content: UCWANINGO lwenkampani ebolekisa ngemali, iWonga, luveza ukuthi abantu baseNingizimu Afrika sebenciphise imali yokuthenga igilosa ukuze bakwazi ukukhokhela i-medical aid, umshwalense nezokuphepha emizini yabo njengoba izinga lempilo liqombola.Ucwaningo lwenziwe kubantu abawu-4 500 abaneminyaka engaphezu kuka-18.Kuvele ukuthi bayahluleka ukukhokhela ama-credit card nezinye izikweletu. Lokhu kusho ukuthi abakwazi ukonga imali nokongela umhlalaphansi.UMnuz James Williams oyinhloko yezokukhangisa eWonga, uthe inhloso yocwaningo lwabo wukuthola ukuthi abantu baphila kanjani njengoba impilo ibiza.“Njengoba impilo ibiza, abantu abasenayo imali yokwenza izidingo zabo. Bayaphoqeleka ukuthi babophe izifociya,” kusho uWilliams.Abantu okukhulunywe nabo kulolu cwaningo u-41% wabantu bahola phakathi kuka-R10 000 no-R25 000 ngenyanga.Kuthiwa bathwele kanzima njengoba besebenzisa u-80% womholo wabo ukukhokhela imizi noma irenti kanti abahola kangconywana basebenzisa u-24% womholo wabo ukwenza lezi zinto.Kuvela ukuthi abahola uR2 500 bona bachitha imali yabo ekuthengeni ukudla nasekuqinisekiseni ukuthi banendawo yokuhlala.Abantu baseNingizimu Afrika abaningi bafuna ukuqinisekisa ukuthi banophahla, bayadla, baphile kahle futhi baya ezikoleni ezikahle.Imali eningi iya ekukhokheleni izindlu (24%), i-medical aid (13%), ukudla/igilosa (11%) nasemalini yesikole (10%).UWilliams uthe bancane kakhulu abantu abakwazi ukuya ezibhedlela ezizimele ngoba abaningi kabanayo imali.Kubantu okwenziwe kubona ucwaningo wu-16% kuphela othe ukwazi ukukhokhela i-medical aid futhi bayakhala ngokuthi iyabiza.Okukhathazayo wukuthi abantu bakhale ngokuthi amabhondi nerenti adla imali yabo eningi.UWilliams uthe labo abakhokhela ama-credit cards nezinye izikweletu bathole ukuthi inzalo inyuke ngo-51%, ikakhulukazi kulabo abahola uR2 500.“Lokhu kusho ukuthi abantu bacwile ezikweletini futhi bayaphoqeleka ukuboleka imali komashonisa nabanye ababolekisi ngemali abangabhalisiwe ngokusemthethweni,” kuchaza uWilliams.U-84% wabaphendulile uthe imali eningi uyichitha ekuthengeni ukudla, u-54% uthe uyichitha ukukhokhela ugesi kanti uphethroli uthatha u-33% wamaholo.“Ukuntenga kwamandla emali kunomthelela omubi njengoba kwenza ukudla kubize, uphethroli onyuka umlibe nogesi obizayo nawo wenza impilo ibize,”kusho uWilliams.Kwabaphendulile ocwaningweni bathe abasathengi izimpahla ezibizayo, abasakwazi ukuzikhipha nokuzijabulisa okuyisibalo esiwu-32%.Bathe baphoqelekile ukunciphisa igilosa abayithenga nyanga zonke nokubopha izifociya.Kuvele ukuthi u-60% wabaphendulile unezingane ezineminyaka engaphansi kuka-21, okufanele bazondle ngo-R971 ngenyanga bengakabali imali yesikole.UWilliams uthe u-10% wabantu abaphendule imibuzo bayaphoqeleka ukuboleka imali ukuze baphile njengoba izindleko zidlula amaholo.Bathe basebenzisa u-90% noma umholo wabo wonke ukuze baphile.U-55% wabantu abaphendulile uthe awukwazi ukonga ikakhulukazi labo abahola kancane.U-59% wabaphendulile uthe awukwazi ukonga imali yomhlalaphansi njengoba abanye bonga u-R1 206 abahola kangcono.Okuthusayo wukuthi abaneminyaka ewu-56 kuya ku-64 abanayo imali abayibekele umhlalaphansi.

ABEKOMITI elilwa nobugebengu eNanda nasezindaweni ezakhelene nayo, bathi akuwenzi umehluko ukuqothwa kwabasolwa ngobugebengu kule ndawo.  Lokhu kulandela isigameko lapho amaphoyisa eqothe abasolwa abathathu kwathi oyedwa waphulukundlela wabaleka, okwezeke eCongo khona eNanda ngoLwesibili ebusuku.Lesi sehlakalo sinconywe kakhulu ngabaningi ezinkundleni zokuxhumana abebenconcoza ngomsebenzi wamaphoyisa.Yize kunjalo, ilungu lekomiti elilwa nobugebengu endaweni, iThekwini Neighbourhood Watch elicele  kugodlwe igama lalo, engxoxweni neSolezwe lithe ukuqothwa kwalezi zigebengu kufana nokuthela amanzi emhlane wedada njengoba sanda isibalo sabesilisa abancane abajoyina iqembu  ezigelekeqe elibizwa nge-West elihlalise lubhojozi umphakathi.“Bevile ku-200 manje abafana abancane abajoyine leli qembu lemigulukudu.  Ukubulawa kwabathathu engikholwa ukuthi bangamalungu aleli qembu elisihlalise kabi, akwenzi mehluko kunalokho kubenza babenolaka kakhulu ngoba uma kufe uzakwabo baphuma zinkalo zonke bantshontshe, babambe inkunzi bagqekeze ngenhloso yokuqoqa imali yokuthi bamngcwabe. Engakatholwa umholi waleli qembu, kusenzima kakhulu,” usho kanjeUthe umholi weqembu cishe uneminyaka engu-21 kanti bazifikela mathupha emizini enezingane zabafana baphoqe abazali ukuthi zijoyine iqembu lakhe. Kukholakala ukuthi abafana banikezwa izibhamu abahlukumeza ngazo umphakathi kanti badayisa nezidakamizwa endaweni. Uthe umkhuba asebewuqalile, ukungena emizini yabantu babatshele ukuthi umuzi bayawudla ngenkani baxoshe abanikazi endlini.“Sifisa ukuthi uhulumeni atshale amasosha ukulwa nalesi sihlava, ngoba kubukeka sengathi amaphoyisa ngeke aphumelele ukulwa naso engalekelelwa,” kuqhuba yena.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa afuna uthuli umsolwa oyedwa ophunyuke wabaleka ngesikhathi bedubulana nawo.“Abasolwa bayamaniswa namacala okubulala iphoyisa uSergeant Yekani Siboniso Thabethe, elokubulawa kwababili bendawonye elenzeka khona eNanda ngoJanuwari, namanye amacala amabili okubulala.  Ngaphambi kokuthi iphoyisa libulawe, kwathathwa isibhamu salo somsebenzi,” kusho uNetshiunda.

AMADODAKAZI wowayengungqongqoshe wezamaBhizinisi kaHulumeni, uMnuz Pravin Gordhan, athi abazi ukuthi bakhuluma ngani labo abagxeka ubaba wawo.Amadodakazi kaGordhan athe ubaba wawo akafanelwe izinhlamba achashwa ngazo. Lokhu akusho enkonzweni yomngcwabo wakhe ebise-ICC.Indodakazi kaGordhan, uNksz Anisha Gordhan, ithe ubaba wayo akufanele agxekelwe ukungenzi kahle kwezinkampani zikahulumeni ezifana ne-SAA, Denel nezinye ebezingaphansi komnyango abewuphethe ngaphambi kokhetho lwangoMeyi.Uthe ubaba wakhe wazama ngakho konke okusemandleni akhe ukuhlenga lezi zinkampani ngesikhathi enikezwa lo mnyango ngo-2018.“Iqiniso ukuthi imali emabhizinisini kahulumeni yaqala ukubhubhudlwa ngo-2009, kwaze kwaba u-2018. Ubuholi obangena ngo-2018 bafica amabhizinisi kahulumeni ebhekene nezinkinga. Abaholi abangena ngalesi sikhathi bazame ngayo yonke indlela ukulungisa izinkinga abazificile.”UNksz Anisha uthe ukuhlaselwa kukaGordhan kubeke impilo yabo engcupheni njengoba ethe kube nezikhathi lapho bebethola khona izinsongo ezibhekiswe kubona bewumndeni.Enye indodakazi kaGordhan, uNksz Priyesha Gordhan, ithe abantu bakuleli akufanele bavume ukudukiswa ilabo abakhuluma izinto ezingelona iqiniso ngoGordhan.“Abantu baseNingizimu Afrika kufanele baqhubeke nokubuka ngeso elijulile izinto ezenzeka phambi kwabo, bengavumi ukudukiswa ilabo abakhuluma abakuthandayo.”Uthe uGordhan ubewubaba onothando ekhaya, wathi ubengaziphakamisile emphakathini.Umngani kaGordhan owayeyiphini lakhe eMnyangweni wezeZimali, uMnuz Mcebisi Jonas, uthe uGordhan ubethukwa kakhulu ilabo ababefuna ukucekela phansi igama lakhe.“Inhloso yabo enkulu babefuna ukuthi uGordhan noMnyango woMgcinimafa behlelwe isithunzi khona babezokwazi ukuzitamuzela emalini yomphakathi.”UJonas uthe baningi abantu abaqhelile kuGordhan ngenxa yokulwa kwakhe nenkohlakalo.“Ubenombono owehlukile ikakhulu uma kukhulunywa indaba yokwakhiwa kabusha kwe-ANC. Lokhu bekumenza ukuthi abe inkomo edla yodwa.”UJonas uchaze ngokugula kukaGordhan.Uthe ngoJulayi, wabatshela ukuthi uphethwe umdlavuza.“Wathi isimo sakhe sibi, wathi utshelwe ukuthi uzophila izinyanga ezintathu kuphela.”UJonas uthe uGordhan ukhombise ukuba nesibindi ngesikhathi ebhekene nokugula.

INHLANGANO eyenza ucwaningo ngakho konke okuthinta izingane, iChildren’s Institute, eseNyuvesi yaseCape Town, isiphakamise ukuthi uhulumeni anyuse isibonelelo sezingane esiwu-R530 okungenani sibe phakathi kuka-R760 no-R1 500.Lolu cwaningo, olubizwa nge-Child Gauge, luveze ukuthi u-71% wezingane zakuleli uphila emakhaya aswele.Ingane eyodwa kweziwu-25 iyashona ngaphambi kokugubha unyaka izelwe.UNkk Lori Lake we-Children’s Institute uthe bathole ukuthi ingane eyodwa kwezine ayikhuli ngendlela efanele ngenxa yokungadli ukudla okunomsoco nokungatholi imfundo efanele.Uthe imfundo yasenkulisa ibalulekile kanti nokudla kuhambisana nokukhula kwengqondo nomzimba. Uthe izingane ezivela emakhaya angenakho ukudla okwanele ziyabonakala ukuthi zilambile nokwenza ingqondo nomzimba kungakhuli kahle.UNkk Lake uthe isibonelelo sezingane yisona esilwa nobuphofu obubhekene nezingane ngakho ukunyuswa kwaso kuzoletha impilo engcono ezinganeni.Ubalule ukuthi nabesifazane kufanele balekelelwe ukuthola umsebenzi nokudla njengoba kuyibona ababhekelela izidingo zezingane.Ngonyaka odlule bezingaphezu kuka-13 million izingane ezihola isibonelelo sikahulumeni.Ikhwelo lokuthi kunyuswe isibonelelo sezingane aliqali ukukhishwa yiChildren’s Institute njengoba uMnuz Mervyn Abrahams, wenhlangango eyenza ucwaningo ngokubiza kokudla nesimo senhlalo, iPietermaritzburg Economic Justice & Dignity Group, ehlale ecela uhulumeni ukuthi anyuse isibonelelo sezingane ukuze zizokwazi ukudla okunomsoco.Uthe ukudla kwezingane ezineminyaka emithathu kuya kweyisishiyagalolunye kubiza u-R825.00 bese kuthi okwengane eneminyaka ewu-10 kuya kwewu-13 kubize u-R898.01UNkk Hlengiwe Zondi, waseMpola ngaphandle kwasePinetown, onezingane ezihola isibonelelo sikahulumeni, uthe bangajabula uma uhulumeni engasinyusa ngoba ukudla kuyabiza.“Kuyabiza ukuthengela izingane ukudla okunomsoco ikakhulukazi lezo eziya enkulisa. U-R530 awaneli, sigcina sesigcwalisela ngemali yokudayisa oswidi nokunye esizama ngakho. Kufanele uhulumeni asizwele ngoba noR370 wabangasebenzi ukhetha ibala.”Ubalule ukuthi uma ethola isibonelelo sezingane uthenga u-2kg kapolony owu-R66.65, u-3kg wama-aphula owu-R45.71, u-4kg kabhanana owu-R58.60, u-7kg wama-orintshi owu-R62.46, amaqanda awu-60 ngoR168.19, olofu bezinkwa bezinsuku eziwu-25 ngenyanga ababiza uR381.14, u-800g we-peanut butter R84.87, u-900g kajamu owu-R38.86, u1kg wemargarine owu-R41.70, ijusi ewu-R120. Konke lokhu kuba wu-R1 068.18.Uthe okunye ukudla okudliwa yizingane kubalwa negilosa yabantu abadala ngakho bayadinga ukuthi isibonelelo sezingane sinyuswe.IChildren’s Institute ibuye yagqugquzela ukuthi izingane kufanele zihambe inkulisa, uhulumeni aqinisekise ukuthi kunothisha abafundisekile ngokuthuthukisa ulwazi lwezingane.

NKOSIKHONA CELEUMASIPALA waseMnambithi, i-Alfred Duma ugcine usifezile isethembiso sokwenza konke okusemandleni ukutakula abadayisi basemgwaqweni bakule ndawo.Lesi sibophezelo senziwe yiMeya yalo NMasipala, uMnuz Zama Sibisi ngesikhathi abadayisi abangu-35 begixatshezwa yilo masipala ngezindlu zokudayisela.UMnuz Sibisi uthe bayakholelwa kakhulu kwiqhaza labadayisi basemgwaqweni wathi yingakho njalo bezibeke eqhulwini izidingo zabo.''Siyakholelwa kakhulu kubasebenzi bethu basemgwaqweni. Siyazi ukuthi banendima abayidlalayo ekufukulweni komnotho wedolobha. Yingakho nje sizimisele ngokubalekelela lapho kunesidingo khona, sizohlala sisiza,“  usho kanje.Mayelana nezindlu ababagixabeze ngazo uthe bakuqaphelile ukuthi zibalulekile kakhulu kubona njengoba uma libalele ilanga beliphelela kubona kanjalo nemvula ibizenzela."Sibe sesibona ukuthi masisukume sibalekelele ngezindlu. Siyakholwa ukuthi zizokwenza izimpilo zabo zibe ngcono kakhulu manje,'' usho kanje.Uthe lolu hlelo alumile, bakhona nabanye abasazoluthola lolu sizo kanti okumqoka kakhulu wukuqinisekisa ukuthi basebenza bejabulile kule ndawo yabo.UNkk Nomalanga Gumede ongomunye wabahlomulile uthe bajabule kakhulu ngezindlu abanikezwe zona.Ulimise ngesihloko elokuthi kwesinye isikhathi bekumane kube lukhuni satshe ukusebenza ungenayo indlu.Uthe babonga ukuthi kwathi uma bezikhalela kulo masipala wangabachizela kodwa kunalokho wathembeka wabuya wabakhela izindlu ezingu-35.UNkk Zandile Mfekayi uthe bese kuphele isikhathi eside edayisa ngaphandle kwendlu, muva nje ukholwa wukuthi sekuzoba ngcono kakhulu.

Ungqongqoshe wezeMfundo eGauteng uMnnuz Matome Chiloane usezwakalise ukushaqeka ethola ukuthi abafundi abane baseQinisweni Secondary School, e-Ivory Park, bazibulele phakathi kuka-Ephreli 26 noMeyi 5 nonyaka.Ngokwesitatimende, isigameko sokuqala senzeka ngo-Ephreli 26 lapho kuthiwa umfundi owayenza uGrade 10 waphuza ushevu ekhaya.Kuthiwa waphuthunyiswa emtholampilo lapho ashonela khona.“NgoLwesine ngoMeyi 2 umfundi kaGrade 11 oyintombazane utholwe efile ekhaya ngabazali bakhe. Kusolwa ukuthi uzibulale ngokudla ushevu,” kusho isitatimende.NgoLwesihlanu, ngoMeyi 3 kuthiwa kunomunye umfundi ongumfana obenza uGrade 11 naye odle ushevu oshonele esibhedlela.NgeSonto, ngoMeyi 5 kuthiwa kunobenza uGrade 12 okusolwa ukuthi udle ushevu ekhaya washonela endleleni ebheke esibhedlela.Umnyango uthe usuthumele ongoti abazokweluleka abafundi esikoleni nezihlobo.UChiloane uthe kubuhlungu ukubona kushona abantu abasebancane.

UNobhala Jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, uthe awakhohlwe amaqembu afuna ukuthi kuhoxiswe uMengameli we-ANC uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa njengomengameli ukuze asebenzisane nale nhlangano kuhulumeni wokubambisana. UMbalula uthe uzwile ukuthi kunamaqembu asabise ngokuthi ngeke axoxe ne-ANC uma kungukuthi ayimhoxisi uRamaphosa.“Abazofika nalesi siphakamiso abahambe bashone ngoba ngeke siyingene eyabo. Siyazi amaqembu azofuna izinto ezithile ukuze asebenzisane nathi, kodwa ekaRamaphosa ngeke siyenze, akayi ndawo,” kusho uMbalula ekhuluma nabezindaba esikhungweni semiphumela yokhetho eMidrand.UMbalula uthe sebeqalile ukubamba izinguyazana ngohulumeni wokubambisana.“Sixoxa nanoma iliphi iqembu. Sixoxa nawo wonke umuntu ngoba ukhetho aluzange luhlonze ozophatha uhulumeni ngayedwana. I-ANC ne-DA amanzi namafutha kodwa sizoxoxa nawo wonke umuntu. Sizoxoxa naneqembu i-Freedom Front Plus,” kusho uMbalula.Usho lokhu nje, iqembu uMkhonto weSizwe eliholwa owayengumengameli we-ANC wezwe uJacob Zuma, lithe lizoxoxa ne-ANC uma isusa uRamaphosa.UMbalula uthe abazange bamthathe kancane uZuma ngoba bebazi ukuthi uyesekwa KwaZulu-Natal, eGauteng naseMpumalanga.I-MK ithole ukwesekwa okukhulu eKZN yadlula i-ANC, kanti ilandelwa yi-IFP.UMbalula uthe bazoxoxa naneMK, wathi kodwa banazo ezinye izinto abangazenza.“Singaba iqembu eliphikisayo ngokusemthethweni, noma sibambisane namanye amaqembu. Asibhekile kuphela ukuthi sibe kuhulumeni.” Uthe ngoMsombuluko, kuzohlangana abaholi abaphezulu benhlangano babhunge ngomkhombandlela.“Kuzobuye kuhlangane nekomiti elibhekele ukusebenza kwansuku zonke kwenhlangano. NgoLwesibili, kuzohlala umhlangano wesigungu esiphezulu okuyiso esizonquma ngokumele kwenzeke. Sizobuyela kwabezindaba sizobatshela ukuthi sihamba nobani kulezi zinguyazana ngohulumeni wokubambisana,” kusho uMbalula.

INHLANGANO, Abahlali baseMjondolo, imemezele ukuthi ithathe isinqumo sokuthi iliboleke i-EFF ivoti layo njengoba kubhekwe okhethweni ngoMeyi 29.Isimemezelo senziwe uMengameli wale nhlangano yabantu abahlala emijondolo, uMnuz S’bu Zikode, ngeSonto.Ubekade esenkundleni yezemidlalo eNkanini, eMayville, eThekwini, abantu bephume ngothi lwabo embuthanweni wabo waminyaka yonke owaziwa ngokuthi i-UnFreedom Day.“Siyiboleka ivoti i-EFF. Abantu okumele bakwazi ukuthi asiyiyona i-EFF futhi asiyijoyini. Uma kudlula ukhetho sobona ukuthi i-EFF ibeka luphi uhlelo lokuhlangabezana nezimfuno zabahlali,” kusho uZikode.Uthe i-EFF izibophezelile odabeni lokubuyiswa komhlaba, kwezomnotho nakwezithinta izwe iPalestine.Uqhube wathi i-EFF iphinde yazibophezela ekuhlangabezaneni nezimfuno zabahlali ezingu-20.UZikode udalule ukuthi ukuvotela kwabo i-EFF akusho ukuthi sebeyiyona nokuthi bazovumelana nayo kuyo yonke into eyishoyo.“Sizoqhubeka nokuthi sibe inhlangano yabantu abahlala emijondolo ezimele yize sizoyeseka ngevoti i-EFF njengoba kubhekwe okhethweni. Umbandela wokubaboleka ivoti ingoba bakwazile ukuphendula kahle bazibophezela,” kusho uZikode.Uthe emhlanganweni wabo bonke abangamalungu abahlali odlule, beyikade ibiziwe namanye amaqembu ezepolitiki lapho abahlali babekade bebeka khona abakufunayo.Uqhube wathi i-EFF ikhombisile ukuvuthwa nokuba nomlando obambekayo.“Namhlanje (esho izolo) besikade sizomemezela nje kodwa isinqumo sathathwa kwiGeneral Assemble yaBahlali eyayingo-Ephreli 7. Isinqumo silandela nochungechunge lwemihlangano ebikade iba semiphakathini yabahlali, akusona nje isinqumo esivele sathathwa abaholi,” kusho uZikode.Uveze ukuthi emuva kwaleyo mihlangano abaholi baBahlali babamba imihlangano ngoMashi 22 kuya kuMashi 24, kudingidwa okwakushiwo abantu.Engxoxweni abe nayo neSolezwe maphakathi nesonto eledlule, uZikode uthe sekuyisikhathi sokuthi i-ANC iphunyuzwe ngoba ihlulekile ukubatakula ebubheni abacwile kubona abahlali.Waveza nokuthi Abahlali sebeyayisaba i-ANC esiphathe izintambo zombuso iminyaka engu-30.

INHLANGANO, Abahlali baseMjondolo, ikhulekela ukuthi i-ANC ikhishwe ngevoti okhethweni lwangoMeyi 29, yengeza ngokuthi “umbuso uyadakana.”Lokhu kuvezwe nguMnuz S’bu Zikode, ongumengameli wale nhlangano, engxoxweni abe nayo neSolezwe izolo.UZikode uthe sesiside isikhathi abantu behlupheka ngakho uyafisa ukuba kunikezwe abanye ithuba lokuphatha izwe.“Lenele ithuba elinikezwe i-ANC, idinga ukuphunyuzwa ngenkulu inhlonipho. Siyalisaba iqembu elibusayo njengamanje, liyingozi kuBahlali baseMjondolo nakubantu baseNingizimu Afrika,” kusho uZikode.Kulindeleke ukuthi ngeSonto eMayville, eThekwini, le nhlangano ibe nomgubo waminyaka yonke ewubiza ngokuthi yi-UnFreedom Day.Lapha izobe yenza isimemezelo ukuthi yiliphi iqembu ezoliseka futhi ilivotele okhethweni.UZikode uthe bebekade benochungechunge lwemihlangano emiphakathini okutholakala khona amalungu ayo, bethatha izimvo nemicabango yabantu.Lo mholi uqhube wathi baphinde bamema amaqembu ezepolitiki ehlukene ukuthi azomukela futhi alalele izimfuno zabantu.“Sibe sesenza umqulu wezimfuno zabantu, sanxenxa amaqembu epolitiki ukuthi azibophezele kulokhu okufunwa ngabahlali ukuthi azokwenza. Besilindele ukuthi aphendule, azibophezele,” kusho uZikode.Uqhube wathi bonke osopolitiki abakhulume nabo bavumile ukuthi bazokwenza okufunwa ngabahlali, ikakhulukazi udaba lokubuyiselwa komhlaba kubantu.Udalule ukuthi abantu bese belilahlile ithemba, besho nokuthi ngeke bavote kodwa bangenelela beyinhlangano.“Sibe nemikhankaso lapho ebesikade sifundisa khona abantu ngokubaluleka kokuvota. Awukwazi ukungavoti bese kuthi ekugcineni ulindele ushintsho. Sesikhathele ukuzwa ngemiqulu yezethembiso yokhetho engafezekiswa yingakho senze owethu,” kusho uZikode.Uthe kusukela ngo-2006 minyaka yonke bagubha i-UnFreedom Day lapho beveza khona ukuthi abakakhululeki ngoba umhlaba awukabuyeli kubantu, abantu babhukuda ebubheni.Ukhale nangesibalo esibhezulu sabantu abaneziqu abaduve nazo emakhaya, abangasebenzi.“Nabantu bangathi awusile ekhanda uthi uhlala emjondolo bese uthi ukhululekile. Ngesikhahi izwe ligubha uSuku lweNkululeko, abantu bagcwala izinkundla bephelezele ongqongqoshe, izinsizwa nezintombi ezimbalwa ezikhululekile,” kusho uZikode.Uthe laba bantu abagcwala izinkundla bagcina sebethi nabo bakhululekile ngoba nakhu basuke benikezwe isikibha samahhala nokudla ngalolo suku.UZikode uthe ngokusho kwabo, ukuthi abakhululekile akukhona ukubukela phansi imizamo yabantu abahola umzabalazo owawulwa nobandlululo okubalwa kubo noChris Hani.“Esikubona kwenzeka manje akusikhona lokhu okwakulwelwa ngabaholi abadela izimpilo zabo ukuze kuzuzwe inkululeko. Ayikabi bikho inkululeko,” kusho uZikode.

KUHLATSHWE ikhwelo kwabafundi bakwa-matric ukuthi bangapholisi maseko bafake izicelo zoxhaso  esikhwameni iNational Students’ Financial Aid Scheme (NSFAS).Lokhu kulandela ukuvulwa ngokusemthethweni kohlelo lokufaka izicelo zoxhaso lokufunda ngonyaka ozayo.Isifundazwe iKwaZulu-Natal yisona esihamba phambili ngezicelo ezitholwe yilesi sikhwama ngesikhathi siqala ukwamukela izicelo ngoLwesihlanu.Kuthe kushona ilanga ngoLwesihlanu bese bebalelwa ngaphezu kuka-172 000 abese befaka izicelo.UNgqongqoshe weMfundo ePhakeme, uDkt Nobuhle Nkabane, unxuse abafuna uxhaso ukuthi abangawapholisi amaseko. “Sivule lolu hlelo ukuze izitshudeni zikwazi ukusheshe zifake izicelo zokuxhaswa yi-NSFAS. Usuku lokuvala ukufaka izicelo nguDisemba 15, nonyaka kodwa izitshudeni nabafundi abangalindi kuze kube ngumzuzu wokugcina ngaphambi kokufaka izicelo.” Uthe nabafundi abenza u-matric abaqala izivivinyo zabo, abafake izicelo manje.“Nalabo abenza u-matric abazobhala sithi abafake izicelo zoxhaso zangonyaka ozayo bangaze balinde kuze kuphume imiphumela yabo. Silindele ukuthi kuvalwa uhlelo lokufakwa kwezicelo sibe sesithole ezibalelwa ku-800 000,” kuqhuba uDkt Nkabane.Uthe abagcini ngokuxhasa ngemali yokufunda labo abazali babo abahola kusuka ku-R350 000 kuya phansi.“Siboleka nemali yokufunda nalabo abazali babo abahola kusuka ku-R350 000 kuya ku-R600 000 ngonyaka. Leli qoqo laziwa nge-missing middle kanti siyazi kukhona nabanye ababalelwa ku-161 000, abafunda ngemifundaze ehlukene abangathembele kwi-NSFAS.” Lolu hlelo lokufawa kwezicelo lwenziwe nasezikoleni  eziyisishiyagalolunye kuleli. KwaZulu-Natal lwenziwe e-Edendale Technical High, eMgungundlovu.Umlawuli we-NSFAS, uMnuz Freeman Nomvalo, uthe iKZN yisona sifundazwe esinesibalo esiphezulu esiqale safaka izicelo. Uthe kubalulekile ukuthi izitshudeni zilethe izimfanelo ezifanele neziqondile uma zifaka izicelo.Uqhube wathi ngeke uxhaswe uma kungukuthi awamukelwanga esikhungweni semfundo ephakeme.Uveze ukuthi abahola isondlo sabantwana bayaxhaswa, akukho mgadagada eminingi edingeka kubona.“Kwabafaka izicelo zoxhaso kumele bangene kwi-website ye-NSFAS, bagcwalise imininingwane bese befaka ulwazi oludingekayo. Sihlela ukuthi kuphele unyaka sibe sesibaphendulile abazoxhaswa,” kusho uNomvalo.Uthe imininingwane okufakwe ngayo izicelo bayibheka ezinhlakeni ezifana nesikhwama esiqoqa intela iSARS, ukuthi iyahambisana.

UNGQONGQOSHE wezeMali uMnuz Enoch Godongwana, uthe isibonelelo sabangasebenzi esiwuR350, sizoqala ukukhokhwa sesiwuR 370 ngo-Ephreli 1, nonyaka. UGodongwana usho lokhu ekhuluma ePhalamende, ngesikhathi ecacisa ngodaba lokwenyuswa kwemali.Lokhu kusho ukuthi imali izokwenyuka ngoR20 ukusuka kule ejwayelekile ebiholwa abantu nyanga zonke.UGodongwana uthe sebefinyelele esivumalweneni sokunyusa isibonelelo.“Kuyintokozo kimi ukuthi sigcine sivumelene ukwenyusa imali isuka kuR350 iya kuR370 kusukela ngo-Ephreli 1. Lokhu kuyingxenye yokuhlonipha amalungelo abantu bakithi,’’ kuchaza uGodongwana.Imali yesibonelelo sabangasebenzi yethulwa emuva kokugadla kweCovid-19 kuleli, eyashiya abantu abaningi bengenayo imisebenzi. Kunesikhalo sokuthi imali incane kakhulu ngoba izindleko zokuphila zimba eqolo.I-Covid -19 igadle okokuqala ngqa kuleli ngoMashi 2020, lapho kwavalwa izwe akwangasebenza lutho. Umnotho wakhahlamezeka kakhulu kwavalwa izimboni kwafa inqwaba yabantu ababehaqwe yiCovid-19.Ngaphambi kwesimemezeleo sikaGodongwana, uMengameli uCyril Ramaphosa wakuveza ukuthi izonyuswa le mali ngoba iwusizo ebantwini. URamaphosa wathi uthola imibiko emihle ngale mali ukuthi iyasiza.

UCWANINGO lwakamuva lweStatsSA luveza ukuthi u-50% wabantu bakuleli uthembele ezibonelelweni zikahulumeni ukuze uphile.Kuvela ukuthi imizi ethembele ezibonelelweni zikahulumeni isuke ku-12.8% ngo-2002 yaya ku-39.4% ngo-2023.Umuzi nomuzi onomuntu oyedwa othola isibonelelo isibalo sakhona sisuke ku-30.8% ngo-2002 saya ku-50% ngo-2023.Isibalo sinyuswe kakhulu yisibonelelo sikaR350 wabangasebenzi.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi uhulumeni uveze ukuthi bawu-18 million abantu bakuleli abathola izibonelelo zikahulumeni.Umphathi weStatsSA, uMnuz Risenga Maluleke, uthe bawu-9.8 million abantu bakuleli abane-medical aid, iningi labo ngabamhlophe njengoba benza u-71.7% wabantu bakuleli abane-medical aid.Uveze ukuthi abaningi abahola izibonelelo zikahulumeni bagcwele e-Eastern Cape, kulandele iLimpopo nezinye izifundazwe.Yize isibalo sabathola ugesi sinyuke saya ku-89.8% ngo-2023 kodwa kuvela ukuthi ikota yabantu bakuleli isabasa phansi ukuze ipheke, abanye basebenzisa igesi nopharafini.UMnuz Mervyn Abrahams, wenhlangano eyenza ucwaningo ngokubiza kokudla nesimo senhlalo, iPietermaritzburg Economic Justice and Dignity Group, uthe kuyiqiniso ukuthi abantu abaningi bathembele ezibonelelweni zikahulumeni kodwa kufanele zithi ukunyuka.Uthe abantu badinga isibonelelo esizobasiza ukuthi beze nezindlela zabo zokuphila.Uveze ukuthi kunocwaningo akade belwenza lapho bebenika intsha efunde kumaTVET College izibonelelo kanti le ntsha ikwazile ukuyofuna imisebenzi, enye yavula amabhizinisi amancane kanti enye isebenzise le mali ukulima amaveji ewadayisela umphakathi.Ubalule ukuthi izibonelelo ziphelela ekudleni futhi nazo azanele ukuthengela abantu ukudla okunomsoco.Ugqugquzele uhulumeni ukuba eze nesibonelelo esizolekelela abantu ukuthi bakwazi ukuziphilisa.

Imqoka impilo yomntwana ezinsukwini ezingu-1000 ezelwe. Lesi kuba yisikhathi sokusimama komzimba, nokuswabuluka engqondweni nasemoyeni komntwana. Futhi lesi kuba yisikhathi sokwakheka kwesisekelo sempilo yengomuso enganeni.Uhlelo olwaziwa nge-1000 Hospital Programme - oluqhamuka nabakwa-Huggies  bembambisene noMnyango wezeMpilo luhlomisa omama abazobeletha ngolwazi namathuluzi amqoka ukunakekela impilo yabo neyabantwana abazelwe. Lo mkhankaso uzophinde uvule amathuba omsebenzi kulabo abafisa ukwenza umsebenzi wezempilo emphakathini.Selokhu lwaqala lolu hlelo ngo-2013, lwaziwa nge-Huggies Health Workers noma iHuggies Moms, sekuqeqeshwe abesifazane bathunyelwa ezibhedlela ezingu-113 eNingizimu Afrika. Iningi lalezi zibhedlela zisezindaweni ezishoda ngezidingo-ngqangi njengakoSoweto eGauteng, eMlaza KwaZulu-Natal naseKhayelitsha eWestern Cape.Esinye sezizathu zokuqalwa kohlelo olunjengalolu kwaba ukucaca kwesidingo sokufundisa abantu ngobumqoka benhlanzeko, impilo yengane nokondleka kwayo. Lezi zinto zineqhaza elikhulu ekukhuleni kahle komntwana osanda kuzalwa nempilo kamama wayo. ENingizimu Afrika ukusondeza lokhu kwesekwa kubalulekile emkhankasweni wokuqinisekisa impilo enhle, ikakhulu ngesikhathi owesifazane esakhulelwe ukuze umntwana afike ephile kahle.Echaza ngalokhu, ngaphambi kosuku i-Baby #BumpDay olungomhla ka-24 Julayi, uCamilla Mgiba oyi-Junior Brand Manager kwa-Huggies, uthe lolu suku luveza ithuba lokuqwashisa ngesidingo sokunakekelwa okulinganayo komama abalindele ukuteta."Uhlelo lwe-1000 Day Hospital Programme seluzakhele igama ngokuba yinqola ethwele ulwazi nezimfundiso ezifanele. Ithimba lethu iHuggies Moms lisebenzisana nodokotela nabahlengikazi amitholampilo nasezibhedlela abazinze kuzo. Sebeyingxenye emqoka yomsebenzi wabezempilo. Ngomsebenzi wabo, besiza omama abalindele ukubeletha, bayakwazi ukusondeza ulwazi oludingekayo olungalekelela labo mama endleleni yabo nangesikhathi esibucayi ngemuva kokubeletha. Singasho nje ukuthi kuze kube manje ithimba le-Huggies Moms selisebenze ama-shift angu-230 lisiza amakhulu omama ekuzinakekeleni bona nabantwana abasanda kuzalwa," kusho uMgiba.Ithimba le-Huggies Moms lisiza kakhulu ngokubonisa abakhulelwe ngokuzinakekela nokuhlelela abantwana besesesiswini baze bafike emhlabeni. Baphinde basize abezempilo ngokulungiselela umama ngolwazi lokuzinakekela sebesemakhaya, bebanika amacebo okubalwa kuwo ukuvama ukugona umntwana enamathele esikhumbeni sakho, ukushintsha amanabukeni, ukuncelisa ibele nokuhlela isimo umntwana osanda kuzalwa azokhula kahle kuso.Kumanje ithimba le-Huggies Moms lihambela izibhedlela zomphakathi namaklinikhi usuku nosuku behambisa izifundo nosizo oludingekayo. Bayakwazi nokuhlela ukuxoxa nomama ngabanye ukuze bezwe kabanzi ngabakudingayo. Kule mikhankaso basebenzisa nemifanekiso ukuze imilayezo yabo ifinyelele ngendlela ezwakalayo.Ngaphandle kokufundisa, ithimba le-Huggies Moms liphinde linikwe umsebenzi wokusabalalisa namasampula emikhiqizo njengamanabukeni nama-wipes okwesula umntwana osanda kuzalwa."Izinsuku ezifana ne-#BumpDay zibekelwe imigubho kwa-Huggies - zisinika ithuba lokubheka indlela esesiyihambile namagalelo enziwe yimikhankaso efana ne-1000 Day Programme. Kuyasithokozisa ukubona umehluko owenziwe yilolu hlelo kubantu besifazane nasemiphakathini. Sizolokhu ziyilandela imiphumela emihle yalolu hlelo olumqoka kangaka," kwengeza uMgiba.

Umndeni wakwaGcaba usukhiphe isitatimende lapho uthi ufuna iziphathimandla zinike ithuba ilungu lawo uMnuz Mfundo Gcaba ithuba lokuthi achaze ngemali okuthiwa wayifakela omunye wabasolwa ecaleni lokubulawa kuka-AKA.Ecaleni lika-AKA, owadutshulwa ngoFebhuwari nyakenye, amaphoyisa abophe uLindokuhle Thabani Mkhwannazi, Lindani Zenzele Ndimande, Eddie Syanda Myeza, Mzwethemba Harvy Gwabeni noLindokuhle Mhlaliseni Ndimande.Ngesonto eledlule ngesikhathi umbuso wenza izethulo zokuphikisana nesicelo sebheyili sabasolwa, uMshushisi onkhulu  u-Adv Elvis Gcweka waveza ukuthi uGwabeni washayela uGcaba ucingo.Uthe ngemuva kwalokho kwangena uR800 000 ebhange likaGwabeni.Umndeni wakwaGcaba uthe kusuka kuvele igama likaMfundo kuningi ukuqagela kubantu ngokuthi leyo mali kwakungeyani.Uthe uyayethemba ingalo yomthetho futhi uzobambisana nayo.Uveze ukuthi uMfundo ngusomabhizinisi ophumelele onamabhizinisi ezimayini zamalahle namatekisi.“Kubalulekile ukuveza ukuthi ukushintshana kwemali okwenzeka phakathi kwakhe noMnuz Gwabeni kwakuqondene namabhizinisi. Lokhu kushintshana osekwenzeke isikhathi eside kungaqinisekiswa ngobufakazi basebhange futhi akukusha,” kusho isitatimende.Sithe umndeni ukhathazekile ngokuthi abomthetho abakamthinti uMfundo ukuzwa uhlangothi lwakhe lodaba. Uthe unxuswa ukuthi anikwe ithuba  lokuthi bamuzwe.“Kusemqoka ukuqonda ukuthi uMfundo uwuqinisekisile umndeni ukuthi akukho okumhlanganisa nezenzo zobugebengu futhi akanaso isizathu sokuzibandakanya nazo. Konke akuqhuba emabhizinisini kusemthethweni futhi akukho akufihlela umphakathi nomthetho.”Umndeni uthe uyazwelana nomndeni ka-AKA kanjalo nokaTibz Motsoane naye owashona kulesi sigameko.

BAYAQHUBEKA nokulwela ukuthi baqashwe ngokugcwele wuMasipala weTheku, abebengabasebenzi ngaphansi kohlelo loMnyango wezeMisebenzi kaHulumeni olubizwa nge- Expanded Public Works Programme, abamiswe emva kokuthi kuthiwe izinkontileka zabo seziphelelwe yisikhathi.Ngenyanga edlule umasipala wamemezela ukuthi ngeke zivuselelwe izinkontileka zabasebenza ngaphansi kwalolu hlelo abevile ku- 4000. Phakathi kwezizathu ezibekiwe, ukhala ngokuncishiswa kwemali yesibonelelo enikezwa umasipala wuMnyango wezeMisebenzi kaHulumeni ukuxhasa lolu hlelo, isuka R42 million nyakenye yabangu- R18.79 million kulo nyaka. Umasipala ugcizelele ukuthi uzoqasha kuphela abangu-1 276 ukwenza lo msebenzi, waveza ukuthi kuzothathwa abasha kwazise abebevele besebenza sikhathi sabo, seminyaka emibili senkonteleka okwakuvunyelwene ngayo, sesiphelile kwabaningi.UNobhala wenyunyana emele laba basebenzi, i-Municipal and Allied Trade Union of South Africa eThekwini (Matusa), uMnuz Xolani Maxhegu ekhuluma neSolezwe, uthe abakalilahli ithemba njengoba zisaqhubeka izingxoxo okuhloswe ngazo ukuthi laba basebenzi babuyiselwe emsebenzini baphinde baqashwe ngokugcwele.“Lolu daba sesiludlulisele kwikhomishini ebhekelele izindaba ezithinta abasebenzi, i-Commission for Conciliation, Mediation and Arbitration (CCMA). Sizohlala nomqashi ngasekuqaleni kwenyanga ezayo ukuze sizwe izincomo zale khomishini. Emva kwalokho sizodlulela eNkantolo yezabaSebenzi ukuze inqume ngalolu daba,” usho kanje.Uthe yize lolu hlelo kungolwesikhashana ngenhloso yokuthi kusinwe kudedelwane kodwa kunabasebenzi asebedonse iminyaka eminingi besebenza, osekwenze bangena shi ezikweletini kwazise bese bezitshelile ukuthi ngeke izinkontileka zabo zisamiswa.Ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kuzungeza izwi eliqoshiwe okukholakala ukuthi ngelikaNobhala we-ANC esifundeni ITheku, uMnuz Musa Nciki, okuthiwa liqoshwe ngesikhathi ekhuluma nezithameli ePlayhouse ngeSonto, ngesikhathi kuhambele ikomiti elibhekelele ukusebenza kwale nhlangano kuzwelonke.Kule nkulumo, uNciki usola laba basebenzi ngakubize ngokubumba inyunyana yabo i-Matusa, ngenhloso yokuthi ibalwele ukuze baqashwe ngokugcwele wumasipala.  Uphinde aveze ukuthi emaqoqweni abo ku-WhatsApp lapho babelana khona ngezindaba, ngaphambi kokhetho babegqugquzelana ukuthi bengayivoteli le nhlangano, wanxusa iMeya entsha uMnuz Cyril Xaba ukuthi angagedluki kokwaqalwa nguMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda obeyimeya phambili ekutheni lolu hlelo luqalwe phansi.UMaxhegu uthe inkulumo kaNciki inobudedengu njengoba inyunyana ingabunjwanga abasebenzi balolu hlelo, seyineminyaka eminingi ikhona futhi ivule izandla kuwona wonke umsebenzi nabangekho ngaphansi kwe-EPWP. Uthe bezikhona izinkulumo ezingehli kahle kubasebenzi njengoba iningi labo lisolwa ngokuthi lavotela i-MK ngokhetho olwedlule okukholakala ukuthi kungenye yezimbangela zokuxoshwa kwabo.

ABAKHAHLANYEZWA yizikhukhula zango-2022, abasahlala ezakhiweni zesikhashana, bathi sebelilahlile ithemba kwi-ANC.Banxuse amaqembu angenele ukhetho KwaZulu-Natal ukuba abakhiphe ezindaweni zesikhashana abahleli kuzo.Lokhu bakusho ngesikhathi kunenkulumo-mpikiswano yamaqembu angenele ukhetho KwaZulu-Natal ebihlelwe iziko lezindaba elinguzakwabo weSolezwe, i-IOL.Owakhahlamezwa yizikhukhula, uNksz Sibongile Mkhize, utshele abebehambele inkulumo-mpikiswano ebiseMhlanga, ukuthi sebekhathele ukuhlala ezindaweni zesikhashana.“Njengamanje kwelulwa inkontileka yakule ndawo esihlaliswe kuyona. Kwenzekani ngemali eyakhishwayo ukuba silekelelwe? Ngiyabonga nge-ANC. Ngizalelwe kuyo, ubaba anginaye ngenxa yayo kodwa ayikho ingqubekela phambili.“Kuyimanje sihlala ndawonye ezindlini. Akekho umuntu ongavuma ukuthi ahlale endlini nomuntu angamazi. Kuyimanje kuyaliwa, abantu bayafa. Sicela ukuthi kuthi kuphela izinyanga eyisithupha sibe sesiphumile lapha. Ayisancengani ngempela manje!”Okhulumela i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mafika Mndebele, uthe iningi labantu abakhahlanyezwa yizikhukhula selahlelelwa izindlu.“Cishe u-70% wabo usakhelwa izindlu.”UMndebele uthe inkinga enkulu ukuthola umhlaba okuzokwakhelwa kuwo abantu.Omele i-IFP KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, unxuse abakhahlanyezwa yizikhukhula ukuba bakhombise intukuthelo yabo okhethweni oluzayo.“Ukulinda izinyanga eziyisithupha angeke kunisize ngalutho. Ninethuba lokuba nizwakalise uvo lwenu ezinsukwini ezizayo. Lisebenziseni ngobuhlakani leli thuba.”Omele i-DA embangweni wesikhundla sikandunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Chris Pappas, uthe uzokuba nomhlangano nabakhahlanyezwa izikhukhula.“Akusithina esiphethe lapha eThekwini kodwa njengeqembu eliphikisayo umsebenzi wethu ukuthi sibange umsindo, ukuze labo abaphethe bezokwenza umsebenzi wabo.”Ilungu le-EFF, uMnuz Magasela Mzobe, lithe kufanele kupheze ukwehliswa ngemilenze kwemali ekhishelwa ukusiza abasuke bekhahlanyezwe izikhukhula.“Uhulumeni kufanele uthathe umhlaba ngaphandle kwesinxephezelo ukuze singeke sibe nenkinga yokuswelakala komhlaba wokwakhela abantu. Lokhu kukhona emqulwini wethu wezethembiso zokhetho.”Omele iRise Mzansi embangweni wesikhundla sikandunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nonkululeko Hlongwane-Mhlongo, uthe bayavinjwa uma bethi bafuna ukulekelela abakhahlamezwe izikhukhula. “Uma sifika emahholo sitshelwa ukuthi kunezingane ezingadlile, kunomamama abangenazingubo zokulala, sijikiswa emasangweni nosizo. Amakhansela angafuni ukusiza imiphakathi ayasijikisa thina esifika nosizo.”

KULOBIZA inhlansi yethemba kubefundisi abephezu kombhidlango wokuhlanganisa uNdunankulu kaZulu, uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi nosihlalo we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Siboniso Duma, okwasuka ngabo umsindo ngesikhathi kunomcimbi wokukhumbula iSilo uDinuzulu kaCetshwayo.Abaholi bamabandla bathe banethemba lokuthi laba baholi bazogcina bebuyisene. Lokhu bakusho emva kokuhlangana noButhelezi, eThekwini, ngoLwesine.Usihlalo wenhlangano yamabandla KwaZulu-Natal, iKZN Christian Council (KZNCC), uBhishophi Nkosinathi Myaka, uthe baxoxa nabo bonke abaholi abathinteka embangweni wombhobho owenzeka phambi kweSilo uMisuzulu Sinqobile kaZwelithini noMengameli, uCyril Ramaphosa.“Okusinika ithemba lokuthi kuzokuba khona ukubuyisana ukuthi bonke abaholi esixoxa nabo, akekho okhombisa ukungahambisani nemizamo yokubuyisana. Bonke bayakwemukela ukungenelela kwethu.”Kuze kube manje imizamo yokuqeda umsindo owasuka KwaCeza ibingakaphumeleli.Umhlangano wamakhosi nekhabhinethi laKwaZulu-Natal owawubizelwe ukuzoxoxa lolu daba wafinyelela kwangqingetshe.Umhlangano wabaholi bamabandla noButhelezi ubugxile kakhulu ekugqugquzeleni ukuthi kube nokuthula njengoba kubhekwe okhethweni.UMyaka uthe abafuni ukuthi iKwaZulu-Natal iphinde igubuzelwe udlame lwezepolitiki oseluke lwabonakala ngaphambilini kulesi sifundazwe.“Ngenxa yokhetho oluzayo kunokushukuma kwezinto. Asifuni ukuthi izinto zigcine ziphuma esandleni, sibone izinto esake sazibona ngaphambilini. Ingakho sithe asingenelele kungakonakali.”UMyaka uthe kunomkhuba omusha abawuqaphelayo, lapho osopolitiki behlisana isithunzi.“Kufanele ikhuzwe le nto. Lo mkhuba wokucekelana phansi isithunzi angeke usiyise phambili.”Unobhala weKZNCC KwaZulu-Natal, uBishophi Nkosinathi Zondi, uthe baxoxa nawo wonke amaqembu angenele ukhetho KwaZulu-Natal, benxenxa ukuba kube nokubekezelelana.UZondi uthe batshele amalungu ebandla kuso sonke isifundazwe ukuba abheke isimo.UButhelezi uthe unethemba lokuthi ukhetho oluzayo luzokuba ngolukhululekile.“Emva kwemithandazo yabaholi bamabandla, nginethemba lokuthi angeke kube nezigameko zodlame.”UButhelezi uwushayele ihlombe umhlangano wayizolo, waveza ukuthi kuwo kukhulekelwe iSilo nendlunkulu.“Indlela eya phambili izokhanya njengoba isisekelo sakho konke ebesikwenza namhlanje, kungumkhuleko.”Khonamanjalo: AbakwaButhelezi endlini yaseMcakwini, bazokuba nomcimbi wokubungaza ukuqokwa kukaButhelezi njengoNdunankulu kaZulu.UButhelezi waqokelwa kulesi sikhundla ngasekuqaleni konyaka, evala isikhala esavulwa ukukhothama kwenkosi Mangosuthu Buthelezi.Umcimbi wokuhlonipha uButhelezi uzokuba eBabanango, kusasa.AbakwaButhelezi babekade bezinze eMcakwini, ngaphambi kokuthi iSilo uShaka kaSenzangakhona sinqobe inkosi uPhungashe, owayehola abakwaButhelezi ngaleso sikhathi.

NJENGOBA amaqembu ezepolitiki ematasa nezinguyaza ngokubumba uhulumeni wokubambisana kuleli, abamabhizisini nosomnotho bafuna kube nozinzo kungashintshwa kakhulu imigomo elawula izwe. Abamabhizinisi bathe akumele kubaleke abatshalimali njengoba abavoti bephoqe ukuthi amaqembu asebenzisane ezweni lonke ngenxa yokuthi alikho iqembu elidle umhlanganiso elizokwazi ukubumba uhulumeni ngalodwana.Umengameli weBusiness Unity South Africa, uMnuz Mxolisi Mgojo, uthe kumele uhulumeni ozobunjwa alandele imigomo yoMthethosisekelo.Uthe kumele uhulumeni alungise izikhalazo zomphakathi. “Silindele uhulumeni ukuthi aseke imigomo eyeseka ukuhweba kwezimakethe ngokukhululeka, umkhakha ozimele ube neqhaza olibambayo. Kumele kubhekwane nenkinga yokungasebenzi kwabantu, izinselelo ezibhekene nomphakathi, kwakhiwe ngokuthi kube namakhono azokhulisa umnotho.” Uthe kumele kuliwe nenkohlakalalo, abantu bakwazi ukuthola izidingo abazifunayo. Ubalule ukuthi kumele amaqembu abambisane akwazi ukuhlukanisa izwe kanjalo neqembu.Isikhulu esiphezulu somkhandlu wosomabhizinisi abamnyama, iBlack Business Council, uMnuz Kganki Matabane, sithe kudingeka kubekwe izwe phambili kunamaqembu ezepolitiki.UMatabane uthe akumele kushitshwe imigomo okulawulwa ngayo izwe.“Kumele izwe liqhubeke nentando yeningi okumanje kubuswa ngayo, abaholi baxoxisane baphinde bavumelane kuphinde kube nozinzo. Lokhu kuzodonsa abatshalimali bangabaleki uma bebona ukuthi sekushintshe izinto.” Abanye osomnotho baveze ukuthi basibheke ngabomvu isinqumo samaqembu azosebenzisa ukubumba uhulumeni.Lokhu kulandela ukuthi i-ANC ikwazi ukudla umhlanganiso ezifundazweni ezinhlanu, kuzwelonke idinga amanye amaqembu ukuze yakhe uhulumeni.Abatshalimali kwabona basibheke ngabomvu isinqumo sokuthi imaphi amaqembu azobambisana ukwakha uhulumeni kuleli. IRandi beliqinile njengoba bekuvotwa kuleli.Abanye bakhuluma eyokubambisana phakathi kwe-DA ne-ANC ukuthi kungadala uzinzo kuleli.UNobhala Jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, uthe baxoxa nawo wonke amaqembu, abakhethi phela emasini ngokubumba uhulumeni.

UFAKAZI woMbuso, iMantshi uNkk Vivienne Cronje, ufunde isitatimende esiveze ukuthi abamangalelwa bashayela uKelly Khumalo ucingo ngesikhathi sebesuka beyodubula umufi uSenzo Meyiwa.Kuvela lokhu nje phambilini ofakazi ababesendlini bathi uMeyiwa wavinjwa esehamba, kwathiwa akabuyele endlini azovalelisa kahle nokwathi emuva kwalokho kwaba yisikhashana kwangena abahlaseli.UNkk Cronje ufunde isitatimende sikammangalelwa wesibili uBongani Ntanzi athi wasenza evuma iqhaza lakhe ekufeni kukaMeyiwa. UMeyiwa  wadutshulwa wabulawa ekubo kaKelly ngo-2014 eVosloorus, eGauteng.Ufakazi uthe uNtanzi walethwa kuyena wathi ufisa ukubhala isitatimende achaze konke akwaziyo ngalolu daba. Uthe uNtanzi wamtshela ukuthi yena washayelwa wummangalelwa wesihlanu uFisokuhle Ntuli emazisa ngetoho. Ufakazi uthe uNtanzi wasuka eCarletonville, eGauteng, waya ehostela eVosloorus eyozwa kahle ngomsebenzi ayebizelwa wona. Uthe kulapho abamba khona umhlangano nommangalelwa wokuqala uMzikawukhulekwa Sibiya nowesihlanu uNtuli.Uthe bamtshela ukuthi kuyobulawa uMeyiwa nokuwumsebenzi abawunikwe wuKelly. “UCarlos (ummangalelwa wesithathu) noMaphisa (ummangalelwa wesine) bashayela uKelly ucingo bemazisa ukuthi konke kuqondile, sesiyeza. Sasihamba nePolo Vivo kodwa ezimpambanweni zomgwaqo sahlangana nenye iPolo Vivo yabanye esasizohamba nabo,’’ kusho isitatimende sikaNtanzi.Isitatimende siveza ukuthi uNtanzi nommangalelwa wesithathu uMthobisi Mncube yibona abangena endlini. Kuvela ukuthi ummangalelwa wesithathu wabakhomba ngesibhamu wathi abalale phansi kodwa umufi uMeyiwa wathatha isihlalo wazama ukushaya uMncube.Kuvele ukuthi balwa wabe eyadutshulwa uMeyiwa, uNtanzi waphuma ngejubane namaselula. UNtanzi uthe abanye abamangalelwa bambona ukuthi uthukile bamsabisa ngokuthi uma eke wakhuluma nje uzofa.Isitatimende sikaNtanzi siveza nokuthi umndeni wommangalelwa wokuqala uSibiya wake waba nenguyazana ngalolu daba. Kuvele ukuthi omunye wodadewabo bakaSibiya wayefuna ukumceba emaphoyiseni ukuthi uyathinteka ekufeni kukaMeyiwa.Icala liguqele ukuthi libuyele enkantolo kusasa lapho kuzoqhutshekwa kulalelwe ubufakazi boMbuso.

ABAMANGALELWA ecaleni lokufa kukaSenzo Meyiwa bathi bagabe ngofakazi wabo oyiphoyisa ozobizwa azochitha okushiwo wozakwabo abangabaphenyi.Ummeli wabamangalelwa u-Advocate Thulani Mngomezulu, uthe bazobiza ufakazi uWarrant Officer Meshack Makhubu onobufakazi obuphikisana nabaphenyi.UMeyiwa owayeyisilomo se-Orlando Pirates neBafana Bafana, wadutshulwa wabulawa ekubo kwentombi yakhe uKelly Khumalo eVosloorus, eGauteng ngo 2014.Kuboshwe abalisa abahlanu abaquliswa icala lokufa kukaMeyiwa kodwa bayawaphika wonke amacala abethweswe wona.UMbuso umi kwelokuthi abamangalelwa bathengwa, base bemphumela inqina uMeyiwa bamkakisa okwenyamzane bamjuqa.Ummeli uMngomezulu ubepheka ngemibuzo uSergeant Batho Mokgola ngesikhathi eveza ukuthi bazobiza uMakhubo oyiphoyisa. UMngomezulu usola abaphenyi becala ngokungathembeki ngendlela abasebenze ngayo udaba lokufa kukaMeyiwa.UMngomezulu uthe amaphoyisa abopha ummangalelwa wokuqala uMuzikawukhulelwa Sibiya enza sengathi ambophela olunye udaba kodwa asembuza ngolukaMeyiwa.Uthe ngesikhathi embopha athatha iselula yakhe eyiphenya ngodaba lukaMeyiwa kodwa ebe engaboshelwe lona nokuyinto ekhomba ukungathembeki.UMngomezulu uthe amaphoyisa ahlukana phakathi ngalolu daba ephikisana ngesikhathi sekufanele kube khona ababoshwayo.Phambilini elinye iphoyisa lafakaza lasho ukuthi abaphenyi bahlukana phakathi.Uthe ngaphandle kukaMakhubo kunabanye ofakazi abasazobizwa bezofakazela abamangalelwa kuleli cala.Ngaphambi kwalokho uMbuso ubize uSergeant Papi Blondie Tsiye owathatha amasampula abamangalelwa olibofuzo.UMngomezulu ucele ukuthi icala lisheshe liguqe ukuze ayolungisa kahle izitatimende zofakazi abazobizwa bezofakazela abamangalelwa.Kulindeleke ukuthi icala liqhubeke ngoMsombuluko lapho okuzobe kubhekwe khona uMngomezulu ukuthi umisa kanjani

INHLANGANO emele abaphathi bamanyuvesi i-Universities South Africa (USAf), isiyalele umlawuli wesikhashana weNational Students’ Financial Aid Scheme (NSFAS), ukuthi alungise ngokushesha uhlelo lwezobuchwepheshe balesi sikhwama obenza kube nzima ukuhambisa imininingwane yezitshudeni.Le nhlangano ezibophezele ukuthi izosebenzisana nomlawuli uMnuz Freeman Nomvalo, oqale umsebenzi wakhe ngeledlule, ithe ayinankinga nokuqhubeka ukukhokha imihlomulo yezitshudeni kodwa inkinga isohlelweni lwalesi sikhwama olungabavumeli ukuthi bafake imininingwane yezitshudeni.UNomvalo unxuse ukuthi kube nokubambisana ezinhlakeni ezehlukene okubalwa i-USAF, izinhlangano zezitshudeni, abasebenzi beNSFAS, abamele amakolishi amakhono ama-TVET njengoba enikwe izinyanga ezingu-12, ukulungisa izinkinga ezihaqe isikhwama.UDkt Phethiwe Matutu, isikhulu esiphezulu se-USAf, utshele isiteshi sethelevishini, ukuthi akulungiswe ngokushesha izinkinga ezikhona kwiNSFAS.Uthe kunezitshudeni namanje okungacaci ukuthi zilutholile yini uxhaso noma cha.“Labo abafake izimangalo kwiNSFAS kumele baphendulwe ukuze kwaziwe ukuthi baxhasiwe noma cha. Siyakwamukela ukuqhubeka sikhokhe imihlomulo yezitshudeni okuyinto esiyenze ngempumelelo selokhu kuqale unyaka. Okunye okwenza kube nokubambezeleka ekutheni sihambise imininingwane yezitshudeni kwiNSFAS wukuthi  uhlelo lwabo lwezobuchwepheshe lunezinkinga alusivumeli ukuthi singene kulona kalula. Lokhu kwenza ukuthi izitshudeni zingakwazi ukuthola uxhaso.” Uthe uma bezama ukuthola usizo kwiNSFAS akekho obasizayo wasola  inkinga yokushoda kwabasebenzi.NoNgqongqoshe weMfundo ePhakeme nokuQeqesha uDkt Blade Nzimande, ekhuluma nabezindaba ngokwenze wahlakaza ibhodi leNSFAS, uyivezile eyokuthi lesi sikhwama sibhekene nezinselelo ohlelweni lwaso lwezobuchwepheshe nokungabi nabasebenzi abenele.Usho lokhu nje iNSFAS ithe maduzane izoba nesithangami nabezindaba lapho izomemezela izinhlelo esizenzile ngabangakakhokhelwa.UDkt Matutu uthe kudingeka kube nabantu abazosiza uma kuba nezinkinga zokuchithwa wuhlelo lweNSFAS.“Kumanje u-60% wezitshudeni osakhokhelwe, ezinye azikhokhelwe. Izitshudeni ziyalamba  uthola ukuthi azazi nokuthi kungani zingaxhasiwe.”UNomvalo uthe akuzoba lula wathi kodwa uzokwenza konke okusemandleni ukulungisa isimo kulesi sikhwama.Ezinye izinto abekelwe nguNzimande ukuthi azenze ngukuxazulula inkinga yokungafiki ngesikhathi kwemininingwane yezitshudeni, ukukhokhelwa kwalabo abangakakhokhelwa okubalwa nezindawo zokuhlala, ukulungiselela uhlelo lokufakwa kwezicelo zangonyaka ozayo, ukushesha ukuphendula abafake izicelo zokuxhaswa, ukuqinisa imigomo yesikhwama nokulungisa ezithinta ubuchwepheshe.UNzimande uveze ukuthi ezinye zezizathu ezenze wachitha ibhodi leNSFAS wuqhekeko obelukhona emalungwini, amanye abedonsa aye kwenye indawo, wukuhluleka ukuchitha izinkampani ezathola ithenda yokusabalalisa imihlomulo yezitshudeni, wukuhluleka ukuletha umbiko waminyaka yonke ePhalamende, wukuhluleka ukulungisa indaba ye-call centre namanje engasebenzi, wukuhluleka ukuphendula ngesikhathi izikhalo zezitshudeni nezinye.

AMAQEMBU athi akulindwe amavoti abalwe kuqedwe kodwa alindele noma yini ngemiphumela yokhetho olubukeka lwehluke kakhulu. Abaholi bamanye amaqembu eKwaZulu-Natal, bebengabonwa nangalukhalo esikhungweni semiphumela e-ICC eThekwini, ngesikhathi semiphumela. Kuvamisile ukuthi abaholi bamaqembu bavuke bayonkanisa esikhungweni semiphumela, bayohlanganisa izibalo bakhulume nabezindaba.Kuqale kwabonakala uMnuz Chris Pappas we-DA, ogaqele esikandunankulu. UPappas uhlale isikhathi eside abanye abaholi bengabonwa kuwuyena yedwa obekhuluma nabezindaba.UPappas uthe bayajabula ngemiphumela ebisaqala ukungena, wathi okukhulu wukuthi i-ANC ibukeka ikhala ngaphansi.“Sizonyuka kakhulu futhi sibheke cishe lapha ko--20% kodwa ngoba i-ANC izophuma nje kuhle lokho ngoba bangabantu abaphakeme. Ngicabanga ukuthi umkhankaso wethu ubusondele kakhulu ebantwini futhi basizwile,’’ kusho uPappas, obebonakala eshayela phezulu enza amancoko.Uthe bazophawula kahle ngokubumba uhulumeni uma sekuqedwe ukubalwa kwamavoti. Abaholi be-ANC ababonakalanga esikhungweni semiphumela. USihlalo we-EFF KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Mongezi Twala, ubonge ukuthi ukhetho luhambe kahle kwangaba nezigigaba. Uthe akulindwe kubhekwe ukuthi imiphumela ihamba kanjani ngaphambi kokukhuluma kakhulu.UMnuz Musa Mkhize obemele iMK esikhungweni semiphumela e-ICC, uthe akubathusi ukuthi bahambe phambili ngamavoti ngoba kwenzeka intando yabantu abebelifuna iqembu.Uthe sekuyisikhathi sokuthi umnotho ubuyele ebantwini ukuze babuyelwe yisithunzi. Omunye umholi ongabonakalanga nguSihlalo we-ActionSA KwaZulu- Natal, uMnuz Zwakele Mncwango.Kulindeleke ukuthi imiphumela iqhubeke nokungena kancane, kancane kanti abe-IEC bathe bazokhipha imiphumela ngeSonto.

ABAHOLI bamaqembu ahlukene ezombusazwe KwaZulu-Natal, sebekhale ngokungabekezelelani njengoba kubhekwe okhethweni kulandela ukuhlusulwa kwezingqwembe zamaqembu abo, ukusatshiswa nokuhlukunyezwa kwamavolontiya asuke ezokhankasa.Laba baholi banxuse ozakwabo ukuthi bashumayeze ivangeli lokubekezelelana nokuthula.Bakusho lokhu ngesikhathi kunomcimbi obuhlelwe yikhomishini yezokhetho wokusayinwa kwesibophezelo sokuthi ukhetho luzoba nokuthula eThekwini izolo.Umholi we-ActionSA uMnuz Zwakele Mncwango, ukhale ngokuthi ziyahlusulwa izingqwembe zabo kwezinye izindawo esifundazweni.Uthe kumele abaholi bashumayeze ivangeli lokuthula kumalungu abo.Ubuye wakhala nangamaqembu asebenzisa imicimbi kahulumeni okubalwa eyokuthulwa kwesabelomali ukukhankasela ukhetho.Usihlalo we-ANC uMnuz Sboniso Duma, unxuse ukuthi kube nobumbano ngalesi sikhathi sokhetho.Uncome abaholi bamaqembu ahlukene ngokutshengisa ubumbano.Kuthe esakhuluma kwabakhona abafunae ukuthi ashenxe enkundleni kwathi uma eqhubeka nokukhuluma babanga umsindo.UMnuz Mongezi Twala we-EFF, uthe bawatshelile amalungu abo izinto okumele azenze nokungamele azenze okhethweni.“Siwatshelile amalungu ethu ukuthi uma ephula imigomo ngeke sinanaze ukuthatha izinyathelo. Siyakhala futhi sinxusa ikhomishini yezokhetho ukuthi iyeke ukuqasha othisha beSadtu ukwengamela ukhetho.” UMnuz Nhlanhla Ngidi weqembu Umkhonto weSizwe, naye uhambe emazwini ozakwabo wathi bayasihlonipha isibopho sokuthi kube nokuthula nokubekezelelana okhethweni.Uthe amalungu abo azophambana nalo mgomo bazowathathela izinyathelo.Usho lokhu nje amanye amalungu aleli qembu aseke asabisa ngokuthi ngeke lubekhona ukhetho uma ongumholi waleli qembu uJacob Zuma, engekho ephepheni lokuvota.UMnuz Thami Ntuli we-IFP, uthe wethemba ukuthi ngeke kube nezindawo ezingo-alubhadwa esifundazweni njengoba kuyiwa okhethweni.Uthe ukhetho kumele lube nokuthula nolukhululekile kungabikhona abazosatshiswa.Iqembu i-Apemo likhale ngokuhlusulwa kwezingqwembe zalo eDumbe. Ne-NFP ikhale esifanayo ngokuthi baningi abaholi bayo abafa ngenxa yokungabekezelelani.Leli qembu lithe kunezindawo eziphenduka o-alubhadwa amalungu alo lapho esatshiswa khona.Liveze ukuthi kwezinye izindawo amalungu alo alunyiswa ngezinja uma ezokhankasa, kokunye asatshiswe ngokuthelwa induku.Libuye laveza nokuthi kuMasipala i-Alfred Duma, kukhishwa izingqwembe zeqembu. Umholi we-ABC uMnuz Philani Mavundla, ukhale ngokuthi isibopho sibhalwe ngesiNgisi kuphela ekubeni yena ubefuna esibhalwe ngolimi lwakhe isiZulu.

ABASHAYELI bamatekisi bathi ukugujwa koSuku lwaBasebenzi  kufana nosizi kubona ngoba lubakhumbuza ukuthi basebenza baze babhashe kodwa bengenayo imihlomulo efana neyabanye abasebenzi.NgoLwesithathu, elakuleli beligubha uSuku lwaBasebenzi lapho kubungazwa nempumelelo ngokulwelwa kwamalungelo abasebenzi nenhlalakahle emsebenzini.Umshayeli wamatekisi uMnuz Mbuso Ndimande oshayela emzileni waseMhlanga, eThekwini ohambela izindawo ezifana neGateway neDurban North, ekhuluma neSolezwe, uthe ngokokusebenza abakwazi  uklugubha lolu suku.“Lolu suku silugubha ngenhliziyo ngoba asinazo izinsuku zokuphumula. Uma uthole usuku lokuphumula ufana nomuntu ozihlalele ongenalutho. Ngakho-ke usuku lona ungalugubha kodwa ulugubha uhleli kanje emsebenzini akukho lapho kuthiwa khona hamba uyophumula. Sesize sakuvumela ngoba yisimo sempilo ephilwa kule mboni,” kusho uNdimande.UMnuz Sizwe Mchunu, naye oshayela emzileni ofana nokaNdimande, uthe uSuku lwaBasebenzi lubalulekile kakhulu ngoba abasebenzi bathola imihlomulo uma besebenza ngalo, kodwa embonini yamatekisi ayibonwa.“Ngeshwa kule mboni yethu siyasebenza kodwa asikakabi nayo imihlomulo. Imboni yethu yamatekisi isasemuva kakhulu futhi kusekuningi okudinga ukuthi kulungiswe nohulumeni asibhekele kulokhu esikudingayo. Njengoba sisebenza nje, ngokomthetho obhaliwe kufanele ngabe kukhona esikutholayo njengoba sisebenza ngeholidi kodwa sizothola imali ejwayelekile noma kuyiholidi,” kubeka uMchunu.

KUBHEKWE ukuthi abameli babalisa abasolwa kwelokufa kuka AKA ababhajwe eSwatini, bakhombe indlela ngesicelo sokubabuyisa kuleli. U-AKA owayengumrepha wadutshulwa wabulawa nomngani wakhe uTebello “Tibz” Matsoane, eThekwini ngonyaka odlule.UMbuso uthi laba balisa basikelana amavenge emalini enguR 800 000 sebeqedile ukwenza umsebenzi wokujuqa umrepha nomngani wakhe.U-AKA wakakiswa okwenyamazane wadutshulwa wabulawa encokola nomngani wakhe uTibz, ngaphandle kwendawo yokudlela iWish on Florida. Bavithizwa ngenhlamvu baphelela khona lapho ngaphandle kwendawo yokudlela eyagcina ivaliwe emuva kwesehlo.Ukubulawa kwabo kwaqoshwa yikhamera kwasabalala ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kwashiya abantu bethuthumela. Amaphoyisa ngoFebhuwari nonyaka amemezele ukuboshwa kwabalisa abathinteka kulolu daba.UMnuz Siyabonga Gezani Ndimande obuye abizwe ngoNxele noMnuz Malusi Dave Ndimande obizwa ngoMjay, baboshwa eZone 4, eMbabane eSwatini. Izinsizwa zakwaNdimande zatholwa zigobe amadlangala emqashweni kanti kukholakala ukuthi zazibalekela amaphoyisa akuleli.Bayisikhombisa abalisa ababoshiwe abayamaniswa nokufa kuka-AKA nomngani wakhe. Abalisa abahlanu bahamba iNkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini kanti ababili basabhajwe eSwatini nokusazanywa ukubabuyisa.Abalisa ababoshwe kuleli bayawaphika wonke amacala abathweswe wona kanti lokhu kuvele ngesikhathi becela ibheyili okuyinto engakaphothulwa.Uhulumeni wakuleli ufake isicelo sokuthi abalisa bakwaNdimande babuyiswe kuleli bazobhekana namacala abafunelwa wona. Kulindeleke ukuthi udaba lubuyele namuhla eNkantolo yeMantshi kwaManzini lapho okuzodingidwa khona lolu daba.Uhulumeni wakuleli wakuqinisekisa ukuthi usithumelile isicelo sokubuyiswa kwalaba balisa. Kulindeleke ukuthi uma udaba lungena ngoLwesibili abameli babo baphendule kwelokuthi bayasiphikisa yini isicelo sokubuyiswa kwabo noma cha.Izimpendulo zabo yizona ezingase zikhombe indlela ngokubuyiswa kwabo. Ngaphandle kwecala lokufa kuka-AKA, amaphoyisa athi kukhona namanye amacala abathinteka kuwona laba balisa okufanele bathweswe wona uma befika kuleli.

INHLANSI yethemba njengoba abamelene nokuqokwa kweSilo uMisuzulu Sinqobile kaZwelithini, befakwa ethimbeni elijutshwe ukuba lixazulule imibango yobukhosi.Ungoti wezamasiko oseNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal, uthe ukufakwa kwabaphikisa ukuqokwa kweSilo ethimbeni kunikeza ithemba lokuthi uzoxazululeka umbango wesihlalo sobukhosi bukaZulu osudonse iminyaka emithathu.Ithimba elijutshwe ukuba lixazulule imibango yobukhosi limenyenzelwe nguMphathiswa wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu, uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi, ngoLwesine.Kuleli thimba kukhona abaseNdlunkulu, uMntwana uMathubesizwe ozohola ithimba, uMntwana uMbonisi, uMntwana uMxolisi, uMntwana uVulindlela, noMntwana uLindi.Bonke laba baNtwana bayaphikisana nokuqokwa kweSilo uMisuzulu njengoba  abanye baseka uMntwana uSimakade Jackson kaZwelithini, abanye baseka uMntwana uBuzabazi Mbuzeli kaZwelithini.Abanye abasethimbeni uMntwana uThuthukani kaMcwayizeni, iNyosi uBuzetsheni Mdletshe, uMfundisi Hamilton Mbatha noMfundisi Daniel Mthembu.UButhelezi uthe ukuqokwa kwethimba kuzobuyisa uzinzo ezizweni zamakhosi ezigubuzelwe imibango.“Isilo esidala uMdlokombane saqala uhlelo lokuthi iNdlunkulu kaZulu ibambe iqhaza lokuxazulula nokudala ukubuyisana lapho kuqubuka khona imibango. Ngethula ithimba labaNtwana baseNdlunkulu abasebenze isikhathi eside noMdlokombane benza lo msebenzi. Ukuzinikela kwabo kuwona kuzoba nomthelela omuhle wokuthula nozinzo ezizweni zamakhosi.“Ukwethulwa kwaleli thimba labantwana elihlanganisa nezingwevu ezisebenze neSilo esidala ezindabeni ezithinta ubukhosi, kuzoqinisa kusimamise isakhiwo sobukhosi Kwazulu Natal.”Isimemezelo sishiye imibuzo eminingi, nokho abezindaba abazange banikezwe ithuba lokubuza.USolwazi uNgubane, uthe ukuqokwa kwabantwana abaphikisa ukuqokwa kweSilo kungase kube ikhambi elingaqeda umbango wesihlalo sobukhosi bukaZulu.“Ngibona kube ubuchule obukhulu ukuqokwa kwabo, siyethemba ukuthi sekuyisona isixazululo lesi.”UNgubane uthe ukuxazululwa kombango wesihlalo sobukhosi bukaZulu kunganciphisa imibango yobukhosi ekhona esifundazweni.“Uma kungalunga phezulu, kuzolunga nakwezinye izindawo. Sihlezi sifisa ukuthi izinkinga zasendlunkulu zilungiswe khona endlunkulu ngoba abaNtwana baseNdlunkulu ibona abazi amasiko. Ezinkantolo abameli babuka imithetho kuphela, abawazi amasiko.”Umbango wesihlalo sobukhosi bukaZulu useNkantolo yokuDluliswa kwamaCala.INkantolo eNkulu ePitoli yachitha isinqumo sikaMengameli uCyril Ramaphosa, sokuvuma ukuqokwa kweSilo, ivuna izicelo ezazifakwe ngabeseka uMntwana uSimakade nabeseka uMntwana uBuzabazi.URamaphosa wabe eseludlulisela phambili udaba.

ABASOLWA ababili ecaleni lokufa komrepha u-AKA ababhajwe eSwatini, baqinise ithimba labo ngeziqongqwane ezimbili zabameli ezimele abanye abasolwa kuleli. U-AKA wadutshulwa wabulawa nomngani wakhe uTebello “Tibz” Matsoane eThekwini nyankenye. U-AKA nomngani wakhe bakakiswa okwezinyamazane bacoboshiswa ngenhlamvu bengaphandle kwendawo yokudlela iWish on Florida, eyagcina ngokuvalwa. Kusolwa ukuthi abalisa babeqashiwe ukuthi bacoboshise u-AKA futhi amaphoyisa athi anabo bonke ubufakazi.Abalisa abahlanu abakuleli baveza ukuthi bayawaphika wonke amacala ababekwe wona basola uMbuso ngokuphumputha. Bayisikhombisa abalisa ababoshelwe leli cala kodwa ababili babhajwe eSwatini lapho baboshwa khona begobe amadlangala. UMnuz Siyabonga Gezani Ndimande owaziwa ngoNxele noMnuz Malusi Dave Ndimande, baboshelwa eZone 4, eMbabane, eSwatini lapho babeqashe khona. Kuliwa indaba yokuthi izinsizwa zakwaNdimande zibuyiselwe kuleli zizobhekana namacala azo.Izinsizwa zakwaNdimande bezivele eNkantolo yeMantshi kwaManzini eSwatini izolo kuzolalelwa udaba lwazo. Kuvele ukuthi isicelo sokuzibuyisa esivela kuleli sesafika kodwa abameli basafuna ukusicubungula babonisane nabasolwa.Kuvele nokuthi baphezu kwemizamo yokuthi basebenzise abameli abasuka kuleli ababili. Omunye wabameli uYolanda Geilink ongummeli kammangalelwa wesithathu uMnuz Eddie Myeza. Omunye ummeli nakuba engadalulwanga kodwa kuvelile ukuthi naye usuka kuleli.Kuvele ukuthi uGeilink usevele ukhona eSwatini kodwa usaqedela imicilikisho yamaphepha amgunyaza ukuthi asebenze.  Abasolwa abaseSwatini bavele banaye ummeli uMnuz Sivesonke Ngwenya okunguyena olokhu ephethe udaba lwabo selokhu lwaqala.IMantshi, uMnuz David Khumalo, ilihlehlisele uMeyi 14 nonyaka udaba ukuze kubhekwe kabanzi isicelo sokubabuyisa bese beyaphawula ukuthi bayasiphikisa yini.Abalisa ababoshwe kuleli abahlanu basazama ukuthola ibheyili kodwa udaba lwabo luguqele uMeyi 2 nonyaka lapho kuzoqhutshekwa khona.

USIZI ingane igubha iminyaka emibili yokuzalwa izolo ngaphandle kwabazali bayo ababulawe ngesihluku ngesikhathi bedutshulwa owayebasola ngokumkweleta uR300.UNksz Phindile Nkomo (28) noMnuz Ntobeko Mhlungu (29), okungabazali bengane esihlala nogogo wayo, badutshulwe bashona ngenyanga edlule emqwashweni eNazaretha, ePinetown.Kusolakala ukuthi uNkomo wayekade ekweleta uMnuz Phiwinhlanhla Nzama (45) ongumshayeli weloli ethutha izinkwa. Kuthiwa wayemkweleta u-R300Kubikwa ukuthi uNksz Nkomo wadutshulwa esendlini encelisa ingane yakhe.Isidumbu sikaMhlungu satholakala emva kwendlu, sinamanxeba amabili okudutshulwa esifubeni nasesiphongweni. Lezi zigameko zenzeke ngo-Ephreli 14 ebusuku.Uphenyo luholele ekuboshweni kukaKhuzwayo, wabekwa amacala amabili okubulala. Ungaphandle ngebheyili kaR5 000 ayinikezwe iNkantolo yeMantshi yasePinetown yize uMbuso wawukade uyiphikisile.Le ndoda yaboshwa ngo-Ephreli 17, isibhamu sayo esisemthethweni satholakala sesigqitshwe esibayeni sezimbuzi kubo eKranskop.Unina kamufi, uNkk Duduzile Khuboni,  ukhombise ukumangala, wathi kunzima emhlabeni. Ubuze ukuthi umsolwa udedelwe kanjani ngebheyili ekubeni enza isihluku ebulala ingane yakhe ingamenzanga lutho?“Akungiphethe kahle, futhi ngiphatheke kabi ngokuthi umsolwa unikezwe ibheyili. Asazi ukuthi kuhamba kanjani uma iqiniso lingekho kanje. Ungaze ubulale umuntu umbulalele uR300?” kubalisa unina kamufi.Uqhube wathi umzukulu wakhe, osebhekwe uyena, ubekade ehlanganisa iminyaka emibili izolo kodwa akasenabo abazali.“Iyakhula ingane, ike yasihlupha unina esanda kushona ngoba ibingahlukani naye isancela ibele. Ibikhala ihlupha kodwa kuthe esengcwatshiwe yaba sesimeni esikahle. Kubuhlungu khona ngoba ayisenabo abazali futhi angiboni ukuthi ngiyoke ngikhohlwe umntwana wami,” kusho uNkk Khuboni.Uchaze indodakazi yakhe wathi akayazeli ukuntshontsha kodwa ubeyazela ukuthanda utshwala okuyinto obungeke uyithinte kuyona.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uConstable Thenjiswa Ngcobo, uthe umsolwa uzophinde avele enkantolo ngoJuni 14, kusaqhutshekwa nophenyo.

UMKHUZI wamaPhoyisa kuleli ufuna bafele ejele abasuke bedonsa izigwebo zamacala okubulala amaphoyisa.UGeneral Fannie Masemola ukusho lokhu eziNdlini zoMbuso ePitoli ngeSonto emcimbini wokukhumbula amaphoyisa abulewe esemsebenzini.Kubulawe amaphoyisa awu-39 kusuka ngo-Ephreli 2023 kuya kuMashi 2024.UMasemola uphonsele inselelo uzakwabo nongqongqoshe eMnyangweni wezokuHlunyeleliswa kweziMlilo uDkt Pieter Groenewald wathi kumele bacabangisise ngaphambi kokusayina ushwele onikezwa iziboshwa.“Ngaphambi kokusayina ushwele, khumbula ubuso balezi ngane ezingesenababa namama ezidlule phambi kwenu. Sithemba ukuthi nizobagcina (ababulali) ingunaphakade ejele, okhiye nibalahle, bahlale baze bashone,” kusho uMasimola.Udlulise amazwi enduduzo abeyibhekise emindenini yalamaphoyisa wathi bazoyeseka uma idinga usizo, okwayo ukuya emahhovisi okhomshana bamaphoyisa ezifundzweni.UMasemola uchaze usuku lwesikhumbuzo njengolwenziwe izigebengu, wanxenxa umphakathi ulekele amaphoyisa ngolwazi ukuze kuliwe nobelelesi.Unxuse amaphoyisa ahlale eqaphile futhi azivikele nesizwe.Kwikota yokuqala yalo nyaka (Ephreli kuya kuJuni) sekubulawe amaphoyisa angu-21 esemsebenzini.

INHLANGANO esiza abalimele ezingozini zomgwaqo isiveze ukuthi abantu abasha abaningi  babulawa yizingozi zomgwaqo.Isikhulu esiphezulu seRoad Accident Fund (RAF) uMnuz Collins Letsoalo, sithe ucwaningo lwabo luveza ukuthi uma usuku lwabantu abasha, iYouth Day lungempelasonto, ezingozini eziwu-74 ezenzeka ngalolo suku kufa abantu abasha kuzo.ULetsoalo uthe ngo-2020 kuya ku-2022 bawu-13 963 abantu abasha abashona ezingozini zomgwaqo eziwu-34 964 ezenzeka ngaleso sikhathi.Uthe iningi labantu abasha abashona ezingozini zomgwaqo basuke behamba ngezinyawo njengoba isibalo sabo simi ku-38% bese kuthi abasuke begibele izimoto babe wu-35%.Ubalule ukuthi abantu abasha abayilandeli imithetho yomgwaqo okubalwa ukubopha ibhande uma besemotweni, ukugqoka izimpahla ezikhanyayo uma behamba ngezinyawo nokuhamba ezindaweni ezifanele ukuze bagweme izimoto.“Njengoba inyanga yabantu abasha isebusika, ubusuku bude kanti abantu abasha bayazula. Kuba yinkinga ngoba sibona abaningi babo beba sezingozini zomgwaqo ngenxa yokuthi bahamba kakhulu ngalesi sikhathi. Siyabacela ukuthi baqaphele uma behamba ngezinyawo, balandele imithetho yomgwaqo futhi bafase amabhande uma begibele izimoto,” kusho uLetsoalo.Udonse ngendlebe bonke abasebenzisa umgwaqo ukuthi balandele imithetho ukuze kunciphe izingozi zomgwaqo.“Kuzo zonke izingozi ezenzeka emigwaqweni yakuleli u-40% wazo ubulala abantu abasha. Ngithanda ukubakhumbuza ukuthi baphephe emgwaqweni ikakhulukazi njengoba kuyimpelasonto enkulu. Ngicela bagweme izingozi zomgwaqo bakhumbule ukuthi kufanele baphile ngomuso, basenamaphupho okufanele bawafeze,” kusho uLetsoalo.Uthe bonke abantu bakuleli kufanele baqinisekise ukuthi imigwaqo iphephile, ikakhulukazi ngezimpelasonto, bangashayeli bephuzile, bahloniphane nasemgwaqweni.Uphethe ngokuthi uma kwenzeka beba sezingozini zomgwaqo bashayele iRAF ku-087 820 1111 ngoMsombuluko kuya kuLwesihlanu noma bangene ku-www.raf.co.za ukuthola usizo olufanele.

BAWOTHA ubomvu abaphakela izikole KwaZulu-Natal, abakhala ngokulinda umnyama ongenafu ezikhulwini zoMnyango wezeMfundo esifundazweni, ezingabuyi nezimpendulo ezikhalazweni zabo. Labo sonkontileka sebenqumele inhloko yoMnyango, uMnuz Nkosinathi Ngcobo, ukuthi iphendule izikhalazo zabo ngoLwesibili ozayo.Okuseqhulwini kwabakhala ngakho ngukunganyuswa kwemali yokuthenga igesi yokuphekela abafundi nokungakhokhelwa kokunye ukudla abakuyisa ezikoleni.UMnuz Xolani Shange wenhlangano yabaphakela izikole, uzwakalise ukuphelelwa yisineke ngokulinda izimpendulo ezingabuyi emnyangweni.UShange uveze ukuthi umnyango wala ukukhokhela okunye ukudla abakuyisa ezikoleni.“Uma siphatha indaba yophuthu, umnyango ukhokhela impuphu kuphela awube usayibala indaba yokuthi ophuthwini kufaka nosawoti. Uma kwenziwa isitshulu, awuwakhokheli amafutha no-curry powder wokunandisa. Kanjalo no-anyanisi awukhokhelwa.”Uthe endabeni yegesi, umnyango ukhokha imali encane kakhulu kunale owawuyikhokhela inkampani eyahluleka ukwenza lo msebenzi yagcina iphuciwe.“Le nkampani eyayinikwe lo msebenzi yayizokhokhelwa uR2 100 ngegesi engu-48kg. Thina sikhokhelwa uR1 360 ngale gesi. Ibiza imali engafani le gesi ezindaweni ezehlukene kanti imali esikhokhelwa yona incane.”Uthe osonkontileka sebependuke baxhasa uhulumeni ngoba incane kakhulu imali abayitholayo.“Ukudla kunyuka njalo. Izikhulu zomnyango ziyakwazi lokhu ngoba zikuthenga njalo emakhaya azo. Ilayisi liyabiza manje kodwa sisakhokhelwa imali okulokhu sakhokhelwa yona kuqala inkontileka. Imali ayinyuki ihambisane nesimo somnotho samanje. Osonkontileka bayaveva manje ngoba bakhathele ukuxhasa uhulumeni,” kusho uShange.Uthe sebecabanga nokungakuhambisi ukudla abangakhokhelwa imali yakho.“Okwamanje asikafiki ekutheni sidube ukuhambisa ukudla esingakhokhelwa khona, sihambise lokhu okumele sikuhambise. Uma umnyango uqhubeka usiziba, ngoLwesibili sizohlangana sikhiphe umkhombandlela.”Uthe kubalulekile ukuthi izikhalazo ezikhona zilungiswe ngaphambi kokuvulwa kwezikole.“Asifuni ukuthi kushaye isikhathi sokuvulwa kwezikole kusanalezi zikhalazo. Sifuna kuthi kuvulwa kube sekuxazululeke yonke into ngoba sizimisele ukwenza umsebenzi ngendlela.” Okhulumela umnyango, uMnuz Muzi Mahlambi, akazange ayiphendule imibuzo athunyelelwe yona.Akuqali ukuthi kube nomsindo ngalolu hlelo oluhlinzekwa ngezigidigidi zamaRandi nguhulumeni.Phambilini, abafundi babhuqwa yindlala ngenxa yezinkinga ezazilukhungethe.

ISouth African Federation of Trade Unions (Saftu) ifuna bajeziswe kanzima abaqashi ababambela abasebenzi imali yempesheni kodwa bagcine bengayidluliselanga ezikhwameni ezifanele.ISaftu isho lokhu emuva kokuthi umxazululi wezinkinga zempesheni, uNksz Muvhango Lukhaimane eveze ukuthi abasebenzi bakuleli bakweletwa uR7 billion yizikhwama zempesheni.IFinancial Sector Conduct Authority (Fsca), ishicilele uhlu lwezinkampani eziwu-4 200 ezibambela abasebenzi imali yempesheni, kodwa zingayifaki esikhwameni esifanele.Iningi lalezi zinkampani ngeziqashe onogada kanti ulwazi lutholakala ku-www.fsca.co.zaUNksz Lukhaimane uthe uma izinkampani zingayifaki imali esikhwameni sempesheni kufanele zithathelwe izinyathelo.Ubalule ukuthi izinkampani ezingakhokhi imali yempesheni zikweleta phakathi kwezinyanga ezinhlanu kuya ezinyangeni eziwu-252 okusho ukuthi iminyaka ewu-21.“Izikhalo ezingaphezu kuka-80% engizitholayo ngezabasebenzi abakweletwa imali yabo yempesheni. “Bathola lokhu uma sebethathe umhlalaphansi noma sebexoshiwe, sebeyofaka isicelo semali yabo.“Kufanele abahleli emabhodini ezikhwama ezahlukene zempesheni bathathe izinyathelo uma umqashi engayikhokhi imali yabasebenzi yempesheni yize ebadonsela,” kuchaza uNksz Lukhaimane.Uthe ngokomthetho wePension Funds Act, kufanele inkampani engayikhokhanga izinyanga ezintathu impesheni, ivulelwe icala.Uveze ukuthi abangayikhokhi imali yempesheni esikhwameni esifanele bebe beyidonsa emaholweni abantu, bangahlawuliswa uR10 million noma iminyaka ewu-10 bebhadla ejele.UNobhala Jikelele weSaftu, uMnuz Zwelinzima Vavi  uthe imali yempesheni idonswa eholweni lomsebenzi nyangazonke bese enye ingxenye ikhokhwa wumqashi.Uthe le mali kufanele iye esikhwameni sempesheni esifanele ukuze uma umsebenzi esethatha umhlalaphansi, akwazi ukuphila impilo engcono.“Sibonga iFCSA ngokushicilela uhlu lwabaqashi abaxhaphaza abasebenzi ngokubabambela imali yempesheni bese bengayifaki esikhwameni esifanele.“Kufanele manje uhulumeni aqinisekise ukuthi abanikazi balezi zinkampani bajeziswa kanzima.“Abakhokhiswe imali abayikweleta abasebenzi nenzalo yayo noma kulandelwe lokhu okushiwo wumthetho wezimpesheni. Lo mthetho ukubeka kucace ukuthi kufanele bahlawuliswe uR10 million noma bavalelwe ejele iminyaka ewu-10,” kusho uVavi.Uthe abasebenzi basebenza kanzima ukuze kuthi uma sebethathe umhlalaphansi bangabi wumthwalo kuhulumeni, kodwa bakwazi ukuphila impilo engcono nemindeni yabo.“Imali yempesheni ibalulekile kubasebenzi ngoba iyabasiza ukuba baphile impilo abayijwayele, banganciki ezibonelelweni zikahulumeni. Bayakwazi nokuqhuba izingane esikoleni nokuthuthukisa impilo yabo.“Abasuke bexoshiwe noma bephelelwe wumsebenzi kungakafiki umhlalaphansi, le mali iyabasiza ukuthi babe nemali yezidingo zabo ngesikhathi besafuna omunye umsebenzi. “Abanye bathenga imizi noma izimoto. Uma bengasayitholi kubadalela ukhwantalala nezinye izinkinga zempilo,” kuqhuba uVavi.Uphethe ngokuthi abaqashi abaphula umthetho wezimpesheni kufanele bajeziswe kanzima.UNkk Lukhaimane ugqugquzele abasebenzi ukuba babheke njalo uma kuphela inyanga ukuthi izinkampani abazisebenzelayo ziyayidlulisela yini imali ezikhwameni zempesheni.Uma bethola ukuthi aziyifaki esikhwameni ucele ukuthi bathinte ihhovisi lakhe ku-www.pfa.org.za. Bangashayela  u-012 346 1738 noma bathumele i-email  [email protected]

UMENGAMELI weNFP, uMnuz Ivan Barnes, unxuse amalungu eqembu angakayemukeli imiphumela yengqungquthela eyamkhetha njengomholi wale nhlangano eyasungulwa uNkk Zanele kaMagwaza-Msibi, ukuba esale esethambisa izinhliziyo.UBarnes ucele labo abangamfuni ngaphakathi eqenjini ukuba basale sebenzela uNkk kaMagwaza-Msibi, bamamukele.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ethula umqulu wezethembiso zokhetho oLundi, ngoMgqibelo. UBarnes waqokwa engqungqutheleni yokukhetha ubuholi beNFP eyayingoDisemba.Amanye amalungu eNFP ayiduba ingqungquthela, kuphinde kube khona amalungu aphonsela inselelo imiphumela yayo eyayiseThekwini.UBarnes uthe ufuna kube nobumbano kwiNFP.“Ngifisa ukunxusa nokunxenxa labo abangekho lapha, abangalwamukeli ushintsho olwenzeka kwiNFP, abangakaphatheki kahle ukuthi uNtshona akasekho. Ushintsho lunzima. Kusenzima ukwamukela kwabanye abafowethu nodadewethu, abafuni ukwamukela ukuthi mina ndodana kaNtshona, imina esenginikezwe izintambo zokuphatha iqembu likaNtshona.“Ngiyabacela lapho bekhona ukuthi noma ubuso bami bengabuthandi, phezu kobuso bami ababeke ubuso bukaNtshona, ukuze sizokwazi ukuqhubeka sikhulume ngazwi linye. Ngiyazi ukuthi kukhona lapho esibanyathele khona amakhona, ngicela bangixolele.”UBarnes uthe basazoqhubeka nezimfundiso zikaNkk kaMagwaza-Msibi.“Amalungu eNFP asenokudungazela, anokungakholelwa ukuthi sisawuphethe umgomo kaNtshona. Namhlanje ngizogcizelela ukuthi uNtshona wasemandulo, usenguye nanamhlanje. Izimfundiso zakhe siqala iNFP, yizo zona lezi engizogijima ngazo iNingizimu Afrika yonke. Angizile ukuzobulala izimfundiso zikaNtshona, angizile ukuzochitha izimfundiso zikaNtshona, kodwa ngizoziqhuba.”Ethula umqulu wezethembiso onamaphuzu angu-15, uBarnes uthe bafuna ukuthuthukisa osomabhizini bakuleli abancane.“Sengihambe emakhaya nasemalokishini, into engithusayo kunabafowethu nodadewethu bangaphandle abasidayisela ama-chips neziphuzo ezingekho emthethweni. Angazi ukuthi lezi zinto zingena kanjani la. Kukhombisa ukuthi kunobuthaka obukhona.“Kodwa ke ukuthuthukisa osomabhizinisi abancane, kufanele sibaqeqeshe, sibanike noxhaso abaludingayo. Lokhu kuzothuthukisa umnotho wethu. Sizophinde sigqugquzele ukuthi osomabhizinisi abancane babambisane nezikole nomasipala.”UBarnes uthe uma benqoba ukhetho bazoqeda inkinga yokusweleka kwamanzi.UBarnes uthe iNingizimu Afrika inamanzi anele kodwa wakhala ngokuthi amadamu amaningi awekho ngaphansi kukahulumeni.“Kwakuyini le yokuthi kuthiwe idamu elomuntu oyedwa ekubeni kunabantu abalala bephuze amanzi abawabanga nezilwane?”UBarnes uthembise ukudala amathuba emisebenzi, ukulwa nenkohlakalo nokwenza ngcono ezokuthutha.

NGEKE babuyele emsebenzini bengawatholanga amabhonasi abo abasebenzi benkampani ekhiqiza izimoto iFord Motor Company South Africa.NgoLwesine laba basebenzi abakwiNational Union of Metalworkers of South Africa (Numsa) baqale isiteleka sabo esisemthethweni besola umqashi wabo ngokuba yigovu elidla lodwa.Isiteleka siqale ngo-9 ekuseni ngaphandle kwamasango akwaFord, aseSilverton, ePitoli.UMengameli weNumsa obebhikisha namalungu ale nyunyana, uMnuz Andrew Chirwa, uthe izikhulu zakwaFord azifuni ukudla nabasebenzi kodwa zijabulela ukubaxhaphaza.Uveze ukuthi sekuphele iminyaka emibili bexoxisana neFord ukuthi uma yenze inzuzo icazele abasebenzi. Kungahlomuli izikhulu zodwa ngoba yizona ezithola amabhonasi ezizumbulu.“Izikhulu zakwaFord azizwa, azifuni ukusilalela uma sizicela ukuthi zicazele abasebenzi inzuzo eyenziwa yinkampani. Le nkampani selokhu yenza inzuzo ngisho ngo-2021 ibiyenza kahle akukho okushintshile namanje izinto zihamba kahle kodwa ayifuni ukunika abasebenzi amabhonasi,” kusho uChirwa.Uthe abasebenzi bazoteleka kuze kube umqashi uhlala phansi nenyunyana yabo ayitshele ukuthi uzoqala nini ukubacazela inzuzo.Uthe inkampani ngabe ayenzi kahle ukube abasebenzi abazikhandli ngakho nabo bayadinga ukubongwa ngokusebenza kanzima njengoba kubongwa izikhulu.“IFord ikhiqiza izimoto eziwu-720 ngosuku. Ikwazile ukutshala imali yokuthuthukisa ingqalasizinda kodwa iyahluleka wukubonga abasebenzi ngokuzikhandla kwabo,” kusho uChirwa.IFord ithe isiteleka sizoba nomthelela omubi emnothweni wezwe njengoba itshale imali eningi ukuthuthukisa ingqalasizinda nabasebenzi bayo. Iveze ukuthi lesi siteleka sizokwakha isithombe esibi ngokuqhuba ibhizinisi eNingizimu Afrika.“Uma senza izinqumo zokuqhuba ibhizinisi nokutshala imali, sibheka ukuthi lapho sisebenza khona yindawo ekahle yokwenza ibhizinisi nokuthi umsebenzi awuphazamiseki,” kusho iFord esitatimendeni.Ithe iyathemba ukuthi bonke abasebenzi bazobuyela emsebenzini maduze, yacela abangatelekile ukuthi bahlale emakhaya kuze kuphele isiteleka.

KULEZI zinsuku abantu bahamba ngolayini baqonde emabhodweni abo amabili lapho bethi bayonyula khona imali yabo yempesheni.UMnuz Bheki Mkhize oyisazi sezezimali e-FNB, uthe uhulumeni uze nohlelo lwe-two pot system ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu banemali eyanele uma sebethathe umhlalaphansi.Uthe ucwaningo abalwenzile bebuza abantu ukuthi bawulungele yini umhlalaphansi, luthole ukuthi u-50% wabo awulondolozi imali eyanele.Kuvele ukuthi abantu uma beshintsha imisebenzi bathatha imali yabo yempesheni bayibhubhudle bese kuthi uma kufika isikhathi somhlalaphansi bangabi nemali eyanele yokuphila.Labo bantu bagcina sebebhalisela ukuhola impesheni kahulumeni etholwa yizaguga ezingakaze zisebenze nebezingayitholi impesheni emsebenzi wazo.Ubalule ukuthi uhlelo lwe-two pot retirement system luzoqinisekisa ukuthi kunengxenye ebekelwe umuntu ukuze aphile impilo entofontofo uma esethatha umhlalaphansi.UMnuz Roy Evans we-Compass Consulting, eluleka abantu ngezezimali zomhlalaphansi nokulondoloza, uthe i-two pot retirement system wuhlelo oluzophoqa abantu ukuthi balondolozele umhlalaphansi.Uthe kusukela ngoSepthemba 1, imali elondolozwa ngabantu ukuze ibasize uma sebethathe umhlalaphansi isizohlukaniswa kabili.Enye izoya esikhwameni esibizwa nge-savings pot, bese enye ifakwe esikhwameni esibizwa nge-retirement pot.Imali yabo esikhona njengamanje esikhwameni somhlalaphansi izohlala esikhwameni esibizwa nge-vested pot.Kuzothi ngoSepthemba 1, kuthathwe u-R30 000 kwi-vested pot ufakwe kwi-savings pot.“Abantu bazokwazi ukukhipha imali esukela ku-R2 000 kuya ku-R30 000 kanye ngonyaka kwi-savings pot. Lo R30 000 uzonyulwa kanye kwi-vested pot ngeke uphinde unyulwe. Uzobe usuba nenzalo, wandiswe nayimali umuntu azobe eyifaka nyangazonke,” kusho u-Evans.Uthe noma ngabe unezigidi esikhwameni sakho sempesheni kodwa imali ozoqala ngayo kwi-savings pot wu-R30 000.Wenze isibonelo sokuthi uma njalo ngenyanga ufaka u-R3 000 esikhwameni sakho sempesheni, kuzothi ngoSepthemba 1 leyo mali icazwe kabili. U-R700 uzongena kwi-savings pot bese u-R2 100 ungena kwi-retirement pot.  Lokhu kusho ukuthi uma ungayikhiphanga imali ngoSepthemba, kuzothi uma kuqala u-Okthoba ube usuno-R30 700.Uhlelo lwe-two pot retirement system alubathinti abantu okushaye uMashi 1, 2021 sebeneminyaka ewu-55 noma ngaphezulu kodwa-ke banelungelo lokukhetha ukungena ngaphansi kwalolu hlelo uma beluthanda. U-Evans ubaxwayise ngokuthi kufanele bacabangisise ukuthi bayathanda yini ukungena kulo ngoba uma sebengenile ngeke bakwazi ukuphuma.U-Evans ukhumbuze abantu ukuthi u-R30 000 okhishwa kwi-savings pot uzoba nezindleko zentela nezesikhwama sempesheni.“Kubalulekile ukuthi abantu babheke nesikhwama sabo ukuthi i-South African Revenue Service (SARS) izothatha malini nokuthi izindleko zesikhwama zizoba malini. Ngeke umuntu athole u-R30 000 unjengoba unjalo. Isikhwama sizothatha izindleko zaso bese no-SARS ethatha intela yakhe, kuzoya ngokuthi umuntu ukusiphi isigaba sentela. Omunye kungathathwa uR8 000 okusho ukuthi u-R30 000 uzofika kuye usuwu-R22 000,” kuchaza u-Evans.Udonse ngendlebe abantu ukuthi bangayikhiphi imali yabo yempesheni ngaphandle uma bebhekene nezimo ezinzima. Ubalule ukuthi imali yempesheni izobe izala, ngakho uma ihleli kulezi zikhwama kusho ukuthi umuntu uzothatha umhlalaphansi enemali enhle kodwa uma eyikhipha ngeke abe nemali ezomjabulisa.Uma kwenzeka umuntu exoshwa, edilizwa emsebenzi noma ephelelwa wumsebenzi ngenxa yezizathu ezithile, uzokwazi ukuthola isamba sakhe semali esikwi-vested pot.Uzokwazi nokuthola imali ekwi-savings pot kodwa ngeke akwazi ukuthatha imali ekwi-retirement pot njengoba yona izomlinda ukuthi aze afike eminyakeni yomhlalaphansi.Kuyothi uma esethathe umhlalaphansi ayithole kanye ngenyanga njengoba uhulumeni engafuni ukuba nabantu akade benezikhwama zempesheni kodwa abagcina sebehola impesheni yakhe.Uma kwenzeka umuntu eshona labo abondliwa wuyena bazothola yonke imali yakhe ekuwo wonke amabhodwe, ngeke kuthiwe ubengakafiki eminyakeni yomhlalaphansi.

SIYANGENA isikhumbuzo senkosi yamaNazaretha yesithathu esakhothama, inkosi Amos Kula Shembe Inyangayezulu, eBuhleni ngoSepthemba 24.Njengoba kuhlala kwenzeka minyaka yonke, kuzokhunjulwa imisebenzi yeNyangayezulu ngenkonzo yayo ekhethekile ebakhona njalo uma kuyilesi sikhathi sonyaka.Okhulumela umholi wamaNazaretha, inkosi Mduduzi Shembe, uMnuz Thokozani Mncwabe, uthe amaNazaretha asuke ezilile ngaphambi kokungena kwenkonzo yeNyangayezulu.“Uma kuzoba yinkonzo yesikhumbuzo yeNyangayezulu, akudliwa into eshisayo noma ngabe lolu suku alukho ngeSabatha. Kuzoba nenkonzo ezoqala ngoSepthemba 25 khona eBuhleni iqhubeke nangakusasa ngomhlaka 25. Umhlaka 24 yilona suku inkosi Inyangayezulu eyayidunguzela kakhulu ngalo yakhothama ngomhlaka 25 Septhemba. Uma kunenkonzo yesikhumbuzo yayo kusuke kuwumunyu wodwa amaNazaretha asuke ekhihla nesililo ekhumbula imisebenzi yenkosi.
