Abanye basuke bebonga abakwenzelwa yinkosi nezibusiso abazinikwa iyona,” kusho uMncwabe.Le nkonzo izokwenzeka kanye nomgidi wezintombi oba njalo ngoSepthemba kumaNazaretha nozoqhubeka emva kwenkonzo yesikhumbuzo.Kulungiselelwa le nkonzo nje uNyazilwezulu lusanda kubuya eNtabazwe (eHarrismith) okuyindawo okuqhamuka kuyona uMqaliwendlela, inkosi u-Isaiah Mloyiswa Mdliwamafa Shembe ongumsunguli webandla lamaNazaretha.UMncwabe uthe bakujabulele ukuvakashela le ndawo bengamaNazaretha nathe inomlando omude ngobuNazaretha.“Inkosi uNyazilwezulu seluzihambele izindawo eziningi ezingamagugu ebandla lamaNazaretha. Indawo esisele ukuthi lungene eKuphakameni okusenzima ukungena kule ndawo ngenxa yombango owabakhona. Nalo uNyazilwezulu lunesifiso sokuthi lungene eKuphakameni. Indawo yasekuPhakameni inomlando ojulile njengoba igetsemane (ithuna) likaMqaliwendlela neleLanga likule ndawo. Ngisho Inyangayezulu ngaphambi kokuthi ikhothame yake yasho ukuthi asithandaze sibheke eKuphakameni ngesikhathi sivakashele kwabhekabezayo (emathuneni amaNazaretha). Yasho ukuthi inesifiso ukuthi wonke umuntu anyathele khona ngaphakathi njengoba le ndawo ilele abasunguli bebandla kube nemicimbi eyenziwa khona. Ngisho nobaba uNyazi angayithenga uma kungavela lelo thuba ngenxa yokubaluleka kwayo le ndawo,” kuqhuba uMncwabe.

SEKUZOPHELA ukuba umphakathi waseMpolweni uhambe amabanga amade uma befuna ukwelashwa njengoba sebakhelwa umtholampilo wabo osezingeni elicokeme. UNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezeMpilo, eKZN, uNkk Nomagugu Simelane, umemezele lokhu ngesikhathi kuzokwethulwa umakhi ehholo lomphakathi waseMpolweni. UNkk Simelane uthe lomtholampilo uzodla isamba sikaR70 million."Ngonyaka owedlule sathi kulo nyaka sizokwakha imitholampilo engu-11. Omunye wale mithompilo ka-11 yilo esiwakha namhlanje eMpolweni. Sathatha isinqumo sokuthi ngeke siphendule isoyi kuphela. Sizohlaba ifosholo maqede ojutshulwe ukwakha, aqale namhlanje ukwakha." UNkk Simelane kulo mtholampilo kuzoqashwa abantu ebebengasebenzi abaphakathi kuka-20 no-25 futhi uzosetshenziswa ngamalungu omphakathi abalelwa ku-50 000, okubalwa nabahlala ku-ward 1 no-ward 12."Ngiyafisa ukuthi njengoba lomtholampilo uzokwakhiwa, ngiyacela niwuvikele."UNgqongqoshe uthe phakathi kwezinto ezizotholakala kulo mtholampilo kubalwa igumbi lokweluleka ngokwengqondo, amahhovisi, igumbi eligcina imishanguzo, i-dispensary, izindawo zokulala abahlengikazi ne-generator ezolekelela kakhulu uma sekubuye i-loadshedding."Uthe lo mtholampilo uzosebenza zonke izinsuku, kusukela ngoMsombuluko kuze kushaye omunye. "Siyafisa usebenze amahora awu-24 kodwa awukwazi ngoba asikwazi ukuba nemali yokuqasha abantu abazosebenza lamahora." Uthe uma kukhona umuntu olimalayo ngezithuba zabo-6.30 ebusuku, abantu bengaya emtholampilo ngoba kuzobe kunomhlengikazi ozobe elala ekhaya eliseduze ngoba elindele ukunikezela ngosizo oluphuthumayo.Imeya yakuMasipala waseMshwathi, uMnuz Mandla Zondi, ikushayele elikhulu ihlombe lokhu kwakhiwa komtholampilo. Uthe abantu bakule ndawo bebehlukumezeka kakhulu ngoba bekufanele bahambe amabanga amade. Lo mcimbi bewuhanjelwe yiNkosi yaseMathulini, oZwathini, uMhlabunzima "Zondamasiniya" Mthuli.

UMSOLWA wesihlanu ecaleni lokubulawa komculi uKiernan “AKA” Forbes nomngani wakhe uTebello “Tibz” Motsoane uthe wayengeve eyokwelusa lo mculi eWish emgwaqweni uFlorida kodwa wayeyohlangana nowesifazane othize.Usho kanje encwadini efungelwe efundwe ummeli wakhe u-Adv Sphiwe Mlotshwa ngesikhathi kuqhubeka ukulalelwa kwesicelo sebheyili yabasolwa abahlanu eNkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini. Izolo uMbuso uphothule ukwenza izethulo zawo zokuthi kungani kungamele badedelwe ngebheyili abasolwa okungoLindokuhle Thabani Mkhwanazi (30), Lindani Zenzele Shisela Ndimande (35), Siyanda Eddie Myeza (21), Mziwethemba Harvey Gwabini (36) noLindokuhle Lindo Ndimande (29).UMlotshwa ephendula izethulo zoMbuso efunda incwadi efungelwe kaNdimande (Lindokuhle), uveze ukuthu wayengayile eWish ngenhloso yokwelusa u-AKA.“Ngangingazi nokuthi naye lo mculi wayekhona. Ngangiyohlangana nowesifazane nalapho engabona ukuthi uthatha isikhathi eside ukuthi afike ngaqhubeka ngilokhu ngimshayela ucingo elokhu engithembisa ukuthi uyeza.”Eqhuba uthe wezwa sekhuqhuma isibhamu ngaphandle.“Angazi lutho ngokudubula. Ngiyakuphika lokhu okushiwo umphenyi othi ngashintsha indawo engangikuyo eWish futhi ngiyakuphika ukuthi ngangingezi eWish  njalo,” ubeke kanje.Umsolwa uphinde wadalula ukuthi isamba semali engu-R100 000 eyafakwa uGwabeni kwakungeyomsebenzi ayekade emenzele wona wokuba ngumshayeli wakhe njengoba ebuye abe ngumuntu ohambela izindawo ezikude. Ugcizelele ukuthi ize ifike kulesi samba yingoba bese kuphele izinyanga engamkhokheli.UMkhwanazi encwadini yakhe efungelwe, uthe ubhecwa ngobende inyama engayidlanga.“Izinsolo engibekwe zona ziyadukisa futhi ziyiphutha. UMbuso akunacala ongangibeka lona ngoba awunabo ubufakazi obuqanda ikhanda. Imali engu-R100 000 engakhokhelwa yona kwakuyimali yami yokuba umqaphi ngoba ngangingakhokhelwe isikhathi eside,” usho kanje.Encwadini efungelwe kaMyeza efundwe ummeli wakhe u-Adv Yolanda Gielink, uthe uMyeza uyakuphika okwashiwo uMbuso ukuthi wayeqashwe uGwabeni futhi ngesikhathi sokudutshulwa komculi yena wayesesibhedlela ngoba edubuleke eqakaleni.“Angizange ngizidubule mina njengoba uMbuso uthe ngangidlala ngesibhamu ngase ngizidubula. Ngicela inkantolo inginike ibheyili ka-R5000,” kusho uMyeza.Icala lizobuyela enkantolo ngoMsombuluko.

ABASOLWA ababili ecaleni lokubulawa komrepha uKiernan "AKA" Forbes nomngani wakhe uTebello “Tibz" Motsoane bathi bayaliphika icala lokumbulala, bamane babhecwa ngobende nje.Izolo eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini kuvele abasolwa abahlanu ababhekene necala lokubulala laba abadutshulwa bengaphandle kwendawo yobumnandi iWish emgwaqweni uFlorida eThekwini. Abasolwa oMnuz Lindokuhle Mkhwanazi (30), Lindani Ndimande (35 ) Eddie Myeza (21), Mziwethemba Gwabini (36 ) noLindokuhle Ndimande (29 ) bafaka isicelo sebheyili.Abasolwa abathathu kulaba kuvele ukuthi izethulo zabo azizange ziphothulwe ngabameli babo.Kodwa umsolwa wokuqala uMkhwanazi benomsolwa wesithathu uMyeza, bakwazile ukuzifaka.Encwadini efungelwe efundwe ngummeli kaMkhwanazi, u-Advocate Simphiwe Mlotshwa, uMkhwanazi ulimise ngesihloko elokuthi uyaliphika icala lokubulala lo mculi.Uze wasebenzisa amagama okuthi usejahe kabi ukuthi liqulwe ukuze kuzohlala obala ukuthi akanacala."Noma seliqulwa icala yilapho okuyohlala khona obala ukuthi angazi lutho ngalo,'' usho kanje.Eqhuba ummeli kaMkhwanazi, uveze ukuthi ngesikhathi lo mmangalelwa ekhalelwa ngamasongo kaSigonyela wayazi ukuthi uboshelwa icala lokubulala uMnuz William Kunene.Uthe kodwa wethuka koma nasozwanweni ngesikhathi amaphoyisa esembhaxabula, wezwa esemphoqa ukuba avume ukuthi uyabandakanyeka ekubulaweni kuka-AKA.Uthe uyayicela ibheyili ngenxa yokuthi kunezinto eziningi okumele azenze uma esephumile.UMkhwanazi uthe angeke alibalekele icala ngoba abaseshi wabathatha wabayisa nalapho ahlala khona, wathi wabanikeza nencwadi yemvume yokuhambela amanye amazwe. Ugcizelele ukuthi umkakhe ukhulelwe yingakho ekudinga ukuphuma ngebheyili ukuze ezomnakekela.Nommeli kaMyeza, uYolanda Gielink, uthe bayaliphika icala lokubulala u-AKA.Uthe konke kuzohlala obala uma seliqulwa leli cala, waqinisekisa ukuthi uMyeza akahlangene nokubulawa kwalo mculi.Naye uthe uMyeza uyayidinga ibheyili ngoba iyilungelo lakhe. Uthe futhi akanazo izincwadi ezimvumela ukuhambela amanye amazwe.Uveze ukuthi nempilo yakhe ngeke ibe sengcupheni uma engathola ibheyili. Uthe nophenyo angeke aluphazamise.Ngaphakathi enkantolo bekugcwele  njengenjwayelo. Uyise ka-AKA, uTony Forbes, ubekhona ephelezelwa ngonogada bakhe.Ephawula uyise ka-AKA, ukhulume ngalaba abanye ababoshelwe eSwatini angakatholakali amaphepha agunyaza ukuthi babuyiselwe eNingizimu Afrika."Kuzothatha isikhathi, angicabangi ukuthi kuzoshesha ukuthi balethwe ngalapha. Kungenzeka kugcine kuthatha ngisho izinyanga. Angazi ukuthi yindaba singakafakwa isicelo sokuthi balethwe kuleli,'' usho kanje.Uthe uyacabanga ukuthi abamelwe ukwenza loyo msebenzi basamatasa nokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi uyaphumelela.Lolu hlelo ulifanise nomjaho wathi, kuzodingeka isikhathi ukuze kugcine kutholakale iqiniso.Mayelana noMkhwanazi ongumsolwa wokuqala, uthe kunelinye icala athola kulona ibheyili, kodwa futhi ufuna enye ibheyili kuleli lika-AKA."Ngiyazibuza ukuthi njengoba elokhu ebalisa ngomkakhe wayenaye yini ngosuku lokubulawa kwendodana yami?'' usho kanje.Ukhale ngokuthi kuyamxaka manje ukuzwa uMkhwanazi yonke into useyenza ibe mayelana nomkakhe.Ubephendula ukuthi unalo yini uzwelo njengoba kuvela ukuthi unkosikazi kaMkhwanazi uzithwele?"Nami indodana yami inengane eneminyaka engu-8. Konke lokhu okubalwa uMkhwanazi akubalulekile,'' echaza.Okuqaphelekile ngabasolwa abahlanu ukuthi bebengazifihlile kulokhu futhi bebonakala bekhululekile.Ngesikhathi sebehla bebebonakala bebingelela abantu ababaziyo abebesenkantolo.Leli cala lizobuyela enkantolo ngoMsombuluko.

ABASOLWA ababili abanukeka ekufeni komrepha u-AKA, ababhajwe eSwatini bafuna idokodo lecala ukuze bathathe isinqumo ngesicelo sokubuyiselwa kwabo kuleli. Iphephandaba laseSwatini iTimes of Swaziland libike kabanzi ngalolu daba.U-Kiernan ‘AKA’ Forbes, wadutshulwa wabulawa nomngani wakhe uTebello “Tibz” Motsoane, eThekwini nyankenye. Bobabili bathelekelwa amadoda abavithiza ngenhlamvu baphelela khona lapho bephuma endaweni yokudlela i-Wish on Florida esiyavalwa.Ummeli wababhajwe eSwatini, uMnuz Sivesonke Ngwenya nguye oveze ukuthi amakhasimede akhe afuna ukubona idokodo lecala ngaphambi kokuthi baphendule.Ababhajwe eSwatini wuMnuz Siyabonga Gezani Ndimande obuye abizwe ngoNxele noMnuz Malusi Dave Ndimande okuthiwa abandawonye. Bayisikhombisa sebebonke abasolwa abakhonjwa wuMbuso ukuthi bamkakisa okwenyamazane bamjuqa umrepha.Ngokuvamile amaphoyisa awalidedeli idikodo lecala ngaphambi kwesigaba lapho sekulungiselelwa ukuqulwa kwecala sebehlangene nabameli.Izinsizwa zakwaNdimande sezivele izikhawu eNkantolo yeMantshi kwaManzini kulandela ukuboshwa kwazo eZone 4 eMbabane, eSwatini.Abalisa abahlanu bahamba icala kuleli kanti laba ababili bakwaNdimande baseSwatini kuzanywa ukuthi babuyiswe. Sesathunyelwa isicelo sokuthi babuyiswe, kodwa kuthe sekufanele baphendule base befuna idokodo lecala.Kuvela ukuthi bathe abakwazi ukuphendula isicelo sokubuyiswa kwabo bengakaboni ukuthi amaphoyisa agugusheka nani edokodweni lawo okubayamanisa necala. Babeka nokuthi azikho izikhali ezatholwa kubona ezibayamanisa nokufa kuka-AKA.Ummeli uNgwenya uthe amakhasimede abo ezwa kuthiwa abekwe uxhaxha lwamacala yingakho efuna idokodo lecala.“ Njengoba sisho sicela imininingwane ethe thuthu ngoba kuthiwa kunamacala okubulala, awokuzama ukubulala, ukutholakala nesibhamu ekubeni singatholwanga ngesikhathi beboshwa eSwatini,’’ kusho uNgwenya.Kwenzeka konke lokhu nje abalisa bakwaNdimande kulindeleke ukuthi babuyele eNkantolo yeMantshi kwaManzini ngoMeyi 14 kuzoqhutshekwa nodaba lwabo.Ababoshelwe kuleli kulindeleke ukuthi babuyele eNkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini ngoMeyi 15 lapho kuzophuma khona isinqumo ngesicelo sabo sebheyili.

ABAMANGALELWA ababoshelwe ukufa komrepha u-AKA, uMnuz Siyabonga Gezani Ndimande noMnuz Malusi Dave Ndimande, kuthiwa babeke imibandela ngokubuyiswa kwabo kuleli besuka eSwatini. Iphephandaba i-Times of Eswatini  libike kabanzi ngalolu daba nokuqhubekayo ngokubuyiswa kwabamangalelwa.Kuboshwe isiqhoqho samadoda okuthiwa ayizinkabi ezanikwa itoho lokuyisa u-AKA koyisemkhulu athola amavenge amahle. Izinsizwa zakwaNdimande zingezinye zalaba ababoshiwe kodwa zona zisabhajwe eSwatini, lapho ezibanjwe zigobe khona amadlangala emqashweni.U-AKA igama lakhe langempela okungu Kiernan Forbes, wadutshulwa wabulawa enomngani wakhe uTebello “Tibz” Matsoane kuFlorida, eThekwini nyakenye. Bathelekelwa amadoda abavithiza ngenhlamvu bashonela khona lapho phambi kwendawo yokudlela iWish eseyavalwa eyayisemgwaqweni uFlorida.Amadoda aboshiwe asolwa ngokumkakisa okwenyamazane u-AKA amcoboshisa nomngani wakhe abahlaselwa bezincokolela bengazelele lutho.Amaphoyisa abophe oMnuz Lindokuhle Thabani Mkhwanazi, (30), Lindani Zenzele Ndimande (35), Siyanda Eddie Myeza (21), Muziwethemba Harvey Gwabeni (36) noLindokuhle Ndimande (29). Bonke bavele eNkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini, ngoLwesine, lwesonto eledlule.Ayishumi amacala ababhekene nawo esewonke asukela ekufeni kuka-AKA nomngani wakhe uTibz.UMbuso wachaza enkantolo ukuthi kusalindwe ukuthi kuphothulwe uhlelo lokubuyiswa izinsizwa zakwaNdimande eziseSwatini.Kuvela ukuthi kube nomhlangano phakathi kwezikhulu zophiko lwezokushushisa eSwatini, abamangalelwa nabameli babo lapho okuvele khona ukuthi banemibandela.Kuthiwa bakubeke kwacaca ukuthi bafuna kuqinisekiswe ukuphepha kwabo. Bacele ukuphelezelwa ngamaphoyisa aseSwatini nabameli babo babanikele ezikhulwini zejele kuleli, hhayi emaphoyiseni.Kuvela ukuthi abafisi ukunikelwa emaphoyiseni akuleli ngoba bayawesaba. Kuvela nokuthi bathe babona sengathi bayobe bephephile emajele akuleli kunokuthi bahlale eSwatini, lapho abatoke khona.Kulindeleke ukuthi izinsizwa zakwaNdimande zivele eNkantolo yaKwaManzini, eSwatini, namuhla ngoba zangena kuleliya lizwe ngaphandle kwamaphepha.Abalisa abahlanu ababoshwe kuleli kulindeleke ukuthi babuyele eNkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini kusasa nabo ukuze kuxoxwe ngezicelo zebheyili. Kulindeleke ukuthi kudingidwe nodaba lokubuysiwa kwabakwaNdimande abavaleleke eSwatini.Izinsizwa zakwaNdimande okuthiwa zinebhizinisi lamatekisi, ziyamaniswa nokufa kukaMnuz William Kunene obedume ngoMtimande owayengumnikazi wamatekisi. Ziphinde zithinteke kwelinye icala lokufa komunye usomabhizinisi.

UMMANGALELWA wesine ecaleni lokufa kukaSenzo Meyiwa, uMthokoziseni Maphisa, uthi wayexhumana nommangalelwa wokuqala uMuzikawukhulelwa Sibiya ngoba uwumshana wakhe.UMaphisa uthumele ummeli wakhe, u-Advocate Zithulele Nxumalo, ukuthi achazele inkantolo ngokuxhumana kwakhe noSibiya ngaphambi nangemuva kokufa kukaMeyiwa.UMeyiwa wadutshulwa wabulawa ekubo kwentombi yakhe uKelly Khumalo eVosloorus, eGauteng, ngo-2014. Abalisa abahlanu ababhekene necala, kusolwa ukuthi bamkakisa okwenyamazane uMeyiwa bethengiwe.UMbuso uthi abamangalelwa bayazana bakuhlela bonke ukufa kukaMeyiwa behlangene ehostela. UMbuso uthi abanye bama ngaphandle, abanye bangena ngaphakathi mhla kuyojuqwa uMeyiwa.Ummeli uNxumalo ubepheka ngemibuzo ungoti wamaselula uLieutenant Colonel Gideon Gouws oveze ukuxhumana kwabamangalelwa. UGouws uthe uNtuli waxhumana nabobonke abamangalelwa.UMaphisa uvume nokwazana nommangalelwa wesithathu uMncube athi wumngani wakhe omkhulu. UMaphisa uthe kodwa wayengamazi ummangalewa wokuqala uBongani Ntanzi, waqala ukumbona enkantolo eBoksburg.Ummangalelwa wesithathu uMthobisi Mncube, uthe ubengabazi abamangalelwa owokuqala nowesibili, waqala ukubabona eNkantolo yeMantshi eBoksburg, ngo-2020.Kuqaphelekile ukuthi abamangalelwa bakubheke ngabomvu lobu bufakazi bamaselula ngoba bebelalele bethe njo amehlo. Abanye bebephethe amabhuku namapeni bebhala. Babuye baxoxe banikine amakhanda, bahleke.Ungoti wamaselula uGouws, uthe akakwazi ukuzwa ukuthi abamangalelwa babexoxa bethini ezingcingweni kodwa ukwazi ukubona ukuthi baxhumana isikhathi esingakanani.Phambilini,. ungoti wamaselula wadalula ukuthi uKelly Khumalo wake waxhumana nommangalelwa wesihlanu uFisokuhle Ntuli kodwa kwangavela ukuthi babexoxa bethini.Kulindeleke ukuthi icala liqhubeke namuhla lapho ummeli u-Advocate Zandile Mshololo azopheka khona uGouws ngemibuzo.IJaji uRatha Mokgoatlheng liyalele ojele ukuthi basheshe babalethe abamangalelwa bengalokhu bebika izaba bekhomba isiminyaminya emgwaqweni.

SEBEZOSIBHALISA beqeda ukuteta isibonelelo sezingane ababeletha esibhedlela iPrince Mshiyeni, esiseMlaza.Izolo iSouth African Social Security Agency (Sassa) ivule amahhovisi azosiza ukubhalisa isibonelelo sezingane. Njengamanje abesifazane baphuma sebesiphethe isitifiketi sokuzalwa kwengane okuyisona abasisebenzisa uma bebhalisa imali yesibonelelo sezingane.“Ukuqala kwalolu hlelo ePrince Mshiyeni kuzoqinisekisa ukuthi imindeni iyakwazi ukunakekela izingane. Siyazi ukuthi ziningi izingqinamba ezibhekana nabazali, sifuna ukuqinisekisa ukuthi bayakwazi ukuthola isibonelelo sezingane ngaphandle kwezihibe,” kusho uNksz Thamo Mzobe, ongumphathi weSassa KwaZulu-Natal.Uthe isibonelelo sezingane sibalulekile kubazali nakubantu abanakekela izingane ngoba yisona esibasiza ukuzenzela izidingo.Ubalule ukuthi kuqala abazali bebethola izingane bese bezenzela isitifiketi sokuzalwa khona ePrince Mshiyeni bese begoduka beya emakhaya. Isibonelelo sezingane bebesibhalisa emahhovisi akwaSassa sebephumile. Abanye bebelinda ukuthi babe nemali yokugibela ngaphambi kokuthi bayobhalisa isibonelelo sengane. Ukuvulwa kwehhovisi kusho ukuthi umzali uzoteta, enzele ingane isitifiketi sokuzalwa bese eyibhalisela imali yesibonelelo sikahulumeni khona esibhedlela iPrince Mshiyeni.Uphethe ngokuthi bazoqinisekisa ukuthi lolu hlelo luba khona nakwezinye izifunda zaKwaZulu-Natal ukuze abazali baphume ezibhedlela sebenakho konke okudingwa yizingane.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi izinhlangano ezibhekelele amalungelo ezingane zikubeke kwacaca ukuthi isibonelelo sezingane siyasiza ukulwa nobuphofu emindenini.

UKUDEMBESELA kwabantu ukuhlolwa izifo kufaka ingebhe yokuthi bangahlaselwa izifo ezithinta inhliziyo bengazi. Ucwaningo olwenziwe iDiscovery Vitality phakathi kuka-2019 no-2023 luveza ukuthi abanye bantu kuphela iminyaka emithathu bengazange bahlolwe ukuthi ngabe zikhona yini izifo abanazo egazini, okuholela ekutheni baze bagule kube ima kuvela ukuthi izifo sezinesikhathi zikhona egazini.Lolu cwaningo luveze ukuthi kubantu abangu-10 bakuleli  bayisithupha abazihlolayo njalo ngonyaka ukuthi abanazo yini izifo ezibangenile.UDkt Mosima Mabunda, oyinhloko yophiko lokuzinakekela ngokwezempilo, eDiscovery Vitality, uthe ucwaningo lwabo bebelwenza ngokubheka amalungu abo ukuthi ayalulandela yini uhlelo lokuhlolwa ukuthi awanazo yini izifo, bathola ukuthi iningi alizikhathazi ngokwenza lokhu yize line-medical aid. “Emhlabeni wonke, izifo zenhliziyo nesifo sikashukela yizona ezihamba phambili ngokuba yimbangela yokufa kwabantu, ukukhubazeka nokuba nempilo ebuthaka. Kuyashaqisa ukuthi cishe uhhafu wabantu abadala abaphila nomfutho wegazi ophezulu noma isifo sikashukela abazi ukuthi banalezi zifo. Ukuhlaziya kwethu kwakamuva kukhomba ukuthi uma ukuhlolwa kwenziwe kahle kuyasiza ukuze kutholakale ukwelashwa okufanele. Njengoba abantu abaningi bengazi ukuthi banalezi zimo, kusho ukuthi abakutholi ukunakekelwa okudingekayo okwandisa ingozi yokuqhubeka kwezifo," kusho uDkt Mabunda.Uqhube wathi emhlabeni wonke siyakhula isibalo sabantu abahlaselwa izifo ezithinta inhliziyo ngakho kudingeka ukuthi kugxilwe ezinhlelweni zokugwema izifo, ukuzelapha nokuzilawula.“Ukuzihlola kunomthelela omuhle wokonga  noma wokugwema izindleko ezihambisana nokwelashwa kwezifo esezinesikhathi eside zikhona egazini,"  kusho uDkt Mabunda.

UMNDENI awanelisekile ngesigwebo esinikezwe owayeyiphoyisa, uMthokozisi Nene, ogwetshwe ngecala lokubulala unkosikazi owayenguthisa, uNkk Thobeka Nene.Udadewabo kaNkk Nene, uNksz Halala Msomi, uthe sincane isigwebo esinikwe uNene uma kubhekwa icala agwetshwe ngalo.UNene ugwetshwe iminyaka engu-25 ebhadla ejele.Isigwebo sakhe sethulwe iJaji Simon Hadebe, eNkantolo eNkulu eMgungundlovu, ngoMsombuluko.UNene wadubula wabulala uNkk Nene ngo-2022 emva kwengxabano eyenzeka emzini wabo oseNtshanga.Ingxabano kuthiwa yasuswa ukuthi uNene wafika nentombi emzini wabo.UNksz Msomi uthe uNene ufanelwe isigwebo esingaphezu kwalesi asitholile.“Wadubula umuntu wesifazane, walimala waphela ebusweni. Lo muntu wenza isihluku esinjena ekubeni eyiphoyisa.”UNksz Msomi uthe okubacasula kakhulu ukuthi uNene ucele ukusiphonsela inselelo isigwebo sakhe.Isicelo usifake emva kokwethulwa kwesigwebo sakhe.UNksz Msomi uthe uNene ukhombisa ukungazisoli.“Njengoba engafuni ukuyodonsa iminyaka engu-25, ufuna ukudonsa iminyaka emingaki? Ufuna ukudonsa iminyaka eyishumi? Usemncane kabi lo muntu, akadonse iminyaka yakhe ewu-25, bese eyaqhubeka nempilo.”Inkantolo ibigcwele phama ngesikhathi kwethulwa isigwebo.Abebezolalela icala bebelokhu betinyela uNene ngamazwi uma inkantolo isaguqile.Unina kaNkk Nene, uNkk Thandekile Msomi, uphume enkantolo esebanjiwe ngesikhathi kuqhubeka ukwethulwa kwesigwebo.UNksz Msomi uthe ukubulawa kukadadewabo kumhlukumezile uNkk Msomi.UNksz Msomi uthe unina osebheke izingane zikaNkk Nene ezimbili.Uthe nazo izingane zikaNkk Nene zihlukumezekile.“Azenzi kahle esikoleni. Lona ofunda ibanga lesibili sebeze basitshela esikoleni ukuthi asimkhiphe ngoba simosha imali yethu. Nalona omunye bathi akhona amathuba okuthi angaphumeleli.”Ethula isigwebo, uHadebe uthe uNene akazange akhombise ukuzisola ngesikhathi kuqhubeka icala njengoba ayelokhu emile kwelokuthi umsulwa.UHadebe uthe uNkk Nene wabulawa ngesihluku, wathi isigwebo senkantolo sizothumela umyalezo oshubile ikakhulukazi njengoba isihlava sokubulawa kwabesifazane sibhebhetheka kuleli.“Wadubula umufi ebusweni, eseduze. Umufi wabulawa ngesihluku, ummangalelwa akanandaba nempilo yomunye umuntu. Kubuhlungu ukuthi wabulala unkosikazi wakho kabuhlungu kanjena wangabe usacabangela nezingane zenu. Ummangalelwa unesihluku. Njengephoyisa uyena okufanele engabe uvikela umkakhe kanye nomphakathi wonke jikelele.”UHadebe uthe kunofakazi abaveze ukuthi uNene ubehlukumeza unkosikazi wakhe nangaphambi kwesigameko njengoba izingane zabo ezimbili bese zihlala komalume.Ngo-2019, uNkk Nene wafaka isicelo sesihlukaniso kodwa baqhubeka bahlala ndawonye.Ummeli kaNene, u-Advocate Shane Matthews, uthe enye inkantolo ingamnika isigwebo esincane uNene.UMatthews uthe kunobufakazi obungashayi khona okwakufanele ukuthi inkantolo ingabumukeli.Uthe ubufakazi bukaMnuz Nxumalo, owathi ungumakhelwane, kwakufanele buchithwe ngoba kwavela ukuthi akakhelene kakhulu nomuzi kaNene.Uthe nobufakazi bukaNksz Nothile Dladla kwakufanele buchithwe ngoba akazange abone kudutshulwa umufi, wezwa ukuqhuma kwesibhamu.Kepha umshushisi, u-Advocate Lauren Marias-Myeni, uthe awekho amathuba okuthi uNene anganikwa isigwebo esingaphansi kwalesi asinikiwe.Inkantolo izonquma ngoDisemba 13 nonyaka ngalesi sicelo.

BABOPHA uthishomkhulu, abazali bezingane ezifunda esikoleni samabanga aphansi, iQondokuhle Primary esiseMlaza okuthiwa bamvulele icala lokweba njengoba bemsola ngokubaphoqa ukuthi bakhokhe imali yesikole kungafanele.Abazali abavuke banikela esiteshini samaphoyisa eMlaza emva kokuvala thaqa isikole, bathe uthishomkhulu ubakhokhisa u-R500 ngonyaka ingane ngayinye ngezingane zabo ezifunda u-Grade R, okuthe makhathaleni bathola ukuthi lokhu akuvumelekile kwazise isikole singaphansi kwezikole zikahulumeni okungakhokhwa kuzo. Kuthiwa umsolwa imali uyithatha esandleni.Omunye wabazali okhulume neSolezwe (onxuse ukungadalulwa), uthe banohlu olunamagama abazali evile kwangu-30 okusolwa ukuthi baqolwe uthishomkhulu, kanti abanye sebevele bamvulele amacala.“Ngesikhathi kufika umhloli simazisa ngalolu daba, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi ayikho imali okumele ngabe ikhokhwa abazali ngaphandle uma kuyisivumelwano sabo, isigungu esilawula isikole nothisha.  Kodwa ngisho amalungu esigungu esilawula isikole abehambisana nathi ngoba akwaziwa nokuthi uthishomkhulu imali ayithatha kubazali uyifaka nini ebhange kwazise ikhokhwa ngesandla.  Ngaphandle kwalokho, abazali baphinde baphoqwe ukuthi bakhokhe u- R50 okuthiwa owefomu uma bebhalisa izingane zabo,”  usho kanje.Kwenzeka lokhu nje abafundi bakulesi sikole abasalubhadi esikoleni kusuka ngoLwesithathu olwedlule, njengoba abazali namanye amalungu omphakathi bavuka bayovala esikoleni kukhalwa ngesimo senhlanzeko nokungaphumi kwamanzi kompompi okuthiwa sekunesikhathi eside, kanti akusukunyelwa.“Amathoyilethi awasebenzi, nelilodwa elisebenzayo ligcwele izimpethu.  Izingane ziyaphoqeleka ukuthi zisebenzise lona noma zishone emva kwamakilasi. Ayikho into engagugile, uphahla emakilasini, amawindi abhodlokile izingane aziphephile.  Sikhulumile nomhloli ngalolu daba kodwa wathi akangene kakhulu enqubeni yesikole kodwa yena akubhekayo ukuthi kuyafundwa yini kuso,”  kusho omunye.Ilungu lesigungu esilawula isikole (elicele ukungadalulwa), lithe lesi sikole kusuka ku-2016 kuhlehle, besamukela abafundi abangu- 1 300, kodwa selokhu uthishomkhulu ethathe izintambo  ngo-2017 emva kokushona kowayenguthishomkhulu, isibalo sabazali abahambisa  izingane zabo  kuso besilokhu sehla njengoba kulo nyaka zingu- 389 kuphela izingane ezifunda kuso.“Abazali bagcina sebebalekisa izingane beziyisa kwezinye izikole ngenxa yokungaphathi ngendlela kukathishomkhulu. Okunye osekusikhathaza ukuthi ngenxa yokwehla kwesibalo sezingane, umnyango usuthathe othisha abahlanu wabathumela kwezinye izikole, kanti kubona ababili sebevele bahambile, abathathu sebeqedela isikhathi sabo nje  bazohamba kungekudala ngoba vele sebezitholile izincwadi ezibakhomba kwezinye izikole,”  usho kanje.Kuze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela okhulumela umnyango uMnuz Muzi Mahlambi engakayiphenduli imibuzo athunyelelwe yona.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uConstable Thenjiswa Ngcobo, uthe amaphoyisa aseMlaza aphenye icala lokweba.“Kusolwa ukuthi owesifazane oneminyaka engu-41 ukhokhe imali yesikole komunye wesifazane, okuthe ngokuhamba kwesikhathi wathola ukuthi bekungamele akhokhe,”  kusho uConstable Ngcobo.

ABE-EFF abaziwa ngokweseka umholi weMK, uJacob Zuma, baphika ukuthi bazolandela obeyiphini likamengameli we-EFF, uMnuz Floyd Shivambu, osejoyine iMK.Amalungu ePhalamende, uMnuz Carl Niehuas no-Advocate Busisiwe Mkhwebane, bachithe amahlebezi okuthi bazolaxaza i-EFF.UNiehaus waziwa ngokuba phambili ekwesekeni uZuma, u-Advocate Mkhwebane uthathwa njengomuntu ozwelana noZuma.Amahlebezi okuthi bazojoyina iMK aqale ukubhebhetheka ngoLwesine ngesikhathi kuvela izindaba zokuthi uShivambu uyashiya kwi-EFF.Umholi we-EFF, uMnuz Julius Malema, ukushilo ukuthi bakulindele ukuthi kukhona abathembekile kuShivambu abazohamba naye. Nokho uNiehaus no-Advocate Mkhwebane bathe bazoqhubeka bayibambe kwi-EFF.UNiehaus uthe akakuphuphi  ngisho elele ebusuku ukushiya i-EFF.“Ngizoqhubeka nokuba ilungu le-EFF elethembekile. Namanje ngisasho ukuthi i-EFF iyona kuphela elwela izinguquko kwezomthetho. Ngakho ngizoqhubeka nokusebenzela iqembu ngokwethembeka.”UNiehaus uthe ngempelasonto uzokube ekhankasela i-EFF eGoli, lapho kuzokuba nokhetho lokuchibiyela.UNiehaus ugxeke nesenzo sokhulumela inhlangano kaZuma engenzi nzuzo, iJacob G Zuma Foundation, uMnuz Mzwanele Manyi, oshiye kwi-EFF, noShivambu, wajoyina iMK.UNiehaus uthe uManyi bekungafanele ashiye i-EFF kabuhlungu kanje.“I-EFF yakuthatha ngesikhathi ubhekene nezinkinga empilweni yakho, yakufukamela. Iyona ndlela obabonga ngayo le?”U-Advocate Mkhwebane uthe ngeke ayishiye i-EFF, wayibiza ngekhaya lakhe. “Angisoze ngiphoxe amalungu e-EFF.”Udaba lokushiya kukaShivambu kwi-EFF luyaqhubeka nokuba segudwini, abaningi babona isigameko sizohlukanisa phakathi i-EFF.Nokho inhlangano yabafundi edlelana ne-EFF, i-EFF Students Command, inxuse amalungu enhlangano ukuba ehlise amaphaphu.Unobhala wenhlangano, uMnuz Khanya Bungane, unxuse amalungu eqembu ukuba angavumi ukuphazanyiswa ilesehlo.“Njengoba sibheke okhethweni lobuholi basezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme, sinxusa ukuthi kube nobumbano. Abafundi ayikho enye inhlangano abayaziyo ngaphandle kwe-EFF. Lesi yisikhathi sokuthi sikhankase, akusona isikhathi sokuthi silahle ithemba.”UBungane uthe bayakholelwa ebuholini bukaMalema.“Kufanele ngazo zonke izikhathi sihlale sigade labo abafuna ukudala uqhekeko. Kufanele siyivikele ngakho konke esinakho i-EFF.”

ABAHOLI be-EFF babhukuliswa wucwaningo oluthi umkhankaso wabo waKwaZulu-Natal uphazanyiswa ukuvela kweqembu elikhankaselwa owayengumengameli  uJacob Zuma, iMK.Umholi we-EFF, uMnuz Julius Malema uthe bazokwenza konke okusemandleni abo ukunqanda okushiwo ucwaningo lwe-Ipsos, oluthi kuzokwehla ukwesekwa kwabo KwaZulu-Natal.Ucwaningo lwe-Ipsos luxwayise ngokuthi ukwehla kwesibalo samavoti esizotholwa i-EFF, KwaZulu-Natal kuzokwehliswa isibalo samavoti esizotholwa yi-MK kuzwelonke.Ukuvela kweMK kushintshe izinto KwaZulu-Natal. Ucwaningo lwe-Ipsos luthole ukuthi kunamalungu e-EFF asehamba neMK.NgoFebhuwari ucwaningo lwe-Ipsos lwalukade luthe i-EFF izothola u-19%, kodwa olwakamuva luthi izothola u-11.5%.Ucwaningo luthi iMK yona izothola u-8%. Lokhu kwenziwe kwenziwe kubantu abangaphezulu kuka-2 500 abahanjelwe emakhaya abo.I-Ipsos ithe yenze ucwaningo phakathi kuka-Mashi no-Ephreli, kuzo zonke izifundazwe zakuleli.Isifundazwe iKwaZulu-Natal singesesibili ngokwesibalo sabantu ababhalisele ukuvota ekupheleni kwenyanga esiwu-20% siqhamuka kusona.UMalema uthe bazokuba senkingeni enkulu uma bengase bangenzi kahle KwaZulu-Natal.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma nabezindaba emva komcimbi we-EFF wokubungaza usuku lwabasebenzi, obuseGauteng.“Ucwaningo lwe-Ipsos lukhombisa ukuthi siyakhula kuzo zonke izifundazwe. Ucwaningo luthi sizothwala kanzima KwaZulu-Natal.“Ukungenzi kahle KwaZulu-Natal kungaholela ekutheni ukukhula kwethu kwezinye izindawo kugcine kungasasisizi ngalutho,” kusho uMalema.I-EFF ibilokhu ikhombisa ukukhula KwaZulu-Natal ezinkethweni ezedlule.Okhethweni lwango-2019, i-EFF yathola izihlalo eziyisishagalombili esiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal, isuka kwezimbili okhethweni lwango-2014.UMalema uthe bazokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi bayaqhubeka nokukhula kulesifundazwe esibangwayo.I-EFF isanda kujuba uNobhala Jikelele wayo, uMnuz Marshall Dlamini ukuzokhanaksa KwaZulu-Natal.“Ngicabanga ukuthi nibonile ukuthi ikuphi esikwenzile KwaZulu-Natal. UDlamini uzohlala khona kuze kudlule ukhetho. Sinethemba lokuthi sizokwazi ukwenza kahle KwaZulu-Natal,” esho.UMalema uvumile ukuthi akuzukuba lula ukukhankasa KwaZulu-Natal.“Thina siyinhlangano entsha. Kusukela emandulo, zimbili izinhlangano ezinamandla KwaZulu-Natal, i-ANC ne-IFP. ”Angeke kube lula ukuthi inhlangano entsha ivele ingene nje kalula KwaZulu-Natal. Kuyangijabulisa ukuthi thina sikhombisa ukukhula KwaZulu-Natal yize siyinhlangano entsha,” esonga.

ABAHOLI be-IFP bathembise ukuhamba ezinyathelweni zomsunguli weqembu ongasekho, Inkosi Mangosuthu Buthelezi, uma benqoba ukhetho KwaZulu-Natal.Abaholi be-IFP nomndeni wakwaButhelezi bazibophezele ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi izifiso zikaButhelezi ziyafezwa.Lokhu bakwenze ngesikhathi kunomcimbi wokwethula umqulu wezethembiso zokhetho obuhlelwe ubuholi be-IFP KwaZulu-Natal.Umcimbi ubusePrince Mangosuthu Buthelezi, oLundi, ngeSonto.Ogaqele isikhundla sikandunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, uthe bafuna ukuthi imizamo kaButhelezi yokuthuthukisa isifundazwe ingashabalali.Kuzobe kungokokuqala i-IFP iya okhethweni uButhelezi engasekho.“Namuhla njengamalungu eNkatha nesizwe, ngaphandle koMntwana ongasekho phakathi kwethu, simelwe wukuthatha isinqumo. Lesi sinqumo akusona nje esethu kuphela kepha ngesezizukulwane ezizayo. Ukwenza, nokungenzi kwethu nonyaka lapho siya okhethweni kuyoqopha lokho esikufisayo ngesikhathi sethu kanjalo nalokho esikufisela izizukulwane ezizayo.”UNtuli wethule amaphuzu aw-15 abazowabeka eqhulwini uma benqoba ukhetho KwaZulu-Natal.Uthe bafuna ukubuyisela ezomnotho ezandleni zabantu bendawo ngokuqinisekisa ukuthi izipaza namanye amabhizinisi amancane kuphathwa abantu bakuleli.Uthe bafuna ukuvuselela kabusha ibhange iThala.“UMntwana wakwaPhindangene nohulumeni owawuholwa yiNkatha wasungula ibhange labantu abampisholo iThala, ukulekelela kakhulu abantu ezindaweni zasemakhaya nasemalokishini, ukusungula amabhizinisi, okwaholela ekudalweni kwamathuba emisebenzi. “Uhulumeni lona okhona we-ANC usuhluleke wancama ukuqhuba umbono wokusungulwa kwebhange iThala. IThala lingumbono we IFP owehlukile kuyoyonke i-Ningizimu Afrika. Uhulumeni we-ANC lapha KwaZulu-Natal usubeke leli bhange engozini yokuthi livalwe, emva kweminyaka abaholi be-ANC bezicebisa bona kanye nobhululu babo. Uhulumeni we-IFP, uzokhuphula izinga laleli bhange, libe yibhange likahulumeni, elinomsebenzi omqoka wokufukula abantu bakithi emakhaya nasemalokishini.”UNtuli ukhale ngokuzithwala kwabaholi abaphethe uhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal, wathi bahluleka ukuzithoba ngisho naphambi kweSilo.Ubalule isigameko lapho uMphathiswa wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho, uMnuz Siboniso Duma, ahlwitha undunankulu kaZulu, uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi, umbhobho phambi kweSilo uMisuzulu Sinqobile kaZwelithini.UNtuli uthe uDuma wakhombisa ukuzithwala.“Ungqongqoshe ophucana umbhobho. Ukube ulana mhlawu,be ngabe nami usengiphucile umbhobho. Ngiyathemba namuzwa epikla phambi kweSilo, ethi uhulumeni unamandla. Uma sesingene emandleni, sizokuqeda lokhu kokuzithwala.”Inkosi uNtuthukoyezwe Zuzifa Buthelezi, uthe bazoqhubeka nokulwela izifiso zikaButhelezi.“Sizolokhu sisebenza nani, sizolokhu simile lapho uMntwana asishiya khona.”Uthe abakungabazi ukuthi i-IFP izonqoba KwaZulu-Natal.“Asinalo uvalo ngawe njengoba ukhethiwe. Siyazi ukuthi njengoba kuzovotwa ngomhla ka-29, uzongena.”IMeya kaMasipala wesifunda iZululand, uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi, ithe bazolanda amandla oLundi, okuyindawo okulele kuyo uButhelezi.

USIHLALO we-IFP KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thamsanqa Ntuli, uthe abantu abazothamela umcimbi weqembu wezethembiso zokhetho enkundleni iMoses Mabhida, eThekwini, ngeke bavunyelwe ukugcaluza bayoze baphume sekuphele umcimbi.UNtuli ukhulume neSolezwe enkundleni iMoses Mabhida, ngesikhathi ehlola isimo ngoba balungiselela umcimbi ozoba ngeSonto. Kulindeleke ukuthi i-IFP yethule umhlahlandlela wokhetho wokuqala selokhu kwakhothama umsunguli wayo, inkosi Mangosuthu Buthelezi.UNtuli ubehamba nabasebenzi be-IFP, nabanye abaholi bezinye izinhlaka zayo. Bekubonakala ukuthi bamatasa balungiselela ukufakwa kwezithombe zabaholi kanti nesiteji bese sixhunyiwe.Njengamanye amaqembu, i-IFP ilungiselela ukhetho lukazwelonke olukhonjwe kuMeyi 29, lapho kuyogezelwana khona kucace ukuthi ngubani ozobusa izwe.Kulindeleke ukuthi abalandeli be-IFP baqhamuke kuzo zonke izinkalo bezothamela umhlahlandlela weqembu. UMengameli we-IFP uMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa, uzokwethula inkulumo yosuku.I-IFP yelama amanye amaqembu asephuma khona kule nkundla ebukeka inesibunge emaqenjini. Kuqale i-EFF kwalandela i-ANC abenze imicimbi yabo ebithanyelwe yizinkumbi zabantu. Muva nje, kwabonakala abalandeli be-ANC sebethe chithi saka olwandle, bengasayingeni eyomcimbi.I-IFP  iyafunga iyagomela ukuthi izogcwala ichichime inkundla futhi ngeke abantu babe wuvanzi. UNtuli uthe indaba yokugcaluza izobe ingavumelekile, kufanele abantu baziphathe kahle bahloniphe umcimbi.“Sithe abantu uma sebengene ngaphakathi abaphumi, ezokuphepha zizobe ziqinile ukubheka ukuthi ongaphakathi akaphumeli ngaphandle. Sizoyenza yonke imizamo yokuthi abantu bahlale, umengameli aze aqede ukukhuluma emuva kwalokho abantu sebengaya emabhishi,’’ kusho uNtuli.Uthe bayamangala ngendlela abantu abakhombisa isasasa ngayo kwi-IFP uze abone ukuthi uShenge lapho ekhona uyazimemela abantu. UNtuli uthe banqume ukuyisa umkhankaso wabo kule nkundla ngoba kunabantu abaningi abayilambele i-IFP.UNtuli uthe kunabantu bazobe bevela nakwezinye izifundazwe abafuna ukuzozizwela bona umyalezo we-IFP. Uthe ngeSonto kuzobe kufakwe izikibha zobuso bomsunguli weqembu ezimhlophe qwa. Uthe bami ngesisekelo somsebenzi kaShenge, ashiya ewenzile esebenzela abantu bakuleli.

IQEMBU uMkhonto weSizwe (MK), lithi lisayimunyunga indaba yokuthi lizowathaka kanjani amalungu ePhalamende, ukuze ibe nenqanawe yekhokhasi.I-MK isabukisisa eyohlu ngemuva kokugoba kophondo yazidela amathambo yathi amalungu ayo azoya ePhalamende, ayofungiswa maduze. I-MK ibifunga igomela ithi ayiyemukeli imiphumela yokhetho.Leli qembu belibize isithangami sabezindaba lapho belichaza khona ngezinhlelo zalo njengoba ukhetho seludlulile futhi sekubekwa uhulumeni omusha. Okhulumela iMK, uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndhlela, uthe lusadingidwa udaba lokuthi izomiswa kanjani ikhokhasi yabo. Uhlu lweMK lubukeka lugqishe ngamagama angaziwa kangako kwipolitiki.UNdhlela, obembiwa ukuthi akhulume, uthe bazomemezela konke ngesikhathi esifanele.“Sishilo nje ukuthi siyaya ePhalamende, sinikeni ithuba silungise kahle sizomemezela. Sisayixoxa indaba yokuthi uhlu lwethu luzoma kanjani. Nizobona ngathi sesiyofunga ePhalamende bese nibona yonke into,’’ kuchiliza uNdlhela.Akafunanga ukuphuma nosuku abazoya ngalo ePhalamende.Uhlu lweMK seluke lwashintsha ngenxa yokuphuma kwabantu ababili, okunguMengameli wayo uJacob Zuma ,nowabhalisa iqembu uMnuz Jabulani Khumalo.UZuma wachithwa yinkantolo yathi ngeke akwazi ukuba yilungu lePhalamende ngoba walahlwa ngecala wagwetshwa, wayohlala ejele. UKhumalo uchithwe yiMK emuva kokuthi imxoshile yamkhipha ohlwini lwayo.UNdhlela udalule ukuthi bazoxoxa nangokuthi ngubani ozohola ikhokhasi yeqembu ePhalamende ukuze lifike kuzwakale. I-MK inezihlalo ezingu-58 ePhalamende ezithole iqala nokungenela ukhetho. Ithole izihlalo ezingu-37 eSishayamethetho KwaZulu-Natal, kanti amalungu ayo asefungisiwe.Nakuba i-MK iya ePhalamende kodwa isakhala ngemiphumela yokhetho futhi ithi izoqhubeka isebenzise izindlela zezomthetho ukuze ithole ubulungiswa.I-MK isiwafakile amaphepha eNkantolo yezoKhetho imangalela i-IEC, iyisola ngokungahambisi izinto kahle. Ummeli we-MK u-Advocate Dali Mpofu, uthe kungenzeka baye nasezinkantolo ezingaphandle kwezwe.Kwenzeka konke lokhu nje iPhalamende selihlalile ngaphandle kweMK lakhetha uSomlomo, iPhini likaSomlomo, noMengameli.

NKOSIKHONA CELEABEFUNDISI baphumele obala bathi amathemba abo sebewabeke enhlanganweni ebunjwe ngesisekelo sezeNkolo, i-African Transformation Movement (ATM).Bagonyuluke ngalokhu eralini yakamuva yaleli qembu ebibanjelwe eWestridge, eMayville.UMfu Thulani Gwala onguSihlalo wenhlangano uHlangana Zayoni, uthe bakholwa ukuthi kukhona okungcono okungeza ne-ATM.Lokhu uthe ukusho ngoba leli qembu limbeka phambili ngazo zonke izikhathi uNkulunkulu.Ngokusho kukaGwala, ngendlela izinto ezimapeketwane ngakhona ezweni, sekudingeka iqembu elingeke limdele uNkulunkulu."Uma ubheka indlela izinto eziyiyo ezweni lethu iNingizimu Afrika, akukho nokuncane nje ukungabaza ngokuthi sidinga uhlobo olunjani lweqembu lezepolitiki. I-ATM okuhle ngayo ukuthi iyakuqonda kahle kamhlophe ukuthi yini efunwa ngabantu abangamakholwa ngaleli zwe,'' usho kanje.UGwala uthe kunemithetho eyagunywazwa eNingizimu Afrika ebuye izwakale iphikisana nezinto amaKhrestu akholelwa kuzona.Bekukhona noMfu Sithembiso Zondo wodumo lwezinkulumo ezakhayo.Ulimise ngesihloko elokuthi elakhe ivoti liya kwi-ATM. Uthe kuhle ukubona iqembu elikholelwa kakhulu ezimisweni zikaNkulunkulu.Uthe kuningi kakhulu okumhlaba umxhwele ngaleli qembu. Wathi imigomo yalo icacile futhi iqhakambisa ubuntu.UMphostoli Mxolisi Phakathi oyilungu lesiShayamthetho KwaZulu-Natal futhi oyilungu lokuqina le-ATM uthe uyabanxenxa abefundisi ukuba bayeseke i-ATM.

ABEQEMBU uMkhonto weSizwe (MK) bakhala ngenkohlakalo nokugqoza kwezidingo kumasipala oyinhlokodolobha yesifundazwe iKwaZulu-Natal, uMsunduzi.Izinkumbi zamalungu eMK zibe nombhikisho emahhovisi omkhandlu asedolobheni uMgungundlovu, izolo, lapho bekhale khona ngokungahanjiswa kwezidingo.Amalungu eMK athe inkohlakalo iyona eyenza ukuthi umasipala wehluleke ukuhambisa izidingo.Umdidiyeli weMK eMsunduzi, uMnuz Majay Hadebe, uthe umasipala uyahluleka ukuhambisa izidingo ezifana namanzi nogesi.“Ugesi uyacishwa njalo phakathi kuka-5 no-9 ntambama. Bathi abantu abasuke besuka emsebenzini abapheke ngani? Amanzi ayahlupha ezindaweni eziningi futhi awahlanzekile.”UHadebe uthe idolobha seliphenduke isizinda semigulukudu namaphara ngenxa yokungaqiniswa kwemithetho yomkhandlu.“Izigebengu ziyacanasa. Abokufika nabo bayazenzela nje.”UHadebe uthe umasipala awunalo uhlelo oluthembekile lokubheka ukuthi abantu bawusebenzisa kangakanani ugesi namanzi.“Kunabantu okuthiwa bakweleta imali eshisiwe kodwa uma usuthi uyalandelela uyathola ukuthi bayasukelwa. Sifuna ukuthi zicishwe zonke izikweletu ezindala.”UHadebe uthe bafuna nokuthi umasipala uqashe ngokugcwele bonke labo abaqashwe ngaphansi kohlelo lwemisebenzi yomphakathi.Umasipala unikezwe izinsuku eziyisikhombisa ukuba uphendule.Uhlu lwezikhalazo lwamukelwe ngobambe njengemenenja, uMnuz Sabelo Hlela.IMeya kaMasipala waseMsunduzi, uMnuz Mzimkhulu Thebolla, ikhale ngobuxoki kwabeMK.UThebolla obekhuluma ngaphambi kombhikisho, uthe izinkinga eziningi ezikhungethe umasipala zaqala ngesikhathi kusaphethe abantu asebengamalungu eMK.Uthe umkhandlu waze wafakwa ngaphansi kweso lomlawuli kusaphethe abantu asebengamalungu eMK.“Kusobala ukuthi laba bantu babengayenzi into ababeyithunywe i-ANC, babezenzela okwabo. Vele eMgungundlovu kwakugcwele izingede zohulumeni wobandlululo. Manje sekuyavela ukuthi abantu bayiliphi.”Baningi ababengamakhansela eMsunduzi asebefudukele kwiMK.Phakathi kwabo kukhona owayephini lemeya, uMnuz Thobani Zuma, kube uMnuz Mtuza Mkhize noMsizi Ngcobo, nabo ababengamakhansela e-ANC.Umgqugquzeli weMK eMsunduzi, uMnuz Thabo Mbambo, uthe angeke baphawule ngokuthi yini eyayenziwa yilaba baholi ngesikhathi besaphethe eMsunduzi.“I-MK inhlangano entsha. Simukela wonke umuntu. Asibheki ukuthi uphumaphi. Sonke sivula ikhasi elisha.”UThebolla uthe iMK ayizange ibazise ngemashi yayizolo.“Sizwile nje kuthiwa bathi bazokhipha amasela, bathi bazokulwa nenkohlakalo. Abantu beMK abangakhohlisani. Ukhetho oluzokuba ngoMeyi 29, akusilo olomasipala. Bona uma benezikhalazo kufanele balandele imigudu efanele ukuze izikhalazo zabo zizosukunyelwa.”

IMK ithi izoqhubeka nokuduba umhlangano wePhalamende elikhulu eCape Town kodwa amalungu ayo aseKZN azofungiswa eSishayamthetho namuhla.I-ANC iphunyukwe amandla okubusa yodwa okokuqala emuva kweminyaka engu-30 nokuphoqe ukuthi ihambe iphaphatha ixoxa namanye amaqembu.IMK ichithwe yiNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo izama ukumisa ukuhlala kwePhalamende elizohlala namuhla lifungise amalungu, kukhethwe usomlomo nomengameli.IMK ikhala ngokuthi kukhona okungahambanga kahle okhethweni obelubanjwe ngenyanga edlule futhi isola ukuthi amavoti ayo awabalwanga kahle.IMK igile izimanga okhethweni ingena okokuqala emuva kokuthi imenyezelwe ngoDisemba nyakenye. IMK imenyezelwe ngowayengumengameli, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, ekhala ngokuthi akeneme nge-ANC ngaphansi kukaMengameli wayo, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa.Okhulumela iMK, uMnuz uNhlamulo Ndhlela, uchaze ngezinhlelo zabo zanamuhla njengoba kuwusuku olukhulu olubhekwe ngabomvu.“Amalungu ethu aseKZN azoya eSishayamthetho kodwa ngeke siye ePhalamande ngoba namanje sisamile ekutheni imiphumela asiyemukeli. IPhalamende liyindawo ekahle yokuzwakalisa izikhalo zethu,’’ kusho uNdhlela.Ngokwesitatimende esikhishwe iMK seliyozilahla kunina, amalungu abo azoya kofungiswa eziShayamenthetho enezihlalo kuzo. Uthe basazobuka ezinye izindlela zomthetho zokuqhubeka nokukhononda ngemiphumela yokhetho abangeneme ngayo.IMK ePhalamende inezihlalo ezingu-58 kanti eKZN inezihlalo ezingu-37. KwaZulu-Natal kulindeleke ukuthi kukhethwe uhulumeni wobumbano namuhla. I-IFP ihlangene ne-ANC ne-DA ne-NFP benza izihlalo ezingu-41 okungabenza bathathe umbuso.Uma kuba kanjalo kuyobe kuchaza ukuthi iMK ne-EFF bazoba yizibukeli bebe ngamaqembu aphikisayo. Kuleso sivumelwano kulindeleke ukuthi uSihlalo we-IFP KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, aphakanyiselwe kwesikandunankulu.Kulindeleke ukuthi abanye bamanye amaqembu banikwe izikhundla ezehlukene ngokuhambisana nesivumelwano sobudlelwano. IMK ike yazama ukuxoxa neNFP enesihlalo esisodwa esizonquma ngohulumeni kodwa kwacaca ukuthi abavumelani. I-IFP yona imemezele ukuthi ike yathola isimemo somhlangano kwiMK kodwa yagcina ingafikanga.I-ANC yona imemezele ukuthi ingena kuhulumeni wobumbano ne-DA, IFP namanye amaqembu asazovela.Uma iPhalamende likhethe ngempumelelo, kuzolandela ukugcotshwa kukamengameli bese eqoka ikhabhinethi yakhe azosebenza nayo.Ngenxa yesivumelwano sohulumeni wobumbano, kulindeleke ukuthi kuvele ongqongqoshe bamaqembu ahlukene uma sekuqokwa ikhabhinethi.

INGASE iqale ingqayingqayi yezikhundla zikahulumeni eqenjini, iMK, eligila izimanga okhethweni ikakhulukazi KwaZulu-Natal lapho ishiye khona kukhalwa emaqenjini.Umbuzo osezindebeni zabaningi njengamanje owokuthi ngabe yibaphi abaholi abazobonakala bevumbuka bephatha iminyango kahulumeni kulesi sifundazwe KwaZulu-Natal uma leli qembu lithatha izintambo.Amagama abaholi abaziwayo abafana nowake waba yisikhulu esiphezulu eMnyangweni wezokuThutha KwaZulu-Natal, uDkt Kwazi Mbanjwa nowake waba nangumeluleki kaZuma, nowake waba wuNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa kuleli, uMnuz Nkosinathi Nhleko, ngamanye amagama alokhu eqhamuka.Njengamanje iMK ayinalo uhlaka njengoba ingakaze ibe nengqungquthela yokukhetha abaholi. Nemigomo yayo ayiqondwa kwazise ayikaze futhi yaba nengqungquthela yemigomo.Akwaziwa futhi ukuthi igadla ngobani nasezikhundleni zondunankulu njengoba nakhona eKZN kungaziwa ukuthi izogadla ngobani. Leli qembu liye okhethweni linezinyanga cishe eziyisithupha likhona nokuchaza ukuthi lisha ceke.Lisebenza kakhulu ngezinhlaka zesikhashana nakhona bekuphekwa kuthululwa. Inqwaba idilizwa ezitezi zezikhundla ebinikezwe zona.Kuzwelonke isebenza ngesigungu esiphezulu sesikhashana esinabaholi cishe abangu-25 abathatha izinqumo.Okhulumela iMK, uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndhlela, uthe nakuba bengakahlali phansi bakhulume ngezikhundla zikahulumeni kodwa abanalo uvalo.“Hhawu senikhuluma ngezikhundla njalo? Thina sisabhekene nomsebenzi wokuthola amavoti. IKZN siqedile ngayo, siyithathile futhi sinabo abantu abafanelwe wumsebenzi esizobajuba, nizobona nje,’’ kusho uNdhlela.UNdhlela uthe akuyona kuphela iKZN lapho ababheke khona kodwa nakuzwelonke basazowenza umonakalo uma sekuqedwe kahle ukubalwa kwamavoti.Uthe abaholi abaqavile bakhona noma ngabe kuthiwa izinhlaka ezisemthethweni azikakhiwa. Uhulumeni wesifundazwe eKZN uma ubunjwa kuba nabaphathiswa abawu-11.Ngaphandle kwabaphathiswa, kube sekuqokwa usomlomo weSishayamthetho sesifundazwe okunguyena okhethwa kuqala ukuze kuhlale indlu. Usomlomo uba nephini lakhe elimlekelelayo ukuze ukusebenza kweSishayamthetho kuhambe kahle.ISishayamthetho sesifundazwe sinezihlalo ezingu-80 ezisuke zizovalwa amalungu avela emaqenjini. Kulindeleke ukuthi uma kwedlula ukhetho bese kuqala ukujuba abantu ezikhundleni, kufungiswe undunankulu bese eqoka abaphathiswa.Kwenzeka konke lokhu nje iMK yadiliza obeyibamba lomdidiyeli wayo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Nhlanhla Ngidi, owugalagala kwezokuphatha uhulumeni.

NOMA ungaba umuntu wesifazane ozithandayo izindawo zobumnandi kodwa yiba nemali yakho yokuzijabulisa, ungathembeli kubantu besilisa ukuthi bakuthengele izidlo.Lesi yisexwayiso esivezwa wongoti kwezokwelukelwa ngokomqondo kanjalo nabezinhlaka zamadoda nalezo ezilwela amalungelo abesifazane.Bakhulume kanje kulandela ukwanda kwezigameko zokubulawa kwabesifazane ngabesilisa abasuke bechitha nabo isikhathi ezindaweni zobumnandi.Esigamekweni sakamuva esenzeke ngesihluku, abesilisa ababili, uMnuz Lungani Mthethwa (38) noMnuz Sandile Chili (44), okumanje bagqigqa enkantolo, basolwa ngokudubula babulale uNksz Anele Mbokazi (29) nomngani wakhe uNksz Zizipho Gabisa (30).Izidumbu zabafi baseVerulam, eThekwini, zatholwa wumphakathi komunye wemigwaqo eKenville, eThekwini.Abafi, omunye owayengumhlengikazi esibhedlela Inkosi Albert Luthuli, omunye engusokhemisi esibhedlela esizimele eMhlanga, babehambe nabasolwa kukuhle.Sebebulewe kwavela izinsolo ezahlukene, kuzona kwakukhona nezokuthi abasolwa badinwa ukuthi abafi babengasayizwa eyokuya ocansini nabo yize base bechithe inqwaba yemali bebathengela izidlo.Kwabaningi lokhu kwadweba isithombe sokuthi ngisho umuntu wesifazane angaba nemali eyenele ukuthi azijabulise kodwa uhlale ukhona umuzwa wokufuna ukutotoswa ngemali umuntu wesilisa.Manje ongoti bayawukhuza lo moya, njengoba izikhathi sezishintshile. Abantu besilisa sebekuthatha njengento ewubala ukubulala abesifazane.Ungoti wezokwelulekwa ngokomqondo, uDkt Manqoba Myeni uthe kudala kwakungewona umsebenzi onzima ukuxwayisa abesifazane ukuthi bamxwaye umuntu wesilisa abangamazi.“Kodwa manje izikhathi zishintshile, sekwaba khona ngisho nezimoto ezikhokhelwa ngebanga ezilihambile, umuntu ayibiza ukuthi imthathe imyise endaweni ethile, abe nesibindi sokwethemba ukuthi owesilisa ongumshayeli uzokwenza lokho owesifazane akulindele. Kuba lula nokwethemba ukuthi lona wesilisa uyiyo ngempela lento athi uyiyona,” kusho uMyeni.“Ngokomthetho, akufanele engabe bathemba abantu abangabazi ngale ndlela njengoba kuhlale kukhulunywa ngezigameko ezinyantisa igazi zokuhlaselwa kwabo nsuku zonke,” kusho uMyeni.Uthe into engalekelela ukuthi kuncishiswe isihlava wukuthi abesifazane abathanda ubumnandi bazihlinzeke ngemali yabo abazoyisebenzisa ebumnandini.“Ababe nemali yabo abazoyidla, ababe nemoto yabo abazohamba ngayo, bahambe babe yiqoqo. Ngesikhathi uvumela owesilisa ukuthi akuthengele izidlo, yilapho osuke usuzibeka khona engcupheni yokungena kunoxhaka wamadoda ayingozi, asebenzisa imali ukudoba abesifazane ukuze kuyiwe ocansini,” kusho uMyeni.Ufanise indaba yabesilisa abanunusela abesifazane ngemali ukuze baye nabo ocansini njengento engafanele kodwa egcwele emiqondweni yabesilisa abaningi.“Ezindaweni zobumnandi lugcwele lolu hlobo lwabesilisa,” kusho uMyeni.Ubuye wathi enye into eyophephisa abesifazane ukuthi bamsabe umuntu abangamazi, babuswe umcabango wokuthi umuntu ongamazi uyingozi futhi angabenzakalisa.UNksz Nombuso Sibisi wenhlangano yabesifazane, iWomen of uMthwalume, uthe inkinga enkulu izwe elibhekene nayo, abantu besilisa abazibona benamandla ngaphezu kwabesifazane, okwenza bazizwe bedeleleka uma owesifazane engavumelani nento asuke eyisho.Uthe babuye badinwe nawukuthi abesifazane bayawaqhakambisa amalungelo abo, bese abesilisa bezama ukukhombisa ubudoda babo ngendlela engafanele.“Amadoda awawukhiphe emqondweni lo mcabango wokuthi sekufanele ahambe naye noma alale naye uma kade emthengele utshwala. Uma wenzela umuntu wesifazane into, musa ukulindela ukuthi akukhokhele ngocansi. Uma ungowesilisa onalowo mqondo, kuhle uvele uye ngqo kulabo abaludayisayo,” kusho uNksz Sibisi, othe kuyadingeka abeluleka abantu ngokomqondo ukuthi bangenelele ukuqeda le ndlela yokucabanga emadodeni.Uthe okulukhuni wukuthi akulula ukubona ngeso umuntu wesilisa onezinhloso ezimbi.“Into elula wukuthi umuntu wesifazane azihlinzeke, angabheki ukwenzelwa owesilisa, ukuze ezizophephisa,” kusho uNksz Sibisi.Uthe bona bafisa ukuthi sibuye isigwebo sentambo kwabesilisa abenzakalisa abesifazane ngalolu hlobo.UMbhishobhi Bhekimpi Mchunu onguSihlalo wenhlangano iSukuma Sakhe Ndoda, uthe yize bekukhuthaza ukuboshwa kwabasolwa ezigamekweni zalolu hlobo kodwa akakholwa ukuthi kukodwa kungenza umehluko.“Sihlale siphakamisa ukuthi izinhlangano ezifana neyethu, zinikwe ithuba lokuthi zihlale nabo phansi uma sebegwetshiwe, sibanike ithuba, bachaze olwabo uhlangothi lwesigameko, ukuze ukwazi ukulwisana nomnyombo walobu bulwane abasuke bebenzile kwabesifazane,” kusho uMchunu.Uthe okubanqinda amandla yimithetho ebekiwe, eyenza kube nzima ukuthi babe nalezi zingxoxo nabasuke belahlwe yila macala.Uphinde wakhala ngokuthi kufanele kusungulwe izinhlelo zokubhekana ngqo nolaka olugcwele kwabesilisa. Uthe umuntu wesilisa uvele enganywe wulaka ngento encane, umqondo ubuye esembulele owesifazane.

ISISHO esithi “uma kukhona uthando kukhona nendlela”, akuqondisiwe othandweni lomuntu wesilisa kuphela.Lokhu kushiwo uNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, ngesikhathi kunomthandazo wabantu besifazane obuse-Newcastle.Uthe lokhu kusho ukuthi lapho kunento oyithandayo uyakwazi ukufinyelela kuyona njengokufuna ulwazi ngebhizinisi noma yini ofisa ukuyenza. Abesifazane kumele benze njalo ukuze kubonakale ukuthi inqola iyahamba. “Imicimbi noma izigcawu ezihlanganisa abantu besifazane ukuze bathole ulwazi ngokusungulwa kwamabhizinisi sekuze kube nomuzwa wokuthi azisebenzi ngoba akubonakali okwenziwa kuzo. Uma ngithi akubonakali, ngichaza ukuthi akukho okuwushintsho okubonakala kwenziwa ngabesifazane ngemuva kokulalela kulezo zigcwawu. Umuntu wesifazane kudingeka ukuthi asukume aye lapho kuthiwa kutholakala khona ulwazi. Kusukela ekhanseleni kuya phezulu,” kusho uNtuli.UMphathiswa wezoLimo KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Thembeni Madlopha- Mthethwa, obeyingxenye yalo mkhuleko, uthe abantu besifazane banezinselelo zasemisebenzini nezasekhaya okubenza bahlale benemithwalo esemahlombe yabo.Uthe abanye babo bakwazi ukuthi bathi behlukumezekile emakhaya uma sebephumela kubantu bahleke “Yize kunjalo sethenjiwe ukuthi singenza umehluko emphakathini wethu. Ukuze sikwazi ukuthi sibe namandla okufeza ukwethenjwa kwethu, sidinga ukuthi sibe nesikhathi sokuguqa ngedolo sithandaze ukuze sithole lawo mandla,” kusho uNkk Madlopha-Mthethwa.

UGQUGQUZELE abesifazane ukuthi basukume bazethembe ngoba banamandla uPastor Lungi M obesiyikhulumi esiqavile emcimbini wokubungaza abesifazane obuku-ward-4 eThalaneni, eNkandla, ngoMsombuluko.Bekuphume nesinedolo kulo mcimbi obekunandisa kuwo umculi wowokholo uFikile Mlomo futhi uhanjelwe inkosi yesizwe sakwaKhanyile, uNdlunkulu uSnqobile Khanyile. Obekuseqhulwini kulo mcimbi obuhlelwe uMasipala waseNkandla bekuwukuqhakambisa ukubaluleka komuntu wesifazane njengoba isiqubulo somcimbi besithi; Zethembe Ungowesifazane Onamandla.“Uma ungumuntu wesifazane kumele wazi ukuthi uwubani, ngoba uma ungazazi wena, uzovumela abantu bakuchaze ukuthi ungubani. Inkinga uma abantu bekuchaza ukuthi ungubani, lokho akulona iqiniso ngoba awudalwanga yibona. Uma uzotshelwa umphakathi, uzothola izinto ezingelona iqiniso ngawe futhi uma uzotshelwa umndeni oganele kuwo, bazokuqamba igama elithi ungumakoti, bese beyakuchazela ngoba wena awuzazi ukuthi kusho ukuthini ukuthi ungumakoti,” kusho uLungi M.Uthe umuntu wesifazane ungumkhiqizo owadalwa uNkulunkulu.“Umuntu wesifazane kunencwadi ebizwa ngeBhayibheli ewumqondo kaNkulunkulu, owamdalayo. UNkulunkulu wasinika amandla ukuze izinto ezenziwa owesifazane zilunge. Yingakho uma izinkinga zikuhlasele, uzibone uvuka, uvuswa amandla kaNkulunkulu avalelwe kumuntu wesifazane,” usho kanje.Iphini leMeya yaseNkanda, uNkk Nonhlanhla Nzuza, likhuluma nabezindaba, lithe obengekho kulo mcimbi uphuthelwe.“Sidle ngokwendlebe nangokomoya okwenza ukuthi sakheke ngoba sinezinto eziningi esizithwele emahlombe singabantu besifazane.“Imizi kumele yakhiwe, izingane zikhuliswe ngendlela noma ngabe kunzima kangakanani ngoba sitholile ukuthi umuntu wesifazane uphiwe amandla okuthi noma izinto zilukhuni kodwa abhekane nazo. Lo mcimbi wembule okunye kwabebezitshela ukuthi size emcimbini nje kodwa kuvele kwashintsha kwaba yinkonzo emnandi ngoba thina singomama abakholwayo,” usho kanje.Khonamanjalo uNksz Buyenzeni Sikhakhane oyisakhamuzi ebesihambele umcimbi uthe bayabonga ngokwenzekile kodwa bacela umasipala ubakhele ihholo lomphakathi eMbizo, eKukhanyeni. “Sihlangana phansi kwesihlahla futhi sicela nomasipala usisize ngokuqeqesha intsha ngamakhono endaweni,” kusho uNksz Sikhakhane.

UMA ufuna ukuthola ukwesekwa ngamavoti okhethweni lukazwelonke ngoMeyi 29, kumele umkhankaso wakho uwubhekise kwabesifazane kanjalo nentsha.Abesifazane bangu-15 million emqulwini wokuvota kuthi intsha eneminyaka engu-18 kuya ku-39 ingu-11.7 million.Umkhankaso wakho kumele ugxile ezifundazweni ezinkulu ngabavoti, iGauteng, ilandelwe yiKwaZulu-Natal kuthi endaweni yesithathu kube yi-Eastern Cape. Lezi zibalo zivezwe yikhomishini yezokhetho, i-Independent Electoral Commission (IEC), eveze ukuthi bangu-27.79 million abantu ababhalisele ukuvota.UMnuz Sy Mamabolo, isikhulu esiphezulu sekhomishini, uveze ukuthi abesifazane yibona abaningi ohlwini lokuvota uma uqhathanisa nabesilisa.Uthe abesilisa benza u-45% ohlwini lokuvota okusho ukuthi bangu-12 million.Uveze ukuthi ngenxa yomthetho ovikela ulwazi, iProtection of Personal Information (POPI) Act, kucishwe ingxenye yezinombolo zomazisi.“Umqulu wezokhetho ukhulile uma uqhathanisa nokhetho lwango-1999, owawunabavoti abangu-18.17 million, kwathi ngo-2014 waba nabavoti abangu-25.39 million. Ngo-2019 wenyuke waya ku-26.74 kanti kulolu khetho bangu-27.79 million.” Uthe amazwe anabantu abaningi abahlala kwamanye amazwe kubalwa iLondon ngabangu-19 525, The Hague (5 574), Canberra (2 609), Dubai (2 574), Dublin (2 342), Wellington (1 668), Abu Dhabi (1 416), New York (1 379), Washington (1 228) neBerlin (1 188).IGauteng inabantu abangu-6.5 million ababhalisele ukuvota, iKZN bangu-5.7 million, kuthi e-EC bangu-3.4 million.UMasipala waseGoli yiwona onabantu abaningi ababhalisele ukuvota ngo-2.3 million. Kulandela uMasipala waseKapa ngo-2.1 million, endaweni yesithathu kulele uMasipala weTheku ngabangu-1.9 million. Kuke kwakhalwa ngokugqoza kwentsha ebhalisele ukuvota kuleli.Amaqembu ezombusazwe aze aphuma umkhankaso ne-IEC, kunxenxwa intsha ukuthi ibhalise.NgoLwesihlanu umnqamulajuqu wokuthi labo abazobe bengekho ezindaweni abajwayele ukuvotela kuzona, bazise ikhomishini. Kulolu khetho ngeke ukwazi ukuvota endaweni ongahlali kuyona ngaphandle kokwazisa ikhomishini njengoba phambilini ubungaya noma yikusiphi isikhungo sokuvota ufike uvote. Kuzobe kungokokuqala ukuthi abangenela ukhetho ngokuzimela babe yingxenye yalolu khetho lukazwelonke.

UMasipala weTheku ubambisene ne-Innovate Durban baqhamuke nohlelo oluzosiza abesifazane abanamabhizinisi eThekwini namaphethelo.Lolu hlelo olubizwa ngeSHEshisa lwenzelwe ukusiza futhi lufundise abesifazane abasaqala nalaba asebenawo amabhizinisi ukuthi bakwazi ukusebenzisa ezobuchwepheshe, bathole ulwazi ngawo baphinde babe nesibindi sokwakha ubuhlobo uma kuziwa kwezamabhizinisi.Ukwamukelwa kwezicelo zokubhalisela ukuba yingxenye yabesifazane abazofunda ngaphansi kwalolu hlelo kuzovalwa ngoMeyi-19, 2024 futhi lolu hlelo luzofundwa izinyanga eziyisithupha.Ukufunda kuzoqala ngoJuni 1, 2024 lapho osomabhizinisi bezofunda ekilasini baphinde basebenzise usizo lwe-inthanethi.Phakathi kwezinto abazozifunda kubalwa ukuxazulula izinkinga, ukuzinaka, ukusebenzisana nabantu nokusebenzisa ezobuchwepheshe.Ukuqeqeshwa ngezamabhizinisi kuzobandakanya ukuphathwa kwezezimali, ukudayisa, ezokuxhumana, izindlela zokwenza ibhizinisi, umnyango wezabasebenzi nokuhambisana nesikhathi kwezamabhizinisi.Ukuze ube yingxenye yohlelo lweSHEshisa kuzobhekwa ukuthi ngabe ibhizinisi lakho liyahambisana yini nemibandela ebekiwe.Le mibandela ithi ibhizinisi kumele libe nonyaka owodwa kuya kwemihlanu lasungulwa, kumele libe nezobuchwepheshe, lingenise imali engango-R100 000 000, kube elilapha KwaZulu-Natal futhi likwazi ukuba yingxenye yezinhlelo ezizobe zihleliwe eThekwini. Lolu hlelo lumahhala.Uhlelo lweSHEshisa luhlose ukudlulisa izinsika ezintathu ezizosiza abasifazane abasasungula amabhizinisi abo, nalabo asebenawo.Eyokuqala ibizwa nge-The Woman, eyokweseka osuke esungule ibhizinisi ukuze akhule kuzona zonke izinhlaka. Eyesibili ithi-Her Business, lapho bezothola ukuqeqesheka, izinsiza zokuthuthukisa amasu ebhizinisi, indlela eliqhutshwa ngayo nokwenza inzalo.Eyokugcina i-Her Community, lapho kuzobe kwandiswa ukwesekwa nokwakha ubuhlobo ukuze babe nomthelela omuhle kulabo abasondelene nabo.Ukuthola kabanzi ngalolu hlelo ungavakashela iwebsite yakwa- Innovate Durban ethi https://www.innovate.durban/sheshisa/

ZININGI izinto eziholela ekutheni abantu bathunjwe ngenhloso yokuthi imindeni yabo ikhokhe imali.Lokhu kushiwo yisikhulu esiphezulu senkampani iMaksure Risk Solutions, uMnuz Knight Mawere  ngesikhathi ephawula ngokwenyuka kwezibalo zabantu abathunjwayo kuleli.Ngokwezibalo zakamuva ezikhishwe iStatistics SA, bangu-15 000 abantu abathunjwayo kuleli ngonyaka. Iningi labo kuba ngabesifazane nezingane.UMawere uthe ziningi izizathu ezenza ukuthi abantu bathunjwe, okungaba wukuthi usebenza kweyiphi inkampani, indawo ahlala kuyo, indlela umuzi wakhe owakhiwe ngayo (uma unezinto eziningi zezokuphepha ngokwezigebengu kungasho ukuthi udla izambane likapondo).Okunye kungaba wuhlobo lwemoto ohamba ngayo, isikole okufunda kuso izingane. Lezi zinto uthe zinomthelela wokuthi uthunjwe noma elinye ilungu lomndeni wakho.UMnuz Chad Thomas we-IRS Forenzic Investigations, uthe iNingizimu Afrika ihamba phambili ngezigameko zokuthunjwa e-Afrika yonke.Uthe ngokujwayelekile abathumbi baqale baphenye kabanzi, abavele bathumbe noma ngubani, wathi kodwa sezikhona izimfunda-makhwela ezikopela okwenziwa yilaba abasebenzisa izinga eliphezulu lokuphenya okuhambisana nokuhlela okunobuchule.Uveze ukuthi ziyehluka izizathu zokuthi abantu bathunjwe, kuvame ukuthi kube ngesokuthi bashushumbiswe kwamanye amazwe, esokuthi abathumbi bathole imali, esokuthi babulawe noma abathumbi babenze izigqila zocansi nokunye."Azikho izibalo eziyizo ezisikhombisa ukuthi izizathu zokuthunjwa kusuke kuyini. Ngicabanga ukuthi isizathu sokunyuka kwezibalo zokuthunjwa kuleli yingoba izigebengu ziyabona ukuthi ngakulolu hlangothi izinhlelo zokulwa nalobu bugebengu, aziqinile kahle.“Amaphoyisa aqala ukuphenya ngokulahleka komuntu omdala ngemuva kwamahora angu-48. Engingeluleka ngakho abantu ukuthi basebenzise ama-App akumaselula, akhombisa ukuthi ukuphi.“Sekuyisikhathi sokuthi iselula ibe wusizo hhayi ithuluzi lokugcina izimfihlo, ukuze uma kwenzeka wehlelwa yilesi sehlo kube lula ukuthi usizakale kusalindwe isikhathi samaphoyisa," kusho uThomas.Ngokombiko we-Stats SA, iGauteng neKwaZulu-Natal ihamba phambili ngamacala okuthunjwa kwabantu abikiwe.EGauteng kubikwe amacala angu-7 818, KwaZulu-Natal   angu-3 081 ngonyaka wezimali ka-2022/2023.UNgqongqoshe woMnyango obhekelele abesiFazane, iziNgane nabaKhubazekile uDkt Nkosazana Dlamini-Zuma, uthe abantu besifazane nezingane yibona abavame ukugilwa.Unxuse amaphoyisa ukuthi enze umsebenzi wawo wokuvikela ukuze kwehle lezi zibalo.

SINIKWE izinsuku eziwu-14 ukuba sibiye kahle ucingo lwaso isiqiwi esizimele KwaZulu-Natal, iMawana Game Reserve.IMawana yakhelene nemiphakathi yaseHlonyane, Mkholo, Nhlazatshe neMkholokotho Olundi.AbezeMvelo KZN Wildlife bathe lesi siqiwi yisona okweqa kuso izindlovu eziwuvanzi Olundi bese zilimaza umphakathi.UMnuz Musa Mntambo  obhekelele ezokuxhumana kwezeMvelo KZN Wildlife, uthe imiphakathi eyakhele iMawana ibilokhu ikhala ngezindlovu eziwuhlalise lubhojozi ezeqa eMawana.NgoMashi 22 enye yalezi zindlovu yalimaza kanzima indoda eyayiluse izinkomo zayo, yasindiswa wukuzenza sengathi ifile ukuze indlovu iyiyeke.Usizo yaze yaluthola ngakusasa sekufika omunye umelusi endaweni efanayo.UMntambo uthe emuva kwalesi sigameko, Ezemvelo zithathe isinqumo sokuyalela iMawana ukuba ibiye isiqiwi kungakapheli izinsuku eziwu-14.Esitatimendeni esithunyelwe kwabezindaba uMnuz Joe Phadima oyiNhloko yeScientific Services kwezeMvelo KZN Wildlife, uthe uma abaseMawana behluleka wukubiya nokulandela eminye imithetho yokongiwa kwemvelo, bazothathelwa izinyathelo zomthetho kubuye kubulawe izindlovu eziwuhlupho.Uveze ukuthi miningi imizamo asebeyizamile yokulekelela abaseMawana ukuba baphathe kahle isiqiwi sabo kodwa ngebhadi ayitheli izithelo ezinhle njengoba umndeni ophethe lesi siqiwi unombango wefa oqhubeka ezinkantolo.Kulezi zinsuku eziwu-14 ezibekiwe abazeMvelo KZN Wildlife bazofundisa umphakathi ukuthi uzivikele kanjani uma uhlangana nezindlovu kanti usuthinte nabezinhlangano ezizimele ukuba basondele nezinye izisombululo.Uthe kube nomhlangano nabaseMawana, umphakathi nabasezemvelo ngalolu daba. Umphakathi ufuna zisuswe izindlovu kule ndawo njengoba abaseMawana belokhu bekhala ngokuthi abanamali yokuzisusa.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi iMawana Game Reserve yasungulwa nguMnuz Cornelius van der Walt ngo-2003. Ushone ngo-2017 waseshiya lesi siqiwi ezinganeni zakhe.Ngo-2017 umkhwenyana wakwa-Van der Walt uMnuz Beyers Coetzee obebhekelele ukusebenza kwalesi siqiwi nomkhakhe uNkk Una uye wabulawa yizo izindlovu ezazeqe esiqiwini ngesikhathi ezama ukuzibuyisela emuva.Ngonyaka odlule kuye kwabulawa izilwane eziwu-900 zasendle eMawana ngoba omunye wezingane zakhona efuna ukwenza imali yokuqhuba umsebenzi wokulungisa lesi siqiwi, kodwa wamiswa izingane zakubo ezaya enkantolo.

ABEZEMVELO KZN Wildlife sebeqale umkhankaso wokunquma izimpondo zobhejane ukubavikela kwizigebengu ezibabulalela zona.Obhejane abanqunywe izimpondo ngabaseHluhluwe iMfolozi Park (HiP) njengoba kubulawa abaningi kulesi siqiwi.Ngonyaka odlule kubulawe obhejane abawu-325 KwaZulu-Natal, abawu-307 babulawe eHiP.Obhejane bayabulawa bese kusikwa izimpondo zabo njengoba kunenkolelo emazweni aseMpumalanga ukuthi uma zigayiwe zisetshenziselwa ukwelapha umdlavuza nokwenza amadoda abukeke kahle.Isikhulu esiphezulu sezeMvelo KZN Wildlife uMnuz Sihle Mkhize uthe basebenzisana neWorld Wildlife Fund (WWF) ukunquma izimpondo zobhejane.“Kubuhlungu ukuthi obhejane sibanqume izimpondo zabo kodwa lokhu sikwenzela ukuthi baphephe ekubulaweni izigebengu,” kusho uMkhize.Uthe ukunquma izimpondo zobhejane kudla imali ngoba zisuke sezidinga ukunqunywa futhi emuva kwezinyanga eziwu-18 kuya kweziwu-24.Izindleko bazokwazi ukubhekana nazo ngosizo lwe-WWF.Isikhulu se-WWF eNingizimu Afrika, uMnuz Morne du Plessis sithe akulula ukuthatha isinqumo sokusika uphondo lukabhejane kodwa yinto eyenziwa uma sekunzima kakhulu.“IKwaZulu-Natal yabamba iqhaza elibalulekile ekuhlengweni kobhejane ngesikhathi sebezoshabalala emhlabeni jikelele.“Namanje yenza ngazo zonke izindlela ukubavikela. Isinqumo sokusika izimpondo sithathwe ukubavikela obhejane yize kungeyona into esithanda ukuyenza,” kusho uDu Plessis.

BANGU-45 abantu ababoshelwe amacala athinta ukhetho  selokhu kuqale isizini yokhetho kuleli.Lokhu kushiwo uLt General Tebello Mosikili, ongomunye wosihlalo bohlaka lombutho wezokuvikela oludidiyelwe, iNational Joint Operations and Intelligence Structure,  oluholwa umbutho wamaphoyisa akuleli, iSouth African Police Service (SAPS) ngeSonto, ngesikhathi kunesithangami sabezindaba lapho lolu hlaka belukhuluma khona nabezindaba ngokuzilungiselela kwalo ukubhekana nokhetho lukazwelonke olungoLwesithathu oluzayo.ULt Gen Mosikili, uthe nakuba engeke asho ukuthi mangaki amaphoyisa ahlelelwe ukubhekana nomsebenzi wokugada ukhetho, kodwa angakusho ukuthi bakuhlelele konke okungahle kwenzeke ngamaphoyisa enele nokuthi uma kuba nesidingo amasosha angenelele.Uthe selokhu iqalile isizini yokhetho kuvulwe amacala angu-50, kuwo kwaboshwa abangu-45. Amacala ababhekene nawo awokudala udlame emphakathini, ukulimaza impahla, ukwephula umthetho wokhetho, i-Electoral Act, nokususa izingqwembe zokukhankasa zelinye iqembu. Ababoshiwe abaseGauteng, Limpopo, Mpumalanga naseNorth West."Sesilwenzile uphenyo olubheka ukuthi iziphi iziteshi zokhetho okungenzeka zibe nodlame ngokubheka izindawo ezike zaba nodlame phambilini, isimo esiqhubekayo kulezo zindawo nokunye. Angeke ngizisho ukuthi iziphi lezo ziteshi nokuthi zikuziphi izifundazwe ngoba sihlelele ukubhekana nazo zonke izimo ezingavela kuzo zonke izifundazwe, kuhlanganisa nezinhlekelele zemvelo nezingadalwa ngabantu," kusho uLt Gen Mosikili.Uthe uhlelo lwabo luhlanganisa amasosha, abasebenzi boMnyango wezaseKhaya, amaphoyisa, ezinye izinhlaka zezokuvikela, ezokutakula nezinye."Eziteshini kuzobe kunamaphoyisa azobe esizana nabekhomishini yokhetho, i-Independent Electoral Commission (IEC), ukuze kukhishwe abazofika nezikhali, abazodala udlame, abazokhankasa ngendlela engavumelekile khona eziteshini nokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi asebexoshiwe ngeke besangena eziteshini futhi. Ngaphezu kwalokho, sizobe sibheke abantu abasabalalisa izinto ezisusa udlame ezinkundleni zezokuxhumana. Sizoqapha abe-IEC uma sebehambisa amabhokisi amavoti ezikhungweni, siphinde sibagade uma sebebala. Ngemuva kokhetho, sizoqapha izixuku zabantu abazobe bejabulela ukhetho sibheke ukuthi lokhu akwenziwa ngendlela enodlame,"  kusho uMosikili.UGeneral Nhlanhla Sizani wombutho wamasosha kuleli, iSouth African National Defence Force, uthe iNiningizimu Afrika ayikho empini ngakho ngeke asho ukuthi mangaki amasosha ajutshelwe ukulekelela ngesikhathi sokhetho.“ Sizolekelela lapho esizobe sidingeka khona,” kusho uGen Sizani.

KUBOSHWE abokufika abayisishiyagalombili nenqwaba yamabhethri emibhoshongo okudonsa khona amaselula enani likaR1 million.Abasolwa babekwe amacala okuphazamisa ukusebenza kwengqalasizinda emqoka, ukutholakala nokwamukela impahla okusolakala ukuthi yebiwe namathuluzi okugqekeza.Kuthiwa amaphoyisa abekade ephenya ngezigameko ezintathu zokugqekezwa kwemibhoshongo yamaselula esifundeni iKing Cetshwayo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda uthe kuboshwe abasolwa abane ngoLwesine eGingindlovu.UNetshiunda uthe uphenyo lwamaphoyisa luwaholele ndawana thize eChatsworth, eThekwini, kwaboshwa abanye abasolwa abane.“Laba basolwa babanjwe oqotsheni besapakisha lawa mabhethri emibhoshongo. Lapha kutholakale amabhethri awu-40 ezinkampani zamaselula ezintathu okusolakala ukuthi ebiwe, angabiza uR1 million,” kusho uNetshiunda.Abasolwa abavela ezweni elingumakhelwane, abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-35 no-49, kulindeleke bavele enkantolo maduze.Abane bazovela eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMthunzini, abanye kweyaseChatsworth.

BALAHLWE elakubo abalisa ababili abangabokufika eNingizimu Afrika ababoshwe nenqwaba yamabhokisi kagwayi owumbombayi ongabiza ngaphezu kuka-R7 million.Abasolwa abaneminyaka engu-32 nengu-29 baboshwe uphiko lwamaphoyiya eK9 eWelkom, eFree State.Kuthiwa amaphoyisa alunywe indlebe ngabantu abebekade besabalalisa ugwayi womgunyathi behamba ngemoto iToyota Camry emhlophe.Okhulumela amaphoyisa aseFree State, uCaptain Loraine Earle, uthe bathole nokuthi lo gwayi ubukade ugcinwe ezindaweni ezahlukene eCedar Park Centre.“Amaphoyisa abe epequlula avundulula amabhokisi angu-787 kagwayi owumbombayi angabiza ngaphezu kuka-R7 million. Kutholakale neDVR hard drive nepheshana lempahla ethunyelwayo okushaqwe amaphoyisa,” kusho uCapt Earle.Uthe abasolwa kulindeleke ukuthi bavele enkantolo maduzane.Kwesinye isigameko amaphoyisa abophe umlisa waseRuyterwacht, eCape Town, oneminyaka engu-35 wabekwa icala lokudayisa izidakamizwa.Kuthiwa lo wesilisa itholakale namaphilisi i-Mandrax angu-87 058, i-Cocaine, ne-Crystal meth. Konke lokhu amaphoyisa athe kungabiza u-R5 million.

Aphelele endaweni yesigameko amadoda amabili adutshulwe ngoyaba lwezinhlamvu emijondolo yaseBuffelsdraai, eVerulam, ngempelasonto.Amadoda, angatholakalanga amagama neminyaka yawo, abulawe sekusele imizuzwana kube phakathi kwamabili ngoMgqibelo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa aseVerulam avule amacala amabili okubulala emuva kwalesi sigameko.“Amaphoyisa abikelwe ngokudubula endaweni yaseBuffelsdraai, anikela khona afica izidumbu ezimbili zabesilisa ebezikade zinamanxeba amaningi,” kuchaza uNetshiunda.Uqhube wathi okwamanje abaziwa ababulali nembangela yokubulawa kwawo kodwa uphenyo lwamaphoyisa luyaqhubeka.Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kwekhansela lendawo, uMnuz Nkosiyezwe Mhlongo, kayiphumelelanga kwaze kwashaya isikhathi sokuba kushicilelwe udaba. Inombolo yocingo lwekhansela ibingangeni.Kubukeka seziphenduka izinsakavukela izehlakalo ezibikwayo zobugebengu okukhona kubo obokubulawa kwabantu emiphakathini eyakhele iVerulam.Abezimo eziphuthumayo enkampanini yonogada iReaction Unit South Africa (Rusa) bathi bathole izingcingo ngabebekade behlaba umkhosi emuva kokuhlaselwa kwamadoda.Okhulumela iRusa, uMnuz Prem Balram uthe bafike endaweni yesehlakalo batshelwa yizakhamuzi ukuthi bezwe ukuqhuma kwesibhamu amahlandla amaningi.“Abahlali basitshele ukuthi baphumele phandle ngenhloso yokuthola ukuthi kwenzakalani nokuyilapho bezithele phezu kwezidumbu ezimbili zamadoda okuthiwa abehlala khona endaweni abulawele kuyona,” kusho uBalram.Uqhube wathi endaweni yesehlakalo kutholakale amagobolonde ezinhlamvu zesibhamu amathathu abekade esesebenzile.

BABONGWE besadla anhlamvana abesifazane abayisithupha bebandla lamaRoma Akhatholika ababe khona ngesikhathi kusungulwa umhlangano wamadodakazi ka-Anna Ocwebileyo iDaughters of St Anne Sodality, kwisiFundabhishobhi saseThekwini.Lokhu kwenzeke ngesikhathi leli bandla linendumezulu yenkonzo yokubungaza ukuphela kweminyaka engu-20 kwasungulwa lo mhlangano kwisiFundabhishobhi saseThekwini esenganyelwe ngu-Archbishop Mandla Mjwara.Inkonzo ibikade iqhubeka eNtshongweni futhi ihanjelwe nanguyena uqobo u-Archbishop. Abesifazane ababongiwe ngokuyibamba ishisa kusukela umhlangano usungulwa ngoNksz Thokozani Myeza, uNksz Stinky Dube, Nksz Busi Mbokazi, Nksz Khanyisile Jali, Nksz Lindiwe Mokoena noNksz Nonkululeko Hlengwa."Sithanda ukunibonga kakhulu ngokuthembeka kulo mhlangano kusukela uqala kuze kube yimanje. Kusho lukhulu ukuthi namanje nisakhona nisayibambile. Siyabonga kakhulu ngokuzinikela kwenu kulo mhlangano,'' kusho uMjwara ebhekise kubona.Banikezwe izitifiketi bebongwa ngendima abayiklamile kulo mhlangano. Bagixatshezwe nangezipho ezinhlobonhlobo. Nabo bazwakalise okukhulu ukujabula ngokuthi babongwe besadla anhlamvana.Lona ngumhlangano wabesifazane bebandla eliKhatholika abangashadile. Lo mcimbi ubuzinyaziswe ukuphuma ngobuningi kwabazalwane abaningi baleli bandla ebebevela ezingxenyeni ezahlukene zesiFundazwe seKwaZulu Natal.UMengameli walo mhlangano, uNksz Nontobeko Dlamini naye ubabongelile laba besifazane ngebanga elide asebelihambile kusukela ubunjwa lo mhlangano.Uthe bakhombisile ukuthi bazimisele kangakanani ngokuwusebenzela ngokuzikhandla nangokwethembeka umhlangano abawujoyina.

Afunga ayagomela ukuthi azobuyela ePhalamende, amalungu eqembu Umkhonto weSizwe, okwahoxiswa ubulungu bawo yileli qembu.La malungu angu-10 ayise leli qembu enkantolo, athe awafudumezeli muntu izihlalo zawo asazobuyela yingakho enqume nokuya enkantolo enkulu yaseWestern Cape, ngoba efuna ubulungiswa.Angu-18 amalungu aleli qembu okwahoxiswa ubulungu bawo yiMK ngoJulayi.UMnuz Thami Khuzwayo, owayehola uphiko lwezitshudeni lweMK, okhulumele amalungu aye enkantolo esithangamini sabezindaba izolo, uthe abayi ndawo bona eqenjini futhi basazobuyela ePhalamende.“Siyakwamukela ukufika kwabantu abafana noMnuz Floyd Shivambu, obeyiphini likamengameli le-EFF. Kodwa akekho ozothatha izihlalo zethu. Siye enkantolo ngoba sifuna kuxazululeke lolu daba.”Uveze ukuthi kunabantu okubalwa uSotswebhu waleli qembu ePhalamende uMnuz Sihle Ngubane, indodakazi yomholi weMK uMnuz Jacob Zuma, uDuduzile, umkhulumeli weqembu uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndhlela nabanye abaxova iqembu.“Sizolwa kuze kube sekugcineni. Asiyanga kwiMK ngenxa yezikhundla kodwa silwa ngoba nabanye kuyobenza okusenzile. Uma singalwi kuyophela ngeMK. Siyalithanda iqembu, salijoyina ngenxa kaZuma owayehlushwa yi-ANC. Ngeke sililaxaze manje, okunalokho sifuna kukhishwe abaxovayo.”IPhalamende limise ukufungiswa kwamalungu amasha eMK kuze kuxazululwe lolu daba enkantolo.Icala kulindeleke ukuthi libuyele ngoSepthemba 3, 2024 kanti la malungu angu-10 afuna kubuyekezwe nendaba yokuhoxiswa kwawo.

AKAZIMISELE ukuphindisela kubantu athi bamenze isilo sengubo wagcina eboshwa uMnuz Paseka ‘Pastor Mboro’ Motsoeneng.Usho kanje esithangamini nabezindaba eqeda kudedelwa ngebheyili kaR3 000 eNkantolo yeMantshi yasePalm Ridge, ngoLwesine.Unogada kaMboro, uMnuz Vincent Baloyi udedelwe ngesixwayiso, bobabili bayalelwa ukuthi babuyele enkantolo efanayo ngo-Okthoba 21.Babekelwe imibandela yokuthi bangaxhumani nofakazi noma ngabe iyiphi indlela futhi bangalubhadi esikoleni okwehla kusona isehlo.“Angizimisele ukuphindisela noma ukulimaza abangihlasela. Ngifuna kube khona ukuthula nokubuyisana. Mina ngiwuMboro futhi ngingenza okuningi,” kusho uMboro.Uthe ufuna kuhlalwe phansi kuxoxwe bese abantu abamonile becela uxolo ngento abamenza yona.UMboro uthe uzobiza isithangami nabezindaba namuhla achaze kabanzi ngokumehlele egqunywe ejele okuyinto ezonyakazisa izwe.“Noma ngabe yini oyenzayo ungabanjwa futhi ungenzi into ezokwenza ubanjwe. Indodana yami cishe yezwa kuthiwa uMboro ufele ejele. Ijele aliyona into yokudlala, akuna-clever laphayana,” kuchaza uMboro.Uthe ujabule ethola ibheyili khona ezokwazi ukuvikela umndeni wakhe, aqhubeke nomsebenzi kaNkulunkulu nowokwakha izwe aphe abantu uthando.Ngenyanga edlule uMboro, indodana yakhe uMnuz Revival Motsoeneng noBaloyi baboshwa bathweswa amacala angu-12 okukhona nawokusabisa, ukuthumba nokukhomba ngesibhamu.Lokhu kusukela esehlakalwenii lapho bangena ngodli esikoleni esiseKatlehong, eGauteng behlome ngocelemba nesibhamu ‘esiyithoyizi’ basabisa othisha maqede bathatha izingane ezimbili ezingabazukulu bakaMboro.Wavuka inja ebomvu umphakathi wangqongqisa isonto lakhe eseboshiwe.

UGQEMEKE engeqiwa ntwala owayengumengameli wezwe uJacob Zuma neqembu elisha uMkhonto weSizwe, ngesikhathi iNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo inquma ukuthi akayi ePhalamende.IJaji Leona Theron ebeliphelezelwa amanye amajaji likhiphe isinqumo esilahla uZuma ngoMsombuluko ekuseni.I-IEC yamemezela ukuthi uZuma akafanelwe wukuba sohlwini lwabaya ePhalamende ngoba walahlwa ngecala wagwetshwa wanganikwa nethuba lokukhokha inhlawulo.Abe-MK basedlulisa isinqumo yafika yabavuna iNkantolo yezoKhetho kodwa i-IEC yalwedlulisa udaba ithi ayenelisekile. IJaji uTheron, uthe kumile ukuthi uZuma walahlwa ngecala wagwetshwa futhi akakwazi ukuya ePhalamende.“ I-IEC isuke ihlunga abantu abaya ePhalamede ukuze kuvikelwe isithunzi sombuso wentando yeningi. I-IEC inamandla okwenza lowo msebenzi wayo ngaphambi kokuthi kubunjwe iPhalamende,’’ kusho iJaji uTheron.IJaji lilibeke ngembaba elokuthi isinqumo seNkantolo yezoKhetho siyachithwa kuzobe sekusebenza eseNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo.

UMENGAMELI Cyril Ramaphosa udalula ukuthi ababambile umoya noma abakhathazekile ngokuthi kukhona okungase kwenzeke njengoba kuzoba nokhetho kuleli.Lokhu kushiwo omkhulumelayo uMnuz Vincent Magwenya izolo, ubekhuluma nezintatheli ezindlini zoMbuso ePitoli, ngezinhlelo zikaRamaphosa emasontweni azayo.UMangwenya uthe njengoba kuzovotwa ngoMeyi 29, akukho ukwesaba.“Akukho ukwesaba uMengameli anakho ukuthi kungase kube khona izinto ezimbi ezizokwenzeka ezweni. Ulindele ukuthi ukhetho luhambe kahle, lube nokuthula futhi lube ngolukhululekile,”kuchaza uMagwenya.Usho lokhu nje esithangamini sabezindaba songqongqoshe bezokuphepha ezweni abebekhuluma ngamalungiselelo okhetho, uNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa uMnuz Bheki Cele, uveze ukuthi balinde isinqumo sophiko lwezokuShushisa, mayelana nokubeka amacala owesilisa owasabisa ngodlame okhethweni. UCele uthe babili abalisa baKwaZulu-Natal, abasabisa ngodlame, oyedwa waboshwa wavela enkantolo ngecala lokusabisa. Wathi omunye balinde iNPA inqume ukuthi uvela nini enkantolo ngecala elifanayo. “Asidlali uma sithi laba abasabisa ngodlame okhethweni sizobhekana nabo, bashushiswe. Kumanje ukhona oyedwa ovele enkantolo silinde omunye ukuthi avele ngecala elifanayo,” kuchaza uCele.Noma engambizanga ngegama umlisa oyedwa osevelile ngecala lokusabisa ngodlame okhethweni kodwa uMnuz Visvin Reddy weqembu Umkhonto weSizwe KwaZulu-Natal, uvele enkantolo ekuqaleni kwenyanga ngecala lokusabisa ngodlame.UReddy wathi kuzoba nodlame uma izinkantolo zivimbela iqembu ukuthi lingenele ukhetho. Wakusho lokhu ngesikhathi kwakulindelwe isinqumo senkantolo mayelana nokuthi owayengumengameli we-ANC nezwe uMnuz Jacob Zuma, uzongenela ukhetho ngaphansi kweMK.UMnuz Bonginkosi Khanyile owasuswa kwesokuba ngumholi wesikhashana wophiko lwentsha lweMK, ngomunye wabaholi abasabisa ngodlame okhethweni. Wasabisa ngokufanayo ukuthi uma uZuma engangeni okhethweni, ngeke lube khona ukhetho kuleli.Amaqembu ezombusazwe axwayisa amalungu awo ngesikhathi esayina izibopho zokuthi azoqinisekisa ukuthi kuba nokuthula ngesikhathi sokhetho. Amaqembu ehlukene athi labo abazosabisa ngodlame, bazothathelwa izinyathelo noma abakhombe indlela.Umkhandlu wongqongqoshe bezokuphepha uxwayise ngokuthi bazogwetshwa kanzima abazosabisa noma abazophazamisa ukhetho.
