UMISE ummeli wakhe ekhala ngokuthi umba eqolo owesilisa ongumsolwa wesibili ecaleni lokubulawa kwabantu abangu-15.UMnuz Thalente Mkhize (33) utokile eWestville nomngani wakhe okuthiwa babeqotha naye abantu, uMnuz Sibonelo "Madanone" Shangase (33).NgoLwesine eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini uMkhize uveze ukuthi useyamkhulula ummeli wakhe, u-Advocate Nkatha abemkhokhela ngoba akasenayo imali yokumkhokhela.Inkantolo igunyaze ukuthi atholelwe ummeli wamahhala.Laba ababili basolwa ngokubulala abantu ezindaweni ezehlukene ngezikhathi ezehlukene eminyakeni eyedlule.Phakathi kwezigameko abasolwa ngokuba ongqondongqondo kuzona kubalwa nesokubulawa kwabantu abayisithupha esenzeka eMawoti, eNanda ngo-2002.Kuleso sigameko kwadutshulwa kwabulawa oMnuz Wandile Fanaphi (17), Qaphelani Mkhovu (20), Mlondi Getane (22), Mlondi Kunene (25), Phillip Hansa (25) noLindo Sphambo (22).UFanaphi noMkhovu kuvele ukuthi babefunda u-matric ngesikhathi bedutshulwa. Lezi zinkabi ziphinde zisolwe nangokuthi yizona ezabulala usomabhizinisi wase-Overport, uMnuz Zeyn Moideeb, owadutshulwa emgwaqweni, uBrickfield ngo-2022.Basolwa nangokuthi baphinde badubula babulala umakhelwane walo somabhizinisi, uShaheed Moodel.Ngo-2021 kuthiwa bathumba, uMnuz Phakamani Cwele bamsusa eNanda bayombulalela KwaDabeka.Basolwa nangokuthi yibona ababulala uMnuz Nhlanhla Goge, eNanda, ngo-Agasti 7, 2021.Kuthiwa yibona futhi ababa ngongqondongqondo ekubulaweni kukaMnuz Njabulo Bongani Shongwe noMnuz Zolani Goodman Mbuthuma okuthiwa kwenzeka eNanda, ngoSepthemba 2, 2021.Kuvela nokuthi kunesinye isigameko lapho babamba khona inkunzi kuhlonyiwe eThekwini bantshontsha imali engu-R144 000.Bakhalelwa ngamasongo kaSigonyela ngo-2022 ngesikhathi bebanjwa ngamaphoyisa bedlula eMarriannhill Toll Plaza.Kuvela ukuthi bazama nokubulala owesilisa wakwaSibisi ohlala eNtuzuma.Icala lihlehliselwe u-Agast 29 ukuze uMkhize athole omunye ummeli.

NJENGOBA zonke izindlela ematshitshini akuleli zibheke kwindumezulu yomkhosi waminyaka yonke, uMkhosi woMhlanga oqeda iminyaka ewu-40 wavuselelwa esigodlweni saseNyokeni, KwaNongoma, iyaqaqamba inhliziyo yomfundi (17) wasesikoleni sabanokukhubazeka eThekwini. Lo mfundi esingeke silidalule igama lakhe ngenxa yokuvikela isithunzi sakhe, useneminyaka ehamba lo mkhosi kodwa kulo nyaka ngeke aye kulandela ukudlwengulwa esigamekweni okusolwa kuso uthisha wakhe. Lo thisha kuthiwa uqale ukudlwengula lo mfundi kulo nyaka izikhawu eziningi ngaphambi kokuthi unina athole ngalo mkhuba kathisha. Unina wale ntombazane ehlala eningizimu neTheku,  uthe indodakazi iphatheke kabi kakhulu ngokungakwazi ukuhlanganyela nezinye izintombi ekubeni kade yalilungiselela lolu suku njengoba beyize yathenga nemvunulo. Umzali (40) uthe waqala ukushaya amakhala ukuthi kukhona okungahambi kahle enganeni yakhe ngesikhathi ebona othisha bemncisha amehlo ngesikhathi  ezolanda umntwana wakhe kulesi sikole okufundelwa khona imisebenzi yezandla.Uthe ngaphambi kokuba abuyele ekhaya  nomntwana kwaqala kwaba nomhlangano omude phakathi kweziphathimandla zesikole nendodakazi yakhe."Wathi sewuphelile umhlangano wothisha nengane yami, ngambuza umntwana ukuthi bekukhulunywa ngani, wathi bebemkhumbuza nge-homework."Uthe yena waze wathola ukuthi ingane yakhe idlwengulwe wuthisha ngoba uthisha esethumelele indodakazi yakhe umyalezo nge-voicenote, eyinxusa ukuba ingavumi ukuthi ubezitika ngayo ngocansi.Umzali uthe uthisha wabuye wamfonela umntwana emnxenxa ukuba aze angalokothi avume ukuthi bake baya ocansini ngoba uzolahlekelwa yitoho bese nomfundi exoshwa esikoleni njengoba kungavumelekile ukuya ocansini nentombazane eneminyaka engaphansi kuka-18. Isolezwe Ngempelasonto liwuzwile umyalezo nezinkulumo zikathisha, esabisa ngokuthi uzozibulala uma lo mfundi evuma esikoleni ukuthi walala naye.Umzali uthe wathatha indodakazi yakhe wayiyisa esibhedlela ePrince Mshiyeni Memorial, eMlaza lapho kwatholakala khona ukuthi indodakazi ilaliwe. Uthe wabe esevulela uthisha icala lokudlwengula khona esibhedlela ngo-Agasti 12.Umzali uthe ufuna uthisha abolele ejele ngalesi senzo sakhe ngoba indodakazi yakhe beyihamba uMhlanga futhi ibisithenge nemvunulo njengoba amabombo ezintombi zonke ebheke eNyokeni, KwaNongoma ngale mpelasonto. Uthe okumphethe kabi ukuthi indodakazi yakhe beyizimisele ngokuya eMhlangeni ngoba beyibukhonzile ubuntombi bayo. Isolezwe Ngempelasonto lithole ukuthi uthisha osolwa ngokunukubeza lo mfundi ukhalelwe ngamasongo kaSigonyela futhi kulindeleke ukuba ayobingelela iNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMlaza, esigcemeni sakwaGG ngoMsombuluko.Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kokhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal nokhulumela amaphoyisa kulesi sifundazwe ayiphumelelanga kusukela ngoLwesine kwaze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela.

OWAYENGUMENGAMELI uMnzu uJacob Zuma, okungakacaci ukuthi uzogcina evunyelwe yini ukungenela ukhetho oluzayo, uthi akukho okuzomvimba ukuthi aphinde aphathe leli zwe.UZuma uthe uma abantu bakuleli bemcela ukuthi aphinde abe umengameli, uzovumela phezulu.Lokhu ukusho ngesikhathi kulalelwe icala lapho iMK imangamele inhlangano eyengamele ukhetho, i-Independent Electoral Commission (IEC), ikhala ngokukhishwa kukaZuma ohlwini lwabaholi abaya ePhalamende.Icala belilalelwe izolo eNkantolo yezoKhetho, isinqumo sizophuma namhlanje.Igama likaZuma, elivela phezulu ohlwini lweMK, lakhishwa ngemva kwezikhalazo zabantu ababekhononda ngokuthi umthetho awumvumeli uZuma ukuthi aye ePhalamende.Umthetho awumvumeli umuntu oke wagwetshwa isikhathi esingaphezu kwezinyanga ezingu-12 ebhadla ejele ukuba angenele ukhetho.Ngo-2021 uZuma walahlwa yicala lokudelela umyalelo weNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo.UZuma utshele abebezomeseka ngaphandle kwenkantolo ukuthi i-IEC ayinawo amandla okukhipha igama lwakhe ohlwini, wathi iPhalamende kuphela elingakhipha igama lakhe.“Umsebenzi we-IEC ukuthi babale amavoti, bese beyasho ukuthi ngubani owinile. Umsebenzi wabo uphela lapho.Kabayeke ukwenza umsebenzi okufanele wenziwe iPhalemende.”UZuma, owakhishwa kwesikamengameli singakapheli isikhathi sakhe, uthe awukho umthetho omvimba ukuthi aphinde abe umengameli.Uthe nakuba uMthethosisekelo uthi akekho umuntu ovumelekile ukuthi aphathe isikhathi esingaphezu kwamahlandla amabili, akekho ongama endleleni yakhe uma evotelwa ngabantu.“Phela sibuswa ngentandoyeningi, akekho umuntu ongavimba intandoyeningi.”UZuma uthe isigaba soMthethosisekelo asimchaphazeli yena ngoba waphuma engakaliqedi ihlandla lesibili, futhi akamele i-ANC okhethweni oluzayo.“Abantu bayakhohlwa ukuthi mina ngakhishwa lapha ngingakaqedi. Kukhona into engisafuna ukuyiqedela lapha. Akekho ozongivimba. Ngeke basithinte laba. Abasazi, basizwa ngendaba.”Ngesikhathi kuqulwa icala, i-IEC ithe iMK yayivele icuphe uchuku ngokufaka igama likaZuma ohlwini lwabaya ePhalamende.Emaphepheni asenkantolo i-IEC ithe abeMK bafaka igama likaZuma ekubeni bazi kahle kamhlophe ukuthi umthetho awumvumeli uZuma ukuba angenele ukhetho.Abe-IEC bathe kuyabakhathaza ukuthi kube namalungu eMK asabisa ngodlame uma uZuma ekhishwa ohlwini.Insongo zenziwa amalungu eMK aqavile, umholi wophiko lwentsha, uBonginkosi Khanyile, novela ohlwini lwabaya ePhalamende, uMnuz Visvin Reddy.Abe-IEC bathe izinsongo zikhombisa ukuthi abeMK bacuphe uchuku. Kepha lokhu kuchithiwe ngummeli weMK, u-Advocate Dali Mpofu, osole i-IEC ngokuzama ukungcolisa igama likaZuma neleMK.UMpofu uthe i-IEC ikhombisa ukuba nenkinga noZuma. Uthe umthetho awumvimbi uZuma ukuthi angenele ukhetho ngoba akazange adonse izinyanga ezingaphezu kwezingu-12 esejele.Isigwebo sikaZuma sahoxiswa nguMengameli wezwe uCyril Ramaphosa, esadonse izinyanga ezintathu.Ummeli we-IEC, u-Advocate Tembeka Ngcukaitobi, uthe ukuthi uZuma wadedelwa engakasiqedi isigwebo sakhe akukushintshi ukuthi wagwetshwa izinyanga ezingu-15.UNgcukaitobi uthe uRamaphosa akanawo amandla okunciphisa isigwebo sikaZuma, wathi inkantolo kuphela engakwazi ukusinciphisa.Uthe uZuma kufanele alinde iminyaka emihlanu ukuze akwazi ukungenela ukhetho.

UPHATHEKE kabi exoshwa yiDemocratic Alliance (DA) owaqopha ivideo elumelayo, eyayicwasa abohlanga eminyakeni engu-15 eyedlule.NgoLwesihlanu iDA ikhombe indlela uMnuz Renaldo Gouws ngokuphula imigomo yale nhlangano.Ukuxoshwa kwakhe kusho ukuthi ngeke esaba yiLungu lePhalamende leDA.“Kungiphule inhliziyo ukuxoshelwa into eyenzeka eminyakeni eminingi kangaka eyedlule kwaba sengathi yenzeke ngonyaka ophelile. Leli qembu lihlulekile ukubhekisisa engangikudlulisa ngenkulumo yami,” kusho uGouws.Kule video uGouws wayeveva intukuthelo ethuka inhlamba ephimisa negama eliqala ngo-K.Wayephawula ngengoma yomzabalazo eyasusa umsindo ngaleso sikhathi eyayithi Dubul’ iBhunu.Emuva kwezikhalo ezazivela emphakathini, i-DA yamisa uGouws yase iqala uphenyo oluphethe ngokuthi axoshwe.I-DA ithi kayisilona iqembu elicwasayo futhi ihlonipha wonke umuntu waseNingizimu Afrika akukhathaleke ibala lakhe.

NJENGOBA kungathu kusalindwe umnyama ongenafu ngesimemezelo seKhabhinethi entsha kaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, omkhulumelayo uMnuz Vincent Magwenya uveze ukuthi alikho iqembu lezepolitiki elizoshintsha imigomo ekhona ezweni.UMagwenya uthe amaqembu ayingxenye kahulumeni wobumbano, awakhohlwe uma ecabanga ukuthi abekhankasa ngakho kuzoba yingxenye yemigomo kahulumeni ozobunjwa. Uthe izwe libuswa ngokwentando yeningi, ngakho ongqongqoshe abazokhethwa abavela kwamanye amaqembu bazoqhubeka balandele imigomo ekhona kahulumeni.“Ongqongqoshe abasha ngeke bafake imigomo yamaqembu abo kuhulumeni. Imigomo ezolandelwa ekahulumeni ehambisana noMthethosisekelo wezwe,” kusho uMagwenya ekhuluma nesiteshi sethelevishini iNewzroom Afrika.Usho lokhu nje, ziyaqhubeka izingxoxo phakathi kukaRamaphosa namanye amaqembu mayelana nokubunjwa kwalo hulumeni njengoba lingekho iqembu elawina ngamalengiso okhethweni.UMagwenya uthe uRamaphosa ekugcineni nguyena ozoba nezwi lokugcina ngalabo azobakhetha kwiKhabhinethi.“Umengameli uhlangana nawo wonke amaqembu, kungaba elikhulu noma elincane. Uzolalela zonke iziphakamiso, bese enza isinqumo. Ngeke akwazi ukufeza zonke iziphakamiso ezizovela. Kukhona abangeke baname ngezinqumo azozithatha ngeKhabhinethi ngoba ekugcineni nguyena onamandla okunquma ukuthi obani azobakhetha,” kusho uMagwenya.Uveze ukuthi alikho iqembu elinamandla noma okuyilona elingungqo-shishilizi kuhulumeni wobumbano.Usho lokhu nje, kulandela ukuvela kwencwadi ye-DA eveze uhlu lwezikhundla ezifunayo kuhulumeni wobumbano.Kulezi zikhundla kubalwa nesephini likamengameli wezwe, noma iminyango ethathwa njengebalulekile.UMagwenya uthe amaqembu ahlukene abekhankasa ayazi ukuthi ezinye zezinto ngeke zibe semigomemi kahulumeni.URamaphosa usanda kukhuza amaqembu ngokufuna izikhundla kuhulumeni wobumbano.UMagwenya uthe abantu balindile bafuna imisebenzi, kukhuliswe umnotho kanjalo nezinye izimfuno.“Okubalulekile ngukuthi kumele kusetshenzelwe abantu, hhayi okunye. Abantu bafuna uhulumeni ozobasenzela ngokushesha.”Uveze ukuthi nakuba iKhabhinethi ingekho, uhulumeni uyaqhubeka nokusebenza.“Uyaluthola usizo eminyangweni kahulumeni nakuba iKhabhinethi ingekho. Umengameli nguyena owengamele izintambo kuhulumeni kuze kuqokwe iKhabhinethi entsha. Ngemuva kokuqokwa kweKhabhinethi kuzoba nomhlangano weLekgotla, lapho kuzohlahlwa khona indlela kalo hulumeni.”I-ANC iveze ukuthi ihlangane nobuholi boMdabu ngoMsombuluko, bavuma ukusebenzisana nohulumeni wobumbano.

IJAJI alimzwelanga ngisho esekhala mi izinyembezi, ecela ukuthanjiselwa isigwebo, owesilisa owabulala abantu eMlaza ogixabezwe ngodilikajele abathathu neminyaka engu-85 ngaphezuluIJaji Bruce Bedderson leNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini ligwebe uBongumusa Sphesihle Radebe (25) wakwa-B eMlaza.URadebe ubekade ethweswe amacala angu-13, kuwona kwahoxiswa amabili okungelokuzama ukubulala nokuphanga kuhlonyiwe kushoda ofakazi okuthiwa abezanga enkantolo ukuzofakaza.Yize kunjalo umshushisi, u-Advocate Bongumusa Mbokazi, ukwazile ukwethula ubufakazi obuholele ekutheni uBedderson alahle uRadebe ngamacala angu-11, okungamathathu okubulala agwetshwe kuwona udilikajele lilinye, awokuphanga kuhlonyiwe amabili wagwetshwa iminyaka engu-15 lilinye.Ugixabezwe ngeminyaka engu-15 icala ngalinye kwamathathu okuzama ukubulala, izinyanga ezingu-12 ngokutholakala nemoto eyebiwe neminyaka engu-10 ngokutholakala nesibhamu nezinhlamvu okungekho emthethweni.UBedderson uphuce uRadebe ilungelo lokuphinde aphathe isibhamu empilweni yakhe.Ngaphambi kokuthi ijaji ligwebe uRadebe, ummeli wakhe umcelele ukuthi agibele ebhokisini lofakazi azinxusele ukuba athanjiselwe isigwebo agcine esitholile.URadebe ukhihle isililo, wacela uxolo emindenini yabagilwa ebisenkantolo wathi sekusemahlombe ayo ukuthi iqede noma iqhubezele phambili okwenzeka ngoba yena akasenawo amandla useboshiwe.Le ndoda ithe ayizalwanga ingumbulali futhi yayingathunywe muntu kodwa okwayehlela idutshulwa ize ibuya emashidini amhlophe esibhedlela eMshiyeni, eMlaza, kwayishiya ilimele emzimbeni nasemphefumulweni.Ivumile ukuthi yayidayisa izidakamizwa nokuthi ababulawa babekhula ndawonye futhi bengabangani kodwa baqembukelana bagcina bedubulana.Esegwetshiwe uRadebe, eseshona phansi ezitokisini, uklunyuluze ngeso izihlobo zabagilwa waphakamisa izandla wamisa o-7 wathi: “Umphefumulo usahlangene nenyama, umqondo usasebenza.”Ababulawa ngokudutshulwa ngoLoyiso Shabalala ngoDisemba 2020, Sthembiso Njapha ngoMeyi 2021 noMthobisi Shibase ngoJuni 2023. Le ndoda ize yaboshwa ngoFebhuwari nyakenye.Emaphepheni asenkantolo unina kaShabalala, uNksz Tholakele Shabalala, uthe uRadebe wabulala indodana yakhe sekusele izinsuku ezintathu kube uKhisimusi, wayiphanga iselula yayo.Kuthiwa uRadebe wabe esephanyeka ezinkundleni zokuxhumana isithombe sikamufi.“Wasifonela wasitshela ukuthi yisipho sikaKhisimusi asisijabulele (esho ukubulala umufi). Waphinde wasabisa ngokuthi usezoqotha wonke umndeni, sagcina sibalekela komakhelwane sayocasha khona,” kusho uNksz Shabalala.URadebe uthe akabazi bakuziphi izinkalo abangani bakhe ababili okuthiwa wayegila nabo le migilingwane.

UKUNGABIKHO kwamanzi endaweni yangakubo, akumthenanga amandla okulima uNksz Ntombenhle Mfeka (26) waseSt Faiths, ePort Shepstone.UNksz Mfeka ulima imifino ensimini yakubo abuye alime ezivandeni zamakhosikazi lapho beqashelwe umeluleki othunyelwe wuMnyango wezoLimo.“Amanzi awekho kahle endaweni yangakithi. Aphuma izikhawu ezimbalwa ngenyanga kanti lokhu kusho ukuthi amanzi kufanele ngiwakhe emfuleni ngoba imifino idinga ukuchelelwa njalo. Ezivandeni sisebenzisana namakhosikazi amaningi kanti noMnyango wezoLimo uyazama ukusisiza. Silima lokho esisuke siyalelwe wumeluleki ukuba sikulime ngoba usuke azi ukuthi kuzodayiseka,” kusho uNksz Mfeka.Uthe emuva kokuphothula u-matric akabange esafunda kodwa uye wagxila kwezolimo.Uveze ukuthi uthando lokulima waluncela kunina akhule embuka elima kubo.“Kubalulekile ukuthi abesifazane balime ngoba uma uzilimela ukudla kwakho ngeke ubulawe yindlala. Uyakwazi nokuzilimela udayisele umphakathi wangakini impilo iqhubeke. Inkinga yamanzi ibithanda ukusiphazamisa kodwa sabona ukuthi kufanele size neminye imizamo,” kusho uNksz Mfeka.Uthe ebusika amanzi awabi khona ngisho emfuleni ayasha bese ephoqeleka ukuba ayowathenga esitolo.Isifiso sakhe wukuthola ojojo abazokwazi ukugcina amanzi emvula nokuba angene ezifundweni zolimo njengoba kuyinto ayithandayo.“Amanzi kamasipala ayaphela amasonto amabili engaphumi empompini. Mhla ephuma awahlali isikhathi eside. Ehlobo kuba ngcono ngoba imvula isuke ikhona ukusilekelela kodwa ebusika kuba nzima ngoba nomfula esithembele kuwona uyasha. Ngiyakudinga ukuxhaswa ngojojo engizokwazi ukugcina kubo amanzi,” kusho uNksz Mkhize.Ugqugquzele intsha ukuba ingalindi ukuqashwa ezinkampanini ezizimele kodwa izame ukuzakhela amathuba omsebenzi lapho ikhona. Uthe  kulula ukungena kwezolimo ngoba uma unomhlaba uyakwazi ukutshala okuncane ozokwazi ukuzidlela kona wena nabanye.

UMENGAMELI we-African People's Movement (Apemo), uMnuz Vikizitha Mlotshwa uthi yize ekholwa wukuthi abalandeli beqembu lakhe bebengayigcwalisa inkundla iMoses Mabhida, kodwa babone kufanele bayibambele emakhaya ingqungquthela yokwethula umqulu wezethembiso zokhetho oluzayo lukazwelonke.IMoses Mabhida eseThekwini, muva nje ibonakale isetshenziswa ngamaqembu epolitiki ukukala ukulandelwa kwawo njengoba selusemome ukhetho lukazweonke olungoMeyi 29.I-Apemo ikhethe ukwethula owayo umhlahlandlela wokhetho enkundleni yebhola yasemakhaya ewubhuqu yaseGloeckner Primary, eSandlwana  eBergville ebigcwele phama ngeSonto ntambama.Lo mbuthano bewuhanjelwe wubuholi bale nhlangano esifundazweni nakuzwelonke."Asizile ukuzokwenza ubukhazikhazi, size kubantu la behlala khona ukuze lubonakale usizi lwabantu.  Singayi lapho okumnandi khona, kube sengathi konke kuhamba kahle.“Esikhundleni sokusebenzisa imali ukuthutha abantu, sibone kungcono siyisebenzisele ukwakha amabhuloho ezinyawo nokufaka amanzi nje njenge-Apemo, singakayi nasokhethweni," kusho uMlotshwa, ophinde abe yiMeya yoMasipala uKhahlamba."Nathi iMabhida singayigcwalisa. Ingagcwaliswa uKhahlamba lulodwa nje, ngoba phela imumatha abantu abangu-48 000, leso okuyisihlalo esisodwa kuphela ephalamende. Awukho nje umehluko ngokugcwalisa iMabhida. “Thina asithuthanga bantu ngamabhasi bazizele bona bagcwalisa inkundla okuwubufakazi bokuthi bayayithanda futhi bazoyivotela i-Apemo."UMlotshwa uphinde wakucacisa ukuthi i-Apemo ilungenele ukhetho, echitha amahlebezi abethi le nhlangano ayilungenelanga."Sifuna ukwenza uguquko ezimpilweni zabantu, ikakhulukazi labo basemiphakathini entulayo uma nje singaba semandleni,“ kusho uMlotshwa.Uthe bangenele ukhetho KwaZulu-Natal, e-Eastern Cape naseFree State maqede benabela nakuzwelonke kanti kungamampunge ukuthi ukhetho abalungenelanga.I-Apemo isungulwe ngo-2021 ngaphambi kokhetho lohulumeni basekhaya isungulwa ngababeqembuke kwiNational Freedom Party (NFD), lapho yathola khona izihlalo eziyisithupha yabe isisebenzisana ne-ANC kuMasipala wasoKhahlamba.

Induna yamabutho esondelene neSilo uMisuzulu kaZwelithini inxusa amabhungu asakhula ukuba avikele izaguga kubadlwenguli.UMnuz Muzi Nyandeni onguNobhala weziNduna zamabutho esifundeni iZululand, uthe kuwumsebenzi wamabutho ukuvikela izaguga nabesifazane.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma emcimbini wokudodisa amabhungu asakhula obuKwaNongoma, ngempelasonto.Lo mcimbi, oyingxenye yokugubha inyanga yamadoda, ubuhanjelwe abantu abangaphezu kuka-500.UNyandeni uthe izinsizwa akufanele zivumele abadlwenguli ukuthi bachanase ezweni lamakhosi.“Kufanele nazi ukuthi lokhu angeke kwenzeke esigodini sakithi sikhona, sizosivikela isigodi sakithi. Asikuncomi ke ukuthi nihlale nihlale nixakazisa imikhonto, singakutholi ukuphumula. Kodwa esikushoyo ukuthi kuwumsebenzi wenu ukuvikela wonke umuntu esigodini sangakini.“Akekho ugogo okuzothiwa udlwenguliwe esigodini nikhona. Ayikho ingane yentombazane okuzothiwa idlwenguliwe esigodini nikhona. Umsebenzi wenu ukuvikela isigodi sangakini njengoba kuwumsebenzi wezinsizwa zonke ukuvikela isifunda senkosi ezikhonze, noma oyise nonina abakhonze ngaphansi kwayo."UNyandeni uthe izinsizwa kufanele zilwe nabo bonke ubugebengu ezigodini ezihlala kuzo."Akufanele kube nomkhulu okuzothiwa ungenelwe abantu, bamphuca imali yempesheni."Omunye wabahleli bomcimbi, uNksz Mningi Zuma, uthe babona imicimbi yokudodisa amabhungu yenza umehluko.Le micimbi yaqalwa emva kwezigameko zokudlwengulwa kwezintombi zomhlanga.Inhlangano engenzi nzuzo, i-Ubuhle leZolo Lethu Youth Development, iba nemicimbi yanyanga zonke, bese kuba nomcimbi omkhulu wonyaka.Le micimbi yaqala ngonyaka owedlule, owokuqala wawusenqabeni yeNgonyama, KwaCeza.“Yehlile imibiko yokudlwengulwa kwezingane ebesiyithola ngaphambilini. Le mibiko besiyithola cishe nyanga zonke.”UMntwana uBhekizizwe Zeblon Zulu ufundise abebehambele umcimbi amahubo nezaga.Kuphinde kwaba nezikhulumi ebeziqhamuka eMnyangweni wezeMfundo eziqhakambise imfundo.Amabhungu angene kulo mcimbi ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku, aphuma ngoMgqibelo ekuseni. Abe eseba nemashi edolobheni KwaNongoma.

UMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa uthi ukwehluleka kwe-ANC ukunqoba ukhetho ngamalengiso akusho ukuphela kwale nhlangano ebisiphathe ngokuzimela iminyaka engu-30. URamaphosa uthe ukungenzi kahle okhethweni lwangoMeyi kuzobagqugquzela ukuthi babuye ngamandla okhethweni olulandelayo.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ethula inkulumo yokuvula umhlangano wesigungu esiphezulu, i-lekgotla, eqale ngeSonto.I-lekgotla ibanjwe emva komhlangano wezinsuku ezintathu wesigungu esiphezulu obubhunga ngemiphumela yokhetho.Bekungokokuqala emlandweni i-ANC yehluleka ukunqoba ukhetho ngamalengiso ngesikhathi kunokhetho olwedlule.I-ANC yaphinde yahluleka ukunqoba ngamalengiso ezifundazweni ezintathu ebiziphethe, iKwaZulu-Natal, Gauteng neNorthern Cape.Kukhona abasabela ukuthi i-ANC ngeke iphinde ibuyele emandleni kulezi zifundazwe ngoba iyehluleka ukubuya ngamandla ezinkethweni.Le nhlangano isihluleke yancama ukubuyisa isifundazwe esayiphunyuka ngo-2009, iWestern Cape, kanye nokubuyisa omasipala abakhulu abayiphunyuka okhethweni lwango-2016 okukhona kubo iJohannesburg neTshwane.Kodwa uRamaphosa uthe imiphumela yokhetho angeke ibadikibalise, wathi bazolwela ukwenza kangcono ezinkethweni ezilandelayo.“Sizithola sisesimweni esinzima. Asikaze sibhekane nesimo esinjena emlandweni wethu weminyaka engu-112. Nokho ke ukuhlulwa kwethu okhethweni akusho ukuthi sekuphelile ngathi. “Siyinhlangano ekade yayinethwa yizimvula. Sakwazi ukudlula kuzo zonke lezi ziphepho esesike sabhekana nazo phambilini. Nakulokhu sizokwazi ukudlula kukho. Kufanele siqhamuke namaqhinga esizowasebenzisa ukuze sikwazi ukubuya ngamandla.”URamaphosa uthe asikho isikhathi sokuthi abaholi be-ANC belokhu bebalisa ngemiphumela yokhetho, wathi abavuke bazithathe.Unxuse abaholi ukuthi bagxile ekulungiseni izinkinga ezidale ukuthi abantu bangayivoteli ngobuningi i-ANC.Uthe bazongenelela komasipala abakhulu abakhungethwe yizinkinga njengoba bekholelwa ekutheni ukwehluleka kwalabo masipala abakhulu ukuhambisa izidingo yikho okwenze ukuthi abantu bangayivoteli i-ANC.Uthe kuzokuba nezinguquko ebuholini bale mikhandlu.URamaphosa uthe bazoqhamuka nezinhlelo zokusombulula izinkinga ezibhekene nentsha.“Kucacile okhethweni ukuthi intsha ayijabule neze. Kufanele siqhamuke nezinhlelo zokufukula intsha.”URamaphosa uthe bazothathelwa izinyathelo abaholi be-ANC abahluleka ukwenza umsebenzi.“Siphelile isikhathi sokudlala manje, ngeke sibabekezelele abantu abahlulwa umsebenzi.”Imiphumela yokhetho yashiya i-ANC iphoqelekile ukuthi isebenzisane namanye amaqembu okukhona kuwo iDA neFF Plus, okungamaqembu anemigomo ephikisana neye-ANC.Lokhu sekwenze ukuthi kube bamadlelandawonye e-ANC agxeka ukusebenzisana kwayo nala maqembu.URamaphosa uvumile ukuthi bazithola bengaphansi kwesimo esinzima njengoba kufanele basebenzisane namaqembu aphikisana nemigomo yabo.Kepha uthe akukho okunye okungcono abebengakwenza ngaphandle kokusungula uhulumeni wokubambisana.Uthe wonke amalungu esigungu esiphezulu avumelana ngokuthi kwakufanele i-ANC isungule uhulumeni wokubambisana.

AKUKAZIWA ukuthi kungase kubuye nini ukuphakelwa kwamanzi okujwayelekile emiphakathini eseNyakatho yeTheku engenawo.Izindawo ezithintekile iNtuzuma, izingxenye zaKwaMashu, iPhoenix, uMhlanga, iVerulam naseNewlands.IDA ifuna kungenele uMnyango wezaManzi nokuHanjiswa kweNdle ngoba kunemiphakathi osekuphele amasonto amabili engaphumi amanzi kompompi bayo. Isimemezlo sokuthi kunenkinga edamini iDurban Heights Water Treatment Works sikhishwe ngoLwesine. UMnuz Thabani Mthethwa we-DA, uthe: “Sifonelwa umphakathi wakulezi zindawo ukhala ngokuthi sekuphele amasonto amabili kungaphumi neconsi kompompi." Uthe usebhalele inhloko yophiko lwamanzi kuMasipala weTheku, uMnuz Ednick Msweli, ecela ukuthi kunyuswe isibalo samaloli alethela umphakathi wakulezi zindawo amanzi.UMasipala weTheku ngempelasonto ukhiphe isitatimende esithi kulezi zindawo ezibaliwe kuzophazamiseka ukuphakelwa kwamanzi ngenxa yokuthi amanzi owathola kuMngeni-uThukela Water ancishisiwe. UMnuz Siyabonga Maphumulo,  okhulumela uMngeni-uThukela Water, uthe bamatasa bahlanza ulwelwesi oluluhlaza olugcwele idamu oluvale izihluzo. "Ososayensi bethu basitshele ukuthi lolu lwelwesi olungavamile luvimbela ukuhluzeka kwamanzi okumele angene emapayipini nokuholelela ekutheni amanzi angaphumi kahle. Kumele siqale sihlanze ulwelwesi sikhuculule izihluzi. Ngokujwayelekile ulwelwesi luvame ukuba khona ehlobo kodwa ukushintsha kwesimo sezulu kudala ukuthi kube nezinto eziningi ezishintshile. Lolu hlobo lolwelwesi olukhona manje luningi ngokungajwayelekile. Siyazi ukuthi umphakathi ulindele ukuthi sisho ukuthi isimo sizolunga nini  kodwa okwamanje asikwazi ukusho. Senza konke okusemandleni ukuze sibuyisele isimo kwesejwayelekile, " kusho uMaphumulo.Imeya yeTheku, uMnuz Cyril Xaba, izolo icashunwe kweminye imithombo yezindaba ithi izindawo eziphakeme ezifana neNtuzuma nezinye izona ezithinteke kakhulu ngoba amanzi akhona mancane.“Ingqalasizinda yethu isindala, amanye amapayipi ayavuza. Izikhukhula zengeze ezinkingeni ebesinazo kodwa inkinga yakamuva idalwa ilolu lwelwesi. Umasipala uzothumela amaloli amanzi engeziwe ezindaweni ezithintekile,” kusho uXaba.

LITHI alikhumbuli lutho ngesigameko iphoyisa likaMasipala weTheku elisolwa ngecala lokubulala intombi yalo, eyayiyiphoyisa  kuwona lo mkhandlu.UConstable Sizwe Ngema (27) ubevele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini izolo. Usolwa ngokubhokoda ngommese uConstable Bianca Khuzwayo (23) waze washona ngoMashi 31.Indaba yokukhohlwa kukaNgema ivele embikweni kaDkt Jabulani Mthethwa omhlole ingqondo ngoMsombuluko ntambama.Ngokombiko kaMthethwa onguchwepheshe ekucubunguleni indlela yokuziphatha kwabantu, uNgema kufanele aye esibhedlela sabangaphilile kahle ekhanda iFort Napier, eMgungundlovu.UMthethwa embikweni wakhe, uthe kulesi sibhedlela uNgema uzofike ahlolisiswe isimo sengqondo.“Emva kokumbheka ngithole ukuthi uyakhohlwa akakhumbuli lutho ngesigameko aboshelwe sona,” kusho umbiko kaMthethwa.Ekhasini lesibili, lapho echaza ngezimo ezehlukene zikaNgema, uMthethwa uthe uthole ukuthi uphatheke kabi futhi udangele.Ubuye aveze ukuthi ubukeka edidekile.UMshushisi woMbuso uMnuz Calvin Govender ethula umphumela wombiko kaMthethwa, uthe uphakamisa ukuthi icala lihlehliswe ukuze kuqale uhlelo lokuyiswa kukaNgema esibhedlela.Ummeli kaNgema, u-Advocate Ravi Reddy, uthe bayakwamukela okushiwo umbiko kadokotela.Uthe njengoba kubuye umbiko othi uNgema kufanele ayiswe esibhedlela sabangaphilile kahle ekhanda, ngeke baqhubeke nokucela ibheyili okwamanje.Uveze nokuthi inkulumo yakhe ibuye ishayisane.IMantshi, uMnuz Scelo Zuma, ithe ilihlehlisela uJuni 7 icala ukuze luqhubeke ngaphandle kwezihibe uhlelo lwasesibhedlela.Umndeni kaConst Khuzwayo obukhona enkantolo nayizolo, uzwakale unengeka ngokutholwe udokotela. Ngesikhathi uGovender echaza kafishane okuqukethwe umbiko, kukhona abavele banxapha.Phambilini, lo mndeni ubulokhu usho ukuthi ngokwawo awuqondi ukuthi kungani uNgema engavele avume icala, agwetshwe.Ubukusho lokhu ngenxa ye-video eyasabalala ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ekhombisa uConst Khuzwayo emzuzwini wakhe wokugcina, ephuma igazi ngamakhala nangomlomo.Le video kuthiwa yafakwa wuNgema ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, waphinde wayithumela kwabasondelene nomufi, ebatshela ukuthi usembulele.

AWAGAYELWE mphako amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal kulezi zinsuku, uma ebhekene nabasolwa ngezenzo zobugebengu nokuhlalisa lubhojozi umphakathi, njengoba eseqothe inqwaba esikhathini esingaphansi kwezinyanga ezimbili.Esigamekweni sakamuva, esenzeke eCato Crest eMayville, ngoLwesibili ebusuku, amaphoyisa edubule abahlanu okuthiwa bebefunwa uthuli ngamacala okubamba inkunzi amabhizinisi omphakathi namathathu okubulala.Isigameko siholele ekutheni babe ngu-32 abasolwa ababulewe ngamaphoyisa ezinyangeni ezimbili (Juni noJulayi), okuvele ukuthi bonke baqale badubule kuqala babhekise kuwo, bese ephendula ngendlela efanayo. Kuzona zonke izigameko ezenzekile, alikho iphoyisa elibulaliwe okuyinto eshayelwa ihlombe umkhuzi wawo esifundazweni uLieutenant General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi. ULt Gen Mkhwanazi usenconywe ngabaningi ngokuqothwa kwezigebengu okuthiwa zihlasela amaphoyisa uma ezama ukuzibopha.Nakuba kunjalo, isishoshovu esilwela amalungelo abantu, uNksz Mary de Haas, uthe ukuqothwa kwabasolwa ngobugebengu ngale ndlela akunabo ubulungiswa futhi kuveza amaphoyisa njengabantu abazithathela umthetho ngezandla.“Kumele sikhathazeke kakhulu ngalokhu kudutshulwa kwabasolwa okwenzeka izikhathi zilandelana. Kunezigameko okuqondakalayo ukuthi kungani amaphoyisa edubule abasolwa. Kuyaqondakala uma edubula abebebamba imoto yemali, lapho ke akungabazeki ukuthi basuke behlome beyizingovolo, ingekho enye indlela amaphoyisa angabhekana nabo ngayo,” usho kanjeUthe sekukaningi kunemibiko eveza ukuthi amaphoyisa adubula abasolwa ngoba impilo yawo isuke isengozini kodwa isikhathi esiningi kusuke kungasilona iqiniso. Uthe kwesinye isikhathi kuyaye kube nobufakazi bophenyo obuvezayo ukuthi umuntu osuke ebulewe usuke engesiyona ingozi emaphoyiseni. Uveze ukuthi akukhona konke okushiwo ngamaphoyisa ngalezi zigameko okuyiqiniso njengoba kwesinye isikhathi engakwenza ukugqiba inkohlakalo yawo. Uphinde wakuveza ukuthi isikhathi esiningi ababulawa ngamaphoyisa basuke bebandakanyeka ekudayiseni izidakamizwa futhi amanye awo enesandla, ngakho ukudutshulwa kwabo kusuke nje kuwukususa ubufakazi obuthile. UDe Haas uthe okunye uma amaphoyisa edubula abantu abaningi kangaka, kukhombisa ukuthi kukhona okungahambi kahle kwezobunhloli emaphoyiseni ikakhulu ukubhekana nokusabalala kwezibhamu esifundazweni. Ukhale ngokungakhokhelwa ngendlela nokubulawa kwezimpimpi zamaphoyisa akholwa ukuthi - kwesinye isikhathi - ulwazi lusuke luputshuzwe yiwo uqobo.Yize uNksz de Haas ebalule ukuthi amaphoyisa nawo kumele abhekisiswe ekwenzeni kwawo kodwa zikhona izigameko lapho amaphoyisa ehlaselwa khona. Ezigamekweni zakamuva esenzeke ngoJuni 6 nonyaka, lapho iphoyisa eliwu-captain elisebenzela esiteshini esikwaMashu elisinde ngokulambisa emvuleni yezinhlamvu lizithela kwabebebamba imoto ethwala imali emgwaqweni u-N2, ekuseni libheke emsebenzini.Kwesinye isigameko esenzeke ngesonto eledlule ePhoenix, iphoyisa lidutshulwe lalimala ngesikhathi iqeqebana labasolwa ebelihlomile libamba inkunzi isitolo esidayia ubucwebe kule ndawo.Okhulumela uphiko oluphenya ngamacala athinta amaphoyisa, i-Independent Police Investigating Directorate (IPID), uMnuz Phaladi Shuping, uthe kukhona lapho uphiko lwabo luthole ukuthi amaphoyisa asebenzise umthetho ukudubula izigebengu kanti kukhona nalapho okuvela ukuthi awephulile.“Lapho ephula khona umthetho, kubhalwa umbiko oyayela ukuthi athathelwe izinyathelo, bese amadokodo edluliselwa ophikweni lwezokushushisa uma kubonakala ukuthi kubekhona izenzo zobugebengu,” usho kanje.Okhulumela amaphoyisa uColonel Robert Netshiunda ekhuluma ezikweni labezindaba i-Newzroom Afrika, ebuzwa mayelana nokudubula kwamaphoyisa, uthe awavele avuke ekuseni eyodubula abantu kodwa asuke eqondene ngqo nabasolwa emva kokuthola umkhondo ngabo.“Siyabalandela abasolwa ngenhloso yokubabopha. Ngokuthola ukuthi bakephi kulandela uphenyo, esikhundleni sokuthi bathobele umthetho bazama inhlanhla ngokudubula amaphoyisa. Uma bedubula, amaphoyisa kumele azivikele, kungenjalo yiwona angazithola esefile,” usho kanje.Uthe abasolwa abadutshulwe eCato Crest batholwe nesibhamu esikhulu, nezintathu ezincane nezidakamizwa.Ezinye izigameko amaphoyisa aqothe kuzo abasolwa okuthiwa abedubula ebhekise kuwo; NgoJulayi 26, adubule abasolwa ababili eNanda, okukholakala ukuthi abeqembu lezigebengu i-West elihlalise lubhojozi umphakathiNgosuku olufanayo, abasolwa abathathu badutshulwe KwaDlangezwa, babefunwa ngamacala okubamba inkunzi nokubulalaNgoJulayi 25, kudutshulwe indoda esolwa ngokuqhumisa umshini wemali eSikhaleni NgoJulayi, 25, adubule abasolwa abathathu eNanda, abebefunwa ngawokubulala okukhona kuwo olokubulala iphoyisa nokubamba inkunziNgoJulayi, 21, adubule umsolwa owayeyisosha eMgungundlovu, eMbali, obefunwa ngamacala ahlukene kubalwa nelokubulala iphoyisaNgoJulayi, 17, adubule abasolwa abane e-Overport abebesolwa ngobunkabiNgoJulayi,14 adubule umsolwa ona-26, eNanda, eLusaka, obefunwa ngamacala amathathu okubulalaNgoJulayi 7, kudutshulwe ababili eChartsworth ngokuntshontshwa kwamakhebula esakhiweni sikahulumeni.NgoJuni 5, munye umsolwa odutshulwe eMbumbulu, obefunwa ngamacala okuduna izimoto nokubamba inkunziNgoJuni 10, adubule abasolwa abane eHarding, okuthiwa bebezama ukubamba inkunzi usomabhizinisi obephuma ebhangeNgoJuni 4, adubule ababili ePhoenix abasolwa ngokubamba inkunzi izimoto ezithwala imalingoJuni 3, kudutshulwe umsolwa oyedwa obefunwa ngamacala okubulala ababili abasekomitini elilwa nobugebengu eNanda.

NGESONTO kuphela iminyaka ewu-48 intsha yaseNingizimu Afrika eyayiphila ngo-1976, yabhikisha ilwa nohulumeni wobandlululo, ilwela ukufuna ukufunda ngolimi lwayo ezikoleni, hhayi ukufunda zonke izifundo ngesiBhunu, isenzo esasiphoqwa wuhulumeni wengcindezelo, izwe lingakakhululeki. Ngalelo langa, abafundi bezikole ezehlukene zaseSoweto abalinganiselwa ku-10 000 babegcwele imigwaqo, bebhikisha. Lokho kwaholela ekutheni kufe abantu abangaphezu kuka-500, kubalwa noHector Pieterson, owayeneminyaka ewu-12 ngaleso sikhathi. Kwalimala abantu abangaphezu kuka-2 000.Isolezwe lixoxe nentsha ephila manje uNksz uZoleka Dlamini waseHighflats, uMnuz Sibusiso Cele waseNdwedwe noNksz Nothando Ndlovu waseThekwini, ukuzwa ukuthi lolu suku lusho ukuthini kubona nokuthi yikuphi okungabagculisi ngalo manje.UNksz Dlamini (21) uthe ukubaluleka kwalolu suku kuya ngokuya kuyehla ngenxa yokuthi intsha yamanje ayisenandaba nomlando nokubaluleka kwawo, ngenxa yezizathu ezehlukene.“Lolu suku seluyiholidi nje elifana namanye ngenxa yokuthi intsha seyiphelelwe yithemba lempilo engcono. Iningi lethu lifundile kodwa imisebenzi ayitholakali, yingakho abaningi sebelushaya indiva. Kumele kwenziwe izinhlelo zokuluvuselela, kufundiswe abeza ngemuva kwethu ngokubaluleka kwalo, futhi kukhuthazwe ubumqoka bokuzimela nokuqala amabhizinisi entsheni,” kusho uNksz Dlamini.UCele (35) uthe nakuba lolu suku lusesemqoka ngenxa yomlando walo, kepha azikapheli izinto ezikhathaza intsha, umehluko wukuthi intsha yamanje isibhekene nezinkinga ezehlukene kunezentsha eyayiphila ngo-1976.“Thina sasilwela izinto engingabala kuzo inkululeko yezomnotho, wukuzimela nokuba ngabaholi bakusasa. Lokho kubonakele nangesikhathi kuvotwa ukuthi intsha seyikhathele yizethembiso ezingafezwa, ifuna izinhlelo zezinto ezibambekayo zokuthi kuzoyiwa kanjani phambili,” usho kanje.UNksz Ndlovu (29) ugxeke intsha yamanje, ekhala ngokuthi izinto ezenziwa ngabanye babo zikhombisa ukungazi ukuthi sisuka kuphi njengoba izwe selilana elikhona manje.“Intsha yamanje yazisa kakhulu amalungelo nokwenza igcine ingasazinaki ezinye izinto ezimqoka, futhi igcina yenza izinto ezingalungile bese icasha ngokuthi ikhululekile. Nokho isekhona intsha ekuqondayo ukuthi asifikanga kalula lapho esikhona manje. Kumele siyintsha siyeke ukukhululeka kakhulu, sivuke sizithintithe sisebenzele ukwenza izinto ezibonakalayo,” kusho uNksz Ndlovu.

NKOSIKHONA CELEAKHUTHAZA ezemidlalo kubantu abasha amabandla amabili aseZayoni iGalathiya neSibusiso Ibandla Lenkosi.IGaliya liholwa nguMbhishobhi J Dludlu ebese kuthi Isibusiso Ibandla Lenkosi liholwe nguMbhishobhi Phumlani Dlamini.Laba baholi basho ngazwi linye kwelokuthi kumqoka kangakanani ukuba abantu abasha bazihlanganise nezemidlalo.Bakholwa ukuthi abantu abasha bangakwazi nokuphilisa imindeni yabo uma bengagxila kwezemidlalo.Bathi yingakho behlele  usuku lwezemidlalo phakathi kwalawa mabandla womabili oluzobe lungoSepthemba 28 e-Ermelo eMpumalanga kulo nyaka.UDlamini uthi amabandla angaklama indima enkulu kakhulu ekuvezeni amakhono abantu abasha."Sikholwa ukuthi amabandla nawo angakwazi ukukhuthaza abantu abasha ngezemidlalo," usho kanje.Eqhuba uDlamini uthe sesiphelile isikhathi sokuthi amabandla ashalazele ezemidlalo, agqolozele ibhayibheli kuephela."Iqiniso ukuthi ezemidlalo zinemali eningi futhi zinobuhle obuningi eziza nabo kumuntu ngamunye nasemphakathini jikelele. Yingakho kumele abantu abasha bakhuthazwe ngazo," echaza.Lawa mabandla athe azobe egxile ebholeni lomnqakiswano nebhola lezinyawo.

AKUDINGEKI ukuthi ukhokhe imali eningi ukukhangisa ibhizinisi lezokuvakasha kodwa ungasebenzisa ngisho uwhatsapp ukuze laziwe.Usho kanje uJohn-Jay Nchoe oyi-content creator nomnikazi wekhasi iGuyGalConner, ngesikhathi ekhuluma ngokushintsha kwendlela yokuzikhangisa kwezokuvakasha.Uthe njengoba umkhakha wezokuvakasha unabantu abahlukene okubalwa abadala nabancane kufanele basebenzise izinkundla zokuxhumana ukuzikhangisa, banganciki nje ezindleleni ezindala zokukhangisa.Ubalule ukuthi ababhali bama-blog, abafaka izindaba emakhasini e-zokuxhumana bangasetshenziswa ukukhangisa amabhizinisi.“Muva nje u-whatsapp wethule izinhlelo ze-Artificial Intelligence (AI) okusho ukuthi ubuchwepheshe bakhona sebuthe thuthu. Umuntu angaqopha ivideo yendawo yakhe ayisabalalise kumaqoqo abantu axhumana nabo kuwhatsapp.“Angithi u-whatsapp usucishe ufane nethelevishini manje. Usuyakwazi ukusakaza kuwona. Kufanele sizifundise ngabo bonke ubuchwepheshe obuzayo ukuze sibusebenzisele ukuzisiza,” kusho uJohn-Jay.Udonse ngendlebe abanikazi bamabhizinisi ezokuvakasha ukuthi balandele amakhasi ezindaba asemthethweni ukuze bakwazi ukufafaza ulwazi oluyilona, bangasebenzisani nabantu abangayilandeli imigomo yabezindaba.Uthe izindlela ezindala zokukhangisa okubalwa amathelevishini, imisakazo namaphephandaba zisazosebenza kodwa abantu kufanele babheke nokusha.“Ngisafundela ubuntatheli ngatshelwa ukuthi amaphephandaba azoshabalala, kodwa namanje asekhona. Umehluko wukuthi asekwazi ukusabalalisa izindaba kuma-website nasezinkundleni zokuxhumana. “Ayayishintsha indlela asebenza ngayo ukuhambisana nezikhathi ngakho namanye amabhizinisi kufanele alandele le ndlela yokusebenza,” kusho uJohn-Jay.UNksz Nokuthula Khwela oyi-influencer yezokuvakasha, uthe kubalulekile ukuthi umlando wezindawo zokuvakasha ungagcinwa nje kuzona kodwa usatshalaliswe nange-internet.Uthe kungasetshenziswa amathuluzi obuchwepheshe besimanje okubalwa i-augmented reality, lapho umuntu ekwazi ukubona indawo azoyihambela, ukuthi injani, kwenziwani uma uye khona nokunye okuningi.Ubalule ukuthi kukhona namathuluzi okubhala asiza ukusheshisa umsebenzi wokubhala kodwa lokhu akusho ukuthi ababhali bayavilapha ngoba kufanele baqinisekise ukuthi babhala okuyikho.

ABADIDIYELI bamabutho bafuna uSihlalo we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Siboniso Duma, adliwe izinkomo eziwu-100 “ngokwehlisa” isithunzi uNdunankulu kaZulu, uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi.Izinduna zamabutho zithe zifuna ukuthi uDuma axolisele ukugcwaneka phambi kweSilo uMisuzulu kaZwelithini noMengameli, uCyril Ramaphosa, ngesikhathi kunomcimbi wokukhumbula iSilo uDinuzulu kaCetshwayo.UDuma, owayephethe uhlelo emcimbini, wayabula umbhobho kuButhelezi ngesikhathi ethula iSilo.Umdidiyeli wamabutho kaZulu, uMnuz Sipho “Masefa” Mhlongo, uthe ukube kuya ngabo uDuma ubezodliwa izinkomo eziwu-100.Lokhu ukusho esithangamini nabezindaba, ebesiseThekwini, izolo. UMhlongo uthe okwenzeka emcimbini kwathela ngehlazo iSilo noRamaphosa.“Ukube sobe sikhona lapho besiyothi abadliwe izinkomo eziwu-100 laba abenze lokhu. Le nto eyenzeke lapha ayamukelekile. Kuyabonakala ukuthi usemkhulu umsebenzi okusamele siwenze njengabadidiyeli bamabutho. Siyethemba ukuthi uma benonembeza laba abenze lokhu, bazohamba beyoxolisa.”UMhlongo uthe abezukumbekela uDuma umnqamulajuqu wokuthi kufanele axolise nini, kodwa wathi akufanele athathe isikhathi eside.“Akufanele kuthathe isikhathi kuze kube sengathi kukhona abakuphushayo. Uma uwumholi kufanele uzibonele uma usephutheni. Asikho isikhathi esithi uDuma unqunyelwa sona, engaya nakusasa. Asifuni kuze kube isikhathi eside ngoba mhlawumbe izitha zingaze zigcine sezithi uhlaleleni isikhathi eside kangaka?”Ebuzwa uMhlongo ukuthi kungani bengasho ukuthi noButhelezi akahlawuliswe, uthe ngokwabo akukho okubheke eceleni okwashiwo uButhelezi.“Undunankulu uthe u(Nobhala we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Bheki) Mtolo wenzeni? Wathi esathi uMtolo, wahlwithwa umbhobho. Phela kwakufanele sizwe ukuthi uMtolo wenzeni, bese siyasho ukuthi undunankulu uyanhlanhlatha. Umqondisi wehlelo usuke enethuba lonke lokulungisa okungalungile. Wayengasukuma nje amfake kahle endleleni ngenhlonipho, noma amphendule uma eseqedile ukukhuluma.”UMhlongo ukuchithile ukuthi amalungu e-ANC alimala emcimbini ahlaselwa ngamalungu e-IFP.UMhlongo uthe abantu bahlaselwa yizigangi nje, uthe amabutho ayengasekho ngesikhathi kwenzeka isigameko.Uthe bazokuya kovela kwabalimele, wathi bazophuma nomkhankaso wokuthola izigilamakhuba ezagqema abantu abangu-16.UMhlongo uthe abayizwa kahle eyokuthi uhulumeni awumamukeli uNdunankulu kaZulu ngoba isikhundla asikho kuMthethosisekelo.Uthe njengoba uNdunankulu kaZulu eqokwa iSilo, uyizwi leSilo. UMhlongo unxuse abaholi bezepolitiki ukuthi bangalwi izimpi zabo phambi kweSilo.“Osopolitiki bafike baxabane emakhoneni, bese beyabuya-ke sebezolwa phambi kweSilo. Sibonga ukuthi uButhelezi wavele wazithulela ngesikhathi kwenzeka le nto ngoba kwakuzoqhuma iqupha.”UMtolo umxolisele uDuma ngokuthi aqophisane noButhelezi phambi kweSilo noRamaphosa.“Kufanele ubheke ukuthi isigangi usishaya kuphi, ungasishayi phambi kwabantu abadala.”UMtolo uthe bafuna ukuthi uButhelezi akhuzwe, angafaki ipolitiki ezintweni zasendlunkulu.Uthe amabutho kwakufanele asithathe iSilo, ahambe naso ngesikhathi uButhelezi efaka igama lakhe nele-ANC.

ZISHAQEKILE izingwazi zamaciko aluleli ngokuthola emthonjeni wezindaba ukuthi zishaywe ngesithende ohlwini lwabaholi abawu-100 abazomela i-Economic Freedom Fighters (EFF).Emuva kokuba iphephandaba langeSonto, iSunday World, lidalule ukuthi inkakha yomculo we-kwaito, u-Eugene Mthethwa, umculi we-Afro soul, uRingo Madlingozi nomlingisi uFana Mokoena, sebezokubukela kwithelevishini okwenzeka ePhalamendene likazwelonke, Isolezwe libe selixhumana nawo."Kungaba kubi uma kuliqiniso ukuthi singathola izindaba ezinjalo emithonjeni yezindaba okuyinto ebiyenzeka kozakwethu abasemisakazweni nakwithelevishini nasemafilimini. Bebebona emaphephandabeni angeSonto ukuthi izivumelwano abanazo, ngeke zivuselelwe," kuphawula u-Eugene ongene ePhalamende ngethikithi le-EFF nyakenye, emuva kokulaxaza i-ANC. Nakuba kunjalo, u-Eugene uthe noma amahlebezi engaba yiqiniso kodwa ngeke kudikize ngisho inqulu ngoba akajoyinanga umzabalazo ngoba elandela ibhodwe eliconsayo.Uthe kodwa wajoyina i-EFF ngenxa yokuzwakala kwezwi layo ekukhathalaleni umkhakha wezobuciko, okuyinto ebonakele nakusomqulu wayo obuqinisekisa ukuthi izolwela izikhalazo zamaciko akuleli.URingo, owangena ePhalamende emuva kokhetho lukazwelonke ngo-2019, uthe yena uqala ukuzwa ngeSolezwe  ukuthi ushiywe ngaphandle ohlwini."Hhayi mntasekhaya, ngiqala ukuyizwa ngawe le ndaba. Sengiyokuzwa kahle uma sekufika incwadi eshoyo, ebuya komkhulu," kushaya ngezinqamulelayo uRingo wodumo lwengoma ethi Ndiyagodola nethi Sondela.NoFana, owayenguDkt Sithole kwiGenerations, uthe akaqondi nqindi nasibhakela ngendaba yohlu lwe-EFF.“Ngiqala nje ukuzwa ngawe ngokwenzeka khona,” kusho uFana owaqala ukuba sePhalamende kusukela ngo-2014.Libuzwa yiSolezwe ngalolu daba, iPhini likaMengameli we-EFF, uMnuz Floyd Shivambu, livele lathi wumbhedo wodwa obhalwe ngala maciko."Uhlu luzoshicilelwa ngabe-IEC. Singalibeka ngembaba elokuthi wumbhedo wokuqala nowokugcina obhalwe yiphephandaba (Sunday World), ebesesicabanga ukuthi selibuyelwa yisithunzi," kusho uShivambu.Eqhuba uthe uhlu aludingidwa ngaphandle kwezinhlaka zeqembu. "Uhlelo lwangaphakathi oluzidalulwelwa umphakathi ngokuhamba kwesikhathi," kuphetha uShivambu. Abanye osaziwayo abangamalungu aleli qembu elahlubuka kwi-ANC ngoLinda Sibiya, Ntando Duma nabanye.

KUVELE amagama ezikhulu ezisolwa ngenkohlakalo kufungiswa amalungu amasha e-MK ePhalamende.Phakathi kwamalungu e-MK amasha afungisiwe kukhona igama laloyo owayeyisikhulu esiphezulu e-Eskom, uMnuz Brian Molefe, elaloyo owayeyisikhulu esiphezulu ePrasa, uMnuz Lucky Montana, nelaloyo owayeyisikhulu esiphezulu eTransnet, uMnuz Siyabonga Gama.Laba bobathathu bafungiswe uSomlomo, uNkk Thoko Didiza, izolo.Bonke laba baholi bashiya ezikhundleni zabo belandelwa yifu elimnyama.Amagama abo avela kakhulu ngesikhathi kuqhubeka iKhomishini eyayiphenya izinsolo zokuLawulwa koMbuso yiDlanzana.Okhulumela i-MK, uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndhlela, uncome amagalelo alaba baholi ngesikhathi besaphethe la mabhizinisi kahulumeni.Abanye abaholi be-MK abafungiswe izolo, uMnuz Gezani Kobane, owaziwa ngelikaPapa Penny, okhulumela inhlangano kaZuma engenzi nzuzo, uMnuz Mzwanele Manyi, uMnuz Thulani Gamede, uMnuz Thembinkosi Mjadu, noNksz Nompumelelo Gasa.UNdhlela unxuse zonke izikhulu zikahulumeni ezinamava nezincithabuchopho ukuba zijoyine i-MK.“Sisembhidlangweni wokulungiselela ukhetho lohulumeni basekhaya lwango-2026 nokhetho lukazwelonke lwango-2029. Sifuna lusifice sikulungele ukuphatha.”I-MK ifungisa labaholi nje, kusenombango ngokuxoshwa kwamalungu ale nhlangano angu-18.La malungu afaka icala enkantolo ephonsela inselelo ukuxoshwa kwawo.Kunesivimbelo esinqanda i-MK ukuthi ifake abantu ezikhaleni zalaba baholi kuze kube kuphuma isinqumo mayelana nokuxoshwa kwabo.Laba baholi be-MK bafungiswe namalungu e-EFF, oMnuz Sinawo Tambo no-Nazier Paulsen.UTambo no-Paulsen bangena ezikhaleni ezivuleke emva kokuqembuka kukaManyi noFloyd Shivambu, abajoyine i-MK ngeledlule.UNkk Didiza wamukele amalungu amasha, wawayalela ukuba asebenze ngokuzikhandla.

I-ANC Youth League (ANCYL) iphonsele i-SACP inselelo yokuba ingenele ukhetho, iyeke ukucasha nge-ANC.UMengameli we-ANCYL, uMnuz Collen Malatji, uthe uma i-SACP izibona ukuthi ingakwazi ukunqoba ukhetho, ayilungenele bese iyeka ukugxeka isinqumo se-ANC sokusungula uhulumeni wokubambisana.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma nabezindaba izolo, lapho ebekhuluma khona ngezinhlelo zokugubha iminyaka engu-80 kwasungulwa i-ANCYL.Abaholi be-SACP nabe-ANC ababoni ngaso linye ngodaba lokufakwa kwe-DA ne-FF Plus kuhulumeni wokubambisana.I-SACP ikhala ngokuthi la maqembu amabili anemithetho ecindezela abahlwempu nabasebenzi.Selokhu kwathi nhlo i-SACP ayingaze ingalungenela ukhetho, iyaye ikhankasele i-ANC.UMalatji uthe uma kuwukuthi i-SACP imile ekutheni i-ANC yenza iphutha ngokufaka la maqembu kuhulumeni wokubambisana, ayingenele ukhetho khona singezokuba khona isidingo sokuthi i-ANC ibambisane ne-DA ne-FF Plus.“Uma nje sesikhuluma iqiniso, ukuphela kweqembu esingathanda ukubambisana nalo i-SACP. Sesisebenzisane nalo kusukela ngo-1994. Linemigomo efanayo neyethu. Alikho elinye iqembu elinemigomo efana ne-ANC, ngisho i-EFF ne-MK abanayo imigomo efana neye-SACP. Kahle kahle wonke la manye amaqembu ayazifanela nje, afuna ukukhipha i-ANC emandleni.“Uma kuwukuthi abe-SACP bazibona ukuthi banawo amandla okwakha izinhlaka ezingabasiza ukuthi bakwazi ukunqoba ukhetho, abangenele ukhetho oluzayo. Uma kuwukuthi abawufuni uhulumeni wokubambisana, abangenele ukhetho, bayeke ukucasha ngaphansi kweziketi ze-ANC.”UMalatji uthe uma kuwukuthi i-SACP ayijabule ngohulumeni okhona, kufanele abaholi bayo baphume baphele kuwona.“Okusikhathazayo njenge-ANCYL ukuthi abaholi be-SACP, lena egxeka uhulumeni wokubambisana, bangongqongqoshe kuhulumeni wokubambisana. Usihlalo we-SACP (uDkt Blade Nzimande) unguNgqongqoshe wezeSayensi nezoBuchwepheshe. “Amanye amalungu esigungu esiphezulu kwi-SACP nawo angongqongqoshe. Lokhu kusho ukuthi i-SACP nayo iyingxenye yohulumeni wokubambisana. Lo msindo abawubangayo awunasidingo, bafuna ukubukwa.”UMalatji uthe i-ANC yaba nezingxoxo ne-SACP ngaphambi kokuthi isungule uhulumeni wokubambisana njengedlelandawonye.UMalatji uthe bazokuba nezingxoxo ne-SACP lapho bezozama khona ukuqeda ukungaboni ngaso linye.

Iyabalisa inhlangano yamakhosi iContralesa ngokuvalelwa ngaphandle ezingxoxweni ebezikhona zamaqembu ezepolitiki mayelana nokubunjwa kukahulumeni wobumbano.ICongress of Traditional Leaders of South Africa (Contralesa) ithi iyadumala uma abamaqembu ezepolitiki bengasakufezekisi ebekade bekuthembise amakhosi ngaphambi kokhetho.Umengameli weContralesa, iNkosi Larmeck Mokoena, uthe ngaphambi kokhetho wonke amaqembu ezepolitiki aya emhlabeni owengamelwe amakhosi afike enza izethembiso.Ezinye zalezo zethembiso uMokoena, uthe kwakuwukuthi amakhosi azofakwa ezingxoxweni zokwakhiwa kukahulumeni wobumbano.“Wonke la maqembu aya emakhosini nakondlunkulu abazisa ukuthi ayakhankasa emhlabeni wabo, awangathuki uma bezwa umsindo. Aze azibophezela athi uma sekudlule ukhetho azobuya axoxe nathi siweluleke ukuthi kumele wakhiwe kanjani uhulumeni wobumbano,” kuchaza inkosi.Iqhuba inkosi ithe ukhetho lufike lwadlula kodwa sekucwebe iziziba manje, akukho namunye oza kubona bengamakhosi.Ngempelasonto, i-ANC imemezele ukuthi seluphothuliwe ihlandla lokuqala lezingxoxo zokwakhiwa kukahulumeni wobumbano.Angu-10 amaqembu ezepolitiki anezihlalo ePhalamende azibophezele ukuba yingxenye yokwakhiwa kukahulumeni wobumbano oholwa yi-ANC.“Lawa maqembu asexoxa wodwa manje futhi aklama nendlela yokuthi zizokwabiwa kanjani izihlalo ePhalamende nakwiKhabhinethi,” kubalisa uMokoena.Uzwakalise ukukhathazeka kwakhe ngokuthi amanye alawa maqembu asezingxoxweni awayifuni noma ayibone indaba yamakhosi nokubusa kwawo.“Sesizophathwa abantu abangasifuni manje? Asizohlala phansi sisonge izandla sibukele izinto zenzeka phambi kwethu sibhekile,” kusho inkosi.Ukhulume nanokuthi akwenele ukuba khona komnyango kahulumeni okhona njengamanje obhekele izindaba zoMdabu,.Ube esenxenxa uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa wathi kumele ayifakele izibuko eyokuqoka ilungu leContralesa ukuthi libe ungqongqoshe kwiKhabhinethi yakhe.URamaphosa kulindeleke ukuthi ayimemezele noma inini ikhabhinethi yakhe.

KUNINGI osekwenziwe ukuzama ukuthuthukisa nokwenza ngcono impilo nokusebenza kwamakhosi nezinduna kodwa isikhalo sisalokhu sikhona.  Uhulumeni uyenzile imizamo yokuthi ubuholi bendabuko bungavalelwa ngaphandle ekubuseni izwe. Kukhona ngisho iNdlu yobuHoli boMdabu kuzwelonke enabaholi bayo nazo zonke izinhlaka. Uma kunomcimbi wokuvulwa kwayo, kuba khona ngisho umengameli wezwe athule inkulumo.Ezifundazweni kunezindlu zobuholi bomdabu nazo zinobuholi bazo futhi uma zivulwa kusuke kukhona iSilo sethule inkulumo, kuboniswane ngokufanele kwenzeke. Kuhambe kwahamba kwaba nesinqumo sokuthi amakhosi, izinduna nomabhalane babo bahole ngoba kuyabonakala ukuthi benza umsebenzi obalulekile ezweni.Amakhosi nezinduna bakhelwa izinkantolo zabo lapho besebenza khona, bahlukana nokusebenza ngaphansi kwezihlahla.Amakhosi nezinduna banikwa indawo yabo komasipala, bavunyelwe ukuthamela imihlangano yemikhandlu lapho okuthathwa khona izinqumo ezithinta abantu babo. Kukhona ngisho uMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu kuzwelonke nasezifundazweni.Phezu kwakho konke lokhu isikhalo silokhu siqhamuka ngokuthi kuningi okusafanele kulungiswe.Obengundunankulu kaZulu ongasekho, iNkosi Mangosuthu Buthelezi, yayinaso isikhalo ilwela amakhosi ukuthi awangabi yizichuse ngaphansi kwalo hulumeni ophethe. UShenge wayekhala ngokuthi amakhosi ayavunyelwa ukuthamela imihlangano yomasipala kodwa awanalo izwi khona.UShenge wayekhala ngokuthi kufanele amakhosi akwazi ukubeka uvo lwawo abe yingxenye yokuphatha nokuthatha izinqumo.UNdunankulu kaZulu omusha uMfundisi uThulasizwe Buthelezi, kade ebize isithangami sabezindaba ngasekuqaleni kwesonto nalapho kuvele khona udaba lwamakhosi. UNdunankulu kaZulu uveze ukuthi kunezinhlelo zokuthi amakhosi alekelelwe ukuze izwi lawo lizwakale kangcono.UButhelezi uthe sekufanele ibhekisiswe kabanzi indaba yokuthi izwe elingaphansi kwamakhosi lilawulwe wuhulumeni. UButhelezi uthe yingakho sebethathe isinqumo sokuthi bacije amakhosi ukuze alungele ukuziphatha ngokugcwele.UButhelezi uthe iSilo sesingene esivumelwaneni nesikhungo iNational School of Government, ukuze kuqeqeshwe amakhosi angu-200.“Amakhosi kufanele aqeqeshwe, ukuze akwazi ukuba sekhaleni lokusebenza udaba lomnotho. Kufanele akwazi ukudlulisa amakhono ukuze kuthuthuke umphakathi wasemakhaya nomnotho wawo. Kufanele abambe iqhaza ekudaleni amathuba emisebenzi nomnotho,’’ kusho uButhelezi.Kamuva nje kunesikhalo ngodaba lokusocongwa kwamakhosi nezinduna okudla lubi. Nakhona lapho amakhosi akhala ngokuthi uhulumeni akenzi okwenele ukubhekana nalolu daba.UNdunankulu kaZulu uthe banethemba lokuthi uhulumeni uzolusukumela lolu daba, athathe izinyathelo ezibonakalayo zokuvikela amakhosi. Uthe uma izimeya nezinye izikhulu zikahulumeni zigadwa, pho amakhosi wona kungani ayekelelwe adlale izigebengu.Cishe kuyadingeka ukuthi kubhekwe kabanzi ukuthi ngabe amakhosi akhala kufanele noma emva kwezinto eziningi ezenzekile noma vele ukukhala kuyohlala kukhona.

AMANYE amalungu, omphakathi waku-ward 1 kuMasipala waseMshwathi, abuyele emakhaya esehleka wodwa emuva okwamukela amatayitela ezindlu zawo.Kulo mcimbi, obubanjelwe ehholo laseThokozani, kunamalungu awu-128 anikezwe amatayitela.UNgqongqoshe woMnyango wokuHlaliswa kwaBantu nemiSebenzi yoMphakathi, uMnuz Sipho "KK" Nkosi, uthe zingu-800 izindlu ezakhelwe abahlali bakulesi sigceme. Yize kunjalo kodwa uNkosi uthe amanye amatayitela asalungiswa."Ngizonikeza amatayitela asho izinto ezintathu. Eyokuqala ithi lendlu oyakhelwe wuhulumeni, wangafaka ngisho isenti elimnyama, isingeyakho nezizukulwane zakho. Eyesibili ithi-ke nalo mhlaba lapho lendlu eyakhiwe kuyo, akekho oyokukhipha kuwona." UNkosi uthe okwesithathu laba abafuna ukuba ngosomabhizinisi "uma unetayitela ufuna ukuboleka usizo noma ngabe yiluphi, uyakwazi ukusebenzisa lelo tayitela lakho njengesibambiso." Nakuba uNkosi ekhulume kanje kodwa uthe akakugqugquzeli ukuba abantu babambise ngamatayitela "ngoba uma ungasabakhokheli labo bantu, banelungelo lokuyidla indlu yakho. Cabanga-ke izindlu ezinhle kanje."UNkosi uthe umuntu uzothola indlu yamahhala, umhlaba wamahhala netayitela lamahhala.Uthe uhulumeni ukhokhela ummeli uR25 000 ngetayitela ngalinye."Zibalele ukuthi uhulumeni ukhokhe ama-million amangaki ngezizindlu ezingu-128."Esephetha uNkosi uthe benza konke okusemandleni ukuthi abangakawatholi amatayitela, bayashesha ukuwathola "ngoba sifuna wonke umuntu abe netayitela."

KUHLOMULE amaNazaretha ngezigubhu ezishaywa uma kugidwa ngesikhathi kunomkhuleko obekuhloswe ngawo ukunqanda izinkinga ezahlukene ezihlasele umphakathi.Umkhuleko obusesizweni sakwaMdletshe, ubuholwa wuMasipala iHlabisa iBig 5 Hlabisa ngaphansi kweMeya, uMnuz Comfort Khumalo.UKhumalo unoxhaxha lwemikhuleko aluhlele ukuthi lujikeleze ngaphansi kukamasipala awuholayo ngenhloso yokuthandazela ukuthula nezinkinga ezihlasele umphakathi.Imeya ikhiphe umnikelo wezigubhu zokusina zamaNazaretha emapthempelini amane aku-Ward 8, nethe akugcinile ngawo njengoba namanye esazohlomula ngazo.Umshumayeli Shayimbizo Ntshangase waseThempelini lamaNazaretha iMpilenhle, uthe bajabule kakhulu uma umkhandlu ubakhumbula bengamaNazaretha uma kunentuthuko yomphakathi.Ngaphambi kokuba iMeya uKhumalo ithule inkulumo kulo mkhuleko, iqale yakhalisa isizwe saseMdletsheni ngokukhothama kwenkosi yakulesi sizwe, iNkosi uBonga Mdletshe esanda kutshalwa.“INkosi uMdletshe ibineqhaza elikhulu esizweni nasemphakathi waseMdletsheni. Ngicela ukuthi uma sekukhulekwa, ungasali ngaphandle nomndeni weNkosi ngokugubuzelwa yifu elimnyama. Kuningi engifisa ukuthi uma sekukhulekwa kungasali ngaphandle. Okunye kwakho ukushelwa yimizi kwabantu njengoba kuvele kuqubuke umlilo ongaziwa ukuthi uqhamukaphi. Sicela ukuthi kukhulekelwe leli dimoni ngoba sikholwa ukuthi umkhuleko ongalinqanda,” kusho iMeya uKhumalo.Unobhala wekomidi labafundisi, uMfu Vusumuzi Mbatha, uthe bazokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi basebenzisana nomasipala ngaso sonke isikhathi ukuqhuba imikhuleko.Umlilo okuthiwa uvele uqubuke esithubeni ushise imizi yabantu, ubuhlasele indawo yaseMdletsheni manje kuthiwa uhlasele kwaMnqobokazi kwaHlabisa.

INDODAKAZI yezishoshovu zomzabalazo uNksz Lindiwe Sisulu, ithi liyashona ilanga inkomo ifasiwe, i-ANC yehlulwa wukukhanda isixaxa namaqembu abantu abamnyama kubunjwe uhulumeni.UNksz Sisulu ozalwa uMnuz Walter Sisulu noNkk Albertina Sisulu, usematheni ngokuphumela obala ngalolu daba. Indaba enkulu iqale emuva kokuthi i-ANC yehluleke wukunqoba ukhetho ngengcaca.Kunamahlebezi athi i-ANC ingase ikhande isixaxa ne-DA elele isibili ngo-21.81% ilandela i-ANC yona ethole u-40%. I-ANC inezihlalo ezingu-159 ekubeni i-DA inezihlalo ezingu-87 okungathi uma behlangana benze izihlalo ezingu-246.I-ANC igadle zephuka okhethweni obelunzima kakhulu ngesonto eledlule yahluleka nokuyiphoqa ukuthi ihambe iphaphatha emaqenjini. Kulezi zinsuku izingxoxo zishisa phansi kuzanywa ukuthola isixaxa esizongena kuhulumeni siphathe izwe.Amaqembu anezinsuku ezingu-14 emuva kokumenyezelwa kwemiphumela yokhetho ukuthi aphume negama kubunjwe uhulumeni. I-ANC isematasa nemihlangano yokuxoxa namaqembu ibingakamemezeli ezokwenza.UNksz Sisulu uthe kungaba yihlazo ukuthi i-ANC iyeke amaqembu abantu abamnyama emaningi kangaka bese ihlangana ne-DA.“Sikhetha i-DA ngoba kwenzenjani nje ngoba sehlukene kakhulu ngemigomo nemibono nabo. Sinabantu esibethembise ukubamela sibenzele konke kodwa i-DA akuyona indlela esingayisebenzisa. Siyiyekeleni i-IFP noma i-MK namanye amaqembu?,,’’ kusho uNksz Sisulu.Uthe umphakathi uyijezise izikhathi eziningi ngevoti ngenxa yokwehluleka kwayo wukufeza izethembiso kodwa yona ifuna ukubagila kakhulu abantu.UNksz Sisulu uthe ekuqaleni iNational Party yazicelela yona ukuhoxa esixaxeni sayo ne-ANC ngoba kucaca ukuthi banezinhloso ezehlukene kakhulu.Kwamanye amaqembu abamnyama akhona kuvela i-MK elele isithathu ngo-14.58% okuyinika izihlalo ezingu-58, ilandelewe yi-EFF ngezihlalo ezingu-39. I-IFP isendaweni yesihlanu ngezihlalo ezingu-17.UNksz Sisulu ubuziwe kwithelevishini ukuthi uvumbukaphi ngoba akaze abonakale ekhankasela i-ANC, wavuka ngolaka wathi akazele ukuzophendula lokho. Uthe ubengeke azishuthe izithombe ekhankasa.

ZIMBILI VILAKAZI NONHLAKANIPHO MNQAYIKWENGEZWE amanye amacala amabili kwabasolwa ngokudubula babulale umculi uKiernan “AKA” Forbes nomngani wakhe uTebello “Tibz” Motsoane ngoFebhuwari nyakenye.U-AKA noTibs badutshulwa ngaphandle kwendawo yokudlela eseyavalwa iWish esemgwaqweni odumile uFlorida.Abasolwa okungoMnuz Lindani Thabani Mkhwanazi (30), Lindani Zenzele Ndimande (35), Siyanda Eddie Myeza (21), Mziwethemba Harvey Gwabini (36) noLindokuhle Lindo Ndimande (29) bebevela okwesibili eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini. Bangene belandelana bebhekise amakhanda phansi, bebukeka bengakhathazekile kangako ebusweni.UMshushisi woMbuso odume ngokungawabheki amacala athinta izinkabi, u-Adv Elvis Gcweka, uthe phezu kwamacala ayishumi abasolwa ababhekene nawo uMbuso wengeze amabili okushintshisana ngemali ngokungemthetho.Ngokwamaphepha asenkantolo kuvela ukuthi uGwabini ongummangalelwa wesine kuleli cala wafakelwa imali engu-R803 455 ngokungemthetho ngoFebhuwari 11, okungusuku olwandulela okwabulawa ngalo ababili.Kuvela ukuthi le mali yayiyinkokhelo yokubulawa kwabo.Amaphepha aqhuba athi laba abanye abamangalelwa, okungoMkhwanazi, Ndimande (Lindani), Myeza noNdimande (Lindokuhle)  elabo icala lokushintshisana ngemali libandakanya  ukuthi bathola isamba semali eyayivela kuGwabini umuntu ngamunye.Lokhu kusho ukuthi asengu-12 amacala ababhekene nawo, kuwona kubalwa elokwakha itulo lokubulala, amabili okubulala, elokutholakala nesibhamu esingekho emthethweni, elokutholakala nezinhlamvu bese kuba ayisihlanu okuzama ukubulala.Okuphinde kwahlaluka enkantolo ukuthi abamangalelwa abane bashintshe abameli babo.Ummangalelwa wokuqala (uMkhwanazi) nommangalelwa wesihlanu (uLindokuhle Ndimande) sebemelwe u-Adv Simphiwe Mlotshwa. Ummangalelwa wesibili (uLindani Ndimande) nommangalelwa wesine (uGwabini) sebemelwe u-Adv Cele igama lakhe elingatholakalanga.Ummangalelwa wesithathu (uMyeza) yena usamelwe uYolanda Gielink obevele emumele phambilini.Ekhuluma nabezindaba uGielink uthe akukho okuhlanganisa uMyeza naleli cala.“Wayeneminyaka engu-20 ngaleso sikhathi. Uyise owayengusomatekisi, washona. Asazi ukuthi yini eyenze bamhlanganisa naleli cala ngoba uthola imali enele emabhizinisini akubo (amatekisi) ukuthi ubengathatha uR200 000 ayobulala umuntu ebeka engcupheni impilo yakhe,” kusho uGielink.Uphinde waveza ukuthi wuye omele abasolwa ababili okungoMnuz Siyabonga Gezani Ndimande noMalusi Dave Ndimande abasabhajwe eSwatini nabo okuthiwa bayathinteka kuleli cala.Izelamani zakwaNdimande ziboshelwe ukuba kuleliyazwe ngaphandle kwamaphepha abagunyaza ukuba kulo. Kuthiwa bafudukela khona beyobhaca emva kokubandakayeka ecaleni lokubulawa kuka-AKA noTibz.“Angikawatholi amaphepha okwamanje, ngisawacelile kodwa ngiyakuphikisa ukubuyiselwa kwabo kuleli. Nginezizathu zalokho. Ngeke ngikwazi ukuqhubeka ngiphawule kakhulu ngalokho njengoba besangale. Uma seluphothuliwe uhlelo lokubuyiswa kwabo yilapho engingakwazi khona ukuthi ngiphawule kangcono sengithathe imiyalelo kubo,” kusho uGielink.IMantshi, uMnuz Vincent Hlatshwayo, ithe kuzoqalwa ngoLwesine oluzayo ukulalelwa kwesicelo sebheyili.

AMAPHEPHA asebhange kammangalelwa wokuqala kwelokufa kukaSenzo Meyiwa, uMuzikawukhulelwa Sibiya, aveza okushayisanayo nalokhu ayekushilo.UMshushisi woMbuso u-Advocate Ronnie Sibanda, weneke amaphepha asebhange aveza ukuthi ikhadi likaSibiya lasebenza eGauteng ngezinsuku zesigameko. USibiya phambilini, wathi wayengekho eGauteng ngonyaka okwabulawa ngawo uMeyiwa.UMeyiwa owayeyisilomo se-Orlando Pirates neBafana Bafana, wadutshulwa wabulawa ekubo kwentombi yakhe uKelly Khumalo, ngo-2014, eVosloorus, eGauteng.USibiya wathi yena wahlala eGauteng kodwa wabuyela emakhaya esephelelwe wumsebenzi, isigameko senzeka engekho.USibanda uveze ukuthi phakathi kukaJulayi 3 noNovemba 28, 2014, ikhadi likaSibiya lasebenza eGauteng. “NgoJulayi 3, 2014, ikhadi lasebenza eMiami Tavern lapho okwasebenza khona uR200. Laphinda lasebenza eNaledi, eGoli, lapho okwakhishwa khona uR600. Kunesikhathi lapho okwakhishwa khona uR200,’’ kusho uSibanda.Uthe lahamba njalo ikhadi lilokhu lisebenza laze lafika naKwaNongoma, lasebenza nakhona. Kuke kwavela phambilini ukuthi uSibiya udabuka khona KwaNongoma.Abameli babamangalelwa ngesikhathi kwenekwa lobu bufakazi, bathe abaphikisani nokuthi kwemukelwe njengobufakazi benkantolo. Kwenekwe namarekhodi asebhange abanye abamangalelwa ababoshwe kuleli cala.Kuvele udaba lwenombolo yocingo okuthiwa yasetshenziswa wummangalewa wesibili uBongani Ntanzi. Kuvela ukuthi kuleyo nombolo kwatholakala umyalezo wasebhange oqondene noNtanzi.Ummeli kaNtanzi, uMnuz Sipho Ramosepele, uthe ikhasimende lakhe liyayiphika leyo nombolo, lithi akuyona eyalo. IJaji uRatha Mokgoatlheng likhumbuze uRamosepele ngodaba lwenombolo, lathi uNtanzi wathi inombolo eyomuntu thizeni amaziyo. URamosepele uvumile ukuthi uNtanzi, uthe inombolo eyentombzane ayejola nayo kudala.Icala lisheshe laguqa ngenxa yokuthi uMbuso ubungenabo ofakazi abaseduze emuva kokwethulwa kobufakazi basemabhange. UMbuso uthe uzobuyisa ungoti wamaselula uLiutenant Gideon Gouws.Kulindeleke ukuthi abameli baqhubeke bapheke ngemibuzo uGouws ngobufakazi abethula obuninda abamangalelwa. Kuvunyelwane ngokuthi icala libuyele enkantolo kusasa, lingahlali namuhla ngoba uGouws uzobe engekho.

AMAPHOYISA aseKZN asekhiphe incwadi egunyaza ukuboshwa kowesilisa waseMariannhill, eThekwini osolwa ngamacala okukhokhisa imali yokuvikela.Ngokusho kokhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Robert Netshiunda, umsolwa uMnuz Linda Hlengwa, odume ngelikaPutin nelinye elithi Mjinja, wayeboshwe ngoJulayi 2020.UNetshiunda uthe lo msolwa oyingozi wayeboshelwe icala lokutholakala nesibhamu esingekho emthethweni nezinhlamvu.“Wadedelwa esitokisini kusalindwe imiphumela yokuhlolwa kwesibhamu. Kusuka lapho uwashaya indiva amasamanisi ambizela enkantolo ukuthi ayobhekana namacala ayebekwe wona,” kusho uNetshiunda, othe incwadi egunyaza ukuboshwa kwakhe ikhishwe yiNkantolo yeMantshi yasePinetown ngoSepthemba 9.UNetshiunda uphinde wadalula nokuthi lona wesilisa ufunelwa noxhaxha lwamacala okufuna ngoshova imali yokuvikela eMariannhill.Uthe amaphoyisa anxusa noma ngubani ongaba nolwazi ngokuthi uHlengwa ukuphi awathinte ngokushesha enombolweni ethi 08600 10111.

AMAPHOYISA aKwaZulu-Natal asezinike amahora angu-72 ukuthungatha abasolwa ngokuqotha abantu abayisithupha kwalimala abane Entshele, Ezakheni, eMnambithi, ngoMsombuluko ebusuku.Ngokwesitatimende samaphoyisa, abantu abangu-12 bebehamba ngeveni emgwaqweni uHelpmekaar, ngesikhathi kuqhamuka enye imoto abebekuyo bavulela ngenhlamvu bebhekise kubo.Abesifazane abayisithupha; oneminyaka ewu-37, ababili abana-17, ona-15, oneminyaka emihlanu nonemibili baphelele endaweni yesigameko.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe abesilisa ababili nabesifazane abathathu baphuthunyiswe esibhedlela ngemuva kokulimala. Owesifazane oneminyaka ewu-21 uphunyuke engenamyocu.Uthe imbangela yalokhu ayikaziwa, wanxusa abanolwazi ngabasolwa ukuthi babikele amaphoyisa aseduze noma bashayele u-08600 10111.

KUTHOLAKALE inqwaba yezidakamizwa, imali, amaselula, ithelevishini nokunye ngesikhathi kugasela amaphoyisa maqede kwathula umsindo ejele laseWestville, kuleli sonto.Lo mkhankaso ubuholwa uKhomishana woMnyango wezokuHlunyeleliswa kweziMilo kuzwelonke, uMnuz Makgothi Thobakgale.Ekhuluma nabezindaba uThobakgale uthe, ukungabuyi kwabo belambatha kusho ukuthi umkhankaso ube yimpumelelo.“Phakathi kwezinto esisazitholile amaselula angaphezu kwayishumi, ama-charger, ama-router amabili, ama-cable okungafanele ngabe angaphakathi, izidakamizwa okubonakalayo ukuthi ziyadayiswa ngoba zifakwe emaphakeshaneni amancane nokunye. Lo mkhankaso siwubona ube yimpumelelo ngoba lokhu esikutholile, sikuthathile, nabatholwe nakho kuzofanele bachaze kabanzi ngakho,” kusho uThobakgale.Phakathi kwamaselula atholwe eziboshweni, bekukhona nama-smartphone.Ubalule ukuthi isiboshwa esitholwe nethelevishini, siphuciwe yona ngoba sehlulekile ukuletha imvume yokuba nethelevishini.Uthe uma benze imikhankaso efuze lena, iziboshwa ezitholwa nezinto ezingavumelekile, zibekwa amacala.“Kusuke kufanele zisichazele ukuthi ngubani ozilekelele ukuthi zingenise lezo zinto ngaphakathi ejele. Sizithathela izinyathelo, kanjalo nalabo ojele abasuke bezilekelele,” kusho uThobakgale.Uqhube wathi imvamisa bayaxoshwa emsebenzini ojele okutholakala ukuthi babandakanyeke ekungenisweni kwezinto ezingafanele ejele.Ohlangothini lweziboshwa ezitholwe nezinto ezingafanele, uthe ziye zishintshwe ziyohlaliswa engxenyeni yejele lapho okuhlala khona iziboshwa eziyingozi.“Konke lokho esikutholile esiboshweni, kubhalwa phansi kwirekhodi laso kuphinde kuvulwe icala emaphoyiseni, ngokuhamba kwesikhathi konke lokhu kuba nomthelela ongemuhle kuso,” kusho uThobakgale.Echaza ngomkhankaso uthe ubufaka phakathi amaphoyisa angaphezu kuka-200, ahlukaniswe amaqoqo angu-15, maqede agasela ezitokisini ezehlukene lapho okugcinwe khona iziboshwa ezenze amacala angena ngaphansi kuka-Medium B.Uthe imikhankaso bayayiqhuba njalo emajele ehlukene.

Imindeni ikhala ngokudembesela kwamaphoyisa uma  ebikelwa ngokuduka kwamantombazane asemancane.Lokhu kushiwo imindeni yamantombazane amabili aduke ezehlakalweni ezehlukene eThekwini, ngeledlule. Umndeni kaNqobile Hlophe (13) ofunda uGrade 8 ePinetown Girls, oduke ephuma esikoleni ngoLwesihlanu, watholakala ngoMgqibelo eseshonile nokaNksz Nokubonga Ndimande (19)  ohlala eGreenwood Park, oduke ngoMsombuluko odlule, ehambe ekhaya eya edolobheni eThekwini, osafunwa, ithi ukudembesela kwamaphoyisa kunikeza izigebengu ithuba lokwenza kahle ubugebengu. UMnuz Mbuso Dladla umalume kaNokubonga Ndimande, uthe amaphoyisa athe amantombazane amancane ngokujwayelekile asuke engadukile, asuke ezihlalele namasoka.UDladla uthe njengoba u Nokubonga wabikwa ngoLwesithathu, ukuthi udukile kodwa akekho umphenyi ophenya ngokulahleka kwakhe anikezwe yena esiteshini, iGreenwood Park. Amaphoyisa ngoLwesihlanu athe azoqala aphenye ngoba elokhu ebuya. " Angiwasoli amaphoyisa ngokucabanga kanjalo ngoba umshana wami naye bekwenzeka ahambe angabuyi aze abuye ngakusasa. Kulokhu sekuphele isonto nokuyinto angakaze ayenze," kusho uDladla.UMnuz Khetho Hlophe umalume kaNqobile, uthe bewumndeni bathe noma bezwa lokho abakutshelwa amaphoyisa, baphuma bazifunela ingane yabo."Ngisizwe ukuthi ngibuye ngibambe itoho ezimotweni ezikhokhelwa ngebanga ezilihambile. Ngifake isithombe ezinkundleni zezokuxhumana. Lolo lwazi luholele ekutheni sishayelwe ngumuntu othe uke wabona intombazane efake umfaniswano ofana nowakhe igijima ngasemgwaqweni ongenela emathuneni e-Ashley ntambama ngoLwesihlanu. Sifike kuleyo ndawo entathakusa ngoMgqibelo sathola isikhwama sakhe. Sase sishayela amaphoyisa asitshela ukuthi kunengane yesikole eshayiswe izimoto ngayizolo. Saya emakhazeni sathola ukuthi uyena," kusho yena.Uthe umufi ubelimele kakhulu. Umzimba udlavazekile kubonakala ukuthi ushayiswe yizimoto eziningi. Uthe amaphoyisa athe imoto yokuqala emshayisile ayimanga, kwalandela nezinye. Uqhube wathi umthetho wamahora angu-24  oshiwo ngamaphoyisa nezigebengu ziyawazi, okwenza ukuthi ziqhubeke kahle nobugebengu bazo, zazi ukuthi azikafunwa.Uthe basola ukuthi umshana wakhe uphunyulile kwabebemthumbile noma bese befikile lapho kade beya khona, kanti uzokwazi ukubaleka.UColonel Robert Netshiunda, okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uthe kuzo zombili izigameko zokulahleka kwabesifazane akukaboshwa muntu, wathi ngeke bazi noma ziyenyuka yini izigameko zokulahleka kwabo esifundazweni, njengoba lokhu kuvezwa izibalo ezikhishwa njalo ezinyangeni ezintathu. UNksz Nokwanda Gambushe weSonke Gender Justice, KwaZulu-Natal, uthe zibukeka zanda izigameko zokuthunjwa kwabantu besifazane, abanye babo batholwa bebulelwe."Cishe zonke izinsuku kuWhatsApp sibikelwa ngezingane zamantombazane adukile kwesinye isikhathi abanukubeziwe. Abanye ababe besatholakala," kusho uNksz Gambushe.Izibalo ze-Statistics SA ezikhishwe ngoMashi kulo nyaka, ziveza ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika ilele isikhombisa ngokuba nabantu abaningi abathunjiwe emhlabeni.Ngokwalezi zibalo bangaphezu kuka-16 000 abantu abathunjwayo kuleli njalo ngonyaka, kubo u-85% ngabesifazane nezingane.Ngokusho kukaNkk Bianca Van Aswegen we-Missing Children SA kwi-website yale nhlangano, uthi zingu-77% izingane ezitholakalayo uma zilahlekile, u-23% awutholakali, wathi ulwazi abaluthola emaphoyiseni luveza ukuthi njalo emizuzwini emihlanu kulahleka ingane kuleli.
