ABAKWASIDLODLO bathungatha umkhondo wabasolwa ngecala lokubulala owesifazane, base becwiya  izitho zomzimba eNorthdale, eMgungundlovu.Kuthiwa kutholakale isidumbu sowesifazane ehlubulwe isikhumba ebusweni, wakopilitwa amehlo, wasikwa ikhala nezindlebe.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda uziqinisekisile izindaba, wathi kunophenyo oluqhubekayo ngesehlo.“Amaphoyisa aseMountain Rise, aphenya icala lokubulala ngemva kwesigameko sokutholakala kwesidumbu sowesifazane oneminyaka engu-27 eNorthdale, ngoLwesine. Kukholakala ukuthi lo wesifazane ubelinyaziwe ebusweni,” kusho uColonel Netshiunda.I-Independent Online ike yabika ukuthi izingane ezilinganiselwa eminyakeni eyisishiyagalombili neshumi ebezidlala esitaladini, zizithele phezu kwesidumbu sowesifazane. Emva kokuthi zizithele kulesi sidumbu, abaqaphe ukuthula kule ndawo baphuthume khona bayobheka.Abaqaphe ukuthula endaweni iMi7, baphawulile ngesidumbu sowesifazane otholakale eNorthdale: “Uma ubheka indlela alinyazwe ngayo lo wesifazane kukhona ukuthi ube yisisulu ecaleni elibi. Kodwa ukuhlolwa kwesidumbu sakhe yikhona okuzocacisa ngokwenzekile kulo wesifazane,” kusho iMi7Amaphoyisa unxusa noma ngubani ongaba nolwazi, ukuze kugcine kubanjwe abenzi bobubi ukuthi afonele amaphoyisa aseMountain Rise kule nombolo ethi: 033 387 9600.

Amaphoyisa aKwaZulu-Natal asephume inqina athungatha abasolwa abadubule babulala amadoda ayisithupha eMlaza, eThekwini, esigcemeni saseV6 ngoMgqibelo ebusuku.Kuthiwa abagilwa bebehleli ngaphandle emqashweni wabo bephuza ngesikhathi kutheleka amadoda angaziwa avulela ngenhlamvu.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe abasolwa badlulele kumnikazi wendlu naye bamdubula nomunye obesendlini.Uthe abasolwa badubule nomunye wesilisa obesendleleni.“Bonke abagilwa abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-20 no-40 bafele endaweni yesigameko.”Uthe imbangela yokuhlasela ibingakaziwa okwamanje.“Amaphoyisa anxusa ongaba nolwazi mayelana nesigameko nokuthi abasolwa bakuphi athinte isiteshi samaphoyisa esiseduzee noma ashayele ku-08600 10111.”

UKUQINISA isandla kwamaphoyisa ikakhulu esifundazweni i-KwaZulu-Natal uma ebhekene ngqo nezigilamkhuba ezihlalisa lubhojozi umphakathi, kwenza abantu babuyelwe yithemba empini yokulwa nobugebengu, obuwumlilo wequbula oshiya kukhalwa.Muva nje, amaphoyisa ophiko lwe-National Intervention Unit (NIU) olungagayelwa mphako, awaconsi phansi kwabaningi kuleli ngenxa yokuzinikela kwawo emsebenzini asuke ejutshelwe kuwona. Esigamekweni esisahleli emiqondweni yabaningi, esokuqothwa kwabayisishiyagalolunye abasolwa ngezenzo zobugebengu eDesai, eMariannhill ngenyanga edlule, esinconywa amalungu omphakathi kuleya ndawo.Nakuba kunjalo, akungabazeki ukuthi impi elwa bukhoma ngezibhamu kusuke kuphakathi kokufa nokuphila. Yize inhloso emaphoyiseni kuwukubopha, kodwa kwesinye isikhathi azithola sekumele aphebeze ukufa uqobo noma aphenduke ababulali ngemizuzwana nje.Akugcini lapho, ayaphoqeleka ukulalela isililo samalungu emindeni efelwe asuke ehlonza abakwabo emva kwesigameko, ngesikhathi kuqiqingwa izidumbu.Ekugcineni kulindelekile ukuthi aphile impilo ejwayelekile njengawo wonke umuntu. Ngabe amelana kanjani nale ngcindezi?Esehlakalweni sokubulawa kuka-Warrant Officer Sthembiso Mazibuko (40) obesebenza ophikweni i-NIU, odutshulwe nyakenye amaphoyisa etholene phezulu nezigebengu eNtuzuma Kwa-C, kuxoxwa nelungu lomndeni, lakuveza ukuthi ubevamise ukubatshela ukuthi ngelinye ilanga uyohamba engabuyi ekhaya. Lokhu kuwubufakazi bengcindezi nokhwantalala olubhekene namaphoyisa nsuku zonke ngenxa yomsebenzi wawo.USolwazi Bonga Chiliza owudokotela wezengqondo ngaphansi koMnyango wezeMpilo, ophinde abe yiNhloko yoMnyango emkhakheni wezifundo ezithinta ukusebenza nokuphila kwengqondo e-University of KwaZulu-Natal, uthe isifo esibizwa nge-Post- Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD), senzeka uma umuntu ehlelwa yisigameko esishaqisayo, esithusayo noma esiyingozi.“Imvamisa lesi simo usibona emva kwamasonto noma izinyanga ezimbalwa wehlelwe isigameko. Zintathu izimpawu ezejwayelekile esibonakala ngaso.“Ukudlala njalo kwemicabango emqondweni ngesimo esikwehlele. Ukwethuka ngendlela engajwayelekile ikakhulu uma uzwa umsindo othile, nokuzama ukugwema imicabango noma indawo okwenzeke kuyo isigameko,” kusho uChiliza.Uthe kungaleso sikhathi umuntu egcina esephuza utshwala ngezinga elingejwayelekile ukwehlisa ingcindezi, okungamholela ekwenzeni amanye amaphutha.Uveze ukuthi ukungelashwa kwaso kungagcina kumshintsha umuntu indlela ayiyo, wathi kubalulekile ukubonana nodokotela wezengqondo.Ugcizelele ukuthi avakashelwe izigaba eziyisishiyagalombili, ezinyangeni ezintathu lapho usuke welulekwa khona esimweni somqondo.Kokunye kuba nesidingo sokuthatha uhlobo lwamaphilisi olunikwayo, uma uqede isikhathi sokwelashwa kwakho uzizwa ungcono kakhulu.Uthi isikhathi esiningi abesilisa bayakugwema ukuthola lolu sizo emva kwezigameko ezithusayo, bebalekela ukubukeka njengabantekenteke okuba nomphumela ongemuhle ekusebenzeni kwengqondo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa kuzwelonke uBrigadier Athlenda Mathe uthe zikhona izinhlelo ngaphakathi zokulekelela amaphoyisa uma enengcindezi.“Kunophiko olubizwa nge-Employee Health and Wellness (EHW), olunabaluleki bezengqondo, abalekelela ngokwezenkolo nosonhlalakahle.“Emahoreni angu-48 kwenzeke isigameko, kulindeleke ukuthi obebhekene nalesi simo ahambele uhlelo olubizwa nge-debriefieng (okuwuhlelo abasuke benaba ngokwenzekile kuhlolwe nesimo sabo),“ usho kanje.Uthe uphiko lwe-EHW olukhona kuzona zonke iziteshi zamaphoyisa luhleze luvuliwe ukwamukela amalungu asuke efuna usizo.UNobhala weNyunyana yamaPhoyisa i-Police and Prisons Civil Rights Union (Popcru) KwaZulu-Natal uNksz Nthabeleng Molefe uthe bayawagqugquzela amalungu abo ukuthi azisebenzise izinsiza zokwelulekwa ngokwengqondo ukuhlangabezana nengcindezi asebenza phansi kwayo.“Aseneme ngokuthi uphiko lwe-EHW lube ngaphakathi eziteshini ngoba kuba nzima kwabanye ukunekela abantu abasebenza nabo izinkinga.“Kwesinye isikhathi usabela ukuthi bazokubuka ngenye indlela. Siyafisa ukuthi i-debriefing yenziwe abasebenza ngaphakathi eziteshini kungalindwa othile oqhamuka kwenye indawo.“Lokhu kungagwema ukuchitheka kwesikhathi amaphoyisa elinde usizo, kwesinye isikhathi amanye agcina esehamba engayenzile, kulindiwe,” usho kanje.Uthe ukungakhulumi kwamaphoyisa ngengcindezi yomsebenzi, amanye agcina esenolaka ngisho emindenini nakubathandiweyo bawo, okungaba nobungozi obukhulu.Ngokocwaningo labakwa-National Library of Medicine olwenziwe phakathi kuka-2012 no- 2022, bangu- 1, 263, 847 abantu asebeke bamukelwa ukuzokwelashelwa ukwethuka, eminyakeni eyishumi.Lokhu kubangelwa ukudutshulwa, ukushaywa, izingozi zomgwaqo nokunye. I-KwaZulu-Natal ngokwalolu cwaningo, izihola phambili.

Uthembise ukujulukisa aphinde azincishe umoya izigebengu uNgqongqoshe omusha wamaPhoyisa, uMnuz Senzo Mchunu.UMchunu ulimise ngesihloko elokuthi ngeke baziwotawote izigebengu ezicabanga ukuthi ikwampunzi edla emini njengoba bezobhekana nazo besebenzisa indlakadla.Kulindeleke ukuthi namhlanje ahlangane nezikhulu zamaphoyisa ukuze aqale umsebenzi ngokushesha njengoba ebeke eqhulwini izinto ezine azogxila kuzona zisuka amadaka. Ufuna ukulwa nesihlava sokwanda kwamacala okubulala, awokudlwengula, ukwebiwa kwezimoto nokugqekezwa kwemizi.Lezi zinto zimenza angabuthi quthu ubuthongo.“Ngiyazi abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ababulali ubuthongo ngenxa yokwanda kwamacala okubulala, awokudlwengula, ukwebiwa kwezimoto kanjalo nokugqekezwa kwemizi. Noma ngingakawutholi umbiko ngebanga elihanjiwe emaphoyiseni okulwa nalawa macala kodwa ngiyazi ukuthi yizona zinto ezenza abantu bangakhululeki.” UMchunu uveze ukuthi akekho ongakhululeka uma la macala eqhubeka nokwanda.“Abantu kumele bazizwe bephephile ezweni labo. Uma lezi zinto singazilungisi, sizobe sibenzele phansi abantu.” Uphefumule kanje izolo ngesikhathi ekhuluma neziteshi zethelevishini zabezindaba ngesikhathi kufungiswa ongqongqoshe namaphini abo eKapa.UMchunu uveze ukuthi uzoqhubeka lapho kushiye khona obephethe izintambo eMnyangweni wamaPhoyisa uMnuz Bheki Cele.“Sengiwulungele lo msebenzi. Ngeke siwotawote ubugebengu, sizolwa ngqo nabo,” kusho uMchunu.Uveze ukuthi uzokwazi ukuphefumula kabanzi nangezinye izinhlelo uma esezinzile kulo mnyango.Indaba yobugebengu ngezinye zezinto ezenza abantu bakuleli bahlale benexhala.KwaZulu-Natal kuba nezehlakalo zokubulawa kwenqwaba yabantu ngesikhathi esisodwa.UCele ubewatshela amaphoyisa ukuthi angananazi futhi angafi ephethe izibhamu uma ebhekene nezigebengu evikela abantu bakuleli.UMchunu uthe bazolakha uhlelo abazosebenza ngalo lokulwa nobugebengu.Uveze nokuthi engakawuqali ngisho lo msebenzi wakhe ubese ethole umbiko ngesinye isehlakalo esithinta ukudlwengula esenzekile.“Kudinga isandla esiqinile ukulwa nobugebengu. Amaphoyisa azolwa ukuze abantu bakhululeke ezweni labo,” kusho uMchunu.

Ufunge wagomela uMkhuzi wamaPhoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, wathi amaphoyisa ngeke ahlale asonge izandla, abukele abafana abancane abayizigebengu behlukumeza abantu emiphakathini.ULieutenant General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi, uthe uma kunesidingo sebengamane banikele nangempilo yabo ukuze kuvikelwe imiphakathi.Usho kanje engxoxweni abe nayo neziko lezindaba iNewzroom Afrika.UMkhwanazi uthe laba bafana abagcwelezayo bathola uxhaso lwemali nezinye izinsiza kwizimpunyela ezingosomabhizinisi.“Ngeke sivumele ukuthi kube nesimo lapho laba bafana besabisa abantu nosomabhizinisi emiphakathini, badale udungunyane esifundazweni. Uma kunesidingo sokuthi sinikele ngempilo yethu ukuze sivikele izakhamuzi, sizokwenza lokho,” kusho uMkhwanazi.Uqhube wathi amaphoyisa awulandela njengoba unjalo umthetho uma esebenza futhi bahlonipha wonke umuntu.Uveze nokuthi izigebengu ezikhaliphile, zivele zicele umaluju uma sezibhekene namaphoyisa.“Lezo (zigebengu) ezizibona ukuthi zinesibindi futhi ziqeqeshiwe, sihlangana nazo empini,” kusho uMkhwanazi.Uveze ukuthi kunamaphoyisa alimalayo amanye abulewe enza umsebenzi wawo wokuvikela izakhamuzi.Ube eseluleka izakhamuzi ukuthi zingakuvumeli ukudukiswa abaholi bazo, ngokuthi benze izinto ezingezinhle ngesikhathi bona behleli emizini yabo benethezekile bedla u-popcorn.UMkhwanazi uthe abantu bakulesi sifundazwe kufuze ukube bafunde lukhulu ngezibhelu ezenzeka ngo-2021.Udalule nokuthi bayazibona izinto ezishowoyo nezinye eziphanyekwa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngabathile abasophe ukugovuza umphakathi ukuba ungene emigwaqweni ngabakushoyo.“Abanye balaba bantu ngosopolitiki abadumile abangekho nasesifundazweni (KZN) abathi uma abantu baseKZN beziphatha ngendlela ethile, akumele bagxekwe,” kusho uMkhwanazi.

UMKHUZI wamaPhoyisa kuleli uGeneral Fannie Masemola, uhlabe ikhwelo emaphoyiseni ukuthi abhalisele ukuvota ngokuyisipesheli njengoba ngosuku lokhetho ezobe ejutshwe ezindaweni ezehlukene.UMasemola uthe njengoba ngokhetho lukazwelonke ngoMeyi 29, ezobe esebenzela ezindaweni ezehlukene, kubalulekile ukuthi azifake lezi zicelo zokuvota ngokuyisipesheli kwiKhomishini yezoKhetho ngoba azobe engekho ezindaweni ahlala kuzona.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi kulolu khetho umuntu akakwazi ukuvota lapho engahlali khona njengoba kubalula umthetho.Ukuze ukwazi ukusheshe uvote kumele ufake isicelo kwi-IEC sokuthi usheshe uvote lapho uhlala khona ngoMeyi 27 noMeyi 28. “Kubalulekile ukuthi nisebenzise ilungelo lenu lokuthi nisheshe nibhalisele ukuvota ngokuyisipesheli. Uma ungakasifaki isicelo, yisikhathi esikahle ukuthi usifake ukuze ukwazi ukuvota,” kusho uMasemola.Uyalele oKhomanda ukuthi baluleke abasebenzi ababaphethe uma kunemihlangano ukuthi babhalisele ukuvota.Ukufaka isicelo sokuvota ngokuyisipesheli kwi-IEC kuvala ngoMeyi 3. Khonamanjalo uMkhuzi wamaPhoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLieutenant-General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi, uveze ukuthi kuzotshalwa amaphoyisa angu-17 000 ngesikhathi sokhetho esifundazweni.UMkhwanazi uthe awekho amaphoyisa azohlaba ikhefu ngesikhathi sokhetho.Uthe ukutshalwa kwalawa maphoyisa kuzodla uR40 million.Ukhale ngokuthi kunezikhungo zokuvota abazobe beziqaphe ngelokhozi ukuze kungabi nobugebengu.Wabalula nokuthi kumele ngabe bagxila ekuphenyeni amacala abaxakile obugebengu okubalwa ukudlwengula, ukubulala namanye kodwa kudingeka bagade ukhetho. Kwenzeka lokhu nje, kusasa uMkhandlu woNgqongqoshe bezokuPhepha kuleli, bazophefumula ngamalungiselelo alolu khetho.Abazobe behola lesi sithangami kubalwa uNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa uMnuz Bheki Cele, owezokuVikela uNkk Thandi Modise kanjalo nowezaseKhaya uDkt Aaron Motsoaledi.

KUKHISHWE izincwadi ezine ezigunyaza ukuboshwa kukaKhabo Jame Lephatsoe owayenguConstable emaphoyiseni aseWelkom ofunelwa uhide lwamacala ahlanganisa inkohlakalo nokuphulwa kwengalo yomthetho.Lo mlisa oneminyaka engu-32 ubudala ufunelwa amacala enkohlakalo, ubuqola nokuphula ingalo yomthetho ngamacala awenza kusukela ngomhla ka 11 Januwari 2018.Kuthiwa lo msolwa nozakwabo babeyobopha owesifazane owatholakala namatshe egolide, kodwa esikhundleni sokumubopha, bamsenga imali elinganiselwa ku-R300 000 eyakhokhwa isuka kwi-akhawunti yomgilwa ifakwe kwi-akhawunti ayinikezwa yilawa maphoyisa.Ngomhla ka17 Febhruwari 2019 wathatha imoto yombutho wayiboleka umngani wakhe owayishayela ehamba yedwa endaweni yaseMeloding kanti uzothola ingozi. “Ngesikhathi uLephatsoe ebizelwa endaweni lapho kwenzeke khona ingozi, wenza wengathi uyena owayeshayela. Lokhu kwaholela ekuboshweni kwakhe nomngani wakhe owahlanza iqiniso babekwa icala lokuphula ingalo yomthetho,” kusho uCaptain Stephen Thakeng okhulumela amaphoyisa aseFree State.Akagcinanga lapho ngoba ngomhla ka9 Juni 2021 lo msolwa waphinde wahlangana nalo mgilwa wathembisa ukukhipha umyeni wakhe owaboshwa ngokuba kuleli ngokungemthetho. Ngalokhu wafuna imali engango-R10 000. Wenza lokhu-nje ngoMeyi waloyo nyaka wazama ukufumbathisa umshushisi ecaleni lokudlwengula ayeliphenya.“Wanunusela umshushisi ngoR5000 ukuze kunyamalale idokodo ecaleni lokudlwengula elenzeka eWesselsbron elaliphenywa wuyena. Lapha wabekwa icala lenkohlakalo nokuphula umthetho.”Leli phoyisa lagcina limisiwe emsebenzini njengoba laliphenywa ngawo wonke amacala kanti kuthiwa akakaze alubhade enkantolo ukuze kuqulwe amacala akhe.

AMAPHOYISA amabili abhekene namacala amane okubulala okuvela ukuthi ayebangenela ezindlini labo ayesuke esehlele ukubabulala.Lokhu kuvele eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini izolo ngesikhathi kuvele amaphoyisa amabili abhekene namacala okubulala ngenhloso.Lawa maphoyisa asePort Shepstone ngoConstable Thanduxolo Vincent Phelago noMayendriam Collin Chetty. Kuthiwa ngo-August 22, 2022  ahlasela umufi, uMqapheli Victor Cele, ngenhloso yokumbulala.Lesi sigameko kuthiwa senzeka eGamalakhe, ePort Shepstone, kanti kuthiwa bangena ngodli endlini yakhe bangabuza lutho bamdubula."Bangena badubula bambulala ngaphandle kwesizathu,'' kusho umshushisi.Ngosuku olulandelayo kuthiwa adlulela phambili eMahlongwa, eMkhomazi, emzini kaNhlonipho Cyril Nzimande, naye amdubula ambulala.Kuthiwa abagcinanga ngokumbulala uNzimande kodwa bakhala bemuka nezinto zakhe. Phakathi kwazo kubalwa iselula, ibhakede elalinemali emhlophe, utshwala iSminoff Vodka, yiwashi likanokusho nesamba semali eshisiwe okuthiwe angeke sidalulwe.Ngalo lolo suku lawa maphoyisa kuthiwa adlulela eMagabheni, ngaseMgababa, ayobulala uPilayelo Sydney Buthelezi. Naye kuthiwa bamdubula bambulala.NgoSepthemba 11, 2023 eMvutshini, eMargate, bahlasela babulala ikhansela le-ANC ku-ward 99, uMnqobi Molefe, okuthiwa bamfica ehleli nonkosikazi wakhe kwakhe.Womabili agcine ekhalelwe ngamasongo kaSigonyela ngoNovemba ngonyaka owedlule. Asifaka isicelo sebheyili kodwa anqatshelwa.Kuthiwa inkantolo yakhala ngokuthi izizathu zabo zokucela ibheyili kazinaso isisindo esanele sokuthi bangadedelwa babe ngaphandle.UChetty waboshwa esemzini wakhe oseNew Heaven ngoNovemba 8. NoPhelago waboshwa esemzini wakhe oseWillow Glen.Icala liyaqhubeka namhlanje.

ANGAPHEZU kwenkulungwane amaphoyisa asuka ezifundeni ezahlukene zaKwaZulu-Natal abeyingxenye yomjaho obubanjelwe ebhishi laseBlue Lagoon, eThekwini ngoLwesihlanu.Lo mjaho waminyaka yonke webanga elingu-12.5 km uhlelwa yihhovisi likakhomishana wamaphoyisa esifundzweni usuneminyaka emithathu wasungulwa. Inhloso yawo ukuhlola ezempilo nokuzivocavoca.Ngokwesitatimende samaphoyisa, lo mjaho wasungulwa ngumkhuzi wamaphoyisa ngo-2022 kanti kulo nyaka, kubonakale isibalo esiphezulu sababambe iqhaza abasuka ezinhlakeni ezahlukene zezomthetho njengamaphoyisa kahulumeni, amaphoyisa omgwaqo, ojele kanjalo namaphoyisa angaphansi kophiko lweRoad Traffic Inspectorate.“Amaphoyisa ajoyine lo mjaho ngenhloso yokuzigcina enempilo. Abawinile bathole imhlomelo kaR5000.”Umqhudelwano ubumkhulu kakhulu kwabesilisa kwazise owokuqala uConstable Thamsanqa Mbanjwa  nowesilibili uThemba Dlamini  oyiProvisioning Administration Clerk bebeshiyana ngemizuzwana. UConstable Mbanjwa osebenzela esiteshini samaphoyisa eMontclair ubhale isikhathi esingu-42.26 kwathi uDlamini osebenzela esiteshini saseShowe ebambe isikhathi sika-42.27. Umanqoba wangonyaka odlule uSergeant Petrus Ndlela wasesiteshini sasePlessislaer uthathe indawo yesithathu ngesikhathi esingu-42.47.Kwabesifazane uConstable Thabisile Thobeka Phungula osebenzela esiteshini saseDundee ubuyise isithunzi kwazise nguyena wokuqala ukudla umhlanganiso kusungulwa lo mjaho ngo-2022, walala isibili ngonyaka odlule. UConstable Phungula ushaye isikhathi esingu-55.04 uhlule uzakwabo uConstable Fanta Ngema osebenzela uphilo lwePOP eMpangeni njengoba emshiye ngemizuzwana engu-41. UConstable Future Jona fongaphansi kophiko lwePOP eThekwini uthathe indawo yesithathu ngesikhathi esingu-57.42.

AYAKHALA amaqembu ezepolitiki ngokuphasiswa komthetho othinta ukuxhaswa kwamaqembu njengoba ethi uzohlomulisa i-ANC ne-DA kuphela ngasezimalini.La maqembu aveze ukuthi lo mthetho iPolitical Party Funding Act, osayinwe nguMengameli uCyril Ramaphosa kuleli sonto, uhlose ukutakula i-ANC ebhekene nezinkinga zemali.USotswebhu we-IFP uMnuz Narend Singh, uthe bahlanganyele namanye amaqembu ukuphikisa ukuphasiwa kwalo mthetho ngoba bazihambisa izethulo ngezinto ababekhala ngazo kuRamaphosa, kodwa wazishaya indiva.Uthe bahlose ukuthi noma sekuhlala iPhalamende elisha lesikhombisa ngemuva kokhetho, bazoqhubeka bawuphikise.“Singamaqembu angu-10 akhala ngendaba yalo mthetho ngoba uphasiswe sisalinde izimpendulo kuRamaphosa ngezethulo zethu. Uzohlomulisa kuphela amaqembu amakhulu okuyiwo azothola imali enkulu, amancane wona azothola imfalakahlana,” kusho uSingh.Uveze ukuthi i-ANC izothola imali ezobe ithathwe kwamanye amaqembu amancane.Kulo mthetho uRamaphosa unegunya lokubeka isikalo semali amaqembu anganikelelwa ngaso emva kokubonisana nePhalamende.Okwamanje amaqembu kumele adalule abaxhasi bawo uma esenikelelwe ngoR100 000 kuya phezulu. Ngonyaka iqembu lezepolitiki linganikelelwa ngumuntu oyedwa ngesamba sika-R15 million kuya ngaphansi ngonyaka.UMnuz Adrian Roos we-DA, uthe bayawuchitha lo mthetho ngoba i-ANC ihlose ukuzizuzisa yona ngawo.Uthe noma bezothola imali ethe xaxa kunamanye amaqembu belandela i-ANC, kodwa bayawuchitha.“Kumele amaqembu amancane abhekelelwe kangcono kungazuzi kuphela amaqembu amakhulu. UMnuz Lawson Naidoo weCouncil for the Advancement of the South African Constitution, uthe kuyashaqisa ukuthi uRamaphosa usayine lo mthetho ekubeni kukhona izikhalazo ezikhona ezivela emaqenjini ahlukene.Uthe akuzange kube nezigcawu zokuthi umphakathi uphawule ngesikhathi lo mthetho useMkhandlwini weziFundazwe ePhalamende.Okunye okuqukethwe yilo mthetho ngukuthi ufaka isigxivizo sokuthi kugunyazwe abangenela ukhetho ngokuzimela ukuthi babe yingxenye yokhetho lwezifundazwe nolukazwelonke olungoMeyi 29, 2024.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi phambilini abangenela ukhetho ngokuzimela bebengenela olohulumeni basekhaya kuphela.mKulolu khetho bangu-11 abazongenela ukhetho ngokuzimela.

BAPHAKIWE abakhongi bamaqembu ezepolitiki abayowamela ezingxoxweni zokubumba uhulumeni wokubambisana ngoba kalikho iqembu elinqobe ngengcaca.Izwe libuya okhethweni lulazwelonke olunzima lapho bezidlana imilalala kubangwa amavoti. I-ANC yehlulekile wukuthola isibalo samavoti esanele ukuze ibuyele emandleni elokhu yawathatha ngo-1994.Isimo esikhona siphoqa ukuthi kuxoxiswane ukuze kubunjwe uhululumeni ngoba emasontweni amabili azayo kufanele kuhlale iPhalamende. Amaqembu asekhethe abakhongi bawo abazowamela ezingxoxweni ukuze kuphunywe nesisombululo.I-DA imemezele ithimba layo elinoNkk Helen Zille, Mnuz Ivan Meyer, uMnuz Alan Winde noMnuz Tony Leon. UNkk Zille unguSihalo wesigungu esiphezulu kwi-DA kanti uke waba ngumholi wayo phambilini. UMeyer unguSihlalo womkhandlu wobuholi kwi-DA naso okuyisikhundla esinamandla. UMnuz Winde unguNdunankulu waseWestern Cape. uLeon uke waba wumholi we-DA phambilini futhi uthathwa njengengwevu yeqembu.I-ANC imemezele ukuthi ithimba layo liholwa nguNobhala-Jikelele uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, ohambisana nabathile abangadalulwanga.I-IFP imemezele ukuthi ithimba layo liholwa yiPhini likaMengameli inkosi uMzamo Buthelezi. Ngaphandle kokuba yiPhini likaMengameli, inkosi uButhelezi iyilungu lePhalamende elimele i-IFP.Okhulumela i-IFP kuzwelonke uMnuz Mkhuleko Hlengwa uthe ithimba liholwa yinkosi uButhelezi akafunanga ukubadalula abanye. Umholi we-EFF uMnuz Julius Malema uthe bami ngomumo ukuxoxa namaqembu afisa ukusebenzisana nabo. Ngokwamavoti yi-ANC ehleli phezulu nakuba ishoda, ilandelwe yi-DA, endaweni yesithathu kukhona iMK evumbuke yadla abantu.Endaweni yesine kukhona i-EFF, bese kuthi i-IFP isendaweni yesihlanu.

KUBE yinjabulo yodwa kubadobi bezinhlanzi baseHluhluwe abahlomule  ngezinsiza ngemuva kwesikhathi eside bekhala ngokushiwa ngaphandle emathubeni omnotho.Laba badobi abasebenzisa ichweba iSodwana Bay bahlomule ngezinsiza zokudoba ngaphansi kohlelo lwentuthuko edidiyelwe umasipala iBig Five Hlabisa.UMnuz Elliot Mthethwa ongomunye wabadobi uthe kuyabathokozisa ukutakulwa wumkhandlu iBig 5 Hlabisa onohlelo lokusiza osomabhizinisi abasebancane.“Sekunesikhathi eside sishiywa ngaphandle ezinhlelweni zokuthuthukiswa komnotho endaweni. Ngakho- ke kuyasijabulisa ukuthi abaholi basikhumbule nathi ezinhlelweni ezifana nalezi,” kusho uMthethwa.Banikizwe izinsiza zokudoba izinhlanzi, baphinde bathenjiswa namathuba okuthi bakwazi ukudayisela izitolo zaseHluhluwe nezakwaHlabisa izinhlanzi abazidobile. Lokhu kwenziwa ngenhloso yokukwandisa amathuba omsebenzi nokugqugquzela osomabhizinisi abasebancane.Imeya yaseBig 5 Hlabisa, uMnuz Comfort Khumalo, ithe isifiso somkhandlu ukuthi  kukhuliswe amabhizinisi  agxile emkhakheni wokuhweba ngezinhlanzi ngenhloso  yokuthuthukisa osomabhizinisi abasafufusa ukuze bakwazi ukuxosha ikati eziko.Ikhansela, uMnuz Sibusiso Simelane uthe kuyajabulisa ukuthi izikhalo zomphakathi wakule ndawo seziphendulekile njengoba bekuyisifiso sabo ukuthola usizo.“Okuphinde kwasijabulisa ukuvulwa kwehholo lomphakathi. Lokho kusho ukuthi kuphelile ukubamba imihlangano ngaphansi kwezihlahla nokuyinto ebathwesa ubunzima uma isimo sezulu sisibi,” kusho uSimelane.

UNOBHALA Jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, ubona kungeke kwenze mehluko ukuhlakaza ubuholi be-ANC KwaZulu-Natal nobezifunda.UMbalula uthe into ezobasiza ukuthi bathole ukuthi yini eyenza ukuthi bengenzi kahle eKZN ngesikhathi kunokhetho lwangoMeyi.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma nabezindaba, eThekwini, izolo, lapho kuqhubeka khona umhlangano wekomiti elibhekelele ukusebenza kwansuku zonke kwi-ANC.UMbalula usho kanjena nje, kukhona amalungu eqembu agxeka ubuholi baKwaZulu-Natal ngokwahluleka ukukhankasela ukhetho olwedlule.Isolezwe lizwe ukuthi abanye abaholi bamagatsha batshele uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, ukuthi bafuna kuhlakazwe ubuholi besifundazwe.URamaphosa ube nomhlangano nabaholi bamagatsha esifundeni iMoses Mabhida, ngoSonto.Umholi wegatsha obehambele umhlangano, uthe bafuna ukuthi ubuholi besifundazwe nobesifunda buhlakazwe.“Silwile kakhulu emhlanganweni.  Asisabafuni laba bantu. Sihlezi sihlulwa ezinkethweni zokuchibiyela bekhona, abasisizi ngalutho uma kukhankaswa. Ngingakubeka kucace ukuthi bayahamba,” usho kanje.UMbalula yena ubehlangene namagatsha e-ANC eThekwini, ngalo iSonto.Utshele abezindaba ukuthi akekho owenze isiphakamiso sokuthi kuhlakazwe ubuholi besifundazwe noma obezifunda.UMbalula uthe abajahile ukuhlakaza ubuholi.“Mhlawumbe bakhona abakujahile lokho, kodwa thina asizile lapha ukuzohlakaza ubuholi. Thina into esiyijahile ukuthola ukuthi iziphi izinto ezaholela ekutheni sihlulwe okhethweni. Ayikho into ongayakha ngokuhlakaza ubuholi. Ziningi izinto esingazenza ukwakha kabusha i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal. Into ebalulekile ukuthi sazi ukuthi kungani abantu bengasivotelanga, nokuthi kungani abantu bengaphumanga ngobuningi.”UMbalula uthe kubashayile kakhulu KwaZulu-Natal ukuvela kweqembu eliholwa owayengumengameli, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, i-MK.“IKwaZulu-Natal iyona eyaba nesibalo esiphezulu sabantu abaphuma bayovota. Ngicabanga ukuthi u-58.2% wabantu abavota lapha KwaZulu-Natal. Kodwa iqiniso ukuthi labo bantu bavotela uZuma. Kufanele sikubuke ukuthi kusho ukuthini lokho.”UMbalula uthe bazimisele ukwakha kabusha izinhlaka zeqembu, wathi bazokhetha ubuholi besikhashana emagatsheni asale engenabuholi ngenxa yokuhlubuka kwabantu okwenzeke ngaphambi kokhetho.Ikomiti elibhekelele ukusebenza kwansuku zonke kwi-ANC luphothule uhambo lwalo laKwaZulu-Natal izolo, lapho lihlangane khona nobuholi besifundazwe.

OBEYIMEYA yeTheku, uMnuz uMxolisi Kaunda, uthi akaxoshwanga esikhundleni ngoba eyisehluleki kodwa i-ANC ibone kufanele ayoyisebenzela kwenye indawo.UKaunda, obekhuluma esithangamini sabezindaba izolo, uphawule kabanzi ngokuxoshwa kwakhe esikhundleni wakhonjwa ePhalamende eCape Town.UMkhandlu weTheku usezandleni ze-ANC ewuphethe ngokubambisana neNFP emuva kokuthi engabanga khona onqoba ingcaca okhethweni. Kusabalele amahlebezi okuthi kungase kujutshwe uMnuz uCyril Xaba, obeyilungu lePhalamende, azovala isikhala sikaKaunda.Ukuchithwa kukaKaunda kumenyezelwe ngoLwesithathu ntambama futhi kuvela nje kumatasa ezweni kuzanywa ukubumba uhulumeni.UKaunda ubebukeka engadangele, eshaya amancoko ebhuqa nangakho ukukhishwa kwakhe esikhundleni. Uthe yena wenze konke okusemandleni ukuthi iTheku libe yindawo engcono kakhulu. Uthe ngesikhathi etshelwa ngokukhishwa kwakhe, ayiphathwanga eyokwehluleka le eshiwo ngabantu.“Uma ujutshwa kwi-ANC awubuzi ukuthi kungani bekhethe wena, ngokunjalo noma usukhishwa ukhonjwa kwenye indawo ngeke ubuze. Yisinqumo engisemukele kahle njengoba ngihlala ngenza nakwezinye. Ngeke ngibaphendule abathi ngiyisehluleki kodwa umsebenzi wami uzozikhulumela,’’ kusho uKaunda.Uthe uyakholelwa ekutheni i-ANC isebenzise ubuhlakani bayo ngendlela efanele ngesikhathi yenza isinqumo. Uthe ukholwa wukuthi imbone njengomuntu ofanele ukuyolekelela esikhundleni ajutshwe kusona.Uthe ukungcola kweTheku lokhu okukhalwa ngakho kungcono kakhulu manje. Uthe balenyusile izinga lokuhlanza idolobha baze bafinyelela nasezindaweni ezisemakhaya.Uthe uyawazi amahemuhemu abhokile, athi angase ashiye kwi-ANC aye kwenye indawo. Uthe amampunge akhulunywa ngabantu abangazi ukuthi bathini.Uthe wazijoyinela yena i-ANC ngokuthanda kwakhe, uyayiqonda kahle ukuthi isebenza kanjani. Uthe bekunozinzo eThekwini ngesikhathi sakhe, akufani nabanye omasipala okuhlala kuketulwa izimeya kufakwe ezinye inyanga nenyanga.Uthe uzishaya isifuba ngokuthi umasipala uphethwe kahle futhi basebenze kakhulu belwa nenkohlakalo ebidla lubi emkhandlwini.Ubuye wathi usebenze kakhulu elungisa udaba lokushoda kwamanzi eThekwini. Kulindeleke ukuthi i-ANC ikhombe imeya entsha ezovala isikhala sikaKaunda.

Ngeke ngisule esikhundleni sami sokuba nguNgqongqoshe weMfundo ePhakeme nokuQeqesha ngenxa yezinkinga zeNational Students’ Financial Aid Scheme (NSFAS). Lokhu kushiwo nguDkt Blade Nzimande, othe lawo maqembu ezepolitiki amfuna ehambile kumele azi ukuthi akayi ndawo. UNzimande obekhuluma nabezindaba izolo, eTshwane, ngokuzokwenzeka kulandela ukuhlakazwa kwebhodi lalesi sikhwama, uthe uyazi amaqembu afana ne-DA, EFF, Umkhonto weSizwe Party namanye, amfuna ehambile.“Ngibonga ukuthi angiqashiwe ibona. Ngizosulelani? Ngisule ekubeni ngikhulise imali esikhwameni iNSFAS. Badlala ipolitiki uma bethi angihambe, angikhethwanga ibona. Ngelanga okuyophatha ngayo i-DA ngiyosula. Angiyi ndawo ngoba asikho isidingo sokuthi ngisule ngenxa yokuthi i-DA namanye amaqembu athi angihambe.” Usho lokhu nje, la maqembu athi akahambe ngoba usehlulekile.UNzimande wehlise amaphaphu kulabo abacabanga ukuthi ngeke bayithole imihlomulo yabo ngoba sekuhlakazwe ibhodi.“Kukhona abangabazayo ukuthi njengoba sekuhlakazwe ibhodi, ngabe imali yabo basazoyithola yini. Ngifuna ukuqinisekisa izitshudeni nabantu bakuleli ukuthi yonke imihlomulo izokhokhwa. Nabahlinzeka ngezindawo zokuhlala bazokhokhelwa njengoba kuhleliwe. Sihlakaze ibhodi ngoba silungisa izinto, akukho okuzoshintsha, sizoqhubeka njengoba sihlelile,” kusho uNzimande.

AMAQEMBU aphikisayo axwayise iMeya yeTheku entsha, uMnuz Cyril Xaba, ngomsebenzi omkhulu oyihlalele.Athe izinkinga ezibhekene nomasipala azimfuni umuntu owande ngomlomo, athi kufuneka umuntu ozogxila ekwenzeni umsebenzi.UXaba uqokwe emhlanganweni womkhandlu oyisipesheli obungoLwesithathu.Emva kokuqokwa, uXaba wenze izethembiso ezinqala wathi uzobeka phambili ukulungisa ingqalasizinda yamanzi neyokuthuthwa kwendle bese elwa nenkohlakalo.Ohola iDA kuMasipala waseThekwini, uMnuz Thabani Mthethwa, uthe yize bekwemukela ukuqokwa kukaXaba kodwa ababoni kuzokwenza umehluko otheni.“Simuzwe esenza izethembiso eziningi. Iqiniso ukuthi ukushintshwa kwemeya angeke kuziqede izinkinga ezikhungethe umasipala. Iqiniso ukuthi uXaba uzophatha umasipala obhekene nenkinga yamanzi nogesi, ingqalasizinda engekho ezingeni nezikhulu ezingathathelwa izinyathelo.”UMthethwa uthe bazoqhubeka nokuqapha ukusebenza kwemali yomkhandlu.Ohola i-IFP kuwo lo masipala, uMnuz Mdu Nkosi, uthe bazogada ukuthi uXaba uyazifeza yini izethembiso azenzile.“Siyakwemukela ukuqokwa kwakhe, siyazibophezela ekutheni sizosebenzisana naye. Kunezinto azishilo esizithandayo njengalena yokuthi uzolwa nenkohlakalo. Singajabula uma ingenzeka leyo.”Ohola i-EFF, uMnuz Themba Mvubu, uthe abamethembi uXaba.“Umlomo uyayithenga imoto, wenze izethembiso eziningi kodwa thina sifuna ukumbona enza izinto zenzeke. Iqiniso ukuthi naseqenjini lakhe abamethembi. Ngesikhathi eqokwa, iningi lamakhansela e-ANC livele laculela phansi, kwanesibhocobhoco.”I-EFF ike yabambisana ne-ANC kulo mkhandlu kodwa umshado wabo waphela kabuhlungu njengoba i-ANC yakhipha uMvubu kwesokuba usihlalo wekomiti lezokuhlaliswa kwabantu.UMvubu uthe bazoqhubeka nokuba yiqembu eliphikisayo, wathi abafune lutho oluzobahlanganisa namaqembu aphethe ngokubambisana uhulumeni kazwelonke nowaKwaZulu-Natal.Ohola i-ActionSA kulo mkhandlu, uMnuz Zwakele Mncwango, uthe bebefuna ukuthi isikhundla sithathwe yikhansela leqembu eliphikisayo.I-ActionSA ibiphakamise igama likaMthethwa onqabile ukungenela umbango wesikhundla sobumeya, wakhala ngokuthi abe-ActionSA abazange bakhulume naye ngaphambi kokuphakamisa igama lakhe.“Thina besibona kuyithuba lokuthi i-ANC siyiphuce umasipala, kuphathe amaqembu aphikisayo.”I-ANC ithe iyakwemukela ukuqokwa kukaXaba.Okhulumela leli qembu KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mafika Mndebele, uthe abantu baseThekwini bazothola izidingo ezibafanele.Uthe uXaba unamava afanele njengoba eseke waba uMphathiswa woMnyango wezoLimo, waphinde waba yilungu lePhalamende.

ABHEKENE nomqansa amaqembu angenele ukhetho lukazwelonke ngoMeyi 29, 2024 KwaZulu-Natal njengoba kudingeka ukuthi athole amavoti abalelwa ku-43 000 kuya phezulu ukuze athole izihlalo esiShayamthetho sesifundazwe.Njengoba ohlwini lokuvota bengu-5.7 million esifundazweni ababhalisele ukuvota, uma bephuma ngothi lwabo ukuyovota lokhu kuyosho ukuthi sizonyuka kakhulu isibalo samavoti azodingeka njengoba engafinyelela nangaphezu kuka-50 000.Lokhu kuvezwe yisikhulu sekhomishini yezokhetho esifundazweni i-Independent Electoral Commission uNkk Ntomb’futhi Masinga, obekhuluma emcimbini weSanef izolo eThekwini.Uthe kuzwelonke kuzoba ngumqansa kakhulu ngoba cishe kudingeka amavoti abalelwa ku-80 000 ukuze uthole isihlalo.UNkk Masinga ungathekise ngokuthi uma kuvota u-60% wababhalisile esifundazweni, kuzodingeka ukuthi umuntu athole amavoti asuka ku-43 000 kuya phezulu. Lesi sibalo sifaka ngisho noyedwa ongenele ukhetho ngokuzimela eKZN.“Uma sanda isibalo sabavoti lokho kuyosho ukuthi siyanda nesibalo samavoti adingekayo ukuze uthole isihlalo. “Uma sehla isibalo sabavoti sizokwehla nesibalo samavoti adingekayo ukuze uthole isihlalo,” kusho uNkk Masinga.Ezweni lonke bangu-12 abangenela ukhetho ngokuzimela njengoba kuzobe kuqala ukuthi kulolu khetho babe yingxenye yalolu khetho.UNkk Masinga uthe abalelwa ku-33 amaqembu azongenela ukhetho esifundazweni.Uveze nokuthi uma kwenzeka kuvuleka isikhala ePhalamende likazwelonke ngeke kube nokhetho lokuchibiyela njengoba kwenzeka, kodwa kuyofakwa igama lobelandela ngamavoti.Uveze ukuthi ngesonto elizayo kuzoba nomcimbi wokusayinwa kwesibopho kwamaqembu azongenela ukhetho ukuthi azohlonipha imigomo yalo.Lo mcimbi uzoba se-Inkosi AlbertLuthuli International Convention Centre eThekwini ngo-Ephreli 17. Uveze ukuthi azikho izindawo ezingo-alubhadwa abangakwazi ukufinyelela kuzona esifundazweni.“Asiboni ukuthi kungafika esimweni sokuthi endaweni ethile size sithi sizohamba namasosha ukuya khona ngoba singakwazi ukungena.“Sisebenzisana namaphoyisa nophiko lwezokuphepha esifundazweni olufaka namaqembu ahlukene ezepolitiki,” esho. Uthinte nodaba okuhlale kugxekwa ngalo ikhomishini lokuqasha othisha abangamalungu eSadtu.I-EFF isanda kukhala ngokuthi ayifuni kuqashwe amalungu ale nyunyana ngoba idlelana ne-ANC. “Awukho umthetho othi umuntu okwinyunyana akaqashwa ukusebenza ngesikhathi sokuvota. “Abangavumelekile yilabo abanezikhundla kwinyunyana kanti asikwazi ukubashiya ngaphandle othisha ngoba bewuSadtu.“Sinalo uhlelo namaqembu ahlukene ne-EFF eyingxenye yalo lokuthi siwanike uhlu ukuze afake isikhalazo ngabasuke beqashiwe, kuphetha uNkk Masinga.

AKHALA ngokunganakwa amanesi angaqashiwe osekuphele isonto eqhinqe ngaphandle kwebhilidi loMnyango wezeMpilo iNatalia, eMgungundlovu.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe, amanesi alinganiselwa ku-150, asuka ezindaweni ezehlukene KwaZulu-Natal ankanise kule ndawo.Lilandisa ngodaba elinye lawo, uNksz Slindile Ndlovu, lithe baneminyaka engaphezu kweyishumi bathola iziqu kodwa lutho umsebenzi.“Mina nje, ngigogoda ngo-2013, ngaqala ngafaka izicelo zomsebenzi njalo uma kuphume izikhangisi kodwa namanje angikaze ngiqashwe,” kusho uNksz Ndlovu.Uqhube wathi abanye ozakwabo, abaqhinqe nabo, bagogoda ngo-2007.Udalule ukuthi iningi labo njengoba lihleli ngaphandle kwebhilidi lowezempilo, lalikhona kulabo ababelinganiselwa ku-8000 abavele bagcwalisa inkundla yezemidlalo, behambise izicelo zabo esibhedlela iNkosi Albert Luthuli, eThekwini ngo-2018.Ngaleso sikhathi umnyango wawukhangise izikhala ezingu-100 kuphela.Uphinde wathi babekhona futhi kulabo ababeyofaka izicelo eminyakeni edlule, kuzovulwa isibhedlela iDkt Pixley Ka Isaka Seme Memorial, KwaMashu.Wenze izinsolo zokuthi ziyadayiswa izikhala.“Sine-group kaWhatsapp yamanesi angaqashiwe lapho esixoxa khona ngodaba lwethu. Sesize sajwayelana, sibaningi. Kukhona abaveze ukuthi sebeqashiwe kodwa bagwaza ngemali enguR35 000 ukuze baqashwe,” kusho uNksz Ndlovu.Uthe babatshela ukuthi izikhulu ezigwazelwa ngale mali zikhona ngaphakathi kuleli bhilidi abaqhinqe ngaphandle kwalo.“Asinawo uR35 000 wokugwaza kodwa umsebenzi siyawudinga, sicela ukuqashwa,” usho kanje.Uthe ngoMsombuluko kukhona isikhulu esiphume ngaphakathi sabatshela ukuthi asikho isabelomali sokuthi baqashwe.Wathi banombuzo wokuthi sisuke sesivelaphi esokuqasha abagwazayo.Uthe bazoqhubeka nokuqhinqa ngaphandle kwaleli bhilidi kuze kuba bachazelwa into ezwakalayo maqondana nokungaqashwa kwabo.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Ntokozo Maphisa, uthe "Umnyango ufisa ukukubalula ukuthi zikhona izikhangiso zabahlengikazi nabahlengi ezikhishiwe, bayanxuswa  labo abenesifiso sokufaka izicelo zokuqashwa ukuba babheke kwi-website yomnyango.Uqhube wathi odabeni lwezinsolo zokugwazisa, umnyango unxusa ukuba labo abanobufakazi balokhu ukuba bavule amacala emaphoyiseni bese beletha ubufakazi ukuze umnyango uphenye.

Ukusoka akukhona okwabafana kuphela, amadoda amadala okuyiwona aseya ocansini asengasoka. Lokhu kushiwo uMnuz Phakamani Ndlovu wePhakamani Empowerment egqugquzela ukuthi abesilisa basoke. Uthe abafana abancane abaneminyaka engaphansi kuka-15 kuhle ukuthi basoke kodwa iqiniso ukuthi bona basuke bengakaqali ukuya ocansini. “Abesilisa esibadinga kakhulu abeneminyaka ephakathi kuka-15 kuya ku-29, okuyibona abasuke sebeqale ukuya ocansini, abasengcupheni yokuthola izifo zocansi kuzo okubalwa neHIV,"  kusho uNdlovu.Uthe abantu abakule minyaka bavamise ukuba nezaba zokuthi kungani bangayi kosoka. “Izaba ababa nazo ukuthi bayasebenza ngeke bakwazi ukulova emsebenzini, abanye bayafunda ngeke bakwazi ukulova esikoleni, kanti abanye babona sengathi amasonto ayisithupha okuyisikhathi esilindwayo ngaphambi kokuthi uye ocansini uma kade usokile side ngokungabekezeleki,” kusho uNdlovu. UDkt Khumbulani Moyo weRigth to Care, uthe ucwaningo olwenziwe yiHuman Sciences Research Council, i-Sixth SA National HIV Prevalence, Incidence, and Behavior Survey,  olushicilelwe  ngo-2022, luveze ukuthi ukuthi cishe u-50% wabesilisa baseNingizimu Afrika abaneminyaka engu-15 kuya ku-24, abasokwe ezikhungweni zezempilo.“Sinxusa amadoda amadala ukuthi asoke. Ungasoka noma uneminyaka emingaki, ungabi sengcupheni okutheleleka nge-HIV," kusho  uDkt Moyo.Lezi zinhlangano zithe okunye okuyinkolelo ukuthi ukusoka kwenziwa ebusika. UNdlovu uthe isilonda sipholiswa indlela umuntu asinakekela ngayo, akuhlangene nokuthi isiphi isikhathi sonyaka."Ukusoka kwenziwa nganoma iyisiphi isikhathi sonyaka bese uyasinakelela sizophola ngesikhathi esilinganayo nalesi esiphola ngaso nasebusika. Into eyenza ukuthi sikugqugquzele ukuthi abesilisa baye kosoka ngalesi sikhathi ukuthi abafundi basuke bevalile okubanikeza ithuba elihle lokuthi bayosoka," kusho yena.Uthe abanye abantu bathoba isilonda ngamanzi anosawoti, bagcobe uvaselina okuyikhona okubhibhisa isilonda.Uthe kule nyanga bakhuthaza kakhulu ukuthi kuphume abesilisa abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-15 kuya-29.UDkt Moyo uthe: "Ubusika buyisikhathi esinabantu abaningi abasoka ngaso eNingizimu Afrika, amathimba ethu eGauteng, Free State, Eastern Cape, Western Cape, Limpopo, Mpumalanga, North West naKwaZulu-Natal asuke emi ngomumo ukuze asoke abesilisa mahhala.“

Iyaqhubeka nokuxoxisana namaqembu ahlukene ezepolitiki i-ANC njengoba eseyisishiyagalolunye azibophezele ukuba ingxenye yokwakhiwa kukahulumeni wobumbano.NgoMgqibelo iRise Mzansi ikhiphe isitatimende isho ukuthi ingenile. Ilandele eduzane i-United Democratic Movement (UDM) ejoyine ngoLwesihlanu.Amanye amaqembu akwiGovernment of National Unity (GNU) yi-ANC, DA, Patriotic Alliance (PA), IFP, PAC, Good Party neFreedom Front Plus.Kwenzeka lokhu nje, amehlo athe njo kuMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ukuba abumbe bese emezela iKhabhinethi yakhe.NasePhalamende bebengakamenyezelwa abazoba osihlalo bamakomiti abhekele ukusebenza kweminyango ehlukene.Esitatimendeni iRise Mzansi ithe isinqumo sithathwe ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku ubuholi bayo emuva kwezingxoxo namaqembu ehlukene kuhlanganisa ne-ANC.Leli qembu lithi kuhle ukuba ingxenye kahulumeni wobumbano ukuze kufezekiswe izinto abazithembisa abavoti ngesikhathi bekhankasa.

UMasipala weTheku unxenxa abasemkhakheni wezincwadi nabasemkhakheni wobuciko ukuba babhalisele ukuba yingxenye yombukiso  i-Articulate Africa Art and Book Fair ozoba e-Inkosi Albert Luthuli International Convention Centre (ICC), eThekwini.Lo mbukiso uzoba yizinsuku ezine, kulindeleke ukuthi uqale ngo-Ephreli 24 kuze kube u-Ephreli 27, nonyaka. Ngokwesitatimende sikamasipala esithunyelwe abezindaba, kumenywa ababhali, abashicileli, abemfashini, abenza ubucwebe nabanye ukuthi babhalise ukuba bazobukisa ngomsebenzi wabo.Ukubhalisela ukubekisa indawo yokubukisa ngomsebenzi wakho kuvalwa ngoMashi 28, 2024. I-Articulate Africa ingezinye zezinhlelo zikaMasipala weTheku oluhlanganisa ubuciko, ukufunda, amasiko nomculo ukuthuthukisa imikhakha eyehlukene yendima yezobuciko. nguMoyomuhle Maphanga waseRumana MahomedKulula ukubhala incwadi yefa futhi kulula ukuqinisekisa ukuthi isayinwe ngokusemthethweni, okungelula ukuqinisekisa ukuthi konke okubhalwe encwadini yefa kuyenzeka.Empeleni akulungile ukuqala ngokubhala incwadi yefa. Phela incwadi yefa yisigaba sokugcina sokuhlela konke onakho, iphinde ibe ingxenye yokuhlela izimali zakho. Konke lokhu kufanele kulandelane ngendlela efanele, ukuze ugweme izinkinga.Yisiphi isinyathelo sokuqala ongasithatha ukuze impilo yakho ihleleke? Qala ngokubhala konke nakho, yilokho ofuna ukuba nakho, uzibuze ukuthi ufuna ukwenzani ngesikhathi usaphila nokuthi ufuna kwenzekeni mhla usungasekho. Zibuze ukuthi ufisani, uzokwenza kanjani lokho, nokuthi imali yokukwenza izovelaphi. Zibuze ukuthi yini ezokwenzeka ngezinto zakho mhla usungasekho emhlabeni.Emva kwalokho usungahlala phansi uzibuze ukuthi: Uma ngihamba emhlabeni manje, ngubani okufanele athole okuthile kulokhu enginakho? Kulapho- ke usungaqala khona ucabange ukuthi incwadi yakho yefa izothini. Lo mbuzo kufanele uzibuze wona njalo emva kweminyaka emibili okungenani, kodwa kungaba ngaphansi kweminyaka emibili uma kunoshintsho olukhulu empilweni yakho. Ushintsho kungaba umshado, ukuzalwa kwengane noma umzukulu, ukushona kwelunga lo mndeni wakho, ukuthengwa kwendlu, nokunye.ENingizimu Afrika sinelungelo lokwaba izinto zethu encwadini yefa ngendlela esifisa ngayo, kodwa lokhu kunezingqinamba. Akusizi ukwaba ifa ngendlela ofisa ngayo ekubeni kunemali encane efeni lakho yokukhokhela izikweletu zakho (zihlangene ne ntela) kanye nezindleko. Lokhu kusho ukuthi umabi wefa kufanele akhethe okukodwa ezintweni ezimbili: izindlalifa kufanele zifake imali efeni ukuze zizuze imoto, yindlu nokunye okuyifa okushiyile, noma amafa owashiyile kufanele adayiswe ukuze kuhlangane imali eyanele yokukhokhela izikweletu nezindleko zakho.Indlela oshade ngayo nayo ibalulekile. Uma ushade umshado ohlanganisa amafa, uhhafu wefa ungowakho, okusho ukuthi awukwazi ukucaza omunye uhhafu ngendlela othanda ngayo. Umaushade umshado ohlukanisa amafa kodwa othi lokho enizokuthola nishadile ngokwenu nobabili, lokho enikuthole nobabili kuzocazwa kuqala ngaphambi kokuthi kwabiwe okubhalwe encwadini yefa.Abashadikazi (nabahlalisene) kufanele bahlale bazi ukuthi uma kushona oyedwa, lowo osele uyakwazi ukufaka isicelo sokuthola izinto zalowo oshonile ngaphansi komthetho iMaintenance of Surviving Spouses Act. Lokhu kwenzeka esimeni lapho ophilayo esele nemali encane noma  engakwazi ukuzinakekela.Okusempeshenini yakho noma okusesikhwameni sakho somhlala phansi, iprovident fund, kwabiwa ngokulandela iPension Funds Act. Ungabaqoka abantu okufanele imali iye kubona, kodwa ababhekelele isikhwama sempesheni ababoshiwe yilokho okubhale phansi.Uma ubabhalile okufanele bahlomule ngezimali zakho zenqubo mgomo yempilo neminye imishwalense, asikho isidingo sokubhala ngalesi sinqumo encwadini yakho yefa. Umshwalense uzokhokhela labo ababhalwe phansi.Uma abazali noma ogogo nomkhulu benze iskhwama sokwethemba, phecelezi iTrust, la begcine khona izinto ezibalulekile, njenge ndlu, izimoto nomunye umcebo, awukwazi ukufaka lezi zinto encwadini yakho yefa. Ngisho noma ngabe unesabelo kuzona.Mayelana nezinto okwazi ukuphisana ngazo, incwadi yakho yefa iyona ezokukhulumela uma ungasekho. Yingakho kubalulekile ukuthi ibhalwe kahle, icace, kungabikho okudidayo kuyo.Ngisho ukufakwa kokhefana endaweni engafanele kungaba yinkinga. Inkantolo ayikwazi ukubheka okunye ngaphandle kwalokho okubhale encwadini yakho yefa. Kubalulekile ukubhala amagama ngendlela efanele encwadeni yefa lakho, ngoba uma engabiziwe ngendlela efanele kungabhedisa izinhlelo zakho.Kubalulekile ukuthi uqoke umuntu ozobhekelela izindaba zefa lakho. Uma engekho oqokiwe, uMaster weNkantolo enkulu uzoziqokela umuntu ozobhekelela amafa akho emva kokuxoxisana nezinhlaka ezithintekayo. Lokhu kuthatha isikhathi kanti isikhathi siyimali. Umuntu ozokwengamela amafa akho kufanele aqokwe wuMaster ngaphandle uma lowo muntu engakwazi ukwengamela amafa.Ukuhlela amafa akho nokubhala incwadi yefa, yisona sinyathelo esingayidli imali eningi. Thola isazi esizokusisa ukuhlela izinto zakho, wazi ukuthi uzokhokha imali encane.Eminyakeni eyishumi (10) edlule, iJaji lenkantolo yokudluliswa kwamacala, uLeach lathi: “Kuyamangaza njalo ukuthi abantu abaningi bathatha usizo kulabo abangazi lutho ngokubhalwa kwencwadi yefa. Le ncwadi ingenye yezincwadi ezibalulekile ukuthi umuntu ayisayine.”IJaji uWeiner naye wenkantolo yokudluliswa kwamacala, wacaphuna kwinkulumo ka-Ambrose Pierce: “Ukufa akukona umphela ndawo. Kusala umbango wefa, oliwa ngezomthetho.”Yenza isiqiniseko sokuthi incwadi yakho yefa ayiqali umbango ozogcina enkantolo, kodwa kube incwadi ecacile engenaso isidingo sokuya enkantolo.Uyisayina kanjani incwadi yefa ngokusemthethweni.• ENingizimu Afrika, incwadi yefa kufanele isayinwe ephepheni. Kungaba yiphepha elibhalwe ngesandla noma elishicilelwe ngomshini, kodwa kungcono uma lishicilelwe ngomshini.• Umnikazi wefa kufanele asayine ezansi kwalo lonke ikhasi lencwadi yefa. Ekhasini lokugcina lencwadi yefa, kufanele asayine ngezansi komusho wokugcina.• Kufanele asayine phambi kofakazi ababili okufanele babe neminyaka engaphezu kweyi-14, abazokwazi nokuya enkantolo bayokwethula ubufakazi uma kunesidingo.• Ofakazi nabo kufanele basayine ekhasini lokugcina (kodwa kuyagqugquzelwa ukuba basayine wonke amakhasi).• Ofakazi kufanele babe khona uma kusayina umnikazi wefa, nabo basayine phambi kwakhe. • Ofakazi abavumelekile ukuhlomula efeni nokuthi kube yibona abalicazayo noma ababhekelela izindaba ezithinta ifa kodwa lokhu akuyenzi incwadi yefa ingabi semthethweni.• Uma umnikazi wefa engakwazi ukusayina, ngenxa yokukhubazeka, ukugula, nokuthi akafundile, kufanele kutholakale usizo longoti bezamafa. Umnikazi wefa uzokwazi ukwenza uphawu oluthile noma omunye umuntu angamsayinela, lokhu kufanele kugunyazwe wukhomishana onelungelo lokwenza izitatimende ezifungelwe.FUNDA kabanzi ngencwadi yefa ngokucindezela le link:https://www.fisa.net.za/wills/

ASIKEZUKUBUYELA oLundi isiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal okwamanje. UNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, uthe udaba lokususwa kwesiShayamthetho eMgungundlovu, lusazoqale luxoxwe amaqembu aphethe ngokubambisana uhulumeni wesifundazwe.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma nabezindaba emva kokwethula ikhabhinethi lakhe eSilweni uMisuzulu kaZwelithini, oLundi, izolo.IsiShayamthetho sathutha oLundi ngesikhathi i-IFP iphuma emandleni KwaZulu-Natal.Kuyiwe okhethweni amaqembu ehlukene phakathi ngokubuyela kwesiShayamthetho oLundi.Amanye amaqembu okukhona kuwo i-IFP, abekhala ngokuthi uhulumeni umosha imali enkulu eqasha izakhiwo eMgungundlovu ekubeni kukhona isakhiwo esingasebenzi oLundi.Amanye amaqembu okukhona kuwo i-ANC abengafuni nokuyizwa eyokuthutha kwesiShayamthetho, ekhala ngokuthi kunezinhlelo zezigidi zamaRandi zokwakha isakhiwo sawo khona eMgungundlovu.Manje la maqembu asebusa ngokubambisana, kuzofanele axoxe ngalolu daba.“Ngiyazi ukuthi sekuzokuba nemibuzo yokuthi ngabe ukuza kwethu lapha kusho ukuthi isiShayamthetho siyabuya. Angikusho ukuthi ukuza kwethu lapha akuhlangene nokubuya kwesiShayamthetho. Njengoba sasishilo nasekuqaleni, lolu daba kufanele luxoxwe. Akufanele silushalazele.”UNtuli uthe kubajabulisile ukuba esiShayamthetho esakhiwa umsunguli we-IFP, iNkosi Mangosuthu Buthelezi.“UButhelezi wayengundunankulu kaZulu. Uyena owayehola uhulumeni waKwaZulu, wayehlala kulesi sihlalo engihlezi kuso namhlanje. Ukuza kwethu lapha kusho khona ukuthi asiwabukeli phansi amagalelo alabo abaphatha ngaphambi kwethu.”UNtuli uthe iSilo sibayalele ukuba babumbane.Uhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal uphethwe ngokubambisana amaqembu amane, i-IFP, ANC, DA neNFP.“Umyalezo weSilo ushumayele ukuthula nobumbano. Umyalezo weSilo ukhuthaze ukuba sisebenze ngobuqotho. Ngingasho ukuthi iSilo sisamukele kahle.“Bekubalulekile kithina ukuba sizozethula ngoba siyazi ukuthi lapha KwaZulu-Natal kubusa iSilo. Lapha besizokwethula izinhlelo zethu zokuthuthukisa abantu baKwaZulu-Natal."UNtuli uthe bazoxhumana nezinye izinhlaka zomphakathi.“Lesi bekuyisiqalo nje, sisazoxhumana namakhosi, nezinhlangano ezilwela amalungelo abantu. Siyazi ukuthi kufanele sisebenzisane nezinye izinhlaka ukuze sizokwazi ukuthuthukisa iKwaZulu-Natal.”UNtuli uthe uhulumeni omusha usuqalile ukusebenza, wathi bazokuba nomhlangano wokuqala wekhabhinethi namhlanje.“Ngiyawethemba la madoda nabesifazane engibaqokile. Abazange baze bapholise amaseko, baqala umsebenzi emva kokuthi ngibaqokile. Abazange basho ukuthi balinde mina ukuthi ngibatshele ukuthi yini okufanele bayenze.”

IPHINI likaNgqongqoshe weMfundo ePhakeme uMnuz Buti Manamela, lithe asikho isidingo sokuthi kwenziwe ushintsho ezinhlelweni zomnyango ngoba ezikhona ziyasebenza. UManamela uthe izinhlelo zenza kube nozinzo futhi zihambisana nokubalulwa umqulu wokuthuthukisa izwe, iNational Development Plan.Uthe noma izwe selibuswa nguhulumeni ohlanganisa amaqembu ahlukene anemibono yawo ngezemfundo kodwa kubalulekile ukuthi lo mkhakha unganyakaziswa. “Ibambe ngakho ngezinhlelo ezikhona, asikho isidingo sokuthi siyishintshe, senze kungabi nozinzo. Siyazi izinto okumele sizenze ukuphucula lo mkhakha,” kusho uManamela.Ukusho lokhu ngenkathi ekhuluma engqungqutheleni esongwa namhlanje eLimpopo, yenhlangano yothishanhloko bamakolishi amakhono iSouth African Public Colleges Organisation (SAPCO).Usho lokhu nje izinhlangano ezimele imikhandlu yezitshudeni iSAUS neSasco, zahlaba ikhwelo lokuthi kungenziwa izinguquko ezinqala ikakhulu esikhwameni esixhasa ngemali yokufunda ezikhungweni iNSFAS. Lezi zinhlangano zazinongabazane zingazi ukuthi yikuphi okuzokwenzeka kulesi sikhwama njengoba abaholi bamaqembu ahlukene, bebefuna kwenzeke izinguquko kusona.Bebefuna isikhwama sibuyele kwesasikwenza phambilini okokuthi sigxile ekubolekeni imali yokufunda izitshudeni.I-DA yayihamba phambili ithi kumele kwenziwe izinguquko esikhwameni.UManamela uthe kubalulekile ukuthi amakolishi asebenzisane nezinkampani ezehlukene ukuze kube nezinguquko ohlelweni lokufunda.“Uma sisebenzisana nezinkampani kuzoba lula ukwazi ukuthi zifunani. Ngaleyo ndlela sizokwazi ukufundisa lokhu okudingwa abaqashi.” Uthe ukuze lo mkhakha ukhule kumele izitshudeni zibambe iqhaza.“Izitshudeni kumele ziveze imibono yazo ngokuthi zifuna kwenziweni kulo mkhakha. Ngaphandle kwazo asikwazi uwukukhulisa.”

UNDUNANKULU waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, unxuse amalungu ekhabhinethi lakhe ukuba akhohlwe izimpi ezingathi shu.UNtuli unxuse abaphathiswa baKwaZulu-Natal ukuba bakhombise ubumbano, baphinde bagxile ekuhambiseni izidingo.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ethula inkulumo yakuvula umhlangano wekhabhinethi, obizwa ngelekgotla.Ikhabhinethi yaKwaZulu-Natal ixube abaphathiswa abaqhamuka emaqenjini ahlukene, i-IFP, ANC, DA neNFP.UNtuli uthe abantu baKwaZulu-Natal balindele ukuthi uhulumeni wokubambisana usebenze ngaphandle kwezihibe.“Asikho isikhathi sokudlala. Asikho isikhathi sezimpi ezingathi shu. Abantu baKwaZulu-Natal bathembele kuthina, asingabaphoxi.”Lo hulumeni ongakaqedi izinyanga ezimbili usunguliwe, usuke wabhekana nezivunguvungu.Kuke kwajikijelana ngamazwi uNobhala we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Bheki Mtolo noMphathiswa woMnyango wokuBusa ngokuBambisana oyilungu le-IFP, uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi.UMtolo wayesola uButhelezi ngokuzenzela umathanda komasipala, emsola ngokushintsha abalawuli ngaphandle kokulandela imigomo.UMtolo ube nomhlangano noNtuli izolo, naphambi kokuqala kwelekgotla.Wale waphetha ukuphawula emva komhlangano wabo, wathi bebezikhulumela ezomndeni.UNtuli uthe abaphathiswa kufanele bangakhohlwa ukuthi bahlanganiswe into eyodwa, athe ukuhambisa izidingo kubantu.“Lona uhulumeni wamaqembu ahlukene ahlanganiswe injongo eyodwa, ukwakha iKwaZulu-Natal elungele wonke umuntu, enamathuba ekusasa elisha. Kulo mhlangano kufanele sivumelane ngezinhlelo zokuhambisa izidingo kubantu.“Ngesikhathi ngigcotshwa, ngathembisa ukuthi sizosebenzela abantu baKwaZulu-Natal. Manje sekuyisikhathi sokuthi sikhombise ukuthi sizimisele kangakanani ukusebenza ngokubambisana. Ukuzimisela kwethu kuzokhombisa ukuthi sizinikele kangakanani ngokusebenzela abantu.”UNtuli uthe babeke eqhulwini ukukhulisa umnotho nokudala amathuba emisebenzi.Uthe umnotho waKwaZulu-Natal ukhahlamezeke kakhulu ngesikhathi kuhlasela  icorona, ngesikhathi kunezibhelu zokuzitapela nangezikhathi ezehlukene okuhlasele ngazo izikhukhula.UNtuli uthe bazimisele ukulwa nobugebengu obudlangile esifundazweni.“IKwaZulu-Natal seyaziwa njengesizinda sezinkabi. Kwaziwa ukuthi abantu babulawelwa ubala lapha. Lokhu ngeke kusiqede amandla, sizoqhubeka nokulwa nobugebengu. Iqhinga esifuna ukulisebenzisa ilelo lokuqala ngokulwa nobugebengu obuncane. Okwenza sifune ukusebenzisa leli qhinga ukuthi uma sibayeka abenza amacala amancane, lokho kugqugquzela abantu ukuthi benze amacala amakhulu ngoba babona sengathi umthetho awuqinile.”Umhlangano welekgotla uzophela namhlanje.

UNDUNANKULU waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, uyalele abaphathiswa abasha ukuba bagxume bahlale phezu komsebenzi abaqokelwe wona.UNtuli uthe ukuqokwa kwekhabhinethi lesifundazwe kusho ukuqala komsebenzi wokwakha kabusha iKwaZulu-Natal.Ukusho lokhu emva kokufungiswa ngokusemthethweni emcimbini obuseMgungundlovu, izolo.Kulo mcimbi obusenkundleni iWoodburn, uNtuli umemezele ikhabhinethi lesifundazwe elakhiwe abaphathiswa abaqhamuka kwi-IFP, ANC, DA neNFP.La maqembu yiwo avota ngokubambisana ngesikhathi kuqokwa uNtuli, ngeledlule.UNtuli uthe ubheke ukuthi abaphathiswa abasha basebenze ngokuzikhandla."Sinomsebenzi omkhulu wokwakha kabusha iKwaZulu-Natal. Ngiyazi ukuthi ngesikhathi sikhankasela ukhetho sasinemiqulu yezethembiso zokhetho eyehlukene. Kodwa ke manje sekuyisikhathi sokuba sibeke phambili izidingo zabantu baKwaZulu-Natal. Sonke sibhekeke ukuba sisebenze ngokwethembeka nangokucophelela."UNtuli uthe bazolandelela ukuthi abaphathiswa bayayenza yini imisebenzi abayiqokelwe.I-IFP iyona ethole izikhundla eziningi kwekhabhinethi lesifundazwe elimenyezelwe izolo.Amalungu e-IFP, uMfu Musa Zondi uzophatha uMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho, uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi, uzophatha uMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu, uNkk Thembeni kaMadlopha-Mthethwa, uzophatha uMnyango wezoLimo, bese kuthi uMnuz Mntomuhle Khawula yena aphathe uMnyango wezeMidlalo, ezobuCiko namaSiko.Amalungu e-ANC, uMnuz Siboniso Duma uzophatha uMnyango wezokuThutha osuhlanganiswe noMnyango wezokuHlaliswa KwaBantu, uNksz Nomagugu Simelane usazoqhubeka nokuphatha uMnyango wezeMpilo, uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka uzophatha uMnyango wezeMfundo.Amalungu eDA, uMnuz Francios Rodgers, uzophatha uMnyango wezeziMali, uMnuz Martin Meyer yena uzophatha uMnyango wezemiSebenzi yoMphakathi.Ilungu leNFP, uNksz Mbali Shinga, lizophatha uMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi.Abaphathiswa abangazange babuye uDkt Ntuthuko Mahlaba, Nkk Bongi Sithole-Moloi, Mnuz Super Zuma, Mnuz Sipho Nkosi noNkk Nonhlanhla Khoza bona basho ngaphambi kokhetho ukuthi sebethi khumu.Ushintsho oluqaphelekayo olwenziwe ukuthi uMnyango wezokuPhepha koMphakathi usuzokuba ngaphansi kweHhovisi likaNdunankulu.UNtuli uthe wenze lolu shintsho ngenxa yokuthi ufuna ukuba sekhaleni lokulwa nobugebengu."Ngesikhathi ngikhankasela ukhetho ngangibeke phambili ukulwa nobugebengu. Manje sekuyisikhathi sokuba silwe nalesi sihlava esihlasele imiphakathi yakithi."Okuqaphelekayo ngekhabhinethi ukuncipha kwabantu besifazane abasezikhundleni.Ikhabhinethi lesifundazwe eledlule beliholwa undunankulu wesifazane, libe nabaphathiswa besifazane abahlanu.Ikhabhinethi elimenyezelwe uNtuli linabantu besifazane abathathu.UNtuli akazange adlule kweyokuncipha kwabantu besifazane kodwa uncome ukuqokwa kwabesifazane ezikhundleni ezimqoka esiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal.Ngesikhathi kukhethwa ngedlule, uNksz Nontembeko Boyce wakhethwa njengoSomlomo, kwathi uNksz Mmabatho Tembe, yena waqokelwa kwesePhini likaSomlomo.UNtuli uthe kuyingqophamlando ukuqokwa kukaNksz Boyce noNksz Tembe."Abaqokwanga nje ngoba nakhu sekugcinwa icala, baqokwe ngoba nakhu bewazi umsebenzi."I-MK ne-EFF abazange babe yingxenye yohulumeni wokubambisana esifundazweni.UNtuli uthe bazosebenzisana namaqembu angeyona ingxenye yohulumeni wokubambisana, wathi imiphumela yokhetho ikhombise ukuthi abantu baKwaZulu-Natal bafuna kube nohulumeni wokubambisana."Ngesikhathi sikhankasela ukhetho akekho owayethi ufuna ukubusa ngokubambisana, sonke sasifuna ukunqoba ukhetho. Abantu baKwaZulu-Natal bafike basho enye into. Basikhombisa ukuthi ibona abenezwi lokugcina, ingakho namhlanje sinohulumeni wokubambisana."UMengameli wamaJaji KwaZulu-Natal, iJaji uThoba Portia Poyo-Dlwathi, liyalele abaphathiswa abafungiswe izolo ukuba bangakhohlwa izifungo zabo.

UTHI awumthusi umbango oshisa phansi wokuhola isifundazwe iKwaZulu-Natal ohola iRise Mzansi esifundazweni, uNkk Nonkululeko Hlongwane-Mhlongo.UNkk Hlongwane-Mhlongo uthe bona bagxile kakhulu emkhankasweni wabo, wathi abafuni ukuphazanyiswa izinto ezenzeka emaceleni.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi enengxoxo ekhethekile neSolezwe.UNkk Hlongwane-Mhlongo ungumholi wesikhashana weRise Mzansi KwaZulu-Natal, kulindeleke ukuthi athulwe ngokusemthethweni njengomele iqembu embangweni wesikhundla sikandunankulu eKZN ngoLwesithathu.Umbango mkhulu KwaZulu-Natal njengoba i-IFP neqembu elikhankaselwa owayengumengameli, uJacob Zuma, uMkhonto weSizwe, likhombisa ukwenza kahle ezinkethweni zokuchibiyela zakamumva ezibe KwaZulu-Natal.UNkk Hlongwane-Mhlongo uthe babheke ukwenza kahle KwaZulu-Natal.“Siyazi ukuthi amaqembu amaningi ayibhekile iKwaZulu-Natal njengoba ingeyesibili ngokwesibalo sabantu ababhalisele ukuvota. IKwaZulu-Natal ithathwa njengababeki benkosi. Thina asithukile. Siyazi ukuthi kuzokuba nesiphithiphithi, nomsindo.“Kodwa iqiniso esilaziyo ukuthi abantu baKwaZulu-Natal abamane bavotele noma iliphi iqembu lezepolitiki. Abantu baKwaZulu-Natal bavotela iqembu abalaziyo ukuthi lizofeza izidingo zabo. Njengoba siya okhethweni abantu angeke bawavotele amaqembu angazifezi izethembiso.”UNkk Hlongwane-Mhlongo uthe umqulu wezethembiso zokhetho wabo unezinto ezidingwa abantu baKwaZulu-Natal.“Engikuthandayo ngomqulu wethu ukuthi abantu baKwaZulu-Natal babambe iqhaza ngesikhathi siwubhala. Siyile kubona, saxoxa nabo, basitshela izinto abazifunayo. “Phakathi kwezinhlaka esixhumane nazo ngesikhathi sibhala umqulu, iKZN Blind Society. Sahlala nabo, basitshela izidingo zabo. Uma ubona izinto ezithinta abantu abaphila nokukhubazeka emqulwini wethu, kuyobe kuyizinto esizithathe kubona.”UNkk Hlongwane-Mhlongo uthe kumjabulisile ukuba afakwe embangweni wesikhundla sobundunankulu.Uthe ukhethwe emva kohlelo olude obeluqhutshwa yikomiti elizimele.“Ikomiti elizimele lathola amagama angaphezu kuka-400. Kwabe sekuhlungwa, kwenziwa inhlolokhono. Emva kwalokho ke, ikomiti labe selikhetha igama lami. Kungijabulisile kakhulu ukuba ngikhethwe. Engikuthandayo ukuthi uhlelo beluqhutshwa yikomiti elizimele.”UNkk Hlongwane-Mhlongo usebenze kakhulu nezinhlangano ezingenzi nzuzo, njengoba esebenze kulo mkhakha iminyaka engu-12.Uphinde wasebenza kakhulu nomasipala.

NAKUBA iqembu elikhulu esiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal, i-MK lithi uNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, uthinte izihloko ezimqoka ngesikhathi ethula umhlahlandlela kahulumeni wesifundazwe kodwa lithe alinalo ithemba lokuthi uzozifeza izethembiso azenze.Bakusho lokhu ngesikhathi bephawula emva kwenkulu eyethulwe nguNtuli esiShayamthetho, eMphithi.Inkulumo kaNtuli ibigxile ekuthuthukiseni umnotho, ukulwa nendlala, ubugebengu, nenkohlakalo, nokuthuthukisa ezemfundo nezempilo.Inkulumo inconywe ngamaqembu abusa ngokubambisana ne-IFP kuhulumeni wesifundazwe; okuyi-ANC, DA ne-NFP.La maqembu athe izinhlelo ezimenyezelwe nguNtuli zizothuthukisa isifundazwe.Kepha abe-MK bathe bazokholwa uma sebebona uNtuli esenza lokho akuthembisile.I-MK iyona enezihlalo eziningi esiShayamthetho.Umdidiyeli we-MK KwaZulu-Natal, uDkt Kwazi Mbanjwa, uthe uhulumeni uhlezi wenza izethembiso ezigcina zingafezwanga.“Siyazi ukuthi uNtuli uyaqala ukuphatha uhulumeni wesifundazwe. Abantu abasebenzi, badinga imisebenzi, ubugebengu buphezulu. Kuningi akushilo okwenza umqondo. Inkinga yethu ukuthi izikhathi eziningi kuba nezethembiso kodwa akukho okuphumelelayo.”UMbanjwa uthe njengeqembu eliphikisayo bazolandelela ukuthi izithembiso ziyafezwa.UMphathiswa wezokuThutha nokuHlaliswa kwaBantu ophinde abe uSihlalo we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Siboniso Duma, uthe inkulumo kaNtuli iyahambisana naleyo eyethulwa uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, ngesikhathi evula iPhalamende.“URamaphosa wakhuluma ngendaba yokuthuthukiswa komnotho. UNtuli naye ukhulume ngokuthuthukiswa kwechweba laseRichard’s Bay, waphinde wakhuluma ngendaba yokulwa nobegebengu.”UDuma uthe vele igeja selisensimini kubaphathiswa baKwaZulu-Natal.“Sivele sesiqalile siyasebenza. Thina nje sesikwazile ukuvakashela abashelwa izindlu ngesikhathi kunomlilo wequbula.”UMphathiswa wezeziMali ophinde abe umholi weDA KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Francios Rodgers, uthe okubajabulisile ukuthi uNtuli ugcizelele eyokuthi ukusetshenziswa kwemali yomphakathi kuzoqashwa ngelokhozi.“Mahle impela amaqhinga athulwe undunankulu, kodwa ke okubalulekile ukuthi kufezwe izinto azethembisile. Sizolwela ukuthi ziyafezwa zonke.”UMphathiswa wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi ophinde abe usihlalo we-NFP KwaZulu-Natal, uNksz Mbali Shinga, uthe beyikhabhinethi lesifundazwe bazokuba ‘omabizw’ asabele’.“Usikhuthaze kakhulu thina malungu ekhabhinethi lakhe ukuthi ulindele uhulumeni ozogijima, ozosheshe ufinyelele, kufezwe izidingo zabantu. Siyakuthatha ke lokho, sizogijima nakho.”Namuhlanje kuzokuba nenkulumompikiswano esiShayamthetho lapho khona amaqembu ezobhunga ngenkulumo kaNtuli.

UBUHOLI be-ANC kwisifunda iMoses Mabhida buthi ukuphikisana kwabo nesiphakamiso sokuthi isiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal sibuyele oLundi, kubanikeza ufuqufuqu lokuthi bakhankasele ukuthi i-ANC inqobe ukhetho KwaZulu-Natal.Ubuholi bakulesi sifunda esihlanganisa izindawo eziseMgungundlovu, buthe buzokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi i-ANC inqoba ngamalengiso KwaZulu-Natal ukuze uMgungundlovu uzoqhubeka nokuba yinhlokodolobha.Lokhu bakusho ngesikhathi bunesidlo sakusihlwa nabezindaba ngoLwesihlanu.Uhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal unezinhlelo zokwakha isiShayamthetho esisha esizohlanganisa namahhovisi eminyango kahulumeni, khona eMgungundlovu.Amaqembu aphikisayo, okubalwa kuwo i-IFP, NFP ne-ActionSA afuna ukuthi isiShayamthetho siphindele oLundi.Usihlalo we-ANC kwisifunda iMoses Mabhida, uMnuz Mzi Thebolla, uthe ukuthutha kwesiShayamthetho kungaphazamisa ukuhanjiswa kwezidingo.“Uyacabanga isiphithiphithi esingasuka, kuthuthwa emahhovisi kuyiwa oLundi? Kungama ukuhanjiswa kwezidingo, abantu bematasa nokuthutha. Kuke kwanesikhathi lapho kwakukhona amahhovisi eminyango kahulumeni ayesoLundi nawayeseMgungundlovu. Lokhu kwakudla kakhulu imali. Asifuni ukubuyela lapho.“Sizokulwela ukuthi uMgungundlovu uqhubeke nokuba inhloko dolobha. Kufanele abantu baseMgungundlovu, nabantu baKwaZulu-Natal bakulwele ukuthi uMgungundlovu uqhubeke nokuba yinhlokodolobha.”UThebolla uthe umkhankaso wabo wokhetho uhamba kahle, wathi akubathusi ukuvela kweqembu elalikhankaselwa owayengumengameli, uJacob Zuma, iMK.I-MK isijoyinwe amalungu aqavile asuka kwi-ANC, EFF ne-DA eMgungundlovu okukhona kuwo owayephini leMeya kuMasipala waseMsunduzi, uMnuz Thobani Zuma, nababengamakhansela kulo mkhandlu, uMnuz Mtuza Mkhize, Msizi Ngcobo, Sibongiseni Majola, Khumbulani Nene, noSibongiseni Majola.UThebolla uthe abantu baseMgungundlovu angeke bevume ukudukiswa uZuma.“Abantu baseMgungundlovu bachayisa uSifiso Nkabinde (owasuka kwi-ANC waya kwi-UDM). Abantu baseMgungundlovu bazomchayisa uZuma nayo yonke le nto ayenzayo. Abantu akusikhona ukuthi babethanda yena siqu sakhe, kodwa babethanda i-ANC. Le nto ifana nembongolo eyayigitshelwe uJesu. Abantu babengathandi imbongolo, kodwa babethanda lomuntu owayeyigibele.”I-ANC eMoses Mabhida izokhetha ubuholi obusha ngoDisemba.Iphini likasihlalo we-ANC kulesi sifunda, uMnuz Nhlakanipho Ntombela, lithe bakwazile ukubuyisa uzinzo.“IMoses Mabhida ibisidume ngokubulawa kosopolitiki neziteleka. Ngesikhathi singena sanikezwa umsebenzi wokuthi sibuyise uzinzo. Bancane kakhulu abantu ababulewe ngesikhathi kuphethe thina futhi neziteleka zibe ncane kakhulu. Uma kunozinzo kwi-ANC, omasipala esibaphethe bayakwazi ukusebenza ngendlela.”

AZIYINGENI indaba yokukhethwa ngamadoda anothile eMkhosini woMhlanga izintombi nto futhi azizigcineli nomendo kodwa konke kumayelana nokuphila impilo ehlelekile.Zisho kanje izintombi nto ezingaphansi kwenhlangano yezintombi, iHlalangentombi, njengoba zilungiselela impelasonto enkulu yoMkhosi woMhlanga waminyaka yonke ozobe usesigodlweni seSilo, eNyokeni. Ezinye zalezi zintombi nto bezisemkhulekweni zikhulekela uhambo oluhle oluya kulo mkhosi obubizwa ngeSiyaya eMhlangeni Prayer  obuseMlaza.Zithi ziyazi ukuthi njengoba kuzobe kuwuMkhosi woMhlanga ngempelasonto kunamadoda asuke ‘ezotheza’ ezintombini ngoba efuna ukuganwa yizintombi nto. Bathi siphelile leso sikhathi, bona abasazigcineli amadoda futhi abafune kugana kodwa abakwenzayo kuyisiko mpilo abazikhethele lona. UNksz Balindile Ntshingila (20), oyintombi ehlolwayo odabuka eNquthu osezinze eThekwini ngenxa yokufunda, uthe yize kuyisinqumo sentombi ngayinye ukuthi iyavuma yini ukukhethwa emhlangeni kodwa akafisi ukuthi kube sengathi bazigcinela ukukhethwa ngamadoda emhlangeni."Siyazi ukuthi akhona amadoda aya emhlangeni ngalezo zizathu ikakhulukazi lawa acebile. Mina ngokwami ngithi asingayengeki sijahe ukugana sisebencane, singakakwazi ukuzimela. Umendo unezinselelo zawo. Uma usungenile awukwazi ukubuye ubuye uqale phansi ube yintombi uma usufice obungakulindele. Ngifisa sengathi zonke izintombi zingaqale zifunde ngoba imfundo iyisikhali okwazi ukulwa ngaso," kusho yena.UNksz Ntshingila wenza izifundo zezempilo, i-Health Promotions Officer, eHatfield City College.UNksz Snothando Nkunjana (19) waseMzimkhulu, osehlala eMarianhill  owenza izifunda zobuthisha e-University of South Africa (UNISA), uthe:" Asizigcineli umendo, sizigcinela ukuthi sikhule size sifinyelele ezingeni elikahle lokuthi sikwazi ukuthatha izinqumo eziyizo ngempilo yethu. Asikho isidingo sokuthi ungaze ulindele ukukhethwa emhlangeni. Kwakhona ukugana akuyona into ephambili kithi. Umendo uyibhonasi nesipho osiphiwe uNkulunkulu kodwa asizigcinele wona,"UNksz Zamekile Cele (25) wakwaMakhutha, owenza unyaka wesibili kwi-Hospitality eCoastal College, uthe: "Senzela ukuthi siqoqeke ngoba silandela indlela yokuphila yokuhlolwa. Uma uyintombi ehlolwayo ngeke utholakale ezindaweni zabantu abadla ubusha babo,“ echaza.Lezi zintombi zikhuthaze ezinye ukuthi zilishumayele lingene leli vangeli lokuthi imfundo phambili, umendo emuva. Bakhuthaze nabesifazane ngisho nabangahlolwa ukuthi bangasheshi bafune ukungena emendweni kodwa bafunde baphinde bafundiseke nangempilo kuyima bengena ekuganeni.

UKHOMISHANA wamaPhoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLieutanent General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi, uthi evile ku-50 amaphoyisa asemisiwe, aphenywa ngamacala abandakanya ukwephula umthetho kusuka ngo-Ephreli kulo nyaka kuze kube yimanje.UMkhwanazi ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ephendula imibuzo ohlelweni obeluyisipesheli lwe-Newzroom Afrika kudingidwa izinkinga ngamaphoyisa eKZN.Lokhu kulandela izigameko ezimbalwa ezibikwayo zokungasebenzi kwamanye amaphoyisa ngendlela nokubandakanyeka ezenzweni zobugebengu.“Uma kunezigameko lapho kutholakala khona ukuthi amaphoyisa ephule umthetho ngandlela thile, kuyabhekwana nakho.  Ngingakusho ngingangabazi ukuthi kulo nyaka nje kuphela, kusuka ngo-Ephreli, sekumiswe amaphoyisa evile ku-50, iningi lawo lisahamba amacala ngaphakathi ngezinto asolelwa ukuthi azenzile eziphambene nomthetho,” usho kanje.Ukusho lokhu nje, kuthe ngesonto eledlule inhlangano i-Amnesty International yadedela umbiko wocwaningo lwayo oluthathe izinyanga eziwu-18 ngokubulawa kwabaholi nezishoshovu zenhlangano Abahlali Basemijondolo.  Lolu cwaningo luveza ukuthi amaphoyisa awawasukumeli amacala okubulawa kwalaba ngendlela efanele, bekhala kakhulu ngesiteshi samaphoyisa esise-Cato Crest, ngokubukela phansi abahlala kulezi zindawo abasuke bezobika noma belandelela emacaleni abikiwe.UMkhwanazi uthe nakuba engenayo imininingwane ngamacala le nhlangano ekhuluma ngawo kulolu cwaningo, kodwa unxusa ukuthi uma umuntu ezovula icala esola ukuthi iphoyisa alibenzi ubulungiswa noma ekholelwa ukuthi liyabandakanyeka ebugebengwini obuthile, lowo muntu wamukelekile ukuzama olunye osizo njengokubika lelo phoyisa ophikweni olubhekelele ukuphenya ngamacala awo, i-Independent Investigating Directorate (IPID) ukuze luphenye.Ukhwele wadilika kulabo abagxeka amaphoyisa ngokusebenzisa inganono uma edubulana nezigebengu, isikhathi esiningi okuvame ukuthi kufe abasolwa. Uthe umsebenzi wamaphoyisa awulula njengokukhuluma kwalabo abasuke behlaziya abakubukela kude, abangakaze babe sesigamekweni lapho izigebengu zitholene phezulu nawo.Uthe maningi amaphoyisa agcina ebulewe kulesi sigameko zokutholana phezulu nezigebengu. Lesi sifundazwe sibala nezinye ezinezinga eliphezulu lokubulawa kwabantu, njengoba izibalo zobugebengu ziveza ukuthi bangu-18 abantu ababulawayo kusona ngosuku.

ASETHUNYELWE ehhovisi likaNgqongqoshe wezoBulungiswa, uMnuz Ronald Lamola, amaphepha esicelo sokubuyiswa kwabalisa abasolwa kwelokubulala umrepha u-AKA, ababhajwe eSwatini. UMnuz Siyabonga Gezani Ndimande, obuye abizwe ngoNxele nomfowabo uMnuz Malusi Dave Ndimande, basabhajwe eSwatini. Baboshwa beseZone 4, eMbabane, eSwatini, lapho ababeqashe khona.Okhulumela iNPA KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Natasha Ramkisson-Kara, uxoxe ne-IOL yakwabo kweSolezwe Ngempelasonto echaza ngodaba. Uthe u-Adv Zungu, usekwenzile obekulindeleke ukuthi akwenze maqondana nesicelo sokubuyiswa koNdimande.“Umsebenzi wokubabuyisa uyaqhubeka ngoba uMqondisi wezokuShushisa uwasayinile amaphepha afanele wawahambisa kwaboMnyango wezoBulungiswa abaphethe umsebenzi,’’ kuchaza uNkk Kara.Izinsizwa ezimbili zakwaNdimande zisabhajwe eSwatini, lapho ezatholwa khona zigobe amadlangala. Izelamani sezivele izikhawu eNkantolo yeMantshi kwaManzini, kubhungwa udaba lokubuyiswa kwazo.U-AKA owayeyisilomo somculi wakakiswa okwenyamazane nomngani wakhe uTebello “Tizb” Matsoane, bavithizwa ngenhlamvu bashona nyakenye, eThekwini. U-AKA igama lakhe langempela okunguKiernan Forbes noTibz baficwa ngamadoda bezincokolela ngaphandle kwendawo yokudlela iWish on Florida eyagcina ivaliwe emuva kwesigameko.Isigameko sokubulawa kwabo saqoshwa amakhamera sasabalala nezwe lonke sashiya abaningi bethuthumela. Kuboshwe abalisa abayisikhombisa abasolwa ngokuba yizinkabi ezanikwa umsebenzi wokucoboshisa u-AKA.Abalisa ababili abaseSwatini, kulindeleke ukuthi uma befika bajoyine abanye abahlanu ababoshwe kuleli nasebehamba iNkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini. ONdimande abaseSwatini, uma bevela beluhlehla udaba kukhalwe ngokuthi iziphathimandla zakuleli bezingakawafaki amaphepha.Kulindeleke ukuthi babuyele eNkantolo yeMantshi kwaManzini ngoMashi 20, okunguLwesithathu oluzayo.Abalisa abahlanu bebevele eNkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini, phakathi nesonto baqala ukufaka isicelo sabo sebheyili. Abamangalelwa oMnuz Lindokuhle Mkhwanazi (30), uMnuz Lindani Ndimande (35), uMnuz Eddie Myeza (21), uMnuz Muziwethemba Gwabini (36) noMnuz Lindokuhle Ndimande yibona abavele enkantolo.UMkhwanazi noMyeza kuphela abakwazile ukufaka izicelo zabo kanti abanye kuthiwe amaphepha abo asalungiswa. Abalisa ababoshelwe kuleli kulindeleke ukuthi babuyele eNkantolo ngoMsombuluko kuqhubeke isicelo sabo sebheyili

KUYALELWE uMnyango wezeMpilo kuleli ukuthi ugxile ekulapheni abantu abahaqwe yizifo zengqondo (mental health). Kusolaka sengathi isifo siyathinteka njengoba kwanda amacala athinta udlame lokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane nezingane.Lo myalelo ukhishwe amalungu ePhalamende izolo ngesikhathi uNgqongqoshe womnyango uDkt Aaron Motsoaledi, ethula isabelomali sikaR62.2 billion, sonyaka wezimali u-2024/2025.Amalungu ePhalamende akhale ngezinto eziningi ezingalungile kwezempilo. Akhale ngezinkinga ezithinta iziguli ezihlala isikhathi eside ezibhedlela zingalutholi usizo lokuhlinzwa nezinye izinto ngenxa yokushoda kwezinsiza.UMnuz Nhlanhla Gcwabaza weqembu iMK, ukhale ngokuhamba kancane kwezinto ezibhedlela zikahulumeni. Uthe namanje izibhedlela azinalo uhlelo lwezobuchwepheshe olunemininingwane yeziguli.“Isiguli siya esibhedlela sokuqala, sithathwe igazi, sidluliselwe kwesinye isibhedlela siphinde sithathwe kabusha igazi. Lapho umuntu ugulela ukufa kodwa kudingeka alinde into angayazi. Iziguli zihlala isikhathi eside zingalutholi usizo ezibhedlela, abanye bafika ezintatha baze bagoduke bengambonanga nodokotela. IPhalamende ilona elibulala abantu ngoba kumele ngabe yilona elishaya imithetho evikela iziguli,” kusho uGcwabaza.UDkt Sophie Thembekwayo we-EFF, uthe kumele izibhedlela zivulwe amahora angu-24 ukuze kusizakale iziguli. Uthe ziningi izinto ezonakele kwezempilo ekubeni inkulu imali ehlinzekwa umnyango.UMnuz Makashule Gana weRise Mzansi, uthe kumele kuqashwe odokotela, abahlengikazi kulungiswe isimo ezibhedlela nasemitholampilo.Ukhale ngokwehla kwesibalo sabantu abadla imishanguzo yokuthithibalisa igciwane iHIV.Usihlalo wekomiti lezeMpilo uDkt Sibongiseni Dhlomo we-ANC, ukhale ngemali ekhokhwa ngumnyango ekhokhela labo abasuke befuna ukunxeshezelwa ngenxa yobudedengu bezibhedlela.Uthe ukube kunohlelo lwezobuchwepheshe olunolwazi lweziguli, ngabe abammeli abathathi amashansi ngamacala athinta ubudedengu ngoba umnyango usuke ungenayo imiqingo nolwazi oluthinta leso siguli.“Ayisukunyelwe indaba yezifo zengqondo ngoba andile namacala athinta udlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane nezingane, okungenza ukuthi umthelela isifo sengqondo. Kunesifundazwe esikhokhe uR900 million, sikhokhela amacala athinta ubudedengu bezibhedlela ngenxa yokuthi ulwazi lweziguli alukho kwezobuchwepheshe,” kusho uDhlomo.UMotsoaledi uthe bayazazi zonke izinselelo ezibhekene nomnyango wathi bayazilungisa.Uveze ukuthi bahlabela phambili nomshwalense wezempilo, iNHI.“Lo mshwalense uzosiza abantu abantulayo kuleli. Ngonyaka uhulumeni uchitha uR100 billion, ukhokhela abanama-medical aid. Le mali kumele ngabe ifakwa kwezempilo ukuze kuzuze wonke umuntu.”Uthe abasebenzi bakahulumeni, amalungu ePhalamende namajaji, baxhaswa nguhulumeni ngoR70 billion ngonyaka kuma-medical aid.Ubalule ukuthi abanye abasebenzi abanama-medical aid, noma kungathiwa basebenza kumuphi umkhakha baxhaswa nguhulumeni ngoR30 billion.“Lo R30 billion usuke ubuyiselwa labo abakhokhela ama-medical aid yisikhwama esiqoqa intela iSARS. Yingakho sithi sihlabela phambili neNHI,”kusonga uDkt Motsoaledi.Esabelweni somnyango kuvele ukuthi uR56 billion, uyiswa ezifundazweni.

UKHETHO lukazwelonke olubhekwe ngabomvu luveze ukuthi abesifazane basashaywa ngesithende uma kukhulunywa ngezikhundla eziqavile zokuhola amaqembu. Amaqembu abophele isingqongqo samadoda sengathi kumbiwa ithuna.Uma uhamba emigwaqweni yakuleli kukancane ukubona ubuso bomuntu wesifazane kukhankaswa ngabo ezingqwembeni zamaqembu.Ulokhu ukhangwa ngamadoda nje, cishe kuzo zonke izingqwembe bese uzibuza ukuthi ngabe kudalwa yini lokhu.INingizimu Afrika ilungiselela ukhetho lukazwelonke olubhekwe ngabomvu nolubekelwe uMeyi 29 nonyaka.Bangu-27.79 million abantu ababhalisele ukuvota kuleli ngokusho kwe-IEC. Lesi sibalo sinyuke kakhulu kusukela ngo-1994 kuqalwa ukuvotela intando yeningi.Cishe uhhafu walaba bantu abesifazane abhalisele ukuvota nokusho ukuthi amavoti amaningi angase avele kubona.Lokhu kusho ukuthi banombono noma bazimisele ngokubeka umbono ngokuphathwa kwezwe. Nakuba kunjalo kodwa bashaywa ngesithende uma kuza ezikhundleni ezimqoka.Amaqembu amaningi asephumele obala ngokuthi wobani ahlasela ngabo abahola umkhankaso wokhetho nabazovela ezithombeni zawo.Uma kubhekwa nje amaqembu abukwa njengamakhulu kuleli cishe wonke agadla ngamadoda, abesifazane ababonwa. Inhlangano ebusayo i-ANC ihlasela ngoMengameli uCyril Ramaphosa okungumholi wayo.Selokhu kwaqalwa ukuvota ngokwentando yeningi kuleli i-ANC ayikaze ibe nomengameli wesifazane ehlasela ngaye uma ingenele ukhetho. I-ANC iyaye ithi ayicwasi ngobuhlanga nangobulili nanoma yingayiphi indlela, kodwa lokhu kubuye kungabonakali ezikhundleni.I-DA ephikisa ngokusemthethweni ihlasela ngoMnuz John Steenhuisen ongumholi wayo. Kukhona i-EFF ehlasela ngoMnuz Julius Malema naye ongumholi wayo. I-IFP ifolosa ngoMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa naye ongumholi wayo.I-ActionSA eholwa wuMnuz Herman Mashaba ifolosa ngaye emkhankasweni wayo wokhetho.Kuvumbuke iqembu elisha uMkhonto weSizwe elesekwa wuMnuz Jacob Zuma nalo elihlasela ngaye njengokunguyena muntu ohola umkhankaso wayo.Amanye amaqembu asebamemezilile abantu agadla ngabo ezikhundleni zokuba wondunankulu bezifundazwe nakhona abesifazane abandile uma bekhona bayimithonseyana.Imihlahlandlela yokhetho nje ebiyethulwa bekulalelwe amadoda odwa esho izethembiso zokhetho, ekhongela amaqembu awo kubavoti bakuleli.Amaqembu amaningi anabo abesifazane asebenesipiliyoni, abamakhono nabafundile futhi abakhaliphe ngokwanele ukuthi bawahole.Bake bazame ukuyobayoba befuna ukuba sezikhundleni kodwa kucace ukuthi amadoda ami ngenhla.Izwe libhekene nenkinga yokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane nezingane nokuyinto okuliwa nayo nxazonke. Omunye angazibuza nje ukuthi ukushaywa ngesithende kwabesifazne, akudwebi yini isithombe sokuthi amadoda yiwona ongqo shishilizi?Akudwebi yini isithombe sokuthi abesifazane bacindezelekile. Kungabe amaqembu awakunakile yini lokhu noma awanandaba nakho?Lokhu kuvame ukubonakala ngisho amaqembu enezingqungquthela zokukhetha ubuholi, abesifazane abavamile ukunikwa izikhundla eziqavile njengokuba womengameli emaqenjini.Abesifazane baze baqale ukuvela ezikhundleni zamaphini alabo abasuke bekhethelwe kweziqavile.Baze babuye bavele uma sekujutshwa amalungu ePhalamende kodwa nakhona kuye ngokuya kwaba ngcono ngoba belwa.Uma amaqembu eneqiniso kuyofanele alubhekisise lolu daba ngoba lushiya imibuzo eminingi ngawo.

ABAHOLI bamaqembu ehlukene ezepolitiki bathembise ukuthathela izinyathelo ezinqala amalungu azophambana nemigomo yekhomishini yezokhetho njengoba kuzovotwa.Laba baholi bathembise ukuthi bazohlonipha isibopho sokuthi ukhetho lube nokuthula futhi lube ngoluphephile kanti nokuthi ngeke bagqugquzele udlame. Bakusho lokhu ngoLwesine eMidrand ngesikhathi ikhomishini yezokhetho yenze umcimbi wokuthi amaqembu asayine isibophezelo sokuthi ukhetho luzoba ngolukhululekile nolunokuthula.IPhini likaNobhala jikelele wokuqala we-ANC, uNkk Nomvula Mokonyane, lithe bahlale bezibophezele ekutheni ukhetho lube nokuthula futhi lube ngolukhululekile.Uthe bazobathathela izinyathelo ezinqala labo abazogqugquzela udlame njengoba kuzovotwa.“Abantu abaphume ngobuningi bayovota ngoba lolu khetho lubaluleke kakhulu. Kumele kube nokubekezelelana kungabikhona ukusabisana.” Umengameli we-IFP uMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa, uzibophezele ekutheni leli qembu lizogqugqugquzela ukuthula njengoba kuzovotwa.Uthe abantu ababaseke ekutheni bashintshe uhulumeni osemandleni.“Siyazibophezela ukuthi ukhetho kuzoba ngolukhululekile nokuthula.” UMnuz Jabulani Khumalo weqembu Umkhonto weSizwe, uthe umele umengameli weqembu uJacob Zuma, wathi bayazibophezela ekutheni kube nokuthula okhethweni.Uthe bazothathela izinyathelo ezinqala labo abazosabisa ngodlame nabazophambana nemigomo yekhomishini.“Sizoshintsha izinto uma sesingene emandleni. Imithetho ekhona sizoyishintsha.” UMnuz Ivan Barnes we-NFP uthe sebengcwabe inqwaba yamalungu abe yabagilwa bezigameko zokubulawa ngenxa yokuthi kunamaqembu angenakho ukubekezelelana.Uthe babalelwa ku-15 abantu asebashona bebulawa.“Siyazibophezela ekutheni ukhetho luzoba nokuthula, ngeke sigqugquzele udlame.
