Siyacela kodwa kwikhomishini ukuthi singatholi amabhokisi anamaphepha okuvota elahlwe emifuleni ukuze sithembe imiphumela yokhetho.” Umgcinimafa we-EFF uNksz Omphile Maotwe, uthembise ukuthi bazobaqondisa ubugwegwe labo abazophambana nemigomo yekhomishini wanxusa ikhomishini ukuthi iyeke ukusebenzisa othisha beSadtu uma kuvotwa.Unxuse nokuthi kungasetshenziswa amalungu eCosatu ngoba aseka i-ANC.Umholi we-DA uMnuz John Steenhuisen, uthe kulolu khetho kuyaphela ngeqembu elilodwa eliphethe amandla wathi abantu abaphume bayovota.Uthe bayazibophezela ekuhlonipheni imigomo yekhomishini nokuthi ukhetho luzoba ngolukhululekile.Ongenele ukhetho ngokuzimela uNksz Anele Mda, ugxeke ikhomishini ngokuthi besingekho isithombe sakhe.Uthe kumele baphathwe njengamanye amaqembu nakuba bengenela ngokuzimela.Useke waba yilungu le-ANC neCope kanti uthe ungenela umbango wokuya ePhalamende ngemuva kukaMeyi 29.Iqembu i-Alliance of Citizens for Change eliholwa nguMnuz Masizole Mnqasela, yilona elitonyulwe laba phezulu ephepheni lokuvota.I-AIC izoba ngaphezu kwe-ANC njengoba itonyulwe yathola amavoti amaningi njengoba kufana imibala. USihlalo we-IEC uMnuz Mosotho Moepya, unxuse amaqembu abalelwa ku-52, nabangenele ukhetho ngokuzimela abangu-12, ukuthi bahloniphe isibopho  abasenzile.Unxuse nomphakathi ukuthi usebenzisane namalungu ekhomishini ezikhungweni zokuvota.

UMKHAKHA wezolimo waseNingizimu Afrika kumele uhlale uwuqaphile umkhuhlane wezinyoni, iH5N1 osukapakele ezinkomeni zobisi,  e-United States (US) ngoba usabalaliswa yizinyoni ezihamba amazwe amaningi. Igciwane lomkhuhlane iH5N1 neH7N6 ilona elihlasele izinkukhu kuleli nyakenye, okuholele ekutheni kubulawe inqwaba yazo kodwa bewungakaze usabalalele kolunye uhlobo lwemfuyo kuleli. Yize kunjalo, abezempilo nosomnotho bathi wonke amazwe kumele aqaphe ngoba kusangenzeka nakwamanye amazwe leli gciwane litholakale nakolunye uhlobo lwemfuyo okungezona izinkukhu nezinyoni. Kungokokuqala ukuthi leli gciwane liphathe izinkomo nabantu. UMnuz Wandile Sihlobo owusomnotho kwi-Agricultural Business Chamber of SA, uthe okwamanje lo mkhuhlane kusabikwe ukuthi usabalalele ezinkomeni e-US kodwa iNingizimu Afrika kumele ihlale iqaphile ngoba ukulawula kwezifo zezilwane kuleli kuya ngokuya kuba ntekenteke. USihlobo uqhube wathi ukuqubuka kwezifo zezilwane  ezifana nesifo samatele, i-swine fever, kungubufakazi bokuthi kunobuthakathaka endleleni izwe elilawula ngayo izifo, ukudla okudliwa izilwane nemigomo elawula ukuphathwa kokudla  kuleli.Uthe ukubheduka kwezifo kunciphisa inzuzo kubalimi  kuphinde kuphazamise nokuthunyelwa kokudla kwamanye amazwe.Kusolwa ukuthi leli gciwane liqale ngoMashi, ukusabalala e-US  lagcina selihlasela izinkomo nabasebenza emapulazini kuleliya lizwe. Akacaci kahle ukuthi zingaki izinkomo zobisi ezinaleli gciwane kanjalo nabasebenza emapulazini, isikhungo esibhekelele izifo, iFood and Drug Administration  (FDA), sisaphenya. Inhloko yophiko olubhekelele umkhuhlane, enhlanganweni yezempilo emhlabeni, World Health Organisation (WHO), uDkt Wenqing Zhang, uthe maningi amathuba okuthi lo mkhuhlane usabalalele ezilwaneni obungakaze uziphathe nakwamanye amazwe ngoba usatshalaliswa izinyoni ezizulazula emhlabeni wonke."Lo mkhuhlane ophatha izinyoni, ubujwayele ukuthi usabalalele ezinkukhwini  nasemakatini asendle, manje sesithole ukuthi kuyenzeka ungene nasemfuyweni eyizinkomo, yize kungavamile. Amathuba okuthi abantu bawuthole lo mkhuhlane mancane kakhulu kodwa sinxusa  ukuthi abantu base-US baphuze ubisi oluke laphekwa kubulawa amagciwane, kuphela okwamanje,“ kusho uZhang.

ISIPHENDUKE inkomo yomqhoyiso eyokuxoshwa kwemeya yaKwaDukuza, uNksz Lindile Nhaca, izinhlaka ze-ANC azivumelani ngalolu daba, naye uNksz Nhaca akavumi ukwehla esikhundleni.UNksz Nhaca useludlulisele kunobhala jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, udaba lokuxoshwa kwakhe, ukhala ngokuthi uboshelwa amanqina enyathi.Izinhlaka ze-ANC esifundeni iGeneral Gizenga Mpanza, i-ANC Women’s League (ANCWL) neYouth League (ANCYL), seziphumele obala zaphikisa isinqumo sokuxoshwa kukaNksz Nhaca.Isinqumo sokuxoshwa kukaNksz Nhaca, esiyingxenye yezinguquko ezizokwenziwa ebuholini bomkhandlu, simenyezelwe unobhala we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Bheki Mtolo, ngoLwesihlanu.UMtolo watshela abezindaba ukuthi umhlangano wesigungu esiphezulu kwi-ANC uthathe isinqumo sokwenza izinguquko ebuholini bomkhandlu ukuze kube nozinzo.UMtolo wenza le simemezelo nje ngoJulayi kwaputshuka inkulumo yakhe lapho ayetshela amakhansela e-ANC kulo mkhandlu ukuthi uNksz Nhaca uzokhonjwa indlela.Ngesikhathi ekhuluma emhlanganweni namakhansela, uMtolo wathi esikhaleni sikaNksz Nhaca bazofaka uMnuz Njabulo Cele, oyikhansela le-ANC emkhandlwini.Encwadini ayibhalele uMbalula, uNksz Nhaca ukhale ngokuthi akazange anikezwe ithuba lokuziphendulela ezinsolweni abekwa zona.“Ziningi izinsolo ezenziwe uMtolo ngami engibala kuzo nalezo azenza ngesikhathi ehlangene namakhansela e-ANC KwaDukuza. Ngikugwemile ukuthi ngiyomphendula esidlangaleni. Sekuyacaca manje ukuthi ngiboshelwa amanqina enyathi.”UNksz Nhaca uthe umhlangano wesigungu esiphezulu esifundeni iGeneral Gizenga Mpanza wasichitha isiphakamiso sokuthi axoshwe.UMasipala waKwaDukuza iwona onesabelomali esiningi komasipala abangaphansi kukaMasipala wesiFunda Ilembe njengoba isabelomali sakulo nyaka singu-R2.7 billion.I-ANCWL ne-ANCWL esifundeni iGeneral Gizenga babe nesithangami nabezindaba ngokuhlanganyela, lapho begxeke khona imizamo yokuxosha uNksz Nhaca.Usihlalo we-ANCWL esifundeni, uNkk Malindi Zondi, uthe ukwenza izinguquko kuMasipala waKwaDukuza kungaphazamisa i-ANC kubo bonke omasipala abasesifundeni Ilembe.UNkk Zondi uthe umkhandlu usebenza kahle ebuholini bukaNksz Nhaca.Usole uMtolo ngokubukela phansi ubuholi besifazane.Umdidiyeli we-ANCYL esifundeni, uMnuz Ndabenhle Mzoneli, uthe abafuna ukuxosha uNksz Nhaca kufanele babize umhlangano wesigungu esiphezulu esifundeni, kuxoxwe lolu daba.“Umthetho we-ANC usho njalo. Asikho isinqumo esike sathathwa ubuholi be-ANC esifundeni obuthi akuxoshwe imeya. Imeya isebenza kahle, ngakho asikho isidingo sokuthi ixoshwe.”

YIZE obeyisikhulu soMnyango wezoLimo eCedara ehambe emhlabeni engakutholanga ukuhlonishwa ngeziqu zobudokotela kodwa imibhalo yakhe inothise imisebenzi eminingi yezobuciko. UMnuz Phumekhaya “Volovolo” Memela (54), owazakhela udumo ngengosi ayeyiloba kwiSolezwe, Ngeso LikaVolovolo, ushone emuva kokugula isikhashana.  Izindaba, zokudlula kwalesi silomo, zidalulwe wumshana waso, uMnuz Sbusiso Dlamini. Ngokusho kukaDlamini, umufi (54) ushonele esibhedlela saseThekwini, iNetcare Umhlanga ngoLwesibili, ngezithuba zabo-3 ntambama. “Umalume ubengeniswe kulesi sibhedlela ephethwe wumkhuhlane ngoLwesihlanu. Ukugula kumqinise kakhulu ngeSonto, kwahluleka ngisho esefakwa i-oxygen, kodwa kwavele kwanyuka iphika, wagcina esenenkinga yokuphefumula.” UVolovolo, obebuye azibize ngeNkosi yasePhoyinti, waqala ukubhala izindaba ezihlekisayo ephephandabeni, Um’Afrika ngokwabelana inkundla no-Ignatius “Zondisiqatha” Mdadane. Sekusungulwe Isolezwe, uVolovolo wabe esebhalela ingosi eyayibizwa Ngeso LikaVolovolo. Kafushane, umufi ubenekhono eliyisimanga lokukwazi ukudingida udaba olunohlonze ngendlela yakhe enamancoko. Abafundi beSolezwe bebehleka baze babhuquze uma befunda amancoko kaVolovolo. Imibhalo yakhe ibuye yacashunwa nangabalobi nezifundiswa eziningi okubalwa kuzo noMark Sanders kwi-Learning Zulu. A Secret History of language in South Africa. Wits University Press 2016. Lokhu kuvela embhalweni owahlaziywa ngo-Okthoba 6,  2017 nguWilhelm Weber. Nakwi-https://www.degruyter.com, umbhalo kaVolovolo utuswa kakhulu.Nombhali onohlonze kuleli, uSbusiso Q Mbhele, ubuye akuveze ukuthi ubewemfundi wengosi kaVolovolo njengoba ebhale kanje endabeni yakhe ethi Ingwijikhwebu, “intombi yakho ngapha, ungiphenya izidwaba ngeso likaVolovolo, uyangikhumula...” Amagalelo kaVolovolo abuye atuswe embhalweni okwi: https://www.grafiati.com.UDlamini uchaze umufi njengomuntu obemnene emndenini nasemalungeni omphakathi, enothando emndenini futhi okhulise ngisho abashana. ”Ubenothando ngendlela eyinqaba. Usikhulisile, evulelekile, enakekela futhi ephila.“UVolovolo ushiye emhlabeni umkakhe, uNkk Mbali KaMaphumulo Memela nezingane ezintathu, okunguSthembile, uLubanzi noNdalo Memela. Phakathi kweziqu abenazo kubalwa iziqu zezokuxhumana azithola eNyuvesi yase-South Africa (Unisa).Yize umufi ebesenomuzi endaweni yaseTafuleni, eNanda, kodwa uzofihlwa emathuneni akubo lapho abedabuka khona eSeafort, eDonnybrook, ngoMgqibelo, wangoSepthemba 7 emuva kwenkonzo ezokuba ngo-10 kubo.

USOMLOMO wePhalamende uNkk Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula, uthi akayi phansi engandlalelwe kwabafuna ukumgaxa ozankosi ngezinsolo zenkohlakalo.Kusabalale imibiko yokuthi uzovela enkantolo emuva kokuthi abaphenyi bepekequle umuzi wakhe. Uhlabe ikhefu elikhethekile emuva kokuqonga kwalezi zindaba. Ibalelwa ku-R4 million imali okuthiwa wanikwa yona egwazelwa.UNkk Mapisa-Nqakula ubhekene nezinsolo ezibucayi zokugwazelwa ngezigidi okuthiwa wayezinikwa ngesikhathi esewungqongqoshe. Kuthiwa usomabhizinisi uthi wayehlala egqigqa kuNkk Mapisa-Nqakula eyocubuza amagabade ngamasaka emali.Ubelokhu ezihlangula ethi umsulwa akaze enze inkohlakalo futhi ethi usola ukuthi kukhona abazama ukungcolisa igama lakhe.UNkk Mapisa-Nqakula ufake isicelo senkantolo esiphuthumayo ethi akuvinjwe ukuboshwa kwakhe. Emaphepheni uveza nokuthi ucela ukunikwa idokodo lophenyo nezitatimende zofakazi abone kahle konke.Iphalamende likhiphe isitatimende lichitha imibiko yokuboshwa kukaNkk Mapisa-Nqakula lithi usekhaya nomndeni wakhe uyalusebenza udaba.Lishona nje ayicaci ekaNkk Mapisa-Nqakula kodwa abeSABC bebenkanise esangweni lomuzi wakhe. Bekubonakala abaqaphi bakhe beyaluza bephuma bengena khona. Kubonakale nendoda yomlungu iphuma nepotimende yashaya imoto yachitha.Iqembu eliphikisayo ePhalamende iDA ithe awukho umthetho ogunyaza ukuthi uSomlomo athathe ikhefu elikhethekile. I-DA ithe ifuna ukufaka isicelo sokungabethembi ubuholi bukaSomlomo bese iyamketula.I-ANC nayo ike yakhipha isitatimende ithi iyazi ngodaba lukaSomlomo futhi iyasemukela isinqumo sakhe sokushenxa esikhundleni. Ithe yona ilinde ukuthi abomthetho bathini bese iqhubeka nodaba.

I-ACTIONSA KwaZulu-Natal ikhathazwa isimo samabhilidi asenkabeni yeTheku anganakwe muntu, asesetshenziswa abokufika kuleli.Lokhu kuvezwe umholi waleli qembu kulesi sifundazwe, uMnuz Zwakele Mncwango, ngesikhathi ehambele amabhilidi ngoLwesihlanu.UMncwango uthe inhloso yokuhambela amabhilidi bekungukuthi bayohlola isimo nokwenzekayo ngaphakathi kuwo.Uthe kuyakhathaza ukuthi bathole ukuthi iningi lamabhilidi lisesimweni esingagculisi, wathi banezinsolo ezinkulu zokuthi kwenziwa izinto ezingalungile kuwo.“Amaningi awo aqhwagwe ngabokufika kuleli. Size sathola nokuthi omunye usomabhizinisi onesitolo kwelinye lamabhilidi, uvale isitolo sakhe ngaphambi kokufika kwethu, okudweba isithombe esicacile sokuthi kula mabhilidi kuqhutshwa imishikashika engalungile,” kusho uMncwango.Uthe okukhathazayo ukuthi amabhilidi anganakiwe awagcini nje ngokuba yizindawo zokuhlala ngokungemthetho kodwa ayinkundla lapho kwenziwa khona izinto ezingalungile.“Lokho kubeka engcupheni ezokuphepha zomphakathi,” usho kanje.Wenze iziphakamiso zokungenziwa ukuze amabhilidi asetshenziswe kangcono umphakathi.“Eyokuqala into engenziwa ukuthi alungiswe kahle, aphendulwe izindawo zokuhlala ezingambi eqolo njengoba sazi ukuthi iseyinkinga indaba yezindawo zokuhlala eThekwini. Ukuphendula la mabhilidi abe yizindawo zokuhlala ezishibhile, kuzonika usizo lwendawo yokuhlala edingekayo kubantu abadonsa kanzima, kuphinde kuqinisekise ukuthi bahlala endaweni ephephile nehloniphekile,” kusho yena.Uthe okunye okungenziwa ukuthi zilungiswe bese ziphendulwa izindawo zokusebenza kosomabhizinisi abancane.“Zingaphendulwa ama-hub aseqophelweni eliphezulu, asize osomabhizinisi abasafufusa ukuthi baqhube amabhizinisi abo ezindaweni ezikahle. Lokho kungalekelela ekutheni kufukuleke umnotho, kwakhe namathuba omsebenzi,” kusho yena.Uthe bayakholwa ukuthi uma kungalungiswa isimo samabhilidi, idolobha lungathuthuka kakhulu bese lokho kuphucula impilo yezakhamuzi zeTheku nezokuphepha.

UMHOLI weRise Mzansi, uMnuz Songezo Zibi, ukhala ngezaguga ezingamalungu ePhalamende ezishaya imithetho ethi abantu abaneminyaka engaphezu kuka-35 abangabekwa phambili uma kunamathuba emisebenzi.UZibi uthe esikhundleni sokuthi kuncishwe abantu abaneminyaka engaphezu kuka-35 amathuba emisebenzi, kufanele engabe kushanelwa zonke izaguga ePhalamende.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi iRise Mzansi KwaZulu-Natal yethula umqulu wezethembiso zokhetho, eThekwini, ngoLwesine.UZibi uthe siphelile isikhathi sezaguga ePhalamende naseziShayamthetho.Uthe iqembu lakhe ligadla ngabantu abasha njengoba kuyiwa okhethweni.Wenze isibonelo ngomele iRise Mzansi embangweni wesikhundla sikaNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nonkululeko Hlongwane-Mhlongo, oneminyaka engaphansi kwengu-40.“Akafani nalaba baholi abadala abanitshela ukuthi senibadala uma nineminyaka engu-35, kodwa bona baneminyaka engaphezu kuka-70,  basengamalungu ePhalamende. IKwaZulu-Natal ifanelwe ukuba nomholi osemusha, onamaqhinga okutakula isifundazwe.”UNkk Hlongwane-Mhlongo uthe uma benqoba iKwaZulu-Natal okhethweni abantu abaneminyaka engaphezu kuka-35 angeke bashiywe ngaphandle.“Abantu abaneminyaka engu-35 noma kufanele banikezwe amathuba, bakwazi ukuziphilisa. Sizokuqeda ukucwaswa kwabantu abaneminyaka engu-35. Bonke abantu kufanele banikezwe amathuba afanayo, kuqashwe abantu abafanelwe umsebenzi.”UNkk Hlongwane-Mhlongo uthembise ukuthuthukisa amahostela nemijondolo uma benqoba ukhetho.Uthe abantu abahlala kulezi zindawo baphila ngaphansi kwezimo ezingezinhle.“Sizosebenzisana nezinhlangano Ubunye bamaHostela, naBahlali baseMjondolo, ukuqeda izinkinga ezikhungethe izindawo eziyimijondolo koCato Manor naseChesterville. Izimo zenhlalo kulezi zindawo azizinhle. Kubhoke ubugebengu, kusocongwa abaholi bemiphakathi.“Emahostela izindlu okuhlala kuzo obaba bethu nabafowethu, zihlukaniswe ngamakhethenisi. Uhulumeni utshela abantu ukuthi abazohlala nemindeni yabo ngaphansi kwalezimo lezi. Amahostela kufanele athuthukiswe ukuze abantu bezokwazi ukuhlala nemindeni yabo kuwo.”UNkk Hlongwane-Mhlongo uthe bazobuqeda nya ubugebengu obudlangile kulesi sifundazwe.“Sizosusa izigebengu emiphakathini. Lokhu sizokwenza ngokubambisana nezinhlangano ezilwa nobugebengu.”UNkk Hlongwane-Mhlongo uthe bazosebenzisana nezinhlangano ezilwela amalungelo abantu, nezingenzi nzuzo.Uthe bazokwenza ngcono ezemfundo, ezempilo, baphinde babeke phambili abaphila nokukhubazeka.

KUGQUGQUZELWE ababhalisele i-Unemployment Insurance Fund (UIF) ukuba baye emahhovisi omnyango wezabasebenzi ukuze basizakale.Lokhu kuza emuva kokumiswa kwezinsiza ze-UIF ukuba zitholakale kumakhompyutha (online) nakumaselula njengoba inkantolo inqume ukuthi akumiswe inkampani ebhekelele lezi zinsiza.UMnyango wezabaSebenzi wathula uhlelo lokuthola izinsiza ze-UIF online nakumaselula ukuze unciphise olayini abade emahhovisi awo. Abantu abafaka izicelo ze-UIF yilabo abasuke bephelelwe wumsebenzi, abakhulelwe nabanye abasuke begunyazwa wumthetho ngenxa yezimo ababhekene nazo.UNgqongqoshe wezemiSebenzi, uNkk Nomakhosazana Meth, uthe njengoba inkantolo imise le nkampani kusho ukuthi okwamanje izinsiza ze-UIF ngeke zithokakale online, ngeke zenzeke nakumaselula.“Sicela abantu baye emahhovisi oMnyango wezemiSebenzi ukuze bathole izinsiza ze-UIF. Sizolula nesikhathi sokusebenza ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu bayasizakala. Siyazi vele ukuthi ukungatholakali kwezinsiza online kuzoholela ekutheni kugcwale abantu emahhovisi,” kusho uNkk Meth.Uxolisile kubantu ngokuphazamiseka okudalwa wukungatholakali kwezinsiza ze-UIF online, esho ukuthi bekufanele balandele isinqumo senkantolo.Uthembise ukuthi uzosebenzisana nezinhlaka ezifanele ukuze enze isiqiniseko sokuthi isimo esinjengalesi asiphindi sibe khona.“Sicela abantu basibekezelele ngesikhathi sisalungisa lolu daba lokutholakala kwezinsiza ze-UIF online. Sizobazisa abantu ukuthi kwenzekani ngesikhathi esifanele, uma sezibuya izinsiza. Siyaxolisa ngokuphazamiseka okube khona,” kusho uNkk Meth.

INGXABANO phakathi kukanomehlo nekhansela iholele ekutheni izintombi nto zaKwaMashu, zingayi emhlangeni.Unomehlo uthi ikhansela lamsongela ngokuthi lizombamba ngoba uvotele i-MK, kuthe uma selingasamniki amafomu agcwalisayo wabona ukuthi beliqinisile, langamtshela nangemihlangano. NgoLwesihlanu, umhloli webhasi uthe kuvumeleke ukuthi agibelise izintombi eziyisikhombisa ekubeni abanye onomehlo bebegibelisa ezingu-15.Izintombi ezihlolwa uNkk Thulisile Ngema, uMaBiyela, zijike esitobhini. Zahamba nabazali ziyobuza edepho ukuthi kungani kuthiwa azibe yisikhombisa, kwathiwa azibuze ikhansela, kube yilo elizocacisa. Kuthiwa ikhansela lishayelwa ucingo, lathi aliyingeni indaba yomuntu owavotela i-MK.Ngakolunye uhlangothi, ikhansela lithi aliyanga koxazulula lokhu kudideka ngoba belimatasatasa futhi onomehlo babetsheliwe ukuthi unomehlo ngamunye uzohamba nezintombi eziwu-15, kodwa uNkk Ngema wafika nenqwaba.UNkk Ngema uthe ezinye izintombi bezizohamba ngenye imoto, ezingu-15 zingene ebhasini. Kuphoqeleke ukuthi zingabe zisahamba zonke. "Ngangicabanga ukuthi uyazisholo nje uma ethi uzongibamba ngoba ekloloda ngesikhathi sokhetho, nakhona angazi ukuthi wayeze athi ngivotele i-MK nje, walibonaphi ivoti lami? Ikhansela liqale langanginika amafomu, lanikeza omunye unomehlo, lingishiya ngiwumakhelwane. Lowo nomehlo wanginika amafomu. Ngamangala ukuthi amafomu sengiwanikwa umuntu wakwesinye isigceme ekubeni ikhansela liwumakhelwane," kusho yena.Ikhansela uNksz Mafiki Zondi ezihlangula, uthe ubengeke aye edepho ayosayinela ibhasi njengoba bekusho uNkk Ngema ngoba umasipala ubesewakhokhele amabhasi ahambayo. "Angimzomdi uNkk Ngema, umakhelwane wami. Uma eyi-MK nayo angiyizondi. Ngiyile ekuseni (ngoMgqibelo) ngayobachazela ukuthi uhlelo lokuya emhlangeni beluthini. Omama bezingane ngibachazelile ngoba bagcine behleli nezingane kwaze kwaba uMgqibelo. Angihlangene nohlelo lonke, yebo amafomu afikela kimi ekhaya. Nganikeza omunye unomehlo, wamnika. Kwase kumele baqhubeke batshelane ngokuzolandela. Bengingeke ngiye kubantu abese belwa besedepho ebusuku,“ kusho yena.

IZIHLATHI zivakashela izindlebe kubasebenzi bomasipala emuva kokusayinwa kwesivumelwano esizobanyusela amaholo ngo-6%.Lesi sivumelwano seminyaka emihlanu kulindeleke ukuthi silethe uzinzo komasipala abawu-257 abangaphansi kwe-South African Local Government Association (Salga).UNobhala Jikelele we-South African Municipal Workers Union (Samwu), uMnuz Dumisane Magagula, uthe lesi sivumelwano sizokhuphula amaholo abasebenzi abawu-300 000 abaqashwe komasipala.“Emuva kwezingxoxo ebezinzima sikwazile ukutholela abasebenzi u-6%. Lokhu kusho ukuthi imali izonyuka ngo-4.5% kusukela ngoJulayi 1 walo nyaka bese kunezezelwa u-1.5% ngoMashi wonyaka ozayo. Yisivumelwano seminyaka emihlanu esizoqinisekisa ukuthi umthwalo uyehla emahlombe abasebenzi njengoba impilo ibiza.”Uveze ukuthi abasebenzi abahola u-R22 000 nangaphansi, abangenaso isibonelelo sezindlu bazothola u-R2 000 ozokhokhwa kunyaka wokuqala wesivumelwano.Uthe bazoqhubeka benze uphenyo ukuthi abasebenzi abangasitholi isibonelelo sezindlu bangalekelelwa kanjani. Lolu phenyo luzophothulwa ngoMashi wonyaka ozayo.“Isivumelwano seminyaka emihlanu sizoqinisekisa ukuthi kunozinzo komasipala ngoba abasebenzi ngeke baphoqeleke ukuthi bayokhuluma indaba yamaholo ngenxa yezivumelwano zeminyaka embalwa. Kuzosiza omasipala ukuba bathumele izidingo kubantu,” kusho uMagagula.ISalga ikuqinisekisile ukuthi amaholo anyuswe ngo-6% ezingxoxweni ebezenganyelwe yiSouth African Local Government Bargaining Council.Kulezi zingxoxo abasebenzi bebemelwe yiSamwu ne-Independent Municipal and Allied Trade Union (Imatu).Izingxoxo ziqale ngoJulayi 15.I-Imatu nayo ithe isivumelwano sizoletha uzinzo komasipala kanti yize isivumelwano sisayinwe ngoLwesihlanu kodwa amaholo azonyuka kusukela ngoJulayi nonyaka.

IZIHLATHI zivakashela izindlebe kubasebenzi bomkhakha wensimbi emuva kokuthi izinyunyana zabo zisayine isivumelwano sokuthi amaholo abo anyuswe ngo-7% kusukela ngoJulayi.UNobhala Jikelele weNational Union of Metalworkers of South Africa (Numsa), uMnuz Irvin Jim umemezele ukuthi basayine isivumelwano seminyaka emithathu nabaqashi ngoMsombuluko.Uthe amaholo azonyuka ngo-7% ngonyaka wokuqala bese ngonyaka wesibili nowesithathu anyuke ngo-6%.Uveze ukuthi babuye bakwazi nokuphakamisa udaba lokuthi abasebenzi baxhaswe uma beuthenga izindlu.“Kuzobhekwa ukuthi imali ezosiza abasebenzi ukuthenga izindlu izotholakala kanjani bese siyaziswa kungakapheli izinyanga ezintathu.Siyajabula ukuthi sivumelane nabaqashi ngoba siye sabacela ukuthi beze nemali engcono. Sitholele abasebenzi isivumelwano esingaphezu kwamandla emali njengoba eku-5.3% thina sathola u-7%,” kusho uJim.Izinyunyana ezisayine isivumelwano yi-UASA eyayibizwa nge-United Association of South Africa, Numsa, South African Equity Workers Association (Saewa) neMetal and Electrical Workers’ Union of South Africa (Mewusa). INational Union of Mineworkers ithe isazokhuluma namalungu ayo.Inyunyana ezigqaja ngokumela abasebenzi abanamakhono (ama-artisan nonjiniyela), iSolidarity, ithe ayihambisani nalesi sivumelwano ngoba amalungu ayo azonyuselwa amaholo ngo-6% bese kufana nokuthi anyuswe ngo-2% uma sekudonswe imali edonswa nyangazonke.

EMUVA kweminyaka emine aboshelwa ukuphehla udweshu lomtapo ngoJulayi 2021, uMnuz Bonginkosi Khanyile (34) useze wanikwa usuku okuzoqulwa ngalo icala.INkantolo yesiFunda yaseThekwini ikubekele uMashi 2025, ukuqulwa kwecala elithweswe uKhanyile oseyilungu loMkhonto weSizwe (MK) Party.UKhanyile ongaphandle ngebheyili ka-R5 000, uvele kule nkantolo ngoMsombuluko ngesikhathi kuphothulwa izindlalelo zokuqala kwecala.UMbuso uhlele ukubiza ofakazi abangu-62, usebenzise ama-video, izithombe nezingxoxo zakuWhatsApp uqinisa ibhawodi.UKhanyile uthe usamile emazwini awasho mhlazane ededelwa ngebheyli ukuthi umsulwa kodwa unqanyulezelwa ukuthi walwa nokuvalelwa ejele kowayengumengameli wezwe, uMnuz Jacob Zuma.Uqhube wathi noma seliphothuliwe icala, uyophuma phambili ngoba akukho muntu amyalela ukuthi atape, ashise noma abulawe.Icala lihlelelwe ukuba liqale ngoMashi 3 kuya kuMashi 15, 2025.“Icala anginalo. Into eyaba inkinga ukuthi ngasuke ngakhankasela ukuthi ubaba uNxamalala akhishwe ejele ngoba wayeboshwe engakaze avele enkantolo. Kwakuphulwa amalungelo akhe nguMengameli (Cyril) Ramaphosa nowayeyiNhloko yamaJaji uZondo,” kusho uKhanyileUqhube wathi iyona into esamgqigqisa enkantolo namanje.UMbuso usola uKhanyile ngokuba sekhaleni ekuphehleni izibhelu ngokuthi agqugquzele abantu ukuthi bavuke injebomvu emuva kokuboshwa kukaZuma. UKhanyile ukhale ngokuthi amacala athinta izibhelu ayebhekene nabanye abantu, okubalwa kubona amaNdiya ePhoenix,  “asulwa.”Uqhube wathi lawo maNdiya asahamba amacala kawanayo imibandela yebheyili yena anikezwa yona.“Njalo ngesonto kumele ngiyovela emaphoyiseni ngisayine. UCyril wathatha isinqumo sokuthi wonke umuntu oweseka uZuma uzomphilisa kanzima. Ingakho ngigqigqa inkantolo ngaphucwa ne-passport,” kuchaza uKhanyile.Uthe noma ngabe icala liyamgojela, yena uyobe azi ukuthi umsulwa ngoba ayikho impahla nezinxanxathela zezitolo azithungela ngomlilo futhi akukho akweba.

KUZOCACA ngoLwesine ukuthi wenza njani uthishanhloko wasesikoleni iMpumulwane Primary, KwaMaphumulo, uMnuz Sithembiso Khumalo (53), osolwa ngokubandakanyeka ecaleni lokubulawa kwephoyisa loMkhandlu weTheku, uCaptain Thomas Ntombela.Umufi wadutshulwa wabulawa esemzini wakhe okwa-S, eMlaza, ngoMeyi 3, nyakenye. Kuthiwa wahlaselwa ngabesilisa abangazange babuze lutho ngesikhathi evula isango.Waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela eSiphingo Medical Towers okuyilapho okwafike kwamenela khona.Ngemuva kwalokho, kwaboshwa inkabi uSipho Ntombela eyayikade isekubhaceni. Le nkabi yagcina seyigeqa amagula enkantolo, yaveza ukuthi yayithunywe nguNkk Faith Ntombela ogane umufi.Wakhalelwa ngamasongo kaSigonyela uNkk Ntombela, kusuka lapho ugqigqa enkantolo.Icala labe selidluliselwa eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini. Emasontweni amabili edlule, enkantolo kwavela ukuthi uNkk Ntombela uyalivuma icala bobabili nenkabi esatshwayo KwaZulu Natal, uKhulani Cele, nayo okwavela ukuthi iyabandakanyeka etulweni lokubulawa kukamufi.UKhumalo naye owaboshwa eyamaniswa naleli cala kwavela ukuthi wayesebenzisana noNkk Ntombela kukhandwa itulo lokubulala umufi.Kuvela ukuthi kumethusile uKhumalo ukuvuma kwalaba icala futhi akazi ukuthi kumele enze njani.Ngaphambilini, inkantolo ike yakhipha isexwayiso esishubile isibhekise ngqo kuKhumalo sokuthi makahlukane nokulokhu enza imizamo yokuxhumana nenkabi engaphakathi ngaleli cala, uSipho Ntombela.Namhlanje, kulindeleke ukuthi kucace ukuthi njengoba laba ababili sebelivuma icala yena uKhumalo uzokwenzanjani.UKhumalo ungaphandle ngebheyili ayithola nyakenye, ngoDisemba, ngesikhathi leli cala lisaqhubeka eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMlaza.Ngaphambilini kwavela ukuthi isibhamu esabulala umufi satholakala sigqitshiwe egcekeni likaKhumalo KwaMaphumulo.

ABASABUTHI quthu ubuthongo abanye abantu baseZimangweni, oThongathi, abakhahlanyezwe yimvula enamandla ehambisana nomoya njengoba bebalisa ngokuthi kukhona asebesebenzisa ithuba ukweba izimpahla zabo.Kuvela ukuthi kunamaphara abhokile antshontsha izimpahla ezibekwe ngaphandle kwezindlu ezidilikile.Isolezwe  lihambele kule ndawo lathola ngamalungu omphakathi ukuthi amaphara awazibekile phansi eba izimpahla.UMnuz Petros Ndimande, ongomunye wabadilikelwe, uthe uyaphoqeleka ukuthi angalali agade izimpahla zakhe ezincane ezisele."Uma kungahamba lezi ezincane izimpahla ezisele ngabe ngilimele kakhulu,'' usho kanje.Uthe bayafisa ukuthi kube khona usizo abalutholayo kuhulumeni ukuze bezokwazi ukulungisa izindlu zabo ngokushesha. Ubekhuluma ematasa eshayela ukhethe njengoba ebevusa indlu yakhe ephephukile. "Ngibone kungcono ukuthi okwamanje ngibe ngizilungisela indlu yami,'' usho kanje.Uthe ubekade ehlala namalungu omndeni wakhe amabili kodwa kumphoqile ukuthi awagodukise njengoba isimo sibonakala simapeketwane.UMnuz Bongani Dlamini naye uthe kuyabaphoqa ukuthi baziqaphe izimpahla zabo ngoba uma kungenjalo kungasa sezingekho.Naye ubeseqalile elungisa indlu yakhe eshayela nokhethe. "Singakujabulela ukuthi lusheshe usizo uma kuwukuthi sizogcina silutholile,'' usho kanje.Nayizolo izikhulu zikahulumeni bezisaqhubeka nokugqigqa kule ndawo. UMphathiswa wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi KwaZulu Natal, uNkk Nonhlanhla Khoza uhambele kule ndawo.Uqale ngokuyoduduza umndeni wakwaZikhali lapho okudlule khona indodakazi yakhona uNksz Sisana Nyawo (39).Umufi kuvela ukuthi ulinyazwe kabi yisihlahla esiwele phezu kwakhe. Unina uNkk Nelly Zikhali ubedinda isililo ebalisa ngomshophi omvelele.UNkk Khoza uthe bazibophezele ekutheni bangenelele ukuze bazithole ukusizakala ngezindlela ezahlukene abantu abakhahlamezekile.Uthe umndeni wakwaZikhali bazowulekelela njengoba kukhona oshonile. Bekukhona neMeya yeTheku, uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda, oveze ukuthi kunezinhlelo zokuthi bakhelwe izindlu ezisemgangathweni abantu bakule ndawo.IMeya yaseKing Cetshwayo, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, unikezele ngosizo lokudla kubantu abakhahlamezekile. Uthe kuyishwa okuvelile.Iqembu i-MK nalo belihambele khona liyolekelela ngokuya ngasethunjini ukuze abantu bangadliwa inkemane njengoba besele dengwane.

UTHELE izithelo ezinhle umkhankaso wamaphoyisa wokulwa nobugebengu elokishini laseNanda, enyakatho yeTheku.Lokhu kulandela ukuboshwa abasolwa abayisithupha abebefunelwa amacala abucayi.Laba basolwa baboshwe ngokusa kwangoLwesibili, eMzinyathi, ngemuva kokuthi amaphoyisa alunywe indlebe ngokubonakala kwalaba basolwa.“Amaphoyisa afike emzini oseMzinyathi lapho abasolwa ebebecashe khona athola abasolwa abayisithupha, kwaphunyuka oyedwa.”Laba bebefunelwa amacala odlame lwasemphakathini okubalwa kuwo nawokubulala unobhala we-ANC kuwadi 53 uThanduxolo Sthandathu, owayedume ngelika-General. “Abasolwa abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-19 no-29 ubudala, batholwe nezibhamu ezimbili, esisodwa sicishwe izinombolo zaso namamagazini amabili agcwele izinhlamvu.”Laba bazovela phambi kweNkantolo yeMantshi yaseNtuzuma, ngoLwesibili. Ukuboshwa kwabo kulandela okwangesonto eledlule lapho kwaboshwa khona abasolwa abahlanu ababonakala kuma-video ezinkundleni zokuxhumana becanasa, bedlalisa izibhamu. Nabo laba bazovela ngoLwesithathu kuyo le nkantolo.

BABHEKE ukuthi uMkhosi woMhlanga wakulo nyaka uhanjelwe isibalo sabantu esiphezulu kwesake sabonwa kulo mkhosi waminyaka yonke.UMnyango wezoBuciko namaSiko KwaZulu-Natal, uthe ulindele amatshitshi angaphezu kuka-40 000 ukuba abe ingxenye yomkhosi wakulo nyaka.Ngokwezibalo zomnyango, isibalo sijwayele ukuba u-35 000.Umkhosi wakulo nyaka uyingqophamlando njengoba kuzobungazwa iminyaka engu-40 kwavuselelwa lolu siko.UMkhosi woMhlanga wavuselelwa iNdlovukazi uShiyiwe Mantfombi Dlamini Zulu ngo-1984.Umlando uveza ukuthi umkhosi wangalowo nyaka wawuhanjelwe amatshitshi angu-500.UMkhosi woMhlanga wakulo nyaka uzoqala esigodlweni eMachobeni, eNgwavuma.Lo mkhosi uzokuba izinsuku ezimbili, uLwesihlanu noMgqibelo, kulindeleke ukuthi uhanjelwe amatshitshi angu-5 000.Ngesonto elizayo kuzoba nomkhosi omkhulu esigodlweni eNyokeni, kwaNongoma.Umkhosi uzothatha izinsuku ezintathu, uzoqala ngoLwesihlanu, futhi kulindeleke ukuthi uhanjelwe amatshitshi angu-40 000.Okhulumela umnyango, uMnuz Ntando Mnyandu, uthe konke sekumi ngomumo.“Indlunkulu kaZulu ngokubambisana nohulumeni wesifundazwe, omasipala kanye nezinye izinhlaka sebekulungele ukwamukela amatshitshi aqhamuka kuzo zonke izifunda ezingu-11 zaKwaZulu-Natal, aqhamuka ezifundazweni ezingomakhelwane iMpumalanga neGauteng, kanye naqhamuka eSwatini.”UMnyandu uthe balindele ubukhazikhazi emkhosini wakulo nyaka.“Kukhulu ukuzigqaja eMkhosini woMhlanga. Izintombi zizikhethela zona ukuzigcina nokuzithiba ocansini. Kulo mkhosi, izintombi ezisuke zihlobe ngemibala ehlukene ekhombisa ukuba msulwa kwazo, ziyaye zihambe ngamaqoqo. Zisuke zicula amahubo ngesikhathi zihambisa umhlanga eSilweni uMisuzulu Sinqobile kaZwelithini. “Lo mzuzu ukhombisa ukunqoba kwazo zonke izintombi ezilingweni ezibhekana nazo. ISilo uGoodwill Zwelithini kaBhekuzulu sasisebenzisa uMkhosi woMhlanga ukugqugquzela amatshitshi ukuba aziphathe kahle. Ngokubambisana neNdlovukazi uMantfombi kaSobhuza, basungula inkundla yokukhuthaza izintombi ukuba ziziphathe kahle.”UMnyandu uthe ngenxa yokubaluleka komkhosi wakulo nyaka babe nemicimbi yokulungiselela izintombi eziya emhlangeni ebikuzo zonke izifunda.“Kube injabulo yodwa ngesikhathi kunemicimbi ebinesiqubulo esithi #SiyayaEmhlangeni.”UMnyandu uthe emkhosini wakulo nyaka bazophinde bahlomise amatshitshi ngamakhono, baphinde bawaluleke ngemikhakha angayifundela.“Inhloso yalokhu ukuba izintombi zikwazi ukubhekana nezimo zempilo.”

BABHEKE lukhulu koyinhloko yamajaji, uMandisa Maya, othathe izintambo ngokusemthethweni ngeSonto.IJaji Maya, oyinhloko yamajaji yesifazane yokuqala kuleli, uthathe ngokusemthethweni emva kokushiya kobeyinhloko yamajaji, uRaymond Zondo, othathe umhlalaphansi ekupheleni kwenyanga eyedlule.Amaqembu ezepolitiki nezinhlaka zezobulungiswa bathe balindele lukhulu kuJaji Maya.Inhlangano eqapha ukusebenza kwamajaji, iJudges Matter, ithe ziningi izinselelo ezisabhekene nezobulungiswa.UMnuz Mbekezeli Benjamin weJudges Matter, uthe inkinga enkulu imayelana nokuphathwa kwezinkantolo.UBenjamin uthe uZondo uzamile ukuyilungisa le nkinga kule minyaka emibili ephethe.“Kodwa ke usazisile ukuthi ugcine engakwazanga ukuyilungisa, wayesazama ukubonana nomengameli. Manje uMaya kufanele aqhubeke nalolu daba. Sizimisele ukusebenzisana naye sizophinde siqaphe ukusebenza kwakhe.”UBenjamin uthe nakuba ezobulungiswa zibhekene nezinselelo eziningi uyakuncoma ukuzimela kwazo.Inhlangano ehola uhulumeni wokubambisana, i-ANC, ithe ukuthatha izintambo kweJaji Maya kufakazela ukuthi ukusebenza ngokuzikhandla kuzala impumelelo.Okhulumela i-ANC, uMnuz Zuko Godlimpi, uthe uMaya uyisibonelo esihle ezweni.“Uzinikele emsebenzini wakhe. Uzokuba owesifazane wokuqala ukungena kulesi sikhundla. Lokhu kufeza izifiso ze-ANC zokuba kube nezinguquko, abesifazane baqokelwe ezikhundleni zokuphatha kuzo zonke izinhlaka zomphakathi. Simfisela inhlanhla njengoba ethatha lolu hambo. Siyazibophezela ekumesekeni ngayo yonke indlela.”I-ActionSA ithe ukuthatha kukaMaya kuyinto enkulu emlandweni wakuleli.Umholi we-ActionSA ePhalamende, uMnuz Athol Trollip, uthe ukuthatha kukaMaya kufanele kuze nezinguquko ezinqala kwezobulungiswa.“Kufanele sifunde kulokhu esidlule kukhona, bese sithuthukisa ukusebenza kwezobulungiswa.”Bobabili uGodlimpi noTrollip baphinde bancoma iqhaza likaZondo abathe uyibambe ishisa.Bathe uZondo wakwazi ukwenza umsebenzi wakhe ngokungesabi yize kwakukhona ababemchapha ngazo zonke izinhlamba.UMaya waqokwa uMengameli, uCyril Ramaphosa, ngoJulayi.Ubeyiphini lenhloko yamajaji, nokuyisikhundla aqokelwa kuso ngo-2022.Ngaphambi kwalokho ubengumengameli weNkantolo yezokuDluliswa kwamaCala kuleli, nokuyisikhundla aqokelwa kuso ngo-2017.

ABELAPHI bendabuko bathi kunabaqashi abasanyathela amalungelo abasebenzi ngokungazemukeli izincwadi zokugula ezibuye nabasebenzi abelashwe ngokwesintu.Laba belaphi bathi kunabasebenzi abangaphezu kuka-30 abakhonjwe indlela ngesinye isitolo esidayisa izingubo esiseHammarsdale, sithi izincwadi zabelaphi bendabuko ezifike nabasebenzi ziwumgunyathi.UMnuz Mbongeni Dlamini wesikhungo esiqeqesha abelaphi ngenhlanzeko nokuthi kumele bayilandele kanjani imithetho yokwelapha ngokuhambisana nemigomo yoMnyango wezeMpilo kuleli, Abelaphi Bendabuko Traditional Practices, uthe lesi sitolo sikhombe indlela abasebenzi abangaphezu kuka-30 ngezincwadi abafika nazo ziphuma kubelaphi abehlukene phakathi kuka-2018 kuya ku-2023."Lesi sitolo sicindezela amalungelo abasebenzi. Kusho ukuthi siyabaphoqa ukuthi basebenzise odokotela basentshonalanga okushayisanayo noMthethosisekelo wakuleli. Kuleli sonto singabelaphi siphelezele abasebenzi abafake lolu daba kumxazululi wezindaba zabasebenzi iCommission for Conciliation, Mediation and Arbitration (CCMA)," kusho yena.Uthe lesi sikhungo sigunyaziwe ukuthi siqeqeshe abelaphi bese sibanikeza igunya lokuthi bakhiphe izincwadi, omunye wabelaphi okuthiwa izincwadi zakhe ziwumgunyathi ugunyazwe ilesi sikhungo ukuthi anikeze iziguli zakhe izincwadi.UMnuz Lonwabo Khakhana, owumgqungquzeli wenyunyana, iFree At Last Workers Union of South Africa (FALWUSA),  okuyinyunyana emele laba basebenzi ecaleni eselize lafinyelela kwaCCMA, uthe ngokubona kwabo umqashi akayilandelanga imigomo ngoba uvele wabaxosha abasebenzi ekubeni zikhona ezinye izijeziso abengazikhipha uma ekholwa ukuthi izincwadi zabo ziwumgunyathi."Umqashi phambilini ubezemukela izincwadi ezifika nabasebenzi ababonwe ngabelaphi, futhi abakhokhele, gwiqiqi ngesikhathi seCovid-19, washintsha wathi lezi zincwadi ziwumgunyathi. “Umqashi usebenzise ithuba lokuthi iningi lalaba basebenzi abekho ngaphansi kwenyunyana futhi nemithetho kabayazi kanti ushaye phansi ngoba thina sibone ukuthi kunyathelwa amalungelo abasebenzi sase sisondela kubo ukuze sibalekele. ENingizimu Afrika umsebenzi uvumelekile ukuthi azikhethele ukuthi welashwa umelaphi wendabuko noma udokotela wasentshonalanga. Lokhu sikubona kuyindlela yokucindezela nokuphoqa abasebenzi ukuthi basebenzise odokotela basentshonalanga. “Lapha asikhulumi ngomelaphi oyedwa, eziningi izincwadi ngezomelaphi waseHammarsdale kodwa kukhona nezomelaphi waseFolweni. Njengoba siye kumxazululi sifuna umqashi acacise ukuthi ufinyelele kanjani ekutheni aze axoshe abasebenzi ngaphandle ngokubexwayisa?" kusho uKhakhana.Kusukela ngo-2014, udaba lokuthi abelaphi bendabuko bakhiphe izincwadi eziwubufakazi bokuthi babonwe umelaphi wendabuko lujwayele ukususa umsindo kuleli. Ngo-2014, uMnyango wezeMpilo wathi izincwadi zabelaphi zivumelekile kodwa wasungula umkhandlu wabelaphi,  iTraditional Healer Council, njengoba kuyalela komthetho i-Traditional Health Practitioners Act 22 of 2007, ukuze abelaphi ababhalise kuwo kube yibo abavumelekile ukuthi bakhiphe izincwadi kodwa okwamanje kusanemicikilisho esashoda ekutheni lo mkhandlu usebenze kahle. Abelaphi balandela imigudu elawulwa ilo mnyango nezinhlangano zabelaphi ezibhaliswe kuwo ukuze  bagunyazwe ukuthi bakhiphe izincwadi.

UMGQUGQUZELI woMkhonto weSizwe (MK) kuzwelonke obambile uMnuz Nathi Nhleko, uthi izitha zeqembu zilinike amandla ngesikhathi zizama ukuqeda ngalo.UNhleko owake waba wungqongqoshe wamaphoyisa kuleli, uxoxe neSolezwe ngezinhlelo zeMK, wathi iqembu lizimisele ukudla ukhetho ngesonto elizayo. UNhleko umemezele ukushiya kwi-ANC ngoMashi nonyaka, emuva kwalokho wathushuka kwiMK.Owayengumengameli uJacob Zuma ngoDisemba nyakenye, wethule iMK wathi uzoyikhankasela ayeseke futhi akasayingeni eye-ANC. I-MK iwundabamlonyeni kulezi zinsuku ezweni kanti abanye bathi izoshintsha ipolitiki abanye bethi bayoke babone.Igama loMkhonto weSizwe libangwe kakhulu, i-ANC ikhala ngokuthi kuthezwa yona nomlando wayo. Kuphunywe kwangenwa ezinkantolo kodwa iMK yanqoba.UNhleko uthe izimbangi zabo zenze iphutha zinganakile zizama ukubaphundla kanti zibakhulisa kakhulu. Uthe kukhulunywa ngeMK lonke izwe futhi abantu babona ithemba labo.“Akusinyakazisi thina ukuhlushwa sihambe izinkantolo ngoba basinike isigcawu sokuzikhangisa esingasikhokheli ngisho isenti. Uma sivela enkantolo silunqobe udaba izinkumbi zabantu zibhekile nabezindaba. Sidumile, kulokhu kukhulunywa ngathi,’’ kuphawula uNhleko.Uthe ukubunjwa kweMK akufani namanye amaqembu ayizicagogwana nje kodwa yona iyithemba labantu. Uthe baze basho abantu ukuthi ababizwa bayaziyela eqenjini. UNhleko uthe konke lokhu kukhomba ukuthi umoya wabantu ungakuphi.Uqhube wathi ubufakazi bokuthi iMK ngeyabantu, bubonakale ngempelasonto edlule ngesikhathi yethula izethembiso zokhetho ezinkundleni yemidlalo e-Orlando, eSoweto. Uthe bebethwele kanzima behlela umcimbi ngoba kukhona abebezama ukubavimba kodwa bafohla kunjalo.UNhleko wengeze ngokuthi bakwazile ukuhlela umcimbi omkhulu bengenayo nemali etheni futhi bebengabahehi abantu ngezijumbane zokudla njengamanye amaqembu.Okuseqhulwini kwiMK wudaba lokulwa nenhlupheko nokweseleka kwamathuba omsebenzi. Kukhona nodaba lwezemfundo okuthiwa kufanele ibhekwe kabanzi. IMk ikhuluma nangokulwa nobugebengu ngokuthi kushintshwe umthetho osebenza kuleli.UNhleko uthe isinqumo senkantolo sokuchitha uZuma ohlwini lwasePhalamende bayasibona nje kodwa asiwucwilisi umkhumbi. Uthe isekhona indlela eya phambili futhi abantu bazozibonela bona.Wengeze ngokuthi okubalulekile okwamanje wukulungiselela ukhetho bese emuva kwalo kwakhiwa izinhlaka.“Umsebenzi omkhulu wukuthi siye okhethweni kodwa kubalulekile ukuthi emuva kwalokho kwakhiwe izinhlaka ukuze iqembu liqhubeke. Akufanele kube sengathi bekuyiqembu eliqhamuke ngoba lifuna ukhetho,’’ kusho uNhleko.

UBUHLAKANI namava kaMgqugquzeli kaZwelonke weqembu Umkhonto weSizwe, uMnuz Floyd Shivambu, azokwazi ukumsiza ekuphembeni amagatsha kuleli qembu, akhe imigomo aphinde abumbe izinhlaka ezifana nophiko lwentsha nolwabesifazane.Lokhu kushiwo abahlaziyi bezepolitiki abathe mkhulu umthwalo obekwe emahlombe kaShivambu kanti abangabazi ukuthi lo msebenzi uzowenza ngempumelelo. Bakusho lokhu nje, kulandela ukutuswa kwesenzo somholi we-MK, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, sokujuba uShivambu kulesi sikhundla njengoba leli qembu lisabumba amagatsha kanjalo nemigomo.UZuma umncomile uShivambu osule kwi-EFF njengephini likamengameli, ngobuhlakani bakhe wathi wambona esasophikweni lwentsha lwe-ANCYL ukuthi akayimpumputhi ipolitiki.Umhlaziyi wezepolitiki, uMnuz Zakhele Ndlovu waseNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal, uhambe emagameni abancoma isinyathelo se-MK sokujuba uShivambu kulesi sikhundla.Uthe uzokwazi ukubumba amagatsha, akhe imigomo, abhekele labo abajutshwe kumakhokhasi ePhalamende naseziShayamthetho, aphinde enze nokunye.“Unamava nobuhlakani njengoba nakwi-EFF nguyena muntu obethathwa njengomunye onobuhlakani. Angingabazi ukuthi lo msebenzi anikwe wona uzowenza ngempumelelo.”UNdlovu uthe kodwa akaboni ezokwazi ukubumba izinhlaka ezixovayo ngaphakathi ngoba nguZuma ongenza lokho.“Asazi futhi noma uzokwazi yini ukukhulisa iqembu ezifundazweni elingatholanga khona amavoti amaningi. Kunabakholelwa ukuthi i-MK ivotelwe abantu abakhuluma isiZulu, ngakho angazi noma uzokwazi yini ukulikhulisa ezifundazweni ezifana neNorth West, Limpopo nase-Western Cape,” kusho uNdlovu. Omunye umhlaziyi ofundisa enyuvesi yakuleli i-Unisa uNkk Sanet Madonsela, uncome umnyakazo we-MK ukujubela uShivambu kulesi sikhundla.Uthe bekulokhu kukhulunywa ngokungahleleki kwezinto kwi-MK njengoba namagatsha ebengekho.“Uzokwazi ukukhanda amagatsha anike ne-MK umkhombandlela. Ngakho umnyakazo omuhle ngoba uzogxila nasezintweni ezithinta ucwaningo kuleli qembu.”Uthe abanye bebecabanga ukuthi ukuthatha lesi sikhundla kufana nokwehlelwa amandla njengoba kwi-EFF nguyena obelandela umholi wayo ngokuba sesikhundleni esiphezulu.UNobhala Jikelele we-MK, uDkt Sifiso Maseko, uveze ukuthi umsebenzi kamgqugquzeli kazwelonke wukuhlela, athuthukise izinhlaka zeqembu, akhe imiqulu nemigomo, acije ngezepolitiki, enze ucwaningo, aqaphe ukusebenza kwemigomo.Okunye ngukuqapha ukusebenza kwalabo abakumakhokhasi ahlukene aphinde abe sethimbeni leKhomishini yezoKhetho.UShivambu uthe noma noma bangamsusa kulesi sikhundla kodwa uzoqhubeka nokuba yilungu.“Uma ngisuswa ekubeni yilungu leqembu, ngizoqhubeka nokuba ivolontiya. Ngizofaka izingqwembe noma kuthiwa ubuholi buyangichitha. Angizele izikhundla kwi-MK kodwa ukuzosebenzela abantu.”

INHLANZI ishelwe amanzi kuboshwa abasolwa ngokuhlalisa lubhojozi umphakathi waKwaMashu bese bebhaca ehostela lakuleya ndawo.Amaphoyisa abophe abasolwa abathathu ngoMsombuluko, abavele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseNtuzuma ngoLwesithathu icala lahlehliswa.OMnuz Dumisani Mlambo (26), Sifundo Hlophe (24) noMnuz Mlondolozi Malinga (43) babhekene necala lokuzama ukubulala, ukuduna imoto nawokutholakala nezibhamu nezinhlamvu okungekho emthethweni.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi laba baboshwe yithimba lamaphoyisa laKwaMashu elibikelwe ngobugebengu obebukade benzeka emgwaqweni uDumisani Makhaye.Kuvela ukuthi abasolwa babone amaphoyisa behla emotweni abebehamba ngayo badla phansi.Amaphoyisa kuthiwa ahubhe ngezinyawo abasolwa, omunye wabo wadubula ebhekise kuwona kodwa wabanjwa.Kubikwa ukuthi utholwe nesibhamu i-9mm ecishwe izinombolo nezinhlamvu. La maphoyisa kubikwa ukuthi aqhubekile nokuthungatha abasolwa, omunye waboshwa ngasemgwaqweni eSiyanda nesibhamu esingekho emthethweni.Kuthiwa uphenyo lwamaphoyisa luwaholele emzini oseSiyanda lapho kuboshwe khona umsolwa wesithathu otholakale nemoto iVW Polo emhlophe obekukade kubikwe ukuthi idunwe eNtuzuma ngawo uMsombuluko.Kulindeleke ukuthi uMlambo abuyele enkantolo ngo-Agasti 29, uMalinga benoHlophe bavele ngosuku olulandelayo.Kwenzeka lokhu nje abanye ababili abasolwa ngokugcweleza kule ndawo basanda kudutshulwa babulawa. Owokuqala ushone emuva kwesigameko sokudunwa kweloli lezinkukhu elafakwa ehostela kwaphenduka idili likamkhipheni.Owesibili udutshulwe washona esigcemeni kwa-H ngesonto eledlule. Umphakathi wasehostela KwaMashu ubukade usuhlalele ovalweni ngenxa yaleli qembu eligcwelezayo.Abantu baphinde banengwa yivideo ebikhombisa laba bantu beqhumisa izibhamu emini kabha ehostela.

ZIZUNGEZE ezinkundleni zokuxhumana impelasonto yonke izithombe zabashayeli bamatekisi base-Estcourt bedlubhe amaphinifa, ama-weave, amacici, abanye baze baruja nemilomo, baphatha nezikhwama zabesifazane begubha inyanga yabesifazane esongwa kuleli sonto.UMnuz Goster Mabizela, ongomunye wabenze lokhu uthe baqoke ukuhlonipha abesifazane ngale ndlela kuyinyanga yabo.Uthe benze lokhu ngoba bazalwa yibo abantu besifazane, bathandana nabesifazane futhi nakubagibeli babo kukhona abesifazane.“Ngokwejwayelekile, umuntu wesifazane uyahlonipha. Uma kwenzekile wanyukelwa umoya, kusuke kukhona osekumdine kakhulu. Uma sibahlonipha, ngeke baphakanyelwe yimimoya,” kusho uMabizela.Uthe ngabakwenzile bebefuna ukushumayela ivangeli lokuthi abangahlukunyezwa abantu besifazane.Bagqugquzele amadoda ngokuthi uthando abalukhonjiswa abazali babo bebathwala izinyanga eziyisishiyagalolunye, abalubuyisele ngokuthi babaphathise okwezikhali zamaNtungwa abesifazane. Uthe bekuqhuma uhleko, kuvunguza nomoya wokujabula ematekisini arenka kuCorner Street, abagibeli bengayikholwa into ebebeyibona.“Umuntu ubethi uma evula isicabha setekisi, afe ukuhleka ebona umshayeli erujile, egqoke ne-weave. Bekuhambe kuhlekwa etekisini, kuze kuyofikwa lapho kuyiwa khona,” kusho uMabizela, othe yena elakhe iphinifa ubeliboleke kumkakhe.Okhulumela iSantaco KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Sfiso Shangase uthe kubajabulisile okwenziwe osomatekisi nabashayeli baseMtshezi.“Kuyasijabulisa ukuthi baveze ukuthi abahambisani nokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane nokuthi bayazibophezela ekutheni bangahlukunyezwa. Abakwenzile kuhle, siyakukhuthaza, sinxusa nokuthi bakuphile kubagibeli babo besifazane. Singezwa ngelinye ilanga kuthiwa bahlukumeze umgibeli wesifazane emva kokwenza into enhle kangaka,” kusho uShangase.

BAFIKE kwezwakala abafundi basezikoleni ezisesifundazweni iKwaZulu-Natal, bebuya nezindondo emqhudelwaneni wamazwe omhlaba, i-International Science Technlogy and Engineering obuseBali, e-Indonesia emasontweni amabili edlule.USiqiniseko Mpontshane (20) waseMabhanoyini eJozini, ofunda  u-Grade 12 eMandla Mthethwa School of Excellence ubuye nendondo yesiliva elala isibili emkhakheni abengenele kuwo, njengoba ubebukisa ngemoto ayisungule eyiqala phansi enganciphisa izingozi emigwaqweni, amajaji ahlabeka umxhwele. UHusna Docrat ofunda u-Grade 11 eSt Dominics eNewcastle, wathola indondo yegolide ngocwaningo lwakhe oluthinta uhlobo lweplasitiki esetshenziselwa ukufaka izimpahla, engahlala isikhathi esevile eminyakeni ewu-20, engasiza ukugwema ukunukubezeka kwemvelo  ngenxa yokungcola.Kulo mqhudelwano okusuke kubhekene abafundi nezitshudeni zezikhungo zemfundo ephakeme ezivela emazweni omhlaba, kubukiswa ngezinto ezehlukene eziqhamuka nentsha ezingaletha isixazululo ezinkingeni ezehlukene emhlabeni jikelele.USiqiniseko bekunguyena kuphela kubafundi abathathu abaqokwe emncintiswaneni i-Eskom Expo  for Young Scientists kuleli, ovela esikoleni esisemakhaya.  Ekhuluma neSolezwe uthe ubengakulindele ukuphuma isibili.“Ngijabule kakhulu ngengikuzuzile. Besiqhudelana nabebevela emazweni ahlonishwayo okukhona kuwo i-France, USA, UK namanye.  Iningi labebekulo mkhakha engiqhathwe kuwo, yizitshudeni ezivela ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme kuyimina nje obevela esikoleni samabanga aphezulu. Ngibonga kakhulu kubazali bami, othisha bami nakubantu abenze iphupho lami laba yimpumelelo,” usho kanje.Isifiso sakhe esikhulu ukuthola umfundaze, njengoba efuna ukufundela ukuba yi-Megatronic Electrical Engineer.USiqiniseko uthe imoto yakhe uyiqale esafunda esikoleni samabanga aphansi eJozini okuthe ngo-2021 waqala ukuthuthukisa umsebenzi wakhe.  Iyazishayela yona, ihamba ngogesi ibe nomazibuthe ezinhlangothini zonke abavimbela ukuthi ingashayisi ezinye emgwaqweni, okuyinto uSiqiniseko athi inganqanda izingozi.  Embukisweni wezinsuku ezintathu walo mqhudelwano phakathi kukaMeyi 2 no 5, amajaji kuthiwa abenikeza nongenelile ithuba lokuba achaze kabanzi ngomsebenzi wakhe.UMnuz Parthy Chetty owuMqondisi kwi-Eskom Expo ecashunwa kwi-website yoMnyango weMfundo eyisiSekelo, ubongele abafundi abahlabene,“Kuyajabulisa ukubona abafundi bakuleli beqhudelana nabanye basemazweni omhlaba. Laba bafundi baqhamuka ezindaweni ezehlukene kuleli ngakho kuyathembisa ukubona izinhloso zethu nge-Science, Technology, Engineering, Mathematics and Innovation (STEMI), kuyaqala kuthela izithelo,”usho kanje.

KUBOSHWE abantu abangu-243 KwaZulu-Natal bathweswa amacala okudlwengula ngoMashi nonyaka.La basolwa bayingxenye yabantu abangu-9 522 abakhalelwe amasongo kaSigonyela esikhathini esifanayo.Amaphoyisa athi bangu-1 380 ababoshelwe amacala athinta izidakamizwa kwathi ababoshelwe ukudayisa utshwala ngokungemthetho baba ngu-445.Lokhu kuvezwe esitatimendeni esithunyelelwe kwabezindaba okhulumela amaphoyisa eKZN, uColonel Robert Netshiunda.Esikhathini esifanayo amaphoyisa ashaqe izibhamu ezingu-258 kuhlanganisa nezinhlokohlela ezingu-17 nezinhlamvu ezingu-3 000.“Abasolwa abangu-167 baboshelwe amacala okubulala, kwathi abawu-137 kwaba awokuzama ukubulala. Abasolwa bayingxenye yabangu-3 156 ababoshelwe amacala abucayi,” kusho uNetshiunda.Kuphinde kwashaqwa imimese engu-463 nocelemba ababalelwa ku-22.UNetshiunda udalule ukuthi abasolwa abangu-148 baboshelwe amacala athinta ukugqekeza imizi nezindawo zamabhizinisi, ukuphanga kusetshenziswa indlakadla nawokuduna izimoto.

UPHITHENE amakhanda umndeni wakwaMpangase eWestrich, eNewlands West, eThekwini, kulandela ukuthunjwa kwengane yawo ngoLwesithathu.UNksz Thobile Mpangase ongumalumekazi wewele elilahlekile, uSibusiso Mpangase (9), uthe basola ukuthi uthunjwe owesilisa ohamba nge-Toyota Etios e-silver grey.Uthe uSibusiso ulahleke ebuya kodlala epaki yendawo nezingane zabafana ezimbili zakubo, eyodwa eyiwele lakhe nenye eneminyaka engu-14. Uthe kwakungabo-9 ekuseni kwenzeka lo mshophi.Uveze ukuthi izingane zithi zathi uma ziphuma nje epaki zibuya zeza ekhaya, kwama i-Etios eduze kwazo, umshayeli wayo owayehamba yedwa, wakhomba iwele likaSibusiso, wathi alize kuyena ufuna ukulithuma ugwayi nephepha lokuwugoqa esitolo.“Lo ona-14 uthe wavele walidonsa ngengalo iwele likaSibusiso, wathi lingayi lapho,” kusho uNksz Mpangase.Uthe lokhu wayekusho ngoba ekhaya babadonsa ngendlebe ukuthi bangasondeli ezimotweni zabantu abangabazi.Uveze ukuthi uSibusiso yena wavele waziyela emotweni yale ndoda.Uma emchaza uSibusiso, uthe uyingane egangile, basola ukuthi yileso kuphela isizathu abacabanga ukuthi samyisa emotweni yomuntu ongaziwa yize umndeni wabayala ukuthi bangakwenzi lokhu.“Bafika ekhaya badla, bangasho ukuthi kwenzekeni ngenxa yobungane. Nathi saqala sanganaka ukuthi uSibusiso akekho. Ngesikhathi kuqhubeka usuku saqala sanaka ukuthi akekho uSibusiso ngoba kufanele ingabe useqhamukile wazodla naye.” UNksz Mpangase uthe yilapho okwabuzwa khona izingane ayekade ehambe nazo ukuyodlala ukuthi uphi, zasho ukuthi uthunywe esitolo umalume wemoto ezingamazi.“Ngabo-3 ntambama sekubuye nomkhulu wakhe, saqala sambheka yonke indawo ngisho nasebanganini bakhe abanye nakomakhelwane, kodwa bonke balandula,” usho kanje.Uthe bagcina beya nasesitolo sendawo, umnikazi waso wathi akakaze afike uSibusiso esitolo ukuzothenga.Ngakusasa bavukela emaphoyiseni ukuyobika, kwaqhutshekwa kwacingwa kodwa namanje ingane ayitholakali.“Siphithene amakhanda. Siyazibuza ukuthi ingane ingabe iphi futhi injani lapho ikhona?” kusho yena.Uthe ubugebengu bokuthunjwa kwezingane buyaqala ngakubo, bahlale bezwa ngezigameko zakude.“Sifisa itholakale iphila ingane, ibuye ize ekhaya. Kubuhlungu njengoba singazi ukuthi ikephi. Unina kunzima kakhulu kuye, miningi imibuzo engenazimpendulo azibuza yona,” kusho uNksz Mpangase.Echaza ngepaki nesitolo, uthe kokubili akuqhelile ekhaya, walinganisa ngokuthi ayipheli imizuzu emibili uhamba ngezinyawo uya khona.Uthe ngosuku alahleke ngalo uSibusiso ubegqoke isikhindi esi-maroon nesikibha esinemikhono emifishane esiluhlaza.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa aseNewlands East avule idokodo lokulahleka komuntu ukuba liphenywe.Uthe lokhu amaphoyisa akwenze emva kokuthi uSibusiso Mpangase (9) kubikwe ukuthi unyamalele ngoMashi 20.Unxuse noba ubani onolwazi ngokuthi uSibusiso uphi, ukuba athinte amaphoyisa enombolweni ethi: 08600 10111.

INTSHA evela emathempelini ebandla laManazaretha (KwaShembe) iye eNkosini uMduduzi “Nyazilwezulu” Shembe, eBuhleni yayocela isibusiso ukuze isungule isikhwama ehlose ngaso ukufukula amalungu ebandla adonsa kanzima.Ngalesi sikhwama le ntsha ihlose ukuqala izinhlelo zokuzisebenza futhi idale imisebenzi ezofukula abantu ngomnotho ngaphakathi esontweni kuhlomule abaswele.Bafuna nokuthi kulekeleleke intsha ithole imali ingene ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme nokunye.UMnuz Zibonele Ngcobo waseNdwedwe ungelinye lamalungu asesigungwini sentsha asophe ukuqala lesi sikhwama.Uveze ukuthi isonto lizohlonishwa umhlaba wonke uma sekuthela izithelo abahlose ukukwenza osekufike isikhathi sokuba bakuqale.“Kumele silethe ushintsho oluzoba yingqophamlando. Okuzosilekelela ukuthi sisungule isikhwama sebandla lapho nabaxhasi bezonikela khona bese sethula izinhlelo zemfundo, ezemidlalo, imifelandawonye nokucijwa kwabantu ngamakhono emisebenzi nezolimo,” kusho uNgcobo.Uveze ukuthi baningi abantu abanamakhono esontweni kodwa abakwazi ukuwaveza ngoba kabanalo utho.ngeSonto, intsha iye eBuhleni yafike yanikela yase icela kuShembe ukuthi lo msebenzi ube yimpumeleloUdaba lubikelwe umfundisi ebandleni obe eseya kolwethula enkosini uNyazi.Intsha ithe baningi osomabhizinisi abakhona ebandleni abangafaka isandla ukuze kusizwe abaswele. Igama lesikhwama bathe bazocela enkosini kube iyona ebabusisa ngalo futhi libe nomlando wesonto.Okhulumela ibandla lakwaShembe eBuhleni, uMnuz Thokozani Mncwabe, uncome intsha wathi kabanakiwe abafelokazi, izintandane nentsha esezikoleni.UMncwabe uthe intsha ihamba emazwini oNyazi oluhlale lugquguquzela ukuthi ibandla alisizane.“Siyakubonga okuqhamuka  nentsha kuhle. Kuke kushone iNazaretha uthole ukuthi alinamali sehle senyuka sicele iminikelo kubantu bangaphandle beze babuze ukuthi ‘leli bandla elingaka, yini eyenza lihlulwe ukusiza iNazaretha?’” kusho uMncwabe.Ubonge intsha wathi kodwa uyazi ukuthi  luzongena unyawo lwemfene ludunge lolu hlelo okuzokwenziwa abantu athe bathanda imali esontweni.“KunamaNazaretha axakekile kodwa awasizakali ngalutho. UNkulunkulu sengathi angayisimamisa intsha kungabi khona idimoni lalabo abathatha imali ngoba uma ike yangenwa ibona, okuzanywa yintsha kuyobe kuphelile,” kusho uMncwabe.

INHLANGANO iCouncil for the Advancement of South African Constitution (CASAC), isichithe eyokufakwa kwenhloko yamajaji uRaymond Zondo, ezingxoxweni zamaqembu ezepolitiki ngokubunjwa kukahulumeni wobumbano kuleli.Le nhlangano ithe uZondo akumele abe yingxenye yalo mhlangano noma kube nguye ozohlanganisa la maqembu, ngenxa yokuthi kumele angachemi, futhi angahlangani nezinto ezithinta ipolitiki ngoba wengamele umthetho.Ikusho lokhu kulandela ukuthi amaqembu ayisithupha, i-ACDP, ATM, BOSA, PAC, UDM ne-UAT ebhalele uZondo, emnxenxa ukuthi abe yingxenye yalezi zingxoxo ngokuthi aqoke ijaji eselathatha umhlalaphansi ukwengamela lezi zingxoxo.Awaneme ngokuthi i-ANC iyona ephakamise ukuthi kuxoxwe ngokuthi kube nohulumeni wobumbano emva kokuba lingekho iqembu elidle umhlanganiso okhethweni elingakwazi ukubumba uhulumeni lilodwa.Unobhala weCASAC uMnuz Lawson Naidoo, uthe akumele inhloko yamajaji izibandakanye nezepolitiki.Uthe kanjalo nejaji eselathatha umhlalaphansi akumele lifakwe ukwengamela lezi zingxoxo ngoba ngomuso kungabakhona abakhalayo.“Isivuthiwe intando yabantu kuleli ngakho amaqembu angakwazi ukuzibambela izingxoxo ngawodwana, kungafakwa amajaji. Uhulumeni wobumbano wango-1994, wawulawulwa nguMthethosisekelo, yonke into eyayenzeka yayibhalwe phansi kubalwa nokuthi izihlalo zizokwabiwa kanjani. Namanje ngicabanga ukuthi umlando usengaziphinda, ngokuthi kusikwe iphethini kulokhu okwenzeka ngo-1994,” kusho uNaidoo.Uthe uma kwakhiwa lo hulumeni amaqembu kumele abeke eceleni ukungazwani, kodwa acabangele umphakathi.Ubalule ukuthi ezifundazweni elingekho iqembu elidle umhlanganiso kuzona, kudingeka iphathwe ngobunono ekahulumeni wobumbano noma uhulumeni wokubambisana ukuze izidingo ziqhubeke nokufinyelela emphakathini.UZondo akakawaphenduli la maqembu amnxenxe ukuthi angenelele.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi uZondo nguyena ozobamba izintambo ePhalamende uma sekufungiswa amalungu amasha, kukhethwa usomlomo nephini likasomlomo wePhalamende, kanjalo nokukhethwa kukamengameli omusha ezweni.

ATHEMBISANE ukukhiphana inkani okhethweni oluzayo amalungu e-ANC naweMK enqwamana eNkantolo eNkulu eThekwini.Kugqame kakhulu ukuklolodelana phakathi kwamalungu alamaqembu abecula ngaphandle kwenkantolo lapho bekulalelwe isicelo esifakwe i-ANC, esola iMK ngokuntshontsha uphawu negama lombutho wezempi wayo owawubizwa ngoMkhonto weSizwe.Amalungu alamaqembu abelokhu ekhumbuzana ukuthi ‘angawandawonye’, ngesikhathi elokhu echomelana.Umculo ubusho phezulu ngaphandle kwenkantolo.Womabili amaqembu abehlele imicimbi lapho abaholi bekhulume khona nabalandeli.Amalungu e-ANC abeholwa uNobhala Jikelele, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, nobuholi baKwaZulu-Natal.AbeMK bona bebeholwa owayengumengameli, uJacob Zuma. Abaholi bebelokhu bexoxa, bejabulelana.Enkantolo abameli be-ANC bathe ukuvela kweMK ohlwini lwamaqembu angenele ukhetho kungadida abantu, abangazitshela ukuthi ihlobene ne-ANC njengoba umbutho wezempi kwi-ANC wawubizwa ngoMkhonto weSizwe.Ummeli we-ANC, u-Advocate Gavin Marriott, uthe iMK izama ukukotela nge-ANC."Bafuna abantu bazitshele ukuthi bahlobene ne-ANC ukuze nezothola amavoti anele ukuthi bathola izihlalo ePhalamende. Inhloso yabo ileyo."UMarriott uthe i-ANC isikuthola kunzima ngisho ukusebenzisa uphawu lwayo olunomkhonto ngoba kuzokuba sengathi idumisa iMK.Abameli beMK bathe uphawu lweMK nolophiko lwempi kwi-ANC azifani.Bathe umkhonto ophawini lweMK ukhombe ngenhla kwesinqa kanti kwelophiko lwezempi kwi-ANC ukhombe ekhanda.Ummeli weMk, u-Advocate Dali Mpofu uthe igama nophawu lweMK akusikho olwe-ANC.Uthe lolu phawu lwabhaliswa phansi yinhlangano engenzi nzuzo, iLegacy Project."Emva kokuthi iMK isingenele ukhetho, i-ANC yagijima yayothenga uphawu ngesamba esingadalulwanga. ILegacy Project yabhalisa uphawu eminyakeni eyishumi eyedlule. I-ANC ayizange yenze lutho ngalokho, iqale ukusukuma uma iMK isingenela ukhetho. Inhloso enkulu ukuphazamisa umkhankaso weMK."Ngaphandle kwenkantolo uZuma utshele amalungu eMK ukuthi bazowunqoba lombango wezomthetho njengoba benzile nasecaleni ebeliseNkantolo yezoKhetho.UZuma uthe abameli be-ANC bafike bakhuluma into engezwakali enkantolo, wathi kusale kancane ukuthi ijaji libahleke.Uthe balungiselela ukunqoba ngamalengiso ukhetho oluzayo, wabafanisa namagwala labo abangezukuyivotela iMK.“Lawo amagwala asaba abelungu, bathi basaba ukuthi abelungu baphatha izibhamu.”UZuma wenze izinsolo zokuthi kunetulo lokukhwabanisa amavoti okhethweni oluzayo.Uthe bathole ulwazi lokuthi amavoti azokhwatshaniswa ngosuku okuzokube kuvotwa ngalo, labo abavota ngokukhethekile.Unxuse amalungu eMK ukuba aqaphele kakhulu ngalolo suku, waphinde wathi ukuvota angeke kube imfihlo uma sekuphethe iMK.UNobhala -Jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula ubuze ukuthi uZuma uzolunqoba kanjani ukhetho lukazwelonke ekubeni esahlulwa ukunqoba ngakubo.UMasipala waseNkandla noWard 14, lapho kwakhe khona uZuma, baphethwe yi-IFP."Kukhona abahamba bethi bazonqoba ukhetho ngokubili kokuthathu. Uzolunqoba kanjani ukhetho esahlulwa i-IFP?"UMbalula uthe i-ANC ihambe ibizwa ngamasela nje kungenxa kaZuma kanye nabanye asebejoyine iMK athe bashiya i-ANC negama elibi.UMbalula uthe abanankinga noZuma, wathi bona bavikela ifa le-ANC."Kungani inhlangano yakhe engayiqambi ngegama lakhe? Uma kuwukuthi igama lakhe liyahlonishwa emphakathini, kufanele engasabi ukuqamba inhlangano yakhe ngegama lakhe."UMbalula uthe angeke basidlulisele phambili isinqumo senkantolo yezoKhetho, esichithe isicelo sabo sokuba kukhishwe iMK ohlwini lwamaqembu azongenela ukhetho."Thina siyazihlonipha izinqumo zenkantolo. Uma sihluliwe ngeke usizwe silokhu sisabisa ngokususa udlame njengoba kade kwenza abanye. Into esesizoyilwela manje ukunqoba ukhetho."Isinqumo sigodliwe.

BACHONYWE uphaphe lwegwalagwala eminxeni eyahlukene  abasebenzisana noMasipala waKwaDukuza ngokuzikhandla ngomsebenzi wabo.Laba baklonyeliswe ngezindondo emcimbini omkhulu obuhlelwe yilo masipala, obusehholo iKwaDukuza Town Hall. Bekunemiklomelo yezindondo iMasakhane Awards.IMeya uNkk Lindiwe Nhaca uthe badinga ukushayelwa ihlombe bonke abasebenzisana nalo masipala.''Inhloso enkulu ngalezi zindondo ukukhuthaza ukusebenza ngokuzikhandla kubona bonke abantu abasebenzisana nathi njengomasipala,'' esho.Omunye wabahlomule ngezindondo lapha kube nguNksz Welile Gumede emkhakheni weBest Youth in Agriculture.UNksz Gumede unguSihlalo wenkampani i-Azowel Projects. Ngaphansi kwayo uthi uqashe ngokugcwele abantu abasha abangaphezulu kuka-20."Kuyangijabulisa ukuthi namhlanje ngihlonishwe ngale ndlela. Ngiyabonga kakhulu,'' usho kanje.Emkhakheni weBest Local Employer kunqobe inkampani iHesto Hernesses okuvele ukuthi isidale inqwaba yamathuba emisebenzi emphakathini.''Siyabonga kule nkampani ngoba iqiniso ukuthi isikwazile ukuthi idale amathuba emisebenzi amaningi kubantu bakule ndawo,'' kuncoma uNkk Nhaca.KwiBest Ward Committe kunqobe uWard 5 ongaphansi kukaKhansela uBartman Mtolo.UNksz Phamela Mkhize noNksz Londiwe Msane bathe kule ward izinto zihamba kahle ngenxa yokuthi benza konke okusemandleni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi intuthuko iyafinyelela kubantu.Kumkhakha weBest Awards for Acting Beyond the call of duty uye kwikwaDukuza Municipality Life Guards."Badinga ukunconywa kakhulu abeKDM Life Guards, mkhulu umsebenzi abebewenza nangezikhathi ezibucayi zezikhukhula,'' kuchaza uNkk Nhaca.Kumkhakha weBest NGO kunqobe iMasithandane, iKDM Childrens Welfare, Inqolobane, Othandweni Childrens Home neSafe Heaven.Kumkhakha weBest Women with Disability, uye kuNksz Bongi Ngcobo.UNkk Nhaca uthe likhulu iqhaza elibanjwa ngabaphila nokukhubazeka kulo masipala. Wamethulela isigqoko uNksz Ngcobo ngokuhlale njalo esebenzisana nabo.

LUSUSE umsindo uhlelo lokuxhaswa kwezinhlangano zamabhizinisi ezaqalwa ondlunkulu bamakhosi ezindaweni zasemakhaya ukufukula umnotho njengoba kuthiwa abanye baphuma beshwiba izandla ngesikhathi kudluliswa izinsiza- kusebenza, emcimbini obuseMnambithi, ngoLwesihlanu. Lolu hlelo loMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana nobuHoli boMdabu KwaZulu-Natal olubizwa ngokuthi Ondlunkulu Rural Economic Development Programme, belwethulwa ngokusemthethweni.  Kuthiwa kuhloswe ngalo ukuhlomulisa abesifazane abenza imisebenzi ehlukene ukususa ikati eziko nokufukula umnotho wasemakhaya ngokuxhasa izinhlangano ezaqalwa  ondlunkulu bamakhosi ngenhloso yokwenza umehluko emphakathini. Nakuba injabulo ibinkulu kwabanye abahlomulile, kodwa ababuye belambatha baphume bedemelayisa njengoba kumenyezelwe izinhlangano ezingu- 40 kuphela ekubeni bonke abebefake izicelo bebelindele ukuthi amabhizinisi abo azohlomula kulolu hlelo lomnyango olubekelwe izigidi.Ezinkulumeni zondlunkulu abangeneme okuthiwa ziputshuke bexoxa eqoqweni labo kwi-WhatsApp, omunye ezwini eliqoshiwe uzwakala esola umnyango ngokuchema nondlunkulu bamakhosi aziwayo naseke ahola ezinhlakeni ezithile ngaphansi kohlaka lweNdlu yabaHoli boMdabu KwaZulu-Natal, eveza ukuthi undlunkulu kaSihlalo walolu hlaka Inkosi Sifiso Shinga nowePhini likaNdunankulu kaZulu Inkosi Phathisizwe Chiliza nabanye abavela  emakhosini anamagama, bahlomulile. “Lezi zinto ezabantu vele abanemali, abasezikhundleni izinto zitholwa yibona.  Futhi ngeke isayekwa, Ogwini nje kunjalo.  Abanye baphume no- R300 000.  Mina ngisheshe ngayibona nje le nto ngize ngasho ngathi imali iyakwazi kwabo,” kubalisa omunye.Omunye uthe wathatha imali yakhe yokugcina ehambisa amafomu okufaka isicelo kulolu hlelo ngethemba lokuthi uzobhekelwa.  Bathi izikhulu zomnyango zahambela ezindaweni, kuthathwa nezithombe zezinhlelo abazenzayo sekuyamangaza ukuthi sekuqokwa abangu- 40 kuphela futhi akucaci ukuthi kulandelwe miphi imigudu ngokuqokwa kwabo.Okhulumela uMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Siboniso Mngadi ukuchithile ukuthi ondlunkulu bamakhosi asezinhlakeni kuphela abahlomula kulolu hlelo.“Lolu uhlelo oluqhubekayo njengoba umnyango ubeke eceleni u- R10 million ukubhekana nalo.  Kulaba abawu- 40 bokuqala, eminye yemigudu ebilandelwa bekunikwa asebevele banamabhizinisi asesebenza kodwa kungasho ukuthi abangahlomulanga ngeke besahlomula, kusuka kuleli sonto, umnyango uzoqala uthinte bonke abanye okumele bahlomule abafake izicelo ukuthi bazomukela amasheke, ” usho kanje.Uthe nemali etholwa ondlunkulu ayilingani kodwa lokhu kuncike ebhizinisini afake ngalo isicelo nokuthi selivele liqalile ukwenza umehluko emphakathini elikuwo. Ugcizelele ukuthi ababizwe kulo mcimbi bayingxenye yabazohlomula yize kungesibo bonke, waqinisekisa ukuthi ngokuhamba kwesikhathi umnyango uzimisele ukuthi bonke ondlunkulu bahlomule kulolu hlelo.Ekhuluma emcimbini wokwethulwa kwalo , uNkk Sithole-Moloi uthe umnyango ubulokhu uxhasa ubuholi bomdabu, kodwa ubungakenzi ngokwanele ngasohlangothini londlunkulu“ Kuyagqugquzela ukuthi iningi londlunkulu livele seliqale ukusebenza ngaphambi kokuthi lolu hlelo lwethulwe ngokusemthethweni.  Kuyajabulisa ukwethula lolu hlelo olubalulekile ngosuku lokubungaza abesifazane lomhlaba wonke,” usho kanje.USihlalo weNdlu yabaHoli boMdabu KwaZulu-Natal, Inkosi Sifiso Shinga, ukushayele ihlombe okwenziwe yilo mnyango.

UCIKEKILE umndeni wephoyisa eliboshelwe icala lokushaya libulale unina ngepulangwe elinezipikili KwaDabeka, eClermont, ngokuthi umsolwa ubemoyizelela intombi enkantolo.Umndeni kaConstable Lungisani “Mazambane” Xaba (48), uthe umsolwa uwenza izilima ngokuwushonisa ngapha nangapha.UXaba usolwa ngokushaya ngepulangwe unina uNkk Greta Xaba (81) waze wasuswa ngamaphoyisa ambopha. Umufi wayehamba ngesihlalo esinamasondo ngenxa yokukhubazeka.Sekujwayelekile ukuthi uXaba uma evela eNkantolo yeMantshi yasePinetown icala lihlehliswe njengoba nangoLwesithathu lihlehliselwe isonto elizayo.NgoLwesithathy ucele imantshi ukuthi imnikeze igunya apequlule isikhwama afike esiphethe enkantolo lapho ekhiphe khona iphepha ebelinesitatimende asibhale ngesandla.Ubefuna sifundwe kodwa inkantolo yathi lokhu kuzoba ingxenye yobufakazi azobethula uma sekwenziwa izindlalelo zokuqala kokuqulwa kwecala.Ubephikelela eze eqophisana nommeli wakhe womdabu waseNdiya kwagcina sekungenelele utolika wohlanga eqondisa inkulumo phakathi kwabo.UXaba useshintshe abameli izikhawu ezinhlanu. Uyaye akhale nangokugula kugcine kuguqe icala.Useke wagibela ebhokisini labasolwa egqoke umnazaretha waKwaShembe. Phambilini wacela imantshi imnikeze igunya lokubuyela ejele eWestville atoke kulona nomuthi womkhuhlane ekhala ngomkhuhlane onzima athi uhlasele khona kodwa wenqatshelwa.“Usenza izilima, ukushintsha kwakhe abameli kukhomba khona ukuthi uyawazi umthetho futhi udlaladlala ngawo. Ngokubuka kwethu akakhombisi ukuzisola ngento ayenza ebulala ukhulu. Akathukile, akasabi futhi ukhululekile nje,” kubalisa umshana kaXaba, uNksz Siyethemba Xaba.UXaba ubegqoke isiklibha esimnyama esinemikhono emide ne-jean enavy namateku.Uvele wamoyizela ebona intombi yakhe enkantolo ebikade izomeseka. Bamiselane izithupha nayo sabantu abebekade bebingelelana avele anengeka amalungu omndeni kamufi.Isigameko senzeka emzini kanina kaXaba, KwaDabeka, ngoMeyi 6, 2022.UXaba obesebe iphoyisa iminyaka engaphezu kuka-10 esiteshini samaphoyisa saKwaDabeka, waboshwa ngoMeyi 7, 2022.Wabekwa icala lokushaya ngenhloso yokulimaza, elashintshwa laba ngelokubulala sekushone unina esibhedlela ngoMeyi 8.

APHUME enkantolo edangele amalungu omphakathi abekade ezokweseka umndeni womfana (8) owabulawa ngokushaywa nangokuklinywa kwaboshwa uyise.La malungu abekade esuka KwaNdengezi, ezwe izolo esefike enkantolo ukuthi iMantshi u-L Gorie, elalele icala, ibambekile ngakho ayikho emsebenzini.Lezi zindaba azehlanga kahle kulaba bantu kwazise sebegqigqe izikhawu eNkantolo yeMantshi yasePinetown icala linganyakazi.Umsolwa uMnuz Siyabonga Innocent Shezi, ungene isikhashana enkantolo wase ebuyiselwa ezitokisini.UShezi wayekade enqatsheliwe ibheyili ngokwedlule kodwa manje usefake isicelo sayo kabusha.Phambilini wafakaza ezihlangula ukuthi nguye owabulala indodana yakhe uSfundo Sibisi.Wacela inkantolo ukuthi imdedele khona ezokwazi ukunakekela unina ogulayo nomndeni wakhe futhi avuse ibhizinisi lakhe lokudayisa oswidi namagwinya.Emuva kwalobu bufakazi, umshushisi uMnuz Rowen Souls watshela inkantolo ukuthi uzobiza umphenyi wecala azofakaza aphikise okwakushiwo uShezi..Wacela inkantolo ukuthi ihlehlise icala ukuze iphoyisa elingumphenyi liye kohlwaya ulwazi futhi liqinisekise okwakade kushiwo uShezi enkantolo.Kusukela lapho icala alikaze lihlale, selihlehle kwaze kwaba kathathu.Unina kaSfundo, uNksz Nonhlanhla Sibisi uvele ahlengezele izinyembezi uma ekhuluma ngokuhlehla njalo kwecala athi kuyamhlukumeza emoyeni.Uveze ukuthi ngokudlule wafaka isikhalo enkantolo ngokubambezeleka kwecala, lapho atshelwa khona ukuthi uShezi unelungelo lokucela ibheyili.Kusolakala ukuthi uShezi walanda uSfundo kubo kanina, waya naye ehlathini eNtshongweni lapho afike wamshaya khona wamklinya ngentambo washona.Isigameko senzeka ngoJanuwari nyakenye sekusele izinsukwana ukuthi umufi ayoqala uGrade 3 esikoleni uMthala Primary. Umufi washona sekusele izinyanga ezintathu ahlaganise iminyaka eyisishiyagalolunye.UNksz Sibisi watshela Isolezwe ukuthi uShezi wabulala uSfundo ngoba ethi ‘umqaqa upende’ emuva kokuthi emalile futhi engayizwa eyokuthi babuyelane.

ISIMO besimuncu esiteshini samaphoyisa KwaMashu, izolo, kulandela ukuthi amaphoyisa amabili akulesi siteshi abanjwe enza ubugebengu njengoba elilodwa lidutshulwe labulawa, elinye lakhalelwa ngamasongo kaSgonyela.La maphoyisa kusolakala ukuthi abeyingxeye yezigebengu eziyisishiyagalolunye ezisolwa ukuthi zibambe inkunzi esitolo e-Richmond Farm, okuthe uma sezikakwe amaphoyisa eLindelani, eNtuzuma, ngeSonto, zadubula amaphoyisa aphindisela kwashona ezintathu. Esisodwa bekuyiphoyisa lakuso lesi siteshi.NgoMsombuluko, elinye iphoyisa lakulesi siteshi elikwazile ukubaleka ngesikhathi kudutshulwana yize bese lidubuleke engalweni, likhalelwe amasongo kaSgonyela likwesinye sezibhedlela enyakatho yeTheku lelashwa inxeba lokudutshulwa. Umthombo waleli phephandaba okuso lesi siteshi, uthe isimo besimuncu kungasebenzeki ngenxa yalezi zindaba.“Siphoxeke kakhulu ngesikuzwile ukuthi ozakwethu ebese sinesikhathi sinabo sithole ukuthi bebeyingxenye yethimba lezigebengu,” kusho lo mthombo.Uthe abanye ozakwabo bebengakholwa becabanga ukuthi kunephutha kuze kube bakhonjiswa izithombe.  Iphoyisa eliboshwe esibhedlela liwu-constable, kanti elishonile liwusayitsheni. Okhulumela amaphoyisa kulesi sifundazwe,  uLt Col Colonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe iphoyisa eliboshiwe u-constable oneminyaka engu-38, kanti elishonile belingakadalulwa igama lalo kodwa ozakwabo balichaze njengosayitsheni obeseneminyaka eyevile ku-20 eyiphoyisa. "Umsolwa oboshwe esibhedlela kulindeleke ukuthi avele enkantolo maduze nje," kusho uNetshiunda.UNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa, uMnuz Senzo Mchunu obehambele eMlaza lapho kudutshulwe khona abantu abayisithupha bashona, ngoMsombuluko, ephawula ngalesi sigameko, uthe baphoxekile ngokuthi kubasolwa bekunamaphoyisa."Siyawanxusa amaphoyisa ukuthi noma ngabe abhekene nasiphi isimo angangeni ebugebengwini. Kuyasikhathaza futhi  kwenza nokuthi sibheke izinhlelo zethu zokuqasha amaphoyisa ukuthi amaphoyisa kube yiwo enza ubugebengu. La maphoyisa  ebusuku ngoMgqibelo abesemsebenzini. Aphuma ekuseni ayozibandabakanya nobugebengu. Amaphoyisa amaningi asebenza kahle kodwa lesi sigameko sisiphoxile," kusho uMchunu.UKhomishana wamaPhoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi, uthe abasolwa bangamaphoyisa baphume emsebenzini bayokwenza ubugebengu besagqoke umfaniswano wamaphoyisa. Kusolwa ukuthi abasolwa bebeyisishiyagalolunye ngesikhathi beficwa ngamaphoyisa komunye wemizi eLindelani. Ngokuthola kwaleli phephandaba, iphoyisa elisale enkundleni lingelokuzalwa eMabheleni, kuthiwa like lasebenza esiteshini samaphoysisa eNtuzuma kodwa belisesiteshini saKwaMashu. Ozakwabo bathi belingakukhonzile ukukhuluma kakhulu.Eliboshiwe, ozakwabo balichaza njengomuntu ozikhululekele, naye osenesikhashana ekhona embuthweni wamaphoyisa. Isolezwe  lithole ukuthi uhlala eNtuzuma eduze kwalapho amaphoyisa eqale khona ngesikhathi efuna umkhondo wabasolwa. Kuchaphazeleka lawa maphoyisa nje esigamekweni sobugebengu, sikhulu isililo ngobugebengu obudla lubi emgwaqweni uDumisani Makhaye ongakwaMashu nasehostela lakule ndawo. Kuke kwavela ne-video ekhombisa abafana abasebancane bephethe futhi beqhumisa izibhamu emini kwabha ehostela. Amaphoyisa akhulume neSolezwe angagunyaziwe ukukhuluma nabezindaba, akhale ngobugebengu obusehostela abathi budla lubi ngale ndlela yokuthi budinga izinsiza eziningi nokuncipha kwesibalo samaphoyisa nakho kunomthelela. Khonamanjalo, izolo ntambama amaphoyisa adubule abulala abasolwa ababili okuthiwa bebefunwa eStanger. Ngesikhathi sokushicilela abesamatasa endaweni yesigameko.

KUME ingqondo emndenini wakwaMbeje, eNewlands West, kunyamalala ilungu lawo libuya esabatheni ngoMgqibelo.UNksz Senamile Mbeje (18) kuthiwa wagcina ukubonwa umndeni wakhe ephuma ethempelini eThandazani.Ngokusho kukanina, uNkk Nkosigiphile Mbeje, uSenamile waphuma emva kokuphela kwenkonzo yokuqala, engumuntu oya ekhaya.“Kwakungabo-11:30 ehamba enkonzweni sazitshela ukuthi sizomfica ekhaya. Sashaqeka uma singamfici. Saze sabuyela emumva ethempelini siyombheka kodwa nakhona sangamthola,” kulandisa uNkk Mbeje.Uthe ngokwejwayelekile uSenamile uye ahambe naye ngemoto uma beya noma bebuya ethempelini. Uthe kokunye, kuyenzeka ahambe nabangani bakhe ngezinyawo kodwa ngosuku anyamalale ngalo wayehamba yedwa.“Sididekile ukuthi kwenzekeni ngempela ngoba uSenamile akalona uhlobo lomuntu owuvanzi. Uhlala ezihlalele ekhaya, futhi uwumuntu othulayo, akufani naye ukuthi avele anyamalale nje angaziwa, le nto iyasethusa,” kusho uNkk Mbeje.Amaphoyisa abengakayiphenduli imibuzo athunyelwe ngalolu daba.

UDIDWA isinyathelo sesosha eselifuna ibheyili ekubeni laliyibongile umndeni wowesifazane owadutshulwa yilomsolwa ngoJanuwari 2024.Isosha loMbutho wezeMpi eNingizimu Afrika, uMnuz Lwanda Zungu belivele eNkantolo yeMantshi yasePinetown eyocela ibheyili ngoLwesithathu.Usolwa ngokudubula amahlandla ayisithupha esifubeni nasentanyeni abulale inkosikazi yakhe uNkk Tania Msane-Zungu ngoJanuwari nonyaka.Isihlobo sikamufi, esicele ukuba ligodlwe igama laso ukuze siphephise impilo yaso, sithe bewumndeni kuyabahlukumeza ukuthi uZungu acele ibheyili.“Sisazama ukwamukela isimo nendlela umufi abulawa ngayo sithole ukuthi lendoda (uZungu) isaqhubeka nesicelo sebheyili eyayikade isinqabile ekuqaleni. Kuyasidida ukuthi kanti ihloseni umthetho wayo,” kusho isihlobo.Siqhube sathi okwenziwa uZungu kukhombisa izinsolo zokuthi akukho ukuzisola kwakwenza.Sidalule nokuthi kuyawuhlukumeza umndeni ukulokhu ugqigqa enkantolo icala linganyakazi.“Siyathemba ukuthi umthetho uzothatha indawo yawo njengoba sizoqhubeka size enkantolo sizolalela isicelo sebheyili,” kusho isihlobo.IMantshi uGwendolyn Robinson ikuhlehlisele u-Ephreli 12 ukulalelwa kwesicelo sebheyili kaZungu.Ithe lucinene uhlu lwamacala asenkantolo adinga iwalalele adinga ibheyili. Imantshi ithe aphakathi kwamahlanu kuya kwangu-10 amacala ebheyili  ewalalela ngosuku.Usho kanje emuva kokuthi ummeli kaZungu, u-Advocate Muzi Mzelemu etshele inkantolo ukuthi uMbuso usumhlinzekile isitifiketi abekade esifuna esivela ehhovisi likamqondisi wabashushi KwaZulu-Natal.Lesi sitifiketi sicacisa ukuthi uZungu ubekwe icala lokubulala okuhleliwe eliwela esigabeni sesithupha.Ngakho kumele abekele inkantolo amaphuzu anqala futhi angejwayelekile angenza imantshi imnikeze noma imncishe ibheyili.UZungu oqatha ngomzimba futhi osheshayo uma ehamba, ungene enkantolo edlubhe isikibha, itracksuit namateku okumnyama. Ubengaliphucile ikhanda nentshebe.Bekukhona namalungu omphakathi nawenhlangano elwa nodlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane, abebezokweseka umndeni kamufi obusenkantolo.

KUSIZE ukungenelela kwejaji lalamula seyiqala ukuphakama imimoya esigcawini esiqondisa ubugwegwe uMengameli wezimantshi KwaZulu-Natal, ngoLwesithathu ekuseni.Umsindo usuke ngesikhathi abameli beKhomishini yeziMantshi eqondisa ubugwegwe uMnuz Eric Nzimande, besola ummeli wakhe uMnuz Ravindra Maklilall ngokufihla imininingwane azogadla ngalo esigcawini.Laba bameli basole uMaklilall “ngokubalalela unyendle” bathi sekwenzeke izikhawu lapho evele ahoshe amaphepha  abangenawo, maqede ahlome imibuzo ufakazi wabo, uMnuz Johaness Meijer.Lokhu kwenze usihlalo wesigcawu, iJaji uJeremiah Shongwe, wangenelela sekuqala ukuphakama imimoya.UMaklilall ubekade eqeda nje ukudlulisela uMeijer amaphepha awahoshe emqingweni wakhe efuna awabuke bese ephendula imibuzo ethile.Ukhuzile uShongwe wathi uyasiqonda isikhalazo esifakiwe, wase eyalela ukuba kulandelwe imigomo ekuyiyona yokwenza izinto esigcawini.UNzimande usemiswe isikhathi esiyiminyaka emihlanu emsebenzini. Usolwa ngokugwazisa ngemali nangocansi ababefuna izikhundla zokuba izimantshi okwesikhashana, ukugembula eCasino ngesikhathi somsebenzi nokushayela ucingo owayemangalelwe ecaleni owagcina ephume phambili.UNzimande uwaphika wonke amacala angu-162 athweswe wona. Isigcawu siyaqhubeka enkantolo edingida amacala athinta imindeni ePhoyinti eThekwini.

BADLULE ezimweni ezinzima abafundi abevile ku-732 000 abazobhala u-matric kulo nyaka. Ezinye zalezi zimo kubalwa ukuphazanyiswa wubhubhane lwegciwane iCovid-19, ngesikhathi benza uGrade 8, ngo-2020. ICovid-19 yaphazamisa imikhakha eminingi yawisa umnotho, yavala thaqa izwe.Lokhu kuvezwe nguDkt Barney Mthembu, iphini likamqondisi jikelele elibhekele uhlelo lokufunda eMnyangweni weMfundo eyisiSekelo izolo, ngesikhathi bechazela ikomiti lasePhalamende ngamalungiselelo okubhalwa kwezivivinyo zika-matric, eziqala ngenyanga ezayo.UMthembu uthe ngo-2021, ngesikhathi laba bafundi benza uGrade 9, lwalusadlangile ubhubhane.Uthe okunye okubalulekile ngalaba bafundi ngukuthi ngesikhathi benza uGrade R ngo-2012, kwakuqala uhlelo okufundwa ngalo manje ezikoleni zakuleli, i-Curriculum and Assessment Policy Statement  (CAPS).“ICovid-19 yabaphazamisa kakhulu nagesikhathi sekumele bakhethe izifundo abazozenza kwaGrade 10. Othisha babelova, kwadingeka ezinye izinto zingafundwa ngenxa yobhubhane olwaphazamisa izinto eziningi kwezemfundo,” kusho uMthembu.Uthe kwakudingeka bashintshane uma beya ezikoleni ukuze bangathelelelani ngegciwane ngakho babengezi zonke izinsuku ezikoleni.UDkt Rufus Poliah, obhekele izivivinyo emnyangweni, uthe sandile isibalo sababhala u-matric ngabangu-8 400.Uveze ukuthi isifundazwe iKwaZulu-Natal yisona esinesibalo esiphezulu sababhalayo.“Sebebonke ababhalayo bangu-732 448, iKZN yona inabafundi abangu-172 213 ababhalayo. Kulandela iGauteng ngabangu-136 620, indawo yesithathu kulele i-Eastern Cape ngabangu-103 975.” Uthe bangu-136 195 ababhala ngasese ezikhungweni ezingu-6 909.“Zingu-23 izikole ezifundazweni eziyisishiyagalolunye ezibhalisa i-South African Sign language. Bangu-210 abafundi ababhala lesi sifundo.”Izivivinyo ziqala ngo-Okthoba 21, ziphothulwe ngoNovemba 27. Bangu-55 053 abaqokelwe ukumaka u-matric ezikhungweni ezingu-188.UNgqongqoshe walo mnyango, uNksz Siviwe Gwarube, uthe konke sekumi ngomumo ngokubhalwa kwalezi zivivinyo.Uthe kuningi okwenziwe ngumnyango wakhe ukulungiselela izivivinyo.“Abafundi bakulungele ukubhala izivivinyo zebanga lokugcina emfundweni yamabanga aphansi. Othisha basebenze kanzima ukulungiselela abafundi ukuthi babhale abakufundile,” kusho uNksz Gwarube.

ATHUKUTHELE avala umgwaqo ngemfucuza amalungu omphakathi aseZimbokodweni, ku-Ward 93 ngaphansi kukaMasipala weTheku izolo, ekhala ngokungahlinzekwa ngamanzi.Lo mphakathi uthi sekuphele izinyanga ezintathu amanzi engaphumi kompompi.Ilungu lomphakathi uMnuz Xulu Xulu, ekhuluma neSolezwe, uthe sebethembela emanzini abawakha efemini eseduze."Amaloli aletha amanzi ayafika, kodwa agcina ephelela emzini ethile.
