Amanzi esiwathola kule femu nawo awekho ezingeni eligculisayo lezempilo, " usho kanje.Imizamo yokuthola ikhansela lendawo ayiphumelekanga njengoba ucingo lwalo belungangeni kwaze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela.Elinye ilungu lomphakathi elizibize ngoKhwela elithe lisondelene nekhansela, litshele Isolezwe ukuthi ikhansela alithandi ukuphawula kwabezindaba ngalolu daba kwazise seludluliselwe ophikweni olubhekelele ukuhlinzekwa komphakathi ngamanzi.Lisole abanye kule ndawo nokuphehla umphakathi elithe kunenhlese yezepolitiki.Liqinisekise ukuthi akhona amathangi amanzi kodwa uXulu uveze ukuthi  nawo abuye angafakwa amanzi nokuyinto ekhathaza kakhulu umphakathi.Lo mphakathi uvala umgwaqo nje kunenkinga yamanzi ezindaweni eziningi eThekwini. Le nkinga emasontweni amabili edlule ibonakale idlulela ngesikhathi kunesiteleka sabasebenzi. Ezindaweni eziningi imiphakathi ibizwakalisa ukungenami kwayo ngalesi simo sokweswela amanzi nogesi ngokuvala imigwaqo ishise amathayi.

BAKHATHAZEKILE abazali bezingane ezifunda esikoleni iNtathakusa High, eBergville okuthiwa sekungenele esontweni lesihlanu ziduve emakhaya emva kokumiselwa ukulwa esikoleni.Abafundi okuthiwa bevile kwabayishumi bafunda u-Grade 10 kuya ku-Grade 12,  bamiswe isigungu esibhekele ukuqondiswa kobugwegwe esikoleni emva kokulwa emagcekeni esikole ngoFebhuwari. Kuthiwa impi yabo isuswa ukupiklelana, njengoba abanye behlala elokishini, abanye bengabasemapulazini.Umzali okhathazekile ongathandanga ukudalulwa ukuvikela ingane yakhe, uthe ikomiti lesikole elengamele lolu daba, lilokhu lihlehlisa lingaphumi nesinqumo, okubakhathazayo njengoba kuhamba isikhathi. “Angiphikisani nokuthi izingane zijeziswe uma zonile, kodwa azingaphucwa ilungelo lokufunda.  Besilokhu sibizelwa emhlanganweni kodwa isikole singaphumi nesinqumo. Sitshelwe ukuthi udaba selusingethwe ihhovisi loMnyango wezeMfundo,” usho kanje.Uthe batshelwe ukuthi umnyango ufuna isikole sidlulisele uhlu lwabafundi abalwayo esikoleni.Uthe ukulwa kwabo akusiyo into eqhubekayo kodwa kwaba yinto yangalelo langa kanti abakutholayo ukuthi kwapiklelana izingane ezihlala elokishini elikuleya ndawo nezihlala emapulazini.Omunye umzali uthe isikole kumele siqhamuke nendlela yokuxazulula lesi simo kodwa kuqikelelwe ukuthi izingane azilahlekelwa imfundo.“Esikufisayo ukuthi izingane zibuyele esikoleni zifunde. Ingane yami nekadadewethu ezifunda uGrade 10 zijika nelanga ngenxa yalesi simo, ” kubalisa yenaUSihlalo wesigungu esilawula isikole uMnuz D.A Hlongwane ukuqinisekisile ukumiswa kwabafundi abalwa esikoleni wathi udaba lusingethwe wumnyango.“Sinenkinga enkulu kulesi sikole. Othisha bafunda besaba izingane zingena nezikhali ezinkulu esikoleni. Lolu dlame lwabafundi selunesikhathi lwaqala kangangoba nyakenye singcwabe umfundi ngenxa yalo yingakho konke sekudluliselwe emnyangweni ukuze kube yiwona ophuma nezinqumo, ” usho kanje.Uthe i sikole senze kahle ku-matric ngonyaka odlule sithola imiphumela engaphezu kuka-90%, kodwa isimo sobudlova kubafundi singaphazamisa umgqigqo yingakho kumiswe nabafunda u-matric abathinteka odlameni.  Uqinisekise ukuthi baningi abamisiwe nakuba engasishongo isibalo esishaya emhloleni.UMnuz Muzi Mahlambi okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo  akayiphendulanga imibuzo athunyelelwe yona ngalolu daba.

I-IFP yenze umzekeliso ngokushweba kwe-MK iKwaZulu-Natal nesimo sezintombi ezinhlanu kulezo ezilishumi okukhulunywa ngazo eBhayibhelini, ezozela zalala zashweba ekutholeni umyeni.Iqembu eliholwa uhulumeni wobumbano ophethe iKwaZulu-Natal, i-IFP, lithe ukungaphathi kwe-MK esifundazweni kuyafana nokwenzeka ezintombini ezaphuthwa umendo ngenxa yokuthi azizange ziwaphathe amafutha okukhanyisa izibani zazo.I-MK iyona eyathola izihlalo eziningi esiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal, njengoba inezihlalo ezingu-37 kwezingu-80, kepha isifundazwe siphethwe ngokubambisana yi-IFP, ANC, DA ne-NFP, abanezihlalo ezingu-41 uma behlanganisiwe.Ngesikhathi kunenkulumo mpikiswano esiShayamthetho, izolo, amalungu e-MK, akhale ngokuncishwa ithuba lokuphatha iKwaZulu-Natal yize kuyiyo eyathola amavoti amaningi esifundazweni.Inkulumo mpikiswano ibibizelwe ukuzoxoxa ngenkulumo eyethulwe uNdunankulu, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, ngoLwesithathu.Ohola i-MK esiShayamthetho, uMnuz Mervyn Dirks, uthe uNtuli akafanelwe ukuphatha isifundazwe, wathi uzosuka maduzane.“Abantu baKwaZulu-Natal bavotela i-MK ngobuningi. Ngokuhlakanipha ke kwenu namaqembu enibambisene nawo, naphuca i-MK ithuba lokuthi iphathe isifundazwe. Angeke sibenzele phansi abantu baKwaZulu-Natal abavotela i-MK, sizoqhubeka silwe. Ukungaphathi kwethu kuyinto yesikhashana.”La mazwi ananelwe elinye ilungu le-MK, uMnuz Sithembiso Magubane, okhale ngokuthi alikho iqembu elasondela kwi-MK ngamavoti KwaZulu-Natal.I-MK yathola amavoti angaphezu kuka-1,6 million KwaZulu-Natal, iqembu eliyilandelayo, i-IFP yathola amavoti angaphezu kuka-600 000.Ilungu le-IFP, uMnuz Mntomuhle Khawula, lithe abe-MK kufanele bazinuke amakhwapha ngokungaphathi kwabo iKwaZulu-Natal.UKhawula uthe njengoba lingekho iqembu elanqoba ngamalengiso KwaZulu-Natal, wonke amaqembu kwakufanele angene ezingxoxweni zokubusa ngokubambisana.“Izandla zazivuliwe kuwo wonke amaqembu ukuba axoxe kodwa kwaba khona akhetha ukungaxoxi ngoba nakhu ayekholelwa ukuthi wona alunqobile ukhetho. NaseBhayibhelini kukhulunywa ngezintombi ezilishumi. Kuyashiwo ukuthi zozela zalala ngesikhathi zisalinde umyeni. Kuyashiwo ukuthi lezo eziyizihlakaniphi zaphatha amafutha okukhanyisa izibani awenele, lezo eziyiziwula aziwaphatha amafutha.”Elinye ilungu le-IFP, uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi, lithe ukwakhiwa kohulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal kwakungeke kuvinjwe yiqembu elinezihlalo ezingu-37.“Abantu be-MK kufanele bafundiswe ipolitiki.”UNtuli uthe angeke kuyisize ngalutho i-MK ukubalisa, wathi kufanele ingakhohlwa ukuthi ayizange inqobe ngamalengiso.“Ukuze uphathe isifundazwe kufanele uthole ngaphezu kuka-50% wamavoti. Alikho iqembu elathola ngaphezu kuka-50% wamavoti lapha KwaZulu-Natal. Amaqembu aphethe athola u-55% wamavoti uma ehlanganisiwe. Ingakho ephethe.“Ukubalisa angeke kubasize ngalutho abantu baKwaZulu-Natal. Manje sekufanele ukuthi wonke amaqembu asebenzisane ukuze kufezwe izidingo zabantu.”

UMPHAKATHI wasehostela laKwaMashu ukhala ngobugebengu obuhambisana nokubulawa kwabantu okuthiwa kwenziwa abafana abancane abasatshwayo.Umhlali ocele kugodlwe igama lakhe obona engaphephile, uthe la bafana basiqhumisa umlibe isibhamu kubuka wonke umuntu. “Abafana abasebancane abenza le nto. Sidinga ezokuphepha ziqine, kufakwe amaphoyisa. Izibhamu ziningi ehostela. Kunzima nokukhuluma ngale nto emphakathini ngoba kukhona abantu abagade la bafana ababatshela ukuthi ubani uthini, kubani ngabo,” kusho umhlali.Omunye umhlali, uthe ubugebengu budlangile ehostela awukwazi ukuhamba ukhululeke ebusuku.“Ukuhamba nje uphumele phandle, ngisho ubheka umngani noma isihlobo uthuka izanya ngoba usuke uzokhuthuzwa noma uthathelwe izinto oziphethe ulinyazwe,” kusho umhlali.Uthe yizingane ezincane ezihluphayo eziphuma ehostela ziyokwenza ubugebengu.Ulandise wathi emasontweni amabili edlule zidune iloli yotshwala zeza nayo ehostela kwaba umazitapele.Ngesonto eledlule kube esifanayo kudunwa iloli yenyama. Emuva kwalokho uthe akulalwanga izibhamu zaqhuma kwaze kwasa emuva kokuthi kudutshulwe kwafa omunye walaba bafana.“Le zingane zinezibhamu. Asihleli kahle ehostela. Ukuba kuya ngami bekuzoba nomahamba nendlwana wesiteshi samaphoyisa ehostela. Uma kuqhuma isibhamu asizwe eseduzane amaphoyisa,” kusho umhlali.Ikhansela lendawo, uMnuz Mzwethu Gwala, lithe inkulu inkinga ekhungethe ihostela futhi wamtshela umphathi wesiteshi samaphoyisa endawo ngokumele kwenziwe yena wenza okwakhe.UGwala uthe watshela umasteshi ukuthi akalande amaphoyisa kazwelonke azotshalwa ehostela ukuze akhuculule izibhamu athe zigcwele.“Isixazululo engasinikezwa wumphakathi ukuthi kwenziwe njengasehostela iGlebelands (eMlaza), kulandwe amaphoyisa kazwelonke ngoba awendawo kawanele futhi awanazo izinsiza kusebenza ezanele,” kusho uGwala.UGwala usole umphathi siteshi wathi wakuhlaba inhlali amtshela khona ayekuthunywe umphakathi.Uqhube wathi kunalokho wabiza amakhosi ukuba azokhuluma nabantu kwalandwa nebandla elafika lashiya umkhuleko.UGwala uqhube  wathi nsuku zonke kuqhuma isibhamu ehostela KwaMashu, kunezingane ezifunda ezikoleni zamabanga aphansi ezijomba igazi.“Kufa abantu abathathu kuya phezulu njalo ngesonto ehostela. La bantu babulawa ngokudutshulwa okukhomba inkinga yezibhamu ehostela,” kusho uGwala.Kwesikabhadakazi ngoLwesine kubikwa ukuthi kudutshulwe kwabulawa ibhungu nomalume walo.Ngeledlule amaphoyisa athe zikhona izinhlelo anazo zokulwa nobugebengu obuhlalise lubhojozi umphakathi emgwaqweni uDumisani Makhaye.Anxenxe abantu ukuthi babike ngobugebengu obenzeka ehostela futhi balekelele amaphoyisa ngemininingwane engaholela ekutheni kunqandwe izigelekeqe.Abe esekhuthaza abantu ukuthi bapheze ukuhamba kulo mgwaqo ngabodwana ebusuku okuyisikhathi okubikwa ukuthi lisuke libhubha ubugebengu.

UNEMIBUZO umndeni wowesilisa waseChesterville, eThekwini, okuthiwa wabulawa yisihlobo sikammangali ngaphakathi esiteshini samaphoyisa oThongathi, maphakathi nenyanga.Kuthiwa umufi, uMnuz Thabiso Shangase (29), wabhudukezwa yilona owesilisa, okuthiwa wayekhaphe udadewabo owayegqekezelwe eze esiteshini samaphoyisa.Ngokusho kukagogo kamufi, uNksz Jabu Mthembu, ngo-Ephreli 15, bathola ucingo lokuthi umufi useshaqwe ngamaphoyisa asoThongathi, esePhoenix.Uthe umufi uboshwa nje, uyamaniswa necala lokugqekeza okuthiwa lenziwa abesilisa ayebagibeze emotweni ayehamba ngayo ekhokhelwa ngebanga elihambile.“Sinikele khona esiteshini samaphoyisa, simphathele izingubo zokugqoka nokudla kodwa sahlala kwaze kwaba yileyo ndaba, singavunyelwa ukuba simbone,” kusho uNksz Mthembu.Uqhube wathi kukhona iphoyisa elabatshela ukuthi usaphume namanye amaphoysa, lathi uma kwenzeke njalo kusuke kuphakathi kokuthi uyoshawa noma uyokhomba indawo yesigameko.Uveze ukuthi kwabuye kwaba khona elinye abalijwayele, elabahlebela ukuthi amampunge ukuthi usaphumile, ukhona ngaphakathi esitokisini, limbonile, laze lakhuluma naye ngakho abaqhubeke balinde.“Laze lasitshela ukuthi ekuxoxeni kwalo naye, washo ukuthi uthe kwaleli cala aboshelwe lona akalenzanga, kodwa lenziwa yilaba abagibeza emotweni, wathi omunye wabo uyamazi. Lathi lamtshela ukuthi kuzofanele akhulume lonke iqiniso ngaphandle kokwesaba,” kusho uNksz Mthembu.Uqhube wathi bagcina begoduka ngabo-6.30 sekuhwalele bengambonanga, kwathi ngabo-9 ebusuku baphinde bathola olunye ucingo lubabizela esiteshini futhi.“Sathi uma sifika, kwathiwa asiphuthume esibhedlela Osindisweni siyombheka ngoba ulimele. Sathi uma sifika esibhedlela, udokotela wasitshela ukuthi ufike esibhedlela ngabo-7.30 ebusuku eseshonile,” kulandisa uNksz Mthembu.Uthe bathi uma bebabuza ukuthi kwenzakaleni, amaphoyisa abatshela ukuthi kwangena umfowabo kammangali, wamshaya.“Thina sixakwa ukuthi sanqatshelwa ukuthi simbone uThabiso, kodwa umhlaseli yena wavunyelwa ukungena. Sifisa ukwazi ukuthi kwenzeka kanjani lokho? Sifuna nokwazi ukuthi wazi kanjani ukuthi ukusiphi isitokisi?” usho kanje.Uphinde wathi kuyabakhathaza ukuthi isiphi isikhathi ahlaselwa ngaso njengoba bona bahamba ngabo-6.30 sekuhwalele esiteshini kanti udokotela wasoSindisweni uveze eyokuthi wafika ngo-7.30 eseshonile.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa asoThongathi aphenya icala lokubulala emva kokuthi umsolwa owayeboshwe ngecala lokugqekeza washawa ngaphakathi esiteshini samaphoyisa.“Umsolwa wakhishwa esitokisini umphenyi wecala ngenhloso yokwenza uphenyo. Ummangali naye wayeyalelwe ukuthi eze esiteshini samaphoyisa ukuzobhalisa isitatimende,” kusho uNetshiunda.Uqhube wathi ngesikhathi bengaphakathi ehhovisi, umfowabo kammangali wabhozomela umsolwa, owavele wawa waquleka.“Kwabizwa abezimo eziphuthumayo, wanikwa usizo oluphuthumayo endaweni yesigameko ngaphambi kokuba aphuthunyiswe esibhedlela lapho afike washonela khona,” kulandisa uNetshiunda.Uvese ukuthi umbulali waboshwa, wabekwa icala lokubulala, wathi uzophinde avele enkantolo ngoJuni 24.

UMPHAKATHI waseMzinyathi, eNanda, ufuna kuvalwe thaqa ukusebenzisa impophoma kwabelaphi bendabuko, kulandela ukwanda kwezigameko zobugebengu obushaqisayo.Izakhamuzi zakule ndawo zizwakalise ukukhathazeka kwazo emhlanganweni womphakathi ngeSonto, kulandela isigameko sakamumva lapho okutholwe khona isidumbu somuntu ongaziwa egwaziwe.Umufi kuthiwa ubonwe umthandazi obezokwenza izinto zakhe empophomeni ngoLwesine, wahlaba umkhosi emphakathini.Kuthiwa umphakathi uthutheleke khona, wambona umufi entanta emanzini, kwabizwa amaphoyisa, aze amkhipha ngoLwesihlanu emini.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi yize kungacaci ukuthi umufi ubulawe nini kodwa kuthiwa ezinsukwini ezimbalwa ngaphambi kokutholwa kwakhe, kwezwakala umuntu ekhala ecela usizo ebusuku khona empophomeni.Unobhala wohlaka olulwa nobugebengu endaweni, uMnuz Ndumiso Mzobe, uthe akusona esokuqala isigameko esishaqisayo senzeka empophomeni.“Emasontweni amabili edlule, umphakathi usize owesifazane obeshaywe kanzima yizigebengu, othe sezimkhiphise u-R20 000 kuwi-app yasebhange kumakhalekhukhwini,” kusho uMzobe.Uqhube wathi ngenyanga edlule kutholwe amathambo omuntu egaxele ematsheni empophoma.“Ziningi nje izigameko. Kwezinye kuye kuphucwe bona abelaphi bendabuko nalabo abasuke behamba nabo izimoto, amaselula nemali,” kusho yena.Uthe izigilamkhuba akuzona ezendawo, kodwa zingabantu abangaziwa ababona ithuba lokwenza ubugebengu kubantu abasuke bezokwenza izinto zokwelapha nokwelashwa.Ukhale ngokuthi ubugebengu sebukapakela nasemizini eyakhele impophoma.“Uma bebuye belambatha empophomeni, badubela kithina esakhele impophoma, basingenele ezindlini, bathathe noma yini abayifunayo.“Yikho sifinyelele ekutheni sivumelane ngokuthi akuvalwe ukusebenza kwempophoma ngoba ubugebengu buya ngokuya buba bubi kakhulu,” kubeka uMzobe.Induna, uThathokwakhe Gumede, ikuqinisekisile ukuthi sibi kakhulu isimo empophomeni.“Abantu bahlaselwa yizigebengu ezingaziwa emakhaya, empophomeni kutholwa abantu sebefile, kungaziwa babulawe nini. Lo wakamumva nje njengoba etholwe ngoLwesine, asazi wayebulawe nini. Phambilini, kutholwe amathambo omuntu, naye okungacaci wabulawa nini,” kusho uGumede.UMengameli wenhlangano yabelaphi bendabuko, iSouth Africa's Traditional Healers Association KwaZulu Natal, uMnuz Sazi Mhlongo naye ushaye amakhala ngokuhanjiswa kwabantu ezimpophomeni, wathi kungaba umbono omuhle ukuvalwa kwazo.Uthe izinyanga ezilapha abantu ngendlela yasemandulo, azikaze ziyalelwe ukuthi ziyise abantu ezimpophomeni.“Ukwelapha kwezikhathi zamanje sekwangenwa ngisho nayizigebengu, ubona sekwande abantu abayisa abantu ezimpophomeni. Lokhu kubeka sona isiguli nayo inyanga engozini yokugetshengwa. Kwabona bangajikelana bodwa, bagebengane,” kusho uMhlongo.Uphinde wenza isibonelo ngalabo abehlelwa umshophi wokuminziswa yizinyoka zezimpophoma neziziba, athe ukube akuyiwa kule zizindawo, ngabe awuze ungehla umshophi wokugwiliza namanzi,” kusho uMhlongo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Robert Netshiunda uthe amaphoyisa aseNanda aphenya idokodo lokufa komuntu emva kokutholwa kwesidumbu somuntu esesonakele empophomeni yaseNanda ngoLwesihlanu. Uthe izimo ezimayelana nalesi sehlakalo zisaphenywa.

UFUNA uzimpendulo nobulungiswa umndeni wowesilisa waseMangethe, eMandeni, ogwini olusenyakatho yaKwaZulu-Natal, odutshulwe wumlisa owaziwayo endaweni, wafela egcekeni kubo ngoLwesine ekuseni.Ilungu lomndeni kamufi, uFanele Mpanza (22), obaziwa ngoKela, elingathandanga ukudalulwa ngoba lisabela ukuphepha kwalo nomndeni walo, lithe lishaqeke kwaphela nasozwaneni ngenkathi lizwa lezi zindaba lisemsebenzini eThekwini.Lilandisa Isolezwe  ngokwenzekile, lithe umufi obebamba amatoho ezinkampanini zokupheka KwaDukuza, ubevakashile ekhaya ngenkathi kwenzeka lesi sigameko.“Umzali womshana wami ubesendlini ekuseni ngesikhathi ezwa impikiswano yamazwi egcekeni, waphuthuma khona ukuyozwa ukuthi ingane yakhe ixabana nobani. Kuthe ephuma phandle wazithela kumshana wami exhakathiswe ingalo yilo mlisa owaziwayo endaweni, obephethe isibhamu, kukhona abaphikisana ngakho, okungazwakalanga kahle ukuthi bebethini. “Kuthe uma umzali ebuza ukuthi kwenzenjani, umshana wami waphunyula kulo mlisa wabaleka eshona ezansi komuzi, wavele wamdubula kwesingezansi nangenhla ngemuva, waphelela khona lapho egcekeni kubuka umzali wakhe,” kusho owomndeni.Eqhuba, uthe kuthiwa kuthe bembuza ukuthi uyidubulelani ingane, wankwankwaza qede wasuka lapho washaya wachitha, eshiya umfana esethule egcekeni kwabo.“Kuyasikhathaza ukuthi kungani engakaboshwa namanje ngoba wumuntu owaziwayo endaweni futhi phezu kwakho konke lokho sifuna asichazele ukuthi uze ubulala ingane kamfowethu ngesihluku esingaka nje bekwenzenjani. Yingane lena, uma ngabe beyonile bekumele asichazele kahle ukuthi yoneni, uma kuyinto esengalungiseka sizame ukuyilungisa kahle,’’ usho kanje.Uthe kumanje banovalo ngoba abaqondi ukuthi isenzo salo mlisa ngebesiqondene nomufi kuphela yini noma usazobuya futhi azoqotha wonke umndeni ukucisha ubufakazi.“Njengoba ngikhuluma nawe nje angizange ngibuthi quthu ubuthongo ngenxa yokwesaba futhi okunye okubuhlungu wukuthi umshana wami ushiye izingane ezintathu emhlabeni, ezisencane nezisamdinga ukuzikhulisa,” kubalisa owomndeni.POLICE COMMENT HERE

UZIBUZA uyaziphendula ukuthi kwenzekani ngosuku lwesehlo udadewabo wowesifazane oboshelwe icala lokubulala indodakazi yakhe eyayineminyaka engu-14 emzini okwa-D KwaMashu.Owesifazane, ongathandanga ukuthi kudalulwe igama lakhe, usho kanje emuva kokuvela kukaNksz Ncamisile Hlophe (43) eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseNtuzuma ngoLwesithathu.Usolwa ngokubulala uLuvuyo Tafadzwe Bera isidumbu sakhe esasinamanxeba amathathu okushaywa ngento ethile esiphundu futhi sinezibazi zokuklinywa.Wanqatshelwa ibheyili ngo-Agasti imantshi yakhala ngendlela enesihluku okwabulawa ngayo umufi owayehlala nomsolwa.“Asazi nathi ukuthi kwenzekani ngoba babehlala bobabili ekhaya. Asikholwa namanje ukuthi uyena oboshelwe leli cala ngoba asimazi engumuntu ongenza into efana nalena aboshelwe yona,” kusho udadewabo kamsolwa.Uveze ukuthi umufi uhlale okokuqala nonina ngonyaka odlule emuva kweminyaka elishumi ekade ehlala noyise eGauteng.Uthe ngeke aphawule ngokuthi bebunjani ubudlelwano bengane nonina ngoba ubengahlali nabo.“Sisamangele nathi ukuthi kwakwenzenjani? Asazi noma baxabana noma wayekade engenwe okuthile (umsolwa). Njengoba siza lapha enkantolo yingoba sifuna ukuthola izimpendulo,” kusho owesifazane obephathele umsolwa okuya ethunjini.Phambilini evela enkantolo umsolwa, omakhelwane bakhe bathi abamazi enjena, bebemazi engumuntu olungile ngakho kumele akhulume iqiniso ukuthi kwenzekani.Uyise wengane ubekhona enkantolo izolo ehamba nowesifazane obefake indandatho. Laba ababili bahlale ngokwehlukana enkantolo nodadewabo kamsolwa. Ngenxa yokuphuthuma owesilisa akakwazanga ukukhuluma nentatheli wacela ukuthi imshayele ucingo.Kuthe uma ethintwa ngocingo wacela ukuba abuye afonelwe.Kuthiwa ngoJulayi 22 nonyaka umsolwa watshela amaphoyisa ukuthi umufi waphuza amaphilisi ekhanda wawa phansi esuka embhedeni ayelele kuwona.Kodwa emuva kokuhlolwa kwesidumbu kwabe sekuvulwa icala lokubulala sekutholakele ukuthi umufi akazishonelanga.Icala lihlehlele u-Okthoba 8 nonyaka ngenxa yokuthi kalifikanga enkantolo idokodo. Kuvele nokuthi icala liphenywa abaseshi ezingeni lesifundazwe.

ILUNGU le-IFP ePhalamende likazwelonke, uMnuz Narend Singh, lithi sekuyisikhathi sokuthi kubhekisiswe ukubuyiswa kwesigwebo sentambo ukuqinisekisa ukubhekana nabenzi bamacala ahlukumeza umphakathi.Ubekhuluma nabezindaba ngesikhathi eyobhonga emswaneni emndenini womfundi, uLusanda Nkomo (10) waseMkhomazi, isidumbu sakhe esitholwe silaxazwe ehlathini elingaphesheya kwakubo. Kulesi sigameko kuboshwe umakhelwane oyiNdiya, uMnuz Rojas Teruman (57), obevele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseScottsburg ngesonto eledlule, icala lahlehliselwa u-Ephreli 17, nonyaka.USingh uthe ukulahleka kwempilo yengane engenacala kuyinto ebuhlungu, engabekezeleki. “Ukubulawa kwengane encane kangaka okusolwa ukuthi kwenziwe umakhelwane, kuyadumaza kakhulu. Sekunesikhathi sikhuluma ngokuthi kubhekwe ukubuyiswa kwesigwebo sentambo. Uma ufika emakhaya okwenzeke kuwo izigameko ezinjengalezi, ubona omama bekhathazekile futhi kwaziwa ukuthi ubani isigilamkhuba, kushiya imibuzo ekutheni kungani leso sigilamkhuba sifanele ukuphila?” usho kanje.Uthe bayakuqonda ukuthi uMthethosisekelo wakuleli uqinisekisa ukuthi wonke umuntu unelungelo lokuphila, kodwa esikhathini esifuze lesi, uyazibuza ukuthi uMthethosisekelo uthini ngelungelo lokuphila labagilwa?Isidumbu sikaLusanda okuthiwa ubefunda uGrade 4 esikoleni iDrift Primary, kuthiwa satholwa umelusi wemfuyo silahlwe ehlathini elingaphesheya kwemizi ngemuva kosuku anyamalala ngalo. Wayegcine ukubonakala ehamba nomsolwa oqashe kamakhelwane, izingane ezimbiza ngomalume, ngayizolo.Kuthiwa wayekade ephuma esontweni ngesikhathi ebizwa umsolwa emthuma okuthile esitolo, okuthe uma ebuya wamcela ukuthi amphelezele ayocinga inja yakhe emizini engaphesheya. Umphakathi obuthukuthele ugane unwabu ngesikhathi kutholwa isidumbu sentombazane, uphikelele lapho kuqashe khona umsolwa wakhiphela izimpahla zakhe emnyango wazokhela ngomlilo. USingh uthe nakuba ebuqonda ubuhlungu obuzwiwa umphakathi, kodwa ukuzithathela umthetho ngesandla akusona isixazululo. Unxuse amaphoyisa ukuthi asebenze ngokuzikhandla ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abenzi bobubi ezigamekweni ezinje, bayavalelwaULusanda ufihlwe izolo, emngcwabeni obuhanjelwe yizikhulu zikahulumeni wesifundazwe obekukhona kuzo uMphathiswa woMnyango wezokuHlaliswa kwaBantu nemiSebenzi yoMphakathi, uMnuz Sipho “KK” Nkosi nomqondisi-jikelele eHhovisi likaNdunankulu, uDkt Nonhlanhla Mkhize nabanye.

OSOMABHIZINISI baseHluhluwe bakhala ngokukhetha iphela emasini kukahulumeni waseNingizimu Afrika, okhombisa ukukholelwa kwabaqhamuka emazweni angaphandle, abathi babamise kabi kwezamabhizinisi.Lokhu kuvele emcimbini wokwethulwa kwentuthuko kwaMduku kumasipala iBig 5 Hlabisa muva nje. Bathe  sekuyisikhathi sokuthi uhulumeni ubuyekeze umthetho ovumela ukudayisa udede kwabokufika ukuze kuqedwe izingqinamba ababhekene nazo.UNksz Nompilo Vilane, uthe kuyabalimaza kakhulu ukukugcwala kwezitolo zabantu abaqhamuka kumazwe angaphandle njengoba idolobha labo lincane.“Asibe sisayibona nhlobo into esiyisebenzayo uma kuzogcwala abantu bokufika abagcina besiphuca iqatha emlonyeni ngenxa yamanani aphansi abadayisa ngawo impahla yabo. Singajabula uma uhulumeni engangenelela kule nkinga ukuze siyibone into esiyenzayo,” usho kanje.Imeya uMnuz Comfort Khumalo, ithe ukulawuleka kwalesi simo kuzolekelela kakhulu  ekulweni nobubha kubantu bakuleli abaswele imisebenzi.“Siqala ukuba nenkinga uma abantu bamazwe angaphandle kuyibo abanakwa ngaphezu kwabantu bakuleli abantula imisebenzi. Kunemisebenzi engadingi ukuthi uze ube yingcithabuchopho kodwa edinga ukuthi abantu babe nolwazana nje oluncane oludingeka kulowo mkhakha abasuke bekuwo. Ngakho- ke asikwazi ukuba nesibalo esiphezulu  soweta babantu bamazwe angaphandle ezindaweni zokudla zakuleli ekubeni sinentsha yakuleli eswele imisebenzi,” kusho uKhumalo .Eqhuba uthe kweminye imisebenzi edinga ulwazi olunzulu kwamukelekile ukuthi kulandwe abantu abangaphandle.Omunye usomabhizinisi, uNksz Lizzy Ndlovu wakwaMduku osekuphele iminyaka emithathu edayisa ukudla, uthe enye inkinga ababhekene nayo ukuvaleleka ngaphandle ohlelweni lokuthola izindawo zokudayisa ezinikwa abokufika.“Amathuba omsebenzi awekho, phezu kwaleyo nkinga kube yithi esizizamelayo ngokuvula amabhizinisi esihlukumezeka ngodaba lwabokufika abagweva nezindawo. Yibo ababekwa phambili ekubeni iningi lethu lingenazo izindawo zokudayisa ezikhishwa uhulumeni,” kusho yena.Eqhuba unxenxe uhulumeni ukuthi ushintshe imithetho yawo ezokwenza balekeleleke nabo njengosomabhizinisi abazimisele ngokuvula amathuba omsebenzi.

I-DA ifuna kusheshe kuhlale iPhalamende ukuze kubhungwe ngesiphakamiso sokungabuthembi ubuholi bukaSomlomo osahlabe ikhefu eliyisipesheli, uNkk Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula, obhekene namacala enkohlakalo.Leli qembu lithe akumele kuze kushaye uMeyi iPhalamende lingahlalanga ukubhunga ngokushesha ngalesi siphakamiso.USotswebhu we-DA ePhalamende uNksz Siviwe Gwarube, uthe bajabule ngokuthi ibamba likaSomlomo uMnuz Lechesa Tsenoli, uvumile ukuthi kube nale nkulumo mpikiswano ngodaba lukaSomlomo.Uthe imigomo yePhalamende icacile ukuthi isiphakamiso esithinta ukungabethembi ubuholi bukaSomlomo noma iPhini lakhe kumele sibhungwe ngokushesha.Uqhubeke ngokuthi asikho isidingo sokubizwa ukuhlala kwePhalamende okuphuthumayo ngelizayo, lolu daba ngolubalulekile noluphuthumayo.Uthe ubhalele amanye amaqembu okubalwa ne-ANC, efuna ukwesekwa kulesi siphakamiso.“Ukugoloza ukusula kukaSomlomo ekubeni ebhekene nezinsolo ezibucayi kanje, kwenza ukuthi sifinyelele ekutheni siphakamise ukuthi akakhishwe ngevoti.“Akasakulungele ukuba kulesi sikhundla ngoba siwuhlaka okumele lubonakale luthatha izinyathelo ezinqala odabeni oluthinta inkohlakalo,” kusho uNksz Gwarube UNkk Mapisa-Nqakula ubhekene nezinsolo ezingu-12 zenkohlakalo ezithinta intshontsho alithola kusonkontileka eMnyangweni wezokuVikela  esanguNgqongqoshe wawo.Kulindeleke ukuthi inkantolo ikhiphe isinqumo esicelweni sikaNkk Mapisa-Nqakula  sokuthi angaboshwa njengoba uphiko lwezokushushisa belumfuna evele enkantolo.UNkk Mapisa-Nqakula wakhetha ukuhlaba leli khefu emuva kwalezi zinsolo okuthiwa zifaka nemali enguR2 million engukheshi ayithola izikhawu ezahlukene kulo sonkontileka.Kwenzeka lokhu nje uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula waphumela obala wathi usethi khumu ePhalamende emuva kokhetho.Wathi ngeke esabuyela ezintweni ezithinta ubuholi ngisho kwi-ANC ngoba esebona ukuthi adede inkundla ngoba kade aba yingxenye yobuholi kusekhona owayenguMengameli kaHulumeni weNtando yeNingi uMnuz Nelson Mandela.IPhalamende kulindeleke ukuthi liveze usuku okuzobhungwa ngaso lesi siphakamiso se-DA.

INKANTOLO yeMantshi yaseMlaza ilihlehlisele inyanga ezayo icala labasolwa ababili kwelokubulawa kobehamba ngesihlalo esinamasongo waseMlaza, ohlaselwe wadutshulwa ekubo ngenyanga edlule.UMnuz Siyabonga Ngubane (36) noMnuz Sithembiso Khomo (23), abebevele enkantolo izolo, baboshwe ngenyanga edlule ngosuku okudutshulwe ngalo uSimanga ‘Katsande’ Khumalo (29) okuthiwa ubesehamba ngesihlalo sabakhubazekile emva kokudutshulwa ngo-2021.Abasolwa bangene enkantolo befaswe ngozankosi kanti bekulindeleke ukuthi kulalelwe isicelo sabo sebheyili njengoba bese bevela okwesithathu ngaleli cala. Inkantolo inqume ukulihlehlisela uMeyi 27 leli cala ukuze kuphenywe. Okube ngenye yezimbangela zokuhlehla kwalo, uKhomo ngesikhathi evela okokuqala kuthiwa watshela inkantolo ukuthi umndeni wakhe uzomtholela ummeli okhokhelwayo okuthe izolo ilungu lomndeni laveza ukuthi ngeke babe nayo imali yommeli, kwaphoqa ukuthi athathe okahulumeni.Babhekene namacala amahlanu okukhona kuwo elokwakha nokuhlela itulo lokubulala, elokubulala, elokutholakala nesibhamu esingekho emthethweni nelokutholakala nezinhlamvu.Ilungu lomndeni kamufi, elingathandanga ukudalulwa, likhale ngokuthi abasolwa babambezela icala.“Siwumndeni siyafisa ukuthi kusheshiswe ukuqulwa kwalo ukuze abasolwa bathole izijeziso ezibafanele. Okubuhlungu ukuthi babengaze badubule umuntu okhubazekile, ohamba ngesihlalo pho. Wayengenabo ubungozi kubona,” usho kanje.UKhumalo udutshulwa nje besekuvele kuphele iminyaka emibili ehamba ngesihlalo sabakhubazekile emva emva kokudutshulwa ngo-2021 ecaleni okuboshwe kulona umsolwa owaziwayo okukholakala ukuthi nguyena othumele izinkabi esejele.Kuthiwa ngaphambi kokuba adutshulwe, wathola izinsongo zothile owafona ethi akasule icala lokuzama ukubulala elibhekene nomsolwa (osejele) kungenjalo bazomenzakalisa.Umufi kuthiwa wakhubazeka ngesikhathi abathile bembamba inkunzi engena kubo, bamshaya ngenduku yegalofu ngaphambi kokuthi bamphuce ifoni yomsebenzi. Kuthe uma ebikela unina, wahamba naye ukuyobikela unina kamsolwa ngokwenzekile, bafike bacela ukubuyiselwa i-sim card.  Umsolwa kuthiwa ebabona kubo akazange abuze, wadubula ebhekise kuKhumalo, kwaba wusuku agcina ngalo ukuzihambela ngezinyawo.Inkantolo ibigcwele abomndeni namalungu omphakathi azwelana nabakwaKhumalo kanti abekhona namalungu emindeni yabasolwa.

ABEMBONI yezinkukhu bafuna kuphasiswe umgomo womkhuhlane wezinkukhu njengoba bethi lesi sifo sithula kancane sibuye sivumbuke.UDkt Abongile Balarane we-SA Poultry Association, uthe sekuphele izinyanga belindele ukuthi obeNgqongqoshe wezoLimo, uNkk Thoko Didiza, uzophasisa umgomo womkhuhlane wezinkukhu.Ekhuluma kwi-East Coast Radio, uDkt Balarane, uthe ukuphasiswa komgomo womkhuhlane wezinkukhu uzosiza abazifuyile ukuthi bakwazi ukuza nezinhlelo zokugwema lesi sifo.Uveze ukuthi bafuna kube nohlelo olungambi eqolo lokuvikela izinkukhu emkhuhlaneni olungeke ludle imali yabalimi abancane.“NgoNovemba wonyaka odlule, uhulumeni washicilela imithetho okufanele ilandelwe uma kugonywa izinkukhu. Kwatholakala ukuthi le mithetho inzima ngeke bakwazi ukuyilandela kahle abalimi. Sicela imithetho elula ezophephisa izinkukhu kodwa kube lula nakubalimi ukuthi bayilandele,” kusho uBalarane.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi isifo sezinkukhu saqubuka ngonyaka odlule, kwanyuka amaqanda nenyama yenkukhu.Inyunyana yabasebenza ngokudla, iFood and Allied Workers Union (Fawu), igqugquzele uhulumeni ukuthi asheshise ngalo mgomo ukuze kuzovikelwa imboni yakuleli.Iveze ukuthi uma lungacacile uhlelo lokugoma izinkukhu zakuleli kuba nzima ukuthi inyama yazo idayiswe kwamanye amazwe lokhu kuholela ekutheni kwande amaphisisi avela kwamanye amazwe azogcina eqeda imisebenzi embonini yenkukhu.

KUGQAME eyesidingo sokwakhiwa kwesiteshi samaphoyisa noma ukusondeza esingumahamba nendlwana kwaDesai eMariannhill nasezindaweni ezakhelene nayo, embizweni kaNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa uMnuz Bheki Cele, ebisehholo  KwaMamdekazi.Embizweni  okuthiwa bekuhloswe ngayo ukuzwa izikhalo zabantu bakule ndawo okuthiwa ubugebengu budla lubi kuyo, okugqame kakhulu kumalungu omphakathi abesukuma ededelana ebeka imibono nezikhalo, isidingo sokusondezwa kwesiteshi samaphoyisa okuzolekelela ekutheni abantu bakwazi ukubika eduze ngobugebengu ukuqinisekisa ukuthi kuliwa nabo.UCele ubesebuya okwesibili kule ndawo emuva kwesigameko esisewundabamlonyeni sokuqothwa kwabasolwa abayisishiyagalolunye abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-18 no 23 okuthiwa bebehlalise kabi umphakathi wakule ndawo, okwenzeke ngesonto eledlule.UNksz Sindi Vilakazi waseZwelibomvu  ukhale  ngokuqhela kwesiteshi samaphoyisa esiKwaNdengezi ababika kuso.“EZwelibomvu sinobugebengu obuningi kakhulu. Izingane ziyadutshulwa mhlawumbe uthole ukuthi umuntu udutshulwa ephuma emsebenzini akwaziwa ukuthi kwenziwe ubani.  Sisebenzisa isiteshi samaphoyisa KwaNdengezi oke ufice ukuthi kwesinye isikhathi akukho muntu.  Siyafisa nje ukuthi okungenani kufakwe noma esiwumahamba nendlwana okuzoqinisekisa ukutholakala kwamaphoyisa ngokushesha uma edingeka,” usho kanje.Isiteshi samaphoyisa esiseMariannhill esiyisakhiwo sesikhashana, kuthiwa sisebenzela iMariannhill yonke ngaphaphandle kwakaNdengenzi naseZwelibomvu.  Izindawo ezibika kuso yi-Dassenhoek, Mpola, Tshelimnyama, Uganda, KwaSanti, Nazareth, Desai neNagina.  Umphakathi ufuna kufakwe iziteshi ezingomahamba nendlwana kulezi zindawo.Kukhalwe  ngamaphoyisa aseMariannhill,  umphakathi owasola ngokungawenzi  umsebenzi, ikakhulu abaphenyi bamacala okuthiwa abawalandeleli amanye amacala abikwa kubona.Ephendula ezikhalweni zomphakathi zomphakathi uCele, uqinisekise ukuthi indawo nemali yokwakhiwa kwesiteshi obekuyizinto ebezibambile, sekukhona, sekulele eMnyangweni weMisebenzi yoMphakathi.“Iziteshi zamaphoyisa zazakhiwe umphakathi usemncane, ngakho asinalo ijubane lokwakha ngokushesha kuhambisane nokwanda kwawo. Akuyona inkinga yaseMariannhill kuphela, kodwa ikhona nakwezinye izindawo.  Ziningi izindawo esenizibalile enifuna kube khona iziteshi ezingomahamba nendlwana, zizofakwa kodwa akuzona zonke izindawo ezizozithola. Isiteshi samaphoyisa obekudala nisicela, bekushoda imali nendawo esizokwakhiwa kuso.  Sekukhona ke konke, sekusele ke ngaseMnyangweni wezeMisebenzi yoMphakathi,” usho kanje.Ngasohlangothini lokugxekwa  kwamaphoyisa ngokungasebenzi, uthe kulo nyaka nje kuphela, amaphoyisa asebophe abasolwa abangu- 993, abawu-209 kubona baboshelwe izidakamizwa, abawu-33 baboshelwe ukubulala, bawu-33 baboshelwe amacala okudlwengula.  Uthe zingu-15 izigameko ezenzekile zokudubulana kwamaphoyisa nezigebengu kule ndawo, kanti bangu-35 abasolwa abafe kuzona, zibe ngu-29 izibhamu ezithathwe amaphoyisa.Ngaphambi kokuqala kwembizo, uCele obehambisana noKhomishana wamaPhoyisa esifundazweni uLieutenant General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi, uNdunankulu uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube uSomlomo kuMasipala weTheku uMnuz Thabani Nyawose nezikhulu zikahulumeni, bahlangane nabagilwa bobugebengu. UNkk Agnes Nzimande uvele wakhihla isililo eneka usizi lwakhe, uthe izigebengu zadubula indodana yakhe ebibondla, zangagcina lapho zamkhipha emzini wakhe manje  usehlala ezihlotsheni.“Umuzi wami bawucekele phansi, ngiyafisa ukubuyela kuwo.  Ngicela uhulumeni angisize ngibuyele emzini wami,” kubalisa yena.UNkk Caroline Maphumulo uveze ukuthi ubugebengu badlula nomphefumulo wendodana yakhe eyayisanda kuqeda enyuvesi, seyifuna umsebenzi esenethemba lempilo engcono.

BAFUNA kubiywe ihostela ukuze kuphele ubugebengu abantu abebevota  esikhungweni saKwaMashu ehostela njengoba bethi kulula ukuthi kungene noma wubani azolahla izidumbu.UMnuz Mhlonipheni Celemba Sibiya (39) owuSihlalo wesigceme esibizwa ngokuthi kuseMalondolo, ehostela KwaMashu, uthe baphume ngobuningi babo ukuyovota ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ihostela liyabiywa ukuze kunciphe ubugebengu.“Sizovota ngoba sifuna kuphele imijondolo kwakhiwe izindlu ezizobuyisa isithunzi sabantu. Sifuna ihostela libiywe ngoba sesiye sifice izidumbu zilahliwe lapha kodwa okungesizo ezabantu abahlala lapha ehostela. Kusuka abantu kwezinye izindawo bazolahla izidumbu lapha. Amaphoyisa agcina esesola thina ngokuba yizigebengu,” kusho uSibiya.Uthe bayajabula ukuthi wonke umuntu ukhululekile ukuvota futhi namaphoyisa asiqaphe ngeso lokhozi isimo.UNksz Siphokazi Mtekwana (33) waseBhambayi eNanda, uthe uvuke ekuseni wayovota eNanda Comprehensive Secondary ngoba bafuna amanzi.“Sidinga amanzi, asinawo kuyimanje sesiphila ngokuthwala izigubhu siyowalanda elolini eliwalethayo. Sizovota ukuze uhulumeni alungise ingqalasizinda yamanzi, sithole amanzi ahlanzekile. Siyayidinga nemisebenzi ngoba sihleli emakhaya asiqashiwe,” kusho uNksz Mtekwana.UNkk Lucy Mhlongo (72) ovote Ohlange, eNanda, uthe ufuna ivoti lakhe lisize uhulumeni ukuthi adale amathuba omsebenzi ngoba izingane zihleli emakhaya namajazi emfundo.Unxuse abaholi be-ANC athe uyilungu layo ukuba baqinisekise ukuthi akuqashwa ngokwenzelela kodwa kunikwa yonke intsha amathuba.UMnuz Sifiso Sithole obedlubhe ezeMK, uthe akangabazi ukuthi izoletha ushintsho ilwe nobugebengu obudla lubi eNanda.Okuphawulekayo wukuthi amalungu amaningi e-IFP abevota egqoke izikibha ezinemibala yeqembu lawo, kulandele awe-MK, awe-EFF nedlanzana le-ANC KwaMashu naseNanda.

UFUNA ubulungiswa omunye wemindeni yabesifazane ababili okuthiwa babulawelwe emijondolo yaseKenville eGreenwood Park, eThekwini, ngeSonto.UNksz Zizipho “Ntuntu” Gabisa nomngani wakhe, uNksz Anele Mbokazi, kuthiwa babulawa nje, imoto yabasolwa ibalande emakubo eRiverview Park, eVerulam.Kuthiwa imoto ifike yabaqathaza, abasolwa babadubula, base bekhala amaphepha.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi uNksz Gabisa ubeyi-pharmacist esibhedlela esizimele eMhlanga, eThekwini, kuthi uNksz Mbokazi, abengumhlengikazi esikhungweni igama laso elingatholakalanga.Umthombo ocele ukuthi ungadalulwa udalule ukuthi abafi bashiye izimoto zabo emakubo ebusuku ngoMgqibelo, bahamba ngeyabasolwa, iMercedes-Benz ebalande emakhaya. “Kuthiwa abasolwa bebezolanda abantu abane, okukhona kubo nodadewabo bakaNksz Mbokazi kodwa kwagcina kuhamba abafi, laba abanye sebethi abasahambi ngoba bashiywa yigazi,” kusho umthombo. Uqhube wathi laba abakhethe ukuhosha imfe, bagcine beziyela enkonzweni. Udadewabo kaNksz Gabisa, uNksz Mpho Gabisa othe ngokomsebenzi useGoli, uthe umufi ubulawa nje, ubekade ekhuluma naye, emtshela ngephupho elibi avuke nalo.“Iphupho engiliphuphile belethusa. Ngokwazi ukuthi uyathwasa uNtuntu, ngamtshela ngalo, wakhombisa ukwethuka, ethi lijulile futhi liyethusa,” kusho uNksz Gabisa othe ubengazi ukuthi kanti ubephupha ngokufa kukadadewabo ngqo.Uqhube wathi okumthuse kakhulu ngephupho ukuthi bebematasa nomufi, belungiselela umsebenzi wesikhumbuzo sikayise obazalayo obekufanele ube kule mpelasonto.“Ngididekile ngoba nobaba naye washona nyakenye, ngosuku olufanayo nokufe ngalo uNtuntu,” kusho uNksz Gabisa.Uthe baqale banganaka bebona izithombe zabafi bedindilizile endaweni yesigameko zizungeza ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, wathi kuthe ngokuqhubeka kwesikhathi, wathola ucingo kwesinye isihlobo, simazisa ukuthi bashayelwe ngamaphoyisa, athi abazofanisa emakhazeni, nebala, bathola ukuthi yibo.Uthe okubaphatha kabi ukuthi bobabili abafi bebezisebenzela, benemali yabo, benezimoto zabo, bezimele. Uthe uNtuntu ubehamba ngeToyota Yaris. “Sinemibuzo yokuthi yini eholele ekutheni abasolwa bababulale ngesihluku esinje? Bebenzeni?” kubuza uNksz Gabisa.Uthe bafuna ubulungiswa ngokubehlele, abasolwa bajeze.“Sishaqekile. Sidinga ubulungiswa. Siyafisa ukwazi ukuthi baze babulawa bekwenzenjani ngoba bayasebenza, banemali yabo bebengathembele kumuntu,” kusho uNksz Gabisa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa aseGreenwood Park, asebophe abasolwa ababili abaneminyaka engu-30 nonengu-44 ngecala lokubulala abesifazane ababili eKenville ngeSonto.“Abasolwa kulindeleke ukuthi bavele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini kusasa,” kusho uNetshiunda.Uthe ngosuku lwesigameko amaphoyisa anikele endaweni yesigameko, kulandela ukutholwa kwezidumbu zabesifazane ababili emgwaqweni uJohanna, zilele exhaphozini legazi, zinamanxeba okudutshulwa.

UMNDENI wowesifazane oshayiswe imoto washona ufuna lijeze iphoyisa elimshayise, labaleka ngoLwesihlanu ePhoenix, eThekwini.UNksz Phumla “Thini” Mtshali (28) ushonele emgwaqweni uPhoenix Highway lapho kwenzeke khona isigameko.Udadewabo, uNksz Phili Mtshali, uthe isigameko senzeke phakathi kuka-1 no-2 entathakusa ngoLwesihlanu.Uthe ngesikhathi udadewabo ehlelwa yingozi ubehamba nesoka lakhe, elithumele umyalezo ngomakhelwane abadlule ngemoto endaweni yesigameko esephangalele.UNksz Mtshali uthe abakutholile ukuthi udadewabo ushayiswe yiphoyisa ebelihamba ngemoto labe selibaleka.“Libonile ukuthi limshayise kabi, labona kungcono ukuthi libaleke. Sithole ukuthi kuthe uma lifika ndawana thize, labona ukuthi inombolo yemoto yangaphambili, iwile endaweni yesigameko ngesikhathi lishayisa udadewethu. Lithumele omunye umuntu ukuthi ayoyicosha,” kusho uNksz Mtshali.Nokho uthe, lokhu kwenzeke emva kwendaba njengoba bese kufike inkampani yonogada, yathatha izithombe zayo.“Sithe sizwa, kwakuthiwa imoto seliyibike njengeyebiwe emzini walo esiteshini samaphoyisa ePhoenix. Sizwa kuthiwa libike ngoLwesihlanu ngabo-10 ekuseni, emva kokwebiwa kwayo ngoLwesine ebusuku ngabo-11,” kusho uNksz Mtshali.Uthe okwenza basole ukuthi ukubikwa kwayo njengeyebiwe kuyindlela yokugwema icala ukuthi kungani kuthathe isikhathi eside kangaka ukuthi liyibike njengelahlekile.“Libalekeleni endaweni yesigameko,  laphinde lathumela umuntu ukuthi azolanda i-number plate yemoto ebiwile? Izigebengu bezingeke zizikhathaze ngalokho, uma ibiyebiwe ngempela,” kubuza uNksz Mtshali.Uphinde wathi baxakwa ukuthi uma kungukuthi beyebiwe ngempela imoto, yini ebisayifuna endaweni yasePhoenix emva kwamahora amathathu yebiwe njengoba udadewabo imshayise phakathi kuka-1 no-2 entathakusa.Uphinde waveza nokuthi kuthe uma bebuza ngephoyisa kwathiwa livamile ukushayela libukhile.Ukhale ngokuthi umufi ushiye izingane ezimbili ezisencane njengoba enye ineminyaka emithathu, enye ineyisishiyagalolunye.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa asePhoenix avule icala lokubulala ngokungenhloso ukuze liphenywe.“Lokhu kuza emva kwesigameko lapho obehamba ngezinyawo eshayiswe yimoto yamaphoyisa engaphansi kophiko lwezokuphepha lwasendlunkulu. Kuthiwa umshayeli wehlulekile ukuma, emgwaqweni uPhoenix Highway ngoLwesihlanu, umgilwa wafela endaweni yesigameko,” kusho uNetshiunda.Uqhube wathi imoto eyenze ingozi itholwe isilahliwe esimobeni.Uthe imoto efanayo ibikwe njengentshontshiwe lapho ebikhona ngoLwesine ebusuku. Wathi icala lokwebiwa kwayo liyaphenywa.“Uphenyo lokuthi ubani obeyishayela ngesikhathi yenza ingozi luyaqhubeka,” kusho uNetshiunda.

AMAQEMBU ezepolitiki adudulana ngezifuba kulezi zinsuku ekhankasela ukhetho, ethula nezethembiso kubantu baseNingizimu Afrika. Lokhu akwenzeki nje emadolobheni nasemalokishini kuphela kodwa ngisho ezindaweni zasemakhaya lapho izakhamizi zisadonsa kanzima uma kukhulunywa ngentuthuko.Kuyaphithizelwa kwethulwa izinhlelo zentuthuko kuvulwa nenqgalasizinda ebeyakhiwa.Leli phephandaba livakashele izakhamizi zasemakhaya eNkandla ukuthola ukuthi sezikulungele yini ukuvota,  ngabe isekhona inhlansi yethemba ngohulumeni kuleli njengoba kugujwa iminyaka engu-30 kwabusa uhulumeni wentando yabantu.UMnuz Muzikayifani Majola waseMahlayizini, uveze ukuthi ukhathazwa iminyaka ebekelwe ukuqasha abantu eNingizimu Afrika.Lokhu ukubona kushaya kuzwele kakhulu kubazali ngoba bahleli nezingane ezinezidingo. Uphinde waveza nokuthi kwanda ubugebengu ngenxa yokweswela kwabantu."Ngabuya emsebenzini ngo-2002 ngaqala ibhizinisi lokuxova izitina kodwa uxhaso lokukhulisa ibhizinisi angilutholi. “Into ebalulekile ukuthi uhulumeni andise amathuba omsebenzi ukuze nentsha izosebenza ikwazi ukuzimela.“Nomthetho udinga ukuqiniswa ukuze kungabi nentsha egcaluza emadolobheni ngoba igcina isiphenduke amaphara," kusho uMajola.UNksz Mpho Dubazane waseMatshenezimpisi, oziphilisa ngokucwala amakhanda, uthe uqale leli bhizinisi ngenxa yokugqoza kwamathuba omsebenzi, wakhetha ukugxila ekhonweni analo. Yize kunjalo kodwa uNksz Dubazane uveze ukuthi inkinga kagesi yenza impilo ibenzima endaweni yangakubo."Ugesi namanzi kuyasihlupha kodwa sekungcono amanzi asekhona. Into esifisa ilungiswe manje ugesi ukuze kusebenzeke kahle.“Ngiyafisa nokuthola indawo yami ngingasebenzeli etendeni ngoba umasipala usengixhasile ngezinto zebhizinisi.“Ngizoya kovota ngoba isidingo sakho ngiyasibona futhi sengisithathile nesinqumo ngeqembu engizolivotela," kusho uNksz Dubazane.UMnuz Taelo Tsotetsi waseMadiyane ukhala ngogesi ekubeni izindawo eziningi zasemakhaya seziphucuzekile. Uveze ukuthi imidanti ka-Eskom yenza kubenzima ezindaweni zasemakhaya bese zisalela emuva  ngentuthuko."Zikhona izinguquko esizibonayo kodwa okuningi sisele kukhona. Ugesi ngenye yezinto esingenayo, ekhaya kusukela ngo-2013 sizama, asinawo kuze kube yimanje. “Uhulumeni kumele abambisane namakhansela nezinduna zisondelane nomphakathi ngoba yibona bantu abazi izidingo zawo.“Kukhona nabantu abadala abahleli ezindlini eziwayo ngenxa yokuswela," kusho uTsotesti.UMnuz Vusimuzi Majola waseMabengela, uthe lesi yisikhathi sokuthi umphakathi uhlangane ubhukule uyovota ukuqinisekisa ukuthi kungena uhulumeni omusha okhathalele izidingo zabo.Indawo yangakubo uthe yeswele kakhulu uma eyiqhathanisa nezinye zasemakhaya ezihlinzekwa ngentuthuko."Kusenzima kakhulu ngogesi, uhulumeni akasisizi, sigqigqa njalo kwa-Eskom kodwa asisizakali. Kuyiwa okhethweni siyovota, sikhipha uhulumeni ongasisizi ngalutho.“Ziningi izidingo zomphakathi esingenzelwa zona ngoba kubambeke kuhulumeni omkhulu, kuze kusize umasipala ngoxhaso senze amabhizinisi," kusho uMajola.

UFISA abantu bafundiseke baphinde bamukele abathandana nobulili obufanayo njengoba kuqhubeka umgubho wenyanga owaziwa nge-International Pride Month, uNksz Nhlalwenhle Cele.Lo mgubho oqale ngo-1 Juni ozoze uphothulwe ngoJuni 30, uyingxenye yezinhlelo zokuqhakambisa ukuthi abathandana nobulili obufanayo bayingxenye yomphakathi futhi namalungelo abo adinga ukuhlonishwa. Ekhuluma neSolezwe, uNksz Nhlalenhlwe Cele (26) owashintsha ubulili azalwa nabo, uthe ukubungaza iPride Month kuyimizamo yokwehlisa ukucwaswa ababhekene nakho.“Sigubha le nyanga ngoba sifuna ukuthi sibe namalungelo okuphathwa ngendlela efanayo njengamalungu omphakathi. Sifuna kuphele ukucwaswa futhi uhulumeni kufanele angenelele ekufundiseni isizwe ngathi ngoba njengoba sithandana nobulili obufanayo sifanele ukuthi sinikezwe impatho efanayo futhi sihlonishwe,” kusho uNksz Cele.Uthe kufanele bajeziswe kanzima abantu abacwasa ngokobulili.“Singabantu nathi, akusho ukuthi njengoba siphila impilo ehlukile kufanele sihlukunyezwe siphinde sizondwe kangaka. Amagama acwasa ngobulili kumele avalwe njengoba kwenziwa kulawa acwasa ngobuhlanga ukuze abantu bezofunda ukuhlonipha abanye abantu,” usho kanje.Uqhube wathi njengoba esephile isikhathi eside njengomuntu owazalwa ebukeka njengowesilisa kodwa ngaphakathi ezizwa engowesifazane (transwoman) uyaziqhenya ngobulili bakhe.“Ngiyazigqaja ngomuntu enginguye, okubi nje ukuthi kumele ngihlezi ngizichaza ngiphinde ngifundise abantu futhi ngiyasaba ukunubezwa ngokocansi njalo uma ngiphumela ngaphandle,” kusho uNksz Cele.Khonamanjalo umsunguli wenhlangano engenzi nzuzo iTranshope, ophinde abe yisishoshovu somphakathi we-LGBTQIA+ uNksz Sazi Jali, uthe uma ubuka umlando wokugujwa kwe-Pride Month kusho ukuthi basabonakala emphakathini.“Isizathu sokuthi siqhakambise ukuthi siyaphila yingoba njalo ngosuku kukhona abalinyazwayo. Abanye abawahloniphi amalungelo ethu ngoba bengabazi ubulili bethu. Yingakho isiqubulo salo nyaka sithi ”I am human too“, okuchaza ukuthi ngingumuntu nami,” kusho uNksz Jali.Esinye sezishoshovu uNksz Lethuxolo Shange sithe uMthethoSisekelo waseNingizimu Afrika ubavikela ngombhalo kuphela.“Abantu esiphila nabo emindenini nasemakhaya bayakuveza ukusicwasa. Odadewethu nabafowethu babulawa mihla yonke futhi mkhulu umsebenzi osasimele ekufundiseni imiphakathi yethu ukuthi nathi singabantu, sisuka kubo, sihlala nabo, sikhonza nabo futhi siyibo,” usho kanje.Kuhlelwe ukuthi kube nemashi ezoba ngoJuni 29 eThekwini, eyenzeka minyaka yonke, lapho amalungu eLGBTQIA+ esuke egcwele khona imigwaqo ukukhombisa ukuthi ayingxenye yomphakathi.

UFUNA kusondele uKhomishana wamaPhoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLieutenant-General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi nezakhe umphakathi wasoSizweni, eNewcastle, kuqala phansi amaqembu emigulukudu ahlalisa abantu lubhojozi.Lokhu kulandela  ukubulawa kwabantu abayisihlanu ezehlakalweni ezehlukene, okuthiwa babulawe ngezindlela ezehlukene. Kusolwa ukuthi babulawe amaqembu emigulukudu.Ilungu lomphakathi elicele ukungadalulwa, liveze ukuthi amaqembu emigulukudu ahlalisa lubhojozi umphakathi anamalungu ayizingane ezincane.Lithe amalungu alama qembu aneminyaka ephakathi kuka-15 no-20.Lithe ababili, babulawe esehlakelweni esisodwa, kwantshontshwa isibhamu soyedwa wabafi, bamdubula ngaso, kwathi umngani wakhe, bamgwaza.“Omunye owayezama ukulwela umphakathi, bamhlasela kubo, bangena ngewindi, bamgwaza phambi kwabazali bakhe. Omunye bamhlasela ezihambela emgwaqweni, bamgwaza,” kusho umthombo.Uthe ngenxa yalezi zigameko, abantu abaningi abasahambi bakhululeke, wathi kuba nzima kakhulu uma sekuhwalele.Uthe okubuhlungu ukuthi akukho okutheni abangakwenza njengoba bebaningi ngendlela yokuthi ababaleki.Ubalule nokuthi kwathi sekusondela impelasonto yoMkhosi woMhlanga, kwasiza inkampani yonogada yomunye wonomehlo, besho ukuziqeda izintombi nto, befuna ukuzidlwengula.“Ezinyangeni ezedlule, bangene emtholampilo wendawo, bakhuthuza abahlengikazi neziguli ebusuku. Ngaleso sizathu uke wavalwa eside isikhathi umtholampilo, kuthe noma usuvulwa, satshelwa ukuthi ngeke usavulwa ebusuku, usuzosebenza emini kuphela,” kusho umthombo.“Uma kungafika uMkhwanazi neNIU, siyakholwa ukuthi kungaba ngcono,” kusho umthombo.Uthe okunye okubakhathazayo yimithetho yakuleli evuna izingane ezineminyaka engaphansi kuka-18 ezenza ubugebengu.“Zenza ubugebengu obunzima, zibulala abantu. Ziboshwe, zibuye zidedelwe ngoba kuthiwa zincane,” kusho umthombo.Ngo-2021, le ndawo ike yahlaselwa elinye iqembu lemigulukudu elalaziwa ngokuthi ‘ama-last warnings’.Kuthiwa laze lanqotshwa ukungenela kukangqongqoshe wamaphoyisa ophumile nosomatekisi bendawo okuthiwa bazivikela ngokwabo kulona.Ikhansela lendawo, uMnuz Vusumuzi Sibeko ukuqinisekisile ukuthi umphakathi awuhlalisekile kahle ngenxa yamaqembu emigulukudu.Uthe kahle hle ziyisithupha izidumbu zababulewe imigulukudu, athe iyazicanasela emphakathini."Lezi zingane zincane kodwa zibulala ngempela. Abanye babo basafunda, abanye basiyeka isikole. Uma beqhamuka kuyacaca ngoba bahloma ngemimese, izizenze, obhushu futhi bahamba beyiqembu mhlawumbe babe ngu-30 bagcwale umgwaqo," kusho uSibeko.Uthe bahlasela emini ilanga libalele, wathi bagqihe nangamabhande athile."Okusiphatha kabi ukuthi kukhona abazali abasenkingeni yokuzisaba lezi zingane, ngesikhathi abanye beziphikela," usho kanje.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uCol Robert Netshiunda, uthe uKhomishana wamaPhoyisa ubuqaphile bonke ubugebengu kulesi sifundazwe, kodwa uma umphakathi unomuzwa wokuthi udinga usizo oluthe xaxa, kufanele ukuveze lokho kumphathi siteshi wendawo."Uma behluleka, badlulele esifundeni, nakhona uma bengasizakali, bese beza kukhomishana wesifundazwe," kusho uNetshiunda.

BAFE ujuqu abantu abathathu abadutshulwe eSihlabeni, eMuden bebuya ukuyovota entathakusa ngoLwesine.Kubikwa ukuthi abagilwa abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-22 no-25, baqhululwe ngenhlamvu ngesikhathi behamba ngemoto okubikwe ukuthi yebiwa eGoli.Imibiko yamaphoyisa  ithi amadoda amathathu abehamba nabesifazane abathathu aqede ukuvota kwase kuyiwa emzini onesitolo esiseduze nesikhungo sokuvota.Kuthiwa bavukelwe abantu abangaziwa okusolakala ukuthi bebekade bebalalele unyendle, babadubula.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe kulimale owesifazane oyedwa waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela.Udalule ukuthi abanye besifazane ababili baphume kulesi sehlakalo bengenamyocu.Kwesinye isehlakalo esiseceleni, amaphoyisa aseWartburg maphakathi nesifundazwe aphenya icala lokubulala nelokuzama ukubulala emuva kokubulawa kowesilisa.Umufi obeneminyaka engu-40 kusolakala ukuthi udutshulwe wafa ngesikhathi esemotweni bude buduze nesikhungo obekuvotelwa kusona esikoleni KwaSwayimana High, ngoLwesithathu ebusuku.UNetshiunda uthe kubikwa ukuthi umufi ubehlezi emotweni nowesilisa ngesikhathi imoto iPolo emhlophe ipaka phambi kweyabo.“Kusolakala ukuthi kuphume indoda ebiphethe isibhamu esikhulu yadubula ibhekise kubagilwa. Kuphangalale umuntu oyedwa, ohlonzwe njengoshonele endaweni yesigameko. Omunye  uphume engenamyocu,” kusho uNetshiunda.Uqhube wathi akwaziwa ukuthi bangobani abasolwa nembangela yalokhu kubulala.Unxuse noma ubani ongaba nolwazi lokuthi bangatholakala kuphi abasolwa athinte amaphoyisa aseduzane noma athinte abeCrime Stop enombolweni yocingo ethi: 08600 10111.

Bavele ngoLwesithathu enkantolo yeMantshi KwaDukuza abasolwa abathathu ababoshelwa ukuphatha izibhamu nezinhlamvu okungekho emthethweni.Kubikwa ukuthi amaphoyisa abelandela umkhondo wowesilisa okuthiwa uphethe izibhamu ezingekho emthethweni ngoLwesibili. Umkhondo wamaphoyisa uwaholele eNhlangwini, KwaDukuza, lapho umsolwa (24) etholwe nezibhamu ezimbili nezinhlamvu eziyisithupha.“Umsolwa ubehleli namanye amabhungu amabili aneminyaka engu-20 no-21 nawo aboshiwe ngoba ephethe izinhlamvu ezingu-65 zezibhamu ezahlukene.Isibhamu esisodwa esithathwe kumsolwa wokuqala sisuswe izinombolo zaso. Amaphoyisa azozihlola izibhamu ukuqinisekisa ukuthi azikaze zisebenze kobunye ubugebengu.

ABESIFAZANE ebebehambele umcimbi we-High Tea ebihlelwe ngusomabhizinisi uNkk Nqobile Mthembu, bagonyuluke ngezimo abadlule kuzona empilweni.Umcimbi ubuhanjelwe abesifazane basemazingeni ahlukene, begqoke beconsa. Ubusendaweni eyibhizinisi elidayisa ukudla okuphekiwe okusezingeni elicokeme iMadam & Sir  esemgwaqweni uFlorida, eThekwini.Bonke abebekhuluma kulo mcimbi bebesho ngazwi linye ukuthi izinselelo ezibhekana nabesifazane ziyafana kungakhathaleki ukuthi uyiliphi ibala. Babale izinkinga zasemindenini ezicindezela abesifazane. UNksz Nomxolisi Gumede owaziwa ngezinkulumo ezakhayo, oke azwakale nasemsakazweni iGagasi FM, uthuse abaningi ekhuluma ngezinkinga ahlangabezana nazo emndenini wakhe, okubalwa kukho ukuzitshwa wuyise. Wafana nomuntu ongenababa yize ekhona. Uthe kodwa ukholwa wukuthi lokho kwamqinisa kakhulu kunakuqala kwamenza walangazelela ukuzimela nokuphumelela empilweni yakhe.Uphosele inselelo abesifazane ebebeyingxenye yomcimbi ukuthi baqine noma behlangabezana naziphi izimo.Abanye bebeveza izinkinga ababhekene nazo emishadweni yabo njengoba kuvele nabathi bayadivosa, bakhathele ukumelana nobunzima. UNksz Bhela Sibiya ongomunye wabebehambele lo mcimbi, uthe abesifazane uma beshada basuke bengazitsheli ukuthi ngelinye ilanga bangazithola sebedivosa, kodwa kuyenzeka futhi kunzima. Uthe naye njengamanje uyadivosa. Ubeseshade iminyaka engu-8.Ekhuluma ngenhloso yalo mcimbi, uNkk Mthembu uthe bekungukuhlanganisa abesifazane ndawonye bacobelelane ngolwazi lwezinto ezehlukene futhi babuye bakhulisane bebodwa.Uthe okunye kwakho abesifazane abahlose ukubakhuthaza ngakho wukungena emabhizinisini.Uthe ukholwa wukuthi iNingizimu Afrika ingaba yindawo engcono kakhulu uma benganda abesifazane abangena kwezamabhizinisi. “Abesifazane banothando futhi banozwelo. Ngakho baningi abangasizakala uma benganda abesifazane abangene kwezamabhizinisi,’’ usho kanje.Abesifazane ebebekhona lapha bebehlobe bebahle bonke befake imihelane. Bebegqoke izingubo ezahlukene ezinemibala egqamile.

AMADODA ayisithupha asolwa ngokubulala obengumdlali weKaizer Chiefs, uLuke Fleurs, asazogqunywa esitokisini aze afake isicelo sebheyili ngesonto elizayo. Laba basolwa bebevele okokuqala eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseRoodepoort ngoLwesihlanu. ULuke (24) ubulawe ngokudutshulwa esigamekweni sokudunwa imoto eGoli ngesonto eledlule.Laba basolwa ngoNdumiso Moswane, Fernando Sive, Nhlakanipo Dlamini, Franky Xaba, Maredi Mphahlele noThembinkosi Hlomikhawu futhi bavele phambi kwenkantolo bengamelwe wumuntu.Enkantolo kuvele ukuthi abasolwa babekwe icala lokubulala, elokubamba inkunzi, elokutholakala nesibhamu nezinhlamvu ezingekho emthethweni nokukhohlisa ingalo yomthetho. Abasolwa, abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-21 no-36, bafune ukunikezwa ummeli wamahhala futhi bahlose ukufaka isicelo sebheyili.UMbuso uthe uzosiphikisa isicelo sebheyili. Umshushisi wenkantolo u-Arnold Limekhaya utshele inkantolo ukuthi ubbuso usadinga imininingwane yebheyili, ukwazi kabanzi ngabasolwa nezitatimende zomphenyi wecala. Icala lihlehliselwe umhla ka-19 Ephreli ukuze kwenziwe uphenyo olunzulu futhi kufakwe kahle isicelo sebheyili. Abasolwa basazogqunywa esitokisini emva kokukhalelwa ngamasongo kaSigonyela beseSlovoville, eSoweto ngoLwesithathu.Ngokusho kwamaphoyisa uLuke ulalelwe unyendle elindele usizo egaraji likaphethiloli eliku-14th Avenue noHendrik Potgieter eHoneydew ngo-Ephreli 3.

BAKHALA ngesikhwama sempesheni esingayikhokhi imali yabo onogada abathola uma sebexoshiwe ukuthi imali yempesheni ibingangeni kwiPrivate Security Sector Provident Fund (PSSPF).Onogada abakhulume neSolezwe kodwa bacela ukuthi angadalulwa amagama abo ngoba bafesa kwezinye izinkampani, bathe iPSSPF ayibasizi ngoba nayo ivele ibatshele ukuthi izinkampani bezingayifaki imali yempesheni esikhwameni yize ibidonswa nyanga zonke emholweni wabo.UMnuz Bheki Dzanibe, onguNobhala weDudula Movement KwaZulu-Natal, uthe kukhona onogada abakhale kubona ngendaba yokungayitholi imali yempesheni.“Akuyona kuphela imali yempesheni ebanjelwa onogada bese ingafakwa esikhwameni sempesheni kodwa sithole ukuthi babanjelwa ne-UIF kodwa nayo ayidluliselwa eMnyangweni wezemiSebenzi. Siyalulwa lolu daba sesize sathola nommeli ozolusingatha ngoba akekho ofuna ukusiza onogada,” kusho uDzanibe.Uthe bafuna uNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, akhiphe umyalelo wokuthi kuqashwe ngokugcwele onogada abaqaphe izikhungo zikahulumeni kanjalo nalabo abasebenza ukuzihlanza.“Sifisa kuqale uNtuli aqashe onogada nabahlanza izikhungo zikahulumeni ngokuphelele KwaZulu-Natal, ngoba ukusebenzela izinkampani ezithola amathenda kufana nokubaxhaphaza. Abasebenzi abayitholi imihlomulo efanele njengeyempesheni neminye ezoletha isithunzi empilweni yabo. Bahlale beyitoho impilo yabo yonke ngoba abanye sithole ukuthi sebesebenze iminyaka ewu-11 kodwa abanampesheni, abana-UIF yize idonswa emholweni yabo nyanga zonke,” kusho uDzanibe.Uthe bafuna uhulumeni kazwelonke nawo uqashe abantu ngokugcwele uyeke uhlelo lwamathenda axhaphaza onogada nabahlanza izikhungo zawo.NgoJulayi 16, Isolezwe liyithintile iPSSPF kwangena umlayezo wekhompyutha othe omunye wabasebenzi uzophendula i-email emuva kwezinsuku ezimbili kodwa kuze kube manje akekho ophendulile.UNksz Muvhango Lukhaimane oxazulula izinkinga zezimpesheni, uthe izikhalo azitholayo nge-PSSPF zisuke zidalwe wukuthi abasebenzi abayitholanga imali yabo ngoba kuthiwa abaqashi babo bebengayifaki imali kulesi sikhwama.Uthe kodwa naso asikhokhi ngesikhathi ngakho uthola bebaningi onogada abalinde imali yabo yempesheni.“Esikhathini esiningi ngiye ngithole ukuthi abanikazi bezinkampani zonogada abayidluliseli imali esikhwameni esifanele kodwa naso lesi sikhwama sinephutha ngoba asilandeleli. Anginawo amandla okubopha isikhwama esithintekayo kodwa ezimeni eziphoqayo ngiye ngiyalele osuke efake isikhalo ukuthi aye enkantolo ukuze akhokhelwe imali yakhe,” kuchaza uNksz Lukhaimane.

IZINHLANGANO ezibhekelele abaphila ngezibonelelo kuleli zithi kuyihlazo ukwenyuswa kwemali eyisibonelelo sabangasebenzi u-R350 ngo-R20.UNgqongqoshe wezeziMali, uMnuz Enoch Godongwana, uthe isibonelelo sabangasebenzi esiwu-R350, sizoqala ukukhokhwa sesiwu-R 370 ngo-Ephreli 1, nonyaka. UGodongwana usho lokhu ekhuluma ePhalamende, ngesikhathi ecacisa ngodaba lokwenyuswa kwemali kuleli ngeledlule.Lesi sibonelelo saqala ngo-2020, ngenhloso yokusiza abaphelelwa umsebenzi ngesikhathi kuhlasele iCovid-19 kodwa izinhlangano ezimele abahola izibonelelo ezingaphansi kweGlobal Reformed Advocacy Platforms for Engagement (GRAPE) zithi, uR20 ngeke wenze mehluko kwabahola le mali.UNkk Bukelwa Hans ongumdidiyeli uthe lesi sibonelelo asikaze sinyuswe selokhu saqala ukuba khona, ngaphezu kwalokho, ukudla kwenyuke kakhulu okwenza ukuthi abahola lesi sibonelelo bangakwazi ngisho ukuthenga ukudla okuzohlala isonto ngale mali."Ngale mali abahola lesi sibonelelo bathenga ukudla okuhlala izinsuku ezimbili kuya kwezintathu, bekungagcono ukuthi yenyuswe ngo-R90 obekungenza ukuthi okungenani bakwazi ukuthenga ukudla okuzoqeda isonto. Le mali kwesinye isikhathi ifakwa emabhange, amabhange athathe izindleko zawo, abahola le mali bagcine behola ubala," kusho yena.Uthe uyazi ukuthi uNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi, uNkk Lindiwe Zulu, wathi bangu-11 million ababhalisele lesi sibonelelo kodwa uyazi ukuthi bangu-9 million abasiholayo."Uhulumeni ngokubona kwethu ubengakwazi ukwenyusa ngemali ethe xaxa ukube ubonisana nabantu abathintekayo, angathathi izinqumo engenalo ulwazi. Okunye okufaka ngcindezi intela yentengo iVAT  efakwa uma uthenga. Kwabampofu le ntela yenza izinto zibe nzima kakhulu," kusho yena.IPhini likaNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezoBulungiswa kuleli, uMnuz John Jeffrey, ephawula mayelana nalesi sibonelo nokuthi sisiza ekutheni abantu bathole ilungelo lokudla kakhululazi izingane, uthe lesi sibonelelo sengeza phezu kwezinye izibonelelo ezikhona ezifana nesibonelelo sezingane nokuthi izingane ziyadla ezikoleni."Sasenzelwe ukuthi sisize abantu abaphelelwa umsebenzi kakhulukazi ngo-2020 ngesikhathi kuhlasele iCovid-19," kugcizelela uJeffrey.Ngenyanga edlule, izinhlangano ezizibiza nge- Alternative Information and Development Centre (AIDC),  okuyi-Amandla PE Forum, iBack to Work Campaign (B2WC), iBlack Sash, iCry of the Xcluded, iFight Inequality Alliance South Africa, iGlobal Reformed Advocacy Platforms for Engagement (GRAPE), i-Institute for Economic Justice (IEJ), i#PayTheGrants, iTreatment Action Campaign (TAC), iTrust for Community Outreach and Education (TCOE) ne-350Africa.org, zimashe ngaphambi kokuthi kwethulwe isabelomali salo nyaka. Bezifuna ukuthi ukuhulumeni anikeze isibonelelo esiqala ku-R1 500, kumiswe ukuncishiswa kwesabelomali, kukhushulwe intela kwabacebile, kuphinde kunikezwe izidingongqangi zamahhala kubo bonke abadla imbuya ngothi, uhulumeni aqhamuke namanye amasu okuphatha izikweletu zomphakathi.

SIYANDA isibalo sabagxeka ukufungiswa kobengungqongqoshe wezeMidlalo, amaCiko namaSiko, uMnuz Zizi Kodwa, njengelungu lePhalamende nakuba esabhekene namacala enkohlakalo.UKodwa wasule njengongqongqoshe walo mnyango kulandela ukuvela enkantolo ngezinsolo zokuthi wamukela uR1.7 million wentshontsho.UMnuz Wayne Duvenage wenhlangano i-Organisation Undoing Tax Abuse (OUTA), uthe lesi sinyathelo se-ANC sokuvumela uKodwa ukuthi afunge njengelungu lePhalamende, sizoba nomthelela ongemuhlelo empini yokulwa nenkohlakalo.Uthe lokhu kuzodlulisa umyalezo ozodida abantu ngokuthi ngabe le nhlangano izibophezele ekulweni nenkohlakalo.“I-ANC ihlale ithi izakha kabusha kodwa yenza okuhlukile kunalokho. Abantu bazodideka ngokuthi ngabe i-ANC izinikele empini yokulwa nenkohlakalo noma isuke izikhulumela nje,” kusho uDuvenage. Umfelandawonye wezinyunyana zabasebenzi iCosatu, isigxekile lesi sinyathelo, yathi uKodwa kumele ahoxe.UMnuz Matthew Parks weCosatu uthe kubamangazile ukufungiswa kukaKodwa ekubeni i-ANC inomgomo wokuthi amalungu abhekene namacala enkohlakalo kumele ahoxe emisebenzini yenhlangano.Uthe lesi sinyathelo sizodida abantu ngoba i-ANC isho okunye iphinde yenze okunye.Uveze ukuthi akuwakhi umqondo ukuthi wasula esikhundleni, gwiqiqi useyabuya uyafungiswa.“Abantu bazolahlekelwa yithemba ngemizamo ye-ANC yokulwa nenkohlakalo. Akukuhle ukuthi sibe namalungu ePhalamende azophuma engena ezinkantolo,” kusho uParks. I-ActionSA nayo isigxekile lesi senzo yathi ngoba ubhekene namacala abucayi.Umholi wenguyazane yaleli qembu ePhalamende, uMnuz Athol Trollip, uthe uKodwa ubhekene nezinsolo ezithinta uR1.7 million, wentshontsho ngakho bekungamele afungiswe.Uthe akuwakhi umqondo ukuthi kungaba nelungu lePhalamende elakha imithetho yezwe ekubeni ligqigqa ezinkantolo.“Sinxusa i-ANC ukuthi imsuse njengelungu layo ePhalamende ukuze abe nesikhathi esenele sokuhamba icala abhekene nalo. Asifuni abantu bakuleli ukuthi bakhokhele izindleko zecala likaKodwa.” Ekhuluma nabezindaba ngemuva kokufungiswa, uKodwa uthe akubuzwe i-ANC mayelana nokufungiswa kwakhe.Uthe eyecala uzobhekana nalo enkantolo wathi umsulwa.

INHLANGANO elwela amalungelo abantu eSwatini, iSwaziland Solidarity Network, igxeka umshado olungiselelwayo weNgonyama uMswati wesithathu nendodakazi yowayengumengameli, uJacob Zuma, uNomcebo (21).ISwaziland Solidarity Network ichaze lo mshado njengechilo, yakhala ngokunyathelwa kwamalungelo kaNomcebo.Okhulumela inhlangano, uMnuz Lucky Lukhele, uthe alukho uthando kulo mshado, wathi kusetshenziswa uNomcebo ukuqinisa ubudlelwano beNgonyama noZuma. UNomcebo uzokuba unkosikazi kaMswati ka-16.Ingonyama yathumela abakhongi ngenyanga eyedlule, kuthiwa yalobola ngezinkomo ezingu-100, nemali enguR2 million.UNomcebo uvele useqalile ukubonakala emicimbini yaseSwatini ehanjelwa abasendlunkulu.Kuthiwa kulindeleke ukuthi ziwushaye emva koMkhosi woMhlanga.ULukhele unxuse zonke izinhlangano ezilwela amalungelo abesifazane ezwenikazi i-Afrika jikelele ukuba zigxeke isenzo seNgonyama noZuma.“Sekukaningi la madoda ebukela phansi amalungelo abantu besifazane. Sekukaningi enza izinto eziphambene namasiko ethu thina ma-Afrika ukuze azuze kwezepolitiki nangemali. “Sifuna ukuthi athathelwe izinyathelo ngokushesha. La madoda awagcinanga nje ngokusebenzisa budedengu amasiko ethu, kepha aphinde ehlisa isithunzi sabantu besifazane.”AbakwaDlamini nabakwaZuma banomlando wokuganiselana.Ngesikhathi uZuma eseyiphini likamengameli, walobola udadewabo weNgonyama, uMntwana uSebentile Dlamini, ngezinkomo ezingu-50.Abanye abakwaZuma abaganwe ebukhosini baseSwatini kubalwa indodana kaZuma, uMnuz Mxolisi Zuma, nosomabhizinisi uMnuz Khulubuse Zuma.ULukhele uthe kukhona okushaya amanzi ngokuganiselana kwale mindeni.“Sekusele kancane ukuthi  iganiselane abantu abayizihlobo. IFinancial Intelligence Centre kufanele iphenye ukushintshisana ngomcebo kwale mindeni yomibili.”UNomcebo uke wabonakala eseduze neNgonyama, evunule ngebhayi leMK, okuyiqembu likaZuma.ULukhele uthe lokhu kwabamangaza  ngoba amaqembu ezepolitiki avalwe imilomo eSwatini.“Abaholi bamaqembu ezepolitiki eSwatini bayahlukunyezwa. Kuyamangaza ukuthi uNomcebo uyakwazi nje ukuvele azifakele ibhayi leqembu likayise phambi kweNgonyama. Le senzo sikhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi abukho ubulungiswa lapha eSwatini.”Okhulumela Ingonyama, uMnuz Percy Simelane, akathandanga  ukuphawula kakhulu ngalolu daba ngoba ‘luthinta impilo yeNgonyama’ yasesithe.USimelane uthe nakuba iSwaziland Solidarity Foundation inelungelo lokuzwakalisa imibono yayo, kodwa ayinalo ilungelo lokugxambukela empilweni yabantu yasesithe.

BAFUNA umkhuzi wamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLieutenant General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi, abalekelele engakehlisi “isivinini ahamba ngaso”, abantu baseMgungundlovu abaxakwe abantu bokufika.Abantu baseMgungundlovu banxuse uMkhwanazi ukuba angenelele ngokushesha odabeni lobugebengu obenziwa ngabantu bokufika enkabeni yedolobha.Lokhu bakusho ngesikhathi kunembizo yokuxoxa ngobugebengu ebibizwe uNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, izolo.UMnuz Gobizizwe Zondi waseMbali, uthe abantu bokufika bayazenzela ezakhiweni ezisedolobheni, wabalula kakhulu ezisemgwaqweni uPietermaritz.“Siyocela kule sivinini onaso, ukuba ungenelele kulolu daba ungaze ukhathale. Akuhambeki kuPietermaritz, amaPakistan ayazenzela. Angazi ukuthi anasiphi isivumelwano nomasipala. Sicela ungenelele kungaze kungenelele thina siwumphakathi.”Nakuba uZondi encome amagalelo kaMkhwanazi ekulweni nobugebengu, ukhalaze ngesiteshi sangakubo eMbali.Uthe eminyakeni emibili edlule, kwadutshulwa indodana yakhe ngezinhlamvu eziwu-17 ngaphandle kwesiteshi samaphoyisa, kwangaphuma ngisho iphoyisa elilodwa.Abantu abaningi abakhulume embizweni bakhale ngokungabibikho kwezimoto eziteshini zamaphoyisa angakubo, ukwebiwa kwemfuyo nokuhlala ngobumnyama ngenxa yokungabi bikho kweziphehli zikagesi, ama-transformer.UNksz Nombulelo Gumede wakwaMafunze, uthe bayaye batshelwe ukuthi izimoto azikho uma beshayela ucingo esiteshini samaphoyisa.UMnuz Mzothule Mchunu waseMooi River, uthe imfuyo yabo iyantshontshwa, wathi iningi lemfuyo entshontshwayo iphelela oThongathi nakwaMaphumulo.“Okuxakayo ukuthi amaphoyisa asuke esekuphi? Kungani engaze angazifuna izimvume zokuthuthwa kwemfuyo?”Ephendula izikhalazo zezakhamizi, uNtuli uncome igalelo likaMkhwanazi ekulweni nobugebengu.UNtuli uthe uMkhwanazi uyisibonelo esihle emaphoyiseni, wathi abantu bakwezinye izifundazwe bayafisa ukuba nabakhuzi bamaphoyisa afana noMkhwanazi.“UMkhwanazi ngimhloma uphaphe lwegwalagwala. Abantu bathi uma bonke abakhuzi bamaphoyisa bakwezinye izifundazwe bengase befane naye, ubugebengu bungaphela.”UNtuli uthe babambisene kahle noMkhwanazi, wathi bazoyinqoba impi yobugebengu.“Lo mkhankaso wokulwa nobugebengu lapha KwaZulu-Natal angeke ube inganekwane noma iphupho lasebusika. Sizokulwa nobugebengu, asikhathalele ukuthi benziwa ubani.”UNtuli uthe bazowukhomba umuzi onotshwala labo abazonqaba ukuboshwa.“Kufanele abantu baKwaZulu-Natal bazi ukuthi uma bekhipha isibhamu besibhekisa emaphoyiseni, amaphoyisa ngeke ahlale angazivikeli.”UNtuli uthe bazoqhubeka nomkhankaso wabo abawubhekise ebantwini basemazweni angaphandle abangenazo izimvume zokuba kuleli.“Kulabo abangaphandle abangenazo izimvume zokuba kuleli, ngithi kubo uyeza uMkhwanazi.”

I-DA igxeka isinqumo sokuncishiswa kwamanzi ezindaweni ezikuMasipala waseThekwini.I-DA ithe ukuncishiswa kwamanzi eThekwini kuzophazamisa impilo yezakhamizi zakulo mkhandlu dolobha.Isinqumo sokuncishiswa kwamanzi simenyezelwe imeya yomkhandlu, uMnuz Cyril Xaba, ngesikhathi ikhuluma emhlanganweni womkhandlu, obuyizolo.UXaba uthe ukusetshenziswa kakhulu kwamanzi eThekwini okuholele ekutheni bathathe isinqumo sokuwanciphisa.“Sihlezi sizikhalela kubantu, sikhala ngokuthi amanzi asetshenziswayo angaphezulu kwalawo esiwatholayo. Okudala lokhu ukuthi baningi kakhulu abantu abafudukela edolobheni lethu, kuphinde kube nenkinga yengqalasizinda endala. Le ngqalasizinda yenza ukuthi amapayipi avuze, silahlekelwe amanzi amaningi.”ITheku lithola amanzi enhlanganweni Umgeni-Thukela Water.UXaba uthe amanzi abawathenga eMgeni-Thukela Water kufanele anciphe ngo-8.4% ukuze Umgeni-Thukela Water uhlangabezane nombandela welayisensi yawo.“Kungakho uMnyango wezaManzi unqume ukuthi kuncishiswe amanzi.”UXaba uthe ukuncishiswa kwamanzi kuzoqala ngo-Okthoba 10, kuzokwenzeka kuze kuphele izinyanga eziwu-12.“Sifisa ukusho ukuthi sizame konke okusemandleni ukuvimba ukuncishiswa kwamanzi. Sizamile ukubhalela umnyango siwucela ukuthi umise kancane uhlelo lokuncishiswa kwamanzi ukuze siqale uhlelo lokubhekana nesibalo esiphezulu samanzi asilahlekelayo, kodwa ke sikulesi simo esibhekene naso manje.”UXaba uthe bazoqhamuka nezinhlelo zokunciphisa amanzi alahlekela umkhandlu.Ikhansela leDA, uNksz Yogis Govender, lithe abantu baseThekwini bafela izono abangazazi.UNksz Govender uthe sekunesikhathi eside umkhandlu uhluleka ukunciphisa umthamo wamanzi ophelela enhlabathini."Uphiko lwezamanzi luhlezi lwenza izethembiso zokulungisa le nkinga. Lolu phiko selusebenzise izigidi zamaRandi luzama ukulwa nale nkinga, kodwa namhlanje silapha."Iqiniso ukuthi uphiko lwezamanzi luhlulekile ukulungisa inkinga. Manje bonke abantu baseThekwini sebezoncishiselwa amanzi. Abantu sekufanele bathembele ezimotweni zamanzi."UNksz Govender uthe ukuncishiswa kwamanzi kungase kuphazamise nokuthuthwa kwendle.UNksz Govender uthe ziningi iziphakamiso zokuxazulula inkinga yamanzi abazenzile, wakhala ngokuthi zonke zashaywa indiva.Uyalele umkhandlu ukuba uqhamuke nezinhlelo zokulungisa le nkinga ngokushesha.

SIMUNCU isimo emphakathini waseDumaneni, oLundi, kulandela ukubulawa kwabayisithupha ngempelasonto ezigamekweni ezimbili ezehlukene.Esigamekweni sangeSonto kudutshulwe ubaba wekhaya (66) kwaMayise, umkakhe (63) namadodakazi amathathu aneminyaka ephakathi kuka-29 no-36.Kuthiwa indodakazi eno-29 ishone endleleni eya esibhedlela.Ikhansela lendawo, uMnuz Thulani Nxumalo, lithe bathole ukuthi laba bahlaselwe abantu abangaziwa abagasele ekhaya ezintatha zangeSonto.“Abahlaseli bafike badubula wonke umndeni onamalungu ayisihlanu. Ashone wonke,” kusho uNxumalo.Kuvela ukuthi amadodakazi abengothisha womathathu ezikoleni ezimbili zendawo, iJobo High neKujulukeni Primary.UNxumalo uthe kwenzeka lesi sigameko nje ngoLwesihlanu emndenini wakwaBiyela kushone umfana oneminyaka engu-16.“Yena uhlaselwe sekuhwalele. Kuthiwa ubefika ngemoto ehamba namanye amalungu omndeni bebuya ndawana thize. Bafike sebelindiwe abahlaseli abavele bathushuka egcekeni babadubula,” kusho uNxumalo.Uthe umfana ushonele endaweni yesigameko, kwathi abanye ababili baphuthunyiswa esibhedlela.“Lukhulu uvalo olukhona emphakathini ngoba bonke laba ababulawayo bahlobene. Emva kwesigameko sangempelasonto, abanye bebecela ngisho nokungena ezimotweni zamaphoyisa ebezihambele izigameko, babaleke kule ndawo,” kwenaba uNxumalo.Uqhube wathi miningi imindeni esithuthile yahamba ngenxa yokuzibona ingaphephile.Uveze nokuthi kusuka ngo-2021 bevile ku-20 abantu asebebulelwe kule ndawo, abahlobene.Ezigamekweni ezimbili ezingaphambi kwalezi zangempelasonto, ngoFebhuwari 2 kwadutshulwa umkhulu walo mfana ona-16 odutshulwe ngoLwesihlanu. Kuthiwa abahlaseli bambulalela ekhaya.Leso sigameko salandelwa ngesokubulawa kwenduna yendawo, uZuma, nayehamba naye, uMbatha. Bona badutshulelwa emotweni ngabantu abazenza abacela ukugitshezwa, kwathi uma ima imoto bakhipha isibhamu badubula uZuma, amachaphazelo asale esethela noMbatha, bashona bobabili.Imizamo yokuthola imindeni ayiphumelelanga.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLieutenant Colonel Nqobile Gwala, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi kuvulwe amacala ayisithupha okubulala esiteshini samaphoyisa sasoLundi.“Esigamekweni sangeSonto abafi baneminyaka ephakathi kwengu-29 nengu-66, bahlaselwe ekhaya eDumaneni. Oneminyaka engu-29 ushone endleleni eya esibhedlela, bonke laba abanye bashonele endaweni yesigameko,” kusho uLt Col Gwala.Uqhube wathi esigamekweni sangoLwesihlanu kudutshulwe umfana (16) wafa.“Akukaboshwa muntu, amaphoyisa asaphenya,” kusho uLt Col Gwala.

BAHLALELE ovalweni abahlali basehostela iKK KwaDabeka, eThekwini ngenxa yobugebengu obuxakile.USihlalo wesigceme B, okuyibhuloho uB1 kuya ku-B7, uMnuz Jabulani Khumalo ,ubize umhlangano ophuthumayo ngeSonto enkundleni yezemidlalo eKK, ngenhloso ypkuzobonisana nabahlali ngenkinga yobugebengu.Kwezinye zezinto ebeziseqhulwini emhlanganweni kubalwa ukugqekezwa kwezindlu, amalambu akhanyisa emaphaseji agcine esentshontshwa ebese kuba ukukhishwa kwamasango okungenwa ngawo.UMnuz Themba Mngonyama ongumhlali, uthe usegqekezelwe endlini yakhe izikhawu ezimbili kulandelana.“Ngangisebenza ebusuku ngase ngithola ucingo komunye womakhelwane bami engitshela ukuthi endlini yami kugqekeziwe. Ngathi ngifika ekuseni nangempela kunjalo futhi kuze kube yimanje angikamazi umuntu owenza lesi senzo,” kusho uMngonyama.Uthe ezintweni ezathathwa ngesikhathi egqekezelwa kubalwa  izikibha zomsebenzi, amateku, ithelevishini nakho konke ukudla ayenakho endlini. Uthe ngesikhathi egqekezelwa okwesibili bamthathela amabhuzu, ithelevishini ayeseyithenge isibili nokudla okwakusalile.Ekhuluma neSolezwe uKhumalo, uthe ziyanda izigameko zokugqekezwa kwezindlu zabantu. “Izindlu zabantu ziyagqekezwa. Uma umuntu engekho uyifica isigqekeziwe ngoba basheshe babone labo abenza leso senzo ukuthi umniniyo akekho,” kusho uKhumalo.Uthe uma uhlala endlini kumele ube namaphepha atshengisayo ukuthi uhlala kuleyo ndlu ngokuphelele.“Uma uhlala endlini ngokusemthethweni, kufanele ube nephepha lento oyikhokhelayo njengamanzi nogesi. Ezikhathini eziningi okusilimazayo, uthola ukuthi umuntu owagcina ebhaliswe ukuthi uhlala kuleyo ndlu kade ahamba futhi wahamba engashintshwanga. Kuthi loyo ongena esikhaleni sakhe, kugcine kungaveli ukuthi ungubani ngoba usuke engabhalisiwe. Okuholela ekutheni izigebengu zigcine zibagcweleza kalula, ngokwazi ukuthi lowo osehlala akabhaliswe ndawo,” usho kanje.Uqhube wathi isixwayiso anaso ngalesi senzo ukuthi abantu basondele emakomitini, ukuze bavikeleke kwabathatha izindlu ngenkani nokuthi izinto zenziwe ngomthetho ngoba abakhipha abantu ezindlini bafika beyiqulu ebusuku baqhumise izibhamu bese bekhipha abantu ezindlini. UKhumalo uphethe ngelokuthi kumele kube nokuthula kubahlali basehostela futhi kumele abantu izindlu bazithole ngendlela okuyiyo.  Uthe lokho okwenzakala manje akusikho ukuthula futhi akumele lushawe indiva udlame nokwebiwa kwezindlu.Ikhansela lendawo uMnuz Khulekani Mbhele, aliliphendulanga ucingo  ngesikhathi lifonelwa ngalolu daba.

ABAMANGALELWA ecaleni lokufa kukaSenzo Meyiwa bathi bazoyeka ukuya enkantolo ngoba abakwazi ukugeza ejele ngoba bageziswa ngamanzi abandayo njengoba kubanda nje.UMeyiwa owayengunozinti we-Orlando Pirates neBafana Bafana, wadutshulwa wabulawa ekubo kwentombi yakhe uKelly Khumalo eVosloorus, eGauteng ngo-2014.Kusafakaza uNksz Pinky Vythilingham osebenzela iVodacom nowethula ubufakazi bokuxhumana ngamaselula abamangalelwa.U-Advocate Charles Mnisi wethule isikhalo sekhasimende lakhe eliwummangalelwa wesithathu uMnuz Mthobisi Mncube. UMnisi uthe kunenkinga yamanzi ashisayo angaphumi ejele eKgosi Mampuru II nokuthwalisa kanzima ikhasimende lakhe.“Akakwazi ukugeza ekuseni ngoba uhlala egumbini elinamanzi abandayo selokhu kuqale ubusika. Akaze ageze kusukela ngoLwesine ngoba kumakhaza kakhulu,’’ kusho uMnisi.Ubalule namanye amaphuzu athe uMncube ukhala ngawo, afisa alungiswe.“Selokhu avalelwa egumbini lakhe yedwa lapha eC-Max akakwazi nokushayela umndeni ucingo, akunathelevishini, akaxoxi namuntu. Izikhulu zejele zithi ugcinwe kanjalo ngenxa yokuthi uwummangalelwa kuleli cala,’’ kusho uMnisi.Uthe ikhasimende lakhe selihlale egunjini lalo lodwa iminyaka emine nokuyinto ebukeka iwukujezisa ngaphandle kokutholwa enecala.Uveze nokuthi ikhasimende lakhe linendawo elalimala kuyona kudala esebuhlungu namanje futhi lidinga usizo lwezempilo. Uthe ikhasimende lakhe lisola ukuthi ukugeza ngamanzi abandayo kuvusa izinhlungu lapha lalimala khona.UMnisi uthe ucela kubizwe isikhulu sejele sizochazela inkantolo ngoba uke wakhuluma naso kodwa asisazibambi izingcingo zakhe.Kuthe kusabhekwe lokho kwasukuma u-Advocate Zandile Mshololo omele ummangalelwa wesihlanu uMnuz Fisokuhle Ntuli, naye ekhala esifanayo.“Ikhasimende lami uNtuli lihlala ejele elifanayo, nalo likhala ngawo amanzi abandayo futhi lingase lingezi enkantolo ngoba alikwazi ukugeza,’’ kusho u-Advocate Mshololo.UMshushisi woMbuso u-Advocate George Baloyi uthe bayaqala ukuzwa ngalesi sikhalo kodwa bazojuba ithimba labaphenyi becala balulungise lolu daba.IJaji Ratha Mokgotlheng liyalele uBaloyi ukuthi aqinisekise ukuthi lolu daba luyalungiswa.

BAHLUKENE phakathi abaholi beNFP ngezinsongo zokuhoxa kuhulumeni wokubambisana ophethe KwaZulu-Natal.Unobhala jikelele wale nhlangano ewumbeki wenkosi esifundazweni, uMnuz Teddy Thwala, uthe angeke baphume kuhulumeni wokubambisana ne-IFP, ANC neDA.Lokhu kuphikisana nezinsongo ezenziwe umengameli weqembu, uMnuz Ivan Barnes, ngeledlule lapho esabise khona ngokuhosha imfe uma benganikezwa isikhundla sobumeya kumasipala wesifunda iZululand.UBarnes wayesigaqele lesi sikhundla kodwa sagcina sithathwe ikhansela le-IFP, uMnuz Michael “Mkhonyovu’’ Khumalo.Emva komhlangano owakhetha uKhumalo, uBarnes wasabisa ngokuhoxa kuhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal.Kepha uThwala uthe angeke baphume kuhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal njengoba ekhala ngokuthi isivumelwano sokubambisana kuhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal asibafaki omasipala.Njengengxenye yesivumelwano sokusebenzisana, iNFP yanikwa uMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi, ophethwe uNksz Mbali Shinga.“Abantu kufanele bakuqonde ukuthi kunomehluko phakathi kukahulumeni kazwelonke, owesifundazwe nohulumeni wasekhaya. Izimo azifani kuhulumeni wesifundazwe nakomasipala. Ngesikhathi sivuma ukusebenzisana kuhulumeni wesifundazwe, asizange siyikhulume indaba yakomasipala. Angicabangi ukuthi ngesikhathi amaqembu evumelana ngokusebenzisana esifundazweni ayevuma ukuphisana ngomasipala.”UThwala uthe uNksz Shinga uzosiphatha lesi sikhundla kuze kufike ukhetho olulandelayo.“Sizoqhubeka nokumeseka, akekho ozomkhipha. Uzophatha kuze kuphele iminyaka emihlanu. Abantu kufanele bakuqonde ukuthi into ebalulekile lapha ukufeza izifiso zabantu baKwaZulu-Natal. Abantu akufanele bafune ukusebenzisa uShinga ukulwa izimpi zabo zokufuna izikhundla.”UThwala uthe iNFP angeke izuze lutho ngokuhoxa kuhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal.I-NFP inesihlalo esisodwa esiShayamthetho, ukuhoxa kwayo kungashiya i-IFP, ANC neDA benezihlalo ezingu-40 uma behlanganisiwe.I-MK inezihlalo ezingu-37, bese kuthi i-EFF ibe nezimbili.“Lokho ke kungadala ungqingetshe ngoba izihlalo ziyokube sezilingana. Lokho kungakhinyabeza ukusebenza kukahulumeni wesifundazwe nokungaholela ekutheni mhlawumbe kugcine kuqalwa phansi ukhetho. Leyo nto ngeke ibasize ngalutho abantu baKwaZulu-Natal kodwa izobambezela ukulethwa kwezidingo.”UThwala uthe udaba lokuphathwa komasipala waseZululand lunzima ngoba kunezimpi zangaphakathi kwiNFP.Kunamakhansela eqembu amabili eNFP, uNksz Khanyi Jiyane, noMnuz Sibusiso Nkosi, aphonsela inselelo ukuxoshwa kwawo.UThwala uthe njengoba kusenamacala asezinkantolo kunzima ukuthi bangaxoxa eyokuthi kufanele banikezwe umasipala.“Njengamanje kusaxabene ubendle, kufanele silinde la macala asezinkantolo kuqala.”

IQEMBU eliholwa ngowayengumengameli uJacob Zuma, uMkhonto weSizwe Party, lidube umcimbi wokukhishwa kwemiphumela yokhetho emuva kokuthi lehlulekile ukunqanda ukukhishwa kwale miphumela.
