Abamele leli qembu bebengabonwa eMidrand, eGauteng nase-ICC eThekwini lapho bekukhishwa khona imiphumela yokhetho lwalo nyaka, abebefuna ukuthi kumiswe ukukhishwa kwayo kuze kulungiswe izikhalo ebezikhona.I-MK namanye amaqembu, i-ACC, ACP, ACT, ACDP, SUN, COPE, UDM, XILUVA, AADP, PA, CIASA, PMC,  AHC, AMC, ARA, UAT, AM4C, APC, AL-JAMAH, SARA, UIM, SARKO, ATM ne-OHM, athumelele le khomishini incwadi yabameli ebiyalela ukuthi lo mcimbi obungeSonto ebusuku esikhungweni samavoti eMidrand, ungaqhubeki kuze kulungiswe izikhalazo.Encwadini yabameli iBoruchowitz ethunyelelwe ikhomishini, iveze ukuthi lezi zinkinga zingaba nomthelela emiphumeleni yokhetho.Ithe lezi zinkinga ziphuce ilungelo lalawa maqembu okhetho olukhululekile. “Yingakho sithi akumiswe ukudedelwa kwemiphumela yokhetho kuze kuphothulwe zonke izikhalazo zamaqembu. Uma kungukuthi ikhomishini ayiphenduli, esibamele bazoqhubeka nezinhlelo zomthetho,” kusho le ncwadi. Ekhuluma neSolezwe ngeSonto ebusuku, okhulumela i-MK, uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndhlela, uthe bebengeke bakwazi ukuyoba yingxenye yento engekho emthethweni. “Bekuwumhlangano ongekho emthethweni. Ziningi izikhalo esifakiwe ngalolu khetho kodwa i-IEC izositshela ngomzuzu wokugcina ukuthi zichithiwe. Sizobheka ukuthi yiziphi izinyathelo zomthetho esizozithatha ngalokhu.”Ekhuluma nabezindaba ngoMgqibelo ebusuku, uZuma uthe akumele imenyezelwe le miphumela yokhetho ngenxa yezikhalazo zamaqembu.Uthe kumele zilungiswe zonke lezi zikhalazo, wathi ngeke kufe muntu uma ingakhishwa.“Akekho ozofa uma le miphumela ingamenyezelwa njengoba bekuhleliwe. Abangacasuli abantu, yingakho sithi akubhekisiswe zonke izikhalazo ngaphambi kokukhishwa kwemiphumela,” kusho uZuma.Usihlalo wekhomishini uMnuz Mosotho Moepya, uthe lolu khetho belunzima kakhulu. Uthe baningi abebencintisana kulona, wathi bagxekwe nxa zonke ngezinkinga ebezikhona.“Sime kunzima ukuze siqhubeke nomsebenzi wesizwe wokhetho. Nanoma yikuphi emhlabeni uma ukhetho seluphothulwa, isimo siyashuba. Siyabonga kulabo abebesikhulekela, besithumelele imiyalezo yokuthi siqine nakuba besigxekwa,” kusho uMoepya. Uthe bebethole izikhalazo ezingu-579 zalabo abebekhalaza ngezinto eziningi ezithinta ukhetho. Uke wakuveza ukuthi umthetho ubalula ukuthi imiphumela yokhetho kumele idedelwe ezinsukwini eziyisikhombisa emva kokubanjwa kokhetho.Uveze ukuthi imiphumela ezokhishwa izoba semthethweni uma isifakwe ngaphansi komqulu kahulumeni, iGovernment Gazette. Ekhuluma emcimbini wokumemezela imiphumela umengameli uCyril Ramaphosa unxuse ukuthi kuhlonishwe isinqumo sabavoti abanqume ukuthi kungabikhona iqembu elidla umhlanganiso kuzwelonke. Uthe imiphumela yokhetho iveza imibono yabantu.“Abantu bakuleli balindele ukuthi abaholi bamaqembu basebenzisane. Bafuna ukuthi kubekwe eceleni ukungaboni ngaso linye, kodwa kusetshenzelwe isizwe. Bafuna ukuthi kuphuculwe izwe, yilokho okuvezwe abantu bakuleli.” Uthe kumele kulungiswe izinkinga ngokuthula, kulandelwe umthetho wezwe.“Kuyohlale kukhona ukungaboni ngaso linye, kanjalo nezinkinga ziyohlale zikhona kodwa abantu bafuna sisebenzisane. Iqembu ngalinye lijutshwe ngabantu ukuthi lenze lokho ebelikuthembisile.” Uthe amaqembu uma eseya ePhalamende kumele azi ukuthi izihlalo akuwona ezawo.Ubonge abantu bakuleli ngokuqinisa intando yeningi.“Kumele sibeke abantu bakuleli phambili. Yisikhathi lapho sithandaza khona ukuthi uNkulunkulu asivikele.”Imiphumela yokhetho iveze ukuthi i-ANC ithole izihlalo ezingu-159 ePhalamende.Amanye amaqembu athole kanje:DA-87, MK-58, EFF-39, IFP-17, PA-9, Freedom Front Plus-6, ActionSA-6, ACDP-3, UDM-3, ATM-2, Al Jama-2, Bosa-2, NCC-2, Rise Mzansi-2, Good-1, PAC-1, UAT-1.Kulolu khetho sehlile isibalo sabantu abaphumile bayovota njengoba bebengu-58.61%. Angu-16 million amavoti angenile kanti angu-212 518 acekeleke phansi.Ngo-2019, bangu-66.99% abantu abaphuma bayovota kanti amavoti acekeleke phansi ayengu-235 472. Bangu-17 million abantu abavota ngo-2019.

BASWELE amaphiko okundiza osomabhizinisi baKwaZulu-Natal abathole izitifiketi eziklelisa izindawo zabo ngenkanyezi eyodwa.UNkk Bronwen Auret oyi-chief quality assurance officer kwiSouth African Tourism, uthe baqale uhlelo lokuqeqesha osomabhizinisi abanezindawo zokuhlala abantu emakhaya nasemalokishini ngo-Okthoba 2021, e-Eastern Cape kwathi sebebona ukuthi luyasebenza baludlulisela KwaZulu-Natal ngoNovemba 2022 lwaphela ngoNovemba 2023.“Inhloso yalolu hlelo wukuqinisekisa ukuthi akekho osala ngemuva kwezokuvakasha, bonke abantu bayangena kulo mkhakha kusukela kwabasemalokishini nabasezindaweni zasemakhaya. KwaZulu-Natal siqeqeshe osomabhizinisi abawu-210 kodwa bawu-150 abathole izitifiketi ezinenkanyezi eyodwa. Lokhu kusho ukuthi uma izivakashi zifuna izindawo zokuhlala ezithembekile zizobona zona kuqala,” kusho uNkk Auret.Uthe emabhizinisini ase-Eastern Cape abawasizile, bathole ukuthi asethola izivakashi unyaka wonke okusho ukuthi nabantu bahlale besebenza.UNkk Lungile Hlabisa weMbopha Guest House esoLundi, uthe sisho lukhulu isitifiketi ngoba manje abantu bazokwazi ukuthi yize besendaweni esemakhaya kodwa izinga labo liphezulu futhi bathembekile.Uthe ukuba sohlelweni lokuqeqeshelwa inkanyezi kwenza abantu basheshe bazi ngabo.UMnuz Luyanda Khoza weVikama Guest House esoLundi , uthe ukuba nenkanyenzi kuyawenza umehluko ngoba ngisho uhulumeni uyabaletha abantu abazohlala endaweni yabo.UNksz Busi Mhlongo wendawo yokuhlala izivakashi ekwaP nakwaN KwaMashu, Umusa Guest House, uthe bayajabula ukuthi izindawo zabo zombili sezinesitifiketi senkanyezi eyodwa.Uthe ibhizinisi lihamba kahle ngoba ukuqeqeshelwa inkanyezi kubavulela amathuba okuthenjwa yibo bonke abasemkhakheni wokuvakasha.Ubalule ukuthi izindawo zabo zisetshenziswa ngisho nayizinhlelo zethelevishini eziqoshwa KwaMashu okubalwa Uzalo, Imbewu neminye imidlalo.Uveze ukuthi sebedale amathuba omsebenzi awu-15 kanti bazimisele ukudala eminye njengoba benethemba lokuthi zizokwanda izivakashi ezibahambelayo

BATHI izobasiza ukuheha izivakashi zakwamanye amazwe osomabhizinisi abazohambela i-Africa’s Travel Indaba bemenywe yiDurban Tourism.UNksz Zinhle Mqadi oyisikhulu esiphezulu sendawo yokudlela eseMlaza, iMax’s Lifestyle, utshele Isolezwe ukuthi bayajabula kakhulu ukuthi iDurban Tourism ibanike ithuba lokuyozikhangisa kwi-Africa’s Travel Indaba.“I-Africa’s Travel Indaba wumbukiso omkhulu wezokuvakasha ohanjelwa ngabantu bamazwe aphesheya kwezilwandle, awalapha e-Afrika nabantu bakwezinye izifundazwe zakuleli. Uyithuba lokuzikhangisa nokwakha ubudlelwano obusha namabhizinisi ahlukene. Sihlezi sizuza uma kuyi-Africa’s Travel Indaba ngoba kunezivakashi eziza elokishini zizodla noma zenze eminye imicimbi,” kuchaza uNksz Mqadi.Uthe lo mbukiso awugcini nje ngokugcwalisa amahhotela kodwa ungenisa imali kuwo wonke amabhizinisi ezokuvakasha eThekwini ngoba izivakashi ziyiswa kuwo wonke amakhona aleli dolobha.Amazwi akhe ananelwe wuNksz Makhosazana Ngwenya wendawo yokuhlala izivakashi eKwaNgcolosi, iSilokazi.UNksz Ngwenya uthe ukuya kwi-Africa’s Travel Indaba kuzobasiza ukuzikhangisa kubantu bamazwe ahlukene ngoba bahlale bezidinga izivakashi.“I-Africa’s Travel Indaba izoqinisekisa ukuthi sihlale sinezivakashi ngoba njengoba sizobe sizikhangisa ngaphansi kweDurban Tourism, izivakashi zizohlale zisikhumbula. Sizokwazi ukukhombisa abantu ubuntu esinabo nobuhle bemvelo bale ndawo yethu,” kusho uNksz Ngwenya.I-Africa’s Travel Indaba izoba seNkosi Albert Luthuli International Convention Centre (ICC) kusukela namhlanje kuya ngoLwesine.Izohanjelwa ngabantu abangaphezu kuka-9 000 kanti kuphakathi kuka-85% no-95% ukugcwala kwamahhotela aseThekwini njengoba kunalo mbukiso. Kulindeleke ukuthi ingenise uR439 million emnothweni weTheku, idale amathuba omsebenzi awu-796.

UJABULILE, wathi ubulungiswa uyabuthola kancane unina wowesifazane obekade eyinkosikazi yesosha odutshulwe washona ngoJanuwari 3, nonyaka, umsolwa enqatshelwa ibheyili.INkantolo yeMantshi yasePinetown incishe ibheyili uMnuz Lwanda Zungu, osolwa ngokubulala inkosikazi yakhe uNkk, Tania Msane-Zungu (36).UZungu unqatshelwe ibheyili yimantshi Gwendolyn Robinson ethe azikho izizathu ezinqala futhi ezingejwayelekile azibekile esicelweni sakhe sebheyili.Icala libe selihlehliselwa uJuni 18, nonyaka, ukuze uMbuso uphothule uphenyo lwawo.UNkk Gwena Msane, unina kaNkk Msane-Zungu (36), uthe: “Yize sijabulile kodwa ukwesaba ebekade sinakho akuphelile ngoba noma ngabe yini ayicabangayo (uZungu) ngeke ayenze ngezandla zakhe, uzothumela. Besingafuni ukuthi ayithole ibheyili.” Uchaze ngesimo sabantwana bababafana balaba ababeganene, wathi bayamkhumbula unina wabo ngoba iminyaka yonke bebekade bephila naye.Uqhube wathi laba bafana abakaze baphile noyise obekade esebenza kude ezintabeni embuthweni wezempi waseNingizimu Afrika.“Bayamdinga umuntu ozoba nabo, bakhungathekile kakhulu, angifuni ukuqamba amanga kubi nje. Oyedwa esikoleni uyazama omunye akakhoni ukulandelela okwenzakalayo,” kuchaza uNkk Msane.Imantshi ithe ngokubona kwayo, uZungu ubekade efuna ibheyili ukuze anakekele abantwana bakhe, aqhube imfundo yakhe futhi ubekhombisa ukukhathazeka ngesimo somqondo sentombazane yakhe.Iqhube yathi uZungu wabuzwa uMbuso ngeqhaza alibamba ekwenzekeni kwesigameko kodwa akusho wathi konke kuyohlaluka uma sekuqulwa icala.“Okwami akukhona ukwahluleka ukuthi unecala noma cha kodwa ukubheka izizathu ezinqala nezehlukile esicelweni sakhe sebheyili. UZungu waphika isidana ukuthi wambulala umkakhe. Inkantolo bekumele ikuqhathanise akushilo nokushiwo uMbuso,” kusho imantshi.Imantshi ithe vele uZungu akasasebenzi futhi abukho ubufakazi abethulele inkantolo uma ethi uzoqala ibhizinisi.Ithe isizathu esikhulu soMbuso, sokuthi uZungu anqatshelwe ibheyili, kumayelana nokuphepha kofakazi nokuthi uyabasabisa.Enkantolo bekukhona amalungu ayo yomibili imindeni eganiselene engasabhekani.Lokhu kuyaye kugqame nangokuhlala kwawo ngokwehlukana emabhentshini asenkantolo.UZungu ubebukeka ezikhululekele njengenjwayelo futhi akakhombisanga kujabha encishwa ibheyili.

UMENGAMELI we-ANC, uCyril Ramaphosa, uxwayise izakhamizi zaseThekwini ukuba zingavumi ukukhohliswa amaqembu ezepolitiki enza izethembiso angeke azifeze.URamaphosa uthe njengoba kubhekwe okhethweni lwangenyanga ezayo, amaqembu amaningi enza izethembiso angeke azigcine.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi eqhuba umkhankaso wakhe wokhetho, eThekwini.Umkhankaso kaRamaphosa waseThekwini uqale ngoLwesihlanu, eNanda.NgoMgqibelo uRamaphosa uhlanagne nenkosi yakwaMlaba, kwaXimba, wahlangana nabamabandla, waphinde wakhankasa nasezindaweni ezingasePinetwon, kwaMaMdekazi naseMarianhill.Utshele abaholi bamabandla ukuthi amaqembu amaningi akhankasela ukhetho athembisa nezinto angazi ukuthi azozenza kanjani uma enqoba ukhetho.“Manje kunamaqembu amaningi ahamba ethembisa abantu ukuthi azobakhela izindlu. Labantu abakaze bakhe ngisho indlu eyodwa. Uma befika kunina benithembisa izindlu, anobabuza ukuthi bake bazakhaphi izindlu.”URamaphosa uthe i-ANC kuphela engakwazi ukufeza izethembiso ezenza ebantwini bakuleli.Uthe lokhu sebekwenze kusukela ngo-1994, ngesikhathi benqoba ukhetho okokuqala.URamaphosa unxuse abantu ukuba baphinde banikeze i-ANC ithuba okhethweni oluzayo.“Yebo sibe  nawo amaphutha, kodwa sikwazile ukufeza okuningi esasikuthembisile. Asiphumeni sonke ngomhlaka 29 siyovotela i-ANC.”

BAFUNE isiteshi samaphoyisa esingumahamba nendlwana abakade basicela abahlali basemijondolo yaseKenville eGreenwood Park, kudutshulwa kubulawa abesifazane ababili ezintatha zayizolo.Osekomitini lomphakathi uMnuz Mashinini “City” Nkosi uthe uvuswe abanye abaholi basendaweni ngabo-3 ekuseni, bemtshela ukuthi sekwenzeke umshophi.Uthe uphuthume endaweni yesigameko, wafike wazithela phezu kwabafi bedutshulwe emakhanda, sebeshonile.“Ngithole ukuthi kuqale kwaba khona imoto ezwakale ima kabi, kwaze kwakhala namasondo. Kuthiwa emva kwalokho, kube sekuqhuma isibhamu kaningi,” kusho uNkosi.Uqhube wathi abaseduze abezwile bathe emva kokuqhuma kwezibhamu, kuzwakale imoto isisuka ngesivinini, ibaleka endaweni yesigameko.“Bathe uma beyobheka bathola abafi bebulewe,” kusho uNkosi.Ubuye wadalula nokuthi abesifazane laba akubona abantu bendawo, okwenza basole ukuthi bekusukwe nabo kwenye indawo, bazobulawelwa kule ndawo.Uthe wukwenzeka kwezigameko ezifuze lesi ezenza bafune isiteshi samaphoyisa esingumahamba nendlwana endaweni.Uthe babesicelile kuNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa waphambilini ngesikhathi ebavakashele endaweni emva kwezibhelu.“Wayehambe esithembisile ukuthi uzosilethela. Sinxusa ungqongqoshe osekhona manje ukuthi asilethele lesi siteshi ukuze kunciphe ubugebengu,” kusho yena.Uthe isiteshi esikhona, iGreenwood Park, sithe ukuqhela kubona, wathi yize amaphoyisa akulesi siteshi ezama ukuzulazula ngamaveni ngezikhathi zasebusuku, eqapha ubugebengu kodwa izigilamkhuba ziyawagada.“Ngesikhathi esazulazula, akwenzeki lutho kodwa uma eke ahamba, zisala zikhala,” kusho uNkosi othe ukuba khona kwamaphoyisa azohlala unomphela esiteshini esingumahamba nendlwana endaweni, kungenza umehluko omkhulu.Uthe kule ndawana okubulawelwe kuyo abesifazane, babalelwa ku-35 asebebulewe kuyo kusuka ngo-2021, babe ngu-87 eKenville yonkana.

IKHALA ngamaphoyisa abulale abantu okungesibo abebafuna, imindeni yabesilisa ababili baseMatshana Reserve, eMpangeni, abadutshulwe ngoMsombuluko.UMnuz Khanyisani Mdladla (30) noMnuz Andile Ngubane (29) kuthiwa baficwe amaphoyisa ophiko lwe-National Intervention Unit (NIU) bedlula ngasesitolo sangakubo, bebuya emsebenzini.Unina kaMdladla, uNkk Sbongile Mdladla, uthe babizelwe endaweni yesigameko ngamanye amalungu omphakathi, bafike bazithele phezu kwenqwaba yamaphoyisa abehlome eyizingovolo futhi enolaka oluxaka uSathane.“Sithe noma sithi sifuna ukusondela emotweni ebebedutshulelwe kuyo, ala ukhasha amaphoyisa abegqoke izigqoko ezifihla ubuso,” kusho yena.Uthe banqatshelwe ngisho ukuyobuka abafi baze bathathwa imoto elanda izidumbu.“Siye sesiyocosha ubuchopho obebusale endaweni yesigameko. Ngesikhathi sibucosha, asihleka amaphoyisa,” kuchaza uNkk Mdladla.Uthe banesiqiniseko sokuthi babulawelwe into abangayazi abafi.“Lezi zingane bezihlonipha wonke umuntu emphakathini. Abantu ebebethunywa nanoma ubani, bengakhalazi. Bebezisebenzela endaweni elungisa izimoto iPower Star. Sekuphele iminyaka emine besebenza khona,” kulandisa yena.Uthe kulo msebenzi bebesebenza izinsuku eziyisithupha ngesonto, behamba ekuseni, babuye ebusuku sebezolala.Wengeze ngelithi amaphoyisa awathathile amaselula abafi, wathi kuhle ethathiwe ukuze kuvezwe ukuthi benzeni.“Siyabufuna ubulungiswa ngokubulawa kwabo. Amaphoyisa kufanele asichazele kabanzi ukuthi yimaphi lawo macala abawenzile njengoba singaze siwabone efika ezobafuna ukukhombisa ukuthi bawuhlupho,”  usho kanje.UNksz Nokululeko Mthethwa, ongudadewabo kaNgubane, uthe imoto ebebehamba ngayo wayithenga kumqashi wabo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe abasolwa ababili ebebefunelwa amacala amabili okubulala, babulawe emva kokudubulana namaphoyisa eMatshana Reserve eMpangeni ngoMsombuluko.“Amaphoyisa amise imoto ebihamba abasolwa, abasolwa bawushaye indiva umyalelo wamaphoyisa, baqala badubula bebhekise emaphoyiseni, nawo abuyisela ngenhlamvu,” kusho uNetshiunda.Uthe emva kokudubulana, abasolwa ababili bashonile. Amaphoyisa asafuna abanye abasolwa abadubule amaphoyisa, abakwazile ukubalekelaUmndeni uyiphikisile eyokuthi abafi badubule amaphoyisa, wathi bobabili, abakaze babe nezibhamu.Uphinde waphika eyabanye abasolwa ebebehamba nabafi, wathi bebezihambela bobabili emotweni njengenjwayelo, bezibuyela emsebenzini.

SEKUQUBUKE imvunge kumaNazaretha ngaphansi kobuholi benkosi uMduduzi Shembe uNyazilwezulu ngemali yensipho yokugeza ihlazo lokuthi lo mholi ushiywe yibhanoyi eye enkonzweni eCape Town ngeledlule.Kuthiwa amaNazaretha asenqunyelwe ujuqu ngabagcotshwa abathile okuthiwa bafuna le mali iqale ukukhokhwa njengoba kuqala umhlangano kaJulayi.Okunye okuthiwa kukhalisa amaNazaretha ukuthi sekuphakanyiswe nokuthi kuqoqwe imali yokuthengela uNyazilwezulu ibhanoyi elizohamba ngalo uma liya kwezinye izindawo ezingaphandle kwesifundazwe.Umthombo waleli phephandaba, ongashayi eceleni, uthe le mali kuthiwa idingeka ngoMsombuluko njengoba kuzoqala inkonzo kaJulayi.“Inkinga esiyibonayo la ukuthi kunabagcotshwa abafuna ukuqola amaNazaretha egameni loNyazilwezulu. Bamemezele ukuthi bayile kumholi uNyazilwezulu beyovuma ihlazo elenzekile ukuthi inkosi igcine ingabanga yingxenye yenkonzo ebiseCape Town njengoba yafika isikhathele. Emva kwalokho bamemezele ukuthi wonke umuntu oyiNazaretha eNingizimu Afrika anikele ukuze kuhanjiswe imali yensipho ukugeza ihlazo lokuthi amaNazaretha aye eCape Town eshiya umholi ngemuva. Inkinga esinayo ukuthi abantu abadala lokho yibona abaholi abaphazamisa inkosi uNyazilwezulu ngokulokhu bethi basayobheka indawo inkosi ezohlala kuyona ebhanoyini laze lahamba ibhanoyi ingangenile, manje sekuthiwa asiyogeza ihlazo,” kusho umthombo.Uqhuba uthe emva kokushiywa yibhanoyi koNyazilwezulu kuphoqeleke ukuthi luhanjiswe ngemoto luya eCape Town. Lokho kudale ukuthi lufike sekwedlule isikhathi futhi lukhathele kwaphoqeleka ukuthi lungabe lusayibamba inkonzo yangeSabatha eledlule eCape Town.Leli phephandaba linawo umyalezo odluliswe ngabanye babagcotshwa kumaNazaretha obhalwe kanje: Sanibonani zihlobo zami ezinhle eNkosini. Ngiyathemba uThixo usasigcinile sonke. Ngiyazi siyazi isimo esisehlele eZweni lakithi eNingizimu, uThixo ehambe uhambo lwaseKapa, kwagcina kwenzeke ihlazo elingenziwanga umuntu wakithi eNingizimu kodwa inkinga ukuthi uThixo wayekithi eNingizimu, leli hlazo lasithela sonke. Izolo kuyiwe phambi kweZulu ozihlalo bonke bakithi kanye noMfundisi Mvubu neNkosi yakwaBhala. Bekuyofunwa insipho yokugeza lesi simo njengoba lo monakalo wagcina wenze uThixo wangaba senkonzweni ngosuku lweSabatha. Ngithi anginazise ukuba kuyolungiswa leso simo kuthiwe asiyazise yonke iNingizimu uma kukhona abafisa ukuba bangasali ukususa lel icala bangavela.Siyabonga.Emva kwalesi sicelo kuthiwa sekuphume nomyalelo wokuthi abesilisa baqale ukuhlanganisa imali engu-R1000 abesilisa kube u-R500 kwabesifazane ukuze kuthengelwe uNyazilwezulu ibhanoyi. Kuthiwe le mali kumele iqale ukukhokhwa ngoMsombuluko ngoJulayi 1.Okhulumela umholi uNyazilwezulu, uMnuz Thokozani Mncwabe, uthe inkosi uNyazilwezulu ihlakaniphe kabi ukuthi ingashiywa yibhanoyi.“Abantu ngeke bakuqonde ukusebenza kukaShembe. Akukhona ngoba ashiywa yibhanoyi kodwa kukhona ayesafuna ukukulungisa okuthinta uShembe, imiphumela yakho ezobonakala kungekudala. UShembe uMpicabadala, udida izazi. Bazitshela ukuhji washiywa yibhanoyi ababoni kukhona ayesakulungisa,” kusho uMncwabe.Ngodaba lokuthenga insipho yokugeza ihlazo, uthe kuke kwenzeke insipho ithengwe uma kungukuthi kunesigameko esenzekile okumele sigezwe kodwa ngeke angene kakhulu kulona. Uqhube wathi nalaba abathi kumele kuthengele uNyazi ibhanoyi uyabancoma kakhulu, wumqondo omuhle lowo kodwa ikomidi lebandla belingakahlali phansi ukudingida lolo daba. Uveze ukuthi nemali okuthiwa izokhishwa uyibona inkulu kakhulu, wathi ngomnikelo ka-R20 nje umuntu emunye lingaphuma ibhanoyi ngenxa yobuningi bamaNazaretha.Amalungu ebandla lamaNazaretha alinganiselwa ku-7 million.

UNDUNANKULU kaZulu, uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi, usifanise nokunikela ngeSilo ezitheni isinqumo sebhodi leNgonyama Trust, sokungaphinde sikhokhele abameli beMbube uma kunamacala athinta umbango wesihlalo sobukhosi bukaZulu.Isibophezelo sokuthi Ingonyama Trust angeke iphinde ikhokhele abameli beSilo uMisuzulu kaZwelithini senziwe eNkantolo eNkulu eMgungundlovu, ngoLwesihlanu.Inkantolo ibilalele icala elifakwe uMntwana uMbonisi kaBhekuzulu, ofuna ukuthi Ingonyama Trust nohulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal bengazikhokheli izindleko zabameli beSilo uma kunamacala athinta umbango wesihlalo sobukhosi bukaZulu.UButhelezi uthe isibophezelo sabameli beNgonyama Trust sikhombisa ukuthi ibhodi elisha alinendaba neSilo.Ukusho ngesikhathi ekhuluma nabaNtwana baseNdlunkulu abezokweseka iSilo. “Banikela ngeSilo ezitheni ekubeni yona le Ngonyama Trust kungeyeSilo.” kusho uButhelezi.Uthe bafuna ukubikela amakhosi ngale nkinga, uphinde wakhala nangokuthi iminyango kahulumeni ebimangalelwe neSilo kuleli cala, ikhombise ukusilahla iSilo.“Kusobala ukuthi sebesikhaphele iSilo. Kufanele siwabikele amakhosi ngale ngozi elengele uZulu,” esho.Ummeli weNgonyama Trust, u-Advocate Alastair Dickson, uthe angeke baphinde bakhokhele abameli beSilo.Inkantolo izwe ukuthi Ingonyama Trust ikhokha isikweletu sezigidi zamarandi sabameli abadala beSilo, iStrauss Daly.AbeStrauss Daly babemele iSilo emacaleni ayethethwa eMgungundlovu, isikweletu sabo singabalelwa kuR8 million.UDickson uthe isivumelwano sokuthi Ingonyama Trust ikhokhe lesi sikweletu senziwa yibhodi elidala elaliholwa iJaji uJerome Ngwenya.“Lena inkinga esayifica uma siqokwa. Senza isibophezelo sokuthi angeke siphinde sikhokhele izindleko zabameli,” kusho uDickson.Uqhubeke ngokuthi asikho isidingo sokuthi Inkantolo ikhiphe isivimbelo sokuthi bakhokhele abameli beSilo ngoba benze isibophezelo sokuthi angeke baphinde benze into efana nale.“Uma umuntu evuma iphutha lakhe, ethi bengidakiwe, angeke ngiphinde, asikho isidingo sokuthi umjezise ngoba uyalivuma iphutha lakhe. Nathi siyasho ukuthi angeke siphinde,” kugcizelela uDickson.Ummeli kaNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube, u-Advocate Muhammad Suleman, uthe uhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal kufanele ulekelele iSilo.USuleman uthe umthetho olawula isikhwama esibhekelele izidingo zeNdlunkulu, iRoyal Household Trust, ubanikeza igunya lokuthi balekelele iSilo ngezidingo zaso.Ummeli weSilo, u-Advocate Jonny Klopper, uthe uMntwana uMbonisi akanalo igunya lokufaka icala.“Ulifaka icala njengobani. Lapha emaphepheni asenkantolo uthi ufaka lesicelo egameni labaNtwana baseNdlunkulu.“Uma kunjalo kufanele engabe kwaba nomhlangano womndeni, waqokwa njengomuntu ozomela umndeni,” kusho u-Advocate Klopper.Isinqumo sigodliwe.

BAKHOMBA ngenjumbane inyosi yesilo, uMnuz Buzetsheni Mdletshe, kugengcwa owesilisa kuphinde kusatshiswa inqwaba ngenganono ngasekupheleni kuka-Ephreli eGazini, KwaCeza.Esigamekweni esenzeke ezinkambini zezinkomo zaseGazini, kugengcwe uMntwana Bhobho Zulu.Kuthiwa uze waya esibhedlela ukuyothola usizo lwezempilo esandleni esagengceka ephephisa ikhanda kucelemba owawuzosho phezulu.“Udokotela wathi kuthinteke nomthambo. Angazi noma isandla sizophinde sikwazi yini ukusebenza,” kusho uZulu.Elandisa Isolezwe olwazi ukusuka nokuhlala udaba, uMntwana uNgcebo Zulu, uthe izinto zaqala ukonakala ngesikhathi kusungulwa umkhandlu okuthiwa Usuthu/Egazini Tribal Authority.Uthe kwaqala sengathi umyalelo ophuma esilweni esesakhothama futhi kuzosizakala abantu.“Uthe usuqala usebenza umkhandlu kwashintsha izinto, kwadliwa umhlaba wabantu baseGazini,” kusho uZulu.Uqhube wathi indawo edliwayo yinkambi okudla kuyo izinkomo zabantu baseGazini.Uthe bavele babone sekubekwe umuntu maqede ibiyelwe indawo edliwe. Uthe yonke imizi ebekiwe eyakwaMdletshe futhi eyabantu abasondelene nenyosi.“Bebelokhu beyinciphisa inkambi ngokuthi bahlehlise ucingo,” kuqhuba uZulu.Udalule ukuthi kwaphinde kwabekwa izinduna eziyisithupha ezigodini ezivele zinezinduna, isigodi ngasinye saba nezinduna ezimbili, eyomkhandlu wakwaNdebele neyasoSuthu.Uthe bayisukumele lento bezama imizamo yokubika esilweni kodwa kube nhlanga zimuka nomoya.“Kwaze kwathintwa uMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu,” kusho yena.Uthe okwavela emva kokuthinta kwabo umnyango, isigcizelelo sokuthi umkhandlu osemthethweni ngoholwa inkosi yakwaNdebele, kwanqanyulwa nemiholo yezinduna eziyisithupha zasoSuthu athi zabekwa nguMdletshe phezu kwezakwaNdebele.“Esigamekweni sakamuva amalungu omphakathi wakwaNdebele adinwe agana unwabu ayodiliza izigxobo nocingo olususwe endaweni yalo lunciphisa inkambi. Yilapho-ke okuqhamuke khona ebebehlome ngezibhamu badubula,” kusho uZulu.Uqhube wathi iningi labaleka kwathi umgilwa owagengcwa wabuza ukuthi benzani belimaza abantu.Uthe abaphendulanga kodwa wahlaselwa ababili, omunye esho ukumqeda ngocelemba, omunye eshaya ngesando.“Sinovalo lokuthi kuzogcina kufa abantu ngale nto,” kusho uZulu.INkosi yakwaNdebele, uMnuz Sibusiso Ndebele, iluqinisekisile udaba, yathi lonke udweshu olukhona luphehlwa nguMdletshe.“Ngokusho kwakhe, indawo iphethwe emikhandlwini emibili. Yilokho-ke okudala udweshu. Okubi ukuthi usebenzisa ukuba seduze nesilo nokuthenjwa yiso ukwenza noma yini,” kusho uNdebele.Uqhube wathi ufisa kungenelele izinhlaka ezifanele ukuze kuxazululeke udaba.“Ngifisa nokuthi ake athathwe ahlaliswe phansi, achaze ukuthi lokhu akwenzayo ukwenzelani,” kusho Ndebele.Ethintwa uMdletshe, uthe ucela ukungaphawuli lutho ngoba akazi ukuthi ungena kanjani ekulinyazweni kwabantu. “Ngangingekho nokubakhona ngesikhathi okwenzeka ngaso isigameko. Engikwaziyo ukuthi leyo ndawo inomuzi kamfowethu,” kusho uMdletshe.Uthe akazi ukuthi kuqondwe ukuthini uma kuthiwa uhamba phambili ekudliweni komhlaba.“Ayikho into engizoyiphawula, kwabona labo bantu angibazi, abakaze bakhulume nami,“ kusho uMdletshe.Okhulumela uMnyango wokuBusa ngokuBambisana nezindaba zoMdabu, uMnuz Siboniso Mngadi, uthe bayalwazi udaba. “Sesibe nemihlangano eminingi nenkosi nenyosi uMdletshe nabantwana basendlunkulu ukuzama ukulungisa udaba. Kule mihlangano kucaca ukuthi umkhandlu wasoSuthu nowakwaNdebele yimikhandlu emibili ehlukene futhi imingcele yalezi zizwe yehlukene, ayigibelene ndawo,” kusho uMngadi.Uqhube wathi akulindelekile ukuthi umkhandlu wasoSuthu kuthiwe ubeka izinduna noma usika iziza kwaNdebele, KwaCeza. “Kucacile futhi ukuthi ukubekwa kwenyosi KwaCeza kwakuwukuthi ibheke umgede osuthathwa njengesigodlo, hhayi ukuthi iyinduna yesigodi noma iso lesilo ezizweni esiphethwe yinkosi yakwaNdebele,” kusho uMngadi. Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uConstable Thenjiswa Ngcobo, uthe amaphoyisa aKwaCeza abophe abesilisa ababili abaneminyaka engu-23 no-55 ngecala lokuhlasela ngenhloso yokulimaza.“Abasolwa bavele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMahlabathini ngo-Ephreli 30, icala lahlehliselwa uMay 6.”

IKHALA ngesiqiwi saseSwatini esiphilisa kabuhlungu umphakathi wezigodi ezakhele iNgwavuma, imindeni yabathathu abatholwe befile, betakwe ndawonye.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe, uMnuz Mfanomncane Nyawo, Mnuz Mbongi Mtshali noMnuz Lindani Mtshali kuthiwa badutshulwe babulawa abaqapha isiqiwi ngoLwesibili.Kuthiwa imindeni yabo ibathole behudulwe babekwa ndawonye kubonakala ukuthi badutshulwe amahlandla amaningi. Kulesi sigameko okuthiwa kusinde oyedwa kusona, kuvela ukuthi ubehamba nabafi ngosuku lwesigameko, yena udubuleke esithweni, ngenhlanhla wakwazi ukubaleka,  wahlaba umkhosi wokuthi abehamba nabo babulewe.UMnuz Duncan Nyawo oyisihlobo sikaNyawo, oshonile, uthe abagilwa basuka emakhaya beyobheka inkomo ebidukele esiqiwini.“Bahlaselwe besayibheka. Ababange besaqeda,” kusho uNyawo.Uveze ukuthi sekunesikhathi lesi siqiwi singabahlalisile kahle.“Kusuka ngo-2017, isiqiwi singasihlalisile kahle. Safike sadayiswa ngendlela esingayiqondi kahle. Emva kwalokho kwaqala ukubulawa kwezinkomo zethu, kokunye zithathwe ngendluzula,” kuchaza uNyawo.Uthe bekuye kuthi uma bezama ukuthi zibuyiswe, kube nhlanga zimuka nomoya.Uphinde wadalula ukuthi nesigameko sowesilisa owabulawa yizindlovu nyakenye, basola abalesi siqiwi.“Indlovu ezazigcwele esiqiwini sabo, bazixosha ngendiza enophephela emhlane, baziwelisela engxenyeni engaphesheya, lapho umphakathi unamadlelo khona.“Sibuhlungu ngendlela esiphethwe ngayo siwumphakathi. Abakwenzayo kukhombisa ukuthi kasiyinto yalutho futhi siyizinyamazane okufanele zibulawe,” usho kanje.IKhansela lendawo, uMnuz Mbalekelwa Nkosi, liqinisekisile ukuthi libikelwe ngokwenzekile, laze laziyela lapho kwenzeke khona isehlo, lathola ukuthi bonke abafile bebedutshulwe emakhanda.“Kukhulu ukukhathazeka emphakathini. Abantu bafisa kube khona ukuxoxa phakathi kweSwatini neNingizimu Afrika, ikhulunywe le nto,” kusho uNkosi.Echaza ngendaba yesiqiwi uthe iyinsumansumane.“Savele savuka sekuthiwa kunesiqiwi. Leya ndawo kusukela kudala, sikhule kudla izinkomo kuyo. Ucingo lwaseSwatini lwaluphansi kodwa manje sizwa sekuthiwa umngcele ususondele ezintabeni,” kusho yena.Uthe umuntu ozihambelayo, ongazi, ayikho into emkhombisayo ukuthi useqe umngcele.“Okusiphatha kabi ukuthi bafe bengaphethe lutho, kwazinyamazane lezo ebebeyozizingela, bebengakazitholi,” kusho uNkosi.Kushaye isikhathi sokushicilela amaphoyisa angakayiphenduli imibuzao athunyelwe yona.

BAZIZWA belahliwe abantu abahlala kolindela ababizwa ngokuthi isemathinini eWelbedacht, eChatsworth njengoba bethi babekwa khona ngo-2008, kuthiwa bazohlala izinyanga ezintathu kuphela.Abantu abahlala kule ndawo basuswa emijondolo yakwa-D nakwa-M eMlaza, eyaseSydenham naseClaire Estate ngenxa yezikhukhula.Abanye bathi basuswa ngoba kuthiwa umhlaba abahlala kuwona awukufanele ukuba kwakhiwe izindlu kuwo.Njengoba elakuleli libungaza iminyaka engu-30 yokubusa ngentando yabantu emuva kokhetho lokuqala lwentando yabantu ngo-Ephreli 27, 1994, laba bantu asebehlale kolindela bacela izindlu ezinesithunzi ababethenjiswe zona. UNkk Sizani Patience Ngcuka (49), utshele Isolezwe ukuthi wasuswa emijondolo yakwa-D, eMlaza emuva kwezikhukhula, ezabagugulela izakhiwo zabo.“Sasuswa eMlaza iMeya yeTheku kusewu-Obed Mlaba. Saqale saqutshiswa ehholo ngaphambi kokuthi silethwe lapha. Kwathiwa sizolinda izindlu zethu ezizobe sezilungile emuva kwezinyanga ezintathu.“Namanje sisalindile selokhu safika, mhlawumbe kusahambe abantu abawu-20 okwathiwa bayohlala ezitezi ezikhona lapha eChatsworth,” kuchaza uNkk Ngcuka.Uthe impilo inzima ngoba ungowesifazane ongenamyeni kodwa osesele nezingane eziyisithupha nabazukulu abasafunda emazingeni aphansi.“Sihleli ekamelweni elilodwa sonke, ngaze ngaphoqeleka ukuthi ngilidabule phakathi ukuze umfana abe nesayidi lakhe.“Kunzima ngisho ukugeza uma usesikhathini, izindlu nazo ziyanetha, singenelwa yizinyoka namanzi. Sibona sengathi sasizolahlwa lapha ngoba akekho osisizayo,” kusho uNkk Ngcuka.UNkk Nomusa Gumede (49) naye owasuka eMlaza ngo-Okthoba 2008, uthe kunzima kakhulu ngoba bangenelwa yizinyoka nezingulube zehlathi.“Simpintshene nezingane zethu nabazukulu kulabo lindela. Akukho nje ukuthi uyakwazi ukugeza kahle. ”Ngisho kwenziwa inkonzo yasekamelweni kamakhelwane uyezwa ube uhleli nezingane endlini yakho. “Siyacela uhulumeni asizwele manje, asiphe izindlu ayesithembise zona,” kusho uNkk Gumede.Uthe kudala babesikelwa utshani, kugencwe nezihlahla kodwa manje sebeyazibhushela njengoba kungekho muntu osondela kubona.UMnuz Sifiso Ngidi (33) naye usho okufanayo nokushiwo womakhelwane bakhe, wathi sekwanele manje, uyacela uhulumeni abanike izindlu ayebathembise zona.Ubalule ukuthi indawo ababekwe kuyo igcwala kakhulu amanzi uma lina, kuze kuvuleke imihosha.UNkk Thembekile Maphumulo (39), onengane ekhubazekile, uthe impilo inzima ngoba ingane yakhe ayikwazi ukuhamba kahle.“Sicela uhulumeni asinike izindlu ayesithembise zona ngoba kunzima ngisho ukuhambisa ingane endlini yangasese. “Isindala manje ayifuni ngiyikhumule esidlangalaleni, kodwa ngiyaphoqeleka ukukwenza lokhu ngoba asinayo indlu yangasese endlini.“Kufanele ngiyikhumule ngaphambi kokuthi ingene endlini yangasese yamadoda,” kusho uNkk Maphumulo.Ubalule ukuthi akukwazi nokuthi ingane ibe nesihlalo samasondo ngoba indawo imazombezombe ayikulungele ukuhamba ngesihlalo esinamasondo noma kungene imoto. Uyaphoqeleka ukuthi ayibelethe ingane.Bathi izindlu yizona ezingabuyisa isithunzi sabo.

AMAQEMBU epolitiki ePhalamende akhala ngokungabibikho kohlelo olucacile lokulwa nabaqola ngodli amalungu omphakathi nosomabhizinisi bathathe kubo imali abayibiza ngeyokubavikela (edume nge-protection fee), okuyisihlava esibukeka sisabalala nezwe lonke.UNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa, uMnuz Senzo Mchunu, ubethulela amalungu ePhalamende likazwelonke e-Cape Town, phakathi kokunye - izinhlelo umnyango wakhe onazo ukulwa nalobu bugebengu obuhlalise kabi umphakathi.UMchunu uveze ukuthi sekuqalwe uhlelo lokusebenzisana olubizwa nge-Operational Plan olufaka phakathi zonke izinhlaka ezilwa nobugebengu okubalwa kuzona amaphoyisa, izinkampani zonogada ezizimele nabamakomiti abhekelele ubugebengu emphakathini okuhloswe ngalo ukulwa nobugebengu ezifundazweni nakomasipala abehlukene.“Ukusayinwa kwesivumelwano salolu hlelo sekwenziwe esifundazweni i-Western Cape.  Maduze luzokwethulwa edolobheni i-Nelson Mandela Bay esifundazweni i-Eastern Cape njengoba sekuvunyelwene ngalo. Ngesonto elizayo lethulwa eGauteng bese kuthi KwaZulu-Natal lethulwe ngomhla ka-19 no-20 kule nyanga,” kusho uMchunu.Uthe amaphoyisa ayabhekana nalezi zigameko, kodwa izigebengu zikhombisa ukuphikelela. Uqinisekise ukuthi nakuba kunjalo kuyogcina wona. Ubalule isigameko sokuboshwa kwabathathu eGauteng, abaqhuba lobu bugebengu, kanti bathathu esifundazweni iMpumalanga okuthiwa balandelwa ngamaphoyisa. Abane bafe bedubulana namaphoyisa eCape Town, kwalimala abane, kanti ababibili basagcwele amathafa. Uveze ukuthi umphakathi uyabika ngezigameko kodwa akwenele. Uthe kunesidingo sokuthuthukiswa kwezibunhloli ukubhekana nalesi sihlava. Ukhale ngohlelo lokukhululwa kweziboshwa ngoshwele, waveza ukuthi bazolubheka noMnyango wezoBulungiswa, njengoba ethi ziningi iziboshwa ezikhululwa ngalo, ngaphambi kwesikhathi okunomthelela ezingeni lobugebengu obubatshazwayo.UDkt Quinton Ndlozi we-EFF ukhale ngokungabibikho kweqhinga elicacile lokuvika lobu bugebengu.“Abantu bafuna ukuzwa ukuthi yiliphi iqhinga uhulmeni azolenza ukulwa namaqembu ezigelekeqe athatha ngodli o-30% kosomabhizinisi abanikezwe imisebenzi kahulumeni. Lokho kwenza uhulumeni angakwazi ukusebenza emazingeni aphansi. Izigameko ziyabikwa emaphoyiseni, kuphela azishaya sabantu abangazi ukuthi lobu bugebengu buyenzeka. Umphakathi uyabazi abantu abawuhlalise lubhojozi,” kusho uNdlozi.UMnuz Vuyo Zungula we-ATM, uthe kumele imikhankaso yokukhuculula ngobugebengu efana nobonakale wenziwa ePhoyinti eThekwini, ngesonto eledlule, yenziwe nakwamanye amadolobha.“Kumele kukhishwe amaphoyisa akhohlakele. Umnyango kumele utshale amaphoyisa ophiko lwamabherethi (Tactical Response Team) emigwaqweni ethile ukulwa nobugebengu. Kumele akhulule amaphoyisa azivikele, uma ebhekene nezigebengu, angavikeli izigebengu ukwedlula wona,” usho kanje.UMnuz Nsikayezwe Cebekhulu we-IFP, uthe lobu bugebengu obudlangile bucacisa ukuthi azikho izinhloli ezanele, okwenza elakuleli kube yikamachanca.UMnuz David Sikhosana we-MK, uthe uphiko oluphenya ngokuziphatha kwamaphoyisa i-Independent Police Investigative Directorate,  kumele luqinise isandla ekuphenyeni amaphoyisa njengoba kunezinkomba zokuthi kukhona amaphoyisa asebenzisana nabaqhuba lobu bugebengu.

SEKUQUBUKE izinsolo zokugwaziswa kwamalungu ebandla lamaNazaretha aseBuhleni uma efuna ukuyonikela kumholi webandla, inkosi Mduduzi “Unyazilwezulu” Shembe.Lokhu kuvezwe yimithombo engashayi eceleni kuleli bandla. Kuthiwa amaNazaretha angaphansi koNyazilwezulu akhala ezimathonsi njengoba engasakwazi ukufika kalula ukuyonikela kumholi ngenxa yokuthi kukhona okuthiwa bafuna intshontsho ukuze bawayise kumholi.Kuthiwa uma ufuna ukuyonikela kuNyazilwezulu, kukhona abaqondisa olayini, abangayizwa nhlobo indaba yomuntu ofuna ukuyonikela kodwa ‘engaxoxanga’ nabo eceleni.Ngokwemithombo yangaphakathi kuthiwa uma ungalikhiphanga intshontsho uyizwa ngendaba eyokufika eduze koNyazilwezulu, futhi uphinda nawo emuva umnikelo wakho uma ungagwazi kubashumayeli abasuke beqondisa ulayini wokuyonikela.“Bahafana kabuhlungu abananhliziyo futhi abancengi muntu. Uma ungabagwazele, uma kulayini uze uthathe isinqumo sokuduba uhambe. Ogwazile ususwa ngisho esemuva kulayini anidlule nonke angeniswe ngaphakathi ayonikela.“Uma uzimisele ngempela ngokuyonikela, kuyaphoqa ukuthi uxoxe nabo labashumayeli abaqondisa ulayini eceleni, bese kubakhona obanika khona bese uyadluliswa. “Nemali okugwazwa ngayo ayincane ngoba uma ukhipha u-R50 kuvele kuthiwe unesikhathi sokudlala, kuthathwe abantu abakhiphe imali ngempela.“Kukhona abagwaza kuze kufike naku-R1000 umuntu ngamunye bese beyadluliswa, baye konikela,” kusho umthombo.Kuthiwa ombona edluliswa abashumyeli abagade ulayini usuke usuwazi ukuthi useqondisile yingakho edluliswa. Uqhuba umthombo uthe sekunesikhathi yenzeka lento, amaNazaretha awazi ukuthi azobikela bani ngoba laba abasuke bethatha intshontsho bayizethenjwa zoNyazilwezulu, futhi yibona abahlala behamba nalo.Omunye umthombo uthe noma ingeyinhle lento eyenziwa yilaba abagwazisayo kodwa ubuye ubathethelele ngakolunye uhlangothi.“Inkinga laba bantu abaholi. Banikwa u-R500 kuphela ngesonto ebandleni kuthiwe yimali yephalishi. ”Bangamadoda emizi yabo, akekho umuntu ongondla umndeni ngo-R500 wanele,” usho kanje.Okhulumela uNyazilwezulu, uMnuz Thokozani Mncwabe  uthe useke wayizwa eyokuthethiswa kwabantu kolayini uma bezonikela.“Indlela okuthiwa benza ngayo laba abaqondisa ulayini ikhomba ukuthi banezinhliziyo ezilukhuni ngezinto ezishiwo ngabantu ngabo. Okokugwazisa bengingakakuzwa kona kodwa okokuthethiswa nokukhacwa kwabantu sengikutholile, yinto esisazoyibheka.“Engingaluleka ngakho ukuthi abantu kumele baqonde ukuthi ngonjani umuntu okusuke kumele ahambe nomholi ngaso sonke isikhathi.“Ngokwazi kwami abantu abasuke besondele kumholi abasuke befike ngenxa yokugula, bagcine sebesebenza eduze kwakhe ngoba basuke belashwa.“Uma kuyiqiniso okushiwo abantu ngalaba okuthiwa bakhaca abantu, kungenzeka ukuthi bathathe isinqumo sokuhamba nomholi bengaguli, yingakho sekungathi bayagula ngoba akukho ukugula abalashwa khona,” kusho uMncwabe.Kuthiwa kukhona nomfundisi oyibhadlazile eshumayela eBuhleni ngeledlule ukuthi abantu bayagwaziswa ukuthi bafinyelele kumholi.

BABHIKISHE ngaphandle kwamahhovisi kaMasipala waseThekwini bekhala ngokunqanyulwa kwezinkontileka zabo, abasebenzi bohlelo i- Expanded Public Work Programme kulo masipala okulindeleke ukuthi ziphelelwe yisikhathi ngoLwesine.Laba basebenzi bohlelo oluxhaswa wuMnyango wezeMisebenzi yoMphakathi neNgqalasizinda, kuthe izolo bavukela kulawa mahhovisi asenkabeni yedolobha eThekwini befuna umasipala ubuyekeze ukunqanyulwa kwezinkontileka zabo abathi kwenziwe bathunyelelwa izincwadi nge-WhatsApp ezazibazisa ngokuphela komsebenzi.USihlalo wekomiti  elibhekele abasebenza kulolu hlelo eThekwini, uMnuz Shiko Gumede, uthe akukho abakunikezwe umqashi njengoba nefomu elibizwa nge- U-19 elisetshenziswa ukubhalisela imali yesibonelelo sabaphelelwe umsebenzi esikhwameni i-Unemployment Insurence Fund, bengalinikeziwe.“Ngesikhathi siqashwa njengoba abanye beneminyaka eyevile kweyisishiyagalombili baqala ukusebenza, sasitsheliwe ukuthi kusetshenzwa iminyaka emibili kudedelwe abanye, kodwa ngenxa yokuthi umasipala ubayekile abantu baqhubeka, lokho kwenze baba namathemba okuthi umsebenzi uzolokhu uqhubeka, bathembela kakhulu kuwona.  Ukunqanyulwa kwawo, abaningi kubagulisile njengoba kukhona abangeniswe ezibhedlela ngoba bengazi ukuthi bazothathani bahlanganise nani kulesi simo esinzima,” kusho uGumede.Uthe ukuqhubeka kwezinkontileka yonke le minyaka, umasipala bewazi ngakho kangangoba owayeyimeya kuwo uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda ehlangene nabo ngo-2020,wabathembisa ukuthi ngeke umasipala ubalahle uma kwenzeka kuphela bazophenyelwa izikhala noma becijwe ngamakhono okuziphilisa okuyinto okubukeka ingenzekile. Isitatimende esikhishwe wumasipala, siveza ukuthi uzothola imali engu-R18.79 million kunyaka wezimali u-2024/2025 eqhamuka eMnyangweni wezeMisebenzi kahulumeni ukuxhasa lolu hlelo, okuthiwa yehle ngo- R42 million kweyanyakenye.  Umasipala uthi isibalo sabasebenzi ngaphansi kwalolu hlelo sizokwehliswa sisuswa kwabangu- 4 122 sifinyelele kwabangu- 1 276.  UGumede uthe bakholwa ukuthi kulesi sibalo kumele kubhekelwe abasebenzi abebevele besebenza njengoba umasipala usuvele waqasha abasha.  Uthe incwadi yezikhalo yamukelwe uMnuz Njabulo Zungu oyisikhulu kulo masipala wathembisa ukuthi bazoba nomhlangano  ngoLwesihlanu nabamele abasebenzi ukubhunga ngalolu daba.Abasebenzi balolu hlelo bathola isibonelelo esiphakathi kuka-R3000 no-R 4000 ngenyanga

IFUNA izimpendulo ngamathuna ayo ambiwe ingatshelwe lutho imindeni engaphezu kweyishumi eNgwadini eMzinto njengoba kuqhubeka uhlelo lokwakhiwa kwedamu kule ndawo.Ngokusho kukaNksz Nomathemba Madlala, ongomunye wabantu okumbiwe amathuna akubo, bekuyinyanga edlule ngesikhathi bethola ngalo monakalo.Uthe awakubo amathuna athintekile ayisishiyagalombili.“Sathola izingcingo kwabanye abantu bendawo, besazisa ukuthi ambiwe amathuna asekhaya kanjalo nawakweminye imizi eseyaba ngamanxiwa kule ndawo,” kusho uNksz Madlala.Uthe emva kwesehlakalo, kube khona imihlangano ababe nayo naboMngeni-uThukela Water kodwa zangaphuma izimpendulo zokuthi umonakalo wenzeke kanjani.Uthe eminyakeni emibili edlule, ngesikhathi kuvela izindaba zokuthi kuzokwakhiwa idamu, zabizwa zonke izakhamuzi zendawo zatshelwa ngokuthuthukiswa kwendawo ngokuthi kwakhiwe idamu.Uthe ngaleso sikhathi batshelwa ukuthi abantu abasahlala endaweni bazothuthwa bayokwakhelwa kwenye indawo nokuyinto eyenzeka.Uqhube wathi kwaphinde wathiwa kuzoqinisekiswa ukuthi amathuna akule ndawo awathintwa.“Baze bafaka ucingo babiya indawo enamathuna, bethi benzela ukuthi bayibone kahle indawo okungafanele bayithinte. Simangele uma sesithola ukuthi balususile ucingo, baqhubeka nomsebenzi wokumba lapho ababethe ngeke bambe khona,” kusho uNksz Madlala.Uthe okwenzekile kuyabakhathaza njengoba bengabantu abasazisayo isintu.Uthe okokuqala, basafuna izimpendulo zokuthi ubani ogunyaze ukuthi kumbiwe amathuna bona bengatshelwe lutho.“Asazi nokuthi amathambo abathandiweyo bethu bawambe bayowalahlaphi. Lokho kwenza singahlali kahle ngoba asazi ukuthi kuzoba nomthelela ongakanani empilweni yethu,” kusho uNksz Madlala.Uqhube wathi bayakholelwa ekutheni kufanele benze imisebenzi ethile ukushweleza ngokuthintwa kwamathuna.“AboMngeni kufanele basinxephezele ngomonakalo odalekile ukuze sizokwazi ukwenza imisebenzi yokushweleza ngokuthikanyezwa kwamathuna,” kusho uNksz Madlala.Induna yendawo, uMnuz Kwenzakwenkosi Bele, ivumile ukuthi udaba iyalwazi, yathi luyalungiswa ezingeni lobukhosi bendawo.“Kunemihlangano elokhu ihlala kusukela kwaqala ukubonakala ukuthi kwenzeke umonakalo. Kule mihlangano basuke bekhona nabo aboMngeni. Sinethemba lokuthi isiphetho esifanele sizoba khona, bawulungise umonakalo abawenzile, wokuthinta amangcwaba abantu,” kusho uBele.Abophiko lwezokuchumana kuMngeni-Uthukela Water bakuqinisekisile ukuthi bayitholile imibuzo ngalolu daba kodwa baveza ukuthi basalinde umbiko ngokwenzeka kule ndawo. Kuvela lesi sikhalo nje, ngenyanga edlule uhulumeni ubuhlangene nabantu baseMaqadini, eNanda kuyokwenziwa umcimbi wokushweleza emuva kokuthi kwasuswa abantu, kule ndawo ngesikhathi kwakhiwa iNanda Dam, kwasala amathuna abantu okukholakala ukuthi kwakhiwa phezu kwawo idamu.

BAKHALA ngokunhlanhlatha kwejaji abaKwaShembe lichitha isicelo sokugudluza umholi uNyazilwezulu esihlalweni eBuhleni.UMshumayeli Chancey Sibisi okhulumela umholi wamaNazaretha owavunwa yinkantolo, inkosi Phinda “Ukukhanyakwelanga” Shembe, uthe ijaji libeke izizathu okungezona abebezisebenzisile ukufaka isicelo sokususa uNyazi esihlalweni eBuhleni.“Besinethemba lokuthi njengoba selithathe isikhathi esingaka ukuthatha isinqumo yingoba belisazama ukubhekisisa yonke imiqingo yaleli cala ukuze lithathe isinqumo okuyisona. Kunalokho livele labeka isizathu sokuthi uNyazi lungumholi wamaNazaretha eBuhleni, thina saphuma eBuhleni sayozimela eThembezinhle.“Lokho akulona iqiniso futhi akuyona into esayifaka esicelweni sethu enkantolo. Lize labuyisa nendaba yokuthi asikwazi ukuchitha uNyazi emzini kayisemkhulu (Inyangayezulu). Olomuzi saluxazulula ngenkantolo ngo-2021. Lwalusho njalo uNyazi ukuthi umuzi kayisemkhulu Inyangayezulu umuzi waseBuhleni kodwa sakhipha amaphepha aqinisekisa ukuthi yindawo yebandla.“Lelo cala salinqoba ngawo u-2021. Manje bese sikhulumela ukuthi lugudluke ngoba seluchithwe kuzona zonke izinkantolo ukuthi lungumholi webandla, sifuna ludedele umholi osemthethweni,” kusho uSibisi.Uthe kunemihlangano ephuma ingena kumanje balungisa lolu daba. Uveze ukuthi neNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini ibanike izinsuku ezingu-20 ukuthi bafake isicelo sokubuyekeza lesi sinqumo.Lokhu uthe noma besaxoxa kodwa bazosifaka isicelo sokubuyekeza lesi sinqumo ngoba akubhekwanga izinto ezifanele ngesikhathi sithathwa.

ABASEBENZI basenyuvesi yezobuchwepheshe, i-Durban University of Technology (DUT), babe nombhikisho kuleli sonto bekhala ngezimo zokusebenza ezingezinhle  nokudilizwa isigubhukane.Lo mbhikisho uqale esikhungweni sakuyo le nyuvesi emgwaqweni uCentenary waze wayophelela esangweni lalesi sikhungo eSteve Biko.Ezingqwembeni laba basebenzi abebeziphethe bekunembhalo ethi: i-DUT akusona isikhungo esihlala abantu abadala, ezinye zibhalwe ukuthi akume ukuphatha ngesandla sensimbi.USihlalo woMkhandlu waseDUT, uMnuz Wiseman Madinane, ekhuluma nenyunyana i-Tertiary Education National Union South Afrika (Tenusa), uthe isibalo esiqinisekisiwe sokudilizwa kwabasebenzi sizoba ngu-43.Ngokusho kwesitatimende se-Tenusa, ezinyangeni ezingu-12 ezandulela usuku lwesaziso sokuqala sokudilizwa, abasebenzi abawu-24 base bediliziwe ngenxa yezidingo zokusebenza zenyuvesi.Siqhube sathi, ngemuva kokuthola i-email evela kuMadinane, inyuvesi ithumele omunye umqulu othi izikhundla ezingu-152 zizothikamezeka ngokudilizwa kwabasebenzi njengoba inyuvesi inabasebenzi abangu-1 545.USihlalo we-Federation of Unions South Afrika, (Fedusa), uDkt Naresh Sentoo, uthe imibandela yokuqashwa ethinta imihlomulo yabo ichithiwe.“Akukho esibuzwa khona futhi azibibikho izingxoxo mayelana nokushintshwa kwalezi zinzuzo, zivele zimiswe, yingakho sifuna ukuthi lokho kubhekisiswe,” kusho uDkt Sentoo.Okhulumela inyunyana i-National Education, Health and Allied Workers Union South Afrika (Nehawu), esifundeni saseThekwini, uMnuz Prince Mthalane, uthe izinkinga zabo zihlanganisa izimo ezinzima abasebenzi ababhekene nazo.“Kushintshwa imigomo yabasebenzi, bayadilizwa futhi abanelisekile ngendlela isikhungo esiphethwe ngayo yiPhini likaShansela noyinhloko uSolwazi Thandwa Mthembu. Ngicabanga ukuthi bekufanele ngabe kade ashenxa emsebenzini wakhe ngoba wehlulekile,” kusho uMthalane.Khonamanjalo: Inyunyana iFedusa esitatimendeni sayo sithe, kade babexa nomkhandlu wase-DUT, kodwa ubaziba.“Abaphathi base-DUT bavamise ukudelela izinqumo ze-CCMA ezivuna abasebenzi, badonsele amacala ezinkantolo eziphakeme. Banyathela phansi amalungelo abasebenzi, bashintsha izimo zokusebenza ngaphandle kokuxoxa ngokuhlanganyela.“Usiko lokusatshiswa selixoshe odokotela nosolwazi abahlonishwa kakhulu e-DUT, kanti abasele nabo babamba bayayeka. Abasebenzi base-DUT badinga uhlelo olunzulu oluzobabuyisela esimweni esizokwenza ukuthi benze umsebenzi wabo endaweni enobulungiswa nevikelekile.”

AKHALE ngezifo ezingamahlalakhona amaphoyisa efuna ibheyili eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini. Laba basolwa babhekene necala lenkohlakalo emva kokuba kuthiwa bazame ukuqola usomabhizinisi wasePhoenix isamba sika-R79 500 abemgwazisa ngeSonto.U-Warrant Officer Matheng Mashabelu (54), uSeargent Zakhele Makhubele (45), uSeargent Xolani Sishi (50) noMnuz Deon Naidoo (48) bakhale ngokuxinwa yizifo ezingamahlalakhona befuna inkantolo ibabonelele.UMashabelu noMakhubele bangamaphoyisa esiteshini esiseBryanston, eGoli, kanti uNaidoo kuthiwa usebenza njengengede ophikweni lwezobunhloli olukhona eGoli.USishi nozakwabo aboshwe nabo, oConstable Stallone Sing (31), Seargent Nicholus Nxuza (50), uSeargent Thamsanqa Dlamini (43) noSeargent Phiwayinkosi Zulu (41) bangamaphoyisa esiteshini esiseNtuzuma. Ngaphandle kukaSingh, oboshwe nabasolwa baseGoli ngeSonto, bonke abasolwa abangamaphoyisa esiteshini esiseNtuzuma bazinikele emaphoyiseni khona izolo.Bekhulunyelwa ngabameli babo, bonke abasolwa baveze ukuthi abakaze baboshwa phambilini, abanabo ubungozi kofakazi, banamakheli aqondile futhi bazimisele ngokuliphika icala abebekwe lona.Baboshwa nje kuthiwa ngeSonto bazame ukugwazisa usomabhizinisi  onesitolo ePhoenix okuvela ukuthi bambhadame namabhokisi amathathu kagwayi abathe awukho emthethweni. Kusolwa ukuthi ubagwazele ngo-R400 babuyisa ushintshi okuthe emva kwesikhashana behambile, babuyela esitolo basesha ngaphambi kokuthi bashaqe ugwayi abewudayisa futhi baphoqa ukuthi umgilwa abanike nesibhamu sakhe.  Kuthiwa  bamthathe baya naye esiteshini esisePhoenix baphoqa ukuthi abanike u-R100 000. Umgilwa kuthiwa ufonele unkosikazi wakhe oveze ukuthi uzokwazi ukukhokha u-R79 500 kuphela. Kuhlelwe indawo lapho kuzohlanganwa khona, balalelwa unyendle baboshwa ngalo iSonto.Inkantolo ibadedele ngebheyili ka-R7000 umuntu emunye. Ebakhulula ngebheyili, uMnuz Ashwell Singh oyimantshi ephethe leli cala, ubadonse  ngendlebe ngokuhlonipha imibandela yebheyili.“Uma kukhona oshintsha indawo ahlala kuyo, azise umphenyi wecala.  Anivumelekile ukuxhumana nommangali noma nofakazi nanoma ngayiphi indlela. Ukwephula imibandela yebheyili kuyoholela ekutheni imali eniyikhokhile ingqwambe, nibuyiselwe esitokisini,” usho kanje.Inkantolo ikusho lokhu emva kokuba umphenyi wecala, uCaptain Zanele Xulu, osebenza ngaphansi kophiko loKlebe, eveze ukuthi akanankinga nokukhululwa kwabo ngebheyili. Yize eveze ukuthi amakheli abasolwa abengakaqinisekiswa wonke kwazise abanye bazinikele izolo kodwa unesiqiniseko sokuthi amakheli abawanikezile ayiqiniso nokuthi kuzothi kushaya usuku lwakusasa esewabhekile.Ngaphambi kokuqala kokulalelwa kwesicelo sebheyili kube nobuhixihixi abameli befuna izintatheli zingathathi izithombe, okuchithwe yinkantolo.  Kuphinde kwadingeka ukuthi inkantolo iguqe okwesikhashana abameli besabhunga emva kokuthi kuvele ukuthi bekungamele kusetshenziswe inkantolo eseThekwini kwazise icala lenziwe ePhoenix ngakho kumele libe seVerulam kodwa babuye bashaya ungqimphothwe bavumelana ngokuthi libe kuyo le nkantolo. Icala lihlehliselwe uNovemba 7 nonyaka kusaqhubeka uphenyo njengoba uCaptain Xulu ethe basalindele obunye ubufakazi nezitatimende.

KUSEKUNINGI okusamele kwenziwe ukuze kuliwe nesihlava sokubulawa kwabesifazane nezingane kuleli.Lokhu kushiwo yinhlangano elwa nalesi sihlava, iMbizo, ebiseDurban Girls Secondary, eThekwini, enkonzweni ebiyenzelwe ukukhumbula uWandile Ngcobo (17), owanukubezwa maqede wabulawa yizigebengu ezangena kubo zizokweba, zamfica esekhaya, engayanga esikoleni emasontweni amabili edlule. UWandile ubefunda uGrade 11 kuso lesi sikole. Isitatimende esithunyelwe ile nhlangano sithe kubuhlungu ukuthi intombazane esencane kangaka iphume umphefumulo ngenxa yomuntu wesilisa, yize kunezinhlelo ezingaka zokulwa nalesi sihlava ezweni. UMnuz Sanele Ndlovu wale nhlangano esitatimendeni, uthe: "Asizukuphumula  abenzi bobubi bengakaboshwa. Akusibo wonke amadoda afana nezigebengu ezibulele uWandile.  Akhona amadoda  aqotho."Omunye wabangani bakamufi uNomcebo Mthembu, uthe uWandile nakuba ebengeyena umuntu obekhuluma avuleleke ngempilo yakhe, kodwa ubezigqaja ngenkolo yakhe. "Ngendlela abengavulelekile ngayo sisanda kuzwa ukuthi ushiywe unina ngasekupheleni konyaka odlule. Kithina bangani bakhe ubefana nodadewethu, hhayi umngani nje kuphela. Kubuhlungu ukuthi namhlanje sikhuluma nganye esengomunye wabasesibalweni sabantu ababulawe ngamadoda," kusho uNomcebo ekhala.UNkk Pamela David ongomunye wothisha, uthe sekuphele iminyaka eyevile kwengu-30 ewuthisha kodwa kungokokuqala ebhekana nesimo esinjena sokuthi umfundi abulawe ngesihluku esinje."Abafundi bonke bethukile ngalesi sehlakalo. Sizomeseka udadewabo, uSiphosethu naye ofunda kulesi sikole," kusho uNkk David.Uthishanhloko wakulesi sikole uMnuz Sunil Balgobind, uthe ngendlela isimo ebesisibi ngayo,  kudingeke ukuthi acele ongoti abeluleka ngokomphefumulo ukuzokweluleka abafundi.Uyise kaWandile, uMnuz Mondli Ngcobo, ubonge isikole ngokwenza le nkonzo.“Ngiyethemba ukuthi iqiniso lizovela maduze lokuthi ngubani lona owenze isihluku esinje endodakazini yami. Ngeshwa angikwazi ukukhuluma okuningi manje ngoba udaba lusingethwe ngamaphoyisa,” kusho uNgcobo.

UKHALE ngokungagqizwa qakala kwesicelo sokudilizwa kwezakhiwo eziyingozi endaweni umndeni womfana (10) owelwe wudonga lwaseposini washona KwaBester, eThekwini.USiyamthanda Ngcongo (10) ushonele endaweni yesigameko emva kokuwelwa udonga lwaseposini elidala akade edlala kulo nabangani bakhe.Kulesi sigameko, kulimale nenye ingane okuthiwa iphuthunyiswe esibhedlela.Lifika endaweni yesigameko Isolezwe, lithole sekugcwele umphakathi nezinhlaka ezehlukene ukuzobabaza isehlo.Phakathi kwazo bekukhona ikhansela lendawo nobuholi beMK endaweni, obebusondele kakhulu noyise kamufi, uMnuz Sbo Ngcongo.Ekhuluma kanzima uNgcongo, uthe unemibuzo eminingi angazi ukuthi izophendulwa ubani.“Wonke umuntu ufika esiphethweni sokuthi kuwe udonga ngenxa yemvula. Kungani wonke umuntu ecabangele emvuleni,” kubuza uNgcongo, othe ushayelwe ucingo esemsebenzini, etshelwa ngesehlo.Uthe kuyamcasula ukuthi wonke umuntu usefuna ukusola imvula ekubeni kwaziwa kahle ukuthi kunesikhalo ngezakhiwo ezingekho esimweni, ezindala, ezingasasebenzi neziyingozi emphakathini.“Ingane yami le elahlekile. Iyangicasula le nto yokuthi kucatshangelwe emvuleni, ukube lwasuswa udonga, ngabe asizange sifike la,” kusho uNgcongo.Ubuze ukuthi njengoba sekwenziwa izinhlelo zokuthi lususwe, bekulindweni.“Yini abayenzile ukuze kungakenzeki lesi sigameko? Bahlale bezidlula lezi zakhiwo, bengenzi lutho ngazo,” usho kanje.Ugcizelele ngelithi ucasulwa abantu abenza sengathi bayamkhathalela, kodwa kade kungenziwa lutho sonke lesi sikhathi, kwaze kwaba ukuthi yena ulahlekelwa yingane.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi sekuphele iminyaka engaphezu kweyishumi abasebenzisa izidakamizwa balicekela phansi iposi, bekhipha amabhokisi okwakufakwa kuwo izincwadi kwasala udonga lodwa.Lithole ukuthi izingane zendawo bezihlale zidlala kulona, kwesinye isikhathi zize zigibele phezulu.Izolo kuthiwa ngesikhathi luwa, ezinye zikwazile ukusheshe zibone zabaleka, kodwa ezimbili zahluleka, okugcine kuholele ekutheni umufi aphangalale.Umphakathi uphinde wakhala nangehholo eliseduze kwendawo yesigameko, wathi nalo liyingozi ezinganeni ezidlala kulo.Ikhansela lendawo, uMnuz Ntshangase, lithe alifuni ukungena ligxile  kwezithinta ipolitiki, lathi isigameko senzekile washona umntwana.“Yinto ebingenzeka noma ikuphi, noma nini, awukwazi ukulivimba icebo likaNkulunkulu,” kusho uNtshangase.Uthe akafuni ukungena entweni yodonga ngoba lokho kuzoba sengathi kufunwa umuntu ozosolwa ngesigameko kanti siyintando kaNkulunkulu.“Okunye nokunye siyokubona ngezikhathi zamavoti. Uma singabantu kwesinye isikhathi kufanele sibukhombise ubuntu. Isidumbu sengane njengamanje silele lapha phansi, kufanele uma singabantu sizifundise ukuthi kukhona izinto okungafanele sidlalele kuzo,” kusho uNtshangase.Uthe isigameko esifana nalesi njengoba kade lina, besingenzeka ngisho nasekhaya, izingane zithi ziyadlala, kuwe udonga, luzimboze.“Okubalulekile ukuthi sibheke ukuthi umndeni uhlangatshezwa kanjani ukutheni umntwana afihlwe ngesizotha,” kusho uNtshangase.Uthe banezinhlelo zokuthi ihholo, okungesilo elikamasipala, elikaSection 21, lilungiswe uMsamariya olungileyo.“Akulona lodwa mabili. Ukube bekuyindlu kamasipala ngabe kade salilungisa, manje elikaSection 21,” kusho uNtshangase.

ZIFUNA uMnyango wezoLimo KwaZulu-Natal ungenelele enkingeni yokulahlekelwa kwazo yimfuyo ngenxa yesomiso izakhamuzi zakwesaKwaMthethwa, Empangeni.Kuthiwa zingaphezu kuka-70 izinkomo esezibulawe yisomiso kanti izimbuzi zona zingaphezu kwekhulu.Omunye wabagilwa, uMnuz Mfana Gumede, uthe selokhu uqalile lo nyaka bayizwa ngendaba imvula nokuholele ekutheni bafelwe yinqwaba yezinkomo nezimbuzi.Uthe umkhizo uqale ukuzwela kakhulu ngoJuni nonyaka, imfuyo yabo isiqala ifa njengezimpukane.Enza isibonelo ngaye, uthe yena usefelwe yizinkomo ezingu-17 nezimbuzi ezine kusuka ngoJuni nonyaka.“Zifa ngayodwa, ngambili, izinsuku zilandelana, amasonto elandelana,” kusho uGumede.Uthe okumehlele kumshiye elimele kakhulu ngoba uziphilisa ngazo izinkomo.Uthe kuthi uma esebona sisibi isimo emalini, adayise inkomo eyodwa, udle umndeni wakhe.“Siyafisa ukulekelelwa ngokudla kwazo okunempilo, ukuze sikwazi ukuthi sivikele lezi ezimbalwa ezisele,” kusho uGumede.Uthe lolu hlobo lokudla lwenza ukuthi nakuba zingawatholi kahle amanzi kodwa zingabi ntekenteke okuholela ekutheni zigcine zifile.Esinye isakhamuzi, uNksz Nonkululeko Mthethwa, sona esilahlekelwe yizinkomo eziyisishiyagalombili, sithe bafisa umnyango ubalekelele ukuthi baphinde baphembe njengoba befelwe yizo zonke.UNksz Mthethwa uthe ezinye izakhamuzi ezisasalelwe imfuyo embalwa, zingakujabulela ukulethelwa amanzi azophuzwa yizinkomo ngamaloli.“Zonke ziphelela emadlelweni. Zivele ziphelelwe amandla, zigingqike zifele khona lapho. Isibaya somile,” kusho yena.Bathe ngenxa yokungani kwemvula, wonke amadamu asendaweni nemifula ebebethembele kuyo ukuthi kuphuze imfuyo yabo asemile utshani nenxa yesomiso.UMphathiswa woMnyango wezoLimo uNkk Thembeni Madlopha-Mthethwa, uthe uzojuba ithimba ukuba liyohlangana nabalimi baleyandawo ukuze kutholakale umbiko ogcwele wokuthi kwenzakalani nokuthi yiluphi usizo abanganikwa lona.Uthe indawo abanolwazi lokuthi ikhahlanyezwe isomiso iseHluhluwe lapho abamatasa khona nezinhlelo zokungenelela.Uthe phakathi kwazo kuye kwakhiwe amadamu namapitsi nokunye.

BAZOBINGELELA iNkantolo yeMantshi ePalm Ridge, abasolwa abathathu ababoshwe ngezinsolo zokubulala amalungu amabili eqembu lepolitiki uMkhonto Wesizwe. Kuthiwa amalungu amabili eMK, abulawa ngeSonto ebusuku eThwala Section, eKatlehong North, ngesikhathi kuqubuka ingxabano phakathi kwawo namalungu e-ANC.“Abagilwa badutshulwe kunengxebano yezepolitiki, umgilwa oyedwa ushonele endaweni yesigameko kwathi owesibili washonela esibhedlela,” kusho uBrigadier Brenda Muridili, okhulumela amaphoyisa aseGauteng.Ngesikhathi amaphoyisa efika endaweni yesigameko athola isibhamu nommese. Umsolwa wokuqala ubanjwe endaweni yesigameko.NgoMsombuluko, ithimba eliphenya amacala abucayi odlame esifundazweni libophe abasolwa ababili abaneminyaka engu-33 no-40 ubudala. Abasolwa babekwe amacala amabili okubulala kanti kulindeleke ukuthi bavele eNkantolo yeMantshi ePalm Ridge.

USUNOVALO umndeni wowesifazane wasePhase 4, eMbali, eMgungudlovu, osekuphele inyanga engabonakali emva kokuyovakashela uyise wengane oyiphoyisa.UNkk Zodwa Ngubo onguninakhulu kaNksz Tina Ngubo (35), uthe bathole ukuthi wahamba ngo-Agasti 16, eMayville, eyovakashela uyise wengane (14) oyiphoyisa esiShayamthetho eMgungundlovu.“Bekungu-Agasti 20, sithola ucingo kuzakwabo wasemsebenzini, ebuza ukuthi akekho yini ekhaya njengoba sekunezinsuku engezi emsebenzini. Sivele sathuka ngoba besazi ukuthi usemsebenzini. Yilapho agcine esesitshela khona ukuthi wayehambe ebizwe nguyise wengane,” kusho uNkk Ngubo.Uthe lona wesifazane wabatshela ukuthi ucingo lukayise wengane lwangena phambi kwakhe, waze wathi uNksz Ngubo akayiboleke imali yokuza, uzomnika uma esefikile.Eqhubeka nokulandisa uNkk Ngubo, uthe isihlobo simshayele ucingo uyise wengane, simbuza ukuthi uNksz Ngubo uphelelephi njengoba kuvela ukuthi unyamalele kade evakashele yena.Uthe uyise wengane wathi umgcine ngo-Agasti 19, emphelezela eyogibela, ebuyela eThekwini.Uqhube wathi waphinde wamshayela naye (uNkk Ngubo) uyise wengane egcizelela into efanayo, wathembisa ukulandelela ukuthi uphelelephi, bese ephinde ebuyela kuNkk Ngubo, into agcina engasayenzi, eseziba nezingcingo zabo.“Ngigcine ngiya khona esiShayamthetho, ngiyombuza ukuthi uzizibelani izingcingo zami? Ngifike engekho, ngakhulunyiswa nomphathi wakhe, othe uma emshayela ucingo wakhuluma inkulumo eshayisanayo,” kusho uNkk Ngubo.Uthe waqale wathi uNksz Ngubo wamshiya esangweni lasesiteshini samaphoyisa ePlessislaer, ukuyovula icala lokulahlekelwa umakhalekhukhwini.Wathi kuthe uma umphathi wakhe esethi uzonikela ePleassislaer, ayocela bamvulele amakhamera angalolo suku, kubonakale ukuthi wamshiya khona ngempela yini, washintsha wathi wamgodukisa wamyisa ePhase 4.UNkk Ngubo uthe ugcine eya ePlessislaer ngoSepthemba 10, ukuyobika ukuthi uNksz Ngubo udukile.“Ngikhathazekile ngale ngane njengoba sekuphele isikhathi eside kangaka ingatholakali. Ngifisa liphenywe iphoyisa ngokuduka kwayo. Akungeni ngisho ukudla uma ngicabanga ukuthi lokhu sekungiphinda isibili esikhathini esifishane,” kubeka uNkk Ngubo.Echaza ngesigameko saphambilini, uthe ngoJulayi 28 ubengcwaba omunye umzukulu wakhe, uMnuz Mlondi Ngubo (23), owagcina ukubonwa ngoJanuwari 1.Uthe kuleso sigameko wathola ucingo lukamakhelwane wakhe emakhaya eMpendle, ethi nangu uNgubo engena ngendlovu iyangena kwakhe.Uthe wamtshela ukuthi mhlawumbe uphuzile njengoba kwakukade kuhlukaniswa unyaka, wathi uma ebahlupha, abambizele amaphoyisa, bambophise.“Kwadlula amahora ambalwa, waphinde washaya ucingo (umakhelwane), ethi akasekho esihlahleni akade emkhuleke kuso (uNgubo), wathi usola ukuthi uqaqwe abangani bakhe, bahamba naye,” kusho uNkk Ngubo.Uveze ukuthi nalolo daba walubika emaphoyiseni kodwa wangabuthola ubulungiswa.Udalule ukuthi okwagcina kwenzeka ukuthi ashayelwe ucingo ngamaphoyisa aseBulwer ngoJuni, emtshela ukuthi athola amathambo omuntu owagqitshwa, akeze azofanisa.“Noma kwase kungamathambo kodwa yayisabonakala kancane i-trunk yakhe esiyaziyo, esihlakaleni kusekhona izihlilingi ayehlale ezifakile, emazinyweni kukhona elihlephuke njengelakhe ngaphambili,” kulandisa yena.Uthe imiphumela yolibofuzo eyenziwa yaqinisekisa ukuthi wuye uNgubo.“Ngalokhu okwenzeka manje, ngilimala isibili, esilondeni esingakapholi ngoba nakuMlondi, ngangilokhu ngihlalele ethembeni lokuthi ingane iyangena, kanti ngizoyithola isingamathambo,” kusho uNkk Ngubo.Amaphoyisa abengakayiphenduli imibuzo athunyelwe yona ngodaba lokuduka kukaNksz Ngubo.

AWUSABUTHI quthu ubuthongo umndeni wowesifazane waseMbumbulu, onyamalele okuthiwa ugcine ukubonwa endaweni yobumnandi i-London, Kwa-L, KwaMashu, lapho bekunentundabebhekene yephathi ngoMgqibelo.UNksz Amile Khambule kuthiwa uhambe kubo ngawo uMgqibelo, engumuntu oya ebanganini bakhe ayesebenza nabo eVerulam.Ngokusho kukagogo kaNksz Khambule, uNkk Patience Khambule, ehamba wathi uzobuya ngeSonto, nokugcine kungenzekanga.Uthe baqale ukukhathazeka ntambama ngeSonto bebona engaqhamuki, nasocingweni engatholakali.“Sivuke ngoMsombuluko, saphinde samzama kodwa lutho ukumthola,” kusho uNkk Khambule, othe bagcine beya emaphoyiseni ngoLwesibili, ukuyobika umuntu odukile.Uthe baphinde baluzama ucingo lwakhe, lwabanjwa umfana waseWoodlands othe ungumngani kaNksz Khambule.“Usitshele ukuthi u-Amile wamgcina ngoMgqibelo, eLondon. Uthe yilapho amnika khona iselula yakhe ukuthi amphathele yona, wagcina egoduka nayo, esemcinga engasamtholi,” kusho uNkk Khambule.Uthe okwenza bashawe uvalo ngokunyamalala kwakhe ukuthi wahamba engaphethe ngisho nezingubo zokushintsha, okukhombisa ukuthi wayengumuntu ozobuya ngakusasa.Uphinde wathi okunye okwenza basole ukuthi kukhona okungenzeka ukuthi kumehlele, ukuthi ungumuntu ozihloniphayo izinsuku zesikole njengoba enza unyaka wokuqala e-Berea Tech.“Yena uvamile ukuzihambela nabangani bakhe ngezimpelasonto kodwa uyaqinisekisa ukuthi ngeSonto uyabuya ngoba usuke azi ukuthi ngoMsombuluko kumele aye esikoleni,” kusho yena.Isolezwe libuye lathola nezikhalo ngeLondon, izakhamizi eziyakhele, zithi ziyafa umsindo futhi kuphazamiseka nokuhamba kwezimoto emigwaqweni eyakhele.Kuthintwa umnikazi weLondon, uMnuz Xolani Mabanga, uthe uNksz Khambule ungomunye wabesifazane abathathu okusabalale ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ukuthi badukile.Nokho uthe kuthe sekulandelelwa kahle, kwatholakala ukuthi usekhona kule ndawo yobumnandi nabangani.Ugcine ethi uzokwenza imizamo yokuthi aye endaweni yobumnandi, amthathe uNksz Khambule amgodukise ngenkani.Ephendula ngomsindo nokuphazamiseka  kokuhamba kwezimoto, uthe ngaphambi komcimbi, ubize umhlangano nezakhamuzi ezakhele indawo, ebika ukuthi kuzoba nomcimbi onesasasa, wabuza ukuthi zikhona yini izikhalazo ezikhona, umphakathi wathi cha.“Kunokuthi bakhalaze, bathe bacela ukuthi bavunyelwe ukuthi bazidayisele ngaphandle kwendawo, bazenzele imadlana, savumelana. Abathi kunezikhalazo, ngikholwa ukuthi abantu nje abadlala umona, ngokubona ukuthi indawo ibe nomcimbi oyimpumelelo, ongabanga nazo izigigaba,” kusho uMabanga.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa aseMbumbulu avule idokodo lokulahleka komuntu.Uthe noma ngubani ongaba nolwazi angathinta amaphoyisa aseMbumbulu, noma ashayele inombolo yamaphoyisa yamahhala ethi 08600 10111.

UKHATHAZEKILE umndeni wowesifazane waseBhobhoyi, ePort Shepstone osekuphele amasonto amathathu kungaziwa ukuthi ukuphi ekubeni enengane enonyaka.UNksz Sithembile Ngesi (30) kuthiwa ubehlala ehostela KwaMashu, esebenza emtholampilo eGoodwins KwaMashu kwa-E. Udadewabo uNksz Sithabile Mkhungo, uthe bathole ukuthi abamjwayele ehostela bathi bamgcina ekuseni eya emsebenzini kanti emsebenzini bathi wafika, wasebenza njengenjwayelo, waphuma ntambama, engumuntu ogodukayo.“Sithole ukuthi kwaqhubeka izinsuku engafiki emsebenzini, asebenza nabo baze bagcina befonela uyise wengane yakhe, bebuza ukuthi ukuphi ngoMeyi 9,” kusho uNksz Mkhungo.Uqhube wathi uyise wengane wabe esebazekela udaba, basukuma lapho banikela KwaMashu.Uthe kwathi emva kokulandiswa ngokwenzekile emsebenzini wakhe, banikela emaphoyiseni beyobika ukuthi unyamalele.Uthe bamzame kaningi ocingweni lwakhe kodwa lulokhu luvalwe njalo.“Mina ngake ngamfonela nangazo lezo zinsuku agcine ukubonwa ngazo, ngithi ngiyambheka nje ukuthi uyaphila yini njengenjwayelo kodwa lwangangena. Angizange nginake ngazitshela ukuthi mhlawumbe uhlushwa ucingo,” kusho uNksz Mkhungo.Uqhube wathi ukunyamalala kwakhe kuyabakhathaza ngoba unezingane ezincane.“Enye inonyaka, enye ineminyaka eyisikhombisa. Azihlali naye kodwa akuze kungaphela isikhathi eside kangaka engazibhekanga,” kusho uNksz Mkhungo.Uphethe ngelithi uNksz Ngesi akasiye umuntu ovele anyamalale nje angaxhumani nomndeni, ngakho kuyabakhathaza okwenzekayo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uConstable Thenjiswa Ngcobo, uthe kuvulwe idokodo lokunyamalala komuntu esiteshini samaphoyisa KwaMashu.

AMALUNGU omkhandlu wezifundazwe ePhalamende afuna incazelo ephelele kwiMeya yeTheku ukuthi yini ebambe ukusebenza kohlelo lwamabhasi iGo! Durban elinesabelo sika-R9 billion okwakumele luqale ukusebenza ngo-2016?Lokhu kuvezwe uMnuz Mzamo Billy, onguSotswebhu wamalungu eNational Council of Provinces (NCOP) aqhamuka KwaZulu-Natal.Uthe bayile ukuyohlola la mabhasi ngoLwesithathu, amile awasebenzi."UMasipala weTheku nabantu bamatekisi abavumelani ngokusebenza kweGo! Durban. Ziyabola izinto ezibekwe lapha nemigwaqo eyakhiwe ngenxa yokuthi umasipala uyahluleka ukuvumelana nabamatekisi," kusho uBilly.Uqhube ngokuthi beyi-NCOP ngeke bahlale basonge izandla babukele izinto ngendlela ezenzeka ngayo, bazofuna umbiko ophelele kwiMeya, uMnuz Cyril Xaba.Uveze ukuthi imeya izibophezelile ukuthi izohlanganisa izinhlaka ezahlukene, baqhamuke nesu lokuyilungisa into yokungaboni ngaso linye."Amabhasi eGo! Durban azolekelela abantu abahluphekayo futhi abadinga ezokuthutha eziqondile. Abantu baKwaMashu, eClermont nakoNew Germany bayawadinga la mabhasi," kuchaza uBilly.Kuleli sonto, amalungu eNCOP abehambele izifundazwe eyobheka angase alekelele ngakho.Bathole ukuthi kunemisebenzi engaqhubeki ephelelwe yimali, ishiywe dengwane, kayiqediwe, eminye imiswe abafuna ngodli u-30% wemali.Leli thimba liye naseHammarsdale liyohlola isikhungo esihlanza inyubathi okuthiwa kumisiwe ukwakhiwa kwayo."Kunemibiko ethi kumile ukwakhiwa kwayo ngenxa yokuthi kunabantu abaphazamisayo. Kuthiwa usonkontileka akanawo amandla okwenza lowa msebenzi," kusho uBilly.Kudlulelwe nasesikoleni iMenzi High eMlaza, lapho bekunemibiko ethi  kumisiwe ama-construction mafia ukwakhiwa kwesikole.Uthe beyi-NCOP ngeke bavumele izimo lapho abantu abafuna ibhizinisi babeke izimfuno zabi phambili kunekusasa labafundi balesi sikole esikhiqiza o-100% bemiphumela ka-matric minyaka yonke.Lwaqala ngoJuni 2022, uhlelo lokunweba lesi sikole ngamakilasi awu-13 nezinye izinto ngesabelo sika-R37 million.Bekumele luphothulwe ngoDisemba 2024, lolu hlelo kodwa sekuzoba uMashi 2025, okuyinto ekhalisa i-NCOP nomphathiswa wemiSebenzi yoMphakathi eKZN, uMnuz Martin Meyer, abathe kuzokwanda izindleko.Unobhala wenhlangano yabhizinisi abamnyama i-Black Business Federation, UMnuz Wonder Jaca, ukhale ngabamisa imisebenzi wathi bonela nabo.

SABELO NSELEKUCACELE noma wubani eSishayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal ngoLwesihlanu ukuthi zibe nzulu izingxoxo nokuvumelana kube okusezingeni eliphezulu phakathi kwamaqembu abeyinkukhu nempaka ngesikhathi kuqhubeka imikhankaso yokhetho.I–ANC, DA ne-IFP bebeyimbumba. Bekuthi uma bephakamisa igama lozokhethwa, owe-ANC aphakanyiswe oweDA, oweDA aphakanyiswe owe-IFP okuyinto ebicacisa ukuthi kuxoxwe ngempela kwavunyelwana ngobekumele kwenzeke izolo kukhethwa usomlomo, iphini lakhe nondunankulu wakulesi sifundazwe okugcine kube wuMnuz Thami Ntuli. I-MK izithole isikhishwa inyumbazane njengoba la maqembu amathathu evote ngokubambisana ekhetha kulezi zikhundla ezintathu. Abaholi be-IFP, ANC, DA, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, uNksz Nontembeko Boyce, noNksz Mmabatho Tembe baqokelwe ezikhundleni ebezibangwa, bahlula amalungu eMK abengenele umjaho wezikhundla.IMK iyona eyathola amavoti amaningi KwaZulu-Natal, yathola izihlalo ezingu-37 kwezingu-80.I-EFF kuphela enezihlalo ezimbili, evote neMK.Imbumba ye-IFP, ANC, DA neNFP inezihlalo ezingu-41.Le mbumba ikhombise ubumbano ngesikhathi kukhethwa yize ibikade ihlakanhlaka ngesikhathi kukhankaselwa ukhetho.Ngesikhathi kukhankaselwa ukhetho, kwaba neziwombe eziningi lapho amalungu alezi zinhlangano ayejikijelana khona ngamazwi ayiziswana.Abanye babefungile ukuthi ngeke basebenzisane nangeshobolo ngesikhathi besakhankasela ukhetho.NgoLwesihlanu abaholi bala maqembu bebebonakala bexoxa, benza amancoko kuqhuma uhleko.Ubumbano lugqame kakhulu ngesikhathi kuphakanyiswa amagama abazongenela umbango wezikhundla.Igama likaNtuli, oqokelwe kwesikandunankulu, liphakanyiswe yilungu le-ANC, uNksz Nomagugu Simelane.Igama likaNksz Boyce, oqokelwe kwesikasomlomo, liphakanyiswe yilungu le-IFP, uMnuz Mntomuhle Khawula.ElikaNksz Tembe, oqokelwe kwesephini likasomlomo, liphakamiswe yilungu le-ANC, uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka.AbeMK bebengazibekile phansi njengoba bephakamise amagama kuzo zonke izikhundla ebezibangwa.Onke amalungu ayo, Inkosi Phathisizwe Chiliza, uMnuz Mervyn Dirks, noNksz Ishan Barciela, akhale ngaphansi.INhloko yamaJaji KwaZulu-Natal, uJaji Thoba Portia Poyo-Dlwati, ebelihlalise umhlangano, lithwale kanzima njengoba amalungu eMK nawe-EFF ebelokhu ekhalaza ngohlelo obelulandelwa ngesikhathi kuvotwa.Bekuvotwa ngokuyimfihlo.Amalungu eMK nawe-EFF akhale ngokuthi kukhona abebeveza ukuthi bavote kanjani. Bathe ukhetho belungakhululekile, bafuna ukuthi kuqalwe phansi ukuvotwa.Bakhalaza nangabezindaba abebeqopha, nokuphethe ngokuthi bayalelwe ukuba bayeke ukuqopha.Kuke kwaba nezikhawu lapho bekubukeka sengathi amalungu eMK nawe-EFF afuna ukuwunyomfa umhlangano.IJaji Poyo-Dlwati lize lakhumbuza la malungu ukuthi linamandla okukhipha abahluphayo.Ngaphandle kwesiShayamthetho amalungu eMK nawe-IFP abekikilizana ngezingoma.Ekhuluma okokuqala njengoNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uNtuli ubonge ukubambisana okube khona emaqenjini kodwa wathi okwamanje akafuni ukugeqa amagula ngakuphethe esandleni.

KUSOLWA iphara ngokungqongqisa umuzi wakubo KwaShobashobane, eZinqoleni, linengwa ukuthi unina walo ulinikeze imali “eshodayo” yokuyothenga iwunga.Kubikwa ukuthi isigameko senzekele ngoLwesibili ngamadina, kanti umsolwa usagcwele amathafa.Kubikwa ukuthi umsolwa oyiphara ufune imali yokubhema kunina obe esemnikeza uR60 wathi enye useyisebenzise ethenga igilosa.Kuthiwa uvele wadinwa wathi ayenele imali anikezwe yona. Kuvela ukuthi unina, ube eseya emzini wakwamakhelwane eyofuna okuthile, undodana wasala washisa.Isibonda somphakathi futhi esisekomitini elibhekele inhlalo nokuphepha kwawo, uMnuz Ronnie Khomo, sithe umsolwa usale yedwa kubo wahlunga izimpahla, ezinye wazibeka emnyango.“Ube esengqongqisa konke ebekade kusele endlini okubalwa imibhede nefenisha. Unina kamgilwa nezingane zakhe ezimbili basele nabebekugqokile, sebehamba behlala komakhelwane,” kuchaza uKhomo.Udalule ukuthi bewumpakathi bakhathazekile yingakho bephume inqina bathungatha umsolwa ukuze bamnikezele emaphoyiseni ambophe. Umsolwa usagcwele amathafa.“Okuphatha kabuhlungu umphakathi, utshelwe ngelinye ilungu lalo mndeni ukuthi indodana yakhe iyamhlukumeza unina ona-52, ihlale imphoqa ukuthi ayinikeze imali ukuze ibheme. Sibikelwe ukuthi undodana useke wamklinya wacishe wambulala efuna ngodli imali yokuthenga izidakamizwa,” kusho uKhomo.UKhomo ubalule nokuthi umlilo ucishwe wumphakathi kwazise izicishamlilo azibizile ebezisuka ePort Shepstone, zibatshele ukuthi indawo yimbi, akufinyeleleki kulo muzi ngoba awukho umgwaqo oya khona.“Umlilo eZinqoleni usha zonke izinsuku kodwa asinaso isakhiwo sezicishamlilo esiseduzane. Kade sacela ukuthi sisondezelwe lesi sikhungo eduzane,” kubalisa uKhomo.Ikhansela lendawo, uMnuz Dennis Nyawose, lisiqinisekisile isigameko lathi okwamanje usawuzamele izipontshi nezimpahla zokulala lo mndeni.Liqhube lathi lithole umbiko obuthi umsolwa ubalekele ezihlotsheni KwaMachi, nakhona wabulala ithelevishini, wase ebizelwa amaphoyisa.  Ikhansela livumile ukuthi abezicishamlilo bafikile, nalo belikhona nalo kodwa abakwazanga ukungena bezocisha umuzi oshile ngoba awukho umgwaqo.

IMINDENI yabesifazane ababili ababulawa ngesihluku ngenyanga edlule, basola imizamo yokubambezela icala kwabasolwa, kungacaci ngommeli omele omunye wabo eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini.Umsolwa wokuqala uMnuz Lungani Mthethwa (38) nowesibili, uMnuz Sandile Chili (44) bekulindeleke ukuthi bafake isicelo sebheyili ngecala lokudubula babulale uNksz Anele Mbokazi (29) nomngani wakhe uNksz Zizipho Gabisa (30).Laba besifazane batholwa bebulewe emgwaqweni waseKenville eThekwini, ngo-Agasti 25. Ngakusasa amaphoyisa abopha abasolwa eSouth Beach emva kokulandelwa komkhondo kusetshenziswa iselula kaNksz Mbokazi.Ngesikhathi bevela izolo enkantolo ebigcwele phama imindeni yabathintekayo nomphakathi, imantshi uMnuz Scelo, Zuma izwakalise ukungenami ngabameli bakaMthethwa.Lokhu kwenzeke ngesikhathi ummeli uNksz Sibongile Khanyile, othe uthunywe uMnuz Nyameka Jondwana ukuthi azomela ikhasimende lakhe uMthethwa.UNksz Khanyile uveze ukuthi abakulungele ukuthi kuqhutshekwe nesicelo sebheyili njengoba bezinikwe ngoSepthemba 9, izitatimende ababezicele ngesikhathi abasolwa begcina ukuvela.UZuma uthe yize esho kanje uNksz Khanyile kodwa ubona ukungahleleki kubameli balo msolwa, wexwayisa ngokuthi selihlehla okokugcina icala ngenxa yabo.Ummeli kaChili, uMnuz B Ngcongo, yena uveze ukuthi ukulungele ukuqala isicelo sebheyili, kodwa uZuma wathi icala alihlehlele u-Okthoba 7, ukuze abasolwa basifake kanyekanye isicelo sebheyili.UMnuz Mvuselelo Magwaza okhulumela umndeni kaNksz Mbokazi, uthe lena indlela yokuqhamuka namaqhinga ngecala.“Njengoba kudideke inkantolo nathi sididekile. Kuyasixaka ukuthi okwani lokhu kubambezela okungaka okulethwa uhlangothi lwabo (abasolwa),” kusho uMagwaza, othe banethemba lokuthi umthetho uzothatha indawo yawo.Udadewabo kaNksz Gabisa, uNksz Thobile Gabisa, uthe ngokubona kwabo, abasolwa bazama ukubaxukuza umqondo beyimindeni yabagilwa.“Mhlawumbe bacabanga ukuthi sizophosa ithawula kanti cha ngoba sifuna ubulungiswa ngezingane ezibulawe zincane, zisanekusasa eliqhakazile,” kusho uNksz Gabisa.Uthe kwabanenga ukuzwa ukuthi abasolwa bahlela ukuliphika icala.“Ungaliphika kanjani icala bonke ubufakazi bukhomba kuwena? Laba bantu babenenhloso yokubulala ngakho ke abagwetshwe,” kusho uNksz Gabisa.Iphini likaSihlalo we-ANCWL eThekwini, uNksz Gugu Sibiya, lithe bayazibophezela ekutheni bazoyeseka imindeni yabagilwa njengoba bengahambisani nokubulawa kwabesifazane nezingane.“Bababulele ngesihluku, badala ukuthi izingane zabo zikhule zingenabo onina. Umthetho awuthathe indawo yawo. Abantwana abasazi ukuthi uma behamba emakhaya bazobuya yini,” kusho uNksz Sibiya.Bekukhona nabenhlangano i-LifeLine, nabo bezokweseka imindeni.Isolezwe  lithole ukuthi uMthethwa ungowokudabuka eKukhanyeni, eNdwedwe.UMthethwa ungene enkantolo eshaye ihembe likanokusho elinombala omnyama nosagolide nebhulukwe lejini nezicathulo zikanokusho. Ubehlala ahlale ahlanganise izandla ebusweni samuntu othandazayo.UChili yena ubefake ijakhethi elinombala omnyama nobomvu egcina emadolweni, ibhulukwe elimnyama, isikibha esibomvu namateki akhathele.Ngaphandle kwenkantolo bekubhikisha umphakathi obufike ngenqwaba yamatekisi ukuzokweseka imindeni yabagilwa.

KUGQAME ubumbano kubaphathiswa baKwaZulu-Natal abake bajamelana phambi kweSilo uMisuzulu Sinqobile kaZwelithini noMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa.Undunankulu kaZulu ophathiswe uMnyango wokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu, uMnuz Thulasizwe Buthelezi, noMphathiswa wezokuThutha, uMnuz Siboniso Duma, bakhombise ubumbano ngesikhathi kugujwa uMkhosi weLembe.UButhelezi noDuma baba nesiwombe esibi ngasekuqaleni kwalo nyaka ngesikhathi kunomcimbi wokukhumbula iSilo uDinuzulu kaCetshwayo.Kulowo mcimbi owawukwaCeza, uDuma wayabula kabuhlungu umbhobho ngesikhathi uButhelezi ethula inkulumo.Emva komcimbi uButhelezi noDuma baphenduka inkukhu nempaka.Kepha eMkhosini weLembe konke bekukuhle kulaba baholi.Ubumbano lwabo lugqame kakhulu ngesikhathi uButhelezi encoma uDuma phambi kwezinkumbi ebezithamele umkhosi obungoLwesibili.Ngesikhathi uButhelezi ethula iSilo, uncome umsebenzi owenziwe uDuma ukwelekelela abantu abebebhajwe emgwaqweni njengoba belikhithikile ngempelasonto.Laba baholi baqhamuka emaqenjini ezepolitiki ehlukene, uButhelezi uyilungu lesigungu esiphezulu kwi-IFP, uDuma  uwusihlalo we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal.Baqale ukubuyisana emva kokubambisana kwamaqembu abo kuhulumeni wokubambisana ophethe isifundazwe. Bake baba nomhlangano  wokuthelelana amanzi.Nakuba sekunesikhathi bathelelana amanzi, uDuma ubesanyamanambana emabuthweni abefuna ukuthi ashweleze eSilweni.Ngesikhathi kunomcimbi wokuvulwa kwesiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal, amabutho acula ingoma egadla kuDuma.Muva nje uDuma usanda kushweleza eSilweni. Ekhuluma eMkhosini weLembe, uDuma uthe konke sekuhamba kahle.UDuma uthe uze washutha isithombe esihle nomholi wamabutho owayehamba phambili ecula iculo elimgadlayo ngesikhathi kuvulwa isiShayamthetho, uMntwana uNkinobho Zulu.Obambe njengondunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Thembeni kaMadlopha-Mthethwa, uthe basebenzisana kahle kuhulumeni wokubambisana.UKaMadlopha-Mthethwa uthe abakhohlwe abacabanga ukuthi uzohlakazeka uhulumeni ophethe isifundazwe.UKaMadlopha-Mthethwa uthe ukwakhiwa kukahulumeni wokubambisana kuyafana nokwenziwa iSilo uShaka kaSenzangakhona ngesikhathi sibumba isizwe samaZulu.“ILembe labumba isizwe esihlonishwayo nesisatshwayo ngokuhlanganisa amakhosi ahlukene. Ungafunga ukuthi iLembe lalazi ukuthi ngelinye ilanga esifundazweni salo kuyoba nohulumeni wokubambisana, inhlosongqangi yawo, Silo Samabandla, ngukubumbana nokuhloniphana ukuze silethe intuthuko kubantu bonke beSilo.“Nokho bakhona Hlanga Lomhlabathi abaphuma eceleni njengojosaka – abafunga bagomele ukuthi lo hulumeni wokubambisana uzoshabalala okwelanga libona amazolo. Njengokuyalela kwakho Silo Samabandla, siyabezwa kodwa asibalaleli.”

KUPHAZAMISEKE ukuhamba kwezimoto, abantu bangakwazi ukufinyelela ezindaweni abasebenzela kuzo nasezikoleni, ngenxa yokuvalwa kwemigwaqo engenela edolobheni, ePort Shepsone, nasezindaweni ezisondelene nalo, okukholakala ukuthi kwenziwe ngosomatekisi abakhala ngokushaqwa kwezimoto zabo ngamaphoyisa afuna izimvume.Lesi siteleka singenele osukwini lwesibili izolo njengoba siqale ngoMsombuluko. Abebevale umgwaqo kuthiwa bebededela kuphela abama-ambulensi nabezimoto zezimo eziphuthumayo, kanti iningi labafundi, othisha, abasebenzi namalungu omphakathi basale dengwane.Iningi labantu abathinte Isolezwe abangathandanga ukudalulwa lithe lisondelene nabemboni yamatekisi, liveze ukuthi ukushuba kakhulu kwesimo izolo, kubhebhethikiswe ukungafiki koMphathiswa woMnyango wezokuThutha nokuHlaliswa KwaBantu uMnuz Siboniso Duma, obekulindeleke ukuthi ahlangane  nosomatekisi enkundleni yezemidlalo eMarburg ngoMsombuluko, kodwa okuthiwa ugcine engafikanga.“Kubukeka sengathi uDuma akayisukumelanga le nto isaqala njengoba isisiphazamisa sonke.
