NgoMsombuluko bekungcono ngoba izimoto ezincane bezingavinjwa bekungamatekisi namabhasi kuphela angahambi, kodwa namhlanje (izolo) kuvinjwa yonke into ngaphandle kwabama- ambulensi.  Nami bekumele ngivuke ngiye emsebenzini, kodwa ngigcine sengizilalela ngoba akukho engizokwenza akuphumi lutho nje.”USihlalo wenhlangano yosomatekisi i-South African National Taxi Council esifundeni Ugu, uMnuz Lethu Maphumulo, uthe abakhala ngakho ukushaqwa kwezimoto zabo ngamaphoyisa kaShanela ngenxa yezimvume.“Iphutha lingakubo, abasiniki izimvume zethu. Izimoto zethu ziboshiwe, sigcina sesingena ezikweletini ngoba siyazikhokhela. Kwesinye isikhathi zigcina sezidliwa lapho sizithenga khona, kungcole izithupha zethu ngoba kuthiwa siboshelwa izimvume.  Sifuna umnyango udedele izimoto zethu ukuze sisebenzea,” usho kanje.Uxolisile kubagibeli abazithola sebengondingasithebeni, wathi abaqondile ukubahlukumeza kodwa bazama ukulwela amalungelo abo ukuze bamelane nempilo.Ngesikhathi sokushicilela, umnyango ukhiphe isitatimende sokuthi uzohlangana nobuholi beSantaco esifundeni Ugu, khona izolo ntambama.

UMPHAKATHI wasoGunjini, eNdwedwe, uthandazele ibhuloho osekuphele iminyaka lingapheli, ufisa umsebenzi wokulakha usheshe njengoba sekuzoqala imvula yasehlobo.Ibhuloho elibizwa nge-P713 lisoGunjini, eNdwedwe, kanti uma seliqediwe lizohlanganisa umgwaqo osuka esiteshini samaphoyisa eNdwedwe udlule esibhedlela oSindisweni, uze uyongena eVerulam.Ngempelasonto, kube nenkonzo yokukhulekela asebashona ngenxa yezingozi nezimpi ezenzeka eduze kwaleli bhuloho. Kubuye kwakhulekelwa nokuthi inkontileka ekhona - kulokhu - iwuqede umsebenzi njengoba eyasekuqaleni yashiya ingaliqedanga.Ngokusho kukaMshumayeli uBhekizitha Phewa wethempeli lamaNazaretha iSinothando, ibhuloho kwakufanele lilunge ngo-1987, kodwa akwenzekanga lokho.Uveze ukuthi kwakhiwa ibhuloho lesikhashana nalo elagcina lihambe nezikhukhula kwaze kwamuka nabantu.Uthe ngokwesibonakaliso sikaMnuz Hlala Mkhize, kufanele kube nomsebenzi wokuhlambulula amanzi ngoba abantu abamuka ebhulohweni lesikhashana bagcina bengene emfuleni uMdloti.UMnuz Zibonele Ngcobo weNdwedwe Development Committee uthe sekuphele iminyaka engaphezu kuka-20 lakhiwa ibhuloho (ebekungelesikhashana).Uveze ukuthi inkampani yokugcina iqale umsebenzi kodwa yangawuqeda ikhala ngokuthi kuphele imali.Uthe lena esikhona ifike emuva kokungenelela kukaMnuz Sihle Zikalala, owaqala ukuyithungatha ngesikhathi esewundunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal.“Ukungabibikho kwebhuloho kuyawuphazamisa umphakathi ngoba amatekisi awasahambi ngapha. Asisakwazi ukuthola amatekisi ayosishiya esibhedlela, sekufanele silibashe ngonyawo. Siyafisa ukuthi umsebenzi wokulakha usheshe njengoba kusazoza nemvula,” kuchaza uNgcobo.Uthe bahlela enye inkonzo ezohlanganisa nemindeni yabashonelwa nezihlobo, abafisa ukuthi uMnyango wezokuThutha nezinye izinhlaka, zibe yingxenye yayo.

BADIDEKILE abazali bezingane ezifunda eSizakahle High, eMnambithi, okuvele ukuthi sekuphele izinsuku othisha bengangeni emakilasini ukufundisa.Abazali kulesi sikole abavuke banikela esikoleni izolo, ngenhloso  yokuzwa ngokuqhubekayo emva kokuthi izingane zabo kuthiwa bezilokhu zifika zibika ukuthi azifundi. Kuthiwa asicaci isizathu kahle ukuthi kungani  benquma ukungangeni emakilasini, bafundise.Umzali oyilungu lesigungu esengamele isikole ocele ukungadululwa, uthe akukho okuqondile ukukhulunywayo okwenza ukuthi othisha bangafundisi.“Sifikile esikoleni, othisha abafunanga ukukhuluma nathi.  Emhlanganweni wesigungu esilawula isikole esibenawo ngoMsombuluko, uthishomkhulu uveze ukuthi othisha bathi abafundisi ngoba kufe imishini yokufothokhopha, okuyinto engingaboni ukuthi iyiqiniso ngoba ezinye izinsiza kufundisa njengoshoki nokunye kukhona,” usho kanje.Uthe emva komhlangano ongabanga yimpumelelo njengoba abazali bengahlangananga nomhloli njengoba bekulindelekile, banqume ukuthi ngeke bazidedele izingane zabo ziye esikoleni kuze kube uMnyango wezeMfundo esiFundazweni uyangenelela ukuxazulula le nkinga.Omnye umzali, uthe lesi sinqumo basithathiswe wukuthi ziningi izindleko abangena kuzona ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abafundi baya esikoleni njengoba abanye begibela.Uthe ukubahambisela ukuthi bayohlala bengafundiswa kungaba ukuchitha imali kungenasidingo.“Sikhathazekile ngekusasa lezingane zethu, kodwa akukho mina engingakwenza kuphela ukuthi ngingabavumeli baye esikoleni ukugwema izinto eziningi ngoba izingane uma zingafundi, ziyohlala esikoleni usuku lonke, zingagcina sezenza izinto ezingafanele,” kusho umzali.Okhulumela umnyango uMnuz Muzi Mahlambi, uqinisekisile ukuthi bawutholile umbiko ngalolu daba basawubheka.Kuze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela engakabuyeli entathelini ukucacisa ngokuphazamisa ukufunda kulesi sikole.

UMPHAKATHi waseNtuzuma A, eLindelani, kubalwa nothisha besikole, nabazali bezingane ezifunda ePhikiswayo Primary, basale bephithene amakhanda emva kyokugasela kwabalisa ababili abangaziwa kulesi sikole, badubula kwafa omunye wothisha, kubuka izingane zesikole ngoMsombuluko ekuseni.Elinye ilungu lomphakathi wakule ndawo elidayisa eduze kothango olubiyele isikole, elidalule ukuthi lizibonele mathupha ingxenye yesigameko, lithe belidayisa njengasemihleni ngesikhathi lizwa ukuqhuma kwesibhamuLithe kuthe uma libheka ngalapho besiqhuma ngakhona, labona abalisa ababili bedubula kaningi uNksz Dudu Khumalo, obefundisa uGrade R kulesi sikole, afike kusona kulo nyaka.“Kuthe uma ngiphenduka ngabona abalisa ababili engingabazi bedubula uthisha eduze kwelinye lamahhovisi angaphakathi esikoleni, maqede bashaya bachitha, bemshiya elele phansi.“Ngishaqekile ngoba bengingayilindele into enjena. Ngaphambi kwesigameko, ngibabonile laba balisa bedlula eduze kwami, nokho ngangasola lutho ngoba kusuke kuphithizela vele ekuseni, abantu beya ezindaweni ezehlukene,” usho kanje.Ngesikhathi Isolezwe lizifa endaweni yesehlo bese kugcwele abantu ngaphandle kothango lwesikole, abanye bemi izicagogwana. Bakhona nabebengaphakathi emagcekeni esikole, bebabaza isihluku ngokwenzekile. Abanye bebeze balibeke ngembaba elokhu bayokukhohlwa befile abakubonile. Abanye bebebalisa ngokuphepha kwezingane zabo ezifunda kuso lesi sikole. UThishanhloko wesikole, uMnuz Mthokozisi Mchunu, uthe kubashiye bephithene amakhanda ukubulawa ngesihluku esinje kukazakwabo, athe ubezikhandla kakhulu emsebenzini.Uthe ngenkathi kwenzeka isigameko yena ubengekho emagcekeni esikole, ekwesinye sezikhungo eyoba yingxenye yomncintiswano wezingane wokuphimisa amagama.“Ngibuye ngishesha emva kokuzwa ngesigameko. Siphatheke kabi kakhulu ngokwehlele uzakwethu, futhi kube buhlungu ukumbona esephangalele emagcekeni esikole,” kusho yena.Uthe ngokwazi kwabo, uNksz Khumalo okuthiwa ubehlala eRiverhorse Valley, ubengenazitha futhi ubengakaze abatshele lutho olubi obelungase luholele esigamekweni esinje.Ebuzwa ukuthi abenzi bobubi bangene kanjani emagcekeni esikole, uMchunu uthe bahlale benza okusemandleni abo ukuqinisekisa ukuthi akungeni noma wubani esikoleni.“Sisola ukuthi abasolwa bathole intuba yokungena ngenkathi kuphithizela kakhulu ekuseni, kungena izingane ebezize esikoleni,” usho kanje.Eqhuba, uveze nokuthi izolo izingane bazigodukisile ukuze ziyophepha emakhaya, waqinisekisa ukuthi namhlanje uhlelo lokufunda luzoqhubeka yize kubuhlungu kunjalo ngokubehlele.“Sisovakashelwa ngabeluleka ngokwengqondo ukusiza ukuze kuqhubeke uhlelo lokufunda nokufundisa, futhi sibonge kakhulu kubazali ngokusukumela phezulu, basisiza ukuphephisa izingane zabo ngenkathi bezwa ngesigameko,”’ usho kanje.Kulesi sikole kuthiwa ukhona ogada esangweni oqashwe nguMnyango wezeMfundo. Usihlalo wesigungu esilawula isikole, uMnuz Trevor Mbazo, naye ukhale kakhulu ngokubehlele okubashiye bephithene amakhanda.Isolezwe lizamile ukukhuluma nabomndeni kamufi, okuvela ukuthi bahlala KwaMakhutha, kepha bala aphetha ukukhuluma nabezindaba. Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo esifundazweni, uMnuz Muzi Mahlambi ukhalisane nozakwabo, futhi wasigxeka isenzo sokubulawa kothisha emagcekeni esikole. Unxuse umthetho ukuba usebenze ukuze kutholakale abenzi bobubi.Okhulumela amaphoyisa esifundazweni, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa aseNtuzuma aphenya icala lokubulala emuva kokubulawa kowesifazane oneminyaka ewu-46.

ABAZI bazophuma babhekephi abahlali abebenemijondolo ku-ward 63 eMalvern, eThekwini emuva kokuthi idiliziwe. Abahlali bakule ndawo baveza ukuthi kuqale ngo-Ephreli 5 nonyaka ukudilizwa kwemijondolo yabo futhi abachazelwa ukuthi kungani idilizwa. UMnuz Syanda Cebisa ongumhlali waseMalvern ekhuluma neSolezwe, uthe abazi ukuthi kwenzekani, bavele babona sebedilizelwa izindlu.“Uthi usemsebenzini uvele ubuye indlu yakho isiwisiwe. Akhona amakomiti asemphakathini asisizayo kodwa lokho kugcina sekungenzeki,” kusho uCebisa.Ulandise wathi bayihambelile iminyango yezezindlu kodwa nakhona babuya belambatha.“Uma siyobika khona eMnyangweni wezeZindlu noma ukuthola ulwazi ngale nkinga esibhekene nayo, sitshelwa ukuthi indawo esakhe kuyo ayikho emthethweni, singalindela noma yini. Okusididayo ukuthi uma besho kanje, yini bengasiwiseli sonke imijondolo yethu bese besibeka kwenye indawo hhayi ukuthi kukhethwe amabala. Ngineminyaka eyisikhombisa ngafika kule ndawo kodwa uthola ukuthi laba abanemijondolo emisha bona abadilizelwa.” Uveze ukuthi okubadidayo ukuthi kunepayipi lamanzi elifakwe ezinyangeni ezedlule kule ndawo kodwa manje sebeyadilizelwa.Uqhube wathi bacela iMeya yeTheku, uMxolisi Kaunda ukuthi alusukumele lolu daba.“Siyakhala ukuthi nakhu sihleli iminyaka sinamakhaya kodwa sithi siyabuya emisebenzini asisenakhaya. Isicelo sethu esisicela kubaba uKaunda ukuthi asikhulumele noMnyango wezeZindlu ukuthi bayiyeke lento ngoba siya okhethweni manje kodwa kuningi kuyonakala. Asazi sizovota sikuphi njengoba sixoshwa nje. Abaholi bethu abasiphethe abasicabangele kulesi simo esikusona,” eqhuba.Ikhansela laku-ward 63 uMnuz Chris Van Den Berg, uthe uzwile ngalo lolu daba futhi lokhu abahlali abakwenzayo kuwukuthatha umhlaba ngokungemthetho.“Inselelo esibhekene nayo ukuthi le mijondolo ihambisana nokuthathwa komhlaba ngokungemthetho nokuyisimo esinzima kakhulu. Umasipala kumele usukume ubhekane nalesi simo,” kusho uVan Den Berg.Uqhube wathi le ndawo abakhe kuyo ayikufanele ukuthi kwakhiwe kuyo. “Nezidingo azikwazi ukufika khona ngoba kukhona umgwaqo kanye nojantshi wesitimela. Ngizamile ukukhuluma nomphakathi ngiwuchazela ukuthi indawo owakhe kuyo ngeke kusebenzeke kuyo,” ubeke kanje.

SEKUVELE izindaba ezishaqisayo ngetulo okuthiwa liphekwa ngabathile eBandleni lamaNazaretha, ukuketula umholi uMduduzi Shembe uNyazilwezulu bese kufakwa uMnuz Mpume Shembe esikhundleni salo sokuhola ibandla. Yize umbango ogqamile uphakathi koNyazilwezulu nomholi uPhinda Shembe Ukukhanyakwelanga, kodwa kulokhu kuthiwa itulo liphekwa ngabathile abayizethenjwa zalo uNyazi.Isolezwe Ngempelasonto, lithole ngomthombo walo ongashayi eceleni ukuthi kunomshoshaphansi wokungcolisa igama loNyazilwezulu lokulenza libukeke licheme namaqembu athile epolitiki, okuzoba yisona sizathu sokuthi lugudluzwe ngaphakathi esikhundleni kukhalwa ngalokho.UMpume okulungiselwa ukuthi athathe isikhundla soNyazilwezulu, kuthiwa uzalwa ngomunye wabafowabo bomholi wamaNazaretha wesibili, iNkosi Jerome Galile Shembe Ilanga. Kuthiwa uyise kaMpume akakaze abe ngumholi wamaNazaretha kodwa kuthiwa uyena ongabangcono ngoba esondelene nezikhulu ezithile zebandla nezepolitiki.“Uma uzokhumbula kahle kuke kwagqanyiswa izindaba zokuthi uNyazilwezulu lunxenxa amaNazaretha ukuthi anike i-ANC ithuba lesibili ukuthi iphinde ihole izwe.“Lokho kwakungaphumi kulona ngokuthanda kwalo, kodwa kukhona isigungu esihlonishwayo esisondele kulona esisuke silweluka ngokumele lukusho kumaNazaretha.“Okudala lokho wukuthi kwasona leso sigungu sisebenza nabathile kwipolitiki. Siyazi ukuthi uma lusho kanjalo kuzongcola igama lalo bese luvela lungeyena umholi ofanele ngoba kuyaziwa ukuthi uShembe akazingeni ezepolitiki.“Lokho kuzokwenza ukuthi kube lula uma sona isigungu sesiphakamisa ukuthi alugudluke esikhundleni ngoba uzihlanganisa nepolitiki,” kusho umthombo.Kuthiwa le mpi isuswe wukuthi uNyazilwezulu lumise ithenda ka-R18 million yokwakha amadokodo eBuhleni, okuwuxhaso olwakhishwa wuMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa.“Kuzona izethenjwa zebandla kukhona ababezohlomula ngale thenda, njengoba besebenzisana nezikhulu ezithile kuhulumeni, bacasuka uma isimiswa. Yingakho sebenza yonke into ezoholela uNyazilwezulu ophathe.“Lezi zethenjwa zilwa nawo wonke umuntu ozama ukuluvikela uNyazilwezulu. Ngikhuluma nawe nje zikwazile ukuqhelisa Inkosi yamaQadi uMqoqi kulona obengavumeli noma yini.“Kukhona nesinye sezethenjwa esiluvikelayo uNyazilwezulu esesithweswe icala lokudlwengula njengoba sihamba inkantolo kumanje,” kusho omunye umthombo.Uqhuba uthe njengamanje kuneminye imizamo yokuthi uNyazilwezulu luvezwe njengomuntu ovukela uMbuso.“Lezi zethenjwa zeluleke uNyazilwezulu ukuthi lukhiphe umhlangano oya eSwazini njengoba kunguMeyi. Ngokujwayelekile umholi webandla akahambi yedwa uma ehambisa umkhuleko kodwa uphelezelwa ngamaNazaretha.“Ukukhipha umhlangano uye eSwazini kuzokwenza amaNazaretha azoluphelezela luya eSwazini angasitholi isikhathi sokuyovota ngoMeyi 29 bese kuthiwa luvukele uMbuso ngokuyisa abantu ngaphandle kuvotwa ezweni labo,” usho kanje.Okhulumela uNyazilwezulu, uMnuz Thokozani Mncwabe ukuqinisekisile ukuthi kunomhlangano wamaNazaretha ozophuma ngoMeyi 25 ukuyokhuleka eSwazini.“Asinalwazi ukuthi uzobuya nini kodwa kuba wumholi onquma isikhathi sokuwubuyisa. Kungenzeka kubuywe lungakafiki ukhetho kodwa asinasiqiniseko.“Ngetulo okhuluma ngalo, lokugudluza uBaba uNyazilwezulu, anginalwazi ngalo kodwa igama likaMpume Shembe ngike ngizwe kukhulunywa ngalo ukuthi ungomunye womndeni wakwaShembe, angikaze ngizwe kuthintwa ezokuhola ibandla ngaye. Ngebhadi angikaze ngihlangane naye futhi anginamlando ogcwele ngaye,” kusho uMncwabe.

Ufuna ubulungiswa umndeni wakwaKhwela eNtambanana, eMpangeni,  kulandela ukudutshulwa kubulawe ilungu lomndeni walo ngamadoda angaziwa agalela emzini wabo ebusuku ezibiza ngamaphoyisa.Isolezwe Ngempelasonto lixoxa nowomndeni, ongathandangwa ukudalulwa igama lakhe, uthe lesi sigameko senzeke ngentathakusa yangoMgqibelo odlule lapho okwathi abomndeni walo belele kwenye yezindlu ezisegcekeni, bavuswa wukungqongqoza ngesankahlu kwamadoda emnyango. Uthe la madoda angaziwa ukuthi angobani, nababekhona abanganakanga ukuthi ayemangaki ngoba kwakusebusuku kakhulu futhi kumnyama, afike angqongqoza emnyango wendlu kamfowabo azibiza ngamaphoyisa.Uthe umka mfowabo nezingane baqale baziba isikhashana, bedidwa yisankahlu sokungqongqoza emnyango okwathi ngokuzwa ukuthi abangqongqozayayo abazimisele ukuyeka futhi sebeshaya kabana nasemafasiteleni, bagcina bevulile.“Kuthe sebevulile, laba balisa bangena ngaphakathi bashaya ingane yomfowethu nomkakhe base bebathatha baya nabo kwenye indlu bafike babafaka kuyona. Kuthe noma sebelapho baqhubeka nokubashaya ngesihluku namanye amalungu omndeni ayekuyona base bebahudulela emnyango,” kusho ilungu lomndeni.Liqhuba lithe ngokuzwa umsindo, inhloko yekhaya, uMnuz Phumlani Khwela, yaphumela emnyango ukuyokhuza umhlola kanti ayibuzanga elangeni - yazithela kwizimbila zithutha, ziholwa ngemhlophe phambili.“Laba balisa bamkhombe ngesibhamu bathi akalale phansi. Kwathi esalele phansi kanjalo bavulela ngenhlamvu wadubuleka ekhanda, waphelela khona lapho kubuka wonke umuntu maqede bashaya bachitha bemshiya esefile,” usho kanje.Umufi Khwela (66) ufihlwe izolo kanti ushiye emhlabeni izingane eziyisithupha nabazukulu abayisishiyagalolunye.Liqhuba ilungu lomndeni, lithe okwenza bakhathazeke kakhulu ngalesi simo wukuthi isigameko esinjena asiqali ukwenzeka emndenini njengoba nango-2010 kwadutshulwa kwafa umzala walo ebulawa ngamaphoyisa mhla kubhoke izigameko zodlame endaweni. Lithi nalapho kwagcina bungenziwanga ubulungiswa.“Kuyasikhathaza ukuthi siqothelwa amalungu omndeni ngabantu abazibiza ngamaphoyisa okufanele ngabe yibona abasivikelayo siwumphakathi. Kuyasikhathaza kakhulu lokhu futhi kumanje sizizwa singaphephile ngoba asazi ukuthi kuzokwenzekani olunye olubi kusukela manje,” kusho ilungu lomndeni.Kuthintwa okhulumela amaphoyisa esifundazweni, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa aseNtambanana aphenya icala lokubulala kulandela isigameko sokubulawa komlisa oneminyaka ewu-66 endaweni ebizwa ngokuthi kuseMthombeni.“Imibiko esayithola ithi umsolwa wafika emzini kamgilwa wangqongqoza emnyango. Kwathi umgilwa evula umnyango, umsolwa wavulela ngenhlamvu amahlandla amaningi kuyena,” kusho uNetshiunda.

BASALE nabebekugqokile osonhlakahle abangasebenzi abaqhinqe eHhovisi likaNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, emva kokukhuthuzwa amaphara.Labo sonhlalakahle abangaphezu kuka-20 balahlekelwe yikho konke ngesikhathi bekhuthuzwa ngoLwesihlanu, belele ngaphandle kweHhovisi likaNdunankulu eliseMgungundlovu.Osonhlalakahle abangasebenzi ilokhu baqala ukuqhinqa eHhovisi likaNdunankulu ngo-Agasti, njengoba bekhala ngokungaqashwa.NgoLwesihlanu bekuhlangana izinsuku ezingu-35 belala ngaphandle kweHhovisi likaNdunankulu.Omunye walabo sonhlalakahle abangaphezu kuka-20,,  abaqhinqe eHhovisi likaNdunankulu, uNksz Nonkululeko Mdiniso, uthe bonke baficwe ubuthongo ngezintathakusa zangoLwesihlanu, baphaphama amaphara esebaleka nezimpahla zabo.“Sivuswe omunye uzakwethu esememeza. Sithe uma sivuka sabona elinye iphara seliyosithela nesikhwama esigaxwa emhlane. Sizamile ukulilandela, sangalifica.”UNksz Mdiniso uthe bantshontshelwe izinto ezibalulekile ezifana nomazisi, izincwadi zokushayela kanye nemali.“Sisale nalokhu ebesikugqokile. Bashanele konke obekusezikhwameni zethu. Bathathe ukudla esikuphiwa abantu okukhona kukho impuphu namaqanda. Bathathe nemali yokugibela kwazise njalo ngoLwesihlanu siyaye siye emakhaya, size sibuye ngeMisombuluko.”UNksz Mdiniso uthe bekungokokuqala ukuba babhekane nalesi simo kusukela baqala ukuqhinqa eHhovisi likaNdunankulu.UNksz Mdiniso uthe isigameko sangoLwesihlanu angeke sibaqede amandla, wathi bazoqhubeka nokuqhinqa.“Sifuna ukuthola impendulo eqondile. Akukwazi ukuthi kusukela ngo-2013 umnyango ulokhu usitshela into eyodwa, ukuthi ayikho imali yokuqasha osonhlalakahle.”UNksz Mdiniso uthe okubakhathaza kakhulu ukuthi uMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal awubanikezi zimpendulo.“Uma sithumela ama-email abasiphenduli. Kunemibiko ekhombisa ukuthi umnyango wabelwa imali yokuqasha osonhlalakahle, wakhetha ukuyisebenzisa kwezinye izindawo.”Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe bekungakaboshwa muntu ngalesi sigameko esiphenywa amaphoyisa asePietermaritzburg.Okhulumela uMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho nezeNhlalakahle, uMnuz Thuba Vilane, uthunyelwe imibuzo ngodaba lokuqhquna kwalabo sonhlalakahle, okushaye isikhathi sokushicilela engakayiphenduli. Ngesikhathi labo sonhlalakahle beqala umbhikisho wabo, kwamiswa umhlangano weKhabhinethi, uNdunankulu, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, nabaphathiswa, baya kolalela izimfuno zalabo sonhlalakahle.

UKUNUKA kwephunga elixakile sekubangele umphakathi waseMgcweni ku-ward 4, eCato Ridge, ukuthi uhlale kabuhlungu njengoba livele livimbanise kungabe kusaphefumuleka.Iphunga liqhamuka edamini elisenkampanini ekhiqiza inyama i-Frey’s Food Brands eyakhelene nemizi yabantu. Ukunuka kwalo - ngokusho kwamalungu omphakathi - kuqale ngamandla ngoMashi kuwo lo nyaka.UMnuz Lindokuhle Phakathi ohlala kuyo le ndawo ekhuluma neSolezwe, uthe leli damu libanika inkinga kakhulu.“Amatekisi awasafuni nokusishiya ngasemakhaya ethu ngenxa yokunuka kwedamu. Idamu uma ligeleza lihamba ngomfula obhukuda izingane, kuphinde kuphuze nemfuyo kuwo,” kusho uPhakathi.Uthe kunezitamkoko esezigeleza wona la manzi anephunga elinukayo eliqhamuka kuyo inkampani.“Izitamkoko zigudla imizi okugcina sekwenza iphunga liphethuke emagcekeni. Ebusuku ligcwala indlu uze ucabange ukuthi nawe usuzonele,” usho kanje.Uqhube wathi inkampani akukho ekwenzile ukuzama ukugwema lesi simo.“Sake sabona bebize inkampani ethize ukulungisa umonakalo kodwa kwangenzeka lutho.”UMnuz Sbonelo Goba yena uthe amanzi aqhamuka kuleli damu ahamba ngesitamkoko esigudla kwakhe okwenza iphunga lingabekezeleki.“Angisakwazi nokuthi ngibe nezivakashi ngenxa yephunga. Njalo ngihlalelwe ukuchaza ukuthi isimo esiphila ngaphansi kwaso sinjani. Ebusuku linuka ngale ndlela exakile kugcina sekungalaleki,” kusho uGoba.Ikhansela laku-ward-4, uMnuz Petros Nxumalo, lithe umphakathi walibikela ngalo lolu daba.“NgoMeyi 2024, ngathumela uMnyango wezeMvelo kumasipala ukuphenya. Baya kulo idamu base bethi bazoya ka-Frey’s benze nombiko,” kusho iKhansela uNxumalo.Okhulumela uMasipala weTheku, uNksz Gugu Sisilana, uthe babikelwa ngephunga elinukayo kule ndawo.“Ngesikhathi umasipala ethola isikhalo mayelana nephunga nokushintsha kombala kwamanzi, wathumela ithimba lezikhulu eminyangweni efanele okuhlanganisa noMnyango wezeMpilo ukuba liyohlola. Ngemuva kokuhlolwa, inkampani yaziswa ngokutholakele futhi kwavezwa izinyathelo ezidingekayo. Isitatimende esimayelana nezemvelo kanye nombiko osolwayo sisalandelwa wumnyango.” kusho uNksz Sisilana.Uqhube wathi inkampani iFrey’s Food Brands inemvume esemthethweni.“Imvume iFrey's Food Brands enayo igunyaziwe futhi inemibandela nemithetho okumele ithotshelwe.Uphiko lwezeppilo likuqaphile ukulandelwa kwemithethonqubo ebekiwe,” usho kanje.Imizamo yethu yokuthola okhulumela inkampani ayiphumelelanga. UNksz Aruna Khan oluleka le nkampani kwezomthetho uthe umphathi omkhulu usemhlanganweni, yena akekho esikhundleni sokukhuluma nabezindaba

AZOGWETSHWA ngo-Agasti nonyaka amadoda amabili abesebenzela uMasipala wesiFunda iHarry Gwala, alahlwe ngamacala enkohlakalo yokuholela izipoki.UMasipala wesiFunda iHarry Gwala uzinze e-Ixopo kanti ubuswa yi-ANC esiwuphathe isikhathi eside.Kuthiwa ibalelwa kuR733 700 imali okuthiwa yadliwa ngohlelo lokuholela izipoki.UThamsanqa Mazibuko (53), ulahlwe amacala okukhwabanisa angu-224 kanti uThembinkosi Mswazi  (56) walahlwa amacala angu-25 okukhwabanisa.Bebevele eNkantolo yamaCala eMali lapho begcine  bewavuma khona amacala abebebekwe wona yinkantolo, ebalahle ngawo wonke.Bobabili baboshwa emuva kwecala elavulwa ngo-2017 e-Ixopo lase lidluliselwa ethimbeni loKlebe elimuke nalo uthuli laze labagojela.Laba bobabili bebengaphandle ngebheyili abayithola emuva kokuthi beboshiwe ngo-2017.Isolezwe Ngempelasonto lithole ukuthi umkhuba wokuholela izipoki udla lubi komasipala.Kuthiwa kufakwa imininingwane ohlwini lwabaholayo kube sengathi abanye babasebenzi uma sekuphuma imali, idliwe ngabathile.Ibamba loMkhulumeli woKlebe KwaZulu-Natal, uWarrant Officer Sibu Ncane, uthe kube yintokozo ukuthi baluphothule lolu daba.Uthe lokhu kube wumsebenzi woKlebe abasebenzise ubuchule babo ukulandela lolu daba baze babagojela abamangalelwa.

KUYE ngamagama enkehli amaphoyisa ebopha abashayeli abaphule imithetho yomgwaqo namanye amacala.Abekade exwayisile amaphoyisa ngaphambi kwempelasonto yobumnandi eThekwini ukuthi zizolala zibaliwe izaphulamthetho emigwaqeni.Okhulumela amaphoyisa kaMasipala weTheku, uColonel Boysie Zungu, uthe kuboshwe abashayeli abangu-23 ngempelasonto.UZungu uthe amaphoyisa abekade enesivimbamgwaqo eCato Ridge lapho ebophe khona abantu abayisikhombisa abebeshayela bebukhile.“Abanye ababili baboshelwe ukutholakala nezibhamu ezingekho emthethweni,” kusho uZungu.Uqhube wathi ziwu-602 izigameko ezibikelwe amaphoyisa akwazile ukuthi  abhekane nazo.Amaphoyisa abikelwe nangezehlo zasemigwaqeni ezingu-128.UZungu uthe amaphoyisa akwazile ukuthola imoto eyodwa ebikade ibikwe ukuthi yebiwe.“Kuphinde kwabhekwana namacala angu-116 okuphulwa kwemithetho kamasipala,” kuchaza uZungu.Khonamanjalo, uZungu uthe abakwasidlodlo babophe abashayeli abangu-14 abebephuzile eHillcrest.Lokhu kwenzeke ngesikhathi kunesivimbamgwaoeqo kuleya ndawo.Kulaba ababoshiwe kukhona nomshayeli oyedwa wesifazane.Ngasekupheleni kwesonto elidlule, amaphoyisa akhiphe isixwayiso ethi bazoboshwa abantu abazoshayela bebukhile.Akhuthaze abashayeli bezimoto nabathandi bobumnandi ukuba bahloniphe imithetho yemigwaqo futhi bangashayeli bephuzile.Aveyeveze nokuthi kuzobe kuphithizela iphoyisa eThekwini futhi kube khona azobe etshalelwe ukuthi alawule ukuhamba kwezimoto ezize emjahweni wamahhashi eGreyville.Bekuphithizela iphoyisa emigwaqweni yaseThekwini, ezindaweni zobumnandi nasemabhishi ngempelasonto. Kwezinye izindawo abekade ehamba ngezinyawo eqaphe ubugebengu ikakhulukazi enkabeni yeTheku naseGreyville.

KUSUKE isidumo ehostela labesifazane iThokoza, eThekwini, ngesikhathi betholana phezulu namaphoyisa bebhikishela ukungabi nawo ugesi osekungenele eviki lesibili bengenawo. Laba besifazane bavuke umbhejazane bashisa amathayi, bebulala namabhodlela, baphinde bavala umgwaqo uYusuf Dadoo ngenxa yokunengwa yindaba kagesi neyenza babolelwe ukudla okugcinwa emafrijini.Kuphazamiseke izimoto kulo mgwaqo njengoba ugcine uvaliwe kungavunyelwe ukuthi izimoto zidlule, nabebebhikisha bezijikisa. Kugcine kufika amaphoyisa ophiko olubhekelele udlame emphakathini nakamasipala, kwafika nendiza enophephela emhlane ebilokhu indiza ngaphezu kwalapho bekubhikishwa khona. Amaphoyisa agcine ephoqeleke ukuthi asebenzise izinhlamvu zenjoloba ukuhlakaza isixuku sabesifazane abebengagayelwe mphako nokuholele ekukhalelweni ngamasongo kaSigonyela kwabesifazane abahlanu.Kulokhu kungqubuzana phakathi kwamaphoyisa nalaba besifazane, ababili badubulekile. Omunye udubuleke ehlombe kwathi omunye wadubuleka ezinqeni ngesikhathi amaphoyisa ehlakaza isixuku.Owesifazane obeyingxenye yombhikisho ongathandanga ukudalulwa, utshele Isolezwe  ukuthi sebeze baphelelwa nayimali yokuthenga ukudla ngenxa yokuthi ugesi abanawo.“Sekuphele izinsuku eziyisikhombisa ugesi singenawo, asidli ngenxa yokuthi ugesi asinawo. Yingakho sinqume ukungena emgwaqweni mhlawumbe izikhalo zethu zizozwakala uma senza kanje. Noma kunzima kodwa sizoyibamba ngoba wathinta abafazi wathinta imbokodo,” kusho lo wesifazane.USihlalo we-Economic Freedom Fighters (EFF) KwaZulu-Natal, uMongezi Thwala ekhuluma nabezindaba, uthe isimo abantu abahlala kuso emalokishini nalapha edolobheni asisihle.“Kuyacaca ukuthi ubuholi baseThekwini abusafuni ukunikeza abantu izimfuno nokulethwa kwezidingo. IMeya yeTheku uMxolisi Kaunda akafuni ukulalela abasebenzi abafuna izimfuno nabalwela amalungelo abo njengoba ecasha ngokuthi lesi siteleka asikho emthethweni. Njengeqembu le-EFF ngeke sithule sibukele abantu bakithi bephila ngaphansi kwalezi zimo. Sizophuma sime nabantu bakithi silwe nobuholi baseThekwini ukuqinisekisa ukuthi bayazithola izidingo njengoba bekhokha intela. Abantu bakithi bayayihlonipha imigomo ebekwe umasipala njengoba wona umasipala uhluleka ukuhlinzeka abantu ngamanzi, ugesi nokuhlanza iTheku.” kusho uThwala.Uthe abahambisani nobulelesi babantu abalimaza ingqalasizinda, amaphoyisa nomthetho awubhekane nabo. Uthe bazoma nabasebenzi ukuze imiholo yabo ilinganiswe neyabanye abasebenzi abasebenza komasipala abakhulu. Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLieutenant Colonel Nqobile Gwala, ukuqinisekile ukuthi abesifazane abahlanu baboshiwe kanti bavulelwe icala lokuphehla udlame emphakathini.“Icala lokuphehla udlame emphakathini liyaphenywa ngamaphoyisa ase-Durban Central emva kokuthi amalungu omphakathi abebhikisha eshise amathayi futhi aphonsa nezinto ebhekise emaphoyiseni. Kuboshwe abasolwa abahlanu ngecala lokuphehla udlame kanti bazovela enkantolo maduzane,” kusho uLieutenant Gwala.Ikhansela lendawo, uMnuz Ntando Khuzwayo, likhuluma neSolezwe  lithe imizamo yokuwulungisa ugesi iyaqhubeka."Okwamanje akukho engingakubika ngoba le ndawo efile yindawo kamasipala. Siqashe izinkontileka ezizimele ukuzama ukuwulungisa futhi nginesiqiniseko sokuthi namuhla (izolo) singase silale usukhanya," kusho uKhuzwayo.

BANIKWE izinsuku eziyishumi abasebenzi bakaMasipala weTheku abebesesitelekeni esingekho emthethweni ukuthi babeke izizathu eziqinile zokuthi kungani kufanele bangaxoshwa.Lokhu kuvezwe uNkk Gugu Sisilana esitatimendeni asithumelele abezindaba izolo.Ngokusho kwakhe, bangu-79 abasebenzi abanikwe izincwadi kanti basebenzela izinhlaka ezehlukene. Bazibandakanye esitelekeni esaqala ngoFebhuwari 27.Abasebenzi abebetelekile bafuna ukuthi umasipala ubaholele amaholo alingana nawalabo abasebenza imisebenzi efana neyabo abasebenza komasipala abasezingeni elilingana nowabo, benza isibonelo ngowaseKurhuleni.“Mayelana namaholo asesigabeni seshumi, kufanele kuqondwe ukuthi udaba lwamaholo ezisebenzi zikaMasipala weTheku lusadingidwa ezingeni likazwelonke,” kusho uNkk Sisilana.Uqhube wathi selokhu siqalile isiteleka kube khona ukusatshiswa kwabasebenzi okuholele ekutheni kuphazamiseke ukuhanjiswa kwezidingo ebantwini.Phakathi kwazo ubale amanzi, ukuqoqwa kukadoti kanjalo nokulungiswa kukagesi.Uthe ezigamekweni ezehlukene bekuba khona ukucekelwa phansi kwengqalasizinda yokuhanjiswa kwalezi zidingo.“Ngokusebenzisana nezinhlaka zamaphoyisa nabezokuphepha, umasipala uyaqhubeka nokuqinisekisa ukuthi isimo siyabuyiselwa kwesejwayelekile. Lokhu sikwenza nangokuthi uma kudingeka ukuthi kuyolungiswa endaweni ethile, kucelwe amaphoyisa ukuthi aphelezele abayokwenza lowo msebenzi. Sibala ukuhlanzwa kwemigwaqo, ukulungiswa kukagesi, amapayipi amanzi anqanyuliwe nokuqoqwa kukadoti,” kwenaba uNkk Sisilana.Uthe banxusa izakhamuzi ukuthi zingaqale ziwukhiphe udoti ziwubeke ngaphandle kuze kube ukuthi umasipala ukhipha isimemezelo sokuthi ziwukhiphe.“Siyaxolisa nakosomabhizinisi nakumalungu omphakathi akhahlanyezwe isiteleka, sicela ukuthi sibekezelelwe ngesikhathi silungisa umonakalo,” kusho yena.Usomabhizinisi wesifazane wakwaF KwaMashu, uNksz Thobile Dlamini, uthe lesi siteleka sishaye kwezwela ebhizinisini lakhe lokubhaka nokupheka.“Emizamweni yokwenza imadlana, ngiye ngithenge isitokwe kakhulu. Ukuhamba kukagesi, kushaye kwazwela kimina ngesitokwe engisigcina efrijini ngoba sonakale sonke, ngagcina ngingasasithengi esiningi ngenxa yokuhamba kukagesi okuqhubekayo,” kusho uNksz Dlamini.Uthe lokhu kuholele ekutheni bagcine bengasawathathi ama-oda ansuku zonke, nokubalahlekisele ngemali.

UPHIKO lwezokuShushisa kuleli lufuna icala lenkohlakalo elibhekene nobenguSomlomo wePhalamende, uNkk Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula, lidluliselwe eNkantolo eNkulu yasePitoli lapho lizoqulwa khona.INkantolo yeMantshi ePitoli, ilihlehlisele inyanga ezayo leli cala ukuze kutholakale usuku azovela ngalo enkantolo enkulu.Okhulumela lolu phiko, uMnuz Henry Mamothame, uthe icala likaNkk Mapisa-Nqakula lihlehliselwe uJulayi 9.Uthe okwamanje uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula nguyena kuphela osabhekene nezinsolo zenkohlakalo.Uthe egcina ukuvela ngo-Ephreli, uMbuso wawuthe uma esebuya kule nkantolo uzovela nabanye.“Ubufakazi obukhona abenele ukuthi singabeka amacala umsolwa wesibili. Sinobufakazi obuqanda ikhanda bokushushisa uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula,” kusho uMamothame. Uthe bafuna icala lidluliselwe enkantolo enkulu yasePitoli ngenxa yobucayi balo.Inkantolo ilulele uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula ibheyili yakhe kaR50 000.Ngokwemibandela yebheyili yakhe akavumelekile ukuthi axhumane nofakazi bombuso, nokuthi ahambise i-passport yakhe kubaphenyi.Ubhekene necala lokuthola intshontsho komunye wosomabhizinisi owayethole ithenda emnyangweni wezokuVikela ngesikhathi esaphethe lo mnyango.Libalelwa ku-R4.5 million intshontsho lezipho nezinye izinto azithola okuhlanganisa nemali enguR2.1 million.Umshushisi u-Advocate Bheki Manyathi, uthe banqume ukungambeki amacala obengumsolwa wesibili ngoba ubufakazi bethu bebunganele.Uthe bafuna leli cala lilalelwe enkantolo enkulu.“UNkk Mapisa-Nqakula uselibone lonke idokodo kanti sivumelene nethimba labameli bakhe ukuthi icala liye enkantolo enkulu. Zonke ezinye izicelo zizokwenzeka kule nkantolo,” kusho uManyathi.UNkk Mapisa-Nqakula ubhekene namacala angu-12 athinta inkohlakalo kanjalo nokushushumbisa imali.

SEBEBHEKE uMengameli uCyril Ramaphosa, asayine umthetho womshwalense wezempilo okhalisa abaningi, iNational Health Insurance (NHI) bese bemfaka enkantolo.Kunezinhlangano eseziphumele obala zathi zizokuphonsela inselelo enkantolo ukusayinwa kwalo mthetho.Umthetho uzosayinwa namhlanje, e-Union Buildings. Phakathi kwabaphikisa ukusayinwa komthetho kukhona izinhlangano zodokotela, ezamabhizinisi, izinyunyana nezepolitiki. Inhloso yomshwalense ukuthi zonke izakhamuzi zithole izinsiza zezempilo ezisezingeni eliphezulu, ukuxilongwa okuyikho nokwelashwa mahhala.Abaphikisana nawo bakhala ngokuthi umthetho uphambene nomthethosisekelo, bakhala nangokuthi imibono yezinhlaka ezithintekayo yashaywa indiva ngesikhathi kunezigcawu zasephalamende.Umholi weDA, uMnuz John Steenhuisen uthe abameli babo sebelinde ukuthi uRamaphosa asayine, bese befaka icala enkantolo.“Kade saqala ukulungiselela lo mzuzu. Abameli bethu sabatshela konke ezinyangeni ezimbalwa ezedlule. Bazofaka icala ngokushesha uma nje uRamaphosa eke wawusayina umthetho,” kusho uMnuz Steehuisen.Uthe isimemezelo sikaRamaphosa sesidale itwetwe kubantu abangazi ukuthi kuzokwenzakalani kuma-medical aid abo.Uthe uRamaphosa uzama ukuthola amavoti njengoba ukhetho selusemome, usebonile ukuthi bazohlulwa okhethweni, yingakho esegijima esayina lo mthetho.Ilungu le-ActionSA, uDkt Kgosi Letlape lithe ukusayinwa komthetho kuzokwenza ukuthi kubhubhudlwe imali njengoba kwenzeka ngesikhathi kubheduka ubhubhane i-corona.“Nakuba kunezinhloso ezinhle zokwenza abantu bathole ezempilo ezilinganayo, inkinga ukuthi indlela oyiyo lo mthetho, uzokwenza ukuthi kube nenkohlakalo esayibona ngesikhathi se-corona.“Iminyango kahulumeni isikhombise kaningi ukuthi iyehluleka ukuphatha ngendlela imali,” kusho uDkt LetlapeIsikhulu esiphezulu kwiBusa, uMnuz Cas Coovadia sithe umthetho awuhambisani nomthethosisekelo, sathi bazothatha izinyathelo zomthetho uma ugcina usayinwa.Uthe umthetho uzokhinyabeza ezempilo nomnotho. Ngokomthethosivivinyo ozosayinwa ube ngumthetho namhlanje, kudingeka imali ephakathi kuka-R200 -R700 billion ngonyaka.Inyunyana yabasebenzi, iPublic Service Association ithe akucaci kahle ukuthi imali yeNHI izovela kuphi ngaphandle kokuthi abasebenzi bazokhokha intela nokuyinto ezobathwalisa kanzima.Inhlangano emele abasebenzi bezempilo abangu-25 000, iSA Health Professionals Collaboration (SAHPC), ithe iziphakamiso abazenza kusukela ngo-2011, zishaywe indiva.Okhulumela iSAHPC uDkt Simon Strachan uthe bebefuna ukuthi uRamaphosa awuphindisele emuva umthetho, uyoxoxwa kabusha ephalamende.“Okwethu ukukhathazeka wukuthi sifisa iNHI ithuthukise uhlelo oluvele lukhona, ingalushonisi phansi,”kusho uDkt Strachan.

BADELE imvula ebilokhu iyishaya izikhawu eThekwini abathandi bengoma, beyobuka amaqembu ahlukene engoma abeshiyelana inkundla enkundleni yezemidlalo eCurries Fountein eThekwini njengoba bekuyiholidi kugujwa usuku lwamalungelo abantu.Lo mcimbi wengoma, iSishaya Ingoma Competition  ubuhlelwe iPlayhouse. Izithombe: Doctor Ngcobo/ Independent Media

BALULINDELE ngamehlo abomvu usuku lwangeSonto abesifazane abazogijima kwiComrades Marathon yanonyaka, ezosuka eThekwini iphele eMgungundlovu.UMabongi Zikalala (50) wakwaNdengezi, ogijimela iHollywood Athletic Club, utshele Isolezwe ukuthi kuzobe kuyiComrades yakhe ye-11. Usegabe ngenombolo eluhlaza enikezwa asebegijime imijaho ewu-10UMabongi, onguthisha esikoleni iZwelinjani Secondary eZwelibomvu, uthi waqala ukugijima iComrades Marathon ngo-2008, emuva kwalokho wajoveka futhi juthi akasayiboni impilo yakhe ngaphandle kwalo mjaho.Uthe ukugijima koweComrades akumdingi umuntu onyanyalatayo, kumele azimisele, ajime ngendlela efanele futhi azibophezele kwezokusubatha. Ubalule ukuthi kubalulekile ukudla izinto ezinomsoco owakha umzimba.Ugqugquzele abesifazane ukuthi bagijime, wathi ukube kuya ngaye ngabe abesifazane badlala lonke uhlobo lwemidlalo olukhona ngoba kuyasiza ukugcina ingqondo iphile kahle.UMabongi uthi waqoka iHollywood Athletic Club ngoba ubulungu bayo abumbi eqolo futhi babuye bagqugquzelwe ngemiklomelo ehlukene uma bephothule iComrades.Omunye wesifazane ongenele iComrades, nguMiliswa Zenzele (41) wasePort Edward, othi waqala ukugijima ngo-2015, enzela ukuchitha  isizungu.Ngaleso sikhathi wayegijima imijaho emincane yo-5km, kuya ko-10km. Kuthe ngo-2016 waqala wagijima imijaho yamabanga amade ngoba umdlalo ususegazini kuye.“Ngangizitshela ukuthi ngizongenela iComrades Marathon yokuqala ngo-2020 kodwa ngagcina ngingayingenanga ngenxa yeCovid-19. Ngenza umjaho wabo o-virtual, kuzobe kungeyokuqala lena. Ngijabule ukuthi ngizobe ngijima, ngike ngawugijima umzila esizohamba ngawo ngabona ukuthi ngikulungele ukugijima ngeSonto,” kuchaza uMiliswa.UMasibulele Mkhundlu (31), odume ngelika-Fit Masi The Runner ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, uthe uzobe egijima iComrades Marathon yesithathu futhi uselinde ukuthi kube yiSonto, ngendlela ajabule ngayo.Le ntokazi yaseNgqeleni, e-Eastern Cape, iqale ukugijima ngo-2018 ngamabanga amafushane yase ikhula yenza amabanga amade okubalwa o-45km kuya ko-70kms.Uthe wagijima iComrades Marathon yokuqala ngo-2022 wenza isikhathi esiwu-11:29, emuva kwalokho wenza eyesibili ngoba egqugquzelwa wukuthi uthola izindondo amabili. Kulo nyaka uzobe eqala ukugijima koweComrades Marathon esuka eThekwini, iye eMgungundlovu ebizwa nge-Up Run.Uthe abangani bakhe bathi yima bezombiza ngomgijimi weComrades Marathon ngoba uzobe esezazi izingqinamba zokunyuka izintaba ebheke eMgungundlovu.UMasibulele waziwa nangokuba yinxusa leComrades Marathon ngoba usebenzisana nayo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.Uthi selokhu aqala ukugijima isifiso sakhe kwakuwukungenela iComrades Marathon eyodwa kodwa akasakwazi ukuyeka. Ukhuthaze abafisa ukuyingenela ukuthi bajime, badle kahle ngoba akuwona umjaho ongawungenela ungajimanga kahle futhi ungadli ngendlela efanele.

BASALE bemangele emva kokuthi owesilisa ongumakhelwane egwaza ebulala ilungu lomndeni wabo esehlakalweni esenzeke KwaVimbukhalo, eNdwedwe, ngoMsombuluko.Kuthiwa uMnuz Siyabonga Blose (36) uphelele egcekeni emva kokugwazwa umsolwa inxeba elilodwa enhliziyweni.Ngokusho kukamamkhulu wakhe, uNkk Sebenzile Ximba, obekhona ngesikhathi umufi ehlaselwa, baqale bangazitshela ukuthi umsolwa uzombulala ngempela umufi njengoba ebesho.“Ngendlela imindeni yethu ekhonzene ngayo, singomakhelwane abasondelene kakhulu. Uma omunye nomunye enze izinkukhwana, asilenzi iphutha, siyahambelana,” kuchaza uNkk Ximba.Elandisa ngokwenzeke ngosuku lwesigameko, uthe umsolwa ufike wabuza umufi ukuthi uphi.“Uthe namuhla uzombulala, futhi ufuna ukumbulalela kubo,” kusho uNkk Ximba, othe bamtshela ukuthi umufi akekho, nakhona bengazitsheli ukuthi uqinisile.Uveze ukuthi kwaphinde kwafika nonina kamufi nodadewabo, bethi bazomkhuza ukuthi angayenzi into embi.“Umufi wafika kukhulunywa, wabuza ukuthi wezwa kuphathwa igama lakhe kwenzenjani, umsolwa wagxuma wahlala embuza ukuthi uyibulaleleni iselula yakhe. Akabange esakwazi ukuphendula ngoba uvele wamgwaza ngempela,” kusho yena.Uveze ukuthi umndeni wonke, okamsolwa nomphakathi umangele ngoba bebengayilindele into efana nale.Uthe emva kwesigameko bakhethe ukuthula, bayeke amaphoyisa asebenze.“Uboshiwe umsolwa. Siwumndeni sikhethe ukungathathi ngezinhliziyo,” kusho uNkk Ximba.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uConstable Thenjiswa Ngcobo, uthe amaphoyisa aseNsuze abophe owesilisa ngecala lokubulala umakhelwane.“Uvelile eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseNsuze, uzophinde avele ngoLwesithathu oluzayo esecela ibheyili. Umsolwa usagqunywe esitokisini,” kusho uConst Ngcobo.

UNGQONGQOSHE kaGesi, uDkt Kgosientsho Ramokgopa, uthi ukungacishwa kukagesi izinsuku zilandelana kumbule izinqe amaqembu ezepolitiki abesesizakele, esebenzisa lenkinga ukukhankasela ukhetho.URamokgopa uthe lamaqembu awasazi ukuthi akhankase ngokuthini njengoba sekuphele izinsuku eziningi ugesi ungacishwa.Uthe lamaqembu asekhethe ukuqamba amanga, athi ugesi awucishwa ngenxa yokuthi sekusondele ukhetho.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma nabezindaba izolo  lapho ebephawula ngezithinta ugesi.Ekuqaleni kwalonyaka nangonyaka owedlule izwe beliphuma lingena ngaphansi kwezigaba ezahlukene zokucishwa kukagesi.Muva nje isathule inkinga yokucishwa kukagesi njengoba sekuphele izinsuku ezingu-26 ungacishwa.Ukungacishwa kukagesi izinsuku eziningi zilandelana kwagcina ukwenzeka ngo-Ephreli 2022, lapho ungazange ucishwe izinsuku ezingu-28 zilandelana.Lesi simo sesiholele ekutheni inkukhu iwusole umgqakazo emaqenjini aphikisayo, asola ukuthi ugesi awucishwa ngenxa yokuthi sekusondele ukhetho.Abaholi bamaqembu aphikisayo abakhombise ukushaya amakhala, umholi we-IFP uMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa, uNobhala Jikelele we-EFF uMnuz Marshall Dlamini, nomholi weDA uMnuz John Steenhuisen.UHlabisa ucele abantu ukuthi bangayivoteli i-ANC okhethweni oluzayo noma ngabe ugesi uyaqhubeka nokungacishwa.Lokhu ukusho ngesikhathi ekhuluma emcimbini we-IFP obuKwaNongoma ngeSonto.UDlamini yena uthi ugesi uzoqhubeka nokucishwa emva kokhetho.Lokhu ukusho ngesikhathi ehola umbhikisho ngaphandle kwamahhovisi kaMasipala waseMsunduzi ngoLwesihlanu.Esitatatimendeni, uSteenhuisen uthe i-ANC ifaka ingcindezi yokuthi ungacishwa ugesi.Kepha uRamokgopa uthe ukungacishwa kukagesi akuhlangene nokhetho lwangoMeyi 29.URamokgopa uthe kukhona amaqembu ezepolitiki abese sizakele ngenkinga yokucishwa kukagesi.“Bebesebenzisa lenkinga ukukhankasela ukhetho. Ngoba-ke manje ugesi awusacishwa, abasenaso isikhali sokukhankasela ukhetho.“Yingakho sebehambe bekhuluma izinto ezingekho. Kukhona nje engikubone kubhalwe ngomunye wabo, ngihluleka ngisho nawukukuchaza,” kusho uRamokgopa.Uqhubeke ngokuthi ukungacishwa kukagesi izinsuku zilandelana kukhombisa ukuthi imizamo yabo yokulwa nalenkinga isiqalile ukuthela izithelo ezinhle.“Kade sawuqala lombhidlango. Sibhekane nobunzima endleleni nokuyinto engayisho ngesikhathi kumnyama kakhulu, ukuthi kukhona esizokuvuna ngokuhamba kwesikhathi. Sesiqalile-ke ukuvuna,” esho.URamokgopa uthe sebeyayinqoba inkinga yokucishwa kukagesi, yize ingakapheli kodwa usukhona umehluko.Uphethe ngokuthi usemncane umehluko kodwa okubaqinisa idolo wukuthi uyabonakala.

UKUGABA ngokudla kwesintu okwehlukile nokuyintandokazi kubantu ababavakashelayo, sekuthele izithelo kwabendawo yokudlela eseMhlanga, eThekwini, iMushroom Lounge, bamenywa ukuyoshaya ibhodwe isonto lonke e-USA.Abale ndawo yokudlela efike kwezwakala ngoMashi nonyaka ngokudla, endaweni egcwele izindawo zokudlela ezidayisa ukudla okujwayelekile emgwaqweni uChartwell Drive, bazoya koshaya ibhodwe e-USA ngoSepthemba 22 kuya ku-26.Umnikazi wale ndawo enedumela nakosaziwayo, uMnuz Sibongiseni Mbambo, uthe ukumenywa kwabo e-USA kudalwe wukufika kwezivakashi zase-USA, ezazize kwiResurgence Conference, ebiseThekwini ngoJulayi nonyaka.Uthe kwathi kusaqhubeka ingqungquthela, ingxenye yazo yafika endaweni yakhe ihamba nemenenja kaMasipala weTheku uMnuz Musa Mbhele nephini leMeya yeTheku uNksz Zandile Myeni.“Sikholwa wukuthi bayithanda kakhulu indawo yethu nohlobo lokudla esikudayisayo, nokho besingakulindele nhlobo lokhu ngoba sisebasha kule ndima futhi asikahlanganisi ngisho unyaka siqalile ukusebenza lapha.“Ngiswele amaphiko okundiza ukukhombisa ukuthi sijabule kangakanani ngaleli thuba, esibona lizosisiza kakhulu ukubeka indawo yethu ebalazweni ngomsebenzi esiwenzayo,” usho kanje.Uthe kuzohamba abapheki bakhe bayophekela abantu base-USA, uthe ithuba lizovula iminyango eminingi futhi liyisiqalo sezinto ezinhle ezinkulu azozenza ngaleli bhizinisi.“Kumanje sekuvele kunabantu abangithintayo koKapa naseGoli becela ngizovula izindawo zokudlela ezifuze lena khona, okukhombisa ukuthi umsebenzi wethu omuhle uyabonakala, nokwenza sikhuthalele ukusebenza kanzima,” kusho uMbambo.Ubonge neSilo uMisuzulu KaZwelithini, oseke wafika kule ndawo, wamupha izibusiso.

USASHAQEKILE umndeni wowesilisa oboshelwe icala lokubulala uninakhulu, maqede washumpula ikhanda waligenda njengebhola endlini.UMnuz Thabo Ntokozo Nzimande (31) uthweswe icala lokubulala uNkk Beatrice de Lange oneminyaka engu-80, ngoLwesihlanu.UNzimande uvele eNkantolo yeMantshi yasePinetown ngoMsombuluko ngecala lokubulala okuhleliwe. Icala lihlehlele uJuni 27 ukuze umsolwa aphinde ahlolwe wudokotela isimo sakhe sengqondo.Amaphepha oMbuso, ombiko kadokotela wengqondo ohlole uNzimande ngoMsombuluko ngaphambi kokuthi avele enkantolo, aveza ukuthi umsolwa unesifo esiphazamisa indlela yokusebenza komqondo, i-bipolar.Kula maphepha, udokotela uthi uNzimande akakulungele ukubhekana naleli cala ngenxa yesimo sakhe sengqondo.“Akakwazi ukunikeza incazelo ukuthi yini eyenzeka, akasikhumbuli nhlobo isigameko. Unomlando wokusebenzisa izidakamizwa. Ubesebenzisa imishanguzo yokuthithibalisa isifo anaso. Usengeniswe kathathu esikhungweni esisiza abanenkinga yezidakamizwa,” kusho udokotela embikweni.Umthombo osondelene nalolu daba uthe uNzimande utholakale egenda ikhanda lesidumbu sikamufi wase ekhalelwa amasongo kaSigonyela.Isihlobo sikamufi, ebesizwakala ocingweni ukuthi sikhungathekile, sithe bewumndeni kabathandi ukuphawula ngomshophi obehlele.Sivumile ukuthi senzekile isigameko, sathi umsolwa ubengazikhombisi izimpawu zokuba wumuntu onobungozi ngaphambi kokuthi kwenzeke le nkilayitheka.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa abizelwa emzini osePinetown afica owesilisa owayegqoke izimpahla ezigcwele igazi.“Isidumbu sikamufi, esasingenalo ikhanda, satholakala egunjini lokulala. Ikhanda latholwa egunjini lokuphumula,” kusho uNetshiunda.Uqhube wathi amaphoyisa abe esethola ukuthi umsolwa ushumpule ikhanda likaninakhulu ngocelemba.Okhulumela uMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mhlaba Memela, uthe sibaphathe kabi lesi sigameko sokubulawa kwesaguga.UMemela udlulise amazwi enduduzo emndenini ngokushona kwesalukazi.“Umphakathi kumele uzithathele phezulu izifo eziphathelene nengqondo futhi kuliwe nesihlava sokusetshenziswa budedengu kwezidakamizwa ezibukeka ziqeda intsha,” kusho uMemela.

Ihhovisi likaNdunankulu waseKZN lithi nakanjani liyoshona elanamuhla esegcotshiwe ngokuphelele ozohola uhulumeni wesifundazwe.Okhulumela uhulumeni wesifundazwe, uMnuz Bongi Gwala, uthe konke sekumi ngomumo, sebephothule wonke amalungiselelo. UGwala ubekhuluma ephuma emhlanganweni nabezokuphepha. Kulindelekele ukuthi uMnuz Thami Ntuli agcotshwe njengoNdunankulu wesifundazwe emcimbini ozoba senkundleni iWoodburn, eMgungundlovu.“Konke sekumi ngomumo sikhona nje la endaweni yomcimbi ingqalasizinda ikhona, abezokuphepha bakhona nabobonke abasebenzi bakahulumeni benza umsebenzi wabo ngendlela,’’ kusho uGwala.UNtuli ungena ezinyathelweni zikaNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube obe nguNdunankulu wokuqala wesifazane ukuphatha isifundazwe iKZN. UGwala uthe kulindeleke ukuthi uNdunankulu afungiswe, uma eqeda sekuyoba kuyena ukuthi wenzanjani maqondana nokuqokwa kwabaphathiswa esifundazweni.UGwala uthe uhulumeni umeme izicukuthwane ezehlukene ezizothamela lo mcimbi futhi noNdunankulu uyazimemela ngokwakhe ngoba kusuke kuwusuku lwakhe.UNtuli onguSihlalo we-IFP eKZN ukhethelwe kwesikaNdunankulu ngoLwesihlanu emcimbini weSishayamthetho ebesihlala okokuqala emuva kokhetho.UNtuli udabuka eVumanhlamvu, eNkandla, kanti uke waba yimeya yakhona. Ukhethwa nje, kade eseyimeya kaMasipala wesiFunda iKing Cetshwayo eRichards Bay.UNtuli uqokwe yi-IFP ngaphambi kokhetho yathi wuyena ezogadla ngaye kwesikaNdunankulu wesifundazwe. I-IFP ingene kuhulumeni wobumbano ne-ANC,DA neNFP.I-IFP ingene ngezihlalo ezingu-15 yalandelwa yi-ANC ngezingu-14  kulandele i-DA ngezihlao ezingu-11. I-NFP yona ithole isihlalo esisodwa okuyisona esinqume ngohulumeni wesifundazwe.I-MK ne-EFF bazithole besele ngaphandle ngesikhathi kubunjwa uhulumeni wesifundazwe. I-MK yiyona enezihlalo eziningi ezingu-37 bese i-EFF iba nezimbili.I-ANC ebiphethe uhulumeni yehluleke yancama wukubuyela emandleni esifundazweni njengoba ilahlekelwe amavoti amaningi okhethweni obelushubile.

UTHWALE kanzima evika zimnetha okhulumela i-DA kuzwelonke, uMnuz Solly Malatsi, ngesikhathi bejijimeza ngesikhangiso sokushiswa kwefulegi lezwe. UMalatsi ubeyingxenye yezihambeli ebezithamele inkulumompikiswano yokhetho e-Unisa ophikweni lwayo eMeckleneuk, ePitoli.Inkulumompikiswano iyingxenye yezingxoxo ezihlose ukuqinisekisa ukuthi kunomuzwa wokhetho olulindwe ngabomvu oluzoba ngoMeyi 29.UMalatsi uqale wajijimezwa ngumphathi wohlelo uSolwazi uJJ Tabane, emnika ithuba lokubeka amazwi okuvula. UTabane uthe uMalatsi akachaze ngodaba lokushiswa kwefulegi, kwacaca ukuthi umdudulele esizibeni esinengwenya.Muva nje, kusuke uthuli lwezichwe ezweni emuva kokuthi i-DA ikhiphe isikhangiso sokhetho lapho kushiswa ifulegi lezwe. Isikhangiso bekufanele singene kuthelevishini kodwa sachithwa. UMalatsi uhlangabezane nezimbila zithutha ngodaba.UMalatsi uncome uTabane ngokuthinta udaba kodwa kwabonakala ukuthi luvukuze abaningi abebethamele. Kube nokuhhomuzela kwezitshudeni ebezigcwele zithamele inkulumompikiswano. UMalatsi ugcine esethi kwakuyisingathekiso nje, babengaqondile okubi.“Kwakuyinto nje yokwenza umzekelo. Ngiyacela JJ ungaholeli abantu ophathe ufundile kakhulu uyakwazi ukuqonda kabanzi lolu daba. Bekuyindlela yokuzwakalisa isikhalo ngokuphathwa kwezwe,’’ kusho uMalatsi ezama ukuphesha.UTabane akagudlukanga, umphoqile ukuthi achaze kabanzi emsola ngokugwegwesa kakhulu esikhundleni sokuhlala odabeni. UTabane uthe uMalatsi kufanele achaze ukuthi i-DA isamile yini ekutheni ifulegi bekufanele lishiswe.USolwazi Tabane uqhubekile ejijimeza uMalatsi embuza ukuthi kungani into ehlangisa izwe njengefulegi bengayihloniphi beyiDA. UMalatsi uthe esanake lokho kwangena esinye isihambeli samjijimeza.Okhulumela i-ANC kuzwelonke uNkk Mahlengi Bhengu-Motsiri, ukhwele wadilika kuMalatsi neDA yakhe ngolwefulegi. “Kwamanye amazwe ukushisa ifulegi kuyicala elibomvu ungagqunywa ejele. I-DA nje into eyaziyo wukuphikisa imigomo yoguquko. Uboke ubuke nalapho iphethe khona nje, ichitha yonke imigomo evuna abamnyama,’’ kusho uNkk Motsiri.Amanye amaqembu abekhona bekuyiBOSA, EFF neRise Mzansi abebemelwe ngabaholi bawo.

BATUSA ubuhlakani bukaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, bokuvala imilomo yabaholi bamaqembu ahlukene, nokubabekela ugibe lokuthi bazikhunge bona eminyangweni ehlukene abajube kuyona.Sisesikhulu isikhalo ngesibalo seKhabhinethi entsha, edidiyele amaqembu angu-11 akuhulumeni wobumbano njengoba inamalungu angu-75. Ongqongqoshe bangu-32 kuthi amaphini ongqongqoshe abengu-43.Abavoti yibona abakhonjwa ngenjumbane ngokuthi ukube bavotele iqembu elilodwa eliphethe uhulumeni, ngabe sincishisiwe isibalo seKhabhinethi ngoba izodla ngaphezu kukaR1 billion ngonyaka. Umhlaziyi wezepolitiki eNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Zakhele Ndlovu, uncome uRamaphosa ngokujuba abaholi bamaqembu eminyangweni abebehlale bekhalaza ngayo bengakabi yingxenye kahulumeni.Ufake umholi we-DA uMnuz John Steenhuisen emnyangweni wezoLimo, oweFreedom Front Plus uDkt Pieter Groenewald emnyangweni wezokuHlunyeleliswa kweziMilo, umholi we-PAC uMnuz Mzwanele Nyhontso umjube emnyangweni wezoMhlaba nokuThuthukiswa kweziNdawo zaseMakhaya, kwathi umholi we-IFP uMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa wamthuma emnyangweni wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu. Umholi wePatriotic Alliance uMnuz Gayton McKenzie umfake emnyangweni wezeMidlalo.Ujube nePhini likamengameli we-IFP Inkosi Mzamo Buthelezi, emnyangweni weziSebenzi zikaHulumeni nokuPhatha, kwathi uNksz Siviwe Gwarube obenguSotswebhu we-DA ePhalamende wamjuba emnyangweni weMfundo eyisiSekelo.Umholi we-UDM uGeneral Bantu Holomisa ujutshwe njengePhini likaNgqongqoshe emnyangweni wezokuVikela.Kuyaziwa ukuthi i-DA ibihlale igxeka uhulumeni ngezithinta ezemfundo, kusuka odabeni lwezinkinga zezindlu zangasese zemigodi ezikoleni, abafundi abangakuqondi abakufundayo, izinga eliphezulu labafundi abashiya phakathi isikole nezinye.  Kwezolimo leli qembu lihlale likhala ngokuthi kumele kubhekelelwe abalimi.IPAC isekhaleni lokuthi umhlaba ubuyiswe ngaphandle kwesinxephezelo kanti i-FF Plus, yona ike yaphakamisa ukuthi kubuyiswe isigwebo sentambo kuleli.UNdlovu uthe:“Ubacuphele umgoga abaholi ngokuthi abafake eminyangweni enezinselelo. Ngeke bakhale kumuntu uma sebengenzi mehluko ngoba abazokwazi ukwenza noma yikanjani eminyangweni abayiphethe,” kusho uNdlovu.UNdlovu uthe ongqongqoshe bamaqembu ahlukene akaboni kukhona imigomo yamaqembu abo, abazoyiphusha kuhulumeni wobumbano.“Imigomo ezolandelwa izohlanganisa uhulumeni wobumbano, hhayi iqembu elilodwa. Ngakho akukho okuzobe kuphuma emaqenjini esingakubona kuphuma eminyangweni ephethwe abanye ongqongqoshe okungebona abe-ANC,” kuqhuba uNdlovu.UNgqongqoshe ehhovisi likamengameli uNksz Khumbudzo Ntshavheni, useyalele ozakwabo kwiKhabhinethi ukuthi babambe amatomu, bangaphefumuli ngezinto abazozenza eminyangweni yabo ngoba umkhombandlela ozolandelwa uzokhishwa nguRamaphosa.Le migomo izokhishwa ngelizayo emhlanganweni weKhabhinethi Lekgotla, ohlanganisa bonke ongqongqoshe, amaphini abo nabaqondisi jikelele.Emuva komhlangano uRamaphosa uzokwenekela izwe ngomkhombandlela ozolandelwa nguhulumeni kule minyaka emihlanu ezayo uma sekuvulwa ngokusemthethweni iPhalamende.Kuzocashunwa imigomo yamaqembu ahlukene ayingxenye yohulumeni wobumbano, ezoyisa izwe phambili futhi ehambisana nemigomo yokuthuthukisa izwe, iNational Development Plan (NDP). “Alikho iqembu okuzothi uma sekuphasiswe le migomo bese kuba elayo. Kuzoba ekahulumeni, ihlanganise wonke amaqembu angu-11 ayingxenye kahulumeni. Lokhu kusho ukuthi akekho ungqongqoshe ozophusha imigomo yeqembu lakhe kodwa imigomo ezophushwa ngekahulumeni,” kuchaza uNksz Ntshavheni.Uveze ukuthi amaqembu ayingxenye kahulumeni wobumbano, uma esevumelene ngemigomo ngeke esakwazi ukuyigxeka.“Amaqembu aphikisayo yiMK ne-EFF kanjalo namanye angekho kuhulumeni wobumbano. Amaqembu akuhulumeni wobumbano, yiwona aphethe uhulumeni.”Mayelana nabakhala ngokwanda kwesibalo seKhabhinethi ekubeni bekunezinhlelo zokuyinciphisa, uNksz Ntshavheni, uthe abavoti yibona abadale lesi simo.“Ukube abavoti bavotela iqembu elilodwa ukuba libuse uhulumeni, ngabe ayibanga khona le nkinga. URamaphosa wayehlele ukunciphisa isibalo seKhabhinethi kodwa ngenxa yokuthi iqembu lakhe alitholanga amavoti enele okuthi akwazi ukwenza lokhu, leli phupho alizange lifezeke.” Kukhona nalabo abangaboni lo hulumeni wobumbano kuphela ihlandla lawo ngo-2029, usabumbene. UNobhala jikelele we-ANC uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, uthe abanankinga nabazophuma kulo hulumeni.“Silindele ukuthi kukhona abazophuma kodwa kukhona abazongena babe yingxenye kahulumeni omusha. Abahambe abahambayo, sizosala siyincenga,” kugcizelela uMbalula.

INKULUMO yeSilo uMisuzulu Sinqobile kaZwelithini iwashiye ekhuluma ngezwi elilodwa amaqembu abangayo esiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal.Amaqembu ameleleke esiShayamthetho ancome inkulumo yeSilo, athi ithinte amaphuzu asemqoka.INdlulamithi yamakhosi yethule inkulumo yokuvula isiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal izolo, lapho ikhulume khona ngobugebengu, inhlupheko, ezokuvakasha nokunye.UNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, ongusihlalo we-IFP esifundazweni, uMnuz Thami Ntuli uthe bazohlale bezihlonipha iziyalo zoNgangazwe lakhe.“Bayede, kuyasithokozisa ukuthi ngaso sonke isikhathi uma kuvulwa isiShayamthetho iSilo sibeka eceleni esisuke sikwenza, size sizokhuluma nathi. ISilo siwuphawu lokuthula noxolo. Yingakho kusijabulisa ukuba iSilo sibe phakathi kwethu. Njengamalungu esiShayamthetho sizimisele ukulandela iziyalo zoNgangazwe.”UNtuli uthe nabo iyabakhathaza eyobugebengu obudlangile, okungelinye lamaphuzu iSilo esigxile kakhulu kuwo ngesikhathi sethula inkulumo.“Sixoxile kakhulu ngale ndaba ngesikhathi kunomhlangano weKhabhinethi, iLekgotla. Sizosebenzisana namaphoyisa ukuqhamuka namasu okubhekana nale nkinga. Njengoba sizokuba nengqungquthela yokubhunga ngobugebengu, sizoxoxa ngokuvikelwa koNdabezitha namakhansela.”UMphathiswa wezokuThutha, ongusihlalo we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Siboniso Duma, uthe nakuba inkulumo yeSilo ibe mfishane, ikwazile ukuthinta zonke izihloko ezisemqoka.“Kusijabulisile ukuthi iSilo sithinte konke okubalulekile. Manje kufanele abantu baKwaZulu-Natal babumbane ukuze kuzofezeka izifiso zeSilo.”UMphathiswa wezeZimali, ongumholi we-DA KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Francois Rodgers, uthe kubajabulisile ukuzwa iSilo sikhuluma ngezokuvakasha.“Ngicabanga ukuthi sithe ukulala kancane lapha KwaZulu-Natal uma kuziwa kwezokuvakasha. Kufanele engabe sisebenzisa ukuba nomlando ocebile njengesifundazwe ukuheha abavakashi. Lena yinto engizoyigqugquzela emihlanganweni yeKhabhinethi ukuba siyenze.”Okhulumela i-MK esiShayamthetho, uMnuz Emacous Mbatha, uthe njengeqembu elihlonipha ubukhosi, bazosebenzisana neNdlulamithi ukuxazulula izinkinga ezibhekene nesifundazwe.“Izinto ezibalulwe oNgangazwe lakhe zidinga ukuthi wonke amaqembu asebenze ndawonye. Kuyajabulisa ukuthi kulo hulumeni omusha uqhubeke umkhuba wokuthi iSilo sinikwe ithuba lokuthi sikhulume nathi. Njenge-MK siyabuhlonipha ubukhosi, yingakho lapha esiShayamthetho siholwa yinkosi (Phathisizwe) Chiliza.”Namhlanje uNtuli uzokwethula umhlahlandlela wesifundazwe, khona esiShayamthetho sesifundazwe.

BAFUNA lusukunyelwe phezulu abazali olwabafundi abafuna ngoshova o-R100 okuyimali yokuvikela abanye esikoleni iMsebe Primary eMlaza, kwa-H.Lokhu kudalulwe ngomunye wabo, uMnuz Sithembiso Lamjola, kulandela ukuya kwabo kulesi sikole izolo, beyofuna izimpendulo.Elandisa, uLamjola uthe uthole ngempelasonto ngokwenzeka kulesi sikole, ehlangana nomzali wengane efunda khona.“Uthe ukhathazekile ngengane yakhe ethi ayisafuni ukuphinde ilubhade esikoleni ngoba ikhathele ukukhokha imali yokuvikelwa,” kusho uLamjola.Uveze ukuthi uthe uma esenza olwakhe uphenyo endaweni, wathola ukuthi ziningi ezikhala esifanayo.Uthe bathole ukuthi sekunesikhathi iqeqebana labafundi abafunda uGrade 6 no-7 kulesi sikole abazibiza ngeQwabe Protection, befuna imali kubafundi abafunda amabanga angaphansi kwawabo.“Kuthiwa babeka isamba sika-R100 ukuthi umfundi ngamunye akasikhokhe. Kuvela ukuthi babeka umthetho othi umfundi ngamunye angakhokha phakathi kuka-R1 kuya ku-R5 nsuku zonke ukwehlisa isikweletu sakhe sika-R100 aze asiqede,” kusho uLamjola.Uthe abafundi abakhala ngokuthi abanayo le mali, baphila impilo yokushawa ngezimpama zonke izinsuku yileli qeqebana “labavikeli”.Uthe engxogxweni ababe nayo nothishanhloko wesikole, bathole ukuthi isikole siyazi ngodaba kodwa akukho zinyathelo ezitheni esesizithathile.“Sikhonjiswe uhlu lwaleli qeqebana elenza lo mkhuba, satshelwa ukuthi bake bashawa, kodwa kwangabe kusaba khona okunye okwenziwayo ngabo,” kusho uLamjola.Udalule nokuthi abafundi abakwaziyo ukukhokha le mali yokuvikelwa yiqeqebana libasabisa ngokuthi uma bebika kothisha noma kubazali, bazophela yinduku.Uthe isimo sesiphumile esandleni njengoba sekukhona abafundi bezikole ezingomakhelwane, abalinda leli qeqebana ngaphandle kwesikole.Uveze nokuthi sebekhona nabanye abazali abaqhinqa ngaphandle kwesikole ukuzobheka “amabhoklolo” ahlukumeza izingane zabo.“Sifuna ilungiswe masinyane le nto ingaze yonakale kakhulu. Asinazo izingane ezizoyeka isikole ngenxa yeqeqebana labavikeli futhi asiludingi udweshu oluzosuka ngaphandle kwesikole ngenxa yale nto,” kubhoka uLamjola.Uthe bafune umhlangano ophuthumayo nesigungu esilawula isikole, iSchool Governing Body (SGB), ukuze ichaze ukuthi yini isikole esiyenzayo ukulwa nesihlava?Uthe sebelubikile udaba nakumphathi wesiteshi samaphoyisa endaweni, ukuze amaphoyisa angenelele ngokubheka ukuthi imali eqoqwa iqeqebana kubafundi liyayidla lona noma kukhona abantu abadala abangaphandle kwesikole eliyisa kubo.Usihlalo weSGB, uMnuz Zakhele Khumalo, uthe akulona iqiniso ukuthi kunenkinga efana nale esikoleni, wathi lokhu okushiwoyo, yinto nje esetshenziswa amaqembu epolitiki afuna ukuzitholela amaphuzu emphakathini.Uthe ukube kukhona into efana nale esikoleni ngabe sebeyazi ngayo njengoba abafundi nabo abazali bevulelekile ukubika ngezinto ezingahambi kahle esikoleni.Uvumile ukuthi kukhona isigameko lapho kuke kwaba khona abafundi abayishumi nanye, ababelindwe ngabanye ngaphandle kwesango lesikole.“Sathola ukuthi ingxabano yayisuswe ukulwa kwababili  ngempelasonto ngakubo. Yase ingenelelwa abangani bangaphandle, abazoqhinqa ngaphandle kwesikole,” kusho uKunene, othe babiza amaphoyisa ukuzolekelela abangaphakathi ukuthi bagoduke bephephile.Uveze nokuthi bakhipha isexwayiso esiqinile kulaba abangaphakathi ukuthi uma kuke kwezwakala ukuthi balwile, bazoxoshwa esikoleni.Uvumile ukuthi uhlu lwabafundi luzibiza ngeQwabe Brothers, kodwa uma bebuzwa ngaleli gama, bavele bashona le nale.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Muzi Mahlambi uthe bazothumela imenenja yesekethe ukuthi iyolubheka lolu daba.“Sizocela isikole sisebenzisane nabazali. Ngeke sikubekezelele ukuhlushwa kwabafundi ngabanye ezikoleni zethu ngoba kufanele zibe yizindawo eziphephile,” kusho uMahlambi.

UMNDENI wowesilisa okuthiwa wadutshulwa wabulawa yiphoyisa ngoba encike emotweni yalo eMolweni, eThekwini, ukhala “ngokucanasa’’ kwalo.Umufi uMnuz Qaphela Mdima wadutshulwa ngaphandle kwendawo yobumnandi i-Casablanca Lifestyle, ngoNovemba 2022.Kwaboshwa uSergeant Sibonelo Christopher Shabangu ongumsolwa wadedelwa ngebheyili ka-R5 000.Selihlehle izikhawu ezintathu icala sekumele uShabangu ethule ubufakazi eNkantolo yesiFunda ePinetown, ngokwenzeka.Lokhu sekunenge umndeni kamufi okhala ngokuthi akucaci nanezizathu zokuthi yini ebambezela ukuthi kuqhutshekelwe phambili necala.Umfowabo kamufi, uMnuz Qiniso Mdima, uthe sekuqala ukubakhathaza lokhu.“Sekuyophela unyaka wesibili umfowethu abulawa nguShabangu kodwa yena uyazicanisela nje wanikezwa nebheyili. Thina sizwa ubuhlungu bokuthi sashonelwa, nokumbona kwethu (uShabangu) enkantolo kuvusa amanxeba ngoba namanje asazi wambulalelani,’’ usho kanje.Ukhuluma kanjena nje, uthe ufike kule nkantolo ezolalela icala kodwa watshelwa ukuthi lahlehliswa bona bewumndeni bengazi.Uthe uthole esesenkantolo ukuthi icala lihlehlele u-Okthoba 8 no-9 enkantolo efanayo.“Ukuya enkantolo kungenzeki lutho kubonakala sengathi wukuhlehlela emuva ngoba bese sithi silindele isiphetho secala. Nethemba liya ngokushabalala ukuthi ubulungiswa siyobuthola ekubeni sibubheke ngabomvu,’’ echaza.Uveze ukuthi izingane zikamufi ezinhlanu zidonsa kanzima kusukela ahamba emhlabeni.UMbuso sewaluphothula uhlelo lwawo lokubiza ofakazi, izintambo waziphonsa kuMnuz Andile Dkela ongummeli kaShabangu.

BAZOYIKHOTHA imbenge yomile abasabisa ngodlame, abavala imigwaqo, abacekela phansi ingqalasizinda, abasabalalisa izinto ezigqugquzela udlambedlu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana nolwazi olungelona ngokhetho lukazwelonke olungenyanga ezayo.Lesi sexwayiso sikhishwe yithimba longqongqoshe ababhekelele ukuphepha njengoba ngoMeyi 29, kuzovotwa okhethweni lukazwelonke nolwezifundazwe.UNgqongqoshe wezokuVikela uNksz Thandi Modise, uxwayise ngokuthi bazoboshwa abazophazamisa ukhetho nabazophambana nomthetho ngokucindezela  ilungelo labantu bakuleli.Uveze ukuthi abantu banelungelo lokukhululeka, ukuphepha nokuthi amalungelo abo angacindezelwa.“Abazophambana nemigomo ebekiwe ngalesi sikhathi bangazithola sebegwetshwa iminyaka engu-30 bebhadla ejele. Sinxusa umphakathi ukuthi ungalusabalalisi ulwazi ongenabo ubuqiniso ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngoba bazoba senkingeni. “Nalabo abahlose ukudida abavoti bazoba senkingeni,” kusho uNksz Modise esithangamini sabezindaba ePitoli, izolo. Uthe amaphoyisa azobafuna aze abathole labo abacabanga ukuthi bazosabalalisa izinto becasha ngezinkundla zokuxhumana.Unxuse nabaholi bamaqembu ngokuqaphela abakushoyo, bangakhulumi izinto ezizokwenza kube nabaphula umthetho.Umphakathi unelungelo lokuthi ubhikishe kodwa lokho kumele ukwenze ngokuthula, kungacindezelwa ilungelo labanye..Uveze ukuthi uhlaka iNATJOINTS, lizobhekana ngqo nanoma yiluphi udlame olungase luqubuke. “Sizoqapha izikhungo nengqalasizinda ebalulekile yokuvota nanoma iyiphi enye izigebengu ezingadlalela kuyona. “Umphakathi awubike noma yimaphi amacala athinta ukhetho noma udlame eziteshini zamaphoyisa noma emahhovisi ekhomishini yezoKhetho,” esho. UNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa uMnuz Bheki Cele uveze ukuthi zingu-500 izikhungo zokuvota abazoziqapha ngelokhozi.Uthe lezi ziteshi zisabalele ezifundazweni ezahlukene okubalwa iKwaZulu-Natal, Mpumalanga nakwezinye izindawo.UCele uthe basebenzisana neKhomishini yezoKhetho eziteshini zokuvota ezingu-23 700. “Sizoqapha yonke indawo bese sigxila kulezi ezingu-500 ngenxa yokuthi yizona ezingaba nezinto ezingenzeka. Abazophambana nomthetho ngeke sinanaze ukubavalela. “Abantu banelungelo lokubhikisha kodwa lokhu kumele bakwenze belandela umthetho,” kuqhuba uCele Uthe ngeke aziveze izibalo zamaphoyisa azojutshwa kodwa zonke izikhungo zizoba namaphoyisa.“Engingakusho wukuthi azobe enele amaphoyisa azojutshwa. Sifuna abantu bakhululeke ngosuku lokuvota ngoba akukho okubi okuzokwenzeka,” kuqhuba uNdosi. Uzwakalise ukukhathazeka ngokubulawa kwamaphoyisa wathi banethimba eliphenya lezi zehlakalo, elinye lizogxila nakwezinye izifundazwe njengoba lesi sihlava sande eKZN.UNksz Modise uthe iminyango ehlukene okubalwa owezobuLungiswa, amaphoyisa nophiko lwezokuShushisa, inohlelo lokusheshisa amacala athinta ukhetho njengoba abashushisi bemi ngomumo.Ubalule nokuthi isikhungo esibhekele izinhlekelele kuleli simi ngomumo ukusiza ezindaweni okungase kuqubuke kuzona isimo esingesihle sezulu.“Lesi sikhungo sisebenzisana nohlaka olubhekele lesi simo ukuze kusheshe kuhlonzwe uma kungase kudaleke inhlekelele. Amathimba azosebenza ubusuku nemini eqaphile,” kuphetha uModise.

BALENGELA eweni lokuba bahlakazwe omasipala abangasebenzi kuqalwe phansi kuvotwe ukuze kukhethwe ubuholi obusha.UMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu uthe ngeke abantu balinde ukhetho lwamakhansela ngo-2026 ekubeni izinto zibheda manje.Lo mnyango, oholwa nguMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa, uthe uwutholile umbiko ebuholini bawo obudala mayelana nesimo somasipala ezweni.UHlabisa uthe uhulumeni wasekhaya (umasipala) ubalulekile ngoba yiwona ohlinzeka abantu ngezidingongqangi futhi uthuthukise imiphakathi.Uthe bawu-257 sebebonke omasipala eNingizimu Afrika futhi kulindeleke bayisebenzise ekwenzeni izidingo zomphakathi imali abasuke behlinzekwe yona.“Kunomasipala isimo sabo esingagculisi. Sizoqala sikhulumisane nabo sibezwe ukuthi yiluphi usizo abaludingayo. Uma sebekushilo abakufunayo sizobe sesibanika khona bese sibabekela isikhathi sokuguqula isimo,” kusho uHlabisa.Uthe uma umnyango usukwenze konke kodwa ingabikhona inqubekela phambili, yilapho bezothatha khona izinyathelo ezinqala.“Awukwazi ukugcina abantu iminyaka emihlanu kumasipala ongasebenzi. Kumele kunikezwe abantu ithuba lokuthi bakhethe kabusha abaholi njengoba bekhombisile ngoMeyi 29 ukuthi bayalishintsha ivoti labo uma ingekho inqubekela phambili,” kusho uHlabisa.UHlabisa ugcizelele ukuthi asikho isidingo sokuba umuntu agcinwe esikhundleni asiphethe ekubeni engawenzi umsebenzi asuke ebekelwe wona. Uqhube wathi bazophinde baxhumane nezinyunyana zabasebenzi komasipala balubeke ezithebeni lolu daba.Akazange awadalule amagama alabo masipala abangasebenzi, wathi usafuna ukuqale akhulumisane nabo.Kwenzeka lokhu nje ngeledlule uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, evula iPhalamende, uthe uhulumeni kazwelonke kumele ulekelele omasipala. Ubalule noMasipala waseThekwini athe kumele kusetshenzwe ubuyiselwe esimeni esihle owawukusona kudala.Lo masipala usanda kukhomba indlela obeyimeya yawo, uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda, isikhala savalwa nguMnuz Cyril Xaba.Njengamanje kunezinhlelo zikahulumeni wesifundazwe nokazwelonke zokuwukulekelela ukuze ukwazi ukusebenza ngendlela efanele.

UVUKE umbhejazane umphakathi waseKatlehong wangqongqisa isonto likaMfundisi Paseka Mboro Motsoeneng, i-Incredible Happenings, kulandela isehlo sangoMsombuluko lapho ehlasele khona isikole efuna ukuthatha ngodli abazukulu bakhe.Ecacisa ngesehlo sangoMsombuluko, uMboro uthi izingane ezibonakale kwivideo ezicaphuna esikoleni ngabazukulu bakhe. Uthe kulawa ma-video ababonisi konke okwenzekile kodwa baveza lokhu okuthandwa abenzi bokubi.Uthe unina walezi zingane wayeyilungu lebandla lakhe, wamlapha emsiza njengoba wayenezinkinga nomndeni wakhe.“Lo muntu wesifazane mdala, wathandana nendodana yami encane kunaye ngenhloso yokwenza imali ngoba azi ukuthi nginemali. Lezi zingane wayezithuka ezibiza ngezidwedwe, engazifuni. Ngizikhulise iminyaka eyisikhombisa izingane, manje sekufika ugogo wazo uyazithatha.Uthe ugogo uthathe izingane wayohlala nazo, manje usefuna imali yesondlo kuyena phezu kokuba wayezithuka. Uveze ukuthi bavulelene amacala nomndeni walo wesimame ongumama wabazukulu ngoba bathathe ngenkani lezi zingane futhi basebenzisa isikhathi sesikole ukuzihlukumeza.“Kungani beyifuna kimi imali yesondlo sezingane? Kubuhlungu ngoba abantu besifazane bayawahlukumeza amadoda uma eziphindiselela ebashaya, bagijimela emaphoyiseni bawabophise agwetshwe iminyaka kodwa kube kuyiwo asukeliwe.”Commander in Chief Pastor Mboro says he heals the sick, he raises the dead, he, he he, where is God in the picture? Can all fake churches close down? pic.twitter.com/zTg9Sfa7duUsola lo mndeni ngokuzama ukwenza imali ngalezi zingane ngoba baxakwe yimali. Uthe balungisa indlu abahlala kuyo, abanayo nempahla endlini kanjalo nokudla yingakho bezama ukwenza imali ngaye.“Bahlangene bonke ngisho nothisha baseMatsediso ngoba uNkk Webster, ongomunye wogogo walaba bazukulu, ufundisa lapha. Ngitshele abaqaphi bami ukuthi bangadubuli, ngizothatha ucelemba ngiyobathusa ngawo kodwa uma besidubula sizoziphindiselela,” kusho yena engaphandle kwesiteshi samaphoyisa.“Wena ungenzenjani uyiphoyisa, uyintatheli abantu behlukumeza izingane zakho? Bafika kwami bezongihlasela, bazi kahle ukuthi nginezikhali, uma ngiziphendulela bazongisola bathi ngihlasela abantu besifazane,” kuqhubeka yena.

NGESONTO ekuseni uMasipala waseGeorge ukhiphe umbiko wakamuva ngotakulo oluqhubekayo ngebhilidi eliku-75 Victoria Street, eGeorge.Sekuphele izinsuku eziyisithupha kusukela kwaqala umsebenzi wokutakula abasebenzi abawelwa yileli bhilidi elakhiwayo eliyizitezi ezinhlanu zamafulethi.Ngokwemibiko eqinisekisiwe:- Babengu-81abasebenzi ngosuku lwesigameko okunguMsombuluko odlule emini- Bangu-45 abasebenzi abatakuliwe obhuqwini lwebhilidi- Bangu-16 okuqinisekiswe ukuthi bashonile- Bangu-14 abasesibhedlela abasalashwa kanti- Bangu-36 abangakatholakali.Umsebenzi wotakulo oholwa amathimba ahlukahlukene emaphoyiseni, abezimo eziphuthumayo bayaqhubeka nokuthungatha abantu abangakatholakali.Kubikwa ukuthi kudingeke ukuba kutholakale abasizi bengqondo abakhuluma izilimi  iChewa, Portuguese nesiShona njengoba iningi labasebenzi likhuluma lezi zilimi.Ngaleyo ndlela kunzima ukuthola imininingwane ephelele ngokuthi bangobani futhi basukaphi.UMasipala waseGeorge unxusa abangasiza ngokutolika ukuba baxhumane noKholiswa Jobela 078 210 5972 noma u-Apolus Swart ku-061 504 4205

BAYALWE ngokuthi bangalenzi iphutha lokukhukhumala bakhohlwe ukuthi bahola abantu abefundisi be-Ethiopian Holy Baptist Church ebebekade begcotshelwa ukuhola igatsha laleli bandla elisePitoli.Leli bandla elihlanganisa iminyaka engu-101 laba khona, laziwa kakhulu ngele Zikhova Ezimnqini. Libalwa namanye anamlando omude nonothile.Bekukade kugcotshwa uMfu Vusi benomkakhe uMfu Sphiwe Jiyane, njengabaholi begatsha iNyanda elisePitoli.Inkonzo yomgcobo ibikade iqhubeka khona ePitoli. Ibihanjelwe yizifunda zaleli bandla eziyisithupha ezitholakala eNingizimu Afrika yonke.Inhloko yebandla kuzwelonke, uSenior Bishop Jeremiah Mashinini, ibeqhuba inkonzo yokubagcoba ngokusemthethweni.UMashinini ubadonse ngendlebe ngokuthi bangalenzi iphutha lokukhukhumala baze bakhohlwe ukuthi baphathiswe into kaNkulunkulu. Uthe umholi wangampela uyazithoba futhi wazi kahle ukuthi uphathisiwe akenzi into yakhe.Ekhuluma ebhekise ngqo kubona uthe: "Kukhona konke enikwenzayo, kumele nazi ukuthi lona umsebenzi kaNkulunkulu. Ngakho-ke kumele ninyathele ngokukhulu ukucophelela lokhu.''Ubancomile ngomsebenzi omkhulu nomuhle athe sebewenzele ibandla, wathi ukusebenza kwabo ngokwethembeka kuyona yonke le minyaka yikhona  okuholele ekutheni bathenjwe ngokuhola leli gatsha."Indlela enikhombise ngayo ukwethembeka yiyona edale ukuthi kubonakale kungaba yinina eningawenza kahle lo msebenzi,'' usho kanje.Omunye wabaholi baleli bandla, uMfu Vusi Ntanzi, uthe ibandla linenhlanhla enkulu yokuba nabaholi bohlobo lwabo.Naye ekhuluma ebhekise kubona uthe: "Ibandla likaNkulunkulu ngobubanzi balo liyabadinga abaholi abafana nani ngokwenza. Sengathi ukugcotshwa kwenu kungedale ukuthi niguquke kokuhle ebenivele nikwenza ngaphambilini.''

BANIKWE izinsuku eziwu-30 abaphathi bekhaya labadaba iKwaMashu Christian Care Society ukuba balungise isimo salo, kungenjalo lizovalwa.Kuleli sonto, uMphathiswa wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi, uNksz Mbali Shinga, unikele kuleli khaya kungazelele muntu emuva kokuzwa ukuthi uMasipala weTheku usulivalele amanzi ngenxa yokuthi likweleta ngaphezu kuka-R2 million.“Leli khaya lisebenza ngokuzimela kodwa lokho akusho ukuthi sizosonga izandla uma izinto zingahambi kahle. Sesiqalile ukuxoxa noMasipala weTheku ukuqinisekisa ukuthi amanzi akhona. Akukwazi ukuthi abantu abadala bangayothutha amanzi. Sikhiphe nomnqamulajuqu wokuthi abaphathi beKwaMashu Christian Care Society balungise isimo saleli khaya. Uma bengasilungisi sizobhalela uMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi kuzwelonke ukuba ulivale. Ngeke sivume abantu abadala bahlale ngaphansi kwezimo ezinzima,” kusho uNksz Shinga.Uthembise ukuthi uzosiqapha ngeso lokhozi isimo saleli khaya ngoba ufuna abantu abadalala baphile kamnandi, hhayi ukuthi baphatheke kabi.Ngaphandle kokuvalwa kwamanzi, uNksz Shinga uveze ukuthi iKwaMashu Christian Care Society inezinkinga zokuphathwa njengoba amalungu ebhodi engaboni ngasolinye okuze kwaholela ekutheni ibhange ligodle kwi-akhawunti imali yaleli khaya.UNksz Shinga ujube ithimba eliyisipesheli elizosebenzisana nabaphethe ikhaya ukuze likwazi ukuthola imali yalo, likhokhele izikweletu, likhuluma noMasipala weTheku ukuqinisekisa ukuthi amanzi ayabuya.Uphethe ngokuthi uzosiqapha ngeso lokhozi isimo, ukuqinisekisa ukuthi isimo siyalunga ukuze abadala bahlale ekhaya elifudumele.

BANINGI abantu besifazane abamnyama abasebenzisa imikhiqizo ehlukene eshintsha ibala lesikhumba sabo sikhanye noma basebenzise imikhiqizo yokuthi bangagugi.Lokhu kushiwo uNkk Futhi Mkhize owudokotela owenza imikhiqizo yokwelapha neyesikhumba esebenzisa owoyela namakhambi emvelo, iPhyto Medicine, obuye abe nomkhankaso ogqugquzela ukuthi abantu bangasebenzisi imikhiqizo ekhanyisa ibala, iNgimnyama Ngimuhle, ephawula nge-video yomlingisi , uKhanyi Mbau ebisabalele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.UMbau ubethi kade ehlinzwa elungisa ubuso okunye bekungezwakali kahle ngoba ubesavuvukele kodwa ubesho ukuthi i-video uyenze ngemuva kwamahora amane ehlinziwe.Kuyo ubengacacisi igama lokwelashwa kwakhe kodwa abaningi bathe ubenza iFace Lift Sugery. UNkk Mkhize, uthe kungenzeka ukuthi okukaKhanyi sekudlulele noma yena akesabi ukuphumela obala ngendlela azizwa ngayo, kodwa baningi abantu besifazane abamnyama abangazethembi ngebala labo abasebenzisa imikhiqizo eminingi eyehlukene ukuze bakhanyise isikhumba ngoba bekholwa ukuthi uma ukhanya umuhle. “Ukuba nemibimbi indalo ekhombisa ukuthi usukhulile. Ungakwazi ukuzivocavoca ngendlela yokuthi kungasheshi kodwa hhayi ukuthi kungenzeki. Ikhona nemikhiqizo yemvelo eyenza okufanayo. Ukuba nemali kwenza ukuthi abantu bakhethe izinto abacabanga ukuthi zisebenza kahle kodwa ezinobungozi okungenzeka bungelapheki,” kusho yena. Imibono yabantu ngesithombe sakhe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana  beyehlukene, abanye bemgxeka, abanye behleka bethi uthenge ubuso obusha. UKhulasande Duncan Mashinini, uthe: " UMichael Jackson wethu,"UThaah Nzwakele Dube, uthe: " Shembe useyiShayina-ke manje uKhanyisile kodwa yini?,"USane MaNgwane Khanyile, uthe:" Cha uNkulunkulu ungizonda ngempela imali uyinika abantu aba-wrong,"I-website yeMayo Clinic, ithe abenza i-face lifting surgery basuke befuna ukuhlale bebukeka bebancane, befuna nokulungisa izinkinga zesikhumba  esigqunqile. Ithe bukhona ubungozi obungaba obesikhashana noma unomphela.Ithe ukuvuvukala emahoreni okuqala angu-24 yinto ejwayelekile eyelaphekayo."Uma uke wakhuluphala noma wancipha, ukuma kobuso bakho kuyaphazamiseka," kuchaza i- website.

KUZOBA ukhethu’ khethi kubavoti kuleli njengoba bengu-14 662 abantu abazongenela ukhetho ekubeni izihlalo ezibangwayo zingu-887 kuphela.Lezi zihlalo ezasePhalamende kanjalo neziShayamthetho zezifundazwe.Okhulumela ikhomishini yezokhetho uNkk Kate Bapela, uthe bangu-6 743 ababanga izihlalo eziShayamthetho, babe ngu-3 596 ababanga izihlalo ePhalamende kuthi abangu-4 323 babange izihlalo zeProportional Representation (PR) ezibangwa amaqembu kuphela.Uthe abantu banikwe kuze kube ngu-5 ntambama namhlanje ukuthi bakhononde ngabantu abangenela ukhetho okubalwa nabalungenela ngokuzimela.Uveze ukuthi bangu-42 abantu okuvele ukuthi bebesohlwini lwamanye amaqembu.“Laba bavela emaqenjini angu-39, kanti omunye ongenela ukhetho ngokuzimela uvela ohlwini lwelinye iqembu. Uhlu lwabantu abangenela ukhetho lutholakala emahhovisi ethu.” Uveze ukuthi iGauteng iyona ezoba nabantu abaningi njengoba inamaqembu angu-40, nababili abangenela ukhetho ngokuzimela ngakho iyona ezoba nephepha elide kunawo wonke kuleli.Uveze ukuthi ikhomishini izonquma ngalabo okukhalwa ngabo kusasa kanti uma bengeneme ngesinqumo se-IEC bangamangala enkantolo yezokhetho ezonquma ngo-Ephreli 2. Ubalule ukuthi uhlu lokugcina lwabangenele ukhetho luzoshicilelwa ngo-Ephreli 10. Ukhumbuze abantu ukuthi bazokwazi ukuvota lapho behlala khona kuphela.Uthe abazobe bengekho lapho behlala khona ngosuku lokhetho bangabhalela isikhulu sekhomishini bafake isicelo sokuthi bazobe bevota kwesinye isikhungo.Kumele bakwenze lokhu ungakashayi uMeyi 17 njengoba ukhetho lungoMeyi 29. Ukufakwa kwesicelo sokuvota lapho ungahlali khona akuhambisani nokufaka isicelo sokuvota ngokuyisipesheli okuzovulwa isicelo sakho maphakathi noMeyi. Abazosheshe bavote abazobe besebenza ngosuku lokhetho, abagulayo, abangakwazi ukuhamba kanjalo nezaguga.

INKANTOLO yeMantshi eThekwini inqabele ibheyili abasolwa ngokubulala umculi u-Kiernan “AKA” Forbes nomngani wakhe uTebello “Tibz” Motsoane.Laba basolwa okungoMnuz Lindokuhle Mkhwanazi (30), Lindani Ndimande (35), Siyanda Myeza (21), Mziwethemba Gwabeni (36) kanye noLindokuhle Ndimande (29), bebevele enkantolo ukuzwa umphumela ngesicelo sabo sebheyili.IMantshi uVincent Hlatshwayo, uthe kunobufakazi obuqanda ikhanda ngalaba basolwa kanti umsolwa wesithathu, uMyeza wadlala indima ebalulekile ukuqinisekisa ukusocongwa kwalo mculi, waveza ukuthi nguye owahlela ukuthi kutholakale izibhamu kanye nezimoto ezasetshenziswa.

INHLANGANO emele abasebenzi abahlanzayo nonogada Iphimbo Labasebenzi, inqumele ugwayi katiki uMasipala weTheku noMnyango wezeMpilo esifundazweni ukuthi baqashwe ngokuphelele ngaphansi kukamasipala nakulo mnyango.Laba basebenzi abebesekwa amaqembu ezepolitiki okukhona eqhulwini i-ActionSA, baphazamise ukuhamba kwezimoto enkabeni yedolobha iTheku emashini esuke epaki i-King Dinizulu yaphelela e-City Hall, ngoLwesihlanu.Phakathi kwezinto ezisohlwini lezikhalo; bafuna kuqedwe ngezinkampani abazisebenzelayo ezizimele ezisebenzela ezikhungweni zezempilo nakumasipala, kodwa baqashwe ngokugcwele.Ethula uhlu lwezikhalo eziqondiswe kwiMeya yeTheku, uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda, uNobhala wale nhlangano uMnuz Elvis Mncwango, uthe bafuna umasipala ukhiphe izinkampani ezinikeza ngomsebenzi, ezixhaphaza abasebenzi“Sifuna kuphenywe ngezinsolo zokuhlukunyezwa kwelungelo labasebenzi okuthiwa kwenziwa yilezi zinkampani ezisebenza kumasipala.
