Bonke onogada nabahlanzayo abasebenzela lezi zinkampani sifuna baqashwe umasipala,” usho kanje.Uthe laba basebenzi sebehlale iminyaka eyevile kwewu-20 bexhashazwa, beholelwa amkinati yilezi zinkampani.Uphinde waxwayisa uMnyango wezeMpilo esifundazweni ngokuthi bazowuthathela izinyathelo zomthetho njengoba sekunesikhathi eside ungafuni ukulalela odabeni oluthinta ukusetshenziswa akwezinkampani ezizimele ukwenza umsebenzi ezikhungweni zezempilo ezijike zixhaphaze abasebenzi.Bacele umhlangano nalo mnyango okumele ubekhona zingakapheli izinsuku eziwu-14.Umholi we-ActionSA KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Zwakele Mncwango ongomunye wabebehola le mashi, baphoxekile ngokwenziwa yilo masipala oholwa yi-ANC wokuguqula isinqumo esavotelwa emhlanganweni wamakhansela ngo-Agasti nyakenye.“Umkhandlu wamakhansela wanikeza umasipala isikhathi esanele esiyizinyanga ezintathu ukuthi kucwaningwe ngalolu daba kodwa wahudula izinyawo kwaze kwaphela izinyanga eziyisithupha. Ekuqaleni, i-ANC emkhandlwini ivote nathi odabeni lokufakwa ngaphansi kukamasipala kwalaba basebenzi, kodwa manje isiguqukile ngenhloso yokubukela phansi lonke lolu hlelo olwenziwe,” usho kanje.Uthe bazokuma nalaba basebenzi kuze kube sekugcineni.

UMASIPALA waseThekwini, uwanqumele ugwayi katiki amaqembu ezepolitiki wathi zingapheli izinsuku ezingu-30 emuva kokhetho, engazisusile izingqwembe zokhetho ezigxotsheni.Umkhandlu uqhuba uthi uma kuneqembu noma umuntu ohlulekayo ukususa izingqwembe, umasipala uzozisusa ngokwawo bese lowo othintekayo ekhokha izindleko zomsebenzi wokususelwa zona.Lokhu kudalulwe ngoLwesibili ngokhulumela uMasipala weTheku, uNkk Gugu Sisilana ephendula imibuzo yephephandaba.Umhlangano wamakhansela eTheku owawungoNovemba nyakenye, waphasisa imibandela ephathelene nokhetho obelungoMeyi 29.Eminye yayo ithi inhlangano noma umuntu ongenele ukhetho kumele akhokhe idiphozithi kaR200, ebuyiswayo, ukuze aphanyeke izingqwembe ewadini eyodwa.Abangenela ukhetho bakalelwa ukuthi zingeqi ku-800 izingqwembe zeqembu noma ezokungenela ukhetho kwiwadi ngayinye.“Emuva kokhetho, idiphozithi ekhokhiwe izogcinwa esikhwameni izinyanga ezintathu, kukhokhelwe ngayo izindleko zomsebenzi wokususwa kwezingqwembe,” kuchaza umasipala.Uma iqembu noma ongenele ukhetho ehluleka ukususa izingqwembe ngokwakhe, uyobe esekhokhiswa zonke izindleko zomsebenzi wokususelwa uqwembe ngalunye oluphanyekwe esigxotsheni.Eminye yemibandela ebibekiwe ukuthi iqembu noma ongenele ukhetho bangaphanyeki izingqwembe ezimbili esigxotsheni esisodwa.Alikho iqembu lepolitiki noma ongenele ukhetho ngokuzimela obekade evumelekeke ukuthi akhangise kuthelawayeka uN2, N3, eNkosi Albert Luthuli International Convention Centre (ICC), nasolwandle (Marine Parade/Snell Parade).Bekungavumelekile ukuphanyeka izingqwembe zokhetho emabhulohweni, ezindongeni nasezihlahleni.

UNGQONGQOSHE kaGesi nezaMandla, uDkt Kgosientsho Ramokgopa, uthi inkukhu inqunywe umlomo kulabo abebethi ugesi awucishwa ngenxa yokuthi sekusondele ukhetho.URamakgopa uthe ukuqhubeka kokungacishwa kukagesi noma ukhetho seludlulile kukhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi babesenga ezimithiyo labo ababethi kuzobuya ukucishwa kukagesi emva kokhetho lwangoMeyi.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma nabezindaba ngoMsombuluko.Sekuphele izinsuku ezingaphezu kuka-100 ugesi ungacishwa.Kwagcina ngo-2020 ukuba ugesi ungacishwa izinsuku eziningi kangaka zilandelana.Ukucishwa kukagesi kwagcina ngoMashi, kusele isikhathi esingaphansi kwezinyanga ezimbili kubanjwe ukhetho lwangoMeyi.URamokgopa uthe ukungacishwa kukagesi isikhathi eside kanje kukhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi uhulumeni uzoyinqoba inkinga kagesi.“Ngaphambi kokhetho bekukuningi ukukhuluma. Kukhona ababethi ugesi awucishwa ngoba kuza ukhetho. Ngesikhathi umengameli esungula uMnyango kaGesi, wasinikeza izinto ezimbili afuna sizenze.“Eyokuqala wathi ufuna ukuthi ugesi ungacishwa kakhulu. Lokho ngicabanga ukuthi sesikwazile ukukwenza. Okwesibili wathi ufuna ukuthi siyiqede nya eyokucishwa kukagesi. Ngokwami ngibona siza kahle okwamanje.”URamokgopa uthe bayaqhubeka nokwandisa umthamo kagesi.Ukhale ngomasipala athe ukwehluleka kwabo kwenza ukuthi ucishwe ugesi kwezinye izindawo yize izwe linogesi owanele.“Ngenxa yokuthi sinogesi owanele njengamanje, kunenkinga entsha esiyiqaphelile. Kunabantu othola ukuthi bahlala isikhathi eside bengenawo ugesi, kwesinye isikhathi kuba izinsuku ugesi ungekho. Lokhu kungenxa yokwehluleka komasipala ukunakekela ingqalasizinda. Kugcina sekufuneka ukuthi kucishwe ugesi ngenxa yokuthi ingqalasizinda endala iyehluleka ukumelana nomthamo omningi kagesi. Ezinye izinkinga ukungaphathwa ngendlela kwezimali komasipala, nokungabikhona kwabantu abazi umsebenzi.”Uthe le nkinga uzoyikhuluma noNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana kanye neziNdaba zoMdabu, uMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa.URamokgopa uthe nakuba kukuningi osekwenziwe, ayikapheli inkinga yokushoda kukagesi.“Asikaphumi enkingeni. Kuzothatha isikhathi eside ukuthi siyinqobe le mpi.”URamokgopa uthe ngale kwenkinga yokushoda kukagesi, kubuye kube nenkinga yokuthi abantu abaningi abawukhokheli.URamokgopa ukhale ngokumba eqolo kukagesi, wathi kwenza ukuthi abantu abaningi bangakwazi ukuwukhokhela.“Uma ingabhekisiswa indaba yokunyuka kukagesi, sizokuba nenkinga ezweni. Abantu abaningi abakwazi ukuthenga ugesi ngenxa yesimo somnotho. Abantu kufanele bakhethe phakathi kokuthenga isinkwa nokuthenga ugesi. Ekugcineni abantu bakhetha ukuthenga isinkwa. Osomabhizinisi nabo banenkinga yokuthi abakwazi ukuqhuba amabhizinisi abo ngenxa yokubiza kukagesi.”

UFUNA izimpendulo umndeni wengane okubikwa ukuthi ishone isele nosingamama eMadadeni, eNewcastle yase igcatshwa nguyise wayo oyinyanga ethi uyayivusa.UPhilasande Mthiyane (5) kuthiwa ushone elele nosingamama. Kuthiwa kuthe uma usingamama, uNksz Nompumelelo Mazibuko, ebona ukuthi ingane isishonile wazisa uyise wayo obeseGoli eyokwelapha.“Umntwana ngithe ngiyamvusa ebusuku ukuze ayochama ngabona egcwele ukudla emlonyeni. Ngamvusa izikhawu eziningi ngaze ngaqaphela ukuthi usethule,” kuchaza usingamama.Uthe akapholisanga maseko wazisa uyise wengane, uMnuz Bonginkosi Biyela ofike ekuseni ngeSonto wase eyigcaba ingane, nokuyinto enenga abakubo kanina kamufi, abafuna ukwazi ukuthi lokho inyanga ibikwenzelani.UMnuz Bonginkosi Thango, ongumkhulu kaPhilasande, uthe bashaya amakhala ngendlela ingane eshone ngayo.UThango uthe bakhathazwa wukuthi isidumbu besinemihuzuko emhlane, emadolweni futhi silimele kabi nasekhanda.“Sifuna ukwazi ukuthi ngempela kwenzakaleni enganeni njengoba inemihuzuko nje emzimbeni?” usho kanje.Uthe okubenza baphithanelwe amakhanda kakhulu wukuthi uyise wengane uyigcabe ekubeni bese ishonileUnina wengane, uNkk Kwakhanya Thango Zungu ubhale kuFacebook ecela usizo, ethi naye ufuna izimpendulo kubaba wengane ukuthi ibulawe yini.Uqhube wathi ingane yakhe beyihlala noyise wayo futhi wayekade eyicele kwabadala komalume bayo, kwavunyelwana ukuthi ayithathe.“Ingane bathi abazi ibulawe yini. Ishayiwe ekhanda nasemzimbeni, ngokusho kukayise kodwa yena uthi ubengekho eseGoli isele nosingamama wayo,” kusho unina kamufi.Ethintwa ocingweni lo wesifazane, ukhale ngokuba matasa wacela ukuba intatheli ibuye imfonele kodwa akabange esaluphendula ucingo.Ethintwa uyise wengane, uvumile ukuthi usigcabile isidumbu sendodana yakhe.“Ngiyazi ukuthi ngenze iphutha elikhulu ngokusigcaba isidumbu sengane yami. Kodwa nami bengithi ngenza izaba nje njengoba ngiwumuntu wamakhambi,” usho kanje.Uthe kuduma ikhanda ngoba akakaze ashonelwe yingane ngaphambilini.“Ngididekile, angazi nokuthi ngithini futhi ngenze njani uma izinto zinjena. Eyi impela kunzima,” usho kanje sakubalisa.Le nyanga ithe ibuzile emndenini ukuthi kwenzakaleni enganeni njengoba inemivimbo. Bayiphendula ngokuthi nabo badidekile ukuthi ngeyani ngoba akekho oke wayishaya.Kuvela ukuthi uPhilasande wayekade ehlala kubo kanina kwathi ngasekupheleni kukaDisemba nyakenye uyise wayihlawula ingane. Ngemuva kwalokho wase ethembisa ukuthi uzoyikhokhela ngokugcwele ebese ihlala naye ngokuphelele eMadadeni. UPhilasande ubenza uGrade R khona eNewcastle.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa aseMadadeni aphenya icala lokubulala emuva kwesigameko lapho ingane eneminyaka emihlanu kusolakala ukuthi ishaywe yaze yashona ngeSonto.UNetshiunda uthe amaphyisa ayaphenya mayelana nalesi sigameko engeza ngokuthi umufi ubekade enemihuzuko nezibazi emzimbeni wakhe.

Zibonga ukuthi ziphume ejele zisaphila izelamani zakwaNdlovu ezigwetshelwe ukubulala eziphume ngebheyili  ukuze icala lazo libuye lidingidwe kabusha.Usomahlaya uSthembiso Pro Ndlovu (32)  nodadewabo uNksz Nokuthula Ndlovu (48)  bese kuphele iminyaka eyisikhombisa bedonsa isigwebo seminyaka ewu-18 ngemuva kokutholakala necala lokubulala isigebengu esagqekeza kubo, sabanjwa umphakathi sashaywa, safela esibhedlela. NgoLwesihlanu, baphume ngebheyili besalinde ukuthi inkantolo yokuDluliswa kwamaCala ikhiphe usuku lokuthi uMbuso nabameli babe nempikiswano ngobufakazi  abagwetshwa ngabo. Lesi sehlakalo senzeka eMgungundlovu ngo-2017 lapho zizalwa khona lezi zelamani. Zagwetshwa ngonyaka ofanayo. Zithi  zagwetshwa ngecala ezingalenzanga ngoba  zona zamemeza umphakathi, azimshayanga umufi. UMmeli wabo uMnuz Thabani Mpungose,  uthe ubufakazi abagwetshwa ngabo obokuthi  babonwa ngomunye wofakazi bephethe izinduku,  kodwa akucaci kahle ukuthi wababona yini bemshaya umufi. Okunye  athi bafuna ukuthi kuphinde kuhlaziywe  ukuthi umbiko wokufa kukamufi abanawo awucacisi kahle ukuthi umufi wabulawa yini.UMpungose, uthe bebesebenzisana neJustice for Prisoners and Detainees Trust,  ekutholeleni uNdlovu nodadewabo ubulungiswa ngoba kuyabonakala ukuthi kukhona okungalandelwanga kahle."Udaba saluyisa enkantolo iSupreme Court. Le nkantolo isivumile ukuthi kukhona okungakhulunywa ngalolu daba, base benikwa ibheyili  besalinde ukulalelwa kwaleli cala,. Lolo suku alukanqunywa,“  kusho uMpungose. UPro uthe: "Ngibonga ukuthi ngiphume ngisaphila. Kunesikhathi lapho ngike ngaphathwa iTB yamathumbu ngisejele, ngaze ngazibonela nami ukuthi ngiyahamba.  Bengike ngizwe abanye esinabo ngaphakathi betshelwa ukuthi sekushone abazali, banqatshelwe ukuyobangcwaba. UNkulunkulu usengenzele umusa ngoba akwenzekanga lokho, siphume abazali besaphila nasemndenini engekho oshonile,"Uthe okumjabulisa kakhulu ukuthi osomahlaya abesebenza nabo bamamukele kahle. Ngesonto elizayo uzobe eqhulula amahlaya komunye umcimbi.Uthe waphazamiseka kakhulu  ngasohlangothini lwezemfundo  waboshwa enza unyaka wokugcina eDurban University of Technology (DUT),  enza i-Electrical Engineering."Ngafunda i-semester eyodwa kwasala ukuthi ngenze uqeqesho msebenzi olungenzeki ejele. Ngafunda iMarketing Management e-Unisa ngingaphakathi ejele,“ kusho uPro.Udadewabo uNokuthula Ndlovu, uthe waboshwa ingane yakhe yokugcina ineminyaka eyisithupha manje isineminyaka engu-13."Ngiphume senginabazukulu ababili abangangazi," esho ehleka.Uthe  ngesikhathi begwetshwa wayesebenza, akasakwazi ukubuyela ngoba imigomo yebheyili ayivumi ukuthi babuyele eMgungundlovu lapho kwenzeka khona isigameko.“Sengifisa engabe selufikile usuku lokuthi lolu daba lulalelwe kabusha, ukuze kuvele ukuthi simsulwa asibona ababulali. Kugezeke namagama ethu,”  kusho uNksz Ndlovu.

UMPHAKATHI wakwaHlabisa naseHluhluwe ukhuculule amadolobha endawo ngenhloso yokunqanda ukwanda kwabahlala ezitaladini ababizwa ngamaPhara nokudungeka kwesimo sezulu esigcina sidale izikhukhula.Lokhu kuvele emkhankasweni wezinsuku ezimbili okunguMsombuluko noLwesibili wokukhuculula udoti edolobheni lakwaHlabisa nelaseHluhluwe.IKhansela lakwa-Ward 12, uMnuz  Cabangokuhle Ncengwa kwaHlabisa ebeliphume nomphakathi walo, lithe okunye abazama ukukugwema ukuba idolobha labo lingagcini selibalekelwa yizivakashi njengoba liyintandokazi kwabasuka kwamanye amazwe."Sibone kungcono ukuba sisukume nomphakathi ukuze sigweme ukuba idolobha lethu liphenduke inhlekisa ngenxa yokungcola. Siyidolobha elihanjelwa abavakashi abaningi abasuka kwamanye amazwe, ngakho ukungcola kwalo kusho ukulimala komnotho," kusho uNcengwa.UMnuz Qaphelani Mdletshe waseHluhluwe uthe okubajabulisayo ukuthi ukukhucululwa kwedolobha labo kugwema nokuba kugcine sekugcwala ababizwa ngamaphara kulona."Amaphara ayayithanda indawo engcolile. Ngakho ukuyekela idolobha libenemfucuza lokho kusho ukuthi sikhanda isidleke zamaphara," kusho uMdletshe.Uthe okunye ukuthi idolobha labo liseduze nomngcele okuyiKosi Bay ohanjelwa kakhulu abavakashi abasuke bezobuka ubuhle bemvelo.Uqhube wathi  uma idolobha selingcolile abantu bagcina sebeliphendula umhhume wezigebengu.IMeya yaseBig Five Hlabisa, uMnuz Comfort Khumalo ithe okunye  abakulwisayo ngemfucuza ukuthi idala nesimo sezulu esinobungozi ."Kugcina sekuba nezikhukhula ezidala umonakala. Phela ukuguquka kwesimo sezulu kubuye kudalwe imfucuza esiyilahla budedengu," kusho uKhumalo.Isimo sokuguquka kwezulu kuyakhalwa ngaso ezindaweni eziningi futji kusolwa imfucuza egcwele emadolobheni amaningi ukuthi iyimbangela yokuguquka kwaso.

Kuxwayiswa umphakathi ngogalakajane okuthiwa baqola umphakathi imali besebenzisa igama likaNgqongqoshe wokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu futhi ongumengameli we-IFP.Kuvela ukuthi inombolo yocingo kaMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa isisezandleni zezigilamkhuba.Labantu kuthiwa baqale ngokuthi bagqekeze inombolo yocingo kaHlabisa.Kabagcinanga lapho njengoba kubikwa ukuthi manje sebeyayisebenzisa bathumela ngayo imiqhafazo abanenombolo kaHlabisa nabanye bacela imali.Okhulumela uMnyango uMnuz Legadimo Leso, uthe lokhu abakubona kwenzeka manje kubaphithanisela ngamakhanda.“Akugcini nje ngokuthi kuthikameze uhlelo lwezokuphepha lukangqongqoshe, kuphinde kwehlise ukuthembeka akuthola emphakathini,” kusho uLeso.ULeso uqhube wathi umnyango ucela amalungu omphakathi ukuthi ahlale eqaphile. Uveze ukuthi uma kwenzeka kukhona umuntu othola umqhafazo womuntu ozishaya sangqogqoshe ocela imali noma ngabe yini ephathelene nayo angakwenzi lokho.UHlabisa ufungiswe ngenyanga eyedlule waba ungqongqoshe walo mnyango ngaphansi kukahulumeni wokubambisana.Ungene kulesi sikhundla ebesikade senganyelwe uNkk Thembi Nkadimeng osenguNgqongqoshe wezobuLungiswa nokuThuthukiswa koMthethosisekelo.ULeso uthe ihhovisi likaHlabisa nokubambisana nabezophiko lezokuvikela bayaphenya ukuthi senzeke kanjani llesigameko.“Kunezinyathelo ezithathwayo ukuze inombolo nezokuxhumana zikangqongqoshe kubuyele kuyena. Kuqhubeka nohlelo lokuhlonza labo ababagila lemigilingwane engekho emthethweni,” kusho uLeso.Ube esenxenxa umphakathi ukuthi labo bantu abangaba nolwazi mayelana nalesi sigameko ukuba baludlulisele ngokushesha kwabezomthetho.

KUJUTSHWE ithimba elikhethekile emaphoyiseni aseGauteng ukuba aphenye futhi abophe abasolwa abayisithupha ababulale amantombazane amabili emijondolo yaseSoshanguve ngeSonto.Kuthiwa laba basolwa baqale ejoyintili iChanging Spot emijondolo yaseSoshanguve ngeSonto ebusuku adubula abantu abebekhona. Kufe ababili (owesilisa nowesifazane) kwalimala kabi abanye abane. Abasolwa basuke kule ndawo banikela komunye umjondolo okule ndawo. Kulo mjondolo  bafike badubula babulala izelamani ezingamantombazane amabili uMpfumo (4) noTinyiko (7) ngaphambi kokuba bawushise ziphakathi izingane.Okhulumela amaphoyisa eGauteng uLt-Col Mavela Masondo uthi uphenyo lokuqala luveza ukuthi abasolwa bebefuna uyise wezingane emzini wakhe ngesikhathi kubulawa lawa mantombazane.

SEKUQALIWE ukuqondiswa ubugwegwe kwezitshudeni zaseNyuvesi i-Unisa, ezibhekene nezinsolo zokukopela nokubhala into efanayo ngesikhathi sezivivinyo zanyakenye. Le nyuvesi iveze ukuthi iphenya amacala evile ku-1400 okukopela ngesikhathi kubhalwa izivivinyo kusetshenziswa uhlelo lwezobuchwepheshe.USolwazi Ramagoai Magano, iphini lomphathi wale nyuvesi obhekele ukuthuthukiswa kwesikhungo, uveze ukuthi seziqalile izigcawu zokuqondisa ubugwegwe kulabo abakopela.Uthe ezinye zezitshudeni zinikwe izexwayiso ngoba bezenze amacala angatheni ngesikhathi zibhala.“Ngalezi zigcawu zobugwegwe sihlose ukuphothula amacala abalelwa ku-1 456 athinta ukukopela.“Siqale ngenyanga edlule ngoMashi 25 lanti ngesonto sbheka amacala angu-75,” kusho uMagano esithangamini sabezindaba kuleli sonto.Akuqali ukuthi kubikwe izinsolo zokukopela kwezitshudeni uma kubhalwa izivivinyo kule nyuvesi.Izitshudeni sezike zakhala nge-Invigilator App esetshenziswayo uma kubhalwa izivivinyo. UMagano uthe amacala amaningi athinta izitshudeni ezenza i-Postgraduate. Uphinde weluleka izitshudeni ezihamba isigcawu sobugwegwe ukuthi zibhalise ukuze zingazitholi sezibambezeleka uma uphenyo luzikhipha phambili.“Asinazo izinhlelo zokubuyela ohlelweni lwakudala siyinyuvesi lokuthi kubhalwe izivivinyo ezindaweni ezazibhalelwa kuzona. Simile ohlelweni lwezobuchwepheshe esilusebenzisayo,” kusho uMagano. Phambilini umkhandlu wezitshudeni wawukhale ngezinkinga ohlelweni lokubhalwa kwezivivinyo okwakuvezwa yizitshudeni.Umengameli womkhandlu wezitshudeni e-Unisa uMnuz Nkosinathi Mabilane, phambilini wathi kusukela ngesikhathi sobhubhane iCovid-19, inyuvesi yanquma ukuthi kubhalwe ngohlelo lwezobuchwepheshe kusetshenziswa i-App.Wakhala ngokuthi le-App okuthiwa icosha yonke into engumsindo uma ubhala, inazo izinselelo njengoba izitshudeni zazikhala ngokuthi uma kucishwa ugesi nezinye izinto kuba nokubambezeleka ukwenza izinto.UMabilane wathi zingaphezu kuka-5 000 izitshudeni ezabanjwa ukuthi zakopela izivivinyo zangonyaka odlule, ezinye zathanjiselwa isigwebo ngoba zaziqala ukubhala.Uthe kwasala ezinye ezibalelwa ngaphansi kuka-2 000, ezase zibanjwa okwesibili zikopela ezizoshushiswa.Unobhala jikelele womkhandlu wezitshudeni kule nyuvesi uMnuz Aphiwe Dlamini, unxuse isikhungo ukuthi sisheshise isigcawu sobugwegwe ukuze izitshudeni zazi ngekusasa lazo.“Sicela ukuthi okungenani lezi zigcawu kushaye uJuni seziphothuliwe ukuze izitshudeni zazi ukuthi kumele zenzenjani. Kukhona izindawo lapho kusadingeka kulungiswe khona izinto enyuvesi,” kusho uDlamini. UMagano uthe asisikhulu isibalo sabakopelile wathi nangesikhathi kusabhalelwa ezindaweni ezahlukene ayebikwa amacala okukopela kanjalo nalabo ababhale into efanayo.

KUCISHE kwavalwa ngehlahla emndenini wakwaXaba, ngesikhathi kusha umjondolo ngheSonto ebusuku, kwashona izingane zamantombazane ezimbili eMatendeni, kwaF eMlaza.Kulesi sigameko esishiye umndeni ukhungathekile, kushone uSmamkele Xaba (19) nodadewabo omncane uZisanda Xaba (13) abashele endlini baze bathula. Unina uNksz Bawinile Ndadane/Xaba (44) nendodana yakhe uMlondi Xaba (16) kuthiwa baphume ngembobo yenayithi umjondolo usha ubuhanguhangu.Abashonile kuthiwa bebepakishe imithwalo beya kuMdedele okuyinkonzo yamaNazaretha eqale ngoMsombuluko nezodonsa inyanga yonke. USmamkele kuthiwa ubenza izifundo ze-Information Technology eNelson Mandela University, ePort Elizabeth. Ubebuye ngoba kungamaholidi okuvalwa kwezikole, kanti uZisanda kuthiwa ubenza uGrade 8, esikoleni  Ekwazini High khona eMlaza.Elandisa Isolezwe, uNkk Noxolo Mbuyisa ongugogo wamantombazane ashonile, uthe abazi basinde kanjani laba abasindile ngendlela okuthiwa senzeke ngayo lesi sigameko.“UBawinile indodakazi kadadewethu owashona. Wabuya emendweni nalezi zingane zisencane emuva kokulahlwa uyise. Ubengasebenzi, ephila ngamatoho ekhulisa izingane zakhe. Uze wakha umjondolo ngoba ezamela ukuthi izingane zakhe zibe nendawo yazo. Uma esilandisa ngokwenzekile, (uBawinile) uthe uzwe sengathi uyaphupha ngabo-10 ebusuku, kunomuntu ongathi umtshela ukuthi akavuke uyasha. Uthe uma evuka lapho wabona indlu isisha ubuhanguhangu. Ekamelweni ubelele nendodana yakhe uMlondi abakwazile ukuvuka baphume endlini. Uthe naye uqale wasaba ukuphuma njengoba indlu ibisivutha yonke waze walandela indodana yakhe ezijube yaphoseka emlilweni iyophuma ngomnyango,” kusho uNkk Mboyisa.Uthe ekamelweni obekulele khona amadodakazi kune-burglar guard kodwa abalikhiyi.“Okubamangazile ukuthi ngesikhathi kusha i-burglar guard bese lifakwe isigaxa sikakhiye abangasazi. Lokhu kwenza kube nezinsolo zokuthi umlilo wokhelwe ngothile obengafuni kuphume muntu endlini ngoba kuze kwafakwa nesigaxa sikakhiye. Ngenhlanhla ikamelo obekulele kulona uBawinile belingenalo i-buglar guard okwenze bakwazi ukuphuma kalula,” usho kanje.Uqhube wathi ngesikhathi sebephumile endlini kusha bazithele emalungwini omphakathi abemile egcekeni kepha engekho owenza imizamo yokucisha umlilo. Uma bebuzwa ukuthi kungani bengalekeleli kuthiwa bakhale ngokuthi inkinga amanzi ahlala engekho kule ndawo abahlala kuyona. Umufi uSmamkele kuthiwa uzwakele ekhala ememeza ecela usizo kodwa ibingekho indawo okungabambeka kuyona ngoba ibisibomvu indlu wumlilo.UNkk Mbuyisa uthe bezwe ubuhlungu obukhulu njengoba isidumbu sikaZisanda besixebule embhedeni abelele kuwo kwathi esikaSmamkele basithola eduze komnyango, okukholakala ukuthi ubengakuwona ezama ukuphuma.Uthe nokuthi yizidumbu bamane bayasho nje ngoba bese beqoqa amathambo bewalayisha kocwazi.Unina wala mantombazanyana ashonile, uBawinile, kuthiwa ungeniswe esibhedlela eMshiyeni njengoba eshile. Umndeni wakhe uthe ubona nokuthi uphithanelwe wumqondo njengoba ekhuluma izinto ezingekho. Kuthiwa ngaphambi kokuthi ayiswe esibhedlela ubelokhu ekhala ngokuthi ufuna ukuyobona izingane zakhe esibhedlela.UNkk Mbuyisa uthe ibathusile indlela abenze ngayo abantu baseMatendeni bebukela kusha izingane zomtanakhe bezwile zikhala ngosizo, bangenza mnyakazo. Uthe yena akahlali kule ndawo njengoba bedabuka eZingolweni, ufike njengoba sekwenzeke isigameko.UMlondi osindile naye kuthiwa uyiswe esibhedlela ukuyohlolwa kodwa kuthiwa isimo asisibi kuyena.Okhulumela amaphoyisa kwaZulu-Natal, uConstable Thenjiswa Ngcobo, uthunyeliwe imibuzo, wathi uzobheka namaphoyisa aseMlaza. Uphinde washayelwa ucingo, wathi usafonela amaphoyisa aseMlaza. Ugcine engasalubambi ucingo uma eshayelwa kwaze kwashaya isikhathi  sokushicilela.

NAKUBA baziwa ngokuba ngenye yezinkampani ezihamba phambili ngokukhiqiza izikhali zombutho wezempi kuleli zwe nasemazweni omhlaba, kodwa babona kungakeneli asebekwenzeile uma kuqhathaniswa nabasakufisa kule ndima.Labo yinkampani iMilkor, esizakhele udumo umhlaba wonke selokhu yasungulwa ngo-1981, ngokuba yinkampani ethenjwayo ekukhiqizeni izikhali, iziklebhe nama-drone kobuchwepheshe besimanje.UMnuz Daniel Du Plessis wale nkampani, ikomkhulu layo elisePitoli, futhi enamahhovisi okusebenzela eGoli naseKapa, uthe ukuhlale beshisekela ukwenza okukhulu, kwenza babone umsebenzi asebewenzile unganele futhi ungakapheli.“Singabantu abahlale bezihlupha ngokuthi singenzanjani ukuthi umsebenzi esiwenzayo uhlale usezingeni elicokeme, okwenza kuthi noma amakhasimende ethu esincoma nabantu bengawuvali umlomo ngesikwenzayo, kodwa singaboni sesifanelwe wukuhudula izinyawo. Sihlale sifuna okukhulu,” kusho yena.Eqhuba, uthe balapha abakhona manje nje, indaba yaqala ngokuthi benze iziqhumane ezisetshenziswa ngabombutho wezempi, okuthe ngo-1994 benabela emazweni omhlaba.“Kuthe ngo-2017 sadlondlobala kakhulu ezweni, sase sandisa nezinto esizenzayo njengoba manje sesikhiqiza nezimoto ezinkulu ezisetshenziswa empini. Sisanda kukhiqiza nohlobo lwe-drone eyenziwe ngobuchwepheshe besimanje bezinga eliphezulu futhi enkulu kunawo wonke akhona e-Afrika.“Sesidayise imikhiqizo yethu engaphezu kwa-62 00 emazweni omhlaba angaphezu kwa-50 emhlabeni wonke kule minyaka ewu-43 sikhona. Kanti asimile njengoba sisafuna ukuqhubeka senze okukhulu, futhi sandise amathuba omsebenzi ikakhulu kubantu abasha ngoba bayikusasa,” kusho uDu Plessis.I-Milkor inabasebenzi abawu-500, okuhlanganisa abawu-320 ebaqashe eKapa.UDu Plessis ucebise abantu abafuna ukungena endimeni yabo ukukhuthalela ukwenza izifundo zobunjiniyela bamakhemali nezobuchwepheshe besimanje.

BASABISE ngokugqugquzela wonke amalungu eqembu loMkhonto weSizwe Party ukuthi anqamule ubulungu bawo nebhange i-First National Bank uma liqhubeka nokuvala i-akhawunti yowayenguMengameli weZwe uMnuz Jacob Zuma.Idlanzana lamalungu e-MK Party elimashele emahhovisi aleli bahange eThekwini, izolo lidlulisele uhlu lwezikhalo kwiziphathimandla zalo, ezinikezwe umnqamulajuqu wezinsuku eziyisikhombisa ukuthi zivule ama- akhawunti kaZuma.Obehola le mashi uMnuz Bhekisisa Ngcobo efunda uhlu lwezikhalo, usole ibhange ngokuba nenhlese yezepolitiki odabeni lokuvalwa kwama -akhawunti.“Sifuna ukuthi ibhange livule ama-akhawunti kaZuma kungenjalo wonke amalungu e-MK Party azolishiya phansi ibhange ukukhombisa ukuzwelana nomholi walo. Sifuna futhi leli bhange linxephezele uZuma ngokumthunaza isithunzi emphakathini limvalela ama-akhawunti akhe,” usho kanje.Leli bhange ngesikhathi kuvela izindaba zokuvalwa kwe-akhawunti kaZuma, liqinisekise ukuthi ayivaliwe, kodwa kuvalwe kuphela imali ephumayo, i-akhawunti iyasebenza. Kuthiwa lokhu kwenziwe ukulandela umyalelo weNkantolo eNkulu yaseMgungundlovu.Ngokwemibiko yabezindaba, isinqumo i-akhawunti yase-FNB kaZuma ivela njengokufakwa kuyo imali-mboleko engu-R7.8 million evela ebhange i-VBS, okumele ayikhokhe.UNobhala-Jikelele we-ANC uMnuz Fikile Mbalula ekhasini lakhe kwi- X, ucashunwe eveza ukuthi kungamanga aluhlaza okushiwo abe-MK Party njengoba befuna ukuphendula udaba lwesikweletu sikaZuma lubukeke njengento yezepolitiki.“Njengawo wonke umuntu owenze isikweletu, kumele asikhokhe. Waboleka imali ngakho kufanele ayikhokhe. Uma imali ingakhokhwa, ibhange linomthwalo wokuya kunoma iyiphi inkantolo ukuzama ukuthola izindlela elingakhokheleka ngazo mali yalo,” kubhalwe kanje.

UPHENYO lweCompetition Commission luveza ukuthi basakhishwa inyumbazane abalimi abancane abamnyama emakethe kaR53 billion, yokudayiswa kwezithelo namaveji.Kuleli sonto iCompetition Commission iveze ukuthi akukho ukuncintisana okuhle emakethe yokudayiswa kwezithelo namaveji ngoba izitolo ezinkulu ezilawula intengo yokudayiswa kwezithelo namaveji.IPhini likaKhomishana weCompetition Commission, uMnuz Hardin Ratshisisu, lithe imakethe yokudayiswa kwezithelo namaveji ingenisa uR53 billion eNingizimu Afrika. Wathi kuleyo mali kukhona uR21 billion ongena ezimakethe zamaveji ezinkulu, noR32 billion ongena ezitolo zokudla ezinkulu.Udalule nokuthi izitolo ezinkulu ziyasebenzisana ekutheni zilawule intengo yamaveji nezithelo. Yikho okwenza kungabikhona ukuncintisana okuhle.URatshisisu uqhube wathi nezinkampani ezikhiqiza imbewu nezikhiqiza umanyolo nezinye izinsiza zolimo kufanele zehlise intengo yemikhiqizo ngoba ukubiza kwayo kukhiphela abalimi abancane ngaphandle.Ukhale ngokuthi umanyolo namanye amakhemikhali asetshenziswa kwezolimi alandwa phesheya. Uthe izitolo ezinkulu ziyasebenzisana ukulawula intengo yegilosa futhi azikho izitolo ezincane ezingena ezinxanxatheleni zezitolo ukuze kuzoba nokuncintisana okuhle.Uphakamise ukuthi izitolo kufanele zivulele abalimi abancane imakethe futhi zilungise nemithetho ebakhiphela ngaphandle abalimi abancane. Uthe akukho ukuncintisana okuhle phakathi kwabalimi ngoba abancane abakwazi ukungena ezimakethe ezidayisa amaveji nezithelo ngoba kuwu-1% kuphela wemali eyenziwa kulezi zimakethe engena emaphaketheni abalimi abancane.Baye baphenya ukudayiswa kwamazambane, u-anyanisi, izaqatha, iklabishi, utamatisi, ispinashi, amagrebhisi, ama-orintshi, ubhanana, amapheya namagrebhisi.URatshisisu uthe abalimi abancane babuye babe nenkinga yokuthola usizo lwezimali ngenxa yokuthi abanawo amanzi okuchelela amaveji nezithelo zabo njengabalimi abamhlophe.Ugqqugquzele abantu ukuthi baphawule ngalo mbiko beze nezincomo ngokuthumela i-email ku:[email protected] Izinhlangano zabalimi azitholakalanga ukuphawula ngalo mbiko njengoba zithe zisazowufunda kahle ngaphambi kokubeka imibono yazo.

PHEZU kokuba iKwaZulu-Natal inomhlaba ovundile wokulima kodwa ucwaningo lwakamuva loMnyango wezoLimo luveza ukuthi abantu baseZululand, Mkhanyakude, Mzinyathi naseHarry Gwala basabulawa yindlala.Lo mbiko udluliselwe ngokusemthethweni kuNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thami Ntuli noMphathiswa wezoLimo kulesi sifundazwe, uNkk Thembeni kaMadlopha-Mthethwa izolo, e-Olive Convention Centre, eThekwini.UDkt Jemina Moeng onguMqondisi wezokuVikelwa kokudla eMnyangweni wezoLimo kuzwelonke , uthe ucwaningo lwabo luqale lwabheka ukuthi abantu banakho yini ukudla ezweni jikelele, bathola ukuthi kukhona kodwa kusenezindawo lapho abantu belala bengadlile.“INingizimu Afrika ikhiqiza ukudla okungasuthisa bonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika. Sibe sesehla sibheka izifundazwe nazo zonke izifunda zakhona. Sithole ukuthi iZululand, Mkhanyakude, Mzinyathi neHarry Gwala inabantu abalala bengadlile. Yisimo esibi lesi ngoba KwaZulu-Natal kunomhlabathi ovundile,” kusho uDkt Moeng.Uveze ukuthi babuye bathola ukuthi KwaZulu-Natal kunesibalo esikhulu sabantu abakhuluphele ngokweqile kwathi e-Eastern Cape naseNorthern Cape bathola abafishane nabondile.Uthe yize iKwaZulu-Natal ingakhiqizi imbewu nemfuyo eningi kodwa incintisana neGauteng ngokukhiqiza imifino.Uzwakalise ukujabula ngokuthi umbiko uthathwe wuNdunankulu noMphathiswa wezoLimo esho ukuthi njengoba belande abasebenzi boMnyango wezoLimo esifundazweni unalo ithemba lokuthi abantu balesi sifundazwe bazogqugquzeleka ukuba balime.UNtuli uthe bazoba sembhidlangweni wokuqeda indlala ngokugqugquzela abantu ukuba balime kuzo zonke izifunda.“Luzobuya uhlelo lwezingadi, sifuna izingadi emitholampilo, ezibhedlela, ezikoleni nasemakhaya. Ngizohambela zonke izifunda ngibheke ukuthi ngabe yonke imizi inezingadi. Sizoqinisekisa ukuthi abantu bathola imbewu, izithombo nomanyolo,” kusho uNtuli.Uthe uzohambela zonke izikhungo zikahulumeni kungazi muntu ukubona ukuthi umsebenzi uqhubeka kanjani njengoba ebonakale esibhedlela iPrince Mshiyeni ngeledlule.UMphathiswa wezoLimo KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Thembeni kaMadlopha-Mthethwa, uthe ezolimo zinamandla okuqeda indlala nokuvula amathuba amaningi omsebenzi ngakho intsha kufanele ingene kulo mkhakha.Naye uthembise ukweseka abalimi nabo bonke abantu baKwaZulu-Natal ngembewu, izithombo, omanyolo nazo zonke izidingo zabo.

INHLOKO yoKlebe kuzwelonke, uLt. Gen Godfrey Lebeya, ithi sebebophe abantu abawu-33 abathinteka ekudliweni kukaR2 billion webhange i-VBS Mutual Bank elawa nemali yabantu.NgoLwesihlanu uLebeya uthe sekusele kancane babophe abawu-43 abasele njengoba sebeqoqe izitatimende eziwu-2 900 ophenyweni lwabo oluqhubekayo.I-VBS Mutual Bank yawa ngo-2019 emuva kokubhubhudlwa kwemali.Kwakukhona omasipala abawu-14 ababelondoloze kuyo imali nabantu abangaphezu kuka-20 000.ULebeya uthe bazolandelwa bonke abadla imali yaseVBS ngoba oKlebe abamile ukusebenza.Ukuwa kweVBS kwenza ukuthi ibhange lombuso, iSouth African Reserve Bank, lisungule umshwalense ozovikela abantu uma kuwa amabhange.Lo mshwalense obizwa nge-Corporation for Deposit Insurance (Codi) olunxephezela abantu ngemali efinyelela kuR100 000.Khonamanjalo uLebeya uthe luyaqhubeka nodaba lokubopha abathinteka ekudliweni kukaR200 billion eSteinhoff.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi owayeyisikhulu esiphezulu uMnuz Markus Jooste, wazibulala emuva kokuboshwa.Kubuye kwaboshwa owayephethe imali kule nkampani uMnuz Benjamin La Grange ozinikele koKlebe wadedelwa ngebheyili kaR150.000. Uzobuyela enkantolo ngo-Okthoba 4.ICosatu ithe iyajabula ngokuboshwa kwezikhulu zaseSteinhoff ngoba kukhona noMnuz Stehan Grobler owayebhekelele ezomthetho kule nkampani.Ithe kufanele baboshwe bonke abathinteka enkohlakalweni yaseSteinhoff ngoba abasebenzi balahlekelwa wuR4.3 billion.Icele iFinancial Sector Conduct Authority ukuthi iqhubeke nokulanda uR475 million owawuhlawuliswe uJooste nezinye izimali ayezithukusile.

SEBEPHENDUKE ondingasithebeni abahlali basebhilidini uStrathdon elisekhoneni lomgwaqo uPark no-Maud Mfusi enkabeni yeTheku njengoba bekhishiwe kuleli bhilidi.Izimpahla zabo okubalwa kuzo imibhede, amafriji, amathelevishini nokunye, kusaphazwe emgwaqweni ngoba kuthiwa abanazo izincwadi eziyisivumelwano sokuqashisa futhi bahleli ngokungemthetho.Omunye wabahlali ongathandanga ukudalulwa ngoba ebona engaphephile, utshele Isolezwe ukuthi abantu abakhishwayo abahlala kuleli bhilidi ngokungemthetho.“Into ebuhlungu ukuthi kukhishwa nabantu abanezivumelwano zokuqasha. Kuthiwa abakhiphe zona lezi zincwadi ezingekho kubona ezikumuntu owadayisa ibhilidi. Uma sizama ukubafonela, laba esenza nabo isivumelwano sokuqashisa bona basikhomba kwabathenga ibhilidi,” kusho lo mhlali.Uthe leli bhilidi beselifana nezindlu zomxhaso kubo.“Kunabantu abese behlale iminyaka engu-27 kuleli bhilidi. Asinayo nendawo esizoya kuyo njengoba sesilahlwe ngaphandle nje. Akekho umuntu osichazelayo ngalokhu okwenzekayo. Abantu abadayisa ibhilidi asibatholi ezingcingweni, kanti laba abasikhiphayo bathi ibhilidi balithenga endalini,” usho kanje.Uqhube wathi imali yerenti bebeyikhokha njalo ngenyanga, kushintshe njengoba sekufike abaphathi abasha bebhilidi.“Besesingazi ukuthi imali yerenti sizoyikhokha kubani. Sathunyelelwa izincwadi sitshelwa ukuthi kumele siyikhokhe kubaphathi abasha okungabaphathi esingenaso isivumelwano nabo. Sizamile nokuthola ummeli osithembise ukuthi lolu daba uzolufaka enkantolo, asingayikhokhi irenti okwamanje size sibathole laba esilwa nabo.”Uthe ngeke aqinisekise ukuthi imali yerenti bekuyimalini, kodwa abantu abebefaneleka ukuthi bahlale bekungabantu abahola imali elinganiselwa ku-R3 500 kuya phezulu, ebese bekhokha imali yerenti engu-R1 500 noma u-R1 800 kushiyana ngesivumelwano obanaso.Amanye amabhilidi okukhishwe kuwo abahleli ngokungemthetho yiCarlen Cort, Tarbora neWeltevrede.Ayiphumelelanga imizamo yokuthola abanikazi bamabhilidi ukuze baphawule. Nakhu okumele ukuqaphele uma urenta noma uthenga ibhilidi:Kumele wazi umnikazi walelo bhilidi futhi kumele ube nesivumelwano sokuqashisa.Kumele ukhokhe irenti ngesikhathi ukuze ugweme ukuxoshwa. Uma umninindlu ekuxosha ngaphandle kokukunika isaziso, unelungelo lokumbika kwa-Rental Housing Tribunal noma ubathinte ku-031 372 1800/02/03/04 noma uthumele i-email [email protected]

KUMNYAMA kubantu abalinganiselwa ku-87 abashelwe yimijondolo ebalelwa ku-52 eSiyathuthuka, eKenville, eThekwini, ngoMgqibelo.Ngokusho kosekomitini le-ward kule ndawo, uMnuz Mashinini Nkosi, akukacaci ukuthi yini ebe yimbangela yomlilo.Ekhuluma neSolezwe, uchaze ukuthi uphathiswe uphiko lwezinhlekelele kule ndawo, wathi ngesikhathi eyihambela uthole ukuthi yize kungafanga muntu, futhi engekho olimele kodwa abantu baphume nebebekugqokile kuphela.Uthe emva kokuthintwa kwekhansela lendawo kanjalo nophiko lwezinhlekelele ngaphansi kukaMasipala weTheku, abagilwa bathole usizo lwezingubo zokulala, izipontshi nokudla.Nokho ukhale ngokuthi bagcine belala emnyango.“Sibone imvula kanjalo nokwanda kwezigameko zobugebengu, ngathinta iziphathimandla, zathembisa ukuthi kuzolethwa itende ukuthi balale kulo abantu kodwa ligcine lingafikanga,” kulandisa uNkosi.Uqhube wathi okubakhathazayo ukuthi abantu abaphephile nhlobo kule ndawo njengoba bebulawa mihla namalanga.“Sinovalo lokuthi bangagetshengwa njengoba behleli emnyango,” kusho yena.Uthe kwaziswe noMnyango wezokuHlaliswa kwaBantu kuzwelonke, nathi uvame ukusiza abashelwe ngempahla yokwakha ukuze bavuse imijondolo yabo, wathi nokho bebengakezwa mpendulo kuwona kodwa badinga usizo masinyane ngoba abantu abakwazi ukuqhubeka bahlale esigangeni.Ukhale ngokuthi sekungokwesikhombisa kusha umlilo endaweni eyodwa kule mijondolo.Ebalula isintu, uthe kwasha ingane kule ndawo, yashona kanye noyise maqede imiphefumulo yabo yangalandwa.Uthe kuleso sigameko ngesikhathi isha ingane ngaphakathi emjondolo, uyise wathi uyazama ukuyikhipha, naye washa.“Ingane yashonela endaweni yesigameko, kwathi yena washonela esibhedlela. Lesi sigameko senzeka eminyakeni emine edlule,” kulandisa uNkosi.Uthe basola ukungalandwa kwemiphefumulo yabo ngalo mlilo ohlasela uphindelela endaweni eyodwa.Ikhansela lendawo, uMnuz Ashok Maharajh, lithe yize lingakayihambeli indawo yesigameko, kodwa libikelwe ngaso.“Ngiwuthintile ngokushesha umasipala, ngizwa ngabasekomitini ukuthi bafikile abezinhlekelele belethe olunye usizo, kwaphinde kwafika nabenhlangano engenzinzuzo iRed Cross nabo belethe usizo,” kusho uMaharajh.Uthe okumkhathazayo ukuthi bebengakalutholi usizo lwenye indawo yokuthi bafihle amakhanda.“Bengingakatholi mpendulo kumasipala ngalokho,” kusho uMaharajh.Uthembisile ukuthi uzoya kobabheka abagilwa uma ephuma emhlanganweni ntambama izolo.

IZAKHAMIZI zaseMariannhill zivuswe wukuduma kwezulu lezandla ngoLwesithathu ekuseni eDesai, eMariannhill ngesikhathi amaphoyisa  egasela lapho obekuhleli khona abasolwa ngokuba yizigebengu ebezihlalise lubhojozi umphakathi kule ndawo.Ngokwesitatimende samaphoyisa, bayisishiyagalolunye abasolwa abafe ujuqu kanti babili abasathungathwa.Laba bebefunelwa amacala ahlukene okubalwa kuwo ukudlwengula nokubamba inkunzi emizini yabantu. “Kuthiwa abasolwa bahlasela kubo kwale ntombazane bezogebenga maqede bayidlwengula beshintshana ngayo umama wayo ekhona,” kusho uColonel Robert Netshiunda okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal. UCol Netshiunda uthe uphenyo lwamaphoyisa luveze ukuthi laba basolwa bebehlela ukuyosoconga umuntu ngoLwesithathu, yilapho anqume ukubavimbezela ngesikhathi ezwa ukuthi bahlangene emzini okhona kule ndawo.Emzini okwenzeke kuwo isigameko amaphoyisa aveza ukuthi athole izibhamu ezine okukhona kuzo nesikhulu.Amalungu emindeni yabasolwa okuvele ukuthi bangabasendaweni afikile ezohlonza izidumbu zababulewe. Uphenyo lwamaphoyisa luyaqhubeka. Kubonakale kufika izimoto ezithatha izidumbu, kuphuma nabantu behlengezela izinyembezi lapho okudutshulwe khona abasolwa abayisishiyagalolunye eMariannhill. 🎥 Khulekani Maseko pic.twitter.com/FdCesayqEV

SIPHULUKUNDLELE amaphoyisa asala ebambe ophaca, isiboshwa okuthiwa sishiye imantshi nezikhonzi zenkantolo zibambe ongezansi sijomba ebhokisini labasolwa emva komyalelo wokuthi sibuyiselwe ekhulukuthu.UMnuz Ntuthuko Nxumalo (30), obevele okokuqala eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseGlencoe, ebhekene necala lokweba, kuthiwa ushiye amaphoyisa nonogada behlanza udende ngesikhathi ecela empunzini engena ehlathini, eshiya enkantolo ophaca abebacathulele. Ngesikhathi sokushicelela, Isolezwe  lithole ngomthombo walo ukuthi ubesagcwelwe amathafa. Lo mthombo obukhona enkantolo ngesikhathi kwenzeka lesi sigameko, uthe imantshi beyisanda kukhipha isinqumo sokuthi abuyiselwe ngaphakathi kwazise ubevela okokuqala ngecala lokuntshontsha.“Imantshi ithe iqeda nje ukumtshela ukuthi icala lakhe liyahlehla, uzogqunywa esitokisini kuze kube wuSepthemba 17, waphulukundlela wadla phansi ephuma ngomnyango wenkantolo. Bekukhona amaphoyisa amabili asenkantolo nonogada, bazama ukumbamba kodwa wajomba ucingo wangena ehlathini, kwaba ukunyamalala kwakhe,” usho kanje.Uthe umsolwa uvela nje, ubevele edonsa isigwebo esithile esilengisiwe ngawo amacala okuntshontsha angaxhumene naleli abevele ngalo enkantolo, njengoba ayetholwe enecala ezinyangeni ezimbalwa ezedlule, wagwetshwa. Kuthiwa amaphoyisa amabili azamile ukumshekelela kangangoba elinye lize ladubula ngenhloso yokumfaka amanzi emadolweni, kodwa kwanhlanga zimuka nomoya, waqhubeka nokubaleka.Kushaye isikhathi sokushicilela, okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Robert Netshiunda engakayiphenduli imibuzo athunyelwe yona ukuqinisekisa lesi sigameko.

UMNYANGO wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal ubukeka untula umkhombandlela noma ukucaciseleka mayelana nohlelo lokuqashwa kodokotela abaqhinqe emahhovisi oMphathiswa walo mnyango kusukela ngoLwesibili.Lokhu kushiwo imenenja yenyunyana yabasebenzi bakahulumeni, iPublic Servants Association SA (PSA) KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mlungisi Ndlovu  ejoyine labo dokotela abebekhombisa ukungenami kwabo ngokumasha phambi kwebhilidi elinehhovisi likaMphathiswa walo mnyango uNksz Nomagugu Simelane, iNatalia Building eMgungundlovu, izolo.Labo dokotela balokhu behlale ngaphambi kwaleli hhovisi ngoLwesibili bathi bazobuyela emakhaya nezincwadi  zokuthi sebethathiwe  njengoba kwethembisa uNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo uDkt Joe Phaahla ngoFebhuwari  ukuthi kuzoqashwa odokotela abangu-800 abangaqashiwe kule nyanga. Bathi ezinye izifundazwe seziluqalile lolu hlelo kodwa kulesi sifundazwe kuthulekile."Sifuna ukuthi uMnyango wezeMpilo esifundazweni uluqale ngokushesha uhlelo lokuqasha odokotela njengoba uNgqongqoshe athembisa.  Kuyasimangaza ukuthi umnyango esifundazweni uthi  awunayo imali ekubeni uNgqongqoshe athi kwisabelomali salo mnyango izobakhona imali. Kubukeka sengathi umnyango untula ukucaciseleka ngokuthi odokotela abesebephothule izifundo zabo bafunani. SiyiPSA siyazwelana nabo ingakho silapha namhlanje, "  kusho uNdlovu.UDkt Thuba Nkabinde, ongomunye wodokotela abangaqashiwe abalokhu behlale ngoLwesibili ehhovisi likaMphathiswa, uthe kubadumazile ukuthi uMphathiswa, utshele izintatheli ukuthi imali ayikho ekubeni lolu daba lungakadingidwa kahle."Inhloko yomnyango, uDkt Sandile Tshabalala, akukho okucacile asitshele kona. UNgqongoshe wakubeka kwacaca ukuthi sizoqashwa futhi siyakubona kwenzeka kwezinye izifundazwe ngoba sezikhona izikhangiso. Kulesi esethu kuthule manje sekuthiwa imali ayikho,"  kusho uNkabinde.Usihlalo we-IFP  uMnuz Thami Ntuli, uthe akwamukelekile ukuthi  odokotela bashaywe indiva noma sebehleli ngaphandle kwehhovisi likaMphathiswa."Lokhu  kukhombisa ukungabi nanhlonipho kukahulumeni  waseKZN. Kuyakhathaza kakhulu ukuthi  izikhungo zezempilo nezibhedlela zikahulumeni KwaZulu-Natal zibhekene nenkinga  yokushoda kodokotela kodwa uhulumeni akakuboni ukuphuthuma kodaba lokuqashwa kwalaba basebenzi abaqeqeshiwe,"  kusho uNtuli esitatimendeni.UMnyango wezeMpilo esifundazweni ubungakaphenduli.

USATHUTHUMELA umndeni wephoyisa likaMasipala weTheku okuthiwa libulawe isoka lalo, nalo eliyiphoyisa kuwo lomasipala ngeSonto.UBiancha Khuzwayo (23) waseGlenmore eThekwini ugwazwe waze wafa eflethini elisemgwaqweni uJoseph Nduli enkabeni yeTheku, ezintatha zangeSonto.Umsolwa (27) kuthiwa umgwaze amanxeba angu-13 umufi, kwathi uma usuzophuma umphefumulo, washutha ivideo, wayisabalalisa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana nakubangani bakamufi.Kuyona kubonakala yena umufi ngemizuzu yakhe yokugcina. Kubonakala umtafula ubhajwe entanyeni kumufi, ephuma igazi ngamakhala elinye elixubene namagwebu liphuma ngomlomo. Isikibha esimhlophe abesigqokile umufi, naso sigcwele igazi.Kuvele ukuthi bebekade benephathi, lapho bebungaza khona ukuthi umsolwa uthenge iflethi. Kule phathi kuthiwa bekukhona abangani  nozakwabo abangamaphoyisa.Isolezwe lithinta unina, okuthiwe naye uyisikhulu esiphezulu emaphoyiseni kaMasipala weTheku, igama lakhe elingatholakalanga, uzwakale eluphendula ngomoya ophansi ucingo, kuzwakala ukuthi akekho esimeni esikahle sokukhuluma.Ezwa ukuthi intatheli emfonelayo, ucele ukudlulisa ucingo kumuntu ongaba namandla okukhuluma nabezindaba.Eluphendula owesifazane odluliselwe ucingo, uthe akukho abangakuphawula okwamanje.“Asazi kahle ukuthi kwenzekeni. Silinde ukuhlangana nomphenyi wecala ngoLwesibili, nokunguye esilinde ukuthi asilandise kabanzi, bese sikwazi ukuphawula kahle,” kusho lona wesifazane, okuthe uma ebuzwa igama, wavele waluvala ucingo.Abayixoxa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana bathi umufi ubekhulelwe. Sikhona nesithombe sikamufi nomsolwa ababukeka bejabule ngaphakathi egumbini likadokotela, phakathi kwabo kukhona i-screen se-ultrasound scan ekhombisa umntwana esiswini.Yize kungaveli ukuthi bese zingaki izinyanga kodwa kuthiwa umsolwa ubejabule, ezitshela ukuthi bazoba nomntwana nomufi.Kuthiwa konakale ngesikhathi ethola ngomngani kamufi ukuthi ingane ayithwele akuyona ekamsolwa nokuyilapho avele wamgwaza khona, wambulala.Ubesethatha i-video eyibhadlaza ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, nakuye lomngani obemputshuzele izindaba zokuthi ingane akuyona eyakhe.Umngani osolwa ngokuqhatha lezi zithandani uthelekelwe abantu khona ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, bembuza ukuthi uziqhatheleni izithandani, abanye bethi akaphumele obala ngokuthi ubambe liphi iqhaza ekutheni kuze kubulawe lona wesifazane.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe umsolwa kulindeleke ukuthi avele ngoLwesibili eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini.Uthe ngokwemibiko abayitholile, lezi zithandani beziphuze utshwala ngesikhathi owesilisa egwaza owesifazane embulala.“Kuthiwa uze waqopha ne-video ngesikhathi umufi esefa, wayithumela inqwaba yabantu, waphinde wayinameka nasezinkundleni zokuxhumana,” kusho uNetshiunda.Uqhube wathi yize kubikwa uphuzo oludakayo nezinye izidakamizwa esenzweni sikamsolwa, akukacaci ukuthi yini eholele ekutheni agwaze umufi.

BASASHAQEKILE namanje abazibonele owesilisa egwaza ebulala okusolwa ukuthi uyintombi yakhe ngeSonto, enxanxatheleni yezitolo iGateway, eMhlanga, eThekwini.Kulesi sigameko kushone owesifazane oneminyaka engu-30, kwaboshwa abesilisa ababili, okuthiwa kubona kukhona isoka likamufi.Ozibonele senzeka isigameko, wacela ukungadalulwa, uthe kusuke ingxabano phakathi kukamsolwa nomufi ngesikhathi behambisana bebheke erenki yamatekisi.“Kubonakele ukuthi kukhona abaphikisana ngakho, yize singeke sazi ukuthi bebephikisana ngani. Sithe sibona lona wesilisa, wabe edonsa ummese egwaza umufi, kwatshaza igazi ngaso leso sikhathi,” kusho umthombo.Uqhube wachaza ukuthi umufi uvele waphelela lapho kanti ubegwazwe endaweni embi. Uthe bekukhona abantu nezingane ezincane eduze kwendawo yesigameko nokwenze ukuthi kuthuke wonke umuntu.“Namanje asiyikholwa leya nto,” kusho umthombo.Uthe umsolwa usheshe waboshwa ngoba isehlo senzeke enxanxatheleni yezitolo lapho kunenqwaba yononogada.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi umsolwa ubehamba nomngani wakhe.IMenenja yezokukhangisa enxanxatheleni yezitolo uNkk Ayesha Sewbaran, isiqinisekisile isigameko yathi senzeke eduze kwerenki yamatekisi emini ngeSonto.Wathi inxanxathela yezitolo ikubeka phambili ukuphepha kwabathengi yikho udaba selwedluliselwe emaphoyiseni ukuthi aluphenye.“Abenzi bobubi baboshiwe ngamaphoyisa, ngebhadi umgilwa ushonile. IGateway ithumela amazwi enduduzo emndenini kamgilwa nabangani,” kusho uNkk Sewbaran.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa aseDurban North, abophe abesilisa ababili oneminyaka engu-37, nengu-44 ngecala lokubulala owesifazane oneminyaka engu-30.“Umufi ugwazwe waze wafa ngeSonto eMhlanga. Bobabili abasolwa bazovela eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini,” kusho uNetshiunda.Uqhube wathi imibiko ithe umgilwa nabasolwa babenengxabano, oyedwa wabasolwa wakhipha ummese wagwaza, wabulala umufi.“Bazamile ukubaleka kodwa amaphoyisa ababopha,” kusho uNetshiunda.

BASABALWA nabanye abasebenzi abaxhashazwayo abasebenzi basezindlini njengoba ucwaningo lwakamuva lweSweepSouth luveza ukuthi abaholelwa ngokohlelo lwe-National Minimum Wage (NMW).ISweepSouth yinhlangano efunela abasebenzi basezindlini umsebenzi.Ngokwe-NMW umsebenzi kufanele ahole uR27.58 ngehora okusho ukuthi ngosuku kufanele athole uR220.64.Ucwaningo lwenziwe kubasebenzi basezindlini abawu-5 600 okugcwele kubo abesifazane abaneminyaka ewu-26 kuya kwewu-41.Kuvele ukuthi abaqashe abasebenzi basezindlini abakwazi ukuholela abantu iNMW ngenxa yezindleko zokuphila, bakhale ngokuthi nabo amaholo abo aphelela kugesi, ekuthengeni igilosa nasemalini kaphethroli neyezinye izidingo zempilo.Kuvele ukuthi abasebenzi basezindlini baholelwa uR2 659 uma besebenze inyanga yonke ezifundazweni eziningi kanti kukhona nabasaholelwa imali engaphansi kwalena.Kuthiwa izifundazwe eziholela kangcono yi-Gauteng neWestern Cape njengoba khona umsebenzi wesifazane wasendlini ohola kancane ethola uR3 349 ngenyanga, bese kuthi owesilisa ovamise ukusebenza engadini athole uR3 059 ngenyanga.Abasebenzi basendlini abahola kangconywana bathola uR3 792 ngenyanga bese kuthi abayitoho bathole uR3 250 ngenyanga.Kuvela ukuthi abokufika bagcwele kulo mkhakha njengoba u-59% okukhulunywe nawo udabuka eZimbabwe, u-37% ngowakuleli bese u-3% kube ngowaseMalawi.Kuthiwe u-83% wabasebenzi basezindlini yiwona kuphela osebenzayo emindenini yawo, unabantu abane abathembele kuwo.UNkk Pinky Mashiane ongumengameli wenyunyana i-United Domestic Workers of South Africa, uthe akubamangazi ukuthi abasebenzi basezindlini baholelwa kancane badlulwa ngisho ngabasemapulazini.“Basaxhashazwa abasebenzi basezindlini, sidinga ukuthi uhulumeni athumele abahloli emizini ehlukene ukuze bayoqinisekisa ukuthi abasebenzi baholelwa malini. Kubuhlungu ngoba manje sesixhashazwa ngabantu bakithi okuyibona abaholela imali encane kakhulu,” kusho uNkk Mashiane.Uthe bazoqhubeka nokugqugquzela abasebenzi ukuthi bangene enyunyaneni ukuze bathole ubulungiswa. Ubalule ukuthi abanye abaqashi abayifaki nemali ye-Unemployment insurance fund (uif) okuba yinkinga uma abasebenzi sebexoshiwe.Uveze ukuthi abasebenzi banikwa uhlu lomsebenzi okufanele bawenze kodwa uyanda njalo ngenyanga kodwa iholo limi ndawonye.Njengamanje abasebenzi abaqashelwe ukuhlanza indlu kuphela kufanele okungenani bathole uR3 349, abasebenza engadini bathole uR3 128, abagada izingane bathola uR3 464, abagada abadala bahola uR3 324 bese abaqashelwe ukupheka bathole uR3 463.UNkk Lourandi Kriel oyisikhulu esiphezulu seSweepSouth, uthe ucwaningo lwabo kufanele luvuse wonke umuntu waseNingizimu Afrika ukuthi abe nozwelo, aholele umsebenzi wasendlini imali efanele.Naye uthe uhulumeni kufanele athumele abahloli futhi ajezise  abangaholeli imali enqunyiwe.Abaqashi abakhulume neSolezwe bathe nabo abakwazi ukuholela abasebenzi basezindlini imali enqunyiwe ngenxa yokuthi igilosa isibiza uR5 252.15,  ugesi uyabiza kanti nemali mboleko inyuka umlibe.UNkk Nqobile Mahlangu (40) ozinze eGoli, uthe ubenomsebenzi oqashelwe ukuhlanza ikhaya abemholela ngokohlelo lwe-NMW iminyaka eyisishiyagalombili bahlukana uma esefuna ukuzosebenzela eThekwini.Uthe ubewenza kahle umsebenzi kanti emuva kokuthi elahlekelwa wuye uye wathola abantu abangazimiseli ngomsebenzi abebefuna ukuholelwa ngokwe-NMW kodwa bengawenzi kahle umsebenzi. Uveze ukuthi abanye bebengathandi nokutshelwa ukuthi bawenze kanjani umsebenzi. Ubalule ukuthi ukubiza kwempilo kwenza abanye abaqashi bangakwazi ukuholela ngokohlelo lwe-NMW kodwa baye baxoxisane nalabo abadinga umsebenzi ukuthi mhlawumbe bano-R2 500 bese bezwana. Njengamanje uthe unomsebenzi ofika ngempelasonto ngenxa yokuthi akamtholi umsebenzi oziphatha kahle enze okulindeleke kuye.

BAZOZIFAKA ngesonto elizayo izicelo zebheyili abasebenzi abawu-13 bakaMasipala waseThekwini, ababoshelwe ukuvala umgwaqo eSydneham, abebevele enkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini.Laba basebenzi bekulindeleke ukuthi izolo bafake isicelo sebheyili kodwa umshushisi, uMnuz Calvin Govender, wathi uMbuso uzokuhlehlisa ukulalelwa kwesicelo salaba basebenzi abangaphansi kwenyunyana, iSouth African Municipal Workers’ Union (Samwu), ngoba usafuna ukuthola olunye ulwazi ngababoshiwe. Ummeli wabo, ephendula umshushisi, uthe akhona amakheli abo bonke abasolwa kodwa umshushisi wathi amakheli wodwa awenele, basadinga olunye ulwazi oluchaza ukuthi basebenza kuwo yini umasipala bonke, uma kunjalo kumuphi umnyango noma abanye abangamalungu omphakathi."Ngesikhathi beboshwa abasolwa kwaba nesiphithiphithi ngoba babebaningi abantu kuleyo ndawo. Kusadingeka ukuthi sithole ulwazi oluphelele ngabo ngaphambi kokuthi bafake isicelo sebheyili," kusho umshushisi.Imantshi ibe isikuhlehlisela uLwesithathu oluzayo ukulalelwa kwesicelo sebheyili.UGovender uthe umsolwa ngamunye ubekwe amacala amabili elokudala udlame emphakathini nelokulimaza impahla esemqoka okubalwa nengqalasizinda.Izihlobo nabeseka ababoshiwe abebegcwele enkantolo badumele ngalesi sinqumo. Bebengafuni ukukhuluma nezintatheli. Ngaphambi kokuthi kuqale icala, abasolwa batshele ummeli wabo ukuthi bafuna ukuthi izintatheli zingavunyelwa ukuthi zibashuthe, uma zivunyelwe zingabavesi ubuso.Umshushisi uthe: "Inkantolo iyisikhungo somphakathi esivulelekile, ngaphezu kwalokho, ama-video nezithombe zabasolwa zigcwele ezinkundleni zezokuxhumana.“USihlalo weSamwu eThekwini, uMnuz Siyabonga Dladla, ethintwa ngalokhu, uthe ufike ngemuva kwesikhathi, ubengekho enkantolo, ngakho ngeke aphawule.IMeya yeTheku, uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda esitatimendeni esithunyelelwe abezindaba, ithe ngeke balukhulume udaba lokungalingani kweholo iSamwu ekhala ngalo ngoba lolo daba olusingethwe ezingeni likazwelonke, umhlangano wakhona ungesonto elizayo."Abasebenzi beSamwu bathi abekho esitelekeni kodwa imiphakathi eminingi ivalelwe amanzi nogesi, kwezinye izindawo udoti awulandiwe okufaka ingcindezi emphakathini ozikhokhelayo lezi zidingo.  Abasebenzi abatholakala bephule umthetho bazobhekana nokuqondiswa kobugwegwe," kusho uKaunda.UMnuz Roshan Lil-Ruthan wenhlangano yomphakathi iVerulam Rate Payers Association, uthe lesi siteleka siholele ekutheni izakhamizi ezibalelwa ku-150 000 zaseVerulam zingabi nawo amanzi."Abantu abashayeke kakhulu abantu abahluphekayo abahlala ezindaweni eziyimijondolo, abangenazo izimoto zokuhamba bayofuna amanzi ezindaweni ezinawo noma imali yokuwathenga. Amaloli amanzi umasipala uke wawathumela kodwa ajika ngoba esatshiswa ngabasebenzi abatelekile,"  kusho uLil -Ruthan.

IMK ithi kusazophenduka amatafula KwaZulu-Natal, kukhishwe emandleni amaqembu ayikhipha inyumbazana ngesikhathi kuqokwa uhulumeni wobumbano KwaZulu-Natal.IMK ithe uhulumeni wobumbano owakhiwe i-IFP, ANC, DA neNFP, ngeke uhlale isikhathi eside.Lokhu bakusho ngesikhathi benemashi yokukhala ngemiphumela yokhetho abebeyibhekise eNkantolo eNkulu eMgungundlovu.Kule mashi iMK ibikhala ngemiphumela yokhetho.Osethimbeni lesikhashana elihola iMK esifundeni iMoses Mabhida, uMnuz Mzwandile Goge, uthe abantu baKwaZulu-Natal bavotela iMK ukuba iphathe isifundazwe.UGoge uthe izofezeka maduze intando yabantu baKwaZulu-Natal yokuthi kuphathe iMK.“Le sitokfela sesikhashana esiphethe lapha sizophela maduze. Ngicela nikhumbuze abantu abadala ukuthi bona bavotela iMK. Nibatshele ukuthi asimile, siyalwa.”Umgqugquzeli weMK esifundeni iMoses Mabhida, uMnuz Reggie Ngcobo, uthe abafuni nokuyizwa ekahulumeni wobumbano ohlanganisa iDA.“Ngeke sivume ukuphathwa uZille (usihlalo woMkhandlu weDA). Ngeke sivume ukuphathwa uSteenhuisen (umholi weDA).”UNgcobo uthe basamile ekutheni kukhona amavoti eMK angazange abalwe.Usho kanjana nje kunesikhulu senhlangano eyengamele ukhetho, i-Independent Electoral Commission (IEC), ebesivele eNkantolo yeMantshi eMgungundlovu, khona izolo.Le sikhulu saboshwa emva kokutholwa sihambisa amaphepha okuvota singagadiwe amaphoyisa.Izolo inkantolo izwe izethulo zabameli bommangalelwa nabe-IEC abathe icala kufanele liyolalelwa eNkantolo yezoKhetho, abeMK bona bafuna ukuthi liqhubeke khona eNkantolo yeMantshi.Inkantolo izonquma namhlanje ukuthi icala lizoqhubeka eNkantolo yeMantshi noma lizodluliselwa eNkantolo yezoKhetho.UNgcobo uthe ukuboshwa kwale sikhulu kufakazela lokhu abakushoyo ukuthi ukhetho lwalungakhululekile.“Kwasimangaza ukuzwa i-IEC ithi ukhetho belukhululekile ekubeni kunamacala asezinkantolo. Kazi bathini ngalesi sigebengu ebesivela lapha namhlanje.”UNgcobo uthe bafuna ukuthi umengameli wamaJaji KwaZulu-Natal, uThoba Portia Poyo-Dlwathi, achithwe ekubeni ijaji.“Kwakufanele alinde kuze kuphele amacala. Manje yena wavele wajaha ukuthi kukhethwe.”UNgcobo uthe uPoyo-Dlwathi kwakungafanele ahlalise umhlangano wokukhetha undunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal ekubeni kusenecala elisenkantolo.Uthe nenhloko yamaJaji, uRaymond Zondo, kwakungafanele ahlalise umhlangano wokuqoka umengameli.IMK ihambise uhlu lwezikhalo ethe ifuna lubhekwe iphini lenhloko yamaJaji, uMandisa Maya. “Asimthembi uZondo, ingakho sifuna ukuthi kube iJaji Maya eliphenyayo.”

LUSEYINDIDA namanje udaba lowesilisa waseNkonyane, eBulwer, okuvela ukuthi ubesezinhlelweni zokudivosa, okuthiwa wayaleza kwasebenza nabo ukuthi kubongwe uma ebuyile emsebenzini maqede wanyamalala unomphelo.UMnuz Sijabule Ngcobo kuthiwa wagcina ukubonwa ngoJulayi 16, emsebenzini wagcina ngoJulayi 15.Ngokusho komthombo, okuthusa abaningi ukuthi ezinsukwini ezimbalwa enyamalele, kwatholwa amateku anyamalala ewagqokile.Uchaza ukusuka nokuhlala kodaba, umthombo uthe uNgcobo wakhuluma amazwi ayindida kozakwabo emsebenzini ezothatha izinsuku ezintathu zokuphumula.Kuthiwa wabe esechitha isikhathi nomngani endaweni yokucima ukoma, babuya ekhaya ebusuku.“Kuthiwa ngoJulayi 17, umshana wakhe wahamba wayongqongqoza endlini kaNgcobo efuna amphuthumise esikoleni ngemoto yakhe ayeyibona ipakwe egcekeni ngoba wayeshiywe imoto ‘kamalume’. Kuthiwa akuphendulanga muntu endlini, wabe eseya emotweni ukuyombheka khona, wazithela phezu kukamngani elele,” kusho umthombo.Uveze ukuthi umngani wathi uma ebuzwa ukuthi uphi uNgcobo, wathi ngesikhathi befika ebusuku, uthe useyolala endlini.Uthe kwaqalwa lapho ukubhekwa kwakhe, kodwa wangatholwa, kwaze kwayobikwa emaphoyiseni.“Sethukile sekutholwa amateku ayewagqokile endaweni, yena kodwa engabonakali. Asisazi ukuthi kwenzekani,” kusho umthombo.Uthe abanye bakholelwa ukuthi wazibulala, abanye bazibuza imibuzo engaphenduleki.“Sizwa kuthiwa ubedivosa nomkakhe, asazi noma lokhu kuhlangene yini nokunyamalala kwakhe. Kuningi nje osekucatshangwa abantu,” kusho umthombo.Umthombo uveze nokuthi umndeni ufuna umngani owaficwa emotweni achaze ukuthi unyamalale kanjani umuntu kade bendawonye.Kuthintwa ilungu lomndeni, uNksz Nomfundo Nzimande, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi uNgcobo unyamalele, wathi impela bakhathazekile ngalokhu.Ebuzwa ngolwedivosi, uthe yize kuke kwaba khona ukugejana nenkosikazi yakhe uNgcobo, kodwa kwabuye kwadlula.“Siwumndeni besingakaze sitshelwe ukuthi sekukhona izinhlelo zedivosi,” kusho uNksz Nzimande.Isolezwe  llithole ngomthombo ukuthi inkosikazi ayisahlali ekhaya noNgcobo.UNksz Nzimande uthe: “Kuyasikhatha ukunyamalala kwakhe ngoba akalona uhlobo lomuntu ovele anyamalale nje.”Siye koshicilela amaphoyisa engakaphenduli emibuzweni athunyelelwe yona.

UQHUBEKE sesimuncu isimo umshado wesintu KwaNgcolosi, eNdwedwe ngeSonto kulandela ukubulawa kwabane abadutshulwe ezintatha.Abashonile oMnuz Bhekisisa Gcabashe okuthiwa ushonele emtholamphilo, oMnuz Msawenkosi Gcabashe, Moses Saziso Gcabashe noVeli Gcabashe obeyinduna yezinsizwa.Kuthiwa kuphinde kwalimala abanye ababili, okuvela ukuthi baphuthunyiswe esibhedlela ukuyothola usizo lwezempilo.Umshado bekungokaNksz Phumzile Gcabashe waKwaNgoza noMnuz Msizi Shangase waKwaNgcolosi.Ngokusho kwesihlobo, uMnuz Khethonjani Gcabashe, bonke abagilwa abangasohlangothini lwakwamakoti.Elandisa ngesigameko, uthe kungene umuntu wafaka inhlamvu ezinsizweni zangakubo kamakoti ebezilele endlini ebezihlaliswe kuyo kubo komkhwenyana.“Zizamile izinsizwa ebezingaphakathi ukumbamba, kwavele kwaqhamuka omunye emnyango, naye wavulela ngenhlamvu kuzona,” kusho uGcabashe.Uqhube wathi alukho nolunci olushiwo ngabahlaseli ngesikhathi bedubula.“Bebedubula nje kuphela. Kushone abathathu enkundleni, oyedwa washonela emtholampilo eNdwedwe,” kulandisa uGcabashe, oveze ukuthi uMsawenkosi noSaziso bayizelamani.Uveze ukuthi abahlaselwe bebelale endaweni yesigameko kulandela umshado omhlophe obusehholo lomphakathi endaweni.Uthe yize besadidekile kodwa abakholwa ukuthi impi ibibhekiswe kwabebeshada njengoba kungahlaselwanga bona ngqo, kuhlaselwe abantu abasondelene nabo.“Asazi noma yimpi esisuke nayo emuva esigodini esisuka kuso. Sididekile ngoba ayikho impi yezigodi esiyaziyo,” kusho yena.Uthe njengoba isintu sithi umshado awuhlehli, uqhubekile yize bekungasemnandi.“Ngikhuluma nawe nje, umakoti uyembesa esibayeni, kodwa sibi isimo, kumuncu kuwo wonke umuntu,” kusho uGcabashe.IMeya yaseNdwedwe uMnuz Sam Mfeka uthe sibaphathe kabi lesi sigameko.Uthe okubakhathazayo ukuthi zibukeka zanda izigameko zalolu hlobo.“Kuke kwaba khona isigameko okwabulawa kuso amantombazane amathathu ehlaselwa adutshulwa, nawo ahlaselelwa ekhaya. Sikhona esinye isigameko sababulawa bezihlalele esitolo. Asisihle isimo,” kusho uMfeka.Uthe umphakathi usathukile njengoba bekuqhubeka umshado wesintu esibayeni kwamkhwenyana, abantu babonakala ebusweni ukuthi abahlalisekile kahle.“Abaningi bami izixongololo, bafisa sengathi kungasheshiswa okwenziwayo, kuhlakazekwe ngoba bazizwa bengaphephile,” kusho uMfeka.Uveze nokuthi nasemgwaqweni obheke kwamkhwenyana, abantu bahambe bema beyixoxa le ndaba.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa aseNdwedwe asephume umkhankaso athungatha abasolwa ababili abadubule babulala amadoda amane omndeni owodwa izolo.“Ulwazi olusezandleni zamaphoyisa okwamanje luthi, bekuhlangene amadoda ngesikhathi kugasela abasolwa, bevulela ngenhlamvu. Abathathu bashonele endaweni yesigameko, amadoda amahlanu aphuthunyiswe emtholampilo wendawo, lapho okufike kwashona khona umgilwa wesine,” kusho uNetshiunda.

USASHAQEKILE namanje umphakathi wakwa-J eMbali, eMgungundlovu, ngemva kwesigameko lapho iphoyisa kuthiwa lidubule izithandani zashona, lase lizidubula nalo lafa ngoMsombuluko.Ngokusho komthombo ocele ukuthi ungadalulwa kulesi sigameko, kushone uNksz Musawenkosi Masinga, kwalimala isoka lakhe igama lalo elingatholakalanga, kwashona umsolwa uConstable Mququ obesebenza (naye igama lakhe elingatholakalanga) esiteshini samaphoyisa, iPlessislaer.Umthombo uthi uConstable Mququ, okuthiwa ubesehlukene noNksz Masinga, uthekele endaweni yesigameko ehlome ngesibhamu.“Ufice owesilisa endlini kaNksz Masinga. Waqala wavulela ngenhlamvu kowesilisa. Udlulele phambili kuNksz Masinga okuthiwa ubegeza endlini encane wamdubula, wathi uma eqeda wazidubula naye,” kusho umthombo.Uqhube wathi owesilisa obeficwe endlini uzamile ukubaleka ngemva kokudutshulwa kodwa wawela ngaphandle komnyango. Wathi uNksz Masinga utholakale enqunu endlini encane futhi opha ekhanda, eseshonile.“Umsolwa naye utholwe esethule egumbini lokuphumula (lounge). Naye ubopha ekhanda, ephethe isibhamu ngesandla,” kusho umthombo.Uqhube wathi bekukhona incwadi yenkantolo evimbela umsolwa ukuthi asondele eduze kukaNksz Masinga, kodwa kuthiwa ubengayigqizi qakala kwaholela ekutheni aboshwe.Omunye umthombo uthe, omakhelwane babize amaphoyisa emva kokuthi bezwe kuqhuba isibhamu emzini okwenzeke kuwo isigameko.“Bathe uma bephuma bebheka, baqaphela ukuthi kukhona owesilisa obelele phansi ngaphandle komnyango. Baqaphele ukuthi akekho umuntu ophume wabaleka, base bethinta amaphoyisa,” kusho umthombo.Uqhube wathi, athe efika amaphoyisa, agqekeza isango ngoba belivaliwe, angena abona wonke umonakalo.Udalule ukuthi umufi wesifazane ubenguthisha kanti bekungumuzi wakhe lona abulawelwe kuwo kanti umsolwa ubeqashile endaweni.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda uthe amaphoyisa asePlessilaer, aphenya amacala amabili okubulala nelilodwa lokufa komuntu kulandela isigameko sokutholakala kwabathathu benamanxeba okudutshulwa ngoMsombuluko e-Unit J eMbali.“Kusolwa ukuthi owesilisa udubule owayeyintombi yakhe, isoka lakhe (lo wesifazane), wabe esephendula isibhamu ezidubula naye. Isoka lowayeyintombi liphuthunyiswe esibhedlela kodwa lashona ngesikhathi lifika khona,” kuchaza uNetshiunda.Uqhube wathi imbangela yokubulala ayikaziwa kodwa kusolwa udlame lwasekhaya.

USOLA isandla semfene umndeni womfanyana waseMkhazana, oLundi, onyamalale ngoLwesihlanu, kwagcina kutholwa isidumbu sakhe ethoyilethi lomgodi ngeSonto.Kuthiwa isidumbu sikaLisulenkosi Lamola (2) sitholwe yisihlobo ethoyilethi elingasasebenzi sekuphele izinsuku ezimbili ecingwa kulona (ithoyilethi) kanjalo nakwamanye omakhelwane.Elandisa ngesigameko umamkhulu wakhe, uNksz Nontobeko Lamula, uthe behlelwa umshophi nje, bekunomcimbi wokukhumbula umkhulu wakuleli khaya obuwenziwe ngoMgqibelo.“ULisulenkosi ulahleka nje ubefike nonina ngoLwesihlanu, besuka kwesinye isigodi esiseduze, behambele umcimbi obuyizolo (esho ngoMgqibelo),” kusho uNksz Lamula.Uqhube wathi unina kamufi ubefike naye (umufi) ngabo-3 ntambama, waba matasa nomsebenzi wasekhaya, ngesikhathi uLisulenkosi ezidlalela ngaphandle.Uthe basola ukuthi umufi ulandele esinye isihlobo ebesiye komunye umuzi endaweni ukuyolanda okuthile.“Asazi ukuthi kwenzekeni ngoba kuphele imizuzwana, unina waqaphela ukuthi akamboni, waphuma wambheka egcekeni, kwacaca ukuthi akekho,” kusho yena.Uqhube wathi bazitshele ukuthi isihlobo sizobuya naye kodwa sabuya sizihambela sodwa.“Ilapho ke okuqalwe khona kwabhekwa kabanzi, sekucaca ukuthi ingane ilahlekile,” usho kanje.Uveze ukuthi ngesikhathi becinga, bebegxila kuwo amathoyilethi omgodi belekelelwa wumphakathi.Uthe emva kokubuya inqina kamabuyaze, babikele amaphoyisa.Uveze ukuthi ngoMgqibelo ngesikhathi beqhubeka nokucinga ukhona umuntu wendawo obatshele ukuthi uke wambona kancane uLisulenkosi ethi pheshe ngakwakhe, kodwa wangamnaka.“Siyakholwa ukuthi ubebona yena ngempela ngoba uze washo nokuthi ubegqokeni. Okusixakayo ukuthi uma ebesehambe ibanga elingako, ubengeke esakwazi ukuzibuyela, ikakhulukazi ngoba leyo ndlela idlula ngasemhosheni,” kubeka uNksz Lamula.Uthe okubashiya nemibuzo ukuthi leli thoyilethi atholwe kulo umufi ilo leli ebebeqale kulo ukucinga, bangamthola.Echaza ngokutholakala kwakhe izolo, uthe isohlobo ebesithi siya ethoyilethi, esiqaphele ukuthi kukhona okusolisayo emgodini.“Sibize umndeni ukuthi uzosibukisa, wazithela kuyo ingane ilele ibheke phezulu, isishonile,” kusho uNksz Lamula.Ubalule ukuthi indlela okwakheke ngayo indawo yokuhlala ethoyilethi, yikho okwenza bashaye amakhala.“ULisulenkosi uyingane enomzimba, ubengeke aphoseke kuleya ndawo yokuhlala ethoyilethi ngoba incane. Ngokwethu, uphoswe umuntu,” kusho yena.Ikhansela lendawo, uMnuz Mpolompolo Khanyile, lithe umphakathi otheleke endaweni yesigameko izolo, usashaqekile.“Sesiyekele konke ezandleni zamaphoyisa. Uphenyo lwawo kanjalo nokuhlolwa kwesidumbu okufanele kusiphendulele imibuzo yokuthi ishone ngokuphoseka ethoyilethi noma ibulewe yase iphoswa” kusho uKhanyile.USotswebhu weNFP eZululand, uMnuz Siphamandla Ntombela, uthe akwenziwe uphenyo olunzulu ukuze umndeni uthobeke amanxeba.“Ukuze kwazeke ukuthi iphosekile noma iphosiwe. Sinxusa nomasipala ukuthi ulekelele ukuvala imigodi yamathoyilethi amadala ukugwema izigameko ezifana nalezi,” kusho uNtombela. Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uConstable Thenjiswa Ngcobo uqinisekise ukuthi amaphoyisa asoLundi avule idokodo lokufa komuntu ukuze liphenywe kulandela isigameko lapho ingane (2) itholwe isishonile ethoyilethi lomgodi, izolo.

USUQALA ukulahlekelwa yithemba lokuthi uzotholakala esawadla anhlamvana umndeni womhlengikazi owagcinwa evakashele isoka lakhe eliphuma ejele ngecala lokubulala ababili.UNksz Thabisile Angel Vilakazi (35) waKwaHhaza eHowick kuthiwa wahamba kubo ngo-Ephreli 16 eyovakashela isoka lakhe lakhona endaweni ngokuzalwa kodwa eliqashe eTshelimnyama, eMariannhill, ngokomsebenzi.Ngokusho komfowabo, uMnuz Thabani Vilakazi, kuningi okushayisa amakhala ngokunyamalala kukadadewabo.Uthe ngosuku olwandulela ahamba ngalo uNksz Vilakazi, waxoxela amalungu omndeni ukuthi ngayizolo ubanjwe inkunzi ngesikhathi efika sekuhwalele ePinetown.“Wathi izigebengu zimphuce opulasitiki ayebaphethe nemali. Zayishiya iselula nesikhwama ayekuphethe. Sixakwa ukuthi waveza ukuthi kuso leso sidididi sokubanjwa inkunzi, isoka lakhe laqhamuka, lathi abahambe baye endlini, kanti yena wayesehlele ukuqasha imoto ekhokhelwa ngebanga elihambile ukuthi imbuyisele ekhaya,” kusho uVilakazi.Uthe konke lokhu uNksz Vilakazi obesebenzela ekliniki eLions River,  wayebaxoxela ngakusasa, ehleli endlini yalo isoka, ngesikhathi bebuza ukuthi akasashongo ngani ukuthi uhambe kanjani ngayizolo.Uthe bona baqale ukubona ukuthi kukhona okushaya amanzi engasabuyi ngo-Ephreli 20 njengoba ayeshilo.Udalule ukuthi bathi uma belandelela esokeni lasho izinto ezehlukene ezididayo.“Laqale lathi baxabana ngomhla ka-20 wahamba. Labuye lathi wahamba nendoda. Laphinde lathi wahamba nabesilisa ababili. Lagcina selithi wahamba nowesilisa wakwaNdlovu,” kulandisa uVilakazi.Echaza uVilakazi uthe balitshela ukuthi alibanike inombolo yowesilisa wakwaNdlovu.“Sithe uma sikhuluma nowesilisa wakwaNdlovu wadalula ukuthi isoka lamshaya udadewethu endaweni yokucima ukoma esendaweni. Wathi baze bamkhuza ukuthi akangashayi umuntu wesifazane kanje,” kusho uVilakazi.Uthe uNdlovu waphinde wabatshela ukuthi lezi zithandani zahamba zaya emqashweni wowesilisa, zibashiya endaweni yokucima ukoma.“Wathi kwathi uma sebefika emqashweni ngoba naye uhlala emqashweni ofanayo, bathola ukuthi usephinde waqala phansi wamshaya udadewethu ngoba baqhamukela kuye ekhala,” kusho uVilakazi.Uthe uNdlovu uthi akasakhumbuli ke emva kwalokho ukuthi kwenzekani njengoba naye wahamba wayozilalela.Udalule ukuthi bathola ngowesilisa ongumnikazi wendawo yokucima ukoma ukuthi uNksz Vilakazi wafika kuye ebusuku ezocela usizo lokuthi kufonelwe amaphoyisa ngoba isoka lakhe liyamshaya.“Sixakwa ukuthi owesilisa uthi akawafonelanga amaphoyisa ekubeni kwakucacile ukuthi udadewethu usenkingeni. Sisola ukuthi naye unalo ulwazi lokuthi isoka lamenzani udadewethu ngoba uma kukhulunywa nabo, inkulumo yabo icishe ifane ungafunga ukuthi bayavikelana,” usho kanje.Uthe okwenza balahle ithemba lokuthi uzotholakala esaphila ukuthi wayeshawa owesilisa owake walahlwa amacala okubulala ababili abashisa nendlu KwaHhaza eminyakeni eminingi eyedlule.Uthe okunye okwenza balahle ithemba ukuthi ucingo lukadadewabo selokhu lwavaleka lokho, kanti nomholo wakhe wangenyanga edlule awukaze uthintwe.“UThabisile uwuhlobo lomuntu othandayo ukuphila kamnandi, ukuthi imali yakhe ingangasetshenziswa kusinika isithombe esingesihle sokuthi kungenzeka ukuthi akasekho,” usho kanje.Uthe bafuna usizo kunoma ubani ongaba nolwazi olungaholela ekutheni atholakale, njengoba sebeye ezibhedlela nasemakhazeni ehlukene kodwa babuya belambatha.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uConstable Thenjiswa Ngcobo, uthe kuvulwe idokodo lokulahleka komuntu esiteshini samaphoyisa eMariannhill.

BASHAYE bachitha nesamba semali engaziwa abasolwa abebehamba ngeMercedes Benz emnyama begebenga imoto yemali.Umbiko ovela endaweni yesiga uthi abasolwa bavimbezele imoto yemali kuN4 ejikeni laseMarikana bevulela ngenhlamvu bebhekise kuyo yaze yama ngaphambi kokuba bayiqhumise ukuze kuhlale obala i-safe egcina imali.Lokhu kwenzeke ngoMsombuluko ebusuku ngesikhathi imoto yemali ibheke eRustenburg.Sebebaleka abasolwa, kuthiwa bahlangane nemoto yamaphoyisa neyonogada benkampani ezimele, kwaba ongaphansi nongaphezulu kududulwana ngenhlamvu.Amaphoyisa azamile ukubavimbezela kuphela umgwaqo ngasemayini iK4, kodwa zajika izigebengu zanikela kuwona ngqo ngenhlamvu ziphuma kule ndawo, kwaba wukuphunyuka kwazo.“Kutholakale i-rifle endaweni obekudutshulwana kuyo namagobolondo angu-22 ezinhlamvu,” kusho amaphoyisa ngesitatimende.Icala liphenywa wuphiko iDirectorate for Priority Crime Investigation (DPCI) kanti akukaboshwa muntu okwamanje.

ZISHAYE zachitha nezikhwama zemali izigebengu eCottonlands, eNdwedwe ngoMsombuluko emini.Abenkampani yonogada iReaction Unit South Africa (RUSA) bafike kuqala endaweni yesehlo kungakafiki amaphoyisa bathola imoto yemali yenkampani iFidelity iyimvithi.Kuthiwa abasolwa abebehlome bephelele bebehamba ngemoto yohlobo lweHyundai nenye yohlobo lweToyota Hilux. Kuthiwa bavulele ngenhlamvu bebhekise kule moto yaze yama ngaphambi kokuba bayiqhumise.

ASHAYWE ngoswazi oluncane amalungu eMK asabisa ngodlame uma le nhlangano kanye nomholi wayo, uJacob Zuma, bevinjwa ukuba bangenele ukhetho.INkantolo yezoKhetho ihlawulise ilungu lePhalamende, uMnuz Visvin Reddy, nowadilizwa kwesokuhola intsha ye-MK, uBonginkosi Khanyile uR150 000.Izigwebo zabo zilengisiwe kuze kube iminyaka emihlanu.UReddy noKhanyile balahlwe amacala okuphula isigaba 87(71) no87(2) somthetho wezokhetho.IJaji EJS Steyn liyalele uReddy noKhanyile ukuba bengasho izinto ezigxeka ukusingathwa kokhetho kule minyaka emihlanu.“Niyalelwa ukuba ningasephuli isigaba 87(1) no87(2) kule minyaka okulengiswe ngayo izigwebo zenu.”Ngaphambi kokhetho laba baholi basabisa ngokuthi kuzosuka udlambedlu uma i-MK ikhishwa ohliwini lwamaqembu angenele ukhetho.Ngaleso sikhathi i-ANC yayifake icala eNkantolo yezoKhetho ifuna ukuthi iMK ikhishwe ohlwini lwamaqembu angenele ukhetho.Nokho isicelo se-ANC sachithwa.UReddy noKhanyile babesabise nangokuthi kuzokuba nodlame uma uZuma engavunyelwa ukungenela ukhetho.Ngaleso sikhathi inhlangano eyengamele ukhetho, i-Independent Electoral Commission (IEC), yayithe uZuma akavumelekile ukuba ilungu lePhalamende ngoba wagwetshwa isikhathi esingaphezu konyaka ebhadla ejele.UZuma wayevela phezulu ohlwini lwamalungu e-MK aya ePhalamende.INkantolo yezoKhetho yachitha isinqumo se-IEC sokukhipha igama likaZuma ohlwini lwabaya ePhalamende kepha iNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo yanquma ukuthi igama likaZuma likhishwe ohlwini.I-video kaReddy lapho esabisa ngodlame yabukwa abantu abangu-138 000.USteyn uthe izinsongo zikaReddy zazingaludunga ukhetho.“Okuqaphelekayo ukuthi uReddy wenza le nkulumo edlubhe umfaniswano we-MK. Lezi zinsongo akazenzanga kanye, waziphinda kabili ekhuluma ezindaweni ezahlukene. Lezi zinkulumo wazenza ngoMashi, sekusele kancane kubanjwe ukhetho lwangoMeyi.”I-video kaKhanyile yona yabukwa abantu abangu-243 000.Ngesikhathi enza inkulumo, uKhanyile wayengumholi wophiko lwentsha kwi-MK, kepha wabuye wadilizwa.“Inkulumo yakhe ibucayi njengayo le kaReddy. Nokho ukususwa kwakhe esikhundleni kusho ukuthi kukhona isijeziso asitholile.”UReddy uthe usaxoxa nabameli bakhe ukubuka ukuthi angeke yini akwazi ukusidlulisela phambili isinqumo senkantolo.Uthe okwamanje usematasa nomsebenzi wasePhalamende njengoba esanda kufungiswa.Kuthintwa uKhanyile, ukhale ngokuthi umatasa nabameli bakhe, wathi uzokhipha isitatimende namhlanje.

KUBIKWA ukuthi baphume bengenamyocu abantu ababili abawe ngendiza encane abebehamba ngayo ngoMgqibelo ekuseni.Lokhu kwenzeke eStellenbosch Airfield ngemuva kwemizuzu embalwa le ndiza isanda kusuka.UStuart Grobbelaar, ophethe ezokuxhumana kumasipala waseStellenbosch utshele abeNews24 ukuthi abezimo eziphuthumayo bafike kule ndawo bathola abantu ababili abebehamba ngale ndiza, ngenhlanhla abalimele.

ABEQEMBU uMkhonto weSizwe (MK), bafuna amaphoyisa ajule ngophenyo abophe umuntu ngokufa kwesishoshovu seqembu uMnuz Morgan Mbili (45) oshe nomjondolo.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi uMbili ushe nomjondolo eCato Crest, eMayville, ngoLwesibili ezintatha. I-MK imenyezelwe owayengumengameli wezwe uJacob Zuma ngoDisemba nyakenye, wathi usezotela yona ayeke i-ANC.UMbili ubeyisethenjwa se-ANC ngaphambi kokujoyina i-MK esanda kusungulwa.UMnuz Thami Mkhize weMK eThekwini, uthe bayakhala ngendlela okwenzeke ngayo. Uthe bathole umbiko wokuthi kuzwakale uMbili ememeza efuna usizo ngesikhathi umlilo ugamenxe endlini.“Kungenzeka nje ukuthi akuyona ingozi kodwa kukhona umuntu othungele umlilo ngoba ugesi ubucinyiwe, ayikho into ebingaqala umlilo. Siyafisa amaphoyisa aphenye kahle kuvele iqiniso ngokuthi kwenzekeni. Silahlekelwe yisosha ngoba uMbili ubekwazi ukusebenzela iqembu,’’ kusho uMkhize.UMkhize uthe ngaphambi kokuthi uMbili ajoyine i-MK, kukhona abebelokhu bemjijimeza, bemsola ngokuthi uhamba nayo. Uthe uma amaphoyisa angase alandelele kahle cishe angalithola iqiniso ngokufa kwakhe.Uthe uyakholwa wukuthi bakhona abantu bendawo abalwaziyo udaba abangasiza amaphoyisa ngomkhondo kulolu daba.Ikhansela lendawo, uMnuz Simphiwe “Luluza” Khanyile, lithe liwutholile umbiko ngokufa kukaMbili kodwa alinayo imininingwane kahle. UKhanyile uthe uthole ukuthi uMbili uxakwe wumlilo esendlini yakhe wagcina eshonile.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu- Natal, uConstable Thenjiswa Ngcobo, uthe amaphoyisa avule idokodo lophenyo ngalolu daba.“Amaphoyisa aseCato Manor ayaphenya emuva kokuthi owesilisa oneminyaka engu-45 ubudala eshe washona kugqamuka umlilo oshise neminye imijondolo,’’ kusho uConst uNgcobo.Inkonzo yesikhumbuzo kaMbili bekulindeleke ukuthi ibe namuhla ehholo eCato Crest lapho okulindeleke ukuthi amalungu eMK aphume ngobuningi azovalelisa kuzakwabo.Phambilini, kwadutshulwa kwabulawa ikhansela uMnuz Siyabonga Mkhize owayejutshwe yi-ANC. Kwaboshwa uMnuz Mzimuni Ngiba naye owayeyikhansela le-ANC phambilini okumanje usejele.

ULAKA lwabalaleli bomsakazo Ukhozi FM, abasola lo msakazo ngokubaqola ngomncintiswano wangoJuni nyakenye, luphoqe iSABC ukuthi iphumele obala ivume induku ngokungamemezeli umuntu owawina.Lokhu kuza emva kokuthi omunye wabebeqokwe kulo mncintiswano ekhale ngokuthi akasazi nokuthi uzophendula athini kubantu ababemvotela njengoba kwavele kwacweba iziziba sebevotelwe.Kwakuqokwe abantu abangu-63 emiphakathini eyahlukene nabayiswa emoyeni ezinhlelweni ezahlukene kuKhozi FM, bechaza ngemisebenzi yabo eyenze ukuthi baqokwe. Lo mncintiswano ubuqhutshwa ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi #Ukhozifm63 njengoba lo msakazo ubugubha iminyaka engu-63 wasungulwa. Abalaleli babenxuswe ukuthi bavotele umuntu oqokiwe ngokuthumela umqhafazo owawubiza u-R1.50.Isikhulu esibambile kwaSABC, uMmoni Seapolelo, sithe baxolisa kakhulu ngokuthi angamenyezelwa umuntu owinile kulo mncintiswano.“Singakuqinisekisa ukuthi ngenxa yezimo ezingeke zidalulwe, ukumenyezelwa komuntu owawina emncintiswaneni #Ukhozifm63 akamenyezelwanga ngosuku olwalushiwo. Isiteshi sisazomemezela umuntu owawina kwabangu-63 ababeqokiwe baze bayokhuluma nasezinhlelweni ezehlukene zomsakazo Ukhozi FM. Sizoqinisekisa ukuthi abantu abaqokiwe kuseyibona, kuphinde kube ne-audit okuyinto eyenziwa kuyona yonke imincintiswano yethu. I-SABC idlulisa ukuxolisa kakhulu kubalaleli boKhozi FM ngokubambezeleka ukuthi kumenyezelwe owinile,” kusho uMmoni.Umncintiswano ubunyakenye ngoJune 1, waphela ngo-Agasti 2. Ubuqhutshwa ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: #ukhozifm63.Kulo mncintiswano kwakucelwe imiphakathi ukuthi iphakamise abantu abenza kahle ezindaweni abahlala kuzo. Ukhozi FM laphinda labiza ababeqokiwe ukuthi beze ezinhlelweni ezehlukene zomsakazo becacisa ngabakwenza ngasemakubo nokuholele ekutheni baqokwe wumphakathi.Emva kwalokho kwanxuswa umphakathi ukuthi ubavotele. Babevotelwa ngokuthumela umqhafazo obiza u-R1.50 futhi kuvumeleke ukuthi umuntu angavota noma ikangaki.Ngeshwa imiphumela ayikaze imenyezelwe kuze kube yimanje. Omunye wababeqokiwe, ozibize ngoPhondolwendlovu Mzolo waseMkhambathini, uthe uke wazama ukukhuluma nabanye ayeqokwe nabo ukuzwa imiphumela, wathola ukuthi bonke basebumnyameni ngalo mncintiswano futhi akekho ovelayo ukuthi wawina kuwona.Uthe uke wenza imizamo yokuthi abuze nakhona oKhozini kodwa wangazithola izimpendulo njengoba bekucaca ukuthi akekho onolwazi.Uthe okubuhlungu abantu babavotela manje abasenayo impendulo uma bebuzwa ngabantu ukuthi kwenzekani ngomncintiswano.

BASOLA ukushaywa ngendlebe etsheni wuMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal othisha abangaqashiwe, emva kokuthi umemezele inqwaba yezikhala zothisha ezisesigabeni u-Post Level One (PL1), ezikhangiswe esidlangalaleni okokuqala, osekuvele ukuthi ezinye zazo kudala zavalwa.Umnyango wenze isimemezelo sezikhala ezingu-747 ezikhangiswe ngokuvulelekile, osekuvumeleke noma wubani onalokho okudingekayo afake ngqo isicelo somsebenzi emnyangweni obekungenzeki phambilini. Emva kwesimemezelo kube negidigidi kubantu abaningi nasezinkundleni zokuxhumana, kunconywa isinqumo njengesiphusile esizosiza ukulwa nezinsolo zokuqashana ngokwenzelela ebezikhona.Nakuba kunjalo, inhlangano yothisha abangaqashiwe kulesi sifundazwe, i-KwaZulu-Natal United Unemployed Educators, isola isenzo somnyango njengemizamo yokuthalalisa ukugwema ingcindezi ekubhekenani nezikhalo zamalungu ayo, kufakwa kulolu uhlu ezinye izikhala esezivaliwe.UMnuz Mfanelo Mncube wale nhlangano engxoxweni neSolezwe, uthe sebethole imibiko kumalungu wabo ngezikole ezingasenazo izikhala kodwa ezifakiwe kulolu hlu.“Ngesikhathi kumenyezelwa lezi zikhalo, besinakho ukunganeliseki ngokuthi azenele zincane kodwa sibonga lokho. Emva kwemibiko ngezinsolo zokuthi kunezikhala ezigcwalisiwe kodwa ezisohlwini, sibonile ukuthi umnyango usaqhubeka nokudlala ngemizwa yethu,“ usho kanje.Uthe banxuse amalungu abo ukuthi uma ehambele izikole asondelene nazo ezimenyezelwe njengezinezikhala zomsebenzi, aqinisekise kuthishomkhulu ukuthi zikhona ngempela yini ngaphambi kokufaka izicelo.Isolezwe lizibonele incwadi eputshikile eqinisekisa ukuqokwa  komunye wothisha esikoleni esiseMlaza i-Velabahleke Secondary, ofundisa i-Accounting ne-Economics eyayimyalela ukuthi aqale ukusebenza ngoJulayi 25, kulo nyaka. Yize kunjalo, lesi sikhala sikhona ohlwini lwezikhala ezikhangiswe wumnyango okuqinisa izinsolo zale nhlangano. Esinye isikole esivela kulolu hlu, iMayiyana High ngaphansi kukaMasipala uMzumbe okukleliswe kulo izikhala  ezimbili zothisha abazofundisa u-grade 10 kuya kuya ku-grade 12 i-Maths Literacy ne-Mathametical Literacy,  okuvele ukuthi lesi sikole sekunesikhathi savalwa ngenxa yesibalo esiphansi sabafundi, sahlanganiswa nesikole iNdlelenhle Secondary esisondelene naso.
