UMncube uthe bazobhalela uHlomuka bemazise ngalezi zinsolo, kanti basaqhubeka nokuqoqa ubufakazi ukuze bebe nohlu oluphelele lezikole okuthiwe zinezikhala zingekho.Ukhale ngokubiza kokulungiselela ukufaka isicelo somsebenzi, okwenza kungahlali kahle ukunxenxa abantu ukuthi bafake izicelo ezikhaleni ezivele zivaliwe. Nakuba kunjalo, uthe bakumisile ukuqhinqa emahhovisi omnyango eMgungundlovu kothisa abangaqashiwe abangamalungu ale nhlangano, njengoba sebabayalele ukuthi basebenzise leso sikhathi ukufaka izicelo zomsebenzi ezikhaleni ezimenyezelwe wumnyango. Kumenyezelwa lezi zikhala, uHlomuka ugqugquzele othisha abangasebenzi ukuthi bafake izicelo.

UFUNA umthetho udlale indima yawo umndeni wowesilisa waseMphumulo Mission KwaMaphumulo kulandela ukufa kwelungu lawo esibhedlela kade lishayiwe.UMnuz Ntobeko Mkhize (35) kuthiwa ushaywe abesilisa bendawo ngoMsombuluko, bamphuthumisa esibhedlela, washonela khona ngoLwesibili.Umalume wakhe uMnuz Thobekani Mkhize, uthe bathole ukuthi umufi wayezihlalele esitolo eMagenqezeni ngesikhathi abasolwa abaziwayo bemthatha ngesidlozane, baya naye esitolo sabo.“Sithole ukuthi bamthatha ngemoto yabo, bafike bamshaya amahora amane kuya kwamahlanu. Kuthe sebebona ukuthi uselimele kakhulu, bamphuthumisa esibhedlela eMphumulo,” kulandisa uMkhize.Uqhube wathi bathole ukuthi ngesikhathi befika esibhedlela babhalise amagama aphelele kamufi, kodwa bathi umuntu abangamazi, abamcoshe elele eceleni komgwaqo elimele eMbitane.“Ukuze sithole ngokufakwa kwakhe esibhedlela kusize ukuthi udadewethu usebenza khona. Uthe uma ezongena emsebenzini wazithela phezu kwakhe, wathi uma ebuza ukuthi kwenzekeni, amanesi athi ulethwe abantu abathe abamazi, bamsizile nje ngoba bembona elele eceleni kwendlela elimele,’ kusho uMkhize.Uthi udadewabo ubheke ifayela lakhe abambhalise ngalo, wathola ukuthi babhale amagama akhe enjengoba enjalo.“Ubuze umbuzo wokuthi uma kungabantu abangamazi bawaze kanjani pho amagama akhe ngoba yena ubesesimweni esibi, engakwazi nokukhuluma,” usho kanje.Uqube wathi ngoLwesibili ekuseni, engakashoni umufi ukwazile ukutshela ilungu lomndeni elisebenza esibhedlela ukuthi ushaywe owesilisa wasesitolo  nabangani bakhe.“Sithe uma sesihlanganisa inkulumo kamufi, ubufakazi bokubhaliswa kwamagama aphelele akhe esibhedlela nobokuthi wathathwa ngesidlozane abantu abaziwayo, sabona ukuthi yibo abambulele,” kusho yena.Uveze ukuthi umufi emasontweni amabili edlule uke wazama ukugqekeza esitolo sabasolwa, wabanjwa engakebi.Uthi waxolisa, umndeni wakhona wenza sengathi umxolele.“Uma sekwenzeka kanje, kusobala bebengaxolile. Sibuhlungu ngokuthi bakhethe ukuthi bavele bambulale. ”Sifisa umthetho udlale indima yawo ngoba ngeke sizithathele umthetho ngezandla,” kusho uMkhize.Ubuye wakhala nangokuthi bakhelene, bayazana, okwenzekile bebengakulindele.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Robert Netshiunda uthe amaphoyisa aKwaMaphumulo aphenya idokodo lokufa komuntu.

AMAPHOYISA abophe abasolwa abayisithupha eSoweto namhlanje kulandela ukubulawa komdlali weKaizer Chiefs ngesikhathi edunwa imoto eGoli ngesonto eledlule. ULuke Fleurs weKaizer Chiefs wadutshulwa wabulawa eHoneydew, eGoli ngo-Ephreli 3 ngenkathi edunwa imoto ebomvu eyiVW Golf 8 GTI egaraji eliku-14th Avenue. Emuva kophenyo olunzulu amaphoyisa avalele laba basolwa ezintatha eSlovoville eSoweto, kanti izingxenye zemoto kaFleurs esihlukanisiwe zona zatholwa ngoMsombuluko.Okhulumela amaphoyisa eGoli uLt Colonel Mavela Masondo, uthe uFleurs wahlaselwa amadoda amabili ayehlome ngezibhamu, nokubikwa ukuthi ayehamba ngeBMW 1 series emhlophe."Abasolwa bamkhomba ngesibhamu bathatha imoto, bamdubula kwesingenhla. Omunye wabasolwa washaya wachitha nemoto walandela uzakwabo," kusho Lt Colonel uMasondo. UFleurs washona emuva kokudutshulwa.Emuva kwalokho uKhomishana wamaphoyisa eGoli uLieutenant General Tommy Mthombeni waqoka ithimba elihlale ezithendeni zabasolwa nokuholele ekutheni baboshwe."Amaphoyisa akholwa ukuthi laba basolwa bayathinteka oxhaxheni lwezigameko zokudunwa kwezimoto okwenzeka eGoli. Uphenyo lokuthola abasolwa luyaqhubeka. Laba basolwa bazovela enkantolo kaMantshi eRoodepoort ngoLwesihlanu ngecala lokuduna nokubulala," kusho uLt Colonel Masondo.

KUSALE enkundleni abasolwa abathathu ngesikhathi bedubulana namaphoyisa eBooysens eGauteng.Kusinde abasolwa abathathu kulesi sigameko esenzeke ngoLwesibili emini ngesikhathi amaphoyisa ezinhlaka ezahlukene eholwa oKlebe evimbezela abasolwa okuthiwa bayingxenye yeqembu lemigulukudu ethinteka emacaleni ahlukene okubalwa kuwo angu-30 okubulala.Kutholakale izibhamu ezimbili ezingekho emthethweni. Amaphoyisa ayaqhubeka nophenyo endaweni yesigameko.

KUPHELE amahlathi oshayasibhamu bevinjezelwa amaphoyisa kuN3 phakathi kweVilliers neHeidelburg ngeSonto ebusuku.Laba baziwa njengemigulukudu esebenzisa amalambu amaphoyisa aluhlaza ukuqhuba ubugebengu bokuduna nokugebenga abantu. Laba bebelandelwa amaphoyisa ezinhlaka ezahlukene okubalwa kuzo iSAPS National Head Office Counter Intelligence, Secunda Crime Intelligence, Gauteng Tactical Response Team, Gauteng Anti-Gang Unit, DPC Tracking Team, Johannesburg K9, CAP Specialised Operations, Tracker Connect, ICB Insurance Crime Bureau, MZ Werke Security, Telesure Insurance Investigation kusukela eGrootvlei eMpumalanga. Kuthiwa amaphoyisa aqale ukusola ngesikhathi ebona le moto ebihamba ngamalambu aluhlaza, aqala ukuyijaha.Bathe sebebona abasolwa ukuthi balandelwa ngamaphoyisa banyusa isivinini bazama ukubaleka bangena eZonkizizwe, Ekurhuleni. Ngokubika kwamaphoyisa, abasolwa bathe bebaleka babe bevulela ngenhlamvu bebhekise kuwo, nawo aphendula ngayo.Bathathu abasolwa abafe ujuqu endaweni yesigameko, kwasinda oyedwa okwazile ukubaleka ngezinyawo.Amaphoyisa athole izibhamu ezimbili ezingetho emthethweni nezinhlamvu kanjalo namalambu aluhlaza emotweni yabasolwa.Imoto yabasolwa okuyiToyota Hilux inikelwe kwabeVehicle Crime Investigation Unit ukuze kuqhubeke uphenyo ngayo.

BAHLAZEKILE abelaphi bendabuko asebezakhele udumo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kuvela izindaba zokuthi bawaka abantu futhi abasuke bekuveza kungamanga ngenhloso yokuheha amakhasimende.Lezi zindaba zivele kuleli sonto kuxabane owayengumsakazi weZululand FM noseyintatheli yekhasi leYouTube, Inyoni TV, uGwajo Zungu nomelaphi, uZamokwakhe “King Bhaka” Nzama.UGwajo uhlambalaze uKing Bhaka ngama-video aqoshiwe, lapho abethi yena akakaze aye emzini walo melaphi eHillary, eThekwini, futhi abakaze bahlangane. Uze wambiza ngomfana omncane angamesabi.UKing Bhaka naye uvele waya ekhasini lakhe waveza bonke ubufakazi bokuthi bayazana noGwajo nokuthi usake wafika emzini wakhe. Uphinde wasabalalisa nezinkulumo eziqoshiwe ekhuluma noGwajo, ezisholo yena ukuthi zonke lezi ziqephu ezike zibonakale ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ekhuluma nabelaphi bendabuko, zingamanga. Kule nkulumo uGwajo uzisholo yena ukuthi zisuke zisungulwe nguyena, bese eqeqesha izinyanga ukuthi zilingise kanjani.Izinyanga okuvela amagama azo ngokuhubhuza amanga ngoDr Khehlelezi, Dr Mabalengwe noDr 2+2. KuMabalengwe uveze udaba alushutha lapho lo melaphi ayesenkantolo kwacisha ugesi ngenxa yokucimasakuwonga kodwa wathi uyena owenze kwacisha ugesi esebenzisa amandla akhe obunyanga. Lokho kuthiwa yinto abavele bayisungula noGwajo ngoba bebona kucisha ugesi enkantolo. KuKhehlelezi, uveze ukuthi ngesikhathi kushuthwa le nyanga ithi ilanda imali emanzini, kwakuyinto engekho, eyayakhiwe. Uze waveza ukuthi isiteshi se-online i-Real TV eyayishutha uKhehlelezi, ayikwazanga ukuhlunga kahle i-video ukuze ikholakale. Uphinde waveza ukuthi nesimo sale nyanga asisihle, isilahlekelwe amakhasimende ngoba kukhona asebebonile ukuthi ayikho into yayo. Uthe kumanje isimo sayo sinzima kwezezimali, ize ifune ngisho neziliphu ima ithume umuntu esitolo ngoba isigade lonke isenti eliphumayo.Ku-2+2, uthe isiqephu abasanda kusishutha lapho bekuvela khona uGwajo eyoxolisa ngenkomo ethi usenenkinga ngoba uxabane nale nyanga, singamanga. Uthe nenkomo yokuxolisa bekuvele kungeyakhe u-2+2.Kuthintwa uKing Bhaka ngenhloso yakhe yokusabalalisa lezi zindaba, uthe akaxabene noGwajo kodwa uyena ongungqondongqondo ekusunguleni izikeshi ku-Facebook ukuze kudayiswe imikhiqizo yezinyanga ezikhohlisa abantu.“Kudala ngizixwayisa lezi zinyanga ukuthi zingadlali ngabantu. Ngigcine ngibonile ukuthi kungcono ngivele ngiyiveze imikhuba yazo. Inkinga ukuthi le nto eziyenzayo ilimaza igama lobunyanga bese kuba sengathi wonke umuntu wenza le nto eziyenzayo,” kusho uKing Bhaka.Kuthintwa uGwajo, uthe imlimaze kakhulu indaba yokuvela kwalezi zindaba.“Kuyaziwa ukuthi mina ngiphila ngawo lo msebenzi. Ngakhile futhi ngisanda kulobola unkosikazi wami ngawo lo msebenzi. Uma sekwenzeka kanje angazi yinto engizoyithini. Le nto ilimaze ngisho nekusasa lami ngoba ngelinye ilanga benginesifiso sokuthi ngisebenzele iziteshi ezinkulu njengeSABC kodwa sengibona amathuba engasekho. Angisazi isizathu esenze uBhaka enze kanje. Okwamanje ngisanqena ngisho nokuvela kubantu ngendlela okwenzeke ngayo,” kusho uGwajo.Bonke abelaphi abathintekayo kulolu daba, bashayelwe izingcingo kodwa izingcingo zabo bebengaziphenduli. Nemiyalezo abathunyelelwe yona abayiphendulanga.Umengameli wabelaphi bendabuko i-Traditional Healers Council KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sazi Mhlongo, uthe yize bengahambisani nokuvela kwalezi zindaba ngezinkundla zokuxhumana, kodwa bayabonga ukuthi sekuvezwe obala lokhu.“Kudala sibona ukuthi kudlalwa ngabantu kusetshenziswa izinkundla zokuxhumana kodwa engekho umuntu okhulumayo ngale nto. Kuyiqiniso, laba abagcwele khona ezinkundleni bethi bayelapha, iningi labo zigebengu. Kunenqwaba yabo abahamba amacala okudlwengula ngoba bafike bethi basiza abantu bese beyabadlwengula. Abanye baveza izinyoka. Ekwelapheni awukwazi ukuveza inyoka bese uthi ungumelaphi. Inyoka iyaluma futhi ayikho into enhle eyamaniswa nenyoka. Abantu abaqaphele izigilamkhuba ezizibiza ngezinyanga,” kusho uMhlongo.

IZIKHALAZO zomphakathi waseMgcweni ku-ward-4 eCato Ridge zizwakele kubaphathi benkampani, iFrey’s Foods Brands, mayelana nephunga  ebese belifanisa nelendle eliqhamuka edamini lale nkampani.Ngokomphakathi, leli phunga selenze impilo yaba nzima kuwo. NgeSonto eledlule Isolezwe libike ukuthi umphakathi aweneme ngaleli damu, waphinde waveza ukuthi inkampani ayenzi lutho ukuxazulula isimo.Umphathi omkhulu wale nkampani, uMnuz Adriaan Holthausen, uthe bayabazisa ubuhlobo abanawo nalo mphakathi.“Sisanda kuthola izimpendulo mayelana nephunga elinukayo elingase liqhamuke kwi-Wastewater Plant yethu. Siyaqonda ukuthi ukunuka kwaleli phunga kunomthelela ezimpilweni zomphakathi waseMgcweni futhi siyaqinisekisa ukuthi sizosibhekisisa isizinda samanzi angcolile,” kusho u-Holthausen.Uthe bazama ngakho konke okusemandleni ukubhekana nalesi simo.“Siyazama ukwehlisa ukunuka ngamandla kwaleli phunga. Sihlanganile nabaholi bomphakathi neminyango kamasipala efanele ukuze sibazise ngesimo nangemizamo yethu eqhubekayo. Ithimba lethu lizibophezele ekuthatheni izinyathelo ezengeziwe ukuxazulula leli phunga. Sizoqhubeka nokusiqapha ngeso lokhozi isimo bese sinigcina ninolwazi ngenqubekela phambili yethu,” usho kanje.Uqhube wathi ukuhlala ngokukhululeka komphakathi nempilo yawo kubalulekile kubo futhi bayabonga ukubekezela nokuqonda kwawo njengoba bezama ukulungisa isimo. Uphinde wathi uma zikhona ezinye izikhalazo noma imibono umphakathi onazo, babathinte ngqo ngoba ngokubambisana bangaqinisekisa ukuphepha nenhlalakahle enhle kuwo wonke umuntu.

BATHEMBISE ukuhlonipha uMthethosisekelo wezwe, basebenzele abantu bakuleli ngokuthembeka ongqongqoshe namaphini abo, abafungiswe ngoLwesithathu yiNhloko yamaJaji, uRaymond Zondo.Le Khabhinethi, edidiyele amaqembu ahlukene abambisene kuhulumeni wobumbano, iqala umsebenzi wayo namhlanje ngokuhlangana nezikhulu zeminyango kanjalo nabebephethe le minyango ukuze bathole umbiko ngobekwenzeka kule minyango.Abanye babo, ngesikhathi bekhuluma nabezindaba izolo eKapa emcimbini wokufungiswa, baphefumule ngezinhlelo zabo nezinto abazibeke eqhulwini abazozenza.Bangu-75 abafungisiwe kanti kuqale ngokufungiswa iPhini likaMengameli wezwe, uMnuz Paul Mashatile.UNgqongqoshe wezokuVikela, uNkk Angie Motshekga, okuhlukene imibono ngokujutshelwa kwakhe kulesi sikhundla, uthe uzomelana nobunzima obuza nalesi sikhundla.Uthe ayikho indawo engenazo izinselelo, wathi nakanjani uzowenza lo msebenzi wakhe.“Ngizwile kukhona abakhalayo ngokuqokwa kwami, abanye bayangihalalisela. Okuhle wukuthi ukhomanda kulo mnyango ngumengameli wezwe engisazohlangana naye akhiphe umkhombandlela ngakulindele,” kusho uNkk Motshekga.Uzakwabo eMnyangweni weziSebenzi zikaHulumeni nokuPhatha, Inkosi Mzamo Buthelezi, uthe ezinye zezinto azozibheka yindaba yesabelomali esiphezulu sabasebenzi bakahulumeni.UButhelezi uthe uzowenza ngokuzimisela umsebenzi wakhe.UNgqongqoshe weziMali, uMnuz Enoch Godongwana, uthe uyabezwa abakhale ngeKhabhinethi kaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa enyinyithekayo, wathi ayinkulu kakhulu uma uqhathanisa no-2 million wabasebenzi bakahulumeni.“Ziningi izinto okumele sizibheke ezithinta isabelomali. Ibingekho enye indlela ngaphandle kokuthi kube nesibalo salabo ngqongqoshe namaphini abo ngenxa yokuthi kunohulumeni wobumbano.” UNksz Pemmy Majodina, uNgqongqoshe wezaManzi nokuHanjiswa kweNdle, uthe eyamanzi iyinselelo ezweni kanjalo nasesifundeni i-Afrika.Uthe kubalulekile ukugcina amanzi ngoba ayashoda.“Amanzi ayimpilo ngakho sizosebenzisana neminye iminyango. Asifuni ukubona amanzi evuza ngoba ayashoda kakhulu ezweni.” Uthe usethole izikhalazo ezevile ku-3 000 ngezinkinga zamanzi kuleli.UDkt Pieter Groenewald, uNgqongqoshe wezokuHlunyeleliswa kweziMilo, uthe uzolwa nenkohlakalo ezikhungweni okugcinwe kuzona iziboshwa futhi ezigcwele zinyinyitheka.Uthe uzobheka isabelomali sokuthi lezi zinkinga kungabhekwana kanjani nazo.“Kubalulekile ukuthi amajele ethu azikhiqizele ukudla okuzodliwa khona. Okubalulekile wukuthi kumele kongiwe imali yabakhokhi bentela.” Mayelana nezinto ake azisho phambilini njengokweseka isigwebo sentambo, uthe uMthethosisekelo awuvumi ukuthi kube nalesi sigwebo.“Kakade sizoba nawo umbono kwiKhabhinethi ukuthi into ethile singayilungisa kanjani njengoba singamaqembu ahlukene. Okubalulekile ukubeka abantu bakuleli phambili.” UNgqongqoshe kaGesi, uDkt Kgosientsho Ramokgopa, uthe nakuba ingaphelile inkinga yokucishwa kukagesi kuleli kodwa likhulu ibanga eselihanjiwe ukubhekana nale nkinga.“Abantu balindele ukuthi ugesi ungapheli. Yinkinga esilwa nayo. Ugesi usuyabiza, abantu abakwazi ukuwukhokhela. Kudingeka kube nezindlela zokubhekana nale nkinga yokunyuka kwawo.”

UKUHOXA kukaChidimma Adetshina emncintiswaneni wonobuhle uMiss South Africa, sekusele izinsuku ezimbili ngaphambi kosuku lokuklomelisa onqobile, kufane noju kwizakhamuzi zakuleli zwe ebezingayizwa indaba yakhe.UChidimma (23), kuthe ngoLwesine wakhipha isitatimende, ememezela ukuthi usenqume ukuhoxa emncintiswaneni, okuzomenyezelwa onqobile kuwona namhlanje ebusuku, eSunBet Arena, ePitoli. Bese kuyisikhathi kunempikiswano ngokungenela kwale ntokazi kulo mncintiswano, kukhona abakhala ngokuthi akufanele ngabe iwungenele ngoba uyise owaseNigeria, kuthi unina udabuka eMozambique, yize bekwaziwa kuthi izalelwe eGoli, futhi yakhulela eSoweto, okwenza ibe nobuzwe baseNingizimu Afrika. USthembiso Mngoma ubhale ekhasini lakhe lakwiFacebook wathi: “Ukube abantu abakhulumanga ngabe ayivelanga le nto eyenziwa eminyakeni ewu-23 edlule. Cabanga nje ukuthi kunomuntu okunzima ukuthi athole umazisi, kanti uvinjwa yizigebengu ezingena kuleli zwe ngokungemthetho.’”UKwena Molweka uthe: “Akekho umuntu ongangenza ngikholwe wukuthi uChidimma uwumgilwa kukho konke lokhu. Umgilwa kulesi simo wumuntu wakuleli zwe owaphucwa ubuzwe bakhe eminyakeni ewu-23 edlule, futhi lowo muntu kumele atholakale, anxeshezelwe ngakho konke lokho.”NgoLwesithathu ebusuku, uMnyango wezaseKhaya, ukhiphe isitatimende uveza ukuthi ukuphenywa kwawo ngoChidimma, kuveze ukuthi unina wasebenzisa umazisi womunye umuntu wesifazane ukumbhalisa njengesakhamuzi sakuleli zwe.UMnyango uveze nokuthi uyaqhubeka uyaphenya futhi uzobathathela izinyathelo bonke abathinteka kugcobho lwakho konke okwenzeke ngokungemthetho ngodaba lukaChidimma.“’Ukuba kulo mncintiswano bekumnandi kodwa emva kokubheka izinto eziningi, sengithathe isinqumo esinzima sokuhoxa kuwona, ukusiza ukuzivikela nomndeni wami,”’ kusho uChidima ekhasini le-Instagram.Akuphelanga sikhathi esingakanani, nenhlangano iMiss South Africa, yakhipha isitatimende ifisela uChidimma inhlanhla kukho konke ahlela ukukwenza ngempilo yakhe.“Inhloso yethu wukuqhakambisa izinhlanga ezahlukene futhi sibeke eqhulwini ubuntu, kanjalo nje sizibophezele ukubamba iqhaza ukwenza abantu besifazane base-Afrika, nasemhlabeni jikelele bazithembe ngobubona,”’ kusho iMiss SA.Ukuphuma kukaChidimma, kusho ukuthi namhlanje kuzoqhudelana izintokazi eziyishumi kuMiss SA, obuya ihlandla lesi-66 nonyaka, okungoNompumelelo Maduna, Kirsten Khan, Layla Zoubair, Ontshiametse Tlhopane, Palesa Lombard,Taahira Katz, Kebalepile Ramafoko waseMpumalanga, Mia Le Roux waseFree State, Onalenna Constantin waseNorth West, noLebohang Khoza othwele amathemba eKwaZulu-Natal.

UMCULI kamaskandi, uKhuzani "Indlamlenze" Mpungose, usolwa ngokuphuca isinkwa abantu akade besebenza esibhedlela saseThekwini, iKing Dinuzulu.Laba basebenzi bathi sebesebenze iminyaka eyisikhombisa kuya kweyishumi kulesi sibhedlela ngaphansi kwenkampani iTower City Cleaning Services. Bathi izinkinga zabo ziqale emuva kokuphelelwa wumsebenzi kweTower City, ngoDisemba nyakenye.Omunye wabasebenzi uNksz Zinhle Sibiya, uthe indawo yeTower City ithathwe yinkampani kaKhuzani, Indlamlenze Cleaning Services."Ngokwesivumelwano neTower City, Indlamlenze bekufanele isithathe sonke thina basebenzi abadala, kungabikhona muntu ophelelwa wumsebenzi. Ngempela kuhambe kahle kusaqala uJanuwari kodwa sathi  sisabenze izinsuku ezine, kwatheleka abantu abasebenza nekhansela laku-ward 35, bathi akuqalwe kabusha ngokuthi kwenziwe inhlolokhono."UNksz Sibiya uthe bayenza inhlolokhono kwabe sekuthathwa abasebenzi abasha kwathi abadala bashaywa ngesithende kwiNdlamlenze Cleaning Services.Uthe balulwa lolu daba babuyiselwa emsebenzini ngoJanuwari 16."Kwabe sekwenziwa isivumelwano sokuthi sonke sizoqala phansi sisebenze izinyanga eziyisithupha emuva kwalokho kuzobuyekezwa izivumelwano."Esephetha uNksz Sibiya, uthe emuva kokuphela kwesivumelwano sezinyanga eziyisithupha kuphinde kwenziwa inhlolokhono, okuthe emuva kwayo, bakhonjwa indlela.Ethintwa uKhuzani, unxuse ukuba kuxhunyanwe nokhulumela inkampani, uMnuz Alpha "Zwide" Nxumalo, okuqinisekisile ukuthi izivumelwano zabakhalazayo nenkampani zifinyelele emaphethelweni.Uze wakuqinisekisa lokho ngokuthumelela Isolezwe  izivumelwano abazenza nabasebenzi futhi bazisayina, ezithi umsebenzi wabo uqala ngoJanuwari futhi uyagcina ngoJuni 30.Echaza, uthe bona njengenkampani bebezimisele ukubaqasha bonke ngesihe hhayi ngempoqo kodwa kwafumaneka ukuthi bangaphezu kwesibalo esidingeka esibhedlela.Echaza ukusuka nokuhlala kwale ndaba, uthe bona babazi ukuthi abasebenzi bawu-122, ngakho kudingeka abawu-28 abazoqashwa kabusha. Uthe bashaqeka sebethola ukuthi empeleni abasebenzi abakhona bawu-206, sekuhlangene nabasha, ekubeni kudingeka abawu-150 kuphela. Eqhuba uNxumalo, uthe baphoqelekile ukuba baqhubeke babaholele futhi babathengele nomfaniswano kuze kuphele izinyanga eziyisithupha. Uthe lokho bebekwenza ngesihe, futhi balahlekelwe yizizumbulu zemali ngalokho. Uthe yingakho begcine benze inhlolokhono okuyiyo ebahlungile. Uthe balandele yonke imigudu futhi babikela ngisho nabakwaCCMA. Bebuzwa abasebenzi ukuthi bayile yini kwaCCMA, bathe bayile kodwa kwanhlanga zimuka nomoya njengoba sebelufaka kwabezindaba udaba. Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kwekhansela ayiphumelelanga kwaze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela. NoNxumalo uthe usenesikhathi agcina ukuxhumana nekhansela ngoba alitholakali.

UFUNA angayitholi ibheyili umsolwa, umndeni womfundi waKwaDumisa eMzinto okuthiwa umbulale ngasekupheleni kwenyanga edlule.Isidumbu sikaZinhle Khathi (18) obefunda u-matric eSiphapheme High satholwa egumbini ayelala kulo ngo-Ephreli 25 ugogo (78) wakhe.Kusolwa ukuthi  umsolwa, onguyise wengane kamufi enonyaka nezinyanga eziyisithupha, wamshaya ngesikhali esithile maqede wadla phansi.Umamncane kamufi, uNksz Thando Khathi, uthe kubathobe amanxeba ukuboshwa komsolwa.“Sijabule ngokuthi uboshiwe. Yize kungeke kusambuyisa uZinhle kodwa kuhle avalelwe ejele ngakwenzile (umsolwa),” kusho uNksz Khathi.Uqhube wathi balindele ukuthi umthetho uqhubeke usebenze, angayitholi ibheyili bese egwetshwa kanzima.Umufi ubengcwatshwa izolo.UMphathiswa wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nonhlanhla Khoza, ukushayele ihlombe ukusebenza ngokuzikhandla kwamaphoyisa ebopha umsolwa ngokushesha.Uthe ukubulawa kukaZinhle kushiye abaningi nezinhliziyo ezibuhlungu.“Umndeni wakhe ubusalindele lukhulu kuye kodwa impilo yakhe yanqanyulwa umuntu onenhliziyo embi. Sizwa kuthiwa ngayizolo, ngaphambi kokuba ambulale, wayekade emshaye ngendlela yokuthi akakwazanga nokuya esikoleni,” kusho uNkk Khoza.Uthe kuyawathoba amanxeba ukuboshwa komsolwa“Yize noma singeke sisawubuyisa mphefumulo kaZinhle kodwa kuyasijabulisa ukuthi umuntu osolwa ngokwenza isigameko esinesihluku uboshiwe. Njengoba bonke ubufakazi bukhomba yena, siyethemba ukuthi umthetho uzosebenza, athole isijeziso esimfanele,” kusho uNkk Khoza.Uphinde wanxusa umphakathi ukuthi wehlise amaphaphu, ungazijeziseli umsolwa kodwa uyeke umthetho usebenze njengoba usuqalile ngokubopha umsolwa.“Kufanele siyeke amaphoyisa aqhubeke nomsebenzi wawo ngaphandle kokuphazanyiswa. Ukuboshwa komsolwa ngokushesha kusho ukuthi asebenza ngokuzikhandla ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ubulungiswa buyenzeka,” usho kanje.Uthe osonhlalakahle basazoqhubeka nokunikezela usizo lokwelulekwa ngokomqondo emndenini kamufi kanjalo nakubafundi besikole abefunda kuso.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa aseSawoti abophe owesilisa oneminyaka engu-24 ngoLwesithathu.“Umsolwa onguyise wengane kamufi uyamaniswa necala lokubulala umfundi oneminyaka engu-18 owatholwa efile ngaphakathi endlini yakubo KwaDumisa ngo-Ephreli 25,” kusho uNetshiunda.Uqhube wathi kuthe sekubuya imiphumela yokuhlolwa kwesidumbu, yaveza ukuthi ufe ngenxa yokushawa kanzima, kwase  kuvulwa idokodo lecala lokufa komuntu.Uthe umsolwa ubanjwe eReservoir Hills, wavela enkantolo ngoLwesihlanu

UCWANINGO lwePietermaritzburg Economic Justice & Dignity Group, luveza ukuthi isibiza u-R5 252.15 igilosa yomndeni isuka ku-R5 252.77 ngoJuni.Kule nyanga kuye kwanyuka isitambu, amaqanda, ugreen pepper, impuphu, irayisi, izibindi zenkukhu, i-cremora, ama-aphula, ipeanut butter nesinkwa.Ukudla okwehlile wutamatisi, ukherothi, i-butternut, ispinashi, amawolintshi, u-anyanisi, u-curry powder, isobho, itiye, izingingila zenkukhu, i-wors, usu, iklabishi, upholoni nojamu.UMnuz Mervyn Abrahams we-Pietermaritzburg Economic Justice & Dignity Group, uthe igilosa isabiza ngoba ukudla okuyizidingo okuthengwa nyangazonke okubalwa impuphu nokunye kusabiza.Uveze ukuthi ukudla kwengane okunomsoco kubiza uR935.71 kodwa isibonelelo sezingane siwu-R530.“Ukudla kuyabiza, abesifazane okuyibona abenza igilosa bathwele kanzima ngoba igilosa yomndeni ibiza ukwedlula amaholo abasebenzi (iNational Minimum Wage) ewu-R5 074.72 ngenyanga njengoba igilosa iwu-R5 252.15. Abangasebenzi bathwele kanzima kakhulu ngoba nesibonelelo sezingane asaneli igilosa enomsocoyezingane,” kusho u-Abrahams.Ukhale ngokuthi ukunyuka kukagesi nakho kwandisa umthwalo emahlombe abantu njengoba unyuke ngo-12.72%.Ubalule ukuthi imizi eminingi isebenzisa ugesi owu-350kWh ngenyanga okusho ukuthi ithenga ikhadi likaR900 kuya ku-R1 200 ngenyanga.Wenze isibonelo sokuthi eMgungundlovu umndeni osebenzisa ugesi owu-350kWh unyuke ngo-R136.05 usuka ku-R906.92 waya ku-R1 042.97.Uthe abantu bathwele kanzima, abakwazi ukumelana nezindleko zikagesi, ezegilosa, ezokugibela nezokubiza kwempilo.

NGESIKHATHI umhlaba wonke ugubha i-International Nurses Day, eba ngoMeyi 12, i-Health and Allied Workers Indaba Trade Union (HAITU) ithi bathwele kanzima onesi ezibhedlela zikahulumeni eNingizimu Afrika.UMengameli weHAITU, uMnuz Rich Sicina, uthe kufanele wonke amalungu ePhalamende nabasebenzi bakahulumeni bonkana bangabi nama-medical aid ukuze bezolwazi usizi olubhekene nonesi kuleli.Uveze ukuthi unesi odume umhlaba wonke uFlorence Nightingale uyaphenduka ethuneni lakhe uma ebona isimo amanesi asebenza ngaphansi kwaso kuleli.“Ngeke silugubhe usuku lonesi ngoba akukho okushintshayo. Siyabatshela ongqongqoshe kule micimbi ukuthi sithwele kanzima, kodwa akukho abakwenzayo. “Kuyimanje onesi abathathu babhekelela iziguli eziwu-40 ewodini eyodwa. Onesi bayathukwa yiziguli ngenxa yokuthi uhulumeni unciphisa imali ebhekelele ezempilo. Akuphephile ezibhedlela, kuningi nje okungahambi kahle,” kusho uSicina.Uthe ukube ongqongqoshe basebenzisa izibhedlela zikahulumeni, bangayi kwezizimele ngabe bayalubona usizi olubhekene nabahlengikazi.“Amalungu ePhalamende uma egula aya ezibhedlela ezizimele, ayofaka imali kahulumeni emaphaketheni omacaphunakusale.“Kungakuhle ukuthi iqedwe i-medical aid ephalamende nakuwo wonke amazinga kahulumeni ukuze le mali izosiza ezibhedlela.“Kunzima ukuthi ezibhedlela zikahulumeni azikho izinsiza kusebenza ezanele, ngisho abasebenzi bezempilo abasaqashwa kahle ngoba uhulumeni ekhala ngokuthi akanamali.“Ayikho into esiyibona ifanele ukugujwa ngalolu suku ngoba bathwele kanzima onesi,” kusho uSicina.Uthe onesi abaholelwa kahle kangangokuthi abakwazi ukufundisa izingane zabo ezikoleni ezinemfundo esezingeni eliphezulu, abakwazi nokuthenga imizi.Uveze ukuthi njengoba uhulumeni engabaqashi onesi kusho ukuthi iningi labo lixhashazwa ama-labour brokers.“Onesi bagcina sebenikezwa izinkontileka yizinkampani ezifunela abantu imisebenzi, ezihlale zincozula iholo labo nyangazonke. “Abanalo nethemba lokuthola umsebenzi ngoba basebenza njengetoho minyaka yonke. Akukho esikujabulelayo ngosuku lonesi. Siyathemba ukuthi isikhalo sethu siyozwakala ngelinye ilanga,” esho.

KUME nse ukufunda esikoleni Incinjane Secondary, ePieters, eMnambithi. Lokhu kwenzeke ngemva kokuthi abazali nabafundi bebhikishili besola  uthisha ofundisa izibalo ngokuthi udakwa kuze kuphazamiseke umsebenzi.Isolezwe Ngempelasonto  lithole ngomthombo walo ukuthi bekunganyakazi lutho esikoleni abazali nabafundi bethi isibami emphinjeni indaba kathisha futhi akathathelwa izinyathelo. Kuthiwa okubi kakhulu wukuthi ufundisa izibalo kumatric nokuyinto ebucayi kanti ubuye afundise neNatural Science.Kuthiwa uthisha uyabudlonya utshwala akabudlalisi futhi kwesinye isikhathi uze ahambe efunwa nguthishanhloko emashibhini uma  engasafiki esikoleni.USihlalo wesigungu esephethe isikole uMnuz Sibongiseni Madlala, uthe impela babhekene nengwadla futhi bafuna isukunyelwe ngokushesha.“ Uma kuholiwe nje kuyaziwa ukuthi akabe eseza emsebenzini isonto lonke, kuthiwa uhamba ephuza nasemajoyintini endawo. Uma kufanele kuphume imiphumela yezingane, ayiphumi ngoba izifundo zakhe azimakiwe ngakho amamaki awekho,’’ kuchaza uMadlala.UMadlala uthe abantu bendawo baze bamncishe utshwala bethi akahambe aye emsebenzini kodwa abufune ezingojeni aze abuthole bese ehlala khona lize lishone.Uthe kuyabakhathaza lokhu ngoba sekuze kwehlisa izinga lokuphasa isikole besiphasa ngo95% sehlile safika ko63% kanti izibalo zizodwa nje imiphumela yazo iwu-33%. Uthe uphenyo lukhomba ukuthi uselove izinsuku ezingu-222 selokhu afika ngo-2018 kulesi sikole.Kuthiwa akukho okungazanywanga ngoba uke watholelwa usizo wayiswa esikhungweni sabasiza abaxakwe yinkinga yezidakamizwa. Kuthiwa waya kabili washiya phansi, bezwa kuthiwa ubuyele emashibhini aphuza kuwona.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz uMuzi Mahlambi uthe wudaba olukhathaza kakhulu olufuna ukusukunyelwa ngokushesha nangokukucophelela lolu.“Ihhovisi lesifunda luzolusebenza udaba sizame ukuthi simsize lo msebenzi wethu. Siwumnyango onakekekelayo yingakho sizoqala ngokumfunela usizo. Uma kuya ngokuthi izinkinga ziyadlondlobala siyobe sesidlulela ekuqondiseni ubugwegwe,’’ kusho uMahlambi.Leli phephandaba lithole ukuthi ngesikhathi kunombhikisho izikhulu zomnyango esifundeni zifikile zathembisa ukuthi kuzolethwa abanye othisha ababili. Kuvele ukuthi lo thisha onenkinga usethunyelwe ukuyothola usizo.Imizamo yokumthola uthisha ayiphumelelanga izinombolo zakhe bezingasebenzi. Kuthiwa uyawalahla amaselula uhlala engatholakali ocingweni.

BAVUKE umbhejazane bavala umgwaqo ngamathayi avuthayo abahlala ehostela labesifazane, iThokoza, bekhala ngokungabi nagesi izinsuku eziyisishiyagalolunye.Laba besifazane batshele Isolezwe ukuthi babone kungcono bangene emgwaqweni ngoba bazizwa benzelwa phansi wuMasipala weTheku.UNksz Ntombi Mkhize ongomunye wabaseThokoza uthe: “Inkinga nje esinayo ugesi phaqa. Kusuka ngesonto eledlule, ugesi awukho. Wavele wahamba kubonakala ukuthi akukhona ukucishwa kokuwonga kodwa uhamba ngoba konakele ndawana thize. Kuze kube yimanje, awukho.” Uthe ayikho inhlobo yokudla kwabo okuhlala emafrijini okungabolanga njengoba sekuhambe izinsuku eziningi kangaka ugesi ungekho.“Bekusanda kuphele inyanga, sithenge kakhulu izinto ezihlala emafrijini. Zonke zibolile,” kusho yena.Uthe sebekhalela ezitofini zegesi ukuze bakwazi ukulala bedlile nezingane zabo, wathi kwakhona lokho kuyingozi enkulu.“Sihlala ngabathathu ezindlini, yilowo nalowo unegesi yakhe, siwabasa sonke, uma kungenzeka iphutha, kungenzeka isibhicongo sodwa,” kuqhuba uNksz Mkhize.Omunye umhlali, uNksz Malindi Ngcobo, obebhandishe unyawo, uthe ubuya esibhedlela ukuyothola usizo kulandela ukushibilika kwakhe ephaseji laleli hostela.“Ngibuya ebusuku emsebenzini, ngiwile, nganyela ngoba kumnyama emaphaseji,” kusho yena.Uthe basaba nezifo ngenxa yokungcola okudalwa ukudla abakulahle emva kokukukhipha emafrijini, njengoba udoti ungalandiwe.“Izimpethu zingcwele yonke indawo, zize zihambe ngisho ezindongeni. Sithe asiteleke ngoba mhlawumbe kuzokwazi ukuthi kusheshe kuzwakale,” kusho yena.Bathe abakufunayo ukubuyiswa kukagesi.Isolezwe lilizwile iphunga elixakayo, elikuhilayo uma umi ngaphandle kwaleli hostela.Baveze ukuthi kuhamba ugesi nje ngesonto elandulela elokuhamba kukagesi, bebeke bahanjelwa amanzi, babiza ikhansela, langenelela, abuya.Ikhansela lendawo, uMnuz Ntando Khuzwayo, elificwe yiSolezwe endaweni, lithe isikhalazo besiqala ukufika ezindlebeni zalo izolo, njengoba abahlali bese beteleka.“Ngithole ukuthi ukhona olungisa ugesi obesefikile ukuzozama ukuwulungisa kodwa wathola ukuthi inkinga ikumasipala ngoba awunabo abasebenzi abazolungisa (ngenxa yesiteleka),” kusho uKhuzwayo.Uqhube wathi useshayele oyinhloko yezagesi kumasipala, wathembisa ukuthi kukhona okuzokwenziwa ukulungisa isimo.“Njengoba ngila, ngeke ngihambe ungalungisiwe,” kuphetha uKhuzwayo.

BABINGELELE imantshi abasolwa abane abahluleke ukuchazela amaphoyisa ngezimbuzi ebezisebhuthini yemoto abebehamba ngayo yohlobo lweMercedes Benz.Laba basolwa abane, abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-19 no-37 ubudala, bavele eNkantolo yeMantshi eSenwabarwana ngoMsombuluko ngemuva kokukhalelwa amasongo kaSigonyela ngeSonto betholakala nezimbuzi zilayishwe ebhuthini yemoto abebehamba ngayo kuN11 ngaseSteiloop.Okhulumela amaphoyisa aseLimpopo, uColonel Malesela Ledwaba, uthi amaphoyisa alunywe indlebe ngabasolwa abashushumbisa izimbuzi zokwebiwa ngaseSteiloop.“Kusize umphakathi olume amaphoyisa indlebe ngesikhathi ubona le moto ihamba eSteiloop. Ngemuva kokuphekwa ngemibuzo kwabasolwa, kucacile ukuthi imfuyo akuyona eyabo.”Umnikazi walezi zimbuzi uzifikele mathupha kule ndawo wakhomba imfuyo yakhe athe ngempela yebiwe. Abasolwa baboshwe ngaleso sikhathi babekwa icala lokweba imfuyo.

BAVELILE abasolwa ngokubulala abantu besifazane ababili babaphosa ehhokweni lezingulube i-Onvervaght, eSebayeng.Laba basolwa abathathu umlimi wepulazi lezingulube uZachariah Johannes Olivier (60), isisebenzi sakhe esiqapha abasebenzi u-Andrian Rudolph De Wet (19), nesinye isisebenzi uWilliam Musora (45) odabuka eZimbabwe.Laba babhekene namacala abucayi, amabili okubulala okuhleliwe nelilodwa lokuzama ukubulala, elokutholakala nesibhamu ngokungekho emthethweni kanjalo nokuphazamisa ukusebenza kwengalo yomthetho. UMusora yena unelinye icala elengeziwe lokuba kuleli ngokungemthetho.“Lawa macala asuselwa esehlweni sango-Agasti 17 epulazini i-Onvervaght, eSebayeng. Kubikwa ukuthi iloli laseClover labonakala lichitha ukudla osekuphelelwe yisikhathi nokuyinto eyenza abagilwa uLocadia Ndlovu (35), odabuka eZimbabwe noMaria Makgatho (44) abahlala eShikotishing Village, eMakotopong, bangena kuleli pulazi beyocosha kulokhu kudla okulahlwe yiloli.”Bahlaselwa lapho badutshulwa laba besifazane bashona, kwalimala owesilisa owakwazi ukuzihudulela emgwaqweni omkhulu wathola usizo lokuya esibhedlela.Icala lavulwa ngomhla ka-20 kwephezulu, abasolwa baboshwa ngosuku olulandelayo.Laba basolwa bavele enkantolo ngoLwesihlanu ukuze kulalelwe isicelo sabo sebheyili kodwa abameli babo banxusa ukuba icala lihlehle ukuze bazothola izitatimende zabasolwa abazenza emaphoyiseni bacela nokuthi baboniswe idokodo lecala.Leli cala lihlehliselwe uSepthemba 10 ukuze kuqhubeke izicelo zebheyili.

KUBE muncu ekuseni ngeSonto, abalandeli beNkatha Freedom Party bethola ingozi belibangise emcimbini waleli qembu enkundleni iMoses Mabhida eThekwini.Ngokombiko othunyelwe yinkampani yezimo eziphuthumayo, i-IPSS Medical Rescue, baphuthume kuN2 phakathi kweGingindlovu neMandeni, bethola umbiko ngengozi yamabhasi amathathu.Kuthiwa bawu-36 abantu abalimele kule ngozi, kodwa bayisishiyagalombili abaphuthunyiswe esibhedlela, kubo uyedwa osesimeni esibucayi.Ayikho imibiko yabashonile kanti nembangela yokushayisana kwalawa mabhasi kayaziwa.Kuthiwa abeRural Metro Fire Department yibona abalekelele ukutakula abantu abebevaleleke emabhasini ukuze bakwazi ukuthola usizo lokuqala.

ZIYAQONGA izinkinga zobuholi kwiNFP, abaholi abakhethwe engqungqutheleni yangonyaka owedlule, sebephenduke inkukhu nempaka.UNobhala Jikelele, uMnuz Teddy Thwala, ufuna inhlangano eyengamele ukhetho, i-Independent Electoral Commission (IEC), ingabemukeli ubuholi akhethwa nabo engqungqutheleni eyayiseThekwini.UThwala ufake isicelo esiphuthumayo eNkantolo eNkulu eMgungundlovu, lapho khona ekhala ngokuthi akuzange kulandelwe imigomo ngesikhathi bekhethwa.UThwala ufuna isicelo sakhe silalelwe ngoLwesihlanu, okuwumnqamulajuqu obekwe i-IEC wokuba wonke amaqembu ezepolitiki alethe amagama abantu abazowamela.Phezu kwecala elifakwe uThwala, kuphinde kube khona elifakwe usihlalo weNFP kwisifunda iTheku, uMnuz Sikhumbuzo Zulu, eNkantolo yezoKhetho.UZulu naye ufuna ukuthi kuchithwe isinqumo se-IEC sokuvuma ubuholi obusha.I-IEC isanda kuveza ukuthi izokwamukela ubuholi obakhethwa ngoDisemba, nokubuyise ithemba lokuthi iNFP izokwazi ukungenela ukhetho lwangoMeyi.Emaphepheni asenkantolo, uThwala uveze ukuthi kunecala eliphonsela inselelo imiphumela yengqungquthela eyabakhetha."Icala lizolalelwa ngo-Ephreli 30. Mina nabanye esakhethwa siyakwamukela ukuthi akuzange kulandelwe imigomo ngesikhathi kuqhubeka ingqungquthela."UThwala uthe kunganyomfeka izinhlelo zeNFP zokhetho uma i-IEC ingaqhubeka nokwamukela ubuholi obusha."Lokho kungasho ukuthi uhlu lwabazomela iNFP luzokube lugcwele abantu abakhethwe engqungqutheleni engekho emthethweni. Sebeqalile balungiselela ukuhambisa uhlu lwamagama. Kungaba nzima ukulungisa lo monakalo uma inkantolo isinqumo ukuchitha ubuholi obakhethwa ngonyaka owedlule."UThwala uthe bafuna ukuthi i-IEC yamukele ubuholi besikhashana obebuhola iNFP ngaphambi kwengqungquthela yangonyaka owedlule.UZulu yena ufuna ukuthi i-IEC yamukele ubuholi obakhethwa engqungqutheleni yango-2019.Labu buholi bahlakazwa emva kwesinqumo seNkantolo eNkulu eMgungundlovu esathi yayingekho emthethweni ingqungquthela obakhethwa kuyo.UZulu uthe ubuholi obakhethwa ngo-2019, kufanele budedelwe buqhubeke nokuhola iNFP ngoba busidlulisele phambili isinqumo sokuhlakazwa kwabo.Uthe i-IEC akufanele yamukele ubuholi obakhethwa ngonyaka owedlule ngoba kusenecala elisenkantolo."Isinqumo se-IEC sizokwandisa izinkinga kwiNFP, nokuzokwenza ukuthi kube nzima ukubuyisana kwiNFP."UZulu ufuna iNkantolo yezoKhetho ilalele isicelo sakhe ngokushesha. UMengameli weNFP, uMnuz Ivan Barnes, uthe angakwazi ukuphawula ngalolu daba emva komhlangano wesigungu esiphezulu seNFP obuyizolo, ntambama.Lo mhlangano ububizelwe ukuzobhunga ngala macala.

UKHUNGATHEKILE umndeni wowesilisa waseNquthu, owadutshulwa wabulawa, uthola ikhadi lesimemo somshado wakhe livela kowesifazane ashona ejola naye.Umufi owayesembonini yametekisi, uMnuz Hezekia Naledi Masiteng, wahlaselwa ngamadoda angaziwa amdubula esendleleni ebheke emzini wakhe khona eNquthu.Isigameko kuthiwa senzeka ngoJuni 5, 2020. Ngesikhathi ebulawa wayethandana nentombi yakhe, uNksz Nompumelelo Ntuli odume ngelikaYayo.Lo wesifazane kuvela ukuthi uthumelele ikhadi lesimemo somshado kumalungu kamufi.Isolezwe Ngempelasonto lisibonile isimemo somshado okuthiwa uzokuba ngoSepthemba 29. Uzosuka kubo kowesifazane eNkandla, uphelele kubo kukamufi eNquthu.Umndeni kamufi usola lo wesifazane ngokuhlekisa ngendodana yawo."Sididekile ukuthi le ntombazane iwuhlela kanjani umcimbi nomufi ingazange isitshele thina. Ize ibe nesibindi esingaka sokusithumelela nekhadi lesimemo somshado pho,'' kubabaza owomndeni.Umndeni uthi uxakwa nawukuthi lo mshado uzophelela kanjani emagcekeni kamufi ngaphandle kwemvume yawo?Kwenzeka le mpicabadala nje, kunecala lombango wamafa eliqhubekayo enkantolo phakathi kwentombi nomndeni kamufi.Intombi kuvela ukuthi inezingane ezintathu nomufi. Isolwa nangokushaqa amatekisi awu-13 kamufi okumanje imali ayisebenzayo kuthiwa iya entombini. Kuthiwa umufi wayengalobolile.Omunye womndeni kamufi uthe bayazi ukuthi umshado intombi iwenza ngoba nakhu sekumele ivuselele izincwadi zemvume yamatekisi njengoba seziphelelwe yisikhathi."Umthetho wasematekisini uthi izincwadi zezimvume zamatekisi kumele zivuselwe owomndeni kamufi noma ke kube umkakhe. Manje le ntombazane seyifuna ukuba nencwadi yomshado ukuze izoqhubeka nokuba nelungelo lamatekisi,'' kuchaza owomndeni.Kuthiwa umndeni ohlangothini lwentombi yiwona omagange nezinhlelo zomshado ngoba ubona ubungozi bokuthi kungenzeka amatekisi agcine esema ukusebenza uma owesifazane engayitholi ngokushesha incwadi yomshado.Ithintwa intombi, ivuthe ingabaselwe isola umndeni kamufi ngokuphapha, uyisa udaba kwabezindaba.UNksz Nompumelelo Ntuli ukuqinisekise ngomlomo wakhe ukuthi impela kuyiqiniso ukuthi uyashada nomufi futhi izimemo seziphumile, wathi ukushada ngale ndlela akuqali ngaye."Wena angithi unguMzulu? Le nto ngokwesintu ike yenziwe, nami ngiyenza ngaphansi kwemibandela wesintu. Kodwa ngeke ngisuke ngitshele wena ukuthi kungani ngenza lo mshado,'' usho kanje ebhoka ngolaka.Ube esecela intatheli ukuthi eminye imininingwane iyifune kulabo ethole kubona udaba, wathi nentatheli ivumelekile ukuba ingafika izodla ngosuku olukhulu lomshado.Isazi somthetho, u-Advocate Mpumelelo Zikalala, sithe  angeke abe nayo incwadi yomshado ngoba ukuze ibe khona ngokomthetho kumele kube ukuthi abantu ababili basadla anhlamvana, bavumile baqinisekisa ukuthi bayashada.Isazi samasiko, uSolwazi Gugu Mazibuko waseNyuvesi yaseJohannesburg sithe lo wesifazane wenza umuga.Uthe lolu hlobo lomshado ngokwesintu lwenziwa uma isoka elishone selilobolile futhi selikhehlile, sekusele ukuthi kuphume udwendwe nje kuphela.Kulolu daba uthe uyakweshwama lokhu okuzobe kwenziwa yilo wesifazane ngoba ubeyintombi nje kuphela engalotsholiwe futhi engazange ikhehlwe.

INHLANGANO egqugquzela ukuba kuthengwe imikhiqizo eyenziwe kuleli iProudlySA, idonse ngendlebe amalungu ePhalamende ukuba agqoke umswenko owenziwe ekhaya.IProudlySA ibinenkundla yokucobelela ngolwazi ePhalamende. Nakukhaphethi obomvu amalungu ePhalamende abekhuluma nomethuli wezinhlelo uThami Dish amchazele ukuthi agqokiswe wobani.AbeProudlySA bathe kubalulekile ukuthi wonke umuntu agqoke impahla eyenziwe kuleli ukuze kuzodaleka amathuba omsebenzi. Amalungu ePhalamende esilisa ebegqoke imibala ezothile kanti awesifazane ebegqame ngemibala ehlukene.UNgqongqoshe wamaBhizinisi Amancane, uNkk Stella Ndabeni-Abrahams, uthe kubalulekile ukuthenga yonke imikhiqizo eyenziwe kuleli nokuseka amabhizinisi amancane.Ubalule ukuthi amabhizinisi amancane adala amathuba omsebenzi amaningi ezweni.

BAYALELWE ukuthi babambe amatomu oNgqongqoshe asebephefumula ngezinto abazozenza eminyangweni abeyengamele ezweni njengoba umkhombandlela ozolandelwa uzokhishwa nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa.Lo myalelo ukhishwe nguNgqongqoshe ehhovisi likaMengameli uNksz Khumbudzo Ntshavheni ngoLwesine, ekhuluma esithangamini nabezindaba eKapa.Ongqongqoshe abahlukene bamatasa baphawula ngezinto abazozenza kuhulumeni wehlandla lesikhombisa, kulandela ukufungiswa kuleli sonto.UNksz Ntshavheni uthe imigomo emisha ezolandelwa nguhulumeni, izobhungwa ngelizayo emhlanganweni weKhabhinethi Lekgotla.“Lo mhlangano uhlelelwe uJulayi 11 noJulayi 12. Kuwona kuzobhungwa ngemigomo ezolandelwa kubhekwa umqulu wokuthuthukisa izwe i-National Development Plan. Abaqondisi jikelele beminyango babuka yonke imigomo yamaqembu ayingxenye yohulumeni wokuphatha ngokubambisana, bese becaphuna imigomo engasetshenziswa ukuthuthukisa izwe. Izobe isihlanganiswa kwenziwe imigomo eyodwa okuyiyo izwe elizogxila kuyona kule minyaka emihlanu ezayo.”Uthe uRamaphosa uzobe esethula isihlanganisiwe ePhalamende ngoJulayi 18, isiwumkhombandlela wezwe.“Alikho iqembu okuzothi uma sekuphasiswe le migomo bese kuba elayo. Kuzobe sekuba yimigomo kahulumeni, isihlanganisa wonke amaqembu angu-11 ayingxenye kahulumeni.”Ugcizelele ukuthi akekho ungqongqoshe ozophusha imigomo yeqembu lakhe, kodwa imigomo ezophushwa ngekahulumeni okuzobe kuvunyelwene ngayo emhlanganweni weKhabhinethi lekgotla.Uveze ukuthi emaqenjini angu-11 ayingxenye kahulumeni, alikho elizobe seliyigxeka.“Amaqembu aphikisayo yi-MK ne-EFF kanjalo namanye angekho kuhulumeni wobumbano. Amaqembu akuhulumeni wobumbano, yiwona aphethe uhulumeni. Imigomo kuzobe kungeyona eye-ANC, DA noma i-UDM, kodwa ekahulumeni.”Uveze ukuthi ongqongqoshe bazobe sebelandela le migomo emisha kahulumeni.“Okwamanje awukho umgomo okhona ezweni, ngoba eyehlandla likahulumeni wesithupha iphele ngesikhathi kufungiswa uRamaphosa. Ngalesi sikhathi ongqongqoshe bamatasa nomsebenzi wokuxhumana nabaqondisi beminyango, ukuthola ngezinto ebezenzeka emnyangweni, nokuthi imiphi imigomo okumele ifakwe ukuze iminyango iyilandele,” kugcizelela uNksz Ntshavheni.Mayelana nabakhala ngokwanda kwesibalo seKhabhinethi ekubeni bekunezinhlelo zokuyinciphisa, uNksz Ntshavheni, uthe abavoti yibona abadale lesi simo.“Ukube abavoti bavotela iqembu elilodwa ukubusa uhulumeni, ngabe ayibanga khona le nkinga. URamaphosa wayehlele ukunciphisa isibalo seKhabhinethi kodwa ngenxa yokuthi iqembu lakhe alitholanga amavoti enele okuthi akwazi ukwenza lokhu, leli phupho alizange lifezeke.” Uthe basazoqhubeka nezinhlelo zokuthi kube nengxoxo ngekusasa lezwe ezohlanganisa izinhlaka ezehlukene zomphakathi.Ugcizelele ukuthi njengoba sebekhethelwe kwiKhabhinethi, bazosebenzela izwe hhayi amaqembu.“Njengoba sifungile nje, asisebenzeli amaqembu ethu kodwa sesisebenzela izwe. Konke esikwenzayo sibeka phambili izwe, hhayi amaqembu ethu asijubile.”

NKOSIKHONA CELEZIYINSAKAVUKELA izigameko lapho okusolwa khona abesifazane ngokusoconga abayeni babo baze balahlwe nangamacala alokho.Abanye balabo besifazane kuvela izizathu ezahlukene ezisuke ziwumnyombo wokuthi bagcine bekhetha ukusoconga abayeni.Ngonyaka owedule iNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini yagweba udilikajele, uNkk Dias Bella Dosantos (44) owalahlwa yicala lokusoconga umyeni wakhe, uMnuz Mark Buttle.Umufi kuthiwa wabulawelwa emzini wakhe oseNewlands East, eThekwini ngoFebhuwari 2018. Kulesi sigameko inkosikazi yagwaza umyeni amanxeba angu-53 ngemuva kwengxabano.Muva nje ecaleni lokubulala elisematheni, uNkk Nongcebo Faith Ntombela usanda kugeqa amagula eNkantolo eNkulu yaseScottburgh mayelana netulo lokubulala umyeni wakhe owayesebenzela amaphoyisa oMkhandlu weTheku, uCaptain Zwelakhe Thomas Ntombela.Umufi wadutshulwa wabulawa esemzini wakhe okwa-S, eMlaza esigamekweni esenzeka ngoMeyi 3, ngonyaka owedlule.Ngemuva kwalokho inkabi eyadubula uSipho Ntombela yageqa amagula eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini yaveza ukuthi yayithunywe nguNkk Ntombela.Wabe esekhalelwa ngamasongo kaSigonyela lo wesifazane ngetulo lokusoconga umyeni. Egonyuluka muva nje, waveza ukuthi walingwa yinkabi esejele uKhulani Cele eyazenza uMphathiswa, uMnuz Siboniso Duma.Kwesinye isigameko uNkk Gugu Mchunu kuthiwa wasoconga umyeni, uMnuz Jabulani Mchunu (50) owayesebenzela uphiko lwezichishamlilo loMkhandlu weTheku olusePinetown.UNkk Mchunu kuthiwa wahlela itulo lokusoconga umyeni wakhe ngoba wayesethandana nowesilisa omncane kunaye ngeminyaka, uMnuz Lindani Phungula (30) esikoleni ayefundisa kusona, iBruyns Primary.Ngosuku asocongwa ngalo umufi, uNkk Mchunu kuvela ukuthi wazenza umuntu osemakhaya kubo eNquthu.Kuthiwa emzini kamufi oseMariannhill kwagasela amadoda angabuza lutho aqhulula uyaba lwezinhlamvu waphelela khona lapho.Kwavela ukuthi umufi uyena owakhokhela umkakhe imali yokuthi aqhube izifundo zobuthishela ekolishi.Ilungu lomndeni elakhuluma neSolezwe ngaphambilini lezwakalisa ukudumala ngokuthi ilungu lomndeni kube yilona elibulala umyeni walo.Kulo nyaka iNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini ilahle ngecala umhlengikazi uNompumelelo Concalves ngecala lokusoconga umyeni wakhe owayengunjiniyela kwaTransnet, uMnuz Nkosi Timmy Langa.Lo mhlengikazi kuthiwa wahlela itulo waqasha izinkabi okuthiwa zathumba umufi emzini wakhe osePinetown ngobusuku bangoSepthemba 25, 2020.Kuthiwa bamthatha bayombulalela ehlathini, oZwathini, eNdwedwe.Udadewabo kamufi, uNksz Zodwa Langa wakhala ngonya athi lwakhonjiswa ngumakoti wakubo ekubeni babemethembile.IJaji elalibambile, uonke Dumisa lakhala kakhulu ngesenzo salo wesifazane.Ngo-2021 iSolezwe  labika ngodaba lowesifazane waseXobho, uNkk Zandile Mawela okuthiwa wakhanda itulo lokusoconga umyeni wakhe owayengusomabhizinisi odumile, uMnuz Richards Mawela.Umufi kuthiwa wadutshulwa ngentululwane yezinhlamvu esendleleni ebheke KwaDukuza.Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi umkakhe wakhalelwa ngamasongo kaSigonyela, wavuma necala lokubulala nelokuhlela ukubulala.Enkantolo wasola umufi njengembangela yokuthi agcine esemcabangela ukumbulala.Lo wesifazane wathi wayesekhathele ukuhlala nendoda emhlukumezayo.Ngonyaka odlule iNkantolo eNkulu ehlezi eLimpopo yagixabeza ngesigwebo sikadilakajele uNkk Florah Manaka (40) ngokwakha itulo lokubulala umyeni wakhe owayesebenza njengochwepheshe we-IT, ePolokwane, uMnuz Archie Manaka (43).Isigameko kuthiwa senzeka ngo-Ephreli 8, 2020. Umufi wahlaselwa wabhokodwa ngommese izikhathi ezimbalwa esemzini wakhe oseMoletje, eGa-Makweya.Ezigamekweni eziningi, ongoti abelapha ngokomphefumulo, bahlaba abesifazane ngokujwayela umkhuba wokuhlala emishadweni noma behlukunyezwa.UDkt Cynthia Hafejee ufanisa ukucasuka kowesifazane ohlukunyezwayo njengebhalunde elilokhu lifuthwa ngomoya, linwebeka. Kuthi uma umoya usungene kulona waze waphelelwa yindawo, liqhume.Kanjalo nowesifazane ohlale ecasuka egqumelana, ngelinye ilanga wenza umhlola wokubulala umyeni ngoba ibhalunde lisuke seligcwele. Uthe kwabanye ukuhlukunyezwa kubenza bafune injabulo kwamanye amadoda, babe namashende. Nakho lokho okudala izinkinga.UNkk Zamandosi Cele wenhlangano yabesifazane iKhuluma Mbokodo, uhambe emazwini afanayo. Uthe abesifazane kumele bajwayele ukugonyuluka ngazo zonke izinkinga ababhekana nazo emindenini yabo.“Akulona ihlazo ukuphuma emshadweni uma uzwa ukuthi kuyashisa. Ungesabi abantu abangazi lutho ngempilo yakho, uhlale uzwa ukuthi uyafa ngaphakathi,” usho kanje.Uthe kungcono ukuchaza enkantolo yesehlukaniso ukuthi kungani uphuma emshadweni okunokuchaza enkantolo ukuthi umbulaleleni umyeni wakho. Ugqugquzele nezinye izinhlangano ukuthi ziphume umkhankaso wokugqugquzela ukuthi abesifazane baphume ebudlelwaneni obungasabajabulisi. Uthe kumele kube nezigcawu eziba wuchungechunge ezingxenyeni zezwe ezahlukene lapho imbokodo ezothola khona ithuba lokuthi ibhodle futhi icebisane.

ASHESHE akhalelwa amasongo kaSigonyela amadoda amane asolwa ngokuqhumisa imishini yemali eKatlehong naseThokoza.Ithimba labaseshi elisuka ezinhlakeni ezahlukene zezomthetho lisebenze ngokuzikhandla kula masonto amabili adlule lithungatha abasolwa ngokuqhumisa imishini yemali.Uphenyo lubonise inqubekela phambili ngesikhathi kuboshwa abasolwa ababili ngoLwesine, kwathi owesithathu owadubuleka wakwazi ukubaleka. Lo msolwa olimalile uboshwe ehamba nomunye ngempelasonto ngesikhathi efuna usizo lwezempilo.Laba basolwa batholwe nemali eno-ink neziqhumane nezibhamu.“Kukho konke lokhu kutholakale izibhamu okukhona kuzo ne-shot gun ehlolwe kwatholaka ukuthi ike yasetshenziswa kobunye ubugebengu,” kusho amaphoyisa ngesitatimende.Abasolwa abathathu bazovela phambi kweMantshi yasePalm Ridge ngoMsombuluko, ngamacala okuqhumisa imishini yemali nokutholakala nezibhamu neziqhumane, umsolwa wesine usasesibhedlela lapho egadwe khona amaphoyisa.

ABAMANGALELWA ecaleni lokufa komdlali weKaizer Chiefs, uLuke Fleurs, bathi isono sabo wukucosha imoto yalo mdlali eyayilaxazwe esigangeni.Abamangalelwa abayisithupha bebevele eNkantolo yeMantshi eRoodepoort lapha abafaka khona isicelo sabo sebheyili. Abamangalewa ngoMnuz Ndumiso Mswane, Fernando Siva, Nhlakanipho Dlamini,  Franky Xaba, Meredi Mphahlele noThembinkosi Hlomikhawu.Ukufa kukaFleurs kwashiya abaningi bethuthumela bebabaza isihluku sezigebengu ezicanasayo eNingizimu Afrika.UFleurs obeneminyaka engu-24, wabulawa ebanjwa inkunzi, waphucwa imoto eHoneydew, eGauteng ngenyanga edlule. Wathelekelwa amadoda thizeni endaweni yokwetha uphethroli amphuca imoto ase emdubula wagcina ngokushona.UMnuz Ingrid Mainule, omele abamangalelwa owokuqala, owesibili nowesithathu wethule udaba lwabo enkantolo ebacelela ibheyili. Uthe amakhasimende akhe athi awazi ngokubanjwa inkunzi nokufa komdlali.Uthe amakhasimende akhe awakaze alahlwe ngamacala phambilini ngaphandle kommangalelwa wesithupha uHlomikhawu. Phambili uHlomikhawu walahlwa yicala lokugqekeza ngenhloso yokweba wagwetshwa iminyaka emine.UHlomikhawu kuthiwa waphinda walahlwa elinye icala elifanayo ngo-2017 wagwetshwa iminyaka emibili ebhadla ejele. Abamangalelwa bacele ukuthi inkantolo ibadedele ngebheyili kaR1000 kanti imindeni yabo izokwazi ukubakhokhela uma bededelwa.Abamangalelwa baboshwa eSlovoville, eSoweto, emuva kokuthi betholwe nemoto kamufi icwiyiwe. Amaphoyisa ebambisene nezinye izinhlaka babathelekela abamangalelwa emuva kwesikhashana bebazingela.Kulindeleke ukuthi isicelo sebheyili sabamangalelwa siqhubeke namuhla enkantolo njengoba bekufanele kuyoqinisekiswa imininingwane ethile ngabo. UMbuso uyasiphikisa isicelo sabo sebheyili.

AMAQEMBU abusa ngokubambisana athi azowapheka ngebhodwe elincane aze athi 'tshiyo tshiyo sengivuthiwe' amaqembu aphikisana nohulumeni wokubambisana oqale ngemuva kokhetho lukaMeyi 29 nonyaka.Amaqembu abusa ngokubambisana athe awakhohlwe amaqembu afungela uhulumeni wokubambisana ngokuthi ngeke uhlale isikhathi eside.Akusho lokhu ngesikhathi kunenkulumompikiswano ePhalamende, lapho bekuphikiswana ngenkulumo kaMengameli wezwe uCyril Ramaphosa.Amaqembu abusa ngokubambisana okubalwa i-ANC, DA, IFP nePA, athe azokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi uhulumeni wokubambisana awushabalali.Umholi weDA, uMnuz John Steenhuisen, uthe ngeke balunge abasongela uhulumeni wokubambisana. Uthe labo abagxeka uhulumeni wokubambisana yilabo abangafuni ukuthi izwe liye phambili.“Sekunesikhathi eside sivumela abantu ukuba bacekele phansi izwe ukuze kuzuze bona, baphazamise ukukhula komnotho. Imiphumela yokhetho olwedlule isinike ithuba lokuba senze izinto ngendlela eyehlukile. Laba abafuna ukucekela phansi izwe ngeke balunge uma sihlangene.”USteenhuisen uthe ukubambisana kwabo akusho ukuthi bazohlala bevumelana ngaso sonke isikhathi.Umholi wePA, uMnuz Gayton Mckenzie, uthe bazosala bodwa labo abafungela uhulumeni wokubambisana.“Isitimela siyahamba, asimile. Asibayeke laba basale kanje.  Into eyenza ukuthi belokhu besisola ngokuthi sidayise ngabantu yingoba bona bagibele isitimela okungesona. Bengingabe ngidayise ngabantu ababengikhankasela ukube angizange ngingene kuhulumeni wokubambisana.”Umholi we-IFP, uMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa, uthe bazimisele ukuletha uzinzo kuhulumeni wokubambisana.“Abantu ngesikhathi bevota bathi bafuna ukuthi amaqembu abambisane. Kufanele senze isiqiniseko sokuthi uhulumeni wokubambisana uyasebenza.”UHlabisa uthe uhulumeni wokubambisana uzoshintsha izimpilo zabantu.Usotswebhu we-ANC ePhalamende, uMnuz Mdumiseni Ntuli, uthe bazimisele ngokusebenzisana nawo wonke amaqembu anezihlalo ePhalamende.Umholi weMK ePhalamende, uDkt John Hlophe, uthe uhulumeni wokubambisana wakhiwe abantu abathanda izikhundla. Uthe ukuba lamaqembu aphethe ngokubambisana awazithandi izikhundla abezoyidedela iMK, iphathe KwaZulu-Natal.“Angithi kuthiwa i-ANC iyona okufanele ihole uhulumeni kazwelonke ngoba iyona eyathola amavoti amaningi, pho kungani iMK ingayekwanga iphathe KwaZulu-Natal? IMK iyona eyawina KwaZulu-Natal.”UHlophe uthe iDA iyona eshaya amaphiko kuhulumeni wokubambisana. Uthe abaguquki ekufuneni ukuthi kuthathwe umhlaba ngaphandle kwesinxephezelo.Umholi we-EFF, uMnuz Julius Malema, uthe kubajabulisile ukubona i-ANC ihluleka ukunqoba ukhetho ngamalengiso.UMalema usole uRamaphosa ngokuphinda izinto azisho enkulumweni ayethula ngoFebhuwari.“Ulenza kanjani lelo phutha? Le nkulumo iyona eyenza ukuthi nilahlekelwe okhethweni. Kusho ukuthi awufundanga lutho.”URamaphosa uzophendula ngoMsombuluko.

KUBHIMBE uhlelo kwabesilisa abayisihlanu okukholakala ukuthi bebeyobulala usomabhizinisi nonogada bakhe, ngenkathi bezithela olakeni lwamaphoyisa, badudubulana ngenhlamvu kwasala abane enkundleni, oyedwa walimala, esigamekweni esenzeke emgwaqeni uMoses Kotane, eSydenham, eThekwini ngoLwesithathu emini. Kuthiwa amaphoyisa abevele elandela umkhondo wabasolwa ngenxa  yamacala abucayi okubalwa kuwo awokubulala nawokubamba inkunzi. Emuva kokuthola ukuthi kukhona abaphezu kwakho amaphoyisa ahlale  ezithendeni zabo. Abasolwa kuthiwa babe wukubona amaphoyisa bavele bavulela ngenhlamvu babhekisa emaphoyiseni abezama ukubamisa. Kube sekudubuleka abanye bashonela emotweni, kwalimala oyedwa okuthiwa uzame ukubaleka. Ngesikhathi Isolezwe lifika endaweni yesigameko,  umsolwa osindile ubehleli phansi ebhandishe emlenzeni egadwe ngamaphoyisa.  Ubebonakala elokhu eqalaza. Ubegqoke isikibha esimpunga nesikhindi esimnyama namateku. Amaphoyisa abala ukhasha uma kusondelwa kuye. Bese kugcwele abantu, kuvalwe nomgwaqo, bebodwa abebebabaza okwenzekile, abanye bekhomba ngalapho obekukhona imoto ebinabasolwa ababulewe. Imoto yabo encane yohlobo lwe-KIA, ibifahlake yaphela iwindi langemuva, kubonakala sengathi izinhlamvu eziningi zamaphoyisa beziqhamuka ngemuva.Oyedwa wabasolwa, obesesihlalweni somshayeli, ubelengela ngaphandle ngekhanda, enoxhaxha lwamanxeba okudutshulwa entanyeni, negazi ligcwele entanyeni. Imoto ibime eceleni komgwaqo ishayise udonga lomuzi.Omunye umsolwa ubelele esihlalweni esingaphambili eceleni komshayeli, nangemuva kukhona ababili. Kuvela ukuthi laba bebeyizinkabi ebezibhilitile ekubulaleni osomabhizinisi emkhakheni wezokwakha nabantu abasemkhakheni wokuqapha. Okhulumela amaphoyisa esifundazweni, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uqinisekise ukuthi bese kuyisikhathi eside amaphoyisa ebafunela amacala okubulala nokubamba inkunzi.“Kuthe amaphoyisa ezwa ngabo izolo aphuthuma ukubavimba, abelamela kule ndawo. Kuthe ezama ukubamisa, bala ukulalela umthetho. Badubule kuqala bebhekise emaphoyiseni. Amaphoyisa aphendule ngenhlamvu kwadubuleka abane bafa, oyedwa walimala,” usho kanje.“Lo msolwa ozame ukubaleka utholwe nesibhamu esincane. Emotweni kutholakale izibhamu esilobe singakatholi ukuthi bezingaki. Kuvele ukuthi esinye sezibhamu abebesisebenzisa bekungesamaphoyisa,” kusho uNetshiunda.

Bavukele ehhovisi lezibonelelo zikahulumeni iSouth African Social Security Agency (SASSA) ngoMsombuluko eDurban Station, eThekwini, benengwa ukungayitholi imali yabo.Abantu bebeqhethe ngaphandle kwamahhovisi bezofuna izimpendulo ngoba sekuphele izinyanga belinde ukuthola imilayezo ebatshela ukuthi imali isingenile kodwa lutho.Iningi labo likhala ngokuthi kuthiwa aliye emagatsheni ahlukene kodwa alilitholi usizo.Ekhuluma neSolezwe, uMnuz Lindokuhle Mbhele, ohlala KwaMakhutha, uthe sekungokwesithathu ehambela emahhovisini akwa-SASSA kodwa usizo engalutholi.“Uma ngibashayela ucingo bangikhomba emagatsheni njengoba ngaya egatsheni eliseMbumbulu, bafike bangichitha, ngagcina ngingasizakalanga,” kusho uMbhele.Uthe u-R350 uyamsiza ezintweni eziningi njengoba engasebenzi.“Ngale mali ngiyakwazi ukuzithengela izinto zokugcoba ngiphinde ngikwazi nokukhokha imali yerenti ngoba ngihlala emjondolo. Kwesinye isikhathi ngiyabalisa ngingazi ngizolala ngidleni ngoba phela ukuwuthola kwethu lo-R350 uyakwazi ukuthi uzame,” usho kanje.UMnuz Sipriyan Kayos, oqhamuka eMgudulu, eReseviour Hills, uthe sekuphele izinyanga eziyisishiyagalombili engawutholi u-R350.“Le mali iyangisiza kakhulu ngoba ngiwumuntu osekhulile oziqoqela amakopi ukuze aziphilise. Ngiyalimala ngokungayitholi lemali ngoba uyaye ukhande izikweletu ungazi uzozikhokha ngani ngoba usuke ulambile,” kusho uKayos.Khonamanjalo uMnuz Thulani Nxumalo, uthe selokhu wabhalisela lesi sibonelelo ngo-2021 kodwa lutho ukusithola.“Amathemba ami wonke bengiwabeke kuwo u-R370 ukuze ngikwazi ukuziphilisa kodwa namanje ngisalindile,” kusho uNxumalo.UNksz Sandy Godlwana obhekelele ezokukhangisa nokuxhumana eSassa KwaZulu-Natal, uthe bonke abahola isibonelelo sabangasebenzi esibizwa nge-Covid-19 SRD Grant baziswa ngezinguquko zohlelo olusha lokuqinisekisa imininingwane.Uthe abantu abathintekayo yilabo abasuke sebefuna ukushintsha izinamba ngakho ukuze iSassa igweme ukukhwabanisa iye ibacele ukuthi baqinisekise imininingwane.Imininingwane iqinisekiswa ngokusebenzisa iselula enekhamera noma ikhompyutha. Umuntu okufanele aqinisekisa imininingwane uthunyelelwa iSMS enelink emchazela ngokufanele akwenze.Uthe imali ngeke iphume umuntu engayiqinisekisanga imininingwane yakhe ngakho kufanele adlule esigabeni sokuqinisekisa ukuthi nguye ngempela oholayo ngokubuka ikhamera ukuze izoshutha ubuso bakhe.“Uhlelo lokuqinisekisa imininingwane yabahola isibonelelo sabangasebenzi lwenziwa kuzwelonke futhi kusetshenziswa amaselula namakhompyutha. Alwenziwa emagatsheni. Sizoqhubeka nokubachazela abantu sifake nezaziso emahhovisi ethu ahlukene ngalolu hlelo,” kuchaza uNksz Godlwana.Uthe akupheli ngisho amaminithi awu-10 ukuthi iSassa ithumelele umuntu isms ngezinyathelo okufanele azithathe ukuze aqinisekise imininingwane.Ugqugquzele abanenkinga yesibonelelo sikaR370 ukuthi bathumele i-email [email protected] lapha bazophendulwa kungakapheli izinsuku ezinhlanu zokusebenza.

AMAPHOYISA axwayisa abantu abasabalalisa izinto  ezingamampunge ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, befaka itwetwe kubahlali, ukuthi bazowukhomba umuzi onotshwala.Lesi sixwayiso esishubile silandela ukusabalala kwenkulumo eqoshiwe ethi kunabantu ‘abangamaqabane’ abangu-11 abadutshulwe KwaXimba, KwaZulu-Natal.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe ngamampunge okuqukethwe kule nkulumo futhi bazobhekana nengalo yomthetho abagila le migilingwane.Uqhube wathi kule nkulumo eqoshiwe kuhubhuzwa amanga kuthiwa kunemoto ehamba abantu asebedubule emizini emine KwaXimba.“Amaphoyisa ayasigxeka lesi senzo futhi singakuqinisekisa ukuthi yinto engekho okukhulunywa ngayo. Sikhuza umphakathi ukuthi uhlukane nokwenza izitatimende ezingamampunge ezingase zisuse uthuthuva noma zifake abantu ingebhe,” kusho uNetshiunda.Uveze nokuthi asikho isigameko salolu hlobo noma esithinta ipolitiki esibikiwe ukuthi senzeke KwaXimba namaphethelo.Ukhuze abenza lo mkhuba wathi abawuyeke ngoba ungase uqubule udlame emphakathini kungenjalo bazobhekana nengalo yomthetho.Ukhuthaze abantu ukuba bazibike ngokushesha emaphoyiseni izigameko zodlame noma ezokusongelwa, kuhlanganisa nalezo ezithinta ipolitiki.“Amaphoyisa ami ngomumo futhi anezinhlelo zokuqapha izakhamuzi futhi agcine ukuthula kusukela manje kuze kudlule ukhetho,” kusho uNetshiunda.Kwesinye isigameko, amaphoyisa akhuze nabasabalalisa inkulomo eqoshiwe ethi kuneziboshwa ezingu-31 ezeqe elolini ebizihambisa enkantolo zisuka ejele iNew Prison.Amaphoyisa athe le nkulumo eqoshiwe indala, ikhuluma ngesigameko esenzeka ngo-2021.Ngokusatshalaliswa kwale nkulumo kabusha kuhloswe  ukufaka abantu ingebhe futhi kuphazanyiswe nomsebenzi wamaphoyisa esikhathini esimqoka kangaka,” kuchaza amaphoyisa.

BAZOSHUSHISWA abelaphi abazovuma ukubhalela noma ngubani incwadi yokuthi angayi emsebenzini.Lokhu kushiwo uNkk Gugulethu Mchunu, owusihlalo obhekelele inyakatho yeTheku enhlanganweni yabelaphi, i-Ethekwini Traditional Health Practitioners, ngesikhathi eyala abelaphi bendabuko. Lokhu kumayelana nokuthi uhulumeni ufuna babhalise emkhandlwini wezinyanga ukuze bakwazi ukukhipha izincwadi zokuqinisekisa ukuthi iziguli zabo bezigula."Njengamanje uhulumeni ufuna sibhalise. Belaphi leli akulona ithuba lokuthi abelaphi banikeze abantu izincwadi zezinyanga ezintathu kuya phezulu, okugcina kufake abasebenzi ezinkingeni. Awukwazi  ukunikeza umuntu obezihlalele ekhaya ezidlela utshwala incwadi yokuthi ubegula. “Kumele siqaphele ngoba lokho kuzokwenza ukuthi siboshwe ngoba nodokotela akakwazi ukubhalela isiguli incwadi engasibonanga. Lokhu kwenzelwa ukuthi sihleleke, saziwe ukuthi singobani nokuthi silandele imigomo ezobe ihambisana nokuthi ubhalisile,“ echaza.Uqhube wathi omunye wemigomo ohambisana nokubhalisa ngaphansi komkhandlu wokwelapha ngokwendabuko ukuthi ube nenhlangano obhalise kuyo okuyiyo eyaziyo ukuthi imithetho yokuba umelaphi uyilandele yonke yini.UNkk Mchunu ubesho lokhu esigcawini sokucobelelana ngolwazi sezinsuku ezimbili  sabelaphi bendabuko ebesihlelwe yiNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal, esiseNanda, esiqale izolo, esizophela namhlanje.Kulesi sigcawu uSolwazi Nombulelo Magula, wophiko olufundisa odokotela ngokwelashwa kwezifo, uthe ngesikhathi sobhubhane lweCovid-19, bafunde ukuthi abantu abanezifo ezingamahlalakhona yibona abagula kakhulu, abanye bashona. Ngenxa yalokho, babone ukuthi kumele umphakathi wonke usebenzisane ukuze kulawulwe izifo ezingamahlalakhona."Esikwaziyo ukuthi u-70% weziguli uqala ngokuya kumelaphi ngaphambi kokuthi uye ezikhungweni sezempilo. Ingakho kubalulekile ukuthi sisebenzisane sonke. Sifisa ukuthi abelaphi bakwazi ukuhlola izifo ezifana nomfutho wegazi, ukusebenza kwezinso nesifo sikashukela okuyizona zifo ezidlange kakhulu eThekwini, ukuze sikwazi ukulwa nazo zingakagxili kakhulu. Sigweme nokushayisana kokwelashwa kwesintu nokwasentshonalanga," kucacisa uSolwazi Magula.UMnuz Enerst Gwala ongumelaphi, uthe inkinga ekhona ukuthi imitholampilo ayibahloniphi abelaphi."Kungenzeka yini ukuthi umtholampilo udlulisele isiguli kimi noma usibuyisele kimi. Cha ngeke kwenzeke ngoba konke okwethu kungcolile. Uma singasebenzisana ngokweqiniso singakwazi ukuhambisana nesifiso senhlangano yempilo yokuthi sehlise izifo ngo-2030. Ezinye izifo ezingamahlalakhona siyakwazi ukuzelapha," kusho yena.

BAHLONGOZA ukufaka isikhalazo esisemthethweni kumaphoyisa ahlanganisa ubufakazi bokusebenza kwamaselula abameli babamangalelwa ecaleni lokubulawa kowayengunozinti we-Orlando Pirates neBafana Bafana uSenzo Meyiwa.Lokhu kuvezwe ummeli kammangalelwa wesithathu, uMthobisi Ncube, u-Advocate Charles Mnisi izolo ngesikhathi ephosa ngemibuzo ufakazi woMbuso oyisikhulu sakwaVodacom, uNksz Pinky Vythilingam.Lesi sexwayiso size ngesikhathi uMnisi ephikisana ngamazwi noNksz Vythilingam.Umsindo ususwe wubufakazi benombolo okuthiwa yayisetshenziswa uKelly Khumalo naleyo eyayisetshenziswa ummangalelwa wesihlanu, uFisokuhle Ntuli.UMnisi ubalule ukuthi ngesikhathi behlaziya ulwazi oluyamaniswa nalezi zinombolo olukwifomethi ye-Excel kuveza ukuthi lezi zinombolo zashayelana izingcingo ngaphambi kokubulawa kukaMeyiwa kanjalo nangemumva kokubulawa kwakhe.Kugcine kuvela ukuthi ulwazi uMnisi afunda kulo kulwifomethi ye-Excel ekubeni ufakazi yena ethi alulethe phambi kwenkantolo lukwifomethi ye-PDF nokwenza angakwazi ukuphendula lutho ngalolu olushiwo uMnisi ngoba akalwazi.Ukuxhumana phakathi kukaKelly noKhumalo kwaqala ukuvela ebufakazini bukaColonel Lambert Steyn, onguchwepheshe wezamaselula emaphoyiseni nyakenye. UNksz Vithilingam uthe yena kolwabo ulwazi akukho lapho okuvela khona lobu bufakazi uMnisi abushoyo. Ubuze ufakazi ukuthi uma sekukhulunywa iqiniso, ngokolwazi lwamaselula, ike yenzeke yini into efana nale.“Akuze kungenzeka ukuthi kubekhona ukusebenza kwezingcingo okungaveli kwi-system yethu,” kuphendula ufakazi.Uthe uzokusho angahlonizi ukuthi lolu lwazi alutomulile lunenhlese yokukhwabanisa ngoba alufani nolwazi olwahlanganiswa wufakazi okubeke kwacaca ukuthi ulwazi lwamaselula baluqapha ngeso lokhozi enkampanini yabo.“Noma ukukhwabanisa kwenziwa, angazi kodwa kulezi zinsuku esiphila kuzo, kungenzeka noma yini. Okwesibili, inhloso yalolu lwazi (olungaqondakali), ukukhanda icala elingekho ngommangalelwa wesihlanu, kube sengathi kwakukhona ukuxhumana phakathi kwakhe nenombolo okuthiwa eKelly Khumalo,” kusho uMnisi.Uqhube wathi lokhu kuwumzamo nje woMbuso ukuthi uKelly Khumalo waba nokuxhumana nommangalelwa.“Okokugcina, siyalelwe (abamangalelwa) ukuthi sifake isikhalazo esisemthethweni ngalabo abahlanganisa lolu lwazi,” kusho uMnisi.Uthe leso sikhalazo sizobe simayelana nokukhwabanisa nokuzama ukunqinda amandla ingalo yomthetho ngoba lolu lwazi ludukisa inkantolo.Icala liyaqhubeka namuhla.

UMBALA  kapende womuzi wakho wangaphandle, owangaphakathi nefenisha ephakathi kumele kuhambisane nezidingo zakho, awumane ufake noma ikuphi.Lokhu kushiwo uNkk Thandeka Malinga weDefyn Dezign,  ongomunye wezikhulumi ezizobe zicobelela izihambeli zomcimbi wabesifazane ohlelwe Isolezwe, iNtandokazi Womens Club ozoba ngo-Okthoba. Uzocobelela ngamasu okuhlobisa umuzi wakho. Lo mcimbi uzobe useCoastlands Hotel, eMusgrave.UNkk Malinga ohlobisa amakhaya, ahlomise abanikazi bemizi ngolwazi lokuthi bakhe imizi ehambisana nezidingo zabo, ongumakhi wezindlu nefenisha, uthe yize kukuhle ukuthi ikhaya lomuntu libe nemibala ayithandayo kodwa imibala kumele ibe nomsebenzi odingwa ngumnikazi wekhaya njengokuthi kube imibala enikeza intokomalo, eyehlisa umoya eyenza umuntu ajabule nokunye." Udokotela uma esemsebenzini uhlala ebhekene neziguli ezigulayo, ikhaya lakhe kumele libe nemibala emhlophe ezokwenza ukuthi kwehle umoya. Ifenisha ephakathi nayo  kumele ihambisane nokuthi indlu yakho yakheke kanjani,"  kusho yena.Uthe ukuba nekhaya elingahambisani nezidingo zakho kukwenza ukuthi esikhundleni sokuthi ubuye emsebenzini uzophumula ekhaya,  uhambe uye ehhotela ngoba linezinto ezenza kwehle umoya nokhwantalala lwasemsebenzini." Umbala kapende kumele ube yimpendulo yokudingwa umphefumulo womuntu. Kunemibala engahambisani okungamele uyihlanganise noma ngabe uyithanda kangakanani. Uma ungeke ukwazi ukungayifaki zama ukungayifaki kakhulu. Igumbi lokudlala izingane ngeke ulifake imibala engaphaphile ngoba inhloso yakho ukuthi zithi uma zingena zibe nento yokuthi kumele zihlale ngoba kuhle,  kuyakhanga,"  kusho yena.Uqhube wathi awukho umuzi ongeke uhlobiseke, nemizi emincane enamagumbi amane iyahlobiseka. "Udinga ukushintsha izinto ezimbalwa kuwo uphenduke ube yinto oyithandayo,"  kusho uNkk Malinga.Uthe enye into ebalulekile ukuthi amakamelo ahambisane nezidingo zomuntu uma esengaphakathi njengokuthi ungahambi ibanga elide usuka ekhishini uya e-dining room, ungahambi ibanga elide usuka ekamelweni lokuphumula eya ethoyilethi. Amathikithi okuya kulo mcimbi angu-R500 atholakala eTicket Pro.

UMENGAMELI wezwe, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa uqinise idolo imindeni yabantu abangu-18 ababulawe eNgobozana, eLusikisiki wathi amaphoyisa azobathola ababulali.Uphawule kanje izolo emuva kokuthi amaphoyisa ase-Eastern Cape ethe alandela umkhondo  futhi anethemba lokuthi azobabopha maduze abasolwa.URamaphosa uzwakalise ukudabuka kwakhe, wadlulisa amazwi enduduzo emindenini eshonelwe wase ebafisela ukululama okusheshayo abagilwa abasindile.Kulokhu kuhlasela kwangempelasonto, ezigamekweni ezimbili, kushone abantu besifazane abangu-15. Usana olunezinyanga ezimbili lusindile lwatholwa lulele phezu kukanina obesebanda.Kuthiwa lugcinwe osonhlalakahle endaweni ephephile. Izolo izihlobo zabagilwa eziqhamuka ezindaweni ezikude zihlanze indawo yesigameko ebigcwele igazi.“Ngeke sivumele ukuthi kugcine izigebengu. Sibuzwa sonke ubuhlungu obulethwe yilesi sehlo esinonya futhi sihlangene ekusibabazeni nasekugxekeni abenzi baso abazosijezela,” kusho umengameli.Umphakathi wakule ndawo uthe usuhlalele ovalweni ngoba seziphenduke insakavukela izigameko zokubulawa kwabantu kule ndawo kodwa okwakamuva kwenze kwabanda amathumbu.URamaphosa ubaqinise idolo wathi amaphoyisa ayasebenza futhi ayakwazi ukusombulula ngisho amacala obugebengu obuhleliwe futhi unethemba lokuthi azosithola isisombululo ngesigameko saseLusikisiki.Ube esenxenxa amalungu omphakathi wathi kumele akhululeke, aludlulisele kubaphenyi ulwazi analo olungalekelela ekutheni kuboshwe abahlaseli ukuze abe nobufakazi obuqanda icala enkantolo.Kulandwe nochwepheshe babaphenyi nabacubungula indawo yesigameko abavela kuzwelonke nasesifundazweni i-Eastern Cape ukuba baphenye.Ihhovisi likamengameli lithi ngaphandle kwesigameko sakamuva, bangu-38 abantu ababulawe ezehlakalweni ezifuze esaseLusikisiki esikhathini esiyiminyaka emibili, kwaboshwa abasolwa abangu-25.

KUZOSHUBA kwabangena ngenkani ezindlini zomxhaso ezisuke zakhiwe wuhulumeni njengoba uNgqongqoshe wezokuHlaliswa kwaBantu kuzwelonke, uNksz Mmamoloko Kubayi, ethi bazothathelwa izinyathelo zomthetho abadla izindlu zomxhaso.“Sithatha izinyathelo ezinqala kulabo abaphula umthetho ngokuthi bangene ezindlini ezisuke zakhelwe abanye abantu. Sithole ukuthi abanikazi bezindlu ezakhiwe wuhulumeni bahlala kabuhlungu noma izindlu zabo seziqediwe. Siyacela abadla izindlu ukuthi basiphumele kuzona ngoba sizosebenzisa umthetho ukuqondisa isimo,” kusho uNksz Kubayi.Uthe bazosiqinisa isandla nakosonkontileka abangaziqedi ngesikhathi izindlu zomxhaso ngoba behlose ukudla imali kahulumeni.“Uhulumeni uselahlekelwe yizigidi ngenxa yosonkontileka abangawuqedi ngesikhathi umsebenzi. Sisuke sihlele ukusebenzisa izigidi ezithile ukwakhela abantu izindlu. Uma umsebenzi usudlula leyo mali esisuke siyibekile kusidalela izinkinga ngoba abantu basuke bezilindile izindlu. Siyabacela osonkontileka ukuba baqede umsebenzi ngesikhathi esibekiwe nalabo abasuke besebenza ngaphansi kwabo njengosonkontileka abancane, sicela benze umsebenzi. Kufanele nginikeze abantu bakithi izindlu eziphelile,” kusho uNksz Kubayi.Uchaze osonkontileka abangawuqedi umsebenzi njengabantu abaphazamisa izinhlelo zikahulumeni zokunika abantu izindlu.Uthe abangawuqedi umsebenzi bazothathelwa izinyathelo, ngeke balokhu benikwa imali yokuthi baqedele ngoba leyo mali ngeyabakhokhi bentela abasuke befuna ukusiza uhulumeni ekuthuthukiseni izwe.Ugqugquzele abantu ukuba babheke izinhlelo zoMnyango wezokuHlaliswa kwaBantu zokuhlinzeka wonke umuntu ngezindlu njengoba uhulumeni ungagcini ngokukhipha izindlu zomxhaso kodwa kukhona uhlelo olokuxhasa abafuna ukuthenga umhlaba wokwakha.Uthe kukhona nohlelo lwabahola kancane abasizwa ukuthi bathole amabhondi nezinye eziqinisekisa ukuthi bonke abantu bakuleli bathola izindlu ezibuyisa isithunzi sabo.

UNDUNANKULU kaZulu, uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi, uthi bazibizela amabhadi labo abaqhubeka nokuphikisa ukuqokwa kweSilo uMisuzulu kaZwelithini.UButhelezi uxwayise ngokuthi bazokwehlelwa okubi labo abamelene neSilo.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma nabebezokweseka iSilo ecaleni elifakwe nguMntwana uMbonisi kaBhekuzulu  nabanye, abafuna ukuthi uhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal nesikhwama Ingonyama Trust, bengabe besazikhokhela izindleko zabameli beSilo.Icala belilalelwe eNkantolo eNkulu eMgungundlovu, ngoLwesine.Abanye abaNtwana abafake icala uVulindlela, Mathuba, Lindiwe, Zweliyazula, Bukhosikabupheli, noBhekinkosi.UButhelezi uthe abanikazi besihlalo sobukhosi bukaZulu abathandi ukuthi kube nabantu abanyakazisa iSilo.“Labo abaxhakazisela iSilo imikhonto, leyomkhonto izophenduka ibheke ngakubona. Labo abafisela iSilo okubi, bazidonsela amanzi ngomsele. Kuthiwa kwembulwa kwembeswa komunye walabo abafake icala, akakwazi nokusayina amaphepha asenkantolo.”UButhelezi uthe bazoqhubeka nokweseka iSilo.“Njengoba sasho ukuthi ilanga seliphumile, akekho oyolicisha lelo langa. Ocabanga ukuthi engafika eNgonyameni, kofanele adlule lapha kithi. Unyaka wesithathu lona iSilo sifakwa ezinkantolo. Nokungenadosi kuyatinyela. Uze uzibuze ukuthi engabe iphumaphi imali?”UButhelezi uthe kusobala ukuthi inhloso kaMntwana uMbonisi nabanye ukuthi iSilo siye enkantolo singenabo abameli, bese siyehlulwa.Ngaphakathi enkantolo ummeli kaMntwana uMbonisi, u-Advocate Thabani Masuku, uthe awukho umthetho ogunyaza uNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube, ukuba akhokhele abameli beSilo.IHhovisi likaNkk Dube-Ncube libeke eceleni uR30 million ozokhokhela abameli beSilo.“Bahlulekile ukusikhombisa noma isigaba esisodwa somthetho esibanika igunya lokuthi bakhokhele abameli beSilo. Kungani bekhokhela abameli bohlangothi olulodwa? ISilo esabuza sinamanye amazinyane aphakanyiselwe ukuba athathe isihlalo sobukhosi. Kungani bona bengaxhaswa ngemali yabameli?”UMasuku uthe Ingonyama Trust ayinalo igunya lokukhokhela abameli beSilo. UMasuku ukhale nangokuthi ibhodi leNgonyama Trust elikhona alikho emthethweni.Amaphepha amaningi abefakwa nguMntwana uMbonisi agcine ekhishiwe.Phakathi kwezinto ezikhishwe ukuthi iSilo siphucwe imihlomulo esiyithola kuhulumeni, igunya lokuqoka undunankulu kaZulu nebhodi leNgonyama Trust.UMasuku uthe bayakwamukela ukuthi okwamanje iSilo uMisuzulu yisona esihlezi esihlalweni.Uthe uma belinqoba icala lapho bephonsela khona inselelo ukuqokwa isinqumo sikaMengameli uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa, sokuvuma ukuqokwa kweSilo, uMntwana uMbonisi nabanye abaNtwana abadala ibona abazobheka ozongena esihlalweni.

KUKHULEKELWE abasebenzi bakaMasipala uMhlathuze kulandela isigameko esishaqisayo sokubulalana konogada ngaphakathi emahhovisi kamasipala ngesonto eledlule. Abefundisi, abasebenzi, izikhulu zikamasipala nezinhlaka ezehlukene bahlangane eRichards Bay Civic Center kwaba nenkonzo yokukhulekela izimo ezehlukene. Lokhu kulandela ukuthi ngoLwesine olwedlule ekuseni kwafa uMnuz Ntokozo Mthembu obeqapha imeya (uMnuz Xolani Ngwezi) okuthiwa wadutshulwa uzakwabo emuva kokuthi evulele ngenhlambu kuMnuz Simo Zulu oqapha imenenja kamasipala.Okhulumela umasipala uMnuz Bongani Gina, uthe ngomkhuleko kuhloswe  ukuletha ukuthula kumasipala, ukuthoba amanxeba kubasebenzi ababona okwenzeka kanjalo nemindeni elahlekelwe abathandiweyo bayo. "Sibize ongoti abeluleka ngokwengqondo ukuzokweluleka abathikanyezwe yilesi sigameko. Nabasebenzi sibathumelele umbiko wokuthi bangesabi baphumele obala uma benengcindezi. Umasipala uzimisele ngokuthi baxhumane nabaphathi uma bedinga ukuba sekhaya. Kukhona nabathuswa ukubona ama-video nokungabathikamiza, sifisa bavele bathole usizo," kusho uGina.Amaphoyisa esifundazweni KwaZulu-Natal ebuzwa ngalesi sigameko athe asematasa nophenyo. Selokhu senzeka abantu bazwakalisa ukushaqeka ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Babodwa abanovalo lokuya emahhovisi njengoba umasipala usiza umphakathi ngezinsiza ezehlukene. UGina uthe amalungu omphakathi ayekhona kwenzeka isigameko bacela avele azokwelulekwa ngokwengqondo.

IZELAMANI zakwaNdimande ezithinteka ekubulaweni komrepha, uKiernan ‘AKA’ Forbes, nomngani wakhe, uTebello ‘Tibz’ Motsoane, kulindeleke ukuba zibuyiselwe eNingizimu Afrika kungekudala.Lokhu kwenzeke emuva kokwenqaba amahlandla amaningi kwalezi zelamani, oMnuz Malusi noSiyabonga, ukubuyiselwa kuleli, besuswa eSwatini. INkantolo yeMantshi yaKwaManzini, eSwatini, ngoLwesihlanu isamukele isicelo sokubuyisela laba basolwa kuleli. Okwamanje akukacaci ukuthi bazobuya nini.USiyabonga noMalusi bazojoyina oMnuz Thabani Mkhwanazi, uLindani Ndimande, uSiyanda Myeza, uMziwethemba Gwabeni noLindokuhle Ndimande uma sebebuyela eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini. Laba basolwa bayathinteka nasekubulaweni kukaMntimande Kunene, uNhlanhla Ngcobo noZamokuhle Mkhwanazi, okuyizigameko ezenzeka eManzimtoti naseBerea, eThekwini.Khonamanjalo, laba abanye  abasolwa basagqunywe esitokisini saseNingizimu Afrika emuva kokunqatshelwa ibheyili.U-AKA noTibz badutshulwa babulawa bephuma eWish Restaurant kuFlorida Road, eThekwini.

KUZOSHUBA kwabahlomule ngokungafanele ngesibonelelo sika-R370 sabangasebenzi njengoba uhulumeni ephasise umthetho wokuthi basikhokhe abasithole kungafanele.Lo mthetho uvumela uNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi, uNkk Lindiwe Zulu, ukuba alande uR370 otholwe abakade bengafanele ukuwuthola.Uzoqala ukusebenza kule nyanga njengoba uNkk Zulu efuna ukuqinisekisa ukuthi uR370 okhuphuke kule nyanga, usuka kuR350, utholwa ngabantu abawudinga ngempela.“ISouth African Social Security Agency (Sassa) ifuna ukuqinisekisa ukuthi isibonelelo sabangasebenzi esiwele kumuntu ongafanele siyabuyiswa. Ngokwesigaba esibizwa ngo-sub regulation 2, iSassa igqugquzela abantu ukuba baqinisekise ukuthi imininingwane yabo yileyo efanele. Uma umuntu ofake isicelo engatholakali, engawuthinti uSassa noma engavuseleli imininingwane yakhe ngeke simkhokhele isibonelelo,” kuchaza uNkk Zulu.Uveze ukuthi abantu abangayithinti iSassa ezinsukwini eziwu-90 emuva kokuthi becelwe ukuba bathinte le nhlangano ngeke basithole isibonelelo sabangasebenzi.Isibonelelo sabo sizobuyela kuhulumeni njengoba iSassa ifuna yonke imali iye kubantu abaziwayo ukuthi bakhona futhi abasebenzi.Uthe kufanele abantu baqinisekise ukuthi iSassa inemininingwane yabo efanelekile okuhlanganisa nenamba yocingo abatholakala kuyona, kanjalo nemininingwane yasebhange efanelekile.Ngokwezibalo zikahulumeni bangaphezu kuka-8 million abantu abahola isibonelelo sabangasebenzi kuleli.

AMAQEMBU aphikisayo akhala ngokuthi ukunyuswa kwemali kagesi namanzi wuMasipala waseThekwini kuzoshaya kuzwele kulabo abakhokhela lezi zidingo.Amaqembu aphikisayo athe ukunyuswa kakhulu kwale mali kuzokwenza ukuthi babe baningi abantu abazohluleka ukukhokhela lezi zidingo zomkhandlu.Lokhu bakusho emva kokwethulwa kwesabelomali somkhandlu, esithulwe iMeya uMxolisi Kaunda, ngoLwesihlanu.Ugesi uzonyuka ngo-12.7%, amanzi wona azokwenyuka ngo-12.9%.UKaunda uthe ngokomthetho kwakukade kuhlongozwe ukuthi ugesi unyuke ngo-14%, amanzi wona kwakuhlongozwe ukuthi anyuke ngo-14.9%.“Njengohulumeni olalelayo, sinqume ukunciphisa imali kagesi namanzi emva kokuthola izikhalazo zomphakathi. Imali okuzonyuka ngayo ugesi isiyefana nalena i-Eskom eyikhuphule ngayo. Imali esinyusa ngayo amanzi yona siyinciphise ngo-2%.”Amaqembu aphikisayo athe inkulu kakhulu le mali okukhushulwe ngayo.Ikhansela leDA, uMnuz Thabani Mthethwa, uthe bekufanele inganyuswa imali yokukhokhelwa kwezidingo.“Into eyinkinga kakhulu ukuthi umasipala uyehluleka ukuhambisa izidingo. Wonke umuntu ohlala eThekwini uyazi ukuthi umasipala uyehluleka ukuhambisa izidingo. Akuwenzi umqondo ukuthi thina sihlale lana sikhulume indaba yokukhuphula imali yezidingo ekubeni umasipala wehluleka ukuhambisa izidingo.”Ikhansela le-ActionSA, uMnuz Zwakele Mncwango, uthe kubukeka sengathi umasipala ujezisa kakhulu labo abakhokhela izidingo.“Abantu abakhokhela izidingo ibona abazoshayeka kakhulu. Lemali okuzonyuswa ngayo imali yezidingo inkulu kakhulu. Lento izokwenza ukuthi kuvalwe amabhizinisi, nokuzokwenza ukuthi abantu abaningi balahlekelwe imisebenzi.
