Okuyolandela lapho ukuthi abantu abaningi bangabi nayo imali yokukhokhela izidingo.”Amakhansela e-ANC, EFF namanye amaqembu amancane avota ne-ANC, akuvikele ukunyuswa kwemali yezidingo.La makhansela athe umasipala kufanele uqoqe imali ukuze uzokwazi ukuqhubeka nokuhambisa izidingo.Isabelomali somkhandlu singu-R67 billion.Imali eningi yabelwe ukulungisa ingqalasizinda yamanzi nekagesi.Imali ebekelwe ukulungisa ingqalasizinda kagesi uR21.5 billion, eyamanzi yona uR11.6 billion.UKaunda uthe lesabelomali sibhekelele kakhulu abahlwempu.“Njengoba kuphela iminyaka engu-30 sathola inkululeko, sifuna ukushintsha izimpilo zabantu. Omasipala ibona abahambisa izidingo eziningi kubantu.”

KUSAZOBA nzima kubathandi bakashokoledi njengoba intengo yawo ilokhu ikhuphuke njalo kusukela ekuqaleni konyaka.Ongoti bezomnotho bathi kulindeleke ukuthi ushokoledi ulokhu ukhuphuka ngenxa yokuthi amazwe akhiqiza u-cocoa ase-Afrika awakwazanga ukukhiqiza u-cocoa oyisibalo esijwayelekile ngenxa yokushintshashintsha kwesimo sezulu.Ngokolwazi olubhalwe kweminye imithombo yezindaba, ushokoledi ongu-80g, ngoFebhruwari ububiza uR22.48  manje usukhuphuke ngo-4.3%. Ngenyanga ezayo kulindeleke ukuthi uphinde wenyuke ngo-17%  okuzokwenza ukuthi ushokoledi omncane, i-chocolate bar ibize uR14 kuya phezulu.Ngokolwazi olukhona, kube nomoya omkhulu eWest Afrika odale umonakalo emasimini ka-cocoa okuholele ukuthi u-cocoa ozovunwa ube ngomncane kakhulu oseke wavunwa eminyakeni engu-14 eyedlule.Ngenxa yalokhu, inkampani enkulukazi yaseNingizimu Afrika ekhiqiza ushokoledi, iMondelēz South Africa, engabakhiqizi bakashokoledi iCadbury,  ithe ihlela ukusebenzisa ukwenyuswa kwamanani ukuze ibhekane nokushoda kuka-cocoa ongase kube nomthelela omubi enzunzweni engeniswa ile nkampani.Isikhulu esiphezulu enkampanini ekhiqiza ushokoledi, iHershey-EO uMichele Buck, uthe: "Uma kubhekwa amanani ka-cocoa sizosebenzisa wonke amathuluzi ebhokisini lethu lamathuluzi, okuhlanganisa namanani, ukuze singalahlekelwa".Abakhiqizi be-Lindt & Sprungli bathe bazama ukubhekana nezindleko ezikhuphukayo zika-cocoa ngesu lokuthenga ngendlela ezobavumela ukuthi babe no-cocoa omningi kunojwayelekile."Izindleko ezisele zidluliselwe ngokunyuka kwentengo, nentengo ephezulu ka-cocoa kuyisizathu esikhulu salokho," kusho okhulumela lo Mnyango.Lokhu kwenyuka kuka-cocoa kuthinta ababhaki bamakhekhe nezinye izidlo ezenziwa ngo-cocoa.

AMAPHOYISA abesezithendeni zabasolwa abayisithupha abathelwe phansi ngenhlamvu ngoLwesine ezigamekweni ezimbili ezehlukene, eThekwini.Esigamekweni sokuqala amaphoyisa adubule abulala abane emqashweni ebebehlala kuwo oThweba, eCamperdown.Kwesesibili, kuthiwa adubule abulala abangani ebebehlangene ngobugebengu ehostela eKlaarwater.Esigamekweni saseKlaarwater, umthombo ocele ukungadalulwa, uthe ujabule umphakathi ngokubulawa kwabafi.“Ababulewe abangani bezibongo ezimbili ezehlukene. Bese kuneminyaka behlukumeza umphakathi, bengenziwa lutho ngoba bayasatshwa. Kuthe uma kuzwakala izindaba zokudutshulwa kwabo, kwajabula wonke umuntu,” kusho umthombo.Uqhube wathi nokho umphakathi usakhathazekile ngomunye olamana noyedwa wababulewe ngoba yena usindile.“Sisola ukuthi ubengekho ngesikhathi kugasela amaphoyisa, kwabulawa laba abafile, wasinda kanjalo. Sikhathazekile ngoba uye obengubhongoza eqenjini ebelihlukumeza umphakathi ngobugebengu,” kusho umthombo.Uthe oyedwa wabafi ungowokudabuka eGumbatana eHighflats, kanti wafika nomfowabo (osindile) bezohlala noyise owayenesipaza ehostela.“Uyise wadutshulwa wabulawa eminyakeni edlule, zaqala lapho ke ukuba yizigebengu lezi zingane,” kusho umthombo.Ikhansela lendawo, uMnuz Sibusiso Khwela likuqinisekisile lokhu lathi phakathi kobugebengu obebenziwa abafi, ukubamba inkunzi, ukudayisa izidakamizwa nokubulala.“Bebenza yonke inhlobo yobugebengu obuyingozi,” kusho uKhwela.Uqhube wathi bayintsha, ekhule ihlala kuleli hostela, bebefunda esikoleni iPhakathi Secondary.“Bagcina bexoshwa kulesi sikole ngoba babengalawuleki, bengaziphathisi okwezingane, bedayisa nezidakamizwa,” kusho uKhwela.Esigamekweni saseCamperdown, induna yesigodi, uMnuz Amos Shange, ithe bakhathazekile ngokwanda kobugebengu obudalwa ukwanda kwamakotishi endaweni.“Sinenkinga yokuthi kufika abantu bacele ukubekwa endaweni, uma sebebekiwe, bakhe amakotishi, baqashise ngawo,” kusho uShange.Uthe nakuba bekhona abantu abawasebenzisela ukusondezela umsebenzi amakotishi kodwa bayawuzwa umoya wokuthi amanye afuye izigebengu ezisuke zifuna izindawo zokucasha.UKhomishana wamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLieutenant General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi ekhuluma nabe-eNCA, uthe bese kuphele izinyanga befuna abasolwa ababulawe eCamperdown.Uthe baqale ngasekupheleni konyaka odlule ukubalandela, kanti bebefunelwa ukubamba inkunzi izimoto zemali eKing Cetshwayo naseHarry Gwala.“Bayiqembu elilodwa. Lisebenza nabanye abakwesinye isifundazwe esingumakhelwane. Babamba inkunzi kulezi zifunda ezimbili bese behamba beqasha amakotishi okucasha,” kusho uMkhwanazi.Uqhube wathi babheka izindawo lapho abangeke belokhu befunwa imininingwane eminingi uma bezoqasha indawo yokuhlala isikhashana.“Ngisho nomasitende wale ndawo ababulawe kuyo, akabazisisi kahle,” kusho uMkhwanazi.Esigamekweni saseKlaarwater kuthiwa abasolwa bebelandelwa amaphoyisa ophiko lweNIU. Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uBrigadier Jay Naicker, uthe ezigamekweni ezimbili ezehlukene amaphoyisa athole izibhamu ezinhlanu ezingekho emthethweni.Uthe esigamekweni esenzeke eCamperdown, amaphoyisa adubule abulala abane, athola izibhamu ezintathu kubo.Wathi esigamekweni saseKlaarwater, zimbili izibhamu ezitholwe kubasolwa ababili abadutshulwe amaphoyisa.Uthe kuzo zombili izigameko, abasolwa abadubule kuqala bebhekise emaphoyiseni, abuyisela ngayo inhlamvu, basala enkundleni.

ISONGWE ngegiya eliphezulu imikhankaso yamaqembu ezepolitiki, emicimbini ebithe chithi saka nezwe, abaholi benxenxa amavoti okokugcina kubantu bakuleli, ngempelasonto.Kule mikhankaso ebigqame ngeziqubulo ezehlukene, bekuyinkombankombane kwabamaqembu begxeka, bethembisa baphinde baveze okuhle abangakwenzela izwe uma abantu bebanika ithuba.I-ANC, isonge ngomkhankaso wayo iSiyanqoba Rally, lapho izinkumbi zabalandeli bayo zigcwalise phama inkundla i-FNB, eGauteng emumatha abantu abevile ku-90 000.Ekhuluma nabebegcwalise inkundla, uMengameli we-ANC uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa uxwayise abantu ngokuthi bangavoteli amaqembu ahlose ukubuyisela emuva igxathu asebelihambile ukuthuthukisa izwe.“Kusemandleni enu ngokusebenzisa ivoti ukuchitha amaqembu ezepolitiki asebenza ngokuzimisela ukubuyisela emuva lokhu esesikuzuzile njengezwe. Siyaninxusa ukuthi nikhethe i-ANC okuwukuphela kwenhlangano ethembekile ekuqhubekeni neyakuqala ukuguqula isimo saleli zwe. Njengoba saqinisekisa ukuqeda ukuLawulwa koMbuso yiDlanzana, namanje sizoma ndawonye ukuqeda lonke uhlobo lwenkohlakalo,” usho kanje.Uthembise ukukhushulwa kwamandla omnotho okuzoholela ekunyusweni kwemali yesibonelelo sabangasebenzi ibengu- R700.Kube bomvu  inkundla yezemidlalo iPeter Mokaba, esifundazweni i-Limpopo, abalandeli be-EFF behambele umkhankaso wokugcina abawubiza nge-Tshela Thupa Rally.Umholi waleli qembu uMnuz Julius Malema ekhuluma kulo mcimbi, uthe u-Ephreli, 27, 1994 kwakumele ngabe unyaka wokuqeda ubandlululo, kodwa kuze kube manje lokhu akukenzeki.“Umehluko ukuthi ubandlululo lwanamhlanje akuselona lolu lokuthi uze ubone izimpawu eziveza ukuthi abantu abathile abavunyelwe la, kodwa ngolwezezimali. Uma ufuna ukuthenga imoto noma umuzi, utshelwa ukuthi isicelo sakho asiphumelelanga, uma ufuna ukuqala ibhizinisi noma ukuya enyuvesi ukuqhuba izifundo zakho, kuthiwa isicelo sakho asiphumeleli ngenxa yokuthi awusebenzi, uyahlupheka.  Namhlanje kuthiwa sikhululekile, sikhululeke kanjani uma izinga lentsha engasebenzi levile ku-40% ?,” kusho uMalema.UMalema ubegxekwa ngabaningi ngephuzu yokuvulwa kwemingcele kuleli. Ushaye ungqimphothwe, wathi imingcele ngeke ivulwe ngokushesha futhi akekho umuntu ongenawo amaphepha okuba kuleli oyovunyelwa ukungena.Abalandeli beDemocratic Alliance bagcwalise inkunda i-Willowmoore, eBenoni eGauteng emkhankasweni wayo wokugcina i-We can rescue SA.Ethula inkulumo yakhe umholi waleli qembu uMnuz John Steenhuisen, ugxeke uhlelo lwezempilo olusanda kusayinwa uRamaphosa i-National Health Insurance.“Njenge-DA, besinani izolo, sinani namhlanje sizobanani ngangemva kokhetho. Asizami ukulungisa ngoba kusondele ukhetho sisayine izinto ngoba sinxenxa ivoti.  Lolu hlelo aluzile ukuzokwenza ngcono ezempilo kuleli  kodwa ukuzothatha amandla ezinkampani ezibhekele ezempilo.  Uma ufuna ukubona indlela izibhedlela ezisebenza ngezinga eliphezulu ngayo, bheka esifundazweni i-Western lapho kuphethe lona leli qembu. Ngakho sinxusa usivotele,” usho kanje.Kube yimpelasonto ematasa eqenjini elisanda kusungulwa i-MK njengoba isonge imikhankaso yalo iMayibuye Rally ezifundazweni ezimbili,  KwaZulu-Natal eHammarsdale ngoMgqibelo nasesifundazweni iMpumalanga izolo.Nakuba umholi waleli qembu uJacob Zuma engafikanga kweyangoMgqibelo abelindelwe kuyo ngabomvu, uthushuke e-Sol Plaatjie University eNothern Cape lapho ebehlangene khona nezitshudeni namalungu omphakathi wama-Khoisan ngaphambi kokuthi adlulele eMpumalanga ukunxenxa ivoti.I-IFP isonge umkhankaso wayo i-Sizonqoba, igcwalisa inkundla yezemidlalo iMhlathuze Sports Complex, eRichard’s Bay.Umholi waleli qembu uMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa ekhuluma nabalandeli abebethamele uthe sebekulungele ukuletha uguquko kulesi sifundazwe nokuba yingxenye kahulumeni wesifundazwe i-Gauteng nokuphathwa kukahulumeni kazwelonke. “Abantu baseNingizimu Afrika bazothola uhulumeni ozodala amathuba emisebenzi, ozoqeda ubugebengu nenkohlakalo, abantu besifazane bahlale ngokuphephaAmanye amaqembu abematasa kule mpelasonto, yi-ActionSA umholi wayo uMnuz Herman Mashaba ohole imashi yeqembu eTembisa eGauteng lapho ebenxenxa khona amavoti, i-Rise Mzansi ibiseDaveyton eGauteng, iBuild One South Africa eholwa uMnuz Musi Maimane isonge umkhankaso wayo i-Zijikilizinto, e-Ellis Park Arena, eGoli.

KUHLWE emini kubanjwa abasolwa abayisithupha bephethe izinhlokohlela zezibhamu ngeSonto emini kuM1 eSandton.Amaphoyisa alunywe indlebe ngemigulukudu ehlela ukuyogebenga ndawana thize edolobheni eGoli behamba ngemoto yenkampani yokudiliva neveni iToyota emhlophe.Nebala amaphoyisa avimbezele laba besasendleleni.“Uphiko lweFlying Squad belulokhu luqaphe lezi zimoto zihamba kuN1 zibheke eningizimu. Amaphoyisa nawo alandele izimoto aze azivimbezela kuM1 eSandton lapho kuvele khona ithuba lokuthi zivinjwe,” kusho uLieutenant Colonel Mavela Masondo okhulumela amaphoyisa eGauteng.Ngemuva kokuvinjwa kwezimoto, zibe seziseshwa kwatholakala ama-rifle amabili, ama-pistol amathathu nezinhlamvu.Izibhamu zizohlolwa ukuze kubonakale ukuthi azikaze zesebenze yini kobunye ubugebengu.Umkhuzi wamaphoyisa eGauteng, uLieutenant General Tommy Mthombeni, uncome uphiko lweJohannesburg Flying Squad ngokusebenza ngokuzikhandla ukuvimbezela abasolwa nokuhlenga impilo yabantu ebingaba sengcupheni ukuba luqhubekile uhlelo lwabo.

UBESEHLALA ekubhaceni owesifazane waseMariannhill eDesai,  othi kudlwengulwe indodakazi yakhe, yena evalelwe ekamelweni okukholakala ukuthi kwenziwe ngabanye abasolwa abayisishiyagalolunye abaqothwe amaphoyisa entathakusa ngoLwesithathu.Owesifazane ekhuluma nabezindaba, uthe ukudlwengulwa kwendodakazi yakhe ena-24 ngoJanuwari nonyaka, kushiye yena nomgilwa nezibazi ezisekude ukuphola.“Sasizihlalele ekhaya ngabo-12 ebusuku ngesikhathi abasolwa abayisithupha ababezifihlile bekhahlela umnyango osekhishini. Bangena bathatha amafoni, amateku ne-TV. Indlu inamakamelo amabili okulala, bangiphushela ekamelweni ngadonsa indodakazi yami encane ena-16 bathi angilale embhedini ngimboze ngengubo nendodakazi yami, omunye umsolwa wasala wadlwengula lena endala eyidlwengulela kwelinye ikamelo,” kubalisa yenaUthe kusuka lapho washiya ikhaya kanti ngesikhathi abezindaba befika kwakhe ubefaka izimpahla esebuyela emzini wakhe, emva kokuthi ezwe ezindabeni ngesigameko sokudutshulwa kwabasolwa. Uthe unethemba elikhulu emaphoyiseni akuleli. Uthe bese ehlala  ethukile selokhu kwenzeka lesi sigameko ikakhulu uma kuphela inyanga ngoba unemiqasho futhi abasolwa babesho ukuthi bafuna imali.Uthe ubugebengu obebuqhutshwa abasolwa bebumlimaza ngisho ebhizinisini lakhe lokuqashisa aziphilisa ngalo njengoba kunezindlu ezingenamuntu, abantu besaba ukuqasha kule ndawo ngenxa yobugebengu.Amalungu omphakathi athi okushaqisayo ukuthi abanye balaba abebehlukumeza yizingane ezaziwayo ezikhulele phambi kwabo. Elinye ilungu lomphakathi elithe linesitolo esincane esidayisa ukudla, lithe bese lisivale izinsuku ezintathu emva kokusongelwa abasolwa abebethi bafuna akhokhe imali ethile ngalo kungenjalo bazolenzakalisa. UMnuz Dawood Chirwari osekomitini elibhekele ubugebengu emphakathini, ekhuluma nabezindaba, uthe namanje usanezibazi njengoba kwadutshulwa kwabulawa indodana yakhe eyahlaselwa ikubo ngo-2020, nodadewabo oshone emva kokudutshulwa  ehamba emgwaqweni kuyo le ndawo, asola ukuthi lezi zigameko zenziwa yibona abasolwa.“Umphakathi walapha ubusuhlukumezeke kakhulu. Uma uzobheka imizi eminingi ayinamuntu nakuba ngingasho ukuthi bakhishwa ngenkani kodwa akekho umuntu ongahlala endaweni abonayo ukuthi akuphephile kuyo,” usho kanje.Uthe abantu kufanele bajabule ngoba sebezokwazi ukuhamba ngokukhululeka.

UMNDENI wowesifazane wasePhoenix, eThekwini, oshayiswe yimoto yamphoyisa yophiko oluqapha eNdlunkulu, uthe ubufuna ajeze umsolwa ngokubulala isihlobo sabo.Ukusho lokhu emva kokuvela kwezindaba zokuthi umsolwa (48) uzingqokloze ngenhlamvu yesibhamu somsebenzi eMhlanga, izolo ekuseni.UNksz Phumla “Thini” Mtshali (28) kuthiwa ushayiswe yimoto yamaphoyisa ebihamba umufi ezintatha zangoLwesihlanu, ehamba ngezinyawo nesoka lakhe emgwaqweni uPhoenix Highway.Udadewabo, uNksz Phili Mtshali, uthe ukube waboshwa ngokushesha umsolwa, ngabe akazibulalanga kodwa ubezohamba inkantolo, bathole ubulungiswa bewumndeni.Uqhube wathi njengoba ebethintwa yiSolezwe  ngokuzibulala kukamsolwa, bekungakapheli sikhathi esingakanani bebikelwe ngakho.“Asikholwa nhlobo ukuthi uzibulele ngempela. Miningi imibuzo esinayo ngokuzibulala kwakhe. Sifisa sengathi singakhonjiswa ngisho nobufakazi bokuthi uzibulele, nokuthi uye ngempela lo obulele udadewethu,” kusho uNksz Mtshali.Uthe bafisa nokucaciselwa ngokuthi ungubani wakwabani, bachazelwe nje kabanzi ngaye ngoba kusukela kwenzeke isigameko, kuningi obekushayisana ngalolu daba.Emva kokwenzeka kwesigameko, kuthiwa umsolwa, akazange ame, kunalokho ushaye wachitha, eshiya i-number plate yemoto  endaweni yesigameko.Kuthiwa uthumele omunye umuntu ukuthi ayoyicosha, nofike emva kwendaba, sesithathiwe isithombe sayo.Kubikwa ukuthi umsolwa uhambe ngoLwesihlanu ekuseni ngabo-10, wayobika esiteshini sasePhoenix, ukuthi imoto intshontshiwe, wathi ugcine ukuyibona ngabo-11 ebusuku ngoLwesine.Kuvele ukuthi lesi siteshi avule kuso icala lokwebiwa kwemoto, okuyiso futhi obekubikwe kuso icala lokubulala ngokungenhloso kulandela ukushayiswa yimoto kukaNksz Mtshali.UKhomishana wamaPhoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLieutenant General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi, uthe iphoyisa elisolwa ngokubulala uNksz Mtshali libonile ukuthi lizobanjwa yikho likhethe ukuzibulala.“Kuningi obekushayisana entweni eliyishilo ngesikhathi livula icala. Phakathi kwakho ukuthi, intshontshwe kanjani imoto emzini wakhe kube kubiyiwe? Okunye obekushiya imibuzo ukuthi le moto abesezobika ukuthi intshontshiwe, ishayise umuntu. Kwaba nombuzo wokuthi ubani ke obeyishayela,” kusho uMkhwanazi.Uthe bebesaphenya yonke le mibuzo ngesikhathi iphoyisa livele linyamalala.“Uvele wazibulala, esebenzisa isibhamu samaphoyisa. Ukwenze lukhu emva kokugonyuluka komunye umuntu ngakwenzile ngempelasonto, wathi uyazibulala ngoba akafuni ukuboshwa,” kusho uMkhwanazi.Khonamanjalo: UNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa kuzwelonke, uMnuz Senzo Mchunu, usigxekile isigameko sokubulawa kwabayisithupha emijondolo engasehostela i-Tehuis KwaV eMlaza, ngoMgqibelo.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ehambele indawo yesigameko izolo.“Lesi isenzo esingafuneki emphakathini. Akekho umuntu okufanele enze into efana nale bese eyekwa nje, yingakho amaphoyisa ephansi phezulu emfuna, sizombamba futhi,” kusho uMchunu.Unxuse abenzi bobubi ukuthi uma bekwazi okubafanele, bavele bazinikele emaphoyiseni, wanxusa nomphakathi ukuthi uma kukhona okwaziyo ngabo, usheshe ubikele amaphoyisa.

BEBEYIZINTANDOKAZI uthishanhloko nothisha waseSogidi Primary, eNsuze, abashone ngoLwesithathu, imoto ebebehamba ngayo ishayiswa yi-ambulensi ngaseVerulam.UNkk Ntombenhle Nokuthula Sibisi (49) waseChurches Hill oThongathi, obenguthishanhloko noNksz Slindile Mbhele (36) waseBhamshela obenguthisha, kuthiwa bebesendleleni eya emhlanganweni wothisha eNdwedwe.Kule ngozi kuphinde kwalimala abanye othisha ababili, okubikwa ukuthi baphuthunyiswe esibhedlela lapho abasalaliswe khona.Imoto abebehamba ngayo bekungeyomunye wothisha abasesibhedlela, kuthiwa bavumelane ngokuthi kuhanjwe ngemoto eyodwa, okuyinto abavame ukuyenza uma kuyiwa emhlanganweni wothisha.Umyeni kaNkk Sibisi, uMnuz Thamsanqa Sibisi, uthe bafe olwembiza ngokufa kwakhe, wabalula ukuthi ubewuhlobo lomuntu obeluwuthanda futhi lizinikele emsebenzini walo.“Eminyakeni emningi edlule wasungula inhlangano engenzi nzuzo, iPartners For Possibilities abesiza ngayo othisha nabafundi ukuthi benze kangcono emsebenzini wesikole. Ibisiza kakhulu othisha. Ubezimisela kakhulu, lapho adlula khona ubeshiya umaka,” kusho uSibisi.Uveze ukuthi uNkk Sibisi waqala ukusebenza ngo-1996, kanti kwesobuthishanhloko uqale ngo-2007, khona eSogidi.Ukhale ngokuthi indawo okwenzeke kuyo isigameko ivamile ukuba nezingozi, wathi bafisa kufakwe izinciphisajubane.“Sizwe kuthiwa bebethi bayajika kanti kuzoqhamula i-ambulensi igijima, yazithela kubona. Impela siyafisa kufakwe izinciphisajubane ukunqanda izingozi kuleya ndawo abashonele kuyo,” kusho yena.Udadewabo kaNksz Mbhele, uNksz Londeka Mbhele, uthe balahlekelwe wumuntu obewusizo emndenini kanjalo nasesikoleni abefundisa kuso.“Emphakathini owakhele isikole abesisebenzela, ubengaconsi phansi, ethandwa kakhulu. Umsebenzi wakhe ubewuthanda ngendlela yokuthi bekubonakala ngezindondo abeziwola unyaka nonyaka,” kusho uNksz Mbhele.Uqhube wathi behluleka nawukubala ukuthi zingaki izindondo nezitifiketi abede ezithola.Uthe kwenzeka isigameko nje, uNksz Mbhele ngesikhathi evalelisa ekuseni, uthe akomkhumbuza uma ebuya ntambama amxoxele ngephupho elibi avuke nalo.“Ngigcine ngingazanga ukuthi belithini, bengithi uzongixoxela uma ebuya kanti ngeke kusenzeka,” kusho uNksz Mbhele.Uveze ukuthi waqala ukufundisa ngo-2007, efundisa uGrade 1 engakazitholi iziqu. Wathi iziqu ugcine ezithola ngo-2017, waqashwa ngokugcwele ngo-2018.UMphathiswa wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Mbali Frazer udlulise amazwi enduduzo emindenini yabashonile nasesikoleni.Ubuye wafisela othisha abalimele ukululama okuphuthumayo njengoba bephuthunyiswe esibhedlela.“Sifisa ukuthi uNkulunkulu abenabo ngalesi sikhathi esinzima,” kusho uNkk Frazer, oveze ukuthi ubuholi bezemfundo ezingeni lesifunda iLembe buhambele imindeni yabashonile nesikole, ukuyoduduza.

UNGQONGQOSHE woMnyango wemiSebenzi yoMphakathi neNgqalasizinda, uMnuz Sihle Zikalala, uthe ukwanda kwezigameko zokufa kwezisebenzi emkhakheni wezokwakha kuphoqa ukuthi babuyekeze imigomo yezokuphepha ezindaweni zokwakha.UZikalala ukusho lokhu esitatimendeni esikhishwe umnyango wakhe izolo, emuva kwesigameko sokushona kwabane kulimale oyedwa, abawelwe udonga abebelakha eBallito, ngoMgqibelo. “Asilona izwe elingenamthetho. INingizimu Afrika inayo imigomo ebekiwe uma kuziwa embonini yezokwakha. Ukwanda kwezigameko zalolu hlobo ngesikhashana nje, kudala ukuthi sikhathazeke,” kusho uZikalala.Uthe okubi ukuthi basazikhotha amanxeba ngesehlakalo saseGeorge, eWestern Cape, kulandela ukudilika kwesakhiwo phezu kwabasebenzi, kwafa abangu-33.Uqhube wathi bathe besababaza lokho, kwenzeka esinye isigameko eNgcobo, e-Eastern Cape, lapho okufe khona abayisithupha.“Kuzodingeka uphenyo olunzulu kuzo zonke lezi zigameko, ukuze kutholakale umnyombo wokuthi zibangelwe yini nokuthi kungani le mboni isibhekana nokwanda kwalezi zigameko?” kusho kanje.Kuvele ukuthi abashonile bebedabuka e-Eastern Cape.Lokhu kuvezwe yikhansela lendawo, uNkk Tammy Colley, ngesikhathi ekhuluma neSolezwe izolo.UNkk Colley uthe ukhulume kafishane nabasondelene noyedwa obembozekile.“Ngesikhathi befika endaweni yesigameko, bebekhala bengalawuleki. Sithole ukuthi bonke abathintekayo bebengabokudabuka e-Eastern Cape, kodwa baqashe kulesi sifundazwe ukusondezela umsebenzi,” kubeka uNkk Colley.Uqhube wathi isigameko senzeke ngabo-9 ekuseni, banikela khona.“Sithole abezimo eziphuthumayo ezehlukene sebevele befikile. Indawo lapho okwenzeke khona isigameko bekuyikhaya lomuntu,” kusho uNkk Colley, oqhube wathi ubengekho umnikazi wendawo ngesikhathi kutakulwa abambozekile.Uthe babonga umphakathi ngokusheshe ubike ukuthi sekwenzeke isigameko nokuthi usondele masinyane emva kwesigameko.Uthe babuye babawusizo nasethimbeni ebelitakula beliboleka izinsiza ezifana nama-generator, ukudla neziphuzo.UNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube edlulisa amazwi enduduzo emindenini yabasholelwe, uthe kuyakhathaza ukwenzeka kwesinye isigameko embonini yezokwakha.“Kuyadabukisa futhi kubuhlungu ukudlulisa amazwi enduduzo emindenini, abangani nozakwabo babane abalahlekelwe yimpilo yabo. Lesi sehlo silethe losizi emphakathini, sikhala nalabo abalahlekelwe,” kusho uNkk Dube-Ncube.Uthe ngesikhathi belinde umphumela wophenyo lwamaphoyisa ngokuholele kule nhlekelele, bazoqhubeka nokunika imindeni ethintekayo ukwesekwa nalolonke usizo eludingayo.Uthe bafisela nophuthunyiswe esibhedlela ukululama okusheshayo, wathi babonga nokusebenza ngokuzikhandla kwamathimba abesebenzi ukutakula abagilwa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa avule amadokodo okufa kwabantu amane emva kokuthi udonga luwele kubasebenzi abahlanu, kwashona abane.“Amaphoyisa aseqale nophenyo ngembangela yokuwa kodonga oluwele phezu kwabasebenzi endaweni yokwakha esemgwaqweni uZen Drive eBallito, ngoMgqibelo,” kusho uNetshiunda.Uthe olwazi abasenalo okwamanje bengamaphoyisa bezingu-14 izisebenzi ebezikule ndawo yokwakha ngesikhathi udonga luwela kwabayisihlanu, lubagqiba.“Amathimba abebheka emaphoyiseni esebenzisana nezinye izinhlaka ezizimele, akwazile ukukhipha bobahlanu ebebegqibekile kodwa abane babo bese beshonile,” kusho uNetshiunda.Uqhube wathi oyedwa utholwe esaphila yize ebesehlale amahora ayisithupha ngaphansi kodonga oluwile.“Amadokodo okufa kwabantu avuliwe ukuthi aphenywe, imbangela eholele ekutheni kuwe udonga nayo izoba yingxenye yophenyo,” kusho uNetshiunda.UMnuz Stoney Buthelezi wenkampani i-Thelbridge Enterprise (PTY) Ltd, uthe ezigamekweni ezifana nalezi kunzima ukusho ukuthi yini imbangela yazo ngoba kwesinye isikhathi basuke beyilandele yonke imigudu efunekayo osonkontileka kodwa ziqhubeke zenzeke izingozi."Indaba yokwakha ibucayi. Uthola ukuthi umakhi ulithathile isampula lomhlabathi layohlolwa ngaphambi kokuthi kuqale umsebenzi, imiphumela ibuye ithi ungaqhubeka umsebenzi wokwakha, kodwa ngokuqhubeka kwesikhathi kwenzeke ingozi," kusho uButhelezi.Uqhube wathi kunzima ukuqagula ukuthi yini ebingenziwanga kahle kulesi sigameko.

UMENGAMELI uCyril Ramaphosa, uthi abakhuluma kabi ngowayengungqongqoshe wezamaBhizinisi kaHulumeni, uMnuz Pravin Gordhan, bebedla ngenkohlakalo eyenzeka eminyangweni kahulumeni.URamaphosa uthe uGordhan uzondelwa ukuthi ubengahambisani nenkohlakalo.Lokhu ukusho enkonzweni yomngcwabo kaGordhan ebiseNkosi Albert Luthuli Convention Centre, izolo.URamaphosa uthe uGordhan walwa ngesikhathi kukhona abazama ukuzitamuzela emalini yomphakathi.“Ngesikhathi izwe lethu libhekene nesikhathi esinzima, lapho khona abasondelene nababesezikhundleni ngaleso sikhathi befuna ukubhubhudla imali, uGordhan walwa. Akazange avume ukuthi kudliwe imali yomphakathi.“Walwa ngisho esebona ukuthi izenzo zakhe zimqhatha nanabantu aqhamuka enhlanganweni eyodwa nabo ababenza okungalungile.”URamaphosa uthe uGordhan wathukwa kakhulu ngesikhathi elwa nemizamo yokuLawulwa koMbuso yiDlanzana.“Labo ababezama ukulawula uMbuso bamzonda kakhulu. Babemusho ngazo zonke izinhlamba. Babefuna akhishwe esikhundleni. Ezinye zezinhlamba ayethukwa ngazo zazinokucwasa ngokobuhlanga. “Nokho izinhlamba azizange zimehlise isithunzi emphakathini, kunalokho zavula abantu amehlo, babona izinhloso zalabo ababefuna ukuzenzela emalini yomphakathi.”URamaphosa uthe izwe lilahlekelwe umholi obezithobile ngokushona kukaGordhan.“Ubekholelwa ekutheni izishoshovu akufanele zilwele ukuzicebisa zona, kufanele zilwele abantu ukuthi baphile impilo engcono.”UGordhan ushone ngeleldlule emva kokuxinwa ukugula.Ushona nje, ubevele esethathe umhlalaphansi kwezepolitiki emva kokuphatha izikhundla okukhona kuso ukhomishana we-SA Revenue Services (Sars), uMnyango wezeziMali  nowezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu.Umngcwabo kaGordhan ubuhanjelwe abaholi abahlukene okubalwa kubo ongqongqoshe abaphethe manje  nababengongqongqoshe.Izikhulumi ebezishiyelana inkundla emngcwabeni wakhe zimchaze njengomholi obeqotho.UNobhala Jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, uthe ingcabha isele kubona ukuba baqhubeke nokulwa nenkohlakalo njengoba uGordhan engasekho.USihlalo we-SACP, uMnuz Blade Nzimande, uthe akazi ukuthi uGordhan uthukelwani ngoba watakula amabhizinisi kahulumeni amaningi awafica eseguqe ngamadolo ngesikhathi eqokelwa kwesikangqongqohse woMnyango wamaBhizinisi kaHulumeni.Owayeyinhloko yamajaji, iJaji uRaymond Zondo, uthe uGordhan uzondelwa ukuthi akazange avume ukuthi kwenzeke inkohlakalo phambi kwakhe.

SELULWE ngamasonto amabili isikhathi sokufakwa kwezicelo zoxhaso lokulekelelwa ngemali kwabalimi uMnyango wezoLimo KwaZulu-Natal.Lokhu kuvezwe uMphathiwa walo mnyango, uNkk Thembeni KaMadlopha-Mthethwa.Phambilini, umnyango wawuthe ukufakwa kwezicelo kuzovalwa namuhla, kodwa muva nje usuveze ukuthi sekuzovalwa ngo-Okthoba 15 ngo-4 ntambama.Amabhizinisi avumekele ukuthi afake izicelo ilawo asebenza kulesi sifundazwe, abhalise ngokusemthethweni ukuthi enza izinto ezithinta ezolimo.Lolu xhaso olonyakazimali ka-2025/2026.UNkk KaMadlopha-Mthethwa uthe ngalolu xhaso, umnyango wakhe uhlose ukuvula amathuba kwezolimo.“Lokhu kuzosilekelela ekutheni siqinisekise ukuthi nathi siyisifundazwe siyayiklama eyethu indima ekutheni elakuleli lihlale linokudla okwenele,” kusho uNkk KaMadlopha-Mthethwa.Uthe akuzogcina nje ngalokhu kuphela kodwa kuzolekelela nasekudalekeni kwamathuba omsebenzi kuphinde kukhulise nomnotho njengoba behlela ukulekelela lawo mabhizinisi akhombisa intshisekelo yokwenza umehluko emnothweni.Uthe amabhizinisi afisa ukuhlomula kuzofanele ukuthi aqinisekise ukuthi ayayilandela yonke imigomo nemibandela ebekwe kwifomu yokungenela.“Uxhaso lwehlukene kabili. Kukhona oluzofinyelela ku-R300 000 lwama-subsistence producers (abazikhiqizelayo). Bese kuba olungafinyelela ku-R2 million lwama-smallholder and commercial producers (abakhiqizela izitolo),” usho kanje.Uthe amafomu okungenela ayatholakala emahhovisi ezolimo komasipala abehlukene, wathi abuye atholakale nakwi-website yomnyango.Wathi labo abazofaka izicelo bavumelekile ukuyobuza ukuthi bawagcwalisa kanjani ngendlela efanele amafomu.Uthe kubalulekile ukuthi abafaka izicelo baqinisekise ukuthi wonke amaphepha afunekayo ezicelweni zabo, bayawafaka ukuze bangakhishelwa ngaphandle ngenxa yokungenzi okufanele.Uxwayise ngokuthi ngaphambi kokuthi lwedluliselwe lolu xhaso kulabo abazophuma phambili ezicelweni zabo, kuyohanjelwa izindawo zabo, lapho abenza khona amabhizinisi abo ezolimo ngenhloso yokuzohlola ukuthi abakushilo ngesikhathi befaka izicelo kuyiqiniso.

OWAYENGUMENGAMELI uMnuz Jacob Zuma, uhoxe ngemizuzu yokugcina emcimbini weMK,  maqede waveza ukuthi uzwe kuthiwa bese kushiswe izinkukhu ezimnyama lapho ebekhona.Nakuba uZuma eqale wakhala ngokuthi ubanjwe isimo esivele emndenini ukuthi angayi emcimbini obuseGamalakhe, ukuvezile ukuthi uzwile ukuthi kunemigilingwane eyenziwe lapho obekufanele abe khona.UZuma uthe ujike endleleni ebheke kulo mcimbi obusesikhungweni Ugu Sports and Leisure Centre ngoMgqibelo. Lokhu ukusho enkulumweni eqoshiwe ethunyelelwe abezindaba.Yize amalungu eMK ebephume ngezinkani kulo mcimbi, uZuma akazange alubhade.UZuma akafunanga ukudalula imininingwane ephelele ngokuhoxa kwakhe emcimbini, kepha ukuvezile ukuthi uzwile ukuthi kunemigilingwane egilwe endaweni obekubanjwe kuyo umcimbi.“Ngelinye ilanga ngiyoxoxa ukuthi yini le ebangela ukuthi kube khona isigigaba sokuthi ngize ngingezi.“Ngizwile okuningana ukuthi lapho ebengizokuba khona bese kushiswe ngisho izinkukhu ezimnyama, kwenziwa konke. Lokhu siyobuye sikuxoxe ngelinye ilanga. “Yebo kubuhlungu ukuthi angikwazanga ukuba nani lapho, kodwa bakhona abafowethu lapho. Ngiyathemba ukuthi umcimbi wenu uhambe kahle,” kusho uZuma.Udalule ukuthi ubezimisele ukutshela abantu abebehambele umcimbi wangoMgqibelo ukuthi i-MK izoyiqeda inhlupheko uma benqoba ukhetho ngokuthi yakhe izimboni.“Lokhu kuzoqeda ukuthi kube nabantu abangayitholi imisebenzi. uma sekuphethe thina ngoba ayikho ingane engezokufunda.“Uhulumeni kuzofuneka awuthwale umthwalo wokuthi yonke ingane ezalelwe lapha, noma ngabe iyintandane, noma kuyahlushekwa lapho izalwa khona, ingancishwa imfundo ngenxa yokuthi ayinabo abazali noma kuyahlushekwa lapho izalwa khona," kugcizelela uMsholozi.UZuma uthe bafuna ukukhuphula isibonelelo sezaguga qahubeka wathi: “Embonweni wethu esisawuxoxa, esithemba ukuthi nizowuvuma, sifuna ukuthi ugogo ngayedwa athole imali elinganiselwa kuR5 000 ukuze akwazi ukuphila kahle, ondle isizukulwane sakhe sonke.”Uthe bafuna ukuthi izwe liphathwe amakhosi kanti masekusondele ukhetho bazokuya nawo.“Siyokube sesiyokusho okokugcina ukuthi ayihlome. Ayihlomeli impi, kodwa ihlomela ukhetho. Isikhali sethu esinaso manje ukhetho,” esho.Uphinde wasebenzisa inkulumo yakhe ukuxwayisa abaholi beqembu abenza okuthandwa yibo.Selokhu kwasungulwa i-MK, baningi abaholi asebedliwe yizembe. Mumva le nhlangano ikhombe indlela obeyididiyela KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Nhlanhla Ngidi.UZuma uthe bazovuna abakutshalile abazophambana nomthetho.“Abafuna ukuganga eqenjini abakuyeke lokho, abazi ukuthi siyobaphupha ngisho ebusuku silele,” kuxwayisa uMsholozi.

UNDUNANKULU waKwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube, uthe isivumelwano ebebenaso noqweqwe lwenyosi yeSilo edilizwe isigubhukane, uMnuz Buzetsheni Mdletshe, besiphambene nomthetho.UNkk Dube-Ncube uthe banqume ukunqamula inkontileka ebebenayo nenkampani kaMdletshe, iMavukefile, emva kokuthi umcwaningi mabhuku omkhulu ekhonondile ngayo.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma nabezindaba ngesikhathi enemibuzo yokulwisana nobugebengu, eNchanga, ngoLwesithathu.UMdletshe waziswe ngeledlule ukuthi inkontileka yakhe izonqanyulwa ekupheleni kwenyanga.Encwadini ebhekiswe kuMdletshe, uhulumeni ukhale ngezimali.UMdletshe waqala ukuba yinyosi ngesikhathi kubusa iSilo uGoodwill Zwelithini kaBhekuzulu, ngo-1977.Ngo-2020 wathatha umhlalaphansi, kepha wabuye wabuya eseyitoho, esebenzisa inkampani yakhe iMavukefile.UMdletshe uyinyosi, aphinde abe umeluleki wezamasiko weSilo uMisuzulu kaZwelithini.UNkk Dube-Ncube uthe uMdletshe usazoqhubeka nokuhasha iSilo uma edingeka, kodwa wathi ngeke esayenza eminye imisebenzi abeyenza."Ngesikhathi kubusa iSilo esabuzayo, uMdletshe wayenza izinto ezahlukene. Kwesinye isikhathi wayeba umeluleki wezamasiko, kwesinye asebenze ukuphelezela abaya emadlinzeni amakhosi, kokunye asebenze njengosomlando.“Umcwaningi mabhuku wathi kuphambene nomthetho ukuthi kube khona umuntu ozoba nezinkontileka ezahlukene nohulumeni ekubeni esathatha umhlalaphansi kuhulumeni. Manje uMdletshe usezobizwa uma edingeka ukuthi ayohasha iSilo.”UNkk Dube-Ncube uthe uMdletshe usezobambisana nezinye izinyosi eziqashwe uhulumeni.“Akusikhona ukuthi uMdletshe akasezukusebenza. Usazoqhubeka asebenzisane nezinye izinyosi eziqashwe uhulumeni. Uma sizokhuluma iqiniso, vele uhlelo olwalukhona olokuthi uMdletshe acije ezinye izinyosi ngoba yena usathatha umhlalaphansi.”Udaba lokunqanyulwa kwenkontileka kaMdletshe lususe umsindo, iSilo sakhipha isitatimende, lapho besikhala ngokwedelelwa wuhulumeni wesifundazwe.Esitatimendeni esikhishwe uNdunankulu kaZulu, uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi, iSilo sikufanise nokufakwa kukaZulu umunwe esweni ukudelelwa kwaso wuhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal.Kepha uNkk Dube-Ncube ukhale ngokugxambukela kukaButhelezi ezindabeni ezithinta ukuphathwa kukahulumeni.“Bazokhumbula abezindaba ukuthi saba nobudlelwano obuhle nondunankulu weSilo owakhothama, iNkosi yakwaButhelezi (Mangosuthu). Wayewazi umsebenzi kahulumeni ukuthi uhamba ugcinephi, futhi wayewazi umsebenzi kaNdunankulu kaZulu ukuthi uhamba ugcinephi.“Lo msebenzi wokwengamela umnyango weSilo ngokukahulumeni, uphethwe yihhovisi likaNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal. Akufanele kube nezitatimende eziqhamuka kuNdunankulu kaZulu ezigxambukela emsebenzini kahulumeni. Uma uNdunankulu kaZulu kunezinto angaziqondi kahle, kufanele afonele uNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal.”

UYAYIVUMA induku yoMkhonto weSizwe (MK) uNobhala we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, othe balithathe kancane leli qembu bebona ukuthi alinabo abaholi nemigomo elakhelwe phezu kwayo.UMnuz Bheki Mtolo ukusho lokhu engxoxweni abenayo neziko lezindaba i-eNCA ngoMgqibelo emini.Ubalule nokuthi abantu bebengenelisekile ngokulethelwa izidingongqangi emiphakathini ikakhulukazi eThekwini lapho abantu bekhala ngesomiso samanzi, imigwaqo nokunye.UMtolo uthe kuyilandele izinkumbi zabalandeli iMK ukukhankasa ifolosa ngowayengumengameli wezwe ne-ANC,, uJacob Zuma.“Yizinto eziphathelene nokulethwa kwezidingo emphakathini okwenze abantu baya eqenjini elisha okuyiMK. Basebenzise umakadebona we-ANC ukuze balande abavoti,” kusho uMtolo.Ukhale nangokuthi kukhona amalungu e-ANC emagatsheni asebenze engaphakathi kulenhlangano esiza iMK ukuze inqobe ukhetho, wabalula izigameko ezimbili sakuMasipala iRay Nkonyeni naseMhlathuze.UMtolo uthe yinto esazolandelelwa ngaphakathi enhlanganweni yabo.Imibiko engakaqinisekiwa ikhomishini yokhetho i-IEC, ikhomba ukuthi alikho iqembu elinqobe ukhetho elizokwazi ukubusa iKZN lodwa.Nakuba kunjalo iMK iwole amavoti abalelwa ku-45%, yalandela i-IFP ngawu-18%, i-ANC yalala isithathu ngawu-17%.Ebuzwa uMtolo ukuthi bazosebenzisana neMK ukwakha uhulumeni wobumbano, uthe i-ANC izosebenzisna neqembu elikhathalele abantu besifundazwe.Ngakolunye uhlangothi iMK ibekele i-ANC umbandela othi kumele isuse umholi wayo, uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa uma ifuna basebenzisane.“Kumele kube uhulumeni onozinzo ozokwazi ukuhlala isikhathi esiyiminyaka emihlanu. Abantu esizokwakha nabo uhulumeni kumele kube ngabathenjwa nangabatshali zimali. Abantu abazobhekana ngqo nabatapayo, abenza ubugebengu nodlame nabavala imigwaqo,” kusho uMtolo.

IZANGOMA zezulu zikhiphe isexwayiso ngemvula enamandla ehambisa nokuduma ezindaweni ezahlukene KwaZulu-Natal, enyakatho ye-Eastern Cape, engxenyeni yempumalanga yeNorthern Cape, eFree State nasezingxenyeni zaseNorth West.

Uma wena noma othile omaziyo uphila ne-HIV futhi uthatha ama-ARV nsuku zonke, ungazuza Akubonakali = Akudluliseki (U=U). Lokhu kusho ukuthi izinga le-HIV emzimbeni wakho lizoba iphansi kangangokuthi ngeke ibe yingozi kuwe futhi ngeke ukwazi ukuyidlulisela kwabanye. Njenganoma yisiphi esinye isifo esingalapheki, ngisho noma kutholakala ukuthi une-HIV, ungaphila isikhathi eside, impilo enempilo ngokuthatha imithi yakho nsuku zonke, njengoba kuyaliwe. Ngokuthatha ama-ARV akho nsuku zonkekanye nokuzuza ukucindezelwa komthamo wegciwane egazini (Akubonakali), ungakwazi:- Phila impilo ende nenempilo- Yiba nomzimba onamandla wokulwa nokugula- Bheka futhi uzizwe umnandi- Vakashela umtholampilo izikhathi ezimbalwa lapho uzinzile ekwelashweni- Qoqa imithi yakho ezindaweni ezikahle zokuthatha ngaphandle kokuya emtholampilo- Ungadluliseli i-HIV kwabanyeUmsebenzi wezempilo uzokunikeza ukuhlolwa kwenani legciwane egazini ukuze athole ukuthi ngabe uyi-U=U. Uma ufinyelela ku-U=U, kufanele uqhubeke uthatha ama-ARV akho nsuku zonke ukuze uhlale Ungabonakali = Ayidluliseleki.Ngenxa yokuthi usenayo i-HIV+, kufanele uqhubeke nokusebenzisa ikhondomu ukuvimbela ezinye izifo ezithathelwana ngocansi kanyeukukhulelwa okungahleliwe. Kungenzeka ukuthi ulahlekelwe yi-U=U uma uyeka ukuphuza ama-ARV akho noma ungawaphuzinjengoba kushiwo.I-U=U ayikona nje ukucindezela igciwane; kumayelana nokujabulela impilo kakhulu nokukhathazeka kancane ngakhoI-HIV ikubambezele. Ngokwelashwa nokunakekelwa okufanele, abantu abaphila ne-HIV bangahola begcweleiphila ngesikhathi inikela ekuqedeni ukusabalala kwe-HIV.Ukuze uthole olunye ulwazi: https://www.uequalsu.co.zaFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/UequalsUzaInstagram: https://www.instagram.com/uequalsu_zaYouTube: http://www.youtube.com/@UequalsU_za

SICHITHIWE isicelo sesiboshwa uThabo Bester sokugunyazwa ukusebenzisa i-laptop sisejele.Lesi siboshwa esidonsa udilikajele ngamacala okudlwengula nokubulala, njengamanje sibhekene necala lokweqa ejele ngonyaka odlule.UBester unikele enkantolo ngoLwesibili, efaka lesi sicelo ngenhloso yokuzilungiselela ukuqulwa kwecala lokweqa kwakhe ejele ngoFebhruwari, wangonyaka ozayo.Le nsizwa iqome ukuzimela yona enkantolo, inxuse ijaji ukuba livume ukuthi ithole i-laptop, yaze yabeka nokuthi igadwe ngeso lokhozi ejele, ngakhoke akukho okubi nokungale komthetho engakwenza uma ithola lokhu kuphela izolandela yonke imigomo ebekelwe yona.“Angitholi ngisho iphephandaba, anginawo umsakazo, anginalo iwashi, angazi nokuthi isikhathi sini, yindlela engiphile ngayo ezinyangeni eziwu-16 ezedlule” kusho uThabo Bester ezikhalela ejajini.Uqome ukuzimela enkantolo uThabo Bester ngesicelo sokugunyazwa ukusebenzisa i-laptop ejele ukulungiselela ukuqulwa kwecala lakhe @IsolezweNews pic.twitter.com/Qw424CdcfpUzwakale ekhushukelwa wushukela uBester ngesikhathi ijaji limtshela ukuthi akanalo ilungelo lokuba ne-laptop.“Awunalo ilungelo ngokoMthethosisekelo lokuba ne-laptop ne-mordem,” kusho ijaji.UBester uphendule ijaji ngokuthi liyenzelela.Ubonise ukuzethemba uBester echaza udaba lwakhe ebala namazwe ahlukahlukene okuthiwa ama-laptop ayasetshenziswa emajele... yize kunjalo, inkantolo ithe cha hhay namhlanje, hhay lapha. BUNKANISE KwaZulu-Natal ubuholi be-EFF bukazwelonke ngale mpelasonto ukuzozizwela kumagatsha izizathu ezenze leli qembu lehlelwa ukwesekwa okhethweni lukazwelonke obelungoMeyi nonyaka.Leli qembu ligasele kulesi sifundazwe liholwa ngumengameli walo uMnuz Julius Malema.Lisanda kugqemeka udume lwengozi ngokushiywa ngomunye wabasunguli balo, uMnuz Floyd Shivambu, obeyiphini likamengameli onikwe isikhundla sikaMgqugquzeli kaZwelonke eqenjini Umkhonto weSizwe, eliholwa nguMnuz Jacob Zuma.UNobhala Jikelele we-EFF, uMnuz Marshall Dlamini, ekhuluma nezintatheli eMhlanga, uthe kutheleke sonke isigungu saleli qembu ukuzozithola ngokwenze leli qembu lishayeke kangaka okhethweni.Leli qembu lisele nezihlalo ezimbili kuphela esiShayamthetho sesifundazwe zisuka kweziyishiyagalombili. UDlamini uthe uthuliwe umbiko ngokwenzeka okhethweni lwangoMeyi.“Silahlekelwe amavoti acela ku-300 000 okhethweni lwangoMeyi. Silahlekelwe izihlalo eziyisithupha esiShayamthetho yingakho sizolalela amagatsha ukuthi kwenzakaleni. Sifuna ukuthola umkhombandlela ngokuthi ikuphi okumele sikwenze,” kusho uDlamini.Uthe bazohambela izindawo ezehlukene ukuthola izinselelo ezibekhona.“Sifuna ukuzwa kubantu okuyibo abebehambele imiphakathi ukuzwa izikhalazo zabo. Kusishayile ukwehlelwa ukwesekwa kwe-EFF kulesi sifundazwe,” kusho uDlamini.Uthe abazile kulesi sifundazwe ngomqondo wokuthi bayazi ukuthi yini eyenze leli qembu langesekwa.UMalema ekhuluma eGoli, ngoMsombuluko ebusuku, ukuvezile ukuthi ngeke basilaxaze lesi sifundazwe kodwa bazoza ukuzozizwela ukuthi kwenzakaleni.Wakuveza phambilini ukuthi iqembu i-MK lifike njengesikhonyane esibhubhise kwasani okhethweni.Wabalula ukuthi akekho owayazi ukuthi leli qembu lingagadla emaqenjini amaningi kangaka lehlise ukwesekwa kwalo.I-ANC ayisalanga ngaphandle ekwehlelweni wukwesekwa kulandela ukufika kwe-MK.UDlamini uthe ngeke bayikhulume eyokuhamba kukaShivambu kule mpelasonto.“UShivambu uhambile eqenjini, ikhasi lakhe silivalile. Akukho okuzokhulunywa ngaye ngoba usengumlando kwi-EFF,” kusho uDlamini.Uveze ukuthi alikho elinye ilungu elisasulile kulandela ukuhamba kukaShivambu.Kusasa uMalema kulindeleke ukuthi akhulume emngcwabeni kamama womholi kasihlalo waleli qembu esifundazweni, uMnuz Mongezi Twala, Osizweni, eNewcastle.

BUSINDELE ukugaleleka kweMK, ecoboshise amaqembu amaningi okhethweni kubalwa nokwehlisa ukwesekwa kwe-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, ubuholi be-EFF esifundazweni obebuzohlakazwa. UKhomanda we-EFF uJulius Malema uthe uyabuthethelela ubuholi baseKZN ngoba akekho owayazi ukuthi iMK izogila izimanga ezingaka okhethweni lukazwelonke nolwezifundazwe obelungoMeyi. I-EFF esifundazweni yehlelwe izihlalo esiShayamthetho yasala nezimbili kuphela kanti ukwesekwa kwayo kwehlile ngenxa yokufika kweMK. Ekhuluma nabalandeli be-EFF ngesikhathi igubha iminyaka engu-11 enkundleni yemidlalo i-AR Abass, eKimberley ngempelasonto, uMalema uthe ubuholi bukasihlalo uMnuz Mongezi Twala, ngeke abuhlakaze.“Alwile amaqabane aseKZN. Awazange abone ukuthi iMK izogaleleka ngale ndlela okhethweni. Bekungelula ukuthi bahlule iMK. Akukho okuzokwenzeka kubona. Bezincane izinsiza zokukhankankasa, basangabaholi baseKZN,” kusho uMalema.Uthe bahluleke bezamile laba baholi wathi kodwa abaholi baseNorth West naseLimpopo, kumele baphendule ngokubhacaza okhethweni.“EBojanala eNorth West silahlekelwe amavoti angu-25 000. Ayikho incazelo yokuthi lokhu kwenzeke kanjani. Sidinga ubuholi obusha kulezi zindawo. Ngeke siyeke abantu abavilaphayo,” kusho uMalema.Uthe kumele bajeze labo ababhacazile okhethweni.“Abantu kumele badle ngoba besebenzile. Abangasebenzanga sizobadedela bayophumula.” EKZN i-IFP, DA, ANC neNFP bakhe uhulumeni wobumbano.I-EFF neMK yiwona maqembu aphikisayo njengoba esebenzisana. Kuzwelonke iMK iyiqembu eliphikisayo ePhalamende. Leli qembu aliyona ingxenye yohulumeni wobumbano kanjalo ne-EFF. UMalema uhlale eyincoma iMK ngokucoboshisa i-ANC ephumile emandleni.I-ANC kuzwelonke ayikwazanga ukuthola amvoti enele ukuthi ibuse ngayodwana kuhulumeni njengoba bekwenzeka phambilini.

ISOUTH African Health Products Regulatory Authority (Sahpra) isihoxise umuthi wesifuba wezingane, iBenylin Paediatric Syrup, emuva kokuthola ukuthi inobuthi obuyingozi.Esitatimendeni sabezindaba, iSahpra ithe ithole umbiko kwiNigerian National Agency for Food and Drug Administration and Control (Nafdac), owaveza ukuthi iBenylin Paediatric Syrup inezinga eliphezulu le-diethylene glycol. ISahpra ithe idiethylene glycol ingadala izinhlungu esinyeni, ukuphalaza, ukukhishwa yisisu, ingenza oyiphuzile angakwazi ukuchama, aphathwe yikhanda, angathathi kahle engqondweni, konakale izinso noma ashone.Kuthiwa idiethylene glycol isetshenziswa emikhiqizweni ehlukene okubalwa i-antifreeze, brake fluid, kugwayi nakodayi.ISahpra ithe ithinte iKenvue (ebiayiwa ngeJohnson and Johnson) emuba kokuthola umbiko waseNigeria, ukuthola ukuthi kwenzekani kwase kuvunyelwana ukuthi imithi ethintekayo mayibuyiswe.Imithi yakwaBenylin ebuyiswayo ibonakala nge-batch number ewu-329304 newu 329303.ISahpra ithe le mithi itholakala kakhulu eNingizimu Afrika, Swatini, Rwanda, Kenya, Tanzania naseNigeria.IBenylin Paediatric iwumuthi wezingane onombala obomvu onukisa okwe-rasberry, usiza uma ingane inomkhuhlane, icinene noma nokunye nje okuphathelene nesifuba.ISahpra icele abantu ukuthi bangathuki ngoba lolu daba lusetshenzwa ngamandla futhi abakhiqiza le mithi banemvume yokwenza lo msebenzi.Ithe imithi ethintekayo yilena enama-batch namba abhalwe ngenhla ngakho kubalulekile ukuthi umphakathi uwabhekisise kahle, ungathuki.Icele izikhungo zempilo nodokotela ukuthi bayibuyisele emuva imithi ethintekayo.Ukubuyiselwa kwalo muthi kufakwe njengo-class 1, okuyisigaba esisetshenziswa yiSahpra uma ikhathazekile ngomuthi osemakethe ongaba yingozi kubantu.ISahpra icele abaphuze le mithi base beba nezinkinga ukuthi baphuthume kodokotela nasezikhungweni zempilo. Kuthiwa kufanele babike ngokusebenzisa i-Med Safety App noma bathumele i-email ku- [email protected].

INHLANGANO ebhekelele abathengi, iNational Consumer Commission (NCC) icela abantu ukuthi babuyisele ezitolo ishampoo yeDark and Lovely etholakala kuma-relaxer akhona ahlukene.Le shampoo ewu-50ml itholakala kwiDark and Lovely Moisture Plus Kit eyi-regular neyi-super nakwiDark and Lovely Anti Breakage Kit.INCC ithe abantu abathenge le shampoo kufanele bayibuyisele ezitolo ukuze bathole imali yabo abathenge ngayo.IPhini likaKhomishana weNCC uNksz Thezi Mabuza uthe inkampani ekhiqiza iDark and Lovely, iLoreal ibatshele ukuthi ithole igciwane kule shampoo ngesikhathi iyihlola ngakho kufanele ibuyiselwe emuva.“Siyakuqonda ukuthi le shampoo isetshenziswa kanye kodwa siyacela ukuthi abantu baseNingizimu Afrika abayithengile imikhiqizo enayo bayibuyisele emuva. Abakhiqizi bale shampoo bathe ukusebenziswa kwayo kungaholela ekutheni ogeze izinwele zakhe ngayo abe nenkinga yesikhumba ekhanda ikakhulukazi labo abanezifo ezihlazela amasosha omzimba,” kusho uNksz Mabuza.Uthe le shampoo yayikhiqizwe ngo-Ephreli wonyaka odlule, idayiswa eZambia, Zimbabwe, Namibia, Kenya, Ghana, Botswana, Eswatini, Lesotho, Morocco, Nigeria nakuleli.Uphethe ngokuthi umthetho ovikela abathengi iConsumer Protection Act, uphoqa abakhiqiza ukuthi baqinisekise ukuthi imikhiqizo yabo iphephile.Ucele izinkampani ukuthi zinisekise ukuthi abathengi baphephile ngaso sonke isikhathi futhi uzoluqapha ngeso lokhozi uhlelo lokubuyiselwa kwama shampoo ezitolo.

INKAMPANI ekhiqiza ukudla, i-Univeler, ibadonse ngendlebe abantu baseNingizimu Afrika yathi  ababuyisele ezitolo iKnorr Brown Onion Gravy njengoba ithole ukuthi ine-Knorr Professional Brown Sauce Base.Lokhu kusho ukuthi leli sobho linezithako ezingabhaliwe phansi okubalwa kuzo ubisi lwenkomo (cows milk) ne-soy.Amasobho abuyiselwa ezitolo yilawo abhalwe Knorr Brown Onion Gravy abhalwe BB 11 DEC 2025 KM 4163 E14A noma BB 12 DEC 2025 KM 4164 E14A.Abantu bacelwe ukuthi bangalidli leli sobho, okungcono balilahle noma balibuyisele esitolo abathenge kuso ukuze babuyiselwe imali yabo.Esitatimendeni abe-Unilever bathe labo abangazwani nobisi lwenkomo noma i-soy bangaba nokuthikamezeka kwezempilo kanti kuyacelwa ukuthi bavakashele udokotela noma baye emtholampilo.Uma bebe nezinkinga kufanele bathinte i-Unilever SA ngokushayela iConsumer Careline ku-0860 331 441 noma bathumele uWhatsApp kwi-Consumer Engagement Centre ku +27 67 429 7040.“Siyinkampani ekholwa wukuthi ukudla kufanele kunambitheke, kube nempilo futhi kube mnandi emakhasimendeni ethu. Ngesikhathi sithola ukuthi kunezithako ezingabhaliwe phansi kulo mkhiqizo, sinqume ukushesha sisilungise isimo. Sizibophezele ukuthi izinga lomkhiqizo lihlale liphezulu ukuze amakhasimende ethu ajabulele ukudla okumnandi, akuthembayo. Siyaxolisa ngokuphazamiseka okuzodalwa yilesi simo, siyabonga ngokusibekezelela nokuseseka,” kusho uNksz Janine Van Rooyen, wakwa-Unilever, oyiNutrition Lead Southern Africa.

IZODLIWA yizembe imeya, uNksz Lindile Nhaca, njengoba ubuholi be-ANC KwaZulu-Natal sebuqale izinhlelo zokwenza izinguquko ebuholini obuphezulu bomkhandlu.Isinqumo sokwenza izinguquko ebuholini bomkhandlu sithathwe emhlanganweni wesigungu esiphezulu kwi-ANC KwaZulu-Natal.Unobhala we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Bheki Mtolo, uthe izinguquko zizothinta ubuholi obuphezulu bomkhandlu obaziwa nge-troika. I-troika kuba imeya, iphini lemeya nosomlomo.Usomlomo womkhandlu uNkk Dolly Govender, kanti iphini lemeya lona alikaze likhethwe kusukela kwashona uMnuz Thulani “Mbazo” Ntuli, ngonyaka owedlule.Imihlangano yokuzama ukukhetha ozongena esikhundleni sephini lemeya yabhuntsha ngenxa yokungavumelani kwamakhansela e-ANC.Isigungu esiphezulu kwi-ANC KwaZulu-Natal sithatha lesi sinqumo nje uNksz Nhaca ubevele esehleli ngesinqe esisodwa.Ngenyanga eyedlule kwaputshuka inkulumo kaMtolo, lapho ayethi khona kufanele uNksz Nhaca asuswe esikhundleni bese kufakwa elinye ikhansela le-ANC, uMnuz Njabulo Cele.Izolo uMtolo akazange afune ukudalula amagama abazokhishwa nabazongena ezikhundleni.UMtolo uthe bakhethe ukwenza izinguquko ngoba befuna ukubuyisa uzinzo kulo mkhandlu.“Kubalulekile kakhulu ukuthi njengoba sibheke okhethweni lohulumeni basekhaya lwango-2026, siqinisekise ukuthi kunozinzo kuyo yonke imikhandlu ephethwe i-ANC. Sizokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi sibuyisa isithunzi se-ANC, siphinde sihambise izidingo.”UMtolo uthe bazophinde benze izinguquko nasemakomitini omkhandlu.“Uhlelo lokwenza izinguquko kuMasipala waKwaDukuza sizolwenza ngokuvumelana nehhovisi likanobhala jikelele (uMnuz Fikile Mbalula). Uma sesivumelene nehhovisi likanobhala jikelele, sizobe sesiqhubeka nezinguquko ngokubambisana nobuholi be-ANC esifundeni iGeneral Gizenga Mpanza. Ubuholi besifunda buzokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi akubi khona zihibe ngesikhathi kwenziwa izinguquko.”UMtolo uveze ukuthi i-ANC izophuma umkhankaso wokufuna amaqembu ezobambisana nawo komasipala baKwaZulu-Natal okungekho qembu elaphumelela ngamalengiso.I-ANC ibikade ibambisene ne-EFF komasipala abaningi baKwaZulu-Natal.Umshado we-ANC ne-EFF usuchithekile komasipala baKwaZulu-Natal abaningi, futhi i-ANC isinabangani abasha KwaZulu-Natal, i-IFP, DA, neNFP, ababusa nabo ngokubambisana isifundazwe.UMtolo uthe bazimisele ngokubambisana namanye amaqembu komasipala ukuze kuzokuba nozinzo.Loku bambisana kwabo sekuqalile ukubonakala kuMasipala waseThekwini, lapho ikhansela le-IFP, uMnuz Mdu Nkosi, eqokelwe kwesikasihlalo wekomiti elibhekelele amanzi nogesi.I-ANC isaxoxa neDA kulo mkhandlu, uma izingxoxo ziphumelela, iDA izothola ikomiti elibhekelele ukuhlaliswa kwabantu.UMtolo uthe kuphelile obekubahlanganise ne-EFF.“Kunzima ukusebenza nala bantu ngoba balala bephenduka. Ngeke ubathembe, bafana nesimo sezulu.”

IKAPAKELE nasePhalamende eyokusebenzisana kwamaqembu ahlukene kuhulumeni wobumbano njengoba osihlalo bamakomiti bepikwe kulawa maqembu futhi bakhethwa ngaphandle kokuphikiswa. Abanye ababengamaphini ongqongqoshe, bakhethelwe ekubeni osihlalo bamakomiti ePhalamende.Ukwehla kokwesekwa kwe-ANC okhethweni obelungoMeyi nonyaka, kwenze abanye abaholi bangakhethelwa ezikhundleni zongqongqoshe namaphini oNgqongqoshe ngenxa yokuthi uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, bekumele apike abaholi bamanye amaqembu kwiKhabhinethi yakhe.Umholi weRise Mzansi, uMnuz Songezo Zibi, ukhethwe ngo-elethu esikhundleni sikasihlalo wekomiti elibhekele ukusebenza kwemali yomphakathi iScopa.Leli komiti yilona elihlola kabanzi ukusebenza kwemali kahulumeni eminyangweni ehlukene.UZibi oke waba ngumhleli wephephandaba, wesekwe yi-ANC kanjalo ne-DA kwesikasihlalo weScopa.Iqembu lakhe liveze ukuthi iScopa isinomholi omusha.“Uzosebenzisana nabantu bakuleli ukuqinisekisa ukuthi imali yomphakathi isetshenziswa ngendlela. Uzovikela imali yomphakathi ngaphandle kokwesaba nokwenzelela,” kusho iRise Mzansi.UDkt Sibogiseni Dhlomo obeyiphini likangqongqoshe wezeMpilo ukhethelwe kwesokuba ngusihlalo wekomiti lezeMpilo ePhalamende.Owayeyinhloko yezokuxhumana kwi-ANC, uNksz Khusela Diko, uqokelwe kwesikasihlalo ekomitini lezokuXhumana nobuChwepheshe.Owayengungqongqoshe wezokuThutha, uMnuz Joseph Maswanganyi, uqokelwe kwesikasihlalo wekomiti lezeziMali.Abaholi okubalwa uMnuz Supra Obakeng Mahumapelo, uqokelwe kwesikasihlalo wekomiti lezobuDlelwano bamaZwe oMhlaba nokuBambisana.Umholi weBosa, uMnuz Mmusi Maimane, uqokelwe kwesikasihlalo weStanding Committee on Appropriations.Oke waba yimeya yaseKurhuleni, uMnuz Mzwandile Masina, uqokelwe kwesikasihlalo wekomiti lezoHwebo, iziMboni nokuNcintisana.Owayengumxhumanisi wethimba lesikhashana le-ANC Youth League, uNksz Joy Maimela, uqokelwe kwesikasihlalo wekomiti leMfundo eyisiSekelo. Owayengungqongqoshe wezemiDlalo, ubuCiko namaSiko uMnuz Zizi Kodwa, uyilungu lekomiti leMfundo ePhakeme.UKodwa wazihoxela kulesi sikhundla njengoba ebhekene necala lenkohlakalo.

UPHIKO lwezokushushisa kuleli iNational Prosecuting Authority (NPA), lumile ekutheni uSomlomo wePhalamende osahlabe ikhefu uNkk Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula, ekugcineni kumele avele njengawo wonke umuntu enkantolo ngoba umthetho awunasikhundla.Ummeli weNPA u-Advocate Makhosi Gwala, uthe abakwazi ukuthi banganqunyelwa ngumsolwa ngendlela okumele benze ngayo izinto.Uthe uma bengase bavumele ukuthi umuntu ongumsolwa abatshele ukuthi ufuna ukuvela nini enkantolo, kusho ukuthi umthetho uyothathwa njengento engekho.Uveze ibanga abalihambile bezama ukunxenxa uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula ukuthi avele enkantolo ngezinsolo zenkohlakalo.“Saqala ukuxhumana naye ngoMashi 8, simazisa ukuthi sekuphume isinqumo sokuthi ashushiswe.“Asikaze simsabise ngokumbopha, okunalokho samnxusa ukuthi azinikele yena emaphoyiseni ehamba nabameli bakhe. Iyona ndlela elandelwayo le ngokomthetho,” kusho u-Advocate Gwala. Ukusho lokhu izolo ngesikhathi kudingidwa amaphuzu enkantolo enkulu ePitoli ngesicelo esiphuthumayo asifakile esivimba ukuthi aboshwe.UGwala uthe ukushushiswa kukaNkk Mapisa-Nqakula, akuphambene nomthetho.“Asikwazi ukuthi singavumela umsolwa ukuthi asitshele indlela okumele ashushiswe ngayo. Umthetho awazi sikhundla, wonke umuntu uyalingana ngaphambi kwawo.” Uveze nokuthi akuphuthumi ukuthi umsolwa angathola idokodo ngaphambi kokubekwa amacala ngokusemthethweni.UGwala uthe imigomo yeNPA ayikwazi ukuthi ingancika esikhundleni somuntu ongumsolwa.UNkk Mapisa-Nqakula usolwa ngokwamukela intshontsho komunye wosonkontileka owayethola amathenda eMnyangweni wezokuVikela ngesikhathi esanguNgqongqoshe wawo.Kuthiwa wamukela imali engukheshi ebalelwa ngaphezu kukaR2 million, izikhawu ezahlukene. Okunye okuthiwa wagwazelwa ngakho i-wigi kanjalo nezinye izinto. Ubhekene namacala angu-12 enkohlakalo efinyelela kuR4 million, okufaka nelokushushumbisa imali. Ummeli kaNkk Mapisa-Nqakula u-Advocate Reg Willis SC, uthe kwakungekho emthethweni ukuseshwa komuzi kaSomlomo ngeledlule ngoba nommeli wakhe wayengekho. Uthe uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula unamalungelo njengawo wonke umuntu wathi kodwa yena uyahlonishwa uma eqhathanisa nabanye abantu. “Sifake amaphepha enkantolo ngoba sifuna ukuvimba ukuboshwa kwakhe, kuze kuphume isinqumo kanjalo nokuthi anikwe idokodo,” kusho uWilllis  .Usole umbuso ngokuputshuza izitatimende zofakazi okwenze uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula waba ngumsolwa.Unxuse ijaji ukuthi uma libachitha esicelweni sabo kodwa libanike isivikelo sokuthi angaboshwa uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula kuze kukhishwe isinqumo.Ijaji Sulet Potterill lisigodlile isinqumo kuleli cala, lizoze lisikhiphe  ngoLwesibili oluzayo. Livumile ukuthi uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula angaboshwa kuze kukhishwe lesi sinqumo.

UMENGAMELI we-ANC Youth League (ANCYL), uMnuz Collen Malatji uthi into eyenza i-ANC ithwale kanzima esifundazweni iKwaZulu-Natal wukuthi abantu bakhona bavota ngokobuhlanga.UMalatji uthe ukuvota kwabantu baKwaZulu-Natal ngokobuhlanga kwenza ukuthi i-ANC yenze kahle kulesifundazwe ngesikhathi isaholwa owayenguMengameli, uJacob Zuma ongowaKwaZulu-Natal.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma kwisithangami nabezindaba.Uthe wumkhuba omdala lona wokuvota ngokobuhlanga KwaZulu-Natal.“Lomkhuba wawuvele ukhona nangaphambi kokhetho lwango-1994. Uma ubuka indlela abavota ngayo abantu baKwaZulu-Natal, uzokuqaphela ukuthi kwenyuka ukwesekwa kwe-ANC ngesikhathi iholwa ilona waseNkandla, kwase kuyehla ngesikhathi sekuphethe uMengameli uRamaphosa (Cyril). Lena indlela abantu baKwaZulu-Natal abavota ngayo.”“Ingcabha isele kubaholi ukuba bafundise abantu baKwaZulu-Natal ngepolitiki.“Kufanele batshelwe ukuthi lapha asakhi amaqoqo ezinhlanga ezithile, kodwa sakha izwe. Sifuna izwe elihlanganisa bonke abantu,” kusho uMalatji.Ngonyaka owedlule i-ANC yajuba abaholi bayo abaqavile baKwaZulu-Natal, okukhona kubo uDkt Zweli Mkhize, Dkt Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma, oMnuz Sihle Zikalala, Senzo Mchunu noMike Mabuyakhulu ukuba bazoqinisa umkhankaso wokhetho.UMalatji uthe banethemba lokuthi bazokwazi ukunqoba iKwaZulu-Natal.“Sisanda kujuba izingwevu eziqhamuka KwaZulu-Natal ukuba ziyokhankasa. Umkhankaso wethu uhamba kahle kakhulu, kufanele sisebenze kanzima kule ndawo. “Silahlekelwe inqwaba yomasipala KwaZulu-Natal ngesikhathi kunokhetho lohulumeni basekhaya olwedlule. “Nathi kufanele sizinuke amakhwapha ngokulahlekelwa eminye yalemikhandlu. Abanye abantu esabajuba kulemikhandlu babelele emisebenzini, babengazihambisi izidingo kubantu.“Abantu ngeke baqhubeke nokuvotela abantu abangabasizi ngalutho. I-ANC kufanele ijube abantu abazimisele ngokwenza umsebenzi,” esho.Uthe bazoqhubeka nokulwela abantu abasha kanti ukunqumela kwabo ongqongqoshe abahlukene ugwayi katiki, sekuqalile ukwenza umehluko.Ubalule kakhulu uNgqongqoshe wezabaSebenzi, uMnuz Thulasi Nxesi noweMfundo ePhakeme, uDkt Blade Nzimande.Uthe selokhu banqumela uNxesi ugwayi katiki, umnyango usuqalile ukudala amathuba emisebenzi.Uveze nokuthi kusizile nokuhlangabezana kukaNzimande nezimfuno zabo zokuhlakazwa kwebhodi lesikhwama esixhasa abafundi ngemali ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme, iNsfas.Uphethe ngokuthi kuyabajabulisa nokuthi sekuyophela inyanga ugesi ungacishwa.

KUZOPHELA ukulinda amalayisensi okushayela umlibe njengoba iNingizimu Afrika isizoba nomshini omusha wokuwashicilela.Lezi zindaba zimenyezelwe wuNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha uNkk Sindisiwe Chikunga kuleli sonto.“Izinhlelo zokuthenga umshini omusha wokushicilela amalayisensi okushayela sezizophothulwa. Silindele ukuthi uma kuphela le nyanga ube usukhona.“Uzoqale uhlolwe ukuthi usebenza kahle yini  lomshini olandwe eFrance,” kuchaza uNkk Chikunga.Uthe bazobe sebeshicilela amalayisensi amasha kule nyanga njengoba bezimisele ukuthi umshini omusha uqale ushicilele amalayisensi awu-100 kwisifundazwe ngasinye.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi ukushicilelwa kwamalayisensi bekubambezeleka ngenxa yokuthi umshini wokuwashicilela ubufa njalo.Lo mshini wawuthengwe eGermany ngo-1998, ubuthi uma ufile kume ukushicilelwa kwamalayisensi, kwazise izipele zokuwulungisa bezilandwa eGermany.Ngonyaka odlule uMnyango wezokuThutha wabika ukuthi awu-350 000 amalayisensi alinde ukushicilelwa njengoba umshini ubufa njalo.UMnuz Fikile Mbalula owayenguNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha waveza ukuthi izinsimbi zokuwulungisa azikho kuleli futhi naseGermany abasalusebenzisi lolu hlobo lomshini ukushicilela amalayisensi.Yikhona lokhu okwenza ukuthi uNkk Chikunga anqume ukuthenga umshini omusha wokushicilela amalayisensi.Uveze ukuthi amalayisensi amasha azohluka kakhulu kwamadala njengoba ezokwazi ukusebenza nakwamanye amazwe.

UFAKAZI wabamangalelwa ecaleni lokufa kukaSenzo Meyiwa, uthe amaphoyisa aphikisana aze aqembukelana phakathi ngabantu okwakufanele baboshwe kuleli cala.  Ufakazi uWarrant Officer Meshack Makhubo, uveze ukuthi yayimagwala mabili ethimbeni lamaphoyisa isimo sishubile kuphikiswana ngokwakufanele baboshwe.Kushushiswa amadoda amahlanu okusolwa ukuthi yiwona aphuma inqina amkakisa okwenyamazane uMeyiwa amusa kwagoqanyawo.UMbuso umi ngezitatimende okuthiwa zasayinwa abamangalelwa, begonyuluka emaphoyiseni badalula nobasi wabo owabanika itoho lokuqeda ngoMeyiwa. Abamangalelwa bathi bazisayina izitatimende ngoba base bevuthiwe yisibhaxu samaphoyisa.UMakhubu osophikweni loKlebe, uthe baqokwa kuleli cala baba yithimba elikhethekile labaphenyi abane. Uthe ngesikhathi bephenya kwacaca ukuthi bayehlukana ngemibono.Uthe behlukana kwaba khona abahamba nedokodo lokuqala elingu-636/10/2014 bese kuba nethimba ledokodo u375/1/2019 elalikhomba abanye abasolwa abehlukile.“ Mina noColonel Buthelezi sagcina sikhishwa ngoba sasinombono ohlukile, yingakho singatshelwanga ngesikhathi sekuboshwa abasolwa. Idokodo lethu salihambisa kuMshushisi uBaloyi noBrigadier Gininda wahambisa elakhe idokodo,’’ kusho uMakhubo.Uthe kuze kube manje akaze ayithole incwadi emazisa ukuthi wahoxiswa kuleli cala. UMakhubo uthe yena unawo womabili amadokodo ecala.UMshushisi woMbuso u-Advocate George Baloyi, uthe ubufakazi bukaMakhubo abunasidingo kulesi sigaba secala wacela ukuthi buchithwe bunganakwa.Udaba lwamadokodo amabili kuleli cala likaMeyiwa lubangwe kakhulu phambilini futhi abezokushushisa baqinisekisa ukuthi akhona womabili. Abezokushushisa bathi bafuna kulindwe kuqedwe ngecala eliqhubekayo kuzwakale umphumela walo bese kubhekwa leli elinye.Kwake kwavela ukuthi idokodo lesibili likhomba ukuthi kufanele kuboshwe abantu ababesendlini ngesikhathi kubulawa uMeyiwa. Idokodo lesibili liveza ukuthi azikho izigebengu ezangena kodwa uMeyiwa wabulawa wumuntu owayesendlini.Kulindeleke ukuthi icala libuyele enkanatolo namuhla kuqhubeke izethulo zokugoqa ubufakazi bokuthi inkantolo yamukele noma ichithe izitatimende zokuvuma icala okuthiwa zenziwa ummangalelwa wokuqala nowesibili.

UPHINDE wahlangabezana nenye ingqinamba yezomthetho loyo owayengumengameli, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, emzamweni wakhe wokuzishushisela mathupha uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa.INkantolo yokuDluliswa kwamaCala ichithe omunye umzamo kaZuma wokuphonsela inselelo isinqumo seNkantolo eNkulu eGoli, esachitha icala lapho ezishushisela khona uRamaphosa.Ummeli kaZuma, u-Advocate Dali Mpofu, uveze ukuthi iNkantolo yokuDluliswa  kwamaCala iphinde yabachitha.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi kuhleli icala eNkantolo eNkulu eGoli.INkantolo eNkulu eGoli yalichitha icala elifakwe uZuma, ikhala ngokuthi isitifiketi esasisetshenziswa uZuma sasinengenalo igama likaRamaphosa.Amajaji ayelalele icala athola ukuthi uZuma wehluleka ukukhokha ngesikhathi imali yesibambiso aphinde anquma ukuthi izinsolo zikaZuma zazingeke ziholele ekutheni uRamaphosa agwetshwe.UZuma wabe esenikela eNkantolo yokuDluliswa kwamaCala, yamchitha, njengoba isiphinde yamchitha futhi.UMpofu utshele inkantolo ukuthi njengoba iNkantolo yokuDluliswa kwamaCala isiphinde yabachitha, sebezonikela eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo.Ukuqhubeka kwecala ebeliseNkantolo eNkulu eGoli izolo, kuzoncika esinqumweni seNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo.UMpofu ucele ukuthi icala ebelilalelwe izolo lihlehliselwe uFebhuwari 6.“Sekuyinto eyejwayelekile ukuthi sicele ukuthi icala lihlehliswe ngoba sisuke sisalinde izinqumo ezithile. Sinethemba lokuthi kuyothi kushaya uFebhuwari, iNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo, iyokube isisikhiphile isinqumo sayo.”UZuma ushushisa uRamaphosa njengengxenye yecala lapho eyezishushisela khona umshushisi omkhulu ecaleni lakhe lenkohlakalo nokukhwabanisa, u-Advocate Billy Downer nentatheli yeziko lezindaba elibika ngesiNgisi.UZuma usola uRamaphosa ngokungathathi zinyathelo ngesikhathi embikela ngokwephula umthetho kukaDowner abemshushisela izinsolo zokuputshuzela intatheli ulwazi oluyimfihlo ngempilo yakhe.Nalo icala lapho uZuma eshushisa uDowner nentatheli, lachithwa yiNkantolo eNkulu eMgungundlovu.UZuma ubezifikele amathupha enkantolo izolo.Akazange akhulume namalungu e-MK abezomeseka enkantolo.Nangeledlule, uZuma akazange akhulume namalungu e-MK ayezothamela icala lombango wophawu elafakwa i-ANC eNkantolo eNkulu eThekwini.Okhulumela inhlangano kaZuma engenzi nzuzo, iJacob G Zuma Foundation, uMnuz Mzwanele Manyi, uthe uZuma uzimisele ngokushushisa uRamaphosa.Ugxeke isinqumo sikaRamaphosa sokuphonsela inselelo ukushushiswa kwakhe, wathi sibambezela ukuqulwa kwecala.

ZIPHINDE zamtinyela  uMnuz Jabulani Khumalo inkantolo ikhipha isinqumo sokuthi igama lakhe likhishwe ohlwini lwabantu abanelungelo lokusayina izinto eziphathelene naleli qembu ebhange.INkantolo eNkulu yaseNorth Gauteng, ePitoli iyalele i-Standard Bank ukuba imkhiphe njengomuntu osayinayo kwi-akhawunti yasebhange ye-MK Party.UKhumalo ubefuna ukuqhubeka nokusayina izinto zaleli qembu, ethola iminikelo, ngenxa yokuthi wayekhalaza ngokuxoshwa kwakhe yiqembu eliholwa nguMnuz Jacob Zuma.Ngaphezu kwalokho, inkantolo imyalele ukuthi akhokhele izindleko zaleli cala.IMK Party ikhiphe isitatimende iveza ukuthi iyasamukela isinqumo senkantolo. Ithi izoqhubeka nokulwa noKhumalo nalabo abamesekayo abazama ukuphazamisa leli qembu. Lithi kuyacaca ukuthi kukhona abafaka uKhumalo imali ephaketheni njengoba ephilela ukukhokhela izindleko zenkantolo futhi bayayamukela iminikelo ye-ANC efika ngezandla zabathile njengoba beqhubeka nokwakha iqembu.Leli qembu lisho lokhu kuvela ukuthi uKhumalo uneminikelo abeyamukela ebhange laleli qembu.Owayengumphathiwe wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, osengu-Advocate enkantolo eNkulu eMgungundluvu, uAdv Kwazi Mshengu, unikele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana esola uKhumalo ngokungabi nawo umndeni.“Angikholwa ukuthi uJabulani Khumalo unomndeni, ngoba bewuzomhlalisa phansi unxuse ukuba ayeke lento. Ezinye izinto azidingi ukungenelela kosopolitiki kodwa, umndeni,” kubhala yena.

SEKUPHINDE kwaqubuka enye impi yamazwi kubaholi bamaqembu akuhulumeni wokubambisana, unobhala jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, nosihlalo woMkhandlu weDA, uNkk Helen Zille.UMbalula useveze ukuthi uNkk Zille abamncengile ukuthi ahlale kuhulumeni wokubambisana, wathi angaphuma uma engasathandi ukuhlala.UMbalula ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ebuzwa ngenkulumo kaNkk Zille esabalale ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, lapho uNkk Zille ezwakala ethi awukho uhulumeni wokubambisana eNingizimu Afrika, wathi izwe liphethwe i-ANC neDA.Kwi-video esabalale ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, uNkk Zille uzwakala ethi i-DA ne-ANC bavumelana ngokuthi babuse ngokubambisana.Uthe uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, uyena-ke owabe eseshintsha ethi kuzoba nohulumeni wokubambisana ngoba efuna ukuthi amalungu e-ANC asheshe amukele ukubambisana kwala maqembu.Kule nkulumo uNkk Zille uphinde azwakale ethi inhloso yabo ukuthi i-ANC igcine iphumile emandleni.UMbalula uthe bona bazi ukuthi izwe liphethwe uhulumeni wokubambisana.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma nabezindaba ngaphambi kokuqala komhlangano wesigungu esiphezulu wezinsuku eziyisithupha. UMbalula uthe uhulumeni wokubambisana uholwa i-ANC ngoba yathola amavoti amaningi okhethweni.“Asincengi muntu lapha kuhulumeni wokubambisana,abafuna ukuhamba, abahambe. Naye uZille uma efuna ukuhamba, akahambe. Iqiniso ukuthi alikho iqembu elanqoba ukhetho ngamalengiso. Abantu bathi bafuna ukuthi kube nohulumeni wobumbano. Asikho ke isidingo sokuthi silokhu sikhohlisana, sikhuluma izinto ezingekho.”Akusikhona okokuqala la baholi begejana ngenxa kahulumeni wokubambisana.Kuke kwaba kubi laba baholi bebanga ukujoyina kwePA, uNkk Zille wayekhala ngokuthi i-ANC ayizange ibonisane nabo ngaphambi kokuthi ivumele iPA ukuthi ijoyine uhulumeni wokubambisana.UMbalula uthe iDA iyazifanela nje nawo wonke amaqembu aphikisayo, wathi inhloso yayo ukukhipha i-ANC emandleni.Ekhuluma ngomhlangano wesigungu esiphezulu wezinsuku eziyisithupha oqale izolo, uMbalula uthe bazoxoxa kabanzi ngemiphumela yokhetho baphinde baqhamuke nomhlahlandlela.I-ANC ayizange yenze kahle okhethweni lwangoMeyi njengoba yathola ngaphansi kuka-50%.UMbalula uthe kufanele baqhamuke namasu azokwenza ukuthi induku ebashayile ingabaphindi okhethweni lohulumeni basekhaya oluzoba ngo-2026.

KUSADLA lubi ukufunwa ucansi kwezitshudeni ukuze zigixabezwe ngamamaki, ukuhlukunyezwa ngokocansi ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme kanjalo nodlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane nokushaywa indiva kwemigomo yezokulingana kwabesilisa nabesifazane.Lezi ngezinye zezinto ezigqame emhlanganweni wekomiti lemfundo ePhakeme ePhalamende izolo, ebelithola umbiko kwiKhomishini yezokuLingana ngokobulili nebanga eselihanjiwe ukufukula abesifazane kulezi zikhungo. Usihlalo wekomiti uMnuz Tebogo Letsie, uhlabe ikhwelo lokuthi zivikelwe izitshudeni zesifazane ezisafunwa ucansi ukuze zithole amamaki. Ukhale ngesihlava sokuhlukunyezwa kwezitshudeni zesifazane athe kumele kuqedwe ngaso.“Izikhungo zemfundo yilapho izitshudeni okumele zizizwe ziphephile khona, noma kuthiwa zihlala ngaphandle noma zihlala ngaphakathi. Iyakhathaza eyokufunwa ucansi kwezitshudeni ukuze zithole amamaki.”UMnuz Tsietsi Shuping obhekele ezomthetho kwikhomishini, uthe izikhungo kumele ziyilandele imigomo ebekiwe ethinta ukulingana ngakwezobulili, ziqinisekise ukuthi izitshudeni ziphephile.Uthe ezinye zezikhungo zibhekene nezinselelo ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi le migomo iyalandelwa.“Ezinye zezikhungo aziyilandeli imigomo ethinta ukulingana ngokobulili, kusagcwele isiqhoqho samadoda ezikhundleni eziphezulu. Nemigomo ethinta ukufukula abaphila nokukhubazeka nabathandana nobulili obufanayo ishaywa indiva ezikhungweni.”Uthe ezinye zezikhungo azifuni ukubuyekeza imigomo ethinta ukuhlukunyezwa ngokocansi ukuze ihambisane nemigomo ethinta ukuqasha.Umqondisi jikelele eMnyangweni weMfundo ePhakeme, uDkt Nkosinathi Sishi, uthe bazoqinisekisa ukuthi umbiko wekhomishini izikhungo ziyawulandela.Uthe imigomo ekhona okubalwa eyokulwa nesihlava sokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane, ihlose ukuqeda ngale nkinga ezikhungweni zemfundo.IPhini likaNgqongqoshe walo mnyango, uDkt Mimmy Gondwe, lithe izikhungo kumele kube yizindawo eziphephile kwizitshudeni.UDkt Gondwe uthe yizinto abazibeke eqhulwini bengumnyango ukulwa nesihlava sokuhlukunyezwa kwezitshudeni ezikhungweni.Owayengungqongqoshe walo mnyango, uDkt Blade Nzimande, wakhipha umbiko wethimba elaliluleka ngezithinta amacala okuhlukumeza ngokocansi kanjalo nodlame olubhekiswe kwizitshudeni ezikhungweni.Leli thimba laphakamisa ukuthi kube nendawo lapho kuzoqoshwa khona amagama alabo abalahlwe amacala okuhlukumeza ngokocansi nawodlame ukuze kungathi uma sebexoshwe esikhungweni esithile, bavumbuke kwesinye isikhungo.

LIZOPHAKAMISA esigungwini esiphezulu se-ANC ikomiti lezobuqotho kule nhlangano, ngezinyathelo okumele athathelwe zona uNgqongqoshe wezobuLungiswa nokuThuthukiswa koMthethosisekelo uNksz Thembi Simelane, ngezinsolo zokuthi wahlomula ebhange eselawa iVBS Mutual. Lokhu kushiwo nguNobhala jikelele we-ANC uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, otshele abezindaba ukuthi nakuba sebewutholile umbiko kuNksz Simelane, kodwa kusamele ayovela phambi kwekomiti lezobuqotho elizophakamisa esigungwini esiphezulu ngokumele kwenzeke ngaye.Usho kanje nje iyaqonga ingcindezi nokuxokozela ukuthi kumele ashenxea kulesi sikhundla kuze kuphothulwe uphenyo.Mayelana nesikhundla sakhe kuhulumeni, ulinde uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, ojutshwe nguyena kulo mnyango.UMbalula uthe bazozamukela iziphakamiso zesigungu esiphezulu.“Yisona esizosho ukuthi kumele simyeke aqhubeke nempilo noma kwenziwe okuthile ngaye. Sizolandela yonke imigomo ekhona kanti ngasohlangothini lukahulumeni, umengameli ozonquma ngekusasa lakhe.”UNksz Simelane ugeqe amagula ePhalamende ngeledlule lapho ekhiphe ingonyuluka ngemali engu-R575 600, ayiboleka kuleli bhange. Uveze ukuthi le mali wayikhokha isinenzalo wathi akayibolekanga ebhange iVBS ngqo, kodwa wayiboleka enkampanini iGundo Wealth Solutions kanti wathenga ngayo indawo edayisa ikhofi eSandton.Ubalule ukuthi le nkampani yayisebenzisana nebhange iVBS njengoba uMasipala wasePolokwane ayeyimeya kuwona, wawunobudlelwano nale nkampani.“Ngaboleka le mali ngoba ngangifuna ukuthi ngithole umholo uma sekuphele itoho kuhulumeni. Ngafuna iseluleko enkampanini iGundo ukuze ngifeze leli phupho, yangazisa ukuthi ingakwazi ukungisiza. Ngayikhokha le mali izikhawu ezintathu, ngayibuyisa nenzalo isingu-R800 000 ngayifaka kwi-akhawunti yeGundo, angikaze ngiboleke imali ngqo kwiVBS,” kusho uNksz Simelane.I-ActionSA ne-DA bamfuna ehlile esikhundleni uNksz Simelane.Umholi we-Action SA ePhalamende uMnuz Athol Trollip, uthe ubhalele uSomlomo wePhalamende noSihlalo wekomiti lezobuLungiswa befuna kube nophenyo oluzimele mayelana nokuthi ngeke angenele ophikweni lwezokushushisa iNPA, uma isishushisa abathinteka odabeni lweVBS, njengoba ingaphansi komnyango wakhe.Ufuna umengameli asheshe angenele amumise emsebenzini kuze kuphothulwe uphenyo.UNksz Simelane uthembise amalungu ePhalamende ukuthi ngeke angenele ekusebenzeni kweNPA kulolu daba.

UMXAZULULI wezinkinga zezimpesheni, uNksz Muvhango Lukhaimane, uyalele isikhwama sempesheni yabasebenzi bomasipala ukuthi sikhokhele umsebenzi uR800 000 owakhokhelwa omunye umuntu ngesikhathi lo msebenzi esaboshiwe.UNksz Lukhaimane, oyiPension Funds Adjudicator, uthe kubalulekile ukuthi izikhwama zempesheni zikhokhe imali kubantu abafanele ukugwema ukuqolwa yizigebengu.Uyalele iMunicipal Gratuity Fund ukuba inikeze lo msebenzi, owayeqashwe yinkampani ebhekelele ezemfucuza kuMasipala waseGoli, iPikitUp, uR800 000 nenzalo yakhona eyanikwa umuntu ongafanele.Lo msebenzi, okungacaci ukuthi wayeboshelweni, wafaka icala ehhovisi likaNksz Lukhaimane ekhala ngokuthi emuva kokuboshwa ngo-2016 wathola ukuthi imali yakhe yempesheni ewu-R810 413.07 yakhokhelwa umuntu ongafanele ngoSepthemba ka-2018.Uthe wayesejele ngesikhathi imali ikhishwa futhi uma esephumile uthole ukuthi kunesitatimende somkokotelo okwathiwa uvuma kuso ukuthi imali uyayifuna, kwathunyelwa namafomu anamaphutha kwathiwa yiwona ayegunyaza isikhwama ukuba sikhiphe imali.Uthe isitatimende esifungelwe sasingenaso nesigxivizo futhi singasayiniwe, okubeka obala ukuthi sasiwumkokotelo.UNksz Lukhaimane uthe lesi sikhwama sakhokha imali yize kwakucaca ukuthi kunenkohlakalo eqhubekayo.Ubalule ukuthi ngoFebhuwari ka-2016 ngesikhathi isikhwama sicela ikhophi kamazisi womsebenzi egxiviziwe, umqashi wathi ngeke akwazi ukuyikhipha ngenxa yokuthi usejele.Uthe ngisho ngoJuni 22 ka-2018 isikhwama sempesheni saqinisekisa ukuthi usesejele kodwa saqhubeka nokukhuluma nesigebengu esasizenza lo msebenzi nge-email.Umsebenzi uthe isikhwama sempesheni sakhokha sibe sazi kahle ukuthi usejele, akakwazi ukuxhumana nabantu nge-email.Isikhwama sithe sona sathola isaziso sakuqinisekisa ukuthi i-akhawunti okufakwa kuyo imali ngeyomsebenzi sase sidedela imali ngoSepthemba ka-2018.Siveze ukuthi sithole ngoJanuwari ka-2019 sesitshelwa yiBidvest Bank ukuthi i-akhawunti okwafakwa kuyo imali ngeyamaqola antshontsha imininingwane yabantu ukuze akhwabanise imali yabo.Sithe savula necala emaphoyiseni emuva kwalesi sigameko.UNksz Lukhaimane uthe isikhwama saba budedengu ngokuthi sikhokhe imali ekubeni sitsheliwe ukuthi umuntu usejele.“Kuyacaca ukuthi isikhwama sasitsheliwe ukuthi umsebenzi usejele. Asizange siyikhiphe imali ngo-2016 njengoba umqashi wayeshilo ukuthi umnikazi wemali usejele. Kuyamangaza ukuthi asizange siyobheka ukuthi kwenzekani njengoba esefuna imali. Kuyaziwa ukuthi umuntu osejele akakwazi ukuxhumana kalula nabantu abangaphandle ngakho kuyamangaza ukuthi isikhwama sempesheni sakhokha imali singazange siqinisekise ukuthi umuntu okhokhelwayo usephumile yini ejele,” kusho uNksz Lukhaimane.Uthe ukube lesi sikhwama besingekho budedengu ngemali yabantu, bekufanele sazi ukuthi ejele awukhulumi nesiboshwa bengazi ojele futhi abantu ababoshiwe abakwazi ukuvula ama-akhawunti asebhange.Ubalule ukuthi izikhwama zempesheni zinesibophezelo sokuphatha kahle imali yabantu, singayiniki amaqola ngakho-ke kufanele sikhokhele lo msebenzi imali yakhe nenzalo yayo.

ABE-SOUTH African Weather Service (SAWS) bakhiphe isexwayiso sokuthi kuzophinde kubuye okwesibili ukukhithika okubonakale ngempelasonto edlule.OweSAWS uNkk Celeste Fourie, uthe izifundazwe ezizothinteka ikwaZulu-Natal, Free State ne-Eastern Cape kusukela ngeSonto kuya kuLwesibili. UNkk Fourie uthe yize kuzoba nalokhu kukhithika, ngeke kube kubi njengalokhu okubonakele ngempelasonto eyedlule.“Isimo sezulu esihambisana nokukhithika kulindeleke ukuthi sishintshe kakhulu njengoba amazinga okushisa ezokwehla abe ngaphansi kuka-10 degrees. Amazinga okushisa azoqala ukwehla kakhulu eWestern Cape ngeSonto. Lokhu kuzodlulela e-Eastern Cape naKwaZulu-Natal ngoMsombuluko nangoLwesibili,” kusho uNkk Fourie, othe lokhu kuzobe kuhambisana nemvula nomoya onamandla.Uqhube wathi okwamanje ngokomhlahlo wabo, abalindele ukuthi uN3 okukhona kuwo iVan Reenen’s Pass ungathikamezeka kangako.Uthe isimo sizoqala ukuba ngcono ngoLwesibili ntambama, lapho umoya obandayo uzobe usuthanda ukwehla.Uthe bazolokhu besiqaphile isimo sezulu, bese beyabazisa abantu uma kukhona okusha abakutholayo.Ubanxusile ukuthi bangahlukani nokulalela umsakazo babuke ithelevishini ukuze bathole ulwazi olufanele ngesikhathi.Uthe abangakhohlwa nawukubheka kwi-website yabo ethi www.weathersa.co.za kanjalo nasekhasini labo le-X elithi @SAWeatherServic ukuze bathole ulwazi lwakamumva ngesikhathi esifanele.

KUZOBA ukheth’ khethu okhethweni lwalo nyaka lukazwelonke njengoba engu-101 amaqembu ezepolitiki abengamelelekile ePhalamende naseziShayamthetho zezifundazwe, akwazile ukuhlangabezana nomnqamulajuqu wokungenela ukhetho.Akugcinanga ngalawa maqembu kuphela, kodwa nabangenela ukhetho ngokuzimela abazobe beqala ngqa ukuba yingxenye yalolu khetho, bangu-16 abagcine bekwazile ukungena.Lezi zibalo zivezwe yikhomishini yezokhetho i-Independent Electoral Commission (IEC), eveze ukuthi angu-115, amaqembu akwazile ukuhlangabezana nalo mnqamulajuqu nakuba kusazohlungwa kahle kubhekwe ukuthi zonke izinto azilethile.Okhulumela i-IEC, uNkk Kate Bapela, uthe amaqembu angu-14 abevele emelelekile akwazile nawo ukuhlangabezana nomnqamujuqu yingakho engu-115 amaqembu esewonke.Uveze ukuthi bangu-11 abangenela ukhetho ngokuzimela abangenele ezifundazweni.“Njengoba kuvalwe ngoLwesihlanu ukulethwa kwezimfanelo, sizocubungula ukuthi zonke izinto ebezidingeka zikhona yini. Uma kungukuthi ezinye zazo azikho, lelo qembu noma ongenela ukhetho ngokuzimela uyochithwa, angakwazi ukuba yingxenye yokhetho,” kusho uNkk Bapela. Uthe ngoMashi 22, bazokwazisa amaqembu kanjalo nalabo abangenela ngokuzimela abavela ohlwini lwamanye amaqembu.“Amaqembu azonikwa kuze kube uMashi 25, ukuthi asuse lowo muntu ovela kulonye uhlu. NgoMashi 26 no-27, ikhomishini izovula ithuba lokuthi kuhlolwe uhlu lwabantu amaqembu azobajuba ePhalamende naseziShayamthetho.” Uveze ukuthi ngo-Ephreli 10, kuzobe sekuvezwa bonke abazongenela ukhetho bese kugaywa amaphepha okuvotaMayelana nokuputshuka kohlu lwamaqembu i-ANC noMkhonto weSizwe ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku, ikhomishini ithe iyaphenya ngoba kuvela ukuthi lwaputshuka ngaphakathi kwikhomishini.Isikhulu esiphezulu sekhomishini uMnuz Sy Mamabolo, sithe bazokwehlisa nesibalo sabantu abakwazi ukubona imibiko ngaphakathi kwikhomishini ukuze kungabi nokuputshuka kweminye imibiko.Uthe yingakho bejube uphenyo ukuze bathole owenze lokhu.UMengameli we-ANC nezwe, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa, uthe nakuba uhlu luputshukile kodwa abantu abayethembe ikhomishini.Uveze ukuthi ngenxa yalokhu abantu abaqhubeke babe nethemba ekusebenzeni kwekhomishini nokuthi ukhetho kuzoba ngolukhululekile.

Ibekwe eqhulwini eyokuqeda inkemane, ukwakha amathuba emisebenzi, ukufukula umnotho nokwakha uzinzo kuhulumeni nakomasipala.Lokhu kuvezwe nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ngoLwesine ePhalamende ngesikhathi enekela isizwe umkhombandlela  wezinto ezizokwenziwa nguhulumeni wobumbano, kule minyaka emihlanu ezayo.Nakuba ezinye zezinto eseke wazisho phambilini kodwa uveze ukuthi kulokhu kuzobekwa umnqamulajuqu wokuthi zenzeka ngokushesha ngoba abantu bakhathele ukulinda. “Abantu bafuna imisebenzi, ukwenza lokho kumele sikhulise umnotho. Umnotho sizowukhulisa ngokuthi silungise omasipala bethu. Ziqalile izinhlelo zokubalungisa ikakhulu labo abakhulu abangamaMetro, njengaseThekwini lapho sijube khona ithimba elilungisa izinto. Sifuna iTheku libuyelwe isithunzi elalinaso ngoba akumele idolobha elikhulu kangaka libe esimeni elikuso manje,” kusho uRamaphosa.Uthe komasipala kumele kufakwe abantu abazi umsebenzi, kulungiswe ingqalasizinda nezinkinga ezithinta amanzi nokuthuthwa kwendle.Uveze ukuthi bazogxila nasekubhekeni ukudla okungeke kusafakwa intela ukuze baqede indlala.“Indaba yokubiza kukaphethroli yinto esizoyibheka ukuze abantu bangashayeki kakhulu ephaketheni. Sizoxoxa njengohulumeni wobumbano sibheke ukuthi ikuphi ukudla okumele kungafakwa intela ukuze kwehle inkinga yobubha.” Ubalule nendaba yemisebenzi wathi bafuna abatshali bezimali bafake imali futhi benza nemizamo yokuthi behlise imali ekhokhelwa isikweletu sezwe.“Sakhe amathuba emisebenzi eyevile ku-2 million, ohlelweni lukamengameli lokuzama ukulwa nalesi sihlava. Izikole ezingu-25 000 zihlomule ngabasizi bothisha. Uma sibambisene sizosiqeda isihlava sokungasebenzi,” kusho uRamaphosa.Ubalule nokuthi bazobiza umhlangano ozohlanganisa zonke izinhlaka, nabantu bakuleli kubhungwe ngezinto ezithinta izwe.URamaphosa wehlise amaphaphu kwabacabanga ukuthi kuzogqabuka igoda phakathi kwamaqembu abambisene kuhulumeni.“Singamaqembu angu-10 kuhulumeni wokubambisana.
