Kumnandi ukuxoxa nabaholi bala maqembu. Awuyi ndawo lo hulumeni. Sinezinto esingaboni ngaso linye kuzona, kodwa kweziningi zazo sibona ngeso elilodwa. Kudingeka ukuthi sisebenzisane,” kusho uRamaphosa.Uthe basazohlangana neKhabhinethi bakhe izinhlelo ezizohambisana nesabelomali sezwe.“Sizoqhubeka sivikele abasebenzi, senze izimo zokusebenza zibe sesimeni. Sizoqhubeka nezinhlelo zokuvikela imigomo ethinta ukuthuthukiswa kosomabhizinisi abamnyama. Sizobaseka osomabhizinisi abancane ukuze bakhe amathuba emisebenzi.” Uthe bayaqhubeka neyomshwalense wezempilo iNational Health Insurance, bakhe amagumbi okufundela ezikoleni, baqeqeshe abahlengikazi, baqinise emkhakheni we-ECD kwezemfundo, baphinde balungise inkinga yamanzi.“Sifuna izwe likwazi ukuzikhiqizela izinto. Asifuni ukuthi kube nezinto ezizoyiswa kwamanye amazwe zibuye sezibiza kakhulu uma sezibuya kula mazwe.”Uthe bafuna sigcine sesiholwa unomphela isibonelelo sabangatohozi.Uveze ukuthi ufuna izwe liphenduke inkundla yokwakha kudume imishini kuphuculwe ingqalasizinda emikhakheni ehlukene okubalwa ezolimo neminye.

YIZE kube nesasasa kukhethwa izintombi nto ebandleni lamaNazaretha kuphela umhlangano kaJulayi, kuthiwa isibalo somama bezingane abakhethiwe sibe ngaphezulu kwesezintombi.Isolezwe Ngempelasonto, lithole ngomthombo walo ongaphakathi ukuthi bezenzeka esihlahleni kukhethwa omama bezingane abaziwa ngokuthi yizintombi zentethelelo.Ngokujwayelekile omama bezingane kuthiwa yibona abasuke beheha inhlalisuthi ukuthi ibakhethe kanti eSipholi, kusuke kuyinhlalisuthi esuke idla ngamabala.“Njengoba isibalo sezintombi ezikhethiwe silinganiselwa ku-5 000, esezintombi zentethelelo cishe sibe ngaphezulu kwalesi. Inkinga ukuthi isihlahla akuyona into egunyaziwe kumaNazaretha njengoba lungakaze lube khona uhlelo lokukhethwa kwasebenezingane,” kusho umthombo.Okhulumela umholi wamaNazaretha inkosi Mduduzi Shembe uNyazilwezulu, uMnuz Thokozani Mncwabe, uthe noma ibekhona eyesihlahla kodwa akekho obenake okwenzeka khona kakhulu.“Njengoba kuyinto engamukelekile akekho okunakayo okwenzeka khona. Ngalokho asisho ukuthi akumele zikhethwe esezinezingane kodwa akulona uhlelo oluhambisana nenqubo yebandla. Ngenxa yokuthi sekuyinto eyenzekayo, sinxusa ukuthi nazo izintombi zentethelelo ziziphathe kahle. Uma izimisele ngokuyokhethwa ayihlale ilindile nayo ingayi esihlahleni inomuntu okhona empilweni yayo ngoba lokho kuzoqhatha inhlalisuthi. Awukwazi ukulinda usuku lokukhethwa ube ubambise ngomuntu. Uma kungukuthi ufuna ukukhethwa kumele ube wumuntu ongenaye umuntu,” kweluleka uMncwabe.Uthe umholi wamaNazaretha osewakhothama, inkosi Amos Kula Shembe Inyangayezulu, nguyena owetha asebenezingane bengagcagcile ukuthi bayizintombi zentethelelo. Uthe, wathi njengoba zithethelelwe kumele ziziphathe kahle zingakulibali ukuthi zisengamaNazaretha futhi zisenalo ilungelo lokuthi zingagana.Echaza ngezintombi nto ezikhethethiwe, ngokwenqubo yebandla lamaNazaretha akumele okhethe intombi kuphele iminyaka emibili engayilobolile.“Empeleni usuke unonyaka owodwa obekelwe wona bese unikwa owesibili ukuthi wenze izinto ngendlela. Uma wehluleka kumenyezelwa ebandleni ukuthi sewehlulekile. Akufihlwa ubizwa ngegama lakho ukuthi wehlulekile okusho ukuthi intombi isingaphindela eSipholi iyokhethwa kabusha. Nayo intombi inalo ilungelo lokuthi iyokumangalela esontweni ukuthi sekuphele iminyaka emibili ungayilobolile. Umuntu okuze kucishe kube ngcono kuyena osuke ematasa elobola kungukuthi iyaphela iminyaka emibili engakaphothuli. Loyo uyazwelwa ngoba kusuke kubonakala ukuthi uzimisele inkinga iwona amandla kodwa ongaqalile nhlobo uyavezwa esontweni. Kumele uye kokhetha usuyibekile imali yokuthi uqale izingxoxo zamalobolo ngoba akuvumelekile ukuthi kuphele izinyanga ezintathu ungavelile emndenini wentombi uma usuyikhethile esontweni,” usho kanje.

I-ACTION SA ithi uhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal kufanele uzinuke amakhwapha ngezinkinga zebhange Ithala ngoba ezinye zidalwe yiwo.UMnuz Alan Beesley osekomitini lezezimali ePhalamende, uthe njengoba iPrudential Authority (PA) okuyisikhungo se-South African Reserve Bank esiqaphe ukusebenza kwamabhange, ikhala ngokuncipha kwemali eThala kufanele kubhekwe uhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal ngoba yiwona owanciphisa isabelomali seThala usisusa ku-R65 million wasibeka ku-R51 million ngonyaka.Uthe inzuzo engena nayo iye yehla ngo-R90 million kule minyaka emithathu edlule.“Sikhathazekile ngesimo sebhange Ithala ngoba akufanele liwe njengoba liyisikhungo esisiza abantu abampofu. Libabulekile njengesikhungo esibhekelele imiphakathi enganakiwe. Kufanele uhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal nawo uzinuke amakhwapha ngoba ngesikhathi unciphisa imali oyinika Ithala uye wandisa izinkinga zaleli bhange,” kusho uBeesley.Uthe kufanele kulungiswe ubudlelwano beThala nezikhungo ezilishayela umthetho okuyi-Financial Sector Conduct Authority (FSCA) ne-Prudential Authority.“Ukungahambi kahle kobudlelwano phakathi kweThala nezikhungo ezilishayela umthetho kwenza kungasebenzeki kahle. Kwenza isimo singahambi kahle njengoba lingakwazi ukuthola amakhasimende amasha. Siyavuma, kufanele lilandele umthetho kodwa asikhumbule ukuthi baningi abathembele kulona. Amacala aqhubeka ezinkantolo nawo aqeda imali yeThala.”Uthe kufanele zonke izinhlaka ezithintekayo zisebenze kanzima ukuqinisekisa ukuthi Ithala alishabalali ngoba libalulekile kubantu basemakhaya abangenawo amanye amabhange eduze.“Sizokhuluma nazo zonke izinhlaka ezifanele ukuze zingenelele ekuhlengeni ibhange Ithala. Okwethu wukuvikela abantu abalondoloza imali yabo eThala, asifuni ukuthi kube nesimo seVBS.”Usihlalo wekomiti lezimali ePhalamende, uDkt Joe Maswanganyi, uthe bazosiqapha ngeso lokhozi isimo saseThala ukuze lizobuyelwa yilayisensi esamisiwe. UNgqongqoshe wezeziMali KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Francois Rodgers nowezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho, ezokuVakasha neMvelo uMfu Musa Zondi, bathembise ukuthi bazolilekelela Ithala ezinkingeni elibhekene nazo.

I-ACTIONSA ikhale ngobuxoki kozakwabo abayingxenye yesivumelwano sokukhipha i-ANC emandleni ngesikhathi imemezela ukuhoxa kwayo kulesi vumelwano esasayinwa ngonyaka owedlule.Umholi we-ActionSA, uMnuz Herman Mashaba, uthe banqume ukuphuma esivumelwaneni ngenxa yokuthi amaqembu abebekhankasa nawo ngokuthi bafuna ukukhipha i-ANC emandleni asecula elinye iculo.UMashaba uthe amanye ala maqembu asexoxa ne-ANC, ngenhloso yokufinyelela esivumelwaneni sokusebenzisana.I-ANC yehlulekile ukuthola izihlalo ezanele ukuthi ibuse ngokuzimela, njengamanje ixoxa namanye amaqembu ngenhloso yokuthola isivumelwano sokusebenzisana.Amaqembu ayingxenye yesivumelwano sokukhipha i-ANC emandleni ahlulekile ukuthola izihlalo ezanele ukuthi akhiphe i-ANC emandleni.UMashaba uthe emva kokumenyezelwa kwemiphumela yokhetho, ozakwabo abebeyingxenye yesivumelwano bavele bagijimela ukuyoxoxa ne-ANC, nathe kuphambene nemigomo abazibekela yona ngesikhathi besayina isivumelwano.“Samangala ngesikhathi sibona amaqembu esinesivumelwano nawo esexoxa ne-ANC. Ngalesi senzo baphula isethembiso abasenza kubantu bakuleli ngesikhathi sikhankasela ukhetho. Ingakho thina sikhethe ukuhoxa.“Asikwazi ukubavimba uma befuna ukuyoxoxa ne-ANC, kuyilungelo labo. Kodwa ke lento abayenzayo iphambene nalokhu esavumelana ngakho. Ingakho sithe asikwenze kube semthethweni ukuhoxa kwethu. Ngeke silokhu sitetema, abaqhubeke nabakwenzayo. Ingakho sihlehla, khona bezokwazi ukuxoxa nanoma iliphi iqembu abafuna ukuxoxa nalo.”UMashaba uthe abafune lutho oluzobahlanganisa ne-ANC.“Sizimisele ngokuba yiqembu eliphikisayo kunokuba sisebenzisane ne-ANC.”I-ActionSA ithole izihlalo eziyisithupha ePhalamende.UMashaba nosihlalo kazwelonke we-ActionSA, uMnuz Michael Beaumont, abazokuya ePhalamende.UMashaba uthe bathathe isinqumo sokuthi bangayi ePhalamende ukuze bagxile ekukhuliseni iqembu.“Ukhetho lohulumeni basekhaya lwango-2026 seluseduze. Sifisa ukuthi ukhetho lufike silulungele. Siyazi ukuthi ukhetho lohulumeni basekhaya ngeke lube lula. Yingakho sikhethe ukuthi sisheshe siqale ukulungiselela ukhetho. “Ukuba yilungu lePhalamende kudinga isikhathi esiningi. Ugcina usuphoqeleka ukuba ukhethe phakathi kokuhambela umhlangano wasePhalamende nowomphakathi. Mina ngikhetha ukuhambela umhlangano womphakathi. Yingakho ngikhethe ukungayi ePhalamende.” Ithimba le-ActionSA ePhalamende lizoholwa owayeyimeya yoMasipala waseNelson Mandela Bay, uMnuz Athol Trollip.Kuleli thimba kukhona nekhansela laseThekwini, uMnuz Alan Beesley.UMashaba uthe uyalethemba ithimba abalithumele ePhalamende.

USABISA ngokumisa ukusebenza ezimayini uMengameli we-Association of Mineworkers Union (Amcu), uMnuz Joseph Mathunjwa, uma zingaxazululwa izinkinga zabasebenzi abafuna amasheya eKroondal, eNorth West.UMathunjwa uthe udaba lwamasheya lwaqala ukuxoxwa ngo-2020 iSibanye-Stillwater ilokhu ibathembisa ukuthi izobuyela kubona kodwa alukalungi namanje.“Sizobhalela i-Commission for Conciliation, Mediation and Arbitration (CCMA) ukuyazisa ukuthi asisitholi isisombululo odabeni lwamasheya olwalungaphothuliwe emuva kwezivumelwano zamaholo ezidlule. Sizolulwa lolu daba futhi sicela uNeal Froneman alulungise ngoba uma engakwenzi lokho uzoyikhotha imbenge yomile. Kwezinye izimayini zakhe uFroneman, siyathembisa ukuthi uma engalulungisi udaba zonke ngeke zisebenze,” kusho uMathunjwa.Usole uFroneman, oyisikhulu esiphezulu eSibanye-Stillwater, ngokungawahloniphi amalungelo abasebenzi.Izolo kube nomhlangano obuhlanganisa amalungu eNational Union of Mineworkers (Num) nawe-Amcu ezinkundleni zemidlalo iWaterval, eKroondal, eNorth West.Kulo mhlangano uMengameli weNum, uMnuz Daniel Daniel Balepile, uthe namhlanje bazohlangana nomqashi ukuze kuguqulwe isinqumo sokubaxosha.Uthe udaba lwamasheya luzolungiswa ngoba bazobambisana ne-Amcu ukuze abasebenzi bathole okungokwabo.Ngeledlule abasebenzi abangaphezu kuka-200 bachitha amahora awu-48 emgodini waseKroondal, bekhala ngokuthi abayitholanga imali yamasheya etholwe abanye ozakwabo kwezinye izimayini zakwaSibanye.Nokho bagcina bephumile emgodini emuva kokuncengwa yizinyunyana zabo.NgoLwesihlanu, uMnuz James Wellsted obhekelele ezokuxhumana eSibanye-Stillwater, uthe bazikhiphile izincwadi eziwu-213 ezazisa abasebenzi ngokuxoshwa kwabo, ezinye bezibaxwayisa ngokuthi bangaphinde bazithole esimweni esinjengalesi.Uthe udaba lwamasheya aseKroondal lwaxoxwa kabanzi nezinyunyana ngonyaka odlule kwashiwo ukuthi umqashi usazobona ukuthi bazofakwa kanjani ohlelweni lwamasheya oluqhubeka eRustenburg.Uveze ukuthi bebezobona uma kuphela lo nyaka ukuthi benzenjani ngalolu daba futhi izinyunyana ziyakwazi konke lokhu.“Kubukeka sengathi kwaba khona ukungaqondi kahle kubasebenzi njengoba kukhona akade belindele okuthile. Izikhalo zabo bekufanele baziphakamise ngendlela efanele ngaphakathi emayini noma bazise izinyunyana zabo. Asihambisani nokuthi bazivalele emgodini ngoba lokhu kubeka engcupheni impilo yabasebenzi. Kufaka engozini umsebenzi wonkana okubeka engcupheni nezinye izinhlaka,” kuchaza uWellsted.

IHLABELA phambili i-ANC nokuqondisa ubugwegwe umholi weqembu Umkhonto weSizwe uJacob Zuma.Inhlangano ithumele uMsholozi incwadi imazisa ukuthi isigcawu sokumqondisa ubugwegwe sizohlala ngoJulayi 17, 2024.Lesi sigcawu sahlehliswa ngenxa yokuthi bekusaqhubeka imikhankaso yokhetho.Unobhala jikelele we-ANC uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, wakuveza ukuthi ngeke bamyeke uZuma bazomqondisa ubugwegwe ngokukhankasela elinye iqembu, agcine esengumholi walo ngoba uphule imigomo yenhlangano. UZuma wamemezela ukuthi uzovotela iMK ngoDisemba nyakenye. Ugcine esengumholi weqembu ngokusemthethweni.Incwadi ethunyelwe uZuma esabalele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana eze yafakwa ngisho yindodakazi yakhe enkundleni i-X, iveza ukuthi isigcawu sokumqondisa ubugwegwe sizokwenziwa ngohlelo lwezobuchwepheshe besimanje.IMK idlise i-ANC namanye amaqembu ngamapayipi okhethweni lwangoMeyi. KwaZulu-Natal leli qembu licoboshise i-ANC layikhipha emandleni lithola izihlalo ezingu-37.EPhalamende linezihlalo ezingu-58, kanti lizibona yiqembu eliphikisayo.Ibamba lomkhulumeli we-ANC uMnuz Zuko Godlimpi, lithe ukuqondiswa ubugwegwe kukaZuma kuzokwenziwa ngohlelo lwezobuchwepheshe.Uthe lokhu kusuke kuyisivumelwano phakathi kwabantu ababhekele uhlelo lokuqondisa ubugwegwe nalowo osuke ezovela ngaphambi kwesigcawu.UZuma ubengahlonizi ukuveza ukuthi ufuna ukulungisa i-ANC ngokuthi ayibuyise ngoba uyithatha njengelahlekile. Uchitha nobuholi bukamengameli wayo uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa.Leli qembu belichitha ngisho eyokuxoxa ekahulumeni wobumbano ne-ANC uma engakhishwa uRamaphosa emandleni.Ngakolunye uhlangothi i-ANC ibala ukhasha ingafuni ukuchitha uRamaphosa ngoba ibilibeka ngembaba elokuthi labo abafuna lo mholi ehambile, abakhohlwe ngeke kwenzeke.UMbalula wathi bafuna ukulandela yonke imigomo yenhlangano ngaphambi kokuthatha izinyathelo ngoZuma.

I-ANC imise iMeya kaMasipala waKwaDukuza, uNksz Lindile Nhaca, esolwa ngokugoloza ukwehla esikhundleni.I-ANC KwaZulu-Natal ithe inqume ukumisa uNksz Nhaca emva kokuthi engawulandelanga umyalelo wokuba ehle esikhundleni.UNksz Nhaca wayalelwa ukuba ehle esikhundleni ngenyanga eyedlule, isinqumo sokuthi akhishwe esikhundleni sathathwa emhlanganweni wesigungu esiphezulu kwi-ANC KwaZulu-Natal.UNksz Nhaca akazange asule esikhundleni, kepha wavele wabhalela uNobhala Jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, emcela ukuthi angenelele odabeni lokuxoshwa kwakhe.Encwadini yakhe eyabonwa yiSolezwe, uNksz Nhaca wakhala ngoNobhala we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Bheki Mtolo, emsola ngokumbophela amanqina enyathi.UNksz Nhaca ubesaqhubeka nokubonakala enza umsebenzi wakhe njengoba ngeledlule ubekhona eMkhosini weLembe.Okhulumela i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mafika Mndebele, uthe uNksz Nhaca umisiwe njengelungu le-ANC.“Akavumelekile ukuhambela imihlangano yamakhansela e-ANC emkhandlwini nemihlangano yomkhandlu. Akavumelekile nokubiza imihlangano yomphakathi.”UMndebele uthe uNksz Nhaca uzobhekana nohlelo lokuqondiswa ubugwegwe.“Sithanda ukukhumbuza bonke abaholi abajutshwe ezikhundleni ukuthi basemseni we-ANC. Bonke abaholi abajoyina i-ANC kufanele bahloniphe imigomo yeqembu.“Abaholi kufanele babeke phambili izidingo zenhlangano, bakhohlwe izidingo zabo. Zonke izinto ezishiwo nezenziwa abaholi be-ANC kufanele zihambisane nemigomo ye-ANC.”Udaba lokwehliswa kukaNksz Nhaca selususe umsindo ezinhlakeni ze-ANC.Uphiko lwabesifazane nolwentsha kwi-ANC esifundeni iLembe luyaphikisana nokuxoshwa kwakhe.Nokho uMafika uthe akuqali ngoNksz Nhaca ukuba athathelwe izinyathelo.“Ngaphambilini, i-ANC ike yathathela izinyathelo abaholi abaphambana nomthetho futhi ayikho into ezosivimba ukuthi siqhubeke nokwenza lokhu.“Sesimbhidlangweni wokuzihlela kabusha, ngakho ke sizoqhubeka nokubhekana nalabo abaphula imigomo. Indlela uNksz Nhaca aziphethe ngayo ayamukelekile futhi ilimaza i-ANC.”UNksz Nhaca bese kunesikhathi eside elengelwa yizembe.NgoJulayi kwaputshuka inkulumo kaMtolo, lapho ayethi khona kufanele uNksz Nhaca asuswe esikhundleni bese kufakwa elinye ikhansela le-ANC, uMnuz Njabulo Cele.Le nkulumo eqoshiwe uMtolo wayenza ngesikhathi ekhuluma namakhansela e-ANC kulo mkhandlu.UMasipala waKwaDukuza ungeminye yemikhandlu enesabelomali esikhulu lapha KwaZulu-Natal njengoba ngonyaka wezimali owedlule ubunesabelomali esingu-R2.7 billion.

BABAMBE umoya abaholi be-ANC ababhekene namacala njengoba le nhlangano inomhlangano wokuphothula uhlu lwabazoyimela ePhalamende naseziShayamthetho.Abaholi be-ANC abangaphezu kuka-70, basengcupheni yokusala ngaphandle ohlwini njengoba bebhekene namacala.Umhlangano wesigungu esiphezulu kwi-ANC obizelwe ukuzophothula uhlu, uqale ngoMsombuluko.Lo mhlangano uzobheka amagama aphakanyiswe ngesikhathi kunemihlangano yamagatsha.Phakathi kwezinto ezizobhekwa ukuthi ngabe abaphakanyisiwe ababhekene yini namacala, nokuthi banazo yini iziqu zemfundo ezifanele?Abaholi abaningi be-ANC bavinjwa ukungenela umbango ngesikhathi kunezingqungquthela zokukhetha ubuholi.Phakathi kwabo kubalwa nosihlalo we-ANC kwisifunda iTheku, uNkk Zandile Gumede, owayephakanyiselwa ukuba angenele umbango wezikhundla ngesikhathi kunengqungquthela yokukhetha ubuholi be-ANC KwaZulu-Natal.UNobhala Jikelele kwi-ANC, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, uthe bazowabhekisisa amagama abaholi aphakanyiswe amagatsha.“Kunemigomo okufanele ibhekwe uma siphothula uhlu lwethu. Imigomo icacile. Sizobheka igama ngalilodwa. Sizobheka ukuthi ngabe loyo mholi akanawo yini amacala, sibheke ukuthi azikho yini izinsolo zenkohlakalo ababhekene nazo?”UMbalula uvele wangena ezintangeni uma ebuzwa ngekusasa lamalungu esigungu esiphezulu okukhona kuwo noDkt Zweli Mkhize, abasolwa ngenkohlakalo.UMkhize washiya kwesokuba ungqongqoshe wezeMpilo emva kwezinsolo zenkohlakalo.“Yonke imibuzo sizoyiphendula emva komhlangano wesigungu esiphezulu. Zonke izinto ezithinta abaholi okuthiwa abashenxe ezikhundleni, abathinteka embikweni weKhomishini kaZondo (Jaji Raymond), sizozikhuluma emva komhlangano. Sizochaza ukuthi kungani abaholi abathile bekhona ohlwini, sichaze nangalabo abangekho.”UMbalula uthe imigomo iqinile kakhulu kwabazomela i-ANC ePhalamende naseziShayamthetho.Uthe kuzobhekwa nokuthi abanye basebenze kanjani ezikhundleni abebejutshwe kuzo, ngaphambi kokuthi bafakwe ohlwini.“Uhlelo olude oluzolandelwa. Abaholi baye kwinhlolokhono. UMengameli (uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa) kwaqala yena kwinhlolokhono. Wahlala amahora amabili kwinhlolokhono, ebuzwa ngemigomo ye-ANC. Bangu-284 abaholi abaye kwinhlokhono.”UMbalula uthe bazokwazi ukuhlangabezana nomnqamulajuqu wangoLwesihlanu, obekwe inhlangano eyengamele ukhetho, i-Independent Electoral Commission (IEC), wokuba wonke amaqembu ezepolitiki alethe amagama abantu abazowamela ePhalamende naseziShayamthetho.Okhethweni lohulumeni basekhaya olwalungo-2021, i-ANC yehluleka ukuhambisa ngesikhathi amagama kwabanye omasipala, i-IEC yabuye yalula isikhathi.

UMMELI woMkhonto weSizwe (MK Party), u-Advocate Dali Mpofu SC, uthe umbango wokubhaliswa kwaleli qembu udalwa wukuthi i-ANC isaba owayengumengameli, uMnuz uJacob Zuma, embona njengengozi kuyona.UMpofu usho lokhu enza izethulo eNkantolo yezoKhetho eBloemfontein, eFree State. I-ANC imangalele uMkhonto weSizwe nenhlangano yezokhetho i-IEC ngokubhaliswa kwaleli qembu elisha.Mabili amacala asenkantolo elokubhaliswa kweqembu bese kuba elombango wophawu lona elizongena eNkantolo eNkulu eThekwini, ngesonto elizayo ngoLwesithathu.UKhongolose ukhala ngokuthi i-IEC yabheda ngokuvumela ukubhaliswa kweMK ekubeni izibiza ngegama lombutho wawo wezempi. I-ANC yasifaka isikhalo kwi-IEC kodwa yachithwa yase ifaka udaba enkantolo.UMkhonto weSizwe kwakuwumbutho wezempi we-ANC owasungulwa ngo-1961 wahlakazwa ngo-1993, sekungenwa embusweni wentando yeningi.UZuma umemezele ngoDisemba, ukuthi akayingeni eye-ANC kodwa usehamba noMkhonto weSizwe azowukhankasela aphinde awuvotele. UMpofu uthe yisona kanye lesi simemezelo esidale wonke lo msindo, kungenjalo ngabe awukho.“Kuwukudlala ngenkantolo nje lokhu abakwenzayo. Ngesikhathi bechithwe yi-IEC basemukela leso sinqumo bahlala bakhetha ukungasiphoseli inselelo. Bavuke sebephaphatheka emuva kokuthi uZuma ememezele ukuthi weseka uMkhonto weSizwe ngoDisemba,’’ kusho uMpofu.Uthe kuyihlaya ukuthi i-ANC uma ibuzwa ngezizathu zokuthatha isikhathi eside, ithi yingoba kwakungamaholidi kaDisemba. Uthe i-ANC kufanele iphumele obala itshele inkantolo ukuthi yesaba uZuma.UMpofu uthe kudlalwa ipolitiki nje, asikho esinye isizathu esenza ukuthi lolu daba lubangwe kangaka. Uthe njengamanje i-ANC iqhamuka ngejubane icela inkantolo ichithe ukubhaliswa kweqembu iphinde ibanabukelise ngokusindwa yizinyawo kwabo.Ummeli we-ANC, u-Adv Tshidiso Ramogale, uthe bafuna inkantolo ivune bona ukuze i-IEC izolungisa iphutha yenzele nangomuso ukuthi ukhetho lusingathwe kahle.“Kufanele ikhomishini yokhetho icathuliswe kulolu daba ngoba ithi ike yenza okufanayo kwamanye amaqembu amathathu noma amane eyenze ngawo izibonelo. Kufanele siyilungise ngoba siyobe silungisela nokhetho oluzayo komasipala, ezifundazweni nakwezinye zindawo,’’ kusho uRamogale.Amajaji athe isinqumo sigodliwe sekuyokwaziswa amaqembu ukuthi sizokhishwa nini. UZuma ubonakale enkantolo namalungu oMkhonto weSizwe. Ithimba le-ANC beliholwa wuNobhala-Jikelele, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula.

UMHLAZIYI wezepolitiki uthe ukuhlehliswa kwesigcawu sokuqondisa ubugwegwe kowayengumengameli, uJacob Zuma, kukhombisa ukuthi ubuholi be-ANC buyesaba ukuthathela uZuma izinyathelo.Umhlaziyi waseNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Zakhele Ndlovu, uthe kufanele engabe kade i-ANC yamxosha uZuma ngoba vele usekhankasela iqembu elincintisana nayo okhethweni, iMK.Lokhu ukusho emva kokuthi i-ANC iqinisekise ukuhlehliswa kwesigcawu sokuqondisa uZuma ubugwegwe.“Bayazi ukuthi kunabantu abangaphakathi kwi-ANC abamthandayo uZuma futhi uZuma ulandelwa izinkumbi zabantu, ikakhulukazi abangamaZulu. Ingakho abaholi be-ANC bevele bangenwa amanzi emadolweni, bahlehlisa isigcawu.”Isigcawu sokuqondisa uZuma ubugwegwe bekufanele sibe kusasa, ekomkhulu le-ANC, iLuthuli House.I-ANC ikhombe izinsolo zokuthi kungase kube nodlame, yase ihlehlisa isigcawu. Amalungu eMK abethe azohlangana eLuthuli House, ezokweseka uZuma.UNdlovu uthe enye into eyenza ukuthi kube nzima kwi-ANC ukuba ixoshe uZuma manje ukuthi iyazi ukuthi kusangenzeka ukuthi ibuye imdinge emva kokhetho.“Kunezinkomba zokuthi i-ANC angeke ilunqobe ngamalengiso ukhetho oluzayo, ikakhulukazi lapha KwaZulu-Natal. Kungenzeka ukuthi bazophinde bamdinge uZuma emva kokhetho.”UZuma ubhekene namacala amabili, elokukhankasela iqembu elincintisana ne-ANC, nokuba ilungu leqembu elincintisana ne-ANC. Wamiswa kwi-ANC emva kokuthi ememezele ukuthi uzokhankasela iMK.UNobhala Jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, usivikele isinqumo sokuhlehlisa isigcawu sokuqondisa uZuma ubugwegwe.“Asifuni ukuphinde sibone le nto esayibona mhla i-DA inemashi lapha eLuthuli House. Udlame aluzange lube lukhulu ngelanga le-DA kodwa kulokhu sibona sengathi udlame beluzokuba lukhulu. Sihlehlise isigcawu ngoba nakhu singafuni ukuthi kube nodlame.”UMbalula uthe uZuma uyaqhubeka nokukhombisa ukuthi akaselona ilungu le-ANC.“Akakhombisi ukuzisola, ukhombisa ukuthi uzimisele ngokushiya i-ANC.”I-MK ikugxekile ukuhlehliswa kwesigcwawu.Okhulumela iMK, uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndhlela, uthe alukaze lube khona udlame lapho amalungu eMK esuke ezokweseka khona uZuma.Uthe izinsolo zodlame ezenziwa i-ANC zisho ukuthi yiyo i-ANC enochuku.“Kusho ukuthi amalungu e-ANC iwona abezovele abhozomele abantu abamsulwa. Vele amalungu e-ANC kade aqala esisongela, aze asihlasela ngesikhathi kunokhetho lokuchibiyela ebaQulusi. Le nto ikutshela ukuthi amalungu e-ANC ayimdlwembe.”UNdhlela uthe uZuma ubesewaqalile amalungiselelo okuyovela phambi kwesigcawu sokuqondiswa ubugwegwe.

I-ANC izoshintsha ukwenza ezifundazweni ezimbili ezinkulu engazange yenze kahle kuzona okhethweni lwangoMeyi, iKwaZulu-Natal neGauteng.Iphini likanobhala jikelele, uNkk Nomvula Mokonyane, lithe bazokwenza izinguquko kuzo zombili izifundazwe.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma nabezindaba kade kuqhubeka kuqhubeka umhlangano wesigungu esiphezulu.I-ANC ayizange yenze kahle KwaZulu-Natal, ngoba yaba iqembu lesithathu ngobukhulu, isuka ekuphatheni isifundazwe.Kanjalo naseGauteng i-ANC yahluleka ukunqoba ngamalengiso njengoba isiphethe ngokubambisana namaqembu amancane.IKwaZulu-Natal neGauteng yizona zifundazwe ezinabantu abaningi abavotayo.UNkk Mokonyane uthe i-ANC izimisele ukubuya ngamandla kulezi zifundazwe okhethweni olulandelayo kepha akangacacisa ukuthi yiziphi izinguquko abazozenza ukuphumelelisa lezi zifiso.“Umhlangano wesigungu esiphezulu awukapheli, sisayixoxa leyo. Ngicabanga ukuthi into ebalulekile kulezi zifundazwe ukuthi siye koxhumana namalungu eqembu. Amalungu eqembu kufanele aqeqeshwe, ukuze ezokwazi ukukhankasela ukhetho.”UNkk Mokonyane uthe ukuvela kweqembu eliholwa owayengumengameli, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, iMK, kubadalele izinkinga eziningi.UNkk Mokonyane uthe ukuvela kweMK akulimazanga i-ANC kuphela, wathi wonke amaqembu ezepolitiki kufanele azibuze, aziphendule ukuthi kwenziwe yini ukuthi iMK iphundle amavoti awo.“Kunale nkolelo yokuthi iMK yathatha amavoti e-ANC kuphela. Iqiniso ukuthi iMK yathatha amavoti amaqembu amaningi ehlukene. Bashanela ngisho lapha kwaMai Mai. Kufanele sizibuze ukuthi ngabe yini lena eyenza ukuthi abantu abahlala ehostela iDenver, bevotele iMK. Baliyeka leli qembu abebehlezi belivotela, okungeyona i-ANC. “Kufanele sizibuze ukuthi yimuphi lo myalezo obushumayelwa yiMK owenze ukuthi abantu bashiye amaqembu abebewavotela. Mhlawumbe kufanele sizibuze ukuthi ngabe ngempela abantu baseNingizimu Afrika bavota ngobuhlanga? Ngabe abantu bavotela umuntu wangakubo?”Inhloko yezokhetho kwi-ANC, uMnuz Mdumiseni Ntuli, ithe enye yezinto ebashayisile okhethweni ukuqhelelana kwabaholi be-ANC nabantu.“Into esiyiqaphelile ukuthi baya ngokuncipha abaholi be-ANC abayizishoshovu zemiphakathi. Yebo, sinabo ubuholi kuzo zonke izindawo kodwa abaholi abasondelene nabantu abasabonakali. Kufanele abaholi besondelane nabantu.”UNtuli uphinde wakhala ngokuthi kuyiwe okhethweni abantu abaningi beyidinelwe i-ANC ngenxa yokucishwa kukagesi kanye nokungahanjiswa kwezidingo.Umhlangano wesigungu esiphezulu uzothatha izinsuku eziyisithupha, uzoze uphothulwe ngesonto elizayo.

I-ANC KwaZulu-Natal izokuba nomkhuleko wokuthandazela owayengungqongqoshe wezamaBhizinisi kaHulumeni, uMnuz Pravin Gordhan, ongeniswe esibhedlela exinekile.Izindaba zokungeniswa kukaGordhan esibhedlela zimenyezelwe wumndeni, ngoLwesibili.Okhulumela i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mafika Mndebele, uthe bazokuba nomkhuleko namhlanje ntambama eThekwini.UMndebele uthe bahlose ukuqinisa idolo umndeni kaGordhan."UGordhan yindodana yakulesi sifundazwe futhi uyingqwele endala enhlanganweni yethu i-ANC. Wazinikela ngesikhathi silwela inkululeko nangesikhathi singena kuhulumeni wentando yeningi. Sifisa ukuba umndeni wazi ukuthi sinawo kulesi sikhathi esinzima."Izolo, kuke kwasabalala izindaba zokuthi uGordhan useshonile, nokho umndeni washeshe wakuchitha lokhu.Okhulumela umndeni, uMnuz Andrian Lackay, uthe uGordhan uthola ukunakekelwa okuseqophelweni eliphezulu."Umndeni ucele ukunikezwa ithuba lokuba ubhekane nalolu daba. Abantu bazokwaziswa ngesimo sikaGordhan uma kuvela isidingo."UNobhala Jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, ugxeke labo abasabalalise amampunge okuthi uGordhan akasekho.UMbalula unxuse abantu ukuthi bangakholwa noma yini abayifunda ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma nabezindaba, izolo, wathi umndeni uzoqhubeka nokwazisa abantu ngesimo sikaGordhan.“Umndeni kuphela onelungelo lokumemezela izinto ezithinta isimo sempilo yomuntu. Sonke kufanele sikuhloniphe lokhu.”UMbalula uthe uGordhan wabamba iqhaza elikhulu ekulweni nenkohlakalo, nathe kwamdalela izitha eziningi.“Mhlawumbe ingakho kukhona abasabalalisa izindaba ezingelona iqiniso ngaye.”UMbalula uye kobona uGordhan esibhedlela, khona izolo, wathi uGordhan uthola ukwesekwa umndeni wakhe.“Sinxusa wonke amalungu e-ANC nabo bonke abantu ukuba babeke uGordhan emithandazweni yabo. Sinalo ithemba lokuthi uzolulama ngokushesha.”UGordhan usebenze isikhathi eside kuhulumeni wakuleli.Phakathi kweminyango ake wayiphatha kubalwa owezeziMali nowezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu.Ngaphambi kwalokho, wayengukhomishana weSA Revenue Service (Sars), wamemezela ukuthatha kwakhe umhlalaphansi kwezepolitiki ngaphambi kokhetho lwangoMeyi nonyaka.Baningi asebefisele uGordhan ukululama ngokushesha kusukela kuvele izindaba zokungeniswa kwakhe esibhedlela.NgoLwesithathu, bekunomkhuleko wasebusuku obuseGoli.Umkhuleko ubuhlelwe yizinhlangano i-Ahmed Kathrada Foundation neDefend Our Democracy.

ITHEMBISE ukuyilwa kuze kunqamuke izandla i-ANC eyokuchitha owayengumengameli wayo nezwe, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, okhonjwe indlela kule nhlangano. Le nhlangano ithe kuhlukene inhloko nesixhanti phakathi kwayo noZuma njengoba simile isinqumo sekomiti elibhekele ukuqondiswa ubugwegwe bale nhlangano, sokuxosha uZuma, okungumengameli wokuqala wenhlangano ngesikhathi senkululeko okhonjwe indlela kule nhlangano.UZuma onezinsuku ezingu-21 ukuthi aphikisane nesinqumo, uzoxhumana nabameli bakhe ngokusho kweqembu lakhe, uMkhonto weSizwe.Ungoti wezomthetho uMnuz Mpumelelo Zikalala, uthe akaboni ukuthi uZuma uzophumelela uma egcina ngokuthi aphonsele inselelo isinqumo ngoba ulitholile ithuba lokuvela ngaphambi kwekomiti kodwa wakhala ngobuhixihixi bezokuxhumana.UNobhala Jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, utshele abezindaba ukuthi bazolwa kuze kube sekugcineni ekutheni isinqumo singaguqulwa.“UZuma wazixosha yena ngokuthi amemezele ukuthi uzoseka elinye iqembu, waphinde waphenduka umholi weqembu. Kunobufakazi obuqanda ikhanda bokuthi ungumholi weMK ngoba uze waya enkantolo wayobanga nomuntu owabhalisa leli qembu. Besifuna ukulandela yonke imigudu yenhlangano ngaphambi kokumxosha. Kahle, kahle kukhona abathi liphume nobomvu ngokuxoshwa kwakhe ngoba vele into ebikade kuthiwa kwakumele ngabe sayenza kudala,” kusho uMbalula izolo.Okhulumela iMK, uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndhlela, ugxeke i-ANC ngalesi sinqumo, wathi ngeke basonge izandla babukele kuxoshwa umholi wabo ngale ndlela. Uthe bashaqekile ngokuthi lesi sinqumo siputshuke singakafinyeleli ngisho kuZuma.“Le yimizamo ye-ANC kaRamaphosa (Cyril) yokubukela phansi uZuma. Obemele uZuma esigcawini sokuqondiswa ubugwegwe (uMnuz Tony Yengeni), akaziswanga ngalesi sinqumo ngendlela efanele, kube sengathi inkantolo yasehlathini,” kusho uNdhlela.UZikalala uqhubeke wathi, “Angafaka isimangalo ngalesi sinqumo ukuze athi ulwe kwaze kwaba sekugcineni kodwa mancane amathuba okuthi aphumelele. Ubengaphika ukuthi akalona ilungu leMK kodwa kunemiqingo efungelwe lapho eveza khona ukuthi ungumholi weqembu waze waya nasenkantolo, ngakho mancane amathuba okuphunyuka.”UMbalula uvikele isinqumo samalungu ekomiti lobugwegwe okubalwa oNksz Faith Muthambi, Nocawe Mafu, Robinson Ramaite, Kerensa Millard no-Advovate Vusi Pikoli, avotele ukuthi axoshwe uZuma.“I-MK igxeka thina ithi siyinkantolo yasehlathini. Siyayilandela imigomo asifani neMK, exosha abantu noma yikanjani. Namhlanje ukhuluma nomuntu kusasa uthole ukuthi usexoshiwe. UKhumalo (Jabulani, owabhalisa iMK), uphi manje? Waxoshwa ngaphandle kokuya ekomitini lobugwegwe,” kusho uMbalula.Uthe bebengeke babhalele iMK incwadi yokuxosha uZuma ngoba ababekanga leli qembu icala kodwa babeka uZuma icala. “Mayelana nodaba lokuputshuka kwesinqumo, yinto esizoyiphenya ngaphakathi ngoba ziningi izinto ezivezwa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Isinqumo simile uZuma uxoshiwe. Ubulungu bakhe bebuzophela ngoDisemba kulo nyaka,” kusho uMbalula.UMbalula uthe uZuma wehlisa ukwesekwa kwe-ANC okhethweni lwanonyaka.

OKHULUMELA i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mafika Mndebele, uveze ukuthi ngeke babambisane neqembu eliholwa owayengumengameli wezwe ne-ANC uMnuz Jacob Zuma, UMkhonto weSizwe. UMndebele uthe nakuba bevule izandla kuwo wonke amaqembu athole izihlalo kodwa ngeke bakwazi ukubambisana neMK.IMK iyona ethole amavoti amaningi KwaZulu-Natal kodwa kubukeka ingeke ithole izihlalo ezanele ukuthi ibuse ngokuzimela.UMndebele uthe isithiyo esibavimba ukuthi basebenzisane neMK ukuthi abaholi beMK abawuhloniphi uMthethosisekelo."Kungafanele benze izinto ngenye indlela abeMK uma befuna ukusebenzisana nathi."Ukusho lokho ngesikhathi ekhuluma nabezindaba esikhungweni sokubala amavoti esiseThekwini.UMndebele uthe ukuhlulwa kwabo KwaZulu-Natal akusho ukuthi abantu bakulesifundazwe abasayithandi i-ANC.Njengoba sekubalwe u-99,66% wamavoti KwaZulu-Natal, i-ANC ilele isithathu ngamavoti awu-595 349.Phezulu kuqhwakele iMK, enamavoti  awu-1 587 856, kulandele i-IFP ngamavoti awu-631 036.UMndebele uthe abantu baKwaZulu-Natal bakhethe ukujezisa i-ANC."Abantu basayithanda i-ANC kodwa bayicasukele. Bacasulwa ukungagcinwa kwezethembiso. Abantu bacasulwa ukungahanjiswa kwezidingo. Siye okhethweni abantu bakoMlaza, lapho i-ANC ivotelwa khona kakhulu, bengenawo amanzi."

UPHIKO lwabesifazane i-ANC Women's League selukhwele lwadilika kwiMeya yaseZululand, uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi ngokuzenza ibhoklolo kwiPhini likaSihlalo we-ANC, eKZN uNks Nomagugu Simelane.Kwenzeka lokhu nje, uButhelezi usasazele uNkk Simelane ngabameli, emsola ngokumehlisa isithunzi ngesikhathi ekhuluma kwingqungquthela ye-ANC ebiseVryheid ngempelasonto.Encwadini esabalaliswe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, abameli bakaButhelezi bathe inkulumo kaNkk Simelane yamhlambalaza, yena siqu nokuba yimeya."Siyalelwe ukuba sifune ukuthi uhoxise inkulumo yakho ngokusemthethweni nasesidlangalaleni kungakapheli izinsuku eziyisikhombisa uthole lencwadi. “Uma uhluleka, ikhasimende lethu lizofuna amademeshe ka-R10 million kuwe njengesinxephezelo ngokuziphatha kwakho okungalungile nokungekho emthethweni.“Sibuye sayalelwa ukuba silibeke ngembaba elokuthi ikhasimende lethu liziphika lilala ngomhlane izinsolo elibekwa zona lokuziphatha ngendlela engavumelekile," kuqhuba incwadi.Unobhala wophiko lwabesifazane kwi-ANCWL, uZama Sokhabase uthe lencwadi yabameli bakaButhelezi iyimizamo yokugqiba ihlazo elenziwa nguButhelezi njengoba esolwa yinqwaba yabantu besifazane ngokubahlukumeza ngokocansi eMkhandlwini waseZululand.UZama uthe ukusabisa ngezinyathelo zomthetho kuyizinkomba zobubhoklolo kukaButhelezi kuNkk Simelane ngoba ezama ukugwema  izinsolo ezibhekiswe kuye.NgeSonto i-ANC esifundeni iMzala Nxumalo ikhiphe isitatimende ngokuhlukunyezwa kwabasebenzi besifazane okubandakanya uButhelezi kumasipala awuphethe.Sithe isitatimende sekungunyaka wesibili abasebenzi besifazane behayiza ngokuhlukunyezwa ngokocansi wuButhelezi. Siqhuba, sithe bayisithupha abesifazane asebekhonjwe indlela kulo masipala ngenxa yokwenqaba ukuzitika ngocansi noButhelezi.Nakuba kunjalo kodwa uButhelezi uthe konke lokhu kungamanga kodwa itulo elakhiwa ngokuhlanganyela ngamalungu e-ANC naweNFP ngenhloso yokudicilela phansi isithunzi sakhe.

UPHIKO lwentsha lwe-ANC, i-ANCYL eThekwini, linxuse umasipala ukuba upheze ukumosha imali, lukhala ngokuhlaliswa kwemihlangano yamakhansela e-Inkosi Albert Luthuli Convention Centre (ICC) okuthiwa kudla imali eyevile ku-R1 million ngenyanga.Lokhu bekusohlwini lwezikhalo ezidluliselwe eHhovisi leMeya yeTheku, uMnuz Cyril Xaba, emva kwemashi ebisuka e-Durban Christian Centre yaphelela e-City Hall.Kule mashi bekukhalwa ngokugqoza kokuqashwa kwentsha kulo masipala.Efunda uhlu lwezikhalo, uNksz Zama Mncube ongumgqugquzeli we-ANCYL eThekwini, uthe iningi imali ekhokhwa wumasipala ukubamba imihlangano yamakhansela-ICC, okumele ngabe kusetshenziswa i-City Hall.“I-City Hall sekuyophela iminyaka ewu-10 kunengxenye elungiswayo, okungapheli ukulungiswa kwayo okwenza kubhukhwe i-ICC ukubamba imihlangano. Akuzwakali ukuthi ukulungiswa kwale ndawo sekungathatha isikhathi eside kanje, asazi noma kukhona yini ozuzayo kulokhu, kodwa uma kunjalo sizothola,” usho kanje.Uthe imali ekhokhwa e-ICC, ibingalekelela ekuqasheni inqwaba yentsha ukunciphisa ingwadla yokungasebenzi kwayo egqame kakhulu kulo masipala.Lolu phiko luthi yinqwaba yezikhala zemisebenzi, umasipala ongaqashi muntu kuzo okumele ngabe kusebenza abantu abasha, naveze ukuthi zevile ku-4 000 emikhakheni eyehlukene.Intsha ithi ifuna isabelomalo esinikwa yihhovisi layo esibhekelele izinhlelo, sibe ngu-R1 billion, njengoba ithi u-R9 million owabelwa ihhovisi labantu abasha awenele kwazise ziningi izinhlelo okumele zenziwe. Bafuna umasipala ubuyisele emsebenzini abantu abasha abebesebenza ohlelweni oluxhaswa wuMnyango wezeMisebenzi yoMphakathi olubizwa nge-Expanded Public Works Programme. Le ntsha yaphelelwa wumsebenzi ngoJulayi emva kokuthi umasipala umemezele ukuthi awunayo imali eyanele oyithola emnyangweni ukuxhasa lolu hlelo.Okunye abakhale ngakho, inkinga yamanzi ekhungethe lo masipala abafuna ilungiswe ngokushesha kuphinde kuqashwe abantu abasha ekutheni benze umsebenzi wokuhlola amamitha emizini yabantu, njengoba kunezikhalo ezithi umasipala ubiza imali ayithandayo ngokusetshenziswa kwamanzi, abekho abasebenzi abanele abahlola ukusetshenziswa kwayo. Bafuna umasipala ukuthi ulungise udaba lwamabhilidi abathi agweve nabofika.Le mashi beyihanjelwe uMengameli we-ANCYL, uMnuz Collen Malatji. Ekhuluma nabebehambele imashi, uMalatji unxuse intsha yale nhlangano ukuthi iqinisekise ukubuyela emagatsheni ayo iwavuselele njengoba imiphumela yokhetho langoMeyi lukhombisile ukuthi yehlelwe ukuthenjwa ngabantu.“I-ANC ihlale ku-40% kuzwelonke. Esikhathini sokuphila kwethu, ihleli ku-14% KwaZulu-Natal. Kunzima, akusafani nayizolo. Lokhu kusho ukuthi indlela esenza ngayo izinto kumele ishintshe. Kumele sibuyele emuva silungise emagatsheni ethu, siyeke ukulwela ukuthi kukhethwa bani, ubani akakhethwa. I-MK ifikile, yathatha amavolontiya enu, yadla ukudla kwenu kwayiwa okhethweni yawina,” usho kanje.

NKOSIKHONA CELELIQINISA ubudlelwane elinabo namabandla ehlukene asesifundazweni saKwaZulu- Natal iqembu i-African Transformation Movements (ATM).Lokhu kudalulwe nguMphostoli Mxolisi Phakathi oyilungu eliqavile laleli qembu futhi ophinde abe yilungu lesiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal.Muva nje leli qembu kade lihambele amabandla ehlukene, okukhona nelinye lamadala aseZayoni neselihlanganise iminyaka engu-100 laba khona.Leli bandla yi-Ethiopian Holy Baptist Church in Zion (EHBCIZ) elaziwa kakhulu ngeleZikhova Ezimnqini kanti inkonzo ibiseZakheni, eMnambithi.Lihambele nebandla iThrone of Grace eliholwa nguMbhishobhi Thabani Khumalo.Lidlulele eNewcatsle enkonzweni yeRivers of Mercy Ministries (RMM) eholwa ngu-Arch Bishop TM Shongwe.Amanye amabandla ahanjelwe yileli bandla yiNkazimulo Church of Christ neBandla leNkosi uJesu Msindisi."Kuyinto emqoka kakhulu ukuthi iqembu lethu libonakale liba nobudlelwane obuhle namabandla ehlukene.“Siyakholelwa kakhulu ekutheni ukuze konke iqembu kulihambele kahle, liyadinga ukuba nobudlelwane namabandla,'' usho kanje.Ugcizelele ukuthi lobu budlelwane akubona obesikhashana futhi abuncikile kuphela ngoba sekusondele isikhathi sokhetho lukazwelonke."Lobu ubudlelwane beqiniso esinabo namabandla ehlukene. Siyakuqonda kahle kamhlophe ukuthi bumqoka kangakanani ukuthi sibe yiqembu elisebenzisana eduze namabandla,'' esho.Ugcizelele kakhulu ukuthi kukhona konke abakwenzayo kuncika kakhulu eduze kwentando kaNkulunkulu ngoba kakade vele bamele lokho.Uthembise ukuthi bazoqhubeka nokusebenzisana namabandla noma ngabe seludlulile ukhetho.UMphostoli Phakathi uphinde abe yilungu lokuqina lebandla, iTwelve Apostolic Church in Christ (TACC).Leli qembu lisungulwe ngaphansi kwesisekelo senkolo yokubusa kwentando kaNkulunkulu emhlabeni nje jikelele.

I-ATM iyaqhubeka nemizamo yokuchitha umbiko woMvikeli woMphakathi okhipha phambili uMengameli, uCyril Ramaphosa, ngodaba lokuntshontshwa kwezindodla zamadola aseMelika epulazini lakhe iPhala Phala.I-ATM ifake amaphepha okuphendula esicelweni sayo esifake eNkantolo eNkulu ePitoli, lapho ifuna ukuthi kuchithwe umbiko ka-Advocate Kholeka Gcaleka.URamaphosa wayesolwa ngokungawabikeli amaphoyisa ngokuntshontshwa kwemali engu- $580 000 (R10 million) eyantshontshwa ngo-2020.Umbiko ka-Advocate Gcaleka wathola ukuthi uRamaphosa akukho okuphambene nomthetho akwenzayo.Kepha i-ATM ayizange iwemukele lo mbiko, yakhala ngokuthi uRamaphosa kufanele achaze ngale mali.Yabe isifaka icala, ikhala ngokuthi u-Advocate Gcaleka akazange akhulume nabo bonke abantu abathintekayo.Emaphepheni asenkantolo, umholi we-ATM, uMnuz Vuyo Zungula, wathi u-Advocate Gcaleka kwakufanele akhulume nowayeyimenenja epulazini likaRamaphosa, uMnuz Simphiwe Ndlovu, okuthiwa uyena owafihla lemali empahleni yasendlini.UNdlovu kuthiwa wanqaba ukukhuluma no-Advocate Gcaleka, uZungula wathi kwakufanelwe aphoqwe ukuthi aphendule imibuzo.UZungula wathi u-Advocate Gcaleka kwakufanele aphinde akhulume nowayesebenza endlini, Nksz Froliana Joseph, okuthiwa uyena owahlebela izigebengu ezashaqa lemali.UNksz Joseph nomfowabo, uMnuz Ndilishano David Joseph, baboshelwe leli cala. Okhulumela i-ATM, uMnuz Zama Ntshona, uthe banethemba lokuthi inkantolo izovumelana nabo kulesicelo sabo.UNtshona uthe bafuna ukuthi u-Advocate Gcaleka aqale phansi umbiko wakhe.“Sifuna enze uphenyo lwakhe ngendlela, asinikeze umbiko oqondile.”UNtshona uthe u-Advocate Gcaleka wavikela uRamaphosa ngoba nakhu encenge umsebenzi.Ngesikhathi enza umbiko, u-Advocate Gcaleka wayebambile esikhundleni sakhe.Kwenzeka lokhu nje iNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo isanda kwemukela icala elifakwe i-EFF, ephonsela inselelo isinqumo sePhalamende sokuchithwa umbiko wethimba elaliphenya ngalolu daba.Umbiko wethimba elaliholwa owayeyinhloko yamaJaji, uSandile Ngcobo, wathola ukuthi kukhona uRamaphosa okufanele akuphendule.Nokho iningi lamalungu ePhalamede lavotela ukuthi umbiko uchithwe, nokwakhalisa amaqembu aphikisayo.I-ATM iyona eyayikade ifake isikhalazo ePhalamende esaholela ekutheni kusungulwe ithimba.

I-DA income umsebenzi owenziwe ongqongqoshe bayo kuphela izinsuku ezingu-100 kwasungulwa uhulumeni wokubambisana ophethe izwe.Umholi weDA, uMnuz John Steenhuisen, uthe mkhulu umsebenzi owenziwe ongqongqoshe baleli qembu abajutshwe eminyangweni ehlukene ezinsukwini ezingu-100 ezedlule.Amalungu eKhabhinethi likaMengameli, Cyril Ramaphosa, amenyezelwa ngoJuni 30, kanti ayeqhamuka emaqenjini ezepolitiki ayishumi.Ukwakhiwa kukahulumeni wokubambisana akuzange kube lula njengoba kwakunokuklwebhana emaqenjini ezepolitiki.I-DA yake yasikaza ukungangeni kuhulumeni wokubambisana kubangwa ukwabiwa kwezikhundla.Echaza ngokungena kwabo kuhulumeni wokubambisana, uSteenhuisen uthe babeka phambili izidingo zezwe.“Sasibhekene nezinto ezimbili lapha. Okokuqala; kwakuwukuthi siyeke kube nohulumeni wokubambisana owawuzokuba ne-EFF ne-MK. Lo hulumeni wawuzoguqisa umnotho wezwe. Okwesibili; kwakungukuthi thina singene kuhulumeni wokubambisana, bese sikhulisa umnotho. Sakhetha ukukhulisa umnotho.”Ezinsukwini ezingu-100 ezedlule akuzange kube lula kuhulumeni wokubambisana.Kuke kwaba nezikhathi lapho i-DA isabisa ngokushiya kubangwa imithetho efana nowezemfundo, iBasic Education Laws Amendement Act, nowomshwalense wezempilo, i-National Health Insurance.UNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo oyilungu le-DA, uNksz Siviwe Gwarube, akazange alubhade mhla kusayinwa umthetho wezemfundo njengoba i-DA ingajabule ngezinye izigaba zomthetho.I-DA iphinde ingajabuli nge-NHI, eyaphasiswa ngaphambi kokhetho.I-DA yathola izikhundla ezibhekile kuhulumeni wokubambisana njengoba inongqongqoshe abayisithupha, namaphini ongqongqoshe ayisithupha.USteenhuisen uthe ongqongqoshe baleli qembu babeke phambili ukuthuthukiswa komnotho nokudalwa kwamathuba emisebenzi.“Ukungena kwethu kuhulumeni wokubambisana kwabuyisa ithemba lekusasa elingcono nokukhula komnotho. Kulezi nsuku ezingu-100 zokuqala senze izinto ezibonakalayo. Into egqame kakhulu ekusebenzeni kukahulumeni wokubambisana ukukhula komnotho nokuncipha kwesibalo sabantu abangasebenzi. “Lena into esiyibeke phambili njenge-DA. Eqinisweni sifuna ukuthi bonke ongqongqoshe bethu baqhamuke nezindlela zokuthuthukisa umnotho nezokudala amathuba emisebenzi eminyangweni abajutshwe kuyo. Ongqongqoshe bethu sebeqalile ukwenza lo msebenzi.”USteenhuisen uthe ongqongqoshe be-DA sebeqalile ukuhoxisa izinhlelo zikahulumeni ezingabasizi ngalutho abantu bakuleli.“Ongqongoshe bethu bakuqaphe ngelokhozi ukusetshenziswa kwemali yeminyango abajutshwe kuyo. Asikwazi ukuqhubeka nokusebenzisa imali entweni engabasizi ngalutho abantu bakuleli.”USteenhuisen uthe ongqongqoshe be-DA baphenya nangenkohlakalo eminyangweni abayiphethe, wabalula uMnyango wezeMisebenzi yoMphakathi neNgqalasizinda.

I-DA isisabise ngokuthi ngeke iqhubeke nokuba yingxenye kahulumeni wokubambisana kwamaqembu ahlukene, uma i-ANC iwisa umnotho noma ibukela phansi uMthethosisekelo.Leli qembu lithe lingamane liphume kulokhu kubambisana ngoba ngaphandle kwalo uhulumeni awunakho ukwesekwa okwanele.Lokhu kushiwo ngumholi walo uMnuz John Steenhuisen ekhuluma ne-Cape Town Press Club, eKapa.Usho lokhu nje kunokuzamazama kulo hulumeni wokubambisana njengoba leli qembu linxenxe uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ukuthi angawusayini uMthethosivivinywa wezikole okunemvunge ngawo iBela Bill.Leli qembu lifuna kulungiswe ezinye izinto elingeneme ngazo kulo Mthethosivivinywa.“Ukungavumelani ngezinto ezithinta nemigomo akusho ukuthi sekukhona ukusabisa ngokuthi aluzobakhona uzinzo kuhulumeni wokubambisana. Kodwa lokhu akusho ukuthi siyohlala unomphela noma kuthiwa kukhona izinto esingeneme ngazo, Okubalulekile kwi-DA ukukhulisa umnotho, sakhe namathuba emisebenzi. Uma lo hulumeni ehluleka ukwenza lokhu, asikho isidingo sokuthi siqhubeke nokuba yingxenye yawo,” kuxwayisa uSteenhuisen. Uthe uma i-ANC ifuna ukuwisa umnotho nokungahloniphi uMthethosisekelo leli qembu liyophuma kuhulumeni.“Uma i-ANC ibukela phansi izinhlaka ezizimele okubalwa ibhange  loMbuso, noma iqeda izinto ngezinto ezithile, ngeke siqhubeke nokuba kuhulumeni.”Uthe ngaphambi kokuphuma kuyoxoxwa, uma kungavunyelwana bese bephuma.“Siyazi ngeke sithole esikufunayo ngaso sonke isikhathi kodwa kanjalo ne-ANC ngeke ihlale ithola ekufunayo. Abantu bakuleli babaluleke kakhulu kunemizwa yosopolitiki,” kugcizelela uSteenhuisen.Odabeni oluthinta iBela Bill, uthe uma egcina ngokusayina, bazobheka ezinye izindlela abazozenza.“Siyayichitha eyeBela Bill, ngoba ibeka engcupheni izinto ezithinta ulimi lwebele ezikoleni. Ngihlanganile noRamaphosa ngamnxenxa ukuthi angasayini. Kuhulumeni wokubambisana kumele abaholi bazibheke izikhalo zabanye,” kusho uSteenhuisen.Kwenzeka lokhu nje iyaqonga ingcindezi yokuthi uRamaphosa awusayine umthetho.Izinhlangano ezehlukene okubalwa uphiko lwentsha lwe-ANC, umfelandawonye wezinyunyana zabasebenzi iCosatu, iqembu i-EFF, nezinyunyana zothisha bafuna uRamaphosa awusayine umthetho ngoba waphasiswa nayiPhalamende.Bezivele zikhala ngokuthi azazi kubambeni ngoba waphasiswa yihlandla eledlule lePhalamende.USteenhuisen uthe ezinye zeziphakamiso abazozenza ngukuthi imali eholwa abangatohozi nyanga zonke okunguR370, iphendulwe ibe isibonelelo sabafuna umsebenzi.Okunye ngukuthi ukukhula kwamaholo abasebenzi bakahulumeni kuhambisane neCPI.

I-DA eThekwini isiveze ukuthi ukungabikho kwemali kadizili wamaloli athwala amanzi yikho okwenza ukuthi angafinyeleli kuzo zonke izindawo ezisuke ziphelelwe yiwo.Ngokusho kukaMnuz Chris van den Berg oyikhansela le-DA ku-ward 63 eThekwini, ngesikhathi engekho amanzi eMalvern, Northdene, Burlington, Chatsworth, KwaSanti, Klaarwater nezinye izindawo, uye wabuza ukuthi kungani kungathunyelwa amaloli, wabe esetshelwa ukuthi apakile ngoba awuthengiwe udizili.Amanzi aphele ngoLwesine ntambama ezindaweni ezihlukene emuva kwezinkinga zikagesi nokufa kwe-motor esiza amaphampu amanzi.“Amaloli athwala amanzi ebengenawo udizili yingakho abantu beye balinda isikhathi eside ukuze bathole amanzi. Ngithole ukuthi le nkinga isilungisiwe kwase kuthunyelwa amaloli ngoMgqibelo emini. Kuyishwa ukuthi izinkinga zamanzi ziyaqhubeka eThekwini yize umasipala wawuthembise ukuthi iyalungiswa ingqalasizinda,” kusho uVan den Berg.Uthe bazoqhubeka beyi-DA nokuluphakamisa udaba lokulungiswa kwengqalasizinda yamanzi ngoba yindala kakhulu.Uveze ukuthi umasipala wawuthe uzofaka imali eyengeziwe uma abantu bekhokhela amanzi ukuze izoqoqwa bese kulungiswa ingqalasizinda kodwa abazi ukuthi ishonephi leyo mali.“Umsebenzi wokuqinisekisa ukuthi amanzi ayaphuma kompompi baseThekwini unzima ngoba amapayipi aqhuma njalo. Lolu daba saluphakamisa kudala futhi besazi ukuthi ayalungiswa kodwa kubukeka sengathi kufanele sisiqaphe ngeso lokhozi isimo sokulungiswa kwawo ngoba aqhuma njalo,” kusho uVan den Berg.UNkk Gugu Sisilana okhulumela uMasipala weTheku, uthe akusilo iqiniso ukuthi ubungekho udizili noma umasipala uphelelwe yimali yokuthenga udizili.“Okwenzekile wukuthi kuye kwabambezela ukudilivwa kukadizili emuva kokwehla kwawo ngoLwesithathu. Lokhu kudalwa wukuthi izinkampani zikadizili aziwuthenganga ngesikhathi ngoba zifuna ukuwuthenga uma sewehlile. Yikona okubambezele ukuthunyelwa kukadizili ezindaweni zethu. Amaloli athwala amanzi abe eselinda kolayini abade ngaphambi kokuthi agcwalise udizili, yikona lokhu okuye kwawabambezela,” kuchaza uNkk Sisilana.Uthe amadepho kamasipala aqale ukuthola udizili ngoLwesihlanu ntambama kwayima kugcwaliswa amaloli athwala amanzi.Ukugcizelele ukuthi umasipala awunayo inkinga kadizili kodwa ukufuneka kwawo nxazonke ngenxa yokwehla kwentengo yawo yikona okubambezele amaloli amanzi.

I-DA ithe ngeke ikwazi ukungena esixaxeni samaqembu uma kukhona i-MK, EFF nePatriotic Alliance, kungamane kuyekwe. Lo mbandela uvezwe wuMnuz Werner Horn ekhuluma ne-SAfm.Amaqembu amatasa nomshikashika wokuxoxisana ukuze kubunjwe uhulumeni wobumbano emuva kokuthi lingabanga khona iqembu elinqobe ngengcaca.I-ANC iphunyukwe yizintambo zombuso yathola u-40%, nokuyiphoqa ukuthi ihambe iphaphatha emaqenjini ixoxa nawo ukuze kungenwe kuhulumeni.UWerner uthe isigungu sabo esiphezulu sithathe isinqumo ngamaqembu okungase kusetshenzwe nawo.“NgoMsombuluko isigungu esiphezulu sizonquma ngendlela eya phambili. Noma ngabe aneqhaza elincane kanjani la maqembu amathathu, ngeke sikwazi impela, sekuyoba nzima kithi,’’ kusho uWerner engacucuzi.Kwenzeka lokhu nje uMengameli we-ANC uCyril Ramaphosa, ngoLwesine ebusuku umemezele ukuthi isigungu sabo esiphezulu sivumelane ngohulumeni wobumbano.UWerner uthe kuyabakhathaza ukuthi uRamaphosa akachazanga kahle ngemicikilishi yohulumeni wobumbano akhuluma ngawo. IMK nePatriotic Alliance bangene okokuqala ePhalamende futhi bafike kwezwakala bathola izihlalo.I-ANC ithe yona izimisele ngokuxoxa nawo wonke amaqembu izwe iziphakamiso zawo ngohulumeni.

IQEMBU i-EFF lengeze ithimba labaholi balo abajutshwe ukuba baqhube umkhankaso KwaZulu-Natal njengoba isifundazwe sibhekwe ngabomvu okhethweni olungoMeyi 29.I-EFF inqume ukwandisa ithimba eliholwa yiPhini likaMengameli, uMnuz Floyd Shivambu, ngabaholi abane.Isinqumo sokwandisa ithimba labaholi sithathwe emhlanganweni wekomiti elididiyela imikhankaso yokhetho kwi-EFF.Abaholi abajutshwe ukuba bazoqinisa ithimba; uNobhala Jikelele, uMnuz Marshal Dlamini, owayeyiphini likanobhala jikelele, uNksz Hlengiwe Mkhaliphi namalungu esigungu esiphezulu; uMnuz Fana Mokoena, noNksz Reneiloe Mashabela.I-EFF ithatha lesi sinqumo nje, isanda kwethula umkhankaso wezethembiso zokhetho kuso isifundazwe iKwaZulu-Natal.Okhulumela i-EFF, uMnuz Sinawo Thambo, uthe emva kwempumelelo yomcimbi wokwethulwa kwezethembiso zokhetho babone isidingo sokuba baqinise ithimba labaholi.“IKwaZulu-Natal iyona elele isibili ngokwezinombolo zabantu ababhalisele ukuvota njengoba bengu-5 723 821 abantu ababhalisile esifundazweni. Umbango uzokuba mkhulu eKZN. Ingakho sikhethe ukuqinisa ithimba eliholwa uShivambu.”I-EFF yenza kahle KwaZulu-Natal okhethweni olwedlule njengoba yathola izihlalo eziyisishagalombili esiShayamthetho sesifundazwe, isuka kwezimbili.UThambo uthe bafuna ukuphinde bandise isibalo samavoti abazowathola KwaZulu-Natal okhethweni lwangoMeyi.“Muhle kakhulu umsebenzi owenziwa ithimba labaholi elijutshwe eKZN. I-EFF ikhombisa ukukhula nokulungela ukhetho. Ukugcwalisa kwethu inkundla ngesikhathi sethula umkhankaso wokhetho kukutshela lukhulu. Inkundla yagcwaliswa kuphela abantu abaqhamuka KwaZulu-Natal, nokusho ukuthi i-EFF iyathandwa eKZN. Asikungabazi ukuthi umsebenzi omuhle owenziwa ithimba labaholi uzoheha abantu abaningi ukuba bavotele i-EFF ukuze sikhiphe i-ANC emandleni. I-ANC yehluleke yancama ukuphatha.”Khonamanjalo: Umholi we-EFF, uMnuz Julius Malema, wethule umqulu wezethembiso zokhetho esifundazweni iGauteng, ngoMgqibelo.UMalema utshele izinkumbi ebezigcwele enkundleni iDobsonville ukuthi i-EFF izolunqoba ukhetho oluzayo.UMalema ukhwele wadilika emndenini wezimpunyela zakwa-Oppenheimer.Amalungu alo mndeni asematheni emva kokunikela ngezigidi zamaRandi kumaqembu ezepolitiki aphikisayo.Mumva nje, uNksz Rebecca Oppenheimer unikele ngoR15 million kwiqembu lezepolitiki elisha, iRise Mzansi.“Kungani abantu bakwa-Oppenheimer benikela ngezigidi kumaqembu ezepolitiki amasha, angenamlando? Sekunesikhathi eside abantu bakwa-Oppenheimer belawula izwe lethu. Sekuyisikhathi sokuthi sibuyise izwe lethu.”

I-EFF ithi izosiphikisa isinqumo senkantolo yaseKapa, sokulahla ngecala uNobhala jikelele waleli qembu uMarshall Dlamini.Inkantolo igwebe uDlamini izinyanga ezingu-18 ebhale ejele okuyisigwebo esilengiswe iminyaka emihlanu, ngecala lokushaya iphoyisa ngesikhathi kunenkulumo eyayibhekiswe esizweni ngo-2019 ePhalamende. Uhlawuliswe uR6 000 ngecala lokulimaza impahla.Leli qembu lithe uDlamini uzoqhubeka nemisebenzi yakhe nokuba yilungu lePhalamende.Okhulumela i-EFF uNksz Lee Anne Mathys, uthe uDlamini wayezivikela ngesikhathi kwenzeka lesi sigameko ePhalamende.Uthe wayevikela ubuholi be-EFF njengoba amaphoyisa ayeveze ukuthi umholi waleli qembu uMnuz Julius Malema wayengenzakaliswa.“Leli cala likuveza ngokusobala ukuthi kwakunezinhlelo zokucasula ubuholi be-EFF. Kwakunezinhlelo ngaleliya langa zokuthi kuvinjwe amalungu e-EFF ukuthi enze umsebenzi wawo. Yingakho sizosiphikisa lesi sinqumo senkantolo ngokuhlanganyela noDlamini.”Uthe inkantolo ikuvezile ukuthi uDlamini ngeke esakuphinda lokhu akwenza.

ISHINTSHE umshovo i-EFF ijuba uNobhala-Jikelele wayo, uMnuz uMarshall Dlamini, embangweni wesikhundla sikandunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal.Seluvele luqalile ukhetho zidlana imilala kuyavotwa njengoba kuqalwe ngabavota ngokukhethekile izolo, nanamuhla beqhubeka. Kulindeleke ukuthi kusasa kuqale ukuvota uwonkewonke.Isifundazwe i-KZN ibukeka iyintombi efunwa yizo zonke izinsizwa kwezepolitiki ngoba imikhankaso yamaqembu iqine kakhulu khona.I-EFF imemezele ukuthi uDlamini uzongenela umbango wesikandunankulu njengoba zidlana imilala okhethweni. Lokhu kusho ukuthi uma ingase isithole isikhundla nguyena oyongena kusona ahole uhulumeni.Akuvamile kwezepolitiki ukuthi unobhala-jikelele ohlala ehhovisi elikhulu abuye ayobanga izikhundla ezingeni elingaphansi. Okunye okuqaphelekayo wukuthi i-EFF imeqile uSihlalo wayo waseKZN, uMnuz uMongezi Twala, yalanda uDlamini phezulu. Okwesithathu wukuthi i-EFF ithathe isikhathi eside kakhulu ukumemezela egadla ngaye kwesombango kandunankulu ekubeni amanye amaqembu kade abamemezela. Igama likaDlamini lize lavezwa wumholi weqembu, uMnuz uJulius Malema, emcimbini wabo womkhankaso wokugcina eLimpopo.UMalema uthe uma bethatha uhulumeni, bazojuba abantu abafundile abanesipiliyoni nabanamakhono afanele noma ngabe abawona amalungu e-EFF.UDlamini udabuka eMzimkhulu khona kulesi sifundazwe. Kuvalwa ihlandla likahulumeni nje ubeyilungu lePhalamende, emele lona iqembu lakhe.Ubuye aziwe njengosomabhizinisi kanti ubesanda kuthweswa iziqu ze-Bachelor of Arts in International Relations azithole e-Unisa nyakenye. UDlamini uphakanyiswa nje ngo-Ephreli nonyaka ulahlwe yicala lokushaya iphoyisa ngesihluku ePhalamende kanti kulindeleke ukuthi agwetshwe ngoMeyi 31.UDlamini uzanywe kaningi ocingweni wangatholakala njengoba belukhala lungabanjwa. Kuzanywe nomkhulumeli weqembu, uMnuz Sinawo Tambo, naye ongatholakalanga.

I-ESKOM isicele amaqembu epolitiki ukuba ayeke ukunameka izingqwembe zokhetho kwingqalasizinda yayo.UNksz Daphne Mokoena okhulumela i-Eskom uthe akuvumelekile ukunameka izingqwembe kwingqalasizinda kagesi ngoba lokhu kungalimaza loyo ogibela kule ngqalasizinda.Uthe ngabasebenzi base-Eskom kuphela abavumeleke ukugibela kwingqalasizinda kagesi ngoba yibona abakwazi ukulandela imigomo yezokuphepha.Ngokujwayelekile izingqwembe zokhetho zinamekwa ezigxotsheni zikagesi nasezihlahleni.Khonamanjalo, i-Eskom ithembisa ukuthi ngeke uhambe kakhulu ugesi ebusika njengoba ilindele ukuwunqamula ngokwesigaba sesibili kuya kwesesine.Kungenzeka uma kukubi kakhulu unqamuke ngokwesigaba sesihlanu.Lezi zindaba zivezwe yisikhulu esiphezulu sase-Eskom uDkt Dan Marokane esithangamini sabezindaba.UMarokane uthe balindele ukuthi ugesi unqamuke izinsuku eziwu-50 phakathi kuka-Ephreli no-Agasti nonyaka.Ulindele ukuthi basebenzise udizili ka-R8.8 billion uma kuba nezimo eziphoqayo.Uthe abantu abehlise umoya ukuthi ugesi ungase unqamuke kuya kwisigaba sesishiyagalombili ngoba lokho ngeke kwenzeke.Uveze ukuthi izinhlelo zabo zokulungisa ingqalasizinda nemishini yabo ephehla ugesi zihamba kahle yingakho izwe selinezinsuku eziwu-31 zokunganqamuki kukagesi.Ubalule ukuthi uma kufe imishini ehambisa ugesi owu-14 000MW bazokwazi ukunqamula ugesi ngokwesigaba sokuqala kanti uma imishini yabo ifa kakhulu kulahleka ugesi owu-17 000MW bazobe sebewunqamula ngokwesigaba sesihlanu.

INKAMPANI ephehla ugesi kuleli i-Eskom isiqale uhlelo lokucisha ugesi ngenhloso yokuhlenga ingqalasizinda yayo esengcupheni yokusha.INKAMPANI ephehla ugesi kuleli i-Eskom isiqale uhlelo lokucisha ugesi ngenhloso yokuhlenga ingqalasizinda yayo esengcupheni yokusha.UNkk Daphne Mokoena obhekelele ezokuxhumana e-Eskom, uthe ukucisha ugesi isikhashana akufani nohlelo lokunqanyulwa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga okuyinto esime izinsuku ezingaphezu kuka-105.Uthe sebeqale uhlelo abalubiza ngokuthi yi-“Save Your Transformers. Save Lives” olugqugquzela abantu ukuthi bonge ugesi, bawuthenge ezindaweni ezisemthethweni, bangaxhumi nowezinyokanyoka.Uveze ukuthi i-Eskom iyaphoqeleka ukuthi inciphise ugesi amahora ambalwa ngenxa yokuthi ingqalasizinda yawo okungama-transformer iyasindwa ngenxa yokwebiwa kukagesi.Uthe u-94% wama-transformer asindwayo okusho ukuthi awu-2 111 ezweni jikelele. Atholakala  eLimpopo, KwaZulu-Natal, Gauteng, Western Cape, Eastern Cape, North West naseMpumalanga.“Ama-transformer agcina esesindwa ngenxa yokuxhunywa kukagesi wezinyokanyoka, ukwebiwa kukagesi, ukuthengwa kukagesi kubantu abangavunyelwe nokuxhunywa kwezigubhu ezingekho semthethweni. Kufanele siwucime ugesi ukuze sivikele ingqalasizinda yethu ngoba uma i-transformer isha lokhu kuchaza ukuthi indawo ingasala ingenagesi izinyanga eziyisithupha,” kuchaza uNksz Mokoena.Uthe ukucishwa kukagesi nokunqamuka kwawo akufani ngoba ukucima ugesi ukuze kuvikelwe ama-transformer akusho ukuthi ugesi usuke usaphehlwa kodwa usuke ukhona.“Uma sicima ugesi sisuke sivikela ukuthi ama-transformer angashi nempilo yabantu. Uma sinqamula ugesi usuke ungekho mningi ophehliwe ngakho siye siwunqamuke ukugwema ukuthi izwe libe mnyama bhuqe. Lo ocinywayo manje wenzela ukuvikela ukusha kwengqalasizinda kagesi,” usho kanje.Lapho bezocisha khona ugesi, uNkk Mokoena, uthe omasipala bazobazisa abantu ukuthi kuzocishwa nini.Ucele abantu ukuthi bonge ugesi, babike izigameko zobugebengu okubalwa labo abaxhume ugesi wezinyokanyoka, abeba ingqalasizinda kagesi ku-0800 112 722.Usihlalo wePietermaritzburg and Midlands Chamber of Business, uthe ukucima kukagesi kubi ebhizinisini futhi eMgungudlovu ugesi ucima njalo.Uthe osomabhizinisi abancane bayaphazamiseka ngoba abanayo imali yokuthenga ama-generator, labo abakwazi ukuthenga ama-generator inzuzo abayiboni ngenxa yokuthi imali iphelela kudizili.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi eMgungundlovu namaphethelo ugesi uye ucime ngabo-5 ekuseni ubuye ngo-9 ekuseni noma ucime ngo-5 ntambama bese ubuya ngo-9 ebusuku.Njalo ngosuku ugesi uhamba amahora amane ngenxa yohlelo lokuvikela ingqalasizinda.

INKAMPANI ephehla ugesi kuleli ithi seyonge u-R12 billion ebizothenga ngawo udizili ukube inkinga kagesi obucima umlibe ibisaqhubeka.Lezi zindaba zivezwe ngoLwesihlanu, eGoli, nguNksz Daphe Mokwena okhulumela i-Eskom, othe sekuphele izinsuku eziwu-163 ugesi wagcina ukunqamuka okuyisimo esagcina ukubonakala ngo-2018.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi kusukela ngoMashi 26, ugesi awukaze unqamuke yize ubudingeka kakhulu ebusika.Selokhu kwaqala izinkinga zikagesi, i-Eskom ibiye isebenzise udizili uma imishini ephehla ugesi ngamalahle inenkinga, lokhu bekwenzelwa ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izwe alibi mnyama bhuqe.UNksz Mokwena uveze ukuthi ngoJulayi 9, ugesi obudingeka ezweni uwu-33 385MW kodwa akuzange kube nesidingo sokuwunqamula ngenhloso yokuwonga ngenxa yokuthi imishini iwuphehla kahle.Uthe kulo nyaka imali esisebenzile ngodizili wu-R3.62 billion kusukela ngo-Ephreli 1 kuze kube wu-Septhemba 5. Ngonyaka odlule imali eyayisisebenzile ukuthenga udizili ngesikhathi esifanayo iwu-R15.74 billion.Uveze ukuthi zihamba kahle izinhlelo zokulungisa iziphehli zikahgesi futhi iziteshi zabo zikhiqiza ugesi owu-66% nangaphezulu. Phakathi kweziteshi ezenza kahle kubalwa iKusile, Grootvlei, Kendal, Lethabo neMatla.Njengamanje i-Eskom iphehla ugesi owu-30 643MW ngosuku kanti ngezikhathi zantambama abantu bavamise ukusebenzisa ugesi owu-26 345MW.I-Eskom imemezele ukuthi ayilindele ukuthi kunqamuke ugesi ehlobo okuyisikhathi esisukela ku-Septhemba kuze kube wukuphela kukaMashi wonyaka ozayo.Yize ugesi ungasanqamuki kodwa kwezinye izindawo usacima ngenxa yokuthi kufanele kuvikelwe ama-transformer ikakhulukazi ezindaweni okuxhunywe kuwo ugesi wezinyokanyoka.UNksz Mokwena ucele abantu ukuthi bagade inqgalasizinda kagesi, uma bebona okungahambi kahle bashayele i-Eskom ku-0800 112 722 noma ku-WhatsApp 081 333  3323.

ZIHAMBA kahle izinhlelo zokuguqula isimo enkampanini ephehla ugesi kuleli, i-Eskom njengoba imemezele ukuthi isiyonge u-R9.59 billion kwizindleko zikadizili kulo nyaka.UNksz Daphne Mokwena okhulumela i-Eskom uthe bazongile izindleko kudizili njengoba kulo nyaka besasebenzise oka-R3.48 billion kanti ngonyaka odlule ngesikhathi esifanayo base besebenzise oka-R13.07 billion.“Zihamba kahle izinhlelo zokuqinisekisa ukuthi i-Eskom isebenza kahle njengoba sikwazile ukonga imali ebesiyisebenzisa kudizili ngo-R9.59 billion,” kusho uNksz Mokwena.I-Eskom ibisebenzisa udizili omningi uma ugesi ucime kungalindelwe ngenxa yokufa kwemishini.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi sekuphele izinsuku eziwu-135 ugesi ungacimi eNingizimu Afrika.Ezindaweni lapho ucima khona kungenxa yohlelo olubizwa nge-load reduction, lapho i-Eskom iphoqeleka ukuthi icime ugesi ukuze ivikele ingqalasizinda.Ngokusho kukaNksz Mokwena, i-load reduction yenzeka kakhulu ezindaweni okuxhunywe kuzo ugesi wezinyokanyoka, ezinemiqasho nezinye esezidinga ugesi omningi kunalowo ingqalasizinda eyayakhelwe ukusabalalisa.Uthe uma ungacimi ugesi ingqalasizinda - okungama-transformer nokunye - ingasha bese kuthatha izinyanga eziningi ukuba ilungiswe. Ngakho ukugwema leso simo baye bacime ugesi ngezikhathi ezithile.

INHLANGANO elwela ukuthi abantu badle ukudla okunomsoco, iHealthy Living Alliance (Heala), isembhidlangweni wokunxenxa uhulumeni ukuba aphoqe izinkampani zokudla ukuthi zibhale emakhathonini nasemathinini ukuthi ukudla kuthakwe ngani.Lapha kukhulunywa ngabakhiqiza iziphuzo, ukudla okusemathinini, okusezitsheni zoplastiki njengamayogathi nokusemakhathonini.UNksz Zukiswa Zimela obhekelele ezokuxhumana kwi-Heala, uthe banemikhankaso emibili eseqhulwini njengamanje. Owokuqala; owokuqinisekisa ukuthi amalebuli okudla anezithako zakho abhalwa ngaphambili, ngamagama agqamile futhi kusheshe kucaciswe ukuthi lokho kudla kunoshukela, usawoti namafutha angakanani.Owesibili; umkhankaso owokuthi intela kashukela isetshenziselwe ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu bakuleli banokudla okwanele ikakhulukazi izingane ezivela emindenini ehlwempu.Lokhu uthe kungenziwa ngokuthi kwengezwe isibonelelo sabangasebenzi noma kwakhiwe izindawo ezilonda ukudla okuzodliwa wumphakathi (food bank).Uthe amalebuli okudla avamise ukuba ngemuva lapho uzotshelwa ngokuthi lokho kudla kuthakwe ngani, ngabe kunempilo nokunye okuningi.Ubalule ukuthi amalebuli okudla ayadida ngoba abhalwe ngamagama esiNgisi angakhulunywa njalo.Lokhu uthi kwenza abantu bathenge noma yikuphi ukudla abasuke bezitshela ukuthi kunempilo kanti kunoshukela, usawoti, amafutha nokunye okungenampilo okusuke kucashile.Uveze ukuthi ukudla kakhulu ushukela, usawoti namafutha kubanga isifo sikashukela (i-type 2 diabetes), isifo somfutho wegazi (high blood), esenhliziyo kanjalo nesohlangothi.“Kubalulekile ukuthi abantu bafundiswe ngendlela yokudla kahle, ukuze bakwazi ukubona ukudla okunomsoco nokungenawo. Into esiyifaka emlonyeni inomthelela empilweni yethu ngoba kukhona asebeguliswa wuhlobo lokudla abakudlayo. Sidinga uhulumeni enze amalebuli okudla abe ngaphambili,” kusho uNksz Zimela.Uveze ukuthi amanye amazwe afuna ukuba nezakhamuzi eziphile kahle aseqalile ukuqinisekisa ukuthi amalebuli aba ngaphambili ekudleni. Kulawo mazwe kubalwa iBrazil, Mexico neChile.Ubuye wakhala ngokuthi eNingizimu Afrika abantu bakhuluphele ngokweqile njengoba ucwaningo luveza ukuthi abayisithupha kwabesifazane abawu-10 bakhuluphele ngokweqile kanti u-13% wezingane ukhuluphele kakhulu.Uthe izifo azigcini kwabesifazane nezingane ngoba olunye ucwaningo luveza ukuthi umuntu oyedwa kwabahlanu eNingizimu Afrika, unesifo somfutho wegazi, esenhliziyo noma usengcupheni yokuqalwa yilezi zifo.Konke lokhu uthe kufakazela ukuthi abantu kufanele badle ukudla okunomsoco, ngisho ezitolo kube sobala ukuthi yini abayithengayo.

INHLANGANO eyengamele ukhetho, i-Independent Electoral Commission (IEC), ifuna lingahoxiswa icala elifakwe i-MK, efuna kuqalwe phansi ukhetho.I-IEC ifuna ukuthi iNkantolo yezoKhetho ichithe imizamo yeMK yokuhoxisa icala njengoba ifuna ukuthi leli cala lilalelwe ngokushesha.I-IEC ithe i-MK yenza izinsolo ezibucayi mayelana nokusingathwa kokhetho lwangoMeyi, yathi kubalulekile ukuthi lolu daba lulalelwe ukuze kuzozwakala iqiniso.Ngeledlule i-MK iveze ukuthi iyalihoxisa icala, yathi izobuye ilifake kabusha.Kepha i-IEC ithe i-MK ayizange ilandele imigudu elandelwayo uma uhoxisa icala.Encwadini yabameli, i-IEC ithe i-MK bekufanele ithole imvume yokuhoxisa icala enkantolo ehlalele udaba.Ithe lokhu kungenxa yokuthi icala selihambe izigaba ezahlukene njengoba kukhona imiyalelo esike yakhishwa inkantolo.I-MK yenza izinsolo zokuthi kwakhwabaniswa amavoti ngesikhathi kunokhetho, yathi kunamavoti angu-9 million angazange abalwe.Ummeli we-IEC, uMnuz Moeti Kanyane, uthe bafuna ukuthi icala lilalelwe.“Kusemqoka ukuthi leli cala lilalelwe izwe libuka, inkantolo bese ithatha isinqumo. Okungenani kufanele sazi ukuthi lezi zinsolo ezibucayi kangaka zinaso yini isisekelo.”UKanyane uthe bafuna nokuthi inkantolo isho ukuthi ubani okufanele akhokhele izindleko zabameli uma kuhoxiswa icala.“I-MK ayizange izibophezele ukuthi izozikhokhela izindleko zabameli. Lapha kumoshwe imali yomphakathi kulungiselwa icala, kanti bazolihoxisa. Kufanele inkantolo ibayalele ukuthi abakhokhe.”Ngesikhathi i-MK ihoxisa icala, yathi izobuye ilifake kabusha.Okhulumela -iMK, uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndhlela, uthe bahoxise icala ngenxa yokuthi sebethole ubufakazi obusha.Wathi bahoxise icala ukuze bezofaka ubufakazi obusha esicelweni abazosifaka kabusha.I-MK yafaka icala ngenyanga eyedlule, emva kokuthi ihlulekile ukuvimba ukumenyezelwa kwemiphumela yokhetho.I-IEC neDA bayasiphikisa isicelo se-MK, bakhala ngokuthi asinabufakazi.Yize i-MK yahlula wonke amaqembu abengenele ukhetho okokuqala, yaphinde yahlula namaqembu amadala afana ne-IFP ne-EFF, ubuholi be-MK abunelisekile ngale miphumela njengoba bekholelwa ekutheni balunqoba ukhetho.Le nhlangano ilale isithathu kuzwelonke, yahamba phambili ngamavoti KwaZulu-Natal.

Inhlangano eyengamele ukhetho i-IEC ithi ithole izikhalo ezingu-579 kusuka kuqale ukhetho.USihlalo we-IEC uMnuz Mosotho Moepya uthe noma ubani unelungelo lokufaka izikhalo kusuka kumalungu omphakathi, amaqembu ezepolitiki noma abangenele ngokuzimela.Uthe izikhalo zithinta abazifake kungakaqedwa ukubala, ezabathi batshelwe ngabanye ukuthi bavotele othile kodwa esikhungweni abaliboni ivoti libaliwe, isikhalo sabathi amavoti abo awaveli esiteshini abavote kuso, ababuza ngokuthi zabiwa kanjani izihlalo ePhalamende nezikhalo zokuziphatha noma ukuqeqeshwa kwabasebenzi be-IEC.Uveze ukuthi banewindi lokulungisa amaphutha nokwenza imiphumela evelayo ibonakale ihlehla iphinde iye phambili.“Kunezikhawu ezingu-24 lapho ikhomishane iyalele ukuthi kuphinde kubalwe.” Kusho uMoepya.Uthe zingu-20 eGauteng izindawo okubalwe kabusha kuzo, ezintathu eNorth West neyodwa eLimpopo.Uthe ngeSonto bazobe bekulungele ukumemezela imiphumela yokhetho kusasa.UMthethosisekelo uthi i-IEC inezinsuku eziyisikhombisa ukumemezela imiphumela ngemuva kokhetho kodwa u Moepya uthe kumele bamemezele ngesikhathi abaqeda ngaso.Umholi woMkhonto Wesizwe uMnuz Jacob Zuma, uthe i-IEC ingajahi ukumemezela imiphumela yokhetho zingalaleliwe izikhalo zayo namanye amaqembu.UZuma uthe abafuni ukucasulwa ngokuthi kujahwe ukubala le miphumela ekubeni kunezikhalazo."Kujahwephi? Ikhomishini imele thina ngakho kumele isilinde uma sinezikhalazo. Asidlali, sifuna kubhekisiswe zonke izikhalazo kungaphuthunywa kukhishwe imiphumela," kusho uZuma.Phezu kokusho kanje kodwa iKhomishini ithe iyaqhubeka nokudedela imiphumela yokhetho ngeSonto ntambama.

INHLANGANO yokhetho kuleli i-IEC, ithi ifuna lulalelwe yiNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo udaba lombango wokungena kukaMnuz Jacob Zuma ohlwini lwabaya ePhalamende.I-IEC ithe lolu daba ifisa lungene eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo ngqo, lungaqali kwenye indawo futhi lube ngoluphuthumayo. Iveze ukuthi ifisa lusombululwe ngaphambi kosuku lokhetho.Izwe lilungiselela ukhetho lukahulumeni kazwelonke oluzoba ngoMeyi 29 nonyaka lapho okulindeleke ukuthi zidlane khona imilala.INkantolo yoMthethosisekelo kuleli kuba yiyona eyokugcina enquma ngezindaba ezisuke zibangwa futhi kuyona kukhona inhloko yamajaji nephini layo namanye amajaji amakhulu.I-IEC isanda kugqemeka ingozi engeqiwa ntwala, ilahlwa yinkantolo odabeni lombango wokungena kukaZuma ohlwini lwabaya ePhalamende.UZuma ngoDisemba nyakenye umemezele ukuthi usejoyine iqembu elisha uMkhonto weSizwe, walaxaza i-ANC.UMkhonto weSiwe umemezele ukuthi uhlasela ngoZuma kwesikamengameli futhi uphezulu ohlwini.I-IEC emuva kwalokho yamemezela ukuthi uZuma ngeke akwazi ukungena ohlwini ngoba uke walahlwa yicala wagwetshwa izinyanga ezingu-15 futhi wangakhokhiswa inhlawulo.UMkhonto weSizwe walufaka enkantolo udaba uphosela inselelo isinqumo se-IEC, amajaji afika alivuna iqembu.I-IEC emuva kwesinqumo ithe isalinde ukuthi amajaji akhiphe incazelo ngesinqumo sawo.I-IEC ithe inqume ukulwedlulisa udaba ngoba ilubona luphuthuma futhi uma lungase luyekwe, luzothunaza imiphumela yokhetho.AboMkhonto weSizwe bakhiphe isitatimende bethi kufanele uKhomishana we-IEC, uJanet Love esule esikhundleni ngoba ubukeka elubhedlile lolu daba lukaZuma. Bathe ngeke besamethemba ukuthi usebenza ngobuqotho.

IKHOMISHINI yezoKhetho kuleli, i-Independent Electoral Commission (IEC) isithembise ukuthi izolikhokhela maduzane idlanzana elisele labasebenza ngokhetho, elingakabatholi onsumbulwane balo.Ikhomishini ithe kusele kuphela u-2% wabasebenza ngokhetho abangakaholi.Ithe u-98% wabasebenzi ababalelwa ku-270 000, sebayithola imali yabo.Ikhomishini iveze lokhu kuphela izinyanga ezimbili namhlanje kwaba nokhetho lukazwelonke nolwezifundazwe olwalungoMeyi 29, nonyaka. Isitatimende sekhomishini, sithe okwenze kwaba nokubambezeleka ukukhokhela abasebenzi ngeminye yemininingwano engafikile kubalwa neyasemabhange.“Imiqingo ithinta indaba yokungasayinwa kwamaphepha ashoyo ukuthi babesebenza, imininigwane yasemabhange kanjalo nezinkontileka ezingasayiniwe. Ngaphandle kwale mininingwane, asikwazi ukukhokha. Inqwaba yabasebenza ngokhetho sabakhokhela ngoJuni,” kusho ikhomishini. Ikhomishini iyalele abangakakhokhelwa ukuthi baxhumane namahhovisi ekhomishini lapho babeqashwe khona ukuze kulungiswe izinkinga ezikhona.Ithe uma kungukuthi abakwazi ukufinyelela emahhovisi, bangathumela imininingwane yabo nge-email ku:[email protected].Kumele bafake amagama abo agcwele, inombolo kamazisi, izinsuku abazisebenza, isikhungo ababesebenza kusona kufaka nesifundazwe nenombolo yocingo. Ikhomishini iveze ukuthi iphoqwe ngumthetho ukuthi ibambe imali yentela uma sebekhokhelwa.“Sikhumbuza abasebenza ukuthi kumele sibambe imali yentela ezoya ophikweni oluqoqa intela iSouth African Revenue Services (SARS).”Ekhasini likaFacebook lekhomishini, abaningi bebekhala ngentela, bethi babanjelwe imali enkulu.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi kube nezikhalazo ezinhlakeni ezehlukene ngolayini abade ezikhungweni zokuvota ngosuku lokhetho.Iqembu iMK lize yaya enkantolo ifuna kuqalwe phansi kubalwe kabusha ngoba lingeneme ngemiphumela yokhetho.Izinkantolo zibe matasa ngamacala ahlukene athinta ukhetho.

NJENGOBA ezobe emathathu amaphepha okuvota okhethweni lukazwelonke ngenyanga ezayo, ikhomishini yezokhetho isixwayise abavoti ukuthi bavote kanye ephepheni ngalinye.Ikhomishini iveze ukuthi uma uke wavota kabili noma ngaphezulu ephepheni elilodwa, lelo voti liyothathwa njengento engekho.Lokhu kuvezwe yisikhulu esiphezulu sekhomishini, uMnuz Sy Mamabolo, ekhuluma esithangamini sabezindaba ngoLwesibili, eGoli.UMamabolo uchaze kabanzi ngamaphepha amathathu okuvota kulolu khetho lwangoMeyi 29.“Iphepha lokuqala lizobe liqukethe amaqembu ezepolitiki kuphela, kanti kulona kuzobe kuvotelwa izihlalo ezingu-200. Leli phepha linamaqembu evile ku-50 azobe efuna ukuvotelwa kanti laziwa ngokuthi yi-PR. Elesibili kuzovotelwa amaqembu kanjalo nabangenele ukhetho ngokuzimela. Kulona kuzobe kuvotelwa abasuka ezifundazweni abaya ePhalamende. Kwelesithathu kuzobe kuvotelwa amaqembu kanjalo nabangenela ukhetho ngokuzimela abazoya eziShayamthetho zezifundazwe. Isifundazwe ngasinye sizoba nephepha lesithathu laso elihlukile kunezinye izifundazwe.”Unxuse abavoti ukuthi bazinike isikhathi ngaphambi kokuba bashaye u-X ngoba uma benze iphutha bawufaka endaweni okungeyona uma sebephinde bewushaya kwenye indawo lelo phepha liyothathwa njengelicekeleke phansi, lingabalwa njengevoti elisemthethweni.Uveze ukuthi emaphepheni okuvota kuzoba negama eligcwele leqembu, isifingqo segama leqembu kanjalo nesithombe somholi weqembu.Kwabangenela ukhetho ngokuzimela kukhona igama lalowo mholi, ubuso bakhe kanjalo negama elithi INDEPENDENT.

Inhlangano eyengamele ukhetho kuleli, i-Independent Electoral Commission (IEC) iyazihlangula embangweni wobuholi beqembu uMkhonto Wesizwe (MK) kulandela incwadi ebhalelwe yona wuMnuz Jabulani Khumalo ecela ukuthi kuhoxiswe owayengumengameli uJacob Zuma njengomholi.NgoLwesibili ekuseni Isolezwe libike ukuthi uKhumalo, owabhalisa iMK, ubhalele i-IEC eyicela ukuthi ihoxise uZuma njengobuso beqembu.Incwadi uyibhale ngemuva kokuxoshwa kwakhe kuleli qembu ekupheleni kwenyanga edlule. Abe-IEC bakubeke kwacaca esitatimendeni abasikhiphile ukuthi bona babambe elentulo ukuthi uZuma wumholi weqembu okunye abahlangene nakho.Kwenzeka lokhu nje, ngoLwesihlanu eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo kuzolalelwa udaba lombango phakathi kwe-IEC noZuma ngokungena kwakhe ohlwini lwabamele iqembu ePhalamende.I-IEC yathi ngeke akwazi ukungena ngenxa yokuthi wagwetshwa izinyanga ezingu-15 ejele kodwa inkantolo yasiguqula leso sinqumo.

UMA uzobe usebenza ngosuku lokhetho lukazwelonke uMeyi 29, 2024 noma uzobe ungekho endaweni obhalisele ukuvota kuyona, ikhomishini yezokhetho kuleli ivule ithuba lokuthi ufake isicelo sokusheshe uvote.Abagulayo abangakwazi ukuhamba, abakhulelwe kanjalo nabaphila nokukhubazeka abafisa ukuvakashelwa emakhaya nabo bazokwazi ukusheshe bavote ngokuthi bafake isicelo.Izicelo zokuthi usheshe uvote zivulwe kusuka izolo kuze kube uLwesihlanu, uMeyi 3, 2024. Isicelo singafakwa emahhovisi ekhomishini, komasipala noma kwi-website yekhomishini.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi njengoba kulolu khetho ungeke ukwazi ukuvota endaweni ongahlali kuyona, kubalulekile ukuthi usheshe ubhalisele ukuvota ngokuyisipesheli.Abanye abangakwazi ukubhalisela ukuvota okuyisipesheli kubalwa izintatheli, amaphoyisa, ojele kanjalo nanoma ibaphi abanye abasebenzi abazobe betohoza ngosuku lokhetho oluzoba yiholidi.Abagunyaziwe ukuthi bavote ngokuyisipesheli bazovotiswa ngoMeyi 27 noMeyi 28. Isikhulu sekhomishini yezokhetho KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Ntomb’futhi Masinga, sisanda kutshela Isolezwe ukuthi abakubuzi isizathu esenza ukuthi usheshe ufune ukuvota.“Asikubuzi ukuthi kungani ufuna ukushesha uvote. Siyakubhalisa nje ukuthi usheshe uvote. Nginxusa labo abazobe bazi ukuthi ngosuku lokhetho bazobe bengekho lapho behlala khona ngoba besebenza ukuthi basheshe babhalisele ukuvota,” kusho uNkk Masinga.Namhlanje ikhomishini inesithangami nabezindaba lapho izokhuluma ngezinto ezehlukene ezithinta ukhetho ezithinta nendaba yokuvulwa kwezicelo zokuthi abantu babhalisele ukuvota.Abafuna ukubhalisela ukuvota bangaya kwi-website yekhomishini ethi:www.elections.org.za.Bangathumela nomqhafazo wabo onenombolo kamazisi enombolweni ethi:32249. Umqhafazo uzobiza u-R1. Ungashayela nenombolo yekhomishini ethi:0800 11 8000, ukuze uthole ulwazi ngokufaka isicelo sokusheshe uvote. Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi lolu khetho lufike ngesikhathi lapho izwe ligubha iminyaka engu-30 lakhululeka.Izinkumbi zabantu bakuleli zavota okhethweni lokuqala lwango-1994. Khonamanjalo uMnyango wezaseKhaya ukhumbuze umphakathi ukuthi azovulwa wonke amahhovisi awo njalo ngemiGqibelo kusuka ngo-8 ekuseni kuze kube u-1 ntambama.Amahhovisi azovulwa ukuze abantu balande omazisi babo, ukufaka izicelo zomazisi abasha kanjalo nokukhishwa komazisi besikhashana. Azovulwa kuze kube uMeyi 25, 2024. Azovalwa ngo-Ephreli 27, 2024 ngoba yiholidi.

I-IFP imise ilungu lePhalamende elisolwa ngokuhlukumeza unkosikazi walo.UMnuz Sanele Zondo, ongusihlalo we-IFP Youth Brigade, umiswe kuzo zonke izikhundla aziphethe.Umiswe emva kokuthi unkosikazi wakhe, uNkk Simenyiwe MaDlomo Zondo, emsole ngokumhlukumeza.UNkk Zondo wenze le zinsolo ngesikhathi ekhuluma bukhoma enkundleni yezokuxhumana i-Instagram.UNkk Zondo wenze inkulumo emva kokuthi sekuphele izinsuku ezinhlanu kubikwe ukuthi unyamalele.Ekhuluma ngoLwesithathu, uNkk Zondo usole umyeni wakhe ngokumshaya, nangokungamnaki.Okhulumela i-IFP, uMnuz Mkhuleko Hlengwa, uthe banqume ukunikeza uZondo ikhefu elikhethekile ngenxa yobucayi bezinsolo ezenziwe uNkk Zondo.“Lokhu kuzomnika ithuba lokuthi ayolungisa izinkinga zasekhaya.”UHlengwa uthe bazibonile izinsolo ezenziwe uNkk Zondo, wathi bafuna ukuthi ziphenywe izinhlaka zomthetho.“I-IFP ihlezi izibophezela ekuthuthukisweni kwabesifazane. Lokhu kubonakala emithethweni nasezithembisweni zokhetho esizenzayo. Sihlezi sizibophezele emkhankasweni wokulwa nokuhlukumeza ngokobulili. Lolu daba siyalusukumela, sithanda ukuqinisekisa umphakathi ukuthi sizobhekana nalo ngokushesha, futhi sizoluphatha ngobunono.”UHlengwa uthe zonke izindaba ezithinta i-IFP Youth Brigade zizosingathwa ihhovisi likanobhala jikelele walolu phiko, uMnuz Mlungisi Mabaso, kuze kuphele ikhefu elinikezwe uZondo.“Uma kukhona okusha ngalolu daba sizophinde senze esinye isimemezelo.”UHlengwa uthe bajabule ngokuthi uNkk Zondo utholakale ephila.UNkk Zondo wayekade egcine ukubonakala ngesonto eledlule njengoba eqhamuke esevumbuka ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.Ukhale ngokuthi uZondo wamthembisa ukumakhela umuzi emuva kokushada kodwa wagcina ehlala endlini karawondi kubo ayifanise nehhoko. Ukhale ngokuthi emuva kokubuya kwenkosikazi kaZondo endala, uZondo ubesehlala elala endlini yayo futhi engakudli ukudla amphakela kona. Ubuye waveza nezinsolo zokushaywa nguZondo athe wagijima kuqala waya esiteshini samaphoyisa eyovula icala kodwa bagcina bengawavulanga ngoba kwavunyelwana ngokuthi bayokhuluma njengomndeni. UZondo uyaziphika izinsolo abekwa zona njengoba ethi uyena ohlukunyezwa unkosikazi.UZondo uthe ngelinye ilanga umkakhe wake wamshaya waze wopha, waze waveza nesithombe lapho ayephuma khona igazi ngasehlweni.Uthe wazama ukuyovula icala emaphoyiseni kodwa wagcina engalivulanga emva kokungenela kwemindeni.UZondo ugcagcelwe ngoMashi kulo nyaka.UNkk Zondo ukholwa ukuthi umyeni wakhe umhlukumeza ngoba nakhu efuna ukuthatha unkosikazi wesithathu.Kepha uZondo uthe izinkinga zabo zaqala emva kokuthi eveze ukuthi ufuna ukulanda ingane yakhe ayithola ngaphandle komshado.Uthe unkosikazi wakhe waqala ukumshintshela emva kwalokho.

PHEZU kokuqengqeleza phambili kwe-MK Party ngamavoti okhethweni lwesifundazwe, iqembu Inkatha Freedom Party (IFP) yilo eseliziveze njengababeki benkosi kuhulumeni wesifundazwe. Lokhu kuhlaluke ngesikhathi uMengameli we-IFP, uMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa, ememezela ukuthi banesivumelwano sokusebenzisana ne-ANC, DA ne-NFP KwaZulu-Natal. Ngokusho kukaHlabisa, la maqembu aphinde asho ngazwi linye ngegama longaba undunankulu.
