Lowo uSihlalo we-IFP KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thami Ntuli.Lesi sivumelwano sishiya ngaphandle iqembu okuyilona elihamba phambili ngokwezihlalo esiShayamthetho, i-MK, okuthiwa ayizange ifike emhlanganweni eyayiwucele ne-IFP ngoMsombuluko.Umhlangano weSishayamthetho nozobumba uhulumeni wesifundazwe uhlelelwe ukuba kusasa.Esithangamini nabezindaba, uHlabisa uveze ukuthi KwaZulu-Natal baphothula izingxoxo zokubusa ngokubambisana ne-ANC, DA, ne-NFP. La maqembu uma ehlanganisiwe anezihlalo ezingu-41 kwezingu-80 esiShayamthetho.UHlabisa uthe wonke amaqembu abaxoxa nawo alemukele igama likaNtuli ukuba athathe njengondunankulu.UHlabisa uthe izingxoxo zisaqhubeka, wathi kodwa sebevumelene ukuthi ubani ozokuba uSomlomo nozokuba yiPhini likaSomlomo.“Sisazokuba nezinye izingxoxo. Siyazi ukuthi isikhathi asisekho njengoba sibekelwe umnqamulajuqu wangoLwesihlanu.”UHlabisa uthe bazi ukuthi i-NFP izosebenzisana nabo.Izolo kusabalale izithombe zikamengameli we-NFP, uMnuz Ivan Barnes, enomhlangano nomholi we-MK, uJacob Zuma.Lokhu kwenze kwaba namahlebezi okuthi i-NFP izosebenza ne-MK.UHlabisa uthe kade benomhlangano izolo ekuseni noBarnes, wathi bazophinde babe nomunye umhlangano khona izolo ebusuku.“Angiyiboni into embi uma uBarnes eyohlangana noZuma. Nathi njenge-IFP asinankinga nokuhlangana ne-MK yize umhlangano wethu wabhuntsha. Iqiniso ukuthi ukuze sikwazi ukuyisa izwe phambili, kufanele sixoxe.”Uma i-NFP ingashaya ungqimphothwe ihlangane ne-MK, esebenzisana ne-EFF, kungasho ukuthi zombili izinhlangothi zizokuba nezihlalo ezilingayo.UHlabisa uthe abakawuvalile umnyango kwi-MK athe yabalindisa umlibe.“Ithimba lethu ebelisingethe izingxoxo lalinda amahora amabili endaweni yomhlangano. Latshelwa ukuthi abaholi be-MK kukhona lapho bebambezeleke khona. Ithimba lethu lagcina lihlakazeka, lashiya uHlengwa (uMnuz Mkhuleko), nomyalelo wokuthi akofona uma kwenzeka befika abe-MK. UHlengwa wahlala amanye amahora amabili, lutho ukufika kwabaholi be-MK. Sekuphinde kwaneminye imizamo yokuthi kube nomhlangano. Asinankinga nokuhlangana nabo.”UHlabisa uveze ukuthi kuzwelonke bazokuba yingxenye kahulumeni wobumbano ohlongozwa yi-ANC.UHlabisa uthe bakhethe ukuba yingxenye yohulumeni wobumbano ngenxa yokuthi alikho iqembu elinezihlalo ezanele ukuthi libuse ngokuzimela.“Into esenza ukuthi sivume ukuba yingxenye kahulumeni wokubambisana ukuthi siyafuna ukubona izwe lakithi liya phambili. Sibakhathalele abantu bakithi, sifuna ukubona izwe liya phambili.”UHlabisa ukuchithile ukuthi uthenjiswe ukunikwa isikhundla sePhini likaMengameli wesibili.“UMthethosisekelo awuvumi ukuthi kube namaphini kamengameli amabili. Ngakho-ke laba abathi ngizokuba iphini likamengameli wesibili bakhuluma into engekho.”UHlabisa uthe beyi-IFP banesipiliyoni sokuphatha ezigabeni ezahlukene zikahulumeni.“Kuzwelonke sasiyingxenye yohulumeni wokubambisana owawuphethe emva kokhetho lwango-1994. Sake saphatha KwaZulu-Natal, siphethe komasipala.”UHlabisa uthe ukuba yingxenye yohulumeni wokubambisana akusho ukuthi bazolahlekelwa ukuzimela.“Sizoqhubeka nokuzimela. Manje isikhathi sokusebenzela izwe.”UHlabisa ukhale ngabantu abangayivotelanga i-IFP athe bafuna ukubakhethela ukuthi basebenze namaphi amaqembu.“Angeke sivume abantu abangazange bayivotele i-IFP ukuba basilawule. Awukwazi ukufike ungasivoteli bese ufuna ukusikhethela ukuthi senzeni.”

UMENGAMELI we-IFP, uMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa, untweze ngendiza phezu kwenkundla iMoses Mabhida ephephezelisa ifulegi leqembu lakhe ebikezela umcimbi. I-IFP izoba nomcimbi wokwethula izethembiso zokhetho eMoses Mabhida, eThekwini, ngeSonto.Inkundla iMoses Mabhida ibukeka ilokhu iyinkundla yamaqembu ezepolitiki lapho ethula khona izethembiso zawo njengoba i-EFF isibuya khona ne-ANC yenze okufanayo.Kuyaphithiza ezweni njengoba amaqembu ehlukene ezihlela kahle kubhekwe okhethweni lukazwelonke oluzoba ngoMeyi nonyaka. I-IFP imatasa nomkhankaso wayo ewusabalalisela ezindaweni ezehlukene ngethemba lokuzuza amavoti.UHlabisa nabanye abaholi bethule indiza yomkhankaso esikhumulweni eVirginia, eThekwini ngoLwesihlanu. Indiza ibinesithombe se-IFP yase igaxwa ifulegi okuthe uma iphakama laphephezela.Ifulegi linobuso bukaHlabisa nomsunguli weqembu inkosi Mangosuthu Buthelezi engasekho. I-IFP izobe ingenela ukhetho lukazwelonke  okokuqala ngaphandle komsunguli wayo uShenge osekhotheme.Ngaphambi kwendiza i-IFP imemezele ukuthi kube yimpumelelo ukuhanjiswa kohlu lwabazoyimela ePhalamende. Ithe ikwazile ukuthobela umnqamulajuqu obukwe yi-IEC wangoLwesihlanu.Kulindeleke ukuthi amalungu e-IFP atheleke ngobuningi bawo uma sekwethulwa umyalezo wezethembiso zokhetho okulindeleke ukuthi uphume kuHlabisa.

UBEHLELI ezwini lokuthi “Sethembe” uMengameli we-IFP, uMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa, ethula umqulu wezethembiso waleli qembu ofaka nendaba yokuthi kutshalwe amasosha ezindaweni ezihaqwe ubugebengu, ukuqashwa kwamaphoyisa enele ukulwa nobugebengu kanjalo nokuqeda ngenkinga kagesi ehlasele izwe kanjalo nokwakha amathuba emisebenzi.UHlabisa uthule umqulu wezethembiso onamaphuzu angu-13, okuyiwo abahlose ukudla ngamabala ngawo njengoba kubhekwe okhethweni lukazwelonke ngoMeyi 29.Lo mqulu uwethule enkundleni iMoses iMabhida eThekwini, ebigcwele phama abaseka leli qembu, abadele ilanga bayothamela umyalezo wezokhetho obuthulwa okokuqala ngaphandle komsunguli waleli qembu, iNkosi Mangosuthu Buthelezi.UShenge ukhothame nyakenye, kanti kulo mqulu bekunxuswa abalandeli beqembu ukuthi benzele uMntwana, ngokuvotela ngobuningi babo leli qembu.Enkulumeni kaHlabisa ethathe ngaphezu kwehora, uveze ukuthi bakhathazekile ngobugebengu obenza abesifazane bangakwazi ukuhamba ngokukhululeka.“Izwe lisengcupheni yokuthi liwe bhu phansi. Sizoqeda ngenkinga kagesi ekhungethe kuleli, sakhe amathuba emisebenzi njengoba u-80% wale misebenzi izobekelwa abantu bakuleli, u-20% abantu bokufika. Sizonyusa imali yezibonelelo, eyezingane kanjalo neyabantu abadala. Sifuna kube nesibonelelo sabangasebenzi sikaR3 000 esizosiza besafuna imisebenzi.”Ukhale ngokuvalwa kwezindawo zokuholela izaguga wathi bazovuselela namakolishi avalwa okubalwa othisha nawabahlengikazi.“Abesifazane nezingane abakwazi ukuhamba ngokukhululeka. Sizotshala amasosha ezindaweni ezihaqwe ubugebengu kuleli obuhlalise umphakathi lubhojozi.” Uthe bazonika amandla izinkantolo zamakhosi ukuze zikwazi ukukhipha izigwebo ezinzima kwabenza ubugebengu, kuqashwe namaphoyisa enele ukulwa nale nkinga.Uveze ukuthi kuzobuyekezwa isikhwama esixhasa ngemali yokufunda emakolishi nasemanyuvesi iNSFAS.Odabeni lwabokufika, uthe kumele babe namaphepha acacile okuthi bazohlala isikhathi esingakanani njengoba kwenzeka nakwamanye amazwe, ngeke kube yikwampunzi edla emini.“Asicwasi abantu bokufika kodwa sibeka abantu bakuleli phambili. Sifuna kuhlomule bona ngezinsiza zakuleli.” Uveze ukuthi kuzokwehliswa ukubiza kwentengo kaphethroli ukuze kungabizi ukudla.Kwezemfundo, uthe bazoqeqesha kabusha othisha.“Sifuna ukunika othisha ithuba lokuthola amakhono amasha. Kwezempilo sifuna wonke umuntu athole ukunakekeleka, sakhe imitholampilo lapho kuhlala khona abantu.” Uthe bazokwakhela abantu izindlu ezizobanika isithunzi, okuzothi uma iqeda ukwakhiwa ifakwe ugesi welanga ukuze kungabi nenkinga yokucishwa kukagesi.“Siyovala imigodi egcwele emigwaqweni. Imali eningi iyoyiswa komasipala, sizovuselela izitimela namabhasi. Sizoxoxa nosomatekisi ukuze sizwe ngezinkinga zabo ngoba yiyona mboni ephethwe ngabantu abamnyama.” Uthe umhlaba ohleli ongenziwa lutho uyonikwa abantu ukuze bawusebenzise.“Senibhikishe kwanela, nashisa amathayi, navala imigwaqo, kodwa akukho zinguquko. Ziyekeni lezi zinto manje, hambani niyoshintsha uhulumeni ngevoti ngoMeyi 29.” Kube nomunyu ngesikhathi kudlalwa i-video kaShenge lapho ayevivisa khona abalandeli.

KUBHEKWE ukuthi i-IFP neDA banikwe isikhundla sokuhola ikomiti esaphucwa kabuhlungu i-EFF kuMasipala waseThekwini.I-IFP neDA kulindeleke ukuthi banikezwe izikhundla zokuphatha amakomiti amasha abunjwe emva kokuhlukaniswa kwekomiti ebeliphethwe i-EFF.Ikomiti elihlukaniswe phakathi elokuHlaliswa kwaBantu, manje sekuzokuba nekomiti elibhekele ezithinta Amanzi, uGesi nokuQoqwa kukaDoti, bese kuba khona elibhekele ukuHlaliswa kwaBantu, ezokuThutha nezobuNjiniyela.Isinqumo sokuhlukaniswa kwekomiti sithathwe emhlanganweni wesigungu esiphezulu obungoLwesibili, umhlangano womkhandlu iwona ozothatha isinqumo sokugcina ngokusungulwa kwamakomiti amasha.IMeya kaMasipala, uMnuz Cyril Xaba, ithe bakhethe ukuhlukanisa ikomiti phakathi ngoba bafuna ukuthi umkhandlu ubhukule ekuhambiseni izidingo kubantu.UXaba uthe ukusungulwa kwamakomiti amasha kuzokwenza ukuthi kube lula ukuqapha ukusebenza kweminyango engaphansi kwalama komiti, wathi kuzokwenza ukuthi umasipala uqoqe imali eningi.Ikomiti lokuHaliswa kwaBantu beliphethwe ikhansela le-EFF, uMnuz Themba Mvubu, owakhishwa ngasekuqaleni kwalo nyaka emva kokuchitheka komshado we-ANC ne-EFF.Umthombo onolwazzi ngodaba uthe izikhundla zokuphatha amakomiti amasha zizonikwa i-IFP ne-DA.La maqembu abengabhekani ne-ANC eThekwini, kodwa kubukeka sengathi seligaya ngomunye umhlathi manje njengoba sekunohulumeni wokubambisana KwaZulu-Natal nakuzwelonke obunjwe ilamaqembu womathathu.I-IFP neDA abazange bawungenele umbango wesikhundla sobumeya ngesikhathi kuqokwa uXaba ngasekuqaleni kwenyanga, phambilini la maqembu abeyaye ayibangise i-ANC uma kuqokwa imeya.Amakhansela e-IFP neDA kuMasipala waseThekwini akuncomile ukuhlukaniswa kwamakomiti, kepha athi awazi lutho ngendaba yezikhundla okuthiwa azonikwa zona.Ohola i-IFP kuMasipala waseThekwini, uMnuz Mdu Nkosi, uthe ikomiti lokuHlaliswa kwaBantu bekufanele lihlukaniswe, wakhala ngokuthi belinomsebenzi omningi kakhulu.“Empeleni kudala la makomiti ayehlukene. Angicabangi ukuthi kukhona umuntu ongaphikisana nalesi sinqumo ngoba sibeka phambili abantu. Umuntu mhlawumbe ongaphikisa iloyo ozicabangela yena yedwa.”UNkosi uthe akazi ngendaba yokuthi bangase banikwe isikhundla, wathi izingxoxo ziphethwe ubuholi obuphezulu.“Thina sizozwa ngobuholi obuphezulu bese silandela lokho abakushoyo.”Ohola iDA kuMasipala waseThekwini, uMnuz Thabani Mthethwa, uthe ukuhlukaniswa kwekomiti kuzokwenza ukuthi kube lula ukuthi balandelele ukusebenza kweminyango engaphansi kwekomiti.UMthethwa uthe azikho izingxoxo zokuthi banikwe isikhundla.“Ingakho bengakhethwanga osihlalo bamakomiti ngoba azikho izingxoxo.”

I-IFP ikhuza ukudonsisana phakathi kwamaqembu amakhulu ayingxenye yohulumeni wokubambisana osanda kwakhiwa.I-IFP ifuna ukuhlalisa phansi abaholi be-ANC nabeDA ukuze kuxazululwe izinkinga ezifufusayo kuhulumeni wobumbano owakhiwe amaqembu ayisikhombisa.I-ANC neDA bathola izihlalo eziningi okhethweni, njengoba i-ANC izihola phambili, ilandelwe iDA.Abaholi be-ANC nabeDA abavumelani ngokujoyina kwePA, iDA ikhala ngokuthi i-ANC ayizange ibonisane nabo ngaphambi kokuthi ivumele iPA ukuba ijoyine.Ngakolunye uhlangothi i-ANC ithi iDA ayinawo amandla okuvimba amanye amaqembu afuna ukujoyina uhulumeni wokubambisana. I-DA nePA bayinkukhu nempaka, iPA ibikhankasa ngokuthi ifuna ukugudluza iDA eWestern Cape.Okhulumela i-IFP, uMnuz Mkhuleko Hlengwa, uthe bafuna ukuthi kuqedwe ngokushesha ukungaboni ngaso linye.“Umengameli we-IFP, uMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa, usejuba ithimba ebelisimele ezingxoxweni zokubambisana, eliholwa iphini likamengameli inkosi Mzamo Buthelezi, ukuba lixoxe nabaholi bamaqembu. Sibona kunesidingo sokuthi kube nomhlangano, ukuze sixazulule izinkinga. Njengoba siyingxenye yohulumeni wobumbano, sizibophezele ekwenzeni isiqiniseko sokuthi sixazulula zonke izinkinga ukuze sizokwazi ukuyisa phambili izwe lethu,” kuchaza uHlengwa.Ukudonsisana phakathi kwabaholi be-ANC neDA sekwenze ukuthi kube khona ababona sengathi uhulumeni wobumbano uzohlakazeka.Kepha uHlengwa uthe lesi yisiwombe nje esidlulayo.“Lezi ezinye nje zezinkinga eziyaye zibe khona uma ingane iqale ukukhasa. Uhulumeni wokusebenzisana wakhiwe amaqembu amaningi. Into ebalulekile ukuthi kuhlalwe phansi kuxoxwe uma kunokwahlukana kwemibono. Kufanele ekugcineni sikwazi ukukhuluma ngezwi elilodwa.”UHlengwa uthe bayazi ukuthi kule minyaka emihlanu abazobusa kuyo ngokubambisana kuzokuba nezinkinga ezinkulu ezizoqhamuka.“Into nje ezobaluleka ukuthi sihlale sibonisana, sivumelana ngalokho okuzoyisa izwe phambili.”Amanye amaqembu ayingxenye yohulumeni wokubambisana iGood, nePAC. Izolo, lamaqembu ajoyinwe yiFF Plus.Umholi weFF Plus, uDkt Pieter Groenewald, uthe bajoyine uhulumeni wobumbano ngoba banesifiso sokwakha kabusha iNingizimu Afrika.“Inkulumo eyethulwe umengameli (uCyril Ramaphosa) ngesikhathi egcotshwa ihambe emazwini esiwasho ngesikhathi sikhankasela ukhetho. Njengeqembu sizibophezele ekuletheni uzinzo ezweni.”

I-Investigating Directorate (ID) ngaphansi kophiko lwezokushushiswa komphakathi iNational Prosecuting Authority (NPA) luthi lucela ukushayiswa ngomoya lwenze umsebenzi walo ngaphandle kokuqagela okungenasidingo.I-ID ikusho lokhu ngesikhathi iphawula ngodaba oluphume kwiSunday World ngeSonto lapho kubikwe ukuthi uSihlalo we-ANC kuzwelonke uMnuz Gwede Mantashe uzokhalelwa amasongo kaSigonyela maduze.Ithe ukuboshwa kwakhe kusukela ekutheni imizi yakhe eGauteng nase-Eastern Cape yengezelwa ezokuphepha yinkampani iBosasa eyayithola amathenda kuhulumeni.Iphephandaba licaphune ababili abasondelene noMantashe omunye okuthiwa uthe uyazi ngokuboshwa kwakhe futhi inhloso yakho ukumhlambalaza.Esitatimendeni i-ID ithe ayiphawuli ngophenyo esuke ilwenza futhi kubalulekile ukuthi kuqondiswe inkulumo ethinta ihhovisi layo.“I-ID ayisithathanga isinqumo noma ikhulume ‘ngokuboshwa okuzokwenziwa maduze’ kukaMnuz Mantashe. Akucaci ukuthi le nkulumo isukaphi kodwa ayiveli kwi-ID,” kusho isitatimende.

IKWAZULU-Natal ihamba phambili ngesibalo seziguli esihaqwe upokisi wezinkawu, i-monkeypox esibizwa nge-mpox.Izibalo zakamuva ezikhishwe uMnyango wezeMpilo zikhomba ukuthi sebengu-13 abantu abahaqwe yilesi sifo, kubo abayisikhombisa abaKwaZulu-Natal, abahlanu abaseGauteng oyedwa owaseWestern Cape. Abashonile babili owaseGauteng nowaKwaZulu-Natal.Umnyango ubuye waqinisekisa ukuthi imishanguzo yokuqala yokwelapha lesi sifo iTecovirim ezigulini ezixineke ethengwe kwamanye amazwe isifikile eNingizimu Afrika. Okhulumela uMnyango, uFoster Mohale, uthe uhlelo lokuthola ukwelashwa okwengeziwe okuhlanganisa nemigomo luyaqhubeka uma kwenzeka kuba nesidingo."Iziguli ezixineke ngokusezingeni eliphansi neliphakathi nendawo sizoqhubeka nokwelashwa kusetshenziswa imith iyakuleli eyelapha izifo ezivelayo uma uhaqwe ileli gciwane,"Imishanguzo yokwelapha igciwane iTecovirim kuleli ayigunyaziwe, odokotela bafaka isicelo esikhungweni esigunyaza ukusetshenziswa kwemithi yokwelapha, iSouth African Health Products Regulatory Authority  (SAHPRA), okwaziwa ngo-section 21.Umnyango unxusa bonke abantu,  kungakhathalekile ubulili, ubudala, okusolakala ukuthi banezimpawu ze-mpox noma abake bathintana nabantu abaziwayo ukuthi baye esikhungweni sezempilo ukuze bahlolwe. Uthe  noma ngubani angangenwa yilesi sifo esingagwemeka futhi eselaphekayo.

UNDUNANKULU waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, uthembise ukuthi umnotho waKwaZulu-Natal uzovuka ngaphansi kukahulumeni omusha ophethe isifundazwe.UNtuli ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ethula umhlahlandlela kahulumeni omusha, esiShayamthetho eMgungundlovu, izolo. Uthe uhulumeni wokubambisana ukubeke emahlombe awo ukwakha kabusha umnotho esifundazweni okhinyabezwe wukubheduka kobhubhane iCorona, izibhelu zikaJulayi 2021, nezikhukhula.UNtuli uthe uhulumeni wokubambisana owakhiwe i-IFP, ANC, DA ne-NFP, uhlalelwe umsebenzi ophuthumayo wokuthuthukisa umnotho.“Emhlanganweni wekhabhinethi, i-lekgotla, savumelana ngokuthi kufanele sikhombe indlela siphinde sididiyele ukwakhiwa kabusha komnotho wesifundazwe.”UNtuli uthe umnotho waKwaZulu-Natal ukhula kancane uma uqhathaniswa nokukhula kwesibalo sabantu, wathi lesi simo sishaya kakhulu intsha nezingane.Uthe ezinsukwini ezingu-100 ezizayo bazogxila ekuthuthukiseni umnotho, okubalwa umnotho wasemalokishini nowasemakhaya.“Umnotho wasemalokishini nowasemakhaya ubalulekile. Angeke kulunge ukuthi abantu basemalokishini nabasemakhaya baphucwe amathuba omnotho. Ezolimo zizobamba iqhaza elibalulekile ekuthuthukiseni umnotho wasezindaweni zasemakhaya. Sizokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi ubukhosi bubamba iqhaza elibalulekile ekuthuthukiseni umnotho wasezindaweni zasemakhaya.”UNtuli uthe bazoyifakela izibuko indaba yezitolo eziphethwe abokufika abangenazo izimvume zokuba kuleli.“Siyakuqaphela belu ukuthi abanye babo  abanezimvume zokuba kuleli abayilandeli imithetho yezempilo neyezokuphepha elawula ukugcinwa kwempahla. Abanye babo badayisa ukudla okubolile. Ezinyangeni ezintathu ezizayo sizokwenza izinhlelo zokuqinisekisa ukuthi imithetho iyalandelwa.”UNtuli uthe ngaphansi kukahulumeni omusha inkohlakalo angeke ibekezelelwe.“Ngithi angikucacise ukuthi uhulumeni angeke uyibekezelele inkohlakalo, sizokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi bathathelwa izinyathelo labo abephula imithetho. Sifuna ukuthi yonke iminyango kahulumeni ilwele ukuthola imibiko yomcwaningi mabhuku engenalo ichashaza. Lena akuyona into ekufanele siyibange.”UNtuli umemezele inombolo yamahhala yokumpimpa abenza inkohlakalo ethi 080 122 9040, ne-email ethi [email protected].“Ngifisa ukuthi izakhamuzi zingathuli uma zibona inkohlakalo, nginxusa ukuthi ziyibike.”UNtuli uthe bazokulwa nobelelesi obudlangile esifundazweni athe buphazamisa ukukhula komnotho nozinzo.Uthe maduze kuzokuba nezimbizo zokubhunga ngobugebengu kuzo zonke izifunda.Uthe bazolwa nodlame lwezobulili athe ludla lubi eNanda, Mlaza naseMpangeni.UNtuli uthe osomabhizinisi abaphazamisa izinhlelo zentuthuko bazoyikhotha imbenge yomile.UNtuli uthembise ukwenza ngcono ezemfundo, ezempilo nokusiza abakhahlamezwa izikhukhula.Uphinde wamemezela ukuthi uhulumeni uzovula umfuziselo weSilo saKwaDukuza osesikhumulweni sezindiza iKing Shaka International Airport.Lo mcimbi kade wawumenyezelwa kodwa ubuye uhlehliswe.Inkulumo kaNtuli ibihanjelwe yiSilo uMisuzulu Sinqobile kaZwelithini, uNdlunkulu Nomzamo Myeni, abaNtwana basendlunkulu, inkosikazi kaNtuli uSindiswa MaSibisi Ntuli, nezikhulu zikahulumeni.

Iqembu iMK lidlebeleka okomlilo wamadlelo njengoba kungena imiphumela yokhetho KwaZulu- Natal. I-MK imenyezelwe ngowayengumengameli uJacob Zuma ngoDisemba nyakenye, wathi uzoyikhankasela ayivotele futhi akasayingeni eye-ANC. UZuma akasulanga kwi-ANC, namanje ubulungu bakhe busekhona njengoba ebuye abe yilungu leMK.Kusho ukuthi iMK ingenele ukhetho inezinyanga cishe eziyisithupha imenyezelwe ngokusemthethweni kubantu bakuleli. Emuva kwesimemezelo sikaZuma ngoDisemba, kwadilika umthangala abantu bethutheleka kuleli qembu.Kushaye u-5 ntambama ngoLwesihlanu iMK isithole amavoti angaphezu kwangu-800 000 esifundazweni ilandelwa yi-IFP enangu-340 069, endaweni yesithathu bekukhona i-ANC ebingaphezu kuka-337 000 ngamavoti. I-DA ibisendaweni yesine izama ukusondela emavotini angu-260 000.Umhlaziyi wezepolitiki uMnuz Zakhele Ndlovu ofundisa ipolitiki e-UKZN, uthe iMK iphundle i-ANC ne-IFP ngenxa yezizathu ezimbili.“Indaba yokuba wumZulu ineqhaza elikhulu ngoba uZuma njengamanje wuyena mholi waKwaZulu omdala nohlonishwayo emuva kokuhamba kukaMntwana waKwaPhindangene. Abantu abebecikwe yi-ANC bebezoya kwi-IFP ukube kayivelanga iMK,’’ kusho uNdlovu.Uthe nangaphandle kokuba wumZulu, uZuma ungumuntu onogazi kubantu nonesisoka nobugagu bokukhuluma izinto ezigovuza abantu.“Indaba yokudatshukelwa aziveze njengomuntu ohlukunyezwayo iyamsebenzela ngoba abantu bathi uZuma waya ekudingisweni waboshwa kodwa namanje usahlushwa. Uma umlalela kahle uyigagu, uyakwazi ukukhuluma nabantu,’’ kusho uNdlovu.UNdlovu uthe nayo iMK yazi kahle ukuthi ibingeke ibe yilutho ngaphandle kukaZuma.Omunye umhlaziyi uMnuz Thobani Zikalala, uthe lokhu kudlondlobala kweMK kuwubufakazi bokuthi iyasebenza indaba yomuntu siqu sakhe kwipolitiki.“Abantu bakuleli bavota ngokuthi umuntu uwubani futhi bayamthanda yini, bese kuxubana nezimo ababhekene nazo ngaleso sikhathi. I-ANC ishaya eceleni njengoba ilokhu ibelesela indaba yobuhlanga,’’ kusho uZikalala.Uthe i-ANC ibukeka igcizelela indaba yokuvota ngobuhlanga uma kukhulunywa ngabantu baseKZN kodwa kwezinye izindawo ayisho kanjalo.UZikalala uthe bakhona abantu abanamakhono nesipiliyoni kwiMK abangase bajutshwe ezikhundleni zikahulumeni uma begcina bethatha izintambo.Kwenzeka konke lokhu nje, umkhankaso we-IFP KwaZulu-Natal ububukeka unamandla uholwa wuSihlalo wayo uMnuz Thami Ntuli ogaqele esikandunankulu.

IQEMBU lezepolitiki i-MK, lifuna ikhomishini yezokhetho i-Independent Electoral Commission ichaze ngezinsolo ezibucayi kusabalala ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, ama-video  akhombisa amabhokisi anamaphepha okuvota asolisayo okuthiwa abhadanywe ngamalungu aleli qembu eHammarsdale naseChesterville ngempelasonto.I-MK ifuna le khomishini ibize isithangami nabezindaba ngaphambi kokhetho icacisele umphakathi ngalezi zinsolo njengoba isola ukuthi lawa maphepha ahambisana nezigxivizo abezodluliselwa kumalungu e-ANC endaweni, kanti esitatimendeni se-IEC iyazichitha izinsolo.Okhulumela i-MK kuzwelonke, uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndlela, uthe lezi zinsolo ziyakhathaza futhi zibeka engcupheni isithunzi sekhomishini yezokhetho kuleli.“Amalungu e-MK abone iloli elisolisayo ebelithwele amabhokisi awu-400 avaliwe nezinye izinto ezisetshenziswa yikhomishini okukholakala ukuthi bekulethwa kumalungu e-ANC. Amalungu ethu afune incazelo ngalolu daba lempahla okukholakala ukuthi yebiwe, ishaqwe amaphoyisa ayigcina esitokisini,” kusho uNdlela.Uthe ngaphezu kwalesi simo, akekho oboshiwe, okuholele etheni impahla ibuyiselwe endaweni egcinwa kuyo emahhovisi e-IEC ngenxa yokungabikhona kwezindawo ezanele zokuyigcina ezikhungweni ezisemphakathini.UNdlela uthe kungakapholi maseko, kuvumbuke eminye imibiko efanayo, lapho kutholwe amanye amabhokisi anamaphepha okuvota avaliwe kwenye indawo engamahhovisi kamasingcwabisane eChesterville, athathwe amaphoyisa.I-IEC esitatimendeni, ithe lawa ma-video asedalule amaqhinga le khomishini ehlela ngayo ukuhambisa nokugcina amaphepha okuvota ngaphambi kokhetho.“Indlela okuhlelwe ngayo ukuqinisa ezokuphepha, ukuthi amaloli ahambisa amaphepha agadwe amaphoyisa. Izindawo ezigcina impahla yokuvota, kumele igadwe ubusuku nemini. Lokhu kuqinisekisa ukuthi akugqekezwa futhi akekho ophazamisa izinto zokuvotisa. Akuvunyelwa muntu ukuthi ongagunyaziwe ukungena ukuthi angene lapho kuvotelwa khona,” kubhalwe esitatimendeni.Iqinisekise ukuthi iyitholile imibiko ngomunye wabasebenzi bayo eChesterville okuthiwa uvuswe  ebusuku ngoMgqibelo ekwakhe,  ngempahla yokuvotisa etholwe igcinwe esikhungweni sokuvota esontweni i-Baptist, eChesterville.  Uthe le mpahla yokuvota ithathwe yahanjiswa esiteshini samaphoyisa eCato Manor.  Ithe kuyiqhinga layo ukuhambisa impahla yokuvotisa ngosuku olwandulela olokuvota ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ukuvota kuqala ngesikhathi.Iqinisekise ukuthi yonke impahla yokuvota ebonakale kulawa ma-video asebuyiselwe emahhovisi ayo, kanti izothathela izinyathelo iqembu namalungu alo athintekayo ekuphazimiseni umsebenzi wayo.

I-MK ifuna kuchithwe ukuqokwa kukaNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thami Ntuli.Le nhlangano ifake amaphepha eNkantolo eNkulu eMgungundlovu lapho ifuna khona ukuthi kuchithwe umhlangano okwaqokwa kuwo uNtuli.Kulo mhlangano owawungoLwesihlanu, kwaphinde kwaqokwa uSomlomo wesiShayamthetho sesifundazwe, uNksz Nontembeko Boyce, nePhini likaSomlomo, uNksz Mmabatho Tembe.IMK ikhala ngokuthi akuzange kulandelwe imigomo ngesikhathi kuhleli lo mhlangano.Ngesikhathi kuqhubeka umhlangano, abeMK baba nezikhalo eziningi okukhona kuzo ukuthi kukhona abantu abakhombisa abanye ukuthi bavote kanjani ngesikhathi kuvotwa ngokuyimfihlo.Baphinde bakhala nokungavunyelwa ukuyogada ngesikhathi kubalwa amavoti.Umgqugquzeli weMK KwaZulu-Natal, uDkt Kwazi Mbanjwa, uthe ibashiya nemibuzo eminingi eyokungavunyelwa kwesicelo sabo sokuba bayobuka ngesikhathi kubalwa amavoti."Yini kanti lena eyayenziwa ngesikhathi kubalwa amavoti ababengafuni ukuthi siyibone?"UMbanjwa uthe abakwamukeli ukuqokwa kukaNtuli neKhabhinethi alimemezele izolo.UMbanjwa uthe konke lokhu okumenyezelwe uNtuli kusazoshintsha uma sekuphume isinqumo ecaleni abalifakile.UMbanjwa uthe iMK  okufanele iphathe uhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal ngoba iyona eyathola amavoti amaningi.IMK yayivota ne-EFF ngesikhathi kukhethwa undunankulu.Amalungu eMK abebhocobele ngesikhathi kuqhubeka umcimbi.Usihlalo we-EFF KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mongezi Thwala, akazange abonakale emcimbini wayizolo.Amaqembu ayingxenye kahulumeni wokubambisana akwamukele ukuqokwa kweKhabhinethi elisha, athi awathuswa icala elifakwe iMK.USotswebhu we-IFP, uMnuz Blessed Gwala, uthe abaholi beMK bakhombisa ukungazimiseli ngomsebenzi."Asinaso isikhathi sokudlala thina. IMK ifike yathi ifuna ukuvotelwa, yajika lapho yathi ayisayi ePhalamende. Bathi noma befika lapha esiShayamthetho bafike bazibangela umsindo."UGwala uthe banelisekile ngabaholi abaqhamuka kwamanye amaqembu abaqokelwe ezikhundleni.UGwala ukushayele ihlombe ukufakwa koMnyango wezokuPhepha koMphakathi ngaphansi kwehhovisi likandunankulu."Udaba lokulwa nobugebengu lubalulekile, ludinga iso elibukhali. Iso likandunankulu Ilona elizokwazi ukubheka kahle lolu daba."Okhulumela i-IFP KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mafika Mndebele, uthe akakungabazi ukuthi lizochithwa icala elifakwe iMK."Kahle hle iyihlaya le nto abayenzayo."UMndebele uthe bazibophezele ekusebenzisaneni kahle namaqembu ayingxenye kahulumeni wokubambisana.Uthe bafuna ukubona kuphuthunyiswa ukuhanjiswa kwezidingo ebantwini.Usihlalo weDA KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Dean Macpherson, uthe ukuqokwa kweKhabhinethi kukhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi uhulumeni wokubambisana ungakwazi ukusebenza."Siyisibonelo esihle lapha KwaZulu-Natal, sithemba ukuthi abaholi bakazwelonke nabo bazobukela kithi, benze into efanayo. Siyaziqhenya ngokuthi kube khona abaholi beDA abaqokiwe. Abaholi bethu abaqokiwe banesipiliyoni esiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal."UMacpherson uthe okubajubulisa kakhulu ukuthi bayishiye ngaphandle iMK ne-EFF ngesikhathi kwakhiwa uhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal.

IQEMBU uMkhonto weSizwe (MK), ligabe ngezincwadi zikaMnuz Jabulani Khumalo azibhala ngo-Ephreli edlulisela amandla kowayengumengameli uJacob Zuma neye-IEC ecacisa ngobuholi.UZuma ngoDisemba nyakenye wamemezela ukuthi uzokweseka iMK okhethweni oluzoba ngasekupheleni kwenyanga lapho okulindeleke ukuthi zidlane khona imilala.UKhumalo owabhalisa iqembu nosexoshiwe eqenjini, ubhalele i-IEC eyicela ukuba ihoxise uZuma njengomholi weqembu. UKhumalo ubuye wabhalela uZuma emazisa ukuthi umisiwe eqenjini ngenxa yokungaziphathi kahle.Abe-IEC bakhiphe isitatimende bephendula indaba yencwadi kaKhumalo bevuma ukuthi bayitholile. I-IEC ithe ayingeni odabeni lweqembu yona, imile ekutheni uZuma wuyena umholi kusukela ngo-Ephreli 9 nonyaka.“I-IEC iyafisa ukugcizelela ukuthi ayingeni ezindabeni zamaqembu zangaphakathi. Iqembu lithatha imiyalelo yomholi weqembu osuke ebhaliswe phansi. Okwamanje uMnuz Jacob Zuma wuyena umholi kusukela ngo-Ephreli,’’IMK ngenyanga edlule imemezele ukuxoshwa kukaKhumalo eqenjini yathi yisinqumo esithathwe yizikhulu eziphezulu eqenjini. Izolo ekuseni kuvukwe ngezindaba zokuthi uKhumalo umise uZuma eqenjini wabhalela ne-IEC eyicela ukuba imsuse.Okhulumela iMK uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndhlela, uthe phansi amaphaphu kubalandeli beqembu akonakele lutho. Uthe isinyathelo sikaKhumalo asithi shu eqenjini.Ngaphambi kwalokho kukhishwe izitatimende, esophiko lwentsha yeMK nesophiko lwayo lwezitshudeni bonke bechitha uKhumalo.Umhlaziyi wezepolitiki uSolwazi Bheki Mngomezulu, uthe konke lokhu okwenzekayo kungaba kabili ngokomthelela eqenjini nokwethenjwa kwalo.“ Izinkinga eqenjini elisha zidala ungabazane kodwa kulokhu kungabuye kubasize ngoba njengamanje uZuma neqembu bavela njengabantu abacindezelwayo. Okunye wukuthi uma ubuka izinsolo ezibhekiswe kuKhumalo zimbi, iMK ingabukeka njengeqembu elingazwani nento ebhedayo,’’ kusho uMngomezulu.Uthe nakuba ibhekana nezinkinga iMK kodwa futhi kukhulunywa ngayo kakhulu nokuyinto eyenza idume.Kwenzeka konke lokhu nje kulindeleke ukuthi iNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo ilalele udaba oluphakathi kwe-IEC neMK lapho okubangwa khona ukuya kukaZuma ePhalamende.I-IEC yanquma ukuthi uZuma akafanelwe wukuya ePhalamende ngenxa yokuthi walahlwa yicala wagwetshwa izinyanga ezingu-15. UZuma wahambisa udaba enkantolo, yavuna yena kodwa abe-IEC balwedlulisa bengagculisekile.

IQEMBU elisha uMkhonto weSizwe (MK) lithi lichithwe ezinkundleni zemidlalo ezehlukene ngaphambi kokuthola i-Orlando, eSoweto lapho lizokwethula khona izethembiso zayo zokhetho.I-MK izimisele ukugadla kuzwakale okhethweni lukazwelonke oluzoba ngoMeyi 29 lapho kulindeleke ukuthi zidlane kulo imilala.Okhulumela i-MK uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndlhela, uthe basesigabeni sokuqedela amalungiselelo omcimbi wabo wokwethula izethembiso okulindeleke ukuthi ube ngoMeyi 18.I-MK yethulwe owayengumengameli uJacob Zuma ngoDisemba nyakenye, wathi uzovotela yona akasayingeni eyokweseka i-ANC. UZuma wathi akenelisekile ngobuholi bukaMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa.Kumanje i-MK kuphuzwa ngayo itiye iba sezindabeni mihla namalanga ngezizathu ezehlukene. Amaqembu amaningi asezethulile izethembiso zokhetho kubantu futhi sekusele amasonto ambalwa kuvotwe.UNdhlela ubale izindawo ezimbili abachithwe kuzona kwaba nezinye angabange esafuna ukuzisho athe bebezama kuzona.“ Inkundla yokuqala ebesiyifuna kakhulu yi-FNB kodwa kwavela ukuthi izobe isetshenziswa. Sizamile ukuthola iMoses Mabhida nakhona satshelwa ukuthi izobe isebenza. Sizame kaningi nakwezinye izindawo saze sathola i-Orlando,’’ kusho uNdhlela.Uthe akuwona umcimbi wokwethula izethembiso kodwa wumhlangano wezwi labantu nokuyilona okufanele ligqame kakhulu ukwedlula osopolitiki. UNdlhela uthe uZuma uzokwethula umyalezo wosuku kulo mcimbi.Uthe ubuholi bumatasa nje buqedela zonke izinhlelo zalo mcimbi okulindeleke ukuthi ube yingqophamlando. Udaba lokungatholakali kwezindawo belulokhu luvela emaqenjini ekhala ngokuthi kuba nzima.I-FP isanda kukhala ngento efanayo izama ukuthola inkundla ngaseMzimkhulu kodwa kwathiwa ngeke ikwazi. Akhona namanye amaqembu ake akhala ngokuthi izinkundla azitholakali.Ngaphandle kodaba lomcimbi wokwethula izethembiso, kulindeleke ukuthi udaba lweMK ne-IEC lungene eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo namuhla.I-IEC yanquma ukuthi uZuma akafanelwe wukuba sohlwini lwabaya ePhalamende ngoba waboshwa wagwetshwa. I-MK yaluyisa enkantolo udaba yafika yalunqoba. I-IEC yalwedlulisa udaba yalufaka eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo.

IQEMBU uMkhonto weSizwe (MKP) selisole i-ANC ngokuyichithela isikhathi ngokubuyela enkantolo ifuna ukuthi ivunyelwe ukudlulisa isinqumo sokuchithwa kwayo embangweni wegama nophawu olusetshenziswa yi-MK.UNobhala Jikelele we-MK, uMnuz Arthur Zwane, uthe i-ANC ayizange ifike ngisho enkantolo enkulu ukuzolwa udaba.UZwane usho lokhu izolo, ekhuluma namalungu eqembu ngaphandle kweNkantolo eNkulu eThekwini, kulandela ukugodlwa kwesinqumo. Abengekho amalungu nabaholi be-ANC enkantolo, ithumele abameli bayo. IJaji uMahendra Chetty lithe lizokhipha isinqumo kulolu daba emuva kokuzwa amaphuzu abevela kubameli be-ANC nabe-MK.I-ANC ibuyele enkantolo ifuna ukuvunyelwa ukuthi isidlulise isinqumo sokuchithwa kwayo yinkantolo ngo-Ephreli nonyaka, eyavuna i-MK odabeni lophawu negama njengoba uKhongolose uthi ngelawo.UZwane ukhwele wadilika kuhulumeni wokubambisana kwamaqembu ahlukene wathi ngowabadayisi.“Ayikho into okuthiwa uhulumeni wobumbano kodwa abadayisi. I-ANC ingabadayisi isebenzisana nabamhlophe, akuwona uhulumeni wobumbano.”Uthe uphawu negama abalisebenzisayo elabo, wathi bazoliwina futhi icala.“Besisodwa nje enkantolo, bengekho. Basaba ngisho ukuza entweni yabo.”Umholi we-MK, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, ufikile enkantolo ezolalela ukuqhubeka kwecala, kwathi uma seliguqa waphuma wahamba. Akazange aye ngisho ukuyokhuluma nabalandeli abebengaphandle kwenkantolo.Ubehamba nendodakazi yakhe uDuduzile, kanti bekulindeleke ukuthi uzophefumula ngokuxoshwa kwakhe i-ANC ngokuhola i-MK nokwehlisa ukwesekwa kukaKhongolose okhethweni.Ummeli we-MK, u-Advocate Dali Mpofu, uthe icala le-ANC ngeke lithele zithelo.Uthe umonakalo wenzeka okhethweni ngakho akukho okuzoshintsha.Ummeli we-ANC, u-Advocate Gavin Marriott, uthe kusazoba nezinye izinketho ngakho ukusetshenziswa kwegama yiMK kuzoba nomthelela.I-ANC ithi enye inkantolo ingafinyelela esinqumeni esehlukile kunesenkantolo enkulu yingakho ifuna udaba ludluliselwe eNkantolo okuDluliswa kuyo amaCala.

ONGAPHANSI nongaphezulu phakathi komholi we-MK esifundeni saseNdwedwe, uMbhishophi Bheki Ngcobo nomculi kamaskandi, uKhuzani "Indlamlenze" Mpungose ngenxa yezikhalo zebebehlanza esibhedlela saseThekwini, iKing Dinuzulu. Laba basebenzi ababalelwa ku-60 basola uKhuzani ngokubaxosha enkampanini yakhe, iNdlamlenze Cleaning Services ngenyanga eyedlule. UNgcobo ube esenikela esibhedlela ukuyohlangana nalaba basebenzi.Uthe ubeyokuzwa ngesihluku okuthiwa baphethwe ngaso abaphathi beNdlamlenze.UNgcobo uthe bathathe isinqumo sokungenelela ukuze kuxazululwe lolu daba."Siyazama ukuxhumana noKhuzani kodwa asimtholi ngoba abathumile abafuni ukusixhumanisa naye." UNgcobo unxuse uKhuzani ukuba amthinte ngqo ngoba abasebenzi bayaxhaphazeka."Abanazo uzinsiza kusebenza. Abasebenzi ufike wabaqasha bephuma kwenye inkampani. Manje sebeqasha abantu abasha, bakhipha abantu abadala." UNgcobo uthe kulaba basebenzi, kunabasebenzi asebeneminyaka ebalelwa kweyishumi besebenza enkampanini okuyiyo ebiyenza umsebenzi ngaphambilini futhi iningi labo ngeke lisaqasheka ngenxa yeminyaka yabo."Lempi ayizophela lapha, Khuzani... Siyezwa nangobudlelwano bakho noNgqongqoshe waseKZN (esiligodlile igama lakhe). Ninobudlelwano obuqhubekayo. Buyazichaza ukuthi yini nithi nicula, nibe ninamathenda ngala," kugadla uNgcobo.Eziphendulela uKhuzani, uthe isizathu esenza anqabe ukuhlangana noMbhishobhi uNgcobo "wukuthi wathi ufuna simkhokhele uR100 000 ukuze ezokhuluma nabasebenzi. Mina ngenqaba, wabe esethembisa ukuthi uzongcolisa igama lami ngayo yonke indlela. Ngakho-ke lezo zinsolo ziyingxenye yokungcolisa igama lami ngoba ngenqaba ukumbona. Uma ungalalela kuleyo-video, uyakugcizelela ukuthi yena ufuna mina hhayi abantu abamele inkampani. (Ukuthi) indaba inemali afuna ukudizelwa ngayo." Ebuzwa ngobudlelwano okuthiwa unabo nongqongqoshe thizeni, uKhuzani uthe ngeke aphendule “izinto ezingamanga kodwa ngiphendula izinto ezinobufakazi”.“Kunabantu abasebenzisa igama le-MK ukuqoqa izimali eziya emakhukhwini abo njengoMapholoba, angazi noma inhlangano yakhe iyakwazi yini lokho," kuphetha uKhuzani. UNgcobo uphike walala ngomhlane ukuthi wake wafuna imali kuKhuzani, uthe abakaze bakhuluma naye futhi abazani. Uthe bayamdinga uKhuzani ngoba bazoqhubeka nokusiza abasebenzi abakhala ngenkampani yakhe.

IQEMBU lepolitiki uMkhonto Wesizwe seliqokele esikhundleni, owayewumholi we-ANCYL, uMnuz Magasela Mzobe.UMzobe osanda kulaxaza i-EFF abeseyilungu layo wajoyina i-MK, uqokelwe esikhundleni sokuba yinhloko ehhovisini likamengameli weqembu uMnuz Jacob Zuma.Esitatimendeni esikhishwe yiqembu izolo esiqinisekisa ukuqokwa kukaMzobe, olikhumelayo kuzwelonke uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndhlela, uthe bayamhalalisela ngokuqokwa kwakhe.“UMzobe uzobamba iqhaza elimqoka ukusiza umengameli ekwenzeni umsebenzi wakhe eqenjini. Ukuqokwa kwakhe kuhloswe ngakho ukuqinisekisa ukusebenza ngendlela kwehhovisi likamengameli neqembu nje lonke,” usho kanje.Ngesikhathi ekhuluma nozakwabo weSolezwe i-IOL, uMzobe uthe ukuqokwa kwakhe kuvule ikhasi elisha kuyena ngakho uzimisele ukwenza umsebenzi wakhe eqenjini ngendlela esezingeni eliphezulu.“Sizosebenzisa lokho esinakho ukulwa nokucindezelwa kwabantu.  Ngijoyine leli qembu ngoba nginenkolelo yokuthi lizokhulula abantu emaketangweni obubha,” usho kanjeI-MK yiqembu eliphikisayo ngokusemthethweni ePhalamende likazwelonke njengoba kubusa uhulumeni webumbano i- National Government of National Unity, oholwa yi-ANC.

UKUQEMBUKA kowayengumengameli we-ANC nezwe, uMnuz Jacob Zuma evula iqembu lakhe Umkhonto weSizwe, kushayele isipikili sokugcina ezinkingeni ezibhekene noKhongolose ikakhulu KwaZulu-Natal. Lokhu kuvezwe abahlaziyi bezepolitiki abangeze nokuthi ezinye zezinkinga zikaKhongolose zidalwe ukuklwebhana nombango wangaphakathi, ukukhathala kwabantu ukuvotela into eyodwa, nokuhlukana kwangaphakathi.Basho kanje kulandela ukuphefumula kukaSihlalo we-ANC kuzwelonke, uMnuz Gwede Mantashe, othe i-ANC esifundazweni ifile, kudingeka yakhiwe kabusha.Yize esho kanje uMantashe, kodwa ukuchithile ukuthi bazohlakaza ubuholi besifundazwe njengoba umlando wabafundisa ukungaxhamazeli bahlakaze ubuholi ngoba kuba nzima kakhulu uma usuwakha kabusha.UNobhala Jikelele we-ANC uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, uke wayithinta eyezinxushunxushu ngaphakathi nokufika kwe-MK njengezinto ezenze le nhlangano yehlelwa ukwesekwa.I-MK ikhiphe i-ANC emandleni esifundazweni njengoba kuphethe uhulumeni wokubambisana kwamaqembu ahlukene. Kuzwelonke i-MK iyiqembu eliphikisayo kanti yathola izihlalo ezingu-58 ePhalamende.Umhlaziyi wezepolitiki oseNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal (UKZN) uMnuz Zakhele Ndlovu, uthe umdonsiswano wangaphakathi kwi-ANC nokuqembuka kukaZuma yikhona okudonsele amanzi ngomsele i-ANC.Esifundazweni, uthe uZuma ube nomthelela ekutheni le nhlangano ilahlekelwe amandla.“I-ANC yashaya isikhala ngokuyibukela phansi indaba yokushiya kukaZuma, kwakumele iyilawule ngendlela. Ukuhlukana kwangaphakathi ngezinye zezinto ezenze le nhlangano ishayeke kanje.”Uthe kodwa izinkinga ze-ANC zaqala eminyakeni eyevile kwengu-10 edlule.“Indaba yaqala engqungqutheleni yango-2007, yasePolokwane, lapho kwagqama khona ukwehlukana kuxoshwa owayengumengameli we-ANC nezwe, uMnuz Thabo Mbeki. UZuma wathatha izintambo, kwathi uma eseshiya kwi-ANC wakhala ngokuthi i-ANC kaRamaphosa ayisafani. Lokhu kubhebhezele kakhulu izinkinga zale nhlangano, abantu bayishiya bahamba noZuma.”USolwazi Siphamandla Zondi ongumhlaziyi ekhuluma nesiteshi sethelevishini, ubale ukufika kwe-MK nokwehlukana kwangaphakathi njengezinto ezilimaze le nhlangano.Uthe abanye abantu sebekhathele ukuvotela abantu ababodwa yingakho babuye bavotela amanye amaqembu.Uveze ukuthi sekuphele iminyaka eyevile ku-15 le nhlangano yehlelwa ukwesekwa.“Ukuyamaniswa kwe-ANC nenkohlakalo, i-MK ngezinye zezinto ezenze le nhlangano yagajwa abavoti. I-MK izalwa yi-ANC kanjalo neCope okungamaqembu ayilimazile le nhlangano.”Uthe ngisho emawadini abantu bayayilaxaza le nhlangano.

Amalungu eqembu oMkhonto Wesizwe Party asenqume ukuyothatha izindawo zawo ePhalamende ngemuva kokuduba ukufungiswa nomhlangano wokuqala ngoLwesihlanu.I-MK ithole izihlalo ezingu-58 ngemuva kokhetho lukazwelonke ngoMeyi 29.Leli qembu laduba ukuya ePhalamande ngoba lingayemukeli imiphumela yokhetho ngoba likhala ngokuthi kwaba nokukhwatshaniswa kwamavoti futhi kunokungahambanga kahle.Umholi weMK, uJacob Zuma, esitatimenndeni esifundwe ngumkhulumeli weqembu uNhlamulo Ndhlela esithangamini nabezindaba eGoli ngeSonto ebusuku, uthe ngemuva kokuthola ukwalulekwa kwezomthetho, iqembu lizothatha indawo yalo ePhalamende.“Sizoqhubeka sikhulume ngenkinga yokukhwatshaniswa kwemiphumela yokhetho ngaphakathi ePhalamende. Ngesikhathi esifanayo sizoqinisa imikhankaso ezinkantolo nezinye izindlela ezisemthethweni ngaphandle. Ukuteleka kuzoqhubeka ngezinye izindlela. Ziningi izimpi ezizayo ezihlanganisa ukushintshwa kwendlela yokuvota echemile ne-IEC echemile,” kusho uZuma.Uthe uyalele ithimba labo lezomthetho ukuthi lenze isiqiniseko sokuthi ubulungiswa buyenzeka ngisho nangaphandle kwakuleli ngoba ngeke bavume ukuthi kwebiwe amavoti eqembu.Ummeli weqembu u-Advocate Dali Mpofu uthe leli qembu selibe senkantolo amahlandla angu-11 ezinyangeni ezintathu ezedlule.UMpofu uthe bazobheka kakhulu amacala achithwe eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo ukuze imiphumela yokhetho ichithwe bese kuvotwa kabusha ezinsukwini ezingu-90. Elinye ngelithinta ukukhishwa kukaZuma ohlwini lwabantu abazomela iqembu ePhalamande ngenxa yokuthi wagwetshwa ejele nathe akuhambisani nokwenziwa emazweni  omhlaba.

IQEMBU uMkhonto weSizwe (MK), lithi asikho isidingo sokuthi owayengumengameli uMnuz Jacob Zuma, ahlangane noMnuz Jabulani Khumalo oxoshiwe ngoba wachazelwa konke ngesinqumo seqembu.I-MK imenyezelwe nguZuma ngoDisemba nyakenye, wathi ngeke esayivotela i-ANC kodwa usehamba neqembu elisha okhethweni oluzayo. Izwe liya okhethweni lukazwelonke ngoMeyi 29, nonyaka.UKhumalo owabhalisa iMK, kwi-IEC uxoshiwe njengelungu futhi lokhu kumenyezelwe ngesitatimende esisabalele kwabezindaba. UKhumalo ucashunwe ekhuluma ne-eNCA, ethi akayazi eyokuxoshwa futhi usazohlangana noZuma ezwe kahle.UKhumalo uchithwa nje, ubelele isibili ohlwini lweqembu lwabaya ePhalamende futhi ubenesikhundla esiphezulu ebizwa ngoKhomanda.Okhulumela iMK uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndlhela, uthe akukho mhlangano ozoba khona phakathi kukaKhumalo neqembu.“Akukho mhlangano ozoba khona ngicela kucace nje lokho. UKhumalo wayesemhlanganweni onabaholi cishe abangu-25, bamchazela konke wanikezwa incwadi, washiya umhlangano. Asikhathazekile ngalutho azokukhuluma ngoba akukho okubi ebesikwenza futhi iqembu libhaliswe ngoZuma manje,’’ kusho uNdlhela.Ebuzwa ngezizathu zokuchitwa kukaKhumalo, uthe abakwazi ukuzidalula manje kodwa zizovela ngokuhamba kwesikhathi. I-MK esitatimendeni sokuxoshwa kukaKhumalo icacise ukuthi wayecelwe nguZuma ukuba abhalise iqembu kwi-IEC.Kuhambe, kwahamba kwaba noshintsho kwakhishwa uKhumalo kwafakwa isithombe sikaZuma, ukuze kukhangiswe ngaye.Kwenzeka lokhu nje, kunombhalo ongaphansi kwegama likaDuduzile Zuma-Sambudla oyindodakazi kaZuma, oveze ukuthi akukho mhlangano.Lo mbhalo okukholakala ukuthi okaDuduzile, uveze ukuthi emabhukwini kaZuma awukho umhlangano awuhlele noKhumalo.Ngaphambi kwalokho kuke kwaba nomunye umbhalo othi bekungeke kulunge ukuthi izinkunzi ezimbili zikhonye esibayeni esisodwa.UKhumalo uzanywe kaningi ocingweni lwakhe belungabanjwa futhi nomyalezo athunyelwe wona akawuphendulanga.Kuxoshwa uKhumalo nje, iMK iphuma ingena ezinkantolo futhi kubukeka kusayihambela kahle. Kulindeleke ukuthi ngoMeyi 10, iNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo ilalele icala phakathi kwaleli qembu ne-IEC.I-IEC yamemezela ukuthi uZuma akafanelwe wukuba sohlwini lwabaya ePhalamende ngoba wake wagwetshwa, waya ejele.

Iqembu Umkhonto Wesizwe lithi lingase lifune ukuthi kuqalwe phansi ukuvota ngenxa yezinto ezahlukene elingeneme ngazo.Okhulumela iqembu uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndhlela, uthe banobufakazi obuqanda ikhanda obuthinta ukungasebenzi ngendlela kwenhlangano eyengamele ukhetho i-IEC. Uthe obunye buthinta i-ANC athe isebenzise izinto zikahulumeni ukufeza izinhloso zayo.Uthe banobufakazi ababuthumele kwi-IEC obuhlanganisa obuqoshiwe lapho abantu bebekhuluma ngokuthi bawaxosha kanjani amalungu abo abegade ukuthi ukhetho luqhubeka ngendlela yini.UNdhlela ubekhuluma esithangamini nabezindaba esikhungweni sikazwelonke semiphumela se-IEC eMidrand ngoMgqibelo ebusuku. Bekukhona nomholi weqembu uJacob Zuma ofike okokuqala kulesi sikhungo.Uveze ukuthi ngesikhathi kunobuhixihixi ngoLwesihlanu ekuseni lapho imiphumela ibingaveli khona kungenxa yokuthi bekunenkampani yezobuchwepheshe yaseKapa ebikhwabanisa izinto.“Sikhulume nabameli bethu futhi izeluleko esizitholile kubo bathe kumele, futhi sizokwenza. Sicabanga ukuthi kuvotwe kabusha. Ukufuna kuqalwe phansi kuvotwe ngenye yezinto esizicabangayo. Yisinqumo esizokhuluma ngaso,” kusho uNdhlela.Uthe okunye bafuna kusungulwe ikhomishana ezophenya kabanzi ngokwenzekile okhethweni.

I-MK ithi izobuye ilifake kabusha icala eliphikisa imiphumela yokhetho elihoxise ngoLwesithathu.Ithe ukuhoxisa kwayo icala akufanele kuthathwe ngokuthi ayinabo ubufakazi bokuthi ukhetho lwangoMeyi lwalungakhululekile.Le nhlangano ihoxise icala ebilifake eNkantolo yezoKhetho, lapho ibifuna khona ukuthi kuqalwe phansi ukhetho.I-MK ayiyemukeli imiphumela yokhetho njengoba ithi kunezigidi zamavoti ayo angazange abalwe.Okhulumela i-MK, uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndhlela, uthe bakhethe ukuhoxisa icala emva kokuthola ubufakazi obusha bokukhwatshwaniswa kwamavoti.“Abameli bethu basiluleke ngokuthi kunemidanti okufanele ilandelwe ukuze sikwazi ukwethula lobu bufakazi obusha enkantolo. Abameli baseluleke ngokuthi kufanele sifake isicelo esisha ukuze sizokwazi ukwethula ubufakazi.“Ngifuna ukukugcizelela ukuthi ukuhoxisa kwethu icala akusho ukuthi asinabo ubufakazi balezi zinsolo esizenzile. Sizofaka isicelo esisha maduze ukuze kuzophenywa izinsolo.”UNdhlela uthe ubufakazi obusha bufakazela lokhu abebelokhu bekusho kokuthi ukhetho lwalungakhululekile.“Ochwepheshe esixoxa nabo bayaqhubeka nokuthola ubufakazi obusha bokukhwashwaniswa kwamavoti. Ingakho sikhethe ukufaka isicelo esisha ngoba besingafuni ukuthi ubufakazi obusha buchithwe.”I-MK ingelinye lamaqembu afika kwezwakala okhethweni lwangoMeyi njengoba yalala isithathu kuzwelonke, yathola izihlalo ezingu-58 ePhalamende.KwaZulu-Natal iyona i-MK eyahamba phambili ngezihlalo ezingu-37, nokho ayisiphethe isifundazwe njengoba izihlalo zayo zingenele ukuthi ibuse ngokuzimela.Yize i-MK yahlula wonke amaqembu abengenele ukhetho okokuqala, yaphinde yahlula namaqembu amadala afana ne-IFP ne-EFF, ubuholi be-MK abunelisekile ngale miphumela njengoba bekholelwa ekutheni balunqoba ukhetho.Emva kokhetho i-MK yafaka isikhalo, ifuna kumiswe ukukhishwa kwemiphumela yokhetho.UNdhlela uthe namanje kusabadida ukuthi yini eyenza ukuthi inhlangano eyengamele ukhetho, i-Electoral Commission of South Africa (IEC), iphuthumise ukumenyezelwa kwemiphumela yokhetho.“Ukukhipha kwabo imiphumela ngokushesha kwaphula amalungelo abantu ababevotile okhethweni.”Njengengxenye yokukhombisa ukungayemukeli imiphumela yokhetho, amalungu e-MK awazange aye ePhalamende ngesikhathi kufungiswa amanye amalungu ePhalamende.Nokho agcine eyile ukuyofungiswa ngesonto eledlule.I-IEC neDA bayasiphikisa isicelo se-MK, bakhala ngokuthi i-MK ayinabo ubufakazi bezinsolo zokuthi kwakhwatshwaniswa amavoti.

OWAYENGUMENGAMELI, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, uthembise amalungu e-MK ukuthi inhlangano yabo izobasa ezweni lesethembiso, wathi le nhlangano ivunywe ngisho nasemazulwini.UZuma uthe maduze i-MK izokhipha abantu bakuleli ezweni lobugqila.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma namalungu e-MK abezomeseka ngaphandle kweNkantolo eNkulu eMgungundlovu, lapho ebebhekene khona necala lenkohlakalo.Nakuba i-MK yahamba phambili ngamavoti KwaZulu-Natal, yaphinde yaba iqembu lesithathu ngobukhulu kuzwelonke, yasala ngaphandle ngesikhathi kwabiwa izikhundla kuhulumeni wokubambisana.Kodwa lokhu akumdikibalisi uZuma njengoba etshele amalungu e-MK ukuthi leli qembu lizoyiqeda inhlupheko.“Ima sizizwayo ukuthi siya eKhenana. Siya ezulwini langempela, ngeke sihlehle! Enye inhlangano lena, yaziwa ngisho emazulwini, yaziwa nayizingelosi. Ezinye izingelosi zifuna ukwehla, zizosisiza.”UZuma uthe ufuna ukuthi i-MK ithathe bonke omasipala okhethweni lohulumeni basekhaya oluzokuba ngo-2026.“Njengoba kuzokuba nokhetho lwasemakhaya, kufanele ukuthi uMkhonto ushanele, uthathe yonke into. Lokho kuyokube kuyibika lokuthi okhethweni (lukazwelonke) oluzayo siyobhubhisa. Siyobhubhisa yonke into ngoba sifuna ukuphatha izwe ukuze sizoshintsha impilo yabantu.”UZuma uthe abakaliphonsi ithawula emizamweni yabo yokuchitha imiphumela yokhetho lwangoMeyi.UZuma uthe basamile ekutheni ukhetho olwedlule lwalungakhululekile.“Njengoba sasinokhetho sahamba phambili ngokuwina, izigebengu ezintshontshayo zacazelana ngamavoti ethu. Ngithi anginazise ukuthi impi yokhetho ayikapheli nakancane ngoba saqolwa. Sinobufakazi obuqanda ikhanda, icala liyeza.“Kuhlezi kuthiwa izwe liphethwe ngentandoyeningi. Ikuphi intandoyeningi uma kuzophatha ongaluwinanga ukhetho? Ngisho kulesi sifundazwe sahamba phambili ngamavoti kodwa kuphethe abantu abalandela emumva.”Inkantolo ibigcwele phezulu njengoba abaholi be-MK bebephume ngobuningi babo ukuzokweseka uZuma.Phakathi kwabaholi abebesenkantolo kubalwa loyo osanda kuqembuka kwi-EFF, uMnuz Floyd Shivambu nabanye abaholi be-MK bakuzwelonke, nabaholi be-MK KwaZulu-Natal okukhona kubo umholi wale nhlangano esiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal, iNkosi Phathisizwe Chiliza.Ngaphandle kwenkantolo, amalungu e-MK abecula izingoma ezeseka uZuma.Okuqaphelekile ukuthi abantu abebezokweseka uZuma izolo bebebancane ukunalabo abajwayele ukubonakala uma evela ezinkantolo.

Amaqembu angeyona ingxenye kahulumeni wobumbano, asebekele umshado wamaqembu abambisene kulo hulumeni isikhathi esingangonyaka noma emibili ngaphambi kokugqabuka kwegoda.La maqembu okuyiMK, EFF, ATM, NCC ne-UAT, aveze ukuthi uma kuke kwakhishwa uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, ezintanjeni zokuhola i-ANC, umshado uyophela.NgoLwesine, esithangamini sabezindaba ePhalamende abaholi balawa maqembu bathule ikhokhasi njengoba bezobe bephikisa ePhalamende.Umholi weMK ePhalamende, uDkt John Hlophe, uveze ukuthi akaboni umshado we-ANC, DA, IFP, PA namanye amaqembu kuzophela ihlandla lalo hulumeni usekhona.Uthe ziningi kakhulu izinto ahluke ngazo uma kuziwa emigomeni.“Kungaba umlingo uma kungase kuphele iminyaka emibili usekhona lo mshado kuhulumeni. Yinto ezophela njengomlilo wamaphepha.” Nomholi we-EFF, uMnuz Julius Malema, uphefumule okufananyo noHlophe, wathi ingase ongapheli iminyaka emibili usekhona lo mshado we-ANC.“I-DA yathi izosebenzisana ne-ANC ngenxa kaRamaphosa. Nakanjani uRamaphosa uzophuma engqungqutheleni ye-ANC ngenxa yokuthi le nhlangano ayiyivumi eyehlandla lesithathu.”Kulindeleke ukuthi ihlale eminyakeni emibili ezayo ingqungquthela ye-ANC kuzwelonke okuyokhethwa ubuholi obusha kuyona.Kuningi ukukhuluma kuleli ngeyalo mshado nokuthi ngabe uzohlala isikhathi esingakanani. UMalema noHlophe babize abaholi be-UDM ne-PAC ngabadayisi abathanda izikhundla kuhulumeni ngokuba yingxenye yomshado.UHlophe uthe njengoba bebethula le khokhasi banezihlalo ezingu-102 abazolwa ngazo ukuphucula impilo yabantu.Uveze ukuthi bazofaka iziphakamiso ePhalamende zokuthi kuqashwe ngokugcwele abasebenzi abafana nonogada, ukusulwa kwezikweletu zezitshudeni, ukunikezwa kwezingane zamantombazane amaqakelo amahhala kanjalo nokuvusa indaba yokuthi kukhishwe ngevoti lokungamthembi uRamaphosa ngodaba lwasepulazini lwakhe iPhala Phala, lapho kwatholakala khona imali ithukusiwe.“Sifuna ivuswe eyokuthathwa komhlaba ngaphandle kwesinxephezelo, ukufakwa ngaphansi kukahulumeni kweBhange loMbuso, ukuchithwa kwayo yonke imithetho yobandlululo nezinye izinto ezithinta umphakathi. Sinethemba ukuthi sizokutholwa ukwesekwa emkhankasweni esizoyenza njengekhokhasi yamaqembu ahlukene.”Odabeni lokuvumbuka kabusha kwezithinta indaba yokudliwa kwemali ebhange iVBS okufaka nabaholi be-EFF, uMalema uthe wudaba oludala lolu nesahluko salo sesavalwa.“Abasisabisa ngokuthi bazosibopha ngokuvusa indaba yeVBS, abakwenze, asibasabi. Akukho okusha okuthinta le ndaba. Ukuthula kwethu akusho ukuthi ingoba singazi ukuthi sizophendula sithini, ingoba sikhathele ukuphendula into engathi shu. Akekho ozosisabisa ngokuthi asivale umlomo ngokuthi avuse indaba yeVBS,” kusho uMalema.

INKANTOLO yoMthethosisekelo yamukele isicelo soMkhonto weSizwe (MK), sokwelulelwa isikhathi sokufaka amaphepha ecala lombango wokungena kukaMnuz Jacob Zuma, ePhalamende.NgoDisemba nyakenye, uZuma umemezele ukuthi weseka iqembu elisha Umkhonto weSizwe, akasayingeni indaba ye-ANC. Maningi amacala abhekene neMK futhi ilokhu iwanqoba. Leli elifakwe yi-IEC ngelinye lawo njengoba seliya eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo.Inhlangano yokhetho i-IEC, yanquma ukuthi uZuma akafanelwe wukungena ohlwini lwasePhalamende ngoba walahlwa ngecala, wagwetshwa. UMkhonto weSizwe walufaka enkantolo udaba wanqoba kodwa i-IEC yalwedlulisa ithi ayinelisekile ngesinqumo.I-IEC iwafakile amaphepha kwasala i-MK, ebhaleliwe icelwa ukuthi iwafake ungakashayi uLwesihlanu kodwa wedlula umnqamulajuqu. Abameli beMK babhalele inkantolo beyicela ukuthi ibelulele isikhathi isikhathi ngoba ayikwazanga ukufaka amaphepha ngesikhathi esibekiwe.Umbhalo ukhomba ukuthi banikwe kuze kube wuLwesibili luka-Ephreli 30, ukuthi bafake amaphepha.“IPhini leNhloko yamaJaji likhiphe umyalelo wokuthi abafuna ukuphikisana nesicelo, bafake amaphepha ngo-Ephreil 30, noma ngaphambi kwawo,’’ kusho umyalelo wenkantolo.Inkantolo ithe izimisele ngokuthi udaba lulalelwe njengoluphuthumayo bese ikhipha isinqumo sayo.

INHLANGANO ebhekele abathengi eNingizimu Afrika, iNational Consumer Commission idonse ngendlebe abantu ukuthi babuyisele ezitolo impahla okusuke kuthiwe ayiphephile ngoba ukuqhubeka bayisebenzise kubeka impilo yabo engcupheni.I-NCC iveze ukuthi kusukela ngo-Ephreli 1 kuze kube wuJuni 30 kulo nyaka iwu-20 impahla okucelwe ukuthi abantu bayibuyisele emuva.Kuleyo mpahla kukhona i-peanut butter, shampoo, battery,  izinkomishi, amasobho, amaplaki kagesi, i-punching bag esetshenziswa ngamabhokisa, izinsimbi zezimoto okubalwa ezeMercedes Benz, Chery, Ford, Citroen neJeep nokunye.“Sithole ukuthi akusibona bonke abantu ababuyisa impahla esisuke sicele ukuthi ibuyiselwe ezitolo. Abanye bayaqhubeka bahlale nayo noma bayisebenzise. Kuyingozi ukwenza lokhu ngoba abakhiqiza lezi zimpahla basuke bethole ukuthi kunobungozi obuthile kuzona. Siye sicacise nasezitatimendeni zethu ukuthi oqhubeka nokusebenzisa leyo mpahla usuke ebeka impilo yakhe engcupheni kokunye angafa nokufa,” kusho iNCC esitatimendeni.Ibalule ukuthi uma kuthiwa abantu ababuyisele into edliwayo emuva kusuke kucacile ukuthi ayisafanele ukudliwa, ngakho ukungayibuyiseli emuva kubeka impilo yoyidlayo engcupheni. Ithe kanjalo nasezimotweni uma kuthiwa azibuyiselwe emagaraji ngoba kunezinsimbi ezingenzi okufanele akufanele kuzitshwe lokhu. Ithe akukho okulahlekela umthengi ngokubuyisela impahla esitolo ngoba usuke ezobuyiselwa imali yakhe bese kuqinisekiswa ukuthi izinkampani zikhiqiza impahla ephephile.I-NCC ithembise ukuthi izokuqapha ngeso lokhozi ukukhiqizwa kwempahla ukuze iqinisekise ukuthi abantu bakuleli basebenzisa imikhiqizo ephephile.

INYUNYANA yabasebenzi bakahulumeni i- National Education, Health and Allied Worker’s Union, ifuna uNobhala we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Bheki Mtolo nenhlangano yakhe bakhokhe inhlawulo ka-R2 million ngekubize ngokudicilela phansi isithunzi samalungu ayo angabasebenzi ezikhungweni zikahulumeni, ngesikhathi ethula inkulumo emcimbni owawuseKokstad ngenyanga eyedlule.Emaphepheni afakwe yiNehawu eNkantolo eNkulu yaseMgungundlovu, ifuna uMtolo ne-ANC bakhokhe inhlawulo ka- R500 000 icala ngalinye, kwamane amangalelwe ngawo.Emva kokhetho, ngesikhathi kusanda kuphothulwa isivumelwano sikahulumeni wokubambisana, uMtolo ekhuluma nezithameli ezevile ku- 1 000 emcimbini owawuseKostad ngoJulayi 21, kuthiwa wakhuluma ngendlela elumelayo egudla amalungu enyunyana. Lokhu wakwenza emva kwemibiko yokuthi kukhona kuwo ayephumele obala eveza ukungahambisani nohulumeni wokubambisana.Inkulumo yakhe eshicilelwe kulawa maphepha okuvela ukuthi wayethula kulo mcimbi, okukholakala ukuthi iyona emdonsele amanzi ngomsele ibhalwe kanje;“ Abanye abebehlangene lana bathe abahambisani nohulumeni wokubumbano.  Niyayazi inyunyana ebizwa nge-Nehawu? Abantu abangamalungu e-Nehawu yibona abasebenza emahhovisi oMnyango wezaseKhaya. Uma niya kulawa mahhovisi niyofuna  isitifiketi sokushona komuntu ningasizakali,  yi-Nehawu leyo.  Uma niya e-Sassa, niyofuna usizo oluthile, nizitshwa, kuyobe yi-Nehawu…,”Le nyunyana ithe inkulumo kaMtolo edicilela phansi isithunzi samalungu ayo, yenziwa ngamabomu futhi ngenhloso.“Iveza ukuthi inyunyana namalungu ayo, yiyona eyimbangela yokungasebenzi emahhovisi oMnyango wezaseKhaya, e-Sassa nokugqoza kokusebenza kwama- ambulensi. Kusho ukuthi le nyunyana namalungu ayo ikhohlakele, ithatha imvalamlomo kubalimi abamhlophe ukucindezela abasebenzi basemapulazini.  Ngenxa yale nkulumo, isithunzi senyunyana silimele,” kubhalwe emaphepheni.Kuthiwa ngosuku olulandelayo, uMtolo ekhuluma ohlelweni lwezindaba lwantambama kuKhozi FM, kuthiwa wakugcizelela lokhu. Le nyunyana iphinde ifune inkantolo ukuthi iphoqe uMtolo nenhlangano i-ANC ekutheni ngaphezu kwale nhlawulo, baphinde babhale isixoliso sinanyekwe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana nasemaphephandabeni.Okhulumela i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Mafika Mndebele,, uthe amaphepha amangalela unobhala wale nhlangano ne-ANC, bawabone ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.“Siyakholelwa ekutheni wonke umuntu unelungelo lokuya enkantolo uma kukhona lapho adinga khona isixazululo.  Asizongena kakhulu emniningwaneni yalolu daba, sizodedela inkantolo yenze umsebenzi wayo.”

I-NFP inikezwe izinsuku ezimbili ukuba iqhamuke nohlelo lokukhokha isikweletu sezigidi zamaRandi yi-Ezulweni Investment, isabisa ngokuthatha izinyathelo ezingaholela ekutheni leli qembu lingakwazi ukungenela ukhetho oluzayo uma lihluleka ukuqhamuka nohlelo lokuyikhokhela kulo mnqamulajuqu ewubekile.Lezi zinsongo ziqukethwe encwadini yabameli ethunyelwe uMengameli weNFP, uMnuz Ivan Barnes.Encwadini yabameli, i-Ezulweni Investment isabisa ngokuthi izoqhubeka necala lokuthi iNFP ihlakazwe uma ihluleka ukuqhamuka nohlelo lokuyikhokhela.Ngokwamaphepha afakwe eNkantolo eNkulu eGoli, isikweletu seNFP sesikhule safika kuR25 million, njengoba yayiboleke uR13 million kwi-Ezulweni Investment ngo-2013.Le mali yasetshenziselwa ukukhankasela ukhetho lwango-2014. Kusukela lapho i-Ezulweni Investment ibilokhu izama ukuthola imali yayo.I-Ezulweni Investment ithe amakhansela eNFP azibophezela ukuthi azosikhokha isikweletu emhlanganweni owawuseThekwini ngonyaka owedlule.“Nawe (Barnes) wawukhona emhlanganweni lapho amakhansela azibophezela khona ukuthi azoqhamuka nohlelo lokusikhokha sonke isikweletu. Nakuba amakhansela enza lesi sibophezelo, isikweletu asikaze sikhokhwe.”I-Ezulweni Investment ike yaba sematheni ngesikhathi ilwa ne-ANC, kubangwa isikweletu sikaR100 million.Icala lahamba laze lafika eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo, kwawina i-Ezulweni Investment. I-ANC yagcina isikhokhile isikweletu.Abe-Ezulweni bathe bazonikela enkantolo uma bengayitholi impendulo.“Sizoqhubeka necala lapho sifuna ukuthi kuhlakazwe iNFP. Nani ke niyazi ukuthi umphumela wokuhlakazwa kweNFP kuzokusho ukuthi angeke nikwazi ukungenela ukhetho oluzayo.”UBarnes ukuqinisekisile ukuthi bayitholile incwadi yabameli be-Ezulweni Investment, wathi bazophendula.“Into nje esifuna ukuyibona ubufakazi balesikweletu. Sifuna ubufakazi bokuthi iNFP yazithola ngempela yini izimpahla okuthiwa iyazikweleta, nokuthi zamukelwa abantu abasemthethweni. Angeke sivele sithi sizokhokhela noma isiphi isikweletu ngenxa yokuthi kukhona abantu abasisabisa ngokuthi sizohlakazwa.”UBarnes uthe abanalo itwetwe lokuthi lesi sikweletu singase sibavimbe ukuthi bangenele ukhetho.“Ukuhlakaza iqembu akusiyo nje into elula ongavuka uyenze ekuseni. Lolu kuba uhlelo oluthatha isikhathi eside. Abantu abafuna ukuvotela iNFP kufanele bazi ukuthi sizokube sikhona okhethweni.”UBarnes usole amalungu eNFP anganeme nasashiya iqembu, ngokuhambe ebhebhezela inkulumo yokuthi iqembu lizohlakazwa.

ISIKHWAMA esixhasa ngemali yokufunda ezikhungweni zemfundo, iNational Students’ Financial Aid Scheme (NSFAS), siyalele izitshudeni zasemakolishi amakhono ukuthi zivule ama-akhawunti asebhange ukuze zithole imihlomulo yazo.Lesi sikhwana sithe lezi zitshudeni zingavula ama-akhawunti kunoma iliphi ibhange.Umlawuli wesikhashana weNSFAS, uMnuz Freeman Nomvalo, ngeledlule, uhlangane nenhlangano yezitshudeni zasemakolishi ama-TVET, ngenxa yokwanda kwezehlakalo zokungenami ngokungakhokhwa kwemihlomulo.“Umhlangano ubumayelana nokubambezeleka ekukhokhweni kwemihlomulo  nokunyamalala kwemali kuma-akhawunti ezitshudeni. Kulo mhlangano izitshudeni zikhale ngohlelo lokusatshalaliswa kwemihlomulo,” kusho iNSFAS.Lesi sikhwama sithe sesiqhamuke nohlelo oluzobhekana nalezi zinkinga kulabo abazothola imihlomulo yabo ekupheleni kwenyanga ezayo.“I-NSFAS ihlela ukuthumela ngqo imali kuma-akhawunti ezitshudeni. Yingakho kubalulekile ukuthi izitshudeni zibe nama-akhawunti anoma iliphi ibhange.” Lesi sikhwama sithe sizoxhumana nabathola uxhaso sibanxenxe ukuthi balethe ulwazi lwabo ukuze imali ingene ngqo kubona.“Siyazi ngokubambezeleka ekutheni izitshudeni zithole imihlomulo yazo kule nyanga. Sijube ithimba lezikhulu zalesi sikhwama ezikhungweni ezehlukene ukuze ziyoxazulula lezi zinkinga.” Lokhu kwenzelwa ukuthi kuqala uhlelo olusha lokufakwa ngqo kwemali kuma-akhawunti ezitshudeni zibe sezixazululekile izinkinga ezivele zikhona. Abalesi sikhwama baveze ukuthi bayazilungisa nezinkinga ezibhekene nezitshudeni zasemanyuvesi.“Okwamanje uhlelo lokukhokhela ngqo izitshudeni kuma-akhawunti azo lokuqala kwezasemakolishi kuphela. Izitshudeni zasemanyuvesi zizoqhubeka nokuthola imihlomulo yazo ezikhungweni, kuze kube uJulayi nonyaka.” I-NSFAS ithe izobeka izitshudeni phambili uma isinquma ngabazothola uxhaso.Kwenzeka lokhu nje, kwezinye izikhungo ziyaqonga izinkinga zezitshudeni ezikhala ngokucotha kohlelo lokukhokhwa kwemihlomuloKwezinye izikhungo kuqubuke imibhikisho yezitshudeni ezikhala esifanayo.Ezinye zazo zikhala ngokuthi zikhishwa omastende eziqashe kubona ngenxa yokungakhokhi kwalesi sikhwama.Uphenyo lwenkampani yabameli eyayijutshwe yiNSFAS lwaphakamisa ukuthi kuchithwe izinkampani ezine ebezikhokha imihlomulo yezitshudeni.UNgqongqoshe weMfundo ePhakeme, uDkt Blade Nzimande, ujube uNomvalo ukuthi alungise izinto kulesi sikhwama, ikakhulu uhlelo lokukhokhwa kwemihlomulo izitshudeni ezikhala ngalo.Wamyalela ukuthi abike njalo kuyena ngokwenzekayo kulesi sikhwama.

ISIKHWAMA esixhasa ngemali yokufunda ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme, iNational Students’ Financial Aid Scheme (NSFAS), sesigxeke isehlakalo sokuvalelwa kwezisebenzi zalesi sikhwama ngaphandle kwemvume yazo, ngesikhathi ziyoxazulula izinkinga ezithinta izindawo zokuhlala izitshudeni eNyuvesi yaseZululand, oNgoye.Lesi sehlakalo kuthiwa senzeke ngoLwesihlanu, kulesi sikhungo lapho lezi zithunywa zigcine sezisatshiswa.Okhulumela isikhwama, uMnuz Ishmael Mnisi, uthe lesi sehlakalo senzeke emuva kokuba kube nomhlangano wohlaka oluthinta izindawo zokuhlala kulesi sikhwama, elalihlangane nabahlinzeka ngezindawo zokuhlala abazimele kanjalo nezikhulu zenyuvesi ngoLwesibili odlule, kubhungwa mayelana nokukhokhelwa kwalezi zindawo. Uthe kulo mhlangano kwavunyelwana ngokuthi kujutshwe ithimba lesikhwama ukuze lifake isandla ohlelweni lokuthi kufakwe izitshudeni ohlelweni lweNSFAS ukuze kukwazi ukuthi kukhokhelwe abanikazi balezi zindawo.“I-NSFAS isacubungula eyokuthathela izinyathelo abahlinzeka ngezindawo zokuhlala, ababeyingxenye yalesi sehlakalo sasoNgoye. Sihlaba nekhwelo lokuthi izikhungo zemfundo kungaba amanyuvesi noma amakolishi amakhono ama-TVET, ukuthi ziqinisekise ukuthi lezo zitshudeni ezingakangeni ngaphansi kohlelo lweNSFAS, zisheshe zifakwe ukuze zikwazi ukukhokhelwa.” Uthe uma kunokubambezeleka ngeke zisheshe zithole imihlomulo yazo yezindawo zokuhlala.“Abanikazi bezindawo zokuhlala kumele baqikelele ukuthi izinkontileka okumele zisayinwe izitshudeni ezithinta lezi zindawo, ziyazisayina ngokushesha. UMnisi uthe baqale ukukhokha imihlomulo yezindawo zokuhlala yezitshudeni ezihlala emakolishi amakhono ngeledlule.Usho lokhu nje, kuke kwaba nezikhalazo kwizitshudeni ezihlala emakolishi ahlukene ezixoshwe abanikazi bezindawo zokuhlala ngoba lesi sikhwama singakhokhile kuze kube yimanje.Lezi zitshudeni bezikhala ngokuthi azazi ukuthi zizoshonaphi njengoba bezikhishwa nasebusuku, zigcina sezilala endle.Ugxeke nezinsolo zenkohlakalo zokusebenzisana phakathi kwezitshudeni, abahlinzeka ngezindawo zokuhlala, abasebenzi bezikhungo kanjalo nabahola izitshudeni."Ngeke siyibekezelele inkohlakalo kanti sizophenya zonke izinsolo ezikhona. Sizophenya ezikhungweni ngoba asifuni kube nokuxhashazwa kwezitshudeni.“ Unxuse abangaba nolwazi ngenkohlakalo ukuthi babike ku:Vuvuzela, kwinombolo ethi: 0860 247 653. Bangathumela no-Call Back ku: 30916.Ukhumbuze abahlinzeka ngezindawo zokuhlala ukuthi uma ziqhele ngo-5km kuya phansi kumele bahlinzeke izitshudeni ngezinto zokuzithwala ziye ezikhungweni noma sezibuya.Ubalule nokuthi kumele baqinisekise nokuthi lezi zindawo ziphephile.

UKUBEKA amakhasimende phambili nokufuna ukwenza azizwe esekhaya uma ezothenga, yikhona okwenze abePick n’ Pay, babuya ngonyawo olusha bevula kabusha isitolo sabo sezimpahla zokugqoka, iPick n’ Pay Clothing, eseGateway, eMhlanga.Lesi sitolo ebesivalwe amasonto ayisithupha silungiswa futhi kushintshwa nendlela esibukeka ngayo ngaphakathi, sibuye sesihlukile, kusukela emisikweni yaso kuya kwindlela esibukeka ngayo, njengoba abaphathi baso benze sahambisana nabantu.Isikhulu sePick n’ Pay Clothing uNksz Hazel Pillay, uthe ukuqonda ukuthi iKwaZulu-Natal ihlobe ngezinto ezahlukene ezithandwa ngabantu, kwenze bahambisana namakhasimende.“Yingakho senze imihlobiso egqize ngezithombe zomoba, kwezinye izingxenye zesitolo senza okuveza umfula uThukela, ukwenza amakhasimende ethu azizwe esekhaya uma ezothenga izimpahla ezahlukene esitolo sethu,” kusho uNksz Pillay.Eqhuba, uthe okunye okubasize kakhulu ukwenza isitolo sabo sibukeke kahle ngaphakathi, wukuthi basebenze namaciko azi ingqephu nadwebayo azinze eThekwini, ukubasiza baqhamuke ne nto ezojatshulelwa nezohambisana namakhasimende abo.“Basisize kakhulu ukwenza obhasikidi esibafake emathilini ukuhlobisa, kwenza kubukeke kahle futhi kwehluke. Emagumbini okulinganisa izimpahla, senze kwagqiza ngemidwebo yezintaba zokhahlamba, safaka nemihlobiso eveza ubunjalo beKZN, ikakhulu ubuhle bedolobha iTheku,”’ usho kanje. Ngaphandle kwalesi sitolo esilungiswe eGateway, iPick n’ Pay iyaqhubeka nokudlondlobala, njengoba ivule izitolo eziwu-50 kulo nyaka, yengeza kweziwu-58 ezivule ngonyaka odlule, okwenza ibe nezitolo eziwu-385. Maduze izovula ezimbili futhi eThekwini.

INYUNYANA yamaphoyisa, i-Police and Prisons Civil Rights Union isichithile isinqumo sokukhushulelwa kwabasebenzi bakahulumeni amaholo ngo- 4,7%, okumenyezelwe wuNgqongqoshe weziSebenzi zikaHulumeni nokuPhathwa, uNkk Noxolo Kiviet, ngesonto eledlule.UNkk Kiviet uthe ngokwesinqumo esathathwa ezingxoxweni zamaholo  nyakenye emhlanganweni wesigungu esihlanganisa umqashi nabamele abasebenzi, i-Public Sector and Coordinated Bargaining Council, uhulumeni uzothi phohlo ngo- 4.7% emaholweni abasebenzi kusuka ngo- Ephreli, 1, ngesonto elizayo.I-Popcru ithi ayikaze isisayine lesi sivumelwano nyakenye ngoba ikholwa ukuthi ukwenyuswa kwamaholo abasebenzi ngale ndlela kuyinhlamba kumalungu ayo futhi kuwukuwabukela phansi.UMengameli we-Popcru uMnuz Thulani Ngwenya, uthe lesi siphakamiso singaphansi ngisho kwezindleko zempilo  njengoba zifinyelele ku- 5.6% ngenyanga edlule.“Ukukhushulwa kwemali ngaleli phesenti, kukhombisa ukuthi uhulumeni akanandaba kangakanani nabasebenzi bakhe. Akwenele ekutheni kungaphucula impilo yabasebenzi emazingeni aphansi nokumelana nezindleko ezikhuphukayo zemihla yonke.  Asiwakholwa amampunge kahulumeni owayethi akubeke etafuleni ukuphela kwento angakwazi ukuyinikeza abasebenzi, ngakho asisayinanga,” kusho uNgwenya.Uthe abezinye izinyunyana, babaxwayisa ngokusayina lesi sivumelwano seminyaka emibili sokukhushulwa kwamaholo, ngakho sekuyisikhathi sokuthi kuvikelwe abasebenzi.Ngo-2022, le nyunyana yaba nokhukhulelangoqo wemashi ngenhloso yokuphoqa uhulumeni ukuthi enze okuthiwa wayekuthembisile ngo-2018 kokuthi ngonyaka wezimali u-2020/2021, uzokhuphula imiholo yabasebenzi ibe ngaphezulu ngephesenti elilodwa, ephesentini lezindleko zempilo.  Okunye ababekumashela, ukukhushulwa kwamaholo abasebenzi ngo- 3% okuthiwa umqashi wakwenza ngaphandle kokuvumelana nezinyunyana zabasebenzi.Nakuba i-Popcru engaphansi komfelandawonye wezinyunyana iCosatu engamadlelandawonye nenhlangano ebusayo i-ANC bavumelana ngokuthi bazokweseka le nhlangano njengoba kubhekwe okhethweni, kodwa uNgwenya uthe abasebenzi abangamalungu abo sebetshengise ukumungabaza uhulumeni ekutheni akazikhathalele izidingo zabo, ngakho bakulungele ukungena emgwaqweni.“Okwamanje kubukeka sengathi abasebenzi bashaywa ngesithende njengoba kungekho iqembu lezepolitiki eliphumele obala ngamalungelo abasebenzi ngesikhathi ekhankasa enxenxa amavoti.  Noma ngabe yiliphi iqembu elizovotelwa ngoMeyi kumele lazi ukuthi abasebenzi bazohleze bekhona nangale kukaMeyi,” usho kanje.

INYUNYANA yamaphoyisa i-Police and Prisons Civil Rights Union KwaZulu-Natal, ifuna kube nezingxoxo ukuxazulula ukuklwebhana phakathi kukaNobhala we- ANC esifundazweni uMnuz Bheki Mtolo nenyunyana iNehawu. UNobhala wePopcru KwaZulu-Natal uNksz Nthabeleng Molefe, uthe bazoxoxa nomfelandawonye wezinyunyana iCongress of South African Trade Unions, ukuthi kuhlelwe umhlangano ngokushesha ukubhunga ngalesi simo.“Sinxusa ukuthi kube nokuxoxisana nokuthi kwehliswe umoya ngalesi sikhathi esinzima. SiyiPopcru sisakholelwa ukuthi ubunye babasebenzi nombutho wentando yabantu kuseyizinto ezibalulekile kulesi sifundazwe, ikakhulu uma kubhekwa umlando wezepolitiki esifundazweni,” kusho uNksz Molefe.Enkulumeni ayethule ekhuluma nabantu eKokstad ngeledlule, uMtolo usole  abasebenzi bakahulumeni abangaphansi kweNehawu, ngokuhluleka ukusebenza ngendlela efanele ezikhungweni eziningi zikahulumeni. Lokhu kulandela ukuthi kube khona amalungu ale nyunyana aphumele obala eveza ukuthi awahambisani nohulumeni wokubambisana, oholwa yi-ANC.UMtolo ukhwele wadilika kubasebenzi abangaphansi kweNehawu, wathi iningi labo lizonda uhulumeni wokubambisana ngoba lingasahlomuli kuwo. Utshele abantu ukuthi abasebenzi abaningi abasebenza emahhovisi oMnyango waseKhaya bangamalungu eNehawu, ngakho uma abantu befika kulawa mahhovisi benganakwa, abokwazi ukuthi yiNehawu leyo.Emva kwalokhu kuphawula, iNehawu inqumele lo mholi ugwayi katiki ifuna axolise ngokushesha engakapheli amahora angu-48, kungenjalo ngeke isamvumela ukuthi athule inkulumo emicimbini yayo. Inxuse i-ANC ukuthi ibhekane noMtolo.

ISIKHULU esiphezulu seRoad Accident Fund (RAF), uMnuz Collins Letsoalo sithi asiyindawo futhi sisazimisele ukusebenzela abantu baseNingizimu Afrika.NgoMsombuluko, uLetsoalo utshele izintatheli ukuthi yize le nhlangano esiza abalimele ezingozini zomgwaqo ibhekene nezingqinamba kodwa ikhokhele abantu uR45.1 billion kulo nyaka.Ukhale ngokuthi abakwazanga ukufeza zonke izinhlelo akade benazo kwazise intela ekhokhwa abetha uphethroli isahleli ku-R2.18 ilitha ebikuwo kule minyaka emithathu edlule.Uveze ukuthi le ntela ibangenisele u-R48.6 billion ngonyaka wezimali ka-2023/24.“Sikwazile ukukhokhela abantu u-R45.1 billion yize sinezingqinamba. Sifike le nhlangano kubukeka sengathi izowa kodwa sakwazi ukuthi sinciphise isikweletu njengoba safika siwu-R19 billion kodwa manje sesiwu-R8.71 billion.”Inkinga yethu enkulu kuseyizindleko zabameli ngoba yize songe u-R24 billion kulo nyaka kodwa zisami ku-R3.899 billion, okusho ukuthi bazinciphise ngo-R4.89 billion.Ubalule ukuthi ukube abaqalanga izinhlelo zabo zokonga ngabe lezi zindleko zingaphezulu kuka-R50 billion onyakeni wezimali u-2027/28.Uthe bathole izicelo zokunxeshezelwa eziwu-79 377, sebekwaze ukuvala eziwu-63 000.Babuye bakhokha no-R12.7 billion kubantu abafake izicelo zokunxeshezelwa ngaphansi kwesigaba esibizwa nge-general damage. Ufanise le mali njengokuthi eyokuxolisa kubantu.Ugqugquzele abalimala ezingozini zomgwaqo ukuthi bazithintele bona iRAF ngoba ikhona ukubasiza kuzo zonke izingqinamba ababhekana nazo emuva kokulimala. Bangayithinta ngokushayela u-087 820 1 111, ngoMsombuluko kuya kuLwesihlanu ngo-7.45 ekusenu kuya ku-4 ntambama. Bangangena nakwi-website yayo ethi www.raf.co.za.

INHLANGANO yezokusakaza kuleli, iSouth African Broadcasting Corporation (SABC), ithi ayinabo ubufakazi bokuthi iHhovisi likaMengameli liphuma iqhubu nenhloko yezindaba kuyo, uMnuz Moshoeshoe Monare, ukuthi liyohlolwa.Lokhu kuza ngemuva kwemibiko yeCity Press yokuthi uMonare kumele ayohlolwa yiState Security Agency (SSA). Kulolu hlelo kusukwe kubhekisiswa yonke imininingwane ethinta umuntu nokuthi uhulumeni engamthemba yini ngemininingwane ebucayi.Izinhlangano ezifana neSouth African National Editors’ Forum (Sanef), Media Monitoring Africa, SOS Support Public Broadcastiong Coalistion (SOS), neCampaign For Freedom of Expression (CEF) zikhiphe isitatimende kanye kanye zikugxeka ukuhlolwa kukaMonare.Okhumela uMengameli uCyril Ramaphosa, uMnuz Vincent Magwenya, ukuchithile ukuthi kuphunywa iqhubu noMonare ngoba sekubhekwe okhethweni lukazwelonke ngoMeyi 29.I-SABC esitatimendeni ngoLwesibili emini, ithe zonke izikhulu zayo ziyahlolwa. Ithe ngesikhathi uMonare eqashwa ngo-2022, iSABC yenze isicelo eSSA ukuthi ahlolwe.Lokhu kuwumbandela wokuqashwa futhi zonke izikhulu zithola isitifiketi uma sezihloliwe.“Ukucacisa, yinto ejwayelekile eSABC ukuthi izikhulu zihlolwe, akukho okubi okuhlosiwe ngalokho. Isikhulu esisha uNomsa Chabeli, naso siyahlolwa njengokombandela wenkontileka yaso. I-SABC ayihlangani nokuhlelwa ukuthi ukuhlolwa kuzokwenziwa nini.”Ithe uMonare akaluphothulanga uhlelo lokuhlolwa njengokusho kwenkontileka yakhe futhi wavuma ukuthi uzohlolwa ngesikhathi esayina inkontileka yakhe.

INKAMPANI enkulu yezimpahla ezisebenza ngogesi emhlabeni jikelele i-Samsung yethule umshini obizwa nge Digital Variable Multi S2 (DVM) eMount Edgecombe Golf Country Club eThekwini.Lomshini uphehla amandla omoya ezindaweni ezahlukene okubalwa kuzo izibhedlela, emabhilidini amakhulu nasenxanxatheleni yezitolo. Bekungeyokuqala ithulwa lapha eNingizimu Afrika njengoba ibidlise kakhulu emazweni aphesheya kwezilwandle.Okunye nge-DVM S2 ukuthi isebenzisa ezobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje futhi ayiwudli ugesi kakhulu.Inhloko yomnyango ebhekelele ezokuphehlwa komoya kwa-Samsung, uMnuz Nico Hanekom ekhuluma neSolezwe Ngempelasonto uthe u-Samsung uyinkampani yezobuchwepheshe.“Ukuze siqhubeke sibe namasu kuthina kubalulekile. Kube yigxathu elikhulu kwezobuchwepheshe ukuthi sethule lomshini ngoba inhloso yethu ukuthi senze imikhiqizo yethu ibe ngcono, iphinde ingashabalali.“Lo mshini usebenzisa amandla amancane ebhilidini, okungezinye zezinto esizenzile kuwo. Enye yezinto ezibalulekile neziyisisekelo esizenzayo njengo-Samsung ukuthi sibe yinkampani engashabalali,” kusho uHanekom.Khonamanjalo uMnuz Joseph Kaseke oyimenenja yezokudayisa kanye nonjiniyela kwa-Samsung yena uthe bancane abantu abazi ngomshini wokuphehla umoya oqandisayo.“Esizama ukukwenza ngobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje obaziwa nge-Artificial Intelligence (AI) ukuthi izosiza abantu uma besebenzisa umshini wokuphehla umoya.“Ngiyazi abantu abaningi bathuswa ukuthi i-AI izobathathela umsebenzi. I-AI ayikwazi ukusebenza ngapandle kwabantu, yithi okumele sisebenzisane nayo futhi izosisiza ukuthi ukusebenza kwethu kube lula,” usho kanje.Uqhube wathi bayazama ukuba nezindawo lapho bezofundisa khona abantu ngayo le mishini abayethulayo.“Siyazama ukuthi sakhe izindawo lapha KwaZulu-Natal, kodwa okwamanje ikhona indawo ese-Four Ways eThekwini lapho esibaqeqesha khona.“Kulabo abangakwazi ukuphumelela siyabaqeqesha ngosizo lwe-inthanethi bangasithola kwi- website yethu ethi-www.samsung.com ukuze bafunde kabanzi ngokuphehla umoya (air conditioning),” eqhuba.

I-South African National Defence Force (SANDF) ichitha imibiko yokuthi amasosha amabili alo mbutho ajutshwe eDemocratic Republic Of Congo (DRC) athunjwe ngamavukelambuso iM23.Amasosha akuleli ajutshwe eDRC njengengxenye yeSouthern African Development Community Mission in the Democratic Republic of Congo (SAMIDRC) ukuyosiza uhulumeni wakuleliya zwe ukudala ukuthula nozinzo.Ngokubika kwe-website yeNational Security News, amasosha akuleli awanazo izikhali ezanele kanti ashaqwe ngamavukelambuso ngesonto eledlule.Ibike ukuthi asethunjwe yiM23.Esitatimendeni i-SANDF ithe wonke amasosha ayo ajutshiwe aphelele."Akukhona okokuqala ukuthi kubhalwe izindaba ezingenasisekelo njengalezi ngeSANDF kusuka yajutshwa eDRC ngaphansi kweSAMIDRC," kusho iSANDF.Ithe ngeke ize ithule futhi ivume ukuthi igama layo lingcoliswe yile mibiko.Ithe izokwazisa abantu bakuleli ngaso sonke isikhathi ngesimo nokuphepha kwamasosha ayo eDRC.Sekufe amasosha amane akuleli eDRC kusuka kuqale unyaka. Esigamekweni sokuqala kwafa amabili ngesikhathi kuqhunyiswa inkambi yawo.Kwesesibili elinye ladubula uzakwabo ngesibhamu somsebenzi ngaphambi kokuzidubula life nalo.

IBHEMILE kwabazotholakala ukuthi benza inkohlakalo ngesikhathi kwakhiwa eminye imitapo yolwazi KwaZulu-Natal njengoba uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa esejube uphiko oluphenya amacala enkohlakalo iSpecial Investigating Unit (SIU), ukuthi luphenye.Lolu phiko luyalelwe nguRamaphosa ukuthi luphenye uMnyango wezemiDlalo, ubuCiko namaSiko esifundazweni ngokwakhiwa kwemitapo yolwazi eyisishiyagalombili kanjalo nokusatshalaliswa kwezincwadi kuyona.Uphiko luzophenya ukuthi ngabe ayisebenzanga yini ngendlela engafanele imali yomphakathi ngesikhathi kwakhiwa imitapo  kusuka ngoJanuwari 1, 2020 kuya kuMashi 28, 2024.Okhulumela i-SIU uMnuz Kaizer Kganyago, uthe umengameli ugunyaze ukuthi kuphenywe umnyango ukuze kubuyiswe imali yabakhokhi bentela eyalahleka.Uthe bazophenya nethimba losonkontileka abasabalalisa izincwadi.Uveze ukuthi imitapo yolwazi okuphenywa ukwakhiwa kwayo yiDukuduku Library, Nibela Modular Library, Kwankosi Khumalo Modular Library, Kwakhetha Modular Library, Mpembeni Modular Library, Ntunjambili Modular Library, Donny Dalton Modular Library, Mfekayo Modular Library neKwanzimakwe Modular Library.“Siphenya nokuthi ngabe kwakukhona yini ukusetshenziswa kwemali ngendlela engafanele ngesikhathi kwenziwa le misebenzi. Siphenya ukuthi bakhona yini abasebenzi bakahulumeni abathintekayo, osonkontileka kanjalo nanoma ngubani othintekayo.”Uthe bazokwenza izincomo zokuthi ngomuso kungavikelwa kanjani ukulahleka kwemali yomphakathi.“Ngokomthetho esiyothola ukuthi bayathinteka, sizobadlulisela ophikweni lwezokushushisa iNational Prosecuting Authority (NPA), ukuze ibhekane nabo. Sigunyazwe ngumthetho olawula iSIU, ukuthi sishushise abathintekayo enkantolo enkulu,” kusho uKganyago. Lumatasa lolu phiko kulezi zinsuku njengoba lusanda kujutshwa nguRamaphosa ukuthi luphenye izinto ezenzeka eMnyangweni wezaseKhaya mayelana nokukhishwa kwezimvume zokuba kuleli luphenye nakwaPrasa.

I-Library and Information Association of South Africa (LIASA)  ikumema ukuthi ugubhe i-South African Library Week (SALW) 2024, ibambisene noMnyango wobuCiko, amaSiko, i-Sabinet ne-EBSCO,  – ngaphansi kwendikimba ethi “ethi “Libraries foster social cohesion”, okusho ukuthi “Imitapo yolwazi yakha ukuzwana kwemiphakathi ehlukene”.Yonke imitapo yolwazi ezweni isebenzisa lo mcimbi waminyaka yonke odonsa isonto lonke njengethuba lokuqhakambisa ukukhangisa imisebenzi yayo ebantwini, umphakathi wonkana, izinhlangano zomphakathi nabantu abathatha izinqumo. Inhloso ngukubaneqhaza ekutheni abantu baqonde iqhaza elibalulekile lemitapo yolwazo ezweni elinamalungelo abantu. Imitapo yolwazi isabalalisa ukukwazi ukufunda nokubhala, igcwalise ilungelo lamuntu elinqala lokukwazi ukutho ulwazi futhi igqugquzele ukubekezelelana nokuhloniphana phakathi kwabantu baseNingizimu Afrika.Le ndikimba igcizelela iqhaza elimqoka lemitapo yolwazi ekuhlanganiseni imiphakathi, njengoba eyizindawo lapho abantu abavela emiphakathini ehlukene behlangana khona ukucobelelana ngemibono, ukufunda bahlangane nangemicimbi yamasiko nemfundo. Ngokwenza kutholakale ulwazi, ubuchwepheshe, izinsizakusebenza nezinhlelo, imitapo yolwazi yandisa ulwazi, ihlanganise abantu futhi yenze ukuthi abantu bazizwe benenjongo eyodwa futhi beyinto eyodwa. Imitapo yolwazi ihlinzeka izindawo eziphephile emiphakathini encisheke amathuba ukuthi abhekane nezindaba zenhlalo nezentuthuko, bacobelelana ngolwazi futhi igqugquzele ukuhlalisana phakathi kwemiphakathi engafani.I-SALW izogujwa phakathi komhlaka-18 kuya mhlaka-24 Mashi.UMnyango wezeMidlalo, eZobuciko namaSiko uchaza ukuhlalisana kwemiphakathi engafani “njengezinga lokuhlangana ngokuhlalisana nokuhlanganiswa kwemiphakathi yesizwe sonke nezinga lokubonakala kokuzwelana phakathi kwabantu nemiphakathi”.Funda iziphephabhuku lobuchwepheshe le-LIASA SALW 2024 lapha: Imitapo yolwazi yandisa ukuhlalisana emphakathini ngokufaka wonke umuntuUkuhlanganisa abantu yinsika yemitapo yolwazi. Kulapho wonke umuntu emukeleke khona, iyizindawo ezakha ukuxhumana nokuthembana phakathi kwamaqoqo angefani emphakathini. Imitapo yolwazi ineqhaza elimqoka ekuhlalisaneni abantu kwabantu emphakathini ngokwenza ukuthi wonke umuntu abeneqhaza, ikhuthaze ingxoxo futhi igqugquzele ukuhloniphana kwabantu abavela ezindaweni ezingafani.
