Yenza imisebenzi yayo ihambisane nezidingo zemiphakathi, igqugquzele ukuthi abantu bahlale befunda futhi yeseke umsebenzi wokuthi abantu bakwazi ukufunda nokubhala.Imitapo yolwazi yandisa ukuhlalisana emphakathini ngokweseka izinjongo zentuthukoImitapo yolwazi ineqhaza elimqoka ekwandiseni ukuhlalisana emphakathini ngokweseka imikhankaso ehlose ukulekelela izinjongo zentuthuko emhlabeni, kuthi ngaleyo ndlela ilekelele ukubhekana nezinselelo zentuthuko ezikhona ezweni nasemhlabeni. UNGQONGQOSHE wezabaSebenzi nezokuQashwa, uMnuz Thulas Nxesi, uthi uhulumeni uzodala imisebenzi ewu-700 000 esebenzisa isikhwama se-Unemployment Insurance Fund (UIF).  NgoLwesibili, uNxesi uthule lolu hlelo e-Exhibition Centre, eThekwini.“Sibonile ukuthi kufanele sidale amathuba omsebenzi siwuhulumeni kulena evele ekhona. Asishiyile ukuthi kube yizinkampani ezizimele kuphela eziqasha abantu kodwa nathi sizovula amathuba omsebenzi awu-700 000 kusukela manje kuze kube wunyaka ozayo,” kusho uNxesi.UKhomishana we-UIF, uMnuz Teboho Maruping, uthe izinhlelo zabo zokudala amathuba omsebenzi amasha zizofezeka, akusiyona nje into abazogcina ngokuyimemezela ngoba vele ikhona imali.Uziphikile izinsolo zokuthi bazama ukusiza uNxesi ukuba akhankasele ukhetho njengoba beza nalolu hlelo.“Izinhlelo zokudala imisebenzi saziqala ngo-2018. Zaphazamiseka ngo-2020 ngesikhathi kuneCovid-19 njengoba imali ibisiza abasebenzi abadiliziwe nalabo akade besebenza amahora ambalwa,” kusho uMaruping.Ngaphandle kokusiza abadiliziwe, i-UIF ibuye yenze izinhlelo zokuqeqesha kabusha abasebenzi ukuze bakwazi ukuthola amanye amathuba omsebenzi.UNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube, uthe abagcini ngokusiza abafuna umsebenzi bewuhulumeni kodwa banezinhlelo zokuxhasa osomabhizinisi abancane.Uveze ukuthi banohlelo lokusiza osomabhizinisi ukuthi badayise imikhiqizo yabo koSpar, Boxer nezinye izitolo ukuze abalimayo badayise kuzo.Uthe bakhulume nebhange Ithala ukuthi libanike amapulazi lapho abantu bezotshala khona ukuze bazithuthukise ngokwebhizinisi.Ubalule ukuthi ngeke bawashiye ngaphandle amabhizinisi amancane ezinhlelweni zabo ngoba imisebenzi eminingi idalwa yiwona.Ugqugquzele abantu ukuthi babhalise ezinhlelweni zokufuna umsebenzi zikahulumeni ezifana nalolu olwenziwa yi-UIF nezinye.IMeya yeTheku, uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda, ithe kubalulekile ukwethulwa kwalolu hlelo lokudalwa kwemisebenzi ngoba luhlanganisa abantu abasha nezinkampani eziqashayo.Uthe abantu abasha bazobuye baqeqeshwe ngamakhono obuchwepheshe besimanje, azobasiza ukuzisebenza.

UMKHANDLU wase-Unisa uvumelane ngo-elethu ngokuhlonipha ingwazi yomculo engasekho uRay Chikapa Phiri ngeziqu zobudokotela. URay Phiri owayehola iqembu lomculo iStimela, ushone ngoJulayi 2017 exinwe wumdlavuza eneminyaka ewu-70 ubudala.I-Unisa imemezele ukuthi le ngwazi engasekho izoyihlonipha emcimbini wokwethwesa izitshudeni iziqu obungoLwesihlanu, ePitoli.Bathe bakhethe ukumhlonipha ngenxa yamagalelo abe nawo emphakathini elwela inhlalakahle yomphakathi ngokubeka uvo kwezepolitiki esebenzisa umculo.“Wayesiqonda kabanzi isimo sangaleso sikhathi ebheka izimo zezepolitiki ezweni waze waqopha izingoma ezikhuluma ngalokho ezifana nezithi Highland Drifter  ngo1974.“Uphinde waqopha ethi Whispers In the Deep/Phinda Mzala  futhi zombili lezi zingoma zavalwa wuhulumeni wobandlululo,’’ kusho abase-Unisa.UPhiri uke wacula nengwazi yaphesheya e-America uPaul Simon ngo-1986 behlangene neLadysmith Black Mambazo ecwecweni elithi Graceland eladuma umhlaba wonke.UPhiri uhlonishwa yi-Unisa nje uke wahlonishwa ngezindondo ezehlukene phambili. Uke wahlonishwa wuhulumeni nge-Order of Ikamanga ngo-2011. INHLANGANO eyengamele ezempilo emhlabeni jikelele, iWorld Health Organization (WHO), izwakalise ukukhathazeka ngokwenyuka kwesibalo sabaphethwe yi-monkey pox e-Afrika.UMqondisi we-WHO, uDkt Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus ubize umhlangano ophuthumayo ngoba efuna ukwazi ukuthi kufanele yini ukuthi imonkey pox ithathwe njengesifo esihlasele emhlabeni jikelele (international emergency).Uveze ukuthi okumenze wabiza umhlangano wukuthi selokhu imonkey pox yaqubuka eDemocratic Republic of Congo (DRC) ngoSepthemba, ilokhu ivela nakwamanye amazwe alapha e-Afrika. Ngaphambi kokuba ibikwe eDRC ibihlasele emazweni ase-Europe.“Umhlangano uzohlala maduzane futhi uzobe usihlanganisa nongoti abazimele bezempilo emhlabeni jikelele. Sifuna ukwazi ukuthi ngabe imonkey pox sesingayithatha njengesifo esihlasele emhlabeni jikelele yini,” kusho uDkt Tedros.Umthetho uthi nguTedros kuphela njengomqondisi we-WHO okwazi ukusho ukuthi isifo sesihlasele emhlabeni jikelele ukuze kulandelwe imithetho ebekwe yile nhlangano yokulwa naleso sifo. UTedros uveze ukuthi kulo nyaka bawu-14 000 abantu abaphethwe yiMpox eDRC kanti bawu-511 esibabulele.Uthe okumkhathazayo wukuthi ngoJulayi kubikwe ukuthi bangaphezu kuka-50 abantu abaphethwe yi-monkey pox eDRC. Kubuye kwabikwa ukuthi bakhona nabanye eBurundi, Kenya, Rwanda, Uganda naseNingizimu Afrika.UMnuz Foster Mohale woMnyango wezeMpilo kuleli, uthe bawu-24 abantu abaphethwe yi-monkey pox eNingizimu Afrika. Abawu-12 base-Gauteng kuthi abawu-11 babe KwaZulu-Natal, oyedwa useWestern Cape.Khonamanjalo iWHO izwakalisa ukukhathazeka ngokwenyuka kwezibalo zabaneCovid-19.UDkt Maria van Kerkhove ongungoti wezifo ezithelelanayo kwi-WHO uthe emazweni awu-84 emhlabeni bathole ukuthi siyanyuka isibalo sabaneCovid emasontweni edlule.Uthe abatholwa benalesi sifo bawu-10% kodwa kuyahluka ngokwamazwekazi (contintents) njengoba e-Europe abatholwa beneCovid-19 bewu-20%.USihlalo we-South African Medical Association, uDkt Mvuyisi Mzukwa, uthe asikho isidingo sokuthi abantu bakuleli basabe.“Bancane kakhulu abantu bakuleli abane-Covid-19 ngoba okwamanje basaphethwe wumkhuhlane ojwayelekile,” kusho uDkt Mzukwa.IWHO igqugquzele abanamasosha omzimba antengayo nabasengcupheni yokungenwa kalula yizifo ukuba bagomele iCovid-19.

USUKU lobaba wusuku olukhethekile lapho kuqhakanjiswa ubuhle babo emhlabeni wonke. Lapha kusuke kuyithuba elihle lokukhombisa uthando wonke umuntu owubaba empilweni yakho, kungakhathalekile ukuthi uyakuzala noma cha, umalume, umkhulu noma ubaba ongumakhelwane odlale iqhaza elibalulekile empilweni yakho.Lolu suku lugujwa ngezinyanga ezihlukene emazweni ahlukene ngokuhambisana nezinkolo namasiko ahlukene. Njengosuku lomama, lolu suku luthakaselwa kakhulu emindenini ngezipho, ukudla okumnandi nokujabula ndawonye.Yize kuthiwa isipho siphuma enhliziyweni kodwa obaba bathi sebekhathele yizipho zemihla ngemihla (amasokisi, uthayi, izinkomishi namakhadi).Abezitolo zezipho bakhuthaza kakhulu ukuthi kwenziwe ibhokisi elinezinto ezahlukene ukuze bajabule obaba.UNosipho Khuzwayo, weKasi Foodz and Events, uthi awudingi ukuba nemali eningi kodwa udinga ukuhlakanipha nobuciko. “Thatha ibhokisi lakho elihle lezicathulo ufake isithombe esenziwe kahle, inkomishi, amasokisi, uswidi wohlobo lwe-menthol, iwashi nesikhwama semali.” Uthi kuya ngamandla akho ukuthi ungafaka izinto ezingakhi ebhokisini ukuze libukeke lilihle.Uthi esikhathini samanje abantu bathanda izinto ezibhekiswe ngqo kubona. Lokhu kusho ukuthi ungathenga isikhwama semali namasokisi, uye lapho abhalwa khona ubhale igama likababa nomyalezo wakho.Uma unemali, ungenza isithombe esikhulu esibhalwe isibongo nezithakazelo zakini, esizokhangiswa ekhaya ukuthi wonke umuntu ofikayo asibone.UMbongeni Mayisela (35), onamadodana amathathu, uthi akukho akulindele ngalolu suku ngoba uma kungewona amasokisi yinkomishi. Uthi kungaba kuhle ukuthola noma yibhodlela lesiphuzo esishisayo asithandayo noma ijezi leqembu lebhola alithandayo, i-Man City.URev. Chris Mathebula ungomunye wobaba abanikele enkundleni uX eyala abantu ngezinhlobo zezipho abangazithokozela bengobaba: iwashi, amaselula ahamba phambili, amateki noma imali.“Sicela nime kancane ngothayi, ama-gown okulala namasendela,” kubhala yena.

LIHLONIPHE abaholi balo bangaphambilini ibandla lama-Afrika ngokuthi lakhe liqede isakhiwo salo seSekethe eMbali, eMgungundlovu.Lokhu kuvezwe yiNhloko yebandla, uMfu Nkosinathi Hlomuka ngesikhathi kunendumezulu yenkonzo yokuvulwa kwalesi sakhiwo.UHlomuka uveze ukuthi indawo okwakhiwe kuyona lesi sakhiwo yayikade ithengwe nguMfu Bhukuda Gwala, ongasekho emhlabeni."Kwakuyisifiso sakhe uGwala ukuthi kube khona isakhiwo sebandla kule ndawo,’’ echaza.Uthe ngemuva kokuba esedlulile emhlabeni, owathatha izintambo zokuhola ibandla, uMfu Mthandeni Majola naye owagcina edlulile emhlabeni waqhubeka nokugqugquzela ukuthi siphothulwe lesi sakhiwo."Yingakho ngithe uma ngingena esikhundleni sokuhola leli bandla ngabona kungcono ukuba ngiwahloniphe lawa madoda ngokuthi ngenze isiqiniseko sokuthi ababekuqalile nakanjani kuyafezeka,'' echaza.Uveze ukuthi leli bandla likubeka eqhulwini ngaso sonke isikhathi ukubaluleka kokuba libe nezindawo zokukhonzela ezisemgangathweni.Lokhu uthe kwaba ngumyalelo owawuvela kumsunguli webandla naye osalala kobandayo uMfu Gadner Mvuyane.UMfu Lumko Baleni weSekethe yaseMgungundlovu uthe kuyabajabulisa ukuthi ekugcineni sebezoba nesakhiwo abakhonzela kusona ngokukhululeka kule Sekethe.Uveze ukuthi bese kuphele isikhathi esingangeminyaka engu-288 bekhonzela ezikoleni.IMeya yesiFunda saseMgungundlovu, uMnuz Muziwokuthula Zuma ulincomile leli bandla ngokuqiniksekisa ukuthi amalungu alo liwakhela izakhiwo zebandla.Uthembise ukuphosa esivivaneni ukuze kuzoqhubeka umsebenzi omuhle athe ubonakala wenziwa ngabaholi bebandla ngokubambisana namalungu alo.

LIFUNA ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abantwana balo bakasontosikole bakhuliswa ngendlela efanele ibandla, uBuhle Benkanyezi Catholic Church in Zion.Lokhu kugcizelelwe kakhulu oyiNhloko yaleli bandla, uMbhishobhi Mandlenkosi Mchunu.Ubekhuluma enkonzweni ankulu kaJulayi yaleli bandla. Inkonzo ibiseSikhaleni.Uthe kumqoka ukuthi abantwana bebandla bakhuliswe kahle ngoba bayikusasa lebandla."Ngiyakholelwa kakhulu ekutheni ukuze ibandla lethu libe nekusasa eliqhakazile kumele ukuthi nakanjani likhulise kahle usontoskole walo,'' usho kanje.Uthe uma bekhuliswa ngendlela efanele lokho kuyohamba ibanga elide kakhulu bakwazi nokuhlukanisa okubi nokuhle."Kumele kube yinto esiyibeka phambili ngaso sonke isikhathi indaba yokukhuliswa kahle kukasontosikole wethu. Lokhu kulula ukuba kwenzeke uma sonke njengebandla sizimisele ngokuthi sikwenze ngokubambisana,'' usho kanje.Ukhulume nangokubaluleka kokuba abefundisi bahambe bayothekela ulwazi ezikoleni ezithuthukisa abefundisi.Uthe ukholwa ukuthi esikhathini samanje kudingeka uhlobo lwabefundisi olukwaziyo ukuzithuthukisa uma kukhulunywa ngezemfundo.Ugcizelele ukuthi ivangeli lezemfundo akumele liphelele kubefundisi kuphela, kodwa nasentsheni yebandla."Sifuna ukuthi intsha ybethu iaqhubeke nemfundo ize ifinyelele ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme. Lokho kuyokwenza ukuthi nabo bagcine benekusasa eliqhakazile,'' usho kanje.Leli bandla linamagatsha ehlukene ezingxenyeni ezehlukene zeKwaZulu Natal. Sekuphele iminyaka  engu- 19 laba khona njengoba lasungulwa ngo-2005.Liphinde libe nezinhlelo ezehlukene elisuke lihlose ngazo ukuthuthukisa umphakathi elikuwona ngezindlela ezehlukene.

IBANDLA iGod’s Mountain Church International (GMCI) lihlose ukunikezela ngohlobo lwemfundo enobuNgcwele futhi enezimpande ezijulile zobuKhristu ngesikole esisungulile, iGMCI School of Excellence.Lokhu kudalulwe wumholi waleli bandla elinesizinda KwaNongoma, uMphostoli Fikile Ndaba.UMphostoli Ndaba uthe lesi sikole samabanga aphansi singaphansi koMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal.Inhlosongqangi yaso ukunikezela ngemfundo esemgangathweni ebantwaneni abancane kodwa bebe bengachezukile emigomweni kaKhristu.Uthe ukholwa ukuthi imfundo noNkulunkulu yizona zinto eziwumgogodla omkhulu wabantu abasha abaphila kulesi sizukulwane."Umthandazo yinto emqoka kakhulu kubafundi bethu esibakhumbuzayo ngayo njalo. Sithi sibafundisa kodwa sibe sibakhumbuza ngokuthi uNkulunkulu uyena onamandla empilweni yabo,'' usho kanje.Uveze ukuthi ngenxa yokuguquka kakhulu kwezikhathi, babone kungcono ukuba zibe khona nezifundo ezihambisana nokuguquka kwesikhathi.Ubalule ukuthi kunezifundo zeRobotics and Coding nezinye ezimqoka kakhulu okuhloswe ngazo ukuthi abafundi bahambisane nesigaba sempilo iNingizimu Afrika ekusona njengamanje.Leli bandla linezinhlelo eziningi futhi ezihlabahlosile elisuke lihlose ngazo ukuthuthukisa umphakathi elikuwona.Ezinye zazo zifaka phakathi uhlelo lokunakekelwa kwabantu abadala bakule ndawo.Muva nje belinengqungquthela enkulu yabantu besifazane ebikhona esizindeni salo.Uveze nokuthi zikhona izifundo ezimayelana nokuthuthukiswa kwamakhono ezisohlelweni lokufunda kulesi sikole.Leli bandla libuye linikelele abaswele lisebenzisa inhlangano engenzi nzuzo iFikile Ndaba Foundation.

NKOSIKHONA CELELigubhe ukuhlanganisa iminyaka engu-66 laba khona ibandla, iHoly Sabath Church of God in Zion elaziwa kakhulu ngeleMighty Christian.Leli bandla lasungulwa ngo-1958 ngu-Archbishop Lazarus Swazi Kunene ongasekho emhlabeni.Njengamanje seliholwa nguMbhishobhi Sibongiseni Kunene oyindodana kamsunguli webandla.Linamagatsha amaningi KwaZulu-Natal nase-Eastern Cape. UMbhishobhi Kunene ophinde abe nguthishanhloko waseQiniselani Primary School eMbumbulu, uveze ukuthi leli bandla kokunye elikubeka eqhulwini wukubaluleka kwezemfundo kubantu abasha."Siyakholelwa kakhulu ekutheni njengoba ibandla lihlanganisa iminyake ngu-66 kumele indaba yezemfundo ibekwe phambili ngaso sonke isikhathi.“Lokhu sikholwa ukuthi kungasilekelela kakhulu ukuze sibe nebandla elinabantu abasha abanekusasa eliqhakazile,'' usho kanje.Okunye akubalulile wukukhuliswa ngendlela efanele kukaSontosikole waleli bandla.Usebenzise amagama esiZulu athi ugotshwa usemanzi. Wathi ngalokho uzama ukuveza ukuthi kumqoka kangakanani ukuthi leli bandla lenze isiqiniseko esikhulu sokuthi libakhulisa ngendlela efanele abantwana abancane.Phakathi kokunye athe bafuna ibandla ligxile kakhulu kukhona, wukulwa nesihlava sokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane nezingane."Kumqoka ukuthi leli bandla kusuka manje kuya phambili libonakale kuba khona elikwenzayo ngenhloso yokunqanda isihlava sokuhlukunyezwa kwamantombazane nezingane,'' usho kanje.UMbhishobhi Kunene uganwe nguNkk Thabisile Kunene (uMaCele).

IBHANGE loMbuso, iSouth African Reserve Bank (Sarb), seliyalele iSteinhoff ukuba inike uhulumeni uR6 billion nenzalo yakhona okuzofakwa esikhwameni esibizwa ngeNational Reserve Fund.IPhini loMphathi weBhange loMbuso, uNksz Fundi Tshazibana, lithe iSteinhoff nezinkampani zayo kufanele zibuyisele uhulumeni le mali kulandelwa umthetho we-Exchange Control Regulations 22B.“Ngamandla enginikwe wona njengePhini loMphathi weSouth African Reserve Bank, ngikhipha isaziso sokuthi iSteinhoff kufanele ibuyisele imali kuhulumeni,” kusho uNksz Tshazibana kwigazethi kahulumeni.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi owayeyisikhulu esiphezulu saseSteinhoff, uMnuz Markus Jooste, kwatholakala ukuthi wayengungqondongqondo ekukhwabaniseni uR200 billion wale nkampani, owashiya abantu bekhala.Imali ebuyayo ilandwe emuva kophenyo olunzulu oluqhutshwa yiSarb ngenkohlakalo yaseSteinhoff, eyaholela ukuthi kungabi nazinzo kule nkampani ngo-2017.UNksz Tshazibana uthe le mali okufanele ibuyele kuhulumeni kngenxa yokuthi iSteinhoff yephula umthetho wokusetshenziswa kwemali eNingizimu Afrika.ISteinhoff yinkampani ebalulekile eNingizimu Afrika njengoba iqashe inqwaba yabantu ezitolo zezimpahla zokugqoka nezefenisha.Okwamanje amacala ababekhwabanisa imali asaqhubeka njengoba uMnuz Ben la Grange noStehan Grobler besabhekene nawo.UMnuz Markus Jooste wagcina ezibulele emuva kokuthola ukuthi uzoboshwa ngokukhwabanisa imali yaseSteinhoff. Wayeseyalelwe ukuba ahlawule uR475 million kwiFinancial Sector Conduct Authority ngokungalandeli imithetho yokusebenzisa imali.ISarb ibuye yashaqa impahla yesinqandamathe sikaJooste, uNksz Berdine Odendaal (40) ebiza uR60 million. Kuthathwe nomuzi wakhe kaR18 million, kwamiswa ukuthi akhiphe imali kuma-akhawunti akhe anoR38.9 million.UNksz Odendaal, kuthiwa wayehlomula kakhulu enkohlakalweni kaJooste njengoba isoka lakhe lalimnika uR150 000 ngenyanga.

AMEHLO athe njo emiphumeleni yokhetho lwezifundazwe nolukazwelonke elindwe ngabomvu engena ilekanyana njengoba kuqhubeka umshikashika wokubalwa kwamavoti.Le miphumela kulindeleke ukuthi kushone ilanga ngeSonto sekwaziwa ukuthi iliphi iqembu noma inhlangano edle umhlanganiso kulolu khetho obelunesasa kubantu bakuleli.Lolu khetho luqale ngebatha kwezinye izindawo njengoba kube nezinkinga zokuphuza ukuvula kwezinye izikhungo zokuvota ngenxa yemibhikisho yomphakathi.Ngaphandle kokuphuza ukuvula kwezikhungo kuze kwavalwa kwezinye  kusenamahele kalayini kukhalwa ngemishini yokubheka ababhalisile ebinobuhixihixi.Abantu abaningi kubalwa nabaholi bamaqembu ezepolitiki bakhale ngokuthi inkinga edale olayini abade, ukungasebenzi kwemishini nokudinge ukuthi kusetshenziswe uhlelo lokubheka ephepheni abavoti. Kwezinye izikhungo kubambezeleke ukufika kwezinsiza zokuvota ngenxa yokuthi abengekho amaphoyisa abezophelezela abasebenzi bekhomishini yezokhetho ukuzihambisa.Ngaphandle kwalezi zinkinga azikho izehlakalo ezimise noma eziphazamise ukhetho njengoba lapho obekunezinkinga khona, amaphoyisa engenelele axazulula isimo. Kubikwe ukuthi zibalelwa ku-20 izikhungo zaKwaZulu-Natal, ezivule sesidlulile isikhathi.Lokhu kuvezwe nguMnuz Masego Sheburi, iphini lesikhulu esiphezulu seKhomishini yezoKhetho, ngesikhathi ekhuluma nabezindaba ngokuthi luqale kanjani usuku lokuvota.USheburi uthe e-Eastern Cape, zinhlanu izikhungo zokuvota eziphuzile ukuvulwa ngenxa yemibhikisho yomphakathi.“EThekwini zingu-20 izikhungo eziphuzile ukuvulwa ngenxa yemibhikisho yomphakathi. Kube nokubambezeleka kwezinye izikhungo ngenxa yokuthi amaphoyisa abengekho ukuphelezela abasebenzi bekhomishini ukuhambisa izinsiza zokuvota.”Ubale izindawo ezehlukene okubalwa eThekwini, uThukela, Mtubatuba, Ugu, uMzumbe naseBuhlebezwe lapho bekulindeke ukuthi amaphoyisa aphelezele abasebenzi.USheburi uvumile ukuthi le mishini ibe nezinkinga kwezinye izikhungo okubambezele uhlelo kwaba nolayini abade. Nesikhulu esiphezulu seKhomishini uMnuz Sy Mamabolo, ekhuluma nabezindaba ekomkhulu lemiphumela izolo ebusuku, uthe bayixazululile inkinga yolayini abade ezikhungweni zokuvota.“Imishini ayisona isidingo esidingwa ngumthetho ezikhungweni zokuvota, into edingekayo wumqulu wokuvota. Yingakho silande abasebenzi abebezobala ukuthi bazofaka isandla enkingeni yolayini abade, sayalela ukuthi kusetshenziswe umqulu wokuvota ukubheka amagama abavoti.”USheburi uveze ukuthi kube nesasasa kulolu khetho njengoba ngabo-11 ebusuku abantu abaningi bese bevotile.“Kube nesasasa kakhulu uma kuqhathaniswa nezikhathi ezidlule zokhetho. Baningi abantu abaphumile bayovota noma okwamanje singeke siveze ukuthi bangakanani. Kwenzeke lokhu ebesikulindele njengoba bengu-27.79 million abantu ababhalisela ukuvota.”Ubalule ukuthi abanye abakwazanga ukuvota lapho bengahlali khona ngenxa yokuthi kwashintshwa umthetho ophoqa ukuthi uvote kuphela lapho uhlala khona.UMamabolo uthe bebengeke balule izinsuku zokuvota ngoba ayikho indawo engagcina izigidi zamaphepha asesebenzile kuvotwa.Usihlalo wekhomishini uMnuz Mosotho Moepya, ukhale ngabanye babaholi bamaqembu abaphazamise ukhetho.Umengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, uncome umsebenzi weKhomishini wathi akubanga nokuphazamiseka okukhulu kulolu khetho.Ugxeke abavimbe abanye ukuyovota wathi noma kunezikhalo akumele kuvinjwe abantu ukuyovota.Usho lokhu emuva kokuvota esikoleni iHitekani Primary, eChiawelo, eSoweto.Ubalule ukuthi uyazi abezomthetho bazoqapha isimo kuze kumenyezelwe imiphumela.Uveze ukuthi unethemba lokuthi abantu bazophinde bayinike elinye ithuba i-ANC.Umholi we-EFF uMnuz Julius Malema, ovote nowakwakhe uNkk Mantoa Malema eSeshego, ume kulayini amahora amane ngaphambi kokuvota.Uthe ubone kunesidingo sokuthi angajombi abanye abavoti kodwa abambe ulayini, ezwe lokhu abahlale bekuzwa abanye.“Uhlelo lokuvota luhambe kancane ngenxa yemishini ebingasebenzi. Ngeke sigxeke iKhomishini ngoba ayihlinzeki nge-network, kodwa uhulumeni okumele uhlinzeke nge-network. Ayikho into ehlale i-100% empilweni ngakho asikhali.”

IBINQUNYELWE ujuqu wokuthi lingashayi elanamhlanje isaphila inhlalisuthi eyisethenjwa somholi wamaNazaretha, Inkosi Mduduzi Shembe (uNyazilwezulu), elalelwe unyendle yathelwa ngoyaba lwezinhlamvu kodwa yaphuma ingenamyocu KwaMashu ngoLwesine.UMnuz Xolani “Maliyavuza” Zungu uhlaselwa nje ubekade ebuya kogubha usuku lwakhe lokuzalwa. Ngaphambi kwalokhu kuhlaselwa ubethole umyalezo oputshukile wagcina ufike kuyena, kukhona oveza ukuthi akumele kushaye uLwesihlanu (namhlanje) esaphila. Isolezwe linawo lo myalezo oyiphimbo lowesifazane. Uthe ubesathi uzoyobika emaphoyiseni.Elandisa ngokusinda kwakhe, uZungu uthe: “Bengihamba ngemoto nginganakile ebusuku ngibuya kogubha usuku lokuzalwa nabasebenzi bami eThekwini ngesikhathi kuqhamuka imoto evele yama phambi kwami ngangakwazi ukudlula. Ngisamangazwe yilokho, kuphume umfana omfishane nesibhamu esincane waqhulula ngenhlamvu ebhekise kimi ngisemotweni. Usuke ezitshela ukuthi useqedile ngami wabuyela emotweni bashaya bachitha. Ngamandla kaNkulunkulu woNyazilwezulu angitholanga ngisho umyocu kodwa imoto isale imbobombobo. Ngisuke lapho ngaya esiteshini samaphoyisa ukuyovula icala ngosekungehlele. Kulapho ngifike ngabona khona sesibala izimbobo zezinhlamvu ukuthi ngidutshulwe ngezinhlamvu ezingu-8,” kusho uZungu othe imoto isasele khona esiteshini samaphoyisa KwaMashu.UZungu ungenye yezinhlalisuthi eziyizethenjwa zoNyazilwezulu nehlala iseceleni kwalo mholi ngaso sonke isikhathi uma ehamba. Abaningi bamazi ngokuhlala egibele isithuthuthu esihamba phambi kwezimoto zoNyazi ukuphendla indlela uma kunemihlangano yamaNazaretha.Isolezwe  like labhala ngaye emva kokwethweswa icala lokudlwengula, elibuyela eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini namuhla. Lo wesifazane ozwakala emyalezweni uyaziqhathulula, uthi akazimisele ukuba yingxenye yokuthi kusocongwe le nhlalisuthi njengoba kunetulo elinjalo.Uzwakala ebiza igama lenye inhlalisuthi, nayo eyisethenjwa soNyazi, ukuthi iyona epheka itulo lokuthi kubulawe uZungu. Uveza ukuthi yena akazimisele ukuthi abe yingxenye yaleli tulo. Uthi yena usafuna ukuphila kahle akhulise nezingane zakhe, angabi yingxenye yokubulawa kwabantu. Uqhuba athi abafuna ukubulala uZungu abaziqhubekele bodwa bangamfaki yena. Inhlalisuthi ayibala kule nkulumo ingenye yezisanda kuxoshwa ebandleni lamaNazaretha ngezinsolo zamatulo amabi okuthiwa iwaphekela uNyazi. Leli phephandaba izolo libike ngokujamelana kwenhlalisuthi okuthiwa isize yaba ngamaqembu amabili khona eBuhleni.Imizamo yeSolezwe yokuthola ukuphawula kwamaphoyisa ayiphumelelanga izolo kwaze kwashaya isikhathhi sokushicilela.

ITHOLWE emakhazeni asePhoenix ngoMsombuluko, inyanga okusabalale izithombe zayo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kuthiwa iduke ihamba namathwasa ayo bebizwe lapho abebeyosebenza khona.UMnuz Qedukwazi Theodare Mzimela (35) waseMzinto obedume kakhulu ngelikaBeefy, kuvela ulahleke ngoLwesihlanu nala mathwasa amabili.Kuthiwa isidumbu sakhe nezamathwasa zitholwe ngaphansi kwebhuloho eliseMngeni. Ngesikhathi esuka ekhaya kuthiwa uduke eya eMhlanga namathwasa akhe nawo atholakale eshonile endaweni efanayo.Kuvela ukuthi uMzimela namathwasa akhe amabili okunguMnuz Senzo Ngema benoMnuz Phumlani Mbuli bebeyohlangana nothile eMhlanga bese behamba beyokwelapha ndawana thizeni.Laba abathathu kuthiwa babulawe ngesihluku esesabekayo njengoba kuvela ukuthi bebenamanxeba okudutshulwa kanti izidumbu beziboshwe izandla ngentambo.Ngesikhathi ehamba ngoLwesihlanu kuthiwa wayeshayela iToyota Corolla emhlophe. Itracker yayo kuvele ukuthi itholwe eGreenwood Park ngempelasonto. UMzimela usocongwa nje kuvela ukuthi ngonyaka owedlule umkakhe naye owayeyinyanga wasocongwa.Okhulumela umndeni ozibize ngokuthi unguKing ukuqiniskisile ukuthi uMzimela utholakale eseshonile emakhazeni.Uthe njengomndeni abakabi sesimweni esikahle sokuthi bangakhuluma ngalo ludaba, bacela ukunikezwa isikhathi esanele sokuzila, okungenani bazokhuluma emva kwezinsuku ezintathu.UMzimela ubeyikhansela le-ABC eMzinto kanti le liqembu lidlulise amazwi enduduzo liwabhekise kubangani nasemindenini amalungu alo. Esitatimendeni esithunyelwe kwabezindaba le liqembu linxuse ingalo yomthetho ukuba iqinisekise ukuthi bayabanjwa abenzi bokubi.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu Natal, uLieutenant Colonel Nqobile Gwala usiqinisekile lesi sigameko.Uthe ngoMashi 16 ekuseni kutholakale izidumbu zamadoda amabili zidindilizile ngaphansi kwebhuloho elisemgwaqweni uMngeni, zinamanxeba okudutshulwa.Uthe ngakusasa kwaphinda kwatholakala esinye isidumbu somunye wesilisa endaweni efanayo.Naso futhi uthe besinamanxeba okudutshulwa. "Amaphoyisa aseSydenham aphenya amacala amathathu okubulala mayelana nesigameko sokudutshulwa kwamadoda amathathu,'' usho kanje.

NKOSIKHONA CELEITHE icabangela kakhulu izingane iMantshi uSmanga Mlotshwa, ngesikhathi yenqaba ukumnikeza ibheyili uZimisele Dlulisa (39) ongumpheki, obhekene necala lokuphihliza intombi yakhe ngestini ayibulale, uNksz Mbali Mokokone (29).Kuvela ukuthi uDlulisa waphahlaza intombi yakhe ngestini yafa, wayigwaza ngoba isidumbu sikamufi sasinenxeba emqaleni.Isigameko senzeka emqashweni wabo oseLusuka, eMawoti, eNanda, emasontweni ambalwa edlule. Senzeka ngosuku lokuzalwa kukamufi.Ngesikhathi enza incwadi efungelwe yokucela ibheyili uDlulisa ngomlomo wommeli wakhe, wakubeka eqhulwini ukuthi ufuna ukuphuma ngaphandle ukuze ondle izingane zakhe ekhala ngokuthi zizosala dengwane.Wazibophezela ngokuthi uzoyigcina imibandela yebheyili uma kwenzeka eyithola.IMantshi ithe ikubona kungesiwona umqondo ophusile ukuthi uDlulisa anikezwe ibheyili. Ithe ayikholwa ukuthi uDlulisa angasebenzisa isizathu sokuthi ufuna ukuyokondla izingane zakhe uma ethola ibheyili."Inkantolo ibona sengathi kumele ibeke phambili izingane kuyona yonke lento eyenzekayo. Okokuqala okumele kubhekisiswe ukuthi izingane zazikhona ngosuku lwesigameko. Ngakho kumele inkantolo izivikele,'' kusho iMantshi.Owomndeni kamufi uNksz Bongiwe Mokokone, uthe ncinci kamjoli njengoba uDlulisa encishwe ibheyili nje. Uthe bebesibheke ngabomvu isinqumo senkantolo ngalolu daba.''Sijabule kabi njengoba engazange ayithole nje ibheyili uDlulisa. Siyabonga ukuthi inkantolo ibe neqiniso yathatha isinqumo esifanele,'' usho kanjena.Umndeni kamufi uhluleke nawukuzibamba kuphuma isinqumo wajabula khona ngaphakathi enkantolo.Ngakolunye uhlangothi abebezokweseka uDlulisa bebephume ngobuningi babo, indumalo ibibonakala ebusweni kubona.IMantshi ithe icala lizoqala ukuqulwa ekuqaleni kukaSepthemba nonyaka.

NKOSIKHONA CELEBELIGXILE kakhulu ekulekeleleni umphakathi elikuwona ibandla, iCovenant Fellowship Church International (CFCI) elibungaza ukuhlanganisa kwalo iminyaka engu-30 laba khona.Lokhu kudalulwe umholi walo uMphostoli Collins Dhlomo obekade elandisa kabanzi ngemisebenzi yale libandla selokhu lasungulwa ngo-1994.Uveze ukuthi leli bandla laklama indima enkulu kakhulu ekulekeleleni abantu abaningi ababenesifo sesandulela ngculazi. Lokhu uthe bakwenza ngesikhathi besanda kuthenga isakhiwo sabo sokuqala esiseSikhawini, ngenani lika-R300 000.Uthe odokotela bebandla bangaleso sikhathi babesebenzisa sona ukulekelela ababehlaselwe yilesi sifo."Lokhu sakwenza ngoba sasibona ukuthi lesi sifo sihlasele ngempela siyefana nje netsunami,'' usho kanje. Uthi abagcinanga lapho izintandane zaziza kulesi sakhiwo zizolanda ukudla okwakuthengwa yibandla."Senza konke okusemandleni ethu ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izintandane siyazinakekela. Cishe ngaloyo nyaka zagcina zifinyelela ngisho ku-40 000 izintandane ezazondliwa yibandla,'' echaza.Ukhulume nangomtholampilo okudebuduze nakhona eSikhawini, iSiboniso Clinic athe wakhiwa yile libandla. "Sahlanganisa siyibandla ngemuva kokuba sikuqaphelile ukuthi sikhulu isidingo sawo kule ndawo,'' echaza.Namanje uthe kunemindeni abayondlayo abahambisa amagilosa kuyona nyanga zonke.Ukhulume nangendima eyaklanywa yibandla kwezemfundo nokuyinto athe lisayenza namanje.Uveze ukuthi bayambonga kakhulu uNkulunkulu ngokuhlanganisa iminyaka engu-30 kwale libandla.Ugcizelele ukuthi bekungelula nhlobo, zibe khona izinselelo maphakathi nendlela.Uqhakambise amandla kaNkulunkulu njengoba ethe uyakhumbula lisungulwa ibandla bekhonzela emzini womuntu.Uveze ukuthi wake wacabanga ukuliqamba ngokuthi yiZululand Covenant Church kodwa wabuye wathola izeluleko waguquka kuloyo mqondo.Njengamanje le libandla uthe linezakhiwo ezahlukene KwaZulu Natal nabazalwane abalinganiselwa ku-20 000.

SEBUPHELE nya ubudlelwano kumaqembu ayehlangene nge-ANC ngaphambi kokhetho, i-DA ne-ActionSA.Isipikili sokugcina ekuchithekeni kobudlelwano bawo sishayelwe ngesikhathi i-ActionSA ihlamuka i-DA kuMasipala waseTshwane.I-ActionSA ivote namaqembu aphikisayo ukuba kukhishwe iMeya ye-DA kulo mkhandlu, uMnuz Cilliers Brink, emhlanganweni womkhandlu, obuyizolo.UBrink ukhishwe ngevoti lokungabethembi ubuholi bakhe emva kokuthi i-ActionSA ivote ne-ANC ne-EFF.Amakhansela angu-120 avotele ukuthi uBrink akhishwe, kwathi angu-80 wona avotela ukuthi angakhishwa.Ngaphambi komhlangano wayizolo, i-ActionSA ibikade ibambisene ne-DA emkhandlwini njengoba i-ActionSA iphethe isikhundla sephini lemeya, iphinde ibe nesikhundla esigungwini esiphezulu esilawula umkhandlu.Bobabili i-DA ne-ActionSA bebephinde bebe ingxenye yamaqembu abefuna ukukhipha i-ANC ngaphambi kokhetho lukazwelonke Uqhekeko kula maqembu luqale ukugqama emva kokhetho, ngesikhathi i-DA ijoyina uhulumeni wokubambisana oholwa yi-ANC.I-ActionSA yasigxeka isinqumo se-DA, yathi siphambene nesivumelwano esasayinwa ngaphambi kokhetho.Muva nje, i-ActionSA isanda kusebenzisana ne-ANC kuMasipala waseJohannesburg, yachayisa i-DA.Amalungu e-DA abenombhikisho wokuzwelana noBrink ngesikhathi kuqhubeka umhlangano wayizolo, athi i-ActionSA icasulwa ukuthi ayizange yenze kahle okhethweni lwangoMeyi.Umholi we-DA eGauteng, uMnuz Solly Msimanga, uthe ukuba i-ActionSA yenza kahle okhethweni lwangoMeyi, i-DA yayingeke isebenzisane ne-ANC.“Bathola amavoti amancane kakhulu nokwenza ukuthi singakwazi ukwakha uhulumeni wokubambisana.”UMsimanga uthe ukukhishwa kukaBrink kuzophazamisa imizamo yokubuyisa uzinzo emkhandlwini.Umholi we-ActionSA, uMnuz Herman Mashaba, uthe bakhethe ukukhipha i-DA ngenxa yokwehluleka kukaBrink ukuphatha umkhandlu.“Izinto bezingahambi kahle lapha emkhandlwini ngesikhathi kuphethe uBrink. Sonke siyazi ukuthi isimo sezezimali asisihle lapha emkhandlwini. Umkhandlu uthole umbiko ongemuhle kuMcwaningi maBhuku kanti futhi uyehluleka ukuhambisa izidingo kubantu.”UNobhala we-ANC eGauteng, uMnuz TK Nciza, uthe liphume nobomvu.“Sijabule ukuthi uBrink ukhishiwe, ubezenzela umathanda lapha. Ngibongela abantu abamnyama asebezothola izidingo. Abantu abamnyama bebenganakiwe ngesikhathi kuphethe uBrink.”Imeya entsha yomkhandlu izoqokwa emhlanganweni womkhandlu ozobizwa maduze.

LUZOGUJWA ngokukhankasela ukuthi i-ANC idle umhlanganiso okhethweni lukazwelonke lwangenyanga ezayo, usuku lwabasebenzi.Lolu suku olugujwa ezweni lonke kuleli, irali enkulu yomfelandawonye wezinyunyana zabasebenzi iCosatu uzobe useKapa.Kulo mgubho osenkundleni yemidlalo i-Athlone Stadium, eKapa, kulindeleke ukuthi kukhulume kuyona umengameli walo mfelandawonye uNksz Zingiswa Losi, uMengameli we-ANC nezwe uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa  noNobhala Jikelele weSACP uMnuz Solly Mapaila.KwaZulu-Natal umugubho walolu suku weCosatu uzoba senkundleni yemidlalo iCurrie’s Fountain eThekwini.Kuzokhuluma kuwona uNobhala -Jikelele weCosatu uMnuz Solly Phetoe nePhini lokuqala likaNobhala wamaKhomanisi uMnuz Madala Masuku.ICosatu ayihlonizi ngokuthi yeseka i-ANC ukuthi ibuyele emandleni njengoba kuzovotwa ngoMeyi 29. UNksz Losi uhlale ekugqugquzela ukuthi kuvotelwe i-ANC nakuba zikhona izinselelo ezweni.Lo mfelandawonye uzivezile izizathu ezenza ukuthi weseke i-ANC okhethweni.Uveze ukuthi izinto zijikile kuleli njengoba kuboshwa ngisho umuntu owayenguMengameli weZwe uJacob Zuma nobenguSomlomo wePhalamende uNkk Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula.ICosatu ibale izinto eziningi ezenziwe yile nhlangano selokhu yathatha izintambo zombuso ngo-1994.Ezinye zazo imfundo yamahhala, izingane ezihola isibonelelo, isibonelelo sabangasebenzi, amalungelo abasebenzi athinta ukuteleka nokuba ngamalungu ezinyunyana, izinkundla zokuxoxa ngamaholo abasebenzi nezinye.“Sesiyakwazi manje ukuthi uma umuntu egula ahlabe ikhefu lokugula. Uma eyobeletha akhokhelwe imali yakhe  noma elimele.“Kunezinguquko ezithinta imali yezimpesheni abasebenzi abazokwazi ukuthola ingxenye yayo besaphila, okungezinye zezinto ezenziwe nguMbuso we-ANC,” kusho iCosatu.Ithe ziningi izinselelo ezisekhona ezweni kodwa  igqugquzela abantu bakuleli nabasebenzi ukuthi bavotele i-ANC. UKhongolose ubhekene nomqansa kulolu khetho njengoba emaningi amaqembu afuna ukuwuketula emandleni.Okunye ngukuthi kulo nyaka kugujwa iminyaka engu-30 le nhlangano yathatha amandla.Yilokhu okudala ukwehlukana kwemibono, abanye bathi sebekhathele yi-ANC ayiphume ngoba yehlulekile,  abanye bathi ayiqhubeke ihole izwe.

UMNCINTISWANO ophezulu ngemali yokudayisa umkhiqizo wobisi oluyimpuphu ofakwa ekhofini  phakathi kwe-Cremora ne-Ellis Brown,  uholele ekutheni iNestle idayisele enye inkampani yokukhiqiza iCremora kuleli.I-Nestle SA ithe isinqamula ubudlelwano nalo mkhiqizo odumile nosetshenziswa ekhofini. Ithe iCremora iyidayisele iGroupe Lactalis yaseFrance ngenani elingadalulwanga ngemuva kokubuyekezwa kohlu lwemikhiqizo,  ehlanganisa iNescafé, iRicoffy, iMaggi, iNespray kanye neKit Kat.INestle ithe iCremora ibisidayiswe eNingizimu Afrika iminyaka ecishe ibe ngu-80, ukuyidedela kuzoyivumela ukuba igxile ekutshaleni imali kweminye imikhiqizo engaletha imali kangcono.Isikhulu esiphezulu sakwaNestlé, uMnuz uMark Schneider,  muva nje sithe i-Ellis Brown eyimbangi enkulu yeCremora ibilokhu idayisa ngemali engaphansi kweCremora, okuholele ekutheni inzuzo ejwayele ukuyenza ngekota ibe ngaphansi kakhulu okudale ukukhathazeka.

IQEMBU leDA KwaZulu-Natal livulele unobhala we-ANC uMnuz Bheki Mtolo icala kubangwa ukususwa kwezingqwembe zokukhankasa.IDA ithi inobufakazi bama-video nomuntu owazibonela ngawakhe abe-ANC besusa izikhangiso zabo zokhetho.Isitatimende esikhishwe uChris Pappas omele iDA emkhankasweni wokuhola isifundazwe sithi: “Isenzo se-ANC sicekela phansi inqubo yentantoyeningi futhi sibonisa ukulahlekelwa yithemba nokwesaba ukukhula ngesivinini seDA.” IDA ithi ibopha uMtolo ngoba njengonobhala weqembu nguyena ohola ukusebenza kwe-ANC, ngaleyo ndlela uyena okumele abhekane nawo wonke amacala enziwa amavolontiya eqembu lakhe.Ngaphandle kookuvula icala emaphoyiseni aseHowick, iDA ithi ifake isikhalo e-IEC ngalesi senzo se-ANC.

UMHOLI weDA uMnuz John Steenhuisen, uthi akusafanele kugujwe uSuku lwaBasebenzi kuleli ngoba baningi kakhulu abantu abajika nelanga.Izolo uSteenhuisen namanye amalungu eDA, bamashele emahhovisi eCosatu eGoli, eyisola ngokunciphisa imisebenzi kuleli.Uthe abaholi beCosatu basebenzisana ne-ANC ngoba befuna ukuthola izikhundla ePhalamende bese bekhohlwa ngabantu bakuleli abadinga imisebenzi.“Siyizwile iCosatu ithi sifuna ukubuyisela abasebenzi emuva kodwa akusilo iqiniso ngoba iyona ebabuyisela emuva. Akukwazi ukuthi abasebenzi baholelwe ngokohlelo lwe-national minimum wage bese labo abasebenzela uhulumeni kolwe-expanded public works bahole kancane. Kuyimanje entsheni engu-10, eyisikhombisa ijika nelanga. Sinabantu abawu-11.7 million abangasebenzi ezweni,” kusho uSteenhuisen.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi iCosatu ike yagxeka iDA emuva kokuthi ithe, abaqashi abangakwazi ukuholela abasebenzi ngokohlelo lwe-national minimum wage kufanele bangawulandeli lo mthetho.IDA ithe ayihambisani nokuthi kube nemithetho ephoqa abaqashi bomkhakha othile ukuba baqale ukuholela abasebenzi imali ethile.USteenhuisen uthe osomabhizinisi abancane akufanele babe yingxenye yezivumelwano ezibaphuca imali ngoba abafani nosomabhizinisi abakhulu abakwazi ukuholela abasebenzi ngokwezivumelwano ezenziwa kwi-bargaining council.Umholi wophiko lwentsha kwiDA, uMnuz Nicholas Nyati, uthe iCosatu ayikwazi ukuthi imele abasebenzi ekubeni ihlala etafuleni elilodwa nohulumeni ongayishayi  imithetho egqugquzela ukutshalwa kwemali.Uthe bakhethe ukuqhinqa emahhovisi eCosatu ngoba iyona ebibuka uhulumeni we-ANC udla imali, unika abakhethekile izikhundla namathuba okwenza imali.Emigubheni yoSuku lwaBasebenzi iCosatu ithe abantu abangakhohliswa yiDA ngoba ayibakhathalele abasebenzi kodwa ivikela abadla izambane likapondo.

UZISHAYA isifuba umasipala waseMthonjaneni ngefilimu edale inqwaba yamathuba omsebenzi okuhloswe ngayo ukufundisa abantu basemakhaya ngokuvota. Izokhonjiswa kuSABC 1 ngoMeyi12.Oyisikhulu esiphezulu kulo Masipala, uMnuz Zipho Mthethwa, uthe kule filimu eqoshelwe eMthonjaneni, iwu-50 intsha ethole amathuba omsebenzi.Inhlosongqangi yayo uthe ukufundisa abantu ngokuvota kodwa kube kudaleka namathuba omsebenzi ebantwini abasha bendawo."Okuyikhona okumqoka ngalo mdlalo ukufundisa abantu bakule ndawo ngokuthi kuvotwa kanjani. Sikhethe ukuthi sibe nalo mdlalo ngenxa yokuthi siyaqonda ukuthi abantu bakule ndawo ngabantu basemakhaya. Ngakho kumqoka ukuba bafundiswe ngokuvota,'' usho kanje.Uthe bakubeke eqhulwini ukuthi abantu abasha kube khona abazokuzuza ezinhlelweni zikamasipala."Kuyajabulia kakhulu ukuthi kuhlomula nabantu abasha ngamathuba ngenxa yalo mdlalo,'' usho kanje.Uthe bayabonga nokuthi iMeya, uMnuz Mbangiseni Biyela ubavumelile ukuthi babe nefilimu yalolu hlobo.Le filimu iqoshwe yinkampani iKH Films engaphansi kweGravel Holdings.Umphathi wale nkampani, uMnuz Siphakamiso Gumede uthe zibe khona izingqinamba ngesikhathi kuqoshwa le filimu wathi kodwa konke kugcine kuhlangene.Uthe bajabule kakhulu ngokuba nobudlelwane nomasipala waseMthonjaneni."Siyalibonga kakhulu leli thuba lokuthi sisebenzisane nalo masipala. Siyathemba ukuthi lokhu kuzobalekelela abantu abasha bakule ndawo,'' echaza.Ubonge nabaphathi baseMthonjaneni Lodge okuyilapho okuqoshelwe khona lo mdlalo. UNksz Nonkonzo Khali obhekele ezokuxhumana kulo masipala uthe kubajabulisile ukuthi kube nefilimu yalolu hlobo ebeka noMasipala waseMthonjaneni ebalazweni.

KWANDE izithebe uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa esephaka izikhundla zeKhabhinethi ngaphansi kukahulumeni omusha woBumbano. URamaphosa udidiyele wonke amaqembu akuhulumeni nhesikhathi ededela uhla lwesigungu sakhe ngeSonto ebusuku ePitoli.Kule khabhinethi abaholi bamaqembu ayingxenye kahulumeni bathole izikhundla zokuhola iminyango.Izembe ligawulile kwabanye ongqongqoshe abebeyingxenye yeKhabhinethi edlule. Abanye bakhuze ibuya, abanye bayiswa kweminye iminyango kwathi abanye behlela ezikhundleni zamasekela.URamaphosa uthe ithimba lamafolosi aliqokile lizosebenzela bonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika.“Ongqongqoshe abaqokiwe bazosebenzela abantu, hhayi amaqembu abo noma ingcosana ethile yabantu baseNingizimu Afrika. Bakhethwe ngoba benamava futhi bezimisele ukwenza umsebenzi wezwe,” kusho uRamaphosa.Abaholi, okubalwa owe-IFP uMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa, owe-DA uMnuz John Steenhuisen, owe-Patriotic Alliance uMnuz Gayton McKenzie, umholi we-UDM uGeneral Bantu Holomisa nabanye bathole izikhundla zongqongqoshe.IPhini likaMengameli kusazokuba uMnuz Paul Mashatile.UHlabisa ujutshelwe eMnyangweni wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana nezindaba zoMdabu, uSteenhuisen useMnyangweni wezoLimo, umholi we-PAC uMnuz Mzwanele Nyhontso ufakwe eMnyangweni wezeMihlaba nokuThuthukiswa kweziNdawo zasemaKhaya.Inkosi Mzamo Buthelezi ihola uMnyango weziSebenzi zikaHulumeni nokuPhatha kwathi umkhulumeli we-IFP uMnuz Mkhuleko Hlengwa, waba yiPhini likaNgqongqoshe eMnyangweni wezokuThutha.UHolomisa uyiPhini eMnyangweni wezokuVikela noMnuz Richard Mkhungo.UMnuz Senzo Mchunu uthathe indawo ebiphethwe uMnuz Bheki Cele eMnyangweni wamaPhoyisa.I-DA uyinike uMnyango weMfundo eyisiSekelo ozoholwa nguNksz Siviwe Gwarube, owezokuXhumana oholwa nguMnuz Solly Malatsi, owezemiSebenzi yoMphakathi onikwe uMnuz Dean MacPherson, owezaseKhaya onikwe uMnuz Leon Schreiber. UNkk Angie Motshekga usenguNgqongqoshe wezokuVikela esuka eMnyangweni weMfundo eyisiSekelo.Esikhundleni sikaNgqongqoshe kagesi osekuhlanganiswe noMnyango wezaMandla kufakwe uDkt Kgosientsho Ramokgopa.UDkt Blade Nzimande ufakwe eMnyangweni wezeSayensi, eMnyangweni weziMali kwabuyela uMnuz Enoch Godongwana.EMnyangweni weMfundo ePhakeme ufake uNksz Nobuhle Nkabane, eMnyangweni wezeMpilo wafaka uDkt Aaron Motsoaledi kwathi iPhini lakhe wafaka obenguNgqongqoshe walo mnyango uDkt Joe Phaahla.EMnyangweni wezobuDlelwano namazwe omhlaba kungene uMnuz Ronald Lamola, kwathi eMnyangweni wezokuHlaliswa kwabantu kwabuyela uNksz Mmamoloko Kubayi.EMnyangweni wezobuLungiswa nokuThuthukiswa koMthethosisekelo ufake uNksz Thembi Nkadimeng, kwathi eMnyangweni wezokuMbiwa wafaka uMnuz Gwede Mantashe.EMnyangweni wezamaBhizinisi amancane uNkk Stella Ndabeni-Abrahams, kowezeNhlalakahle yoMphakathi wafaka uNksz Sisisi Tolashe.EMnyangweni wezokuThutha ujube uNkk Barbara Creecy, kowabesiFazane, iNtsha nabaPhila nokuKhubazeka ufake uNkk Sindy Chikunga kwathi kwezokuHlunyeleliswa kweziMilo wafaka uDkt Pieter Groenewald ongumholi we-FF Plus.Emnyangweni wezaManzi nokuHanjiswa kweNdle ufake uNksz Pemmy Majodina.UMnuz Jomo Sibiya owayenguMphathiswa woMnyango wezokuHlaliswa kwabantu KwaZulu-Natal ujutshelwe kwesePhini likaNgqongqoshe wezabaSebenzi, kwathi uMnuz Sihle Zikalala wajutshelwa kwesephini likaNgqongqoshe eMnyangweni wezemiSebenzi yoMphakathi.UNgqongqoshe obhekele ukuhlela nguNksz Maropene Ramokgopa kanti osehhovisi likaMengameli nguNksz Khumbudzo Ntshavheni.URamaphosa uthe ngenxa yokuthi maningi amaqembu abambisene kuhulumeni akakwazanga ukunciphisa isibalo samalungu eKhabhinethi njengoba ayethembisile ukuthi uyokwenza lokhu.UNgqongqoshe wezoHwebo nguMnuz Parks Tau kanti amanye amaphini ongqongqoshe kweminye iminyango ahamba ngamabili.IKhabhinethi entsha kulindeleke ukuthi ifungiswe kusasa.

IDURBAN Chamber of Commerce and Industry ithi iyasamukela isinqumo sokufakwa ngaphansi kwesigaba 139 lapho kulethwe ongoti ukuze balekelele lo masipala ukuthumela izidingo.UMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana nezoMdabu uthumele uDkt Mike Sutcliffe noDkt Casius Lubisi ukuba bazotakula iTheku ngaphansi kwesigaba 139 ngoJuni.Esitatimendeni iDurban Chamber ithe uMasipala weTheku uyaludinga usizo ngoba kuningi osudlule kukho okubalwa iCovid-19, izibhelu zikaJulayi 2021, izikhukhula zango-2022 nezinye izigameko ezenza kungathunyelwa kahle izidingo kubantu abakhele lo masipala.Iveze ukuthi amanye amabhizinisi aphoqeleke ukuvala ngenxa yokungabibikho kwamanzi, ugesi, izinkinga zokuphepha, ukungathuthwa kukadoti nezinye izingqinamba.Phezu kwalezi zingqinamba iDurban Chamber, ithe osomabhizinisi bebekhokhiswa intela wumasipala unganakile ukuthi izinto azihambi kahle.Ibuye yakhala nangokungcola kwamanzi asolwandle obekuhlalahlale abe negciwane le-e-coli ngenxa yokungenwa ngamanzi anendle, lokhu bekuxosha amakhasimende nezivakashi emabhizinisi agudle ulwandle.“Njengenhlangano emele osomabhizinisi siyasamukela isinqumo sokulethwa kongoti abazosiza iTheku ukuze likwazi ukuthumela izidingo kubantu. Kubalulekile ukuthi uMasipala weTheku usebenze, kukhucululwe ukungcola, kuthuthukiswe ingqalasizinda, kuqine ezokuphepha ukuze kuzoza abatshalizimali, izivakashi nabantu baphephe,” kusho IDurban Chamber.Ibuye yakhala ngezinkinga zezigebengu eziphazamisa umnotho esho nokuthi kufanele kulungiswe indaba yenkohlakalo kumasipala kususwe imicikilisho yokwenza ibhizinisi.Ithe izinkinga zaseThekwini zenziwe ngamabomu kodwa ziphazamise kakhulu osomabhizinisi nabantu baseThekwini ngakho kufanele lilungiswe wongoti.

Ngabe ufuna ikusasa eliqhakazile? Woza e-Durban University of Technology (DUT), isikhungo esaziwa emhlabeni jikelele ngemfundo esezingeni eliphezulu, ukuqeqesha kwezobuchwepheshe, ucwaningo, ezamabhizinisi nokwenza izinto ngendlela ehlukile enobuhlakani.Kwafuna ukufunda enyuvesi yekhethelo ngo-2025, iDUT iyona ehamba phambili. IDUT yisikhungo semfundo ephakeme esiKwaZulu-Natal, esinamakhephasi emfundo ayisikhombisa aseThekwini naseMgungundlovu. IDUT yasungulwa ngo-2002 emuva kokuhlanganiswa kwe-ML Sultan ne-Technikon Natal, le nyuvesi inezigaba zemfundo ezahlukene okubalwa eze-Accounting and Informatics, Applied Sciences,  anagement Sciences, Engineering and the Built Environment, Health Sciences, neze-Arts and Design. Kunezinhlaka zocwaningo eziwu-20 okugxilwa kuzona, ngalolu cwaningo iDUT izibophezele ekuthuthukiseni ubuchwepheshe besimanje ibuye ixazulule izingqinamba ezibhekene nomhlaba. Impumelelo ye-DUT ayithinti kuphela ezemfundo kodwa kuthuthukiswa izitshudeni ngayo yonke indlela, lapha kubalwa nakwezamabhizinisi.Uphiko lwe-Management Sciences lunesikole samabhizinisi esibizwa nge-DUT Business School,okuyisona esigxile ezifundweni zamabhizinisi ezihlomisa izitshudeni ngamakhono ebhizinisi aletha uguquko lwezomnotho oluhle emphakathini. Lezi zifundo zigunyazwe yi-Council for Higher Education (CHE). Lesi sikhungo esibuye sibe yilungu le-South African Business School Association (SABSA), sithembisa izifundo ezihlukile zebhizinisi, ezikhiqiza abaholi abazokwazi ukuxazulula izinkinga ezenzeka emhlabeni.Emithanjeni ye-DUT kuhamba phambili uhlelo lwayo olushintsha ezemfundo olubizwa nge-ENVISION2030, olwasungulwa ngo-2020. Lolu hlelo lugxile kwizisekelo zokwenza izinto ngokuthembeka, ukungafihli lutho, inhlonipho, ukuziphendulela, ukungenzeleli, ukuzinikela, ukusebenza ngokuzikhandla, ukusebenza ngendlela eyamukelekile, nokuba nozwelo. Konke lokhu kuyisisekelo salesi sikhungo. Ngaphezu kwalokho uhlelo lwe-ENVISION2030 luyisitatimende sokuzibophezela ukuthi iDUT iyohlezi inakekela umphakathi, iza namasu amasha okwenza izinto, ithuthukisa osomabhizinisi futhi ihambisana nalokho okwenzeka emhlabeni jikelele. Lesi sitatimende sisho ukuthi iDUT izohamba phambili ekuthuthukiseni izwe nomhlaba. Iyakholelwa ekwakheni ingqalasizinda ehamba phambili kwezemfundo nakuyo yonke imikhakha esebenza kuyona. Lokhu kusho ukuthi uhlelo lwe-ENVISION2030 lunenjongo yokuthuthukisa impilo yabantu ngayo yonke indlela.Isiqubulo senyuvesi esithi– “CREATIVE. DISTINCTIVE. IMPACTFUL.” –sithembisa izitshudeni imfundo nentuthuko kuyo yonke impilo yazo. Labo abafuna ulwazi, abomele ukuqeqeshwa kwezobuchwepheshe namabhizinisi bazothola usizo eDUT. Akusona isikhungo semfundo ephakeme kuphela kodwa yisikhungo somphakathi esenza izinto ngendlela ehlukile kwezobuchwepheshe, nezamabhizinisi. Phezu kwakho konke lokhu sithuthukisa izitshudeni ukuze zithi uma ziphuma zibe namagalelo abonakalayo emhlabeni.Kulabo abanobizo lwamabhizinisi, iDUT inesikhungo esibizwa nge-innobiz DUT Centre for Entrepreneurship and Innovation. Lesi sikhungo siqeqesha izitshudeni ngolwazi lomsebenzi, zifunde kabanzi ngemikhakha yamabhizinisi ukuze zithi uma ziphuma zikwazi ukuzivulela amabhizinisi azo, azoxazulula izinkinga zomphakathi. Yenza iDUT inyuvesi yakho ekhethekile ukuze uqale imfundo ehlukile, ezokuhlomisa ngolwazi oludingayo, ukwazi ukuba neqhaza elibalulekile emhlabeni. Yiba namaphupho amakhulu, khetha iDUT njengekhaya lakho lezemfundo. Sezivuliwe izikhala zezifundo ze-undergraduate ne-postgraduate,kulabo abafuna ukufunda izifundo ezihlukene ezizobasiza ukuphumelela.Ngolwazi oluphelele ngezifundo zaseDUT, okudingekayo uma uzobhalisa nokufakwa kwezicelo ungavakashela u-www.dut.ac.za (https://www.dut.ac.za/)DUT ENVISION2030… CREATIVE. DISTINCTIVE. IMPACTFUL.

ISIKHUNGO semfundo ePhakeme, iDurban University of Technology (DUT), sikhombisile ukuthi kungani saziwa njengesikhungo sobuchwepheshe njengoba sethule isikebhe sokuqala esihamba ngogesi welanga e-Afrika yonkana.Lesi sikebhe esibizwa ngeSiyahamba Solar Boat sizongenela umncintiswano omkhulukazi wezikebhe ozoba se-Europe ngoJulayi, obizwa ngeMonaco Energy Boat Challenge (MEBC).NgoLwesihlanu, izikhulu zaseDUT zisebenzisana ne-Energy and Water Sector Education Training Authority (EWSETA), zethule ngokusemthethweni iSiyahamba Solar Boat ePoint Yatch Club, eThekwini.Kuvele ukuthi isikebhe saseDUT sakhethwa ukuba singenele iMEBC kwimingenelo ewu-120 eyayifakiwe. Sizoncintisana nezinye izikebhe eziwu-15 ezivela emazweni ahlukene.Isikebhe sakhiwe yizitshudeni nabasebenzi beDUT Energy Technology Station eyaziwa ngokuthi yiKZN Industrial Energy Efficient Training Resource Centre (IEETR).UMqondisi wezokuXhumana eDUT, uMnuz Alan Khan  uthe iDUT yiyona yodwa inyuvesi eya kwiMEBC, e-Afrika yonkana.Uthe iSiyahamba bayiqambe kanjena ngoba behlonipha uKaputeni wamaBhokobhoko uSiya Kolisi emuva kokuwina indebe yomhlaba yebhola lombhoxo ngo-2019.Umsebenzi wokwakha iSiyahamba waqala ngo-2018.USolwazi Fulufhelo Nemavhola oyiPhini likaVice Chancellor weResearch, Innovation and Engagement eDUT, uchaze iSiyahamba njengophawu oluhle olukhombisa imisebenzi eyenziwa yile nyuvesi.“ISiyamba iwubufakazi bokuthi iDUT ikhiqiza izitshudeni ezishintsha impilo yabantu. Asiqhubeke nokuza nemikhiqizo emisha ezoletha ushintsho,” kusho uNemavhola.USolwazi Ian Lazarus ohola ithimba leSiyahamba uthe bahlale beza nemikhiqizo ezoshintsha impilo yabantu eDUT kanti kade baziqala izinhlelo zokuya eMonaco.Uveze ukuthi umshayeli wesikebhe uMnuz Steve Ellis unolwazi olunzulu ngokusebenza kwezikebhe ngakho akangabazi ukuthi uzonqoba kwiMEBC.“ISiyahamba yisikebhe esisizwa wugesi welanga ukuhamba. Lokhu kuzosisiza ukudlulisa umyalezo wokuthi akuvikelwe ulwandle nemvelo ngokusebenzisa obunye ubuchwepheshe. “Izosisiza njengoba simatasa nokuletha ezokuthutha ezingambi eqolo futhi ezivikela imvelo. Kuzosisiza ukukhombisa abasemkhakheni wezikebhe ukuthi uyakwazi ukusebenzisa izindlela ezingayilimazi imvelo ukusebenzisa umkhumbi,” kusho uLazarus.UNksz Candice Moodley we-EWSETA uthe ngeke bayeke ukweseka izinhlelo ezizoguqula impilo yabantu ngokuletha ubuchwepheshe obungayilimazi imvelo.Udalule ukuthi izinhlelo zabo zike zaphazamiseka ngesikhathi seCovid-19 kodwa babuye baqhubeka emuva kwayo.

INHLANGANO iHola Bona Rennaisance Foundation (HBRF), ithi kufanele ichithwe imiphumela yokhetho ngoba kuningi okungahambanga kahle.Izwe belibambe ukhetho lukazwelonke ukuze kuqokwe uhulumeni ozobusa iminyaka emihlanu ezayo, namanje indaba yokhetho isewundabamlonyeni.I-HBRF imangalele i-IEC eNkantolo yezoKhetho, ikhala ngokuthi ayikwazanga ukubhekana nezikhalo zamaqembu anganelisekile ngokhetho.Amaphepha abonwe yiSolezwe ngeMpelasonto abeka amaphuzu   enhlangano ethi yiwona amqoka okufanele abhekwe uma sekuqulwa icala. Iveza ukuthi amaqembu amaningi okubalwa iMK afaka izikhalo ngokhetho.Iveza nokuthi i-IEC ayikwazanga ukuphendula ngendlela egculisayo. Babuye bakhale ngokuthi abayithembi ukuthi iqotho kangakanani iimiphumela eyayivezwa ebhodini le-IEC.Inhlangano yokhetho i-IEC imemezele imiphumela yokhetho ngeSonto yathi belungolukhululekile nolungenazihibe. IMK namanye amaqembu bakhala ngokuthi abanelisekile ngokuningi abakholwa wukuthi akuhambanga kahle.Amaqembu ayephakamisa nokuthi kubalwe kabusha abanye bethi akuqalwe phansi kuvotwe. Nakuba kunjalo kodwa ziyaqhubeka izinhlelo zokuhlalisa iPhalamende lapho okuzokhethwa khona umengameli wezwe.Seluhanjisiwe uhlu lwamalungu ePhalamende olwemukelwe yiNhloko yamaJaji kuleli iJaji uRaymond Zondom okusho ukuthi izinhlelo ziyaqhubeka.

IFISA kungapheli ngoMkhosi woMhlanga itshitshi elina-73 elisaqhubeka nokuya kulo mkhosi ohlanganisa iminyaka ewu-40 wavuselelwa kabusha.UNksz Ngipheni Ngcobo, waseMgungundlovu, uthe ufuna ukuthi uMkhosi woMhlanga uqhubeke nokudlondlobala akubone kule minyaka ewu-39 eyedlule.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma neSolezwe ngaphambi komkhosi wakulo nyaka ozoba sesigodlweni eNyokeni, ngempelasonto.“Sengathi ungaqhubeka, ungapheli umhlanga, uze uficwe nayizizukulwane ezizayo. Izizukulwane ezizayo ziyojabula uma ziyifica le nto enhle kanjena.”UMkhosi woMhlanga wavuselelwa kabusha iNdlovukazi uMantfombi Shiyiwe Dlamini-Zulu ngo-1984.UNksz Ngcobo uthe uMkhosi woMhlanga usudlondlobele kakhulu uma uqhathaniswa nezikhathi owavuselelwa ngazo kabusha. “Kwakungelula ngesikhathi uqala. Thina saqala ukuwuhamba kusewusizi. Lo buhle osebukhona esigodlweni babungakabi bikho. Ngisho namatende esesihlelelwa wona, ayengekho. Amatende esasilala kuwo amanye wawubona nje ukuthi alethwe abantu bendawo. Abantu babengebangaka. Manje usuyaduka emhlangeni uma ungaliqaphelanga itende enihlaliswe kulona.”UNksz Ngcobo uthe eminyakeni eyedlule kwakuphuma imoto eyodwa ngakubo eyayihambisa izintombi emhlangeni, wathi manje sekuphuma inqwaba yamabhasi.Nokho ukhalile ngokuthi mumva sithanda ukuncipha isibalo samabhasi akhishwa yizinhlaka zikahulumeni.UNksz Ngcobo uthe ukukhula komkhosi nokushintsha kwezikhathi kudale izinkinga eziningi."Kwakunenhlonipho kuqala, izingane zazingakachwayizi kanje. Inkinga ukuthi izingane zikuthanda konke, zithanda ukuba izintombi zibuye zithande nobudala. Ngibuye ngisole onomehlo ngalokhu. Kuqala zazingenzeki le zinto esezenzeka manje."Manje sekuke kugobe umhlanga ezinganeni. Nginesiqubulo esithi 'umhlanga awugobi, kugoba intombi'. Noma ngabe kunomoya ongakanani umhlanga awugobi. Phela umhlanga into engcwele okufanele uyiphathe uze uyofika nayo esigodlweni. Laba bamanje bayaqhubeka bawuhambise umhlanga noma usugobile."UNksz Ngcobo uthe uzobe ekhona nasemkhosini wakulo nyaka.Ngesikhathi ekhuluma neSolezwe izolo ubematasa namalungiselelo.ISilo uMisuzulu Sinqobile kaZwelithini sakhipha umyalelo wokuthi uNksz Ngcobo akangabe esahamba ngamabhasi athutha izimbali zesizwe ngenxa yeminyaka yakhe.Imbube yayalela uMnyango wezobuCiko namaSiko ukuba uhlelele uNksz Ngcobo imoto ezomlanda uma kunomkhosi.Ngonyaka odlule UNksz Ngcobo wahamba ngalolu hlelo.Izolo uthe abomnyango bebengakaqinisekisi ukuthi uzolandwa yini nakulo nyaka, wathi uzogibela amabhasi uma abomnyango begcine bengamlandanga.

KUGQUGQUZELWE izinkampani ezisebenza ngemali ukuba zenze kangcono ukufundisa abantu ngokuphathwa kwayo engqungqutheleni ye-Financial Sector Conduct Authority (FSCA), ebiseGoli.UKhomishana uMnuz Unathi Kamlana, uthe ukuthuthuka kobuchwepheshe akusho ukuthi kufanele kube nabantu abasala ngaphandle ekufundisekeni ngemali.Wenze isibonelo sokuthi abantu bakuleli banomasingcwabisane abaningi kunemikhiqizo ezobasiza ukulondoloza imali.Ngonyaka imboni kamasingcwabisane ingenisa uR20 billion, okuyimali uKamlana athe ingxenye yayo kufanele ngabe iyongiwa.Ubalule ukuthi ucwaningo luveza ukuthi abantu abongi ngokwanele eNingizimu Afrika, wacela izikhungo zemali ukuba zenze kangcono ekufundiseni abantu.Uthe akasho ukuthi abantu mabangabi nomasingcwabisane kodwa mabalinganise ukuze ukuhlelela ukufa kungathathi imali yabo eningi.UMnuz Lungisa Fuzile oyisikhulu esiphezulu eStandard Bank, uthe imithetho ayivumi ukuthi baxube ukudayisa imikhiqizo ethile nokufundisa abantu ngemali.Ululeke abantu ukuthi abahlukanise phakathi kwezikweletu ezinhle nezimbi, ebalula ukuthi akusiwo wonke umuntu onemali yokuthenga umuzi nemoto yingakho beboleka imali ebhange ukuthenga lezo zinto.Isikhulu esiphezulu saseFirst Rand ephethe ibhange iFNB, uNkk Mary Vilakazi, sithe amakhasimende abo ayafundiswa ngokuphatha kahle imali njengoba kunobuchwepheshe obuwachazela ukuthi asebenzisa malini njalo ngenyanga.Uthe ubuchwepheshe abusho ukuthi kufanele bavale amagatsha ngoba baningi abantu abasaya emagatsheni ukuze bathole umuntu okhuluma ulimi lwabo.Odabeni lomasingcwabisane abaningi, uthe amabhange nawo kufanele akhulume nekhasimende elinomasingcwabisane abathathu, ukuthola isizathu salokho. Ulitshengise neminye imikhiqizo engaligqugquzela ukonga imali.Ekupheleni kwengqungquthela kushicilelwe usomqulu obophezela zonke izikhungo zeimali ukuba zifundise abantu ngokuphathwa kwayo, usomqulu utholakala kwi-website ye-FSCA.

UVOTE usemanzini umndeni womholi weMK, uJacob Zuma, kushona owomndeni ngaphambi kokhetho lwangoLwesithathu.Umfowabo kaZuma, uMnuz Joseph Ngekengithule Zuma, ushone ngoLwesibili.UJoseph ushone esevotile, abomndeni bathe uvotele iMK.UJoseph ubelokhu ephambili ekwesekeni uZuma ngesikhathi esakwi-ANC, nangesikhathi ebhekene nokuboshwa.Uyena owayekhulumela umndeni enkonzweni eyayibizelwe ukuzokhulekela uZuma ngesikhathi edonsa isigwebo sezinyanga ezingu-15 ejele.Abanye bakwaZuma bavote esikhungweni esisesikoleni iNtolwane Primary  kanye noZuma, ngoLwesithathu.UJoseph yena wavota ngokukhethekile ngoMsombuluko, ngaphambi kokuthi kumenele.Okhethweni lwangoLwesithathu abomndeni wakwaZuma bebehlukene phakathi njengoba kukhona abavotele iMK, abanye bavotela i-ANC.Umfowabo kaZuma, uMnuz Khanya Zuma, uthe uJoseph ungakulabo abavotele iMK.“Selokhu kwathi nhlo silandela umfowethu (uZuma). Ubengeke (uJoseph) ahlukane nomfowethu. Njengoba nami nje ungibona, ngiyabagwaza. Kusukela siseyizingane, besilokhu silandela umfowethu (Zuma) ngoba thina asimandla kakhulu ezintweni ezithinta ipolitiki. Ngiyazi ukuthi umfowethu (uJoseph) wavotela uMkhonto.”Yize uKhanya ethe uJoseph ubengathandi ukuzibandakanya nezinto zepolitiki, nokho ubengasabi ukuphawula ngezinto ezingamphethe kahle kwi-ANC.Ngesikhathi uZuma ekhishwa kwesobumengameli ngo-2018, uJoseph waphumela obala, wagxeka ubuholi be-ANC.Wasola ubuholi be-ANC ngokusebenzisana namaqembu aphikisayo ukuketula uZuma.Nangesikhathi uZuma eboshwa, uJoseph wayeyingxenye yabantu ababephikisana nokuboshwa kwakhe.Ekhuluma enkonzweni eyayingo-2021, wathi ukuboshwa kukaZuma kwazwisa umndeni ubuhlungu.UKhanya uthe bese kunesikhathi eside uJoseph egula.“Kugcine-ke kumthatha. Kusizwise ubuhlungu ukuhamba kwakhe. Besinethemba lokuthi uzosinda kule nto ebimphethe.”UKhanya uchaze uJoseph njengemvu yenkosi.“Umuntu obezilungele. Selokhu azalwa, uzilungele. Bona bangaphambi kwami, kodwa ubungaze udideke, uzitshele ukuthi imina engimdala ngoba yena ubezithulela. Ubewumuntu obezithandela inkonzo kakhulu. Ubesonta eyiNazaretha, futhi enesikhundla ebandleni.”UKhanya uthe uJoseph uzofihlwa kuyo le mpelasonto.AbeMK badlulise amazwi enduduzo emndenini wakwaZuma.“Ubuholi beMK kuzwelonke budlulisa amazwi enduduzo emndenini kaZuma. Sengathi umphefumulo kaJoseph ungalala ngokuthula.”

IPHINI likaNgqongqoshe wezokuVakasha, uMnuz Fish Mahlalela lithe ubalulekile umbukiso omkhulukazi wezokuvakasha kuleli i-Africa’s Travel Indaba njengoba ungenisa uR408.6 million emnothweni wezwe.UMahlalela uthe konke kumi ngomumo nge-Africa’s Travel Indaba yalo nyaka ezoba ngoMeyi 13 kuya ku-16, eNkosi Albert Luthuli International Convention Centre, eThekwini.Uthe ucwaningo lwabo luveze ukuthi ngonyaka odlule i-Africa’s Travel Indaba yadala amathuba omsebenzi awu-2 295, yangenisa uR75 million wentela eye kuhulumeni.Uthe kulo nyaka bazoletha osomabhizinisi abasafufusa abawu-120 bewuMnyango wezokuVakasha kazwelonke, ukuze bakwazi ukuzikhangisa.“Sifuna ukushintsha umkhakha wezokuvakasha ukuze ube nabo bonke abantu bakuleli. Siyazi ukuthi kugcwele abasebenzi besifazane kulo mkhakha kodwa asibaboni ezikhundleni zokuphatha. Sifuna ukukushintsha lokhu ukuze sibabone yonke indawo,” kusho uMahlalela.Uthe umkhakha wezokuvakasha uyakwazi ukudala amathuba omsebenzi amaningi ngakho uma wona usebenza kahle, umnotho uzokhula nabantu baqashwe.USihlalo wekomiti lezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho kuMasipala weTheku, uMnuz Thembo Ntuli, uthe i-Africa’s Travel Indaba iza namathuba omsebenzi awu-796 eThekwini. Balindele ukuthi ingenise uR439 million emnothweni waleli dolobha.Uveze ukuthi amahhotela asebhukhwe ngaphezu kuka-85% njengoba kuza i-Africa’s Travel Indaba futhi akangabazi ukuthi azogcwala.UMphathiswa wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho, ezokuVakasha neMvelo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Siboniso Duma, uthe bazoletha osomabhizinisi abasafufusa abawu-15 abazokhangisa imikhiqizo yabo kwi-Africa’s Travel Indaba ukuze bakwazi ukukhula.Uthe lo mbukiso ubalulekile ngoba ufukula umnotho wesifundazwe iKwaZulu-Natal kwazise abawuhambelayo baphenduka amanxusa alelizwe.

KUBE yithuba eliyingqayizivele kwabadayisa ukudla nokokuphuza, kuvotwa eCato Crest eMayville, njengoba abantu bebemi kolayini abade belinde ukuvota.Nakuba kuthe kuphakama ilanga olayini sebekapakele ngaphandle ezikhungweni ezimbili okuvotelwa kuzo, esiseWiggins naseCato Crest, abantu babekezelele ilanga ebeliphumile, kodwa beyigcagcele esokeni kwabadayisa ukudla ngaphandle, kulezi zikhungo.UNksz Nosihle Mlotshwa obehla enyuka kolayini edayisa amajusi esikhungweni esingasemtapeni wolwazi eCato Crest, , exoxa neSolezwe, uthe lolu wusuku olumatasa njengoba akudayisayo kuthengwa ubuthaphuthaphu."Engifisa nje ukukubona ngevoti ukuthi kuthathe uhulumeni ozosinakekela singabadayisi basemgwaqweni.  Sakhelwe amatafula anezindawo zokukhosela uma lina noma kushisa ngoba nathi siyalekelela emnothweni wezwe," usho kanje.Emigwaqweni egudla lezi zikhungo  zokuvota, bekumiswe amatende amaqembu ezepolitiki ehlukene abesondelene kodwa kungekho ukungcofana ngaphandle nje kokuthi imisakazo beyiqhuma phezulu, umuntu edansela ingoma yeqembu alizwa ngaphakathi.Ukuvota akuqalanga ngesikhathi esibekiwe ezikhungweni eziningi esifundazweni kubalwa nalesi esiseCato Crest.Ilungu lesigungu esiphezulu kwi- ANC uDkt Sibongiseni Dhlomo,  ojutshwe yinhlangano ukubheka ukuqhubeka kokhetho ezikhungweni zokuvota eziku-ward 101, eThekwini, uthe ukuqala emva kwesikhathi akuphazamisanga kangako uhlelo lokuvota."Ukuvota kuqale emuva kancane kwesikhathi esibekiwe  ngenxa yokuthi bekunenkinga kweminye imishini yakwa- IEC, kodwa kuqhubeke kahle. Siyakuqaphela ukuthi mabili amaqembu akhombisa ukuba nesasasa okuyi- ANC ne-MK eyingane yethu okukhombisayo ukuthi ngaphambi kokuxebuka kwe- MK, besizidlela amahlanga,  namanje noma isikhona, sizonqoba kule ward," usho kanje.

IMIPHUMELA yocwaningo idalula ukuthi siphezulu isibalo seziguli ezihlaselwa yizifo ezithinta umgudu womchamo eNingizimu Afrika, uma siqhathaniswa nezakwamanye amazwe.Lokhu kuvele ocwaningweni olushicilelwe kwi-Journal of Health and Biological Sciences  muva nje. Ucwaningo belubheka izinga lezifo ezihlasela umgudu womchamo ama-Urinary Tract Infections (UTI), eSub-Sahara Afrika.Kulezi zifo kubalwa izinkinga zesinye ezihlasela abantu abaningi emhlabeni kodwa eNingizimu Afrika, baningi kakhulu abanezinkinga zaso.Ngokombiko wocwaningo, iNingizimu Afrika ihamba phambili ngo- 67.6% , kulandele iNigeria ngo-43 kuya 65%), kube yiZambia ngo-38.25%.Luphinde luveze ukuthi ama-UTI ajwayelekile eNingizimu Afrika, ikakhulu kwabesifazane ngenxa yokuthi abanye banamasosha antekenteke, abanye banesifo sikashukela, abanye abagezi ngendlela efanele ngoba amanzi ahlanzekile kwesinye isikhathi awatholakali. Ukungabikhona kwengqalasizinda yokuthuthwa kwendle esezingeni nakho kubuye kube nomthelela wokuthi abesifazane bathole amagciwane agcina ehlasela umgudu womchamo ngesikhathi besebenzisa izindlu zangasese.UNkk Elani van Zyl, umphathi wophiko olukhiqiza imikhiqizo enakekela izifo ezibucayi kwi- kwaPharma Dynamics, uthi izifo eziphindelelayo ze-UTI  zithinta u-25-30% wabesifazane abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-20 nengu-40.“Ukuthola ama-UTI amabili ezinyangeni eziyisithupha noma ezintathu ngonyaka kuthathwa ngokuba nama-UTI aphindelelayo. Izifo zesinye (cystitis) zenzeka lapho amagciwane amancane ekhuphuka ngomgudu womchamo aze ayongena esinyeni. Lokho kubangela ukutheleleka okubuhlungu emgudwini womchamo ongezansi, nakuba elapheka kalula kodwa ama-UTI anganyukela emgudwini womchamo ophezulu, adale izinkinga eziningi. Yingakho kubalulekile ukuthi onalesi sifo athole ukuhlolwa okufanele kusenesikhathi,” kugcizelela uNkk van Zyl.Uqhube wathi ukuya ocansini kungase kungenise amagciwane angafuneki emgudwini womchamo abe seduze nawo ngoba i-ishubhu elikhipha umchamo  kwabesifazane, liseduze kakhulu nesitho sokulahla indle kunakubantu besilisa. Lokhu kwenza kube lula ukuthi amagciwane aphelele esinyeni.UNkk van Zyl, uphethe ngokuthi ezinye izinsiza zokuhlela umndeni okungaba ama-spermicide, ama-diaphragm, nama-cap omlomo wesibeletho nazo zingawandisa amagciwane angadala ingozi yama-UTI.

IHHOVISI likaNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, selizwakalise ukukhathazeka kwalo futhi lagxeka abantu abakhangisa ngemisebenzi engekho besebenzisa izinkundla zokuxhumana nezinye izindlela zokusabalisa ulwazi. Esitatimendeni esithunyelelwe abezindaba namhlanje, lithe ezinye zalezi zikhangiso, ezingaselona iqiniso, zakhangiswa wuhulumeni wesifundazwe ngo-Agasti nyakenye ngaphansi kohlelo, iSthesha Waya-Waya.“Izikhangiso zaleyo misebenzi nohlelo lokuqashwa kuzona sekwavalwa futhi azikaze zikhangiswe kabusha. Zonke izikhala zemisebenzi kuhulumeni wesifundazwe zikhangiswa ekhasini le-website likahulumeni noma kuma-website eminyango,” kusho isitatimende.Lesi sitatimende sigcizelele ukuthi lezi zikhala zemisebenzi ezikhangiswa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana azigunyaziwe wuhulumeni wesifundazwe kodwa zingezabantu abahlose ukulutha abantu baseNingizimu Afrika abadinga imisebenzi nabafuna ukushiya emikhakheni ethile, bangene kweminye.Sinxusa izakhamuzi ukuthi ziqaphele ukungaluthwa ngabantu uma zifaka izicelo zemisebenzi.“Seluleka ukuthi abantu bayeke ukulutha abanye ngemisebenzi engekho nokuthi noma yisiphi isikhala somsebenzi esikhishwa wuhulumeni sizokhangiswa emaphephandabeni athembekile nakwisizindalwazi sohulumeni wesifundazwe ku-www.kznonline.gov.za/kznjobs,” kusho ihhovisi likaNdunankulu.Lithe lizibophezele ukwethembeka nokusingatha uhlelo lokuqasha ngendlela ecacile futhi engenagcobho, lakhuthaza abantu ukuqala baqinisekise ukuthi isikhala somsebenzi ababona sikhangisiwe sisemthethweni yini, babike kubona uma kukhona okusolisayo abakubonayo kusona. “Sihlose ukuvikela izakhamuzi zaseNingizimu Afrika, siqinisekise nokuthi wonke amathuba avelayo anikezelwa ngendlela efanele nenobulungiswa,” kuphetha ihhovisi likaNdunankulu.

IHLOSE ukuthuthukisa osomabhizinisi abancane inhlangano yabalimi esanda kwethulwa iVirtual Farmers Nest Groupy.Lokhu kudalulwe omunye walabo abangamanxusa ayo, uMnuz Fanele Gumbi.Uveze ukuthi le nhlangano ithole uxhaso lwemali eshisiwe eNorway. Imali abaxhaswe ngayo uthe ilinganiselwa ku-R65, 4 million.Lolu xhaso uthe yilona kanye oludala ukuthi kube lula ukusebenza kubona.Uthe le nhangano igxile kakhulu ekuthuthukisweni kosomabhizinisi abakwezolimo.Lokhu uthe bakwenza ngokuthi bahwebelane ngezimbuzi, iziklabhu nezinkomo.Uthe njalo ngemuva kwezinyanga ezimbili amalungu ale nhlangano athola ingqayizivele yethuba lokuthi ahwebe ngalezi zilwane."Okuyikhona okumqoka kakhulu ukubona bonke abasanda kungena bekhula. Sifuna ukwenza isiqiniseko esikhulu sokuthi bayathuthuka osomabhizinisi bakithi abagxile kwezolimo,'' usho kanje.Uthe yize inhlangano yabo yethulwe ngonyaka owedlule kodwa ibonakala ikhula mawala.Lokhu uthe kungenxa yentshisekelo enkulu ebonakala ikhonjiswa ngamalungu ayo. "Kuyajabulisa kakhulu ukusebenza kwabantu okubonakalayo ukuthi bafuna ukuzuzani empilweni yabo,'' usho kanje.Uthe kusavulelekile nakwabanye abanentshuisekelo yokungena kwezolimo ukuba bangabajoyina nabo.Noma esho kanjalo uthe kodwa badinga labo bantu abazi kahle ukuthi bahlose ukuzuzani ngokungena kwezolimo.

AYIPHUMELELANGA imizamo ye-EFF neMK ePhalamende yokuthi kuhlehliswe inkulumo yokuvulwa kwePhalamende nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ngesonto elizayo.La maqembu abefuna inkulumo ihlehliswe ngenxa yokuthi sincane isikhathi esinikwe amakomiti ukuthi aphasise isabelomali seminyango, okumele kuphothulwe kule nyanga.Okukhalisa i-EFF neMK wukuthi, uRamaphosa wenze kwaba nalesi simo sokusheshisa izinto ngenxa yokuthi waphuza ukukhetha iKhabhinethi entsha ngenxa yokuthi kwakusaqhubeka izingxoxo zamaqembu zokubumba uhulumeni.Emhlanganweni wekomiti lemigomo lasePhalamende izolo, uDkt Mbuyiseni Ndlozi we-EFF, ukhononde ngokuthi amalungu ePhalamende anikwe isikhathi esincane sokuthi afundisise imiqingo ethinta isabelomali.Uveze ukuthi emihlanganweni yamakomiti bekudingeka kukhethwe osihlalo kuphinde, kubhungwe ngeyesabelomali.“Yingakho sithi akuhlehliswe ukuvulwa kwePhalamende ngenxa yokuthi nguyena uRamaphosa ophuze ukuqoka iKhabhinethi. Ngemuva kwalokho kudingeke ukuthi kwakhiwe amakomiti asePhalamende, azobhekela iminyango. Ayihlehliselwe u-Agasti eyenkulumo yokuvulwa kwePhalamende ukuze sibe nesikhathi esenele.”UMnuz Mnqobi Msezane weMK, ukhale esifanayo ngokuthi sincane isikhathi esinikwe amalungu ukuthi afunde imiqingo ethinta isabelomali ukuze siphasiswe.Uthe le miqingo ifika ngayizolo ebusuku, ekuseni ngosuku olulandelayo kumele kubhungwe ngayo.“Sincane isikhathi esinikwe amalungu amakomitini  ukuthi acubungulisise. Amalungu cishe wonke amaqembu akhala esifanayo, yingakho sithi akuhlehliswe imihlangano.”URamaphosa uzothula inkulumo yokuvula iPhalamende lehlandla lesikhombisa likahulumeni, ngoJulayi 18. NgoJulayi 19, kuzoba nenkulumo mpikiswano ngenkulumo kaRamaphosa. NgoJulayi 22, uRamaphosa uzophendula obekushiwo amalungu ePhalamende.UNksz Veronica Mente we-EFF, uthe ukushoda kwezindawo zemihlangano zibhebhethekise isimo njengoba amanye amakomiti kudingeke asheshe aphume lapho abehlangene khona ngenxa adedele elinye ikomiti.Uthe njengoba behlangana njalo beyikomiti lasePhalamende yingoba basuke bezoxoxa ngezingqinamba ezikhona futhi nohlelo lwasePhalamende lungabuyekezwa uma kunezikhalo ngalo. USomlomo wePhalamende uNkk Thoko Didiza, uthe bawutholile umbiko ngezinye izinselelo ezibhekane namalungu kwamanye amakomiti.Uthe uhlelo lwePhalamende abalusebenzisayo lwavunywa yiwona wonke amalungu ayemelwe osotswebhu bawo.“Kuhlehliswe isabelomali seminye iminyango ngenxa yokuthi amakomiti abhekele le minyango abesazihlela. Amakomiti azokwazi ukuhlala kumele aqhubeke, kuthi lawo anezinselelo kuhlehliswe imihlangano.”Uthe njengoba emaningi amaqembu ayingxenye yePhalamende babona ukuthi kungcono kwandiswe izinsuku ukuze athole ithuba lokuphawula enkulumeni kaRamaphosa.Usotswebhu we-ANC uMnuz Mdumiseni Ntuli, unxuse ukuthi kungashintshwa uhlelo lokuvulwa kwePhalamende ngoba kubalulekile ukuvulwa kwale ndlu kuleli hlandla.

NKOSIKHONA CELEBenze isibophezelo sokuthi bazolandela izwi likaNkulunkulu abefundisi ababili abebegcotshwa ebandleni labasindisiwe eliseMgungundlovu, iHouse of Christ Family Church (HOC).Leli bandla liholwa nguMfu Nhlanhla Khambule. Inkonzo beyilapho okukhonzela khona leli bandla eMbali, eMgungundlovu ekhoneni lomgwaqo uMbulazi noMngeni.Abebegcotshwa uMfu Sbu Ngwane noMfu Sanele Delwa. UKhambule uthe ubheke ukuthi laba ababili balandele izimiso zebandla likaNkulunkulu nenqubomgomo yebandla ngaso sonke isikhathi.Ubachaze njengamadoda awazisayo kakhulu umsebenzi kaNkulunkulu wabe esebanxusa ukuthi baqhubeke nokwenza kanjalo.UNgwane ubonge uNkulunkulu ngokumhlanganisa noKhambule. Uthe kwaba yicebo likaNkulunkulu ukuthi agcine engaphansi kobuholi bendoda enobuchule futhi eshumayela izwi likaNkulunkulu njengoba linjalo lingaxutshwe nalutho.Uthe selokhu ajoyina leli bandla usekhulile kakhulu ekumazini uNkulunkulu. Wenze isibophezelo sokuthi konke uzokwenza ngendlela efanelekile nangendlela eyamukelekile."Ngiyambonga uNkulunkulu okunguyena ohambe nami kuyona yonke le ndlela kuze kuba kufika lesi sigaba. Ngiyafisa futhi ukuba aqhubeke nokuthi ahambe nami ukuze ngizokwazi ukufeza icebo lakhe,'' usho kanjena.Uthe ukuba wuMfundisi akumethusi ngoba umkhulu wakhe uMfu John Ndlovu wayengomunye wabaholi bebandla i-Apostolic Church of Southern Africa."Yingakho nje ngikholwa ukuthi ukugcotshwa kwami kuyefana  nokubuyiselwa komphongolo endaweni efanelekile,'' usho kanje.UDelwa naye ubonge uKhambule ngokubethemba ngokuthi bangaba ngabanye babaholi baleli bandla.Le nkonzo ibihanjelwe ngabefundisi abehlukene ebebevela ezingxenyeni ezahlukene zesifundazwe seKwaZulu Natal.

LENZE isicelo sokuthi kubuyiswe isikhulu sakwaVodacom phambi kwenkantolo namuhla, iJaji uRatha Mokgoatlheng izolo ngesikhathi liguqisa ukulalelwa kwecala lokubulawa kowayengunozinti we-Orlando Pirates neBafana Bafana uSenzo Meyiwa.UMokgoatlheng uthe ukubuyiswa kukaNksz Pinky Vythilingam kuzolekelela ekucaciseni kabanzi ngobufakazi bokufonelana okuthiwa kwenzeka izikhawu ezimbili ngo-2014 phakathi kukakelly Khumalo nommangalelwa wesihlanu, uFisokuhle Ntuli.Indaba yokufonelana kukaKelly noNtuli isalokhu iqhubeke njalo nokuba yinzukazikeyi njengoba ungakaphenduleki umbuzo wokuthi kungani ingaveli emaphepheni kaVythilingam enziwa ngaphansi kukaSection 205, ibe ivela emiqingweni kaColonel Lambertus Steyn.UNksz Vythilingam ujutshwe yiVodacom ukuba afakaze ngobufakazi bezinombolo zamaselula abathintekayo kanti uSteyn ujutshwe umbutho wamaphoyisa ukuba enze okufanayo.Phambilini enkantolo ngesikhathi laba ababili bethula ubufakazi, kuvele ukuthi buyashayisana. Ebufakazini bukaNksz Vythilingam, akukho lapho okuvela khona ukuthi uKelly waxhumana noNtuli. KobukaSteyn kuvela ukuthi baxhumana.Kusuka ngoMsombuluko, abuye ngawo isibili uSteyn, ulokhu emile kwelithi kweyakhe imiqingo kuyavela ukuthi baxhumana laba ababili.“Into ezosiza lana, fonelani uNksz Vythilingam ukuze eze enkantolo kusasa (esho ngoLwesine) ukuze bezoyichaza ngokuhlanganyela le nzukazikeyi,” kusho uMokgoatlheng, othe uzomfonela ngokwakhe uNksz Vythilingam.Ngaphambi kwalokho u-Advocate Charles Mnisi omele ummangalelwa wesithathu uMthobisi Mncube ubhuqe uSteyn ngokuba yiphoyisa elikhohlwayo, esholo ephuzwini lokuthi wakhohlwa izikhawu eziningi ukusho ukuthi ukhohliwe ukwengeza umthetho wamahora amabili.Ubuye wamsola ngokwakha ulwazi olungekho ngokuthi uKelly noNtuli bafonelana. USteyn ugcizelele ngelithi bafonelana.Ngesikhathi kuqala inkantolo uMokgoatlheng ukhiphe isexwayiso esishubile ethi yize noma kusuke kuliwa nokuthi kutholwe iqiniso ngesigameko kodwa akufanele kungabe kusahlonishwana noma kwehliswe isithunzi somuntu.Ubesho ngesigameko sangoLwesibili lapho uMnisi noSteyn beshukane khona kwakuncane indawo, uSteyn wagcina ecela indlela, ethi obesekwenzeka akukhona abekubuyiselwe enkantolo.

KUTHUKUTHELE iJaji uRatha Makgoatlheng, elengamele ukuqulwa kwecala lokufa kukaSenzo Meyiwa ngesikhathi kuvela ukuthi omunye wabameli akafikanga ngenxa yokugula.UMeyiwa owayeyisilomo sikanozinti we-Orlando Pirates neBafana Bafana, wadutshulwa wabulawa ekubo kwentombi yakhe uKelly Khumalo eVosloorus, eGauteng ngo-2014.Icala lisesigabeni lapho uMbuso uqhubeka nokweneka ubufakazi onabo. NgoLwesihlanu bekufundwa ubufakazi bamabhange abamangalelwa.Kuthe kuqala icala ngoLwesihlanu kwavela ukuthi u-Advocate Thulani Mngomezulu akekho ubike ukugula. UMngomezulu ungummeli wommangalelwa wokuqala uMuzikawukhulelwa Sibiya.Umbiko kaMngomezulu wethulwe wu-Advovate Zandile Mshololo ethi wuyena ozombambela kodwa ngeke akwazi ukupheka ufakazi ngemibuzo kuzolindwa uMngomezulu. IJaji licikwe wukuthi uMngomezulu akabikanga kulona ngokugula kwakhe kodwa ubikele u-Advocate Mshololo.“Buka nje uyakwazi ukushayela uzakwabo ucingo kodwa akakwazi ukushayela ijaji. Ubhalele umabhalane wami kodwa akangibhaleli mina. Uma umuntu ebikela ijaji kufanele lithole ithuba lokumbuza imibuzo ukuthi akezi ngani kodwa yena ubhale incwadi,’’ kusho ijaji.Kuvele ukuthi abehhovisi likaMngomezulu babhalele umabhalane wejaji bebika lolu daba kodwa ijaji lathi akwenele lokho.Ijaji lithe yingakho lize lathetha, likhala ngokuthi abanye abameli abawahloniphi amajaji.“Manje usesitshela ukuthi uyoze apheke ufakazi ngemibuzo uma esebuyile ekubeni wazi kahle ukuthi imigomo ithi kufanele kuqale ummeli kamsolwa wokuqala,’’ kubhoka ijaji. Lithethe laze labuza ukuthi ithini imithetho yokusebenza.Ijaji lithe kwalona qobo lwalo liyabika kubaphathi balo uma libambezelekile lingeke lifike ngesikhathi futhi libika ngendlela efanele.Kwenzeka lokhu nje ijaji belisanda kutholana phezulu noMngomezulu kubangwa yona indaba yokugula. UMngomezulu wayecele ukuthi icala liguqe ekhala ngeso lakhe kodwa ijaji lanqaba lathi lizomnika umuthi weso.Ngaphambi kwalokho ijaji lake lakhononda ngabameli abamnyama libasola ngobuhlathi kodwa lagcina lixolisa ngoba inhlangano yabo yayivutha. Kulindeleke ukuthi icala liqhubeke ngoMsombuluko.

UKUGUQUGUQUKA kobufakazi obethulwe ngomunye wofakazi ngesigameko  sokubulawa ngokungqongqiswa kwabathathu, eNkanini, eCato Manor kugcine kuphoqa iJaji kuleli cala ukuba lizifikele mathupha endaweni yesigameko.IJaji uMahandra Chetty kuvele ukuthi lihambile nethimba lalo beyobona lapho okwenzeka khona isigameko.Kuvela ukuthi ngoJanuwari 25, 2022 kwagasela abantu abayisithupha endlini lapho okwakuhlala khona abesilisa abathathu ababesolwa ngokuhlalisa lubhojozi umphakathi.Kuthiwa bakhishwa endlini bafakwa emotweni bangqongqiswa  bephila. Kulesi sigameko kwabulawa oMnuz Phumlani Tshekele, Numkile Mfenqe noRefilwe Mokoena.Babesolwa ngezigameko zokudlwengula nokudayisa izindlu zabantu ngodli.Ngemuva kwesigameko kwaboshwa oMnuz Bangomniseli Khondlo (41) odume ngelikaJomo, Vusimuzi Mazula (46), Thandekile Penelope Sithuntasa (37), Siphenathi Zoko (28), Mfanafuthi Muzi Masikane ( 37) noScelo Thusi (39).Selokhu kuqaliwe ukuqulwa kwecala kunofakazi ozichaza njengowayekhona ngosuku lwesigameko. Igama lakhe ligodliwe ngenxa yezizathu zokuphepha.Kodwa okuqaphelekile enkantolo ukuthi ukhuluma aphinde aziphikise. Kokunye athi wabona aphinde ashaye ungqimphothwe athi okunye akakubonanga.Yikho lokhu okugcine kuphoqa iJaji ukuba lizifikele mathupha endaweni yesigameko."Bekumqoka ukuba ngihambe ngifike endaweni yesigameko ngoba bekukuningi ukudideka uma ufakazi efakaza," lisho kanje.Phakathi kwezinye zezizathu okuvela ukuthi zigcine zidala ukuthi iJaji liye endaweni yesigameko ukuthi ufakazi uthi wakubona konke okwakwenzeka ngosuku lwesigameko ekubeni wayebuqamama.Kuvela ukuthi ngesikhathi sesigameko ufakazi wabaleka wangena ehlathini, waqhela ngebanga endlini lapho okwathathwa khona ababulawa.IJaji liye endaweni yesigameko lifuna ukuzibonela mathupha ukuthi kule ndawo ufakazi athi wayekuyona kwakungenzeka yini ukuthi abone konke okwakwenzeka.Belifuna nokubona ukuthi ikude kangakanani inkundla yezemidlalo ufakazi athi wadlula kuyona ngesikhathi ebaleka.Yize selibuya khona endaweni yesigameko kodwa ufakazi ubesaqhubeka nokulidida iJaji. Icala liyaqhubeka.

IJAJI uRatha Makgoatlheng elihlalele icala lokubulawa kukaSenzo Meyiwa, lithimule lingabhemile ngobufakazi babamangalelwa, lathi buyadida futhi bulishiya nemibuzo. UMeyiwa owayeyisilomo se-Orlando Pirates neBafana Bafana, wadutshuwa wabulawa ekubo kwentombi yakhe uKelly Khumalo eVosloorus ngo-2014.Kuboshwe abalisa abahlanu okuthiwa yibona ababulala uMeyiwa bethengiwe. Abamangalelwa bayawaphika wonke amacala ababekwe wona, bathi amaphoyisa abaphoqa ukuvuma amacala. UMbuso umi ngezitatimende othi abasolwa bazibhala bazisayina bevuma amacala.Phambilini, bekuhlala kuvela ukushayisana phakathi kwabamangalelwa nabameli babo uma kwethulwa ubufakazi. Uma bebuzwa abamangalelwa bethi, abazi akubuzwe abameli bazoziphendulela. Abameli babamangalewa bafaka isicelo sokuthi zichithwe izitatimende ngoba amaphoyisa awenzanga kahle ngesikhathi zisayinwa. Ijaji nakuba lingakasikhiphi isinqumo ngalolu daba kodwa belilokhu liphawula, kuzwakala ukuthi liyakuthimula okuningi okushiwo abamangalelwa.Umshushisi u-Advocate George Baloyi ubetasa nezethulo zoMbuso ngesikhathi ijaji lilokhu liphawula. Ijaji lithe kunezinto eziningi ezishiya imibuzo uma licubungula ubufakazi babamangalewa.“Ummangalewa wesibili uthi wayevuvukele ezihlakaleni esikwe wozankosi. Uthi washawa wopha emlonyeni. Waya yini esibhedlela ngenxa yalokhu? Wawabikela yini amaphoyisa ngoba phela uthi isikibha sasinamabala egazi?” kubuza ijaji.Ijaji lithe okunye okuxakayo wukuthi kunobufakazi bokuthi omunye wabamangalelwa washawa amaphoyisa egaraji eliphithizela abantu kwangaba ndaba zalutho.“Igaraji liseduze komgwaqo futhi kunendawo edayisa okudliwayo ephithizelayo, kunezindawo zokuhlala nendawo yokwetha uphethroli negesi nabantu bayaphithiza. Amaphoyisa ayizilima, avele ashaya umuntu endaweni enjalo?” kubuza ijaji ebelibuye lizwakale ligquma samuntu oxakekile.Liphinde lathi kunendawana lapho ummangalelwa wesibili, uMnuz Bongani Ntanzi, ethi umphenyi uSergeant Vusimuzi Mogane, wayefika esiteshini angasebenzi kusona aphuce amaphoyisa umsebenzi alawule. Uthe konke lokhu akuvamile nje, kuyethusa uma kuthiwa kwenzeka ngoba kunendlela enemibandela enzima ngokusebenza esiteshini.Umshushisi uBaloyi ucele inkantolo ukuthi ikuchithe okushiwo abamangalelwa bese yamukela izitatimende zabo njengobufakazi okufanele bubhekwe. Kulindeleke ukuthi uBaloyi asonge namuhla ekuseni bese kuyaqhutshekwa.
