IJAJI lincome ubuchwepheshe besimanje ngesikhathi lehlulela ecaleni elithweswe unesi osolwa ngokuthenga izinkabi ukuba zithumbe futhi zibulale umyeni wakhe ongunjiniyela.Lithe ubufakazi obuqoqwe uMbuso busebenzisa i-tracker yezimoto, izingcingo nemiyalezo eqoshiwe ukubandakanya abamangalelwa ecaleni.Ijaji elibambile uSolwazi Bonke Dumisa belikade lehlulela ecaleni lokubulawa kukaMnuz Nkosi Langa owayengunjiniyela kwaTransnet.Wathunjwa kwakhe ePinetown ngoSepthemba 29, 2020 wabulawa ngalobo busuku, isidumbu sakhe satholwa ngoNovemba waloyo nyaka sesonakele ehlathini oZwathini, eNdwedwe.Kwaboshwa unkosikazi wakhe ongunesi ogqigqa icala, uNksz Mpumelelo Goncalves, wabekwa icala lokuthumba, ukubulala okuhleliwe, ukuphanga kusetshenziswa indlakadla namabili okuphazamisa ukusebenza komthetho.Waboshwa kanye nomfowabo uMnuz Nkosinathi Zungu abagqigqa naye inkantolo.UJames Mashudu Mthimkhulu walivuma icala wagwetshwa iminyaka engu-20 waphenduka ufakazi woMbuso.USol Dumisa uze wathi uzithola elalele leli cala ngenxa yobufakazi obuningi obuqoqwe uMbuso usebenzisa ubuchwepheshe besimanje.Uze wafunda ubufakazi obethulwa uchwepheshe wakwaStandard Bank mayelana nokuthunyelwa kwemali ngendlela esheshayo.“‘Lo fakazi waveza izinkokhelo lapho ummangalelwa wesibili okusolakala ukuthi wayethumelela uMthimkhulu imali ngemuva kokuba esebulele umufi,’’ kuchaza uDumisa.Ugcizelele ukuthi ubuchwepheshe bezingcingo eziqoshiwe, imiqhafazo, i-tracker nobasemabhange budlale indima enkulu ekuzameni ukuthola iqiniso ngokwenzeka.Unkosikazi kuthiwa uyena osolwa ngokuba wungqondongqondo ekubopheni itulo lokubulala, elokuthumba nanokuthi uma sekudayiswa iveni likamufi kumele bakhiphe i-tracker bayilahle.Kuthiwa wayesho ukuthi uma ingase itholakale le veni kungabe kusho ukuthi kuphelile ngabo.Ebufakazini uDumisa asebuthintile kukhona nobukaMnuz Siyabonga Mbedu.UMbedu wayengumuntu wesithathu ukuba adayiselwe iveni kamufi eyayingadayiseki kanti uzoshiya umazisi wakhe phakathi. Watholwa ngamaphoyisa eMgungundlovu kuleliveni, eyayishiywe dengwane.Kubikwa ukuthi amaphoyisa awuthatha umazisi acinga ngawo uMbedu owafonelwa wabizelwa esiteshini samaphoyisa sasePinetown lapho afike waboshwa khona.Kuvela ukuthi wabe esechaza konke ayekwazi nokuthi uLanga ubulewe walahlwa ehlathini oZwathini, eNdwedwe. Amaphoyisa kuthiwa abe esethungatha futhi abopha abathintekayo. UMashudu wathi nguye noZungu abaklinya ngentambo ye-ayina uLanga wafa. Ngaphambi kokuthi abulawe uLanga kuthiwa wacela ukuba bamkhulule kodwa kwakhona abathi awusale usuqedelwa umsebenzi owase uqaliwe.Kuyaqhubeka ukwahlulela namuhla.

IJAJI uJacqueline Henriques lithi kumele liqale ukuqulwa manje icala lezinkabi ezimbili ezesatshwayo KwaZulu-Natal, ezibhekene noxhaxha lwamacala angu-15 okubulala okuthiwa azenza ezigamekweni ezahlukene phakathi kuka-2020 no-2022. Ijaji likhulume kanje ngoLwesine, ngesikhathi laba ababili okunguMnuz Wiseman Shangase (30) odume kakhulu ngelikaMadanone noMnuz Thalente Mkhize (36), bevele eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini.Ijaji lisho kanjena nje, leli cala ligida ndawonye futhi sekunezikhawu eziningi lihlehliswa ngenxa yezizathu ezahlukene. Kuke kwaba khona isikhathi lapho laba ababili belaxazwa ngabameli.“Sekuhambe isikhathi eside kakhulu leli cala lingaqulwa. Kumele manje liqale ukuqulwa ukuze sigweme ukubambezeleka kwalo,’’ lisho kanje ijaji.Phakathi kwezigameko abasolwa ngokuba ngongqondongqondo kuzona kubalwa nesokubulala abahlanu esenzeka eMawoti, eNanda, ngo-2022.Kuleso sigameko kwabulawa uWandile Funaphi (17), Qaphelani Mkhovu (20), Mlondi Getane (22), Phillip Hansa (25) noLindo Siphambo (22).UFunaphi noMkhovu - ngesikhathi bebulawa - kuvela ukuthi babenza u-matric. Laba ababili baphinde basolwe ngokuthi yibona abasoconga usomabhizinisi wase-Overport, uMnuz Zeyn Moideen owadutshulwa emgwaqweni uBrickfield ngo-2022.Ngosuku olufanayo basolwa ngokuthi baphinde babulala umakhelwane walo somabhizinisi, uShaheed Moodel. Kuvela nokuthi ngalo lolu suku, baphinde bazama ukubulala owesilisa wakwaSibisi waseNtuzuma kodwa yaphunza imizamo yabo.Kuvela nokuthi ngo-2021, abasolwa bathumba uMnuz Phakamani Cwele bemsusa eNanda baze bayombulalela oLwandle Drive, KwaDabeka.Basolwa nangokuthi yibona ababulala uMnuz Nhlanhla Goge eNanda, ngo-August 7, 2021. Kuthiwa yibona futhi ababa ngongqondongqondo ekubulaweni kukaMnuz Njabulo Bongani Shongwe benoMnuz Zolani Goodman Mbuthuma okwenzeka eNanda, ngoSepthemba 2, 2021.Kuthiwa bazama nokubamba inkunzi kuhlonyiwe endaweni yokucima ukoma yaseThekwini, ngo-2022, kodwa behluleka.Kuleso sigameko kuthiwa baphumelela ukuphuca abesilisa ababili izibhamu zohlobo lweNorinco Piston neDashprod Rifle, beba nezinhlamvu ezingu-66.Ngesikhathi bekhalelwa ngamasongo kaSigonyela kuthiwa ngaphakathi emotweni yabo kwakunezinhlamvu ezingu-90, futhi bezama nokubaleka kodwa baboshwa sebedlula eMariannhill Toll Plaza.Ngaphakathi enkantolo bekukhona imindeni yabagilwa nabebezokweseka abasolwa. Icala lizobuyela enkantolo ngoNovemba 14.

IPHINI leNhloko yamaJaji kuleli, iJaji Mandisa Maya, eliphakanyiselwe kwesenhloko yamajaji, lithi lisungule umgomo wokuvikela ozakwabo ezenzweni zocansi.IJaji Maya lidalule lokhu izolo, ngesikhathi kunenhlolokhono lapho beliphekwa ngemibuzo yiJudicial Service Commission (JSC), ebiholwa yiNhloko yamaJaji kuleli, iJaji Raymond Zondo.IJaji uMaya liphakanyiswe nguMengameli uCyril Ramaphosa, wathi yilona alibona lifanelwe wukuvala isikhala sikaZondo, oseyodla endala. Kuvele ukuthi iJaji uMaya liqhamuke nombono wokuthi kube nomgomo wokubhekana nenkinga yezenzo zokunukubezwa kozakwabo emsebenzini.“Lowo msebenzi uyaqhubeka futhi ususemaphethelweni, sawubhala umbiko wokuqala waya kubaphathi bawubuyisa bathi asilungise okuthile. Sisanda kulungisa nje sawuhambisa umbiko siyethemba uzophumelela kulokhu,’’ kusho iJaji uMaya.UZondo uvumele phezulu wathi ikomiti impela uyalazi liholwa yiJaji uMaya futhi kwaba wumbono walo. IJaji uMaya lithe kufanele kubhekisiswe indaba yezimo zokusebenza namaholo ozakwabo.“Izimo zokusebenza kufanele zibe zinhle ukuze sihehe abantu abasezingeni eliphezulu. Ngiyazi nje ukuthi izimantshi zike zasabisa ngokuya esitelekeni nongqongqoshe uyakwazi lokho,’’ kuchaza iJaji uMaya.Ungene odabeni lokunakekelwa kwezempilo nokuqinisekisa ukuthi baphile kahle ngoba babhekene nomsebenzi obucayi nobalulekile.Uthe uzimisele ngokusukumela udaba lwezokuphepha ezinkantolo wathi kunezigameko zokuhlaselwa kozakwabo lapho okusuke kufanele baphephe khona. Uthe uMengameli wamaJaji eGauteng, iJaji Dunstan Mlambo, uke waba ngumgilwa wobugebengu enkantolo.IJaji uMaya lithinte nodaba lokuvikelwa kwesithunzi sezobulungiswa lathi uhlaka lwezokuxhumana kufanele likhuphule amasokisi lufundise abantu ngokusebenza kwamajaji.Uthe umphakathi uke ukhale ngezinto ezilula nje okufanele ngabe uyafundiswa ngazo njengokuboshwa komuntu adedelwe ngebheyili. Uthe ukungabi nolwazi kwabantu kwenza baphelelwa ukwethemba umkhakha wezobulungiswa.Ijaji lithe enye inkinga enkulu wukuthi kunabantu abanegama emphakathini abahlalele ukugxeka ezobulungiswa esidlangaleni nje, bebe bengazifundanga izinqumo zamajaji.

INhloko yamaJaji kuleli iJaji uRaymond Zondo, ichibiyele imithetho yokuhlala kwePhalamende okubhekwe ngabomvu namuhla ngoLwesihlanu lapho okuzokhethwa khona uMengameli.Umthetho omusha uthi uma ilungu lifisa ukubuza ngendlela okuqhutshwa ngayo umhlangano kufanele liphakamise umbuzo lisekelwa elinye elivela kwenye inhlangano.Ngaphezu kwalokho indlela elidingidwa ngayo iphuzu izobe ilawulwa ukugwema ukuphazamiseka komhlangano.Ekuqaleni ilungu belinelungelo lokuphakamisa isandla libuze ngaphandle kokudinga ukwesekelwa.Usihlalo womhlangano unikwe ilungelo lokuthi uma ilungu lingayihloniphi imithetho likhishwe phandle khonamanjalo.Ekuqaleni ilungu belinxuswa ukuthi lihoxise amazwi ahlabayo ngaphambi lokuthi likhishwe kodwa manje kuthiwa lingakhishwa khonamanjalo.

IFUNA kube khona okwenziwayo ngamaphoyisa angamazambane abolile asebenzisana nemigilulukudu, i-Democratic Allience (DA).Lokhu ikusho izolo ngesikhathi ihambele esiteshini samaphoyisa saseVerulam, okuke kwaba nemibiko yokuthi amaphoyisa akhona ayehluleka ukwenza umsebenzi.Kusabalale imibiko ebisola amaphoyisa akulesi siteshi ngokuba mdibimunye nemigulukudu.UMnuz Chris Pappas oyiMeya yaseMgeni, okhethelwe kwesobundunankulu kwi-DA, uthe bakhathazekile kakhulu ngemibiko engemihle ngalesi siteshi.Uthe kumele asuswe amaphoyisa angamazambane abolile asebenzisana nemigulukudu."Kusiphathe kabi ukuzwa ngezindaba zokuthi kukhona amaphoyisa akulesi siteshi asebenzisana nezigebengu," usho kanje.Ulimise ngesihloko elokuthi eVerulam, Mashu neNanda, babhekene nengwadla yokwanda kobugebengu.Eqhuba uphosele inselelo uNgqongqoshe wezamaPhoyisa, uMnuz Bheki Cele, ukuba kube khona akwenzayo ngalesi simo.Uthe akukho okuzolunga uma amaphoyisa sekuyiwona ezwa ngezinswelaboya.UMnuz Ian Cameron oyisishoshovu esilwa nobugebengu, uthe kubi ukuthi mihla namalanga kukhulunywa ngenkinga yobugebengu KwaZulu-Natal.Usole uhulumeni ophethe ngokungabi nazo izimpendulo ngenkinga yobugebengu obugubazele iKwaZulu-Natal nezinye izifundazwe.Uthembise ukuthi bona bazimisele ngokuthi benze konke okusemandleni abo ngenhloso yokuqinisekisa ukuthi kuyaphela ukucanasa kwezigebengu eVerulam.Uphawule nangodaba lowesilisa okuthiwa uyacanasa eVerulam ngoba uzwana namaphoyisa."Kumeke kube khona okwenziwayo mayelana nalo wesilisa okuthiwa wenza umathanda ngoba nakhu asebenzisana namaphoyisa," echaza.Umphakathi wakule ndawo ukhale ngokungalutholi usizo emaphoyiseni njalo uma kunezigameko zobugebengu.

KUHLWE emini owesilisa egwetshwa odilikajele ababili yinkantolo eNkulu yasePitoli ngamacala okubulala.USibusiso Mtshali (29) waseVosloorus owaziwa ngokuba yinkabi ugwetshwe odilikajele ababili ngamacala amabili okubulala okuhleliwe.Ugixabezwe ngeminyaka engu-15 ngamacala amathathu okuzama ukubulala, eyisithupha yokutholakala nesibhamu neminye emithathu yokutholakala nezinhlamvu.Kuthiwa ngomhlaka19 Meyi 2019, uMnuz Convency Lawrence Twala owayengusomatekisi wayesemzini wakhe eZithobeni, eBronkhorstspruit, nabangani bakhe abane ngesikhathi kugasela uMtshali ehamba nabanye abantu ababili, bavulela ngenhlamvu.UTwala wafa ujuqu kwathi umngani wakhe uKagiso Zachariah Rampou wafela esibhedlela. Abangani babo ababili balimala kodwa basinda.Uphenyo lwamaphoyisa lwawaholela enkantolo yeMantshi eVanderbijlpark ngomhlaka 24 Mashi 2022 evele ngelinye icala lokubulala.Ngokombiko wophiko lwezokushushisa, uMtshali wagqunywa esitokisini kusukela ebanjwa enkantolo yemantshi ngemuva kokunqatshelwa ibheyili. Waqale wawaphika amacala ayebekwe wona, kodwa ngemuva kokulahlwa ngawo, wanxusa inkantolo ukuthi ibe nozwelo kuyena ngesigwebo ezosikhipha icabangele iminyaka yakhe.Umshushisi obephethe icala u-Advocate Sipho Lalane ukhale ngokuthi uMtshali akazange abonise ukuzisola ngezenzo zakhe.Wayenesikhathi esiningi sokushintsha umqondo esuka eGoli eyokwenza amacala eBronkhortspruit.Wahamba waze wafika emzini kamufi embulalela ekhaya lakhe.

Belike lanukeka emikhubeni yokwebiwa kwemfuyo endaweni ikhansela le-IFP kuMasipala iNdumeni ngaphambi kokuthi lizithele kunoxhaka wamaphoyisa alibophe nezinkomo okusolwa ukuthi bezintshontshiwe. UMnuz Dumisani Xaba (52) waKwaSithole eDundee, uzobuyela ngesonto elizayo eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseDannhauser, naboshwe nabo ababanjwe ngamaphoyisa belayishe emotweni izinkomo zokwebiwa okukholakala ukuthi bezintshontshwe epulazini lomlimi ngeSonto.UXaba, oyikhansela le-IFP elihlala kulo mkhandlu ongaphansi koweSifunda Umzinyathi,  noMnuz Kwazi Zungu bebevele enkantolo kanti bathweswe icala lokweba imfuyo. Imoto kaXaba, ebihudula inqola ebinezinkomo ezine, kuthiwa imiswe amaphoyisa emgwaqeni u-R33 phakathi kweDundee neKranskop ngeSonto ebusuku. Kuthe uma befakwa izinkwesheni ngokuthi baphumaphi futhi balibangisaphi bakhombisa ukunkwankwaza, zabe seziyabakhalela.Inkantolo ilihlehlisele uLwebili leli cala, lapho kulindeleke ukuthi bafake isicelo sebheyili. Kuthiwa ngesikhathi beboshwa, amaphoyisa acele ukunikezwa incwadi egunyaza ukulayishwa kwemfuyo kodwa bakhipha ebinemininingwane engacacile, okwenze amaphoyisa asola ukuthi kukhona okushaya amanzi.UXaba, okuvele ukuthi ubuye abe wuMfundisi ebandleni laseChibini, kuthiwa uphinde abe nguSihlalo we-IFP eNdumeni.USihlalo wenguyazana ye-IFP kulo masipala, uMnuz Xolani Msezane, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi bazwile ngokuboshwa kukaXaba.“Siyakholelwa ekutheni umuntu umsulwa kuze kube inkantolo imthola enecala. Emva kokusabalala kwesithombe esinemoto edonsa inqola enezinkomo okuthiwa abanikazi baboshwe ngamaphoyisa, siyifanisile nekakhansela wethu, kwaphoqa ukuthi ngithinte uSomlomo sanikela esiteshini samaphoyisa eDundee, nebala sifike kunguye uXaba oboshiwe. “Udaba siludlulisele ebuholini obungenhla okuyibona obuzonquma. I-IFP imile emgomweni wawo yokungahambisani nanoma yiluphi uhlobo lobugebengu, ngakho sidedela umthetho ukuthi uphenye,” kusho uMsezane.Umthombo weSolezwe,  okhona kule ndawo ongathandanga ukudalulwa, uveze ukuthi bezikhona izigameko zokuntshontshelana imfuyo endaweni, kanti leli khansela belinukeka kodwa liziphungele ngokuthi liyazondwa nokuthi yizimpi nje zomndeni.“Esigamekweni nje sakamuva esenzeke ngoMeyi, kudutshulwe indodana yalo ikhansela okukholakala ukuthi kwakubangwa izinkomo zokwebiwa. Kwaphela izinsuku ezimbili, kwadutshulwa okukholakala ukuthi uyena owadayisa indodana yekhansela okusolwa ukuthi yisenzo sokuziphindiselela,” kusho umthombo.Kubuzwa uMsezane ngalolu daba, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi sikhona isigameko esinjalo esenzeka endaweni. Uveze ukuthi amahlebezi abehlanganisa ukufa kwendodana yekhansela nawokuziphindiselela, abe nomthelela ongemuhle ngisho nangesikhathi sekuvotwa njengoba bekukhona abebelibeka ngembaba bethi ngeke bayivotele i-IFP. Bethi ngeke bayivotele ngoba kubulawa abantu akholwa ukuthi kungenye yezimbangela zokuthi yehlelwe kakhulu ukwesekwa okhethweni kulesiya sigceme. Uthe uboshwa nje uXaba bekuwusuku abebize ngalo inguyazana ye-IFP ukuzobhunga ngemiphumela etholwe iqembu kule ndawo nendlela eya phambili, nakho-ke sekungasenzeki. Okhulumela amaphoyisa esifundeni Umzinyathi, uConstable Siyabonga Nkwanyana, uthe abasolwa babhekene namacala okuntshontshwa kwemfuyo.

INGXABANO yabesilisa bandawonye baseMaphephetheni, eNanda, iphethe kabuhlungu, ikhipha isidumbu kwathi omunye wangeniswa egunjini labagula kakhulu elimele kanzima.UMnuz Muntu Gwala kuthiwa ushonele emtholampilo emva kokuthi exabane nomfowabo igama lakhe eligodliwe njengoba kuvele ukuthi ubangwa nezibi esibhedlela emva kokulimala kanzima, okuvela ukuthi bagencene. Yize imbangela yokuxabana kwalaba bandawonye ingacaci, kodwa ngokulandisa komthombo weSolezwe  ongathandanga ukudalulwa, bobabili laba bebephuzile ngesikhathi bexabana njengoba bebephuma emcimbini obukomunye umuzi wesihlobo okhona endaweni, ngempelasonto.“Kuphoqe ukuthi umphakathi ungenelele uzame ukulamula ngesikhathi omunye edonsa ucelemba egenca umfowabo ekhanda nasemlenzeni, kanti nobegenca naye ubesevele elimele kanzima. Lo obephucwa ucelemba ubesho ukuqeda namalungu omphakathi kodwa agcine ekwazile ukumphuca,” kuchaza umthombo.Uthe omunye kubona ushonele emtholampilo kwathi umfowabo wangeniswa egunjini labalimele kakhulu kwesinye sezibhedlela eThekwini, lapho elashwa khona.Ngesikhathi Isolezwe lithinta ilungu lomndeni uNksz Ncinci Gwala, unqabile ukuphawula ngalolu daba waveza ukuthi usematasa njengoba ethe usedolobheni, wacela ukuthi abuye athintwe, wavala ucingo.Ikhansela lendawo, uMnuz Makhosini Luthuli, likuqinisekisile ukuthi lolu daba lwenzekile futhi kukhona abambikele ngalo.“Ngenxa yokuba matasa, angikwazanga ukuyovakashela umndeni ngokuzwa ukuthi kwenzekeni. Nginqume ukuthi ngiye kusasa (esho namhlanje) ukuze sithole kahle udaba. Esisakuzwile nje ukuthi umufi uzofihlwa ngeSonto, nokuthi bebephuma emcimbini obukhona endaweni ngesikhathi kuqubuka ingxabano,” usho kanjeOkhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uConstable Thenjiswa Ngcobo, uthe amaphoyisa aseNanda aphenya icala lokubulala.  Ngokwesitatimende samaphoyisa umufi washaywa abantu abangaziwa.

USihlalo weKhomishini yezoKhetho uMnuz Mosotho Moepya, useqinisekise abantu bakuleli ukuthi bazobhekisisa konke okuyizikhalazo ngaphambi kokudedela imiphumela yokhetho.Uthe ngeke bajahe ukudedela le miphumela ngoba bafuna abantu baqhubeke nokubethemba.“Sizoqhubeka nokuqinisekisa ukuthi sibheka yonke into ngokucophelela. Zonke izikhalazo ezingenile sizozibhekisisa ngokuvuleleka,” kusho uMoepya esithangamini sabezindaba.Usho lokhu nje cishe wonke amaqembu ezepolitiki akhala ngokwenzelwa phansi yikhomishini.La maqembu akhala nangezinye izinto ezithinta nokuthi kukhona ukushintshwa kwemiphumela okwenzekile.Amanye afuna kuphinde kuqalwe phansi ukubalwa kwamavoti ukuze aqinisekise ukuthi angu-ngqo.Lokhu kwenzeka nje alikho iqembu eliwine ukhetho ngamalegiso kuzwelonke.I-ANC kuzodingeka ukuthi isebenzisane namanye amaqembu ukuze ibumbe uhulumeni.“Uhlelo lokubala imiphumela  emhlabeni jikelele luhlale lidinga ukwenziwa ngobunono. Lwenziwe ngendlela yokuthi luhambisane nezinguquko ezibekhona ngesikhathi kuchitshiyelwa umthetho kuleli.” Uthe lolu hlelo lwahlolwa yiKhomishini ngaphambi kokulusebenzisa.Usho lokhu nje ngoLwesihlanu kube nobuhixihixi kwacisha izibani ebhodini le miphumela.Kukhona abebesola ukuthi ikhomishini izama ukukokotela imiphumela.Izikhulu zekhomishini zithe alukho ulwazi olulahlekile ngenxa yalobu buhixihixi.

UMLAWULI wesikhashana wesikhwama esixhasa izitshudeni ngemali yokufunda neyokuhlala ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme, iNational Student Financial Aid Scheme (NSFAS), usehlabe ikhwelo komastende abaqashise izitshudeni ukuthi bangazixoshi lezo ezisakweleta imali ngoba bayalusebenza udaba lwazo. UMnuz Freeman Nomvalo, usebathembise ukuthi izikhalazo zabo bahlela ukuzixazulula ungakashayi uJuni 18, 2024. Uthe selokhu eqale umsebenzi kulesi sikhwama abanye babantu ahlangana nabo ababalulekile kubona omastende ngoba bahlalisa izitshudeni zabo. “Ezinye zezikhalazo zabo yindaba yokuthi abakhokhelwa. Sibafakelile omastende imali yabo ngenyanga edlule kanti sizophinde sibakhokhele enye ingxenye yemali maphakathi noJuni. Yingakho ngibanxusa ukuthi labo abangakhokhelwe ukuthi bangazixoshi izitshudeni ezikweletayo. Siyaqinisekisa ukuthi bonke omastende siyabakhokhela ngoba asifuni kube nalabo abangayitholi imali yabo.” Uthe isasebenza ne-email abangathumela kuyona baveze izikhao zabo.“Bangathumela ku: [email protected]. Sicela kuthumele labo abakhalaza ngokungakhokhelwa.” Uphinde wanxusa nezitshudeni ezifunda emakolishi amakhono amaTVET ezingenawo ama-akhawunti asemabhange ukuthi ziwavule ukuze kungabambezeleki ukukhokhelwa kwemihlomulo yazo.Uthe imininingwane yasebhange kumele kube eyesitshudeni ukuze kufane yonke into uma sekuqhathaniswa ulwazi lwasemabhange. Uphinde waxwayisa umphakathi kanjalo nalabo abagxeka umsebenzi osuwenziwe ukulungisa izinto kulesi sikhwama okwenzeka ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, ukuthi bapheze ukwenza lokhu.Uveze ukuthi abanezikhalazo bangakwazi ukuxhumana naye ngqo.“Sivuleleke kunoma ngubani ukuthi axhumane nathi uma enezikhalazo. Inhloso yethu sonke ukulungisa izinto ukuze izitshudeni zithole izimfanelo zazo.”

KUHLATSHWE ikhwelo emaqenjini angenele ukhetho lukazwelonke ukuthi ahloniphe isibopho asenzile sokuthi ukhetho luzoba nokuthula futhi luzobe lukhululekile.Lokhu kuvele esitatimendeni somhlangano oyisipesheli weKhabhinethi, njengoba ngenyanga ezayo kunokhetho lukazwelonke nolwezifundazwe ngoMeyi 29. Okhulumela uhulumeni uNksz Nomonde Mnukwa, uthe konke sekumi ngomumo ngalolu khetho njengoba neKhomishini yezoKhetho ibisayinisa abaholi bamaqembu izibopho zokuthi ukhetho luzoba nokuthula nokukhululekile.Uthe lesi sibopho kumele sihlonishwe njengoba sibeka imigomo okumele ilandelwe.“IKhabhinethi inxusa abantu ukuthi baphume bayovota, nokuthi kuzoba nokuthula ngesikhathi sokhetho. Njengoba izwe ligubha iminyaka engu-30 lakhululeka, kubalulekile ukuthi abantu baphume bayovota bakhumbule ukhetho lokuqala lwango-1994.” Khonamanjalo, i-IEC ithe isiwuqalile umsebenzi wokugaya amaphepha okuvota njengoba bengu-27.7 million abantu ababhalisele ukuvota.Lesi yisibalo esikhulu sabantu abake babhalisa kuleli selokhu kwaqala ngo-1999, ukusebenzisa umqulu wokuvota. Ikhomishini idalule embikweni wasePhalamende ukuthi inike amaqembu amelwe kule ndlu uR342 million onyakeni wezimali u-2022/2023.Iveze ukuthi amaqembu amane awazange anikwe ingxenye yemali yawo ngoba awazange ahambisane nemigomo edingwa ngumthetho olawula ukuxhaswa kwamaqembu, iPolitical Party Funding Act. La maqembu yi-African Independent Congress, Cope, NFP nePan Africanist Congress of Azania.Umgomo wePolitical Party Funding Act, udinga ukuthi amaqembu adalule abawaxhasa ngemali uma sebenikele ngemali esuka kuR100 000 kuya phezulu. Le mali kumele ayidalule ezinsukwini ezingu-30, enikelelwe. I-IEC ibe isishicilela uhlu lwamaqembu anikelelwe kanjalo nabaxhasi.Ikhomishini iveze ukuthi angu-537 amaqembu abhalisiwe kuleli. Angu-322 kuwo abhalise kuzwelonke kuthi angu-214, abhalise ezifundazweni.Angu-167 kwangu-537 amelwe ePhalamende naseziShayamthetho. Kuphinde kwavela ukuthi i-ANC iyona ethole imali eningi evela kwikhomishini njengoba ithole uR148 milllion. I-DA yona ithole uR62.7 million, kulandele i-EFF ngoR40.9 million, namanye amaqembu.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi bangu-14 889 abazobanga izihlalo okhethweni ekubeni izihlalo zingu-887, ezihlanganisa ezingu-400 ePhalamende, kuthi ezinye ezaseziShayamthetho zezifundazwe.Ikhomishini ivule iwindi lalabo abazobe besebenza noma bengekho lapho bevotela khona ngosuku lokhetho ukuthi bafake izicelo zokuvota ngokuyisipesheli.Leli windi livalwa ngoMeyi 3. Kulolu khetho ngeke uvunyelwe ukuvota lapho ungahlali khona.Ukuvota ngokuyisipesheli kuqala ngoMeyi 27 noMeyi 28.

INHLOKO yoMnyango weMfundo eyiSisekelo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Nkosinathi Ngcobo, isinxuse umphakathi ukuba ubambe iqhaza ulwe nenkinga yodlame ezikoleni nasemphakathini.Lokho kuza emva kwesigameko sangoMsombuluko ekuseni, lapho kudutshulwe kwafa uNksz Duduzile Khumalo, obefundisa uGrade R ePhikiswayo Primary, eNtuzuma, eThekwini.Isigameko senzeke emagcekeni esikoleni, lapho kugasele khona abalisa ababili abangaziwa, bazenza abazali bezingane ezifunda kulesi sikole, bavulela ngenhlamvu kuNksz Khumalo (46),  kubuka izingane zesikole, waphelela khona lapho.UNgcobo uvakashele isikole izolo, lapho efike wadlulisa khona amazwi enduduzo kothisha, wase ephonsa inselelo yokuthi umphakathi kube khona okwenzayo ukulwa nodlame emphakathini, oselukapakela nasezikoleni.“SiwuMnyango wezeMfundo sinazo izinhlelo zokuqinisekisa ukuphepha kwezikole, okuwukuqinisekisa ukuthi izikole zibiyeliwe, futhi sihlale sisebenzisana namaphoyisa ukulwa nobugebengu.“Nokho asikwazi ukwenza konke ngokwethu, sidinga umphakathi usilekelele ngoba izikole zethu zisemphakathini, ngakho sicela wonke umuntu abambe iqhaza ukubhekana nezinkinga ezinje esibhekene nazo,”’ kusho yena.Eqhuba, uthe bayazi ukuthi kunabazibuza ukuthi kungani onogada abagada ezikoleni bengabaningi, futhi bengahlomi ngezikhali zokuzivikela ebunzimeni obufuze lesi sigameko.“Inkinga edala lokho wukuthi asinawo umklamo wemali eyanele ukuqasha abantu abaningi, nokuthi asikwazi ukuvumela ukuthi onogada bezikole bahlome ngezikhali eziyingozi ngoba lokho kungabeka impilo yabafundi engcupheni, futhi kungaholela nasekutheni bangakhululeki emagcekeni ezikole,” usho kanje.Isolezwe lifika kulesi sikole, bekuyisikhathi sekhefu. Izingane bezizidlalela nje ebaleni phandle, ungaphika ukuthi kunesigameko esinjena esisanda kwenzeka emagcekeni esikole.Nokho sekuqale isithangami, ebesithanyelwe nawothisha bakulesi sikole, bebonakala ebusweni bengashongo lutho ukuthi baphatheke kabi ngokubehlele.Kuphethwe isithangami, kwaqhubeka nohlelo obese luvele luqalile, nobeluzothatha usuku lonke, nokweluleka abafundi nothisha, ukubasiza ukubhekana nokuvelile nabakubonile. Uthishanhloko wakulesi sikole, uMnuz Mthokozisi Mchunu, ubonge ozakwabo ngokuqina nokubhekana nalesi simo esinzima, wanxusa ukuthi baqhubeke nokuzikhandla basize izingane abazifundisayo zibe nekusasa eliqhakazile.

UMENGAMELI Cyril Ramaphosa usenxuse abantu ukuthi bangavinjwa uma befuna ukuyosebenzisa ilungelo labo lokuvota noma kunezikhalazo emphakathini.URamaphosa okhulume kanje emuva kokuvota esikoleni iHitekani Primary, eChiawelo, eSoweto, uthe uthemba ukuthi abezomthetho bazoqinisekisa ukuthi abantu bayakwazi ukuvota. "Ngithemba ukuthi abantu bazokwazi ukuvota noma kukhona abangeneme. Ngethemba ukuthi konke kuzohamba kahle ezweni lonke njengoba kuqhubeka ukuvota kuze kuvalwe izikhungo,“ kusho uRamaphosa  obehamba nowakwakhe uDkt Tshepo Motsepe.Uveze ukuthi unethemba lokuthi abantu bazophinde bayinike elinye ithuba i-ANC.Usho lokhu nje kwezinye izindawo okubalwa nase-Eastern Cape kunemibhikisho eqhubekayo abantu abangeneme ngokugqoza kwezidingo.Abanye babaholi bamaqembu ahlukene ezepolitiki bahlabe ikhwelo elifanayo lokuthi abantu abaphume bayovota. UMnuz Masego Sheburi, iphini lesikhulu esiphezulu seKhomishini yezoKhetho, utshele isiteshi sethelevishini ukuthi iningi labavoti liphuma ekuseni ukuyovota.Uthe ngokwemibiko abayitholile zimbalwa izehlakalo zokuphazamiseka kokuvota abebesabikelwa ngazo.Uhlabe ikhwelo kubantu ukuthi baphume bayovota njengoba izikhungo zivalwa ngo-9 ebusuku.Okunye okubaluliwe ngukuthi uma wenze iphutha ngesikhathi uvota, uyakwazi ukucela elinye iphepha lokuvota uphinde uvote.Kuchithwe njengamampunge ukuthi abesifazane abapende izinzipho abavunyelwe ukuvota njengoba kuxikizwa isithupha sabo ngo-inki.Laba okuzoshaya u-9 ebusuku besami kolayini ezikhungweni zokuvota bazovunyelwa ukuthi bavote baze baphele bonke kulayini.

IYAQONGA ingcindezi ebhekene noMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa yokuthi ajube uphiko oluphenya amacala athinta inkohlakalo, iSpecial Investigating Unit (SIU), ukuthi iphenye inkohlakalo kwi-National Skills Fund.Lesi sikhwama esingaphansi koMnyango weMfundo ePhakeme, sakhelwe ukuphucula amakhono nokuxhasa izinhlelo ezehlukene.I-DA, Fedusa nophiko lwentsha lwe-EFF bakhala ngenkohlakalo edla lubi kulesi sikhwama.Muva nje kuvele umbiko wokuthi kunemali ebalelwa ku-R123 million, eyakhwatshaniswa esikhwameni.UNkk Desiree van der Walt, iphini lomkhulumeli we-DA kwezemfundo ephakeme, unxuse uRamaphosa ukuthi ajube i-SIU ukuthi iphenye ngenkohlakalo kulesi sikhwama.Uthe le mali engu-R123 million eyadliwa, kusolwa ukuthi yathenga izimoto zikanokusho nepulazi.Uveze ukuthi le mali yayihlelelwe izinhlelo zokufuya onogwaja, kuqeqeshwe imiphakathi ngalokhu kufuya baphinde bayiswe kwamanye amazwe.“Sifuna i-SIU iphenye. Abathola lolu xhaso kuthiwa basebenzisa kuphela u-R1.6 million ohlelweni lokufuya. Sethemba ukuthi ungqongqoshe omusha emnyangweni uzobeka phambili izitshudeni ezidonsa kanzima, akhuculule inkohlakalo.” IFedusa igxeke inkohlakalo kulesi sikhwama yathi le mali bekufanele yenze izinhlelo zokuqeda indlala.Inxuse abezomthetho ukuthi babophe abakhwabanise imali yomphakathi.“Siyayigxeka eyokuthi imali ebihlele ukuphucula umphakathi igcine isiyenza okunye. Akubuyiswe le mali elahlekile ukuze ifakwe kwezinye izinhlelo.” I-EFFSC ithe ukwebiwa kwale mali kuphuca intsha ithuba lokuthola amakhono.Ithe kufanele kuboshwe abathintekayo, kuliwe nenkohlakalo ebuyisela izwe emuva.“Ngeke siphumule kuze kubanjwe abenzi bobubi. Kumele benziwe isibonelo labo okuyotholakala ukuthi babe neqhaza kule nkohlakalo.” OwayenguNgqongqoshe womnyango, uDkt Blade Nzimande, wakuveza ePhalamende ukuthi kunophenyo ababelwenza mayelana nokungacaci ukuthi washonaphi u-R5 billion kulesi sikhwama.Wajuba ithimba elaliphenya ngalokhu kunyamalala kwale mali eminyakeni emibili yezimali.Okhulumela uNzimande, uMnuz Veli Mbhele, ucashunwe kwiNewzroom Afrika, ethi ezinye zezinto seziphenywa abezomthetho ngakho akakwazi ukukhuluma ngazo.Uthe uNzimande usaya komunye umnyango wathi unethemba ukuthi uMnyango weMfundo ephakeme uzophawula maduzane ngalolu daba.

IQEMBU lezepolitiki i-IFP, KwaZulu-Natal selinxuse uhulumeni ukuthi amemezele  uThongathi, eThekwini, olukhahlanyezwe yisishingishane njengendawo yenhlekelele.Isishingishane esinamandla esihlasele esifundazweni ngesonto eledlule, sishaye kwazwela oThongathi kwacekeleka phansi imizi elinganiselwa ku-2 000, kwathi abantu ababalelwa ku-8 000 basala dengwane.UMnuz Les Govender,  oyilungu le- IFP esiShayamthetho, usenxuse uMphathiswa eMnyangweni wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana KwaZulu-Natal uNkk Bongiwe Sithole-Moloi noNdunankulu kulesi sifundazwe uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube ukuthi bamemezele indawo yasoThongathi njengeyehlelwe yinhlekelele. Bangu-12 abantu okuthiwa badlule emhlabeni.“Emva kokuhambela ezinye izindawo ezikhona oThongathi okuyiSandfields, Faibreeze, Magwaveni, Newtown, Sea Tides,  Greylands nakwezinye, kubonakele ukuthi zikhahlamezekile, ngakho sikholelwa  ukuthi uhulumeni kumele anikeze okokufihla amakhanda ngokushesha emphakathini osale ungenamakhaya. Le nhlekelele eyenzeke oThongathi iveze ubuthaka ngasekulungiseleleni ukubhekena nezimo ezifuze lezi nokuhlela nje ngokubekwa kwezakhiwo,” usho kanje.Uthe kufanele kube namaqhinga okungenelela ezimeni ezinjengalezi, kungaba athinta imvelo noma noma ingqalasizinda ukuqinisekisa ukuphendula ngokushesha uma kwehla umshophi nokugwema ukubambezeleka.  Le nhlekelele idale ukuphazamiseka kokuhanjiswa kwamanzi nokuphakelwa kukagesi  kodwa iMeya kuMasipala weTheku, uMnuz Molisi Kaunda ebihambele khona ngoLwesihlanu, iqinisekise ukuthi abasebenzi baphansi phezulu ukubuyisela isimo kwesejwayelekile.Okhulumela uphiko lwezibonelelo zikahulumeni, i-South African Social Security Agency KwaZulu-Natal, uNksz Sandy Godlwana, uthe u-R4 968 700 yimali esetshenziswe wuphiko ukwelekelela abehlelwe yinhlekelele oThongathi.“Abasebenzi  bamatasa ukuqinisekisa ukuhlinzeka ngokudla okuphekiwe nsuku zonke, kubagilwa abangu-2001, ukuhlinzeka ngezingubo zokulala, izimpahla zezingane, omatrasi nokunye okubalulekile, ” kusho uNksz Godlwana.

NKOSIKHONA CELELikhuthaza abantu abasha ukuba bayothekela ulwazi ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme, ibandla labasindisiwe iKingdom Life Ministries International (KLMI).Lokhu kugcizelelwe ngumholi webandla uMphostoli Lungi M, obekhuluma kwiCareer day ebihlelwe yibandla eCurries Fountain, eThekwini.Phakathi kwezikole ebezikhona kubalwa uMkhunbane High, Charles Sabela Secondary, Menzi High neZwelibanzi High."Siyabakhuthaza abantu abasha ukuthi uma sebephothule ibanga leshumi bahambe beyoqhuba izifundo zabo ezikhungweni zemfundo ePhakeme,'' kugcizelela uNksz Lungi M.Umphathi wabantu abasha ebandleni uNkk Yolanda Mambulu, uthe bakholwa ukuthi uba nekusasa eliqhakazile umuntu omusha ohlome ngeziqu zemfundo ephakeme.UNkk Londeka Mzobe, obemele iNyuvesi yakwaZulu Natal (UKZN), ukhuthaze abafundi ukuba bangabi madolonzima ukufaka izicelo kulesi sikhungo. Uthe bagxila kakhulu kulabo bafundi abasuke bephase kahle ebangeni leshumi.UNkk Mzobe uqhube wathi isikhungo yisona sodwa esinezifundo ze-Agricultural Engineering. Wathi i-UKZN inomlando ojulile futhi ihlanganisa iminyaka ewu-124 sasungulwa eKwaZulu Natal.UNksz Nokwanda Malinga, obemele iDurban University of Technology (DUT), unxuse abafundi ukuba basheshe bazifake izicelo ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme.UNksz Xolisile Masikane, osebenzela iMakhophila Training uthe bagxile ekucijeni kakhulu amakhono abantu abasha. Uthe uma kukhona abantu abasha abanentshisekelo yokuziphilisa ngamakhono abo mabasondele kubona.Inkosi uMzamo Buthelez, yeNkatha Freedom Party (IFP), iphonsele abantu abasha inselelo yokuba babhukule, balwele ukuphila impilo engcono futhi bagweme izidakamizwa nezifo ezithathelanayo.

IMEYA yaseJozini uMnuz Naye Mathe iseveze ukuthi ukushiyela kubaholi bomdabu ukubheka nokugadwa kokulungiswa komgwaqo obekunzima ukulungiswa kwawo endaweni yaseMakhonyeni, eJozini.Lo mgwaqo uzolungiswa nebhuloho elaziwa ngokuthi iMtshazi bridge, okuvela ukuthi bekunzima ukuwela kulo.Echaza ngesimo saleli bhuloho uMathe uthe, njengoba sekuyiwa esikhathini sasehlobo nje impilo yomphakathi wakule ndawo ibizoba nzima ngenxa yemvula ebizodala ukuthi banganyakazi.“Lo mgwaqo sangenelela sawulungisa kungenzeki lutho kuwo, ubusungcono manje yize uwubhuqu, kodwa ukufaka ibhuloho kwasiza kakhulu. Manje ngizokwethula usonkontileka ozofaka itiyela kuwo, ukuze kuthi ngoDisemba ube ususebenza ngenxa yokuthi awumude kakhulu. Umsebenzi lona womphakathi esithemba ukuthi abaholi bomdabu sosebenza nabo kahle ukuze uphele. Kuzoqashwa abantu bakhona la endaweni ukuze kube khona abakutholayo,” kusho uMathe.Uthe kuzothatha izinyanga ezimbili kuphela ukuwuqeda futhi uzodla imali engango R1.2 million.Uveze ukuthi uyaziqhenya ngemisebenzi ayihlabela amasoyi engena ekubeni uMeya nezothulwa ekuqaleni kwaleli sonto.

KULUKHUNI satshe kwabakuleli abahlala emazweni akhungethwe yizimpi abafuna ukuvota okhethweni lwangenyanga ezayo.Abahlala emazweni akhungethwe izimpi kuzofanele bayovota emazweni angomakhelwane ngenxa yokuthi amanxusa akuleli asethuthile emazweni abahlala kuwo.Emazweni abhekene nale nkinga kukhona i-Israel elwa neHamas eGaza, bese kuba iRussia elwa ne-Ukraine.Abanye balabantu abazange bakwazi ukubhalisela ukuvota ngenxa yezimpi eziqhubekayo.UNgqongqoshe wezoBudlweno naMazwe oMhlaba, uDkt Naledi Pandor uthe zikhona izinhlelo zokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi bonke abafuna ukuvota bayalithola ithuba lokuvota."Zikhona izinhlelo esizenzile. Abafuna ukuvota bangaya emazweni angomakhelwane. Uma uhlala e-Israel, akhona amahhovisi enxusa eRamala. Sifuna kungabi khona umuntu ongezolithola ithuba lokuvota,“ kusho uNgqongqoshe Pandor.UPandor uthe bajabule ngesibalo esiphezulu sabantu abahlala emazweni angaphandle ababhalisele ukuvota."Emhlanganweni engibe nawo ne-IEC (Independent Electoral Commission), bangitshele ukuthi siphezulu kakhulu isibalo sabantu abahlala emazweni angaphandle ababhalisele ukuvota. Kungokokuqala emlandweni ukuba sibe nesibalo esiphezulu kanje," esho.Lo Ngqongqoshe ubekhuluma esithangamini nabezindaba ebesibizwe ikomiti le-ANC elibhekelele ezobudlelwano namazwe angaphandle.Leli komiti lishayele ihlombe imizamo kahulumeni wakuleli yokudala ukuthula ezwenikazi i-Afrika nasemhlabeni jikelele.UPandor uthe uhulumeni wakuleli wenza umsebenzi oncomekayo ngesikhathi umangalela i-Israel, enkantolo yamazwe omhlaba.Uthe lesinyathelo sasifanele njengoba ekhale ngokuthi i-Israel ibulala abantu abangenacala eGaza.“Isinqumo esathathwa uhulumeni wakuleli sihambisana nesibophezelo esasisayina eGeneva Convention lapho sazibophezela khona ukuthi ngeke sivume ukuthi kube nezwe elizobulala abantu. Asikwazi ukusonga izandla kubulawa abantu eGaza.“Asikwazi ukuthula kucindezelwa abantu eGaza. Nathi sike saphila ngaphansi kwengcindezelo, siyazi ukuthi kunzima kangakanani. Amazwe omhlaba aselekelela ngesikhathi silwa nengcindezelo. Ingakho nathi silekelela labo abacindezelekile,” kuqhuba uPandor. UPandor uthe bayazama ukuxazulula impi ephakathi kwiRussia ne-Ukraine kanti bafuna ukuhlalisa phansi abaholi balamazwe, kukhulunywe ngalempi esidonse isikhathi eside."Kuningi esesikwenzile ukuzama ukuxazulula impi. Njengamanje sisesigabeni lapho sesikulungele ukuhlanganisa zombili izinhlangothi. Sifuna ukuba nomhlangano ozohanjelwa izona zombili izinhlangothi," ephetha.

UMASIPALA wesiFunda iMajuba usuqale izinhlelo  zokulungisa ingqalasizinda yamanzi njengoba usuqashe nenkampani yonogada ezoqapha izindawo eziphakela amanzi emphakathini ongaphansi kwalo mkhandlu.Lo msebenzi wokulungisa isimo samanzi ngaphansi komkhandlu uzinze eRamaphosa Settlements, eDannhouser.  Kulindeleke ukuthi  uphothulwe ngoNovemba wonyaka ozayo.UMkhandlu uzosebenzisa uR178 million ngalolu hlelo oluzosiza umphakathi waseRamaphosa nezinye izindawo.Imeya yoMkhandlu, uMntwana uNdabuko Zulu, yethule  izinhlelo zamanzi kumalungu omphakathi muva nje. Ithe umkhandlu uphoqeleke ukuthi ubeke eceleni uR45 million wokukhokhela inkampani yonogada ejutshiwe ukuba iqaphe amapayipi amanzi nayo yonke ingqalasizinda.“ UR45 million uzokhokhelwa inkampani yonogada. Ngabe siwusebenzisa ezinkingeni zamanzi kodwa kumele sikubeke phambili ukugadwa  kwamapayipi amanzi imini nobusuku, ngenxa yokuthi kubabantu abantshontshayo ezindaweni eziphakela amalungu omphakathi. Siyanxusa ukuthi nezinduna ukuthi  zisilekelele ukukhuthaza abantu ukuthi akukuhle ukuntshontshwa kwamapayipi engqalasizinda yamanzi,” kusho uMntwana uZulu.Umsebenzi uqale ngoJanuwari njengoba uzophothulwa ngoNovemba wonyaka ozayo.Ngawo kuvuleke amathuba omsebenzi angu-50.Umphakathi wakule ndawo uke wavuka indlobane ukhala ngokunakwa ngezikhalo zawo zamanzi nangezikhulu zomkhandlu ebezingatholakali uma sekumele zichaze ngohlelo lwamanzi. UMnuz Richard Zungu oyilungu lo mphakathi waseRamaphosa eDurnacol, uthe ukungabi  namanzi bekwenza impilo ingabi lula neze."Umphakathi uke  wacasuka kakhulu ngenxa  yezikhulu ezazingatholakali ukuba zichaze ukuthi kwenzakalani ngamanzi. Okunye okwabacasula kwaba ukuthi uMeya uZulu wathi kubo sebakhe imijondolo bayiqamba ngoRamaphosa ngoba becabanga ukuthi bazosheshe bakhelwe izindlu. Lokho kwabacasula kakhulu. Nokho sihabule namhlanje ukuthi ukukhala kwethu kuzwakele futhi namanzi sesizowathola namathuba emisebenzi," kusho uZungu.

IMEYA yeTheku, uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda, ikhwele yadilika kumakhansela amaqembu aphikisayo, yathi into ayaziyo ukusonga izandla agxeke, awafuni umasipala uzenzele ngokwawo imali.UKaunda uthe ayikho imali ezovele iqhamuke phezulu njengemana yaseBhayibhelini futhi uyazi ukuthi la maqembu ngeke akuvotele ukuphasiswa kwesabelomali.Uphawule kanje emuva kokwethula isabelomali esihlongozwayo sikaR67.3 billion.Amaqembu aphikisayo okubalwa kuwona i-ActionSA, IFP, DA ekhale ngobunzima obuzothwalwa ngabantu kusukela ngoJulayi1.Athe kumanje zimapeketwane izinto eThekwini, yini lena ezobe ikhokhelwa abantu ngoba abazitholi izinsiza kumanje? Abalule inkinga kagesi, eyamanzi, ukuqowa kukadoti nokunye. INational Freedom Party ne-EFF babonakale behambisana nokuningi ebekade kwethulwa uKaunda enkulumweni yakhe.“La makhansela ahlala phansi akhononde ngezingqinamba ezikhona kwingqalasizinda kodwa awafuni ukuba umasipala uzenzele ngokwawo imali ukuze ubhekane nalezo zinkinga. Ayikho imali efana nemana, ezokwehlika phezulu izohlala emkhandlwini,” kusho uKaunda.UKaunda uphakamise ukuthi imali kagesi ikhushulwe ngo-14%, eyamanzi ngo-14.9%, eyokuthuthwa kwendle ngo-12.9%, ukuqoqwa kadoti emakhaya ngo-8% kumabhizinisi ngo-9%.Uthe uphiko lwezokuHlaliswa kwabantu bazolwabela uR1.44 billion, bakhe izindlu ezingu-1 638.“Siyazwelana nabantu, yingakho sinanomgomo othi bonke labo abangakwazi ukukhokhela izinsiza abazithola kumasipala sibafaka ngaphansi kohlelo lokungakhokhi. Asifuni ukufaka ingcindezi enkulu nakosomabhizinisi. Ngakolunye uhlangothi, isabelomali sethu kumele sikwazi ukwenza izidingo zomphakathi,” kusho uKaunda.Ukuphikile ukuthi uMasipala waseThekwini ucwile ezikweletini ngakho ukuboleka kwabo uR1.5 billion abakuhlongozayo kuncane uma kuqhathaniswa nokweminye imikhandlu emikhulu kuleli.

UNGENE enkantolo eqhutshwa ngamaphoyisa emoyizela, egcwele injabulo owesilisa osolwa ngokuklinya abulale ingane yakhe wayilahla ehlathini KwaNdengezi.UMnuz Siyabonga Shezi waseNtshongweni, eThekwini, ubekade evele eNkantolo yeMantshi yasePinetown.Uthweswe icala lokubulala indodana yakhe eyayineminyaka eyisishiyagalombili, uSifundo Sibisi, ngoJanuwari 2023. Umufi wayephasele uGrade 4 esikoleni samabanga aphansi, Umthala Primary.UShezi ungene enkantolo wahlala phansi ebhokisini labasolwa, kwathiwa akasukume ame ngezinyawo.Ube eseqala eqalaza izinhlangothi zonke wagcina edonse amehlo eMantshi J Goorie.Imantshi ibe isibuza uShezi ukuthi kungani ekhwishizela, ebheka emuva nasemaceleni?Uphendule wathi ukhumbule umndeni wakhe, manje uyaqalaza ukuthi ukhona yini enkantolo ukuzomeseka.Imantshi ibe seyibuza kubantu abebekade bethamele icala ukuthi ukhona yini oyisihlobo sikaShezi, kwaphendula ngokuphakamisa isandla owesilisa obekade ethwele isigqoko enkantolo.Le ndoda iyalelwe yiphoyisa ukuthi isuse isigqoko ekhanda.Iqhubelike imantshi yatshela uShezi, yathi nasi isihlobo sakhe, ufuna ukuthini kusona, waphendula ngokuthi ufuna ukubingelela.Unikeziwe leyo nkululeko uShezi wabe esephenduka ebheka ngakusona wathi: “Sawubona mfowethu, unjani? Basaphila ekhaya? Ubatshele ukuthi ngiyabakhumbula,” kusho Shezi emoyizela.Imantshi ibe isimkhumbuza uShezi ukuthi kusenkantolo lapha, akaziqoqe, azihlele kahle bese egxila entweni ezelwe khona.Kwenzeka konke lokhu nje, unina kaSifundo, uNksz Nonhlanhla Sibisi, ubebukeka ekhathazekile, ecwayiza engaqedi ethule du enkantolo.Ubegqoke isiklibha esimhlophe ebekade sinobuso bukaSifundo sinamagama athi “Uphumule ngokuthula.”Kulesi siklibha bekufaswe kusona nesipeletu ebesinesithombe somholi webandla lakwaShembe eBuhleni, uMnuz Mduduzi “uNyazilwezulu” Shembe.Bekulindeleke ukuthi kuqale ukuqulwa kwecala izolo, kodwa uShezi wathi usafuna ukufaka kabusha isicelo sebheyili. Lokhu ukusho ngomlomo wakhe kwafakazelwa nawummeli, uMnuz Mfanunje Dlamini.Phambilini uShezi wayekade eyibongile ibheyili.Imantshi ibe isikubekela uLwesibili oluzayo ukulalelwa kwesicelo sebheyili, yathi akukuhle ukulokhe kuhlehla icala.Ngaphandle kwenkantolo uNksz Sibisi uphimise amazwi athi: “Uma kwenzeka kanjena (icala limi ndawonye), kuvele kuthi angiyiyeke phansi yonke mina le nto.”Ube esefulathela abantu akade emi nabo isikokela, abebekade bezomeseka enkantolo, wayoncika odongeni wakhihla esikaNandi.Nabebekade bezomeseka bagcine sebechiphiza izinyembezi, bethi kubacasulile okwenziwe uShezi ehleka, bamsola ngempakamo nokungazisoli.Phambilini, uNksz Sibisi watsheka Isolezwe  ukuthi uShezi wasonga wathi uzombulala umufi ngenhloso yokumfundisa isifundo.UNksz Sibisi usola ukuthi uShezi wabulala ingane ngoba wayengafuni ukwamukela ukuthi ucu alusahlangani.

IKHALE kakhulu ngesihlava sokubulawa kwabesifazane imantshi ethe sesiphenduke insakavukela ngesikhathi igweba udilikajele owesilisa waseLindelani owasoconga intombi yakhe.UMxolisi Mvula (32) kuthiwa wangqubuza odongeni intombi yakhe, uNksz Phindile Mkhize (21) amahlandla ayisikhombisa waze washona.Isigameko senzeka ngoDisemba 2, 2022 eLindelani, uMvula ecikwa ukuthi umufi wayekade engalalanga kuyena ngayizolo njengoba babekipitile.Ngemuva kokuba esemngqubuze odongeni, kuthiwa waqhubeka wamgxoba umufi eselele phansi waze wakhihliza amagwebu.Ngemuva kwalokho kuthiwa uMvula wabaleka kodwa amaphoyisa agcina embambile.Wafaka isicelo sebheyili kodwa inkantolo yamnqabela ikhala ngokuthi izizathu zokuyicela azibekile azenele ukuthi angayithola.Izolo iNkantolo yeMantshi yaseNtuzuma imgwebe udilikajele ngecala lokubulala ngenhloso.IMantshi uMohamed Motala ikhale ngesihlava sokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane yathi kumele sinqandwe. Ithe lesi sihlava siyethusa indlela esesisabalele ngakhona ezweni lonke.Ithe ukuze sizonqandwa kumele abantu abenza isenzo esifana nesikaMvula bagixabezwe ngezigwebo zodilikajele ukuze nabanye bezofunda."Isigwebo sikadilikajele yisona esikufanele ngenxa yonya olukhombisile ubulala umufi. Uma zizoqina izigwebo zabahlukumeza abesifazane nakanjani sizokwehla isibalo sokuhlukunyezwa kwabo,'' usho kanje.Iqhuba, ikhale ngokuthi uMvula kusukela ekuqaleni ubengakaze akhombise ukuzisola ngakwenze kumufi."Umsebenzi wenkantolo wukufaka imfundiso kulabo abasuke bonile ngethemba lokuthi bayofunda emaphutheni abo ngokuhamba kwesikhathi. Ngeshwa akukho esingabe sisakwenza kulabo abasuke sebebulewe,'' isho kanje.Ngemuva kwesigwebo, uMvula obegqoke ijakhethi emnyama obebonakala ebheke phansi, usukumile waqalaza emuva ebantwini abebekhona wase eyehla. Akukho akushilo kubona.Abomndeni kamufi bambukile babonakala sebekhala beduduzana.UMshushisi uKaystree Ramshamujh ufunde incwadi ebhalwe ngunina kamufi, uNkk Vuyile Mkhize echazela inkantolo ngokuthi kwamlimaza kanjani ukubulawa kwendodakazi yakhe.Kuyona uveze ukuthi usephila ngokuphathwa yikhanda elingapheli futhi elingasalapheki ngenxa yokuthi ucabanga njalo selokhu kwabulawa uPhindile.Uthe wayazi ukuthi kuyogcina kuphume isidumbu kulobu budlelwano bendodakazi yakhe noMvula.Uthe yingakho aze ambiza uMvula wamtshela ukuthi ukugwema lokho mabahlukane nendodakazi yakhe kodwa washaya phansi ngonyawo uMvula.Kuyona uveze ukuthi umufi uyena obeyithemba lempilo engcono njengoba wayesemusha, bekholwa ukuthi uzoba nekusasa eliqhakazile. Uthe manje sekungumsebenzi wakhe ukukhulisa ingane kamufi ayishiya ineminyaka emithathu.

AFUNA ukuxegiselwa umbandela webheyili othi angalubhadi eHillcrest lapho kuhlala khona ummangali ongusomabhizinisi, uMnuz Thabiso Ngcobo, amaphoyisa alishumi ayamaniswa nokuzama ukumbulala.Wonke la maphoyisa angaphandle ngebheyili ka-R5000 enemibandela.Kulokhu bonke bebezifihlile. Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi phambilini kwaba nemibuzo ngokuzifihla kwephoyisa elidume ngokuqotha izigebengu ngenhlamvu nalo elingumsolwa kuleli cala, uPedro Rodiguez (44).Amaphoyisa abekwe icala lokuzama ukubulala. Kuthiwa adubula imoto kaNgcobo esigamekweni okuthiwa senzeka emgwaqweni uM13 ngasePinetown.Izolo eNkantolo yeMantshi yasePinetwown, ummeli wamaphoyisa, uHenry Van Breda utshele iMantshi, uWendalynn Robinson ukuthi abasolwa bacela ukuxegiselwa omunye wemibandela yebheyili."Umbandela wokuthi amaphoyisa angalubhadi eHillcrest ngoba kungalapho kuhlala khona ummangali awumubi futhi bazimisele ukuwuhlonipha. Kodwa inkinga ngombandela ukuthi uphazamisa ukusebenza kwamaphoyisa,'' kusho uVan Breda.Uqhube wathi njengoba amaphoyisa esaqhubeka nokwenza umsebenzi wawo umbandela wokuthi kube khona indawo angakwazi ukufinyelala kuyona ukhinyabeza ukusebenza kwawo."Bangichazelile ukuthi abasazi ukuthi benzenjani uma kuvela izimo eziphuthumayo ezibaphoqa ukuba bayosebenza kule ndawo. Ngiyanxusa ukuthi lo mbandela uhoxiswe ukuze basebenze ngokukhululeka,'' kunxusa uVan Breda.Uthembise ukuthi eminye imibandela amaphoyisa azimisele ukuyigcina njengoba injalo.IMantshi ithe ngeke iwuhoxise lowo mbandela ngoba uyingxenye enkulu yemibandela yebheyili. Yathi ayiboni kungumqondo ophusile ukuhoxiswa kwawo."Kungakuhle uma ningase nikhulume nabaqashi benu nibazise ngesinqumo senkantolo esihambisana nombandela webheyili yenu. Uma nenza kanjalo ngikholwa ukuthi akukho okuzoniphazamisa ekusebenzeni kwenu,'' kusho iMantshi.Icala lihlehliselwe uNovemba 15 njengoba kuvela ukuthi kunolunye uphenyo olusaqhutshwa.

KUGQUGQUZELWE osomabhizinisi ukuba bafake izicelo zemali yokuqala noma ukukhulisa amabhizinisi abo esikhwameni esibizwa ngeMasisizane Fund esibhekelele kakhulu amabhizinisi asemakhaya nasemalokishini.Isikhulu esiphezulu seMasisizane Fund, uMnuz Ndumiso Zulu, sithe selokhu baqala ukusiza osomabhizinisi ngo-2007 ngoba bafuna ukuba yingxenye yokuthuthukiswa komnotho ezindaweni zasemakhaya nasemalokishini.Uthe baxhasa amabhizinisi aphethwe ngabamnyama, abesifazane, abantu abasha nabantu abakhubazekile.Amabhizinisi axhaswayo yilawo azoletha uguquko oluhle emakhaya nasemalokishini.Wenze isibonelo sokuthi uma endaweni yangakini abantu behamba ibanga elide ukuyokwenza igilosa, ungacela uxhaso lokuletha isitolo segilosa, ubachazele ukuthi uzoyidayisela bani nokuthi uzoqasha abantu abangaki nokunye okusuke kuqukethwe ezinhlelweni zebhizinisini.“IMasisizane Fund yasungulwa yu-Old Mutual kanti ayibaxini osomabhizinisi ukuba basheshe babuyise imali. Iyabalinda ukuthi benze inzuzo ngaphambi kokubakhokhisa imali ababolekwe yona. Uxhaso lwethu lufana nokuthi uboleka imali kodwa asinayo imicikilisho eminingi njengamabhange nezinye izikhungo ezibolekisa ngemali. Okwethu wukuqinisekisa ukuthi ibhizinisi liyawakha umqondo futhi lizongenisa imali,” kuchaza uZulu.Uveze ukuthi imali ebolekwa osomabhizinisi iqala kuR250 000 iye kuR20 million kodwa kubhekwa izidingo zebhizinisi uma kukhishwa imali.“Uma ufuna ukuletha isitolo segilosa ngakini, imali oyibolekwayo ngeke ilingane neyomuntu ofuna ukudayisa amakota esikoleni. Siye sibheke izidingo zebhizinisi bese sikhipha uxhaso oluzolekelela usomabhizinisi ukuba afeze izinhlelo zakhe,” kusho uZulu.Uthe abadinga uxhaso bangavakashela  u-https://www.oldmutual.co.za/business/solutions/masisizane/ balandele okushiwoyo ukuze bathole uxhaso.

UKUSEBENZISANA nokwakha ubudlelwano besikhathi eside ngezinye zezinto okucetshiswe amaciko abesifazane ukuthi azenze ukuze achume eminxeni eyahlukene yezokulingisa.Lokho kuvele emcimbini wokucobela abesifazane abasafufusa kule mboni ngamacebo okuchuma, iWomen’s Month Industry Engagement, ebiseKZN Tourism and Film, eMusgrave, eThekwini ngoLwesihlanu.Esinye sezikhulumi zosuku, i-series producer yeRhythm World, uSinini Mati weluleke abesifazane ukuthi bajwayele ukusebenza ndawonye kule mboni ukuze bathuthuke emisebenzini yabo.“Ukusebenzisana singabesifazane kuzosiza ngokuthi imicabango namacebo enu nenifisa ukukwenza nokukukhiqiza kule ndima kuphumelele, njengoba kwenza abesilisa esibona kuyibo ababambe iqhaza emidlalweni eminingi yethelevishini. Nathi uma singabambisana singenza njengabo,”’ kusho uSinini.Eqhuba, ucebise nangokuthi amaciko asafufusa, ikakhulu anemicabango yemidlalo ethile nanoma yini okunye acabanga ukuthi kungaba wusizo kule ndima, angesabi ukubathinta eRhythm World, evubele Umkhokha, Sibongile and The Dlaminis, Muvhango, Komkhulu neMy Brother’s Keeper, ukukha phezulu.Umbhali nomqondisi wamafilimu nemidlalo yethelevishini, uLindokuhle Mthimkhulu, yena ugqugquzele abesifazane ukuthi bangagabi ngethalente lemvelo kuphela, kepha bazihluphe nangolwazi lwalo mkhakha ukuze babe sethubeni lokuchuma.“Lokho ngikwazi ngami ngoba kuyangisebenzela ukuthi ngiwufundele lo mkhakha, okwenza ngingagxili entweni eyodwa kuwona ukuphila, ngoba ngikwazi ukwenza imisebenzi eminingi eyahlukene endimeni, ngakho nabanye ngibona kungabasiza ukwenza kanjalo kubhekwe phambili,”’ kucebisa uLindokuhle.USimphiwe Buthelezi weMoses Kotane Institute, yena uhlabe akubize ngesihlava sokumonelana kubantu besifazane bebodwa. Uthe uma bengayeka lowo mkhuba bengaya kude nempilo.“Kanjalo nokukhuthalela ukuhambela imicimbi efuze lona esikuwona manje ngenye yezinto esiza ukwakha ubudlelwano obunganisiza ukuthuthukisa amakhono enu,” usho kanje.Ezinye izikhulumi zosuku bekungomqondisi wemidlalo yethelevishini uNombuso Buthelezi, uphrojusa wamafilimu uPortia Ndudane, umqondisi wamafilimu uMinenhle Luthuli nemenjenya yophiko lwezokucwaninga eKZN Film, uNgqabutho Bhebhe.

INYUNYANA yamaphoyisa, iSouth African Policing Union (Sapu), idonse ngendlebe uNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa omusha, uMnuz Senzo Mchunu, ukuthi angalinge aphume emzileni wakhe wokuba ngungqongqoshe.ISapu ikusho lokhu izolo ngesikhathi yamukela uMchunu kulesi sikhundla emva kokuqokwa kuso nguMengameli wezwe, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa, ngeSonto.Oyibamba lokhulumela iSapu kuzwelonke, uMnuz Jabu Mabena, uthe kuzofanele uMchunu angagxambukeli emsebenzini wamaphoyisa njengoba ukusebenza kwawo kungesiwo umsebenzi wakhe.“Ukusebenza kwamaphoyisa kubhekene nokhomishana wawo kuzwelonke. Asimfuni uNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa ozoziphathisa okukakhomishana wawo,” kusho uMabena.Nokho uveze ukuthi bayabethemba ubuholi bukaMchunu njengoba beke basebenzisana kahle naye ngesikhathi esengungqongqoshe woMnyango weziSebenzi zikaHulumeni nokuPhatha.UMchunu waphatha lo mnyango phakathi kuka-2019 no-2021.“Indlela ayewuphethe ngayo lo mnyango, ebonisana nezinhlaka ezifanele, yadlala enkulu indima ekuxazululweni kwezithinta izisebenzi zikahulumeni. Sasithi uma sidingida izingqinamba naye kwiPublic Service Co-ordinating Bargaining Council (PSCBC), wayekhombisa ukuthi uyindoda ongayethemba,” kuchaza uMabena.Isikhundla esithathwa nguMchunu besiphethwe nguMnuz Bheki Cele kusuka ngo-2018.UMabena uphinde wathi bayakwemukela ukuqokwa kukaDkt Pieter Groenewald njengoNgqongqoshe wezobuLungiswa nokuHlunyeleliswa kweziMilo.Uthe uDkt Groenewald akamusha kangako emkhakheni wezokuphepha njengoba eke waba yingxenye yekomiti lamaphoyisa ePhalamende.“Sifuna ukumnika ithuba ukuthi azibonakalise amava akhe eMnyangweni wezobuLungiswa nokuHlunyeleliswa kweziMilo. Ziningi izingqinamba kulo mnyango. Inkinga yokugcwala ngokweqile kwamajele akuyona yodwa into esifuna ayisebenze ngokushesha, siphinde sibe nenkinga yokushoda kwezisebenzi kulo mnyango,” kusho yena.Uthe isibalo seziboshwa ezibhekwa wujele ngamunye eNingizimu Afrika siyazedlula izibalo ezibekiwe ngokusemthethweni nokwenza kube nzima ukuthi ojele benze umsebenzi wabo ngendlela.Lo mnyango othathwa nguDkt Groenewald ubuphethwe nguMnuz Ronald Lamola iminyaka eyisihlanu kusuka ngo-2019.Okhulumela inyunyana yamaphoyisa, iPopru, uMnuz Richard Mamabolo, ekhuluma neNewzroom Afrika, uthe bona abasinaki kakhulu isiqu somuntu.“Esikhathazeke ngakho thina ukuthi iSAPS izokushintsha kanjani ukwenza kubhekwe phambili ngoba ibe nezingqinamba eziningi,“ kusho uMamabolo.Uthe okunye okubakhathazayo ukuthi amaphoyisa awakaze abe nokhomishana wawo kuzwelonke osiqedayo isikhathi asuke esibekelwe ukuthi asihlale ehhovisi. “Leyo nto ibanga ukuthi lungabi khona uzinzo kwezokuphatha. Ukuqokwa kwakhe (uMchunu) kufike ngesikhathi amaphoyisa ebhekene nesihlava sokubulawa kwawo, ukungabibikho kwezinsizakusebenza kanjalo nobuhixihixi ekukhushulweni kwamaphoyisa ezikhundleni,” kusho yena.Uthe uthola iphoyisa lihlala esikhundleni esisodwa kuze kuphele iminyaka eyishumi.“Konke lokhu sifuna kulungiswe, okufaka phakathi nokubuyekezwa kwendaba yemali yezokuphepha kwamaphoyisa, okulokhu kudonsa ngonyawo lonwabu kusuka ngo-2003,“ kusho uMamabolo.

IFOLOSA ngentsha, abefundisi bamahlelo ahlukene, izishoshovu ebezihola imikhandlu yezitshudeni, abaholi bomdabu, izazi zomthetho, amaciko, abaphila nokukhubazeka, abathandana nobulili obubodwa kanjalo neminye imikhakha iqembu Umkhonto weSizwe ePhalamende naseziShayamthetho zezifundazwe.Kuye ngokwamagama enkehli omholi waleli qembu uJacob Zuma, owayengumengameli wezwe kanjalo ne-ANC.UZuma wayekuveza njalo uma ekhankasela ukhetho ukuthi leli qembu lizohluka kunamanye uma sekujutshwa amalungu ePhalamende naseziShayamthetho.Wayekusho engahlonizi ukuthi kumele abaholi bomdabu babe sekhaleni lokuya ePhalamende.Lokhu kugqame kuleli sonto ngesikhathi kufungiswa amalungu amasha ePhalamende amele leli qembu eKapa.Kwabafungisiwe kukhona abefundisi bamahlelo ahlukene, abaholi bomdabu, ababekwi-ANC, kanjalo nalabo ababekwi-ANC Youth League.Kukhona nosopolitiki abebenamaqembu abo okubalwa uMnuz Andile Mngxitama weqembu iBLF.Kukhona nenkosi yesizwe samaKhoi-San, uDkt Glen Taaibosch, uMbhishobhi uDkt Nokwethemba Mtshweni, uMfundisi Lungisani Shangase wase-United Congregational Church of Southern African KwaMashu, uMnuz David Skosana odume ngelikaMazolman owayekhulumela iqembu lebhola iSuperSport United FC ongumyeni ka-Advocate Busisiwe Mkhwebane owakhishwa kwesikaMvikeli woMphakathi. U-Advocate Mkhwebane uyilungu lePhalamende elimele i-EFF.Omunye wabafungisiwe owayengumholi wentsha ye-ANC eHarry Gwala, uMnuz Sibonelo Nomvalo, uMnuz Kwenzokuhle Madlala owayesemkhandlwini wezitshudeni eMangosuthu University of Technology. Omunye wabafungisiwe uNksz Nompumelelo Gasa osebuholini baseMatthews Meyiwa Zone, eHammarsdale, kuwadi 7 eThekwini.Uthe njengomuntu osemusha uzogxila ezintweni ezithinta imigomo nasezintweni ezithinta ukukhuliswa komnotho nokwakha amathuba emisebenzi.

KUKHALWA ngabokufika abaphendule inhlekisa inhlokodolobha yaKwaZulu-Natal, uMgungundlovu, ngokwakha imijondolo phakathi edolobheni.Imijondolo ekhalisayo yakhiwe engxenyeni yedolobha ebizwa ngeSomalia, ephakathi kwimigwaqo uWest noPietermaritz Street.Le ngxenye yedolobha igcwele kakhulu izitolo zabokufika.Izindlu eziningi sezinwetshiwe, umasipala ukhala ngokuthi akuzange kulandelwe imithetho ngesikhathi zinwetshwa.IMeya yoMasipala waseMsunduzi, uMnuz Mzimkhulu Thebolla, uthe le ndawo isiphenduke yaba ikwampunz’ edla emini.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi benomkhankaso wokuyobheka ukuthi imithetho yomkhandlu iyalandelwa yini.UThebolla uthe abafike bakuthola kule ndawo kubashaqisile.“Bengihlezi ngizwa kuthiwa kukhona indawo okuthiwa kukwaMachanca, bengingakaze ngiyibone. Sithole imijondolo la. Le mijondolo idlula lena ekoGomora, nakwezinye izindawo, itholakala edolobheni. Lapha abantu bazakhele nje angazi ukuthi bakha kuphi. Abantu kufanele bazi ukuthi kunemithetho lana.”UThebolla ufunge ngokuthi bazothathelwa izinyathelo osomabhizinisi abaphambana nomthetho.“Njengoba silapha asizile nje ukuzokhuluma, sizobuya sesihamba nazo zonke izinhlaka zomthetho. Sifuna ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi akekho umuntu ozokhala ngokuthi kunyathelwa amalungelo akhe. Sifuna ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi umthetho uyalandelwa eMsunduzi. “Sifuna ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi imithetho yomkhandlu iyalandelwa. Sibonile ukuthi enye yezindawo lapho edolobheni ezinenkinga yokulandelwa kwemithetho. Abantu bazenzela umathanda, imithetho ayilandelwa nhlobo.”UThebolla uthe zikhona izinyathelo abavele sebezithathele osomabhizinisi abaphula imithetho.“Akusikhona okokuqala sifika lapha. Sekunesikhathi siqhuba umkhankaso wokuhlola ukuthi imithetho iyalandelwa yini. Akhona amabhizinisi esesiwavalile ngoba sithole ukuthi enza okuphambene nomthetho. Njengoba besilapha besisaqhubeka kulokho.”Le ndawo ihlezi igcwele izimoto eceleni komgwaqo. UThebolla uthe bazoqala uhlelo lokuthi izimoto ezima kule ngxenye yedolobha ziyakhokha.“Nakuba lungakabi bikho uhlelo lokukhokhela ukupaka lapha eMsunduzi, kodwa sizokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi izimoto ezima lapha ziyakhokha. Sizoqala nje silungise izindawo zokuma izimoto.”UThebolla uthe basazogasela nakwezinye izingxenye zedolobha.Uthe bafuna ukuthi amabhizinisi abuyele ebantwini abamnyama.“Kunezinto nje ongalindele ukuthi zenziwe abanye abantu, ezingenziwa ugogo Dlamini. Sifuna ukuthi umnotho ubuyele ebantwini.”

SIDIDEKILE esinye sezikhulu zikaMasipala waseJozini kwezokuXhumana esingasaholi njengoba sithi lokhu kwenzeka ngoba senqaba "ukujabulisa" uMnuz Mfananaye Mathe oyiMeya kuloMasipala.UNkk Sinenhlanhla Mthembu waseMthunzini, eMpangeni ugeqe amagula ngakubize ngokuhlukumezeka kwakhe athe bekuvela kwimeya, uMathe athi kwasuka ekutheni wathi kumele nakanjani "amjabulise''.Uthi akazange aqonde ukuthi uma ekhuluma ngokumjabulisa ukhuluma ngokocansi noma ufuna amnikeze imali.Ngokusho kwalo wesifazane, ukuhlukumezeka kulo masipala uqale ukukuthola ngesikhathi esanda kuwujoyina ngo-2021."IMeya uMathe yangitshela emehlweni ukuthi yona ufuna ukujatshuliswa yimina. Lento eqala ukuyisho ngangizitshela ukuthi uyadlala.“Kodwa kuthe uma eqhubeka eyisho ngaqaphela ukuthi uyisho nje akadlali,'' kusho uNkk Mthembu.Ngokusho kwakhe uthi lo myalezo wawuthola esesibhedlela futhi egula kakhulu nokuyikhona okwenza ukuthi aphuze ukuthi awuthole."Lo myalezo ngawuthola emva kwesikhathi ngenxa yokuthi ngangigula kakhulu. Kuthe sengizama ukubuyela kuyena wathi mangingabe ngisazihlupha futhi mangimane ngicishe inombolo yakhe ocingweni lwami naye futhi uzokwenza kanjalo,''echaza.Uthi kusukela lapho impilo imane yanzima kakhulu ethola ukuhlukumezeka okungapheli emsebenzini. "Kusukela lapho bengihlukunyezwa ngize ngizibuze ukuthi ngoneni le engaka,'' ebalisa.Uthi kuthe esababaza ukuhlukunyezwa akutholayo ehhovisi lemeya wabona ephepheni sekukhangiswe ngomsebenzi wakhe ukuthi kudingeka ozowenza.''Ngempela wafika ozokwenza umsebenzi wami, mina kwathiwa mangiphume ehhovisi ngibone ukuthi ngisebenzela kuphi ngaphakathi ebhilidini likamasipala. “Kusukela lapho-ke bengisebenza ngaphandle kwehhovisi. Ngigcine sengiduba ngase ngithatha isinqumo sokuba ngimane ngisebenzele emotweni,'' usho kanje.Ukhala kakhulu ngokuthi umholo wakhe kawusangeni ekubeni esangumsebenzi kamasipala. Uthe uzamile ukuxhumana nabengamele izindaba zabasebenzi ngaphakathi kodwa kwanhlanga zimuka nomoya.Utshelwa ukuthi kunomyalelo wokuthi umholo wakhe awungaphumi, kodwa isizathu asicaci ngoba akaxoshiwe futhi akukho nkundla yokuqondiswa kwezisebenzi ayihambayo. Uthi utholile ukuthi imali yakhe ayingeni ngenxa yokuthi waxabana nemeya, kodwa wenqaba ukulandisa kabanzi ngokuthi lokho ukuzwe ngobani.Uveze ukuthi udaba useludlulisele kwaCCMA bazohlangana khona ngesonto elizayo.Leli phephandaba linawo amaphepha aqinisekisa ukuthi udaba lwalo wesifazane nemeya bazohlangana enkantolo yabasebenzi ngoLwesine. Eziphendulela uMathe uthe wayezoze acele ukujatshuliswa umsebenzi nje yingobani? Uthe yena njengomeya akanalo ilungelo lokuthi angaxhumana nomsebenzi.Wathi futhi akazi ukuthi kunomsebenzi osekuphele izinyanga imali yakhe ingangeni. "Ukube kukhona into enjengaleyo ngabe sekufinyelelile ezindlebeni zami,'' usho kanje.

NJENGOBA seluseMome ukhetho lukaZwelonke oluzocacisa ngabazohola uhulumeni, imeya yakumasipala i-Alfred Duma, ukhansela Zama Sibisi, unxusa ukubekezelelana kumalungu amaqembu.USibisi usho lokhu ngesikhathi ethula izinhlelo zentuthuko zesabelo mali sika-2024/25 emphakathini waseMnambithi. Umcimbi ubuseLadysmith Indoor Sports Centre muva nje.“Noma ngabe sihlukene ngokwamaqembu epolitiki kodwa lokho akusishintshi ukuthi sisengamalungu omphakathi futhi azanayo. Izikibha zamaqembu esisuke sizigqokile siyazikhumula uma sesilala, siqhubeke sibe amalungu omphakathi ajwayelekile. Sinxusa ukubekezelelana kukhona konke esikwenzayo,” kusho uSibisi.USibisi wethule izinhlelo zomsebenzi zesabelo mali esingaphezu kuka-R70 million. Uthe kumanje bamatasa balungisa amabhuloho nemigwaqo. Uveze ukuthi kukhona nalapho ugesi ubingekho khona abamatasa nokuwufaka ezindaweni zasemakhaya.“Asigcinile lapho siphinde silekelele abantu abasha abaphothule esikoleni abangakayitholi imisebenzi ukuthi bakwazi ukuzithuthukisa. Abanye sibakhokhela izikweletu zabo zalapho bebeqeqeshwa khona ukuze bakwazi ukuthweswa iziqu ezisuke zivinjwe yizikweletu abanazo. Akudingi ukuthi umuntu ajuluke efuna usizo kumasipala njengoba abaningi bazifikela mathupha ehhovisi lemeya bathole usizo. Siphinde sathatha isinqumo sokuthuthukisa osomabhizinisi abancane ngokubanika ama-Voucher okuthi bakwazi ukuqhubeka namabhizinisi abo,” usho kanje.Kosomabhizinisi abancane uMasipala ukhiphe iVoucher ka-R300 umuntu emunye, kwahlomula osomabhizinisi abangu-1 500. Kuphinde kube nemali elinganiselwa ku-R1,4 million yokuthuthikiswa kwamakhono, uR10 million wokuvula amathuba omsebenzi nokunye.Uqhube wathi izinselelo abanazo ukuthi uma kunemisebenzi esuke yenziwa emphakathini kubuye kube nezinkinga zokuthi kuphazamiseke ukusebenza. Lokho uthe kudalwa wukuthi umphakathi usuke nezikhalo ngendlela okuqashwa ngayo kwesinye isikhathi. Ngalokho uthe akasho ukuthi umphakathi awungakhali uma ubona kukhona okungahambi kahle kodwa akube nendlela okhala ngayo kungaphazamiseki ukusebenza.Kuwona lo mcimbi bekukhona nogaqele isikhundla sokuba nguNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uKhansela Thambi Ntuli. UNtuli ophinde abe nguSihlalo wenhlangano ephethe omasipala iSalga, uthe iyamkhalisa indlela okwabiwa ngayo imali kuhulumeni. Uthe omasipala okuyibona abanomsebenzi omningi wokuthuthukisa umphakathi banikwa u-9% kuphela kwisabelo mali bese uhulumeni wesifundazwe uthole u-40% kanti uhulumeni omkhulu unikwa u-51%.

IMEYA entsha yaseThekwini, uMnuz Cyril Xaba, ithi izakhamuzi zifanelwe ukuthola okungcono kunalokhu ezikuthola kulo mkhandlu-dolobha oyisizinda somnotho waKwaZulu-Natal.UXaba unxuse ubuholi bomkhandlu ukuba bubhukule, wathembisa ukuthi ngeke abaphoxe abantu baseThekwini.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ethula inkulumo emva kokufungiswa kwakhe. UXaba ukhethwe emhlanganweni womkhandlu oyisipesheli obuyizolo.UMasipala waseThekwini ukhungethwe izinkinga okukhona kuzo eyokuhlupha kwamanzi nogesi nokungcola kwedolobha.UXaba uthembise lukhulu ngesikhathi ethula inkulumo yokwamukela isikhundla.“Akusiyona into encane ukujutshelwa esikhundleni esikhulu kangaka. Ngiyazibophezela ukuthi ngeke ngibenzele phansi abantu baseThekwini. Ngizosebenzisana nezinhlaka ezehlukene ukuze sizokwazi ukuthuthukisa iTheku. Maningi kakhulu amathuba okukhula lapha eThekwini.”UXaba uthe uzogxila ekuthuthukiseni ingqalasizinda yamanzi neyokuthuthwa kwendle, wathi akwamukelekile ukuthi kube nabantu abahlala isikhathi eside bengenawo amanzi.“Sifuna ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi amanzi awahluphi.”UXaba uthe bazohlanza inkaba yedolobha ngenhloso yokuheha osomabhizinisi ukuba babuye. Uthe bazokulwa nenkohlakalo, wathi bafuna ukuthi nabasebenzi bomkhandlu babhukule.“Ngeke sibabekezelele abantu abangafuni ukwenza umsebenzi. Sizolandelela ukuthi izikhulu zomkhandlu ziyayenza yini imisebenzi ezavuma ukuthi zizoyenza.”UXaba uthe abantu ngeke bavunyelwe ukwakha ezindaweni ezijwayele ukukhahlamezwa izikhukhula, wathi umkhandlu uzoqinisa umkhankaso wokunika abantu izindawo eziphephile zokwakha.UXaba ubekade eyilungu lePhalamende, ngaphambi kwalokho wayengumphathiswa wezoLimo.Uthe uwulungele umsebenzi, wathi unaso isipiliyoni esifanele.“Sengiphathe izikhundla ezehlukene kusukela ngo-1994. Ngaqala ukuphatha izikhundla ngineminyaka engu-27. Sengiphathe izikhundla iminyaka engaphezu kuka-30. Le nto yezikhundla ayiyintsha kimi.”UXaba ukhethwe engaphikiswa muntu. I-ActionSA ibiphakamise igama lekhansela le-DA, uMnuz Thabani Mthethwa, onqabile ukungenela umjaho wesikhundla, ekhala ngokuthi abe-ActionSA abazange baxoxe naye ngaphambi kokuthi baphakamise igama lakhe.USomlomo weTheku, uMnuz Thabani Nyawose, uthe ukuqokwa kukaXaba engabangiswa kusho ukuthi kunobumbano emkhandlwini.“Kungokokuqala ukuthi imeya ikhethwe ingabangi namuntu. Lokhu kusho ukuthi sesiqala isigaba esisha lapha emkhandlwini. Kusho ukuthi sesibumbene, sikhuluma ngazwi linye.”Phambilini, amaqembu aphikisayo amakhulu, i-DA, IFP ne-EFF, abeyaye ezame ukuhlanganyela i-ANC, kodwa izolo abonakale eyinhlakanhlaka.Umhlangano umiswe izikhawu ezine, amaqembu ecela ukunikezwa isikhathi sokuyohlanganisa amakhanda.Umasipala wasala ungenayo imeya emva kokususwa kukaMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda, oseyilungu loMkhandlu weziFundazwe.

YIZE iningi lihlala libalisa ngokugqoza kwemishado kodwa ebandleni lamaNazaretha yinto engakhulunywa leyo njengoba kushada izinkumbi zabantu minyaka yonke.Lokhu kufakazelwe yimishado yamaNazaretha elinganiselwa ku-1 800 ebiseBuhleni ngempelasonto njengoba bekuvalwa umhlangano kaJulayi. Kuphinde kwayiwa eSipholi (ebhentshini) kwakhethwa izintombi ezilinganiselwa ku-5000, kwabhabhadiswa abantu abalinganiselwa ku-10 000.Okhulumela inkosi Mduduzi Shembe uNyazilwezulu, uMnuz Thokozani Mncwabe, uthe yinto eyenzeka minyaka yonke le njengoba imishado iphuma uma kunguJulayi kuleli bandla.Echaza ngemfihlo yokuba nemishado eminingi ngalolu hlobo, uthe kungenxa yezimfundiso zamaNazaretha ngokubaluleka komshado.“Emhlanganweni wezinsizwa u-23, kulapho inhlalisuthi ilulekwa khona ngokubaluleka komshado. Ku-14 okungowomama nakhona iyadingidwa eyomshado bese kuba wu-25 wezintombi lapho zilulekwa ngokubaluleka komshado. Uma ungasinelwe uyinsizwa ziningi izinto ezikudlulayo, ngisho kugcotshwa abashumayeli nabefundisi awunikwa lelo thuba. Noma ungaganile akulula ukuthola ithuba lokuthi ube ngumholi ebandleni. Yingakho amaNazaretha ewubona ubalulekile umshado,” kusho uMncwabe.Ecacisa ngohlelo lomshado nokukhethwa kwezintombi okuyinto ebiyenzeka ngempelasonto, uMncwabe uthe awukho umshado obusiswa kuleli sonto kungalotsholiwe, futhi esigcawini semishado kuya izintombi nto eziqala ngokuthi ziyohlolwa ubuntombi bese zibonakala ngechashaza elimhlophe esiphongweni ukuqinisekisa ubuntombi bazo.“Njengoba bekushadwa ngeSonto, zonke izintombi bese zihloliwe zanikwa inansuka (indwangu eluhlaza ezimboza ngayo ikhanda). Inansuka itholakala esontweni kuphela futhi inikwa umuntu oseyintombi nto ozoshada. Izintombi ezisuke zizoshada uzibona ngayo. Noma ngabe sekushadiwe ngokohlelo lwenkonzo kusuke kumele ukuthi zingapheli izinyanga eziyisithupha ungalukhiphanga udwendwe. Lokho kungenxa yokuthi noma ungashada ngokwesonto kodwa aniyi ocansini lungaphumanga udwendwe. Nakhona kugqugquzelwa ukuthi kusheshe ukuze ningaweli esonweni niye ocansini lungaphumile udwendwe, ngoba nisuke senihlanganisiwe njengendoda nomfazi,” usho kanje.Uthe uma kufike usuku lodwendwe nikwazile ukuziphatha kahle nishadiswa wuMfundisi futhi nencwadi yomshado iyaphuma khona ebandleni ngoba kukhona uMfundisi onemvume yokushadisa. Uthe uma kufike usuku lodwendwe intombi ingasaphelele, ushadiswa wuMvangeli okuyinto angayithandi amaNazaretha.Umlingisi woMkhokha: The Curse, uMnuz Kini Shandu ngomunye wabashadelwe ngohlelo lwamaNazaretha eshada noNksz Andile Khanyile ngempelasonto.Uthe ujabule kabi ngoMaKhanyile futhi kube yisibusiso kuyena nasemndenini wakhe ukufika kwalesi sikhathi.“Sengilobolile ngiqedile. Udwendwe lungoDisemba kulo nyaka. Ngijabule kakhulu futhi nomndeni wami ujabule ngokwenzekile. Kuyisifiso sabo bonke obaba ukuthi uma benamadodana aganwe,” kusho uShandu.Ebuzwa ukuthi uzomthatha yini unkosikazi wesibili njengoba kuke kwenzeke ebandleni lamaNazaretha, uthe okwamanje akuyona into ayicabangayo.“Kungaba yisibusiso engingeke ngisinqabe uma kungenzeka abekhona owesibili. Kungabe sibusiswe sobabili noMaKhanyile ngoba kungabe kungowethu sobabili uma efika,” usho kanje.UMncwabe uthe ibandla lamaNazaretha likholelwa kuNkulunkulu futhi kuba yisinqumo somuntu ngamunye ukuthatha unkosikazi wesibili.“Uma uMfundisi eshadisa kunombuzo ongasali, wokuthi nishada umshado wabantu noma okaNkulunkulu yini. Uma nishada okaNkulunkulu kusuke kusho ukuthi uzoba nonkosikazi oyedwa. Uma uthe ushada owabantu kusho ukuthi uzomthatha unkosikazi wesibili,” ubeke kanje.

SIBEKELWE imibandela eqinile isikhungo i-Educor, nguNgqongqoshe weMfundo ePhakeme uDkt Nobuhle Nkabane, obuyisele okwesikhashana ukubhaliswa kwaso ngaphansi komnyango wakhe njengoba sase sikhishiwe. Lesi sikhungo esinamakolishi amane akhishwa ngaphansi kwabhalisiwe owayenguNgqongqoshe walo mnyango uDkt Blade Nzimande, ngenxa yokungayilandeli imibandela ebekelwe izikhungo zemfundo.Amakolishi athintekayo kulokhu yi-Damelin, City Campus, Icesa City Campus ne-Lyceum College.UDkt Nkabane uthe uzobuyisela okwesikhashana ukubhaliswa kwe-Educor, uma izohlangabezana nayo yonke imigomo nemibandela yeCouncil on Higher Education (CHE), ngaphambi kokuqala uhlelo lokufunda nokufundisa.Uthe okunye ngukuthi kumele isikhungo silethe umbiko wokusebenza kwaso njalo ngenyanga emnyangweni.“Kumele izinhlelo zokufunda nokufundisa zibe sezingeni. Kumele kulethwe umbiko zinyanga zonke obandakanya izitatimende zokusebenza kwemali, izibalo zezitshudeni ezibhalisile kanjalo nezinye izimfanelo.” Uthe njalo ngekota kumele isikhungo silethe umbiko oveza ukuthi kunozinzo ngasemalini.“Kumele kube nokuvuleleka ngasemabhukwini athinta imali. Uma kukhona izinselelo lesi sikhungo kumele sisheshe sikubike lokhu emnyangweni.” Uthe banqume ukubuyisela ukubhaliswa kwaso okwesikhashana ngoba bengafuni kuphazamiseke izitshudeni ezibhalise khona.“Kumele ngikucacise ukuthi ukubuyiselwa kwaso okwesikhashana njengesikhungo esibhalisiwe, akusho ukuthi sekuyaphela ngohlelo lwezomthetho oluqhubekayo phakathi kwesikhungo nomnyango. Nginalo ilungelo lokuhoxisa isinqumo sesikhashana uma kungukuthi imibandela engiyibekile ayilandelwa,” kugcizelela uDkt Nkabane. Uthe bazimisele ngaso sonke isikhathi ukweseka izikhungo ezilandela imigomo kahulumeni.Le migomo uthe ibekelwe ukuvikela izitshudeni nokuqinisekisa ukuthi zithola imfundo esezingeni.UNzimande ngesikhathi ehoxisa ukubhaliswa kwesikhungo wakuveza ukuthi kusuka ngo-2012, bebesinxenxa ukuthi silungise izinto eziningi ababekhala ngazo.Ezinye zazo ukungalethi imininingwane yokusebenza kwemali, bekukokotelwa isibalo sezitshudeni njengoba izibalo bezishayisana, ukungakhokhelwa kwabasebenzi kanjalo nezinye izinto.Ukubuyisela ukusebenza kwesikhungo kuzosiza izitshudeni ebezingazi ukuthi zizoziqedelaphi iziqu zazo.

UZOBHALISA kwiNHI emtholampilo, kudokotela noma esibhedlela esinenkontileka ne-NHI uma uqala ukuya khona, ngemuva kwalokho ngeke kudingeke ukuthi ubhalise, uma uya kunoma yimuphi omunye umtholampilo, udokotela noma esibhedlela ngoba amarekhodi akho azobe esetholakala kubo bonke abahlinzeka ngezempilo abanenkontileka. Ngabe abantu bazokwazi ukusebenzisa izinsiza abazithandayo?Yebo.  Abantu bazokwazi ukuthola odokotela abanenkontileka ye-NHI, emitholampilo noma izibhedlela eziseduze nabo, kungakhathaleki ukuthi ezikahulumeni noma ezizimele.Yiziphi izinsiza ezizohlinzekwa ngaphansi kwe-NHI?I-NHI izokhava inzuzo yosizo lwezempilo oluphelele ezikhungweni zezempilo ezinenkontileka ye-NHI zikahulumeni nezizimele.Ama-Medical Aid ngeke avumeleke ukuthi akhave inzuzo ekhavwe iNHI uma isiqalile ukusebenza kodwa izibhedlela ezizimele zizoqhubeka zibe khona.Uma zisize iziguli zizokhokhelwa iNHI njengoba kwenza ama-mediacal aid njengamanje. Ayisezukubakhona imali okumele ikhokhwe isiguli eceleni ebizwa ngama-levy nama co-payments.

IMIDLINZO nokunukana ngokuthakatha emndenini, kutholakala amathambo ‘kababa wekhaya’, ehlathini eliseduze komuzi wakhe okuthiwa besekuphele iminyaka ewu-15 kwabikwa ukuthi unyamalele.UMnuz Themba Njapha (87) waseNkanyisweni, eMbumbulu, kuthiwa umndeni bewusumcinge wahlanza ngedela kusuka ngoNovemba 2009, kanti ubesenzelwe ngisho imicimbi yesintu yokumkhuphula.Ngesonto eledlule, ligaye ngomunye umhlathi emndenini wakwaNjapha, umzingeli okuthiwa ubezicuphela izinyamazane ehlathini elisendaweni esawa ngezansi komuzi, ezithela phezu kwamathambo elaliswe ehlokozini, wahlaba umkhosi.UMnuz Dalisu Njapha ongowomndeni, uthe basondelile ukuzozibonela isimanga, bathola ukuthi izinsalela nebala ezikayise emva kokubona izimpahla ayenyamalale ezigqokile.“Wayegqoke ibhulukwe lesisosha, isikibha esibomvu namabhuzu. Yize isikibha besingasabonakali kahle, kodwa ibhulukwe namabhuzu bekugqamile okwenze kwabalula kithina ukubona ukuthi amathambo akhe. Sizolinda imiphumela yolibofuzo njengoba kuthathwe igazi kwamanye amalungu omndeni, nakuba singangabazi ukuthi wuye,” usho kanjeUveze ukuthi atholwa nje, kuvele kukhona ukubhekana ngeziqu zamehlo phakathi kwemindeni yoyise njengoba yakhelene, kanti kunezinsolo eziqinile zokuthi abesendlini kayise omncane kukhona abakwaziyo ngokunyamalala kukayise, aveze ukuthi umgilwa unguyise omdala olamana namzalayo. Kuthiwa yomithathu imizi yoyise yakhelene kangangoba ihlukaniswe wuthango, kanti isimo sibe muncu kakhulu emva kokutholwa kwamathambo.Elandisa Isolezwe ngezinsolo abanazo, uthe ngosuku olwandulela okwalahleka ngalo umufi, emzini kayise omncane kwakunomcimbi owawungaqondakali, kufike izangoma. Kwathi ngakusasa umufi wanyamalala wangaphinde watholwa, wathungathwa kwaze kwayekwa.Ugcizelele ukuthi okuqinisa izinsolo ezithi wabulawela endaweni okutholakale kuyo amathambo - okukholakala ukuthi awakhe - iyenyukela kakhulu, njengoba eminyakeni ayesekuyo wangesenawo amandla okuhamba endaweni enjalo ngenxa yokukhula. Uveze ukuthi kunesipikili esingene ethanjeni, nocingo abasola ukuthi waboshwa ngalo, kanti izinsalela zitholwe zidindilizile, okukhombisa ukuthi wayengagqitshiwe.Uthe emva komhlangano womndeni awubize ngo-Ephreli kulo nyaka - ohlanganisa izindlu ezintathu zoyise - zaqina kakhulu izinsolo zokuthi wenzakaliswa.“Kulowo mhlangano, kwavela ukuthi izangoma ezazikhona zazizoqinisa igceke ngoba kuthiwa kunomuntu omubi emndenini obathakathayo. Bathi bacupha kanti izangoma zaveza ukuthi owenza lokhu kukhona okuzomehlela, okuthe ngakusasa kwanyamalala ubaba,” kusho yena.Uthe okubadidayo ngisho sekutholwe amathambo, uyise omncane akazange alubhade ukuzobabaza nje ekubeni sekunguyena kuphela koyise osadla anhlamvana.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa aseMbumbulu, avule idokodo lophenyo ngokufa komuntu.

Kufanele azinuke amakhwapha amaqembu asale ngaphandle ngesikhathi kwabiwa izikhundla kuhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal nasesiShayamthetho.Nakuba iningi lamaqembu ameleleke esiShayamthetho libaliwe ngesikhathi kuqokwa ikhabhinethi lesifundazwe, amaqembu amabili, i-MK ne-EFF awatholanga lutho.La maqembu awazange alibone elidlalayo ngesikhathi kuqokwa undunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, uSomlomo wesiShayamthetho sesifundazwe uNksz Nontembeko Boyce, nePhini likaSomlomo wesiShayamthetho uNksz Mmabatho Tembe.Laba baholi abaqokwayo baqhamuka kwi-IFP, ANC neDA.Nangesikhathi uNtuli ememezela ikhabhinethi lesifundazwe, i-MK ne-EFF abazange bavele ngoba ikhabhinethi lakhiwe abaholi be-IFP, ANC, DA ne-NFP.I-IFP ithole izikhundla ezithe xaxa futhi inabaholi abane abangabaphathiswa. Labo oMfundisi Musa Zondi ophethe uMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho, uMfundisi Thulasizwe Buthelezi oseMnyangweni wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana kanye neziNdaba zoMdabu, uNkk Thembeni kaMadlopha-Mthethwa woMnyango wezoLimo, noMnuz Mntomuhle Khawula okwezamaSiko nezeMidlalo.I-ANC ithole izikhundla ezintathu. UMnuz Siboniso Duma uzophatha uMnyango wezokuThutha nokuHlaliswa kwaBantu, uNksz Nomagugu Simelane usazoqhubeka nokuphatha uMnyango wezeMpilo bese kuthi uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka engamele ezeMfundo.IDA icoshe iminyango emibili ewele kuMnuz Francois Rodgers kwezeZimali, noMnuz Martin Meyer eMnyangweni wezeMisebenzi yoMphakathi.I-NFP ithole isihlalo esisodwa esisezandleni zikaNksz Mbali Shinga, ophethe uMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi.Imiphumela yokhetho KwaZulu-Natal ibiphoqa ukuthi kube nohulumeni wokubambisana ngoba alikho iqembu elathola izihlalo ezanele ukuthi libuse ngokuzimela.Lena yokubusa ngokubambisana KwaZulu-Natal, ayiyintsha njengoba ngaphambili sekuke kwabambisana i-IFP ne-ANC.I-MK iyona enezihlalo eziningi esiShayamthetho njengoba inezingu-37 kwezingu-80, i-EFF inezimbili.Njengeqembu elathola izihlalo eziningi esiShayamthetho, iMK bekulula kuyo ukufuna abazoyeseka ukuze ikwazi ukuphatha KwaZulu-Natal. Sekusemlandweni ukuthu leli qembu lichithe isikhathi esiningi liziba eyokwakha uhulumeni, lalibala ukukhononda ngemiphumela yokhetho.Kuyimanje kunecala eliseNkantolo yezoKhetho, lapho iMK ifuna ukuthi kuchithwe imiphumela yokhetho lwangenyanga eyedlule.Umhlaziyi wezepolitiki oseNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Zakhele Ndlovu, uthe iMK ibizoshaya ngamaphiko kuhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal, ukube yasheshe yasukuma.“Njengoba i-IFP inikezwe izikhundla ezine ekubeni yathola izihlalo ezingu-15 okhethweni, lokhu kusho ukuthi iMK ibizothola okungenani izikhundla eziyisithupha.“AbeMK kufanele bayiqaphele le nto ingagcini isibaqhatha bodwa. Uyabona kuyimanje ngiyazi ukuthi abantu abaphezulu ohlwini lwe-MK bayasho ukuthi ngabe lezi zikhundla ziphethwe yibo.”UNdlovu uthe ubona amaqembu ayingxenye kahulumeni wobumbano ecazelene kahle izihlalo.“Indlela okucazwe ngayo izikhundla ihambisana nezihlalo ezatholwa yila maqembu ngesikhathi kunokhetho. I-IFP ithole izikhundla eziningi ngoba iyona enezihlalo eziningana kulaba esebenzisana nabo.”I-ANC iyona enikezwe iminyango ethola isabelo esibhekile uma kwabiwa izimali KwaZulu-Natal.Esabelweni sanonyaka esiwu-R150 billion, uMnyango wezeMfundo wathola imali eningi, wabelwa uR63 billion, ulandelwa uMnyango wezeMpilo owathola uR53 billion.UMnyango wezokuThutha walala isithathu, wathola uR13 billion.UNdlovu uthe kungenzeka ukuthi i-ANC icushiwe njengoba inikezwa le minyango.“Mhlawumbe bafuna ukubona ukuthi izowakhipha ngendlela okuyiyo yini amathenda. Njengoba i-DA iphethe uMnyango wezeZimali, iyona ezogada ukuthi amathenda akhishwa ngayiphi indlela.”I-IFP ikwazile ukuthola iminyango ebalulekile, ikakhulu owezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho, nowezokuBusa ngokuBambisana kanye neziNdaba zoMdabu.UNdlovu uthe uMnyango obaluleke kakhulu kwetholwe i-IFP owezokuBusa ngokuBambisana kanye neziNdaba zoMdabu.“Ikakhulukazi njengoba u(Mfu Thulasizwe) Buthelezi (uMphathiswa womnyango) engundunankulu kaZulu. Lo mnyango uzomxhumanisa namakhosi.”UNdlovu uthe akayizwa kahle eyokuthi uMnyango wezokuPhepha koMphakathi ufakwe ngaphansi kwehhovisi likaNdunankulu.“Umsebenzi omkhulu indaba yokuphepha komphakathi. UNdunankulu unomsebenzi omkhulu wokuhola ikhabhinethi omhlalele. Angiboni ukuthi uzokwazi ukuzibhanqa kahle zombili lezi zinto.”Njengoba usuqokiwe uhulumeni wesifundazwe, umsebenzi wokuhambisa izidingo kubantu kufanele uqale ngokushesha.Laba baholi abaqokiwe abaqhamuka emaqenjini ahlukene kufanele bakhohlwe ukungaboni ngaso linye obekukhona phakathi kwabo ngesikhathi kukhankaselwa ukhetho.Lona umyalezo owagcizelelwa nguNtuli ngesikhathi ethula ikhabhinethi.“Sinomsebenzi omkhulu wokwakha kabusha iKwaZulu-Natal. Ngiyazi ukuthi ngesikhathi sikhankasela ukhetho sasinemiqulu yezethembiso zokhetho eyehlukene. Kodwa-ke manje sekuyisikhathi sokuba sibeke phambili izidingo zabantu baKwaZulu-Natal.
