Sonke sibhekeke ukuba sisebenze ngokwethembeka nangokucophelela.”Mkhulu umsebenzi ohlalele ikhabhinethi laKwaZulu-Natal elisha.Kule minyaka eyedlule isifundazwe sibhekane nezinkinga eziningi okubalwa ukuhlasela kwezikhukhula, izibhelu zokuzitapela, nokubheduka kobhubhane iCovid-19.

IHLALELE ovalweni imindeni enamathuna afakwe amatshe asemathuneni eZwelethu eMlaza ngokucekelwa phansi kwawo.Ngokuthola kwaleli phephandaba kunowesilisa okungaziwa noma uhlala emijondolo eyakhiwe eduze kwamathuna noma uqhamuka kwenye indawo, okuthiwa  ufika ephethe isando aphihlize noma iliphi ithuna alithandayo.UNkk  Ntombifuthi  Xaba,  onelungu lomndeni elingcwatshwe kula mathuna, uthe yena nomndeni wakhe bebeye emathuneni beyohlanza ithuna likadadewabo ongcwatshwe khona, izolo bafica inqwaba yamatshe ecekelwe phansi."Sizithele komunye umuntu naye onelungu lomndeni elingcwatshwe kuyo le ndawo, wathi usehlale efika ezobheka ukuthi ithuna lesihlobo sakhe alicekeliwe yini phansi. Uthe useke wafica indoda  iphihliza amathuna ngesando. Uthe waya emahhhovisi kamasipala  aziwa ngoSizakala aseMlaza wayobika kodwa akasizakalanga. Bathi izindaba ezithinta amathuna aziqondene nabo akazame ikhansela," kusho uNkk Xaba.Uqhube wathi okubaphatha kabi ukunganakwa kwamathuna akule ndawo."Mina nginamalungu omndeni angcwatshwe eWentworth, eMerebank kanye nakhona la eZwelethu. Kulawa amanye amathuna kunonogada abagade esangweni. EZwelethu akukho nogada, abantu bazingenela noma ikuphi ngoba ukhonkolo okubiywe ngawo omunye webiwa kwasala izikhala ezinkulu okungangena kuzo nemoto. UMasipala weTheku sifisa ukuthi ungenele, uqashe onogada noma uqhamuke nendlela yokuvikela amathuna. Amatshe amathuna ayabiza. Uma senililungisile niwumndeni niye nizitshele ukuthi niqedile,"  kusho uNkk Xaba.Uphendula kulokhu umasipala, uthe: “Lolu daba belungakabikwa ngokusemthethweni kuMasipala weTheku. Umasipala ukhathazeke kakhulu ngendlela yokuziphatha enobugebengu. Sinxusa imindeni enamathuna acekelwe phansi ukuthi ibike lolu daba emaphoyiseni, ukuze  kuboshwe abenzi bobubi. Siyasigxeka lesi senzo esiwukungahloniphi indawo yabantu abalele.”

LIZOBUYELA ngoMeyi 9, eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMzimkhulu, icala lowesilisa (20) osolwa ngokubulala ngesihluku isaguga saseClydesdale, eMzimkhulu, ngeledlule.Kuthiwa isidumbu sikaNkk Nokubonga Rose Memela (89) sitholwe sishisiwe egumbini lakhe lokulala ngoLwesibili, kanti kusolwa ukuthi umsolwa ovele enkantolo ngoLwesine, uqale wamdlwengula umufi ngaphambi kokuba amklinywe aphinde amshise.Umzukulu kagogo, uNksz Vuyokazi Memela othe namanje basasezinhlungwini, uthe umsolwa ubabulale bephila ngokubulala ugogo wakhe ngesihluku.“Sithandazela ukuthi kwenzeke ubulungiswa njengoba umsolwa eboshiwe. Into asenze yona singumndeni ibuhlungu. Ugogo ubefana nomama kithi, ubeyikho konke,” kusho uNksz Memela.Uchaze umufi njengomuntu obewusizo emphakathini, waveza ukuthi kwayena umsolwa ubeke azofuna usizo kuye.“Ubehlale efika ezocela ukukha amanzi ekhaya, ugogo amvumele ngaphandle kwenkinga kodwa ekugcineni ubone kugcono ambulale ngesihluku,” kubeka uNksz Memela.Uqhube wathi babonga abantu balapho abeqashe khona umsolwa, okuyibo abaholele ekutheni agcine eboshwa emva kwesigameko.“Emva kwesigameko, baqale baqaphela ukuthi wenza izinto ezingajwayelekile, bangagcina lapho, baphinde baqaphela nokuthi ugqoke izicathulo zakhe (ugogo). Bamvalele ekhoneni bembuza imibuzo,” usho kanje.Ugqube wathi bathe uma bebona ukuthi ubanika izimpendulo ezingagculisi, bathi bazomqhuba bamhambise emndenini kamufi.“Kuthiwa uvele wacela ukuthi uma eyiswa khona, okungenani kubizwe amaphoyisa kuqala, nokuyilapho okuvele khona ukuthi kukhona akwaziyo ngesigameko,” kusho yena.Elandisa ngokwenzeka kwesigameko, uthe senzeke esathathwe yindlela yamatoho eThekwini.“Ngithole ucingo ngezikhathi zasekuseni ngosuku lwesigameko, omakhelwane bengazisa ukuthi kuyasha ekhaya. Baphuthume baya khona, bathi uma befika, bathola ukuthi ugogo ushile egumbini lakhe lokulala.” Uqhube wathi basola ukuthi umsolwa isigameko usenze khona ngezikhathi zasekuseni.“Isidumbu sikagogo besibekwe phansi eduze kombhede wakhe. Eshile, kwasha nombhede nezinye izimpahla ebezisegumbini lakhe lokulala,” usho kanje.Ngesikhathi evela enkantolo umsolwa ngeledlule, kuthiwa uyinqabile ibheyili.IMeya kaMasipala waseMzimkhulu, uNkk Jabulile Msiya, ithe abesifazane bendawo bathutheleke enkantolo, bafike bamasha, bezwakalisa ilaka labo ngesigameko besho nokuthi abafuni umsolwa adedelwe ngebheyili.Uqhube wathi okwenze bamasha ukuthi abamdingi endaweni.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa aseMzimkhulu abophe owesilisa ngecala lokudlwengula, elokubamba inkunzi nelokubulala owesifazane osemdala amhlasele kwakhe.Uthe umsolwa uvelile enkantolo, wagcinwa esitokisini.

KUPHELILE ngezikhaftini ezibizayo zakwaTupperware njengoba abanikazi bale nkampani e-United States befake amaphepha aveza ukuthi abanamali enkantolo.Le nkampani ivale ifemu yayo yokugcina e-United States kulo nyaka kwahlukumezeka abasebenzi abangu-150 abadiliziwe.Ngokombiko weReuters, le nkampani ifake amaphepha okuthi ayinamali ngoLwesibili, kanti kuvele ukuthi ikweleta u-R12 billion engakwazi ukuwukhokha.Kuvele ukuthi ngonyaka odlule iye yakhala ngokwehla kokuthengwa kwezitsha zayo.Ize yaxosha obeyisikhulu sayo uMnuz Miguel Fernandez, isikhala sakhe savalwa nguNksz Laurie Ann Goldman njengoba isifake amaphepha okuthi ayinamali.ITupperware yasungulwa ngo-1946, emuva kokuthi umsunguli wayo uMnuz Earl Tupper ekhiqize isikhaftini esinesivalo esingakuchithi ukudla kodwa esivuleka uma sesivulwa wumuntu.Lezi zikhaftini kuthiwa zaba nedumela elikhulu kwabesifazane okuyibona ababenzela abayeni ukudla abazokuphatha emsebenzini, babe sebeqala ukuzidayisa benza nemicimbi okwakusuke kuhlangenwe kuwo ukuheha abanye ukuba badayise izikhaftini.Kuthiwa kule minyaka ewu-80, i-Tupperware ibincike kakhulu kubantu abayidayisela imikhiqizo yayo ngaphandle kokuthola uqeqesho oluthile, iningi labantu abawu-300 000 abadayisa i-Tupperware kuthiwa bekungabesifazane.Ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kuhlukene imibono njengoba usaziwayo wakuleli, u-Anele Mdoda, enze ihlaya lokuthi abantu abangapheki yibona abawise i-Tupperware njengoba ubusetshenziselwa ukuphatha ukudla.Abanye bamphendule ngokuthi kulesi simo somnotho kaRamaphosa otshekile sebefaka ukudla esikhaftinini zika-ice cream, abanayo nemali yokuthenga i-Tupperware.Abanye bathe kungcono ngoba abazali kade babewuthenga ukuthi uhlobise ngakho usazoba khona.

KUPHAZAMISEKE ukufunda esikoleni iNkoningi Primary, eNtambanana, abafundi bezithela phezu kwesidumbu sikathishomkhulu silenga ngentambo kwelinye lamakilasi, emagcekeni esikole ngoLwesine ekuseni, okukholakala ukuthi uzibulele.UMnuz Welcome Mathenjwa (43) okuthiwa bekungakapheli nezinyanga eziyisithupha ethathe isikhundla sokuba wuthimkhulu kulesi sikole, kukholakala ukuthi uzilengise ngoLwesithathu ebusuku, njengoba isidumbu sakhe kuthiwa sibonwe abafundi ekuseni, silenga ekilasini obekungafundeli muntu kulo elisondelene nekhishi lapho bephakelwa khona.Umthombo weSolezwe ocele ukungadalulwa, ongomunye wabazali bezingane ezifunda kulesi sikole, uthe umufi ngosuku olwandulela okutholakale ngalo isidumbu sakhe, uvalelise othisha ngokubosela inyama, kungekho okusolisayo.“Kuthiwa ubize othisha wabosela inyama kwamnandi nje ngaphakathi esikoleni kungekho okusolisayo. Ngesikhathi kufika ibhasi eligibela othisha njengoba besebenzisa lona, izimoto zabo bezishiya edolobheni ngenxa yesimo somgwaqo ongemuhle, uthe uzobalandela kukhona asematasa ngakho, uzolandwa wumngani wakhe,” kusho umthombo.Uthe uphinde wanxusa unogada unogada esikoleni ukuthi naye agibele ibhasi nothisha ayomthengela okuthile edolobheni okusokala ukuthi ubenza izaba zokumqhelisa, efuna ukusala yedwa.Kuthiwa isimo sibe muncu kakhulu esikoleni kwaphoqa ukuthi othisha nabafundi babuyele emakhaya, kuqhuma isililo.Lo mthombo uthe kukholakala ukuthi uqale wadla umuthi wokubulala amagundane ngaphambi kokuthi azibulale, njengoba ububonakala ezandleni uchitheke naphansi egunjini okutholwe isidumbu sakhe kulo.Uthe esinye isijuqu sentambo okukholakala ukuthi kunqanyulwe kuyona azihilele ngayo, beyisesikhwameni sakhe ebesisele ehhovisi. Kuthiwa ngaphambi kokuthi aphase inhlolokhono ethatha izintambo njengothishomkhulu kulesi sikole, ubefundisa kwesinye samabanga aphezulu esikhona endaweni, i-Eminingi High.UMnuz Zazi Xaba ongusihlalo wesigungu esengamele isikole, uthe namanje basashaqekile ngokwenzekile.“Akukho nje engikusolile obekudla uthishomkhulu njengoba sigcina ukubonana besihlele ukuthi sibe nomhlangano kusasa (esho namhlanje), lapho besizodingida khona ngezinto ezithinta isikole okubalwa kuzo umcimbi wokuvalelisa abafundi bakwa-Grade 7 nokulungiswa kwesikole,” usho kanje.Uthe ngokolwazi analo, uthishomkhulu ungowokudabuka eSikhaleni, kanti akubanga lula ukukhuluma namalungu omndeni wakhe kwazise nafike endaweni yesigameko abeqandula ngenxa yezinhlungu zokulahlekelwa yilungu lawo.Imizamo yokuthola umndeni kamufi igcine iphunzile.Njengenjwayelo, okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Muzi Mahlambi, ugcine engatholakalanga ukuze aphawule. Uthunyelelwe imiyalezo washayelwa kodwa kwacweba iziziba okuyinto esiyinsakavukela. Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uConstable Thenjiswa Ngcobo, uthe amaphoyisa aseNtambanana asevule odokodo lophenyo ngokufa komuntu.

SEKULINDWE isinqumo semantshi ecaleni eselidonse iminyaka emine lokubulawa ngesihluku kowayengumfundi ka-matric u-Andile ‘Bobo’ Mbuthu (16).Izolo uMbuso nommeli wabasolwa benze izethulo zokugcina,  benxenxa iMantshi uSanele Hlatshwayo ukuba ibavune.Isigwebo sizowiswa ngasekupheleni kukaJuni ngenxa yokuthi iNkantolo yeMantshi yaseVerulam, elalele icala, inohlu lwamacala amaningi okumele iwalalele.UMbuso unxenxe uHlatshwayo ukuthi ulahle abamangalelwa abahlanu ngecala lokuthumba nelokubulala uBobo.Bancike kakhulu ebufakazini obethulwa owayengumsolwa futhi engumngani kaBobo owaphenduka ufakazi woMbuso ezininda nabamangalelwa.Umshushisi uthe okwenziwa abamangalelwa kuBobo babekuhlelile futhi benomqondo bezama ukuziveza kumphathi wabo owayebelwe utshwala..Ngakolunye uhlangothi ummeli wabamangalelwa uMnuz Chris Gounden, uthe uMbuso uhlulekile ukuvezela inkantolo ubufakazi bokuthi wayekade ethunjiwe uBobo nokuthi kwakuhleliwe ukubulawa kwakhe.Unxenxe imantshi ukuthi ingabalahli ngamacala abathweswe wona okungenani ayibathole benecala lokushaya.UBobo washaywa wafa ngo-Ephreli 2020 esolwa ngokweba utshwala endaweni yobumnandi okwakungekamzala wakhe uMnuz Mlungisi Thabethe, eMagagula Lounge, eHambanathi oThongathi.UGounden uthe uThabethe uyena owayalela abamangalelwa ukuthi bashaye uBobo ephethe isibhamu ngesandla ebatshela ukuthi uma bengamshayi yena uzoshaya bona.UMbuso ukuchithile lokhu ubuza ukuthi kungani abamangalelwa babekade besebenzela umuntu abamsabayo futhi oyingozi emphakathini njengoba sebesho manje enkantolo?Ubuze nokuthi kungani bengayanga emaphoyiseni emumva kwesigameko beyobika ukuthi kwenzekeni uma kungeve kuyinhloso yabo ababekade bekwenza?.UThabethe wadutshulwa wafa ngo-2021 esigamekweni esingahlobene nokufa kukaBobo. Wayengummangalelwa wokuqala ecaleni ngaphambi kokuthi abulawe.Bobahlanu abamangalelwa okungoMnuz Andile Nhleko, Mncedisi Mzobe, Siyanda Msweli, Lindani Ndlovu noMalusi Mthembu bayawaphika amacala abathweswe wona. Bebephelele bonke enkantolo izolo futhi bebukeka bezikhululekele.Kukhona lapho uHlatshwayo ebuze khona umshushisi wathi kungani uMbuso wasebenzisa lo fakazi ekubeni kucaca ukuthi uyena owabamba iqhaza elikhulu kushaywa umufi waze wafa.Ubuze nokuthi inkantolo ithini ngobufakazi abethulile obebukade bushintshashintsha?Umshushisi uphendule wathi leso yinqumo esathathwa abaphathi bakhe ophikweni lwezokushushisa.Uqhube wathi ufakazi wenza amaphutha ngoba wayena-18 ethula ubufakazi obase budonse izinsuku eziningi elokhu ephicwa uGounden ngemibuzo.Enkantolo bekukhona amalungu omndeni kamufi angaphuthi uma kuqulwa leli cala athe amagange ukuzwa isinqumo senkantolo.Yagcwala izinkundla zokuxhumana i-video eyayiveza uBobo emabokoboko elele phansi egxiza igazi eshayiwe.Kuthiwa washaywa usuku lonke wafa, isidumbu sakhe kwayiwa naso eBhamshela sabaselwa nezinkuni emphongolweni ebusuku. Ngakusasa ekuseni kuthiwa izinsalela zesidumbu zahlakazwa ngepiki zase zifakwa ezikhwameni nezitini, ezifanayo nezazisemzini kaThabethe, saphonswa edamini.Satholwa emuva kwezinsuku izinsalela zesidumbu, imiphumela yolibufuzo yaqinisekisa ukuthi kwakungezikaBobo.

INKUNZI eluvava kwezokuphathwa kweminyango kahulumeni, uDkt Kwazi Mbanjwa, iwumholi omusha weMK KwaZulu-Natal emuva kokudilizwa kophethe lesi sikhundla.IMK isematheni kulezi zinsuku emuva kokugila izimanga okhethweni iqala nje nokungena futhi inezinyanga ezimbalwa imenyezelwe.IMK yamenyezelwa ngowayengumengameli, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, ngoDisemba nyakenye, wathi uyayishiya i-ANC ngeke asayivotela. Emuva kwalokho kudilike umthangala abantu bejoyina ubuthaphuthaphu kuleli qembu elisha.UMbanjwa waduma kakhulu engumqondisi-jikelele kuhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal kudala. Uke waba wumeluleki kaZuma kudala.IMK imthumelele incwadi imazisa ukuthi nguyena osezophatha isikhundla somdidiyeli wesikhashana eKZN. Encwadini uMbanjwa uncengwa ukuthi asiphathe ngobunono isikhundla.“Uyanxuswa ukuthi usebenzise amandla onikwe wona ngokunakekela, ungawasebenzisi budedengu. Ubeke phambili ukukhulisa iqembu lilungele ukhetho lohulumeni basekhaya ngo-2026,’’ kusho incwadi Isolezwe eliyibonile.UMbanjwa uqokwa nje bekusanda kudilizwa uMnuz Simphiwe Mpungose obesahlale isikhashana esikhundleni. Ngaphambi kukaMpungose kwakudilizwe uMnuz Nhlanhla Ngidi.UNgidi naye uwugalagala kwezokuphathwa kukahulumeni futhi wadilizwa isigubhukane, wangachazelwa ukuthi kwenzenjani. Ukuqokwa kukaMbanjwa kulesi sikhundla abanye bakuhumusha ngokuthi iMK ilungiselela ukuthatha uhulumeni.Kusaqhubeka izingxoxo zokubusa ngokubambisana emuva kokuthi engekho onqobe ngengcaca eKZN. I-MK inezihlalo ezingu-37 KwaZulu-Natal ezithole emuva kokhetho futhi ihleli esicongweni.Endaweni yesibili kuhleli i-IFP ngezihlalo ezingu-15, ilandelwe yi-ANC ngezingu-14. Endaweni yesine kukhona i-DA ngezihlalo ezingu-11, ilandelwe yi-EFF ngezihlalo ezimbili.I-NFP ilele emsileni ngesihlalo esisodwa kodwa naso esingenamehluko uma sekuxoxwa. Kulindeleke ukuthi ubunjwe maduze uhulumeni uma sekukhona amaqembu avumelanayo.

IQEMBU eliholwa owayengumengameli, uJacob Zuma, iMK, seliyalele amalungu ePhalamende naweziShayamthetho ukuba ashiye ezikhundleni aziphethe eqenjini.IMK iyalele lamalungu ukuba agxile emsebenzini wawo wasePhalamende naseziShayamthetho.Lo myalelo uqukethwe encwadini ebhalwe unobhala jikelele weMK, uDkt Sifiso Maseko, ebonwe yiSolezwe. Incwadi kaMaseko ibhalwe ngoLwesithathu.Ngesikhathi iMK ikhansela ukhetho, uZuma wayevele eshilo ukuthi bonke  abazojutshwa kuhulumeni ngeke banikwe izikhundla eqenjini.UZuma wakhala ngokuthi umkhuba wokuthi abaholi baphathe izikhundla kuhulumeni nasemaqenjini iwona owenza ukuthi inkohlakalo ibhebhetheke.UZuma wathi ukuphatha kwabaholi izikhundla kuhulumeni nasemaqenjini kubaphendula amasosha azikhuzayo, wathi akekho obakhalimayo noma sebephuma endleleni.Encwadini, uMaseko ukhumbuze abaholi abathintekayo ngalezinkulumo ezenziwa uZuma ngaphambi kokhetho.“UZuma wakubeka kwacaca emihlanganweni yeqembu nangesikhathi ekhankasela ukhetho ukuthi amalungu e-MK azojutshwa ezikhundleni kuhulumeni kufanele ehle ezikhundleni aziphethe eqenjini.“Iqembu likuthumele ePhalamende njengelungu elethembekile. Njengoba usamukele lesi sikhundla, uyaziswa ngokusemthethweni ukuthi awusenasikhundla sokuhola eqenjini.”Labaholi abathintekayo badonswe ngendlebe ukuba bangaphinde banikeze izinhlaka zeqembu imiyalelo.Lesinqumo sizochaphazela abaholi abaningi kwiMK.Phakathi kwabo ohola iMK ePhalamende, uDkt John Hlophe, ophinde abe yiphini likamengameli kwiMK. Lokhu kusho ukuthi uHlophe kufanele ashiye kwesokuba yiphini likamengameli.Umyalelo kaMaseko usho ukuthi iMK isizokuba nobuholi obusha KwaZulu-Natal. Bobabili umdidiyeli weMK KwaZulu-Natal, uDkt Kwazi Mbanjwa, nomgqugquzeli wayo uMnuz Thobani Zuma, bangamalungu esiShayamthetho.UMaseko ukhipha lencwadi nje ivele ikhona imvunge ngaphakathi kwiMK njengoba kukhona amalungu afuna ukuthi kube nongqungquthela yokukhetha ubuholi.Kukhona abakhala ngokuthi abaholi abajutshwe ePhalamende naseziShayamthetho abanaso isikhathi esanele sokwenza imisebenzi yeqembu.Laba bathi ukungabi nesikhathi esanele kwabaholi abajutshwe ePhalamende naseziShayamthetho ikhona okwenze ukuthi iqembu lingenzi kahle ezinkethweni zokuchibiyela zakamumva.Mumva abaholi beMK abaqhamuka ezifundeni eziyisishagalombili zaKwaZulu-Natal bahambele emzini kaZuma, beyocela ukuthi kube nengqungquthela yokukhetha ubuholi beqembu. Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kokhulumela iMK, uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndlhela, ayizange iphumelele.

IQEMBU elikhankaselwa owayengumengameli, uJacob Zuma, iMK, liphinde lehlula i-ANC komunye umbango wasenkantolo.INkantolo eNkulu eThekwini ichithe icala ebelifakwe yi-ANC, ebisola iMK ngokuntshontsha igama nophawu lophiko lwayo lwezempi oselahlakazwa, uMkhonto weSizwe.Isicelo se-ANC sichithwe nezindleko zaso. Isinqumo sikhishwe ngoMsombuluko ekuseni.Kube yinjabulo kumalungu eMK abezolala icala ngesikhathi kuthulwa isinqumo.Owabhalisa ngokusemthethweni iMK, uMnuz Jabulani Khumalo, uthe kubajabulisile  ukunqoba icala.Uthe sebezogxila emkhankasweni wokhetho.Leli yucala lesibili lapho iMK ihlula i-ANC.Icala lokuqala lalithethwa eNkantolo yezoKhetho, lapho i-ANC yayifuna kukhishwe iMK ohlwini lwamaqembu angenele ukhetho.

UKUCHITHWA kwesicelo se-ANC sokuthi kususwe ohlwini lokuvota iqembu Umkhonto weSizwe (MK), owesekwa ngowayengumengameli we-ANC nezwe uJacob Zuma, kwenza abaholi beMK baye eNkantolo eNkulu eThekwini beshayela phezulu njengoba kuhlala icala elithinta ukuqanjwa kwaleli qembu kanjalo ne-logo yalo. I-ANC yaya enkantolo ikhala ngokuthi leli gama ne-logo okohlaka lwayo olwalulwa nobandlululo.Izolo inkantolo yezokhetho igqeme  i-ANC udume lwengozi, i-ANC ibifuna kususwe ohlwini iMK njengeqembu elibhalisiwe njengoba ibithi kukhona imigudu engalandelwanga ngesikhathi ibhaliswa.Lesi sinqumo sikhishwe yiJaji uLebogang Modiba, othe akukho okungahanjiswanga ngendlela ngesikhathi ikhomishini yezokhetho i-Independent Electoral Commission, ibhalisa leli qembu nyakenye.Ijaji lithe i-ANC yahluleka izikhawu ezimbili ukufaka isicelo sokuthi kuchithwe iMK ingabhaliswa.“Kumele izinuke yona amakhwapha i-ANC ngoba yahluleka ukuphikisa ukubhaliswa kweMK. Ngakho ke ngiyasichitha isicelo se-ANC.”IMK yaveza ukuthi i-ANC ayizange ikuphikise ukubhaliswa kwayo kwaze kwaba uZuma umemezela ukuthi uzokweseka leli qembu njengoba kuzovotwa ngoMeyi 29.Leli qembu elabhaliswa nguMnuz Jabulani Khumalo ngoSepthemba nyakenye, lisamukele lesi sinqumo lathi linethemba lokuthi lizophumelela naseThekwini.UKhumalo okhulume namalungu abezolalela isinqumo izolo, uthe awaphinde aphume ngobuningi bawo namhlanje eThekwini.“Sesiyohlangana ne-ANC evotini maqabane. Noma kuthiwa banifaka umunwe esweni, ningaphenduli noma nilwe, kodwa nithi sizohlangana evotini. UMsholozi uzobe elungiselela ukuhola izwe ngoJuni 1, ngoba sizodla umhlanganiso okhethweni,” kusho uKhumalo.Uncome isinqumo senkantolo wathi siveza ukuthi azichemile yize kukhona abese befake izinto ezisho okunye ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.Uthe abakwazi ukuqhubeka baholwe abantu abadla inkece yomphakathi.Okhulumela i-ANC uNkk Mahlengi Bhengu-Motsiri, uthe bayaweseka umthetho futhi bayasamukela isinqumo senkantolo.Uthe abantu bakuleli banelungelo lokuthi bajoyine noma iliphi iqembu okuyinto abayilwela kanzima.“Icala beliphakathi kwe-ANC ne-IEC sikhala ngemigudu engalandelwanga ngesikhathi kubhaliswa iMK. Asiphikisani nokuthi iMK ibekhona emqulwini wokuvota. Siyaphikisana nokuthi leli qembu lisebenzise uphawu lweMK negama elethiwe ngalo ngoba yizinto ezilawulwa yi-ANC. Lezi ngezinye zezinto esiyokhuluma ngazo eNkantolo eNkulu eThekwini kusasa (namhlanje). Asifuni ukuthi izinto ezithinta i-ANC zisetshenziswe abafuna ukuzicebisa bona,” kusho uNkk Bhengu-Motsiri.Okhulumela i-IEC uNkk Kate Bapela, uthe isinqumo senkantolo sifakazela ukuthi balandela yonke imigudu ngesikhathi bebhalisa iMK.

IQEMBU Umkhonto weSizwe lithi ngeke limsuse ohola leli qembu ePhalamende uDkt John Hlophe, ekubeni yilungu lohlaka olululeka umengameli ngezobulungiswa.Okhulumela leli qembu uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndhlela, uthe bazolwa kuze kube sekugcineni nezinhlangano ezifuna kukhishwe uHlophe kwi-Judiciary Services Commission, ngoba unamava kwezobulungiswa.“Ngeke sizwe ngezinye izinhlangano ukuthi ubani okumele simjube, nokungamele. Noma kuthiwa inkantolo iyasichitha siyoqhubeka nomsebenzi wethu, uHlophe akayi ndawo.” Usho lokhu nje inkantolo enkulu yaseWestern Cape ayizange isikhiphe isinqumovecaleni elifakwe yi-DA nezinhlangano ezehlukene ezifuna kuchithwe uHlophe, kwi-JSC.I-JSC iphinde iphakamise okumele babe ngamajaji nezimantshi kuleli. Amajaji abelalele leli cala, athe azokhipha isinqumo maduzane.Kuqalwe ngoLwesine ukudingidwa kwalolu daba kule nkantolo njengoba lezi zinhlangano okuyi-Freedom Under Law ne-Corruption Watch, zifuna uHlophe achithwe kwi-JSC.I-AfriForum iya eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo ukuyophikisana nalesi sinyathelo sePhalamende sokufaka uHlophe kwi-JSC. U-Adv Thabani Masuku SC omele uHlophe, unxuse inkantolo ukuthi isichithe lesi sicelo esiphuthumayo sokuthi uHlophe angabi yingxenye yeJSC.Uthe kumele lezi zinhlangano zikhokhe nezindleko kuleli cala ngoba yizona ezihudulele uHlophe enkantolo, noma kuthiwa uyawina noma uyachithwa. “Uma kukhishwa uHlophe kwi-JSC kuyosho ukumnqinda umsebenzi wakhe wasePhalamende. I-DA isasho into eyodwa emaphepheni ayo mayelana nokungamfuni uHlophe okuyinto ehlulekile ukuyilwa ePhalamende,” kusho uMasuku.Uthe ukuze uHlophe abe yilungu le-JSC kudingeka abe yilungu lePhalamende kuphela, akukho okunye.Ummeli weMK, u-Adv Dali Mpofu, ukhale nge-DA wathi ifuna izinkantolo zinqumele iPhalamende indlela okumele lisebenze ngayo.Uthe akumele izinkantolo zisetshenziselwe ukuphendula izinqumo ezithathwe yiPhalamende.“Lokhu okwenzeka la enkantolo kuyimizamo zokuphinde zingcwabe uHlophe, ngoba emnyama. UHlophe waphundlwa izimendlela zokuba yijaji, ngakho lesi sicelo salezi zinhlangano siyimizamo yokuthi aphinde acindezelwe futhi,” kusho uMpofu.Uthe i-DA kwakumele ilwe ukuphakanyiswa kukaHlophe njengelungu lePhalamende okuyinto leli qembu elingakwenzanga.Uchithe ukuthi iJSC iyona eqoka amajaji, wathi lowo msebenzi okamengameli wezwe.

UMKHONTO weSizwe (MK) uthi umethule umthwalo uBonginkosi Khanyile odilizwe esikhundleni sokuba wumholi wentsha yeqembu nabanye abenabo kulolu hlaka lokuhola abantu abasha. Ukudilizwa kukaKhanyile esikhundleni kumenyezelwe yiqembu lakhe izolo ekuseni ngencwadi. UKhanyile uchithwe noGazuzu Nduli obengumdidiyeli waseGauteng. Kuchithwe noThapelo Maisha obeyiphini likamengameli.Isolezwe  lizibonile izincwadi ezithunyelelwe laba baholi bentsha baziswa ukuthi baxoshiwe futhi kufanele balinde iqembu ukuthi lizobajuba kuphi.UMkhonto weSizwe okuphuzwa ngawo itiye kulezi zinsuku, umenyezelwe owayengumengameli uJacob Zuma ngoDisemba nyakenye. UZuma washingila wachizela uKhongolose ethi akasahambi nawo useqome iMK azoya nayo okhethweni.UKhanyile owaduma emkhankasweni i#FeesMustFall, ubeqokelwe esikhundleni ngoJanuwari nonyaka njengoba esechithwa manje.Okhulumela uMkhonto weSizwe uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndhlela, uthe banqume ukubadedela abaholi bentsha ukuze bakhankase kahle ezinhlakeni zentsha.“Kufanele babhekane nomsebenzi wokukhankasa kubantu abasha ukuze beseke uMkhonto weSizwe. Bekufanele sibethule umthwalo ukuze bakhankase kahle bengaxakwe yilutho. Khumbula phela nokuthi akekho umuntu onesikhundla, noma wubani angashintshwa nanini, sonke nje sihlala silindile,’’ kusho uNdhlela.Kuthe kusabatshazwa lokho kokuchithwa kukaKhanyile nabanye, kwavela ukuthi uMinenhle Cibane obengunobhala-jikelele wesikhashana naye uchithiwe. UKhanyile wayeyilungu le-EFF elivuthayo, wasuka kuyona waya kwiPatriotic Alliance egcine imxoshile.Uthushuke eqenjini iMK lapho afike wanikwa khona isikhundla lesi asediliziwe kusona. UKhanyile ubesanda kuba sematheni ngezinto ahambe ezisho emphakathini.Kukhona lapho ashutshwa khona ekhaca abantu ngolaka ebabiza ngabadayisi. Kukhona nalapho akhuluma khona ngesankahlu ecaza izikhundla eqenjini ethi uZuma wuyena ngqo shishilizi.Kwenzeka konke lokhu nje, iMK isematheni emuva kokuthi uZuma enqobe icala abelifake enkantolo emangalele inhlangano eyengamele ukhetho i-IEC. UZuma uphume phambili kade ekhala ngesinqumo se-IEC sokumnqabela ukuthi aye ePhalamende uma bethola izihlalo.UKhanyile uzanywe kaningi ocingweni lungangeni.

IQEMBU eliholwa owayengumengameli, uJacob Zuma, iMK, lichayise i-ANC ebizama ukulinxenxa ukuba libe ingxenye yezingxoxo zokubusa ngokubambisana.Okhulumela i-ANC, uNkk Mahlengi Bhengu-Motsiri, uveze ukuthi iMK izibe izicelo zabaholi be-ANC zokuba kuhlanganwe.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma nabezindaba, izolo, lapho ebekhuluma khona ngokuxoxwe emhlanganweni wekomiti elibhekele ukusebenza kwansuku zonke kwi-ANC obubhunga eyokubusa ngokubambisana.I-ANC isembhidlangweni wokuthola amaqembu ezobusa ngokubambisana nawo njengoba ingazange iwine ngamalengiso ngesikhathi kunokhetho ngeledlule.IMK ilele isithathu ngokwezibalo zamavoti.Abaholi beMK sebekusho kaningi ukuthi ngeke baxoxe ne-ANC uma isaphethwe uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa.UNkk Bhengu-Motsiri uthe ubuholi obuphezulu kwi-ANC buzamile ukuxhumana neMK kodwa zangabuya izimpendulo.“Kube nemizamo eminingi yokuxhumana neMK kodwa ke asikayitholi impendulo. Umnyango uzohlezi uvuliwe kuwo wonke amaqembu afuna ukuyisa izwe phambili. Thina siyi-ANC sizimisele ukuxoxa nawo wonke amaqembu ezepolitiki. Yebo singaba nemibono ehlukene kodwa sinethemba lokuthi singakwazi ukusebenzisana sonke. Thina sibeke phambili izwe.”UNkk Bhengu-Motsiri uthe sebeziqalile izingxoxo namanye amaqembu athole izihlalo eziningi ePhalamende, iDA, EFF, IFP, NFP nePA.Uuthe banethemba lokuthi izingxoxo nala maqembu zizohamba kahle.“Okusinikeza ithemba ukuthi lamaqembu avumile ukuhlangana nathi sixoxe. Lokhu kukutshela ukuthi nabo bafuna ukubona lolu daba luxazululeka. Kodwa ke konke kuzoncika ezingxoxweni. Thina esikufunayo ukuthi kube nohulumeni ozohlanganisa onke amaqembu“Kuzobe kungekhona okokuqala siba nohulumeni ohlanganisa amaqembu. Ngisho nasezikhathini lapho esasiwine khona ngamalengiso, sasike siwafake amaqembu amancane. Ude Lille (uNkk Patricia) weGood, uyingxenye kahulumeni. UHlengwa (uMnuz Mkhuleko) we-IFP uwusihlalo weScopa (Standing Committee on Public Accounts).” UNkk Bhengu-Motsiri uthe kujwayelekile ukuthi kube netwetwe uma kunezingxoxo zokubusa ngokubambisana, wathi bazokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi izingxoxo ziphothulwa ngokushesha.Namhlanje kuzoba nomhlangano wesigungu esiphezulu kwi-ANC ozothatha isinqumo sokuthi imaphi amaqembu abazosebenzisana nawo.UNkk Bhengu-Motsiri uthe kuneziphakamiso ezintathu okuzoxoxwa ngazo, nokho angafuni ukuzidalula.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi isiphakamiso sokuqala esokuthi i-ANC ibambisane namaqembu athole izihlalo, ezinye iziphakamiso zithinta ukusebenzisana ne-DA ne-IFP ngezindlela ezehlukene.

UNOBHALA -JIKELELE obambile kweloMkhonto Wesizwe, uMnuz Sihle Ngubane, uthi babhalele iPhalamende belazisa ukuthi uMnuz Jabulani Khumalo, waxoshwa akufanele abe sohlwini lwabo.Kumanje iMK inezihlalo eziwu-58 ePhalamende, ezithole emuva kokugila izimanga okhethweni lukazwelonke ngenyanga edlule.UKhumalo owabhalisa iqembu, nguyena ophezulu ohlwini lwamalungu eMK aya ePhalamende, emuva kokuthi kukhishwe igama likaJacob Zuma. Igama likaZuma likhishwe emuva kwesinqumo senkantolo eyathi akufanele aye ePhalamende.UKhumalo ubelele isibili ngaphambi kokuthi igama likaZuma lihoshwe ohlwini. UNgubane uthe ngeke bakwazi ukumelwa nguKhumalo ngoba waxoshwa eqenjini.“Yinto ejwayelekile nje, amaqembu ayalwenza ushintsho ohlwini uma esexoshiwe umuntu. Sibhalele iPhalamende silicela ukuthi uKhumalo akhishwe sabanika nencwadi yokuxoshwa kwakhe bayalusebenza udaba manje,’’ kuchaza uNgubane.Ethithwa uKhumalo ngalokhu uthe nguyena umholi weMK ePhalameende noma ngabe kukhona abangakuthandi lokho.“Ngiphakathi impela, yimina umholi weMK ePhalamende, uNgubane ukhuluma into angayazi nje. Kusho ukuthi abafundile ngoba imithetho yePhalamende iqondile. Nani anobathumelela umthetho bawufunde kahle,’’ kuphendula uKhumalo.UNgubane ubuziwe ukuthi bazoya yini ePhalamende ngoba benesikhalo ngemiphumela yokhetho, wanqaba ukuphendula. Uthe ucela ukuphawula ngodaba lukaKhumalo bese kuphelela lapho hhayi okunye.Phambilini abe-IEC bakucacisile ukuthi amaqembu awakwazi ukuchibiyela uhlu lwawo kuze kube kuhlala iPhalamende okokuqala.Kwenzeka konke lokhu nje uKhumalo ulufake enkantolo udaba lokuxoshwa kwakhe kwiMK. Udaba lwangena enkantolo kwalalelwa izethulo sase siyagodlwa isinqumo.

IQEMBU lepolitiki uMkhonto Wesizwe Party (MKP) lowayenguMengameli wezwe, uMnuz Jacob Zuma lithi alizimisele ngokwenza ubudlelwano ne-ANC eholwa wuMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa emva kokhetho.Liveze ukuthi lizimisele ukusebenzisana namaqembu azovumelana nokuthi uMengameli Zuma anikwe ushwele kamongameli.Okhulumela iMKP, uNhlamulo Ndhlela usho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma nabezindaba kwi-IEC’s National Results Operations Centre eMidrand.Uthe wonke amaqembu azimisele ukukhuluma nabo kumele azimisele ngokuthi kushintshwe umthethosisekelo. Kwezinye izinto azibalile ukuthi kushintshwe nomthetho i-Irrigation Act ephoqa uhulumeni ukuthi uthenge amanzi emadamini aphethwe abantu abazimele.“Sifuna ukuthi kube nobumbano futhi asikungabazi ukuthi lokhu kuzokwenzeka. Sizozofinyelela kulokho asidlali. Le iyona ndlela esizoyisebenzisa ukuthi siye esivumelwaneni sokusebenzisana namanye amaqembu. Sizobheka ukuthi amaqembu ayayifuna inqubekela phambili futhi sizosebenzisana nahambisana nalo mbono wethu. Lokho ikona okuzocacisa ukuthi siyasebenzisana noma cha,” kusho uNdhlela.Uthe bafuna ukuthi amaqembu azimisele ukusebenzisana nabo avumelana nalo mthetho wokunika uZuma ushwele ukuze akwazi ukubuyela ephalamende.UNdhlela uthe ukusho lokhu njengoba kubukeka izinto zibavuna ukuthi bangaba yiqembu eliphikisayo ngokusemthethweni.“Ithina esizosho ukuthi ubani okumele abe ngumengameli futhi bese simbekela umgomo wokuthi anike uZuma ushwele.  Sizombuyisela uZuma ukuba ngumengameli ngisho ngabe asikawushintshi lo mthetho ,futhi lokho sizokwenza kalula. Yize kuke kwaba nezinsolo zokuthi alikho iqembu lepolitiki elizowina ngamalengiso kwaZulu-Natal, kodwa uNdhlela uthe bebezibekele ukuthi bazowina ngo-60% kulesi sifundazwe.

SIYINDABA egudwini kumalungu omphakathi wasoDidini, eMbumbulu, isehlakalo sokudutshulwa kubulawe induna endaweni ebiphinde ibe ngusomabhizinisi.UMnuz Sphiwe Msweli (54) kubikwa ukuthi udutshulwe ngoyaba lwezinhlamvu eqeda kuvala ebhusha lakhe elibude buduze nomuzi wakhe.Umthombo weSolezwe uveze ukuthi uMsweli ubengusomabhizinisi owaziwayo nohlonishwayo kakhulu kule ndawo.“Akuqondakali ukuthi yini imbangela yokudutshulwa kwakhe. Sonke njengamalungu omphakathi siyazibuza siyaziphendula ukuthi ingampela ubulawelweni?’’Kuvela ukuthi abasolwa abadubule umufi bafike behamba ngeveni emhlophe okuthiwa babaleke ngayo sebedubulile. “Sizwe kuthiwa, uthe eselele phansi bamkhuthuza, asibange sisezwa ke ukuthi bathatheni,” kusho umthombo.Ugcizelele ukuthi uMsweli ubengusomabhizinisi othandayo ukufaka isandla ngenhloso yokulekelela abaswele emphakathini.Nomsebenzi wakhe wobunduna, umthombo uthe ubewenza ngokuzikhandla nangokuthembeka okukhulu.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu Natal, uLieutenant Colonel Nqobile Gwala, uthe kuvulwe icala lokubulala, elokuzama ukubulala, nelokweba esiteshini samaphoyisa eMbumbulu.“Kubikwa ukuthi ngoMashi 8, owesilisa udutshulwe wabulawa, ngaphandle kwebhizinisi lakhe oDidini, eMbumbulu, ngabasolwa abangaziwa,” kusho uLt Col Gwala.Uqhube wathi umufi uphinde wantshontshelwa isibhamu sakhe, amaphoyisa asaphenya ngembangela yokubulawa kwakhe.Imizamo yokuthola umndeni ayiphumelelanga njengoba inombolo yocingo ebitholwe Isolezwe ibikhala ingabanjwa. Usihlalo weNdlu yobuKhosi boMdabu KwaZulu Natal, iNkosi Sifiso Shinga, ithe kuyabakhathaza ukuthi namanje akukho okutheni okwenziwayo ukulwa nesihlava sokubulawa kwezinduna namakhosi.“Akwenziwa lutho. Nomthetho awuyilimi indima yawo uma kuziwa ngakulolu daba,” kusho uShinga.Enza isibonelo, uthe amakhansela ayanikwa abaqaphi uma ezizwa engaphephile.“Kodwa ezinduneni, uhulumeni uye akhale ngokungabibikho kwemali. Ngokomthetho izinduna namakhosi akubona abantu okufanele bahambe ngaphandle kwabaqaphi.“Ngasohlangothini lwamaphoyisa, siye sibone amanye amacala okubulawa kwabathile ebekwa eqhulwini ngophenyo, kodwa awokubulawa kwezinduna namakhosi, wona awathathelwa phezulu,” kusho uShinga.Uthe kusuka ngo-2019, zingaphezu kuka-50 izinduna ezibulelwe, wathi amakhosi angu-12.

UBEPHILA impilo yobukhazikhazi, ezikhangisa ngokuhweba ngeForex omunye wabasolwa ababhekene necala lokubulala ngesihluku abesifazane ababili eKenville ngempelasonto.Izidumbu zabangani, oNksz Anele Mbokazi noNksz Zizipho Gabisa zitholwe zidindilizile kule ndawo. UMnuz Lungani Mthethwa ongumsolwa wokuqala, uvela ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ephethe imfumba yemali engamaphepha, enxenxa abantu ukuthi abamlandele ebhizinisini leForex ukuze bacebe njengaye. Kwenye yama-video uze ayidalule  imali ayivezayo isekhalibhothini, ethi ingu-R3 million. “Ngingumhwebi weForex. Ilokhu ke okungikhuthaza kakhulu. Uma ngithi ngilandele, uzofana nami, ngisuke ngikhuluma ngento enje,” esho eveza imfumbamfumba yemali engamaphepha ekhalibhothini. Kukhona lapho eveza khona izinhlobonhlobo zezimoto zakhe zenani eliphezulu. Uphinde avele esezindaweni zomntakabani. Kuleli cala uboshwe nomngani wakhe, uMnuz Sandile Chili, ongumsolwa wesibili. Bevela eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini, kuvele ukuthi ngaphezu kwamacala amabili okubulala, kukhona namanye ababhekene nawo.Phakathi kwawo kukhona elokushaya, elokubamba inkunzi nelokutholwa nesibhamu esingekho emthethweni nezinhlamvu.Abameli babo, uMnuz Nyameka Jondwana noNkk Sibongile Khanyile bekhuluma nabezindaba ngaphandle kwenkantolo, bathe abangakudalula okwamanje ukuthi abasolwa bazowaphika amacala ababekwa wona."Yize singafuni ukukhuluma okuningi okwamanje njengoba uphenyo lusephansi, kodwa abasolwa bazowaphika wonke amacala ababekwe wona,“ kusho uKhanyile.IMantshi, uMnuz Scelo Zuma ilihlehlisele uSepthemba 4 icala ukuze abasolwa bacele ibheyili. Uveze ukuthi ngenxa yobucayi becala maningi amathuba okuthi lidluliselwe eNkantolo eNkulu (yaseThekwini). UMshushisi woMbuso uMnuz Calvin Govendor, uthe bazosiphikisa isicelo sebheyili ngoba abasolwa babulale abagilwa ngenhloso.Udalule ukuthi ihhovisi loMqondisi wezokuShushiswa koMphakathi linentshisekelo ngecala njengoba limayelana nesihlava sokubulawa kwabesifazane.Uphinde waveza nokuthi ngesikhathi abasolwa beboshwa eSouth Beach, eThekwini batholwe nesibhamu i9mm nezinhlamvu ezingu-16 neselula kaNksz Mbokazi.Abasolwa kuthiwe bazogcinwa esitokisini samaphoyisa eDurban North.Ngaphakathi enkantolo abasolwa bebebukeka bediniwe, bebiphile. UMthethwa ubegqoke ihembe elinombala o-brown avela eligqokile kwamanye ama-video akhe abonakala ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, uChili ubedlubhe ezimnyama. Bobabili bebelokhu beqalaza emumva, bebuka ukuthi obani abeze enkantolo.Isolezwe liqaphele ukuthi bekukhona imindeni yabasolwa kuphela, ingekho eyabagilwa.Ithintwa imindeni yabagilwa ithe iphansi phezulu namalungiselelo emingcwabo.Ngosuku lwesigameko, abasolwa kuthiwa bahamba bayolanda abafi emakubo eRiverview Park, eVerulam kwayiwa ebumnandini.Kuvela ukuthi abasolwa babashela abafi ngenhloso yokuthi kugcine kuyiwe ocansini, nokwathi uma kungasenzeki lokho, abasolwa babathatha abafi bayobadubulela eKenville.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi abagilwa nabasolwa bazane emasontweni amabili edlule, kuhlanganwa ememulweni othize.UNksz Mbokazi kuthiwa ubengumhlengikazi esibhedlela iGeneral Gizenga Mpanza Memorial (Stanger Hospital) kuthi uNksz Gabisa abe yi-pharmacist esibhedlela esizimele eMhlanga. Isolezwe lithole ngomthombo walo ukuthi kusize ucingo lukaNksz Mbokazi obelukubasolwa ukuthi batholakale njengoba ibifunwa kusetshenziswa enye ifoni eyi-Iphone enobuchwepheshe obukwazi ukuthola ifoni elahlekile yalolu hlobo. Isolezwe libuye lahosha ukuthi emotweni eyi-Mercedes Benz kutholakale amanye amaselula namajakhethi abantu besifazane. Abantu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana bebebabaza isihluku okubulawe ngaso abagilwa, kanti emuva kokuvela kwezithombe zabasolwa bebebiza uMthethwa ngesigebengu abanye bebethi sebephuma kuTik Tok wakhe.

UNGOTI wezomthetho uthi mancane amathuba okuthi inhlangano eyengamele ukhetho, i-Independent Electoral Commission (IEC), iphikise isinqumo esivumela owayengumengameli, uJacob Zuma, ukuba angenele ukhetho.UMnuz Mpumelelo Zikala, weZikalala Attorneys, uthe kungaba lukhuni ukuthi i-IEC iludlulisele phambili lolu daba ngenxa yesikhathi.“Inkinga enkulu ukuthi kune-timetable yokhetho, eshoyo ukuthi kufanele kwenzekeni, ngasiphi isikhathi. I-IEC iyona eyenza le timetable. Njengamanje i-timetable ithi i-IEC kufanele ishicilele uhlu lokugcina lwamagama abantu abazongenela ukhetho. Uma i-IEC ingathi ifuna ukusiphonsela inselelo isinqumo senkantolo lokho kungaphazamisa i-timetable.”I-IEC ithe ifuna izizathu eziholele ekutheni iNkantolo yezoKhetho ivumele uZuma ukuthi angenele ukhetho.Okhulumela i-IEC, uNksz Kate Bapela, uthe bakhuluma nabameli babo ukubheka ukuthi iziphi izinyathelo zomthetho abangazithatha.Lokhu ukusho esitatimendeni abasikhiphe emva kwesinqumo senkantolo sangoLwesibili.Inkantolo inqume ukuthi kwakungekho emthethweni ukukhishwa kwegama likaZuma ohlwini lwabantu abaya ePhalamende.Igama likaZuma lalikhishwe emva kwezikhalo zabantu abathi akavumelekile ukuba abe ilungu lePhalamende ngenxa yokuthi useke wagwetshwa izinyanga ezingu-15 ebhadla ejele.Umthetho awubavumeli abagwetshwe isikhathi esingaphezu kwezinyanga ezingu-12 ukuba baphathe izikhundla kuhulumeni.UBapela uthe basalinde ukuthi inkantolo ibanikeze izizathu zayo zokuvumela uZuma ukuba angenele ukhetho.“Kubalulekile ukuthi inkantolo isinikeze izizathu zayo ukuze siqonde kahle  ukuthi ifike kanjani kulesi sinqumo.”UNksz Bapela uthe bebengakanqumi ukuthi bazosiphikisa yini isinqumo senkantolo.“Njengamanje sixoxa nabameli bethu. Sizonquma ukuthi sizothatha ziphi izinyathelo uma abameli sebesilulekile. Kuzoba lula ukuthi basiluleke uma sesinazo izizathu ezenze ukuthi inkantolo ithathe isinqumo esithathile. Sinethemba lokuthi inkantolo izosinika izizathu ngokushesha, ukuze nathi sizokwazi ukuthatha isinqumo ngokushesha.”Udaba lokukhishwa kwegama likaZuma ohlwini bese lususe umsindo njengoba kukhona amalungu eMK abesabisa ngokuthi kuzoba nodlame uma uZuma egcine engavunyelwanga ukuba angenele ukhetho.UZuma uphezulu ohlwini lweMK lwabaya ePhalamende.

IBASE ingomane yomlilo i-DA ngodaba lokujutshwa kwamalungu e-ANC ezikhundleni zikahulumeni futhi ibukeka iwukhwezela kakhulu kunakuqala. I-DA isuse umsindo omkhulu ithi i-ANC kufanele ikhiphe onke amaminithi emihlangano yekomiti lokujutshwa kwabantu.Kuhlala kukhalwa emazingeni aphansi komasipala abantu bethi kuqashwa ngokuthi umuntu ukuyiphi inhlangano akubhekwa kakhulu ukuthi uneziqu noma umsebenzi uyawazi yini.Kamuva nje i-DA isanda kumemezela ukuthi iwusabalalisela ezifundazweni umkhankaso wayo wokulwa nomgomo wokujuba amalungu ezikhundleni. Ithe ifuna ukuthi kuvele indlela okujutshwa ngayo abantu kuhulumeni wezifundazwe nakomasipala.Ithe uma i-ANC igoloza ukuyinika imininingwane, izoya enkantolo iyoyiphoqa njengoba yenzile kuKhongolose kuzwelonke.I-DA ikhala ngokuthi uhlelo lokujuba amalungu ezikhundleni olwenziwa yi-ANC, yilona kanye oludala inkohlakalo. Ikhala nangokuthi kujutshwa abantu abasuke bengenawo amakhono nesipiliyoni esifanele. Ikhala nangokuthi uma sebefakiwe ezikhundleni basuke bezodansela isigingci se-ANC benze inkohlakalo.UMholi weDA uMnuz John Steenhuisen, uthe umgomo wokujuba amalungu amaqembu ezikhundleni udala inkinga.“ Abantu bakhethelwa ezikhundleni kubhekwa ukuthi baphethe amakhadi aliphi iqembu bese kuchithwa abasuke bazi umsebenzi. Uma wenza kanjalo usuke ubanga ukuthi abantu bakuleli babe nenkinga enkulu ngenxa yokuba nomuntu ongawazi umsebenzi nonomlando wenkohlakalo,’’ kusho uSteenhuisen.Uthe yingakho izwe libhekene nokucinywa kukagesi nokungasebenzi kahle kwezinkampani zikahulumeni. Uthe uma bengena emandleni, bayophasisa umthetho wokuthi uqedwe lo mkhuba wokujuba abantu ezikhundleni ngokwamaqembu.Kuyini ukujutshwa kwamalungu ezikhundleni ?Inhlangano uma ingenela ukhetho bese inqoba ukhetho ingena kuhulumeni, kube sekuba nesidingo sokuthi kuqashwe abantu kuhulumeni. Izikhundla eziqavile abafakwa kuzona ezifana nezezinhloko zeminyango namaphini azo. Izinhloko zezinkampani zikahulumeni nezinye izikhundla eziqavile. I-ANC yaphumela obala yasho ukuthi yona inekomiti elijuba abantu ezikhundleni futhi ikwenza lokhu ngoba isuke ifuna ukufaka abantu abaqonda kabanzi imigomo ye-ANC. UMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa wayilanda kabanzi indaba evele phambi kwekhomishini eyayiholwa yiJaji Raymond Zondo. URamaphosa wathi akukhona ukufaka amalungu kodwa basuke bewagqugquzela ukuthi awafake izicelo nawo azobhekwa uma sekubhekwa abantu. URamaphosa wakuphika ukuthi inenkohlakalo indlela abajuba ngayo amalungu.URamaphosa watshela ikhomishini ukuthi abantu abasuke bebaphakamisela ezikhundleni basuke benawo wonke amakhono afunekayo, iziqu nesipiliyoni.Izinsolo ezibekwe kuyona i-DAI-DA ngesikhathi imatasa ikhwezela umlilo oshisa i-ANC, kuvumbuke izinsolo zokuthi nayo inawo amakomiti ajuba abantu ezikhundleni kodwa izenza ngcono. UMengameli we-ANC uRamaphosa ukhale kakhulu ngeDA ethi iyaxokiza ngoba nayo iyakwenza lokhu esola ngakho i-ANC.Kuvumbuke ababengabaholi beDA asebashiya kuyona bethi nayo inalo ikomiti elijuba abantu ezikhundleni lapho esuke iphethe khona. UMengameli we-ActionSA uMnuz Herman Mashaba uthe i-DA iyamangaza ngalokhu ekushoyo.“ Kufanele siyivimbe indaba yokuthi amaqembu ajube abantu ezikhundleni. I-DA yake yakuzama lokhu ngesikhathi ngiseyimeya kodwa kwasho ukuthi ngiyanqaba mina,’’ kusho uMashaba.UMnuz Zwakele Mncwango we-ActionSA oke waba kwiDA naye uke wabhala eyichitha indaba yesikhalo seDA ngalolu daba.UMnuz Dulton Adams we-ACDP uthe lolu daba kudlalwa ngalo ipolitiki njengamanje.USolwazi Kedibone Phako ekhuluma nabe-eNCA uthe kuyahlekisa okwenziwa yiDA ngoba nayo inawo lo mgomo njengoba ixake i-ANC.“ Uma ubheka lapho bephethe khona eCape Town, eTshwane neCity of Johannesburg bebezama ukuphusha osopolitiki babo ukuthi bangene ezikhundleni zokuphatha. Lokho kukodwa kudunga isimo sokusebenza kulabo abasuke bebekwe ezikhundleni,’’ kusho uPhako.Lo msindo okhona ukhomba ukuthi kusafanele kubhekwe kabanzi ukuthi awukho yini umthetho okufanele uphasiswe ukulawula indlela okufanele kwenziwe ngayo. Udaba lokuqashwa kwabantu lubaluleke kakhulu kuleli njengoba kushoda amathuba emisebenzi.Kungenzeka ukuthi baningi abaphuthwa wumsebenzi ngenxa yokuthi abawona amalungu amaqembu ezepolitiki kodwa bebe benazo zonke izimfanelo.

KUQUBUKE umsindo emuva kokuvela kwezindaba zokuthi owayeyimeya yaseGoli, uDkt Mpho Phalatse, uhlukanise nobengumyeni wakhe uBrutus Malada, washada emuva kwezinyanga ezine ehlukanisile.Ngokubika kweSunday World, uPhalatse noMalada bekungakapheli neminyaka emibili beshadile.Kuthiwa manje ushade noMfundisi Gerald Nxumalo webandla iJubilee Global Ministries ngo-Agasti 31.UPhalatse (47) kuyahlaluka ukuthi akacucuzi ekuthatheni isinqumo ngomshado njengoba esedivose kabili. Okubenze bahlukana noMalada yingoba izihlobo zikaMalada bezivakasha endlini yabo nokuyinto abenenkinga nayo.UMalada ucashunwe ekuqinisekisa ukuthi bahlukanise ngo-Ephreli ngenxa yezinkinga zomndeni. Uthe babe nesikhathi esimnandi ndawonye.UPhalatse akatholakalanga ukuthi aphawule.Abantu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana  baphawule ngezindlela ezahlukene. UNtshavheni ubhale ku-X ukuthi abantu abamyeke ngoba uyakholelwa emshadweni.UShilukwa Nghonyma uthe: "UDkt Mpho Phalatse uphule irekhodi, udivose wase eyashada esikhathini esingangezinyanga ezine."UBillions4Her2 uthe uMpho Phalatse uyaqhubeka nempilo, akachithi sikhathi. Uthe uyambongisa.UJuddeRo uthe uPhalatse ubepheka imbuzi ngomhluzi wenye.

ZISASHAQEKILE namanje izihlobo zomngani ogwaze wabulala omunye emqashweni wakhe kwaH eNtuzuma, ngoLwesihlanu.UNksz Fezeka Dlamini (32) obeqashe kwaH kodwa ongowokuzalwa eMtshezi, kuthiwa ubulawe ngowesifazane obengumngani, bengamathe nolimi naye. Kuthiwa umgwaze ngommese wokupheka.Ziningi izinto ezikhulunywayo okuthiwa ziyimbangela yokubulawa kwakhe.Udaba lokuphuma kwesidumbu sikhishwa ngumngani, belukhulunywa nasezinkundleni zokuxhumana.Abanye bathi umsolwa ucasulwe ukuthi umufi okuthiwa ubenemali, ubesethi useyolala yena kanti umsolwa ubesafuna kuqhutshekwe kuhlalwe kuphuzwe.Abanye bathi bekubangwa imali yokuqasha.Isolezwe likwaze ukuthola udadewabo kamsolwa, uNksz Sanelisiwe Ngqeqe (39) othe umsolwa uyamlama.Uthe namanje isajama ingqondo uma ethi uyaqala uyacabanga ukuthi kwenzeke kanjani ukuthi udadewabo omncane, abulale umuntu abebengamathe nolimi naye.“Umufi wafikela ekhaya ngesikhathi ezozama impilo eThekwini. Uhlale iminyaka engu-15 ekhaya ngaphambi kokuyohlala emqashweni. Baqala lapho ukuzwana nodadewethu,” kusho uNksz Ngqeqe.Uthe ukuhlala emqashweni ubesanda kuqala.Uthe ngisho abantu bakubo kamufi, bebethi uma bezobheka amatoho eThekwini, bebefikela kubo sekungathi bangumndeni.Echaza ngokuzwana kukamufi nomsolwa, uthe bese kungathi bayazalana.“Umuntu obengazi, ubezitshela ukuthi yizelamani. Esikhathini esiningi udadewethu ubekuthola kulula ukuvuleleka kumufi kunokuthi avuleleke kimi ngingowakwabo,” kulandisa uNksz Ngqeqe.Uthe emva kokwenzeka kwesigameko, ushayelwe ucingo yizingane zakwabo ezimelamayo njengoba bengasenabazali futhi kunguye omdala, wathi abamtholanga ocingweni kwaze kwaba ukuthi baya eZimangweni, lapho ahlala khona.“Ngifike endaweni yesigameko esethule umufi, udadewethu esethathwe ngamaphoyisa, kugcwele inqwaba yabantu,” kusho uNksz Ngqeqe.Uthe ugcine engayizwa imbangela ecacile yokuxabana kwabo.“Ngizwe kancane kuthiwa bebebanga imali ye-rent kodwa ngazibuza ukuthi bayibanga kanjani imali ye-rent udadewethu enekhaya esalishiyelwa ngabazali bethu kwaM. Ngizibuze ukuthi yini emhlanganisa nemali ye-rent?” usho kanje, wathi uhlela ukuphindela khona endaweni yesigameko ayoqala phansi abuze ukuthi bekubangwani.Udalule ukuthi umufi nomsolwa bebefika ezinkambeni zikaFaro futhi bekuke kwenzeke ukuthi baphikisane ngamazwi.“Kodwa ubuthi uyababona ngakusasa, sebeyazwana, sebeyahleka, usungaphika ukuthi ngayizolo bebeke baphambana ngemibono,” kuchaza uNksz Ngqeqe.UNksz Ngqeqe ubelokhu ekhale njalo ngelithi noma ngabe kuthi bese kufike isikhathi sokuthi umufi ashone kodwa “ubese angaze ahambe ngesandla sikadadewabo pho?”Ukhale nangokuthi umsolwa njengoba eboshiwe nje, ubashiye nengane enezinyanga ezinhlanu, eyazalwa singakashayi isikhathi.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uthe amaphoyisa aseNtuzuma abophe owesifazane emva kokusolwa ngokugwaza umngani wakhe washona emgwaqweni uMartin Gumede kwaH eNtuzuma, ngoLwesihlanu.“Kuthiwa umufi ubesemqashweni wakhe nomngani bephuza ngesikhathi kusuka ingxabano. Kuthiwa umsolwa ugwaze umufi washona. Uboshwe ngamaphoyisa, kanti uzovela enkantolo namuhla,” kusho uNetshiunda.

UPHIKO lwezokushushisa kuleli ludide abaningi luveza ukuthi kukhona izicelo zebheyili olungeke luziphikise emacaleni athinta inkohlakalo nokukhwabanisa okwaholela ekubulaweni kwababili enyuvesi yaseFort Hare.Umbuso wamukele ukudedelwa kwabasolwa abangu-12 ngebheyili kodwa yala yaphetha ukuba kudedelwe abanye.Abasolwa bakamuva abangu-15 baboshwe ngenyanga edlule ezifundazweni ezine zakuleli. Kulaba basolwa kukhona no-Anwar Khan ongumnikazi wenkampani yonogada edume ngokugada osaziwayo futhi wayengunogada ka-Aka okungumrepha wakuleli owadutshulwa wabulawa eseThekwini ngonyaka odlule.Abasolwa abayishumi kulaba babhekene namacala okukhwabanisa nenkonhlakalo badedelwe ngebheyili engazange iphikiswe ngumbuso. U-Anna Smith, Paul Tladi, Lucrecia Davids, Mbulelo Gingcana, Nkateko Mawila, Nozuko Mabombo, Thamsanqa Sonjica, Craig Retief, Bradley Conradie noNthabiseng Makhoba bonke badedelwe ngebheyili kaR5000 umuntu ngamunye.Imigomo nemibandela yebheyili yabo ithi kumele basayine njalo ngoLwesithathu esiteshini samaphoyisa esiseduze futhi banikele emaphoyiseni izincwadi zabo zokuvakasha. Abanye abasolwa ababoshwa nabo uSarga Burger noGosain van der Haarhave bona badedelwe ngebheyili kaR50 000. Ngesitatimende esithunyelwe kwabezindaba, umbuso uveze ukuthi ngeke uziphikise izicelo zebheyili zalaba basolwa kodwa uzophikisa ezintathu, okungezikaTerrence Joubert, Anwar Khan no-Isaac Plaatjies obeyisikhulu esiphezulu kule nyuvesi. Umbosu uthe uPlaatjies uyayishalazela ibheyili kodwa ukuyilungelo lakhe ukuthi ayicele.  “Kuyilungelo lakhe ukufaka isicelo sebheyili kodwa kumele kucace ukuthi umbuso uzosiphikisa. Njengamanje uKhan noJoubert bazofaka izicelo zabo ngoLwesihlanu.Kulaba basolwa abangu-15, abayisishiyagalolunye bangabasebenzi abaqashwe iyona le nyuvesi kanti laba abanye ngosomambizinisi abaphakela le nyuvesi ngemisebenzi eyahlukene.

KUSUKE umsindo ecaleni lokubulawa kukaSenzo Meyiwa kuphikiswana ukuthi kuyiqiniso yini ukuthi uKelly Khumalo waveza izinombolo zeselula ezimbili emaphoyiseni wazigodla ezinye.UMeyiwa owayeyisilomo sikanozinti we-Orlando Pirates neBafana Bafana, wadutshulwa wabulawa ekaKelly eVosloorus, eGauteng ngo-2014. Kushushiswa abalisa abahlanu okuthiwa banikwa itoho lokujuqa uMeyiwa.Izolo bekuphekwa ngemibuzo ungoti wamaselula wasemaphoyiseni uLieutenant Colonel Gideon Gouws emuva kokuqeda ukwethula ubufakazi.Icala lisesigabeni lapho uMbuso weneka khona ubufakazi bamaselula uzama ukuveza ukuxhumana kwabamangalelwa nokwazana kwabo.U-Advocate Thulani Mngomezulu omele ummangalelwa wesithathu, uMthobisi Mncube uvukuze udaba lwamaselula nezinombolo zikaKelly. UMngomezulu ubezama ukuveza ukuthi uMncube akaze axhumane noKelly bexoxa ngokujuqa uMeyiwa. UMngomezulu uthe unencwadi kaKelly efungelwe lapho edalula khona izinombolo zakhe ezimbili.UMngomezulu uthe kulezi zinombolo akuveli ukuthi uKelly waxhumana noMncube. UMngomezulu unqandwe yiJaji uRatha Mokgoatlheng elithe kuke kwavela ukuthi uKelly wayenezinombolo noma amaselula amaningi ngaphezu kwayisithupha.IJaji licele uMshushisi woMbuso u-Advocate George Baloyi ukuthi alekelele kulokhu. UBaloyi uhambisane nejaji wathi ziningi izinombolo zikaKelly ezatholwa amaphoyisa kunalezo aziveza yena.“ Nkosi yenkantolo ufakazi owungoti wamaselula uColonel Lambertus Steyn wathi uKelly wayenezinombolo eziyisishiyagalombili,’’ kusho uBaloyi.Udaba lwamaselula kaKelly luke lwavela phambilini ngesikhathi kuthiwa wayexhumana nabamangalelwa. Ngesikhathi abameli bepheka ufakazi ngemibuzo kuke kwasuka isidumo kusolwa iJaji ngokuxhamazela nokuba nethika.UMngomezulu usole iJaji ngokuba nethika lingamniki ithuba elanele lokwendlala udaba.“ Inkosi yenkantolo ibuye igagamele ingabi nakho ukubekezela,’’ kusho uMngomezulu. IJaji langazibeka phansi nalo lathi hhayi ngoba lihluthuka kodwa likhuluma iqiniso.UMnuz Sipho Ramosepele ubuye wakhala ngento efanayo ethi ijaji alibaphathi kahle bengabameli libuye lingababekezeleli kahle. Icala liyaqhubeka namuhla kulindeleke ukuthi uMbuso ubize omunye ufakazi.

SIYINDABA egudwini kumalungu omphakathi wase-17 eMlaza isehlakalo sokutholakala kwesidumbu somuntu sikhishwe ikhanda emathuneni akule ndawo.Kuvela ukuthi ngoLwesine amaphoyisa anikele kule ndawo ngemuva kokuba elunywe indlebe ngokuthi kukhona isidumbu esimbiwe sasuswa ikhanda kwahanjwa nalo.Kuvela ukuthi amaphoyisa efika endaweni yesigameko, afice ibhokisi lingaphandle komgodi.Kuthiwa bekugcwele igazi endaweni yesigameko phansi njengoba kubonakale sengathi ikhanda lijuqulwe khona emathuneni. Isidumbu besingaphandle kwebhokisi.Umthombo okhulume neSolezwe Ngempelasonto ukhona endaweni yesigameko, uthe lokhu abakubonayo akujwayelekile nhlobo."Njengoba ngikhuluma nawe nje bhuti, ngikhona lapha. Nali ibhokisi phambi kwami, isidumbu sijuqulwe ikhanda. Ikhanda akwaziwa ukuthi lithathwe lase liyiswa kuphi,'' usho kanje.Isidumbu kuvela ukuthi ngesomuntu wesilisa futhi singcwatshwe ngoMeyi 12 kuwona lo nyaka.Kuvele ukuthi lesi sidumbu ngesomuntu obephila nokukhubazeka njengoba impilo yakhe yonke ubengaboni emehlweni. Kuvela ukuthi bakhona nabanye abangaboni emehlweni emndenini wakubo, okuthiwa babehlala kwa-U, eMlaza kodwa base befudukela, eKapa.Umphakathi osondelene nalawa mathuna okhulume neSolezwe Ngempelasonto uzwakalise ukukhathazeka okukhulu ngalokhu okwenzekile.Amalungu omphakathi acele ukuba kugodlwe amagama awo, athe ayathuthumela uma ecabanga ngalento eyenzekile.Abuze ukuthi aphephe kangakanani amathuna ezihlobo zawo uma kuzoba nabantu abangena kalula nje emathuneni, bambe igodi bese benukubeza isidumbu.Ngaphambilini kuke kwaba namahemuhemu okuthi isidumbu sisuswe nezingalo, okugcine kutholakale ukuthi akunjalo."Imbi kakhulu lento esiyibone yenzeka kulawa mathuna. Uma ingasukunyelwa kuyacaca phela ukuthi kusazombiwa ezinye izidumbu kule ndawo,'' kukhalaza ilungu lomphakathi.Elinye ilungu lomphakathi likhale ngokuthi umndeni uzwiswa ubuhlungu besibili njengoba isidumbu sesiqale phansi sayiswa emakhazeni.Bakhale kakhulu nangokuthi sekumele kube khona abantu abawaqaphayo amathuna ukuze kugwemeke izehlakalo zalolu hlobo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, ecashunwa yi-IOL, uthe amaphoyisa abizelwe endaweni yesehlakalo azithela phezu kwethuna elimbiwe. Uthe athole nokuthi ikhanda belinqunyiwe.“Kuvulwe icala lokumbiwa kwethuna ngokungemthetho nokunukubezwa kwesidumbu,” kusho uNetshiunda.

USAKHUNGATHEKILE umndeni kamabhalane wasesikoleni iMbazwana Primary eHangaz eMbazwana otholakale ezihilele ngoMgqibelo.UMnuz Musawenkosi Sunshine Zikhali (57) kuthiwa utholwe esethule kuveranda wasekhishini emzini wakhe.Ngokusho kwelungu lomndeni elibuye libe sekomitini lezokuphepha emphakathini uMnuz Vuyani Zikhali, umufi uphume engumuntu oyochitha amanzi endlini encane, kodwa watholwa eseshonile ngabo-6 ekuseni.Uthe uphume egumbini lakhe nonkosikazi lokulala ewumuntu oyochitha amanzi endlini encane ngaphandle ngabo-6 ekuseni, wangabe esabuya.“Utholwe esethule, ezilengisile, kwase kwaziswa amanye amalungu omndeni ngomshophi,” kusho uZikhali.Udalule ukuthi umshophi wenzeka nje bekukhona ukhanjana obelwenziwe njengoba umufi ebevakashelwe abashana bakhe abahlala ezindaweni ezikude.“Bekubuswa, kodwa kungesikho ukuthi bekunomsebenzi obukhona. Bekugayiwe nje ukhanjana njengoba ngokwesintu, kuye kwenziwe utshwala besiZulu uma kuhlangenwe, kujatshulwe,” kwenaba uZikhali.Uthe sekwenzeke umshophi, abashana bakamufi ebebevakashile bashaqeke baze bathi: “umalume uphuma engena nje esinika izidlo (ukhamba) ngayizolo (ngoLwesihlanu) kanti kuzophetha kabi kanje,” kusho uZikhali.Uthe kulukhuni ukuzama ukuhlanganisa into ebingaba yimbangela yokuthi umufi azibulale njengoba kungekho ncwajana ayishiyile ngaphambi kokuzikhunga.“Uphume ewumuntu obeyochama, ayikho incwadi ayishiyile. Akukho futhi abebike ukuthi kuyamkhathaza emoyeni ezinsukwini ezandulela isigameko,” kusho uZikhali.Uqhube wathi alikho elibi ebelikhona phakathi kukamufi nonkosikazi wakhe njengoba bebelale, konke kukuhle.Emchaza, uthe ubengumuntu obezithulela, uma kuxoxwa aqhamuke esengena ngohleko, engesiye umuntu wempi noma onenhliziyo encane.Uthe kulesi sikole ashone esebenza kuso, bese kuphele iminyaka engaphezu kweyishumi engumabhalane khona, wathi unkosikazi kamufi  ufundisa kuso.Okhulumela amaphoysa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa aseMbazwana avule idokodo lokufa komuntu ukuze liphenywe kulandela isigameko sokutholwa kowesilisa (57) ezilengisile.“Lesi sigameko senzeke emzini kamufi oseHagaza ngoMgqibelo. Alukho unyawo lwemfene olusolwayo nembangela eholele ekwenzekeni kwalesi sigameko, esisazophenywa ngamaphoyisa,” kusho uNetshiunda.

ISIFO sofuba ngeke siphele uma kusanenqwaba yabantu abadla ukudla okungenamsoco kuleli.Lokhu kushiwo uSolwazi Willem Hanekom wesikhungo esenza ucwaningo i-Africa Health Research Institute (AHRI), ngesikhathi ongoti asebenesikhathi eside becwaninga ngaleli gciwane beshiyelana inkundla engqungqutheleni edingida ngalesi sifo, i-8th SA TB Conference eqhubekayo eThekwini.UHanekom uthe asekubonile ngalesi sifo ukuthi uma abantu bedla ukudla okunempilo kuyenzeka noma benalo igciwane laso lingafiki esigabeni lapho lizobagulisa khona."Inkinga esibhekene nayo ukuthi kuleli kuneqwaba yabantu ababhuqwabhuqwa indlala abajabulela ukuthi badlile, okuseyiphupho kubo ukuthi ukudla abakudlayo kube okuqukethe imisoco edingwa umzimba ukuze amasosha abo aqine. Lokhu kusitshela ukuthi imithi iyodwa ngeke isilaphe isiqede lesi sifo. Siyoze silekelelwe ukuthi kube nomgomo wokuvikela lesi sifo." Uthe okunye nje okungakaqondakali ngalesi sifo yize sekuneminyaka eminingi sikhona ukuthi sithelelana kanjani.Uthe phambilini bekuthiwa uma onaso ekhwehlela kuqhasha amathe, oseduze kwakhe uba sengozini yokusithola. Kunolunye ucwaningo oluveza ukuthi uketshezi oluningi luphuma emakhaleni ngesikhathi onaleli gciwane ephefumula noma ekhwehlela."Ucwaningo lwakamuva luveza ukuthi bangaphezu kuka-58% abantu abanesifo seTB abangenazo izimpawu. Okungenzeka ukuthi iyona imbangela yokuthi lesi sifo silokhu siqhubekile nokuba ngesihamba phambili esibulala abantu kuleli yize kunezinto ezinhle kangaka esizenzayo zokulwa naso. Umbuzo ukuthi sizobathola kanjani abantu abanalesi sifo uma bengenazo izimpawu," kusho uHanekom.UDkt Refiloe Malatji oqale ukusebenza ezinhlelweni zoMnyango wezeMpilo zokwelapha iTB kuleli ngo-1994,  nomsunguli wenhlangano, i-AQUATIY Innovations, uvumelane noHanekom, wathi kusadingeka kutshalwe imali emkhakheni wokuqeda ububha ngoba lesi sifo simandla kakhulu ebantwini abanobubha."Kumele kulungiswe indaba yokushoda kwezindlu, indlela okusetshenzwa ngayo ngoba nayo inomthelela ekusabalaleni kwalesi sifo.  Ngasohlangothini lwezempilo akukho okusivimbayo ukuthi uma umuntu ekhwehlela simnike imishanguzo ngaphambi kokuthi kubuye imiphumela. Njengamanje uma sisola ukuthi umuntu uneTB simnika amabhodlela sithi akayokwehlela. Abuyele ekhaya egula enjalo. Sivinjwa yini ukuthi simnike imishanguzo, sisalindile? Ngesikhathi ebuyela ekhaya uthelela abangaki,," kubuza uDkt Malatji.

OSEZAKHELE udumo ngokubonakala emicimbini yokwethulwa kwemiqulu yezethembiso yamaqembu epolitiki ehlukene egqoke nezikibha zawo ngokuhlukana eMoses Mabhida, uthealikho iqembu lepolitiki aselijoyinile.UThembeka Dliwako (21) osedume ngeleNdlondlo yaseMoses Mabhida, uthe okwamanje usafuna ukuzwa okushiwo amaqembu bese ekhetha iqembu elihambisana nezifiso zakhe.Useke wabonakala egqoke isikibha se-EFF emcimbini wayo nese-ANC kowayo. Uthe usazobonakala nese-IFP namanye amaqembu.“Sengikubhalisele ukuvota kodwa bengingakabi nalo iqembu engithi ngizolivotela. Njengamanje ngisalalela okuthenjiswa amaqembu. Uma sengiwalalele wonke enza izithembiso ngizothatha isinqumo ngengizolivotela,” kusho uThembeka.Le ntokazi yaseHoneville, eMgungundlovu, yenza unyaka wesibili kwiHuman Resources Management eMnambithi TVET College. Ngakolunye uhlangothi uThembeka ubuye afaniswe nomculi kamaskandi uKhuzani, kangangoba abantu baze bathi kumele kwenziwe ulibofuzo ukuthola ukuthi abahlobene yini.Uthe akahlobene noKhuzani futhi akakaze ahlangane naye.“Akungithusi ukuzwa abantu bengifanisa noKhuzani ngoba nasekhaya bahlale besho ukuthi ngifana naye,” usho kanje.Uthe akayena umuntu olandela kakhulu umaskandi kodwa umculi amkhonzile kuwona uGatsheni wodumo lwengoma iHit After Hit.Ngokungena emculweni noma kwezobuciko, uthe akuyona into ayicabangayo ngoba akalona igagu kodwa kuziqondanele nje waduma ngenxa yokuhambela imicimbi yamaqembu epolitiki.Uthe nasesikoleni ziyambanga izinhlangano zabafundi ezidlelana namaqembu epolitiki.“Bonke bafuna ngingene ezinhlanganweni zabo ukuze ngijoyine amaqembu abo epolitiki. Kukhona nje oze wangiphuca isikibha se-IFP ebengizosigqoka komunye umcimbi wayo ngoba enginxenxa ukuthi ngijoyine  iqembu lakhe. Ngisho ngizihambela ngizwa abantu bengimemeza yonke indawo,” kusho yena.EleNdlondlo yaseMabhida uthe uliqanjwe ngabantu kodwa ikhasi lakhe leFacebook, uthe livulwe uyena.Kwabo uthe uyingane yedwa kubazali bakhe kodwa uyise unazo ezinye izingane ezimbili ezindala kunaye azithole ngaphambi kokuthola yena kunina. Abazali bakhe uthe badabuka eMtshezi kodwa sebehlala eMgungundlovu. Isibongo asisebenzisayo uthe esikayise kanti unina owakwaNdebele.

ISILO uMisuzulu Sinqobile kaZwelithini sisebenzise inkulumo yaso yokuvula isiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal ukukhumbuza izinhlaka zikahulumeni ukuthi yiso esibusa lapha kwelikaMthaniya.ISilo sinxuse izinhlaka zikahulumeni ukuba zinikeze ubukhosi inhlonipho obuyifanele.Lokhu kwenzeke ngesikhathi iNdlulamithi ikhuluma emcimbini wokuvula isiShayamthetho eMgungundlovu izolo.ISilo sithe asiyona inkosi yesizwe esisodwa, sathi siphethe iKwaZulu-Natal yonke.“Ngiyafisa ukucacisa okuthile nokumqoka. Ngokukhonjwa ngumunwe womlando ngiyazi ukuthi ngiyinkosana kaZulu. Lokhu angikungabazi futhi ngiyakuqonda ukuthi kusho ukuthini. Okunye engikwaziyo wukuthi ngokwemithetho yale ndlu, ngiyinkosi yesifundazwe. “Lokhu ngithi angikuveze ngoba sikhona isilingo sokuthi isihlalo lesi engiyinhloko yaso sibukwe njengento nje yemikhosi futhi yesizwe esisodwa. Ngiyanigqugquzela ukuba ubukhosi nibunike indawo yabo obuyifanele. Kanjalo nakubo ubukhosi ngithi abungazexwayi izinguquko okungenzeka ukuthi ziza nesikhathi esikuso.”IMbube ithe nakuba lilikhulu igxathu eselihanjwe wuhulumeni ekuthuthukiseni abantu kule minyaka engu-30 kuphethe uhulumeni wentando yabantu, kuningi okusafanele kwenziwe.Sikhale ngokuthi miningi imindeni ebhuqabhuqwa yindlala, sakhala nangobelelesi obudlangile KwaZulu-Natal.“Ngeke sincome sithi konke kuhamba kahle uma kusekhona abantu abacabanga ukuthi ukuxazulula ukungaboni ngaso linye emaqenjini abo nasemiphakathini yabo kumele kwenziwe ngezibhamu. Njengoba ngimi lapha namuhla isibalo esikhulu samakhosi, izinduna nabantu bakababa sisenhlabathini ngenxa yezibhamu. Ngenxa yezibhamu imindeni eminingi ibhekene nobubha futhi isele nezintandane, eminye ilahlekelwe ngabantu abebeyondla.”IMbube ikhale ngokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane nezingane.“Njengenhloko yobukhosi lokhu kuyangikhathaza futhi nani kufanele kunikhathaze. Abesifazane kuleli zwe nabo bayizakhamizi. Kumele bavikeleke, kumele bazizwe beyingxenye yezwe elinakekelayo nelivikelayo.”ISilo sincome imizamo yamaphoyisa aKwaZulu-Natal yokulwa nobugebengu, saphinde sashayela ihlombe izinhlelo zikaNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, zokuba nengqungquthela yokubhunga ngobugebengu.ISilo sinxuse zonke izinhlaka zomphakathi ukuba zibe yingxenye yengqungquthela ehlelwayo.IKwaZulu-Natal iphethwe ngokubambisana amaqembu ahlukene.ISilo sinxuse wonke amaqembu anezihlalo KwaZulu-Natal ukuba abambisane, sakhumbuza amalungu esiShayamthetho ukuthi awazimele wona, kodwa amele abantu.“Njengoba sakhele lesi sifundazwe saKwaZulu-Natal singumndeni, singumndeni omibalabala. Ukuba mibalabala kwethu akulona iphutha, kunalokho kusinika ithuba lokwazana, ukufundisana nokwamukelana. Njengezakhamizi zaKwaZulu-Natal kasidlule ekubekezelaneni kepha samukelane, samukelane ekutheni sehlukile nje kepha singumndeni. Njengosesihlalweni nenkosi yenu ngimi ngomumo ukunilekelela kulolu hambo nezinye izinkambo ezihlose ukuthuthukisa abantu baKwaZulu.”Umcimbi wayizolo ubungewona ubukhazikhazi njengokuvamile.Bekungokwesibili iSilo sivula isiShayamthetho kulo nyaka njengoba senza ngasekuqaleni konyaka.Namhlanje uNtuli uzokwethula umhlahlandlela kahulumeni wesifundazwe, khona esiShayamthetho.

AYABALISA amakhosikazi asePulangweni, KwaMaphumulo, asesithenjini athi akhonjwe indlela ngumyeni wawo ongusomabhizinisi ethi unengwa ukuthi kukhulelwe ingane yakhe yentombazane eneminyaka engu-16.UNkk Zandile Mthembu (uMaMchunu) (40), noNkk Nomaswazi Mthembu (uMaMhlongo) (38) bakhala ngesenzo sikaMnuz Vukile Mthembu (50).Bobabili bathi basamangele kakhulu ngesenzo somyeni wabo. Batshele intatheli ukuthi uthuthuva lususwe wukukhulelwa kwengane yentombazane, ebuza ukuthi ikhulelwe kanjani bekhona, yini umsebenzi wabo.UMaMchunu, ongunkosikazi wokuqala, uthe ugane uMthembu ngo-2017. Uveze ukuthi ingane ekhulelwe yentombazane ngeyakhe.Uthi bona abazange bamazise uMthembu ngokukhulelwa kwendodakazi yakhe encane kodwa bakhetha ukuthi azibonele yena ngenxa yokuthi uyindoda enolaka."Ngesonto eledlule ubonile ukuthi u.....(egagula ingane ngegama) ukhulelwe. Uvele waduba ngisho ukudla wathetha waze wabomvu amehlo. Angikaze ngimbone ecasuke kanjena selokhu ngamazi. Yebo kubi ukukhulelwa kwengane encane kangaka kodwa ukuthi usengaze asixoshe pho,'' usho kanje sakubalisa.Uqhuba uthi ngakusasa ekuseni ubatshele ukuthi mabahambe, usazoke acabange kahle ukuthi uyawadinga yini amakhosikazi anganamsebenzi njengabo."Uthe singamakhosikazi ahlulekayo ukukhulisa umntwana, wathi kuhle siphindele emakithi. Ngikhuluma nawe nje nami ngikithi KwaNongoma,'' usho kanje.Uthi ubone kungcono ukuthi umtanakhe okhulelwe ahambe naye. Ukhale kakhulu ngolaka lomyeni wakhe wathi kusamele athi ukulwehlisa.Uveze ukuthi banengane eyodwa kuphela. UMaMhlongo, ongunkosikazi wesibili, naye uthe ubuyele kubo KwaSwayimane."Ayikho phela into ebesizoyenza uma sixoshwa. Ubumbona kahle ubaba ukuthi akadlali usifuna sihambile ngampela emzini wakhe,'' usho kanje.Uveze ukuthi yena ungene esithenjini ngo-2021. Uthi umyeni wabo ubaphethe kahle akukho angabenzeli khona. Kodwa wase egcizelela ukuthi akazwani nje nhlobo nento ebhedayo.Ethintwa uMnuz Mthembu ngokuxosha kwakhe amakhosikazi, uthe umuzi wakhe uwuphatha ngendlela ethandwa nguyena ngoba nguyena owazilobolela yena amakhosikazi akhe."Ngicela ukubuza ndoda, njengoba ungishayela ucingo nje ungibuza ngamakhosikazi ami ngabe uwena yini owawalobola? Musa-ke ukungicasula ngoba uqala into ongeke uze uyimele,'' ethetha.Uthe uma kungukuthi amakhosikazi lawa agijime ayohlebela Isolezwe  ngokuxoshwa kwawo, azokwenza kube nzima kakhulu kulesi simo abhekene naso ngoba kusho ukuthi awasile.Isolezwe Ngempelasonto litholile ukuthi uMthembu unezitolo. Kuvela ukuthi ngaphambilini wayekade enamatekisi kodwa wawadayisa ekhala ngodlame kule mboni.

UZIZWA ethunazekile owesifazane waseNdwedwe osola umyeni wakhe ngokuthatha imali yakhe isinyenyela maqede wayolobola omunye wesifazane.UNksz Dudu Mzulwini (40) usola uMnuz Funimali Mthokozisi Chili (54) ngokuthatha imali yakhe wayozishaya zonke kowesifazane angamazi futhi angamtshelanga lutho ngaye. Laba ababaili kuthiwa bebehlala ndawonye emzini wabo oseNdwedwe.Lo wesifazane ubenemali ayikhokhelwe abesikhwama esibhekele abalimala ezingozini zomgwaqo kuleli, iRoad Accident Fund. Walimala engozini yemoto ngo-2018.Uthe wayenqume ukuthi imali ingene kwi-akhawunti yomyeni wakhe ngoba emethemba, kodwa uthi akwenzile uyokuxoxela amagwababa echobana.Uthi ubone ngezithombe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ukuthi uChili kade eyolobola.''Ngikhulumile naye ngamtshela ukuthi ngiyayifuna imali yami. Wavuma ukuthi ulobole ngayo. Emva kwalokho ugcine esethi uzoyihlanganisa angikhokhele yona kancane kancane,'' echaza.Uthi umtshele emehlweni ukuthi bekumele ayisebenzisele ukulobola le mali ngoba iyona ebikhona. “Uthe angingakhathazeki uzongikhokhela uR5000 nyanga zonke ize ihlangane,’’ echaza.Lo wesifazane othi usephenduke inhlekisa nakubangani balo olotsholiwe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, uzizwa engento yalutho kodwa kumcacele ukuthi umuntu ongamboni kakhulu, wumyeni wakhe.''Angifuni ukuqamba amanga, ingihlukumezile kakhulu lento emoyeni wami. Ngiyazibuza ngiyaziphendula ukuthi ingampela le ndoda ngiyenzeni ukuthi isingaze ingizwise ubuhlungu obunjengalobu.“Mina ngihlela izinto ezibalulekile ngemali ngala kanti yena ungihleka usulu,'' ebalisa.Uveze ukuthi bese beneminyaka engu-8 bendawonye noChili.Lo wesifazane uthe usekhethe ukumane amshiye uChili, amchaza njengowesilisa ongumhlukumezi ongabahloniphi abantu besifazane.Kumanje uthi usenqume ukumshiya uChili ngoba akaboni ukuthi uyoke akwazi ukuxola. Uthe wenza lokhu nje ubevele engamphethe kahle, emhlukumeza ngokumshaya.Uthe sekucacile ukuthi kanti nokumphatha kabi kangaka bese kwenziwa nawukuthi kugida uthando lwalo wesifazane enhliziyweni yakhe.Ethintwa uChili uvumile ukuthi kade eyolobola isinqandamathe sakhe, kodwa waphika ukuthi usebenzise imali yomunye unkosikazi ukuze alobole lena  yesibili."Ayikho leyonto, uqamba amanga bengingeke ngiyenze into enjengaleyo,'' usho kanje.Ube esekhala ngokuthi usendaweni embi akakwazi ukukhuluma kahle wacela ukuthi intatheli ibuye imthinte ngakusasa. Emva kwalokho akabange esatholakala.ISolezwe Ngempelasonto litholile ngomthombo osondelene nalaba ababili ukuthi uChili unamanye amakhosikazi amathathu awalobola, kodwa wahlukana nawo emsola ngokuwahlukumeza.

INDODAKAZI yowayengumengameli uJacob Zuma, uNkk Duduzile Zuma -Sambudla ifuna kuboshwe uMnuz Jabulani Khumalo emsola ngokuqamba amanga efungile.UKhumalo noZuma bebesenkantolo yezoKhetho ebiseNkantolo eNkulu eGoli, izolo lapho bekulalelwe khona udaba lobuholi beqembu. UKhumalo owaxoshwa eqenjini umangalele i-IEC neMK afuna bambuyisele njengomholi emabhukwini.Kungena leli cala nje iMK isematheni ngokugila izimanga okhethweni lukazwelonke obelungesonto eledlule.Ummeli kaKhumalo u-Advocate Mfesane Ka-Siboto, uthe incwadi eyabhalelwa i-IEC kushintshwa ubuholi yakokotelwa kwaba sengathi ibhalwe yikhasimende lakhe.UKa-Siboto udalule izinto eziningi athe azihambisani nencwadi kaKhumalo yangempela. Ubalule ngisho indlela asayina ngayo wathi ayifani. Okunye obekubangwa wukuthi ngabe udaba luyiswe enkantolo efanele yini futhi uKhumalo ubefanelwe yini ukufaka udaba.Ummeli kaZuma neMK, u-Advocate Dali Mpofu usole uKhumalo ngokuhubhuza amanga encwadini yakhe efungelwe ayifake enkantolo.UMpofu uthe kunamacala amathathu okuqamba amanga efungile okufanele uKhumalo abhekane nawo.“ Icala lokuqala yilapho uKhumalo ethi ubuholi besikhashana  bukazwelonke abunawo amandla okuthatha izinqumo. Kunencwadi ayibhalela i-IEC eyazisa ukuthi kuphethe ubuholi besikhashana bukazwelonke kuze kube kubanjwa ingqungquthela emuva kokhetho,’’ kusho uMpofu.UMpofu uthe okwesibili uNkk Zuma- Sambudla uyingxenye yobuholi obuphezulu njengoba uKhumalo esemphika nje encwadini efungelwe ethi akanamandla.“ Icala lesibili, kunencwadi eyabhalwa wuKhumalo azisa i-IEC ngamalungu asesigungwini lapho abala khona noNkk Zuma-Sambudla kodwa encwadini efungelwe usemchaza njengomuntu ongenawo amandla,’’ kusho uMpofu.Uthe icala lesithathu wukuthi uKhumalo uthi uNkk Zuma-Sambudla wakokotela incwadi ayibhalela i-IEC ezenza yena. Kuvela nendaba yokushintshwa kwemininingwane yokungena kwezobuxhakaxhaka be-IEC yanikwa uNkk Zuma-Sambudla.UMpofu uthe uNkk Zuma- Sambudla uzimisele ngokuvulela uKhumalo icala aphinde amsasazele ngabameli ngokumehlisa isithunzi.Okuqaphelekile enkantolo wukuthi uKhumalo ubehleli eqhelelene kakhulu noZuma kungathi abazani. UKhumalo ubehleli emuva kommeli wakhe noZuma ngapha emuva kwethimba lakhe.Amajaji asigodlile isinqumo athe adinga isikhathi sokuyocubungula kabanzi okwethulwe phambi kwawo.

NKOSIKHONA CELEINHLANGANO ekhuthaza ubunye ezizweni ezahlukene, nokuziphatha emantombazaneni nasezinsizweni, Indoni SA izoqala isikole sokucija abantu abasha ngokwamakhono ukuze bakwazi ukuziphilisa.Lokhu kudalulwe uSihlalo wayo, uDkt Nomcebo Mthembu ngesikhathi begubha usuku olukhulu lwentsha ngomcimbi Inkehli Youth Festival eRichmond, eNdoni Village.Ngalolu suku bekukade kuhlanganyele ndawonye abantu abasha bezizwe ezahlukene bencintisana ngemidlalo eyahlukene eyayidlalwa kudala. Kuyona kubalwa umagalobhe, umlabalaba neminye.Bancintisane nangendlamu nangomculo, kwanqoba iqembu Abahliphizi. UDkt Mthembu uthe kumele balekelelwe abantu abasha abanamakhono ukuze bakwazi ukuwacija amakhono abo ebese besebenzisa wona ukuziphilisa.Uthe yingakho befinyelele esinqumeni sokuthi basebenzisane nezinye izinhlaka ukuqinisekisa ukuthi acijwa ngendlela efanele amakhono entsha.Uthe ehlukene amakhono abantu abasha abangaba nawo. Uthe kodwa bazolekelelwa kuwona wonke. Uthe kungaba elomculo, ukubhaka, noma ke ukuthunga. Uveze ukuthi kunesikole abazosebenzisana naso kodwa abangeke basidalule okwamanje."Iqiniso ukuthi kulesi sikhathi esiphila kusona mancane kakhulu amathuba omsebenzi. Ngakho ke kumqoka kakhulu ukuthi abantu abasha bethu sibakhuthaze ukuthi basebenzise amakhono abo ukondla imindeni yabo,'' usho kanje.Uthe uma abantu abasha sebekutholile ukucijwa ngokwamakhono kumele bafundiswe ukuthi bangangena kanjani ebhizinisini."Uma ungumuntu omusha kumele wazi kabanzi ukuthi ikhono lakho ulisebenzisa kanjani ukuze wenze ngalo ibhizinisi,'' usho kanje.Abantu abasha bathe kuyabajabulela ukuba yiqoqo elisebenzisana neNdoni ngoba bancela kogwansile.U-Olwethu Matshikiza (14) uthe bahlomula okuningi ngokuthi babe yingxenye yeNdoni. Uthe bachazwa ukuthi bakhunjuzwa ngamasiko abo kodwa futhi banikezwe nolwazi lokuthi baziphilise.Induna yendawo, uMnuz Bongani Phoswa ithe kuyajabulisa ukuthi abeNdoni bakubeka eqhulwini ukwenza ngcono izimpilo zabantu abasha bezizwe ezahlukene.“Kuyawukhulula umoya wami ukubona abantu abasha bakule ndawo engikuyona becijwa amakhono futhi bekhuthazwa ukuba badlale imidlalo eyayibagcina bematasa emandulo,’’ usho kanje.

KUXOVEKE izinhlelo ngomzuzu wokugcina ngesikhathi kuhoxiswa umcimbi wezitshudeni zaseCoastal TVET College wokuthweswa iziqu obekuhlelwe ukuthi ube ngoLwesine, nosekusabalale ngemiyalezo kaWhatsApp ukuthi usuhoxisiwe.Lo mcimbi wamakhempasi ayisishiyagalombili eleli kolishi ubuzoba sekhempasini eseMbumbulu. Esinye sezitshudeni ebezifunda kulesi sikhungo, esicele ukuthi lingadalulwa igama laso ukuze siphephe, sithe sishaqeke kwaphela nasozwaneni sithola lezi zindaba, sizizwa ngabanye abathole imiyalezo, okuthiwa isatshalaliswe ngezinkundla zokuxhumana ngabasebenzi basekolishi.“Ngathintwa ngocingo ngabekolishi ngo-Agasti 21, bengazisa ukuthi umcimbi wethu wokuthweswa iziqu uzoba kusasa, ngahlela yonke into ngoba yinto okukade ngiyifisa empilweni. Bengilokhu ngilindele ukuthi bangithumelele isimemo nge-email njengokuthembisa kwabo, nakhu manje sengizwa ngalokhu. Ngiphoxeke kakhulu ngoba ngisebenze kanzima ukuze ngifike kulesi sigaba esikusona manje,” kusho isitshudeni.Siqhuba, sisole abaphathi bekolishi ngokungasingathi lolu daba ngendlela efanele, nangokungena ezintangeni ngesizathu esenze kwahoxiswa umcimbi ngomzuzu wokugcina, sekuhlelwe konke.“Ngizwe ngesonto eledlule ukuthi umcimbi awusezukuba khona, ngaqale ngangakholwa, ngizitshela ukuthi abantu bayaphosisa. Kuthe ngithinta isikhungo ngibuza, baqale bangitshela ukuthi uhlehliselwe u-Okthoba, nalapho futhi bangacacisa ukuthi yini isizathu salokho. Akuphelanga zinsuku ezingakanani, saziswa ukuthi awusezukuba khona nhlobo kulo nyaka, kuthiwa uhlehliselwe unyaka ozayo. Yeka ukusebenza kwethu kanzima,”’ sisho kanje.Isolezwe liyibonile eminye yemiyalezo, lapho ingxenye yalezi zitshudeni, ize yenza i-group kaWhatsApp, ishayana ngamakhanda, kubhungwa ukuthi kungani isikhungo sihoxise umcimbi ngemizuzu yokugcina.Liyibonile futhi imiyalezo ethunyelwe ngokuthiwa ungomunye wabaphathi bakuleli kolishi, azisa izitshudeni ukuthi umcimbi awusezukuba khona, engachazi ukuthi kungani uhoxisiwe.Esinye isitshudeni, naso sikhale ngokuthi lezi zindaba bezingamukeleka kalula ukuba baziswe ngazo kusenesikhathi, futhi ngendlela efanele, hhayi ukuthunyelelwa imiyalezo ehamba ibhuza ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, bedluliselana yona.“Okubuhlungu kakhulu wukuthi bese sihlele yonke into, abanye bethu baze bakhokhela nezindawo zokulala eziseThekwini ngoba behlala kude, futhi bengeke bakwazi ukufika emcimbini, bese begoduka ngosuku olulodwa. Ngizwe nokuthi kunesitshudeni esiseDubai, lapho ebesisebenza khona, ebese sikhokhele ngisho amathikithi ebhanoyi ukuza emcimbini,” kusho isitshudeni.Kuthintwa uMnuz Mthokozisi Ndlovu, osezinhlakeni zobuholi kuleli kolishi, ubuze intatheli ukuthi inombolo yakhe iyithathe kuphi, wacela ukuthi kuthintwe owophiko lwezokuxhumana, athe nguyena ozoba nezimpendulo eziqondile ngalolu daba.Ethintwa owophiko lwezokuxhumana, uMnuz Thami Ngcobo, ucingo lwakhe belukhala umlibe lungabanjwa, wangawuphendula umyalezo awuthunyelelwe nge-WhatsApp.

SIYALELWE ukuthi sifunele izitshudeni ezinye izindawo zokufunda nokuthi singabe sisamukela izitshudeni ezintsha izikhungo ezine ezingaphansi kwe-Educor, ezikhishwe ohlwini lwezikhungo ezizimele nguMnyango weMfundo ePhakeme nokuQeqesha.Lokhu kuvezwe nguNgqongqoshe walo Mnyango uDkt Blade Nzimande izolo ekhuluma nabezindaba ePitoli ukuthi lezi zikhungo okuyiDamelin, City Varsity, Icesa City Campus neLyceum College, zikhishiwe ngaphansi kwezikhungo ezibhalisiwe ngumnyango wakhe.Uthe izinkinga ezithinta inkohlakalo, ukungalethwa kolwazi oluthinta ukusebenza kwezimali, ukukokotelwa kwesibalo sezitshudeni, ukungakhokhelwa kwabasebenzi ngezinye zezinto ezibhekene nalezi zikhungo.Uveze ukuthi ngoLwesihlanu umnyango wakhe ufake ngaphansi komqulu kahulumeni ukuthi lezi zikhungo azisabhalisiwe ngaphansi kwawo.“Kusuka ngo-2021 no-2022 i-Educor ephethe lezi zikhungo ihlulekile ukuletha ulwazi oluthinta ukusebenza kwezimali.“Kumele i-Educor ifunele izitshudeni ezinye izindawo zokufunda ukuze ziphothule iziqu zazo. Siqale ukusebenza nobuholi obusha balezi zikhungo kusuka ngo-2012.“Besibucela ukuthi bulungise izinto buhambisane nomthetho kodwa bulokhu bucela ukululelwa isikhathi ukuze buzilungise, okugcina ngokuthi zingalungi,” kusho uDkt Nzimande. Uthe manje kumele kuqhutshekwe nezitshudeni ezikhona zize zithweswe iziqu kungamukelwa ezintsha. Udalule ukuthi sekuyihlandla lesithathu i-Educor icela ukululelwa isikhathi ukuze ilungise izinto. Manje icele kuze kube u-Okthoba nonyaka.Uthe bazoyinika leli thuba lokulungisa izinto ngoba bafuna ukuvikela isithunzi seziqu zakuleli, ukuze kungabi nongabazane ngazo.Ukhale ngokuthi i-Educor yakokotela isibalo sezitshudeni enazo yathi zingu-50 000, ekubeni zingu-13 086 kanti ubezithola izikhalazo njalo ngalezi zikhungo.“Kukhona ezinye ezithinta ukuthi izitshudeni zagixabezwa ngamamaki okuthi ziphasile ekubeni zingaphasanga. Okunye ukungaholelwa kwezisebenzi, izinga eliphansi lokufundisa, abasebenzi abangenazo iziqu ezifanele zokufundisa, ukushaywa indiva uma izitshudeni zifuna imali yazo, ukukhokhelwa imali encane kwabasebenzi nezinye,” eqhuba.Uthe izinto ezithinta ukusebenza kwemali ezikhungweni yinto ebalulwa ngisho emthethweni.Uveze ukuthi izinto okukhalwa ngazo ngalezi zikhungo zigcina zingalungiswanga. “Izitshudeni kumele ezinsukwini ezingu-14 kushicilelwe indaba yalezi zikhungo, zinikwe imiphumela yazo, zibuyiselwe imali nokuthi lezo esezizophothula iziqu zibhaliswe izivivinyo zithweswe nemiyezane. “Nginxusa abasebenzi ukuthi baye enkantolo yezabasebenzi noma eCCMA (Commission for Conciliation, Mediation and Arbitration. ukuze basizakale,” kusho uNgqongqoshe.Uzwakalise ukukhathazeka ngokuthi ezinye zalezi zikhungo iDamelin, inomlando kuleli njengoba selokhu yabakhona kusuka ngo-1947.Kulesi sithangami kucetshiswe izitshudeni ukuthi ziye kubameli ukuze bazisize zithole imali yazo.Okhulumela inhlangano emele imikhandlu yezitshudeni iSouth African Union of Students’ (SAUS) uMnuz Asive Dlanjwa, uthe baphatheke kabi ngezitshudeni ezizosala dengwane ngenxa yalesi simo.

BAZWAKALISE indumalo abe-MK inkantolo ivimba umholi wale nhlangano, uDkt John Hlophe, ukuthi ahambele imihlangano yekomiti eliluleka umengameli ngezobulungiswa.INkantolo eNkulu eWestern Cape ikhiphe isivimbelo sesikhashana esivimba ukuthi uHlophe ahambele imihlangano yekomiti iJudicial Service Commission kuze kuba kuphuma isinqumo esicelweni sokuthi akhishwe kuleli komiti.Isinqumo senkantolo kuleli cala elifakwe i-DA nezinye izinhlangano ezifuna uHlophe achithwe ekomitini, sikhishwe ngoLwesihlanu.Nakuba i-MK ithe asiyethusanga isinqumo senkantolo, izwakalise ukudumala.“Akusimangazi lokhu okwenzekile ngoba sihlezi sisho ukuthi izinkantolo ziqhoqhobelwe abathize.
