Leli yiqhinga lezepolitiki lokuvimba ukuthi uHlophe abe ingxenye yekomiti,” kusho isitatimende esikhishwe i-MK.I-MK iqhube yathi into eyenza ukuthi i-DA ingafuni ukuthi uHlophe abe ingxenye yaleli komiti eliphakamisa amagama okufanele babe amajaji, ukuthi ifuna uHlophe angaphazamisi ukuqokwa kwalabo abafunwa i-DA kwesenhloko yamajaji eWestern Cape.“Bayazi ukuthi uHlophe akasinisi amahleza, lapho kukhona yena akudlalwa.”UHlophe wayeyinhloko yamajaji eWestern Cape, wachithwa emva kombiko walo leli komiti.I-DA nezinye izinhlangano zikhala ngokuthi uHlophe akakwazi ukuphinde abe ingxenye yekomiti elamchithayo.Okhulumela i-DA, uNksz Karabo Khakhau, uthe isivimbelo senkantolo sisho ukunqoba kubona.“Isinqumo senkantolo sihambisana nalokhu ebesihlale sikusho futhi sihambisana nemizamo yethu yokuqinisekisa ukugcinwa kwesithunzi nobuqotho kwezobulungiswa. Ijaji elakhishwa esikhundleni emva kokwephula imithetho alikwazi ukuthi lingahlala ekomitini eliphakamisa amajaji liphinde liqinisekise ubuqotho kwezobulungiswa.”UNksz Khakhau uthe bazoqhubeka nokulwela ukuzimela kwezobulungiswa.“Isinqumo sanamhlanje siyisiqalo nje. Ukuvumela uHlophe, owakhishwa esikhundleni emva kwempi yomthetho ende, ukuba abe ingxenye yokuqokwa kwamajaji bekuzokwenza ukuthi abantu baseNingizimu Afrika balahlekelwe ukwethemba ezobulungiswa.“Isinqumo sanamhlanje sisho ukunqoba kubo bonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika abafuna ukubona ezobulungiswa ezizimele. Isinqumo siqinisekisa ukuthi labo abanikwa umsebenzi wokuqoka amajaji kufanele kube abantu abaqotho.”Isinqumo senkantolo sisho ukuthi uHlophe ngeke abe ingxenye yemihlangano yekomiti ezokuba ngenyanga ezayo.

UMHOLI wamaNazaretha eThembezinhle, Inkosi uPhinda Shembe - Ukukhanyakwelanga, usethathe isinqumo sokulidlulisela eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo icala lokukhipha eBuhleni umholi wamaNazaretha, Inkosi Mduduzi Shembe - Unyazilwezulu.Lokhu kuza emuva kokuthi ngoLwesithathu iNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini iphinde yachitha isicelo sakhe sokugudluza Unyazilwezulu eBuhleni. Bese kungokwesibili kuchithwa isicelo salo mholi sokugudluza  uNyazilwezulu.UMshumayeli Chansey Sibisi, ophinde asebenzisane nabameli boKukhanyakwelanga, uthe bamangele kuchithwa okwesibili isicelo sabo.“Asazi noma kuyindlela yokusibambezela yini le eyenziwe yijaji njengoba isichithe isicelo sethu okwesibili. Okubuhlungu ukuthi ijaji alisithintanga nhlobo isicelo sethu sokuthi kugudluke uNyazi eBuhleni. Kunalokho livele lagxila endabeni yokuthi uNyazi lingumholi webandla, asikwazi ukulususa endaweni yokuhola amaNazaretha. Esicelweni sethu besingazange sikhulume ngokuthi ubani ongumholi noma ongeyena ngoba lokho sezanquma izinkantolo ngakho, ukuthi uNyazi aliyena umholi wamaNazaretha ofanele. Thina besifake isicelo sokuthi inkantolo ilugudluze esihlalweni eBuhleni ukuze kungene Ukukhanyakwelanga okunguyena mholi ofanele nowavunwa yinkantolo. Asazi ukuthi kungani ijaji liqala phansi ligxila odabeni esesadlula kulona futhi laphothulwa,” kusho uSibisi.Uthe sebexoxile nabameli babo ukuthi ngesonto elizayo bafaka amaphepha eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo.“Siyabona abanye bayajabula njengoba sichithwa yinkantolo ihlandla lesibili esicelweni esisodwa kodwa thina asithukile nakancane. Siyazi ukuthi le njabulo yabo izophela kungekudala sekuphenduka amatafula. ENkantolo yoMthethosisekelo icala lizobe selilalelwe amajaji amathathu, siyakholwa ukuthi bazosizwa isicelo sethu,” usho kanje.Okhulumela uNyazilwezulu, uMnuz Thokozani Mncwabe, uthe bajabule kakhulu ngokwenzekayo ngoba kuyakhombisa ukuthi uNyazilwezulu lingumholi ofanele.“Lezi zindaba zize kahle silungiselela inkonzo kaJulayi okuzobe kwenzeka izinto eziningi kuyona. Engingakusho nje ukuthi abantu abangayinaki indaba yamacala, siqhubeke nokukhonza uNyazi. Njengoba kuza uJulayi ziningi izinto ezizojabulisa amaNazaretha njengoba sazi ukuthi kule nkonzo kwenzeka izinto eziningi. Okunye kwakho nje ukuthi izintombi nto zizobe zihambise izintingo kuNyazilwezulu eNtanda, eMzinyathi. Kusuke kuwumgidi omkhulu wena owabona izintombi zihambisa umhlanga eSilweni ngosuku loMkhosi woMhlanga. Kuwona uJulayi kuzophinde kubhajadiswe inqwaba yabantu abazobe bekhetha inkolo yobuNazaretha, kuphinde kuyokhethwa nezintombi ebhentshini. Ngasekupheleni kwawo uJulayi kuzobe kuphuma nemishado kushadiswa khona ebandleni,” kusho uMncwabe.Uthe umhlangano kaJulayi uzosingathelwa khona eBuhleni futhi kuzobe kufike amaNazaretha aqhamuka kuzona zonke izindawo.

UZOKWAMUKELWA ngendumezulu yenkonzo yibandla asanda kulijoyina umculi wokholo osezakhele igama ngomculo waseZayoni.Umculi uNtombifuthi Shongwe odume kakhulu ngelikaMamkhokheli uzokwamukelwa ngemfudumalo enkonzweni enkulu engoMeyi 25, oSizweni eNewcatsle.Le nkonzo ihlelwe yibandla lakhe elisha alijoyinile Isibusiso Ibandla leNkosi Baptist Church in Zion of Southern Africa.Umholi waleli bandla uMbhishobhi Phumlani Dlamini ukuqinisekisile ukuthi kuzokuba nalolu hlobo lwenkonzo.Uthe isizathu salokhu wukuthi bafuna ukumamukela kahle lo mculi enkonzweni, naye azizwe emukelekile."Njengobuholi bebandla sibone kungcono ukwenza  inkonzo yokuthi simamukele udadewethu.“Siyathemba ukuthi lokhu kuzobe kusho lukhulu nakuyena.'' usho kanje uDlamini.Eqhuba uthe kube yinto enkulu kubona ukujoyinwa wumculi osezakhele igama elikhulu emculweni weZayoni.Uthe akangabazi nakancane ukuthi ukujoyinwa yilo mculi kuleli bandla kuzodala ukuthi linyuke nezinga lomculo kuleli bandla.Lo mculi naye uthe ukujabulele kakhulu ukujoyina leli bandla wathi kuningi okuhle akuthandile ngalo.Uveze ukuthi ubengakulindele ukuthi ubengaze enzelwe indumezulu yenkonzo yokumamukela ngokusemthethweni.Lo mculi kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi waqala ukuzakhela udumo esacula neGalathiya ngo-2006. Wayedlisa ngengoma eyayisihloko sithi Imali yomntwana.Waqopha umlando ngokuthi abe ngumculi wokuqala ngqa wesifazane waseZayoni ukucula ngayedwana kulolu hlobo lomculo.

NKOSIKHONA CELEWENZE isibophezelo sokuthi bazophathwa kahle abazalwane abasha abajoyina ibandla aliholayo, uMbhishobhi Phumlani Dlamini, Isibusiso Ibandla leNkosi Baptist Church in Zion of Southern Africa.Lesi sibophezelo uDlamini usenze kwindumezulu yenkonzo yokwamukelwa kwamalungu amasha. Inkonzo ibisehholo lomphakathi eMaromeni, eNewcatsle.Leli bandla belikade lijoyinwa nguMbhishobhi VJ Shongwe namanye amalungu afike nawo. Lena bekuyinkonzo enkulu ebiyenzelwe ukuba bamukelwe kahle futhi nabo bazizwe bamukelekile.Ekhuluma ebhekise kubona uDlamini uthe : "Siyabonga kakhulu ngokuthi nibone kungcono ukuba leli kube yilona bandla enilijoyinayo. Akusikhona ukuthi  singcono kodwa kuyacaca ukuthi niholwe umoya kaNkulunkulu uqobo. Okwethu nje ukuqinisekisa ukuthi asenzi ukuba nizisole ngokujoyina leli bandla.''UDlamini uthe kumhlabe umxhwele ukubona ibandla aliholayo lijoyinwa ngamalungu amasha eholwa ngumholi osenokhakhayi oluqinile njengoMbhishobhi Shongwe.Uthe kulokoza inhlansi yethemba ngokukhula kwaleli bandla njengoba ethi bafuna ukulibona liba namalungu amaningi futhi lisabalala nasezweni lonke.Konke lokhu uthe kungaba lula ukuba kwenzeke inqobo nje uma kwanda ukusebenzisana nokubambisana okuhle phakathi kobuholi bebandla.UMbhishobhi Shongwe uthe kuningi okuhle okudale ukuthi abone kungcono ukuba ajoyine Isibusiso Ibandla LeNkosi.Uncome ubuholi bebandla wathi bubonakala buyazi kahle into obuyenzayo nobuphokophelele kuyona. Wathi yingakho ke nje engazange ananaze ukuthi naye abe yingxenye yalo.Kule nkonzo bekukade kukhona noMfu Thulani Manana uqweqwe lomculi waseZayoni osenamava nosezakhele udumo.Le nkonzo ibihanjelwe ngabazalwane baKwaNongoma, Swatini, oPhongolo naseGoli. Bekukhona nebandla iTwelve Apostolic Church ngaphansi kukaMbhishobhikazi Zungu.

IZOKUBE ihanjelwe ngabaculi abehlukene indumezulu yenkonzo yomkhuleko ehlelwe nguMphrofethi Zakhele Dlamini odume ngeleKhosi.Le nkonzo izokube ingomhlaka-06 ku-Ephreli, eCinema eMlaza. Phakathi kwabaculi abazoba yingxenye yale nkonzo kubalwa uBabo, uSgwili, Andile Mbili, Abanqobi, IThimba le-Afrika, yi-Amazing Grace ukukha nje phezulu.Izoqala ngehora lesishiyigalombili ekuseni ize iphele ngezithuba zantambama. Ngokusho kukaDlamini inhloso enkulu yayo ukukhulekela abantu abazithola bebhekene nezimo ezinhlobonhlobo empilweni.Uthe lo mkhuleko uzobe ungakhethi iphela emasini njengoba uzohlanganisa abantu abavela emabandleni ahlukene.Uveze ukuthi balindele abantu abavela ezingxenyeni ezahlukene zeKwaZulu-Natal kanti ubugcizelele ubukhulu besasasa la lomkhuleko."Ziningi kakhulu izinkinga abantu bakithi abazithola bebhekene nazo. Yingakho sibone kungcono ukuhlela lolu hlobo lomkhuleko,'' usho kanje.Phakathi kwabantu athe balindelekile lapha yilabo abangasebenzi, abahlushwa yizifo ezahlukene nalabo ababhekene nezingqinamba emindenini yabo."Iqiniso elimsulwa lithi ziningi kakhulu izinkinga abantu bakithi ababhekene nazo. Siyathemba ukuthi ngalo mkhuleko kukhona okuzoqaqeka,''usho kanje.Uchaze umkhuleko njengethuluzi elinamandla okunqoba nanoma yini ema endleleni yomuntu. “Sifuna abantu bakithi bahlome ngomkhuleko basebenzise wona ukunqoba zonke izinkinga abazithola bebhekene nazo,'' echaza.Ukuvezile ukuthi minyaka yonke baye babe nalo luhlobo lwenkonzo athe ukholwa ukuthi luhamba ibanga elide ekulapheni abantu.

INDUNA yaseMdletsheni eHluhluwe iphonse inselelo kuziphathimandla zikamasipala waseBig Five Hlabisa ngaphansi koMkhanyakude ukuba kuqashwe onogada abazoqapha izakhiwo zomphakathi.INduna uMnuz Ndabazamanina Mdletshe ikusho lokhu emcimbini wokuvula kwehholo lo mphakathi  ku-Ward 10 muva nje, lapho kugqame khona isikhalo ngezikhungo zikaHulumeni ezicekelwa phansi ngabatshontsha impahla."Siyayizwa indaba yokuthi umphakathi kumele ugade leli hholo ukuze lihlale lisesimeni, kodwa esikhala ngakho ukuthi akube nonogada abaqashwe umasipala baholelwe. Lokho kuzosiza ekutheni kunqandwe izigebengu ," kusho uMdletshe.Uthe ziningi izakhiwo zikaHulumeni esezicekelwe phansi  ngenxa yokuthi azinabo onogada .Kumanje umasipala waseBig Five Hlabisa uphoqeleke ukuba ukhokhe imali engu-R15 million ukuze kwakhiwe kabusha inkundla yezemidlalo eyayenzelwe imidlalo yendebe yomhlaba ka-2010.Le nkundla okuyiNkosi Nkanyise Sports field, iseNhlwathi kanti igcine isiyidlelo lezinkomo nezimbuzi ngoba yacekelwa phansi kwebiwa yonke ingqalasizinda yayo.IMeya waseBig Five Hlabisa, uMnuz Comfort Khumalo uthe umphakathi kubalilekile ukuba uzibambele mathupha ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izakhiwo zentuthuko azicekelwa phansi."Siyanxusa ukuba umphakathi ubambisane nathi ekutheni lezi zakhiwo zingacekelwa phansi. Sicela nokuthi abenzi bobubi bahanjiswe emaphoyiseni ukuze iphele lento yokucekela phansi izikhungo zomphakathi," kusho uKhumalo.Umphakathi ukushayele ihlombe ukwakhiwa kwaleli hholo ngoba uthi usuzokwazi ukubambela imihlangano kulo neminye imibuthano yesizwe.

UMASIPALA weTheku usuveze ukuthi izinkinga zikagesi nokungasebenzi kahle kwe-motor yephampu kuphazamise ukuthunyelwa kwamanzi ezindaweni ezihlukene kuleli dolobha kusukela ngoLwesine.Kulindeleke ukuthi umsebenzi uphothulwe ngoMsombuluko 10 Juni uma kungabanga nezithiyo ezithile.Esitatimendeni, umasipala uveze ukuthi izindawo eziphakelwa amanzi esiteshini iNorthdene ngeke zibe namanzi.Uthe amathimba aseqalile ukulungisa izinkinga zokusebenza kwephampu ukuze ngoMsombuluko abantu bakwazi ukuwathola amanzi. Iphampu efile isiza ukuthumela amanzi ezinqolobaneni ezihlukene eziphakela ompompi emizini yezakhamuzi zeTheku.Izindawo ezingenamanzi njengamanje yilezi: Buffels Bosch, Burlington Heights, Savanah Park, Shallcross, Crossmoor, Klaarwater, Savannah Park, St Wendolins (KwaSanti), Arena Park, Chatsworth, Ehlanzeni, KwaMgaga, Montford, Moorton, Risecliff, Welbedacht East ne-West, Westcliff, Woodhurst.Ezinye ezithintekayo yiMariannheights, Mariann Industrial Park, Nsizwakazi, Phumphele, Umshinini, Ezinyathini, Luganda, Nagina, Pineview, Regency Park, Sithundu Hills, Malvern, Queensburgh, Northdene neMoseley Park. Kuvela ukuthi mabili amanye ama-motor afile azofakwa ngoJulayi nangoNovemba kodwa uma sekubuyiselwe lena eyodwa imiphakathi ethintekayo izokwazi ukuthola amanzi.UMasipala uthe uzothumela amaloli athwala amanzi kube yiwona azosiza umphakathi kulesi sikhathi.Ngeminye imininingwane, ukuba umphakathi u-downloade i-app kaMasipala weTheku noma uthumela u-whatsapp ku-073 1483 477 ukubika ukuphazamiseka nokuthunyelwa kwezidingo.
