INGCABHA isisemphakathini ukuthi uphawule ngoMthethosivivinywa ozolawula ohulumeni bokubambisana kuleli.Ngalo mthethosivivinywa i-Local Government: Municipal Structures Amendment Bill, kuhloswe ukwakha imigomo ezolawula labo hulumeni ukuze kungandi izinkinga zokuphatha ezikhona ikakhulu emkhandlwini ephethwe ngokubambisana amaqembu ahlukene.UNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu kuleli uNkk Thembi Nkadimeng, uthe uyakwamukela ukukhishelwa umphakathi ukuze uphawule ngoMthethosivivinywa.Awukho umthetho ofuze lo kuleli ekubeni kubukeka uhulumeni kazwelonke uzophathwa ngokuhlanganyela ngenxa yokuthi alikho iqembu elidle umhlanganiso okhethweni lwangeledlule.“Lo Mthethosivivinywa uza ngesikhathi lapho kudingeka kube nemigomo ezolawula ohulumeni bokubambisana. Uza ngesikhathi omasipala abangu-81 bephethwe ngokuhlanganyela emuva kokhetho lohulumeni basekhaya lwango-2021,” kusho uNkk Nkadimeng.Ukwanda kwale mikhandlu okungekho iqembu eliwine ngamalengiso, kwenza kube nesidingo sokuthi indaba yezinselelo ezibhekene nale mikhandlu okubalwa nendaba yokuhanjiswa kwezidingo kanjalo nokungabikhona kozinzo.“Ukuchitshiyelwa kwalo Mthethosivivinywa kuzophoqa amaqembu ukuthi angene esivumelwaneni esibhaliwe esizokwenza ukuthi asebenzisane lapho kungekho khona iqembu elidle umhlanganiso elingakwazi ukubumba uhulumeni ngalodwana. Sikholwa ngukuthi lo Mthethosivivinywa uzokwazi ukulungisa nendaba yokuthi amaqembu amancane afune izinto ezinkulu ekubeni ethole amavoti amancane.” Uveze ukuthi kulabo hulumeni bokubambisana kubangwa nezikhundla igcina isishaywa indiva eyokuhanjiswa kwezidingo emphakathini.“Kuba nombango emihlanganweni kuliwe, imihlangano igcine ingasahlalanga ngenxa yokuthi izibalo zisuke zingenele. Isabelomali sigcina singaphasiswanga okuphazamisa ukuhanjiswa kwezidingo.” Ugqugquzele zonke izinhlaka ukuthi zibambe iqhaza zibeke umbono wazo ngalo Mthethosivivinywa.Okuqukethwe yilo Mthethosivivinywa ngukuthi imeya, iphini lemeya, usomlomo womkhandlu kanjalo namalungu esigungu esiphezulu angasuswa ngevoti uma sekuphele iminyaka emibili akhethwa. Kodwa lezi zikhulu bangasuswa noma yinini uma kungukuthi zihlulwa ukwenza umsebenzi wazo noma zephule umthetho.Abafuna ukuphawula bangabhalela umnyango ungakashayi uJulayi 5, 2024. Bangathumela ku:[email protected], noma bathumele ngeposi ku:Mqondisi jikelele emnyangweni uNhlamulo Mathye, Department of Cooperative Governance, Private Bag X804, PRETORIA, 0001

UNGQONGQOSHE weMfundo eyisiSekelo uNkk Angie Motshekga, uthe ingcabha ikubazali nasezigungwini ezilawula izikole ngodaba lwenyufomu egqokwa ezikoleni.Uthe abazali nezigungu kumele banqume ukuthi yiluphi uhlobo lwenyufomu okumele lugqokwe nokuthi lugqokwa kangaki, wathi umnyango ungabeka imigomo kodwa ngeke uzinqumele izikole nabazali ukuthi kumele benzenjani.Ukusho lokhu kulandela ukwethulwa kombiko wekhomishini yamalungelo abantu, owethulwe ekomitini lezemfundo ePhalamende, oveze ukuthi ezinye izikole ziba namanyufomu ahlukene.Umbiko uveze ukuthi kwezinye izikole abafundi abenza u-matric bagqoka inyufomu ehlukile, okufaka ingcindezi kubazali  okudingeka bathenge enye inyufomu kuleli banga ekubeni abafundi bezoyigqoka izinyanga ezimbalwa.“Okungijabulisayo ngukuthi ikhomishini ayisho ukuthi akuyekwe ukugqokwa kwenyufomu ezikoleni. Kubalulekile ukuthi igqokwe ukuze kube lula ukuhlonza abafundi,” kusho uNkk Motshekga.Uthe okunye okumele kubhungwe eyabafundi abagqebhezayo uma begqoke inyufomu.“Abanye balaba bafundi bagqoka amanyufomu amancane adlulwa ngisho ama-jakhethi abawagqokayo. Abakwazi ngisho ukugoba ngoba kuzovela iphenti, okungenye yezinto okumele kubhungwe ngazo.” Uthe kumanje kunezikhalazo azilungisayo ezithinta abafundi benkolo yama-muslim, abagqoka izikhafu.“Yinto engiyilungisayo njengongqongqoshe. Ziningi izikhalazo ezikhona ezithinta inyufomu esibhekana nazo singumnyango,” kusho uNkk Motshekga.Odabeni lwezinwele zabafundi kukhalwe ngokuthi zingaphazamisa uma zizinde kakhulu ngesikhathi kufundwa.Ikhomishini iphakamise ukuthi kudingeka kubekwe isikalo semali senyufomu ngoba kwezinye izikhawu ibiza kakhulu okushaya abazali ephaketheni.Amalungu ePhalamende athe akumele kuyekwe ukugqokwa kwenyufomu ezikoleni.USihlalo wekomiti ePhalamende uNkk Bongiwe Mbinqo-Gigaba, uthe ukugqokwa kwenyufomu kusiza ekutheni abafundi babe yinto eyodwa.Uthe elakuleli libhekene nenkinga yokungalingani ngakho ukugqokwa kwenyufomu kwenza kube nokulingana.“Udaba lokubiza kwenyufomu kumele lubhekane nekhomishini yezokuncintisana. Umnyango kumele uyibheke eyokuthi kwezinye izikole kunenyufomu egqokwa ehlobo, enye igqokwa ebusika bese kuba naleyo egqokwa ngu-matric wodwa.” UMqondisi jikelele emnyangweni uMnuz Mathanzima Mweli, uthe sebeke bahlangana nekhomishini yezokuncintisana wathi indaba yokubiza kwamanyufomu yinto eseke yaphenywa kwakhishwa umbiko ngokuthi kukhona ukusebenzisana kwezinkampani ezikhiqiza amanyufomu nemali eziyibizayo.

INKANTOLO yezokhetho  iyona ezoba nezwi lokugcina ngabazongenela ukhetho lukazwelonke ngoMeyi 29. Inkantolo izonquma ngalabo okuzobe kufakwe izikhalo ngabo, ngokuthi abakulungele ukungenela ukhetho ngoba bake balahlwa amacala phambilini.Ithuba lokufaka izikhalo lizovulwa ngoMashi 26 noMashi 27, nokuyilapho ikhomishini eyengamele ukhetho i-Independent Electoral Commission (IEC), izoshicilela uhlu lwabantu abazongenela ukhetho.Umphakathi uzobe usukwazi ukufaka izikhalo ngabazobe besohlwini lokuvotelwa, abangafanele.Lokhu kuvezwe yiphini lesikhulu esiphezulu se-IEC uMnuz Masego Shebhuri.Ekhuluma neSAfm izolo ekuseni, uthe uma sekuphothulwe lolu hlelo abantu abafuna kubuyekezwe isinqumo se-IEC sokuthi ibachithile ukungenela ukhetho, bangaya enkantolo yezokhetho.Uthe amaqembu azonikwa ithuba lokuthi alungise izikhalazo ezizofakwa. “Inkantolo ezoba nezwi lokugcina. Okwamanje asikwazi ukusho ukuthi umuntu othile uzokwazi yini noma ngeke akwazi ukungenela ukhetho ngoba uhlelo alukavulwa,” kusho uShebhuri.Usho lokhu nje kusanemibuzo ngokuthi owayengumengameli wezwe uJacob Zuma, okumanje ukhankasela iqembu elisha Umkhonto weSizwe, uzokwazi yini ukungenela ukhetho.Leli qembu liyiklame liyiklamile ekutheni nguZuma ozolimela okhethweni njengoba kukhona nezingqwembe ezinobuso bakhe. Nasohlwini lwaleli qembu elifolosa ngalo nguZuma ozihola phambili. UShebhuri uthe iqembu eliphakamise umuntu kumele liqinisekise ukuthi lowo muntu uvumelekile ukuthi angenele ukhetho.“Kwayena lowo muntu ongenela ukhetho kumele akuveze ukuthi uvumelekile ukuthi angangenela ukhetho. Ukuze ungenele ukhetho kumele kube ngukuthi awukaze udonse isigwebo ngaphakathi ejele esiyizinyanga ezingu-12, esihambisana nokuthi awuvunyelwanga ukukhokha inhlawulo. Okunye okubhekwayo ngukuthi ngabe isiphelile yini iminyaka emihlanu umuntu aqeda ukudonsa isigwebo,” kusho uShebhuri. UZuma wagwetshwa izinyanga ezingu-15 edonsa ejele yinkantolo yoMthethosisekelo ngokudelela imiyalelo yokuvela ngaphambi kwekhomishini eyayiphenya ngokulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana.Khonamanjalo sikhonjwe indlela isisebenzi se-IEC esiputshuze uhlu lwamagama abajutshwe yi-ANC neMK ePhalamende.Isikhulu se-IEC uMnuz Sy Mamabolo, siveze ukuthi lesi sisebenzi sinqanyulelwe inkontileka yaso.UMamabolo uthe bekungamele sikhiphe ulwazi olufuze lolu wathi besisebenza emahhovisi ekhomishini eGauteng.“Noma ngubani ophula imigomo yekhomishini ngeke simbekezelele. Sizimisele futhi sizibophezele ngokuthi sibe nokhetho olungenagcobho.” Izolo ntambama ikhomishini ikhiphe isitifiketi somqulu wezokhetho okhule waba nabantu abangu-27.79 million abazovota.

ZIKLANYWE ziklanyiwe njengoba konke sekulele kubavoti ukuthi bakhethe iqembu abalijuba ePhalamende naseziShayamthetho zezifundazwe njengoba ikhomishini yezokhetho idedele uhlu lokugcina lamaqembu nabazongenela ukhetho lukazwelonke ngenyanga ezayo.Kulolu hlu kukhona namaqembu amasha azobe eqala ukubanga amavoti okhethweni lwangoMeyi 29. Abalelwa ngaphezu kuka-36 amaqembu azobe ebanga amavoti, ingxenye eningi yawo amaqembu amasha.Amanye azobanga amavoti kuzwelonke nasezifundazweni ezimbalwa, kuthi amanye angenela ukhetho ezweni lonke.Emaqenjini amasha kukhona amagama aziwayo, kanjalo nangaziwa noma angagqamile kakhulu.Phakathi kwangagqamile kubalwa iSizwe Ummah Nation, engenela ukhetho kuzwelonke naKwaZulu-Natal.Amanye amaqembu esifundazweni nakuzwelonke azobe engenela ukhetho okokuqala kubalwa iRise Mzansi, Economic Liberators Forum South Africa, All Citizens Party, Build One South Africa, Africa Restoration Alliance, Umkhonto weSizwe, African Content Movement, African Congress for Transformation. Amanye amaqembu kubalwa iSouth African Royal Kingdoms Organization, South African Rainbow Alliance, Xiluva neCitizens.Bangu-12 abangenela ukhetho ngokuzimela, kulaba uyedwa esifundazweni iKZN.Ikhomishini iveze ukuthi kudingeka amavoti abalelwa ku-43 000 esifundazweni ukuze uthole isihlalo esiShayamthetho, kuzwelonke abalelwa ku-80 000 kuye ngokuthi singakanani isibalo sabavotile.Kulol luhlu lokugcina eqenjini iMK olikhankaselayo owayengumengameli uJacob Zuma useqhulwini labazihola phambili kwabaya ePhalamende, kuthi indodakazi yakhe uNksz Duduzile yona ingunombolo 18 ohlwini lwasePhalamende.Omunye okhona iNkosi yesizwe samaKhoi-San, uDkt Glen Taaibosch, oke wabonakala enoZuma ngesikhathi kulalelwe icala enkantolo enkulu kuleli sonto ongunombolo 41 ohlwini lwasePhalamende.UZuma useke wakucacisa ukuthi akusho ukuthi ngoba usohlwini ukuthi uzothola isikhundla.Umkhulumeli waleli qembu, uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndhlela, yena ungunombolo 25, ohlwini lweMK lwasePhalamende.UZuma ungene ngembobo yenaliti njengoba evunwe yiNkantolo yezoKhetho ukuthi abuyiselwe ohlwini emuva kokuchithwa yikhomishini kulandela isikhalazo ngokuthi akumele abe yingxenye.Kwamanye amaqembu uhlu alushintshanga.Amaqembu angabonwa ohlwini kubalwa i-All Game Changers, eholwa yindodana kaZuma uDuduzane. UZuma wayethembise ukuthi uza nezinguquko ezinqala ezweni. Leli qembu likhishwe ohlwini yikhomishini ngoba lingalandelanga imigomo ebekiwe.

BESABA ukuthi bangase balahlekelwe amasimu abo omoba abalimi baseMpangeni abangakwazi ukukhokha imali yokukhonzela amasimi. Laba balimi bomoba abathi bayizakhamuzi zesizwe saKwaMadlebe eMpangeni, abahlala eMevamhlophe, eNdabayakhe naseNqutshini bathi sebenqunyelwe ugwayi katiki wokuthi uma behluleka ukukhokha le mali ngoNovemba bazophucwa amasimu omoba enomkhiqizo.Omunye wezakhamuzi oneminyaka engaphezu kuka-60, ongathandanga ukudalulwa, uthe insimu abayilimayo engamahektha amabili yayilinywa uyise owayengakaze ayikhonzele kodwa ngoJuni batshelwe ukuthi abakhokhe imali eyevile kuR20 000.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe le mali iphakathi kukaR20 000 no-R100 000 "Induna yasibizela emhlanganweni yathi komkhulu kuthiwe sekunesikhathi eside silima singawakhonzeli amasimu sibe senza ibhizinisi ngawo. Kulo nyaka kumele sikhokhe. Sanqunyelwa ugwayi katiki kwathiwa kumele sikhokhe ungakashayi uNovemba. Uma sehlulekile iyadliwa insimu,"  kusho isakhamuzi.Esinye isakhamuzi ebesikhala ngento efanayo emsakazweni Ukhozi FM , sithe abakwazi ukukhala ngalokhu ngoba basaba ukwenzakaliswa."Kunamadoda asegade ukuthi singawuhlahli umoba ukuze kudliwe amasimu enomkhiqizo. Konke okwenziwayo kwenziwa ngesihluku. Siyasatshiswa. Akugcini lapho uma kuke kwafika ekutheni wena ufuna udaba lwakho luye enkosini uyabulawa nokubulawa. Asenzi imali eningi ngomoba uyakalwa. Ngokubona kwethu inkosi ifuna ukuwadla amasimu ngoba iyazi ukuthi baningi abazohluleka ukukhokha ingakho ifuna ukuthi sikhokhe singakahlahli kunokuthi ithi asikhokhe uma sesikhokhelwe, " kusho isakhamuzi.UNdunankulu wakulesi sizwe uMnuz Mbhoyi Zungu, uthe amasimu omoba ayibhizinisi bonke abanalama simu bayawakhonzela."Umhlaba uyakhonzelwa ezindaweni zamakhosi. Akuyona into entsha. Kusekhona inkosi endala ewuyise wale ekhona kwakuvele kunjalo.  Akuliwa kuba isivumelwano esenziwa naye umuntu avume. Kuyakalwa kuqinisekiswe ubungako bomhlaba.  Kuyaxoxiswana ngoba phela ngabantu besizwe laba akuliwa. Uma ekhala luyenziwa uhlelo. Asikho isikhalo esifike kimi njengondunankulu ngemali yokukhonzela amasimu. Inkosi ayihlangene nokuklanywa kwamasimu nemali yokukhonzela amasimu. Into eyenziwa izinduna. Leyo mali iya kwi-Trust isetshenziselwa ukuthuthukisa isizwe," kusho undunankulu.Uthe awekho amasimu agadwe ngamadoda aphuma komkhulu."Abagadene ilabo abaqashe umhlaba kwabanye, asihlangene nalezo zivumelwano thina. Siyacela abalimi ukuthi uma benezikhalo beze kimi sizame ukuyilungisa inkinga. Umhlaba owabantu besizwe bonke sinejoka lokuthi siwabe ngokufanele," kusho uZungu.UMnuz Senzelwe Mzila woMnyango wokuBusa ngokuBambisana KwaZulu-Natal, uthe lolu daba belungakafiki kubo basazofuna imininingwane ephelele ngaphambi kokuthi baphawule ngalo.

Usuyesaba umphakathi emva kokuba umfundi wokuqala kuleli kutholakale ukuthi uhaqwe iMpox.Umfundi waseHammanskraal eGauteng ungowokuqala ukuhaqwa ilesi sifo. Isifo besidlange kwabesilisa abanemiyaka ephakathi kuka-17 kuya ku-43.Ekuseni ngoLwesine iningi labantu lizwakalise ukuba novalo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngokusabalala kwaleli gciwane..UDumisani Mazibuko kuFacebook, uphawule wathi: “Siyabhebhetheka manje lesi sifo” UMthobisi Myende uthe: " Hhayi bo awucishwe lo  mlilo"UThobe Thobe uthe: " Shwele Nkosi ngenelela unqande lesi sifo kodwa soneni kangaka.Kuke kwaba nokudideka mayelana neqiniso ngemiphumela yalo mfundi ofunda uGrade 1 esikoleni i-Iketleng Primary,  eHammanskraal. Ekuseni uMnyango wezeMfundo eGauteng ukhiphe isitatimende uthi umfundi uhaqwe iMpox. Akuphelanga sikhathi esingakanani wakhipha esinye wathi isitatimende sikhishwe ngaphambi kokuthi isikhungo esibhekele izifo ezithathelanayo, iNational Institute for Communicable Diseases (NICD) siqinisekise imiphumela yakhe.UMnuz Steve Mabona okhulumela  uMnyango wezeMfundo, uthe abazali bomfundi bazise isikole ngemiphumela yomfundi ngoLwesibili, bathi umfundi uke wavakashela izihlobo ebezinezimpawu zeMpox  eNorthern Cape ngempelasonto edlule. Ngemuva kwezinsukwana naye ube nezimpawu wahlolwa kwaqinisekiswa ukuthi uhaqekile. Kuleso sitatimende uthe uMnyango wezeMfundo ngeke usakhuluma ngalolu daba kuzokhuluma owezeMpilo. Ntambana, uMphathiswa wezeMfundo eGauteng, uMnuz Matome Chiloane, uqinisekise ukuhaqeka komfundi. Ucele abazali bezingane ezike zasondelana naye ukuthi baxhumane nesikole ukuze zihlolwe ukuthi azithelelekanga yini."Ithimba le-Integrated School Health Programme (ISHP) lizovakashela esikoleni ukuze lifundise ngalesi sifo nangokuhlolwa kwaso. Siyaqonda ukuthi lokhu kungase kudale ukukhathazeka kubazali kodwa siyabaqinisekisa ukuthi lesi simo sisisingethe ngokucophelela okukhulu.” kusho uChiloane.

Kuzophoqeleka ukuthi amaqembu ajube abanye abaholi ezikhundleni zobumeya ezivuleke emuva kokushiya kwabanye ngesikhathi kubekwa uhulumeni omusha.Izwe libuya okhethweni lukazwelonke oludale ushintsho olukhulu ezweni. Kulezi zinsuku kumatasa kubekwa uhulumeni ozobusa iminyaka emihlanu.UMasipala waseZululand ophethwe yi-IFP, usale ungenayo imeya emuva kokwenyuka kukaMfundisi Thulasizwe Buthelezi waya kuhulumeni wesifundazwe. UButhelezi ubuyela njengokugiya eSishayamthetho ngoba wayekhona phambilini.UButhelezi obuye abe wuNdunankulu kaZulu, uqokelwe kwesoMphathiswa wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu. UButhelezi umenyezelwe wuNdunankulu omusha uMnuz Thami Ntuli, ngoLwesibili.UNtuli onguNdunankulu omusha umemezele abaphathiswa bakhe eqeda ukufungiswa eMgungundlovu ngoLwesibili emcimbini obukade ubhekwe ngabomvu.UNtuli naye ubeyimeya yaseKing Cetshwayo njengoba esekhuphukele ekuphatheni uhulumeni wesifundazwe. Nakhona eKing Cetshwayo eseRichards Bay, kuzophoqa ukuthi kuvalwe isikhala sakhe sobumeya.Okhulumela i-IFP uMnuz Mkhuleko Hlengwa, uthe bayazi ukuthi kunezikhala ezivulekile futhi akonakele lutho. Uthe akukho ukuphazamiseka kokusebenza okuzoba khona ngokwenyuka kwezimeya.“Amaphini ezimeya azobamba ezikhundleni kuze kube kuqokwa izimeya zomasipala. Kunzima okwamanje ukusho ukuthi yinto yanini,’’ kusho uHlengwa.Ngaphandle kwezimeya ze-IFP kuphinde kwavuleka isikhala semeya yeTheku ngesikhathi kwesula uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda yena osejutshwe ePhalamende.UKaunda wesule kungasazelele muntu emuva kokuthi kade kwasa evika izagila ngapha nangapha bezama ukumketula. UKaunda ehamba wathi i-ANC izowusingatha umsebenzi wokuqokwa kwemeya entsha maduze.Igama likaMnuz Cyril Xaba lilokhu livela njengokunguyena osikazwayo esikhundleni semeya yeTheku. UXaba akasabuyeli ePhalamende emuva kokhetho. UXaba uthathwa njengonesipiliyoni kakhulu ekusebenzeleni uhulumeni emazingeni ehlukene.

KUNGASE kuphoqe ukuthi aboMkhonto weSizwe Party bayolola abanye  abaholi abazolungela ukuba seqhulwini lohlu lwasePhalamende kuleli qembu emuva kokuthi iNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo ichithe uJacob Zuma.IJaji Leona Theron laseNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo, ngoMsombuluko, likhiphe isinqumo esichitha uZuma. I-IEC yayimemezele ukuthi uZuma akafanelwe wukuba sohlwini lwasePhalamende ngoba walahlwa ngecala wagwetshwa.Udaba luhambe lwaze lwafika eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo ekhiphe isinqumo yathi uZuma neqembu lakhe bangasifaka isikhalo kuyona.UZuma ubephezulu ohlwini lwe-MK lwasePhalamende futhi ubuso bakhe busazoqhubeka buvele emaphepheni okuvota. Uhlu lwe-MK lugqishe amagama angenasigqi kangako kwezepolitiki.Uhlu luphinde lube negama likaNkk Duduzile Zuma-Sambudla oyindodakazi kaZuma nohleli kunombolo 18. Ukuchithwa kukaZuma kusho ukuthi i-MK inezikhala ezimbili ohlwini - esikaMnuz Jabulani Khumalo owaxoshwa nesakhe uMsholozi. Kufanele i-MK ivale izikhala ePhalamende emuva kokhetho uma izitholile izihlalo.Abahlaziyi bezepolitiki bathe kufanele i-MK ibheke ukuthi ifaka abantu abanjani ePhalamende ukuze iqinise ikhokhasi yayo. Umhlaziyi ozinze e-UKZN uMnuz Zakhele Ndlovu, uthe abe-MK kufanele bafake abantu abanohlonze. UNdlovu ukhulume ngegama likaMnuz Nathi Nhleko osanda kujoyina i-MK esuka kwi-ANC. Kukhona ezikhulunyelwa phansi ezithi uNhleko angase angene ePhalamende.“Isinqumo senkantolo asibalimazi kakhulu ngoba uZuma usazoqhubeka avele ephepheni lokuvota. Abantu abaningi vele beze ngaye uZuma kwi-MK. Kufanele bathole umuntu onohlonze njengaye uNhleko osemdala epolitikini nonesipiliyoni,’’ kusho uNdlovu.UNhleko uthintiwe ngalokhu, wakuhleka usulu wathi amampunge nje akhulunywa abantu.“Angikho ngisho ohlwini lwasePhalamende futhi akungikhathazi lokho. Nginikwe umsebenzi wokuba wumgqugquzeli kuzwelonke, ngimatasa nawo,’’ kusho uNhleko.Umhlaziyi wezepolitiki uSolwazi Bheki Mngomezulu, uthe isinqumo senkantolo asisho lutho olutheni kwi-MK.“Ngeke kushintshe ukuthi ubuso bukaZuma buzoba sephepheni lokuvota. Kuyakhathaza khona ukuthi akekho umuntu onohlonze ohlwini lwasePhalamende kodwa isigungu esiphezulu okufanele siqine silungise lolu daba,’’ kusho uMngomezulu.Okhulumela i-MK, uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndhlela, uthe uZuma nobuholi beqembu bazobonana nabameli bese bukhuluma nezwe emuva kwalokho. UNdhlela ushiye angalazi emajajini ewasola ngokuchema nokwenzelela.Uthe akudikizi ngisho inqulu kubona ngesinqumo senkantolo kodwa sibanika omkhulu umdlandla wokuthi baqhubekele phambili.

KUZOQOPHEKA umlando eMkhosini woMhlanga wakulo nyaka ozokuba ngenyanga ezayo.Kulo nyaka kuzobe kuhlangana iminyaka engu-40 kwavuselelwa kabusha lo mkhosi ohanjelwa izintombi eziqhamuka ezindaweni ezehlukene okubalwa nezingaphandle kwesifundazwe iKwaZulu-Natal.UMkhosi woMhlanga wavuselelwa kabusha ngo-1984, uvuselelwa iNdlovukazi uShiyiwe Manftombi Dlamini Zulu, ozala iSilo uMisuzulu Sinqobile kaZwelithini.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi emkhosini wakulo nyaka kuzogqanyiswa kakhulu ibanga eselihanjwe yilo mkhosi.Umthombo osondelene namalungiselelo omkhosi, uthe kuyinto enkulu ukuthi umkhosi uzohlanganisa iminyaka ewu-40 wavuselelwa.“UMkhosi woMhlanga ungeminye yemikhosi egqamile lapha KwaZulu. Isasasa lilokhu likhule njalo, kwahlula nangesikhathi umkhosi uphazanyiswa iCorona. Nombango wesihlalo sobukhosi awuzange uwuphazamise umkhosi. Ingakho ke kuzogqanyiswa ukufinyelela komkhosi kule ngqophamlando.“UMkhosi woMhlanga ubambe elikhulu iqhaza ekwakheni intsha. Ukhuthaza izintombi ukuba zizithibe, zingajahi izinto ezingalungile. Ingakho kwathathwa isinqumo sokuthi uvuselelwe kabusha ngoba kwakubonakala ukuthi intsha ibhekene nezinkinga eziningi.”Umthombo uthe ngeke bakukhohlwe okwenziwa iNdlovukazi uShiyiwe ivuselela umkhosi ngesikhathi kubusa iSilo uGoodwill Zwelithini kaBhekuzulu.“Ngiyacabanga ukuthi akuzange kube lula ukuvuselela umkhosi okwasekuphele isikhathi eside ungasenziwa. Ngibona ukuthi into eyalekelela indlovukazi ukuthi vele nakwaNgwane (eSwatini, lapho izalwa khona) uyenziwa uMkhosi woMhlanga.”Njengenhlalayenza, uMkhosi woMhlanga uzoqala esigodlweni eMachobeni, eNgwavuma, ngoSepthemba 7.NgoSepthemba 14 kuyobe sekulandela umkhosi omkhulu ozokuba sesigodlweni eNyokeni, kwaNongoma.Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kokhulumela iSilo, uMntwana uSimphiwe Zulu, ayizange iphumelele njengoba ucingo lwakhe belukhala lungabanjwa.Amalungiselelo omkhosi aseqalile, izinhlaka ezehlukene seziqalile ukukhangisa umcimbi ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.Omasipala abaningi sebeqalile ukwenza imicimbi yokuthi ndlelanhle ezintombini ezizoya emhlangeni.

UKUNGAXHASWA ngemali eyenele koMnyango wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, kwenza ukuthi zingavalwa izikhala zodokotela ezisuke zivulekile. Le nselelo ayigcini nje ngokuthi kungaqashwa odokotela kodwa yenza nokuthi lungavulwa uphiko lomama nezingane esibhedlela esisha iDr Pixley Ka Isaka Seme Memorial, KwaMashu.UMphathiswa woMnyango uNksz Nomagugu Simelane, utshele amalungu esiShayamthetho ukuthi inkinga yemali yenza bangakwazi ukuvala izikhala zodokotela njengoba kukhona abangaqashiwe.Uthe babalelwa ku-200 odokotela abangaqashiwe emnyangweni ekubeni kunezikhala.“Noma sinazo izikhala ezingavaliwe kodwa iqiniso ngukuthi asikwazi ukuzivala ngenxa yokunconzulwa kwemali emnyangweni. Uma isikhala sivuleka, asibe sisakwazi ukusivala ngisho noma kuthiwa sishiywe ngumuntu obeqashwe ngokugcwele,” kusho uNksz Simelane.Uthe lokhu kuyawudida umphakathi ngoba ukhala ngokuthi lowo muntu ohambile ubehlelelwe ukuthi uzowuthola umholo wakhe njengoba ubeqashiwe ngokugcwele.“Siyaqhubeka nokuxoxa nomnyango kazwelonke mayelana nalolu daba. Siyakujabulela ukwesekwa ngumnyango kazwelonke, njengoba uNgqongqoshe ezama ukuthi sithole imali ethe xaxa njalo uma kuqala unyaka wemali,” kusho uNksz Simelane ngesikhathi lumnyango uvele ngaphambi kwekomiti elibhekele ukusebenza kwemali yomphakathi, iStanding Commitee on Public Accounts, esiShayamthetho muva nje.Sekube nezikhawu lapho odokotela abangaqashiwe bemashele emnyangweni wesifundazwe, kanjalo nokazwelonke bekhala ngokungaqashwa.UNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo kuzwelonke,uDkt Joe Phaahla, usanda kuveza ephendula imibuzo ePhalamende, ukuthi sebeziqalile izinhlelo zokuqasha odokotela.UPhaahla uthe kodokotela ababalelwa ku-800 abakhala ngokuthi abasebenzi, abangu-270 sebeqashiwe ezweni lonke.Inhloko yomnyango esifundazweni, uDkt Sandile Tshabalala, ithe sebeluqalile nohlelo lwe-e health ukuze imininingwane yeziguli itholakale  kalula.Ukhale ngokuthi kwesinye isikhathi abeduka amafayela eziguli ezikhungweni zabo.Kulo mhlangano kuvele nokuthi uphiko lwezingane nomama alukasebenzi esibhedlela iPixley ngenxa yokuthi imali ayikho.Kuvele ukuthi kudingeka uR146 million ukuze lolu phiko lusebenze.Kubalulwe nokuthi kusasebenza ama-wodi angu-32 kuphela kulesi sibhedlela kwangu-38.Usihlalo weScopa, uNkk Maggie Govender, uthe uphiko lomama nezingane esibhedlela iPixley lubaluleke kakhulu emphakathini ngakho kudingeka lubhekelwe uma kuvela imali.“Umphakathi uludinga kakhulu lolu phiko ngakho kudingeka ukuthi lunikwe imali uma kwenzeka ivela. Siyazazi izinkinga ezibhekene nomnyango ngenxa yezinkinga zokunconzulwa kwemali kodwa ngqongqoshe nethimba lakho awugcini ngokukhala nje, wenza izinto zenzeke,” kusho uNkk Govender.

UKWANDA kwezehlakalo zodlame olubhekiswe kothisha ngabafundi ezikoleni zakuleli, sekwenze bakhala ngokuthi abanazo ezinye izindlela zokuqondisa abafundi selokhu kwavalwa induku.Izinyunyana zothisha zikhala ngokucindezelwa kwamalungu azo njengoba nomthetho uvikela abafundi.Uma uthisha eke waqondisa umfundi, emntshontsha ngenduku uma ebhadanywe oqotsheni, ubhekana necala elimkhomba emnyango, axoshwe angakwazi nokuthi aphinde afundise kuleli.Kodwa uma umfundi etitinye uthisha, uma isigungu sesikole simthole enecala, umiswa izinsuku ezimbalwa bese ebuyiselwa esikoleni.NoMnyango weMfundo eyisiSekelo, ukhale ngokuthi uma umfundi exoshwa esikoleni asuke enze icala kusona, kudingeka uphinde umfunele isikole ngoba akumele kube nomfundi ozobhuquza ekhaya angafundi.Ukusabalala kwe-video yesehlakalo esenzeke eGlenvista High eGauteng, muva nje, lapho kungongaphansi nongaphezulu phakathi kukathisha nomunye wabafundi, kwenze izinyunyana zathi kumele kwenziwe okuthile ngoba othisha abaphephile. Uthisha kule video ubonakala ezama ukubhula lo mfundi ngesihlalo, emuva kokuvuka othulini.UNobhala jikelele weSadtu, uMnuz Mugwena Maluleke, ukhale ngokuthi isiyinsakavukela ezikoleni eyodlame olubhekiswe kothisha ngabafundi .Uthe izikole kumele zibe yizindawo ezingenalo udlame wathi nosizo olunikezwa ezikoleni okuqubuke kuzo udlame, kumele lungachemi nabafundi kuphela.“Okubuhlungu ngukuthi iSace igweba kanzima othisha, abafundi bona bayayekwa. Umnyango kumele wenze isimo sokusebenza kothisha sibe sihle futhi ubhekane nabafundi abangalawuleki.”UMengameli weNatu, uMnuz Sibusiso Malinga, uthe selokhu kwavalwa induku ezikoleni, akukho uMnyango wezeMfundo owabahlinzeka ngakho ukuthi bakusebenzise ukuqondisa abafundi.“Ibuhlungu impilo kathisha kulezi zinsuku ngoba uma eshaye umfundi uyaxoshwa, ayikhulunywa eyakhe. Akekho ovikela uthisha ngoba nomnyango umlahla ngecala, aze aboshwe kwesinye isikhathi. Umfundi osuke eshaye uthisha uyabuyela esikoleni, emuva kokumiswa isikhashana.”Uthe nomkhandlu olawula othisha iSouth African Council for Educators (Sace), ucheme nabafundi.“Ithina esikhokhela iSace kodwa kwayona ayisivikeli, ichema nabafundi. Ngiyazi kunzima kodwa ngiyanxusa kozakwethu ukuthi uma bebona ukuthi umoya uyaphakama, baphumele emnyango babuye selehlile igwebu. Ukucabanga kothisha kumele kube ngaphezu kwalokho komfundi, bangasheshi ukuhluthuka.”Ubalule nokuthi ezikhathini eziningi uma umfundi onile, umjezisa ngokuthi umhlalise uma sekuphume isikole.“Inkinga enkulu ngukuthi uma umhlalisa ngemuva kwesikole kudingeka wena umgade. Uma egibela izimoto zomalume, kumele wena uqinisekise ukuthi leyo moto ayimshiyi ngoba ngeke umhlalise uphinde umlaxaze ungazi ukuthi uhambe ngani. Ujika wena ke usufana nobophekile, ngoba kumele umhambise ekhaya uma imoto isihambile ngoba ngeke umshiye kanjalo esikoleni. Kugcina sekufana nokuthi uzigwebe wena ngokumqondisa,” kusho uMalinga.Okhulumela umnyango, uMnuz Elijah Mhlanga, uthe uMthethosisekelo wezwe ubalula ukuthi kuyilungelo lomfundi ukufunda.Uthe bazama ukushintsha indlela abafundi abacabanga ngayo emakilasini ukuze baxazulule izinkinga abanazo ngokuthula.“Kudingeka sisebenzisane siyizinhlaka ezehlukene kusuka emaphoyiseni, umphakathi, abazali kanjalo nabafundi. Induku yavalwa ngakho umuntu oyisebenzisayo ubhekana necala,” kusho uMhlanga.Ukhale ngabanye abazali athe baphikela izingane zabo uma zenze amacala ezikoleni.“Umthetho uthi umfundi umiswa izinsuku ezingu-14, emva kwalokho uyabuyela esikoleni. Uma umxosha esikoleni, kungumsebenzi womnyango ukumfunela esinye isikole. Nakhona kuleso sikole bafike bamchithe ngoba kuthiwa uxoshwe la ebefunda khona ngoba eyihlongandlebe.”UMnuz Matakanye Matakanya, wenhlagano iNational Association of School Governing Bodies (NASGB), uthe othisha bayazi ukuthi akumele bashaye abafundi ngoba kuyicala.Uthe kumele iqiniswe imigomo ezikoleni kulabo bafundi abashaya othisha. “Akumele ngabe sibona izehlakalo lapho abafundi beshaya khona othisha. Kodwa induku yavalwa ngakho othisha bayazi ukuthi akumele bayisebenzise.” I-Sace embikweni wayo waminyaka yonke ihlale ibika ukwanda kwamacala othisha abasashaya abafundi ekubeni induku yavalwa ngeminyaka yo-1990.Isikhulu esiphezulu se seSace uNksz Ella Mokgalane, sithe minyaka yonke ayanda amacala enduku ezikoleni.Uthe ezinkundleni zokubonisana ababa nazo nezinyunyana zothisha, bahlale bexwayisa ngalesi sihlava senduku ngoba othisha bayaxoshwa.“Uma umfundi ekukhahlela unguthisha, wena awukwazi ukumphindisela. Umele umzali esikoleni ngakho okubalulekile ngukuthi uphume kulelo kilasi, ungazange uphindisele,” kusho uNksz Mokgalane.NoMthethosivivinywa iBasic Educations Laws Amendment Bill (Bela) ephasiswe wuMkhandlu weziFundazwe ePhalamende, ukubeka kucace ukuthi induku isavaliwe ngakho kuyicala kulabo abasaqhubeka nokuyisebenzisa.

BABHEKENE nengwadla abanye othisha abafundisa uGrade R KwaZulu-Natal, abathe ngqu emabhange bafica itshe lome inhlama, imali ingabonwa.Labo thisha bekumele bahole ngoLwesibili kodwa bafike imali ingekho kuma-akhawunti abo.UMengameli weNatu uMnuz Sibusiso Malinga, ugxeke umnyango wathi awubacabangeli labo thisha.Uthe bathathwa kancane ngoba beyingcosana ngoba ngeke laba abanye kuthiwe abakhokhelwe.“Amanyala lawa enziwa ngumnyango ngoba labo thisha babalulekile ngoba yibona abafundisa isisekelo semfundo. “Banezikweletu okumele bazikhokhe, kuvele kuyaziwa ukuthi njalo ngenyanga kumele bahole ngakho kuyaxaka  uma bengasaholi,”kusho uMalinga.Uthe umnyango uhlela ukuthi uGrade R ube yimpoqo kodwa izinsiza azikho.Uqhubeke ngokuthi baqalelani ngokufanele bagcine ngakho, kumele ngabe kunazo zonke izinsiza ngaphambi kokuba kuthiwe uGrade R uyimpoqo. Bazokhokha ngani uma usuyimpoqo? ebuza. “Ngaphambi kokuba ube yimpoqo zonke izidingo zakhona okubalwa nokuholela othisha kumele zibekhona,” kusho uMalinga.UDkt Imran Keeka okhulumela i-DA kwezemfundo esiShayamthetho, ukhale ngokuthi umnyango ufuna ukwenza uGrade R ube yimpoqo ekubeni imali ingekho.Ekhuluma ngesikhathi kudingidwa eyoMthethosivivinywa wezikole iBasic Laws Amendment Bill esiShayamthetho, uthe akazi kwamali ukuthi izovelaphi njengoba uGrade R befuna ube yimpoqo ekubeni umnyango wesifundazwe uhlale unezinkinga zesabelomali. Umnyango wezemfundo esifundazweni uthembise ukuthi bazokhokhelwa kusasa abangaholanga.Esitatimendeni somnyango, uveze ukuthi labo thisha baqashwa isikhathi esiwunyaka, okuyinto eyenzeka ngisho ezingeni likazwelonke.“Izinkontileka zabo zivuselelwa njalo ngonyaka, uma kuqala unyaka wezimali ngo-Ephreli. Nakulo nyaka kwenzeke okufanayo, kwalungiswa neyamaholo abo ango-Ephreli 30, 2024.“Iningi labo bakhokhelwe ekupheleni kwenyanga edlule, kodwa abanye bangakhokhelwa.“Imbangela yokungaholelwa kwabanye kube wukulethwa kwezinto ezingaphelele, okwenzeke ngesikhathi befakwa ohlelweni lokukhokhelwa kwi-Persal, ngo-Ephreli 15, 2024.“Imali yabo isifakiwe, bazoyithola ngoMeyi 3, 2024, umnyangon uzokhokha kabili ngohlelo lwePersal,” kusho isitatimende.Lesi sitatimende siveze ukuthi umnyango ukwazi ukukhokha kabili ngenyanga ngohlelo lwe-Persal.Umnyango uxolisile kulabo abangayitholanga imali kodwa wathi nakanjani bazoyithola kusasa.

ITSHE limi ngothi ngesimo sama-ambulensi ezibhedlela ezisesifundeni iKing Cetshwayo ngemuva kwezivuvaba lapho iziguli zilinda amaviki ukufika kwama-ambulensi, ezinye zigcine zishona zingafinyeleli ekusizakaleni okufanele. Imindeni ekwaziyo ukukhokhela ama-ambulensi ezinkampani ezizimele nokuqasha izimoto yiyo kuphela esindayo ngoba idlulisela izihlobo zayo kwezinye izikhungo zezempilo.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe kusukela ngoJulayi ama-ambulensi  ayashoda engxenyeni yalesi sifunda ehlanganisa iMelmoth, iKhombe naseNkandla. Isikhathi esiningi kawekho nhlobo. Muva nje umndeni wakwaKhuzwayo, eMelmoth, uphoqeleke ukuthi ukhokhele i-ambulensi ezimele u-R9 000 ukuze uhambise isihlobo sawo, uMnuz Simphiwe Khuzwayo, esibhedlela eNgwelezane. UKhuzwayo ubedutshuliwe waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela KwaMagwaza, eMelmoth. Kuphele izinsuku ezimbili elindile  kulesi sibhedlela kanti bekumele ahlolwe amehlo abopha nokuvuvukala ekhanda.Udokotela wakhe wayembhukhele ukuthi aye esibhedlela iChief Albert Luthuli, eThekwini. Akakwazanga ukuya ngoba akafikanga ngesikhathi eNgwelezene wafika isimshiyile i-ambulensi.Umthombo waleli phephandaba osehhovisi elilawula ama-ambulensi eNkandla, eMelmoth naseKhombe, uthe abanawo ama-ambulensi, wonke afile. Bathembela kwawakwezinye izindawo ezifana naseShowe naseMpangeni ukuthi abasize.Uthe le ngxenye yesifunda inama-ambulensi angu-13 namabhasi ahambisa iziguli amahlanu. Wonke afile, ase-workshop. Kuwo kukhona aseduve izinsuku ezingaphezulu kuka-100 engalungisiwe.“Ngenyanga edlule nje kuphela, iziguli ezevile ku-700 azikwazanga ukuya ezikhungweni zezempilo ebezidluliselwe kuzo ngesikhathi ebezidluliselwe ngaso ngenxa yale nkinga. Okubuhlungu ukuthi kulezi ziguli kubalwa izingane eziphukile, abadutshuliwe nezinye iziguli ezisuke zidinga izinsiza ezisuke zingekho ezikhungweni eziseduze kwazo. Ama-ambulensi kahulumeni abhekele ukusiza umphakathi ontulayo ongakwazi ukukhokhela ama-ambulensi azimele,” kuchaza umthombo. Uthe izikhulu zoMnyango eziphethe iSifunda zabikelwa kodwa kuze kube manje azikaqhamuki nasisombululo.“Inkinga esibhekene nayo ukuthi izikhulu ezikhipha igunya lokuthi i-ambulensi ikhandwe, noma ingakhandwa zishaya ngonyawo lonwabu uma kumele zithathe isinqumo. Kuyenzeka ukukhandwa kwe-ambulensi kuthathe izinsuku ezingu-200 ngalesi sikhathi nebikhona isuke isifile. Inkinga ayidalwa ukuthi isifunda asinayo imali, kumanje sinayo imali yokukhanda. Inkinga ngabantu abaqashiwe abadonsa izinyawo uma kumele bathathe isinqumo, ” usho kanje.UMnuz Mlungisi Ndlovu wenyunyana yabasebenzi, iPublic Servants Association (PSA), uthe inkinga yokushoda kwama-ambulensi ibhekene nesifundazwe sonke kodwa okwase-King Cetshwayo sekungaphezu kwamandla. “Sifisa ukuthi uMphathiswa wezeMpilo noNdunankulu bangenelele kulolu daba ngoba sekunesikhathi ludingidwa emazingeni aphansi, singaphumi isixazululo. Ekugcineni umphakathi ongaqondi ukuthi kwenzekani ulwa nabasebenzi bezempilo uzitshela ukuthi bayavilapha,” kusho yena. UDkt Imran Keeka, obhekele ezempilo kwi-DA, uthe ukushoda kwama-ambulensi yinkinga yesifundazwe sonke.“Sibhalele uMphathiswa wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal (uNkk Nomagugu Simelane), sicela ukuthi asinike izibalo zama-ambulensi akulesi sifundazwe nokwabiwa kwawo. Ezindaweni zasemakhaya inkinga inkulu kakhulu kodwa naseThekwini iziguli zilinda i-ambulensi zize ziqashe azimele. “Lokhu akwamukelekile. Siyazi ukuthi inqwaba yamabhasi ahambisa iziguli zisuka kwezinye izikhungo zezempilo ziya kwezinye, namanye ama-amabulensi aduve ema-workshop ayokhandwa ngoba asemadala. Amanye asehlale izinyanga eziyisithupha kulawo ma-workshop,”  kusho uDkt Keeka. UMnuz Ntokozo Maphisa okhulumela uMnyango wezeMpilo KwaZulu -Natal, uthe  isiguli okuthiwa saziqashela i-ambulensi ezimele asikwazanga ukulinda imizuzu engu-15 , i-ambulensi yafika sesihambile. Akabange esangena esimeni sokushoda kwama-ambulensi eKing Cetshwayo.

LIGUQE kungasekuhle icala lokufa kukaSenzo Meyiwa ngesikhathi iJaji uRatha Mokgoatleng lithuthana nommeli u-Advocate uThulani Mngomezulu obelisola ngobuqili. UMeyiwa owayengunozinti we-Orlando Pirates neBafana Bafana, wadutshulwa wabulawa ekubo kwentombi yakhe uKelly Khumalo eVosloorus, eGauteng, ngo-2014. Bahlanu abalisa abashushiswayo okuthiwa banikwa itoho lokujuqa uMeyiwa.Icala lisesigabeni lapho uMbuso ubiza khona ofakazi bawo bese bephekwa ngemibuzo abameli babamangalelwa uma beqeda. UMngomezulu ubepheka ngemibuzo ufakazi oyiphoyisa uConstable uJabulani Buthelezi ngesikhathi kusuka ingxabano.Bekubangwa indaba yokuthi mangaki amaselula atholakala kummangalelwa wokuqala uMuzikawukhulewa Sibiya ngesikhathi eboshwa. UMngomezulu uze wathi uzofaka isikhalo ngejaji athe alihambisi kahle izinto uma lisingethe udaba. Uthe uselinake izikhawu linakho ukuvuna uMbuso.“Impela Nkosi yeNkanto ngisho njalo futhi ngimile emazwini ami. Kumanje ngilungisa isicelo ngaphansi komthetho u-317,’’ kusho uMngomezulu ebhoka.UMngomezulu uthe ijaji liyathanda ukugxambukela futhi lihlangene noMbuso benza ubuqili. Kusuke isidumo esinamathambo emuva kwalokho, ijaji kwathi alimqede.“Ungisola ngobuqili manje, ngihlangene kanjani noMbuso mina? Ungasebenzisi amagama ongeke uwamele, ungalokothi ngoba nginelungelo lokukumangalela. Kungenzeka awuqondi kahle umthetho. Ungehlisa isithunzi ungibeka izinsolo,’’ kusho ijaji.Emuva kwalokho, kube sengathi kuyedlulwa odabeni kwayiwa ekhefini lesidlo sasemini nokuthe uma kubuywa ijaji laqala phansi labhoka liqhuba lolu daba, ijaji lakhipha izichazamazwi ezintathu kwafunwa incazelo yegama elisetshenziswe wummeli.Ijaji lifunde izincazelo ebeziveza ukuthi leli gama lichaza ukuhlangana ngobuqili. Ijaji laqhubeka labhoka lisho nokuthi selibikele abaphathi balo.UMngomezulu ugcine esexolisa ethi uyawahoxisa amazwi akhe kodwa kwabonakala ukuthi ijaji belisadiniwe ngesikhathi kuguqa icala. Kuvunyelwane ngokuthi icala liguqele uMsombuluko. UMbuso uthe namuhla yiholidi kanti kusasa nangoLwesihlanu abekho ofakazi abazofika.

Buchitheke bugayiwe ibandla lixosha izethenjwa zomholi wamaNazaretha, Inkosi Mduduzi Shembe, uNyazilwezulu okuthiwa bezinamatulo ebeziwabophile ukuholela Ophathe umholi.Isolezwe lithole lezi zindaba ngomthombo ongashayi eceleni nozazi zonke ezebandla, kuthiwa kunesimemezelo esenziwe ngoMgqibelo, eBuhleni kuxoshwa izethenjwa ebese zifana nensila yoNyazilwezulu. Leli phephandaba linalo izwi eliqoshiwe lapho bekwenziwa khona lesi simemezelo futhi kukhona nekhophi yencwadi ebhalwe yiNhlalisuthi, iveza ukuthi sekunesikhathi yenza uphenyo ngabadla uNyazi izithende bengaphakathi ebandleni.Abaxoshiwe, abangeke adalulwe amagama abo ngenxa yokuthi abatholakalanga ukuze baziphendulele, kuthiwa bahlonzwe njengabayingozi kakhulu ngamatulo okuthiwa bebewakhele lo mholi.Omunye wabaxoshiwe kuthiwa uyathinteka ematulweni amabi okungcolisa igama loNyazilwezulu, ukudayisa umuzi waseBuhleni nasezinhlambeni ezihlambalaza uNyazi. Omunye kuthiwa uthinteka kuwona la matulo futhi kuthiwa yena ubedelela inkosi uNyazi. Owesithathu oxoshiwe kuthiwa kutholwe ukuthi ubesebenzisana nezitha zoNyazilwezulu ukuze kufezeke izinhloso zazo ukungcolisa uNyazi.Imibandela yokuxoshwa kwabo kuthiwe bangaphinde babonakale bebeka imicondo yabo kuwona wonke amathempeli angaphansi kwebandla lamaNazaretha, oNyazilwezulu kuze kuphele iminyaka eyishumi. Noma ngabe kuthiwa isiphelile le minyaka kuthiwa ngeke bavele bavunyelwe ukungena ebandleni kodwa kuyoqalwa ezingxoxweni, uma ibandla lingagculiseki ngesimo sabo ngaleso sikhathi ngeke bavunyelwe ukubuyela kulona.Kuphinde kwakhishwa nomyalezo oshubile wokuthi kungabi khona noyedwa kumaNazaretha ozozama ukubancengela noma ukukhuluma udaba lwabo ukuthi babuyiselwe ebandleni.“Oyokwenza kanjalo uzomiswa iminyaka eyisikhombisa ebandleni. Uma kunezizathu ezibalulekile ayozethula ukuthi angamiswa, kuzomele azi ukuthi ngeke aphinde aqokelwe kunoma yisiphi isikhundla ebandleni. Ngokunjalo nomnikelo wesihle oya esiqwini (uNyazi) ngeke aphinde avunyelwe ukuthi awukhiphe,” kusho inkulumo eqoshiwe. Umthombo wephephandaba uveze ukuthi bobathathu abaxoshiwe bebeseduze kakhulu koNyazilwezulu kangangoba ayikho into ebifika kulona ingadlulanga kubona.“Amacala ka (emgagula ngegama) mabi kakhulu ngoba yena usebenzisana nezikhulu zepolitiki ukudicilela phansi isithunzi soNyazilwezulu. Inkinga ingethenda ka-R18 million okungumnikelo kaMongameli Cyril Ramaphosa wokwakha amadokodo eBuhleni, eyamiswa wuNyazi, abezibheke kuyona. Phezu kwamanye amatulo abathinteka kuwona uNzimande ungomunye wabathele uNyazi ngehlazo lokuthi lushiywe yibhanoyi luya eCape Town muva nje. U..(emgagula ngegama) yena kuthiwa ubesebenzisana nabaseThembezinhle ukuketula uNyazi,” kusho umthombo.Okhulumela uNyazilwezulu, uMnuz Thokozani Mncwabe uthe kufakazeleka isiphrofetho somholi wesibili wamaNazaretha inkosi Johannes Galile Shembe Ilanga, asisho ngeNhlalisuthi njengoba kuyiyona ethathe lesi sinqumo. “Inkosi iLanga yathi uma kukhona okungahambi kahle akobuzwa Inhlalisuthi ngebandla. Ngalokho yayisho khona ukuthi inhlalisuthi ingabaqaphi bebandla. Isinqumo esithathile sikholwa ukuthi ilwenzisile uphenyo ngaphambi kokuba isithathe,” kusho uMncwabe.

KUPHAMBENE noMthethosisekelo wezwe ukugqunywa kwesiboshwa ngasodwana amahora angu-23 singaxhumani namuntu okuyinto egcina isilimaza emqondweni nasemzimbeniLokhu kudalulwe u-Edwin Cameron oyijaji lophiko oluzimele oluqaphe ukusebenza kwamajele, i-Judicial Inspectorate for Correctional Services (JICS).UCameron uthe umthetho wezwe nasemhlabeni jikelele ukubeka kucace ukuthi ukugqunywa kwesiboshwa ejele akumele kudicilele phansi ilungelo nesithunzi saso.Uveze ukuthi kuphambene nomthetho okwenzeka ejele laseBhongweni, eKokstad naseKgosi Mampuru II C-Max, ePitoli.“Amakhulu eziboshwa ezihlala ngazodwana kulamajele amabili. Ezinye iziboshwa zihlukumezekile ngokugqunywa kwazo isikhathi eside ngazodwana emakhulukuthu, “ kusho uCameron.UCameron uyahambisana nokuthi zijeze ngamacala eziwenzile iziboshwa kodwa lokho kungabi sengathi kuyaliwa nazo noma kuyaphindiselwa.“Umthetho uthi isijezo sesiboshwa ukusincisha inkululeko yaso nokuphila impilo esiyithandayo kodwa akusho ukuthi kumele usiphathe ngendlela engenabo ubuntu,” kusho uCameron.Uphakamise ukuthi iziboshwa zingagcinwa ngazodwana isikhathi eside kungenasidingo ngaphandle uma kunesizathu. Ufuna nokuthi zivunyelwe ukuba zibonwe izivakashi futhi zikwazi ukufona.Usho kanje ekhuluma nabeziko lezindaba iNewzroom Afrika.Okhulumela uMnyango wezokuHlunyeleliswa kweziMilo, uMnuz Singabakho Nxumalo uthe sekuyihaba ukuqhathanisa isimo samajele manje nokwakukade kwenzeka ngesikhathi sobandlululo ngoba kwehluke kakhulu.UNxumalo uqhube wathi emajele okukhulunywa ngawo kuvalelwe kuphela iziboshwa eziyingozi futhi eziqhamuka kwamanye amajele ngenxa yezokuphepha.“Akulona iqiniso ukuthi izwe linohlelo lokugquma iziboshwa ngazodwana. Asikho isiboshwa esivalelwa amahora angu-23 ngaphandle kokuxhumana nabanye abantu,” kusho uNxumalo.Uthe iziboshwa zinikwa ihora lokuzivocavoca, zigeze, zixhumane nabezempilo uma kudingeka, ziyavakashelwa futhi ziyafona.

INHLANGANO yodokotela iSouth African Medical Association (SAMA), ithi iphoxekile ngendlela uMnyango wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal osingathe ngayo udaba lokuqashwa kodokotela asebephothule izifundo abangaqashiwe.Usihlalo wale nhlangano uDkt Mvuyisi Mzukwa, uthe labo dokotela abakatholelwa izikhala yize uNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo uDkt Joe Phaahla athembisa ukuthi kuzoshaya u-Ephreli 1 sebeqashiwe."Odokotela bayashoda ezikhungweni zezempilo ekubeni befunde ngemali yabakhokhi bentela. Uhulumeni lolu daba akalusingethe ngendlela. Sibhekene nabantu abangenalo iqiniso kusukela phezulu kuwo uMnyango wezeMpilo.“UNgqongqoshe wayethe uzokhuluma nezifundazwe ngalolu daba kodwa kuze kube manje akucaci ukuthi bazoqashwa nini. Kusho ukuthi njengoba kuza ukhetho ongqongqoshe bakhuluma noma yini.“Lento idala ukuthi kube nemibhikisho efana nalo oseMgungundlovu. Siyabeseka odokotela abaqhinqe ngaphambi kwehhovisi likaMphathiswa wezeMpilo eKZN, uNksz Nomagugu Simelane futhi sizobajoyina nathi ukuze abakulwelayo kube nesigqi," kusho uMzukwa.UDkt Busisiwe Mancotywa osekomitini elibhekelele odokotela abangaqashiwe eKZN uthe kusukela ngoFebhruwari bangu-17 odokotela baKwaZulu-Natal asebeqashiwe osekwenze ukuthi isibalo sisuke ku-187 siye ku-170."Lesi sibalo sincane kakhulu kunalokho ebesikulindele. Siyabonga kulabo abasesekayo kuhlanganisa neminikelo ngezinto eziningi esizidingayo njengoba sihleli ngaphambi kwehhovisi likaMphathiswa wezeMpilo," kusho yena.UDkt Thuba Nkabinde uthe kusukela beqhinqe kuleli hhovisi babe nemihlangano emibili nenhloko yomnyango uDkt Sandile Tshabalala, kodwa akukabikhona abavumelene ngakho."Sisazoqhubeka nokuhlala lapha kuze kube sithola esathenjiswa khona," kusho uNkabinde.Umnyango wezempilo, uthe uNdunankulu wakulesi sifundazwe uzokwenza isitatimende ngalou daba.

NKOSIKHONA CELEKULOKOZA inhlansi yethemba ngokuxazululeka kwenkinga yamanzi ezingxenyeni ezahlukene zesiFunda iLembe.Lokhu kuza ngemuva kokuba iMeya yesiFunda, uMnuz Thobani Shandu ememezele ukuthi kuzoba nepayipi lamanzi elizosuka eMshwathi lizophakela amanzi kule ndawo.UShandu ubekhuluma emhlanganweni womphakathi wokuzohlahlela usomqulu wentuthuko edudiyelwe, phecelezi IDP, obusenkundleni yezemidlalo, eSinamfini, KwaMaphumulo.Eqhuba, uthe babone kungcono ukuba basebenzise leli payipi ngenhloso yokuqeda nya ngenkinga yamanzi kule ndawo.Uthe bazibophezele ngokuthi benze konke okusemandleni ukuze abantu bakule ndawo bangeke bezithole njalo bebhekene nengwadla yokushoda kwamanzi.Uveze ukuthi bazokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi lubonakala lushesha kakhulu lolu hlelo lwamanzi asuka eMshwathi."Sizokwenza konke okusemandleni ethu ukuqinisekisa ukuthi lolu hlelo luyashesha. Sifuna ukuthi abantu bethu bawathole kalula amanzi,'' usho kanje.Uthe okwamanje akakazi kahle ukuthi ngabe lolu hlelo luzobonakala luthatha isikhathi esingakanani.Kodwa wethembisa ukuthi bazozama ngakho konke okusemandleni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi alubonakali luhamba ngonyawo lonwabu.Njengoba uhlelo lungakaphothulwa, uthe umphakathi ngeke usale dengwane ungenamanzi.''Okwamanje zikhona ezinye izinhlelo zokunikezela ngosizo lwamanzi kubantu bakule ndawo,'' echaza. Uthe okwamanje abantu bazothola usizo lwamanzi njengoba bebakhele amapitsi. Uveze nokuthi kukhona nompompi bamanzi ababafake emizini eyahlukene. Wathi kukhona nohlelo lwamaloli ahambisa amanzi kubantu.IMeya kaMasipala waKwaMaphumulo, uNkk Zibuyile Khuzwayo ukhulume ngezinhlelo eziningi ezihlabahlosile athe bafuna ukuzenzela umphakathi wakule ndawo. Uthe ezinye izinhlelo abanazo kufaka phakathi ukulungiswa kwemigwaqo ewubhuqu. Ubalule nezinhlelo zokwakhelwa kwabantu izindlu.Uthe okuseqhulwini yingqalasizinda nakho ukunikezela ngosizo lwamanzi kubantu bendawo.Amalungu omphakathi athole ingqayizivele yethuba lokubuza ngezinto eziningi ezimayelana nentuthuko.

Kuphuzwa ngayo itiye indaba yokwenyuka kwesibalo samalungu eKhabhinethi emenyezelwe nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, eyakhiwe abaholi bamaqembu ahlukene.IKhabhinethi ayimemezele ngeSonto ebusuku ePitoli, iqukethe oNgqongqoshe abangu-32, namaPhini abo angu-43.Lokhu kusho ukuthi iKhabhinethi inamalungu angu-75.Amanye amaqembu asebenzisana ne-ANC kuhulumeni wobumbano anezikhundla zongqongqoshe eziwu-12, kweziwu-32 kanti i-ANC ithole eziwu-20. Amaphini ongqongqoshe e-ANC angu-35, kuthi amanye amaqembu anezingu-10. Eminye iminyango inamaphini amabili ongqongqoshe.IKhabhinethi yehlandla eledlule ibinongqongqoshe abangu-30.URamaphosa uhlukanise eminye iminyango, waqeda ngomnyango wezamaBhizinisi kahulumeni kanti izinkampani ebezingaphansi kwalo mnyango, zizofakwa eminyangweni ehlukene.Uhulumeni wobumbano osayine isivumelwano sokubusa izwe, yisona sizathu esenze ukuthi uRamaphosa angakwazi ukunciphisa isibalo songqongqoshe.Kwayena uRamaphosa uvumile ukuthi wayehlele ukwehlisa isibalo seKhabhinethi ngenxa yokuthi bekunezikhalazo ezweni.Kodwa ngenxa yokuthi bekudingeka ukuthi adidiyele amaqembu ahlukene kwiKhabhinethi, wabona kunesidingo sokuthi angasehlisi isibalo kodwa asenyuse ukuze kusebenzeke.Umholi we-ActionSA uMnuz Herman Mashaba, ukhale ngokuthi abakhokhi bentela bazofaka isandla sishone ephaketheni ngenxa yale Khabhinethi.UMashaba uthe bekunesikhalo ezweni sokuthi kumele kwehliswe isibalo songqongqoshe kodwa uRamaphosa ukushaye indiva lokhu.“Le Khabhinethi izodla ngaphezu kukaR1 billion ngonyaka, okuhlanganisa umholo, imihlomulo nezinto ezithinta ukugadwa kwabo. Kule mali kukhona neyabasebenzi abazobe besemahhovisi ongqongqoshe namaphini abo.”Okhulumela i-EFF uNksz Leigh-Ann Mathys, ugxeke iKhabhinethi wathi bekwabelwana ngezikhundla emaqenjini ahlukene ayingxenye kahulumeni wobumbano.Uthe: “Lezi zikhundla zinikwe abelungu abazoqhuba imigomo esekwa ongxiwa, kusetshenziswa abantu abamnyama okuyibo abaningi. Siyayichitha eyeKhabhinethi egcwele ababandlululi.” Usihlalo we-DA Federal Council uNkk Helen Zille, uthe ubengenalo ulwazi ukuthi sizonyuswa isibalo seKhabhinethi. Uthe uzwe ngayo ngesikhathi uRamaphosa eseyimemezela.“Besingazi ukuthi iKhabhinethi izonyuswa kangaka ukuze i-ANC izuze kakhulu kunalokho obekumele ikuthole. Besazi ngezikhundla ebezizotholwa yi-DA kuphela. Besazi futhi ngokuhlukaniswa kweminye iminyango. Ukunyuswa kwesibalo seKhabhinethi akuhlangene ne-DA.” Uthe bebefuna iKhabhinethi encane wathi ukube bekulandelwe imigomo yokuthi kwabiwe ngokuthi amaqembu athola izihlalo ezingaki, ngabe ayibanga nkulu iKhabhinethi.UMnuz Wayne Duvenage isikhulu esiphezulu senhlangano i-OUTA, uzwakalise ukukhathazeka ngokwanda kweKhabhinethi.Uthe emnyangweni wezokuMbiwa Phansi bekumele lo mnyango ophethwe nguMnuz Gwede Mantashe, ufakwe ngaphansi komnyango kaGesi.“Le bekuyindlela yokuhlomulisa amalungu e-ANC. Bekungamele kugcinwe umuntu ofana noDkt Blade Nzimande, osesemnyangweni wezeSayensi ngoba lo mnyango bekungamele futhi uhlukaniswe nomnyango weMfundo ePhakeme nokuQeqesha.”Ukhale ngokuthi uNzimande bekumele asuswe ngoba ushiye emoshe isikhwama iNSFAS.ICosatu ikhale esifanayo ngesibalo esikhulu seKhabhinethi.UMnuz Matthew Parks weCosatu, uthe badumele ngokwandiswa kwesibalo samaphini ongqongqoshe.“Siyayamukela iKhabhinethi kodwa siyakhala ngesibalo samaphini ongqongqoshe. Sizosebenzisana neKhabhinethi ukuphucula impilo yabantu.” ISACP ikhale ngokwanda kweKhabhinethi yathi lokhu kusho khona ukuthi i-ANC ilahlekelwa amandla.Umhlaziyi wezepolitiki uDkt Levy Ndou, uthe uRamaphosa ubengaphansi kwengcindezi yokuthi anyuse isibalo seKhabhinethi ukuze kumeleleke uwonke wonke emaqenjini akuhulumeni.“Iyakhathaza eyokwanda kwesibalo seKhabhinethi. Kodwa ibingekho into abengayenza ngoba izikhundla zibalulekile kwipolitiki. Isizathu esenza amaqembu angenele ukhetho ingenxa yezikhundla.”Amanye amaqembu akuhulumeni ne-ANC ayamukele iKhabhinethi.Akuqali ukuthi kube neminyango enamaphini amabili ongqongqoshe. Ngisho eminyangweni kahulumeni wezifundazwe esuke ihlanganise iminyango emibili, kujwayelekile ukuthi kube nezinhloko zomnyango ezimbili.UNdou uthe amaphini ongqongqoshe enza imisebenzi ehlukene eminyangweni esuke ihlanganisiwe.Iminyango okubalwa owezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu, owezokuVikela ofaka namaMilitary Veterans, owezokuQasha nowezabaSebenzi, owezamaHlathi, ukuDoba nezeMvelo anamaphini amabili ongqongqoshe.“Yinto ejwayelekile akukho okusha ekutheni kube namaphini amabili emnyangweni owodwa,” kusho uNdou.

ABESIKHUNGO sabakhubazekile iNduduzweni Centre for Disabled esiseMhlabeni, eMlaza, bathi kubuye inhlansi yethemba izolo bevakashelwa wuSihlalo we-IFP kwaZulu-Natal ogaqele esokuba nguNdunankulu walesi sifundazwe, uMnuz Thami Ntuli.Umphathi wesikhungo, uMnuz Themba Shiba, uthe akukho abangakwenzile ukuthola usizo kuhulumeni ukuze basizwe njengoba bentula yonke into esikhungweni.Isikhungo uthe sigcine abantu abangu-40 abakhubazeke ngezindlela ezehlukene. Uthe yize kunabantu abaningi kangaka kodwa abanalutho bawusizi.“Kusijabulisile ukufika kukaNtuli (Thami Ntuli) esikhungweni ngoba bese silahle ithemba lokuthi kukhona usizo esiyobuye siluthole kulesi sikhungo. Kumanje sinenkinga yokuthi isikhungo sifelwe ngamawindi, izicabha, kushoda ukudla nazo zonke izinsiza ezingakwazi ukusenza siqhubeke sisebenze ngendlela efanele. Kusuka ngo-2017 besilokhu sibhalela iminyango kahulumeni ehlukene sicela uxhaso kodwa akekho ongena indaba yethu. Sesize sabhalela ngisho nomasipala, izimeya ngisho nosomlomo komasipala kodwa asilutholi nhlobo usizo. Abanye bebefika babuke bese bethi basayohlanganisa amakhanda ukuze babone ukuthi bangasisiza kanjani kodwa kuvele kucwebe iziziba,” kusho uShiba.Uthe kubamangazile ukuthi uNtuli ubefika okokuqala kulesi sikhungo wafika esephethe nezihlalo ezihamba ngamasondo wathembisa nokuthi uzoletha nezinduku zokuhamba. Uthe kungokokuqala ukuthi kubekhona abakutholayo selokhu baqala ukucela usizo kuhulumeni, wathi uNtuli uthembisile ukuthi kukhona okuzokwenzeka ukubeka lesi sikhungo ezingeni.Ekhuluma kulesi sikhungo uNtuli, uthe yena uqale ngokwenza ucwaningo lokuthi badingekani kusona ngaphambi kokuba eze khona.“Uma sekuvotwa ngiyethemba niyazi ukuthi kumele nenzenjani ukuqinisekisa ukuthi iNkatha iyanqoba. Uma  befika benithembisa ningabachithi namukele konke abakushoyo kodwa nenze okufanele uma sekumele kuvotwe,” kusho uNtuli.UShiba uthe bona njengesikhungo esiku-ward 88 bayazi ukuthi ivoti labo liya kuphi.  Wathi kungokwesibili behlangana noNtuli njengoba ayebabizele emhlanganweni lapho befike baveza khona izikhalo zabo wavele waqhamuka nosizo ngokushesha.

KUBE yinjabulo kwabangamakhulu ngesikhathi uMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu eKZN unika izincwadi zokuqashwa kwabazoqeqeshelwa umsebenzi kuhulumeni nabazoqashwa ngokugcwele.Abaqashiwe kubalwa abazoqeqeshelwa umsebenzi abangaphezu kuka-500, abasebenzela isipiliyoni abangu-220 nabaqashwe ngokuphelele abangu-100.Banikwe izincwadi zokuqashwa uMphathiswa woMnyango uNkk Bongiwe Sithole-Moloi ngesikhathi kunomcimbi oThongathi Sports Center ngoMsombuluko.UMnyango ubunokhukhulelangoqo wohlelo lokuqasha ngaphansi kohlelo  iShesha Waya Waya obelwenziwa ngezobuchwepheshe. Lolu hlelo belusebenzisa ubuchwepheshe besimanje ukulekelela abafuna umsebenzi ukuba bafake izicelo zomsebenzi kuhulumeni.Abaqeqeshelwa umsebenzi njengengxenye yezifundo abazenzayo ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme bazofakwa komasipala abehlukene kanti abanye ezindaweni ezahlukene esifundazweni. Abanye bona bazofakwa ekomkhulu ukulekelela ezimpikweni ezahlukene ngamakhono abo amasha nokuthi bathole isipiliyoni esizobasiza ukuthi baqasheke.Kwabaqashiwe kukhona nezimenenja ezisezigabeni eziphakathi nendawo kanye nabasezingeni eliphezulu. Iningi labaqashiwe lizoqala ukusebenza ngo-Ephreli 1 nonyaka.Ebanika izincwadi zokuqashwa uNkk Sithole-Moloi ubahalalisele abasebenzi abebejabule begcwele indawo obekubanjelwe kuyo umcimbi njengoba belindele umzuzu ozoshintsha impilo yabo.“Uhulumeni uzimisele ukulwa nezinga eliphezulu lokungasebenzi kwabantu nokusiza asebethweswe iziqu ukuthi bathole isipiliyoni esidingekayo ukuze baqasheke,” kusho uNkk Sithole-Moloi.Abanikwe izincwadi zokuqashwa bazwakalise ukujabula ngohlelo lukahulumeni lwezobuchwepheshe lokuqasha abathe lwenza ukufuna umsebenzi kungabi nazihibe

AQHUMISE umkikizo ngaphandle kweNkantolo yaseNtuzuma amalungu omphakathi akule ndawo izolo ngesikhathi umfundisi osolwa ngokudlwengula izingane zamantombazane ezintathu enqatshelwa ibheyili.UMfu Mandla Mahlaba weBandla laseZayoni, iNew Jerusalem kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi wakhalelwa ngamasongo kaSigonyela emasontweni amabili edlule.Wavulelwa amacala esolwa ngokudlwengula izingane ezintathu zamantombazane ezineminyaka engu-13 ebandleni.Umphakathi ngemuva kwalokho wavuka umbhejazane okwagcina kuholela ekutheni agcwale amathafa lo mfundisi. NgoLwesihlanu unqatsheliwe ibheyili.Lokhu kuwajabulisile kakhulu amalungu omphakathi abebhikisha ngaphandle kwenkantolo ekhuthaza ukuthi umsolwa angayitholi ibheyili."Kusijabulisile kakhulu ukuthi umfundisi akayitholanga ibheyili,'' kusho ilungu lomphakathi.Elinye lithe kuyajabulisa kakhulu ukubona ukuthi inkantolo yenze okufanelekile kuleli cala.''Sifisa ukuthi angabe esaphuma ejele. Kumele ajeze ngalokhu okubi kangaka akwenzile ezinganeni zethu ezincane nakangaka,'' kusho elinye ilungu lomphakathi.Ngaphambilini umfundisi waphumela obala kwiSolezwe Ngempelasonto  ngokuthi ujola nendodakazi yomkakhe.Walimisa ngesihloko elokuthi lokhu akakufihli futhi yinto azohlala phansi ayibhunge nabo bobabili ukuze kube nenqubekela phambili mayelana nalolu daba.Kwaba nezinsolo zokuthi ngaphakathi ebandleni umfundisi uthandana nenqwaba yabesifazane futhi ulala nabo.Kwavela nokuthi amalungu ebandla ubewaphoqa ukudla amasi nesiklabhu.

IGCAGCELE esokeni emindenini yabagilwa nakumalungu omphakathi ayesekayo, iNkantolo yeMantshi yaseVerulam yenqaba ukuthi akhishwe ngebheyili umfundisi webandla labasindisiwe osolwa ngamacala okunukubeza ngokocansi abafana abancane.UMnuz Mkhanyisi Mshalala (57), ubevele kule nkantolo izolo, lapho obekulindeleke ukuthi kukhishwe isinqumo esicelweni sakhe sokuthi adedelwe ngebheyili. Ubhekene namacala amane okunukubeza ngokocansi abafana abaneminyaka engu-12 kuya phansi eWaterloo. Kuthiwa ubewumqeqeshi weqembu lebhola lezinyawo  aphinde afundise izifundo zeBhayibheli futhi ewumfundisi ebandleni labasindisiwe elikhona endaweni. Isinqumo sokunqatshelwa ibheyili semukelwe ngentokozo yimindeni yabagilwa namalungu omphakathi abenkanise ngaphandle kwenkantolo ukufaka ingcindezi ekutheni angayinuki.Uyise womunye wabagilwa (igama lakhe eligodliwe ukuvikela isithunzi sendodana yakhe), uthe okumdumaza kakhulu ngomsolwa, ukuthi ubemthemba kakhulu, kanti yena uthi lala lulaza.“Ngijabule kakhulu ngesinqumo senkantolo. Ngiyafisa ukuthi uma esegwetshwa athole isigwebo esizomenza ahlale isikhathi eside ngaphakathi. Ingane beyicela kimina ukuyodlala ngiyivumela ngangoba noma ingazobuya bengingenankinga nokuthi ilala endlini kamqeqeshi ngoba yilapho abebehlanganyela khona ngebhola noma ngezinto ezithinta isonto kwazise ubebuye abewumfundisi wabo.  “Ngiqale ukubona uma ingane ichama igazi ingafuni ukusho ukuthi kwenzenjani, ngaze ngayithembisa induku, kwayilapho igonyuluka khona ngokunukubezwa umsolwa,” usho kanje.Umsolwa kuthiwa abagilwa ubebaphuzisa unemenayidi okukholakala ukuthi ubesuke esewuthake nesidakamizwa esithile, ebese uyabadlwengula, emva kwalokho ebasabise ngokubenzakalisa uma beke bayizeka emakhaya imikhuba yakhe.UMnuz Khumbulani Zuma oyisishoshovu somphakathi, uveze ukuthi umsolwa uwavumile amacala athweswe wona. “Umphakathi ubuphume ngobuningi uzokweseka imindeni yabagilwa, ufake nengcindezi enkantolo ekutheni umsolwa engayitholi ibheyili. Isinqumo senkantolo siyasenelisa. Ngesikhathi sibhikisha ngaphandle, bakhona abazali abathathu baseMhlasini, abaqinisekise ukuthi izingane zabo nazo ziphumele obala zagonyuluka ngokuhlukunyezwa umsolwa. Basuke enkantolo banikela esiteshini samaphoyisa ukuyovula amacala,” usho kanje.Inkantolo ilihlehlisele u-Okthoba, 17 icala, njengoba kusaphenywa. Kulindeleke ukuthi sande isibalo samacala afanayo athweswa umsolwa uma esevela ngalolu suku.Eboshwa ngenyanga edlule, kudingeke angeniswe esibhedlela ukuyokwelashwa kwazise umphakathi wawuqale wamtitinya kanzima ngaphambi kokuthi umdlulisele emaphoyiseni.

INJABULO ibibhalwe ebusweni kosomabhizinisi abancane njengoba benikelelwe ngezinsiza zokusebenza nguMphathiswa wezokuThuthukiswa kwamaBhizinisi Amancane, uNksz Stella Ndabeni-Abrahams, eThekwini ngoLwesine.Labo somabhizinisi bebekhala ngezingqinamba ezahlukene okubalwa kuzo ukuba nefriji elincane bagcine bengakwazi ukugcina inyama eningi noma iziphuzo.UNkk Thobekile Makhoba onekhishi lokudayisa ukudla enkabeni yeTheku ekhuluma neSolezwe, uthe ahlomuhle ngakho kuzomsiza kakhulu.“Ngihlomuhle, ngesitofu segesi, ibhodwe, ifriji kanye netafula okuzongilekelela kakhulu ekutheni ibhizinisi lami liqhubeke liye phambili okuzogqugquzela nabanye ukuthi bafake izicelo ukuze bahlomule,” kusho uNkk Makhoba.Uthe ziningi izingqinamba ahlangabezana nazo ngoba ubengenazo ezinye zezinsiza.“Kwesinye isikhathi amakhasimende ami abefuna iziphuzo, uthole ukuthi anginazo ngenxa yokuthi ifriji lami lincane futhi bengithenga inyama njalo ngoba bengingakwazi ukuthenga eningi,” usho kanje.UMnuz Thalente Ndlovu oqhamuka eSiyathuthuka Madoda Multi-Purpose Cooperative ezinze eJozini abambisene kuyo noMnuz Hlobisani Thabede, banebhizinisi lokwenza ama-tissue, uthe njengoba behlomule ngeloli kubasize kakhulu lokho ngoba bebengakwazi ukuzilandela impahla.“Iloli lizosisiza kakhulu ngoba besingakwazi ukuzilandela impahla eSappi ngoba umthamo wempahla esiwuthengayo mkhulu kakhulu okwenza singakwazi ukulayisha, sigcine sesiliqasha iloli,” kusho uNdlovu.Uthe ukuqasha iloli elizobathuthela impahla kubiza kakhulu.“Bekumba eqolo sikhokha imali ecishe ifike ku-R15 000 ngokuqasha iloli. Sesizokwazi ukufaka i-order bese siyazilandela thina. Izinsiza zokwenza i-tissue esizitholile zizosisiza ekutheni sikwazi ukusebenza ngoba ezinyangeni ezedlule silimele kakhulu njengoba sisanda kuqala-nje ngo-2022 ukusebenza,” usho kanje.Uthe impahla yokwenza i-tissue ibiza kakhulu futhi amafemu akhiqiza yona akude nabo. Uthe nemali abahlomule ngayo okungu-R1 197 25,00 izobasiza kakhulu njengoba beyibhizinisi elisakhula. Uma bethole i-order elikhulu bebengakwazi ukuhambisa impahla, kuphoqe ukuthi lowo othengayo azilandele impahla obekugcina sekubalahlekisela ngamakhasimende.UNgqongoshe wezokuThuthukiswa kwamaBhizinisi amaNcane, uNksz Stella Ndabeni-Abrahams, ugcizelele ukuthi abahlomule ngezinsiza abasebenzisane futhi besekane.“Kubalulekile ukuthi njengosomabhizinisi abancane nisebenzisane futhi nakhe namathuba emisebenzi ukuze kuxoshwe ikati eziko,” kusho uNksz Ndabeni-Abrahams.Uthe izimvume zokudayisa azingasetshenziselwa ukucindezela osomabhizinisi abasebancane. Uthe bayasebenzisana noMnyango wezeMfundo ukuze abaneziqu abangaqashiwe basebenzisane nosomabhizinisi abancane, waveza ukuthi  bazothatha abaneziqu abangu-1 500 kuzwelonke. Uphinde wagcizelela ukuthi ngaphansi komthetho we-National Small Enterprises Act, bazovula ihhovisi lommeli ukuze lisize osomabhizinisi babike uma bexhashazwa.

ITHOBEKE amanxeba inkosikazi kasomatekisi waseBhukhanana, eMpangeni, owabulawelwa uR6 000, begwetshwa odilikajele neminye iminyaka ngaphezulu, abesilisa ababili abalahlwe ngecala lokubulala umyeni wakhe.UMnuz Thulani Nsele wadutshulwa wabulawa emakethe yakule ndawo ngoMeyi 24, 2021, eneminyaka engu-47.INkantolo yeMantshi yaseMthunzini ilahle ngecala usomatekisi waseBhukhanana uNkunzebomvu Biyela nenkabi yakhe yaKwaDukuza, uTsepo Pakkies.Ngecala lokubulala bagwetshwe odilikajele, ngelokuzama ukubulala banikwa iminyaka emihlanu, ngelesibhamu esingekho emthethweni bagixabezwa ngeyishumi, baphinde bathasiselwa ngemibili ngokutholwa nezinhlamvu.Ephawula ngesigwebo umkamufi, uNksz Nompumelelo Ndlovu, uthe nakuba isigwebo singeke sisambuyisa umyeni wakhe kodwa ujabule. Wabalula ukuthi kuningi adlule kukho ngesenzo sababulali.“Sinezingane siphoqeleke ukuthi sishiye ikhaya lethu, siye ekubhaceni ngenxa yezinsongo ebesizithola. Bengishayelwa ucingo izinombolo ezifihliwe, zingitshele ukuthi angihambe ngiyosula icala, kungenjalo nami ngizobulawa,” kusho uNksz Ndlovu.Uqhuba wathi ubevele abatshele kwezikabhoqo ukuthi akukho cala azolisula ngoba icala eloMbuso akulona elakhe.Uveze nokuthi ukubulawa komyeni wakhe kwashiya omkhulu umonakalo ezinganeni zakhe, athe zonhlanu zisasesikoleni.“Ngaphandle kokulimala komqondo ngoba bezisondelene kakhulu noyise, kwaphoqa ukuthi ngizikhiphe ezikoleni ezizimele, ziyofunda kwezikahulumeni ngoba imali ibingasangeni kahle ngamatekisi asishiya nawo,” kusho uNksz Ndlovu.Uthe umufi wayenamatekisi ayisishiyagalombili ePitoli, bese eba mathathu eMpangeni, wathi uphoqeleke ukuthi awathuthe awaseMpangeni awayise ePitoli ngoba kungasebenzeki.“Nakhona kuyafiliza, kuyasho ukuthi sekushintshe isandla, akusefani nangesikhathi kusekhona yena,” kusho uNksz Ndlovu.Elandisa ngokubulawa komyeni wakhe, uthe into ayibanga noBiyela ukufikiswa kwezingane sekwedlule isikhathi esikoleni.Uthe izingane zendawo zazithuthwa imoto kaBiyela, bathola izikhalazo esikoleni, othisha bethi zihlale zifika sekwedlule isikhathi.“Umyeni wami wakhuluma kaningi noBiyela ezwakalisa ukungenami ngoba imoto yakhe ibizithatha ngo-5 ekuseni izingane emakhaya, sixakeke uma sezifika sekwedlule isikhathi esikoleni,” kuchaza uNksz Ndlovu.Uqhube wathi umufi wavele wazikhipha ezakhe izingane emotweni kaBiyela, waqala ngokuzihambisa yena esikoleni, ngaphambi okuba azitholele enye imoto eyayiya ngakhona ezikoleni zezingane.“Abazali bavele bazikhipha nezabo, bazifaka kule moto etholwe umyeni wami. Kwaphuma izingane ezingu-12 emotweni kaNkunzi, wadinwa wafa, ethi umyeni wami umphuce umsebenzi,” kusho yena.Uthe baqala lapho bathola izinsongo, uBiyela eshayela ucingo umufi emtshela kwezikabhoqo ukuthi izinsuku zakhe sezibaliwe. UNksz Ndlovu uthe naye wayemsongela, ethi akusensuku zatshwala amgqokise inzilo.“Ingane ngayinye yayikhokha uR500 ngenyanga. Okusho ukuthi uNkunzi wabulala umyeni wami embulalela uR6 000,” kubalisa uNksz Ndlovu.UBiyela noPakkies baboshwa ngalo usuku lwesigameko njengoba icala balenzela budebuduze nesiteshi samaphoyisa, avele abajaha esizwa nawumphathi. Ngenxa yengcindezi, bayigingqa imoto ababebaleka ngayo, uBiyela waphuma wabaleka eshiya ngemumva umazisi, amakhadi asebhange, ilayisense neselula. Amaphoyisa ngaphakathi emotweni afica uPakkies, nomunye wesilisa owaphenduka ufakazi woMbuso.UNksz Ndlovu ubonge umphakathi ngokumeseka kusuka liqala icala, waphinde wancoma abaseshi ngokugojela ababulali.

UNGQONGQOSHE wezokoThutha kuleli uNkk Sindisiwe Chikunga uqinisekisa ukupheliswa kohlelo lwama-e-toll, oselukhathaze abashayeli baseGauteng iminyaka eminingi. Ngokwesimemezelo sikangqongqoshe lolu hlelo luzonqanyulwa ngoLwesine phakathi kwamabili nokusho ukuthi kusukela ngoLwesihlanu, abashayeli ngeke besakhokhiswa ngokudlula eamabhulohweni ama-e-toll.Uthei lawa amabhuloho azoqhubeka nokuma njengoba azosetshenziselwa izinhlelo ezehlukene ukuqapha isimo emgwaqweni kanti namakhamera azosetshenziselwa ukuqapha ubugebengu.Abanama-akhawunti bazokwazi ukuqhubeka nokuwasebenzisela ezinye izinsiza ezihambisana nezokuthutha, njengokukhokhela izindaba zokupaka izimoto, kodwa abasanezikweletu kufanele baqinisekise ukuthi bayazikhokhela.“Abashayeli basanesibophezelo sokuthi bakhokhe, lokho kuyisibopho ngokomthetho. Mayelana nokuthi sizokwenzenjani ukuqinisekisa lokho, yinto leyo esizoyilungisa njengoba isikhathi siqhubeka,” kusho uNdunankulu wesifundazwe uMnuz Panyaza Lesufi obeyingxenye yesithangami nabezindaba.Yize kuyizindaba ezimnandi lezi, kodwa uStefanie Fick okhulumela i-Organisation Undoing Tax Abuse (OUTA) uthe kabathokozile ngokwanele bengakezwa kahle ukuthi uhulumeni uzosikhokhela kanjani isikweletu sezigidi salolu hlelo.“Kuhle ukwazi ukuthi abantu balwe baze baphumelela njengoba seluqedwa lolu hlelo, kodwa ungqongqoshe uhlulekile wukuchazela izakhamuzi ukuthi izokhokhwa kanjani imali elinganiselwa kuR43 billion eyisikweletu sokwakhiwa kwalo lonke lolu hlelo,” kusho yena.

BAKHOLWA ukuthi kuzokwenza omkhulu umehluko kwezokuphepha eMpendle ukuvulwa kwehhovisi lamaphoyisa omgwaqo nokudluliswa kwezimoto zokusebenza.Lokhu kushiwo yiMeya yalo masipala, uMnuz Buyisani Mlaba ngoMsombuluko ngesikhathi kunomcimbi wokwethula ihhovisi nezimoto.UMlaba uthe bese siside isikhathi lingekho leli hhovisi kulo masipala.“Kusuka ngo-2021, ngaqala umsebenzi wokuthi kwakhiwe leli hhovisi njengoba lo msebenzi sesiwuphetha manje,“ kusho uMlaba.Uthe bekuba nzima uma kunezinkinga ezehlukene ezidinga isandla sephoyisa lomgwaqo.Uthe umsebenzi olandelayo owokuthi kube nesikhungo sokuhlolela amalayisensi okushayela ukuze izakhamuzi ziphumule ejokeni lokuhamba ibanga elide, ziya eMgungundlovu ziyozenza.Uthe okwamanje isikhungo sizoqala ukusebenza ngamaphoyisa amane, bese kuthi maduzane, kuqashwe amanye athe xaxa. Zintathu izimoto zamaphoyisa ezinikelwe uMphathiswa wezokuThutha esifundazweni, uMnuz Siboniso Duma.UMnuz Mawo Khumalo wemboni yezokuthutha endaweni, obekhona emcimbini, uthe bayakujabulela ukuvulwa kwaleli hhovisi nokulethwa kwamaphoyisa azosebenza kulo.“Sizimisele ukusebenza ngokubambisa namaphoyisa futhi siyacela ukuthi ezinhlelweni zawo, angakhohlwa ukusifaka ukuze sibenzisane kahle,“ kusho uKhumalo.

KUBE yinjabulo egcwele umunyu umndeni wamukela iziqu zendodakazi yawo engasekho emhlabeni.Lokhu kwenzeke eDurban University of Technology (DUT) lapho umndeni wakwaNkabane wamukele iziqu zendodakazi wayo uPrincess Zabanguni Nkabane ongasekho emhlabeni.UPrincess ubesebenza njengeSenior Communications Officer kuMasipala weTheku, udlule emhlabeni ngoMeyi 14, 2024, ngemuva kokugula isikhashana. UMasipala weTheku wenze inkonzo yakhe yesikhumbuzo ngoLwesine ngaphambi kokuba ayongcwatshwa ekhaya kubo ePlainhill, eXopo, ngoMgqibelo.Okuvuse umunyu kakhulu kozakwabo enyuvesi wukuthi uhamba emhlabeni sekusele izinsuku ezimbalwa athweswe iziqu zeMasters ngezifundo zobuntatheli.Iziqu zakhe zamukelwe ngudadewabo uZinhle Nkabane obenonina wabo uMama Nkabane nomyeni kamufi uNhlanhla Makhanya.UMakhanya uchaze ingoduso yakhe njengeqhawekazi ebeliwuthanda umndeni futhi lizinikele nasemsebenzini walo.“Ingoduso yami izokhunjulwa ngokuba nothando nokuzinikela kwakhe emndenini. Ubesebenza futhi efunda, kodwa asikaze siluswele uthando lwakhe, ikhaya letho belihlezi linemfudumalo ngenxa yakhe,” kusho uMakhanya.Yize kube nomuzwa womunyu nobuhlungu ukubona umndeni wamukela iziqu zale ntokazi ingasekho ukuzibongela yona ngemisebenzi yayo emihle, kodwa kube kuhle ukubona ubuholi benyuvesi bunxuse bonke ebebekhona ehholo ukuba basukume ngomzuzu wokuhlonipha le ntokazi ngesikhathi udadewabo amukeliswa iziqu zayo.

KUBE nesililo nenjabulo enkantolo emuva kokuthi ijaji ligwebe udilikajele unesi owathenga izinkabi ezasoconga umyeni owayewunjiniyela.Lezi zithandani kwase kusele izinyanga ezintathu zishade umshado omhlophe.IJaji elibambile uSolwazi Bonke DumisaIJaji elibambile, uSolwazi Bonke Dumisa ligwebe uNksz Nompumelelo Goncalves (31) nomfowabo uNkosinathi Zungu (40) iminyaka engu-10 ngecala lokuthumba, ewu-20 ngecala lokuphanga kusetshenziswa udlame nodilikajele ngokubulala okuhleliwe.Lo wesifazane ubhanselwe ngeminyaka eyisishiyagalombili ngamacala amabili okuphazamisa ukusebenza kwengalo yomthetho. Wabika amacala angekho emaphoyiseni okungelokuduka komuntu nelokwebiwa kwemoto kamufi ekubeni wayazi ukuthi ukuphi.Ababulali, njengasemihleni, bebebukeka bezikhululekele beqeda kugwetshwa, kunalokho unina nodadewabo kaNksz Goncalves bavele bakhala.Ngakolunye uhlangothi, abomndeni kamufi, uMnuz Nkosi Timmy Langa ajabulile, akikiza aze avuma ingoma yokubhuqa enkantolo (Azophela amaqhinga...Abanye bayokhala izinyembezi).UNksz Zodwa Langa ongudadewabo kamufi uthe bayazi ukuthi ngeke esabuya uLanga kodwa isigwebo sibasule izinyembezi sabathoba amanxeba.“Bubi ubudlelwano phakathi kwethu nabakamakoti, asikhulumi selokhu sagcinana kusaphila umama (unina kaLanga osewashona) ngoDisemba 2020,” kusho uNksz Langa.Osekufiswa yilo mndeni manje ukuba ubone ingane kamufi ezohlanganisa iminyaka eyisishiyagalolunye ngoDisemba, abagcina ukuyibona ngo-2020.Le ngane esifunda uGrade 3 eMtuba, ikhuliswa ugogo wayo unina kaNksz Goncalves obesenkantolo. Lo mndeni uthi abakwaTransnet lapho umufi ayesebenza khona, bayibambile imali yakhe ngoba umndeni ubungafuni iwele ezandleni ezingafanele.Umngani kamufi, uMnuz Thamsanqa Maduna, obesenkantolo, uthe umufi wayengumuntu onothando, onakekelayo engabukelani phansi futhi amampunge ukuthi wayehlukumeza.UMaduna uthe ngo-2019, watshelwa umufi ukuthi uZungu wayehluleka nawukuzenzisa engamfuni.“Wayekhathazekile ukuthi akafunwa wuZungu. Ngaphambi kokuthi abulawe, uNkosi wangicela ukuthi ngimkhaphe ayokwembesa ekhweni lakhe eMtuba. Kwabaleka isilwane (isiklabhu) esasizohlatshwa emcimbini, engizisolayo manje ukuthi ngasijahelani ngabuya naso ngoba kwakuyizinkomba zokuthi laba ababili kwakungamele babe ndawonye,” kuchaza uMaduna.UDumisa uthe laba ababili abakhombisanga ukuzisola ngabakwenza. Uthe umsebenzi kanesi owokuhlenga impilo yabantu kodwa uNksz Goncalves wathatha impilo yomuntu.ULanga wathunjwa kwakhe ePinetown ebusuku ngoSepthemba 29, 2020, wabulawa ngokuklinywa emahlathini oZwathini, eNdwedwe.Inkabi uJames Mthimkhulu yalivuma icala yagwetshwa iminyaka engu-20.

UBEHAMBA ngevesi lokuhlonipha oyinkakha kwezokulingisa uLeleti Khumalo eluleka amaciko abethweswa iziqu emcimbini obubanjelwe eDurban North, eThekwini izolo.ULeleti ukhulume kanje ngesikhathi ethula inkulumo yakhe yokwethula i-Simon “Mabhunu” Sabela Industry Lecture ebihlelwe yiKwaZulu-Natal Tourism and Film Authority.Abafundi abebethweswa iziqu bebeqhamuka esikhungweni esiseMzimkhulu kuMasipala iHarry Gwala nesiseMbazwana, eMkhanyakude.Ezifundweni ebekade bezenza kubalwa izifundo zika-NQF Level 4 no-NQF Level 5 zokubhalwa kwamafilimu nemidlalo yethelevishini, ezokudidiyela nezokuthwebula kusetshenziswa ubuchwepheshe be-drone.Ethula inkulumo yakhe udalule ukubaluleka kokuhlonipha kumkhakha wezokulingisa.“Ukuze lo mkhakha ukuhloniphe, kumele uqale wena uwuhloniphe uphinde uzihloniphe wena. Ngeshwa lo mkhakha wezokulingisa usifuna sibahle futhi sakheke kahle kodwa manje izinto ziya ngokushintsha, yingakho ngigcizelela ukuthi kubalulekile ukuthi uzinakekele,” kusho uNksz Khumalo.Uthe ziningi izinselelo umkhakha wezokulingisa oza nazo futhi kumele wazi ukuthi yini ekusebenzelayo njengomlingisi.“Abanye bagcina sebezinikela ezidakamizweni. Awukwazi ukuthi ube umlingisi owenza yonke into. Ngokukwazi ukwenza lokho, uzokwazi ukuthi yimuphi umsebenzi okufanele,” usho kanje.Eqhuba uthe kubalulekile kulo mkhakha ukuthi uzwane uphinde wazi abantu futhi uqikelele ukuthi njalo ulola ikhono lakho.“Ngeke uphumelele kulolu hambo uma uhamba wedwa. Kumele usebenzise ukuzwana kwakho nabantu ngoba ngeke uphile wedwa. Lo mkhakha unonya kakhulu, abanye bazokudonsela phansi ngoba bebona ikhono lakho onalo elimangalisayo.”“Ungakhululeki kakhulu ngoba ikhono kudingeka ulilole nsuku zonke. Uma usingethwe abantu asebemnkantshubomvu ungasabi ukubabuza ukuthi lokhu kwenziwa kanjani,” ubeke kanje.UMnuz Sbonelo Cele waseLovu KwaZulu-Natal, ongomunye wabathweswe iziqu kwezokuthwebula kusetshenziswa ubuchwepheshe be-drone, ekhuluma neSolezwe, uthe ukwenza lezi zifundo kumba eqolo.“Ngiwumuntu ozisebenzayo njengoba ngithwebula izithombe ukuze ngiziphilise. Ngibonge kakhulu ku-KZN Tourism and Film Authority njengoba bekwazile ukungikhokhela uR30 000 izifundo. Ziningi izinselelo ebengibhekene nazo ngesikhathi ngenza lezi zifundo ngoba kumele ufike isonto lonke, okwenze ukuthi ngize ngiyiqede ngawo lo nyaka ngoFebhuwari,” kusho uCele.Uthe ngokomsebenzi awenzayo ukuthola ilayisensi yokusebenzisa ubuchwepheshe be-drone kuzomsiza kakhulu.“Kuneminye imisebenzi ongakwazi ukuthi ufake izicelo kuyo uma ungenayo ilayisensi. Esikhathini samanje kusebenza izinto zobuchwepheshe, ngakho-ke ukundizisa i-drone kunciphise izindleko zokuqashwa kwendiza enophephela emhlane ohambisana nomthwebuli futhi kulula ukusebenzisa ubuchwepheshe uma usukwazi njengoba izinto zihlala zishintsha njalo,” usho kanje.USphamandla Mdluli waseMbazwana obenza izifundo zika-NQF Level 5 zokubhalwa kwamafilimu nemidlalo yethelevishini nokudidiyela, uthe ufunde okuningi ngokudidiyela.“Ngifunde ukuthi kusukela ngaphambi kokuthi udidiyele, noma usudidiyelile yini okumele uyiqonde futhi uyenze uma usebenza nabantu. Mina bengibhekene nokuhlela isikhathi esiningi, ngafunda nokuthi uqala kuphi uma uhlela,” kusho uMdluli.Uthe kunamafilimu amancane abekade bewenza ngesikhathi besafunda abehlelwa wuye. Uthe ufunde ukuthi kulo mkhakha awusebenzi wedwa kodwa usebenza nabantu abanemiqondo ehlukahlukene.

UMKHUZI wamaPhoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLieutenant General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi, unxusa laba abathi bayizazi zezobugebengu nomthetho ukuba basondele ngaphambili basebenzisane nabo ekulweni nobugebengu.UMkhwanazi ubekhuluma nomethuli wezinhlelo ze-Newzroom Afrika engxoxweni ekhethekile ngoLwesine ntambama. Usho kanje ephendula ukuphawula okuthi usebenza kuhle kwenkabi ejuqa abantu ingabi nazwelo.Uthi kunzima ukuphikisana nomuntu ozibiza ngesazi entweni kodwa angakaze ayenze. “Angikwazi ukuthi ngizibize isazi sobuntatheli ngoba angazi ukuthi ungakanani umsebenzi owenzile wena ukuhlanganisa lo msebenzi esihlangene ngawo namuhla. Olwazini enginalo lweminyaka ngisebenza njengephoyisa, angikwazi kodwa ukwahlulela amaphoyisa abesengozini ethile ngale kokuthi ngizwe ukuthi kwenzakaleni ngokulalela wona abekhona lapho.“Mina nginganxusa bonke abathi bayizazi ezinemibono ngendlela yokwenza lo msebenzi, abasondele basijoyine bahambe nathi uma kwenziwa umsebenzi wokuthungatha nokubamba izigebengu. Sizobanika ithuba lokuthi basihole phambili ngokolwazi lwabo lokusebenza, basibonise ukuthi yikuphi okungcono abangakwenza ngendlela abazi ngayo bese bayabuya bezositshela ukuthi bakuzwe kunjani ukwenza kunokuhlala komabonakude bephawula,” kusho yena.#Newzroom405's @XoliMngambi asks KwaZulu-Natal Police Commissioner Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi about the state of preparedness of the police in dealing with criminals."We try to prepare as much as we can. SICHITHWE nezindleko yiNkantolo eNkulu yaseMgungundlovu ngoLwesihlanu, isiphakamiso esifakwe wuhlangothi lweqembu lepolitiki i-Abantu Batho Congress oluchitha uMnuz Philani Mavundla njengomengameli walo.Emaphepheni amukelwe yinkantolo ngo-Ephreli 12 kulo nyaka, lolu hlangothi luthi uMavundla akasiyena umholi weqembu.Luveza ukuthi sewaxoshwa ngakho akanalo ilungelo lokuqoka uhlu lwabazolimela iqembu ephalemende likazwelonke nasezishayamthetho zezifundazwe nasezifundeni okhethweni lukazwelonke ngenyanga ezayo. Uhlelo lokwamukelwa kohlu lwabaphakanyiselwe ukumela amaqembu, inhlangano yezokhetho i-Independent Electoral Commission, luvalwe ngenyanga edlule.Bafuna inkantolo iphoqe le nhlangano ukuthi yamukele uhlu okuthiwa ludidiyelwe ubuholi ababusekayo kuchithwe oluhlelwe ngokukaMavundla. Lokhu bekufakwe njengesicelo esiphuthumayo.UMnuz Sabelo Sithole osohlangothini oluphikisa ubuholi bukaMavundla, exoxa neSolezwe, uthe isizathu sokuchithwa kwalesi siphakamiso okwamanje, yingoba abamele uMavundla babhalele abahlangothi lwabo incwadi beveza iphutha elenziwe inkantolo lokubanikeza usuku oluseduze ukuthi baphendule kwazise amaphepha afakwe ngo-Ephreli 12.Ngokomthetho, kumele silalelwe ngo-Ephreli 26, ekubeni ngokwamaphepha asenkantolo kumele banikezwe izinsuku ezingu-15 ukuphendula.“Lokho kube yiphutha lenkantolo kodwa elizolungiswa njengoba kusasa (namhlanje) abameli bezobuyela ukuze kutholakale usuku olusha. “Lolu daba luyaphuthuma njengoba ngokweqembu uMavundla akasesiye umholi walo futhi akanalo ilungelo lokudlulisela kwa-IEC uhlu lwabazomela iqembu emva kokhetho lwangenyanga ezayo,” usho kanje.UMavundla uthe akukho okubajabulisayo ngalesi sinqumo ngoba kwasekuqaleni ubelokhu emile kulokhu abakholelwa kukhona njengeqembu, akukho okushintshile.“Laba bathunywe abathile ukudicilela phansi i-ABC.  Wuhlelo lwabo ukugqigqa izinkantolo. Wonke amacala asebawafakile, inkantolo iwachithile. Yimina onelungelo njengomengameli we-ABC lokuqoka uhlu lwabazomela iqembu, lokho akukashintshi. “Engithanda ukukusho kubantu ukuthi i-ABC esayiqala isekhona, iyasebenza futhi ilungenele ukhetho kuzwelonke nasezifundazweni,” usho kanje.

Ihlulekile imizamo ye-ANC yokuthi kuchithwe iqembu elesekwa ngowayengumengameli wale nhlangano kanjalo nezwe uJacob Zuma, uMkhonto weSizwe, ohlwini lwamaqembu azongenela ukhetho.Inkantolo yezokhetho ngoLwesibili ichithe lesi sicelo se-ANC sokuthi leli qembu lisulwe njengamanye azongenela ukhetho.Lesi sicelo sikhishwe yiJaji uLebogang Modiba, othe akukho okungahanjiswanga ngendlela ngesikhathi ikhomishini yezokhetho i-Independent Electoral Commission, ibhalisa leli qembu nyakenye. Ijaji lithe i-ANC yahluleka izikhawu ezimbili ukuthi ifake isicelo sokuthi kuchithwe iMK ingabhaliswa.“Kumele izinuke yona amakhwapha i-ANC ngoba yahluleka ukuphikisa ukubhaliswa kweMK. Ngakho ke ngiyasichitha isicelo se-ANC.” I-ANC ibikhala ngokuthi akuzange kulandelwe imigomo ngesikhathi kubhaliswa leli qembu, kolunye uhlangothi i-IEC neMK bebemile ekutheni kwalandelwa yonke imigudu ebekiwe.IMK yaveza ukuthi i-ANC ayizange ikuphikise ukubhaliswa kwayo kwaze kwaba uZuma umemezela ukuthi uzokweseka leli qembu njengoba kuzovotwa ngoMeyi 29. Leli qembu labhaliswa nguMnuz Jabulani Khumalo ngoSepthemba nyakenye kanti uZuma wamemezela ukuthi uzovotela leli qembu ngoDisemba 16, nyakenye.

INKANTOLO yezoKhetho ichithe isinqumo senhlangano eyengamele ukhetho, i-Independent Electoral Commission (IEC), sokukhipha igama lowayengumengameli, uJacob Zuma, ohlwini lwabaya ePhalamende.Igama likaZuma lakhishwa ohlwini emva kwezikhalo zabantu ababethi uZuma akakulungele ukuya ePhalamende ngenxa yokuthi useke wagwetshwa izinyanga ezingu-15 ebhadla ejele.Umthetho awuvumi ukuthi umuntu oseke wagwetshwa isikhathi esingaphezu kwezinyanga ezingu-12 aphathe isikhundla kuhulumeni.UZuma wabe esekuphonsela inselelo ukukhishwa kwegama lakhe.Icala belilalelwe ngoMsombuluko.Amajaji amahlanu abelalele icala anqume ukuthi kwakungekho emthethweni ukukhishwa kwegama likaZuma ohlwini.Amajaji awasidalulanga isizathu sokuchitha isinqumo sokukhishwa kwegama likaZuma.
