EYOKUNQANYULWA kwesabelomali emnyangweni weMfundo eyisiSekelo, ikhwelo lokuthi asule esikhundleni ungqongqoshe walo mnyango kanjalo nokulungiswa kwezimo zokusebenza zothisha ziseqhulwini engqungqutheleni yeSadtu eqhubeka eGoli.Kule ngqungquthela esongwa kusasa lapho kuzomenyezelwa nabaholi abasha bale nyunyana, amadlelandawonye ne-ANC afuqe umkhankaso wokuthi kuliwe nenkinga yokunqanyulwa kwesabelomali nokuthi kungabikhona uthisha ozodilizwa ngenxa yale nkinga.UNobhala jikelele weSACP uMnuz Solly Mapaila, uthe bazoma neSadtu ekutheni kungabikhona uthisha ozodilizwa.“Sifuna kufakwe imali kwezemfundo ngoba yilona thuluzi elibalulekile lokukhulula abantu ebubheni. Sizoyilwa eyemizamo yokudiliza othisha ngenxa yale nkinga.” Nomengameli weCosatu uNksz Zingiswa Losi, uhambe emazwini kaMapaila, wathi ngeke bavume ukuthi kudilizwe abasebenzi.Uthe ziningi izinto okusamele zilungiswe kwezemfundo okubalwa ingqalasizinda, ukuphepha kothisha nabafundi nezinye.“Ngeke sivume ukuthi izinkinga zemali ziholele ekutheni kudilizwe abasebenzi. Asebekuhulumeni wokubambisana  abavela kwamanye amaqembu, sebeyazimangalisa manje ukuthi izinselelo zokunqanyulwa kwesabelomali zinomthelela onzima emikhakheni ehlukene,” kusho uNksz Losi.Uthe laba bamaqembu asebengongqongqoshe, bebehlale beshumayela ivangeli lokuthi kuncishiswe isibalo sabasebenzi.“Manje njengoba sebekuhulumeni sebebona ngenye indlela, sebefuna kufakwe imali okuyinto esasihlala sikhala ngayo. Uma kudilizwa othisha sizokwanda isibalo sabafundi abazosala dengwane emakilasini.” UMapaila uthe kumele uNksz Siviwe Gwarube, asule esikhundleni ngokuduba ukuhambela umcimbi wokusayinwa komthetho wezikole iBela Act.“Sizowuvikela lo mthetho kuze kube sekugcineni. UMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa kumele ngabe usamxosha emnyangweni uma ngempela kuwuyena oqasha aphinde adilize ongqongqoshe,” kusho uMapaila.Ekhuluma nesiteshi sethelevishini izolo uNksz Gwarube, uzivikele wathi uRamaphosa wayazi ukuthi ngeke abe khona kulo mcimbi.“Njengoba sikuhulumeni wokubambisana kuzoba khona ukuhluka kwemibono. Akumele ngoba umuntu uqhuzukile bese esheshe exoshwa,” kusho uNksz Gwarube ezithethelela njengoba bebaningi abathi akaxoshwe.ISACP ixwayise neKhomishini yezoKhetho kuleli, ukuthi ingavumeli ukutshelwa abathile ukuthi ingabaqashi othisha beSadtu uma kunokhetho ezweni.Uthe abanye babantu abasuke bengamele ukhetho basuke bengazi ngisho nomthetho ngakho kubalulekile ukuthi abasebenzi babe yingxenye yokwengamela ukhetho.“ISadtu kumele iqhubeke nokusebenza ngesikhathi sokhetho njengabo bonke abasebenzi kuleli. Ayingavalwa ngenxa yokuthi kunabantu abasuke befaka ingcindezi.” Usho kanje, amanye amaqembu ezepolitiki okubalwa ne-EFF, ahlale ekhala ngokuthi awafuni iSadtu ilawule ukhetho.

IBHEKENE nembedumehlwana imindeni emibili yaseThandanani, eTrenance Park, eVerulam, kulandela ukubekwa kwabantu emhlabeni wayo okukhona kuwo namathuna.Ngokusho kwayo, laba bantu asebakhe kule ndawo, babekwa yikomiti le-ANC elihlala ezindlini zemixhaso eziseduze kwale ndawo. Imindeni ethintekayo owakwaCebekhulu nowakwaNdlela.UMnuz Nkosinathi Cebekhulu ekhuluma neSolezwe, uthe ukubekwa kwabantu kuqale ngo-2022 kodwa kube mandla ngoDisemba nyakenye.“Izindlu ezakhiwe phezu kwamathuna asekhaya zilinganiselwa ku-30, angizibali ezinye eziyinqwaba ezakhiwe emhlabeni ongenamathuna,” kusho uCebekhulu.Uthe uke waxoxa nabantu asebakhe emathuneni akubo, bamtshela ukuthi ikomiti belibakhokhisa uR800, ikesi likabhiya, ibhodlela nenyama yokosa.Uthe le nto ibaphatha kabi kangangokuthi balubikile udaba ezinhlakene ezehlukene okukhona kuzo namaphoyisa.“Sekunesikhathi sibikile kodwa asiwuboni umnyakazo,” kusho uCebekhulu.Uveze ukuthi bake bazama ukubiza umhlangano nalaba asebehleli emhlabeni wabo, ikomiti athi libabekile nemindeni yomibili ethintekayo, kodwa wabhuntsha umhlangano njengoba bengafikanga abakhe emhlabeni wabo.“Sigcine sithola ukuthi ikomiti libatshele ukuthi abangezi, lizobamela bona. Sawuduba ke umhlangano ngoba besifuna bageqe amagula phambi kwawo wonke umuntu ukuthi kwenzeke kanjani ukuthi bakhe phezu kwamathuna ethu,” kusho uCebekhulu.Uqhube wathi afuna ukukubona kwenzeka ukuthi ajeze amalungu aleli komiti ngesenzo sawo.“Sifuna ukuthi laba abahleli emathuneni asekhaya basuke. Singabantu abamnyama, le nto eyenzekayo ukuthi abantu bakhe emathuneni asekhaya iphambene nesiko nenkolo yethu,” kusho uCebekhulu.Osohlangothini lomndeni wakwaNdlela, uMnuz Zakhele Ndlela, uthe bake bazama kaningi ukuxoxa nabantu abakhe emhlabeni wabo ukuthi bapheze ukwenza lokhu.“Abanye babeqonda isikhalo sethu bayeke, kodwa abanye baqhubeke,” kusho uNdlela.Naye uthe abahambisani nokwenziwa ikomiti.“Ikomiti lenza imali ngomhlaba wethu. Njengoba bakhe baze bafika nasemathuneni, sifuna basuke,” kukhala uNdlela.Kuthintwa uMnuz Msawenkosi Zuma osekomitini, uthe akukho angasiza ngakho intatheli.“Asikwazi thina lokho ukuthi badlelwe umhlaba. Ngisekomitini lomphakathi kodwa umsebenzi wethu ukuhambisa izidingo kubantu, hhayi okunye. Abantu abadla umhlaba bakwenza lokho ngendlela yabo,” kusho uZuma.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLieutenant Colonel Nqobile Gwala, uthe amaphoyisa aseVerulam aphenya icala lokungena emhlabeni ngokungemthetho nokuthikanyezwa kwempahla.“Ofake isikhalazo uthe iqeqebana labantu badle umhlaba, bakha izindlu ngaphandle kwemvume. Uthe bacekele phansi amatshe amathuna. Udaba lusaphenywa,” kusho uLt Col Gwala.

SEKUQUBUKE impi yamazwi phakathi kwabaholi be-ANC nabe-IFP kulandela ukugqenywa izingozi kwamalungu e-ANC abehambele umcimbi wokukhumbula iSilo uDinuzulu kaCetshwayo.I-ANC yenze izinsolo zokuthi amalungu alimale emcimbini obuKwaCeza, ashaywe ngamalungu e-IFP. I-ANC ithe amalungu ayo ahlaselwe amalungu e-IFP aqhamuka ehostela.Kepha i-IFP iyaziphika lezi zinsolo ethe azinabufakazi, isabisa nokubika udaba kwinhlangano eyengameli ukhetho, i-Independent Electoral Commission.Amalungu e-ANC ayisishiyagalolunye aphuthunyiswe esibhedlela kukubi, emva kokuthelekelwa abantu abebephethe izinduku.Oyedwa kuthiwa ubusesimweni esingagwinyisi mathe, emva kokuquleka.Ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kusabalale izithombe ebezikhombisa amalungu e-ANC ebhandishile emakhanda. Kunezwi eliqoshiwe elisabalale ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, ebelibabaza isihluku.“Sihlalo, uma ikhona indlela awuzame ukuyibika kubuholi besifundazwe le nto. Sesibulewe nenduku, isisibulele Inkatha ngenduku lapha KwaCeza. Amaqabane amaningi asefile induku, asesibhedlela kuyimanje.”Lesi sigameko senzeke umcimbi usuphelile, izicukuthwane okubalwa kuzo iSilo uMisuzulu Sinqobile kaZwelithini noMengameli, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa, bese behambile.Ezinye izicukuthwane bezisadla endaweni ebezihlelelwe yona, kanti amalungu omphakathi wona abesahleli etendeni, ejabulela izingoma ebezidlala emsakazweni.Osinde kulesi sigameko ocele ukuba igama lakhe lingadalulwa, uthe bathelekelwe iviyo elifike kamumva, umcimbi usuphelile.“Amabutho abengasekho, abesesendaweni abehlelelwe yona ngesikhathi kwenzeka isigameko. Laba bantu bafike ngamakhumbi, begqoke izikibha ezimhlophe nezibomvu. Bafike bashaya abantu abebefake izikibha ze-ANC. Bebeqinisa kakhulu ekhanda.”Okhulumela i-ANC kuzwelonke, uNkk Mahlengi Bhengu-Motsiri, uthe bafuna amaphoyisa aphenye ngokuhlaselwa kwamalungu enhlangano yabo.“Kuyadumaza ukuhlaselwa kwamalungu e-ANC emva komcimbi obe impumelelo. Siyazi ukuthi kunemizamo yokuqeda udlame lwezepolitiki KwaZulu-Natal. Kufanele kubhekwane nalabo abasabhebhezela udlame. Sithanda ukukhumbuza labo abasagqugquzela udlame ukuthi udlame saluqeda ngo-1994. Sinxusa abantu baKwaZulu-Natal ukuthi baziqhelelanisa nalabo abagqugquzela udlame.”Okhulumela i-IFP, uMnuz Mkhuleko Hlengwa, uthe i-ANC ibathela ngodaka, wathi ithuswa yimpumelelo yabo.Uthe kufanele kusolwe uSihlalo we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Siboniso Duma, ngokwedelela isihlalo sobukhosi bukaZulu emcimbini wangoMgqibelo.“Thina kade sinomcimbi wokwethula izethembiso zokhetho obe yimpumelelo. Siyaqhubeka nokunqoba izinketho zokuchibiyela. Ukukhula kwe-IFP kuyabatatazelisa. Okunzima ukuthi noDuma ngapha naye wenza okubheke eceleni. Ukhombise ukungasihloniphi isihlalo nomengameli wabo. Benza izinsolo ngaphandle kokuletha ubufakazi.”

ABASOLWA abangu-14 abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-34 no-59, baboshwe ngesikhathi kuqhubeka umsebenzi wophiko lwezobunhloli oluqhutshwa yithimba elihlanganisa i-Directorate for Priority Crime Investigation Mpumalanga, Road Traffic Management Corporation neCrime Intelligence eSabie, Graskop, Lydenburg naseVerena, esifundazweni iMpumalanga.Laba ababoshiwe bayizikhulu zomgwaqo okuhlanganisa, amaphoyisa omgwaqo nomfundisi wesikole sokushayela, babekwe amacala okukhwabanisa, inkohlakalo nokwephula umthetho kazwelonke wezokuthutha emgwaqweni.Ukuboshwa kwabo kulandele uphenyo lophiko lwezobunhloli oluqhutshwa yithimba elihlanganisa i-Directorate for Priority Crime Investigation Mpumalanga, Road Traffic Management Corporation kanye ne-Crime Intelligence, mayelana nabahloli bamalayisensi okushayela abasebenzisana nabanikazi bezikole zokushayela ukuze banikeze abafundi amalayisensi okushayela kulabo ababefake izicelo ngaphandle kokulandela imigudu efanele, ukungahlolwi abashayeli ngendlela ejwayelekile nokusiza abafake izicelo lapho bebhalela amalayisensi.Uphenyo lwaqala ngonyaka u-2021, ulwazi olwatholwa yi-Crime Intelligence lwaholela i-Directorate for Priority Crime Investigation ukuthi ibhalise iphrojekthi ngaphansi kwegama elithi, Kwanele. Okuyiyona eyayisetshenziswa ukwenza uphenyo olungajwayelekile. Abasolwa bebesebenzela izikhungo zamalayisensi eSabie, Graskop, Lydenburg naseVerena, esifundazweni iMpumalanga.“Ngesikhathi sokukhishwa kwama-learners licence, abafake izicelo bebesizwa noma banikezwe izimpendulo ngabahloli abebesebenzisana nabanikazi bezikole zokushayela ukuze kube lula umsebenzi. Amalayisensi okushayela kuthiwa anikezwa abafake izicelo ngaphandle kokuhlolwa ngemuva kokukhokha imali eshisiwe.”Imvume egunyaza ukuboshwa kwabasolwa ikhishwe ngoMsombuluko, Septhemba 16, 2024, eziteshini zokuhlola ezehlukene kanye kanye. Abasolwa baboshwe, bathweswa amacala abanye bayiswa enkantolo ukuze bavele  okokuqala kanti abanye bagcinwe esitokisini njengoba belindele ukuvela kwabo ngoLwesibili, Septhember 17, 2024.Inhloko yesifundazwe yoKlebe, uMajor General Gerber no-CEO we-RTMC, bakuthokozele ukusebenzisana kwethimba elisebenze ngokuzikhandla ubusuku nemini, ukuqinisekisa ukuthi umsebenzi uphothulwa ngempumelelo futhi konke okuhlosiwe kuyenzeka.Kuyenzeka. NgoLwesibili kuboshwe amanye amaphoyisa omgwaqo angu-13 ezindaweni ezahlukene okubalwa kuzo iNelspruit,Kabokweni, KwaNyamazane,White River naseCalcutta. Abanye balaba basolwa bavele enkantolo badedelwe ngebheyili ephakathi kukaR2500 noR10 000.

Iqembu QEMBU eliholwa owayengumengameli, uJacob Zuma, iMK, lenze inqwaba yezinguquko ohlwini lwamalungu ayo azofungiswa ePhalamende ngoLwesibili.I-MK yathola izihlalo ezingu-58 ePhalamende, iPhalamende liveze ukuthi le nhlangano yenze izinguquko ezingu-21 ohlwini lokuqala olwashicilelwa yinhlangano eyengamele ukhetho, i-Independent Electoral Commission (IEC).Uhlu lokuqala lweMK lwalunegama likaZuma phezulu, elalilandelwa elaloyo owabhalisa ngokusemthethweni le nhlangano, uMnuz Jabulani Khumalo.Bobabili uZuma noKhumalo bayingxenye yezinguquko ezenziwe ohlwini.UZuma ukhishwe ngenxa yokuthi inkantolo yanquma ukuthi akakulungele ukuba yilungu lePhalamende ngoba wagwetshwa isikhathi esingaphezu konyaka ebhadla ejele.UKhumalo yena waxoshwa eqenjini.I-MK imemezele ukuthi ePhalamende izoholwa owayengumengameli wamajaji eWestern Cape, uMnuz John Hlophe.UHlophe wachithwa ekubeni ijaji emva kokulahlwa yicala lapho ayephenyelwa izinsolo zokuthi wazama ukunxenxa amajaji ukuba enzelele uZuma ecaleni lenkohlakalo.Okhulumela iPhalamende, uMnuz Moloto Mothapo, uthe umthetho uyawavumela amaqembu ezepolitiki ukuba enze izinguquko ngaphambi komhlangano wokuqala wokufungiswa kwamalungu ePhalamende.NasesiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal, iMK yenza inqwaba yezinguquko ohlwini lwayo.UMothapo uthe amalungu eMK azofungiswa inhloko yamaJaji uRaymond Zondo, noma ijaji elizojutshwa uZondo.“Lokhu kwenziwa ngoba kuzokube kungokokuqala ukuthi la malungu enze isifungo njengoba kade kunokhetho. Usomlomo useyokube esefungisa amanye ke amalungu azojoyina iPhalamende ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.”Amalungu eMK awazange alubhade mhla uZondo ayefungisa ozakwabo bakwamanye amaqembu njengoba ayekhala ngokuthi ukhetho aluzange luhambe kahle.Kwaphoqa ukuthi iPhalamende lihoxise zonke izinhlelo zokuya kwamalungu eMK eCape Town, okukhona kuzo amathikithi ezindiza nezindawo zokuhlala.UMothapo uthe bawahlelele wonke amalungu eMK azofungiswa.Ngakolunye uhlangothi, uHlophe uthe uyena oncenge uZuma ukuba avume ukuthi bayofunga ePhalamende.UHlophe uthe emhlanganweni wakhe noZuma, uveze ukubaluleka kokuthi amalungu eMK aye ePhalamende.Lokhu ukusho ngesikhathi ekhuluma emcimbini obuhlelwe abameli bebala elinsundu obuseThekwini, ngoMgqibelo.“Ngamtshela ngathi, ‘baba, asiye ePhalamende. Ngimbonile, bengize kuyena. Ngijabule ukusho ukuthi sizofungiswa ngoLwesibili.”UHlophe uthe umsebenzi wakhe ePhalamende kuzokuba ukuhlanganisa izinhlangano ezimele abantu abamnyama.Uthe uZuma ubeseziqalile izingxoxo nabaholi bamanye amaqembu abaluleke kubo njengomholi we-EFF, uMnuz Julius Malema.I-MK ne-EFF ngamanye amaqembu angeyona ingxenye yohulumeni wobumbano.

ABAMELI bagqugquzele abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ukuthi bangawuzibi umkhakha wensangu njengoba ibalulekile ekuvikeleni imvelo.Baveze ukuthi njengoba insangu (hemp) yafakwa ngaphansi kwezitshalo ezibalulekile ekuvikeleni imvelo ngo-1976, kubalulekile ukuthi abantu bayitshale ngokusemthethweni.UMnuz Sentebale Makara, ongummeli eCliffe Dekker Hofmeyr (CDH), uthe eNingizimu Afrika insangu kwaphasa ukuthi isingasetshenziswa emizini yabantu futhi itshalwe ngoFebhuwari walo nyaka.Uthe insangu ibalulekile ngoba iyakwazi ukugcina umoya ongcolile ibuye ivikele ukuguguleka kwenhlabathi kanti ayidingi ukunakekelwa ngamakhemikhali abulala izinambuzane njengezinye izitshalo.Udonse abantu ngendlebe ukuthi bafundisise kabanzi ngalesi sitshalo ngoba ngaphandle kokubangenisela imali, siyakwazi nokuvikela izinhlekelele zemvelo okubalwa kuzo izikhukhula njengoba sikwazi ukuvimbela ukuguguleka kwenhlabathi.UNkk Tessa Brewis, naye ongummeli eCDH osohlakeni lwezomthetho olubheka ezezimali, uthe miningi imithetho ephasiswayo emhlabeni jikelele mayelana nensangu ngakho kufanele abantu bafunde kabanzi ngayo ukuze bakwazi ukuyitshala.Ubalule ukuthi insangu iyasiza ekudambiseni izinhlungu njengoba isisetshenziswa emithini ehlukene.Kwesinye isikhathi iba ngamafutha okurabha kanjalo namaphilisi asiza abagula ngezifo ezihlukene.Uveze ukuthi ingasetshenziswa ekukhiqizeni indwangu, isetshenziswe ekudleni njengoba izinhlamvu zayo zinama-vitamin ne-Omega 3.Iyasiza nasekwakheni izindlu nasekwakhiweni kwamaphepha.

OMUNYE wabaqeqeshi abadlule esandleni sikaJoel “The Horse” Faya esikhungweni saMaZulu FC sabadlali abasakhuliswa ngenkathi esengumdlali, uphonse inselelo ezikhulwini zikahulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal, wathi zingazikhohlwa ezemidlalo ezinhlelweni zentuthuko.UMafa Zuma, omunye wabadlali abaqeqeshwa nguFaya esikhungweni saMaZulu eminyakeni edlule, manje osengumqeqeshi esigabeni seSafa ABC Motsepe League, ubekhuluma enkonzweni yesikhumbuzo ngoFaya ngoLwesine ntambama eMoses Mabhida Stadium, eThekwini.UFaya (65) owazakhela igama kuMaZulu ngeminyaka yo-1970 kuya ko-80, udlule emhlabeni ngoLwesihlanu olwedlule. Uzongcwatshwa namuhla eHeroes Acre, eRed Hill, ngemuva kwenkonzo yomngcwabo ezoba ngo-9 ekuseni KwaMashu Christian Centre.“Thina njengabantu abasebholeni, abaphila ngalo siyafisa ukuthi abaholi bethu bezombusazwe njengoba bekhankasela ukhetho oluzayo, ezinhlelweni abanazo bangazishiyi ngaphandle ezemidlalo ngoba zibaluleke kakhulu.“Ezemidlalo zibambe elikhulu iqhaza emphakathini, ekuqoqeni intsha ingabi wuvanzi ngoba ukubamba iqhaza kwentsha kunciphisa nezinga lobugebengu nokudliwa kwezidakamizwa,” kusho uZuma, ongumqeqeshi weDlangezwa Hellenic edlala kwiSafa KZN ABC Motsepe League.Uqhube wkhuluma ngobunzima obubhkene nanaqeqeshi wathi: “Ngiyacabanga nje uma kungathiwa ngelinye ilanga kwakhiwa isikhungo sebhola esibizwa ngeJoel Faya Academy, ngenza isibonelo, kunabantu, ikakhulu abaqeqeshi, abangakwazi ukuthola ithuba lokuthola isinkwa.“Yingakho-ke simnxusa uhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal ukuthi azithathe njengezibalulekile ezemidlalo ezinhlelweni anazo zokuthuthukisa imiphakathi.”UZuma ubephakathi kwabadlali abadlule esandleni sikaFaya esikhungweni saMaZulu, okubalwa uNjabulo “Mvonqo” Manqana, owagcina ezakhe igama kwiLamontville Golden Arrows, waphinda wadlala nakuwo AmaZulu.UMuzi “Mr House” Khumalo, omunye wezinkakha ezadlala noFaya kuMaZulu ngeminyaka yo-80, umchaze njengomdlali owayezikhulumela.“Ngidlale noJoel kusukela ngo-1983 kuya ku-1992. UJoe wayengathuli, wayekhuluma njalo nje. Wayengasweli into azoyikhuluma (esho sakuncokola). Njengoba nazi-ke nani ukuthi ngesikhathi sethu yayingekho imali. Ngakho-ke kwesinye isikhathi sasike singaholi.Ngoba-ke mina nganginguthisha, uJoel wayethi ngoba wena unguthisha uyahola noma ungangahola (eqenjini) akunandaba, yithina abantu okumele sihole,” kusho uKhumalo.Phakathi kwezinkakha zebhola ebezizimazise inkonzo yesikhumbuzo, kubalwa uMafa “Ace” Nduli, Ronald “Cutter” Langa, Vuma Mfeka, Patson “Sparks” Banda, Siyabonga “Bhele” Nomvethe, ukubala ezimbalwa.

KUGQAME isifundazwe i-KwaZulu-Natal kuklonyeliswa izikole, emqhudelwaneni wazo kazwelonke, i-Road Accident Fund ngokubambisana nenhlangano engenzi nzuzo i-Safer South Foundation. Ngalomqhudelwano kuhloswe ukugqugquzela abafundi ukuthi baqhamuke nezisombululo ukugwema izingozi emgwaqweni.Emcimbini wokumenyezelwa kwezikole ezidle umhlanganiso obuse- Olive Convention Centre eThekwini ngoLwesihlanu, zingu- 20 izikole ebezibambe iqhaza emqhudelwaneni ezivela ezifundazweni ezine okuyi-Gauteng, i-Limpopo, i-Eastern Cape ne-KwaZulu-Natal.Kwezingu-10 eziphumelele, ezine kuzona zivela kulesi sifundazwe. Umqhudelwano uqale nyakenye, abafundi bezikole zamabanga aphakeme bebenxuswe ukuthi babhale indatshana ezoveza izisombululo ekutheni zingagwemeka kanjani izingozi emgwaqeni.Abamabanga aphansi bona benze imidwebo ethile ezofundisa futhi ikhombise okungaba yizisombululo ekugwemeni lesi sihlavaUNkk Riah Phiyega we-Safer South Africa Foundation, enikezwe umsebenzi wokugqugquzela izikole ukungenela lo mqhudelwano kulezi zifundazwe, unxuse izihambeli ukuthi zibambe iqhaza ngokuqinisekisa ukuthi isihlava sezingozi emgwaqweni siyagwemeka.“Uhlelo lweqhinga lokuthuthukisa elakuleli esigabeni sikazwelonke  lwango- 2010, lugcizelela ukuthi ngonyaka u-2030 zibe sezehle okungenani ngo-50% izingozi ezenzeka emgwaqweni.“Ngakho-ke uma kufundiswa izingane ukuthi ziqhamuke nesisombululo, yinto enhle leyo,” usho kanje.IPhini likaNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha kuleli uMnuz Lisa Mangcu obehambele lo mcimbi, uphonsele inselelo uMnyango wezeMfundo kuleli ukuthi kube nesifundo esifundisa ngokuphepha emgwaqweni.“Izingozi zomgwaqo isikhathi esiningi zidlula nemiphefumulo yabantu abasha abayikusasa. Kuyaphoqa ukuthi sibe nesifundo ngokuphepha emgwaqweni ukuvikela ikusasa lakuleli.“Sincoma abakwa-Road Accident Fund ne-Safer South Africa Foundation ngokuqhamuka nalolu hlelo olufundisayo ezikoleni. Intsha yango-1970, yasukuma yalwela amalungelo.“Ngakho-ke nentsha yanamhlanje nayo mayithi sekwanele ngezingozi emgwaqweni, iveze izisombululo,” kusho uMangcu.Izikole ezine kulesi sifundazwe eziklonyelisiwe, esabakhubazekile iDas Special School, elale isithathu kumunxa wezikole zabaphila nokukhubazeka, saklonyeliswa ngo- R15 000. Isikole samabanga aphansi saseGingindlovu, i-Ensingweni Primary sidle umhlanganiso kuzona zonke izikole ebesiqhathwe nazo zamabanga aphansi, semuka no- R120 000.EsaKwaDukuza i-Nonhlemvu High, salala isithathu emkhakheni wezamabanga aphakeme saklonyeliswa ngo- R25 000, silandela ngemuva esaseMlaza, Igagasi High esilale isibili esithole u- R50 000.Ezinye izikole eziklonyelisiwe ezivela kwezinye izifundazwe i-Thusong Special School (Gauteng) ehlomule u-R35 000, Fuluthelo Special School  (Limpopo) sithole u-R50 000, Ntilini Full Service neMount Aycliff Full Service zase-Eastern Cape zithole u-R17 000 isikole ngasinye.I-Pele Primary ithole u-R70 000 neVuwane Secondary ethole u-R100 000 zombili ezivela esifundazweni iGauteng.Ezinye izikole ezingaphumelelanga zinikezwe umthobanhliziyo ka-R5 000 isikole ngasinye.

EZWENI lapho izinga lokungasebenzi kwentsha liphakathi kwamanani aphezulu kakhulu emhlabeni, osomabhizinisi abathathu abasebasha baguqula imiphakathi yabo futhi benza umehluko.Labosomabhizinisi abathathu bonke bayavumelana ngokuthi amabhizinisi adinga okungaphezu nje kwemali ukuze athuthuke; adinga isiqondiso, ukuqeqeshwa, kanye nomphakathi okholelwa emandleni abo.UFundisiwe Mbele, u-Achuma Somkhence, noSilindokuhle Mbatha abagcini nje ngokwakha amabhizinisi abo kodwa baphinde bahlahla indlela yekusasa eliqhakazile neliqinile njengabaqashi bakusasa.Uhambo lukaMbele kwezamabhizinisi lwazalwa ngenxa yesidingo lapho elahlekelwa umsebenzi ngesikhathi kubhebhetheka igciwane iKhorona (COVID-19).UMbele wasebenzisa amakhono akhe okwenza izinwele aba ibhizinisi eliphumelelayo.Waqale iDurban Kids’ Salon, isaluni engumahamba nendlwana eletha isitayela sezinwele ngqo emakhaya ezingane eThekwini namaphethelo.Umgomo wakhe ucacile: ukukhuthaza ukunakekelwa kwezinwele zemvelo nokunciphisa ukusetshenziswa kwamakhemikhali anokhahlo.Isevisi yesaluni yakhe ayigcini nje ngokusindisa isikhathi sabazali kodwa futhi inikeza ulwazi oluzolile ezinganeni.Uthi: “Ngangifuna ukwakha indawo lapho izingane zizizwa ziduduzekile futhi zinakekelwe.UMbele uncoma inqubekelaphambili yakhe ngokwesekwa akuthola ku-FNB Youth Start-up Accelerator emnikeze ukuqeqeshwa okubalulekile ekuphathweni kwezimali, ubuholi kanye nokumaketha.Izinhlelo ezifana nalezi zibalulekile kosomabhizinisi abasebasha, azinikezi nje uxhaso lwezimali kodwa nokuqeqeshwa okudingekayo ukuze kusimame futhi kuthuthukiswe ibhizinisi.Ngokwemibiko yakamuva, ama-70-80% amabhizinisi amancane ayahluleka phakathi neminyaka emihlanu yokuqala.Leli zinga eliphezulu lokuhluleka ligqame kakhulu phakathi kosomabhizinisi abasha ngenxa yezihibe zezimali, ukuqeqeshwa, namathuba ezimakethe (GEM Global Entrepreneurship Monitor) .UMbele unalesi seluleko kosomabhizinisi abasafufusa: “Uma kukhona kungasebenzi, zama okunye. Yiba umngane ngokuzithiba, ukungaguquguquki nokusebenza kanzima.”U-Achuma Somkhence, wasungula ibhizinisi lakhe, iSamgn Smoothies ukuze anikeze izakhamuzi zaseMlazi, eThekwini ezinye izindlela ezinempilo esikhundleni sokudla okusheshayo.USomkhence watshala imali yakhe abeyilondolozile kuma-blender nezinye izinto zokusebenza ekuqaleni kuka-2020, emva kwezinyanga ezimbili ibhizinisi lakhe labhekana nenqinamba ngesikhathi izwe lonke liba nama lockdown ngenxa yeKhovidi.Naphezu kwalezi zingqinamba, ukuzimisela kwakhe akuzange kuntengantenge.Usebenzise ukukhangisa kwamagama kanye nemicimbi ye-pop-up ukukhulisa ibhizinisi lakhe lapho isivuma imithetho yelockdown.“Zonke izingqinamba ohlangabezana nazo, nozinqobayo zikwenza ukhule, ufunde futhi ngengomuntu,” usho kanje.USomkhence uthe ukuba nomeluleki yinto edingwa yibo bonke abanikazi bamabhizinisi; umuntu ohamba eduze kwabo, umuntu ongabakhomba endleleni efanele.“Ngaphezu kwalokho, uma uqala ibhizinisi, akekho okufundisa ngezezimali. Ngifunde ukuthi ngingabiza kanjani imikhiqizo yami nokuphatha ukungena kwami ​​kwemali ngesisheshisi sentsha esine-FNB ne-Fetola. Kwakuyinguquko kimi futhi yangifundisa ukuphatha imali yami kangcono. Kungenze ngaba usomabhizinisi ongcono. Manje sengingakwazi ukugxila kwezinye izinto zebhizinisi lami.”Uthando lukaSilindokuhle Mbatha lokusimama kwemvelo luholele ekutheni asungule i-Bantu Solutions, inkampani elawula udoti wokudla eNewcastle.Esebenzisa indlela yeBokashi, uMbatha, 29, uguqula imfucumfucu yokudla ibe umquba obalulekile, okunqanda ukuthi kugcine sekugcwele izindawo zokulahla imfucuza.“Umsebenzi wami wokuqala wawu sembonini yokugaywa kabusha kwatoti, ngaba nokuqonda kokubaluleka kokugaya udoti okwazi ukuthi uphinde uwusebenzise kabusha (recycling).  Ngaba nentshisekelo yokwenza okuthile okunomthelela ofanayo. Ngakho ngaqala ibhizinisi lami,” kusho yena.UMbatha ubhekana nezingqinamba nsuku zonke njengoba ibhizinisi likhula, kuya kuba nzima ukuqoqa udoti wokudla usebenzisa izithuthi zomphakathi noma izimoto eziqashiwe. Unethemba lokuthi ngelinye ilanga uzothenga eyakhe imoto.Umbele naye ubalule ukuthi ezokuthutha nazo ziyakhathaza.Ngokuvamile kufanele aye kumakhasimende ngemva kwamahora futhi asebenzise amatekisi noma ashayele i-Uber. Lokhu kudla inzuzo yakhe futhi uyavuma ukuthi impilo izoba lula ngeveni lakhe.“Uma ngizizwa ngicindezelekile ngikhuluma nomeluleki wami kwezamabhizinisi ongisizayo ukuhlela uhlelo lwami kanye nezithunywa. Ukuzethemba kwami ​​sekukhule kakhulu, sengiyakwazi ukwethula izethulo kanye nenethiwekhi kalula,” kusho uMbatha.Uthi uma uzimisele ngokuqala elakho ibhizinisi, qonda ukuthi ayikho into eyimpumelelo eyenzeka ngobusuku obubodwa kumele uqinise umsebenzi wakho ukuze uthole izithelo ezinhle.“Uhambo lwezamabhizinisi luwumjaho wemarathoni, hhayi owokugijima. Gxila embonweni wakho, futhi izokuyisa ezikhathini ezinzima,” kusho uMbatha

ZIPHUME zinxapha zodwa eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini, ezinye izihlobo zomunye wabesifazane abadutshulwa babulawa eKenville, ngasekupheleni kuka-Agasti.Badinwe baveva bebona ngamehlo abasolwa ababili kuleli cala, uMnuz Lungani Mthethwa (38) noMnuz Sandile Chili (44).Izidumbu zabafi, oNksz Anele Mbokazi (29) noNksz Zizipho Gabisa (30) zatholwa zidindilizile eKenville ngo-Agasti 25. Babekade behambe nabasolwa ngayizolo.Abasolwa obekulindeleke ukuthi bafake isicelo sebheyili, ababange besasifaka njengoba kuvele ukuthi uChili usezothola ummeli omusha, ozodinga isikhashana ukuthi afundisise okuqukethwe yidokodo.Abameli abebekhona ngeledlule, abasazoqhubeka nokumela uMthethwa, nabo baveze ukuthi kunezitatimende ezibalulekile uMbuso ongakabaniki zona.Imantshi, uMnuz Scelo Zuma, ibe isilihlehlisela uSepthemba 17, icala lapho okulindeleke ukuthi abasolwa bafake izicelo zabo zebheyili.Okhulumela umndeni, uMnuz Mvuselelo Magwaza, uthe wehluleke ngisho nokubabheka abasolwa ngobuhlungu ababalethele bona bewumndeni kaNksz Mbokazi.“Cabanga ke ukuthi uma kube nzima kimi, ukubabheka, kube nzima kangakanani kodadewethu ukuthi bababheke emehlweni,” kusho uMagwaza.Uqhube wathi uma kwenzeka bededelwa ngebheyili, kuyobe kusho ukuthi bona bewumndeni bagwazwa enxebeni lisabhibha.“Kodwa sizowudedela umthetho uklame indima yawo. Sizobheka kuyo inkantolo ukuthi kube yiyo ethatha isinqumo ebona sifanele ngalolu daba,” kusho yena.Uveze ukuthi kusenzima emndenini kulandela isigameko, wathi abaningi basadidekile futhi basethukile.Uveze ukuthi isibhedlela obekusebenza kuso uNksz Mbokazi, iNkosi Albert Luthuli Central, naso sinenkonzo yesikhumbuzo esimenzele yona.Enkantolo bekugcwele izihlobo, abangani namalungu omphakathi kaNksz Mbokazi. Kubona bekukhona nabebegqoke izikibha ezinesithombe ngemumva, zihambisana nombhalo othi Justice for Anele and Zizipho.

UFUNA izimpendulo umndeni wekhehla laseMadamini, eJozini, okuthiwa lishone lase lingcwatshwa yintombi umndeni ungazi.Kuthiwa uMnuz Bhekabakubo Dludla (69) ubanjwe ukugula washona. Ube esengcwatshwa yintombi yakhe yakhona eJozini, uNksz Zamile Mhlongo (30), ingawazisanga umndeni kamufi.Isolezwe likhulume nendodakazi endala kamufi, uNksz Bongekile Dludla, ebivutha ingabaselwe.Ithe kuyilumbo okwenziwe yintombi kayise, yathi bona ngeke baze bavume ukuthi balawulwe yintombi ngomzimba kayise. Ithe bafuna simbiwe isidumbu sikayise sizongcwatshwa emzini wakhe.Indodakazi kamufi ithe bazolulwela lolu daba kuze kube yisekugcineni. "Iyachwensa le ntombazane. Angazi ngempela ukuthi icabanga ukuthi iyini. Isithathaphi nje isibindi sokuthi ingenza lo mhlola ngaphandle kokuthi isazise?'' isho kanje kuzwakala ukuthi iyathuthumela.Ivumile ukuthi bebazi ngomjolo kayise nentombi, yaveza nokuthi uyise wayekade esebenza kahle kodwa manje ubengasasebenzi. Yalile ukudalula ukuthi uyise wayesebenza kuphi, yathi intombi kuzomele ibachazele ukuthi ngempela ibingenelwe yini? "Intombi yake yangishayela ucingo ingazisa ukuthi ubaba usezohlala nayo. Yangitshela ukuthi ubaba uthe kuyona siyamhlukumeza selokhu kwashona umama lapha ekhaya. Nalapho futhi asazi ukuthi ubaba besimhlukumeza ngani futhi kanjani,'' kusho indodakazi.Ithe bazovula icala futhi ngeke kuze kugcine yona intombi. Ithe intombi kumele ibachazele ukuthi imali kababa wabo ayeyibekile ishonephi?"'Kuningi kabi lo wesifazane okuzomele asichazele khona. Angeke phela sidlale intombazane ifuna ukucanasa phezu kwamakhanda ethu.'' Ngesikhathi uNksz Mhlongo ethintwa uqale ngokuthuka ukuthi lolu daba selufinyelele kwiSolezwe. "Hawu sebegijime batshela Isolezwe!'' usho kanje.Uvumile ukuthi ubesothandweni oluvuthayo noDludla. Wamchaza njengowesilisa obesekhulile kodwa obenothando lweqiniso.Uthe akazimisele ngokuthi aphenduke inkukhu nempaka nezingane zikamufi, wathi umufi uxinwe yisifuba kwase kuyamenela njalo.Ebuzwa ukuthi umngcwabe kuphi uDludla, uphendule ngokukhululeka, wathi kubo. Uveze ukuthi bese kuphele iminyaka emithathu egcwele ehlezi ndawonye nomufi."Kumele bazi ukuthi mina anginacala. UDludla uyena owangeshela ehlangana nami futhi uyena owathi uzizwa enokuthula okukhulu uma ekanye nami lapha ekhaya,'' usho kanjena.Uthe uma befuna ukumba isidumbu  akanankinga kodwa bayobe benza okuphambene nesifiso sikamufi "owacela" ukufihlwa nguyena.Uthe akakwazi emzini kaDludla kodwa wathi uyazi ukuthi yikhona eJozini.Isazi samasiko, uSolwazi Phila Mthethwa, sisihlabe sasihlikiza isenzo sentombi. UMthethwa uthe kunemikhuba eyenziwayo uma kungcwatshwa ubaba wekhaya, kuwona okufaka phakathi ukubika ukuthi umzimba sewufikile emagcekeni.Ubuze ukuthi leyo mikhuba pho intombi iyenze kanjani? Uthe intombi kumele isukume ilungise lo monakalo ngoba uma kungenjalo lesi simo singahamba sigcine siba yifindo empilweni yayo esikhathini esizayo.“Ngokwesiko nje, yichilo leli elenziwe yilo wesifazane,’’ usho kanje. Uthe futhi ngemuva kwezinyanga ezithile umufi wenzelwa umsebenzi wokumbuyisa, wathi pho umndeni kamufi uzowenza kanjani isidumbu sikwelinye igceke lomuzi ongaziwa? Isolezwe ngaphambilini like labika ngesehlakalo esifuze lesi lapho khona intombi yaseMzimkhulu yangcwaba indoda ngaphandle kokwazisa umndeni wayo.

IKHUZA umuga i-Azapo ngokungagadwa kwethuna lesishoshovu somzabalazo uSteve Biko. Lokhu kwenzeka ngemuva kokucekelwa phansi kwethuna likaBiko, lapho kubhonculwe izinsimbi eziwumfanekiso wezandla eziboshiwe.Ithuna lesishoshovu liseSteve Biko Garden of Remembrance eGinsberg, eQonce, e-Eastern Cape. Abe-Azapo bathi babikelwe ukuthi kubonakale sezingasekho izinsimbi zethusi eziwumfanekiso wezandla zomuntu oboshiwe.“Simangazwa wukuthi uMasipala iBuffalo City Metro awunakekeli, uhlinzeke ngezokuphepha endaweni ebaluleke kangaka. Ithuna likaBiko nendlu yakhe kwemukelwa nenjengendawo yamagugu ngaphansi kwe-South African Heritage Recources Agency,’’ kusho i-Azapo.Kuthiwa abenhlangano iSteve Biko Foundation, yibona ababikele umndeni kaBiko ngokucekelwa phansi kwetshe lethuna, okuthiwa akwaziwa ukuthi kwenziwe ngubani futhi akunamkhondo.UBiko owayengumholi weBlack Consiousness Movement (BCM), edabuka eKing Williamstown, wafela esitokisini ngo-1977, ePitoli. Ukufa kwakhe kuthiwa kwaba wumphumela wokushawa kanzima ngamaphoyisa ngenxa yezenzo zakhe zokulwela inkululeko.Abe-Azapo bathe kuyichilo okwenzekile futhi kukhombisa ukuthi uhulumeni awunandaba neqhaza likaBiko emzabalazweni wenkululeko yezwe. I-Azapo ithe kungakuhle uma umasipala engase uyibiyele le ndawo bese eyihlinzeka ngezokuphepha ukuze kungaphinde kwenze lokhu.Bacele amaphoyisa ukuthi asheshise aphenye kabanzi ukuze abambe labo noma lowo owenze lo mhlolo, wacekela phansi ithuna likaBiko.Ngo-2022, kwabikwa ngokucekelwa phansi kwetshe lethuna lesinye isishoshovu somzabalazo uMnuz Chris Hani. Itshe lethuna likaHani lacekelwa phansi ngezinsuku okwadedelwa ngazo umbulali wakhe, uJanusz Walus.Ngo-2019 kwabikwa ngokucekelwa phansi kwethuna lesishoshovu uMnuz Moses Mabhida eliseMbali, eMgungundlovu. Nakhona umndeni wawukhala ngokunganakekelwa kwethuna likaMabhida.

BABHODLA umlilo abantu abazivocavoca eVirgin Active, eMoses Mabhida, eThekwini, kulandela ukubonakala kwendle endaweni yokubhukuda.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe, umuntu obone lesi simanga, umuntu ozivocavoca kule ndawo, abaphethe bethule bengayithi vu.NgeSonto eledlule, amanye amalungu athathe isinqumo sokuthumela abameli bawo ukuthi bathumele incwadi ephuthumayo kubaphathi bendawo yokuzivocavoca.Kule ncwadi, Isolezwe eliyibonile ikhophi yayo, amalungu abuza iziphathimandla ukuthi ukube ilungu elithile belingathwebulanga izithombe, lazifaka kwi-Whatsapp Group yasejimini, bekuzokwaziwa nini ukuthi kunalesi simo endaweni yokubhukuda?“Ngokubuka ubuningi bendle, singasho singananazi ukuthi amanzi angcolile. Nakanjani, lesi sigameko sizoba nomthelela wezempilo ongemuhle kumuntu ozithole ebhukuda kula manzi,” kusho incwadi.Iqhube yathi, kungani amalungu engaziswanga ukuze ezoyigwema indawo yokubhukuda isikhashana.Ibuye yathi njengamalungu endawo yokuzivocavoca, bazokwazi ngani ukuthi ngokuzayo, into efana nale ngeke iphinde ifihlwe njengoba kwenzekile kulokhu?“Abantu bazophathwa yizifo zamehlo, izindlebe, amakhala, umphimbo, ukuphefumula nokukhishwa yizisu, bengazi ukuthi imbangela kube ukusebenzisa indawo yokubhukuda enendle,” kusho incwadi.Oyinhloko yophiko olubhekelela amakhasimende, uNksz Jacqui Walter, uthe iVirgin Active ihlale iqinisekisa ukuthi ezempilo nezokuphepha ziseqopheleni eliphezulu.“Imenenja ebisebenza iyilandele imigudu efanele ngeSonto ebusuku. Sesiphenyile sathola ukuthi ilungu elithintekayo linokugula okuthile kanti izinyathelo ezifanele ukulungisa lolu daba sezithathiwe,” kusho uWalter. Uthe ngaphezu kwalokho, kukhona umyalezo othunyelwe kuwo wonke amalungu ngeWhatsapp group ngo-5:30 ngoMsombuluko ekuseni.Uphinde wathi babuye bathumela amaSMS, abesho ukuthi indawo yokubhukuda ivaliwe futhi isazohlolwa iphinde ikhucululwe ngaphambi kokuthi ivulwe. “Uma kwenzekile kwakhona ukungcoliswa kwendawo yokubhukuda ngendle, siye sisheshe siyivale, siyisuse indle, sihlole amazinga e-chlorine ne-pH kuyima siyivula uma konke sekubuyele esimweni esifanele,” usho kanje.

KUYAQHUBEKA ukudilizwa kwabantu ezimayini njengoba sekuvele izindaba zokuthi i-Anglo American Platinum (Amplats) izodiliza abasebenzi abawu-3 700.I-Amplats ithe abantu abazothinteka abakuzo zonke izimayini zayo eziseNingizimu Afrika kwazise izama izindlela zokonga imali emuva kokwehla kwenzuzo eyenziwa yinkampani.I-National Union of Mineworkers (NUM) isizwakalise ukukhathazeka ngokudilizwa kwabasebenzi ezimayini njengoba ikhala ngokuthi izimayini zilokhu zibadilizile abasebenzi kodwa izikhulu aziyi ndawo.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi ngoMeyi, iNum ibibhikisha eSibanye Stillwater eNorth West, lapho kumenyezelwe ukuthi kuzodilizwa abasebenzi abawu-3 107 namatoho awu-915.UMnuz Khathu Ramufhufhi weNum eLimpopo, uthe bakhathazekile ngokudilizwa kwabasebenzi ngoba ukudilizwa komuntu oyedwa kuthikameza umphakathi wonkana.Ukhale ngokuthi umholo womsebenzi oyedwa wondla amalungu omndeni amane kuya phezulu kwazise ayikho imisebenzi eNingizimu Afrika.Uveze ukuthi kuzodilizwa abasebezi abaqashwe ngokugcwele nabasebenzi abawu-600 abangamatoho.“I-Amplats ithe kwehlile ukudayiswa kwe-platinum kanti kuye kwaphazamiseka ukusebenza ezimayini zayo ezihlukene. Ukudilizwa kwabasebenzi ngeke kuthikameze abaseLimpopo kuphela kodwa naseRustenburg kuzobe kukhalwa esifanayo. Kubuhlungu ukuthi abasebenzi bazophelelwa wumsebenzi futhi nemiphakathi encike ezimayini izophazamiseka,” kusho uRamufhufhi.Uthe bafuna izimayini zingajahi ukudiliza abantu kodwa ziqale zixoxe nezinyunyana ukuze kuzotholakala izindlela zokonga imali ezingaqali ngokudilizwa kwabasebenzi.“Sizoqhubeka nemikhankaso yethu yokulwa nokudilizwa kwabantu sisebenzisana neCosatu okuyiyona ethe kufanele kuxoxwe uma inkampani inezingqinamba. Njengamanje izikhulu zezimayini zivele zisazise ukuthi zizodiliza abasebenzi zingakaze zisibizele ezingxoxweni zokonga imali. Zona uma kukhulunywa ngokonga imali, zivele zibone kungcono zidilize abasebenzi,” kukhala uRamufhufhi.

INYUNYANA yabasebenza ngensimbi, iNational Union of Metalworkers of South Africa (Numsa), idonse ngendlebe amalungu ayo angaphezu kuka-300 000 ukuba angalokothi avotele i-DA, Action SA, Rise Mzansi, Patriotic Alliance, FF Plus, Bosa ne-ACDP.Ithe lama qembu afuna ukubuyisela abasebenzi emuva futhi awahambisani nenkululeko yabantu emhlabeni jikelele.UNobhala Jikelele we-Numsa, uMnuz Irvin Jim, uthe amalungu abo angavotela noma yiliphi iqembu elingabaliwe ngenhla ngoba kuyosho ukuthi lona alibacindezeli abasebenzi.Ubalule ukuthi amaqembu abalwe ngenhla awawahloniphi amalungelo abasebenzi, awafuni ngisho bateleke, awafuni kulwelwe amalungelo abo nokuthi labo abahola kancane kakhulu baholelwe ngokohlelo lwe-national minimum wage.Ubuye wakhala ngokuthi la maqembu awabeseki abantu abacindezelwe ePalestine, abaqhunyiswa ngamabhomu amasosha akwa-Israel nsukuzonke eGaza.“Kulo nyaka ngeke sisho ukuthi abasebenzi bethu bavotele liphi iqembu kodwa asifuni bavotele lawa esiwabalile ngoba azoqeda nya ngemisebenzi. Azovulela ukuthi baxhashazwe kuphele ukuhlonishwa kwamalungelo abasebenzi. Sebengavotela noma iliphi iqembu. Ngeke sithi baye kwi-ANC, EFF, MK namanye kodwa yibona okufanele bazithathele isinqumo. Thina okwethu wukuthi sibatshele ngamaqembu azobabuyisela emuva,” kusho uJim.Uthe lisekhona iqembu labo elibizwa nge-Socialist Revolutionary Workers Party (SRWP) kodwa basazama ukulakha yingakho lingeke lilingenele ukhetho.Uveze ukuthi isinqumo sokuthi kuvotelwe noma yimaphi amaqembu ngaphandle kwalawa abawabale ngenhla sithathelwe ukuletha impilo engcono kubasebenzi.“Sifuna abasebenzi babe nempilo engcono, njengenyunyana enamalungu amaningi sizimisele ukuba nezivumelwano namaqembu epolitiki abeke izimfuno zabasebenzi phambili. Lapha sibala i-EFF, ANC, MK namanye alwaziyo usizi lwabasebenzi. Isekhona iSRWP kodwa sisayakha yingakho ingangeni okhethweni,” kusho uJim.

I-UNITED National Transport Union (Untu) isola inkampani yakuleli yezitimela, iPassenger Rail Agency South Africa (Prasa), ngokuzama ukudiliza abasebenzi isinyenyela. Lokhu kulandela ukuthi amalungu e-Untu ebikele inyunyana yawo ukuthi iPrasa inezithangami eziphoqa abasebenzi ukuba bavolontiyele ukushiya umsebenzi.I-Untu iveze ukuthi amalungu ayo, ayitshele ukuthi izikhulu zakwaPrasa zihambela izifundazwe ezehlukene bese zithi asebekhulile kufanele bathathe umhlalaphans kanti nalabo abaneminyaka eminingana besebenza kule nkampani kufanele bavolontiyele ukushiya.Esitatimendeni sabezindaba, iPhini likaNobhala we-Untu, uMnuz Dan Khumalo lithe bakhathazekile ngesinyathelo sePrasa ngoba akekho umsebenzi abafuna adilizwe kodwa bafuna izinkampani zikahulumeni zidale amathuba omsebenzi.“Sikhathazekile ukuthi iPrasa ihlela ukudiliza abasebenzi isinyenyela njengoba ibabizela emakhoneni ingasitsheli thina esibamele. Sagcina izikhulu zisitshela ukuthi kwehlile ukusetshenziswa kwezitimela njengoba kudala abantu bebehamba ka-600 million ngezitimela kodwa manje sebehamba ka-15 million ngonyaka,” kuchaza uKhumalo.Uthe iPrasa yabatshela ukuthi izodinga uR7 billion kule minyaka ezayo ukubhekela izindleko zokusebenza kodwa ayizange ibalule ukuthi izodiliza abasebenzi.“Sizocela umhlangano ophuthumayo nezikhulu zasePrasa ngoba asifuni abasebenzi badilizwe. Sifuna izinkampani zikahulumeni zidale umsebenzi. Asithandi nokuthi izinkampani zingawulandeli umthetho ngoba ukubeka kucace ukuthi yini okufanele yenziwe uma kuzodilizwa abasebenzi,” kuchaza uKhumalo.Imizamo yokuthola iPrasa ukuze iphawule ayiphumelelanga njengoba bengayiphendulanga i-email abathunyelelwe yona.

UKHALA ngokuma nse kwempilo owesifazane waseSilver Stream, KwaMaphumulo, owaphunyelwa yisitifiketi sokuzalwa sithi ungumuntu wesilisa.UNksz Lihle Akhona Ngubane (23), uthe uqale ukubona esefunda u-matric ukuthi lento izohamba ihambe imnike inkinga.“Ngizalwa abazali ababengafundile. Abakwazanga ukusheshe babone ukuthi kukhona inkinga esitifiketini sami sokuzalwa ngesikhathi bengenzela sona ngo-2001,” kusho uNksz Ngubane.Uthe kwaba ngudadewabo omdala owabika kubazali ukuthi lento izomhlupha uNksz Ngubane uma esefika kwa-matric kodwa badembesela.Uthe ngo-2019 basukuma nabazali bakhe, bezama ukulungisa inkinga.“Saya ehhovisi loMnyango wezaseKhaya KwaDukuza, baqala ngokusehlisa besenyusa, befuna izinto ezehlukene ngaphambi kokuba sifakwe isicelo sokulungisa iphutha,” kusho uNksz Ngubane.Uthe ubelokhu egqigqa khona, eyobheka ukuthi seluhambe lwafikaphi udaba lwakhe kodwa afike athole ukuthi “lusasetshenzwa”.Uveze ukuthi ugcine esenza izicelo ezine eminyakeni eyisihlanu edlule, ngokwelulekwa yisizebenzi zomnyango.“Bebeye bethi kungcono ngiphinde ngisiqale phansi isicelo uma bebona ubude besikhathi esengisilindile esicelweni engisuke ngisenze ngaphambili,” kusho uNksz Ngubane.Uthe isicelo sokugcina usenze ngoMashi nonyaka.Uveze ukuthi uyise ushone ngoJuni nyakenye, esematasa nakho ukulungiswa kwephutha.“Angikwazi kwenza lutho ngalesi sitifiketi esithi ngiwumuntu wesilisa. Angikwazi ukwenza isicelo sikamazisi ngesitifiketi esithi ngingumuntu wesilisa. Angikwazi ukufuna umsebenzi ngesitifiketi sokuzalwa,” kubalisa uNksz Ngubane.Uthe isifiso sakhe ukuthi kulunge le nkinga ukuze ezothintitha impilo yakhe, aqhube izifundo zakhe esikhungweni semfundo ephakeme noma afune umsebenzi, azithuthukise.Okhulumela uMnyango wezaseKhaya, uMnuz Cyril Mncwabe weluleke uNksz Ngubane ngokuthi abuyele ehhovisi lapho enza khona isicelo, bazomnika impendulo yosekwenziwe ngesicelo sakhe sokulungisa iphutha lobulili.

BAZOLIBUKA kuthelevishini iPhalamende abanye abaholi abebenezihlalo  kodwa bangakwazi ukubuyela.Bekushunqa uthuli ezweni kuvotwa okhethweni olube yingqophamlando lapho bezidlana imilala. Inhlangano ebusayo izithole ilahlekelwa yizihlalo ezingu-71 ePhalamende yangakwazi ukubuyela emandleni ngengcaca.Kunamaqembu angene okokuqala ePhalamende ayekade elibuka kuthelevishini ekuqaleni manje sekuzobukwa bona. UMkhonto weSizwe (MK) ungene okukuqala ePhalamende ngezihlalo ezingu-58 nokube yingqophamlando kwezepolitiki yezwe.Kwabazongena okokuqala kukhona nePatriotic Alliance (PA), engene ngezihlalo ezingu-9. Kukhona i-ActionSA ekwazile ukungena ngezihlalo eziyisithupha nayo izobe iqala ukubonakala ePhalamende.Kuvela negama le-Build One South Africa (BOSA) engene ngezihlalo ezimbili ePhalamende.Kuvela negama le-National Coloured Congress (NCC) nayo engene ngezihlalo ezimbili ePhalamende. Neqembu elisha iRise Mzansi likwazile ukungena ngezihlalo ezimbili ePhalamende.Kukhona ne-United Africans Transfomation (UAT) engenile ngesihlalo esisodwa. Kukhona amaqembu abeyingxenye yePhalamende eledlule kodwa angakwazanga ukuthola amavoti enele ukuze abuye.Kwabangabuyanga kuvela igama leNFP ehluleke yancama ukuthola amavoti enele, ekuqaleni ibinezihlalo ezimbili. Kuphinde kuvele iCOPE nayo ekhale ngaphansi kade inezihlalo ezimbili ePhalamende.Kuphume i-African Independent Congress (AIC) ebikade inezihlalo ezimbili njengoba ingasekho. Nakuba abanye bengenile abanye baphuma kwabasele kukhona abehlelwe yisibalo sezihlalo zakhula kwabanye.I-EFF ibuye ngezihlalo ezingu-39 isuka ezihlalweni ezingu-44 nokusho ukuthi ilahlekelwe yizihlalo ezinhlanu. IFreedom Front Plus (FF Plus) ibuye ngezihlalo eziyisithupha isuka ezihlaweni eziwu-10 nokusho ukuthi yehle ngezihlalo ezine.I-ACDP ingene ngezihlalo ezintathu isuka kwezine eyayinazo ekuqaleni. I-Good Party ibuye ngesihlalo esisodwa isuka kwezimbili eyayinazo ekuqaleni.I-DA ibuye ngezihlalo ezingu-87 nokusho ukwenyuka isuka kwezingu-84 eyayinazo ekuqaleni. I-IFP ingene ngezihlalo ezingu-17 nokukhomba ukwenyuka isuka kwezingu-14.I-UDM ibuye ngezihlalo ezintathu yakhula ikade inezimbili.

AZOVINJWA yimigomo amalungu ahlele  ukuphazamisa uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, ePhalamende uma esethula inkulumo yokuhlahla indlela ezolandelwa nguhulumeni wobumbano eminyakeni emihlanu ezayo eKapa, namhlanje ebusuku.URamaphosa uzovula iPhalamende ngokuthula inkulumo ezobanjelwa eCity Hall, lapho kumenywe khona izicukuthwane ezifaka nababengomengameli bezwe.USomlomo wePhalamende, uNkk Thoko Didiza, ekhuluma izolo esithangamini sabezindaba ngamalungiselelo alo mcimbi, uveze ukuthi kunemigomo elawula ukuhlala kwezindlu zombili zePhalamende, evimbela ukuphazanyiswa kukamengameli wezwe.“Kunemigomo emisha ezolandelwa yePhalamende enqinda labo abafuna ukuphazamisa inkulumo kamengameli ukuthi bangakwenzi lokhu. Le migomo iyacacisa ukuthi umcimbi wakusasa (namhlanje), owokuvulwa kwePhalamende kuphela, hhayi okunye. Le migomo ibekelwe ukuthi kube nesizotha ngoba inkulumo kuzobe kungeyokuhlahla indlela ngezinto ezizokwenziwa nguhulumeni omusha,” kusho uNkk Didiza.Uthe akazi noma likhona yini iqembu elizoduba ukuvulwa kwePhalamende.Iqembu iMK yaduba ukuhlala kwePhalamende lapho kwakhethwa khona usomlomo, iphini likasomlomo kanjalo nomengameli wezwe.Kubhekiwe ukuthi ngabe kuzoya ngokwamagama enkehli kwi-EFF, eyathembisa ukuthi ngeke isamphazamisa uRamaphosa uma ethula inkulumo ebhekise esizweni.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi leli qembu belimisa kabi uRamaphosa uma ethula le nkulumo lize ligcine selikhishwa ngesankahlu ePhalamende. UNobhala wePhalamende, uMnuz Xolile George, uveze ukuthi lo mcimbi uhlelelwe phakathi kukaR6 million kuya kuR14 million.Uveze ukuthi abazi imalini ezogcina isebenzile esabelweni abasibekile.Ubalule nokuthi sekuphothuliwe ukwakhiwa kwamahhovisi angu-155, kwangu-203 asha ngesikhathi kusha iPhalamende.“Sishoda ngamahhovisi angu-54 ukuze kube namahhovisi enele. Sithemba ukuthi umsebenzi wokuphothula ukwakhiwa kwePhalamende kabusha, kuzophela ngo-Ephreli 2026,” kusho uGeorge.USihlalo weNdlu yoMkhandlu weziFundazwe, uNkk Refilwe Mtsweni-Tsipane, uthe bameme ababengomengameli okubalwa noMnuz Jacob Zuma, ababengoSomlomo bePhalamende okubalwa uNksz Baleka Mbete noNkk Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula, ohamba amacala enkohlakalo enkantolo.UNkk Didiza uthe abakazi ukuthi ubani ozofika nongeke aphumelele kwabamenyiwe okwamanje.“Sizokwazi kusasa ntambama uma sekuvalwe uhlelo lokulandwa kwezinto zokungena ukuthi obani abazofika. Okwamanje ngeke sikwazi ukusho ukuthi ubani uyeza noma akezi,” kusho uNkk Didiza.Uthe ingqephu izobe idla umunyu kwizimenywa wathi nomkhosi wezokuvikela uzoviliyela kuye ngokuthi sinjani isimo sezulu.

UBONGE imantshi wathi ihlenge impilo yakhe ngokuthi imncishe ibheyili owayeyisoka lakhe oboshelwe icala lokubulala indodana yabo eyayineminyaka eyisishiyagalombili.UNksz Nonhlanhla Sibisi ongunina kamufi, uSifundo Sibisi (8), uphawule kanje emuva kokuthi iMantshi L Gurie imnqabele ibheyili uMnuz Siyabonga Innocent Shezi (30).UShezi uthweswe icala lokubulala uSifundo ngokumshaya nokumklinya ngentambo yesikhindi ayesigqokile ngoJanuwari 13 nyakenye ethi uqhuqha unina.“Ngijabulile noma kungekhona ukuthi icala seliphelile kodwa ukuthi impilo yamo iyisindisile inkantolo. Inkantolo ibonile ukuthi uyingozi uma ephumela ngaphandle uzosibulala,” kusho uNksz Sibisi emamatheka.Ube esethi unethemba lokuthi icala lizoqulwa liphele ngesikhathi esifushane ngoba bonke ubufakazi bukhona bese uShezi edilikelwa ijele alapheke emoyeni.UMbuso uthe uNonhlanhla ubesohlwini lwabantu abebezobulawa uShezi njengoba bese eqalile ngoSifundo.Abanye okuvele ukuthi amagama abo asohlwini lwabazoyiswa kwagoqanyawo, abangofakazi boMbuso, ngunina kaShezi, ugogo wakhe nodadewabo.Imantshi ithe uShezi akanayo indawo eqondile ahlala kuyona, uzolibalekela icala futhi uyingozi kofakazi ashaye inkantolo ngemfe iphindiwe wathi akabazi.“Ubhekene necala elibucayi lokubulawa komuntu okuyingane yakho ngakho uzolibalekela uma udedelwa ngebheyili ngoba uyazi ukuthi lihamba nesigwebo sokuthi udilikelwe ijele uma likulahla. Akusona isizathu esinqala futhi esehlukile ukuthi ufuna ibheyili ukuze unakekele umama wakho futhi uqhubeke nebhizinisi lokudayisa amagwinya noswidi,” kusho imantshi.Icala libe selihlehliselwa u-Agasti 14 nokuyilapho inkantolo izobeka khona usuku eliyoqulwa ngalo.UShezi uyaliphika icala wathi izizathu uzozisho mhlazane seliqulwa okwamanje ufuna ibheyili aqhubeke nempilo.Akakhombisanga zimpawu zokudinwa noma zokudibikibala ngesikhathi imantshi ithi akabuyele ezitokisini inkululeko uyoyithola limthetha icala.

WAYEFAKELWA imali yesitokofela neyokubolekwa kuma-akhawunti asebhange uMengameli wezimantshi KwaZulu-Natal, omisiwe emsebenzini ngoxhaxha lwamacala athinta ukugwazisa nawocansi.Lokhu kushiwo ummeli, uMnuz Ravindra Maklilall, esigcawini esiqondisa ubugwegwe uMnuz Sibusiso Eric Nzimande eThekwini.UMaklilall ubekade ebuza futhi ecacisela ufakazi, uMnuz Johannes Meijer, ukuthi kwakungeyona imali okwakugwazelwa ngayo uNzimande.UNzimande, owamiswa emsebenzini ngo-Okthoba 2018, uthweswe amacala angu-162.Kulawa macala kukhona nawokugwazisa ngemali nangocansi kwababekade befuna ukuba yizimantshi okwesikhashana, okuyizinsolo aziphikayo uNzimande.UMaklilall utshele uMeijer ukuthi uhlu lwamacala aluhlanganisa waze wayolubika emaphoyiseni luyageja, akulandelwanga umthetho futhi kwaphulwa amalungelo kaNzimande, kwathunazwa isithunzi sakhe.Lo mmeli ube esekhanyisela uMeijer ngezigatshana zomthetho, wambuza ukuthi kuyicala yini okwakwenziwa uNzimande nozakwabo emsebenzini uma bebolekana imali?UMeijer uhlonywe imibuzo yalulo hlobo kaningi, wagcina esebuka ngasethimbeni labameli beKhomishini yeziMantshi afakaza ohlangothini lwalo.UMaklilall utshele lo fakazi wathi ukubuka kwakhe, abameli ngeke kumsize ngalutho, akaphendule imibuzo.UNzimande, ophucile ekhanda, ubegqoke isudu nezicathulo ezimnyama, ihembe elimhlophe nothayi nezibuko. Ubethule du, eloba phansi konke okukhulunywa uMeijer.Ubebuye abhale ephepheni okuthile abekudlulisela kuMaklilall obenqekuzisa ikhanda samuntu ovumayo.UMaklilall uvalele ekhoneni uMeijer, obebuye aphendule ngokuthi akazi, akasakhumbuli, eminye imibuzo ayibhekiswe kwababekade bephenya uNzimande, okwakhe kwakuwukuhlanganisa uhlu lwamacala anikezwa lona wasebikela amaphoyisa.“Imali enguR140 000 enithi yafakwa kwi-akhawunti yasebhange kaNzimande wuNkk Gumede (Lindelwa) wayebolekwa yona. UNzimande wawukhokha uR40 000 wayo. Nencwadi efungelwe kaNkk Gumede iyacacisa ukuthi babebolekene imali,” kuchaza uMaklilall.Ummeli ucacise nangemali okuthiwa yakhokhwa kwi-akhawunti kaNzimande ngumabhalane wasenkantolo. Le mali, uMaklilall uthe kwakungeyesitokofela ababesidlala noNzimande.UMaklilall ube esengena nakwamanye amacala athweswe uNzimande, wathi asolwa ngokwenza nabo inkohlakalo bayazihlangula.“Laba abasebenzi abenza imisebenzi eyehlukene enkantolo, bakhala ngokuthi kungcoliswa amagama abo ngenhloso yokubanqinda bangakhuphukeli ezikhundleni eziphezulu ngomuso,” kusho uMaklilall.Ummeli ubuze uMeijer ukuthi bamazisa yini uNzimande ukuthi uyaphenywa njengoba aze athola ngombiko wabezindaba? Uphendule wathi akazi, akuyena owayephenya.Isigcawu siyaqhubeka.

ISIFUNDAZWE iLimpopo singene emlandweni wokuba nondunankulu wokuqala wesifazane, uDkt Phophi Ramathuba, okhethwe ngoLwesihlanu esiShayamthetho.IziShayamthetho zihlale okokuqala izolo lapho bekukhethwa khona osomlomo, amaphini abo nondunankulu bezifundazwe. Izifundazwe zihlale ngesikhathi esifanayo nePhalamende, nalo ebelihlala okokuqala.ILimpopo ibuyele ezandleni ze-ANC ebivele iyiphethe phambilini. Bekuqala eLimpopo ukuthi kukhethwe undunankulu wesifazane njengoba lesi sikhundla besihlala siqhoqhobalwa amadoda.UDkt Ramathuba ubenguMphathiswa wezeMpilo esifundazweni kuhulumeni okade uphelelwa yisikhathi kanti ungena esikhundleni ebesiphethwe wuMnuz Stanley Mathabatha.UNkk MaQueen Joyce Letshoha-Mathae ukhethelwe kwesikaNdunankulu waseFree State. I-Free State nayo ibuyela ezandleni ze-ANC ebiyiphethe ngaphambi kokhetho lwangenyanga edlule.EMpumalanga kukhethwe uMnuz uMandla Ndlovu kwesikaNdunankulu nokuyisikhundla okuphuma kusona uNkk Refilwe Mtsweni-Tsipane. Nakhona eMpumalanga kubuyele yona i-ANC.E-Eastern Cape kubuyiselwe uMnuz u-Oscar Mabuyane naye ojutshwe yiyona i-ANC ebuyise isifundazwe. E-Western Cape kubuyele uMnuz Alan Winde obevele eqhoqhobele lesi sikhundla yena ojutshwe yi-DA ephethe isifundazwe.UMnuz uPanyaza Lesufi ubuyiselwe kwesikaNdunankulu waseGauteng yona ezophathwa ngokubambisana namanye amaqembu nebikade iphethwe yi-ANC ngaphambi kokhetho. UDkt uZamani Saul ubuyele kwesikaNdunankulu waseNorthern Cape.E-North West kukhethwe uMnuz uLazarus Mokgosi ongena esikhundleni sikaMnuz Bushy Maape ongabuyelanga. INorth West nayo ibuyela ezandleni ze-ANC ebikade iyiphethe ngaphambi kokhetho.Omunye owesifazane othole isikhundla esiqavile nguNkk Thoko Didiza okhethelwe kwesikaSomlomo wePhalamende. UNkk Didiza udabuka KwaZulu-Natal kanti uke waba ungqongqoshe wezoLimo, ukuBuyiswa koMhlaba nokuThuthukiswa kwezindawo zasemaKhaya.KwaZulu-Natal kukhethwe uNksz Nontembeko Boyce kwesikaSomlomo weSishayamthetho nokuyisikhundla abevele esiphethe ngaphambi kokhetho. UNksz Boyce udabuka eFlagstaaf, e-Eastern Cape, kodwa usezinze eKZN. UNksz Mmabatho Tembe weDA ukhethelwe kwesePhini likaSomlomo. UNksz Tembe udabuka eMgungundlovu, KwaZulu-Natal.

IPHINDELA enkantolo imenenja kaMasipala waseMsunduzi, uMnuz Lulamile Mapholoba, ephinde yamiswa emsebenzini kungakapholi maseko inkantolo ichithe ukumiswa kwayo kokuqala.UMapholoba uthe useyalele abameli bakhe ukuthi bafake isicelo esiphuthumayo eNkantolo eNkulu eMgungundlovu, baphonsele inselelo ukumiswa kwakhe kwakamumva.UMapholoba wamiswa emsebenzini ngoFebhuwari, esolwa ngokungaziphathi kahle.NgoMsombuluko, iNkantolo yezabaSebenzi inqume ukuthi kwakungekho emthethweni ukumiswa kukaMapholoba.NgoLwesithathu nangoLwesibili uMapholoba uzamile ukuphindela emsebenzini, kodwa wafike watshelwa ukuthi akavumelekile ukubuyela emsebenzini ngoba usamisiwe.Izindaba zokumiswa kukaMapholoba okwesibili ziqinisekiswe imeya uMnuz Mzimkhulu Thebolla, obekhuluma esithangamini nabezindaba, izolo.UThebolla uthe uMapholoba uthunyelwe incwadi emazisa ngokumiswa kwakhe.Inkantolo yachitha ukumiswa kukaMapholoba ngelithi kwakungafanele ukwenza kwakhe izethulo kuhlalelwe uThebolla, yathi kwakufanele kuhlalelwe umhlangano wawo wonke amakhansela.UThebolla uthe leli phutha balilungisa emhlanganweni womkhandlu owawungeledlule, nokuyilapho bathatha khona isinqumo sokumisa uMapholoba okwesibili.UThebolla uthe uMapholoba uzobhekana nohlelo lokuqondiswa ubugwegwe.“Sesiluphothulile uphenyo, sathola ukuthi uMapholoba kukhona imithetho ayephula. Manje uzobhekana nokuqondiswa ubugwegwe. Uzomiswa emsebenzini kuze kube kuphothulwa uhlelo lokuqondiswa kwakhe ubugwegwe.”UThebolla uthe abalindele ukuthi uMapholoba afike emsebenzini njengoba emisiwe.“Angifuni ke ukusho ukuthi kwenzekani kubantu abafika endaweni abangamukelekile kuyo.”UMapholoba utshele Isolezwe ukuthi  ufuna ukumangalela uThebolla, amsola ngokungawuhloniphi umyalelo wenkantolo.“Ihlazo leli elenziwa imeya yaseMsunduzi, ayiwuhloniphi umthetho. Ithimba labameli bami libheke eNkantolo eNkulu eMgungundlovu liyomangalela imeya ngokuthi idelela umyalelo wenkantolo. Ngifuna nokuthi inkantolo iwuthathe njengongekho emthethweni umhlangano okwathathwa kuwo isinqumo sokungimisa okwesibili.”UMapholoba uthe incwadi yesibili yokumumisa emsebenzini  ithi isinqumo sokumumisa sathathwa ngoMeyi 2, wathi kodwa incwadi uze wayithola ngoLwesibili, emva kokuphuma kwesinqumo esithi kwakungekho emthethweni ukumiswa kwakhe.“Angazi ukuthi umgxabhiso wani lo abawenzayo. Bakhombisa ukungawuhloniphi umthetho. Mhlawumbe kwenza ukuthi akusibona abakhokhela izindleko zamacala. Ngiyazi ukuthi ekugcineni ngizonqoba. Nasekuqaleni bahlekisa ngami uma ngibatshela ukuthi ayikho emthethweni le nto abayenzayo.”UMapholoba ukuqinisekisile ukuthi uzamile ukubuyela emsebenzini izolo nangoLwesibili, wathi ufike watshelwa ukuthi akavumelekile ukuba semsebenzini ngoba usamisiwe.UMnuz Sabelo Hlela uyena ozoqhubeka nokubamba esikhundleni semenenja kamasipala.

NAKUBA lingahambisani nohlelo lokunqunywa kwezimpondo zobhejane ngokugcwele iPhini likaNgqongqoshe wezaMahlathi, ukuDoba nezeMvelo, uMnuz Narend Singh, kodwa lithe liyakweseka.USingh sho kanje ngeSonto, eHluhluwe Imfolozi Park (HiP), ngesikhathi ehambele ukubungazwa kosuku lobhejane.Kulo mcimbi, abezeMvelo KZN Wildlife, bakhombise uSingh ukuthi lwenziwa kanjani uhlelo lokunqunywa kobhejane izimpondo ngenhloso yokubavikela kulabo ababazingelela izimpondo zabo.USingh uthe lolu hlelo akalweseki ngokugcwele ngoba uyakholelwa ekutheni obhejane badalwa nezimpondo ngenhloso ethile.“Kodwa ngoba kuzanywa ukuthi kuxoshwe labo ababazingelayo kuphinde kuqinisekiswe nokuthi akube kusaba khona ukubaluleka kwabo uma sebekhishwe izimpondo, yikho lusunguliwe,” kusho uSingh.Uthe kusukela abezeMvelo beluqalile, sehle ngamandla isibalo sokuhlaselwa kwabo.“Siyafisa ukuthi le nto kungabi yinto esizoyenza unomphelo kodwa kube ukuthi sithola ezinye izindlela zokulwa nalobu bugebengu bokuzingelwa kwabo,” kusho uSingh.Uthe bakhathazekile ngokuzingelwa kobhejane, wathi bakhala nangalabo abasekhaleni lalokhu, athe yibo abakhipha imali eshisiwe, bakhokhele labo abahamba bayozingela lezi zilwane, bazibulalele izimpondo zazo.“Namuhla sikhumbula amakhulu ngamakhulu obhejane, ababulawe ngesihluku. Sigubha nohlelo oluqhamuke nabezeMvelo ngohlelo lokukhishwa kwezimpondo zabo,” usho kanje.Isikhulu sezemvelo KZN Wildlife, uMnuz Sihle Mkhize, sithe banezinhlelo eziningi ukuzama ukulwa nesihlava sokubulawa kobhejane.“Olunye lwazo, olokusebenzisana nemiphakathi eyahlukene. Sisungula amabhodi emiphakathini ehlukene, ukuze akwazi ukusilekelela ngomsebenzi wokuvikela ezemvelo,” kusho uMkhize.Uthe sebesungule nezemidlalo ezindaweni ezehlukene lapho okudlalwa khona ibhola lezinyawo nebhola lomnqakiswano, kube kufundiswa abantu ngokubaluleka kokuvikelwa kobhejane.Ubuye wathi kwezinye izinhlelo, baqasha wona umphakathi ukuthi ugade izingcingo ezibiye iziqiwi.“Sibuye sibe nanohlelo lokumpimpa ngokuzingelwa kwabo obhejane ukuze sikwazi ukulwa nalolu bhubhane,” kusho uMkhize.Uhlelo lokunqunywa kobhejane izimpondo kuqalwe ngo-Ephreli nonyaka. Ngokwezibalo zangoMeyi nangoJuni nonyaka, kuvela ukuthi kubulawe obhejane abangu-21 (Meyi 2024) no-22 (Juni 2024), uma kuqhathaniswa nesibalo sabangu.42 (Meyi 2023) nabangu-34 (Juni 2023) nababulawa ngesikhathi esifanayo nyakenye.

KUBOSHWE nephoyisa elidume ngokuqotha izigebengu ngenhlamvu uPedro Rodriguez (44)  ecaleni lamaphoyisa ayishumi abhekene necala lokuzama ukubulala usomabhizinisi, uMnuz Thabiso Ngcobo.ENkantolo yeMantshi yasePinetown, uRodrigues odume ngelikaPedro, uvele njengomsolwa ka-10, wanikwa ibheyili ka-R5 000. Abanye abasolwa abangamaphoyisa kuleli cala bavele enkantolo emasontweni amabili edlule badedelwa ngebheyili. Bonke baboshwa uphiko oluphenya amacala okuthinteka kuwo amaphoyisa i-Independent Police Investigative Directorate (IPID).Kuvela ukuthi uNgcobo wayeshayela emgwaqweni uM13 ngasePinitown, ngesikhathi edutshulwa ehlezi emotweni yakhe.Akazange alimale kodwa wonke lawa maphoyisa avulelwa icala lokuzama ukubulala.Izolo ngesikhathi sekuvele uPedro, ummeli wakhe uHenry Van Breda, ucele ukuthi kungabibikho zithombe zakhe ezizothathwa futhi ubuso bakhe bungavezwa.Ucele uPedro ukuba anikezwe ibheyili waveza ukuthi akasiyona ingozi emphakathini futhi kungokokuqala ukuthi kube khona icala lwalolu hlobo avulelwe lona, wathi angeke aze aluphazimise uphenyo ngokuthi axhumane noNgcobo.Ngemuva kwesigameko, uPedro kuthiwa wazinikela yena kumphenyi wecala.Wafike washiya i-passport yakhe kuyena. Kuvele ukuthi unesipiliyoni seminyaka engu-27 esebenza embuthweni wamaphoyisa aseNingizimu Afrika.Icala lakhe lihlehliselwe u-Agasti 20 ngoba kusakhona uphenyo okusamele lwenziwe.UNgcobo uthe kuyajabulisa ukuthi bakhona asebekhalelwe ngamasongo kaSigonyela ngesigameko kodwa uthe akagculisekile ngendlela izinto ezibonakala zihamba ngayo ecaleni likaPedro."Kungani yena ezophathwa ngendlela ehlukile engafani neyabanye aboshwe kanye nabo? Yini edala ukuthi angafuni ukuthi athathwe izithombe futhi azimboze ubuso?'' usho kanje.Uthe kuyamangaza ukuthi amaphoyisa ayisishiyagalolunye wona imantshi yawatshela ukuthi awakhumule ama-mask abonakale ebusweni, kodwa kuPedro akunjalo."Ngiyazibuza nje ukuthi kwayona ke inkantolo ibone kanjani ukuthi nguyena ngampela lo uPedro  emnikeza ibheyili njengoba ebezifihlile nje ebusweni,'' usho kanje.Uthe uma kuzoqhubeka aphathwe ngale ndlela uPedro bazolusukumela lolu daba baluyise phambili.Uthe kuyaxaka nokuthi ufike enkantolo eqashwe ngelokhozi ngabantu abangasiwona amaphoyisa, wathi uzwile nokuthi uPedro emsebenzini unikezwe iholidi lokuthi abhekane necala.Uthe uyafisa ukwazi ukuthi kungani ngampela aphathwe ngendlela ehlukile kangaka uPedro?Ziningi izigameko zokuqothwa ngenhlamvu kwezigebengu emalokishini ehlukene lapho khona okuhlale kuvela ukuthi leli phoyisa lisuke liphambili kuzo. Emalokishini amaningi igama lalo liyaziwa.

IPHOYISA ladubula ngesibhamu somsebenzi endaweni yobumnandi esehlakalweni okwagcina kushone owesilisa elalikade lixabene naye ngoba lizivikela libona lisengozini.Lokhu kushiwo uMnuz Andile Dakela ongummeli kaSergeant Sibonelo Shabangu othweswe icala lokubulala uMnuz Qaphela Mdima.UDakela ubephica ngemibuzo uMnuz Ayanda Shabangu ongufakazi woMbuso.UNgcobo utshele iNkantolo yeMantshi yasePinetown, izolo ukuthi nguShabangu owadubula umufi amahlandla ayisithupha, emdubula ngisho esephakamise izandla ecela uxolo, kwaze kwajama isibhamu.Kodwa uDakela uthe uShabangu wadubula ebhekise kumufi owayekade naye ephethe isibhamu, sisokhalweni lwakhe ngakwesokudla.“Ummangalelwa uthe wabona engaphephile ngoba kwakunengxabano eyayiphakathi kwabo isuswe ukuthi umufi wayekade encike emotweni yakhe,” kusho uDakela.Kusolakala ukuthi uShabangu waxabana nomufi bebanga ukuthi wayekade ebeke indololwane emotweni yakhe.UNgcobo uphikile ukuthi umufi wayephethe isibhamu. Udalule nokuthi wayemi eduze kukamufi edutshulwa futhi wawa emuva kokuqhuma kwesibhamu ihlandla lesibili.Isigameko senzeka ebusuku ngoNovemba 2022 ngaphandle kwendawo yobumnandi iCasa Blanka Lifestyle, eMolweni eThekwini.UDakela uthe utshelwe uShabangu, ongaphandle ngebheyili kaR5 00 ukuthi wabaleka emuva kwesigameko ngoba wayeziphephisa kumalungu omphakathini ayesevuke inja ebomvuLo mmeli uthe uShabangu wahambisa lesibhamu somsebenzi esiteshini samaphoyisa saseHillcrest, wafike wabika okwenzekile sase siyathathwa kwabhalwa phansi sase sifakwa ezintweni eziwubufakazi.UNgcobo uthe isibhamu okukhulunywa ngaso saqathazwa uShabangu phansi sesijamile, saphelela ezandleni zomuntu ayefike naye kule ndawo.Uphothule ubufakazi bakhe ntambama uNgcobo, wase ebuza iMantshi M.A Khumalo efuna isiqiniseko sokuthi inkantolo ngeke isambiza azofakaza. Kuhleke wonke umuntu enkantolo ngisho uShabangu ebhokisini labasolwa.Icala lihlehliselwe uJuni 5 lapho kulindeleke ufakazi omusha woMbuso.

Iphoyisa likaMasipala weTheku lisolwa ngokugwaza libulale uzakwabo wesifazane esigamekweni okuthiwa senzeke enkabeni yeTheku ezintatha ngeSonto.Okhulumela amaphoyisa kaMasipala weTheku, uColonel Boysie Zungu, usiqinisekisile isigameko. Unqabile ukudalula eminye imininingwane ngalolu daba wathi selusingethwe amaphoyisa akwaSAPS.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe, la maphoyisa ebengekho emsebenzini ngesikhathi sesigameko. Kuthiwa umsolwa ugcine ezinikela emaphoyiseni waboshwa.Okhulumela iSAPS KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda ukhiphe isitatimende lapho ethe owesilisa oneminyaka engu-27 uboshwe ngemuva kokugwaza intombi yakhe eflethini.Kuthiwa lezi zithandani beziphuza utshwala ngesikhathi owesilisa egwaza owesifazane. Kuthiwa uphinde waqopha ama-video nezithombe owesifazane esefa wazithumela abantu abahlukene waphinde  wafakaa nasezinnkundleni zokuxhumana.Uthe imbangela yesigameko ayikaziwa.*Sekwengezwe ukuphawula kukaColonel Robert Netshiunda odabeni obekungekho phambilini.

KUSOLAKALA ukuthi isikweletu semali yokushonisa sibe yimbangela yokudutshulwa, kufe iphoyisa elisebenzela eNsuze, eNdwedwe ngoLwesibili ebusuku, libulawa wuzakwalo. Kuthiwa ubesehlulwa wukukhokha imali abelikweleta yona.Umthombo weSolezwe ongathandanga ukudalulwa uveze ukuthi umufi (47) ubewumashonisa, eboleke umsolwa (47) imali abesehluleka ukuyikhokha, kanti ngoLwesibili ebusuku umthelekele emsebenzini wamdubula, washaya wachitha, emshiya efile. “Baxabane bebanga ukuthi umufi ubefuna imali yakhe ebisinkulu, ayiboleka umsolwa. Bebesebenza ndawonye, kanti umsolwa ubengasebenzi ngosuku lwesigameko, wafika emsebenzini, wavulela ngenhlamvu kumufi, waphelela khona lapho,” kusho umthombo. Okhulumela amaphoyisa esifundazweni uColonel Robert Netshiunda uqinisekise ukuthi umufi obewusayitsheni, ubesemsebenzini njengenjwayelo ngenkathi kwenzeka isigameko. Uthe umphathi wesiteshi ubeqaphe isimo egcekeni njengenjwayelo ngenkathi kwenzeka isigameko, wezwa kuqhuma isibhamu, okuthe ephuthuma ngaphakathi, wazithela kumufi.Umsolwa kuvela ukuthi uvuke izolo waya emsebenzini. Kusolwa ukuthi ubezitshela ukuthi akabonwanga muntu ngesikhathi esebaleka emuva kokudubula uzakwabo. Libe selimshonela esefike emsebenzini ngoba kulapho ekhalelwe ngamasongo kaSigonyela. UKhomishana wamaPhoyisa esifundazweni uLt General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi, uthe amaphoyisa kumele azwane ngaso sonke isikhathi, agcine ubudlelwano babo bubuhle futhi avikelane.“Abaphathi kumele baqaphe isimo zikhathi zonke futhi basondelane nabasebenzi ukusiza ukusheshe babone uma kunokungaboni ngaso linye. Umsebenzi wobuphoyisa uyafukuzisa futhi amaphoyisa abaluleke kakhulu, ngakho kumele abhekelelwe njalo.“Lesi sigameko esenzeke esiteshini samaphoyisa sibi futhi yize umsolwa ezothathelwa izinyathelo zomthetho ngaso, kumele kwenziwe imizamo yokuphenya ngembangela yokufa komuntu endaweni okufanele ngabe amaphoyisa aphephile kuyona,” kusho uMkhwanazi.UMkhwanazi ukhuthaze amaphoyisa ukusebenzisa izikhungo zangaphakathi eziteshini zamaphoyisa zokwelulekwa ukusiza ukuzigcina esesimweni esihle somqondo ukuze kugwemeke ukusebenzisa udlame ukuxazulula izinkinga.UNobhala Jikelele wenyunyana ebhekele amalungelo amaphoyisa namajele iPolice and Prisons Civil Rights Union (Popcru) uNksz Nthabeleng Molefe, uthe uzwelana kakhulu nomndeni wephoyisa elibulewe, wase ethembisa ukuthi bazobhunga nobuholi babo ukusiza ukugwema izigameko ezifuze lesi.“Yize singakezwa ngembangela yalesi sigameko kodwa siyazi ukuthi amaphoyisa asebenza ngaphansi kwezimo ezinzima nezingenza kube nesimo esinjena, yingakho sihlale siwaluleka ukuvuleleka ngezimo abhekana nazo ukuze zilungiswe ngendlela efanele. Siyasigxeka kakhulu isenzo esinje futhi sizwelana nomndeni wephoyisa elibulewe,” kusho uNksz Molefe.Ebuzwa ngezokuphepha emaphoyiseni, uthe kunzima ukuvimbela umsebenzi ukuza emsebenzini uma engasebenzi ngoba kungenzeka avike ngokuthi kunomsebenzi angawuqedanga, okumele awenze, wase ecebisa ukuthi kwandiswe amaphoyisa eziteshini ezishoda ngawo ukuze kuhlale kunabantu abanele ukumelana nokuqapha izimo ezahlukene ezindaweni zokusebenza.

LIGWETSHWE kanzima iphoyisa elilahlwe yicala lokudlwengula usingandodakazi walo.Leli phoyisa lase-East London livulelwe icala wumalumekazi kamgilwa ngemuva kokuthi unina wengane naye oyiphoyisa oshade nomsolwa ehlulekile ukuvulela umyeni wakhe icala yize ingane imazisile ngalokhu. Kuthiwa izigameko zokunukubeza ngokocansi zenzeka phakathi kuka-2018 no-2021 ziqala ngesikhathi umgilwa eneminyaka engu-13 ubudala.Leli cala ladluliselwa ophikweni oluphenya amacala amaphoyisa i-IPID waboshwa kanjalo uSergeant oneminyaka engu-53 ubudala. Lolu phiko luveze ukuthi umalumekazi kamgilwa uyena olandele inqubo yaleli cala, kwaze kwaba sekugcineni.Lo Sergeant ugwetshwe iminyaka engu-25 ngecala lokudlwengula neminyaka emihlanu ngamacala amabili okunukubeza ngokocansi. Lezi zigwebo uzozodonsa kanye kanye.Umkakhe ongunina wengane ugwetshwe iminyaka emihlanu ebhadla ejele noma akhokhe inhlawulo kaR5000 ngokuhluleka wukubika lawa macala esetsheliwe ngawo.

NKOSIKHONA CELEIPHOYISA lasoSizweni Police Station, eNewcastle, ngokubambisana nohlaka olulwa nobugebengu kule ndawo, seliqale umkhankaso wokuxwayisa abelaphi bendabuko ngobungozi bokusebenzisana nezinswelaboya.UWarrant Officer Sipho Mlungisi Zondi, okumsukumise phansi wukwanda kwezigameko zezigebengu okuthi uma zibanjwa zikade zigila imikhuba yobugebengu, zitholwe nemithi ezisuke ziyilande kubelaphi bendabuko.Ubale namabhande eziwabophela ezingalweni, ezikholwa wukuthi ayazivikela uma sezigila imikhuba. uZondi uthi lokhu kuveza ngokusobala ukuthi kungakanani ukusebenzisana phakathi kwabelaphi bendabuko nezinswelaboya okuyinto athi isiqala ukubakhathaza kakhulu.''Sesitholile ukuthi izigebengu eziningi zihamba kakhulu kubelaphi bendabuko uma kukhona ezizokwenza okungukuganga. Sikholwa ukuthi uma abelaphi bendabuko benganciphisa ukuzilekelela izinswelaboya, kungancipha nobugebengu kule ndawo,'' usho kanje uwarrant.Uthe lo mkhankaso uwuqala ngokubiza ukhukhulelangoqo womhlangano abize kuwo nabelaphi bendabuko. Lo mhlangano uzoba ngo-Agasti 30, ehholo lomphakathi eNewcastle. Uthe inhloso ukubaqwashisa ngokuthi uma benza lokhu, okanye uma isigebengu siyibalile inyanga, nayo iba mdibi munye nalobo bugebengu obusuke benziwe.Ngaphandle kokuba yiphoyisa, uZondi uyisishoshovu esilwa nobugebengu kule ndawo. Ugcizelele ukuthi igxathu lokuqala lokunqanda lesi simo ukuxoxisana nabelaphi bendabuko."Kulo mhlangano sizobaqwashisa abelaphi bendabuko ngobungozi bokusebenzisana kakhulu nezinswelaboya. Siyethemba ukuthi lo mhlangano uzoletha ushintsho olukhulu mayelana nobugebengu kule ndawo esikuyona,’’ usho kanje.Uthe bayafisa nokuthi izinhlangano eziphethe abelaphi bendabuko nazo zisondele ukuze kuzotholakala ikhambi kule ngwadla abazithola bebhekene nayo kule ndawo.Uthe kuningi okunye okuhlabahlosile abazobhunga ngakho kulo mhlangano.Isolezwe Ngempelasonto kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi ngaphambilini lake labika kabanzi ngezigameko zokwanda kobugebengu kule ndawo.Laveza ukuthi sekunamaqembu ehlukene ezinswelaboya ahlalise lubhojozi umphakathi wakule ndawo.

KUVULWE idokodo lophenyo mayelana nephoyisa laKwaDukuza okuthiwa lizidubule lafa esiteshini samaphoyisa sakule ndawo ngoMsombuluko ekuseni.Akuqondakali ukuthi iphoyisa belixabene nobani njengoba lizingqoklozele emsebenzini.UCaptain Nqobile Gwala, okhulumela amaphoyisa kulesi sifundazwe, uthe kuvulwe idokodo lophenyo kulandela ukutholakala kwesidumbu sephoyisa elisebenza kulesi siteshi sinenxeba lokudutshulwa ekhanda eduze kwalo kunesibhamu."Okwamanje lolu daba lusaphenywa, akukaziwa ukuthi kwenzekeni. Uphenyo yilona oluzocacisa ngembangela yokuzibulala," kusho yena

LIQINISE isikimu salo ePhalamende iqembu Umkhonto weSizwe, ngokuhlabana ngofishi omkhulu osuka kwi-EFF uMnuz Floyd Shivambu, obeyiphini likamengameli kuleli qembu.Kunezinkulumo zokuthi maningi namanye amalungu e-EFF angase ahambe noShivambu njengoba noMnuz Mzwanele Manyi, okhulumela iJacob Zuma Foundation, elandele uShivambu wajoyina i-MK.I-MK iqinisa iskimu sayo nje kunezikhala ezingu-18 ezivulekile emva kokuhoxisa amalungu ayo ePhalamende.Umhlaziyi wezepolitiki, uMnuz Zakhele Ndlovu ozinze eNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal, nomkhulumeli we-MK uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndhlela, bathe uShivambu uza namava ezepolitiki nobuhlakani obuzokhulisa leli qembu.UNdlovu uthe i-EFF igqemeke udume ngokushiywa nguShivambu, ongomunye wabasunguli beqembu eminyakeni engu-11 edlule, wathi umholi we-EFF, uMnuz Julius Malema, kumele azinuke amakhwapha ngokuhamba kukaShivambu, kanjalo nabanye abasazohamba.“UShivambu ubonile ukuthi alikho ikusasa kwi-EFF ehlelwe wukwesekwa yadlulwa yi-MK esanda kusungulwa ngokwamavoti nangokwesekwa. Bekungekho ukukhula kuyena ngoba i-EFF istokfela sikaMalema ngakho ubengeke abe ngumengameli. Uyigqeme ingozi i-EFF ngokuyishiya kanti izuze kakhulu i-MK ngokuyoqinisa isikimu sayo ikakhulu ePhalamende.”UNdlovu uthe akangabazi ukuthi namanye amalungu okubalwa uMnuz Carl Niehaus, owaziwayo ngokweseka uZuma angashiya noma yinini.“Noma i-EFF izobakhona kodwa ngeke isakhula. UMalema uluhlaza, akakwazi ukusebenza nabantu. Ushiywe umngani omkhulu wakhe abengazitsheli ukuthi angahamba. Akungimangazanga ukuhamba kwakhe kodwa ngoba kumele ngabe lesi sinqumo kade asithatha,” kusho uNdlovu.Omunye umhlaziyi uMnuz Nkosikhulule Nyembezi ekhuluma neSABC, uthe ukushiya kukaShivambu nabanye kusho ukukhula kwentando yeningi kuleli.Uthe uShivambu kunamathuba okukhulisa iqembu i-MK alifake nakwezinye izifundazwe.“Yisikhathi esinzima lesi obekumele amaqembu angavumi ukulahlekelwa amalungu. Kakade usayosebenza ngaphansi kohlaka lwamaqembu aphikisayo ePhalamende ngakho kufana nokuthi basayokwenza into eyodwa ne-EFF.” UNdhlela uthe bayabamukela oShivambu noManyi, wathi bazoqinisa leli qembu empini yokukhulula abantu kuleli.“Bafike ngesikhathi esihle eqenjini lapho siqinisa khona umshikashika wamaqembu aphikisayo. Bazojutshwa ngokwamava abo kanti sibafisela okuhle kodwa ekulweleni abahlwempu,” kusho uNdhlela.Uthe okwamanje basangamalungu wathi ubuholi abukanqumi ukuthi bazojutshwaphi.UShivambu uthe asikho isikhundla asanikwe sona, wathi uzosebenza ukunika umkhombandlela kwi-MK.“Asikho isethembiso enginikwe sona yi-MK sokuthi izonginika isikhundla noma ingijube ePhalamende. Isinqumo engisithathile sithinta mina ngqo, sizoqhuba umshikashika wamaqembu aphikisayo ePhalamende.”

I-Independent Communications Authority of South Africa (ICASA) ikhiphe isinqumo ecaleni eliphakathi kweSABC neqembu lepolitiki iDA mayelana nesikhangiso saleli qembu sokhetho.Kuleli cala i-ICASA ithe lo msakazeli womphakathi kumele uhlawule imali engangoR500 000 ngokunqaba ukudlala isikhangiso seDA esibonisa ukushiswa kwefulegi laseNingizimu Afrika. Lo mqondisi wezokuhumana uveze ukuthi iSABC kumele ikhokhe le mali kungakapheli izinsuku eziyisikhombisa.I-SABC iveze ukuthi isacwaninga isinqumo se-ICASA kanti isazofuna izeluleko ezifanelekile ukuthi ithathe izinyathelo eziqondile.

UMKHANDLU wamabandla, iSouth African Council of Churches (SACC) ugqugquzele abantu bakuleli ukuthi baqine emkhulekweni njengoba kwanda izinhlekelele zemvelo.UMengameli we-SACC, u-Archbishop Thabo Makgoba, uthe babeke usuku lwanamhlanje  njengosuku lapho isizwe sonke kufanele sikhulekele izingqinamba ezibhekene neNingizimu Afrika.Uthe kuzokhulekelwa abapheshukelwe yizindlu nabashonile ngenxa yesimo sezulu esibi KwaZulu-Natal, Eastern Cape naseWestern Cape.Kuzokhulekelwa nokuthi abaholi bepolitiki babe nobuhlakani njengoba kudingidwa izindlela zokubusa izwe emuva kwemiphumela yokhetho ephoqa amaqembu epolitiki ukuba asebenzisane.Kuzobuye kukhulekelwe nokuthula ezweni uMakgoba athe kufanele kukhulekelwe emhlabeni jikelele.“Njengesizwe esisodwa siza phambi kukaNkulunkulu ngomthandazo. Umkhuleko wethu uzozwakala kuNkulunkulu woxolo, uthando nobulungiswa. Sigqugquzela bonke abantu ukuba bathandaze,” kusho uMakgoba.Uthe osopolitiki uma bexoxa kufanele bakhumbule izidingo zabantu bakuleli, balwe nobuphofu, inkohlakalo, udlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane, ubugebengu, balungise nemfundo yakuleli.Udlulise amazwi enduduzo kwabashonelwe yizihlobo zabo ngenxa yesimo sezulu esibi KwaZulu-Natal nase-Eastern Cape.Ucele abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ukuthi baqhubeke nokunikelela abakhahlanyezwe yisimo sezulu wabonga nalabo asebenikelile.

ISABISA ngokuphaka impi iyibhekise kuMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, inyunyana yothisha iSadtu, ifuna ukumphoqa ukuthi angapholisi maseko asayine uMthethosivivinywa iBasic Education Laws Amendment Bill (Bela Bill).Lo mthetho usezithebeni zikaRamaphosa njengoba waphasiswa yiNdlu yoMkhandlu weziFundazwe ngaphambi kokhetho.Akwaziwa ukuthi yini ebambe uRamaphosa ukuthi angawusayini ube ngumthetho.Ngeledlule ubematasa esayina eminye imithetho kodwa iBela Bill akakayisayini.UNobhala Jikelele weSadtu, uMnuz Mugwena Maluleke, uthe sekujwayelekile ukuthi izinto ezithinta imfundo uRamaphosa abe manqika ukusheshe azisayine.Uthe bafuna asheshise asayine lo mthetho ngoba waphasiswa.“Simatasa sivukuza amalungu ukuthi siye eziNdlini zoMbuso sifuna asayine lo mthetho. Akucaci ukuthi ulindeni engawusayini umthetho njengoba kade waba setafuleni lakhe,” kusho uMaluleke.Usho lokhu kulandela isicelo sikaNgqongqoshe omusha weMfundo eyisiSekelo, uNksz Siviwe Gwarube, othi uzonxenxa uRamaphosa ukuthi ame kancane ukusayina lo mthetho.Wathi kukhona ezinye izinto asafuna zibuyekezwe ngaphambi kokuba awusayine.Kuyaziwa ukuthi i-DA, yayiphikisana nokuthi kuphasiswe lo mthetho njengoba yaze yathi izoya enkantolo ngoba ingahambisani nezinye izinto eziqukethwe kuwona.Okuqukethwe kulo mthetho okukhalisa izinhlangano ezehlukene okubalwa ne-DA, yindaba yamandla anikwe inhloko yomnyango wezemfundo esifundazweni, ukuthi inqume uma isikole sesigcwele.Lezi zinhlangano zazikhala ngokuthi izigungu zezikole ziphucwa amandla.Okunye ngukuthi ayikho imali yokuxhasa i-Early Childhood Development, esiyimpoqo ngaphansi kwalo mthetho.UMaluleke uthe sekuphele iminyaka engu-10, kubhungwa eyeBela Bill.“Sekuphele iminyaka engu-10, sibhunga ngeyalo mthetho. Yingakho sithi awusayinwe ngoba akuwona umthetho we-ANC, noma we-DA kodwa owabantu bakuleli. Nangesikhathi umengameli kumele asayine umthetho wokuthi abafundi basezikoleni zabaphila nokukhubazeka bathole izinsiza zokubasiza uma befunda, kwathatha isikhathi eside ukusayina umthetho owawuzokwenza lokhu kusheshe kwenzeke. Sifuna into ethinta imfundo ayisukumele ngokushesha.” Uthe abasabi ukumasha ukuze bamtshengise ukuthi kumele abeke imfundo phambili.

UNOBHALA Jikelele weSouth African Federation of Trade Unions (Saftu), uMnuz Zwelinzima Vavi uthe kufanele uhoxiswe umthetho omusha wezimpesheni ngoba ngeke unikeze abasebenzi imali abayidingayo.UVavi uthe ngesikhathi bephakamisa ukuthi uhulumeni avumele abasebenzi ukuthi bathole ingxenye ethile yempesheni yabo ukuze bakwazi ukuphila babengazitsheli ukuthi kuzodedelwa imali encane bese enye kuthiwe bazoyithola uma sebethathe umhlalaphansi.“Njengamanje umthetho wezimpesheni onikeza abantu igunya lokuthola ingxenye ethile yemali yabo, obizwa nge-two pot retirement system awubasizi abasebenzi. Asihambisani nalo mthetho ngoba usho ukuthi umsebenzi odiliziwe, oxoshiwe noshiya emsebenzini ngeke athole imali eyanele yokuphila. Sifuna uhoxiswe bese kulethwa umthetho ozosiza abasebenzi ngemali yabo yempesheni hhayi lona obanikeza uR30 000 ongeke ubasize ngalutho,” kuchaza uVavi.Uthe uR30 000 awanele ukubhekana nobunzima obuthwelwe ngabantu bakuleli ngenxa yokubiza kwempilo, ukunyuka kwemali mboleko, izinkinga zezikweletu, ukushonelwa, ukufundisa izingane nokunye okuningi.“Asihambisani nokuthi ingxenye eningi yempesheni ihlale esikhwameni esizolinda abantu ukuthi bafike eminyakeni yempesheni. Kudala abasebenzi babefuna ingxenye yempesheni yabo okungenani uhhafu hhayi le okuthiwa bazoyithola. Sasifuna abasebenzi banikwe ingxenye yempesheni yabo ukuze sigweme umkhuba wokushaya isidudla kubasebenzi bakahulumeni ikakhulukazi othisha. Ubuthola ukuthi uthisha uyasula emsebenzini ngoba empintshwe yizikweletu nezinye izinkinga zempilo. Ubethola imali yakhe yempesheni bese ebuyela emsebenzini emuva kwezinyanga ezintathu noma eziyisithupha,” kusho uVavi.Uthe uhulumeni uthathe izimfuno zabasebenzi wazenza ngendlela yakhe ukuze ajabulise ongxiwa.“Uhlelo lwezimpesheni olusha oluzoqala ngoSepthemba luzocebisa ongxiwa ngoba bayayilondoloza imali yabasebenzi ezikhwameni zabo ezehlukene. Ithi uma isizala bathole imihlomulo emikhulu kuthiwe amabhonasi okwenza kahle. Abasebenzi abajuluka kanzima besebenzela le mali awukho umcebo abawutholayo futhi manje bazonswinyeka ngenxa yalo mthetho ozobanika amakinati noma ngabe bebhekene nezimo ezinzima,” kuphetha uVavi.

UMFELANDAWONYE wezinyunyana, iSouth African Federation of Trade Unions (Saftu), ithi iBhange loMbuso kufanele liyehlise manje imalimboleko ngoba abasebenzi abasakwazi ukukhokhela izidingo zabo.UMnuz Trevor Shaku okhulumela iSaftu, usho lokhu ngoLwesine emuva kokuthi umphathi weSouth African Reserve Bank (Sarb), uMnuz Lesetja Kganyago eyigcine ku-8.25% imali mboleko.Okusho ukuthi inzalo ekhokhwa ngabantu uma beboleke imali emabhange izohlala ku-11.75%.UKganyago uthe okwamanje imalimboleko isazohlala kulesi sigaba ekuso ngenxa yokuthi amandla emali asahleli ku-5.2%.
