ISarb ifuna abe ku-4.5% ngaphambi kokwehlisa imalimboleko.“Amalungu amane ekomiti avotele ukuthi imalimboleko ihlale ku-8.25% kodwa amabili aphakamise ukuthi yehle. Sizobheka okwenzeka emandleni emali, emnothweni nakwamanye amazwe ngaphambi kokuthi sinyakazise imalimboleko. Kuhle ukuthi ugesi awusacimi njalo kodwa umnotho siwubona ukhula ngo-0.6% ngekota yesibili yalo nyaka,” kusho uKgangayo.UShaku uthe sekuyisikhathi sokuthi iSarb yehlise imalimboleko ngoba abasebenzi bakhokha inzalo eningi ezikweletini zabo. Uthe umuntu onomuzi obiza uR1.3 million usekhokha inzalo ewu-R4.247 manje ngenxa yemalimboleko engehli.“UKganyago uhlale ethi usiza abantu ngokungehlisi imalimboleko kodwa iqiniso wukuthi usiza abacebile ngoba yibona abakwazi ukonga njengoba isimo sinjena. Abasebenzi abakwazi ukonga, sebephila ngezikweletu ukuze bakwazi ukudla nokwenza ezinye izidingo,” kusho uShaku.UMnuz Mervyn Abrahams wePietermaritzburg Economic Justice & Dignity Group, uthe iBhange loMbuso alibacabangeli abampofu nabasebenzi ngoba ukuntenga kwamandla emali akusilo iphutha labo kodwa kungenxa yezimo abangakwazi ukuzilawula.Uthe abampofu nabasebenzi bathwele kanzima ngoba kubiza yonke into eNingizimu Afrika.Uphethe ngokuthi bazoqhubeka nokubhalela izinhlaka ezifanele bacele ukuthi kwehliswe imali mboleko.Izazi zomnotho oSolwazi Bonke Dumisa noMnuz Siphamandla Mkhwanazi wakwaFNB, zithe akukho okuzimangazayo ngesinqumo sikaKganyago ngoba vele iSarb ayinyakazi uma amandla emali engekho esilinganisweni sayo sika-3% no-6%.

UMPHATHI webhange lombuso, iSouth African Reserve Bank (Sarb), uMnuz Lesetja Kganyago, uthi ngeke ishintshe maduze imali mboleko, isazohlala ku-8.25%.UKganyago usho lokhu ngoLwesine ngesikhathi ememezela ukuthi amalungu athatha izinqumo ngemali mboleko avumelene wonke ukuthi ayingashintshi. Lokhu kusho ukuthi inzalo ekhokhwa ngababoleka imali emabhange izohlala ku-11.75%.Uthe okwamanje ikomiti elinquma ngemali mboleko eSarb lizobheka okwenzekayo ngaphambi kokuthatha isinqumo esihlukile. Uveze ukuthi imali mboleko ingase yehle ngonyaka ozayo.Uncome ukuthi ugesi usudonse isikhathi eside unganqamuki, wathi kulokoza inhlansi yethemba ngokukhula komnotho waseNingizimu Afrika.USolwazi Bonke Dumisa, ongumhlaziyi womnotho ozimele, uthe bekulindelekile ukuthi iSarb igcine imali mboleko ku-8.25% ngenxa yokuthi ifuna amandla emali abe phakathi kuka-3% kuya ku-6%.Uthe ngeke yehle uma amandla emali eseko-5.2%.Isazi somnotho saseFNB, uNkk Mamello Matikinca-Ngwenya, naso sithe akumangazi ukuthi imali mboleko ayishintshanga ngoba ucwaningo lwabo lukhombisa ukuthi ingase yehle ekoteni yesibili yalo nyaka.UMnuz Mervyn Abrahams, wenhlangano eyenza ucwaningo ngokubiza kokudla nesimo senhlalo, iPietermaritzburg Economic Justice & Dignity Group, ucele uKganyago ukuthi ehlise imali mboleko ngoba iyabashaya abantu abampofu.Uthe yize bekuqonda ukuthi inyuselwa ukuthi abantu bangazenzi izikweletu kodwa vele abampofu abasazenzi ngoba badonsa kanzima kunalokho basala bengenamali ngenxa yenzalo abayikhokha ezikweletini zabo.Lesi sinqumo uthe sivuna abacebile ngoba akuzweli kangako kubona.

I-SOUTH African National Taxi Council (Santaco) ikushayele ihlombe ukuphasiswa komthetho wezokuthutha, iNational Land Transportation Act ochitshiyelwe kabusha.UNkk Mmatshikhidi Rebecca Phala okhulumela iSantaco kuzwelonke, uthe umthetho uzoqinisekisa ukuthi abanikazi bezimoto ezikhokhelwa ngebanga ezilihambile bafaka izicelo zokusebenza njengawo wonke umuntu osebenza kwezokuthutha.Yize bejabula kodwa uNkk Phala uthe basamangele ukuthi kungani kuthathe isikhathi eside kangaka ukuthi uchitshiyelwe umthetho.“Sekuphele iminyaka ewu-13 imboni yamatekisi ikhala ngokusebenza kwezimoto ezikhokhelwa ngebanga ezilihambile ezitholakala kuma-app. Lezi zimoto bezidla umsebenzi kodwa zingenazo izimvume zokusebenza. Izimoto bezisebenza emizileni yamatekisi anezimvume zibe zingenazo izimvumo, bekunobugebengu obuphazamisa abagibeli,” kuchaza uNkk Phala.Uthe ukufika kwezimoto ezikhokhelwa ngebanga ezilihambile ezitholakala kuma-app kudle inzuzo yabamatekisi kwavala nenqwaba yezinkampani zama-meter taxi.“Kusiphatha kabi ukuthi uhulumeni uthathe isikhathi eside ukuvikela abantu baseNingizimu Afrika, ezinkampanini zangaphandle ebezisebenza ngaphandle kwezimvume. Siyathemba ukuthi uhulumeni uzosebenzisana nemboni yezokuthutha asize nezinkampani zakuleli ezithuthukisa ama-app ezokuthutha,” kusho uNkk Phala.Ngaphansi kwalo mthetho kulindeleke ukuthi abasebenza ngaphandle kwezimvume bahlawuliswe uR100 000.Ubuye unikeze izinhlaka zezokuthutha ezifundazweni amandla okuphuca nokumisa imvume yokusebenza yomuntu ongawulandeli umthetho. ISantaco ithe izokuqapha ngeso lokhozi ukusetshenziswa komthetho ngoba ifuna kuphephe abagibeli. Kube nokuncintisana okuhle kwabasebenza embonini yezokuthutha.

KUMUNCU enkampanini yezobuchwepheshe inqunyelwa ugwayi katiki ngokubuyisa uR500 milion ngezinkontileka ezimbili ze-Eskom okuthiwa azikho emthethweni.ISpecial Tribunal okuyisigungu esikhethekile esilalela amacala aphenywa yiSpecial Investigating Unit (SIU) ikhiphe umyalelo wokuthi iSystems Applications Products (SAP) ikhokhe imali enguR500 million zingakapheli izinsuku eziyisikhombisa.Lokhu kulandela uphenyo olwenziwe yiSIU ngezinkontileka ezimbili eziphakathi kwale nkampani ne-Eskom.Kuthiwa phakathi kuka-2013 no-2016, i-Eskom neSAP bangene ezinkontilekeni ezimbili ezibizwa nge-Enabling Agreement  ne-Cloud Services Agreement zenani lika-R1.1billion. Uphenyo lwe-SIU luthole ukuthi i-Eskom ingene esivumelwaneni se-Enabling Agreement ne-SAP ukuze yenze imisebenzi yokuyitholela amalayisensi futhi iqaphe umsebenzi wokunakekela nokwenza okunye okuyizinsiza zesikhashana ngenani lenkontileka engu-R1 037 045 965.50.“Ngemuva kwalokho, i-Eskom neSAP basayine isivumelwano sesibili seCloud Services ngenani lenkontileka engu-R21 712 514.82,” kusho iSIU ngesitatimende.

INHLANGANO eqoqa intela kuleli, iSouth African Revenue Service (Sars), ithi isiqoqe uR4.1 billion kubantu abafuna ukunyula imali yabo yempesheni.Esitatimendeni uKhomishana weSars, uMnuz Edward Kieswetter, uthe ingu-161 607 imiyalelo yokuqoqa intela abayitholile okukhona kuyo ewu-159 853 yalabo abafuna ukunyula imali yempesheni.Lokhu kusho ukuthi ngosuku iwu-17 964 imiyalelo yokuqoqa intela etholwa yiSars.“Imiyalelo yokuqoqa intela ithunyelwa ngabaphathi bezikhwama ezihlukene okuyibona abashoyo ukuthi kufanele sithathe intela engakanani kumuntu ngamunye. Abantu abakweleta intela kufanele bakhumbule ukuthi iSars izoyiqoqa emalini abafuna ukuyinyula. Uma benze isivumelwano sokulandela uhlelo oluthile lokukhokha isikweleti imali ezothathwa izobe ilandela lolo hlelo,” kusho uKieswetter.Uthe uhlelo lokuqoqa intela luyashesha ngoba aluthathi amahora angaphezu kuka-24.Uveze ukuthi abantu bazokwazi ukuthola ulwazi ngentela okufanele bayikhokhe ngokuvakashela kwi-website yakwaSars naku-whatsapp wayo otholakala ku-0800 11 7277.Phakathi kwezizathu ezibekwa ngabantu abasuke befuna imali yempesheni kubalwa idivosi, ukufudukela kwesinye isikhwama noma ukudinga imali.Uthe iSars izokhipha eminye imininingwane ngokuhamba kwesikhathi njengoba isimo sishintsha njalo uma abantu benyula imali yabo.

ISAZI samasiko esingumelaphi wendabuko, uSolwazi Velaphi Mkhize, owaziwa ngelikaVVO, sizokwenza umcimbi wokufundisa ngamagalelo esanusi esasiwumbhali wakuleli  ongasekho emhlabeni, uVusamazulu Credo Muthwa.Elandisa Isolezwe  ngalo mcimbi ozokwenziwa e-UKZN ophikweni oluseMgungundlovu, ngoLwesibili ngo-9 ekuseni, okuyiholidi lamagugu esintu, uthe siyisiqalo semicimbi azoyenza ukufundisa abantu ngokwelapha ngesintu.“Ngiqoke ukuqala ngoCredo (Muthwa) ngoba ngifuna ukuvezela abantu abangawazi amagalelo akhe ukuthi wayehlakaniphe futhi enamandla angakanani okwelapha ngokwesintu. Ngizovezela abantu abangazi ukuthi wayeboniswa futhi engesabi ukuveza ayekuzwa nayesekubonile, okuyiyona nto eyenza waduma umhlaba wonke ngemisebenzi yakhe emihle,” usho kanje. Uthe lo mcimbi uyindlela yokufundisa abantu ngezinto zesintu nokuthi bazi ngamaqhawe akuleli zwe ayephila eminyakeni eminingi edlule, okusiza ngokuthi umlando wawo ungashabalali.“Kuwo futhi lo mcimbi ngizokwethula incwadi yami entsha esanda kuphuma esihloko sithi Umsamo: Umelaphi Wendabuko Nokwelapha, ehluba udlubu ekhasini ngokuthi ukwelapha kuyini nokuthi yimiphi imigomo elandelwayo uma uzoqala ukukwenza.“Ngizokwethula futhi uhlelo lokufundisa ngezifundo zomsamo nokwelapha ngesintu oluthi Umlambomunye VVO Scholarship, engizobambisana kulona ne-UKZN,” kusho uSolwazi Mkhize.UCredo wazalwa ngoJulayi 21 wango-1921, washona ngoMashi 25 wango-2020. Waziwa ngokuba yisanusi esasiboniswa futhi singenqeni ukusho esikubonile. Wazakhela udumo ngezincwadi okukhona kuyona eyaduma kakhulu ethi Indaba: My Children.

IMANGOSUTHU University of Technology (MUT), isixwayise abafaka izicelo zokuthola izikhala zokufunda kule nyuvesi, ukuthi baqaphele amaqola azama ukubagebenga imali ngethemba lokuthi bazobatholela izikhala zokufunda. Umyalezo othunyelwe ekhasini lenyuvesi uveza ukuthi abenza lo mkhuba, baheha abafaka izicelo ukuthi bakhokhe imali ukuze bathole izikhala zokufunda besebenzisa izindlela ezehlukene okubalwa ne-E Wallet, Money Send nokukhokha ezitolo uSpar noShoprite. Kuthiwa abenza lokhu basebenzisa inkundla yezokuxhumana i-WhatsApp. Inyuvesi ithe ayizisebenzisi zonke lezi zinhlelo uma kukhokhwa kulesi sikhungo.“Abenza lo mkhonyovu abasebenzeli inyuvesi ngoba ayizisebenzisi lezi zinhlelo uma kukhokhelwa izikhala zokufunda. Izikhala zitholakala ngokuthi ufake isicelo kwi-Central Applications Office (CAO), usebenzisa imiphumela yakwaGrade 12. Sifuna ukuxwayisa abazokhokha besebenzisa lezi zinhlelo ukuthi ngeke bazithole izikhala ngoba imali isuke ingayi enyuvesi,” kushoisixwayiso.Sibuye sabalula ukuthi isikhungo asixhumani nabafake izicelo kusetshenziswa inkundla i-WhatsApp.“Sixhumana nabafake izicelo sisebenzisa inombolo yocingo umuntu asuke efake ngayo isicelo kwi-CAO. Imali yaseMUT ikhokhwa ebhange i-Absa kuphela.” Kuxwayiswe nangokuthi abafaka izikhala bangakhokheli muntu imali noma kuthiwa isitshudeni noma umsebenzi wakule nyuvesi ukuze bathole izikhala zokufunda.“Sinxusa abaziyo ngalabo abafuna imali kulabo abafuna izikhala zokufunda enyuvesi ukuthi babampimpe. Bangabika ku:0800 228 999 ngoba akuvumelekile ukugwazelwa kwezikhala zokufunda kulesi sikhungo,” kusho umyalezo.

UNGQONGQOSHE wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu, uMfundisi Thulasizwe Buthelezi, uxwayisa izakhamuzi ngesimo sezulu esibi okulindeleke ukuthi siphazamise izingxenye ezinkulu zesifundazwe kusukela ngoLwesihlanu, Septhemba 20, kuze kube uMgqibelo.Isexwayiso sakamuva esikhishwe ngabakwa-South African Weather Service (SAWS) sikhomba ukuthi kulindeleke likhithike ngokuka-Level 6 ezingxenyeni zezifunda uThukela, Harry Gwala naseMgungundlovu. Lezi zimo zezulu ziyingozi empilweni futhi zingaholela ekuvalweni kwemigwaqo okwesikhashana ngenxa yokunqwabelana kweqhwa, okubangele ukuphazamiseka kwezimoto emizileni emikhulu.Izakhamuzi zakulezi zindawo ziyanxuswa ukuthi zithathe izinyathelo zokuphepha ezifanele, okuhlanganisa nokubambezela uhambo olungadingekile, ukugwema ingozi yokuvaleleka ngenxa yemigwaqo eneqhwa.Isexwayiso sesithwathwa ngokuka-Level 2 sikhishwe ezingxenyeni zesifunda Ugu, uThukela, Mgungundlovu, Harry Gwala naseMajuba. Kwezinye izindawo kuxwayiswa ngemvula enamandla.UMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana uqinisekisa izakhamuzi ukuthi amathimba alawula izinhlekelele, adidiyelwe yiSikhungo SokuLawulwa kweziNhlekelele sesiFundazwe, akhona futhi azoqapha ngeso lokhozi intuthuko. Lawa mathimba ahlonyiselwe ukubhekana nezimo eziphuthumayo futhi anikeze usizo lapho kudingeka khona.

UKUQHUBEKA komsebenzi wokuthuthukiswa kwemigwaqo emikhulu KwaZulu-Natal kuzoholela ekuvalweni kwesikhashana kukathelawayeka uN2 eNseleni kusukela ngoMsombuluko ozayo.Lo mgwaqo uzovalwa ebhulohweni iNseleni River Bridge (B2020) njengoba kuqhubeka umsebenzi wokulungisa ingqalasizinda lapha kuleya ndawo. Abashayeli abajwayele ukusebenzisa lo mgwaqo bayazi ukuthi sekunesikhathi kunosebenzi oqhubekayo kuleya ndawo. USerisha Sukraj oyi-Eastern Region Project Manager eSanral uthe ukuvalwa kwalo mgwaqo kubalulekile ukuze uqhubeke kahle umsebenzi wokuphakamisa ibhuloho kule ndawo.“Njengoba kuqala uhlelo lokuphakamisa ibhuloho, kubalulekile ukuvala ingxenye yomgwaqo ukuze kulawulwe isimo,” kusho yena.Izinsuku nezikhathi okuzovalwa ngazo:Julayi 29, 2024 uma ubheke eningizimu kusukela ngo-9 ekuseni kuya ku-2 ntambamaJulayi 30, 2024 uma ubheke enyakatho kusukela ngo-9 ekuseni kuya ku-2 ntambamaJulayi 31, 2024 uma ubheke eningizimu kusukela ngo-9 ekuseni kuya ku-2 ntambamaAgasti 1, 2024 uma ubheke eningizimu kusukela ngo-9 ekuseni kuya ku-2 ntambamaKunxuswa abashayeli ukuba bahlele kahle uhambo lwabo bazibekele nesikhathi esanele sokubhekana nokubambezelela, ikakhulukazi uma bebheke ezindaweni ezifana nasezikhumulweni sezindiza lapho kusetshenzwa khona ngesikhathi.“Sinxusa abasebenzisi bomgwaqo ukuba baqaphelisise izimpawu zomgwaqo behlise nesivinini uma sebesondela kule ndawo okusetshenzelwa kuyo,” kuqhubeka uSerisha Sukraj.

NAMHLANJE elamanqamu phakathi komholi wamabhinca, uNgizwe Mchunu noMengameli woMkhonto Wesizwe, uMnuz Jacob Zuma njengoba benemicimbi ebhekwe ngamehlo abomvu.UNgizwe uhlokoloze izidleke zeziqandu ngokuhlela umcimbi awuqondanise nosuku lokwethulwa kwe-manifesto yoMkhonto Wesizwe Party e-Orlando Stadium, eSoweto namhlanje.UNgizwe ubize Imbizo YamaBhinca ePeople's Park (ngaseWorkshop), eThekwini ngalolu suku.Kuyaziwa ukuthi uZuma noNgizwe badabuka eNkandla futhi uNgizwe uze wagqunywa esitokisini ngoba ethi ulwela uZuma.Nangosuku uNgizwe aphumelela ngalo icala eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseRanburg, eGoli, uZuma wabonakala ezomeseka.Ngaleso sikhathi uNgizwe ubekhwela edilika kuMengameli we-ANC nakwabanye abaholi bale nhlangano ngoba ebasola ngokucindezela uZuma, kodwa manje usesolwa ngokusebenzela i-ANC ukucindezela inhlangano kaZuma, iMK.Umholi wosomatekisi kodwa oseyilungu leMK, uGodole, uthe uNgizwe yixoki elithengwe yi-ANC ukuze lidayise umuntu omnyama."Mabhinca nonke ngicela ningayi kulo mbhedo, owenziwa yilo ngoba yena ugijimisa isisu, ithumbu liyakhala bese eqeda efaka nina ezintweni zakhe. “Njengamanje ubaba uNxamalala ufuna ukutakula abantu abamnyama. Yena bamfumbathisa imali ukuthi abantu abaye ePeople's Park. “Ngiyanicela zingane zakwethu siyogcwalisa i-Orlando Stadium iphuphume ukuze sikhiphe lobukusa, osebenzisa amabhinca ukufeza izinhloso zakhe." UGodole uthe uNgizwe wakwenza lokhu kwi-EFF kodwa ufike kwangqingetshe kwiMK.NoDkt Anele "King Lucifer" Mthembu uthe uNgizwe akasiye umuntu kodwa yiphixiphixi elingenandaba nekusasa kodwa elicabangela isisu salo kuphela.Uthe zolo lokhu ubebiza ngaphansi kweziketi zikanina uMengameli weZwe, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa ngoba ekhala ngokuboshwa kukaZuma kodwa manje usengaku-ANC, ucindezela uZuma."Angicabangi ukuthi kukhona umuntu ongafaka ivoti lakhe kwi-ANC ngoba kusho uNgizwe," kusho umlandeli weMK.Eziphendulela uNgizwe uthe uyabezwa abantu bekhuluma abakuthandayo ngaye. "Abantu sebekhulume kakhulu, bekhuluma izinto abazithandayo, ngendlela abayithandayo.“Ngibize Imbizo YamaBhinca nje sasivumelene kusukela ekuqaleni ukuthi uma kufika isikhathi sokhetho, siyovumelana futhi siphinde sikhulumisane ukuthi yikuphi lapho kuyofanele sibaboleke amavoti, hhayi sibaphe noma sibe yingxenye yabo."UNgizwe usolwe kakhulu ngokubiza uZuma ngexhegu nokuthi ancome uDkt Nelson Mandela ngokuthi waba wumholi we-ANC ihlandla elilodwa maqede washenxa.Uthe akahoxiswanga futhi akavulanga ispaza shop. UNgizwe uthe e-USA awekho amaqembu amaningi kodwa mabili nje ekubeni kuleli kunenqwaba yamaqembu, okwenza abantu abamnyama baphenduke inhlekisa kwezinye izizwe.Uthe amabhinca azokuzwa kahle ngoMgqibelo ukuthi ikusasa lawo libhekephi.

LISOBISHINI ikhehla (75) elidonsa isigwebo sikadilikajele eseliphinde lavulelwa amacala okusabisa nokufuna ukugwazelwa uNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo, uDkt Aaron Motsoaledi.Isiboshwa uJacob Yende, sisolwa ngokufonela futhi sithumele imiyalezo kaWhatsapp uMotsoaledi sifuna ngodli uR80 000.UYende uvele ngoLwesine eNkantolo yeMantshi yasePitoli emuva kokuthola amasamanisi ngoJulayi 29 nonyaka.OKlebe bathi ngoDisemba 29, 2022 uMotsoaledi esenguNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezaseKhaya wafonelwa indoda eyazibiza ngoVusi.Kuthiwa uVusi watshela ungqongqoshe ukuthi uyinkabi eqashelwe ukuthi imyise kwagoqanyawo futhi usekhokheliwe uR40 000 omunye uR20 000 uzowuthola uma esephothle umsebenzi.Okhulumela oKlebe uColonel Katlego Mogale, uthe uVusi wabe esefuna ungqongqoshe ukuthi amfakele uR80 000 kwi-akhawunti yasebhange uCapitec ngoba wayekholelwa ukuthi uhloniphekile futhi unomusa.Kuvela ukuthi udaba lwabikwa esiteshini samaphoyisa eBrooklyn kwaqala uphenyo olwavundulula ukuthi obeshaya ucingo usejele.OKlebe bathi kwabe sekupeqululwa ejele kwashaqwa amafoni namaSIM cards.“Iziboshwa eziyisishiyagalombili zanikezelela ngezitatimende, esinye sazo umnikazi we-akhawunti yasebhange eyanikezwa ungqongqoshe. Kwavela ukuthi lendoda inguJacob Yende odonsa isigwebo sikadilikajele ejele laseWitbank,” kusho uCol Mogale.UYende kulindeleke abuyele kule nkantolo ngoSepthemba 9 nonyaka ukuze athole ummeli.

LIKHALE ngomkhuhlane onzima ohlasele ejele laseWestville iphoyisa eliboshiwe lase licela imantshi ukuba ilivumele lihambe nemishanguzo yokuthithibalisa umkhuhlane uma selibuyela esitokisini.UConstable Lungisani “Mazambane” Xaba (48), othweswe icala lokushaya abulale unina ngepulangwe elinezipikili, ushaye indesheni emantshini eyicela ukuba imvumele abuyele esitokisini nomuthi womkhuhlane.Uqale waba nenguyazana nommeli wakhe eNkantolo yeMantshi yasePinetown, emcela ukuba amcelele emantshini ukuthi imvumele anikezwe umuthi womkhuhlane.Kuthe imantshi isamunyunga isicelo, wezwakala uXaba esekhuluma nayo ngqo ngesiZulu ethi: “Ngiyakucela nkosi yenkantolo, ngivumele ngihambe nomuthi womkhuhlane.”Imantshi ibuze iphoyisa lasenkantolo ukuthi kuvumelekile yini okufunwa uXaba laphendula ngokuthi cha.Ube esechithwa kanjalo uXaba kwabekade ekufuna, amaphoyisa ase eyamqhuba esembuyisela esitokisini.Ngaphambi kwalokho ummeli kaXaba ubekade efake isicelo enkantolo sokuthi lihlehliswe icala ngoba kunemininingwane ephathelene necala ayidingayo kuMbuso.Nebala imanthi ikugunyazile lokho icala yalihlehlisela uJuni 26 nonyaka.Phambilini uXaba wanqatshelwa ibheyili amahlandla ehlukene. Useshintshe abameli baze baba bahlanu. Ukubambezeleka kwecala sekuthukuthelisa amalungu omndeni wakhe afuna liqulwe liphele bese egwetshwa udilikajele uXaba.UXaba useke wafika enkantolo efake umnazaretha nomgexo waKwaShembe nokuyilapho acela khona ukuthi kuhlehle icala ngoba ethi kubuhlungu izinsini akukhulumeki.Izolo ubebukeka ezikhululekele egqoke i-jean eluhlaza okwesibhakabhaka nesikibha esimnyama esinemikhono emide, eklame izinwele nentshebe yakhe kahle.Abengabonwa nangalukhalo enkantolo amalungu omndeni wakhe ajwayele ukufika ezothamela icala.UMbuso usola uXaba ngokuthi washaya kanzima wabulala unina uNkk Greta Xaba (81) owayehamba ngesihlalo esinamasondo ngenxa yokukhubazeka.

KULINDELEKE ukuthi uMbuso ufake isicelo sokubuyiswa isibili kukafakazi, uCol Lambertus Steyn, ngoMsombuluko, ecaleni lokubulawa kowayengunozinti weBafana Bafana ne-Orlando Pirates, uSenzo Meyiwa.Lokhu kuvezwe uMbuso izolo, ummeli kammangalelwa wesihlanu uFisokuhle Ntuli, u-Adv Zandile Mshololo, esonga ukuphosa ngemibuzo ufakazi oyisikhulu sakwaVodacom, uNksz Pinky Vythilingam.Kukholakala ukuthi uMbuso ufuna uSteyn azocacisa ngobufakazi abethula nyakenye, obabuveza ukuthi omunye wabamangalelwa waxhumana ngocingo noKelly Khumalo ngaphambi nangemumva kokubulawa kukaMeyiwa.Lobu bufakazi bushiye imibuzo ngeledlule, uNksz Vythilingam eveza ukuthi abubonwa nangokhalo olwazini olugcinwe yiVodacom.Okuphinde kwaqwebulisa amehlo, ukuveza kukaNksz Vythilingam ukuthi akuze kungenzeka nangengozi ukuthi kube khona izingcingo eziphumayo nezingenayo kodwa zingaveli lapho begcina khona ulwazi lwamaselula.UNksz Vythilingam uphinde washayela isipikili sokugcina ngesikhathi eveza ukuthi obulethwe wuye ubufakazi bukwi-format ye-PDF, engavumi ukuthi umuntu anezele olunye ulwazi, kanti obalethwa uSteyn babukwi-format i-Excel, evumayo ukuthi umuntu azinezelele olunye ulwazi.Abameli beholwa u-Adv Charles Mnisi baveze ukuthi bazosiphikisa isicelo sokubuyiswa kukaSteyn enkantolo.Ngesonto elizayo, kulindeleke ukuthi kuvele ukuthi isihambe ibanga elingakanani ingcweti ezimele esanda kunikwa isibhamu nezinhlamvu okuthiwa kwasebenza endaweni yesigameko ukuthi iyokuhlola.

IJAJI Ratha Mokgoatlheng elihlalele icala lokufa kukaSenzo Meyiwa lithi abameli babambezela icala bashaya izaququ ngongoti wabo ohlola izibhamu abathi bazomletha.UMeyiwa wadutshulwa wabulawa ekaKelly Khumalo, eVosloorus, eGauteng ngo-2014. UMbuso wethula ubufakazi ozimisele ukugojela ngabo abalisa abahlanu okholwa wukuthi babulala uMeyiwa.UMbuso sewambiza ungoti ohlola izibhamu owathi isibhamu esatholwa siyahambisana negobolondo lenhlamvu elatholwa endaweni yesigameko. Isibhamu esahlolwa satholwa kummangalelwa wesithathu uMthobisi Mncube.Abameli babamangalelwa babuphosela inselelo lobo bufakazi bathi bazoletha owabo ungoti ahlole isibhamu. IJaji libuze ku-Advocate Charles Mnisi ukuthi kumiphi ngongoti wabo ozohlola isibhamu.UMnisi uthe basalinde iLegal Aid SA ukuthi ibazise ukuthi isihambe yafikaphi ngokuqoka ungoti wezibhamu. IJaji likhuze lababaza lathi sekudleke isikhathi eside.“ Umthetho uthi kufanele nithole ithuba elanele lokwenza umsebenzi wenu kodwa sekungaphezulu manje. UMbuso wethula ubufakazi bawo ngo-Agasti ngonyaka odlule, sekuphele izinyanga eziyishiyagalolunye,’’ kusho iJaji.IJaji lithe leli cala liwundendende alipheli kanti nabaphathi balo bayakhononda ngalo. IJaji lize lancokola ngokuthi liyoze lificwe wukufa lingaqedile ngecala.Kuvele omunye ummeli uMnuz Sipho Ramosepele wathi abeLegal Aid SA bake bambhalela bemazisa ukuthi sebemtholile  ungoti wabanika nezindleko zakhe. URamosepele uthe abakwazi kodwa ukubonana nongoti okwamanje.IJaji libuze kuMshushisi woMbuso u-Advocate George Baloyi ukuthi bangaki ofakazi abasele abazobizwa wuMbuso. UBaloyi uthe uMbuso uya ngasemaphethelweni okusonga ubufakazi bawo.Uthe bebezimsele ukusonga ngasekupheleni kwenyanga kodwa ukubambezeleka okukhona kuzophoqa ukuthi kwelulwe isikhathi. izolo icala lisheshe laguqa ngesikhathi isikhulu saseVodacom ebesethula ubufakazi bamaselula sixinwa wukugula.Izwi lesikhulu beliya ngokuya lishabalala ngenxa yomkhuhlane kwavunyelwana ngokuthi aliguqe icala ufakazi anikwe ithuba lokululama. IJaji nakuba belingeneme kodwa ligcine livumile ukuthi icala lihlehlele uLwesibili.

NKOSIKHONA CELEASABISA ngokuduba ibandla amalungu ebandla akhala ngokuthunazeka kwesithunzi sawo ngemuva kokuba abefundisi balo ababili bebambane ngesidlozana bebanga intombi.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe Ngempelasonto kume yonke into ngeledlule ebandleni Izethembiso Faith Church  eMtubatuba ngesikhathi abaholi balo ababili betholana phezulu ngesibhakela phambi kwabanye abazalwane.Lesi sigameko kuthiwa senzeke esigodlweni saleli bandla khona eMtubatuba.Kuvela ukuthi uMfu Ndabenhle Dlamini nomngani wakhe uMfu Zakhele Malinga kubonakale ngabo sebehluthana ngesibhakela egcekeni ngesikhathi inkonzo ngaphakathi iqhubeka.Kuthiwa uDlamini uyena umholi webandla, bese kuthi uMalinga abe sesigungwini esiphezulu esilawula leli bandla.Amalungu ebandla akhulume neSolezwe Ngempelasonto athe ezwe sekundiza emoyeni igama likaNoluthando Mpinga, okhonza kuleli bandla."UMalinga ubebuza uDlamini ukuthi uthandana kanjani noNoluthando ekubeni azi kahle ukuthi uhlela ukumlobola,'' kulandisa umthombo.Uqhuba, uthe kugcine sekulamula amakholwa njengoba bekubonakala ukuthi uMalinga uyamgojela uDlamini njengoba ebesephezu kwakhe esho nokusho ukuthi yena “akenziwa njalo”."Thina besingazi nokuthi laba babanga intombi. Baze basihlaza naba abantu,'' usho kanjena.Kuthiwa ngesikhathi behluthana ngesibhakela, uNoluthando ubengakafiki enkonzweni. Kuthiwa ugcine engasabonakalanga nangakhalo ekubeni engumuntu ongaphuthi enkonzweni."Sisola ukuthi kukhona omshayele ucingo wamazisa ngesigameko wase ebona ukuthi makangabe eseza,'' kuchaza umthombo.Isolezwe Ngempelasonto likhulume noMalinga, wathi kumphatha kabi ukuthi ibandla lakhe lizovela emaphephandabeni ngodaba olubi kangaka."Wohhe, bhala mfowethu ngoba vele ngiyazi utshelwe yibona laba engisonta nabo. Silwile noDlamini kodwa ukuthi besibangani anginawo amandla okukhuluma lokho nawe,'' usho kanjena.UDlamini yena uncenge intatheli ukuthi noma ilubhala udaba kodwa iligodle igama lebandla futhi igodle namagama abo.Uvumile ukuthi kube nento enjengalena, wathi kodwa akekho sesimweni esikahle sokuthi angakhuluma ngaso.Elinye ilungu lebandla lithe kuze kwenzeka lesi sehlakalo nje, sekunesikhathi bebabuza uMalinga noDlamini ukuthi kanti baganwa nini.Ethintwa uNoluthando, uvele wanxapha wathi akanaso isikhathi sokukhuluma ngomsangano, wavala ucingo.Umthombo uthi kunabazalwane abaningi abacabanga nokuphuma ngenxa yesigameko abathi sibacikile.Isolezwe Ngempelasonto lithole ukuthi uMalinga noDlamini babe nomhlangano ngoLwesine nesigungu sebandla."Asazi nokuthi ubani obize lowo mhlangano kodwa sithole ukuthi uDlamini uphume waduba ungakapheli,'' kusho ilungu lebandla elicele ukuba kugodlwe igama lalo.Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kwabasesigungwini sebandla igcine iphunzile kwaze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela.

NKOSIKHONA CELEASALE eshaqekile amaphoyisa asesiteshini saseMsunduzi, eMgungundlovu ngesikhathi elinye iphoyisa elingu-Warrant Officer ebelidle amponjwana livulela ngenhlamvu kozakwabo ababili.Umthombo uveza ukuthi leli phoyisa ebelidle amponjwana lifike emsebenzini lidakwe lingazazi nokuthi lingubani.Kuthiwa lingene emsebenzini limemeza lihlulwa nawukuhamba lidlubhe umfaniswano wezakwadalawane kubonakala nje ukuthi libukhile.Kuvela ukuthi kuthe lawa amanye amaphoyisa amabili uma elibuza ukuthi lisithathaphi isibindi sokuthi lingeza emsebenzini libukhe ngaleya ndlela, kwasuka esinamathambo liwabuza ukuthi wona awadakwa yini.Khona lapho kuthiwa kuphakame imimoya, nokugcine ngokuthi odakiwe akhiphe isibhamu adubule labo zakwabo ababili, ngaphakathi esiteshini. Amagama alawa maphoyisa agcine engazange atholakale.Umthombo utshele leli phephandaba ukuthi kube wubutatata amanye amaphoyisa ezama ukunqanda lo odubulayo, nokuyinto athe ibinzima kwazise umunwe wakhe ubusendaweni yokudubula.Kudubuleke iphoyisa elilodwa laphuthunyiswa esibhedlela kungozi makhaza. Kuvela ukuthi leli phoyisa ngemuva kokudubula, lidlubulundelile labaleka ngeveni yamaphoyisa kodwa lagcina likhalalelwa ngamasongo kaSigonyela. Amaphoyisa akulesi siteshi kuthiwa agcwale izinkalo elithungatha abuya nalo liphila. Abaseduze kwesiteshi kuthiwa abawuvali umlomo njengoba bethi bayokuxoxela amagwababa echobana abakubonile."Asiyazi ngampela thina le nto eyenziwa yileli phoyisa. Ukudubula ozakwenu phakathi esiteshini ... isibindi esingaka ukuthi usithathaphi nathi kasazi,'' kusho umthombo.ISolezwe Ngempelasonto  litholile ukuthi kuyinto eyinsakavukela ukufika kwamaphoyisa akulesi siteshi eze emsebenzini enuka phu utshwala.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda usiqinisekisile isigameko.Uthe amaphoyisa aseMsunduzi aphenya udaba lwephoyisa okusolakala ukuthi lidubule labhekisa kozakwabo."Kusolakala ukuthi kube nengxabano phakathi kwalawa maphoyisa okuyiyona egcine iholela ekutheni elinye ligcine selidubula libhekise kozakwabo,'' usho kanje.Uthe lesi sigameko senzeke esiteshini samaphoyisa.Okhulumela uphiko olubhekelele amacala enziwa ngamaphoyisa i-Independent Police Investigative Directorate (IPID), uMnuz  Phaladi Shuping uthe bazolulandelela udaba bathole umnyombo walo.

KULALE isidumbu sesibili, kudutshulwa kubulawa owesilisa waseNquthu, obehambele umngcwabo womunye wesilisa KwaJikaza, oLundi, ngoMgqibelo.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe, lona wesilisa, okungaveli ukuthi ungubani, kuthiwa udutshulwe yinhlamvu ebindiza emoyeni ngesikhathi kuqhunyiswa izibhamu kulo mngcwabo.Kuvela ukuthi bekungcwatshwa uMnuz Sabelo Mazibuko (47) okuthiwa ushone ngokudutshulwa ngoMeyi 19, ehostela iNguni, eGoli.Umfowabo kamufi, uMnuz Celi Mazibuko, uthe yize engazi kahle ukuthi ubani odubulile nanokuthi ithini imininingwane yalo odutshuliwe, kodwa lesi sigameko esibashiye beshaqekile, senzeke phambi kwabo.“Isigameko senzeke ngesikhathi sesiphuma nebhokisi ekhaya emva kwenkonzo yomngcwabo, siya emathuneni ngaphandle komuzi. Mina nabanye besibambe ibhokisi ngesikhathi sizwa kuqhuma isibhamu,” kusho uMazibuko.Uqhube wathi ngokwejwayelekile, uma kuqhuma isibhamu abantu baye bethuke, abanye babheke phansi, nabo benze okufanayo.“Sithe siphakamisa amehlo, bese kukhona owesilisa obese elele phansi, edubulekile,” kusho uMazibuko.Uthe lona wesilisa akukho okutheni abakutholile ngaye ngaphandle kokuthi ungowokudabuka eNquthu. Uthe nomndeni wakhe ubungakaxhumani nabo, nabo bebengakayenzi imizamo yokuwucinga.Uqhube wathi yize beqhubeke nokuya emathuneni bengumndeni, kodwa bathole ukuthi lona wesilisa uphuthunyiswe esibhedlela Obonjeni ngabanye ebebehambele umngcwabo kamfowabo.“Sizwa kuthiwa ufike washonela khona esibhedlela,” usho kanje.Akakwazanga ukucacisa eyalabo ebebeqhumisa izibhamu njengoba ethe, bezwe kuthiwa ebebedubula ngabangani bakamfowabo.“Sithole ukuthi bemphelezela ngendlela ahambe ngayo, njengoba naye ehambe ngaso isibhamu,” kubeka uMazibuko.Ebuzwa ukuthi ubephila mpiloni umufi eGoli, uthe ngokwazi kwakhe, ubengasebenzi kodwa ezihlalele nje ehostela.Uthe kwebebehambele umngcwabo, bebekhona ebebevela eGoli, kuphinde kube khona abendawo, wathi ngenxa yokuba matasa ngezinhlelo zomngcwabo, abazange banake ukuthi abadubulayo bebengobani nokuthi bebengabendawo noma abaseGoli.Imithombo yeSolezwe ithe umufi ubeyinkabi, kanti odutshulwe emngcwabeni wakhe, kusolwa ukuthi uye owadayisa umufi ngesikhathi edutshulwa eGoli. Nokho uMazibuko akakwazanga ukuqinisekisa lezi zinsolo.Kushaye isikhathi sokushicilela amaphoyisa engakayiphenduli imibuzo athunyelelwe yona.

KWENZEKE okungajwayelekil, eBottlebrush, eChatsworth, eThekwini, njengoba kuthiwa ilungu lomndeni wabasolwa abebezokhalelwa ngamasongo kaSigonyela, lingqongqisa ngomlilo imoto yamaphoyisa lisekwa yiqeqebane.Kulesi sigameko kuthiwa kuphinde kwakhandwa ngamatshe enye imoto yamaphoyisa.Ngokusho komthombo, imoto ishiswe ngumfowabo wowesifazane obezoboshwa ngamaphoyisa ngoLwesine.“Amaphoyisa agasele komunye wemijondolo ekule ndawo ezintatha ngenhloso yokubopha izithandani. Athe esematasa nalokho, aqaphela ukuthi sekukhona ilangabi lapho ebepake khona izimoto. Kushe eyodwa yophiko lwePublic Order Policing,” kusho umthombo.Uthe le moto ishe nazo zonke izinsizakusebenza kanjalo namaselula amaphoyisa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa ophiko lwe-eThekwini District Task Team abephansi phezulu efunana nabasolwa ngecala lokubulala.Uthe kugcine kubonakala ukuthi kudingeka amanye amaphoyisa ukuba azolekelela nokuyilapho kubizwe khona amanye ophiko lwePublic Order Policing.“Ngesikhathi amaphoyisa ematasa ejaha abasolwa ngonyawo, iqeqebana lamalungu omphakathi lishise imoto yamaphoyisa laphinde lakhanda ngamatshe enye,” kusho uNetshiunda.Ucacise ukuthi lesi senzo sokuhlaselwa kwezimoto zamaphoyisa akuzange kuwavimbe ukuthi aqhubeke nokubopha abasolwa ebebebafuna.“Baboshwe bobabili, kanti batholwe nezibhamu ezimbili ne-air rifle,” kusho uNetshiunda, othe kulindeleke ukuthi bavele enkantolo maduze.UKhomishana wamaPhoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLieutenant General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi, usigxekile isenzo sokuhlaselwa kwezimoto zamaphoyisa.Uqhube wathi ukuphazanyiswa kwezinsizakusebenza zamaphoyisa kungukuhlasela ngqo uhulumeni.Ufunge wagomela ukuthi amaphoyisa azokwenza konke okusemandleni ukuthi abambe abenze lokhu.“Amalungu omphakathi ahlale ekhala ngokuthi izinsizakusebenza zamaphoyisa azenele, nokuyinto ekhathaza wonke umuntu, bese kuba khona abantu abafana nalaba, abanezinhloso zokunqinda ukusebenza kwamaphoyisa ukuze baqhubeke nokucanasa,” kusho uMkhwanazi.Ukubeke kwacaca ukuthi ukushiswa nokukhandwa ngamatshe kwezimoto zamaphoyisa kuyicala elibomvu, wathi amaphoyisa asevele aphansi phezulu acinga abenze lesi sigameko.

ISIFO sofuba sisalokhu sihamba phambili ngokubulala abantu abaningi kuleli nasemhlabeniLokhu kushiwo uSolwazi Sizulu Moyo,  woMkhandlu owenza ucwaningo lwesayensi ethinta abantu, iHuman Science Research Council (HSRC),  ngasikhathi kunesigcawu ebesiyizolo sokuchaza ngebanga eselihanjwe iNingizimu Afrika ukuze iqede isifo sofuba ngo-2030.USolwazi Moyo,  uthe imiphumela yango 2022 yocwaningo olubheka ukwelashwa kwalesi sifo nezinga lokusabalala kwaso ekhishwe nyakenye ikhomba ukuthi bangu-54 000 abantu ababulawa isifo sofuba ngonyaka kuleli, okusho ukuthi emizuzwini eyishumi kunomuntu obulawa isifo sofuba."ENingizimu Afrika  isibalo sabantu abaneHIV abahaqwa iTB siphezulu. Isifo sofuba neHIV kusondelene yize iTB ihlasela nabantu abangenayo iHIV.USolwazi  Violet Chihota wesikhungo i-Aurum Institute, uthe umbiko wango-2022, uveza ukuthi ukhona umehluko uma kubhekwa ukuthi eNingizimu Afrika ukusabalala kwaleli gciwane kwehle ngo-11% ngo-2015 ngemuva kokuthi uhulumeni ehlanganise amasu okulwa neTB neHIV ngo-2014. Kusukela lapho izinga lokusabalala kwaso lilokhu lehla. “Ngokubona kwethu lokhu kudalwa ukuthi iningi labantu abaneHIV lidla imishanguzo,”  kusho uSolwazi Moyo.UDkt Nkhensani Nkwashu, womkhandlu wengculazi, iSA National Aids Council (SANAC), uthe amasu ka-2023 kuya ku-2028 kumele asize iNingizimu Afrika ukuze ukwamukelwa kwabantu abahaqwe iHIV neTB kusuke ku-85% wango-2022, kuye ku-95%, kwehle isibalo sabahaqwe isifo sofuba sisuke ku-56% wango-2022 siye  ku-36%, ukwelashwa ngempumelelo kwalesi sifo kusuke  ku-78% wango-2022 kuye ku-90%."Okunye okungamele sikukhohlwe ukuthi kunezimo ezithile ezenza isimo sibe nzima okubalwa ububha, ukushoda kokudla okunempilo okumele kudliwe ngabantu abahaqekile. Ukwelashwa kwalesi sifo kungaba nemiphumela emihle kakhulu uma umphakathi ungabamba iqhaza elibonakalayo ezinhlelweni zokulwa naleli gciwane,"  kusho  uSolwazi Nkwashu. USolwazi Moyo, uthe  zisekhona izinto eziyizingqinamba ekwelashweni kwalesi sifo,  njengokuthi kusenzima ukuhlonzwa kwezingane ezihaqwe yileli gciwane nokuthi imishanguzo emisha  esetshenziswa isikhathi esifishane ehlolwayo ayizilungele izingane.

ULAXAZE isikhundla oyisihlobo sowayengumengameli, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, ngemva kokusolwa ngokushendeza neMK ekubeni eyikhansela le-ANC.UMnuz Malunga Sabelo, usulile ekubeni yikhansela kuMasipala iRay Nkonyeni, ngemva kwamahlebezi okuthi uhamba imihlangano yeMK.Kuthiwa bese kunesikhathi eside uSabelo ehlezi ngesinqe esisodwa esikhundleni sakhe. Kuthiwa okumqhathe kakhulu nobuholi be-ANC,  ukuvakashelwa kwakhe nguZuma, okwenzeke ngasekuqaleni kwenyanga.Ekhuluma neSolezwe, uSabelo uthe usule ngemva kokuqonga kwezinkulumo ezithi uzoxoshwa.USabelo uphawule kanje:“Ngaqale ngezwa izindaba zokuthi kunobuholi obebuhlangane bodwa, bukhuluma indaba yokuthi ngizoxoshwa ngoba ngizalana, noma ngihlobene noZuma. Ithe uma indaba isiningi kakhulu, ngabe sengizama ukubikela abanye abaholi. Ngangikhala ngokuthi akungakhulunywa ngegama lami ngingekho, angibizwe nami ngizoziphendulela. Nokho abazange bangibize. Nami ngigcine sengizibona ngingaphephile.”USabelo bahlobene kabili noZuma, ngezibongo uMavundla noMzobe. Ukuphikile ukuthi uhamba imihlangano yeMK, wathi ukuvakasha kukaZuma emzini wakhe kwakungahlangene nepolitiki.Echaza ngokuvakashelwa nguZuma uthe:“Ubevakashe elandela indaba yobuhlobo. Kwakuyinto yomndeni. Wafika emzini wami, sabe sesidlulela enkosini yakwaMavundla, lapho kusuka khona ubuhlobo bethu.”USabelo uthe ngeke avume ukuthi kube nabantu abazomkhethela ukuthi axhumane naziphi izihlobo zakhe.“Ngeke ngivume ukushayelwa umthetho yibona. Akufanele basole mina, ngoba nami angizikhethelanga ukuhlobana noZuma. Kufanele basole uNkulunkulu ngoba uyena okhethayo ukuthi ngubani uzohlobana nobani.”USabelo uthe ubevele engahleli kahle ebukhanseleni. “Ngike ngazama ukwesula esikhundleni ingakabi khona iMK ngenxa yokuthi kwakukhona izinto engangikhala ngazo. Ubuholi besifunda bathi angingasuli, bathi bazozilungisa izinto engangikhala ngazo. Abazange bazilungise lezo zinto.”USabelo uthe ngeke ashiye kwi-ANC.Unobhala we-ANC esifundeni iTolomane Mnyayiza, uMnuz Xolani Luthuli, uthe uSabelo usule ngemva kokubanjwa esemhlanganweni weMK.“Ubevele azi ukuthi uzoxoshwa ngoba bese kunezithombe zakhe esemihlanganweni yeMK. Abantu bebelokhu besho ukuthi lo muntu usebenzela iMK. Usemane uyayisho nje leyo buhlobo noZuma kodwa iqiniso lithi uke wazama ukwesula ngaphambilini.”Ukwesula kukaSabelo kusho ukuthi kuzokuba nokhetho lokuchibiyela kuWard 14. I-ANC ijwayele ukungenzi kahle okhethweni lokuchibiyela KwaZulu-Natal.ULuthuli uthe balulindele ukhetho lokuchibiyela.

AYOYIZEKELA amagwababa echobana amantombazane amabili, eneminyaka eyisikhombisa neyisishiyagalolunye. Kuthiwa athunjwe edlala kubo, ayodlwengulwa ubusuku bonke maqede ayolaxazwa ndawana thize.Amaphoyisa asesifundazweni iMpumalanga, athungatha izinswelaboya ezisolwa ngokuhlukumeza omuntuza.Okhulumela amaphoyisa aseMpumalanga, uColonel Donald Mdhluli, uthe izingane ezingenacala, zizwe ubuhlungu ezingasoze zabulibala empilweni yazo, zidlwengulwa ubusuku bonke."Lokhu kwenzeke emuva kokuba amantombazane amabili enyamalele ngoMgqibelo wangoMashi 30, ekhaya labazali bawo elisendaweni yaseVosman, eduze kwaseWitbank."Amaphoyisa athe isigameko esinyantisa igazi sithuthumelise amalungu omphakathi."Abazali baqale ukushaya amakhala ngokunyamalala kwalezi zingane emuva kokungatholakali kwazo lapho bezigcinwe zidlala khona.“Babe sebazisa amaphoyisa okuyiwo avule idokodo labantu abalahlekile ukuze kuphenywe. Kube sekuphunywa inqina kuyokuthungathwa kwabagilwa kodwa kwanhlanga zimuka nomoya," kuchaza uMdhluli.Ngakusasa ngeSonto amaphoyisa asesiteshini sasePhola, abikelwe ukuthi izingane sezitholakele kodwa sekunezimpawu zokuthi zinukubeziwe ngokocansi."Ukutholakala kwezingane kube wusizo loMsamariya olungileyo, ozifice zidwanguza lapho zidalakaxwe khona ngumdlwenguli. Uzishiye dengwane ukuba zizibonele njengamachwane emuva kokuzivalela ubusuku bonke," kusho uMdhluli.Uthe uMsamariya olungileyo ufice izingane zingqangqazela emuva kwesigameko esizehlele nangamakhaza ashubisa umnkantsha ngoba bezingawahlomele amakhaza ngezingubo ebezizigqokile.Uqhube wathi amaphoyisa aphenya ngamacala odlame emndenini, ukuvikelwa kwezingane nokunukubezwa ngokocansi.Uthe anxusa noma ngubani ongaba nomkhondo wezinswelaboya ukuba afonele uSergeant Zinhle Mathenjwa ku-072 792 0691 noma afonele ku-08600 10111.

UFUNA livalwe isonto eliyalela abantu ukuba bayeke imishanguzo yezifo ezehlukene, umndeni waseSikhaleni, oshonelwe ngumama wekhaya obejoyine leli sonto. Umama oshonile kuthiwa wayeka imishanguzo ngemuva kwesiphrofetho esaqhamuka ebandleni sokuthi bayeke konke, baphile “ngeZwi”.Oshonelwe yinkosikazi eyeke imishanguzo yayo ye-HIV ne-TB emuva kokusonta kuleli bandla, elibizwa nge-House of Redemption, utshele Isolezwe ukuthi umkakhe, uqale ukuvakashela isonto elisha endaweni ngonyaka odlule. Uthe leli sonto likomunye umuzi khona eSikhaleni.Oshonelwe naye unguMfundisi ebandleni labasindisiwe. Uthe nalo leli elajoyinwa wumkakhe ngelabasindisiwe kodwa izimfundiso zalo zehlukile.“Inkosikazi yami iqale iwumuntu ovakashayo kuleli sonto. Ibuye ihambe ithi bayokhuleka ebusuku kodwa kuthe ngokuhamba kwesikhathi yangitshela ukuthi yona isiyashiya kwelethu isiyokhonza kwelisha. Nalapho angizange ngibe nenkinga ngoba umuntu unelungelo lokukhonza lapho ethanda khona. Inkinga iqale lapho sengimbona ephela emzimbeni. Uma ngibuza ukuthi kwenzenjani angezi nempendulo eqondile,” kulandisa owesilisa.Uthe ngoNovemba nyakenye unkosikazi wakhe ubesephele kakhulu emzimbeni futhi wabona nokuthi akasayidli imishanguzo ye-HIV ne-TB ayinikezwa emtholampilo.“Ngithe uma ngimbuza ukuthi kungani angayidli imishanguzo wathi esontweni lakhe kuphume isiphrofetho esithe sebezophila ngezwi, abalahle imishanguzo. Ngithe noma ngimtshela ukuthi ayikho into enjalo, wangangilalela. Ubeqhubeka eya khona esontweni,” kusho umfelwa.Uthe ngoJanuwari nonyaka uyile kuleli sonto eyobuza abaphathi balo ngendaba yesiphrofetho. Uveze ukuthi bavuma ukuthi sivelile bathi futhi simile nje kanjalo, abantu abayeke imishanguzo.“Umkami uqhubekile nokusonta esakwazi ukuzihambela kanti noma esegula kakhulu ebewumuntu ongafuni ukuya emtholampilo futhi befika nabakuleli sonto lakhe bamthathe uma ngingekho. NgoMashi bamthatha esele nezingane. Ngathi uma ngibuya ngacela omunye umfowethu ukuba angiphelezele ngiyomlanda ngoba ngangimshiye esegula kakhulu. Saze sabiza amaphoyisa ukuthi asivulele ngoba babengavuli ngesikhathi kuseyithina sobabili,” kusho owesilisa.Uthe kwathi uma ecela abasesontweni ukuba bamthathe ngemoto yabo bambuyisele ekhaya ngoba yena wayehamba ngemoto yomuntu, banqaba.Uveze ukuthi amaphoyisa athi akukho angakwenza ngoba umkakhe uziyele ngokuthanda kwakhe kuleli sonto, akaphoqwanga.“Umkami ugcine ebuyile ekhaya ngase ngimyisa emtholampilo. Wafika wadluliselwa esibhedlela ngoba amanesi ebona ukuthi usegula kakhulu. Ushone ngoMashi 13. Ngiphatheke kabi ngokuthi umkami ugcine eshonile ngenxa yokulalela isiphrofetho sebanald elathi akayeke imishanguzo esiza ngokuthi siphile. Ngiyafisa abezempilo nabomthetho balithathele izinyathelo leli sonto ngoba basekhona abaya kulo,” usho kanje.Ikhansela lendawo, uMnuz Vincent Sbu Dludla, lithe labikelwa ngokushona kowesifazane kodwa belingazi ukuthi ubesonta esontweni elithi abantu abayeke imishanguzo.“Ngiyabanxusa abantu ukuthi bangayiyeki imishanguzo ngoba ngabe ayikhishwa emtholampilo ukube ayisizi. Ngiyacela bayidle ngendlela imishanguzo abayinikwa emtholampilo. Amasonto ayekisa abantu imishanguzo akufanele abe semphakathini,” kusho uDludla.UMbhishobhi Bhekimpi Mchunu, onguSihlalo weKwaZulu-Natal Church Leaders Council, uthe abahambisani nokuthi abantu balahle imishanguzo yabo ngoba yenzelwe ukubasiza ezifweni abanazo.Uthe yize bekholwa ukuthi uNkulunkulu uyakwazi ukunqoba zonke izifo kodwa alikho isonto elinelungelo lokukhipha umyalelo wokuthi abantu mabalahle imishanguzo.“Amasonto kufanele athandazele abantu ukuze baphile. Akufanele kube yiwona abalahlisa amaphilisi abasiza ukuze baphile. Uma kwenzeke isimangaliso kufanele umuntu abonakale ephila, hhayi ukuthi kuthiwe akalahle amaphilisi,” kusho uMchunu.Umnikazi weHouse of Redemption, ochazwe njengoNkk Nkomo, utshele Isolezwe ukuthi yize beshumayela ukuthi abantu abaphile ngezwi likaNkulunkulu kodwa abakaze bathi akulahlwe amaphilisi. Uthe kuba wumuntu ozithathela isinqumo sokuthembela kuNkulunkulu angabe esawaphuza amaphilisi, hhayi ukuthi isonto elisuke lithe akawayeke.Ushaye ngezimfushane, wabe esecela ukufonelwa kusasa ukuze akhulume nabaphethe ibandla.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Ntokozo Maphisa uthe: "Izinsolo esizizwayo siwuMnyango ziyashaqisa futhi ziyichilo. Umthethosisekelo wezwe wango-1996, uChapter 2 ukhuluma ngamalungelo abantu angu-27, abizwa ngokuthi yi‘’Bill of Rights”. Omunye wale mithetho ukubeka kucace ukuthi bonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika banelungelo lokuthola usizo lwezempilo. Abantu siyabanxusa ukuba bangazilaleli izinkoleloze ezidusa isizwe mayelana nokudliwa kwemishanguzo yokuthithibalisa isandulela ngculazi nengculazi uqobo, ngoba ihloliwe, futhi ukusebenza kwayo kuhle kufakazelwa yisayensi.“Ukudliwa kwale mishanguzo ngendlela efanele - ngaphandle kokuphutha - kubalulekile ngoba kuqinisa amasosha omzimba, futhi kukwazi ukwenza igciwane ligcine lingasatholakali egazini. Siyacela nakubantu abadla imishanguzo yesandulela ngculazi kanye nengculazi uqobo ukuthi bakuqonde ukuthi impilo yabo incike kubo uqobo. Bangakuvumeli ukudukiswa ngabanye abantu ngezinqumo ezingabeka impilo yabo engcupheni.“

Izinhlangano ezilwela ukuthi kube nesibonelelo sabangasebenzi kuleli sezizwakalise ukukhathazeka ngohlelo lokuqinisekisa imininingwane yabahola uR370 obuwu-R350 wabangasebenzi njengoba zithi abanye bagcina sebekhishelwe ngaphandle kulolu hlelo.Lezi zinhlangano ezakhe umfelandawonye obizwa nge-Universal Basic Income Coalition (UBIC), zithe uhlelo lokuqinisekisa imininingwane lubakhiphela ngaphandle abadinga lesi sibonelelo ngoba  iningi labo alinawo amaselula anamakhamera okwenza kube nzima ukuthi baqinisekise ukuthi kuseyibo ngempela laba abaholayo.Ngeledlule Isolezwe liye labika ukuthi iSouth African Social Security Agency (Sassa) iqale uhlelo lokuqinisekisa imininingwane yabantu ukuze ilwe nokukhwatshaniswa kwemali.UMnuz Paseka Letsatsi obhekele ezokuxhumana kwaSassa waveza ukuthi kunamaqola azama ukuhlomula kule mali ngakho ukugwema lokhu iSassa icela abahola isibonelelo sabangasebenzi ukuba baqinisekise imininingwane yabo.Abahola isibonelelo sabangasebenzi baye babheke ukuthi isibonelelo sabo sesiphasisiwe yini kanti uma kuvela ukuthi iSassa ifuna baqinisekise imininingwane kufanele bakwenze lokhu.Bazobe sebethola ama-sms amabili, eyodwa ebachazela ukuthi lwenziwa kanjani uhlelo lokuqinisekisa imininingwane bese kuthi eyesibili ine-link okungenwa kuyo ukuze uqinisekise imininingwane.Okwamanje imininingwane iqinisekisa ngale ndlela njengoba iSassa ifuna kuvele ubuso bomuntu oholayo ukuze ibone ukuthi uye ngempela.UNkk Elizabeth Raiter we#Paythegrants okungenye yezinhlangano ezikwi-UBIC, uthe baningi abangeke bayihole imali yabo kaJuni ngenxa yokuthi lolu hlelo lumenyezelwe sekuhambe isikhathi futhi abaningi abanawo amaselula.Uthe yize bekuqonda ukuthi iSassa kufanele ilwe nenkohlakalo kodwa abahambisani nokuthi kukhishwe inyumbazana abantu abahola isibonelelo sabangasebenzi.Ukhale ngokuthi njengoba imisebenzi ingekho abantu abaningi sebeziphilisa ngale mali ngakho ukuphazamiseka kwezinhlelo zokuyihola kunomthelela omubi empilweni yabo.Uphethe ngokuthi bazoqhubeka nokuxoxisana neSassa ukuze kulethwe uhlelo olungeke lukhiphe inyumbazana abangenawo amaselula esimanje anamakhamera.

ILUNGU lesigungu esiphezulu kuMasipala waseThekwini, uMnuz Thembo Ntuli, ufuna umkhandlu uxhase izintombi eziya eMkhosini woMhlanga ngendlela efanayo naleyo oxhasa ngayo imicimbi yobumnandi.UNtuli uthe akulungile ukuthi umasipala uxhase ngezigidi zamaRandi imicimbi yobumnandi kodwa uhluleke ukuxhasa ngendlela eyanele izimbali zezwe eziqhamuka eThekwini ezisuke zilibangise eMkhosini woMhlanga.Lokhu ukusho ngesikhathi kuqhubeka umhlangano wesigungu esiphezulu emkhandlwini obuyizolo.Nakuba beziphume ngobuningi izintombi eMkhosini woMhlanga wakulo nyaka obusesigodlweni eNyokeni, ngempelasonto, kube nesikhalo sokuthi izintombi eziningi aziyanga emkhosini ngenxa yokweswela izinto zokuthutha.Imikhandlu eminingi kuthiwa isinciphisile isibalo samabhasi abethutha izintombi.UNtuli uthe imali efakwa umkhandlu ukuxhasa izintombi eziya eMkhosini woMhlanga ayanele.Uthe uMkhosi woMhlanga ubalulekile ekukhuliseni izintombi, wathi umkhandlu awuzuzi lutho ngokufaka izizumbulu emicimbini yobumnandi.“Isibalo sabantwana asijabulisi. Sifaka imali eningi ekuxhaseni imicimbi yobumnandi kodwa asitholi lutho ngayo. UMkhosi woMhlanga ukhuthaza izintombi ukuba zizigcine. Kubi ke ukuthi uma sekufike isikhathi sokuthi izingane ziye kozikhombisa, bese kuba nezinkinga. Lezi izingane zasemakithi ezizigcinile, akufanele ukuthi uma sekufanele ziyozibonakalisa bese kukhalwa ngezimali.”UNtuli uthe kufanele umasipala ushintshe ukwenza.“Kufanele siyilungise le ndaba. Ngiphonsela inselelo bonke abathintekayo ukuba balusukumele udaba. Nginxusa ngisho nohulumeni wesifundazwe ukuba nawo uyilungise le ndaba ngoba iyasithinta sonke.”UDkt Nomagugu Ngobese, weNomkhubulwane Culture and Youth Development Organisation, uthe ziningi izintombi ezingayanga emkhosini wakulo nyaka ngenxa yokushoda kwamabhasi.“Ukube abazali abakhiphi izimali zabo zokugcina, ngabe ziningi kakhulu izintombi ezigcina zingayanga. Uvele uthunyelwe ibhasi eyodwa ekubeni unezingane eziwu-400, bese uyaxakeka ukuthi uzozenza njani lezi ezinye. Okuxakayo ukuthi uma kuyiwa emaralini, amabhasi agunquza nabantu abathathu.”UDkt Ngobese uthe le nkinga babhekana nayo minyaka yonke.“Amaphutha maningi lapha komasipala. Kuyasho ukuthi benza into abangayithandi. Angikhumbuli ukuthi bake bayithanda le nto, bayenza ngoba nakhu bephoqelekile. Vele ke uma wenza into ongayithandi, kuzokuba namaphutha.”UDkt Ngobese ukhuthaze abazali bezintombi ukuthi bangathembeli komasipala.“Mina nje engingakuphakamisa ukuthi abazali abaqale ukuqongelela ngoJanuwari. Kufanele sikwazi ukuzimela ngoba uma uncike kumuntu uvela obala uma loyo muntu esesusa isandla.

USOLA ukuthi isikhumba esilumayo esibukeka njengesenyoka yisona esimfakela isigcwagcwa kubaqashi owesifazane waseMtubatubaUNksz Mbali Msweli (31) othi wazalwa enesikhumba esomile, esilumayo bese siyebuza bese sidala izikwele emzimbeni sibukeke njengesenyoka, yisona esidala ukuthi angaqashwa emizini yabantu.Uthi abantu abaningi bacabanga ukuthi lesi sifo siyathathelana."Sengizame kaningi ukuthola umsebenzi, kwezinye izikhathi ngiwuthole owokusebenza endlini kodwa uma sengifika umqashi athi useshintshe umqondo.“Umane athi uzobuye angibize, angabe esangibiza. Muva nje ngike ngathola ithuba lokwenza uqeqesho-msebenzi obeluzokwenza ukuthi mina nabanye ebesinabo siqashwe sibe ngonogada.“Abanye babiziwe mina angibizwanga, kulokhu kuthiwa asikaveli isikhala. Yize engekho oshilo ukuthi inkinga yisikhumba sami kodwa ngiyabona ukuthi yisona ngoba abantu besaba nokusondela eduze kwami," kusho yena.Uthe esikoleni nakhona wayefunda kanzima izingane zimcwasa. Kunesikhathi lapho aze wasizwa uMnuz Lawrence Mthombeni owake waba imeya yaseMkhanyakude owayenebala elimhlophe. Wakhuluma nezingane ngesimo sesikhumba sakhe ezitshela nokuthi asithelelani."Ubaba uMthombeni wangisiza, ezinye izingane zangemukela kodwa akuzange kuphele ukuthi ziyangesaba.“Abantu basemphakathini nabo banakho ukungibuka ngendlela ehlukile, yize ngikhulele kubo," kuchaza uNksz Msweli.Mayelana nokwelashwa uthe wagcina esekhathele ukuya emtholampilo ngoba ubenikwa i-Aqueous Cream  abebona ingamsizi.Ngo-2018 uthe wadluliselwa esibhedlela iNgwelezane waya eKing Edward, watshelwa khona ukuthi isifo anaso aselapheki. Wanikwa into yokugcoba engamphathanga kahle nayo i-Aqueous Cream. Udokotela wakhe wamyekisa yona wamnika i-Aqueous kuphela, waze waziyekela ukuyilanda ngoba ebona ingamsizi.UDokotela wesikhumba uDkt Mamello Ntsele osebenza ezibhedlela iKing Edward naseCrompton, uthe nakuba engasihlolanga lesi siguli kodwa kubukeka sengathi sineLamellar Ichthyosis, okuyisifo esiwufuzo esidala ukuthi isikhumba some ngokwedlulele." Lesi sifo asilapheki ngoba siwufuzo kodwa ikhona imithi engamaphilisi yokusilawula enikezwa iziguli ezinisaso okumele ziyisebenzise impilo yazo yonke.“Iziguli eziningi zibuye zikhathale ngoba zisuke zifuna into ezozelapha.“Ngingeluleka ngokuthi lesi siguli sibuyele esibhedlela ukuze sithole usizo njengoba kusebusika nje isikhumba soma kakhulu, siyebuza nakho okubuhlungu. Le mithi engiyishoyo isiza kuleso simo," kusho uDkt Ntsele.

ISIKOLE esikhiqize inqwaba yamaqhawe, ikakhulukazi ababhali abahlonishwa nasezingeni lomhlaba, iGcotsheni Higher Primary, sizogubha iminyaka ewu-100 sasungulwa ngendumezulu yomcimbi.Usihlalo wethimba elihlela le ndumezulu yomcimbi, uDkt Nakanjani Sibiya, uthe umgubho uzoba kulesi sikole ngoJulayi 6 kulo nyaka. “Kulo mkhosi kuzobe kumenywe bonke abake bafunda kulesi sikole, amalungu omphakathi ngokunjalo nabahlobo beGcotsheni abavela emikhakheni ehlukahlukene. Bangaphezu kuka-500 okulindelwe ukuba bathamele umcimbi.”IGcotsheni idume ngokuba yindawo okwazalelwa kuyona ababhali abayizingwazi abanjengoSolwazi uDBZ Ntuli nabanye. USibiya uthe empeleni babalelwa eshumini ababhali abadabuka eGcotsheni futhi zibalelwa ku-200 izincwadi abazibhale ngabodwana noma ngokuhlanganyela. Uthe singakhula kakhulu isibalo sezincwadi uma kubalwa nalezo abazibhale nabalobi bakwezinye izindawo. “Ngokwesibonelo nje, uPB Maphumulo usebhale amanoveli awu-11, imidlalo emide neyomsakazo ewuchungechunge ewu-14, kanti zingaphezu kuka-150 izindaba ezimfushane nemidlalo emifushane eziphume osibeni lwaseGcotsheni. Kusukela ngo1963 kuze nganeno, cishe akekho umuntu ofunde isiZulu esikoleni noma esikhungweni semfundo ephakeme ongakaze ayifunde incwadi, okungenani yombhali oyedwa waseGcotsheni”USibiya, wodumo lwencwadi ethi Bengithi Lizokuna nethi Kuxolelwa Abanjani, uthe bambalwa kakhulu abaziyo ukuthi owayeyisishoshovu somzabalazo owasocongwa ngo-1990, uMbuso Shabalala, wafunda eGcotsheni.“Wayekhaliphe ngendlela exakile umfo kaMshengu, evame ukweqiswa amakilasi athile. Sasisagcina kwaStandard 4 (Grade 6)isikole, kwathi phakathi nonyaka uthishanhloko, uMthembu wenza izinhlelo zokuba adlulele kwesinye isikole ukuze ayofunda uStandard 5 (Grade 7), nakhona wafike wabaqwaqwada nanxa wayefike phakathi nonyaka”USibiya uthe ngale kwegalelo kwezemfundo, kwezemibhalo nakwezokulwela inkululeko, likhulu neqhaza labantu abavamile nje baseGcotsheni okwathi noma bengafunde kuyaphi, kokunye bengafunde nhlobo, bakwazi ukusungula amabhizinisi anjengezitolo, ezokuthutha, ezolimo, baphemba amabandla enkolo, babalwa nezikhuthali nakwezinye izinhlaka nemikhakha.USibiya unxuse osomabhizinisi, iminyango kahulumeni nomasipala ukuba  baphonse itshe esivivaneni ukuze lo mcimbi ube sezingeni elicokeme.
