SIKHULU isililo ngokubulawa kwenyanga yaseMlaza, uMnuz Nhlanhla "Sibushebushe" Cele, obese esinde izikhawu bemhlasela.UCele wazakhela udumo olukhulu ngembiza esiza amadoda ekamelweni, iSibushebushe.Ukuduma kwale mbiza kaCele yikhona okwadala ukuthi naye agcine esebizwa ngoSibushebushe.Udutshulwe izinhlamvu eziyisithupha ekhanda esendaweni yakhe yokudayisa utshwala iYellow Lounge, eMlaza.Kuvela ukuthi wehle emotweni kwase kuqhamuka amadoda amathathu avulela ngenhlamvu ebhekise kuyena, amdubula ekhanda nasesifubeni.Abahlaseli kuvela ukuthi bathathe nemali yakhe ebilinganiselwa ku-R40 000.Uphuthunyiswe esibhedlela eMshiyeni nokuyilapho ashonele khona.Ngonyaka owedlule, bamhlasela bamdubula ngentululwane yezinhlamvu kodwa wasinda, wayolala esibhedlela.Kuvela ukuthi nakulo nyaka bazamile ukumdubula nakhona baphinde behluleka.Izolo, amalungu ebandla abekade elihola, iDwala Lokuphila, abeseqalile ukuthutheleka kubo kwa-A, eMlaza, ezobhonga emswaneni.Okuqaphelekile ukuthi sikhulu isililo kumalungu alo ngokubulawa kukaCele.Abelimisa ngesihloko elokuthi afe olwembiza achaza uCele njengomholi obeqotho ebandleni eqinisekisa ukuthi zonke izinto zihamba kahle. Ibandla abelihola linamagatsha kusona sonke isifundazwe.Umfowabo kamufi, uMnuz Thembile Cele, uthe badunguza ebumnyameni ngokuthi ngabe obani abambulele. Uthe bagqemeke engeqiwa ntwala.Uthe bakhathazekile ngokuthi ubani lo obelandela umfowabo kangaka.UCele ubedume kakhulu ngeziphrofetho zakhe ebezishaya emhlolweni. Abantu abaningi bebejwayele ukufika kwakhe bezokwenza imhlahlo njengoba ebedume ngokungashayi eceleni, egagula abantu ngamagama.Eminyakeni eyedlule, kwavela udaba lomunye umndeni ayekade ecuphe kuwona ithuna kwasa ngakusasa kubanjwe umkhunkuli.Ngaphandle kwendawo iYellow Lounge, ubephinde abe nezindlu zokuqashisa. Kuwona wonke amabhizinisi akhe balinganiselwa ku-100 abasebenzi abebaqashile. Ubenesithabathaba somuzi esikwa-Q, eMlaza.Ubengakufihli ukuthi uzifela kangakanani ngeqembu i-Inkatha Freedom Party (IFP).Waduma kakhulu nangesikhathi enze umngcwabo wenkawu yakhe, u-2 Pool ayekade eduma ngokuhlezi ehamba nayo.Njalo ngoDisemba ubethengela imindeni engu-100 igilosa yokudla. Wayevamise ukuzwakala kakhulu oKhozini nasemsakazweni Izwi LoMzansi.Ubenenqwaba yezimoto abebuye ezisebenzisele ukuhambisa amalungu ebandla lakhe.Kune-prank call ayenziwa nguKini Shandu lapho okwakuzwakala khona uCele emsabisa ngokuthi uzomthumelela ngezulu.Kwake kwabhalwa nodaba ngowesilisa waseThekwini okuthiwa wayekhala ezimathonsi ngokuthi wathenga umvusankunzi iSibushebushe kuCele, induku yakhe yama unomphele. Kuthiwa lo wesilisa wayeseze washiywa wunkosikazi wakhe ngoba wayekhala ngomyeni wakhe owayesefuna ucansi zonke izinsuku nenduku ingawi.Kwesinye isigameko, uCele wake wathukana nomkhwekazi wakhe bebanga ukuthi umkhwekazi umphuce indodakazi yakhe. Kuthiwa umkhwekazi wafika emzini kaCele wathatha indodakazi yakhe nomzukulu wabaleka nabo uCele engekho.Ushona nje, bekunecala abelihamba ebophe yena umkhwekazi wakhe efuna inhlawulo ka-R600 000. Kulelo cala waxosha ummeli wakhe isigubhukane ekhala ngokuthi wenza kancane.Endaweni yakhe iYellow Lounge wake wasungula umcimbi wabesifazane abebedansela amakhasimende akhe benqunu njalo uma kunguLwesihlanu ebusuku. Kwakufika ngisho nabefundisi bephulula izinqe zamantombzane. Kwakuba uyena uCele owayebuye apotshozele abantu ukuthi abamaphi amabandla labo bafundisi.Amaphoyisa abengakayiphenduli imibuzo athunyelelwe yona ngalolu daba.

IQEMBU loMkhonto Wesizwe Party lidlulise amazwi enduduzo emindenini yamalungu alo ashone engozini enyantisa igazi eyenzeke eSambaba, eKranskop ngoMgqibelo.Ngokwesitatimende saleli qembu, ayisithupha amalungu ashone ngesikhathi itekisi abebehamba ngayo iginqika yokheleka ngomlilo ngo-11 ekuseni.Kuthiwa amalungu eMK abelibangise KwaDakw’udunuse, eNkandla emzini womholi weqembu uJacob Zuma, emcimbini wokuhlonipha unkosikazi wakhe wokuqala uNkk Sizakele MaKhumalo Zuma.“Ngeke sikwazi ukubuchaza ubuhlungu esibuzwayo ngalesi simo esisehlele. Sidlulisa amazwi enduduzo emindenini nasezihlotsheni zabashonile.”Leli qembu lifisele abasindile ukululama okusheshayo esibhedlela.

UMCHAZE njengomuntu obenothando nobewusizo emphakathini umndeni womhluzi weSolezwe, uMnuz Mbongeni John Khuzwayo (68) oshone kungazelele muntu.Ngokusho kwelungu lomndeni, uNkk Nomusa Khuzwayo, umufi obedume ngelikaMnguni ushona nje, umndeni uvele usemanzini ngendodana yakhe, uMnuz Smanga Khuzwayo (25) oshone ngoLwesihlanu.Bobabili bashonele esibhedlela esiKwaMashu, iPixley ka Isaka Seme emva kokugula isikhashana.UNkk Khuzwayo uthe uMnguni uthathwe wushukela okhuphuke ngoLwesibili ngesikhathi kungeniswa esibhedlela uSmanga, exinwe yisisu.“Ubesondelene kakhulu ubaba noSmanga. Ngesikhathi eqalwa ukugula uSmanga, ubaba naye uvele wagula isigubhukane, ekhushukelwa ushukela,” kuchaza uNkk Khuzwayo.Uthi kumqinisile uSmanga ukugula ngoLwesihlanu, wahlelelwa ukuthi ayohlizwa, okugcine kungenzekanga, njengoba evele washona engakayiswa egumbini labahlinzwayo.“Ubaba besingakamtsheli ukuthi uSmanga ushonile njengoba eshona namuhla (esho izolo). Sicabanga ukuthi uzizwele egazini ukuthi indodana yakhe ayisekho,” kusho uNkk Khuzwayo.Uthe ubenothando oluyisimanga emndenini wakhe, athi uma ephuma emsebenzini, ababingelele ngokumoyizela uma engena ngomnyango.Uthe emphakathini ubewusizo njengoba bebeye bezwe abantu sebebonga, bethi wabasiza bexakekile.UMnguni ubengowokudabula eNhlangakazi eNdwedwe kodwa ehlala eNtuzuma.  Ushona nje, ubesesebenzele Isolezwe iminyaka eyevile kweyisihlanu.Phakathi kweminye imithombo yabezindaba ayisebenzele, iBBC, Um’Afrika neLanga.

BATHWALE izandla emakhanda, babalisa abebejutshwe yiqembu i-MK ePhalamende, okumanje banikwe izincwadi ezibaxoshayo ngemuva kwenyanga eyodwa befudukele eKapa.Amalungu angamanye awu-18 i-MK eqinisekise ukuthi iwasusile ePhalamende, athi ebese efudukile benzela ukusondezela umsebenzi omusha. Abanye bese beyekise amakhosikazi imisebenzi, bayekisa izingane ezikoleni nabo besula emisebenzini abebeyenza njengoba bebazi ukuthi bayogxila eKapa, ePhalamende.Bakhala ngabathile kuleli qembu abaxovayo, ababakhiphe ngoba befuna ukufaka izintombi zabo, izihlobo kanjalo nabangani babo. Ayisalanga ngaphandle nendodakazi yomholi waleli qembu uMnuz Jacob Zuma, uNksz Duduzile Zuma-Sambudla, abayikhomba ngenjumbane ukuthi ibhokile ekubulaleni leli qembu abalithandayo.Abanye bebengothisha, abefundisi, ababesebenza eminyangweni kahulumeni ehlukene kanti abanye abaholi bomdabu.Okubakhalisa kakhulu ngukuthi bese bethenge izimoto, bathuthela eKapa nemindeni yabo, okuyizingane kanjalo naphathina babo ababayekise nemisebenzi yabo ukuze bayoqala kabusha impilo eKapa lodumo. Leli qembu limemezele ukuthi lihoxise amalungu angu-18 ePhalamende. La malungu lithe angu-12 awo ayevele azi ukuthi azodeda inkundla emuva kokufungiswa kodwa akhetha ukuqhubeka. Ayisithupha ayengekho ngesikhathi kufungiswa ngenxa yokungaphatheki kahle nangezinye izizathu.Omunye wabaxoshiwe osuka KwaZulu-Natal okhulume neSolezwe wacela ukungavezwa, uthe ibuhlungu into ebehlele wathi akayifiseli ngisho isitha sakhe.Uveze ukuthi izindaba zokuxoshwa kwabo zibafikele besemaqeleni lapho bejutshwe khona ezifundazweni ezehlukene.“Siqale ukubona ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ukuthi sixoshiwe. Incwadi ifike ngo-Agasti 7, isuka ePhalamende iveza ukuthi iqembu lithi selihoxise ubulungu bethu. Asikaze sizwe lutho evela eqenjini mayelana nalokhu kuhoxiswa kobulungu. Sithuke soma nesixoshwe nabo ngoba besimatasa sijutshwe kwezinye izifundazwe, senza umsebenzi weqembu.” Ukhale ngokuthi usule lapho ebesebenza khona ngoba eseyosebenza ngokugcwele eKapa.“Amanga ukuthi kukhona umuntu owavuma ukufungiswa ebe azi ukuthi uzokhishwa emuva kwenyanga. Abaxova iqembu bafuna ukufaka izintombi zabo, abangani, imindeni yabo kanjalo nezihlobo zabo. Okubuhlungu ngukuthi bayalixova iqembu. Sikhulu isililo, yimbi le nto eyenziwe kubantu nguMkhonto,” kubalisa oxoshiwe.Omunye wabaxoshiwe naye ongeke avezwe, ukhale ngokuthi indodakazi kaZuma iyona eshaya amaphiko.“Iyona efaka abangani bayo ezikhundleni ezishiywe yithina. UZuma zinhlanu izikhundla abefuna ukufaka abantu azogadla ngabo abafana noBrian Molefe, Papa Penny, Lucky Montana nabanye. Siwusebenzele uMkhonto kusuka nyakenye wabunjwa. Besikhankasa ngemali yethu, sehla senyuka kuyona yonke imikhankaso kodwa manje sesikhishwa okwezinja.” Uveze ukuthi ngoLwesihlanu abaxhumanisi nabagqugquzeli be-MK eKZN bayile kuZuma eNkandla, lapho behlale khona kwaze kwahlwa, bemkhalela ngezinto eziningi ezingahambi kahle eqenjini.“Wabikelwa ngezinkinga zokungabi khona kwezinhlaka ezikhethwe ngokusemthethweni ezenza kube nabazenzela umathanda eqenjini. Ubikelwe nangendodakazi yakhe ebulala iqembu. Sekucacile ukuthi uma ngase iNkosi imkhumbule, i-MK kuyophela ngayo iyofana ne-NFP ne-Cope. Abantu bayayithanda i-MK kodwa uma izinto zenzeka kanje, bazoyiduba.” Abaxoshiwe bathe bazolinda iPhalamende lize libaxoshe.“Okwamanje sisathole izincwadi zasePhalamende, elithe asixazulule le nkinga eqenjini noma siye enkantolo. Asikafiki odabeni lokuya enkantolo ngoba sisafuna ukubonana nobaba (Zuma), simbikele. Uma uzama ukuya eNkandla uyavalelwa ngaphandle, kungasa ungangenanga wabonana nomengameli. Asifuni ukuxova iqembu ngoba siyalithanda futhi asingenanga ngopotsho noma ngomkhoshosho ngoba amagama ethu afakwa ohlwini ngendlela eqondile.” Okhulumela i-MK, uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndhlela, esitatimendini uthe lizoqhubeka lusefe ulwandle kwabangena ngomkhoshosho ohlwini lwasePhalamende futhi abahlonizi ngokubakhomba indlela.

SIBE muncu isimo, kwaqhuma isililo kumalungu emindeni nezihlobo zabayisishiyagalolunye abaqothwe amaphoyisa eDesai, eMariannhill entathakusa ngoLwesithathu.Abasolwa abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka18 no-26 iningi labo okuthiwa lalaxaza isikole, bafe ujuqu kulesi sigameko okuthiwa bebedubulana namaphoyisa.  Kuvele ukuthi bebehlalise lubhojozi izakhamuzi ezithe  liphume nobovu ngesikhathi kusabalala lezi zindaba.Ngakolunye uhlangothi, izihlobo namalungu emindeni bakhihle isililo emva kokukhomba nokuqinisekisa ukuthi abafe kulesi sigameko bayigazi labo.“Mhlawumbe umfana wami ufele ubala. Ubengayenzi le nto asolelwa kuyo, ubengayenzi,” kusho owesilisa ozichaze njengoyise womunye wabafe kufdutshulwana. Kuthe uma esondela kwabezindaba ezokhuluma nabo, wahetshezwa owesifazane othile obethi akangasho lutho. Ngesikhathi Isolezwe lifika kule ndawo kuseluvivi, amanye amalungu omphakathi angomakhelwane abasondelene nalapho kwenzeke khona isehlo, abesabuzana ukuthi kwenzekeni. Sebezwa ukuthi kukhona asebedutshuliwe abahlala endlini eseceleni komgwaqo, iningi labo liswabulukile libonga linconcoza ngomsebenzi wamaphoyisa. Iningi lemiqasho nemizi eseduzane nendawo yesigameko ibilenga izingidi, eminye isifana namanxiwa, njengoba kuthiwa abasolwa bebengongqongqoshe kule ndawo.“Kuzoke kushaye umoya.  Ukuba kuya ngami besizohlanganisa imali sishise inyama sijabulele lolu suku. Bese sethuka izanya ngoba bebegqekeza endlini, bebamba inkunzi, bedlwengula kanti bebephatha izibhamu ezinzima, besatshwa,” usho kanje omunye.Omunye ubevele ngewindi ebukela phesheya komgwaqo amaphoyisa ematasa eqoqa ubufakazi, omakhelwane bemhalalisela bethi uzoke aphumule.Ekhuluma neSolezwe, uthe ubesenezinyanga nje ezimbalwa ebuyele ekhaya abeselishiye iminyaka emithathu ngenxa yabasolwa abebezicanasela. Uthe ubelala obenyoni njengoba ebengumakhelwane walapho bekuhlala khona ababulewe. Usho lokhu nje, indawo okwakuyibhizinisi lokukhanda izimoto nomuzi kaMnuz Nguboyezizwe Ncube owayewumakhenikha owadutshulwa ngoFebhuwari  nyakenye, usuyinxiwa njengoba kuthiwa umndeni wathutha emva kokubulawa kwakhe. Kulesi sigameko kwabulawa abahlanu, okungomakhenikha ababili nabasebenzi babo abahlanu ezigamekweni ezenzeka ngosuku olulodwa emizini ekhona endaweni, ngesikhathi besebenza. Umholi womphakathi uMnuz Zama Khumalo, uthe isigameko sokubulawa komakhenikha senzeka emva kokuthi sekuzwakele ukuthi bafuna ukubiza umhlangano womphakathi ukuze kuliwe nobugebengu.“Umphakathi ufanele ukujabula. Singebhiyoze  ngokufa kwabantu kodwa ngeke ngigxeke umphakathi ngokujabula kwawo ngoba bebewuhlalise kanzima. Kwenzeka lokhu nje besisanda kubiza umhlangano womphakathi, sakhuluma nabagilwa balobu bugebengu bakhuluma  ngobuhlungu ababuzwayo,” kuchaza uKhumalo.Omunye uthe ukubulawa kwabasolwa kwenzeke kungakapheli namahora amangaki bebambe inkunzi owokufika oyilungu lomphakathi elikhonziwe, bamphuca u-R40 wakhe abeyothenga azokudla esitolo kwazise bekuwusuku lokuqala ephume ebhandeni ezile ukudla inyanga yonke ngokwenkolo yamaSulumane.UMphathiswa woMnyango wezokuThutha ukuPhepha nokuXhumana koMphakathi, uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka, uncome umsebenzi wamaphoyisa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uthe abasolwa badubule kuqala babhekisa amaphoyiseni, aphendula.“Amaphoyisa ngesikhathi efika endaweni yesehlo, angqongqoze emnyango okungesiwo, abasolwa abebekwenye indlu badubula bebhekise kuwona, aphendula ngendlela efanayo. Kufe abayisishiyagalolunye, kanti alikho iphoyisa elilimalile. Amaphoyisa athole izibhamu ezintathu ezincane nesisodwa esikhulu, kanti kusathungathwa abanye ababili okuthiwa bayingxenye yale migulukudu abasagcwele amathafa,” usho kanje.

KUBIKWA ukuthi inkinga yokucishwa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga iyona eholele ekutheni kudilizwe amakhulu abantu enkampanini ethandwa ngabaningi kuleli.ISter-Kinekor eyaziwa ngokuba sezinxanxatheleni ezehlukene kuleli ikhiphe isimemezelo sokuthi izodiliza abasebenzi abangu-236 futhi izovala ama-cinema ayisishiyagalolunye ezifundazweni ezintathu iGauteng, KwaZulu-Natal neWestern Cape.Ama-cinema azovalwa aseBayside (WC), Boardwalk (KZN), Mimosa (KZN), Shelly Beach (KZN), Cedar Square (GP), Maponya (GP), Matlosana (GP), Southgate (GP) neSterland (GP)

Sikhulu isililo ngomculi wokholo okuthiwa udutshulwe wabulawa wumyeni wakhe esesontweni ngoMgqibelo.Lesi sigameko kuthiwa senzeke eMadonde Shadani ngabo-6 ntambama.Kubikwa ukuthi umsolwa ungene emagcekeni esonto ngesikhathi ibandla lisadumisa, wadubula ephindelela umkakhe (45) waphelela endaweni yesigameko.Ngokwesitatimende samaphoyisa, umsolwa ongaziwa iminyaka yakhe, ubaleke ngeToyota Corolla e-silver grey.Okhulumela amaphoyisa aseLimpopo uColonel Malesela Ledwaba, utshele Isolezwe ngoLwesibili ekuseni ukuthi umsolwa uboshwe ngoMsombuluko ebusuku.Uthe uzinikele yena emaphoyiseni."Uzovela enkantolo kusasa (ngoLwesibili) nokuyilapho sizodalula khona igama lobulewe," kusho uLedwaba.Yize igama lakhe lingadalulwanga kodwa iZimoja ibike ukuthi umufi nguFuni Mbedzi obecula phambili eqenjini iWorship House.Leli qembu laseLimpopo elineminyaka engu-20 likhona, lisanda kukhipha i-albhamu entsha iWorship House Celebration 20 (Live at Worship House Church Limpopo, 2023).Esitatimendeni esishicilelwe kuFacebook, iqembu likuqinisekisile ukushona kukaFuni, ongomunye wabebecula phambili kulona.Lithe uqale ukucula eqenjini kusuka likhipha i-albhamu yesibili.Iqembu liphinde lahlehlisa umcimbi wokwethulwa kwe-albhamu yalo obuzoba sePitoli ngempelasonto."Usuku olusha luzomenyezelwa maduze. Siyakubonga konke ukwesekwa ikakhulukazi kulesi sikhathi esinzima esidlula kuso njengeWorship House Family."Sinxuse ukuthi kuqhutshekwe nokukhulekelwa kwemindeni ethintekayo.Abantu baphawule ekhasini leqembu bethi sengathi umoya wakhe ungaphumula ngokuthula.

KUQHUME isililo enkantolo ngesikhathi ijaji ligweba uscabha wetekisi udilikajele neminyaka engu-38 ngaphezulu ngecala lokubulala owayengumshayeli wemoto ekhokhelwa ngebanga elihambile eMbilo, eThekwini.IJaji KQ Hadebe, eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini ligwebe uSambulo Mngomezulu (38) udilikajele ngecala lokubulala uMnuz Griffits Mndeni Gumede (37).Uphinde wagwetshwa eminye engu-18 ngecala lokuduna iVW Polo empunga  kusetshenziswa indlakadla, engu-15 ngokutholakala nesibhamu nemihlanu ngokutholwa nezinhlamvu.UMngomezulu uphucwe ilungelo lokuthi aphinde aphathe isibhamu esisemthethweni ngezandla zakhe.Umshushisi u-Advocate Gugu Xulu watshela inkantolo ukuthi ababulali bakaGumede bazenza abantu abaqasha imoto kanti bafuna ukumgebenga.Sasingakathathwa nasendaweni yesigameko isidumbu sikaGumede nemoto yakhe isanda kubizwa emoyeni, waboshwa eseKwaMashu, uMngomezulu.Wayekade engaphandle ngoshwele onikezwa iziboshwa uMngomezulu eboshwa.Wayedonsa isigwebo seminyaka engu-23 ngoxhaxha lamacala okukhona kuwona awokugqekeza, ukubamba inkunzi kuhlonyiwe, ukutholakala nesibhamu nezinhlamvu okungekho emthethweni.NgoLwesihlanu, olwedlule uMngomezulu uxolisile emndenini kaGumede usenkantolo okuthe emuva kwesigwebo, umndeni walunqaba uxolo lwakhe.Eseshona emgodini ebuyela ezitokisini uMngomezulu, uvele washwiba izandla samuntu ophebeza obekukade kushiwo umndeni kamufi abebemvalelisa bekhihla isililo.Ngaphambi kwalokho ijaji lithe uMngomezulu ungumuntu ongeke aphinde ahlumeleliseke isimilo ngoba ekukhuleni kwakhe ubengena ephuma ejele ngamacala afana nagwetshelwe wona izolo.Likhale nangesihlava sokubulawa kwabenza umsebenzi ofana nokamufi lathi kuwumsebenzi wenkantolo ukubagixabeza ngezigwebo eziqinile abagila le migilingwane..“Ibhizinisi ayekulona umufi libuyisa ithemba kubantu ukuthi bazosizakala esikhathini lapho imisebenzi ingekho khona. Nsuku zonke bayabulawa abakuleli bhizinisi baphucwe izimoto zabo,” kusho ijaji.Ijaji lithe wayezenzisa uMngomezulu ecela uxolo efuna ukudatshukelwa ekubeni waqale wabambezela ukuqala nokuphothulwa kwecala ebashonisa le nale. “Waxolisa ngoba wenzela wena kungeve  kusuka ngaphakathi kuwena. Sikuphi isidingo sokubulala umuntu owayengalwi futhi engahlomile? Isenzo sakho sasiwubuqaba. Umufi ubengumuntu omncane, ethembekile futhi enakekela abantwana bakhe nomndeni. Ngenxa yesenzo sakho esimbi kwashabalala lokho. Amanxeba ayesendaweni ebucayi, nanenza isiqiniseko sokuthi akasindi,” kusho ijaji.Umufi washiya emhlabeni umndeni, izingane ezimbili nenye unina ayeyikhulelwea. Ngokwezitatimende ezifundwe enkantolo, izingane ziqhatha usizi, ziswele futhi zintula imali.Unina wengane kamufi yena, uthe washayeka phansi wavuka esibhedlela ezwa ukuthi ushonile uGumede. Uthe uGumede wayebondla, usephila ngokukhangezwa izimpahla zengane eyake yaphila ngamanzi abhoyiliwe isonto lonke iswele ubisi.Ilungu lomndeni kaGumede, elicele kugodlwe igama lalo, lithe nakuba bejabule ngesigwebo esinikezwe uMngomezulu, esibathoba amanxeba, kodwa basenemibuzo engakaphenduleki ukuthi wayebulawelani futhi baphi abanye ababulali bakhe?

ISILO uMisuzulu kaZwelithini sibumbe ikomiti elizoseluleka ngesinqumo odabeni lokuhlwithwa umbhobho kuNdunankulu kaZulu uMfundisi uThulasizwe Buthelezi, okwenziwa wuSihlalo we-ANC eKZN uMnuz Siboniso Duma.UNdunankulu kaZulu uButhelezi uthumele isitatimende ngokubunjwa kwekomiti elizobheka lolu daba oluwundabamlonyeni. UDuma wethusa abaningi ehlwitha uButhelezi umbhobho ethula iSilo emcimbini owawukwaCeza oLundi.Umcimbi okwenzeka kuwona lesi sigameko kwakungowokukhumbula iSilo uDinuzulu kaCetshwayo esakhothama eminyakeni engu-110 eyedlule. Udaba lukaDuma noButhelezi lwasabalala ezinkundleni zokuxhumana abantu bebabaza abangakaze bakubone.UButhelezi uthe iSilo siqoke ikomiti okukhona kulona inkosi uSifiso Shinga ewuSihlalo wamakhosi esifundazweni. Kukhona nenkosi uNgqayizivele Sithole eyiPhini likaShinga, inkosi Phathisizwe Chiliza eyiPhini likaNdunankulu kaZulu. Kukhona nenkosi uRussell Cebekhulu ewuSihlalo wamakhosi eKing Cetshwayo, yinkosi uZulu yakwaNgenetsheni, yinkosi uXulu eNkandla nenkosi uMpungose yesifunda iZululand. Kukhona noMntwana uVanana Zulu wendlu yaKwaMinyamanzi ongumkhuzi wamabutho kaZulu.Ekomitini kuvela negama likaMntwana uZeblon Zulu waKwaMandlakazi noMntwana uVusi Zulu waseMahhashini. UButhelezi uthe iSilo sifisa ukwelulekwa ngalolu daba nokuthi yikuphi okungenziwa ukuze kungaphindi okwenzekile.Khonamanjalo uMengameli we-IFP uMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa ubize isithangami sabezndaba eThekwini ngalolu daba. UHlabisa umemezele ukuthi usebhalele uMenagmeli we-ANC uCyril Ramaphosa ecela ukuthi athumele amalungu esigungu esiphezulu amathathu. Uthe uHlabisa nabo bazokhipha amathathu kuhlanganwe kuxoxwe.UHlabisa uthe bakhathazwa wukuthi kunemizamo yokuyamanisa i-IFP nezenzo zodlame nokuyinto engeyinhle. Uthe bazimsele ngokuthi kube nokhetho olunokuthula.

ISILO samaBandla uMisuZulu kaZwelithini, sithi size sisole ukuthi kukhona abalaya sona uma sibheka imbedumehlwana yobugebengu esifundazweni KwaZulu-Natal ezinsukwini zokubusa kwaso. ISilo sisho kanje enkulumweni yaso eMkhosini woMhlanga esigodlweni eMachobeni ngempelasonto lapho sivule isifuba ngevuso laso ngezehlakalo zokubulawa kwabantu, ukudlwengulwa kwabesifazane nezingane kanjalo nokuqhuma kwesibhamu umlibe esifundazweni. IMbube ithe okuyikhathaza kakhulu ngukuthi lesi sifundazwe yisona esihamba phambili ngalezi zinto.Sikhuze lesi sihlava sathi sekwanele, akwenziwe okuthile ngoba yisona abayogcina sebesikhomba ngomunwe ukuthi isimo saphuma esandleni ngesikhathi siseSihlalweni.“Angibulali ubuthongo. Eyokubulawa kwabantu, ukudlwengulwa kwabesifazane nezingane, kanjalo nokuqhuma kwesibhamu esifundazweni sakithi. Angazi noma ngalezi zehlakalo kuyalwa mina yini,” kusho iSilo.UMkhosi obuseMachobeni, eNgwavuma, wandulela omkhulu ozoba ngempelasonto KwaNongoma.ISilo sithe sizohlanganisa amakhanda noNdunankulu waso uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi, noNdunankulu wesifundazwe uMnuz Thami Ntuli, ngezehlakalo zobugebengu.“Kumele siyixoxe le ndaba ngoba iyangikhathaza. Umkhuzi wamaPhoyisa esifundazweni, ubaba uMkhwanazi (Lt-Gen Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi), usebenza ngokuzikhandla elwa nobugebengu,” kusho iMbube.INgonyama ithe lesi sifundazwe kumele sidume ngezinto ezinhle.“Kungani nje singadumi ngokuthi sihamba phambili ngezolimo? Noma ngabe siduma ngokuthi sihamba phambili kwezemfundo, hhayi ngobugebengu.” Sithe okugujwa kakhulu kulo nyaka ngukuphela kweminyaka engu-40 ukhona lo mkhosi. “Ngiyafisa ukuthi niqhubeke nibambisane nami njengoba benibambisene kahle noMdlokombane. Lo mkhosi namanje usekhona, okusho khona ukuthi izinhlanhla zilokhu zikhona,” kusho iMbube. UNtuli uthe ezinsukwini ezimbalwa uzobe eqeda izinsuku eziyikhulu esihlalweni sobuNdunankulu.Uthe bafike kuhulumeni imali ingekho, kanjalo lesi sifundazwe singaphansi kwesimo esibucayi. “Sifice izinga lobugebengu liphezulu okubalwa nokubulawa kwamakhosi nezingane. Anginamahloni Silo ukuthi uhulumeni wakho ubukhosi oyinhloko yabo buyingxenye yesixazululo. Ubugebengu sibufice budlangile ngaphakathi nangaphandle kukahulumeni. Sesiqalile ukubuphunga ngenhloso yokubuqeda.”Uthe baqale umkhankaso wokukhuculula abokufika kuleli abakuleli ngokungekho emthethweni oqale eThekwini.Uthe ngeke bayeke isifundazwe sibuswe yizigebengu.Uncome izintombi ebezihambele uMhlanga athe izibalo zazo zikhula minyaka yonke.“Njengohulumeni weSilo, siyazibophezela ekutheni yonke le minyaka ezayo lo mkhosi woMhlanga sizoweseka. Namuhla uneminyaka engama-40 sizowuphakamisa ufike kweminye iminyaka engu-40.”

ISILO uMisuzulu kaZwelithini sizobikela amakhosi “ngokudayiswa” kwaso yibhodi lesikhwama esigade umhlaba kaZulu, Ingonyama Trust.IMbube ibize umhlangano wamakhosi ophuthumayo ozoxoxa ngeNgonyama Trust.Ibhodi elisha leNgonyama Trust lisanda kwenza isibophezelo sokuthi ngeke liphinde likhokhele izindleko zabameli beSilo uma kunamacala athinta umbango wesihlalo sobukhosi bukaZulu.Lesi bophezelo senziwe eNkantolo eNkulu eMgungundlovu ngeledlule, ngesikhathi kulalelwe icala elifakwe uMntwana uMbonisi kaBhekuzulu, ofuna ukuthi Ingonyama Trust nohulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal bangazikhokheli izindleko zabameli beSilo.Isibophezelo seNgonyama Trust sanenga uNdunankulu kaZulu, uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi, owaze wasola ibhodi leNgonyama Trust “ngokunikela ngeSilo ezitheni”.Umhlangano wamakhosi uzoba sesiShayamthetho esidala, oNdini, ngoLwesine.UButhelezi uthe umhlangano wangoLwesine ubizwe ngesikhathi esinzima, wathi kunemizamo yokuqeda ngeNgonyama Trust.“Kunemizamo yokuphuca amakhosi umhlaba ongaphansi kweTrust, okuwumhlaba amakhosi awugadele uZulu.”UButhelezi usanda kusola uNgqongqoshe wezoLimo nokuThuthukiswa kweziNdawo zaseMakhaya, uNkk Thoko Didiza, ngokuphuca amakhosi ilungelo lokusayina izimvume zokusebenzisa umhlaba.Lezinsolo wazenza emhlanganweni we-IFP namakhosi, owawungeledlule.UButhelezi wathi lezi mvume sezizosayinwa uNkk Didiza.“Amakhosi ayazi ukuthi ukusayina amaPTO (permission to occupy) amandla amakhosi, emhlabeni wamakhosi. I-ANC isijikile esithembisweni eyasenza kuMntwana wakwaPhindangene (uMangosuthu Buthelezi) sokuthi umhlaba ongaphansi kweNgonyama Trust ngeke iwuthinte.”UNkk Didiza uziphikile lezi nsolo, wasola uButhelezi ngokudukisa abantu.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma nesiteshi sethelevishini esikhokhelwayo.UNkk Didiza uthe isinqumo sokuphuca amakhosi amandla sathathwa yibhodi elaliphethe Ingonyama Trust ngo-2016.Uthe isinqumo sebhodi saphonselwa inselelo izakhamizi zilekelelwa inhlangano iCouncil for the Advancement of the SA Constitution (Casac).“Nebala inkantolo yachitha isinqumo sebhodi. Usihlalo webhodi wangaleso sikhathi wanquma ukudlulisela phambili isinqumo. Njengamanje kunecala elingakaphothulwa eNkantolo yokuDluliswa kwamaCala. Thina silinde isinqumo senkantolo. Ngakho ke akusilo iqiniso lokhu okushiwo uButhelezi. Sithanda ukumxusa ukuthi uma kukhona izinto afuna ukuzidlulisa, alandele imigudu efanele.”UButhelezi uthe emhlanganweni wangoLwesine bazophinde bakhulume ngombuthano obizwa ngeSibaya.Lo mbuthano kaZulu wonkana uzokuba sesigodlweni kwaKhangelamankengane.

ISILO uMisuzulu Sinqobile kaZwelithini sifuna uZulu uyozikhombisa amandla  eGoli emva kokuzikhombisa eMkhosini woMhlanga obuyingqophamlando.ISilo sithe inselelo ehlalele uZulu ukuba uyozikhombisa amandla eGoli emva kokuzibonakalisa ngoMkhosi woMhlanga obuseNyokeni, ngempelasonto.Imbube ithe nakuba eGoli kunezizwe eziningi, uZulu iwona omningi kuleli dolobha eliyisizinda somnotho wezwe.Lokhu sikusho ngesikhathi sikhuluma nezimbali zezwe, izolo.Kulo nyaka bekugujwa iminyaka ewu-40 kwavuselelwa kabusha uMkhosi woMhlanga.Izintombi beziphume ngobuningi emkhosini wakulo nyaka.Imbube ithe kuzokwenziwa uMkhosi woMhlanga waseGoli lapho uZulu uzozikhombisa khona amandla.Beziphume ngobuningi izintombi zaseGoli emkhosini wakulo nyaka, kepha zakhala ngokuthi zikhishwa inyumbazane.“Ukuze siqede lezi nkulumo, kufanele siye eGoli. Nibonile ukuthi izintombi zaseGoli beziningi kanjani? IGoli linezizwe eziningi. Nathi sibaningi eGoli, eqinisweni ithina esibaningi kunabo.”ISilo sithe umkhosi wakulo nyaka uvunywe yizulu.Indlulamithi yamakhosi ithe isimo sezulu sikhombise ukuthi umkhosi wakulo nyaka uhambe kahle.Izulu beliguqubele kwaNongoma, lishaye izihlambi ngesikhathi iMbube iphuma namabutho bephuma esigodlweni beya enkundleni, nangesikhathi iSilo sikhuluma nezinkulungwane zamatshitshi abeseNyokeni.ISilo sithe isimo sezulu sikhombisa ukuthi umkhosi wamukeliwe amadlozi aseNdlunkulu.“Kusho ukuthi namakhosi amadala ayejabula. Thina balapha eNdlunkulu sizosala sibonge ukuthi umkhosi uhambe kahle. Kodwa sizojabula kahle uma sesizwa ukuthi nonke nifike niphephile emakhaya. Ngiyahlukumezeka kancane ngenxa yamaloli agcwele emigwaqweni. Ilesifunda kuphela esinale nkinga yamaloli, awekho kwezinye izifunda.”Izolo izintombi ezingu-28 zivalelise eSilweni.Lezi zintombi ezigide okokugcina eMkhosini woMhlanga njengoba sezibheke emendweni.Imbube ihalalisele lezi zintombi, yazinika izibusiso.ISilo sinxuse izimbali zesizwe ukuba ziqhubeke nokuzigcina.Imbube ifisele izintombi ezizobhala izivivinyo zokuphela konyaka ukuba zibhale kahle, saphonsela inselelo ababhala ibanga leshumi ukuba benze kahle njengoba kwenza abalapha esifundazweni ababebhala ngonyaka odlule.“Laba bangonyaka odlule benza saziqhenya ngabo. Ningavumi ukuphazanyiswa izinto eziseceleni, nihambe niqonde kahle ngoba niyazi lapho niya khona.”ISilo siphinde sazwakalisa ukukhathazeka ngobugebengu obudlangile esifundazweni.Imbube ithe ukwanda kwezigameko zokubulawa kwabantu nokuhlukunyezwa kwabantu besifazane kunika iKwaZulu-Natal igama elibi.“Yithi esihamba phambili ngalobu bugebengu ezwenikazi, angisasho ezweni. Le nto isinikeza igama elibi.”

ISILO uMisuzulu kaZwelithini sesizwakalise ukukhathazeka ngokuhoxiswa kwelayisensi yebhange Ithala njengoba sithi lokhu kuzoba nomthelela omubi kubantu abathembele kuleli bhange ukuqhuba amabhizinisi abo.Siyalele uNdunankulu kaZulu, uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi, ukuba athinte uMphathiswa wezeziMali noNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal ukuze beze nezinhlelo ezizoqinisekisa ukuthi ilayisensi yaseThala iyabuya.Sibalule ukuthi Ithala libalulekile kubantu baKwaZulu-Natal, osomabhizinisi basemakhaya nabaselokishini abazothikamezeka uma lingasavumelekile ukusebenza ngendlela ejwayelekile.Sithe Ithala yibhange elasungulwa nguNdunankulu kaZulu ongasekho, uMntwana uMangosuthi Buthelezi, ukuze lisize izizukulwane zaKwaZulu-Natal.UMnuz Wonder Jaca onguNobhala Jikelele we-Black Business Federation, uthe kuyabakhathaza ukuhoxiswa kwelayisensi yaseThala ngoba liyisikhungo esisiza abantu abamnyama ngaphandle kwemicikilisho eminingi.“Siqale ukukhathazeka ngesikhathi iSouth African Reserve Bank (Sarb) iqoka umlawuli ukuba asebenzisane neThala. Siye sakhala nangesikhathi i-Absa ingayivuseleli inkontileka yokusebenzisana neThala. Kuyasikhathaza kakhulu ukuthi manje iFSCA isihoxise ilayisensi yeThala kangangokuthi alivumelekile ukuthatha amakhasimende amasha,” kusho uJaca.Uthe sekuphele iminyaka Ithala lizama ukuthola ilayisensi yamabhange kodwa aliphumeleli.“Sicela uhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal, ikakhulukazi uNdunankulu uMnuz Thami Ntuli noMphathiswa wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho, ezokuVakasha neMvelo, uMfundisi Musa Zondi, bangenelele. Sibonile eGauteng uMphathiswa wezeziMali ehlenga iDrip okuyinkampani kasomabhizinisi omnyama. Sicela naKwaZulu-Natal uhulumeni abhalele iSarb nezinye izikhungo ezilawula ukusebenza kwebhange Ithala ukuze linikwe ilayisensi yalo.”Uthe osomabhizinisi abamnyama basizwa yiThala uma bethole umsebenzi njengoba libaboleka imali yokuqala umsebenzi.“Uma osomabhizinisi sebethole imali baye bagqugquzelwe ukuthi bavule nama-akhawunti ebhange Ithala. Ngisho ozakwethu laba abaphakela izikole baye baboleke kulo imali. Uma lingasakwazi ukuvula ama-akhawunti amasha kusho ukuthi baningi abazothikamezeka. Siyacela uhulumeni enze isiqiniseko sokuthi ilayisensi iyabuya.”Isikhulu esiphezulu sebhange Ithala, uDkt Thulani Vilakazi, sithi phansi amaphaphu kubantu ngokuhoxiswa kwelayisensi yi-FSCA ngoba lisazoqhubeka nokusebenza.“Ithala lisavuliwe futhi liyaqhubeka nokusiza amakhasimende alo. Sifisa ukuqinisekisa abantu ukuthi imali yabo iphephile futhi asikho isidingo sokuthi bazoyikhipha.”Uthe ilayisensi ihoxiswe ngoba iFSCA inganeme ngokulandelwa kwemigimo ethile ethinta imali (financial soundness reguirements).“Abathola amathenda basazoqhubeka nokusizwa Ithala Development Finance Corporation, okuyinkampani ezimele. Amakhasimende ebhange Ithala azoqhubeka nokusebenzisa ama-akhawunti awo, azoqhubeka nokukhokha ngamakhadi ezitolo nokukhipha imali ezitolo nakuma-ATMs. Ababoleke imali eThala bazoqhubeka nokuyikhokha. Imishwalense yamakhasimende ngeke iphazamiseke, konke kuzoqhubeka kahle.”Uthe iyodwa kuphela into abangavumelekile ukuyenza ngokomyalelo we-FSCA, wukuvula ama-akhawunti amasha.Ubalule ukuthi imigomo ethinta imali (financial soundness requirements) ebekwe kwisigaba 194 somthetho wezikhungo ezisebenza ngemali awulithinti Ithala njengoba lingabhalisile njengebhange ngaphansi kwesigaba 1 se-Banks Act.Uthe isinqumo se-FSCA sokuhoxisa ilayisensi yokuhlinzeka ngemali siza emuva kokuthi Ithala lingasathathwa njengesikhungo esisebenza ngendlela ehlukile kwamanye amabhange yize kunomlawuli oqinisekisayo ukuthi imali yabantu iphephile kuze kutholakale isisombululo sezihibe ezibhekene neThala.

ISILO uMisuzulu kaZwelithini sizwakalise ukungenami ngesinqumo sikahulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal sokuhoxisa isivumelwano nenyosi engumeluleki eNdlunkulu ngaphandle kokuxhumana naso. Esitatimendeni esithunyelwe ihhovisi likaNdunankulu kaZulu izolo, iNdlulamithi ithe uhulumeni wesifundazwe kawusazi nokuthi siyini iSilo. Lokhu kulandela ukunqanyulwa isigubhukane kwenkontileka yoqweqwe lwenyosi, uMnuz Buzetsheni Mdletshe. ISilo sixwayise uhulumeni ngokungahloniphi umndeni waseNdlunkulu kanye neSilo sathi kufana nokufaka uZulu umunwe esweni. Ngokwesitatimende, uMdletshe usazoqhubeka nokuhasha iNgonyama. ISilo sesiyalele uNdunankulu kaZulu, uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi, ukuthi enze isiqiniseko sokuthi uMdletshe uyaqhubeka nokwenza umsebenzi wakhe waseNdlunkulu yize esediliziwe wuhulumeni wesifundazwe.UMdletshe usebenza njengenyosi, aphinde abe ngumeluleki weMbube kwezamasiko. Ubeholelwa uhulumeni wesiifundazwe. UMdletshe uneminyaka esondela ku-50 ehasha amakhosi aKwaZulu njengoba waqala ngesikhathi kubusa iSilo uGoodwill Zwelithini kaBhekuzulu.NgoMsombuluko ihhovisi likaNdunankulu wesifundazwe sibhale incwadi ebhekiswe kuMdletshe ukuthi inkontileka yakhe izonqanyulwa ekupheleni kwale nyanga. “UMdletshe ubambe iqhaza elibalulekile emikhosini yaseNdlunkulu. Uyena ovula imikhosi engcwele, umkhosi wokugezwa owenziwa ngaphambi kokuthi inkosi entsha ingene eSihlalweni nomkhosi wokweshwama,” kusho uNdunankulu weSilo.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe, uMdletshe uthintwe isigijimi sehhovisi likaNdunankulu ngoLwesihlanu wabe esesihlangabeza emgwaqweni ngenxa yobubi bendlela ebheke ekhaya. Kuthiwa isigijimi sifike samnika incwadi yokunqanyulwa kwenkontileka ngaphandle kokuchaza okuningi, sase siyahamba. Abaningi bakholelwa ukuthi uMdletshe wazidalela amazinyo abushelelezi ngokunqaba ukulandela umyalelo kaMphathiswa wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Siboniso Duma ngesikhathi kunombango wombhobho emcimbini wokukhumbula iSilo uDinuzulu kaCetshwayo kwaCeza.Ngesikhathi uDuma eyabula umbhobho kusakhuluma uButhelezi, wayalela uMdletshe ukuba asukumise iSilo, kepha uMdletshe walandula, wathi inqubo iyamphikisa ukuthi angasukumisa iSilo ekubeni ekhona uNdunankulu kaZulu.Abeluleki beSilo, uSolwazi Jabulani Maphalala noMnuz Philani Mavundla bazwakalise ukukhathazeka ngokunqanyulwa kwesivumelwano sokusebenza sikaMdletshe. Esitatimendeni, bathe lokhu kushiya imibuzo ukuthi kungani kunqanyulwa izinto ezibalulekile kodwa kuyekwa imicimbi kahulumeni ewubukhazikhazi, okusetshenziswa kuyo imali ngezinto ezingathi shu kubalwa ubumnandi. Bathe kunzima ukungayamanisi lokhu nokunqaba kukaMdletshe ukwenza ayekuyalelwa wuDuma emcimbini wakwaCeza. Kuthintwa okhulumela ihhovisi likaNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Bongi Gwala, izolo uthembise ukuthi bazokhipha isitatimende kepha kuze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela bengakasikhiphi isitatimende.UMdletshe uthe inkontileka yakhe bekufanele iphele ngo-2025.Ngokwencwadi evela kuhulumeni ehhovisi likaNdunankulu, inkontileka izonqanyulwa ngo-Ephreli 30 futhi isizathu kuthiwa wukushoda kwemali.UMdletshe ubesewuholela ngenkampani yakhe umsebenzi awuqhuba eNdlunkulu, esesebenza njengetoho, okuwuhlelo olwenziwa ngemuva kokuthatha kwakhe umhlalaphansi ngesikhathi kusabusa uMdlokombane.UMdlokombane wacela ukuthi uMdletshe aqhubeke njengetoho, ekhala ngokuthi usamdinga eduze kwakhe. Nangesikhathi kungena iNdlulamithi, nayo yanxusa ukuthi uMdletshe aqhubeke nokusebenza ngale ndlela.

ISILO uMisuzulu Sinqobile kaZwelithini siqinisekise ukuthi uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa uzohambela umcimbi wokuvulwa komfuziselo weSilo uShaka kaSenzangakhona.Imbube ithe uRamaphosa uzokube ekhona uma sekuvulwa umfuziselo weLembe osesikhumulweni sezindiza, i-King Shaka International Airport.Lokhu ikusho ngesikhathi ikhuluma eMkhosini weLembe, obungoLwesibili, KwaDukuza.Indlulamithi yamakhosi ithe umfuziselo uzovulwa ngokusemthethweni maduze kodwa yangalusho usuku.“Ngiyafisa ukuthi Zulu niphume ngothi lwenu njengoba lo mcimbi uzokube ubukwa umhlaba wonke njengoba nazi nje ukuthi kuthiwa i-King Shaka International, ingesinye sezikhumulo sezindiza ezibalulekile.”Ngeledlule Isolezwe  libike ukuthi sekulindwe iSilo ukuba simemezele usuku lokuvulwa komfuziselo.Bekunethemba lokuthi umfuziselo weLembe uzovulwa ngaphambi komkhosi wayizolo, kodwa kwagcina kungenzekanga.Sekuphele isikhathi eside kulindwe ukuthi kuvulwe umfuziselo weLembe owakhiwa kabusha.Kuzovulwa lo mfuziselo owakhiwe kabusha nje, owokuqala wakhishwa emva kokuba iSilo esesakhothama, uGoodwill Zwelithini kaBhekuzulu, sikhonondile.UMdlokombane wakhala ngokuthi umfuziselo wezigidi zamaRandi uveza Ilembe njengomfana wezinkomo njengoba livela limi eduze kwezinkomo, wakhala nangokuthi umkhonto owawusezinyaweni zeLembe wawukhombisa ukuphosa ithawula.Kubikwa ukuthi umfuziselo omusha ungu-12m ubude.Umfuziselo wokuqala wabiza u-R3, 2 million, akukaziwa ukuthi ukwakhiwa komusha kubize malini.Ngonyaka owedlule, kwaba nemizamo yokuvula umfuziselo ngosuku olwandulela uMkhosi weLembe wangonyaka owedlule, kepha umcimbi wabuye wabhuntsha ngemizuzu yokugcina.Ngesikhathi kubhuntsha umcimbi, indlunkulu yakhala ngokuminyana kwemicimbi eyayenzeka ngoSepthemba, njengoba iminingi imikhosi yasendlunkulu eyenzeka ngenyanga yamagugu.

ISILO uMisuzulu Sinqobile kaZwelithini sithi sisazoqhubeka nokushaya ngamafishane uma sikhuluma nesizwe.Sikusho lokhu ngesikhathi sikhuluma eMkhosini waMaganu, obusesigodlweni eMachobeni, ngoMgqibelo.Kulo mkhosi iSilo siphinde sakhuluma imizuzu engaphezudlwana kweyishumi.Nangeledlule iSilo sakhuluma isikhathi esingaphezudlwana kwemizuzu eyishumi ngesikhathi sivula ngokusemthethweni isiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal.Lokhu kwaholelela ekutheni kube namaqembu ezepolitiki aphakamisa ukuthi umcimbi wokuvulwa kwesiShayamthetho ube usuku olulodwa.Lama qembu akhala ngokuthi iningi imali emosheka ngokuthi umcimbi ube izinsuku ezimbili.ISilo sitshele abebehambe umcimbi wangempelasonto ukuthi asisiboni isidingo sokuthi sikhulume isikhathi eside ngoba iSilo esesakhothama, uGoodwill Zwelithini kaBhekuzulu, sakhuluma kwanela.“Angithandi nina beSilo ukwanda kakhulu ngamagama. Ngiyaye ngithi ubaba wami, uMdlokombane, kwakushona ilanga ekhuluma nani. Wakhuluma kwanela. Asikho isidingo sokuthi ngikhulume nani, ngizolokhu nginikhumbuza nje ukuthi wathini.”Enkulumweni yaso iSilo sibonge amakhosi, izinhlaka zikahulumeni, nabanye abenze ukuthi umcimbi ube impumelelo.Isiphakamiso sokuthi umcimbi wokuvulwa kwesiShayamthetho ube usuku olulodwa uqhubekile nokususa umsindo ngesikhathi kuqhubeka umcimbi.Undunankulu kaZulu, uMfundisi Thulasizwe Buthelezi, uphume iqhubu nosihlalo we-ActionSA KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Zwakele Mncwango, emsola ngokuphusha umkhankaso wokuthi iSilo singabe sisasivula isiShayamthetho.UMncwango watshela abezindaba ukuthi asikho isidingo sokuthi umcimbi ube izinsuku ezimbili.Waphakamisa ukuthi iSilo asifike sikhulume ekuseni, bese emini kukhuluma undunankulu wesifundazwe.UButhelezi uthe abantu abaningi bakhombisa ukuyithakasela inkulumo yeSilo, wathi kwamumangaza ukuzwa uMncwango egxeka. “Kuyamangaza ukuthi lapha kwithelevishini nasemaphepheni nina beSilo bese kukhuluma uMnuz Zwakele Mncwango weqembu i-ActionSA, ethi akuvalwe ukuthi iSilo sivule iPhalamende. Ngabe sengimangala, ngazibuza ukuthi uMncwango ungubani ukuba angavala iSilo ukuba sizovula isiShayamthetho. “Abamjwayele uMncwango abasondele kuye, bakhulume kahle naye eduze bamtshele ukuthi zikhona izindaba ezinkulu kunaye, okungafanele azikhulume. Kuyini ukuthi athi iNgonyama ayivalwe, athi kumoshwa imali?”UMncwango ubize isithangami nabezindaba namhlanje lapho ezoziphendulela khona.

ISilo uMisuzulu kaZwelithini sizothumela abakhongi ukuba bayosicelela ubuhlobo obuhle ebukhosini bakwaMyeni, eJozini.Ithimba labakhongi beSilo lizokuya komemeza kwaMyeni, ngeSonto.ISilo sizothatha imbali yakwaMyeni, uNomzamo Myeni, ukuba ibe undlunkulu.Izindaba zokuthunyelwa kwabakhongi zimenyezelwe undunankulu kaZulu, uMfu  Thulasizwe Buthelezi, emhlanganweni obusesigodlweni kwaKhangelamankengane ngoLwesibili ntambama.Kulo mhlangano bekukhona amakhosi nabantwana baseNdlunkulu nabanye osopolitiki naso iSilo.ISilo sicele indlunkulu ukuba isiphelezele uma abakhongi seboyosicelela ubuhlobo obuhle.“Nina beSilo iNgonyama ithi anginazise ukuthi isithole imbali ngapha ebukhosini bakwaMyeni. Ngakho ibithi anginicele baNtwana ukuba niyiphelezele iyolobola le mbali esiyitholile yakwaMyeni,” kusho uButhelezi. Ithimba labakhongi beSilo kulindeleke ukuthi liholwe abantwana basendlunkulu abadala, kulindeleke namabutho.Ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, akukho okutheni okubhalwe uNksz Myeni emakhasini akhe.Amakhasi kaNksz Myeni amathathu akwiFacebook agcwele izithombe ezindala, esokugcina esango-2021.Uzichaza njengomsebenzi wasebhange, aphinde aveze ukuthi wafunda eMfolozi Tvet College.Umthombo wasendlunkulu uthe sekuneminyaka iSilo sithandana noNksz Myeni.“Ngiqale ukwazi ngothando lwabo cishe esikhathini esiyiminyaka emibili eyedlule uma ngingaphosisi. Into yabo ibifihliwe, ababaningi endlunkulu abebazi ngayo.”Umthombo uthe iSilo siqale ukuthandana noNksz Myeni ngesikhathi esasebenzela elinye lamabhange egatsheni eliseJozini.“Ugcine esesebenza ehhovisi leSilo, angazi kahle ukuthi ubenzani.”ISilo sinondlunkulu ababili, uNtokozo Mayisela noNozizwe Mulela waseSwatini.ISilo nondlunkulu uMayisela babhala ngo-2021, emva kokutshalwa kwendlovukazi ezala iSilo, uShiyiwe Mantfombi Dlamini Zulu.Ngawo u-2021 iSilo sabe sesithumela abakhongi kwaMayisela, eNewcastle.Kuthiwa iSilo salobola ngezinkomo zoboya eziyisishiyagalombili no-R50 000. Sabe sesihambisa umembeso ngo-2022.Yize iSilo nondlunkulu uMayisela babhala ngo-2021, kwase kuneminyaka bethandana.Bahlangana ngo-2009, emshadweni kaMntwana uBukhosibemvelo, ongudadewabo weSilo. Banabantwana ababili, uLwandle noMandulo.Ngo-2022 iMbube yalobola undlunkulu uMulela.Kuthiwa iSilo nondlunkulu uMulela basuka kude, njengoba kuthiwa baqala ukuthandana ngesikhathi iSilo sisafunda eSwatini.Ngonyaka owedlule kuvele imibiko yokuthi iSilo nondlunkulu uMulela abasaboni ngaso linye.Ngesikhathi kunalamahlebezi, iSilo sasimeqa undlunkulu uMulela uma sibingelela abahambele imicimbi yasendlunkulu.Mumva nje undlunkulu uMulela akasabonakali emcimbini yasendlunkulu.

INGONYAMA yaMabandla wonke uMisuzulu kaZwelithini, iyalele zonke izinduna emahostela ukuthi zibike uma kunemizamo yokudala uthuthuva emphakathini, lwenziwa abangayamukeli imiphumela yokhetho.Isilo siyishayele ihlombe inhlangano eyengamele ukhetho i-Independent Electoral Commission (IEC), ngokuqinisekisa nokuhlela ukhetho olukhululekile futhi olunemiphumela eyiqiniso.“Isilo sincoma wonke amaqembu ezepolitiki ngendlela aziphathe ngayo enokuthula ngesikhathi kunkankaswa nangosuku lokuvota,” kusho uNdunankulu kaZulu, uMfundisi Thulasizwe Buthelezi esitatimendeni.Isilo sinxuse abezomthetho ukuthi babhekane nabazama ukudala uthuthuva ngemuva kokhetho.Sithe siyathemba ukuthi bonke abaholi bamaqembu bazozibophezela ekuhlonipheni imiphumela yokhetho futhi babambe iqhaza ekugqugquzeleni ukuthula nozinzo.Imiphumela imenyezelwe eMidrand, ngeSonto ebusuku naphezu kwezikhalo zamaqembu.I-MK namanye amaqembu angu-26 esewonke athumele i-IEC incwadi yabameli ebiyalela ukuthi ungaqhubeki umcimbi wokumenyezelwa kwemiphumela kuze kulungiswe izikhalazo.

ISilo uMisuzulu Sinqobile kaZwelithini sizogcoba iNkosi yaseMbongobongweni, uMzamo Buthelezi, ngoLwesihlanu.Umcimbi wokugcoba uButhelezi uzokuba seMbongombongweni.UMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu KwaZulu-Natal, oholwa uNdunankulu kaZulu, uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi, ukhiphe isimemo somcimbi.UMnyango uchaze umcimbi wangoLwesihlanu njengengqophamlando.UButhelezi uwuNgqongqoshe woMnyango weziSebenzi zikaHulumeni nokuPhatha, uphinde abe iPhini likaMengameli we-IFP.Ubaba omncane wenkosi, uBukhos'abuhawukelwa Buthelezi, uthe sebelala bengalele, njengoba kulungiselelwa usuku olukhulu."Lolu usuku oluyingqophamlando esizweni sakwaButhelezi. Kuzokwenzeka into engakaze yenzeke. Sibona sengathi kujabula ngisho imvelo. Ngingasho ukuthi amalungiselelo ahamba kahle ngakuthina.'UBukhos'abuhawukelwa uthe balindele ukuthi umcimbi uhanjelwe abantu abaqhamuka ezindaweni ezahlukene."Uma uzokhumbula kahle isizwe sakwaButhelezi sahlakazeka ngesikhathi sezimpi. Kukhona abasoPhongolo, abaseJozini, abaseMtuba nabaseDumbe. Ibo bonke labo bantu esibalindele ukuthi befike."UBukhos'abuhawukelwa uthe umcimbi wokugcotshwa kwenkosi kufanele engabe kade wenzeka kusaphethe iSilo uGoodwill Zwelithini kaBhekuzulu."Inkosi kade yahlonzwa, saze sageziswa izandla iSilo uMdlokombane. Ziningi izinto eziphazamisile njengakho ukuvela kobhubhane iCorona, umcimbi walokhu uhlehla. Siyathokoza ukuthi ekugcineni umcimbi uzogcina wenzekile."UBukhos'abuhawukelwa uthe kubajabulisile ukuqokwa kwenkosi kwiKhabhinethi likaMengameli, uCyril Ramaphosa."Lena into enkulu lapha esizweni sakithi ikakhulukazi ngoba inkosi yethu icoshe leli thuba, ikakhulukazi ngoba inkosi yethu iselula, ineminyaka engu-47."Njengoba umsebenzi wokuba ungqongqoshe udinga isikhathi esiningi, uBukhos'abuhawukelwa uthe uButhelezi ubengakacacisi ukuthi uzoqoka umuntu ozombambela ubukhosi noma uzozibambela.Umsunguli we-IFP, iNkosi Mangosuthu Buthelezi, wayebanjelwe ubukhosi ngenxa yokuba matasa ngezinto zepolitiki."Inkosi iyona ezonquma, kusekusha ukuba sengingaphawula ngalokho."Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kokhulumela iHhovisi leSilo, uMntwana uSimphiwe Zulu, ayizange iphumelele njengoba ucingo lwakhe belukhala lungabanjwa.UButhelezi waqokelwa kwesiPhini likaMengameli we-IFP ngo-2012.Kwakungokokuqala ukuba kube nalesi sikhundla kwi-IFP.Uke waba ilungu lesiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal, waba imeya yomasipala wesifunda iZululand, ngaphambi kokuthi abe ilungu lePhalamende. UButhelezi uchazwa njengenothando lokongiwa kwemvelo nokuthuthukiswa kwamabhizinisi amancane.

SIBUYELE kwesijwayelekile isimo engojeni yezinkulungwane zabantu bakuleli iDragon City eGoli kulandela imizamo yamaphoyisa yokukhuculula kule ndawo ngoLwesithathu.Ithimba lamaphoyisa lisebenza ngokubambisana nabaseshi bophiko lweCommerce Crime, Gauteng Crime Prevention Wardens, neBrand Protectors, lukhiphe incwadi egunyaza ukuseshwa nokushaqa okuhlosiwe eDragon City ngokuhambisana nemigomo yoMthetho wezMpahla zoMgunyathi.Ngokusho kwamaphoyisa, lena ngenye yezindlela abazama ngazo ukulwa nokuhwebelana ngezimpahla zomgunyathi nezingekho emthethweni eGauteng. “Ube yimpumelelo umsebenzi wethu njengoba kushaqwe izimpahla zomgunyathi ezingu-5,800 zenani lika-R2.4 mil. Kwaboshwa umsolwa obandakanyeka kulesi senzo esingekho emthethweni kanti uzobhekana necala eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseGoli.”

UMHOLI weqembu elivota ne-ANC kuMasipala waseThekwini, i-ABC, uMnuz Philani Mavundla, uthe isimume emphinjeni eyokubheda kwezinto kulo mkhandlu.UMavundla uthe uma izinto zingalungiswa ngokushesha, bazohoxa esivumelwananeni sokusebenzisana ne-ANC.Lokhu ukusho ngesikhathi ekhuluma nabezindaba, lapho kumenyezelwe khona ukuthi uzomela i-ABC embangweni wesikhundla sikandunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal okhethweni lwangoMeyi.UMavundla uyena owasindisa i-ANC ngesikhathi kukhethwa okokuqala ubuholi bomkhandlu, futhi i-ABC iyaqhubeka nokusindisa abaholi be-ANC uma kuneziphakamiso zokungabethembi ubuholi babo.UMavundla uthe lokhu kuzophela maduze uma i-ANC ingashintshi ukwenza.Ukhale ngomthelela wesiteleka sabasebenzi esidonse isikhathi eside, nathe kuze kwasiza ukungenela kukamengameli weCosatu, uNksz Zingiswa Losi, ukuze uphele.“Le nto ibingeke yenzeke ukube bengisekhona eThekwini ngoba ngangingakubalekeli ukukhuluma nabaholi bezinyunyana.”UMavundla, oyiMeya kaMasipala waseMvoti, uthembise ukudala amathuba emisebenzi, ukulungisa ingqalasizinda yamanzi, imigwaqo, ezemfundo, ezempilo, ezokuphepha, nokulwa nendlala.“Sikholelwa ekutheni ukuxazulula lezinkinga kuzokhulisa umnotho, kuqede indlala nokusweleka kwamathuba emisebenzi. Izinkinga ezikhungethe iKwaZulu-Natal zidinga ukuxazululwa ngokushesha.”UMavundla uthe bazochaza kabanzi ngamaqhinga abo uma sebethula umqulu wezethembiso, ngenyanga ezayo.“Umqulu wezethembiso sizowuthula ngendlela ehlukile. Umqulu sizowethula eDurban Station. Kuzobe kunengoma, nemvunulo. Kuzobe kunabaholi bomdabu. Umqulu uzokwethula ngo-Ephreli 13.”UMavundla uthe bakhethe umcimbi ukungawenzeli enkundleni enkulu ngoba iningi ligcina ligcwala olwandle, lingabe lisazilalela izinkulumo.“Thina sizokwenza umcimbi wentsha ebhishi, ngo-Ephreli 20. Siyibonile le nto yaseMabhida ukuthi abantu bagcina sebeya olwandle. Ingakho sizoya olwandle. Imibiko isikhombisa ukuthi mhlawumbe u-90% wabantu abebekule micimbi ebiseMabhida, abazange bazizwe izinkulumo.”UMavundla, oke waveza eyokuthi bazosebenzisana neqembu elikhankasela owayengumengameli, uJacob Zuma, uMkhonto weSizwe, uthe bazongenela ukhetho ngokuzimela.“IMK iyizingane kuthina, iyona okufanele engabe iguqa kuthina. Njengamanje thina sinezimeya, bona abanazo. Kuyenzeka kwesinye isikhathi ukuthi ingane izalwe kamumva kunawe, bese kuba ukuthi inomzimba omkhulu. Angisho ukuthi ngiyabeya, kodwa iqiniso ukuthi okwamanje thina sibakhulu kunabo. Indaba yabo siyoyibona emva kokhetho.”UMavundla uthe akanalo uvalo lokuthi umbango wangaphakathi kwi-ABC uzophazamisa umkhankaso wabo wokhetho.Kunohlangothi kwi-ABC olwaxosha uMavundla, kunecala eliseNkantolo eNkulu eMgungundlovu.“Labo bantu bazisukelwa ubushinga, base becabanga ukuthi bengasiphuca i-ABC. Iqiniso ukuthi njengoba kukade kubhaliselwa ukungenela ukhetho, imina engibhalisile. Kuyaziwa ukuthi imina umholi we-ABC.”

SESIPHELILE isikhathi sokuthi umuntu wesifazane ukhuliselwa ukuthi agane nakho okugcina kumdalela izinkinga zokuthi kunabantu abacabanga ukuthi ukulobola kusho ukuthenga.Lokhu kushiwo iPhini likaNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha, uMnuz Mkhuleko Hlengwa ngesikhathi ekhuluma emhlanganweni wokubonisana nokubheka indima eklanywe umunxa wamabhanoyi ekuqinisekiseni ukulingana ngokobulili emisebenzini ekhona kulo mkhakha, iNational  Aviation Gender Summit, ebiseThekwini.Uthe lo mhlangano uyingxenye yokuqhubeka nomkhankaso wokulinganisa abesifazane nabesilisa kulo mkhakha owaqala ngo-2018, ngesikhathi  lolu phiko luqala ukuba nesigcawu esinjengalesi."Kulo mhlangano sizobheka ukuthi iziphi ezinye izindlela esingazenza ukuze siqhubeke nomgqigqo omuhle. NgokweWorld Economic Forum kungathatha iminyaka engu-102 ukuthi sikwazi ukuvala igebe elikhona phakathi kwabantu besifazane nabesilisa. Yize kunocwaningo olunjalo thina sibheka ukuthi yini esingayenza ezokwenza ukuthi sisheshe sifinyelele lapho kumele sifike khona. Siyabonga ukuthi kulolu phiko kuningi osekwenziwe njengoba sibona abantu besifazane bebaningi ezikhundleni zokuphatha, ukuze kuphume lokhu kucabanga ukuthi kunemisebenzi ethile abesifazane abangayenza.  Ezinye zezindlela zokucabanga ziholela ekutheni abantu besifazane bagcine sebehlukumezeka ngenxa yelobolo,"  kusho uHlengwa.UNkk Poppy Khoza owumqondisi wesikhungo esilawula amabhanoyi, iCivil Aviation Authority, uthe sekusele iminyaka eyisithupha ngaphambi kokuthi kufike u2030 lesi sikhungo esizibekele ukuthi ngawo abesifazane abasezikhundleni babe sebelingana nabesilisa kube u50/50."Senza kahle uma ubheka ukuthi lesi sikhungo sineminyaka engu-28 kuphela. Uma sikwaze ukushintsha izinto ngale minyaka, iminyaka engu-102 iyofika kade salungisa," kusho uNkk Khoza.Uthe abesifazane abanamalayisensi okushayela amabhanoyi bangu-1 590 kwabesilisa abangu-11 000. U-45% wabesifazane abasezikhundleni zokuphatha, ophikweni olubhekele ukugcinwa komthetho uthe bangu-37.1% , abaphethe ebhodini lokuphatha  kulesi sikhungo bangu-52%.Uthe ngokubona kwakhe enye inselelo ekhona ukuthi umuntu uma ecabanga wona ucabanga ukushayela ibhanoyi kanti ziningi izinto ezikhona ezingahambisana nomkhakha awufundele okungadingeka ukuthi ashintshe kancane abhekele wona.“ Uma uwummeli uyakwazi ukwengeza ngezifundo ezithile ukuze ubhekele amabhanoyi kanjalo neminye imikhakha. Okudingeka ukuthi abantu besifazane bakwenze ukufunda izifundo ezilingana nephakethe labo. Ngiye ngithi uma ukwazi ukukhokha imali yokugibela ungakwazi ukufundela ikhono elithile elingakungenisa kulo mkhakha,”  kusho uNkk Khoza.

KUYAQHUBEKA eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini ukukhishwa kwesinqumo ecaleni likanesi osolwa ngokuthenga izinkabi okuthiwa zabulala umyeni wakhe owayewunjiniyela ePinetown.Ijaji elibambile, uSolwazi Bonke Dumisa liqale ngokuthi libuyekeze okwashiwo ofakazi boMbuso abayisithupha.Uvele wakhihla isililo uNksz Zodwa Langa ongudadewabo kamufi ngesikhathi uDumisa ethinta ubufakazi abethulela inkantolo phambilini.Uze waduduzwa amalungu omndeni wakhe afike nawo enkantolo bezokwethamela icala.Bekukhona nezihlobo ebezizokweseka abamangalelwa okungoMnuz Nkosinathi Zungu nodadewabo kankosikazi kamufi, uNksz Nompumelelo Goncalves.Abamangalelwa bathweswe icala lokuthumba nelokubulala okuhleliwe uMnuz Nkosi Tommy Langa owayewunjiniyela eTransnet ngoSpthemba 2020.Kukhona nelokuphangwa kweveni kaLanga, i-Isuzu X Rider,ngendlakadla, namabili okuphazamisa ukusebenza kwengalo yomthetho.Ebufakazini uDumisa asebuthintile kukhona nobukaMnuz Siyabonga Mbedu.UMbedu wayengumuntu wesithathu ukuba adayiselwae iveni eyayingadayiseki kanti uzoshiya umazisi wakhe phakathi owatholwa amaphoyisa eMgungundlovu kule moto eyayishiywe dengwane.Kubikwa ukuthi awuthatha umazisi acinga ngawo uMbedu owafonelwa wabizelwa esiteshini samaphoyisa sasePinetown lapho afike waboshelwa khona.Kuvela ukuthi wabe esechaza konke ayekwazi ukuthi uLanga ubulewe walahlwa ehlathini aoZwathini, eNdwedwe. Amaphoyisa kuthiwa abe esethungatha futhi abopha abathintekayo.Omunye wabantu ababoshwa umngani kaZungu, uJames Mashudu Mthimkhulu. Walivuma icala wagwetshwa wase ephendula ufakazi woMbuso ezininda yena nabamangalelwa.

INKANTOLO eNkulu yaseThekwini izonquma ngekusasa lowesilisa othweswe amacala ayisikhombisa okukhona kuwona awokudlwengula izingane zakhe ezimbili nokubulala unina wazo.IJaji elibambile uKevin Gounden kulindeleke ukuthi lahlulele emacaleni uMbuso owathwese ummangalelwa.Bekulindeleke ukuthi uGounden asikhiphe ngesonto eledlule isinqumo kodwa wase ekuhlehlisa uMsombuluko ekhala ngokuthi akakulungeli ukwahlulela.Ummangalelwa uthweswe amacala amane okudlwengula, elokubulala, elokuzama ukubulala nelokushaya. Ugcinwe ezitokisini njengoba anqatshelwa ibheyili.Ababeyizinqandamathe kuthiwa baqala ukuhlala ndawonye eMlaza ngo-2009, bafudukela KwaNyuswa ngo-2016. Laba ababili bebenezingane ezintathu.Kuvela ukuthi phakathi konyaka u-2014 no-2016, ngesikhathi umndeni usahlala eMlaza, ummangalelwa wayejwayele ukuya kwenye yezingane zakhe eyintombazane ngesikhathi igeza.Usolwa ngokufike akhuhle umphambili wakhe esithweni sayo sangasese ayesithinta nangeminwe yakhe.Kubikwa ukuthi umufi (unina wezingane) wayesuke engekho ekhaya ngalezo zinsuku.Nangesikhathi sebehlala KwaNyuswa, kusolakala ukuthi wayesenza isikhathi sokuthi abe yedwa nengane (umgilwa) aqhubeke nemigilingwane yakhe.“Baya ngokuba muncu ubudlelwano phakathi kwalezi zithandani ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, okwakudalwa indlela ummangalelwa ayesesondelene kakhulu ngayo nomgilwa. Ummangalelwa usolwa ngokuthi wayesemshaya futhi emthuka umufi,” kusho uMbuso.UMbuso, oholwa u-Advocate Thabani Buthelezi, usola ummangalelwa ukuthi ngoMeyi 10, 2022, ukuthi waqhasabula ngezimpama umgilwa emsola ngokubuya emuva kwesikhathi emsebenzini emsola ngokuthi kade esesokeni.Phakathi kwamabili ngoMeyi 11, 2022, kusolakala ukuthi ummangalelwa wayenga umufi ngokuthi ambizele ehlathini elingaphandle komuzi wabo, lapho afike amshaya khona ngokuthile amahlandla amaningi wagcina eshona.“Emuva kwalokho, wabaleka endaweni yesigameko, wabizela ngaphandle enye yamadodakazi akhe waya nayo ehlathini lapho afike wayidlwengula khona. Emuva kwalokho wayishaya, wakhipha ummese wazama ukuyigwazwa kodwa wehluleka. Indodakazi yaphunyuka yase ibalekela endlini,” kuchaza uMbuso.Kuthiwa isidumbu sikamufi sacingwa satholakala ehlathini, lapho ummangalelwa wayengasabonwa nangalukhalo. Kubikwa ukuthi ummangalelwa wagcina etholakele wabe esekhalelwa amasongo kaSigonyela.

AZIBUYELE emasisweni, ingane yakho akube ngeyami, neyami kube ngeyakho.Lokhu kungahle kulekelele ekutheni kunqandwe isihlava sokuhlukunyezwa kwezingane, kwephulwe amalungelo azo okubukeka sekuphenduke insakavukela eNingizimu Afrika.Izingane kumele zifundisweIzigameko zokuhlukunyezwa kwezingane kubikwa ngakho nsuku zaphuma ikakhulukazi ezisuke zishayiwe, zidlwenguliwe, zithunjiwe, zidayisiwe ezinye ziyabulawa imbala.UMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi eNingizimu Afrika usanda kudalula ukuthi zingu-250 izingane ezishiywe dengwane ngonyaka odlule.Kuvela nokuthi ukuphulwa kwamalungelo ezingane kwenziwa kakhulu abantu abasondelene nazo, nokumele ngabe bangabavikeli bazo.Isikhulu esiphezulu kwiNelson Mandela Children’s Fund, uDkt Linda Ncube-Nkomo ukhombe ngenjumbane abantu emiphakathini wathi bayihlaba indaba yokuvikela izingane.Ekhuluma neziko labezindaba iNewzroom Afrika uthe kuzwisa ubuhlungu ukuthi izingane zihlukunyezwa emakubo.Uma ingane ingaphephile kubo, ihleli nabantu okumele bayivikele, bayondle futhi bayikhulise, wubani ozoyivikela emphakathini?,” kubuza lesikhulu.Siqhuba sithi ingane kumele ikhuliswe wumphakathi wonke, ngakho-ke uma kunengane elahlekayo, wonke umuntu akayibheke. UDkt Ncube-Nkomo uthe uma kunengane esuke ilahlekile emphakathini, ukhona umuntu osuke azi ukuthi ikuphi.Uxwayise ngokuthi uma kuqhubeka ngendlela okwenzeka ngayo manje, lezingane zizoba ngabantu abadala ngomuso, zenze izinto ezinesihluku ngoba zikhule zingawazi amalungelo azo nemithetho ezivikelayo.Indaba esematheni eyokuduka kukaJoshlin Smith oneminyaka eyisithupha waseDiazville, eSaldanha Bay, eWestern Cape.Unyamalale ngoFebhuwari 19, kuze kube manje usacingwa akakatholakali. Okuthuse abaningi ukuthi unina kaJoshlin, uNksz Kelly Smith ungomunye wabasolwa abane ababoshiwe.Kamuva kutholakale isidumbu sikaLusanda Nkomo obeneminyaka engu-10 owayebikwe ukuthi ulahlekile ngoMashi 17, kwaboshwa owesilisa ongumakhelwane wakhe eMkhomazi.Isidumbu sikaLusanda kuthiwa satholwa ngumelusi wezinkomo futhi sihlubule, kwavulwa icala lokubulala nelokudlwengula.Kubukeka kuyinkombankombane phakathi kwahulumeni nabantu emphakathini ngokuthi ubani okumele abe sekhaleni ekuvikeleni izingane.Uphiko oluyinhlanganisela yeminyango kahulumeni ebhekele ukuvikela nenhlalo yomphakathi, lusanda kuzwakalisa ukukhathazeka kwalo ngalesi sihlava.“Sikhathazwa amacala avulwayo okuthumba noma ukulahleka kwezingane ezinye ezibulawayo. Siyagcizelela ukuthi ngeke silubekezelele udlame olubhekiswe ezinganeni,” kusho uphiko.Okhulumela uMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mhlaba Memela uthe kuwumsebenzi wawo wonke umuntu emphakathini ukuvikela ingane.“Sonke siwumphakathi kumele sibambisane ekulwisaneni nokuhlukunyezwa kwezingane futhi siqinisekise ukuthi amalungelo azo ayahlonishwa.“Kuqala ekhaya ukuvikelwa kwengane. Kumele bafundise ingane yomfana neyentombazane ngendlela efanayo,” kusho uMemela.Ukhuthaze abantu emiphakathini ngokunakekela izingane, noma ngabe uyifica ikusiphi isimo, wena njengomuntu omdala kumele kube semahlombe akho ukuthi uyinakekele ingane.Uthe kuyishwa ukuthi isikhathi esiningi abantu abadala yibona kanye abahlukumeza izingane. Bayazama bewuhulumeni ukuthi izingane zivikelwe, kodwa bawudinga umphakathi ngokungabafihli abazihlukumezayo.Uhlabe abafihla abahlukumeza izingane emphakathini wathi abenzi ubuntu.Uhulumeni usanda kunxenxa amaphoyisa ukuthi awangabi madolonzima uma ebikelwa ngala macala athinta izingane nokuthi umphakathi usebenzisane nawo.Ngakolunye uhlangothi amaphoyisa akhiphe amathiphu okuvikela izingane:Ingane mayitshele umzali uma kunento eyenza isabe noma ingazizwa kahle.Kuyalwe ingane ukuba ingamtsheli umuntu engamazi igama layo nalapho ihlala khona.Ingane akumele idlale yodwa ngaphandle kwakubo noma ezindaweni zomphakathi.Uma kunomuntu osondela enganeni bese iyesaba, kumele imemeze ifune usizo.Kukhuthazwa izingane ukuba zingangeni emotweni noma zamukele izipho ebantwini ezingabazi, futhi zingabavuleli emakhaya azo.Izingane zikhuthazwe ukuba zibikele umuntu omdala ukuthi ziya kuphi futhi zizobuya nini.Uhulumeni uphonsela inselelo izakhamuzi ukuba zibikele amaphoyisa ngokushesha uma zisola ukuthi kunengane elahlekile.“Abazali noma abaqapha izingane kumele baxoxe nazo bazifundise izindlela zokuphepha. Yiqeqeshe ingane, ikwazi ukubona ubungozi nokumele ikwenze,” kusho uhulumeni.

SEKUPHENDUKE insakavukela umchilo wesidwaba ukuthi njalo uma kuvulwa izikhungo zemfundo ephakeme, kube nemibhikisho yezitshudeni, kwesinye isikhathi ehambisana nokucekelwa phansi kwempahla kulezi zikhungo.Ngalesi sikhathi izikhungo zandisa onogada abazimele, zigqigqa ezinkantolo zithole incwadi evimbela izitshudeni ukuthi zibhikishe, ukuze zingacekeli phansi impahla.Umonakalo odalwa yilezi ziteleka ushaya ephaketheni izikhungo ngoba kusuke kuzobiza imali eshisiwe uma sekulungiswa impahla ecekelwe phansi.Okusuke kuseqhulwini lwezikhalazo zezitshudeni, phakathi kokunye  kuthinta isikhwama esixhasa ngemali yokufunda iNational Students’ Financial Aid Scheme (NSFAS). Noma izikhungo zingazama kanjani ukuxazulula le nkinga ngaphambi kokuba kuvulwe, kodwa umsindo uhlale uzosuka.Izitshudeni zisuke zikhala ngokuthi azilutholanga uxhaso, ezinye azikaphendulwa kwaze kwavulwa,  okwenza ukuthi zingakwazi ukubhalisa. Muva nje isikhalo kube ngukuhamba kancane kohlelo lwezikhungo lokuthi zihambise uhlu lwezitshudeni ezizobhaliswa ukuze zikwazi ukuthola uxhaso.Indaba egudwini kube nawuhlelo olusha lwalesi sikhwama lokuthi luzame ukuzitholela ngqo izindawo zokuhlala izitshudeni.Obekukhalisa abaphathi balesi sikhwama ngukuthi kwesinye isikhathi kuba nenkohlakalo yokusebenzisana phakathi kwezikhungo nabahlinzeka ngezindawo zokuhlala.Kokunye izitshudeni zigcine zihlala ezindaweni ezingekho ezingeni elifanele ekubeni zikhokhelwa imali eshisiwe.Yingakho abalesi sikhwama beqale uhlelo lokuzihlola lezi zindawo bese bezigunyaza. Lokhu kususe omkhulu umsindo ngoba namanje kukhona abebekhala ngokuthi balala endle ngenxa yokuthi akukhokhiwe.Lesi sikhwama siveze ukuthi sithole izicelo ezingu-1.9 million zoxhaso kulo nyaka kanti bangu-1.2 million asebexhasiwe.Sisebenze ukuthi izitshudeni ezibalelwa ku-243 113 zichithiwe, kanti zingu-15 174 ezifuna kubuyekezwe izicelo zokuchithwa kwazo.Ohlelweni olusha lwalo nyaka lokuboleka imali yokufunda olwaziwa nge-missing middle, abazali babo abahola kakhulu abangakwazi ukuthola umfundaze abangawukhokhi uma sebesebenza, kuvele ukuthi zingu-30 728 izitshudeni ezifake izicelo.Lezi zitshudeni zizoyibuyisa imali ezixhaswe ngayo uma seziphothule izifundo zazo.Izitshudeni eziningi zikhale nangohlelo lokuthi imihlomulo yazo ikhokhwe yizinkampani ezine, ezaqokwa yilesi sikhwama nyakenye.Lezi zinkampani kunezinhlelo zokuthi kunqanyulwe izinkontileka zazo njengoba uphenyo olwenziwa yinkampani yabameli lwaveza ukuthi kwaba nokungenelela ngesikhathi sezinikwa lo msebenzi. Kulokhu kusolwa isikhulu salesi sikhwama esakhonjwa indlela.Inhlangano emele imikhandlu yezitshudeni iSouth African Union of Students’ (SAUS), yathi ayifuni kube nokuphazamiseka ukukhokhwa kwale mihlomulo njengoba lezi zinkampani kulindeleke ukuthi ziqhubeke nalo msebenzi wokukhokha le mihlomulo ngo-Ephreli kulo nyaka.Okwamanje umsebenzi wokukhokhwa kwemihlomulo ubekwe emahlombe ezikhungo.Okhulumela iSAUS uMnuz Asive Dlanjwa uveze ukuthi zisekhona izinkinga ngezitshudeni ezingakazitholi izimfanelo.Uveze ukuthi basakuchitha ukukhokhwa kwemihlomulo yilezi zinkampani, wathi kodwa ngoba kunezinhlelo zokuthi zinqanyulelwe izinkontileka ngendlela esemthethweni, abafuni kube nokuphazamiseka ekutheni izitshudeni zithole izimfanelo zazo nyanga zonke. UNgqongqoshe weMfundo ePhakeme uDkt Blade Nzimande, uhlale ekucacisa ukuthi kunezinselelo kulesi sikhwama wathi kodwa mkhulu umsebenzi esiwenzayo.UDkt Nzimande ephendula imibuzo ePhalamende muva nje ukuvezile ukuthi lesi sikhwama sengezelwe omunye umthwalo njengoba sesibhekele nohlelo lokuboleka izitshudeni imali yokufunda.Ubalule ukuthi enye yezinto eyenza luhambe kancane uhlelo lokukhishwa kwemali yoxhaso ngukuthi kumele kulandelwe yonke imigomo, izitshudeni zisayine imiqingo yokuzibophezela ngoba ngezinye zezinto ezisuke zidingeka ukuze umuntu athole uxhaso.Odabeni lwezindawo zokuhlala, uthe abakwazi ukumane bakhiphe imali bakhokhele izindawo abangakaze bazibone ukuthi zisezingeni elifanelekile..

KUDALEKE isiphihli sengozi ebandakanya izimoto ezingu-17 kwalimala nabantu abangu-23, iloli lihluleka ukubhreka kuN14 ngasejikeni likaR55 eCenturion, ngoLwesibili ekuseni.The N14 east this morning 💔 pic.twitter.com/OEHg02EHXtAbezimo eziphuthumayo bachaze le ngozi njengenhlakelele ebathusile kwaphoqa ukuba kuvalwe lo mgwaqo ukuze kusizakale abalimele kuqoqwe nokungcola kwezimoto ezishayekile.“Sifike endaweni yesigameko sathola kusaphazeke yonke into emgwaqweni, kunezimoto eziwu-17 zithintekile ngezindlela ezahlukene,” kusho uKyle van Reenen okhulumela i-Emer-G-Med.UVan Reenen uthe bangu-23 abantu abalimale ngokuhlukahlukana. Izinkampani zabezimo eziphuthumayo basize abalimele ngaphambi kokubaphuthumisa ezibhedlela ezahlukene eziseduze.He hit me on the right rear, and my car faced the opposite direction. If i hadn't moved, I would've ploughed straight into the car that was in front of me. KUCISHE kwadungeka umcimbi wokwethwesa iziqu izitshudeni ezenza i-Electrical Engineering eThekwini TVET College ngesikhathi ezinye zazo zibhikisha, ziphosa namatshe kuwo wonke umuntu obesondela kulesi sikhungo.UMengameli wesigungu esihola izitshudeni eThekwini TVET College, uMesuli Nzimande uthe zikhala ngemali kaNsfas ezingayitholile.Azigcini lapho zibala ukufeyila uma zingaphasanga izifundo eziyisithupha kweziyisikhombisa ezizenzayo nokuthi imali yokubhala kabusha izifundo ezizifeyilile inkulu kakhulu.Uthe kusasa (namuhla) bazoba nomhlangano nothishomkhulu nobunye ubuholi bekolishi ukuhlahla indlela eya phambili.Kulimale isitshudeni esisodwa nabasebenzi bekolishi ababili kulo mbhikisho.Umcimbi wokwethwesa iziqu izitshudeni uze waqala sekushaye u-12 ngenxa yokuthi bekusabizwe amaphoyisa ukuzosombulula isimo nonogada besikhungo bebeqaphile.Uthishomkhulu waseThekwini TVET College, uMnuz Nkosinathi Mchunu uthe umcimbi uqale sekudlule isikhathi ngenxa yesiteleka ebesingaphezu kwamandla abo. Uye washesha nokuhamba ngoba ethi usayothola ikhambi lesiteleka.Uthe uhlelo lokuqeqesha izitshudeni baluqale ngo-2018 usuzophela kodwa baphazamiseka ngezikhathi zeCovid-19.Uveze ukuthi kuke kwaba neziqubu lapho izitshudeni bezikade zingafunwa ezinkampanini eziqeqeshela umsebenzi ngenxa yeCovid-19, kodwa bakwazi ukudlula kuleso sigaba.“Nami ngaqala njengani ngaqhubeka nokufunda. Uma uneziqu zikagesi uyakwazi ukukhetha umunxa othile ugxile kuwona ukuze uziphilise.“Iziqu zenu zisho ukuthi senizokwazi ukuzitholela amathuba omsebenzi noma nivule izinkampani zenu, niqashe abanye abantu.“Abantu banezindlu abazakhayo ezidinga ugesi, izwe linenkinga yokunqamuka kukagesi, kufanele nize nezisombululo. Kunabantu abafaka ama-solar nani kufanele nibe matasa lapho,” kusho uMchunu.Uthe izitshudeni ngeke zihambe neziqu kuphela kodwa zizonikwa nama-multi meter azozisiza ukuhlola ugesi lapho zizobe zisebenza khona.Ubalule ukuthi uma usebenza ngogesi awuvele nje uthinte kodwa uqale uhlole ukuthi kunogesi ongakanani nokuyinto ecacisayo ukuthi kumele usebenze kanjani.Ubonge abafundi ngokubekezela njengoba bekunezingqinamba eziningi ngaphambi kokuthi bathole iziqu zabo.UNksz Lungelo Kubheka othole iziqu, uthe njengamanje usebenza ukunakekela elinye lamabhilidi eThekwini futhi uyajabula ngoba useziphethe iziqu zakhe.UNkk Carminee Ramchunder we-Health and Welfare Sector Education and Training (Hwseta), uthe bahlale bekuthokozela ukusebenza nezikhungo zemfundo ephakeme ukunikeza izitshudeni amakhono okuziphilisa.

AMAPHOYISA kuMasipala weTheku akhiphe isixwayiso ngokuvalwa komgwaqo amasonto ambalwa kuleli dolobha. Ngokwesitatimende esikhishwe amaphoyisa, kuzovalwa umgwaqo uBrooke Street oxhuma kuM4 ngaseningizimu uze uyongena kuDr Pixley KaSeme Street. Lo mgwaqo uzovalwa okwesikhashana kusukela ngoMeyi 3, (ngoLwesihlanu) kuze kube nguJuni 21, 2024.Lo mgwaqo uzovalwa ukuze kuqhubeke kahle ukubhidlizwa kwebhilidi iChina Emporium.Kunxuswa abashayeli ukuba bagweme ukuhambela kule ndawo, basebenzise le migwaqo:*Ukungena kwesokunxele ku-Anton Lembede Street, ujikele kwesokudla kuWarwick Avenue ubuye kwesokudla ukuthola uPixley Ka Seme Street.**Ukungena kuMargaret Mncadi Avenue (Victoria Embankment) *Ukungena kuChe Guevara Road (Moore Road)Kukhuthazwa abashayei ukuba bacophelele futhi bahlele kahle izindlela zabo ukuze bangaphazamiseki.Amaphoyisa omgwaqo azobe ekhona ukuqapha isimo.

IBHEKENE nengwadla imiphakathi eyakhele iTheku namaphethelo ngenxa yokungabibikho kwamanzi nokungathunyelwa kwamaloli awathwalayo. Isolezwe lithole ukuthi kusukela ngo-2022, imiphakathi eyahlukene eThekwini ikhala ngenkinga yamanzi ikakhulukazi leyo esenyakatho yeTheku. Abantu bakhala ngokuthi uMasipala weTheku awuzikhiphi izaziso zokuthi azophela nezizathu zokuphela kwawo, bavele babone ngawo engasaphumi kompompi babo. Uma beshayela ucingo kwamasipala izingcingo azibanjwa, u-WhatsApp awuphendulwa, ngisho ezinkundleni zokuxhumana umasipala awuchazi. Uma amanzi engekho abantu bathi abakwazi ukuphuza amanzi ahlanzekile, abakwazi ukugeza, ukusebenzisa izindlu zangasese, ukupheka, ukuwasha nokunye okuningi.UNksz Bayo Smamane waku-ward-56, eNewtown A, eNanda, uthe sebehlale isikhathi eside bengenawo amanzi.“Emuva kwezikhukhula zika-2022, amanzi awaphindanga aphuma kompompi. Izindlu zangasese asikwazi ukuzisebenzisa, asikwazi ukupheka, ukuwasha nokuphuza amanzi ahlanzekile. Sisizwa ukujaha amaloli amanzi afika uma ethanda,” kusho uNksz Smamane.Uthe akekho umuntu obachazelayo ukuthi kwenzekani ngenkinga ababhekene nayo.Uthe isimo siya ngokushuba ngoba namaloli athwala amanzi awasafiki endaweni.“Okubuhlungu ukuthi nesikole iPhumuzuzulu Primary sibhekene nenkinga efanayo, izingane zize zikhishwe kungakashayi isikhathi sokuphuma. Abadla imishanguzo abakwazi ukuyiphuza,” ubeke kanje.ENanda namaphethelo umphakathi uze wabhikisha kuleli sonto, ufuna amanzi. Ikhansela lendawo, uMnuz Syabonga Ntombela, lithe ukuhamba kwamanzi kubangelwa ukulimala kwengqalasizinda eyaguguleka ngesikhathi sezikhukhula.Khonamanjalo: KwaSanti, Klaarwater, Savannah Park naseShallcross, amanzi ahamba phakathi neviki abuye ngempelasonto.“Amanzi asehamba ngoLwesine aze abuye ngeSonto. Uma engaphelanga ngalezi zinsuku, siye sibone ngawo ephela ngo-7 ebusuku aze abuye ngo-8 ekuseni. Sesiyazi ukuthi ayavalwa ebusuku kodwa uma sibuza kuMasipala weTheku kuthiwa asuke engavaliwe kodwa izinqolobane eziwagcinayo zisuke zisagcwaliswa. Okubuhlungu wukuthi umasipala usazithumela izincwadi ezifuna abantu bakhokhele amanzi,” kusho isakhamuzi.EDassenhoek naseThornwood nakwezinye izindawo zaseMariannhill, nakhona kukhalwa esifanayo njengoba amanzi ephela noma kunini, asikho isimemezelo esikhishwayo kodwa abantu babona ngawo esephelile.KwaMashu sekuphele izinyanga ezintathu amanzi ephuma ngezinsuku ezithile. ENtuzuma aphuma izinsuku ezintathu ngesonto. Kulezo zinsuku kuba amahora ambalwa, ebusuku nangezimpelasonto awaphumi. UNkk Gugu Sisilana okhulumela uMasipala weTheku, uthe kuyiqiniso ukuthi iNanda Newtown ngenye yezindawo eziphazamisekile njengoba kusalungiswa isikhungo samanzi iNtuzuma 2 Pumpstation.“Akusilo iqiniso ukuthi sekuphele iminyaka emibili abantu bengenawo amanzi kodwa amanzi ayafika abuye aphele. Ziningi izinhlelo ezenziwa wumasipala zokusiza abantu okubalwa ukufakwa kwamathangi ezindaweni ezingenamanzi. Uyaqhubeka umsebenzi wokuthuthukisa ingqalasizinda eNtuzuma 2 Pumpstation. Kulindeleke ukuthi uphele ngo-2025,” kuchaza uNkk Sisilana.Uveze ukuthi ukuncishiswa kwamanzi kwenzelwa ukuthi kugcwale izinqolobane zamanzi, ukuze wonke umuntu athole amanzi ngokulinganayo.INtuzuma Pumpstation 2 iphakela izikhungo zamanzi ezihlukene okubalwa iNtuzuma Reservoirs 3, 4, 5, ne 7.Izindawo ezithintekayo yiNanda namaphethelo, iNtuzuma namaphethelo neRichmond Farm.Ubuye wafaka isitatimende seMeya yeTheku, uMnuz Cyril Xaba, lapho ithembise abantu baseThekwini ukuthi iyalusukumela udaba lwamanzi futhi isixazululo sizotholakala maduze.Ithe uyaqhubeka umsebenzi wokuthuthukiswa kwengqalasizinda yamanzi enyakatho yeTheku, eningizimu nasentshonalanga yeTheku.

UPHIKO lwentsha lweqembu Umkhonto weSizwe (MKPYL), lusole umona ezinhlanganweni ezigijimele ezinkantolo zifuna ukuchitha umholi waleli qembu ePhalamende uDkt John Hlophe, ekubeni yilungu leJudicial Services Commission (JSC). Le khomishini iluleka umengameli wezwe ngezinto ezithinta amajaji.Lokhu kulandela ukuya enkantolo kwezinhlangano i-AfriForum ne-DA, zifuna uHlophe akhishwe kwiJSC.NeFreedom Under Law ithe izothatha izinyathelo zomthetho ngalolu daba.UMnuz Nkateko Mkhabela wezokuxhumana kwiMKPYL, uthe iPhalamende lalandela yonke imigomo ngesikhathi liphakamisela uHlophe kwiJSC.Uthe lezi zinhlangano zifuna ukwenza iMK intenge njengeqembu eliphikisayo ePhalamende.“Lezi zinhlangano bezingafuni uHlophe akhethelwe kulesi sikhundla ngoba ziyawazi amava akhe. Azibhekele ukusebenza kwansuku zonke kweJSC, ngakho azikwazi ukukhulumela ikhomishini.”  I-AfriForum ifake amaphepha enkantolo yoMthethosisekelo ifuna kususwe uHlophe.Isikhulu esiphezulu se-AfriForum uMnuz Kallie Kriel, sithe akukwazi ukuthi umuntu owaphucwa isikhundla sokuba yijaji angakhethelwa esikhundleni esifuze lesi.UKriel uthe bazolwa kuze kufike enkantolo yokugcina ngoba bafuna singehli isithunzi seJSC. “Ukuthi  uHlophe abe yingxenye yeJSC kubeka engcupheni isithunzi sale khomishini. Kubeka engcupheni nomthetho wakuleli yingakho siyilwa indaba yokufakwa kwakhe.”UNkk Helen Zille uSihlalo weFederal kwi-DA, uthe bafake amaphepha enkantolo enkulu yaseWestern Cape, ngoba befuna kuchithwe uHlophe kwiJSC. Uthe noma bekwamukela ukuthi kuyilungelo lamaqembu ukuphakamisa amalungu awo kwiJSC, kodwa abamfuni uHlophe kule khomishini.“Akaziphathanga ngendlela elindelekile kumuntu oyijaji. Sifake isicelo esiphuthumayo sokuthi avinjwe ukuthi angene kwiJSC. Okwesibili ngukuthi sifuna kubuyekezwe isinqumo sePhalamende sokumqokela kwiJSC.” Uthe ukuqokwa kukaHlophe kubukela phansi umthetho.Amanye amalungu ePhalamende ayingxenye yeJSC kubalwa kuwona nomholi we-EFF uMnuz Julius Malema. Kulindeleke ukuthi umhlangano weJSC uhlale ngo-Okthoba, lapho le khomishini izophakamisa kumengameli wamajaji okumele avale izikhala ezivulekile ezinkantolo ezehlukene.

LUVELE obala ubumbano ezinhlangeni ezehlukene ngesikhathi kunemiklomelo yezindondo i-17th PanSALB Multiligualism Awards, ngoLwesine ebusuku e-ICC, eThekwini.Kulo mcimbi Isolezwe lihlonishwe ngendondo emkhakheni weMedia Category/Lifetime Achievement Award.Leli phephandaba elizobe ligubha iminyaka engu-22 ngenyanga ezayo lisemlandweni ngokuba noshicilelo nsuku zonke ngolimi lwendabuko kuleli. Lingelikhulu kunawo wonke akhona e-Afrika ashicilelwa ngolimi lwethunga.Zonke izikhulumi kulo mcimbi zigqugquzele ukuthi kukhulunywe izilimi zendabuko yase-Afrika, bekukhona abafisa ukuthi imikhiqizo ibhalwe ngolimi lwendawo lapho ivutshelwe khona.UMhleli weSolezwe, uMnuz Thulani Mbatha, uthe lo mklomelo uyinto enkulu ekuhlonishweni kweqhaza elibanjwe yileli phephandaba kwezokuxhumana. “Isolezwe aligcini nje ngokuba yinkundla yezindaba nezokuxhumana kodwa likhathula indima enkulu ekubuyiseleni ulimi lwesiZulu eqhulwini nokuqinisekisa ukuthi alushabalali, okuyinselelo ebhekene nezilimi eziningi zendabuko e-Afrika,” kuphula uMbatha. Inkosi Themba Mavundla enguSihlalo wePLC kwaZulu-Natal, ithe emandulo izingonyama namakhosi kwawumsebenzi wawo ukuthuthukisa ulimi nokulukhusela.“Abantu abancane nomama babenezinhlaka zabo lapho ababefundiswa khona ukusebenzisa ulimi. Kwakunendlela yokusebenzisa ulimi. Omncane wayengakhulumi njengomdala. Kwakuthi noma uyonana ufike ungathekise ungakuqondisi ukuthi uzonana. Ulimi ufunda ngalo ukuphila nokuxhumana nabantu. Njengamakhosi ezizwe siyafisa ukubonga ibhodi lakwaPanSALB ngokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi izilimi zethu azishabalali. Empeleni njengamakhosi kumele engabe singumtapo wolwazi wokusetshenziswa kolimi. Lokhu kungandisa ngisho amathuba omsebenzi. Uma kukhiqizwa umkhiqizo oyiswa kuleso sifundazwe okukhulunywa khona lolo limi imikhiqizo ibhalwe ngolimi lwakhona. Uye uphoxeke ubona ingane iphethe ugwayi ithunywe ngumuntu omdala kube kungafanele ngabe iwuphethe. Okwenza ingazi ukuthi akufanele yingoba kusuke kubhalwe ngesingisi kanti ukube kubhalwe ngolimi eluqondayo ngabe iyazi ukuthi akumele iwuphathe,” kuchaza inkosi Mavundla.Emcimbini bekukhona nabaqhamuka eminyangweni kahulumeni omunye wabo okungu-Adv Linda Zama, ongumeluleki ehhovisi likaNdunankulu KwaZulu-Natal, inhloko yoMnyango wezobuCiko namaSiko KwaZulu-Natal, uDkt Thobile Sifunda nabanye.Bekuklonyeliswa abantu neminyango emikhakheni ehlukene okubalwa oweLanguage & Literature, Language Activist Category, Translation & Interpreting, Youth Category, Government / Public Sector, Education neBusiness & Technology.Kunandise abaculi abehlukene okubalwa uLwah Ndlunkulu, Zuko Kupiso, Oscar Makamu Na Majuvani Sisters noThabang Nkutha. USomizi obengomunye wabaphathi bohlelo ubeqhulula amahlaya, abantu bahleka kwaze kwabuhlungu izisu.

ISOSHA ladubula amahlandla ayisithupha emqaleni nasesifubeni labulala inkosikazi yalo emzini wabo ePinetown, eThekwini.Lokhu kuqukethwe edokodweni loMbuso elifundwe eNkantolo yeMantshi yasePinetown.UMbuso uphinde walishintsha icala obekungelokubulala elithweswe isosha loMbutho wezeMpi eNingizimu Afrika, uMnuz Lwanda Zungu laba elokubulala okuhleliwe uNkk Tania Zungu.Umshushisi uMnuz Ehud-Jadon Francko utshele inkantolo ukuthi icala seliwela esigabeni sesithupha.Lokhu kuchaza ukuthi uZungu kumele ashaye indesheni ngokuthi abeke izizathu ezimqoka zokuthi kungani imantshi kumele imnike ibheyili.Isenzo soMbuso kubukeka sinyakazise ummeli kaZungu, u-Advocate Muzi Mzelemu, othe bebeqala ukuzwa enkantolo izolo ukuthi selishintshiwe icala.UMzelemu usukume wafaka isicelo esiphuthumayo, ephikisana nokushintshwa kwecala.Uveze ukuthi uZungu, sekuphele izinyanga ezintathu egqunywe ezitokisini akaze acaciselwe ngamacala athweswe wona nokuthi enzeka kanjani.“UMbuso ufike kanjani ekutheni kwakuyisigameko esihleliwe okwenzeka. Siphi isitifiketi sikamqondisi wabashushisi esishoyo ukuthi icala seliwela esigabeni sesithupha? kubuza uMzelemu.Umshushisi uvumile ukuthi asikho futhi uxhumene nehhovisi likamqondisi wabashushisi esicela.Imantshi ibe isilihlehlisela namuhla ukuze kuqhutshekwe nesicelo sebheyili. Ngaphambi kwalokho uMzelemu ubefuna kuqhutshekwe nokulalelwa kwebheyili ethi uMbuso awusebenzise imininingwane esedokodweni ngoba inohla lokuzobe kuqukethwe esitifiketini esifunekayo.Imantshi beyiqale yatshela uZungu ukuthi uma limlahla icala athweswe lona angabhadla ejele iminyaka engu-25. UZungu ubebukeka ekude ngokomqondo ehlezi ebhokisini labasolwa. Uqale kwangathi kunento ayikhuluma yedwa, ejeqeza abangena enkantolo kodwa kungezwakali abekade ethini.Inkantolo beyikade igcwele abantu abebekade bezokweseka umndeni kamufi nezihlobo zakhe. Bekukhona nabebekade begqoke izikibha  ebezinemibhalo elwa nokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane nezingane.UZungu usolwa ngokudubula abulale inkosikazi yakhe ngoJanuwari nonyaka. Abomndeni kamufi basola uZungu ngokuhlukumeza umufi waze wambulala.Ngakolunye uhlangothi umufi usolwa ngokuthi waphinga nomuntu abazanayo noZungu nokuyinto eyaholela ekutheni ambulale.

ISOSHA elibhekene necala lokubulala umkalo ekuqaleni konyaka lizokwazi ngoLwesine ukuthi liyayithola yini ibheyili noma cha.UMnuz Lwanda Mxolisi Zungu obeyisosha loMbutho wezempi wakuleli iSouth African National Defence Force (SANDF), usolwa ngokudubula abulale umkakhe, uNkk Tania Zungu (36).Isehlakalo kuthiwa senzeka emzini wabo osePinetown. Izolo bekulindeleke ukuthi iMantshi, uWendalynn Robinson akhiphe isinqumo ngebheyili kodwa washaya ungqimphothwe.Uthe kunezinto okumele aqale azibhekisise, isinqumo sesizophuma ngoLwesine."Angeke kulunge ukuthi ngikhiphe isinqumo namhlanje. Kunezinto okumele ngiqale ngizibhekisise kuqala mayelana naleli cala," echaza.Ngaphambi kwalokho umbuso ushayele isipikili sokugcina uveza amaphuzu oweseka ngawo ukuthi kungani kumele isosha lingayitholi ibheyili.UMshushisi u-Enud Franko zithe zisuka nje wasola umsolwa ngokusebenzisa ingane yakhe eneminyaka engu-14 ukuzivikela."Bekungafanele umsolwa avunyelwe ukuthi ingane yakhe ayenzise isitatimende sokuthi imvikele.
