Le ngane ithe iyamdinga uyise kumele ayithole ibheyili," usho kanje.Umshushisi ubuye wakhala ngokuthi isosha akumele lidedelwe ngoba lingaletha ukwesaba kwabomndeni kamufi.Umsolwa ubefake ishethi elimhlophe efake nothayi  oluhlaza.

KUVELE ukuthi bese kunesikhathi bengahoshelani onogada ababili abafe esigamekweni sokudubulana kwabo emahhovishi kaMasipala uMhlathuze ngoLwesine ekuseni. Kulesi sigameko kufe ujuqu uMnuz Simo Zulu obeqapha uyise oyimenenja kuwona lo masipala. Kusolwa uzakwabo uMnuz Ntokozo Mthembu oqapha imeya yakhona eMhlathuze ngokumdubula kanti naye uzogcina edutshulwe ngozakwabo washona. IMeya uMnuz Xolani Ngwezi uveze ukuthi kusukela ngoDisemba nyakenye laba baqaphi bebengabhekani."Kuqale ngoDisemba esontweni lesithathu. Ngalolo suku sasiyebhishi, wayekhona uMageba (Imenenja yaseMhlathuze) wakubona ngamehlo kwenzeka phambi kwethu.“Ngakuzama okungangamandla ami ukungenelela ukuxazulula isimo, ngeshwa kugcine sekuphelela lana," kusho uNgwezi.Eqhuba uthe ngosuku lwesigameko laba bobabili kusolwa ukuthi konakala uma kuhlangana amehlo nokuholele ekutheni bajikijelane ngamagama ayiziswana.Yilapho kuqale khona udweshu nokusolwa ukuthi uMthembu ubesedonsa isibhamu waqonda ngqo kuZulu wamdubula maqede wadla phansi kwaze kwabe naye uyadutshulwa.UNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana nezoMdabu KwaZulu-Natal uNkk Bongiwe Sithole-Moloi, unxusa izinhlaka zomthetho ukuthi zenze upheno olunzulu kulandela isigameko.Kwisitatimende esishicilelwe wumnyango, uNkk Sithole-Moloi uthe omasipala yindawo okumele ihlale iphephile kuwona wonke umuntu, bakhululeke nabazofuna izidingo."Ukulahleka kwemiphefumulo kulesi sigameko kuyinto ebuhlungu nethikameze abasebenzi, amalungu omphakathi nabaholi kumasipala. “Sinxusa abasebenzi behlise amaphaphu bagweme nokungabhebhethekisa udlame. Sicela abantu bahlangane babambisane kuzilwe ngokuthula, kufinyelelwe kwizinqumo ezinokuthula," kusho uNkk Sithole-Moloi.Eqhuba unxuse umasipapla ukuthi uthathe izinyathelo ezifanele. “Sinxusa nanoma ubani ongaba nolwazi mayelana nalesi sigameko ukuba alekelele amaphoyisa," usho kanje.Ephetha udlulise amazwi enduduzo kubona bonke abathintekile ngesigameko."Sizwelana kakhulu nemindeni, ababangani, izihlobo, ozakwabo nabasebenzi bonke kumasipala. Kuyethusa ukwehla kwalesi sigameko phambi kwabasebenzi namalungu omphakathi.“Sizobambisana neminye iminyango kuhulumeni ukuhlinzeka abasebenzi namalungu omphakathi ngosizo lokwelulekwa ngokwengqondo njengoba ebone kwenzeka lesi sigameko esishaqisayo," kusho uNkk Sithole-Moloi.

KUSEBENZE uR15 million wosizo lwebhange Ithala, ukwakha nokuvula ngokusemthethweni indawo entsha yokusebenzela yeHRMP Logistics, inkampani egcina nethutha impahla, iyihambise ezindaweni ezahlukene ezweni lonke.Le ndawo yale nkampani eholwa wuMnuz Musa Makhunga, yethulwe ngoLwesihlanu eDube Tradeport, eLa Mercy, eduze kwesikhumulo sezindiza iKing Shaka.Exoxa neSolezwe Ngempelasonto sekuphele umcimbi wokuvula le ndawo ewu-5 600m2, uMakhunga uthe kubajabulise kakhulu ukuxhaswa yiThala ngoba bebehlale besebenzela ezindaweni abebeqashe kuzona kusukela beyiqala ngo-2018.“Okuhle kakhulu ngale ndawo esikuyona manje wukuthi iDube Tradeport, esakhe emhlabeni wayo, ikwazi ukurentisa ngomhlaba wayo iminyaka ewu-49, esikholwa wukuthi sizokwazi ukusebenza kahle nangokukhululeka kuyona ukuqhuba nokukhulisa umsebenzi esiwenzayo.“Sikholwa wukuthi ukusebenza kwethu lana kuzothela izithelo, siqhubeke nokukhulisa inkampani yethu esesiqashe izisebenzi eziwu-10 kuyona. Sibonga kakhulu kwabeThala ngokuhlale bevule izandla ukuxhasa amabhizinisi abantu abenza imisebenzi ebonakalayo emphakathini njengathi,” kusho uMakhunga.USihlalo webhodi leThala uMnuz Sihle Mkhize uthe kusemkhondweni wabo ukusiza noma wubani waKwaZulu-Natal onebhizinisi elenza umehluko emphakathini.“Ngenkathi sicubungula isicelo sabo (esho iHRMP Logistics) sagculiseka ngaso, sase sibaxhasa ngoR15 million wokubasiza bafukule ibhizinisi labo njengoba sesihlangene namhlanje umsebenzi owenziwe usuphelile. Sikholwa wukuthi bazoqhubeka babe wusizo emakhasimendeni abo,” kusho uMkhize.

IGCAGCELE esokeni kosomabhizinisi abancane baKwaZulu-Natal abazohlomula ngoxhaso lwemali yokuthuthukisa amabhizinisi oluvela ebhange Ithala nakwiSourceFin.Izolo isikhulu esiphezulu se-Ithala Development Finance Corporation (IDFC), uNksz Pearl Bengu, sithe iSourceFin ibeke uR150 million wokuthuthukisa osomabhizinisi abancane abasemikhakheni ehlukene.Uthe le mali izotholakala ngokushesha futhi osomabhizinisi sebengaqala ukufaka izicelo.“Ithala liyathanda ukuthuthukisa osomabhizinisi abancane ngoba yibona abadala amathuba omsebenzi amaningi. Kuzoxhaswa osomabhizinisi abathole umsebenzi kuhulumeni kodwa abangenayo imali yokuqala umsebenzi, abanamabhizinisi emalokishini, emakhaya nakwezinye izindawo. Inhloso yethu wukufukula umnotho waKwaZulu-Natal ukuze wonke umuntu asebenze,” kuchaza uNksz Bengu.Uthe Ithala lingamavulandlela ekufukuleni osomabhizinisi basemakhaya nasemalokishini njengoba kuyilona elibaxhasa ngaphandle kokubafuna imicikilisho.“Sifuna osomabhizinisi bakhule bangahlali bengosomabhizinisi abancane. Ukusebenzisana kwethu neSourceFin kuzosisiza ukwenza lokho. Okuhle wukuthi sizobe sicathula nabo, ngeke sibanike imali noma izinsiza kusebenza kuphela kodwa bazofundiswa nangokuphatha kahle imali, ukuhlela umsebenzi nangemithetho ethile ethinta osomabhizinisi,” kusho uNksz Bengu.UMnuz Joshua Kadish oyisikhulu esiphezulu seSourceFin, uthe bayajabula ukusebenzisana neThala ngoba lihamba phambili ekuthuthukiseni abantu baKwaZulu-Natal.Uthembise osomabhizinisi ukuthi ngeke balinde isikhathi eside uma sebefake isicelo sokuxhaswa njengoba kusetshenziswa ubuchwepheshe besimanje.“Siyazi ukuthi kunzima ukuthola imali emabhange amakhulu yingakho sisebenzisana neThala okuyilona elenza umsebenzi omuhle wokulekelela osomabhizinisi abancane. Sizobanika imali yokwenza umsebenzi, sibafundise ukuyiphatha sibanike nohlelo lokuqeqeshwa ngomakadebona kwezamabhizinisi. Okuhle wukuthi sinezinkampani esisebenzisana nazo ezenza imikhiqizo ehlukene okuzosiza osomabhizinisi,” kusho uKadish.Wenze isibonelo sokuthi usomabhizinisi olungisa ingqalasizinda uyakwazi ukuxhunyaniswa nendawo azothenga kuyona engambi eqolo. Lokho kusiza yena ukuthi onge izindleko.Uthe osonkontileka bavumelekile ukuthenga ezinkampanini abazaziyo kodwa kulolu hlelo kuzoqale kubhekwe ukuthi kwezinye izindawo leyo mpahla ibiza malini.

Lithathe elinye igxathu udaba lweholidi lwaseDubai olwathathwa wuNobhala Jikelele we-ANC uMnuz Fikile Mbalula nomndeni wakhe ngo-2016 njengoba uphiko lwezokushushisa oluzimele lwe-AfriForum lukholwa wukuthi kukhona okumele aphendule ngakho.I-AfriForum imemezele ngoLwesithathu ekuseni ukuthi isithole idokodo emaphoyiseni ngemuva kokufaka isicelo kulandelwa umthetho  iPromotion of Access to Information Act (PAIA).Ngonyaka odlule uphiko lwezokushushiswa komphakathi iNational Prosecuting Authority (NPA) yathi ngeke ize imshushise uMbalula ngezinsolo zokushushumbisa imali.Umbiko woMvikeli woMphakathi wango-2019 wathi iNPA kumele ibheke izinsolo zokuthi inkampani iSedgars Sports yakhokha izindleko zeholidi likaMbalula ngoDisemba ka-2016 ngesikhathi esanguNgqongqoshe wezemiDlalo, ubuCiko namaSiko kuzwelonke.I-AfroForum ithe ngemuva kokuthola idokodo ikholwa wukuthi uMbalula kumele aphendule."Ngemuva kokuhlaziya ubufakazi, kucace bha ukuthi isinqumo sokungamshushisi uMbalula sasingenasisekelo. Ubufakazi bukhomba ukuthi kukhona ukuvumelana okungekho emthethweni okwakukhona phakathi kofakazi namaphoyisa; ukuhluleka ukuthatha izitatimende kofakazi ababalulekile; ukuhluleka ukuqoqa amabhuku nemininingwane ebalulekile kanjalo nokungasebenzisani kahle kwamaphoyisa nabashushisi," kusho uBarry Bateman, okhulumela i-AfriForum.Uthe ubufakazi bukhomba ukuthi baningi abakhokhela izindleko zempilo yakhe ewubukhazikhazi."Kubukeka sengathi uMbalula ubefikelwa ngamaphoyisa neNPA. Lokhu sekuqinise umkhankaso wophiko ukuthi wenze isiqiniseko sokuthi uMbalula uyavela enkantolo."

ISIFO sohlangothi yisona esibe yimbangela yokudlula emhlabeni kwenkosi yomculo wesikhalanga, uDkt Thulani Manana (56).Lokhu kudalulwe yindodana yakhe, uMnuz Trevor Manana, ngesikhathi ikhuluma neSolezwe ngezindaba zokudlula emhlabeni kwale ngwazi eyenze umculo weZayoni wachuma.UManana uveze ukuthi uyise ubekade eseMtubatuba eye komunye umngcwabo, kwathi ngemuva kwezinsuku ezimbili engakaphindeli ekhaya e-Ermelo, eMpumalanga, wadluliselwa esibhedlela saseNgwelezane."Kusiphathe kabi kakhulu ukushiywa ngubaba emhlabeni. Uhlaselwe yisifo sohlangothi wase eyasishiya,'' esho.Uthe bagqemeke udume lwengozi ngokulahleka kukayise. Umncomile ngendima ayiklamile ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi uyachuma umculo weZayoni.Uthe kuyise bekuhlale njalo kuseqhulwini ukubaluleka kokufukulwa komculo weZayoni.Uchaze uyise njengendoda ebikholelwa kakhulu emkhulekweni. "Ubaba ubewazisa kakhulu umkhuleko. Ubekholwa ukuthi uma nje esethandazile konke kusuke sekuqondile,'' usho kanje.Ubekhuluma neSolezwe enza amalungiselelo okuthi kuthathwe isidumbu sibuyiselwe e-Ermelo okuyilapho azofihlelwa khona.Umethulele isigqoko ngokuthatha umculo waseZayoni awusabalalisele eSwatini naseBotswana.UMfu Thulani Gwala ongusihlalo wenhlangano yamaZayoni, iHlangana Zayoni uthe uwile umuthi omkhulu.Uncome iqhaza likaManana ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi uyathuthukiswa umculo weZayoni kuzona zonke izifundazwe.Ukuvelela kukaManana emculweni kumenze wagcina esezuza izindondo ezahlukene eminxenei eyahlukene. Wathola nendondo kumaSama Awards.Uke wahlabana ngendondo yeBest AmaZion Music kumaCrown Gospel.Kumncintiswano iMpumalanga Awards wazuza izindondo kwiBest siKhalanga, Best African Mucic nakwiBest Composer.Waqala ukuduma kakhulu nge-album yakhe eyayisihloko sithi Imali yomntwana.'Wayekade eyenze ngokubambisana noMbhishobhi Sipho Mnyembe ongasekho emhlabeni.Belidume kakhulu iqembu lakhe Abanikazi Bomkhalanga. UMfu Bheki Dlamini obeyilungu leqembu uthe bafe olwembiza ngokudlula emhlabeni kukaManana.Umchaze njengomuntu obenokuthula, ewazisa umculo weZayoni. UManana wake wakhipha i-album esihloko sithi Udlalelani ngom’Zayoni ezama ukukhuza abadicilela phansi isithunzi saleli bandla.UMfu Vusi Gama ongomunye wezingwazi zomculo waseZayoni naye uthumele amazwi enduduzo ngokudlula emhlabeni kukaManana. Uthe kulotshiwe emlandweni ukuthi umufi waba ngowokuqala ukuqopha i-album egcwele yomculo wesikhalanga.Uthe kuningi okuhle okungafundwa ngabantu mayelana nendlela uManana abewuthanda ngayo umsebenzi wakhe wokucula.Phakathi kwabaculi aseke acula nabo uManana kubalwa uThokozani Langa, uBonakele noLundi naye ongasekho emhlabeni.UManana ubephinde abe nguMfundisi ebandleni lamaZayoni, iPhillip Apostolic Catholic Church yaseThembisa. Ikhwaya yeZayoni yaseTshwane University of Technology (TUT) ubeyicija ngomculo.Ushiye emhlabeni abantwana bakhe abayisikhombisa. Umndeni uthe usazolumemezela usuku lokufihlwa kwakhe.

IDOLOBHA iTheku lithi selikulungele ngokuphelele ukusingatha umcimbi womjaho wamahhasi omkhulu kuleli iHollywoodbets Durban July, laveza nokuthi lilindele inzuzo elinganiselwa ku-R650 million ngalo mcimbi ozoba seHollywoodbets Greyville Racecourse, eGreyville, eThekwini ngoMgqibelo.Lokho kuhlaluke esithangamini sabezindaba ebesenziwe emgwaqweni uFlorida eThekwini, lapho uSihlalo woPhiko lokuThuthukisa uMnotho eThekwini, uMnuz Thembo Ntuli eqinisekise khona ukuthi akusekho okuzophazamisa lo mcimbi ozobe wenziwa okwesi-128 nonyaka, nokungokwesithathu wengwanyelwe yiHollywoodbets.UNtuli uthe balindele amaphanta angaphezu kuka-45 000 ukuzobhejela imijaho yosuku, nabantu abangaphezu kuka-20 000 abazobe behambele umcimbi.“Ilinganiselwa ku-R271 million imali ezosetshenziwa emcimbini, kanti konke okuzobe kwenziwa kuzosiza ukwakha amathuba omsebenzi angaphezu kwa-5 000, sihlele u-78% wezindawo zokulala,” kusho uNtuli.Uthe nezokuphepha zizobe ziqinile njengoba abakwasidlodlo bazobe bekanise idolobha lonke ukuqinisekisa ezokuphepha nokuthi kube lula ukusabela uma kukhona lapho bedingeka khona.Uveze nokuthi kusukela ngoLwesihlanu ngo-11 ebusuku kuzovalwa imigwaqo okubalwa kuyo uMitchell Crescent/Sixth Avenue, Clarence Road/Sixth Avenue, Mitchell Crescent/Fifth Avenue, Clarence Road/Fifth Avenue noDLI Avenue/Avondale Road ukuze kugwemeke isiminyaminya kwabeza emcimbini.Ohlangothini lwezemfashini, kuzobe kukhona abasiki bengqephu abayisishiyagalolunye abaqokwe yiHollywoodbets ukuzokhangisa ngemisiko eyahlukene ehambisana nendikimba yosuku ethi Ride The Wave.Labo basiki bengqephu woLerato Mathobela, Zadani Bhengu, Mphumeleli Mkomonde, Sbonelo Gcumisa, Amahle Blose, Nomfundo Nxumalo, Lwandle Khulu, Nobuhle Mnguni noPhumzile Ndlovu. “Siyakuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu abazohambela umcimbi bazojabula futhi ngeke basikhalele isikhathi sabo. Senze konke okusemandleni ukwenza umcimbi ube sezingeni eliwufanele,” usho kanje.Kwabathanda ubumnandi, bazojatshuliswa yimicimbi yobumnandi eyahlukene ezoqhubeka impelasonto yonke okubalwa iFact Durban Rocks, Any Given Sunday, Anywhere in the City, eKasi Durban July, Mojo’s July Weekend, EThekwini Jazz Jam, Artizen Durban July neWhite Party Lifestyle Excursion ukukha phezulu.

INGENISE uR500 million emnothweni weTheku i-Africa’s Travel Indaba ebiseNkosi Albert Luthuli International Convention Centre (ICC), eThekwini.Lezi zindaba zivezwe yiPhini leNhloko yophiko lwezokuvakasha kuMasipala weTheku, uNkk Winile Mntungwa esithangamini sokuvalwa kwengqungquthela, izolo.“I-Africa’s Travel Indaba ihambe kahle kakhulu eThekwini ngoba abayihambele bafake imali engaphezu kuka-R500 million emnothweni weTheku. Le mali ingene ngokuthengwa kwempahla, ukuhlala kwabantu emahhotela, ukubhukhwa kwezimoto ezisetshenziswa yizivakashi, ukudla ezindaweni zokudlela nokunye okuningi,” kuchaza uNkk Mntungwa.Uthe aseqalile amalungiselelo okuqinisekisa ukuthi i-Africa’s Travel Indaba ihlala eThekwini njengoba bekhipha unyawo njalo uma kunalo mbukiso ngokuthi baphathe kahle izivakashi.Uveze ukuthi nezokuphepha sezihlala ziqinile eThekwini hhayi ukuthi amaphoyisa atshalwa ngoba kune-Africa’s Travel Indaba kodwa ahlale esiqaphile isimo sezokuphepha.Ubalule ukuthi kunomkhankaso wokuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu bayahlomula kwezokuvakasha njengoba bekukhona osomabhizinisi abancane abaxhaswe yiDurban Tourism ukuba bazikhangise kulo mbukiso.Isikhulu esibhekele ukusebenza kwe-Tourism KwaZulu-Natal, uNksz Phindile Makwakwa, sithe uma abantu becabanga i-Africa’s Travel Indaba, bacabanga iTheku neKwaZulu-Natal ngakho asikho isidingo sokuyihambisa kwenye indawo.Uthe kunezinhlelo abazenzayo zokuqinisekisa ukuthi lo mbukiso uhlala kulesi sifundazwe yize bazi ukuthi nabanye bazowubhidela.Isikhulu esiphezulu se-SA Tourism uNksz Nombulelo Guliwe, sithe i-Africa’s Travel Indaba ihambe kahle kakhulu ngoba zingaphezu kuka-1 200 izinkampani ebezizokhangisa ngemikhiqizo yazo.Uveze ukuthi osomabhizinisi benze imihlangano engaphezu kuka-24 000 futhi bayajabula ukuthi namazwe ase-Afrika ayanda kulo mbukiso.UMnuz John Oritho obhekele ukusebenza kwe-ICC, uthe isimo sesingcono kakhulu kulokho esasiyikho emuva kokuhlasela kweCovid-19.“Silindele ukuthi imicimbi eza lapha ikhule ngoba kuyimanje isikhulu esiphezulu sase-ICC siphesheya siyohlwaya eminye imicimbi esingayiletha lapha. Ukuza kwe-Travel Indaba kuyasisiza ngoba kuvulela abafundi bezokuvakasha eDurban University of Technology (DUT) amathuba okuthola isipiliyoni somsebenzi. Sibuye sithathe abapheki bakuzo zonke izikole zalapha eThekwini ukuze bazophekela izivakashi zamazwe omhlaba. Bonke abasebenzayo bathola izitifiketi ezishoyo ukuthi bebesebenza kwi-Travel Indaba ezibasiza ukuthola umsebenzi noma ukuzisebenza,” kusho u-Oritho.Uthe bayakuqonda ukubaluleka kwezokuphepha kwezokuvakasha ngoba izivakashi zifuna ukuzizwa ziphephile ngaso sonke isikhathi.Uthembise abantu ukuthi ezokuphepha zizohlala ziqinile eThekwini ngoba umasipala ubambisene kahle nosomabhizinisi nezinye izinhlaka zomphakathi.

IMEYA yaseThekwini, uMnuz Cyril Xaba, uchaze isinqumo sokucisha izikweletu zentela yemizi yasebashona njengesenzo esizonikeza usizo emakhaya ahlwempu.UXaba usho kanje emhlanganweni womkhandlu kamasipala weTheku obubanjelwe eNkosi Albert Luthuli International Convention Centre, eThekwini ngoLwesine.Isinqumo sokumemezela ushwele wokwesula izikweletu zentela yemizi yabantu asebashona nalabo abaxakeke kakhulu abangakwazi ukuzikhokhela, kuhambisana nemithetho esophikweni olulawula ezezimali, i-Municipal Financial Management Act kanye ne-eThekwini Municipality Credit Control ne-Debt Collection Policy.Ngokwesitatimende esikhishwe uMasipala weTheku, izikweletu zentela yemizi yabantu asebashona zingaphezu kuka-R900 million.Umkhandlu uphinde wanquma ukuthi ukucisha lezi zikweletu kuzokwenzeka ngaphansi kwemibandela ethize."Umufi kanye nefa alishiyile kumele kube yindawo yokuhlala, hhayi ibhizinisi; isikweletu esithintekayo sibe sidala kunezinyanga ezingu-24, ozozuza indawo osaphila onetayitela elisemthethweni lokumela ifa, kumele aphumele obala ukugwema ukuvela kabusha kwesikweletu. Ezimweni lapho isihlobo kungumuntu osemncane noma ohlwempu, umkhandlu ugunyaze ukuthi inqubomgomo yabahlwempu izosetshenzizwa," sisho kanje isitatimende.IMeya ikhuthaze abanamatayitela ukuthi basondele ukuze bezokwazi ukungena ngaphansi kwalezi zinhlelo."Lesi sinyathelo sizovumela abahlezi endaweni enetayitela elisemthethweni ukuthi beze ngaphambili futhi benze amalungiselelo adingekayo. Ngenxa yalesi sinqumo, umasipala unombono wokuthi lokhu kuzosiza imindeni eminingi edonsa kanzima ngoba abanye baze baxhume nezinsiza zethu ngokungemthetho, okwenza ukuthi silahlekelwe kakhulu njengedolobha," kusho iMeya uXaba.Khonamanjalo iMeya iphinde yanxusa izihlobo zalaba abazohlomula ukuthi balisebenzise leli thuba ngokuthi baye kumasipala bayobuzisisa ngalolu hlelo ukuze bangene kulo ngokushesha.

KUBUYISE ithemba ukuphuma ngobuningi kwabantu besilisa beyohlolwa umdlavuza wamankwahla eMlazi Com-Tech, eMlaza, ngoMgqibelo.Lokhu kushiwo uSihlalo wePatients Affairs kwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Dumisa Pakkies, othe kubahlabe umxhwele ukuqhamuka kwabesilisa ezindaweni ezehlukene.UPakkies wasinda emva kokutholakala kwalo mdlavuza ngo-2020.Uthe ngokubambisana nenhlangano engenzi nzuzo, iProstate Cancer Foundation, bebelethe odokotela abaseqophelweni eliphezulu bezohlola abesilisa baphinde baxoxisane nabo ngokubaluleka kokunakekela isimo sabo sezempilo.“Indoda kufanele ihlolwe. Siyabagqugquzela ukuthi bahlolwe unyaka nonyaka ngoba ngesikhathi umuntu eqala ebona izimpawu, umdlavuza usuke usuhambe ibanga elide, esemancane amathuba okuthi welapheke,” kusho uPakkies.Uthe ngokujwayelekile uma umuntu ezijwayeza ukuhlolwa unyaka nonyaka, uma enawo ubanjwa usasesigabeni sokuqala nesesibili bese kuba lula ukuthi welashwe.Uthe bagqugquzela ukuthi bonke abesilisa abaneminyaka engu-40 kuya phezulu, bazibandakanye nalokhu, wathi kulabo abanemindeni enomlando wawo, kufanele baqale ukuwuhlola okungenani uma beba neminyaka engu-35.UMnuz Dumisa Ngidi (59) waseMlaza ongomunye wabahloliwe, uthe ngokujwayelekile abantu besilisa abazwani nokunakekela impilo yabo.“Imvamisa singamadoda asikhulumi. Sibhekana nezimo sodwa, singatsheli muntu. Imikhankaso efana nale iyasiza ngoba iyasifundisa ukuthi sivuleleke ukuze sithole ukwesekwa okwenele,” kusho Ngidi.UMnuz Sithembiso Cele (64) waseLamontville, uthe iningi labesilisa lesaba ukuthi uma umuntu esetholwe nomdlavuza kusuke sekuphelile ngaye.“Sidinga imikhankaso efana nale ukuze sifunde okuningi, akuyiwe emphakathini, kukhulunywe ngomdlavuza emisakazweni nakumathelevishini, kugqugquzelwe ukuthi sihlole,” kusho uCele.

KUNENHLANSI yethemba empini yokulwa nobugebengu kuleli njengoba kunezinhlelo zokulungiswa kwesikhungo okubikwa kusona ubugebengu kuleli, i-10111. Lokhu kuvezwe nguMqondisi jikelele ehhovisi likamengameli, uNksz Phindile Baleni, neNhloko yoKlebe, uLieutenant General Godfrey Lebeya, abathe maduzane umphakathi uzokwazi ukusebenzisa le nombolo ukubika izehlakalo zobugebengu. ULebeya uthe lokhu bakwenza ngokuhlanganyela nosomabhizinisi bakuleli.“Sifuna ukusishintsha lesi sikhungo ukuze umphakathi ukwazi ukuqhubeka ubike amacala obugebengu. Lezi ngezinye zezinhlelo zokuqinisa ukulwa nobugebengu kuleli.”Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi lesi sikhungo sibhekene nezinkinga njengoba kuke kuphele isikhathi singasebenzi, abantu bangakwazi ukubika amacala.UNksz Baleni utshele abezindaba ukuthi mkhulu umsebenzi osuwenziwe ngaphansi kobudlelwano abanabo nalabo somabhizinisi emkhakheni ehlukene okubalwa nokulwa nobugebengu kuleli.Uthe kuhle ukuthi labo somabhizinisi bafaka isandla empini yokulwa nobugebengu kuleli.“Indaba yesikhungo i-10111 ngenye yezinto ezolungiswa ukuze kuqiniswe impi yokulwa nobugebengu. Uma sekulungiswe yonke into sizovivinya indaba yalesi sikhungo ekomkhulu laso eMidrand.” Uthe kunezinye izinhlelo zokuthi kusungulwe iForensic Laboratory ukusheshisa izinto ezithinta uphenyo. “Ukuphasiwa komthethosivivinywa, iNPA Amendment Bill, kuzoqinisa kuphinde kwenze uphiko lwezokushushisa luzimele. Lokhu kuzokwenza ukuthi ziqhubeke izinhlelo zokulwa nenkohlakalo kuleli,” kusho uLebeya. UNksz Baleni uthe ngaphansi kwalokhu kusebenzisana nosomabhizinisi sekwehlise ukucishwa kukagesi kuleli.“Kwehlile ukucishwa kukagesi ngo-61% uma kuqhathaniswa nesikhathi esifanayo ngonyaka odlule. Lokhu kwenziwe wukuthi kubuye ukusebenza kwesikhungo sikagesi, iKusile, kanjalo nezinhlelo ezikhona zokuthi kufakwe ama-solar ophahleni lwezindlu.” Uthe ziyaqhubeka izinhlelo zokuqeda le nkinga njengoba sekunebhodi eliqokiwe enkampanini, iNational Transmission Company of South Africa (NTCSA). Maduzane kunezinhlelo zokuthi le nkampani iqale ukusebenza.“ Uveze ukuthi izinhlelo zalo nyaka wukuthi kunyuswe ugesi okhona kuleli ufinylele ku-11.5 GW. Ubalule nokuthi izinkinga ezibhekene nokuthuthwa kwempahla kuleli ziyalungiswa.“Uhulumeni nosomabhizinisi bayazilungisa ezithinta nokuphuculwa kwezithinta ukuthuthwa kwempahla kusetshenziswa amaguzu. Sikhuluma nje sesehlile nesibalo semikhumbi ebibhajwe echwebeni laseThekwini. Amaphoyisa amatasa nezinhlelo zokuqapha ingqalasizinda.”

KUBUYISE ithemba ukusayinwa komthetho ngokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu, i-Climate Change Bill, esayinwe nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa.Ngalo  mthetho uhulumeni uhlose ukuzibophezela ekuqhamukeni namaqhinga azonciphisa umonakalo odalwa isimo sezulu esingesihle, ngenxa yokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu.Phakathi kokunye okulindeleke kuhulumeni ukuthi aqinisekise ukuthi elakuleli lenza okulindeleke kulo, kwinhlanganisela yamazwe azibophezele ekuqhamukeni namasu azolwisana nalesi sihlava. Echaza kafushane okhulumela ihhovisi likaRamaphosa, uMnuz Vincent Magwenya, uthe phakathi kokuhloswe ngalo mthetho, ngukuthi elakuleli liqinisekise ukuthi muncane umoya eliwungcolisayo.“Ngokuqhubeka kwesikhathi kufanele elakuleli linciphise inani lama-greenhouse gases eliwakhiqizayo, afinyelele esikalweni esivumelekile ngale kokuthi kulahleke amathuba emisebenzi. Kumele kwakhiwe amanye amathuba omsebenzi azobe eqhakambisa ukubaluleka kokusetshenziswa kwezinye izinto ezingawungcolisi umoya,” kusho uMagwenya.Lo mthetho uhlose ukuthi uqinise amatomu okusebenzisana phakathi kwenzinhlaka ezehlukene nokubekwa kwemigomo ecacile elakuleli likwazi ukuhlangabezana nezivumelwano, zeNationally Determined Contribution (NDC) engaphansi kwesivumelwano saseParis.Lesi sivumelwano sasayinwa amazwe angu-196 engqungqutheleni i-UN Climate Change Conference (COP21), eyayiseParis ngo-2015.Amazwe azibophezela ukuthi azoqhamuka nezindlela ezintsha zokunciphisa ukukhiqiza umoya ongcolile, aqhamuke nezindlela ezintsha ezizokhuthaza umoya ohlanzekile.Kucacele noma ngubani ukuthi iyadingeka imizamo enjengale kulandela iziwombe zomonakalo odalwa yisimo sezulu esingesihle esilokhu sibonakala siziphinda minyaka yonke.Lokhu kusho ukuthi kufanele kushintshe ukwenza kubantu, izimboni zemikhiqizo kanjalo nezinhlaka ezehlukene zikahulumeni.Uma ubuka iziwombe zesimo sezulu esingesihle ezilokhu zihlasela isifundazwe iKwaZulu-Natal kukhomba ngokusobala ukuthi izinto ziya ngokuya ziba zimbi.Ngo-Ephreli 2022 lesi sifundazwe sahlaselwa yizikhukhula ezadlula nemiphefumulo yabantu abalinganiselwa ku-450. ITheku lashayeka kakhulu.Balinganiselwa ku-48 abagcina bengatholwanga.Ezibalweni ezashicilelwa uhulumeni ezingeni likazwelonke, abalelwa ku-4 000 amakhaya acekeleka phansi, kwathi angaphezu kuka-8 000 akhahlamezeka kancane. Lokhu kwashiya abantu abalinganiselwa ku-40 000 bengenazo izindawo zokufihla ikhanda.Zingaphezu kuka-600 izikole ezacekeleka phansi, okwaholela ekutheni abafundi abangaphezu kuka-270 000 bathikamezeke.Izikhungo zezempilo ezathinteka zibalelwa ku-66.NgoDisemba 2023, zaphinda zagasela futhi izikhukhula, kwathinteka uMnambithi noMgungundlovu. Ngokwezibalo ezashicilelwa uMnyango wokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu, kuleso siwombe kwafa abantu abangu-40.Le mvula yabuye yaholela ekutheni kulimale abantu abangu-74.Kwakhahlamezeka amakhaya angu-800, kuwona kwakukhona angu-247 okwaphela nya ngawo, kwasala abantu abangu-47 bengenandawo yokuhlala, kwathinteka abalinganiselwa ku-4 000.Ngasekuqaleni kukaJuni nonyaka, kufe abayishumi kuhlasela isishingishane oThongathi. Isishingishane sashiya inqwaba ingenamakhaya. Ngokusho kowayeyiMeya yeTheku uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda, umonakalo owadalwa yisishingishane ulingangiselwa kuR481.7 million.Kuzo zonke lezi ziwombe, nengqalasizinda efana nemigwaqo, amabhuloho akusali , nakho kucekeleka phansi.Emasontweni edlule, umlilo wequbula eShowe naseMgungundlovu udlule nabantu abangu-15.EMgungundlovu, bayisikhombisa abacisha umlilo abafe bezama ukubhula umlilo eBoston. Kule sigameko, kwasha amadlelo angama-hektha angaphezu kuka-2 000, kwasha imfuyo engu-48.Ngaphambi kwalokho, lo mnyango wabika ngokufa kwabayisikhombisa kulandela ukuqubuka komlilo wequbula ezindaweni ezehlukene okukhona kuzo iKing Cetshwayo, Ilembe, Zululand noThukela.Abalimi balahlekelwa yimfuyo engu-1 600, isha emlilweni, kwathi ama-hektha angu-14 000 ayenamadlelo angqongqa.Ucwaningo olwenziwa yizazi zesimo sezulu, lukhomba ukuthi ukuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu kudalwa yizenzo zabantu ngokushisa kwabo kuze kweqe izinto ezifana namalahle, uwoyela negesi. Ukushiswa kwalezi zinto kuholela ekutheni kwakheke ukushisa okungabekezeleleki emkhathini bese kuba nezimo zezulu ezingezinhle.OnguSolwazi kwezokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu eLondon School of Hygiene & Tropical Medicine, ophinde ahlonishwe ngokuba wuSolwazi eNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal, uTafadzwa Mabhaudhi, uthe elakuleli seliphenduke inkundla yesimo sezulu esingesihle ngenxa yokuthi alizilungiseleli.Uthe okwenza kushaye kuzwele ukuthi izinga lobubha nokungalingani kwabantu liphezulu kakhulu.“Ngokubambisana phakathi kwezinhlaka zonke zikahulumeni, umphakathi, izincithabuchopho, abemikhakha ezimele, sihlalelwe yijoka lokwenza okuthile ukuzama ukunciphisa umthelela odalwa isimo sezulu esingesihle,” kusho uMabhaudhi.Uthe okungasiza ukuthi izwe liqale ukuqinisa ekusebenziseni amandla avuselelekayo (renewable energy) liphinde litshale izihlahla eziningi.“Umphakathi kufanele ufundiswe ngobungozi besimo sezulu esingesihle ukuze uqonde ubungozi baso. Lokhu kuzolekelela nasekuzilungiseleleni, ikakhulu kulabo abahlala ezindaweni ezakhele imifula,” kusho uMabhaudhi.Uthe kufanele uhulumeni ashintshe ukwenza, esikhundleni sokuthi aqhamuke esephendula emonakalweni odalwe yisimo sezulu esingesihle.“Ngibala ingqalasizinda ekwaziyo ukumelana nesimo sesulu esingesihle,” kunezela yena.Wenze isibonelo ngohlelo lokugeleza kwamanzi emigwaqweni. Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi imibiko yangemuva kwezikhukhula zika-Ephreli 2022, yaveza ukuthi enye yezinto ezenza ukuthi iTheku kube yilo elishayeka kakhulu, ukungasebenzi kohlelo lokuhambisa amanzi emigwaqweni.UMasipala weTheku wathunyelwa imibuzo mayelana nokuthi usuhambe ibanga elingakanani ukulungisa le nkinga. Esikhundleni sokuphendula, wacela ukuthunyelwa uhlu lwemigwaqo enale nkinga.

UNGQONGQOSHE wamaPhoyisa kuleli, uMnuz Bheki Cele uthi ukwakhiwa kwesiteshi samaphoyisa eManguzi, kuzolekelela ekulweni nokweqiswa kwezimoto umngceleni okudla lubi.UCele uvule ngokusemthethweni isiteshi samaphoyisa esakhiwe kabusha sanwetshwa saba ngcono kunakuqala. Kuvulwa isiteshi nje, isifunda uMkhanyakude, sixakwe wubugebengu bokushushumbiswa kwezimoto emngceleni.Kunezigebengu ezeba izimoto kuleli bese ziziwelisa ziye emazweni angomakhelwane anjengeMozambique. Kusolakala ukuthi kuneqeqebana elibamba inkunzi lithathe izimoto ezinkulu zidayiswe eMozambique.Kugcine kutshalwa ithimba elikhethekile ukuthi liyozinza kule ndawo libhekane nalobu bugebengu.UCele kuleli sonto ubenomkhankaso wokuvula iziteshi zamaphoyisa ezintsha esifundazweni.Ungqongqoshe uvule ngokusemthethweni isiteshi samaphoyisa kwaDabhazi, KwaNongoma. Uphinde wavula isiteshi samaphoyisa eMelmoth, kulo leli sonto elifanayo, esinye eGamalakhe, ePort Shepstone. NeDonybroook ayisalanga ngaphandle. Ukuvulwa kweziteshi kuchazwe njengomzamo wokubhekana nenkinga yobugebengu edla lubi ezweni.Ngaphandle kokuvulwa kweziteshi, uCele uke wazinza esifundazweni KwaZulu-Natal, ehamba ngohlelo lwezimbizo zokulwa nobugebengu ezindaweni ezehlukene.Ubugebengu budla lubi KwaZulu- Natal, kanti amaphoyisa ayavutha abathela othulini abasolwa okuthiwa basuke bewadubula uma eyobabopha.

“BANGALALA bevale iso elilodwa abacebile uma igebe phakathi kwabampofu nabacebile lingavalwa.” Lesi yisexwayiso esikhiswe yiPhini likaNgqongqoshe wezokuVakasha, uMnuz Fish Mahlalela.Izolo, uMahlalela evula isithangami sokucobelelana ngolwazi namathuba embonini yezokuvakasha, kwi-Africa’s Travel Indaba, uthe likhulu kakhulu igebe phakathi kwabampofu nabacebile eNingizimu Afrika.“Kufanele singalizibi igebe eliphakathi kwabampofu nabacebile ngoba lilokhu likhula. Imboni yezokuvakasha ngenye yezindlela esingalivala ngayo leli gebe ngoba lo mkhakha unamathuba amaningi. Ukwazi ukuletha imali emakhaya, ukwazi ukuvulela abesifazane nabantu abasha amathuba omnotho. Uma singalivali igebe lokungalingani phakathi kwabaswele nabacebile, abacebile ngeke balale ngoba bazogqekezelwa abampofu, abazobe bezofuna ukudla,” kusho uMahlalela.Uthe bewuhulumeni badinga ukusebenzisana nezinhlaka ezihlukene emphakathini ukuze kuvulelwe abampofu amathuba emkhakheni wezokuvakasha.Ugxeke abavalela abanye ngaphandle, wathi umkhakha wezokuvakasha kuleli akusiwona owabebala elithile kuphela kodwa ngowabo bonke abantu baseNingizimu Afrika.Inkakha yomlingisi wakuleli, uJerry Mofokeng wa Makhetha, igqugquzele abantu ukuthi babe yibona, bangasilahli isintu ngoba izivakashi zifuna ukubona lokho.UJerry nguye obe yisikhulumi sokuqala embukisweni wezokuvakasha, i-Africa’s Travel Indaba, eqhubeka eNkosi Albert Luthuli International Convention Centre.Uthe izivakashi zifuna ukuzwa izindaba zabantu bakuleli, zifuna ukuzwa imfudumalo yabo nobuntu.Lo mlingisi uqale ngokuxoxa inganekwane wabe esethula inkondlo ebincoma ubuhle beNingizimu Afrika, amaqhawe ase-Afrika nazo zonke izigameko esezehlele leli zwekazi.Izolo, bekunezithangami zokucobelelana ngolwazi ezihlukene lapho osomabhizinisi abancane beveze ukuthi badinga ukufakwa ezinhlelweni zokuthuthukisa umnotho.UJerry Pooe ongumsunguli we-Wushwini Pan African Art Centre, eKwaNgcolosi, uthe bafuna ukuhlomula bewosomabhizinisi abancane emicimbini emikhulu eyenzeka enkabeni yeTheku.Uveze ukuthi yibona abasondele kakhulu kubantu futhi abakwazi ukudala amathuba omsebenzi amaningi.Amazwi akhe ananelwe nguNkk Dumile Cele, othe amabhizinisi amancane yiwona akwazi ukudala amathuba omsebenzi amaningi ngakho kufanele asekwe.UMnuz Thato Mothopeng onguMqondisi weSouth African Township and Village Tourism (SATO VITO), uthe izivakashi azisagcini ngokuhambela emadolobheni noma eziqiwini kodwa sezifuna ukuya ebantwini.“Izivakashi sezifuna ukuyobona abantu ukuthi baphila kanjani. Zifuna ukuyohlala emakhaya abantu, azisathandi kakhulu ukuhlala emahhotela noma eziqiwini zifuna ukuxoxa nabantu,” kusho uMothopeng.UJerry uthe kuyiqiniso lokhu ngoba izivakashi ezivela eRussia, ziye zicele ukuyobonana nemindeni yaKwaNgcolosi, zicele nokuyobona izangoma.“Ezokuvakasha ziyakwazi ukushintsha impilo yabantu ngoba zifuna ukubahambela lapho behlala khona. Sinemindeni esisebenzisana nayo, ekwaziyo ukuphatha kahle izivakashi nokuxoxa nazo. Okuhle wukuthi izivakashi zifuna ngisho ukudla nabo abantu emizini yabo, zibone ukuthi baphila kanjani nsukuzonke,” kusho uJerry.

LIZOHLAWULISWA uR1 193 iqembu lezepolitiki uma lisuselwa uqwembe lokhetho olulodwa kweziphanyekwe ezigxotsheni kusuka ngoMsombuluko (Julayi 1).Lesi saziso sikhishwe uMasipala weTheku esitatimendeni osithumele abezindaba izolo.Lo mkhandlu uthe ukhetho lwangoMeyi 29 lufike lwadlula, wakhuthaza amaqembu ezepolitiki ukuthi asuse izingqwembe ungaze uzisuse ngokwawo.Ibamba lemenenja ebhekele ezokukhangisa, uMnuz Sagren Naicker, lithe umgomo wabo uthi zonke izingqwembu kumele zisuswe zingakapheli izinsuku ezingu-30 kudlule ukhetho.Uthe lesi sinqumo esathathwa emhlanganweni wamakhansela ngoDisemba nyakenye.“Uma amaqembu ezepolitiki ehluleka ukususa lezingqwembe ngokwawo, esikhathini abekelwe sona, umasipala uzozisusa ngokwawo bese uhlawulisa lelo qembu ubheka isibalo sezingqwembe ozisusile,” kuchaza uNaicker.Uthe lomgomo ufaka phakathi nalawo maqembu ayekade egunyazwe ukukhangisa kothalawayeka nasemabhishi ngokhetho.Uqhube wathi umasipala wenza isiqiniseko sokuthi ilandelwa njengoba injalo imithetho yedolobha futhi akukho namunye onegunya lokukhangisa ngaphandle kokuthi anikezwe imvume.Imenenja kaMasipala weTheku, uMnuz Musa Mbhele, ihambe emazwini kaNaicker, yathi ukhetho ludlulile ngakho azisuswe izingqwembe.“Ukususwa kwazo kuzosisa ukugcina umasipala uhlanzekile ngoba ezinye izingqwembe zipheshulwe umoya ezinye zilenga ngendlela enobungozi,” kusho uMbhele.

KUZOSHAYEKA abahlala emijondolo nabalimi abasafufusa kuncishiswa imali eyabelwe uhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal.UMgcinimafa kazwelonke unciphise imali yokuthuthukiswa kwemijondolo, neyokuthuthukisa abalimi abasafufusa eyabelwa iKwaZulu-Natal njengoba siqhubeka nokuba sibi isimo sezezimali kuhulumeni.Izindaba zokuncishiswa kwemali eyabelwe uhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal zidalulwe uMphathiswa wezeziMali, uNkk Peggy Nkonyeni, ngesikhathi ethula isabelosemali, izolo, esiShayamthetho.Imali ebekelwe ukuthuthukisa imijondolo, i-Informal Settlements Upgrading Partnership Grant, incishiswe ngo-R228.6 million kunyaka wezimali ozayo.UNkk Nkonyeni uthe uMgcinimafa kazwelonke unqume ukunciphisa le mali ukuze kuzogcwaliselwa emalini eyabelwe ukunyusela abasebenzi bakahulumeni imiholo.Inhloso yemali encishisiwe ukuhlinzeka abahlala emijondolo ngamanzi, ugesi, ukuthuthwa kwendle, nemigwaqo.UNkk Nkonyeni uthe enye imali ebekelwe ukuthuthukisa ezokuhlaliswa kwabantu, iHuman Settlements Development Grant, nayo incishiswe ngo-R268.7 million.Nayo le mali ethathwe kwisabelomali izogcwalisela emalini eyabelwe ukunyusela abasebenzi bakahulumeni imiholo.Imali eyabelwe ukulekelela abalimi abamnyama abasafufusa, Ilima/Letsema Projects Grant, inciphiswe ngo-R24 million."UMgcinimafa kazwelonke uthathe le mali wayoyifaka ohlelweni lukamengameli lokudala amathuba emisebenzi."UNkk Nkonyeni uthe isiyonke imali okuncishiswe ngayo isabelomali sesifundazwe kulo nyaka wezimali ozayo ingu-R4 billion.Izoqhubeka nokuncishiswa ngemali engaphezu kukaR4 billion kwiminyaka emithathu yezimali ezayo.UNkk Nkonyeni uthe akuzange kube lula ukunciphisa isabelomali."Uma sibuka ukuthi kufanele kwenziwe kanjani ukunciphisa isabelomali kulo nyaka bekufanele sijule, ngoba sesibe neminyaka eminingi yokuncishiswa kwaso, ngakho ke akukho lula ukukwenza kulo nyaka wezimali. Isabelomali sesifundazwe asikho esimweni esihle. Kodwa ke akukho ebesingakwenza, yingakho kumele sikwenze kuze kuba isimo somnotho siyashintsha."UNkk Nkonyeni uthe iminyango kahulumeni yezifundazwe kufanele izibambe ziqine njengoba umnotho ukhula kancane.Uthe babheke ukuthi umnotho waKwaZulu-Natal ukhule kangcono uma sekuxazululwe inkinga yokushoda kukagesi.UMnyango wezeMfundo nowezeMpilo iyona ethola isabelo esibhekile.Isabelosemali sesifundazwe singu-R150 billion.UMnyango wezeMfundo uthole uR62 billion, owezeMpilo wathola uR53 billion, kwathi owezokuThutha wona wathola uR13 billion.UMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho uthole uR3.4 billion, owezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi nawo wathola uR3.4 billion, kwathi owezokuHlaliswa kwaBantu wathola uR3.5 billion.UMnyango wezoLimo uthole uR2,6 billion, owezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu uthole uR1.7 billion, owezeMisebenzi yoMphakathi wathola uR1.8 billion, kwathi owezeMidlalo wona wathola uR1.5 billion.IHhovisi likaNdunankulu lithole uR784 million, elikaSomlomo lithole uR782 million, elikaMgcinimafa lathola uR680 million, kwathi uMnyango wezokuPhepha koMphakathi wona wathola uR243 million.

Ukhalaezimathonsi uyise womfanyana (11) wase-Adams Mission, engeke silidalule igama lakhe nelikayise, othi indodana yakhe isezinhlungwini emva kokucwecwa wudokotela isikhumba somphambili kwasala ijwabu ekubeni ubethi uyayisoka.Elandisa ngokubehlele uyise womfanyana, uthe waze ngesikhungo sokusoka i-Unjani Clinic ngokusibona kuTikTok, lapho besikhangisa khona ngokuthi sisoka izingane zabafana. “Ngibone ukuthi lesi sikhungo esizimele ngesangala ngihlala ngakhona e-Adams Mission, ngase ngiyasethemba, ngayisa umfana wami kusona. Bengifuna ukuthi kusokwe indodana yami futhi bekungenye yezindlela zokuseseka ngoba esasendaweni, kanti ngizilandela izinkinga,” kusho uyise.Uthe indodana yakhe isokwe kulesi sikhungo ngoMsombuluko, wangoJuni 17, wathi babone isibuyela kusona ngesonto eledlule, isiqaqwa amabhandishi ukuthi ayisokekanga nhlobo, kunalokho kucwecwe isikhumba phakathi nomphambili, ijwabu lisenjengoba belinjalo. Leli phephandaba lisibonile isithombe esikhombisa ubuntu balo mfana ngendlela alinyazwe ngayo. Kucwecwe isikhumba kwajikelezwa umphambili wakhe ijwabu lisele liyazilengela.“Ngithe uma ngibuza ukuthi kungani ingane yami ilimele kanjena, bacasha ngokuthi mhlawumbe yalala kabi ebusuku, yazicindezela, yazithunuka - besho into engekho ngoba kuyacaca ukuthi umsebenzi obekumele bawenze ubehlulile. Sizamile ukubonisana nabo ukuthi simisa kanjani ukulungisa le nkinga, kepha bangakhombisa nhlobo ukuzwelana nathi.”“Sikhathazeke kakhulu ngalesi simo, size sabona kukuhle ukuhambisa ingane esibhedlela eKingsway izolo (esho ngoLwesine), okuyilapho ikhona namanje, ukubheka ukuthi ngeke yini ilapheke.“Kuyasikhathaza ukuthi asazi umonakalo ongaphakathi ungakanani, futhi sesaba nokuthi kungenzeka ukuthi ubuntu bayo bungasebenzi ngendlela efanele uma isikhulile uma kuwukuthi ilimale kabi,” kusho kanje.Kuthintwa uMnuz Nhlanhla Mbatha osebenza kulesi sikhungo, uthe bayalwazi lolu daba futhi bamchazela uyise womfana ukuthi basola ukuthi ingane yakhe yazilimaza ngokuzenwaya esilondeni singakapholi kahle. Uthe kungenzeka ukuthi yikhona okudale ukuthi ingasokeki ngendlela efanele, futhi ilimale ngale ndlela.“Simcelile nokuthi alethe umntwana wakhe kithina izolo (esho ngoLwesine), kepha wala waphetha, wasitshela ukuthi lolu daba uzolwengamela ngendlela yakhe, njengoba sekwenzeka manje sithintwa ngabezindaba. Simtshelile futhi ukuthi uma ebona ukuthi kukhona esingakwenzanga kahle akasivulele icala ukuze udaba lusingathwe ngokomthetho,” kulanda uMbatha.Uqhube wathi bona sebeneminyaka engaphezu kwemihlanu benza lo msebenzi bezimele, futhi kuyaqala ukuthi kube nesimo esinjena.“Nawe bhuti wami ungazifikela esikhungweni sethu uzibonele umsebenzi wethu ukuthi siwenza kanjani,” esho entathelini. Kuthintwa okhulumela uMnyango wezeMpilo esifundazweni, uMnuz Agiza Hlongwane, ucele ukuthi banikwe ithuba lokulandela lolu daba ukuze bathole ukuthi konakale kuphi.

KUSOLWA ukuthi ukuzibandakanya nezinto ezikhathaza umphakathi, yikhona okudonsele amanzi ngomsele isishoshovu somphakathi esiyilungu le-EFF kuMasipala waseBaqulusini, esidutshulwe eduze kwakubo ngabasolwa abangaziwa.UMnuz Simangaliso Zwane (42) waseShoba eVryheid, kuthiwa udutshulwe  ngoLwesine okukholakala ukuthi kwenziwe ngabamfonele bazenza abafuna ababoleke itende lomcimbi nezitulo, okuyibhizinisi abelenza.UMnuz Zipho Zwane oyisihlobo somndeni ophinde abe wuSihlalo we-South African National Civic Organization esifundeni iZululand,  elandisa Isolezwe uthe umufi kuthiwa uphume emva kokuthola ucingo oluthile kukhona abemnxusa ukuthi bahlangane esitolo esiseduze, obedukile obezoboleka itende, ngalo uLwesine ntambama.“Udutshulwa nje, ngayizolo bekunecala abelihambele labasolwa ngokuzama ukubulala uMnuz Sandile Mtshali, oyiPhini likaSihlalo we-South African Municipal Workers Union, okwenzeke ngenyanga edlule. Yize singeke siqagele ukuthi ukubulawa kwakhe kuhlobene yini namacala enzekayo endaweni abenganqeni ukuphumela obala ngawo, kodwa ubenakho ukusho ukuthi kukhona abamfuna efile,” usho kanje.Uthe umufi ubejwayele ukuthi uma kunamacala athinta inkohlakalo noma ubugebengu emphakathini, aphumele obala akhulume ngokungesabi, kangangoba noma abasolwa beboshwa ubeba sekhaleni ehola umphakathi ukuyobhikisha ngaphandle kwenkantolo ngenhloso yokufaka ingcindezi ukuthi bangayitholi ibheyili.Uthe isifiso sabo ukuthi icala lokubulawa kwakhe liphenywe ezingeni lesifundazwe njengoba kukhombisa ukuthi izinga lokudutshulwa kwabantu lidla lubi endaweni kanti isikhathi esiningi amanye amacala avele aphelele ezeni, kungaboshwa muntuUMnuz Thulani Ndlovu owuSihlalo we-EFF esifundeni iZululand, uthe bagqemeke engeqiwa ntwala ngokubulawa kukaZwane.“Sizwelana kakhulu nomndeni wakhe, sonke silimele. Ubewumuntu obewukhathelele umphakathi, esebenza ngokuzikhandla ekukhuliseni iqembu. Iyasithusa indlela okwenzeke ngayo ngoba kuyakhombisa ukuthi yinto ebihleliwe. Uvalo esinalo ukuthi asazi ukuthi bangaki abantu abakhathalele umphakathi asebehlelelwe ukubulawa njengoba kukhombisa ukuthi kunabantu abasemkhankasweni wokubulala,” usho kanje.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uConstable Thenjiswa Ngcobo, uthe amaphoyisa aseVryheid aphenya icala lokubulala

KUBE isiphithiphithi abantu bebaleka, kuqhuma isibhamu emini kabha, erenki yaseThuthwini, eseduze nezitolo eMthwalume izolo, esigamekweni esidlule nemiphefumulo yabane okuthiwa kukhona kubo nosomatekisi odumile waseHlokozi.Lesi sigameko esishiye amalungu omphakathi azibonele senzeka ethuthumela ngenxa yokwethuka, kukholakala ukuthi abathathu abebeqaphe usomatekisi (igama lakhe eligodliwe kuze kwaziswe umndeni) bashonele endaweni yesigameko kwathi yena wadlula emhlabeni emva kwesikhashana engeniswe emtholampilo.Ilungu lomphakathi elizibonele ngamehlo kwehla lo mshophi, lithe imoto ebihamba usomatekisi nokukholakala ukuthi bebemgadile ihlaselwe abathile abebehamba ngezimoto ezimbili abavele bakhipha izinhlokohlela zezibhamu ngamawindi badubula bebhekise ngakuyo, yasala imbobombobo.“Kuvele kwaqhamuka imoto eyiveni, abebephakathi bakhipha izinhlokohlela zezibhamu ngamawindi kwasho inhlamvu. Bengisathi ngingena esitolo kwa-Boxer, angibange ngisaqhubeka. Ngivele ngajika ngabaleka ngingazi kwenzekani, ngala ebengibalekela ngakhona kuvele kwaqhamuka imoto ethwala imali, ngavele ngangabe ngisazi ngishonephi ngoba bese ngizitshela ukuthi kubanjwa yona inkunzi,” kusho ilungu lomphakathi.Liveze ukuthi akabange esakuthenga abekusukele ekhala ngoba bese kugxabha isisu ngenxa yokuduma kwezulu lezandla. Kwi-video eqoshwe kwenzeka lesi sigameko kubonakala abantu besaphazeka bebaleka, oyiqophayo elokhu ebabaze njalo isihluku.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe  ngomthombo walo, usomatekisi ngesikhathi ehlaselwa ubephuma eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMzumbe lapho kukhona icala alihambayo. Kuvela ukuthi ungumfowabo kasomatekisi waseHlokozi owayesatshwa, owashona eminyakeni edlule emva kokudutshulwa amaphoyisa, ayekade emfuna uthuli.Ngesikhathi sokuloba, amaphoyisa abesaqinisekisa ukuthi bathathu abadlulile, kodwa umthombo weSolezwe uveze ukuthi owesine ushonele emtholampilo.Oyimenenja yenhlangano yamatekisi, i-South African National Taxi Association KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sifiso Shangase, ngesikhathi sokuloba uthe bebengakatholi mbiko ngalolu daba.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uBrigadier Jay Naicker, uthe amaphoyisa aseHibberdene aphenya amacala okubulala.“Kukholakala ukuthi umshayeli nabagibeli bebephuma enkantolo ekhona endaweni besathi bangena emgwaqweni omkhulu ngesikhathi bevalelwa ekhoneni ngabebehamba ngezimoto ezimbili abavele bavulela ngenhlamvu.  Kukholakala ukuthi abasolwa baphinde bathatha izibhamu zabagilwa ngaphambi kokuthi bashaye bachithe endaweni yesigameko,” kusho uNaicker.Uthe imbangela yalokhu kuhlasela ayikaziwa okwamanje, amaphoyisa ayaphenya.Kule ndawo okwenzeke kuyo lesi sigameko kuyaphithizela njengoba kunerenki yamatekisi, kunezitolo eduze nezinye izakhiwo zikahulumeni zokusiza umphakathi. Ngenxa yokuphithizela imoto edlula ngakhona ayikwazi ukuhamba ngejubane eliphezulu.

ASEFISA ukuthutha endaweni ukuze aphephe amanye amalungu omphakathi ngenxa yetwetwe kufufusa impi yezigodi ezimbili KwaNongoma okukholakala ukuthi kuqalwe wukubulawa komfundi owagwazwa ngomunye ngoJulayi.USeluleko Zondi (17), wasoNyango khona KwaNongoma, kuthiwa washona emva kokugwazwa ngomunye umfundi obehlala esigodini sakwaMusi, okuthiwa wamgwaza ngaphakathi emagcekeni esikole. Lo mfundi ubenza u-grade 12 esikoleni esisendaweni, iSihlahlasenkosi High.  Kuthiwa ingxabano yabo yayiqale ngaphandle kwesikole kanti kukholakala ukuthi umsolwa waboshwa wadedelwa ngenxa yeminyaka yakhe.Kukholakala ukuthi lesi sigameko yisona esiholele ekuhlaselweni  kwabesilisa abayisithupha okuthiwa bebehleli beziphuzela esitolo esikwaMusi ngoMgqibelo. Kuvela ukuthi badutshulwe ngabasolwa abangaziwa abebehlome ngezibhamu, kwashona ababili uChunu Mchunu ophelele endaweni yesehlo noSandile Ngubo, yena oshone emva kokungeniswa esibhedlela. Kulimale abanye ababili abangeniswe esibhedlela.Umthombo weSolezwe, okhona endaweni, uthe emva kwezinsuku kubulawe uSeluleko, kubulawe uThuba Mncwabe wakwaMusi ohlaselwe wadutshulwa ehostela eliseJeppestown eGoli okukholakala ukuthi ubulawe ngabasesigodini sasoNyango.“Emva kwaleso sigameko kuhlaselwe uGcwala Khumalo obeyinduna yezinsizwa wakwaMusi obulawelwe emzini wakhe nokukholakala ukuthi uhlaselwe abasoNyango.“Kuthiwa lokhu kwenzeke emva kokudutshulwa kukaNzama (igama lakhe esingenalo) wasoNyango okukholakala ukuthi udutshulwe abakwaMusi.Ikhansela lendawo, uMnuz Simanga Mbatha, likhuluma neSolezwe, lithe sekuphoqe ukuthi imeya yaKwaNongoma nezinduna baye eGoli ukuyobhula umlilo.“Kubulawa laba ngoMgqibelo, izinduna nemeya bebeseGoli ngalo isonto eledlule ukuyokhuluma nezinsizwa ngalesi sigameko. Isimo sibi kangangoba sekunamalungu omphakathi athi asesaba nokuphuma ebusuku azivalela ezindlini kanti amanye asefisa nokuthutha endaweni.  Siyafisa ukuthi umphakathi usebenzisane namaphoyisa ukuze kubanjwe abenzi bobubi bavalewe,” usho kanje.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa aKwaNongoma aphenya amacala amabili okubulala nawokuzama ukubulala ngesigameko esenzeke ngoMgqibelo.

AKHALA ngokugqemeka engeqiwa ntwala amalungu omphakathi wasoLundi, kungqongqiswa izitolo zabokufika basePakistan, ngesonto eledlule.Lesi sigameko esishiye amalungu omphakathi ebambe ongezansi, senzeke elokishini elikule ndawo ngoLwesine, kushiswa izitolo zabokufika eziyisithupha, kanti amaphoyisa aqinisekise ukuthi kuboshwe abasolwa abayisishiyagalombili abavele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMahlabathini, ngoLwesihlanu, ngamacala okucekelwa phansi kwempahla.UNkk DS Ntombela oyilungu lomphakathi, uthe ubethembele esitolo esiseduze kwakwakhe ukuthenga ukudla futhi uma engenayo imali ubekweleta kuso, ekhokha uma esehole impesheni.“Kungiphethe kabuhlungu ukushiswa kwalesi sitolo. Kumanje nje ngisangene ngoba akukho muntu esengizokweleta kuyena. Uma ngizohola impesheni ngiyakhokha nanoma imalini yento engiyithathile, ngiyakhokha, ngiphila kuso.  Abenze lokhu lokhu uNkulunkulu ababonelele,” usho kanje.Uthe ngaphambi kwalesi sigameko, kuqale ngokuthi umnikazi wesitolo avalelwe ugesi, okungaziwa ukuthi kwenziwe ngubani. Uveze ukuthi umphakathi uzamile ukulekelela ngesikhathi isitolo sigqamuka amalangabi, kodwa kwanhlanga zimuka nomoya, emva kokuthi iqulu labafana lisibhunyele ngophethroli ngaphambi kokuthi libaleke.Omunye wabanikazi bezitolo ezishisiwe, uMnuz Abraham Bobich ekhuluma nabezindaba emva kwalesi sigameko, uthe  kuqhamuke abalisa abebehamba ngemoto emhlophe, babhunyela isitolo sakhe ngophethroli, balayitha ngaphambi kokuthi babaleke."Abashongo lutho, bavele bokhela izitolo ngomlilo. "Siyabonga ukuthi kukhona asebeboshiwe, kodwa siyesaba. Asazi noma bakhona yini abanye abebesebenzisana nabo abangakaboshwa. Abantu bayasikhalela, bathi asivule izitolo, kodwa sinovalo," usho kanjeUMasipala waseLundi ukhiphe isitatimende ugxeka lesi senzo.“Umasipala usubikele abomthetho ukuthi baphenye. Sicela bonke abanikazi bamabhizinisi ukuthi bahlale beqaphile, basebenzisane namaphoyisa ukugcina umthetho, nokuhleleka,” kubhalwe esitatimendeni.Abasolwa kuthiwa baboshwe ngalo uLwesine, kusaphele amahora ambalwa kwenzeke lesi sigamekoOkhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe abasolwa ababoshiwe kukholakala ukuthi bayathinteka emacaleni okucekelwa phansi kwempahla.

UHLALELE ovalweni umndeni wowesilisa  obewummangali ecaleni losolwa ngokuba yinkabi osaboshiwe, okuthiwa uhlaselwe wadutshulwa  emva kokuthola ucingo obelumsongela.UMnuz Simanga ‘Katsande’ Khumalo (29) waseMlaza kuthiwa bese ehamba ngesihlalo sabakhubazekile emva kokudutshulwa umsolwa owaziwayo endaweni ngo-2021 okuvele ukuthi uboshelwe namanye amacala.  UKhumalo udutshulwe ngenyanga edlule ehlaselwa kubo eMlaza esigamekweni okuboshwe kuso abasolwa ababili. Umndeni ukholwa ukuthi bebethunywe umsolwa engaphakathi ejele, obefuna umufi asule icala lokuzama ukubulala okuthiwa wayemvulele lona.Ilungu lomndeni kaKhumalo elicele ukungadalulwa lilandisa Isolezwe, lithe selokhu kwenzeke lesi sigameko sebethuka izanya kwazise kunamahlebezi okuthi umsolwa owayethume abahlaseli.“Ubewumuntu ophumelelayo. Ngo-2021, ngesikhathi ebuya emsebenzini ukhale ngokubanjwa inkunzi ngabathile, abaqale ngokumshaya ngenduku yegalofu ngaphambi kokuthi bamphuce ifoni nezinye izinto zomsebenzi. Omunye wabo wayemazi ngoba owakhona endaweni, sanikela kubo ngenhloso yokuthi kuxoxwe nonina ukuthi okungenani abuyise  i-simcard ngoba yayinezinamba ezibalulekile zasemsebenzini njengoba ngaleso sikhathi (umufi) wayeyimenenja eHusser Grill,” echaza.Uthe ngesikhathi befika kubo kamsolwa eMlaza kwa-B, batshelwa ababekhona  ukuthi akathintwa ngakho abahambe angaze ebafice, okuthe bengakaligwinyi waqhamuka wadubula ebhekise kuKhumalo. Uthe uKhumalo  waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela i-Prince Mshiyeni Memorial, kwaba wusuku agcine ngalo ukuzihambela ngezinyawo.Uthe emva kokuvulwa kwecala lokuzama ukubulala, umsolwa ubengaboshwa okuthe ngokuhamba kwesikhathi waboshelwa namanye amacala, akholwa ukuthi kwavuka naleli lokuzama ukubulala.“Ngelinye ilanga ngangena endlini umufi ekhala, wathi ufonelwe othile angamazi wamtshela ukuthi akasule icala emsabisa ngokuthi uzomenzakalisa.  Amaphoyisa abefuna ukuthi azobhala kabusha isitatimende, kodwa bese engasazimisele ngokuqhubeka naleli cala futhi nathi siwumndeni simeseka kulokho.  Ngizamile ukuyolesula kodwa amaphoyisa  anqaba athi lizosulwa owalivulayo, ngachaza ukuthi akakwazi ukuhamba njengoba ekhubazekile, kwavunyelwana ngokuthi umseshi uzofika ekhaya azomsayinisa amaphepha okulesula, kodwa lutho ukufika kwaze kwabe uyahlaselwa uyadutshulwa emva kokusongelwa ngokubulawa,” kusho yena.Uthe bezwe kuthiwa omunye wababoshiwe uvumile ukuthi wayethunywe umsolwa okwenza umndeni uhlalele ovalweni ngoba awazi ukuthi yikuphi okuzolandela njengoba kucaca ukuthi ukwazi ukuthumela izinkabi zimsebenzele engaphakathi ejele. Usole amaphoyisa ngokuhudula izinyawo uma umufi efuna ukusula icala ngoba ebona engaphephile.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Robert Netshiunda uqinisekise ukuboshwa kwabasolwa ababili abasolwa ngokubulala uKhumalo abebevele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMlaza ngesonto eledlule kanti bazophinde bavele kusasa.

Osomabhizinisi abahlukene baKwaZulu-Natal bathole ithuba nokukhangisa ngemikhiqizo yamabhizinisi abo ezihambelini zomcimbi wokuvulwa kwengqungquthela yezokuhwebelana, i-reSURGEnce Conference, e-ICC, eThekwini, ngoLwesine.Kule ngqungquthela, ezoze iphethwe ngeSonto, nezoba nezigcawu ezahlukene zokucobelana ngolwazi lokuchuma kwezamabhizinisi. Kunosomabhizinisi abawu-120 abazokhangisa ngamabhizinisi abo. UNkk Agnes Mhlongo weSwitched on Trade CC, yaKwaNyuswa, uthe ukuba kulo mcimbi kusho lukhulu kuyena futhi wethemba ukuthi kuzoba nomehluko obonakalayo ebhizinisini lakhe lezimpahla zokugqoka azithunga ngesandla, aliqala ngo-2005.“Ngizele ukuzokhangisa ngebhizinisi lami ezithamelini zamazwe omhlaba ngoba ngiyazi ukuthi ziyithanda kabi imikhiqizo ehlukile nemihle njengeyami. Ngifuna nokwakha ubudlelwano obuzoba wusizo ebhizinisini lami ngesikhathi esizayo,” kusho uNkk Mhlongo.UMnuz Sifiso Ngcobo naye ongomunye wosomabhizinisi ababezokhangisa emcimbini, uthe ithuba elinjengaleli liwusizo kakhulu kosomabhizinisi abanjengabo abangakachumi.Lo somabhizinisi owumdwebi nosebenzisa upende ukwenza izithombe zemidwebo uqhube wathi wethemba ukuthi le ngqungquthela izoba nomehluko omkhulu ebhizinisini lakhe ikakhulu ngoba bayindlala abamnyama abenza lo msebenzi.“Into engiyibheke kakhulu ngokuza lana wukwakha ubudlelwano obuzongisiza ngokungivulelela amanye amathuba ngomuso, nokuthi ngikwazi ukuthola eminye imicimbi efuze lona yokusabalalisa umkhiqizo engiwenzayo,” kusho yena.Le ngqungquthela izoqhubeka futhi namhlanje ngemibukiso yosomabhizinisi futhi kube nezingxoxo zokucobelana ngolwazi lokuhwebelana nokusebenzisana kwiziphathimandla zamazwe ehlukene omhlaba okubalwa nezaseMelika.NgoMgqibelo kuzovakashelwa izindawo zokuvakasha ezahlukene zaseThekwini, kube nomcimbi womculo wokholo kusihlwa, bese kuvalwa ngemvuselelo ngeSonto emini.

UMMELI uNksz Kaylen Moodley wenkampani yabameli iMooney Ford Attorneys udonse ngendlebe abaqashi ukuthi babe nobufakazi obuphathekayo ngaphambi kokuxosha abasebenzi.Usho lokhu emuva kokuthi iNkantolo okuDluliswa kuyo amacala iyalele isitolo iWoolworths ukuba sibuyisele emsebenzini umsebenzi owayexoshwe ngoba esolwa ngokuthenga incwadi yokugula kudokotela.Ngokombiko wePretoria News, lo msebenzi wathumela incwadi kadokotela ngesikhathi ayelovile emsebenzini. Abaphathi bakhe eWoolworths basola ukuthi uyithengile emuva kokuthola ukuthi yayisayinwe ngumuntu ababesola ukuthi uyinesi.Lo msebenzi wachaza ukuthi udokotela unezindawo ezimbili zokusebenza yingakho enye incwadi isayinwe wumuntu ohlukile kodwa abaqashi abazange balalele.Kuthiwa bathumela ithimba lapho kusebenzela khona lo dokotela elathola ukuthi abantu babeshesha ukuphuma sebephethe izincwadi zokugula.Wabe esexoshwa emuva kokuthi ithimba lithumele umbiko wokuthi lo dokotela ukokotela izincwadi.Ijaji leNkantolo okuDluliswa kuyo amacala lithe iWoolworths kufanele ibuyisele lo msebenzi eyamxosha ngo-2018 emsebenzini.Lathi abukho ubufakazi bokuthi udokotela udayisa izincwadi ngaphandle kwenzwabethi eyatholwa yilesi sitolo.UNksz Moodley ubhale kwi-website yeMooney Ford Attorneys emuva kwalesi sinqumo wathi abaqashi kufanele babe nobufakazi obuphathekayo, hhayi inzwabethi ngaphambi kokushushisa nokuxosha abasebenzi.Uthe uma umqashi esola ukuthi umsebenzi uthumele incwadi yokugula ewumkokotelo kufanele aqoqe ubufakazi kudokotela othintekayo, ambuze ukuthi isiguli sifikile yini kuye?Uthe leli cala lingubufakazi bokuthi ukukhuluma iqiniso kuyakhulula ngoba umsebenzi othintekayo wayemazisa njalo umqashi uma egula futhi eze nencwadi kadokotela.Uphethe ngokuthi wumqashi okufanele abe nobufakazi obuphathekayo bokuthi umuntu akaguli ngempela futhi uma esola udokotela ngokudayisa izincwadi nalapho abe nobufakazi obuphathekayo, hhayi inzwabethi.

IKHOMBISE ukunengeka ingxenye yabamangalelwa abangu-65, ababoshelwe icala lokuphehla izibhelu zomtapo ngoJulayi 2021, kuchithwa izicelo zokuthi bathole abameli bamahhala.Laba bamangalelwa abaqhamuka ezingxenyeni ezehlukene zezwe, bebevele eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini ngoLwesine.Bekulindeleke ukuthi kuqale kwenziwa izendlalelo zokuqala zokuqulwa kwecala kodwa kwahlehliselwa uJuni 26, nonyaka.Enkantolo kuvele ukuthi isizathu esiholele bachithwe wukuthi imali banayo yokuthi bangazitholela abameli abakhokhelwayo.Omunye wabachithiwe, uNksz Belecia Zwane (40) odabuka eGoli, phambilini owayekade enommeli okhokhelwayo.Usukume watshela inkantolo ukuthi uzosiphonsela inselelo isinqumo sokuthi anganikwa ummeli wamahhala wakwa-Legal Aid.“Sekuphele iminyaka emine ngehla ngenyuka ngikhokhela nendawo yokulala uma ngithamele leli cala eselidonse iminyaka emine. Ngamkhokhela ummeli kwaze kwaphela yona imali. Belilokhu lihlehliswa icala uMbuso ungakakulungeli ukuqala kwalo,” kubalisa uNksz Zwane.Utshele inkantolo ukuthi uzowudalula umholo wakhe nezikweletu anazo uma esephonsela inselelo isinqumo sokuchithwa kwakhe.IJaji Bruce Bedderson lithe liyazwelana naye kodwa ukuqulwa kwecala kumele kugcine kwenzekile.Enkantolo bekukhona ijaji, abasebenzi basenkantolo, abameli nabamangalelwa abagcwala inkantolo nalapho kuhlala khona abasuke bethamele icala. Abanye abammangalelwa bebedlubhe umfaniswano weqembu uMkhonto weSizwe (MK) Party.Ijaji lithe icala lingase liqulwe amasonto amahlanu kuya phezulu kodwa kuzoya ngokuthi kubizwa ofakazi abangaki.Okhulumela uphiko lwezokushushisa, iNational Prosecuting Authority (NPA) KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Natasha Ramkisson-Kara, utshele Isolezwe  enkantolo ukuthi uMbuso bewumi ngomumo ukuze kuqhubeke icala.“Kuphoqeleke ukuthi abameli ekade bekulungele ukuqala kwezendlalelo zecala balinde labo abebekade befuna ukumelwa abameli bamahhala,” kusho iNPA.Abamangalelwa bathweswe icala lokubopha itulo lokususa udlambedlu emphakathini, ukugqugquzela udlame emphakathini, ubuphekula, ukuvukela uMbuso nokubopha itulo lokuzama ukubulala.Izibhelu zaqala KwaZulu-Natal zenabela ezingxenyeni zaseGauteng. Zadlula nemiphefumulo yabantu abangu-350.

KUKHALWA ngemali echithwa nguhulumeni okhokhela abasebenzi abamisiwe asebehlale emakhaya iminyaka. Lokhu kuvezwe nguSihlalo wePublic Service Commission, uDkt Somadoda Fikeni, okhale ngokuthi nohulumeni akasazi isibalo salaba basebenzi abamiselwe amacala ahlukene.UFikeni uthe ezikhaleni zabamisiwe kunamabamba kwawona akhokhelwa imali ngokubamba kulezi zikhundla. Uthe izibalo zabasebenzi abahleli emakhaya behola zihlawumbiselwa ku-300 kuya phezulu.“Abanye babethi basuka ku-300 kuya ku-1 000 kodwa asinaso isiqinisekiso ngoba asinazo izibalo eziphathekayo. Ibalelwa kuR240 million imali esetshenziswa uhulumeni ukukhokhela la basebenzi. Kuyawuqeda umdlandla kubasebenzi abafaka uphethroli baye emsebenzini nsuku zonke ekubeni kunozakwabo abazihlalele emakhaya abaqhubeka nokuhola.”Uthe kwabamisiwe kukhona asebeqhuba izifundo zabo, abanye bavula amabhizinisi kanti abanye baya kwamanye amazwe bazitamuzele le mali kahulumeni. Ukusho lokhu emhlanganweni ohlanganisa osihlalo bePublic Service Commission, esifundeni iSADC obuseKapa. UNgqongqoshe weziSebenzi zikaHulumeni nokuPhatha, Inkosi Mzamo Buthelezi, uthe kuqalwe uphenyo ukuze bathole isibalo sabahola besemakhaya.UButhelezi uthe abanazo izibalo eziqondile zabahola besemakhaya. UFikeni uthe wayephakamise ukuthi kube nosuku okuzoza ngalo bonke abamisiwe emisebenzini yabo.“Sasithe akube nguNovemba nyakenye ukuze babalwe ukuthi bangaki. Namanje ngisamile ekutheni uma silubeka lolu suku singakwazi ukuba nesibalo esiqondile sabahola behleli emakhaya. Uma sifuna ukuba nohulumeni osebenza ngendlela, kumele siqale sazi ukuthi zithini izibalo zabasebenzi abahola bengenzanga lutho.”Uthe bayajabula ukuthi uButhelezi uveze ukuthi uzobeseka njengoba befuna iPSC izimele.Uveze ukuthi bafuna iPSC ifane nezinye izinhlaka ezifana nehhovisi loMvikeli woMphakathi nezinye ukuze ithathele abasebenzi izinyathelo ezinqala.Ubalule ukuthi inhloso yalo mhlangano ngukuthekela ulwazi kwamanye amazwe akwiSADC ngezithinta abasebenzi bakahulumeni.“Sifuna abantu bathole izidingo okuyinto abahlale bekhala ngayo kuhulumeni. Yingakho kumele siqinisekise ukuthi abasebenzi bakahulumeni basekhaleni lentuthuko,” kusho uFikeni.

AMALUNGU esigungu esiphezulu kwi-ANC angene emhlanganweni wokuyoxoxa eyokubusa ngokubambisana engaphansi kwengcindezi yokuba adlalele kude neDA.Ngaphambi komhlangano wayizolo, kwande amadlelandawonye namalungu e-ANC athi awafuni nokuyizwa eyokubambisana kwe-ANC neDA.Idlelandawonye le-ANC, iSACP, libe nesithangami lapho liveze khona ukuthi alihambisani nokubambisana kwe-ANC neDA.Idlanzana lamalungu e-ANC eliphikisana nokubambisana neDA belibhikisha ngaphandle kwendawo obekubanjelwe kuwo umhlangano.Yize kukhona ongoti ababona umshado we-ANC neDA ungabuyisa ithemba kubatshalizimali, kukhona amalungu e-ANC angafuni nokuyizwa eyalo mshado.Omunye walabo abebebhikisha, uNksz Thuthukile Zuma, oyindodakazi yomholi weMK, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, uthe iDA ihlale iphikisana nemithetho ethuthukisa abantu abamnyama.“Sikholelwa ukuthi asikho isidingo sokuthi i-ANC ibambisane neqembu elaziwayo ukuthi alifuni ukubona abantu abamnyama beya phambili. I-DA ihlezi iphikisana nayo yonke imithetho eshaya uhulumeni we-ANC. Kuyimanje bayaphikisana nomshwalense wezempilo. Uma ufunda kahle umqulu wabo wezethembiso zokhetho uzobona ukuthi bayaphikisana nemithetho ethuthukisa abantu abamnyama. “Singalifaka kanjani kuhulumeni wokubambisana iqembu eliyisitha sokuthuthukiswa komuntu omnyama. Uze ubabone ukuthi abalikhathalele kanjani izwe, bakwazi ukushisa ifulegi lakuleli. Siyathemba ukuthi abaholi bethu ngeke basebenzisane neDA.”ISACP ibe nesithangami nabezindaba ngoLwesithathu ebusuku, lapho ithe ayihambisani nokubambisana kwe-ANC neDA.Unobhala weSACP, uMnuz Solly Mapaila, uthe abasebenzi nabahlwempu bazohlupheka uma kungaphatha iDA.UMapaila uphinde waveza ukuthi abafuni ukuthi i-ANC ibambisane neMK.ICosatu namanye amalungu esigungu esiphezulu kwi-ANC abevele esephumele obala ngaphambi komhlangano wayizolo, aveza ukuthi awayizwa eyokubambisana neDA.Unobhala jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, uthe besingekho isidingo sombhikisho.“Asikanqumi ukuthi sizobambisana naliphi iqembu. Kuyishwa ukuthi bese kuba khona umbhikisho. Isikhathi esikuso sidinga ukuthi sibeke phansi amaphaphu. Njengoba siya emhlanganweni asicabangi ngokufana.”Uthe okwamanje bazama ukuxoxa nawo wonke amaqembu ezepolitiki.UMbalula uchaze ubunzima ababhekene nabo ekuxhumaneni neMK.“Asikayitholi impendulo eqondile. Kunzima ukuxhumana neMK ngoba bavele bakutshele ukuthi balinde ubaba (uZuma). Yonke into yenziwa ubaba lapha.”

UMA uzwa kuthiwa kunowesifazane obulewe yisoka noma ngumyeni, kwabaningi akuseyona into engajwayelekile kwazise ayipheli inyanga kungabanga khona imibiko efuze le. Yize iminingi imibiko yabesifazane ababulawa ngabasuke beshade nabo kodwa muva nje miningi kakhulu eyalabo ababulawa amasoka abasuke benezingane nawo noma abakipite nawo. Bonke basuke begajwe yisikhwele. Kusuke kube nezinsolo zokuthi owesifazane usuke eseqomile noma nje indoda isuke seyaliwa. Lobu bushimane abenziwa ngamadoda aseqinile ngokweminyaka kodwa kubhoke amabhobhodleyana kulo mkhuba onyanyisayo.Isigameko sakamuva nje sokubulawa kowesifazane enxanxatheleni yezitolo eGetaway, yisoka okuvela ukuthi belingafuni ukwaliwa, ngesinye sezibonelo zalezi zindaba ezishiya ezincane izingane zingenabazali kwazise labo yise abasuke bebulele onina bajwayele ukubanjwa baboshwe bagwetshwe.Esinye isigameko ngesowesifazane waseNanda oneminyaka ewu-21, owabulawa yisoka nalo eliselincane lidinwa wukuthi uhambe wangabuya emkipitweni wabo. Uma sekuphenyisiswa kwatholakala ukuthi empeleni lo wesifazane ubebalekele kwadadewabo ngoba esekhathele yisibhaxu salo myeni mbumbulu akipite naye. UKhomishana wamaPhoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLieutenant General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi, ukhale kakhulu ngezigameko zokubulawa kwabesifazane ngamasoka abo kulesi sifundazwe. Uze wakubeka obala nokuthi empeleni nje amadoda aKwaZulu-Natal yiwona enza ukuthi kube khona ubugebengu obuhambisana nokubulawa kwabantu jikelele.Muva nje iNkantolo yeMantshi ePinetown isanda kugixabeza ngeminyaka engu-15 u-Africa Mdabe (31) ngokulahlwa yicala lokubulala intombi yakhe, uThandeka Thwala (26).UMdabe waqongqotha umufi ngegalofu ekhanda washona ngemuva kwezinsuku esibhedlela. Isigameko senzeka ngoNovemba 8, 2019. Wayekade emsola ngokuthi uyajola.INkantolo yeMantshi yaseLindelani isanda kugweba udilakajele uMxolisi Mvula (30) ngecala lokubulala intombi yakhe, uPhindile Mkhize (21).UMvula kuthiwa washaya ngesiphongo odongweni umufi amahlandla ayisikhombisa waze washona. Isigameko senzeka eLindelani ngoDisemba 2022. Kuthiwa uMvula wayecabanga ukuthi umufi useqomile njengoba engazange alale endlini ngayizolo.UKhetha Ntombela (36) wasoconga uNontobeko Dlomo (31), isidumbu wasithatha wasigqiba ethoyilethe. Isigameko senzeka eQabavu, eNsuze, ngonyaka odlule kodwa uNtombela waze wakhombisa amaphoyisa la agqiba khona umufi sekudlule unyaka.NgoNovember 17 ngonyaka owedlule iNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini yagweba udilikajele uSfiso Professor Ndlovu (50) ngecala lokubulala ayethandana naye, uKhulukazi Ndlovu.UNdlovu wayenengwa ukuthi lo wesifazane usethandana nomunye ayesebenza naye. UNdlovu kuthiwa wamthumba umufi wase emshisa nemoto. Isidumbu sikamufi satholakala sishe sangqongqa eMachobeni, eNanda.USphelele Mabaso (41) waseMsinga wagwaza intombi yakhe, uHlomisile Mbatha (30), amanxeba ayisikhombisa, isidumbu sikamufi wayosilahla ehlathini. Naye wayegajwe yisikhwele.Ezinyangeni ezedlule sibe yindaba egudwini isehlakalo sephoyisa ebelisebenzela uMasipala weTheku, uConstable Sizwe Ngema (osezikhindini), ayebonakala kwividiyo ebulala intombi yakhe, uBianca Khuzwayo.Muva nje uMnuz Zimisele Dlulisa (29), ongumpheki, ukhalelwe ngamasongo kaSigonyela esolwa ngokubulala intombi yakhe, uMbali Mokokone (29). Isigameko senzeka eMawoti, eNanda. Kuthiwa wamphahlaza ngesitini, wamgwaza nasemqaleni. INkantolo yeMantshi yaseNtuzuma isanda kumnqabela ibheyili.UMbhishobhi Thabani Khumalo, wenhlangano yamadoda iSukuma Ndoda Sakhe, ukholwa wukuthi konke lokhu kudalwa yidimoni lolaka emadodeni. Ukhomba ukungafundiseki ngempilo njengento eyinkinga edlulele eyenza nabesifazane bagcine beyizisulu ngale ndlela.Ugxeke nomkhuba wokukipita odla lubi kulezi zinsuku, wathi kwenza amanye amadoda acabange ukuthi ngoba nakhu owesifazane usehlala naye, usefana nonkosikazi.“Akugcini lapho, kunanamadoda athi uma esenengane noma enezingane nowesifazane acabange ukuthi sebefana nonkosikazi nendoda. Uma kuke kwathi nkente umuntu abone kufanele ajezise owesifazane ngokumbulala noma ngokumshaya kanzima. Uthe maningi amadoda agcine esebulala amakhosikazi enengwa ukuthi asezibona engelutho emizini yayo ngoba kusebenza amakhosikazi wona engasasebenzi. Ukhulume nangodaba lokuthi amadoda kumele adodiswe, ahambele uchungechunge lwezigcawu zokubhungwa kwezinselelo abhekana nazo.“Uma amadoda ehamba lezi zigcawu azokwazi ukuthi umama wengane akuchazi ukuthi usengowakho,’’ usho kanje.UMnuz Sakhile Ngubane, oyiLife Coach, uthi amadoda amaningi adiniwe, anentukuthelo esuka kude.“Ngiyazi ukuthi le yinto ehlale ikhulunywa kodwa ngiyayisho, lento yokuthi indoda yikhali iyazona izinto. Lokho kungakhali kwenza kugqibelane intukuthelo eyona izinto. Nokukwazi nje ukuthi uma owesifazane esethe ucu alusalingani, amadoda amaningi anokuzibuka wona acabange ukuthi lokho kusuke kuwaphuca ubudoda bawo. Kumele sifunde ukuthi uma umuntu esethi kuphelile, akuphele. Akukho akukweleta khona. Wayethe uyakuthanda manje akasakuthandi. Angithi thina siyabashiya abesifazane siqonywe ngabanye. Basale bekhala kodwa kudlule,” egcizelela. Ungoti oweluleka ngezomphefumulo, uDkt Cynthia Hafejee, weluleka abesifazane ukuthi bangalubekezeleli ulaka emadodeni.“Uma nixabene nesoka lakho, likushaye ngempama noma likwethuke lisho ukukuqeda, musa ukube usahlala kulobo budlelwane. Yizinkomba zokukhulu okuzayo lezo,” usho kanje.Uthe abesifazane okumanje babulawe amasoka, konke kusuke kuqale ekuthukweni nasekushayweni.“Kuwumkhuba ongalungile ukuxolela isoka eselike lakushaya....ngisho ngabe likusikaze ngetshe. Lelo litshe ngelinye ilanga liyosuka esandleni lize ngqo ekhanda lakho kuphele ngawe”.

Iyaqaqamba inhliziyo yomholi we-EFF uMnuz Julius Malema, ngokulaxazwa yiphini likamengameli waleli qembu uMnuz Floyd Shivambu, ojoyine iqembu eliholwa owayengumengameli wezwe uMnuz Jacob Zuma. UMalema ufanise ubuhlungu abuzwile ngokusula kukaShivambu nangesikhathi ezwa ngokudlula emhlabeni kukanina.UShivambu uthumele incwadi yokusula kanti uMalema uthe babe nengxoxo ende naye.“Iminjunju engiyizwayo ifana nangesikhathi ngizwa izindaba zokushona kukamama. UFloyd ubengeyena nje umlingani kwezepolitiki kodwa ungumfowethu. Uzohlale engumfowethu futhi naye ngimtshelile ukuthi ukushiya kwi-EFF kufana nokuthi uzishiya yena ngoba ungumsunguli waleli qembu,” kusho uMalema esithangamini nabezindaba izolo lapho obumbona ukuthi udumele ngalesi sigameko.Uveze ukuthi uyazi ukuthi kukhona abanye abazwelana noShivambu, abasazohamba.“Kunabanye engibaziyo ukuthi vele bebebhobhe kwi-EFF nakwiMK. Kodwa bengingalindele ukuthi ngingashiywa nguFloyd. Umgomo we-EFF uthi osehambile akaphinde abuyele kwi-EFF kodwa kuFloyd ngiyawushintsha lo mthetho noma yinini wamukelekile uma esefuna ukubuya.” Uthe akananxa neMK ngokuhlwitha uShivambu wathi ngeke bamvimbe umuntu onqume ukuthatha enye indlela.UMalema uchithe nokuthi uShivambu ushiya ngoba bengazwani noma ebefuna ukumphonsela inselelo njengoba kuzoba nengqungquthela yokukhetha ubuholi ngasekupheleni konyaka.“Belungekho ungabazane ngesikhundla sikaShivambu, nokuthi kukhona abebesisikaza ngejozi. Bakhona engizwe ukuthi bazophonselwa inselelo njengonobhala jikelele uDlamini. Esephini likamengameli angizwanga ukuthi kukhona osisikaza ngejozi kanjalo nokuthi uShivambu ubezongiphonsela inselelo,” kuqhuba uMalema.Uthe ngeke life leli qembu ngokuhamba kukaShivambu.“Kuvuleka isahluko esisha futhi siyavivinywa. Amalungu awame isibindi iqembu aliyi ndawo. Noma singahamba kodwa lona lizohlale likhona.”UMalema uthe uyoze afe eyilungu le-EFF.“Ibhokisi lami liyobe ligoqwe ngemibala ye-EFF. Angisoze ngajikela abantu abama nami, abanye baze baxoshwa, balahlekelwa yimizi nemisebenzi ngesikhathi bengiseka ngixoshwe kwi-ANC, ngayovula i-EFF.”Uthe ngeke basivale isikhundla sikaShivambu ngoba kubhekwe engqungqutheleni.“Uma sifaka umuntu esikhundleni sephini likamengameli kuzosidalela inkinga. Uma engasakhethwa engqungqutheleni kuzoba nesixakaxaka ngoba uzobe ezibona ekhethwa,” kusho uMalema.Encwadini yokusula uShivambu uthe unqume ukungabuvuseleli ubulungu bakhe wathi uyashiya eqenjini futhi uyahoxa kuzona zonke izikhundla nokujutshwa ePhalamende. Uthe akathandi ukukhuluma kakhulu ngeqhaza lakhe kwiMK wathi uyokhuluma ngesikhathi esifanele. Ukuchithile ukuthi ubevakashele eNkandla muva nje eyobonana noZuma.

IYAQONGA ingcindezi yokuthi azinikele kwabezomthetho ukuze zimkhalele uSomlomo wePhalamende osahlabe ikhefu uNkk Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula, ochithwe inkantolo enkulu ePitoli esicelweni sakhe sokuthi angaboshwa.Le nkantolo, ngoLwesibili, imchithe nezindleko uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula kulesi sicelo sakhe esiphuthumayo, kulandela ukukhalaza ngokuthi uyazi uphiko lwezokuShushisa lumfuna ukumhlambalaza ngokumbopha esidlangalaleni ngamacala enkohlakalo.Usolwa ngokwamukela intshontsho le mali nezipho okwevile kuR4 million, ngesikhathi esanguNgqongqoshe wezokuVikela.Amaqembu asePhalamende i-UDM ne-EFF, athe kumele aboshwe ngokushesha uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula.Umholi we-UDM uMnuz Bantu Holomisa unxuse abezomthetho ukuthi bangapholisi maseko kodwa bambophe ngokushesha uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula.Uthe bayasamukela isinqumo senkantolo wathi akaye emaphoyiseni.“Sabhalela ikomiti lezokuVikela ngoMashi 2021 ngesikhathi kuvela izinsolo zokuthi uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula wakhokhelwa imali eyevile kuR5 million, kusuka ngo-2017 kuya ku-2019. “Ngatshelwa ukuthi lezi zinsolo angiye kozibika emaphoyiseni, nokuyinto engayenza. Silinde uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula ukuthi enze okufanele, asifuni ukuthi siye ePhalamende silokhu siyobhunga ngokungabethembi ubuholi bakhe ngoba simatasa sikhankasela ukhetho. Yena nje akaziyele emaphoyiseni, ayoboshwa,” kusho uHolomisa. I-EFF ithe akekho ongaphezu komthetho ngakho akaboshwe.Ithe abezomthetho abambophe ngokushesha ukuze abhekane nalezi zinsolo.“Ngeke sibavikele abantu abadayise abanye ngokuthi bagwazelwe ngemali. Simfuna ehlile esikhundleni sakhe ePhalamende. Sinxusa wonke amaqembu ukuthi aseke isiphakamiso sokuthi akhishwe ngevoti ePhalemende,” kusho i-EFF.Okhulumela i-ANC uNkk Mahlengi Bhengu-Motsiri, uthe bayasamukela isinqumo senkantolo wathi bayawuhlonipha umthetho ukuthi uthathe indawo yawo.Uthe bazolandela umgomo wenhlangano wokuthi kumele ahoxe njengokomyalelo wemigomo yenhlangano kulabo abasuke bebhekene namacala.USotswebhu we-DA uNksz Siviwe Gwarube uthe sebebhalele iBamba likaSomlomo uMnuz Lechesa Tsenoli, befuna ahlalise ngokushesha iPhalamende ukuze kubhungwe isiphakamiso sobungabuthembi ubuholi bukaNkk Mapisa-Nqakula. Uthe kumele uSomlomo aphendule kulezi zinsolo wathi nemigomo yendlu iyasho ukuthi lesi siphakamiso kumele sisheshe sihlale. “Siyasamukela isinqumo senkantolo esiveze ngokusobala ukuthi abantu ababhekene nezinsolo ezifuze lezi abakwazi ukubaleka bangashushiswa. Akekho umuntu ongaphezu komthetho kuleli, ” kuphetha uNksz Gwarube. Okhulumela uPhiko lwezokuShushisa u-Advocate Mthunzi Mhaga, akafunanga ukudalula ukuthi bazombopha nini uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula wathi kodwa umthetho uzothatha indawo yawo.

KUYAQHUBEKA ukubhekana ngeziqu zamehlo phakathi kukaNgqongqoshe weMfundo eyisiSekelo, uNksz Siviwe Gwarube, nenyunyana yothisha iSadtu.Le nyunyana inqume ukungamumemi engqungqutheleni yeshumi kazwelonke yale nyunyana, eqhubeka eBoksburg, eGauteng, esongwa kusasa.Kule ngqungquthela kuzobhungwa ngezinselelo kwezemfundo, kukhethwa nabaholi abasha abazophatha iminyaka emihlanu.Sekufana nesiko ukuthi izinyunyana zabasebenzi uma zinezingqungquthela, zibize uNgqongqoshe obhekele lowo mkhakha.Le nyunyana ibingalenzi iphutha lokungamumemi obenguNgqongqoshe womnyango, uNkk Angie Motshekga, yize yake yangabona ngaso linye naye yaze yambhikishela.Kulokhu ibize kuphela iPhini likaNgqongqoshe wezeMfundo uDkt Reginah Mhlaule, ukuzothula inkulumo evela kumqashi.Abanye abakhulumile kubalwa abaholi bamadlelandawonye, okuyiCosatu okukhulume uMengameli walo mfelandawonye uNksz Zingiswa Losi, uNobhala jikelele weSACP, uMnuz Solly Mapaila, nezinye izinhlaka.Ingqungquthela ivulwe yiPhini likamengameli lezwe nele-ANC, uMnuz Paul Mashatile. NoMashatile ushilo ukuthi kubalulekile ukuthi uNksz Gwarube, abe nobudlelwano neSadtu ngoba iyona enkulukazi kwezemfundo.“Kumele ngabe ukhona uNgqongqoshe weMfundo eyisiSekelo kule ngqungquthela kodwa angimboni. Kuyadingeka azizwele izinselelo zothisha futhi uyadinga ukwakha ubudlelwano neSadtu,” kusho uMashatile.Le nyunyana inamalungu angu-275 500 kwezemfundo.UMengameli weSadtu uMnuz Magope Maphila, utshele amalungu ahambele ingqungquthela ukuthi akamenyiwe uNksz Gwarube.Kuqhume ihlombe kwashaywa amakhwela ngesikhathi etshela amalungu ukuthi akulona iphutha njengoba engekho ingoba akamenyiwe.Uthe kumele anikwe imiyalelo emine okuzomele ayilandele ngoba akaziphethe ngendlela.“Imiyalelo ithi, kumele aqhubeke nomthetho wezikole osayiniwe, iBela Act, ngokushesha. Kumele athande iSadtu ngenhliziyo nangomqondo, ayithande le nyunyana aphinde afune izeluleko kule nyunyana ngaso sonke isikhathi.”Ugxeke okwenziwa yi-DA eWestern Cape, ngokudiliza othisha abevile ku-2 000 ngenxa yezinkinga zemali ekubeni nezinye izifundazwe zibhekene nezinkinga ezifanayo.“Ngesikhathi sihlangana naye wathi asibeke eceleni indaba yepolitiki, wathi uzosithinta afune izincomo ngezinto eziningi kwezemfundo. Samtshela kwezikabhoqo ukuthi sasingamfuni ngoba uvela kwi-DA, engayifuni iSadtu. Wabukela phansi uMengameli eduba umcimbi wokusayinwa komthetho ngoba ehambisana nokufunwa iqembu lakhe i-DA,” kusho uMaphila.UNksz Gwarube uvumile ukuthi akamenywanga engqungqutheleni yeSadtu. “Angimenywanga engqungqutheleni yeSadtu, sinabo ubudlelwano obuhle nale nyunyana. Okubalulekile ngiyabazisa ngezinto engizozenza emnyangweni, angibashiyile ngaphandle,” kusho uNksz Gwarube ekhuluma nesiteshi sethelevishini izolo ekuseni.

Kuqopheke umlando uMasipala wesifunda uMzinyathi usayina isivumelwano sokuthi ushintshe igama ungabe usabizwa ngoMzinyathi kodwa ubizwe ngokuthi iPrince Mangosuthu District Municipality.Le ngqophamlando yenzeke KwaPhindangene eMahlabathini ngoLwesibili lapho ubuholi bukaMasipala, amakhansela namakhosi buphume ngobuningi kuzosekwa lo mbono.Umasipala uMzinyathi uqale izingxoxo zokushintshwa igama ngo-2020 kodwa ukuqhutshwa kwazo kwaphazamiseka ngenxa yokubheduka kweCovid 19. UMntwana waKwaPhindangene ukhothame sezifikile kuye lezi zindaba. Inkosi yaKwaButhelezi esesihlalweni uNtuthukoyezwe Zuzifa kaMangosuthu Buthelezi ithe bewumndeni bayavuma ukuba uMzinyathi ungaqhubeka nalezi zinhlelo."Sithobeke kakhulu ukuba beze lapha ekhaya siluxoxe udaba yize sebake bayithumela incwadi phambilini. Yize siye sakuveza kubona ukuthi uMntwana wayengayithandisisi into yokuthi ahlonishwe ngenxa yepolitiki abanye belwisana nalokhu kanti phela abantu bebemhlonipha ngokweqiniso bebona imisebenzi yakhe. IMangosuthu University of Technology yakwenza lokhu kwaqanjwa neminye yemigwaqo ngaye. Bekusanda kufika abanye nje lapha ekhaya beqembu lezithuthuthu befisa ukubiza iqembu labo ngoMtwana,"  kubeka iNkosi.IMeya yoMzinyathi uMnuz Petros Ngubane uthe uMntwana kuningi akwezele isizwe, akwenze eMzinyathi."Sibe sesihlala siwumkhandlu woMzinyathi savumelana nokuthi ahlonishwe. Sijabulile siswele imilomo yokubonga emndenini kusuka manje siyaqhubeka nezinhlelo silandela yonke imigudu efanele. UMntwana imisebenzi yakhe iyomhlala imlandela noma esesithele kithi eMzinyathi kakukho abengasiseki uma sikwenza sivula amanzi ubebakhona, kwiPrince Mangosuthu Ultra Marathon eba khona yonke iminyaka esiseka. Ukumhlonipha yinto ekade sasiyifisile siyabonga ukuthi umndeni namhlanje uthi  masiqhubeke wenziwe lo msebenzi," kusho uNgubane.

IYOGA ingasiza ukuhlanganisa izinhlanga ezehlukene ezihlala KwaZulu-Natal. Lokhu kushiwo nguNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, ngesikhathi kugujwa usuku lweyoga emhlabeni,  i-International  Yoga Day, obeluhlelwe inhlangano iSivananda World Peace Foundation eThekwini, ngoMgqibelo.UNtuli uthe uyayeseka iyoga ngoba iyithuluzi elisiza ekutheni abantu banyakazize umzimba okubenza baphile kahle baphinde bakwazi ukuphilisana."Ngiyafisa ukuthi isabalale kuso sonke isifundazwe, ingabukeki njengento yaseThekwini kuphela," kusho uNtuli.Obeyiphini likaNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo kuleli, uDkt Sibongseni Dhlomo, uthe iYoga iyasiza ekutheni abantu bakwazi ukuxhumana nobubona futhi bakwazi ukuphilisana. Ngaphezu kwalokho, yenza ukuthi baphile kahle okusiza ngokuthi abantu bangaguli kakhulu baze badinge ukulaliswa ezibhedlela.UMnuz Ishwar Ramlutchman Mabheka Zulu weSivananda World Peace Foundation, uthe kulo nyaka kuphela iminyaka eyishumi, inhlangano yezizwe i-United Nations yabeka usuku lokugujwa kweyoga emhlabeni."Iyoga iyasiza ekutheni abafundi bakwazi ukumela nezifundo bangabi nengcindezi novalo. Abantu abadala nabo ngeke sibashiye ngaphandle ngoba iyabasiza kakhulu, belule imisipha nokulwa nezifo ezingamahlalakhona. Iyoga ilungele wonke umuntu. Iyaziqhelisa izifo ezifana nengcindezi, izifo zenhliziyo nezinye," kusho uRamlutchman.Uqhube wathi ibuye isize nabantu abasha ekutheni ibanikeze umfutho ongapheli ukuze bakwazi ukubhekana nezinselelo zabo ezifana nokufunda umsebenzi nokunye.UNksz Thuli Mazibuko waseNanda ongomunye wabantu ebebehambele lo mgubho, uthe uyilungu lenhlangano iMandlela NPO egqugquzela ukuthi abantu balandele izinhlelo zoyoga ukuze baphile kahle."Ngiyijoyine kulo nyaka, bengingazi lutho ngayo. Selokhu ngiyijoyinile ngiyawubona umehluko. Sengiyakwazi ukulawula ukudinwa kangcono, sengizizwa ngilula," kusho uNksz Mazibuko.
