IYOGA iyalekelela ukwazi ukumelana nengcindezi edalwa yizinkinga eziningi ezivelayo ngesikhathi ukhula.Lokhu kushiwo uBongani Luthuli ofundisa iYoga enhlanganweni iSivananda World Peace Foundation, ngesikhathi kwethulwa ngokusemthethweni izinhlelo zokulungiselela usuku lweYoga emhlabeni, iWorld Yoga Day eba minyaka yonke ngoJuni 21, eThekwini, ngeSonto.Uthe unyaka wesishiyagalolunye enza iYoga esimsize ekutheni akwazi ukulawula ulaka nengcindezi abebhekana nayo ngenxa yezinkinga zokukhula."Sengiphakathi ngabona ukuthi kunesidingo sokuthi nami ngifundise abantu bakithi ukuthi iYoga iyisikhali esingakusiza ekutheni ubhekane nengcindezi empilweni, ikusize ekutheni umqondo wakho ukwazi ukucabanga ngendlela," kusho uLuthuli.Lezi zinhlelo zizokwenziwa esifundazweni iKwaZulu-Natal ukuze kufundiswe umphakathini ukuthi iYoga ibaluleke kanjani nokuthi yenziwa kanjani.UMnuz Ishwar Mabheka Zulu Ramlutchman wale nhlangano, uthe kulo nyaka kuzobe kuphela iminyaka eyishumi, inhlangano yezizwe, i-United Nations yabeka usuku lweyoga emhlabeni."Kulo nyaka sizogxila kakhulu ezikoleni ukuze sifundise abafundi ukuthi bangayisebenzisa kanjani iYoga ukuze bakwazi ukubhekana nezifundo zabo bangabi nengcindezi novalo. Abantu abadala nabo ngeke sibashiye ngaphandle ngoba iyabasiza kakhulu belule imisipha baphinde balwe nezifo ezingamahlalakhona. Okusempeleni iYoga ilungele wonke umuntu kodwa bakhona ewusizo kakhulu kubo njengalaba esengibabalile," kusho uRamlutchman.UNkkThobile Njapha (55) waseNanda obeqala ukujoyina iYoga izolo, uthe uphathwa yisifo samathambo, ujwayele ukusebenza engadini. Ululekwe ngabanye abantu endaweni ukuthi ajoyine iYoga ukuze abone ukuthi ngeke yini imsize."Kusenzinyana khona ngoba bengingajwayele ukwelula umzimba wami ngendlela esifundiswa yona kodwa ngiyethemba ukuthi kuzogcina kujwayeleka," kusho yena.UXolani Radebe waseNtuzuma ofundisa ukwenza iYoga, uthe abantu abamnyama bazitshela ukuthi iYoga into yamaNdiya kanti into esiza umzimba wawo wonke umuntu."Sengibhale nencwadi efundisa ngeYoga ngesiZulu ngoba  nathi singabantu abamnyama siyadinga ukuthi siyiqonde kahle ukuthi iyini. Uma sengithole uxhaso ngizoyishicilela,"  kusho uRadebe.

IJUTSHELWE ukuyomela iqembu, Umkhonto weSizwe, ePhalamende lase-Afrika, iPan African Parliament, indodakazi yomholi waleli qembu, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, uNkk Duduzile Zuma-Sambudla. Leli Phalamende liyingxenye ye-African Union kanti lakhelwa ukuthi abantu basezwenikazi, i-Afrika, babe nezwi ezintweni ezithinta ezomnotho e-Afrika. USotswebhu we-ANC ePhalamende, uMnuz Mdumiseni Ntuli, usukume izolo ngesikhathi lihleli waphakamisa amagama amalungu azojutshelwa ezinhlakeni ezehlukene.Kulo mhlangano bekumele kukhethwe namalungu amaqembu azojutshwa kwiKhomishini yeziMantshi ne-Judicial Services Commission (JSC). UNtuli uphakamise amagama amalungu aya kwi-Pan African Parliament okungoMnuz Vuyani Pambo we-EFF, nguyena uNtuli ozomela i-ANC, uMergan Chetty we-DA kanjalo noNkk Sambudla-Zuma weMK.USomlomo, uNkk Thoko Didiza, ubuze ukuthi kukhona yini abaphikisa lawa magama, kwangavela muntu.Uthe lokhu kusho ukuthi ayaphasiswa. UNtuli uphinde waphakamisa amagama amalungu azoba yingxenye yeKhomishini yeziMantshi kuleli, okungoNksz Faith Muthambi we-ANC, uMnuz Adrian Roos we-DA, uMnuz Sbonelo Nomvalo weMK kanjalo noNksz Omphile Maotwe we-EFF.Aphasiswe ngo-elethu amagama alawa malungu.UNtuli uphakame wahoxisa isiphakamiso abesenzile sokuthi abaholi okubalwa kubo oMnuz Soviet Lekganyane we-ANC, uDkt John Hlophe umholi weMK ePhalamende, u-Advocate Glynnis Breytenbach we-DA, uMnuz Julius Malema we-EFF noMnuz Athol Trollip we-ActionSA, babe sekomitini iJSC.Umsebenzi weJSC wukuphonsa imibuzo amajaji asuke ezojutshelwa ezinkantolo eziphezulu okubalwa neyoMthethosisekelo.UNtuli uthe uhoxise lesi siphakamiso ngoba kusazoxoxwa kabanzi namaqembu ahlukene ePhalamende.UNkk Didiza ukwamukele okuphakanyiswe nguNtuli nakuba amalungu eMK abengeneme ngokuthi awathintwanga ngaphandle kokuhlehliswa kokujutshelwa kwalawa malungu kuleli komiti.Kwenzeka lokhu nje namhlanje kulindeleke ukuthi kufungiswe iKhabhinethi entsha emenyezelwe nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ngeSonto ebusuku.Izofungiswa eCape Town International Convention Centre, eKapa yinhloko yamajaji uRaymond Zondo.

ZIFISA ukubona uguquko ezintweni ezehlukene ezithinta impilo yabantu, ezinye izaguga ezivote ngokuyisipesheli.Njengoba ukuvota okuyisipesheli kuqale ngoMsombuluko, kuhlukene imibono kubantu abadala abebevota ngegxathu eselihanjiwe ukuphucula impilo yabantu, abanye bathi usemkhulu umsebenzi okusamele ukuthi wenziwe, abanye bathi ukhona umehluko abawubonayo.UMnuz Adalbero Makhoba (73) waseTshelimnyama ngasePinetown, uthe selokhu aqala ukuvota ngo-1994 kanti alukho ukhetho olumphuthayo.“Ngiyavota ngoba ngiyazi ukuthi kwakunzima kudala. Uhulumeni usekwazile ukusikhulula ukuba sihlale lapho sithanda khona, sithenge ezitolo ndawonye nabelungu ngoba kudala sasivela ewindini bona bangene ezitolo bekhululekile. Njengamanje ngihleli endlini yomxhaso engayakhelwa wuhulumeni. Kunemigwaqo enetiyela eyenziwa wuhulumeni esimnika amandla ngevoti lethu. Abantu abavote ukuze bakhululeke,” kusho uMakhoba.Uthe ufisa ivoti lenhlangano yakhe (ANC) lisize ukudala amathuba omsebenzi entsheni ehleli emakhaya namajazi ayo emfundo.“Kufanele uhulumeni ayibhekisise nendaba yokuthi abantu abaneminyaka ewu-40 abasaqashwa ngoba nabo bahleli emakhaya. Uma ethi ugcina ukuqasha abaneminyaka ewu-35 uthi laba abanewu-40 abashonephi ngoba nabo basenawo amandla okusebenza?” kubuza uMakhoba.Ubuye wacela uhulumeni ukuthi amunwebele indlu yakhe yomxhaso ukuze okungenani ibe namakamelo amabili.Ubalule ukuthi uma evakashelwe ngabazukulu bakhe kuba nzima ngoba inekamelo elilodwa kuyaphoqeleka ukuthi balale egumbini lokuphumula.Utshele Isolezwe ukuthi uzovotela ekhaya ngenxa yokuthi washaywa yisifo sohlangothi ngakho akakwazi ukuhamba kahle.Uthe usehlala yedwa ngoba nenkosikazi yakhe yashona ngo-2021. UMnuz Piet Ntshangase (66) ongowokudabuka kuMasipala waseMkhanyakude ohlala emijondolo eseCato Crest, eMayville uthe yevile kwengu-15 iminyaka aseyihlale emjondolo wakhe, wahlala kuwo esabamba itoho elimphelele ngo-2015.“Ngiqale ukuvota ngo-1994  kodwa muncane kakhulu umehluko nje empilweni yami engisawubonile.  Angisenalo ithemba lokuthi kukhona okungcono okuyoke kwenzeke, sekuwukwenza nje angisalindele lutho. Engikufisayo ukuthi  siholwe uhulumeni ozosisiza asikhiphe emjondolo siphile kahle,” usho kanje.UNksz Koto Lukhozi (81) ongowokudabuka eMkhomazi naye osehlale isikhathi eside kule mijondolo, uthe awukho umehluko asewubonile.“Ngiyafisa ukuthi sitholelwe indawo engcono. Iyona nto engifuna ukuyibona ngaleli voti kodwa nje awukho okwamanje umehluko engisawubonile.  Uma kuna imvula isimo siba nzima kakhulu, kumele sime ngezinyawo, umjondolo unetha,” kusho uNksz Lukhozi.Lezi zaguga zigqugquzele abantu ukuthi bavote bakhethe uhulumeni ozoletha intuthuko

ABANTU bakhala ngokuba kwampunz’edlemini kwelakuleli ngenxa yezinto ezingamahlazo nezingajabulisi ezivelayo ezenzeka mihla namalanga. Ngesonto eledlule kwavela udaba lwenkambi eqeqesha abokufika baseLibya okuthiwa bangena kuleli bezenza abantu abazoqeqeshela umsebenzi wokuba ngonogada kodwa baqeqesha ngezinsiza zobusosha. Lokho kwenzeka-nje, kusadingidwa eyentokazi enguChidinma Vanessa Adetshina ehamba phambili kwezinye ezingu-13 ezingenele ukuba uzime wakuleli uMiss SA. Abantu basazibuza ukuthi kwenzeka kanjani lokhu ngoba uyise wale ntokazi udabuka eNigeria kanti umama wayo ngowaseMozambique?ICASULE abaningi ekaChidinma Vanessa Adetshina ebonakala ebungaza nomndeni wakhe waseNigeria ukuqokelwa esikaMiss SA. Kwenzeka lokhu nje, kusanomsindo ngokungena kwakhe kulo mncintiswano ngoba ubaba wakhe ungowaseNigeria kanti unina owaseMozambique, kodwa wakhulela kuleli.AKATHENGELWE abadlali bekhethelo umqeqeshe! Lawa ngamazi abalandeli beKaizer Chiefs ngemuva komdlalo wangempelasonto neYanga yaseTanzania. Abalandeli baleli qembu elibaniswe ngo-4-0 kowesicoco seToyota Cup bathi akungadlalwa ngomqeqeshi wabo omusha uNasreddine Nabi  ukuthi uzokwenza imilingo ngabadlali abayizahluleki zakudala.UNOBHALA jikelele we-ANC uMnuz Fikile Mbalula ucacise eyokuxoshwa kukaMnuz Jacob Zuma eqenjini likaKhongolose ngokuthi uyenza ozenzile ngokuphula umthetho 25.17.17.4 ufundwa nomthetho 2 ocacisa ngokusobala ukuthi ilungu lale nhlangano alivumelekile ukusebenzisana nelinye iqembu lepolitiki elibhalisiwe futhi elingeyona ingxenye yamaqembu angumbimbi nayo.

IZAZI zezilimi zihlanganyele ndawonye kwi-International Conference of the African Languages Association of Southern Africa (ALASA), ehlelwe ngokubambisana phakathi kwePan South African Language Board (PanSALB), neNyuvesi iKwaZulu-Natal (UKZN).USihlalo wengqungquthela obuye abe yisifundiswa e-UKZN uDkt Sanele Nsele, uthi umbuthano ubophele izazi zezilimi ezehlukene eziphuma ezikhungweni ezahlukene. Wathi inhloso wukubhunga ngekusasa lezilimi zesintu nokuthi kucutshungulwe ngamathuba akhona ezinhlakeni ezahlukene okubalwa kwezemfundo, kwezamabhizinisi nakwezobuchwepheshe besimanje.UDkt Nsele uthi bahlose ukukhuthaza nokuthuthukisa izilimi zesintu nokugqugquzela ukusetshenziswa kwazo ezinhlakeni ezahlukene kanye nokusetshenziswa kwazo lapho kuthuthukiswa ezobuchwepheshe.Izazi ezihlangene zidingida izihloko ezithinta ukuhumusha nokutolika, ukusetshenziswa kukaliminingi ezikoleni ngenhloso yokukhuthaza abafundi ukuba bakuthakasele ukuthola ulwazi ngolimi lwebele kanjalo nokuthuthukisa ubuchwepheshe obusebenzisa ulimi lwesintu.Ingqungquthela iqale ngoLwesibili izogoqwa ngoLwesihlanu.

ISILO uMisuzulu kaZwelithini sizibonele okokuqala selokhu singene esihlalweni isisusa samafindo angaqaqiwe kwezombusazwe KwaZulu-Natal ngesikhathi uSihlalo we-ANC esifundazweni uMnuz Siboniso Duma eyabula umbhobho kusakhuluma uNdunankulu wesizwe uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi. UButhelezi ubuye abe yilungu lesigungu esiphezulu se-IFP. Lesi sigameko sithele ngechilo iSilo uMisuzulu noMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa kulo mcimbi wokukhumbula iSilo uDinuzulu kaCetshwayo obukwaCeza ngempelasonto. Ibabaza Inyosi yeSilo, uMnuz Buzetsheni Mdletshe, ebikhona, ithe ayikaze ihlangabezane nesimo esinje eminyakeni eminingi isebenza  neSilo esesabuza uZwelithini. UMdletshe uthe kufanele kushwelezwe njengoba kugcine kuchitheka igazi, kwashaywa namalungu e-ANC agcine elashwe ezibhedlela.“Ingonyama noRamaphosa bathelwe ngegazi. Uma betholakala labo abenze lo mkhuba, kufanele baboshwe. Kodwa-ke obenze umcimbi kufanele ashweleze.”Ukukhathazeka kukaMdletshe kuzwakaliswe nawungoti wezamasiko, nomhlaziyi wezepolitiki abakuchaze njengechilo ukudonsisana kukaMphathiswa (wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho), uDuma, noMfu Buthelezi, phambi kweSilo noRamaphosa.Umdonsiwano uqale ngesikhathi uDuma ephuca uButhelezi umbhobho wokukhuluma. UButhelezi, obezokwethula iSilo, uqale inkulumo yakhe ngokuncoma uRamaphosa ngokuhlonipha ubukhosi bukaZulu.Inkinga iqale ngesikhathi uButhelezi ecela uhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal ukuba ubukele kuRamaphosa, uhloniphe iSilo. UDuma uvele wasukuma wadumela umbhobho wokukhuluma ngesikhathi uButhelezi ebiza igama likanobhala we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Bheki Mtolo.“Cha ngeke besicela ukuthi sihloniphe umcimbi esize kuwona. Shenge sicela uhlale phansi, uyawona umcimbi weSilo.”UDuma ube eseyalela Inyosi Mdletshe ukuba isukumise iSilo.UMdletshe wenqabile, wathi umthetho awuvumi ukuthi kube nguye osukumisa iSilo ekubeni undunankulu kaZulu ekhona.Lesi sigameko sicasule amabutho avele asukuma, akhuza izaga.UButhelezi ugcine ewunikiwe umbhobho, wabe naye esekhuza izaga ezigadlayo. Izaga azibizile ngesithi, ‘wathinta amabhubesi’, esithi ‘ikhuzeni lenkukhu’, nesithi ‘wathinta uZulu udakwe yini’.Impi yabaholi iqhubekile nangemuva kwenkulumo yeSilo njengoba kubonakale uDuma enqaba ukunikeza uButhelezi umbhobho ngesikhathi kufanele ethule isipho sikaRamaphosa.UDuma ubonakale ezama ukuwunikeza iSilo umbhobho, kodwa ekugcineni wathathwa uButhelezi.Ekhuluma neSolezwe, uchaze ngenqubo eyamukelekile ekwethuleni iSilo, wathi akukho emandleni akhe ukwenza lokhu.“Uma engekho undunankulu kuyaye kuthathwe umuntu omdala endlunkulu, kube uye owenza lo msebenzi. Kuyenzeka-ke uma engekho omdala endlunkulu kuloyo mcimbi, bese kuba yinyosi eyenza lowo msebenzi. Naye ngimtshelile uMhlonishwa ukuthi umthetho awuvumi. Okungijabulisile ukuthi naye uButhelezi akasukanga wayohlala phansi. Uqhubekile wama, waze wagcina elitholile ithuba lokwenza umsebenzi wakhe.”Ungoti wezamasiko, uSolwazi Sihawukele Ngubane, uthe okwenzekile kwehlisa isithunzi seSilo.“Thina njengoZulu saziwa ngenhlonipho. Kuyasehlisa isithunzi seMbube noZulu uma kuzokwenzeka into enje phambi kweSilo. Kufanele ikhuzwe le nto. Uma iSilo sibukeleka phansi, noZulu uzobukeleka phansi.”Umhlaziyi wezepolitiki wase-University of KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Zakhele Ndlovu, ubabhangqe ngabhadelinye oButhelezi noDuma ethi baziphathise okwezingane.UNdlovu uthe uButhelezi bekungafanele afake ipolitiki emcimbini kahulumeni, wathi noDuma bekufanele azithibe.“Basiphoxile, baziphathise okwezingane. UShenge uyena oqale leya nto. UDuma bekufanele amlinde aqede, bese eyamphendula.”UNdlovu uxwayise ngokuthi ukuhlaselwa kwamalungu e-ANC kuzovusa izilonda ezingakapholi.“Le nto abayenzile ifana nokubhebhethekisa umlilo oshayo. Izokwenza ukuthi kubhekwane ngeziqu zamehlo. Kubi ngoba le nto yenzeka sibheke okhethweni.”ISilo sikhumbuze abebehambele umcimbi ukuthi siyiSilo samabandla onke.“Ngingakaqhubeki nenkulumo yami, ngicela ukunikhumbuza nina beSilo ukuthi nonke njengoba nilapha, nonke ningabami.”

LILOLIWE izembe kumalungu e-EFF ePhalamende, aweziShayamthetho namakhansela aqhamuka ezindaweni lapho iqembu lathola khona amavoti angaphansi kuka-100.I-EFF isibhalele amalungu ayo aqhamuka ezindaweni lapho iqembu lahluleka ukuthola amavoti angu-100, iwayalela ukuba achaze ukuthi kungani kufanele angadilizwa ezikhundleni. I-EFF ayenzanga kahle okhethweni olwedlule.Isolezwe libone incwadi ebhalwe unobhala jikelele weqembu, uMnuz Marshall Dlamini, lapho eyalela khona abathintekayo ukuba benze izethulo zokuthi kungani kungafanele baxoshwe.Incwadi kaDlamini iveza ukuthi isinqumo sokuthi kubhalelwe abachaphazelekayo sathathwa emhlanganweni wesigungu esiphezulu owawuseThekwini, ngenyanga eyedlule.“Emhlanganweni kwanqunywa ukuthi bonke abajutshwe ezikhundleni kuhulumeni naseqenjini abaqhamuka ezindaweni lapho iqembu lathola khona amavoti angaphansi kuka-100 kufanele benze izethulo zokuthi kungani kufanele bangakhishwa ezikhundleni. Uma ungumuntu oqhamuka endaweni lapho iqembu lathola khona amavoti angaphansi kuka-100, uyalelwa ukuba wenze izethulo zokuthi kungani kufanele ungakhishwa esikhundleni.”Isolezwe likhulume namalungu e-EFF amabili aqinisekise ukukhishwa kwezincwadi.Lama lungu athe baningi kakhulu abaholi abazothinteka KwaZulu-Natal.“Iqiniso ukuthi i-EFF yashaya udaka KwaZulu-Natal. Ngo-2019 sathola amavoti angaphezu kuka-360 000. Uyichaza kanjani lena yokuthi kulo nyaka sithole ngaphansi kuka-100 000. Kukhona abantu okufanele bathathelwe izinyathelo.”Umthombo uthe okumangazayo ukuthi i-EFF inobuholi bamagatsha cishe kuzo zonke izingxenye zeKwaZulu-Natal kodwa kukhona izindawo lapho ihluleka khona ukuthola amavoti angu-100.“Igatsha le-EFF lakhiwa amalungu angu-100. Amanye amagatsha kuthiwa anamalungu angu-600. Kwenzeka kanjani ukuthi lama gatsha ahlulwe ukuthola amavoti angu-100?”Elinye ilungu le-EFF lixwayise ngokuthi ukuxoshwa kwamanye amalungu kungenza ukuthi iqembu lilahlekelwe kakhulu.Ngaphambi kokhetho lwangoMeyi, i-EFF yaxosha inqwaba yabaholi abahluleka ukuhlelela abantu bangakubo amabhasi ayezobahambisa emcimbini wokugubha iminyaka engu-10 kwasungulwa inhlangano..“Inkinga ebuye ibe khona ukuthi kuyaye kukhethwe iphela emasini uma kuthathelwa abantu izinyathelo eqenjini. Kunabantu abangathintwa yize noma behluleka ukwenza umsebenzi.”Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kokhulumela i-EFF, uNksz Leigh-Ann Mathys, ayizange iphumelele.

IBAGIXABEZE ngodilikajele abathathu umuntu ngamunye iNkantolo yesiFunda sasoLundi abesilisa ababili abalahlwe ngecala lokubulala umndeni wabathathu.Ngokusho kokhulumela iNational Prosecuting Authority (NPA) KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Natasha Ramkisson-Kara, ababulali babesola oyedwa wabagilwa ngokuthakatha.Echaza ngesehlakalo, uNkk Ramkisson-Kara uthe ngoDisemba 2019 uNtethelelo Madi (21) no-Ayanda Khanyile bahlahlela ngobhushu owesilisa (68), umkakhe nomzukulu eMahlabathini.“Itulo lokubulala balihlanganisa phambi kwabesilisa ababili kanti oyedwa wabo wayehlobene nabagilwa. UMadi wanikela kubo ukuyothatha ubhushu maqede bahamba noKhanyile baya emzini wabagilwa,” kuchaza uNkk Ramkisson.Uqhube wathi uMadi noKhanyile bangena kulo muzi ngefasitela bagenca owesilisa (68) ngobhushu. Uthe baphinde benza okufanayo kunkosikazi kamufi nomzukulu ngaphambi kokushaya bachithe.“Emva kwesigameko babuye bagonyuluka koyedwa wabesilisa ababehlela itulo phambi kwabo, bamsabisa ngokuthi angayithi vu,” kusho uNkk Ramkisson-Kara.Udalule ukuthi emva kwezinsuku ezimbalwa abagilwa bebulewe, uphenyo lwamaphoyisa lwawaholela kulaba besilisa uMadi noKhanyile ababopha itulo lokubulala phambi kwabo.“Benza izitatimende emaphoyiseni ezibheca uMadi noKhanyile ngecala,” usho kanje.UNkk Ramkisson-Kara uthe enkantolo uMshushisi woMbuso, uMnuz Mzwandile Baldwin Mtshali, wahola ubufakazi balona wesilisa uMadi noKhanyile abagonyuluka kuye, waphinde wabeka phambi kwenkantolo umbiko wokuhlolwa kwezidumbu.“Bagwetshwe odilikajele abathathu umuntu ngamunye ngamacala amathathu okubulala. Izigwebo zabo bazozidonsa kanye kanye. Inkantolo iphinde yanquma ukuthi abakufanele ukuba nezibhamu,” kusho uNkk Ramkisson-Kara.Khonamanjalo, iNkantolo eNkulu yaseMgungundlovu igixabeze uDelisani Mkhize (54) ngodilikajele ababili neminyaka engu-10 ngaphezulu ngecala lokubulala unina nodadewabo ngoDisemba 2023.Ukugwetshwa kukaMkhize kuza emva kokuthi evele walivuma icala lokudubula abulale unina, uNkk Mathithi Mkhize, nodadewabo, uNksz Celiwe Mkhize, eMid-Illovo.Echaza ngesigameko, uNkk Ramkisson-Kara uthe nakuso umbulali wayesola abagilwa ngokumthakatha.“Ngosuku lwesigameko uMkhize wathatha isibhamu sakhe wanikela ekhaya labagilwa, wabadubula ngaphambi kokuthi abanqume, waphosa amakhanda abo ethoyilethi lomgodi,” kusho uNkk Ramkisson.Echaza ngesigwebo, uthe unikwe odilikajele ababili ngecala lokubulala umuntu ngamunye bese kuba iminyaka eyishumi ngecala lesibhamu esingekho emthethweni.

ABANTU baseMshwathi badonswe ngendlebe ukuba bangalinge bashise ingqalasizinda esikhona ngoba kukhona abayidingayo. IMeya yakuMasipala yaseMshwathi, uMnuz Mandla Zondi, isho kanje ngesikhathi yethula imigwaqo eyakhiwe ezindaweni ezingaphansi kuka-ward 2 izolo.Uthe lemigwaqo enetiyela yayicelwe ngabantu baseMshwathi ngoba babekhala ngokuthi akuhambeki kalula."Wasabela lohulumeni olalelayo, abewusho uSomlomo waseMshwathi (uNkk Sbongile Mbatha-Ntuli), uhulumeni ka-ANC. Sinokuziqhenya namhlanje ukuthi sizowethula yonke lemigwaqo esinetiyela. Asigcinile lapho siyazi kuningi okusadingwa wumphakathi wakithi. Kancane kancane, ngokubambisana nani, sizogcina sokuqede konke," kusho uZondi.Eqhubeka uZondi unxuse umphakathi ukuba uyinakekele ingqalasizinda."Ngicela ukululeka ukuthi izidingo esizidingayo kuhulumeni asikazitholi zonke kodwa akusho ukuthi uma ungakatholi okunye, bulala okukhona. Funa okunye kodwa sewazi ukuthi kukhona osukubeke eceleni. Ungathi uma ufuna umtholampilo bese uthi uzoshisa ihholo."UZondi ubuye wethula isikhungo okuhloswe ngaso ukufukula amakhono abantu bendawo yaseThokozani ku-ward 1.Uthe bafuna iThokozani Elderly Centre ingagcina ngomphakathi waseThokozani kuphela kodwa isize wonke umphakathi waku-ward 1."Umuntu omdala olalayo, olokhu ephenduka nelanga, ugcina engasaphilile kahle. Ukusuka nje ekhaya, ufike uze lapha." Esephetha uZondi uphonselele inselelo umphakath  ukuba usiphathise okwezikhali zamaNtungwa futhi waluleka intsha ukuba ugade kahle abantu abadala. *Khonamanjalo kube injabulo yodwa ngenkathi umphakathi waseMshwathi k-Ward 3, endaweni yaseMthizane ngenkathi ubuholi bukamasipala bethula ngokusemthethweni   iNqolayolwazi Crèche. UZondi ubonge umndeni wakaJila ngokuthi unikele ngendawo ngaphandle kokufuna inkokhelo. Induna yakulesi sigodi icele umphakathi, ikakhulukazi izinsizwa, ukuthi zibe yiso nomvikeli walesi sakhiwo esikade saba isidingo.Kuphinde kwanenhlokomo nasemphakathini waseCool Air ku-Ward 7 ngesikhathi wemukela ngokusemthethweni isikhungo samakhono, iCool Air Skills Centre, okuyisakhiwo esidle umhlanganiso kwisifundazwe sase KZN ngokuba isakhiwo esiseqopheleni eliphezulu. Lesi sakhiwo sizoqeqesha amakhono ahlukahlukene, okubandakanya ulwazi lwama-computer.Ubuholi bukhulume nezindimbane zamalunga omphakathi obuyingxenye yokuvulwa kwalesi sakhiwo.

BABALISE ngomonakalo  odalwe yizikhukhula abadayisi baseMargate, ePort Shepstone.Lokhu bakubikele Isolezwe ngesikhathi kuhambele iMeya yaseMngeni uMnuz Chris Pappas kule ndawo eyohlola umonakalo. Bakhale ngokuthi selokhu kwenzeke umonakalo phakathi edolobheni lehlile kakhulu izinga lokuthengwa kwemikhiqizo yabo.UMnuz Bongani Khuzwayo odayisa izimpahla zokugqoka kule ndawo, uthe sibi kakhulu isimo ngemuva kwezikhukhula."Selokhu kwenzeke le nto bancane kakhulu abantu abathengayo. Lokhu kudalwa ukuthi sehlile nesibalo sabantu abahambela kuleli dolobha ngemuva kwezikhukhula," usho kanje sakubalisa.Uthe indlela idolobha labo elikhahlamezeke ngayo abazi ukuthi kuzothatha isikhathi esingakanani ukuthi isimo sibuyele kwesejwayelekile.UNkk Busisiwe Ngcokama odayisa izinto ezidliwayo uqale wabalisa ngokuthi igcwele amanzi indawo abadayisela kuyona.Uthe kulezi zinsuku akulula nokuthi abathengi basondele ematafuleni abo.Uchaze isimo ababhekene naso njengosizi. "Kulukhuni impela, imindeni yethu siyondla ngemali eyinzuzo esiyithola ngokudayisa lapha. Manje uma sekunje asazi ukuthi lizoya ngani ibhodwe eziko," ebalisa.Ugcizelele ukuthi ufisa ukubona uhulumeni ungenela ngokushesha ulungise konke okonakele edolobheni ukuze nabo njengabadayisi bangalimali kakhulu.Uthe okudala ukuthi kube lukhuni satshe ukuthi bebengakulungele ukubhekana nesimo salolu hlobo wathi  empeleni nje sibehle ngaphezulu, uma bengadayisi impilo iyama.Ezinye izakhamuzi  zibalise ngomonakalo omkhulu ezithi udalwe yizikhukhula emizini yazo.UMnuz Zwelakhe Mkhize uthe indlu yonke igcwele amanzi.Uthe  kumele athenge impahla yasendlini entsha ngoba yonke ikhuntile futhi ngeke isasebenziseka.Ubalise ngokuthi akazi ukuthi impahla entsha uzoyithenga ngani ngoba uhola impesheni. UPappas uthe bazophindela emuva babhunge kabanzi ngabangalekelela ngakho emphakathini wakule ndawo.Uthe ukholwa ukuthi umphakathi udinga usizo oluphuthumayo hhayi izethembiso ezingamanga.

IZIKHULU ezangamele izikhungo ezibizwa ngamaThusong Services Centre bezinombuthano ngenhloso yokucobelelana ngolwazi emahhovisi oMkhandlu waseMgungundlovu. Oyisikhulu soMnyango wokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu eKZN, uNkk Bev Khanyile, uthe lezi zikhungo zidlala enkulu indima ekuhlanganiseni zonke izidingongqangi zomphakathi.Uthe iCentre Management Forum umbuthano wabaphathi bamaThusong Services Centre, okuyizakhiwo ezisemqoka komasipala."AmaThusong Service Centre izikhungo zomphakathi lapho kusuke kusondezwe zonke izidingo zomphakathi endaweni eyodwa futhi ezindaweni zawo. Lezo zidingo kungaba ngezomnyango wasekhaya, Sassa, DSD nemfundo, nezinhlangano zomphakathi.“Uthe kubuye kuxazululwe izinkinga ezikhungethe umphakathi.Uthe kwiCentre Management Forum kusuke kuhlanganiswe zonke izimenenja zezikhungo ezingamaThusong."Inhloso yeCentre Management Forum ukuhlanganisa bonke abaphathi balezi zikhungo zaKwaZulu-Natal.Ukuze abazidingida izinkinga abahlangabezana nazo ezikhungweni zabo. Lombuthano uyasiza kakhulu ngoba abaphethe amaThusong  bayakwazi ukwabelana ngolwazi ngoba abenze kahle bayakwazi ukucobelela ozakwabo. Iphinde isize ekutheni bebodwa bayaqhudelana ngoba uma kukhona obona omunye owenze kahle, uthi 'nami ngizobuyela kumasipala wami ngifike ngenze kahle.'"UNkk Khanyile lokhu kubuye kusize nomnyango ukuba ukwazi ukubheka ukuthi uhlelo olwengamele wuMnyango wakwaCogta luqhutshwa kahle.UNkk Khanyile, obhekele ukuthuthukisa wonke amaThusong Centres, ucele zonke izimenenja ebezikhona ukuthi kumele ziqinisekise ukuthi ziyabalekelela abantu ukuthi bathole zonke izidingo zabo.Ugqugquzele ukuthi yonke iminyango kaHulumeni kanye naleyo engenzi nzuzo ezimele isondele kakhulu kumaThusong ukuze abantu bathole izidingo zabo zindawonye ngale kokuthi bagibele baye ezindaweni ezahlukene ukuya kofuna izidingo.IMeya yaseMshwathi, uMnuz Mandla Zondi, ithe inhloso yamaThusong ukuthi abantu bafike kwisikhungo esisodwa kodwa esineminyango eminingi ndawonye ukuze abantu bazithole zindawonye izidingo zabo.UZondi, obeyisikhulumi sosuku,  uthe kulamaThusong kuvamise ukuba kunkanise amahhovisi akwaSASSA, DSD, Home Affairs, SAPS, awezolimo, awezempilo, akamasipala , amabhange kanye nokunye okuyizidingo zomphakathi.UZondi ube esebonga wonke amamenenja ukuthi abe nempokophelo yokusebenzela abantu noma ngabe izimo zinzima kangakanani.

LUPHENYWA wuMvikeli woMphakathi udaba lwenkohlakalo kuMasipala Endumeni, eDundee okusolwa ukuthi kunesikhulu esagwaza ngo R600 000 ukuze sithole isikhundla.Isolezwe Ngempelasonto liyibonile incwadi yoMvikeli woMphakathi eqinisekisa ukuthi nakanjani uphenyo seluyaqala ngalolu daba.Umthombo owazi kahle udaba uthi kunomuntu obike udaba kuMvikeli woMphakathi wacela ukuthi igama lakhe ligodlwe.Leli phephandaba liyibonile incwadi eveza izinsolo zenkohlakalo ezishaqishayo.Umbhali wencwadi uzwakala enxusa uMvikeli woMphakathi ukuthi angene agamanxe Endumeni aphenye.Umbhali wencwadi uthi kunesikhulu esagwaza ukuze sithole isikhundla esiphezulu kumasipala.Kuvela ukuthi kukhona nobufakazi balokhu. Phezu kwalokho kuthiwa isikhulu kukhona lapho esingaphathanga kahle khona imali yomphakathi kodwa kwathuleka nje.“Ngamaphuzu esengiwabalile ngicela uMvikeli woMphakthi aphenye kabanzi ngalezi zinsolo, abambisane nezinye izinhlaka zoMbuso uma enza lo msebenzi,’’ kuchaza incwadi.UMvikeli woMphakathi u-Advocate Kholeka Gcaleka ubhalele umuntu ofake isikhalo emazisa ukuthi uyitholile incwadi futhi usejube uphenyo ngalolu daba.“Ngibhala maqondana nencwadi yakho ka-Ephreli 9, 2024. Ngiwatholile onke amaphepha owathumelile futhi ngiyaqinisekisa ukuthi ngigunyaze uphenyo maqondana nesikhalo.“Sizokuthinta maduze futhi uhlale wazi ukuthi uvikelekile,’’ kusho uMvikeli woMphakathi encwadini esayiniwe.Umthombo uthe lolu daba lutatazelisa izikhulu kangangokuthi zinqume ukuthi kube nomhlangano womkhandlu ophuthumayo ngoMsombuluko lubekwe ezithebeni.IMenenja kaMasipala uMnuz Sithembiso Ntombela ithe iyazi ngalolu daba kodwa isesemhlanganweni, icela ukunikwa imizuzu ewu-30 noma ihora.Inikwe isikhathi esingaphezu kwaso, yathintwa yathi ayikaqedi izosho uma iqeda kodwa yangashaya.

BANOKHWANTALALA abesifazane ngenxa yezikweletu nokungabibikho kwemali yokubhekela izidingo.Lezi zindaba zivezwe nguMnuz Benay Sager oyisikhulu esiphezulu seDebt Busters.USager ukhiphe ucwaningo olubizwa ngeMoney Stress Tracker, oluthole ukuthi abesifazane abasebasha banokhwantalala kakhulu ngenxa yokubiza kwempilo.Abadala kuvele ukuthi bakhathazeke kancane ngoba abanazo izikweletu eziningi futhi abayi kwabaluleka ngezikweletu.“Ucwaningo lwethu belubheka abantu abawu-26 000 ababhalise kwiDebt Busters ukuthi bacwaningwe ukuthi ukhwantalala lwabo lungakanani ngenxa yezikweletu. Sithole ukuthi ukhwantalala lwezikweletu lusuke ku-78% obelukuwona ngonyaka odlule lwaya ku-75% kulo nyaka. Abantu bampintshwe wukubiza kokudla, ukunyuka kwemali mboleko nokungathunyelwa kahle kwezidingo,” kusho uSager.Ukungacimi njalo kukagesi kuye kwehlisa kancane ukhwantalala njengoba abantu bekwazi ukubuka ithelevishini, ukupheka nokwenza ezinye izinto eziphazamisekayo uma ugesi ungekho.Uma kuqhathaniswa namadoda abesifazane banokhwantalala oluwu-10% ukudlula olwamadoda, bakhathazeke ka-20% ngempilo yabo naka-30% ngempilo yemindeni yabo.Udokotela wengqondo uDkt Andrea Kellerman, uthe abesifazane yibona abakwaziyo ukusho ukuthi banokhwantalala. Uthe ukhwantalala lubahlasela kakhulu ngoba yibona okufanele beseke amalungu omndeni, baqinisekise ukuthi umndeni udlile futhi wonke umuntu uphile kahle. Abanye banokhwantalala ngoba bakhulisa izingane ngabodwana.Amadoda uthe ayakwazi ukuvalela imizwa yawo, angabhekani nezinto eziningi ngesikhathi esisodwa njengabantu besifazane.“Into eyenza abesifazane babe nokhwantalala kakhulu wukuthi bangomama, yibona abasebenzayo ukuze kudliwe ekhaya. Bahlale bephatheke kabi ngenxa yomthwalo abawutshethe wezezimali nempilo,” kusho uDkt Kellerman.Uthe bakhathazekile ngoba abakwazi ukukhokha izikweletu, ayipheli inyanga besanemali ebhange, umholo uphelela kwigilosa.Ubalule ukuthi u-40% womholo ukhokhela izikweletu kanti abahola uR20 000 ngenyanga abakwazi ukuphila kahle ngenxa yezikweletu.Abaneminyaka ewu-55 bakhathazeke ngokukhokhela izikweletu nokuthi ngabe banemali eyanele yomhlalaphansi.IDebtBusters ithe abadinga usizo bangangena kwi-website yale nkampani ukuze balekelelwe ngezindlela zokuqeda izikweletu.

BEKUYINJABULO ngesikhathi isikole samabanga aphansi iMthethweni Primary, eMlaza, sivakashelwe inkampani i-Sporting Chance ibambisene nenkampani i-Walt Disney Afrika kuyoqwashiswa abafundi ngokuhlala bezivocavoca, izolo.Ukuhambela izikole kuwuhlelo olubizwa nge-Happy Healthy Play nalapho behlose ukunika amandla izikole ezintula izinsiza ukuze zifundise nangokubaluleka kokuzivocavoca ezikoleni.Ezinye izinto izingane eziqwashiswe ngazo ukufundiswa ukudla ukudla okunomsoco futhi okuzozinika amandla kanye nokuzivocavoca ngezindlela ezihlukahlukene ongakwenza uzihlalele ekhaya.Imenenja yakwa-Sporting Chance, uMnuz Bradlyn Stuurman, ikhuluma neSolezwe, ithe lolu hlelo baluqala ngo-2016.“Inhloso yethu ukuqhakambisa ukubaluleka kokuzivocavoca nokuthi izingane ziphile kahle. Isizathu sokuthi sivakashele ezikoleni ezingenazo izinsiza ezifanele yingoba ezinye zazo azinazo izinhlaka ezikahle zokuthi izingane zizivocavoce,” kusho uStuurman.Uthe kumqoka ukuthi izingane zifundiswe zisezincane ngokuzivocavoca futhi kubekhona ozoziqeqesha ezikoleni.“Izingane kumele ziphile impilo ekahle. Sisazama ukuthola abaqeqeshi emphakathini abazokwazi ukuziqeqesha ukuze siqhubeke nohlelo lwethu. Omunye umgomo esinawo wukuthi uma sesibatholile abaqeqeshi, sibahlomise ngolwazi. Siphinde sipende indawo esiyibiza nge-happy play ground ngaphakathi ezikoleni esizivakashelayo ukuze kuxhumane nohlelo lwezemfundo abalufundayo kwaGrade 3 okubalwa kulo ukuzivocavoca, ngezindlela ezehlukene,” usho kanje.Uthisha, uNksz Zama Cuambe, ofundisa uGrade 3 eMthethweni, uthe okwenziwe yi-Disney World kubasize kakhulu.“Sisizakele ngoba abantwana bazokhula bazi ukuthi yikuphi ukudla okumele bakudle okuzobasiza ekukhuleni kwabo nokumele bakugweme ukuze bangangenwa yizifo,” kusho uNksz Cuambe.Uthe njengothisha bakuthokozelile okulethelwe abafundi ngoba kuyisifundo esihle. Uthe njengoba befundisa izingane bazoqikelela ukuthi ziyazivocavoca ngoba zingabantu abafunda ngokubuka. Uqhube wathi nezithombe abazitholile zibahlomise ngolwazi okuzosiza izingane ukuze zibone ukuthi uma zidla ukudla okuthile imizimba yazo izobukeka kanjani.

MANCANE amathuba okuthi izinkawu ezijwayelekile, ezihlale zibonakala emakhaya kuleli, zisabalalise upokisi wezinkawu, iMpox.Lokhu kushiwo ongoti bezempilo baseNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal ngesikhathi kunesigcawu sokucobelelana ngolwazi mayelana neMpox. UDkt Richard Lessens uthe igciwane, imonkeypox, isezinkawini zase-Afrika emaphakathi nezwe, eligcine selitheleleka nakubantu lisuka ezilwaneni. "Baningi abantu abakhathazeke ngokuthi eThekwini kunezinkawu eziningi, bacabanga ukuthi zingalisabalalisa leli gciwane kanti akunjalo. Izinkawu ezinaleli gciwane ezamaphakathi ne-Afrika futhi kunohlobo oluthile lwegciwane olusabalalayo. Njengamanje eDRC kunohlobo olusha, iClade IIb,  olusabalala kakhulu yingakho bebaningi abantu abatheleleka ngalesi sifo kuleliya lizwe. Emazweni analeli gciwane lasuka ezinkawini, njengamanje lithelelana ngokuthintana kwabantu nakuleli kunjalo," kusho yena.Uqhube wathi nakuba kukuningi abangakakwazi ngalesi sifo kodwa bayacabanga ukuthi ukubheduka kwaso kudalwe ukuthi ukugomela iSmallpox kuleli kwavalwa eminyakeni engu-40 eyedlule."IMpox iyigciwane elisemndenini owodwa nowe-Smallpox. Umgomo ovikela iSmallpox uyayivikela iMpox. Esingakakuqondi kahle okwamanje ukuthi kungani iziguli ezineHIV ezine-Cd4 Count engaphansi kuka-350 zigule kangaka,“ kuchaza uDkt Lessens.USolwazi Nokukhanya Msomi, owungoti wezifo ezidalwa amagciwane, uthe okwamanje isikhungo esihlola uketshezi esibhekelele ukuhlola lesi sifo sisakwazi ukumelana nomthamo okhona woketshezi okumele luhlolwe.  USolwazi Yunus Moosa uthe okwamanje zonke iziguli ezingu-20, ezike zahaqwa yileli gciwane kuleli zilaliswe esibhedlela, zigula kakhulu.“Esikwaziyo ukuthi okwamanje zonke iziguli ezihaqekile ngabesilisa abaya ocansini nabanye, iMpox ziyithole ngokusondelana nabanayo. Ngalokho angichazi ukuthi lesi sifo sithelelana ngocansi. Uketshezi oluphuma ezilondeni yilona olusuke lunegciwane. Ludlulela komunye ngokuthi uketshezi lungene esikhunjeni esilimele okungaba esisikekile, esishile noma esinomhuzuko,” kusho uSolwazi Moosa.

Sekuqubuke izinkinga emaqenjini ayingxenye kahulumeni wokubambisana kubangwa ukujoyina kwePA.I-DA isibhalele i-ANC ifuna ukwazi ukuthi iPA ivunyelwe kanjani ukuthi ijoyine uhulumeni wobumbano kungakhulunyiwe namanye amaqembu.Amaqembu asabela kuqala ikhwelo likahulumeni wobumbano owamenyezelwa i-ANC, iDA, IFP neGood.Ukujoyina kweDA ne-IFP uhulumeni wobumbano kwenza ukuthi kube lula ukuba uMengameli, uCyril Ramaphosa, abuyele esikhundleni ngesikhathi kunomhlangano wokukhetha umengameli.Ngesikhathi i-ANC ikhipha isimemo sikahulumeni wobumbano, yakubeka ngokusobala ukuthi izandla ziyohlezi zivuliwe kwamanye amaqembu afuna ukujoyina.Muva nje kuvele izindaba zokujoyina kwePA ebeke umbandela wokuthi ifuna ukunikezwa uMnyango wezaseKhaya noma uMnyango wezamaPhoyisa uma ijoyina.Usihlalo woMkhandlu weDA, uNkk Hellen Zille, uthe bafuna ukwazi ukuthi iPA ivunyelwe kanjani ukuthi ijoyine uhulumeni wobumbano kungakhulunyiwe nabo.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma nabakwaSABC.“Isigaba 17 sesivumelwano sikahulumeni wobumbano sikubeka ngokusobala ukuthi nakuba umengameli enegunya lokuqoka ongqongqoshe, kufanele abonisane nabaholi bamaqembu ayingxenye kahulumeni wokubambisana.“I-ANC kufanele yazi ukuthi ayikwazi ukuzithathela izinqumo, kufanele baxoxe nathi. Kufanele bengakhohlwa ukuthi abazange balunqobe ukhetho. I-ANC ayikwazi ukuvele nje izifakele noma ubani.”USotswebhu we-ANC ePhalamende, uMnuz Mdumiseni Ntuli, uthe izingxoxo ngohulumeni wobumbano azikaphothulwa, wathi lokho kusho ukuthi wonke amaqembu afuna ukujoyina asavumelekile.“Asikwazi ukuvala umnyango ekubeni singakaqedi ukuqoka abazongena ezikhundleni ePhalamende.”USotswebhu weDA ePhalamende, uNksz Siviwe Gwarube, uthe impikiswano ngokujoyina kwePA ayisho ukuthi uzohlakazeka uhulumeni wobumbano.“Singene kuhulumeni wobumbano sazi ukuthi ngeke sihlezi sivumelana ngakho konke.”IDA nePA abanabo ubudlelwano obuhle, ngesikhathi kukhankaselwa ukhetho iPA yayifuna ukuthi iDA ithole ngaphansi kuka-50% eWestern Cape.Unobhala wePA, uNksz Chinelle Stevens, uthe ngeke bavume ukuphathwa uNkk Zille.“UNkk Zille kufanele azi ukuthi incwadi yokujoyina uhulumeni wobumbano sayisayina ngosuku olulodwa nabo, ngakho ke sasingekho isidingo sokuthi i-ANC ixoxe nabo. I-ANC ayikwazi ukutshelwa iDA ukuthi kufanele imeme maphi amaqembu kuhulumeni wokubambisana. Uma i-ANC ingavuma ukulawulwa iDA, lokho kungakha isithombe sokuthi uNkk Zille ubabambe lapho bebancane ngakhona.”Khonamanjalo, ayanda amaqembu ajoyina uhulumeni wobumbano.IPAC iyiqembu lakamumva elimemezele ukuthi lizokuba ingxenye kahulumeni wobumbano.Lokhu ikusho esitatimendeni esikhishwe emva komhlangano wesigungu esiphezulu.Unobhala jikelele wePAC, uMnuz Apa Pooe, uthe banqume ukujoyina uhulumeni wobumbano ukuze benze isiqiniseko sokuthi uhulumeni usebenza ngendlela.

ABEZWA lutho abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ngemali yabo esemabhodweni empesheni njengoba abantu sebeqalile ukufaka izicelo zokukhipha o-R30 000 babo.UNksz Michelle Acton oyi-Retirement Reform Executive (Isikhulu esikhulu) e-Old Mutual, uthe ngoLwesibili bangaphezu kuka-93 000 abantu abangene ku-WhatsApp wale nkampani bebuza ngendaba yokukhipha u-R30 000 wabo osebhodweni lempesheni elibizwa nge-savings pot.Uthe selokhu kuqale uhlelo lwe-two pot retirement system bathole izingcingo ezingaphezulu kuka-1000 kodwa konke kuhamba kahle.“Amakhasimende ethu afuna ukukhipha imali ayasizakala. Ziningi izingcingo esesizitholile, bayangena ku-WhatsApp nakwezinye izindlela zokuxhumana abantu. Okwamanje izinhlelo zethu zisahamba kahle.”UKhomishana we-South African Revenue Service, uMnuz Edward Kieswetter, uthe ngoMsombuluko baphasise izicelo zokukhipha imali eziwu-2 759, kwathi ngoLwesibili bathola eziwu-2 424. Lokhu uthe kusho ukuthi abantu bazothola imali ewu-R103 million bese kungena intela ewu-R6.7 million.KwaSanlam bathe ngoSepthemba 1, abantu bese beqalile ukufaka izicelo zokukhipha imali ebhodwe lempesheni.Baveze ukuthi konke kuhamba kahle base becela abantu ukuthi bangajahi ukukhipha imali ngaphandle uma kunezizathu ezibaphoqa ukuthi bayikhiphe.Bathe amakhasimende abo azokwaziswa ngazo zonke izigaba zokukhipha imali ngoba le ye-two pot izothatha isikhathi esijana kunesijwayelekile.IGovernment Employees Pension Fund (GEPF) yazise abantu ukuthi bathole uhlelo olusha lwe-app ye-GEPF etholakala ku-Android naku-Huawei.Abasebenzisa i-IOS bazokwazi ukuyithola ngoSepthemba 23 le app yokuzisiza.Ithe uma sekuqinisekiswe yonke imininingwane yomuntu kuzothatha izinsuku eziwu-60 ukuba imali ingene kwi-akhawunti yomuntu.IMomentum igqugquzele abantu ukuthi basebenzise i-app ukufaka izicelo zokukhipha imali, yathi izinkumbi ezithutheleke emahhovisi ayo.

Amaphoyisa aseMgungundlovu ashaqe owesilisa ayomphosa imibuzo ngokubulawa kwabantu abathathu nokuzama ukubulala oyedwa ngeSonto ekuseni.Ngokwesitatimende samaphoyisa, amaphoyisa athole umbiko ngesehlakalo sokudubula nokuthe uma efika endaweni yesigameko azithela phezu kwezidumbu ezintathu ngaphakathi emotweni. Abagilwa abathathu abaneminyaka engu-24, 34 no-36 bahlonzwe njengabashonile endaweni yesigameko.Okhulumela amaphoyisa eKZN, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe kubikwa ukuthi abangani abane bebehleli emotweni bephuza ngesikhathi kufika umsolwa waqala wadubula ebhekise ngakubo ngaphandle kokuthi vu. Abathathu badubuleke bashonela khona lapho kanti  oyedwa ukwazile ukubaleka emuva kokudubuleka engalweni. Yize ingakacaci imbangela yokuhlaselwa kwalaba kodwa kukholakala ukuthi ihlobene nokuthathwa kowesifazane ekilabhini nomunye wesilisa okuthiwa uthathwe omunye wabashonile ngesikhathi eshayela imoto ekhokhelwa ngebanga elihambile.

NKOSIKHONA CELEKUFUFUSA udlame oDidini, eMbumbulu, ngenxa yesihlava esesiphenduke insakavukela kule ndawo sokwebiwa kwezinkomo ebese ziyahlinzwa.Ngesonto eledlule nje lilodwa, Isolezwe Ngempelasonto  lithole ukuthi zingu-30 izinkomo ezebiwe emizini eyehlukene, zonke zitholakale zihlinziwe endaweni ebizwa ngokuthi isesilaheni.Kuvela ukuthi le ndawo isiqanjwe kanje ngoba zonke izinkomo ezebiwe zitholakala sezihlinziwe kuyona le ndawo.Isolezwe Ngempelasonto linane-vidiyo lapho khona okubonakala amalungu omphakathi esecosha inyama yezinkomo ezihlinziwe esilaheni.Amalungu omphakathi ayizisulu zalokhu akhulume neSolezwe Ngempelasonto, azwakalisa ukunengeka okukhulu ngalesi sihlava.UMnuz Samson Shezi uveze ukuthi emzini wakhe kwebizwe izinkomo eziyisithupha."Zonke izinkomo zami ngizithole sezihlinziwe lapho okuhlinzelwa khona ezinye ezisuke zebiwe. Le nto iyangicasula angifuni ukuqamba amanga. Uma kuqhubeka kanje luzobuya udlame lapha eMbumbulu,'' usho kanje.Uthi akuqondakali ukuthi kanti zisuke zebiwelwani uma zizohlinzwa zishiywe kanjalo, kungathathwa naleyo nyama.UNksz Sindi Phahla uveze ukuthi kubo bangena beba izinkomo ekubeni kwakunesifo.Uthe namanje basazibuza bayaziphendula ukuthi obani laba abanesibindi esingaka sokuthi bangene emzini okunesifo kusona maqede bebe imfuyo?''Sididekile namanje asisazi ukuthi senze njani. Uyabona laba abangene ekhaya ekubeni kunesifo impela banesibindi,'' usho kanje.Elinye ilungu lomphakathi elicele ukuba ligodlwe igama lalo liqinisekisile ukuthi kungekudala kuzosuka udungunyane kule ndawo."Ngiyakutshela mina lukhulu udlame oluzayo lapha eMbumbulu. Sikhathele manje ngeke phela size sidlale abantu bedlala ngemfuyo yethu,'' usho kanje sakusonga.UMnuz Zwakele Zondi owebelwe izinkomo ezine ufunge wagomela wathi buzochitheka bugayiwe.“’Angeke kulunge phela sidlale abanye abafana. Impela bayisukelile inyoka emgodini wayo,’’ usho kanje.Bonke laba ababelwe imfuyo bathi ababikanga emaphoyiseni ngalokho, kodwa babika enduneni yendawo, uMnuz Simphiwe Msweli.Ngebhadi leli phephandaba lithe lizama ukuxhumana naye ngalezi zinsolo, kwavela ukuthi ubulewe ngenyanga edlule. Kunezinsolo zokuthi ukubulawa kwakhe kuyahambisana nalo mkhuba odlangile. Kuvela ukuthi umufi wabiza umhlangano womphakathi ngoJanuwari, ukuzobhunga kabanzi ngale ngwadla.Kuthiwa umufi wathi uyabazi abantu abeba izinkomo, kwathi uma kuthiwa akabadalule wangakwenza lokho."Amadoda endawo ayehambele loyo mhlangano aphuma ecasukile awuduba nomhlangano. Uyabona-ke ukuthi uma sekubulewe induna ngenxa yalokhu lungakanani ke udlame olufufusayo kule ndawo?'' usho kanje.Imizamo yokuxhumana nekhansela lakule ndawo, uMnuz Ayanda Ndlovu, iphunzile ucingo belukhala kodwa lungaphendulwa.

IZINYUNYANA zabasebenzi bezempilo zithi uMnyango wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal unomthelela ezigamekweni zonesi abashaywa iziguli besemsebenzini.Esigamekweni sakamuva esenzeke ngoMgqibelo,  isiguli okusolwa ukuthi besingayidli kahle imishanguzo yaso yokulawula isifo sengqondo, sishaye  abahlengikazi ababili emtholampilo oseMpangeni.UMphathiswa wezeMpilo uNksz Nomagugu Simelane, uthe ngokuzwa kwakhe kuthe kusenomhlangano abaphathi besakhuluma nomhlengikazi wokuqala ngesigameko sokushaywa yisiguli,  saphinde salwa nomunye umhlengikazi oqashwe inhlangano esiza umphakathi osebenza kuwo umtholampilo. Kwagcina sekubizwa amaphoyisa nophiko olubhekele iziguli ezinezifo zengqondo zasesibhedlela iNgwelezane. Usihlalo wenyunyana yabahlengikazi, iDENOSA  KwaZulu-Natal , uMnuz Sibonelo Cele, uthe ukushoda kwabahlengikazi ezibhedlela nokungabikhona kwamawodi abhekele iziguli eziphazamisekile ngokwengqondo kuzo zonke izibhedlela ekubeni sikhula isibalo seziguli ezihlaselwa izifo zengqondo kudala ukuthi inkinga ingapheli. "Isiguli esiphazamiseke ngokwengqondo sidinga ukuthi umhlengikazi angawasusi amehlo kuso. Uma umhlengikazi eke wawasusa amehlo wasiza ezinye iziguli siyadinwa. Imithetho okumele ilandelwe ngaphambi kokuthi kuqinisekiswe ukuthi isiguli siphazamisekile nayo yengeza ingcindezi. Ngesikhathi kusalindwe isiqinisekiso  kuyenzeka isiguli senze umonakalo. Ukushoda kwabahlengikazi kwenza ukuthi umhlengikazi angakwazi ukubheka leso isiguli  esisodwa," kusho uCele.UMnuz Mlungisi Ndlovu oyimenenja yenyunyana yabasebenzi bezempilo iPSA KwaZulu-Natal, uthe  ezokuphepha ezikhungweni zezempilo azikho ezingeni elifanele."Onogada kwesinye isikhathi basuke bengekho eduze ukuze baqaphe ukuphepha kwabasebenzi nezinye iziguli ngoba isiguli singalimaza noma ngubani. Emasontweni ambalwa khona esibhedlela  eNgwelezane udokotela ugwazwe isiguli esemsebenzini, manje isiguli sesishaya onesi ababili. Lesi simo sidinga ukuqashelwa kakhulu.  Uma sesenzekile isigameko umnyango kudingeka ukuthi ubeseke abasebenzi ngokuthi uvakashele kuleso sikhungo ukuze kwehle uvalo. Uphinde unikeze umhlengikazi othinthekayo usizo lokwelulekwa ngokwenqondo. Uma elimele kubhekwe nokuthi uyawuthola umhlomulo wokuthi ulimale esemsebenzini," kusho uNdlovu.UMphathiswa, uNksz Simelane, uthe umnyango uyaluphenya lolu daba kodwa isiguli asiboshwanga, sigodukiswe nowomndeni.

KUVELE ukuvunana kwezitatimende zabamangalelwa ecaleni lokufa kukaSenzo Meyiwa nezofakazi bombuso ababesendlini ngobusuku besigameko. Ofakazi bebelokhu bemile ekutheni kwangena amadoda nokuyiwona adubula uMeyiwa.Kufundwe izitatimende zabamangalelwa kwavela okwashiwo wofakazi kwaze kwavela nezinsolo zokuthi uKelly Khumalo wakhipha uR100 000 ethenga izinkabi.UMeyiwa owayeyintandokazi ye-Orlando Pirates neBafana Bafana, wadutshulwa wabulawa ekubo kwentombi yakhe ewumculi uKelly eVosloorus, eGauteng ngo 2014.Amaphoyisa athi ummangalelwa wokuqala uMuzikawukhulelwa Sibiya nowesibili uBongani Ntanzi, bawavuma amacala basayina nezitatimende. Abamangalelwa bese beziphika izitatimende bethi baphoqwa ukuzisayina kodwa inkantolo yanquma ukuthi zizosebenza.Iphoyisa uLieutenant Colonel Solomon Raphadu elathatha isitatimende kuNtanzi, lisifundile enkantolo.URaphadu uthe wathatha isitatimende kuNtanzi ngoJuni 2020 esiteshini samaphoyisa eMoroka lapho ayeqeqebula khona.Uqhubeke ngokuthi uNtanzi wabhala ukuthi washayelwa ucingo wummangalelwa wesine uMnuz Mthokoziseni Maphisa, emazisa ngomsebenzi ophuthumayo wokubulala uMeyiwa. Isitatimende siveza ukuthi uNtanzi wasuka eNorth West waya eGoli.Kuvela ukuthi bahlanganela ehostela eVosloorus lapho okwaxoxwa khona ngokubulala uMeyiwa.“ Bangitshela ukuthi uKelly Khumalo ukhiphe umsebenzi wokuthi kubulawe uSenzo Meyiwa. Savumelana sahamba ngezikhathi zantambama, ngangena ngaphakathi noCarlos owafuna imali namaselula.“UMeyiwa wagxumela uCarlos balwa wadubuleka umufi, mina ngaphuma namaselula nemali,’’ kusho isitatimende.UNtanzi uthi wanikwa uR15 000 njengenkokhelo waphindwa ngoR30 000 awunikwa wummangalelwa wesihlanu uFisokuhle Ntuli.Elinye iphoyisa uColonel Mhlanganyelwa Mbotho elathatha isitatimende sikaSibiya libiziwe nalo lachaza kabanzi ngaso.Esitatimendeni sikaSibiya kuvela ukuthi kwaqala kwayiwa enyangeni kuyochithwa amathambo ukuhlola ukuthi kuzohamba kahle yini.Isitatimende siveza ukuthi inyanga edabuka eSwatini, yabatshela ukuthi konke kumhlophe abahambe.“Abangani bami bangithinta bathi kunomsebenzi abawunikwe wuKelly ufuna kubulawe uSenzo uzokhokha uR100 000.“Saqala kumkhulu sahlola sakhokha uR50, wasinika umuthi namabhande ukuze siqine. Sabuye samkhokhela uR5 000 umkhulu emuva komsebenzi,’’ kusho isitatimende sikaSibiya.Uthe baxoxa ukuthi babezokwenza sengathi kubanjwa inkunzi bese bedubula uMeyiwa. Sebesendleleni beya ukuyosebenza uthe uKelly wabashayela ebabuza ukuthi bayeza yini.Icala liyaqhubeka enkantolo ngoMsombuluko.

Izitshudeni zaseDurban Uneversity of Technology (DUT) ezenza izifundo zeMandarin (Ulimu lwaseChina) zizoba nethuba lokuvakashela izindawo ezahlukene esifundazweni iFujian, eChina, ngenhloso yokuqonda kabanzi ngosikompilo lwakhona namathuba emikhakheni eyahlukene.Lezi zitshudeni ezingu-17 zifulathele eNingizimu Afrika ngoMsombuluko ekuseni zaze zafika edolobheni iFuzhou, ngoLwesibili ngo-5 ntambama, ngokwesikhathi saseChina (iChina ingaphambili ngamahora ayisithupha neNingizimu Afrika).Uhambo, i-2024 FAFU-DUT Confucius Institute Summer Camp of "Experiencing Charming Fujian" luhlelwe yiConfusius Institute yaseDUT neFujian Agriculture and Forestry University (Fafu) futhi luzodonsa amasonto amabili.IConfucius Institute (CI) yaseDUT igqugquzela ukusebenzisana emikhakheni ehlukene phakathi kwe-DUT namanyuvesi aseChina.UDkt Eddie Fu oyi-Director ye-Global Engagement eFafu, uthe uyajabula ukwamukela izitshudeni zase-DUT ikakhulukazi ngoba usebenze khona iminyaka emine njengesikhulu se-CI yakhona.Uthe kuningi akukhumbula ngeTheku ngoba bagqugquzele ukuthi abantu baxhumane, ikakhulukazi abasha baseChina naseThekwini.“Yize nizohlala izinsukuwana kodwa siyathemba iFuzhou izoba yikhaya lenu lesibili. Nizovakashela izindawo ezahlukene esifundazweni nibe nezingqungquthela nabanye abafundi bakwezinye izikhungo esifundazweni. Nizohambela izindawo ezinomlando. IFujian iyafana neKwaZulu-Natal eNingizimu Afrika ngoba sinemilando eyahlukene namasiko amangalisayo nezizwe ezahlukene njengaKwaZulu-Natal,” kuchaza uFu.Uthe uyathemba ukuthi bazokhuluma kakhulu iMandarin babone nokundlondlobala kweFujian, futhi ngomuso bazobuya bezofunda noma bezosebenza kulesi sifundazwe.Lolu hambo luqondane nokuvakasha kukaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa eChina, ofike ngoMsombuluko, njengoba kunengqungquthela iChina-Africa Cooperation Summit (FOCAC) esongwa ngoLwesine. NgoLwesithathu uzokwethula inkulumo engqungqutheleni i-South Africa-China Business Forum.“Omengameli bamazwe omabili (Ramaphosa nowaseChina) babe nomhlangano obe yimpumelelo wokugqugquzela ukusebenzisana. Ngiyathemba njengabantu abasha nizobambisana nathi sigqugquzele ubungani kula mazwe womabili,” kusho uFu.Inhloko ye-DUT CI, uFrank Lin WU, ithe lolu wuhlelo abalwenza minyaka yonke kusuka ngo-2015, ngaphandle kweminyaka lapho kuhlasele khona iCovid-19.I-CI yase-DUT isungulwe ngoMashi, ngesikhathi uMengameli waseChina, uXi Jinping, evakashele owayengumengameli waseNingizimu Afrika uJacob Zuma. Yaqala ukusebenza ngo-2014 futhi ise-ML Sultan.Izitshudeni ezihambile bezibukeka zijabule zithatha nezithombe yize nokukhathala bese kubhalwe ebusweni kwabanye. Ngemuva kwendiza yamahora alinganiselwa ku-12 esuka eGoli iya eShenzhen, zingene ebhasini imizuzu engu-40 zibheke esiteshini sesitimela samahora amane esibheke eFuzhou. Zamukelwe yithimba laseFafu, nasehhotela zamukelwa ngezinye izitshudeni zaseFafu nazo ezikhombise injabulo.

ZIMILE kwelithi ngeke zilubhade emakilasini izitshudeni zaseMfolozi TVET College ebezibhikisha izolo eRichards Bay zikhala ngezinkinga.Phakathi kwezikhalo zazo ziveze ukuthi kukhona eziphathelene neNational Student’s Financial Aid Scheme (NSFAS), kuphinde kube khona ezithinta isikhungo ngqo.Umhleli wombhikisho, uMnuz Sanele Mvelase, echaza ngezinye zezinkinga, uthe kuze kube yimanje ezinye izitshudeni azikaze zizithole izincwadi zokufunda.“Abanye sebeze baqala ukubhala izivivinyo, abanye kulindeleke ukuthi baqale maduze. Kuthiwa asizibhale kanjani izivivinyo singenazo izincwadi,” kubuza uMvelase.Uqhube wathi ezindaweni ezihlala izitshudeni ngaphakathi esikhungweni kunomgomo wokuthi izitshudeni ziyaphekelwa.Uthe ophekela izithudeni ukhala ngokuthi akakhokheliwe, izitshudeni zibhuqwa yindlala.“Sonke lesi sikhathi ubezama ngendlela azama ngayo, aziphekele izitshudeni. Kamumva ukhale ngokuthi sekuphele kona lokho abekubekile, izitshudeni sezilala ngephalishi,” kusho uMvelase.Ukhale nangokuthi uxhaso lwemali yokukhokhela irenti kulezo zitshudeni ezihlala emiqashweni ezimele, imali yama-data, eyokudla nezinto zokugcoba ivele ibe ncane njengoba enye ithathwa ama-charges.Elandisa mayelana nezinkinga ezithinta isikhungo, uthe izitshudeni eziphila nokukhubazeka azibhekelelwe, njengoba zize zisizwe ezinye izithudeni uma zizofunda.Ubuye wathi amabhilidi awekho esimweni esifanele, wathi amanye anetha imvula kodwa kulindeleke ukuthi bafundele kuwo.“Lezi zinkinga ezimayelana nesikhungo zindala, ezinye zazo, kusukela ngo-2012 zikhona, zingalungiswa,” kusho yena.Uthe bakulungele ukubuyela ekilasini, inqobo nje uma behlangatshezwa ezikhalweni zabo ikakhulukazi lezo ezithinta izincwadi nokudla.Okhulumela isikhungo uMnuz Bhekani Ndlovu, uthe  bayazibophezela ekutheni ukufunda nokufundisa kuqhubeke ngendlela ejwayelekile.Uthe bayazi ukuthi imbangela enkulu eyenza izitshudeni ziteleke yizinkinga zeNSFAS.“Ihhovisi leNSFAS elikhona esikhungweni sethu, lenza konke okusemandleni ukulungisa izinkinga zabafundi,” kusho uNdlovu.Uthe batholile ukuthi ezinye izinkinga zidalwe ukungakhokhelwa kwabahlinzeka ngezidingo esikhungweni, wathi lokhu kwenzeke izinyanga ezimbili kuphela.“Ngokwesivumelwano osonkontileka abasisayina nesikhungo, kufanele babe nemali eyanele ukukhokhela abasebenzi babo izinyanga ezintathu ukugwema izimo ezifana nalezi. Isikhungo senza konke okusemandleni ukulungisa lolu daba,” kusho uNdlovu.

SEKULELE ezandleni zazo ukuthi ziyawasebenzisa yini amathuba ezikhonjiswe wona izitshudeni zaseDurban University of Technology (DUT) eziphothule uhambo lwamasonto amabili esifundazweni iFujian, eChina, ngoLwesihlanu.Lezi zitshudeni ezingu-17 ezenza izifundo zolimi lwakhona iMandarin, zifulathele elakuleli ngoSepthemba 2, ukuyothamela i-summer camp ehlelwe yi-DUT Confucius Institute neFujian Agriculture and Forestry University (Fafu).Kusuka zifika kuleliya zwe belungekho usuku lokuphumula njengoba bezehla zenyuka zihambela izigcinamagugu zifunda ngomlando waseChina, ikakhulukazi eFujian. Bezihamba nezitshudeni zaseFafu, lapho zifunde kabanzi ngomlando wenyuvesi.Zihambele nezindawo eziningi ezigcina umlando okubalwa kuzo enomlando wemisebenzi kamengameli wezwe, uMnuz Xi Jinping eFujian, ngaphansi kohlelo olubizwa nge-3820.Zibuye zayofundiswa ngomsuka wetiye i-jasmine tea njengoba itiye liyingxenye enkulu yomlando waseChina.Zifunde nangokusetshenziswa kobuchwepheshe be-juncao okuwutshani obukhiqiza amakhowe osebalethwa naKwaZulu-Natal ngo-2005.Ezinye izindawo ezihanjelwe kubalwa nezinye izikhungo zemfundo ephakeme ukuyochazelwa ngamathuba akhona.Njengoba iChina yaziwa njengezwe eliseqhulwini ngakwezobuchwepheshe, izitshudeni ziyiswe eChina Fujian VR Experience Center. Khona kutshenziswa ubuchwepheshe be-virtual reality ukwenza ezemfundo zibe lula kanjalo nezikaqedisizungu okuthi uma ufake izibuko zakhona kube ngathi uyingxenye yakho.Ziye nasesikhungweni i-Brickz PartNIR Innovation Center nasembukisweni wamabhizinisi iChina International Fair for Investments & Trade.Bezingagcini ngokufunda kuphela kodwa beziphinde zidle nokudla kwakhona.Yize izitshudeni zikhombise ukukujabulela ebezifundiswa ngakho kodwa kuhambe izinsuku kwaba nokuhhumuzela, kokunye zithengelwe ukudla okusheshayo kwasezitolo ezikhona eNingizimu Afrika ngoba sezikhathele ezingakujwayele kwakuleliya zwe. Nokushisa bekungazibekile phansi kwazise yisehlobo nobekudala abanye bekhale ngokukhathala.Zonke zibuye ziphephile yize kuke kwaba novalo lokuthi esinye sizogcina siyohlolwa ngoba besikhala ngezinhlungu ngasenhliziyweni.Umqondisi we-DUT CI, uMnuz Frank Lin Wu ekhuluma nezitshudeni, uzigqugquzele ukuthi ziwathathe amathuba ezikhonjiswe wona.“Uma ninamaqhinga okuqhamuka nezinto nokuqeqeshelwa amabhizinisi, nikhululeke nisazise ukuze sizobona ukuthi sinisiza kanjani,” kusho uWu.

BAGCIZELELE izizathu ezehlukene zokuthi kungani kufanele badedelwe ngebheyili abasolwa  ecaleni lokubulawa komculi uKiernan ‘AKA’ Forbes nomngani wakhe uTebello ‘Tibz’ Mosoane.Abasolwa abahlanu, oMnuz Lindokuhle Thabani Mkhwanazi, Lindani Zenzele Ndimande, Siyanda Eddie Myeza, Mziwethemba Harvey Gwabeni noLindokuhle “Lindo” Ndimande bebevele ngoLwesinne eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini.Abameli babo bebenza izethulo zokugcina njengoba kuqhubeka ukulalelwa kwesicelo sebheyili.Ummeli womsolwa wesibili, uNdimande, u-Adv Walmaras, uthe akufanele ukuthi kubekwe isizathu sokuthi umsolwa angeqa aye kwelinye izwe, bube bungekho ubufakazi obusekela lokho.“Ibheyili akufanele inqatshwe ngoba nakhu amaphoyisa athi kunobungozi. Abukho ubufakazi obukhombisa ukuthi angabaleka ngakho akwanele ukuthi kuthiwe uzobaleka,” kusho uWalmaras.Uthe ngesikhathi uNdimande eboshwa, yathathwa ipassport yakhe.Ummeli kaGwabeni, u-Advocate Paul Jorgensen uthe ikhasimende lakhe alikuphiki ukuthi kwafakwa uR800 000 ebhange lalo, wathi angasho angahlonizi ukuthi kwakungowebhizinisi.“UMbuso unazo izindlela zokulandelela ukufakwa kwemali ukuze uzanelise. Imali wayithola enkampanini ehloniphekile,” kusho uJorgensen.Uqhube wathi isizathu esidala ukuthi uMnuz Mfundo Gcaba (okuthiwa inkampani yakhe eyafaka imali), angaboshwa ingoba abukho ubufakazi obuphathekayo obumyamanisa necala.Echaza ngemoto iBWM, okuthiwa yayilokhu ilandela u-AKA kusuka esikhumulweni sezindiza, uthe yayiqashelwe izinto ezihlangene nomsebenzi.“Kwase kunesikhathi iqashiwe. Okunye okungavezwa ukuthi zikhona ezinye izimoto eziningi aziqasha ngaphambi kwalokho,” usho kanje.IMantshi uMnuz Vincent Hlatshwayo ilihlehlisele inamhlanje icala, ukuze uMbuso  wenze izethulo zawo zokugcina.

KUZOKWENZEKA okuhlukile kwi-Africa’s Travel Indaba njengoba kulo nyaka izihambeli zalo mbukiso zizobe zoselwa inyama yaseMax’s Lifetyle.Ngokusho kwesikhulu esiphezulu sase-Max’s Lifestyle, uNksz Zinhle Mqadi, kulo nyaka banqume ukuletha umuzwa wakwa-Max’s kwiTravel Indaba ukuze labo abangeke balithole ithuba lokuya khona bahambe benawo umuzwa wokuthi kwenzekani.“Asiyona nje indawo ewushisanyama kodwa kulokhu sinqume ukubosela inyama kwi-Africa’s Travel Indaba abantu sisizwa yiDurban Tourism. Sizobuye sibakhumbuze ukuthi asiyona nje indawo yokosa inyama kodwa sinendawo yokucwala izinwele, edayisa izimpahla nokunye okuningi okwenzeka eMax’s Lifestyle,” kusho uNksz Mqadi.Uthe bayakujabulela ukuthi izivakashi azisagcini nje ngokuvakasha enkabeni yedolobha kodwa seziya nasemalokishini.Ucele uhulumeni ukuthi athuthukise ezinye izindawo zokuvakasha elokishini ukuze abantu bahlale khona.“Sinenkinga yokuthi kusenabantu abacabanga ukuthi akuphephile kwezinye izindawo zasemalokishini. Ngenhlanhla thina eMax’s Lifestyle sesakhe ubudlelwano obukhombisa ukuthi siphephile. Ezinye izindawo zithathwa njengezingaphephile ngoba zisemalokishini. Siyacela uhulumeni azithuthukise, atshale namaphoyisa. Kungakuhle abantu bahambele eMlaza bayobona umuzi wezishoshovu zomzabalazo obaba nomama uGriffiths noVictoria Mxenge. Kubalulekile ukuthi sizithuthukise izindawo zethu ukuze abantu babe nezinto eziningi abazozenza emalokishini,” kusho yena.UMnuz Samora Nqweniso oyimenenja esabambile kwaTourism KwaZulu-Natal, uthe bayasebenzisana nezinhlangano ezihlukene ukukhangisa amabhizinisi ezokuvakasha nokuhlomisa osomabhizinisi ngamakhono adingekayo.Uthe zikhona izinhlelo zokuqinisekisa ukuthi ezokuvakasha zihlomulisa abantu ngoba nasendaweni yokupaka imikhumbi yezivakashi entsha bayafika osomabhizinisi abancane.Ubalule ukuthi abanye bahambisa izivakashi ezisuka emkhumbini ezindaweni ezihlukene zokuvakasha ezakhele iKwaZulu-Natal. Kuya ngokuthi izivakashi zifuna ukubonani.Uthe ababheki nje imicimbi emikhulu kodwa nangesikhathi sezinkonzo nemibukiso yokujima bayayikhangisa iKwaZulu-Natal.

IZOKHETHWA emhlanganweni womkhandlu ozokuba ngoLwesibili imeya yoMasipala waseThekwini.Umhlangano okuzokhethwa kuwo imeya uzokuba seNkosi Albert Luthuli International Convention Centre.ITheku lisale lingenayo imeya emva kokususwa kukaMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda, osejutshwe eMkhandlwini weziFundazwe.Umasipala ukhiphe isimemo kwabezindaba, ubika ngomhlangano wangoLwesibili, kepha wangachaza ukuthi iziphi izindaba ezizoxoxwa emhlanganweni.Umhlangano wangoLwesibili wahlelwa ngaphambi kokuthi kususwe uKaunda.Usomlomo, uMnuz Thabani Nyawose, uthe bazosale sebesebenzisa wona umhlangano wangoLwesibili ukuvala isikhala semeya.“Ngiyakuqinisekisa ukuthi imeya entsha izokhethwa emhlanganweni wangoLwesibili.”I-ANC ibingakaluphothuli uhlelo lokuqoka ozokuba imeya.Kuvela ukuthi ubuholi be-ANC KwaZulu-Natal buphakamise amagama amathathu okuzokhethwa kuwo ozokuba imeya.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe Ngemepelasonto, ohlwini kukhona igama lowayenguMphathiswa wezoLimo, uMnuz Cyril Xaba, kube khona elaloyo obenguNgqongqoshe wezaMaphoyisa, uMnuz Bheki Cele nelaloyo obengundunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube.UXaba obekade eyilungu lePhalamende, akabuyeli ngenxa yokuncipha kwezihlalo ezitholwe i-ANC okhethweni oludlule.Kanjalo uCele noNkk Dube-Ncube nabo basale ngaphandle ngesikhathi kufungiswa amalungu ePhalamende naweziShayamthetho.Laba holi bazokwenziwa inhlolokhono, bese kuqokwa oyedwa.Okhulumela i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mafika Mndebele, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi sebewahambisile amagama amathathu kodwa angakafuna ukuwadalula.“Kuzokuba nohlelo lokuhlunga, uma seluphothuliwe sizomemezela ukuthi ubani ophumelele.”Phezu kwesikhundla semeya, i-ANC isahlalelwe umsebenzi wokuqoka usihlalo wekomiti lezokuHlaliswa kwaBantu.Leli komiti selihlale isikhathi eside lingenaye usihlalo kulandela ukuxoshwa kwekhansela le-EFF, uMnuz Themba Mvubu.UMvubu wakhishwa emva kokuqala kwezinkinga emshadweni we-ANC ne-EFF kumasipala waseThekwini.Mumva nje i-EFF isanda kumemezela ukuthi kuphelile obekuyihlanganise ne-ANC kuMasipala waseThekwini.UKaunda ubelokhu ebambe njengosihlalo wekomiti kwaze kwabe uyashiya.Akucaci noma i-ANC isazoqhubeka nokubambisana namaqembu amancane eThekwini noma isizosebenza namaqembu ebambisene nawo kuzwelonke.EThekwini i-ANC ibambisene neNFP, namanye amaqembu amancane.Kuzwelonke naKwaZulu-Natal i-ANC ibambisene ne-IFP neDA.

IZOFIHLWA ngeSonto inyanga yaseMlaza ebidumile, uMnuz Nhlanhla "Sbushebushe" Cele.UCele owazakhela udumo olukhulu ngembiza esiza amadoda ekamelweni, uSbushebushe, udutshulwe wabulawa ngesonto eledlule esendaweni yakhe, iYellow Lounge ekwa-A, eMlaza.Bamphuthumisa esibhedlela eMshiyeni okuyilapho okwamenela khona.Umngcwabo wakhe uzobe usehholo lomphakathi lakwa-V, eMlaza. Kulindeleke ukuthi uhanjelwe ngabantu abaningi abavela ezindaweni ezahlukene.Kulindeleke ukuthi uholwe yibandla laseZayoni abelihola, iDwala Lokuphila. Amalungu omndeni akuqinisekisile ukuthi uCele uzofihlwa ngeSonto.NgoMgqibelo kuzoba nenkonzo yomlindelo ezodonsa ubusuku bonke kuze kuse ngakusasa.Namuhla, khona ehholo kuzokuba nenkonzo yesikhumbuzo ehlelwe iNkatha Freedorm Part (IFP).Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi uCele ubengakufihli ukuthi uyilungu laleli qembu.ISolezwe like labhala ngoCele phambilini ngesikhathi edutshulwa kodwa wasinda.Ubeyinyanga ebiphinde ibe ngusomabhizinisi njengoba ebeqashe izisebenzi ezilinganiselwa ku-100 emabhizinisini akhe ehlukene.

IZOHANJELWA yiloyo owayenguMengameli wezwe laseNingizimu Afrika, uMnuz Jacob Zuma inkonzo enkulu yenhlangano ebizwa ngokuthi yiLast Move Revival eyandulela iPhasika kuleli sonto.Lokhu kudalulwe yiloyo onguSihlalo wale nhlangano, uMphostoli Sifiso Khuzwayo. Kule nkonzo kuzobuye kukhulekelwe nokhetho lakulo nyaka. Uveze ukuthi lena kuzoba yinkonzo enkulu ezoqala ngoLwesihlanu ize iphothulwe ngoMgqibelo ntambama.Uveze ukuthi iLast Move, inkonzo izobe iyenza ngokuhlanganyela nenhlangano, iSouth Coast Pastors Fraternal.Kuzokube kugxunyekwe itende elikhuliu enkundleni yezemidlalo yaseLovu, KwaGabela. Inhlosongqangi yayo uthe ukuhlanganisa abefundisi kwenziwe amazwi ayisikhombisa ngaphambi kwephasika, ebese kulalelwa uMnuz Zuma ekhuluma nezinceku zenkosi."Simeme uMsholozi ukuze ezokhuluma kabanzi nabefundisi mayelana nendima okufanele iklanywe yibona abefundisi ezweni. Kuningi okunye azokhuluma ngakho uma esehlangene nabefundisi,'' usho kanje.Baningi kakhulu abanye abefundisi abaziwayo kakhulu okulindeleke ukuba babe yingxenye yale nkonzo.Phakathi kwabo kubalwa uMphostoli PD Ngcobo, uMbhishobhi PR Chiliza. Umbhishobhi S. Ngcobo, u-Archbishob T Nxumalo, uMbhishobhi S Thabethe, uMbhishobhi D Ngobese noMbhishobhi N. Nkwanyana.Bonke bazoshiyelana inkundla bashumayele ngamazwi ayisikhombisa ngoLwesihlanu.Kulindeleke ukuthi ngoMgqibelo uMsholozi ethule inkulumo ayibhekise kubefundisi.

Izihlathi zizovakashela izindlebe kubashayeli bezimoto njengoba izibalo zeCentral Energy Fund (CEF) zamaphakathi nenyanga ziveza ukuthi intengo kaphethroli izokwehla ngoJulayi.Ngokwezibalo zeCEF kulindeleke ukuthi intengo yelitha likaphethroli i-ULP95 lehle ngoR1.10 bese ele-ULP93 yehle ngoR1.15.  Intengo yamalitha kadilizili izokwehla ngo-55 cents bese elikapharafini yehle ngo-45 cents.Inhlangano eyenza ucwaningo ngezezimoto, i-Automobile Association (AA) ithe lezi zibalo zisengashintsha njengoba inyanga ingakapheli.“Okwamanje ngeke sikuqinisekise ukuthi ilitha likaphethroli lizokwehla ngamalini ngoba izibalo zisengashintsha njengoba inyanga ingakapheli. Esingakuqinisekisa wukuthi ucwaningo lukhombisa ukuthi uphethroli uzokwehla ngoJulayi. Ucwaningo lwethu luveza ukuthi intengo ka-oyela iyehla emhlabeni jikelele kanti sibuye sibheke neRandi ukuthi lihweba ngamalini uma liqhathaniswa ne-Dollar laseMelika ngoba u-oyela ongahluziwe ulandwa ngaphandle,” kuchaza abe-AA esitatimendeni.Bathe uma iDollar laseMelika lehlelwe ngamandla lokho kusho ukuthi u-oyela ongahluziwe uzothengwa ngemali encane bese kuba nomthelela omuhle uma nowoyela ushibhile ngoba kuzuza abathengi bakaphethroli njengoba ugcina sewehla.“Uma isimo singashintshi abashayeli bezimoto bazozuza ngoba ukwehla kukaphethroli kuzonciphisa umthwalo emahlombe abo. Phela impahla eningi ithwalwa ngamaloli ngakho uma kunoshintsho kwintengo kadizili nophethroli lokho kwehlisa izindleko kubantu bakuleli,” kusho abe-AA.Uhulumeni uyimemezela ngesonto lokuqala intengo kaphethroli bese abantu bebona ushintsho eziteshini zikaphethroli ngoJulayi 3.

I-ACTIONSA KwaZulu-Natal ihlongoza ukufaka enkantolo uMasipala weTheku nowoGu ngenkinga yamanzi.Lokhu kuvezwe umholi waleli qembu, uMnuz Zwakele Mncwango izolo kwabezindaba emva kokuhambela iziphehlimanzi ngoLwesibili nangoLwesithathu behlola isimo samanzi.Uthe lokhu bakususele embikweni owenziwe inhlangano elwela amalungelo abantu, iHuman Rights Commission kulandela ukuthola izikhalazo eziningi emphakathini.Udalule ukuthi abemukelekanga kuMasipala woGu njengoba bevinjwe ngezinhlokohlela zezibhamu.UMncwango ophinde agaqele esobuNdunankulu njengoba kuyiwa okhethweni, uthe bazoya enkantolo ukuqinisekisa ukuthi uyabahlinzeka abantu ngamanzi njengoba kuyilungelo labo elikumthethosisekelo.“Sizoqale sifune incwadi ephoqa laba omasipala ukuthi basivulele amathangi agcina amanzi neziphehlimanzi ukuze sihambise onjiniyela bethu ukuyobheka ukuthi yiziphi izinkinga ezikhona,” kusho uMncwango.Uqhube wathi onjiniyela bazophinde bahlole nengqalasizinda bese beyasho ukuthi kungaba yimalini ukuthi kulungiswe umonakalo.“Uma sesiqede lokho, sizobe sesiya enkantolo nombiko ogcwele ozosho ukuthi nazi izinkinga ezikhona, zingalungiswa kanjani ukuze inkantolo iphoqe (omasipala) ukuthi abantu bahlinzekwe ngamanzi,” kusho uMncwango.Ukhale ngokulahleka kwamanzi angu-58% eThekwini, wathi lokhu kusho ukuthi iningi imali ekhishwa umasipala ukhokhela amanzi agcina engafikanga kubantu.Uthe amanzi alahlekayo uma sekubhekwa ezezimali, kuye kuvele ukuthi adla imali engu-R2 billion ngonyaka.Okunye akhale ngakho ukuhudulwa kwezinyawo ukulungiswa kwezinkinga zamanzi ezindaweni ezihlala abantu bebala elimnyama.“Kugcina sekuyinto ejwayelekile kubantu abahlwempu kodwa uma eMhlanga kuhambe amanzi izinsuku ezimbili, kusukuma ngisho imeya (uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda) ayochaza ukuthi kwenzekeni,” kusho yena.Uthe sekuphele amasonto amabili eMlaza kwa-Q bengenamanzi.“Inhlekelele yamanzi eThekwini yenziwe ngamabomu ukuze kukhishwe amathenda, bese kudliwa imali,” kusho uMncwango.Uthe abakubonayo wubugebengu babantu abasebenzisa amanzi ukuzicebisa.“Umngeni Water uyawaletha amanzi kodwa agcine engafinyelelanga kubantu. Kunobugebengu babantu asebehlangene ukwenza imali ngokusungula inhlekelele yamanzi. Bacekela phansi ingqalasizinda ukuze kuzothunyelwa amaloli emphakathini,” kusho uMncwango.Uqhube wathi abanye babulala ingqalasizinda ukuze bezobizwa ukuthi bazoyilungisa, wathi le nkinga ingalungiswa ngokuqedwa kwamathenda.Uphinde wathi enye inkinga idalwa wukuthi ubuholi bukaMasipala waseThekwini bunenkinga yokungazimiseli ngokuxazulula inkinga yamanzi.Wenze isibonelo ngezigcinimanzi zaseNanda, Ntuzuma nasePhoenix, wathi imiphakathi eyakhelene nazo sekuneminyaka ingenamanzi.

INDLUNKULU kaZulu izobumbana uma sekunomkhuleko wokukhumbula  iSilo esesakhothama, uZwelithini KaBhekuzulu KwaNongoma kusasa.Lokhu kuvezwe uMntwana uMbonisi Zulu esitatimendeni esithunyelelwe abezindaba. UMntwana uMbonisi Zulu uthe umkhuleko kuzobe sekuyiminyaka emithathu  kwakhothama oNgangezwe lakhe, ngoMashi 2021. Uveze ukuthi wenziwa yindlunkulu ihlangene kanjalo nenhlangano engenzinzuzo, iGoodwill Foundation. Ngokusho kwesitatimende esithunyelwe uMntwana uMbonisi  kwabezindaba, umkhuleko  owenziwa kulandela ukukhothama koNgangezwe lakhe, ngoMashi 2021, uzoba seMahhashini KwaNongoma.UMntwana uMbonisi uthe okubajabulisayo ukuthi kuzobe kungokokuqala ukuthi lesi sikhumbuzo sibanjwe yindlunkulu ihlangene.“Lokhu kuwuphawu lokuzibophezela ekubuyiseni ukuthula, ubumbano nesithunzi sendlunkulu,” kusho uMntwana.Echaza ngokuzobe kwenzeka ngalolu suku, uthe kuzobe kukhulekwa, kubungazwa neqhaza leSilo esakhothama, kuphinde kwenziwe nezibophezelo emibonweni yaso.Uthe kuzosetshenziswa umkhuleko ukukhulekela ukuthula nobumbano endlunkulu.Uqhube wathi bayibonile imizamo yezepolitiki ezama ukudukisa  nokuhlukanisa phakathi indlunkulu.“Labo bazifunela nje amavoti besebenzisa isizwe sikaZulu. Asihambisani nosopolitiki abasebenzisa isiko likaZulu nemicimbi ebalulekile ukuzama ukugaya amavoti,” usho kanje.Echaza iSilo esesakhothama, uthe njengenkosi ebesemlandweni wokuhola isikhathi eside ukuwadlula wonke emlandweni wesizwe samaZulu, kubalulekile ukukhunjulwa kwaso.Umkhuleko uthe uvuleleke kuwo wonke umuntu.

YIZE iKwaZulu-Natal iliqale kabi leli sonto njengoba kuvuke isiphepho esiphephule imizi nezimoto kwaze kwashona nabantu, kodwa isazi sezulu sithi kulindeleke ukuthi liphenye izulu kusukela namuhla kuze kube wuLwesine.Ngokusho kukaMnuz Sihle Dlamini oyisazi sezulu se-SA Weather Service, isiphepho esiphephule imizi nezimoto zabantu ngeke sibuye kuleli sonto.UDlamini uthe ngokocwaningo lwabo babona izulu lizoba lihle kusukela namhlanje kuze kube wuLwesine.Imvula bayilindele ngoLwesihlanu nakhona amathuba ayo awu-30% ezindaweni ezigudle ulwandle okubalwa iMargate, iTheku, iRichards Bay naseMbazwana.Uthe le mvula izoqhubeka kuze kube yiSonto lapho izobe isina eRichards Bay, River View naseMbazwana.Phambilini uSolwazi Tafadwanashe Mabhaudhi oyisazi sokuguquka kwesimo sezulu, eNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal, wathi kufanele kwakhiwe izindlu ezimelana nesimo sezulu elibi njengoba siguquka ngendlela ecekela impahla kulimale nabantu.Wathi kuyisinyathelo esihle ukusungulwa kwesikhwama sokuguquka kwesimo sezulu esibizwa nge-Climate Fund.“Isikhwama sokuguquka kwesimo sezulu akufanele nje sigxile ezinhlekeleleni zemvelo kuphela kodwa kufanele sisetshenziselwe ukwakha ingqalasizinda ezomelana nesimo sezulu esishintsha njalo. Kufanele seseke izinhlelo zokuphehla ugesi ngendlela engayilimazi imvelo,” kusho uMabhaudhi.Okwamanje bezingakacaci izinhlelo zesikhwama sokuguquka kwesimo sezulu.

ISINQUMO sokuchithwa kwamajaji amabili akuleli iJaji uJohn Hlophe, ebeliwumengameli wamaJaji eWestern Cape neselithathe umhlalaphansi iJaji uNkola Motata, sishiye imibono ehlukene.Bekuqala ngoHlophe noMotata ukuthi kuketulwe noma kuchithwe amajaji ngaphansi kombuso wentando yeningi. Bekulindelekile ukuthi kube wudaba oludala umsindo ezinhlakeni ezehlukene.Kuvamile ukuthi kube nezikhalo zokuthi umkhakha wezomthetho kuleli unamabatha futhi lokhu kudala ukuthi ungethenjwa kahle. Kuhlala kukhalwa ngokuthi amajaji abuye engathembeki ekutheni ngabe asebenza ngobuqotho na.Inhloko yamaJaji kuleli, iJaji Raymond Zondo, selizame kaningi ukuvikela amajaji, lithi uma kukhona onobufakazi akabuhambise kuphenywe. UZondo usuke evika izagila amajaji esolwa ngokungaziphathi kahle nangenkohlakalo.IPhalamende lisanda kuvota ligunyaza ukuchithwa kwamajaji uHlophe noMotata alahlwe amacala ehlukene. UHlophe ulahlwe yicala lokuzama ukunxenxa amajaji ukuthi enzelele owayengumengameli uMnuz Jacob Zuma.UHlophe kuthiwa waphula umthetho wokuziphatha mhla ecubuzela uZuma amagabade emajajini. Kukhalwa ngokuthi wathunaza umkhakha wamajajai nezobulungiswa kuleli.UHlophe uphike kwaze kwaba sekugcineni, ethi amacala abekwa wona awekho kodwa kunetulo elihambisana nepolitiki. Kuthathe iminyaka cishe ewu-15 ukuthi kuphothulwe udaba lwakhe. Kungenzeka lufinyelele enkantolo lolu daba ngoba uHlophe akeneme ngesinqumo.UMotata yena walahlwa yicala emuva kokuthi eshayele ebukhile, washayisa udonga lwesakhiwo thizeni nokuwudaba owlaba wundabamlonyeni.Ngaphandle kukaHlophe noMotata, kukhona namanye amajaji ashushiswayo wona angakalahlwa amacala. Phakathi kwayo kukhona iJaji uNomonde Mngqibisa-Thusi neJaji uTshifhiwa Maumela.Nawo la majaji asolwa ngokungaziphathi kahle emsebenzini wawo nokwaphoqa ukuthi kufakwe isikhalo amiswe bese eyophenywa aphendule phambi kwezithangami ezifanele.Kuyini ukuchithwa kwamajaji alahlwe amacala?Isizindalwazi seJudges Matters sichaza kabanzi ngokuketulwa kwejaji liphucwe amandla. Bakhuluma ngesigatshana 77 soMthethosisekelo wezwe ogunyaza ukuketulwa noma ukuchithwa kwejaji okuhlukene izigaba ezintathu.“Isigaba sikhuluma ngokususwa kwejaji uma likhombisa ukwehlulwa wumsebenzi noma lilahlwe amacala kumbe ukungaziphathi kahle. Kufanele udaba lubekwe ePhalamende, bese kuyavotwa, iningi uma livumelana bese kuphuma isinqumo,’’ kusho isizindalwazi.Ngaphambi kwalokho, udaba lusuke luqale kwiJudicial Service Commission ibambisene neJudicial Conduct Tribunal ephenyayo. Kuvela ukuthi uma udaba lufika ePhalamende lubhekwa nawumnyango wezomthetho bese wululeka usomlomo.Usomlomo uba esexhumana nehhovisi lenhloko yamajaji nezinye izinhlaka ezithintekayo. Uma kuqedwa ukuvota ePhalamende, uSomlomo ubhalela umengameli emazisa ngomphumela nesinqumo okufanele asithathe. Uma sekuphothuliwe konke, ijaji liyephucwa lelo gama bese libizwa njengabantu abajwayelekile. Akugcini lapho kodwa lephucwa nemihlomulo ehambisana nomholo nakho konke okunye.Amajaji ahola cishe imali efinyelela kuR1 million ngonyaka nemihlomulo ehambisana nezimoto nokunye. Konke lokhu kuyahlwithwa uma ijaji lichithwa.Ukuchithwa kwamajaji uHlophe noMotata, kususe umsindo omkhulu ikakhulukazi emaqenjini ezepolitiki akhala ngokuthi ngamajaji amnyama achithiwe. Amaqembu akhala ngokuthi lokhu kubuyisela emuva umsebenzi omkhulu wezokuphuculwa kwezomthetho kuleli.Inhlangano ebusayo i-ANC yiyona eyiningi ePhalamende nokuchaza ukuthi amalungu ayo avota ngobuningi bawo echitha amajaji amabili. UNobhala-Jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, waphawula ngalolu daba lwesikhalo ngamajaji amnyama.“Siyahambisana impela nokuthi abantu abamnyama bangene ezikhundleni eziqavile njengawo amajaji kodwa uma umuntu etholwe enecala akukho esingakwenza. Kuphoqe isimo ukuthi amajaji achithwe noma kubuhlungu kunjalo kodwa iqiniso limile,’’ kusho uMbalula.I-EFF ikugxekile kakhulu ukuchithwa kukaHlophe, yathi iyazwelana naye kakhulu futhi ngeke alale engadlile ikhona. UMalema uke wabonakala evakashele uHlophe ekhombisa ukumeseka, waxoxa naye kabanzi ngalolu daba.Ngaphandle kodaba lwamajaji, kade kusanda kuphothulwa uhlelo lokuchithwa kobengumvikeli womphakathi, u-Advocate Busisiwe Mkhwebane naye owakhishwa yiPhalamende. I-EFF nalapho ikugxeke kakhulu ukuchithwa kwakhe njengomuntu omnyama emkhakheni wezomthetho aphinde abe ngowesifazane.Phambilini, abamnyama nabesifazane bebengavamile ukuba sezikhundleni eziphezulu zomthetho kuleli nokuyinto okube nesidingo sokuthi ilungiswe. Bekuvele kuzowususa umsindo ukuketulwa kwamajaji amnyama ezikhundleni.

UKUBAMBEZELEKA kokuphothulwa kwesikole samabanga aphansi, saseNtuzuma, iFaith Mlaba, iminyaka ewu-22 kugxekwe nguMphathiswa wezeMisebenzi yoMphakathi neNgqalasizinda, uMnuz Martin Meyer.UMeyer ubekade ehambele kulesi sikole njengoba sekuyela ngasemaphethelweni ukwakhiwa kwaso.Kuvele ukuthi sekukaningi kuvinjwa ukwakhiwa kwaso. Ezinye zezizathu okuvele ukuthi bezibangela ukuvinjwa kokuqedelwa kokwakhiwa kwaso umbango womhlaba okusona, ukungakhokhelwa kwababasebenzi nokunye okuningi.UMeyer uthembise ukuthi umnyango wakhe uzokwenza konke okusemandleni ngenhloso yokuvimba konke okuthikameza imisebenzi yokwakhiwa kwezikole KwaZulu-Natal."Kubi ukuthi kungathatha isikhathi eside kangaka ukuphothulwa kwesikole. Lokhu kulimaza umphakathi, kungagcini lapho kulimaza kakhulu nabantu abasha bakule ndawo,'' usho kanjena.Uthe kumhlaba umxhwele ukuthi ekugcineni lesi sikole sesize saphothulwa.Wancoma zonke izinhlaka ezahlukene okuyizona ezingenelelile ukuze kugcine kuxazululeka izinkinga ezahlukene ebese zibambezele ukuphothulwa kwaso iminyaka yaze yaba miningi kangaka.Uthe angeke bakubekezelele nhlobo ukuphazanyiswa kokukwakhiwa kwezikole ngoba lokho kusho ukuphazanyiswa kwekusasa lezingane.Lesi sikole sizokuba namagumbi okufundela awu-15. UMnuz Sipho Khathi onguthishanhloko waso, uthe bese kuqala ukubakhathaza kakhulu ukubambezeleka kokuphuthulwa kwaso."Mina angikaze ngiyibone into enjengalena ukuthi kungaphela iminyaka eminingi kangaka isikole singaphothulwa ukwakhiwa,'' usho kanjena.Uthe bayabonga ukuthi ekugcineni sekuze kwalunga. Uveze ukuthi yonke le minyaka abafundi bebefundela esikoleni esisesimweni esingagculisi.UMeyer uvele usembhidlangweni wokuhambela zonke izikole ezibhekene nengwadla yokubambezeleka kokwakhiwa kwazo. Muva nje, kade evakashele eMenzi High, eMlaza.UNkk Faith Mlaba okuqanjwe ngaye lesi sikole, uthe inhliziyo yakhe igcwele ukuthokoza okukhulu ngokuthi isikole esiqanjwe ngaye sesize saphothulwa.

UNDUNANKULU waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, uthi balinde umnyama obungenafu labo abathi uzophuma maduze esikhundleni sakhe.UNtuli uthe uzoyiqeda iminyaka emihlanu abekelwe yona ekulesi sikhundla angene kuso ngoJuni nonyaka.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma embizweni yokulwa nobugebengu ebiseMgungundlovu, ngoLwesibili.I-MK ihlezi isongela uNtuli ngokuthi uzophuma maduze esikhundleni, futhi ihlezi imbiza ngondunankulu wesikhashana.I-MK iyona eyathola izihlalo eziningi esiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal, uNtuli wangena kanzima esikhundleni sakhe njengoba ahlula ilungu leMK, iNkosi Phathisizwe Chiliza, ngamavoti angu-41 kwangu-39.UNtuli uthe uyazizwa izinkulumo ze-MK, wathi ike yafika nasehhovisi lakhe ihola umbhikisho wabantu ababekhalaza ngokuphucwa ama-transformer, wathi nangalo leli langa yafike yakhuluma ulimi olufanayo.“Into eyangimangaza uma sengifika ekhaya, ngixoxelwa unkosikazi, wangibuza ukuthi kanti ngingundunankulu wesikhashana. Wangitshela ukuthi uzwe kukhona abebekhuluma, bethi beze kundunankulu wesikhashana. “Lolu limi ngiyalwazi. Lapha esiShayamthetho lukhulunywa ilaba abangafuni ukwamukela lohulumeni ophethe. Abafuni ukwamukela ukuthi ithina esiphethe nokuthi sizohlala iminyaka emihlanu sihola, sisebenzela abantu baKwaZulu-Natal.”Uhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal wakhiwe amaqembu abeyinkukhu nempaka ngaphambi kokhetho, i-IFP, ANC, DA ne-NFP.UNtuli uthe basebenzisana kahle kuhulumeni wokubambisana, wathi uhulumeni owakhiwe ila maqembu awuyi ndawo.“Labo abanethemba lokuthi lohulumeni uzobhidlika, abakhohlwe. Thina siyayazi into esangena kuyona. Asingenanga kuhulumeni wokubambisana ngoba nakhu sijahe izikhundla. Indlela abantu abavota ngayo iyona eyenza ukuthi kube nohulumeni wokubambisana. Ukuze ukwazi ukuphatha uhulumeni wesifundazwe kufanele ube nezihlalo ezingaphezu kuka-50%. Akekho lapha esiShayamthetho onezihlalo ezingaphezu kuka-50%.“Indlela abantu abavota ngayo yasinika ithuba lokuthi sixoxe, sibuzane ukuthi wena uyafuna yini ukuba kuhulumeni wokubambisana. Ongasondelanga, wawungeke umphoqe ngoba wayenesizathu sokungasondeli.”UNtuli unxuse abantu ukuba baqaphele ukungadukiswa ilabo abakhetha ukungabi ingxenye yohulumeni wokubambisana.“Akekho okufanele ayogovuza abantu ngaphandle, athi akube neziteleka zonke izinsuku. Kufanele sihlangane, sibatshele labo abafuna ukusigovuza ukuthi kade sadlula okhethweni. Manje sekuyisikhathi sokusebenzela abantu.”

‘ASIYILE ePhalamende ukuyosinisa amahleza, asibona futhi ondlavini, siye ngenhlonipho.’Lokhu kushiwo ngumholi weqembu uMkhonto weSizwe ePhalamende, uDkt John Hlophe, othe noma bezohlonipha ozakwabo kodwa ngeke bakuvumele ukuchukuluzwa. UHlophe owayengumengameli wamajaji eWestern Cape, uthe bayawazi umthetho futhi bazosebenza ngawo ukuze ushintshwe.“Size la ukuzosebenza, hhayi ukuzosinisa amahleza. Sizokwenza konke silandela umthetho wezwe nakuba sifuna kushintshwe izinto ezithinta wona umthetho. Asizile ukuzodlala ipolitiki eshibhile. Njengomuntu owazi umthetho, siyawazi amalungelo ethu njengabantu abadala,” kusho uHlophe kulandela ukufungiswa kwamalungu aleli qembu angu-58 ePhalamende, eKapa izolo.UHlophe owayengekho ohlwini lokuqala lwabantu abajutshwe yileli qembu ePhalamende, uveze ukuthi owayengumengameli wezwe ne-ANC uJacob Zuma, nguyena ongumengameli weMK.“Sifuna ukuqeda ngemithetho esilawulayo njengoba sifuna ukulawulwa owase-Afrika. Sifuna umhlaba ubuyele ngaphansi kwamakhosi. ENgilandi, umhlaba ungaphansi kweNgonyama yakhona kodwa akukho okonakele emnothweni wakhona,” kusho uHlophe ekhuluma nabezindaba.Ubalule ukuthi bazoba yiqembu eliphikisayo besebenzisana namanye amaqembu amancane.“I-DA isikuhulumeni ngakho ayiselona iqembu eliphikisayo.
