Sifuna kucacele noma ngubani ukuthi ngeke siwuyeke umshikashika wasenkantolo wokuphikisana nemiphumela yokhetho njengoba sesifungisiwe.”Ohlwini lweMK labafungisiwe kukhona abebevele bebhekiwe nabasha.Kwabebevele bebhekiwe kubalwa indodakazi kaZuma, uDuduzile, okhulumela leli qembu uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndhlela, uMnuz Des van Rooyen owaduma ngokuqhoqhobala izinsukwana isikhundla sikangqongqoshe wezizeziMali kuleli, noMnuz Sipho Mbatha owayekwi-EFF.Abanye abafungisiwe kubalwa uMnuz Andile Mngxitama umengameli weqembu iBlack First Land First, owayeyilungu lePhalamende emele i-EFF, uMnuz David Skosana, umyeni ka-Advocate Busi Mkhwebane, owayenguMvikeli woMphakathi kanti manje uyilungu lePhalamende emele i-EFF. Omunye ofungisiwe ngobengungqongqoshe wezeMidlalo, ezobuCiko namaSiko, uMnuz Zizi Kodwa, owasula esikhundleni ngoba ebhekene necala lenkohlakalo.Ekhuluma nesiteshi sethelevishini izolo, uKodwa uthe bekumele afunge ngeledlule kodwa wabambeka.“Ngiyilungu le-ANC njengoba ngiwunombolo 25 ohlwini lwabamele le nhlangano ePhalamende. Yingakho ngizile ngazofunga,” kusho uKodwa ngamafuphi.La malungu afungiswa nje, kulindeleke ukuthi uqale umsebenzi wePhalamende njengoba namhlanje kuqala imihlangano ehlukene.Izoshintsha impilo kumalungu amasha ePhalamende njengoba amanye awo abetohoza kanti amanye abengatohozi.La malungu asezolala noR1.274 million ngonyaka, kuthi umholi weqembu eliphikisayo ahole uR1.792 million ngonyaka.Azothola neminye imihlomulo njengoba ezohlala ezindlini ezikhokhelwa abakhokhi bentela eKapa. Lezi zindlu zinefenisha kanti amanzi nogesi kumahhala kuzona.La malungu azotetemuka ngamabhanoyi mahhala nezingane zawo.Azokwazi ukugibela amabhanoyi izikhawu ezingu-88 bhusende aphinde abe nezinkontileka zocingo.Izingane zawo ezineminyaka engaphansi kwemibili zizondiza mahhala izikhawu ezingu-60, kuthi ezineminyaka emibili kuya kwengu-18 zingandiza kawu-12. Awakhokheli ukupaka ezikhumulweni zezindiza, izingane zawo zihanjiswa bhusende zisuka lapho ehlala khona eKapa ziya ezikoleni.

OKUFANELE ingane yakho ebusika: Uchungechunge lwe-Just For Baby Skincare.Ubusika buletha ukuphola nobuhle besizini kodwa bubeka budala izinselelo esikhumbeni esithambile somntana wakho. Umoya obandayo, umswakama ophansi, nokufudumala kwangaphakathi kungasusa umswakama wemvelo, kushiye isikhumba somile, sizwele futhi sisengcupheni yokulimala kalula. Kulobu busika, qinisekisa ukuthi isikhumba sengane yakho sihlala sithambile, sinamanzi futhi sinempilo ngobubanzi ngochungechunge lwe-Just For Baby Skincare. Ifakwe izithako ezipholile nezicebe ngama-antioxidant eRooibos, imikhiqizo yethu inikeza inhlanganisela ephelele yokunakekelwa okumnene nokuvikela okusebenzayo.I-Petroleum Jelly: Umvikeli oguquguqukayo I-Just For Baby Petroleum Jelly yethu, etholakala kuzo zombili izinketho ezinephunga elimnandi nezingenalo iphunga, kufanele ube nayo ebusika. Lo mkhiqizo usebenza ngezindlela eziningi, njengesithiyo esivala umswakama, ugcina isikhumba somntwana wakho sivikelekile ezintweni ezinokhahlo. Umkhiqizo ongenaphunga ufanelekile ezinganeni ezinesikhumba esinokuzwela, ukuqinisekisa ukuvikelwa ngaphandle kwengozi yokuqubuka. Kulabo abajabulela iphunga elimnene, elimnandi, inketho yephunga inikeza ukuvikelwa okufanayo okuhambisana namakha amnandi.Amafutha okugcoba alungele ukuvimbela kanye nokupholisa amaqhubu enziwa yinabukeni, ukuvikela izindebe eziqhekekile, nokuvikeleka okwengeziwe kulezo zihlathi zasebusika ethambile. Ukungaguquguquki kwawo kuqinisekisa ukumata kwesikhumba okuhlala isikhathi eside, okwenza kube yisisekelo esimisweni sokunakekela isikhumba sasebusika somntwana wakho.I-Baby Oil: Ukunakekela okukhethekile kwesikhumba esinozwelaI-Just For Baby Baby Oil, ethakwe kahle ngeRooibos, igcina isikhumba simatile futhi kuqinisekisa ukuthi sihlala sithambile futhi sibushelelezi. Le fomula engasindi, futhi ayikwenzi uxhwathe amafutha kakhulu nokwenza ilungele ukusetshenziswa nsuku zonke, isiza ukuvimbela isikhumba esomile, esiklazukile esivame ukuhambisana nezinyanga ezibandayo.Ukubhucunga ingane yakho Ngamafutha Ezingane akugcini nje ngokuthuthukisa ukuthamba kwesikhumba kodwa futhi kuthuthukisa ukuphumula nokusondelana kwenu. Amakha amnandi e-Rooibos anikeza umuzwa opholile, okwenza ukubhucungwa ngaphambi kokulala kube isiko elisiza ingane yakho ukuthi ihlise umoya futhi ilale kangcono. Amafutha ethu ezingane asiza ukondla isikhumba esinozwelo, anikeze umgoqo ovikelayo kwisomiso sasebusika.I-Aqueous Cream: Isigcobo sansukuzonkeI-Just For Baby Aqueous Cream yethu, etholakala ngezinhlobonhlobo ezinamakha amnandi nezingafakwanga amakha, iyingxenye ebalulekile yanoma yiluphi uhlobo lokunakekelwa kwesikhumba ebusika. Lesi sigcobo esinokhilimu, singena kalula esikhunjeni sifanelwe wukusetshenziswa nsuku zonke, siqinisekisa ukuthi isikhumba somntwana wakho sihlala simatile futhi sinethezekile usuku lonke.Isigcobo esingenawo amakha sifanele izingane ezinesikhumba esizwelayo, sithambisa kalula ngaphandle kwamakha angeziwe. Kubazali abakhetha isigcobo esinamakha ashayela phansi, ukhilimu omatisa kamnandi onephunga elimnandi futhi sithakwe kahle nge-Rooibos.Lesi sigcobo sisetshenziswa emzimbeni wonke, okwenza kube yisixazululo esiguquguqukayo sokugcina isikhumba somntwana wakho sithambile futhi sibushelelezi. Sigcobe ngemva kokugeza ukuze uvale umswakamo noma uwusebenzise usuku lonke ukuze ulungise noma yimaphi amabala omile avela ngenxa yezimo ezinzima zasebusika.Amandla eRooibosOkwenza uchungechunge lwe-Just For Baby luhluke wukusetshenziswa kweRooibos. I-Rooibos iyisithako semvelo esiza ukupholisa nokuvikela isikhumba esithambile sisenza sibe isengezo esifanelekile ohlelweni lokunakekela isikhumba sengane yakho ebusika.Sesiphetha njengoba kuqala ubusika, beka phambili ukunakekelwa kwesikhumba sengane yakho ngochungechunge lwe-Just For Baby. Imikhiqizo yethu, ehlanganiswe nezithako zekhethelo nezivikelayo ze-Rooibos, yenzelwe ukugcina isikhumba sengane yakho sithambile, simatile, futhi sinempilo isizini yonke. Kusukela ekuvikelweni okushintshashintshayo kwe-petroleum jelly yethu kuya ekufakweni okujulile kwe-baby oil yethu nokudla kwansuku zonke kwe-Aqueous Cream, umkhiqizo ngamunye uklanywe ngokucophelela ukuze uhlangabezane nezidingo eziyingqayizivele zesikhumba esithambile somntana wakho.Yenza ubusika kube yisizini yokunethezeka nokunakekela nge-Just For Baby futhi uqinisekise ukuthi ingane yakho ijabulela isizini ngesikhumba esivikeleke kahle, esondlekile, nesithambile kahle.Landela i-Just For Baby: https://www.facebook.com/justforbabysouthafrica

KUPHAZAMISEKE izinhlelo zokugubha usuku lokuzalwa komgilwa (18) ngoMgqibelo ‘edlwengulwa’ umastende okuqashe kuye umndeni wakhe e-Extension 3, eChesterville.Lesi sigameko kuthiwa senzeke kwi-B&B yakhe lona wesilisa okuthiwa uphinde abe yinesi esibhedlela esizimele, iLife Westville, aphinde abe sekomitini le-ward elithenjwayo.Unina kamgilwa elandisa ngesigameko, uthe senzeka nje, bebehlele ukuthi bazomkhipha, ayojabulela usuku lwakhe lokuzalwa uma bebuya emsebenzini.Uthe umgilwa ubhozonyelwe umastende ngesikhathi ethunywe esinye isiqashi kwesinye esihlala emiqashweni yakhe lona wesilisa, encikene neB&B khona e-Extension 3.“Luvele lonakala usuku lwakhe sekuvela lo mshophi, kwathina singabazali bakhe sadunyelwa amakhanda, kwaphela nokuthi besimhlelele okuhle,“ kusho unina. Eqhubeka nokulandisa uthe: “Ingane ibonwe esinye isiqashi esihlala naso, ikhala. Sayibuza ukuthi ikhalelani, yangafuna ukusho, kwaze kwaba ukuthi igonyuluka sekubuya uyise emsebenzini,” kusho unina kamgilwa.Uqhube wathi bathole ukuthi bekungesikho okokuqala eyigila.“Bese kungokwesibili. Ubethi uma eyidlwengula, ayisabise ngokuthi uzoyibulala bese eyoyiphosa kude lapho engeke iphinde itholwe khona muntu,” kusho unina kamgilwa.Uqhube wathi, esigamekweni sakamumva, umastende uze wengeza ngelithi usazoyiphinda futhi.Uthe baphoqelekile ukuthi bathuthe kulo mqasho ngeSonto, emva kwesigameko.“Ngeke ngikukhohlwe akwenze kithina. Uziphathise okwesilwane ekubeni besimethemba,” kusho unina kamgilwa, oveze ukuthi ngesikhathi ethola ucingo olumazisa ngesigameko, wake wahlala phansi, waphinde wasukuma ngenxa yokungakukholwa ayekutshelwa.Uyise kamgilwa uthe okubahlukumeza kunakho konke ukuthi lona wesilisa ubefike aqoqe irenti ngapha ezenza usomabhizinisi othembekile bese eyodlwengula indodakazi yabo ngale.Udalule ukuthi bese kuzophela unyaka wesibili beqashe emqashweni walona wesilisa kanti ngesikhathi sebehamba, ufune ngodli R900 ngaphambi kokuba baphume.Ukhale ngokusatshiswa abakubo kamsolwa nabanye abantu abangaziwa, abafika bukhoma bezobatshela ukuthi abasule icala.“Izolo nje (esho ngoLwesibili) ukhona ofike kulo mqasho omusha esesikuwo, ngoba usendaweni, wafike wayibamba ngesidlozana, ethi ayiyosula icala. Uphinde wathi uzolokhu ebuya kuze kwenziwe le nto ayishoyo,” kusho uyise kamgilwa.Uthe umgilwa ufunda uGrade 11 kodwa usamile esikoleni kulandela isigameko njengoba engekho esimweni esikahle ngokomqondo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa ophiko oluphenya amacala oDlame lwaseMndenini, ukuVikelwa kweZingane nawoCansi eBrighton Beach lubophe owesilisa (30) emva kokudlwengulwa kwentombazane ngoMgqibelo. “Umsolwa uvele enkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini ngoLwesibili,“ kusho uNetshiunda.

UMHLAZIYI wezepolitiki waseNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Siyabonga Ntombela, uthe kubalulekile ukuthi i-ANC ishushise uMnuz Jacob Zuma ngaphambi kokhetho.Uphawule kanje emuva kokuthi i-ANC ibizele owayengumengameli, uJacob Zuma, osekhankasela iMK, esigcawini sokuqondisa ubugwegwe.Ngokwamaphepha okumbiza kulesi sigcawu, uZuma uzoqondiswa ubugwegwe ngoLwesibili ekomkhulu le-ANC, iLuthuli House.UZuma ubhekene namacala amabili okuphula imigomo ye-ANC.Icala lokuqala elokugqugquzela abantu ukuthi bavotele iqembu elizokube lincintisana ne-ANC okhethweni.Ngonyaka owedlule, uZuma wagqugquzela abantu ukuthi bakhiphe i-ANC emandleni, wabacela ukuthi bavotele iMK.Icala lesibili elokuba yilungu leqembu elincintisana ne-ANC.UZuma uvela ohlwini lwamalungu eMK aphakanyiselwe ePhalamende."I-ANC kufanele iye okhethweni yazi ukuthi uZuma umi ngakuphi. Uma uya empini udinga ukuya namasosha owethembayo. I-ANC ibingeke ithi izoyeka ukushushisa uZuma ngenxa yokuthi sekusondele ukhetho. Abakwazi ukumisa izinhlelo zabo ngenxa yokuthi kuza ukhetho," kusho uNtombela.Uthe kubalulekile ukuthi i-ANC izwe uhlangothi lukaZuma."Angicabangi ukuthi lento ayenzayo uyenziswa ukuthi ufuna ukubuyela ePhalamende. Ngisola sengathi emva kokhetho uzophakamisa omunye umuntu ukuthi ayohola iMK ePhalamende. Kufanele bezwe ukuthi ngempela yini lena ayifunayo."UNtombela uthe amalungu eMK azosebenzisa lesi sigcawu ukuqhuba umkhankaso wabo"Bazokuthi uZuma uyacindezelwa. Bazokuthi ukhishwa ezinkantolo, manje useyashushiswa. Bazoveza uZuma njengomuntu osukelwayo."Okhulumela iMK, uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndhlela, uthe bazomphelezela uZuma uma eseyovela phambi kwesigcawu sokuqondisa ubugwegwe."Sizophuma ngobuningi bethu. I-ANC asiyethembi nakancane. Kunabaholi be-ANC abasongela uZuma, emva kwalokho wavelelwa ingozi yemoto. "UNdhlela uthe umthethosisekelo uyamvumela uZuma ukuthi abe yilungu le-ANC aphinde akhankasele iMK.Okhulumela i-ANC, uNkk Mahlengi Bhengu-Motsiri, uthe isinqumo sokubizela uZuma esigcawini sokuqondisa ubugwegwe sikhombisa ukuthi i-ANC izimisele ukubhekana nabaphula umthetho.UNkk Bhengu-Motsiri uthe uZuma uzothola ithuba lokuziphendulela.UZuma uxwayiswe ngokuthi isigcawu sokuqondisa ubugwegwe sizoqhubeka noma engekho.

SEKUBE nokubambezeleka kwecala engabonwa nangokhalo enkantolo ummeli wamadoda amahlanu asolwa ngokushaya abulale ngesihluku u-Andile “Bobo” Mbuthu (16).Ummeli, uMnuz Chris Gounden, kuze kwashaya izikhathi zamadina engekho eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseVerulam ngoLwesine.Nommangalelwa wesine, uMnuz Lindani Ndlovu, akafikanga njengoba ebike ukugula, wathi uya kwadokotela.Bekumele liqale ngo-10:30 ekuseni ukulalelwa icala ngokwesivumelwano sangoFebhuwari liguqa.IMantshi Sanele Hlatshwayo ibe isiliguqisa okwesikhashana icala.UHlatshwayo uthe akalindwe uGounden njengoba yena nomshushisi bezokwenza izethulo zokugcina.Lezi zethulo ezokunxenxa uHlatshwayo ukuthi abalahle ngecala noma abakhiphe phambili abasolwa ecaleni.Amalungu omndeni kaBobo nawebandla akhonza kulona abekhona enkantolo.UMbuthu wayesolwa ngokweba utshwala endaweni yobumnandi, iMagagula Lounge, eHambanathi, oThongathi.Le ndawo yangqongqiswa ngomlilo wumphakathi owawuveva yintukuthelo.Ividyo eyayikhomnisa uBobo eshaywa, egxiza igazi yagcwala izinkundla zokuxhumanaWashaywa washona, isidumbu sakhe sagxishwa emphongolweni sabaselwa ngezinkuni. Izinsalela zaso zahlakazwa ngepiki zafakwa koplastiki ababoshwa bahlanganiswa nezitini balahlwa emfuleni.

BELUYINDABA egudwini udaba lwamaselula abasolwa ecaleni lokubulawa komrepha u-AKA, abebevele eNkantolo yeMantshi kwaManzini, eSwatini. UMnuz Siyabonga Gezani Ndimande obuye aziwe ngoNxele noMnuz Malusi Dave Ndimande bebesenkantolo.Bekuyokhulunywa ngezinhlelo zokubuyiselwa kwabo kuleli lapho okuzoqhubeka khona icala lokufa komrepha okwashiya abaningi bethuthumela. Kuvele ukuthi amaphepha esicelo sokubuyiswa kwabo avela kuleli abengakafakwa.U-AKA igama lakhe nguKiernan Forbes, wadutshulwa wabulawa nomngani wakhe uTebello “Tibz” Matsoane eThekwini nyakenye. Bahlaselwa amadoda bemi ngaphandle kwendawo yokudlela iWish on Florida eyagcina ivaliwe.Izinsizwa zakwaNdimande zibanjwe amaphoyisa eZone 4, eMbabane, eSwatini emqashweni lapho bezigobe khona amadlangala. ONdimande bafike enkantolo behamba bezifihla bengafuni ukushuthwa.Omunye ubefake ijakhethi emnyama enesigqoko kodwa esidedelile silenga ngemuva. Omunye efake ijakhethi emibalabala naye esiyekile isigqoko. Babonakale behla elolini neziboshwa eziningi befaswe ngamaketango.Omunye wabo ubebuye ahlebe okuthile kumfowabo bese ehleka kodwa ebhokisini bebegebise amakhanda sakucasha.UMshushisi uMnuz Macebo Dlamini, utshele inkantolo ukuthi besingakafiki isicelo esivela kuleli esinxusa ukuba kubuyiswe abamangalelwa. Uthe udaba baluthatha njengoluphuthuma kakhulu futhi bayathemba ukuthi isicelo sizofika maduze.Umshushisi uveze udaba lwamaselula abamangalelwa athathwa ngesikhathi beboshwa. Uthe abomthetho bakuleli bawadonse ngendlebe amaphoyisa aseSwatini bathi awathatha amaselula ngoba angase abe nobufakazi obuzosiza ophenyweni.Amaselula amane abephethwe ngezikhwanyana eziwucwazi obonakalayo ngaphakathi, athuwe phambi kwenkantolo. Ummeli wabamangalelwa uMnuz Sivesonke Ngwenya, uthe unenkinga ngendaba yokuthathwa kwamaselula amakhasimende akhe.“Kuthiwa kunencwadi efungelwe ebhalwe wumphenyi wecala maqondana nokuthathwa kwamaselula kodwa mina angikaze ngiyibone. Bengicela ukuthi udaba lwamaselula luhlehlele uMashi 12,’’ kusho uNgwenya.UMshushisi ukhuze wababaza wathi udaba lokuthathwa kwamaselula akufanele lulokhu lubangwa kufanele athathwe ukuze ahlale kahle ngaphansi kweso lamaphoyisa. Inkantolo igunyaze ukuthathwa kwamaselula yase ithi kodwa udaba lwawo luzoxoxwa kahle uma udaba selubuyela enkantolo. Icala lihlehlele uMashi 12 elizobuyela ngawo eNkantolo yeMantshi kwaManzini. Kulindeleke ukuthi abalisa abakuleli babuyele eNkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini namuhla.

UMNDENI wephoyisa eliboshelwe icala lokubulala unina wethemba ukuthi umbiko kadokotela obelihlola uzoqinisekisa ukuthi liphile saka ukuthi lingabhekana necala.Amalungu omndeni kaConstable Lungisani “Mazambane” Xaba (48), anenkolelo yokuthi ukhohlisa inkantolo kanye nabo ngoba akukho ukuphazamiseka komqondo anakho.UXaba uvele kancane eNkantolo yeMantshi yasePinetown wasehanjiswa kudokotela obezomhlola njengoba ayekade ecele inkantolo ukuthi ixilonge isimo sakhe sengqondo.Nebala uhanjisiwe kudokotela wase ebuyiselwa ejele laseWestville atoke kulona kusuka ngo-2022.Icala lakhe libe selibekelwa uJulayi 31 khona inkantolo izokwamukela umbiko kadokotela bese kuyacaca ngokumele kulandele.UNksz Andile Xaba ongudadewabo kammangalelwa, usole umfowabo ngokubambezela ukuqala kokuqulwa kwecala abakubheke ngamehlo abomvu.“Siyethemba ukuthi udokotela uzoqinisekisa esihlale sikusho ukuthi uphile saka uLungisani. Njengomuntu obekade esebenza ngomthetho ulokhu ezama izindlela zokuthi aphunyule,” kuchaza uNksz Xaba.Ubuze ukuthi uma kuwukuthi umfowabo akaphilile, kungani emamatheka akhombise ukujabula uma ebona isancinza sakhe enkantolo kodwa anyukubale uma ebuka umndeni wakhe kube sengathi akawazi.UXaba wancishwa ibheyili. Useshintshe abameli amahlandla amaningi. Uyaye akhale nangokugula kuguqe icala. Usanda kuzama ukuphoqa inkantolo ukuthi ifunde incwadi ayeyibhale ngesandla esejele, kwahlehla icala.Kuthe sekubuywa wavele wacela inkantolo ukuthi imvumele ayohlowa ingqondo.“Asimazi ukuthi uzoqhamuka nakuphi okusha uma sesibuyela enkantolo ngoba uhlale enezinto ezintsha aqhamuka nazo ngenhloso yokubambezela icala,” kusho uNksz Xaba.UXaba usolwa ngokushaya ngepulangwe elalinezipikili abulale unina uNkk Greta Xaba (81) owayephila nokukhubazeka.Isigameko senzeka emzini kamufi KwaDabeka, eClermont ngoMeyi 6, 2022 waboshwa ngakusasa uXaba.UXaba waboshwa esebe yiphoyisa iminyaka engaphezu kuka-10 esiteshini samaphoyisa saKwaDabeka

ZIBAKHALELE abasebenzi abathathu benkampani ebhaka izinkwa besenga ezimithiyo ngokudunwa iloli lezinkwa.Kuthiwa laba basebenzi babikela umqashi ngokubanjwa inkunzi ngoMgqibelo ngoMashi 16, 2024 eSterkspruit, e-Eastern Cape.Umshayeli weloli wabikela amaphoyisa ukuthi ngoMgqibelo ngezithuba zo-4 ntambama, yena nozakwaboa babili bavinjezelwa amadoda amahlanu abehamba ngeveni yohlobo lweFord emhlophe eHerschel. Uthi baphunyuka babaleka bashiya iloli lomsebenzi. Bathe sebebuya ngemuva kwesikhathi, baqaphela ukuthi kwebiwe isisefo semali nemali. Basuke lapho banikela emaphoyiseni beyobika ngalesi sehlo.Ngesikhathi ethola umbiko, amaphoyisa anqume ukusesha leli loli kuqala nokuyilapho athole khona imali ifihlwe ngaphansi kwamakhrethi ezinkwa.“Laba bobathathu bahlulekile ukuchazela amaphoyisa ngale mali efihliwe, kwaba wukuboshwa kwabo,” kusho amaphoyisa ngesitatimende.Laba basolwa abaneminyaka engu-29, 38 no40 ubudala babekwe amacala okweba nokuqamba amanga.

AMAPHOYISA abophe amadoda amabili angowokufika eNingizimu Afrika nezidakamizwa ezingabiza uR3 million.Abasolwa, oneminyaka engu-34 nonengu-38, baboshwe ngokwehlukana eMbilo nasemgwaqeni uStephen Dlamini eThekwini ngoLwesibili.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe lawa madoda kulindeleke ukuthi avele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini ngoLwesithathu.Echaza ngokuboshwa kwawo, uNetshiunda uthe amaphoyisa alunywe indlebe ngendoda ebikade idayisa izidakamizwa.“Le ndoda ibonwe eMbilo okuthe uma kuseshwa imoto yayo kwatholakala iwunga ewu-900. Uphenyo olwenziwe emzini wale ndoda luvundulule enye iwunga nophawuda. Sekukonke kungabiza uR2 million,” usho kanje.Umsolwa ube esekhalelwa amasongo kaSigonyela wathweswa icala lokutholakala nokudayisa izidakamizwa nelokuba seNingizimu Afrika ngokungekho emthethweni.Umsolwa wesibili kuthiwa utholwe ngamaphoyisa nophawuda wokwenza iwunga eBerea. UNetshiunda uthe amaphoyisa abekade eyibeke iso le ndoda ebisolisa.“Uphenyo olunzulu luholele amaphoyisa endlini kamsolwa esemgwaqeni uStephen Dlamini lapho kutholakale khona omunye uphawuda ongabiza uR1 million,” usho kanje.

BASASHAQEKILE namanje ngesigameko sokumbiwa kwesidumbu sengane enezinyanga ezinhlanu eMpongompongweni, ngaseNtshawini, KwaDukuza, ngoMgqibelo, okuthiwa igqitshwe abazali bayo ngeledlule.Kulesi sigameko kuboshwe uyise kamufi, uSmangaliso Kwanele Nqoko ngoMsombuluko, obanjwe esegcwele amathafa.Kuthintwa ikhansela lendawo, uMnuz Nkululeko Qwabe mayelana nesigameko, lithe lithole ukuthi ingane yagqitshwa yizithandani ebusuku ngoMgqibelo owedlule, emva kokubona ukuthi isishonile.UQwabe uthe ngokuzwa kwakhe, izithandani zazikade zihambe ziyophuza endaweni yokucima ukoma endaweni nayo ingane.Kuthiwa, sezibuya owesifazane wazumeka walala, wavuswa owesilisa ephethe ingane ngesandla, ethi isishonile akazi kwenzekeni.“Kuthiwa bavumelana ngokuthi kungcono bavele bayoyigqiba ngasemfuleni osendaweni. Bazama kodwa behluleka ngoba babengenawo amathuluzi okumba,” kusho uQwabe.Uthe bagcine becela usizo komunye wabangani ukuthi abambise egcekeni kubo kowesilisa (uyise wengane) owamdonsa ngendlebe umngani ukuthi aze angayithi vu.“Kuthiwa emva kokuba sebeyigqibile, waphinde wasabisa yena unina wengane ukuthi angatsheli muntu,” kusho yena.Uthe ngokuqhubeka kwezinsuku, izihlobo zabo zibabuzile ukuthi iphi ingane, baqamba amanga bathi bayivakashise kwezinye izihlobo.“Unina wengane ubeyikhomba ezihlotsheni zikayise, uyise eyikhomba ezihlotsheni zikanina,” usho kanje.Udalule ukuthi ngoMgqibelo owedlule, isihlobo sipotshozelwe umuntu othile ukuthi abalulandele udaba “lokuvakashiswa” kwengane ngoba kukhona okushaya amanzi.“Lesi sihlobo sivele sanikela kubo kayise wengane namaphoyisa. Wavele wabaleka uyise wengane, kwacaca lapho ukuthi kukhona okungahambi kahle,” usho kanje.Uqhube wathi unina wengane uhlaliswe phansi wabuzwa ukuthi iphi ingane, wagonyuluka ngokuthi bayigqibile, washo nokuthi yena uvuke isishonile, wancengwa uyise wayo ukuthi bayigqibe.Uveze ukuthi ngesikhathi sesimbiwa isidumbu sengane, siphume sisongwe ngengubo, kanti besicindezelwe ngezingodo.“Kuphinde kwavela nokuthi besiphuma igazi ngomlomo, nokuqinisa izinsolo zokuthi mhlawumbe yalinyazwa okuthile yashona,” kusho uQwabe.Ubuye wathi emva kokuboshwa ngoMsombuluko, uyise wengane ukhombe unina wayo, ethi wuye owayicindezela ngebele eyincelisa. Uthe unina wayo yena ukhomba uyise wayo ngelithi umvuse eyiphethe ngezandla isishonile.Uthe siwushaqise wonke umphakathi isigameko.“Sibonga ukuthi aboshwe uyise wayo, sifisa kuqhubeke uphenyo, aboshwe nonina uma etholwa enecala,” kusho uQwabe.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uConstable Thenjiswa Ngcobo, uthe amaphoyisa aKwaDukuza abophe umsolwa (29) kulandela isigameko. Uthe umsolwa uzovela namuhla eNkantolo yeMantshi yaKwaDukuza.Umamkhulu kamufi, uNksz Nomzamo Nqoko okunguye owathola ucingo esihlotsheni simtshela ukuthi akaphenyisise “ngokuvakasha” kwengane, uthe abakufunayo ukubuya kwemiphumela yokuhlolwa kwesidumbu.“Ukuze uma enecala, kwenziwe ubulungiswa. Ngibufuna impela ubulungiswa ngengane yami. Unina namanje usathuka izanya, sibi impela isimo kuyena,” kusho uNksz Nqoko.

IZINSOLO ezihlasimulisa umzimba okuvela kuzo ukuthi umakoti ushayise ephindelela umyeni wakhe ngemoto waze waqhuma ikhanda, zishiye umphakathi waseHammarsdale ubambe ongezansi. Wangagcina lapho, wazinkinka ngotshwala kwafika abakubo kamufi engazazi negama ngenxa yokudakwa, sekwenze umndeni kamufi wacela amaphoyisa ukuthi ambophe.UMnuz Nhlanhla Gabela (51) obeshade noNkk Khulile Gabela, kuthiwa ushonele endaweni yesehlakalo kuleli sonto. Kunomakhelwane abaningi abathi bazibonele ngawabo kwenzeka le nsambatheka.Ilungu lokuqala lomphakathi liveze ukuthi kube nengxabano phakathi kwalaba ababili besemotweni kamufi. Ngemuva kwengxabano kuthiwa kubonakale umufi ephuma ngesankahlu emotweni samuntu ophushwayo."Sithe sisababaza lokho imoto yeza kuyena yamshayisa iphindelela. Ikhanda lopha kabuhlungu. Yaqhubeka yamgaya ikhanda kwaze kwaba uyathula khona lapho,'' lisho kanje leli lungu lomphakathi.Elinye lithe liyokuxoxela amagwababa echobana elikubone kwenzeka phambi kwalo."Angiyazi mina le nto, angikaze ngibone umuntu wesifazane ebulala indoda yakhe ngesihluku esingaka. Khona ke kuthiwa baxabane usengaze amgaye ngemoto pho,'' libuza sakumangala.Owesifazane naye othe ubekhona ngesikhathi sesigameko uthe akusuki emqondweni wakhe akubone kwenziwa kumufi.Usole owesifazane ngokuba nonya ekhala ngokuthi le nto uyenze phambi kwezingane zikamufi ebezibuza ukuthi ubulawelani uyise.Udadewabo kamufi, uNksz Amanda Magwaza uthe bafuna ukuthi amaphoyisa aphenye umakoti ngokufa komfowabo.Uthe utsheliwe ukuthi ubulawe kanjani umfowabo. Wathi ubaxoxele izinto ezingefani ngesikhathi ebalandisa  ngokushona komfowabo."Esithinta okokuqala uthe umfowethu ube sengozini yemoto washayiswa kabuhlungu yiloli. Okwesibili wathi umfowethu ushayiswe yimoto engaziwa maqede yabaleka,'' usho kanje.Uthe kusobala ukuthi umakoti usenga ezimithiyo. "Ngesikhathi sifika lapho behlala khona simfice ephuzile engazazi nokuthi ungubani futhi kungabonakali nokuthi kunesigameko esibuhlungu esenzekile,'' echaza.ISolezwe Ngempelasoto lithole ukuthi umakoti kwenzeka lesi sigameko nje uvele unyamanambana kubo kamkhwenyana, usolwa ngokuhlukumeza umufi.Kuvela ukuthi umakoti ubengasebenzi, wayeka umsebenzi wokushayela amatekisi.Kodwa kuthiwa yize bebehlala ndawonye bese bephenduke inkukhu nempaka njengoba indoda bekuyicika ukuthi yiyona ephekela umkayo.Amalungu omphakathi akhala ngokuthi namanje akakaboshwa umakoti.Ethintwa umakoti uthe umatasa kukhona abantu ahlezi nabo akhuluma nabo udaba olumqoka  akakwazi ukuphendula imibuzo yentatheli.Eshayelwa ucingo okwesibili walile ukuphawula ngabamsola ngokubulala umyeni wakhe. "Ngeke ngikwazi ukuphendula umbuzo wakho,'' eshaya ngezinqamulelayo.Ezinkundleni zokuxhumana beyikhulunywa kakhulu le ndaba amalungu omphakathi ekhomba umakoti ngenjumbane.Laba ababili kuthiwa banezingane ezimbili  kuthiwa bese siside isikhathi beshadile.

KUBATSHAZWA ubulwane kowesilisa nendodana baseMwolokohlo, eNdwedwe, kulandela ukutholakala kwesidumbu sesihlobo sesonakele ethoyilethi lomgodi emzini wabo.Umufi, uMnuz Nkosinathi Vilakazi (25) obedukile, wagcinwa umndeni wakhe ngoJulayi 21, eya esitolo.Kutholwa isidumbu sikamufi emva kwenyanga aduka nje, kuvela ukuthi ukhona umoya obuvunguza wokuthi umuntu owagcina ukubonwa elandela umufi, yindodana yakulo muzi atholwe kuwo.Kuvela ukuthi amalungu omphakathi adlulisela lolu lwazi emaphoyiseni emva komhlangano womphakathi.Kulo mhlangano okuthiwa kwakukhona amalungu omphakathi, ubuholi bendawo namaphoyisa, kwakudingidwa izigameko zokubulawa kwabantu endaweni okuthiwa zidlangile.Owomndeni, uMnuz Mzikayifani Vilakazi, uthe kubahlukumeze kakhulu emoyeni okwenziwe ngabasolwa njengoba bebebathatha njengezihlobo.“Kulo muzi sikhulele khona, kwagana umalumekazi wethu. Ayikho into esiphathe kabuhlungu njengokuthola ukuthi ingane yethu ibulawe khona,” kusho uVilakazi.Nokho ubonge ukusebenzisana phakathi kwamalungu omphakathi, amaphoyisa nobuholi bendawo ekutheni kugcine kutholwe ithambo likamufi.Uthe bazoshiya konke ezandleni zamaphoyisa ukuthi enze umsebenzi wawo.Endaweni yesigameko izinhlaka zamaphoyisa ziqale zasusa amatshe kasimende njengoba kuvele ukuthi abasolwa basiphosa emgodini wethoyilethi elidala elingasasebenzi isidumbu.Kuthiwa baphinde badiliza udonga lwalo, bezama ukuthi kunganakeki.Nokho kuthangi, ngesikhathi umndeni uya khona, emva kokuthi oyedwa wabasolwa eculile, ufice kubhuza izimpukane, kunephunga elingabekezeleleki.Kuvele nokuthi abantu ebebedlula njengoba indawo yesigameko iseduze nomgwaqo oya emtholampilo wendawo, bebebona abasolwa bediliza ithoyilethi, bebeka amatshe kasemende, benganaki bezitshela ukuthi bazilungisela umuzi wabo.Ngesikhathi imoto yamaphoyisa isihamba nabasolwa emva kokukhomba indawo yesigameko, umphakathi ushiye ongalazi, udinwa abakwenzile.Ikhansela lendawo, uMnuz Mdu Cele, lithe isigameko siwethuse kakhulu umphakathi, wathi senzeka nje, vele abantu banovalo lokuhamba nasemgwaqweni ngenxa yokukwanda kwezigameko zokubulawa nokugetshengwa kwabantu.“Njengoba sebeboshiwe, sikhuthaza amalungu omphakathi ukuthi angathuli nokuwehlele kodwa akhulume,” kusho uCele.Okhulumela amaphoyisa eKZN uColonel Robert Netshuinda uqinisekisile ukuthi kuboshwe ubaba oneminyaka engu-48 nendodana eneminyaka engu-25 emuva kokumbiwa kwesidumbu emgodini wethoyilethi kule ndawo. Uthe abasolwa bazovela enkantolo yeMantshi eNdwedwe ngoMsombuluko. Uthe umsolwa oneminyaka engu-25 uqale waboshelwa icala lesibhamu esingekho emthethweni. Kuthe uma kwenziwa uphenyo kwatholakala ukuthi ungumuntu wokugcina ukubona umufi obembiwa. Laba basolwa uveze ukuthi bathinteka kwamanye amacala amabili okubulala, elenzeke ngoMeyi nonyaka lapho unogada wabulawa kwatholwa isidumbu sakhe silahlwe emgwaqweni siboshwe ngentambo. Esinye isigameko esangoJanuwari 2021, lapho kwabulawa khona indoda eyatholwa igwaziwe isidumbu sayo salahlwa emgwaqweni ebangani elingelide ukusuka emzini wabasolwa. UNetshuinda uthe kusaqhubeka uphenyo ngokuthinteka kwabasolwa esigamekweni sokubulawa kwabasolwa ecaleni lokubulawa kowesifazane okhulelwe eMlaza.

USHAQEKILE umndeni womdidiyeli wezinsizwa odutshulwe elele kubo eNkomeqhubu, eTafelkop, eNgonyameni ngoLwesine kusihlwa.USHAQEKILE umndeni womdidiyeli wezinsizwa odutshulwe elele kubo eNkomeqhubu, eTafelkop, eNgonyameni ngoLwesine kusihlwa.UMnuz Lunga Message Mthembu (39) okuthiwa ubenogazi kubantu abaningi bakule ndawo, kuthiwa kushiye imibuzo ukusocongwa kwakhe.Kuvela ukuthi ubelele kubo endlini yakhe engaphandle ngesikhathi ehlaselwa ngamadoda afike angabuza lutho, amdubule elele embhedeni.Amadoda kuthiwa abehamba ngezinyawo njengoba aphume abaleka ngemuva kokumbulala.Udadewabo kamufi, uNksz Hlengiwe Mthembu ubabaze isihluku esikhonjiswe kubulawa umfowabo.Uthe bezwe ngesibhamu nje siqhuma endlini kabhuti wabo. Ngesikhathi sesigameko uthi bekukhona yena nomkamufi, kodwa besendlini enkulu."Ngemuva kokuba sekuqhume isibhamu siphuthumile saya endlini yakhe. Simfice esethule igazi ligcwele umbhede. Yaze yabuhlungu nansi into eyenziwe ngabantu kumfowethu,'' usho kanje sakubalisa.Uthe kuduma amakhanda kubona ngoba bebazi umfowabo eyigeza lensizwa enogazi, nezinsizwa eziningi zasendaweni zimkhonzile."Uma kunengoma endaweni uyena njalo obehlezi ephambili eyivumisa. Ubengakaze asitshele ukuthi kunezitha ezimfunayo,'' usho kanje.Uveze ukuthi lesi simo siyihlukumezile kakhulu ingoduso kamfowabo, uNksz Fikelephi Dlamini.ISolezwe Ngempelasonto lithunyelelwe ama-video lapho khona umufi ebonakala khona ebhikla ingoma, kukhala amakhwela, kuqhuma nemikikizo, izinsizwa ziyivuma.Kuvela ukuthi izinsizwa zendawo ziyathuthumela ngendlela okusocongwe ngayo umufi.Elinye ilungu lomphakathi libabaze ukulunga kukamufi nokuba nogazi kwakhe emphakathini.Lilimise ngesihloko elokuthi abazi ukuthi yini le engaka ebingaze idale ukuthi insizwa ethandwa kangaka emphakathini isocongwe ngalolu hlobo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uConstable Thenjiswa Ngcobo usiqinisekisile lesi sigameko.Uthe amaphoyisa aKwaNdengezi amatasa afuna umkhondo wabantu okungenzeka ukuba bayathinteka ekusocongweni kukamufi."Kusolakala ukuthi umufi ubekade esekhaya ngesikhathi ehlaselwa ngabantu abangaziwa. Kuthiwa bafike bamdubula bambulala,'' usho kanje.

KUZOCACA namhlanje ukuthi iqembu Umkhonto weSizwe lizoqhubeka nokungenela ukhetho lukazwelonke ngoMeyi 29, njengoba sibhekwe ngabomvu isinqumo senkantolo yezokhetho ezinze eBloemfontein.Le nkantolo ezokhipha lesi sinqumo eGoli hhayi eBloemfontein ngokwesimemezelo esenziwe izolo, kulindeleke inqume kuleli cala elibhekwe ngabomvu elafakwa yi-ANC ikhala ngokubhaliswa kweMK eyesekwa ngowayenguMengameli weZwe ne-ANC uJacob Zuma.I-ANC ikhala ngokuthi kunezinto ezingahanjiswanga kahle ngesikhathi ikhomishini yezokhetho i-Independent Electoral Commission, ilibhalisa iqembu leMK .Akubhekiwe isinqumo sale nkantolo kuphela kodwa i-IEC izodedelela umphakathi nohlu lwabantu abazomela amaqembu kulolu khetho.Kulolu luhlu kuzodedelwa namagama abantu abazongenela ukhetho ngokuzimela njengoba bezobe beqala ukuba yingxenye yalolu khetho. Kube nokudideka izolo njengoba bekulindeleke ukuthi inkantolo ikhiphe lesi sinqumo ekuseni kodwa egcine ingasikhiphanga.Inkantolo yezokhetho izolo imemezele ukuthi lesi sinqumo sizokhishwa namhlanje kusuka ngo-9 ekuseni, enkantolo enkulu yaseGoli.Kuke kwaputshuka imibiko yokuthi uNobhala Jikelele we-ANC uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, useyitholile imiphumela ngasese ngesinqumo senkantolo njengoba izolo bekumele kube nesithangami sabezindaba emuva kokukhishwa kwalesi sinqumo.UMbalula ukuchithile lokhu enkundleni i-X, wathi amajaji angenza lokho angasuswa nasezikhundleni.Ubalule ukuthi abanolwazi ngokuthi isinqumo sesiputshukile ababike lelo jaji ukuze lithathelwe izinyathelo.Isikhulu esiphezulu sekhomishini uMnuz Masego Sheburi, ekhuluma nesiteshi sethelevishini, unxuse amaqembu ukuthi alandele imigomo ebekiwe njengoba kuyiwa okhethweni.USheburi uthe lawo maqembu azosabisa ngodlame noma aphambane nemigomo ebekiwe okumele ilandelwe, inkantolo yezokhetho izowaphuca amavoti noma achithwe angabe esakwazi ukungenela ukhetho.“Akuwona umsebenzi wekhomishini ukubika amaqembu aphula imigomo kodwa noma ngubani angabika lokhu enkantolo yezokhetho. Le nkantolo iyona ezonquma ngesigwebo esizotholwa ilelo qembu noma loyo ongenela ukhetho,” kusho uSheburi. Mayelana nokudedelwa kohlu lwamaqembu, uSheburi uthe umnqamulajuqu wokukhalaza ngabajutshiwe ungoLwesine. Uveze ukuthi uhlu lokugcina lwabazongenela ukhetho luyoshicilelwa ngo-Ephreli 10. Kwenzeka lokhu nje i-DA izolo imemezele ezobajubela ezikhundleni nabazongenela ukhetho njengondunankulu ezifundazweni ezahlukene.

SEKUZANDLENI zejaji ngekusasa likanesi othweswe icala lokuthengela umyeni wakhe owayengunjiniyela izinkabi ukuthi zimbulale ngoSepthemba 2020.IJaji elibambile, uSolwazi Bonke Dumisa, kulindeleke ukuthi likhiphe isinqumo sokuthi liyamlahla ngecala noma limkhipha phambili unesi, uNksz Nompumelelo Goncalves.Ligcina ukuhlala icala, uDumisa wathi isinqumo uzosikhipha ngo-Ephreli 2. Waveza nokuthi kungenzeka athathe usuku noma ezimbili efunda isinqumo sakhe ngoba buningi kakhulu ubufakazi ethulelwa bona.Lo wesifazane ongummangalelwa wesibili ecaleni athweswe lona nomfowabo, uMnuz Nkosinathi Zungu ongummangalelwa wokuqala. Basolwa ngokuthumba futhi babulale behlelile uMnuz Nkosi Timmy Langa.Bayawaphika amacala abathweswe wona yize uZungu atshela inkantolo ukuthi uLanga wabulawa “ngephutha” abantu ayekade ehamba nabo.UMbuso usola uZungu nomngani wakhe, uJames Mashudu Mthimkhulu, ukuthi bathumba uLanga emzini wakhe osePinetown.Isidumbu sikamufi satholakala sesiqala ukonakala ehlathini elisoZwathini, eNdwedwe, ngoNovemba 2020.UMthimkhulu, walivuma icala wase egwetshwa iminyaka engu-20 ebhadla ejele. Waphenduka ufakazi woMbuso waninda ngecala bobabili abammangalelwa ngesikhathi ethula ubufakazi enkantolo.UMbuso usola ukuthi uNksz Goncalves waqasha uZungu noMthimkhulu ukuthi bathumbe, babulale futhi badayise iveni kaLanga.Enkantolo kwavela ukuthi uLanga waklinywa ngentambo ye-ayina washona.Enkantolo kwavela nokuthi bahluleka ukudayisa iveni likaLanga abagqigqa nalo koMsinga naseBergville bagcina belishiye dengwane. Enkantolo kwavela nokuthi esebulewe uLanga, kwaba khona inkokhelo eyenziwa nguNksz Goncalves ayeyibhekise kuMthimkhulu. Kwathi uma umshushisi u-Advocate Krishen Shah, ebuza ukuthi kwakungeyani le mali, uNksz Goncalves wathi kwakuyimali ayekade ecelwe uZungu ukuthi ayithumele uMthimkhulu ngoba wayekade emkweleta yona.

KULINDELEKE ukuthi bashayelele isipikili sokugcina aboMbuso nabameli ecaleni lokubulawa kowayengunozinti uSenzo Meyiwa, uma selibuyela enkantolo ngoMsombuluko. Icala libuyela eNkantolo eNkulu ePitoli ngoMsombuluko ekuseni.UMeyiwa owayeyisilomo se-Orlando Pirates neBafana Bafana, wadutshulwa wabulawa ngo-2014, ekubo kwentombi yakhe engumculi uKelly Khumalo, eVosloorus. Icala lisesigabeni lapho kubangwa khona ukuthi izitatimende zabamangalelwa zokuvuma amacala kufanele yini zamukelwe njengobufakazi.Abamangalelwa bathi amaphoyisa abaphoqa ukuthi bavume amacala abasayinisa izitatimende ngenkani. Uhlangothi loMbuso lumile ekutheni bawavuma amacala, baze badalula nowayebanike itoho lokusoconga uMeyiwa.Icala liguqe ngenyanga edlule ukuze kunikezwe izinhlangothi zombili ithuba lokuthi zifake amaphepha ezethulo. Izinhlangothi zombili zase ziqedile ukwethula ubufakazi. Sekufanele batshele ijaji ukuthi bami ngamaphi amaphuzu ezicelweni zabo.

AMEHLO asethe njo kuMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, obhekwe ukuthi amemezele iKhabhinethi entsha, okulindeleke ukuthi ihlanganise amaqembu ahlukene.Le Khabhinethi kulindeleke ukuthi ayimemezele noma yinini njengoba ematasa exoxa nezinhlaka ezehlukene okubalwa namaqembu akuhulumeni wobumbano, amadlelandawonye ne-ANC mayelana nazobajuba kuhulumeni. Kuhlukene imibono ngale Khabhinethi njengoba kukhona abafuna kuncishiswe isibalo sayo, kuqedwe ngamaPhini oNgqongqoshe, abanye bafuna kwandiswe isibalo sabesifazane, kanti abanye bafuna kufakwe abantu abanamava. Kukhona nabayichithayo eyalo hulumeni njengoba abanye abaholi bamaqembu beqagela nokuthi ngeke kushaye ngisho uDisemba walo nyaka, usekhona lo mshado.Njengoba lingekho iqembu eladla umhlanganiso okhethweni, kwaphoqa i-ANC ukuthi inxenxe amanye amaqembu ukuthi kwakhiwe lo hulumeni wobumbano. Okwamanje amaqembu akha uhulumeni yiDA, IFP, Patriotic Alliance, ANC neGood. Amanye amaqembu aveze ukuthi asayicubungula eyokuba yingxenye kahulumeni angasayina noma yinini kuwona.Ngesikhathi efungiswa eziNdlini zoMbuso ePitoli kuleli sonto, uRamaphosa, uveze ukuthi usemi ngomumo ukusebenza nalo hulumeni.Uveze ukuthi bahlela ukwakha amathuba emisebenzi kulo hulumeni, balungise zonke izinkinga zezwe, wathembisa ukuthi uzosebenzisana nawo wonke amaqembu kulo hulumeni.Ubuyise ithemba kubantu, wathi kumele bawuthembe lo hulumeni ozinhloso zawo ukuthuthukisa izwe.“Kulabo abaphakathi kuhulumeni wobumbano, abagangayo sizobakhipha. Akudlalwa la kuyasetshenzwa,” kusho uRamaphosa.USotswebhu we-ANC ePhalamende, uMnuz Mdumiseni Ntuli, ekhuluma nesiteshi sethelevishini iNewzroom Afrika izolo, uthe uRamaphosa uyazi ngezinselelo ezibhekene nezwe ngakho maduzane uzomemezela iKhabhinethi.UNtuli uthe uRamaphosa nguyena ozoba namandla okuqoka iKhabhinethi.“Angakhetha noma amalungu amangaki eqenjini elithile, noma angakhethi muntu ngoba umgomo wohulumeni wobumbano ngukuthi nguyena onamandla okuqoka iKhabhinethi yakhe,” kusho uNtuli.Uthe akukho lapho kubhalwe khona ukuthi kumele akhethe amalungu amangaki emaqenjini asemshadweni.UNtuli ubuye wacacisa ukuthi i-ANC iyona ehola uhulumeni wobumbano.“I-ANC iyona ehola lo hulumeni wobumbano njengoba kuyiyona eyanxenxa amanye amaqembu ukuthi abe yingxenye kahulumeni wobumbano. Akuyona i-DA eshaya amaphiko kuhulumeni wobumbano. Noma ingaphuma esivumelwaneni, ngeke uwe bhu uhulumeni,” kusho uNtuli.Ukusho lokhu kulandela isikhalazo se-DA sokuthi bekumele kuqale kukhulunywe nayo, ivume ngaphambi kokuba kwamukelwe i-PA kulo mshado.Uthe abadingi ukuthi baqale bakhulume neqembu elithile, bathole imvume yalo ngaphambi kokwamukela elinye iqembu kulo mshado.

KULINDELEKE ukuthi agonyuluke ngomlomo wakhe owesifazane othweswe icala lokubulala umyeni wakhe.Namhlanje, uNkk Faith Nongcebo Ntombela, kulindeleke ukuthi avume phambi kweJaji uChetty eNkantolo eNkulu yaseScottburgh, itulo lokubulawa kuka-Captain Zwelakhe Ntombela owayeseyiPhoyisa loMkhandlu weTheku. Izolo, ubevele eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini nababili asolwa nabo kuleli cala, uMnuz Sithembiso Khumalo onguthishanhloko noKhulani Cele, oyinkabi eyesatshwayo evele isigwetshiwe ngamacala angahlobene naleli. Laba ababili bazophinde babuyele enkantolo maduze.Ngaphambilini umshushisi, u-Advocate Kristen Shaah, watshela iJaji laseNkantolo yaseThekwini, uBruce Bedderson, ukuthi uNkk Ntombela icala uyalivuma.UBedderson wathi kumele lokhu uNkk Ntombela akwenze ngomlomo wakhe ethathe inkantolo ngamehlo engqondo ayibeke ngakho konke okwenzeka kuhlelwa itulo.Izolo, bekulindeleke ukuthi lokhu akwenze uNkk Ntombela kodwa kwahlaluka ukuthi amaJaji aseNkantolo yaseThekwini amatasa, angeke akwazi ukulalela icala lakhe.Kwase kuvunyelwana ngokuthi kusetshenziswe iNkantolo eNkulu yaseScottburgh. "Icala lakho liya eNkantolo eNkulu yaseScottburgh,'' kusho iJaji libhekise kuNkk Ntombela.Ngaleso sikhathi uNkk Ntombela ubebonakala ethule samuntu ojulile ngomcabango. UNkk Ntombela usolwa ngokuba ungqondongqondo wetulo lokubulawa komyeni wakhe.Umufi wahlaselwa esemzini wakhe okwa-S, eMlaza, ngoMeyi 3, ngonyaka owedlule.Ngesikhathi edutshulwa umufi, uNkk Ntombela, wayekhona ngaphakathi endlini kodwa kuvela ukuthi akazange azihluphe ngokuyobheka emnyango.Wadutshulwa ngabantu abangaziwa waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela eSiphingo Medical Towers okuyilapho okwafike kwamenela khona.Ngemuva kwalokho, amaphoyisa abopha inkabi uSipho Ntombela okwavela ukuthi nguyena owadubula.Le nkabi yageqa amagula ilandisa inkantolo ngalo lonke itulo yaveza nokuthi yayikade ithunywe nguNkk Ntombela.Yaveza nokuthi yayikhokhelwe imali engakanani ukuze yenze lo msebenzi. Inkantolo yabe seyiyigweba iminyaka engu-15 ibhadla ejele.Ngemuva kwalokho, noNkk Ntombela wakhalelwa ngamasongo kaSigonyela ngaleli cala.

UZOGCOTSHWA bese enekela izwe umkhombandlela ngezinhlelo zikahulumeni wobumbano, uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, emcimbini okuzobe kusindwe ngobethole, ozoba sezindlini zoMbuso e-Union Building, ePitoli, namhlanje.URamaphosa uzogcotshwa yinhloko yamajaji, iJaji uRaymond Zondo, kulo mcimbi okulindeleke ukuthi uhanjelwe omengameli bamanye amazwe ase-Afrika, amalungu ePhalamende, abaholi bamaqembu ezepolitiki, izicukuthwane ezehlukene, abantu bakuleli kanjalo nondunankulu bezifundazwe.Abezokuphepha bami ngomumo ukubhekana nosikhwili phambana nobhoko, abazophula umthetho.Utshwala, izidakamizwa, izikhali eziyingozi, amabhodlela  nama-kani akuvumelekile lapho kuzobe kubanjelwe khona umcimbi.Imigwaqo eseduzane nezindlu zoMbuso, izobe ivaliwe kungangeneki ngezimoto.Abantu abazothamela lo mcimbi bazobe behlinzekwe ngezokuthutha.UNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa, uMnuz Bheki Cele, uthe bahlale beyilungele imicimbi efuze le ukugada abaphula umthetho.UCele obekhuluma esithangamini soNgqongqoshe bezokuphepha ezweni muva nje, uveze ukuthi akukho okuzokwenzeka uma sekugcotshwa umengameli ngoba naphambilini ziningi izinto obekusatshiswa ngazo ukuthi zizokwenzeka, kodwa ezigcine ngokungenzeki.Ubale eyangesikhathi kuzoba nokhetho, wathi kukhona ababethi kuzoba nodlame, nangesikhathi kumele kukhishwe imiphumela yokhetho, okwagcina ngokuthi kungenzeki lutho.“Nangesikhathi kumele kuhlale iPhalamende okokuqala likhethe umengameli kanjalo nosomlomo, kwakunengebhe yokuthi kukhona okungase kwenzeke. Namanje akukho okuzokwenzeka, siyizingovolo siqaphe kwasani,” usho kanje uCele.Inkulumo kaRamaphosa ibhekwe ngabomvu njengoba kukhona uhulumeni ohlanganisa amaqembu ahlukene.Okwamanje mahlanu amaqembu ayingxenye kahulumeni, aholwa yi-ANC, kube ne-DA, IFP, Patriotic Alliance neGood.Izingxoxo zisaqhubeka namanye amaqembu mayelana nokwengeza amanye amaqembu kulo hulumeni.Ngemuva kokugcotshwa kukaRamaphosa, kulindeleke ukuthi amemezele iKhabhinethi yakhe ezobe ihlanganisa amaqembu ahlukene.Kule Khabhinethi kuthiwa iPhini likaRamaphosa uMnuz Paul Mashatile, maningi amathuba okuthi likhuze ibuya kulesi sikhundla.Amanye amaqembu wona kuthiwa azothola izikhundla zongqongqoshe namaphini oNgqongqoshe kanjalo nokwengamela amakomiti ahlukene ePhalamende.Minyaka yonke uma kuzomenyezelwa iKhabhinethi entsha, kuhlale kuhlatshwa ikhwelo lokuthi sehliswe isibalo songqongqoshe beKhabhinethi ngoba baningi kakhulu.Phambilini, i-DA ibihlale ikhala ngokuthi kuncishiswe isibalo seKhabhinethi ngoba kwengezwa izindleko ezingenasidingo. Nakulokhu ezinye izinhlangano ezehlukene okubalwa ne-ActionSA, ahlabe ikhwelo lokuthi kwehliswe isibalo seKhabhinethi.UNobhala Jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, utshele abezindaba ukuthi uRamaphosa uzokhetha iKhabhinethi yakhe ezobe ihlanganisa namalungu akwamanye amaqembu.UMbalula uveze ukuthi uma seziphothuliwe izingxoxo uRamaphosa uyomemezela iKhabhinethi yakhe.Uveze ukuthi izinto eziseqhulwini kuhulumeni yindaba yokuphucula umnotho, ukwakha amathuba emisebenzi, ukuvikela amalungelo abasebenzi, ukuvikela amalungelo abesifazane, ukuphucula ezemfundo, ukulwa nobugebengu nenkohlakalo kanjalo nendaba yokuvikela imigomo ethinta ubudlelwano namanye amazwe.URamaphosa uzohlonishwa ngumbutho wezokuvikela okubalwa ukuqhunyiswa kwezibhamu, ukuviliyela kwezindiza emoyeni.Kuzonandisa amaciko ahlukene okubalwa uSjava, Vicky Sampson, Makhadzi nabanye.

KUTHUNUKE amanxeba abengakapholi kubalingisi nabadidiyeli bemidlalo yethelevishini, ukudlula emhlabeni kukamakadebona womlingisi, uConnie Chiume.Izindaba zokudlula emhlabeni kukaConnie (72) ziqinisekiswe yisitatimende esikhishwe wumndeni wakhe ekhasini lakhe le-Instagram izolo, lapho odalule khona ukuthi ushonele esibhedlela Garden City, eGoli.“Siwumndeni wakwaChiume siphatheke kabuhlungu ukunazisa ngokudlula emhlabeni kwenkakha yomlingisi ohlonishwa umhlaba wonke, uConnie Chiume. Siwumndeni sicela ukuthi nisinike isikhathi sokubhekana nalobu bunzima,”’ kusho isitatimende somndeni.Omunye womakadebona womlingisi, uDumisani Dlamini wodumo lukaChester kwi-Yizo Yizo, uthe ukushona kukaConnie kufane nokuthela upelepele esilondeni njengoba bebesazikhotha amanxeba ngoMpho Sebeng, oshone ngoMeyi, nokukaMbongeni Ngema, oshone ngoDisemba nyakenye. “’Silahlekelwe kakhulu ngokuhamba kwakhe futhi okubuhlungu kakhulu wukuthi isikhala nokubaluleka kwakhe sizokubona manje ngoba engasekho emhlabeni. Ngithuke kakhulu ngizwa izindaba ngonkosikazi wami, bengingakulindele nhlobo lokho kodwa ngizoziduduza ngokuthi bese kuyisikhathi,” usho kanje.UMandla N weBlack Brain Pictures osikhiqize inqwaba yemidlalo yethelevishini, yena uthuke wagelekeqa ethintwa yiSolezwe  ngalolu daba, waveza ukuthi ubengakezwa nhlobo ngalo ngoba ubesaxinwe wumsebenzi.“Sizomkhumbula njalo ngemisebenzi yakhe emihle nangakho konke okuhle akwenzile, ikakhulu ukubeka iNingizimu Afrika ebalazweni ngendawo ayilingisa kwiBlack Panther,” kusho uMandla N kuzwakala ukuthi kumshaqisile ukuzwa lezi zindaba.UConnie uzakhele igama ngendawo kaMamokete Khuse ayeyilingisa kwi-Rhythm City  phakathi kwa-2007 kuya ku-2021, kanti futhi washayelwa elikhulu ihlombe ngokuvela kwifilimu yaphesheya kwezilwandle i-Black Panther ngo-2018, nakweyesihlabani saphesheya kwezilwandle uBeyonce, i-Black Is King ngo-2020.Ulingise nakwi-Zone 14 ngo-2005, Housekeepers ngo-2018, Queen Sono  ngo-2020 ne-Gomora ngo-2021 kuya ku-2023. Amazwi enduduzo alokhu engene njalo ezinkundleni zokuxhuman kosaziwayo abehlukene, bekhala ngokuhamba kwakhe.

BABHIKISHELE ukuphoqwa ukugibela amatekisi, othisha nabasebenzi bezempilo e-Underberg, abagcwale umgwaqo bephethe izingqwembe ezinemibhalo ehlukene bekhala ngabemboni yamatekisi kule ndawo.Laba basebenzi bavuke bagcwala umgwaqo u-D200 eKulman khona e- Underberg, bekhala ngokwehliswa ezimotweni uma begibelisene nozakwabo beya noma bephuma emsebenzini baphoqwe ukuthi bagibele amatekisi, abakubona njengokuxhashazwa.Omunye wababhikishi  ongathandanga ukudalulwa, ezwini eliqoshiwe alithumelele abezindaba,  uthe behliswa kabuhlungu uma besezimotweni zozakwabo kuphunywa emsebenzini, bakhonjwe erenki okwenza kwesinye isikhathi bafike lapho beya khona sekudlule isikhathi ngenxa yokugqoza kwamatekisi njengoba kule ndawo kusemakhaya.“Siyahlukumezeka kakhulu. Abanye ozakwethu abanazo izimoto, ngakho uma siphuma emsebenzini imvamisa ngoLwesihlanu siya emakhaya, siyahambisana.  NgoLwesihlanu sivamise ukuphuma ngo- 12:15 emini.  Ngaleso sikhathi izimoto zamabanga amade zisuke seziphelile njengoba ziphela  ngo-9 ekuseni. Ozakwethu abangenazo izimoto babuyiselwa erenki baqale bayobheka izimoto uthole ukuthi uya eMgungundlovu noma eThekwini, ugcine usufika ebusuku ekhaya,” kusho yena.Uthe bazamile ukuxoxisana nabaphethe usoseshini kodwa bakhombisa ukulushalazela lolu daba, okubenze banquma ukubhikisha ngenhloso yokuveza ilaka labo.Bathi le ndawo isemakhaya, izimoto zakhona zihamba ngesikhathi esithile zisheshe ziphele ngakho kugcina sekunzima ukuthola izinto zokubuyela ekhaya besuka emsebenzini kwazise bayehliswa ezimotweni zozakwabo uma bebagibelisile.Ikhansela lendawo, uMnuz Themba Shoba, lithe liqinisekise ukuthi umbhikisho awuzange uphazamise kangako  ukufunda ezikoleni nokusebenza ezikhungweni zezempilo njengoba ubeyisikhathi esincane, abasebenzi babuyela emsebenzini.“Bathe inhloso ukuveza ilaka labo bebengaqondile ukuthi kube nokuphazamiseka kokufunda ikakhulu ngoba abafundi bayabhala kuleli sonto.  Nokho nabamatekisi baluvezile uhlangothi lwabo njengoba bekhala ngokuthi ukugibelisana kuyabalimaza njengoba kuwumsebenzi wabo ukuthutha umphakathi.“ Ngokubona ukuthi lolu daba luyadinga ukuhlalelwa phansi, sinqume ukuthi kube nomhlangano nabamele lezi zinhlangothi zombili kanti sizocela nabeminyango kahulumeni ikakhulu owezokuThutha ukuthi babekhona emhlanganweni  ukuze balekelele ekuxazululeni lesi simo,” usho kanje.UMnuz Piet Mkhize ongomunye wabagade ukusebenza kwamatekisi kusoseshini eKulman, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi kuzoba nomhlangano ngoMsombuluko wathi konke abakhala ngakho abasebenzi kuzolalelwa emhlanganweni kuphunywe nesixazululo.

LIHLEHLELE inyanga ezayo icala lezinsizwa ezimbili zakwaNdimande ezaboshwa eSwatini ngenyanga edlule.UMnuz Siyabonga Gezani Ndimande noMnuz Malusi Dave Ndimande abanukeka ecaleni lokufa komrepha uKiernan “AKA” Forbes nomngani wakhe uTebello “Tibz” Matsoane bavele phambi kweMantshi yaseManzini ngoLwesithathu ekuseni.Ukuvela kwabo kulandela ukuthunyelwa kwamaphepha esicelo sokuba babuyiswe kuleli ukuze bazobhekana naleli cala.NgoLwesibili, umnyango wezobuLungiswa namaJele ukhiphe isitatimende esiqinisekisa ukuthi uNgqongqoshe uMnuz Ronald Lamola uwagunyazile futhi wawathumela amaphepha eSwatini.Umshushisi wombuso eSwatini utshele iMantshi ukuthi asefikile amaphepha esicelo sokubuyiswa kwalezi zinsizwa kuleli. Ummeli wabasolwa uveze ukuthi lawa maphepha afike awumqulu omkhulu okusho ukuthi udinga isikhathi sokuba awafunde futhi alumane indlebe namakilayenti akhe ngokuqukethwe yiwo.Inkantolo ikuvumile lokhu yatshela abasolwa ukuthi icala liyahlehla.Kulindeleke ukuthi icala labo libuyele ngomhla ka9 Ephreli lapho kuzozwakala khona ukuthi bayasiphikisa na isicelo sokubuyiswa kwabo kuleli. Inkantolo iveze ukuthi uma abasolwa besiphikisa isicelo sokubuyiselwa ezweni lakubo, kuzobe sekuhlelwa kahle isikhathi nezinsuku ezifanelekile zokudingida lokho.[JUST IN] #AKA The Ndimande brothers will be back in court on the 9th of April. This is when we will know whether they plan on opposing the extradition request from SA. #eNCA pic.twitter.com/oRYzNiHr28Kwenzeka lokhu nje, abanye abasolwa abahlanu abanukeka ecaleni elifanayo bayaqhubeka nezicelo zabo zebheyili enkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini.

KUGONYULUKE nabanye abazali baveza ukuthi uthisha, obhekene necala lokudlwengula umfundi oneminyaka engu-17, ophila nokukhubazeka, useke wanzakalisa nezingane zabo. Lokhu bakuveze izolo, ngesikhathi bebhikisha ngaphandle kweNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMlaza, lapho obekuvela khona uthisha.Laba bazali amagama abo agodliwe bathe bafuna ubulungiswa futhi bahlela ukuvula amacala ebese bebona ukuthi amacala angengezwe yini kuleli elilodwa lokudlwengula uthisha abhekene nalo.“Sonke sizovula amacala manje ukuze kuzobonakala ukuthi le ndoda ezibiza ngothisha seyone kangakanani,’’ kusho umzali.Omunye umzali uveze ukuthi usanda kutshelwa yingane yakhe ukuthi nayo wayidlwengula esafundisa kwesinye isikole ngaphambi kokuba ezofundisa esikoleni akusona.Lo thisha ofundisa esikoleni sabanokukhubazeka esiseThekwini, kuthiwa wadlwengula umfundi ophila nokukhubazeka emagcekeni esikole esigamekweni okuthiwa senzeke ngenyanga eyedlule.Lokhu kuthiwa kuholele ekutheni umfundi angabe esaya kuMkhosi woMhlanga obukade ungempelasonto esigodlweni saseNyokeni, KwaNongoma.Unina womfundi okusolakala ukuthi wadlwengulwa, uthe unengwe ngowesifazane ogane uthisha ofike kuyena ngeledlule, wamcela ukuba ahoxise icala ebese bayaxoxa ngokuthi kungaba yimalini abangayikhokha.Uthe umphendule ngokuthi akazi ukuthi uye ubize malini umqhoyiso wokudlwengulwa futhi ubengakaze engezwa ngawo ngaphambilini.Kunenkulumo eqoshiwe (Voice Note) okukhuluma khona iphimbo lowesilisa okukholakala ukuthi ngelikathisha elizwakala kanje:“Ngiyakucela phela we.....(emgagula ngegama umgilwa) ungaluvezi lolu daba lokuthi ngilale nawe. Phela mntanami uma wenze kanjalo uzongiphelela umsebenzi wokuba nguthisha bese kulamba umndeni wami,’’ lizwakala kanje iphimbo.Yile Voice Note athi unina kamgilwa wathola ngayo ukuthi ingane yakhe idlwengulwe nguthisha. Uthe kulapho asukuma khona waphuthumisa ingane esibhedlela iPrince Mshiyeni Memorial abafike baqinisekisa ukuthi ngempela idlwenguliwe ingane.Uveze ukuthi utholile ukuthi bese kuyizikhawu eziningana uthisha edlwengula umgilwa esikoleni.“Sengize ngakhetha nokuthi ngimkhiphe umntwana wami esikoleni,’’ echaza.Uthe akufunayo ubulungiswa okuzoholela ekutheni abhadle ejele inguna phakade uthisha ngakwenzile. Ubalise ngokuthi ingane yakhe angeke isalubhada eMkhosini woMhlanga ekubeni beyiwukhonzile.Ngaphandle kwenkantolo bekukhona idlanzana ebelibhikisha liphethe izingqwembe ebezinemibhalo ehlukene. Eminye yazo ibithi Phansi ngothisha ongumdlwenguli! Asibafuni othisha abadlwengulayo! Mababoshwe abadlwengula izingane zethu!Ngaphakathi enkantolo umshushisi elingatholakalanga igama lakhe utshele imantshi ukuthi kunophenyo olusaqhubeka mayelana naleli cala. Imantshi ibe seyilihlehlisela u-Okthoba 15, nonyaka.

KUBHUJIWE emigwaqweni yaKwaZulu-Natal ngempelasonto.Izingozi zezimoto ezenzeke esifundazweni zidlule nemiphefumulo yabangu-21.Ingozi edlule nemiphefumulo eminingi yenzeke emgwaqweni ohlanganisa iGreytown neMooi River, uR622.Kule ngozi kushone abantu abangu-12. Kuyona kushayisane mahlanze imoto eyi-SUV neveni, abantu abangu-11 bashonele endaweni yesehlakalo.Oyedwa osindile kule ngozi ushonele esibhedlela.Kwabashonile kukhona nomfundi waseMichaelhouse, obebuya kodlala emncintiswaneni webhola lombhoxo.Ushone kanye nabazali bakhe. IMichaelhouse idlulise amazwi enduduzo ekhasini layo leFacebook.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa aseGreytown aphenya icala lokubulala ngokungenhloso.“Abantu abayisishiyagalolunye abashonile bebesevenini. Imbangela yengozi ibingakaziwa.”Kwenye ingozi, kushone amalungu eMK ayisithupha engozini eyenzeke ngaseKranskop.Amalungu eMK abeya eNkandla emcimbini wokugubha usuku lokuzalwa lwenkosikazi endala yomholi weMK, uJacob Zuma, uNkk Sizakele MaKhumalo Zuma, agingqike nemoto.Kule ngozi kulimale abantu abangu-11 abebesuka eMtshezi. Imoto kuthiwa iphelelwe amabhuleki, yabe isigingqika, yasha.UMphathiswa wezokuThutha KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Siboniso Duma, uzohambela imindeni eshonelwe.Umnyango uthe uzimisele ukwelekelela imindeni elahlekelwe.Esitatimendeni, uDuma, uthe useyalele izikhulu zomnyango ukuba zixhumane nemindeni elahlekelwe.Kepha iMK ithe ngeke ivume ukuthi uhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal uphathe uhlelo lokungcwatshwa kwamalungu enhlangano.Osebuholini obuphezulu beMK, uMnuz Floyd Shivambu, uthe bafuna ukuziphathela uhlelo lomngcwabo, wathi kodwa ngeke bawuvimbe uma ufuna ukuxhasa imindeni eshonelwe.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma namalungu eMK abehamba nawo ngesikhathi eyohlanganisa amehlo nemindeni eshonelwe.UShivambu uthe uzwile ukuthi uhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal uhlela ukungcwaba abashonile.“Ithina esizosho ukuthi ubani okufanele akhulume ngasiphi isikhathi emgcwabeni. Bona uma befuna ukuxhasa imindeni eshonelwe, bangakwenza lokho. Iqiniso ukuthi ithina okufanele engabe siphethe lapha KwaZulu-Natal. Ingakho singeke sivume ukuzwa ngabo.”Enye ingozi yemoto edlule nemiphefumulo yabathathu yenzeke KwaDukuza.

KUBIKWA ukuthi bathathu abezicishamlilo abashonile ngesikhathi belwa nokuqeda umlilo wequbula ku-R617 ngaseBoston.Kuthiwa lo mlilo uqale epulazini iStirling Farm, wabhebhetheka ngokushesha ngenxa yesimo sezulu esingesihle.Umphathi omkhulu weMidlands EMS, uMark Winterboer, uqinisekise kwabezindaba isibalo sabathathu abashonile wathi owesine uphuthunyiswe esibhedlela esesimweni esibucayi kakhulu.Kuthiwa abashonile ngabesifazane abathathu abasebenzela inkampani. Umphathiswa wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu, uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi, udlulise amazwi enduduzo ngabezicishamlilo abashonile.“Sibuhlungu ngokulahlekelwa abasebenzi abanesibindi abebelwela ukuvikela abanye abantu ukuba bangangeni engozini.”UButhelezi usho lokhu ngesikhathi esoLundi, lapho abehlola khona isimo kulandela umonakalo odalwe wumlilo wequbula. Lapha kushe umhlaba olinganiselwa ku-3 000 hectares ovame kakhulu ukudla imfuyo. Lo mphathiswa ufike ephethe amabhele ukulekelela abanemfuyo engasenakho ukudla, waveza nokuthi uhulumeni usebenza ngokuzikhandla ukusiza labo abasale dengwane.

SIMUNCU isimo kumalungu omphakathi waseMfube Village ngaphandle kwaseMiddelburg eMpumalanga ngokushona abafundi engozini yebhasi nesitimela ngoLwesithathu ntambama.Imibiko evela endaweni yesigameko ikhomba abafundi abahlanu besikole iMoreig Primary School abashone kule ngozi yebhasi nesitimela kanti baningi abanye abalimele.Abezimo eziphuthumayo basendaweni yesehlo njengoba kusatakulwa abafundi abasavalelekile.

BAZOVELA eNkantolo yeMantshi eRichards Bay namuhla abasolwa abangu-30 ngezinsolo zokudayisa izincwadi zokushayela zomgunyathi.Laba basolwa abakhalelwe ngamasongo kaSigonyela basebenza esikhungweni sokushayela saseMelmoth ngaphansi koMasipala waseMthonjaneni.Esitatimendeni esikhishwe wuMnyango wezokuThutha nokuHlaliswa kwaBantu, kuvela ukuthi bebedayisa izincwadi ngo-R2 500.“Ngaphambilini, uphiko oluhlola izimoto emnyangweni nophiko loKlebe babophe abantu abangu-9, abahloli ababili nabafake izicelo zamalayisensi abangu-10 abahlomulile. Umnyango usuwahoxisile wonke amalayisensi akhishwa yilabo ababoshiwe,” kusho isitatimende.Siqhube sathi lokhu kuyinkomba ecacile yokuzimisela komnyango ukuqeda ngeqembu lezigebengu, okuhlanganisa abahloli, abanikazi bezikole zokushayela nabafaka izicelo.“Umyalezo wethu uthi abashayeli mbumbulu abenze izivivinyo zokushayela zomgunyathi bazosuswa emigwaqweni yethu, baboshwe futhi bavalelwe ejele. Lokhu sikwenzela ukuqeda izingozi emigwaqweni yethu futhi sisindise impilo yabantu abangenacala,” sisho kanje.UMphathiswa wezokuThutha nokuHlaliswa kwaBantu KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Siboniso Duma, uncome ukuboshwa kwalaba basolwa.UDuma uncome umsebenzi omuhle owenziwa uphiko loKlebe namaphoyisa omgwaqo, waphinde wancoma ukuzikhandla kwabasebenzi balo mnyango.“Laba basebenzi bayaqinisekisa ukuphepha kwabashayeli emgwaqweni kanye nokuphepha komphakathi. Umnyango uzoqhubeka ukhuculule ukungcola ezikoleni zokushayela nasezindaweni zokuhlola ezahlukene,” usho kanje.Umphathiswa uthe labo abashayela izimoto bengenazo izincwadi, amalayisensi abo azothathwa ebese beyaboshwa babhadle ejele ngoba izingozi eziningi emgwaqweni zidalwa ukuthi abantu abaningi bashayela bengenazo izincwadi futhi nokuqeqesheka okusezingeni abakutholanga. Uqhube wathi umnyango uqinisekisa ukuthi usebenze ngokuzikhandla ukuvikela umphakathi uphephe ezingozini zemigwaqo.

AKAKWAZANGA ukuvela enkantolo ngenkinga yekheli umzanyana osolwa ngokweba usana abelugada eWaterfall, eBhamshela waboshwa oThongathi lapho abecashe khona nalo.Isolezwe  lakwabo kwaleli phephandaba, ngoLwesihlanu libike ngomzanyana oboshelwe ukweba usana okuthiwa uthathe izimpahla nesitifiketi sokuzalwa. Kuthiwa usana lomfana olunezinyanga eziwu-7 lubonakele lungasekho nomzanyana engasekho.Unina wosana, uNksz Zibuyile Gumede ufake lolu daba ezinkundleni zokuxhumana enxusa abantu ukuba bawuhlabe bawulawule bamfunise usana lwakhe.Bekulindeleke ukuthi umzanyana avele okokuqala eNkantolo yeMantshi KwaDukuza ngoLwesihlanu kodwa wagcina engavelanga. Isolezwe Ngempelasonto lizamile ukuthola kwabathile enkantolo, baqinisekisa ukuthi akavelanga.Bathe kunenkinga yekheli likamsolwa, ngoba akanayo indawo eqondile ahlala kuyona ngaphandle kwalo muzi abegada kuwona ingane.Umzanyana kuthiwa webe usana ngoLwesithathu waboshwa ngoLwesine oThongathi. Kuthiwa ubanjwe emuva kokuthi ecele ukubekelwa amanzi ashisayo komunye umuzi. Kuthiwa ubegobe amadlangala emzini thizeni ongasahlali muntu, eduze kwemizi yomntakabani.Kuthiwa laba abanemizi kule ndawo basolile ukuthi kukhona okushaya amanzi ngomuntu ohleli nosana emzini ongahlali muntu bawuhlaba bawulawula.Unina wosana olwebiwe uthe lo mzanyana wamthola ngesihlobo sakhe esasihlala naye emqashweni. Uthe ngendlela umzanyana abezwana ngayo nengane bamangele uma esekhala emuka nayo.Ngesikhathi eboshwa ngoLwesine umzanyana, kuthiwa uvele njengomuntu ongathi uyadideka emqondweni ethi usana luwumzukulu wakhe.Kulindeleke ukuthi umzanyana avele enkantolo ngoMsombuluko lapho okuzocaca khona ngendaba yekheli.

USESIMENI esibucayi umshayeli wemoto ediliva impahla kulandela ukuhlaselwa izigebengu zifuna ukuduna iveni yenkampani.Lokhu kwenzeke kuN2 ngaseMandeni ngoLwesine ekuseni. Ngokombiko ovela endaweni yesehlo, iveni edilivayo kuthe iphuma kwi-toll gate yavinjwa yimoto encane inamadoda amane phakathi.“Kuthiwa amadoda amane avulele ngenhlamvu ebhekise kumshayeli weveni, ngenhlanhla imoto yonogada eqapha iveni ibiseduze yaphendula ngenhlamvu ibhekise kubasolwa,” kusho uSamantha okhulumela abe-IPSS Medical Rescue and IPSS Security Services.Abasolwa baphunyuke babaleka bengaphethe lutho. Umshayeli weveni odubuleke kabi uthole usizo lokuqala endaweni yesehlo waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela ngendiza enophephela emhlane.

UBANGWA nezibi esibhedlela owesifazane olimale kabi kungqongqa indlu abelele kuyo nomndeni, esigamekweni okushone kuso ubaba wekhaya, umzukulu nowesifazane obesiza.Lesi sigameko esenzeke ngesonto eledlule KwaNtabankulu oLundi, sishiye amalungu omphakathi ebambe ongezansi. Sidlule nomphefumulo kaMnuz Zibonele Mkhize (60) oyinhloko yomuzi, uLisakhanya Mthethwa (4) owumzukulu noNksz Nomalanga Mchunu okuthiwa ubengumsebenzi kuleli khaya.Kuthiwa abanye emndenini balimale okungatheni, kanti owesifazane ongumnikazi womuzi yena usesimeni esibucayi esibhedlela emva kokuthi elimale kulesi sigameko.Ikhansela kule ndawo, uMnuz Fisokwakhe Dlamini, liuthe nakuba isizathu sokusha kwendlu enkulu okuvela ukuthi beyilala amalungu omndeni abalelwa kwayisishiyagalolunyeni ingakaziwa, kodwa kusolwa ukuthi kubangelwe ukucinywa kukagesi.“Kunohlelo lokucinywa kukagesi amahora athile komasipala.  Sikholwa ukuthi  kungenzeka ukuthi kukhona obekhanyise ikhandlela wakhohlwa, asazi. Akekho futhi osinika izimpendulo ngoba abantu abadala abebekhona yibona abashonile kanti osindile usesibhedlela, bonke laba abanye izingane okungekho okutheni ezikukhumbulayo,” usho kanje.Uthe okwehlele umndeni kubashaqise kakhulu, kangangoba umfana osethe ukukhula okuwuyena owazama ukuhlenga unina nowazibonela uyise nabanye ababili bengqongqa, kuyakhombisa ukuthi uhlukumezeke kakhulu emqondweni ngenxa yalesi simo.Owomndeni, uNksz Silindile Mkhize, uqinisekise ukuthi uyise ubefihlwa khona izolo, kanti uLisakhanya ufihlwe ngeSonto bese kuthi uNksz Mchunu yena batshelwe ukuthi uzofihlwa namhlanje.“Izikhulu zikaMasipala oLundi zifikile ukuzobhonga emswaneni.  Lukhona usizo esilutholile kumasipala, osihlangabeze ngalo,”usho kanje.IMeya kulo masipala uMnuz Wilson Ntshangase, idlulisele amazwi enduduzo emndenini ngesikhathi iwuhambele ngoMsombuluko.

ABEZIMO eziphuthumayo babizelwe KwaDukuza lapho isalukazi nomzukulu waso behlaselwe yinja yohlobo lweRottweiter ngoLwesine ntambama.Abe-IPSS Medical Rescue bafike endaweni yesigameko bathola isalukazi esineminyaka eng-67 ubudala nomzukulu waso oneminyaka emithathu benamanxeba okulimala kabi ngenxa yokuhlaselwa yinja.Bobabili balashelwe endaweni yesigameko ngaphambi kokuba baphuthunyiswe esibhedlela besesimeni esibucayi.Imbangela yalesi sehlo kayaziwa kodwa amaphoyisa akwaDukuza ayaphenya.

AMAPHOYISA aseGauteng abophe abasolwa ababili ngecala lokubulawa komfana oneminyaka emihlanu elokishini laseSoshanguve, ePitoli ngesonto eledlule.Lokhu kwenzeke ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku ngesikhathi owesilisa efika emzini wakhe ehamba ngeveni elihlophe leToyota. Bekungezithuba zika-10.30pm ngesikhathi efika ekhaya wahlangantshezwa yindodana yakhe esencane. Lo mlisa ungena ekhaya nje uphelezelwa yizigebengu ezimuvimbezele zizama ukuthatha imoto yakhe.Kuzwakale kuduma izulu lezandla ngesikhathi kuthathwa le moto nokuyilapho okubonakale khona ukuthi kudubuleke le ngane, ephuthunyiswe esibhedlela kodwa ngeshwa yafike yaphelela khona.Ukubulawa kukaDitebogo Phalane ngalesi sihluku kuthuse kakhulu amalungu omphakathi waseSoshanguve nasePitoli yonkana asehlalele ovalweni ngenxa yokwanda kwezigameko zobugebengu obunodlame.- UCele ubabaza isiga kubulawa ingane kudunwa imoto–Kuthungathwa abadubule babulala ingane beduna imoto Kuthiwa abasolwa batholakale nemoto eyasetshenziswa ngesikhathi kudunwa imoto kababa kaDitebogo, nayo le moto kubikwa ukuthi yadonwa elokishini laseMabopane. Amaphoyisa abuye athola umshini wokujema imoto, isibhamu nezinhlamvu. Ukuboshwa kwalaba basolwa kwenzeka ngemuva kokuba ungqongqoshe wamaphoyisa uMnuz Bheki Cele avakashele umndeni walo mfana eyobhonga emswaneni ngoLwesibili.UCele uthembise umndeni ukuthi ithimba elisungulelwe ukuphenya leli cala lizosebenza ngokuzikhandla ukuthola abasolwa abenze lokhu.Yize kuboshwe abasolwa ababili, amaphoyisa aveze ukuthi imoto yalo mndeni eyadunwa ayikatholakali kanti uphenyo luyaqhubeka nokungenzeka kuboshwe abanye abasolwa.

KUBOSHWE abaganene emva kokutholakala kwesidumbu seshende lenkosikazi sidindilize esikhotheni, sinamanxeba okugwazwa KwaNdelu, eMthwalume, ngeSonto. Ngokuthola kweSolezwe, isidumbu sikaMkhohliswa Duma (52), obedume ngoMabhilidi, kuthiwa sitholwe ngumuntu ozithele phezu kwaso eduze kwendlela edlula ngaphandle komuzi wabasolwa ngoMsombuluko.Kuthiwa amaphoyisa abashaqe ngokwehlukana abasolwa njengoba kuboshwe owesifazane (48) kuqala emva kokuvuma ukuthi nguye ombulele umufi.Kuthiwa aphinde abuya azolanda umyeni wakhe (85) njengoba kukholakala ukuthi umlekelele ngesikhathi enza umshophi.Nakuba umufi bese kuneminyaka ehlala kule ndawo, kuthiwa izihlobo zakhe azikaveli njengoba kuvela ukuthi ubehambe ehlala emizini yabantu lapho abebamba khona amatoho okukhelela abantu amanzi.Umthombo ocele ukungadalulwa uthe udaba lokubulawa kukamufi luwundabizekwayo endaweni.Ulandisa ngesigameko uthe: “NgeSonto umsolwa nomufi, abebephila ngokuhlale beziphuzele, bagcine ukubonwa belandelana eshibhini lendawo. Kuthiwa umsolwa wayelokhu etshela umufi ukuthi akangalokhu emlandela, ephethe ibhodlela lotshwala.”Uqhube wathi lona wesifazane wagcina ehamba nebhodlela lakhe, umufi waqhubeka wamlandela.“Asazi-ke ukuthi babangeni njengoba etholwe esebulewe ngoMsombuluko,” kusho umthombo odalule ukuthi emva kokutholwa kwesidumbu sikamufi, uma ebuzwa umsolwa ukuthi uphi umufi, waphendula ngelithi “ngimbulele”.Umthombo uveze ukuthi umsolwa njengoba ebeshendeza nomufi ubenaye umyeni kodwa ogugile.“Ungunkosikazi wesithathu wekhehla njengoba bashona ababili abangaphambi kwakhe. Ugana ikhehla nje vele selilidala, yena usangqabashiya,” kusho umthombo othe akekho obengayazi eyokushendeza kukamsolwa nomufi.Omunye umthombo wendawo uveze ukuthi umsolwa ubelala nomufi khona emzini wakhe lapho agane khona njengoba ebengenayo indawo yokuhlala eqondile (umufi).“Ubethi uma esemnyonyobisa kwakhe amgqokise iphinifa bese ethi kumyeni wakhe ngumngani wakhe ohlwelwe, ocela indawo yokulala uzohamba ekuseni, ikhehla lingaboni ukuthi ishende,” kusho umthombo.Uqhube wathi ngelinye ilanga wagcina ebabhadama kwenye indlu waze walishaya ishende.“Lokho akubayekisanga ukushendeza njengoba beqhubekile. Ngisho nezingane zekhehla, ezihlala eThekwini, ziyazi ngakho konke lokhu futhi zikubeka kucace ukuthi azimfuni umsolwa,” kusho umthombo.Ikhansela lendawo, uMnuz Mngoma (igama lakhe elingatholakalanga) lithe libikelwe ngodaba olushaqisayo kodwa belingakayi endaweini ukuyothola imininingwane.“Ngithintiwe ngemikhuba yalo mama obengaziphethe kahle. Kodwa angikwazi ukuphawula kakhulu ngingakayi khona ukuyothola ulwazi olugcwele,” kusho uMngoma othe uzoya namuhla kule ndawo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa aseMsinsini abophe abasolwa ababili, oneminyaka engu-48 nonengu-85.“Ukuboshwa kwabo kulandela isigameko lapho kutholwe khona owesilisa (52) esikhotheni eMlamula ebulewe. Ubenenqwaba yezingozi ekhanda,” kusho uNetshiunda.Uthe abasolwa bekulindeleke ukuthi bavele eNkantolo yeMantshi yasoThuthwini izolo.

KUVULWE amacala angu-130 ngezinsuku ezintathu zokuvota lapho kuboshwe khona abantu abangu-90 babekwa amacala ehlukene.Lokhu kudalulwe uKhomishana wamaPhoyisa, uGeneral Fannie Masemola esithangamini nabezindaba sophiko lwezokuphepha iNational Joint Operational and Intelligence Structure (NatJoints) ngeSonto ntambamaUMasemola uthe izigameko eziningi zibikwe e-Eastern Cape, KwaZulu-Natal naseMpumalanga.Uqhube wathi linye icala lokubulala elibikwe eWartburg, eKZN.“Ngosuku lokuqala lokuvota okuyisipesheli kubikwe amacala angu-26 kwaboshwa abantu abangu-24. Ngolwesibili kubikwe amacala angu-17, kwaboshwa abayisishiyagalolunye,” kusho uMasemola.Uqhube wathi ngosuku lokuvota, ngoLwesithathu kubikwe amacala angu-37, kwavalelwa abantu abangu-57.UMasimola uthe iningi lababoshiwe lidedelwe ngebheyili kodwa abangu-22 basagcinwe ezitokisini.Lolu phiko luthe lwanelisekile ngezokuphepha nokugcinwa komthetho ngesikhathi sokhetho.

Umkhuzi wamaphoyisa eNothern Cape, uLieutenant General Koliswa Otola, ukushayele ihlombe ukuboshwa kwabantu abayisishiyagalombili baseNigeria abasolwa ngokuhlasela amaphoyisa futhi balimaza nezimoto zawo.Amaphoyisa abelandela umkhondo ngomunye wabo osolwa ngokuba nezidakamizwa ngesikhathi kwenzeka isigameko ngoLwesine.Ngesikhathi amaphoyisa esesha, ahlaselwe yiqulu labaseNigeria. Agcine esedubula ngezinhlamvu zenjoloba ukuzama ukubahlakaza.“Omunye wabasolwa uboshelwe icala lokutholakala nezidakamizwa ezingavumelekile, abathathu baboshelwe ukudala udlame emphakathini, bagcinwe esiteshini samaphoyisa eKimberley,” kusho isitatimende samaphoyisa.Kuthiwa ngesikhathi kusalandelwa imigudu yokuboshwa kwabo, abasolwa babulale amawindi esiteshini base bengezelwa amacala okulimaza impahla.Kuphinde kwatheleka elinye iqulu esiteshini lasabisa ngokuziphindislela.Kuthiwa amaphoyisa abaxwayise ngokuthi kumele bahlakazeke nokuyilapho belimaze khona izimoto zawo, kwabashowa abanye abane.U-Lieutenant General Otola usigxekile lesi senzo wathi abaphazamisa ukusebenza kwamaphoyisa, bazobhekana nengalo yomthetho.“Ngeke sikwamukele lokhu futhi sisahlola abasolwa ngokusebenzisana neHome Affairs ukuthola ukuthi basezweni ngokusemthethweni yini,” kusho uLt Gen   Otola

AKHALELWE ngamasongo kaSigonyela amadoda okusolakala ukuthi ayimigulukudu ebikade isibhubhisile ekugqekezeni nasekujamiseni ama-signal ezimoto eThekwini.Lawa madoda kulindeleke ukuthi avele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini.Kubikwa ukuthi eyodwa yawo ibanjwe oqotsheni ngamaphoyisa ngesikhathi igqekeza imoto eSydenham, eThekwini ngoLwesihlanu.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLieutenant Colonel Nqobile Gwala uthe ngoLwesihlanu ngamadina amaphoyisa aqaphele imoto iHaval enombala obomvu ebikade isolisa.Uqhube wathi lemoto beyikade inezinombolo okungezona ezayo futhi beyipakwe eduzane kwendlu yesonto.“Amaphoyisa abelokhu eyibeke iso lemoto. Kube sekwehla kuyona owesilisa oqonde emotweni iToyota Etios empunga ebikade ipakwe eduzane kweHaval. Le ndoda izame ukuvula lemoto isebenzisa ukhiye wokuzakhela,” kulandisa uLt Col Gwala.Uqhube wathi le ndoda ivulile yangena ngaphakathi emotweni iToyota kwathi ngesikhathi isakwaqazisa, isizama ukuyidumisa iyebe, yavele yathelekelwa amaphoyisa ayibamba.Kuvela ukuthi le ndoda ibe isiqhutshwa ibuyiselwa emotweni iHaval ebiyehle kuyona kwaficwa ngaphakathi amadoda amabili ezihlalele.“Amaphoyisa ayiseshile iHaval. Lawa madoda atholakale nezinto eziningi ezisetshenziswayo uma kugqekezwa noma kujanyiswa i-signal yemoto. Abe eseboshwa womathathu abekwa icala lokuzama ukuduna imoto nelokutholakala nezinto zokuyigqekeza,” kusho uLt Col Gwala.

BAKHALELWE amasongo kaSigonyela abantu abathathu okusolwa ukuthi basabise owesifazane bemphoqa ukuthi avotele liphi iqembu lezepolitiki.Abasolwa abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-48 no-55 kulindeleke ukuthi bavele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseRitavi ngoLwesine.Amaphoyisa athi ngoLwesibili babikelwe owesifazane okuthiwa ufike esikhungweni sokuvota esikoleni iXibukulwana Secondary, eRunnymede, eyovota.Kusolakala ukuthi kuqhamuke abesifazane ababili nowesilisa abambuze ukuthi uzovotela yiphi inhlangano yepolitiki.Kubikwa ukuthi lo wesifazane ube esebatshela ukuthi ivoti lomuntu liyimfihlo.Kusolwa ukuthi laba abathathu bavele bamsabisa bamyalela ukuthi avotele liphi iqembu ngoba uma engakwenzi lokho, uzobe ebeka impilo yakhe engcupheni.Okhulumela amaphoyisa eLimpopo, uBrigadier Hlumani Mashaba, uthe umgilwa ube esebika udaba lwakhe kubasebenzi bekhomishini yokhetho i-IEC, ababe sebebikela amaphoyisa.UMkhuzi wamaPhoyisa eLimpopo, uLieutenant General Thembi Hadebe, uthe ukuboshwa kwalaba abathathu kungeminye yemizamo yabo yokulwa nodlame nokuqinisa ezokuphepha ngalesi sikhathi sokhetho.

Amaphoyisa aKwaZulu-Natal abophe abasolwa abayisikhombisa eKombe, phakathi kweNkandla naseMsinga, ngezinsolo zokutholakala nezibhamu okukhona kuzo ama-AK47 nezinhlamvu okungekho emthwethweni ngoMsombuluko ekuseni.La madoda, aneminyaka ephakathi kuka-27 no-75, aboshwe ngemuva kokuthi amaphoyisa elunywe indlebe ngawo.Amaphoyisa athe kungenzeka ukuthi kunomuntu osindile obezobulawa yila madoda njengoba eboshiwe nje.“Abayisithupha baboshwe ngemuva kokutholakala ne-AK47, i-308 yokuzingela nezibhamu ezincane ezintathu zonke ebezinezinhlamvu,” kusho amaphoyisa esitatimendeni.Athe umkhankaso wawo udlulele kwenye indawo lapho kuboshwe khona umsolwa oyedwa otholakale nezibhamu ezingekho emthethweni.“Ngesikhathi efika kule ndawo owesilisa oyedwa uboshwe ngemuva kokutholakala ne-AK47 ne-.38 special revolver nezinhlamvu. Bonke abasolwa bagcinwe esiteshini saseMuden futhi bazovela eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseGreytown maduze,” kusho amaphoyisa.

KUBOSHWE amadoda amabili akade engaphandle ngoshwele onikezwa iziboshwa njengoba ayekade etholwe enecala lokubulala isaguga oThongathi, eThekwini.Abasolwa kulindeleke ukuthi bavele enkantolo namuhla ngamacala amahlanu ababekwe wona.Kubikwa ukuthi ngoLwesithathu, amaphoyisa abizelwe emzini osepulazini iWaterfall ebekade ugqekeziwe kwebiwa. Umnikazi wawo oneminyaka engu-69 nemoto yakhe bengabonwa nangalukhalo.Kuthiwa amaphoyisa esevula idokodo ngokulahleka komuntu kanye namacala okungelokugqekeza nelokweba.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe ngoMgqibelo, uphenyo lwamaphoyisa aseMhlali luholele ekuboshweni kukamsolwa esitolo esidayisa ukudla.“Utholwe nesibhamu nezinhlamvu okungokwendoda ebikwe ukuthi ilahlekile. Uphenyo luholele ekuboshweni kukamsolwa wesibili otholwe nemoto nezimpahla okusolakala ukuthi zebiwe ngesikhathi kugqekezwa,” kusho uNetshiunda.Kuvela ukuthi uphenyo olunzulu lwamaphoyisa luwaholele epulazini lamoba eWaterfall, lapho kutholakale khona isidumbu sesaguga obekubikwe ukuthi silahlekile.Isidumbu besikade sisongwe ngoplastiki abamnyama saboshwa ngezintambo salahlwa ekujuleni kwesimoba.UNetshiunda uthe abasolwa babe sebebekwa amacala, okungelokubulala, elokugqekeza nokweba, elokuphatha isibhamu nezinhlamvu ngokungemthetho okusolakala ukuthi kwebiwe kulo muzi.“Uphenyo kwesikhashana wamaphoyisa luvundulule ukuthi abasolwa bebekade bengaphandle ngoshwele onikezwa iziboshwa,” kusho uNetshiunda.Ngokusho kwenkampani yonogada iReaction Unit South Africa (Rusa) esitatimendeni, umufi ubekade enamasonto amabili agcina ukubonakala ephila.Okhulumela iRusa, uMnuz Prem Balram, uthe babikelwe ngamalungu omndeni kamufi ukuthi bagcina ukumbona ephila ngesikhathi beze kwakhe emgubheni wosuku lwakhe lokuzalwa.

BABHADLE ezitokisini abesifazane ababoshelwe amacala okukhipha imiphefumulo yabesilisa ezigamekweni ezimbili ezehlukene ezenzeke eMandeni, emasontweni amabili elandelana.Esigamekweni sakamuva esenzeke izolo, kuboshwe owesifazane oneminyaka ewu-30 ngecala lokubulawa kukaMnuz Ayanda Ngobese waKwaSithebe, khona eMandeni, okuthiwa ugwaziwe. Kuthiwa uNgobese nomsolwa bangabangani kanti bebezihlalele bephuza kwenye indawo yokucima ukoma elokishini e-Chappies, ngesikhathi kuqubuka ingxabano phakathi kabo. Kuthiwa umsolwa ukhiphe ummese wamgwaza, ngaphambi kokuthi anyamalale, kanti umgilwa uphelele emtholampilo. Umsolwa ubeseboshwa amaphoyisa izolo, kanti kulindeleke ukuthi avele enkantolo namhlanje.Kwesinye isigameko esenzeke ngesonto eledlule, uMnuz Siyanda Mpanza (35) ongowokudabuka eMangethe, okuthiwa ubeqashe nentombi yakhe uNksz Samkelisiwe Bhengu KwaSithebe, kusolwa ukuthi babe nengxabano eholele ekutheni imgence ngegeja, washona emva kwesikhashana engeniswe emtholampilo.Umfowabo kamufi uMnuz Siphamandla Mpanza elandisa Isolezwe, uthe umfowabo ubehlala nentombi yakhe beqashe KwaSithebe, ngenxa yamatoho kanti iwumuntu owaziwayo nakubo njengoba besekunesikhathi bathandana.“Umastende uthe uzwe kunomsindo obekukhombisa ukuthi bayaxabana okuthe emva kwesikhathi kwathula. Kukholakala ukuthi umsolwa umgence ngegeja ebelikhona endlini, kanti eqeda ukwenza lokho, uphumile endlini wamkhiyela waze wabuya ngezintatha ngakusasa kulokho bexabane kuqala ukuhwalala,” usho kanje.Uthe umastende uvukile waphoqa umsolwa ukuthi avule endlini ngoba uzwile ukuthi bebexabana, okuthe uma bevula umfowabo ubesevele kade eqalile ukopha emva kokugencwa, kanti ushonele emtholampilo eSundumbili.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi amaphoyisa aseSundumbili aphenya amacala okubulala nokuthi abasolwa baboshiwe. Uveze ukuthi uNksz Bhengu uvelile ngesonto eledlule njengoba kulindeleke ukuthi aphinde avele kuleli sonto.

KULINDELEKE ukuthi avele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMtshezi maduze ngecala lokubulawa kobengumsolwa, amaphoyisa amabili aboshwe ngoLwesibili.Kuthiwa umgilwa oneminyaka ewu-29 obengumsolwa ecaleni elithile kubikwe ukuthi udukile ngoLwesibili emva kokuthi ebonakale ethathwa amaphoyisa enkabeni yedolobha eMtshezi, okuthe ngokuhamba kwesikhathi kwatholakala isidumbu sakhe.Okhulumela uphiko olubhekelele ukuziphatha kwamaphoyisa, i-Independent Police Investigative Directorate (Ipid) uMnuz Phaladi Shuping, uthe abaphenyi abangaphansi kwalo luphiko banikele endaweni yesigameko lapho kutholwe khona isidumbu sikamsolwa baqhuba uphenyo lwabo olunzulu.“Lo luphiko luthole umbiko othi amaphoyisa amathathu aseMtshezi abelandela umkhondo ngomsolwa okuthe ngokuhamba kwesikhathi watholwa ebulewe. Kuboshwe amabili, elisebenzela esiteshini saseWembezi nelisebenzela eMabhanoyini,” usho kanje.Uthe uphenyo lwe-Ipid luholele ekutheni kuhlonzwe abasolwa, zabakhalela.

Likhalelewe amasongo kaSigonyela, ikhansela le-IFP kuMasipala waseNdumeni, okuthiwa libanjwe oqotsheni nezinkomo okukholakala ukuthi zintshonthwe epulazini lomlimi oseDannhauser.Umsolwa okuthiwa ubuye abewumfundisi ebandleni lamazayoni (igama lakhe eligodliwe aze avele enkantolo), kuthiwa uboshwe nomunye abebehamba naye izolo, kanti kulindeleke ukuthi bavele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseDundee namhlanje.Okhulumela amaphoyisa esifundeni Umzinyathi, uConstable Siyabonga Nkwanyana, uthe kuboshwe amadoda amabili aneminyaka ephakathi kwengu-41 no-52 okulundeleke ukuthi avele enkantolo maduze.“Abasolwa baboshelwe ukutholakala nezinkomo okusolwa ukuthi zebiwe, kanti amaphoyisa ababophe endaweni yaKwaSithole, ngeSonto. Bebehamba ngemoto eyiveni ebidonsa inqola, emgwaqweni u-R33 ngesikhathi iphoyisa ebelisemsebenzini liqaphela ukuthi kunezinkomo ezine phakathi enqoleni.   Liqonde emotweni ukuhlola amaphepha agunyaza ukuthuthwa kwemfuyo, lathola ukuthi kunokusolisayo, imininingwane ayibhaliwe ngendlela okudingeka ngayo,” kusho uNkwanyana.Uthe abasolwa bahlulekile ukunikeza amaphoyisa incazelo eqondile ekutheni izinkomo bazithathe kuphi nokuthi bebezihambisa kuphi. Uphiko lwamaphoyisa olulwa nokuntshontshwa kwemfuyo eGlencoe kuthiwa liqale ophenyo, umnikazi wezinkomo kwatholakala ukuthi ngowaseDannhauser, izinkomo zabuyiselwa kuye.

SIZOLALELWA ngoMsombuluko eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMbumbulu, isicelo sebheyili sekhehla, okuthiwa libanjwe oqotsheni ngunogada wesikole livalele izelamani zamantombazane ezincane, okuthiwa lizibhudubeze zidlula ngakwakhe ziya esikoleni.UMnuz Philo Walton Mbambo (64) wase-Adams Mission, eThekwini, okuvele ukuthi uyinhlalisuthi kwelinye lamabandla, uvele kule nkantolo ngoMsombuluko, emva kokuthi eboshwe ngesonto eledlule ngecala  lokunukubeza ngokocansi abagilwa  abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-12 no-14.
