Kuthiwa abagilwa bafunda kwesinye sezikole ezikhona endaweni, ubebavimba uma bedlula ngakwakhe beya esikoleni.Bese kungokwesibili umsolwa evela kule nkantolo, kanti inqume ukulihlehlisela uMsombuluko icala abhenekene nalo ngenxa yokuthi amaphoyisa asazoyoqinisekisa ikheli lakhe.Unina wabagilwa elandiswa Isolezwe ngokwenzeka, uthe umsolwa usebenzise ukuthi wakhe eduze kwendlela lapho edlulela esikoleni.“Bengingakaze ngimbone, ngiqale ukuzwa nje sengibizwa esikoleni sezingane, kuthiwa angiphuthume. Angihlali nezingane ngibamba amatoho, zihlala noninakhulu.  Ngesikhathi kufika isigijimi sithi ngifunwa esikoleni, ngenhlanhla ngangingasebenzi ngalolo suku, ngisekhaya,” usho kanje.Uthe elandiswa, umsolwa ubonwe wumakhelwane oqaphele ukuthi uvalele izingane zamantombazane njengoba bese kunesikhathi zingenile endlini.Kuthiwa umakhelwane kamsolwa uphuthume esikoleni wayobika, nebala unogada wesikole uzithele kumsolwa ebophe umgilwa izandla nezinyawo, okuvele ukuthi ubeseqedile ukunukubeza omncane esehlela ukudlulela komunye.Uthe izingane ziveze ukuthi ubengaqali, bese kungokwesithathu, omncane selokhu emqale ngonyaka odlule kanti omdala ubesemnukubeza okwesibili. Kuthiwa ubethi  abasome, abangcolise emathangeni, kwesinye isikhathi ebaphoqe bavume ashutheke isitho sakhe sangasese endaweni yokuzikhulula. Kuthiwa abagilwa ubeqale abaphoqe ukuthi babuke i-video yocansi ngaphambi kokuthi agile umkhubaUnina wabagilwa uthe emva kokuthi umsolwa ebanjiwe ngesikhathi engakaboshwa, ufikile kubo kwabagilwa okuvela ukuthi akekho umuntu wesilisa ohlala khona, wathi abangayilaleli into eshiwo esikoleni. Kuthiwa uthe bavele othisha bayamzonda kodwa bamphebeza ngoba nodokotela wayeseqinisekisile ukuthi izingane zinukubeziwe.

UKUFAKWA kwamakhamera anele, ukulawula izikhathi zokusebenza kwamabhizinisi amancane nokuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu abahlala emabhilidini aseThekwini bakuwo ngokusemthethweni, kungalekelela ekwehliseni izigameko zobugebengu ezibatshazwayo ePhoyinti, edume ngokuhlala abantu bokufika.Lokhu kuvele enkulumweni kaKhomishana wamaPhoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLieutenant General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi, ngesikhathi ekhuluma nabezindaba kuqhubeka umkhankaso wamaphoyisa neminyango kahulumeni wokukhuculula emabhilidini. Kulo mkhankaso amaphoyisa abehambisana noMnyango wezaseKhaya nowezoBulungiswa. Kuthe ngoLwesibili bagasela kungazelelwe emabhilidini ayisithupha asePhoyinti, kwaboshwa abangu-123 bokufika abahlala kuwo benganazimvume zokubakuleli.Kuvundulululwe izidakamizwa nemali engumbombayi engamadola aseMelika, elinginiswa no- R4,1 million wemali yakuleli.UMkhwanazi uthe umasipala kumele uqinise kakhulu kweminye imithetho, njengokubeka isikhathi esiqondile sokuvalwa kwamabhizinisi njengoba ethe kukhona asebenze ubusuku bonke kungekho sizathu esiqinile sokwenze njalo. Ubale kuwo izindawo zokucwala izinwele nezitolo zokudla ezincane, athe izigilamkhuba zicasha ngakho uma ziphusha umshikashika wazo esithe.“Inkinga yethu enkulu njengamaphoyisa, kunamabhilidi anganakiwe othola ukuthi abanikazi bawashiya phansi, athathwa ngokungekho emthethweni ngabathile. Bahlukaniselana ngawo baqashise, ngakho kukhona abahlala khona abakhokhiswa imali yokuqasha ngendlela engaqondile,” usho kanjeUthe ukwengeza amakhamera ukuqinisekisa ukuthi yonke into eyenziwa edolobheni iyaqopheka, kungenza kube lula ukulwa nobugebengu.Uthe abanye kutholakala ukuthi endaweni okurenta kuyo abantu enemibhede emibili, kuhlala abangu-20. Abantu bayashintshana, abanye balala ebusuku abanye balale emini, okwenza naphakathi kwamabili uthole kunabantu abehla benyuka emgwaqweni ungazi ukuthi benzani, okuphazamisa kakhulu izivakashi.Emabhilidini okugaselwe kuwo kutholwe ukuthi elinye yibhilidi likamasipala kanti kunothile okhokhisa i-renti kulo ngokungemthetho, othathwe amaphoyisa wayophoswa imibuzo. Kulo mkhankaso kuphinde kwavundululwa izinhlamvu ezingu-117 zezibhamu ezehlukene, kanti kunqanyulwe ukuphakelwa kwamanzi nogesi emabhilidini amabili okukholakala ukuthi kungenwe kuwo ngokungemthetho.Yize kunezinsolo ezibeka kabi amaphoyisa esiteshini samaphoyisa esisePhoyinti zokusebenzisana nezigebengu, kodwa uMkhwanazi ugcizelele ukuthi amaphoyisa  asebenza ngokuzikhandla ukulwa nabo nakuba ekhona amazambane abolile. Uveze ukuthi yinqwaba yamaphoyisa kulesi siteshi aseboshiwe ngenxa yalezi zinsolo.UNdunankulu wesifundazwe, uMnuz Thami Ntuli neMeya kuMasipala weTheku uMnuz Cyril Xaba, bebengabanye abebehola lo mkhankaso.UNtuli uthe imikhankaso enjengalena izoqhubeka, kanti akuwona nje kuphela amabhillidi okungenwe kuwo ngokungemthetho aseThekwini okugaselwa kuwo, kodwa nakwezinye izindawo.

UKHOMISHANA wamaPhoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt Col Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi uthi azoboshwa amaphoyisa aphula umthetho ngoba akekho umuntu ongaphezu komthetho.Usho lokhu emuva kokuboshwa kwephoyisa elisebenza esiteshini saseMpumalanga, eHammarsdale elibhekene necala lokushaya ngenhloso yokulimaza intombi yalo.Lesi sigameko kuthiwa senzeke emgwaqweni uMthoko Mkhize ngeSonto.Intombi yaleli phoyisa, uNksz Thandeka P Ngcongo inikele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana yabhala ukuthi amaphoyisa esiteshi iMpumalanga, eHammarsdale anqabile ukuyivulela icala uma iveza ukuthi ishaywe yiphoyisa elisebenza kulesi siteshi.Lona wesifazane izolo ukuqinisekisile ukuthi likhona icala elivuliwe ngalesi sigameko.Izolo ntambama amaphoyisa aqinisekise ukuthi nalo wesifazane ugcine eboshiwe ngecala lokushaya nokucekela phansi impahla emuva kokuthi iphoyisa nalo livule icala. Ngokwamaphoyisa,  lo wesifazane ulishayile walimaza isicabha semoto yalo. Kuvela ukuthi bobabili bebedle amanzi amponjwana. Lusaqhubeka uphenyo. ULt-Gen Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi uthe akekho umuntu ongaphezu komthetho, ngisho namaphoyisa. Leli phoyisa lizovela enkantolo ngoLwesine.Uveze ukuthi seluqalile nophenyo ngezinsolo zokuthi kunamaphoyisa anqabile ukuvulela owesifazane icala ngesikhathi ezobika ngokushaywa kwakhe esiteshini samaphoyisa.Uma kukhona okubambekayo ngalezi zinsolo, uMkhwanazi uthe kuzoqala izinhlelo zokuqondisa ubugwegwe, ezizolandela imigomo yokusebenza kwamaphoyisa.Uthe amaphoyisa alusukumela phezulu udaba lodlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane elandela umthetho iDomestic Violence Act. Udonse ngendlebe amaphoyisa ukuthi abe yisibonelo esihle.“Abesifazane nezingane kufanele bazizwe bephephile uma kukhona amadoda, kufanele bazibone bephephe kakhulu uma kukhona amaphoyisa noma ngabe engasebenzi.“Amaphoyisa kufanele abe yisibonelo esihle, alwa nalo lonke uhlobo lobugebengu olubhekiswe kwabesifazane nezingane.“Uma amaphoyisa enza noma ngabe yiluphi uhlobo lobugebengu, sizokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi abhekana nomthetho,” kusho Lt-Gen Mkhwanazi.Khonamanjalo uNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nonhlanhla Khoza uzwakalise ukushaqeka ngezigameko zokuhlaselwa kwabesifazane ezithinta amaphoyisa.Uzigxekile lezi zigameko esho nokuthi kumphethe kabi ukuthi amaphoyisa okufanele avikele abantu, yiwona anodlame.Ube esedlulisa amazwi enduduzo emndenini wephoyisa lesifazane likaMasipala weTheku eligwazwe labulawa ngobeyisoka lalo naye obeyiphoyisa likamasipala.Ubuye wagxeka ukushaywa kanzima kukaNksz Ngcobo wathi amaphoyisa kufanele awaphenye kabanzi lamacala athinta amaphoyisa noma ngabe enziwe wozakwabo.Uveze ukuthi sebekhiphe ithimba losonhlalakahle elizosiza imindeni ethintekayo.“Kusiphethe kabi ukuthi amaphoyisa enze lezi zigameko. Njengoba sekukhona ababoshiwe sikholwa ukuthi umthetho uzothatha indawo yawo. Sifuna izinkantolo zenze isibonelo ngabenzi balobu bugebengu obubi. Kufanele kucace ukuthi akekho ongaphezu komthetho,“ kusho uNkk Khoza.

KUBOSHWE amadoda amabili enye yawo ebikade ingaphandle ngoshwele onikezwa iziboshwa ngecala lokudlwengulwa kubulawe intombazane ebiwumfundi kaGrade 11.Abasolwa ababili baboshwe ngokwehlukana eMalukazi naKwaShembe, eClermont.Isidumbu sikaWandile Aphiwe Ngcobo, obefunda eDurban Girls Secondary, satholakala sinamanxena okugwazwa emzimbeni siboshwe izandla futhi sivalwe umlomo nge-pentihose kubo eMlaza ngoLwesibili ngoMeyi 28 nonyaka.Kwebiwa iTV ne remote, idecoder neselula kamufi okusolakala ukuthi waqale wadlwengulwa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, Brigadier Jay Naicker uthe abasolwa baneminyaka engu-25 nengu-39.UNaicker uthe abaphenyi basebenze ubusuku nemini beqoqa ubufakazi.“Uphenyo luholele ekuboshweni komsola oneminyaka ewu-25 otholakale nefoni kamufi ngoMgqibelo eMalukazi. Kuphinde kwaboshwa umsolwa oneminyaka ewu-39 ngesikabhadakazi ngeSonto KwaShembe, eClermont. Ubekwe icala lokudlwengula nelokubulala. Lo msolwa ubengaphandle ngoshwele onikezwa iziboshwa,” kusho uNaicker.Uthe abasolwa kulindeleke ukuthi bavele enkantolo maduze.

Kulindeleke ukuthi avele eNkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini namuhla ngoLwesihlanu umsolwa oboshelwe ukudayisa upharafini ngokungemthetho eSiphingo ngoLwesine.Umsolwa, oneminyaka engu-55, uboshwe woKlebe ngokudayisa ngaphandle kwemvume.Okhulumela oKlebe uLieutenant Colonel Simphiwe Mhlongo, uthe bathole ulwazi ngokwenziwa wumsolwa base benikela lapho esebenzela khona.“Ngesikhathi befika bafice amaloli amabili ediliza upharafini. Umnikazi wendawo utshele amalungu ethu ukuthi uqale ibhizinisi  ngonyaka odlule,” kusho uMhlongo.Uthe wahlawuliswa u-R10 000 ngokusebenzisa indawo engenaso isitifiketi sobungozi nokugcina impahla enobungozi ngaphandle kwemvume. Umshayeli uhlawuliswe uR5 000 wokuthulula ngaphandle kwemvume.“Umnikazi webhizinisi uboshelwe ukudayisa ngaphandle kwemvume.”

ULALE ebaliwe umlisa osolwa ngokubulala ngesihluku ibhungu lasesigodini saKwaShange, eSpringvale, eXobho. Umsolwa ushaqwe ngamaphoyisa asesiteshini saseHighflats izolo emini emuva kokusoleka ekubulaweni kukaMnuz Nkanyiso Mhlongo-Latha ngalolu suku. Ngokusho kukayise omncane kamufi, uMnuz Sthembiso Latha, umsolwa uqhutshwe ngamaphoyisa wayowakhombisa lapho abulalele khona indodana yomfowabo.ULatha uthe umufi uhlaselwe ngezithuba zabo-5 kuya ku-6 ntambama ngeSonto. “Sengathi ubekomunye umuzi wakwaZuma obekunetiyana khona lapha endaweni yangakithi eSpringvale. Usuke khona ngabo-4 ntambama ewumuntu ozowela emfuleni aye entombini yakhe. Akabange esawela-ke lapho ezansi.” Uthe ube esehlaselwa wumuntu thizeni. “Akwazeki noma lo muntu uqhamuke ngemuva noma baficane lapho kodwa mina ngimfice enezingozi ngemuva. Emklabhile, wamgenca. Wamnquma intamo, wabe esemhlahlela nasesifubeni. Uthulele lapho.” ULatha uthe yena umfice ngezintathakusa ngabo-2 ngoMsombuluko eseshonile.Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kwamaphoyisa aKwaZulu-Natal ayiphumelelanga kwaze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela.

BADIDEKILE kuboshwa oshelwe wumuzi esayoncenga inkosikazi akade exabane naye yagoduka, ukuba ibuye ekhaya eNtaphuka, eNdwedwe.Omakhelwane bendoda (54) eboshwe emuva kokushelwa wumuzi, bathi kuyadida ukuboshwa kwayo emuva kokwehlelwa wumshophi wokushelwa yisithabathaba somuzi.Kuthiwa umuzi wayo ushe ebusuku bangoMsombuluko emuva kokuthi ishiye ikhandlela likhanya yayoncenga unkosikazi ohambe waya kubo emuva kwengxabano.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi kuye kwaba nokuhilizisana ngamazwi phakathi kwendoda nenkosikazi yayo ngesikhathi indoda ivakashelwe ngumngani obephethe utshwala ngenhloso yokuthi babuphuzele emzini wale ndoda.Kuthiwa inkosikazi iye yacela ukuthi utshwala buyophuzelwa kubo kwendoda, hhayi emzini wabo njengoba ingumuntu osontayo.Indoda inqabile yahlala kwayo nomngani baphuza utshwala yagcina ihilizisana nomkayo.Kuthiwa ibe isimphelezela umngani sebeqedile ukuphuza yathi uma ibuya ingxabano yaqhubekela phambili.UMnuz Zibonele Ngcobo wenhlangano esiza umphakathi iNdwedwe Development Commitee, uthe bathole ukuthi emuva kwengxabano unkosikazi uye washiya umuzi wakhe wabuyela kubo, okungekho kude kakhulu nomuzi wayo.Indoda kuthe sekwehle ulaka yamlandela, yashiya ikhandlela likhanya njengoba bese kumnyama ngenhloso yokuyoncenga umkayo ukuba abuye."Ibuye umuzi ususha kungasekho ukuthi ingangena egumbini obekushiywe kulo ikhandlela izame ukucisha. Ngiyile nami ngiyohlola isimo ngathola ukuthi kusele urawondi kuphela isithabathaba somuzi sishile. Ngesikhathi ngiya khona ngifice kunenkonzo nomama womuzi angikwazanga ukukhuluma naye ngoba ubelethelwe umkhuleko kulo rawondi osele," kuchaza uNgcobo.Uthe baxakekile uma sekuboshwa umnumzane wekhaya ngoba abazi nokuthi icala livulwe nini nokuthi livulwe wubani.Ucele usizo kumasipala nakubo bonke abantu baKwaZulu-Natal ukuze kusize umndeni oshelwe. Uveze ukuthi usele nokugqokile, kushe omazisi nezincwadi zendodana yakhona efunda u-matric.UConstable Thenjiswa Ngcobo wamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uthe amaphoyisa aseNdwedwe aphenya icala lokucekela phansi umuzi emuva kwesigameko lapho kusolakala ukuthi indoda (54) ishise umuzi wayo eNtaphuka ngoJuni 24.Kulindeleke ukuba ivele enkantolo yeMantshi yaseNdwedwe namuhla (kusasa).

Kuboshwe owesilisa (33) ngezinsolo zokudlwengula indodakazi (15) yentombi yakhe phakathi kumaMashi noJuni 2023 eSpitspunt, eMarlerekeng, eLimpopo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa kulesiya sifundazwe uColonel Malesela Ledwaba esitatimendeni uthe, ngokolwazi abalutholile, umgilwa uze wagonyuluka ngalokhu kunina ngeSonto.Uthe kuze ngemuva kokuthi unina nesoka bebe nengxabano eshubile ngobudlelwano babo.“Kusolwa ukuthi umsolwa wanukubeza umgilwa kabili ngezinsuku ezahlukene. Isigameko sokuqala senzeka ngesikhathi unina eye ezitolo kwathi esesibili senzeka esemsebenzini. Ngemuva kokuthi umgilwa etshele unina, umsolwa ubalekile,” kusho uLedwaba.Uthe amaphoyisa abikelwe ngesigameko kwabe sekuvulwa icala lokudlwengula.NgoMsombuluko umsolwa ubanjwe ecashe eLefiso.Kulindeleke ukuthi avele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseSiyabuswa  ngoLwesine.

BASOBISHINI othisha besifazane ababili basesikoleni saseNanda, iMatabetulu Primary, ngenxa yezinsolo zokufihla udaba lokudlwengulwa komfundi wesifazane kaGrade 4 wakulesi sikole. Isolezwe lithole ngomthombo walo ongaphakathi kulesi sikole ukuthi uNkk Nonhlanhla Gumede noNksz Gugu Hlanguza bakhalelwe ngamasongo kaSigonyela emuva kokutholakala ukuthi bathula nodaba olungaka. Umthombo uhlebele leli phephandaba ukuthi umfundi (13), eligodliwe igama lakhe ukuvikela isithunzi sakhe, wabikela labo thisha ukuthi wadlwengulwa ngumlisa oyisihlobo sakhe futhi ogada kulesi sikole. Kuthiwa labo thisha kabazange basibika lesi sigameko kwiziphathimandla zesikole nasemaphoyiseni. Baqoma ukufela ngaphakathi okwebutho likaZulu. Okhulumela amaphoyisa aKwaZulu-Natal, uConstable Thenjiswa Ngcobo, ukuqinisekisile ukushaqwa ngamaphoyisa asesiteshini saseMtshebheni kukaNkk Gumede noNksz Hlanguza ngoLwesihlanu olwedlule."Amaphoyisa aseNanda abophe abesifazane ababili ngokwehluleka ukubika ngesehlakalo sokudlwengulwa kwengane. Kusolwa ukuthi intombazane eneminyaka ewu-13 yabikela othisha ukuthi inukubezwe wuninalume wayo kodwa othisha bangalubika lolu daba emaphoyiseni. Idokodo libe seludluliselwa ophikweni lwamaphoyisa aseNanda olulwa nodlame lomndeni, ukuvikelwa kwezingane nezigameko zokudlwengula ukuze luqhubeke nophenyo. Laba bantu besifazane baboshwe ngoJuni 14, 2024."UConstable Ngcobo uthe othisha bavele phambi kweNkantolo yeMantshi yaseNtuzuma ngoLwesithathu. "Icala lihlehliselwe u-Agasti 2, kulo nyaka," kuphetha uConstable Ngcobo.Ethintwa okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo kulesi sifundazwe, uMnuz Sihle Mlotshwa, uthe bayaleshwama lolu daba. Yize kunjalo kodwa uthe sebeyalele umqondisi wezeMfundo esiFundeni sasePinetown ukuba abaphenyele kabanzi. “Siphatheke kabi futhi kusidinile ukuzwa izindaba ezibuhlungu kangaka. Sinethemba lokuthi umthetho uzodlala indima yawo,” kuphetha uMlotshwa.Isolezwe libuye lahabula ukuthi nomalume wengane naye ukhalelwe ngozankosi kanye nabo othisha.

ISAKHAMUZI saseNigeria siboshelwe ukutholakala nezidakamizwa ebizithusheke kuma-headphones esikhumulweni sezindiza i-OR Tambo, eGoli.Le ndoda okuthiwa idayisa izimpahla emgwaqweni iboshwe ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku ngesikhathi yehla endizeni ebikade isuka eSao Paulo, eBrazil izothatha enye ilibangise eNigeria.Lo mlisa waseNigeria kuthiwa wehle endizeni wahlangana nomsebenzi ohlanza le ndawo wanikeza yena lama-headphones asetshenziswa endizeni.Amaphoyisa asole ukuthi kukhona okushaya amanzi phakathi kwalaba bobabili asondela, aqaqa lama-headphones athola icocaine igxishwe phakathi.Kuthiwa lo msebenzi ukwazile ukuphunyuka kulesi sidididi wadla phansi njengoba ethungathwa amaphoyisa.Amaphoyisa athi umsolwa ungomunye wabantu abayisishiyagalolunye ababoshwe kulezi nyanga ezimbili betholwa nezidakamizwa ezingabiza ngaphezu kukaR13 million. Leli nani lifaka phakathi neCocaine engabiza uR12 million eshaqwe e-OR Tambo International Airport.UKhomishana wamaPhoyisa uGeneral Fannie Masemola uthe iNingizimu Afrika akuyona inkundla yokugcwaneka izigebengu.Ushayele ihlombe amaphoyisa abophe umsolwa wagcizelela ngokuthi izaphulamthetho zizobhekana kanzima nengalo yomthetho.

KUBOSHWE umholi we-ANC oqavile esifundeni iTheku okuthiwa uthathwe nabaqaphi bakhe ngezinsolo zokushayela budedengu nokutholwa nezibhamu ezingenazo izimvume. Lo mholi ongeke adalulwe okwamanje uboshwe ngoLwesithathu ebusuku.Lo mholi wesilisa unesikhundla esiqavile esigungwini sesifunda kodwa akajutshiwe esikhundleni sikahulumeni noma kumasipala. Ungumuntu osebenza ngokugcwele ehhovisi le-ANC esifundeni iTheku.Izingede zeSolezwe zithi lo mholi utholwe eshayela budedengu imoto engenazo nezinombolo. Kuthe uma eboshwa kwashaqwa nezibhamu kwaboshwa nabaqpahi bakhe ababili.Kuthiwa amaphoyisa oKlebe nawomkhandlu weTheku asebenze ngokubambisana ukubopha lo mholi. Kuthiwa uyiswe esiteshini samaphoyisa eDurban North nokuyiwona aphethe udaba lwakhe. Kuvele nokuthi ngesikhathi eboshwa kutholwe izishaqane zemali okungaqondakali ukuthi eyani.

UBEBUKEKA edidekile ngesikhathi evela eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseVredenburg owesifazane ongumsolwa wesine ecaleni lokuthumba nokudayiswa kwengane uJoshlin Smith (6).UNksz Lourencia Lombaard (32), obebukeka edangele,  uvele ngoMsombuluko ekuseni enkantolo.Lo wesifazane usolwa uMbuso ngokuba mdibi munye nabanye abasolwa abathathu okukhona nonina kaJoshlin ekunyamalaleni  kwalengane engakatholakali.Icala lihlehliselwe uMsombuluko ngesonto elizayo ukuze umsolwa afake isicelo sebheyili.UMbuso ukuveze zisuka amadaka wathi uzosiphikisa isicelo sokuba akhululwe ngebheyili uNksz Lombaard. Umsolwa ucele ukuba atolikelwe ngesiBhunu okukhulunywa enkantolo.UJoshlin unyamalale ngoFebhuwari ngakubo eSaldanha Bay eWestern Cape.Umphakathi waphuma inqina umthungatha kodwa wathola izimpahla ayezigqokile kuphela. Unina kaJoshlin nesoka lakhe bayibonga ibheyili kanti bazobuyela enkantolo ngoMeyi. Bekuthulekile ngaphandle kwasenkantolo, bengekho ababhikishi futhi kungahenqiwe ngocingo oluhlabayo.Bekunedlanzane labantu ebelikade liqhinqe ngaphandle kwenkantolo ligqoke izikibha ezinobuso bukaJoshlin.

Owesilisa ungene esigodlweni seNgonyama uMswati III kwaLozitha watshontsha ukudla wakudla.Ngokwemibiko yeSwaziland News, ngemuva kwesigameko kuthiwa kutshalwe amasosha namaphoyisa esigodlweni.Ngokomthombo weSwaziland News oyiphoyisa esidlweni, kutholakale ukuthi lona wesilisa ubesehlala esigodlweni cishe amasonto amabili engaziwa wumuntu.“Kunezindlu ezingahlali muntu esigodlweni ezinethelevishini, imibhede emihle nefenisha kanti njengoba isigodlo sisikhulu nje, le ndoda ibulale iwindi ukuze ihlale ngaphakathi endlini. Sithole ukuthi ebusuku ibiya ekhishini ithathe ukudla bese ikudlela endlini. Kwenzekile ukuthi enye yezingane ebilula izinyawo esigodlweni yabona ikhethini lithi nyaka,” kusho umthombo.Kuthiwa iphuthume yayobika kwabe sekujutshwa amaphoyisa washaqwa lona wesilisa wayiswa esiteshini samaphoyisa eMbabane.“Kodwa ngigcine ngizwa kuthiwa inkosi ithe akahlolwe ukuthi uyaphila yini ekhanda uma engaphili ayekwe.”Imibuzo ethunyelelwe okhulumela amaphoyisa uSenior Superintendent Phindile Vilakazi igcine ingaphendulwanga.Okhulumela iNgonyama uMswati uPercy Simelane, uthe akukho okubambekayo anakho ngesigameko kodwa wakuqinisekisa ukuthi kunezinkulumo endlunkulu ngokuthi isigameko senzekile.“Akukho okusemthethweni okukhona ngesigameko. Esinakho yimibiko engaqinisekisiwe esabalele. Kubukeka sengathi kunecala emaphoyisa esingeke sikhulume ngalo emphakathini okwamanje ngoba lithinta ezokuphepha,” ucashunwe kanje uSimelane.

IKHOMISHINI yezokhetho i-Independent Electoral Commission (IEC) isiqinisekise ukuboshwa kukakhomishana wayo, uDkt Nomsa Masuku (62). Ithe  ukuboshwa kwakhe akuhlangene nesikhundla nomsebezi awenzayo manje kwi-IEC. Uboshwe woKlebe wadedelwa ngebheyili ka-R20 000 ngoLwesihlanu. Uthweswe icala  elimayelana nezinsolo zenkohlakalo ka-R1.2 million esasebenza ebhange iStandard Bank.

UHOLE amaphoyisa nabekomiti elibhekele ubugebengu emphakathini ukuyokhomba ezinye izindawo aseke wagila kuzo umkhuba, umfundi (17) osolwa ngokuba umalugaju esigodini okuthiwa iseMakhoso, eMthwalume.Kuthiwa umsolwa uvume eyokucathamela izingane ezifunda ezikoleni zamabanga aphansi azidlwengule bese eyazibulala. Kulezi gameko kukhona nesengane eneminyaka eyisishiyagalombili, isidumbu sayo esatholwa silaxazwe ngasemfuleni sesonakele.Lo msolwa ofunda u-Grade 9 esikoleni esisendaweni, ubevele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMzumbe izolo, kulandela isigameko esenzeke ngoLwesithathu okuyisona esimdonsele amanzi ngomsele.Esigamekweni sangoLwesithathu, usolwa ngokuhlasela umfundi owenza u-Grade 1, ephuma esikoleni samabanga aphansi esikhona endaweni. Kusolwa ukuthi umhudulele esikhotheni wamhlubula umfaniswano wesikole abewugqokile nezimpahla zangaphansi wazama ukumdlwengula, ngaphambi kokuthi amgqeme ngetshe ekhanda amklinye, wamshiya ecabanga ukuthi ufile. Inkantolo ilihlehlisele uMsombuluko icala, njengoba kuthiwa emva kokuthi evelile, uhole amaphoyisa eyowakhombisa lapho kwabulawelwa khona uSinethemba Ngcece (8) owayefunda u-Grade 3 eMakhoso Primary. Isidumbu sikaSinethemba satholwa ngoSepthemba nyakenye ngabafana abebebhukuda, silahlwe emhlangeni ngasosebeni lomfula. Kwase kuphele amasonto amathathu edukile, kanti naye wayegcine ukubonakala ephuma esikoleni.Kuthiwa eboshwa umsolwa, emva kwesigameko esenzeke ngoLwesithathu sokuhlaselwa komfundi, uzivumele yena kumalungu omphakathi alandele umkhondo kungakapheli sikhathi kuhlatshwe umkhosi. Amalungu omphakathi ambhadame ezihlalele kubo.Uyise womgilwa elandisa Isolezwe Ngempelasonto, uthe indodakazi yakhe ihlwithwe wumsolwa sekubalwa amagxathu ingene ekhaya njengoba ubeyilandela eduze, udadewabo akazange abone lutho.“Umhudulele endaweni eyisikhotha wamenzakalisa. Ingane iphaphame emva kwesikhashana umsolwa esehambile, yangena kwamakhelwane yopha kanzima ekhanda ingakwazi nokuphefumula. Ibihlubule njengoba umsolwa ehambe nezingubo zayo. Bayiphelezelile bangena nayo ekhaya okuyilapho okuhlatshwe khona umkhosi kuthungathwa umsolwa. Ngibonga iNkosi nabakithi ukuthi ingane yami isindile,” kusho yena.Ukuqinisekisile ukuthi indodakazi yakhe iyelulama, wathi izoludinga usizo lokwelulekwa ngengqondo njengoba namanje isathuka izanya.UNkk Bongekile Sithole oyiPhini likaSihlalo wenhlangano engenzi nzuzo, i-Women of Mthwalume obehola umphakathi kulandelwa umkhondo womsolwa uthe: “Siphatheke kabi singamalungu omphakathi ngezehlo okubonakala zilokhu zanda.  Sisukumile namalungu esigungu abhekelele ukuphepha emphakathini salandela umkhondo. Sitholile ukuthi umsolwa ufunda esikoleni samabanga aphakeme esikhona endaweni nokuthi ubemisiwe esikoleni. “Amacala abekwe wona awokuzama ukubulala nokudlwengula kodwa sitholile ukuthi uvumile emaphoyiseni icala lokubulawa kukaSinethemba, wathi uzokuya kokhombisa amaphoyisa lapho agila khona lo mkhuba,” usho kanje.Amalungu omphakathi abegcwele ngaphandle kwenkantolo ngesikhathi evela, abengavunyelwe ukungena ngaphakathi.UMphathiswa woMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal uNksz Mbali Shinga usigxekile lesi senzo, waqinisekisa ukuthi umgilwa nomndeni bazohlinzekwa ngosizo lokwelulekwa ngokwengqondo.

KUBOSHWE uMfundisi (37) wabekwa icala lokudlwengula akhulelise intombazane eneminyaka engu-17 eZamdela, eFree State.Okhulumela amaphoyisa eFree State, uSergeant Josephine Rani, uthe osonhlalakahle baye ophikweni lwamaphoyisa oluphenya amacala athinta umndeni, ukuvikelwa kwezingane nawocansi babika ngalezi zinsolo.Laba basebenzi kuthiwa bafike batshela amaphoyisa ukuthi ingane ikhulelwe futhi kusolakala ukuthi yadlwengulwa ngumfundisi.“Amaphoyisa aye kolubikela unina wengane udaba, wabe eseya esiteshini samaphoyisa wayovulela umfundisi icala lokudlwengula,” kusho uSerg Rani.Kuthiwa ntombazane, esinezinyanga ezinhlanu izithwele, ilandise yathi kwakuwuMsombuluko, ngoJanuwari 1, 2024 ngo-8 ekuseni, ikubo kanti kuzofika umfundisi.Kubikwa ukuthi umfundisi waqale waba nengxoxo nenye intombazane emuva kwalokho wase ebiza umgilwa ukuba eze emotweni yakhe.“Kusolakala ukuthi umfundisi wafike washela umgilwa efuna abe intombi yakhe kodwa wenqaba. Waphuma emotweni wabaleka ebheke kubo kodwa umfundisi wamlandela wangena egunjini lokulala likanina kamgilwa, wase eyamdlwengula,” kusho uSerg Rani.Kusolakala ukuthi emuva kwale sigameko, umfundisi watshela umgilwa ukuthi angatsheli muntu ngokwenzekile. Kuthiwa wathi uma ehluleka ukuthula umgilwa ngeke amqashe unina nomalume wakhe.Umsolwa kulindeleke ukuthi avele ngoLwesine, eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseSasolburg.

IHEALTH Professions Council of South Africa (HPCSA) okuwumkhandlu olawula odokotela, usudonse ngendlebe abantu ukuba baqinisekise ukuthi baya kodokotela abanemvume yokusebenza.Lokhu kulandela ukuboshwa komsizi kadokotela wamazinyo obesebenza ngaphandle kwencwadi emgunyaza ukuba enze lo msebenzi eLonehill, eGoli.IHPCSA iveze ukuthi ngesikhathi ihlola izindawo okusebenza kuzo odokotela, ithole uNksz Dorothy Shunmugam obesebenza njengomsizi kadokotela wamazinyo yize engenayo imvume yokwenza lo msebenzi.IHPCSA iveze ukuthi incwadi yokusebenza kaNksz Shunmugam yasulwa ngo-2006 emuva kokuthi engayikhokhanga imali yokuyivuselela ekhokhwa kanye ngonyaka.UNksz  Shunmugam uboshiwe ngaphansi kwesigaba 17 se-Health Professions Act lapho ebhekene necala lokusebenza ngaphandle kwemvume.Esitatimendeni sabezindaba iHPCSA ithe uDkt Kow-Der Yeh ongudokotela wamazinyo onemvume yokusebenza eNingizimu Afrika kusukela ngo-2019, obeqashe uNksz Shunmugam usebikwe kwi-Medical and Dental Professions Board lapho ezobhekana necala lokuqasha umuntu ongenayo imvume yokusebenza.“Bonke odokotela kufanele babe nemvume yokusebenza ekhishwa yiHPCSA. Lokhu sikwenzela ukuvikela umphakathi. Kuyicala ukuqasha umuntu ongenayo imvume yokusebenza bese umvumela ukuba alaphe abantu. Umphakathi kufanele ubabike odokotela abasebenza ngaphandle kwemvume ngokuthumela i-email [email protected].”IHPCSA ithe kubalulekile ukuthi abantu baye kodokotela abanemvume yokusebenza ukuze bahlale bephephile. Abafuna ukuqinisekisa ukuthi odokotela banemvume yokusebenza bangangena kwi-website ye-HPCSA  bese bebheka ngaphansi kwesihloko esithi register. Bangashayela ne-HPCSA bephethe imininingwane kadokotela ku-012 338 9300/1.

ZIMKHALELE owesifazane owumzanyana osolwa ngokweba usana olunezinyanga eziyisikhombisa, abelugada washaya wachitha nalo nezimpahla zalo konke nesitifiketi salo sokuzalwa.Umthombo olwazi kahle udaba, uthe umzanyana uqoqe izingubo samuntu oyowasha kanti usehamba nosana ngaphandle kwemvume yomndeni.Usana lwebiwe ngoLwesibili lwatholakala ngoLwesine, oThongathi, kwaboshwa umzanyana ngecala lokuthumba.Unina wosana ubememezele kuFacebook enameke nezithombe ecela ukufuniswa lo wesifazane owebe usana.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi ilungu lomndeni ebelikhona libone kuthe nya, laqalaza laze lakhathala kanti useshaye wachitha nosana umzanyana.UNksz Zibuyile Gumede uthe umhlolo awugilwe wumzanyana, impela uyowukhohlwa efile.Uthe lo mzanyana wayemthole ngesihlobo sakhe ababehlala naso emqashweni wasemcela ukuthi amgadele ingane.Uqhubeke wathi umzanyana washeshe wafika ukuze abone kahle ekhaya, ajwayele ngaphambi kokuqala ngokusemthethweni emsebenzini.“Bebezwana kahle kakhulu nengane yami konke kuhamba kahle.“Usisi wami kodwa uke wangitshela ukuthi lo muntu ogada ingane wamxoxela ukuthi ufunwa ngesibhamu wumyeni abeshade naye, badivosa.“Kwaba yinto ekhathazayo kumuntu ogada ingane uma kuzwakala esho kanjalo,’’ kusho uNksz Gumede.Uthe njengoba kade enyamalele nosana nje ubengenayo ngisho iselula futhi abazi okutheni ngaye, wazi ukuthi owaseNtaphuka, eNdwedwe.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uConstable Thenjiswa Ngcobo, uthe amaphoyisa abophe owesifazane ngalolu daba. “Amaphoyisa aseMhlali abophe owesifazane ngecala lokweba usana, uboshelwe oThongathi.“Idokodo ladluliselwa emaphoyiseni aKwaDukuza abhekene namacala odlame lwemindeni, ukuvikelwa kwezingane nawocansi. Umsolwa uzovela enkantolo maduze,’’ kusho uConstable Ngcobo.Umthombo obukhona kutholwa ingane kumzanyana, uthe batholwe emzini thizeni ongahlali muntu oThongathi. Ngesikhathi kufika amaphoyisa kuthiwa umzanyana uzenze umuntu ophanjanelwa yikhanda ekhuluma izinto ezingahlangani.“Uvele wathi wumzukulu wakhe le ngane futhi ubaleke nayo ngoba bebehlela ukumbulalala yena nayo. Le ndawo ahleli kuyona wumuzi nje ongahlali muntu. ”Ubanjwe ngokuthi acele ukubeka amanzi komakhelwane, base beyasola,’’ kusho umthombo.Unina wengane ubonge kakhulu kubo bonke abalekelele ekutheni kutholwe usana lwakhe, wathi basaphikelele esibhedlela ukuze luxilongwe ukuthi luphile kahle yini.

Amaphoyisa athungatha abasolwa okuthiwa badubule babulala abantu abane abebehleli emjondolo e-Uganda eMlaza ngoLwesine ebusuku. Ngokombiko wamaphoyisa abasolwa ababalelwa kwabayisithupha bangene kulo mjondolo obekuphuza kuwo abagilwa bafuna amaselula. Abagilwa banqabile nawo, oyedwa wabasolwa wakhipha isibhamu wadubula kwashona abathathu. Ngesikhathi abasolwa sebephuma emjondolo kuthiwa bahlangane nomunye obephuma endlini encane naye bamdubula.Naye lo wesilisa wesine kuthiwa unqabile ukubanika iselula. Amaphoyisa acela ongaba nolwazi olungaholela ekuboshweni kwabasolwa ukuba baxhumane namaphoyisa aseduze noma bashayele inombolo yokubika ngobugebengu u-08600 10111.

IMIGULUKUDU emithathu ethelwe othulini ngamaphoyisa ngoLwesine eShowe, yiyo ‘eyashisa’ amatekisi kaMnuz Vikizitha Biyela, ongumfowabo womsakazi woKhozi FM, uZimiphi ‘Zimdollar’ Biyela.Lokhu kuqinisekiswe nguBiyela ngesikhathi ethintwa yiSolezwe Ngempelasonto.UBiyela uthe kulaba abathathu ababulewe, kukhona ababili abashisa amatekisi akhe ngasekupheleni konyaka odlule.“Yibona impela abangishisela amatekisi ami,” kusho uBiyela.Echaza ngokuqala kwempi, uthe abafi abayingxenye yeqeqebana elimhlaselayo, baqala ngokufaka i-chemical ethize ematekisini akhe amane emakhaya abashayeli bakhe.Uthe lokhu kwaphinde kwenziwa nakwamanye amatekisi amabili ngomunye uzakwabo osembonini.Uthe emva kokuthola izingcingo kubashayeli abahlukene bekhala ngokuthi amatekisi avele ajame uma bewadumisa, babayalela ukuthi bawase komakhenikha, abafike bahlonza uhlobo oluthile lwe-chemical abathi ithelwe ezinjinini.“Emva kwalokho, ngabayalela abashayeli ukuthi baziqaphe izimoto, nokuyilapho ezaqala ukushiswa khona, zishiswa emakhaya abo abashayeli, enye yashiswa iyokhandwa, amanye ashiswa emgwaqweni,” kusho uBiyela,Uthe laba ababulawe ngamaphoyisa ngoLwesine, yilabo ababezishisa emgwaqweni izimoto zakhe.“Ezigamekweni ezimbili ezehlukene, babonakala ngoba kwakusemini, yikho ngithi ibona ngoba bayaziwa, babonwa,” kulandisa uBiyela.Uqhube wathi okwakwenza zigcine sezihlaselwa emini izimoto zakhe ukuthi wayesebadonse ngendlebe abashayeli ukuthi basheshe bayolala kusakhanya ngenxa yokwanda kwezigameko zokuhlaselwa.“Esigamekweni sakamuva nje, kwahlaselwa enye imoto yami eyayiqashwe ukuhambisa abantu ababeye emcimbini we-ANC eThekwini.“Umshayeli wayeqeda ukubachitha bonke abantu, wathikamezwa yiQuantum elalingenazo izinombolo, balishisa itekisi ayehamba ngalo.“Ngokwabo babethi balishisa naye phakathi kanti ababonanga ukuthi ukwazile ukuphulukundlela, abaleke,” kuchaza uBiyela.Echaza ngomsuka wempi, uthi waqala ukuba nyamanambana ngesikhathi ekhuza leli qeqebana ukuthi aliyeke ukuntshontsha izimoto, okukhona kuzo nezikahulumeni, lizihlakaze bese lidayisa izingxenye zazo.Uveze ukuthi ngokwakhe ngabe kungcono ukuthi amaphoyisa ababophile abafi, angababulali ukuze bachaze enkantolo ukuthi bazishiselani izimoto zakhe.Uqhube wathi kulaba abasele njengoba eveze ukuthi bayiqembu, ufisa baboshwe bangabulawa.Esitatimendeni esithunyelwe amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal kwabezindaba, abafi bashone emva kokudubulana namaphoyisa eShowe.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCol Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa abadubule emva kokuthi ezame ukubamisa, bangama, kunalokho bavulela ngenhlamvu bebhekise kuwona.“Amaphoyisa abethole umkhondo wabasolwa abahlome ngezibhamu besendleleni yokuyosoconga.“Azamile ukubavimba ngaseKing Dinuzulu, babaleka. Abajahile nokuyilapho behle khona emotweni yabo, baqala badubula bebhekise emaphoyiseni,” kusho uNetshiunda.Uthe ngesikhathi ebuyisela ngenhlamvu amaphoyisa, bafe bobathathu, nokho likhona iphoyisa elilodwa elidubulekile.Uthe kutholwe izibhamu ezimbili, esisodwa sazo sicishwe inombolo yaso nenqwaba yezinhlamvu.Uthe ngesikhathi kuseshwa imoto kutholwe i-hand grenade nezinye izinhlamvu zohlobo lwesibhamu esikhulu.“Ababili babafi bahlonziwe, bayasoleka emacaleni amaningi okubulala nokuzama ukubulala embonini yamatekisi ngaphansi kwesiFunda iKing Cetshwayo,” kuphetha uNetshiunda.

AMAPHOYISA athele othulini amadoda amabili okukholakala ukuthi adubule kwafa  abayisithupha eDumaneni oLundi ngempelasonto.Ababulewe, bahlaselwe ezigamekweni ezimbili ezehlukene besemakhayaEsigamekweni sangeSonto, kudutshulwe kwabulawa abashadile uMnuz Mandlenkosi Mayise (66) noNkk Delisile Mayise (63) namadodakazi abo angothisha endaweni okungoNksz Phemile Mayise (36), Bongathini Mayise (34) noPhindile Mayise (29). UPhindile kuthiwa washonela endleleni eya esibhedlela.Esigamekweni sesibili, esenzeka ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku, kwadutshulwa kwafa umfana wakwaBiyela oneminyaka engu-16. Yena kuthiwa wadutshulwa abasolwa abavele bavumbuka ekhaya, beqeda kungena ngemoto namanye amalungu omndeni bebuya ndawana thize.FUNDA NALOLU DABA: - Bahleli lubhojozi kuqothwa izihlobo–  Udutshulwe wabulawa owesifazane obelele nosana–  Ugwetshiwe owabulala umnakwabo kubangwa indodaOkhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLieutenant Colonel Nqobile Gwala, uthe amaphoyisa ophiko lweNational Intervention Unit (NIU) athole umkhondo ngezinkabi ezibandakanyeka ekubulaweni kwabagilwa.Uveze ukuthi umkhondo uholele amaphoyisa komunye umuzi osesigodini saseNcayini KwaYanguye, eMelmoth ngoLwesibili.“Amaphoyisa athe uma engena kulo muzi, kwaqhamuka amadoda amabili endlini karawondi, avulela ngenhlamvu ebhekise emaphoyiseni,” kusho uLt Col Gwala.Uveze ukuthi abasolwa abaneminyaka elinganiselwa kwengu-30 bafele endaweni yesigameko.Udalule ukuthi amaphoyisa athole  i-revolver nesibhamu esikhulu nezinhlamvu ezingu-24 kubasolwa.“Ngesikhathi eqhubeka ebheka endlini karawondi, athola amaselula amane, izinhlamvu ezine ze-shortgun,  i-shortgun, uqhwasha, i-pistol nezingxenye ze-revolver,” kusho uLt Col Gwala.Uthe zonke izibhamu ezitholwe amaphoyisa zizothunyelwa kwabahlola izibhamu ukubheka ukuthi awekho yini amacala ezibandakanyeka kuwo.Uthe icala lokubulawa kwabasolwa libikiwe ophikweni oluphenya amacala athinta amaphoyisa, i-IPID.

KUSOLWA ukuthi bekufunwa owesilisa ofike ngemoto enowesifazane odubulekile eHlane eCentocow, ngokudutshulwa kubulawe abesilisa bendawo bezama ukusiza ngoMgqibelo ebusuku.Endaweni yesigameko kuthiwa kushone uMnuz Philasande Chiya, okuthiwa ubezama ukuhlenga owesifazane obedutshuliwe. NgoMsombuluko kushone owesibili uMnuz Ntandoyenkosi Langa, obephuthunyiswe nabanye ababili esibhedlela, okukhona kubo nowesifazane obeficwe emotweni. Ngokusho komthombo olwazi ukusuka nokuhlala udaba, umufi ushayele unina ucingo ebusuku ngosuku lwesigameko.“Umtshele ukuthi ubona kukhona imoto emi ngaphandle egcekeni lakubo, wayalela unina ukuthi aphume ayobheka. Ngaleso sikhathi yena ubesesitolo sendawo,” kusho umthombo.Uqhube wathi, unina kamufi uphume wayoyibheka imoto, wafica kunowesifazane obehleli esihlalweni esiseceleni kwesomshayeli, edutshuliwe.“Ubuyisele ucingo endodaneni eyibiza ukuthi ize izomlekelela ngoba emotweni efice owesifazane odutshuliwe, odinga usizo,” kusho umthombo.Uqhube wathi lona wesilisa uze egijima ezosiza, benonina kwase kufika abanye abathathu bendawo.“Bebesamsiza lona wesifazane, bembizela nabosizo oluphuthumayo ngesikhathi kufika enye imoto, ebinamadoda amathathu, afike avulela ngenhlamvu kulaba ebebethi bayasiza,” kuqhuba umthombo.Uthe yilapho okugcine kushona khona uChiya, kwathi abanye abathathu baphuthunyiswa esibhedlela.Udalule nokuthi basola ukuthi umuntu obefunwa uthuli owesilisa obeshayela imoto, okuthiwa ucele empunzini emva kokupaka imoto endaweni yesigameko, eshiya owesifazane olimele kuyo.Uphinde wathi bathole ukuthi imoto ibisuka ePlangweni, okuyindawo ekhona eCentocow.Ikhansela lendawo, uMnuz Nhlanhla Dlamini eqinisekisa isigameko, uthe umphakathi usashaqekile nokho wathi abethukile kangako njengoba besola ukuthi abahlaseli bebehlose abebesemotweni. “Nokho izigameko zokudutshulwa kwabantu ewadini seziqala ukusikhathaza, ngoba sezivamile. Ngeledlule emhlangalweni we-war room kuze kwaphakanyiswa indaba yokuthi kusungulwe iCPF,“ kusho uDlamini. Uveze ukuthi akukaziwa ukuthi umshayeli uphelelephi kanti imoto igcine ithathwe ngamaphoyisa. Imizamo yokuthola umndeni kamufi ayiphumelelanga. Owesifazane otholwe emotweni kuthiwa uphuthunyiswe esibhedlela elimele. Amaphoyisa athunyelelwe imibuzo ngalolu daba kodwa kuze kwashaya isikhathi sokuchicilela engakaphenduli.

UTHEMBELE emaphoyiseni ngokubanjwa kwabasolwa umndeni wesitshudeni saseDurban University of Technology, ophikweni lwayo oluseMgungundlovu, okuthiwa sidutshulwe abebebamba inkunzi eduze kwendawo ehlala izitshudeni zale nyuvesi, eScottsville, entathakusa ngeSonto.USinenhlanhla Dlamini  (21) obenza unyaka wesibili kwiBusiness Information Management ,kuthiwa ushonele endaweni yesigameko emva kokuhlaselwa abasolwa abangaziwa babaphuca amafoni.Udadewabo kaSinenhlanhla, uNksz Mandisa Dlamini elandisa Isolezwe, uthe umufi ubehamba neqeqebana lezitshudeni bephuma emcimbini i- All Varsity Picnic obusenkundleni yezemidlalo iHarry Gwala, ngesikhathi kuma imoto ebinesigejana sabelisa, bakhonjwa ngesibhamu.“Kuthiwa ngesikhathi imoto ima, kwehle abasolwa babakhomba ngesibhamu babaphuca amafoni nemali abebeyiphethe. Izitshudeni bezihamba ziyidlanzana, kanti kuthe uma abasolwa sebehamba badubula babhekisa ngakubagilwa, nokuyilapho kudubuleke khona udadewethu,” usho kanje.Uthe ngesikhathi imoto isuka ngejubane iphinde yashayisa omunye  umuntu wesilisa obewela umgwaqo naye oshonele endaweni yesigameko.  Kuthiwa uSinenhlanhla ongowokudabuka eNtuzuma, ubehlala endaweni ehlala izitshudeni eseScottsville eMgungundlovu, kanti isigameko senzeke kusele ibangana bafike lapho behlala khona.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLieutenant Colonel Nqobile Gwala, uthe amaphoyisa ase-Alexandra aphenya amacala amabili okubulala.

KUSHONE abasolwa ngobugebengu abathathu kubo okukhona nephoyisa ngesikhathi betholele phezulu namaphoyisa eNtuzuma, eThekwini, ngeSonto.Ngokuthola kwaleli phephandaba, abasolwa kuthiwa babambe inkunzi isitolo e-Richmond ekuseni izolo. Amaphoyisa athola umkhondo wokuthi bacashe eNtuzuma, okuthe uma efika lapho kade becashe khona bavulela ngenhlanvu bebhekise emaphoyiseni, nawo aphendula ngayo. Baphume bebaleka beqa uthango lomuzi ebebehleli kuwo amaphoyisa abajaha. Ababili basala lapho, abayisikhombisa babaleka. Ngemuva kwesikhashana, kubikwe ukuthi amaphoyisa abalandelile abafica komunye umuzi ebese becashe kuwo badubula amaphoyisa aphindisela kwafa umsolwa oyiphoyisa. UKhomishana wamaPhoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi, uthe kulaba basolwa ababili abadutshulelwe emzini wokuqala eduze koyedwa kutholakale ivesti evikela inhlamvu nekepisi lamaphoyisa nesibhamu sephoyisa ebelihambisana nezigebengu  elishonile, okutholakele ukuthi lisebenza esiteshini samaphoyisa KwaMashu."Ngaphakathi endlini kutholakale izingubo zamaphoyisa ezehlukene esicabanga ukuthi iphoyisa yilo ebelisiza izigebengu ngazo. Imoto yaleli phoyisa okungeyona eyomsebenzi nayo itholakele kulo muzi," kuchaza uMkhwanazi.Umuzi wokuqala abasolwa ngobugebengu abaficwe kuwo kuthiwa owomsolwa oboshelwe amacala ehlukene obugebengu, ongaphandle ngebheyili okusolakala ukuthi naye ubeyingxenye yabasolwa ababalekile.Amaphoyisa aveze ukuthi sebebonke abasolwa bebeyisishiyagalolunye.Ngaphandle komuzi bekugcwele umphakathi obubuka, obuthi awubonanga lutho futhi awuzwanga lutho uma ubuzwa ngamaphoyisa nezintatheli ngokwenzekile, yize amaphoyisa ethi ububukele abasolwa bebaleka.Omunye womakhelwane obengekho ngesikhathi kudubulana amaphoyisa nabasolwa, uze wazincama wabuza kuwo amaphoyisa, omakhelwane bakhe bonke bethi abazi ukuthi kungani kuhenqiwe kungasavumelekile ukuthi adlule aye emzini wakhe.UMkhwanazi uthe abasolwa ababili abakazi ukuthi bangobani nokuthi akhona yini amanye amacala abayamaniswa nawo. Uthe emakhukhwini abasolwa bekukhona amavawusha ama-airtime nawokugembula okusolwa ukuthi bawathathe esitolo abasibambe inkunzi."Uzakwethu ubesebenza ebusuku, esikhundleni sokuthi  ekuseni aye ekhaya ayolala, uhambe wayokwenza ubugebengu. Ngiphoxeke kakhulu ngalesi senzo kodwa angimzweli ngokuthi ugcine eseshona ngale ndlela.  Kuyishwa ukuthi maningi amaphoyisa athinteka ezenzweni zobugebengu. Umphakathi kuba lula ukuthi uvule uma kufika iphoyisa lifake umfaniswano. Uma nawo esebandakanyeka ezenzweni ezinje kuzokwenza umphakathi ungabe usazi ukuthi uthembele kubani," kusho uMkhwanazi.

UFE ujuqu umsolwa okuthiwa  ubedubulana  namaphoyisa,  obefunwa uthuli ngamacala okubulawa ngesihluku kowayeyintombi yakhe eyayisimalile nodadewabo, abahlaselwe bekubo Obuka, eMelmoth ngonyaka odluleUMnuz Sibonelo Xulu (30) kuthiwa uthelwe othulini ngamaphoyisa ngesikhathi etheleka engazelele lapho ebebhace khona eCato Crest, eMayville izolo ekuseni. Kuthiwa ngesikhathi amaphoyisa esondela, udonse isibhamu wadubula ebhekise kuwona,  nawo aphendula ngendlela efanayo, amdubula.  Ubefunelwa ukubulala uNksz Nomvula Zulu (33) owayeyintombi yakhe nodadewabo uNksz Noluthando Zulu (20) abahlaselwa  besele bodwa nezingane ezincane ngoNovemba, 19 nyakenye.Lesi sigameko sashiya amalungu omphakathi engawuvali umlomo. Umsolwa kuthiwa wanikela kubo kowayeyintombi yakhe  (uNomvula) eyayisimalile, eyiphoqa ukuthi ivule endlini.  Ngesikhathi yenqaba, kuthiwa wabulala iwindi wangena ngalo, waqala ukudubula abagilwa ababesele bodwa nezingane ezincane njengoba kuthiwa abazali babehambele umngcwabo wesihlobo owawukwesinye isigodi. Kuthiwa wathatha namafoni abo.UNomvula washonela endaweni yesigameko kwathi uNoluthando washona emva kwezinsuku ezimbalwa engeniswe esibhedlela.  UNoluthando kuthiwa wuye owabhala isitatimende emaphoyiseni echaza ngakho konke okwenzeka ngaphambi kokuthi ashone, waveza  igama likamsolwa.  Kusukela ngosuku lwesigameko kuthiwa umsolwa wabaleka endaweni. Inkantolo yeMantshi yaseMelmoth yakhipha incwadi egunyaza ukuboshwa kwakhe.  Bekunemibiko yokuthi ubebuye abonakale endaweni ngezikhathi ezithile.  Umndeni uveze ukuthi uhleli lubhojozi ngesikhathi esagcwele emathafa, kanti kuthiwa ubebuye athumele imiyalezo yokwesabisa kwelinye ilungu lomndeni, elisongela ngokulibulala, okuphoqe ukuthi uyise wabagilwa acele izinsuku emsebenzini eyogada umndeni wakhe obuhlalele ovalweni.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLieutenat Colonel Nqobile Gwala, uthe umsolwa obefunwa ngamacala okubulala nokubamba inkunzi, utholwe nesibhamu nezinhlamvu ezintathu, kanti lolu daba selubikiwe ophikweni olubhekele ukuziphatha kwamaphoyisa i-Independent Police Investigative Directorate.

SIYINDABA egudwini kumalungu omphakathi waseMtshebheni, eNanda, isigameko sokubulawa kowesifazane oyedwa kwase kudutshulwa namalungu akhe omndeni.Isolezwe  lithole ukuthi uNksz Zandile Ndlovu (38) udutshulwe ngoyaba lwezinhlamvu ngesikhathi emzini wakhe kugasela amadoda amahlanu abehlome eyizingovolo.Amdubula nje ubengena esangweni esedubule alimaza indondana yakhe nelinye ilungu lomndeni. Kuthiwa abahlaseli bangene badubula laba ababili, okuthe uma kungena lo wesifazane esangweni, kwazwakala omunye wabo ethi “Majita, nangu umuntu ebesimzele”, kwase kukhala inganono wasala edindilizile njengoba efele khona lapho. Kuvela ukuthi la madoda afike apaka imoto kude nasegcekeni lakwaNdlovu ase asondela ngezinyawo.Umthombo uthi acuthe esangweni okuthe uma kuthushuka indodana yakhona ayidubula yalimala kabi onyaweni.Angene ngaphakathi adubula umkhulu wakhona esiswini ophuthunyiswe esibhedlela. Kuthiwa amadoda aphume abaleka kwathi esengenhla abonakala engena emotweni emnyama abekade eyipake kude maqede akhala amaphepha."Sididekile sonke lapha emphakathini, asazi ukuthi ingampela ubulaweleni lo wesifazane. Okusixakayo ukuthi besingakaze sizwe ukuthi kukhona umuntu axabene naye kumbe ke umuntu angazwani naye,'' kuchaza umthombo.Omunye umthombo osondelene nomufi kodwa ocele ukuba ligodlwe igama lawo, uthe badukuza ebumnyameni mayelana nokuthi kungani kuhlaleselwe lo mndeni."Kuyaxaka ngampela ukuthi kungamane kuhlaselwe umndeni esingawazeli lutho kodwa umane uhleselwe ngale ndlela. Kubi ngampela lokhu esikubone kwenzeka kuleli khaya,'' usho kanje.Umufi kuvela ukuthi akukho lapho abesebenza khona.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi eminyakeni emine eyadlula umfowabo kamufi owayenesitolo sokudayisa utshwala, naye wahlaselwa ngamadoda amane ambulala ngokumdubula.Kuze kube yimanje kuthiwa abekho abantu abake baboshwa mayelana naleso sigameko.Kuvela ukuthi amalungu omndeni wakwaNdlovu athuka izanya njengoba esezizwa engasaphephile.Indodana kamufi, uMnuz Simli Ndlovu, ithe bakhungathekile ngesehlakalo ngoba abekho abantu ebebazi ukuthi bayabalandela emndenini wabo.UNdlovu uveze ukuthi lesi sigameko sibalimazile njengoba sebesele bodwa beyizingane kulo muzi. "Nami bangidubulile onyaweni, kodwa bona bebefuna umama,'' usho kanjena.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu Natal, uConstable Thenjiswa Ngcobo, uthe belingakabibikho icala lalolu hlobo elivuliwe kubona kodwa basazolibheka.

Kudutshulwe kwabulawa ufata webandla lamaKhatholika eqeda kubamba inkonzo yomthandazo wasekuseni e-Aquer-Park ngoLwesithathu ngabo-7 ekuseni.Lesi sigameko kuthiwa senzeke eTzaneen, eLimpopo lapho umfundisi (38) ehlaselwe khona ngowesilisa ongaziwa.Kuvela ukuthi ufata obulewe nguWilliam Banda odabuka eZambia.Ekhasini leSt Peter’s Parish Catholic Church kuFacebook kufakwe isitatimende lapho bezwakalise khona ukushaqeka bechaza nangesigameko.Abantu bazwakalise ukudabuka kwabo bephawula.Umkhuzi wamaphoyisa eLimpopo uLieutenant General Thembi Hadebe uzwakalise ukushaqeka ngalokhu wayalela ukuthi kuphenywe ngokushesha ngesigameko.Ngokwamaphoyisa, ufata uqede inkonzo yasekuseni namalungu ebandla wabe eseya egunjini lokushintshela lapho elandelwe khona ngowesilisa ongaziwa. Kuthiwa lona wesilisa umdubule kabili ekhanda ngaphambi kokuphela emehlweni.Amaphoyisa nabezimo eziphuthumayo baphuthumise umgilwa esibhedlela esiseduze lapho kufike kwaqinisekiswa khona efika ukuthi useshonile.UHadebe ujube ithimba eliphenya ngokubulala nokubanjwa kwenkunzi ukuthi lihole uphenyo futhi libambe umsolwa.Kunxuswa onolwazi ukuthi axhumane noLieutenant Colonel Richard Boshomane ku-079 894 5501 noma uWarrant Officer  Phaladi Makola ku-082 749 2233 okanye abike esiteshini samaphoyisa esiseduze.

SIKHULU isililo elokishini laseKatlehong, kubulawa umnikazi wenkampani yonogada obesekhaleni lokulwa nobugebengu nodlame emiphakathini yaseKurhuleni.UMnuz Mandla Nkambule obengumholi wenhlangano elwa nobugebengu iThatha Zonke Anti-Crime Unit, udutshulwe wabulawa ngoLwesithathu ntambama, eKatlehong. Le nhlangano kaNkambule yagqama kakhulu ngesikhathi yeseka umethuli wezinhlelo, uXolani Khumalo, wohlelo Sizok’thola  ngesikhathi eyozinikela emaphoyiseni kulandela ukuvela kwemibiko yokuthi uyathinteka ekufeni kowayesolwa ngokudayisa izidakamizwa, uRobert “Kicks” Varrie, okuthiwa washona ngemva kokuthelwa ngenduku ohlelweni lukaKhumalo kuthiwa akakhiphe izidakamizwa okwakusolwa ukuthi uzithukuse endlini yakhe.ULieutenant Colonel Mavela Masondo okhulumela amaphoyisa aseGauteng, uthe umufi ubehamba kuleli lokishini ngesikhathi ehlaselwa abasolwa abangaziwa ngo-5.30.“Umgilwa ubeshayela emgwaqweni ngesikhathi ephazanyiswa yimoto yabasolwa eqhamuke eceleni kwakhe bavulela ngenhlamvu. Imoto yakhe iphaphalaze yabhajwa kuthango oluseceleni komgwaqo,” kusho yena.Amaphoyisa aphenya icala lokubulala. Anxusa umphakathi ukuba ulekelele ngolwazi olungaholelwa ekuboshweni kwabasolwa.

Isinqumo sokubuyisa bonke abebexoshiwe ebandleni lamaNazaretha somholi, inkosi uMduduzi Shembe uNyazilwezulu, siletha ithemba ngozinzo kuleli bandla.Lokhu kwenzeka ngemva kokuthi uNyazilwezulu lumemezele eBuhleni, njengoba kunomhlangano kaJulayi ukuthi kube yiphutha ukuthi kuxoshwe abantu ebandleni, abanye okungaqulwanga ngisho amacala abo.Luveze ukuthi ukuxoshwa kwabantu ebandleni lamaNazaretha kufana nokubabulala ngoba kukhona abazalelwa kuleli bandla abangazicabangi bekwenye inkolo ngaphandle kweyobuNazaretha.Phakathi kwabantu abaxoshwa ebandleni kubalwa abefundisi okusanda kumenyezelwa ukuthi sebebuyiselwe futhi bayaqhubeka nemisebenzi yabo. Abanye yinhlalisuthi okusanda kumenyezelwa ukuthi ixoshiwe emva kophenyo okuthiwa kuvele ukuthi bekunamatulo amabi ebeliwabhekise kumholi uNyazilwezulu.Ngasekuqaleni koyaka kwaba nabafundisi ababuyiselwe ebandleni kade bexoshiwe, bafike abangamukelwa kahle ngoba kukhona abebengazimisele ngokubahlonipha njengabefundisi.Kuwona lo nyaka kwavela nezindaba zokuthi inkosi yamaQadi, uMqoqi Ngcobo ike yathwala kanzima ibandla liye emhlanganweni eGoli. Kuthiwa yavinjwa ngabathile yaphuma ngesamagundane kukubi kwaze kwabakhona abashawayo.Kuzona zonke lezi zigameko nezinye ezenzeke phambilini, uNyazilwezulu belungakaze luzwakale luphawula ngazo.Ukuzwakala kwayo ikhuluma ngalezi zinto kubuyise ithemba kumaNazaretha njengoba iningi likholwa wukuthi udaba lulunga uma sekukhulume umholi.Isolezwe Ngempelasonto linenkulumo okuthiwa ibikhulunywa nguNyazilwezulu eBuhleni muva nje, lukhala ngokungazwani kwenhlalisuthi nokuyikho okuholela ekutheni kuxoshwe abantu ebandleni.“Inkinga yenu anizwani lapha ebandleni. Umuntu uthi esathi ukhuza lokhu kuvumbuke okunye. Eqinisweni inhlalisuthi ayinalo ilungelo lokuxosha abefundisi. Uma kunenkinga ekhona kumele kuhlalwe phansi ilungiswe. Noma ngabe umuntu wonile akumele ukuthi avele axoshwe ebandleni lingaqulwanga icala lakhe. Noma ngabe liquliwe kodwa akumele abantu baxoshwe kalula kanjalo ebandleni. Kunabantu abazalwa bengamaNazaretha abangayazi enye inkolo, okusuke kungukubabulala uma ubaxosha ebandleni. Njengoba kungumhlangano kaJulayi, akekho umuntu oyiNazaretha ofisa ukuba sekhaya kodwa bonke bafisa ukuba yingxenye yalo mhlangano kaJulayi. Uma umxoshe ebandleni kusuke kufana nokuthi umbulele ngoba isuke ingekho enye into ayaziyo ngaphandle kobuNazaretha. Akazi nokuthi uzophila ngani ngaphandle kwenkolo yobuNazaretha,” inkulumo okuthiwa eyoNyazi.Kuyona lunxuse amakhosi nabafundisi ukuthi babambisane nalo ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi wonke umuntu obexoshiwe ubuyela ebandleni.Kuthiwa bonke abebexoshiwe ebandleni sebeqalile ukubonakala ebandleni. Okhulumela uNyazilwezulu, uMnuz Thokozani Mncwabe uthe ngeke ayiphinde inkulumo yenkosi uNyazilwezulu, ngoba kusuke sekukhulume owokugcina uma kukhulume lona.“Osekumele sikwenze ukuthi siyoshweleza enkosini uNyazilwezulu nasemakhosini nakubefundisi. Siwathukile amakhosi nabefundisi neNkosi uNyazilwezulu ngendlela esiziphethe ngayo esontweni. Noma ngabe awubanga yingxenye yomhlangano okwathathwa kuwona isinqumo sokuthi kuxoshwe abantu kodwa uma uyiNazaretha nawe unesono. “Uma kumele kushwelezwe kusuke kudingeka wonke amaNazaretha abe yingxenye yokushweleza. Lokho kungumthetho wamaNazaretha okudingeka waziwe nangabantu abasanda kubhajadiswa ukuba ngamaNazaretha. Izinkinga ziqale ngokuthi kuthukwe amakhosi kukhulunywa izinto ezingenabufakazi kuthiwa akhombe inkosi ngezibhamu. Lelo chilo kumele ligezwe kuxoliswe nakubefundisi nasenkosini uNyazilwezulu,” kusho uMncwabe.Uthe nokungezwani kwenhlalisuthi akakholwa ukuthi yingoba ingezwani ngempela kodwa ukushayisana kwemibono okugcina sekuholele ekutheni kuxoshwe abantu esontweni.Uveze ukuthi lesi sinyathelo senkosi uNyazilwezulu singesibalulekile kakhulu futhi nesizokwenza kube nozinzo ebandleni. Uqhube wathi uma sekushweleziwe unxusa amaNazaretha ukuthi abuye ahlale phansi abe nokuthula akhonze uNkulunkulu, azoyibona imiphumela yokudumisa uShembe.Ibandla lamaNazaretha linamalungu alinganiselwa ku-7 million emhlabeni. Iningi lawo likwaZulu-Natal lapho kuzinze ikomkhulu lawo, ekuPhakameni.Isigodlo okuyisona esithathwa njengesikhulu njengamanje iseBuhleni, okuyindawo yebandla eyakhiwa ngumholi wesithathu wamaNazaretha inkosi u-Amos Kula Shembe Inyangayezulu. Inyangayezulu inguyise wenkosi uMbusi Vimbeni Shembe uThingolwenkosazana, oluzala inkosi ebusayo kumanje uMduduzi Shembe uNyazilwezulu.

UKUSHAYELE ihlombe ukufakwa kwemibhoshongo yamaselula eyisishiyagalombili eMkhanyakude umphakathi wakule ndawo.Inkampani yamaselula, iMTN imemezele ukuthi isiqedile ukufaka imibhoshongo ezindaweni ezehlukene ezakhele uMkhanyakude, okukhona kuzo neManguzi, okudlula kuyo izimoto ezebiwe ziyiswa eMozambique.Osethimbeni elilwa nobugebengu bokweqiswa kwezimoto emngceleni, uMnuz Joseph Ngubane, uthe iMTN ibasisizile ngokufaka imibhoshongo.“I-network eManguzi iyinkinga. Ihlupha impela nje, wagudluka kancane edolobheni, ayisekho. Lokhu kuzosilekelela kakhulu,” kusho uNgubane.Uqhube wathi kona ubugebengu bokweqiswa kwezimoto emngceleni abusebubi njengakuqala.“Kusukela kwalethwa ithimba lamaphoyisa azobhekana ngqo nalobu bugebengu, sibona kukhona umehluko omkhulu,” kusho uNgubane.Enza isibonelo uthe, emasontweni amabili edlule kubanjwe izimoto ezimbili ngaseHluhluwe.“Zombili zibanjwe ziyokweqiswa umngcele,” kusho uNgubane.Uthe ithimba lamaphoyisa, lisekhona namanje futhi liyasebenza impela.Oyisikhulu esiphezulu eMTN KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Busi Dlamini uthe ngokufaka le ngqalasizinda benzela ukuthi kube lula ukuxhumana kubantu bendawo, kuphinde kube lula ukuthi izinhlaka ezehlukene zilwe nobugebengu bokweqiswa kwezimoto emngceleni.“Isifunda saseMkhanyakude siyaziwa ngobugebengu bokweqiswa kwezimoto emngceleni. Enye yezingqinamba zezinhlaka ezilwa nalobu bugebengu bekuba i-network, ebiyenza kube nzima ukuthi kulwiwe kalula nobugebengu,” kusho uNkk Dlamini.Uthe ukufakwa kwemibhoshongo kuzokwenza ukuthi kuxhumaneke kalula, abezinkampani zama-tracker abheka ukuhamba kwezimoto basebenze kalula kanjalo nokubikwa kobugebengu kufinyelele ngesikhathi esifanele ezinhlakeni.Ubugebengu bokwebiwa kwezimoto buke badla lubi eManguzi. Kuke kwaba nemibiko yokuthi abahamba ngezimoto ezingamaveni amakhulu kule ndawo, bebengenelwa emakhaya, baphucwe izimoto zabo. Kulezo zigameko, abagilwa bekuke kwenzeke ukuthi bathathwe bayolahlwa emahlathini akude.Isigamekoi esadonsa amehlo abaningi, kwaba esokudutshulwa kukaMnuz Judah Mthethwa, owayesekhaleni lokulwa nalobu bugebengu. UMthethwa wangenelwa ekhaya lakhe wadutshulwa. Nokho bagwetshwa ngasekuqaleni kwalo nyaka abalahlwa yicala lokumbulala.

‘AKUSIBO bonke abantu abathanda ukufunda izincwadi, kanti futhi nezinto eziningi ziyashintsha ngakho kusemqoka ukuhambisana nesikhathi ukuze ubuciko bukusebenzele.’Isho kanjalo imbongi, uMbali Malimela, ekhuluma emcimbini wokucobelela ababhali besifazane ngolwazi lokuchuma kwezokubhala, iYoung Writers Women Symposium, eWushwini Pan African Centre, KwaNgcolosi, ngoLwesihlanu emini.Kulo mcimbi obuwenziwe okwesibili nonyaka, bekuhlangene amaciko asebasha esifazane ukucotshelelwa ngolwazi lokusiza achume ebucikweni obehlukene okuhambisaa nokubhala.UMbali owaziwa ngokubhala, akhiphe izinkondlo zesiZulu, ezenza kahle kakhulu online, ubecebisa izihambeli ukusebenzisa ubuchwepheshe besimanje ukusabalalisa umsebenzi wazo.Uthe nababhali asebeshicilele izincwadi zabo kungabasiza ukusebenzisa ubuchwepheshe besimanje ukusabalalisa umsebenzi wabo wobuciko ebantwini abaningi.“Into enhle ngezitolo zobuchwepheshe wukuthi zenza kube lula ukufinyelelelisa umsebenzi wakho ezindaweni ezahlukene, umhlaba wonke jikelele, futhi kungakusiza nawe osuvele unezincwadi, uzenze zibe nama-audio, ukusiza ukwandisa amakhasimende abantu abangathandi ukufunda, kodwa abangakujabulela ukulalela umsebenzi wakho,” usho kanje.Omunye wababhali nongumshicileli wezincwadi, uZikhona Myaka, yena ucebise izihambeli ngokumele zikwenze nokumele zikugweme uma zizoshicilela izincwadi, ikakhulu uma zisaqala. Uxwayise ababhali abasafufusa ukuqaphela ukuthi baqoka yiphi inkampani ukushicilela umsebenzi wabo, ukusiza ukugwema ukuthi kube lula ukwebiwa komsebenzi wabo ngosomathuba.“Yenza ucwaningo ngenkampani ozoshicilela kuyona, ubheke ukuthi isebenza ngayiphi imibandela nokuthi iyahambisana yini nawe ngaphambi kokwenza isivumelwano. Kuyasiza nokuthi uqhathanise ukusebenza kwezinkampani namanini omsebenzi, ukuze uqoke ehambisana nawe. Okumqoka wukukhuthalela ukufunda ukuze uzochuma ngokubhala, usho kanje.Kuwo futhi lo mcimbi, kwethulwe incwadi ka-Amanda Khomo, esihloko sithi Hurt: Losing A Loved One. Ethula incwadi yakhe, u-Amanda uveze ukuthi uzokwethula eyesithathu maduze, esihlo sithi Inkanuko, eyelama eyesibili ethi Isodoma Negomora.

ISOSHA laqhulula umkalo ngezinhlamvu eziyisithupha; okwaba eyodwa ekhanda, ezine entanyeni neyodwa esifubeni kanti lalimi phezu kombhede okwakulele kuwona umufi, lakwenza phambi kwezingane zalo nomkhwekwazi walo emzini wabo ePinetown, eThekwini, ngoJanuwari 3.Lokhu kuqukethwe esitatimendeni esifungelwe somphenyi wecala uSergeant Sugar Sosibo esethulelwe enkantolo.Isosha lombutho wezempi (reservist), uMnuz Lwanda Zungu (37), ugqigqa iNkantolo yeMantshi yasePinetown, ucela ibheyili ecaleni athweswe lona lokubulala ngokuyinhloso umkakhe, uNkk Tania Msane-Zungu (36).UZungu usolwa ngokuthi watshela enye yezingane zakhe, ngesikhathi zigijimela ekameleni labo (benomufi) nogogo wazo bezwa umufi ekhala efuna usizo, ukuthi ayikhululeke wase eyadubula.“Waqeda ukudubula umufi amahlandla ayisithupha, wabaleka esegcwele igazi. Endleleni wasabisa umakhelwane wakhe owayezobheka ukuthi kwenzakalani, wathi uzomdubula waqede wamqhulula ngamatshe,” kuchaza uSosibo.Incwadi kaSosibo ifundwe ngumshushisi uMnuz Ehud-Jadon Francke echazela imantshi uWendalynn Robinson.UZungu wazinikela emaphoyiseni ngoJanuwari 5, emuva kokushayelwa ucingo nguBrigadier Cele ngoba wayengaziwa ukuthi ukuziphi izinkalo.Kubikwa nokuthi umufi waxoxela umama umfundisi, uNkk Londi Ndimande, ngoFebhuwari 14, 2022, ukuthi wabikela uyise mhlazane eshaywa uZungu.Kuthiwa ubaba kamufi wameluleka wathi akahlukane noZungu ngoba kuyacaca ukuthi uzombulala. Kubikwa ukuthi umufi watshela uyise ukuthi usemxolele uZungu.“Ubaba kamufi wathi uyasihlonipha isinqumo asesithathile kodwa uma kwenzeka ebulawa uZungu ngeke alubhade yena lapho,” kufunda umshushisi.NgoNovemba nyakenye, kuthiwa umufi wacela usizo lwezomthetho kummeli u-Advocate Bongumusa Sishanga ngemigudu angayilandela ukuze athole incwadi yenkantolo ezovimba uZungu ukuthi asondele eduze kwakhe. Kuthiwa umufi wathi uZungu ungumuntu onodlame futhi usabela impilo yakhe neyomndeni wakhe nokuthi usefuna incwadi yesehlukaniso somshado.UMbuso uthi akanganikezwa ibheyili uZungu ngoba akanalo ikheli eliqondile lalapho ehlala khona, akanayo impahla ebiza yena, unencwadi yokuhambela amanye amazwe, ubeqashwe umbutho wezempi kuleli kodwa eyi-reservist.“Uma ededelwa ngebheyili kuyafana ngoba umbutho wezempi ngeke umbizele emsebenzini, okuyinto oyishilo. UZungu uyabazi ofakazi, wabulala umkakhe, yini engamvimba ukuthi ababulale nabo? Angalibalekela icala,” kusho uFrancke.Ummeli kaZungu, u-Advocate Muzi Mzelemi, uthe singamampunge isithombe esizanywa ukudwetshwa uMbuso ngomsolwa. Uthe akukho namunye umuntu owaziyo ukuthi kwakwenzekani kuleya ndlu ngosuku lwesigameko. Ucele imantshi imnikeze ibheyili uZungu, aphume ayosebenza ondle izingane zakhe.Udalule nokuthi anganikwa nombandela wokubosholewa endlini aphume uma eyosebenza kuphela izingane zakhe zingaphili impilo yokukhangeza ekubeni ekhona edla anhlamvana.Imantshi kulindeleke isikhiphe ngoMsombuluko isinqumo ngebheyili.

KUCHITHWE amahemuhemu nenkoleloze ngobudlelwano bomsunguli we-African National Congress (ANC), uDkt John Langalibalele Dube, nomsunguli wenkolo yakwaShembe, iNazareth Baptist Church, uMphrofethi Isaiah Shembe (uMqaliwendlela). Esifundweni ebesenziwe ngalaba baholi baseNanda, ebesibanjelwe e-University of KwaZulu-Natal eMgungundlovu kuleli sonto, kucacisiwe ukuthi ngamampunge ukuthi uShembe noDube babeyinkukhu nempaka. Amanye amahemuhemu asabalele yilawo athi nguDube owabhala ephephandebeni lakhe, Ilanga LaseNatali, ukuthi uShembe washona kade ezama ukundiza. Amanye amaNazaretha athi uDube waqalekiswa ngalokho.UDkt Ngugi Mahaye, owumsunguli weSiqabetho Senhlalamafini, uthe uShembe noDube kwakungamathe nolimu kangangoba uShembe wathandazela uDube ngaphambi kokukhethwa njengomengameli we-ANC ekubeni ayengekho."Abawaziyo umlando bazokhumbula ukuthi uma kuyosungulwa umbutho wabantu owawuzolekelela ukuthi izwe liphume kumakhamandela, uDkt Dube akayanga eMangaung (eBloemfontein ngo-1912), kwakumele aye. Owayebhala i-concept kwakunguMnuz Prixley Ka-Isaka Seme. UShembe wafika ngo-4 ekuseni wangawuthatha umthandazo ka-4. Wahamba wayowuthatha kwaDube, wathandazela uJL Dube." UMahaye uthe uDube wakhethwa ukuba wumengameli engekho. Uthe abantu angeke babuqonde ubudlelwano balawa maqhawe."Kwathi noma kuhamba kuba nezimo zasemhlabeni abazange bahlukane," kuphawula uMahaye.Echaza ngendikimba yalesi sifundo, uSolwazi Vitalis Chikoko uthe bakhumbula izingwazi ezasifundisa ukuthi sikwazi ukuzicabangela, singacatshangelwa. Uthe lesi sifundo besenziwe ngokuhlanganyela wuphiko lwezemfundo nolwezenkolo.Uthe inhlosongqangi yalesi sifundo bekungekhona ukubaqhathanisa kodwa bekuwukubethulela isigqoko.Umlingisi owayenguMaNgcobo kuZalo, uDawn Thandeka King, uthe yena usalaxaza inkolo yobuLuthela wajoyina eyamaNazaretha. Uthe yena uyisizukulwane soMqaliwendlela ngenxa yokuthi uyise nguLombo Qiniso Shembe oyindodana yeLanga, iNkosi uJG Shembe.Udalule ukuthi usenethempeli lakhe elibizwa ngokuthi iKwaThandeka eFourways, eGoli.Umlingisi ongumzukulu kaDube, uZweli Dube, unxuse ubuholi bamanje ukuba bayiphathise okwezikhali zamaNtungwa inkulunkuleko eyalethwa wukuzabalaza kwezishoshovu esezalala kobandayo. UShembe wadlula emhlabeni ngoMeyi 2,1935 kwathi uDube washona noFebhuwari 11,1946.Lesi sifundo besihanjelwe ngobengundunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomusa Dube, uSolwazi Sihawu Ngubane nezinye izinjululwazi.

SICHITHIWE isicelo sezintatheli ezicele kumiswe ukuqulwa kwecala lokufa kukaSenzo Meyiwa ngesikhathi sokhetho ngoba zizobe zingekho enkantolo.Kulindeleke ukuthi izwe liye okhethweni lukazwelonke olubhekwe ngabomvu ngoMeyi 29. Isicelo sabezindaba sivezwe wuMshushisi woMbuso u-Advocate George Baloyi ngesikhathi kuguqiswa icala ngoLwesihlanu. Icala lisheshe laguqa ngesikhathi sekhefu lesidlo sasemini ukuze kunikwe abameli noMbuso ithuba lokubhunga okuthile.UMeyiwa wadutshulwa wabulawa ekubo kwentombi yakhe uKelly Khumalo, eVosloorus eGauteng ngo-2014.UMshushisi uBaloyi ethula udaba ucele ukubonana neJaji uRatha Mokgoatlheng ngasese. babhunge ngodaba lwabezindaba.IJaji lithe uBaloyi akayibeke ebandla indaba, izwakale ukuthi bathini abezindaba.UBaloyi uthe abezindaba bazobe bematasa nokhetho kodwa abafuni ukwedlulwa yicala, bebecela ukulindwa baze babuye.“Nkosi yenkantolo abezindaba bebecela ukuthi icala liguqe ngesikhathi sokhetho ngoba zonke izinsiza zabo zizobhekana nokhetho. Bebecela ukuthi kubuywe sekwedlule ukhetho,’’kusho uBaloyi.IJaji libuze ukuthi ithini indlu ngalesi sicelo, kwaqhasha ummeli u-Advocate Zandile Mshololo wathi ngeke kwenzeke kanjalo yena uyasiphikisa isicelo.U-Advocate Thulani Mngomezulu weseke u-Advocate Mshololo wathi naye uyasiphikisa isicelo.Omunye ummeli u-Advocate Charles Mnisi uthe abezindaba bekufanele bafake isicelo esibhalwe phansi esisemthethweni, hhayi ukuphathisa umyalezo kumshushisi.IJaji lizwakale lingahambisani nesicelo libuza abameli ukuthi yake yabonakala yini into enjalo phambilini.UBaloyi uthe ukholwa wukuthi lokhu kudalwa yindlela umphakathi omagange ngayo ngaleli cala.Udaba lumunyungwe kwaphunywa nesinqumo sokuthi siyachithwa isicelo ngeke balindwe abezindaba.Bekungaqali ukuthi kube nodaba lwabezindaba, phambilini uZandie Khumalo wayecele ukuthi bangabucosheli ubufakazi bakhe. Isicelo sikaZandie sachithwa, abezindaba baqhubeka nomsebenzi wabo.Ngesikhathi icala liguqa bekulalelwe ubufakazi bukangoti wamaselula uLieutenant Colonel Gideon Gouws othi abamangalelwa babexhumana ngamaselula.Kulindeleke ukuthi icala libuyele enkantolo ngoMsombuluko, kuqhubeke ubufakazi bamaselula.

UPHIKO oluthuthukisa intsha likaMasipala uMzinyathi lubambisene neMoses Kotane Research Institute neMantec Foundation lucije intsha ewu-100 eyakhele lo masipala ngolwazi logesi osebenza ngelanga nobuchwepheshe bokuwenza. Ngenkathi icijwa intsha ithole ithuba lokufunda ngobuchwepheshe bezamandla, ukuthi kwenziwa kanjani namasu ezixazululo zokwenza ubuchwepheshe busebenze.UMthokozisi Silango waseGlencore ongomunye wabahlomule kulolu hlelo, uthe abakufunde kuzoba wusizo kakhulu ukuxazulula izinkinga ezibhekene nomphakathi.“Sithemba ukuthi esikufunde kuzosisisza siqhamuke namasu okuxazulula inkinga kagesi ezweni futhi sikwazi nokuqala amabhizinisi ukukwazi ukuzimela,” kusho uSilango.USamkelo Mdunge waseNdumeni, naye ohlomulile uthe: “Okungihlabe umxhwele kakhulu wukuthi bazokwazi ukusilekelela uma siqala izinkampani zethu futhi basisize nokuzichumisa, ithuba elingandile emphakathini engikuwona.”Isikhulu esiphezulu soMzinyathi Development Agency, uMnuz Senzo Ntombela, sithe ngesikhathi bezwa ngale ngqayizivele yethuba, banquma ukulibamba ngezandla zombili ngoba bayazi ukuthi ezamandla zisayinselelo enkulu ebhekene nezwe.“Lolu hlelo luyisize kakhulu intsha ukuguqula inkinga yezamandla ibe yithuba lezomnotho, okuzosiza isifunda sethu, kube kusiza futhi ngokwakha amathuba omsebenzi adingeka kakhulu.“Le ntsha esicijiwe izosizwa esibambisene nabo kulolu hlelo ukuqala amabhizinisi ayo ezamandla futhi izobhekwa ngeso elibukhali ngabazi kabanzi ngale mboni isikhathi esithile kuze kube wukuthi amabhizinisi abo esekwazi ukuzimela ngokwawo,” kusho uNtombela.Uthe ubafisela okuhle njengoba sebengena kwezamabhizinisi, nokuthi unethemba lokuthi lolu hlelo luzovuna izithelo.“Sinethemba elikhulu lokuthi lokhu akuzukuphelela lapha manje njengoba sikhuthaza nabanye abantu abasha ukulandela ezinyathelweni zalaba,’’ usho kanje.

OBENGUMMANGALELWA usukume waphaphatheka, engakholwa ngesikhathi inkantolo imkhipha phambili ecaleni eselidonse iminyaka emine lokuthumba nelokubulala ngesihluku u-Andile “Bobo” Mbuthu (16).UMnuz Siyanda Msweli kuthiwe akagoduke ngoba buntekenteke ubufakazi obebumyamanisa namacala.Usukume waphaphatheka wayoma emnyango nakhona esamangele eme yedwa walinda kwaze kwaphothulwa icala.Ozakwabo o-Andile Nhleko, Mncedisi Mzobe, Lindani Ndlovu noMalusi Mthembu libagojele, balale bebaliwe.Bancishwe nokuthi yelulwe ibheyili yabo, bayalelwa ukuthi babuye eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseVerulam, ngo-Agasti 27.Ngalolu suku kuyokwamukelwa imibiko yosonhlalakahle ngempilo yalawa madoda nomndeni kamufi.Kuyophinde kube nesigcawu sobengummangalelwa owaphenduka ufakazi woMbuso lapho ezobe ezicelela intethelelo nokuthi kungani kungamele yena ashushiswe.Imantshi uSanele Hlatshwayo ithe lawa madoda enza isihluku futhi uma ewadedela ngebheyili angase abaleke unomphela.UBobo washaywa yilawa madoda wafa ngo-Ephreli 20, 2020, esolwa ngokuthi weba utshwala endaweni yobumnandi eMagagula Lounge eHambanathi, oThongathi. Le ndawo yangqongqiswa ngomlilo wumphakathi uveva intukuthelo.Ujabule unina kaBobo, uNksz Gugulethu Mbuthu, elahlwa ngecala lawa madoda.Yena nomndeni wakhe nabebandla abebezomeseka baphume enkantolo bacula bebonga uMdali.UNksz Mbuthu uthe yize ingeke isavuka indodana yakhe kodwa uyabonga ngokuthi ligcine libagojele abamangalelwa.“Ngase ngithembele kuyona ukuthi izoqeda u-matric ingondle kwazise ngangiwa ngivuka nayo kodwa babona kungcono bayithathe impilo yayo,” kusho UNks Mbuthu.Lo mndeni ufuna badilikelwe yijele ababulali bakaBobo.UBobo washaywa usuku lonke wafa, isidumbu sakhe kwayiwa naso eBhamshela lapho sabaselwa nezinkuni emphongolweni ubusuku bonke.Ngakusasa ekuseni izinsalela zaso zahlakazwa ngepiki zafakwa ezikhwameni nezitini ukuze zizike zaphonswa edamini.Zatholakala emuva kwezinsukwana kwenziwa ulibofizo nonina, imiphumela yaqinisekisa ukuthi kwakungezikaBobo. Umnikazi weMagagula Lounge naye owayeboshiwe kuleli cala wadutshulwa wabulawa kwesinye isigameko engaphandle ngebheyili ngecala likaBobo.

I-ANC KwaZulu-Natal iphelile, kudingeka yakhiwe kabusha.Lokhu kushiwo nguSihlalo kazwelonke we-ANC, uMnuz Gwede Mantashe, othe kudingeka abunjwe kabusha amagatsha kulesi sifundazwe avithizwe wukufika kweqembu eliholwa nguMnuz Jacob Zuma, Umkhonto weSizwe.UMantashe okusho lokhu izolo ekhuluma ne-SABC ngaphandle kwendawo obekubanjelwe kuyona umhlangano wekomiti elibhekele ukusebenza kwansuku zonke eBoksburg, eGauteng, uthe i-MK iyivithizile i-ANC eKZN.“Iphelile i-ANC eKZN, kudingeka yakhiwe kabusha. I-MK iqedile ngale nhlangano kulesiya sifundazwe. Abantu bacabanga ukuthi ukwakha kabusha kusho ukuhlakaza yonke into kanti akunjalo, kulula ukwakha uma kunesisekelo. Safunda isifundo ngokuhlakaza bonke ubuholi phambilini okuba nzima uma usuwakha kabusha. Yingakho kulula ukwakha nokuvuselela lapho kukhona okuthile khona kunokuqala phansi lapho kungekho lutho,” kusho uMantashe.Usho kanje sekunesikhathi ikhulunywa eyokuthi buzulelwa amanqe ubuholi bakulesi sifundazwe ngenxa yokwehlelwa ukwesekwa kwale nhlangano kuleli.UNobhala Jikelele, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, ekhuluma nabezindaba uthe bazobuyela kulesi sifundazwe ingakapheli inyanga njengoba kusona ukuzozizwela emagatsheni ngokwenzeka.Uveze ukuthi asikathathwa isinqumo ngokuthi kuzokwenzakalani ngobuholi bakulesi sifundazwe.UMbalula uthe bayazi kwenzakalani, wathi isigungu esiphezulu yisona esizokhipha umkhombandlela ngokumele kwenzeke.“Sizoba nomhlangano wesigungu esiphezulu ekupheleni kwale nyanga. Abantu ababalelwa ku-600 000 bavotela i-ANC eKZN, abanye banquma ukungavoti. Ziningi izinto esingazenza eKZN kodwa asifuni kube sengathi kukhona esibabeka amabala ngokwehlwa kokwesekwa. Iqembu likaZuma lidale umonakalo. Amanye amalungu e-ANC abehobile kanti asebenza umshoshaphansi ne-MK okhethweni,” kusho uMbalula.Uthe ukuhlakaza ubuholi akusona kuphela isisombululo esikhona ngoba zikhona nezinye izindlela zokulungisa isimo ngaphandle kokuhlakaza ubuholi.Uveze ukuthi bahambele izifundazwe ezintathu okuyiKZN, Gauteng naseNorthern Cape, lapho le nhlangano yehlelwa ukwesekwa.“Sizoya naseMpumalanga lapho sehlelwe khona ukwesekwa sisuka ku-70% saya ku-50%. Silungiselela ukhetho lohulumeni basekhaya osekusele cishe unyaka ngaphambi kokuthi lubanjwe,” kusho uMbalula.Uthe ukucishwa kukagesi, inkinga yamanzi, ubugebengu, ngezinye zezinto ezenze abantu bangayivotela i-ANC.

KUBE yinjabulo ngoLwesine kuvulwa isikole samabanga aphezulu esilungiswe kabusha, saba nobuchwepheshe besimanje obusezingeni, i-Dr J.L Dube High, KwaMashu, okubikwa ukuthi kudle imali elinganiselwa kuR75 million ukusilungisa.Ekhuluma emcimbini wokwethula lesi sikole emphakathini osakhele, uMphathiswa wezeMfundo uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka, ushayele ihlombe zonke izinhlaka ezibambe iqhaza ekutheni silungiswe, ikakhulu inkampani exhasile ukwakhiwa kwaso i-Cotton on Foundation, eminyakeni emibili edlule.“Sibonga uhulumeni ukubeka phambili imfundo yezingane zethu ngokuthi kungabi yizikole zasemadolobheni kuphela eziba sezingeni eliphezulu njengalesi. Okunye okusijabulisayo wukuthi lesi sikole asizokuba sihle kuphela, ngoba siyaziwa ngokukhiqiza imiphumela emihle, njengoba senzile ngonyaka odlule kuphasa wonke umfundi kamatikuletsheni kusona,” kusho uHlomuka.Uthishanhloko wesikole, esasungulwa ngo-1979, futhi esinabafundi abawu-1 325 nonyaka, uMnuz Sipho Magwaza, uthe uswele amaphiko okundiza ukukhombisa ukuthi ujabule kangakanani ngomsebenzi omuhle owenziwe kusona.“Lokhu kuzosilekelela kakhulu ukuthi sikwazi ukukhiqiza imfundo esezingeni eliphezulu njengoba isikole sethu sesenziwe ngendlela yokuthi sihambisane nobuchwepheshe esikubona kwamanye amazwe njengoba kuzofundwa ngamakhompytutha, ukusiza ukuthi abafundi esibakhiqizayo baphume sebekulungele ukubhekana nezimo zempilo esiyiphilayo manje,” usho kanje.Ikhansela elakhele ku-ward 40, lapho okwakhiwe khona lesi sikole, uMnuz Siyezwana Mzimela, uthe umsebenzi owenziwe kulesi sikole uzosiza kakhulu ukukhiqiza abafundi abazoba nekusasa eliqhakazile, babuye benze umehluko emphakathini.Omunye wabazali bezingane ezifunda kulesi sikole, uMnuz Bongani Majola, naye ubonge kakhulu umsebenzi owenziwe, athe uzolekelela kakhulu izingane zabo ukuba nekusasa elihle.UMagwaza ugcizelele ukuthi kumanje sebeqedile ngohlelo lokubhalisa abafundi abazofunda esikoleni sabo ngonyaka ozayo, ukukhombisa ukuhleleka nokubeka imfundo phambili.

UTHUKUTHELE uyaveva uTebogo Sithathu, umculi owaduma ngeR&B, ngemva kokuba ehlwithwe umbhobho esacula ingoma ebuza ukuthi wenzeni owayengumengameli wezwe, uMnuz Jacob Zuma. UTebogo wayeyilungu leqembu elalibizwa ngamaTwins, eladuma ngamanoni athi: Shona Phansi, Love 10 000 nelithi Ngiyasha. Kuthe esaqala ukucula uTebogo, waqhamuka umengameli womfelandawonye wezinhlangano zamaciko iCCIFSA, uJoy Mbewana, wamphuca umbhobho maqede wahlambalazeka kozakwabo. UTebogo, ongumsunguli weMK Creatives Council ( MKCC), uthe loya mbuthano bewungahlangene nepolitiki kodwa bekungowokudingida umthethosivivinyo obizwa ngeCopyright Amendment Bill, athe ungomunye wamaciko akhuluma kakhulu ngayo. "Bengisemhlanganweni njengomunye wezishoshovu ezilwela amalungelo amaciko, ikakhulu ekuvikeleni imisebenzi abezobuciko abazisungulele ngemiqondo yawo. Lokho ngikwenza ngaphansi kwenkampani yami i-IP Justice. Yingakho kuthe uma abaholi bamaciko bebizwa ukuba bayonikezela ngohlu lwezikhalazo kuNobhala-Jikelele we-ANC (uMnuz Fikile Mbalula), ngabizwa nami."UTebogo uthe ukuvinjwa ngamalungu e-ANC ukuba aphose umbuzo olula wokuthi: Wenzeni UZuma, kwenze abantu babona ukuthi i-ANC iwuhlobo luni. Uthe uphucwe ilungelo elikuMthethosisekelo lokuhlanganyela nanoma iyiphi inhlangano ngokukhululeka."Amanye abangamacomrade e-ANC baze bangisabisa ngodlame nokungicindezela besebenzisa amandla okuba kuhulumeni. Buka nje banyanyisa kanjani. Ngibatshelile kodwa ukuthi angisabi lutho ngoba ngingokaJehova," kuphetha uTebogo.Eziphendulela uJoy uthe uTebogo uyiComrade nomngani wakhe futhi ubeyingxenye yomhlangano.Echaza uJoy ubeke kanje:"Besivumelene ngokuthi umhlangano uzophathwa kanjani, obese kusele ngakuthina ukuhambisa i-memorandum kuNobhala-Jikelele. Ngakho ngesikhathi eseqala ecula ingoma ethi: Wenzeni UZuma, bekufanele anqandwe ngoba ubebuza umbuzo endaweni engafanele, kithi ngoba thina bemboni yobuciko asikaze sasola uZuma nanganoma yini."UJoy uqhube wathi abebekuhlanganele ukucela ukuhlangana nomengameli nokuthi umthethosivivinyo ungasayinwa kuphela."Ngaphandle kwalokho, bebenomhlangano nabo njengeMK lapho bekufanele abuze khona lokho noma enkantolo izolo (esho ngoLwesithathu) lapho ebengabuza abantu abafake uZuma enkantolo."Uthe ngale ndaba yomthethosivivinyo amaciko kufanele abumbane futhi anelungelo lokuzibandakanya neqembu lepolitiki.Waphetha ngokuthi uTebogo uyazi ukuthi uma kukhulunywa ngendaba yezobuciko, ubumbano lusemqoka.

UVALO kubagibeli bamabhasi akwaMetro kubulawa omunye wabo egibela ibhasi elilibangise eSandton lisuka eFleurhof.Kuthiwa owesifazane oneminyaka elinganiselwa kweyo-o40 ubudala osebenza ebhange uhlaselwe umsolwa esitobhini ajwayele ukubibela kuso eFleurhof ngoLwesithathu ekuseni.UMnuz Kenny Kunene oyiphini likamengameli wePatriotic Alliance nekhansela kumasipala waseGoli uthi ngempela njengoba befike endaweni yesigameko bazizwele ngokwabo okwenzekile.Uthi lowesifazane uhlaselwe engena ebhasini kanti umsolwa usebngaphakathi wavulela ngesibhamu. “Lo wesifazane ujike wazama ukubaleka umsolwa lo wadubula kabili, wawa lo wesifazane, wamqedela edubula kabilii.”[GRAPHIC CONTENT] A woman was shot dead by an unknown man on a Metrobus in Johannesburg today. Officials say she was approached by the gunman who shot her and then fled the scene. Newzroom Afrika's Veronica Makhoali speaks to Joburg Transport MMC Kenny Kunene.Watch:… pic.twitter.com/kYnSmofpnNUthi bazothatha ivideo esebhasini yize bezwile ukuthi umsolwa ubefihle ubuso egqoke ikepisi futhi eseqedile ukuhlasela kufike imoto emhlophe yohlobo lwePolo engenayo izinombolo yathatha umsolwa yaphela emehlelweni.Okhulumela abeMetro Bus uGoodwill Shivuri utshele abezindaba ukuthi kubuhlungu okwenzekile futhi nabanye abagibeli abebekhona basathuthumela.Uthi bazonikezwe usizo lokwelulekwa kanjalo nomshayeli webhasi usathukile futhiBancome ubuqhawe bomshayeli webhasi ngoba ngemuva kokuhlaselwa kwalo wesifazane ushayasibhamu ukhombe yena ngesibhamu kodwa walokhu elele njalo esitelingi, esehambile umsolwa umshayeli usukile endaweni yesigameko ehambisa abanye abagibeli abangu-15 kwenye indawo ephephile ethi mhlawumbe umgulukudu usazobuya.Ushayeli usuke lapho wabuyela endaweni yesigameko njengoba umufi ubengakasuswa.Umyeni kamufi namanye amalungu omndeni abesendaweni yesigameko.UKunene uthi umyeni ubatshele ukuthi ngoMsombuluko, umkakhe umtshele ukuthi uqaphele amadoda abesesitobhini sebhasi angawajwayele kodwa futhi awagibelanga uma sekufika ibhasi.Uthi lokhu kubenza basole ukuthi ukubulaw kwalo wesifazane bekuhleliwe.

Kusinde ngokulambisa umshayeli weVW Polo odutshulwe ngoyaba lwezinhlamvu eVerulam, eThekwini, ngoLwesihlanu ntambama.Lesi sigameko kuthiwa senzeke emgwaqweni uWick Street.NgokweReaction Unit South Africa (Rusa), le nkampani ithole inqwaba yezingcingo kosomabhizinisi nabahamba ngezinyawo bekhala ngokuduma kwezulu lezandla.“Onogada bathunyelwe ngabo-6.14 ntambama nokuthe uma befika bathola indoda ihleli esihlalweni somshayeli kwiVW Polo e-silver. Ubetshulwe amahlandla amaningi kwesingenhla emzimbeni nasekubusweni. Unogada udubuleke ethangeni yinhlamvu ebindiza emoyeni,” kusho iRusa esitatimendeni.Isitatimende sithe abezimo eziphuthumayo bakwaRusa nakwaKZN VIP basize laba ababili ngaphambi kokubaphuthumisa esibhedlela.Sithe kutholakale inqwaba yamagobolondo esibhamu i-9mm nawesibhamu esikhulu endaweni yesigameko. Bekukhona neVW Polo emhlophe ebishiywe ngaphambi kwemoto yowesilisa olimale kanzima. Iwindi lePolo emhlophe nalo belidubulekile.“Akukaqinisekiswa ukuthi imoto ishiywe ngabasolwa yini. Imbangela yokuhlasela ayikaziwa.”

Amaphoyisa athungatha uthuli abasolwa ngokudubula ‘usomabhizinisi odumile nomqaphi wakhe’ ebusuku ngoLwesihlanu, eMogaung.Okhulumela amaphoyisa aseLimpopo uBrigadier uHlulani Mashaba, uthe lo  somabhizinisi (57) odumile angamdalulanga nomqaphi wakhe (33) badutshulwe ngabo-7.45 ebusuku.Ngokwemibiko, abagilwa bebeshayela emgwaqweni u-R574 bebheke ngaseMonsterlus ngesikhathi befika kwisicimpisajubane ngaseMogaung. Abasolwa abebehamba ngeMercedes-Benz eluhlaza okwesibhakabhaka kuthiwa badubule kaningi bebhekise kubo.“Usomabhizinisi udubuleke engalweni kanti umqaphi wakhe uphumile emotweni wadubula kaningi ebhekise ngakubasolwa. Udubuleke kaningi ngesikhathi enza lokho,” kusho uMashaba.Uthe abasolwa babaleke ngale kokuthatha lutho kubagilwa. Abasolwa baphuthunyiswe esibhedlela.UMashaba uthe amaphoyisa aphenya amacala amabili okuzama ukubulala.Anxuse onolwazi ngabasolwa ukuthi ashayele umphenyi uSergeant Madimetja Manganye ku-060 624 3383 noma athine isiteshi samaphoyisa okanye ku-08600 10111
