Kudutshulwe kwafa ababili, kwalimala abathathu ngesikhathi amadoda angaziwa evulela ngenhlamvu ethaveni kuBhabhatane Street, eWalmer, e-Eastern Cape, ngeSonto.UKhomishana wamaPhoyisa kulesiya sifundazwe uLieutenant General Nomthetheleli Mene, uthe uphatheke kabi ngalokhu kudubula athe kwenzeke ngoSuku lweNtsha, okuyiholidi lokubungaza nokuhlonipha intsha ezweni.Kubikwa ukuthi ngabo-11.20 ebusuku amaphoyisa abizelwe ethaveni lapho kuthiwa kungene abesilisa abahlanu  bavulela ngenhlamvu kwabebephakathi.Kuthiwa la madoda abezifihle ubuso.“Kudutshulwe kwafa ababili, owesifazane oneminyaka engu-18 nowesilisa iminyaka yakhe engaziwa kwathi abathathu okungabesilisa ababili nowesifazane balimala,” kusho okhulumela amaphoyisa uColonel Priscilla Naidu.Uthe imbangela yalokhu kuhlasela ayikaziwa futhi icala liphenywa wuphiko lweProvincial Serious and Violent Crimes Unit“Sinxusa umphakathi ukuthi usisize ngalolu phenyo futhi sicela noma ubani onolwazi ukuthi asondele. Ukubambisana nathi kubalulekile ukusisiza sithole izimpendulo kuleli cala nokuthi sigweme olunye udlame emphakathini wethu,” kusho uLt Gen Mene.

INKAMPANI elawula ukusebenza ezikhumulwenzi zezindiza kuleli, i-Airports Company South Africa (ACSA), iqinisekise ukushona kwabagibeli ezikhumulweni zezindiza i-OR Tambo ne-King Shaka kule mpelasonto.Ngokwesitatimende esikhishwe yile nkampani, isehlo sokuqala sibikwe e-O.R. Tambo International Airport (ORTIA) ngo-3.10 ntambama. Abasebenzi basesikhumulweni sezindiza babike ngomuntu owe kususa esitezi sesihlanu wayoshaya phansi. Abezimo eziphuthumayo namaphoyisa asebenza kule ndawo baphuthume kuye kodwa ngeshwa bafike esethule. Uhlonzwe njengoshonele khona lapho kanti imininingwane yakhe ibingakaqinisekiswa.Kwesinye isehlo esenzeke eKing Shaka International Airport, kuthiwa umgibeli wendiza ushayeke phansi washona esendaweni yabafikayo ngezindiza. Lo mgibeli wesilisa utholelwe usizo lokuqala oluphuthumayo kodwa ngeshwa naye uthulele khona lapho.Imbangela yokufa kwabo kayaziwa okwamanje kodwa amaphoyisa ayaphenya.

KUFE ababili kushayisana izimoto ngoLwesithathu ekuseni, kuthelawayeka uN2 ngaseMatigulu.Ngokombiko othunyelwe abezimo eziphuthumayo, baphuthume kule ndawo ngemuva kokuthola umbiko ngengozi enyantisa igazi.“Sifike kule ndawo sathola izimoto zishayisane mahlanze, ngesikhathi kuhlolwa isimo sabebehamba ngalezi zimoto, kutholakale ukuthi babili abantu abashonile,” kusho abe-IPSS Medical Rescue.Kuthiwa babili abantu abalimele kabi kanti kubo kukhona nengane.Bayaqhubeka notakula kule ndawo kanti ukuhamba kwezimoto kuphazamisekile.Ngesikhathi abezimo eziphuthumayo besaqhubeka notakula abalimale engozini, bathole omunye umbiko ngengozi ebandakanya imoto eyodwa eyenzeke kuwo uN2, ngakwaDukuza. “Sithole umbiko mayelana nemoto ephaphalaze yaginqikela eceleni komgwaqo.”Ngesikhathi befika endaweni yesigameko, bathole umshayeli esavalelekile phakathi emotweni. Abezicishamlilo bayaqhubeka nemizamo yokutakula umshayeli obonakala elimele kabi.

KUFE ababili kwalimala abangu-17, itekisi lishayisana nemoto encane emgwaqweni u-R74, eDoringkop ngaKwaDukuza, ngoLwesibili ekuseni.Ngokwesitatimende sabakwa-IPSS Medical Advanced Life Support, kwabangu-17 abalimele, abayisikhombisa kubona balimale kanzima kanti omunye wabo okuthiwa ubegibele etekisini, kudingeke ukuthi aphuthunyiswe esibhedlela ngendiza enophephela emhlane.“Bonke abalimale kule ngozi bathole usizo oluphuthumayo, ngaphambi kokuthi bathunyelwe ezikhungweni zezempilo ezehlukene.  Bobabili abashayeli, owemoto encane nowetekisi nabanye abagibeli balashelwe imihuzuko,” kubhalwe esitatimendeni.Kwehla le ngozi nje, bekusabatshazwa ukufa ngesihluku kwabayithupha okungabesifazane okuthiwa bangamalungu e-MK ababehambele umcimbi waleli qembu, nabo babhubha kugingqika itekisi ababehamba ngalo, emgwaqweni ofanayo ngaseKranskop ngenyanga edlule. Itekisi ababehamba ngalo lalilayishe abagibeli abangu-17 kubalwa nomshayeli, lisuka eMtshezi lilibangise eNkandla kanti abawu-10 kwabalimala bangeniswa ezibhedlela besesimeni esibucayi.

UMNYANGO wokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdaba ukhiphe isexwayiso ngemvula enamandla engadala izikhukhula ezindaweni ezehlukene esifundazweni iKwaZulu-Natal.Lo mnyango uthe izangoma zezulu ngaphansi kweSouth African Weather Service zikhiphe isexwayiso ngemvula enamandla elindeleke ezindaweni eziseNingizimu yesifundazwe okubalwa kuzo uMzumbe, uMdoni neRay Nkonyeni. Kuvela nokuthi okufanayo kulindeleke eThekwini nasezindaweni ezisemkhandlwini weLembe.Kukhishwa lesi sexwayiso nje, izakhamuzi zaseMargate azilalanga ngenxa yezikhukhula ezidalwe yimvula yangeSonto ebusuku.Imvula ihlasele kakhulu izindawo eziheha izivakashi eVongo naseMargate kwaguguleka nemigwaqo kwacekeleka nempahla eningi. UMnuz Sboniso Mngadi okhulumela umnyango uthe bakhiphe amathimba ezinhlekelele ayohlola umonakalo nokuqhubeka nokuqapha isimo kule ndawo.UMnyango @kzncogta uhlola umonakalo Margate nasoVongo kulandela izikhukhula ezidalwe yomvula enamandla ngeSonto ebusuku @IsolezweNews pic.twitter.com/T2hJ56cNED“Amathimba ethu amatasa abheka ukuthi umonakalo ungakanani.”Kubikwa ukuthi bane abantu abashonile ngenxa yemvula. Ithimba lezinhlekelele nezimo eziphuthumayo litakule izidumbu ezintathu zabantu okukholakala ukuthi bebehamba ngemoto ekhukhuleke ebhulohweni ngeSonto ebusuku.Kule moto kuthiwa bekunabantu abadala abathathu nengane eyodwa.Owesine oshonile kuthiwa ushaywe wumbani. Amathimba ezimo eziphuthumayo asezindaweni ezahlukeneke njengoba uqhubeka umsebenzi wokutakula izimoto ezithintekile kule ndawo nokusho ukuthi kusengavela ezinye izindaba zabanye abalimele nabashonile.

Kufe abasolwa ngokuduna imoto abathathu, kwalimala iphoyisa elilodwa ngesikhathi kudutshulwana eMlaza, eThekwini, ngoLwesihlanu ekuseni.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe abasolwa bebeqeda ukuduna owesifazane imoto kwaR ngesikhathi amaphoyisa ebajaha.“Kujahwane ngezimoto ngesivinini nokuthe kufikwa kwaT, abasolwa badubula bebhekise emaphoyiseni nawo ase ezivikela ngokudubula. Kufe abasolwa abathathu. Iphoyisa lidubuleke engalweni kanti lisesimeni esigculisayo,” kusho uNetshiunda.Uthe abasolwa batholakale nezibhamu ezintathu nemoto abebesolwa ngokuyiduna.Owesifazane oduniwe akalimalanga.

Kusale enkundleni isosha elilodwa lombutho wakuleli, iSouth African Defence Force (SANDF), kwalimala amanye angu-13 ngesikhathi etholana phezulu namavukelambuso, iM23, eSake, eDemocratic Republic of Congo, ngoLwesine.I-SANDF, esitatimendeni esikhishwe ngoLwesihlanu, ithe wonke amasosha alimele ayalulama esibhedlela, iGoma.Ithe kulimale izimoto zawo ezimbili kulesi sigameko.“Uma yonke imininingwane mayelana namalungu ethu isiqinisekisiwe sizophinde sikhiphe eminye imininingwane futhi umndeni woshonile uzokwaziswa,” kusho iSANDF.Amasosha akuleli ajutshwe eDRC njengengxenye yeSouthern African Development Community Mission in the Democratic Republic of Congo (SAMIDRC) ukuyosiza uhulumeni wakuleliya lizwe ukudala ukuthula nozinzo.Ngelesihlanu isosha kakuleli ukufa kuleliya lizwe kusuka kuqale unyaka. Esigamekweni sokuqala kwafa amabili ngesikhathi kuqhunyiswa inkambi yawo.Kwesesibili elinye ladubula uzakwabo ngesibhamu somsebenzi ngaphambi kokuzidubula life nalo.

UMPHATHISWA wezokuphepha komphakathi nokusebenza kwamaphoyisa eWestern Cape, uReagen Allen, unxuse amaphoyisa ukuthi enze konke okusemandleni ukuqinisekisa ukubanjwa kwabasolwa abavulele ngenhlamvu endaweni yokuphuca kwafa izingane ezintathu.Lokhu kwenzeke elokishini laseKhayelitsha, eKapa, ngoMgqibelo ntambama ngezithuba zika-4 lapho oshayasibhamu abangaziwa befike kule ndawo bavulela ngenhlamvu.Okhulumela amaphoyisa  kulesi sifundazwe uColonel Andrè Traut uthe leli cala lidluliselwe ophikweni oluphenya amacala abucayi nanodlame esifundazweni.“Abaseshi ophikweni lwamacala abucayi odlame aphenya ngesigameko sokubulawa kwabantu abathathu nokulimala kwabanye endaweni yokuphuca ngoMgqibelo ntambama. Kubikwa ukuthi kufike amadoda angaziwa kule ndawo avulela ngenhlanvu ebhekise kwabebekhona,” kusho yena. Owesilisa oneminyaka engu-30 u nezingane ezimbili ezineminyaka engu-11, 12 bafe ujuqu kwathi enye ingane eneminyaka emihlanu yashonela esibhedlela. Zintathu ezinye izingane eziphuthunyiswe esibhedlela ngenxa yokudubuleka.

KUFE nodabuka kulesi sifundazwe, empini yamaphoyisa nosolwa ngokuba wubhongoza ekuqhwageni ngodli imali yomphakathi nosomabhizinisi eMthatha, esifundazweni i-Eastern Cape, obezibiza ngenkosi eyaqokwa ngabantu.UMnuz Senzo Ndlovu waseRichmond, KwaZulu -Natal, kuthiwa ungomunye wabaqaphi ababili bakaMnuz Sakhumzi Dalinzolo Mareke (42), okuthiwa bobathathu bafe ujuqu bedubulana namaphoyisa.UNdlovu kuthiwa ubesebenza njengomqaphi kaMareke ngesikhathi betholana phezulu namaphoyisa okuthiwa abelandela umkhondo ngezenzo zabahlalise lubhojozi umphakathi nosomabhizinisi kuleya ndawo agasele emzini wakhe (uMareke).Umthombo weSolezwe ongathandanga ukudalulwa obusondelene noNdlovu, uthe ubesenesikhathi esebenza njengomqaphi, ngakho abakholwa ukuthi kukhona okumhlanganisa nalobu bugebengu ngaphandle kokuthi ubesebenza.“Besingazi nokuthi umuntu amgadayo usolakala ezenzweni ezinje.  USenzo bekuwumuntu nje ohloniphayo, wahamba nje kuwumuntu eyosebenza kusho ukuthi uthelwe amachaphazelo,” usho kanje.Kuthintwa udadewabo kamufi uNksz Amanda Ndlovu, ukuqinisekisile ukushona komfowabo kulesi sigameko wathi bewumndeni bacela ukungaphawuli ngalolu daba kwabezindaba kuze kube uyafihlwa.Ekhuluma nabezindaba izolo e-Eastern Cape uKhomishana wamaPhoyisa kuleli, uGeneral Fannie Masemola, uthe amaphoyisa anomsebenzi wokuvikela umphakathi kanye nawo.“Lezi zigameko ezihlalise kabi umphakathi, azibikwa ngokwanele emaphoyiseni. Selokhu kuvulwe inombolo yamahhala yokumpimpa ngazo eMthatha emasontweni adlule, zisengu-1 180 kuphela izingcingo ezisangenile zibika ngalobu bugebengu. Kuzona, ezingu-688 ezabafona bedlala. Angu-33 amacala abikiwe mayelana nalobu bugebengu” usho kanje.Uthe amaphoyisa asebenza ngokuzinikela ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abathintekayo bayaboshwa, kwenzeke ubulungiswa.  Selokhu kuqale lezi zigameko, bevile ku-10 abasolwa ezifundazweni ezehlukene asebebulewe bedubulana namaphoyisa okukholakala ukuthi bathinteka ekufuneni ngodli imali yomphakathi.Kukholakala ukuthi omunye umsolwa uzame ukuhlasela iphoyisa lophiko i-National Intervention Unit elalikhona kudutshulwa uMareke nabaqaphi bakhe, kodwa wagcina eboshiwe.

KUFE oyedwa kwalimala kabi omunye kuwa iveni lisuka ku-N2 layohlala kuNorth Coast Road ngoLwesibili ekuseni, eThekwini.Abezimo eziphuthumayo bafike endaweni yesigameko bathola isimo sisibi iveni ebelithwele imifino nezithelo lilele ngohlangothi phakathi kwemizila ephambanayo.Imibiko yokuqala iveza ukuthi umshayeli uphunyukwe yiveni ehamba phezu kwebhuloho kuN2 yashaya umuntu obehleli onqenqemeni lomgwaqo uNorth Coast ngaphambi kokuba ilale ngohlangothi.Umshayeli weveni obehamba yedwa ngesikhathi kwenzeka le ngozi utholakale esesimeni esibucayi kakhulu ngenxa yokulimala.Abe-ALS Paramedics banike umshayeli usizo lokuqala ngaphambi kokuba aphuthunyiswe esibhedlela esiseduze.Imbangela yengozi kayaziwa okwamanje, kodwa amaphoyisa ayaphenya

KUPHUME isidumbu kuhlaselana abokufika abebehleli emzini oseDurban North ngeSonto ntambama.Ngokubika kwamaphoyisa, abesifazane abane abadabuka e-Asia bebehleli emzini abawuqashile osemgwaqweni u-delaide Tambo eDurban North ngesikhathi kufika owesilisa naye owuhlanga lwabo.“La besifazane bacele umlisa lo obefika ukuba abahambise esitolo esiseduze. Ngesikhathi bengena emotweni, kuphume omunye wesilisa naye owuhlanga lwabo, wavulela ngenhlamvu ebhekise kubona,” kusho amaphoyisa ngesitatimende.Kushone owesimame oyedwa, abanye baphuthunyiswa esibhedlela besesimeni esibucayi.Amaphoyisa asendaweni yesigameko njengoba uphenyo luqhubeka ukuze kutholakale imbangela yokuhlaselwa kwalaba kanye nomsolwa okukholakala ukuthi ubalekile.

Amaphoyisa adubule abulala osolwa ngokubamba inkunzi abanye bagcwala amathafa eSikhaleni ngeSonto ebusuku.Kuthiwa laba bebeqeda ukubamba inkunzi umgilwa eNdindima ngaphambi kokubaleka.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa ampintshele ekhoneni abasolwa abane eNcombo.“Bathe bangabona kuphayisa amalambu aluhlaza amaphoyisa, abasolwa badubula bebhekise ngakuwona nokuholele ekutheni amadoda omthetho aziphendulele. Kufe umsolwa oyedwa kulokho kudubulana abanye abathathu babaleka bangena esikhotheni,” kusho uNetshiunda.Uthe umufi utholwe nesibhamu i-.38 special revolver nezinhlamvu ezinhlanu futhi akukho phoyisa elilimalile.Uthe amaphoyisa amatasa athungatha ababalekile futhi banxusa noma ubani onolwazi ngabasolwa ashayele isiteshi esiseduze noma ku-08600 10111.

Kudutshulwe kwafa umsolwa oyedwa omunye waboshwa ngesikhathi bezama ukubamba inkunzi egaraji lokwetha uphethroli iShell Service Station, kuMoss Street, eVerulam ngoLwesihlanu emini.Inkampani yonogada iReaction Unit South Africa (Rusa) ithe amalungu ayo, amaphoyisa eSAPS abambisane ngemuva kokuthola ubunhloli bokuthi kunabasolwa abathathu abahlela ukubamba inkunzi egaraji.Bathe bazungeze igaraji behamba ngezimoto ezingabhaliwe.“Onogada bakwaRusa bangene esitolo kungapheli sikhathi esingakanani abasolwa bengenile. Abasolwa bavulele ngenhlamvu bezama ukubalekela ukuboshwa,” kusho isitatimende.Onogada baphindisele ngenhlamvu kwadubuleka oyedwa wabo ekhanda. Kuthiwa ubalekele ngaserenki yamabhasi lapho eshayeke phansi khona. Utholakale nesibhamu esiyi-9mm.“Umsolwa oneminyaka engu-19 ujahwe ngamalungu eRusa namaphoyisa eSAPS aseVerulam. Uboshwe esikhotheni eduze nomgwaqo uR102. Utholakale nesibhamu.”Kushaye u-1 emini amaphoyisa esasendaweni yesigameko.

ZIHLINZEKWE ngogesi okokuqala ngqa izakhamizi zaseBangamazi eNkandla oselokhu kwathi nhlo ziphila ngokukhanyisa amakhandlela.Le mizi ewu-45 ikhanyiselwe ugesi okokuqala ngqa uMasipala waseNkandla kulandela ukuthola imvume nosuku ka-Eskom.Lezi zakhamizi bese kuphele iminyaka zihleli namamitha kagesi angakhanyi emakhaya kodwa ngeledlule kube sekukhanyiswa amatransformer ukuze kukhanye nasemakhaya.UMnuz Lungisani Buthelezi oyimenenja ebhekelele leprojekthi uveze ukuthi beluyingxenye enkulu yeNhloshane eyayizofakela abantu abawu-1300 ngokuhlukana kwezigaba zayo."Izigxobo, namamitha bekulinde ukuthi kuphothulwe lolu hlelo luka-Eskom bese kukhanyiswa iprojekthi. Sithole usuku lomhlaka 4 Ephreli, sikhuluma kuyimanje imizi isinawo ugesi.“Ikhona imizi embalwa ekhanyiswa namhlanje, kuqedelwa kuyo ngoba iningi layo liqhelelene kanti imitha likhanyiswa ngalilodwa,"kusho uButhelezi.IMeya kaMasipala uMnuz Mbhekiseni Biyela uthe ukuhlinzekwa kwabantu ngezidingo kuseqhulwini futhi bzafinyelela ngisho ezindaweni ezisehlanzeni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi bayazithuthukisa.Ukukhanya kukagesi kule ndawo uBiyela uthe kuzophucula impilo yezakhamizi nokuyinto abayilwelayo.Yize kunjalo uBiyela ukuvezile ukuthi kunezinsiza ezingaphansi kweminyango kahulumeni ezenza kubenzima ukungenelela ngazo emiphakathini njengoba bewumasipala omncane ongenasabelo mali esikhulu.

SISHUBILE isimo phakathi komholi we-DA uMnuz John Steenhuisen noMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ngezinhlelo zokusayinwa koMthethosivivinywa wezikole iBela Bill ibe ngumthetho. USteenhuisen usabise ngokuthi aluzobakhona uzinzo kuhulumeni wokubambisana uma uRamaphosa eqhubeka nalo mcimbi wasesidlangaleni, wokusayina ozoba seziNdlini zoMbuso ePitoli kusasa.URamaphosa ushaya phansi ngonyawo akajiki ekutheni uyaqhubeka nokusayina kanti uthe ubevele elindele ukuthi kuzoba nemvunge.Uxwayise ngokuthi akumele uma kukhona ukungavumelani, bese abaholi bamaqembu abambisene kuhulumeni, basabise ngokuthi aluzobakhona uzinzo.USteenhuisen uthe ufuna ukuhlangana noRamaphosa ukuze amnxenxe ukuthi angasayini.“Uma eqhubeka nokusayina uzobe ephula umongo wokusebenzisana kuhulumeni wokubambisana. Ngesikhathi kubhungwa eyokubumba uhulumeni, samtshela kwezikabhoqo ukuthi asiwamukeli lo mthetho ngendlela oyiyo okwamanje, sathi akawubuyisele ePhalamende ukuze kwenziwe izichibiyelo,” kusho uSteenhuisen.Uthe uzohambisa izichibiyelo abafuna zenziwe kulo mthethosivivinywa ngoba uRamaphosa unawo amandla okuwubuyisela ePhalamende.“Uma enqaba uzobe ebeka engcupheni eyokusebenzisana kuhulumeni. I-ANC iyazi ukuthi akumele ithathe izinqumo ngayodwana.” Okhulumela uRamaphosa, uMnuz Vincent Magwenya, esithangamini nabezindaba izolo eKapa, uthe umengameli uyaqhubeka nokusayina umthetho.Uthe okumkhathazayo umengameli abaholi abakuhulumeni wokubambisana, abasabisa ngoqhekeko uma kukhona abangahambisani nakho.“Umengameli akakhathazekile ngokuthi uzohlukana phakathi uhulumeni wokubambisana. Kuyakhathaza kodwa ukuthi lokhu kusabisa akubhekile kuphela kumengameli wezwe, kodwa nakubantu bakuleli. Uhulumeni awubunjelwanga iqembu elithile, kodwa ubunjelwe abantu bakuleli.” Uthe umengameli akawusayini kuphela umthetho uma kungukuthi awuhambisani noMthethosisekelo, hhayi ngezizathu zepolitiki. “Lo mthetho udlule kuzona zonke izigaba okubalwa nePhalamende yingakho ezowusayina. Asikho isidingo sokuthi umengameli avumelane nabaholi bamaqembu ngaphambi kokusayina umthetho,” kusho uMagwenya.Uthe kuzoba nezinhlelo zokuzama ukuxazulula ukungaboni ngaso linye kuhulumeni wokubambisana.“Amaqembu ayakwazi ukuthi ePhalamende afune kube nezichibiyelo emthethweni. Nakulokhu azokwazi ukufaka izichibiyelo uma ususayiniwe.”Uthe umengameli ukulindele ukuthi kusazobakhona ukungaboni ngaso linye kubaholi kuze kuphele ihlandla likahulumeni wokubambisana. Neqembu i-ActionSA lisabise ngokulandela umgudu wezomthetho uma uRamaphosa esayina umthetho.NoNgqongqoshe weMfundo eyisiSekelo uNksz Siviwe Gwarube, wanxusa uRamaphosa ukuthi angawusayini umthetho ngoba kukhona ezinye izinto angeneme ngazo.Okuqukethwe yilo mthetho wukuthi uGrade R uzoba yimpoqo, amanye amandla okubalwa ulimi lokufunda ezikoleni kanjalo nokugcwala kwesikole, kubekwe enhlokweni yomnyango kuleso sifundazwe. Abazali bazobekwa amacala uma kungukuthi banqabela izingane zabo ukuthi ziye esikoleni.

AMAPHOYISA afuna uthuli abasolwa ngokudubula babulale abantu abangu-17 ezehlakalweni ezimbili ezenzeke eNgobozana eLusikisiki, e-Eastern Cape ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku.Okhulumela amaphoyisa uBrigadier Athlenda Mathe, uthe bavuke ngezindaba ezingezinhle zokudutshulwa kubulawe abantu abangu-17.Emzini wokuqala uthe kubulawe abantu abane akusindanga muntu.“Esehlakalweni sesibili bekunabantu abangu-19 abebekade belele emzini ose-NU2, abangu-13 babo  badutshulwe bashona. Kusinde abantu abayisithupha okungabantu besifazane abane nowesilisa,”kusho uBrig Mathe.Uqhube wathi ubangwa nezibi esibhedlela owesilisa osekhulile osinde edutshulwa. Uveze nokuthi bekukhona ingane enezinyanga ezimbili kuhlaselwa, ephume ingenamyocu.“Ingane iyiswe esibhedlela ukuze ithole ukunakekelwa okudingakalayo. Kusiphatha kabi okwenzekile,” kusho uBrig Mathe.Amaphoyisa athi bangu-15 abesifazane abasocongiwe kanye namadoda amabili.Uveze ukuthi uKhomishana wamaPhoyisa uGeneral Fannie Masemola usehlanganise ithimba eliphezulu lamaphoyisa azophenya ezi zigameko.Njengamanje uthe bamatasa nomsebenzi wabo abaphenyi futhi kunamathimba amabili ochwepheshe bendawo yesigameko avela ePitoli ajutshwe ukuba ahlwaye izimpendulo.“Kutshalwe inqwaba yamaphoyisa ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthi bayatholakala abantu abenze lobu bugebengu. Sikhuthazwa ukuthi ezigamekweni zokudubula esezibe khona kulesi sifundazwe, amaphoyisa akwazile ukubopha abasolwa,” kuchaza uBrig Mathe.Udalule nokuthi kuyabakhathaza ukuthi amacala okubulawa kwabantu aphezulu e-Eastern Cape.Uthe lesifundazwe sivalwe ukubalwa nezintathu ezihamba phambili ngamacala okubulawa kwabantu uma sekukhishwa izibalo zobugebengu.

AMAPHOYISA athungatha amadoda okuthiwa avulele ngenhlamvu ebhasini ebikade ilayishe abagibeli kwafa ujuqu owesifazane ona-52 kwalimala abanye ababili.Kubikwa ukuthi isigameko senzeke ngoLwesithathu ntambama emgwaqeni uNewlands Drive, eThekwini. Kuvela ukuthi icala libikwe esiteshini samaphoyisa saseNewlands East kumanje ayaphenya.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLieutenant Colonel Nqobile Gwala ulandise wathi babikelwe ukuthi kunamadoda abekade engabagibeli ebhasini, avulela ngenhlamvu ebhekise kubagibeli abathathu.“Owesifazane oneminyaka engu-52 ushonele endaweni yesigameko, abanye abagibeli ababili, abebekade belimele, baphuthunyiswe esibhedlela,” kusho uLt Col Gwala.Ube esenxusa noma ubani ongaba nemininingwane mayelana nalesi sigameko nolwazi ukuthi bangobani ababulali abathintekayo axhumane namaphoyisa.ULt Col Gwala ucele abantu bathinte ocingweni uWarrant Officer Basha enombolweni ethi: 082 582 3672 noma kwaCrime Stop ethi: 08600 10111.Bangabika nakwi-app yamaphoyisa ethi: MYSAPS futhi bangazisho ukuthi bangobani uma bethanda.

KUGUNYAZWE ukuboshwa kwababili bandawonye, yiNkantolo eNkulu yaseMgungundlovu okuthiwa banyamalala kuqhubeka ukuqulwa kwecala lokubulawa kwabathathu.Lokhu kwenzeke ngoLwesihlanu ngenkathi kugwetshwa umfowabo obesele odilikajele abathathu neminyaka engu-30, ngaphezulu emacaleni okukholakala ukuthi bawenza ndawonye nababalekile.Lawa macala kuthiwa enzeke eMid- Illovo ngo-2021, kuxabene imindeni emibili, okwafa abangu-10 kwakhona nabalimalayo. UZwelakhe Nene (43) ugwetshwe yile nkantolo udilikajele icala ngalinye, kwamathathu okubulala neminyaka ewu-10 icala ngalinye kwawokuzama okubulala.Abafowabo oMnuz Mhlonishwa Nene noMvikelwa Nene kuthiwa basagcwele amathafa njengoba bebengasalubhadi enkantolo kuqhubeka ukuqulwa kwecala osekugunyazwe ukuboshwa kwabo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe emva kokukhululwa kwabo ngebheyili yinkantolo, kube nelungu lomunye wemindeni exabene eladutshulwa labulawa emasangweni esikole lapho laliwunogada khona, okwenzeka ngoSepthemba, 2021.“Baphinde badubula babhekisa etekisini elaligcwele abagibeli, esigamekweni okwafa kuso ababili, kwalimala abevile kwababili. “Abaphenyi bakwazi ukulandela umkhondo, owaholela ekutheni lesi sigameko sihlanganiswe nalaba, kanti uMvikelwa noMhlonishwa banquma ukungabuyeli enkantolo ngesikhathi kuqhubeka ukuqulwa kwecala, okuholele ekutheni kukhishwe incwadi egunyaza ukuboshwa kwabo,” usho kanje.Kuvele ukuthi laba baboshwe ngoJuni emva kokuthi itekisi eyayilayishe amadoda ayisishiyagalolunye yavinjwa ngamaphoyisa kwatholakala izibhamu nezinhlamvu.Abayisithupha ababesetekisini iNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini  yabakhulula emva kokuthi bungabanga bikho ubufakazi obubahlanganisa necala.Okwavela enkantolo ngomlomo kaMnuz Mxolisi Nxasana owayemele  omunye wabathathu abathwesa amacala ngesikhathi kulalelwe isicelo sebheyili, laba babephuthuma emhlanganweni wokukhethwa kobuholi begatsha le-ANC khona eMid-Illovo ngesikhathi bevinjwa amaphoyisa.Waveza ukuthi omunye wababesetekisini wayezokhethwa kulo mhlangano, wasola ukuthi kwakuyimizamo yabathile ukubathumelela ngamaphoyisa ngenhloso yokuqinisekisa ukuthi abafiki emhlanganweni.

AMAPHOYISA afuna uthuli abesilisa abane abasolwa ngokuvulela ngenhlamvu emndenini waKwaMagwaza eMalangeni, eMzinto, ngeSonto kwashona abathathu.Kulesi sigameko kuthiwa kulimale abanye ababili.Ngokusho kokhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, umndeni ohlaselwe ngowabesifazane bodwa abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-11 no-61.Uthe abagilwa bahlaselwe behleli endlini ewurawondi sebelungiselela ukuyolala ngesikhathi abasolwa bevula ngesankahlu isicabha.“Isicabha sivulwe oyedwa wabo obegqoke isigqoko esimfihla ubuso, kwathi omunye naye obezifihle ubuso ngesigqoko, wakhomba abesifazane abefuna badutshulwe bafe,” kuchaza uNetshiunda.Uqhube wathi kutholwe abesifazane abaneminyaka engu-28, 37 nonengu-61 benamanxeba ayinqwaba okudutshulwa.“Bahlonzwe njengabashonele endaweni yesigameko. Abagilwa abasindile, oneminyaka engu-11 nonengu-60, bebedubuleke ezingalweni nasezithweni,” kulandisa uNetshiunda.Uthe abasolwa abakaziwa okwamanje nembangela yokubulala ima isazohlonzwa ngamaphoyisa.Uqhube wathi nokho kunezinsolo ezivezwa wuphenyo lwamaphoyisa zokuthi kungenzeka ukuthi ukuhlaselwa kwabagilwa kuyamene nokuthi oyedwa wabo ubesezinhlelweni zokudivosa.“Ubelwela ukuthola ingxenye yempesheni yomyeni wakhe,” kusho uNetshiunda.Uphethe ngelithi amaphoyisa anxusa noma ngubani ongaba nolwazi olungawalekelela ophenyweni lwawo ukuthi athinte amaphoyisa aseduze noma ashayele inombolo yawo yamahhala ethi 08600 10111. Ikhansela lendawo, uMnuz Sithembiso Mthwane, lithe lizwile ngesigameko kodwa belingakayi ukuyohlanganisa amehlo nomndeni.Uthe isigameko siwushaqisile umphakathi ngoba yize ubugebengu bukhona endaweni kodwa obokuhlaselwa kwabantu emzini wabo bebungakaze benzeke.“Sishaqekile nje futhi sizibuza imibuzo eminingi ngoba nalo mndeni ohlaselwe akukho okutheni esiwazela khona, ukuthi sekungenzeka isigameko sokuthi uhlaselelwe ekhaya bese ubulawa ngesihluku esingaka,” kusho uMthwane.Imizamo yokuthola umndeni ayiphumelelanga.

KUTHUNGATHWA amalungu amasha ebhodi lesikhwama sezitshudeni, i-National Students’ Financial Aid Scheme (NSFAS), anamava emikhakheni ehlukene aphinde abe neziqu ze-Masters.Lokhu kuvele emqulwini kahulumeni i-Government Gazette, okhishwe nguNgqongqoshe weMfundo ePhakeme, uDkt Nobuhle Nkabane, onxuse umphakathi ukuthi uphakamise amagama abantu abazoba amalungu aleli bhodi.Kulo mqulu kudingeka amalungu angu-18 azohlala kulona iminyaka emine.Inhlangano yezitshudeni i-EFFSC, ifuna abazoba amalungu aleli bhodi baphendule imibuzo esidlangalaleni.Le nhlangano ithe ifuna lonke uhlelo lwenziwe esidlangalaleni ngoba ifuna kunqandwe inkohlakalo.“Sifuna abafuna ukuba amalungu basivezele ukuthi bahlela ukuyivikela kanjani imali kahulumeni. Phambilini, ongqongqoshe balo mnyango bebeqoka abantu emakhoneni, abanye abangenawo amava. Yingakho lesi sikhwama sihaqwe yinkohlakalo engaka ingoba bekufakwa obhululu,” kusho i-EFFSC. Ibhodi lalesi sikhwama lahlakazwa ngowayengungqongqoshe womnyango uDkt Blade Nzimande, waqoka umlawuli uMnuz Freeman Nomvalo owehliselwe isikhathi azosihlala kulesi sikhwama njengoba ezogcina ngoDisemba, nonyaka.Kumanje uNomvalo umatasa uhambela izifundazwe ezehlukene lapho ehlanganisa amehlo nabahlinzeka ngezindawo zokuhlala ezikhungweni zemfundo, ethola izinselelo ababhekene nazo.Izinhlangano zezitshudeni ziveze ukuthi azifuni kube nezinxushunxushu uma sekumele kufakwe izicelo zangonyaka ozayo.Zifuna kungabi nokuphazamiseka uma sekuqokwa ibhodi elisha.Emqulwini okhishwe nguDkt Nkabane, amagama abazophakanyiswa kumele afike kuyena ngoSepthemba 3, ngenyanga ezayo.Kumalungu angu-18 ebhodi, angu-13 aqokwa ngungqongqoshe kanti afaka nosihlalo webhodi, amanye aqokwa yibhodi.Kudingeka abe namava emkhakheni wezezimali, owezomthetho, owezesayensi, owezokuphatha, owezobunjiniyela kanjalo nowemfundo ephakeme. Lesi sikhwama sixhasa siphinde siboleke izitshudeni imali yokufunda ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme.Umsebenzi walesi sikhwama ukululeka ungqongqoshe ngezithinta ukuxhaswa kwezitshudeni siphinde senze eminye imisebenzi esiyalelwe yona nguDkt Nkabane.Abaphakamisa amagama abantu kumele bashutheke ne-CV yalabo ababaphakamisayo, nencwadi yabo bevuma ukuphakanyiselwa ebhodini.Bangathumela ku:The Director General: Higher Education and Training, bayibhekise ku: Ms. K Matjane.Bangayiposela ku:Private Bag X 174, Pretoria, 0001.Bangathumela ne-email ku: [email protected]

ITHOBEKE amanxeba imindeni engaphezu kuka-500 eyayakhele indawo okwakhiwa kuyo idamu laseNanda, kufika uNgqongqoshe waManzi neNhlanzeko, uMnuz Senzo Mchunu, izolo, ezokwenza umsebenzi wokugezwa kwayo nokukhunjulwa kwabathandiweyo bayo ababengcwatshwe kule ndawo.UMchunu ubezofeza isicelo le mindeni obese kuhambe iminyaka yasicela kuhulumeni.Usihlalo wale mindeni okuthiwa yasuswa ngendluzula, uMnuz Scara Gcabashe, uthe kube yinto enhle okwenziwe wuhulumeni ekugcineni.“Abathandiweyo bethu bambiwa ngo-1988, sangabazi ukuthi bahamba bayongcwatshwaphi,” kusho uGcabashe.Uthe le nto ibibahlupha kakhulu njengoba bengabantu bakholelwayo esintwini.“Sibatshele ngo-2017 ukuthi siyawudinga lo mcimbi wokugezwa ngoba besibona sengathi abakutholi ukuphumula abathandiweyo bethu,” kusho yena.Uqhube wathi bonke abathandiweyo babo ababazi ukuthi amaBhunu athi uma ehamba kule ndawo, abangcwabaphi.“Uhulumeni wobandlululo wazenzela okuthandwa yiwo. Ngokwemiqingo, bathi bangcwatshwa emathuneni ahlukene eThekwini. Asinaso isiqiniseko salokho,” kubeka uGcabashe.Uveze ukuthi kukhona abanye abangambiwanga, abangaphansi kwamanzi namanje.Uthe ngaphansi kwesizwe samaQadi, ingu-317 imindeni eyasuswa, kuthi esizweni saseMaphephetheni ibe ngu-271. Uthe yonke yalayishwa emalolini ngendluzula.Uthe abanaso isibalo esiqondile semindeni engaphansi kwesizwe sakwaNgcolosi eyasuswa.“Yona ayizange ilayishwe ngisho emalolini, yabhunyelwa ngamanzi, abantu baphuma nalokho ababekugqokile kuphela,” kukhumbula uGcabashe.Uphethe ngelithi bagculisekile ngokwenzeke izolo, wathi bayakholwa ukuthi imiphefumulo yabathandiweyo babo izokuthola ukuphumula.UMchunu uthe idamu lakhiwa ngo-1989, ngenhloso yokuthi kuqedwe isomiso samanzi emphakathini, kulekelelwe ukusebenza kwezimboni bese kuthuthukiswa ezokuvakasha ngobuhle balo.“Kodwa ngaphansi kwalo kunendaba ebuhlungu, engaxoxwa, yabantu abanikela ngokukhulu, baphinde baphenduka ondingasithebeni,” kusho uMchunu.Uqhube wathi kwathikanyezwa amathuna abathandiweyo bemindeni eyayihlala kule ndawo. “Namuhla (esho izolo) sizovuma ukuthi okwenzeka la, akubanga nabo ubulungiswa, siyaxolisa ukuthi sithathe isikhathi eside kangaka ukufezekisa umcimbi ofana nalo,” kusho uMchunu.Uthe bami nabo bonke labo amazwi abo agcina eya ngokusha ngenxa yobude besikhathi, wathi bayabuqonda ubuhlungu balabo abanabathandiweyo babo abagcina bevaleleka emanzini.“Ukukhala kwabo buthule, buyozwiwa ngisho nayizizukulwana,” kusho uMchunu.Uqhube wathi umcimbi wayizolo uwuphawu lokuthi bayazibophezela ezintweni ezingamasiko ezibachazayo  njengabantu abamnyama.Kulo mcimbi kwembulwe itshe lesikhumbuzo elichaza ngokwenzeka athe liwuphawu lwethemba.

SIYANDA isibalo seziguli ezinezimpawu zomkhuhlane ezihlwahlwa njengezine-Pnuemonia eNingizimu AfrikaIsikhungo esibhekelele izifo ezithathelanayo, iNational Institute for Communicable Disease (NICD) embikweni waso wakamuva mayelana nokusabalala komkhuhlane, sithe uhlelo olubheka iPnuemonia kuleli, iPnuemonia Serveillance Programme, luveza ukuthi kusukela ngoMeyi 26, uhlobo lomkhuhlane oluhlasele kakhulu abantu oludala iPnuemonia,  i-influenza A ebuye yaziwe nge-H1N1. Abesikhungo bathi le influenza isihaqe abantu abangu-90 kwabangu-116 abanalesi sifo esidalwe ngamanye amagciwane. Bathi kulandela i-influenza B/Victoria  ngezigameko ezingu-23 eziholele ekutheni iziguli zihlaselwe yiPneumonia.Isikhungo sithi iziguli eziningi zihlaselwe zineSwine Flu zijwayele ukuba nezimpawu zomkhuhlane ezijwayelekile, okuhlanganisa umkhuhlane, ubuhlungu bomzimba, ukugodola, ukukhathala, umphimbo obuhlungu nekhanda elibuhlungu. Ngakolunye uhlangothi, ezihaqwe yigciwane iRespiratory Syncytial Virus (RSV) - enezimpawu ezicishe zifane nezeCovid-19 - ziba nenkinga yomgudu wokuphefumula, okuholela ekutheni zicinane esifubeni, kube nzima ukuthi ziphefumule kahle kwesinye isikhathi kube nomsindo esifubeni noma zikhwehlele kakhulu. I-NICD ithe iqhathanisa izibalo zabantu abalaliswa ezibhedlela nabaya ezibhedlela belashwe babuyele emakhaya,  benezinkinga zokuphefumula. Izinga liyalingana nelanyakenye, ngokwezibalo abazithole ezibhedlela ezizimele nakodokotela. "Odokotela siyanxusa ukuthi uma iziguli zifika ziphethwe umkhuhlane zingakwazi ukuphefumula kahle bazihlolisise ukuthi zingenwe iliphi igciwane  ngoba ukumkhuhlane obukeka ungenawo amandla ungaholela ekutheni umuntu agule kakhulu noma ashone, ikakhulukazi kubantu abasengcupheni," kusho iNICD esitatimendeni.Iqhube yathi abantu ethe basengcupheni ngabesifazane abakhulelwe abanesikhathi esingaphansi kwamasonto ayisithupha, abanezifo ezingamahlalakhona kuzo okubalwa iHIV, isifo sikashukela, izifo zamaphaphu, isifo sofuba, izifo zezinso, izifo zenhliziyo, abakhuluphele ngokweqile, abantu abadala abaneminyaka engaphezulu kuka-65  nezingane ezineminyaka engaphansi kwemibili.I-NICD ithe nakuba isizini yomkhuhlane isinesikhashana iqalile kusabalulekile ukuthi abantu bawugomele umkhuhlane ukuze bagweme ukugula kakhulu.

IBHOKELWE umphakathi yehlela ngezansi inkosi okuthiwa ibimise uhlelo lwezigidi zamaRandi lokufakwa kwetiyela endaweni yayo.Inkosi yakwaZashuke, eBulwer, uPhimbo Ngubane, imemezele ukuthi kuzoqhubeka ukufakwa kwetiyela emva  komhlangano womphakathi, lapho izakhamuzi ziyisole ngokumisa ukufakwa kwetiyela.Bese kuphele amasonto amathathu kumile ukufakwa kwetiyela elingu-11 km elisuka kwaBhidla, liya eNkwezela.Ukufakwa kwetiyela kwabelwe uR297 million.NgoMgqibelo, kwakunomhlangano womphakathi, lapho izakhamuzi zasola uNgubane ngokuvimba intuthuko.UNgubane kuthiwa wamisa inkontileka efuna ukuthi osomabhizinisi bendawo bahlomule, efuna nokwazi ukuthi abantu abazophazanyiswa ukwakhiwa komgwaqo bazonxeshezelwa kanjani.NgoMsombuluko, kuphinde kwaba nomunye umhlangano womphakathi, lapho uNgubane eveze khona ukuthi ukwakhiwa komgwaqo kuzoqhubeka.Emhlanganweni, uNgubane uthe usamile kwakufunayo, kodwa wathi bavumelene ngokuthi usonkontileka aqhubeke nomsebenzi."Ngisamile kwelokuthi ngifuna uR61 million usale kule ndawo. Nalabo umgwaqo ozodlula emagcekeni abo, kuthinteke amathuna, kufanele bathole izinxephezelo. Lokho sizokuxoxa kodwa inkontileka izobe iqhubeka."Ngithe angizehlise kinina. Ingakho ngithe angizizele mina noma bengimatasa. Angifuni nithi inkosi isifakwe igwinya. Angifuni nithi kwakufika yona (inkosi) ngesikhathi kusazovinjwa, uma sekunezivumelwano ayisafiki."Ikhansela lendawo, uMnuz Sipho Mthembu, lithe uzoboshwa umuntu ozophinda azame ukumisa ukwakhiwa komgwaqo."Kuyongiphoqa ukuthi ngivele ngibize amaphoyisa azobopha umuntu. Angikhathali ukuthi unasiphi isikhundla. Ngizobiza amaphoyisa afike ngo-12 azokubopha. Ngeke sivume ukuthi kube nomuntu ozomisa intuthuko."UNgubane usole ababebize umhlangano wangoMgqibelo ngokungcolisa igama lakhe, wathi uthukwa ngazo zonke izinhlamba."Kuthiwa ngiyinkosi eyixoki, eyiphixiphixi. Iqiniso ukuthi mina ngisuke ngilwelwa nina. Nina nibanga ithambo elingenanyama, niyayiyeka inyama."Osekomitini lomphakathi, uMnuz Mnelisi Shange, ukuphikile ukuthi bahudulela phansi igama likaNgubane.Uthe babiza umhlangano wangoMgqibelo ngoba bekhathazekile ngokumiswa kokwakhiwa komgwaqo.UMnuz Salanjalo Mncwabe, uthe kwakungafanele uNgubane amise ukwakhiwa komgwaqo engakhulumile nesizwe asibusayo."Inkosi iyinkosi ngesizwe sayo. Inkosi ayikwazi ukuyokwenza into engafunwa isizwe sayo. Awukwazi ukuhamba uthi uyongikhelela amanzi, ungangibuzile ukuthi ngiyawadinga yini."UMnuz Bheki Sithole, uthe uNgubane wake wamisa ukwakhiwa kwemigwaqo engenela emakhaya, efuna ukukhokhelwa inkampani eyayinikezwe umsebenzi."Nalapho samncenga, sathi ngoba ayikho into ebhalwe phansi ethi usonkontileka akamnike uR30 000, sicela abadedele baqhubeke nomsebenzi. Inkwali yahlala emgwaqweni, kwaze kwadaleka ingozi."

LUGOBILE uphondo kuhulumeni waKwaZulu- Natal wagcina uwuhlehlisa umcimbi wokukhumbula iSilo uDinuzulu kaCetshwayo obekufanele ube ngeSonto kwaCeza, oLundi. Uhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal ubuhlele ukugubha iminyaka ewu-110 kwakhothama uMamonga woSuthu.UMgwazi kadinwa zingqapheli, wahlala esihlaweni sikayise ngo-1884 wakhothama ngo-1913 eneminyaka engu-45. Uhulumeni waKwaZulu- Natal ubumemezele ukuthi umcimbi uzoba ngoMashi 10.Bekulindeleke ukuthi umcimbi uthanyelwe yiSilo uMisuzulu kaZwelithini okuyisona esibusayo manje. Izolo Isolezwe lithole isitatimende sikaNdunankulu kaZulu uMfundisi uThulasizwe Buthelezi ethi iSilo sizobe singekho lapho.UMfundisi uButhelezi uthe isizathu wukuthi kukhona izinto ezingaxoxwanga kahle neSilo ngalo mcimbi.“ Ngenxa yemibuzo eminingi yabezindaba , iSilo sithe angidlulise umyalezo wokuthi ngeke sibe khona emcimbini wokukhumbula iSilo uDinuzulu ozoba ngoMashi 10. Akekho umuntu ovela endlunkulu ozomela iSilo. ISilo siyawuthokozela umcimbi kodwa kufanele kuxoxwe naso ngendaba yesikhathi nendawo,’’ kusho uButhelezi.Emuva kwalokhu Isolezwe lithole ngezingede zalo ukuthi umcimbi uhlehlile. Isolezwe libone incwadi okuthiwa ibhalwe wuNdunankulu uNkk Nomusa Dube - Ncube ekhuleka kuBayede emazisa ngoshintsho.Incwadi iveza ukuthi usuku lomcimbi lushintshe emuva kokubonana naendlunkulu kaZulu ngalolu daba.“Bayede! Le ncwadi yazisa iSilo ngoshintsho olukhona emuva komhlangano nendlunkulu ngoMashi 2 lapho bekuxoxwa khona ngomcimbi wokukhumbula iSilo uDinuzulu. Indlunkulu iphakamise ukuthi umcimbi ube ngoMashi 16,’’ kusho incwadi.Iyaqhubeka ibalule ukuthi indlunkulu ikhathazwa wukuthi uhulumeni awuyinakanga indaba yesikhumbuzo sokukhothama kweSilo uZwelithini kaBhekuzulu esebuza ngoMashi 12, 2021.“ Kuvele ukuthi indlunkulu ibivele ihlele umkhuleko wokukhumbula ukukhothama kweSilo ozoba ngeSonto ngoMashi 10. Kungakho sithi umcimbi weSilo uDinuzulu uzoba ngoMashi 16 kwaCeza esifundeni iZululand,’’ kusho incwadi.Okhulumela ihhovisi likaNdunankulu, uMnuz Bongi Gala, ebuzwa ngalokhu akaphikanga akavumanga kodwa uthe bazokhipha isitatimende ngalolu daba.

KUGELEZE igazi eMaotana eNanda ngempelasonto, kudutshulwa, kubulawa abayisithupha abasolwa ngokuhlalisa lubhozi umphakathi ngobugebengu.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe, abafi bahlaselwe emakubo, yiqulu ebelihlome ngezibhamu nangocelebha.Umthombo weSolezwe ocele ukungadalulwa, uthe abafi basolwa ngokubulala ngokuhlanganyela isakhamuzi ngoLwesine.Uthe kuthe uma oyedwa wabo eyobuzwa ngalokhu, wadubula ebhekise kwabebeyombuza.“Lusuke lapho ke uthuthuva, umphakathi wadinwa, wahamba ubangenela ngabanye ngabanye, ubadubula,” kusho umthombo.Ilungu lophiko oluqapha ubugebengu endaweni nalo elicele ukungadalulwa, lithe umphakathi ubabulele ngoba bese ukhathele ubugebengu babo.“Bebeyizigebengu. Umphakathi uthukuthele ngoba bayacanasa emphakathini. Badubula babulale umphakathi, bawuphuca izinto zawo emini ilanga libalele. Umuntu adubule umuntu ambulale, embulalela iselula kaR200,” kusho ilungu lophiko.Okhulumela inkampani yonogada ehambela zonke izindawo zezehlakalo, iReaction Unit South Africa (RUSA) uMnuz Prem Balram, uthe esigamekweni sokugcina esenzeke ngoMgqibelo emini, iqulu libulale owesilisa (52) eqeda kuphuma endlini yakhe.Umthombo udalule ukuthi kulesi sehlakalo, iqulu lithe liyamdubula, wangadubuleka, lagcina selimgenca kuqala, lase limphinda isibili ngesibhamu, wabe eseyadubuleka.UBalram uthe esigamekweni esingaphambi kwaleso, okuthiwa senzeke ngabo-10 ekuseni kuhlaselwe omunye wesilisa (42), ophoqwe ukuthi aphume endlini yesihlobo sakhe ngaphambi kokuthi adutshulwe kuphindelelwa kubuka izihlobo.Kuthiwa bagasele kubo, bangamthola ngaphambi kokuthi bambone ematasa edla emzini wesihlobo oseduze, banikela khona, bafike bamdubula bephindelela.“Abezimo eziphuthumayo enkampanini yethu, bebesemata naleso sigameko ngesikhathi betshelwa ukuthi kukhona omunye odutshulwe abantu abafanayo endaweni ebude buduze nalapho bebekhona,” kusho uBalram.Uthe kokwenzeke ngoLwesihlanu, kudutshulwe owesilisa (43) obematasa elekelela ngesikhathi kwenziwa amalungiselelo omngcwabo kwamakhelwane wakhe.“Kuthiwa yena, abasolwa baqale bamfuna isibhamu, kwathi uma ephendula ngelithi akanaso, bamdubula,” kusho uBalram.Amaphoyisa abebengakayiphenduli imibuzo athunyelelwe yona ngalezi zigameko.

KUVUNGUZA umoya wokuthula nozwano phakathi kwabantu baseMzumbe, abavota ezikhungweni ezehlukene endaweni.Zivulwe ngesikhathi esifanele izikhungo zokuvota endaweni kanti  akubikwanga zihibe. Phakathi kwabantu abebezovota bekuxubene abadala nabancane. Bebehleli izixukwana ngaphandle kwezikhungo abanye bebambe imigqa belinde ukungena ngaphakathi ukuze bavote.Kuzo zonke izikhungo bekubonakala amaphoyisa ahlomile eqaphe isimo futhi ehla enyuka ngaphandle nangaphakathi ezikhungweni. Yize bekunabantu bamaqembu ahlukene kodwa bebehleli ngokuzwana bedansa bexoxa.Amanye amalungu omphakathi athe avuke ngovivi ezilungiselela ukuvota,  abelubheke ngabomvu usuku lokuvota. Bathe banezikhalo ngentuthuko ikakhulu amanzi namathuba emisebenzi. Kukhona abakhononde ngokuthi  amanzi aphuma kanye emuva kwesikhathi eside futhi namaloli athwala amanzi awafiki.Abanye bathe bahleli nezingane ezifundile emakhaya kodwa aziqashiwe. Bathe kukhona abake bakubona phambilini okuyizindlu nogesi kodwa kusashoda.Kulindeleke ukuthi ukuvota ezikhungweni kuqhubeke kuze kushaye u-9 ebusuku uma sekuvalwa izikhungo.

KUVELA ukuthi nabefundisi bamabandla abasindisiwe bambodelana KwaMhlabuyalingana, ePhelandaba kumelaphi wendabuko ongakufihli ukuthi "uyathwalisana''.Lo melaphi wendabuko, osephenduke undabuzekwayo nasezinkundleni zokuxhumana, uthe kucacile ukuthi abantu bakuleli abasakwenqeni ukuthwala. Usizi nobubha yikona okwenza bakhethe lo mkhuba.UMnuz Mvelase, odume ngelikaShumi lamakati, uthe abefundisi bamabandla abasindisiwe batheleka bethelekile kuyena. Iningi lisuke lifuna ukuthi kuchume amabandla alo nabazalwane banganqeni ukunikela izimali ezishisiwe ebandleni ukuze kusimame nomfundisi.''Ngeke ngibe namahloni ngalo msebenzi ngoba yinto eyenziwayo. Ngiwenza impela nje, ngithwalisa nabo impela abefundisi abasindisiwe, ngeke ngibacwase. Namanje nje lapha izolo kade kukhona abavela eGoli naseMpumalanga ekade ngibathwalisa,'' usho kanje.Uphikile ukuthi ukuthwala kuyingozi njengoba abanye abelaphi bendabuko beyaye baxwayise. Uthe kuya ngokuthi uthwala ngayiphi indlela nokuthi uthwaliswa wubani.“Ngeke ngibadalule abefundisi esengibasizile kodwa yinqwaba la KwaZulu-Natal. Abazalwane babo baze babathengele nezimoto imbala. Abantu bangakhuluma nje abafuna ukukusho kodwa okusalayo lento iyenzeka futhi yenziwa abantu bakuwo wonke amazinga empilo muva nje,” egcizelela.Uthe alikho icala ekuthwaleni, ngoba umuntu usuke ehlose ukuqinisekisa ukuthi leyo nto aziphilisa ngayo iyakhula.Uthe izithwalo zakhe azinabo ubungozi ngoba zisuke zingahlanganisi ukuthi akubulawe abantu noma kuchithwe igazi.ISolezwe Ngempelasonto likhulume nabefundisi ababili abacele ukuba kugodlwe amagama abo.Owokuqala ulimise ngesihloko elokuthi selokhu ahlangana noMvelase izinto uzibona zikhanya ebandleni, nomnikelo abazalwane bawukhipha ngenye indlela.Uthe naye kukhona omunye uMfundisi owamcebisa ukuthi kumele aye kuphi uma efuna ukubona izinto zakhe zikhanya ebandleni, athole nomnikelo obonakalayo.Owesibili uthe akathandi ukuthi kwaziwe ukuthi ibandla lakhe likhuliswa yini kodwa uvumile ukuthi kunento ayithola eyisithwalo okuyiyona edala ukuthi izinto zenzeke.Bonke laba befundisi bathi abayithi vu emindenini yabo eyokuthi bathwele, baye bababaze ubukhulu bukaNkulunkulu uma izinto sezenzeka.

KUNXENXWA abantu ukuthi baqede indlala futhi badale amathuba omsebenzi ngokutshala amakhowe besebenzisa ubuchwepheshe baseChina obubizwa ngeJuncau Technology obenza impilo ibe lula.Lobu buchwepheshe basungulwa nguSolwazi Lin Zahanxi waseFujian Agriculture & Forestry University (FAFU) ngo-1986. Wazakhela utshani obungezinhlobo ezingu-49 bokutshala amakhowe adliwayo nasetshenziselwa ukwakha imithi.Kuthiwa lobu tshani obucishe bufane nomhlanga, buphinde busize ukuvikela inhlabathi ingaguguleki noma ubusike budliwe yimfuyo.UMnuz Hui Lin ongumqondisi wezokuqeqesha eChina National Juncao Research Center of Juncao Technology, uthe iSilo esesebuza, uGoodwill Zwelithini kaBhekuzulu, wakugqugquzela ukusetshenziswa kwe-Juncao ngesikhathi evakashele esikhungweni sabo okuyinto ayenza kwaze kwaba yikathathu.“Lobu buchwepheshe benza ukuthi kuhlale kunokudla okunomsoco futhi budala amathuba omsebenzi nokwenza imali. Amazwe amaningi asathuthuka ayabunaka manje. Sikhuluma nje, bangaphezu kwabayisishiyagalolunye omengameli bamazwe asebake bavakashela isikhungo futhi sebusabalale emazweni angu-107,” kusho uLin.Uthe isikhungo sivule amagatsha emazweni angu-13 okuhlanganisa nesiseCedara College of Agriculture eduze kwaseHowick.UMnuz Lungelo Dlamini osebenza ngezesayensi eMnyangweni wezoLimo KwaZulu-Natal, uthe i-Juncao yethulwa kubo ngo-2005, futhi bayisebenzisela ama-oyster mushroom.Uthe sebeqeqeshe abalimi abangaphezu kwenkulungwane. Uqhube wathi babheke ukungagcini ngokuyisebenzisela amakhowe kodwa nangezinye izindlela ngoba isimo sezulu sasesifundazweni iFujian, eChina, sicishe sifane nesaseKZN.Ugqugquzele abalimi ukuthi bakubheke ukutshala amakhowe ngoba isidingo sawo siyakhula.Uthe abafuna ukuhlomula kumele baxhumane namahhovisi omnyango asezindaweni abaseduze nazo okuyilapho kunabeluleki babo khona okuyibo abazobasiza mahhala.ULin noDlamini bebekhuluma nezitshudeni ezingu-17 zaseDurban University of Technology (DUT) ezihambele eChina amasonto amabili ngenhloso yokuyofunda.Uhambo luhlelwe yiConfusius Institute (CI) yaseDUT neFafu futhi luzosongwa ngoLwesihlanu. Bahambele izindawo ezigcina ulwazi ukufunda kabanzi ngeChina; ikakhulukazi ngeFujian nendlela yesimanje okwenziwa ngazo izinto emikhakheni okubalwa kuyo eyezolimo, imfundo neminye.Umqondisi weDUT CI, uMnuz Frank Lin Wu uthe babheke ukuthuthukisa ukuqeqeshelwa amakhono futhi ubuchwepheshe ngenye yezinto abaqala ngazo. “Sibheke ukwakha inkundla ezozuzisa umphakathi ikakhulukazi abantu abasha nezingane ngokubafundisa iMandarin (ulimi lwaseChina) ukubasiza bathole amathuba ahlunene namakhono,” kusho yena.

KUZOSHAYWA izinyoni ezimbili ngetshe elilodwa njengoba kugujwa usuku lweNkululeko namhlanje ezweni lonke. Kuzobe kuhlanganiswa neminyaka engu-30 elakuleli lathola inkululeko, ngaphansi kwentando yabantu.Ngalolu suku abantu baphuma ngobuningi babo bashaya ujenga beyovotela uhulumeni omusha ngoba izwe lalisuka ngaphansi kombuso wobandlululo.UMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, uzohola umgubho wosuku ezindlini zoMbuso ePitoli. Ihhovisi lakhe linxuse abantu bakuleli ukuthi bagubhe lolu suku ngokubheka ibanga elihanjiwe selokhu izwe lakhululeka. Banxuswe ukuthi bakhe ikusasa elizobungazwa nguwonke wonke. Isiqubulo salo nyaka sithinta eyeminyaka engu-30 yenkululeko, ukubambisana kanjalo nokuthuthukiswa kwezwe.“Le migubho ihambisana nokubungazwa kweminyaka engu-28 kwabhalwa uMthethosisekelo wezwe. Usuku lweNkululeko lwakhelwe ukuhlanganisa abantu bakuleli, uhulumeni kanjalo nezinhlaka ezehlukene,” kusho uRamaphosa.Kulo mgubho kulindeleke uNgqongqoshe wezemiDlalo, ubuCiko namaSiko uMnuz Zizi Kodwa, noNdunankulu waseGauteng uMnuz Panyaza Lesufi, nezinye izikhulu zikahulumeni ukuthi bahlanganyele noRamaphosa uma selugujwa. KwaZulu-Natal lolu suku luzogujwa kumasipala wesifunda. uGu.UNdunankulu wesifundazwe uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube, uzohola uhulumeni kulo mgubho.Kuwona uzobalula izinhlelo zokulungela kwesifundazwe ukubamba ukhetho lwangenyanga ezayo ngoMeyi 29.  Umgubho uzoba sezinkundleni zemidlalo iTB Molefe.Namaqembu ahlukene ezepolitiki azogubha usuku ezindaweni ezehlukene.I-IFP izokwethula ibhasi elizosetshenziswa yiqembu uma likhankasa.Umengameli we-IFP uMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa, uzokwethula ibhasi eBlue Lagoon eThekwini, bese lihambela emalokishni okubalwa eMlaza, ligcine eFolweni, lapho leli qembu lizobe ligubha usuku lweNkululeko.Unobhala jikelele we-EFF uMnuz Marshall Dlamini, uzogubha usuku ngokuhlangana nomphakathi ohlala ehostela iGlebelands, eMlaza.

Indlala ezweni elingumakhelwane iZimbabwe isidale ukuthi kuqhanyukwe nohlelo lokuthi kuzingelwe izindlovu ezingu-200 ukuze zidliwe ngabantu.UNgqongqoshe wezeMvelo eZimbabwe, uMnuz Sithembiso Nyoni, ucashunwe kwiBulawayo24, ethi uhulumeni ucabanga ukunqanda ukungqubuzana phakathi kwezilwane nabantu ngokuthi kuzingelwe izindlovu ezigcwele ngokweqile ezweni. Lokhu kuhloswe ngakho ukuqeda indlala nokunciphisa izindlovu.“IZimbabwe inezindlovu eziningi kunezidingayo. Sinezindlovu ezidlula amahlathi ethu. Njengohulumeni sikhuluma neZimParks (Zimbabwe Parks and Wildlife Authority) neminye imiphakathi ukwenza okwake kwenziwa yiNamibia ukuze sibulale izindlovu bese sinxenxa abesifazane ukuthi bomise inyama, bayipakishe bese benza isiqiniseko sokuthi ifika emiphakathini edinga umsoco,” kusho uNyoni.Kuthiwa indlala eZimbabwe idalwa yisomiso esihlasele kuleliya zwe.

KUSHESHE kwaguqa ukuqulwa kwecala lokubulawa kowayengunozinti weBafana Bafana ne-Orlando Pirates, uSenzo Meyiwa, ummangalelwa wokuqala ekhala ngokuxinwa yisisu.OMuzikawukhulelwa Sibiya, Bongani Sandiso Ntanzi, Mthobisi Prince Mncube, Mthokoziseni Maphisa noFisokuhle Nkani Ntuli baphambi kweNkantolo eNkulu yasePitoli ngokufa kukaMeyiwa.Icala liguqe isikhulu enkampanini yamaselula iVodacom, uNksz Pinky Vythilingam, sisaqhubeka nokwethula ubufakazi baso obumayelana nokusetshenziswa kwamaselula abathinteka kuleli cala.UNksz Vythilingam ubethula ubufakazi bakhe eholwa uMshushisi woMbuso u-Advocate Ronnie Sibanda.USibiya uphakamise isandla ecela ukulumana indlebe nommeli wakhe, u-Adv Thulani Mngomezulu.UMngomezulu ubuye kuSibiya watshela inkantolo ukuthi ummangalelwa wokuqala uthi akazizwa kahle, ukhishwe yisisu ekuseni.“Manje senze njani?” kubuza ijaji elengamele ukuqulwa kwecala, uRatha Mokgoatlheng.“Ummangalelwa wokuqala uzwakalise ukuthi ucela liguqe icala, lihlehliselwe usuku lwakusasa,” kuphendula uMngomezulu.UMokgoatlheng obezwakana engagculisekile, ubuzisise ukuthi simqale nini isisu uSibiya, uMngomezulu waphendula ngelithi: “Ekuseni namuhla (esho izolo)”.UMokgoatlheng wexwayise ngokuthi uzoyidinga incwadi kadokotela ozomhlola uSibiya aphinde amnike nemithi, ozokwenaba ngokuthi uguliswa yini.Icala liyabuyela enkantolo namuhla.

KULINDELEKE ukuthi inkantolo ikhiphe isigwebo ecaleni likanesi owaqasha izinkabi ezabulala umyeni wakhe owayewunjiniyela.Ibamba lejaji, uSolwazi Bonke Dumisa, kulindeleke ukuthi liwise isigwebo eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini.Luwubekele uMsombuluko noLwesibili umsebenzi wokufundwa kwesigwebo ngenxa yobufakazi obuningi elethulelwa bona.Phambilini uDumisa walahla ngecala lokuthumba, elokubulala ngokweba imoto uNompumelelo Goncalves.Lo wesifazane walahlwa ngamacala benomfowabo uNkosinathi Zungu.UZungu, nayekade eqashwe nabo, babulala uMnuz Nkosi Timmy Langa, owayewunjiniyela kaTransnet.Bamthumba emzini wakhe ePinetown ngobusuku bangoSepthemba 29, 2020 bayombulalela emahlathini oZwathini, eNdwedwe.Bazihlangula kwaze kwaba uDumisa ubalahla ngalawa macala ngo-Ephreli nonyaka.UNksz Zodwa Langa ongudadewabo kamufi, ufuna inkantolo ukuthi igixabeze ababulali ngodilikajele.UNksz Langa uthe uyobe ubathobe amanxeba uDumisa uma ebanikeza izigwebo ezizobahlalisa ejele isikhathi eside laba ababili.“Silindele ukuthi ijaji libanikeze udilikajele ababulala, ikakhulukazi uMpume (Goncalves). Lokho kuzosisiza ukuthi sikwazi ukuphola nasemoyeni ngoba abakwenza kwasizwisa ubuhlungu,” kusho uNksz Langa.Phambilini ehlulela uDumisa watusa ubuchwepheshe besimanje wathi uMbuso ukwazile ukwethula ubufakazi obuqanda ikhanda uvezela inkantolo ukuthi yilaba ababulala uLanga.Umshushisi u-Advocate Krishen Shah wayesebenzisa ubufakazi bezingcingo eziqoshiwe, obe-tracker yezimoto, obasemabhange, obemibhoshongo okudonsa khona amafoni wabiza nochwepheshe bamafoni.Inkabi uJames Makhudu Mthimkhulu, engomunye yabantu abaqashwa uGoncalves yathenjiswa uR15 000, yalivuma icala yagwetshwa iminyaka engu-20 ejele.UMthimkhulu waphenduka ufakazi woMbuso wazininda kanye nalaba abazogwetshwa.Watshela inkantolo ukuthi uyena noZungu abaklinya ngentambo ye-ayina uLanga washona. Wathi abakwenza bebulala babeqashwe uGoncalves.

IGWETSHWE odilikajele abahlanu neminyaka engu-30 ngaphezulu yiNkantolo yesifunda yaseNquthu, inyanga mbumbulu ezishaya samphrofethi, elahlwe ngoxhaxha lwamacala okudlwengula.Kuthe ngoLwesithathu, inkantolo yagweba kanzima uMthokozisi Cyril Mdlalose (37) ngamacala amathathu okudlwengula abesifazane abasebancane abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-15 no- 18, emva kokuthi ayebaholela ophathe, ezenza umphrofethi okhathalele ukubelapha.NgoFebhuwari 2022, uMdlalose kuthiwa waholele ophathe umgilwa oneminyaka ewu-15, emva kokuthi ekhohlise unina (kamgilwa) ngesibonakaliso esithile, okuthe uma umgilwa efika endlini yakhe wamyalela ukuthi akahlubule, ngaphambi kokuthi amdlwengule ephindelela. Ngo-Agasti ngawo unyaka ofanayo, uMdlalose kuthiwa wasebenzisa amaqhinga afanayo ukulutha unina kamgilwa oneminyaka ewu-18.  Kuthiwa wathatha umgilwa wahamba naye waya emfuleni ngenhloso yokuyomhlambulula.  Kufikwa emfuleni kuthiwa wamyalela ukuthi akangene emanzini ahlambe. Ngesikhathi  umgilwa eqeda ukugeza, kuthiwa uMdlalose wayesevele elendlalile ithawula, wamyalela ukuthi ahlale kulo, wamgcoba umuthi wakhe ekhanda nasezindlebeni. Emva kwalokho kuthiwa umgilwa wahanjelwa umqondo wangabona lutho okwenzekayo, kwathi uma ephaphama wayesesele yedwa uMdlalose engasabonwa.Kuvele ukuthi le mikhuba uyiqale ngo-2020, okuyilapho edlwengule khona umgilwa ono-18 emva kokuthi emhlolelile wathi uyathakathwa kangangokuba izinsuku zakhe ephila emhlabeni ziyancipha.  Wayalela umgilwa ukuthi afike emzini wakhe osendaweni okuthiwa kuseMadresini, khona ezokwazi ukumsusa isinyama ahamba naso. Esefikile umgilwa, kuthiwa wamyalela ukuthi akalale abheke phezulu, wamgcoba ngomuthi ngaphambi kokuthi amdlwengule. Kuthiwa wayalela umgilwa ukuthi angayixoxeli muntu indaba, kwathi emva kwezinsuku ezingu-11 waphinde wamdlwengula.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe emva kokuvulwa kwamacala, umphenyi wahlanganisa ubufakazi obuholele ekuboshweni kukaMdlalose.UKhomishana wamaPhoyisa esifundazweni uLieutenant General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi ukushayele ihlombe ukugwetshwa komdlwenguli.“Lesi sigwebo sifke ngesikhathi esihle kuyinyanga yokuhlonipha iqhaza labesifazane. Izigwebo ezinjengalezi ziyawakhuthaza amaphoyisa ekutheni aphenye ngokungakhathali emacaleni afuze lawa, enolwazi lokuthi izinkantolo zizokwenza isiqiniseko sokususa izigilamkhuba emphakathini,” kusho uMkhwanazi.UMdlalose ngeke esavunyelwa ukuphatha isibhamu, igama lakhe lizokleliswa ohlwini lwabantu abalahlwe ngamacala ocansi, abayingozi.

INKANTOLO eNkulu yaseMgungundlovu igwebe abane abalahlwe yicala lokubulala ngesihluku isihlobo somunye wabo, okuthiwa basishaya ngesagila ngaphambi kokusiklinya saze safa, sisolwa ngokuthakatha okwenza siphumelele sodwa emndenini,  esigamekweni esenzeka ngo-2021.Inkantolo igwebe uSiyabonga Shelembe (37) udilikajele ngecala lokubulala ubabekazi wakhe uNksz Tholakele Cynthia Shelembe (53) okuthiwa wayemsola ngokuphehlela amalungu omndeni amanzi amnyama, okwenza aphumelele yedwa emndenini.  Ugwetshwe nozakwabo okuthiwa wabanxenxa ukuthi bamlekelele ekubalaleni umgilwa okungoThobani Mkhize (23) naye onikezwe udilikajele ngecala lokubulala, kwathi uThandolwethu Sibisi wagwetshwa iminyaka engu-25, kuSiphelele Cele (21) yaba ngu-18 ngamacala okubamba inkunzi.Emva kokuthi inkantolo ilalele izethulo zabameli babamangalelwa isehlisile lesi sigwebo, njengoba kuvele enkantolo ukuthi babebancane ngeminyaka ngesikhathi kwenzeka icala futhi baxolisa emndenini wakwaShelembe ngokuwuzwisa ubuhlungu.UShelembe noMkhize banikezwe iminyaka engu-15 bebhadla ejele kwathi uCele noSibisi bagwetshwa eminyaka engu-10 nengu-12 ngokwehlukana.Kuthiwa uCele, uSibisi noMkhize basuka eMlaza baqonda eNyangwini  kuMasipala Ugu, lapho babezohlangana khona noShelembe, owabatshela ngeqhinga lakhe lokubulala ubabekazi. Wabatshela ukuthi uma sebembulele, bathathe izimoto zakhe ezimbili okuyizona ababezozikhokhela ngazo ngomsebenzi ababezowenza.Kuthiwa bamhlasela ngesagila ababesinikwe uShelembe bamklinya ngaphambi kokuthi bathathe izimoto zakhe ezimbili bahambe nazo.  Eyodwa kuthiwa bayishisa kwathi enye bayidayisa bahlukaniselana imali.  Kuthiwa uShelembe waboshwa ngakusasa emva kokuthi ebonwe umuntu omaziyo owambona ngesikhathi kuthathwa izimoto zikababekazi wakhe, okuwuyena owakhipha abanye ayenabo.UMshushisi u-Advocate Nkonzo Mlotshwa uhole ubufakazi bomunye ufakazi owayenalaba ngesikhathi kwenziwa icala. Kuphinde kwafundwa isitatimende sendodakazi kaShelembe  eveze ukuthi unina wayeyinsika emndenini.  Imizamo yokuphonsela inselelo isinqumo senkantolo ukuthi kubuyekezwe isigwebo ayiphumelelanga.Okhulumela uphiko lwezokuShushiswa koMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal uNkk Natasha Ramkisson Kara uthe bayasemukela isigwebo.“Siyathemba ukuthi sizothumela umyalezo oshubile kwabanentshisekelo yokwenza ubugebengu obufanayo. Sincoma umsebenza owenziwe yilolu phiko namaphoyisa,” usho kanje.

UMGUBHO wosuku lwamalungelo abantu obekukhunjulwa kulona abangu-69, ababulawa ngumbuso wobandlululo esibhicongweni sango-1960 eSharpeville eGoli, luphenduke inkundla yokugxeka uhulumeni kaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, okwenziwe abaholi abahlukene bamaqembu ezombusazwe.Laba baholi bebekhala ngokuthi kuze kwadingeka ukuthi bangene ngenkani emalibeni okungcwatshwe kuwona lezi zinkumbi ezafa embhikishweni wokulwa nokuphathwa kwamapasi ngoMashi 21, 1960. Abaholi okubalwa owePAC uMnuz Mzwanele Nyhontso, owe-Action SA uMnuz Herman Mashaba, oweBuild One South Africa uMnuz Mmusi Maimane, uMnuz Ace Magashule we-African Congress for Transformation (ACT), owe-Azapo uMnuz Nelvis Qekema, babhikishe ngaphandle kwenkundla iGeorge Thabe obekubanjwe kuyona lo mgubho.Bagxeke uhulumeni ngokufaka ubukhazikhazi okubalwa okhaphethi ababomvu ugubha lo lusuku ekubeni ngabe ulisebenzisela ukukhumbula labo abasala enkundleni. Laba baholi bathe kudingeke ukuthi baze bangene ngenkani emalibeni ngoba akuwona awe-ANC kodwa iPAC eyaqhamuka nalo lusuku.“Safelwa izishoshovu ngaloluya suku. Asilugubhi lo lusuku kodwa sisuke sikhumbula abasishiya, belwela umzabalazo. Kuyichilo okwenziwa nguhulumeni ngoba kuza umengameli wezwe bese kufakwa okhaphethi ababovu, siphinde sivinjwe ukungena,” kusho uNyhontso.Uthe bameme amaqembu anomqondo ofana nowabo ukuzogubha lolu suku.UQekema ugxeke ukubizwa kwalo lusuku ngolwamalungelo ekubeni kumele kuthiwe usuku lwaseSharpeville.“Sizohlangana okhethweni sikhiphe i-ANC emandleni singamaqembu ahlukene. Sifuna lo lusuku lubuyele kwiSharpeville ngoba asazi lwashintshelwani.” Nabanye abaholi bahambe emazwini kaQekema okuthi kumele kubuyelwe ekutheni usuku lwaseSharpeville.Ethula inkulumo yosuku uRamaphosa ugxeke umbuso wobandlululo wathi waletha inhlupheko yeminyaka kubantu bakuleli ikakhulu kwabamnyama.Uthe kuningi osekwenziwe nguhulumeni ukubakhipha ebubheni.“Abantu sebenezindlu, banogesi, amanzi, bathola isibonelelo, bafunda mahhala nokunye. Inkinga yokucishwa kukagesi, simatasa nayo, sizoqeda ngayo.”Uthe abantwana abavela emindenini ehlwempu sebeyasiphothula isikole, baze bayofunda emanyuvesi.“Sesikwaze ukubuyisa umhlaba ongama-hektha angu-4 million kubantu ababephucwe lo mhlaba. Sesikwaze ukubuyisa omunye ongu-5 million wama-hektha kwabasebenza kanjalo nabahlala emapulazini.” Uveze ukuthi izingane zithola izibonelelo, ziyadla ezikoleni mahhala wathi abangatohozi nabo bathola isibonelelo.“Yize sisephezulu isibalo sabangasebenzi kuleli, kodwa sesikwazile ukunyusa izinga labasebenzayo cishe ngohhafu eminyakeni engu-30 kuleli. Siyaqhubeka nezinhlelo zokuqasha abangasebenzi kuleli.” Uthe iningi labesifazane lithola amathuba njengoba u-60% wabasebenzi bahulumeni abesimame.Uveze ukuthi kumele kuqiniswe izinhlelo zokugcina abafundi besezikoleni baze baphothule u-matric.Kube nokuphazamiseka kwenkulumo kaRamaphosa ngesikhathi ama-generator ethatha isikhathi eside ukudonsa, okwenze abanye abebethamele lo mgubho bacule amaculo ahlukene okweseka i-ANC.Khonamanjalo uNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube, uhloniphe ababhubha kulesi sibhicongo wathi bangamaqhawe alwa ukuze abantu bakhululeke.Unxuse abantu bakuleli ukuthi babukele kula maqhawe wathi kumele kuliwe nesihlava sokubulawa kwabesifazane.

Kukhale izembe ebuholini be-ANC Youth League (ANCYL) ezifundazweni nasezifundeni obusolwa ngokwehluleka ukuhlela izingqungquthela zokukhetha ubuholi.Ikomiti elibhekele ukusebenza kwansuku zonke kwi-ANCYL lihlakaze ubuholi bezifundazwe nobezifunda, kwase kuqokwa ubuholi besikhashana.Ubuholi obuhlakaziwe bebuvele bungobesikhashana, babukade buqokelwe ukuba buhlele izingqungquthela zokukhetha ubuholi.Nokho izifundazwe nezifunda eziningi zihlulekile ukuhlela izingqungquthela zokukhetha ubuholi.Umhlangano wekomiti elibhekele ukusebenza kwansuku zonke kwi-ANCYL ubungesonto eledlule, unqume ukuthi zihlakazwe izinhlaka zesikhashana.Uhlu olukhishwe i-ANCYL luveza ukuthi iningi labaholi abebephethe phambilini abazange balibone elidlalayo ngesikhathi kuqokwa ubuholi obusha.Phezu kwezinguquko eziningi ezenziwe, obengumdidiyeli we-ANCYL KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mqondisi Duma, usindile ezembeni.UNksz Lulame Mabude, uqokelwe kwesomgqugquzeli we-ANCYL esifundazweni.I-ANCYL KwaZulu-Natal isidonse ngobuholi besikhashana kusukela ngo-2021 emva kokuhlakazwa kobuholi bangaleso sikhathi obabuholwa uMnuz Kwazi Mshengu, owayengusihlalo, noMnuz Thanduxolo Sabelo, owayengunobhala.Amathimba  e-ANCYL abehola esifundazweni phambilini ehluleka encama ukuhlela izingqungquthela, ezinye izingqungquthela zabhuntsha ngemizuzu yokugcina.Unobhala jikelele we-ANCYL , uMnuz Mntuwoxolo Ngudle, utshele ubuholi obusha ukuthi buhlalelwe umsebenzi wokuhlela ingqungquthela yokukhetha ubuholi.Esitatimendeni, uNgudle uthe zonke izingqungquthela zokukhetha ubuholi kufanele zibanjwe ngaphambi kokuphela kukaFebhuwari.“Nibhekene nomsebenzi wokulungiselela imihlangano yamagatsha lapho kuzophakanyiswa khona amagama abantu abazongenela imibango yezikhundla ezingqungqutheleni enizozihlela. Kufanele nenze isiqiniseko sokuthi yonke imigomo iyalandelwa, niphinde nenze isiqiniseko sokuthi kuphendulwa zonke izikhalo ezingase ziqhamuke ngesikhathi kuqhubeka amalungiselelo okuhlela izingqungquthela.”UNgudle uxwayise abaqokiwe ngokuthi bazokhishwa uma benza okuphambana nomthetho.“Labo okuzotholakala ukuthi baphambana nalo mbhidlango wokwakha kabusha izinhlaka ze-ANCYL, bazokhishwa. Ikomiti elibhekele ukusebenza kwansuku zonke linikeze ihhovisi likanobhala jikelele amandla okukhipha abaphambana nomthetho ngaphandle kokuthi kuze kuthiwe abavele phambi kwekomiti eliqondisa ubugwegwe.”Esifundeni iTheku, umdidiyeli kuzoba uNksz Zama Mncube, umgqugquzeli kube uMnuz Ntokozo Ngcobo.Esifundeni iMoses Mabhida umdidiyeli kuzoba uMnuz Mthokozisi Ngidi, umgqugquzeli kube uMnuz Lungisani Mthalane.

KUNENGEKE abasolwa eNkantolo eNkulu yaseBloemfontein kuhlehla icala ngenxa yokungapheleli kwabasolwa nabanye abangenabo abameli.Kule nkantolo bekuvele owayengunobhala jikelele we-ANC uMnuz Ace Magashule nabanye asolwa nabo ngamacala enkohlakalo athinta ithenda ye-asbestos.Kufikwa enkantolo, kubikelwe ijaji ngezingqinamba ezikhona eziphoqa ukuba icala lingaqhubeki. Okhulumela uphiko lwezokushushisa eFree State uMojalefa Senokoatsane utshele abezindaba ukuthi isizathu esikhulu esenze icala lahlehla wukuboshwa kukaMoroadi Cholota owayengumsizi kaMagashule. UMoroadi, okumanje use-United States of America, uboshwe yiziphathimandla e-USA futhi kulindeleke ukuba avele enkantolo ngoMsombuluko 15 Ephreli 2024. UMbuso uveze ukuthi uzophuthuma izinhlelo zokubuyiswa kukaMoroadi kuleli kulandela ukuvela kwakhe enkantolo. Kubuye kwavela ukuthi ukuboshwa kukaMoroadi akusona sodwa isizathu sokuhlehla kwecala.“Kuvele nokuthi ummangalelwa 5, okuyinkampani, ayinabo abameli kanti esinye isizathu wukuthi owayeyilungu lesigungu esiphezulu (MEC) uSarah Mlamleli, akakwazanga ukufika enkantolo ngenxa yokugula futhi kuvele ukuthi uzoze avele ngoJulayi 2024.”Phambilini uMagashule, Edwin Sodi, Blackhead Consulting kanye noThabane Zulu, bafaka isicelo sokuhlakaza leli cala ngoba bethi alikho icala ababekwe lona, nokho inkantolo yasichitha isicelo sabo. Laba nabasolwa nabo okunguNthimotse Mokhesi, Mahlomola Matlakala, Sello Radebe, Kgotso Manyeki, Sarah Mlamleli, Nozipho Molikoe, Albertus Venter, Moroadi Cholota, Margaret-Ann Deidericks, nezinye izinkampani ezintathu, 602 Consulting Solutions, Mastertrade 232 kanye no-Ori babhekene namacala okukhwabanisa, inkohlakalo, ukushushumbiswa kwemali nokwephulwa koMthetho wokuPhathwa kweMali yoMphakathi (PFMA).La macala amayelana nenkontileka ye-asbestos ka-R255 million eyakhishwa uMnyango wezokuHlaliswa kwaBantu eFree State yanikezwa inkampani iBlackhead Consulting, ukuze ihlaziye, ihlole futhi ikhiphe uphahla lwe-asbestos ezindlini ezisezindaweni zabahlwempu eFree State, cishe eminyakeni eyisithupha edlule.Icala lizobuyela enkantolo ngomhla ka14 Juni lapho kuzokwethulwa izendlalelo zokuqulwa kwecala. Kulindeleke ukuthi kushone lelo langa sebelunikiwe usuku okuzoqulwa ngalo icala

KUPHOQELEKE ukuthi lihlehliselwe inyanga ezayo icala lobekade eyiphoyisa oboshelwe icala lokushaya abulale unina KwaDabeka, eClermont, imantshi ingabonwa nangalukhalo enkantolo.Imantshi u-Bilkish Asmal ayifikanga eNkantolo yesiFunda, ecaleni elithweswe uMnuz Lungisani Xaba (48).Ngesonto eledlule, imantshi yalihlehlisela usuku lwayizolo icala ukuze kwenziwe izindlalelo zokuqala kokuqulwa kwalo emuva kweminyaka emibili lisenkantolo linganyakazi.Kube sekubekelwa uSepthemba 11 nonyaka, ukwenziwa kwalolu hlelo. Kwenzeka lokhu emasontweni edlule, imantshi ibisanda kukhala ngokubambezeleka kwecala ithi kuqhamuka ohlangothini lukaXaba.Yathi kusukela ngoNovemba 11, 2022, lifika enkantolo yalo, akunamnyakazo ngakho kumele kube khona okwenzakalayo.Izolo, abomndeni kaXaba baphume edangele enkantolo kwazise baze bathola ngephoyisa elisebenza enkantolo ukuthi selihlehlisiwe icala.Lokhu kubangelwe ukuthi wona abekade ehlezi ngaphandle kwenkantolo okuvamise ukulalelwa khona leli cala elishintshelwe kwenye izolo.Yize kunjalo bathe bazolokhu begqigqa enkantolo ngoba ekugcineni bafuna ukwazi iqiniso lokuthi uXaba ‘wambulalelani unina’, uNkk Greta Xaba (81).Kusolakala ukuthi ummangalelwa washaya unina, owayehamba ngesihlalo esinamasondo ngenxa yokukhubazeka, ngepulangwe elalinezipikili ngoLwesihlanu ngoMeyi 6, 2022.Waboshwa ngakusasa wabekwa icala lokushaya ngenhloso yokulimaza elashintshwa laba ngelokubulala umufi eshona esibhedlela ngoMeyi 8, 2022.UXaba usenqatshelwe ibheyili amahlandla amabili futhi useshintshe abameli izikhawu eziningi.Kamuva usanda kubhokela izintatheli wazikhomba, ebuza kummeli wakhe ukuthi zivumelekile yini ukuba senkantolo zibike ngecala athweswe lona?

ALIKAHLOLWA namanje ingqondo iphoyisa likaMasipala weTheku elibhekene necala lokubulala intombi yalo ebinguzakwabo emsebenzini.Lokhu kuvele izolo ngesikhathi uConstable Sizwe Ngema (27) evela eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini.Usolwa ngecala lokugwaza abulale uConstable Bianca Khuzwayo (23) eflethini lakhe elisenkabeni yeTheku ekupheleni kukaMashi. Uphinde asolwe nangecala lokweba iselula kamufi.Ngesikhathi evela ngesonto eledlule enkantolo, uMbuso waphakamisa ukuba lihlehliselwe izolo icala ukuze ayohlolwa ingqondo.Bekulindeleke ukuthi kumenyezelwe imiphumela yokuhlolwa kwakhe ingqondo izolo kodwa uMshushisi, uMnuz Calvin Govender waveza ukuthi akakahlolwa.“UMbuso unesicelo sokuthi lihlehliselwe ikusasa (esho namuhla) icala ngoba umsolwa akakahlolwa ingqondo. Lokhu kwenzeke ngenxa yokuthi udokotela obekelwe ukuthi enze lo msebenzi ubebambeke kwelinye icala athula kulo ubufakazi lonke leli sonto eledlule,” kusho uGovender.Uqhube wathi ngokwezinhlelo, bekulindeleke ukuthi udokotela amhlole izolo ntambama ngo-2 bese ephothula umbiko wakhe khona izolo.Ubuye wathi umsolwa uzogcinwa esitokisini sasesiteshini samaphoyisa iDurban Central ukuze kusondezelwe udokotela ozomhlola.Ummeli kamsolwa, u-Advocate Ravi Reddy uqinisekise ukuthi uyakwazi konke okushiwo uGovender.Ube esebuza inkantolo ukuthi ngeke yini kwenzeke ukuthi umsolwa asale esecela ibheyili emva kokufundwa kombiko kadokotela.IMantshi, uMnuz Scelo Zuma, ithe kuzobonakala namuhla ukuthi lokho kungenzeka yini, ngokubuka uhlu lwamacala azongena.Umsolwa ubedlubhe ijakhethi ebomvu, ekhophoza, esonge izandla zakhe zingaphambili.Umndeni kamufi, ubugcwele ngezinkani enkantolo. Ngaphambi kokuqala kwecala, umamkhulu kamufi, uNksz Mpume Khuzwayo, wehlulekile ukubamba izinyembezi, waphuma wayokhala ngaphandle kwenkantolo.Kuthe inkantolo isilihlelisile icala, aphuma amalungu omndeni ayomthulisa.Emva kokubulawa kukamufi ngoMashi 31, umsolwa kuthiwa wafaka i-video ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ekhombisa umufi eshona.Kule video, kwakubonakala umufi ephuma igazi ngomlomo nangamakhala, esifubeni kwakugcwele igazi, kwakusabhajwe ummese okusolwa ukuthi wamgwaza ngawo.Le video kuthiwa umsolwa akagcinanga ngokuyinameka ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kuphela, kodwa wabuye wayithumela kwabanye abasondelene nomufi, okukhona kubo nomngani.

UKUNGABIBIKHO kwedokodo kuphoqe ukuthi iNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMlaza ilihlehlise icala lokubulawa kowesilisa wakwa-B, eMlaza, owaqhululwa ngezinhlamvu ehamba ngesihlalo esinamasondo.Umufi uMnuz Simanga Khumalo (29) wadutshulwa ngamadoda angaziwa ekuqaleni konyaka, esigamekweni esenzeka kwa-Q, emini kwabha kubuka wonke umuntu.Ngemuva kwalesi sigameko kunabesilisa ababili abakhalelwa ngamasongo kaSigonyela, beyamaniswa naleli cala.Ababoshwa ngoMnuz Siyabonga Ngubane (36) noSithembiso Khomo (23), okuyimanje bavalelwe futhi bagqigqa eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMlaza emuva kokunqatshelwa ibheyili.Babhekene namacala amane. Kuwona kubalwa elokwakha itulo lokubulala, elokubulala, elokutholakala nesibhamu esingekho emthethweni nelokutholakala nezinhlamvu.NgoLwesithathu, laba besilisa bebekade bevelile eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMlaza.UMshushisi u-N. Mohani uphakamile watshela imantshi uNgcobo ukuthi alikho idokodo, ucela ukuthi icala lihlehliswe.Imantshi ibuzile ukuthi kwenzekeni njengoba kuthiwa idokodo alikho nje?Umshushisi uthe umseshi ophenya icala umazise ukuthi idokodo alikho esandleni sakhe wabe eselalela lokho amtshela khona.Imantshi ibe seyilihlehlisela u-Agasti 7 icala, yanxusa ukuthi lingenzeki iphutha lokuthi liphinde lingabibikho idokodo.Umufi ngesikhathi ebulawa kwase kuphele iminyaka emibili ehamba ngesisihlalo esinamasondo emuva kokudutshulwa ngo-2021, ngabasolwa ababezama ukumbamba inkunzi.Kuthiwa kuleso sigameko bamphuca iselula, bamshaya ngenduku yegalofu base bayamdubula.Ngemuva kwalokho kwaboshwa owesilisa osejele owesatshwayo eyamaniswa nalesi sigameko.Lo wesilisa kuthiwa wadonsa ngendlebe umufi ukuthi alesule icala uma engafuni ukuthi amenzakalise. Kusolwa ukuthi lo wesilisa osejele nguyena ungqondongqondo wetulo lokubulawa kukamufi njengoba esolwa ngokuthumela ababulali esezikhindini.

KUPHOQE ukuthi lihlehle icala lokungqongqiswa ngomlilo kwabathathu okwenzeka eNkanini, eCato Manor, ngoJanuwari 25, 2023 ngesikhathi ummangalelwa wokugcina ekhala ngesibhobo ebesisho ukumjuqa eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini.Bayisithupha abasolwa kuleli cala, ngoMnuz Mniseli "Jomo" Khondlo (41), Vusimuzi Mazula (46), Thandekile Penelope Sithuntsa (37), Siphenathi Zoko (28), Mfanafuthi Muzi Masikane (37) noScelo Thusi (39) okunguyena oxinwe wukugula kuqhubeka icala.Laba basolwa ngokuthi baba ngongqondongqondo ekutheni bokhele ngomlilo abesilisa abathathu, oMnuz Phumlani Tshekee, Numkile Mfenqe noRefilwe Mokoena.Laba ababulawa kuvela ukuthi babewuhlalise lubhojozi umphakathi ngezigameko ezahlukene. Phakathi kwezigameko ababesolwa ngazo ukudlwengula abesifazane, ukubamba inkunzi nokudayisa ngodli izindlu zabantu bakule ndawo.Izolo ngesikhathi kuqhubeka icala, umsolwa wesithupha ubebonakala ebamba isisu ezibhongqa. Ugcine ebonakala esephakamisa isandla.Kusondele ummeli eduze kwakhe okunguyena ogcine esetshela iJaji, uMahendra Chetty, ukuthi ummangalelwa ubambekile akazizwa kahle.Ijaji libe selicela ukuthi icala lihlabe ikhefu isikhashana ukuze athole ukunakekeleka akudingayo umsolwa.Selibuya ekhefini ufakazi, ongeke lidalulwe igama lakhe, uqhubekile nokuthula ubufakazi ethatha inkantolo ngamehlo engqondo ngokwenzeka ngosuku lwesigameko.Kuthe esalandisa ijaji laphinda lakuqaphele ukuthi umsolwa wesithupha usabhekene nenkinga yokugula."Ngenxa yokuthi omunye wabasolwa ubonakala engaphilile nhlobo. Leli cala kungcono lihlehle ukuze liqhubeke kusasa ngesikhathi esifanayo kuyona le nkantolo,'' usho kanje.Ekuseni ufakazi utshele inkantolo ukuthi abasolwa abane kulaba abayisithupha wababona behlome beyizingovolo ngesikhathi kusuka udweshu lokubulawa ngesihluku kwalaba abathathu.Uthe ummangalelwa wesihlanu nowesithupha, obegula, bona akazange aqaphele ukuthi babehlome ngani esandleni.Uthe abamangalelwa ubakhumbula kahle befika endlini ababekuyona bathatha laba abathathu bayobokhela ngomlilo emotweni.Ngosuku lwesigameko kuvela ukuthi umphakathi wawuhlome uyizingovolo uphethe ocelemba, izando nezinye izikhali wahlasela kubo kaPhumlani lapho ayehlezi khona nabangani bakhe.Kuvela ukuthi babathatha babayisa emotweni babaphoqa ukuba bangene kuyona ngaphakathi base befaka uphethroli base bayabashisa.

KUHLEHLE isigcawu sokuqondisa ubugwegwe owayengumengameli, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, kubangwa eyokuthi ubefuna ukuzifikela mathupha.UZuma akazange aye esigcawini abebizelwe kuso ebesibanjwe ngezobuchwepheshe, izolo.Kunalokho uZuma uthumele owayeyilungu lesigungu esiphezulu kwi-ANC, uMnuz Tony Yengeni, ukuba eyomumela.Okhulumela iMK, uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndhlela, uthe uYengeni ufike wakubeka kwacaca ukuthi uZuma ufuna ukuthi azifikele bukhoma esigcawini, singabanjwa kusetshenziswa ezobuchwepheshe."Emva kwempikiswano ende, ikomiti eliqondisa ubugwegwe linqume ukuthi isigcawu sizobanjwa kusetshenziswa ezobuchwepheshe kodwa ke sabe sesiyahlehla. Kuphakanyiswe ukuthi sibe ngoJulayi 23.I-ANC icele ukungajahwa ngesikhathi iqala ukushushisa owayengumengameli, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, osehola iMK.Le nhlangano inxuse ukunikwa ithuba lokuthi ishushise uZuma ngasese, yaveza ukuthi isinqumo esizothathwa yikomiti eliqondisa ubugwegwe angeke simenyezelwe ngokushesha.Okhulumela i-ANC, uMnuz Zuko Godlimpi, uthe isigcawu siqhubekile ngendlela obekuhlelwe ngayo, kusetshenziswa ezobuchwepheshe.UGodlimpi uthe abezindaba abavumelekile ezigcawini ze-ANC zokuqondisa ubugwegwe.“Kunenqwaba yemibuzo esiyitholayo eqhamuka kwabezindaba ngalolu daba. Isinqumo sizomenyezelwa uma ikomiti selilalele laphinde lahlaziya zonke izethulo. Angeke ngikwazi ukusho ukuthi isinqumo sizophuma emva kwesikhathi esingakanani ngoba konke lokho kuncike ekutheni ikomiti lizothola izethulo ezingakanani.”UNobhala-Jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, ubezokwethula ubufakazi kulesi sigcawu.UMbalula usekusho kaningi ukuthi isinqumo sikaZuma sokweseka iMK senze ukuthi i-ANC ihluleke ukunqoba ukhetho ngamalengiso.Okokuqala emlandweni, i-ANC yathola ngaphansi kuka-50% wamavoti okhethweni, yalahlekelwa iKwaZulu-Natal, yaphinde yahluleka ukuwina ngamalengiso ezifundazweni, iGauteng neNorthern Cape.Ngakolunye uhlangothi iMK yona yafika kwezwakala njengoba yalala isithathu.Ekhuluma engqungqutheleni ebihlelwe yinyunyana yabasebenzi, iNehawu, uMbalula uthe amavoti angaphezu kuka-2 million atholwe iMK okhethweni abezotholwa i-ANC.“Abantu bethu bakhethe ukuvotela iMK, lokho kufanele sikuvume.”UZuma usolwa ngokuphula imigomo ye-ANC njengoba amemezela ukuthi uzokhankasela iqembu ebelincintisana nayo okhethweni, waphinde wanxenxa nabantu ukuthi bangayivoteli i-ANC.UZuma kwakufanele ashushiswe ngaphambi kokhetho kodwa isigcawu sabuye sahlehliswa ngenxa yokusabela udlame.Izolo bekunengcosana yamalungu eMK abecula bude buduze namahhovisi e-ANC.

INKANTOLO yeMantshi yaseVerulam ikuhlehlisile ukugwetshwa kwamadoda amane alahlwe icala lokuthumba nokubulala u-Andile ‘Bobo’ Mbuthu (16).Bekulindeleke ukuthi ngoLwesibili iMantshi Sanele Hlatshwayo agwebe o-Andile Nhleko, Mncedisi Mzobe, Lindani Ndlovu noMalusi Mthembu abalahlwe ngamacala ngenyanga edlule.Kodwa akwenzekanga njengoba uHlatshwayo kuvele ukuthi akekho kule nkantolo kodwa umatasa nelinye icala ayijaji elibambile kulona eliqhubeka eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini.Ukuwiswa kwesigwebo kube sekubekelwa u-Okthoba 2 nonyaka.Abasizi bakaHlatshwayo, abafikisane nentatheli enkantolo, bekubukeka sengathi kabanalo ulwazi ngokuhlehliswa kwecala.Baze babekwa esithombeni umshushisi wecala uMnuz Ntuthuko Mngadi base bebona abeze ngayo.Amalungu omndeni kaBobo nawebandla okukhonza kulona unina  awalubhadanga enkantolo.Umalume kaBobo, uMnuz Bongani Mthembu, uthe bese bazisiwe ukuthi ngeke sikhishwe isigwebo izolo, kuhlehliselwe olunye usuku.Ubezwakala ocingweni ukuthi ukhululekile. Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi kwaqale kwaba nokuhlehla okwaba khona ekukhishweni kwesinqumo, okwawunenga umndeni ukhala ngokuthi awaziswanga.Ngosuku okuyokhishwa ngalo isigwebo inkantolo iyokwamukela imibiko yosonhlalakahle ngempilo yala madoda nangomndeni kamufi.Kuyophinde kube nesigcawu sobengummangalelwa owaphenduka ufakazi woMbuso lapho ezobe ezicelela khona intethelelo nokuthi abeke izizathu zokuthi yini kungamele ashushiswe.UHlatshwayo wakhala kakhulu ngalo fakazi owayewumngani kaBobo, ebuza uMbuso ukuthi kungani enziwe ufakazi?UBobo washaywa wafa yilama doda ngo-Ephreli 20, 2020. Isidumbu sashiswa izinsalela zahlakazwa ngepiki zagxishwa ezikhwameni nezitini zayolahlwa emfuleni. Wayesolwa ngokweba utshwala eMagagula Lounge, eHambanathi oThongathi.Le ndawo yobumnandi eyangqongqiswa umphakathi kwakungekamzala kaBobo, uMnuz Mlungisi Thabethe owadutshulwa wafa ngoMashi 2021 esigamekweni amaphoyisa athi sasingahlobene nokufa kukaBobo.

KUHLEHLELE ukuphela kwenyanga ukugwetshwa kukaNobhala-Jikelele we-EFF uMnuz Marshall Dlamini, olahlwe yicala lokushaya ngesihluku.UDlamini ubevele eNkantolo yesifunda eCape Town lapho obekulindeleke khona ukuthi kukhulunywe eyesigwebo. UDlamini ngo-Ephreli walahlwa yicala lokushaya iphoyisa ngesihluku kwafahlaka izibuko ebusweni balo.UDlamini washaya u-Warrant Officer Johan Carstens ngesikhathi kunomcimbi wenkulumo kamengameli ayeyibhekise ezweni ngo-2019.  UDlamini uzithethelela ngokuthi babelunywe indlebe ngecebo lokuhlasela umholi wakhe uMnuz Julius Malema.Wathi yena njengomuntu obuye abe yinhloko yezokuphepha eqenjini, kwakufanele enze imizamo yokuphebeza uCarstens.Okhulumela abezokuShushisa (NPA) eWestern Cape, uMnuz Eric Ntabazalila uqinisekisile ukuthi udaba lungenile kodwa isigwebo asikhishwanga.Uthe udaba luhlehlele uJuni 28 lapho okuzoqhubeka khona uhlelo lokukhishwa kwesigwebo sikaDlamini. Ngesikhathi evelile ngoLwesihlanu kuqalwe imicikilisho yokwendlalela isigwebo.Kulalelwe umbiko kangoti obeluleka inkantolo ngelokuthi uDlamini ungumuntu onjani nongafanelwa hlobo luni lwesigwebo.UDlamini akuyena yedwa kwi-EFF ohamba icala njengoba noMalema ebhekene necala lokuqhumisa isibhamu ngesikhathi kunomcimbi eMdantsane, e-Eastern Cape ngo-2018. Kwelinye icala uDkt Mbuyiseni Ndlozi noMalema baphuma phambili besolwa ngokushaya iphoyisa emngcwabeni kaNkk Winnie Madikizela-Mandela.

LIHLEHLISELWE kuMsombuluko ozayo icala labokufika abangu-95 abadabuka eLibya, ngenxa yokungabibikho kukatolika okhuluma ulimi lwama-Arab.Abasolwa basamile ekutheni bathathwe kwelakubo beqashwe ngusomabhizinisi onezitolo zobucwebe. Bathi usomabhizinisi ubatshele ukuthi ubaqasha njengonogada nokuthi ngokolwazi lwabo, bahleli kule nkambu abatholakale kuyo beqeqeshelwa umsebenzi wokuba ngonogada hhayi amasosha.Imibiko evelayo ithi usomabhizinisi okusolwa ukuthi nguyena obaqashile wake wazama ukuvukela umbuso wakhona eLibya.Ngokolwazi oluvele enkantolo yeMantshi eWhite River namuhla, kuthiwa ngokwamaphepha alaba basolwa agunyaza ukungena kuleli, kubhalwe ukuthi balapha ngoba bazokwenza izifundo zezokuphepha.Kuthiwa laba baqala ukubonakala emphakathini ngesonto elandulela elokhetho lukazwelonke futhi babexhumana nomphakathi wendawo bedayisa izimpahla zabo futhi bebefika nesimajoyintini beyozijabulisa.Usihlalo wekomiti lamaphoyisa ePhalamende, uMnuz Ian Cameron uthi akwamukelekile ukuba khona kwendawo efana nalena esebenzayo kungekho muntu wezomthetho owaziyo ngalokhu. Wathi baxhumene nePsira okuyiyona enikezela ngezitifiketi zokusebenza kwezinkampani zezokuphepha, kanjalo nalabo abafuna ukusebenza emkhakheni wokuba ngonogada befuna ukwazi ukuthi le nkampani ethole imvume yokusebenza nalaba bantu ijike nini yasebenza ngendlela okungasiyona.Izinkampani ezithintekayo okubalwa neyendawo okutholakale kuyo abasolwa kulindekele ukuthi zikhiphe izitatimende ngoLwesibili, kanti abameli bazo bebekhona enkantolo ukulalela icala.

LIYALELWE ukuthi liphumule lize lilulame ngokugcwele iPhini likaMengameli lezwe, uMnuz Paul Mashatile, “elihlaselwe yisiyezi”  ngesikhathi lithula inkulumo emcimbini obuseLimpopo, ngempelasonto.Kwaphazamiseka umcimbi ngesikhathi uMashatile “ehlaselwa yisiyezi”, wasizwa unogada esewa kugujwa usuku iN’wamitwa, eLimpopo.Selokhu kwenzeke lesi sehlakalo, uMashatile uhlatshiswe ikhefu kanti kudingeke ukuthi kuhlehliswe nokuvela kwakhe ePhalamende ngoLwesine ntambama.Ubezovela ngaphambi koMkhandlu weziFundazwe ePhalamende, lapho ebezophendula khona imibuzo.
