Lolu hlelo beluzokwenziwa kusetshenziswa ubuchwepheshe.Okhulumela uMashatile, uMnuz Keith Khoza, uthe lo mholi uhlatshiwe ikhefu yithimba lodokotela kulandela isehlakalo.Uthe uyalelwe ukuthi aphumule lonke leli sonto nakuba esengumqemane. “Usengumqemane kodwa nakuba kunjalo kuthiwe akathi ukuphumula. Mayelana nokuvela ePhalamende, ubhalele uSihlalo weNdlu emnxusa ukuthi kuhlehliselwe olunye usuku ukuphendula imibuzo.”Uthe yinto eseqhulwini kuyena ukuvela ePhalamende njengoba ehlale enxenxa noNgqongqoshe ukuthi bavele ngaphambi kwePhalamende.Uveze ukuthi uthemba ukuthi maduzane bazolikhipha usuku azophendula ngalo izinto ezithinta ukuhanjiswa kwezidingo emphakathini, ezithinta ezolimo nokukhiqizwa kokudla kanjalo nezinhlelo zokulwa nobugebengu.Ekomitini lasePhalamende elihlanganisa osotswebhu bamaqembu ahlukene izolo, kuvele ukuthi lizoguqa kuze kube yinyanga ezayo.Ngokwezinhlelo zokuphendula imibuzo kukaMashatile obekuhlelelwe inyanga ezayo bekuzokwenzeka ekupheleni kuka-Okthoba.Amalungu ePhalamende athe anethemba ukuthi ngalesi sikhathi uzobe eseluleme esekwazi ukuzovela aphendula imibuzo.Okunye okuvelile ukuthi njengoba ehlabe ikhefu ezinye zezinto okumele zibikwe kuyena ezithinta iPhalamende zizolinda aze abuyele ehhovisi.

NKOSIKHONA CELEIZINDAWO ezisemapulazini zijwayele ukuba senkingeni yokungazitholi izinsiza ezifana nogesi nokunye. Kodwa uMasipala oseMnambithi, i-Alfred Duma, uqale uhlelo lokuqinisekisa ukuthi lezi zindawo azisali ngaphandle ezinhlelweni zikagesi.IMeya yakule ndawo, uZama Sibisi yethule osonkontileka abazokwenza lo msebenzi ku-ward 24 khona eMnambithi. "Njengomasipala wakule ndawo, kungumsebenzi wethu ukuthi senze konke okusemandleni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu basemapulazini bayawuthola ugesi,'' egcizelela.Ikhansela uMnuz Thobani Dlamini ophinde abe sesigungwini esiphezulu kulo masipala, uthe lolu hlelo luzodla u-R6 million."Okudala ukuthi le phrojkethi igcine seyidla imali engaka ukuthi abantu bakithi basemapulazini bakhe ngokugqagqana okukhulu. Kodwa noma kunjalo sizimisele ngokubahlinzeka ngogesi,'' usho kanje.Uthe okunye okuhle ngale phrojekthi ukuthi ihlomulise abantu bakule ndawo ngamathuba omsebenzi, okuyinto imeya uSibisi ahlale eyikhuthaza.Bangaphezu kuka-20 abantu bakule ndawo abazohlomula ngamathuba omsebenzi.Unxuse ukuthi labo abasezingxenyeni lapho ugesi ungakafinyeleli khona, babekezele. "Sizogcina sifinyelelile kuzona zonke izindawo. Lolu wuhlelo oluqhubekayo.'' Uveze ukuthi baqhuba nohlelo lokwakhiwa kwamabhuloho ezingxenyeni ezahlukene zaseMnambithi namaphethelo.

ABAFUNDI baka-matric, ababhuquza emakhaya nezitifiketi zika-matric kanjalo nabasenkulisa, banyelwe yinyoni esandleni.Lokhu kuvele ngesikhathi kunomcimbi wokwethulwa kwezinhlelo zokuhlomisa intsha ngolwazi nangamakhono eNkungumathe Youth Centre, eNkandla muva nje.Abaka-matric, abenza izifundo iMaths neScience, bazocijwa ngothisha abangongoti balezi zifundo ngezimpelasonto.Umgqugquzeli wombuthano, uMnuz Mthokozi Mchunu, uthe lolu hlelo lokutakula abafundi balezi zifundo ezimqoka luxhaswe ngesamba sikaR400 000 yiLocal Government Sector Education and Training Authority (LGSeta)."Le mali izobhekela izindleko zokugibela, ukudla, izinsiza zokubhala, ama-Scientific Calculater nokubonelela othisha ababili abajutshwe wuMkhandlu iKing Cetshwayo."UMchunu uthe babuye  basiza nentsha eno-matric kodwa engazi ukuthi izokwenzani."SiyiNkungumathe NPO sixhumane neFinance and Accounting Services Sector Education and Training Authorities (Fasseta) sabatholela izindawo abazothi befunda bebe besebenza kuzo futhi bethola nemali eyisibonelelo. IFasseta ibuye yabanikeza nama-laptop abazowasebenzisa izinyanga eziwu-12. Bazoqhubeka bawasebenzise ngisho sebeluphothulile uhlelo ebebelwenza."Eqhuba uMchunu uthe babuye baqokwa yigaraji lasendaweni iSasol Mathulas Garage, ngaphansi kohlelo lwalo olubizwa ngeSasol Neighbours, ngenhloso yokufukula imfundo yenkulisa iSwelihle Creche.Uthe leli garaji lixhase lolu hlelo ngoR20 000."Sithenge izinsiza zasenkulisa ezinjengezitofu, ithelevishini, amabhodwe, amafriji nokunye."Lo mcimbi bewuthanyelwe nayiPhini loMqondisi-Jikelele loMnyango wezokuThutha kuZwelonke, uMnuz Chris Hlabisa, naye uchazele abafundi ngezinhlelo ezitholakala kulo mnyango ezifana nemifundaze, ama-learnership nemisebenzi. UHlabisa akagcinanga lapho kodwa ubuye waqwashisa umphakathi ngezingozi zemigwaqo.Kubuye kwanikezwa amaSeta ahlukahlukene ithuba lokuba achazele intsha ngamathuba anawo. Kwabuye kwayobukwa ibhuloho elakhiwa kule ndawo. Abanye ebebehambele lomcimbi yiNkosi yendawo, uZakhe Mpungose nenduna yayo, uMnuz MS Mahaye, uNksz Nokulunga Mthombeni weFasset) noMnuz Eliot Seake weLGSeta.

UMNYANGO waManzi nokuThuthwa kweNdle kuzwelonke, uzodlulisela kwikhabhinethi umthetho ochitshiyelwe okholwa ukuthi uzolekelela ekutheni kuhlinzekelwe ngendlela efanele umphakathi ngamanzi. Bakholwa wukuthi i-Water Services Amendment Bill, izoqinisekisa ukuthi izinkampani ezinikezwe umsebenzi wokuhlinzeka umphakathi ngamanzi, zinezimvume.Lokhu kudalulwe nguNgqongqoshe womnyango uNksz Pemmy Majodina esithangamini nabezindaba ebesisePitoli izolo, okuthiwa bekuhloswe ngaso ukwenekela umphakathi ngamaqhinga umnyanoo onawo ukulwa nengwadla yokushoda kwamanzi kuleli.UNksz Majodina uthe umnyango wakhe usebenza ngokubambisana nowezokuBusa ngokuBambisa neziNdaba zoMdabu kuzwelonke kanye nowezeziMali ukuthi bathole isisombululo sokushoda kwamanzi okubukeka kukhahlameza omasipala abaningi.“Izinga lokuphakela amanzi komasipala nokuthuthwa kwendle liyaqhubeka nokwehla. Sizokwethula lo mthetho ochitshiyelwe kozakwethu kwikhabhinethi ngaphambi kokuthi udluliselwe ephalamende.  Uzophoqa ukuthi izinkampani eziphakela umphakathi ngamanzi zibe nezimvume zokusebenza kulula. Kuzonika abasemandleni ilungelo lokuthi babhekisise ukuthi izinkampani ezinikezwa umsebenzi wokuhlinzeka ngamanzi, zinamava adingekayo ahlangabezana nokwenza lo msebenzi,” usho kanje.Uthe ngaphambi kokuthi banikezwe umsebenzi, kuzobhekwa ukuthi banazo yini izimvume ezibavumela ukusebenza.Ukuvaleka kwamanzi, ikakhulu komasipala abakhulu kubalwa nowaseThekwini, kushiye inqwaba yamalungu omphakathi ekhathazekile ngoba kwezinye izindawo amanzi aphuma ngezikhathi ezithile kuphela, kanti kwezinye awasaziwa.UNksz Majodina uthe umnyango wakhe usebenzisana nezinkampani ezizimele neminye iminyango kahulumeni ukuqinisekisa ukushintshwa kamapayipi amadala, avuzayo komasipala abakhulu ngoba ukuchitheka kwamanzi ngalolu hlobo yikhona okuyimbangela yokulahleka kwamanzi amaningi nokuyinto elimaza umnotho.Mayelana nokuthuthwa kwendle, uthe umnyango wakhe usebenza kanzima ukususa uhlelo olubizwa nge-bucket system (ukuthutha indle ngebhakede), elenziwa kwezinye izifundazwe. Uthe umnyango usebenze nabacwaningi ukuthola izindlela ezilula nezinesithunzi zokuthuthwa kwendle okuwuhlelo oluzoqinisekisa ukuthi azikho izitamkoko ezivuzayo futhi lukwazi ukonga amanzi.

KUHLUKENE imibono ezinyunyaneni zothisha kuleli ngokuqokwa kukaNgqongqoshe omusha weMfundo eyisiSekelo, uNksz Siviwe Gwarube, njengoba zithi zizomqapha ngelokhozi ngendlela azosebenza ngayo.ISadtu iyakuchitha ukuqokwa kwakhe, ithi unomlando wokungazifuni izinyunyana njengoba ehlale ezigxeka, ikakhulu kwezemfundo.INatu ngakolunye uhlangothi ithe izomlinda imbone ukuthi uzosebenza kanjani ngaphambi kokubanga umsindo uma esephambuka.UNobhala-jikelele weSadtu, uMnuz Mugwena Maluleke, umchithile uNksz Gwarube wathi iqembu alimele alinendaba nezikhalazo zothisha abamnyama.UMaluleke uthe bayazi ukuthi uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa unelungelo lokuqoka noma ngubani ambona efanele ukuphatha umnyango othile.“I-DA ibichitha umthetho wezikole, iBela, oqhakambisa indaba yolimi okumele lusebenze ezikoleni kanjalo namandla anikwa inhloko yoMnyango wezeMfundo. Aseneme ngokuthi umnyango unikwe umuntu we-DA noma kuthiwa umnyama.   ”Uthe ngisho emqulwini wokukhankasela ukhetho we-DA, yakubeka kwacaca ukuthi iSadtu inamandla ngakho kumele kubhekwane nayo.“Noma kungumengameli onamandla kodwa akukho okuvimba i-DA ukuthi yenze ekuthandayo ngomnyango ewuphethe. Siyinyunyana enkulu kwezemfundo ngakho uphoqelekile ukuthi asebenzisane nathi,” kusho uMaluleke.Umengameli weNatu, uMnuz Sibusiso Malinga, uthe bayamamukela uNksz Gwarube, wathi bona basebenza nanoma ngubani.Uthe njengoba bengacheme naqembu lezepolitiki, abanankinga nabaphathiswa beminyango noma kuthiwa baqhamuka kuliphi iqembu.Uveze ukuthi vele nasezifundazweni abaphathiswa bavela emaqenjini ahlukene.“Sizomlinda aqale asebenze sibone ukuthi uzozisukumela izinkinga ezikhona kwezemfundo bese sibanga umsindo uma engasazenzi. Asikwazi ukumchitha singakezwa nokuthi uhleleni ngomnyango.”Uthe ziningi izinselelo ezisabhekene noMnyango wezeMfundo.“Kunenkinga yengqalasizinda ezikoleni, inkohlakalo ekukhishweni kwamathenda, ubugebengu ezikoleni, ukunqanyulwa kwesabelomali seminyango kanjalo nezinkinga ohlelweni lokudla. Sifuna aqashe othisha ababhuquza emakhaya, avale nezikhala ezikoleni.”Uthe kumele aqede nokuqashwa kwabathile ezikhundleni eziphezulu ngoba bedlelana neqembu elithile.INaptosa ithe kube nozinzo ngesikhathi kusaphethe obengungqongqoshe, uNkk Angie Motshekga.Ithe bazomeseka uNksz Gwarube futhi bazosebenzisana naye ezinkingeni ezibhekene nomnyango.UNksz Gwarube (34) uneziqu zeBA kwi-Law, Politics nePhilosophy azithola enyuvesi iRhodes.

BAKHEXE imilomo abamabandla ahlukahlukene ngemva kokuvalwa kwezintshumayelo nemithandazo ezitimeleni. Yize kunjalo, kukhona abathi igcagcele esokeni ngoba kade babefuna ziqedwe izintshumayelo ezitimeleni. Bathe bebehlukumezeka ngoba bebehlanjalazwa ngoba bekukhona abebeshumayela ngabo. Okhulumela inhlangano elwela amalungelo abantu abebehweba nabebekhonza ezitimeleni iDudula Movement, uMnuz Bheki Dzanibe, uthe bagqemeke udume lwengozi ngokuvalwa kwezinkonzo ngoba inkulu indima eziyidlalayo ekudambiseni izimo ezingezinhle. Okhulumela inkampani yezitimela iPrasa eKZN, uMnuz Zama Nomganga, uthe udaba lokuvalwa kokuhweba nokusonta ezitimeleni, luqale lwadingidwa nezinhlangano ezimele imiphakathi ehlukahlukene.UNomnganga uthe kufanele abantu bakhumbule ukuthi iPrasa iyinhlangano kahulumeni esebenzisana nomphakathi."Sine-forum esixoxisana nayo emele abantu abadayisa eziteshini."Uthe okwenze benza izinguquko ukuthi izitimela ezindala zihlukile kwezamanje. Uthe ezamanje zakhiwe zafana namabhanoyi futhi ziwumhubhe."Kulezi zitimela awukwazi ukugida nokudayisa kuzo. Abantu abakwazi ukuphatha ama-burger." Uthe izikhathi ziyashintsha kanjalo nokwenza izinto ziyashintsha."Nemigwaqo nemigomo kuyashintsha," kusho uNomnganga.Uthe ebhanoyini awukwazi ukubhema, ukusonta nokuhweba.Eqhuba uthe nokuthandaza ezitimeleni akusamukelekile ngenxa yokuthi kusuke kunabantu abahlukahlukene futhi bamazinga ezinkolo ezingefani. Uthe abanye basuke beyofesa kanti abanye basuke befunda, ngakho basuke befuna ukuthula."Ngakho awukwazi ukufaka inkonzo. Akukwazi ukuthi umuntu athandaze ngenye indlela, kube kukhona nabanye abathandaza ngenye indlela. Kukhona abathandaza bamemeze, ekubeni kukhona abathandaza buthule."Uthe abantu abakhumbule ukuthi sikhona isikhathi Sabatha neSonto, ngakho abasebenzise zona ukudumisa uNkulunkulu ngezindlela ezahlukene.Esephetha uthe phakathi nezinsuku abantu basuke betshisa izintshumayelo zangezimpelasonto nokucabanga ngezinye izinhlelo.*Olunye ulwazi lucashunwe kuKhozi FM.

KUGWENYWE ukuvalwa kukathelawayeka uN3 ngaphansi kwebhuloho iLynnfield obekuhlelelwe ukuthi kwenziwe ngoLwesithathu emini.ISouth African National Roads Agency (Sanral) yayimemezele ukuthi uN3 uzovalwa isikhashana ngo-2.30 kuya ku-3 emini ngoMsombuluko nangoLwesithathu, ukuze kuqhunyiswe ngaphansi kwebhuloho.Yathi kuzovalwa nomgwaqo uR103.Imenenja yakwaSanral, uJason Lowe, ithe ngeke sisaba khona isidingo ngakho umgwaqo ngeke usavalwa."Ukuqhunyiswa okwenziwe ngoMashi 11, kube yimpumelelo futhi bekwanele ukuze kuqhutshekwe nomsebenzi kuR103," kusho yena.Uqhube wathi bayaxolisa kubashayeli ngokuphazamiseka futhi bayababonga ngokubekezela njengoba kuqhubeka nokwakhiwa komgwaqo.

INHLANGANO elawula izinkampani ezisebenza ngemali kuleli, i-Financial Sector Conduct Authority (FSCA) imemezele ukuthi ihoxise ilayisensi yokusebenza yebhange Ithala.Ithe ilayisensi ihoxiswe ngokomthetho i-Financial Advisory and Intermediary Services Act (FAIS Act), 37 ka 2002.Esitatimendeni esithunyelwe kwiSolezwe izolo, i-FSCA ithe ilayisensi ihoxiswe ngoJulayi 26 ka-2024, kanti namanje isahoxisiwe. Ithala lizobuyiselwa ilayisensi yalo uma selilungise okukhalwa ngakho.Isizathu sokuhoxiswa kwelayisensi wukuthi Ithala alikho sesimweni esihle kwezezimali ukuze kuvikelwe amakhasimende alo.“Ukuhoxiswa kwelayisensi kusho ukuthi Ithala alivumelekile ukuqala umsebenzi omusha othinta imali ngaphansi kwe-FAIS Act. Kufanele lichazele amakhasimende alo ngokwenzekayo ngoba livumelekile ukusiza amakhasimende alo ebelisebenza nawo ngaphambi kokuhoxiswa kwelayisensi,” kuchaza iFSCA esitatimendeni.Iveze ukuthi Ithala lizamile ukufaka isicelo sokuphikisa isinqumo seFSCA kwi-Financial Services Tribunal kodwa yachithwa, icala belilalelwe ngo-Agasti 22, 2024.I-FSCA iveze ukuthi Ithala belilokhu libekwe iso ngabasebenzi bayo (FSCA) kanti bathole ukuthi kalikho sesimweni esihle sezezimali ngokwesigaba 46 (1) sokusebenza ngemali kanjalo nangokwesigaba 48 (1) salo mthetho.Ithe kubalulekile ukuthi izikhungo ezisebenza ngemali zilandele umthetho wokusebenza ngemali FAIS Act, okuyiwona ovikela amakhasimende alezi zikhungo.Ibalule ukuthi kubalulekile ukuthi ibhange lime kahle esimweni sezezimali (solvency), lifeze lokho elalisungulelwe kona ukuze kusizakale amakhasimende alo nezinye izinhlaka.Isikhulu esiphezulu sebhange Ithala, uDkt Thulani Vilakazi sithe abantu kumele bazi ukuthi Ithala livuliwe ukubhekelela amakhasimende alo njengoba lisalungisa okushiwo yiFSCA.Uthe kuyiqiniso ukuthi ilayisensi ihoxisiwe kodwa lokhu ngeke kuphazamise imishwalense yamakhasimende abo nemihlomulo ayitholayo, abantu bangaqhubeka nokufaka izicelo zokunxeshezelwa bazosizakala.“Uhulumeni wasungula Ithala ukusiza abantu baKwaZulu-Natal ngezimali ikakhulukazi labo abasezindaweni eziswele emakhaya. Ithala liyawenza umsebenzi walo, liyiguqulile impilo yabantu. Ukulandela imithetho yokusebenza ngezimali kulisebenzele Ithala njengoba lithole umbiko ongenagcobho woMncwaningi Mabhuku kunyaka wezimali ka-2023/24. Ayikho imali emoshiwe noma esebenze kungafanele. Selisebenze kahle, linozinzo iminyaka engaphezu kuka-20 .” kusho uVilakazi.

UPHUME enkantolo edangele, kuhlehliswa icala, owaxoshwa esikhundleni sokuba yikhansela le-ANC osolwa ngokudubula abulale uzakwabo eMayville, eThekwini.UMnuz Mzimuni “Mzi” Ngiba (46) nabanye abasolwa abane aboshwe nabo, ubekade evele eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini, ngoLwesine.Zithe zisuka amadaka, umshushisi u-Advocate Nhlanhla Shange wasukuma efaka isicelo kwiJaji uJacqueline Henriques, ukuba lihlehliswe icala.Ubeke isizathu sokuthi akekho umshushisi omkhulu okunguyena owengamele leli cala. UShange uthe isizathu sokuthi angabi khona enkantolo uzakwabo wukuthi ushonelwe isihlobo sakhe.“Uyoze abe khona emsebenzini emuva kwamasonto amabili, ekuqaleni kukaMeyi, ngakho ngicela ukuthi lihlehliswe icala,” kucela uShange.Ijaji likhombise ukunengeka ukuthi icala kudingeka ukuthi lihlehliswe.Libuzile ukuthi uShange ngeke yena akwazi ukubamba izintambo aqhubeke necala?“Angifuni ukuzwakala sengathi anginalo uzwelo ngokwehlele uzakwenu kodwa kusukela ngoMashi kugcina ukuhlala leli cala, beningakazilungiseleli?” kubuza ijaji.Ijaji libe selikhipha isinqumo sokuthi icala lihlehliselwa uJuni 13, nonyaka.Likhiphe nomyalelo othi uMbuso nabamele abamangalelwa kuzomele bahlangane benze izendlalelo zokuqala kokuqulwa kwecala engakashayi uMeyi 17.Abamangalelwa okungoMnuz Nkosinathi Ngcobo, Sandile Mzizi Ngiba, Sifiso Mlondo noPhathesakhe Ngiba, bavele babhocobala, babuyiselwa ezitokisini beqhutshwa yiphoyisa indumalo ibhalwe ebusweni.Abamangalelwa bathweswe amacala amabili okubulala uMnuz Siyabonga Mkhize, owanqoba ukhetho engasekho, nelungu le-ANC uMnuz Mzukisi Nyanga.Babhekene namanye amacala amabili okuzama ukubulala abantu ababili ababesemotweni noMkhize noNyanga ngesikhathi behlaselwa emuva kokukhankasa eCato Crest, eMayville, ngo-Okthoba 2021.Kwelinye icala, iJaji uHendriques libeke izinsuku okuzoqulwa ngazo icala lokubulawa kowayefundisa eMangosuthu University of Technology (MUT).Icala kulindeleke ukuthi liqale ukulalelwa ngo-Okthoba 7 kuze kube uNovemba 1, nonyaka, eNkantolo eNkulu yaseScottburgh.Abamangalelwa okungoMnuz Siyabonga Freeman Mahaye (35), Thobani Mhlongo (23), Kwanele Makhaye (29) noSihle Mkhize (23) bathweswe icala lokuthumba, elokuphanga kusetshenziswa udlame nelokubulala okuhleliwe uMnuz Chanlall Dwarika ngoMeyi, 2023.Yagcwala izinkundla zokuxhumana i-video eyayikhombisa abamangalelwa beshaya umufi base bemfaka ngenkani emotweni yakhe iHonda SUV, bahamba naye. UDwarika watholakala eseshonile eNanda.

Lihweba ngoR18 iRandi lakuleli uma liqhathaniswa ne-U$SD yaseMelika njengoba kugcotshwa uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa.USolwazi Bonke Dumisa oyisazi somnotho esizimele, uthe izimakethe ziyakujabulela okwenzeka ezweni njengoba iRandi like langabi nozinzo kusayiwa okhethweni kodwa emuva kokumenyezelwa kwemiphumela lahweba kangcono.Uthe njengoba seliwuR18 lisuka kuR18.93 ngoLwesihlanu kanti noma liqhathaniswa noPondo waseBritain lenza kahle kakhulu njengoba izimakethe zivulwe lihweba ngoR22.93 lisuka kuR23.30 kanti ngoLwesihlanu beliwuR24.20.Uma liqhathaniswa ne-Euro belihweba ngoR19.61 lisuka kuR20.61 ngoLwesihlanu. UDumisa uthe loku kukhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi abatshali zimali bayakujabulela abakubonayo.Uphethe ngokugqugquzela abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ukuthi beze nezisombululo zezinkinga zomnotho, bangahlali bekhala njalo.

LIZOGAYA ngomunye umhlathi kubafundi abenza uGrade 4 ezikoleni  ngonyaka ozayo njengoba sebezofunda ezinye izifundo ngolimi lwebele. Izifundo, iMaths neNatural Science zizoqala ukufundwa ngolimi lwebele ukuze kunciphe isihlava sabafundi abafeyilayo ngenxa yokuthi basuke sebefundiswa ngesiNgisi.Lokhu kuvezwe nguNgqonqoshe weMfundo eyisiSekelo, uNkk Angie Motshekga, izolo ekhuluma engqungqutheleni ebheka ukufunda ngezilimi zesintu kuhlanganisa nesiNgisi eBlomfontein.UNkk Motshekga uthe ucwaningo luveza ukuthi abafundi bayafeyila uma sebekwaGrade 4 ngenxa yokuthi basuke sebeshintshe ulimi lokufunda sebefundiswa ngesilungu.Uveze ukuthi kusuka kwaGrade R kuya kwaGrade 3, abafundi bafundiswa ngolimi lwebele bese kushintsha izinto uma sebefka kwaGrade 4, lapho sekudingeka bafundiswe ngesilungu.“Ucwaningo luveza ukuthi abafundi abafundiswa ngezilimi abazincela ebeleni, benza kahle kakhulu. Uma uqhathanisa izibalo zocwaningo uthola ukuthi abafundiswa ngolimi lwabo okuyisiNgisi kanjalo nesiBhunu benza kahle kunalabo abasuke bekhuluma lezi zilimi njengezengeziwe. Umfundi ongaluncelanga ebeleni lolu limi, uqale atolikele olimini lwebele, ngaphambi kokuba aphendule umbuzo,” kusho uNkk Motshekga. Uveze ukuthi abafundi baze baqale ukwenza kahle uma sebekwaGrade 9.“Lokhu kuveza ukuthi basuke sebeqala ukusibamba isilungu yingakho benza kahle uma sebekuleli banga. Kusuka kwaGrade 4 kuya kwamanye amabanga kusuke kumbulwa kwembeswa kulabo abangaluncelanga ebeleni ulimi abafunda ngalo.” Uthe baluqala kancane kancane lolu hlelo ngoba abafuni ukuxina abafundi.“Kukhona abathi sifuna ukubabuyisela eGibhithe ngokuthi sibafundise ngezilimi zabo. Kwamanye amazwe abafundi bakhona benza kahle kakhulu ngoba basuke befunda ngezilimi zabo.” UDkt Mark Chetty, obhekele izivivinyo emnyangweni kazwelonke, uveze ukuthi yingakho nocwaningo lubalula ukuthi abafundi bakwaGrade 4 abakuqondi abafundayo.Uthe bazoqala ngezifundo ezimbalwa kwaGrade 4 bese benabela kwamanye amabanga eminyakeni elandelayo.“Ngo-2026 sinabela kwaGrade 5, size sifinyelele kwaGrade 7. U-80% wezinto ezizofundwa kwaGrade 4 ngonyaka ozayo, zizofundwa ngolimi lwebele bese u-20% ufundwe ngesiNgisi. KwaGrade 7 kuzolingana, njengoba u-50% kuzoba ngolimi lwebele bese kuthi omunye kube isiNgisi,” kusho uChetty. Uveze ukuthi abafundi bazokwazi ukuphendula ngalezi zilimi zombili, okungaba isiZulu nesilungu.UNkk Motshekga uthe baqale bavivinya lolu hlelo e-Eastern Cape, iminyaka eyishumi wathi lube yimpumelelo.“Kuzobe kungokokuqala ukuthi eminyakeni engu-30 izwe lakhululeka, sibhalise siphinde sicwaninge ukuthi abafundi baphasa kanjani uma bebhala ngolimi lwabo iMaths nezinye izifundo.”Uchithe ukuthi bafuna ukuqeda ngesiBhunu njengoba kukhona abafafaza la mampunge wathi zonke izilimi zesintu ziyalingana emnyangweni.

AJIKISIWE amabhasi awosigedlemba abecuthele ukuthutha izimbali zezwe eziya eMkhosini woMhlanga wakulo nyaka oyingqophamlando njengoba kuphela iminyaka engu-40 lomkhosi wavuselelwa kabusha.Abanikazi bamabhasi okutholakale ukuthi awekho esimweni batshelwe ukuba balethe amanye amabhasi alungele ukuthutha amatshitshi alibangise esigodlweni eNyokeni, KwaNongoma.Angu-31 amabhasi okutholakale ukuthi awakulungele ukuba semgwaqeni.Lokhu kudalulwe uMphathiswa wezokuThutha, uMnuz Siboniso Duma, obekade eyohlola amabhasi azothutha izintombi.UDuma uthe emabhasini angu-177 ahloliwe, angu-146 okutholakale ukuthi akulungele ukuba semgwaqeni.“Lokhu kusho ukuthi sikwazile ukusindisa imiphefumulo engenacala njengoba sikhiphe lamabhasi angu-31 emgwaqeni. Kusobala ukuthi lamabhasi angamathuna ezihlalele. Abanikazi bala mabhasi sebetsheliwe ukuthi abalethe amanye amabhasi akulungele ukuba semgwaqeni.”UDuma uthe baphinde bahlola namatekisi, wathi onke amatekisi ahloliwe atholakale ekulungele ukuba semgwaqeni.“Siyabonga kubanikazi bamatekisi ngokulandela imithetho yomgwaqo.”UDuma uthe babeke phambili ukuphepha kwezimbali zesizwe ikakhulukazi njengoba umkhosi wakulo nyaka uyingqophamlando. “Njengoba nonke nizokhumbula ukuthi siqale inyanga yamagugu ngokubamba umhlangano obalulekile neSilo uMisuzulu kaZwelithini. Emhlanganweni, iSilo sigcizelela kakhulu eyokuphepha kwezintombi. “Kule minyaka engu-40 eyedlule uMkhosi woMhlanga ukhulile kakhulu njengoba usuhanjelwa ngisho nangabantu abaqhamuka emazweni angaphandle. Likhulu isasasa elikhona ngomkhosi wakulo nyaka njengoba izindawo zokulala sezigcwele esifundeni iZululand.”UDuma uthe amaphoyisa omgwaqo azokube ephume ngezinkani kule mpelasonto.“Amaphoyisa azobonakala emisa izimoto namabhasi, ehlola ukuthi akulungele yini ukuba semgwaqweni.”UDuma uthe banezingxoxo nabanikazi bamaloli, wathi bafisa ukuthi amaloli ayigweme imigwaqo emikhulu ezosetshenziswa abantu ababheke eNyokeni.Phakathi kwemigwaqo ayibalulile osuka uR66 phakathi koLundi noNongoma, R66 phakathi kweGingindlovu noLundi, R66 phakathi koPhongolo noNongoma, uR618 phakathi koNongoma noHlabisa kanye noR618 phakathi koNongoma neVryheid.Izimbali zezwe ziqale ukutheleka eNyokeni izolo, umkhosi uzophela ngeSonto.Kulindelwe izintombi ezingaphezu kuka-40 000 emkhosini wakulo nyaka.UMkhosi woMhlanga wavuselelwa kabusha iNdlovukazi uShiyiwe Mantfombi Dlamini Zulu ngo-1984, ngesikhathi kubusa iSilo uGoodwill Zwelithini kaBhekuzulu.

ZIKHALA ngokucindezelwa kothisha izinyunyana njengoba zithi umthetho uvikela uphinde uvune abafundi abatitinya othisha okuthi uma sebezivikela bakhonjwe indlela. Lezi zinyunyana zithi kugcina sekuba umfundi ophenduka umgilwa ekubeni engumphehli wodweshu.Lokhu kulandela ukusabalala kwe-video yesehlakalo esenzeke eGlenvista High eGauteng, muva nje lapho, kungongaphansi nongaphezulu phakathi kukathisha nomunye wabafundi. Kuvela nomunye umfundi ezama ukugqema uthisha ngesihlalo.Uthisha kule video ubonakala ezama ukubhula lo mfundi ngesihlalo, emuva kokuvuka othulini.UMengameli weNatu, uMnuz Sibusiso Malinga, uthe selokhu kwavalwa induku ezikoleni, akukho uMnyango wezeMfundo owabahlinzeka ngakho ukuthi bakusebenzise ukuqondisa abafundi.Uveze ukuthi okwenziwa abafundi yinto eyenzeka nasemphakathini ngoba kwayona iyabahlasela othisha kubalwa nezigebengu. “Ibuhlungu impilo kathisha kulezi zinsuku ngoba uma eshaye umfundi uyaxoshwa, ayikhulunywa eyakhe. Akekho ovikela uthisha ngoba nomnyango umlahla ngecala, aze aboshwe kwesinye isikhathi. Umfundi osuke eshaye uthisha uyabuyela esikoleni, emuva kokumiswa isikhashana.” Uthe nomkhandlu olawula othisha iSouth African Council for Educators (SACE), ucheme nabafundi.“Ithina esikhokhela iSACE kodwa kwayona ayisivikeli, ichema nabafundi. Ngiyazi kunzima kodwa ngiyanxusa kozakwethu ukuthi uma bebona ukuthi umoya uyaphakama, abaphumele emnyango babuye selehlile igwebu. Ukucabanga kothisha kumele kube ngaphezu kwalokho komfundi, bangasheshi ukuhluthuka.” UNobhala Jikelele weSadtu, uMnuz Mugwena Maluleke, ukhale ngokuthi isiyinsakavukela eyodlame ezikoleni.Uthe izikole kumele kube yizindawo ezingenalo udlame wathi nosizo olunikezwa ezikoleni okuqubuke kuzo udlame, kumele lungachemi nabafundi kuphela. Ukhale ngokuthi umthetho uvuna abafundi kodwa bese uqina ngasohlangothini lothisha.“Okubuhlungu ngukuthi iSACE igweba kanzima othisha, abafundi bona bayayekwa. Umnyango kumele wenze isimo sibe sihle sokusebenza kothisha futhi ubhekane nabafundi abangalawuleki.”Ukugxekile ukuhlaselwa kothisha wathi lokhu kuzothena amandla labo abasafuna ukufundela lo mkhakha. Okhulumela umnyango, uMnuz Elijah Mhlanga, ucashunwe ethi uMthethosisekelo wezwe ubalula ukuthi kuyilungelo lomfundi ukufunda.Ukhale ngokuthi abanye abazali bayazivuna izingane zabo ngokuthi baziphikele uma kungukuthi kukhona izinto ezisolwa ngazo ezikoleni.“Abazali yibona abagijima baphikele izingane zabo. Umthetho uthi umfundi umiswa izinsuku ezingu-14, emva kwalokho  uyabuyela esikoleni. Uma umxosha esikoleni, kungumsebenzi  womnyango ukumfunela esinye isikole. Nakhona kuleso sikole bafike bamchithe ngoba kuthiwa uxoshwe la ebefunda khona ngoba eyihlongandlebe.”

KUKHONJWA ngenjumbane abesilisa asebekhulile abanganqeni ukushaya iphakethe bakhiphe imali abadlisa ngayo kubafundi abaqashile basezikoleni zaseNkandla.Lokhu kuvele eMbizweni YaMadoda ebibanjelwe ehholo lomphakathi waseThalaneni, eNkandla.Ngokusho kwesikhulu sophiko lwePrimary Health Care (PHC) esibhedlela saseKhombe, uMnuz Lawrence Khoza, sithe sibalelwa ku-25% isibalo sentsha yakulesi sifunda ekhulelwa ineminyaka ephakathi kuka-15 no-19.Uthe intsha ayigcini ngokukhulelwa kodwa igcina isitheleleka ngegciwane lengculazi. "Siwu-50% isibalo sentsha efika lapha ikhulelwe okugcina kutholakale ukuthi isihaqwe yisifo sengculazi." UKhoza uthe iningi lezingane ezibhekana nale ngwadla ngabafundi abahlala emiqashweni."Njengoba kwaziwa ukuthi ezikoleni zaseNkandla izinga lokuphasa liphezulu, abazali abaningi baletha izingane zabo ukuba zizothola imfundo engcono. Njengoba zihlala emiqashweni zisuke seziziphethe, sezenza noma yikanjani. Yilapho amadoda anemali esebenzisa ubuthakathaka bazo ngoba ezinye zisuke ziphuma emindenini engamile kahle.Zisuke zingazitholi zonke izidingo emakhaya bese ama-blesser ethola intuba yokuzixhaphaza ngokocansi."Kuthiwa abantu abanemali abaheha abafundi ngezimpahla ezibizayo nempilo entofontofo. Uthe okunye okubuhlungu ukuthi izingane ezisuke ziqala ukubeletha, azifuni ukusebenzisa izivikelo ngoba zinenkolelo yokuthi ngeke zisabathola abantwana.UKhoza uthe yize kunjalo kodwa njengesibhedlela banazo izinhlelo zokunqanda lesi sihlava.Usonhlalakahle wakwaSA National Council on Alcoholism and Drug Dependence (Sanca), uNksz Cebisile Zungu, ukhale ngokusetshenziswa kwezidakamizwa. Unxuse abazali ukuthi bayeke ukuthumela izingane ukuba ziyothenga utshwala nezidakamizwa ngoba zigcina sezidlwengulwa yimilutha.Ubuye wadalula ukuthi kunemilutha emibili esanda kudlwengula umfana yaze yamnquma ubuntu bakhe.UNkk Zonke Shazi-Hlongwane, wenhlangano esiza abazali ekutheni bakhulise izingane Ikusasa Ngelami, uthe izingane ezineminyaka ezingaphansi kweminyaka engu-18 zisuke zisadinga ukuba ngaphansi komzali."Ukuba sendaweni engalona ikhaya zisezincane kwenza ukuthi zizithathele zona izinqumo noma zizithole zenza into ebezingayithandi ngoba zibona ezinye zenza ngoba zisuke zingakabi naso isibindi sokuthi zime ekutheni azikwenzi okuthile. Uma zibona bebaningi abakwenzayo futhi kubunobumnandi nokuphila ntofontofo maningi amathuba okuthi ziheheke ngoba akekho umzali ozikhalimayo nozinika izeluleko,"  kusho  uNkk Shazi-Hlongwane.Uthe lokhu ngeke kufaniswe nokuthi ingane ifunda eboarding school ngoba yona inemithetho elawula abafundi kanti emqashweni asikho isakhiwo esifana naleso esisungulwe sisuselwa emthethweni ovikela abafundi.IMeya yakuMasipala waseNkandla, uMnuz Mbhekiseni Biyela, ikhale kakhulu ngezinga lokuphuzwa kotshwala ngabantu besifazane kule ndawo. UBiyela uthe amajoyinti amaningi asegcwala abantu besifazane kunabesilisa. Ubuye wadalula ukuthi imililo esishise imizi eminingi eNkandla ibaselwa ngabantu abasuke bedakiwe, ikakhulukazi yisiqatha.Nenduna yasesigodini saseNgwegweni, uMnuz Sphelele Ngidi, ithe uphuzo lubhubhisile kubantu abaningi baseNkandla.Phakathi kwezitatanyiswa ebezikhona kungabalwa amakhosi asendlunkulu, izinduna namakhansela.Kulo mcimbi kusukume wonke umuntu ngesikhathi sekunandisa ompetha besicathamiya, iZulu Messengers kanti uhlelo beluphethwe ngobuchule umsakazi weJozi FM, Vusizwe Langa.

UKHOMISHANA wamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi ukhombe umunwe abantu besilisa bendlu emnyama ukuthi yibona abayimbangela enkulu yokwanda kwezigameko zobugebengu kulesi sifundazwe.UMkhwanazi usho lokhu ekhuluma kwiKZN Social Crime Prevention Summit, ingqungquthela yokulwa nobugebengu, ebise-Olive Convention Centre, eThekwini izolo.Kule ngqungquthela, uKhomishana uveze ukuthi ekucwaningeni kwabo ngobugebengu obuhlukene obenzeka esifundazweni, babophe abantu besilisa abamnyama abawu-60 000, kwathi kwabesifazane kwaboshwa abawu-11 728.“Ngiyaxolisa ukubeka lokhu ngale ndlela kodwa lezi zibalo zikubeka ngokusobala ukuthi abantu besilisa bendlu emnyama bayimbangela yokudlonga kobugebengu eKZN,” usho kanje.Eqhuba uMkhwanazi, uveze ukuthi okunye okubakhathazayo wukuthi iTheku noMgungundlovu yizona zifunda ezenza ubugebengu bube phezulu kakhulu esifundazweni.Uthe iTheku lino-42.1% kuthi uMgungundlovu ube no-11% wezenzo zobugebengu. “Uma singanqoba ubugebengu kulezi zifunda isimo singaba ngcono kakhulu esifundazweni sethu.”’“Kuyasikhathaza nokuthi intsha yesifundazwe ingene shi ebugebengwini obehlukene. Ukucwaninga kwethu kusivezele ukuthi intsha eneminyaka ephakathi kuka-16 no-25 iyona ebandakanyeka kakhulu ezenzweni zobugebengu. Yinto esikhathaza kakhulu ngoba labo bantu baseminyakeni okumele ngabe bayafunda noma bayasebenza kuyona,” kusho yena.UMkhwanazi uthe ezinhlotsheni eziwu-17 zobugebengu ezibikiwe, okuhamba phambili ngezokweba nezokushaya, njengoba ezibalweni zangonyaka odlule, bathola ukuthi awu-96 000, ku-256 527 wamacala obugebengu abikiwe. “Uma kungehla izenzo zalawo macala kungaba ngcono kakhulu. Okunye okudale lokho wukwanda kwesibalo sabantu abahlala emigwaqeni, okwenza kwande izenzo zobugebengu ngoba ukuphila kwabantu ngendlela engacacile kwenza benze noma yini ukuziphilisa, bese bephula nomthetho," kusho uMkhwanazi.Uthe abantu abayekile ukubulalana njengoba kulo nyaka nje kuphela sekubikwe amacala okubulala awu-6 343, okwenza iKZN ibe yisifundazwe esihamba phambili ezweni ngokufa kwabantu.“Ukubopha abantu abenza ubugebengu akusizi ukulungisa izinto. Asithole umnyombo wazo zonke lezi zinkinga esibhekene naso.”’UMkhwanazi uveze nokuthi ukuswela ingqalasizinda, yindlala yamathuba omsebenzi, yimibhikisho eyenziwa ngabantu ngezizathu ezahlukene nodlame ematekisini ngezinye zezinkinga ezidinga ukulungiswa ukuze kuliwe nobugebengu.

BAKHALA bayazithulisa abantu akade betshale imali ebhanoyini elibizwa nge-LeftoverCurrency ebelizinze eVerulam, KwaZulu-Natal.Leli bhanoyi liphahlazeke ngoMsombuluko lapho abantu abaningi bebelindele ukuthi bazokhokhelwa o-R700 000, R1 million nezinye izishaqane.NgoMsombuluko kusabalale ama-video nezithombe zenqwaba yabantu benkanise ngaphandle kwebhilidi obekukhona kulo amahhovisi ale nkampani okuthiwa bafike kuwo sekulenga ingidi. Iningi labebenkanisile belithi lizohola ngoba phela usuku lokuqala enyangeni lungolunye lwezinsuku okuholwa ngazo kodwa bagoduke belambatha njengoba bese kukhala ibhungezi, kungasekho muntu. Isolezwe lithole ukuthi iLeftoverCurrency ibiphethwe ngowesilisa obezibiza ngelikaBrian Mkhize nozakwabo obebizwa ngoDlamini.UNksz Ntombikhona Dlamini waKwaSimamane, eNdwedwe, uthe baqale ukuzwa ngeLeftoverCurrency ngo-Agasti wonyaka odlule ngesikhathi benikwa amaphepha achaza ngale nkampani uma beyothenga eVerulam.“Sibe sesihambela izinkundla zokucobelelana ngolwazi sabona nesitifiketi esibhalwe ukuthi bayayikhokha intela eLeftoverCurrency sase sijoyina. Abantu bakhona bebebukeka bethembekile, behlanzekile futhi bekhuluma kahle. Ubufaka uR5 ohambisana no-R1300 bese uthola uR3200. Bekufanele ube nekhanda likaMandela uR5. Owokugubha iminyaka ewu-90, uR5 ubuthi uma uwufakile uthole uR33 800 emuva kwezinsuku eziwu-32,” kuchaza uNksz Dlamini.Uthe okokugcina ubetshale oR5 abawu-20 kanti ubezothola uR700 000 kwazise baningi nabantu akade ebatshela ngale nkampani.“Sithe uma sesiyolanda imali yethu ngoMsombuluko safica amahhovisi evaliwe, uMkhize noDlamini bengasabonwa nangokhalo. Silindile ngoba phela imali besivamise ukuyithola kodwa kulokhu asizange siyithole. Amaphoyisa afikile athi kufanele ababili kithina bayovula icala bese silifaka kwigroup kawhatsapp ukuze kuthi uma kunokwenzekayo ecaleni sikwazi ukusizakala,” kusho uNksz Dlamini.Uthe ukhathazekile ngokungayitholi imali kule nkampani ngoba ubebona eyithola le abeyitshale kancane.Uveze ukuthi uMkhize wathi udabuka eNewcastle futhi le nkampani ibisebenza online naseMpumalanga ngaphambi kokuza KwaZulu-Natal.Omunye obedlala leli bhanoyi, ongathandanga ukudalulwa, uthe okwabenza bangena kalula wukuthi ngo-Ephreli kulo nyaka kunabantu abaklonyeliswe ngamathelevishini, amabhodwe esintu, amafriji nokunye ababeqale kulo ngonyaka odlule.Isolezwe liyibhekile iLeftoverCurrency langayithola ohlwini lwezinkampani ezigunyazwe ukusebenza ngemali yiFinancial Sector Conduct Authority (Fsca).IFSCA ithe ngaphambi kokutshala imali abayisebenze kanzima abantu, kufanele babheke ukuthi leyo nkampani igunyaziwe yini ukwenza lo msebenzi.Lokhu bangakwenza ngokungena kwiwebsite yeFSCA ethi www.fsca.co.za noma bashayele u-0800 110 443.IBhange loMmbuso, iSouth African Reserve Bank, lihlale likugcizelela ukuthi imali ayishintshi intengo yayo, uR5 uhlale uwuR5 noma ngabe unekhanda likaMandela noma elezilwane zasendle.UConstable Thenjiswa Ngcobo wamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal ugcine engayiphendulanga imibuzo athunyelwe yona ngalolu daba.

SISHUBILE isimo phakathi kwenkosi yaseMgababa, eSouth Coast uPhathisizwe Philbert Luthuli nesizwe sakhe, esimsola ngokuqasha izingane zayo ezikhundleni zomkhandlu wayo.Isolezwe Ngempelasonto  lithole ukuthi impi ephakathi kwenkosi nesizwe isikwelinye izinga njengoba kuthiwa ngisho nesigungu sayo asihambisani nesenzo senkosi.“Isimangazile inkosi uLuthuli eqasha izingane zakhe ukuthi zisebenze emkhandlwini wakhe. Bekunezikhundla zabantu ababili ebezivulekile, okungesikanobhala nesomuntu ohlanza enkantolo yesizwe. Esikamabhalane sivuleke ngenxa yokuthi inkosi ixoshe obekhona ngoba ubengahambisani nezinto ezenzayo. “Ithe uma isimemezela ukuthi kuqashwe omunye, kwavunyelwana ukuthi kumele kube wumsebenzi okhangiswayo ukuze abantu bendawo bafake izicelo zomsebenzi. Baningi abantu abafake izicelo ukuthi banikwe umsebenzi. Okuthusile ukuthi abantu bathe beletha izicelo kwafike kwathiwa sekuqashiwe lube lungakafiki nosuku okuvalwa ngalo ukufaka izicelo,” kusho umthombo.Uqhuba umthombo, uthe umkhandlu uyibuzile inkosi ukuthi ngobani laba asebeqashiwe, kwavela ukuthi isiqashe izingane zayo kuzona zombili izikhundla.Lokho kuthiwa kususe umsindo kangangoba nomkhandlu kuthiwa ugcine usujamelene nenkosi ngesenzo sayo, yagcina isisele yodwa nomndeni wayo ngoba akekho ohambisana nesenzo sayo.Kuthintwa inkosi ngalolu daba ifune ukwazi ukuthi ngobani asebeluhambise ephephandabeni.“Selokhu ngaba yinkosi kusuka ngo-1988, angikaze ngizwe kuthiwa sekungaze kuyiswe udaba lokuqashwa kukamabhalane emaphephandabeni. Kuyilungelo lami ukuthi ngingamqasha umabhalane. Njengoba ungazimisele ukuveza amagama abantu abakutshele lolu daba ngeke ngikwazi ukuphawula ngalo. Okunye okumele ukwazi ukuthi lolu daba akulona olwamaphephandaba, kungcono ungalubhali. Kufana nokuthi olomndeni njengoba luthinta isizwe nami. Udaba lomndeni ke kusuke kungelempepho akulona olokubhalwa emaphepheni. Laba abaluyise emaphepheni bafuna ukungihlambalaza nje,” kusho inkosi uLuthuli.ULuthuli akaqali ukuba sematheni ngezinto ezithinta yena endaweni yakhe. Ngo-2018 kwake kwavela isikhalo somphakathi wakhe uthi uhlala ebonakala ezindaweni zobumnandi ephuza eshaya namavosho. Umphakathi waphinde wasola inkosi ngokuthi idla imali yokudayisa izindawo endaweni yayo bese iyozitika ngeziphuzo. Kuyona le ndawo inkosi uLuthuli yake yaxabana nosomabhizinisi, uMnuz Edward Mpeko owayenendawo yokulala khona, waxoshwa yinkosi ngokungemthetho. Leli cala lagcina liphelele eNkantolo eNkulu eMgungundlovu lapho kwaphuma phambili uMpeko kwathiwa akakhokhelwe nezindleko zecala.

KUBATSHAZWA isihluku nesibindi sezigebengu ezigile amaphoyisa zingazimbozile ngisho ubuso, ngesikhathi ziwahlasela, zawalalisa phansi, zawaphuca izibhamu eMbizana, e-Eastern Cape, ngeSonto ebusuku.Lesi sigameko sishiye abantu bebambe ongezansi izigebengu ebezingagayelwe mphako, zilinda amaphoyisa zase ziyagadla kwasala elilodwa enkundleni nayisikhombisa elimele kanzima.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe, lawa maphoyisa ahlaselwe kusetshenziswa izinhlokohlela zezibhamu, ama-AK47. Kuthiwa amaphoyisa asesiteshini eMbizana aye eZizityaneni  ebizelwe endaweni yesigameko obekubulewe kuso umuntu ngeSonto ebusuku. Ezintatha ngoMsombuluko, amaveni amathathu esebuyela esiteshini esisedolobheni, ahlaselwe. Iveni yokuqala kuthiwa ibidlula egaraji ngesikhathi kuzwakala ukuqhuma kwesibhamu kubhekiswe kuyo ngabasolwa abangaziwa. Umshayeli ukwazile ukudlubulundela wadlula kule ndawo edubulekile waze wayoma esiteshini samaphoyisa eMbizana. Ababili abebekule veni babike ngalokhu kuvukelwa ngabantu esiteshini. Iveni yesibili ebilandela, kuthe isidlula ngakule ndawo nayo yadutshulwa, umshayeli wahluleka ukuyilawula, yaze yayoshayisa isigxobo sikagesi. Izigilamkhuba kuthiwa zibe seziya kule moto zaphoqa amaphoyisa amane abephakathi ukuthi aphume, ziwakhombe ngezibhamu. Ziphuce amaphoyisa izibhamu zathatha, iR5 eyodwa nama-9mm amane. Zithathe amaphoyisa zayongena nawo egaraji, zawaphoqa ukuthi alale phansi, zawabopha, lapho ebese ziveze zilalise khona abasebenzi basegaraji abebegadwe ngezibhamu. Kuthiwa izigebengu zibe sezilinda amanye amaphoyisa, kuthe kuqhamuka imoto yesithathu yamaphoyisa, zavulela ngenhlamvu kwadubuleka iphoyisa elilodwa lashona, imoto yashayisa isigxobo sikagesi. Izigebengu kuthiwa ziye kule moto zathatha isibhamu sephoyisa abelingumgibeli, umufi obeshayela ubengasiphethe isibhamu. Kuthiwa ziye egaraji zazama ukuqhumisa umshini wemali kodwa zehluleka, zagcina zibaleke nezibhamu zamaphoyisa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa e-Eastern Cape, uLieutenant Colonel Siphokazi Mawisa, uthe amaphoyisa aphenya icala lokubulala, awokuzama ukubulala nawokubamba inkunzi. Amacala aphenywa ngoKlebe. Abasolwa ababalelwa kwabangu-20 basagcwele amathafa. Kwenzeka lokhu nje, ngeviki eledlule kusinde ngokulambisa amaphoyisa amabili eMbumbulu, adunwe imoto athathelwa izibhamu ngabasolwa ababehamba ngemoto iVW Polo. Imoto yamaphoyisa itholwe ilele ngokhakhayi budebuduze nalapho ithathwe khona. UDkt Johan Burger ongungcweti wezobugebengu ozimele, uthe kuyakhathaza ukwanda kwezigameko zokuhlaselwa kwamaphoyisa futhi kukhombisa ukuthi izigebengu aziwesabi nhlobo.“Indlela okwenzeka ngayo lezi zigameko, lapho esize sibone izigebengu zigebenga amaphoyisa zingazifihlile nokuzifihla, kukubeka ngokusobala ukuthi aziwesabi amaphoyisa. Kumele uhulumeni neziphathimandla bayisukumele le nkinga, kwenziwe isibonelo ngabathinteka kulezi zigameko,” usho kanje.Uthe kumele kuphenywe kuze kuboshwe abathintekayo, kungathalaliswa nje kugcine kungaziwa ukuthi uphenyo luhambe lwafika kuphi. Okhumela iSouth African Policing Union, uMnuz Lesiba Thobakgale, uzigxeke kakhulu izenzo zokugetshengwa kwamaphoyisa.“Zonke lezi zigameko zikhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi amaphoyisa awahlonishwa nhlobo futhi okwenziwa kuwona kungukwedelela umthetho ngakho sinxusa ukuthi kuphuthume uphenyo ukuze kuboshwe abenzi bokubi,” usho kanje.

KUSOLWA iqembu lemigulukudu elihlalise lubhojozi umphakathi waKwaMashu, elingena izikole liphange othisha futhi ligebenge abasebenzisa umgwaqo uDumisani Makhaye.Lokhu kuvezwe umthombo weSolezwe osezinhlakeni zezokuphepha ocele igama lawo ligodlwe.Uveze ukuthi laba besilisa bafike benze ukuganga bese beyabaleka bayocasha ehostela laKwaMashu.Esehlakalweni sakamuva kuthiwa bajamelane namaphoyisa amabili angabaseshi akade ezolanda iselula ebikadwe ikhuthuzwe umuntu ebizisho ukuthi isehostela.“Iqulu lezigebengu, ebelihlome ngezibhamu, livele lawagolozela amaphoyisa okudingeke ukuthi ahlabe umkhosi abize amanye kwayimande zidla phansi. Sezibhubhisile, zibamba nabantu emgwaqweni uDumisani Makhaye,” kubeka umthombo.Uqhube wathi izigebengu zisanda kungena esikoleni eMukelani Primary, zaphanga othisha amaselula nemali.Kuthiwa azigcinanga lapho, ziphinde zasebenzisa amaselula othisha zazithumelela imali ngohlelo lwe-app. Kulowo mnyama kuthiwa othisha bebekhonjwe ngezibhamu.Isolezwe selibike kaningi ngobugebengu okuthiwa bugubuzele ihostela laKwaMashu nokubulawa kwabantu. Kukhona asebeze balifanise nokuthi kukwaLasha.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe abakwasidlodlo basebenzisana namalungu omphakathi ukuze kunqandwe ubelelesi emgwaqweni uDumisani Makhaye.Uqhube wathi kule ndawo kudunwa izimoto, abantu babanjwa inkunzi abanye bagcine begwazwa noma bedutshulwa.“Sikhulumile nabasesiteshi samaphoyisa sendawo ukuthi kumele kuhleze kuphithizela iphoyisa kusukela ngo-6 ebusuku okuyisikhathi okuqala ngaso ubelelesi. Le nto ibikade yenzeka ngezimpelasonto kuphela, manje seyenzeka nsuku zonke,” kusho uNetshiunda.Uhlabe ikhwelo elibhekise emphakathini, wathi awugweme ukusebenzisa lo mgwaqo ebusuku uma kungekho okuphuthumayo.“Kungenjalo kumele bahambe bengamaqoqo. Uma kukhona abakusolayo bashayele ucingo amaphoyisa noma bazame izindlela zokuthi baphephe. Bangazami ukuphindisela ezigebengwini,” kusho uNetshiunda.Mayelana nemibiko ethi abantu ababodwa abenza lobu bugebengu elokishini laKwaMashu, uNetshiunda uthe uma kwenzeka ubugebengu amaphoyisa ashona khona bese eyacubungula enze uphenyo kubhekwe nembangela.Uthe ihostela laKwaMashu bese lithule isikhathi eside ngoba basebenzisana nabantu abahlala ngaphakathi kulona.“Uma kunezigilamkhuba kunoma iliphi ihostela, eziphuma zenze ubugebengu ngaphandle, abantu abanikeze amaphoyisa lolo lwazi khona ezoya eyozibopha,” kusho uNetshiunda.

KUSHODA kwabasebenzi ezikhungweni ezamukela izingcingo uma abantu beshayela inombolo u- 10111eziteshini zamaphoyisa, kuchazwe njengengwadla umphakathi obhekana nayo uma kumele ubike noma umpimpe abathile ngamacala asuke enzeka njengoba izingcingo kugcina sekuthatha isikhathi eside ukuthi ziphendulwe.Ephendula umbuzo we-DA ePhalamende ngesonto eledlule mayelana nezikhala zomsebenzi ezingavaliwe kulezi zikhungo, uNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa uMnuz Bheki Cele, uthe u-41,31% wabasebenzi abakhona ezikhungweni abenza lo msebenzi, okuchaza ukuthi izikhala ezingu- 58,69% zasala zingavaliwe.Esitatimendeni esithunyelwe yi-DA, leli qembu lithe isibalo esikhulu ngalolu hlobo sezikhala ezingavaliwe, sikhombisa ukuhluleka kukaCele.“Lezi zibalo zikhombisa ukuthi ungqongqoshe akawugqizi qakala umsebenzi wakhe wokuqinisekisa ukuthi abasebenzi benele  kulesi sikhungo esiwuhlaka olubalulekile emphakathini kwazise yilona olwamukela izingcingo uma abagilwa befuna usizo ngokushesha,” kubhalwe kanje,Kuvele ukuthi zingu- 2.34 million izingcingo  ezingene kulezi zikhungo   zangamukelwa ezinye zavalwa ngaphambi kokuthi oshaya ucingo adlulise umbiko, okwenzeke ngonyakamali owedlule u-2022/2023. Lokhu kwenza kube u-61,59% kuphela wezingcingo ezamukelwe kulezi zikhungo kuzwelonke, ngonyakamali ofanayo.Echaza ngalokhu, uCele uthe lesi sibalo sisuselwe ezintweni ezimbalwa okungaba ukufoneleka kwale nombolo ngephutha, ukufona udlulise umbiko ongekho okhohlisayo nokunye, noma kunjalo i-DA ikhale ngokuthi lesi yisibalo esiphezulu.UNobhala-jikelele womfelandawonye wezinyunyana, iSouth African Federation of Trade Union uMnuz Zwelinzima Vavi, uthe siyakhathaza isibalo sezikhala zomsebenzi kulesi sikhungo ezingavaliwe.“Kumele sikuqonde ukuthi abantu abafoneli kulezi zikhungo ngoba befuna ukudlala nje, kodwa kungenxa yokuthi basuke besesimeni  esidinga ezokuphepha ngokushesha noma behlaselwe yizigebengu. Uma kubhekwa imininingwane emenyezelwe uCele, kuyakhombisa ukuthi asikho isikhungo  salolu hlobo esisebenza ngokugcwele,” usho kanje.Izifundazwe i-KwaZulu-Natal, i-Free State, i-Mpumalanga ne-Eastern Cape kuthiwa zinesibalo esingu- 60% sabangaqashiwe kulesi sikhungo.  Izikhungo ezise-Queensburg e-Eastern Cape neziseSecunda eMpumalanga zinabasebenzi abangu- 8,2 %  no- 14,2% ngokwahlukana.

UMASIPALA wasebaQulusini ufuna kuqiniswe imithetho elawula ukusebenza kwezikhungo ezithenga izinsimbi namakhebula kagesi antshontshwe kamasipala.IMeya yalo masipala, uMnuz Sifiso Mkhwanazi ibibize isithangami sabezindaba izolo, izokwethula umbiko mayelana nokwebiwa kwamakhebula kagesi ezindaweni ezingaphansi kwalo masispala. Ukhale ngokuthi lokhu kugcina kuholele ekutheni umphakathi umashele umkhandlu uma ungenawo ugesi, wathi lezi zikhungo zibuye zithenge amakhebula kamasipala antshotshiwe  ekubeni kwaziwa ukuthi ayimpahla kamasipala.Uthe izinga lokwebiwa kwamakhebula kagesi kule ndawo kuphezulu kakhulu kangangoba umkhandlu usuze wathatha isinqumo sokuthi uqoke abaphenyi abazimele ngo-2022."Okusiphethe kabi kakhulu ukuthi kubantu abasolwa ngalobu bugebengu kubalwa nomunye wabasebenzi bethu njengoba ngoLwesine kutholakele ikhebula elingamamitha angu-300 emzini kasomabhizinisi wendawo ohlonishwayo. Lo somabhizinisi uthe lilethwe umsebenzi wethu. “Kuyasikhathaza lokhu, ngaphezu kwalokho sikhathazwa indlela amaphoyisa ahudula ngayo izinyawo ngamacala athinta ukwebiwa kwamakhebula. Akulona udaba oluncane lolu. “Ukwebiwa kwamakhebula, ukuphazanyiswa kokusebenza kwama-transformer (imishini ephehla ugesi) nengqalasizinda kagesi, kusibuyisela emuva. Sizithola sisebenzisa imali sithenga izinto ebese zithengiwe," kusho uMkhwanazi.Uthe awu-30 amacala avuliwe okwebiwa kwamakhebula kodwa mahlanu asesesigabeni sokuthi kunabantu ababoshiwe abavela enkantolo ngawo.Uqhube wathi usebhalele abaholi bamaphoyisa ebaQulusini, ekhalaza ngokuthi amaphoyisa ahudula izinyawo ngala macala, kwesinye isikhathi aba nokwenzelela kubantu abathintekayo. “Kulaba bakamuva, kuvela ukuthi amaphoyisa abathathile kodwa abazange bavele enkantolo ngoba baboshwe badedelwa, bangabekwa amacala. Kubo kubalwa nomnikazi womuzi ikhebula elitholakale kwakhe,” kuchaza imeya. UMkhwanazi uqhube wathi kuzolandelwa imithetho yabasebenzi yokuqondiswa ubugwegwe kumsebenzi othintekayo, wathi lolo hlelo lwenziwa yimenenja kamasipala.

KUKHALWA ngogesi omba eqolo eNingizimu Afrika njengoba ucwaningo luveza ukuthi u-57.9% womholo wabantu bakuleli uphelela emalini yokuthenga ugesi neyokugibela.Isolezwe  lithole ukuthi ngo-R200 abantu sebethola ugesi wekhadi owu-59.3 units kanti phambilini ububa wu-80 units.Ngo-R500 sebethola ama-unit awu-149.5, phambilini bebethola awu-168.4.Lezi yizibalo zikagesi othengwa ngabantu baKwaZulu-Natal, eGauteng abantu bakhona babhekene nenye inkinga njengoba emalini abathenga ngayo ugesi kudonswa uR200 okuthiwa wokukhokhela ukulungiswa kwengqalasizinda.UMnuz Mervyn Abrahams wenhlangano eyenza ucwaningo ngokubiza kokudla nesimo senhlalo, iPietermaritzburg Economic Justice & Dignity Group, uthe ucwaningo lwabo luthole ukuthi u-57.9% wamaholo uqedwa wugesi nemali yokugibela.Uthe ugesi uyabiza kakhulu kufanele uhulumeni eze nezindlela zokuwehlisa.“Ngaphambi kokuthi iNational Energy Regulator of South Africa (Nersa) inyuse intengo kagesi sathumela izethulo zokuthi akufanele unyuswe kakhulu. Inkinga abantu abazihambeli izithangami zeNersa ukuze babeke imibono yabo ngokubiza kukagesi. Kwabanye omasipala unyuke ngo-13%, kwabanye unyuke ngo-16%. Yisimo esithwalisa kanzima abantu ngoba kusho ukuthi u-57.9% womholo wabo ukhokhela ugesi bese enye ingxenye bayisebenzisele ukugibela uma beya emsebenzini,” kuchaza u-Abrahams.Uthe bazoqhubeka nokukhala ezinhlakeni ezifanele kodwa wagqugquzela abantu ukuthi ngonyaka ozayo bahambele izithangami zeNersa futhi bayibhale phansi imibono yabo yokuthi kungani ugesi kungafanele unyuke ngamalengiso.Ubuye waveza ukuthi i-Eskom iwunyusa kakhulu ugesi ngoba ifuna ukuqoqa imali eyayilahlekela kodwa okubuhlungu le mali isikhokhwa ngabantu abampofu.“Abantu abacebile banama-solar nezinye izindlela zokuphehla ugesi. Okusho ukuthi eminyakeni ezayo kuzosala abampofu abancike kugesi wase-Eskom. Kufanele uhulumeni eze nezindlela zokuxhasa ugesi ophakelwa abantu emizini yabo ngoba njengamanje ubiza kakhulu,” usho kanje.Uthe abantu abakwazi ngisho ukuthengela imindeni yabo ukudla okunomsoco ngenxa yokubiza kukagesi, imali mboleko enyuka njalo nokubiza kwezinga lempilo.Ubuye waphakamisa ukuthi bafuna iNational Minimum Wage (NMW) inyuke ibe wuR40 ngehora njengoba iwuR27.58 okwamanje.Uveze ukuthi ukubiza kwempilo kwenza abasebenzi baboleke imali noma behola ngenxa yokuthi abakwazi ukuthenga ukudla, ukukhokha ugesi nokwenza ezinye izidingo zempilo.“I-NMW kufanele inyuke ukuze abasebenzi bakwazi ukuphila impilo engcono. Iholo lomuntu oyedwa londla abantu abane kuya phezulu. Umholo wabo njengamanje awubaniki isikhala sokonga nesokuphila impilo engcono. Bayaphoqeleka ukuyoboleka ukuze badle ngenxa yokuthi uhhafu womholo uphelela emalini yokugibela nasekuthengeni ugesi,” kusho u-Abrahams.

EVILE ku-65 000 amadokodo amacala athinta ucansi nokudlwengulwa kwabesifazane ahoxiswe kungafinyelelwe esiphethweni sophenyo phakathi kuka- 2018 noDisemba nyakenye.Lokhu kuthiwa kuvezwe wuNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa kuleli uMnuz Senzo Mchunu ngesikhathi ephendula umbuzo we-DA ephalamende ngesonto eledlule.Emva kokuthi owayewuNgqongqoshe kulo mnyango uMnuz Bheki Cele kuthe ngoMeyi wavezela iphalamende ukuthi evile ku-54 million amadokodo avaliwe kungafinyelwe esiphethweni kusuka ngonyaka wezimali u-2018/2019 ngenxa yokushoda kobufakazi, uMchunu wenekele iphalamende ngohlu lwamadokodo.Phakathi kwamadokodo amacala avuliwe okuthiwa agcine ehoxiswe engasetshenziwe, angu- 61 740 awokudlwengula, 5 523 awokushaya ngenhloso yokwenza ucansi bese kuthi angu- 141 026 athinta ukuhlukunyezwa ngokobulili.I-DA ithi okuvezwe wuMchunu kuyaphazamisa kakhulu futhi kudweba isithombe esibi ikakhulu njengoba kuyinyanga okuhlonishwa ngayo iqhaza labesifazane.Ilungu le-DA ephalamende uNksz Lisa Schickerling, lithe angu-974 amadokodo amacala athinta ucansi avalwayo eziteshini zamaphoyisa  kuleli, ngenyanga, kusuka ngo-2018.“Lokhu kusho ukuthi cishe bangu-32 abagilwa bamacala okudwengulwa nokushaywa ngenhloso yokwenza ucansi abagcina bengabutholi ubulungiswa, ngosuku. Lesi simo siyaphazamisa kakhulu sidinga ukungenelela ngokushesha kukangqongqoshe nezikhulu emaphoyiseni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi udlame olubhekiswe kwabesiifazane luyasukunyelwa,” usho kanje.Kuthiwa okunye okuyimbangela yokuhoxa kwamacala, amadokodo ayalahleka noma ebiwe okugcina sekuphazamisa.Amanye amacala okuvela ukuthi agcina ehoxisiwe ngenxa yokushoda kobufakazi nodaba oluthinta amadokokodo, angu- 76 655 awokubulala, angu-256 162 okubamba inkunzi nangu-9 114 okuthumba.UMchunu uthe u- 68,75% wamadokodo antshontshwe eziteshini zamaphoyisa athinta amacala othinta ucansi, wonke ayevulwe eziteshini ezisesifundazweni iLimpompo okuthiwa kushiya ukukhathazeka.

INHLANGANO elwela amalungelo abampofu, iDudula Movement, ikhala ngokuvalwa kwabadayisa amashibusi noswidi ezitimeleni zaKwaZulu-Natal.UNobhala weDudula Movement esifundazweni, uMnuz Bhekie Dzanibe, utshele Isolezwe ukuthi iPassenger Rail Agency South Africa (Prasa) yethule izitimela ezintsha yase ivala ukuthi kudayiswe kulezi zitimela.UDzanibe uveze ukuthi phambilini abadayisi bebethwala amashibusi, oswidi, amagwinya neziphuzo ukuze badayisele abagibeli bezitimela KwaZulu-Natal.“IPrasa yethule izitimela ezintsha, ezinhle futhi esizijabulelayo. Okubuhlungu wukuthi kulezi zitimela abantu bakithi abazizamela ukuphila ngokudayisa ezitimeleni abasavumelekile ukwenza lo msebenzi. Siyazi ukuthi isimo sibi eNingizimu Afrika, imisebenzi ayikho ngakho abantu baziphilisa ngokudayisa,” kuchaza uDzanibe.Uthe abadayisi bayaboshwa uma betholwe beqhuba umsebenzi wabo wonogada bakwaPrasa ezitimeleni.Uveze ukuthi nabagibeli abasavumelekile ukudla nokuphuza amanzi ezitimeleni, nabo bayajeziswa uma benza lokhu.“Sibabhalelile kwaPrasa KwaZulu-Natal sacela ukuthi basichazele isizathu sokuvala abadayisi, abazange basiphendule. Abasho nokuthi yimuphi umthetho abawulandelayo njengoba bephuca abantu bakithi isinkwa,” kusho uDzanibe.Yize ethe abantu bayaboshwa kodwa ebuzwa ukuthi bayiswa ejele noma bayahlawuliswa, uthe akekho umdayisi oseke wavalelwa ejele noma wahlawuliswa kodwa baye bavalelwe ezindlini zangasese amahora ambalwa bese bexwayiswa ukuthi bangaphinde badayise.UMnuz Zama Nomnganga, obhekelele ezokuxhumana kwaPrasa KwaZulu-Natal, uthe umthetho awubavumeli abadayisi ezitimeleni ezintsha. Uthembise ukuthi uzothumela impendulo ayeyibhalele iDudula Movement kodwa kuze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela engayithumelanga incwadi.

AKHALA ngokuhlawuliswa izizumbulu ngumlimi omhlophe amadoda aseMbonjane, eMophela emuva kokuthi izinkomo zawo zingene epulazini lakhe.Ngokusho kukaMnuz Mntonjani Robert Luthuli (74) izinkomo zabo bezijwayele ukuyodla epulazini zingaboshwa kodwa kuthe uma selithengwa ngomunye umlimi baqala baba nezinkinga zokuthi ziyaboshwa uma zingena epulazini.“Okusiphethe kabi wukuthi umlimi akabiyile lapho kungena khona izinkomo. Alikho nebhodi elixwayisa ngokuthi akayidingi impahla ukuba ingene kuleya ngxenye yepulazi. Ngosuku ufuna uR50 uma inkomo yakho eyibophile. Mina ngiboshelwe izinkomo ezintathu. Anginayo imali yokuzikhipha njengoba ngiphila ngokuhola impesheni,” kusho uLuthuli.Uthe bayafisa ukuthi kungenele uMnyango wezoLimo ngoba izinkomo zabo phambilini bezidla lapho seziboshwa khona manje.Omunye umnumzane okhiphe izinkomo zakhe ezintathu ngoR2 000, uthe bayafisa ukuthi kungenelele aboMnyango wezoLimo ngoba izinkomo zabo bezidla zikhululeke phambilini kodwa seziyaboshwa njengoba  ipulazi selithengwe wumlimi omusha.Uthe okwamanje bebengakalubiki enkosini lolu daba bebesazizamela bodwana eceleni ukuluxazulula.UMnuz Reggie Ngcobo obhekele ezokuxhumana eMnyangweni wezoLimo nokuThuthukiswa kwezindawo zasemakhaya kuzwelonke, uthe abalimi ababoshelwe izinkomo kufanele babanike igama lepulazi ukuze bathumele uphiko lwabo lwezomthetho ukuba lulungise lolu daba.UMnuz Bruce Mattison ongumnikazi wephawundi eligcina imfuyo esuke iboshiwe, uthe abalimi ababoshelwe imfuyo bangeza ephawundini lakhe bazolanda imfuyo.Uveze ukuthi ngokomthetho i-Animal Identification Act ka-2002 yonke imfuyo kufanele ibe nophawu oluhlukile okuyilona umnikazi wayo abona ngalo ukuthi ngeyakhe.“Imfuyo esuke iboshiwe ilethwa ephawundini lami eliseHowick bese idedelwa uma umnikazi eseyikhombile. Angeza yedwa noma ahambe namaphoyisa emfuyo ukuze athole izinkomo zakhe,” kusho uMattison.Ukugcizelele ukubaluleka kokumakwa kwemfuyo ukuze kusheshe kucace ukuthi ngekabani.Imizamo yokuthola umlimi ukuze aphawule ayiphumelelanga njengoba Isolezwe lingayitholanga inombolo yakhe yocingo.

KUKHALWA ngesihluku okuthiwa sikhonjiswe yisoka ngesikhathi libhokoda owesifazane ebelithandana naye ngommese amahlandla angaphezulu kwayisikhombisa.Siyindaba egudwini kumalungu omphakathi waseNhlanhleni, eMakholweni, e-Underberg isenzo sesoka okuthiwa likhalelwe ngamasongo kaSigonyela njengoba lihlasele uthisha emqashweni, e-Underberg  lamgwaza kubuka wonke umuntu.Uthisha uNksz Moshoeshoe (igama lakhe eingatholakalanga) kuvele ukuthi yena nomsolwa, baneminyaka engu-50.Umthombo obukhona ngesikhathi kwehla isehlo uveze ukuthi bazwakale bexabana ngaphakathi endlini.Kuthiwa bekuzwakaka ukuthi nemimoya iphezulu."Ngemuva kwesikhashana sibone owesifazane esephumela emnyango egijima ebaleka kodwa esegcwele igazi namandla okubaleka engasenawo. Isoka liqhubekile lamjaha lamfica laqhubeka lamgwaza esedindilize phansi,'' kuchaza umthombo.Ngemuva kwalokho owesilisa kuthiwa ugcwale amathafa kodwa ngenhlanhla amaphoyisa ashesha athola umkhondo wakhe wase ekhalelwa ngamasongo kaSigonyela.Uqhuba uthi laba ababili bese kunesikhathi eside bethandana.Kuvela ukuthi isoka belikujwayele ukufika emqashweni lizovakashela  owesifazane.Kuthiwa akuqondakali ukuthi baxatshaniswe yini.Kuvela ukuthi uthisha akusiye owendawo njengoba eqashile nje. Kuthiwa ubefundisa esikoleni eNhlannhleni Combined.Elinye ilungu lomphakathi elizwakalise ukukhathazeka okukhulu ngalesi sehlakalo, lithe bayakweshwama abakubonile."Endaweni yakithi angikhumbuli nje sibona umuntu wesifazane ebulawa ngesihluku esingaka. Hheyi yaze yaba nesihluku nansi indoda. Futhi kusekude kabi ukuthi ngikukhohlwe engikubone namhlanje,'' lisho kanjena.Likhale ngokuthi kwale noma owesifazane esekhala kabuhlungu ememeza ecela uxolo kodwa owesilisa wavuka umbhejazane esho ukumqeda."Kubuhlungu kabi ukuthi angabulawa ngesihluku esingaka umuntu owusizo olungaka emphakathini wethu obefundisa izingane zethu ngokuthembeka nangesineke,'' kuqhuba ilungu lomphakathi.Kuvela ukuthi isoka lingumuntu owaziwa ngokuba yisixhwanguxhwangu.Kuthiwa kunabanye vele abebeshaya amakhala ngokuthandana kwabo bekhala ngokuthi owesifazane unomoya ophansi ekubeni isoka laziwa ngokuthanda ukulwa ngaso sonke isikhathi.Ikhansela laseNhlanhleni kuWard 2, uMnuz Basil Ntshiza, uthe bashaeke kakhulu ngokwenzekile.Uthe kule ndawo akakhumbuli kuba nesehlo salolu hlobo.Ugcizelele ukuthi abafisi ukuthi kuphinde kube nesehlakalo salolu hlobo ngokuzayo.Uthe babonga kakhulu amaphoyisa akulendawo asukume ngokushesha kwabanjwa umsolwa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa abophe owesilisa oneminyaka engu-50 ngecala lokubulala owesifazane naye oneminyaka engu-50."Kubikwa ukuthi owesilisa ugwaze owesifazane amanxeba amaningi washonela khona lapho. Owesilisa uzovela enkantolo kusasa (namhlanje),'' usho kanjena.

KUBATSHAZWA ukwanda kokuphathwa kwezibhamu ezingekho emthethweni eMayville, eThekwini kuhlaselwa onogada okuthiwa bebegade abebezolungisa ugesi endaweni, ngoLwesithathu emini.Lesi sigameko esishaqise abaningi kuthiwa senzeke eNsimbini eMayville, Kuthiwa abantu kule ndawo bebeninkinga yokunqamuka kukagesi okuholele ekutheni kufike abasebenzi benkampani ewulungisayo ekuMasipala weTheku, bephelezelwa ngonogada benkampani Imvula Security.Ikhansela kule ndawo, uMnuz Bhekisisa Mngadi, uthe abazibonele, bathi kuqhamuke imoto emhlophe inabasolwa, bafuna ngodli izibhamu konogada okugcine kuba nokudubulana phakathi kwabo nabasolwa.“Kudubuleke unogada oyedwa waphelela endaweni yesigameko, kwathi abanye balimala baphuthunyiswa esibhedlela. Ngifike kuleya ndawo umufi esemboziwe kanti omunye unogada obelimele ubesemotweni amaphoyisa ethatha isitatimende,” usho kanje.Uqinisekise ukuthi ngowesilisa unogada odlule emhlabeni ngenxa yalesi sigameko.  UMngadi uthe ukuphathwa kwezibhamu ezingekho emthethweni kule ndawo sekuyinsakavukela, okwande kakhulu ukuphathwa kwazo emva kwezibhelu zango-Julayi 2021.“Akusaphephile neze lapha. Nakuba abasolwa bekwazile ukudubula kwashona unogada, kodwa bahlulekile ukuthatha izibhamu okukholakala ukuthi bekuyinto abebeyifuna kakhulu,” kusho yena.Kuthintwa amahhovisi enkampani, Imvula Security ozichaze njengosebenza kwandabazabantu kule nkampani ukuqinisekisele ukuthi bayazi ngalesi sigameko, wathi abagunyaziwe ukwanda ngemininingwane kwabezindaba.Ukuhlaselwa konogada beqaphe ukuvikeleka kwabasebenzi bakaMasipala weTheku abasuke bejutshwe ukwenza umsebenzi womphakathi ezindaweni eziwakhele, akusiyo into entsha njengoba kuthe nyakenye KwaMashu,  iqeqebana labesilisa ababehlome ngezibhamu ladubula labulala onogada ababili ababeqaphe abasebenzi bakamasipala bashonela endaweni yesigameko.Mayelana nesigameko sangoLwesithathu, okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa aseMayville aphenya icala lokubulala nawokuzama ukubulala.

ABASE-CLOVER bamemezele ukuthi bakhiphe i-peanut butter i-Go Nuts emashalofini ngemuva kokuthi kutholakale ikuthi inesikhutha (i-aflatoxins) esingaphezulu kwesivumelekile.IGo Nuts ewu-400G ilandela eminye imikhiqizo yamakinati i-peanut butter ekhiqizwa ePick n Pay, Dischem, Dischem Lifestyle ewu-400g  newu-800g , Eat Naked no-Ice Cream onamakinati waseWoolworths.Ikhomishini ebhekelele abathengi kuleli, iNational Consumer Commission (NCC), ithe abaseClover bakhiphe i-peanut butter iGo Nuts ewu-400g engu-10 776 emashalofini kusukela ngoLwesihlanu."Ingozi yokuthi amakhasimende adle umkhiqizo onezinga eliphezulu kunelivumelekile lesikhutha i-aflatoxins ukuthi angaba nezinkinga zezempilo ezihlanganisa ukucanuzelelwa kwenhliziyo, ukuphalaza, ubuhlungu beqolo. “Amakhasimende athenge le mikhiqizo esikhishiwe emashalofini asezitolo ayacelwa ukuthi angabe esayidla le mikhiqizo. Akayiphindisele ezitolo ayithenge kuzo ukuze athole imali yawo noma ngabe awesenazo iziliphu eziwubufakazi bokuyithenga," kusho isitatimende seNCC.

ABHOKA ayakhahlela amaqembu aphikisayo ePhalamende ngekhefu elithathwe wuSomlomo wePhalamende onukelwa yijele ngezinsolo zokukhwabanisa nokushushumbisa imali.Iyaqonga ingcindezi yokuthi uNkk Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula ehle esikhundleni njengoba i-DA isiphakamise ukuthi akashiye emuva kokuba kugasele uphiko lwezokushushisa emzini wakhe oseBruma eGoli, luqoqa ubufakazi ngezinsolo abhekene nazo.Ngemuva kokuhlaselwa ngabaphenyi, kube sekuvela amahlebezi okuthi isilungisiwe nencwadi egunyaza ukuboshwa kwakhe. NgoLwesine ntambama, kuvele umbiko wokuthi uhoxile ohambweni lwethimba lasephalamende elibheke eGeneva eSwitzerland. Kubikwa ukuthi incwadi yokuthatha ikhefu lezinsukwana emsebenzini ukuze akwazi ukubhekana nodaba lwamacala anukwa ngawo.Kuse ngoLwesihlanu kunamahlebezi wokuthi uzinikele emaphoyiseni asePitoli, lokhu kulandela ukubonakala kwezimoto ezimhlophe zimi esangweni lakwakhe ekuseni okuthiwa bezizomlanda.Kuthe kusabhekwe lokho, kulindelwe nokuthi avele phambi kwenkantolo yeMantshi ePitoli, wadedela abammeli bakhe abaphuthume enkantolo enkulu yakuleli bayofuna isivimbelo sokuboshwa.Ngokwamaphepha afakwe enkantolo, uMapisa-Nqakula ufake isicelo esiphuthumayo esibheke kwabahlanu ababaluliwe okubalwa ungqongqoshe wamaphoyisa, umphathi wezokushushisa nabanye. Le ncwadi iveza nokuthi uMapisa-Nqakula ufuna nokubona idokodo lamacala abekwa wona.Kuqhubeka lokhu-nje iDA ithi iphini likasomlomo wephalamende lisamukele isicelo sabo sevoti lokungabethembi ubuholi bukasomlomo. USiviwe Gwarube uthe: “Akukho lokhu okwenziwe wusomlomo ngokuthatha ikhefu. Ngokomthetho wephalamende umuntu uthatha ikhefu ngokuvunyelwa yindlu yonke ngevoti.”UGwarube uthe usomlomo bekumele asule esikhundleni ngoba isikhundla sakhe asifanelwe wukuphathwa wumuntu ongazithola esehlazweni elifana naleli.Uthi banethemba lokuthi isicelo sabo sevoti lokungabethembi ubuholi bakhe, sizophumelela.

IVEZA ukuthi kusazovela amanye amanyundululu ngesikhulu sikaMasipala weTheku esiyinhloko yoMnyango wezamaPaki, ezokuNgcebeleka namaSiko imithombo engaphakathi kulandela ukunikwa kwaso incwadi okuhloswe ngayo ukusimisa emsebenzini.NgoLwesine, kuphutshuke incwadi eyimfihlo, ebiveza ukuthi ngoMeyi 22, uDkt Simphiwe Ndlovu, unikwe incwadi ebimyalela ukuthi angeqi amahora angu-48 engakachazi ukuthi kungani kufanele engamiswa emsebenzini.Le ncwadi  ithi uNdlovu kufanele aqinisekise ukuthi uyayiletha impendulo ngoMsombuluko.Kuyo kuvela ukuthi wagunyaza ukukhokhelwa kukatshwala ngemali eshisiwe emcimbini iMother Of All Festivals eyayiseDurban ICC ngoDisemba 15, nyakenye.Imithombo ithi kulo mcimbi uNdlovu wagunyaza ukukhokhelwa kotshwala bemali eyevile ku-R80 000.“Yathi uma ihanjiswa kumgcinimafa i-invoice eyayifaka phakathi nenkokhelo yotshwala, waphawula ekhasini elalikhombisa inkokhelo yotshwala, wase eyibuyisela emumva ukuba ilungiswe,” kusho umthombo.Uqhuba umthombo, uthe esikhundleni sokuthi ilungiswe, kwahleshulwa lelo khasi elalingokuthengwa kotshwala, yabuyiselwa kumgcinimafa i-invoice isanesamba esifaka phakathi imali okuthengwe ngayo utshwala, kwagcina iphasiswa.Umthombo uthe ngaphandle kwalezi zinsolo, kusazovela ukuthi lesi sikhulu sibhubhudla imali kamasipala ngendlela engafanele.Sisolwa ngokuthi sinokugunyaza ukukhishwa kwemali ngamaprojekthi athile, agcina engenziwanga.“Phakathi kwawo kukhona eka-R1.8 million okwakufanele kulungiswe izindawo zomphakathi zokubuka ibhola lombhoxo nyakenye, KwaMashu. Le mali yaphuma kodwa azizange zilungiswe izindawo kuleli lokishi,” kusho umthombo.Uveze ukuthi kukhona nengu-R25 million eyagunyazelwa ukukwakhiwa kwezinkundla zemidlalo emawadini angu-25, eThekwini, kodwa okungakaze kwenzeke.“Ezinye izinsolo ezokuthi ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka uthenge izimoto ezintathu; ama-Toyota Hilux, wanikela ngazo esifundeni saseThekwini se-ANC,” kusho umthombo.Omunye umthombo, nawo olwazi ukusuka nokuhlala olukaNdlovu, uthe okubakhathaza ngaye ukuthi ugabe ngokuba ngumngani omkhulu wemenenja yeTheku, uDkt Musa Mbhele.“Lokho kumenza azenzele umathanda emnyangweni awuqhoqhobele ngokwazi ukuthi uGumede ngeke amthathele zinyathelo,” kusho umthombo.Uqhube wathi unerekhodi lokwenza kabi ezindaweni ake aphatha izikhundla kuzo, wathi ebhange iThala naseMnyangweni wezaseKhaya, washiya igama elibi ngezenzo zenkohlakalo.Okhulumela umasipala weTheku, uNkk Gugu Sisilana, uthe umasipala awuzixoxi nabantu bangaphandle izinto zangaphakathi ezithinta abasebenzi.

I-IFP iyona ehlomule kakhulu ezinkethweni zokuchibiyela ebezithe chithi saka KwaZulu-Natal.Le nhlangano inqobe kumawadi ayisikhombisa abenezinketho zokuchibiyela ngoLwesithathu.I-IFP inqobe amawadi amathathu ebikade ingawaphethe eMzumbe, wonke la mawadi abekade ephethwe i-ANC ngaphambi kokhetho lokuchibiyela.I-IFP iphinde yanqoba iwadi ebikade iphethwe i-ANC kuMasipala waseMthonjaneni, yase ithatha nelikade liphethwe i-ABC kuMasipala waseMvoti.Kwenzeka lokhu nje, i-IFP isanda kuthola isikhundla sikandunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, yaphinde yathola nabaphathiswa abane kwikhabhinethi lesifundazwe.IPhini likaSihlalo we-IFP KwaZulu-Natal, iNkosi Ntandoyenkosi Shabalala, lithe imiphumela ikhombisa ukuthi abantu bakulesi sifundazwe bayahambisana nesinqumo se-IFP sokujoyina uhulumeni wobumbano.Amanye amaqembu ahlomulile okhethweni lokuchibiyela yiDA neMK.I-DA iwine iwadi ebeliphethwe yi-ANC eNewcastle, iMK nayo yawina iwadi ebeliphethwe i-ANC eMzumbe.I-ANC ikwaze ukugcina amawadi amathathu okhethweni lwangoLwesithathu.

KULINDELEKE ukuthi kuphume nesinedolo namahlanje emkhulekweni woMkhonto Wesizwe Party (MKP) ozoba setendeni elikhulukazi e-24 Kolling Street, eThekwini namahlanje.Kulo mkhuleko okuzobe kuhlangene abamabandla ehlukene kuzotheleka nomengameli weMKP, uMnuz Jacob Zuma.Umgqugquzeli wawo uPastor Muntuza Majola oyilungu leMKP lokuqina, uthe kulo mkhuleko bazobe bezokhulekela ukhetho olunokuthula nomengameli weMKP.“Sihlanganise wonke amabandla ezenkolo ukuzokhuleka kanyekanye. Ngaphandle kwawo kukhona nabelaphi benadabuko abehlukene, amakhosi ehlukene noNdlunkulu abaqinisekisile ukuthi bayeza namhlanje. Inhloso yomkhuleko ukuthi kube nokhetho olunokuthula. Ngokukhethekile sizokhulekela uMengameli Jacob Zuma nomndeni wakhe. Siphinde sikhulekele ngokukhethekile isifundazwe iKwaZulu-Natal, iGauteng ne-Capetown okuyizifundazwe ezinkulu bese sibhangqa nezinye,” kusho uPastor Majola.Uthe kuvumeleke wonke umuntu ukuthi abe yingxenye yalo mkhuleko futhi kuzobe kungenwa mahhala. Umkhuleko uzoqala manje ekuseni kuze kushone ilanga.Abazobe bephethe uhlelo kuwona uS’boniso Ngubane noPastor Thomas Hadebe. Izikhulumi kukhona uMbhishobhi BM Buthelezi, Pastor LG Shangase, uSolwazi onguMbhishobhi omkhulu uV Gama, uMfu PS Mathe, uMbhishobhi LD Nkgadima, uRAS Nkanyiso Dlamini, uMfu Mpungose, uMfu T Mathe, uMbhishobhi S Sibisi, uMzimbokhalimali Dlamini, uDkt MN Lukele, Dkt Tamarah Shange, uMphostoli ST Mkhize, uPastor ST Mkhize, uPastor LF Nzimande, uPastor Ka-Mthobisi Mchunu, uMdikoni Fikile Khuzwayo, Acharya Shyam Ramanuj, uVisvan Ready noPearl Gasa ongumholi wophiko lwabesifazane lweMKP. Kwabazonandisa.Kubaculi kuzonandisa iThe Unity Apostolic Church in Christ, Mlindeli Nkomo, Sbuh Mkhwanazi, Phumloo Mahlaba, Abanqobi nabanye.UMengameli Jacob Zuma uzoba yisikhulumi sosuku kulo mkhuleko.

UKUBULAWA kwabahwebi bakatshwala osekuphenduke insakavukela muva nje ezingxenyeni ezahlukene zeKwaZulu Natal, sekusukumise iSisonke Liqour Tradors yanxusa uNkulunkulu ukuba angenelele.NgoLwesine bekunendumezulu yomkhuleko obukade uqhubeka eCinema, eMlaza.Inkonzo beyizinyaziswe ngabefundisi bamahlelo ehlukene abephume ngobuningi.Muva nje, zibonakale zanda kakhulu izigameko zokubulawa kwabahwebi bakatshwala.Iningi labo libulawa ngokudutshulwa okuyinto le nhlangano ethi iyihlalisa lubhojozi.UMfu Thulani Sibiya webandla lamaLuthela, uthe nguNkulunkulu kuphela ongangenelela manje kulesi simo sokuqothwa kwabahwebi bakatshwala.UMfu Sithembiso Zondo uthe akukho okudlula uNkulunkulu.Uthe kufanele bazifundise nokufukulana uma kukhona isidingo sokuba benze kanjalo.“Namhlanje silapha sizonxusa uNkulunlulu esimkhonzayo ukuthi kube nguyena ongenelelayo manje. UNkulunkulu okuhle ngaye ukuthi akukho okumehlulayo,’’ usho kanje.Usihlalo wale nhlangano, uMnuz Brush Mncandi, uqale ngokuveza ukuthi naye komunye unyaka bake bamdubula.Uphosele inselelo ozakwabo ukuthi bazifundise izingane zabo ngokuthi liphathwa kanjani ibhizinisi likatshwala.Lokhu uthe kuyolekelela kakhulu uma kwenzeka noma yini kumnikazi webhizinisi.Unxuse ukuthi kube khona ukusebenzisana kubona bonke abahwebi bakatshwala. Wabanxusa nokuthi benze isiqiniseko sokuthi bayawuhlonipha umsebenzi wabo.Umlingisi woZalo, uZama Ngcobo odlala indawo kaMadongwe kulo mdlalo, uthe kuyadabukisa ukuthi kukhona abantu abahlalisa lubhojozi abahwebi bakatshwala.“Kukhona imindeni ephilayo ngalo msebenzi,’’ usho kanje ngamafuphi. Umculi kamskandi, uBahubhe, uSgwili noJumbo, bakhonze ngomculo.

NGEKE uzilethele amabhadi uma ubhala incwadi yamafa. Lokhu kushiwo nguMnuz Stephen Mofokeng weLegal Aid South Africa obegqugquzela abantu ukuthi babhale izincwadi zamafa mahhala kuleli sonto.ILaw Society of South Africa yeza nohlelo lokuthi abantu babhale izincwadi zamafa mahhala kanye ngonyaka kusukela ngoSepthemba 16 kuya kuSepthemba 20.UMofokeng uthe kunabantu abacabanga ukuthi ukubhala incwadi yefa kuhambisana namabhadi noma mhlawumbe kuzokwenza basheshe bashone.“Ukubhala incwadi yefa ngeke kukulethele amabhadi, kuzoqinisekisa ukuthi impahla yakho ishiyelwa labo obathandayo ngendlela obufisa ngayo. Iyabavikela futhi ibalulekile kulesi sikhathi esiphila kuso.”Uthe uma usunayo incwadi yefa ungathatha leli thuba ukuyibukisisa kabusha wenze isiqiniseko sokuthi zonke izinto zisahamba ngohlelo.Ugqugquzele abantu ukuthi uma bebhala incwadi yefa basebenzise amagama aqondile angeke adide abantu uma sekwabiwa ifa.Ubalule ukuthi incwadi yefa ivimba imibango nezinye izinkinga ezenzekayo uma oshonile ebengayibhalanga.Abafisa ukubhalelwa izincwadi zamafa kufanele baye kubameli abayingxenye yohlelo lokwenza izincwadi zamafa mahhala bephethe omazisi, babhale impahla abanayo, babe namagama nezinamba zomazisi balabo abafuna ukubashiyela ifa.UMofokeng uthe kubalulekile ukukhetha umabi wamafa othembekile, ohlelekile futhi ozokwazi ukumelana nalo msebenzi.Uthe kubalulekile nokuchaza kahle abashiyelwa ifa ukuthi bangobani amagama, izinamba zabo zomazisi, ukuthi bahlobene kanjani nomnikazi wefa ukuze ugweme amaphutha uma sekwabiwa ifa.Imininingwane yabameli abazobe besiza ngokubhala incwadi yamafa mahhala kuleli sonto itholakala ngokuvakashela u: LSSA National Wills Week – LSSA

Amadlelandawonye kaKhongolose afanise abantu baKwaZulu-Natal njengentibane ngokukhohlwa kalula imisebenzi kahulumeni oholwa i-ANC abenzele yona njengoba kubhekwe okhethweni.Lokhu kuvele ngesikhathi kunesikhumbuzo somholi weSACP uMnuz Chris Hani ebesiseZicole, eNquthu muva nje.Umholi weSACP esiFundeni Inkosi Bhambatha uMnuz Lucky Moloi uthe abantu bakhohlwa uKhongolose ngoba babemdinelwe baze bayovotela Inkatha ngo-2021."Abantu basidinelwa lapha eNquthu babuyela eGibhithe futhi angazi nokuthi ibizwa ngani lento ababuyela kuyo ngoba neGibhithe lingcono," kusho uMoloi.Ngakolunye uhlangothi, umholi weSanco uMnuz Joe Sikhakhane  uthe okubi ukuthi  i-ANC kusadingeka ichazele ngisho abantu abahlala ezindlini zomxhaso ukuthi yini eyenziwe uhulumeni."Empeleni i-ANC akufanele ngabe iyakhankasa ikakhulukazi kubantu abahlala ezindlini zomxhaso. Nokho okubuhlungu ubafica bethi lo hulumeni akabenzeli lutho kodwa basho nje bahleli endlini abangazi nokuthi malini usimende wokuyakha, nesitina. Iqiniso nje ukuthi abantu bakhohlwa kalula njengesilwane okuthiwa intibane.  Ubezwa sebethi bayovotela Inkatha kodwa awazi kanjani njengoba yehluleka kudala," kusho uSikhakhane.Umholi wentsha yamaKhomanisi KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sandile Dayi, uthe abantu kumele bazi ukuthi uma iDA neMK Party ne-ActionSA bethatha izwe bayovala imali yezibonelelo zezingane nezimpesheni kanye nekaNSFAS.Uqhube wathi la maqembu ahamba indlela eyodwa kodwa baphelezela abantu abehlukene.

UMASIPALA i-Alfred Duma eMnambithi, izolo uqale umkhankaso wokugqugquzela abafundi abasezindaweni ezisemkhaya ukuthi bathande umkhakha wezesayensi ngokwethula iNational Science week, emcimbini obuseDriefontein kuWard 19.IMeya kaMasipala uMnuz Zama Sibisi, ithe ukushoda kolwazi nezobuchwepheshe balezi zifundo ezikoleni ezisemakhaya, kwenza abantu abasha basezindaweni ezisemakhaya basalele emuva kulo mkhakha oyikusasa emhlabeni wonke. USibisi uthi njengomasipala bafuna ukuklama indima ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi babuyisa uthando lwesayensi kubafundi basemakhaya."Inkinga enkulu esibhekene nayo ezindaweni ezisemakhaya ukuthi sincane kakhulu isibalo sabantu abasha abenza izifundo zesayensi. Sifuna ukuthi kushintshe manje lokho kuvuleke ikhasi elisha,'' usho kanje uSibisi.Uthe okudala ukuthi akuqaphele ukuthi bayidlanzana abafundi abenza lezi zifundo, ukuthi phambilini uke wawusebenzela uMnyango wezeMfundo.Uthe umasipala ufuna ukusebenza kanzima ngenhloso yokuguqula lesi simo. Uthe ukholwa ukuthi nakanjani lokhu kuzokwenzeka.Uzibophezele ekutheni abafundi bezikole ezahlukene zaseMnambithi, abayophuma phambili kwisayensi bayogixatshezwa ngemifundaze nendathane yeminye imiklomelo.UMasipala kuleli sonto lesayensi, uzohambela izikole zakule ndawo uhambisana nabezikhungo zemfundo ephakeme, okubalwa iDurban University of Technology nezinye, befundisa kabanzi ngalezi zifundo. Bekhuluma ngemikhakha yesayensi ehlukene abantu abangangena kuyona."Sihlose ukuthi sakhe abantu abasha abakubeka phambili ukufunda. Sifuna kodwa ukuthi kube ngabantu abasha abangesabi ukwenza izifundo zeScience,'' usho kanje.Uveze ukuthi bawu-200 abafundi bakule ndawo abahlomule ngemali yokubhalisela ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme.Ngonyaka ozayo ufisa ukuthi isibalo sinyuke sifinyelele kwabangu-300. Lokhu uthe bazohlezi bekwenza ngoba bayibeke eqhulwini imfundo kulo mkhandlu.UDkt Myalo Sabela obevela eDurban University of Technology (DUT) ukushayele elikhulu ihlombe ukutshalwa kothando lwesayensi kubafundi.Uthe akangabazi nakancane ukuthi lokhu okuhlwanyelwa umasipala waseMnambithi, kuzohluma ngokuhamba kwesikhathi."Ngeke nizisole ngokukhuthaza abafundi ukuba benze izifundo zesayensi,'' usho kanje uDkt Sabela.Umfundi u-Andile Hadebe wesikole sakule ndawo Ingula High ubonge umasipala ngokukhuthaza abafundi basemakhaya ngezifundo zesayensi.

NKOSIKHONA CELEUMELAPHI wendabuko wakwaMhlabuyalingana, ukhuthaza abesifazane ukuba bakukhuthalele ukuzihlanza ngemuva kwezinto ezifana nokuphuphunyelwa yisisu noma ukukhipha isisu uqobo.UMnuz Mvelase wasePhelandaba, kwaMhlabuyalingana odume ngelikaShumi Lamakati, uthi baningi abesifazane ababhinjelwa yizinto ngenxa yokuhamba nesinyama esihambisana nokungazihlanzi.UMvelase uthi njengoba kuyinyanga yabesifazane ukhethe ukuqhakambisa lezi zihloko ezinkulumweni zakhe azenza emisakazweni yomphakathi nakweminye imithombo efuze amakhasi akhe ezokuxhumana.“Noma ungaphuzuzela kanjani kodwa uma uke wakhipha isisu noma waphuphunyelwa, awukwazi ukushiya kulenga nje, kumele kube khona okwenzayo ukuze uzihlanze,” egcizelela uMvelase.Lo melaphi osezakhele udumo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana uthi kunezinto okuthi uma abesifazane bezizibile zigcine seziphenduka ithunzi elimnyama kubona.Uthe abanye abantu besifazane baba namahloni ukuhambela abelaphi bendabuko, kanti akumele kube njalo."Ayikho into umuntu wesifazane okumele azenyeze ngayo uma esukumela izinkinga zakhe. Wonke umuntu ophilayo ngaphansi komthunzi welanga kumele azisukumele izinkinga zakhe,'' usho kanje.Uveze ukuthi bayadinga nokuhlanjululwa nalabo besifazane abashonelwa ngabayeni babo. Kodwa uthe lokho kumele kube umsebenzi owenziwa ngumelaphi owuqonda kahle umsebenzi wakhe.Uveze nokuthi bakhona nabanye besifazane abangayitholi imisebenzi ngenxa yezinkinga zesinyama nemisamo yabo. Uthe akumele imbokodo yazi ukuthi ukuya kubalaphi akuchazi ukuthi kukhona okubi abasuke sebekwenza kodwa ukusukumela impilo engcono futhi engenazo izihibe.Uthe abesifazane abazithola benezinkinga ezahlukene uyabakhuthaza ukuthi bangasondela kuyena abaxazululele.UMvelase ujwayele ukuzwakala emsakazweni Igagai FM, ekhuluma ngezinto ezahlukene ezithinta indlela yokwelapha ngesintu nendlela yokusebenzisa amakhambi esintu ngendlela efanele.

Kukhuthazwe amadoda ukuba aphumele obala uma kukhona izinselelo abhekene nazo empilweni ukuze ezogwema ukuzibulala noma ukubulala labo abasondelene nawo.Lona bekungumongo wezinkulumo ezahlukene ebezithulwa ngemuva kwemashi yabesilisa abasemkhakheni wamaphoyisa. Imashi yangoMsombuluko ibisuka epaki iKing Dinuzulu yaphelela eCity Hall, eThekwini.Ibihlelwe yinhlangano ebunjwe ngamadoda, Isukuma Sakhe Ndoda eholwa nguMbhishobhi Bhekimpi Mchunu.UMchunu uthe kule nhlangano bayakholelwa kakhulu ekutheni amadoda kumele azijwayeze ukubhoboka njalo uma kukhona izinkinga abhekene nazo.UBrigadier Eric Thwala onguSihlalo wamadoda angamaphoyisa KwaZulu Natal akwaSAPS uveze ukuthi amadoda amaningi azithola enengcindezi emsebenzini nasemakhaya."Siyanikhuthaza bantu besilisa ukuthi ningesabi ukukhuluma nanoma yikuphi enibhekana nakho,'' usho kanjena.Uthe amadoda kwesinye isikhathi azithola enengcindezi ngenxa yezezimali nokubhimba kwezinto ebudlelwaneni abakubona."Siyanikhuthaza ukuthi nikhulume isikhathi sisakhona ukugwema izinto ezingalungile,'' echaza.Wenze isibonelo ngesigameko esibe wundabamlonyeni lapho iphoyisa loMkhandlu weTheku, uConstable Sizwe Ngema (27) lisolwa ngokubulala ngesihluku intombi yalo, uNksz Bianca  Khuzwayo (23), maqede laqopha i-video layifaka ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.UNdunankulu wesiFundazwe saKwaZulu Natal, uMnuz Thami Ntuli uwadonse ngendlebe amadoda wathi angalenzi iphutha lokukhohlwa ukondla imindeni yawo.Uthe indoda eqotho ibonakala ngokunakekela umndeni futhi iwuvikele uma kunesidingo sokuba yenze kanjalo.Uzwakalise ukungenami kwakhe ngokuba seqhulwini kwendawo yaseNanda uma kukhulunywa ngezibalo zokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane.Uthe kukhona okumele kwenziwe ngalesi sihlava njengoba kuvela ukuthi angu-641 amacala okuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane avulwe esiteshini samaphoyisa saseNanda kusuka ku-Ephreli 2023 kuya ku-Ephreli 2024.IPhini leMeya leTheku, uNksz Zandile Myeni uphosele amadoda inselelo yokuthi abhodle ngazo zonke izinkinga anazo.Uthe lokho kungaholela ekutheni kube khona izinto ezingagwemeka.
