UMNYANGO wezeMpilo kuleli uxwayisa umphakathi ngokusabalala kweqoqo lamagciwane omkhuhlane ahlasela umgudu wokuphefumula iRespiratory Syncytial Virus (RSV), asabalele ezweni lonke njengoba kuyisikhathi somkhuhlane.Umnyango uthe iRSV phakathi kwezinye zezimpawu zayo ohaqekile wehlelwa i-oxygen ehamba egazini lakhe okuholela ekutheni izicubu zakhe zingayitholi ngokwanele, bese ecobeka ekhathala.Kwesinye isikhathi kusuke kuhambisana nokuvaleka kwamakhala, ukucinana kwesifuba, ukuthimula, ukukhwehlela noma ubuhlungu bomphimbo.UMnuz Foster Mohale, uthe uNgqongqoshe walo Mnyango uDkt Joe Phaahla ukukhuthaza abantu bagomele umkhuhlane ukuze bawugweme.Uthe lo mkhuhlane ube nzima kubona ikakhulukazi abantu abadala, izingane nabanezifo ezingamahlalakhona ezithinta amaphaphu.“Isikhungo esibhekele izifo ezithathelanayo iNational Institute for Communicable Diseases (NICD), sinohlelo lokuqapha ukusabalala kwamagciwane okuphefumula ezweni lonke.“Yazise umnyango ukuthi manje sekuyisikhathi se-RSV engadidaniswa ne-Covid-19 noma i-SARS-CoV- 2 ngenxa yezimpawu ezivamile. “Igciwane le-RSV lidala ukugula ikakhulukazi ezinganeni ezincane nezinkinga zokuphefumula kubantu abadala. Isizini yomkhuhlane ngokuvamile ilandela i-RSV  njengoba sesiqala ukubona ukwanda kwezifo.“Yize izifo eziningi ezibangelwa umkhuhlane - amagciwane e-RSV  ne-SARS-CoV-2 ngokuvamile adala ukugula okunqobekayo. “Kuyenzeka lamagciwane adale ukugula okuholela ekutheni umuntu afe ikakhulukazi labo abasengcupheni,"  kusho uMohale.Iphini likaNgqongqoshe walo Mnyango uDkt Sibongiseni Dhlomo, uthe amagciwane abizwa ngeRSV ahlasela abantu njalo ngesikhathi esithile sonyaka.Uthe njengamanje amagciwane eRSV asabalele kakhulu. Kulula ukuthi aphambaniseke neCovid-19 ngoba izimpawu zakhona ziyefana. “ICovid-19 nayo isekhona. Njengezwe asizange sikwazi ukugoma abantu abangu-90% ukuze kuvikelwe ukusabalala kwayo. Abagoma abanye abazange besajova ngemijovo yokwengeza amandla.“Abantu abadala, abanezifo ezithinta amaphaphu nabake bahlinzwa ubende, abangayidli ngendlela imithi yabo yokuthithibalisa iHIV banamathuba amaningi okuhaqeka  noma begomile," kusho uDhlomo.Indlela yokugwema ukusabalala komkhuhlane ukuvala umlomo uma ukhwehlela noma uthimula.Ukuhlala ekhaya uma ugula, ungayi kwabanye abantu ngoba ungabathelela.Gwema ukusebenzisa izitsha ebezisetshenziswa yilowo onomkhuhlane zingageziwe nokuqabulana.

IHLOSE ukukhuthaza abantu abasha ukuba basebenzise amakhono abo ngenhloso yokuziphilisa inkampani egxile kwezokuthutha, iMawande Tours.Lokhu kuvezwe ngumsunguli wayo, uMnuz Mawande Bekwa, njengoba bezosebenzisa inyanga yabantu abasha ukubakhuthaza ukuthi basebenzise amakhono abo, ikakhulukazi omculo nezemidlalo.Uthe uyakholelwa kakhulu ekutheni abantu abasha kumele babhukule benze konke okusemandleni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi baphila impilo ekahle.Uveze ukuthi yingakho behlele umncintiswano abawubiza ngokuthi yiMagabheni Street Games. Uthe le midlalo izodonsa izinsuku ezimbili, umhlaka 15 no-16 kuJuni. Uthe amaqembu amathathu azonqoba azoklonyeliswa ngesamba esithile semali.Uthe ngale midlalo bazobe bekhumbula uSibusiso Mseleku owayewuqweqwe lwentatheli yezemidlalo."Sihlose ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu abasha ababi wuvanzi. Futhi sifuna ukubakhuthaza ukuthi bangaziphilisa besebenzisa amakhono abo,'' usho kanje.Uthe minyaka yonke bajwayele ukuthi kube khona abakwenzela abantu abasha njalo uma kuyinyanga yabo.Uveze ukuthi kule midlalo kuzobonakala oDJ abehlukene. Nalapho uthe bayethemba ukuthi kuzohlwanyeleka imbewu yokungena emculweni kubantu abasha bakule ndawo."Sifuna ukukhuthaza abantu abasha ukuthi bangagcini nje kuphela ngokufuna amathuba omsebenzi kodwa bazi ukuthi bangaziphilisa ngethalente abanalo,'' usho kanje.Le nkampani izophinde ihambele izikole ezehlukene inikele ngomfaniswano wesikole iphinde ikhuthaze abafundi.Phakathi kwezikole ezizohanjelwa yiSidelile High School yaseMgabeni, iMagabheni Primary noPhapheni Primary. Bazobe behamba noScelo Mncube wezinkulumo ezakhayo.

UMPHATHISWA woMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi uNksz Mbali Shinga, uthe bazosungula izigcawu zezingxoxo ngezinkinga zomphakathi waseChibini, eHlokozi.Usho kanje ngoMsombuluko emva kokuhambela umndeni wakwaKhambule lapho okwadutshulwa kwabulawa kuwo amalungu ayisikhombisa ngoLwesithathu olwedlule.Kulesi sigameko kwashona umama wekhaya uBahlakaniphile Khambule (64), indodakazi yakhe uPhilile Khambule (39), umalokazana uNompilo Khambule (34), isihlobo uSkhumbuzo Khambule nabazukulu oLisa Khambule (9), Siphosethu Khambule (9) noZemvelo Khambule (5).Kuthiwa wahlaselwa sekuhwalele, ngesikhathi ubuka ithelevishini.Kuthiwa kwagasele abantu abangaziwa, bavulela ngenhlamvu kulo mndeni okuthiwa wawuhleli egumbini lokuphumula.Ngesikhathi ehambele khona uNksz Shinga, uthe emva kwalesi sigameko, bazophusha ukuthi kube nezigcawu emphakathini lapho kuzodingidwa khona izinkinga zokungaboni ngasolinye.“Izakhamuzi kufanele zikwazi ukuhlala phansi zixoxe ngezinkinga zazo ngoba ukubulala akusona isisombululo,” kusho uNksz Shinga, othe kuba kubi kakhulu uma kubulawa abesifazane nezingane, abangakwazi ukuzilwela.“Uma behluleka ukuxazulula izinkinga zabo, bangabika ngisho nasebuholini bomphakathi ukuze bungenelele,” kusho uNksz Shinga.Uthe umndeni wakwaKhambule usazoqhubeka nokunikwa usizo lokwelulekwa ngokwengqondo emva kokwehlelwa yisigameko.“Siyabanxusa ukuthi balusebenzise usizo losonhlalakahle esibalungisele lona ngoba isehlakalo esibehlele sinzima,” kusho uNksz Shinga.Uthe nangomngcwabo kanjalo nangemumva kwawo, lolu sizo luzoqhubeka kuze kuba ukuthi kuyacaca ukuthi sebengcono.Ngesikhathi Isolezwe lihambele endaweni yesigameko ngeledlule, umndeni waveza ukuthi kwenzeka isigameko nje, bekulokhu kufika abantu abangaziwa behlomile, befuna ngoshova esinye isihlobo esiboshiwe.Kuthiwa lokhu kwaze kwaholela ekutheni umama wekhaya athi unkosikazi kalona wesilisa akeze azoquba ekhaya elikhulu nezingane, kanti abasolwa bazofika bazoqotha imbokodo nesisekelo kwababesegcekeni ngosuku lwesigameko.

UKUNCELISA ingane ibele uma ungumama osemncane akukwenzi ungabi sezintweni.Lokhu kushiwo uMphathiswa wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, uNksz Nomagugu Simelane ngesikhathi ekhuthaza omama abasebancane ukuthi bancelise izingane zabo ibele. Lona ngumyalelo ohambisana nesonto lokugqugquzela omama ukuthi bancelise izingane ibele emhlabeni, iWorld Breastfeeding Week, eqale ngoLwesine ngeledlule ephela ngoLwesithathu."Nginxusa omama abancane ukuba bangaphuci izingane zabo inzuzo enkulu yobisi lwebele ngenxa yokwesaba ukuthi bangase babonakale  sengathi abekho ezintweni noma badla ngoludala," kusho uMphathiswa.Uqhube wathi izingane ezincela ibele kuphela izinyangeni eziyisithupha zokuqala (ngaphandle kokunikezwa amanzi, ubisi oluyimpuphu, olunye ubisi noma ukudla) zithola inzuzo eningi yezempilo ngoba ziba namasosha omzimba aqinile, zinamathuba amancane okuthi zihlaselwe izifo okubalwa kuzo isifo sokungaphefumuli kahle, ukutheleleka ngesifo sofuba / i-pneumonia, isifo sohudo, isifuba somoya, ukukhuluphala ngokweqile, noma isifo sikashukela  utype1.“Ubisi lwebele luqukethe yonke imisoco edingwa ngumntwana. Uma izingane zincela ibele kuphela amasosha azo omzimba ayaqina aphebeze izifo uma ziqhathaniswa nezingane ezincela ibhodlela noma olunye ubisi,"  kusho uMphathiswa.Uphinde wanxusa omama abancelisa ibele, abanobisi oluningi ukuthi  banikele ngalo ukuze basize izingane ezisengozini ezizalwe ngaphambi kwesikhathi nezigulayo kanye nomama abangakwazi ukuhlinzeka ngobisi olwanele lwezingane zabo ezilaliswe esibhedlela.“Izibhedlela zethu eziningi zine-Human Milk Bank, ehlola, iqoqe, icubungule bese isabalalisa ubisi lwebele. Sicela abancelisayo ukuthi bakucabange ukunikela ngobisi lwebele,  ukuze basize izingane ezingalutholi ubisi konina. Ngale ndlela bangasiza abampofu, futhi babanikeze isipho esiyigugu sempilo enhle, isipho sokuphila.” kusho uMphathiswa Omama abangakwazi ukunikela ngobisi lwabo kwiMilk Bank, abangabhemi, abangaphuzi, abangasebenzisi izidakamizwa, abaphila kahle, abazimisele ukuhlolelwa iHIV, isifo sofuba, iHepatitis B, ugcusula nezinye izifo. Izibhedlela ezinama-Milk Bank iPrince Mshiyeni Memorial,  Addington, Grey’s,  Victoria Mxenge (King Edward VIII), RK Khan,  Ladysmith,  Newcastle, Inkosi Albert Luthuli Central, Harry Gwala Regional, Port Shepstone,  Queen Nandi Memorial,  Murchison, General Justice Gizenga Memorial,  Mahatma Gandhi Memorial neChrist the King. Ezibhedlela iDr Pixley ka-Isaka Seme Memorial, Charles Johnson Memorial,  Manguzi,  Showe, neVryheid asakhiwa.

NKOSIKHONA CELEOMUNYE wabefundisi asebenokhakhayi oluqinile, odume nangezintshumayelo ezinohlonze nasemisakazweni, uthi akuphele ukucwasana kwamabandla ikakhulukazi phakathi kwamabandla abasindisiwe naweZayoni. UMfu MS  Mpungose weBandla iHis Own Bible Church International, wodumo lwezintshumayelo ezisuke zibeka into njengoba injalo futhi onganqeni ukuqinisa ulimi, uthi sesifikile isikhathi sokusebenzisana  nokuhambelana phakathi kwabasindisiwe nabaseZayoni ukuze kuphele lobu butha okungazeki nokuthi bakheka kanjani.Ugcizelela ukuthi munye uNkulunkulu okhonzwayo kuwona wonke amabandla.Lokhu ukusho njengoba ezoba yingxenye yendumezulu yenkonzo yebandla laseZayoni Isibusiso Ibandla leNkosi Baptist Church in Zion of Southern Africa, eliholwa nguMbhishobhi Phumlani Dlamini.Le nkonzo izokuba ngoMeyi 25, ehholo lomphakathi iMarromen, eNewcatsle. Uveze ukuthi phambilini uke wakhonza ebandleni laseZayoni futhi konke wayekubona kukuhle nje."Makuphele ukubakhona kwemingcele ephakathi kwabasindisiwe nebandla laseZayoni. Uzwe nezintshumayelo zabanye zigudla abanye kabi.“Into  emqoka ukuthi kukhonzwa uNkulunkulu kulelo bandla. Inqobo nje uma engathukwa uNkulunkulu kulelo bandla, konke kuhle ngalo,'' usho kanje.Uthe empeleni ibandla likaNkulunkulu ngobubanzi balo lingabonakala likhula kakhulu uma lingagwema ukupiklelana nokubukelana phansi.Ugcizelele ukuthi yena uNkulunkulu umkhonza noma yikuphi lapho ebona khona ukuthi ukhona futhi ukhonzwa ngeqiniso.UMbhishobhi Dlamini uhambe emazwini kaMpungose wathi yize beyibandla leZayoni, bakhethe ukumsondeza eduze ngoba ungomunye wabaholi abanohlonze olukhulu.Uthe kumqoka ukuthi wonke amabandla asebenzisane ngaso sonke isikhathi, kungabibikho ukuklwebhana okungenasidingo.

Isikhathi esiphila kusona manje sidinga ukuthi usebenzise izinkundla zokuxhumana ngendlela efanele ukusabalalisa kalula umsebenzi owenzayo nokukhulisa igama lakho ebantwini.Lelo yiphuzu eligcizelelwe yingxenye yezikhulumi ezicobelele izihambeli, oningi lazo bekungabantu abasha abebehambele i-Industry Chats, umcimbi wokucobelana ngolwazi lwemikhakha eyamene nezobuchwepheshe obuseBoston Media House, eThekwini ngoLwesithathu.Esinye sezikhulumi zosuku uMnuz Brooklyn Masuku, i-Commercial Digital Officer yeGagasi FM, uthe izinkundla zokuxhumana ziyindlela elula futhi esheshayo yokwenza imali inkani nje uma uzisebenzisa ngendlela efanele.“Loko ngikwazi ngami ngoba ngisebenza ngazo ukuphila. Esikhathini samanje cishe wonke umuntu uhlale esocingweni lwakhe, ngakho kusemqoka ukusebenzisa izinkundla zokuxhumana ikakhulu uFacebook, ngoba awumbi eqolo futhi kulula ukuwusebenzisa, ukwenza inzuzo futhi ukhulise igama lakho noma elomsebenzi owenzayo,” kusho uMasuku.UMnuz Mnqobi Mthethwa weMagaga Media & Communications ebihlele umcimbi, yena uthe izikhathi zishintshile ngakho indlela obekwenziwa izinto ngayo kudala ngeke isafana neyamanje. “Kubalulekile ukuhambisana nesikhathi, ubheke indlela okwenziwa izinto ngayo ukuze ungasaleli ngemuva kwabanye. Njengathi esihlela imicimbi, ekuqaleni ubuphoqeka ukusebenzisa imali eningi ukuhlela yonke into, kodwa manje sekulula ngoba okuningi sesikwenza ngezinkundla zokuxhumana, indlela esizayo ukwedlulisa umyalezo futhi wonke imali,” kucebisa uMthethwa.UNksz Skhulile Vumase wophiko lokumaketha eCebolethu Group, yena ucebise abafuna ukuqala amabhizinisi ukuqikelela ukuqhamuka nezindlela ezihlukile, kuthi uma kungawezinto ezijwayelekile, kube khona inkinga abayixazululayo ngawo.“Abenze abantu bafise ukusebenza nabo ngokubeka amakhasimende abo phambili, bazibambele mathupha emabhizinisini abo ukuze babone uma kukhona okungahambi kahle, bakwazi ukukulungisa ngokushesha,” usho kanje.Ezinye izikhulumi zosuku bekungumlingisi uNksz Londiwe Cele, umsakazi weGagasi FM uNksz Lwandle Masoka ne-music plugger uNksz Nokwanda Mkhize.Uhlelo lomcimbi beluphethwe wuNksz Olwethu Sokhulu weMinemhlophe Brands, nayo ebiyingxenye yabahleli bomcimbi.

UZOYISEBENZISELA ukukhokhela ezinye izinto  ezingakhokhelwa yisikhwama esixhasa izitshudeni, iNational Student Financial Aid Scheme (NSFAS), imali anikwe yona oklonyeliswe wumasipala ngokuphasa kahle.UMalusi Nxele ongomunye wabafundi abaklonyeliswe wuMasipala uMhlathuze ngo-R10 000 emcimbini obuwenziwe yilo masipala wokuklomelisa abangu-20 abaphase kahle u-matric ngo-2023 abebefunda ezikoleni ezingaphansi kwalo masipala, nabafundi ababili abakhethe ukwenza izifundo ze-Electrical Engineering, ngosizo lwenkampani ekhuthaza ukuthi abafundi bafunde iScience, Technology, Engineering neMathematics (STEM). Abafundi abaklonyeliswe ngokuphasa kahle bathole imiklomelo engama-laptop, izitifiketi no-R6 000 wokubhalisa. UNxele owenza i-Electrical Engineering, eNyuvesi yaseZululand, ophikweni oluseRichards Bay, ubefunda eMangwe High, uthe ukufunda kwakhe kukhokhelwa yiNSFAS kodwa zikhona izinto okubuye kudingeke ukuthi zikhokhelwe umzali. Le mali izomsiza lapho.UMnuz Nkululeko Mbuyazi uthishanhloko waseMangwe, uthe kuyabajabulisa ukuthi umasipala ubone umsebenzi abawenzayo ngokuthi uklomelise abafundi.“Isikole sethu siphase ngo-100%. Ukuze abafundi bethu bafunde izinto ezizobasiza, zisize nendawo abahlala kuyo, nyakenye siqale uhlelo lokufundisa iCoding & Robotics okuyizifundo ezisiza ekutheni zixazulule izinkinga kusetshenziswa ubuchwepheshe.Uthe ngokubambisana nenye yezinkampani, abafundi bakhe irobhothi elikutshelayo ukuthi uma unephepha ongasalidingi lifake kulo mgqomo.“Inkinga yemfucuza elahlwa budlabha inkinga ekhona emphakathini, abafundi bafuna ukuyixazulula. Isikole sethu asigcini ngokufundisa abafundi bethu kuphela kodwa sisiza nabafundi baseDover Farm School nabaseZiphozonke High  uma befuna ukwenza izifundo zeCoding neRobotics.IMeya yaseMhlathuze, uMnuz Xolani Ngwezi, ithe bakhuthaza ukuthi abafundi bafunde izifundo ezizobavulela amathuba omsebenzi khona endaweni.“Sinezimboni ngakho kubalulekile ukuthi abafundi bafunde izifundo ezzaziwa ngeSTEM ngoba izimboni eziningi zidinga lawo makhono. Siyafisa isikole Amangwe High  siqhubeke sibe yisikhungo esizofundisa ezinye izikole kusetshenziswa ezobuchwepheshe ngeCoding neRobotics,” kusho uNgwezi.

Aseqalile amalungiselelo andulela umcimbi omkhulu wezintombi uMkhosi woMhlanga oba KwaNongoma minyaka yonke ngoSepthemba. UMasipala waseNkandla kule mpelasonto uhlanganise izintombi nto ezivela emawadini angu-14 wazenzela umcimbi wokundlalela i-Operation Siyaya eMhlangeni.Kusukela ngoLwesihlanu zikhempe eNkandla Indoor Sports Centre zihuba amahubo, zibhikla ingoma zikhunjuzwa nangokubaluleka kokugcina ubuntombi bazo.Kuze kwasa zihlangene zigadwe khona omama abahlolayo abaziwa ngonomehlo. NgoMgqibelo zivuke zahlolwa zase zingena umgwaqo ziviliyela zihlobile ziphethe nezinqwebe ezinemiyalezo eyahlukene ekhuza nangodlame lobulili oludla lubi kuleli.Zibe sezifikela eNkandla Multipurpose Centre sezihlangatshezwa ondlunkulu bamakhosi ahlukene, imeya ebambile eKing Cetshwayo uMnuz Skhumbuzo Dlamini, iphini leMeya eNkandla uNkk Nonhlanhla Nzuza. Kwabebehambele umcimbi kubalwa uNkk Thobeka Mabhida Zuma namakhansela omkhandlu.

NKOSIKHONA CELEKugcizelelwe ukubaluleka kokuzivocavoca ngesikhathi kunomjaho wokukhumbula uMengameli wokuqala we-African National Congress (ANC), iNkosi Albert Luthuli obewethiwe elokuthi yiLuthuli Peace Walk obuseGroutiville ngale mpelasonto.ULuthuli waba ngowokuqala ukuhlonishwa ngendondo yeNobel Peace Prize. Wadlula emhlabeni ngoJulayi 21,1967. Kuthiwa washayiswa yisitimela eseThembeni. Kuhlangana iminyaka engu-57 adlula emhlabeni.Umjaho wokumkhumbula uchazwe njengomqoka kakhulu yizikhulumi ezahlukene.IMeya yaKwaDukuza, uNkk Lindiwe Nhaca ithe kuyajabulisa ukukhunjulwa kwesishoshovu ngalolu hlobo. Ithe okuhle ukuthi lo mjaho uzophinde ufake ugqozi lokuzivocavoca kubantu ngoba kuyinto emqoka kakhulu.UNkk Velile Luthuli oyilungu lomndeni wakwaLuthuli, uthe sengathi lolu hlobo lomjaho lungavusa uthando kubantu bakule ndawo lokuzigcina bephilile ngokuzivocavoca.Uthe bewumndeni wakwaLuthuli bayakujabulela kakhulu ukugcinwa kwegama lale ngqalabutho liphila ngaso sonke isikhathi."Lokhu kusho lukhulu kithina njengomndeni uma ilungu lethu lisakhunjulwa yize sekuphele isikhathi eside kangaka ladlula emhlabeni,'' usho kanjena.Uthe ukukhunjulwa kukaLuthuli ngomjaho kubahlaba umxhwele ngoba wayengumuntu owayezifela kakhulu ngezemidlalo.UDkt Mxolisi Mchunu onguSihlalo weLuthuli Museum uthe eminyakeni ezayo bafuna ukubona lo mjaho udlondlobala ufinyelela kwelinye iqophelo.Uthe kuyajabulisa ukubona abantu abasha kanjalo nabadala bezibandakanya nomjaho wokukhumbula ingqalabutho eyeyiqhakambisa izimpilo zabantu abamnyama.NeMeya yesiFunda iLembe, uMnuz Thobani Shandu iwuncomile umbono wokukhunjulwa kukaLuthuli ngalolu hlobo.Bonke ababe yingxenye yalo mjaho banikezwe izindondo  zokubabonga ngokuwungenela. Banikezwe imiklomelo ngokwehlukana kweminxa yabo.Ophume phambili kulo mjaho kube wuNksz Thembeka Buthelezi othe uyazigqaja ngokuba yingxenye yomjaho wokukhumbula iqhawe labantu abamnyama.

INHLANGANO esiza abanezifo zengqondo, iSouth African Depression and Anxiety Group (Sadag), isigqugquzele abantu bakuleli ukuba behlise otshwaleni.Iveze ukuthi abanye bancamela ukuphuza utshwala kunokuthenga ukudla okunomsoco. Icele abantu ukuba basheshe bafune usizo uma becabanga ukuthi banenkinga yophuzo oludakayo.Udokotela wengqondo waseCape Town, uDkt Timmy Joji ubenesithangami sokucobelelana ngolwazi nabeSadag exwayisa ngobungozi bophuzo oludakayo.“Uma unomuntu onenkinga yotshwala kubalulekile ukuthi ube nozwelo ngoba loyo muntu uzama ukubhekana nesimo esithile ngokusebenzisa utshwala.“Abantu abanenkinga yotshwala abaziboni. Abanye abafuni nokusizwa. Kubalulekile ukukhuluma nabo ngendlela ekahle, ungabahluleli,” kusho uDkt Joji.Ucele abanenkinga yophuzo oludakayo ukuthi bangabi namahloni futhi bangazehluleli, kodwa bathinte iSadag ngoba ikhona ukubasiza.Uthe bangakhuluma nomeluleki ku-whatsapp ngokushayela u-087 163 2025.Bangashayela u-0800 12 13 14 lapho bezokhuluma nomeluleki osiza abanenkinga yotshwala. Bangathumela  futhi isms ku-32312 ukuze balekelelwe. Usizo lumahhala kanti lutholakala nsukuzonke.UJoji uthe kukhona nezinhlangano ezisiza abanenkinga yophuzo njenge-Alcoholics Anonymous (AA) eba nemihlangano kuzo zonke izifundazwe zakuleli. Abafisa ukuthi ibasize i-AA, bangangena kwi-website yale nhlangano ethi www.aasouthafrica.org.za ukuthola umhlangano oseduze nabo.Nazi izimpawu okufanele zisukunyelwe:Ukuhlale ufuna utshwala ukuze uzizwe ngendlela ethile.-Ukungazizwa kahle uma ungaphuzanga utshwala. Kungenzeka uqhaqhazele, ujuluke, ucanuzelwe yinhliziyo, ungahlaliseki kahle, usheshe ucikeke noma uzizwe ukhathazekile.-Ukungenzi lokho okulindeleke kuwena, isibonelo ungayi emsebenzini, esikoleni noma ungafuni ukuba nomndeni wakho ngenxa yotshwala. Kungenzeka ehle amamaki akho esikoleni uma uwumfundi, ulove esikoleni noma uxabane nabantu obathandayo.-Ukushintsha kwendlela oziphatha ngayo, abanye bashintsha esikhaleni babe nolaka ngenxa yokuphuza kakhulu noma ukungabutholi utshwala.-Ukungamukeli ukuthi unenkinga yotshwala, uma abanye bekhuluma nawe. Lokhu kwandisa izinkinga zakho.

KUKHUZWA umkhuba okuthiwa uyadlanga, wokujikijelwa kwezitimela ezihambela emalokishini akhele idolobha iTheku, osekuholele ekuncipheni kwesibalo sezitimela ngenxa yokuthi zisuke zisayolungiswa.Uphiko lwezitimela ezithwala abagibeli,  i-Passanger Rail Agency of South Africa, luthi lesi  sihlava sesiholele ekulahlekeni kwemali eningi  njengoba kubiza imali eshisiwe ukuthenga amawindi afa kulezi zigameko, okukholakala ukuthi isikhathi esiningi zenziwa yizingane ezidlala eceleni kukajantshi.Olukhulumelayo KwaZulu- Natal uMnuz Zama Nomnganga, uthe izigameko zokujikijelwa kwezitimela ngamatshe zenzeka kakhulu emizileni ebheke esiteshini  iThembalihle KwaMashu naseCato Ridge.“Sesehlile isibalo sezitimela ezihambela KwaMashu naseCato Ridge. Lokhu kwenziwa ukuthi izitimela ezimbili ebezisebenzisa umzila waKwaMashu zikhishiwe zisayolungiswa, kanti sinye esikhishwe emzileni waseCato Ridge.  Okwenzekayo ukuthi izitimela ezintsha azifani nezindala obekukhishwa amakhanda ayolungiswa uma enenkinga kusetshenziswe elinye ukudonsa isitimela. Lezi zamanje uma ubulala iwindi langaphambili, kumele sikhishwe sonke emzileni siyolungiswa ngoba asihlukaniseki,” usho kanje.Uthe ukufakwa kwamawindi kudla izigidi ngobudedengu nje babantu abayekela izingane zenze  umdlalo ongemuhle wokucekela phansi impahla. Unxuse abazali nomphakathi ukuthi balekelele ekukhuzeni izingane ezenza lo mdlalo kwazise awugcini ngokushodisa izitimela nje kuphela, kodwa ubuye ubeke impilo yabagibeli engozini ngoba ukushayeka kwewindi lesitimela sihamba, kungathusa umshayeli siphume emzileni kudaleke isibhicongo.UNomnganga uthe bakhathezekile njengoba kusondela ukuvalwa kwezikole, okusho ukuthi  isibalo sezingane ezenza lo mkhuba singase sande.Uthe ikhona imikhankaso asebevele bayiqalile yokuhambela izikole beqwashisa ngengozi yokujikijelwa kwezitimela kanti bayahlangana nezinhlaka ezehlukene zomphakathi ezilekelela ngokukhuza lesi sihlava.

INZIMA impilo kubantu abasha abangasebenzi njengoba izibalo zabangasebenzi zilokhu zikhula unyaka nonyaka.IStatsSA iveze ukuthi kuphele imisebenzi ewu-67 000 noma ewu-0.6% kusukela ngoDisemba wonyaka odlule kuze kube wuMashi walo nyaka. Lokhu kusho ukuthi abangasatohozi sebewu-10 664 000.Imisebenzi iphele emkhakheni wezohwebo lapho kuphele ewu-57 000, kwezemiphakathi ewu-18 000, ezamabhizinisi ewu-4 000 nezezimayini ewu-3000.Isolezwe likhulume nentokazi yaseMlaza (28) eyaphothula iziqu ze-BA Industrial Sociology eNyuvesi yaseZululand ngo-2019, eveze ukuthi selokhu yaqeda ukufunda ayiwutholi umsebenzi yize iwufuna.Iveze ukuthi inzima impilo yokungasebenzi uma uwumuntu omusha ngoba kufanele ucele imali ye-data lokungena kuma-website ahlukene okubheka umsebenzi, ucele imali yokwenza amakhophi lapho kuposwa khona kanjalo nemali yokugibela uma usubizelwe ukuyokwenza inhlolokhono.Le ntokazi engathandanga ukudalulwa igama ngoba inqena amehlo abantu, ithe ayiwutholi noR350 wabangasebenzi kodwa iye izame amatoho ezindaweni ezihlukene.“Siyazi ukuthi uhulumeni ugxile emkhakheni wesayensi kodwa zikhona nezinye izifundo ezingagxilile kwisayensi lapho abantu bedinga khona imisebenzi. Kungakuhle ukuthi angayikhohlwa naleyo mikhakha adale amathuba omsebenzi. Ngiyazifaka izicelo zomsebenzi ezinhlelweni ezibhekelele abantu abasha abangasebenzi kodwa angikaze ngibe nenhlanhla yokutohoza kuzo,” kusho le ntokazi.IStatsSA sithe abantu abaqashiwe sehle ngo-29 000 noma u-0.3% sisuka ku-9 513 000 ngoDisemba wonyaka odlule saya ku-9 484 000 ngoMashi walo nyaka.Isazi somnotho sakwaFNB, uNksz Koketso Mano, sithe kuyakhathaza ukuthi sebevile ku-10.6 million abantu abangasebenzi kuleli.Unxuse uhulumeni ukuthi udaba lokudalwa kwemisebenzi lube seqhulwini lwezinhlelo zakhe ngoba abantu abangasebenzi baphelelwa yithemba.Uveze ukuthi izinga lokuphila eNingizimu Afrika liyabiza ngisho abantu abasebenzayo abakwazi ukumelana nezindleko zempilo.

USUKUMELE indawo yangakubo kwezemfundo usomabhizinisi waseMsinga uMnuz Snothi Ndlovu ngokumema amanyuvesi ukuba azocija abafundi bakamatikuletsheni ngemigudu elandelwayo ukuze bamukelwe kuwona.UNdlovu uhlanganise izikole zaseMsinga Top endaweni yakwaNocomboshe ngenjongo yokuthekela ulwazi.Ulande izikhungo zemfundo ephakeme, iDurban University of Technology (DUT) neMangosuthu University of Technology (MUT). Lolu hlelo ulwenze  ngaphansi kweFoundation yakhe iSnothi Care Foundation. Uthe kuningi okusafanele kwenziwe eMsinga."Nami akubanga lula ukungena enyuvesi ngesikhathi ngiphasa umatikuletsheni, ngiqhubeke nemfundo yami eMangosuthu emkhakheni wobunjiniyela kwaba nzima. Abantu bangakithi bekade bethi njengoba ngifundela lo mkhakha, okusho ukuthi ngifundela ukushayela umshini wokugugula umgwaqo. Kuze kube namanje izimo zisenzima emphakathini wakithi ngoba abanye abazazi izinto zasemanyuvesi. Ngibone kuyisu elihle  lokusiza abantwana bangakithi eMsinga ngoba abakaze balithole leli thuba  kule ndawo. Uma singabambisani endaweni yakithi, akukho okuyosiyisa phambili, " kusho uMnuz Ndlovu.Kulo mcimbi bekukhona umlingisi woMkhokha: The Curse  uKini Shandu, iJaji uMjabuliseni Madondo okuyijaji  eligqame kakhulu ngesikhathi lixazulula umbango wobukhosi eNdlunkulu kaZulu phakathi kweSilo uMisuzulu kaZwelithini noMntwana uSmakade bebanga isihlalo sobukhosi.Imeya yaseMsinga, uMnuz Felinkosi Sikhakhan,e obeyingxenye yalo mcimbi, ibonge iqhaza elibanjwe uNdlovu.Uthe lizoba khona ikusasa elihle emphakathini waseMsinga uma kubanjiswana."UMsinga yindawo ebidume ngezimpi.  Sifuna ukuwuguqula udume nangemfundo. Sekuyaphaswa kahle manje eMsinga akusafani naseminyakeni edlule.Omunye wabafundi uSiphosethu Ngubane, wasoSizo High School, uthe bahlomule kakhulu ngokufika kwamanyuvesi endaweni yakubo. Uthe wusizo lolo abebelibukela kude bezwa ngalo emisakazweni lwenzeka kwezinye izindawo.

LUQALE kabi usuku kubagibeli abagingqike netekisi emgwaqweni uR102 ngaseDarnall.Abezimo eziphuthumayo babizelwe kule ndawo ngombiko wokulimala kwabagibeli ngengozi yemoto eyodwa. Abe-IPSS Medical Rescue bafike kule ndawo bathola itekisi ligingqike lilele ngokhakhayi eceleni komgwaqo.“Sifike endaweni yesigameko sathola kunabantu abaningi abalimele abanye bebesavaleleke phakathi etekisini. Ngesikhathi kuhlolwa isimo sabo, kutholwe ukuthi ababili bebesesimeni esibucayi kakhulu,” kusho uSamantha Meyrick okhulumela abe-IPSS Medical Rescue.Abagibeli abahlanu balimele kabi kwathi abayisikhombisa bona bathole imihuzuko emincane. Abalimele balashelwe endaweni yesigameko ngaphambi kokuphuthunyiswa esibhedlela.

Abezimo eziphuthumayo bafike endaweni yesigameko bathola iveni elilayisha izingane zesikole liginqikile kwaSithebe, eMandeni.Le ngozi yenzeke ngoMsombuluko ekuseni lapho okulilame khona abafundi abangu-15 belimele ngezindlela ezahlukene.Abe-IPSS Medical Rescue bafike bahlola isimo sezingane, abaningi bebenemihuzuko emincane. “Abafundi baphuthunyiswe emtholampilo waseSundumbili. Ngesikhathi kufikwa emtholampilo kutholakale ukuthi abafundi abathathu bahanjiswe emtholampilo ozimele.”Kusenjalo, kushintshe isimo somfundi oyedwa kwaphoqa ukuthi athole usizo lokuqala olukhethekile ngaphambi kokuthi abe-IPSS Medical Rescue bamphuthumise kwenye indawo athole usizo.

ABEZIMO eziphuthumayo babizelwe emgwaqweni uR614 oThongathi ngemibiko yengozi ebandakanya abantu abaningi.Kuthiwa kushayisane izimoto mahlanze, eyodwa yaphaphalaza yawela esikhotheni.Abe-IPSS Medical Rescue bafike kule ndawo bathola ukuthi bangu-11 abantu abalimele, kubo okukhona ababili abasesimweni esibucayi.“Abalimele kakhulu bathole usizo lokuqala anduba baphuthunyiswe esibhedlela. Abanye abayisishiyagalolunye bona balashelwe kule ndawo maqede badedelwa,” kusho uSamantha Meyrick okhulumela le nkampani.Amaphoyisa asendaweni yesigameko njengoba uphenyo luqhubeka.

Abasolwa ngokubamba inkunzi isitolo sobucwebe eChatsworth, eThekwini, ngoLwesihlanu badubule balimaza obesesitolo nephoyisa likaMasipala weTheku ebelibajaha.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe abasolwa esingaziwa isibalo sabo, abebehlome beyizingovolo, bagasele esitolo sobucwebe badubula. Enye inhlamvu ishaye okuthile kwalimala obenganakile ebusweni.“Amaphoyisa anikele khona kwase kuba nokudubulana ngesikhathi ejaha abasolwa. Iphoyisa likamasipala lidubuleke lalimala emlenzeni. Amaphoyisa aqhubekile nokujaha abasolwa kwagcina kuboshwe ababili eMlaza. Batholakale nezimoto ezimbili abebebaleka ngazo zinegazi,” kusho uNetshiunda.Uthe amaphoyisa athungatha abanye abasolwa ababalekile. Uveze nokuthi kuyaphenywa ukuthi abasolwa abathinteki yini eqenjini elibambe inkunzi esinye isitolo sobucwebe ePhoenix ngesonto eledlule lapho kudutshulwe kwalimala khona iphoyisa.

KULINDELWE lukhulu eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini lapho kuzovela khona uNkk Nongcebo Faith Ntombela waseMlaza osolwa ngokuba ungqondongqondo ekusocongweni komyeni wakhe owayeyiphoyisa loMkhandlu weTheku, uCaptain Thomas Zwelakhe Ntombela.UNtombela wadutshulwa esemzini wakhe kwa-S ngoMeyi 3 nyakenye. Waphuthunyiswa eSiphingo Medical Towers okuyilapho okwamenela khona.Ngemuva kwezinyanga ezimbalwa, inkabi eyadubula uSipho Ntombela eyayisekubhaceni, yakhalelwa ngamasongo kaSigonyela.Yageqa amagula itshela inkantolo ukuthi beyithunywe nguNkk Ntombela ukusoconga umyeni wakhe. UNkk Ntombela naye wabe eseboshwa.Kwabe sekuboshwa noMnuz Sithembiso Khumalo, onguthishanhloko waseMpumulwane Primary School, KwaMaphumulo. Yena wayesolwa ngokuthi ubesebenzisana noNkk Ntombela ekuhleleni itulo lokusocongwa kukamufi. Khona lapho kwavela negama lenkabi eyesatshwayo KwaZulu-Natal uKhulani Cele ukuthi nayo ibe nesandla ekusocongweni kukamufi.Bonke abasolwa kusuka lapho bebegqigqa eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMlaza, kwaze kwaba icala lidluliselwa eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini.Njengoba lizobe liqala ukuba seNkantolo yaseThekwini nje kusasa, umthombo osondelene necala uveze ukuthi kungenzeka kube nengwikhwebu ngaleli cala.UNkk Ntyombela ugqame kuleli cala ngenxa yokuthi ubebonakala enganakukhathazeki, emamatheka njalo uma ezovela enkantolo.Ngesikhathi eboshwa uNkk Ntombela wayekade esebenza khona inkantolo yaseMlaza.UMnuz Nkosinathi Ntombela, ongumfowabo kamufi, kubona ukuthi icala liqhuba kanjani enkantolo akusasho lutho ngoba “okusalayo umfowethu akasekho emhlabeni.”Uthe mkhulu umonakalo okhona emndenini njengoba kwabulawa umufi.Uthe nokho kulokoza inhlansi yethemba kubona njengomndeni ngokuthi inkantolo izobenza ubulungiswa agcine egwetshiwe lo wesifazane nabo bonke abathintekayo ecaleni.

KULINDELEKE kukhethe ukhethu phakathi kweqembu uMkhonto Wesizwe ne-ANC okhethweni lokuchibiyela, emawadini angaphansi kukaMasipala uMzumbe, namhlanje ngoLwesithathu.Angu-12 amawadi anganamakhansela komasipala abahlukene KwaZulu-Natal, okuzobe kuvotwa kuwo owaseNewcastle, Umvoti nowaseMzumbe.  Amehlo azobe ethe njo kowaMzumbe okunamawadi ayisithupha asale emva kokwesula ezikhundleni kwamakhansela ayisithupha e-ANC, abemiswe ngonyaka odlule. Abesolwa nokuvota namaqembu aphikisayo ukugudluza iMeya uMnuz Bongani Nyuswa owabuyela esikhundleni emva kokuthi inkantolo ikumisile ukukhishwa kwakhe.Lawa makhansela okunguMnuz Sibonelo Maphumulo owayewusomlomo kumasipala namakhansela emawadini ahlukene kulo masipala okunguMnuz Thulo Mkhungo, Mnuz  Sibonakaliso Hadebe, Mnuz Bheki Ngema, Mnuz Mhlengi Luthuli, Mnuz Thuthukani Jeza, noMnuz Ayanda Duma okuthiwa bajoyine i-MK emva kokwesula kwabo, kanti bangenele ukhetho sebemele leli qembu.Unobhala we-ANC esifundeni iTolomane, uMnyayiza uMnuz Xolani Luthuli, uthe bakulungele ukuvikelwa ukulahleka kwalawa mawadi.“Siyethemba ukuthi abantu bazosivotela. Siwenze wonke amalungiselelo alolu khetho lokuchibiyela,” usho kanje.UMnuz Vincent Mdunge okhulumela i-MK esifundazweni, uthe ukwesula kwamakhansela e-ANC ajoyine i-MK, kuyizinkomba zokuthi leli qembu liyakhula.“Lolu khetho sizolunqoba vele. Miningi imikhandlu esesithole imibiko yokwesula kwamakhansela, edinwe yisinqumo se-ANC, kungeyona kuphela kuphela njengoba amalungu amanye amaqembu nawo awenelisekile ngokwenziwe amaqembu ngalo hulumeni osanda kubekwa,” kusho uMdunge.Lo masipala ophethwe yi-ANC unezihlalo eziwu-39, kanti i-ANC emva kokhetho lohulumeni basemakhaya ngo-2021, yathola izihlalo ezingu-21, i-IFP ezingu-14, ezimbili ze-EFF, bese kuthi iqembu i-APEMO ne-ATM banesihlalo ngasinye.Ngaphandle kwalolu khetho, u-ward 14 ngaphansi kukaMasipala i-Ray Nkonyeni ngaphansi kwaso lesi sifunda se-ANC, nayo isale ingenakhansela emva kokusula kukaMnuz Sabelo Malunga okukholakala ukuthi ujoyine i-MK.  ULuthuli uthe basalindele ukuthi ikhomishini yokhetho i-IEC ikhiphe usuku lokhetho.

Kulindelwe izivakashi eziqhamuka emazweni ehlukene ezingu-1.3 million eThekwini njengoba kuzongena ihlobo.Lokhu kuhlaluke ngesikhathi kwethulwa umkhankaso iDurban Tourism Summer, eCoastal Lounge Resort, eMgababa izolo ngaphansi kwesiqubulo esithi: The Endless Wave of Tranquility obuhanjelwe abaqhamuka emkhakheni wezokungcebeleka njengoba bekukhona oDJ abadumile okubalwa kubo oDJ Sox, T’zozo uDJ Bongs nabanye.IMeya yaseThekwini, uMnuz Cyril Xaba, yethule ngokusemthethweni lo mkhankaso yathi  inhloso yawo ukugcina iTheku lisemiqondweni yezivakashi."Ngalo mkhankaso sifuna ukuqhakambisa izindawo zaseThekwini ezingamagugu anomlando ocebile. Sifuna izivakashi uma zifika edolobheni lethu ziziwe ziyingxenye yethu," kusho uXaba.Uthe njengoba kukhona ezinye izindawo zokubhukuda ezisavaliwe, bazozivula maduze."Izindawo zokubhukuda ebezisavaliwe bekungamele kubhukudwe kuzo, futhi sasitsheliwe ukuthi asime kancane ukuzivula siqikelele ukuthi uma sesizivula asibi nayo inkinga. Asifuni nokuncane okuzokhalisa izivakashi zethu zidikibale yingakho sisavule izindawo zokubhukuda ezingu-5 kuphela," usho kanje.UXaba uphinde waqinisekisa ukuthi ezokuphepha ziqinisiwe ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izivakashi ziphephile."Ezokuphepha zibalulekile ngoba uma singaziqinisi, okubi okuzokwehlela isivakashi esisodwa kuzobalekisa zonke izivakashi kuphinde kulahlekise ithemba kulabo abebefuna ukuzovakasha kuleli dolobha," ubeke kanje.Khonamanjalo ikhansela laku ward-98 eMgababa, uMnuz Arthur Mgobhozi, lithe bazizwe behloniphekile ngokuthi lo mkhankaso uzokwethulwa eMgababa."UMgababa unomlando omuhle kakhulu futhi ngimema wonke umuntu, nabaqhamuka kwamanye amazwe ukuthi beze bazojabula ngoba iTheku livulelekile," kusho uMgobhozi.

KULINDELEKE ukuthi wehle umthwalo emahlombe abantu bakuleli njengoba amandla emali eseku 4.6% esuka ku-5.1% ngoJuni.Lezi zibalo zikhishwe yi-StatsSA izolo. Iveze ukuthi amandla emali antengiswa wukubiza kukagesi, uphethroli nokudla.Isazi somnotho esizimele, uSolwazi Bonke Dumisa, sithe ukudlondlobala kwamandla emali afike ku-4.6% kusho ukuthi iBhange loMbuso, i-South African Reserve Bank (Sarb), lizoyehlisa imalimboleko.Uthe isizathu salokhu wukuthi amandla emali asondele kwisilinganiso semali esifunwa yi-Sarb njengoba ifuna abe phakathi kuka-3% no-6%.“Njengoba amandla emali eseku-4.6% azokwenza kube lula ukuthi iBhange loMbuso liqale ukwehlisa imalimboleko ngenyanga ezayo (Septhemba). Kungakuhle ukuthi imalimboleko yehle ngoba vele amandla emali antengiswa wukunyuka kukaphethroli, ugesi, izinsiza zikamasipala nokunye okungelona iphutha labantu,” kusho uDumisa.Ezibalweni ze-StatsSA kuvele ukuthi yehlile nentengo yokudla neziphuzo ezingenabo utshwala njengoba intengo yalezi zinto isuke ku-4.6% ngoJuni yaya ku-4.5% ngoJulayi.Isazi somnotho sase-FNB, uNksz Koketso Mano, sithe emhlabeni jikelele amandla emali asenozinzo olubonakalayo nakwintengo ka-oyela futhi neRandi alisehlelwa ngamandla.Naye uthe balindele ukuthi i-Sarb yehlise imalimboleko okuzokwehlisa imali ekhokhwa yilabo abakhokhela imizi, izimoto nenye imali abayibolekile.UMnuz Morne Malan we-Free Market Foundation (FMF), uthe kufanele uhulumeni alubhekisise udaba lokunyuka kukaphethroli, ugesi, ukudla okuba nomthelela omubi emandleni emali.Uthe yize bejabula ukuthi amandla emali akhombisa ukudlondlobala kodwa abazi ukuthi azoqhubeka yini ngale ndlela ngenxa yezinto ezenzeka ezimakethe zomhlaba.Ubalule ukuthi amandla emali awantengiswa yizinto ezenzeka eNingizimu Afrika kuphela kodwa ukunyuka kukawoyela ongahluziwe kuba nomthelela kuwona.

ZENZE okungajwayelekile izinswelaboya okuthiwa zigqekeze indlu yebandla lamaRoma aKhatholika e-Oakford, eVerulam, maqede zaphuza iwayini zashiya kumapeketwane ngaphakathi.Kuvela ukuthi ziqale zaphula umnyango zase zingena ngaphakathi. Isolezwe linazo izithombe ezikhombisa umonakalo eziwenzile ngaphakathi.Kuvela ukuthi ukugqekezwa kwale ndlu yesonto kukhinyabeze ukukhonza njengoba ubuholi balo obuphezulu bunqume ukuthi bumise ukukhonza kuleli sonto nasemagatsheni alo.Leli bandla lingaphansi kwesiFundabhishobhi saseThekwini esiholwa nguMbhishobhi Mandla Mjwara. Ihhovisi lakhe lithunyelelwe imibuzo mayelana nalesi sigameko kodwa azikho izimpendulo ezibuyisiwe.Ilungu lebandla elingathandanga ukudalulwa, lithe badumele kakhulu ngokugqekezwa kwesonto.Liveze ukuthi lokhu kuphoqe ukuthi izinkonzo zimiswe ngoba abakwazi ukukhonzelae endaweni engcolile.''Ubuholi bebandla buthathe isinqumo sokuthi kumiswe ukukhonza kule pherishi. Asikwazi ukuthi singaqhubeka sikhonea endaweni engcole ngalolu hlobo,'' usho kanje.Ilungu lithe kukhona umcimbi abazowenza wokuhlanjululwa kwepherishi ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, laveza ukuthi izinswelaboya zintshontshe izitsha okufakwa kuzona umnikelo nezinye izitsha elithe ziyingxenye enkulu yeMisa futhi sisinye lithe sibiza u-R4 000.Phakathi kwalezi zitsha kuvela ukuthi bekukhona ezineSakramente elithathwa njengomzimba kaKristu, nokuyilo elenza ukuthi iMisa libaluleke. Ilungu likhale ngokuthi maningi amagatsha angaphansi kwale pherishi angeke asakhonza ngenxa nje yalesi simo.Amakholwa alawo magatsha okuthiwa mane, azosala dengwane ngenxa yalesi simo esibehle ngaphezulu.Leli lungu lebandla lidalule ukuthi bese kungokwesibili izinswelaboya zihlasela kule ndlu yesonto. "Okungiphatha kabi kakhulu ukuthi sekungokwesibili manje kugqekezwa isonto. Akukapheli nesikhathi esingakanani njengoba bake baligqekeza, basusa nothayela waphezulu,'' lisho kanje.Ilungu lisole amaphoyisa lathi ayadembesela, akukho okungakho ababalekelela ngakho, lathi ukuba ayangenelela ngabe abazitholi bebhekene nengwadla engaka yokugqekezwa kwendlu yesonto.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZululu Natal, uConstable Thenjiswa Ngcobo, usiqinisekisile isigameko.Uthe amaphoyisa aseVerulam aphenya isigameko sokugqekezwa kwendlu yesonto. Uthe kusolakala ukuthi kunabantu abathile abagqekeze indlu yesonto, bangena ngaphakathi."Kukhona nezinto okuvela ukuthi bazintshontshile sebengene ngaphakathi,'' usho kanje.Kwenzeka lesi sigameko nje, Isolezwe  emasontweni amabili edlule, libike ngokubanjwa inkunzi kwabafundi nabazali besinye sezikole ezakhelene naleli sonto. Abafundi baseSacred Heart Secondary nabanye abazali babanjwa inkunzi yizigebengu okuthiwa zafike zaqhumisa izibhamu kusanda kuphuma isikole. Abafundi kuthiwa basala bethuthumela emuva kwesigameko. Kule ndawo kukhona nesikole samabanga aphansi.

SEKUPHELE amasonto amabili isikole samabanga aphezulu iMbilane High esizinze oLundi, singenawo amanzi, okuphoqe ukuthi izingane zihlaliswe emakhaya.Ngokusho kukasihlalo wesigungu esengamele isikole, uMnuz Sihle Shandu,  amanzi avalwe kulesi sikole ngenxa yokuthi umasipala iZululand ukweletwa uMnyango wezeMfundo izindodla zemali.Ekhuluma neSolezwe, uthe balahlekelwe isikhathi esiningi sokufunda obekumele basisebenzise.“Isikole sisivale ngoLwesihlanu ngesonto eledlule ngoba amanzi abengekho. Silahlekelwe amaviki amabili agcwele okufanele engabe izingane bezifunda futhi isizathu sikamasipala abasitshela sona ukuthi uMnyango wezeMfundo uyabakweleta,” kusho uShandu.Uthe umasipala ubatshele ukuthi uma befuna ukuthola amanzi kumele bawakhokhele.“Thina njengesikole asiwukweleti lutho umasipala ngoba siwukhokhelile. Amanzi sigcina sesiwathenga njengoba sikhokha u-R750 ngamalitha angu-5 000 ithangi lamanzi ngalinye, okubi ukuthi sithatha emalini yabazali njengoba iningi labo lingasebenzi futhi bengakwazi nokukhokha imali yesikole,” usho kanje.Uthe njengoba izingane abanazo esikoleni zingu-1002, amanzi bayawadinga kakhulu ngoba bawasebenzisa ezindaweni eziningi.“Siwasebenzisela ukuphekela izingane, ezindlini zangasese nokuphuza, ngakho-ke asazi ukuthi njengoba sinamathangi amathathu okugcina amanzi, azosanela yini,” ubeke kanje.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo, KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sihle Mlotshwa, uthe bebengazi ngalesi simo.“Besingalwazi lolu daba oluphazamisayo, kuyishwa ngoba abafundi nothisha bayathinteka. Silinde umbiko ovela ezinhlakeni ezifanele ngalolu daba,” kusho uMlotshwa.Khonamanjalo: Usihlalo weqembu le-ActionSA, KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Zwakele Mncwango, ubhalele eHhovisi likaNdunankulu, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, ekhala ngayo le ndaba yokunqanyulwa kwamanzi eMbilane High.“Njengeqembu kasineme ngesinqumo esithathwe uMasipala waseZululand sokunqamula amanzi. Ngesikhathi seCovid-19, isikole iMbilane sasingezinye sezikole esanikelelwa ngamathangi amanzi sinikwa umasipala, ngokwazi ukuthi uMnyango wezeMfundo uzokhokha izindleko,” kusho uMncwango.Uthe ukungakhokhi koMnyango wezeMfundo kubangele ukuthi i-borehole isikole ebesithembele kuyo nayo iphelelwe amanzi.IMeya yaseZululanda uMnuz Michael Khumalo, uthe umasipala kudingeke ukuthi unqamule ukuhlinzekwa kwamanzi ezakhiweni zoMnyango wezeMfundo kulesi sifunda ngenxa yesikweletu sika-R4 million.  ‘Kusuka ngo-2022 sizamile ukuxhumana nomnyango ukuze wenze izinhlelo zokuxazulula le nkinga. Siyi-Water Service Authority sikhathazekile ngalesi simo yingakho sisahubeka nokuxoxisana noMnyango wezeMfundo ukuze uvume lesi sikweletu bese ukhokha.’ .

Imibhikisho eyahlukene isiholele ekutheni uMasipala waseMdoni umise ukuhlinzeka izidingo ezifana nokuqoqwa kukadoti nokuvula izikhungo ezihlola abafundela ukushayela.UMdoni usubhekane nemibhikisho eyahlukene emasontweni amathathu edlule ephazamise ukusebenza komkhandlu.Emibhikishweni esibe khona kukhona owomphakathi okhala ngenkohlakalo nowabasebenzi.Ngeledlule, bekunomunye umbhikisho womphakathi lapho ababhikishi benxuse ukuthi uMengameli uCyril Ramaphosa, ajube uphiko oluphenya inkohlakalo, iSpecial Investigating Unit, ukuba izophenya umkhandlu.Ngaphambi kwalo mbhikisho, bekukhona owabasebenzi abakhala ngezinsiza zokusebenza. Namhlanje, kulindeleke ukuthi kube nomunye umbhikisho womphakathi emahhovisi omkhandlu.Ngenyanga eyedlule, umkhandlu wakhipha isaziso somphakathi lapho owawuxwayisa khona ukuthi udoti angeke uqoqwe nokuthi kuzovalwa izikhungo ezihlola abafundela ukushayela ngenxa yemibhikisho.Khona lapho, kuphinde kube nodaba lokumiswa kwenkotileka eyakha umgwaqo eDududu, umphakathi usola amakhansela ngokuqasha abasondelene nawo.Sekuphele amasonto amathathu, umphakathi wakule ndawo uvale amasango kasonkontileka ufuna ukuthi kuphume abasebenzi othi sebephelelwe izinkontileka zezinyanga ezintathu abazisayina. Sekumele kuqashwe abanye abasohlwini lwabadinga umsebenzi emawadini amabili umgwaqo owakhiwa kuwo.Ngakolunye uhlangothi, amakhansela athi asezamile ukuhlangabezana nomphakathi ngokuthi kubekhona abantu abasha abaqashwayo, ngaphezu kwalaba abakhona ngoba usonkontileka uthi usabadinga kodwa umphakathi ushaya phansi ngonyawo ufuna kuphume laba abebesebenza.Omunye wamalungu omphakathi ocele ukungavezwa igama lakhe ngoba ethi wesabela ezokuphepha, uthe ngesikhathi kuqalwa iphrojekthi ngoFebhruwari, kwakuvunyelelwe ukuthi abaqashiwe bazosebenza izinyanga ezintathu badedele abanye, manje akusenzeki .Ngaphezu kwalokho,  akusalandelwa amagama asohliwni labantulayo emawadini, sekubonakala nabantu abebengemuva ohlwini sebesebenza nokungebona abasemawadini athintekayo."Imihlangano esisabe nayo amakhansela awafuni ukulandela uhlelo, kunalokho athi azokwengeza abanye abasebenzi okuzokwenza ukuthi kungathathwa isibalo esiningi salaba abebengakahlomuli. Amakhansela afuna ukugcina abantu bawo. Ngeke sikuvume lokho uma sekuphele izinanga ezintathu umuntu akaphume kungene omunye," kusho yena.USomlomo ophinda abe yikhansela lakwa-ward 3, kuMasipala waseMdoni, uMnuz Mthandeni Mbutho, uthe uyazi ngezinsolo zokuthi baqashe abantu babo. “Into esibhekene nayo la ukuthi imiphumela yokhetho esiphuma kulo iveze ukuthi iqembu elithile ilona elithandwa ngabantu, manje lelo leqembu selifuna ukuphatha ekubeni ukhetho esiphuma kulo bekungelona olwamakhansela. Lenza noma yini ukuze kube sengathi ilona eliphethe. Lizibiza ngomphakathi, uma ningavumelani nokushiwo yilo lenza kungasebenzeki,”  kusho uMbutho. Uthe izinkontileka zabasebenzi ziyizinyanga ezintathu kodwa zibhalwe ukuthi usonkontileka uma esamdinga umsebenzi uzoqhubeka." Lo ‘mphakathi’ omise inkontileka kuthe uma ufika nesikhalo usonkontileka wathi uma kuqalwa phansi kuzoba izindleko ezengeziwe, kungcono engeze ngesibalo esithile sabasebenzi ngoba kudingeka umfaniswano, ukuthi baqeqeshwe nerekhodi lezempilo. Okuxakayo ukuthi lo mphakathi awufuni kuzwa lutho, ufuna kwenziwe okufunwa yiwo. Awufuni kuthatha mbono wamuntu, uncamela ukuthi umgwaqo ume noma ungayiswa kwenye indawo awunandaba. Asikwazi ukumisa abantu emsebenzini sebetshelwe ukuthi bayaqhubeka, nabo bazoteleka,“ kusho yena Uqhube wathi kuMasipala uMndoni akusebenzeki ngenxa yabantu abathile abagovuza umphakathi kumiswe amaphojekthi. Amahhovisi kamasipala avaliwe, abasebenzi basesitelekeni. UMphathiswa woMnyango wokuBusa ngokuBambisana nobuHoli boMdabu, uMfundisi Thulasizwe Buthelezi, uzohlangana nabasebenzi bakwamasipala abatelekile ngoMsombuluko.

UMPHATHISWA woMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu KwaZulu-Natal, uMfundisi Thulasizwe Buthelezi, uthi kumele uhulumeni  enyuse imali esinikezwa omasipala, ngenxa yezinhlekelele ezibangelwa ukuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu, esivamise ukushiye amalungu omphakathi esele dengwane.UButhelezi ukusho lokhu njengoba kusabatshazwa umonakalo odalwe umlilo wequbula obukhashwa yisishingishane somoya onamandla oshiye kukhalwa kwabanye omasipala abekhele lesi sifundazwe, kungqongqa imizi yabantu, imfuyo nempahla ebalulekile.“Selokhu siwuqalile lo nyaka, inyanga nenyanga kuba nenhlekelele kanti omasipala abanayo imali eyanele yokubhekana nalezi zinto ngoba uma inhlekelele yenzeka, abantu babika ekhanseleni noma kwimeya kamasipala.  Njengomphathiswa womnyango, lokhu ngizokubheka sibone ukuthi omasipala singabalekelela kanjani ekutheni isabelomali senyuswe ukuze bekwazi ukubhekana ngqo nalesi simo,” kusho uButhelezi.Uthe abantu sebekhuzwe kakhulu ekutheni uma beqala umlilo kwesinye isikhathi ngenhloso yokubabela ikhaya, kumele bawugade umlilo ukuthi ungeqi. UButhelezi noMphathisa woMnyango wezokuThutha nokuHlaliswa KwaBantu esifundazweni, uMnuz Siboniso Duma, kuzothi namhlanje bayobhonga emswaneni emzini wakwaGazu eZinyosi ku-ward 1, ngaphansi kukaMasipala Umlalazi. Kudlule emhlabeni khona ilungu lomndeni, uMnuz Mntukabongwa Gazu (67) okuthiwa ushe wangqongqa nendlu abekuyo ngesikhathi umlilo ushisa izindlu ezintathu kulo muzi ngeSonto ebusuku, kanti elinye ilungu lalo mndeni lingeniswe esibhedlela lilimele kabi.UDuma uthe umnyango wakhe unezinhlelo zokuthi umndeni wakwaGazu wakhelwe indlu yesikhashana ukuze ukwazi ukugoba amadlangala kuyo, uzile ngesikhathi kuqhubeka izinhlelo zokufihlwa kukaGazu.“Ithimba lokuphiko lokuHlaliswa KwaBantu eliholwa yinhloko yomnyango, uMnuz Mdu Zungu, liyaqhubeka nomsebenzi wokwakha indlu yesikhashana ukuqinisekisa ukuthi umndeni uzilela ngesizotha othandiweyo wawo.  Ukuhlonzwa kwemindeni ethintekile kwehla inhlekelele kuyaqhubeka, ngoba asifuni kube khona abakhahlamezwe yilesi simo abashiyeka ngaphandle,” kusho uDuma.Izindawo ezithinteke ngenxa yale nhlekelele ngezakhele oMasipala Umlalazi, Inkandla, Umvoti nowaKwaNongoma.

UMYANGO wezeMfundo eGauteng uqinisekise ukumiswa kwabafundi abangu-12 ngezinsolo zokucwasa abafundi abansundu.Kuthiwa lokhu kuvele ngesikathi kubikelwa ihhovisi lesifunda iTshwane South ukuthi abafundi balesi sikole bahlela imashi ngoLwesihlanu mhla ka 19 Julayi.Umsusi wodweshu iWhatsApp Group evulwe ngabafundi abangondlebezikhanya ilanga abayisebenzisela ukuhlambalaza nokucwasa abafundi abamnyama.Ngesikhathi izikhulu zesifunda zibiza umhlangano ophuthumayo  nabafundi abebehlele imashi, zithole ukuthi sekunesikhathi yaqala le nkinga uthishanhloko ebikelwa kodwa engazithathi izinyatheloKuthiwa nethimba eliphethe esikoleni liyabacindezela abafundi abamnyama bebe bekhombisa uthando kwabamhlophe.Lesi sikole asiqali ukuvela ezindabeni ngezinsolo zokucwasa ngoba ngo-2016 kwasuka umsindo ngesikhathi kubhikisha abafundi abamnyama bekhala ngokucwaswa nokucindezelwa ngenxa yezinwele zabo okwakuthiwa zimbi futhi akumele zihlale zingalukiwe ngoba kazibukeki kahle.Kubikwa ukuthi abafundi abamisiwe bazobizelwa esigcawini sokuqondiswa ubugwegwe ngomhla ka 31 kwephezulu futhi uMnyango wezeMfundo uzoqhubeka nokuphenya izinsolo ezivezwe abafundi ngabasebenzi bakulesi sikole.

BAMISIWE abasebenzi bakaMasipala waseNewcastle, okuthiwa batholwa bedla amambawu bukhoma emini kwabha ngesikhathi somsebenzi, baze bashuthwa ngabantu.UMasipala waseNewcastle usezandleni ze-IFP, eyawephuca i-ANC emuva kokhetho lohulumeni basekhaya ngo-2021.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi abasebenzi bakamasipala abahlanu bebenomkhuba wokuhlala epaki thizeni bashaye ezibandayo kubuka amalungu omphakathi. Kuthiwa bakwenza lokhu befake ngisho izimpahla ezibakhombayo ukuthi basebenzela umkhandlu, kodwa bengazi nanyaka.Leli phephandaba linaso isithombe esiveza laba bebeke okubonakala njengobhiya phambi kwabo.Babonakala bezipholele kukhona abesilisa nabesifazane behleli etafuleni ngokukhulu ukukhululeka.Kuthiwa kunomuntu thizeni owashutha laba ekhuza umhlolo wokuthi abasebenzi bomkhandlu badla utshwala ngesikhathi somsebenzi.Isithombe sihambe saze safika ezikhulwini zomkhandlu nazo ezikhuze zababaza.Lesi sithombe besisabalele nasezinkundleni zokuxhumana, kukhuzwa umhlolo wabasebenzi abangenandaba.IMenenja kaMasipala uMnuz Zamani Mcineka, ikuqinisekisile lokhu yathi kunophenyo oluqhubekayo kodwa ayivumelekile ukwanda kakhulu okwamanje.“Sibacele ukuthi balinde ngasekhaya ngoba sisaqhuba uphenyo olunzulu, emuva kwalokho bazovela esithangamini esifanele.“Angikwazi ukukhuluma ngalolu daba okwamanje ngoba lusaphenywa, kufanele silusingathe ngobulungiswa,’’ kusho uMcineka.Ngaphandle kokuphawula kwemenenja, bekukhishwe isitatimende ngalolu daba umasipala ukhala ngalesi senzo.Umasipala uveza ukuthi lesi senzo sijivaza igama lawo futhi siwufaka ehlazweni kubantu abawakhele.Uthe uma kukhona abanolwazi oluthe thuthu ngalezi zigameko bangesabi ukuwulekelela ngemininingwane ukuze kuthathwe izinyathelo ezifanele.Kwesinye isigameko phambilini Isolezwe labika ngabasebenzi bakaMasipala uMsunduzi, eMgungundlovu abatholwa becambalele emathuneni ngesikhathi somsebenzi.Labo basebenzi bathathelwa izinyathelo bagcina besayine izexwayiso, bangaxoshwa.

KUPHUNYUZWE emsebenzini izikhulu eziphezulu eMnyangweni wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu KwaZulu-Natal ezisolwa ngenkohlakalo.Izikhulu ezinhlanu zimiselwe ukungaphathi ngendlela imali yomnyango. Amacala azo asukela endleleni umnyango owasebenzisa ngayo imali ngesikhathi kubhekwe okhethweni lwangoMeyi.Uhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal wawuphethwe yi-ANC ngokuzimela ngaphambi kokhetho, njengoba manje usuphethwe ngokubambisana amaqembu ahlukene.UButhelezi yena uyilungu le-IFP, eyingxenye yamaqembu aphethe ngokubambisana.Ngokusho komnyango, kulezi zikhulu ezinhlanu ezimisiwe kukhona nesikhulu sezezimali nabaqondisi ababili okukhona kubo obhekelele uphiko olukhipha amathenda.UMphathiswa woMnyango, uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi, ukushayele ihlombe ukumiswa kwalezi zikhulu.“Ukumiswa kwazo kuthumela umyalezo oshubile futhi kubuyisa isiko lokuphatha imali yomnyango ngendlela nelikuqinisekisa ukuthi bathathelwa izinyathelo labo abephula imithetho.”UButhelezi ungene kulo mnyango emva kokhetho lwangoMeyi.Uke wakuveza ngaphambilini ukuthi kuningi okushayisa amakhala akufice emnyangweni.Ngesikhathi uButhelezi ejikijelana ngamazwi noNobhala we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Bheki Mtolo, waveza ukuthi kunophenyo aseluqalile emnyangweni.UButhelezi wathi yiningi imali yomnyango eyasetshenziswa ngendlela engaqondakali ngesikhathi kubhekwe okhethweni.Waveza ukuthi uphenyo oluqhutshwa umnyango lungase luholele ekutheni kube khona abantu ababoshelwa amacala enkohlakalo.Ngaphandle kokuphenya izinsolo zenkohlakalo, uButhelezi ufike kulo mnyango waguqula izinqumo ezathathwa engakafiki.Ngesikhathi efika emnyangweni, uButhelezi washintsha abalawuli abajutshwe wumnyango komasipala okubalwa kubo owesifunda uThukela, uMkhanyakude nowaseNkosi Mtubatuba.UButhelezi waphinde wethula ngokusemthethweni ithimba longoti eliyolekelela kuMasipala waseThekwini.Leli thimba okukhona kulo owayeyimenenja yomkhandlu, uMnuz Mike Sutcliffe, nowayengumqondisi jikelele eHhovisi likaMengameli, uDkt Cassius Lubisi, lamenyezelwa ngonyaka owedlule, kodwa kwaze kwashaya ukhetho lingethuliwe emkhandlwini.Kwakunezinsolo zokuthi amakhansela e-ANC awavumelani nesinqumo sokujutshwa kwaleli thimba.Kumiswa izikhulu zalo mnyango nje, noMnyango wezeMisebenzi yoMphakathi neNgqalasizinda esifundazweni nawo usanda kumisa izikhulu eziphezulu.Lo mnyango oholwa uMnuz Martin Meyer, oyilungu leDA, usanda kumisa izikhulu ezine ezisolwa ngenkohlakalo.Kuzona kukhona inhloko yomnyango, isikhulu sezezimali, nomqondisi ophikweni olukhipha amathenda.

INYUNYANA yabasebenzi bakahulumeni, iPublic Servants Association (PSA), ithi kufanele baziphendulele abaphazamise izinsiza ze-Unemployment Insurance Fund (UIF).UMnuz Reuben Maleka wePSA uthe bayajabula ukuthi usemisiwe uKhomishana we-UIF uMnuz Teboho Maruping ngethenda kaR5 billion eyanikwa iThuja Holdings.Uthe ngisho nenkinga yokuphazamiseka kwezinsiza ze-UIF online ziphazamiseke uMaruping ebuka.Izinsiza ze-UIF ziye zaphazamiseka emuva kokuthi inkampani ebhekelele ukuzamukela kuma-khompyutha nakumaselula iye yaya enkantolo emuva kokuthi inkontileka yayo ingavuselelwanga.“Siyajabula ukuthi uMaruping umisiwe ngoba kufanele achaze ukuthi uthinteka kanjani kwithenda kaR5 billion eyanikwa iThuja Holdings. I-UIF iphatha izizumbulu ezisiza abantu abaphelelwe wumsebenzi, abakhulelwe nabanye abasuke benezinkinga emsebenzini ngakho kufanele iphathwe kahle. UMaruping kufanele enze umsebenzi wakhe angasebenzisani nezinkampani ezifuna ukweba imali yabantu bakuleli abasuke bethwele kanzima,” kusho uMaleka.Ugqugquzele abantu ukuba babike izigameko zenkohlakalo ukuze izikhungo zikahulumeni zizohlale zisebenza kahle.Khonamanjalo i-UIF imemezele ukuthi izokwengeza amahora okusebenza okubala ukuthi abantu bazosizwa nangoMgqibelo.Amahora okusebenza azoqala ngo-7.20 ekuseni kuvalwe ngo-4 ntambama.Njengoba izinsiza zingatholakali online abantu basizwa emahhovisi oMnyango wezabaSebenzi ezweni jikelele. Ngesonto eledlule bangaphezu kuka-181 000 abantu abasizwe yi-UIF ezweni jikelele abathole imali ewu-R419 607 185.Akusiwo wonke amahhovisi azovulwa ngoMgqibelo njengoba KwaZulu-Natal kuzovulwa ihhovisi eliseMgungundlovu neliseRichards Bay, amanye azosebenza izinsuku ezijwayelekile.

KUVALIWE ukuthuthwa kwemfuyo eMpangeni, oLundi naseVryheid, kuhlasela amatele kulezi zindawo.Lesi sifo sike sahlasela ezindaweni eziningi kulesi sifundazwe nyakenye njengoba sesibuyile futhi.UMnyango wezoLimo KwaZulu-Natal, uthe zimbili izigameko zalesi sifo eziqinisekisiwe; esaseMpangeni nesaseVryheid, esesithathu sasoLundi sisaphenywa.UMphathiswa walo mnyango, uMnuz Super Zuma, uthe ukuhamba kwemfuyo isuka kwezinye izindawo iya kwezinye yikho okuyimbangela yokuthi kubuye lesi sifo eKZN ngoba imfuyo enalesi sifo ihlangana nengenaso bese iyayithelela."Kuzo zombili izindawo ezinobungozi obukhulu neyodwa enobungozi obuncane, sekubanjwe imihlangano nobuholi bendabuko, izinhlangano zemfuyo, abalimi, abahweba ngemfuyo kubo bobathathu omasipala," kusho uZuma.Uthe kusukela kubikwe isigameko sokuqala, umnyango uqinise izinhlelo zokugoma,  waqala ukusebenza ngokuqapha okuqhubekayo ngempilo yezinkomo.Uqhube wathi uyethemba ukuthi ososeshini bezifundazwe namakomiti  azokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi bonke abafuyi abangamalungu nabangewona amalungu bayayigoma imfuyo yabo ukuze kunqandwe ukusabalala kwalesi sifo.

UKUSHESHE asukume angalindi amathonsi abanzi, kumsizile washeshe wathola ukwelashwa uMbhishobhi Vusi Dube osanda kuthola ukuthi unomdlavuza wamankwahla.UDube ongumholi webandla lodumo i-Ethekwini Community Church (ECC), uthi yilona khwelo alishayayo emadodeni wathi awangaqubi nje, uma kukhona angakuzwa kahle, asheshe ayofuna usizo.Useqale nomkhankaso wokukhuthaza nokuqwashisa amadoda ngokubaluleka kokuzihlola. Uveze ukuthi akukho lapho obekubuhlungu khona ngesikhathi eyozixilonga kudokotela owafike wamtshela ukuthi usenomdlavuza.“Ngenhlanhla udokotela ungitshele ukuthi akukonakali kakhulu ngoba umdlavuza ubungakadluleli emathanjeni. Uthe ukuba ubusudlulele khona ngabe konakele kakhulu. Enye into athe ingisizile ukuthi ngingumuntu ohlala ezivocavoca njalo. Lokho uthe kuyasiza ukuthi amasosha omzimba akwazi ukumelana nezifo ezisuke zikuhlasela. Nginxusa amadoda ukuthi angakwesabi ukuyozihlola ukuze angatholi sekonakele. “Udokotela ungitshele nokuthi uma usuneminyaka engu-40 kuya phezulu, usuke usengcupheni yokuhlaselwa yilo mdlavuza uma ungowesilisa. Okunye okugqamayo ukuthi lesi sifo besingandile kuthina bantu abamnyama kodwa muva nje, sesigcwele kuthina,” kusho uMbhishobhi Dube.Uthe abesilisa kumele bangasabi ukuhlolelwa lolu hlobo lomdlavuza ngoba uma usheshe wazi ngawo, uphila isikhathi eside. Ubale owayengumengameli wakuleli, uDkt Nelson Mandela, noMbhishobhi uDesmond Tutu, njengabanye besilisa abaphila kade yize babenalo mdlavuza. UDube uzosebenzisa ukhukhulelangoqo wembizo yamadoda ayibiza ngeMen’s Conference, ezoba sesontweni lakhe i-ECC ngo-Agasti 3, ukufundisa amadoda ngalo mdlavuza. Uthe ngaphandle nje kokuqwashisa ngomdlavuza kodwa kuzobe kuyinkundla yamadoda evulelekile, kukhulunywa nangezinselelo zempilo ezikhungethe amadoda jikelele.“Kuyona sizobe sizothinta izihloko eziningi ezikhathaza amadoda. Ezinye zazo ubunzima abhekana nabo emishadweni yawo uma kungukuthi anezingane ngaphandle komshado, othola ukuthi unkosikazi akazemukelile. Sizoba siwadodisa ukuthi ezimweni ezinjalo kumele enzenjani.” Uthe kuzobe kukhona nongoti abehlukene abazobe becebisa amadoda ngezithinta inkonzo yasekameleni.“Siyobe singena sigxila ekutheni uma indoda izithola isenkingeni yokungakwenzi okulindelekile, okuwukujabulisa umkayo ngocansi, kumele yenze njani. Sibheka nokuthi kwawona ke umshado kumele uqiniswe kanjani ukuthi ungaphephuki uma kufika izivunguvungu.”Kubantu abazoba yizikhulumi kulo mcimbi kukhona uNick Nzama owaziwa ngokuba nezinkundla zokukhulisa abafana ukuthi babe ngamadoda aqotho. Kukhona nomculi wowokholo uSipho Makhabane ongagcini ngokuba wumculi kodwa ozobe ekhuluma ngokunqoba izinkinga emshadweni njengoba naye kukhona adlule kuzona. Bakhona nabanye abangabefundisi bese kuba uyena uMbhishobhi Dube. Uthe emva kwale mbizo, kuyobe sekuhlalwa phansi kudliwe inyama yenhloko okuyinto evamise ukuhlanganisa amadoda.

BAZONGENA bagamanxe emaphaketheni abashayeli bezimoto njengoba kumenyezelwe ukunyuka kukaphethiloli ngoLwesithathu.I-Central Energy Fund (CEF) ikuqinisekisile ukuthi intengo kaphethiloli ongu-93, no-95 octane izonyuka ngo-R1.21 ilitha kanti udizili uzokhuphuka ngo-R1.06 (0.05% sulphur) no-R1.19 (ngo-0.005%). Upharafini okhanyayo ukhuphuka ngo-64c ilitha kanti intengo enkulu yokudayisa y-LP gas ikhuphuka ngo-41c nge-kg.Kuthiwa ukwenyuka kwakamuva kudalwe ukwenyuka kwangoFebhuwari futhi kubangelwa ukwehla kwerandi, nenani eliphezulu likawoyela emazweni angaphandle.

UTHELA izithelo ezifundazweni ezehlukene kuleli, umkhankaso wamaphoyisa okuhloswe ngawo ukukhuculula ubugebengu owaziwa nge-Operation Shanela.Lokhu kuvezwe okhomishana bamaphoyisa ezifundazweni esithangamini nabezindaba ebesisePitoli, izolo, obekuhloswe ngaso ukunekela izwe imiphumela yalo mkhankaso esikhathini esiwunyaka kusuka kuMeyi, wanyakenye.Lesi sithangami besizimaziswe wuKhomishana wamaPhoyisa kuzwelonke, uGeneral Fannie Masemola, uNgqongqoshe wezamaPhoyisa, uMnuz Bheki Cele nePhini lakhe uMnuz Cassel Mathale nokhomishana bezifundazwe obekukhona phakathi wabo noLieutenant General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi, obambe lesi sikhundla KwaZulu-Natal nezikhulu eMnyangweni wamaPhoyisa.Bangu-616 423 abasolwa ababoshelwe amacala ehlukene kuzwelonke selokhu kuqale lo mkhankaso, kwavundululwa izibhamu ezingu-22 525.Evula lesi sithangami, uCele uthe nakuba amaphoyisa esekhaleni lalo mkhankaso kodwa ukusebenzisana neminye imikhakha abalule kuyo i-South African National Defence Force, amaphoyisa akomasipala, uMnyango wezaseKhaya, uphiko oluqoqa intela kuleli i-South African Revenue Services, neminye iminyango kahulumeni yikhona okukwenze waqhutshwa ngempumelelo.“Kulo mhlangano sihlose ukukhombisa izwe ukuthi kusukela kuqale lo mkhankaso  ngonyaka odlule, amaphoyisa asalokhu ezinikele emsebenzini wokulwa nobugebengu. Iqhaza elibanjwe wumphakathi ukulwa nobugebengu liyakhula,” usho kanje.UMkhwanazi uncome umsebenzi wamaphoyisa kulesi sifundazwe ngokuzinikela ekuvikeleni umphakathi, eqinisekisa ukuthi emigwaqweni okuhamba kuyo kungaba abasuke beya emisebenzini, nezingane eziya ezikoleni, baphephile.“Kube nempumelelo kakhulu ukusebenza kwamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, ikakhulu uma ubheka izigameko ezenzekile kubalwa kuzo ezokudutshulwa kwabantu behleli ndawonye noma izigameko lapho uthola khona ukuthi sekunomgilwa obulewe. Baningi asebeboshiwe ezigamekweni ezifuze lezi. Ukwenza isibonelo esigamekweni esenzeka ePlessislaer (eMgungundlovu) lapho kwabulawa khona abawu-10  bendawonye, nesaseMlaza lapho kwabulawa abayisithupha,” kusho uMkhwanazi.UKhomishana wamaPhoyisa eGauteng, uLieutenant General Tommy Mthombeni, uqinisekise ukuthi ngempelasonto edlule nje kuphela, bangu- 940 ababoshwe kulesi sifundazwe, wancoma ukusebenza kwamaphoyisa. Bangu-51 557 kuzwelonke ababoshelwe ukutholakala nezidakamizwa kulo mkhankaso, okuyisibalo esiphezulu kunawo wonke amacala asohlwini lababoshiwe ngesikhathi sawo umkhankaso.

SISHAYELWE ihlombe isinqumo sikaNgqongqoshe weMfundo eyisiSekelo, uNksz Siviwe Gwarube oyilungu le-DA, sokumisa ukukhishwa kwethenda ka-R9.8 billion, enkampanini eyodwa ebizophakela izikole kuleli.Le thenda kuthiwa imiswe emva kokuba kukhona abahlabe umkhosi besola inkohlakalo njengoba yakhishwa engakabikhona ungqongqoshe kulo mnyango. Kuthiwa yakhishwa ngesikhathi kumatasa nezingxoxo zokubumba uhulumeni wokubambisana kwamaqembu ahlukene.Okhulumela i-DA, uNksz Karabo Khakhau, uthe bayasamukela lesi sinyathelo wathi akumele kube nomfundi ozolamba.Uveze ukuthi lolu hlelo lubaluleke kakhulu ngoba abanye abafundi kukhona ukudla abakutholayo ngosuku.“Kubalulekile ukuthi lolu hlelo luphumelele ngenxa yesimo sendlala esibhekene nezwe. Kucacile ukuthi ezinye izifundazwe ziyehluleka ukulawula ngendlela lolu hlelo ngakho kumele zisike iphethini kulezo ezenza kahle.” Okhulumela inhlangano ephakela izikole KwaZulu-Natal, i-NSNP Service Providers Association, uMnuz Thabang Mncwabe, usincomile isinyathelo sikaNksz Gwarube. Uthe bayakuchitha ukuthi uhlelo lunikwe inkampani eyodwa ezophakela izwe lonke.“Inhloso yalolu hlelo wukufukula abesifazane, abalimi nezinhlaka ezehlukene okubalwa nentsha. Sikhathazekile ngoba uhlelo olufuze lolu lwaba nezingqinamba esifundazweni umnyango wagcina ukhokhe imali enkulu.”Uthe bayakhathazeka uma umsebenzi omkhulu njengalo unikwa umuntu oyedwa.Lolu hlelo luhlomulisa abafundi abevile ku-9.6 million nsuku zonke.Esifundazweni inkampani eyodwa eyayithole lo msebenzi wokusabalalisa ukudla ezikoleni zesifundazwe, yabhekana nezingqinamba kwadingeka ukuthi umnyango ubuyele ohlelweni oludala lokuthi osonkontileka bazihambisele ukudla ngqo ezikoleni.Izinkinga zazifaka ukungafiki ngesikhathi kokudla ezikoleni eziningi.

KUNENGE abameli babasolwa ukuhlehliswa kokufakwa kwencwadi edlulisela icala lokubulawa kwephoyisa likaMasipala weTheku, eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini.NgoLwesibili, eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMlaza, bekulindeleke ukuthi lidluliselwe enkantolo enkulu icala lokubulawa kukaCaptain Thomas Zwelakhe Ntombela okwenzeka maphakathi nonyaka owedlule.Umufi wahlaselwa wadutshulwa esemzini wakhe ngoMeyi 3, nyakanye. Waphuthunyiswa eSiphingo Medical Towers nokuyilapho okwafike kwamenela khona.Ngemuva kokusocongwa kukaNtombela, kwaboshwa umkakhe, uNkk Faith Ntombela ongumsolwa wokuqala noMnuz Sithembiso Khumalo ongumsolwa wesibili onguthishanhloko wasesikoleni saKwaMaqumbi, KwaMaphumulo.Kwavela nokuthi bebesebenzisana nenkabi esatshwayo KwaZulu-Natal, uKhulani Cele ongumsolwa wesithathu kuleli cala.Umshushisi, uS Mohan, utshele inkantolo ukuthi ayikaphothulwa incwadi yokudlulisela ngokusemthethweni kwaleli cala eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini.Ucele iMantshi, uM Ngcobo, ukuba abanikeze esinye isikhathi sokuthi lokhu kwenzeke.Uthe ehlala phansi, kwasukuma u-Advocate Mdu Mvune omele uKhumalo, wakhwela wadilika kuMbuso ewusola ngokubambezela icala.Ulimise ngesihloko elokuthi lo mdlalo wokulitshaziswa kwaleli cala akasawuthandi nje nhlobo."Ngicela ukubuza ukuthi okwesingaki manje kuhlehliswa uma kufanele leli cala lidluliselwe eNkantolo eNkulu. Ngampela yini imbangela yalokhu?“ ebuza.Uthe ukulitshaziswa kwaleli cala akukho kuhle ngoba kuhambisana nokuthi abasolwa bayaphela ephakethini.Udalule ukuthi ube nengxoxo ende nomshushisi waseNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini, okunguyena ozobhekelela leli cala, u-Advocate Krishen Shah.Kunoma yini eyenzekayo, uthe kumele kube khona ukucatshangelwa kwalabo abathintekayo kuleli cala. Nommeli kaNkk Ntombela, u-Advocate Ashwin Rugbheer,  uhambe emagameni ka-Advocate Mvune.Uthe kukhona okumele kwenziwe ngoba akusamukelekile ukuhlehliswa kaningi uma sekufanele leli cala lidluliselwe phambili.Imantshi ithe icala lizobuyela enkantolo ngo-Ephreli 10. Yagcizelela ukuthi okokugcina ngci lihlehliswa.Abasolwa uNkk Ntombela nenkabi, uCele bafike beqashwe ngeso lokhozi yinqwaba yamaphoyisa abehlome ngezinhlokohlela zezibhamu.UNkk Ntombela ubebonakala ezikhululekile nje ngaphakathi enkantolo.

ABAHLAZIYI bezombusazwe sebexwayise ngokuthi kungaba nomthelela ukuxoshwa komunye wabaholi ababhalisa iqembu Umkhonto weSizwe kwikhomishini yezokhetho kuleli uma kungukuthi kukhona abazozwelana naye ngalesi sinqumo sokumkhomba indlela. Laba bahlaziyi bathi leli qembu lidinga wonke umuntu ukuthi abe yingxenye yalo ikakhulu njengoba lizobe liqala ukungenela ukhetho.Bakusho lokhu kulandela ukuxoshwa kukaKhumalo namanye amalungu amane, kungakapheli sikhathi esingakanani kwehliswe esikhundleni obezomela leli qembu kwesikandunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Nhlanhla Ngidi.UKhumalo ulele endaweni yesibili ohlwini lwabantu leli qembu elibajuba ePhalamende emva kokhetho.Isitatimende esikhishwe okhulumela iqembu, uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndhlela, siveze ukuthi uKhumalo nabanye abaholi okungoMnuz Ray Khumalo, Bheki Manzini, noNksz Lebo Moepeng noRochelle Davidson, sebekhonjwe indlela.“Emhlanganweni wabaholi bakazwelonke kuthathwe isinqumo sokuthi bakhonjwe indlela laba baholi. Lesi sinqumo sithathwe ngenxa yokuthi kunemizamo yalabo abafuna ukuthi lungabikhona uzinzo eqenjini kanti sithathwe ukuvikela bonke labo abafuna kube nezinguquko kuleli.” UNdhlela unxuse amalungu ukuthi athembe abaholi abamatasa nomsebenzi weqembu. Umhlaziyi uDkt Levy Ndou uthe kumele likhathazeke leli qembu ngokulahlekelwa abantu ngalesi sikhathi sokhetho.Uthe kuseva ukuthi leli qembu lingaxosha abantu ngoba libadinga kakhulu ukuze lenze umehluko okhethweni.“Kolunye uhlangothi, ngeke futhi kube kuhle ukuthi njengoba iqembu kumele libe nemigomo okumele liyilandele, bese kubakhona abazokwenza umathanda. Kumele ilandelwe imigomo ebekiwe emaqenjini kungabonakali ukuthi kukhona ukukhetha iphela emasini,” kusho uNdou. Omunye umhlaziyi uSolwazi Bheki Mngomezulu, uthe bangabakhona abazozwelana noKhumalo njengoba engumuntu owabhalisa iqembu.Uthe lokhu kungadala izinxushunxushu eqenjini wathi kodwa uma abantu bezochazelwa izizathu bazoqonda okwenzekayo.“Akumele kube nokukhetha iphela emasini, uma kukhona abanye abaholi abazosolwa ngokufanayo nabo kumele bakhonjwe indlela. Uma kunokungathembani eqenjini ngeke futhi ukwazi ukugcina abantu abanjalo ngoba kumele kube nemigomo ezolandelwa enhlanganweni,” kusho uMngomezulu.Ayiphumelelanga imizamo yokuxhumana noKhumalo, izolo njengoba ucingo lwakhe belukhala lungamukeli nemiyalezo.UKhumalo ubhalise leli qembu ngoSepthemba nyakenye, ngoDisemba owayengumengameli wezwe uJacob Zuma, wamemezela ukuthi uzolikhankasela.Muva nje, kuvele ukuthi uKhumalo wayethunywe nguZuma ukuthi abhalise leli qembu.Zimbuza izintatheli uKhumalo muva nje ngoqhekeko ngaphakathi eqenjini ngesikhathi kukhishwa isinqumo enkantolo yaseThekwini esachitha i-ANC mayelana nombango we-logo yaleli qembu, wathi izinkulumo ziyohlezi zikhona wathi abantu bafuna ukubona iqembu lihluleka.Waveza ukuthi izinkinga bayazilungisa.UZuma uhlezi ekuveza lapho ekhuluma khona namalungu eMK, ukuthi bazobasusa labo abagangayo eqenjini.Wathi nalabo abagaqele izikhundla ngeke balibone elidlalayo ngoba akuyona indawo yokudlalela kwiMK.Wabalula nokuthi okwamanje akekho umholi okhethiwe kodwa kusawubuholi besikhashana obubambile.Muva nje, nekhomishini yezokhetho isanda kuveza ukuthi yathola incwadi evela kwiMK, eyayiveza ukuthi sebushintshiwe ubuholi kwiMK, uZuma osehola leli qembu.

ZIGAWULWE zabekwa phakathi kwabameli be-ANC nabeqembu elisha uMkhonto weSizwe, elesekwa owayengumengameli uJacob Zuma. Kulindeleke ukuthi benze izethulo zabo ngombango wegama nokuyicala elibhekwe ngabomvu.UMkhonto weSizwe wethulwe wuZuma ngoDisemba nyankenye eGauteng, wathi yilona qembu azoleseka akasayingeni eye-ANC ngoba isishintshile. Lokhu akwehlanga kahle kuKhongolose njengoba umangalele leli qembu eNkantolo yezoKhetho ikhala ngokuthi isebenzise igama lombutho wawo wezempi. I-ANC ikhala ngokuthi i-IEC bekungafanele ibavumele babhalise iqembu.I-IEC phambilini iphawulile ngalolu daba ithe iqembu libhaliswe ngendlela efanele kwalandelwa yonke imigudu. Kulindeleke ukuthi udaba lungene eNkantolo yezokhetho eBloemfontein, eFree State.Amacala ombango ahlukene kabili kukhona leli elingena ngoLwesibili bese kuba khona lapho okuzobangwa khona uphawu loMkhonto weSizwe nokuwudaba oluzongena eThekwini.Kwenzeka konke lokhu nje kulungiselelwa ukhetho lukazwelonke oluzoba ngoMeyi 29 nonyaka. Umholi wesikhashana wentsha yeMK uBonginkosi Khanyile usanda kushwabula ngokuthi uma iMK ingekho okhethweni ngeke kuvotwe.Khonamanjalo kusalindwe abe-IEC ukuthi bacubungule amagama abantu abazomela amaqembu bese kuphuma isimemezelo ngokuthi bakhona yini abachithwayo.

ZIHLABANA amalunda ngoMsombuluko eNkantolo yezoKhetho, phakathi komholi weMK uMnuz Jacob Zuma, noMnuz Jabulani Khumalo ababanga ubuholi beqembu. INkantolo yezoKhetho ezinze eBloemfontein, eFree State, isebenza izindaba eziphathelene nokhetho kuphela.UKhumalo owabhalisa iqembu, ufake udaba enkantolo ecela ukuthi kuchithwe uZuma kubuyiselwe yena njengomholi.UZuma umemezele iMK ngoDisemba nyakenye wathi uzoyikhankasela futhi ayivotele. Wathi akasayingeni eye-ANC. Kuhambe kwavela ukuthi uZuma usebhaliswe njengomholi kwi-IEC, kwaphuma uKhumalo.UZuma uhambe waze wafakwa waba wubuso beqembu emaphepheni okuvota okungenwe ngawo okhethweni. Kuhambe kwavela ukuthi uKhumalo uxoshiwe eqenjini kodwa yena ekuphikisa lokho.UKhumalo wayibhalela i-IEC eyicela ukuthi isuse uZuma njengomholi ifake yena kodwa yamchitha. I-IEC yathi ime ngencwadi kaKhumalo owayibhalela eyicela ukuthi ifake uZuma njengomholi.I-IEC yathi umuntu ezomlalela nguZuma ngoba nguyena umholi weMK futhi ayingene embangwnei wezikhundla ngaphakathi.UKhumalo ubelele isibili ohlwini lweMK lwabaya ePhalamende, elandela ngemuva kuZuma obephezulu eqhulwini. UZuma uchithwe yinkantolo ohlwini lwasePhalamende nokusho ukuthi izikhala ezivulekile esakhe nesikaKhumalo.UKhumalo ofake isimangalo enkantolo umile ekutheni nguyena umholi osemthethweni weMK. UKhumalo ukuqinisekisile ukuthi udaba lwakhe luzongela eNkantolo ngoMsombuluko lapho oluzolalelwa khona.Kulindeleke ukuthi abameli bakaKhumalo benze izethulo phambi kwamajaji bawachazele ukuthi kungani efuna ukubiyiselwa eqenjini njengomholi.IMK selokhu imenyezelwe ibigqigqa ezinkantolo ivika izagila ezivela kwi-ANC. I-ANC yamangalela iMK iyisola ngokweba igama layo kodwa yafika yanqoba iMK enkantolo.Kuphinde kwavela elinye icala elangena eNkantolo eNkulu eThekwini, kubangwa uphawu lweMK nakhona futhi i-ANC yakhala ngaphansi.Kwenzeka konke lokhu nje iMK igila izimanga okhethweni oluqhubekayo njengoba kusabalwa amavoti.

IZIKHALO ngokuhanjiswa kwezidingo kubantu nemibhikisho yamalungu omphakathi ekhala ngokugqoza kwentuthuko, kuthiwa ngezinye zezimbangela eziholele ekutheni uMnyango wokuBusa ngokuBambisana neNdaba zoMdabu KwaZulu-Natal umemezele umlekeleli kuMasipala Umdoni ngenhloso yokuwutakula.UMphathiswa walo mnyango uMfundisi Thulasizwe Buthelezi, kuthe izolo wamemezela uMnuz Dhanpalan Devaraj Naidoo njengomlekeleli, emva kokuthi kuthiwa isigungu esiphezulu kuhulumeni wesifundazwe sivumelene ngokuthi ufakwe ngaphansi kwesigaba somthetho u-154(1) woMthethosisekelo, olawula ukuthi kulekelelwe umasipala okubonakala ukhungethwe yizingqinamba.Ethula uNaidoo, uButhelezi umchaze njengonamava adingekayo njengoba ethe uneminyaka eyevile ku-30 esebenza komasipala okubalwa owesifunda Ugu noMdoni.“Kuke kwaba nemibhikisho kulo masipala abantu bekhala ngokugqoza kwentuthuko, ukuntuleka kwamanzi, amaholo angefani kubasebenzi nokunye. Isigungu esiholwa wuNdunankulu uMnuz Thami Ntuli sithathe isinqumo sokuthi uhulumeni wesifundazwe ungenele kulo masipala ngaphansi kwesigaba somthetho 154 (1). U-Naidoo usemnkantshubomvu emsebenzini othinta omasipala ngakho amava akhe awangabazeki,” kusho uButhelezi.Uthe lo masipala ukwabahamba phambili kwezokuvakasha ngakho kumele uphathwe ngendlela kuphinde kuhanjiswe izidingo kubantu okuyilokho abatshalizimali abafuna ukukubona.Umasipala uphethwe yi-ANC okuthe ngokhetho lohulumeni basemakhaya ngo-2021, yathola izihlalo ezingu-18.UButhelezi obehambisana neMeya uNkk Mbali Cele-Luthuli, uthe ukungenela kwesigungu esiphezulu sikahulumeni wesifundazwe kwamukelwe ngezandla ezimhlophe yiwona wonke amaqembu.Kwenzeka lokhu nje ezinyangeni ezimbili ezedlule i-DA beyihlabe ikhwelo ifuna kufakwe lo masipala ngaphansi kweso lomlawuli, ngokwesigaba somthetho u-139(1)Phakathi kwezinto leli qembu ebelikhala ngazo, ukugqoza kokuhanjiswa kwezidingo nokungalungiswa kwengqalasizinda.Okhethweni lokuchibiyela ku-ward 15 kuwo lo masipala obelungenyanga edlule, i-DA iyibuyisile le ward njengoba yayinqobe ngo-2021.

KULEZI zinsuku abantu abaningi bayazifela ngokuba nesikhumba esibusheshelezi esikhazimulayo abaningi abakubiza nge-glow.Ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kunamakhasi amaningi aluleka ngezinto ongazisebenzisa uma ufuna ukuba nesikhumba esinje, kusukela ekususeni izinduna, amabala, nokukhanyisa isikhumba esinezisihla.Abantu basebenzisa izinto eziningi ukuze babe ne-glow njengokuphuza amaphilisi athile nokugcoba kodwa muva nje abasendimeni yokuzicwala bathi indlela engenisile yokuzicwala yokwenza isikhumba sibe bushelelezi ukusetshenziswa kwamavithamini angangeni ngomlomo kodwa afakwa ngemijovo emincane kujovwe isikhumba okwaziwa nge-micro-needling,ebuye yaziwe nge-collagen induction therapy.Kule ndlela kusetshenziswa izinaliti ezincane ezikwi-micro needling pen. Phakathi kwezinto ezenziwa ile ndlela yokuzinakekela  ukwenza isikhumba sibe bushelelezi, ukususa izibazi, ukusiza isikhumba ukuthi sikwazi ukumunca masinyane imithi yokwelapha isikhumba, ukhilimu wokugcoba noma ukusikhuthaza ukuthi sikwazi ukukhiqiza i-collagen ngokwaso.UNksz Philile Ngcobo wenkampani ecwala isikhumba kusetshenziswa izindlela ezintsha kuzo okukhona nayo imicro-needling, iSkinPlus,  uthe ezinalitini ezincane ezingena esikhunjeni kusuke kunengxube yamavithamini ahambisana nokuthi umuntu ufuna ukwenziwani nokuthi ufuna ukuzuzani." Kunamavithamini afanayo nalawa abantu abawaphuza ngomlomo, umehluko ukuthi wona angena ngqo esikhunjeni. Le ndlela yokwelapha noma ukuzicwala isingenisile nakwabamnyama abayiqondayo ukuthi isebenza kanjani. Iningi eliyisebenzisayo lineminyaka ephakathi kuka-20 kuya ku-30 bayisebenzisela ukuthi babe nesikhumba esibushelelezi," kusho uNksz Ngcobo.Uthe kunelinye iqembu elineminyaka engaphezulu kwengu-40 eliyisebenzisela ukuthi isikhumba salo singagugi ngokushesha ngoba kule minyaka isikhumba  esisebusweni sisuke sesiqala ukuthamba ngenxa yokuhamba kweminyaka." Kunabantu abafuna ukuthi bahlale bebukeka bebasha nabo bayisebenzisa kakhulu imicro -needling," kusho yena.Uthe lolu hlobo lokuzicwala alubizi kangako, kuya ngokuthi kufakwe maphi amavithamini emjoveni."Kunezindawo ezenza lolu hlobo lokuzicwala ngemali eqala ku-R350. Uma usaqala kudingeka ukuthi uye kanye noma kabili ngesonto. Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi uyisebenzisa ugcina usuya kanye ngenyanga noma kanye ezinyangeni ezintathu kuye ngokuthi usebenzisa maphi amavithamini," kuchaza uNksz NgcoboUqhube wathi into enhle ngalolu hlobo lokuzicwala ukuthi lulungele zonke izinhlobo zesikhumba futhi abukho ukungozi obungakanani kukho ngoba kufana nokuphuza amavithamini."Abanye baye bathi bezwa ubuhlungu esikhumbeni esiphongweni nasekhaleni, uma umpofu ubuso buba bomvu  ngesikhathi uqeda ukwenza kodwa uma unesikhumba esizothile akubi khona okubonakalayo,"  kusho yena.

IHHOVISI likaMengameli lithi awehle amaphaphu asisibi isimo kuNgqongqoshe kaGesi uDkt Kgosientsho Ramakgopa owehlelwe yingozi yemoto.IHhovisi likaMengameli lithi uRamakgopa ube sengozini ephuma eNorth West eya eGauteng nabaqaphi bakhe. Isitatimende sikhomba ukuthi nakuba ithintekile imoto ebinongqongqoshe  kodwa akalimalanga.“Bonke abebesemotweni baphuthunyiswe esibhedlela beyoxilongwa kodwa uNgqongqoshe udedeliwe akalaliswanga esibhedlela,’’ kusho isitatimende.Bathe uNgqongqoshe usesimeni esikahle futhi ufisele bonke abathintekile ukululama ngokushesha. Izikhulu zikahulumeni ezigadwayo sezivamile ukuba sezingozini zomgwaqo. Owayeyiphini likamengameli uMnuz David Mabuza waphuma kukubi emotweni ehlelwe yingozi.Owayengumengameli uJacob Zuma usanda kuba sengozini yemoto lapho omunye umshayeli kuthiwa washayisa izimoto zakhe. Lo mshayeli waboshwa wavela enkantolo ngecala lokushayela budlabha.UDkt Ramakgopa uqokelwe esikhundleni ngoMashi ngonyaka odlule kwathiwa uzobhekana ngqo nenkinga kagesi.Kwaba nomsindo omkhulu ngokuqokwa kwakhe amaqembu aphikisayo ethi  kwandiswa ongqongqoshe mahhala nje. Bekuqala emlandweni kahulumeni wakuleli ukuthi kube nongqongqoshe kagesi.Kwenzeka konke lokhu nje kusanconywa ukuthi ukucinywa kukagesi kusamile.

KUDUMA amakhanda emndenini wakwaNgubane, eMabomvini, eMsinga, ngenxa yokubhujelwa wumuzi, okhongeleke kwiqukubula lomlilo ongaziwa ukuthi ushiswe wubani, kwasha uR13 000 wemali yestokofela somama bendawo ebithukuswe kuwona. Lilandisa Isolezwe Ngempelasonto ngokubehlele ilungu lomndeni elihlala eFree State ngokufunda, uNksz Londeka Ngubane, uthe lesi sigameko senzeke kuleli sonto.“Kuthiwa kuqubuke umlilo wequbula kwathi ngenxa yomoya obunamandla, umlilo wathungeleka ngokushesha, wafinyelela ekhaya. Kushe izindlu ezintathu eziwolawondi okuhlala kuzona umama nezingane zakwethu eziyisikhombisa,” usho kanje.Eqhuba, uthe kusize ukuthi bekusasekuseni, wunina obesele yedwa ekhaya, izingane zisesikoleni, wakwazi ukuphulukundlela ukuzisindisa engozini yomlilo. Nokho ngenxa yobukhulu bomlilo, zishe zaphela izindlu zakubo ezintathu nempahla ebiphakathi.“Kushe cishe yonke impahla ebisendlini, kwasha ngisho imali engaphezudlwana kukaR13 000 yestokofela ebigcinwa wumama ekhaya, eyehlukaniswa ekupheleni konyaka namakhosikazi endawo,” kusho uNksz Ngubane.Leli phephandaba liyibonile ividiyo ekhombisa kusha lezi zindlu ezingolawondli, zivutha umlilo ngaphandle nangaphakathi, impahla ebiphakathi ingasabonakali, isiwumlotha. Kusale indlu yomxhaso nezindonga zenye eyakhiwayo.Uthe ukhathazekile futhi kumphatha kabi ukwanda kwezigameko ezinje zokuqubuka kwemililo yequbula endaweni, nokugcina kungaziwanga ukuthi kuqalwe wubani, ekubeni kube kuyiqeda imizi yabantu endaweni yangakubo.“Nakuba akulalwa phandle nje, sisizwe wukuthi kusale indlu eyodwa yomxhaso ebilala izingane nosekuzophoqa ukuthi kunqwatshelwane kuyona. Siyishumi uma sekubuye mina ekhaya nobaba osebenzela eDundee,” usho kanje.Unxuse noma wubani ongakwazi ukubasiza ukufaka isandla ukuze bakwazi ukuthola izimpahla nokudla ukuqhuba impilo.Kuthintwa okhulumela uMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu esifundazweni, uMnuz Senzelwe Mzila, ukuzwa ukuthi usezwile yini ngalolu daba, ucele ukuthi athunyelelwe imininingwane ephelele ukuze abone ukuthi bangangenelela kanjani.
