Baphenduke ondinga sithebeni abomndeni obuqashise osolwa ngokubulala ingane (7), ngesikhathi beshiselwa umuzi eDumisani Makhaye, eMpangeni, ngoLwesine.Owomndeni, uNksz Samke Khumalo, udalule ukuthi emva kwalesi sehlo, baphoqelekile ukuthi bayokhosela kwezinye izindawo eziphephile.Echaza ngesigameko, uthe senzeke bengekho ekhaya.“Bengisemaphoyiseni, ngashayelwa ucingo ngomunye umngani wami ethi ekhaya kuyasha,” kusho uNksz Khumalo.Uveze ukuthi umuzi wakubo uke wagadwa ngamaphoyisa usuku lonke emva kokutholakala kwesidumbu sikamufi, umphakathi ufuna ukuwucekela phansi.“Babewujikijela ngamatshe, bezama ukuphihliza amawindi,” kusho uNksz Khumalo.Uthe kwangenelela amaphoyisa, ebakhuza ukuthi umnikazi womuzi akanacala futhi konke akuyekelwe ezandleni zawo.“Sibona ukuthi anele ahamba, baqala phansi,” kusho uNksz Khumalo.Usole owesifazane ambize ngegama ethi wuye ophehle udweshu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.Uthe lona wesifazane ubesabalalisa ulwazi olungelona, ethi ingane iqotshiwe yenziwa izicucu, nokuyinto athi igovuze umphakathi, baqala phansi badinwa.Uveze ukuthi umsolwa owayengasolisi, wayedabukisa njengawo wonke umuntu ngesikhathi kucingwa ingane.Uthe kwaze kwaba yintambama lapho amthumelela khona umyalezo, oyindida, naphuza ukuwubona ngenxa yokucisha kweselula, iphelelwe yi-battery.Uthe bekusaphele izinyanga ezintathu lona wesilisa eyisiqashi kubo, nokho wathi ubevame ukuchitha isikhathi esiningi emzini wentombi yakhe eyinesi.Uthe bekungakaze kube khona okusolisayo ngaye njengoba ebekhonze ngisho ezakubo (kaSamke) izingane ezineminyaka emine (eyintombazane) neyishumi (engumfana).Umthombo weSolezwe  uveze ukuthi umphakathi ushise umuzi emva kokuzibuza imibuzo engaphenduleki ngesigameko.“Kuningi umphakathi ozibuza khona. Isibonelo nje, ukuthi umastende waze nini ukuthi kunesidumbu sengane emzini wakhe?” kusho umthombo.Uthe umastende wathi ingane yaphuma yahamba emva kokuyithuma amaphilisi ezinhlungu.“Umbuzo uthi, uma iphume yahamba, uyithole kanjani pho umfana ohlala ngasesangweni? Kunokushayisana kwezikhathi kusuka ngesikhathi umfana azicebe ngaso u-06.50pm ntambama kuze kuba umama (umastende) ubikela amaphoyisa ngoba esewabona,” kusho umthombo.Okhulumela umndeni kamufi, uMnuz Sandile Mhlongo, uthe akukho angakuphawula ngokushiswa komuzi ngaphandle kokuthi ababandakanyeki, isigameko senzeke bebematasa namalungiselelo omngcwabo.Umufi uZanokuhle Khumalo (7) ungcwatshwe ngeSonto. Waduka ngoMsombuluko, evakashele kwamastende. Isidumbu sakhe esasixhishwe kuplasitiki satholwa ngaphansi kombhede endlini yesiqashi, esagcina siboshwa, sesibalekile.

UMENGAMELI uCyril Ramaphosa  uthi kuningi okusengenziwa ukuqinisekisa ukuvikelwa kwamalungelo abantu baseNingizimu Afrika.URamaphosa uthe yize kukuningi okwenziwe kule minyaka engu-30 eyedlule, lide ibanga okusafanele lihanjwe.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi evula ingqungquthela ebibizelwe ukuzobhunga udaba lwamalungelo abantu.URamaphosa uthe inkohlakalo nokungahanjiswa kwezidingo emphakathini  kuphazamisa imizamo yokuvikela amalungelo abantu.“Siyavuma ukuthi kuningi okusadinga ukwenziwa. Inkohlakalo nokwehluleka komasipala ukuhambisa izidingo, kubukela phansi imizamo yokuvikela isithunzi sabantu bakuleli.“Sonke sihlalelwe umsebenzi omkhulu wokuvikela amalungelo abantu. Abantu bakithi kufanele bathole zonke izidingo zabo. Yinde indlela esasihlalele. Sineminyaka engu-30 sathola inkululeko, nesayithola emva kweminyaka eminingi siphila ngaphansi kohulumeni wobandlululo,” kusho uRamaphosa.Uthe eminyakeni engu-30 eyedlule kuningi okwenziwe ukuvikela amalungelo abantu nesithunzi sabo kule lizwe.Eminyakeni eyedlule uthe sasaziwa njengezwe elicindezela abantu, kodwa manje saziwa ngokuhlonipha amalungelo abo. Kufanele siziqhenye ngebanga eselihanjiwe.Uqhubeke ngokuthi ngaphansi kukahulumeni wentando yeningi kushaywe imithetho eminingi ethuthukisa abesifazane.“Namhlanje baningi abesifazane abaphethe izikhundla eziphezulu kuhulumeni nasezinkampanini ezizimele. Ngesikhathi sikahulumeni wobandlululo abesifazane babecindezelekile kakhulu. Miningi imithetho esiyishayile evikela abesifazane nezingane odlameni lwezobulili, ” kusho umengameli.Udalule nokuthi ingxenye enkulu yesabelomali sikahulumeni iya ekuvikeleni amalungelo abantu.Uthe baningi abantu manje asebethola ithuba lokufunda, abakwazi nokusebenzisa imitholampilo, ezikoleni kutholakala ukudla, futhi baningi abantu abathola izibonelelo.Uyivumile eyokuthi izibonelelo azanele, abantu badinga imisebenzi, uthe bayazama ukudala amathuba emisebenzi.Uthe isinqumo abasithatha sokweseka abantu basePalestine ngesikhathi kusuka impi eGaza ngoba bayazi ukuthi kunzima kangakanani ukuphila ngaphansi kukahulumeni wengcindezelo.Elakuleli lamangalela elakwa-Israel enkantolo yamacala amazwe omhlaba, liyisola ngokusoconga abantu basePalestine kulempi esidlule nemiphefumulo engaphezu kuka-30 000.“Nathi siphilile ngaphansi kukahulumeni wengcindezelo iminyaka eminingi. Maningi amazwe asesekela, silwela inkululeko. Inkululeko yethu kobe ayikagcwali kahle uma abantu basePalestine bengakakhululeki,” kuphetha uRamaphosa.

ISIKHULU enkampanini yamaselula iVodacom, uNksz Pinky Vythilingam, esiwufakazi ecaleni lokufa kukaSenzo Meyiwa, sithi ukhona owayesebenzisa iselula kamufi esebulewe.UMeyiwa, owayengunozinti we-Orlando Pirates neBafana Bafana, wadutshulwa wabulawa ekubo kwentombi yakhe, uKelly Khumalo, eVosloorus, eGauteng, ngo-2014.Bahlanu abalisa abashushiswayo uMbuso okholwa wukuthi bathengwa bamkakisa okwenyamazane uMeyiwa bamjuqa. Icala lisesigabeni lapho uMbuso weneka khona ubufakazi ozimisele ukugojela ngabo abamangalelwa.UMshushisi woMbuso, u-Advocate Ronnie Sibanda, nguyena obeqhuba ufakazi ngemibuzo ngesikhathi kufikwa odabeni lweselula kaMeyiwa.UNksz Vythilingham uthe ubufakazi buveza ukuthi kunomuntu owenza ikhadi elisha leselula kaMeyiwa ngo-Okthoba 27 okuwusuku olulandela abulawa ngalo. Uthe kodwa akazi ukuthi wubani lowo muntu.“Lokhu kwenziwa esitolo esiseBenmore Gardens, ikhadi elisha lase lifakwa kwenye iselula, iNokia 3330 Classic. Kwashaywa izingcingo ezingu-63 ezaba yimpumelelo kusebenza lelo khadi,’’ kusho uNksz Vythilingham.Uthe ukuze umuntu akwazi ukwenza lolu shintsho kudingeka aphathe umazisi bese eveza ubufakazi bokuthi ikhadi leselula elakhe. Uthe kuphinde kudingeke nephepha lobufakazi bekheli ahlala kulona lowo muntu.UNksz Vythilingham uphinde waveza indaba kaKelly athe waxhumana nommangalelwa wesihlanu, uMnuz Fisokuhle Ntuli, ngaphambi kokubulawa kukaMeyiwa. Uthe ucingo lokuqala lwaba ngo-Agasti 2, 2014.Uthe olwesibili lwaba ngo-Okthoba 15, 2014 nokwaba yizinsuku ngaphambi kokujuqwa kukaMeyiwa. Ngesikhathi uNksz Vythilingham efakaza, kuvele ukuthi unomkhuhlane othanda ukumxina.Uthe esaqhubeka nokufakaza kwacaca ukuthi uxineka kakhulu kwavunyelwana ngokuthi icala liguqe. Kulindeleke ukuthi icala libuyele namuhla enkantolo.

KUNUKWA ikhansela ngowesilisa obesekuyophela inyanga yesithathu enyamalele, isidumbu okukholakala ukuthi ngesakhe esitholwe sesonakele silaxazwe emafusini agudle ujantshi phakathi kwamafemu, KwaSithebe eMandeni ngeledlule.UMnuz Siyabonga Makhoba (40) kuthiwa ubegcine ukubonwa ngoFebhuwari 7 kulo nyaka evakashele abangani bakhe.Isidumbu okukholakala ukuthi ngesakhe, kuthiwa sitholwe sisagqokiswe izimpahla ezifanayo nayenyamalale ezigqokile, sesingasabonakali kahle.Umndeni kaMakhoba usola ikhansela lenye yama-ward KwaSithebe, njengoba ngesikhathi edukile, bekunamahlebezi okumsongela.Lamahebezi alandele emva kokungavumelani ngemali ikhansela okwakumele liyikhokhele umufi ukuze acishe icala lokushaya, ukuzama ukubulala nokuthumba ayelithwese lona.Kusolakala ukuthi ikhansela lenza lokhu limsola ngokweba uthayela walo.Umfowabo kamufi uMnuz Mthoko Makhoba, elandisa Isolezwe uthe ngoNovemba nyakenye umsolwa nabangani bakhe bathumba umufi.Kuthiwa bamhudula ngemoto bembophe izandla nezinyawo bamshaya bemsola ngokuthi untshontshe uthayela, okuthe ngokuhamba kwesikhathi kwavela ukuthi awuthathwanga uyena.“Emva kwalokho sihlanganile, kuvulwe icala emaphoyiseni aseSundumbili, nokuthe ngoJanuwari 14,  ikhansela lahlangana nomndeni lifisa ukuthi kucishwe icala. “Umfowethu ufune u-R50 000 ngokulimala kwakhe, ikhansela lathi lingamkhokhela u-R25 000 kwagcina kungabonwanga ngaso linye, kwaba ukuthi umufi uyaqhubeka necala,” usho kanje.Uthe bezwe ngabathile ukuthi ikhansela lisonga ngokuthi ngeke liqedelwe umsebenzi yi “phara” lona.Kusaphele amasonto amathathu emva komhlangano, umufi wanyamalala njengoba isidumbu okusoleka ukuthi ngesakhe sitholwe ngeledlule.UMakhoba uphinde wagxeka umphenyi wecala ebelithweswe ikhansela ngokuhudula izinyawo ekuqoqeni ubufakazi njengoba ifomu lokulimala i- J88,  (Isolezwe elilibonile) likhombisa ukuthi umufi wayelimele kabi ngesikhathi evulela umsolwa icala.Uveze ukuthi batshelwe ukuthi icala elithweswe ikhansela lihoxisiwe ngenxa yokushoda kobufakazi, kanti lolu lwazi lufinyelele emndenini umufi esanyamalele isidumbu singakatholwa.Yize umndeni uthumelele intatheli yonke imininingwane ngokubikwa kwecala elithweswe ikhansela lokushaya, ukuthumba nokuzama ukubulala umufi, okubalwa nenombolo yecala elivulwe esiteshini samaphoyisa eSundumbili, amaphoyisa aqinisekise ukutholwa kwezinsalela zesidumbu somuntu.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uConstable Thenjiswa Ngcobo, uthe amaphoyisa aseNyoni avule idokodo lophenyo ngokufa komuntu.

UNDUNANKULU waKwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube ukhuthaze izakhamizi ukuthi zingavumi kube nabantu abasebenzisa ugesi wezinyokanyoka ukuze zigweme ukuthi ucishwe.Ukhulume kanje eseNtshanga, eThekwini ngoLwesibili ebusuku ehlangene nomphakathi.Ubekade ebungaza nawo ukuthi sekuyakhanya emuva kwesikhathi esiwunyaka nezinyanga ezine lendawo ingenawo ugesi.Kuthiwa lokhu kubangelwe wukuqhuma kwesiphehlamandla sikagesi ngenxa yabantu ababekade bezixhumele ugesi ngendlela engekho emthethweni. Kuvela ukuthi i-Eskom, okuyiyona ephakela ugesi lendawo, iyalele umuzi ngamunye ukuthi ukhokhe uR3 000 ukuze kulungiswe isiphehlimandla sikagesi ebesicekeleke phansi.“Umphakathi akufanele wenze izinto ezingekho emthethweni. Kukhona abantu abawukhokhelayo ugesi bese kuba khona labo abawuntshontshayo.“Ukukhokhiswa kwabo, (okwenziwe yi-Eskom), sekuzodala ukuthi wonke umuntu azibophezele, angavumi kube nabantu abawuntshontshayo ngoba naye yimali yakhe lena ayikhokhile, kuthengwa itransformer,” kusho uNkk Dube-Ncube.Uxwayise wathi umphakathi uzoba nenkinga uma ungayinakekeli ingqalasizinda yawo.Uveze ukuthi i-Eskom inomgomo wokuthi uma kusha i-transformer yenza uphenyo ithole ukuthi bangaki abantu abasebenzisa ugesi.Kuthiwa emuva kwalokho ibe isilungiswa kodwa uma iphinda isha, kumele umphakathi ukhokhe.“Siwuhulumeni kube nomnikelo esiwenzayo ukuhlangabezana nomphakathi (waseNtshanga) ngoba sebekhombisile ukuthi bazimisele ukukhokhela ugesi futhi angabi khona owebayo.“I-Eskom ibatshelile ukuthi uma iphinda isha i-transformer, abayisebenzisayo bazokhokha ngokuphindwe kabili imali yokuyilungisa,”kusho uNdunankulu.USomlomo kaMasipala waseThekwini, uMnuz Thabani Nyawose uthe indawo yaseNtshanga ingezinye ezihlinzekwa ugesi i-Eskom ngakho kuba lukhuni ukuthi umkhandlu ungenelele uma kunezinkinga zawo.UNyawose uthe ukujabulele ukungenelela kukaNdunankulu noNgqongqoshe kaGesi (Dkt Kgosientsho Ramokgopa) enkingeni ebikhungethe lomphakathi.Uveze ukuthi ziningi ezinye izindawo ezinenkinga efuze eyaseNtshanga okubalwa kuzona eNtshongweni, eMgababa, eMagabheni, eLovu nezinye ezihlinzekwa ugesi i-Eskom.“I-Eskom ikhala ngokuthi abantu bayawuntshontsha ugesi, abawukhokheli. Siwumasipala siqale umkhankaso wokufundisa abantu ngobubi bokungawukhokheli ugesi.”Sinomsebenzi omkhulu wokufundisa abantu ngokubaluleka kokukhokhelwa kwezidingongqangi zikahulumeni,” kusho uNyawose.Uthe banethemba lokuthi nakulezi ndawo ezingenawo ugesi undunankulu uzobasiza ekutheni ubuye ngokushesha.

KUNXENXWE amakhosi ukuba alekelele ngokudayisela osomabhizinisi abanezihlelo  zokwakha izinxanxathela zezitolo umhlaba ukuze kulethwe umnotho ezindaweni  zomphakathi.Amalungu omphakathi waseHluhluwe nakwaHlabisa asabeke ithemba lawo ezitolo ezisedolobheni kuphela. Lokhu kudalwa ukuthi yizo kuphela ezikhona kule ndawo nokuphoqa ukuthi ahambe ibanga elide uma efuna ukukuthenga.Emcimbini wokuthuthukiswa komphakathi obusezinkundleni yezemidlalo, eCwakeme, KwaHlabisa kwethulwe izinhlelo zakamumva zomkhandlu. Ngazo kuhloswe ukunqanda usizi  olukhungethe amalungu omphakathi wakulezi zindawo.Phakathi kwalezo ezibalulwe kulo mcimbi kubalwa ukwakhiwa kwezinxanxathela zezitolo eHluhluwe nakaHlabisa.Ikhansela lendawo uMnuz Jeremiah Msizana obengomunye wabebehambele umcimbi, uthe umphakathi ungakuthokozelela kakhulu ukubona kusondela izinxanxathela zezitolo emakhaya ngoba kungenza isimo sempilo sibe ngcono kakhulu.“Njengamanje azikho izindawo ezidayiswayo emakhaya kodwa ezisadayisiwe ngezomkhandlu.  Yingakho- ke sicela kakhulu emakhosini ukuthi angenelele  ezinhlelweni zokudayiswa komhlaba odingwa osomabhizinisi abanezinhlelo zokuletha intuthuko emakhaya,” kusho uMsizana.Uthe ukudayiswa kwazo kuzolekelela kakhulu ekutheni kuthuthuke umphakathi futhi kuphucuzeke nesimo sempilo emakhaya.Imeya yaseBig 5 Hlabisa, uMnuz Comfort Nkosi, uthe umkhandlu  uhlose ukuqoqa uR2 million ngomhlaba ohlele ukuwudayisa.“Leyo mali iyosilekelela kakhulu ukubhekana nesikweletu sama- rates esingu R32 million,” kusho uKhumalo.Amalungu omphakathi abefike ngobuningi bawo kulo mcimbi abegqoke izikibha zeqembu le- IFP ebezibukeka zizintsha.Amanye awo abegqoke  amajazi abizwa ngezimpulampula ezinobuso bomholi we-IFP ongasekho uMangosuthu Buthelezi.Esangweni  lale nkundla yezemidlalo ubukhangwa yitende elincane le-IFP lapho abantu bebebhalisa kulo abanye bethatha nobulungu beqembu.Ilungu lomphakathi uNksz Balungile Ngema waseCwakeme ubonge ukuzisondeza kommkhandlu kubantu. Unxenxe iziphathimandla zezokuphepha ukuthi zilusukumele phezulu udaba lokulahleka kwezingane endaweni.“Okuningi kuhlukumeza thina singabesifazane futhi kubuhlungu ngoba namanje enye yezingane ayikatholakali,” kusho uNksz Ngema obekhala ngokunyamalala kwabantu endaweni ngenxa yobugebengu .

ZIKHATHAZEKILE izikhulu zoMnyango wezokuThutha KwaZulu-Natal ngokuthi njalo uma kunemicimbi emikhulu ehlanganisa izinkumbi zabantu kubakhona abantu abalimalayo.Lokhu kulandela ingozi yamabhasi okulimale kuyo inqwaba yamalungu e-IFP ngeSonto ekuseni abelibhekise eralini yaleli qembu enkundleni yemidlalo iMoses Mabhida eThekwini.Ngokwemibiko kuthiwa amabhasi amathathu abelibangise kule rali yokwethulwa komqulu wezethembiso zokhetho, ashayisane ngaseGingindlovu kuN2.Okhulumela uMnyango wezokuThutha uMnuz Kwanele Ncalane, uzwakalise ukukhathazeka ngezingozi ezibakhona uma kunemicimbi efuze le.Uthe abashayeli kumele bandiswe uma bezohamba amabanga amade.Uveze ukuthi abanye basuke sebekhathele bese kudaleka izingozi.“Sinxusa abahleli bemicimbi ukuthi baqinisekise ukuthi babili abashayeli abasuke bezoshintshana uma bezohamba amabanga amade ukuze baphumule. Abanye uthola ukuthi bahamba amabanga amade, abanye ngisho ebusuku ngakho basuke bekudinga ukuphumula.” Uthe akekho oshonile kule ngozi ngaphandle kwabalimele.Ngokombiko wabezimo eziphuthumayo bakwa-IPSS Medical Rescue, bangu-36 abalimale kule ngozi eyenzeke ngabo-9 ekuseni.Okhulumela abe-IPSS uNksz Samantha Meyrick, uthe bayisishiyagalombili abaphuthunyiswe esibhedlela, abanye belimele kanzima. Uthe abanye bebenemihuzukwana nje wathi abanye babalaphele endaweni yesehlakalo. I-ANC esifundazweni ifisele abalimele ukwelulama okusheshayo.Kwenzeka lokhu nje ngenyanga edlule kushone abalandeli be-ANC abayisishiyagalombili, ngesikhathi bephuma eralini yokwethulwa komqulu wezithembiso zokhetho eyayikule nkundla. Ibhasi yayilibangise eMpumalanga kanti ingozi yenzeka emgwaqweni uR33 eDumbe.NgoJanuwari kwashona abalandeli abayisithupha be-ANC ababeye emgubheni iJanuwari 8 eMpumalanga.Le ngozi yenzeka eLimpopo kanti ibhasi yayiya enkundleni yemidlalo iMbombela.

BAKHALA ngobunzima oMasipala baKwaZulu-Natal abathi bakweletwa yiminyango kahulumeni u-R3 billion. Usihlalo wenhlangano yomasipala, iSA Local Government (Salga) KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thami Ntuli uthe omasipala nabo sebephoqeleka ukutsheleka imali abazoyisebenzisa ngesikhathi besalinde ukuthi iminyango kahulumeni ibakhokhele.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma nabezindaba ngezinkinga ezikhungethe omasipala, izolo eThekwini.UNtuli uthe kungokokuqala emlandweni ukuthi  isikweletu seminyango kahulumeni sifike kuR3 billion.Iminyango ekweleta kakhulu owezeMpilo, owezeMfundo nowezeMisebenzi yoMphakathi.Isikweletu esikhulu esamanzi, kube esama-rates nesikagesi.Uthe sekuyinto eyejwayelekile ukuthi omasipala bazithole bephoqeleka ukudala izikweletu ngenxa yokwanda komkhuba wokungakhokhi ngesikhathi kweminyango kahulumeni.“Indlela omasipala abenza ngayo isabelomali sabo, basenza bebala nemali abasuke bezoyiqoqa. “Uma iminyango kahulumeni namabhizinisi behluleka ukukhokha ngesikhathi, kuphoqa omasipala ukuthi bayodala izikweletu ukuze kungaphazamiseki izinhlelo zentuthuko abasuke bezihlelile.”“Ukunyuswa kwemali ekhokhwa uma uboleka imali ifike ngesikhathi esinzima komasipala. Imali inyuswe ngesikhathi kunesidingo esikhulu komasipala ukuthi batsheleke imali ngenxa yokungakhokhi kweminyango kahulumeni.“Kuyasikhathaza ukuthi ayikaze yehliswe namanje imali ekhokhwa uma uboleka. Lesimo siphazamisa ukusebenza komasipala,” kusho uNtuli.Uqhubeke ngokuthi imali enkulu ekhokhwa uma kubolekwa, yenza kube nzima komasipala ukuyibuyusela.Isikhulu esiphezulu kwiSalga KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sabelo Gwala uthe sikhula ngamandla isikweletu seminyango kahulumeni.“Ngonyaka owedlule isikweletu besingu-R2,5 billion, manje esingaphezu kuka-R3 billion. Kuke kwakhona isikhathi lapho khona isikweletu besiphansi, singuR500 million.”“Uma omasipala bethi babasela izikweletu, bayaye batshelwe ukuthi imali inikezwe imikhandlu yabazali (ezikoleni).“Uma bethi bakhuluma nemikhandlu yabazali, imikhandlu yabazali, ibatshele ukuthi ayikayitholi imali. Yingakho- ke kwesinye isikhathi kuyaye kuze kuphoqe ukuthi omasipala bavale amanzi,” kuqhuba uGwala.Uthe bayayeseka imikhandlu evala amanzi eminyangweni kahulumeni ekweletayo.“Ayikho enye indlela omasipala abangenza ngayo ukuze bakwazi ukuqoqa izikweletu zabo,” ephetha.

LUSEYINZUKAZIKEYI olokuthola ummeli ephoyiseni likaMasipala weTheku elisolwa ngokugwaza libulale uzakwabo ebelithandana naye ngeledlule.Lokhu kuhlaluke izolo ngesikhathi livela eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini.UConstable Sizwe Ngema (27) kuthiwa wagwaza ephindelela uConstable Bianca Yolanda Khuzwayo (23) ngoMashi 31eflethini elisemgwaqweni uJoseph Nduli eThekwini.Umsolwa waqopha ivideo wayithumelela abambalwa abasondelene nomufi waphinde wayinameka ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.Ngesikhathi evela enkantolo kuqale kwavela ukuthi ukhona ummeli ozimele amtholile, okuthe sekufanele ammele, kwavela ukuthi ubuye wahoxa ngoba ubengakhokhelwe.UNgema ugcine etshela inkantolo ukuthi ubuyela esicelweni sakhe asenza ngeledlule sokufuna ummeli kahulumeni.Inkantolo enqume ukuthi lihlehliselwe u-Ephreli 15 icala, yathi uma esephinda evela enkantolo uNgema kuzobe kuzozwakala ukuthi isicelo sakhe basamukele yini abameli bakahulumeni.Ngesikhathi evela ngeledlule kwakugcine kungacacanga ukuthi usemisiwe yini emsebenzini noma cha.Kwathiwa ummeli kahulumeni angamthola uma eseyitholile incwadi emumisa emsebenzini, kwavela nokuthi uma engakayitholi, akangeni ohlwini lwabavumeleke ukuthola usizo lwabameli bakahulumeni.Ibigcwele phama inkantolo, kukhona amalungu omndeni kamufi, abenhlangano engenzinzuzo enikezela ngosizo lokwelulekwa ngengqondo iLifeLine, amalungu e-EFF nawomphakathi.Amalungu omndeni kamsolwa abengabonwa. Umsolwa ubebukeka edabukile, egqoke ijean, ishethi nejakhethi okushwabene.Ngesikhathi esehla ebuyela emgodini, uthe uyaqalaza lapho obekuhleli khona abantu abebehambele icala, wanxashelwa abantu abehlukene, abanye bembuza ukuthi usithathaphi isibindi sokulokhu eqalaza.Umndeni kamufi ubusasikhihla isililo. Kuzanywa ukukhuluma nomamncane wakhe, uNksz Nozipho Khuzwayo, izinyembezi zivele zagcwala amehlo wangakwazi nokukhipha izwi.Umamkhulu kaBianca, uNksz Mpume Khuzwayo, naye obebuye ahluleke ukuzibamba, zehle izinyembezi uthe namanje abakapholi ngento abayenziwe umsolwa.Ukhale ngokuthi nakho ukulokhu begqigqa ezinkantolo kubenza bangazizwa kahle.“Kusebuhlungu, angisiboni isidingo sokuthi silokhu sehla senyuka ezinkantolo ngoba uzivezile ngokwakhe ukuthi nguye umbulali,” kusho uNksz Khuzwayo zehla izinyembezi.Uthe akaqondi ukuthi yini ezolokhu iqulwa enkantolo ngoba abukho ubufakazi obudlula obokusabalalisa ivideo.“Bonke ubufakazi wazikhiphela yena. Angazi ukuthi yini ezolokhu ikhulunywa ezinkantolo,” kusho uNksz Khuzwayo.

KUSHODE ozogadla kuqala enkantolo emuva kokuklolodelana ngamazwi phakathi kwamalungu omndeni wesosha elisolwa ngokubulala nabomndeni kamufi.Isosha loMbutho wezeMpi eNingizimu Afrika uMnuz Lwanda Zungu, licele ibheyili eNkantolo yeMantshi yasePinetown.Njengenjwayelo ulandwe ezitokisini wangena enkantolo wahlala phansi ebhokisini labasolwa.Kube sekungena abantu abazothamela icala. Kubona bekuhamba phambili udadewabo kaZungu, uNksz Lwanele Zungu nabomndeni wakhe.Kube sekungena abomndeni kamufi, uNkk Tania Msane-Zungu.Omunye wabakubo kamufi bekuthi akamudle amqede uNksz Zungu, wabanjwa abebehamba naye wamkhumbuza ukuthi kusenkantolo lapha angazithola esejeziswa kanzima.Yomibili lemindeni eganiselene ibe isihlala ngokwehlukana emabhentshini enkantolo kubonakala ukuthi ithibelene.Ummeli kaZungu, u-Advocate Muzi Mzelemu ubize uNksz Zungu ezokwethula ubufakazi.UZungu uvele wagebisa ikhanda wase echiphiza izinyembezi ngesikhathi ezwa ukuthi idonsa kanzima indodakazi yakhe kusukela aboshwa ngoJanuwari.UNksz Zungu uthe uyapatanisa ukuze ilale idlile futhi ikwazi ukuya esikoleni indodakazi yesosha eneminyaka engu-13.UZungu ugqunywe ejele laseWestville lapho etoke khona ngezinsolo zokuthi wadubula amahlandla ayisithupha wabulala inkosikazi yakhe, abanezingane ezimbili nayo, uNkk Tania Msani-Zungu.“U…(edalula igama lengane) akayijwayele impilo ayiphilayo manje yokuthi amukele ukuthi into ethile ayifunayo ngeke akwazi ukuyithola.“Unokuzivalela yedwa endlini athi ukhumbule uyise. Ufeyilile nasesikoleni nge-term yokuqala nonyaka.“Kunzima ngoba nonina wayo (ingane) engasekho emhlabeni. ULwanda ubemthanda futhi embiza ngontombikayise u(ebiza igama lengane),” kusho uNksz Zungu.Lowesifazane utshele iMantshi yeNkantolo yasePinetown, uGwendolyn Robinson ukuthi unezingane zakhe ezintathu azikhulisayo ngoR4 420 awuhola lapho esebenza khona nawo ongenele ukwenza zonke izidingo zomndeni.Uqhube wathi ubuye ahlephule emalini yesondlo sikahulumeni sabantwana bakhe ukuze enze izidingo zengane yesosha athe izindleko zayo zilinganiselwa ngaphezu kukaR3 000 ngenyanga.Ingane obekukhulunywa ngayo ekaZungu ayithola entombini, engazalwa wuNkk Msane-Zungu abanezingane ezimbili zabafana naye.Lezo izingane zabafana kuthiwa zathathwa abaKwaMsane emuva kwesigameko.“Ingane yashonelwa unina wayo ngo-Ephreli ngonyaka odlule. Emuva kwalokho ihlale noLwanda noTania emzini wabo. Selokhu kwenzeka isigameko isihlala nami,” kusho uNksz Zungu.Uveze ukuthi lentombazane yesosha iqale yafeyila uGrade 7 ngoDisemba, kumanje ihamba udokotela oyeluleka ngengqondo futhi idinga imishanguzo yokuthithibalisa i-sinus ewufuzo kulomndeni.Lo wesifazane uchaze ubhuti wakhe njengomuntu onenhliziyo enhle, obewusizo kubo bonke futhi ewunakekela umndeni wakhe.Uthe bangamemukela ngaphandle kokumbeka amabala emndenini uma ngabe inkantolo imnikeza ibheyili.Umshushisi u-Ehud-Jadon Francke ube esetshela imantshi ukuthi uzogadla ngencwadi efungelwe yomphenyi wecala.Lencwadi iphonselwe inselelo uMzelemu wathi uyacindezelwa uZungu, abukho ubulungiswa kokwenziwa umbuso obavukele esiswini njengotshwala uletha lencwadi abebeqala ukuyibona izolo.Ube esefaka isicelo esiphuthumayo sokuba avunyelwe uZungu ukuba agibele ebhokisini labasolwa ukuze aziphendulele kwasolwa ngakho kulencwadi.Uthe isicelo sebheyili akumele sibe njengomdlalo we-chess lapho kugodlelwana khona ulwazi. Imantshi ithe izokwahlulela namuhla ngalokho.

KUQUBUKE impi yamazwi phakathi kwamalungu ekomiti lemigomo yePhalamende. Bekudingidwa ngokungasukunyelwa kwezinsolo zenkohlakalo ezibhekiswe kuSomlomo wePhalamende, uNkk Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula.Amalungu aphikisayo abuze ukuthi yiziphi izinyathelo ezizothathelwa uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula, ngezinsolo zokuthi wagwazelwa cishe ngoR2 million? Kuthi imali wayinikezwa ngomunye usonkontileka owayethole ithenda emnyangweni wezokuVikela ngesikhathi usaphethwe nguSomlomo. Nakuba uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula ezichithile izinsolo futhi wazibophezela ekutheni uzobambisana nophenyo kodwa amalungu ePhalamende akhale ngokuthi kubukeka inganakwa eyezinsolo. UNksz Hlengiwe Mkhaliphi we-EFF, ubuze ukuthi yikuphi abakwenzayo ngezinsolo, wafuna ukuthi udaba lubhungwe izolo emhlanganweni.Ibamba likasomlomo uMnuz Cedric Frolick, liphendule ngokuthi udaba lusezithebeni zekomiti elibhekele ukuziphatha kwamalungu. UFrolick uthe uma kuwukuthi bayalubhunga udaba, bazobe bephula imigomo yekomiti okumele ilucubungule. Kodwa uNksz Mkhaliphi uthe ngeke avume ukuthi batshelwe ukuthi yiziphi izinto okumele bazixoxe nokungamele bazixoxe.Kujobelele uSotswebhu weDA uNksz Siviwe Gwarube, wathi bazofaka isikhalazo ekomitini lezokuziphatha kwamalungu ePhalamende. Wathi kumele sivikelwe isithunzi sePhalamende futhi wathi labo abatholakala benecala lenkohlakalo kumele babhekane nomthetho.UFrolick uchazile ukuthi ikomiti elibhekele ukuphenya izinsolo ezibhekiswe kuSomlomo, lagcina ukuhlangana ngo-2023, nakhona lahlangana izikhawu eziyisithupha. Uveze ukuthi kulo nyaka alikaze lihlangane.Lokhu kudale ukuthi amalungu avuke umbhejazane, abuza ukuthi ngabe bukhona yini ubulungiswa obuzokwenziwa yikomiti elihlangana izikhawu ezimbalwa ngonyaka?“Asikwazi ukuthi singahlala singenzi lutho kunezinsolo ezinzima kanje,” kusho uNksz Mkhaliphi.USotswebhu we-ANC uNksz Pemmy Majodina, uvikele uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula, wathi akumele izinsolo ezingakaqinisekiswa ziphenduke inkundla yokunqakisana ngamazwi.UNksz Gwarube uthe uma ikomiti limthola ukuthi kumele aphendule ngezinsolo uSomlomo, kumele kuqale uhlelo lokumsusa esikhundleni.Okhulumela uSomlomo uMnuz Mike Ramagoma, uthe uma kunophenyo olwenziwayo uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula uzobambisana nalo futhi uzophendula yonke imibuzo. Kepha, uRamagoma ukuqinisekisele ukuthi usomlomo umsulwa ezinsolweni asolwa ngazo.

KUSUKE esinamathambo izolo ngaphandle kweNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini, umndeni wephoyisa likamasipala okuboshwe isoka lalo nalo eliyiphoyisa ubona umndeni kamsolwa. Umsolwa, uMnuz Sizwe Ngema (27) ubevele okokuqala enkantolo ngecala lokubhokoda ngommese uNksz Yolanda Biancha Khuzwayo (24) waze wafa eflethini lakhe (umsolwa) elisenkabeni yeTheku, ngeSonto.Unina omncane kaYolanda, uNksz Nozipho Khuzwayo, wehlulekile ukuzibamba wafokofisa umndeni kaNgema, ewubuza ukuthi yini oyilande enkantolo.“Ninesibindi sokuzokweseka umbulali. Yini nje enizoyenza enkantolo?” kusho uNozipho, zehla izinyembezi ebakhomba ngomunwe. Abomndeni kamsolwa abebekhuluma abazange baphendule, bebebukeka bedabukisa. Ekhuluma nabezindaba ngaphandle kwenkantolo uveze ukuthi ezinsukwini ezimbalwa ngaphambi kokubulawa kukaYolanda, ubethe ufuna bahlale phansi baxoxe ngokuthile.Uthe usho lokhu ngesonto eledlule, umufi ehambe ngemoto nomsolwa, nokulapho aqaphele khona ukuthi umsolwa “unehlo likaSathane”.Uveze ukuthi umsolwa wamkluluza ngesikhathi ebuza uYolanda ukuthi bangabangani kuphela yini benomsolwa, maqede waphendula ngelithi: “Sizoxoxa ngeSonto mamncance”.“Ngakhuluma nje ngahlwayela, ngithi oyoke akuthinte Yolanda uyobe uthinte mina uqobo nomndeni wonke, wangithi klulu ngehlo likaSathane lo mfana,” kusho uNozipho.Uthe uyasola ukuthi umufi ubezokhuluma ngento ebalulekile, abezodinga ukuthi ambonise kuyo.Ephawula ngekhulunywa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana yokuthi umsolwa ubulale umufi ngenxa yokuthi uthole ukuthi ingane ayikhulelwe bekungesiyo eyakhe nokuthi uhushule isisu, uthe kufikile kubona. “Kufikile ngabangani. Engikwaziyo ukuthi uYolanda ubengeke athathe isinyathelo esithize, ngaphandle kokuthi akhulume nami. Ngikholwa ukuthi isizathu sokuthi athi uzokhuluma nami ngeSonto, ubefuna ukwendlala udaba oluthile, acele ngimbonise.“UYolanda uvame ukuza kimina uma efuna ukuboniswa kukho konke, ukube ubefuna ukuhushula isisu, ubezoza kimina azongitshela,” kusho uNozipho.Uthe okubadina kakhulu ukuthi umsolwa unazo ezinye izingane kwabanye abesifazane angazondli.“Kodwa unesibindi sokubeka isizathu sokuthi ubulele ngoba bekuzohushulwa isisu?” kubuza uNozipho.Uqhube wathi uma umsolwa evela emndenini ophilayo kufanele umbonise ngokuthi akavele alivume icala, kungalokhu kugqigqwa izinkantolo, liqulwa ngoba uze wafaka ngisho ne-video ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ukuthi kubone wonke umuntu.“Kukhombisa ukuthi ubezishaya isifuba ngakwenzile, bekungesilo iphutha kodwa ukwenze ngenhloso,” kusho uNozipho.Udadewabo kaYolanda, uNksz Philasande Khuzwayo, uthe umufi ubengumuntu onenhliziyo enhle, engakuthandi ukulwa, kubethusile ukuthi abulawe ngesihluku esinje.Udalule ukuthi umufi nomsolwa baqale ukwazana ngesikhathi beyofundela ubuphoyisa, bagcina sebethandana.Uveze ukuthi ubulawa nje, yena ubezitshela ukuthi umufi nomsolwa sebahlukana kulandela ukumxwayisa kwakhe ngabantu besilisa abanodlame.“Emva kokungixoxela ukuthi baxabene, wamshaya, ngamtshela ukuthi akamyeke ngoba uma umuntu wesilisa eke waqala washaya, akabe esayeka. Ubengasangixoxeli lutho ke ngothando lwabo ngoba ngaqinisa ubuso ngamtshela ukuthi kungagcina kuphume umphefumulo. Ngakho ngithukile ukuthi ilo, ngoba mina bengizitshela ukuthi abasathandani,” kusho uPhilasande.Uqinisekise ukuthi ubekhulelwe, wathi nakuba engazi kahle ukuthi izinyanga bese zingaki, kodwa bese kuqala ukubonakala.Uphinde waveza nokuthi umufi ubenengane yomfana eneminyaka eyisihlanu, ayithola ngaphambi kokuthandana nomsolwa.Ngaphakathi enkantolo bebesidinda buthule isililo, ngesikhathi umsolwa emi phambi kwemantshi, efake i-jean, nesikibha esi-maroon esibhalwe ukuthi ‘Living My Best Life’.Icala lihlehliselwe u-Ephreli 9, ukuthi umsolwa afake isicelo sakhe sebheyili, nokuthi kuqinisekiswe ukuthi usemisiwe yini emaphoyiseni kaMasipala weTheku ukuze akwazi ukuthola usizo lommeli kahulumeni aveze ukuthi uyaludinga ngesikhathi evela izolo.

KUPHAKAME imimoya, kwashoda ozogadla kuqala phakathi kukammeli nomshushisi phambi kwejaji ebeliqeda kugweba udilikajele unesi owathenga izinkabi ezabulala umyeni wakhe owunjiniyela.IJaji elibambile, uSolwazi Bonke Dumisa, ligwebe uNksz Nompumelelo Goncalves (31) eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini, ngoLwesibili.UNksz Goncalves nomfowabo uNkosinathi Zungu (40) bagwetshwe iminyaka engu-10 ngecala lokuthumba, engu-20 ngecala lokuphanga kusetshenziswa udlame nodilikajele ngokubulala okuhleliwe.Lo wesifazane ubhanselwe ngeminyaka eyisishiyagalombili ngamacala amabili okuphazamisa ukusebenza kwengalo yomthetho.Wabika amacala angekho emaphoyiseni okungelokuduka komuntu nelokwebiwa kweveni kamufi uMnuz Nkosi Timmy Langa owayengunjiniyela kwaTransnet.Wathunjwa kwakhe ePinetown, ngoSepthemba 29, 2020, waklinywa ebulawa emahlathini asoZwathini, eNdwedwe ngalobo busuku. Ummeli kaNksz Goncalves, u-Advocate Mandla Luthuli, usukume waphonsela inselelo izigwebo ezinikwe lo wesifazane wathi ziqine kakhulu ekubeni usemncane, uyaqala ukwenza icala. Uthe kunobufakazi inkantolo engabamukelanga.Wenze nezinsolo zokuthi abagwetshiwe babona sengathi inkantolo ithathe kakhulu uhlangothi loMbuso, icindezela bona.Kusukume umshushisi, u-Advocate Krishen Shah, wakuchitha lokhu wabeka amaphuzu avumelana nokushiwo ijaji.Kulowo mnyama, uLuthuli usukumile ephikisa obekushiwo uShah, bobabili bemi ngezinyawo.Bajikijelane ngamazwi baze bakhombana. Ungenelele uDumisa wabakhuza, wathi abehlise umoya, kwahlatshwa ikhefu.Ubuye ekhefini uDumisa wasichitha isicelo ebesifakwe uLuthuli sokuba kubuyekezwe izigwebo.

UKULAHLEKA kwezibhamu zamaphoyisa minyaka yonke sekuqubule isiphakamiso sokuthi zifakwe ubuchwepheshe obuthile, obuzokwenza ukuthi zisheshe zitholakale.Lesi siphakamiso senziwe yilungu le-EFF ePhalamende uDkt Mbuyiseni Ndlozi, belikhononda ngokwanda kokulahleka kwezibhamu zamaphoyisa. UNdlozi uphakamise ukuthi amaphoyisa ayibheke eyokuthi afake izibhamu zawo ubuchwepheshe beGPS, obuzokwenza ukuthi zisheshe zitholakale.UNdlozi ukhale ngokuthi amaphoyisa alahlekelwa yizibhamu emsebenzini abudedengu. Kuphinde kwaba nesiphakamiso sokuthi namaphoyisa uqobo kumele afakwe okuthile okuzohlonza lapho ekhona zikhathi zonke.“Njengoba izimoto zamaphoyisa zifakwe okuthile okwenza zisheshe zitholakale uma zilahlekile, kumele ibhekwe eyokuthi namathuluzi okusebenza okuyizibhamu zifakwe lobu buchwepheshe. Lokhu kuzokwenza ukuthi zisheshe zitholakale uma zilahlekile. Ziningi kakhulu izibhamu ezisabalele emphakathini okugilwa ngazo ubugebengu,” kusho uDkt Ndlozi.Ukusho lokhu izolo ngesikhathi ubuholi bamaphoyisa obuhlanganisa uKhomishana uGeneral Fannie Masemola, noNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa uMnuz Senzo Mchunu, buhambele umhlangano wekomiti lasePhalamende lamaphoyisa ukuyokhuluma ngesabelomali sonyaka.Emhlangannweni kuvele ukuthi njalo ngonyaka zibalelwa ngaphezu kuka-700 izibhamu zamaphoyisa ezilahlekayo.UMasemola uvumile ukuthi izimoto zamaphoyisa zinabo ubuchwepheshe bokwenza ukuthi zitholakale uma zilahlekile.“Indaba yokufaka lo buchwepheshe ezibhamini, yinto esizoyibheka. Ngonyaka kuhlaleka izibhamu ezingaphezulu kuka-700 zamaphoyisa. Sikwazi ukuthola izibhamu ezevile ku-22 000 ebezilahlekile ezihlanganisa nezamaphoyisa, nezabantu jikelele. Nendaba yokuthi sifake okuthile emaphoyiseni ukuze sazi ngaso sonke isikhathi ukuthi akuphi, yinto esizoke siyibheke,” kusho uMasemola. Emhlanganweni kuvele ukuthi nonyaka isabelomali somnyango sizofinyelela ku-R113 billion.Okunye okuvelile wukuthi ukugada ukhetho lohulumeni basekhaya nolukazwelonke obelungoMeyi nonyaka, beluhlinzekelwe uR290 million. Izinhlelo zokulwa nobugebengu zihlinzekelwe ngoR38 billion, ukuqapha imingcele kubekelwe uR2.5 billion, izinhlaka ezehlukene emaphoyiseni okubalwa iSpecial Task Force zibekelwe uR82 million, iNational Intervention Units ithole uR804 million, kwathi iTactical Response Teams yathola uR590 million kanti iPublic Order Policing ihlinzekwe ngoR4 billion.UMchunu uthe kubalulekile ukuthi kubanjiswane ukuze kuphume uhlelo oluhlanganisa uwonke wonke lokulwa nobugebengu.“Mkhulu umsebenzi esibhekene nawo wokulwa nobugebengu. Uma singahlangene sizobe sihlulekile ukwenza okubhekiwe emphakathini. Abantu yibona okumele basho uma sisebenzile, bakubona ngamehlo ngoba ubugebengu busithinta sonke,” kusho uMchunu.

UHULUMENI uphake impi elwa nobugebengu emiphakathini ngokuthi aqinise izinsiza kusebenza ohlakeni iCommunity Policing Forum (CPF) KwaZulu-Natal.UNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube wethule izimoto ezingu-95 ezizosetshenziswa yiCPF. Ezimotweni ezethuliwe kukhona namaVW Polo namaveni.Uhulumeni wabe uR30 million walolu hlelo waveza nokuthi ezinye izimoto ezingu-95 zi-odiwe ziyeza.Ukusho lokhu emcimbini obukade useHoy Park, eThekwini ngoLwesihlanu emini.Ubuzinyaziswe usihlalo weNdlu yobuHoli boMdabu eKZN, Inkosi uSifiso Shinga, amaphoyisa, abaholi bakahulumeni, abe-CPF namavolontiya.“Izimoto zokuqala zizosatshalaliswa ezindaweni ezaziwayo ukuthi zinobugebengu obuningi. Kubekwe naseqhulwini izindawo zasemakhaya lapho kufakwe khona amakhamera namalambu amakhulu akhanyisa bha,” kusho uNdunankulu.Uqhube wathi lezi zindawo zifakelwe nama-WiFi ukwenzela ukuthi ikhamera ikwazi ukubonakala noma ngabe ukuphi namaphoyisa akwazi ukwenza umsebenzi wawo ngokuphepha.Udalule nokuthi abafuni kube nendawo lapho izigebengu ezizocasha khona.Ube esekhuthaza ukubambisana kukahulumeni nazo zonke izinhlaka ezilwa nobugebengu nabezinkampani zonogada.“Njengamanje asikakwazi ukuthi siluhlele udaba lonsumbulwane (imali yokuholela abeCPF) ngenxa yokuthi sithe uma sibona isibalo sabo nezimali ezikhona, azizokwazi ukwanela,” kucacisa uNdunankulu.Nakuba bengeke bahole kodwa uNdunankulu ubaqinise idolo abeCPF wathi mkhulu umsebenzi abawenzayo. Uthe ngakho-ke kukhona okuncane abazothiphazisa ngakho ukuze bakwazi ukuqhubeka nomsebenzi abawenzayo ngesikhathi lusadingidwa udaba lokubaholela.Usihlalo weCPF KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mabutho Mtshali uthe igcagcele esokeni, baneminyaka engu-25 benza lo msebenzi, beyingakaze yenzeke into efana nalena esifundazweni.“Sikhalile ngokushoda kwezinsiza kuNdunankulu nakuMphathiswa (uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka) basilalela. ”Kusukela manje kubhekwe phambili isiphakiwe impi elwa nobugebengu. Sizosebenzisana namaphoyisa siqinisekise ukuthi isifundazwe sivikelekile,” kusho uMtshali.UHlomuka ubonge iqhaza elibanjwe i-CPF nabamahlelo ehlukene emphakathini okubalwa nezinkampani zonogada ezilwa nobugebengu.

USAVALIWE umgwaqo uN3 uma ubheke eThekwini ngase-Ashburton ngenxa yengozi yetekisi neveni.Ngokwemiiko evela endaweni yesehlo umshayeli wetekisi uhlulekile ukuyilawula yase ishayisana neveni. Itekisi kuthiwa liginqikile lalala ngohlangothi eceleni komgwaqo, abantu ababili kuthiwa bakhafulwe yitekisi bashona. ngokusho kwabezimo eziphuthumayo benkampani i-ALS Paramedics, abashonile ngabesilisa ababili abaneminyaka elinganiselwa ku30 ubudala.

ZIWU-107 izikhungo ezigcine zingavulwanga izikhungo ezigcine zingavulwanga eMthatha, e-Eastern Cape ngenxa yodlame oluqhubeka esifundeni i-OR Tambo.Lokhu kuza emuva kokuthi abanikazi bamatekisi bevale imigwaqo bekhala ngokuthi izimfuno zabo aziphendulwanga.Lezi zindaba zivezwe yiPhini likaKhomishana yokhetho i-Independent Electoral Commission (IEC), uMnuz Masego Sheburi.Uthe zikhona nezinye izikhungo lapho ukhetho luqale khona sekudlule isikhathi ngenxa yokuthi bekulindwe izimvilophu.Uveze ukuthi bazokwenza konke okusemandleni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu baqhuba ilungelo labo lokuvota ngokusebenzisana nezinhlaka zokuphepha.Uveze ukuthi bawu-1.6 million abantu ababhalisele ukuvota okuyisipesheli.Kulabo bantu abawu-1 million bazovotela ezikhungweni, kuthi abawu-600 000 bavakashelwe emakhaya.Uveze ukuthi izolo ngabo-2 ntambama besekuvote abantu abawu-230 000 ezikhungweni kanti bebengakababali abavotiswe emakhaya.USheburi uthe yize zibe khona lezi zinkinga kodwa zincane kakhulu uma ubheka ukuthi izikhungo zokuvota zingaphezu kuka-22 000. Uthe izinhlaka zezokuphepha ziyalusebenza udaba lwaseMthatha, kanti bazokwazi ukwenza isimemezelo ngesikhathi esizayo ukuthi kuzokwenzekani kulesiya sifunda, kodwa bona njengenhlangano yokhetho bazokwenza konke okusemandleni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu abathintekayo abalahlekelwa yilungelo labo lokuvota. Amavoti ayisipesheli azobalwa kanye nawawo wonke umuntu uma sekuqedwe ukuvota.Uthe abasebenzi base-IEC bazovakashela nasemajele ukuyovotisa iziboshwa.Uxwayise abantu ukuthi baqaphele imininingwane engesiyo ebhebhethekiswa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.Uthe amavoti azobalwa ezikhungweni zokhetho bese edluliselwa esikhungweni esikhulu sokubala amavoti.Ugqugquzele ababhalisele ukuvota okuyisipesheli ukuba bavote ngoba ithuba lizovalwa namhlanje.Bangavota nakusasa ezikhungweni ababhalise kuzo uma kwenzekile ukuthi bahlulekile wukuvota ngezinsuku ezibekelwe amavoti ayisipesheli.USheburi uthembise ukuthi ukuvota namuhla kuzoba ngcono kakhulu ngoba izinkinga abahlangabezane nazo ngosuku lokuqala lokuvota ngokuyisipesheli bazobe sebezilungisile. Khonamanjalo, uKhomishana wamaphoyisa kuzwelonke uGeneral Fannie Masemola ekhuluma eHarrismith lapho bekunomviliyelo wamaphoyisa ajutshwe ukuyolekela ezifundazweni okubalwa kuzo iKZN ne-Eastern Cape, uthe umyalelo awunike amaphoyisa ukuthi enze isiqiniseko sokuthi abantu bakuleli bakhululekile ukuthi bavote. Uthe ubaluleke ukuba banqande ubugebengu benze isiqiniseko sokuthi kunozinzo.

AYANCIPHA amahlathi okucasha kwi-ANC elahlwe yicala lokushaya indiva umyalelo wenkantolo wokuba ihlinzeke iDA ngayo yonke imibhalo equkethe okwakuxoxwa yikomiti le-ANC elijuba abaholi ezinhlakeni zikahulumeni.I-ANC iphinde yahlangabezana nenye imbibizane kulempi yomthetho njengoba iNkantolo eNkulu eGoli iyiyalele ukuba inikeze iDA yonke imibhalo zingakapheli izinsuku ezingu-15.I-ANC yanika iDA imibhalo ngasekuqaleni konyaka emva kokuphoqwa yisinqumo seNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo.Kule mibhalo eyahlinzekwa iDA, ayefihliwe amagama abantu ababephakanyiselwa ezikhundleni, i-ANC yaphinde yakhala ngokuthi eminye imibhalo ayitholakali.I-DA yabe isinikela enkantolo isola i-ANC ngokushaya indiva umyalelo wenkantolo.Inkantolo iyalele i-ANC ukuba ihlinzeke iDA ngemibhalo yayo yonke imihlangano yekomiti elijuba abaholi ezikhundleni.Kulemibhalo kubalwa ama-email nezingxoxo ze-WhatsApp zamalungu ekomiti.Ilungu leDA, uDkt Leon Schreiber uthe i-ANC angeke ikuthole ukuphumula ingakayilethi yonke imibhalo.“I-ANC isikukhombise ngokusobala ukuthi izimisele ukwenza noma yini ukufihla izinto ezazixoxwa emihlanganweni yekomiti. UMengameli, uCyril Ramaphosa, uyena owayengusihlalo wekomiti ngalesikhathi.“Bazokwenza noma yini ukuze bafihle ukuthi ukujuba kwabo izikhulu yikona okwenza ukuba kube nokulawulwa kobbuso yidlanzana.“Siyajabula ukuthi inkantolo ivumelane nathi. Njengoba inkantolo ivune thina, sinxusa uRamaphosa ukuba enze into elungile, khona kuzophela lempi yezomthetho.“Isikhathi sidliwe yinja kwi-ANC njengoba benikwe izinsuku ezingu-15 ukuba basinikeze imibhalo ephelele, engafihliwe amagama abantu.“Njengoba besilokhu senza ngesikhathi kuqhubeka lempi yezomthetho, sizothatha izinyathelo zomthetho ezifanele uma singanelisekile,” kusho uDkt Schreiber.Okhulumela i-ANC kuzwelonke uNkk Mahlengi Bhengu-Motsiri, uthe bebengakanqumi ukuthi bazowulandela yini umyalelo wenkantolo.“Sisalinde ukuthola isinqumo senkantolo esibhaliwe, sobe sesibona ukuthi sikhona yini isidingo sokusiphonsela inselelo isinqumo senkantolo,” kusho uNkk Bhengu-Motsiri.Uthe bafuna ukuthi nayo iDA ibahlinzeke ngemibhalo yekomiti elijuba izikhulu lapho iphethe khona.“Thina siyayilandela imiyalelo kodwa iDA iyabaleka neyayo imibhalo. Kuhluleke noma sesifaka isicelo sokunikezwa imibhalo ngaphansi komthetho iPromotion of Access to Information Act.“Banqaba baphetha ukusinikeza imibhalo emayelana nokujutshwa kwezikhulu eminyangweni kahulumeni waseWestern Cape nakuMasipala waseCape Town. Sicela ukuthi iDA isinike lemibhalo,” kuphetha uNkk Bhengu-Mmotsiri.

KUPHELA amaphupho namuhla ngoLwesithathu eNkantolo eNkulu eThekwini njengoba kulindeleke ukuthi ijaji limemezele isinqumo ngesicelo sokukhipha umholi wamaNazaretha, inkosi Mduduzi ‘Unyazilwezulu’ Shembe eBuhleni.Ukumenyezelwa kwesinqumo kuza emva kwesicelo esafakwa wumholi wamaNazaretha, inkosi Phinda Shembe Ukukhanyakwelanga nyakenye ecela inkantolo ukuthi igudluze uNyazi njengoba selalahlwa amacala okuba ngumholi wamaNazaretha.Lezi zindaba ziqinisekiswe wummeli woKukhanyakwelanga, uMnuz Trevor Nkosi othe isinqumo ngesicelo sabo sizomenyezelwa namuhla.“Akuzoba yinto ezothatha isikhathi eside ngoba bekungasaqulwa icala. Bekungukubheka isicelo ebesisifake enkantolo sokuthi uNyazi ludilike esikhundleni njengoba selwachithwa yizona zonke izinkantolo ukuthi lungumholi wamaNazaretha,” kusho uNkosi.Uthe isinqumo sizomenyezelwa yiJaji uHlatshwayo. Echaza ngokukhishwa koNyazi eBuhleni, uNkosi uthe esicelweni sabo kwakungukuthi lungabe lusaziphathisa okomholi futhi lwehle esihlalweni lugudlukele umholi ofanele Ukukhanyakwelanga ukuthi aqhubeke nemisebenzi yenkonzo.Uthe ngokwesicelo sabo ukuthi uNyazi lungagqokisi komholi wamaNazaretha, luphinde lungaziholi izinkonzo kuzona zonke izindawo zebandla lamaNazaretha. Uqhube wathi ngaphandle kwekomkhulu lebandla eBuhleni, babecele ukuthi kungabikhona lapho luzobonakala khona luhola ibandla. Uveze ukuthi abalunqabele ukuthi uNyazi lungahlala kunoma yimuphi umuzi wakubo kaShembe kodwa kungabikhona lapho luzohola khona ibandla ezindaweni zenkonzo. Nasezintweni ezithinta imali yebandla, uthe nakhona babefake isicelo sokuthi lungahlangani nazo njengoba lungeyena umholi wamaNazaretha.Lesi sinqumo besilokhu sibhekwe ngabomvu kusuka nyakenye safakwa. UNkosi uphinde wachaza ukuthi bekumele ukuthi bafake lesi sicelo yize izinkantolo sezanquma ukuthi uNyazi aluyena umholi.Ngokwesinqumo secala esasichitha uNyazi njengomholi wamaNazaretha uthe kwakungukuqinisekisa ukuthi aluyena umholi, sekumele bafake isicelo sokulugudluza. Ephetha uthe okwamanje akulula ukusho okuzokwenzeka ngoba kulindelekile ukuthi ozochithwa yicala phakathi kwabo, afake isicelo sokulibuyekeza enkantolo.

SELUZE lwafika usuku lwesinqumo lapho abantu bethola khona ithuba lokukhetha uhulumeni ozobabusa eminyakeni emihlanu ezayo. Ukhetho lwalo nyaka belulindwe ngabomvu futhi luthathwa njengoluzokwehluka kakhulu.Bangu-27 million abantu bakuleli ababhalisele ukuvota kanti lesi sibalo sinyukile sisuka ku-26 million wango-2019. Angu-70 amaqembu angenele ukhetho kanti bangu-11 abangenele ukhetho ngokuzimela.Kulindeleke ukuthi abantu bakuleli baphume ngobuningi babo beyovota ezikhungweni okulindeleke ukuthi zivulwe ngo-7 ekuseni zivalwe ngo-9 ebusuku. Usuku lokuvota lumenyezelwe njengeholidi ukuze abantu bathole ithuba elanele lokuyovota.Isikhulu se-IEC kuzwelonke uMnuz Masego Sheburi, sithe kuqale kahle ukuvotisa labo abebefake izicelo zokuvota ngokukhethekile. Abavota ngokukhethekile baqale ngoMsombuluko kwaqhubeka nayizolo.USheburi uthe zincane kakhulu izinkinga ezibikiwe futhi bakwazile ukuzisukumela bazilungisa ngokushesha.“Kuqale kahle kakhulu ukuvota, besinezikhungo ezingu-666 ebezingenabo abavota ngokukhethekile. Ezinye izikhungo bezivotisa abantu ngokukhethekile. Sike saba nezinkinga eMthatha nasePort St Johns kodwa sengeza abasebenzi kwalunga,’’ kusho uSheburi.Uthe kunabantu abakhononde ngokuthi abakwazanga ukuvota ngokukhethekile ngenxa ygezizathu ezehlukene kodwa bakwazile ukusiza izolo. Uthe kukhona abasebenzi babo abahambele ubala emakhaya bengasabafici ababhalisele ukuvota ngokukhethekile.Uthe sekuwumsebenzi wabo labo bavoti ukuziyela ezikhungweni bayovota nawowonke umuntu ngeke bachithwe. Uthinte nodaba lwabakhubazekile abangaboni wathi banalo uhlelo lokubasiza.Uthe nalabo abanenkinga yedumbe ezandleni bazothola usizo bakwazi ukuvota ngendlela enesithunzi nokuhlonipha ilungelo labo. Abe-Commission for Gender Equality bathe bazobe bekhona ezikhungweni beqaphile ukuthi amalungelo abantu athinta ubulili ayahlonishwa yini kungabibikho abacwaswayo.Bathe bafuna ukubona kubekwa eqhulwini abakhulelwe, abadala, abakhubazekile nabaphethe izingane ezincane kakhulu.Kulindeleke ukuthi umuntu oyovota aphathe umazisi wakhe oyikhadi noma omdala oyibhukwana onamagabelo. Okunye okugcizelelwayo wukuthi umuntu uzovunyelwa ukuvota esikhungweni ayebhalise kusona.Umuntu ozokwazi ukuvota kwesinye isikhungo angabhalisanga kusona yilowo owayesifakile isicelo salokho kusenesikhathi. Umuntu uma evota uzonikwa amaphepha amathathu okuvota okulindeleke ukuthi avote kuwowonke ngalinye.Abe-IEC bazokhipha imiphumela yokhetho ngokusemthethweni ngeSonto kodwa ngaphambi kwalokho izobe ibonakala esikhungweni semiphumela, ilokhu ingena.Kulindeleke ukuthi izingqapheli zokhetho nezithunywe amaqembu ziluqaphe ngeso lokhozi ukhetho.

KUPHENDULEKE imithandazo yeminyaka umphakathi wethulelwa uhlelo lokwakhelwa umgwaqo abalokhu bawulinda kusuka ngo-1994.Injabulo ibibhalwe ebusweni kumphakathi waseNompondo nowaseMagengebula, kwaHlabisa, muva nje ngesikhathi kumenyezelwa ukuthi umsebenzi wokwakhelwa umgwaqo oyibhuqu uzoqala kule nyanga, uphothulwe emva kwezinyanga eziyisithupha.Ubuhamba endleleni eyavulwa ukuhamba kwezinkomo. Elinye ilungu lomphakathi, uMnuz Thembinkosi Xulu uthe, ungathi bayaphupha ngalesi simemezelo."Kusijabulisile ukuthi namuhla kuzophendulwa isoyi lo mgwaqo esakhala ngawo ngaphambi kokuba izwe likhululeke. Impela impilo ayisophinde ifane nakuqala njengoba sesizoba nomgwaqo ozokwenza izimoto zifinyelele emakhaya," kusho uXulu.IMeya uMnuz Comfort Khumalo utshele izinkumbi zomphakathi ukuthi ukwakhiwa kwalo mgwawo oyibhuqu kuzothatha izinyanga eziyisithupha ngaphambi kokuba uphothulwe. Uthe umbuthembele endleleni eyakhandwa yizihlibhi zezinkomo endulo kusaphethe uhulumeni wobandlululo."Ngenxa yalesi simo, umphakathi ubuthwala kanzima uma kufanele uthole usizo lwamaphoyisa noma abezimo eziphuthumayo ngoba izimoto zabo bezingakwazi ukufinyelela kulezi zigodi. Uma izulu linile bekubheda kakhulu. Nokho singubuholi nathi sekuzofika ubuthongo ngoba uyaqala umsebenzi maduze," kusho uKhumalo.Imikikizo ibiqhuma phezulu abantu bejabulela ukuthi ngemuva kweminyaka bekhala kodwa ekugcineni isililo sabo sizwakele. UKhumalo udalule ukuthi lo msebenzi wokwakhiwa kwalo mgwaqo uzodla imali engapgezulu kancane ku-R2 million. Uveze nokuthi omunye umgwaqo ozohlomula owetiyela osedolobheni lakwaHlabisa obunenqwaba yemigodi ngenxa yamaloli athwala izingodo nempahla eyahlukene. Lo mgwaqo onguSt Lucia Road ubusubalekelwa abashayeli bezimoto abaningi. UKhumalo uthe wona uzolungiswa ngemali engu-R2.3 million kanti ukuwufaka kabusha itiyela kuzothatha izinyanga eziphakathi kwezintathu nezine.

USEJUBE ukuba kwenziwe uphenyo umkhuzi wamaPhoyisa KwaZulu-Natal kulandela ukuvela kwe-video ekhombisa amaphoyisa enabisa ngenduku owesilisa oThongathi, eThekwini.Isigameko kuthiwa senzeka ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku ngesikhathi amaphoyisa enza umsebenzi wawoUMajor General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi uchaze isigameko njengesiwubudedengu futhi esitshengisa ukungabi nesibopho kwabaphethe.Amaphoyisa athi kule video kuvela iphoyisa lisakaza ngempama umgilwa okubukeka engenzanga lutho.Emuva kwesikhashana kuqhamuka amanye amaphoyisa afike ahlanganyele umgilwa amshaye.Kuthiwa elinye lalawa maphoyisa libonakala likhahlela umgilwa eselele phansi lize lime phezu kwakhe.UMkhwanazi uthe akukho muntu ongaphezu komthetho ngakho ufuna umbiko ogcwele ukuthi yini eholele ekutheni kuze kuhlaselwe umgilwa ongowesilisa ngalolu nhlobo.“Ngaso sonke isikhathi uma esebenza amaphoyisa kufanele akhumbule uMthethosisekelo wezwe nendlela yokuziphatha yombutho wamaphoyisa. Iphoyisa lithatha isifungo sokusebenzela nokuvikela umphakathi ngakho akufanele lisebenzise budedengu amandla eliphathiswe wona,” kusho uMkhwanazi.Uqhube wathi abantu kumele bazizwe bephephile futhi bangesabi uma bebona iphoyisa nokumele babalekele kulona uma benenkinga.UMkhwanazi uthe uma umbiko ukhomba ukuthi aphule umthetho lawa maphoyisa,  azobhekana nohlelo lokuqondiswa ubugwegwe lwangaphakathi embuthweni wamaphoyisa.Uveze ukuthi amaphoyisa angaziphindisela kuphela uma ezithola ehlaselwa nakhona angasiqinisi isandla.

KUPHENYWA izinsolo zokuqasha ngobuhlobo kuMasipala wakubaQulusi emva kwezikhalo zokuthi izihlobo zamakhansela ziyazitamuzela nje kulo mkhandlu uma kunamathuba emisebenzi.Uphenyo luqhutshwa uMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu KwaZulu-Natal othole izikhalo zokuthi kunezihlobo zamakhansela eziqashwe ngaphandle kokulandelwa kwemigomo.UMphathiswa woMnyango, uNkk Bongi Sithole-Moloi, usebhalele uSomlomo womkhandlu, uNksz Nonkululeko Ndlela, ecela ukuba umkhandlu uphendule ngalezi zinsolo.Isolezwe libone incwadi lapho uNkk Sithole-Moloi efuna khona incazelo ngokuqashwa kwabantu okuthiwa baqashwa ngendlela engaqondakali.Phakathi kwezinto uNkk Sithole-Moloi afuna ukuba umkhandlu umhlinzeke ngazo kubalwa izicelo zemisebenzi ezafakwa izihlobo zamakhansela eziqashiwe, kube imiphumela  yenhlolokhono eyenziwa, nezincwadi eziphakamisa ukuthi kuqashwe izihlobo zamakhansela.USithole-Moloi unikeze umkhandlu izinsuku eziyisikhombisa ukuba umnike imininingwane ayidingayo.“Nginethemba lokuthi nizoluthathela phezulu lolu daba, ninikeze izimpendulo ngoba izinsolo ezenziwe zibucayi.”Isikhalo sibale izihlobo zamakhansela ezinhlanu okuthiwa zaqashwa ngendlela engaqondakali.Esinye isihlobo sekhansela kuthiwa savele saqashwa ngokugcwele ngaphandle kokuthi kukhangiswe isikhala somsebenzi.Kuthiwa kukhona nabasebenzi ababeyitoho abavele baqashwa ngokugcwele ngaphandle kokuthi kukhangiswe izikhala zomsebenzi.Isikhalo siphinde siveze ukuthi kunomsebenzi owaqashwa ukuba abe ngumabhalane e-call center, engenawo u-matric okwakuthiwe uyafuneka esikhangisweni somsebenzi.UNkk Sithole-Moloi uthe umthetho uyamvumela ukuba acele izimpendulo uma kunezinsolo zokuthi umkhandlu awuyilandeli imigomo.UNksz Ndlela uthe umasipala uzobambisana nophenyo lomnyango.Uthe akuqali ukuthi uNkk Sithole-Moloi abuze ngalolu daba.Uthe wakuphendula konke ayekubuzile, wathi namanje uzophinde aphendule kulokho akwazi ukukuphendula.“Ngoba bathi bazoqala uphenyo ngokwesigaba u-106 somthetho wokuphathwa komasipala, ezinye izimpendulo bazozithola kahle uma sebeqale uphenyo. Lapho bazobe sebekwazi ukukhuluma nayo yonke iminyango yomkhandlu, bathole izimpendulo ezigcwele.”Khonamanjalo uNksz Ndlela neMeya kaMasipala, uMnuz Sifiso Mkhwanazi, bathole izincwadi ezibabizela enkantolo ukuba bazokwethula ubufakazi ecaleni elithinta inkohlakalo emkhandlwini.Icala lithinta udaba lwesikhulu esavele saqashwa ngokugcwele isikhala somsebenzi singakhangiswanga.UNksz Ndlela noMkhwanazi babizelwe eNkantolo yeMantshi eVryheid, ngoJuni 4.UNksz Ndlela uthe uzoya kokwethula ubufakazi njengokubizwa kwakhe yinkantolo.

UTHATHWE amaphoyisa ukuyohlonywa ngemibuzo umakhelwane, kutholwa isidumbu somfundi  owaduka ngeSonto, silaxazwe ehlathini eliphesheya kwakubo eNewhaven, eMkhomazi ngoMsombuluko.Isidumbu sikaLusa Nkomo (10) obefunda u-Grade 4 esikoleni iDrift Primary eMkhomazi, kuthiwa sitholwe umelusi sidindilize ehlathini sinezibazi zokuklinywa, simbozwe ngengubo abeyigqokile eceleni kwaso kukhona amakhondomu abesesebenzile.Kuthiwa ubegcine ukubonakala ehambisana nomakhelwane oyiNdiya oyisiqashi endaweni, ogcine eboshwe amaphoyisa ngoMsombuluko ntambama.UNksz Zandile Mzwendaba osekomitini lomphakathi, osondelene kakhulu nomndeni wakwaNkomo, uthe ingane bagcina ukuyibona iphuma esontweni, umakhelwane wacela ukuyithuma okuthile esitolo.“Ngokulandisa kwengane eyayihamba naye (umgilwa), emva kokuthi ebuye esitolo lapho ayethunywe khona waveza ukuthi umalume (umakhelwane) umcele ukuthi amphelezele bayocinga inja yakhe komunye umuzi ongaphesheya lapho ayezwe ukuthi ikhona.Bagcina ukubonakala behamba naye, kanti umsolwa wangena kamfowabo wahlala isikhashana ingane imlinde ngaphandle, washeshe waphuma behamba belandelana kwaba ukugcina ukubonakala kwayo,” usho kanje.Uthe ngesikhathi bethungatha bengayitholi, bathole ukuthi igcine ukubonakala nalo makhelwane okuthe uma befuna ukuzobheka lapho ehlala khona njengoba eqashe sakugada umuzi owumakhelwane nakamgilwa umnikazi ongahlali kuwona, kuthiwa uvulele izinja okwenze kwangaba lula ukungena kuwo.Kuthiwa  emva kokutholakala kwesidumbu sikaLusa sidindilize ehlathini, amalungu omphakathi abewotha ubomvu anikela lapho kuhlala khona umakhelwane acekela phansi impahla yakhe ayikhiphela emnyango ayokhela ngomlilo.  Kuthiwa kusize ukufika kwamaphoyisa njengoba kuyiwona amthathe amfaka evenini, waphepha olakeni lomphakathi.Uninomncane kaLusa uNksz Dumisile Nkomo, uthe bafe olwembiza njengoba bengazi ukuthi bazothathani bahlanganise nani.“Isimo lapha ekhaya sibi njengoba kwehla lesi sehlo ebesingalindelwe, kuduma amakhanda kwazise unina kaLusa kuphela obamba amatoho ekhaya,” kubalisa yena.UMphathiswa wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi esifundazweni uNkk Nonhlanhla Khoza usigxekile lesi senzo.“Ukutholakala kwesidumbu sengane kuboshwe umakhelwane, kwenza ukuthi sizibuze imibuzo eminingi.  Silindele ukuthi balekelele ekugadweni kwezingane uma abazali bengekho,” usho kanje.Ukhuthaze amalungu omphakathi ukuthi noma lesi simo sibuhlungu kodwa angazijeziseli kumsolwa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLieutenent  Colonel Nqobile Gwala, uthe amaphoyisa asaqoqa ubufakazi ngalolu daba, kanti aphenya icala lokudlwengula nokubulala.

LUYINDABA egudwini kumalungu omphakathi eSakabuthu, eBulwer udaba lomfundi wentombazane waseNdabakazibuzwa High School okuthiwa ulwe nomunye kwagcina kuphuma isidumbu. Ngokuthola kweSolezwe, umufi uSnqobile Ngubane (16) obefunda uGrade 10 kulesi sikole uhilizisane nomunye umfundi afunda naye ekilasini bagcina sebebambana ngesidlozana.Isigameko kuthiwa senzeke ngoLwesihlanu phambi kwabanye abafundi nothisha.Kuthiwa ngesikhathi belwa umufi bamngqubuze kaningana kabuhlungu etsheni ngekhanda wopha kakhulu, waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela kwafike kwamenela.Usihlalo wesigungu esilawula isikole, uMnuz Ngubane (ongathandanga negama lakhe) usiqinisekisile lesi sigameko.Uthe bayakweshwama okwenzekile kulesi sikole. "Kuyaqala nje ngqa ukuthi kube nesigameko esifuze lesi emlandweni walesi sikole. Namanje sisathukile siyazibuza ukuthi ngempela kwenzekeni,'' usho kanje.Ugcizelele ukuthi abatholanga ukuthi ubuyini umnyombo wempi yabafundi ababili. Uthe bakhathazekile kakhulu ngokuthi kugcine kuphuma isidumbu egameni lokuthi kube nempi emagcekeni esikole.Omunye umzali ocele ukuba kugodlwe igama lakhe, uthe okubakhathaza kakhulu ukuthi uma bebabuza abanye abafundi ukuthi bekubangwani bathi kabazi."Sifuna ukuthola ukuthi abafundi bebebangani kodwa sihlulekile,'' usho kanje.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi abomndeni kamsolwa bahambile bayocela uxolo emndenini kamufi.Umthombo uveza ukuthi kube khona ukuxoxisana phakathi kwezinhlangothi zombili kwavunyelwana ngokuthi le bekuyimpi yezingane akumele igcine seyidala udungunyane phakathi kwale mindeni."Imindeni yomibili igcine ivumelana ngokuthi asikho isidingo sengxabano ngenxa yalesi simo,’’ usho kanje.Isolezwe lithole nokuthi lesi sigameko simhlukumezile kakhulu unina kamufi,  kangangoba kuvela ukuthi akekho esimweni esikahle ngokomqondo.Isolezwe lizamile ukuxhumana naye kodwa belungangeni ucingo lwakhe. Umfundi osolwa ngokulimaza kabi omunye kuthiwa ukubo akazange alubhade esikoleni izolo.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu Natal, uMnuz Muzi Mahlambi, uthe siyabethusa lesi sehlakalo.Ukhale kakhulu ngesihluku esesikhonjiswa ngabafundi kwabanye muva nje.Uthe sekuqala ukuba yinsakavukela manje ukuthi abafundi babulalane emagcekeni esikole.Uveze ukuthi ngalo isonto eledlule kube khona umfundi wasesikoleni saKwaNongoma ogwaze wabulala omunye emagcekeni esikole."UMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal uyazwelana kakhulu namalungu omndeni kamufi. Kuyacaca ukuthi inkulu inkinga ekhona ezikoleni zethu,’’ usho kanje.Umufi kuthiwa uzongcwatshwa kule mpelasonto.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda usiqinisekisile isigameko.Uthe amaphoyisa aseBulwer aphenya icala lokufa komfundi wentombazane oneminyaka engu-16."Umfundi kuvela ukuthi ushone ngemuva kokuba elimale kabi ekhanda kade exabane nozakwabo esikoleni. Isidumbu sizohlolwa ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthi yini ngempela imbangela yokufa,'' usho kanje.

KUSOLAKALA ukuthi ubehlulwa wukwamukelwa ukwaliwa omunye wabasolwa ababili, abagasele emndenini waseMangethe, eMandeni ngoMsombuluko, bavulela ngenhlamvu, kwashona amalungu amabili omndeni wembangi, kwasinda oyedwa ophuthunyiswe esibhedlela.Kulesi sigameko sangoMsombuluko ntambama kushone uMnuz Eric Mthethwa (62) nendodakazi yakhe uNksz Lungisile Dube (43), kwalimala kabi uNksz Phetheni Mthethwa (57), osinde ngokulambisa edubuleka esinqeni nasethangeni.Elandisa Isolezwe ngokwenzekile, owomndeni, uNksz Sibongile Dube, uthe ubengekho ekhaya ngesikhathi sesehlo, okuthe efika wahlangatshezwa yingane yakwamakhelwane ebikhala, imemeza ikhuza umhlola.“Kuthe ngingena egcekeni ngazithela kumalume, elele phansi eseshonile, enamanxeba okudutshulwa. Kuthe ngithi qwebu amehlo, ngazithela kumamncane elele phansi, ekhaliswa yizinhlungu, ngazama ukumtatamisa ngimsiza,” usho kanje.Eqhuba, uthe ubesadideke kanjalo, ezama ukufonela abosizo oluphuthumayo ukusiza umamncane wakhe, ngenkathi ezwa leyo ngane yakwamakhelwane, imemeza futhi imkhombisa esinye isidumbu.“Kuthe ngisondela ngalapho ebingiyalela khona, ngathola ukuthi udadewethu obelele ngasesimobeni, useshonile. Kuthiwa uzame ukubaleka ngenkathi behlaselwa ekhaya, wafela ngaphandle komuzi lapho bemdubulele khona,” kulandisa uNksz Mthethwa.Uthe basola ukuthi isehlakalo sidalwe wukuthi omunye wabasolwa ubengafuni ukwamukela ukuthi unina wezingane zakhe wamshiya, waqoma umfowabo oseze wamkhulelisa. Uthe bakholwa wukuthi abasolwa bebesophe ukuzobulala umfowabo nentombi yakhe, okuthe uma bengabafici ekhaya,  baxabana nabomndeni  ababafice ekhaya.“Omunye wabasolwa wumuntu esimaziyo endaweni futhi akukhona okokuqala kwenzeka isimo esinjena. Phambilini wake wazama ukuthungela indlu kamfowethu ngomlilo, salubika udaba emaphoyiseni kodwa kwangaboshwa muntu njengoba manje sekushona abantu abangahlangene nengxabano,”’ usho kanje.Uthe bakhathazekile ngokubehlele ukuthi ingxabano engentombazane igcine iholela ekufeni kwamalungu omndeni wabo angenacala nangahlangane nesisusa sengxabano.“Sizohlanganisa amakhanda siwumndeni sizame ukusombulula le nkinga, ngoba kumanje sizizwa singaphephile ngoba asazi ukuthi bazokwenzani uma kwenzeka bededelwa abenzi bobubi,”’ kusho uNksz Mthethwa ekhathazekile.Ikhansela laku-ward 9, eMakhwanini lapho kwakhele khona umndeni wakwaMthethwa, uMnuz Siphiwe Thwala, lisigxeke kakhulu isenzo sokubulawa kwabomndeni, lathi yisimo esibi kakhulu ebeliqala ukuzwa ngaso emphakathini eliwuholayo. “Nginxusa abantu ukuthi uma kukhona abangazwani ngakho, bakulungise ngendlela engenalo udlame, hhayi ukubulalana nokulimaza abantu abangenacala,”’ kusho uThwala.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe abasolwa ababili abaneminyaka ewu-27 no-37 ababoshelwe lesi sehlo bazovela namhlanje enkantolo yeMantshi yaseNyoni, eMandeni.

KUSOLWA umbango wokukhonya  ekuqoqeni ‘imali yokuvikela’  abanikazi bezitolo kudutshulwa kubulawa abathathu eMinitown, eHammarsdale,  ngoLwesihlanu.Ngokuthola kwaleli phephandaba abafi bebegasele kwesinye sezitolo zabokufika bezoqoqa imali 'yokuvikela' kumnikazi wesitolo ongowangaphandle kwakuleli, ngesikhathi kufika elinye iqembu nalo elenza lo mkhuba livulela ngenhlamvu kubo lathatha nezibhamu kubafi. Kulesi sehlakalo kudubuleke nomthengi oneminyaka ewu-10 walimala.Umthombo waleli phephandaba okule ndawo, uthe abashonile nabebedubula baqale bahilizisana ngaphambi kokuthi kuqhume isibhamu. Omunye umthombo waleli phephandaba oyiphoyisa elingagunyaziwe ukukhuluma nabezindaba, uthe abanikazi bezitolo, abantu abadayisayo nabanezimoto ezidiliva impahla uma abantu bethengile bakhokhiswa iziqhwaga imali okuthiwa ‘eyokubavikela’. Uma benqaba ukuyikhokha bayabulawa."Emasontweni amabili kudutshulwe umnikazi weveni  elithutha impahla okuthe uma kuthiwa akakhokhe imali ‘yokumvikela’ wenqaba.  Wonke umuntu onebhizinisi  elokishini kuthiwa uyakhokha, ngisho abadayisa amagwinya,"  kuchaza yena.Uthe abadayisa amagwinya kuthiwa bakhokha uR100 ngenyanga, abanezitolo bakhokha o-R3000 ngenyanga kuye ngokuthi abathi bayabavikela bafike bathi abakhokhe malini."Inkinga esibhekene nayo ukuthi abakhokhiswayo abawabiki amacala bayesaba ngoba bayabulawa noma bahlukunyezwe baze basibone isidingo sokuthi bakhokhe imali ‘yokubavikela’,"Isolezwe lihoshe umoya wokuthi lo mkhuba wokukhokhiswa kosomabhizinisi imali yokubavikela obubatshazwa e-Eastern Cape nasezindaweni eziningi KwaZulu-Natal ukhona ikakhulukazi emalokishini nasemahostelaEhostela KwaMashu kuthiwa abanikazi bezitolo  ezingama-tuckshop bakhokhiswa uR3000 njalo ngenyanga, kungakhathalekile ukuthi bayenzile yini inzuzo noma cha kuleyo nyanga.Kwamanye amalokishi abanikazi bezindlu eziyimiqasho uma zike zaba yishumi bafika sekufakwe isitikha esinenombolo yokuthi ngubani umvikeli nenombolo yakhe.“ Uma sebefikile uyaphoqeleka ukuthi ukhokhe kungenjalo uzobhekana nokuhlukunyezwa noma ukufa,” kusho umthombo.ULt Colonel Robert Neitshunda okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uthe, amaphoyisa aseMpumalanga avule amacala amathathu okubulala nelilodwa lokuzama ukubulala kulandela ukudutshulwa kwabesilisa abathathu abaneminyaka engu-27, 38 no-43 eMinitown eMpumalanga ngoLwesihlanu ntambama nentombazane eneminyaka eyishumi edutshulwe yalimala kulesi sehlakalo."Amaphoyisa athole izidumbu ezintathu zamadoda zidindilize ngemuva kwe-tuckshop yabantu bokufika eduze komgwaqo omkhulu waseMinitown. Abashonile bebenamanxeba amaningi okudutshulwa. Ngokwemibiko kuthiwa kufike amadoda amane ngemoto avulela ngenhlamvu ebhekise kubafi bashonela khona lapho. Kusolwa nokuthi abasolwa bathathe izibhamu kubafi ngaphambi kokuba bahambe,"  kuchaza yena.Uqhube wathi uphenyo olusenziwe luveze ukuthi lesi sehlakalo kungenzeka ukuthi sihlobene nombango 'wemali yokuvikela'.

KUBE yisimo esingajwayelekile ngesikhathi isisebenzi sasesontweni sithola izidumbu ezintathu zabefundisi zidindilizile.Umbiko othunyelwe abeNPA uveza ukuthi ngomhlaka 12 kwephezulu isisebenzi saseCaptic Orthodox Church sibingelelwe yigazi nezidumbu sifika kule ndawo.Ngesikhathi kuphenywa isimo sale ndawo, kutholakale ukuthi abefundisi abathathu okunguTakla Elsmwaeili Ayoub Attia Mossoud Mouss, Marcos Shawkat Nasry Morid Wanas Mina noMarcos Mofed Tawfek Isaac Youstos bagwazwe bafa.Kuthiwa bonke abasolwa nabagilwa bebehlala kulo leli sonto.“Isisebenzi sifike sazithela kulezi zidumbu sase sibikela umdikoni webandla okunguyena oshayele amaphoyisa. Amaphoyisa apheke ngemibuzo abasolwa ababili uSaeed Basonda (37) oyiMonk nomfundisi uSamuel Avamarkos (47) abagcine bekhalelwa ngamasongo kasiGonyela,” kusho uLumka Mahanjana okhulumela iNPA eGauteng.Laba basolwa bavele phambi kweMantshi yaseCullinan ngamacala amathathu okubulala. Icala labo lihlehliselwe umhlaka 28 kwephezulu lapho okulindeleke ukuthi bafake isicelo sebheyili.

I-ROAD Traffic Management Corporation (RTMC) isiqale uphenyo ngengozi okufe kuyo abantu abangu-10 kwalimala kanzima abangu-24 ngoMsombuluko ekuseni, ngaseDelmas, eMpumalanga.Le ngozi okuthiwa yenzeke ezimpambanweni zomgwaqo u-N12 no-R24, kuthiwa yenzeke ngesikhathi iloli elincane lishayisana eceleni netekisi ngesikhathi iphuma ku-N12 ingena ku-R24.Itekisi kuthiwa ibinezinombolo zaseMozambique, ithwele abantu bakuleliya zwe abebebheke ngaseMalahleni. Iloli lona kuthiwa beliya ngaseBronkhorstspruit.Etekisini kufe abayisishiyagalombili okubalwa nomshayeli kwathi abayisithupha balimala kanzima.Ababili abebeselolini bafile kwathi abantu-18 okuhlanganisa nomshayeli balimala kanzima.I-RTMC idlulise amazwi enduduzo eminindenini yabashonile yafisela abasesibhedlela ukululama.Ithe uphenyo luzozama ukuthola ngembangela yengozi kubhekwa indlela abashayeli abenze ngayo, imvelo nokuthi izimoto bezisesimweni zokuba semgwaqweni.

Abantu nezinkampani ezehlukene bagubhe usuku lokuzalwa kowayengumengameli waseNingizimu Afrika wokuqala wentando yabantu ongasekho uNelson Mandela ngokwelula isandla emiphakathini.Ithimba leSolezwe lihambisana nenkampani ebhaka izinkwa iBB Bakeries, lihambele ehholo KwaNdengezi livakashele inhlangano yabantu asebesempeshenini iKwaNdengezi Senior Citizens liphethe izinkwa, amalayisi nezingubo zokulala zakwa-Aranda Blankets.Ngaphambi kokuya KwaNdengezi, ithimba leSolezwe nabaxhasi balo bavakashele ekhaya labadala nabaphila nokukhubazeka iSakhisizwe Old Age Home, eNewtown A, eNanda, nezipho.Nezinye izinkampani nohulumeni benze okufanayo.

UMPHAKATHI waseSection 6, eMadadeni, eNewcastle, uthi liphume nobomvu kubulawa ngesihluku ubhongoza weqembu lemigulukudu ezintatha zangeSonto.U-Asanda Dube oneminyaka elinganiselwa kwengu-19, kuthiwa abasolwa baqale bamxhifa ngesitini ngaphambi kokuba bamgwaze bambulale.Ilungu le-foramu elwa nobugebengu endaweni, Abaqondisi, elicele ukungadalulwa, lithe umsindo uqale ngesikhathi amalungu eqembu likamufi, iWest, eyohlasela abantu bakomunye umuzi endaweni.“Kuthiwa bafike bashawa, kwacaca ukuthi bayahlulwa. Kuthiwa babone kungcono ukuthi bayovusa yena umufi elele, bembikela ngokuthi bayashawa,” kusho umthombo.Uqhube wathi, ngempela umufi uvuke wanikela khona kanti yilapho naye abese ezohlaselwa khona.Uthe umthombo ujabule umphakathi ngokubulawa kukamufi njengoba ebesewuhluphe isikhathi eside umphakathi.“Umphakathi uphumule, bekuhlale kukhalwa lapho abehamba khona,” kusho umthombo.Uthe phambilini, umphakathi wake waya emndenini kamufi uyonxusa abazali ukuthi bamkhuze umufi ngokuwuhlukumeza kodwa kwanhlanga zimuka nomoya.Isihlobo sikamufi, uMnuz Surprise Dube ubhale ekhasini lakhe le-Facebook, ezwakalisa ukuthi babuhlungu ngokushonelwa yisihlobo.“Ngenhliziyo ebuhlungu nangobuhlungu obungabekezeleleki, simemezela ukudlula ngesihluku kukamfowethu omncane. Ubulawe ngesihluku ezintatha zamanamuhla (esho ngeSonto),” kusho uDube.Uqhube wathi uyazi ukuthi kulabo abamaziyo nabakhula naye, izinhliziyo zabo zibuhlungu, wathi isibani sikamfowabo sicishwe singakafiki isikhathi kodwa imicabango ngaye nothando lwakhe ngeke lwedlule.“Uyohlale esezinhliziyweni zethu,” kusho uDube, othe ingathi kungaba khona ubulungiswa.Isolezwe lisanda kubika ngamaqembu emigulukudu ahlalise lubhojozi umphakathi. Lapho imithombo iveze khona ukuthi Osizweni, maphakathi noSepthemba, abulala abantu abayisithupha.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa aseMadadeni aphenya icala lokubulala nelokuzama ukubulala kulandela isigameko lapho abesilisa begwazwe yiqulu labasolwa."Bobabili abagilwa ebebenamanxeba okugwazwa baphuthunyiswe esibhedlela lapho omunye efike washonela khona," kusho uNetshiunda othe okwamanje imbangela yokubulala ayikaziwa.

AZOBE ephakwe ngobuningi bawo amaphoyisa ukuqapha okuzobe kwenzeka emjahweni wamahhashi omkhulukazi iHollywoodbets Durban July, eGreyville.Kulindeleke ukuthi asebenze ngokubambisana nezinye izinhlaka zezokuphepha okubalwa onogada ngoMgqibelo.Amaphoyisa akhumbuze abantu abazothamela lo mjaho ukuthi bazoseshwa bese kushaqwa izinto ezingavumekile ukuba umuntu angene nazo.Ezinye zalezi zinto kubalwa ummese, isibhamu, amabhodlela kanye notshwala.Okhulumela amaphoyisa eThekwini, uCaptain Carmen Rhynes uthe nakulokhu amaphoyisa azobe esebenzisa izindlela zokuphepha ebekade zisetshenziswa esikhathini esidlule.“Amaphoyisa azotshalwa lapho kusingathelwe khona umjaho nasedolobheni ukuze kunqandwe izigameko ezingase ziwuphazamise. Azosiqapha isimo ukuze aqinisekise ukuthi uphephile futhi kunozinzo,’’ kusho uCapt RhynesUnxenxe bonke abazobe beyingxenye yomjaho ukuba baziphathe kahle futhi baqinisekise ukuthi izinto zabo zihleli ngononina. Uthe kumele bazi ukuthi kungenzeka kube notsotsi abaphithizela khona esixukwini.Ube esexwayisa abantu abazoshayela bebukhile, wathi bazokhalelwa amasongo kaSigonyela.“Maningi amaphoyisa azobe etshalelwe ukuthi alawule ukuhamba kwezimoto ezize emjahweni. Abantu bayanxuswa ukuthi basebenzise eminye imigwaqo ngesikhathi somjaho. Kunemigwaqo ezovalwa enkabeni yedolobha eThekwini,” kusho amaphoyisa.Eminye yemigwaqo ezovalwa u-DLI Avenue, Gladys Mazibuko Road, Avondale noHaden.Kuzothikamezeka uMitchell Cresent, u-5th no-6th Avenue noClarence Road.Amaphoyisa athe izobe incane indawo ehlelelwe ukuba kupakwe khona izimoto ngakho abazohambela umjaho bayanxuswa ukuba basebenzise izithuthi zomphakathi.“Labo asebethenge amathikithi endawo yokupaka imoto ngaphakathi banxuswa ukuthi bangene esangweni elingasedolobheni lomgwaqo uDLI Avenue. Bayanxuswa ukuba bafike kusenesikhathi ukuze bagweme isiminyaminya esangweni,” kusho amaphoyisa.

UKUQINISEKISA ukuthi izivakashi ziphephile, uhulumeni utshale uR174.5 million ukuvikela izindawo ezihanjelwa kakhulu yizivakashi, waqasha nabaqaphi abawu-2 300.Lezi zindaba zivezwe wuNgqongqoshe wezokuVakasha, uNkk Patricia de Lille ngesikhathi evula ngokusemthethweni umbukiso wezokuvakasha, i-Africa’s Travel Indaba oseNkosi Albert Luthuli Internatonal Convention Centre (ICC), eThekwini.UNkk de Lille uthe basebenzisana nezinhlaka ezehlukene kusukela kuhulumeni kazwelonke, amaphoyisa kahulumeni nawomasipala ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izivakashi ziphephile.Uthe amaphoyisa atshalwe ngobuningi bawo e-ICC nakwezinye izindawo ezihanjelwa yizivakashi.Amazwi akhe ananelwe wuSomlomo weTheku, uMnuz Thabani Nyawose oveze ukuthi umasipala uwatshale kuwo wonke amakhona aleli dolobha amaphoyisa kanti ngisho emalokishini azobe ebonakala.Ngaphandle kwamaphoyisa ahamba ngezinyawo, uNyawose uthe basebenzisa ubuchwepheshe besimanje ukuqapha ubugebengu.“Sitshale uR8.1 million sithenga imishini yobuchwepheshe esisiza ukuqapha ubugebengu. Lokhu sikwenzela ukuvikela izakhamuzi zeTheku nezivakashi ezisiza ukufukula umnotho nokudala amathuba omsebenzi. I-Africa’s Travel Indaba ngomunye wemibukiso ekhombisa ukuthi iTheku likulungele ukuhweba namanye amazwe nokwamukela izivakashi. Ezokuphepha siziqaphe ngeso lokhozi. Njalo ngonyaka siyawandisa amaphoyisa kamasipala ngokuqasha awu-400,” kusho uNyawose.UNkk de Lille uthe umkhakha wezokuvakasha ubalulekile ngoba ngonyaka odlule ungenise uR458.9 billion emnothweni.Uthe kuyamjabulisa ukubona abantu bakuleli bevakasha wabagqugquzela ukuthi nakulo nyaka benze njalo njengoba kuzoba nezipesheli ngaphansi komkhankaso we-Shot Left ezizoqala ngoSepthemba 2 ziphele ngoSepthemba 8.Uveze ukuthi i-Africa’s Travel Indaba iyakhula njengoba inamazwe awu-26 ase-Afrika okukhona kuwo namabili amasha okuyi-Burkina Faso ne-Eritrea aqalayo ukuza kulo mbukiso.UNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube, uthe i-Africa’s Travel Indaba ibalulekile ngoba yenzeka ngoMeyi okuyinyanga ye-Afrika kanti indikimba yalo nyaka ethi, Unlimited Afrika, yinhle kakhulu.Uthe bayajabula ngokuthi umkhakha wezokuvakasha ususesimeni esingcono kakhulu kunaleso owawukusona ngesikhathi seCovid-19.

AMAPHOYISA athungatha abasolwa abasinde ngokulambisa ngesikhathi eqotha abane okuthiwa bebehamba nabo okukholakala ukuthi badubule babhekisa ngasemaphoyiseni abezama ukubabopha, bebamba inkunzi usomabhizinisi ephuma ebhange, eHarding, ngoMsombuluko ekuseni.Kuthiwa abasolwa bahlale ezithendeni usomabhizinisi obengene enxanxatheleni yezitolo kule ndawo wakhipha isamba semali esingadalulwanga. Kusolakala ukuthi bebezama ukumbamba inkunzi ngesikhathi behlangabezana namaphoyisa. Kunokuthi bathobele ukuboshwa, bavulela ngenhlamvu bebhekise kuwona nawo aphendula ngendlela efanayo, kwafa abane.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe ithimba lamaphoyisa oluhlanganisa awophiko loKlebe, olwe- K9 namanye eHarding, lithole umbiko wezobunhloli ngokubanjwa kwenkunzi obekungase kwenzeke.“Ngesikhathi amaphoyisa esondela kubasolwa, banqabile ukulandela umyalelo wawo badubula babhekisa ngakuwona. Amaphoyisa aphendule ngendlela efanayo, kwafa abane. Amaphoyisa asezithendeni zabanye abasolwa ababaleke ngababili endaweni yesehlakalo,” usho kanje.Uthe imali ebithathiwe nesibhamu kutholwe kubasolwa abadutshuliwe.  Unxuse noma ngubani ongaba nolwazi olungasiza amaphoyisa ekubanjweni kwabasolwa abasagcwele amathafa ukuthi babike esiteshini samaphoyisa esiseduze noma bafonele ku-08600 10 111.Kwenzeka lokhu nje amaphoyisa asanda kuthela othulini abasolwa ababili, kwathi owesithathu wangeniswa esibhedlela elimele, abadutshulwe ngasePhoenix abebelandelwa ngamaphoyisa ngecala lokubanjwa kwemoto ethwala imali emgwaqeni u-R74 ngaseKranskop ngesonto eledlule. Ngenyanga edlule aqothe abayisithupha nabo okuthiwa bebedubulana nawo, abebefunwa ngamacala okubamba inkunzi imoto yemali, okwenzeke ezigamekweni ezehlukene eCamperdown naseKlaarwater.

KUDONSWE abantu ngendlebe ukuthi bangalinge bathumele imininingwane yabo yasebhange neminye imininingwane eyimfihlo kumaqola azenza sengathi aqoqa intela.Njengoba kuqala isikhathi sokuqoqwa kwentela kubantu, iSouth African Revenue Service (Sars) ikhumbuze abantu ukuthi ayikaze ifune imininingwane yabo yasebhange kwi-email, SMS noma ePosini ngakho uma bethola lesi sicelo kumele bazi ukuthi asiveli kule nhlangano.UMnuz Manie van Schalkwyk oyisikhulu esiphezulu senhlangano elwa nokuqolwa kwabantu, iSouthern African Fraud Prevention Service (SAFPS), uthe njengoba sekuqoqwa intela namasela amatasa afuna intuba yokuqola abantu.Uthe babone ukuthi njalo uma kuqoqwa intela kunezigebengu ezithumelela abantu imilayezo yokuthi seziphothuliwe izinhlelo zabo zentela. Kuye kuthiwe kunemali okufanele ibuyele kubona noma okufanele bayikhokhe.Emuva kwalokho, kuthiwa baye bacele abantu ukuthi bathumele imininingwane yabo yasebhange noma bathunyelelwe ama-link kuma-website angekho semthethweni, lapho kuthiwa mabafake imininingwane yasebhange ukuze bakhokhelwe imali eza ngakubona.“Amaqola aze athumele ubufakazi bokuthi imali isifakiwe kwi-akhawunti yomkhokhi wentela kanti lutho. Abantu kufanele baqaphele ngoba amaqola amatasa,” kusho uVan Schalkwyk.Uthe abantu bangayikhiphi imininingwane yabo eyimfihlo noma ngabe amaqola esethi uma bengakhokhi inhlawulo bazojeziswa noma bavalelwe ejele.Ugqugquzele abantu ukuthi bathinte iSars uma bethola imininingwane abangenayo isiqiniseko sayo.Ubalule ukuthi iSars inayo imininingwane yomuntu okhokha intela ngakho uma kufanele abuyelwe yimali izofakwa kwi-akhawunti yakhe ngaphandle kokuthi afake imininingwane yakhe.Uthe abantu kufanele bahlale beqaphile ngoba izigebengu zisebenzisa izindlela ezihlukene ukubaqola.Uphethe ngokuthi kufanele zibikwe emaphoyiseni izigameko zokuqolwa ngoba bathole ukuthi abantu abavamisile ukuzibika.

AMAPHOYISA aphenya icala lokubulala emuva kwesigameko lapho kudutshulwe ngoyaba lwezinhlamvu kwabulawa owesifazane esigcemeni ka-D, KwaMashu.Kubikwa ukuthi uNksz Nomonde Mkhonza (55) udutshulwe amadoda amabili ngoLwesibili ntambama.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe umufi ubekade enamanxeba amaningi okudutshulwa ekhanda.Uqhube wathi umufi uhlonzwe njengomuntu oshonele endaweni yesigameko.Kwenzeka lokhu nje, elakuleli libungaza inyanga ka-Agasti ethathwa ngokuthi ngeyabantu besifazane kuqhakambiswa amalungelo namagalelo abo.Isolezwe lihoshe ngomthombo walo ukuthi umufi ubesanda kuphuma esangweni wahlaselwa.“Uthe uyaphuma nje esangweni emgwaqweni uNtuzuma, wahlaselwa amadoda amabili akade ehlome ngezibhamu amdubula amahlandla amaningi washonela khona lapho,” kusho umthombo.

USUFUNE wakhathala umndeni wowesifazane wasoShabeni, ePort Shepstone osekuphele amasonto amathathu anyamalala emva kokuthi kuthiwa washiya incwadi esonga ngokuziphonsa eweni.UNkk Nosihle “Nono” Khuboni-Sengane (33) kuthiwa akabonwa nangokhalo selokhu anyamalala emva kokuthi ashiya incwadi ayesonga ngokuziphonsa eweni, okuthiwa akuyi lutho lubuyayo elikhona endaweni ebalisa ngokwehlulwa wumhlaba.UNkk Samke Khuboni owunkosikazi womfowabo kaNosihle, uthe namanje abatholi mkhondo kuacwebeze iziziba abazi nokuthi ukuziphi izinkalo.“Sesithungathe yonke indawo lutho ukumthola, namanje akekho osavelile owaziyo ukuthi ukuphi. “Ingane yakhe eneminyaka eyisishiyagalolunye sesiyazisile ukuthi unina asimtholi nokho seyiqala ukwamukela kwazise isencane,” usho kanje.UNkk Khuboni-Sengane okuthiwa washonelwa umyeni ayemganile eminyakeni edlule, kuthiwa ubesenesoka ebelimcelile okukholakala ukuthi ukusonga ngokuzibulala kwakhe kube ngemva kwengxabano ethola ukuthi isoka liqonyiwe.Encwadini ayishiya kubo ngosuku anyamalala ngalo, kubhalwe ukuthi umndeni ulivumele isoka ukuthi libe yingxenye yezinhlelo zokufihlwa kwakhe.Iqhubeka ithi uyohlale elithanda lona isoka nengane yakhe eneminyaka eyisishiyagalombili okuthiwa ihlala kubo lapho kwakushadele khona unina.

KUSEYINKIYANKIYA umchwayo waMamboza ukubuyiswa kwabalisa ababili ababoshelwe icala lokufa kuka-AKA, ababhajwe eSwatini, lapho abatholwa begobe khona amadlangala. Izinsizwa ezimbili uMnuz Siyabonga Gezani Ndimande, owaziwa ngoNxele noMnuz Malusi Dave Ndimande, zivele izolo eNkantolo yeMantshi kwaManzini. Bezibonakala zingqumuza okuthile enye imoyizela kanti enye ibilokhu ithibile samuntu okhathazekile.U-AKA, igama lakhe langempela okunguKiernan Forbes, wadutshulwa wabulawa nyakenye nomngani wakhe uTebello ‘Tibz’ Matsoane eThekwini. U-AKA noTibz bathelekelwa amadoda abavithiza ngenhlamvu baphelela khona lapho bengaphandle kwendawo yokudlela, iWish on Florida.Indawo abahlaselwa kuyona yagcina ivaliwe ngenxa yalesi sigameko esaqoshwa ngamakhamera sashiya abantu bethuthumela.Amaphoyisa ahlonze amadoda ayisikhombisa akholwa wukuthi yiwona amkakisa okwenyamazane u-AKA, aze amgojela waya kwagoqanyawo. Kukholakala ukuthi kukhona othile owayewanike amadoda aboshiwe itoho futhi amaphoyisa athi anobufakazi okubanindayo.Abalisa abahlanu sebevele kabili eNkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini bathweswa amacala ngokufa kuka-AKA, nomngani wakhe uTibz.Zimbili izinsizwa zakwaNdimande ezibhajwe eSwatini, ezisolwa nabahlanu kanti zilindwe amacala kuleli.
