Sezivele izikhawu enkantolo eSwatini, kudingidwa udaba lokubuyiswa kwazo kuleli. Iphuzu elifike libe wungqingetshe elokuthi abakuleli bebengakasifaki isicelo esisemthethweni sokubuyiswa kwabo.Elakuleli linomnqamulajuqu kaMashi 22, okunguLwesihlanu lwesonto elizayo ukuthi lifake amaphepha esicelo sokubabuyisa. Ngokomthetho kuthiwa isicelo sibekelwe izinsuku ezingu-30 kusukela ngosuku okuboshwe ngalo abasolwa.Icala lihlehlele kuMashi 20,  lapho okuzocaca khona ngesicelo sokubabuyisela kuleli. Abasolwa ababoshwe eNingizimu Afrika, bona babuyela kusasa (Mashi 14) eNkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini, lapho kuzodingidwa khona ngokuthi bafake isicelo sebheyili.

USAZOQHUBEKA nokuthatha izinsuku ezimbili umcimbi wokuvulwa kwesiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal, ngelizayo.Njengenjwayelo lo mcimbi oba minyaka yonke eMgungundlovu, uzovulwa yiSilo uMisuZulu kaZwelithini ngosuku lokuqala.Ngosuku lwesibili uNdunankulu wesifundazwe, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, uzothula inkulumo yokuhlahla indlela yesifundazwe.Sekufana nesiko ukuthi lo mcimbi uthatha izinsuku ezimbili esifundazweni nakuba sekuke kwaba nekhwelo lokuthi ube ngosuku olulodwa ukuze kwehliswe izindleko.NgoFebhuwari nonyaka, ngesikhathi kunomcimbi wokusivula kwakubekwe isabelomali sikaR3.2 million ngalo mcimbi.Emhlanganweni weNdlu yoMkhandlu weziFundazwe ePhalamende muva nje, kuvele ukuthi lo mcimbi uzoba ngoJulayi 10 noJulayi 11, 2024.Kulo mhlangano kuvele ukuthi izifundazwe ezintathu azikazilethi izinsuku zokuvulwa kweziShayamthetho. Lezo zifundazwe yiLimpopo, Free State ne-Western Cape.UNksz Seeng Mokoena omele iqembu uMkhonto weSizwe kwiNCOP, ukhale ngokushayisana kwezinsuku.“NgoJulayi 10, no-11 kuzobe kunemihlangano yamakomiti ekubeni kuvulwa isiShayamthetho saseKZN ngalezi zinsuku. Sivulwa izinsuku ezimbili, olokuqala kusuke kukhuluma iSilo, bese ngosuku lwesibili kukhuluma undunankulu.” USihlalo weNdlu yoMkhandlu weziFundazwe, uNkk Refilwe Mtsweni-Tsipane, uthe kubalulekile ukuthi amalungu athamele yonke imihlangano yamakomiti, wathi kodwa uyasizwa isicelo sabavela eKZN ngoba kubalulekile ukuhambela umcimbi wokuvulwa kwesiShayamthetho.Uthe abanankinga nokudedela abaseKZN ukuthi bathamele lo mcimbi.“Sizonidedela ukuthi nihambele lo mcimbi nakuba izobe iqhubeka imihlangano yamakomiti ngenxa yesikhathi esinaso. Asikwazi ukuhlehlisa noma ukuchibiyela uhlelo ngoba sincane isikhathi esinaso kodwa asinankinga nokuthi nihambele umcimbi.” Nelungu le-IFP uMnuz Poobalan Govender, libongile ngokuvunyelwa ukuthi bathamele lokhu kuvulwa kwesiShayamthetho.“Siyabonga ukuthi nisivumele ukuthi sihambele lo mcimbi ngoba ubaluleke kakhulu.” Kubuzwa uNksz Nomusa Phungula, okhulumela isiShayamthetho mayelana namalungiselelo okuvulwa ngokusemthethweni kwesiShayamthetho, ushaye ngamafuphi wathi bazomemezela uma sekuphothulwe konke.“Sizomemezela uma seziphothule izingxoxo nazo zonke izinhlaka,” kusho uNksz Phungula.Ngosuku lokuqala lokuvulwa kwesiShayamthetho iMbube ithula inkulumo ixwayise ngezinto ezithile.Ngalezi zinsuku zokuvulwa kusuke kudliwe ingqephu amalungu esiShayamthetho kanjalo nezimenywa.

KUTHELE izithelo ezinhle ukubambisana kwezinhlaka ezahlukene zezomthetho i-Asset Forfeiture Unit (AFU), uphiko lukazwelonke lwezokushushisa kanjalo nophiko oluphenya amacala ayisipesheli noKlebe kushaqwa imphahla yezigidi ezingu-R52.6 million ezikhulwini ezingu-22 zoMnyango wezemiSebenzi yoMphakathi eMpumalanga, nakumabhizinisi aphakela lo mnyango ngemisebenzi.Ukushaqwa kwale mpahla kuhambisana nomthetho wesiGaba 26 womthetho Wokuvimbela Ubugebengu Obuhleliwe, 121 ka-1998. Lokhu kumayelana nophenyo lweSIU ngezinkontileka zama-PPE ngesikhathi sokubheduke iCovid-19. Kubikwa ukuthi izikhulu zalo mnyango zakhipha amathenda ezigidi ukuze kutholakale amaPPE kodwa izinkampani ezanikezwa umsebenzi kazizange ziwenze,  zakhetha ukukhokhela lezi zikhulu nemindeni yazo ngezindlela ezahlukene.Abasolwa abathintekayo abasebenzela lo mnyango nguMacDonald Sigudla, Dorries Mbatha, Bandile Ngcobo, Godisamang Molotsane, Kobus Mkhabela noSipho Monareng. Izinkampani nabanikazi bazo iMaganeleni Trading and Projects (Pty) Ltd, Anthony Maganeleng Mashigo, Gladness Gugu Bulunga, Thandolwam Transport and Projects (Pty) Ltd, Mbombela Integrated Waste Management Services (Pty) Ltd, Orapaleng Molotsane, Tsidi Susan Sedibe, Superia Services Trading CC, Whisky Delisa Khumalo, Makulaspan Construction (Pty) Ltd, Thabang Lebo Andiswa Dibakoane, Ntando Ms Trading (Pty) Ltd, Bongani Edward Lukhele, Ligabho Le'Africa Properties (Pty) Ltd, Oratile Molotsane no-Ezrom MolotsaneUphenyo lumbule ingubo ngobugebengu obuhlukene benkohlakalo, ukukhwabanisa, ukweba nokushushumbiswa kwemali okwenziwe yibo bonke laba basolwa. Ngokuhambisana noMthetho wama-Special Investigating Unit ne-Special Tribunals Act 74 ka-1996 (uMthetho we-SIU), i-SIU idlulisele ubufakazi bobugebengu ku-NPA nakoKlebe ukuze kuqhutshekwe nophenyo, okuholele ekuboshweni kwezikhulu zomnyango nabahlinzeka ngemisebenzi.Imvume yokushaqwa kwempahla ikhishwe iNkantolo eNkulu yaseMpumalanga ezinze eMbombela, egunyaze ukushaqwa kwempahla ezindaweni ezingu-34 ezifundazweni iMpumalanga, North West, Western Cape naseGauteng.Kule mpahla kukhona izakhiwo ezingu-2, izimoto ezingu-31, nesikebhe, impahla yaphakathi endlini, ubucwebe, izikhali, izihlamvu nemali. Kusukela ngoJulayi 23, abasolwa bavinjelwe ukusebenzisa amabhange abo, ukuthola imiholo, ukubhanga ngobuchwepheshe besimanje.

KUSEMNYAMA ngokwakhiwa kwezindlu zesiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal eMgungundlovu, njengoba amaqembu abusa isifundazwe ngokubambisana ehlukene phakathi.Nakuba emaqenjini abusa ngokubambisana kukhona afuna ukuthi kuqhubeke ukwakhiwa kwezindlu zesiShayamthetho ezizokuba namahhovisi kahulumeni, amanye amaqembu afuna ukuthi isiShayamthetho sibuyele oLundi.USomlomo, uNksz Nontembeko Boyce, uthe lolu daba uselushiyele emaqenjini abusa ngokubambisana ukuba aluxoxe.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ethula isabelomali sesiShayamthetho ngoLwesihlanu.UNksz Boyce ubephendula inkulumo kaSotswebhu we-DA, uDkt Imran Keeka, ocele ukuthi kuvuselelwe izingxoxo zokwakhiwa kwesiShayamthetho.Udaba lokwakhiwa kwezindlu zesiShayamthetho eMgungundlovu, ludala, laqalwa ukukhulunywa ngesikhathi kusuka isiShayamthetho oLundi, ngo-2004.Nakuba kade lwaqala ukukhulunywa lolu daba, akukho mnyakazo otheni owenziwe.Umnyakazo oqaphelekile wenziwa owayengundunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube, owamemezela ukuthi kuzoqala ukwakhiwa kwezindlu zesiShayamthetho ezizobiza u-R6 billion.Lokhu wakwenza ngesikhathi ethula inkulumo yakhe ngesimo sesifundazwe yokugcina, ngasekuqaleni konyaka.Ukungabuyeli kwe-ANC emandleni kushiye ungabazane ngokwakhiwa kwezindlu zesiShayamthetho njengoba isibambisene namaqembu afuna ukuthi isiShayamthetho sibuyele oLundi.I-IFP ne-NFP bafuna ukuthi isiShayamthetho sibuyele oLundi.Nakho ukubuyela kwesiShayamthetho oLundi kubukeka kungelula. Muva nje uNdunankulu Thami Ntuli, uthe lolu daba lusadinga ukuxoxwa.Lokhu wakusho ngesikhathi eyokwethula iKhabhinethi yakhe eSilweni.UKeeka uthe unethemba lokuthi uMnyango kaMgcinimafa kuzwelonke nasesifundazweni, noMnyango wezeMisebenzi yoMphakathi neNgqalasizinda esifundazweni, izoqala kabusha izingxoxo zokwakhiwa kwezindlu zesiShayamthetho, eMgungundlovu.Uthe uhambo lwakamumva lwamalungu esiShayamthetho lwaseScotland, lukhombise ngokusobala ukuthi kufuneka kwakhiwe isiShayamthetho.UNksz Boyce uthe uyazi ukuthi kunokungavumelani ngalolu daba, wabalula kakhulu ingwevu ye-IFP, uMnuz Blessed Gwala, athe iyazi ukuthi abavumelani nayo ngalolu daba.UNksz Boyce uthe amaqembu abusa ngokubambisana kufanele baluxoxe udaba. “Ekugcineni kufanele sivumelane. Yingakho ngithi ngizoyishiyela kubaholi bamaqembu abusa ngokubambisana ukuba axoxe.”

Umhlaziyi wezepolitiki uthi kusekuncane lokhu kuxabana kwamaqembu abusa ngokubambisana KwaZulu-Natal kududulana owe-ANC nowe-IFP.UMnuz Zakhele Ndlovu waseNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal, uthe asazoxabana kakhulu amaqembu aphethe ngokubambisana esifundazweni.Ubekusho lokhu emva kokujikijelana ngamazwi kukaNobhala we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Bheki Mtolo, noMphathiswa wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu oyilungu le-IFP, uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi.Ingxabano yabo iqalwe nguMtolo, osole uButhelezi ngokuzenzela umathanda komasipala.Esitatimendeni, uMtolo uthe uButhelezi uhamba eshintsha abalawuli nezimenenja zomasipala ngaphandle kokulandela imigomo.Abalawuli abashintshiwe kusukela kungene uButhelezi bakoMasipala Inkosi Mtubatuba, uMkhanyakude nasoThukela.UMtolo uthe ukuziphatha kukaButhelezi kubeka engcupheni ukusebenza kukahulumeni wokubambisana.“Angeke sivume ukuthi uButhelezi azenzele umathanda. Selokhu akhethwa, uzibona emkhulu ukunohulumeni wokubambisana. Ngifuna ukumkhumbuza ukuthi alikho iqembu elanqoba ngamalengiso KwaZulu-Natal. Wonke amaqembu kufanele asebenze ngokubambisana.”Nokho uButhelezi uthe angeke ezwe ngoMtolo.“UMtolo kufanele akhumbule ukuthi i-ANC yaphuma emandleni ngoMeyi 29. Akangadidwa ukuthi kunohulumeni wokubambisana bese ezitshela ukuthi kusaphethe i-ANC. Ziphelile izinsuku lapho uMtolo ezotshela khona umphathiswa nezikhulu zomnyango ukuthi akwenziweni. Mina ngakhethwa undunankulu.”UButhelezi uthe kunenkohlakalo eningi ebiyenzeka emnyangweni ngaphambi kokuthi afike, wathi bazoqala uphenyo athe lungase luholele ekutheni kube khona ababoshwayo.Akukapheli ngisho izinyanga ezimbili uhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal wokubambisana waqokwa njengoba sekuqala uqhekeko.I-IFP ne-ANC iwona maqembu amakhulu kuhulumeni wokubambisana, iwona aphethe izikhundla eziningi.UNdlovu uthe akuthusi ukudonsisana kukaMtolo noButhelezi.“Iqiniso ukuthi la maqembu awazange azikhethele ukusebenzisana, aphoqwa imiphumela yokhetho. La maqembu azosebenzisa izikhundla abelwa zona ukukhankasela ukhetho lohulumeni basekhaya oluzayo.“UButhelezi uzofuna ukusebenzisa umnyango awunikiwe ukuveza inkohlakalo komasipala. Uzofuna ukuveza i-ANC njengeqembu elikhohlakele. Uzofuna ukuthi i-IFP ibonakale njengeqembu elisebenzayo.”UNdlovu uthe kuningi okusazoqhatha amaqembu, kodwa wathi akaboni umshado wawo uzoshabalala.“Basazoqhubeka nokumbulana izinqe kodwa bazohlala ndawonye ngoba bayazi ukuthi kungonakala okuningi uma bangahlukana. Ukuhlukana kwabo KwaZulu-Natal kungachaphazela uhulumeni kazwelonke njengoba nakhona bebambisene. Ngakho ke ngicabanga ukuthi abaholi bakazwelonke angeke bayivume leyo nto.”

ZISAZOQHUBEKA izinselelo ezibhekene noMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, zokungavalwa ngesikhathi kwezikhala zothisha, ukungaqashwa konogada, ukungaqashwa kwabahlanza izikole, ukushoda kwezinsiza-kufundisa okubalwa nezincwadi nokungakhokhelwa kwamanzi nogesi ngenxa yokunganeli kwesabelomali nakulo nyaka.Lezi zinkinga zeminyaka ezixake lo Mnyango, zizoqhubeka kunyaka wezimali u-2024/2025 nakuba isabelomali singu-R62.989 billion.Izinyunyana zothisha esifundazweni zihlala zikhala ngokungafakwa ngesikhathi kwemali yezikole, ukungavalwa kwezikhala zothisha abathatha ikhefu, ukushoda kwezinsiza-kufundisa, ukungakhokhelwa ngesikhathi kosonkontileka, nokufeyila ukukhokhela ugesi namanzi ngesikhathi, nangezinye izinkinga ezibhekene noMnyango.Zithi othishanhloko kuze kudingeke ukuthi basebenzise imali yabo ukutakula izikole.Umphathi wezezimali eMnyangweni, uMnuz Lalisingh Rambaran, uthe isimo sisenzima njengoba kusenohlelo lokuthi ingxenye ethile yemali, bengayitholi yonke kuMgcinimafa.Uveze ukuthi ingxenye enkulu yesabelomali iya emaholweni abasebenzi.“U-R51 billion uya emaholweni wabasebenzi bese kuthi enye imali iye ezikoleni. Kudingeka sifake izicelo kuMgcinimafa uma kudingeka sivale izikhala ezibalulekile emnyangweni,” usho kanje emhlanganweni wekomiti lezemfundo esiShayamthetho ebelizophasisa lesi sabelomali.Uveze nokuthi kumiswe nezinhlelo ezintsha zokulungiswa kwezikole, ngaphandle kwalezo ezikhahlanyezwe yizimvula nesichotho.Lokhu kusho ukuthi izikole ezidinga ukulungiswa zizothi ukuma kancane ngenxa yezinselelo.Kulo mhlangano, uMphathiswa woMnyango uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka, unxuse ukuthi leli komiti lisebenzisane nelezezimali ukuthi kuyiwe kuMgcinimafa, kuyonxuswa ukuthi achathazele lo Mnyango imali.UHlomuka ubuye waveza eyobugebengu obenzeka ezikoleni kanjalo nezehlakalo zokuhlaselwa kothisha, balinyazelwe emagcekeni ezikole, wathi kudinga ukubambisana kwezinhlaka ezehlukene.Uthe onogada abakhona ezikoleni baqashwe ngumnyango abaqashiwe yizinkampani ezizimele njengoba kunamalungu esiShayamthetho abethi kumele onogada baqashwe ngumnyango.UNksz Hlengiwe Mavimbela we-ANC, uvumelene nombono wokuthi basebenzisane nekomiti lezezimali ukuze kuyiwe kuMgcinimafa kuyonxenxwa ukuthi achathazele lo mnyango imali.Ukhale ngesimo esingesihle sokuthi kuzogqoza ukuhlinzekwa kwamathuluzi okusebenza ezikoleni ekubeni kubhekwe imiphumela ka-matric ekupheleni konyaka.UMnuz Siphiwe Moyo weqembu i-MK, ukhale ngokushoda konogada ezikoleni zesifundazwe nabafundi abangakuqondi abakufundayo uma beqhathaniswa namanye amazwe. I-MK ne-EFF abasesekanga isabelomali, kwathi amanye amaqembu okuyi-ANC, IFP ne-DA baseseka.

SISANKENENEZA ezindlebeni zakhe isililo sozakwabo becela usizo, kumsebenzi osale nezibazi zokusha kodwa wakwazi ukuphulukundlela kungqongqa abayisithupha abebezama ukucima umlilo wamadlelo obusha ubuhanguhangu, eMpophomeni kuMasipala waseMngeni, ngeSonto.Umgilwa igama lakhe eligodliwe ngenhloso yokumvikela, uthe akubone kwenzeka kuyisithombe azophila naso impilo yakhe yonke njengoba kusenzima ukwamukela indlela abone ozakwabo beyiyo ngemizuzwana nje kade bephila kungekho ocabanga ukuthi kunento ebuhlungu ezobehlela.Ngesikhathi Isolezwe  livakashele kubo kamgilwa, limfice elele ngenxa yezinhlungu ebhandishe isitho nasemathangeni womabili, engakwazi nokuhamba kahle, esebenzisa induku.“Sithole umbiko obuthi kuyasha. Ngesikhathi sizama ukucima, kuqapheleke ukuthi amalangabi omlilo angaphezu kwamandla, induna ebisigadile yasiyalela ukuthi siqhele bese sizame ukuqhamukela ngakolunye uhlangathi. Kodwa ngokushesha, umoya uvunguze wabheka ngalapho bese singakhona usunamandla kakhulu,” usho kanje.Uthe ubephambili asebenza nabo bengemuva kwakhe, ngesikhathi ephenduka ubengasaboni muntu kodwa ezwa ngesililo, wazama ukubaleka kodwa amalangabi esevele emhangulile njengoba izinto abezigqokile kudingeke azikhumule sezivutha.“Ngesikhathi ngibaleka, bekunzima ngoba sibeletha isigubhu emhlane esinamalitha awu-20 amanzi, okwenza kubenzima ukugijima naso. Ngicabanga ukuthi abaningi bahlulwe ukugijima naso ngoba indawo beyenyukela siphefumula intuthu,” kuqhuba yena.Uthe bebeqeqeshwe izinsuku ezintathu kuphela kanti ezimbili kuzona besekilasini befundiswa ngomlilo. Uthe baqashwe yinkampani i-Formusa kasonkontileka osebenza ngaphansi kwenkampani, i-Sappi yaveza ukuthi alukho usizo asalutholile ngisho lokwelulekwa ngokomqondo. Uthe emva kokuqeqeshwa, azikho izitifiketi abanikwe zona.Uveze ukuthi ubesanamasonto yena nabanye asebenza nabo beqashiwe, kanti umqashi ubebabambela kuphela imali ye-Unemployment Insurence Fund.Kulesi sigameko kudlule emhlabeni abesifazane abahlanu nowesilisa oyedwa, kanti omunye wesilisa kuthiwa isimo sakhe sibi esibhedlela.Kwabadlule emhlabeni kulesi sigameko kukhona; uNksz Ntombifuthi Ngcobo, Nksz Ntombikhona Nxele, Mnuz Vusi Radula, Nksz Nonsikelelo Zuma, Nksz Khethiwe Ngcobo noNksz Mabongi Sishane.UNksz Amanda Sishane ongudadewabo kaMabongi, uthe bewumndeni bafe olwembiza ngokulahlekelwa udadewabo kule nhlekelele.“Bekuwuyena kuphela osebenzayo futhi esondla ekhaya. Sekusele mina, izingane zakhe ezintathu neyami nomama lapha ekhaya. Bekungunyaka wakhe ka-12 esebenza e-Formusa kanti ubengasisona isicimamlilo kodwa bebecelwa nje ukuthi benze lo msebenzi uma sekufike ubusika beqeqeshwe izinsukwana, uma kuqala ihlobo baphindele emsebenzini wabo wokutshala amahlathi,” usho kanje.Kuthintwa osebenza ophikweni lwezicishamlilo eThekwini osemnkantshubomvu kulo msebenzi ocele ukungadalulwa, uveze ukuthi ukuqeqeshelwa lo msebenzi kuthatha izinyanga ezine zonke futhi ngaphambi kokuqasha kuningi okubhekwayo kumuntu kubalwa nesimo sakhe sempilo.UMnuz Alson Ngesi okhulumela iFormusa, uthe abasebenzi babenikezwe ukuqeqeshwa okwanele, kodwa wavala ucingo ngesikhathi ecelwa ukuthi aqinisekise ukuthi baqeqeshwa izinsuku ezintathu kuphela.UNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu uMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa noNdunankulu esifundazweni uMnuz Thami Ntuli nabanye abaphathiswa beminyango, bahambele imindeni ukuyobhonga emsanweni.  UHlabisa uthe ngokombiko, umonakalo odalwe imililo ehlasele lesi sifundazwe ulinganiselwa ku-R90 million.

USAKUTHOLA kunzima ukuphila ngaphandle kwendodakazi yakhe, owesifazane okwadlwengulwa kwabulawa indodakazi yakhe maqede isidumbu salahlwa ngaphansi kwebhuloho elikuN2 ngoDisemba 23  nyakenye.Lokhu kuvezwe yilungu lalo mndeni, uMnuz Philani Nzuza ngesikhathi ekhuluma neSolezwe ngesimo sikaNkk Nomusa Xulu (44) waseGreytown.Icala beliqhubeka eNkantolo yeMantshi, yaseThekwini. Umufi uNksz  Nonhlakanipho Buthelezi ( 26) kuthiwa wayephuma endaweni yokuzijuxuza, eChestervile, iClassic Lounge ngesikhathi ehlelwa yilo mshophi.Kuthiwa yena nomngani wakhe owasinda kwathi sekuyisikhathi sokuthi baphindele endlini eManzimtoti, kwaqhamuka imoto eyayinabesilisa abane yathi izobagodukisa.Abesilisa ababengaphakathi ngabasolwa okunguMnuz Nkosinathi Emmanuel Ndala (23), Sphamandla Mkhulise (24), Sphamandla Thulani Bhengu (24) noThalent Mbongeleni Ntanzi  (21).Bonke babhekene namacala okuphanga, ukudlwengula nokubulala.Kuthiwa maphakathi nendlela benqaba ukubehlisa kunalokho imoto baze bayipaka emgwaqweni uN2 oya KwaDukuza.Kuthiwa babadlwengula bobabili, lo omunye waphunyuka umufi wehluleka ukudlubulundela bambulala. Eseshonile bamphanga konke ayenakho."Iqiniso elimsulwa ukuthi kunina wengane impilo ayiphindanga yafana selokhu kwavela lo mshophi. Kulukhuni kuyena ukwamukela ukuthi indodakazi yakhe yabulawa," kuchaza uNzuza.Uthe indlela unina kamufi ahlukumezeke ngayo uhluleka nawukuza enkantolo.UMshushisi u-Advocate Calvin Govender uthe kungaba ngcono ukuthi icala lihlehle njengoba kusekhona uphenyo olwenziwayo.IMantshi uMnuz Zuma uthe ngenxa yezicelo eseziphakanyiswe nguMshushisi uyavumelana nokuthi lihlehliselwe uMeyi 8 nonyaka.Abameli babasolwa nabo bavumelene ngokuthi lihlehliswe icala.Ngaphakathi enkantolo kuzwakale ukuhhumuzela okukhulu kumalungu omphakathi ngesikhathi kumenyezelwa ukuhlehliswa kwalo.Iningi labebesenkantolo beleseka umndeni womgilwa.Bekukhona nabanye besifazane ebebehlezi ndawonye okukholakala ukuthi bahlobene nabasolwa.Abasolwa babonakale bebaphakamisela izandla ngesikhathi sebehla bephindela esitokisini. Oyedwa wabesifazane obefake isikibha esimhlophe ubonakale ekhala izinyembezi.Abasolwa bebebonakala bekhululekile. Isicelo sabo sebheyili sachithwa.

Iseqhulwini eyokuhlonishwa koMthethosisekelo wezwe, eyokungacwasi ngokwebala nangokobulili, eyokugqugquzelwa koxolo nokubuyisana kanjalo neyozinzo kuhulumeni wasekhaya ezisekelweni ezilawula uhulumeni wobumbano, ohlanganisa amaqembu amahlanu kuleli. Ngaphansi kwalezi zisekelo, uMengameli wezwe uCyril Ramaphosa nguyena onamandla okuqoka iKhabhinethi yakhe. Amaqembu ayingxenye kahulumeni wobumbano yi-ANC, DA, IFP, Patriotic Alliance neGood.UNobhala jikelele we-ANC uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, ekhuluma nabezindaba muva nje, uveze ukuthi izandla zisavuliwe nakwamanye amaqembu ukuthi angaba yingxenye yalo hulumeni.UMbalula uthe abasebenzi ngokuthi iqembu elabamnyama ngoba elakuleli lihlanganisa zonke izinhlanga. Uthe basebenza namaqembu ahlonipha uMthethosisekelo wezwe, angacwasi ngokobulili nangokobuhlanga kanjalo neminye imigomo ethuthukisa izwe.Amaqembu abambisene kuhulumeni anezihlalo ezingu-273 ePhalamende. Lokhu kusho ukuthi ano-68%.UMbalula uthe baphoqwe ngabavoti ukuthi basebenzisane namanye amaqembu njengoba lingekho iqembu elawina ngamalengiso okhethweni lukazwelonke nolwezifundazwe.“Akuyona inkinga edalwe yi-ANC, kodwa abavoti abathi kumele sibambisane. Abantu abathi abafuni kube nohulumeni ophethwe yiqembu elilodwa, yingakho sinalo hulumeni,” kusho uMbalula.Njengoba abantu bengayi nxanye bengemanzi, baningi abangeneme ngalesi sivumelwano sikahulumeni wobumbano. Ngaphakathi kwi-ANC kukhona abangeneme kanjalo nakwamanye amaqembu. Nezinyunyana zabasebenzi azeneme ngalesi sinyathelo.Abanye bakhala ngokuthi imigomo ye-DA neye-ANC iyashayisana, ikakhulu ezintweni ezithinta ezemfundo, umhlaba nokuvikelwa kwamalungelo abasebenzi.Abanye bebefuna ukuthi kubambisane amaqembu ‘abamnyama’ ne-ANC, okubalwa Umkhonto weSizwe, oholwa owayengumengameli wezwe uJacob Zuma, i-EFF, IFP namanye.I-ANC ike yakubalula ukuthi ayikwazanga ukusebenzisana ne-MK ngoba eminye yemibandela yayo bekuwukuchitha uMengameli Ramaphosa. UMbalula ukubalulile ukuthi ukusebenzisana kwabo namaqembu anemibono ehluke kakhulu kunekaKhongolose, akusho lutho ngoba ngeke baguquke babe yilawo maqembu.“Ngeke sishintshe imigomo yethu ifane neye-DA, ngeke futhi isigwinye. Ne-DA ngeke ishintshe imigomo yayo ilandele eye-ANC njengoba sibambisene. Sibambisene ukuze siyise izwe phambili,” kusho uMbalula.Okunye okuseqhulwini emigomeni ngukuthi uma kukhona ukungavumelani kwamaqembu, kumele kusetshenziswe ezinye izindlela zokuzama isixazululo uma kunongqingetshe.Umhlaziyi wezepolitiki uSolwazi Ntsikelelo Breakfast, uthe okuhle manje ngukuthi sekunemigomo amaqembu asesebenzela phezu kwayo.Ekhuluma nesiteshi sethelevishini iNewzroom Afrika, uBreakfast uthe le migomo izokwazi ukunqanda abazonhlanhlatha.“Kunento amaqembu azobe esebenzela phezu kwayo kunokuthi nje wonke umuntu adonse abheke le, nomunye abheke kwenye indawo.”

UKUBANJWA inkunzi kwezimoto ezithwala imali kuyaqhubeka nokuba yiva elingabanguleki ezweni.Lokhu kushiwo yiNhloko yoKlebe u-Lt General Gofrey Lebeya, esithangamini nabezindaba ePitoli ngoLwesihlanu, nobekuhloswe ngaso ukwenekela umphakathi igxathu eselihanjwe yilolu phiko ukulwa nobugebengu ekoteni yokugcina yonyaka wezimali u-2023/2024.“Lolu phiko ngokubambisana nezinkampani ezizimele, luyaqhubeka nokuqinisa izinhlelo ukulwa nalesi sihlava. Imigulukudu ebamba inkunzi izimoto ezithwala imali, ingabantu abanesihluku abangenandaba nempilo yomunye umuntu.,” usho kanje.Uthe kule kota nje kuphela angu-51 amacala okubanjwa kwenkunzi kwezimoto ezithwala imali kanti bangu-20 ababoshiwe, babe ngu-15 abagwetshelwe amacala afanayo.ULebeya uthe lolu phiko uthe selubophe abantu abangu-547 ngamacala ehlukene kule kota, okukhona kuwo awenkohlakalo, athinta ukukhwabaniswa kwezimali, nawokuhwebelana ngemali ngendlela engekho emthethweni, awokubulawa kwamaphoyisa, ukumbiwa kwezimayini ngokungekho emthethweni nokubanjwa kwenkunzi izimoto ezithwala imali. Amaphesenti angu- 80 ababoshiwe abakuleli bese kuthi angu- 20, ngabokufika kuleli. Isifundazwe esizihola phambili ngababoshwe yilolu phiko, yi- Gauteng.Zingu-736 izibhamu ezitholwe kubasolwa nezinhlamvu ezingu-1159.Angu-22 amaphoyisa abulewe kule kota, angu-17 kuwona abulawe engekho emsebenzini.Kuqoqwe izidakamizwa ezingabiza imali eyevile ku- 47 million kwaboshwa abasolwa abangu-68 kanti abangu-42 kubona abakuleli bese kuthi abanye abokufika.

ABACULI bakamaskandi bashaqekile ngesikhathi kuvela igama likazakwabo ohlwini lwabasolwa ngokubulala umrepha wakuleli, uKiernan ‘AKA’ Forbes. UMnuz Lindani Zenzele Ndimande (35), emculweni kamaskandi waziwa ngoShiselansimbi, ungummangalelwa wesibili kuleli cala. Yize umculi wasoCilwane, kwesakwaMthethwa, eMpangeni, ekhiphe ama-albhamu amathathu kodwa yingoma yango-2021, ethi Iyozala Nkomoni, emgqamise kakhulu ngenxa yokubophela izihlabani zomculo. Phakathi kwabaculi abasebenze noShiselansimbi kubalwa uBuselaphi engomeni ethi Wayeyinsizwa Ubaba, uNdoni engomeni ethi Nhliziyo Yami, uSphe Zulu (oseke wacula noKhuzani NeZingane Zoma) kwethi Umthakathi, uPinky Mabaso weShabalala Rhythm naMaYellowbone kwethi Nyathela Ngamandla noMaqhinga Hadebe onguphrojusa futhi omdlalela isigingci. UMaqhinga, obuye acule neShabalala Rhythm noQadasi, uthe umazi kahle uShiselansimbi ngenxa yokuthi ungumkhaya wakhe futhi basebenze kakhulu naye emculweni. “Ngabe unamanga ongathi wake wathi nxa kuye. Ubengakwazi ukuthi ‘Sawubona’ kodwa uthi ‘Amen.’” Nakuba kunjalo uthe abantu abangazi kangcono ngempilo yakhe umndeni wakhe. UBuselaphi uthe umazi umsolwa njengomculi ozihloniphayo nongazwani nento engasile. UNdoni, ongumkhaya wakhe, unxuse ukungaphawuli lutho ngomsolwa. Isolezwe like labika ngomcimbi wokwethulwa kwe-albhamu kaShiselansimbi, owawusehholo lomphakathi eCilwane, ngoJuni 2021. Kanti omakhelwane bakhe bamchaza njengomuntu oyisibonelo esihle. Lo maskanda kuthiwa wahleshulelwa uR133 000, esambeni semali ewuR800 000 obikwa ukuthi wakhokhelwa ababulali baka-AKA. Ngokophenyo lwamaphoyisa, iseleula kaShiselansimbi iveza ukuthi wayekhona umculi endaweni yesigameko phambi kwaseWish on Florida,  eThekwini, waxhumana nomunye wabamangalelwa.U-AKA, nomngani wakhe uTebello ‘Tibz’ Motsoane, balalelwa unyendle ngabantu maqede  bashonela endaweni yesigameko ngesikhathi bephuma endaweni yokudlela.Kuleli cala uShiselansimbi, obuye abe wusomatekisi, usolwa noMnuz Lindokuhle Thabani Mkhwanazi (30), ongusomatekisi, uMnuz Siyanda Eddie Myeza (21) ongumahlalela eMlaza, uMnuz Mziwethemba Harvey Gwabeni (36) ongusomabhizinisi onezimayini eLimpopo, uMnuz Lindokuhle Ndimande (29) onepulazi eCamperdown ngaseMgungundlovu, uMnuz Siyabonga Gezani Ndimande/Nxele (28) noMnuz Malusi ‘Mjay’ Dave Ndimande (29). *Kwenzeka lokhu nje, kusanda kusala enkundleni omunye umculi kamaskandi uSjula ‘Iqhawe LakoMenziwa’ Biyela. Lokhu kwenzeka ngesikhathi amaphoyisa ophiko oluphenya amacala abucayi iNational Intervention Unit (NIU), edubulana nabasolwa ngobugebengu obenzeka eNtibane Lodge, phakathi kwasoLundi, naseMelmoth ngenyanga edlule. Kulesi sigameko, uSjula wadlula emhlabeni noMnuz Sihle ‘Gwajo’ Biyela, Mnuz Bizokwakhe Sithole noMnuz Lindani Ncanana.

LIZISHONELE izinkabi ezintathu zishaqwa amaphoyisa ngoMsombuluko ngecala lokubulala owesilisa waseCinci KwaMbonambi okuthiwa balenze ngoLwesihlanu olwedlule.Ngokusho kokhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda uthe abasolwa babanjwe eMlaza, eThekwini naseHighflats eXobho.Lezi zinkabi zisolwa ngecala lokuthumba, elokubulala, elokuzama ukubulala, elokutholwa nezibhamu ezingekho emthethweni nelezinhlamvu.Elandisa ngesigameko uNetshiunda, uthe ezintatha zangoLwesihlanu  abasolwa ababili bagasela emzini wabagilwa, bezenza amaphoyisa.“Bafuna ngodli isibhamu nemali kubaba wekhaya, bamphoqa ukuthi ahambe nabo. Kubikwa ukuthi abasolwa bamdubula bambulala maqede bamlahla esikhotheni,” kusho uNetshinda.Uqhube wathi baphinde babuyela emuva kunkosikazi kamufi, naye bamthatha bahamba naye.“Yena watholwa elahlwe endaweni yaseMposa, enenxeba lokudutshulwa ebusweni. Waphuthunyiswa emtholampilo oseduze,” kusho uNetshiunda.Udalule ukuthi abasolwa batholwe nezibhamu ezintathu nezinhlamvu. Uveze nokuthi nemoto ababebaleke ngayo nayo itholwe kubona.Umthombo ocele ukuthi igama lawo lingadalulwa, uthe umufi ubengumuntu obesezihlalela ekhaya njengoba esenesikhashana athatha umhlalaphansi.Uqhube wathi unkosikazi kamufi yena ungunogada emtholampilo.“Kuthiwa ngesikhathi befuna isibhamu kumufi kuvele ukuthi ilayisensi yaso ibisidlulelwe yisikhathi. Bathe ngoba ayivuselelwe, bayambopha kwaba ukuhamba kwabo naye,” kusho umthombo.Kuthintwa ilungu lomndeni, lithe ngeke likwazi ukuphawula ngoba  amaphoyisa abadonse ngendlebe athi abangakhulumi ngesigameko.Libuye lathi okunye okwenza bangafuni ukuphawula ukuthi basenovalo emva kwesigameko, bazizwa bengaphephile.UKhomishana wamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLieutenant General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi ukushayele ihlombe ukuzikhandla kwamaphoyisa asaqhubeka nokwenza konke okusemandleni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ubulungiswa buyenzeka.“Ngeke sivume ukuphathwa yizigebengu. Ngeke sikwazi ukuba nemiphakathi ehlalela ovalweni ngenxa yabantu abazishaya isifuba ngokuba obhongoza bobugebengu,” kusho uMkhwanazi.

Sishayelwe ihlombe wuMphathiswa wezokuThutha eKZN isinqumo senkantolo egwebe iminyaka engu-10 indoda eyabulala ngokungenhloso izihlobo zikangqongqoshe.UMnuz Sipho Hlomuka uthe ukugwetshwa kukaCelumusa Ngwenya (35), yiNkantolo yesiFunda eMnambithi, kuzothumela umyalezo oshubile nakwabanye abashayeli.UNgwenya uvume amacala okubulala ngokungenhloso amalungu ayisithupha kaNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha, uNkk Sindisiwe Chikunga engozini yomgwaqo wase eyagwetshwa.Uphucwe nelayisensi yakhe yokushayela ekhanseliwe.“Siyasincoma isinqumo senkantolo esenze lo mshayeli wabhekana nesenzo sakhe. Sizoba yisifundo kuyena nakwabanye abashayeli bezimoto abaqhubeka nokushayela budedengu,” kusho uHlomuka.Ukhuthaze izinkantolo ukuba ziqhubeke ngawo lo mgqigqo wokukhipha izigwebo eziwulolu hlobo.Isiphihli sengozi eyayinyantisa igazi sehla emgwaqweni onguthelawayeka uN11 eMnambithi ebusuku ngomhla ka-17 Julayi 2022.Yayiphakathi kwemine nengu-40 iminyaka yababhubha okwakuyindodana kangqongqoshe, inkosikazi nezingane zabo ezine.INational Prosecuting Authority eKZN ithe uNkk Chikunga walethela inkantolo umbiko lapho ezwakalisa ubuhlungu bakhe nesilonda asala naso ngokushona kwamalungu omndeni wakhe.Kuthiwa ingozi yenzeka uNgwenya esika imoto ejikeni ehamba ngesivinini sika-158km/h endaweni egunyazwe ijubane lika-80km/h.

Kuhluka imibiko yodokotela ecaleni lababulawa bangqongiswa kwabathathu, ngoJanuwari 25, 2022, eNkanini, eCato Manor.Ngosuku lwesigameko kwasocongwa abesilisa abathathu okungoMnuz Phumlani Tshekele, Numkile Mfenqe noRefilwe Mokoena.Kuvela ukuthi babekade besolwa umphakathi ngokuwuhlalisa lubhojozi, bedlwengula bedayisa izindlu zabantu ngodli.Kuvela ukuthi amalungu omphakathi abahlasela besendlini abathatha ayobokhela ngomillo bephakathi emotweni.Kwabe sekuboshwa abasolwa oMnuz Mmiseli Khondlo (41) odume ngelikaJomo, Vusimuzi Mazula ( 46), Thandekile Penelope Sithuntsa (37), Siphenathi Zoko (28) Mfanafuthi Muzi Masikane (37) noScelo Thusi (39).NgoLwesibili, eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini, bekukade kufakaza uDkt Tsikwe Lesego owayehlola izidumbu. Uveze ukuthi esidunjini sokuqala asihlola wathola ukuthi umufi washa wangqongqa, wathola nokuthi intuthu yiyona eyaba yimbangela yokuthi agcine edlulile emhlabeni.Uthe wathola ukuthi entanyeni kamufi kwakubhajwe izinhlayiya okungaqondakali ukuthi ngezani.Ngakolunye uhlangothi, uDkt Naidoo naye owayehlola izidumbu zabafi uyakuphikisa lokhu, uthe kwakungezona izinhlayiya kodwa kwakuyigazi elase lomele ngaphakathi esidunjini sokuqala.Kuningi okunye okusembikweni wokuhlolwa kwezidumbu kaDkt Naidoo okuphikisana nombiko kaDkt Lesego."Kusho ukuthi naye yindlela ahlola wathola ngayo ukuthi leliya yigazi. Mina kodwa ngokwami ukuhlola ngathola ukuthi leziya kwakuyizinhlayiya ezithile,'' usho kanje.Ngokombiko kaDkt Naidoo, kubuye kuvele ukuthi ingxenye yephaphu kulesi sidumbu sokuqala sase sibovu okwakuwumphumela wokuthi isidumbu sakhe sasha sangqongqa.Nalokhu futhi uDkt Lesego uthi yena akazange akubone. UDkt Lesego uveze nokuthi yena wasihlola isisu sesidumbu sokuqala, kodwa uthi njengoba embikweni kaDkt Naidoo kungaveli lutho olumayelana nesisu, lokho kuveza ukuthi akazange asihlole isisu sesidumbu sokuqala.Ngokombiko kaNaidoo izidumbu zazimnyama, kodwa uLesego uthi kunjalo kodwa, hhayi kuzona zonke izingxenye zomzimba."Phela isidumbu sibamnyama sonke uma kuya ngokuthi sonke sishe yonke indawo,'' echaza.UMshushisi, uCalvin Sing ubesabe emphicaphice njalo ngemibuzo uDkt Lesego.IJaji uChetts belibonakala linokudideka uma lizwa okushiwo uDkt Lesego ekuqhathanisa nombiko kaNaidoo.

ISHE yangqongqa ifemu ekhiqiza ikhemikhali esetshenziswa uma kwakhiwa imikhiqizo yotshwala eProspecton, eSiphingo eThekwini ngeSonto.Ngokusho kosophikweni lwezicishamlilo eThekwini, uMnuz Perigassen Goveder, akekho oshonile noma olimalile kulesi sigameko esenzeke efemini i-IPA ezintatha.“Sithole ucingo lusibizela endaweni yesigameko phakathi kwamabili. Bekungabo-12:30 ezintatha ngesikhathi sifika endaweni yesigameko, saqala ukucisha umlilo obusha ubuhanguhangu,” kusho uGovender.Uqhube wathi bafike bathola ukuthi bekunabasebenzi abayishumi endaweni yesigameko ngesikhathi kuqala umlilo.“Kubona akulimalanga noyedwa, bakwazile ukuphuma bephephile,” kucacisa uGovender.Uthe okwamanje imbangela yomlilo ibingakahlonzwa, wathi abakutholile ukuthi ifemu ibikhiqiza ikhemikhali esetshenziswa emikhiqizweni yotshwala.Uthe bakwazile ukuwucisha ngempumelelo umlilo, yize kucekeleke phansi yonke impahla ebikulefemu.

ISIKHULU se-IEC KwaZulu- Natal uNkk Ntombifuthi Masinga, sithi kushone abantu ababili abebesuka ezikhungweni zokuvota.UNkk Masinga ubekhuluma esithangamini sabezindaba esikhungweni semiphumela e-ICC, eThekwini. Uthe omunye kwabashonile uwe evenini washona ephuma ukuyovota eMsinga.Omunye ugwazwe washona eBulwer, esuka esikhungweni sokuvota ngesikhathi exabana nomuntu thizeni. Udlulise amazwi enduduzo emndenini yabashonile.UNkk Masinga uthe kube nezigameko zokushayana kwezinye izindawo. Uthe eMlalazi, eShowe kube nesigameko sokushawa komuntu esikhungweni. Kukhona nomunye oshawe eCato Ridge.Uphinde wabika ngokuboshwa komsebenzi we-IEC eMgungundlovu, obesolwa ngomkhonyovu wamabhokosi okuvota. Uthe bawachazelile amaphoyisa ukuthi umsebenzi wabo ubesebenza kepha wasolwa abathile ngokukhwabanisa.UNkk Masinga uthe udaba lusaphenywa ngamaphoyisa kanti ibhokisi lokuvota lithathiwe. Uthe ngaphandle kwalokho ukuvota kuhambe kahle nokubala kusaqhubeka.

SIKHULU isililo ngokudlula emhlabeni kwemenenja kaMasipala waseDumbe, uMnuz John Khumalo.UKhumalo ushone engozini yemoto eyenzeke phakathi kwedolobha iDumbe neVryheid, ngoLwesithathu, ekuseni.Imininingwane yengozi edlule nomphefumulo kaKhumalo ayicacile kahle.Izithombe ezisabalale ezinkundleni zokuxhumana zikhombise imoto kaKhumalo nenye ukuthi zitholane mahlanze.Zombili izimoto bezishayiseke kakhulu ngaphambili, enye yazo ibilele ngohlangothi.UKhumalo uchazwe njengesikhulu ebesizinikele emsebenzini waso futhi sikwazi ukusebenza nawo wonke amaqembu ezepolitiki.UKhumalo usebenze kulo mkhandlu kuphethe i-IFP, nangesikhathi kuphethe i-ANC, njengoba manje sekuphethe iNFP.USotswebhu we-NFP esifundeni iZululand, uMnuz Siphamandla Ntombela, uthe bagqemeke engeqiwa ntwala ngokushona kukaKhumalo.“Ibuhlungu indaba kaMntungwa, umuntu obezinikele ekusebenzeleni umphakathi, ubenothando nentobeko. Ziningi izindawo uKhumalo asebenze kuzo. Umsebenzi ubewenza ngokwethembeka.”UNtombela uthe uKhumalo ubesebenza nabo bonke abaholi bamaqembu ehlukene.“UMntungwa usebenzile ebuholini be-IFP, obe-ANC nobe-NFP. Ubekwazi ukuhlukanisa ipolitiki yobuqembu nomsebenzi kahulumeni. Zimbalwa izimenenja zomasipala ezisebenze ngaphansi kwamaqembu ahlukene. Uyingxenye yabambalwa abasebenze ngokwethembeka emaqenjini ehlukene. UNtombela uthe ngeke bawakhohlwe amagalelo kaKhumalo.“Sifisa ukukhalela umkakhe, izingane zakwabo, izingane zakhe, umndeni kanye noMkhandlu waseDumbe. Sisadumele namanje ngalezi zindaba esivuke ngazo.”UKhumalo uyindodana yengwevu ye-IFP engasekho, uMnuz Zakhele ‘MZ’ Khumalo, owayengunobhala wezokuphatha kwi-IFP futhi esondelene kakhulu nomsunguli wale nhlangano, inkosi Mangosuthu Buthelezi.Imizamo yokuthola iMeya kaMasipala waseDumbe, uMnuz Sibusiso Mkhabela, ayizange iphumelele njengoba ucingo lwakhe belukhala lungabanjwa futhi engazange ayiphendule imiyalezo ayithunyelwe.Kanjalo nemizamo yokuthola umndeni ayizange iphumelele.

KUSHONE  isiguli  sesibili esihaqwe upokisi wezinkawu KwaZulu-Natal.UMnyango wezeMpilo kuleli, izolo, uthe owesilisa wesibili oshonile ngowesilisa oneminyaka engu-40 waseMnambithi,  kanti ushonele ekhaya. Kuhlonzwe eseshonile ukuthi ubehaqekile ngoba ubengazange aye esikhungweni sezempilo.Isibalo sabantu abahaqwe ileli gciwane kuleli sesenyukele kubantu abangu-16, kubo bathathu abantu abashonile. Kwabashonile ababili abaKwaZulu-Natal, oyedwa owaseTembisa.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMpilo, uMnuz Foster Mohale, uthe imiphumela yokuhlolwa kwalo wesilisa kuqinisekiswe ngeSonto.Uthe lo wesilisa ubenezimpawu ze-mpox okuwutwayi emzimbeni wonke. Izigameko ezimbili ezihlonzwe kamuva ziqinisekiswe eGauteng, isigameko sokuqala indoda eneminyaka engu-43 neneminyaka engu-29."Bobabili abahlonzwe kamuva abanawo umlando wokuphumela emazweni angaphandle kwaleli," kusho uMohale.Kwabangu-16 abahaqwe ileli gciwane,  abayisishiyagalombili abaKwaZulu-Natal, abayisikhombisa baseGauteng, noyedwa owaseWestern Cape.

Kushone oyedwa ngemuva kokuba imoto iphume ebhulohweni lomgwaqo uR102 oThongathi.Abezimo eziphuthumayo ngaphansi kwenkampani i-IPSS Medical Rescue bayaqhubeka nomsebenzi wokutakula imoto ephaphalaze yawela ezansi kwebhuloho ku-R102 ngaseMaidstone oThongathi. Imibiko evela endaweni yesigameko iveza ukuthi umshayeli uhlulekile ukulawula imoto yaphuma emgwaqweni yayolala ngophahla ezansi kwebhuloho.Uyedwa umuntu okuqinisekiswe ukuthi ushonile, kodwa abezimo eziphuthumayo basacinga mfuleni ukubona ukuthi akekho yini omunye ongakatholakali.

KUSHUBE umbango wokuhola iKwaZulu-Natal amaqembu ezepolitiki eqinisa imikhankaso yawo yokhetho lwangesonto elizayo.Amaqembu asembangweni wokuhola iKwaZulu-Natal, i-ANC ne-IFP abe nemikhankaso emikhulu ezingxenyeni zeKwaZulu-Natal kule mpelasonto.IKwaZulu-Natal ingeyesibili ngokwesibalo esiphezulu sabantu ababhalisele ukuvota.I-ANC ithumele uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, ukuba azoqinisa umkhankaso wayo wokhetho.URamaphosa uchithe izinsuku ezintathu ekhankasa ezifundeni iTheku, iMoses Mabhida, Inkosi Bhambatha, neGeneral Gizenga Mpanza.URamaphosa uvale umkhankaso wakhe eThekwini.Uqale ngokuyokotha inkosi yaseMangangeni, uBhekamanganga Shozi, wabe eseyokhuluma nabalandeli be-ANC abebehlangene eSiphingo.URamaphosa uthe akakungabazi ukuthi i-ANC izonqoba KwaZulu-Natal.“Laba abathi iKZN bazoyithatha, bayaphupha, amaphupho nje. Nina njengamavolontiya e-ANC nizokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi i-ANC iyalunqoba ukhetho. Anizukugcina ngokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi siyanqoba KwaZulu-Natal, nizophinde nenze isiqiniseko sokuthi siyanqoba nakuzwelonke.”URamaphosa uthe kuningi okwenziwe i-ANC ukushintsha impilo yabantu.Uthe umthetho womshwalense wezempilo asanda kuwusayina, iNational Health Insurance, uzoshintsha impilo yabantu.“INHI izoqeda ukucwaswa kwabantu ezikhungweni zezempilo. Bonke abantu bazothola usizo lwezempilo ngokulingana.”Bekungokokugcina ukuba uRamaphosa akhankase KwaZulu-Natal ngaphambi kokhetho oluzayo.I-IFP  ibe nomcimbi omkhulu eThekwini, enkundleni iKing Zwelithini, eMlaza.Inkundla ibigcwele phama.Ophakanyiselwe kwesikandunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, uthe i-IFP kuphela enomlando wokuletha izidingo kubantu.“I-IFP ayikhulumi ngomlomo, inemisebenzi ebonakalayo.”UNtuli uthe bakhathazekile ngokungahanjiswa kwezidingo kuMasipala waseThekwini.“Uma siwina ukhetho sizowuhlakaza uMasipala waseThekwini, kuqalwe phansi ukuvota.”UNtuli uthe kubashiya nemibuzo ukusayinwa komshwalense wezempilo sekubhekwe okhethweni.“Asiwugxeki lo mthetho kodwa kungani usayinwa ngoba nakhu sekuyiwa okhethweni? Kungani uhulumeni ungathathanga le mali wayothuthukisa ngayo izibhedlela nemitholampilo? Kungani kungaqashwanga odokotela?”Nabanye abagaqele esobundunankulu KwaZulu-Natal bebengazibekile phansi.Omele iDA, uMnuz Chris Pappas, uhambele inkonzo yokukhulekela ukhetho ebiseWestville, wabe esedlulela enkonzweni ebiseLutheran Church, eThekwini.Omele i-ActionSA, uMnuz Zwakele Mncwango, ubekhankasa kwaDukuza, ngoMgqibelo.NgeSonto wethule inkulumo enkonzweni eCFCI, oLundi.UMncwango uthe kuzokuba noshintsho ekubusweni kwezwe emva kokhetho.Uthe ufisa ukuthi abazongena emandleni kube abantu abamesabayo uNkulunkulu.

ABENZA ucwaningo ngokubiza kokudla bathi awukho umehluko ozokwenziwa wukudlondlobala kwamandla emali kubantu bakuleli.NgoLwesithathu, iStatsSA sikhiphe izibalo eziveze ukuthi amandla emali asuke ku-5.3% ngoMashi aya ku-5.2% ngo-Ephreli.UMnuz Meryvn Abrahams obhekelele ukusebenza kwe-Pietermaritzburg Economic Justice & Dignity Group, eyenza ucwaningo ngentengo yokudla, uthe okwamanje akukho okuzojabulisa abantu ngoba amaveji nokunye ukudla kusaqhubeka nokumba eqolo.“Siyakwamukela ukuthi amandla emali athe ukudlondlobala kodwa lokhu ngeke kwehlise umthwalo emahlombe abantu bakuleli abathwele kanzima ngenxa yokubiza kwempilo. Amaveji asetshenziswa njalo okubalwa amazambane, u-anyanisi, u-pepper nokunye kusabiza. Igilosa yomndeni ibiza uR5 336.31. Lokhu kusho ukuthi abantu bathwele kanzima kanti njengoba amaveji esabiza, awukho umehluko ozokwenzeka ngezibalo zakamuva zamandla emali,” kusho u-Abrahams.Uthe mhlawumbe umehluko uzobakhona uma sekuvunwe amaveji atshalwe manje ebusika.Ugqugquzele abaqashi ukuba banyuse amaholo abasebenzi ukuze bakwazi ukuba nemali eyanele yokuthenga ukudla.“Uhulumeni naye kufanele anyuse izibonelelo ukuze abantu bakuleli bezokwazi ukuthola ukudla okunomsoco. Okwamanje kuyabiza ukuphila eNingizimu Afrika,” kusho u-Abrahams.USolwazi Bonke Dumisa, oyisazi somnotho esizimele, uthe izibalo zakamuva zamandla emali zisho ukuthi abantu bakuleli akufanele balindele ukuthi kwehle imali-mboleko.Uthe ibhange lombuso iSouth African Reserve Bank (Sarb), lifuna amandla emali abe phakathi kuka-3% no-6%.“Angiyiboni iSarb yehlisa imali-mboleko kulo nyaka ngoba ukuze inyakaze kuyodingeka ukuthi amandla emali abe ku-4.5%. Abantu abaqhubeke nokubopha izifociya ngoba iqiniso lithi okwamanje ngeke yehle imali mboleko,” kusho uDumisa.UNksz Koketso Mano oyisazi somnotho eFNB, uthe abalindele ukuthi amandla emali adlondlobale kakhulu ngoMeyi, kodwa balindele ukuthi uphethroli uqhubeke nokwehla uma udlame lwaseMiddle East luba ngcono.Naye uthe imali-mboleko abalindele ukuthi yehle okwamanje mhlawumbe ingaze yehle makuphela unyaka.

KUSHAQEKE abaningi ngengozi yebhasi edlule nemiphefumulo yabangu-45 ebhulohweni iMamatlakala, emgwaqweni uR618 eLimpopo ngoLwesine ekuseni.Kubikwa ukuthi leli bhasi belisuka ezweni laseBotswana lithwele abazalwane beya eMoria enkonzweni yePhasika ngesikhathi kwenzeka le ngozi.Kubikwa ukuthi umshayeli uhlulekile ukulawula ibhasi laphaphalaza, lanqamula ukhonkolo layowela ezansi ehlathini okuyibanga elingu-50 mitha ngaphambi kokuba kugqamuke ilangabi.Uphathiswa wezeMpilo eLimpopo uFlorence Radzilani uhambele indawo yesigameko eyambisana noNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha kuzwelonke uNkk Sindisiwe Chikunga ngoLwesine ukuhola isimo.Ngokombiko okhishwe yilo mnyango bebengu-46 abantu abebesebhasini kubalwa nomshayeli, bangu-45 abantu bashonile, kanti okwamanje kusatholakale izidumbu ezingu-12 njengoba abaningi bashe bangqongqa. Kuthiwa kusinde ingane eyedwa eneminyaka eyisishiyagalombili, elashwa esibhedlela ngenxa yokulimala.Lo mphathiswa uveze ukuthi umnyango uzosebenza ngokuzikhandla kwenziwa ulibofuzo ukuze kuqinisekiswe ubuzwe babantu abebesebhasini."Ngidlulisa amazwi emindenini elahleke lwe kule nhlekelele yengozi sizobabeka emkhulekweni," kusho yena.UNgqongqoshe unxuse abashayeli ukuba bacophelele futhi baqaphele emgwaqweni njengoba bebaningi abantu bahambela izindawo ezahlukene njengoba kuyimpelasonto yePhasika.

IZINKOMBA ziveza ukuthi izikhungo ezingonyamakayipheli, njengoshisanyama nasemadeleni, yizo okuphelela kuzo imfuyo esuke yebiwe.Lokhu kuvezwe abenhlangano yabalimi i-African Farmers’ Association of South Africa (Afasa) KwaZulu-Natal, nenhlangano elwa nokuntshontshwa kwemfuyo iNkanyamba Forum, engxoxweni neSolezwe.Isigameko sakamuva esenzeke ngeSonto sokuboshwa kwekhansela le-IFP kuMasipala waseNdumeni, uMnuz Dumisani Xaba nabehamba naye uMnuz Kwazi Zulu, kushiye amalungu omphakathi ebambe ongezansi.Kuthiwa babanjwe belayishe izinkomo ezine emotweni edonsa inqola emgwaqweni u-R33 phakathi kweDundee neKranskop UMnuz Mbongeni Sikhakhane owusihlalo we-Afasa KwaZulu-Natal, uthe bakhathazekile ngokwanda kwezigameko zokuntshontshwa kwemfuyo kulesi sifundazwe. Uthe kunobufakazi bokuthi amasela ayisebenza masisha, adayise impahla isiyinyama ezindaweni ezingoshisanyama nasemadeleni.“Imvamisa imfuyo esuke yebiwe, amasela ayihlinzela emahlathini kutholakale ngesikhumba nomswani, okukhombisa ukuthi isuke izolayishwa iyiswe endaweni ethile edayisela abantu inyama okungaba yikoshisanyama nakwezinye izindawo ezidayisayo. Lokhu kuyabalimaza abalimi ikakhulu abansundu ngoba sikholelwa ukuthi imfuyo iyibhange lethu thina bantu abansundu,” usho kanje.UMnuz Tallman Zuma, ongumsunguli wenhlangano elwa nokuntshontshwa kwemfuyo emphakathini iNkanyamba Forum, uthe isikhathi esiningi uma belandela umkhondo ngokulahleka kwemfuyo kuyabonisa izinsalela zayo zivamise ukutholakala ebangeni elingaqhelile kakhulu nalapho yebiwe khona.“Ezigamekweni eziningi, imfuyo siyifica ihlinziwe. Kwesinye isikhathi uyaye ubone umuntu odayisa inyama emholweni wezalukazi, ubone ukuthi isavuza igazi okukhombisa ukuthi ibisanda kuhlatshwa,” usho kanje.Uthe kwesinye isikhathi ezindaweni ezishisa inyama, inyama uyithola inotshani nenhlabathi nokuyizinkomba zokuthi isuke ihlinzwe kuphuthunywa.Umnikazi wendawo yobumnandi eChesterville eThekwini, i-Mashamplane’s Shisanyama, ukugxekile ukuthengwa kwenyama yokwebiwa okunezinsolo zokuthi kwenziwa abanye abasebhizinisini elifanayo, wathi kuwudlisa amakhasimende into engekho ezingeni.“Ngenza isiqiniseko sokuthi inyama engiyidayisayo ngiyithenga ezindaweni ezivumelekile ukudayisa inyama ukuhlangabenzana namazinga ezokuphepha ezempilo. Uma udayisela umuntu ukudla into oyithenge emaseleni, uma isigulisa abantu sekutholakala ukuthi inobuthi, uzokwazi kanjani ukuthola loyo muntu okudayiselile? “Ebhizinisini lami abezempilo bayafika izikhathi nezikhathi ukuzohlola, namaphoyisa ayafika ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ibhizinisi lisaqhutshwa ngendlela ephephile. Uma kukhona ozakwethu abathenga ngalolu hlobo, abakuyeke lokhu, kuyasilimaza sonke kwehlise isithunzi semboni esikuyo,” usho kanje.UMnuz Mike Ngwenya ongumqondisi kwa-Cattle Watch, okuyinhlangano yamaqhinga okunqanda ukwebiwa kwemfuyo, uthe zikhona izindlela zobuchwepheshe abazisebenzisayo kwezinye izifundazwe ukunqanda ukwebiwa kwemfuyo.“Kunama-tracker afakwa emfuyweni okwenza kube lula ukuyibona ukuthi ikuphi ngoba ixhunyaniswa nomakhalekhukhwini womlimi. Lolu hlobo ludinga ingqalasizinda, ekhona kwezinye izifundazwe kodwa KwaZulu-Natal ayikho ngoba uhulumeni akafuni ukuhlangabezana nabalimi ngoba lolu hlelo lumba eqolo. Kwezinye izifundazwe iminyango yezolimo iyasebenzisana nabalimi ngakho silufakile khona, okubi ngoba siqhamuka kulesi sifundazwe kodwa asikwazi ukusiza khona,” kusho uNgwenya.Phakathi kuka-Okthoba noDisemba nyakenye, awu-7 290 amacala okwebiwa kwemfuyo abikwe emaphoyiseni KwaZulu-Natal.

KUSOLWA ukuthi uqalwe abazingeli bezinyamazane umlilo wequbula obulale abayisithupha abayizicishamlilo eBoston, eHowick ngaphansi kukaMasipala uMngeni ngeSonto.Lokhu kuvezwe yiMeya kulo masipala uMnuz Chris Pappas ekhuluma nabezindaba emva kwalesi sigameko.Kusolakala ukuthi umlilo obusha ubuhanguhangu ubhebhethekiswe umoya oshintshe indlela obuvunguza ngayo wavunguzela mawala ngasohlangothini obekusebenza kulo laba besebenzi bezimo eziphuthumayo abebezama ukuwubhula.“Umlilo kukholakala ukuthi uqalwe abazingeli. Umlilo uphunyukile, okukholakala ukuthi kubangelwe yisimo sezulu okuyilapho abacimimlilo bazithole sebesengozini. Ozibonele, uchazile ukuthi laba basebenzi bazame kanjani ukunqanda umlilo kodwa wagcina ubaphunyuka, nokuholele ekutheni abanye bashone,” usho kanje.UMphathiswa woMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu esifundazweni uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi udlulise amazwi enduduzo emindenini.Kuvele ukuthi kubasebenzi abalimele, ababili basesimeni esibucayi esibhedlela.Lokhu kwenza isibalo sabafe ngenxa yemililo yequbula senyukele kwabawu-13 kulesi sifundazwe.Abakwa-South African Weather Service baxwayise amalungu omphakathi ngamakhaza nomoya angase ahlasele lesi sifundazwe nezinye izingxenye ezimaphakathi nezwe.

SESIFINYELELE kwabayisikhombisa isibalo sabafe ngenxa yemililo yequbula esha ubuhanguhangu komasipala abahlukene KwaZulu-Natal, osekuphoqe uhulumeni ukuthi ame ngezinyawo ukuhlinzeka ngosizo kwabakhahlamezekile.Kwabadlule emhlabeni ngenxa yale nhlekelele eqale ukubonakala ngesonto eledlule ebangelwa imimoya enamandla ehlasele ezingxenyeni zesifundazwe, kubalwa uSandiso Wudla (2) noMnuz Ncane Nyandeni (68) basoLundi, uMnuz Muntukabongwa Gazu noNksz Bongiwe Luthuli (67) kuMasipala uMlalazi, uNkk Jadi Ngcobo (86) kuMasipala uMaphumulo, uSinakho Madlala (9) kuMasipala Inkosi Langalibalele noMnuz Sithaba Mpofu (29) wakuMasipala iRay Nkonyeni.UMphathiswa woMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu esifundazweni, uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi obehambele oLundi ukuyohlangana nabakhahlanyezwe yilesi simo, usole amasela emfuyo ngokusha kwale mililo edlangile.Uthi izinduna kumele zisebenzisane nomphakathi ukuthi kwenziwe uphenyo lwala bantu abashisa umlilo.“Umlilo awuvelanga wazisukela kodwa ushiswe umuntu.  Kumele kuphenywe kabanzi. Amasela emfuyo yiwo asusa le mililo ukuze ebe kahle imfuyo. Izinduna azisebenzisane nomphakathi kubanjwe laba bantu,” usho kanje. Uthe usebhalele ungqongqoshe walo mnyango kuzwelonke ekutheni kube nemali ezolekelela ukuze izigameko ezifuze lezi zingashiyi abantu bedengwane.“Nginxuse ukuthi u-R100 000 ufakwe kwi-ward ukuze kube lula ukulekelela. Sicela amakhansela ahlonze imizi ethinteke kakhulu. Okwanamhlanje sizowulekelela umphakathi ngokuwunika amabhele okudla imfuyo ukuzibazisa ngesikhathi sisalinde uhlelo oluphelele,” usho kanje.IMeya kuMasipala i-Zululand, uMnuz Michel Mkhonyovu Khumalo, uthe kuzoba nomklomelo ukuqinisekisa ukuthi amasela ayavalelwaLo mlilo kuthiwa usecekele phansi amadlelo abalimi emhlabeni ongama-hektha angu-14 000 kwafa imfuyo ewu-1 600.

KUSOLWA ukuxhunywa kukagesi ngokungemthetho nemijondolo eyakhiwe ngamabhodi phakathi efulethini kusha ibhilidi elise-Jeppestown, edolobheni iGoli.Ngokwemibiko esuka endaweni yesigameko, abahlali kuleli fulethi eliyizitezi ezintathu batshelwe ngezithuba zika-1.15 entathakusa ukuthi kuyasha. Lokhu kwenzeke ngokusa kwangeSonto. UMnuz Themba Mkhize oyikhansela kule ndawo naye onefulethi lapha uthi ubikelwe ngo-1.15 ukuthi kuyasha, waphuthuma abezimo eziphuthumayo, ngenhlanhla bafike kungakapheli imizuzu eyisikhombisa.“Yize basheshile ukufika abezimo eziphuthumayo kodwa umonakalo ubusumkhulu kakhulu ngoba kunemijondolo phakathi ebhilidini ehlukaniswe ngamabhodi nokuyinto ebhebhethekise kakhulu umlilo,” kusho uMkhize.Uqhubeke wathi ababili abashonile ngabantu besilisa kanti laba abanye ababili akukacaci ngenxa yokulimala kwabo.UMnuz Robert Molaudzi okhulumela abezimo eziphuthumayo kumasipala iGoli, uthe ithimba lakhe lifike kule ndawo ngobumnyama, umlilo uvutha ubuhanguhangu, wathi bathole ukuthi kunemijondolo phakathi kulawa mafulethi kanti nogesi awuxhunyiwe ngendlela efanele.“Abezicishamlilo bathole izidumbu ngesikhathi behlola isimo nonubanzi bomonakalo odalwe wumlilo. Kukhona nabantu abalimalile nalabo abahogele umusi,” kusho yena.UMulaudzi uthe kwabalimele kukhona osesimweni esibucayi kakhulu ophuthunyiswe esibhedlela i-Charlotte Maxeke kanti ababili baphuthunyiswe eHillbrow.AbeJo’burg City Power nabo bakhona kule ndawo ukuhlola isimo sokuxhunywa kukagesi njengoba kunezinsolo zokuthi kukhona izinyokanyoka.UMulaudzi uthi sebewuqedile umsebenzi wabo kanti ibhilidi selinikezelwe emaphoyiseni ukuba aqhubeke nophenyo.

UKUNGAHOSHELANI kwabomndeni wakwaKhumalo eMsinga, KwaMajozi, esigodini iMazabeko, yikho okusolwa ukuthi kuholele ekuphumeni kwesidumbu, kudutshulwa kufa omunye wabo, kubuka abantu emshadweni emzini wakwaMabaso, endaweni. Elandisa Isolezwe ngesigameko, uMnuz Mbhekeleni Khumalo onguyise kamufi, uMnuz Thubelihle Khumalo (25), uthe indodana yakhe ibivakashe ekhaya njengoba bekuyimpelasonto yeholidi lokubungaza igalelo labantu besifazane, ukuzobabona ekhaya, ngoba ibisebenzela eGoli, ihlala ehostela i-Denver. “Bengingekho kulowo mshado kodwa ngibikelwe ukuthi kube nokuhilizisana phakathi kukaThubelihle nomunye umfana obehamba nabafowabo ababili bozalo. Kuthe engazelele umfana wami, eme kwenye yezimoto ebezisemshadweni, bamdubula esiphundu, edutshulwa womunye wabafowabo kubuka wonke umuntu. Basuke lapho bakhala amaphepha, bemshiya efile. Kumanje bagcwele izinkalo, akwaziwa ukuthi babaleke, bashona kuphi,” kulandisa uKhumalo.Eqhuba, uthe usola ukuthi ukwenzeka kwesigameko bekuvele kuyitulo ebeliboshelwe umufi njengoba bekunezingxabano zomndeni, waveza nokuthi abanye bomndeni bebesola umufi ngokuba yimpimpi yamaphoyisa.“Bekusanda kugasela amaphoyisa emzini wabafowabo esibasola ngesigameko, ashaqa izibhamu zabo kubona, ababopha.  Ngiyazi futhi ukuthi bekusolwa ukuthi wuyena owabampimpa emaphoyiseni. Bamdubula nje, bebesanda kuphuma ejele ngamacala okutholakala nezibhamu ezingekho emthethweni. Ngisola ukuthi le ndaba isukele lapho,” usho kanje.Uthe kuyamkhathaza ukungahoshelani kwabomndeni wakhe awuchaze ngokuthi wumndeni omkhulu onamalungu amaningi, ngokwehlukana kwezindlu nokuzaleka kwabo.“Ukungezwani komndeni wami kuqale ngenkathi kubulawa omunye wabafowethu eGoli, ngoMashi, nonyaka. Kwaba nokusolana emndenini ngokufa kwakhe, njengoba sesilana esikhona manje. Kumanje asithembani sisodwa,” usho kanje.UKhumalo uthe bakhona abomndeni asebefikile ukuzobabaza umhlola owenzekile wokufa kwendodana yakhe, eshiye emhlabeni ingoduso nezingane ezimbili. Uthe yize kunjalo kodwa ukholwa wukuthi kunabathile abajabule ngokumehlele.Kuthintwa okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uConstable Thenjiswa Ngcobo, uthe amaphoyisa aseNhlanhleni, aphenya icala lokubulala mayelana nesigameko sokudutshulwa, kwafa umlisa oneminyaka ewu-25 eMazabeko, eMsinga, ngoMgqibelo.

UFUNA ubulungiswa umndeni wowesifazane oyinkosazana ebandleni lamaNazaretha aseBuhleni ovulele ilungu elaziwayo kuleli bandla icala lokudlwengula.Umsolwa (igama lakhe eligodliwe), okuthiwa  uwumacaphuna kusale, kuvele ukuthi wayenga umgilwa ona-18 waseMlaza ngokuthi abahlangane enkabeni yedolobha iTheku ngaphambi kokuthi amcele ukuthi bayodla kwesinye sezitolo zokudlela esiseMorningside.Unina kamgilwa elandisa Isolezwe, uthe indodakazi yakhe ebiseyintombi nto ngaphambi kwalesi sigameko, iyikholwa kuleli bandla kanti ithi umsolwa imbone emhlanganweni wasentabeni iKhenana wacela inamba yagcina ngokumnika.“Indodakazi yathi ijwayele ukumbona umsolwa uma kunemihlangano emikhulu uma kuzofika inkosi yamaNazaretha uNyazilwezulu njengoba evamise ukubonakala  ngaphambili ehamba ngesithuthuthu egudluza abantu phambi kwezimoto zenkosi.  Uthe wacela inamba yocingo wagcina ngokumnika, kwathi ngoMsombuluko wamfonela ecela behlangane eThekwini,” usho kanje.Uthe ngenxa yokuthi indodakazi yakhe izihlalela ekhaya njengoba iqede u-matric nyakenye, ngesikhathi eyicela imazisile ukuthi ayinayo imali futhi idolobha ayilazi kahle, wathembisa ukuyifakela u- R100 nge-e-wallet ukuze igibele.  Uveze ukuthi umsolwa ulethwe yi-uber, wanxenxa umgilwa  ukuthi agibele emotweni eyomkhombisa enye yezindawo zokudlela, eMorningside.“Ngesikhathi befika endaweni yokuphumula, ithe uyibambe ngesandla bangena egunjini elithile lokulala wakhiya umnyango, wathatha ukhiye wangena nawo endaweni yokugezela wabuya esebhince ithawula.  Emva kwalokho ithe uyiphoqe ukuthi ikhumule waqala wayidlwengula, kuthe eseqedile waphuma wayishiya lapho,”  usho kanje.Uthe  wasizwa owesifazane ohlanza le ndawo emva kokumlandisa ngokwenzekile, wamkhombisa amatekisi abheke erenki, waqonda esibhedlela i-Prince Mshiyeni Memorial lapho ehlolwe khona.Uthe okubaphatha kabi wukuthi umsolwa akakaboshwa kunalokho usalokhu ebafonela ebancenga ethi akukhulunywe eveza ukuthi bebethandana nomgilwa futhi ubezomkhetha ebandleni.  Uveze ukuthi selokhu bavula icala amaphoyisa awakaze axhumane nabo, okubenza bathuke njengoba kubatshazwa ubunjinga kumsolwa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLieutenant Colonel Nqobile Gwala, uthe kubikwe icala lokudlwengula emaphoyiseni aseMlaza.“Lokhu kulandela isigameko sokudlwengulwa kwentombazane ena-18 okusolakala ukuthi idlwengulwe umsolwa owaziyo ngoLwesibili,” kusho uLieutenant Colonel Gwala.

BANUKANA bodwa othisha baMsizeni Combined eTugela Ferry, eMsinga, izigebengu zintshontsha u-R42 000 westokofela abebesidlala namakhompyutha esikoleni. Kuthiwa izigebengu zibophe unogada wesikole izandla nezinyawo ngezintambo zezicathulo, zamvalela kwelinye igumbi.Lesi sigameko esenzeke ngesonto eledlule, kuthiwa izigebengu ezine ebezihlome ngemimese nesibhamu zigasele kulesi sikole esiseMsinga ebusuku, zabamba unogada zamvalela kweliye igumbi emva kokumshaya nokumbopha.Kuthiwa zithathe amakhompyutha awu-12 nama-laptop amane okuyimpahla yesikole. Kuvela ukuthi zidlulele endaweni obekugcinwe kuyo imali yothisha ewu-R42 000 yesitokofela abebesidlala, bebolekisana ngayo.Umthombo osondelene nalesi sikole ongathandanga ukudalulwa, uthe kunezinsolo zokuthi kukhona uthisha obajikele wathumela izigebengu ukuthi zigile lo mhlola.“Angiboni ukuthi izigebengu zingene esikoleni ngoba zifuna amakhompyutha, kodwa kuyacaca ukuthi bezizolanda imali. Beyihlala esikoleni, betshelekisa ngayo, kodwa kuthe sebeyiqoqile ngesonto eledlule besazoyihambisa ebhange, cishe ngenxa yokuthi bekuphakathi nezinsuku kusetshenzwa, kwaphoqa ukuthi isale ikhiyelwe egunjini okuhlangana kulo othisha nakho ke sekungena abantu sebeyishaqa,” usho kanje.UNksz Nelisiwe Thusini owusihlalo wesigungu esengamele isikole, uthe ukuntshontshwa kwempahla yesikole, kubaphazamisile kakhulu abafundi nothisha.“Umsebenzi wabafundi omningi ugcinwe kwamanye amakhompyutha antshontshiwe. Kusale amathathu kuphela, nakhona kusho ukuthi imoto ebihamba izigebengu  beyisigcwele. Sihlanganile nabazali nothisha ukudingida lolu daba, siphakamisa ukuthi okungenani kulekelelwane kuthengwe ikhompyutha eyodwa ezolekelela abafundi. Abazali abayizwanga kahle leyo, ngakho ke sizohlanganisa nothisha sibone ukuthi senzenjani,” kusho uNksz Thusini.Elandisa ngabakutshelwe ngunogada wesikole, uthe kwakungo-1 ezintatha, ngesikhathi ebona abesilisa abane becusha esibhobeni, othangweni lwesikole. Ukuphazima kweso, unogada uthe basondela kuyena bamkhomba ngesibhamu bemsabisa nangokumgwaza. Uthe emva kokumbopha nokumshaya, sebehambile, unogada wazama ukumemeza kodwa kwangekho omzwayo wagcina ekwazile ukuvula isicabha ngesilevu. Wahamba egxuma waze wafika emzini osondelene nesikole elimele ekhanda.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa aseMsinga aphenya icala lokugqekeza.

USOLA isikhwele kumsolwa, umndeni womfundi ka-matric obulawe uyise wengane yakhe KwaDumisa, eMzinto.Isidumbu sikaZanele Khathi (18) obefunda eSiphapheme High sitholwe egumbini abelala kulo ngoLwesine emini. Kusolwa ukuthi umsolwa umbulale ngokumshaya aphinde amklinye ngoLwesithathu ebusuku.Ngokusho kukamalume wakhe, uMnuz Petros Khathi, umufi ubenengane enonyaka nezinyanga eziyisithupha nomsolwa.Uthe ubehlala nogogo (78) ongasaboni kahle emehlweni nophinde angezwa kahle nasezindlebeni ngenxa yokuguga.“Uye ugogo oqaphele ngoLwesine ngabo-10 ekuseni ukuthi umufi akazange amuzwe elungiselela ukuya esikoleni. Uhambe wayobheka lapho elala khona, wazithela phezu kwakhe esethule,” kusho uKhathi.Uveze ukuthi umufi ubengasafuni ukuthandana nomsolwa ngenxa yesikhwele nokuhlukumeza.“Umbulala nje, ubesanda kumtshela ukuthi abahlukane, wathi okungenani bazoqhubeka uma eseqede u-matric wakhe ngoba ubudlelwano buyamthikameza esikoleni,” kusho uKhathi.Uthi bakholwa ukuthi udinwe yilokho wambulala.Udalule ukuthi nyakenye, ngesikhathi umufi ezama ukubuqeda ubudlelwano bakhe nomsolwa, wamkhiphela ummese, ethi uzomgwaza ambulale.“Wakwenza lokhu phambi kwabantu, waze wathi omunye umama wendawo, uma esemgwazile yena uzowutshela umndeni wakhe ukuthi umbonile embulala,” kusho uKhathi.Uthi unina kamsolwa uveze ukuthi uyasola ukuthi indodana yakhe isenzile isehlo, njengoba ngoLwesine ekuseni, imcele imali yathi ifuna ukuthengela umufi okudliwayo ngoba akaphilile.“Wathi uthe uzothenga isinkwa, upholoni ne-drink. Lezi zinto zificwe endaweni yesigameko ngosuku okutholwe ngalo isidumbu. Sisola ukuthi wayezitshela ukuthi usazophaphama umufi,” usho kanje.Uthe okubuhlungu ukuthi umsolwa wenza lomuga nje, umndeni awunayo ngisho imali noma umasingcwabisane wokungcwaba umufi.Uthe yize eshone ngeledlule, izinhlelo zomngcwabo azikaqali ngoba abazi bazothathani bahlanganise nani.Uveze nokuthi bahleli ngokwesaba njengoba umsolwa esagcwele amathafa.UMphathiswa wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nonhlanhla Khoza, uzwakalise ukudabuka nokudinwa kulandela isigameko.Uthe ukuqhubeka kokubikwa kwezigameko zokuhlukunyezwa kwabantu besifazane esifundazweni kuyifu elimnyama emiphakathini eyehlukene.“Sikhathazekile ngabenza isihluku, abazibona benelungelo lokuphatha abantu besifazane, betshala ukwesaba nokuhlukumeza. Yize umnyango nezinye izinhlaka zenza konke okusemandleni ukulwa nesihlava, imizamo yethu iwela ezindlebeni ezingezwa,” kusho uNkk Khoza.Unxuse umphakathi ukuthi usukume ulwe nezigameko zokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa aKwaSawoti avule idokodo lokufa komuntu ukuba liphenywe emva kokutholakala kwesidumbu sowesifazane sinamachaphazelo egazi.“Izinsolo zithi kungenzeka ukuthi wawa wazilimaza kodwa kuzolindwa imiphumela yokuhlolwa kwesidumbu ukuze kucace ukuthi ubulawe yini,” kusho uNetshiunda.

UPHITHENE amakhanda umndeni wowesifazane wasoShabeni, ePort Shepstone, osekuyisonto lesibili edukile okuthiwa ushiye incwajana esonga ngokuziphonsa eweni okungayi elibuyayo kulo, nokusolwa ukuthi ugajwe yisikhwele sesoka ebeseliqonyiwe.Umndeni kaNkk Nosihle “Nono” Khuboni-Sengane (33), uthe usumthungathe wancama, kangangoba naseweni ayesonge ngokuziphonsa kulo Ophengeni, amaphoyisa asezame nangezinja zomkhondo kodwa abuya elambatha.Kuthiwa ubeseceliwe yisoka elisha emva kokushona komyeni wakhe, oshone eminyakeni edlule, kanti beseziphothuliwe nezingxoxo zokuthunyelwa kwabakhongi obekulindeleke bafike namalobolo ngePhasika.UNkk Samke Khuboni ogane umfowabo, uthe uskwiza wakhe uhlala naye emzini kamfowabo selokhu abuya emzini emva kokushona komyeni. Ungumuntu ofihlayo, ohleze ezihlekela okungelula ukubona uma kukhona into emdlayo.“Sitholile ukuthi kube nengxabano emva kokuthola ukuthi isoka lakhe liqonyiwe. Sengathi ushaye ucingo labanjwa yintombi engikholwa ukuthi leyo nto uyithathe ngamawala ngenxa yesikhwele, wabona kungcono athathe lesi sinqumo. Sesimbheke yonke indawo kangangoba nesoka lakhe liyafika sizocinga nalo kodwa awukho umkhondo esiwuhoshayo kuze kubemanje,” usho kanje.Uthe ukugcina ukubonakala, ubekade ephelezele ingane yakhe eneminyaka eyisishiyagalolunye eyoyigibelisa izimoto isiphindela kubo kaSengane lapho ayeganele khona kwazisa ihlala khona, wabuya kodwa waphinde wanyamalala eshiye zonke izingcingo zakhe.Ugcizelele ukuthi ubewumuntu obengazuli, ezihlalela ekhaya futhi enomngani oyedwa abamaziyo, naye okhungatheke kanye nabo. Uthe ubephuma uma eya esontweni noma eyohlangana nesoka lakhe nalapho ubesho uma ezohamba.Encwadwini okuthiwa uyibhale wayishiya kubo Isolezwe  eliyibonile, ibhalwe kanje;“Bafowethu umhlaba ungehlule. Uma nifica ngingekho ningethuki, sengifuna ukuphumula manje…  Iyobonana kwelizayo uma iNkosi isasigcinile.  Ngicela ningishayelele ucingo uNhlanhla (isoka), nimtshele ukuthi ngiyohleze ngimthanda, ningivalelisele nasenganeni yami,’’ okunye okubhalwe kule ncwadi.Kule ncwadi, obhalile unxuse ukuthi umndeni ulivumele isoka lakhe libambe iqhaza uma kwenziwa amalungiselelo okungcatshwa kwakhe.UNksz Sindi Sengane okuwuyena onamathelise ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ecela ukufuniswa, uthe uNkk Khuboni-Sengane ongunkosikazi kamfowabo ongasekho, uthe ukewaba nemicabango yokuthi kungenzeka mhlawumbe uphathwe kabi ukuthi kuzoba nomhlangano wemindeni, owakwaKhuboni nowakaSengane. Bekuzodingidwa udaba lwamalobolo njengoba besekudingeka alotsholwe lapho abeshadele khona, kodwa wabuye wayiphepheza kwazise bekuyinto obekumele imhluphe ngoba ayikho kakhulu ngaye. “Sigcina ukuxoxa naye bekumuntu okhululekile nje ongakhombisi lutho, ngakho ngisashaqekile ukuthi yini lena eyayimudla engadala ukuthi adlinze ngokuzibulala pho? ” kusho uNksz Sengane.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLieutenant Colonel Nqobile Gwala, uthe kubikwe ngokulahleka komuntu, esiteshini samaphoyisa eMehlomnyama, wathi ukuthungatha kusaqhubeka njengoba engatholakali

KUSOLWA ukuphuma kwesondo elolini laphaphalaza laqonda etekisini njengembangela yengozi eshiye abagibeli betekisi belimele kabi kuN2 ngaseBallito.Ngokubika kwabezimo eziphuthumayo abakhulume nofakazi ozibonele kwenzeka le ngozi, kuthiwa yisondo leloli eliphaphalaze lashayisa itekisi okuholele engozini.“Obonile kwenzeka ingozi uthi kuphume isondo nerim elolini ebihamba ibheke ngaseningizimu, eliphaphalaze lawelela emzileni wezimoto ezibheke enyakatho, lashayisa itekisi ngaphambi kokushayisa imoto yesibili.”Babili abagibeli betekisi abalimale kabi okudingeke ukuba bathole usizo lokuqala olukhethekile ngaphambi kokuphuthunyiswa esibhedlela. Abanye abagibeli abayishumi bathole imihuzuko.Ngenhlanhla abebesemotweni yesibili abalimalanga.

KUKHALWA ngokubhenywa mawala kwesidakamizwa iwunga okuthiwa kudla lubi ehostela KwaMashu, okuholela  ezigamekweni ezishaqisayo zobugebengu nokubulawa kwabantu, osekuhlalise lubhojozi amalungu omphakathi kule ndawo. Ngokusho  komthombo weSolezwe osondelene nesiteshi samaphoyisa KwaMashu, bayisithupha abantu abatholwe bebulewe ezinsukwini ezehlukene. Ukweqiwa kwezidumbu ngabantu abasuke beya noma bebuya ematohweni ekuseni nantambama kuleli hostela, kuthiwa sekuyinsakavukela kumalungu omphakathi ahlala ehostela okusolwa kakhulu izenzo zobugebengu ezibhebhethikiswa ukusetshenziswa kwalesi sidakamizwa nezinye okuthiwa zithengiswa ubuthaphuthaphu kuleli hostela.UMnuz Sandile Gwala oyikhansela kule ndawo engxoxweni neSolezwe, uthe isonto nesonto, kutholakala okungenani abantu abathathu kuya phezulu abasuke bebulewe akholwa ukuthi yizenzo zobugebengu ngenxa yezidakamizwa ezidlangile.“Ukubulawa kwabantu kuleli hostela yinto nje ejwayelekile eyenzeka masonto onke, ukuthi inyathelwa ngezinyawo ngoba abantu abadayisa izidakamizwa bayasatshwa futhi basebenzisana nezikhulu zamaphoyisa ezisatshwayo esifundazweni.  Phambilini, ngesikhathi kunomhlangano wokuzama ukuthola isixazululo, ngikuvezile ukuthi sicela okungenani kungenele amaphoyisa kazwelonke ukulwa nalesi sihlava, kodwa sengathi umbono wami awamukelekanga,” usho kanjeUthe kunalokho kwavela umbono wokuthi akuqale kuhlangane amakhosi, njengoba abantu abahlala ehostela iningi labo livela ezindaweni zamakhosi ezehlukene.  Uthe akulula ukuhlanganisa amakhosi,  ngeke abamelele bonke abantu kwazise bavela ezindaweni eziningi ezehlukene.Ngonyaka odlule ngo-Agasti, umholi wamaNazaretha aseBuhleni uvakashele kuleli hostela ngenhloso yokuhambisa umkhuleko wokulwa nesihlava sokubulawa kwabantu.  UGwala uthe nakuba ukuhlanganiswa kwamakhosi nomkhuleko woNyazi engakufeli ngamathe, kodwa ukholwa ukuthi kumele kuqale kungenele amaphoyisa ajutshwe esuka ezingeni likazwelonke ukubamba izephulamthetho bese kugcinwa ngomkhuleko ukuqinisekisa ukuthi isihlava asibuye siqale phansi njengoba kwenzeka.UMnuz Mthembeni Thusi wenhlangano Ubumbano Lwamahostela, uthe izigameko zokubulawa kwabantu nobugebengu emahostela, zidalwa ukuntuleka kwamathuba omsebenzi.“Siyathemba ukuthi uhulumeni ongenile uzokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi okungenani kule minyaka emihlanu uyalehlisa izinga labantu abangasebenzi. Lokhu kungaletha isixazululo, ngoba ukufa kwabantu kuyinto esikhathazayo sonke, ebuhlungu kakhulu,” kusho uThusi.Kwesinye sezigameko zakamuva zokubulawa kwabantu kule ndawo esenzeke ngesonto eledlule, kutholwe izidumbu zabesilisa ezimbili zidindilizile ngasenkundleni yezemidlalo, Isulabasha kuyo le ndawo.  UGwala (ikhansela) uthe waziswe ukuthi bebekade bevakashele abathile ababaziyo abahlala ehostela,  kanti uthole ukuthi omunye wabo udabuka eMbumbulu.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa KwaMashu aphenya amacala okubulala, emva kokutholakala kgwezidumbu ezimbili zabesilisa zinamanxeba okudutshulwa emgwaqweni uDumisani Makhaye.

KUSOLWA izimpunyela ngokusebenzisa intsha ekwenzeni ubugebengu obufana nokuqoqa ngodli imali yokuvikela ezinhlakeni zomphakathi nokudayisa izidakamizwa.Lokhu kushiwo nguKhomishana wamaPhoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLieutenant General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi, eSouth Beach eThekwini kulandela ukufa kwabasolwa abayisithupha kade bedubulana namaphoyisa.Abafi, okuvela ukuthi basebancane ngeminyaka, badutshulelwe eflethini eliyindawo yokuvakasha njengoba kuvela ukuthi bebebhukhelwe kulo ngowesilisa othile ngoMgqibelo.Laba basolwa ngokudubula babulale abesilisa abane abasebancane eTshelimnyama, eMarriannhill, ngeSonto.Kuleso sigameko kuvela ukuthi abasolwa bafica abafi bezihlalele emgwaqweni bephuza, babayalela ukuthi balale phansi ngezisu maqede babadubula emakhanda.Kuthiwa abane bafela khona lapho, kwathi owesihlanu waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela esesimeni esibucayi.Abafi ababulawe ngeSonto kuthiwa bebedayisa izidakamizwa ngakwaGaqanga esitolo ngaseTshelimnyama Primary.Abasolwa (ababulawe izolo) baphinde basolwe ngokudubula babulale abesilisa abathathu eMinitown, eHammarsdale, ngoLwesihlanu.Kuleso sigameko kuthiwa baficana nabafi esitolo somuntu wokufika kuzoqoqwa imali yokuvikela. Kuthiwa baqale bahilizisana ngaphambi kokuthi bakhiphelane izibhamu badubulane.UMkhwanazi uthe bengamaphoyisa bakhathazekile ngentsha esencane ezibandakanya nobugebengu.“Uma ubuka iminyaka yabo, ikhomba ukuthi kufanele ingabe bafunda u-matric noma basenyuvesi kodwa benza ubugebengu,” kusho uMkhwanazi.Uthe phakathi kobugebengu le ntsha eba mandla kubo obokudayisa izidakamizwa nobokuqoqa imali yokuvikela ikakhulukazi ezitolo zabokufika.Ugcizelele kwelokuthi basebenzela abantu abathile abanemali.“Njengalaba nje esibathole kuleli flethi elibizayo. Ngeke uvele ubhukhe kulona ungenamali, kusobala basebenzela umuntu onemali,” kusho uMkhwanazi.Uthe lona osolwa ngokuba nemali obebhukhele abafi, basezithendeni zakhe.Uthe le nkinga idinga zonke izinhlaka zomphakathi ukuba zibambisane ziyidudule impi yobugebengu.“Ngeke inqotshwe yithi sodwa singamaphoyisa, izinkantolo namajele. Lokhu okwenzekayo kukhomba ukuthi inkulu inkinga emphakathini nasemakhaya lapho le ntsha ikhuliswa khona” kusho uMkhwanazi othe uma kuqhubeka kanje ikusasa alikho.Uthe ukuhlala kwabantu abasha bengenzi lutho, behamba bezulazula ezitaladini, bazithola sebeqashwa abathile ukuthi babenzele ubugebengu bese uma amaphoyisa ethi ayababopha, badubule kuqala bese beyafa uma amaphoyisa esebuyisela ngenhlamvu.

ABASE-ESKOM basola ubugebengu kugqabuka ilangabi esiteshini sikagesi eZola eSoweto ngoLwesithathu.Ukusha kwalesi siteshi kuphazamise izakhamuzi eziningi eDobsonville, eMndeni, Jabulani, Moletsane, Mofolo North, Naledi, Tladi, Zola naseZondi eziphakelwa yilesi siteshi ugesi.I-Eskom iphuthumise ama-Technician ukuphenya ngalesi sehlo nokuhlola umonakalo nokuthi kuzothatha isikhathi esingakanani ukuphothula umsebenzi wokulungisa le nkinga.Uphenyo lokuqala lwe-Eskom ngokusho kuka-Innocentia Zabala okhulumela le nkampani, luveza ukuthi ukusha kudalwe yinkinga yobugebengu. Uthe kusolwa izinswelaboya ebezizama ukweba i-transformer kwase kusha enye. Uthe lokhu kubonakale ngokungabibikho kwamafutha e-transformer nabakholwa wukuthi ebiwe."Abasebenzi bethu bamatasa nomsebenzi wokuzama ukulungisa isimo ukuze kusizakale izakhamuzi ngogesi. Izindawo ezifana naseMndeni, Moletsane, neDobsonville endala zisanenkinga," kusho yena.Uqhubeke wathi okwamanje kabakwazi ukusho ukuthi uzobuya nini ugesi kulezi zindawo kodwa basebenza ngokuzikhandla ukulungisa inkinga. Uthe kukhona onogada abaqaphe isimo kulesi siteshi kwazise siyintandokazi yemigulukudu.

ONJINIYELA, abezimo eziphuthumayo nabophiko lokagesi kuMasipala waseGoli bahlola umonakalo ngaphansi kwebhuloho elikuM1 lapho kuqubuke khona ilangabi kusha amakhebuli ngoLwesithathu emini.Kulindeleke ukuthi onjiniyela bezakhiwo bahlole isimo somhubhe okuhamba kuwo leli khebula elishe langqongqa eBraamfontein futhi bahlole nesimo sebhuloho kuM1 ngaphambi kokuba kungene nabanye ukuze kuqinisekiswe ezokuphepha.AbeCity Power bakhomba izinswelaboya ngenjumbane ngawo wonke lo monakalo.Ukusha kwamakhebuli kuphazamise izinto eziningi ezindaweni ezehlukene ezakhelene naleli dolobha. Ngale kokuvalwa thaqa kwalo mgwaqo omkhulu, kodwa kuphazamiseke iziteshi ezimbili zikagesi eziseBraamfontein naseFordsburg. Izindawo ezifana neParktown, Braamfontein neNewtown zisale zingenawo ugesi futhi abeCity Power baveze ukuthi abakabi nalo ulwazi lokuthi sizolungiswa nini isimo kwazise kufanele kuqale kuhlolwe isimo sebhuloho kanjalo namakhebuli ashile.UMnuz Isaac Mangena, okhulumela abeCity Power uthe bekungakabacaceli ukuthi izinswelaboya zikwaze kanjani ukufinyelela kulawa makhebuli."Kubonakala sengathi abantu abenze lokhu bebenesikhathi ngoba kukhona okhonkolo abasindayo okuyibona abasekele amakhebuli ukuze aphephe futhi akulula ukufinyelela kuwo amakhebuli ungakawususi ukhonkolo."UMangena utheukhonkolo usetshenziselwa ukuvikela amakhebuli kodwa ubuye wabathwalisa ubunzima ngoba wenze kwaba lukhuni ukuba abezicishamlilo basheshe babhule ilangabi ngesikhathi kungqongqa amakhebuli.

Kusolakala ukuthi kube nesandla semfene kugwazwa, kubulawa umfundisi emvuselelweni yebandla, iFountation of Life Global Church, ebikwaDendethu, eMandeni, enyakatho yaKwaZulu-Natal, esigamekweni esenzeke ngoMgqibelo ebusuku.Umholi webandla, uMfundisi Sifiso Mazibuko, uthe kubashaqise kakhulu ukubulawa kukazakwabo ngesihluku esinje futhi basola ukuthi lesi senzo sinogcobho ngenxa yendlela esenzeke ngayo. Umufi, uMfu Mduduzi Mcineka (49), kuthiwa ubesenonyaka agcotshelwa ubufundisi kuleli bandla kanti ubesebenza kwenye yamafemu enza imibhede KwaSithebe, khona eMandeni. Elandisa Isolezwe ngokwenzekile, uMazibuko uthe ibandla lakhe belikade lenze imvuselelo phakathi noJuni, kwathi ngokubona ukuthi abantu bayithakasele base benquma ukuyenza futhi ngoLwezihlanu nangeMigqibelo ezindaweni ezahluke endaweni. “Nangalowo Mgqibelo besiyenzile imvuselelo, sibeke itende kwaDendethu ukuzokhulekela inhlalakahle yomphakathi, sinxuse uNkulunkulu ukulwisana nobugebengu nezinye izimo ezikhathaza umphakathi wasendaweni,” usho kanje.Eqhuba, uthe ngenkathi kwenzeka isigameko yena ubengakafiki etendeni kodwa utshelwe ukuthi imvuselelo ibisiqalile, kunomama obefunda iBhayibheli epulpiti, sekuzovulwa inkonzo.“Kuthiwa kuqale kwaqhuma izibhamu bude buduze netende obekuhlanganyelwe kulona kepha akwanganakeka kangako, abazalwane baqhubeka nokukhonza. Kuthe kusenjalo kwangena abalisa abathathu abangaziwa kodwa kwangasolwa lutho ngabo ngoba vele abantu bebeqhubeka betheleka ngobuningi babo njengenjwayelo etendeni.“Kusuke omunye walaba balisa wayohlwitha iselula yalo mama obesepulpiti, efunda iBhayibheli kuyona, wazama ukubaleka nayo. Umufi  usukumile ezama ukuyosiza lo mama obephucwa iselula, kwaba nesibhudubhudu kwase kusuka omunye walaba balisa abangaziwa wagwaza umufi esiswini. Umphefumulo uphumele endleleni ephuthunyiswa emtholampilo lapho udokotela esazise ukuthi ummese ushaye nenhliziyo wopha kakhulu, washona,” kulandisa uMazibuko.Uthe okwenza bashaye amakhala ngalokhu wukuthi ngaphambi kwesigameko kunamalungu afike enkonzweni ukuzolanda izihlobo zawo inkonzo ingakapheli. Lokho okwenza basole ukuthi kungenzeka kukhona abebazi ukuthi kunento enje ezokwenzeka. “Sifisa ukuthi amaphoyisa alandelele ngalesi sigameko ngoba indlela esenzeke ngaso yenza sishaye amakhala futhi sekuqala ukusikhathaza lokhu ngoba sekungokwesine manje kufa umfundisi endaweni ngendlela enesihluku kanje,” kusho yena.Kuthintwa udadewabo kamufi, uNksz Hloniphile Mcineka, naye ukhale ngokuthi ibadidile indlela umfowabo ashone ngayo futhi yenza basole ukuthi kunogcobho oluthile kuyona.Uthe yena ubengekho enkonzweni ngosuku lwesigameko, ufonelwe sekuvele sekonakele. Uthe ngokwazi kwakhe umufi ubengenazo izitha futhi ewumuntu okholwayo nokhonze umndeni wakhe, akamazeli lutho olubi. “Kuyasixaka ukuthi kungani umenzi wokubi egwaze yena kuphela ekubeni bekunabantu abaningi kangaka enkonzweni yingakho ngisola ukuthi kungenzeka ukuthi yitulo ebeliqondene naye ngqo. Sifisa ukuthi ukuphenya kwamaphoyisa kusiphendulele imibuzo esinayo ngokufa kukamfowethu,” kusho udadewabo kamufi.Udadewabo kamufi uveze nokuthi yena nomfowabo badabuka eMthunzini kodwa sebehlala eMandeni manje ngenxa yomsebenzi.Uthe ingane yakwabo ibiqashe KwaMasomonco, khona eMandeni, kodwa isiqalile ukwakha umuzi wayo osuzophela. Umufi ushiye emhlabeni unina, unkosikazi nezingane ezimbili.Okhulumela amaphoyisa esifundazweni, uConstable Thenjiswa Ngcobo, uthe amaphoyisa asesiteshini eSundumbili aphenya icala lokubulala mayelana nesigameko sokufa kwendoda eneminyaka ewu-49.“Kusolakala ukuthi lona wesilisa ugwazwe ngabasolwa abathathu abangaziwa ngoMgqibelo eMandeni, endaweni yakwaDendethu. Umgilwa uphuthunyiswe esibhedlela washonela khona ngenxa yamanxeba amabi okugwazwa,” kusho uConstable Ngcobo.

KUSOLWA ukuziphindiselela kwelokubulawa kwabakhongi, kudutshulwa kubulawa abayisikhombisa bomndeni womunye wabasolwa eChibini, eHlokozi, ngoLwesithathu.Lo mndeni kuthiwa uhlaselwe sekuhwalele, ngesikhathi ubuka ithelevishini. Kuthiwa kugasele abantu bavulela ngenhlamvu kwabebehleli egumbini lokuphumula.Phakathi kwabashonile kukhona umama wekhaya uBahlakaniphile Khambule (64), indodakazi yakhe uPhilile Khambule (39), umalokazana uNompilo Khambule (34), isihlobo uSkhumbuzo Khambule nabazukulu oLisa Khambule (9), Siphosethu Khambule (9) noZemvelo Khambule (5).USiphosethu noZemvelo bazalwa umufi uNompilo, endodaneni yakulo muzi okuvela ukuthi iboshiwe, kuthi uLisa azalwe nguPhilile.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe ngemithombo elwazi ukusuka nokuhlala udaba, indodana kaBahlakaniphile engumyeni kaNompilo, isoleka ecaleni lokudutshulwa kwezelamani zakwaDlamini ezabulawa ngaphandle kwasekhweni ngenyanga edlule. Zaziyokhongela umfowabo. Lezi zelamani, uThando noMzwandile Dlamini, zahlaselwa zisakhuleka ngaphandle kwesango lasekhweni.Kuvela ukuthi kuhlaselwa kubo nje ubesanda kuboshwa. Abasolwa ngokwenzakalisa umndeni wakhe kuthiwa bebelokhu befika emzini wakhe okhona endaweni ukuzombheka ukuthi uyadedelwa yini ngebheyili “ukuze bamsoconge”.Umsolwa oboshiwe, oyilungu lomndeni wakwaKhambule, kuthiwa uyamaniswe nokubulawa kwabakhongi ngophenyo lwamaphoyisa olwathola izinkulumo zakhe nabanye abasolwa ngokudubula abakhongi ababehamba ngamaPolo. Kuvele ukuthi labo basolwa bePolo bashonile emva kokudutshulwa esehlweni esingahlobene nalesi ePort Shepstone emasontweni edlule. Kuvela ukuthi ilungu lomndeni wakwaKhambule eliboshiwe lihlanganiswe nabasolwa ngezinkulumo zamaselula.Ilungu lomndeni, elingafunanga ukwanda kakhulu ngenkulumo uma libuzwa ngalezi zinsolo, uNksz Dudu Khambule, likuqinisekisile ukuthi ngempela umfowabo uboshiwe."Unamasonto amathathu eboshiwe," kusho uDudu ongachazanga ukuthi ivala abekwe lona lithini.Udalule ukuthi kuhlaselwa kubo nje bekunezinsongo zokusoconga umfowabo ebese zinesikhashana zikhona."Emzini wakhe bekulokhu kufika abantu abangaziwa behlome ngezibhamu bezomfuna ngesankahlu," kusho uDudu.Uveze ukuthi kwenzeka umshophi nje unina (uBahlakaniphile) ubembizile uNompilo nezingane ukuthi bazoquba ekhaya elikhulu, esaba ukuthi bazosocongelwa emzini wabo njengoba bebehla benyuka nezibhamu okuthiwa bebemfuna.Uthe kusajame ingqondo uma ecabanga ngokubehlele, ubuhlungu ababuzwayo, wathi okukhulu kunakho konke ukuthi basovalweni bona abasele (ebebengekho).UNdunankulu wesifundazwe, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, ubafanise nezilwane abasolwa ngesihluku abasikhombise emndenini wakwaKhambule."Sizwa ubuhlungu nathi njengoba sila. Uma sizwa iminyaka yezingane ezibulewe, siyazibuza ukuthi abantu abanesihluku esingaka bavelaphi.
