Labo bantu bafanelwe ukususwa emphakathini ngoba bayizilwane," kusho uNtuli.Uthe noma ngabe bekuyisiphi isizathu, besingekho isidingo sokuthi kubulawe abantu.Uthe uhulumeni ezingeni lesifundazwe, nasesifundeni iHarry Gwala ngaphansi kweMeya uMnuz Zamo Nxumalo, bazosondela ngokuhlanganyela emndenini ukuzolekelela ngakho konke abakudingayo okufaka phakathi izindleko zomngcwabo nosizo lokwelulekwa ngokwengqondo.Unxuse amaphoyisa ukuthi enze konke okusemandleni ukubamba abasolwa ngokushesha.IMeya kaMasipala waseHarry Gwala, uNxumalo, ithe bakhathazekile ngalesi sigameko nezinye ezenzeke kule ndawo kusuka ngenyanga edlule.UKhomishana wamaPhoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt Gen Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi, uveze ukuthi angu-25 amagobolondo ezinhlamvu atholwe endaweni yesigameko.Uthe okubacacelayo bengamaphoyisa ukuthi lokhu kubulala bekuhleliwe futhi abasocongi bebefuna ukwenza uthulamsindo njengoba abafi bedutshulwe emakhanda."Sesihlanganise ithimba ezingeni lesifundazwe elizosebenzisana namaphoyisa esifunda ukuphenya ngesigameko," kusho uMkhwanazi othe okushiwo wumndeni okwamanje basakuthatha njengamampunge njengoba uphenyo lwabo lusephansi.Umndeni wakwaKhambule kuthiwa uziphilisa ngebhizinisi lamatekisi.

KUKHALWA ngomengameli we-ABC, uMnuz Philani “PG” Mavundla ophinde abe yikhansela kuMasipala waseMvoti okuthiwa unqwahe nemoto yeMeya yalo masipala, uMnuz Gabriel Malembe we-IFP.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi uMavundla ubenikwe le moto ngesikhathi eyiMeya kulo masipala.Umthombo waleli phephandaba uveze ukuthi uMavundla  usabisa nemeya yaseMvoti uyitshela ukuthi ngeke ayinike imoto futhi yena uyinsizwa ngeke imenze lutho.Kuthintwa imeya yaseMvoti, ithe impela kuyiqiniso ukuthi uMavundla unqaba nemoto kamasipala.“Ngicela ukucacisa lokhu. UMavundla wakhishwa esikhundleni ngoMeyi 21 kulo nyaka akaseyona imeya kodwa usele nesikhundla sokuba yikhansela. NgoJulayi 1 uthole incwadi yasenkantolo esho ukuthi isikhundla sakhe sokuba yimeya siphele ngoMeyi 21. Njengoba incwadi ibiqinisekisa ukuthi akaseyona imeya kumele abuyisele yonke impahla kamasipala abenikwe yona njengemeya. Manje unqwahe nemoto yaseMvoti eyiBMW X5 ebhaliswe ngokuthi Mvoti 1. Kunalokho uphambanisa izinto uthi uma ebuyisa imoto ngeke ayibuyise zingakapheli izinsuku ezingu-30. Angiqondi ukuthi ukhuluma ngaziphi izinsuku ezingu-30 ngoba yena waphuma esikhundleni ngoMeyi 21. Uma ekhuluma ngezinsuku ezingu-30 zaphela ngoJuni,” kusho uMalembe.UMalembe uthe usaxoxisana namaphoyisa ukuthi kube yiwona angenelelayo ukuxazulula lolu daba ngoba sekucacile ukuthi uMavundla akafuni ukubuyisa imoto.“Uma uzokhumbula mina ngike ngaba yiMeya yaseMvoti ngaphinde ngehliswa esikhundleni emva kwesikhashana ngifungisiwe. Akuphelanga ngisho isonto uMavundla akanginikanga thuba efuna la izimoto zomkhandlu. Angizange ngiyikhulume indaba yezinsuku ezingu-30 ngazibuyisa manje yena usebamba uyayeka uma sekumele abuyise imoto yomkhandlu,” kuqhuba uMalembe.Kuthintwa uMavundla ucingo lwakhe belukhala lungabanjwa nemiyalezo abethunyelelwa yona ifkile kuyena kodwa wangayiphendula. Nangemuva kwemiyalezo uphinde wazanywa efonelwa kodwa lutho engalubambi ucingo lwakhe.KuMasipala waseMvoti kuthiwa uMavundla uhlala emihlanganweni kamasipala njengekhansela lakhona futhi uthatha izinqumo ngokubambisana namanye amakhansela. Kuleyo mihlangano kuthiwa kusuke kuhleli uMalembe njengemeya kamasipala.

UBEHLALE ekhala, efuna ukubuyiselwa indodakazi (3) yakhe umfundi ka-matric otholwe ebulewe eSiqungeni, eMthwalume, ngeSonto.Isidumbu sikaMandisa Cele (21) obefunda eSinokubonga Junior Secondary sitholwe simbozwe ngengubo phezu kombede egumbini lakhe lokulala.Ikhanda lakhe kuthiwa belibokozela, aphinde abe nezibazi ebusweni nasemzimbeni.Kusolwa uyise wengane ngesigameko, okumanje kuthiwa akasabonwa nangokhalo. Ubabomncane kamufi, uMnuz  Mzwandile Dlungelwa, uthe umsolwa ubemhlukumeza umufi, ehlala ngokumshaya.“Bebevame ukuxabana, uMandisa efuna abakubo kamsolwa babuyise ingane yakhe, abamphuca yona ngenkani,” kusho uDlungelwa.Uthe uMandisa ubebabikela uma eshaywe umsolwa, bathi uma benikela khona, bamfice esekhale amaphepha. Udalule ukuthi esigamekweni esandulela lesi, umsolwa wabulala wonke amawindi endlu kaMandisa, ayishiyelwa wunina ongasekho. “Ngathi ngiyafika, ngathola esebalekile,” kusho uDlungelwa.Elandisa ngesigameko, uthe babizwe womakhelwane. “Sifike sekugcwele umphakathi, kukhona nomndeni kamsolwa. Sithole ukuthi yiwo umndeni kamsolwa nomakhelwane ababone kuqala ukuthi uMandisa ubulewe,” kusho uDlungelwa.Uthe bezwe kuthiwa umndeni kamsolwa ubone engabuyi ngoMgqibelo, wanikela kwamakhelwane wendawo yesigameko ngeSonto, uyocela ukuphelezelwa uyombheka.Kuthiwa bafike bathuma umakhelwane ukuthi akangene ngaphakathi, abheke, waphuma ethwele izandla ekhanda ethi usezithele phezu kwesidumbu.“Sisola ukuthi kukhona abakwaziyo. Yini le ebese beyazi eyenze ukuthi bafune ukuphelezelwa uma beye endaweni yesigameko?” kubuza uDlungelwa.Uphinde wathi basola ukuthi umndeni kamsolwa uyazi ukuthi ukephi njengoba engabonwa nangokhalo nje.“Ngisho sesifikile endaweni yesigameko siwumndeni, bavele bazimela esixukwini somphakathi, belokhu belalela ukuthi sikhuluma sithini,” usho kanje uDlungelwa othe lokhu kubadine kakhulu.Uveze ukuthi igazi likaMandisa beliqala endleleni yakwamsolwa, ligudle liye ethangini lamanzi eliseduze kwendlu, ngaphambi kokuba liyongena egumbini lokulala endlini.Uthe basola ukuthi umhlasele ngesikhali esithile endleleni, wawa, maqede wamhudula, ezama ukumgeza igazi ethangini, ngaphambi kokuqhubeka amhudulele endlini, la agcine eficwa khona.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, ukuqinisekisile ukuvulwa kwecala lokubulala emaphoyiseni aseHibberdene.Isolezwe like labika ngesigameko esifuze lesi ngo-Ephreli nonyaka, umfundi ka-matric eSiphapheme High, uZanele Khathi (18) owashaywa waklinywa yisoka KwaDumisa, eMzinto. Kule sigameko kwasolwa iskhwele kumsolwa.

INYUNYANA yothisha i-National Teachers Union, isola uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal ngokuxhamazela, ukhangisa inqwaba yezikhala zothisha eziku-Post Level One, (PL1) kungalandelwanga imigudu. Kulindeleke ukuthi ukwamukelwa kwezicelo zomsebenzi kuvalwe ngoLwesihlanu.Kusukela umnyango umemezele izikhala ezingu- 747 emasontweni amabili adlule, othisha abangaqashiwe bamatasa behla benyuka befaka izicelo zomsebenzi njengoba kuwuhlelo lokuqala lwalo lo mnyango lokukhangisa izikhala ngendlela evulelekile evumela wonke umuntu ohlangabezana nokudingekayo ukuthi acele umsebenzi.Yize kunjalo, amathe angase abuyele kwasifuba kwabanye asebechithe imali yabo belungiselela ukufaka izicelo, njengoba ziqina izinsolo eziveza ukuthi kunenqwaba yezikhala ezizohoxiswa okukholakala ukuthi akuhanjiswanga ngendlela kwazise ezinye zazo zikhangiswe sekuvele kunabantu abaqashiwe kuzona.UMengameli weNatu kuMnuz Sibusiso Malinga engxoxweni neSolezwe, ukhale ngokuxhamazela komnyango njengoba eveze ukuthi maningi amaphutha ohlwini olukhishiwe.“Umnyango bekumele ulinde, ulandele kahle yonke imigudu ngaphambi kokuthi uphanyeke lo luhlu lubonwe abantu bonke, kube kunamaphutha.  Isenzo sawo siwukukhohlisa umphakathi futhi ngiyakholwa ukuthi siqhutshwa izinhloso zepolitiki.  Ngaphambi kokukhishwa kwezikhala, bekumele kuqale kuthintwe abahloli nothishomkhulu ngendlela efanele baqinisekise ukuthi izikhala zikhona kulezo zikole ngaphambi kokukhishwa kwesikhangiso. Othisha abangaqashiwe, sebevele bachithe imali befaka izicelo nasezikoleni lapho kuvele kungeke kusathathwa muntu khona ngoba izicelo zivaliwe,” usho kanje.Ukusho lokhu nje, kunohlu lwezikhala ezingu-33, okwabelwana ngalo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana okuthiwa zihoxisiwe.  UMalinga uthe bayazi ukuthi kukhona izikhala ezikhangiswe kungafanele, wathi umnyango uhlangane nezinyunyana zothisha ukubhunga lolu daba khona izolo, kanti kulindeleke ukuthi umemezele okufinyelelwe kukhona kulo mhlangano.Omunye wothisha abangasebenzi okhulume neSolezwe, uthe emva kokuphuma kwezikhangiso, ufake izicelo ezindaweni ezintathu ezama inhlanhla.“Amathemba ami asethanda ukufiphala emva kokuhosha umoya wokuthi ezinye izikhala kungenzeka zihoxiswe.  Bengiboleka imali yokugibela ngiye edolobheni eGreytown ukuze ngingene kwi- internet cafe ngoba ngasekhaya sihlushwa yi-network. Kumele ngibuye ngibe nemali yokugaya ama-CV ami, ngakho ngingadumala kakhulu uma kungathiwa lapho ngifake khona izicelo, bekuyizikhala ezivaliwe,”  kusho yena.UMnuz Mfanelo Mncube wenhlangano yothisha abangaqashiwe, i- KwaZulu-Natal United Unemployed Educators, uthe emva kokubhalela ihhovisi loMphathiswa woMnyango uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka ngesonto eledlule bekhala ngento efanayo, bathole impendulo ethi ukukhangiswa kwezikhala kuzobuyekezwa.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Muzi Mahlambi, uthe yihhovisi lomnyango eligunyaza ukukhishwa kwezikhala ngokuxhumana nezinyunyana, ngakho noma yiluphi uguquko olungenziwa ngalezi zikhala, luzoqhamuka kuleli hhovisi.

Basole uMbuso ngokuxova ubufakazi bokusebenza kwamaselula nezinombolo abameli babamangalelwa ecaleni lokubulawa kowayengunozinti weBafana Bafana ne-Orlando Pirates, uSenzo Meyiwa, ngoLwesibili.Lokhu kwenzeke ngesikhathi oyisikhulu enkampanini yamaselula iVodacom, uNksz Pinky Vythilingam, esaqhubeka nokwethula ubufakazi bakhe obumayelana nokusetshenziswa kwamaselula nezinombolo zabathinteka kuleli cala.U-Advocate Charles Mnisi, ongummeli kammangalelwa wesithathu uMthobisi Mncube, usole u-Adv Ronnie Sibanda ngesikhathi ebuza umbuzo ngemibhoshongo eyayicosha ukusebenza kwenombolo kaMeyiwa nekaLongwe Twala.“ITower yaseSpruit View, yiyo yini le eyacosha ukusebenza kwenombolo kamufi (uMeyiwa) nekaLongwe Twala, phakathi kuka-8 no-9 wasebusuku?” kubuza uSibanda.UNksz Vythilingam ubuze uSibanda ukuthi ubuka kuliphi ikhasi lezibithi, ubesazama ukuphendula uSibanda ngesikhathi engenelela uMnisi ethi, “Ngicela uMbuso uyilandelanise kahle imibuzo yawo, ukuze sikwazi ukulandela kahle.”USibanda uthe uzama ukwenza khona lokhu okucelwa uMnisi, wakhala ngokuthi inkinga ukuthi ubufakazi obethulwa uNksz Vythilingam busemazibithini ehlukene.UMnisi uqhube wathi, yena akasaqondi ukuthi uSibanda uma ekhuluma ngombhoshongo (iSpruit View) ukhuluma ngombhoshongo owodwa yini nalowo okuthiwa wacosha ukusebenza kwenombolo kaMncube, noma usekhuluma ngekaLongwe Twala.U-Advocate Zandile Mshololo, omele ummangalelwa wesihlanu, uFisokuhle Ntuli, yena ukhale ngokuthi ufakazi akaqikelele ukucacisa ukuthi ubufakazi abethulayo busekhasini lesingaki, kwangaphezu kuka-4000, okuthiwa aqukethe ulwazi lokusebenza kwezinombolo zabathintekayo.Ngokuqhubeka kwesikhathi, u-Adv Sipho Ramasepele naye usukume wacela ukucaciselwa ukuthi ubufakazi obethulwa uNksz Vythilingam, bumayelana nenombolo kammangalelwa wesibili (uBongani Ntanzi) noma intombi yakhe.“Uma sibuka izibithi uzakwethu (uSibanda) akhuluma ngalo, ngokobufakazi bukaCol Kgosi, izingcingo ezenziwa yile nombolo okufakazwa ngayo, inombolo okungesiyo ekammangalelwa wesibili.“Inombolo egcina ngo-6890, ekammangalelwa wesibili, inombolo egcina ngo-7056 (okuyiyo ofakazi afakaza ngayo) eyalowo owayethandana nommangalelwa wesibili,” kusho uRamasepele.Ufakazi ucacisele uRamasepele ukuthi wethula ubufakazi bezingcingo ezazikhishwa kanjalo nezazingena enombolweni egcina ngo-6890.“Sizama ukuveza ukuthi inombolo ethile ekabani bese sizama ukuyixhumanisa nezinye izinombolo,” kusho uNksz Vythilingam.“Bekufanele acacise ukuthi lobu bufakazi obenombolo egcina ngo-7056, hhayi ukuthi kube sengathi obenombolo egcina ngo-6890, kodwa asiqhubeke ke,” kuphendula uRamasepele.UNksz Vythilingam ubuye waveza ukuthi ngokolwazi lwabo lweRICA, inombolo ummangalelwa wesithathu uMthobisi Mncube avume ngomlomo kammeli wakhe ukuthi ngeyakhe, ngokolwazi lakwaVodacom, akuveli ukuthi eyakhe.Icala liyaqhubeka namuhla, kusazoqhubeka yena uNksz Vythilingam nobufakazi bakhe.

KUSOLWA ukudembesela komphenyi ‘ngokuduka' komunye wofakazi owukhiye ecaleni lokungqongqiswa kwabathathu okwenzeka ngoJanuwari 25, 2022, eNkanini, eCato Manor.Ngalobo busuku kwabulawa abesilisa abathathu okungoMnuz Phumlani Tshekele, Numkile Mfenqe noRefilwe Mokoena.Kuvela ukuthi babesolwa umphakathi ngokuwuhlalisa lubhojozi bedlwengula bedayisa izindlu zabantu ngo dli.Ngosuku lwesigameko kuvela ukuthi amalungu omphakathi abahlasela besendlini abathatha ayobokhela ngomillo bephakathi emotweni.Kwabe sekuboshwa abasolwa abayisithupha oMnuz Mmiseli Khondlo (41) odume ngelikaJomo, Vusimuzi Mazula ( 46), Thandekile Penelope Sithuntsa (37), Siphenathi Zoko (28) Mfanafuthi Muzi Masikane (37) noScelo Thusi (39).NgoLwesithathu eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini bekufakaza umphenyi elingeke lidalulwe igama lakhe ngenxa yezizathu ezithile.Ngesikhathi ephekwa ngemibuzo, ummeli wabasolwa uvumile ukuthi akamazi ukuthi washonaphi uMnuz Mlambo ongomunye wofakazi ochazwa yinkantolo njengobalulekile kuleli cala.Kuvela ukuthi uMlambo wayekhona ngesikhathi sesigamemko futhi kuningi akubona.Kodwa kuthiwa walimisa ngesihloko kwabasondelene nabo ukuthi akazimisele ngokuthi abe ngufakazi kuleli cala ngoba lokho kungabeka umndeni wakhe engcupheni.Kodwa isitatimende esifungelwe wasenza.Umphenyi  uveze ukuthi lo fakazi wake wamthinta ngocingo emazisa ukuthi akasekho eNkanini useseGoli."Wangitshela ukuthi ukhethe ukuthi alishiye iTheku ngoba akazimisele ngokuthi abe ngufakazi kuleli cala. Wangitshela ukuthi useGoli kodwa wanqaba ukungitshela ukuthi kuphi nalo,'' usho kanje.Ummeli wabasolwa usole umphenyi ngokudembesela ukuthola ukuthi ukuphi nendawo ufakazi.Uziphendulele umphenyi wathi kunzima kakhulu ukuthi angagcwala lonke iGoli ekubeni lilikhulu kangaka ebheka umuntu oyedwa."Akulula njengoba ucabanga ukufuna umuntu ongamazi nokuthi ukuziphi izinkalo,'' uphendule kanjena.Uthe  ikhona imizamo ayenza kodwa yabhuntsha. Uthe baze bacela nokuthi kungenele nophiko lweCrime Intelligence kodwa kwanhlanga zimuka nomoya.Umphenyi unxuse inkantolo ukuba isebenzise isitatimende esenziwa ufakazi ngaphambi kokuba agcwale izinkalo.IJaji uChetts lizwakalise ukukhathazeka kwalo ngokuduka kwalo fakazi lakubeka ngembaba ukuthi bekudingeka afike ezobethula ubufakazi ngento ayibona ngosuku lwesigameko..

LIHLEHLISELWE inyanga ezayo yiNkantolo yeMantshi yaseHarding, icala lowokufika kuleli okuthiwa ngesonto eledlule, uvukwe yisikhwele wagenca ngocelemba isoka lobeyintombi yakhe. Umgilwa kuthiwa ulimale kanzima esandleni.Lo msolwa ona-27 (esingenalo igama lakhe) okuthiwa ungowokudabuka eSomalia, ubevele enkantolo ngoMsombuluko, ngecala lokushaya ngenhloso yokulimaza uMnuz Xolani Mbuthuma (35) okuthiwa usebenza njengonogada ezitolo eHarding. Kusolakala ukuthi uhlaselwe emva kokubonwa wumsolwa emi nentombi okuthiwa ibithandana nomsolwa kodwa isimalile.Lesi sigameko kuthiwa siholele ekutheni umphakathi nabomndeni kamgilwa bavuke umbhejazane, baphoqe ukuthi kuvalwe izitolo zabokufika baseSomalia edolobheni eHarding, kuze kube abafowabo bakamsolwa bamhambisa emaphoyiseni njengoba bekukholakala ukuthi bebemfihlile. Umfowabo kaMbuthuma, uMnuz Tony Mbuthuma, uthe emva kokuthi abanikazi bamabhizinisi baseSomalia bevakashele umndeni ukuzoxolisa ngesenzo sabo beqinisekisa ukuthi umsolwa sebemhambise emaphoyiseni, bakhokhiswe inhlawulo ethile ngokulimala kukamsolwa, kwathelelwana amanzi.“Noma kuvunyelwane ngokuthi icala lizosulwa emva kokuthi abafowabo bakamsolwa bekhokhe inhlawulo ethile, kodwa umsolwa usatoke ngaphakathi njengoba inkantolo inqume ukulihlehlisela uJuni 5, icala. Umhlangano siwuhlale namhlanje (esho izolo), kanti umsolwa ubesevele esevelile enkantolo, kwathathwa lesi sinqumo. Sekuyothi ke uma esevela, umgilwa aye enkantolo aveze ukuthi sekuxoxiwe,” usho kanje.Elandisa ngokulimala kukamfowabo okuthwa ugenceke kanzima esandleni ezama ukuvika, uthe ngoLwesine esephuma emsebenzini ushayelwe ucingo yintombi yakhe yeza ngasesangweni lalapho asebenzela khona. Ngesikhathi besazimele, kuthiwa kuqhamuke umsolwa wabuza intombi ukuthi bayini nalo muntu emi naye. Uthi imchazelile ukuthi bayathandana njengoba yena (umsolwa) isamala. Kuthiwa umsolwa uphuthume esitolo sakhe wabuya esebelethe ucelamba emhlane, ngesikhathi umgilwa enganakile elibele ukukhuluma nentombi yakhe. UMbuthuma uthe abantu abebekhona bazamile ukuxwayisa umgilwa ukuthi akabaleke, kwasho ukuthi bese kusemuva kwesikhathi, umsolwa eseseduze kakhulu, kwaphoqa ukuthi avike ngezandla okulapho alimale khona.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal,  uConstable Thenjiswa Ngcobo, uthe kuboshwe owesilisa oneminyaka engu-27 ngecala lokushaya ngenhloso yokulimaza.  Uzobuyela enkantolo ngenyanga ezayo.

BANGASE babe senkingeni abagcotshwa baseBuhleni okuthiwa baxakazise uMfundisi waseGinyezinye becasulwa wukuthi ugqoke umjiva enkonzweni yomngcwabo wakubo ebiphethwe yibona.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi uMfundisi Joseph Mhlongo waseGinyezinye nophinde akhulumele lolu hlangothi, kuze kwaphoqa ukuthi angayi ngisho emathuneni kungcwatshwa udadewabo nomfowabo, exakaziswa abagcotshwa baseBuhleni eMphushini, eFolweni, emasontweni amabili edlule. IGinyezinye iholwa yinkosi Sizwe Shembe, uMudliwamafa.Kuthiwa uMfundisi Mhlongo ubesemngcwabeni womndeni, kushone udadewabo nomfowabo ngesikhathi ehlelwa yilo mshophi.“Ubaba omncane oshonelwe ukhonza eBuhleni mina ngikhonza eGinyezinye. Bengiyongcwaba izingane zakhe ezishone ngokulandelana. Kuqale kwashona intombazane ebigula ngoLwesibili, kwalandela umfana obesengozini yemoto ngoLwesine. Ngesikhathi igula indodakazi kababa omncane yimina obehlala eya esibhedlela ngiyoyibheka njengodadewethu. Inkinga iqale uma ngifika enkonzweni yesikhumbuzo sezingane zakithi. “Ngifike khona ngigqoke umnazaretha kodwa ngangahlala nabagcotshwa, ngahlala nomndeni ngoba bengazi ukuthi inkonzo iphethwe abaseBuhleni. Kuze kumina omunye wabagcotshwa engitshela ukuthi sengathi kuzoba nenkinga ukuthi ngigqoke umjiva uma kukhona bona. Ngibabuzile ukuthi inkinga ikuphi ngoba ngeke ngikwazi ngisho ukuphatha inkonzo ngoba ngiyilungu lomndeni oshonelwe,” kusho uMfundisi Mhlongo.Uthe emva kwalokho, lo mgcotshwa uphindele emuva wayokhuluma nabanye abagcotshwa baseBuhleni. Uveze ukuthi babheke kuyena bamkhombisa ngezandla ukuthi akunankinga. Yize kunjalo uthe ubebona ukuthi banenkinga ngaye. “Ngosuku lokungcwaba ngixakaziswe yelinye ilungu laseBuhleni elingeyena ngisho umgcotshwa, lingibamba ngomjiva lizama ukungikhumulisa wona phambi kwabantu. Kuvele kwacaca ukuthi nabagcotshwa bayazi ngale nto eyenziwa yilo mfana njengoba bevele bazibukela nje, bangakhuza. Kuze kwasuka abafowethu abangewona amaNazaretha bafuna ukulwa kwasuka umsindo khona emngcwabeni. Kuze kwaphoqeleka ukuthi ngingayi ngisho emathuneni ngasala ekhaya ngoba impi ibingafuni ukunqamuka njengoba bese nginqabile ukukhumula umjiva,” usho kanje.Uthe okubuhlungu kakhulu ukuthi akakwazanga ngisho ukubeka itshe kufihlwa izingane zakwabo ngenxa yabantu abangenzisanga okwamakholwa. Uthe okumphatha kabuhlungu kakhulu ukuthi uyazi ukuthi iNkosi Mduduzi Shembe (uNyazilwezulu) kaluhambisani nale nto eyenziwe abagcotshwa balo. Lokhu kungenxa yokuthi enkonzweni yokuqala konyaka lukuvezile ukuthi amaNazaretha awahloniphe imindeni uma ishonelwe.Okhulumela uNyazilwezulu, uMnuz Thokozani Mncwabe, uthe sebezwile ngalesi sigameko.“Sizobikelwa iNkosi uNyazilwezulu. UBaba uNyazi alukuvumi lokhu abakwenzile, kumele kube nezinyathelo ezithathwayo ukunqanda izimo ezinje nangomuso. Wonke umuntu wamukelekile ukuthi angahlangana nezihlobo zakhe ngaphandle kokuphazanyiswa ngoba esohlangothini oluthize lwamaNazaretha. “Mina nje nginazo izihlobo eKuphakameni naseThembezinhle futhi ngiyahlangana nazo njengomndeni wami, angiphazanyiswa wumuntu yize ngaziwa ukuthi ngihamba nobaba uNyazilwezulu. Okunye abantu kumele bazi ukuthi ukuba nezinhliziyo ezimbi kwabantu baseBuhleni akuwona umthetho webandla kodwa basuke befike nazo bangaphenduki noma sebebhabhadisiwe. Ukuba nezinhliziyo ezimbi lokhu abakwenzile,” kusho uMncwabe.Uthe umfundisi abamxakazisile uhlonipheke kabi futhi unomlando omude kabi nenkolo yamaNazaretha. Uthe kubo kaMfundisi Mhlongo yilapho okwakufikela khona uMqaliwendlela kanjalo neNkosi iLanga belifikela kubo kusanda kuqala inkolo yobuNazaretha.

ZIPHEFUMULE ngezinkinga ezikhungethe uhlelo olusavivinywa lwezindawo zokuhlala ezingaphansi kwesikhwama esixhasa izitshudeni ngemali yokufunda ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme, iNational Student Financial Aid Scheme (NSFAS), izinhlaka ezihlanganisa izitshudeni nabaphathi bezikhungo.Lo mhlangano obungoLwesine ePitoli, bekuhloswe ngawo ukuthola isisombululo enkingeni ebhekene nezikhungo, izitshudeni nezinye izinhlaka kulolu hlelo lwalesi sikhwama ngezindawo zokuhlala ezikhungweni.Umlawuli wesikhashana weNSFAS, uMnuz Mr Freeman Nomvalo, uthe babize lo mhlangano ngenxa yezikhalazo sezitshudeni ezithinta ukuphepha lapho zihlala khona nezingqinamba omastende abahlangabezana nazo.Uthe omastende bakhale ngokungakhokhelwa kanjalo nokuphuza ukukhokhelwa.“Sivumelene ngokuthi kusungulwe ithimba eliyisipesheli elizobhekana nazo zonke izingqinamba ezithinta izindawo zokuhlala. Nginethemba lokuthi kuzobanjiswana ukuze kuxazululeke lezi zinkinga ngokushesha,” kusho uNomvalo.Izinhlaka abehlangene nazo zifaka uMnyango weMfundo ePhakeme nokuQeqesha, inhlangano yabaphathi bamanyuvesi i-Universities South Africa (USAF), eyabaphathi bamakolishi amakhono amaTVET i-South African Public Colleges Organisation (SAPCO).Abanye yilabo abamele imikhandlu yezitshudeni emanyuvesi i-South Africa Union of Students (SAUS), emele izitshudeni emakolishi i-South African Technical Vocational Education and Training Student Association (SATVETSA), eyabahlinzeka ngezindawo zokuhlala ne-Development Bank of Southern Africa (DBSA).UNomvalo uthe ziningi nezinye izinto abavumelene ngazo kulo mhlangano. Zikhala mihla izitshudeni ezikhokhelwa yilesi sikhwama ngalolu hlelo lwezindawo zokuhlala njengoba zigcina sezilala endle ngenxa yokungakhokhi kwalesi sikhwama.ISAUS isikhale kakhulu ngalolu hlelo yathi lwenza kube nzima satshe ukuthi izitshudeni zigxile ezifundweni ngoba zijikijelwa emnyango omastende ngoba lesi sikhwama singakhokhile.Enye yezinto uNgqongqoshe weMfundo ePhakeme uDkt Blade Nzimande, ayalela uNomvalo ukuthi ayilungise indaba yezindawo zokuhlala izitshudeni.UNzimande wathi izitshudeni akumele zize zikhathazeke ngokuthi akukhokhiwe, kodwa zigxile ezifundweni zazo.

KUGQAME inkinga yokushoda kwamanzi ezindaweni ezehlukene zakuleli, imiphakathi ephuza amanzi nemfuyo kanjalo nokuhluleka kukahulumeni ukuxazulula lezi zinselelo.Lokhu kuvele ngesikhathi kwethulwa isabelomali sikaR134 billion soMnyango wezaManzi nokuHanjiswa kweNdle ePhalamende.Amalungu ePhalamende akhale ngokuthi izinkinga zamanzi azibhekene kuphela nabantu abahlala emakhaya kodwa nasemadolobheni.UNksz Nobuntu Webster weBosa ukhale ngokuthi imiphakathi ithwele kanzima ngenxa yamanzi.Uveze ukuthi ngisho emalokishini asemadolobheni iyinkinga eyamanzi.“EThekwini kunenkinga yamanzi ekubeni yidolobha elikhulu. Angiyiphathi ke eyezinye izindawo lapho imiphakathi kudingeka ikhe amanzi emifuleni nasezizibeni ezinezilwane. Iyakhathaza eyokuthi noma kunale nkinga kodwa umnyango ubuyisela emuva imali. Nyakenye kubuyiselwe emuva uR44 million kuMgcinimafa, le mali ngabe isiza umphakathi.”UMnuz Makashule Gana weRise Mzansi uthe bazimisele ukweseka umnyango kodwa uma uzohlinzeka abantu ngamanzi.Ukhale esifanayo ngezindawo eziningi kuleli ezingenawo amanzi.“Abantu kumele bathole amanzi ahlanzekile. Nathi lapha ePhalamende uma sithi amanzi ethu ahlanzekile, kumele ngabe asiphuzi amanzi athengwe ezitolo kodwa siphuze aphuma empompini. Asiphuze amanzi aphuzwa yiwo wonke umuntu.” UMnuz Thembinkosi Mjadu weMK uthe abaseseki lesi sabelomali ngoba abantu abaningi abanawo amanzi.Ubale izindawo ezehlukene ikakhulu KwaZulu-Natal athe zakhele amadamu amakhulu kodwa azinawo nhlobo amanzi.“Abantu abanawo amanzi. Kudingeka kusheshiswe ukuhlinzekwa kwabantu ngamanzi.” UNgqongqoshe walo mnyango, uNksz Pemmy Majodina, uneke eyezinhlelo ezehlukene zokulwa nenkinga yamanzi.Uthe kunezinhlelo zokulungisa amadamu ezindaweni ezehlukene eKZN, ezizoletha amanzi.“Kunamadamu afana neHazelmere azokwandisa indaba yamanzi eThekwini nakwezinye izindawo. Kunamanye azokwandisa amanzi eMkhomazi, Bulwer, enyakatho yeKZN, Port Shepstone nakwezinye izindawo.” Uvumile ukuthi iTheku libhekene nenkinga yamanzi, wakhala ngokuthi amanzi amaningi ayamosheka kuleli.“Siyizwe elisebenzisa kakhulu amanzi. Amanye amanzi ayamosheka agcina engafinyelelanga emphakathini. Lokhu kudalwa ukuvuza kwawo kanjalo nengqalasizinda esindala,” usho kanje.Ukhale nangemvula ehambisana nezikhukhula athe ilimaza ingqalasizinda.“Siyayithanda imvula kodwa uma isihamba nezikhukhula ilimaza ingqalasizinda. Imvula yenza ukuthi amadamu angashodi ngamanzi. Ukuguquka kwesimo sezulu kuyasilimaza ngoba izikhukhula zango-2022, 2023 nezamanje eKapa, zilimaza le ngqalasizinda yamanzi kanjalo neyokuthuthwa kwendle,” kusho uNksz Majodina.UMnuz David Mahlobo, iPhini likaNgqongqoshe walo mnyango, lithe ngeke kubekhona ukushoda kwamanzi kuleli.Uthe kunemali evile kuR40 billion ukusiza omasipala ababhekene nenkinga yamanzi.

UBEYISIBANI sabanye akhahlamezeka nabo  owesilisa wasoThongathi ongumsubathi, owaqhubeka nokuyogijima iComrades Marathon waze wayiqeda yize ayelahlekelwe yikho konke ayenakho ngesishingishane.UMnuz Phumlani Anold Ntuli nabanye abayisishiyagalolunye ngoLwesibili, banikelelwe ngamasheke kaR8 000 umuntu ngamunye yinkampani ekhiqiza izinkwa, iBB Bakeries, ukuthi bavuse amakhaya abo.UNtuli waphikelela nokuyogijima lo mjaho okokuqala ngqa ngoJuni 8, emva kokudilikelwa yindlu yakhe ngoJuni 3.Umnikelo bawuthole emva kokuthi omunye wabasebenzi baseBB Bakeries, owagijima noNtuli wathola ngesimo esamehlela ngaphambi komjaho.Ekhuluma neSolezwe, uNtuli uthe wayengazi ukuthi ukuqhubeka kwakhe nokuyogijima umjaho yize sekuphika isimo kuzozala ukuthi azitholele usizo nabanye.“Okwangenza ngaqhubeka nokuyogijima ukuthi yize ngangilahlekelwe yikho konke enganginakho kodwa ngangisaphila. Angibonanga kufanele ukuthi ngivumele inkinga eyayingehlele inginqande,” kusho uNtuli.Uthe wayethi uma enyuka amagquma azibuze ukuthi ingabe uma esebuya, uzolalaphi ngoba indlu yayingekho.“Ngangingazi ukuthi ukuqhubeka kwami nokugijima kuzoholela ekutheni babone ukuzimisela kwami, bese bengilethela lolu xhaso,” kusho uNtuli.Uthe usizo lukhulu kuye nabanye ngoba iningi liziphilisa ngamatoho, bebengeke babenawo amandla okuvusa izindlu zabo.Oyi-Regional Community Development Specialist eBB Bakeries, uMnuz Samukelo Nkosi, uthe okwenze basondela nosizo ukuthi izandla ziyagezana.Uthe inkampani imile ngenxa yokwesekwa umphakathi othenga umkhiqizo wabo ngakho kuba wumbono omuhle ukuthi uma nabo sebebhekene nenkinga, inkampani isondele kubo nosizo.“Emva kokuthinteka komunye wabasebenzi bethu yisimo sikazakwabo agijima naye, wasibikela siyinkampani ngesimo, sibe sesisondela nosizo. Umthetho wenkampani uthi asikwazi ukutomula umuntu oyedwa sisize yena, sigcine sesithola nabanye abayisishiyagalolunye, ukuthi banikelelwe kanye naye umfo kaNtuli,” kusho uNkosi.Uthe udaba lokuzinikela kukaNtuli lubafikisele ngezinyembezi, becabanga ukuthi uqhubekile nokuphokophelela waqeda umjaho yize ehlelwe umshophi.

Kutheleke KwaZulu-Natal amaphoyisa engeziwe ukuzoqapha isimo njengoba kusaqhubeka izinguyazana zamaqembu zokwakha uhulumeni wokubambisana.La maphoyisa ajutshwe nguKhomishana wamaphoyisa uGeneral Fannie Masemola, kanti azosebenzisana namasosha uma kunesidingo.UMasemola ujube amaphoyisa angu-300 ophiko oluqapha izibhelu emphakathini ukuzoqapha isimo. Leli yithimba lesithathu ukujutshwa eKZN.UMasemola waqala wajuba amaphoyisa angu-200 ekuqaleni kwenyanga edlule, waphinde wajuba amanye angu-300 ngesikhathi sokhetho njengoba esejube ithimba langu-300 manje.Ezingxenyeni ezehlukene eThekwini okubalwa Kwa-D KwaMashu, kubonakale amasosha abehlome ephelele abeqaphe isimo. E-Avoca nasemgwaqweni uMngeni eThekwini, amaphoyisa abevala kwasani, esesha izimoto, amatekisi kanjalo namaloli.Amanye amaphoyisa abekanise nasemigwaqweni engenela ezimbonini zaseMariannhill nasePinetown, lapho kwatatshwa khona inyama notshwala ngezikhathi zezibhelu ngo-2021, esesha izimoto. Ezinye izimoto zamaphoyisa bezishaye ujenga zilibhekise ngaseChatsworth.UMasemola uthe bajube la maphoyisa emuva kokuthola umbiko wethimba lezobunhloli. “Sengeze amaphoyisa emuva kombiko wezobunhloli wokuthi kukhona okuhlelwayo noma ngingeke ngisho ukuthi yini. Lo mbiko uveza ukuthi alukabikhona uzinzo, yingakho sithumele amaphoyisa ophiko oluqapha izibhelu,” kusho uMasemola.Uthe banolwazi ngazo zonke izinto ezihlelwayo eKZN, wathi yingakho befuna ukuzinqanda.“Siyazi  ukuthi abantu benzani nokuthi bahlelani yingakho siqinise ezokuphepha eKZN. Amaphoyisa azozinza eKZN kuze kube siyaqinisekisa ukuthi kuphephile,” kusho uMasemola.Uthe uzothumela amanye amaphoyisa uma kunesidingo.“Ukhetho lube nokuthula kanjalo nozinzo. Abantu bavote ngokukhululeka futhi ngaphandle kokusatshiswa. Siyabonga emphakathini ngokuziphatha kahle ngalesi sikhathi,” kuqhuba uMasemola.Omunye usihlalo womkhandlu obhekele ukuphepha ezweni iNational Joint Operational and Intelligence Structure (NATJOINTS), uLieutenant General Tebello Mosikili, uthe amasosha ami ngomumo ukulekelela  uma kunesidingo.Uthe anendima ayidlalayo amasosha njengoba eyingxenye yomkhandlu. Uveze ukuthi amaphoyisa awajutshiwe kuphela eKZN kodwa nakwezinye izifundazwe. “Sithola ulwazi lwezobunhloli bese silandela lowo mbiko ngoba asifuni ukuthi kusiphinde okwasenza phambilini, kwaqubuka udlame singalindele. Kulokhu lonke ulwazi esilutholayo siyaluhlelela ngendlela ngoba asifuni ukuzithola sibamba siyeka. Yingakho sijube amaphoyisa eKZN ukuze aqhubeke nokuqapha isimo.” Ukhomishana wamaphoyisa uLieutenant-General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi, uxwayise osikhwili phambana nobhoko esifundazweni wathi babhiyoze bazibheke ngoba amaphoyisa azobe eqaphe isimo.Uthe amaphoyisa azolokhu esiqaphile isimo kuze kubunjwe uhulumeni.

UMASIPALA wasoThukela unxusa umphakathi owakhele lo masipala ukuthi ubilise amanzi ozowaphuza emva kokutholakala kwegciwane i-E. coli esikhungweni esiphehla amanzi.Umphakathi othintekayo owaseColenso, Winterton naseBergvilleUMnuz Siyabonga Masoka oyimenenja yezinhlelo ezenziwa umasipala, uthe umasipala uhlole ukuphepha kwamanzi  esikhungweni sawo emva kokutholakala kwenqwaba yezinhlanzi ezifile emseleni wamanzi eBergville. Uthe ukuhlolwa kwamanzi ngoMsombuluko kuveze ukuthi kunezinsalela ze-E. coli esikhungweni esihlanza amanzi esiseColenso naseBergville.Ethintwa izolo mayelana nokuthi ngabe umasipala awukakwenzi yini okunye ukuhlolwa, uthe: "Isixwayiso sokuthi umphakathi ubilise amanzi ozowaphuza sizoqhubeka kuze kube umasipala wenelisekile ngokuhlanzeka kwamanzi okungabeka impilo yezakhamizi engcupheni. Ngizokuthinta uma sengithole okusha,"Ucashunwe  kweminye imithombo yezindaba ethi kumisiwe ukuphakelwa kwamanzi esuka ezikhungweni zokuhlanza ezithintekile eya emachibini aseZwelisha, eLangkloof naseBergville.Lo masipala ungowesibili obike ngamanzi angahlanzekile ngenxa yegciwane i-E. coli emasontweni amathathu.Ekuqaleni kwenyanga edlule isikhungo esihlola ukuphepha kwamanzi i-Institute for Water and Wastewater Technology (IWWT), esiseDurban University of Technology (DUT) sakhomba amabhishi angu-11 aseThekwini njengangahlanzekile ngoba kwatholakala izinsalela ze-E. coli ngesikhathi ehlolwa.Usolwazi Faizal Bux, we-IWWT, wathi lesi sikhungo njalo uma kungamaholidi sihlola ukuphepha kwamanzi ukuze siqinisekise ukuphepha komphakathi owasebenzisayo.Wathi okukhathazayo ukuthi imiphumela yokuhlolwa kwamanzi atholakala emlonyeni womfula uMgeni isihlale iveza ukuthi amanzi akhona ane-E. coli.

ITHOLWE ishonile indodana yeMeya kuMasipala Umvoti ewumholi weqembu lezepolitiki i-Abantu Batho Congress, ebesekuphele isonto kubikwe ngokunyamalala kwayo.UMnuz Nkosinathi Mavundla (30), oyindodana kaMnuz Philani Mavundla ongusomabhizinisi nomholi we-ABC, kuthiwa isidumbu sakhe sitholwe ngoMgqibelo.Ngokwesitatimende esithunyelelwe abezindaba, umndeni uveze ukuthi umufi wayegcine ukubonakala  ngoJuni 1.Esitatimendeni, umndeni uveze ukuthi wayegcine ukubonwa ekubo kwaMavundla, kanti awandanga ekutheni isidumbu sakhe sitholwe kuphi, sikusiphi isimo.Isolezwe  lithinta okhulumela umndeni, uMnuz Sandile Mavundla, uqinisekise ukutholwa kwesidumbu somfowabo kodwa waveza ukuthi okwamanje umndeni usematasa ngezinhlelo zokumfihla ngakho kuzoxhunywana nabezindaba ngalolu daba ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.Ecashunwa ekhuluma nephephandaba eliwuzakwabo weSolezwe, i-Sunday Tribune, uyise kamufi, uMavundla uthe okwamanje umndeni usasemanzini wanxusa ukuthi kukhulunywe noSandile, oveze ukuthi ngenxa yomyalelo wamaphoyisa anxuse ukuthi ulwazi umndeni wabelane nawo, akazokwazi ukuveza ukuthi isidumbu somfowabo sitholwe kuphi.Kuthiwa umufi ubenezingane ezimbili nengoduso yakhe, kanti umndeni uzoyidlulisa imininingwane ngohlelo lokungcwatshwa kwakhe uma seluphothuliwe.Kushaye isikhathi sokushicilela amaphoyisa engakayiphenduli imibuzo abethunyelelwe yona ngalolu daba.

USOMATEKISI obedume ngobukhazikhazi uhlaselwe oshayasibhamu elokishini eMeadowlands ngempelasonto.Oshayasibhamu bavimbezele uKwanele "MKZ" Makwanza, phakathi kwemigwaqo uRev Frederick Modise, eMeadowlands Zone 1, eSoweto.Umufi ubehamba nge -Audi TT eluhlaza kuhle kwesibhakabhaka, ibhajwe odongeni lomuzi ishayekile ngemuva kugxaza amafutha ngaphansi. Izimbobo zezinhlamvu zibonakala ewindini langaphambili ohlangothini lomshayeli.UMakwanza obekusoseshini iMDN uphuthunyiswe esibhedlela esiseduze iTshepo Themba eMeadowlands.Ayicaci imbangela yokuhlaselwa kwakhe kanti amaphoyisa ayaphenya.“Kuphenywa icala lokubulala kulandela ukuhlaselwa kowesilisa okubikwa ukuthi ungusomatekisi ngeSonto ntabama ngo14h45,” kusho uLieutenant Colonel Mavela Masondo.

Amaphoyisa athungatha abasolwa abadubule babulala umfana oneminyaka emihlanu ngesikhathi beduna imoto elokishini laseSoshanguve.Lokhu kwenzeke ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku ngesikhathi owesilisa efika emzini wakhe ehamba ngeveni elihlophe leToyota. Bekungezithuba zika-10.30pm ngesikhathi efika ekhaya wahlangantshezwa yindodana yakhe esencane. Lo mlisa ungena ekhaya nje uphelezelwa yizigebengu ezimuvimbezele zizama ukuthatha imoto yakhe.Kuzwakale kuduma izulu lezandla ngesikhathi kuthathwa le moto nokuyilapho okubonakale khona ukuthi kudubuleke le ngane, ephuthunyiswe esibhedlela kodwa ngeshwa yafike yaphelela khona.Amaphoyisa aphenya icala lokubulala nokudunwa kwemoto. Amaphoyisa anxusa umphakathi ukuba usondele ngaphambili nolwazi olungasiza kuboshwe abasolwa.

AMAPHOYISA aphume inqina athungatha abasolwa abane okusolakala ukuthi bagqekeze umuzi bathumba owesifazane ophila nokukhubazeka bamphoqa ukuba athumele uR50 000 nge- App bemkhombe ngesibhamu.Kuvela ukuthi phambilini umgilwa wake wabandakanyeka engozini yemoto eyamshiya ekhubazekile ehamba ngesihlalo esinamasondo.Kuvela nokuthi wabe esethola imali yesinxephezelo evela kwaRoad Accident Fund (RAF), isamba sayo esingaziwa.Kuthiwa wabiza abantu ebabemsebenzela elungisa ikhaya kabusha.Omunye wabasolwa oneminyaka engu-29 uvele usekhalelewe ngamasongo kaSigonyela wase evela ngoMsombuluko eNkantolo yeMantshi yasePinetown.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe,  ngoLwesihlanu olwedlule ngehora leshumi ekuseni kugasele amadoda amahlanu emzini oseWybank, ePinetown.Kuthiwa amadoda afike akuveza ngokusobala ukuthi afuna bani neselula yakhe.Umthombo uqhuba uthe laba bantu babe sebephoqa umgilwa ukuthi avule i-app yebhange lakhe bese ethumela  imali engango-R50 000.Kwenzeka lokhu nje kuvela ukuthi abagilwa babethunjwe kusukela ekuseni  baze baphunyuka ngehora lesihlanu ntambama.“Nakuba kungaqondakali ukuthi kukhona yini ukuhlobana phakathi komgilwa nabasolwa kodwa kukholakala ukuthi bacashe eMariannhill,” kusho umthombo.Awubange usadalula ukuthi baphunyuke kanjani ogibeni, umsolwa ubanjwe kanjani nokuthi kwenzekeni ngemali.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu Natal, uConstable Thenjiswa Ngcobo usiqinisekisile isigameko sokuboshwa komsolwa nokuvela kwakhe enkantolo.Uveze ukuthi ngoLwesihlanu olwedlule umgilwa wayekade ehleli kwakhe nendodakazi yakhe ngesikhathi kungena owesilisa wabakhomba ngesibhamu.“Kwaphinde kwangena abanye besilisa abathathu endlini. Abagilwa bavalwa amehlo bathathwa bayiswa endaweni engaziwa lapho bafike baphoqwa khona ukuthi bathumele imali,” usho kanje.

AMAPHOYISA KwaZulu-Natal aphume umkhankaso wokuthungatha umsolwa odubule walimaza iphoyisa ezintatha zangoLwesithathu eNewtown A, eNanda.Ngokombiko ovela emaphoyiseni, amaphoyisa aqapha udlame lwasemphakathini abehamba ezitaladini zaseNanda enza umsebenzi wawo ngesikhathi ebona iqulu lamadoda elisolisayo, alimisa elisesha.“Ngesikhathi amaphoyisa enza umsebenzi wawo, kuxebuke oyedwa kuleli qulu wabaleka. Iphoyisa elinguConstable lizamile ukumjaha, kodwa lo mlisa wavulela ngenhlamvu ebhekise kulo,” kusho amaphoyisa ngesitatimende.Leli phoyisa liphuthunyiswe esibhedlela ngemuva kokuthi lilimale lidubuleka isilevu nengalo. Amaphoyisa anxusa umphakathi ukuba ulekelele ngolwazi olungaholela ekubanjweni kwalo msolwa.

UMPHATHISWA woMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal uNkk Nonhlanhla Khoza uqhakambise iqhaza losonhlalakahle ababhekela inhlalakahle yabantu.Ukusho lokhu njengoba kugujwa inyanga eyaziwa njengeyokuhlonipha lezi zisebenzi zomphakathi egujwa umhlaba wonke.Uthe le nyanga eyokukhumbula, ukuqhakambisa nokubonga ukusebenza ngokungakhathali nokuzinikela kwalezi zisebenzi kulo mkhakha."Ukubaluleka kosonhlakahle emphakathini wethu ngeke kubukelwe phansi.  Kusuka endimeni abayihlakula ngesikhathi sobhubhane i- Covid 19 kuze kufike ekulweni nodlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane nezingane, bayaqhubeka nokuba ithemba kwabaningi abangenamandla okuzilwela," usho kanje.Ugcizelele ukuthi bayizinsika ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi imindeni inempilo baphinde bagqugquzele ukukhula nokuzinakekela  kwabebecindezelwe.Uthe ukhathazekile ngenqwaba yabafundele lo mkhakha ababhuquza neziqu emakhaya esifundazweniUthe kuyakhathaza ukubona amakhono eduvile ekubeni umphakathi uwadingaNjengengxenye yokugubha inyanga yabo, umnyango uphinde wahlonipha labo abanikele ngempilo benza umsebenzi wokulekelela umphakathi ukuze usizakale.Unxuse ukuthi osonhlalakahle bavikelwe zikhathi zonke.Uthe umnyango uzoqinisekisa ukuthi kunosonhlalakahle oyedwa ewadini isifundazweni sonke ukuqinisekisa ukuthi usizo luyafinyelela kuwowonke amalungu omphakathi.

KUVALWE amaculo nemidanso engesiyona eyamaNazaretha ebese kudla lubi ngaphansi komholi webandla lakwaShembe, inkosi uMduduzi uNyazilwezulu Shembe.Lesi simemezelo senziwe yinhlalisuthi yoNyazilwezulu eBuhleni ekhale ngokuthi iningi lamaculo abese esetshenziswa ngabaningi kuleli bandla abehamisana nomoya ongcolile okungesiwona okaShembe.Lesi simemezelo esiqoshwe ngeselula kukhuluma inhlalisuthi yoNyazi senziwe eBuhleni muva nje.Kusona kuthiwa: “Amaculo okungesiwo ebandla, nemidanso eyenziwa ebandleni kuvaliwe. Akusavumeleke noyedwa oyophinde abonakale noma azwakale ecula iculo okungesilona elebandla. Ofuna ukucula akasebenzise izihlabelelo zebandla enze ngendlela okwenziwa ngayo ebandleni lamaNazaretha oNyazilwezulu. La maculo nemidanso awahambisani nomoya ongcwele woNyazilwezulu kodwa anomoya ongcolile kaSathane. Oyotholakala ecula noma enza le midanso uzothathelwa izinyathelo ezinqala ngaleso senzo,” lisho kanje.Udaba yokucula amaculo okungesiwo awakaShembe kuleli bandla bese ludla lubi. Bekuze kube khona nama-video abegcwala ezinkundleni zokuxhumana lapho bekuvela khona abanye babashumayeli beshaya ivosho esontweni kuchwaze. Kuthiwa bese kuwumkhuba owandile nokungaziwa ukuthi uqale kanjani njengoba abantu bese bezenzela umathanda ebandleni.Obekuthusa kakhulu ukuthi abagcotshwa bebebonakala beshaya ivosho begqoke imijiva yebandla baphinde bacule namaculo okungewona awamaNazaretha, nobekushiya abanye bedidekile ukuthi kuseyibandla likaShembe yini leli okwenziwa kulona kanje.Okhulumela uNyazilwezulu, uMnuz Thokozani Mncwabe uthe bajabule kabi ngokuvalwa kwale mikhuba ebiyenzeka esontweni.“Bonke laba abebegila le mikhuba bebeyiqala uma sebefuna ukuqola abantu imali. Bebecula lezi zingoma abebehlose ngazo ukufuna imali emakholweni. Esikuqaphelile ukuthi ngaphezu kokuthi bebefuna imali, bebengcolisa negama loNyazilwezulu ngoba lo mkhuba bawuqale sekunguye osesihlalweni. Abakaze bayenze lento kubaholi abedlule. Bese kuyinto esiyandile okungaziwa nokuthi izonqadwa kanjani. Uma sebefuna imali bese beze babe nezindlela zabo zokuyifuna njengoba bese kunamatemu abawasebenzisayo bethi ‘Akushaywe uthando’. Ubuwazi ke ukuthi uma sekushiwo njalo sekufuneka imali bese ziyaqala lezi zingoma kuqhume nevosho khona esontweni. Sinezihlabelelo zamaNazaretha ezingu-242 abantu abangazisebenzisa noma bejabule bazicule uma bese sontweni,” kusho uMncwabe.Njengoba amaNazaretha esemhlanganweni kaJulayi, uMncwabe uthe bazilile, abazithinti izinto eziningi njengokudla isinkwa nenyama yenkukhu. “Kuzoqala imigidi yezintombi nto ezohlukana izigaba eziyisikhombisa njengoba sezihambise izintingo eNtanda, zaphinde zahlolwa ubuntombi. Emva komgidi wezintombi kuzoqala owenhlalisuthi obizwa ngenjobo, kube yizikotshi bese kuza umbhabhadiso, kuphume imishado nokukhethwa kwezintombi nto Esipholi (Ebhentshini),” usho kanje.Kuthiwa ukuzila inyama yenkukhu kungenxa yokuthi yenza abantu bafudunyalelwe yigazi bese befuna ukuya ocansini kanti nalo luziliwe njengoba kunomhlangano kaJulayi.Kuthiwa noma ngabe awuyile emhlanganweni kaJulayi, uma uyiNazaretha kuyaphoqa ukuthi uzile konke okuzilwayo lapho ukhona.

ABAHLOLI kuMasipala weTheku basivale thaqa isitolo esidayisa ukudla okusheshayo enkabeni yedolobha.Ngokwesitatimende esikhishwe umasipala, iFrendo’s Chicken, iphula imithetho eminingi yezempilo neyezokuphepha.Ngale kokungabi nesitifiketi esisemthethweni esigunyaza ukusebenza ngokudla, kutholakale ukuthi abasebenzi babuye balale egumbini eligcina impahla.“Ukuvalwa kwalesi sitolo kuza ngemuva kokuhlolwa okuphelele lapho okuvele khona izinto ezingi ezingafanele nezingabeka impilo yomphakathi engcupheni. Ezinye zazo; ukwephulwa komthetho ngokuhweba ngaphandle kwesitifiketi esivumelekile, ukwehluleka ukunikeza amarekhodi okuqeqeshwa kokuphatha ukudla nesitifiketi sokulawula izinambuzane,” kusho isitatimende sikamasipala.“Okunye okutholakele ngesikhathi kuhlolwa lesi sitolo wukuthi nesakhiwo uqobo kasikho ezingeni elifanelekile njengoba kungatholakalanga ipulani lesakhiwo eligunyaziwe nokungangeni komoya owanele.“Kubuye kwatholakala ukuthi kukhona abasebenzi abalala kuyo le ndawo nokuyinto ephazamisa uhlelo lokuhamba kwamanzi lapha edolobheni.

UPHIKO lwezamanzi eDurban University of Technology (DUT), i-Institute for Water and Wastewater Technology (IWWT) luthi awangcolile ayaxathuka amabhishi aseThekwini. Bakhiphe nesexwayiso ngobungozi bokusebenzisa la mabhishi awu-14 aseThekwini namaphethelo.Ngokusho komqondisi we-IWWT uSolwazi Faizal Bux, ukuhlolwa kwabo kubavezele ukuthi awu-14 amabhishi anamagciwane ayingozi amsuka wawo yindle.Uthe kulawo mabhishi bathole ukuthi awu-11 awo okukhona kuwo iBallito Tidal Pool, Westbrook Beach, Umdloti Beach, Glenashely Beach, Virginia Beach, Umgeni River, Umgeni River mouth, Laguna Beach, Country Club Beach, Bay of Plenty, ne-Addington Beach anesilinganiso esiphezulu segciwne elibizwa nge-Escherichia coli (E.coli).UBux uveze ukuthi yiBronze Beach noMhlanga Lighthouse kuphela amabhishi anesilinganiso esamukelekile se-E.coli, bese kuba yi-uShaka Beach enesilinganiso saleli gciwane.“Uma uqhathanisa namanye amabhishi aseThekwini, yi-uShaka Beach kuphela ekhombise ukuba nesilinganiso esiphansi se-E.coli. Kulawa amanye amabhishi awu-11 kuvele ukuthi isimo sawo siyakhathaza kakhulu, futhi ososayensi be-IWWT beluleke abantu ukuba bangawasebenzisi ukuzijabulisa kuwona kuze kube wukuthi kwehla leli gciwane kuwona,” kusho uBux. Uqhube wathi umlando ukhombisa ukuthi Umgeni River uhlale unesilinganiso esiphezulu saleli gciwane, okuwubungozi okukhulu. Uthe uphiko lwabo lwezamanzi luhlale luhlola ukuba sezingeni elifanele kwamanzi njalo ngamaholidi ukusiza ukubhekelela ukuphepha komphakathi. Kuthintwa okhulumela uMasipala weTheku, uNkk Gugu Sisilana, ucele ukuthi bathunyelelwe imibuzo nge-email, bese benikwa okungenani amahora awu-24 ukuphendula.

UMASIPALA waseMhlathuze uqinisekise imibiko yokudutshulwa kwabasebenzi ababili emmahovisi aseRichards Bay. Asavaliwe amahhovisi alo masipala.Ngokombiko othunyelwe abezindaba ngoLwesine ekuseni, kuthiwa lesi sehlakalo senzeke ekuseni namhlanje kanti ukufa kwalaba basebenzi okubukwa ukuthi ngonogada babanye babaholi balo masipala kuqinisekiswe amaphoyisa khona kule ndawo.Ngokombiko wamaphoyisa, kuthiwa unogada obengekho emsebenzini ufike wavulela ngenhlamvu kuzakwabo, washona, kwathi omunye unogada waphindisela ngenhlamvu kumsolwa, naye wasala enkundleni.Amaphoyisa athi uphenyo luyaqhunbeka.Umholi we-Action SA KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Zwakele Mncwango udlulise amazwi enduduzo emindenini yalabo abashonile, wasigxeka isenzo sokuhlaselana kwabasebenzi phakathi emagcekeni kamasipala.

KUVELE negama lowakwaGcaba ecaleni lokubulawa komrepha uKiernan “AKA” Forbes noTebello “Tibz” Motsoane.Izolo enkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini bekuvele abahlanu abayamaniswa naleli cala okungoLindokuhle Thabani Mkhwanazi (30), Lindani Zenzele Ndimande (35), Eddie Syanda Myeza (21), Mzwethemba Harvy Gwabeni (36) noLindokuhle Mhlaliseni Ndimande (29).UMbuso ubukade wenza izethulo zawo uphikisana nesicelo sebheyili yabasolwa. UMshushisi omkhulu u-Adv Gcweka uveze ukuthi uGwabeni washayela uMnuz Sydney Mfunda Gcaba ucingo.Uthe ngemuva kwalokho kwaba nemali engu-R800 000 eyangena ebhange likaGwabeni.“UGwabeni washayela uGcaba ucingo ngemuva kokuba sekuzwakele ukuthi u-AKA useshonile,” usho kanje.Ngokwesitatimende esifundwe umshushisi enkantolo, imali eyangena yayivela kwi-akhawunti yenkampani iBright Circle (pty) Ltd okuvela ukuthi inomqondisi oyedwa okunguMnuz Sydney Mfunda Gcaba kanti kwakubhalwe ukuthi imali eyayikhokhelwa umsebenzi wokubonisana (consult). UMbuso uveze ukuthi ngombono wawo kwakucashiswa ukuthi le mali ngeyani njengoba bekholwa ukuthi kwakungeyokudubula. Kuvela ukuthi uGwabeni esethumela imali wasebenzisa igama elithi isabelo (dividends) kodwa akukho lapho okuvela khona ukuthi abasolwa nababili bakwaNdimande babenamasheya enkampanini yakhe. UMshushisi uthathe bonke abebesenkantolo ngamehlo engqondo ebalandisa ngakho konke okwenzeka ngosuku lwesigameko.Uveze ukuthi konke kwaqala ngokuthi kube khona abamlandelayo u-AKA ngesikhathi efika esikhumulweni sezindiza eKing Shaka.Abasolwa ababemlandela uthe babehamba nge VW Polo, abanye babehamba ngeBMW   eyayishayelwa uGwabeni. Uveze nokuthi imoto kwakungesiyona ekaGwabeni kodwa wayeyiqashile.Uthe esesuka lo mculi eya ehhotela abasolwa baqhubeka nokumelusa.Uthe ngemuva kwalokho u-AKA waya eWish nokuyilapho afika wakhuluma khona nomphathi wendawo uMnuz Kweyama.“UKweyama watshela lo mculi ukuthi akapake imoto yakhe e-salon yakhe,” kuchaza yena.Ngesikhathi esengaphakathi eWish, uMshushisi uveze ukuthi uNdimande (Lindo) wayekhona naye ngaphakathi esamqaphile, waze washintsha nendawo ukuze ababone kahle.UMshushisi uthe ngesikhathi sekudutshulwa lo mculi abantu babaleka kodwa uNdimande waqhubeka wazihlalela ekhombisa ukungathuki.Uthe i-video iyamveza owayedubula ecuthile phakathi kwezimoto efake ikepisi elimhlophe. Kuvele ukuthi owadubula uMnuz Malusi Ndimande (osagcinwe eSwatini) nomfowabo. UMshushisi uveze ukuthi umsolwa wesibili uNdimande, uGwabeni noLindo yibona abaya eJacobs beyolanda iMercedes eyayinezibhamu ezazizosetshenziselwa ukubulala u-AKA.UMshushisi uveze ukuthi ubufakazi buveza ukuthi abasolwa babekhona endaweni yesigameko.UMshushisi uthe uyasiphikisa isicelo sabasolwa sokuthola ibheyili.Uthe umsolwa wokuqala uMkhwanazi akanayo indawo yokuhlala.Owesibili uNdimande  uzoba yingozi emphakathini uma ethola ibheyili.Umsolwa wesithathu uMyeza, uMshushisi uthe uma engathola ibheyili angase angafiki uma sekuqulwa icala futhi akanayo indawo ahlala kuyona.Umsolwa wesine uGwabeni, uthe nguyena ungqondongqondo wetulo lokusocongwa kwalo mculi futhi angalibalekela icala.Owesihlanu uLindokuhle uthe naye uyingozi emphakathini.Icala lizobuyela enkantolo ngoLwesibili.

IZIMO zempilo zenza kungabi yiwo wonke umuntu okhuliswa wumzali noma ngabazali bakhe bobabili.Zehlukene izizathu eziholela kulokho. Kungaba wukuthi omunye wabazali noma bobabli abasekho emhlabeni, noma bangabi seduzane nomntwana ngenxa yezizathu ezahlukene, okungaba wukusebenzela kude nasekhaya noma ukwehlukana kwabazali.Umeluleki wezengqondo ozinze eManzimtoti, eNingizimu yeTheku, uNkk Tholinhlanhla Dlamini-Ngcoya, uthe ukukhula komntwana kungekho umzali noma abazali bobabli kuyingozi ngoba kungaholela ekutheni eqe izigaba zokuba wumntwana.“Lokho kwenzeka ngokuthi umntwana kugcine sekuphoqa ingqondo yakhe ukujwayela ukuba mdala ebe esasemncane, futhi kwenza angakwazi ukujabulela isigaba sokuba wumntwana njengabanye abantwana. Inkinga ukuthi usuke ebhekene nezimo ezidinga enze izinto okumele ngabe zenziwa wumzali wakhe ukube ubekhona,” kusho uNkk Dlamini-Ngcoya.Eqhuba, uthe okungcono ngobunzima baleyo mpilo wukuthi kungenza umntwana asheshe ajwayele ukubhekana nezimo ezinzima zempilo, loko kumsiza ukusheshe aqine ukhakhayi.“Yize kunjalo kusemqoka ukuthi abantwana abaphila impilo enjalo balekelelwe ngabantu abadala abangakwazi ukuxhumana nabo, bancele kubona ulwazi lwezinto obekumele ngabe bazifundiswe ngabazali babo ukubasiza baqhubeke nempilo,” usho kanje.UMnuz Siyabonga Ntshangase, umeluleki wezengqondo ozinze ePitoli, eGauteng, yena uthe umzali wumuntu obaluleke kakhulu empilweni yengane kusukela izalwa kuze kube isisesigabeni sokukwazi ukuzimela empilweni.“Umzali uneqhaza elikhulu okumele alibambe ukubhekela ukuthi ingane yakhe ikhula kanjani. Nguye okumele ayifundise indlela yokuphila nokumelana nezimo ezahlukene zempilo, yingakho kuba nzima kakhulu uma kwenzeka engabi bikho empilweni yomntwana ngenxa yezizathu ezahlukene,” kusho yena. Uthe nakuba kuzohlale kubuhlungu kodwa kuba ngconywana uma abazali beshiya umntwana emhlabeni esekhulile futhi esekwazi ukuzimela, kunokuthi bahambe noma bangabi bikho empilweni yomntwana esasemncane ngoba lokho kwandisa izinto ezingathikameza ukukhula kwakhe.“Okunye kwalokho wukuthi kuba lula ukuthi ingane ibe ngumgilwa wabantu abahlukumeza umphakathi ngoba engekho omuntu obhekelele ukuphepha nenhlalakahle yayo, futhi kungenza nokuthi umntwana angakwazi ukuchuma emakhonweni ezinto aphiwe kuzona ngenxa yokungabi bikho komuntu omesekayo nomgqugquzelayo,” usho kanje.UNtshangase ucebise ngokuthi amalungu omndeni abantwana abangasenabazali kumele balekelele ukubakhulisa, nokuthi labo bantwana bangesabi ukucela usizo ezinhlakeni zohulumeni okungaba ezenhlalakahle ukuze basizakale kokubakhathazayo.

ISILO samabandla, uMisuzulu kaZwelithini sithe sekusicacele ukuthi umbango wesihlalo sobukhosi esihlezi kusona uyoze uphele mhla sangena ethuneni.INdlulamithi isho lokhu igcoba ngokusemthethweni inkosi yaseMbongombongwane, inkosi uMzamo Buthelezi emcimbini obusoPhongolo. Kulo mcimbi obugqame ngemvunulo yamabutho, iSilo sikubalulile ukuthi uButhelezi uyinkosi yesibili ayigcobayo selokhu engene ebukhosini.UButhelezi ungeniswe esibayeni, okuyisiko lakulesi sizwe uma kugcotshwa inkosi. Uhashwe kwaqhuma nemikikizo obekuyingxenye yenjabulo ebikhonjiswa yilesi sizwe.ISilo sitshele inkosi yaseMbongombongwane ukuthi ibekezele esihlalweni ngoba akulula.“Sengize ngazinikela sizwe sikaMageba ukuthi sengiyoze ngibizwe wuNkulunkulu ngilokhu ngikhonjwa ngibangiswa...,” kugonyuluka iNdlulamithi.UMisuzulu KwaZwelithini uthe usuku olunjengalolu lumenza ahlengezele izinyembezi."Ukuba awukho lo mndeni wakwaButhelezi ngabe angikho mina. UMntwana wakwaButhelezi wamela iqiniso lesizwe kusukela ngimncane. Wangelusa kusukela kuhamba uMdlokombane, wenza isiqinisekiso ukuthi ngiyahlala esihlalweni," kusho INdlulamithi.Uthe ubonga kakhulu iSilo esimzalayo uGoodwill KaZwelithini."Njengoba ngilapha ngizoqhubekeza ukuzofeza lokho uMdlokombane angakuqedanga. Le nkosi esingayo lapha, uMdlokombane wayivuma ukuthi iyinkosi yaseMbongombongwane.Lo mcimbi ubuhanjelwe nawuNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Thami Ntuli, uNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa nokuBambisana kuzwelonke ophinde abe umengameli we-IFP, uMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa, uSomlomo wesifundazwe uNksz Nontembeko Boyce noNgqongqoshe wezokuSebenza koMphakathi, uMnuz Martin Meyer.UNtuli uthe usuku lokugcotshwa kukaButhelezi luyingqophamlando kuZulu wonkana. "Kuyingqayizivele ukuthi lolu suku ngiluzwe luxoxwa yilungu lomndeni woMntwana wakwaPhindangene. Ukwethulwa kwenkosi yesizwe kusho ukuvunywa kwayo kwalabo abasaphila nalabo abangasekho futhi ukuphepha kwamakhosi kuseqhulwini," kusho uNtuli.Inkosi yaseMbongombongwane ebibekwa, ibonge bonke abebehambele lo mcimbi, yathi kucacile ukuthi nala kungekho qhude kuyasa. "Uhambo lwami ekuholeni, wuhambo losizi nezinyembezi. Lolu suku lufakazela iqiniso ukuthi uThixo akabbubheki ubuso bomuntu. NaseMbongombongwane namhlanje (esho izolo), liphumile ilanga. Ngabe ngijabula kakhulu ukuba uMntwana wakwaPhindangene ukhona phakathi kwethu ngoba indawo iMbongombongo eyakhe. Ngicela ukuphosa inselelo nasemakhosini ukuthi asisingathe isihlalo futhi asilwele," kusho inkosi uButhelezi.

AKUHAMBANGA kahle kowayengumengameli uJacob Zuma ekhala ngaphansi emzamweni wakhe wokuphikelela ukungena ePhalamende. IJaji uLeona Theron leNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo likhiphe isinqumo esilahla uZuma.UZuma ngoDisemba wonyaka odlule, umemezele ukuthi usehamba neqembu elisha i-MK, akasayingeni eye-ANC. Izwe kumanje lilungiselela ukhetho lukazwelonke oluzoba ngoMeyi 29.I-MK ibilibeka ngembaba elokuthi ifuna ukubuyisela uZuma esikhundleni sikamengameli, ake asiphatha amahlandla amabili.INkantolo yoMthethosisekelo yiyona eyayilahle uZuma ngecala lokwedelela inkantolo ngo-2021, yamgweba izinyanga eziwu-15 wangena ejele eMtshezi.Ngokwesigaba 47 (1) (e) soMthethosisekelo, wonke umuntu uvumelekile ukungena ohlwini lwabazoya ePhalamende ngaphandle komuntu ogwetshwe izinyanga ezingaphezulu kwezingu-12 ngaphandle kokunikwa ithuba lokukhokha inhlawulo.I-IEC yamemezela ukuthi uZuma akufanele abe sohlwini lwasePhalamende ngoba walahlwa ngecala. Abe-MK basedlulisela eNkantolo yezoKhetho bafika balunqoba udaba.I-IEC yalwedlulisa udaba yalusa eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo njengoba befike balunqoba.Umbango ubumaqondana nokuthi uZuma kufanele yini aye ePhalamende njengoba walahlwa ngecala lokwedelela inkantolo. IJaji uTheron lithe uZuma walahlwa ngecala futhi lokho kumile, akujiki. Lathi ukuthi akasiqedanda isigwebo ngenxa yokuthi washeshe wakhishwa nanokuthi wanikwa ushwele kamengameli, akusho lutho ngoba isigaba somthetho sikhuluma ngesigwebo kungakhathalekile ukuthi ugwetshwele icala lobugebengu noma lokwephuma umthetho. Inkantolo ithe uZuma angakwazi ukungena ohlwini lokuya ePhalamende emuva kweminyaka emihlanu kuphele isigwebo sakhe njengoba kusho umthetho. Ijaji lithe kungumsebenzi we-IEC ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu ababa sohlwini lwasePhalamende bathembekile, lathi kungumsebenzi wenkantolo ukuqinisekisa ukuthi umthetho uyalandelwa njengoba unjalo. Ungoti wezomthetho, uMnuz Mpumelelo Zikalala, uthe isinqumo senkantolo sisho ukuthi kuphelile ngalolu daba. UZikalala uthe uZuma akanalo ithuba lokwedlulisa icala ngoba isinqumo siphume enkantolo enkulu kunazozonke kuleli.I-IEC ikhiphe isitatimende ithi iyasemukela isinqumo senkantolo, isizokwazi ukubhekana namalungiselelo okhetho ngaphanddle kokuphazamiseka. I-IEC ithe akufanele kube nokudideka ngalolu daba.“Ukugwema ukudideka kuhle sicacise ukuthi isinqumo ngeke siphazamise iphepha lokuvota. UZuma uzoba wubuso beqembu lakhe kodwa igama lakhe lizokhishwa ohlwini lwabaya ePhalamende.UZuma nakuba engabonakalanga enkantolo kukhishwa isinqumo kodwa uNobhala-Jikelele we-MK, uMnuz Sihle Ngubane, ubekhona. Ubehamba namanye amalungu e-MK nokuthe uma kuphuma isinqumo babonakala bedangele.Kwenzeka konke lokhu nje, i-MK isanda kuxosha uMnuz Jabulani Khumalo owabhalisa iqembu. UKhumalo ulufake enkantolo udaba lombango weqembu, ufuna kukhishwe uZuma kufakwe yena.UKhumalo umile ekutheni nguyena umholi nomsunguli weqembu osemthethweni futhi uzolwa kuze kube sekugcineni.

KULOKOZA  inhlansi kubantu abaningi ngokuvulwa kabusha kwedokodo elimayelana nokuthi wafa kanjani loyo owabe engumengameli we-African National Congress (ANC), uChief Albert Luthuli.Lokhu kushiwo ngusihlalo weChief Albert Luthuli Museum uDkt Mxolisi Mchunu obekhuluma izolo, eGroutville, ngesikhathi kwethulwa ngokusemthethweni iLuthuli Peace Walk.ILuthuli Peace Walk izokuba ngomhlaka-20 Julayi  khona eGroutville.UMchunu uthe uMnyango wezoBulungiswa kuzwelonke yiwona obanikeze isiqiniseko mayelana nodaba lwedokodo."Kuhle ukuthi idokodo lizovulwa kabusha ukuze sithole iqiniso ngokufa kukaLuthuli," usho kanje.Uveze ukuthi lolu daba kuyimanje lusezandleni zoKlebe.ULuthuli owaba ngowokuqala ukuhlonishwa ngeNobel Peace Prize kuthiwa wafa ngokushayiswa yisitimela eseThembeni.Mayelana nomjaho, uthe uzothuthukisa umnotho iphinde ukhuthaze ezemidlalo kubantu bakule ndawo. Lokho uthe kuhle ngoba uLuthuli wayezifela ngezemidlalo.Ilungu lomndeni, uNkk Velile Luthuli, lithe kuyabajabulisa ukukhunjulwa kukaLuthuli ngale ndlela.Naye uthe kuhle ukuthi idokodo lizovulwa kabusha. Uthe njengomndeni bafuna ukuthola ukuthi wafa kanjani uLuthuli.IMeya yesiFunda iLembe, uMnuz Thobani Shandu, ithe kuhle ukuthi leli qhawe likhunjulwe ngale ndlela.Obhekelele ezokukhangisa kwiLuthuli Museum, uNksz Valencia Mthembu, uthe bayethemba ukuthi konke kuzohamba kahle ngosuku lomjaho.Umsunguli walo mjaho, uMnuz Zakhele Gumede, ushayelwe uhlombe ngokuqhamuka nombono ohlukile wokukhunjulwa kukaLuthuli.

KUGQUGQUZELWE abasebenzi bophiko lwezibonelelo zikahulumeni, i-South African Social Security Agency (Sassa) ukuthi bavezele ulwazi amalungu omphakathi asuke ehambele amahhovisi alolu phiko, ukuze afundiseke ngezindlela zokusebenza kwalo nendlela yokuziphatha.Emcimbini wokuvulwa ngokusemthethweni kwamahhovisi alolu phiko eBridge City KwaMashu ngoLwesihlanu, uNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi uNkk Lindiwe Zulu uthe umphakathi kumele uqonde ngokusebenza kwabasebenzi, uphinde ufundiswe  nangendlela yokuhleleka ukugwema izinkinga empilweni.“Uma abantu besemahhovisi  belindile, akube nento ebafundisayo ukuthi yikuphi okulindeleke kubona. Amalungu omphakathi  achitha isikhathi esevile emizuzwini engu-30 elindile, ngaleso sikhathi kuningi angabe asekufundile okuwumphako wendlela.“Umyalezo ogqugquzela amantombazane asemancane ukuthi azivikele ekutholeni izingane eminyakeni yawo.“Olunye lolwazi olungagcizelelwa kwabasuke behambele amahhovisi, ngolokugwema ukwanda kwabathola izingane besebancane, okwenza umsebenzi wakwa-Sassa ube nzima,” usho kanje. Uthe awafundiswe nangokubaluleka kokugxila kakhulu ezikoleni, waveza ukuthi amahhovisi alolu phiko, ayinkundla evakashelwa ngabantu abaningi nsuku zonke ngakho kumele abasebenzi basebenzise lelo thuba ukudlulisa ulwazi olubalulekile.Ukulungiswa kwamahhovisi akule nxanxathela yezitolo, kulandela ukucekeleka kwawo phansi ngesikhathi engqongqa kunezibhelu ngo-2021. Lesi sigameko saphoqa ukuthi athuthelwe ehholo lomphakathi Kwa-L  khona KwaMashu okwesikhashana ngo-2022.Ukulungiswa kwawo bekuqhubeka kanti aqale ukusebenza ngoSepthemba ngonyaka odlule.UNksz Thamo Mzobe oyi-Regional Executive Manager unxuse abasebenzi ukuthi bathembeke emsebenzini wabo ukuze kungagcini sekugxekwa uhulumeni ngenxa yokuziphatha kwabo.Uhambo lukaNgqongoshe, uNkk Zulu eThekwini luqale ngoLwesithathu olwedlule ngesikhathi evakashele esikoleni i-Cwebezela Primary eMlaza lapho enikele khona ngemifaniswano.NgoLwesine udlulele emahhovisi alolu phiko eMnini ukuzohlola ukusebenza kwawo ngaphambi kokudlulela eBridge City ngoLwesihlanu.

Kubukeka sebekhumelene umlotha uNdunankulu kaZulu, uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi noSihlalo we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Siboniso Duma.Laba baholi abangabaphathiswa kwikhabhinethi laKwaZulu-Natal elisha babambe umhlangano okuthiwa uthathe amahora amabili.Emva kwalo mhlangano obungeSonto, ebusuku, ihhovisi likaDuma lithe sekuvunguza umoya wobumbano kulaba baholi.UButhelezi noDuma baba nesiwombe esibi ngasekuqaleni konyaka, uDuma ehlwitha kabuhlungu uButhelezi umbhobho esathi wethula iSilo uMisuzulu kaZwelithini ngesikhathi kunomcimbi wokukhumbula iSilo uDinizulu kaCetshwayo.Lesi sigameko senzeka KwaCeza, phambi kukaMengameli, uCyril Ramaphosa, iSilo uMisuzulu, nesizwe samaZulu.Umcimbi wagcina udungeka njengoba kwagcina kugqenywa amalungu e-ANC angaphezu kweshumi.Imihlangano yamakhosi yokuzama ukuxazulula lolu daba yafinyelela kwangqingetshe.Manje kubukeka sengathi sebekwazile ukubuyisana.Ezithombeni nakumavidiyo okuthathwe emva komhlangano, laba baholi babonakala bencokola, bexhawulana.Okhulumela uDuma, uMnuz Ndabezinhle Sibiya, uthe sekuvunguza umoya woxolo kubona.“Kuvunguza umoya wobumbano nokuphokophela ukusebenzisana.”UButhelezi uphathiswe uMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu, kanti uDuma yena uphathiswe uMnyango wezokuThutha nezokuHlaliswa kwaBantu.Ebuzwa ukuthi udaba laKwaCeza lukhulunyiwe yini emhlanganweni, uSibiya uthe “Akukho okungaxoxwanga, kusukela kokwango-1994 kuze kube okwamanje mayelana nokwakha isisekelo sokusebenzisana.”UButhelezi wenqabile ukuphawula ngalolu daba, wathi intatheli ayinalo ilungelo lokumbuza ukuthi ubexoxani nozakwabo kwikhabhinethi yaKwaZulu-Natal.Udaba lukaButhelezi noDuma lwacasula abantu abaningi, okubalwa kubo amabutho athi afuna ukuthi uDuma ahlawuliswe kanzima.Unobhala wezinduna zamabutho kwisifunda iZululand, uMnuz Muzi Nyandeni, uthe kuyabajabulisa ukubuyisana kwala baholi kodwa wathi udaba alukapheli.UNyandeni uthe basamile ekutheni uDuma kufanele eyoshweleza eSilweni.“Njengabantu abazwana nokuthula, siyathokoza nxa abaholi sebehlalile phansi, babonisana. Kodwa ke ukuxoxa kwabo lapha ezingeni likahulumeni akusho ukuthi udaba seluphelile.“Isihlalo satheleka ngehlazo ngaleliya langa, angeke sikubalekele lokho. Ingakho kufanele abuye azoshweleza eSilweni, nasemakhosini. Udaba kufanele luzophelela phambi kweSilo.”Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kukasihlalo wendlu yobuholi bomdabu KwaZulu-Natal, iNkosi Sifiso Shinga, ayizange iphumelele.Bekungekhona okokuqala uButhelezi ebonakala encokola noDuma.Ngeledlule, laba baholi babonakala bexoxa ngesikhathi kumenyezelwa ikhabhinethi yaKwaZulu-Natal.UButhelezi noDuma kulindeleke ukuthi babe khona uma uNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, eyokwethula ikhabhinethi lakhe eSilweni.UNtuli uzokwethula ikhabhinethi eSilweni, oNdini, namhlanje.

IKHUZA ibuya esikhundleni iNhloko yeBhange loMbuso, uMnuz Lesetja Kganyago, emuva kokuthi uMengameli uCyril Ramaphosa, evuselele inkontileka yayo. I-SARB imemezele izindaba yathi uKganyago unikezwe inkontileka yeminyaka emihlanu.Ngaphandle kukaKganyago kuqokwe namaphini amabili azosebenzisana nawo. Abaqokelwe ezikhundleni zamaphini nguNksz Nomfundo Tshazibana, Dkt Rashad Cassim. Kwathi uDkt Mampho Modise wafakwa esikhundleni sikaMnuz Kuben Naidoo, obeyiPhini lenhloko yeSARB owesule nyakenye.Ihlandla likaKganyagko elisha lizoqala ngoNovemba nonyaka, liphele ngoNovemba ka-2029. AbeSARB bababongele kakhulu abaqokiwe bazwakalisa ukubethemba nokubeseka emsebenzini wabo.Baveze nokuthi ukuqokwa kwabo kuzodala uzinzo kulesi sikhungo esithathwa njengesibaluleke kakhulu ezweni. Bathe bayamethemba kakhulu uKganyago ngenxa yesipiliyoni anaso nokusebenza ngobuqotho akukhombisile.

IGCINE ikhonjwe indlela imenenja kuMasipala Abaqulusi, obesekuphele izinyanga imisiwe emva kokuthi isolwe ngokuvumela owayeyimeya kulo masipala ngokuba wusihlalo emhlangwaneni wekomiti lezezimali, ekubeni wayesesulile esikhundleni.Incwadi equkethe umbiko wokuxoshwa kukaMnuz Zwelihle Dlamini, Isolezwe eliyibonile ebhalwe ngoMsombuluko.Lencwadi iveza ukuthi ulahlwe ngecala lokuholela ophathe amalungu ekomiti lezezimali ngoMashi 28, 2023 ngesikhathi ewatshela ukuthi uMnuz Mncedisi Maphisa, okwasekuphele amasonto amabili esulile ukuthi unelungelo lokuba wusihlalo womhlangano.Ngokwale ncwadi, uMaphisa waqhubeka ukuhlalisa lomhlangano wabanesandla ezinqumweni ezazithathwa kuwo ekubeni wayengaseyiyona imeya.UMaphisa wayesule emva kwezincomo zesigungu esiphezulu se-IFP ukuthi asuke esikhundleni kulandela inkulumo yakhe eqoshiwe eyayinamagama alumelayo eyaputshuka yasabalala ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, okukholakala ukuthi wayephoqa abasebenzi komunye umhlangano ayenawo nabo ukuthi benze intando yakhe.Ecaleni elethweswe uDlamini ebeliqhubeka ngaphakathi kuMasipala phakathi kukaJanuwari noMashi kulo nyaka,  utholwe enecala lokukhohlisa umkhandlu wamakhansela nosomlomo kumasipala okuthiwa kwenzeke ngoJulayi nyakenye.Kuvele ukuthi wathi isibalo sababebamba umhlangano sasanele ukuthi ungaqhubeka, okwatholakala ukuthi akunjalo emva kokuthi sekuthathwe izinqumo emhlanganweni wamakhansela.Okunye axoshelwe khona, kuthiwa ukuqoka ngendlela engekho emthethweni uMnuz Thami Xaba esikhundleni sokuba yisikhulu esibambile ophikweni lokusebenzisana nomphakathi kulo masipala.Imizamo yokuthola uDlamini ayiphumelelanga, ngesikhathi sokuloba ucingo lwakhe beluvaliwe kwaze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela.Okhulumela umasipala uNksz Lolo Madonsela uthe udaba lusingethwe yiMeya uMnuz Khehla Mkhwanazi, ngesikhathi sokushicilela athe isematasa nemisebenzi kamasipala.

UMNYANGO wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal ukwamukele ukukhonjwa indlela kukathisha waseGroutville Secondary, KwaDukuza emuva kokulahlwa yicala lokufuna izithombe zezitho zangasese zomfundi nokumthumelela umphambili wakhe. UMnuz Musa E Mnkwanyana (39) uxoshwe ekufundiseni wuMkhandlu woThisha eNingizimu Afrika (SACE). Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Muzi Mahlambi, uthe bahlale bebakhuza othisha ukuba bahlukane nemikhuba engasile kubafundi. Isolezwe Ngempelasonto lithole ukuthi uMnkwanyana walahlwa yicala wumkhandlu wezabasebenzi abasemkhakheni wezemfundo (ELRC) ngoMeyi 8. UMnkwanyana ubemangalelwe kulo mkhandlu wumqashi wakhe, okunguMnyango wezeMfundo eKZN. Leli cala lalihlelelwe ukunkankanywa ngo-Okthoba 19, ngo-2023, Febhuwari 26, 2023 nangoMashi 26 kulo nyaka. Ngokusho kwesinqumo somkhandlu (ELRC), leli cala lenzeka ngo-2022 ngesikhathi uMnkwanyana efuna izithombe zezitho zangasese zomfundi ayemfundisa isiNgisi kuGrade 11 (ongagagulwangwa ngenxa yokuthi usemncane) futhi wabuye wamkhombisa umphambili wakhe. Yize uMnkwanyana abephika elala ngomhlane ukuthi wawenza lamanyala kodwa kwakhona ubufakazi obulethwayo futhi kwafakaza ngisho noyise womfundi. Siqhuba isinqumo sithe ngesikhathi kuqhubeka uphenyo, uMnkwanyana wabhala isitatimende ezivumela ukuthi ulenzile ichilo enganeni."Ngakhuluma nengane ngendlela engafanele umsebenzi engiwenzayo futhi ngayicela ukuba ingithumelele izithombe ezigcolile.“Ngenxa yamahloni ngazicisha izithombe efonini yami. Abazali beza esikoleni futhi angikuphikanga ababekusho ngalolu daba," kusho uthisha. Eqhuba uMnkwanyana wathi uyazisola futhi uyaxolisa ngesenzo sakhe, uqhubeke kanje:."Ngakhuluma nobaba futhi ngaxolisa kakhulu. Ngiyafunga ukuthi angikaze ngiyithinte ingane. Ngiyasemukela isono engasenza enganeni nasemndenini. “Ngingenza nanoma yini ukulungisa isiphambeko sami nokulekelela ingane nomndeni ekubhekaneni nalesi simo. Ngiyaxolisa kakhulu futhi ngiyafisa ukunikezwa ithuba lokulungisa iziphambeko zami."Umfundi wathi waqala ukuxhumana noMnkwanyana ngoWhatsApp ngaphandle kwesikole isikhashana kwaze kwaba lolu daba lwaziwa ngu-anti wakhe. Uvumile umfundi ukuthi wamtshela uMnkwanyana ukuthi uyamthanda ngaphambi kokuba baqale ukukhuluma ngemikhuba yocansi. Uthe uthisha wamcela izitho zangasese, naye wamthumelela futhi wazijabulela uthisha. Eqhuba uthe naye wamcela uthisha izithombe ezingcolile kodwa uthisha wenqaba, wathi ufuna azibonele ngqo umphambili wakhe.Umehluleli omkhulu eMkhwandlwini wezeMfundo veKZN, uRaj Shanker, ubuchithile ubufakazi bukaMnkwanyana wabe esemlahla ngecala nokuthi axoshwe ngokushesha wuMnyango wezeMfundo ngoba akakufanele ukusebenza nezingane ngokomthetho wesigaba 120 weChildren's Act. Ubuye wathi kuzokwaziswa noMqondisi-Jikelele ukuba afake igama likaMnkwanyana kwawabantu abakhohlakele..

NJALO ngoJulayi 28, umhlaba ugubha iWorld Hepatitis Day, okuwusuku lokuqwashisa ngesifo esihlasela isibindi.KwaZulu-Natal, uNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo uNksz Nomagugu Simelane, udonse ngendlebe abantu ukuthi basheshe basukume uma kukhona abangakuzwa kahle emzimbeni ngoba ihepatitis, ebuye ibizwe ngohephisi ibulala umuntu oyedwa njalo ngama-sekhondi awu-30, emhlabeni jikelele.UNksz Simelane uthe kule nyanga abantu kufanele bafunde kabanzi ngesifo ihephisi, ukuze bagweme ukubulawa yiso.“Ihepatitis yisifo sokuvuvukala kwesibindi okubangelwa amagciwane ahlukahlukene athathelanayo nangathathelani, okuholela ezinkingeni zezempilo ezihlukene. Ezinye zazo zingagcina zikubulala,” kuchaza uNksz Simelane.Uthe phakathi kwezimpawu zehepatitis kubalwa ukukhathala sengathi uphethwe wumkhuhlane, ukukhipha indle ephaphathekile uma uyozikhulula, umchamo ongcolile nobuhlungu besisu.Okunye ukungathandi ukudla, ukuncipha emzimbeni ngendlela engachazeki nokuba namehlo aphuzi ahlobene ne-jaundice, nesikhumba.Ungqongqoshe welulek abantu ngokuthi kufanele baphuthume emtholampilo uma benalezi zimpawu, bangazibi ngoba ihephisi iyabulala.Uveze ukuthi umuntu angalashwa ngokuphuza imithi namaphilisi akunikwa esikhungweni sezempilo. Ubalule ukuthi nokugoma kuyasiza ukuthi abantu bangahlaselwa yihephisi (isibonelo eminye imigomo etholwa yizingane ivikela ihephisi).UNksz Simelane uphethe ngokuthi abantu kufanele bahlanzeke, baye ocansini oluphephile, bangabolekani ngezinaliti, ama-razor, nezixubho.

UNGQONGQOSHE wezaMahlathi, ukuDoba nezeMvelo, uNkk Barbara Creecy, uxwayise ngobungozi izwe elingazithola libhekene nabo uma ungasetshenziswa ngokucophelela umhlaba.Ukusho lokhu izolo njengoba umhlaba jikelele ubukade ubungaza uJuni 17 njengosuku olwaziwa ngokuthi iDrought and Desertification Day.Isiqubulo sakulo nyaka besithi: “United for Land: Our Legacy. Our Future.”Lapha bekuqhakanjiswa ukubuyisela umhlaba esimeni sawo, kuncishiswe ukusetshenziswa kwawo ngendlela engenza ungabe usaba nempilo futhi kuliwe nesomiso.UNkk Creecy uxwayise ngokuthi indlela okusingethwe ngayo umhlaba wezwe ibeka engcupheni ezempilo nokukhiqiza.“Ukwanda kwesibalo sabantu, okuhambisana nokukhiqiza nokusetshenziswa komhlaba okungajwayelekile, kufaka ingcindezi ekukhiqizweni kwamagugu ambiwa phansi. Lokhu kwenza umhlaba usetshenzwe ngendlela engajwayelekile,” kusho uNkk Creecy.Uqhube wathi isimo somhlaba wezwe sithinta wonke umuntu ngakho ukunakekelwa kwawo kumele kube wumsebenzi wawo wonke umuntu.Ukhuthaze abantu nabamahlelo ehlukene ezweni ukuthi beseke imizamo nezinhlelo okuhloswe ngazo ukuvikela nokubuyisela umhlaba esimweni sawo.“Inhlalonhle nempilo yomphakathi, ikakhulukazi emakhaya, kuncike kakhulu ekusetshenzweni komhlaba. Umhlabathi ubalulekile ukuthi kukhiqizwe ukudla, kukhiqizwe ugesi, amanzi okuyizinto ezibalulekile ekuphileni kwabantu. Ngakho ukusebenzisa budlabha umhlaba kuphazamisa indlela yokuphila,” kusho ungqongqoshe.Uveze ukuthi uma babantu besebenzisa umhlaba ngendlela eyamukelekile, lokho kuzobenza bakwazi ukubhekana nesimo sokuguquka kwesimo sezulu ikakhulukazi ezindaweni okubhoke khona isomiso.Ubalule nokuthi umhlaba ubalulekile ekukhulisweni komnotho ngezolimo, amahlathi namagugu ambiwayo ukuze kukhiqizwe ukudla nezinye izimpahla.“Ngakho kubalulekile ukongiwa komhlaba futhi kulandelwe imigomo eyiyo yezolimo,” kusho ungqongqoshe.

SEKUXWAYISWE oskhwili phambana nobhoko abasabisa ngokuthi kuzoba nodlame njengoba kuzoba nokhetho lukazwelonke ngoMeyi 29.IKhabhinethi isixwayise ngokuthi labo abasabisa ngokuthi kuzoba nezibhelu, bazobhekana nengalo yomthetho.Lesi sexwayiso sikhishwe nguNgqongqoshe ehhovisi likamengameli uNksz Khumbudzo Ntshavheni, esithangamini nabezindaba izolo ngemuva komhlangano weKhabhinethi.Ubephendula imibuzo yezintatheli ezimbuze ngokuthi iziphi izinyathelo ezizothathelwa labo abasabisa ngodungunyane njengoba kubhekwe okhethweni nokuthi kungenzeka yini umlando uziphinde ngokuthi kube nezibhelu zokutatshwa kwempahla okwenzeka ngoJulayi 2021, ikakhulu KwaZulu-Natal naseGauteng. “Izinhlaka zomthetho zizobhekana nanoma ngubani osabisa ngodlame njengoba kubhekwe okhethweni. Ukhetho luzoba ngolukhululekile futhi izinhlaka zomthetho zizoqinisekisa ukuthi kunokuphepha ezweni.” Usho lokhu nje abanye babaholi beqembu elesekwa ngowayengumengameli we-ANC nezwe uMnuz Jacob Zuma, uMkhonto weSizwe, basabise ngokuthi kuzoba nodungunyane uma kungukuthi leli qembu alibi yingxenye yokhetho.NgoLwesithathu umholi wesikhashana wophiko lwentsha lweMK, uMnuz Bonginkosi Khanyile, ekhuluma nabezindaba eGoli, usabise ngokuthi ngeke luhlale ukhetho uma kususwa uZuma ohlwini lokuvota.“Uma kususwa iMK noZuma emqulwini wokuvota ngeke lubekhona ukhetho kuleli. Lokhu kuzobe kuwukusiphuca ilungelo lethu. Asesabi ukuthi singaboshwa ngalokhu esikushoyo,” kusho uKhanyile.Uthe bayaya enkantolo ukuyobhekana ngqo ne-ANC, ecaleni elithinta umbango wegama kanjalo nophawu elisetshenziswa yileli qembu. Leli cala kulindeleke ukuthi lihlale enkantolo yaseBloemfontein ngoMashi 19. UNksz Ntshavheni uthe iKhabhinethi ikhathazekile ngesiteleka esiphazamise ukuhanjiswa kwezidingo sabasebenzi bakaMasipala weTheku.“Lesi siteleka ebesihambisana nodlame siphazamise ukuhanjiswa kwezidingo ezifana namanzi nogesi. Sinxusa abezomthetho ukuthi bavikele amalungelo ezakhamuzi.” Odabeni oluthinta ukubuyiswa komhlaba, uthe bangu-2.3 million asebehlomulile ohlelweni. Uveze nokuthi ikhomishini ebhekele ukubuyiswa komhlaba isinxephezele ababefake izicelo zokubuyiswa komhlaba ongu-3 889 701 wama-hektha, okudle uR25 billion. Uveze nokuthi sebethuthukise izindawo okwakhiwe kuzo imijondolo ezingu-578, ohlelweni lokuqala wathi kwelesibili bahlela ukuthuthukisa ezingu-1 497. Ubalule nokuthi luphothulwe ngempumelelo uhlelo lokunyusa udonga lwedamu iHazelmere, okudle uR820 million.Uthe lokhu kuzonyusa amanzi agcinwa kuleli damu.Uzwakalise ukukhathazeka ngokwanda kwamacala kamuva nje okuthunjwa kwezingane.Unxuse abazali ukuthi baqaphele ikakhulu ngalesi sikhathi futhi bahlale bazi ukuthi izingane zabo zikuphi.

SEKUVELE ukuthi ukushoda kwemithi kashukela ikakhulukazi lowo obizwa nge-Ozempic, kuhlobene nokuthi abanye abantu bawusebenzisela ukuncipha emzimbeni.I-South African Health Products Regulatory Authority (Sahpra) ixwayise abenza lokhu ithi babeka impilo yabo engcupheni. Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi izinkampani ezikhiqiza imithi elwa ne-type 2 diabetes, ziveze ukuthi izoshoda kulo nyaka emhlabeni jikelele.UMnuz Deon Poovan obhekelele ukulawulwa kwemithi kwi-South African Health Products Regulation Authority (Sahpra), uthe ukushoda komuthi kashukela obizwa nge-Ozempic bathole ukuthi kuhlobene nokuncishiswa kwesisindo somzimba.Ekhuluma kwi-eNCA, uthe kunabantu abasebenzisa lo muthi ukuncipha ngenxa yezithako zawo ezikwazi ukulawula isisindo somzimba.Uthe kuyingozi ukusebenzisa i-Ozempic ukuncipha ngoba eNingizimu Afrika ayizange igunyazwe njengomuthi wokuncipha.Labo abasebenzisa i-Ozempic ukulwa noshukela kufanele bakhulume nodokotela babo ukuze banikezwe eminye imithi.“I-Ozempic iyashoda emhlabeni jikelele. Okubi esesikutholile manje wukuthi kunabantu abayisebenzisela ukuncipha. Kuyingozi ukwenza lokhu ngoba njengenhlangano elawula ukusetshenziswa kwemithi asikaze sithi i-Ozempic ngeyokunciphisa umzimba,” kusho uPoovan.Ucele abafuna ukunciphisa umzimba ukuthi bakhulume nodokotela babo ngoba i-Ozempic ngeke ibasize kodwa babeka impilo yabo engcupheni. Uthe badinga ukukhuluma nezazi zempilo ezizobaluleka kahle.“Ngisho umuntu onoshukela uyachazelwa ukuthi i-Ozempic izomsiza ngani. Ubuye akhulume nabasebenzi bezempilo okubalwa odokotela, ama-dietician nabanye ngokudla okufanele akudle. Uye achazelwe nangendlela osekufanele aphile ngayo njengoba ushukela obizwa nge-type 2 diabetes udinga umuntu adle ngendlela efanele, azivocavoce enze nokunye okuzomgcina ewumqemane.”Ubuye wakugcizelela ukuthi i-Ozempic wumuthi otholakala ngokuya kudokotela awuvele nje uwuthenge ungenayo incwadi ekugunyaza ukuba uwuthenge.

UKHOMISHANA wamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLieutenant General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi, ukhalima abantu abazobhiyozela imiphumela yokhetho, bese bekwenza ngendlela engekho emthethweni.UMkhwanazi uthe abazoba osikhwili phambana nobhoko, abazobhiyoza kuze kweqe, bazoyikhotha imbenge yomile.Uyalele abaholi bamaqembu ezepolitiki ukuthi baxwayise amalungu abo ukuthi abhiyoze kepha aqaphele.Umkhwanazi ubeke kanje:“Sixwayisa labo abazobhiyoza ukuthi bakwenze lokhu belandela umthetho. Uma bebhiyoza bephula umthetho, amaphoyisa ngeke ananaze ukubabopha. Amaphoyisa azobe eyiqaphe ngelokhozi imibhiyozo.”Wathi nalabo abazophuza bese beshaya abanye, bazobhekana nabo.“Njengoba kuqala impelasonto kukhona abazophuza bese bebhiyozela kwabanye. Kwabona siyabaxwayisa ukuthi bapheze ukwenza lokhu ngoba uma beke baphambana nomthetho, sizobe sikhona ukubabopha,” kusho uMkhwanazi.Ukusho lokhu ngoLwesihlanu ngesikhathi ekhuluma nabezindaba esikhungweni semiphumela yezokhetho yeKhomishini yezoKhetho eThekwini.UMkhwanazi uncome amaphoyisa ngomsebenzi omuhle awenzile ngalesi sikhathi sokhetho, wathi ibalelwa ngaphezu kuka-900 imibhikisho yomphakathi yokukhala ngezidingo kusuka ekuqaleni konyaka.“Abalelwa ku-60 amacala athinta ukhetho, ahlanganisa ukuphazamisa abasebenzi bokhetho, ukucekela phansi impahla yokuvota, ukushaya, ukuqhumisa isibhamu namanye. Bathathu abantu ababoshelwa lawa macala abangakadedelwa,” kubeka uMkhwanazi.Uthe emacaleni okubulala abikiwe eMpumalanga, Wartburg naseMuden ngaseGreytown, bathole ukuthi abengahlangene nokhetho.“Kunamaphoyisa amabili ayekiswe umsebenzi wokugada ukhetho emuva kwe-vidiyo esabalale ezinkundleni zokuxhumana egqoke umfaniswano wamaqembu. Umsebenzi wethu akuwona owokuba osopolitiki kodwa ukugada ukhetho,” kusho uMkhwanazi.Khonamanjalo isikhulu esiphezulu seKhomishini yoKhetho, uMnuz Sy Mamabolo, sikuchithile ukuthi ubuhixihixi obudaleke izolo kucisha ibhodi lemiphumela ezikhungweni okukhishwa kuzona imiphumela, buzoba nomthelela emiphumeleni.Uthe alukho ulwazi olwebiwe kulobu buhixihixi.“Alukho ulwazi olwebiwe ngenxa yalobu buhixihixi. Ulwazi lonke luphelele kube nje nokuphazamiseka kodwa yonke into ihamba kahle.” Kanti isikhulu sekhomishini KwaZulu-Natal uNkk Ntombifuthi Masinga, sihambe emazwini kaMamabolo, sathi alukho ulwazi olulahlekile ngenxa yobuhixihixi.Uveze ukuthi zintathu izikhalazo ngokhetho abazitholile wathi ezimbili zazo zichithiwe. “Esisodwa simatasa naso. Sizothi sikhipha imiphumela ngeSonto (kusasa) sibe sesixazulule yonke into. Imiphumela yaseThekwini, izogcina ukungena ngenxa yokuthi inezikhungo eziningi zokuvota,” kuchaz uNkk Masinga.Uveze ukuthi iTheku linezikhungo ezibalelwa ku-800, ekubeni izikhungo zokuvota zibalelwa ku-4 900.

UMASIPALA weTheku unxusa abantu ukuthi bahlale besiqaphile isimo sezulu kulandela isixwayiso sabakwa-South African Weather Service ngoMsombuluko.Lo mkhandlu omkhulukazi KwaZulu-Natal uthi izangoma zezulu zikhiphe isixwayiso esiphuzi, esisesigabeni sesibili ngesimo sezulu esibi esithinta iTheku nezinye izingenxe zesifundazwe.Esitatimendeni umasipala uthe kulindeleke ukuduma kwezulu okuhamba nesichotho, umoya nemvula enamandla ngoMsombuluko.Kuthiwa lokhu kungaholela ekutheni kube nezikhukhula ezindaweni eziyimijondolo, emigwaqweni, ezindaweni eziphansi namabhuloho kugcwale amanzi.Kube sekunxuswa abantu ukuthi bahlale beqaphile  bangazitholi sebelimala.Kamuva izulu selishiya kukhalwa eThekwini, kusukela ngezikhukhula ezagadla ziphindelela kwabhubha inqwaba yabantu ngo-2022.Abanye balabo bantu abakaze batholakale kuze kube manje.
