I-SOUTH African Social Security Agency (Sassa) ixwayisa abantu ukuthi bangayinaki inkulumo engelona iqiniso ezungeza ezinkundleni zokuxhumana emayelana nokuholwa kwezimpesheni.Esitatimendeni esithumele abezindaba, iSassa ithe izwe lisesikhathini sokhetho ngakho kunabantu abazama ngakho konke okusemandleni abo ukutshala ingebhe kubantu abahola izibonelelo zikahulumeni.Kule nkulumo eqoshiwe kuthiwa kuzwakala izwi lowesilisa okhuluma isiXhosa, ethi uhlelo lokuholela izimpesheni lakwaSassa lugqekeziwe.Iqhubeka ithi ngenxa yalokhu, abantu ngeke bayithole impesheni yabo njengenhlalayenza ngoba iSassa isaba abakhwabanisi.Kuthiwa le ndoda isho nokuthi imali yesibonelelo ngeke ifakwe kuma-akhawunti asemabhange abahola izimpesheni kuze kulungiswe uhlelo lokuholwa kwezimpesheni emuva kwamasonto amabili.Kuyona le nkulumo eqoshiwe kwaziswa abantu ukuthi imali yesibonelelo bazoyithola emahhovisi akwaSassa eduze kwalapho behlala khona futhi kumele baphathe omazisi babo.Le ndoda kuthiwa ihubhuza amanga, ithi isabalalisa le nkululumo ngoba iyazi kunabantu abangenayo imisakazo noma uWhatsApp.AbakwaSassa bathi ngamampunge ashiwo kule nkulumo futhi abantu abangangenwa amanzi emadolweni.“Sinxusa abantu ukuthi bangakunaki okuqukethwe yile nkulumo kodwa balandele okubhalwe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana zakwaSassa eziqukethe imininingwane yangempela mayelana nezinsuku okuholwa ngazo izimpesheni zinyanga zonke,” kusho uSassa.ISassa ithi akukhona okokuqala ibhekana nenkinga efuze lena kwazise isike yaphebeza amahemuhemu ayethi  kuzonqanyulwa ukuholwa kwezibonelelo.“ISassa ifuna ukuqinisekisa umphakathi ukuthi ngeke kube nokuphazamiseka ekuholweni kwezimpesheni. Luhamba kahle uhlelo lwethu lokuholela abantu izibonelelo futhi ngeke luphazanyiswe lutho. Abantu bazoyithola ngesikhathi imali yabo,” kucacisa iSassa esitatimendeni.

UMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana nobuHoli boMdabu KwaZulu-Natal  uxwayisa umphakathi ngokuthi kungenzeka kube nemililo yequbula ezingxenyeni ezithile zesifundazwe ngenxa yomoya oqale ekuseni.UMphathiswa walo mnyango, uMfundisi Thulasizwe Buthelezi, uthe ngokolwazi abalutholile ezangomeni zezulu kulindeleke ukuthi kube nesimo sezulu esingaholela ekutheni kube nemililo yequbula kusukela ngo-9 ekuseni kuze kube ngu-10 ebusuku.Izindawo ezingathinteka ezingaphansi kukaMasipala Abaqulusi, i-Alfred Duma, iBig Five Hlabisa,  iDr Nkosazana  Dlamini-Zuma,  eThekwini, iGreater Kokstad, Impendle, Ingwe, Inkosi Langalibalele,  owaKwaDukuza, iseMandeni, iKwaMaphumulo, eMkhambathini, iseMpofana, iseMsinga, eMthonjaneni, eMtubatuba,eNdwedwe naseNewcastle."Amathimba ezinhlekelele kulabo masipala asemi ngomumo ukuze abhekane nezinhlekele ezingase zibe khona,"  kusho uMphathiswa esitatimendeni.Lo mnyango unxusa umphakathi ukuthi ungabasi imililo ezindaweni ezivulekile noma ushiye umlilo ungagadiwe.Ungalahli izinqamu zikagwayi ngamafasitela ezimoto noma ezindaweni ezivulekile.Ugweme ukujikijela amabhodlela ezigangeni ngoba akwazi ukukhulisa imisebe yelanga futhi okhele imililo.Ukuthi uzilungiselele izinhlekelele ezingenzeka zomlilo ngokuthi wazi ukuthi izinsiza zokucisha umlilo zitholakala kanjani.Uma kuba nomlilo omkhulu, ubike ngokushesha bese uyaqhela kuleyo ndawo udedele ochwepheshe ukuthi bawulawule.

ZIBALELWA ku-161 iziguli okuqinisekiswe ukuthi zihlaselwe yisifo samehlo, uphenyane (pink eye), eThekwini.UMphathiswa wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomagugu Simelane, uthe iziguli ezingu-55 zihlonzwe esibhedlela iClairwood, ezingu-50 eKZN Children’s Hospital, ezingu-39 emtholampilo, iCato Manor Community Health Centre, ezingu-15 esibhedlela iMcCord kuthi ezimbili zihlonzwe eHalley Stott Clinic.Uthe uma unophenyane kuvuvukala untwentwesi olusobala olugudle iso kanye nenhlamvu yeso. Lolu ntwentwesi lubizwa nge-conjunctiva. Amehlo aba bomvu."Sinxusa  abanezimpawu ukuthi bangahlali ekhaya. Bavakashele emitholampilo eseduze nabo. Ngesikhathi seCovid-19 sasungula imikhuba eminingi ekhuthaza inhlanzeko njengokugeza izandla njalo ngensipho namanzi noma izihlanzi. Lezo ngezinye zezinto okumele sizijwayeze zona ezingagwema ukusabalala kophenyane,” kusho yena.Uthe ungakuvimbela ukuba neso elibomvana ngokuthi ungawathinti amehlo akho, ugeze izandla zakho njalo, ukusebenzisa ithawula elihlanzekile nendwangu yokugeza nsuku zonke. Ningasebenzisi  amathawula noma izindwangu zokugeza ezizodwa nibe baningi, ukushintsha imicamelo yakho njalo, ukulahla izimonyo zamehlo ezindala ezifana ne-mascara nokugwema ukuzisebenzisa nomunye umuntu.Omunye wabahlengikazi, ongavumelekile ukukhuluma nabezindaba, uthe iziguli eziningi eziphethwe uphenyane yizingane zesikole. Kunzima ukululawula kuzona ngoba umgomo uthi akumele zisondelane nokungelula ngoba ngeke zingadlali, ezinye zigibela nezimoto zomalume ndawonye.

UHLAKA olushaya imithetho ethinta izikweletu, iNational Credit Regulator (NCR), ludonse ngendlebe ababolekisa ngemali ukuthi bangalokothi bathathele abantu omazisi babo namakhadi okukhipha imali ebhange.I-NCR ikhiphe lo myalelo emuva kokuthola izikhalo kubantu baseMbombela, eMpumalanga, akade bekhala ngokubanjelwa omazisi babo ngomashonisa.Iye yajuba Oklebe ukuba bayophenya ngalolu daba, bagasele emizini yomashonisa lapho bethole khona omazisi namakhadi okuhola isibonelelo sikahulumeni.I-NCR ithe kuyicala ukubamba umazisi, ikhadi lasebhange nelesibonelelo sikahulumeni. Owenza lokhu angavalelwa ejele isikhathi esingangonyaka noma ahlawuliswe imali. Isigwebo siya ngobunzima becala.Ithe abantu baye bayibikela ngokubanjelwa omazisi njengoba sekusondele ukhetho ngoba bekusho ukuthi bebengeke bakwazi ukuvota.Iveze ukuthi ihambisane noKlebe ngoba ayikwazi ukubopha.Esitatimendeni sabezindaba uCaptain Lucy Sekgotodi woKlebe eMpumalanga, uveze ukuthi kuboshwe abantu abayisithupha abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-23 no-54 ababhekene necala lokuphula umthetho wezikweletu iNational Credit Act.Uveze ukuthi bebehambisana neNCR ngesikhathi bebopha laba bantu emuva kokuthi umphakathi ubalume ngendlebe ngokuthi laba banamabhizinisi okubolekisa ngemali angekho semthethweni.“OKlebe bathole ukuthi laba ababolekisa ngemali bebebamba amakhadi asebhange, amakhadi okuhola isibonelelo sikahulumeni nomazisi. Bebegcina lezi zinto ngakubona ukuqinisekisa ukuthi labo ababoleke imali bayayikhokha imali abayibolekile nenzalo yakhona ephezulu,” kusho uCapt Sekgotodi.Uthe umphathi woKlebe eMpumalanga, uMajor General Nicholas Gerber, ukushayele ihlombe ukuboshwa kwalaba bantu abayisithupha.UGerber ucele umphakathi ukuthi uyeke ukuboleka imali komashonisa ngoba abanawo unembeza futhi baxhaphaza abampofu.I-NCR itholakala ngokushayela u-0860 627 627/011 554 2700 nangokuthumela i-email [email protected]

USUYAQALA ukubonakala umonakalo wesishingishane uFilipo esihamba nemvula enamandla esecekele phansi imizi nengqalasizinda eMkhanyakude.Kuxwayiswa izakhamizi kuMasipala waseJozini ukuthi akuhambeki emgwaqweni uP449 ngenxa yezikhukhula. Kunanemizi esigcwale amanzi emagcekeni ayo.Izakhamuzi ziyanxuswa ukuba zibeke ukuphepha kwazo phambili. Amathimba abhekele izinhlekele ayaqhubeka nokusigada isimo kwisifundazwe sonke.Kwenzeka lokhu nje, bezikade zixwayisile izangoma zezulu ukuthi lizoyidliva izulu, kube nezikhukhula ezingadala umonakalo omkhulu ngakho abantu abahlale beqaphile.Isishingishane uFilipo siqale eMozambique senabela eNingizimu Afrika.Liyayidliva ezindaweni eziningi ezisenyakatho yesifundazwe iKwaZulu-Natal, kunxuswa abashayeli ukuba bacophelele. pic.twitter.com/C8X9qYY0AjKwaZulu-Natal liyidliva kakhulu ezindaweni ezakhele uMkhanyakude, iKing Cetshwayo neZululand.Kwenzeka lokhu nje, kujutshwe ithimba elibhekele izinhlekelele likazwelonke ukuba lisebenze nezifundazwe iKwaZulu-Natal, Limpopo neMpumalanga, ezizothikanyezwa uFilipo.Lokhu uhulumeni uthi kwenziwe ngenhloso yokuhlenga impilo yabantu kuvikelwe ingqalasizinda.UNkk Thembi Nkadimeng onguNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu unxenxe abantu wathi bahlale beqaphile.“Abantu ababambisane nabezinhlekelele. Bagweme ukuhamba noma ukushayela noma ukuwela imigwaqo namabhuloho agcwele amanzi,” usho kanje.IMeya yaseJozini, uMnuz MfanaNaye Mathe, nayo ixwayise abantu yathi abazibheke.“Uma ubambo lwakho lungaphoqi uyanxuswa ukuba uhlale endlini. Gwema izindawo lapho kugeleza amanzi,” kusho uMathe.Mayelana namathimba ezinhlekelele eJozini kungathintwa uNkk AG Gumede ku-066 299 1076 noma ku-072 017 2040.Noma babike ku-NKK ZO Khumalo ezinhlekele emgwaqweni ku-076 091 5378.

KUXWAYISWE abamaqembu ezepolitiki ahlukene ukuba bapheze ukwenza izitatimende ezichukuluzayo nezingadala ukungabekezelelani emalungwini omphakathi njengoba kubhekwe okhethweni.Lokhu kuvezwe wuMphathiswa woMnyango wezokuThutha, ukuPhepha nokuXhumana koMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka, embizweni ebihlanganise abamaqembu ezepolitiki ehlukene ebingoLwesihlanu KwaNongoma, obekuhloswe ngayo ukuqinisekisa ukuthula nozinzo njengoba kubhekwe okhethweni lukazwelonke nolwezifundazwe ngoMeyi, 29.UHlomuka ophinde abe wusihlalo wekomiti elihlanganisa amaqembu ezepolitiki ehlukene esifundazweni, elinikezwe umsebenzi wokuxazulula ukungaboni ngasolinye emaqenjini, elibizwa ngeMulti-Party Political Intervention, uthe abaholi bamaqembu banomthwalo wokufundisa abalandeli babo ngokubaluleka kokupolitika ngendlela evuthiwe nokubekezelelana.“Kungaba yiphutha elikhulu uma singabuyisela emuva okwazuzwa abangaphambili kwethu ngesikhathi bakha uzinzo ikakhulukazi kwezepolitiki,” usho kanje.IKwaNongoma isezindaweni ezake zahlaselwa yisihlava sokubulawa nokuhlaselwa kosopolitiki.Muva nje, amalungu e-ANC angeniswe ezibhedlela elimele okukholakala ukuthi ashaywe ngawe-IFP, emuva kwesigameko esenzeke emcimbini wokugubha iminyaka engu-110 kwakhothama iSilo uDinuzulu kaCetshwayo owawukwaCeza emasontweni amabili adlule. Kukholakala ukuthi ukuhlwithwa umbhobho kukaNdunankulu kaZulu, uMfundisi Thulasizwe Buthelezi, wuMphathiswa eMnyangweni wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho, ezokuVakasha nozeMvelo uMnuz Sboniso Duma, kwaba nomthelela kulesi sigameko.UKhomishana wamaPhoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, u-Lieutenant General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi, ekhuluma kulo mhlangano, uthe umsebenzi wamaphoyisa ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu bakuleli basebenzisa ilungelo labo ngokukhululeka.“Umthethosisekelo wakuleli unikeza wonke umuntu ilungelo lokuthi angaba yilungu leqembu lezepolitiki, angaqala inhlangano yakhe yezepolitiki nokuthi akhankasele ukuthi  abantu bajoyine iqembu lakhe. Thina njengamaphoyisa sinikezwe umsebenzi wuMthethosisekelo wakuleli, ukuvikela amalungelo abantu,” kusho uMkhwanazi.Amaqembu abebambe iqhaza kulo mhlangano phakathi kwawo bekukhona i-ANC, IFP, DA, EFF, MK Party, ABC, ActionSA namanye.

KUXWAYISWE abaholi bamaqembu ezepolitiki namalungu ukuthi bangakhulumi amagama anohlevane noma izinto ezizojivaza isithunzi sokhetho njengoba ingakakhishwa ngokusemthethweni imiphumela yokhetho.Lesi sexwayiso sikhishwe nguSihlalo weKhomishini yezoKhetho uMnuz Mosotho Moepya, othe umgomo wokuziphatha owasayinwa amaqembu usamile njengoba imiphumela ingakashicilelwa.Usho lokhu nje abaholi abehlukene bakhwela bayadilika, abanye bakhuluma amagama anohlevane njengokuthi kwezinye izifundazwe abavoti bavote belandela uhlanga oluthile.USihlalo we-ANC uMnuz Gwede Mantashe noSihlalo woMkhandlu we-DA uNkk Helen Zille, bathe abavoti baKwaZulu-Natal, bavotele iqembu elisha uMkhonto weSizwe, eliholwa ngowayengumengameli uMnuz Jacob Zuma owayengumengameli wezwe, ngokobuhlanga ngoba engumZulu.“Sixwayisa abaholi nabeseka amaqembu ukuthi bacwecwe ulimi uma bekhuluma ngoba imigomo yokuziphatha ethinta ukhetho isamile. Abamaqembu bayazi ukuthi uma kuphulwa le migomo yiziphi izinyathelo abangathathelwa zona emthethweni ngakho sinxusa ukuthi bakuqaphele abakushoyo kuze kukhishwe imiphumela.” Uthe bayakwamukela ukugxekwa ngezikhalo zomphakathi ezithinta ukhetho.Amaqembu ehlukene akhale ngokuhamba kancane kohlelo lokuvota kwezinye izikhungo ezize zavalwa entathakusa izolo, ukungasebenzi kwemishini yokubheka amagama abavoti, ukungavunyelwa kwabanye abavoti ebebengabhalisile ezikhungweni abebefuna ukuvota kuzona nezinye izinkinga.UMnuz Sy Mamabolo, isikhulu sekhomishini, uthe abasebenzi abebesiza okhethweni baqeqeshwe izinsuku ezine.Uthe bakha uhlelo lokuqasha laba basebenzi besebenzisana namaqembu amelelekile emkhandlwini ofaka ikhomishini namaqembu.“Kwaqashwa intsha eningi ebingasebenzi, engenaso nesipiliyoni. Ukuphatha ukhetho kudinga ukuthi ube nolwazi.”Uthe ezikhungweni okubalwa iCity Hall, eThekwini enabantu abaningi abavota kuyona baphuzile ukubala amavoti ngenxa yokuthi kuvotwe ngisho sesishayile isikhathi sokuvala.Ubalule nokuthi izolo ngabo-3 ntambama kunezikhungo ebezisabala amavoti. “Siqashe abacwaninga imiphumela abazoqinisekisa ukuthi yonke imiphumela iyiyona. Uma sekuphothulwe konke kuzobe sekwabiwa izihlalo zasePhalamende kanjalo naseziShayamthetho, kunikwe inhloko yamajaji uhlu lwabantu abazojutshwa.” Uthe umthetho ubagunyaza ukuthi bamemezele imiphumela ezinsukwini eziyisikhombisa wathi bazimisele ukungaphambani nalokhu okubekwe emthethweni.UMamabolo uthe umthetho uvumela ukuthi umuntu avote lapho ehlala khona kuphela wathi abajikisiwe yingoba bebengaveli ohlwini lokuvota.Abanezikhalo ezithinta ukubalwa kwamavoti noma ezinye ezithinta izinto ezenzeke ezikhungweni zokuvota, banikwe kuze kube yinamhlanje ngo-9 ebusuku ukubika ku:[email protected].

UMPHATHISWA wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu KwaZulu-Natal uNkk Bongi Sithole - Moloi, ukhumbuze abantu ngobungozi bomlilo njengoba kungena ubusika nje.UMphathiswa ugcizelele lokhu ngesikhathi kunenkonzo yokukhumbula abaphangalala ngenxa yezinhlekelele nokuhlonipha abasebenzi balo mkhakha abazinikela ngezikhathi ezinzima.Umkhuleko ubusenkundleni yezemidlalo iZinkwazi, eMbali eMgungundlovu.Isifundazwe silahlekelwe yimiphefumulo yabantu abangu-90 ngenxa yezinhlekelele ezindaweni ezingaphansi kwaseThekwini, uMgungundlovu, Ilembe nasoThukela.Abantu abakhahlamezeka basala bengenazo izindawo zokuhlala, bathuthelwa emahholo.Kwakhahlamezeka nengqalasizinda okubalwa kuyona imigwaqo  neyokuphakela amanzi namanje kwezinye izindawo kusenzima.Umkhuleko ubuthanyelwe yizinhlaka ezahlukene zamabandla abehlangene enxusa kuMdali ukuthi zehle izinhlekelele esifundazweni.UMphathiswa uthe lo mkhuleko bahlose ngawo ukukhumbula abangasekho, baphinde baxwayise ngobungozi bomlilo.‘’Yingqayizivele yethuba le yokuthi sihlangane, sithandaze ndawonye. Siyabancoma kakhulu abasebenzi bezokutakula abasebenza ngokuzikhandla ezimweni ezinzima,’’ kusho uMphathiswa.Uthe njengoba ubusika busondela nje, abezinhlekelele bazobe bemi ngomumo ukwelekelela lapho bedingeka khona.UMphathiswa uthe uyazi ukuthi ebusika kuvame ukuthi kubikwe izigameko zomlilo ngenxa yokuthi kumakhaza abantu basuke bezifudumeza.

KUDONSWE ngendlebe izintombi ngokubaluleka kokuzigcina zizitombi nokuthi zigxile emfundweni.Lokhu kuvele ngesikhathi kunomcimbi wokulungiselela ukuya eMkhosini woMhlanga obukwaHlabisa ngeSonto.Induna yezintombi okunguNksz Andile Zuma uthe kubalulekile ukuthi amatshitshi aziqhenye ngobuntombi bawo agxile emfundweni ukuze abenekusasa eliqhakazile.“Isikole sibaluleke kakhulu. Yingakho kufanele amatshitshi abuqinise ubuntombi bawo ngokuthi athole iziqu emaNyuvesi. Kulabo abangaphiwe esikoleni njengoba singeke sifane sonke, kubalilekile ukuthi bagxile kumakhono abo angaba imisebenzi yezandla noma kwezolimo.“Kuningi okungenziwa izintombi ukudlala indima ebalulekile emnothweni wezolimo nakweminye imikhakha yamabhizinisi,” kusho uNksz Zuma.Izintombi beziphume ngobuningi bazo kulo mcimbi zijabulela ukuthi izinsuku zokuya eMkhosini woMhlanga seziyasondela.Lo mcimbi obizwa ngokuthi iSiyaya eMhlangeni, owokulungiselela uMkhosi Womhlanga  ozoba seMachobeni, eNgwavuma ngempelasonto bese ulandelwa ozoba seNyokeni kwanoNongoma ngoMgqibelo womhlaka 14 Septhemba.UNksz Zuma ubuye wafundisa amatshitshi ngamahubo aculwa eMkhosini woMhlanga nangendlela yokuziphatha uma sezifika esigodlweni.Uveze nokuthi selokhu baqala ukuzihlanganisa nalo mkhosi baningi abantu abahlomulile okuyizintombi ngokuthi amanyuvesi abeke amagazebo okusiza izintombi ngokufaka izicelo ezikhungweni zeMfundo ePhakeme.

AMAQEMBU ezepolitiki aphikisayo kuMasipala waseThekwini, asola i-ANC ngokuhlinzela ezibini amakhulu abasebenzi abaqashwe ngaphansi kohlelo i- Expanded Public Works Programe (EPWP). Sekubikwe ukuthi bazohola okokugcina ngokuphela kwale nyanga ngoba kuthiwa kuvunyelwane ngokuthi zingavuselwa izinkontileka zabo, umasipala ubalisa ngezindleko.Encwadini eputshukile, ebibhalelwe iziphathimandla zangaphakathi kumasipala ezibhekelele lolu hlelo, kuvela ukuthi emhlanganweni obungenyanga edlule, kwadingidwa ukuthi uhlelo oluphethwe wuMnyango wezeMisebenzi yoMphakathi ludla R297 million ngonyaka kumasipala. Kuthiwa isibonelelo salo mnyango esinekezwa umasipala sincishiswe safinyelela kuR18.7 million, okusho ukuthi umasipala kumele ubeke eceleni uR278.3 million wokuhlangabeza izindleko. Kule ncwadi kubhalwe ukuthi imenenja kamasipala nesikhulu esiphezulu esibhekelele ukusebenza kwezimali kuwona baveze ukuthi ayikho imali okuholele ekutheni kunqunywe ukuthi ngo-Julayi, 25 nonyaka bonke abasebenzi abangaphansi kwalolu hlelo bazohola okokugcina.I-ActionSA ne-EFF,  bathi lokhu kuzoshiya inqwaba yabantu ingenawo umsebenzi nedolobha iTheku nezindawo ezakhelene nalo zisesimeni esingesihle ngoba umasipala awunabo abasebenzi abenele ukubhekana nemisebenzi okubalwa kuyo ukugcina idolobha lihlanzekile.UMnuz Themba Mvubu we-EFF, uthe lokhu kuyaziveza ukuthi uhlelo lolu lwalubanjwe ngamabomu yi-ANC ngenhloso yokunxenxa amavoti, emva kwalokho uhulumeni wobumbano okhona usuqalile ukukhombisa ukuthi awunendaba nabantu.“Lena yimali yesibonelelo eqhamuka ehhovisi likamgcinimafa kazwelonke kuhulumeni omkhulu. Kuza kanjani ukuthi kwandiswe isibalo songqongqoshe kwikhabhinethi okuzodla ama-billion, bese kuqedwa imisebenzi ebantwini abayidinga ngempela ukuxosha ikati eziko? Esikhathini esinzima kakhulu kubantu bakithi abayizinkulungwane, ababhubhiswa yinkemane ukuze kudle iziqumama ziqhubeke nokuphila ntofontofo ngoba nakhu ukhetho seludlulile sebeqalile bayaziveza ukuthi bangobani,” kusho uMvubu.UMnuz Zwakele Mncwango we-ActionSA, uthe uhlelo lwavuselwa ngoDisemba nyakenye umasipala usukuvezile ukuthi awunayo imali okwathi uma bebuzwa ngokuthi pho bazoluqhuba kanjani, bangena ezintangeni.“Kuyacaca ukuthi kugenjulwa ngempilo yabantu abathembele kulolu hlelo ukondla imindeni. Konke abakwenza belivuselela babenzela ukunxenxa amavoti ebantwini manje ukhetho seludlulile. Wumsebenzi kamasipala ukugcina idolobha lihlanzekile kodwa ngendlela owenza ngayo kungathi wenzela laba basebenzi umusa nje ekubeni kufanele vele uqashe isibalo esanele ukwenza lo msebenzi,”usho kanje.Uthe emhlanganweni wamakhansela olandelayo, bazophakamisa ukuthi kungaqhubeki ukumiswa kwabasebenzi futhi ngaphambi kokuthi bamiswe, ababizwe bonke ndawana thile babalwe. Wathi lokhu kuzoveza obala ukuthi isibalo sabasebenzi sincane kakhulu kunalesi esibhalwe phansi njengoba ekholelwa ukuthi yinqwaba yezipoki eziholelwa kulolu hlelo okugcina sekulimaza abantu abawudinga ngempela umsebenzi. Imizamo yokuthola izinyunyana zabasebenzi kulo masipala ayiphumelelanga. Kuze kwashaya nesikhathi sokushicilela kungatholakalanga nokuphawula kukaMasipala weTheku.

KUYAPHELA ngezinombolo ozifonela uma udinga usizo oluphuthumayo kuleli okuyi-10111, 10177 kanjalo no-107.Lezi zinombolo zifonelwa uma udinga usizo lwamaphoyisa, udinga usizo lwama-ambulensi kanjalo nolunye usizo.IKhabhinethi  isigunyaze ukuthi lokhu kukhishelwe umphakathi ukuze uphawule ngokuvalwa kwaezinombolo.Inhloso ngukuthi kube nenombolo eyodwa ezosetshenziswa abantu bakuleli uma benezinkinga.Esithangamini sakamuva emuva komhlangano weKhabhinethi, uNgqongqoshe ehhovisi likamengameli, uNksz Khumbudzo Ntshavheni, uthe umphakathi uzonikwa ithuba lokuthi uphawule ngokuvalwa kwalezi zinombolo.Uthe inhloso kahulumeni ngukuthi kube nenombolo eyodwa, okuzobalula ukuthi abantu bayikhumbule.Inombolo entsha ezosetshenziswa ithi: 112.“Kubanzima ukukhumbula izinombolo eziningi uma ufuna usizo lwamaphoyisa noma usizo lwezempilo. Yingakho kumele kube nenombolo eyodwa ezoba mfishane okuzobalula ukuyikhumbula,” kusho uNksz Ntshavheni.Sekuke kwabakhona izikhalo ngenombolo yokucela usizo emaphoyiseni i-10111.EPhalamende amalungu ekomiti lamaPhoyisa ake akhala ngokuthi le nombolo ayisheshi ukuphendulwa.Kwesinye isikhathi kuthiwa le nombolo imane ivaleke esikhaleni ofuna usizo engazelele.Okunye okukhalwe ngakho yindaba yokushoda kwabasebenzi lapho kufonelwa khona, okwenza izingcingo zingabanjwa ngesikhathi. Ngesikhathi uMnuz Bheki Cele esengungqongqoshe wamaphoyisa, waveza ukuthi kusuka onyakeni wezimali u-2018/2019, zibalelwa ku-14.9 million kwezingu-56.99 million, izingcingo ezingaphendulwanga ezazifonela i-10111. Waveza nokuthi lesi sikhungo kumele ngabe sinabasebenzi ababalelwa ku-3 344 kodwa sinababalelwa ku-1 315.Ukunqanyulwa kwesabelomali seminyango ehlukene kuleli kube nomthelela ekutheni ezinye izikhala zingavalwa eminyangweni ehlukene.Ngokwamaphoyisa le nombolo isetshenziselwa ukubika amacala aphuthumayo.Isebenza amahora angu-24, kanti ifonelwa mahhala uma usebenzisa i-landline. Uma usebenzisa iselula kudla imali ejwayelekile. Zonke izingcingo ziyaqoshwa.Kuhlale kunxuswa umphakathi ukuthi ungadlaleli kule nombolo ngokubika amacala angekho.

AMAPHOYISA aqale uphenyo kulandela isigameko sokubulawa kwamadoda amabili okwenzeke eBuffelsdraai, eVerulam ngoMgqibelo ekuseni.Imibiko ithi amadoda amabili adutshulwe abulawa ngoyaba lwezinhlamvu emgwaqweni.Okhulumela abezimo eziphuthumayo enkampanini yonogada iReaction Unit South Africa (Rusa) uMnuz Prem Balram, uthe babikelwe ngalesi sigameko ekuseni.Uthe onogada babo baphuthume endaweni ababikelwe ngayo bafica izidumbu ezimbili zidindilize phansi.“Balandelwe abezimo eziphuthumayo okuthe uma befika, behlola isidumbu sokuqala, bathola ukuthi sinamanxeba amaningi okudutshulwa ekhanda. Isidumbu sesibili sitholakale buqamamana nesokuqala,” kusho uBalram.Uthe naso isidumbu sesibili besinamanxeba amaningi okudutshulwa ekhanda. Bobabili ababulewe kuthiwa bafe ujuqu lapho bedutshulelwe khona.Udalule nokuthi kutholakale isibhamu nesikhwama esimnyama ebesikade sinezinhlamvu zesibhamu i9mm eduzane kwesidumbu sesibili.UBalram ube esehlawumbisela wathi cishe abalelwa ku-20 amagobolondo ezinhlamvu zesibhamu i9mm atholakale lapho kubulawelwe khona amadoda.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe  amaphoyisa aseVerulam aphenya amacala amabili okubulala kulandela lesi sigameko.“Amaphoyisa abikelwe ngokudubula okubekhona aphuthuma endaweni yesigameko. Afice izidumbu zamadoda amabili phansi zinamanxeba okudutshulwa. Kutholakale nesibhamu eduzane kwesinye sezidumbu,” kusho uNetshiunda.Uthe  okwamanje ayaziwa imbangela yokubulala futhi nabasolwa kabaziwa.

UNGQONGQOSHE woMnyango weMfundo eyisiSekelo, uNksz  Siviwe Gwarube, uthe kuyaqhubeka ukuhlolwa kohlelo lokufunda oluzogxila ekucijweni kwabafundi ngamakhono bathole izitifiketi ezibagunyaza ukuthi badlulele kwesinye isigaba semfundo uma bephothula uGrade 9, olwaziwa  ngeGeneral Education Certificate (GEC).Ukusho lokhu izolo ngesikhathi evula ingqunquthela yaminyaka yonke esingethwe isigungu esibhekele izingabunjalo lemiphumela ka-matric, ebizwa nge-Annual Conference of the Association for Education Assessment in Africa,  eCape Town.  Le ngqungquthela osekungeka-40 izothatha izinsuku ezine.UNksz Gwarube ekhuluma ngalolu hlelo, uthe inhloso yalo ukugxila ezintweni ezingalekelela umfundi ukukhulisa ikhono lakhe akwazi ukuzenzela.“Lolu hlelo luzosiza ngokunciphisa isibalo sabafundi abayeka ezikoleni bengaqedile luphinde lugweme nokuthi baphoxeke ngenxa yemiphumela, libenze baqasheke ngokwamakhono abanawo adingekayo,” usho kanje.Lwaphakanyiswa yilo mnyango ngo-2019, kuthiwa luzonikeza umfundi igunya lokuzikhethela ekutheni aqhubeke nokufunda uma esephase uGrade 9 ayophothula uGrade 12, noma uma ezizwa ukuthi akadonsi kahle ezifundweni akwazi ukusebenzisa lesi sitifiketi ukudlulela komuye umkhakha wemfundo ukuphucula ngqo ikhono analo.Le ngqunquthela eqhubekayo, ihanjelwe othisha, abafundi, izithunywa ezivela kwamanye amazwe ase-Afrika eziyizazi zomthetho, ezivela e-India, e-Europe nase-United Kingdom okulindeleke zethule izinkulumo ezehlukene kuyo. Kuthiwa  kuhloswe ngayo ukucobelelana ngolwazi ezintweni ezithinta ezemfundoUNksz Gwarube uthe ukwabelana ngolwazi nezithunywa ezivela kwamanye amazwe, kuzosiza elakuleli ekuqiniseni ubudlelwano nokusebenzisana nawoBalinganiselwa ku-13.4 million abafundi abafunda ezikoleni ezehlukene ezingu-24 836 kuzwelonke, kanti othisha bangu-460 000.

KUYAQHUBEKA ukuhlonzwa kwezidumbu kulandela ukuwa kwebhilidi elingamafulethi ayizitezi ezinhlanu ngoMsobuluko odlule.Ukuwa kwaleli bhilidi elisemgwaqweni u75 Victoria, eGeorge kwathusa abaningi ezweni lonke kanti umsebenzi wokutakula abangakatholakali usaqhubeka yize sekuphele amahora angaphezu kuka-211 kwenzeka isehlo.Umbiko wakamuva oqinisekiswe wumasipala waseGeorge uthi babengu-81 abasebenzi abebekhona ngosuku lwesehlo, bangu-62 abatholakele, bangu-12 abasesibhedlela, bangu-33 abashonile kanti bangu-19 abangakatholakali.Kwabashonile, bangu-27 abesilisa kanti abesifazane bayisithupha.Umasipala waseGeorge uveza ukuthi uyaqhubeka umsebenzi wokuhlonza abalimele nabashonile kanti bangu-47 abagilwa asebaxhunyaniswe nemindeni yabo.Umsebenzi wokuhlonzwa kwezidumbu owenziwa amaphoyisa ngokubambisana nabezempilo esifundazweni iWestern Cape uthela izithelo ezinhle njengoba sekuhlonzwe izidumbu ezingu-18. Kulezi zidumbu ezihlonziwee zingu-14 ngezabesilisa kanti ezine ezabantu besifazane. Kubo bonke abashonile asebahlonziwe, bayisikhombisa abakuleli, kanti abakwamanye amazwe bami kanje:- Zimbabwe: 3- Lesotho: 1- Malawi: 5- Mozambique: 2Umasipala waseGeorge uyaqhubeka nesicelo emindenini elahlekelwe yizihlobo zayo ukuba ixhumane namaphoyisa ukuze kuzosizakala nalabo abangakahlonzwa.

SEBENGAPHEZU kwesigidi abantu ababhalisele ukuvota okuyisipesheli, okhethweni lwezifundazwe nolukazwelonke ngoMeyi 29.Laba babhalisele ukusheshe bavote ngoMeyi 27 noMeyi 28 2024, ngoba bazobe besebenza ngosuku lokhetho.Abanye bazovakashelwa emakhaya yizisebenzi zeKhomishini yezoKhetho, ngoba begula noma bekhulelwe.IKhomishini ihlabe ikhwelo kwabasafisa ukubhalisela ukuvota ngokuyisipesheli ukuthi basenalo ithuba njengoba kuvalwa namhlanje.Abazofaka izicelo emahhovisi ekhomishini banethuba kuze kube u-5 ntambama, labo abazosebenzisa ubuchwepheshe bazokwazi ukubhalisa kuze kube u-12 ebusuku.“Ikhomishini ifuna ukukucacisa ukuthi akuyi ngeminyaka ukuze ukwazi ukubhalisela ukuvota ngokuyisipesheli. Noma ngubani angafaka isicelo sokuthi avote ngokuyisipesheli,” kusho ikhomishini.Iveze ukuthi bangu-396 531 abazovotiswa emakhaya ngalezi zinsuku kanti abangu-686 458 bazovota ezikhungweni. Isifundazwe i-Eastern Cape yisona esinesibalo esiphezulu sabazovotiswa njengoba bengu-105 631, kulandele iKwaZulu-Natal ngabangu-65 600. Kwabazovotela ezikhungweni, iGauteng yisona sifundazwe esinesibalo esiphezulu ngabangu-168 664, kulandele iKZN ngabangu-138 846.Abafuna ukufaka izicelo bangaya ku:www.elections.org.za. Bangathumela umqhafazo onenombolo kamazisi ku:32249.Khonamanjalo ikhomishini isiveze ukuthi akukho okubi ngokuvakashelwa yinxusa lase-USA uMnuz Reuben Brigety, muva nje.Ikusho lokhu emuva komsindo ovela ezinhlakeni ezehlukene ezisola ugcobho nokuthi i-USA ifuna ukugxambukela okhethweni.Ikhomishini iveze ukuthi ike yavakashelwa nayi-European Union, kanjalo nenxusa laseLatin America.Ezinkundleni zokuxhumana abantu, okubalwa nowayeyilungu lePhalamende le-ANC uMnuz Tony Yengeni, nowayengumholi wePAC uMnuz Letlapa Mphahlele, bazwakalisa ukungenami ngokuvakasha kukaBrigety kwi-IEC. Nomengameli wenhlangano i-#NotInMyName uMnuz Siyabulela Jentile, uthe bafuna amaminithi omhlangano phakathi kukaBrigety nekhomishini. Uthe umphakathi kumele wazi ukuthi yini engaka eyayixoxwa.Ikhomishini iveze ukuthi isazohlangana namanye amanxusa ngaphambi kokhetho okubalwa ne-Dean of the African Diplomatic Corps. Okhulumela uMnyango wezobuDlelwano namazwe Angaphandle uMnuz Clayson Monyela, uphawule enkundleni i-X, wathi akukho okubi futhi akukusha ukuvakasha kwamanxusa kwikhomishini. Uthe nangesikhathi kusaphethe owayengumengameli uJacob Zuma, kwakwenzeka okufanayo.Uveze nokuthi zihamba kahle izinhlelo zokuwelisa izinsiza zokuvota ziye kwamanye amazwe.“Sinethemba lokuthi yonke into izohamba ngohlelo ukuze abantu bakuleli abahlala kwamanye amazwe bavote. Izinsiza zokuvota zizohanjiswa emazweni angu-115.” Abahlala kwamanye amazwe bazovota ngoMeyi 17 no-18 ezindlini zamanxusa.

KUYAVULWA ngoLwesihlanu ukufakwa kwezicelo za-online esikhwameni esixhasa izitshudeni ngemali yokufunda, iNational Student Financial Aid Scheme (NSFAS).Lokhu kushiwo nguNgqongqoshe weMfundo ePhakeme, uDkt Nobuhle Nkabane, ngesikhathi kunesithangami sabezindaba.Izicelo ezizofakwa kusukela ngoLwesihlanu ezokukhokhela ukufunda ngonyaka ozayo, u-2025.Ukuvulwa kokufakwa kwezicelo bekumele kuqale izolo kodwa ungqongqoshe wathi kuzoqala ngoLwesihlanu. UDkt Nkabane uthe kusukela ngesonto eledlule ngoLwesine bekunezigcawu zokubonisana nezinhlangano zezitshudeni, abaphathi bamakolishi nezikhungo zezemfundo ephakeme mayelana nokuxhaswa kwabafundi yilesi sikhwama.Uthe eminyakeni eyedlule isibalo sezitshudeni ezithembele kulesi sikhwama ukuze sizixhase ngemali yokufunda sikhule kakhulu,   okuhambisana nokuthi uhulumeni uvulele ithuba nezitshudeni eziphuma ezindaweni ebezinganakiwe phambilini, okuyizingane ezizalwa ngabazali abantulayo nabahola imali encane."Kubalulekile ukuthi iNSFAS izilungiselele ngokwanele ngokwezinsiza kanye nohlelo oluzokwazi ukuhlangabezane nesibalo esikhulayo," kuchaza uDkt Nkabane.Uthe ngesikhathi kunezigcawu zokubonisana kuvelile ukuthi izinxushunxushu ezukhungweni eziphezulu zezemfundo zisuswa yizinkinga zeNSFAS."Izitshudeni eziningi zizwakalise ukuphatheka kabi ngokubambezeleka kokukhokhwa kwemali yokufunda ezikhungweni nokungasebenzi kahle kwezinhlelo zeNSFAS," kusho ungqongqoshe.Uqhube wathi iNSFAS kulindeleke ukuthi yethule inqwaba yezinhlelo zokubhekana nezinye zezinselelo ezivezwe yizinhlangano zezitshudeni. Lokhu kubandakanya ukuthi kwenziwe lula uhlelo lokubhalisa online.Okunye athe kuvelile ngesikhathi kunezigcawu zokubonisana wukubambezeleka kokukhokhelwa kwezitshudeni ezifunda ngeNSFAS, nokukhishwa kwemiphumela kamatric okuholela ekutheni nezinqumo zokuthi bazoluthola yini uxhaso kulesi sikhwama nakho kuhlehle. Indlela esetshenziswayo yokuxhasa izitshudeni nokusebenzisana kweNSFAS  namaSETA. Ukubaluleka kokuthi kuqinisekiswe ukuthi izitshudeni zihlala ezindaweni eziphephile. "Kungumbono wami ukuthi kumele kube nezingxoxo eziqhubekayo phakathi kwezinhlaka zezitshudeni kanye nezinhlangano zezombusazwe ukuze kubunjwe ikusasa nenqubomgomo yemfundo ephakeme esebenzayo, ikakhulukazi mayelana nosizo lwezezimali," kusho uDkt Nkabane.

UKUSA kubonwe abezindaba benkanise ngaphandle komuzi kaNkk Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula osanda kusula esikhundleni sakhe sokuba ngusomlomo wePhalamende wabuye wasula njengelungu lePhalamende.Ngesikhathi zifika izintatheli emzini wakwaNqakula eBruma, ngase-Eastgate, eGoli, ngaphambi kwehora lesithupha ekuseni, kubonakale izimoto zikhanyise amalambu. Ngehora lesikhombisa, zibonakale ziphuma izimoto zilandelana zilibangise esiteshini samaphoyisa iLyttelton, eCenturion lapho okubikwa ukuthi wavulelwa khona amacala.UNkk Mapisa-Nqakula usolwa ngokwamukela intshontsho komunye wosonkontileka owayethola amathenda eMnyangweni wezokuVikela ngesikhathi esanguNgqongqoshe wawo.Kuthiwa wamukela imali engukheshi ebalelwa ngaphezu kukaR2 million, izikhawu ezehlukene. Okunye okuthiwa wagwazelwa ngakho i-wigi kanjalo nezinye izinto. Ubhekene namacala angu-12 enkohlakalo efinyelela kuR4 million, okubandakanya nelokushushumbisa imali.Ubelokhu ezihlangula ethi umsulwa akaze enze inkohlakalo futhi ethi usola ukuthi kukhona abazama ukungcolisa igama lakhe. Phakathi nenyanga edlule, uphiko lweNPA lwanikela emzini wakhe luyosesha, nokuyilapho okwavela amahlebezi okuthi sekuseduze aboshwe.Lokhu kwamenza wasukumela phezulu waphuthumisa isicelo senkantolo ethi akuvinjwe ukuboshwa kwakhe. Emaphepheni waveza nokuthi ucela ukunikwa idokodo lophenyo nezitatimende zofakazi abone kahle konke.NgoLwesibili iNkantolo eNkulu yasePitoli, imchithe nezindleko uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula kulesi sicelo sakhe esiphuthumayo. Yilesi sinqumo senkantolo esiholele osukwini lwanamhlanje.Uzobingelela iMantshi yasePitoli khona namhlanje lapho okulindeleke ukuthi acele ibheyili.

I-Africa’s Travel Indaba isiphenduke umbukiso ohlonishwa kakhulu kwezokungcebeleka kanye nezokuvakasha okhombisa inhlobonhlobo ebanzi kakhulu yemikhiqizo yezokuvakasha yase-Afrika ehamba phambili kanye nolwazi emhlabeni.Sinesiqiniseko sokuthi iKwaZulu-Natal izophinde ibeke unyawo lwayo phambili futhi isingathe enye i-Africa’s Tourism Indaba encomekayo.Sinezindaba eziningi ezithokozisayo esingabelana ngazo nabalingani bethu bohwebo bamazwe ngamazwe abazohambela i-Africa's Travel Indaba yalo nyaka.Sinxusa zonke izithunywa ukuba zivakashele isitendi seTourism KwaZulu-Natal kuDEC1.G37Njengohulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal, sifuna izithunywa zamazwe ngamazwe zibuyele emakhaya zazi ukuthi isifundazwe sethu sizishaya isifuba ngensada yemikhiqizo nemisebenzi yezokuvakasha. Isifundazwe sethu esihle kakhulu, siyindawo ephephile enokuhlangenwe nakho okuhlukahlukene kwezokuvakasha ongakwenza, ukuthengise uphinde ukupakishele amaklayenti akho uma ubuyela ekhaya.Uma sewufikile KwaZulu-Natal, siyethemba ukuthi uzozinika isikhathi sokuzibonela imikhiqizo yethu yezokuvakasha, izindawo zokudlela, ukudla, impilo yasebusuku, isimo sezulu esimnandi, abantu abanomoya wokungenisa izihambi kanye nomlando onothile kanye namasiko.

Umhlaziyi wezepolitiki uthe maningi amathuba okuthi uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, akhishwe singakapheli isikhathi sakhe njengoba kwenzeka kwababengaphambi kwakhe.Uvele usuqalile umjaho wezikhundla kwi-ANC, le nhlangano izoba nengqungquthela yokukhetha ubuholi ngo-2027.Umhlaziyi wezepolitiki oseNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Siyabonga Ntombela, uthe maningi amathuba okuthi uRamaphosa kuthiwe akashenxe kwesokuba umengameli wezwe emva kwengqungquthela yokukhetha ubuholi be-ANC.URamaphosa ube nomlando omubi  njengoba ebe umengameli wokuqala kwi-ANC ukuba ahluleke ukunqoba ukhetho ngamalengiso.I-ANC isiphethe ngokubambisana namanye amaqembu.UNtombela uthe uma i-ANC ingakhetha abaholi abangahambisani nohulumeni wokubambisana lokho kungabeka engcupheni amathuba kaRamaphosa okuqeda ihlandla lesibili.“Uma nje kungakhethwa umuntu onjengoPanyaza Lesufi (usihlalo we-ANC eGauteng), kungasho ukuthi i-ANC izophuma kuhulumeni wokubambisana. ULesufi usekhombisile ukuthi akahambisani nohulumeni wokubambisana. Akazange ayifake iDA kwikhabhinethi yaseGauteng.“Ngike ngamuzwa ethi uRamaphosa akasayine iBela Bill (umthetho wezemfundo obangwayo). Ubuholi obusha be-ANC bungazibuza ukuthi sikhona yini isidingo sokuthi uRamaphosa aqhubeke njengoba inhlangano ihluliwe okhethweni. Kukhona abangathi inqubekela phambili abayiboni selokhu angena ngo-2018.”Akekho umengameli we-ANC osaphathe izwe kuze kuphele amahlandla amabili.Owayengumengameli wokuqala wombuso wentando yabantu, uNelson Mandela, wathi khumu emva kokuphatha ihlandla elilodwa.Owalandela emva kwakhe, uMnuz Thabo Mbeki, wehliswa esikhundleni kusele izinyanga aqede ihlandla lesibili.UJacob Zuma  wehliswa esikhundleni kusasele unyaka kuphele ihlandla lesibili.Bobabili uZuma noMbeki behliswa ezikhundleni emva kwezingqungquthela zokukhetha ubuholi be-ANC.UNtombela uthe kungenzeka ukuthi ubuholi obusha be-ANC bukhethe ukumdedela uRamaphosa aqedele ihlandla lesibili."Lokho bazobe bekwenzela ukuthi kube lula ukudlulisela izintambo kozongena. Uma i-ANC ikhetha umuntu ohambisana nohulumeni wokubambisana, bazomyeka uRamaphosa aqhubeke."Unobhala jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, ukhuze amalungu enhlangano aseqale umbango wezikhundla.UMbalula uthe amalungu e-ANC kufanele agxile ekulungiseni izinkinga eziholele ekutheni le nhlangano ihluleke ukuwina ukhetho ngamalengiso.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma nabezindaba, ngoMgqibelo."Ngingakusho ukuthi kukhona abantu asebeqalile ukukhuluma indaba yezikhundla. Abantu abafundi emaphutheni abo. Njengamanje sithole u-40% wamavoti okhethweni."Esikhundleni sokuthi abantu baqhamuke namaqhinga okubuyisela i-ANC endaweni yayo, abantu bakhuluma indaba yezikhundla. Abantu abakhohlwe indaba yezikhundla, ngeke isisize ngalutho."UMbalula uthe bazokhuluma kabanzi ngemiphumela yokhetho emhlanganweni wesigungu esiphezulu olandelayo.Umhlangano wesigungu esiphezulu olandelayo uzoba izinsuku eziyisithupha, izinsuku ezintathu zibekelwe ukuxoxa ngemiphumela yokhetho.

I-TRANSNET isayine isivumelwano sika-R1.3 billion nenkampani iMnambithi Terminals ukuba yakhe isikhungo sokubeka impahla ewuketshekezi, eMaydon Wharf, eThekwini.Lesi sikhungo kulindeleke ukuthi sisize ichweba laseThekwini ukuba libe nezindawo ezihlukile zokugcina impahla ewuketsheze futhi nomsebenzi usheshe.Njengamanje iTransnet imatasa nezinhlelo zokunyusa impahla engena emachwebeni ayo njengoba ifuna ukubuyela esicongweni samachweba enza kahle emhlabeni jikelele.Ukusayinwa kwesivumelwano kusho ukuphothulwa kwesigaba 79 esakhishwa wuNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha, uNkk Sindisiwe Chikunga, sokuba kunikezwe iMnambithi Terminals igunya lokuphatha impahla ewuketshezi esizeni esiwuMaydon Wharf 6, iminyaka ewu-20.Okujabulise abantu wukuthi uMnambithi Bulk Terminals ngeyabantu abamnyama bakuleli njengoba bethephe u-100% wayo. Lokhu iTransnet ithe kukhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi izimisele ukuletha uguquko lwezomnotho echwebeni laseThekwini.Ithe iNingizimu Afrika izokwazi ukulanda impahla ewuketshezi nokuyithumela kwamanye amazwe kusetshenziswa iMnambithi Terminal.I-terminal yaseMnambithi izokwazi ukuba nomzila wamaguzu ezitimela obhekelele yona nendawo yokungenisa amaloli. Lokhu kuzoqinisekisa ukuthi akukho okuzobambezela umsebenzi wale nkampani.Kulindeleke ukuthi intuthuko yeMnambithi Terminal idale amathuba omsebenzi awu-40 kuya ku-100 bese kuba awu-400 ayimixhantela azovela ezinkampanini ezizosebenzisana nale nkampani.Isigaba sokuqala sale ntuthuko sizoqala ngokuthi kudilizwe ingqalasizinda ekhona njengamanje ukuze kwakhiwe isisekelo esisha, kufakwe amathangi, amapayipi amakhulu okuthwala impahla ewuketshezi kanjalo nezindawo zokupaka imikhumbi esuke ilethe impahla.Esigabeni sesibili nesokugcina kuzobe sekufakwa amanye amathangi nenye ingqalasizinda.“ITransnet National Port Authority (TNPA) izimisele ukuletha uguquko kwezomnotho nokuqinisekisa ukuthi bonke abantu bakuleli abasali ngaphandle. Siyajabula kakhulu ukwamukela iMnambithi Terminals futhi siyathemba ukuthi lesi sivumelwano sizothuthukisa umnotho wezwe njengoba kubhalwe kwisigaba 79 se-National Ports Act ka-2005,” kusho isikhulu esiphezulu saseTransnet, u-Adv Michelle Phillips.

UDUTSHULWE wafa owesilisa osolwa ngokubulala iphoyisa ngesikhathi etholana phezulu namaphoyisa ngenhlamvu.Lo mlisa ubefunelwa icala lokubulala usigaxamabhande emaphoyiseni kamasipala ngoJulayi, ngesikhathi ezama ukunqanda ukudunwa kwemoto ku-M7 ePinetown.Ngokwesitatimende samaPhoyisa kaMasipala eThekwini, amaPhoyisa kaMasipala weTheku ngaphansi kophiko lweSpecial Operations Directorate, alandele umkhondo walo msolwa aze afika esigcemeni sakwaQ, eMlaza, amlandela aze afika esigcemeni kwa-Q.Kuthiwa umsolwa uvulele ngenhlamvu ebhekise emaphoyiseni. Iphoyisa elilodwa lidubuleke esifubeni kodwa ngenhlanhla lasindiswa yivesti lesivikelo. Kulimale nengane yentombazane eneminyaka eyishumi nanye ehuzulwe yinhlavu engalweni.Umsolwa udutshulwe wafa, kwathi abalimele baphuthunyiswa esibhedlela.

LIZOGAYA ngomunye umhlathi eqenjini elesekwa owayengumengameli wezwe ne-ANC uJacob Zuma, Umkhonto weSizwe, njengoba abazoba sesigungwini esiphezulu saleli qembu bengeke bazinuke izikhundla zokuba ongqongqoshe.UZuma uthe izinto zizokwenziwa ngendlela ehlukile kuleli qembu.“Niyabona nje, senze ngamabomu ukuthi singabi naso isigungu sabaholi abaphezulu kuleli qembu okujwayelekile emaqenjini ezepolitiki. Sifuna ukukhetha kahle labo abazoya kuhulumeni nalabo abazoqhubeka bahole iqembu. Uma usesigungwini esiphezulu ngeke ube ngungqongqoshe. Sifuna ukugada abajaha izikhundla,” kusho uZuma.Uthe inkinga idalwa ngukuthi umuntu oyedwa uba sesigungwini seqembu, abe ngungqongqoshe bese engabikhona ozomgada.“Kuzoba lula uma eqenjini kukhona abazomgada. Asizothatha noma ngubani simenze ungqongqoshe, sizobabhekisisa. Ngibezwile nje abanye bejabulela ukuthi basohlwini oluya ePhalamende, abangekho bathukuthele bayaveva.”Uthe wabatshela ukuthi akujahwe lutho kuleli qembu.“Abezwa, ngabatshela ukuthi asijahe lutho, yonke imikhakha izomeleleka ePhalamende. Abanye abasohlwini bazodeda uma sengizikhethela abantu abakhubazekile, abaculi, amakhosi, izinyanga kanjalo nakweminye imikhakha abaya ePhalamende. Abanye sizobakhipha ohlwini ukuze babone ukuthi abanazo izikhundla. Ningathuki uma sekwenzeka lokhu, nibuze ukuthi senzani.” Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma nabeseka leli qembu eMsinga ngempelasonto.Uthe izwe lizobuyela emakhosini okuyiwo azohlonishwa ashaye nomthetho.“Sithathe isinqumo sokuthi silithathe izwe libuyele kithina ngoba siyabona ukuthi abafowethu abalengamele abaliphethe kahle. Uhulumeni kwamanye amazwe ukhothama futhi usebenzele Inkosi yakhona. ENgilandi akekho umengameli, kodwa kukhona obambele osebenza ngaphansi kwenkosi yakhona. Kungani amakhosi ethu enganikwa la mandla? Sibaphuca abaphethe izwe ngoba sifuna amakhosi abe namandla nezwi ekuphathweni kwezwe. Akube yiwona azosithuma njengabanikazi bezwe.” Uthe ivoti libalulekile wathi ukube kuya ngaye ngabe kuvotwa kuvulelekile.“Kungani yonke into isobala kuleli kodwa ivoti liyimfihlo. Sizowushintsha umthetho, sifuna kuvotwe ngokuvulelekile. Umuntu akavote kubonakale ukuthi uvoteleni. Kungani kumele usabe uma uvotele into oyithandayo? Yingakho sithi asibuyele eMkhontweni, sivotele leli qembu njengendlu emnyama. Benza imfihlo yokuvota ngoba bafuna ukusirobha, izigebengu ziyakhwabanisa.” Uthe iMK ilona qembu elizoletha inkululeko abantu abazoyibamba ngezandla.Uveze ukuthi izimayini zizophathwa abamnyama wathi izimboni kumele zibe semakhaya.“Sifuna ukuyishintsha nemithetho esigwebayo nsuku zonke. Sisebenzisa imithetho yabelungu, iRoman Dutch Law, sizoyishintsha sifake umthetho ophethe abantu base-Afrika. Ngihlale ejele iminyaka ngenxa yalo mthetho wabelungu, ngiyazi ngo-si into engikhuluma ngayo.” Uthe izimpimpi zihlale zikhona ezweni wathi ngesikhathi kusaliwa yayigaxwa ithayi.Ubalule nokuthi uhulumeni uzoba nemali yokufundisa yonke intsha.“Uma ubalekela isikole sizokufaka ejele, ufundele khona uze ugogode. Ingane encane efundayo uma iqeda u-matric iya emasosheni, iyofundela ukuvikela izwe. Iyofunda ukuhlonipha, bese iya enyuvesi. Akekho ongeke aye enyuvesi, uzobe ehlaleleni? Akukho ngane ezophuza utshwala, lutho. Intando yabantu ivuna ukuthi ingane iphuze noyise, kuzophela lokhu.”

KUZOBIZWA ofakazi abangu-13 ecaleni lowesilisa waseFolweni obhekene necala lokudlwengula nokusoconga okuthiwa wakwenza kowesifazane ngesikhathi somvalelandlini.UMnuz Samkelo Victus Dube (29) usolwa ngokudlwengula abulale uNksz Sibahle Faith Biyela (17), ngokumgwaza esiphongweni ngesikrudrayva,  esigamekweni okuthiwa senzeka ngo-Okthoba 5, 2020.UDube kuthiwa wayevakashelwe nguNksz Biyela endlini yakhe eseFolweni kade embizile ukuthi bazohlala ndawonye baphuze utshwala.Umufi kuthiwa wafika nomngani wakhe, uNksz Thandiwe Princess Shange.UDube ubevele izolo eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini, nokuyilapho uMshushisi, uSenior State Advocate Khatija Essack eveze ukuthi kuzobizwa ofakazi abangu-13 kuleli cala elizoqala ukuqulwa namhlanje.Phakathi kofakazi abazobizwa uMshushisi, uthe kubalwa iphoyisa elafika endaweni yesigameko, udokotela wasemakhazeni asePark Rynie nomngani kamufi, uNksz Shange.Sebeqedile ukuphuza, kuthiwa uDube wacela uNksz Biyela ukuthi baye ocansini, okuyinto umufi okuthiwa wayenqaba ethi akalali nendoda angathandani nayo.Kuthiwa baphuza kwaze kwaba yiphakathi kwamabili.Enkantolo, kuvele ukuthi lokhu kwamnenga uDube wase edonsela ngenkani egumbini lakhe uNksz Biyela wamdlwengula. Ngemuva kwalokho wamgwaza washonela khona lapho.Ngemuva kwalokho waphuma wahubha uNksz Shange naye wamgwaza kodwa wasinda wacela empunzini. UNksz Shange kuthiwa wakubona konke okwakwenzeka egumbini likaDube.UDube kuthiwa wagcwala amathafa kodwa ngokuhamba kwesikhathi wagcina esekhalelwa ngamasongo kaSingonyela.Uke wasifaka isicelo sebheyili kodwa inkantolo yamchitha. Kuvele nokuthi uDube babengamathe nolimi nomufi kodwa wayengakaze amshele.

NKOSIKHONA CELEBAZOBA yishumi sebebonke ofakazi ecaleni lokusocongwa kowesilisa waseMariannhill, okusolakala ukuthi wabulawa ngunkosikazi wakhe ebambisene noBen 10 ayesemqomile.UMnuz Jabulani Mchunu (54), wahlaselwa esemzini wakhe ngabesilisa ababili bamdubula bambulala esigamekweni esenzeka ngonyaka owedlule.Ngemuva kwalokho kwaboshwa umkakhe uNkk Gugu Mchunu (50) owayenguthisha efundisa esikoleni samabanga aphansi, iBruyns Primary.Kwaboshwa nesoka lakhe elinguBen 10, uMnuz Lindani Phungula (30). Bobabili basolwa ngokuba ongqondongqondo ekuhlanganiseni itulo lokusocongwa kukamufi.Bafaka isicelo sebheyili inkantolo yabachitha ikhala ngokuthi izizathu zabo azinaso isisindo esanele sokuba bangadedelwa babe ngaphandle.NgopLwesihlanu eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini, uMshushisi uSenior Prosecutor T. Mbokazi utshele iJaji uMohani Moodley ukuthi bazoba yishumi sebebonke ofakazi azobabiza uma leli cala seliqala ukuqulwa ngoNovemba 3 nonyaka."Bazoba yishumi sebebonke ofakazi engizobabiza bezofakaza kabanzi ngabakwaziyo mayelana nokubulawa kukamufi. Ngiyethemba ukuthi ubufakazi babo buzoyilekelela kakhulu inkantolo,’’ kuchaza uMbokazi.Ngosuku abulawa ngalo umufi umkakhe wayengekho kuthiwa wayegodukile eye kubo eNquthu.Kuthiwa wayefuna ukukhanda isithombe sokuthi akaxhumene nokubulawa kukamyeni wakhe ngoba kwenzeke egodukile. Kodwa uphenyo lwamaphoyisa lwaholela ekutheni kuboshwe yena noBen 10.Kuvela ukuthi uNkk Mchunu wasoconga umyeni wakhe ngoba nakhu efuna ukuzuza amafa awadle nesoka elisha.Isolezwe Ngempelasonto labika kabanzi ngalesi sigameko. Lapho khona ilungu lomndeni lalikade ligeqa amagula likhuluma ngokuphatheka kabi komndeni.Laveza ukuthi umufi uyena owafundisa uNkk Mchunu waze wathola iziqu zobuthishela. Lakhala ngokuthi wayengazi umufi ukuthi usondeza inyoka ezomqhofoza ikhanda ngelinye ilanga.

BAZOKWAZI ngoSepthemba ukuthi bayaluthola uxhaso lwamabhizinisi noma cha ababefake izicelo zoxhaso kwi-Operation Vula Fund.Lezi zindaba zivele ngesikhathi uMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho, ezokuVakasha neMvelo KwaZulu-Natal wazisa abantu ngokuqhubekayo kulesi sikhwama.UNksz Mkhethi Sibisi obhekelele ezokuxhumana kulo mnyango uthe bathole izicelo eziwu-26 000 kanti njengamanje ziyacutshungulwa.Uthe bazokhipha imali maduze njengoba sebesesigabeni sokugcina sokuhlunga abazoxhaswa ngaphansi kwesigaba esibizwa ngo-tier 1 se-Operation Vula Fund eMkhanyakude. Lesi sigaba sizophothulwa ngo-Agasti 30.Ngonyaka odlule uhulumeni wayebeke eceleni uR191 million ukuxhasa osomabhizinisi ku-tier 1 we-Operation Vula. Kuxhaswa amabhizinisi adinga uxhaso luka-R50 000 nangaphansi. Uxhaso luyakhula ngokwezigaba kusukela ku-tier 1 kuya ku-tier 3.“Abafake izicelo zoxhaso ngaphansi kuka-tier 1 bazoqala ukwazisa ngemiphumela ngoSepthemba. Uma kushaya uSepthemba 30 bengaziswanga ukuthi izicelo zabo zihambe kanjani, kufanele bazi ukuthi izicelo zabo aziphumelelanga. Labo akade sebesayine izinkontileka nabathole amasheke bazothintwa uma sekuqala uhlelo lokukhishwa koxhaso,” kuchaza uNksz Sibisi.Uthe ukubhekwa kwezicelo eziku-tier 2 no-tier 3 kuyaqhubeka njengoba amathimba abo ecubungula zonke izicelo ezifakwe ngabantu baKwaZulu-Natal.Uxolisile ngokubambezela okube khona esho nokuthi bazoqhubeka nokwazisa abantu ngokwenzekayo njalo.

KUZOCACA uma sekusayine uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ukuthi luzovelaphi uxhaso lomshwalense wezempilo kuleli, iNational Health Insurance (NHI). UNgqongqoshe weziMali uMnuz Enoch Godongwana uthe abakanqumi ukuthi izovelaphi imali yokuxhasa lo mshwalense.Okwamanje basalinde uRamaphosa ukuthi aqale asayine umthethosivivinywa wezempilo ukuze ube semthethweni.URamaphosa usekuveze izikhawu eziningi ukuthi maduzane uzowusayina lo mthethosivivinywa.“Uma sekusayiniwe sizobe sesihlwaya ukuthi sizoluthathaphi uxhaso lwalo mshwalense. Asingabazi ukuthi uRamaphosa uzowusayina lo mthethosivivinywa,” kusho uGodongwana.Ukusho lokhu ephendula imibuzo yamalungu ePhalamende njengoba abefuna ukwazi ukuthi imali yokuxhasa lo mshwalense izovelaphi njengoba izwe libhekene nenkinga yezikweletu.IPhalamende laphasisa umthethosivivinywa iNHI ngoDisemba nyakenye. UGodongwana uthe abantu bakhuluma indaba yokuthi kuzosetshenziswa imali yentela ukuxhasa lo mshwalense, okungelona neze iqiniso,“Angikaze ngisenze lesi simemezelo. Abantu nje abazisholo okwabo, into engingakaze ngiyenze leyo. Ngikhuluma ngendaba yentela kanye ngonyaka uma ngithula isabelomali.“Uma ngizokhuluma ngezinto ezithinta intela, ngizokwenza ngonyaka ozayo ngoFebhuwari uma sekuthulwa isabelomali sezwe,” kusho uGodongwana.Uthe akusho ngukuthi ziningi iziphakamiso ezithinta ukuxhaswa kwalo mshwalense.“Yingakho ngithi uma sekusayiniwe kwaba ngumthetho, ngizobe sengisebenza noMnyango wezeMpilo ukubheka izindlela ezahlukene zokuxhasa lo mshwalense.” Uveze ukuthi lo mshwalense uzoqala ngezikhawu ezahlukene. Ubalule nokuthi uhulumeni ufuna ukuqinisekisa ukuthi kukhona yonke ingqalasizinda efanele uma sekuqalwa ngalo mshwalense. “Sifuna le ngqalasizinda ibe sezingeni elifanele ngaphambi kokuqala indaba yalo mshwalense, ekugcineni izobakhona,” kusho uGodongwana.Uveze nokuthi akuzona zonke izikhungo zikahulumeni ezisesimweni esingesihle zokuthi kuqale lo mshwalense.Uthe uma sikhona isidingo bazosebenza nezikhungo ezizimele ukuqala lo luhlelo. Akulona futhi iqiniso ukuthi imali yalo mshwalense izofinyelela kuR1 trillion.

INGCABHA isisele noMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ukuthi asayine  uMthethosivivinywa, iBasic Laws Amendment Bill (BELA), ube ngumthetho njengoba wesekwe izifundazwe eziyisishiyagalombili eNdlini yoMkhandlu weziFundazwe ePhalamende, ngoLwesine.Isifundazwe iWestern Cape yisona kuphela esingawesekanga uMthethosivivinywa.Usihlalo wekomiti lezeMfundo, ubuChwepheshe, ezemiDlalo, ubuCiko namaSiko, uMnuz Mamagase Elleck Nchabeleng, ubuze abebemele izifundazwe ukuthi bayaweseka noma bayawuchitha lo Mthethosivivinywa.Abebemele lezi zifundazwe basho ngamunye  ukuthi bayalelwe ukuthi baweseke uMthethosivivinywa ngaphandle kowaseWestern Cape, oveze umyalelo wokuthi kumele uchithwe.UNchabeleng uthe ngenxa yokuthi ezifundazweni eziyisishiyagalolunye kuleli sinye esiwuchithile, kusho ukuthi uyasekwa ngoba zonke ezinye ziwesekile.“Siyabonga ngomsebenzi owenziwe kulo Mthethosivivinywa obalulekile. Ninqume ukuthi wesekwe uMthethosivivinywa siyayazi imibono yamanye amaqembu ngawo, futhi siyayihlonipha.” Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi lo Mthethosivivinywa waphasiswa yiNational Assembly, wase udlulela kulo Mkhandlu weziFundazwe ukuze kulungiswe ezinye zezinto okwakukhalwe ngazo, ngaphambi kokuba uye kumengameli ukuze awusayine.Akuwona umthetho omusha njengoba uchibiyela umthetho wezikole ovele ukhona.Okuseqhulwini kuwona indaba yokuthi uGrade R abe yimpoqo kuleli, ukuvala unomphela ukusetshenziswa kwenduku, ukunikwa amandla inhloko yomnyango ukuthi inqume uma isikole sesigcwele nezilimi okumele zisebenze zokufunda ezikoleni.Okunye wukuthi kumele kubekwe imigomo ohlelweni lokufundela kwabafundi emakhaya.Okunye ngukuthi labo abazovimbela abafundi ukuthi baye ezikoleni kumele bagwetshwe yinkantolo.Amaqembu ahlukene okubalwa i-DA nezinhlangano zepolitiki okubalwa i-Freedom Front Plus, ziyawuchitha uMthethosivivinywa.Okukhalwa ngakho kakhulu ukuthi kumele kube abasekomitini lesikole abazonquma uma sesigcwele, izwi lokugcina kungabi elenhloko yomnyango.Lezi zinhlangano zikhala nangokuthi uhulumeni akanayo imali yokulungisa izinkinga ezibhekene nezemfundo ngakho ukuphoqa ukuthi uGrade R ube yimpoqo, kuzokwengeza omunye umthwalo.Selokhu yaqala eyokuchibiyela kwalo Mthethosivivinywa kukhulu ukuphikisana nawo njengoba ezinye izinhlangano zisabise ngokuthi zizoya nasenkantolo ngoba azihambisani nawo.Abawesekayo bona bathi liphume nobovu ngoba kukhona abazama ukuvimba ezinye izinhlanga ukuthi zifunde ezikoleni zabo ngokuthi kufundwe ngolimi oluthile nokuthi kuthiwe isikole sesigcwele ekubeni singagcwele.

KUHLOSWE ukudala imisebenzi, kuliwe nokunqamuka kukagesi futhi kuthuthukiswe imiphakathi ngohlelo oluzocija ngamakhono intsha engu-6 000 eThekwini.IMeya yeTheku uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda nabeKwaZulu-Natal Education Development Trust basayine isivumelwano sokusebenzisana ngoLwesihlanu.Sisayinwe esikhungweni iShukela Training Centre, eMount Edgecombe. Imeya ithi intsha izoqeqeshwa kulesi sikhungo esifundisa imisebenzi enhlobonhlobo.UKaunda uthe lo luhlelo lugxile kwezamandla ngakho-ke intsha izoqeqeshelwa ubuchwepheshe bama-solar.“Izozibeka emathubeni amahle ukuthi ithathwe yizimboni ezizimele nohulumeni usebenze kwezithinta ingqalasizinda kagesi.“Lo luhlelo luzokwenza intsha ibe yingxenye yohlelo lukamasipala lokuphehla ugesi kusetshenziswa indlela yesimanje” kusho uKaunda.Uthe ugesi ozotholakala kulindeleke ukuthi usetshenziswe ezikoleni, ezibhedlela nasemitholampilo nasemiphakathini.Uqhubeke ngokuthi kubalulekile ukuhlomisa intsha ngolwazi nangamakhono adingekayo, kwazise izwe libhekene nengwadla kagesi.“Ukuze izwe likwazi ukubhekana nenkinga kagesi, kubalulekile ukucija intsha ngamakhono ngoba yiyona eyikusasa la lelizwe. “Sijabule ngesivumelwano esisayindiwe esizodala amathuba emisebenzi angu-6 000 entsheni eyakhele iTheku,” kuchaza uKaunda.Isigaba sokuqala sohlelo kulindeleke ukuthi kufakwe ama-solar panels ne bio-gas digester ezikoleni.Uhlelo lwesibili kuthiwa luzogxila ezikhungweni zempilo bese kuthi olokugcina kufakwe amalambu azokhanyisa emalokishini nasemakhaya.UKaunda uthe lokhu kuzolekelela ekulweni nobugebengu ikakhulukazi uma ucishiwe ugesi ngenhloso yokuwonga.Uphethe ngokuthi intsha ayizoqeqeshelwa nje ukuthi uma isiqedile ifune imisebenzi kodwa bafuna uma isiqedile izimele ngokuvula amabhizinisi ayo iqashe abanye.

INKANTOLO ibeke usuku ezolalela ngalo ubufakazi obuzokwethulwa iphoyisa elithweswe icala lokudubula ngoyaba lezinhlamvu libulale okuthiwa wayekade encike emotweni yalo.Kubekelwe uJuni 25 nonyaka ukuze uSergeant Sibonelo Christopher Shabangu abeke uhlangothi lwakhe ngokwenzeka.UShabangu ubekade evele eNkantolo yeMantshi yasePinetown ngoLwesithathu emini.Ungaphandle ngebheyili kaR5 000.Ummeli kaShabangu, uMnuz Andile Dakela phambilini watshela inkantolo ukuthi ummangalelwa wadubula ezivikela ngoba ebona ukuthi impilo yakhe isengcupheni.UDakela wathi uShabangu wayekade exabana nomufi, uMnuz Qaphela Mdima, ayekade emyalele ukuthi asuke emotweni yakhe anganciki.Isigameko senzeka ngaphandle kwendawo yobumnandi iCasa Blanca Lifestyle, eMolweni, eThekwini.Enkantolo bekade kukhona abantu baseMolweni abangaphuthi uma kuqulwa icala.UMdima wahlonzwa njengoseshonile emuva kokuthi ephuthunyiswe emtholampilo waKwaDabeka elimele kanzima.UMbuso usonge uhlelo lwawo lokubizwa ofakazi.

ZIZONEKELWA izwe enkantolo izitatimende zabamangalelwa kwelokubulawa kukaSenzo Meyiwa emuva kokuthi zamukelwe njengengxenye yobufakazi obuzobhekwa uma sekuqulwa icala.UMeyiwa owayeyintandokazi ye-Orlando Pirates neBafana Bafana, wadutshulwa wabulawa ekubo kwentombi yakhe uKelly Khumalo eVosloorus, eGauteng, ngo-2014. Kushushiswa abalisa abahlanu okuthiwa yibona abayisa uMeyiwa kwagoqanyawo bethengiwe.UMbuso umi ngezitatimende okuthiwa zasayinwa abamangalelwa ababili kuleli cala bevuma amacala belandisa abaphenyi ukusuka nokuhlala ngokufa kukaMeyiwa. Abamangalelwa bathi bavuma basayina izitatimende ngoba base bevuthiwe yisibhaxu samaphoyisa.Ummangalelwa wokuqala uMuzikawukhulelwa Sibiya nommangalelwa wesibili uBongani Ntanzi, kuthiwa yibona ababhala izitatimende. UNtanzi waze wathatha amaphoyisa eyowakhombisa kubo kaKelly lapho okwafela khona uMeyiwa.Abaphenyi bathi abamangalelwa badalula ngisho umqashi wabo owabanika itoho lokucoboshisa uMeyiwa futhi bakhokhelwa emuva kwalokho.Abamangalelwa bafaka isicelo sokuthi izitatimende zingemukelwa zichithwe ngoba zatholakala ngokungemthetho. UMbuso ubize ofakazi bawo abachaze kabanzi ngokuthathwa kwezitatimende kanti nabamangalelwa babize ababo. IJaji Ratha Makgotlheng likhiphe isinqumo salo izolo lichitha abamangalelwa esicelweni sabo. IJaji lithe liyazemukela izitatimende njengobufakazi obuzobhekwa uma sekuqulwa icala.“Emuva kokucubungula kabanzi bonke ubufakazi ngithole ukuthi ummangalelwa wokuqala wazivumela yena icala wabhala isitatimende ngokuthanda kwakhe. Ummangalelwa wesibili naye wazivumela ngokuthanda kwakhe futhi wayengaphoqiwe nokuyokhomba indawo yesigameko,’’ kusho iJaji.IJaji lithe ukwemukelwa kwezitatimende akusona isinqumo secala lonke kodwa kuyingxenye nje yecala. Kuvele nokuthi izitatimende zokuvuma amacala azisebenzi kwabanye abamangalelwa kodwa zisebenza kulabo abazibhalile kuphela.Ngesikhathi iJaji liqeda ukufunda isinqumo, kube sekutolikelwa abamangalelwa nokuthe uma bebuzwa ukuthi bayezwa yini bazibukela nje bangaphendula.UMshushisi woMbuso u-Advocate George Baloyi usemukele isinqumo wathi usezobiza ofakazi ukuze bazokwenaba kabanzi ngezitatimende zokuvunywa kwamacala.Ummeli wabamangalelwa uMnuz Sipho Ramosepele ucele ukuthi bangaqali bahanjiswe ejele abahlala kulona usafuna inguyazana nabo. Icala libuyela namuhla enkantolo.

KUZOGAYWA amaphepha okuvota angu-90 million njengoba kubhekwe okhethweni lukazwelonke ngoMeyi 29. Umsebenzi wokugaya la maphepha uqala ngenyanga ezayo uze uphothulwe ngoMeyi.Lokhu kuvezwe yiPhini lesikhulu esiphezulu sekhomishini eyengamele ukhetho kuleli i-Independent Electoral Commission (IEC), uMnuz Masego Sheburi, ngesikhathi le khomishini ivele ngaphambi kwekomiti lasePhalamende.USheburi uthe  njengoba amaphepha okuvota ezobe emathathu kulolu khetho, bazogaya u-30 million iphepha ngalinye okwenza ukuthi esewonke abe ngu-90 million. Kuzobe kungokokuqala okhethweni ukuthi abangenele ukhetho ngokuzimela babe yingxenye yalo.“Sizogaya la maphepha ezikhungweni eziyisithupha kuleli. Asifuni ukuthi wonke umsebenzi wenziwe yinkampani eyodwa ngoba mkhulu kakhulu umsebenzi wokugaya amaphepha okuvota angu-90 million. Konke sekumi ngomumo mayelana nokugaywa kwalawa maphepha okuvota.”Uthe ngo-Ephreli 4 kuzokwenziwa uhlelo lokutomula iqembu elizobe liphezulu ephepheni lokuvota.“Sizotomula leli qembu elizobe liphezulu ephepheni lokuvota. Sizobe sesitomula nokuthi amanye amaqembu azoma kanjani kuleli phepha.” Uthe angu-370 amaqembu abhalisele ukhetho.Uveze nokuthi ngoLwesihlanu bazokwazisa amaqembu ngabantu azobajuba abavela ohlwini lwamanye amaqembu.“Sizonika amaqembu ithuba lokuthi afake elinye igama lomuntu ozongena esikhaleni salowo ozobe evela ohlwini lwelinye iqembu. Uma kungukuthi amaqembu awalisusi leli gama, kusho ukuthi uzovela ohlwini lwamaqembu ahlukene uma sekuvotwa kodwa uma sekwabiwa izihlalo, uzothola esisodwa hhayi eziningi. Sifuna ukuxwayisa amaqembu ukuthi akulona ithuba lokuthi ashintshe lonke uhlu alulethile kodwa ukushintsha afake elinye igama uma kungukuthi igama livela kolunye uhlu.” UMnuz Mawethu Mosery wekhomishini, uthe abangenele ukhetho ngokuzimela bazoba sohlwini olufanayo namaqembu.“Ngeke kube nokuhlukana kube nabangenela ukhetho ngokuzimela bodwa kanjalo namaqembu. Bonke bazobe behlangene endaweni eyodwa, ephepheni lokuvota,” kusho uMosery. USheburi uveze nokuthi ngesonto elizayo uMashi 26 noMashi 27, bazokhipha uhlu lwabantu amaqembu afolosa ngabo.“Ngo-Ephreli 10, ikhomishini izoshicilela uhlu lokugcina lwabazongenela ukhetho. Ilapho ke okuzobe sekucaca ukuthi bangaki abazongenela ukhetho ngokuzimela kanjalo namaqembu azobanga amavoti,” kusho uSheburi. Uveze nokuthi bakulindele ukuthi abazokhala ngaphansi okhethweni, bazozithethelela ngokuthi ukhetho belungakhululekile.“Njengoba sanda isibalo samaqembu angenela ukhetho kodwa kugcina ngokuthi kukhethwe ambalwa azoya ePhalamende naseziShayamthetho. Okhethweni lwango-1999 angu-26 amaqembu angenela ukhetho. Njalo uma kunokhetho, siyanda  isibalo samaqembu angenela ukhetho kodwa ambalwa avotelwayo. Manje angu-370 abhalisele ukhetho kodwa uthola ukuthi angu-13 avotelwayo, okwenza abasuke bekhale ngaphansi bese bekhala ngokuthi ukhetho belungakhululekile.” Ubalule nokuthi abasuke bemele amaqembu ezikhungweni zokuvota basheshe bahambe uma bebona ukuthi izinto azihambi kahle.

BAZONGENA bashone emaphaketheni abantu baseNingizimu Afrika njengoba ikhuphukile intengo kagesi izolo ilanywa eduzane ekaphethroli.U-Eskom ukhuphule intengo kagesi ngo-12.74% onyakeni wezimali u-2024/25. Phakathi kwamabili namuhla intengo kaphethroli izonyuka ngo-67 cents ilitha.Mayelana nentengo kadizili, kulindeleke ikhuphuke ngo-3 cents ilitha maphakathi nezwe. Ezifundazweni ezigudle ulwandle yehle ngo-4 cents ilitha.Lokhu kukhuphuka kwentengo kaphethroli kuthiwa kubangelwa ukunyuka kwamanani emikhiqizo emhlabeni nokuba buthaka kwamandla erandi.USomnotho ozimele uSolwazi Bonke Dumisa ukhale ngakubize ngama-administered prices, okuyimali uhulumeni aba nezwi lokugcina kuyona okubalwa ama-rates, intengo kagesi nekaphethroli.UDumisa uthe ukunyuswa kwentengo kagesi kubonwa abantu ngento engathetheleleki ngoba kuyaqhubeka ukucishwa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga.Uhlabe inkohlakalo egubuzele u-Eskom wathi ingakho lenkampani ephehla ugesi ngelahle ifuna imali ukuze ikwazi ukwenza umsebenzi wayo.UMnuz Layton Beard wakwa-Automobile Association uxwayise ngokuthi kuzoguga iphakethe kubashayeli bezimoto.UBeard uthe ukunyuka kwentengo kaphethroli kusasa kungase kwelanywe okunye maduze.“Okubi ukuthi amaholo abasebenzi awakhushulwa alingane nentengo kaphethroli ekhuphuka njalo. Ukukhushulwa kwentengo kungagcina sekunyusa nemali yokugibela kwizithuthi zomphakathi,” kusho uBeard.Ukhale ngokuthi kumanje abathengi bathwele ijoka ngenxa yokumba eqolo kwamanani ezinto ezitolo.UBeard ukhuthaze abashayeli ukuthi basebenzise izindlela eziphusile zokonga imali njengokuthi bacele kubaqashi ukuba basebenze ezinye izinsuku besemakhaya uma kwenzeka.“Uma usebenzisa imoto yakho kancane, lokho kuzokongela uphethroli ugcine usebenzisa imali encane,” kuphetha uBeard.

ZIZOJIKA izinto embukisweni omkhulukazi wemfashini eNingizimu Afrika, iSA Fashion Week, njengoba kwethulwa isigaba esibizwa nge-Walk Your Worth esizohlonipha abesifazane abenza izinto zenzeke emikhakheni ehlukene.Lo mbukiso, ozoba ngo-Ephreli 19 eMall of Africa, uza emuva kwesithangami sokucobelelana ngolwazi ebesisakazwa kwi-You Tube esibizwa ngeTalk Your Worth nayo ebikhiqizwa yi-L’Oréal Paris.Le nkampani yezimonyo isanda kumemezela umlingisi wakuleli ozinze phesheya, uThuso Mbedu, njengenxusa layo laseSub-Sahara Africa.Esitatimendeni esithunyelwe kwabezindaba, iL'Oréal Paris ithe kuzobe kukhangisa osaziwayo embukisweni we-Walk Your Worth okubalwa kubo uBonang Matheba, uMiss SA uNatasha Joubert noThembi Seete.Kulo mbukiso we-Walk Your Worth iL’Oréal Paris isebenzisana nelebuli yemfashini, iBiji La Maison de Couture, okuyiyona ezobe yenze imisiko esezingeni.“Sengenze into engiyithandayo iminyaka ewu-30 futhi ngiyajabula ukuthi ngizobe ngisebenzisana neL’Oréal Paris ne-SA Fashion Week kulo mbukiso we-Walk Your Worth. Yonke imisiko izobe ibuveza obala ubuhle balabo abazobe beyikhangisa,” kusho uBiji Gibbs.U-Ayanda Mackay, obhekelele ezokukhangiswa kwe-L'Oréal Paris, uthe bayinkampani ebhekelele abesifazane futhi ezimisele ukufukula abesifazane.“Sizimisele ukuthi lo mbukiso ube ngeminye ehamba phambili e-Afrika lapho kuzocaca ukuthi iL’Oréal izibophezele ekunikezeni bonke abesifazane amathuba nokubafukula,” kusho u-Ayanda.

AKEKHO ozolahlekelwa wumsebenzi njengoba sekuhlanganiswe izikhungo ezine zikahulumeni zaba yizikhungo ezimbili.UMphathiswa wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho, ezokuVakasha neMvelo KwaZulu-Natal, uMfu Musa Zondi, wethule ngokusemthethweni i-KZN Economic Regulatory Authority (KZNERA) esungulwe emuva kokuhlanganiswa kwe-KZN Liqour Authority ne-KZN Gaming and Betting Board.Ubuye wathula ngokusemthethweni iKwaZulu-Natal Tourism and Film Authority (KZNTAFA) esungulwe emuva kokuhlanganiswa kwe-Tourism KwaZulu-Natal ne-KZN Film Commission.Uthe indlela abalwenze ngayo uhlelo lokuhlanganisa lezi zikhungo akekho ozolahlekelwa wumsebenzi ngoba abantu bafakwe ezikhaleni ezihambisana namakhono abo.“Ukuhlanganiswa kwalezi zikhungo kusho ukuthi sizokonga izigidi zamaRandi emaholweni futhi senze umsebenzi ngokushesha. Lezi yizikhungo ezibalulekile ekudaleni amathuba omsebenzi nasekuthuthukiseni umnotho waKwaZulu-Natal. Okuhle wukuthi akekho olahlekelwe wumsebenzi njengoba senza lolu hlelo olwaqala ngo-2015,” kusho uZondi.Uthe kuthathe isikhathi eside ukuhlanganisa lezi zikhungo ngenxa yokuthi abantu bebenexhala lokuthi kungalahleka umsebenzi.Ukhumbuze abaqokiwe ukuphatha lezi zikhungo ukuba bayizisebenzi zomphakathi ngakho kufanele balethe impilo engcono kubantu.Ubalule ukuthi kwesinye isikhathi abantu abasebenzayo baye bangaboni ukuthi kukhona abantu abampofu abadinga usizo, wathi akufanele abanotho bakhohlwe wusizi lwabampofu.UNkk Mbali Myeni ongusihlalo we-KZNERA, uthe ngesikhathi kuqala uhlelo lokuhlanganiswa kwezikhungo zikahulumeni kwakukhona abathukile ngoba bengazi ukuthi bazothinteka kanjani kodwa manje bayabona ukuthi lesi sinyathelo siyawenza umqondo.Uthe ngeke bakhiphe amalayisensi kuphela kodwa bazoqinisekisa ukuthi zonke izinhlanga zakuleli ziyangena kule mikhakha abayibhekelele.UMnuz Paulos Ngcobo oyilungu lebhodi le-KZNTAFA, uthe bafuna iKwaZulu-Natal ihehe izivakashi nabazokwenza amafilimu e-Afrika. Lo msebenzi uthe uzokwenzeka kahle njengoba sekuhlanganiswe ezokuvakasha namafilimu.Okwamanje lezi zikhungo zinezikhulu eziphezulu ezisabambile eseKZNTAFA nguMnuz Sibusiso Gumbi kanti eseKZNERA nguNksz Portia Baloyi.IKwaZulu-Natal Growth Fund isibizwa ngeKZN Growth Fund Agency, usihlalo webhodi layo nguDkt Cassius Lubisi, isikhulu esisabambile nguNksz Tshidi Ikaneng.IMoses Kotane Research Institute iyona esizogxila ocwaningweni lwezomnotho, usihlalo weBhodi nguMnuz Thinta Cibane, isikhulu esiphezulu ngu-Dkt Thandeka Ellenson, esisabambile ngu-Adv Thembelihle Mapipa.

KUBHEKWE inzuzo elinganiselwa ku-R203 million emnothweni wedolobha iTheku ngengqungquthela yezinsuku ezinhlanu yokuhweba nokwakha ubudlelwano bokusebenzisana, i-reSURGEnce Conference, eqala ngoLwesithathu ize iphethwe ngeSonto.Lokho kushiwo yiMeya yeTheku, uMnuz Cyril Xaba, emcimbini wokwethula le ngqungquthela ngokusemthethweni obuse-Inkosi Albert Luthuli International Convention Centre (ICC), eThekwini, nokuyilapho ezokwenzelwa khona.UXaba uthe balindele izihambeli ezingaphezu kuka-8 580 kule ngqungquthela esungulwe yinhlangano yabezenkolo yaseMelika, iChristian Times Global, ngoba ibona ithuba lokutshala imali eThekwini ukufukula abantu abadingayo. “Lokhu kuzosiza ukufukula umnotho wedolobha njengoba kwande isibalo sabantu abazolala emahhotela kusukela ngoJulayi 14 kuya kuJulayi 23, futhi sibheke ukuthi kwakhiwe amathuba omsebenzi angaphezu kwa-700 ngayo,” kusho uXaba.Kuzodingidwa izihloko ezahlukene kubalwa ezokuhwebelana, ukutshala imali, ukuhlela imicimbi, ukuqala nokuchumisa amabhizinisi, ezolimo nezempilo. Izivakashi zizobe ziqhamuka emazweni omhlaba okukhona kuwona iMelika, Jamaica, Zambia, Zimbabwe, Uganda, Kenya, Cameroon and nezaseKapa imbala lapha ezweni.Kwizikhulumi kuzobe kukhona owayeyisekela likamengameli waseZambia, uDkt Nevers Mumba, u-Ayo Tometi we#BlackLivesMatter, u-Adriene Nicole, Voza Rivers oyi-Executive Producer we-New Heritage Theatre noDkt Alexander Chisango we-World Economic Congress, ukukha nje phezulu. Imeya ithe le ngqungquthela izosiza osomabhizinisi abasafufusa abazokhangisa ngamabhizinisi abo ehlukene ngoJulayi 18 no-19, kube kuqhubeka izingxoxo zengqungquthela ezizosiza ngamasu okufukulana nokuthuthukisana emikhakheni eyahlukene. NgoMgqibelo, kuzoba nomcimbi womculo wokholo iResurgence Gospel Fest ozobe ugabe ngezihlabani zaseMelika, oShirley Caesar noHezekiah Walker, behambisana nabakuleli zwe oDumi Mkokstad, Ayanda Ntanzi, Xolly Mncwango noMnqobi Nxumalo.Isiqubulo sengqungquthela sithi Moving The Needle Forward Towards Economic Emancipation,  izosongwa ngomcimbi wemvuselelo i-Economic Revival Africa Arise Worship.

KUNXUSWA abashayeli ukuba bahlele kahle izindlela zabo uma bezohambela ngasoPhongolo ngesonto elizayo njengoba kulindeleke ukuba kuvalwe umgwaqo uN2.Ukuvalwa kukathelawayeka uN2 oPhongolo kuyingenye yokuqhubeka komsebenzi wokuthuthukisa ingqalasizinda ebhulohweni iPongola River Bridge (B42).AbeSanral bathi ngenxa yokwakhiwa komgoqo kakhonkolo ebhulohweni, kuzoqalwa ukuvalwa kwesikhashana komzila ngokusetshenziswa kohlelo lokuba zidedelane izimoto ukuze zihambe ngendlela.Izinsuku zokuvalwa komgwaqo zimi kanje:26 Agasti 2024 (uma ubheke eNingizimu) kusukela ngo-09h00 kuya ku-14h0028 Agasti 2024 (uma ubheke eNingizimu) kusukela ngo-09h00 kuya ku-14h0030 Agasti 2024 (uma ubheke eNingizimu) kusukela ngo-09h00 kuya ku-14h00“Sinxusa abasebenzisi bomgwaqo ukuthi balandele izimpawu zomgwaqo kanye nejuybane  elinqunyiwe uma beza noma behamba endaweni okwakhiwa kuyo,” kusho uSerisha Sukraj, oyi-Eastern Region Project Manager, eSanral.

KUNGASE kuphazamiseke ukukhokhwa kwesondlo sezingane uma kuphela inyanga njengoba uMnyango wezoBulungiswa uveze ukuthi izigebengu zizame ukweba imali zisebenzisa i-internet.Esitatimendeni sabezindaba, uMnyango wezoBulungiswa uveze ukuthi izigebengu zingene ohlelweni lokukhokhwa kwemali yesondlo zashintsha imininingwane yabantu okufanele bathole isondlo zafaka eyazo.Lokhu kuholele ekutheni umnyango ulumise uhlelo lokukhokhwa kwezibonelelo olujwayelekile ukuze kuliwe nalobu bugebengu.Uthe usubikele izinhlaka zomthetho okuyizona eziphenyayo ngalolu daba.Okwamanje abahola izibonelelo zikahulumeni bacelwe ukuba baye ezinkantolo ukuze bakwazi ukuthola imali yabo.Esitatimendeni, uNksz Kgalalelo Masibi uthe imali izotholakala kuzo zonke izinkantolo zakuleli ukuze abahola isondlo bengeke bahlupheke.Ubuye wakuveza ukuthi bayaxoxisana nezinye izinhlaka okubalwa kuzo namabhange ukuze kungagcwali imali eningi ezinkantolo.Ezinkundleni zokuxhumana abesifazane abathola isondlo sezingane bathe ubuhixihixi buqale ngoMeyi 15 kanti abanalo ithemba lokuthi uma kuphela inyanga wonke umuntu uzoyithola imali.Omunye ocele ukungadalulwa, ngoba esabela ukuthi ngeke ayithole imali uma eseya enkantolo, uthe akusikona okokuqala izigebengu zizama ukweba imali ngakho umnyango kufanele ube nezinhlelo ezifana nezamabhange zokuvikela imininingwane yabathola isondlo sezingane.Ucele ukuthi imali ifakwe kuma-akhawunti abantu asebhange, ingavayi ohlelweni lwekhompyutha lomnyango ngoba izigebengu zihlasela lona njalo.

KUZOPHAZAMISEKA ukuthunyelwa kwamanzi ezindaweni ezikuMasipala weTheku nakuMasipala wasoGwini. Lokhu kudalwa wukuthi inhlangano ephakela omasipala baKwaZulu-Natal ngamanzi, UMngeni-uThukela Water uzothatha amanzi amaningi kwisiphehlimanzi saseWiggins Water Works bese edluliselwa kwisiphehlimanzi esiphakela izindawo eziseNingizimu, iSouth Coast Water Pump Station.Lo msebenzi uqalwe ngoLwesihlanu 10 kuMeyi uzoqhubeka kuze kushaye uMgqibelo wango-18 Meyi 2024. Kuhloswe ukuthi kukhushulwe umthamo wamanzi ophakelwa izindawo eziseNingizimu neTheku  nasoGwini.AboMngeni-uThukela Water nabakuMasipala weTheku baveze ukuthi izinkinga zamanzi eNingizimu zaqala mhla kulimala ipayipi elikhulu elihambisa amanzi ngasekuqaleni konyaka. Kuze kube yimanje kusazanywa imizamo yokuzixazulula.UMngeni-uThukela Water unxusa umphakathi ukuba usebenzise amanzi ngokonga ukuze kukwazi ukuthi kusheshwe kudlulwe kulesi simo futhi kuqinisekiswe ukuthi wonke umuntu uyawathola amanzi.Izindawo ezithintekayo ngaphansi kwaloluhlelo lokuphuthunyiswa kokulethwa kwamanzi ileziKuMasipala weThekuAmanzimtoti, Almond, Kingsburgh, Doonside, Illovo Beach, Panorama Park, Umgababa, Mgobhozini, Mfume, KwaSoni, Mshiwase, Nkwali, Lovu, Bhekulwandle, KwaMakhutha, Mkhazini, Ezimbokodweni, KwaFakazi, KwaMgendwa, Mahlathini, Ohlongeni, eKuphileni, Adams Mission, Umnini, Danganyana, Magabheni, Dlambula, Ehlanzeni, Thoyane, Umkhomazi, Clansthal, Craigeburn, Amahlongwa, Amalundi, Crowder Farm nase MalukaziKuMasipala UguScottburgh, Freeland Park, Mahlongwa, Mandawe, Park Rynie, Pennington kanye nezindawo eziphakelwa isiphehlimanzi Umzinto Treatment Plant.

KUZOTHATHA izinsuku ezinhlanu kuya kweziyisikhombisa ukuthi ukuphakelwa kwamanzi ezindaweni eziseNyakatho yeTheku kubuyele esimeni esijwayelekile.Lokhu kushiwo iMeya yeTheku, uMnuz Cyril Xaba,  izolo esithangamini nabezindaba lapho ebazisa khona izakhamuzi zakuleli dolobha ngokuqhubekayo ngezinselelo eziholela ekutheni umphakathi ohlala  kulezi zindawo ungabi nawo amanzi aphuma kompompi.Sekuphele amasonto amabili kuya kwamathathu umphakathi wakwezinye izindawo ungenawo amanzi aphuma kompompi.UXaba uthe ipayipi elikhulu elingu-15 diametres  elenza umsebenzi omkhulu ukuze umphakathi wakulezi zindawo uthole amanzi okwamanje alikasebenzi.Uqhube wathi uMnyango wezaManzi, wazisiwe ngenkinga yolwelwesi oluluhlaza oluvale izihluzi zamanzi edamini i-Albert Falls,  osekuze kwaholela ekutheni nedamu eliphakelwa isikhungo esihlanza amanzi iDurban Hieghts Water Treatment Works, ibe nenkinga yalolu lwelwesi.Uthe njengoba kusalungiswa isimo uMasipala weTheku usukhiphe amaloli amanzi angu-228,  ukuze aphakele umphakathi ohlala ezindaweni ezithintekayo ngamanzi.Izindawo ezithintekayo kubalwa, iNewlands, Verulam, Ntuzuma, KwaMashu, Phoenix, Umhlanga nezinye.Uthe isikhungo esiphakela amanzi uMgeni-uThukela sisebenzisa izindlela eziningi ezihlanganisa ukudonswa kwamanzi adlule edamini iNegle nelaseNanda ahlanzwe."Ngaphambi kokuthi kube nolwelwesi oludale ukuthi amanzi ashode kulezi zindawo umasipala ubuvele unezinselelo zawo ebezenza eminye imiphakathi ingawatholi amanzi ngendlela.  Lezo zinselelo zisalungiswa," kusho uXaba.Uthe isisombululo esiphelele balindele ukuthi silethwe idamu elakhiwayo eliseMkhomazi okulindeleke ukuthi liqale ukusebenza ngo-2032 kodwa zikhona ezinye izisombululo zesikhashana abanazo.Uthe njengoba sekusondele isikhathi sokuzijabulisa, umasipala usiqaphile isimo sokungcola kwamabhishi,  ngokuthi kulungiswe amapayipi ahambisa indle nezikhungo eziyihlanzayo ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthi ayikapakeli olwandle.UXaba ubuye wamemezela ukuthi kuzoba nophiko olubhekele ukufundwa kwamamitha amanzi nogesi,  oluzokwenza ukuthi kube lula ukuthi kuxazululwe izinkinga ezibhekana nomphakathi, oluzoqala ukusebenza ngokuphelele ngoNovemba. “Sifuna kulungiseke inselelo yokuthi amakhasimende agcine engazi ukuthi abhekana nobani ngezinkinga zawo ezithinta ukufundwa kwamamitha angakhonjwa ngapha nangapha.”

KULINDELEKE ukuthi iNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini, ihlukanise inhloko nesixhanti ikhiphe isinqumo ngombango wophawu lweqembu uMkhonto weSizwe. Icala lombango wophawu belusenkantolo ngoMashi, kwenziwa izethulo sase sigodlwa isinqumo.I-ANC imangalele iMK izigaba ezehlukene iyisola ngokweba igama nophawu lwayo yenza ngalo iqembu ezongenela ngalo ukhetho. Izwe libheke okhethweni lukazwelonke oluzoba ngoMeyi 29, nonyaka nolubhekwe ngabomvu.IMK yiqembu elisha elethulwe nguZuma ngoDisemba, wonyaka odlule. UZuma ememezela leli qembu wathi ngeke esayivotela i-ANC kodwa usehamba noMkhonto weSizwe, azowukhankasela. Kulezi zinsuku uZuma uphansi phezulu ukhankasela iqembu elisha.I-ANC ibifake udaba eNkantolo yezoKhetho ikhononda ngesinqumo se-IEC sokubhalisa iMK njengeqembu elizongenela ukhetho. Ikhale ngaphansi i-ANC, kulelo cala inkantolo yavuna iMK.I-IEC yamemezela ukuthi uZuma ngeke akwazi ukuba sohlwini lwabazoya ePhalamende, ngenxa yokuthi walahlwa yicala lobugebengu, wagwetshwa. I-MK iye enkantolo yafika yalunqoba udaba kodwa abe-IEC, bathe balufaka eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo.Phezu kwalawo macala kukhona eliseThekwini, lapho i-ANC imangalele iMK ngophawu lwayo nokuyilona okuzophuma isinqumo ngalo ngoMsombuluko.UMkhonto weSizwe kwakuwuphiko lwe-ANC lwezempi olwasungulwa ngoDisemba 1961, ngenholso yokubhekana nohulumeni wobandlululo. Lo mbutho wezempi wahlakazwa ngoDisemba 1993, ngesikhathi  izwe selizongena embusweni wentando yeningi.Abe-MK bakhiphe isaziso sokuthi bazobe bephume ngobuningi babo beyothamela isinqumo senkantolo. Abalandeli beMK bavame ukuphuma ngobuningi beyokweseka iqembu labo enkantolo noZuma uba khona.

UMPHATHISWA wezeZimali KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Francios Rodgers, ufunge wagomela ukuthi kuzophela nya ukusaphazwa kwemali ezintweni ezingahlelelwe kuhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal.URodgers uthembise ukukuqapha ngelokhozi ukusetshenziswa kwemali kuhulumeni wesifundazwe.Ukusho lokhu emva kokwethula kabusha isabelomali sesifundazwe esingu-R150 billion, esiShayamthetho.URodgers uthe  izikhathi esiphila kuzo zidinga ukuthi iminyango kahulumeni ibophe izifociya.“Asikwazi ukuvele sisebenzise imali ezintweni ebesingazihlelelanga. Kufanele sikuqaphe lokhu. Kuzokuba umsebenzi wami ukuba  iphoyisa elizogada ukusetshenziswa kwemali. Ngizokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi imali ayimoshwa. Kufanele sibekezele, sizophuma maduze kule simo esikuso.”URodgers uthe bafuna ukuthi zithathelwe izinyathelo izikhulu zeminyango kahulumeni eziphula imigomo.“Izinto engihlale ngizisho ukuthi kufanele sakhe uhulumeni osebenza ngokuthembeka. Ukuze uhulumeni usebenze ngokuthembeka, kufanele kube nemigomo ebekiwe okufanele ilandelwe yiwo wonke umuntu. Njengoba kunemigomo elawula ukusetshenziswa kwemali kahulumeni, kufanele senze isiqiniseko sokuthi le migomo iyalandelwa.“Njengohulumeni omusha, kufanele senze izinto ngendlela ehlukile. Kulo hulumeni kufanele senze isiqiniseko sokuthi imigomo iyalandelwa. Kufanele senze isiqiniseko sokuthi bathathelwa izinyathelo abamoshe imali. Akufanele sitotose abantu abaphula imithetho. Ngizokuba owokuqala ukubathathela izinyathelo abaphula umthetho.”URodgers ukhulume ngezingxoxo zokuthi ezinye izinkampani zikahulumeni ezenza inzuzo zifakwe emnyangweni wakhe.URodgers uthe ngesikhathi kunezingxoxo zokubusa ngokubambisana kwaba nesiphakamiso sokuthi izinkampani ezifana nezeMvelo KZN Wildlife, Sharks Board, Liqour Board, neGaming and Betting Board, zifakwe emnyangweni wakhe.Lezi zinkampani ziseMnyangweni wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho nokoNgiwa kweMvelo.“Lezo zingxoxo azikaphothulwa.”Ephawula ngezeMvelo KZN Wildlife, uthe le nkampani kufanele ibhukule ukuze yenze imali, ingathembeli kuhulumeni.“Into engihlale ngiyisho kwabezeMvelo ukuthi kufanele bazi ukuthi yini inhloso yezeMvelo. Akuwona umsebenzi kahulumeni ukwenza amabhizinsi ezokungcebeleka. Into okufanele siyibheke kakhulu ukunakekela izilwane nezithelo ezitholakala ezindaweni eziphethwe ezeMvelo. Akhona amaqhinga okwenza imali esesiqalile ukuwabona esebenza.”

Zizoqashwa ngelokhozi izikhungo ezibalelwa ku-500 zokuvota kuleli ngamaphoyisa ngosuku lokhetho.Lokhu kuvezwe nguNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa uMnuz Bheki Cele ngesikhathi ekhuluma nabezindaba esithangamini sethimba longqongqoshe ababhekele ukuphepha abebekhuluma ngamalungiselelo okhetho, ePitoli.UCele uthe ezikhungweni ezibalelwa ku-23 000 zokuvota, ezingu-500 abazoziqapha ngelokhozi.“Sizoqapha yonke indawo kodwa bese sigxila kulezi ezingu-500 ngenxa yokuthi yizona okungase kube nezinto ezingenzeka.“Abazophambana nomthetho ngeke sinanaze ukubavalela. Abantu banelungelo lokubhikisha kodwa lokhu kumele bakwenze belandela umthetho,” kusho uCele.Uthe ngeke aziveze izibalo zamaphoyisa azojutshwa okhethweni ngoMeyi 29.“Engingakusho wukuthi azobe enele amaphoyisa azobe ejutshiwe. Sifuna abantu bakhululeke ngosuku lokuvota ngoba akukho okubi okuzokwenzeka,” esho. Uveze nokuthi bahlangane nabo bonke abaphathi beziteshi zamaphoyisa njengoba kuzovotwa.Kulesi sithangami kuvele nokuthi yonke into isimi ngomumo mayelana namalungiselelo okhetho.Kuvele nokuthi uhlelo lwezokuphepha luzobuyekezwa njalo uma kunesidingo.
