ITSHE lizogaya ngomunye umhlathi ezikhungweni zoMnyango wezaseKhaya kufika ungqongqoshe omusha othi kumele iphele indaba yolayini abade nokuthi njalo kuthiwe imishini ayisebenzi.UDkt Leon Schreiber, ophuma kwiDemocratic Alliance, usho kanje eqeda kufungiswa ukuba wungqongqoshe walo mnyango eCape Town.Uthe abantu bakuleli abehlise amaphaphu mayelana nomazisi oyibhukwana eliluhlaza ngoba awukazoqedwa. Usho lokhu nje ngeledlule kusabalale imibiko ebithi sekuyaphela ngalolu hlobo lukamazisi njengoba lo Mnyango usufuna ukuthi bonke abantu babe nomazisi oyikhadi. “Yize kunjalo kodwa siyabakhuthaza abantu ukuthi bathole omazisi abangamakhadi (smart IDs) okungewona umqansa ukuwuthola,” kusho uSchreiber.Ube esethi igeja ensimini, ufuna ukubona kuphuculwa indlela amahhovisi alo mnyango enza ngayo umsebenzi.Ufuna kuqedwe olayini abade ababonakala ezikhungweni zalo mnyango. Ufuna nokuthi abantu balujwayele uhlelo lokufaka izicelo usebenzisa ikhompyutha.“Kuzomele iphele le nto yokuthi imishini ayisebenzi (i-offline). Mina njengongqongqoshe ngifuna ukuthi isebenze (imishini). Kumanje sixoxisana nezinye izinhlaka ukuze siqinisekise ukuthi imishini yethu ihlale isebenza ngaso sonke isikhathi,” kusho uSchreiber.Uyichithile imibiko esanda kusabalala ngaye ukuthi ungowaseZimbabwe.Uthe yena akaze awubeke umcondo wakhe eZimbabwe, uzalelwe eNingizimu Afrika wakhulela khona.Uveze nokuthi uyafisa ukuvakasha kulelizwe elingumakhelwane namanye  emhlabeni angakaze aye kuwona.“Izindaba ezingelona iqiniso ukuthi mina ngingowaseZimbabwe. Ngisho ikhomishana yokhetho i-IEC ayikuvumeli ukuthi ube yilungu lePhalamende uma ungeyena owaseNingizimu Afrika,” kuchaza ungqongqoshe.Uchaze ubumqoka bomnyango aphathiswe wona empilweni yomuntu wathi iwona oqinisekisayo ukuthi uyisakhamuzi.Uqhube wathi umuntu uyaxhumana nalo mnyango cishe impilo yakhe yonke kusukela ezalwa enzelwa isitifiketi noma esedlulile emhlabeni enzelwe esokufa.

INHLOKO yamaJaji kuleli uRaymond Zondo, ithe kuzoqhubeka ukufungiswa kwamalungu ePhalamende noma kuthiwa kunamalungu adube umhlangano. UZondo uthe kulo mhlangano wokuqala wePhalamende okumele uhlale ezinsukwini ezingu-14 kwamenyezelwa imiphumela yokhetho, kuzokhethwa uSomlomo nomengameli wezwe. Uthe umhlangano uyoqhubeka uma sivuma isibalo samalungu angekho ngenxa yezizathu ezithile. “Uma nje isibalo samalungu ePhalamende senele, siyoqhubeka nomsebenzi wokufungisa amalungu ePhalamende. Umsebenzi obaluleke kakhulu ezweni ngoba kukhethwa usomlomo wePhalamende, umengameli wezwe, kanjalo nosihlalo woMkhandlu weziFundazwe,” kusho uZondo.Ukusho lokhu eKapa ekhuluma nezintatheli kulandela ukuthola uhlu kwiKhomishini yezoKhetho lwamalungu amasha ePhalamende naweziShayamthetho azofungiswa maduzane.Uveze lokhu nje iqembu eliholwa owayengumengameli wezwe uJacob Zuma, Umkhonto weSizwe, lisabise ukuthi lingase lidube lo mhlangano wokuqala wePhalamende lapho kuvotelwa khona lezi zikhundla, ngenxa yokuthi aleneme ngendlela ikhomishini yezokhetho ebhekelele ngayo izikhalo zamaqembu.Ongoti kwezoMthethosisekelo bathe ukuduba kweMK ukuthamela lo mhlangano ngeke kumise ukuhlala kwePhalamende ngoba likhona noma lingekho leli qembu isibalo samalungu adingekayo ukuze kuqhubeke umhlangano sizohlangana.“Umsebenzi obalulekile lo ozokwenziwa amajaji. Ikhona imigomo esishicilelwe okumele ilandelwe uma sekufungiswa la malungu. Kuzobe kuvuleka isahluko esisha ezweni,” kusho uZondo. Usihlalo wekhomishini yezokhetho, uMnuz Mosotho Moepya, uthe siyaqhubeka nokwanda isibalo samalungu ePhalamende naweziShayamthetho angabesifazane.Uthe u-43.5% wamalungu ePhalamende akhethiwe, abesifazane, abesilisa benza u-56.5%.Uveze ukuthi iningi lamalungu akhethiwe aphakathi kweminyaka u-40 kuya ku-59.Abaneminyaka engu-20 kuya ku-29 angu-12, aphakathi kuka-30 weminyaka no-39 abengu-67.Aneminyaka engu-40 kuya ku-49 angu-110, aneminyaka ephakathi kuka-50 kuya ku-59 abengu-110. Aneminyaka engu-60 kuya ku-69 angu-90, kuthi aneminyaka engu-70 angu-11. “Umsebenzi wekhomishini ukuqinisekisa ukuthi sibamba ukhetho, kukhethwe abantu abazohola izwe. Siwenza lo msebenzi ngaphandle kokuchema nokwenzelela. Uhlu esiludluliselayo liveza umbono wabantu bakuleli,” kusho uMoepya.UZondo uthe njengoba sebethole uhlu sebeyazi ukuthi obani abantu abajutshiwe.“Mkhulu umsebenzi ebese siwenzile ukulungiselela amalungu amasha. Okunye kwakho ukwenza imigomo ezolandelwa kanjalo nokuqoka abazongimela ezifundazweni uma sekufungiswa amalungu eziShayamthetho,” kusho uZondo.Uthe konke abakwenzayo balandela uMthethosisekelo wezwe.

KUZOTSHALWA amaphoyisa engeziwe ezikhungweni zokuvota ezisezindaweni osekuke kwabikwa izigameko zokungabekezelelani kwezepolitiki KwaZulu-Natal, ukuqinisekisa ukuthi amalungu omphakathi avota ngenkululeko nangaphandle kokwesaba.Lokhu kuvele enkulumweni kaMphathiswa wezokuThutha ukuPhepha nokuXhumana koMphakathi kulesi sifundazwe, uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka esithangamini nabezindaba eThekwini, okuthiwa bekuhloswe ngaso ukunekela umphakathi ngamalungiselelo amaphoyisa esifundazwe ukuqinisekisa ukuthula okhethweni likazwelonke nezifundazwe, ngesonto elizayo.KwaNongoma ngenye yezindawo okuthiwa zizoqiniswa ngokwengeziwe ezokuphepha, njengoba inomlando ongemuhle wokubulawa kosopolitiki.UHlomuka uthe evile ku-17 000 amaphoyisa nabanye bezinhlaka zezokuphepha, abazobe betshalwe kuzona zonke izikhungo zokuvotisa esifundazweni.“Zonke izikhungo okuzovotelwa kuzo sezibhekisisiwe nangendlela okumele ezokuphepha zimiswe ngakhona kuleso naleso sikhungo. Njengoba ukuvota ngokukhethekile kuzoqala ngoMeyi 27 no-28, sesikulungele. Uhlelo lwethu ukuthi siqinisekise ukuthi zonke izikhungo zivikelwe nabasebenzi bekhomishini yezokhetho i-Independent Electoral Commission,“ usho kanje.Uthe angu-1 008 amavolontiya azolekelela ukulwa nobugebengu ajutshwe wuphiko lomnyango aphathiswe wona.Uthe kunamathimba alwa nobugebengu azohlala evivele ukuthi uma kunesigijimi esixwayisa ngokwenzeka endaweni ethile, anikele khona ngokushesha. UHlomuka uphinde waveza ukuthi kuzoba nezinkantolo eziyisipesheli ezizohlalela amacala aphuthumayo enenzeka ngesikhathi kuqhubeka ukhetho ukuqinisekisa ukuthi axazululwa ngokushesha.Uthe kunekomiti elihlanganisa wonke amaqembu ezepolitiki ukuqinisekisa ukuthi kuyabhekwana nezimo ezingaphazamisa uzinzo esifundazweni, kanti liyahlangana njalo ukubhekana nalezi zimo.Zingu-4 974 izikhungo zokuvotisa esifundazweni. Nakuba lesi sifundazwe sivakashelwa kakhulu amaqembu ezepolitiki ehlukene ukunxenxa amavoti, uHlomuka uthe kunenhlansi yokubekezelelana kwezepolitiki kwazise kuze kube manje njengoba zingeziningi izigameko ezibikiwe zodlame.  Uxwayise abasabalalisa izinto ezingamanga ezingaphehla udllame ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ukuthi bangase bathathelwe izinyathelo.Uqinisekise ukuthi imigwaqo eya ezikhungweni zokuvotisa isesimweni esigculisayo, wathi amathimba ezinhlekelele azobe emi ngomumo ukubhekana nazo zonke izimo zezulu.UHlomuka ubehambisana noKhomishana wamaPhoyisa esifundazweni, uLieutenant General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi, amncome ngokulwa nobugebengu esifundazweni.

AMANAZARETHA athi kufakazeleka isiphrofetho somsunguli webandla lakwaShembe, iNkosi Isaya Shembe, Umqaliwendlela ngokuqamba iLindamakhosi okuyithempeli lebandla elikwaNongoma njengoba kuzobhajadiswa iSilo uMisuzulu kaZwelithini ngeSonto kwaNongoma.ISilo sizobhajadiswa wuMholi wamaNazaretha, inkosi uMduduzi Shembe uNyazilwezulu.Okhulumela uNyazilwezulu, uMnuz Thokozani Mncwabe, uthe kuzoqopheka umlando kudumale izitha kubhajadiswa iSilo wuNyazi.Uthe kumanje kuqhubeka umhlangano wamaNazaretha oseLindamakhosi kwaNongoma, kodwa iSilo sizobhajadiselwa kwaKhangelamankengane okungaqhelelene naseLindamakhosi."UMqaliwendlela wathi kuseLindamakhosi. ISilo uMisuzulu kaZwelithini kuzoba iSilo sokuqala ukubhajadiswa sithatha inkolo yobuNazaretha. Sijabule kakhulu ngokuzokwenzeka futhi kuzoba ngumlando enkolweni yobuNazaretha kubhajadiswa iSilo. Izilo zaphambilini bezingayixwayi inkolo yobuNazaretha kodwa asikho sake sabhajadiswa saba yiNazaretha," kusho uMncwabe.Ngomcimbi wokubhajadiswa kweSilo uthe konke bazokuzwa ngoNyazilwezulu, akwaziyo ukuthiumbhabhadiso uzoba semini kwaKhangelamankengane. Ubudlelwano bamaNazaretha ngaphansi koNyazilwezulu buhlala bubuhle. NeSilo esesibuzile uZwelithini kaBhekuzulu ubehlala evakashelana noNyazilwezulu. Uma kunemigidi eNdlunkulu kuqala kunyathele amaNazaretha eholwa wuNyazilwezulu ukubusisa umcimbi ungakaqali. Noma amaNazaretha enyuka intaba eNgcwele uma kuqala unyaka iSilo siba yingxenye yalolu hambo olungcwele lokunyuka intaba.

KUMISWE amaphoyisa amabili abeyingxenye yezoqapha ukhetho, njengoba ezobhekana nokuqondiswa ubugwegwe ngenxa yokuziphatha kwawo.UMkhuzi wamaPhoyisa kwaZulu-Natal uLieutenant General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi ukhiphe umyalelo wokuthi kuthathelwe amaphoyisa amabili izinyathelo, ngokubonakala ephula umthetho wamaphoyisa ngendlela aziphathe ngayo nokwehlisa isithunzi samaphoyisa.Amaphoyisa asolwayo kuthiwa abonakale kwi-video egqoke umfaniswano wamaphoyisa, ehamba ngemoto yamaphoyisa yaseSundumbili, ethatha uzakwabo obengekho emsebenzini esikhungweni sokuvota egqoke nomfaniswano weqembu lepolitiki.Lokho kuholele ekutheni uMkhwanazi ayalele ukuthi lamaphoyisa asuswe ngokushesha ohlwini lwamaphoyisa aqaphe ukhetho. Uthe amaphoyisa kumele aziphathise okwamaphoyisa ngaso sonke isikhathi ahloniphe nesifungo angaphansi kwaso njengombutho wamaphoyisa aseNingizimu Afrika. “Sengikusho izikhathi eziningana lapha kwaZulu-Natal ukuthi amaphoyisa awaziphathise okwamaphoyisa ayekele ipolitiki kosopolitiki. Ngihlala ngikusho futhi ukuthi amaphoyisa angakhankaseli amaqembu epolitiki. Okwenziwe yila maphoyisa akwamukelekile futhi ukuziphatha kwawo kuwukubukela phansi umsebenzi osuwenziwe wokuqinisekisa ukuthi sibe nokhetho olukhululekile noluphephile. Uthe lamaphoyisa azoquliswa ngaphakathi emaphoyiseni ngokuziphatha kwawo,” kusho uLieutenant General Mkhwanazi.Amaphoyisa anxuswa ukuthi aphathe wonke amaqembu epolitiki ngokufana nangenhlonipho. Kuthiwa amaqembu awabike konke akubona kungahambi kahle emaphoyiseni futhi akekho ongaphezu komthetho. Amaphoyisa aphambana nomthetho kuthiwa kuthiwa azobhekana nemiphumela yomsebenzi wawo.

UNgqongqoshe wezemiDlalo, ubuCiko namaSiko kuzwelonke, uGayton McKenzie, uthi usekhiphe umyalelo wokuthi kudalulwe lonke uhla lwabathole imali emnyangweni wakhe.UMcKenzie ungene kulesi sikhundla ngemuva kokuthi uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ememezele iKhabhinethi yakhe entsha eyakhiwe ngohulumeni wobambiswano muva nje.I have given an instruction that a list be published of all Artist, Creatives & Sports people who have been receiving money from the Department of Sport, Arts & Culture be published inclusive of amounts & reasons. The time where only a select connected few benefit is over.UMcKenzie ubhale ekhasini lakhe lika-X ngoMsombuluko ekuseni ngesinqumo asithathile.“Sengikhiphe umyalelo wokuthi kushicilelwe uhla lwawo wonke amaciko nabezemidlalo abebethola imali eMnyangweni wezemiDlalo, ubuCiko namaSiko kuvezwe nemali kanjalo nezizathu,” kubhala uMcKenzie.“Isikhathi sokuthi kuhlomule ingcosana eyazana nabantu siphelile,” kuqhuba yena.Lo mbhalo ubukeka uthinte abaningi njengoba abanye bese bephawula bekhombisa ukusithakasela isimemezelo.MamaJoy right now pic.twitter.com/LXqskggeuUInvestigate Natasha's grant/ bursary. ABALIMI bamazambane bathi ngeke anele abantu bakuleli okungenani izinyanga ezimbili ngoba izitshalo zabo zaphazanyiswa yisithwathwa.ITransvaal Agricultural Union of South Africa (TLU), iveze ukuthi abalimi bamazambane eLimpopo, yibona abashayeke kakhulu kanti lokhu kuzophazamisa isivuno samazambane.ITLU ibicwaninga ngomonakalo odalwe yisithwathwa kusukela esontweni lesibili likaJulayi.Esitatimendeni esithunyelwe abezindaba uMnuz Henk Van de Graaf onguSihlalo we-TLU North Region, uthe amazambane amaningi adayiswa kuleli atshalwa eLimpopo. Wathi bayakhala abalimi babo abaseLevubu, Marble Hall, Arabie, Vivo naseBela-Bela bathi izitshalo zahlaselwa yisithwathwa zase ziyamosheka.“Ucwaningo lwethu luveza ukuthi kuzoshoda amazambane ngoba yiwona ashayeke kakhulu, namanye amaveji athintekile okubalwa utamatisi. Abalimi babuye bakhala ngokuthi kumosheke nengqalasizinda yamanzi. Abalimi bamazambane bashayekile nangokudlule ngenxa yesimo sezulu,” kuchaza uVan de Graaf.Ucele izikhungo ezibolekisa ngemali ukuthi zingabahluphi abalimi ngoba basazoyidinga imali yokutshala kabusha.Ucele nongqongqoshe wezoLimo ukuthi angenelele ngoba uma isimo sezulu siphazamisa abalimi kusho ukuthi kuzophazamiseka ukuba khona kokudla ezweni. Ubalule ukuthi izambane liphekwa yiwo wonke umuntu kusukela kompofu kuya kocebile ngakho ukungabikhona kwamazambane enele kuzozwela.IPotatoes South Africa, idalule ukuthi intengo yamazambane ingase inyuke ngenxa yokuncishiswa kwesikalo samanzi okufanele sisetshenziswe ngabalimi.Ithe abalimi bamazambane badinga amanzi ngakho ukuncishiswa kwesikalo samanzi kuzoba nomthelela omubi ekulinyweni kwawo.

KUZOVALWA imigwaqo eseduze kweNkosi Albert Luthuli International Convention Centre (ICC) njengoba kuza umbukiso omkhulukazi wezokuvakasha, i-Africa’s Travel Indaba.UMasipala weTheku uthe umgwaqo uWalnut uzobe uvalwe thaqa njengoba kuza umbukiso kanti izimoto ezisuka kuBram Fischer naku-Dr AB Xuma ngeke zikwazi ukuhamba kulo mgwaqo.Imigwaqo iqale ukuvalwa ngoMsombuluko 6 Meyi kuya kuMeyi 20.Eminye imigwaqo ezophazamiseka uStalwart Simelane, Samora Machel, Or Tambo Parade, Boscombe Terrace noPlayfair.Umasipala ucele abashayeli bezimoto ukuthi basebenzise eminye imigwaqo ngalesi sikhathi.I-Africa’s Travel Indaba izohanjelwa ngabantu abangaphezu kuka-9 000 kusukela ngoMeyi 13 kuya kuMeyi 16.Kuzobe kukhona osomabhizinisi abancane abawu-120 abazozikhangisa nabanye abavela emazweni awu-26 ase-Afrika.UColonel Boysie Zungu okhulumela amaphoyisa kaMasipala weTheku uthe ukuvalwa kwemigwaqo kuzoqinisekisa ukuthi i-Africa’s Travel Indaba ihamba kahle.“Kuzobe kutshalwe amaphoyisa kamasipala kuwo wonke amakhona eTheku. Isimo sizobe sisiqaphe ngeso lokhozi ngoba Indaba ihanjelwa ngabantu abavela emazweni ahlukene. Kuzobe kukhona izikhulu zohulumeni, abathengi bamazwe, izinhatheli nezinye izivakashi,” kusho uZungu.IMeya yeTheku, uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda, ithembise ukuthi konke kuzohamba kahle ngoba iTheku linomlando wokuba nemicimbi esezingeni lomhlaba.Ugqugquzele abantu baseThekwini nabasembonini yezokuvakasha ukuba bamukele izivakashi ngezandla ezifudumele.

INHLANZI izoshelwa amanzi kwizaphulamthetho, nasemigwaqweni engothelawayeka eThekwini, emva kokwengezwa komacekeceke bezimoto zamaphoyisa ezinesivinini esiphezulu.ITheku lengeze izimoto eziwu-50 okubalwa kuzona ama-VW Golf 8 GTI, ama-Ford Ranger namaveni kwa-Isuzu.Ngonyaka owedlule, ngoNovemba, la maphoyisa ethule izimoto zawo ezintsha amaToyota Cross awu-50.Sezizonke izimoto ezintsha zalawa maphoyisa ezithengiwe zingaphezu kuka-150.UKhomishana wamaPhoyisa kaMasipala waseThekwini, uSibonelo Mchunu, uthe bazokhuculula izigebengu, abantu abashayela budlabha nalabo abafunwayo.Uqhube wathi inhloso enkulu ukuba banciphise ubugebengu futhi amaphoyisa abonakale kulezo zindawo ezithathwa ngokuthi zinobugebengu obuxakile.Udalule ukuthi iTheku lihleli endaweni yesithupha komasipala abakhulukazi emhlabeni jikelele ngokuba nesibalo esiphezulu sobugebengu. Uthe ufuna kushaye unyaka ozayo usubonakala umehluko,  sebengale kukanombolo 20.“Njengamanje singaphansi kwamadolobha iGoli, iTshwane noMgungungundlovu ohleli endaweni yokuqala. Asihleli siyasebenza. Sifuna ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi buyancipha ubugebengu,” kuchaza uMchunu.Mayelana nokuqashwa wamaphoyisa amasha alo mkhandlu, ukwengeza esibalweni esikhona, uMchunu uthe iyabhubhudla inkezo.Phambilini uMchunu watshela Isolezwe  ukuthi umasipala ungemuva esibalelweni samaphoyisa okumele ngabe unawo. UMchunu uthe njengamanje babalelwa ku-487 abaqeqeshwayo emakolishi okuzothi uma kuqala amaholidi kaDisemba, babe sebesensimini besebenza.Uhlawumbisele esikhathini esingamasonto ayisithupha kusukela manje, wathi lawa maphoyisa azobe eseluphothulile uqeqesho.Kwenzeka lokhu nje, uNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa, uMnuz Senzo Mchunu, iMeya yeTheku uMnuz Cyril Xaba, ubuholi bamaphoyisa eSAPS kuzwelonke, esifundazweni naweTheku, buhlanganise amakhanda buzama ukuthola ikhambi lobugebengu obuxakile eThekwini.

ZITHWELE kanzima izingane ezimbili ezabona unina egwazwa ebulawa yisoka lakhe ngo-Okthoba ngonyaka odlule, eMorningside eThekwini.Lokhu kuvezwe nguNkk Thandi Phohlo, ongunina kamufi, uNksz Dima Phohlo (31) okusolwa ukuthi wabulawa ngesihluku yisoka lakhe, uMnuz Mhleli Ndaba (31).Lesi sehlakalao kuthiwa senzeka ngemuva kwengxabano eyayishubile phakathi kwabo.Izingane okukhulunywa ngazo kuvela ukuthi ngabafana omunye uneminyaka emithathu, omunye unemihlanu.Izolo umsolwa ubevele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini. Unina kamufi uzwakalise ukukhathazeka kwakhe ngabazukulu bakhe wathi njalo ebusuku abalali baxoxa ngabakubona ngosuku lwesigameko."Iyangikhathaza impilo esiphilwa ngabazukulu bami. Baxoxa ngakho konke abakubona  ngalelo langa. Baze basitshele nokuthi isehlakalo saqala senzeka ngaphakathi endlini kwaze kwaphunyelwa ngaphandle,'' usho kanje.Uthe akagculisekile ngendlela izinto ezenzeka ngayo kuleli cala.Ukhale ngokuthi icala lihlehliswa njalo ekubeni kumhlukumeza nokuza njalo enkantolo. "Sengiqala nokulilahla manje ithemba ngokuthi bukhona ubulungiswa obuzokwenzeka kuleli cala. Lihlehliswa njalo kanti kunjalo nje angiboni kahle nokuthi kwenziwani,'' usho kanje ekhononda.Uthe akekho nje enkantolo ozihluphayo ngokuxhumana nabo ngakho konke okuqhubekayo.Umshushisi, u-Advocate Calvin Govender, utshele inkantolo ukuthi icala selisesigabeni sokuthi manje selingaqala ukuthi liqulwe.Kuthiwa umufi kwathi uma ebona ukuthi umsolwa uyamlimaza wabalekela emnyango, kodwa wamjaha waze wamfica waqhubeka nokumgwaza esesemnyango.Enkantolo kuvele ukuthi kunemifanekiso eqoshiwe eveza umsolwa ebulala umufi ngesihluku.Umsolwa ungaphandle ngebheyili ka-R20 000. Icala lihlehliselwe uMeyi 10 ukuze liqale ukuqulwa.Ibheyili yakhe inombandela wokuthi angalinge aphazamise uphenyo futhi angasondeli eduze kwabantwana bakhe.Phambilini umsolwa watshela inkantolo ukuthi lokhu wayekwenza ngoba wayehlose ukuthi azivikele kumufi.IMantshi, uXolile Manjeza, ivumile ukuthi icala lihlehle ukuze ngokuzayo liqale ukuqulwa.

UHULUMENI waKwaZulu-Natal usamukele futhi wasishayela ihlombe isigwebo esiyingqophamlando seminyaka engu-23 esinikezwe umshayeli weloli elabulala abantu abangu-20 oPhongolo ngoSepthemba 2022.INkantolo eNkulu yasoPhongolo igwebe uSibusiso Siyaya (30) ngoLwesine.Ubekade ethweswe amacala angu-22 okukhona nawokubulala angu-20 engozi eyenzeka kuthelawayeka uN2 eGodlwayo, oPhongolo.Kwelokushayela budedengu, ugwetshwe iminyaka emithathu, elokuhluleka ukusiza abagilwa nokubika ingozi wagwetshwa eyisithupha. Uzozidonsa umkanye lezigwebo.USiyaya uphinde wagwetshwa iminyaka engu-14 ngamacala okubulala abekade ethweswe wona futhi akakulungele ukuba nezincwadi zokushayela, aphucwe zona. Inkantolo ithe ingu-20 iminyaka azoyibhadla ejeleOkhulumela uMnyango wezokuThutha KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Kwanele Ncalane uthe ukugwetshwa kukaSiyaya ngale ndlela kuyigxathu elikhulu kwezobulungiswa.“Kuzohamba ibanga elide ekuhlwayeleni imbewu entsha kubashayeli ukuthi bafunde ukuthi ubumqoka bokugcinwa kwemithetho yemigwaqo bungakanani.”Ukugwetshwa kukaSiyaya kuzokwenza nemindeni iphole amanxeba,” kusho uNcalane.UNcalane uthe nabanye abashayeli kuhlanganisa nabamaloli kumele bafunde isifundo kule ngozi.“(Isinqumo sizosiza) nokubuyekeza imithetho yemigwaqo ezweni ukuze iqine kakhulu kunakuqala.“Abashayeli mabaqonde ukuthi ubudedengu babo bungaholela ekutheni kuvaleke imizi eminingi,” kusho uNcalane.Uphiko lezokushushisa iNational Prosecuting Authority KwaZulu-Natal isamukelile isinqumo senkantolo esiyingqophamlando.UMbuso obuholwa uMshushisi u-Advocate Krishen Shah ubize ofakazi abawu-12 okukhona nochwepheshe nobamakhamera ayeselolini.Abashona babe neminyaka ephakathi kwemihlanu kuya kwengu-28 iningi labo kungabafundi. Emuva kwengozi uSiyaya wadla phansi kodwa wagcina eboshiwe ngosuku lwesigameko uSepthemba 16.

UTHWESWE amacala ngokusemthethweni uBafana Mahungela osolwa ngokubulala uthisha waseGoli uKirsten Kluyts. Lo msolwa ubhekene namacala amahlanu, okukhona kuwona ukuthumba, ukuphanga esebenzisa isihluku, ukubulala, ukuhlukumeza ngokocansi kanye nokuphazamisa ukusebenza kwengalo yomthetho.Umufi wayeyingxenye yomqhudelwano wokugijima i-MyRun, eGeorge Lea Park, ekupheleni kuka-Okthoba, isidumbu sakhe satholwa onqenqemeni lwepaki. UMahungela wabonwa endaweni yesigameko lapho kwabulawa khona ubufakazi beCCTV okuthiwa buveza ukuthi weqa isango elikhiyiwe ukuze abaleke.Ngemuva kokuthweswa amacala, idokodo libe selidluliselwa enkantolo enkulu yaseGoli lapho kulindeleke ukuthi kuqale izethulo zokuqulwa kwecala ngomhla ka16 Agasti nonyaka.U-Advocate Itumeleng Masako, omele uBafana Mahungela, uzwakalise ukukhathazeka ngokuthi incwadi yecala iyahluleka ukudalula yonke imininingwane edingekayo nebalulekile njengoba kudingeka. Uthi uma kubhekwa ubunzima bokusebenza kohlelo, mancane amathuba okuthi ukulalelwa kwezethulo ngaphambi kokuqulwa kwecala kuqhubeke ngokuthanda koMbuso. Ummeli wakhe ucele izinsuku zikamhla ka-1 no-2 Agasti ukuba afake isicelo esisha sebheyili ngezethulo ezintsha.

KWEHLILE ukukhathazeka kwabezikole ezifundisa ukushayela KwaZulu-Natal, uhulumeni esifundazweni ememezela uhlu lwabangu-4 000 abahlomule ohlelweni lokufundiswa mahhala ukushayela, iThuthuka DriverTraining Programme.Lokhu kushiwo nguMnuz Mzwandile “MG” Zondi, okhulumela inhlangano yezikole ezifundisa ukushayela, iKZN Ubumbano Driving Schools Operators Association ngeSonto.UZondi uthe isimemezelo sikahulumeni sango-Okthoba nyakenye, sokuthi uzofundisa mahhala isibalo esithile sentsha nabangasebenzi izincwadi zokushayela, sibalimazile ezinyangeni ezine ezedlule.“Kulezi zinyanga ezine ezedlule sibone zehla izibalo zabantu ebebezobhalisela ukufundiswa ukushayela ezikoleni ezehlukene ezikufundisayo esifundazweni. Lokhu bekwenzeka ngoba inqwaba yafaka izicelo ukuhlomula kulolu hlelo,” kusho uZondi.Uveza ukuthi abantu abaningi bebemanqikanqika ukuthi babhalise, ngoba kubhaliswa ngesamba esithile semali.“Abantu bebengafuni ukugembula ngemali yabo, bayifake kithi bebhalisa, kanti umuntu uzokhethwa kulolu hlu oluzohlomula ohlelweni lukahulumeni,” kuchaza uZondi.Uqhube wathi bayalweseka lolu hlelo lukahulumeni ngoba izikole eziyinani elithize zizohlomula ezindaweni ezehlukene.“Uhulumeni uzobafundisa kuzo izikole zethu, ngaleyo ndlela abalezo zikole ezizokhethwa ukuthi zifundise laba abahlomulile, bazohlomula nabo kulolu hlelo,” kwenaba uZondi.Ngesikhathi ethula ngokusemthethweni lolu hlelo uNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube ngoMashi 1, wathi abahlomule kulo bakhethwe kuzo zonke izifunda zesifundazwe, wathi kukhethwe entsheni kanjalo nalabo abangasebenzi ukubeseka nokubanika ikhono lokushayela elizosiza njengoba beqhubeka nokufuna imisebenzi

ELULWE ngamahora amahlanu, amahora  okusebenza kwamahhovisi oMnyango wezaseKhaya ngemiGqibelo kuze  kushaye usuku lokuvota. UMnyango wezaseKhaya,  uthe amahhovisi awo azovulwa ngemiGqibelo kusukela ngo-8  ekuseni kuze kushaye u-1 emini okuqale ngoMgqibelo esiphuma kuwo  kuze kube uMeyi 25.UMnyango wezaseKhaya esitatimendeni osithumelele abezindaba, uthe amahhovisi azobe evuliwe azokwazi ukuxazulula izinkinga zezinombolo zomazisi  ezifanayo ezisetshenziswa ngabantu abangaphezulu koyedwa, kuchitshiyelwa imininingwane ethile kubo omazisi, ukulungiswa kwabo, omazisi abakhomba ukuthi abanikazi bashonile bebe bengashonanga bazolungiswa uma kunamaphepha aphelele akhomba ukuthi abanikazi bawo bayaphila, ukufakwa kwezicelo ezintsha zomazisi, nomazisi besikhashana. Iphini likaNgqongqoshe wezaseKhaya, uMnuz Njabulo Nzuza, lithe kuzobe kunamahhovisi angomahamba nendlwana ahlelelwe ukuthi ahambise omazisi ezindaweni ezikude namahhovisi.“Sizosebenzisa amahhovisi amakhansela, neminye iminyango esisebenzisana nayo ukuze silethe usizo eduze kodwa umphakathi uzokwaziswa ngezinsuku  esizofika ngazo ezindaweni ezihlonziwe. Ngaphezu kwalokho, izakhamuzi zisengabhukha isikhathi sokuzolanda ama-Smart ID Cards kanye nezincwadi zomazisi abaluhlaza ngaphambi kokuvakashela emahhovisi ngokusebenzisa i-Branch Appointment Booking System , etholakala kwi-website yoMnyango wezaseKhaya i-www.dha.gov.za, noma bavakashele emahhovisi ngaphandle kokubhukha,” kusho uNzuza.Unxuse abafake izicelo zomazisi ikakhulukazi intsha eqalayo ukuzifaka ukuba beze emahhovisi omnyango bazolanda omazisi babo.

ISIKHULU se-IEC KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Ntombifuthi Masinga, sithi benze konke okusemandleni ukulungiselela ukhetho futhi sebemi ngomumo.UNkk Masinga ubekhuluma ngesikhathi kwethulwa ngokusemthethweni isikhungo semiphumela yokhetho izolo okuyi-ICC, eThekwini. Kulindeleke ukuthi izwe lube nokhetho lukazwelonke olubhekwe ngabomvu ngoLwesithathu oluzayo.Ukhetho lwangesonto elizayo luzobe luqoka uhulumeni wehlandla lesikhombisa kusukela ngo-1994. Kunjalo nje nonyaka kuphela iminyaka engu-30 yombuso wentando yabantu.Kubonakele ukuthi isikhungo semiphumela sesimi ngomumo sekufakwe bonke ubuxhakaxhaka besimanje. UNkk Masinga uthe baneziteshi zokuvota eziwu-4 974 esifundazweni, eziwu-117 ezesikhashana. Uthe iziteshi eziyisishiyagalolunye  ezingomahamba nendlwana. Wathi kukhona ezingu-35 ezizobe zibhekene nabazovota besemajele.UNkk Masinga uthe bangu-5.7 million abantu ababhalisele ukuvota KwaZulu-Natal, bazoba namaphepha anele ukuthi bavotise bonke abantu abafisayo. Uthe akushintshe lutho ngesikhathi sokusebenza, izikhungo zizovulwa ngo-7 ekuseni zivalwe ngo-9 ebusuku.Kukhunjuzwe abantu ukuthi baphathe omazisi babo uma sebeyovota ezikhungweni futhi bavote lapho ababhalise khona. Uthe abantu abazovunyelwa ukuvota lapho bengabhalisanga khona, yilabo abafake izicelo zalokho ngaphambi kwesikhathi.Kulindeleke ukuthi ngoMsombuluko kuqale kuvote labo ababhalisele ukuvota ngokukhethekile kuze kukapakele kuLwesibili. Kuyothi ngoLwesithathu bese kuvulwa izikhungo kuvote uwonkewonke.UNkk Masinga uthe angu-33 amaqembu angenele ukhetho KwaZulu-Natal, azodlana imilala ngoLwesithathu ngoMeyi 29, uma sekuvotwa. UNkk Masinga ubengahambi yedwa kodwa bekukhona noMnuz Glen Mashini, onguSihlalo we-IEC kuzwelonke. UMashini ugcizelele ubumqoka bokuba nokhetho olukhulekile.UMashini unxuse abantu bakuleli ukuthi balekelele ukuthi ukhetho luhambe kahle bahloniphe yonke imiyalelo babambisane ne-IEC.IPhini loMkhuzi wamaPhoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uMajor General Phumelele Makhoba, lithe nabo bami ngomumo ukuqapha ukhetho. Uthe kuzoba namaphoyisa kuzo zonke izikhungo bese kuba nalezo zindawo abazihlonzile abazoziqapha ngokuthe thuthu.UNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube, uncome i-IEC nezinye izinhlaka ngokubambisana ngezinhlelo zokhetho. Uthe nabo bewuhulumeni wesifundazwe bazinikele ekutheni balekelele ukuze  ukhetho lube yimpumelelo.Umcimbi ubuthanyelwe nayilabo abamele amaqembu ezepolitiki esifundazweni. Kubonakele nezokuphepha ziqinile esikhungweni futhi kuthiwa sizohlala sigadiwe.

UKUBEKWA kwemfuyo umaka kuseyiyona ndlela ebonakala ingaba wusizo ekuvikeleni ukwebiwa kwayo.Lokhu kushiwo uMphathiswa wezoLimo KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Super Zuma ngesikhathi umnyango wethula omaka abasha asebezosebenza kulesi sifundazwe.Lo luhlelo ulwethule izolo ngaphansi kukaMasipala iNkosi Langalibalele maphakathi nesifundazwe. UZuma uthe ukubhalwa komaka abasha kuzosiza ekutheni imfuyo eyebiwe isheshe ihlonzwe  nabanikazi bayo bayithole ngokushesha. UMnuz Sibusiso Ndlovu wediphu iBolohweni okuyinhlangano yabafuyi   baseLoskop, oke webelwa imfuyo izikhathwu ezimbili uthe kumlahlekisele ngemali ngoba ukufuya kuyibhizinisi.“Ngo-2022 amasela athathe izinkomo ezingu-12. Ngonyaka odlule ngo-Agasti nangoNovemba, ngalahlekelwa yizimbuzi nezinkomo eziyisi-7 ngokulandelana kwazo.“Kwakubuhlungu ukubona izinkomo zami zithathwa kimi. Kungithathe iminyaka ukuqongelela imali yokuthenga ezinye.“Ngomzuzwana ngalahlekelwa yikho konke. Iyangikhuthaza imizamo yomnyango yokunqanda ukwebiwa kwemfuyo. Njengabafuyi sifuna ukubona amasela ebhekana nomthetho,” kusho uNdlovu.UGeneral Khumalo wasesiteshini samaphoyisa i-Upper Tugela, uthe liyakhathaza izinga eliphezulu lokwebiwa kwemfuyo kule ndawo, amanye amacala okwebiwa kwemfuyo aholela ekubulaweni kwabantu.“Kuyadumaza ukubona ukuzimisela kwalezi zigebengu. Kuke kwaba nezikhathi lapho ubusela buholele ekutheni kubulawe abalimi. Ngikholelwa ekutheni ukubulawa kwabantu okungenasidingo bekungeke kwenzeke ukuba besisebenzisana.“Kuwo wonke amacala esikwaze ukubopha kuwo besisizwa ngamalungu omphakathi asinike umkhondo. Sidinga abantu abaningi ukuthi basisize ukuze sinqobe lezi zigebengu.“Siyayibonga imizamo yomnyango futhi sizosebenzisana nawo ukuze siqede ukwebiwa kwemfuyo,” kusho uKhumalo.Inkosi Sifiso Shinga enguSihlalo weNdlu yabaHoli boMdabu KwaZulu-Natal  ithe amasela eba imfuyo, aphuca izizukulwane ifa lazo. “Isifundazwe sonke siyahlushwa ngamasela emfuyo.Kubuhlungu ukubona imindeni ilahlekelwa yingcebo yayo. Lezi zigebengu zinonya, siyameseka  uhulumeni emizamweni yakhe yokuqeda lobu bugebengu.“Ngicela umphakathi usebenzisane namaphoyisa ukuze kuboshwe amasela,” kusho Inkosi uShinga.

UKWENZA inzuzo ngebhizinisi lezolimo nokusabalalisa ulwazi ngezinye zezinto abalimi abancane abafisa ukugxila kuzo ukuze kukhule umnotho.Lokhu kushiwo uMnuz Sya Ngcobo wenkampani iSyajay Agricultural Services okuyinkampani esungulwe intsha ebifunda ezolimo e-Owen Sithole Agricultural College, ngesikhathi uNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube noMphathiswa wezoLimo, uMnuz Super Zuma, bethula uhlelo lwentuthuko edidiyelwe yezolimo i-Integrated Agricultural Development Programme, eRichmond.Le nkampani ihlomule nezinsiza ezibiza ngaphezu kukaR5 million, yathengelwa amathaneli namafriji okugcina imikhiqizo okuzophuma kwi-Agribusiness  Development Agency (ADA).UNdunankulu noMphathiswa banikeze abafuyi izinkunzi nogandaganda abangaphezulu kuka-1 128 okudle uR17 million.Undunankulu uthe kumele kube nezindlela zokulekelela abalimi abasafufusa bakhule baze bafinyelele ezingeni lokuthi balime noma bafuyele ukudayisa.“Uma benikwe ithuba abalimi nabafuyi abasathuthuka bangakwazi ukuba nemikhiqizo eminingi, balandele izindlela eziyizo zokukhiqiza baphinde bonge imvelo,” kusho uNkk Dube-Ncube.UZuma uthe ukunikwa kwabalimi lezi zinsiza kuzokwenza ukuthi bakwazi ukukhiqiza kakhulu bakwazi nokushintshashintsha izitshalo nokuyinto evame ukuba inselelo kubo.Uthe uMnyango wezoLimo uzinikele ekutheni usize abalimi ukuze bathole izimakethe ngohlelo lwawo olwaziwa ngeRadical Agrarian Sociao-Economic Transformation (RASET).

KUVELE ukuthi lalizivikela isosha elibhekene necala lokudubula amahlandla ayisithupha libulale inkosikazi yalo ePinetown, ngoJanuwari, nonyaka.Lokhu kuvezwe u-Advocate Muzi Mzelemu ongummeli kaMnuz Lwanda Zungu, ngesikhathi enza izendlalelo zokuqala kokuqulwa kwecala eNkantolo yesiFunda yasePinetown.UZungu usolwa ngokubulala inkosikazi yakhe, uNkk Tania Msani-Zungu, phambi kwezingane zabo.Inkantolo ibeke izinsuku ezimbili uNovemba 25 no-26 nonyaka okulindeleke ukuthi kuqulwe ngazo icala.Unina kamufi, uNkk Gwen Msani, ube nakho ukuthuka ngesikhathi ezwa uMzelemu enkantolo ekhuluma ngokuthi uZungu wayekade ezivikela.“Kuyangithusa ukuthi umuntu owabulala ingane yami manje usethi wayekade ezivikela kuyona. Kusho ukuthi isibhamu saqale saphathwa ingane yami? Ithinta ubufakazi bami le nto njengomuntu owayekade ekhona endlini kwenzeka isigameko,” kusho uNkk Msani.Uqhube wathi ubufakazi obufunwa inkantolo obufaka phakathi izithombe zendawo yesigameko yibona obuzoveza iqiniso.Lo wesifazane uthe uyakweshwama okushiwo uZungu futhi awukho umsindo wokuhilizisana kwabantu ababebanga okuthile owawukhona.Uthe uZungu nommeli wakhe bayazidlalela ngoba ekugcineni lizovela obala iqiniso ukuthi umufi wayengalwi kodwa wavele wabulawa.Enkantolo kwavela ukuthi babungesebuhle ubudlelwano balaba abaganene ababusiswe ngabantwana ababili.Inkantolo yasichitha isicelo sebheyili sikaZungu, yakhala ngokuthi uyabazi abanye ofakazi ngakho iyabaphephisa. UZungu wazinikela emaphoyiseni eqhutshwa ummeli wakhe emuva kwezinsukwana kwenzeke isigameko. Wacela ibheyili ethi ufuna ukuqhubeka ondle abantwana bakhe abathathu, ababili babo abazala nomufi.

OMELE i-DA embangweni wesikhundla sikandunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Chris Pappas, uthi uzosebenzisa yona kanye le mali ekhwatshaniswa eminyangweni kahulumeni ukutakula abahlwempu uma benqoba ukhetho KwaZulu-Natal.UPappas uthe bazosebenzisa imali esashazwa kuthengelwa izikhulu izimoto zikanokusho ukuqhamuka nezinhlelo zokutakula abahlwempu.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi enengxoxo ekhethekile neSolezwe, lapho ebekhuluma khona ngomkhankaso wakhe wokuhola iKwaZulu-Natal.UPappas uthe yiningi imali emosheka ngenxa yenkohlakalo eminyangweni kahulumeni.“Le mali iyona okufanele engabe iya ekufezeni izidingo zabantu abahlwempu. Uma sekuphethe thina izophela le nto yokuthi izikhulu zigadwe yinqwaba yabantu.”Ezinhlelweni zakhe zokutakula abahlwempu, uPappas ufuna ukuthi omama bezingane baqale ukuhola besakhulelwe, ukukhuphula izibonelelo zikahulumeni, intela ingafakwa ekudleni okuthengwa kakhulu abahlwempu, nokunika abafuna imisebenzi imali yokugibela.“Abantu kufanele bazi ukuthi ingane iqala ukukhula isesesiswini. Ngakho ke omama kufanele basheshe ukuqala ukuhola. Izibonelelo zikahulumeni azilingani nemali edingwa umuntu ukuze angabulawa indlala. Intela efakwa ezintweni ezifana namafutha namaqanda, yenza ukuthi abantu abahlwempu bangakwazi ukuthenga ukudla. Kanjalo nabantu abafuna imisebenzi kufanele bathole uxhaso.”UPappas uphinde abeke phambili ukudalwa kwamathuba emisebenzi, ukuthuthukiswa komnotho, ukulwa nobugebengu, nokuhanjiswa kwezidingo.UPappas uthe akakhulumi inganekwane uma ethi uzotakula iKwaZulu-Natal.UPappas uthe abangakholwa ukuthi uzokwazi ukushintsha isimo sesifundazwe, ababuke umsebenzi omuhle awenzile ngesikhathi eqokwa njengemeya yoMasipala waseMngeni.UPappas waqokwa kwesobumeya ngo-2021.Uthe wafika isimo sisibi emkhandlwini, wathi basishintshile isimo ngokushesha.“Emkhandlwini wethu, isimo sezimali besingahambi kahle. Kule minyaka emibili nengxenye, silungise isimo sezimali. Sesithole imibiko kamcwaningi mabhuku engenagcobho kulandelana. Lokhu kusho ukuthi siyakwazi ukuphatha imali yomkhandlu.“Ukuhanjiswa kwezidingo nakho sekubuyele esimweni. Phela singakhohlwa ukuthi inhloso ngukuthi abantu kufanele bathole izidingo ekugcineni. Ngicabanga ukuthi sekuyinto eyejwayelekile ukubuka omasipala behlulwa ukuhambisa izidingo kubantu. Thina lapha eMngeni siyakhombisa ukuthi omasipala kufanele bahambise izidingo kubantu.”UPappas uthe ukuphatha kahle kwabo uMasipala waseMngeni kwenza ukuthi umkhankaso wabo waKwaZulu-Natal ube lula.“Kuqala bekuba nzima uma sikhankasa lapha KwaZulu-Natal ngoba abantu uma besibuza ukuthi siyakwazi yini ukuphatha, ibingekho indawo eseduze esiyiphethe ebesibakhombisa ngayo ukuthi siyakwazi ukuphatha. Besilokhu sibatshela ngezindawo ezikude esiziphethe, sithi ababuke kuzona. “Manje sesivele sibatshele ukuthi ababuke eMngeni. Lena yindawo eseduze nabo, abangakwazi ukuziyela, beyoyibona. Enye into ebisilimaza ukuthi besikhankasa kakhulu eCape Town naseGoli. Manje sesiyazi ukuthi kufanele sikhankase nasezindaweni zasemakhaya.”UPappas uthe umkhankaso wabo uphinde ulekelelwe ukwehluleka kobuholi obuphethe iKwaZulu-Natal.“Ukwehluleka kwabo kwenza ukuthi abantu babone ukuthi sekufanele bashintshe ivoti labo. Phela abantu baKwaZulu-Natal abasabi ukushintsha ivoti. Bake bakwenza lokhu ngaphambilini, bakhipha i-IFP. Namanje abantu bazophinde bakwenze lokho. Lapha KwaZulu-Natal sidinga abaholi abaqotho.” UPappas uthe iDA ikhombisa ukukhula KwaZulu-Natal.“Siyiqembu elikhula ukhetho nokhetho lapha KwaZulu-Natal. Nathi sibalwa kanye namanye amaqembu amakhulu lapha KwaZulu-Natal. Buka nje ngoMgqibelo sizokuba nomcimbi omkhulu eThekwini, eCurries Fountein, lapho silindele khona abantu abangu-10 000. Yebo asikafiki ezingeni lokugcwalisa iMabhida kodwa nayo le nkundla esizoyisebenzisa inomlando onothile emzabalazweni wamalungelo abantu.”UPappas uthe umbango ushisa phansi KwaZulu-Natal.“Maningi amaqembu aqhamukile lapha KwaZulu-Natal. Angiboni kuneqembu elizothola u-50%. I-MK ibikade ize kabi kodwa manje sebeyaxabana kakhulu. Ngibona kuzokuba iyona i-MK, ithina, i-IFP ne-ANC, mhlawumbe ne-EFF, abazothola amavoti amaningi.”

KUDLA lubi ukusetshenziswa kwesidakamizwa i-Cocaine, edume ngentashi emalokishini, okuthiwa imvamisa ibhenywa omacaphunakusale ngenxa yokumba kwayo eqolo.Umqondisi wenhlangano elwa nokusetshenziswa kwezidakamizwa i-South African National Council on Alcoholism and Drug Dependence, eThekwini, uNkk Fathima Hussain ekhuluma ne-SABC, uthe ukusetshenziswa kwalolu hlobo lwesidakamizwa kwenyuke cishe ngo-32% ngonyakamali odlule.Ukusho lokhu emva kokuthi ngoLwesibili, amaphoyisa ophiko loKlebe  evundulule inqwaba yalolu hlobo lwesidakamizwa okuthiwa singabiza u-R15 million  emkhunjini obusechwebeni eliseRichards Bay.UMnuz Mbongiseni Msomi owumsunguli wenhlangano eluleka asebeyimulutha yezidakamizwa abafisa ukuphuma kuzo, iLaqhakaza Iphara Recovery Organization engxoxweni  neSolezwe, uthe iningi labasuke bezocela usizo, abavela ezindaweni ezakhelene nedolobha iTheku abalule kuzona i-Durban North okuyindawo ehlala abantu abanemali.“Lolu hlobo lwesidakamizwa sisetshenziswa abantu ababukeka benemali futhi iningi labo abafundile.  Isikhwanyana esincane esenela inkinobho yehembe, ngo-2019 ngigcina ukusibona, besibiza u-R500, cishe sesikhuphuke kakhulu manje. Imvamisa abantu abafika bezofuna usizo, basuke sebenenkinga yemali, omunye esecwile ezikweletini ngendlela emangalisayo, njengoba uma sesikungene kahle egazini ungasibhema noma ikathathu ngosuku,” usho kanje.Uthe abazisebenzisayo akulula ukuthi babonakale njengoba iningi lapho lingabantu ababukeka bephumelele, abagqoka kahle futhi abahloniphekile ngenxa yemisebenzi abayenzayo noma iqhaza abanalo emphakathini. Uveze ukuthi osomabhizinisi abadlondlobele nabo bagcina bedla lesi sidakamizwa esishaya kuzwele ephaketheni.“Okunye ngaso ukuthi sinomona, asisebenziseki nolunye uhlobo lwesidakamizwa. Umuntu ungamfica ephethe ikani likabhiya endaweni yobumnandi kuze kuse engaliqedile ngoba usuke ebheme sona. Uma sibuza ababhema intashi ukuthi yimuphi umuzwa abasuke abanawo uma sebeyisebenzisile, baveza ukuthi ibanika umdlandla kanti bazizwa behlala benomuzwa wenjabulo ephuphumayo nje emva kokubhema,” kusho uMsomiUthe imvamisa abantu abasisebenzisayo baneminyaka esuka ku-19 kuyaphezulu. Uthe abanye asebengenwe kahle yilesi sidakamizwa abafika kuyena baveza ukuthi sebesebenzise imali mhlawumbe abebeyilondolozele izinhlelo ezithile zokuthuthukisa imindeni, noma sebedayise impahla ebalulekile kubalwa imizi nezimoto ngenxa yokungena shi ezindlekweni. Izingane ezishiyelwe amafa ngabazali imvamisa zigcina imali ziyibhubhudle ngaso.Uveze ukuthi sehluke kakhulu kulezi ezinye, ngakho umzali akulula ukuthi asheshe aqaphele ukuthi ingane iyasisebenzisa ngoba asikhahlazani emzimbeni futhi osesebenzisayo umuntu obukeka ehlanzekile, futhi nabantu asuke ehamba nabo benza abone ingane yakhe iphephile futhi inekusasa eliqhakazile ngendlela ababukeka ngayo, kwesinye isikhathi abahlonipheka ngayo emphakathini.  Kwezinye izidakamizwa okubalwa kuzo iwunga notshwala imvamisa kuba wukududana kwabangani kodwa kulolu hlobo kuthiwa umuntu uyazikhethela yena ngoba ebona uhlobo lwabantu abasuke besisebenzisa ezibuka yena kubona.Nakhu ongakuqaphela uma umuntu esebenzisa iCocaine.Uvamise ukucinanaUbukeka ejabule ngokweqile ebhemile noma abhocobale uma engabhemileAkasebenzisi ezinye izidakamizwa, uma kwenzeka akagxili kuzo

LIBEKWE icala lokushayela liphuzile iphoyisa elinguConstable esiteshini saseTwatwa, Ekurhuleni.Leli phoyisa elibonakale kwi-video esuse umsindo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, kuthiwa belingagunyaziwe ukushayela imoto yombutho ngosuku lwesigameko.Amaphoyisa aveze ukuthi enze uphenyo oluqinisekise ukuthi leli phoyisa lisebenzela esiteshini saseTwatwa, lathathelwa izinyathelo ngokushesha.“Leli phoyisa libekwe icala lokushayela liphuzile nokushayela imoto yombuso ngaphandle kwemvume nelokushayela budedengu. Lizobuye libhekane necala lokuqondiswa ubugwegwe emsebenzini ngalokhu,” kusho uLieutenant Colonel Mavela Masondo okhulumela amaphoyisa eGauteng.

LIKHALELWE amasongo kaSigonyela iphoyisa laseHammarsdale elisolwa ngokushaya intombi.Leli phoyisa elineminyaka engu-39 ubudala liboshwe ngoLwesibili ekuseni ngecala lokushaya ngenhloso yokulimaza intombi yalo esigamekweni esenzeke ngeSonto mhlaka 31 Mashi 2024.Kuthiwa leli phoyisa elinguSergeant esiteshini saseMpumalanga, eHammardsale lihlasele intombi yalo (29) endaweni esemgwaqweni uMthoko Mkhize ngeSonto ebusuku.Umgilwa ogama lakhe nguThandeka Ngcongo unikele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngoMsombuluko, efuna usizo eveza ukuthi amaphoyisa awafuni ukumsiza ngokuvula icala.Ngemuva kokuvela kwezithombe zakhe, baningi abantu abalule isandla beveza ukuthi bazimisele ukumsiza futhi bazoqinisekisa ukuthi umsolwa uyaboshwa.Kuse ngoLwesibili, le ntokazi yabhala omunye umlayezo wokuthi icala livuliwe kodwa umsolwa akakaboshwa.Esitatimendeni sawo, amaphoyisa aqinisekise ukuboshwa kwaleli phoyisa aveza nokuthi ziyaphenywa nezinsolo ezenziwe ngumgilwa zokuthi waqale wanqatshelwa ukuvula icala.Kuthiwa uma kutholakala ukuthi lokhu kuyiqiniso, kukhona abazoqondiswa ubugwegwe ngaphakathi esiphoyiseni.Umsolwa uzovela ngoLwesine enkantolo yeMantshi eHammarsdale.

LIZOVELA enkantolo ngecala lokuzama ukubulala isoka ‘elingqongqise’  intombi yalo okubonwa ngokusa kuyona esibhedlela.Kuvela ukuthi omakhelwane bacishe intombi (22) ebiivutha ubuhanguhangu isoka (34) selidle phansi.Isehlakalo senzeke ngesikabhadakazi ngoLwesibili eCarolina, eMpumalanga. Isoka lithungathwe amaphoyisa laboshwa emva kwamahora ambalwa lenze lokhu.Kubikwa ukuthi umgilwa usindiswe ukumemeza ehlaba umkhosi ecela usizo komakhelwane eshiswa.Amaphoyisa athe kuthe uma omakhelwane bephuthuma beyobheka ukuthi kwenzekani babona umsolwa ebhunyela umgilwa ngokuthile obekusesigubhini esingu-2 litre wase eyabaleka.Ibamba loMkhuzi wamaPhoyisa eMpumalanga, uMajor General (Dkt) Zeph Mkhwanazi lisigxekile isehlakalo esenzeke ngenyanga yokubungaza abantu besifazane.“Sithikamezekile izigameko zalolu hlobo eziwudlame olubhekiswe kubantu besifazane esikhathini lapho sibabungaza ngenyanga yabo u-Agasti. Simfiselela ukwelulama okusheshayo umgilwa,” kusho uMkhwanazi.Umsolwa kulindeleke ukuthi avele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseCarolina namuhla.

LIBUYELA enkantolo icalalo kubulawa kowayengunozinti we-Orlando Pirates neBafana Bafana, uSenzo Meyiwa kulandela ukuguqa kwalo isigubhukane ngenyanga edlule abameli babamangalelwa becela isikhathi sokufunda imiqulu evela kumbuso.Ngaphambi kokuguqa abameli baveza ukuthi kunomqulu kafakazi oyisazi sezokucwaningwa kwamaselula, uColonel Gideon Gouws abangenawo kodwa abawudingayo.Abameli bakhala ngokuthi abazange banikezwe le miqulu kafakazi yize umbuso wawumile kwelokuthi babanikeza lolu lwazi, usebenzisa isigaba 205,  esibagunyaza ukuthola ulwazi lwamaselula abasolwa.Umeli u-Advocate Sipho Ramosepele wabuye waveza ukuthi emiqulwini abayinikezwa kubonakala sengathi inombolo okuthiwa ngekamsolwa uBongani Sandiso Ntanzi ingeyomunye umuntu.“Kubonakala sengathi  le nombolo ingeyomunye umuntu futhi naye lowo muntu wesifazane uqinisekisile ukuthi usenesikhathi eside eyisebenzisa, kodwa umbuso uyaqhubeka nokuthi le yinombolo yomsolwa wesibili,” kusho yena.

LIPHINDE lahlehla icala elithinta izibhelu zomtapo zangoJulayi ngenxa yokuthi abanye abamangalelwa abanabo abameli.Abasolwa abacela ku-60 bavele eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini ngoLwesithathu ekuseni.Abamangalelwa bathweswe amacala okwakha itulo lokususa udlambedlu emphakathini, ukugqugquzela udlame emphakathini, ubuphekula, ukuvukela uMbuso nokwakha itulo lokuzama ukubulalaIcala labo lihlehliselwe uJulayi 26 nonyaka ukuze uMbuso nabameli bashintshane ngemiqingo yecala bese kwenziwa izindlalelo zokuqala kwalo.Ijaji lithe le sikhathi sizonikeza ithuba abamangalelwa abangenabo abameli ukuba babathole.Omunye wabamangalelwa uNksz Ntombizodwa Zanele Msalela kuvele ukuthi ushone kulo nyaka.Icala lingene kule nkundla ngoJanuwari nonyaka lisuka kweyesifunda kodwa alinyakazi.UMbuso uthe iseyinselelo eyokutholela abanye abamangalelwa abameli nokuyinto ebambezela icala.Kwaba esifanayo ngesikhathi  icala lihlehla ngoMeyi nonyaka. Abanye abamangalelwa abezanga enkantolo ngezizathu ezehlukene.Enkantolo kuvele ukuthi omunye ummangalelwa uyoteta, kwathi omunye wabika ukuthi uvaleleke esiminyaminyeni sezimoto ekuseni nokuthe uma elandelelwa ngocingo wangabe esatholakala.Bakwabahlanu ijaji eligunyaze ukuthi baboshwe uma bengalubhadi enkantolo ngokuzayo.Abanye babamangalelwa bebegqoke izimpahla zeqembu lezepolitiki, uMkhonto weSizwe enkantolo. Ngaphakathi enkantolo bahlala bagcwala wonke amabhentshi.Izibhelu zaqala KwaZulu-Natal zenabela ezingxenyeni zaseGauteng. Zadlula nemiphefumulo yabantu abangu-350.

IKOMITI lePhalamende elibhekele izikhalo zamalungu lichithe uphenyo olumayelana nokwenyuswa komholo kukaNobhala jikelele wendlu uMnuz Xolile George, ngenxa yokuthi obenguSomlomo wendlu uNkk Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula, usulile.Usotswebhu weDA uNksz Siviwe Gwarube, wafaka isikhalo ePhalamende ekhala ngokuthi uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula wanyusela uGeorge umholo ngo-70% engazange axhumane namuntu. Kuthiwa wamnyusela umholo usuka kuR2.6 million, waya kuR4.4 million ngo-2022.Usihlalo wekomiti uDkt Manketsi Tlhape, uthe njengoba esulile abakwazi ukuqhubeka nophenyo.“Umthetho wePhalamende ukubeka kucace ukuthi kuphenywa amalungu ePhalamende. Kodwa uma umuntu engeselona ilungu asibe sisakwazi ukumphenya. Ngenxa yokuthi uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula akaselona ilungu lePhalamende, asisakwazi ukuqhubeka nophenyo,” kusho uTlhape.IPhini likasotswebhu weDA uDkt Annelie Lotriet, ligxeke amalungu e-ANC lathi anqume ukuvikela uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula ngokumnyusela imali.UDkt Lotriet uthe amalungu athe ikomiti alikwazi ukuphenya uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula ngoba akaselona ilungu lePhalamende.“Usengakwazi ukuthi ashushiswe ngoba usule ngaphambi kokuba aphendule ngakwenza. UGeorge usekhona ngakho kumele indaba yakhe iphenywe.” UNkk Mapisa-Nqakula usule ekubeni ilungu lePhalamende kanjalo noSomlomo njengoba ebhekene namacala enkohlakalo.Amacala athinta intshontsho okuthiwa walithola ngesikhathi esangungqongqoshe wezokuVikela.Usolwa ngokuthola uR2.1 million ongukheshi awuthola izikhawu ezehlukene kanjalo nezinye izipho. Kuthiwa imali nezipho wakuthola komunye wosonkontileka owayethole ithenda kulo mnyango.Ungaphandle ngebheyili kaR50 000 kanti ngoMsombuluko kuleli sonto uhambise i-passport yakhe kubaphenyi njengoba engavumelekile ukuthi ahambele amanye amazwe. Akavumelekile ukuthi axhumane nofakazi kuleli cala.

LIBHEKWE isambane iphoyisa elilahlwe icala lokubulala unkosikazi walo njengoba ummeli walo evumelana noMbuso kwelokuthi kufanele lithole isigwebo esiqinile.Ummeli kaMthokozisi Nene, u-Advocate Shane Matthews, utshele inkantolo ukuthi uNene ufanelwe isigwebo esingaphezu kweseminyaka engu-15 okuyisigwebo esincane kunazo zonke esinganikwa umuntu olahlwe icala lokubulala.UNene ulahlwe icala lokudubula abulale unkosikazi wakhe, uNkk Thobeka Nene, owabulawa ngo-2022 emzini wabo oseNtshanga.INkantolo eNkulu eMgungundlovu inikeze UMatthews ithuba lokuba ashwelezele uNene ukuba anganikwa isigwebo esiqinile.UMatthews uvele wenza okungajwayelekile, watshela inkantolo ukuthi uNene ufanelwe isigwebo esiqinile.“Libi icala olenzile, ufanelwe ukudonsa isikhathi eside, mhlawumbe nodilikajele ukufanele.”Okushiwo UMatthews kuhambisana nokushiwo uMbuso, ocele ukuthi uNene anikwe isigwebo esiqinile.UMatthews uthe nakuba engamele uMbuso kuleli cala, uyakuqonda ukuthi icala elenziwe uNene likhulu kakhulu.“Ngike ngezwa uMbuso ubalula ukuthi isigwebo esincane esinikwa umuntu olahlwe icala lokubulala kuba iminyaka engu-15. Umuntu owenze icala elifana naleli ufanele ukuthola isigwebo seminyaka engaphezu kuka-15. Lapha enkantolo sizwe ubufakazi bokuthi umufi wazikhalela, ecela ukuba angabulawa. Sizwile ukuthi wahudulwa phansi.”UMatthews uthe uNene usamile kwelokuthi umsulwa.“Ngimcelile ukuthi akazochaza ukuthi kwenzekani ngempela ngosuku lwesigameko, kodwa walokhu emile kwelokuthi umsulwa.”UMbuso ufunde isitatimende sikanina kamufi, uNkk Thandekile Msomi, nesikadadewabo kamufi, uNksz Halala Msomi.Bobabili bacele ukuthi uNene anikezwe isigwebo esiqinile.Bathe bayasaba ukuthi angase abenzakalise uma engasheshe adedelwe.UNkk Msomi uthe kubahlukumezile emiqondweni ukubulawa kwendodakazi yakhe.“Izingane ziyasaba noma uzithuma kwenye indlu. Ebusuku sisheshe sivale iminyango ngoba siyasaba. Mina senginenkinga yokuvele ngiwe esithubeni, ngidla imishanguzo ngenxa yokuthi nginenkinga yenhliziyo, ngihlushwa nawushukela.”UNkk Msomi uthe amantombazane amabili azalwa indodakazi yakhe noNene, awenzi kahle esikoleni, wathi useze wabizwa watshelwa ukuthi kufanele abonane nodokotela wengqondo.Enye indodakazi yayineminyaka engu-12 ngesikhathi kubulawa unina, enye yayineminyaka eyisithupha.UNkk Msomi uthe kwaphoqeleka ukuthi abazukulu bakhe bakhishwe esikoleni esizimele ababefunda kuso ngoba wayengasekho umuntu ozobakhokhela.UNene ubefake ikhanda phansi ngesikhathi kuqhubeka icala.Bekulokhu kuzwakala amagama ayiziswana evela kumalungu omphakathi abegcwele enkantolo.UNene uzogwetshwa ngoSepthemba 30.Abebezolalela icala bathe baphoxekile ukuthi uNene akazange agwetshwe izolo, bathi bebejahe ukuzwa ukuthi uzothola isigwebo esingakanani.

BAHLAFUNA bejeqeza abantu baseCato Crest ngenxa yokwanda kobugebengu obuhambisana nezibhamu. Lokhu kuhlale obala ngoLwesibili ebusuku amaphoyisa etholana phezulu nabasolwa kweminye yemizi ekule ndawo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa, uRobert Netshiunda, uthe akulona iqiniso ukuthi amaphoyisa aqinisa kakhulu isandla kwabasolwa ngobugebengu njengoba kuyisehlo sesine lesi emasontweni amabili sokubulawa kwabantu okuthiwa bebefunelwa amacala abucayi.NgoLwesibili olwedlule, abasolwa abathathu abebefunelwa inqwaba yamacala okubulala okuhlanganisa noSergeant Yekani Siboniso Thabete, badutshulwe babulawa eCongo, eNanda. USergeant Thabete, obeyilungu leKwaMashu Tracking Team, wahlaselwa waphucwa izikhali wadutshulwa wabulawa ngesibhamu somsebenzi.NgoLwesine, umsolwa oyedwa okuthiwa ubeyingxenye yabagebenge i-ATM wadutshulwa wabulawa amaphoyisa abemjaha eMandlankala, eSikhaleni. Ekuseni ngovivi (ngoLwesihlanu olwedlule), abanye abasolwa abathathu basala enkundleni bedubulana namaphoyisa balimala kabi emzini oKwaDlangezwa eMpangeni. Kusolwa ukuthi nabo babeyingxenye yesigameko sokuqhunyiswa kwe-ATM okwenzeke ngoLwesine.Kube esifanayo eNanda abasolwa ababili bezithela olakeni lwamaphoyisa. Laba ababili abebengamalungu eqembu elidume kabi iWest Gang bebevaleleke ekhoneni emzini ose-Angola e-Mawoti eNanda bedudulana namaphoyisa ngenhlamvu. Kuthiwa bebefunelwa amacala okungenani amane okubulala.Esigamekweni sangoLwesibili esenzeke emgwaqweni uStandard eCato Crest, amaphoyisa agadle kubasolwa abahlanu. Ngokwesitatimende samaphoyisa, laba bebefunelwa uxhaxha lwamacala okubulala, ukuduna izimoto kanjalo nokugebenga amabhizinisi.Ngesikhathi kuhlolwa indawo, amaphoyisa athole izibhamu ama-AK47, ama-handgun amathathu nezidakamizwa.UMnuz Tshepo Shezi utshele abeNewzroom Afrika ukuthi bazwile kuduma izulu lezandla ebusuku bathuka kakhulu ngoba nabo banezingane futhi bebengazi ukuthi njengoba kudutshulwa kuhlaselwa bani futhi isizathu sithini.“Sivuke ekuseni sathi asizozibonela ukuthi kwenzenjani nokuthi ngobani abebehlaselwa yingakho size lapha ngoba sinabantwana sinezihlobo. Ubugebengu obukhona lapha buningi kakhulu futhi ngeke sakwazi ukulwa nabo sibuqede bonke ngoba kokunye asazi busukaphi,” kusho yena.

UKWEHLELWA ukwesekwa kwe-ANC okhethweni lukazwelonke ngeledlule, kwenze abanye abaphathiswa, ongqongqoshe kanjalo nondunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube, badliwa yizembe bangalibona elidlalayo ohlwini lwabaya ePhalamende nasesiShayamthetho.I-ANC ithole izihlalo ezingu-14 esifundazweni yathola izihlalo ezingu-159, kuhlanganisa ezasePhalamende naseMkhandlwini weziFundazwe.UMphathiswa wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu esifundazweni uNkk Bongi Sithole-Moloi, obengunombolo 15 ohlwini lwabaya esiShayamthetho, akalibonanga elidlalayo njengoba uhlu lwabaya esiShayamthetho luvale ngoMnuz Mafika Mndebele, okhulumela i-ANC esifundazweni ongunombolo 14.UNkk Dube-Ncube obengunombolo 31, ohlwini ngomunye wabaholi abangabuyeli esiShayamthetho. Abanye abaholi be-ANC abangalibonanga elidlalayo ohlwini kubalwa usotswebhu we-ANC esiShayamthetho uMnuz James Nxumalo we-SACP, uNobhala wamaKhomanisi esifundazweni uMnuz Themba Mthembu oyiphini likasomlomo wesiShayamthetho, uNksz Zinhle Cele, owake wakhulumela i-ANC esifundazweni uMnuz Nhlakanipho Ntombela, usihlalo wekomiti lezemfundo esiShayamthetho uMnuz Sifiso Sonjica, uMnuz Mike Mabuyakhulu obezokhuza ibuya ukuba uKhongolose uthole izihlalo ezenele, uNksz Vuyiswa Caluza, uMfundisi Vusi Dube, uNkk Ntombikayise Sibhidla-Saphetha owake waba nguMphathiswa wezobuCiko amaSiko nezemiDlalo kanjalo nobenguMphathiswa wezobuCiko amaSiko uNkk Amanda Mapena okhonjwe indlela nyakenye, nabanye. Kuzwelonke bangaphezu kuka-70 abaholi be-ANC okubandakanya  noNgqongqoshe abangalibonanga elidlalayo njengoba le nhlangano yehlelwe wukwesekwa.Kulabo ngqongqoshe kubalwa owamaPhoyisa uMnuz Bheki Cele,  owezobuDlelwano namazwe omhlaba uNkk Naledi Pandor, owezeNhlalakahle uNksz Lindiwe Zulu, owezemiSebenzi uMnuz Thulas Nxesi, namanye amaphini ongqongqoshe. Obengungqongqoshe wezemidlalo kuzwelonke uMnuz Zizi Kodwa, osule kulesi sikhundla njengoba ebhekene necala lenkohlakalo uhleli kunombolo 25, kwabaya ePhalamende. Akucaci noma uzobuyela yini ukuyofungiswa njengoba ehoxe nasezigungwini ze-ANC, ngenxa yokuthi usebekwe amacala ngakho ulandela umgomo wale nhlangano wokuthi abahamba amacala kumele bahoxe kuze kuphothulwe amacala ababhekene nawo.Ungqongqoshe ehhovisi likamengameli obhekele abesifazane nezingane uDkt Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma, wamemezela ukuthi usezibeka phansi izintambo emuva kokhetho.Kwenzeka lokhu nje amaqembu amatasa nezinguyazana zokubumba uhulumeni wokubambisana njengoba lingekho iqembu eladla umhlanganiso kuzwelonke elingakwazi ukubumba uhulumeni ngalodwana.Kanjalo nasesifundazweni kudingeka amaqembu asebenzisane ukwakha uhulumeni.

LIDINWE lagana unwabu iJaji Ratha Mokgoatlheng, elihlalele ukuqulwa kwecala lokubulawa kukaSenzo Meyiwa, licikwa ngabameli laze laguqisa icala. Bekubangwa ukuchitshiyelwa kwencwadi efungelwe kafakazi.UMeyiwa owayeyisilomo se-Orlando Pirates neBafana Bafana, wadutshulwa wabulawa ngo-2014, ekubo kwentombi yakhe uKelly Khumalo eVosloorus, eGauteng. UMbuso uthi abamangalelwa bathengwa ukuthi bamphumele inqina okwenyamazane uMeyiwa, baqede ngaye.Icala liguqe kungasekuhle kuphambana imibono. UMbuso ubize ufakazi ongungoti wamaselula kwavela ukuthi uthathe umsebenzi obuwenziwa nguColonel Lambertus Steyn, osethathe umhlalaphansi. Umsindo usuke lapho-ke kubangwa ukuthi incwadi efungelwe bekufanele icacise kahle ngoshintsho longoti bamaselula.Abameli baveze ukungenami kwabo bethi indlela okwenzeka ngayo ayinabo ubulungiswa kubamangalelwa. Kukhononde kakhulu u-Advocate Zandile Mshololo, omele ummangalelwa wesihlanu uFisokuhle Ntuli.UMbuso neJaji bavumelene ngokuthi kuqhutshekwe nencwadi efungelwe engalungisiwe kodwa u-Advocate Mshololo wala ukhasha, wathi ngeke.“Lokhu okwenzekayo akunabo ubulungiswa ekhasimendeni lami ngoba simangele nje ukuthi incwadi ilungiswa khona lapha ebhokisini lofakazi. Asazi futhi ukuthi yini enye esazolungiswa,’’ kubhoka u-Adv Mshololo.IJaji libonakale licikeka kakhulu ngalokhu lithi akufanele ngabe kunenkinga ngoba kuyachazwa ukuthi ufakazi omusha uthathe izintambo kuSteyn othathe umhlalaphansi.“Hhayi ! kuyacaca ukuthi ukuqonda izinto kahle kuhambisana nesipiliyoni inkosi impela. Kusobala ukuthi sizomosha isikhathi ngalolu daba. Kungcono siyeke, sihambe sibuye kusasa ngoba kuthiwa asenzi ubulungiswa. Ngiyaxolisa kakhulu ngalokhu,’’ kusho ijaji libonakala ukuthi licikekile futhi linikina ikhanda lize liyancinciza.U-Advocate Mshololo ubenikina ikhanda ngesikhathi iJaji likhuluma sakuthetha lihlehlisa icala. Ngaphambi kwalokho kuke kwabangwa indaba yokuqasha uchwepheshe ohlola izibhamu.Abameli babecele ukuletha ungoti wabo wezibhamu ukuthi azohlola isibhamu namagobolondo okuthiwa kwabulala uMeyiwa. Ungoti kufanele akhokhelwe abeLegal Aid kodwa lokhu akukenzeki. Libangiwe lelo phuzu kwaze kwalethwa omele abeLegal Aid, ukuthi azochaza.Kulindeleke ukuthi icala liqhubeke ngoLwesithathu lapho ungoti wamaselula ezokweneka ubufakazi bakhe.

LIGWETSHWE kanzima iphoyisa elaqotha abasekhweni kunomhlangano wokuxazulula izinkinga phakathi kwalo nomkalo eSand River Trust, eHazyview ngomhla ka 30 Ephreli 2023.Kubikwa ukuthi uConstable Sizwe Cedrick Khoza oneminyaka engu-38 wayenezinkinga nomkakhe uNomthandazo Suzan Mnisi (31) ngesikhathi ecela abasekhweni lakhe bangenele.Kulowo mhlangano kwafika udadewabo kamakoti uXolisile Mnisi (32), ongumhlengikazi esibhedlela iMatikwane nomfowabo uDennis Mkhatshwa (42).“Kubikwa ukuthi kwaqubuka ingxabano emhlanganweni, umfowabo kamakoti watshela uKhoza ukuthi ungumfana omncane. Kuthiwa lokhu kwathukuthelisa uKhoza owaphuma waya egumbini lokulala eyolanda isibhamu sakhe somsebenzi.Kuthiwa leli phoyisa lalanda isibhamu lifuna ukukhombisa umlamu walo ukuthi umfana omncane ukwazi ukwenzani.Icala labikwa kwabe-IPID, waboshwa uKhoza kodwa wabuye wadedelwa ngebheyili.Icala lakhe ladluliselwa ophikweni lwezokushushisa eMpumalanga lapho kwanqunywa khona ukuthi abekwe amacala amathathu okubulala.Leli phoyisa elalisebenza esiteshini saseMasoyi lawavuma amacala ngomhla ka 3 kwephezulu njengoba seligwetshwa.“UKhoza ugwetshwe odilikajele abathathu ngecala ngalinye lokubulala kwakhishwa nomyalelo wokuthi akafanelwe wukuphatha isibhamu,” kuqhubeka u

LIZOQALA ukuqulwa ngoFebhuwari 10 wonyaka ozayo, icala lokweqa ejele kwesiboshwa, uThabo Bester.Lokhu kuvezwe yiJaji uCagney Musi, eNkantolo eNkulu yaseFree State.Bekuvele kulindeleke ukuthi uMusi amemezele ukuthi kuzoqala nini ukuqulwa kwecala likaBester nabanye, njengoba bonke abameli kanjalo noMbuso beveze ukuthi sebekulungele ukuqulwa kwalo.Ngesikhathi kuqhubeka ukuhlala kwenkantolo, ummeli kaBester uke wazama ukuveza ukuthi uBester kungenzeka angakulungeli ngokomqondo ukuqulwa kwecala ngenxa yendlela aphethwe ngayo ejele, iKgosi Mampuru.Ummeli udalule ukuthi unikwa ihora elilodwa kuphela lokuthi azivocavoce, nokho uMusi akakugqizanga qakala lokhu, wathi uma ummeli kaBester esewalungise kahle amaphepha esikhalo sekhasimende lakhe, ngeke ananaze ukudlulisela udaba lwakhe kwelinye ijaji ukuze lilulalele.Leli cala laba wundabuzekwayo ngoMeyi 2022, ngesikhathi kuvela ukuthi uBester owayedonsa isigwebo sakhe ngamacala okubulala nawokudlwengula, weqa ejele.Lezi zindaba zavela sekuphele unyaka eqa.Bayisishiyagalolunye ababoshwa ngalokhu, okukhona kubo nowayeyintombi yakhe, ababanjwa naye eTanzania uDkt Nandipha Magudumana.I-ANC nomhlangano wokubhunga ngokhetho nentuthukoIBIZE umhlangano ozodonsa izinsuku eziyisithupha i-ANC ukuzobhunga ngokubhacaza kwayo okhethweni obelungoMeyi nonyaka.IBIZE umhlangano ozodonsa izinsuku eziyisithupha i-ANC ukuzobhunga ngokubhacaza kwayo okhethweni obelungoMeyi nonyaka.Isitatimende sikaKhongolose siveze ukuthi umhlangano uqala namhlanje eBirchwood Hotel, eBoksburg.Kuqala umhlangano wesigungu esiphezulu se-ANC namhlanje kuze kube nguMgqibelo. Kusuka ngeSonto kuze kube nguLwesibili, kuzohlala umhlangano ohlanganisa bonke abaholi bakwezinye izifundazwe, kubalwa ongqongqoshe, abaphathiswa beminyango, ondunankulu, izimeya, amaphini ongqongqoshe kanjalo nabanye abaholi.Kulo mhlangano bazobe becaciselwa kabanzi ngezinhlelo ze-ANC okumele bazilandele ezisuselwa emqulwini wezokhetho. “Inhloso ngukuthi kufuqwe izinhlelo zokuqeda indlala, ukukhulisa umnotho, ukwakha amathuba emisebenzi, ukwehlisa izinga lokuphila eliphezulu kanjalo nokubhekana nezinye izingqinamba ezibhekene nomphakathi,” kusho isitatimende.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi i-ANC yehlelwa wukwesekwa yaze yadinga ukuthi ibambisane namanye amaqembu ngenxa yokwehlelwa wukwesekwa okhethweni.Kuhlukene imibono ngabase-Israel kuma-Olympic KUSHAYISANA imibono ngokuya kwabadlali base-Israel kuma-Olympic aseParis, njengoba leliya lizwe liqhubeka nokudedela amabhomu eGaza.IPhini likaNgqongqoshe wezeMidlalo, ubuCiko namaSiko, uNksz Peace Mabe noNobhala jikelele we-ANC uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, bathe i-Israel akufanele ivunyelwe ukuya kuma-Olympic njengoba isaqhubeka nokubulala abantu basePalestine, eGaza.Babalule ukuthi neRussia ayikwazi ukuya kuleya midlalo ngoba isolwa ngokuba nodlame.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi abadlali baseRussia kabavumelekile ukuya kuma-Olympic ngenxa yempi eqhubeka phakathi kwezwe labo ne-Ukraine kanjalo nezinsolo zokuthi abadlali babegqugquzelwa ukuba basebenzise izikhuthazi ezingavumelekile.ISouth African Zionist Federation (SAZF), ithe uMabe noMbalula kufanele bahlukane ne-Israel ngoba inelungelo lokuya kuma-Olympic njengawo wonke amazwe.Kolunye uhlangothi. i-Palestine Solidarity Alliance Youth League in South Africa, ithe i-Israel enobandlululo akufanele ibe semidlalweni yama-Olympic.Ikhale ngokuthi ukuba khona kwayo kugqugquzela ukucindezelwa kwabantu.

INKANTOLO yeMantshi yaseThekwini ilihlehlisele uJulayi 12 icala lokudlwengula elithweswe isethenjwa soNyazilwezulu.UXolani “Maliyavuza” Zungu ubevele kule nkantolo ngoLwesine njengoba engaphandle ngebheyili ecaleni lokudlwengula athweswe lona.Usolwa ngokudlwengula owesifazane ongelinye lamalungu ebandla lamaNazaretha.Ummeli kaZungu, uMnuz Ayanda Khanyile we-Ayanda Khanyile Attorneys, uthe bona sebemi ngomumo ngaleli cala kodwa babanjezelwe wuMbuso ngenxa yobufakazi obungenele okudingeka buzokwethulwa enkantolo.“Esikutholile ukuthi owesifazane okuthiwa wadlwengulwa wuZungu akakaxoxi nomphenyi wecala. Ngelanga obekuhlelwe ukuthi bayokhuluma ngalo wafike wakhala wangakhuluma. Okunye wukuthi kunemiyalezo abeyithumelela uZungu okungakaqinisekiswa ukuthi iphuma kuyena ngempela yini. Thina sesimnikile yona umphenyi wecala, besilindele ukuthi sizofika enkantolo eseyidlulisele kuMshushisi kodwa sathola ukuthi akukenzeki lokho. Ngeke ngikwazi ukudalula ukuthi  le miyalezo ithini ngoba lokho kungalimaza icala,” kusho ummeli.Kuthintwa uZungu, uthe ngeke akwazi ukuphawula lutho ngecala ngoba lisesenkantolo.Elinye ilungu lomndeni kaZungu ebelisenkantolo nelingathandanga ukudalulwa, lithe bona banolwazi lokuthi leli cala alikho kodwa kukhona abalibhebhezelayo ngoba belwa noZungu.“Inkinga ukuthi uMaliyavuza usondelene kakhulu noNyazilwezulu. Kukhona abanenkinga yokuthi uyalivikela kwezinye izinto. Owesifazane lo okuthiwa umdlwengulile, yintombi yakhe akade athandana nayo futhi bebehlala bevakashelana. Inkinga idalwe yile thenda ka-R18 million eyakhishwa wuMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa yokwakha amadokodo eBuhleni. Kukhona izethenjwa ezilwa nawo wonke umuntu osondele noNyazi ngoba zifuna iwele ezandleni zazo. Zisebenzisana nezikhulu zepolitiki ezicasulwe wukuthi uNyazilwezulu lukumisile ukwakhiwa kwamadokodo obekuzozihlomulisa ngokudla le mali,” kusho umthombo.Kuthintwa uZungu ngendaba yethenda ka-R18 million yokwakha amadokodo eBuhleni, uthe yena akahlomuli lutho kumathenda kahulumeni futhi namabhizinisi awenzayo awahlangene namathenda.

KUHLEHLISELWE isonto elizayo yiNkantolo yeMantshi yaseVerulam, ukulalelwa kwesicelo sebheyili ecaleni elibhekene nomfundisi webandla labasindisiwe, osolwa ngokunukubeza ngokocansi izingane zabafana.UMnuz Mkhanyisi Mshalala (57) okuthiwa ubenezinyanga eziyisithupha ehlala eWaterloo, okuthiwa ubencikiswe yisihlobo sakhe, ubevele kule nkantolo izolo. Uboshwe emasontweni amabili adlule ngamacala asolelwa kuwo okudlwengula abafana abathathu abeneminyaka engaphansi kuka-11.Kuthiwa ubebuye afundise ngeBhayibheli. Kukholakala ukuthi abagilwa ubebanukubezela endlini yakhe uma bemvakashele kuzobhungwa ngezwi leNkosi nangezinto ezithinta ibhola. Kuvele ukuthi ubebuye abe wumqeqeshi weqembu labafana abeneminyaka engaphansi kuka-11, aphinde abe wumfundisi ebandleni labasindisiwe khona endaweni. Inkantolo ilihlehlisele u-Septhemba 5 leli cala, kusaqhubeka uphenyo.UMnuz Khumbulani Zuma oyisisishoshovu somphakathi nomgqugquzeli we-MK ku- ward 106, obengomunye wabebehola umbhikisho ngaphandle kwenkantolo ngesikhathi kuvele umsolwa, uthe abazali bezingane balutheka njengoba ngesikhathi efika wangenisa ngesonto nangebhola okwenza bamethemba.“Ukufika kwakhe uzenze umuntu oyikholwa nofundisa ngeBhayibheli. Uphinde waziveza njengomuntu onolwazi nogqozi ekuqeqesheni abafana abancane ebholeni lezinyawo.  Ngenxa yokuthi indawo ikhungethwe ubugebengu nokusetshenziswa kwezidakamizwa, abazali babone kuyithuba lokugcina izingane zabo zimatasa futhi zenza into eqondindile, kanti uthi lala lulaza,” kusho uZuma.UMnuz Xolani Ngcobo oyilungu lesigungu esilwa nobugebengu eWaterloo, uthe ukuya kwabantu enkantolo, bekuhloswe ngakho ukweseka imindeni yabagilwa ukuze umsolwa engadedelwa.“Ngenxa yesimo semindeni yabagilwa somnotho neminyaka yabo, sibone kukuhle ukuthi sibe ngasohlangothini lwabo sibeseke kulesi sikhathi esinzima ababhekene naso. Ukwesaba kwethu kusekutheni asazi ukuthi zingaki izingane azigilile ezingakaphumeli obala ngoba sithole ukuthi ezindaweni aseke ahlala kuzo okuyi-Parkgate naseMhlasini, ubewumuntu ogila le mikhuba,” kusho uNgcobo.Ngesikhathi eboshwa, uMshalala usindiswe ukufika konogada bakwa-Reaction Unit of South Africa olakeni lwamalungu omphakathi abesho ukumudla amfele. Uvela nje, uqeda kululama njengoba ubengeniswe esibhedlela emva kwalokhu kutitinyeka ngamalungu omphakathi, kanti ubephansi kweso lwamaphoyisa.

KUVELA ukuthi selihlukene phakathi ibandla laseZayoni amaJericho ngoMfundisi walo ophinde abe yinyanga osezikhindini, osolwa ngokuba unggondongqondo ekusocongweni kukamama nendodakazi okwenzeke emasontweni amathathu edlule.UMnuz Simphiwe Abraham Mhlaba (54) ubevele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseNtuzuma, ngoMsombuluko, usolwa ngokubulala uNkk Patricia Jeza (48) nendodakazi yakhe uNksz Queen Jeza (28).Izidumbu zalaba ababili zatholakala zilahliwe emaChobeni, eNanda, kwase kuboshwa uMhlaba okwavela ukuthi waba nengxabano nalaba ababili kubangwa uR300 000  “wokubathwalisa.’’Kwavela ukuthi abagilwa bakhokhela umsolwa le mali befuna ukuthi abathwalise okuthe uma kungasayi ngamagama enkehli base befuna ukubuyiselwa imali yabo.Lokhu kuvela ukuthi yikhona okususe udungunyane phakathi kwabo nomsolwa.Isolezwe likhulume nabangamalungu ebandla bezigodlile amagama abo, baveza ukuthi ibandla lihlukene phakathi ngokuthi asekwe yini uMhlaba noma cha."Kukhona abakholelwa ukuthi akanacala, kumele esekwe uma evela enkantolo, kube khona abathi angeke bona beseke umbulali," kuchaza umthombo.Nelinye ilungu lebandla nalo lipotshozele Isolezwe ukuthi ibandla lihlukene phakathi.Umsolwa waziwa ngokuphila impilo ewubukhazikhazi. Uhlala emzini oyisitezi oseNanda. Uhamba ngonyanyavu lwemoto lohlobo lwe-Range Rover olubhalwe isibongo sakhe.Umsolwa ungumfowabo wenyanga eshone ngonyaka odlule, uMnuz Samuel Mhlaba, owayedume ngokwelapha uZodwa Wabantu.Ngesikhathi engena enkantolo umsolwa ubebonakala ekhululekile efake ihembe elimnyama egunde nembungculu.Ubingelele abebezomeseka ebebeyingcosana ngaphakathi enkantolo.IMantshi uMizri ithe icala lihlehliselwa isonto elizayo ngoLwesine, ukuze umsolwa ezofaka isicelo sakhe sebheyili.UMshushisi wecala uMnuz Sphamandla Dlamini, uvumelene nokuthi icala lingahlehliswa.Ngaphakathi enkantolo bekukhona namalungu omndeni abagilwa kubonakala nje ukuthi simuncu isimo.Amalungu emndeni yabafi ale aphetha ukukhuluma neSolezwe, athi kawazimisele ukusho okuthile.Imizam yokuthola ukuphawula kwabebandla lamaJericho ayiphumelelanga ngoba izingcingo nemiyalezi abathunyelelwe yona bekungaphendulwa.

KUDUMA ikhanda kumholi we-IFP oyilungu lePhalamende odukelwe unkosikazi osekuphele izinsuku ezine engatholakali.UMnuz Sanele Zondo, ongusihlalo wophiko lwentsha kwi-IFP,  i-IFP Youth Brigade, uthe ubambe umoya ngonkosikazi wakhe, uNkk Simenyiwe MaDlomo Zondo, athe wagcina ukukhuluma naye ngoLwesihlanu.“Ngagcina ukukhuluma naye ngabo-11 emini yasekuseni. Wangibikela ukuthi usaya kothenga eRichards Bay. Ngagcina lapho ke ukuxhumana naye. Ngangingekho ekhaya ngesikhathi ehamba, angazi ukuthi wayegqoke kanjani.”UZondo wagcagcelwa ngoMashi, kwelakubo, eHluhluwe.UZondo uthe imindeni, owakubo nowakubo kwamakoti, ikhathazekile ngokunyamalala kukaNkk Zondo.“Sinxusa abangaba nolwazi olungaholela ekutheni simthole, ukuba baxhumane nathi. Imindeni isebenzisana namaphoyisa nazo zonke izinhlaka zokuphepha nezikahulumeni ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi siyamthola uSimenyiwe. Kubalulekile ukuthi simthole.”UZondo uthe okumkhathazayo ukuthi abantu sebeqalile ukukhuluma izinto ezehlukene, wathi kukhona nabanuka yena ngokuduka kukankosikazi wakhe.“Sengithola imiyalezo ethusayo nengaqondakali. Lolu daba selungenwe abantu abaningi. Uyazi ukuthi abantu bazohlezi bekhuluma uma kunesimo esinje. Kuvamisile vele ukuthi uma kuduke umuntu oshadile, kusolwe lona omunye osele.“Ingakho sengithandazela ukuthi uMaDlomo atholakale, khona kuzophela konke lokhu kukhuluma okukhona. Uma engabuya mhlawumbe angacacisa ngalezi zinto ezikhulunywayo. Ingakho ngithandazela ukuthi atholakale ephila.”Uyise kamakoti, uMnuz Nkosinathi Dlomo, uthe indodakazi yakhe yagcina ukumthumela umyalezo ngeWhatsApp, ngaphambi kwehora lesibili, ngalo uLwesihlanu.“Emva kwalokho wabe eselahleka emoyeni. Sasithi noma sithi siyafona, ucingo lwakhe lukhale lungabanjwa. Ngeshwa ucingo walushiya khona kwaZondo, baze baluthola ngesinye isikhathi.”UDlomo uthe ubunzima ababhekene nabo abuchazeki.“Kubuhlungu ngoba umntwana wethu lona, asimazi noma usaphila yini. Asazi ukuthi kwenzekani ngaye. Siphatheke kabi kakhulu. Sinethemba lokuthi uzotholakala maduze.”Kuze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, engakayiphenduli imibuzo athunyelwe yona.

BABUYELA emabhentshini aseNkantolo eNkulu ePitoli abalisa abahlanu abasolwa ngokujuqa owayengunozinti uSenzo Meyiwa.  UMeyiwa owayeyisilomo se-Orlando Pirates neBafana Bafana, wadutshulwa wabulawa ekubo kwentombi yakhe uKelly Khumalo ngo2014.UMbuso uthi abalisa abahlanu yibona abamkakisa okwenyamazane uMeyiwa ngobusuku kuka-Okthoba 26, 2014 eVosloorus, eGauteng. Abamangalelwa bonke bayawaphika onke amacala ababekwe wona.Icala lisesigabeni sokuqulwa lapho uMbuso uqhubeka khona nokubiza ofakazi bawo okholwa wukuthi bazosiza ukugojela abamangalelwa.Phambilini icala laguqa ukuze kunikwe abameli ithuba lokucubungula kahle bonke ubufakazi bese belungela ukuphosa imibuzo kofakazi boMbuso.

UTHOLWE enecala lokubulala ngenhloso owesilisa waseNtuzuma, owangqubuza intombi ayekipite nayo ngekhanda odongeni kasikhombisa yaze yafa eyisola ngokuthi isiqomile. UMxolisi Mvula (30) wabulala uNksz Phindile Mkhize(21) ngoDisemba 2 2022, kulandela ukuthi engalalanga endlini ababekipite kuyona eLindelani.Kuleso sigameko kuvela ukuthi uMvula, owucecevana ngokomzimba, wayedinwe egane unwabu esho nokusho ukuthi ukungalali endlini kowayeyintombi yakhe kwakusho ukuthi usenelinye isoka alale kulo. Kuvelile enkantolo ukuthi umufi wayelale kwadadewabo ngenxa yokuthi babengazwananga noMvula. Ubuya nje ekuseni wayesezothatha izimpahla zakhe ukuze abuyele ekhaya.Kuthiwa wamngqubuza odongeni kaningi, maqede wamgxoba nasebusweni nasekhanda, konke ekwenza ngesankahlu nelukuluku lokudinwa. Umufi kuthiwa washonela endaweni yesigameko. Ngemuva kwalokho ummangalelwa wathi nyawo zami ngibelethe kodwa wagcina ekhalelwe ngamasongo kaSigonyela.NgoMsombuluko, uMvula okhanyayo ngokwebala, ubebukeka sengathi akazi nokuthi lidumephi. INkantolo yeMantshi yaseNtuzuma, ikhiphe isinqumo yamlahla ngecala lokubulala ngenhloso.IMantshi uMohamed Montala, ikhale ngesihluku esikhonjiswe ngummangalelwa kumufi.Imantshi isebenzise ubufakazi obethulwa nguDkt Naidoo onguchwepheshe osenolwazi olunzulu lokuhlolwa kwezidumbu.Lo chwepheshe wenekela inkantolo ngendlela alimala ngayo ekhanda umufi. Waveza ukuthi igazi elilinganiselwa ku-100 mm lachithekela ebuchosheni."Indlela igazi elachitheka ngayo ebuchosheni uchwepheshe ohlola izidumbu waveza ukuthi kwakubangelwa yisankahlu ummangalelwa ayesisebenzisa ngesikhathi engqubuza umufi odongweni ephindelela,'' kusho iMantshi.Iqhuba ithe kuvela ukuthi ummangalelwa wamngqubuza umufi izikhawu eziyisikhombisa okuwubufakazi bokuthi wayehlosile ukumbulala."Ukube wawungahlosile ukumbulala umufi wawungeke umngqubuze odongweni izikhawu eziningi kangaka. Yingakho namhlanje ngikuthola unecala lokubulala ngenhloso,'' isho kanje imantshi ibhekise kummangalelwa.IMantshi isebenzise ubufakazi obethulwa ngufakazi owayekhona ngesikhathi sesigameko, uNksz Sithembile Mkhize.Ithe ubufakazi obethulwa yilo fakazi buyabambeka futhi abuzange bushiye inkantolo nongabazane ngokwenzeka ngosuku lwesigameko.Kuvele nokuthi kunofakazi abapendele inkantolo isithombe sokuthi umufi wayesebudlelwaneni bothando obabuhlukumeza.Kubikwa ukuthi ngesikhathi engalalanga nesoka lakhe wayekade elale nodadewawo, wavuka ekuseni wamncenga ukuba amphelezele ukuze ayolanda izimpahla zakhe kubo kwesoka."Lokhu kokuthi umufi wayezolanda izimpahla zakhe kubo kukammangalelwa kuveza ngokusobala ukuthi wayesezinhlelweni zokuphuma kulolu thando,'' kuqhuba iMantshi.UMshushisi u-Advocate Kaystree Ramsamujh, uchaze ummangalelwa njengomqambi manga wakhala ngobufakazi obushayisanayo abethulela inkantolo.Uthe ukholwa ukuthi konke ummangalelwa wayevele ekuhlosile. Ukhale ngokuthi ummangalelwa waqamba amanga wathi umufi washayeka ngephutha odongeni kade bebanga iselula ekubeni umufi wayengenayo (iselula) ngesikhathi sesigameko.Kuvele nokuthi ngo-Okthoba 2022, ummangalelwa wake washaya walimaza umufi waze wavuvukala umlomo.Unina kamufi uNkk Vuyile Mkhize ubonge ukuthi ummangalelwa ulahlwe yicala."Ngiyabonga ukuthi ekugcineni ubulungiswa bubonakala benzeka ngokubulawa komtanami. Manje sengifisa ukuthi athole isigwebo esimfanele,'' usho kanje uNkk Mkhize.Omunye obesenkantolo, uNkk Thokozani Khumalo, uSihlalo wenhlangano uBambiswano, ebhekekelele ukuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane eLindelani, uthe bajabule ngokuthi inkantolo imthole enecala ummangalelwa.Namhlanje inkantolo izokhipha isigwebo sikammangalelwa.

SIBHUNTSHILE isigcawu sokuquliswa kweJaji Tshifhiwa Maumela elaliphethe icala lokufa kukaSenzo Meyiwa, elingeniswe esibhedlela lixinwe wukugula.UMaumela waba yijaji lokuqala ukunikwa icala lokufa kukaMeyiwa kodwa kuthe sekuphakathi wamiswa emsebenzini kwafakwa iJaji Ratha Mokgoatlheng. UMaumela nakuba wayebike ukugula kodwa kwavela ukuthi umisiwe uzoya esigcawini.IJaji uMaumela limangalelwe wuMengameli wamaJaji eGauteng iJaji Dunstan Mlambo, elikhala ngokuthi wehlulwa wumsebenzi, uthatha isikhathi ukukhipha izinqumo. UMlambo kade eseqalile ukwethula udaba echaza ngokumangalela uMaumela.UMaumela bekufanele avele okwesibili esigcawini sokumshushisa izolo eGoli kodwa kwavela ukuthi ungeniswe esibhedlela engemuhle kahle.USihlalo wesigcawu Ijaji Chris Jafta odla umhlalaphansi, ungene esexolisa ngokuthi kungaqalwa ngesikhathi wathi kukhona osekuqhamukile okuphazamisayo.“ Siyaxolisa ngokuthi singaqali ngesikhathi ngoba bekufanele siqale ngo-9 kodwa kunodaba oluvelile oludale ukuthi singaqali ngesikhathi,’’ kusho uJafta ophose izintambo kumholi wobufakazi nakummeli kaMaumela.Ummeli kaMaumela u-Advocate Ghandi Badela, uchaze ngodaba lwekhasimende lakhe.“ Kunjengoba sekuchaziwe impela kunesimo esingaphezu kwamandla esiphoqa ukuthi senze ngenye indlela. IJaji uMaumela lingeniswe esibhedlela, manje besikhuleka ukuthi udaba luhlehle kuze kube uyelulama. Siphakamisa uMeyi 27 njengosuku esiyobuya ngalo ngokuvumelana nabanye ozakwethu la,’’ kusho uBadela.IJaji uJafta lithe lolo suku olokubambisa ngoba akwaziwa ukuthi isimo sizoba njani kodwa kuyobuzwa ngalo kubonakale ukuthi kumiswa kanjani.NgoMsombuluko okuqale ngawo isigcawu, ummangali uMlambo ubebeka izinto ngembaba engahlonizi ngokungenami kwakhe ngoMaumela. UMlambo uthe uMaumela ugodla izinqumo isikhathi eside, uma emshayela izingcingo angamtholi futhi angabuyeli kuye.Uthe icala lokufa kukaMeyiwa kwakungafanele lihlalelwe wuMaumela kodwa wazenzela ngokuthanda kwakhe.“ Wayenikwe umyalelo wokuthi alisebenze icala nokuyothi uma selilungele ukungena enkantolo bese elibuyisa kodwa wavele wayongena nalo enkantolo. Kwase kuvele kwenzekile kwakunzima ukumephuca lona,’’ kusho uMlambo.

INKANTOLO yeMantshi yasePinetown isichithile isicelo sebheyili sesosha elibekwe icala lokudubula amahlandla ayisithupha libulale umkalo.IMantshi uGwendolyn Robinson, ithe azikho izizathu ezinqala futhi ezingajwayelekile ezibekwe uMnuz Lwanda Zungu esicelweni sakhe sebheyili.Icala libe selihlehliselwa uJuni 18 nonyaka ukuze uMbuso uphothule uphenyo lwawo.UZungu usolwa ngokudubula emi phezu kombhede okwakulele kuwona umufi, uNkk Tania Msane-Zungu (36) ngoJanuwari 3 nonyaka.Kusolakala ukuthi wadubula umufi kanye ekhanda, amahlandla amane entanyeni enye inhlamvu yangena esifubeni. UZungu uyaliphika icala lokubulala ngokuyinhloso eliwela esigabeni sesithupha athweswe lona uMbuso.Enkantolo bekukhona amalungu ayo yomibili imindeni eganiselene kodwa engasabhekani.Lokhu kuyaye kugqame nangokuhlala kwawo ngokwehlukana emabhentshini asenkantolo.UZungu ubebukeka ezikhululekele njengenjwayelo futhi akakhombisanga kujabha ennqatshelwa ibheyili.Ummeli kaZungu, u-Advocate Muzi Mzelemu akasiphikisanga isinqumo semantshi. Lokhu kuchaza ukuthi uZungu uzoqhubeka agqunywe ezitokisini zasejele laseWestville.

KUVAMBANISE iphunga elingameleleki ezindaweni eziningi kuMasipala weTheku kulandela isiteleka samasonto amabili esesishiye leli dolobha lixathuka.Ngesikhathi izintatheli zeSolezwe zihambele ezinye izindawo izolo, zizithele ezingqumbini zikadoti ongaqoqiwe nosusaphazeke yonke indawo.Amafulaha ngamafulaha kadoti ayakhula usuku nosuku njengoba ezinye izakhamizi zisaqhubeka nokuwubeka ngaphandle nakuba omdala ungakalandwa.Ngokujwayelekile umgwaqo uRiverside, oya endaweni yokulahla udoti eRoadhouse ngaseMngeni, unemizila emibili evumela ukuthi izimoto ziphambane. Kodwa sekusemanyaleni kulo mgwaqo nomzila usuwodwa, omunye ugqitshwe amasaka oplastiki abamnyama abavuza ukubola.Endaweni yokulahla udoti eSpringfield, kuphithizela izimoto zabantu abazozilahlela ngokwabo udoti, abanye abalunguzi nakulunguza bawulahla bengakangeni.Ekhoneni lomgwaqo uQuarry Road East noMngeni, uma ubheke ngakwaMakro, abantu sebekhethe ukumbondela udoti ngaserobhothini elikule ndawo, okuyisimo esifanayo nakwezinye izindawo eziningi.Iphunga kulezi zindawo, liyahila, likwenza ucanuzelelwe yinhliziyo, kubhuza nezimpukane.Ehostela labesifazane eThokoza ku-Yusuf Dadoo Street, lapho okukhalwa khona ngokuhamba kukagesi isikhathi eside, nokungalandwa kukadoti, izimpethu beziqomfiza obondeni kuleli sonto.Lesi simo sesibeke engcupheni abantu abangangenwa yizifo ngokungcola okuxake ukwenza. UDkt Carmen James, ongudokotela owelapha zonke izifo, uthe ukulahlwa budlabha kukadoti ikakhulukazi eduze kwemifula kungadala ukuthi amanzi abe negciwane i-Ecoli. Leli gciwane litholakala endleni.“Udoti kuyenzeka ube namanabukeni, ngakho maningi amathuba okuthi leyo ndle igcine ifinyelela emanzini. Uthe  imvelo iyona ethinteka kakhulu uma udoti ulahlwa budlabha ngale ndlela,” kusho uDkt James.Khonamanjalo, bayabuyela eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini abasebenzi bakamasipala abangu-13, ababoshelwa icala lokudala udlame emphakathini nelokucekela impahla.Abasebenzi abebevele okokuqala kule nkantolo ngoLwesithathu kulindeleke ukuthi bacele ibheyili.NgoLwesibili emhlanganweni woMkhandlu weTheku kuvele ukuthi sekushone umsebenzi, kwalimala kabi ababili njengoba kunesiteleka.Umsebenzi, ongadalulwanga igama, kuthiwa ushone emva kokuhlaselwa ozakwabo abebesembhikishweni. Lokhu kudalulwe imenenja kamasipala, uMnuz Musa Mbhele.UMbhele uthe umsebenzi oshonile wahlaselwa esebenza emathuneni aseMlaza.“Kunamacala amabili okuzama ukubulala aphenywayo.
