Laba basebenzi balimala kanzima emva kokuhlaselwa.”Kunemibiko yokuthi abasebenzi abangatelekile bayasatshiswa uma bethi bazama ukuyolungisa ugesi.UMbhele uthe abasebenzi abaningi sebebuyelile emsebenzini, kodwa wathi iningi lisasaba ukuphumela ngaphandle liyokwenza umsebenzi walo.“Abaningi bakhala ngokuthi babona bengaphephile.”Isiteleka siphinde saholela ekucekelweni phansi kwempahla.UMbhele uthe basezinhlelweni zokuvulela icala inyunyana yabasebenzi bakamasipala, i-SA Municipal Workers Union (Samwu) ehola umbhikisho.“Sifuna ukuthi bakhokhele izindleko zawo wonke umonakalo odalwe yisiteleka.”Ikhansela le-DA, uMnuz Mzamo Billy, lithe kuyakhathaza ukuhlaselwa kwabasebenzi abangatelekile.Uthe ukuqhubeka kombhikisho isikhathi eside kusho ukwehluleka kobuholi bomkhandlu.“Kuyaqala emlandweni ukuba sibone umbhikisho walolu hlobo. Abantu sebehlale isikhathi eside bengenawo amanzi nogesi. Akufanele engabe ubuholi buyabukela nje isimo sinje.”Ikhansela le-EFF, uMnuz Khanyisani Khambule, lithe njengoba iningi labasebenzi kuthiwa selibuyele emsebenzini, kufanele imiphumela ibonakale.“Akufanele sizwe ngendaba ukuthi abasebenzi sebebuyele emsebenzini, kufanele sibabone benza umsebenzi. Akufanele sibakhokhele ukuthi bavuka beyohlala nje.”’Ikhansela le-ANC, uMnuz Nkosenhle Madlala, lithe bayakuqonda ukuthi abasebenzi abaningi basesaba ukuphumela ngaphandle, wathi balindele ukuthi isimo sibe ngcono ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.

SEKUQUBUKE ukukhathazeka ngokwanda kwabantu abadala (50-54), abane-HIV eGauteng, okuvele ukuthi isibalo sabo sesinyukele ku-32.2% ngo-2022, sisuka ku-20.8% ngo-2017.USolwazi Khangelani Zuma we-Human Sciences Research Council (HSRC), okuwuyena obehola lolu cwaningo, uthe abakutholile wukuthi abantu abane-HIV sebephila isikhathi eside ngenxa yokuthi badla imishanguzo yalesi sifo.“Okusikhathazayo wukuthi njengoba sanda isibalo sabantu abadala abane-HIV kusho ukuthi - ngaphandle kwalabo abadla imishanguzo yabo - kukhona nabanye abasuke beqala ukuthola ukuthi bane-HIV. Lokhu sikusho ngoba isibalo sabo sikhuphukile kuleso sango-2017.”Uthe ucwaningo lwenziwe kubantu baseTshwane, Ekurhuleni, eGoli, Sedibeng naseWest Rand.“Abantu abadla imishanguzo banyuke bafinyelela ku-73.4% eGauteng, ngo-2017 lesi sibalo sasiku-56.0%. Kuvela ukuthi abesifazane yibona abadla kakhulu imishanguzo njengoba isibalo sabo siku-75% bese esamadoda sibe ku-66.3%. Sibuye sathola ukuthi kusenabantu abangazihloli i-HIV njengoba u-61.8% wabantu abaneminyaka ewu-25-49 bethe abazihloli.”Uthe phakathi kwezinto ezenza sinyuke isibalo sabaphila ne-HIV wukushesha uzimbandakanye nocansi njengoba abanye abacwaningiwe beveze ukuthi baqale ukuya ocansini beneminyaka engaphansi kuka-15.Okunye wukulala nabantu abahlukene nokungenzi ucansi oluphephile.Ubalule ukuthi u-70% wabacwaningiwe uthe awuwasebenzisi amakhondomu noma uwasebenzisa ngezikhathi ezithile.Ugqugquzele uhulumeni ukuba andise imikhankaso yokuqwashisa nge-HIV, agqugquzele abesilisa ukuba basoke, andise imikhankaso yokusetshenziswa kwePreP. Uphinde wanxusa ukuthi kufundiswe nabesifazane namantombazane ngezindaba ze-HIV njengoba kuseyibona abangenwa kakhulu yiyo.

KWENZEKE okuvamile kuhlehla icala lenkohlakalo nokukhwabanisa elibhekene nowayengumengameli, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, kuqubuka omunye umdonsiswano.Icala lihlehlele inyanga ezayo emva kokuthi abameli bakaZuma bevuke inja ebomvu, baphonsela inselelo isinqumo seJaji uNkosinathi Chili, sokungabanikezi izizathu zokuchitha isicelo sabo sokuba kushenxe umshushisi omkhulu ecaleni, u-Advocate Billy Downer.UChili wachitha isicelo sikaZuma ngasekuqaleni konyaka, wabe esethi izizathu zokuchitha isicelo uyozihlinzeka mhla esekhipha isinqumo ecaleni.Ummeli kaZuma, u-Advocate Dali Mpofu, uthe ngeke bakwazi ukuqhubeka nokuqula icala bengakazitholi izizathu ezenza ukuthi kuchithwe isicelo sabo."Sifisa ukusidlulisela phambili isinqumo senkantolo. Asikwazi ukusidlulisela phambili isinqumo uma singenazo izizathu zokuchithwa kwaso."Kuke kwaphakama imimoya ngesikhathi abameli bakaZuma noMbuso bedonsisana ngodaba lokuqulwa kwaleli cala.Kube nomzuzu lapho khona uMpofu egane khona unwabu, ekhala ngokubukelwa phansi nguDowner.Indaba iqale ngesikhathi uDowner etshela uMpofu ukuthi angamphazamisi uma ekhuluma.“Angizanga lapha enkantolo ukuba ngizohlukunyezwa uDowner. Nginelungelo lokusukuma, ngizwakalise ukungahambisani kwami naye uma enza into engavumelekile.”UChili ukuhlehlisele uSeptemba 11 ukulalelwa kwecala, lapho khona ezokwethula izizathu zakhe zokuchitha isicelo sokuba kushenxe uDowner.Lona umzamo kaZuma wesibili wokushenxisa uDowner.Isicelo sokuqala wasifaka ekhala ngokuthi uDowner uchemile, nokho sachithwa lesi sicelo.Waphinde wafaka isicelo sesibili ekhala ngokuthi uDowner uphule umthetho ngokuputshuzela intatheli ulwazi oluyimfihlo olumayelana nokugula kwakhe.Naso lesi sicelo sachithwa, uZuma wazama nokuzishushisela uDowner mathupha, nalo leli cala lachithwa.Ecaleni lenkohlakalo, uZuma umangalelwe nenkampani yezikhali yaseFrance, iThales.UZuma usolwa ngokuthola intshontsho ngesikhathi elakuleli lithenga izikhali.Izolo, uZuma utshele abebezomeseka enkantolo ukuthi ubhecwa ngobende inyama engayidlanga.Uthe ngesikhathi kuthengwa izikhali wayengeyona ingxenye kahulumeni kazwelonke njengoba ayengumphathiswa lapha KwaZulu-Natal.

ZIYABHIMBA izinto kuSomlomo kuMasipala Abaqulusi, osebhalelwe yiqembu lakhe i-IFP lifuna izincazelo ngenkulumo ayethule kungcwatshwa isishoshovu somphakathi esiyilungu le-EFF kulo masipala.Incwadi eputshukile Isolezwe  eliyibonile iqondiswe kuNksz Nonkululeko Ndlela owuSomlomo nekhansela laleli qembu ibhalwe ngoMgqibelo. Le ncwadi imnikeza umnqamulajuqu wezinsuku eziyisikhombisa ukuthi aphendule ngenkulumo ayethule emngcwabeni kaMnuz Simangaliso Zwane, odutshulwe ebangeni elingatheni ukusuka kubo ngabasolwa abangaziwa ngenyanga edlule.Ekhuluma kulo mngcwabo, uNksz Ndlela  okukholakala ukuthi kumdonsele amanzi ngomsele, uncome isibindi sikamufi owameseka esedayiswe abakwabo (IFP).“Ngiyamkhumbula, sebengidayisile abakwethu. Amaqembu ezepolitiki anamhlanje ayadayisana, nani niyadayisana, akekho ongcono. Kwakumele ngikhethwe ngibe wusihlalo womama eZululand. Abantu bafaka imisila ngaphansi bonke.  Kwaqhamuka amadoda angabafazi athwala amaduku, akhuluma izindaba zabafazi…” washo kanje.Encwadini ebhalwe wunobhala we-IFP ehhovisini layo elikulo masipala, uMnuz Sifiso Danisa, leli qembu lithi inkulumo kaNksz Ndlela ayethula kulo mngcwabo, ifaka iqembu ehlazweni.Bafuna acacise ukuthi inkulumo ayeyethula kulo mngcwabo, wayeyethula njengosomlomo na? Bafuna aveze ukuthi wubani omyalele ukuthi akhulume emngcwabeni egameni leqembu nokuthi umngcwabo wayewuhambele njengomholi weqembu le-IFP okukanye wayezihambele nje.Le ncwadi iveza ukuthi lolu daba lizodluliselwa esigungwini sobuholi obuphezulu be-IFP.Kuthintwa uDanisa (unobhala), ukuqinisekisile ukuthi incwadi nguyena oyibhalile.“Beyiqondiswe kusomlomo ngakho anginalo ulwazi lokuthi iputshuke kanjani.  Esikudingayo nje ukuthi asicacisele, akuliwa naye. Ngokwehhovisi engikulo, kumele sazi uma umholi ezokhuluma emcimbini othile egameni leqembu. Kodwa ke angifuni kuphawula ngalokhu kakhulu kwazise incwadi seyivele iputshukile nokuyinto engadala umonakalo uma ngingaphawula ngigxile ngayo ngoba kwakungayona incwadi evulelekile,” usho kanje.Ngaphambi kokuthi uZwane adutshulwe, wayekhala ngayekubiza ngenkohlakalo edla lubi kulo masipala. Phakathi kokunye akubhala ekhasini lakhe kwi-Facebook  ngaphambi kokuthi abulawe, wayekhala ngokudutshulwa kwesishoshovu okuthiwa besilwela amalungelo abasebenzi kulo masipala uMnuz Sandile Ntshali. Kuthiwa uNtshali wasinda edutshulwa, walimala kabi okuthiwa bakhona ababoshiwe. UZwane wayesola ukuthi uNtshali wayekade elalelwe unyendle ngezinye izikhulu kulo masipala ezamthengela izinkabi. Wayegqugquzela umphakathi ukuthi uphume ngobuningi uyokweseka uNtshali enkantolo ngesikhathi kuvela abasolwa ngokumdubula.  Kuthiwa ngesikhathi uZwane edutshulwa, ngayizolo wayekade ehambele leli cala, egqugquzele namanye amalungu omphakathi ayeyingxenye yalo.

LITHINTE amalakazane iJaji Ratha Mokgoatlheng, eliqula icala lokubulawa kukaSenzo Meyiwa, ngamagama eliwashilo lisola abameli abamnyama ngobuhlathi.Inhlangano yabameli abamnyama iBlack Lawyers Association (BLA), ithe ifuna umhlangano neNhloko yamaJaji eGauteng, uJaji Dunstan Mlambo.IJaji belihlalele udaba ngoLwesithathu lapho elikhulume khona amagama okuthiwa awanambitheki kubameli abamnyama. Inhlangano yabameli ikholwa wukuthi ijaji likhulume leqisa laze lasho okungafanele.IJaji licasulwe wukungafiki kommeli u-Advocate Thulani Mngomezulu enkantolo okuthiwa ubike kumsizi weJaji nakozakwabo ukuthi akezi. IJaji lidinwe wukuthi uMngomzeulu akalithintanga lona ngqo alazise ngokulova kwalo.UMeyiwa owayeyisilomo se-Orlando Pirates neBafana Bafana, wadutshulwa wabulawa ekubo kwentombi yakhe uKelly Khumalo eVosloorus, eGauteng ngo-2014.Icala liyaqulwa eNkantolo eNkulu ePitoli kanti bahlanu abalisa abasebhokisini okuthiwa yibona abacoboshisa uMeyiwa.IJaji belibonakala ukuthi licikekile ngalo ludaba.“Yiyona ndlela abameli abamnyama abasebenza ngayo le, mhlambe angithi abanye babo? Kungathi engangibikelanga mina? Ngabe yiyona ndlela ummeli oqeqesheke kahle okumele enze ngayo le?“Ngize ngithola umyalezo kumsizi wami kodwa ummeli akalifoneli ijaji futhi kulindeleke ukuthi lona lisineke lijabule ngoba ummeli omnyama,’’ kusho iJaji lilinganisa ukuhleka.UMengameli weBLA uMnuz Nkosana Mvundlela, uthe abeneme ngendlela iJaji elikhulume ngayo futhi kufanele lulungiswe lo ludaba ngokushesha.“Kungaba yishwa ukuthi unemibono enjalo, kungabe impela kuthunaza umsebenzi wabo bonke abameli kuleli. “Kungaba kubi ukuthi iJaji elihlonishwa njengaleli, licabange ukuthi uzakwethu wenze lokhu okuthiwa ukwenzile ngoba emnyama,’’ kusho uMvundlela.IJaji Mokgoatlheng aliqali ukuba sematheni ngokuphawula kwalo enkantolo. Phambilini lake lathathana no-Advocate Zandile Mshololo kodwa naye wama ekutheni kufanele iJaji limhloniphe ngoba uwummeli.Kulindeleke ukuthi icala lokufa kukaMeyiwa libuyele enkantolo namuhla lapho kuzoqhubeka khona ubufakazi.

UMNDENI wewele laseWestrich eNewlands West ebelithunjiwe ufuna aboshwe ngokushesha umbulali. Isidumbu sikaSibusiso Mpangase (9) obesekuphele amasonto amabili edukile kuthiwa sitholwe ngabadobi sintanta emfuleni uMngeni ngoLwesithathu olwedlule. Kwakubikwe ukuthi uthunjwe yindoda engaziwa eyayihamba ngeToyota Etios e-silver grey ngoMashi 20 ebuya kodlala epaki yendawo.Ngesikhathi kwenzeka isehlakalo, uSibusiso kuthiwa wayehamba newele lakhe nenye ingane (14) yakubo.Umalumekazi kaSibusiso, uNksz Thobile Mpangase uthe bafuna kuboshwe umbulali.“Amaphoyisa awasisize asitholele umbulali, ambambe, ambophe ngento asenze yona,” kusho uNksz Mpangase.Echaza ngesimo abeyiso uSibusiso ngesikhathi umndeni uyoqinisekisa ukuthi nguye yini, uthe isikhumba besiphalwe sonke, iso lingekho, ekhanda egundiwe ezinye izinwele zishuthekwe ebuchosheni, kukhona izinzwane ezisikiwe, kwaphinde kwasikwa nengxenye yesitho sakhe sangasese.Uveze ukuthi ukungabonakali kahle kwakhe ngenxa yokucwiywa kwenze amalungu omndeni abeyoqinisekisa ngoLwesithathu atholwe ngalo, abuya ethi akuyena.Uthe kuze kwaba amalungu omndeni aye ngoLwesine abone ukuthi uyena emva kokucela abasemakhazeni ukuthi bawashe izimpahla abezigqokile. Uthe emuva kokuwashwa kwezingubo bakwazile ukubona ukuthi nguyena, kwazise bezifana nayezigqoke ngosuku anyamalala ngalo.“Sikholwa ukuthi umuntu owamthumba wayenolwazi lonke lokuthi uyiwele uSibusiso. Futhi sikholwa ukuthi ucwiye ezinye izitho zomzimba wakhe ukuze ayothwala ngazo ngoba kuye kushiwo ukuthi abantu abangamawele, banenhlanhla,” usho kanje.Ngesikhathi Isolezwe libika ngokuthunjwa kukaSibusiso ngeledlule, uNksz Mpangase washo ukuthi owesilisa osolwa ngokuthumba uSibusiso wazenza umuntu omthuma esitolo ukuthi ayomthengela ugwayi.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Robert Netshiunda ukuqinisekisile ukuthi isidumbu sikaSibusiso sitholakele, kwavulwa idokodo lokufa komuntu, imbangela yokufa kwakhe ayikaziwa njengoba kusalindwe imiphumelela yokuhlolwa kwesidumbu.

LIVULWA ngosuku okwazalwa ngalo owayenguMengameli wokuqala wombuso wentando yeningi eNingizimu Afrika, uMnuz Nelson Mandela, iPhalamende ngenyanga ezayo.UMengameli wezwe uCyril Ramaphosa uzothula inkulumo yokuvula iPhalamende lehlandla lesikhombisa ngoJulayi 18, 2024.Uzonaba ngezinhlelo zikahulumeni omusha wehlandla lesikhombisa ngemuva kokhetho lukazwelonke nolwezifundazwe obelubanjwe ngenyanga edlule.Leli hlandla likahulumeni lizohlala iminyaka emihlanu ngaphambi kokuba kukhethwe obunye ubuholi.Kulo nyaka kwenzeka okuhlukile njengoba kuzoqale kuvulwe iziShayamthetho bese kuvulwa iPhalamende ngenxa yokhetho.Okhulumela ihhovisi likaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, uMnuz Vincent Magwenya, uthe lo mholi usebhalele uSomlomo wePhalamende, emnxusa ukuthi abize umhlangano wokuhlala kwePhalamende, kuhlanganise neNdlu yoMkhandlu weziFundazwe.Uthe uzothula inkulumo yokuvula iPhalamende. “Ukuvulwa kwePhalamende kuhambisana nomgubho wosuku lukaMandela, okuwusuku olwabekwa yi-United Nations. Ngalolu suku umphakathi usuke unxuswa ukuthi wenze umehluko ulandela ezinyathelweni zale ngqalabutho.”Okhulumela iPhalamende uMnuz Moloto Mothapo, uthe uSomlomo uNkk Thoko Didiza noSihlalo weNdlu yoMkhandlu weziFundazwe uNkk Refilwe Mtsweni-Tsipane, bayitholile incwadi kamengameli enxusa ukuthi babize umhlangano wokuhlala kwePhalamende.Uthe lo mhlangano ubizwa kulandelwa isigatshana u-84 ngaphansi koMthethosisikelo wezwe.“Ayaqhubeka amalungiselelo alolu suku olubalulekile. Kubalulekile ukucacisela umphakathi ukuthi ukuvulwa kwePhalamende emuva kokhetho kuhlukile kunomcimbi wenkulumo kamengameli asuke eyibhekise esizweni, okwenzeka njalo ngoFebhuwari minyaka yonke,” kusho uMothapo.Uthe ukuvulwa kwePhalamende ilapho umengameli ezobe eveza umkhombandlela wezinto ezisuke zizokwenzeka eminyakeni emihlanu yombuso wakhe. “Inkulumo ebhekiswe esizweni usuke ebalula izinto ezizokwenzeka kulowo nyaka kuphela. Ubika nangesimo sezwe, yingakho kunomehluko,” kusho uMothapo.Kwenzeka lokhu nje kulindeleke ukuthi kushaye lolu suku umengameli ebe eseyimemezelile iKhabhinethi yakhe.Okwamanje ziyaqhubeka izingxoxo namaqembu ahlukene mayelana nokubumba uhulumeni.Umcimbi wokuvulwa kwePhalamende uhambisana nengqephu emalungwini ePhalamende. Kanjalo noma kwethulwa inkulumo kamengameli ayibhekise esizweni njalo ngoFebhuwari amalungu asuke egqoke econsa, kukhona nezimenywa ezehlukene okubalwa nababengomengameli bezwe kanjalo nabantu abenza umehluko ezweni.

LIDLULISELWE eNkantolo eNkulu yasePort Shepstone icala lomfundi osolwa ngokuba umalugaju obevele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMzumbe.Le nkantolo inqume ukuthi umsolwa ona-17 waseMthwalume avele enkantolo engenhla kusasa.Ubhekene necala lokuzama ukubulala, ukushaya ngenhloso yokwenza ucansi nokuthumba umfundi oneminyaka eyisithupha okuthiwa wamcathamela ephuma esikoleni wamhudulela esikhotheni wazama ukumdlwengula. Kukholakala ukuthi wamgqema ngetshe ekhanda wamshiya ecabanga ukuthi ufile.Umsolwa, okuvela ukuthi ubefunda u-grade 9 kwesinye sezikole ezikule ndawo ngesikhathi eboshwa, zimkhalele ngenyanga edlule emva kokuthathwa amalungu omphakathi amnikela emaphoyiseni.Kuthiwa uphinde wavuma icala lokubulala uSinethemba Ngcece (8) waseMakhoso khona eMthwalume, naye okukholakala ukuthi walandelwa ngendlela efanayo njengoba isidumbu sakhe kuthiwa satholwa abafana ababebhukuda silahlwe osebeni lomfula, sihlinziwe futhi sesiqala ukonala.  USinethemba wayesenamasonto amathathu enyamelele.Emasontweni adlule inkantolo iphinde yengeza icala lokubulawa kukamgilwa kulawa abhekene nawo umsolwa. Ngesikhathi evela bekuvunyelwe kuphela ilungu lomndeni wakhe, okuthiwa yingoba usemncane ngokweminyaka, usengaphansi kwesandla sabazali. Okhulumela inhlangano elwa nokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane nezingane endaweni, i-Women of Mthwalume, uNkk Bongekile Sithole, uthe imindeni yabagilwa ibiziwe yaziswa ngesinqumo senkantolo. Bakholwa ukuthi njengoba selidluliselwe eNkantolo eNkulu, sebezovunyelwa ukwethamela icala.

INKOSIKAZI yenduna edonsa udilikajele, ngokubulala usihlalo wegatsha le-ANC, izihlangulile ekutheni iyona eyagwazela amaphoyisa imali enguR120 000 ukuze asule icala elagcina ligojele umyeni wakhe.UNkk Sibongile Ndlovu ubephicwa ngemibuzo wuqweqwe lomshushisi, u-Advocate Lawrence Gcaba, eNkantolo yeMantshi yasePinetown izolo.Ungummangalelwa wesibili ecaleni lokuphazamisa ukusebenza kwengalo yomthetho nelenkohlakalo yokufumbathiswa kwamaphoyisa amabili angabamangalelwa, uLieutenant Colonel Khephu Ndlovu noKapteni Bonginkosi Dlamini woKlebe.UMbuso uthi la maphoyisa afumbathiswa uR120 000 owawukhishwe ebhange wuNkk Ndlovu ngomyalelo womyeni wakhe, uFelokwakhe Ndlovu, owayesatokile ngaleso sikhathi ukuze kulahleke ubufakazi ecaleni lokubulawa kukaThulani Nxumalo owayengusihlalo we-ANC KwaNdengezi.UFelokwakhe ugwetshwe udilikajele ngoMeyi nonyaka ecaleni lokubulala uNxumalo ayeyisihlobo sakhe. Kusolakala ukuthi uR120 000 wamukelwa amaphoyisa endaweni epaka izimoto ezize esiteshini samaphoyisa, iDurban Central. UDlamini nalaba abashadile bancishwa ibheyili. Bavele enkantolo nendodana yabo, uMnuz Lindokuhle Ndlovu, noKhephu abangaphandle ngebheyili.UGcaba utshele uNkk Ndlovu ukuthi wakhipha uR120 000 kwi-akhawunti yasebhange yomyeni wakhe kunguLwesine ayezowunika uNdlovu noDlamini eyalelwe ngumyeni wakhe esejele.“Imali ngayikhipha ngoba ngifuna ukwenza izidingo zasekhaya. Kwakungeyona eyokugwaza ukuze kusulwe icala. Ngaya kuNdlovu ukuze angicebise ngoba ngangifuna ukuthenga itekisi, iQuantum, sase sixoxa nangomcimbi womembeso owazuzoba sekhweni lakhe,” kuchaza uNkk Ndlovu obezihlangula aze abize uGcaba ngobaba.UGcaba ukuphikisile lokhu, wathi uNkk Ndlovu waya emhlanganweni wokuhanjiswa kwemali emaphoyiseni ekhashwa ngabesilisa ababili ababize ngomkhulu noMpofu okwakuyizethenjwa zalo mndeni ezazizoqinisekisa ukuthi uhlelo luba yimpumelelo.Bekukhona izihlobo zabamangalelwa enkantolo. UFelokwakhe uyisihlobo segazi nephoyisa uNdlovu. Kusolwa ukuthi UDlamini, owayephenya icala lokufa kukaNxumalo, wagcina esusiwe kulona.UNkk Ndlovu uthe akasiboni isidingo sokuqambela inkantolo amanga esehlale isikhathi eside kangaka ejele.ULindokuhle, ongumshana kaKhephu, kuleli cala ungena ngokuthi uMbuso uyasola ukuthi nguyena owafihla isibhamu okwabulawa ngaso uNxumalo.IMantshi uMuntukayise Khumalo ilihlehlisele uSepthemba 26 icala ukuze kuqhutshekwe nokuqulwa kwalo.

Lizoqala namhlanje, ngoLwesibili  ukuqulwa eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini icala labesilisa abathathu baseThekwini, abasolwa ngokugasela kwiBnB eseGlenwood, babulala umnikizi wayo ngo-August 10, nyakenye.Laba besilisa abangoBernand Langa (31), Mdumiseni Ntuli (27) noManelisi Mtshali (29) bebevele kule nkantolo ngoMsombuluko.Kuvela ukuthi bahlasela uNksz Jackie Nedham bafika endaweni yakhe bangqongqoza bazenza abantu abazofuna indawo yokulala.Kuthiwa kwathi sebengaphakathi baqale ngokumshaya ngaphambi kokuba bambulale ngokumklinya ngaphambi kokumnquma imilenze, bamshiya kanjalo.Ngemuva kwalokho, kuthiwa bakhala bemuka nesamba semali esikhulu esingazange sidalulwe. Kunezimpahla okuvela ukuthi babaleka nazo.Ungqondongqondo waleli tulo kuvela ukuthi ngumsolwa wokuqala uLanga, okuthiwa kwase kuphele isikhathi eside kakhulu engumsebenzi kule BnB.Kuthiwa wacela umsolwa wesibili nowesithathu ukuba bamlekelele ukuze kuphumelele itulo lakhe. Kuvela ukuthi wabathembisa ukuthi bazohlomula imali enhle uma bemlekelela.Kuthiwa babaleka nemoto ewumbala omnyama yakhe umufi. Ngemuva kwesikhathi esingangenyanga, babe sebekhalelwa ngamasongo kaSigonyela.Ngosizo lwamakhamera akule Bnb kuvela ukuthi yiwona avezela amaphoyisa konke okwenzeka ngalelo langa lwesigameko.Nyakenye, kuvele ukuthi bazama ukufaka isicelo sebheyili kodwa inkantolo yabenqabela ikhala ngezizathu ezingazwakali kahle abazibeka zokuthi bangathola ibheyili."Icala lenu lizoqala ukuthi liqulwe kusasa (namhlanje),'' kusho iJaji uRadebe.Abasolwa bobathathu bebebonakala bejulile ngokomqondo bethule, kwesinye isikhathi bebonakala sabantu abadidekile emqondweni.Ngesikhathi sebehla kuhlehliswa icala babonakale bephakamisa izandla bebingelela izihlobo zabo ebezingaphakathi zizobeseka.Kuvela ukuthi bobathathu kungenzeka kube khona amanye amacala anezezelwayo phezu kwaleli lokubulala.Ngaphandle kwecala lokubulala, babhekene necala lokugqekeza nelokweba.Umshushisi u-Advocate Dernado MacDonald, uthe kuhle ukuthi leli cala selizoqala ukuqulwa.Kuvela ukuthi kukhona nomunye umsolwa wesine okungenzeka naye agcine esebajoyina ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.

UMMANGALELWA wesihlanu ecaleni lokugwazelwa kwamaphoyisa ngo-R120 000 ukuze alahlekise ubufakazi ecaleni lokubulala elalibhekene noyise, ushaqise izethameli eNkantolo yesiFunda ePinetown ukuthi akudikizanga nqulu ngokuboshwa kukayise.UMnuz Lindokuhle Mbonambi (osebenzisa isibongo sakoninalume) uthe okwamenza wangaphatheka kabi ukuthi wayengaqali ukuboshwa uyise ngoba wayengena ephuma ejele."Wayeke aboshwe, aphinde aphume. Wayengalibambile kangako iqhaza empilweni yami, kangangoba ngangingakaze ngiphatheke kabi ngokuboshwa kwakhe," kusho uMbonambi.Ubekhuluma ngoyise ongummangalelwa wesithathu, uFelokwakhe Ndlovu odonsa udilikajele ngokubulala umzala wakhe owayephinde abe ngunobhala wegatsha le-ANC KwaNdengezi, uMnuz Thulani Nxumalo.Ubethula ubufakazi ngoLwesihlanu eluswa ngemibuzo ummeli wakhe njengoba esolwa wuMbuso ukuthi nguye owafihla isibhamu sikayise esasetshenziswa ngesikhathi kubulawa uNxumalo.UMbonambi ulandulile enkantolo ukuthi wayekhathazekile ngokuboshwa kukayise wase ehlangana nowesilisa okuthiwa uMnuz Sphephelo Ndlovu (ambize ngobhuti wakhe kodwa abanesibongo esifanayo).Kusolwa ukuthi wabizelwa yile ndoda esontweni ukuze ayothola ukudla komphefumulo futhi akhulekelwe, nokwathi seliphumile isonto bobabili bahamba ngemoto baya kwaNdlovu (Felokwakhe).Lapha kuthiwa uMbonambi waphuma esephethe okuthile okwakukade kusongwe ngoplastiki wakunika uNdlovu (Siphephelo) wayomgcinela khona kubo.Ekugcineni kwavela ukuthi kwakuyisibhamu esasinezinhlamvu, waboshwa uNdlovu (Siphephelo) emva kwezinyangana kwaxhakathiswa uMbonambi.UMbonambi uyazihlangula kulobu bufakazi obethulwa enkantolo wuNdlovu (Siphephelo). Uthi uyabhecwa, akazi kwenziwelani lokhu.Kwabanye abamangalelwa abagqigqa inkantolo kubalwa owayeyiphoyisa elinguKaputeni, owayephenya icala lokubulawa kukaNxumalo, uMnuz Bonginkosi Dlamini; uNkk Sibongile Ndlovu nomyeni wakhe uFelokwakhe kanye nowayengumphathi wesiteshi samaphoyisa saseBhekithemba eMlaza, uMnuz Khephu Ndlovu.Bonke bayawaphika amacala abathweswe wona, okungelokufumbathisa nelokuphazamisa ukusebenza kwengalo yomthetho.Ingqikithi yecala loMbuso wumhlangano okuthiwa wabanjwa wuNdlovu (Khephu) noNkk Ndlovu nabanye besilisa ababili lapho kupakwa khona izimoto ezize esiteshini samaphoyisa iDurban Central.Kusolakala ukuthi yilapho uNdlovu afumbathiswa khona uR120 000 ukuze asebenzise isikhundla sokuba usomaqhuzu emaphoyiseni ashabalalise ubufakazi, okuyinto ayikhahlela ngezinyawo zombili.Bobabili oNdlovu (uKhephu noFelokwakhe) ngabandawonye. UDlamini nabashadikazi bagqunywe ezitokisini benqatshelwa ibheyili.Icala liqhubeka enkantolo efanayo ngoLwesibili.

KUMANGALE abantu enkantolo ngesikhathi uMbuso udalula ukuthi owesifazane oboshiwe uvume amacala athweswe wona, okungelokuthumba nelokudayisa uJoshlin Smith (6).UNksz Lourencia Lombaard (32), ongumsolwa wesine ecaleni uvele izolo eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseVredenburg, eWestern Cape.Inkantolo ilihlehlisele uMsombuluko ngesonto elizayo icala ukuze umsolwa afake isicelo sebheyili futhi kuqhutshekwe nophenyo. UMbuso ukhombise zisuka wathi uzophikisana nokuthi uNksz Lombaard anikwe ibheyili.UMbuso uthe umsolwa wenze isitatimende lapho evuma khona amacala athweswe wona, wengeza ngokuthi okuningi kuzovela mhlazane sekubuyelwa enkantolo.Kukholakala ukuthi umsolwa ungomunye babantu abagcina ukubona uJoshlin ngelanga anyamalala ngalo ngoFebhuwari 19, nonyaka.Ungene enkantolo igcwele abesebenzi bayo, amaphoyisa, nabezindaba ebukeka edidekile. Ucele ukuba atolikelwe ngesiBhunu konke okukhulunywa enkantolo.Abanye abasolwa ecalemi bagqunywe ezitokisini, kubalwa unina kaJoshlin, uNksz Kelly Smith, isoka lakhe uMnuz Jacquen Appolis, noMnuz Steven van Rhyn.Bobathathu batshela inkantolo ukuthi bayayibonga ibheyili balunge begqunywe ezitokisini, icala labo lahlehliswa. Owayengumsolwa wesine, okuyisangoma, waboshwa wavela enkantolo kepha amacala ahoxiswa.Bekuthulekile ngaphandle kwenkantolo, bengekho ababhikishayo futhi kungahenqiwe ngocingo oluhlabayo njengoba kwenzeka ngesonto eledlule.Bekunedlanzana labantu ebeliqhinqe ngaphandle kwenkantolo ligqoke izikibha ezinobuso bukaJoshlin.Phambilini umphakathi waphuma inqina uthungatha uJoshlini kodwa wathola kuphela izimpahla ayekade ezigqokile.Kwafika ngisho uNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa, uMnuz Bheki Cele kubo kwaJoshlin eSaldanha Bay, ngemva kokunyamalala kwakhe.

LIPHIKA lilala ngomhlane ikhansela le-IFP kuMasipala waseNdumeni elisamisiwe, okuthiwa kuphinde kwatholwa imoto yalo nezinkomo okukholakala ukuthi ezokwebiwa, e-Utrecht ngesonto eledlule.Kuphinde kwaqubuka umsindo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngesikhathi kunofaka umbhalo othi kuphinde kwatholwa imoto kaMnuz Dumisani Xaba ophinde abewusihlalo we-IFP nomfundisi ebandleni laseChibini, okuvele ukuthi iphinde yatholakala nemfuyo kwebiwa.Ozibiza ngoSizwe Mjibhozi obhale ekhasini elithi IFP IN DIVERSITY 2024/2026/2029, ubhale kanje: “Lisaqhubeka ikhansela laseNdumeni nokungcolisa isithunzi seqembu… Kulokhu ubethumele, kwabanjwa imoto yalo nezinkomo zokwebiwa kwabanjwa nemigulukudu.”UXaba ezihlangula, uthe imoto useyidayisile.“Imoto ngiyidayise ngoLwesibili olwedlule.  Ngebhadi besingakaqedi ukukhokhelana nobeyithengile ngakho isabiza lapha ekhaya.  Ngiqale ukubona udaba ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngeSonto. Amaphoyisa abekade engithinte ngoLwesihlanu ngalolu daba, ngawazisa ukuthi angisahlanganise lutho nemoto,” usho kanje.Uthe yize kunjalo, yena nomthengi bebengakakhokhelani imali ephelele okuchaza ukuthi imoto isasegameni lakhe, futhi uyena okudingeka ayoyikhipha emaphoyiseni ngoba isabiza yena. Uthe usenqume ukuthi ayigcine uma eseyikhiphile, okungenani abuyisele abemdayisele imali yakhe ngoba ukutholwa kwayo nemfuyo yokwebiwa kungcolisa igama lakhe. UXaba uthe uxhumanile namdayiselile, kodwa naye waziqhathulula ngelokuthi imoto ibihamba umfana wakhe ngoba yena wayithenga nje kodwa akakwazi ukushayela. Kuthiwa kuboshwe abasolwa ababili ngaleli cala..NgoMeyi ubesematheni ngesikhathi imoto abehamba ngayo okuyile esiphinde yaboshwa, ibhadanywa amaphoyisa ilayishe izinkomo ezine zokwebiwa emgwaqweni obheke eDundee, okuvele ukuthi zazintshontshwe eDannhauser.Nakuba Isolezwe belibike ukuthi uXaba naboshwe naye bangaphandle ngebheyili ka- R1 000 futhi kulindeleke ukuthi baphinde bavele ngo-Agasti 28. Kodwa ngesikhathi ethintwa, uveze ukuthi icala abebekwe lona lihoxisiwe emva kokuthi ngoJulayi 18 kuvele umuntu owayeqashe imoto yakhe, okugcine sekuboshwa yena.Ucele ukungaphawuli agxile kulolo daba njengoba ethe usalinde ukuhlangana neqembu bese emva kwalokho ekwazi ukweneka isayidi lakhe kwabezindaba njengoba ekholwa ukuthi igama lakhe lahudulelwa phansi kakhulu.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Robert Netshiunda  uthe kuboshwe abasolwa abathathu abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-34 no- 45  ngamacala okutholwa nemfuyo eyebiwe, kanti bavele eNkantolo yeMaantshi yase-Utrecht ngoMsombuluko.

Alifunanga nokuyingena eyesicelo sokubuyekezwa kwendlela okumenyezwa ngayo izinombolo zabathintekayo ecaleni lokubulawa kowayengunozinti weBafana Bafana ne-Orlando Pirates, uSenzo Meyiwa, ijaji ngoLwesithathu.Lokhu kwenzeke ngesikhathi u-Advocate Sipho Ramasepele, ongummeli kammangalelwa wesibili, uBongani Ntanzi, ecela ukuthi zingabe zisamenyezwa ngokuphelele izinombolo zabathintekayo.“Emva kokuvezwa kwezinye zezinombolo izolo, kukhona isiphukuphuku esishayele ucingo unina kammangalelwa wesihlanu, sakhuluma ubuphukuphuku,” kusho uRamasepele.Uqhube wathi lolu daba bake bathi ukulumana ngalo indlebe nabashushisi bengabameli, bebeka umbono wokuthi kuzofanele kushiwo kuphela izinombolo ezine ezingasekugcineni kwenombolo yeselula.“Bese kuthi amagama abanikazi bazo, angagagulwa nhlobo, kushiwo njekuphela ukuthi le nombolo ekalowo ovela ku-index number 1, ngenza isibonelo. Thina sizobe sesazi ukuthi kushiwo bani,” kwengeza uRamasepele.IJaji uRatha Mokgoatlheng liphendule ngelithi: “Cha, cha, cha, ngeke ngikwazi ukuvumela lokho, ngoba ngizophinde ngisolwe ngokwenza umathanda wami enkantolo.”Uqhube wathi ubufakazi okufanele buvezwe enkantolo, kufanele buvezwe.“Ukuthi ubani okhetha ukuthatha olunye lolwazi oluvela la (enkantolo) alwenze lokho akuthandayo, okwakhe lokho. Akusikho okwenkantolo, inkantolo ayihlangene nalokho,” kusho uMokgoatlheng.URamasepele ugcine esethi uma inkantolo ibona kanjalo ayikho inkinga.Ufakazi ophambi kwenkantolo njengamanje, uNksz Pinky Vythilingam, oyisikhulu senkampani yamaselula, iVodacom, uqhubekile nokwethula ubufakazi bakhe obuthinta izinombolo zamaselula eholwa umshushisi woMbuso, u-Adv Ronnie Sibanda.Kuyiwe ekhefini leyitiye, kwathi uma kubuywa, umshushisi woMbuso, u-Adv George Baloyi, wacela inkantolo ukuthi iguqe ize ibuye namuhla.Uthe wenza lesi sicelo ukuze uMbuso uzokwazi ukugaya obunye ubufakazi obuthunyelwe ngobuxhakaxhaka bamakhompyutha ukuze bube semaphepheni bese bedluliselwa kubameli.Uthe lobu bufakazi bumayelana nemibhoshongo okuthiwa kwakudonsa kuyo amaselula abamangalelwa, wathi buqukethe ulwazi lokuthi iqhelelene kangakanani, wathi buphinde bucacise ukuthi umbhoshongo ngamunye uqhelelene kangakanani nendawo yesigameko okwabulawa kuso uMeyiwa.UMeyiwa wadutshulwa wafa ekubo kwentombi yakhe engumculi, uKelly Khumalo ngo-Okthoba 2014.

LUNIKWE amandla uphiko oluphenya amacala enziwa amaphoyisa kanjalo namaphoyisa kamasipala kuleli i-Independent Police Investigative Directorate (IPID), kulandela ukusayinwa komthetho nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa.URamaphosa usayine umthetho i-Independent Police Investigative Directorate Amendment Act, ezonika i-IPID amandla okuphenya amacala enziwa amaphoyisa namaphoyisa kamasipala uma esemsebenzinini noma engekho.Phambilini lolu phiko belunamandla okuphenya kuphela amacala enziwe amaphoyisa uma esemsebenzini. Amacala azophenywa yilolu phiko asuke ebucayi okubalwa awokudlwengula, awokubulala namanye.Okhulumela uRamaphosa uMnuz Vincent Magwenya, uthe lo mthetho usayinwe emuva kokubuyekezwa komthetho wango-2011 walolu phiko.Uthe ngokwalo mthetho lolu phiko kumele lusebenze ngokuzimela futhi lungakhethi mabala.“Kumele lungakhethi mabala, lusebenze ngaphandle kokwesaba nokwenzelela. Lolu phiko luzophenya wonke amacala enziwe amaphoyisa namaphoyisa kamasipala noma kuthiwa bebesemsebenzini noma bengekho. Luzophenya namacala okudlwengula enziwa amaphoyisa namaphoyisa kamasipala.”Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi lolu phiko lumandla ekuphenyeni amacala athinta amaphoyisa asuke edubule kwaze kwagcina kushona izigebengu. Ngokwalo mthetho osayiniwe uNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa akasazokwazi ukuthatha izinyathelo zokuqondisa ubugwegwe isikhulu se-IPID, ngaphandle kokungenela kwePhalamende.Okunye ngukuthi sekumele kuhlolisiswe kabanzi ngaphambi kokuqashwa kwesikhulu salolu phiko.UMnuz Stephens Ramafoko, obhekele ezomthetho kwi-IPID, ekhuluma nesiteshi somsakazo iSAfm, uthe okusha ngukuthi lolu phiko selunikwe amandla athe xaxa okuphenya amacala enziwa amaphoyisa nakamasipala.“Phambilini besingakwazi ukuphenya amacala enziwa amaphoyisa nakamasipala uma engasebenzi. Kodwa manje sesizokwazi ukuphenya amacala noma kuthiwa abengasebenzi.” UMagwenya uthe uhlaka iCivilian Secretariat, lweluleka ungqongqoshe wamaphoyisa ngemigomo nangocwaningoUthe luqapha nokusebenza kwamaphoyisa luphinde luxhumane nezinhlaka ezehlukene ezingekho emnyangweni ngezinhlelo zokulwa nobugebengu.

KUZOSHINTSHA ukwenza komasipala abashaya udaka kuleli njengoba kuzobunjwa ithimba longqongqoshe abahlukene, abazobhekana ngqo nokulungisa isimo kulabo masipala.Leli thimba lizobhekana nokuguqula izinto kulabo masipala abangenzi kahle abahlale bethola imibiko engemihle yokusebenza kwemali.Lokhu kuvezwe nguNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu, uMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa, othe leli komiti lizongena ligamanxe kulabo masipala, libheke amava ezikhulu ezijutshwe khona. UHlabisa uthe iKhabhinethi inqume ukuthi kumele kubunjwe leli thimba elizoletha uhlaka lokusebenza ezinsukwini ezingu-21 ezizayo.“Uhulumeni wobumbano ubeke eqhulwini eyokulungisa uhulumeni wasekhaya. Ithimba longqongqoshe lizibekele isikhathi sokuthi lilungise isimo, kwezinye izindawo izinyanga ezintathu, kweminye eziyisithupha kuya kwezingu-12,” kusho uHlabisa.Uthe sekusele izinyanga ezingu-26 ngaphambi kokhetho lohulumeni basekhaya, wathi yingakho besebenza ngamandla ukulungisa isimo kulabo masipala.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi uMcwaningi maBhuku Jikelele evele ngaphambi kwekomiti lalo mnyango ePhalamende izolo, lapho bekuthulwa umbiko wokusebenza kwemali komasipala.Iminyango athe iyingxenye yekomiti kubalwa owezokuBusa ngokuBambisana, owezokuHlaliswa kwaBantu, owezaManzi nokuHanjiswa kweNdle, uMnyango kaMgcinimafa, owezokuThutha kanjalo nokaGesi naMandla.UHlabisa uthe uzolinika leli komiti umbiko uma usulungile. Ukhale ngomasipala abangu-10 okubheda uhlelo kubona.UMcwaningi maBhuku Jikelele, uNksz Tsakani Maluleke, uveze ukuthi omasipala abangu-34 kwabangu-257, abathole umbiko omuhle wokusebenza kwemali.UMasipala waseKapa yiwona kuphela umasipala kwabakhulu kuleli abaziwa ngamametro, othole umbiko omuhle wezezimali.KwaZulu-Natal, uMasipala uMhlathuze ungomunye womasipala abathole umbiko omuhle wokusebenza kwezezimali.UNksz Maluleke ukhale ngokuthi omasipala abaningi bathole imibiko esuke inezinto okudingeka zilungiswe.“Omasipala abangu-110, bathole umbiko wokusebenza kwezezimali omuhle kodwa kunezinto okudingeka zilungiswe. Omasipala abangu-14 bathole umbiko omubi wokusebenza kanti kudingeka batakulwe kulesi simo.” Ukhale ngokuthi phezu kokuba omasipala abangama-metro benazo zonke izinsiza kodwa ukhathazekile ngokuthi abenzi kahle.“Omasipala okubalwa oweTheku, owaseGoli, owase-Ekurhuleni ne-Nelson Mandela Bay, bathole imibiko edinga ukuthi kulungiswe okuthile,” kusho uNksz Maluleke.Ubuye waveza ukuthi kunokuthi isimo sibe ngcono komasipala abathola imibiko emihle siya ngokuba sibi kakhulu.UNksz Hlengiwe Mkhaliphi we-EFF, ukhale ngokuthi isimo siba sibi kunokuthi sibe ngcono komasipala ngokusebenza kwemali.UHlabisa uthe amaqembu ezepolitiki kumele akwazi ukungenelela abuze izimeya ngezikwenzayo emikhandlwini engahambisi ngisho imibiko yokusebenza kwemali.

LIZOYA kohlolwa ingqondo iphoyisa likaMasipala weTheku elibhekene necala lokubulala ngesihluku intombi yalo, nayo eyiphoyisa kuwona lo masipala.Lokhu kuhlalukengoMsombuluko ngesikhathi umsolwa uConstable Sizwe Ngema (27) evela eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini.Kwenzeka lokhu nje, bekulindeleke ukuthi afake isicelo sebheyili kodwa uMshushisi woMbuso uMnuz Calvin Govender waphakamisa ukuthi naso isicelo sebheyili, uNgema uzosifaka uma sekubuye umbiko wodokotela abazomhlola umqondo.UNgema ubekwe amacala amabili, elokuqala elokugwaza abulale uConstable Bianca Khuzwayo (24), elesibili elokweba iselula yakhe.Isigameko senzeka eflethini likamsolwa elisenkabeni yeTheku ngoMashi 31.UMshushisi uGovender eqeda ukubeka ezithebeni icala, ucele ukuthi lihlehliswe ukuze umsolwa ezoyohlolwa ingqondo.“Umbuso wenza lesi siphakamiso usisusa kobunye bobufakazi obusedokodweni laleli cala,” kusho uGovender.Ummeli kamsolwa, u-Advocate Ravi Reddy uthe akaphikisani nesiphakamiso sombuso.“Noma singakazi okwamanje ukuthi umphumela uzobuya uthini kodwa uma umbiko usulungile, uzolekelela,” kusho u-Adv Reddy.Ufake isicelo sokuthi libuye emva kwamasonto amabili icala kodwa iMantshi uMnuz Scelo Zuma wale waphetha, ethi side kakhulu leso sikhathi.“Izinsuku eziyisikhombisa kufanele ukuthi zizokwanela ukuthi ahlolwe umqondo,” kusho uZuma.UZuma ugcine ethi alibuyele ngoMeyi 6 icala wathi umsolwa uzoqhubeka nokugcinwa esitokisini sasejele laseWestville.Ngesikhathi evela enkantolo uNgema izolo, ubeshaye ezimnyama, elokhu ebukeka edangele, esonge izandla zakhe ngaphambili.Umndeni kamufi ubukhona enkantolo, wala ukukhuluma nabezindaba, othe akukho ofuna ukukusho.Isigameko sabangundabuzekwayo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana emva kokuthi uNgema aqopha i-video kaConst Khuzwayo ephuma umphefumulo, ummese ayemgwaze ngawo usabhajwe esifubeni.

ICALA lokubulala elibhekene nephoyisa elalisebenzela uMasipala weTheku kulindeleke ukuthi liloku lihlehla enkantolo kuze kufike uNovemba 8 lapho uMnuz Sizwe Ngema ezoyohlolwa ngawo ingqondo eFort Napier.Emaphepheni asenkantolo abonwe yiSolezwe Ngempelasonto kuvele ukuthi umsolwa uzoyiswa kulesi sibhedlela sabagula ngengqondo ngoNovemba 8 nonyaka. UNgema uthweswe icala lokugwaza abulale intombi yakhe wase efaka i-video ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.Isenzo sikaNgema (27) othweswe icala lokubulala ngesihluku intombi yakhe, uNksz Bianca Khuzwayo (23), saba yindaba egudwini.Lesi sigameko senzeka ngoMashi 31 kuwona lo nyaka.Ngokwezinhlelo kuthiwa uNgema uzolokhu eya enkantolo kufike kuhlehliswe icala kuze kufike uNovemba 8 azoyohlolwa ngawo ingqondo.NgoLwesihlanu uNgema ubevele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini, icala laphinde lahlehliselwa uJulayi 25.Ngaphambilini kwaba nesasasa elikhulu enkantolo kulindeleke ukuthi kumenyezelwe imiphumela yokuhlolwa kwakhe ingqondo kodwa kwavela ukuthi lokho akwenzekanga.Azibanga khona izizathu ezibambekayo ezavezwa. UMshushisi uCalvin Govender waphakamisa ukuthi lolu hlelo lusheshe ukuze leli cala lizobonakala liba nenqubekela phambili.Ngaphambilini kule nkantolo kwahlaluka ukuthi umsolwa akakhumbuli lutho ngokwenzeka ngosuku lwesigameko.Lokhu kwavela embikweni kaDkt Jabulani Mthethwa onguchwepheshe ekucubunguleni indlela yokuziphatha kwabantu.Ngemuva kwalokho uDkt Mthethwa waphakamisa ukuthi kungaba umbono ophusile ukuba umsolwa aphinde ayohlolisiswa kahle ukusebenza kwengqondo yakhe esibhedlela.

AMAQEMBU abambisene ne-ANC kuhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal nokazwelonke, i-IFP neDA, awazazi noma azokweseka i-ANC noma azongenela umbango wesikhundla sobumeya kumasipala waseThekwini, uma sekukhethwa imeya entsha.Abaholi be-IFP nabeDA eThekwini, bathe basalinde izwi eliqhamuka ebuholini obuphezulu uma bebuzwa ukuthi bazokweseka bani ngoLwesithathu.Imeya yeTheku izoqokwa emhlanganweni womkhandlu oyisipesheli ozokuba ngoLwesithathu eNkosi Albert Luthuli Convention Centre, eThekwini.Maningi amathuba okuthi i-ANC isicoshe phansi isikhundla ngoba akukho okubambekayo okukhombisa ukuthi amaqembu aphikisayo azozama ukuyihlanganyela.Kubhekwe ukuthi i-ANC iphakamise igama lowayenguMphathiswa wezoLimo, uMnuz Cyril Xaba.I-ANC ayinazo izihlalo ezanele zokuthi ibuse ngokuzimela eThekwini, yasindiswa amaqembu amancane ngesikhathi amaqembu aphikisayo amakhulu iDA, EFF ne-IFP bezama ukuyiqumba phansi mhla kukhethwa imeya emva kokhetho lohulumeni basekhaya lwango-2021. Akubukeki i-IFP neDA bezoyiphonsela inselelo kulokhu.Yize amaqembu engenaso isivumelwano sokusebenzisana komasipala, anesivumelwano sokusebenzisana kuzwelonke naKwaZulu-Natal.Ohola i-IFP kumasipala waseThekwini, uMnuz Mdu Nkosi, uthe bebengakanqumi ukuthi bazokwenza njani emhlanganweni wakusasa."Njengamanje alikho iqembu elisakhulume nathi kulawa amakhulu anezihlalo esigungwini esiphezulu. Sisalinde abaholi ukuthi basitshele ukuthi kufanele senzenjani. Sizokuba nenguyazana ngaphambi komhlangano, kulapho ke esizovumelana khona ngokuthi emhlanganweni sizofika senze njani."UNkosi uthe ukusebenzisana kwe-IFP ne-ANC esifundazweni nakuzwelonke akusho ukuthi sebezobambisana nakumasipala."Kodwa ngiyazi ukuthi abaholi bethu bayaxoxa ngalokhu, ngakho sizolinda bona."Ohola iDA kumasipala waseThekwini, uMnuz Thabani Mthethwa, uthe bazokuba nenguyazana namhlanje."Asikho isinqumo esesisithathile, silinde abaholi ukuthi basibonise."Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kukasihlalo we-EFF eThekwini, uMnuz Themba Mvubu, ayizange iphumelele.I-EFF ibikade isebenzisana ne-ANC eThekwini, kodwa umshado wabo waphela kabuhlungu njengoba i-ANC yakhipha uMvubu kwesokuba usihlalo wekomiti lezokuhlaliswa kwabantu.ITheku lisale lingenayo imeya emva kokususwa kukaMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda, osejutshwe eMkhandlwini weziFundazwe.Imeya kwakufanele ikhethwe emhlanganweni womkhandlu owawungenyanga eyedlule kepha akwangenzeka.

Abasebenzi abasolwa ngokuphazamisa ukusebenza kukamasipala, abangamalungu eSA Municipal Workers Union (SAMWU),  abafuna ukuthi iholo labo esigabeni uCatagory 10, lilingane nabanye abasebenzi abasebenza kwabanye omasipala abangama-metro kuleli. Umasipala uziphendulela ngokuthi ngeke ukwazi ukuthatha isinqumo ngalezi zikhalo ngoba zisadingidwa ezingeni likazwelonke. Phambilini, ubungafuni nokuba nomhlangano nale nyunyana ngoba uthi lolu daba akukafaneli ulukhulume singakakhishwa isinqumo ngalo kuzwelonke kodwa kuleli sonto imenenja kamasipala, uMnuz Musa Mbhele, ithe umasipala uhlangene nenyunyana ngoba awukho umgomo othi akumele bakhulume nabasebenzi babo noma ngabe isinqumo ngesikhalo sabo kumele siphume kuzwelonke.Abaholi benyunyana iSAMWU abaphumeli obala ngokuthi ngabe lesi siteleka sisaqhubeka yini, bathi abasebenzi babuya emsebenzini njengoba beyalelwe yinkantolo. Umasipala uthe unezinhlelo zokwengezelwa kosonkontileka abalungisa ugesi namanzi isikhathi sokusebenza ngalesi sikhathi, ukuphelezelwa ngamaphoyisa kwabasebenzi abangekho esitelekeni, amavolontiya ahlanza idolobha kodwa eminye imiphakathi isalokhu ikhala.Kusukela ngoFebhruwari 27, kuningi osekwenzekile, ngakolunye uhlangothi, umphakathi osunengwe ukungalethwa kwezidingo nawo usuphumele ezitaladini ukhombisa ukucasuka kwawo, ngokubhikisha ushise amathayi avuthayo uvale imigwaqo, ufuna amanzi nogesi.Amaqembu ezepolitiki aphikisayo athi sekuyisikhathi sokuthi iMeya yeTheku, uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda nemenenja yalo masipala, uMnuz Musa Mbhele, bashiye izikhundla zabo ngoba umsebenzi ubehlulile, kodwa uMbhele uthi uMasipala weTheku ungomunye womasipala abathathu abaphethwe kahle kuleli.  Usihlalo wenyunyana yabasebenzi I-Independent Municipal & Allied Trade Union (Imatu), eThekwini nayo enamalunga ayo kuMasipala weTheku, uNksz Queen Mbatha, uthe le nyunyana ayikho esitelekeni kodwa iyingxenye yezingxoxo ezidingida lolu daba.Uthe abasebenzi abangaphansi kwale nyunyana abakwazi ukufinyelela emphakathini ngoba bayesatshiswa, abanye bashaywa ngamatshe.-Kunomsebenzi oshaywe wabulawa ehambise abasebenzi abamba imigodi emathuneni ase-17 eMlaza, abanye baphelezelwa ngamaphoyisa uma beyosebenza.-Abangu-13 abangamalungu eSAMWU baboshelwe amacala okudala udlame emphakathini nokulimaza impahla kamasipala. Badedelwe inkantolo ngebheyili kaR2 000 umuntu emunye.-Abangu-88 bakhonjwe indlelaAbangu- 81 bamisiweAbangu-1800 banikezwe izincwadi zokuthi abaziphathanga kahle.UMbhele uthe umonakalo odaleke eThekwini ngenxa yalesi siteleka usabalwa kodwa ungaphezulu kuka-R10 Million. Akuzona izakhamizi kuphela ezikhathazekile ngesimo saseThekwini kodwa nosomabhizinisi, ngenxa yokukhathazeka kwabo, uNdunankulu uNkk Nomusa Dube Ncube, kudingeke ukuthi akhulume neDurban Chamber of Commerce, ayimise idolo ngalesi simo.Abezempilo bakhathazekile ngokunqwabelana kukadoti osulahlwa ezindaweni ezingafanele ngoba ungalandiwe.UDkt Carmen James uthe imfucuza elahlwe ezindaweni ezingafanele ingadala ukuthi imifula nezikhungo zamanzi zingenwe indle.“Indle idala igciwane le-e.coli, udoti udala izimpethu, izimpukane nezinye izinambuzane. Uma sekunalezo zinambuzane kuba namagundane nezinyoka eziyingozi kubantu. Njengamanje umphakathi ubheke ukuthi ngabe amasonto amabili athenjiswe yimeya, azophela isimo sesibuyele ngempela yini kwesejwayelekile.

UMPHATHISWA wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu KwaZulu-Natal uNkk Bongiwe Sithole-Moloi wethule uhlelo lokulwa nokulahlwa kwemfucuza budlabha eMawoti, eNanda.Lolu hlelo oluzovula amathuba angu-450 emisebenzi ezinyangeni ezingu-12, lusungulwe komasipala abangu-12 esifundazweni ngaphansi kolubizwa nge-Expanded Public Works Programme (EPWP).Omasipala abayingxenye yohlelo kubalwa oweTheku, owaseKokstad, uMsunduzi, Alfred Duma, Ray Nkonyeni, uMasipala waseNdumeni, Newcastle, KwaDukuza, Abaqulusi noMasipala waseMhlathuze.Kumasipala ngamunye kuzovuleka amathuba omsebenzi angu-40 kanti kowaseThekwini kuzovuleka angu-100.UMphathiswa wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu, uNkk Bongi Sithole-Moloi, udlulise izinkontileka kubasebenzi abaqashiwe, wabalula inhloso yokuthi baqale lolu hlelo lokulwa nokulahlwa kwemfucuza budlabha."Okuseqhulwini ngalolu hlelo ukuthi sisuse izindawo zokulahla imfucuza ezingekho emthethweni, bese siyaziguqula zibe yizindawo eziyizingadi emphakathini, ezinye kube ngezokuzijabulisa.“Sihlonze izindawo eziningi kubona labomasipala, kubalwa neziseduze nezikole, izibhedlela nezemidlalo," kusho uSithole-Moloi.Uqhube wathi bazibophezele ukuthuthukisa imiphakathi,  wanxusa ukuthi omasipala bakweseke ukulwa nokulahlwa kwemfucuza ngokungemthetho."Sinxusa omasipala ukuthi balweseke lolu hlelo ngokuhlinzeka ngezinsiza ezifana nemigqomo kadoti.“Sizibophezele ukuthuthukisa imiphakathi njengoba ukulahlwa kwemfucuza ngokungemthetho kwanda, udoti ugcina usungena emfuleni nasolwandle okubeka  engcupheni impilo yezilwane ezihlala emanzini."Ukulahla imfucuza ngokungemthetho kugcina sekuvala  izitamkoko, okudala inkinga yokungahambi kwamanzi uma kunemvula enkulu," kubeka uNkk Sithole-Moloi.

LUQALILE uhlelo lokunqanyulwa kwezinkontileka zezinkampani ebezinikezwe umsebenzi yisikhwama esibhekelele uxhaso lwezitshudeni, i-National Students Financial Scheme, wokuhlinzeka ngemali okukholakala ukuthi aziwenzanga ngendlela umsebenzi.Ngenyanga edlule uNgqongqoshe weMfundo ePhakeme nobuChwepheshe, uDkt Blade Nzimande, umemezele ukuhlakazwa kwebhodi elengamele lesi sikhwama, safakwa ngaphansi kweso lomlawuli emva kokuthi kube nezikhalo eziningi ezivele ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme nakwabamele izitshudeni ngokungahambi ngendlela kohlelo lokudluliselwa kwemali.Kuqokwe uMnuz Freeman Nomvalo njengomlawuli kulesi sikhwama, okuwumsebenzi azowenza izinyanga eziwu-12, okuyisikhathi esingavuselelwa uma kusenesidingo.Ekhuluma esithangamini nabezindaba ebesisePitoli ngoMsombuluko, okokuqala selokhu ephethe lesi sikhundla, uNomvalo uthe lesi sikhwama sithathe amagxathu abalulekile ukulandela izincomo zombiko wenkampani yabameli, iWerkmen Attorneys, owawucubungula iminxa isikhwama okumele sikhuphule amasokisi kuyo ekuphathweni kwaso.“Phakathi kwezinto ezavela kulo mbiko, okuthiwa azihanjiswanga ngendlela, wukuqokwa kwezinkampani isikhwama esasizokhokha kuzo zona ziyidlulisele kwizitshudeni ezifake izicelo zoxhaso, okuyi-Ezaga Holidings, iCoinvest Africa, iNorraco Corporation neTenet Technologies.  Ngiyajabula ukumemezela ukuthi ukunqanyulwa kwezinkontileka zalezi zinkampani sekuqalile namaphepha adingekayo asefakiwe enkantolo. Ukunqamula izinkontileka, iNsfas isebenzisane nabophiko oluphenya amacala abucayi, iSpecial Investigation Unit. Lapho kudingeka khona, sizovula amacala obugebengu,” usho kanjeUthe ukuqinisekisa ukuthi uhlelo lokukhokhelwa kwezitshudeni emanyuvesi aluphazamiseki, lesi sikhwama sinxuse wona amanyuvesi uqobo ukuthi alekelele kulolu hlelo lokuhlinzekwa kwezitshudeni ngezimfanelo kuze kube sekupheleni kukaJulayi kulo nyaka.Unxuse zonke izitshudeni, ezifake imininingwane yasebhange engaqondile ezithole umyalezo ozazisa ngalokho, ukuthi ziphinde zifake kabusha imininingwane yazo elungisiwe.Mayelana nezindawo ezihlala izitshudeni, uNomvalo unxuse bonke abanikazi bezindawo ezizimele abangakhokhelwe ukuthi babhalele lesi sikhwama kwi-email ethi [email protected] babike izikhalo zabo. Uthembise ukuthi ababhale manje bazokhokhelwa ngasekupheleni kwale nyanga kanti abasalile bazokhokhelwa maphakathi nenyanga ezayo.Uveze ukuthi izitshudeni ezifunda emakolishi, ezibhekelelwe ngaphansi kwalesi sikhwama, imali yazo iqale ukukhokhwa ngenyanga edlule, wanxusa lezo ezingakawafaki ama-akhawunti azo asemabhange ukuthi ziwafake ukuze zikhokhelwe. Uthe zingu-211 591 izitshudeni zasemakolishi eseziyitholile imali yazo kanti ezingu- 7 160 azikakayitholi  ngenxa yezingqinamba ezehlukene kubalwa nalezo ezithinta imininingwane yasemabhange.

LUQALE kabi usuku kwezinye izakhamizi zaseSoweto zifakwa kuwolawola ngamacala ahlukene ngesikhathi amaphoyisa enesivimbamgwaqo eRoodepoort.UKhomishana wamaPhoyisa eGauteng uLieutenant General Tommy Mthombeni obehola umsebenzi ebambisene nezinhlaka ezahlukene zamaphoyisa iTRT, POP neMounted Unit, VCIU, kukhona amaphoyisa kamasipala nabaqaphi bobugebengu abasha abasanda kuqashwa ngohlelo lweNasi Ispani.Kulesi zivimbamgwaqo kuboshwe abantu abangu-65 ngamacala okuba kuleli ngokungemthetho abanye batholwe bephethe umshini wokugembula ongekho emthethweni.Ngokusho kwamaphoyisa, uhlelo lwe-#OperationShanela luzoqhubeka ezindaweni ezahlukene eGoli kodwa luzogxila kakhulu ezindaweni ezisentshonalanga njengoba iqhubeka impi yokulwa nabavukuzi abangekho emthethweni.Ngemuva kwalesi sivimbamgwaqo, amaphoyisa anikele eMatholesville endaweni eyaziwa kakhulu ngokuba namazamazama.Amaphoyisa afike kule ndawo awola amathulizi okuvukuza angekho emthethweni.UMnyango weziMbiwa nawo ufake isandla ekulekeleleni amaphoyisa ngogandaganda obusetshenziselwa ukugqiba le nqwaba yemigodi okuvukuzwa kuyo okungekho emthethweni.

LUQALE phansi uvalo emphakathini waseNhlungwane eNtuzuma kulandela ukudutshulwa kubulawe abane ezigamekweni ezimbili ezahlukene.Esigamekweni esenzeke ezintatha izolo, kudutshulwe kwabulawa abathathu ebebeyiziqashi kule ndawo, kanti ngoMsombuluko ebusuku bekudutshulwe oyedwa, oyisakhamuzi.Ngokusho komthombo ocele ukungadalulwa, esigamekweni sayizolo, abasolwa okukholakala ukuthi bebelibangise emqashweni ohlala abafi, baqale badubula owesilisa (40) nowesifazane (24) abahlangane nabo endleleni.“Kuthiwa baqale bababuza lo abagcine bemdubulela endlini ukuthi uphi, bemgagula ngegama.“Kuthe beqeda nje ukubayalela ukuthi bazomthola kuliphi igumbi, babadubula bobabili, base bedlulela emqashweni,” kusho umthombo.Laba ababili kuthiwa bebeyothenga utshwala njengoba bekuphuzwa emqashweni, kumnandi.Uqhube wathi, bathe uma befika emqashweni, baqonda ngqo egumbini ebeliqashwe yilona wesilisa (50), bamdubula.“Baqede lapho bathatha izikhiye zetekisi abelishayela, bahamba ngalo,” kusho umthombo, othe itekisi ligcine litholwa lishiywe lodwa eLindelani.Uveze ukuthi bobathathu abafi bangabokudabuka eMsinga, wathi abanaso isiqiniseko sokuthi bebehlaselelwani wathi ukholwa ukuthi umuntu obefunwa yilo odutshulelwe endlini.“Laba ababili, bafele ukuthi bababonile abasolwa nokuthi mhlawumbe abantu ababaziyo,” kusho umthombo.Elandisa ngesigameko sangoMsombuluko, nathe naso senzeke endaweni efanayo nale okudutshulelwe kuyo ababili izolo, uthe umufi uMnuz Zamo Mthembu uvinjezelwe ngabasolwa, bamdubula.“Kuthiwa bebevile kwabane. Bathe uma beqeda ukumdubula, baphela emehlweni, akucacanga noma bebehamba ngezinyawo noma ngemoto yini,” kusho umthombo.Imizamo yokuthola imindeni yabafi ayiphumelelanga.Umsunguli weNtuzuma Neighbourhood Watch uMnuz Andile Jali uthe indawo yaseNtuzuma neyaseNanda zihlaselwe amaqembu emigulukudu, i-East neWest.Uthe nakuba bengakalutholi ulwazi olugcwele kodwa izigameko zokubulawa kwabantu, ziyamaniswa nawo lamaqembu emigulukudu.“Kwesinye isikhathi bangenelana bodwa, babulalane bebanga izindawo zokudayisa izidakamizwa.“Kokunye, babulala amalungu omphakathi bewabamba inkunzi noma bewasukela nje,” kusho uJali.Edweba isithombe ngalamaqembu, uthe ngendlela ayingozi ngayo, anamalungu angaphezu kuka-50 iqembu ngalinye.Wakhala ngokuthi abakula maqembu, bayizingane ezincane.“Izingane ezincane lezi. Zineminyaka eqala ku-16, endala kunazo zonke okuthiwa ingubhongoza wakhona, ineminyaka engu-21.“Umphakathi uyazisaba ngoba ziphatha izinhlokohlela zezibhamu,” kusho uJali.Nakuba kuke kwangathi kuyathula kancane ngasekupheleni konyaka odlule ngesikhathi iNIU ibaqotha, kodwa sekuqale phansi.“Kuthiwa emva kokudutshulwa kwabayisithupha (eZintombini, KwaBester) ubhongoza wakhona, waqala phansi, wahamba engena umuzi nomuzi, efuna amalungu amasha,” kusho uJali.Uthi wayefika anikeze ingane eno-16 isibhamu athi uma ingafun ukujoyina izozibona ukuqeda.“Eziningi zijoyinile, ebezisaba abazali bazo bazihambisile endaweni, zayohlala kwezinye izindawo,” usho kanje.Uthi abakubonayo ukuthi impi yemigulukudu kulendawo isiyoqedwa ukutshalwa kwayo iNIU noma amasosha.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Robert Netshiunda uthe amaphoyisa asephume inqina, athungatha abasolwa ngokubulala abantu abane, balimaza noyedwa eNhlungwane.“Akucaci noma zombili izigameko zihlobene. Onolwazi olungalekelela ophenyweni, uyacelwa  athinte amaphoyisa aseduze noma ashayele inombolo yokubika ngobugebengu ethi 08600 10111,” kusho uNetshiunda.

UMNYANGO wezemfundo KwaZulu-Natal, usuluqale ngokusemthethweni uhlelo lokukhangiswa kwezikhala zothisha eziku- Post Leve One (PL1), oluvumela bonke abanezicucu ezifanele bafake izicelo ngokuvulelekile.Lolu hlelo belulindwe ngamehlo abomvu ngothisha abangaqashiwe nabaqashwe ngokwetoho, emva kokuthi lwamenyezelwa nguMphathiswa walo mnyango esifundazweni uMnuz Sipho Hlomuko ethatha izintambo, kulandela izikhalo zenkohlakalo nokuqasha ngikwenzelela okukholakala ukuthi bekwenziwa yiziphathimandla ezikoleni nasemahhovisi omnyango emazingeni  aphansi ngesikhathi kuqhubeka uhlelo lwaphambilini obeluphoqa umuntu ukuthi ashiye imininingwane yakhe kwi-database yomnyango, athembele ekutheni igama lakhe lizotonyulwa uma kuvela isikhala.  Ngalolu hlelo, abafaka izicelo sebezokwazi ukubona izikhala ezikhona zomsebenzi, njengoba zikhangiswa isidana zifakwe kwi- website yomnyango ethi, www.kzneducation.gov.za.   UHlomuka ugqugquzele bonke abafuna ukufaka izicelo zomsebenzi ukuthi bengaliyeki leli thuba.  Izikhala zomsebenzi zikleliswe ezikoleni ezikomasipala abehlukene esifundazweni.

UMKHONTO weSizwe (MK) uthi kungenzeka kuqathake abanye abaningi njengoba ulwandle izolo, lukhafule ongumdidiyeli wayo wesikhashana KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Nhlanhla Ngidi. UNgidi udilizwa esikhaleni nje, kuthangi lokhu kade emele i-MK emcimbini we-IEC lapho amaqembu abeyofunga khona ngokuziphatha kahle ngesikhathi sokhetho. Umcimbi ubuseThekwini e-ICC, lapho wonke amaqembu abegqishe khona. Ukhetho oluzoba ngoMeyi 29, nonyakaUMkhonto weSizwe lona ongundabuzekwayo, wethulwa owayengumengameli uMnuz Jacob Zuma ngoDisemba nyakenye, wathi usehamba nawo. UZuma walibeka ngembaba elokuthi akasayingeni eye-ANC. UZuma kumanje uphezulu ohlwini lwabaya ePhalamende emuva kokwehliswa kukaMnuz Jabulani Khumalo owabhalisa iqembu. I-MK isasebenza ngezinhlaka zesikhashana njengoba ingakayihlalisi ingqungquthela yokukhetha ubuholi bayo.UNgidi, ophezulu ohlwini lwe-MK lwabaya esiShayamthetho e-KZN, udiliziwe esikhundleni sokuba wumholi wesikhashana esifundazweni. Isolezwe liyibonile incwadi ebhalelwe uNgidi imaziswa ngokuhoxiswa kwakhe ebikhomba uMsombuluko ka-Ephreli 14.Ebuzwa ngalokhu izolo, uNgidi uthe uyitholile impela incwadi kodwa ubesamangele ngokukhishwa kwakhe isigubhukane engazi nokuthi woneni.“Ngifana nawe nje nami njengoba ubuza, nami angazi kungaba kuhle nithinte lona iqembu lichaze kahle. Akukho nobekusolisa nje, kunalokho bebehlala bencoma bethi i-KZN iza kahle kakhulu iyasebenza,’’ kusho uNgidi obezwakala engenakutatazela.UNgidi ungomunye wabahlonishwayo kwezokuphatha kuhulumeni njengoba eke waba wumqondisi-Jikelele  wesifundazwe i-KZN.Okhulumela uMkhonto weSizwe, uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndhlela, uthe umsebenzi wangaphakathi uyaqhubeka futhi kufanele kulindelwe noma yini.“Ibambezelekile incwadi kaNgidi, bekufanele ifike ezinsukwini ezimbili ngaphambi kokuthi kuyofungwa kwi-IEC. Kunezinhlelo eziningi zokulungisa izinhlaka zeqembu futhi kungenzeka noma yini nakulo uhlu lwaseSishayamthetho,’’ kubeka uNdhlela.UNdlela akazange aphume nesizathu esiqondile sokuthi yini le eholele ekutheni kuchithwe uNgidi. Uthe basezinhlelweni zokubheka kabanzi ukusebenza kweqembu babuyekeze nezinye izinqumo zabo ngezikhundla zobuholi. UNgidi udilizwa nje, kade kusanda kuchithwa uMnuz Bonginkosi Khanyile obehola intsha kuzwelonke.UMkhonto weSizwe awufunanga nokuthi kuze kulalwe isikhundla sikaNgidi singenamuntu, wamemezela igama likaMnuz Thobani Zuma ekubeni umgqugquzeli. UZuma ubeyisethenjwa se-ANC eyake yamjuba kwesephini likameya kuMasipala uMsunduzi, eMgungundlovu. Esikhundleni ebesiphethwe uNgidi sokuba umdidiyeli kungene uMnuz Siphiwe Muziwenkosi Mpungose.

LUSAZOQHUBEKA nokusefa ulwandle eqenjini Umkhonto weSizwe, njengoba leli qembu liveze ukuthi lisazogawula izembe kwizithunywa ezangena ngomkhoshosho ohlwini lwabajutshwe ePhalamende.Lokhu kuvezwe ngumkhulumeli waleli qembu uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndhlela, kulandela ukuhoxiswa kwamalungu aleli qembu angu-18 ePhalamende, aphucwe ubulungu yileli qembu.Sekuya ngokwamagama enkehli njengoba umholi waleli qembu uMnuz Jacob Zuma, ubelishumayela elokuthi basazolushintsha uhlu lwabantu abajutshwe ePhalamende.Njalo bekuthi uma ekhankasa akuveze ukuthi kukhona abangena ngomkhoshosho kanti bazokhishwa ohlwini.UNdhlela uthe amalungu ahoxiswe ePhalamende, awaxoshiwe eqenjini.“Basangamalungu e-MK ngoba wonke umuntu ojutshiwe uyivolontiya. Abaxoshiwe eqenjini kodwa bahoxiswe ePhalamende. Bangu-18 abakhishwe ohlwini, abangu-12 bafungiswa bazi ukuthi bazokhishwa ohlwini. Abayisithupha abazange bafungiswe ngenxa yezizathu ezehlukene okubalwa ukugula nezinye kanti bonke bahoxisiwe. Sisazoqhubeka sibakhiphe abangene ngomkhoshosho ohlwini,” kusho uNdhlela.Uthe ohlwini, abantu babefaka izihlobo, abangani kanjalo nomakhelwane babo.“Besilokhu sisho ukuthi sifuna zonke izinhlaka zomphakathi zimeleleke ePhalamende. Yilokho esizoqhubeka sikwenze. Iningi labahoxisiwe alizange lifike ePhalamende ngelanga elibalulekile, okwakumele kuvotwe ngalo.”Uthe abanye abaholi abavela ohlwini lwabantu abazojutshwa, ababevele beshilo ukuthi bazomela leli qembu ePhalamende basaya.“Sinabaholi abafana noMnuz Brian Molefe, Siyabonga Gama, Lucky Montana nabanye. Balinde iPhalamende ukuthi libazise ukuthi bazofungiswa nini. Silandele zonke izinhlelo zangaphakathi eqenjini ukuhoxisa nokujuba amalungu amasha e-MK ePhalamende. Abahoxisiwe baziswa ngalesi sinqumo.”Uveze ukuthi kunozinzo eqenjini, akukho ukuntenga kobuholi.“Vele uma usaphemba iqembu kuba nezinkinga kodwa ayikho inhlekelele eqenjini. Uzinzo lukhona kwi-MK njengoba ubuholi obukhona ngobesikhashana.”Okhulumela iPhalamende, uMnuz Moloto Mothapo, uvumile ukuthi uSomlomo wePhalamende, wayithola incwadi evela kwi-MK, yokuhoxisa amalungu ePhalamende.Uthe ngokoMthethosisekelo, ilungu lePhalamende lihoxiswa uma iqembu elilimele lihoxisa ubulungu lalelo lungu.“USomlomo umatasa ubhekisisa izincwadi azitholile ukuze athathe isinqumo ngazo. Isinqumo uzosimemezela maduzane,” kusho uMothapo. Leli qembu lisanda kuhoxisa esikhundleni obengunobhala jikelele walo, uMnuz Arthur Zwane.UZwane uhoxiswa nje wake wakhonjwa indlela ngaphambilini kwabuye kwaba nengwiji wabuya.

IMIFELANDAWONYE yezinyunyana ithi uhulumeni kufanele aqinise isitilobho ezinkampanini ezizimele ukuba zize noguquko njengoba ucwaningo lwakamuva luveza ukuthi izikhundla eziphezulu zisaphethwe ngamadoda abelungu.Kulolu cwaningo olwenziwe wuMnyango wezemiSebenzi, kuvela ukuthi u-61% wezikhundla eziphezulu uphethwe ngabelungu, u-11.6% wazo uphethwe ngamaNdiya, AmaKhaladi aphethe, u-6.1% bese abaMnyama baphathe u-17.2%.Kuthiwa abamnyama baphethe u-17.2% wezikhundla eziphezulu yize u-80% wabasebenzi abaqashwe emazingeni aphansi umnyama.Kuvela ukuthi ezinkampanini ezizimele ezikhundleni zokuphatha amadoda amhlophe aphethe u-48% wazo, kulandele abesifazane abamhlophe ngo-13% kugcine amadoda amnyama ngo-10%.Kubuye kwavela ukuthi izinkampani ezizimele yizona eziqashe kakhulu abantu bokufika.UMnuz Trevor Shaku obhekelele ezokuxhumana, kwiSouth African Federation of Trade Unions (Saftu), uthe kuyishwa ukuthi abantu abamnyama nabesifazane yibona abaningi futhi abenza umsebenzi onzima kodwa bayingcosana ezikhundleni zokuphatha.“Uhulumeni kufanele azithathele izinyathelo izinkampani ezizimele ezingazimisele ukuletha uguquko ezikhundleni zokuphatha. Uguquko siyalubona kuhulumeni kodwa asiluboni ezinkampanini ezizimele. Kufanele zihlawuliswe izinkampani ezingazimisele ukunika ababencishwe amathuba ithuba lokuphatha,” kusho uShaku.Uthe bazolwa nalezi zinkinga zokungabikho koguquko futhi bafuna ne-National Minimum wage inyuke ibe wuR72 ngehora ukuze umsebenzi ohola kancane athole uR12 000 ngenyanga.UMnuz Matthew Parks weCosatu uthe kuyaphoxa ukuthi emuva kweminyaka ewu-30 izwe libuswa ngentando yabantu kusenezinkampani ezingafuni ukuthi ebuholini bazo kube nazo zonke izinhlanga zakuleli.Uthe izinkampani ezingenalo uguquko kufanele zibe namahloni bese zijeziswa ngendlela efanele.“Kuyaphoxa ukuthi amadoda abelungu asahleli ezikhundleni eziphezulu yize enza isibalo esiwu-4% sabantu bakuleli. Uguquko lukhona kuhulumeni kodwa ezinkampanini ezizimele asiluboni. Siyazi nasePhalamende ukuthi iDA, Action SA ne-FF+ ngamaqembu angahambisani nokuthi ababencishwe amathuba banikwe izikhundla zokuphatha. Sibona amadoda abelungu esaphethe emkhakheni wezezimali, emabhange, kwimishwalense, ezimayini nakwezokuvakasha,” kusho uParks.Uphethe ngokuthi uma uhulumeni ezimisele ngokuletha uguquko akufanele ukuthi agcine ngokwenza ucwaningo kodwa kufanele ajezise izinkampani ezingawulandeli umthetho.

IVUKUZE amakhosi nezinduna zamabutho eyokuphucwa kukaNdunankulu kaZulu, uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi, umbhobho ngesikhathi ethula iSilo uMisuzulu Sinqobile kaZwelithini, emcimbini wokukhumbula iSilo uDinuzulu kaCetshwayo.Amakhosi asebize umhlangano ophuthumayo kanti nabadidiyeli bamabutho babize isithangami nabezindaba lapho bezophefumula khona ngalesi sigameko esenzeka phambi kukaMengameli, uCyril Ramaphosa.UButhelezi, uphucwe umbhobho uMphathiswa wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho, uMnuz Siboniso Duma, owayephethe uhlelo emcimbini owawukwaCeza, ngoMgqibelo.Amakhosi azohlangana esiShayamthetho esidala, oNdini, kusasa.Iphini likandunankulu kaZulu, inkosi Phathisizwe Chiliza, lithe kwabashaqisa okwenzeka phambi kweSilo noRamaphosa.“Kuyishwa, kuyichilo, kungamanyala, ukuthi phambi kweNgonyama, uNomthebe wesizwe, kwenzeke into enje. Isigungu esiphezulu endlini yobuholi bomdabu KwaZulu-Natal sinqume ukuthi kubizwe umhlangano ophuthumayo ukuze le ndaba ixoxwe ngokujulile. Sizobheka zonke izinhlangothi. Kufanele zonke izinhlaka zikhunjuzwe ngesigaba sokuhlonipha uma siphambi kukaNomthebe wesizwe.”Isigameko sesidale itwetwe lokuthi kungase kuqubuke udlame lwezepolitiki KwaZulu-Natal njengoba kugcine kulimala amalungu e-ANC angu-16.UChiliza ukhuze ukuchitheka kwegazi KwaZulu-Natal.“Sinxusa abaholi bezepolitiki ukuba baqaphele into abayikhulumayo, bangaphehli udlame. Akufanele abantu baze bagcine sebethatha izinqumo ezingalungile, ezizosibuyisela emumva. Sinxusa bonke abantu ukuthi behlise amaphaphu.”Izinduna zamabutho zizoba nesithangami nabezindaba, eThekwini, namhlanje.Kunamahlebezi okuthi kukhona amabutho afuna uDuma angabe esavunyelwa emicimbini yasendlunkulu.Unobhala wezinduna zesiFunda iZululand, uMnuz Muzi Nyandeni uvumile ukuthi sibacikile isenzo sikaDuma kodwa wangafuna ukuphumela obala ngodaba lokuthi kukhona amabutho afuna ukuthi uDuma avalwe endlunkulu.“Okuningi sizokukhuluma kusasa (namhlanje). Engingakutshela khona ukuthi izinduna namabutho abeneme ngalokhu okwenziwe uDuma, kokungahloniphi Ingonyama. Wakhombisa ukuba luhlaza cwe.”Umdidiyeli wamabutho esiFundeni iKing Cetshwayo, uMnuz Zakheleni Xulu,  uthe ukuhlaselwa kwabantu emcimbini kuthunaza isithunzi samabutho njengoba kukhona izinsolo zokuthi abalimala bashaywa yiwo.“Sikhathele udlame lwezepolitiki KwaZulu-Natal. Kufanele ikhuzwe le nto, ikakhulukazi njengoba sekunukeka amabutho. Asikwamukeli ukuthi abaholi abakuleli zinga benze ukuganga okunje. Noma ngabe bebephambene kanjani bekufanele bahloniphane, benzele iSilo.“Mina angikaze ngikubone ukuthi uma osopolitiki bengcofana, bese bephucana umbhobho. Ngazi ukuthi omunye uyamlinda aze aqede, bese eyamphendula. Kwakha siphi isithombe lokhu okwenziwe uDuma kokuthi aphuce uNdunankulu kaZulu umbhobho,” kuphawula uXulu.Isolezwe lizame ukukhuluma noButhelezi, kodwa wacela ukuba kukhulunywe noChiliza.Okhulumela i-IFP, uMnuz Mkhuleko Hlengwa, uthe uDuma usekukhombise kaningi ukuthi akamamukeli uButhelezi njengoNdunankulu kaZulu.UHlengwa utshele abeNewzroom Afrika ukuthi sekukaningi ubuholi be-ANC KwaZulu-Natal bubukela phansi iSilo.Uthe abazi ukuthi uButhelezi wayefuna ukuthini ngesikhathi ephucwa umbhobho.“Simthintile uButhelezi sifuna ukumbuza ngale nto. Besikhathazwa ukuthi sekuthinteka igama le-IFP. Usitshele ukuthi lokhu abefuna ukukusho ubengunyaziwe iSilo.”Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kukaDuma ayizange iphumelele njengoba ucingo lwakhe belukhala lungabanjwa, ekazange awuphendule nombuzo awuthunyelwe.NgeSonto uDuma utshele abeNewzroom Afrika ukuthi uButhelezi wayengekho ohlelweni lwangoMgqibelo.Uthe isikhundla sikaNdunankulu kaZulu asikho kuMthethosisekelo.Usole uButhelezi ngokusebenzisa isikhundla sakhe ukulwa izimpi zepolitiki.

UZOFAKA isimangalo eNkosini umndeni wakwaPhiri, KwaCele, eMandawe ojikiswe kule ndawo sewufikile nesidumbu kukhalwa ngokuthi awukwazi ukungcwaba endaweni ongasahlali kuyona.Lo mndeni ubusuka eGolokodo, eFolweni, lapho osuzinze khona.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe lo mndeni uhlangabezane nezimbila zithutha ziholwa emhlophe phambili ngesikhathi umphakathi ubaxosha sebefikile nesidumbu.Kuvela ukuthi bebefike nesidumbu sikaMnuz Sandile Phiri (30) oshone ngeledlule ngemuva kokugula. Uze wangcwaba ngakusasa endaweni abathe abathandi ukuyidalula.Owomndeni okhulume neSolezwe ocele ukuba ligodlwe igama lakhe uthe umndeni unenxiwa eMandawe.Uthe lolu daba bahlela ukuyolibika enkosini.   ‘’’Sizoluyisa enkosini lolu daba ngoba lusiphethe kabi,’ kusho owomndeni.Uthe sekuphele isikhathi eside benaleli nxiwa, uthe inkinga yonakale ngokuthi kudlule amhlabeni umalume wakhona okunguyena obehlala khona kwasala kungenamuntu.Uthe kodwa kuyinto eyaziwayo ukuthi inxiwa ngelakwaPhiri. Uma elandisa uthe kushone umufi bangabuza lutho bahamba bayomba ithuna ngayizolo ukuze angcwatshwe ngakusasa."Lokhu besikwenza ngoba siyazi ukuthi yinxiwa lakwaPhiri. Besingazi ukuthi kanti kukhona abantu abaxakwa ukuthi asisahlali khona futhi lokho bakubona kuyisono,'' usho kanje.Uthe okubashiye bedidekile ukuthi kungani bengazange babamise ngayizolo ngesikhathi bemba umgodi kodwa babalinda bafika nesidumbu ngakusasa."Ukuba kukhona abebefuna ukuthi bakusho ngabe kube ngcono kakhulu ukuba bakusho ngayizolo ngesikhathi bebona kusambiwa umgodi. Manje kusixakile ukuthi basilinde size sifike nesidumbu,'' usho kanjena.Uthe kube yisigameko esibe buhlungu kakhulu saphinde sanezela usizi phezu kolunye emndenini."Bengiqala ngqa empilweni yami ukubona abantu bephindiswa emuva nesidumbu. Indlela okwenzeke ngayo ibithusa kakhulu. Indlela abantu bakuleya ndawo ebebengafuni ngayo ukuthi kungcwatshwe ibishiya imibuzo,'' usho kanje.Ithintwa iNkosi yakule ndawo, uMnuz Cele (elingatholakalanga igama lakhe), uthe umthetho wendawo, uthi umuntu ongcwaba khona ohlala khona ngokugcwele.Uthe kodwa alukho udaba olufuze lolu oolufinyelele ezindlebeni zakhe. ''Ngizozama ukuxhumana nezinduna ngithole ukuthi kwenzekeni,'' usho kanje.Ngokujwayelekile uthe izinkinga zalolu hlobo kuye kubhungwe ngazo emihlanganweni yangoLwesine.Uthe mhlawumbe nalolu daba luzofinyelala kubona bese lubhungwa emhlanganweni.

ISINGENE kwelinye igiya ingxabano esuswe ukuxoshwa kwabathile abebesondele enkosini yamaNazaretha uNyazilwezulu yohlangothi lwaseBuhleni. Isolezwe lihabule ukuthi ngemuva kokugudluzwa kwamalungu abenukwa ngokwakha itulo elibi elibhekiswe ekuphazamiseni ubuholi boNyazi  kudaleke uqhekeko phakathi kwenhlalisuthi eyizethenjwa okumanje isize yaziqamba amaqembu. Kuthiwa kula maqembu kukhona elizibiza ngoBumbano Cop 17 kuthi elinye libizwe ngaBathandi beQiniso. Lesi simo sesidale uvalo ngokuthi kungaba khona uthuthuva olunganqandeki uma singalungiseki. Umthombo ongaphakathi ebandleni uthe iNhlalisuthi yaziwa ngokukhuluma ngazwi linye okwenza le ngxabano esanda kuqubyuka ishayise ngovalo.“Ayikaze yenzeke le nto ukuthi kuxabane inhlalisuthi yodwa esontweni. Indaba isuswe ukuthi kususwe inhlalisuthi ebisondele eduze koNyazilwezulu yayalelwa ukuthi ingaphinde ingene esontweni futhi ingalubhadi kuwona wonke amathempeli ebandla ngaphansi koNyazilwezulu,” kusho umthombo. “Okwenzekayo manje nokufakela abantu uvalo ukuthi iNhlalisuthi ememezele ukuthi kusuke le ebiseduze koNyazilwezulu, iyona esibonakala isondele kulona igade uNyazi. Le exoshiwe okuthiwa akulindelekile ukuthi ibonakale ebandleni ifika ngenkani futhi iyabonakala ukuthi ifuna ukuba seduze koNyazi. “Lokhu kwenza kungabi nakho ukuthula njengoba sekuke kwaba nanesimemezelo esisabalale nge-voice note  (izwi eliqoshiwe) kuthiwa iNhlalisuthi akumele ithathe izinqumo esontweni. Sekuphinde kwagqama nendaba yala maqembu eNhlalisuthi esihlukene phakathi ebandleni,” kusho umthombo.Leli phephandaba lishayele ucingo enye yezinhlalisuthi okukholakala ukuthi yiyo eyenza isimemezelo sokumisa le esolwa ngokuba namatulo amabi abhekiswe kuNyazilwezulu, ethe ngeke ikwazi ukuphawula. Ithe umuntu ovumeleke ukuphawula ngezindaba zesonto uMnuz Thokozani Mncwabe kuphela.Ethintwa uMncwabe, uthe uyayazi yonke le nhlalisuthi ngokuzihlukanisa kwayo ngamaqembu.“Ngokwazi kwami bonke laba bantu bathanda inkosi uNyazilwezulu. Angiboni ukuthi abasazwani ngalolo hlobo kodwa engikubonayo kube wukuphambana kwemibono nje kubona. Ngokuvunyelwa yinkosi uNyazilwezulu ngizokwazi ukuhlala nabo phansi kodwa nabo kumele bakhombise ukuthi bazimisele ukuthi lolu daba luxazululeke. Ngisho inkosi iNyangayezulu yathi uma kukhona lapho singaboni khona ngaso linye kumele sihlale phansi silulungise lolo daba,” kusho uMncwabe.Uthe phambilini kwakunabaholi bezinsizwa ababebheka yonke into ethinta izinsizwa obekungabikwa kubona ukuba basekhona. Uthe njengoba bengasekho manje sekungaba yibona abangangenelela ukulungisa isimo.

IMIPHAKATHI yaseThekwini ebidinwe ukuthi sekuphele izinsuku ezintathu kuya phezulu ingenawo amanzi noma ugesi ivale imigwaqo ngamathayi nemigoqo.Le miphakathi ibithi sekungaphezu kwamandla njengoba sekubole ukudla emafrijini, amathoyilethi ayanuka, awekho amanzi okugeza nawokuphuza.KwaMashu abahlala ehostela, bavale imigwaqo ekuseni nokuphazamise abebeya emsebenzi bethi sekuphele izinsuku ezine ugesi ungekho kule ndawo.ENtuzuma umphakathi  uvale umgwaqo omkhulu okuhamba kuwo amabhasi  kamasipala.Okunye obekukhathaza umphakathi ukuthi abanye ompompi abasemgwaqweni umphakathi obuthola kuwo amanzi bebengasaphumi lutho. Abahlala kwezinye izingxenye zaseNtuzuma naKwaMashu ebebesenawo amanzi bese benqaba nawo bethi  kuzokwenyuka izikweletu zabo.UNdunakulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomusa Dube -Ncube, obekhuluma esithangamini nabezindaba, izolo,  uthe umasipala wenza konke okusemandleni ukuze umphakathi uthole izidingo ikakhulukazi amanzi, ugesi nokuthuthwa kwendle.Uthe kunethimba elakhiwe iminyango kahulumeni ehlukene nabamabhizinisi elizolekelela ekutheni kubuyiselwe amanzi emiphakathini  ikakhulukazi ehlala eNyakatho yeTheku okuyiyona ephazamiseke kakhulu. Uthe isiteleka esingekho emthethweni sabasebenzi benyunyana i-SAMWU, siqale sekusele usuku olulodwa kuphothulwe umsebenzi wokulungiswa kwamapayipi nama-valve kule ndawo."Umsebenzi obuwenziwa ubusuphothuliwe kodwa kudingeka kube nabasebenzi abazoqapha ukungena kwamanzi emapayipini ,  aze ayongena lapho egcinwa khona ngaphambi kokuthi aye emphakathini,"  kusho uNdunankulu.Uthe bayaqonda ukuthi abasebenzi kumele bakhale uma kukhona abengenelisekile ngakho  kodwa lokho akusho ukuthi sekumele kunyathelwe  ilungelo lomphakathi. Uthe sekwakhiwe ithimba lezinhlaka zamaphoyisa ezehlukene elizophelezela abasebenzi abangatelekile abasatshiswayo uma beyosebenza. Kuqashwe nezinkampani ezizimele ezizolekelela ekuhanjisweni kwezinye izidingo ezifana nokuqoqwa kwemfucuza. Uqhube wathi umqashi okunguMasipala weTheku awukahlangani neSAMWU ngoba azikho izikhalo ezilethwe ile nyunyana kuye kodwa uMnuz Siya Dladla weSAMWU, uthe umqashi uyazi ukuthi bafuna ukuhlangana naye,  balinde ukuthi  anqume usuku. UNdunakulu uthe  abasebenzi beSAMWU babenomhlangano ngoLwesibili olwedlule, ngemuva kwalowo mhlangano ababuyelanga emsebenzini.Imibiko ithi abasebenzi abatelekile bafuna kulungiswe umholo wabo ulingane nowabanye abasenza komasipala abangama-metroIMeya yeTheku, uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda, ithe ayinaso isibalo esigcwele sokuthi bangaki abasebenzi abatelekile ngoba abanye bayasatshiswa. Uthe akwaziyo ukuthi kuthinteke wonke umasipala,  hhayi uphiko lwamanzi nolukadoti kuphela.Uthe kuzophela isonto isimo sesibuyele kwesijwayelekile, wathi kuzolandelwa izindlela ezifanele zokuqondiswa ubugwegwe kwabangenele isiteleka esingekho emthethweni.

KUSENZIWA uphenyo olunzulu ngezezimali ecaleli elithinta ukubulawa komrepha uKiernan "AKA" Forbes, nomngani wakhe uTebello "Tibz" Motsoane.Lokhu kudalulwe nguMshushishi u-Advocate Lawrence Gcaba, ngesikhathi ebeka izizathu zokuthi kungani icala kumele lihlehliswe futhi.Unxuse inkantolo ukuba ikuvumele ukuhlehliswa kwalo. Kuvunyelwane ngokuthi libuyele enkantolo ngoNovemba 29, kuwona lo nyaka.Kuleli cala kuboshwe abasolwa okunguMnuz Lindokuhle Mkhwanazi, Mnuz Lindani Ndimande, uMnuz Eddie Myeza, Mnuz Mziwethemba Gwabini, noMnuz Lindokuhle Ndimande."Kunolunye uphenyo oluthinta ezezimali kuleli cala okusamele lubhekwe kabanzi. Uma sekuphinde kubuywa siyethemba ukuthi lolu phenyo luzobe seluphothuliwe,'' usho kanje.Ubalule nesizathu sesibili sokuthi kumele bazi ukuthi kwenzakalani eNkantolo yeMantshi yakwaManzini, eSwatini, lapho okuvela khona izelamani zakwaNdimande, uMnuz Siyabonga "Gezani" Ndimande, noMnuz Malusi Ndimande nabo abangabasolwa.

UPHIKO oluphenya amacala abucayi i-Special Investigations Unit, seluphothule uphenyo lwezicelo zenhlawulo ezingu-108, ezifakwe eMnyangweni wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal ezizodla imali eyevile ku-R2.4 billion.Lokhu kuvezwe yiNhloko yalolu phiko u-Advocate Andy Mothibi ngesikhathi ethulela ikomiti elibhekele ukusebenza kwemali yomphakathi, i-Standing Committee on Public Accounts (Scopa) ePhalamende, igxathu asebelihambile ukuphenya ngezicelo ezibopha umnyango okukholakala ukuthi ezinye zazo zenziwa ngabameli abaqhuba inkohlakalo ezifundazweni ezehlukene.KwaZulu-Natal nje kuphela, uMothibi uthe lolu phiko luthole izicelo ezingu-2 440 ezifakwe eMnyangweni wezeMpilo kulesi sifundazwe zemali eyevile ku- R29.1 billion, kanti kuzona sekuphothulwe uphenyo kweziwu-108.“Kwezingu 107 osekuqediwe ngophenyo lwazo, eziwu-76 kuzona kutholwe ukuthi okufakwe ngabo izicelo sebashona, okwenze ukuthi imali engu- R1 715, 500, 250,00 isuswe emalini yenkokhelo. Kudluliselwe ophikweni lwezokushushiswa komphakathi (NPA) amacala abandakanya abameli nabanye abasolwa abatholwe namaphepha okushicilelwe kuwo imininingwane yeziguli, antshontshiwe,” usho kanje.Uthe ngophenyo sekugwenywe ukulahleka kwesamba esevile ku- R2.4 billion kulesi sifundazwe, selokhu kuqale uphenyo, kanti bonke abathinteka kulo bugebengu kubalwa abameli nabasebenzi bezempilo, bazoshushiswa.Lolu phiko luthi izicelo eziningi ezihlawulisa umnyango, zigxile ebudedengwini obenzeka ngesikhathi kubelethiswa, okuholela ekukhubazekeni kwezingane. UMothibi uthe ezinye izicelo zifakwe ngeziguli zingenalo ulwazi ngazo, kanti kwesinye isikhathi abameli abebezenza osonhlalakahle bebevakashela abantu asebekhulile abahlala nezingane ezashiywa ngabazali, babhalise imali yesibonelelo kanti babasayinisa amaphepha okufaka izicelo.Inkampani yabameli i-Nonxuba Attorneys ezinze eGoli, okuthiwa seyivele ithweswe amacala ngokusemthethweni, ifake ezicelo ezingu-44 zalolu hlobo eMnyangweni wezeMpilo e-Eastern Cape, okuyimali engu- R497 million obekumele ikhokhwe umnyango kulesiya sifundazwe.UMothibi uthe phakathi kuka-2010 no-2016,  izicelo ezifakwe eNkantolo eNkulu yaseMthatha nje kuphela zinyuke zafinyelela ku-529 zisuka ku-46.Uthe ubufakazi buveza ukuthi kunokusebenzisana phakathi kwabameli, abahlengikazi nodokotela ukuqhuba le nkohlakalo.Umthetho ogunyaza ukuphenywa kwenkohlakalo eyenziwa izikhulu eminyangweni kahulumeni usayinwe uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ngo-2022

KULINDELEKE ukuthi uNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa noKhomishana wawo babe senkantolo uma sekuvela abasolwa abangu-15, ababoshelwe amacala okubalwa nawokubulala eNyuvesi iFort Hare.UMnuz Bheki Cele, noGeneral Fannie Masemola balindeleke ukuthi namuhla bathamele icala eNkantolo yeMantshi eDimbaza, e-Eastern Cape.Ithimba lamaphoyisa elabunjwa ukuze liphenye izigameko zokubulawa kwabantu enyuvesi, libophe abasolwa abangu-15.Kuthiwa abasolwa baboshwe ngempelasonto ezifundazweni ezihlukene okubalwa iKwaZulu-Natal, Gauteng, Western Cape, nase-Eastern Cape.Ukuboshwa kwabo kwenyusa isibalo sabantu ababoshelwe amacala athinta inyuvesi safinyelela ku-25.Abasolwa babhekene noxhaxha lwamacala okuhlanganisa awenkohlakalo, ukukhwabanisa, awokuthumba, awokuzama ukubulala nawokubulala.UGeneral Masemola uthe ithimba lamaphoyisa abalibumba ukuba liphenye futhi libophe abasolekayo, lizoqhubeka nokwenza umsebenzi walo ngaphandle kokwesaba nokwenzelela.“Limatasa ithimba lamaphoyisa emsebenzini wokuthola umnyombo nokuthi ngobani abasekhaleni lenkohlakalo, ukukhwabanisa nokubulawa kwabantu kule nyuvesi,” kuchaza uMasemola.Udalule nokuthi umsebenzi wabo ukuphenya bajule, baqoqe ubufakazi obuqanda ikhanda, kuthi uma befaka icala enkantolo nakanjani libagojele abasolwayo.Umvusi wenyamazane kwaba yisehlakalo sokudutshulwa ngoyaba lwezinhlamvu kubulawe uMnuz Mboneni Vesele, ngoJanuwari 2023.UVesele wayeneminyaka emihlanu engumqaphi wePhini likaShansela wenyuvesi, uSolwazi Sakhele Buhlungu. Wasocongelwa emotweni kaVesele, owayengekho ngaleso sikhathi.Kuthiwa uBuhlungu wayekade etholelwe baqaphi emuva kokuthi ethole izinsongo zokuyiswa kwagoqanyawo ngesikhathi ephenya ngezinsolo ezazishaqisa zokwehliswa ngomlenze kwemali yenyuvesi.

USUBHALELE uNgqongqoshe wezeziMali noMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa uhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal ofuna kulungiswe indaba yelayisensi yebhange Ithala.Lezi zindaba zivezwe wuMphathiswa wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho, ezokuVakasha neMvelo, uMfu Musa Zondi, esithangamini sabezindaba ebesiseLangeni Hotel, eThekwini.“Ithala liyinsika yokuthuthukiswa komnotho KwaZulu-Natal, emuva kwesimemezelo se-Financial Conduct Authority (FSCA) sokumisa ilayisensi yebhange Ithala, uNdunankulu uMnuz Thami Ntuli nohulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal, uthathe isinqumo sokubhalela uNgqongqoshe wezeziMali, uMnuz Enoch Godongwana noMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, ukuba babheke lolu daba. “Sifuna kuqinisekiswe ukuthi inkinga enjengalena ayiphindi ibe khona. Kufanele kushintshe nomthetho osucindezela Ithala ngoba kade lisebenza ngaphandle kwezihibe phambilini,” kusho uZondi.Uveze ukuthi emuva kokuvela kwezindaba zokumiswa kwelayisensi yeThala uthole inqwaba yezingcingo kogogo nabanye abantu abalondoloza imali yabo kuleli bhange.“Abezindaba banyuse ushukela wogogo ngendlela abalubike ngayo lolu daba. Ngiyaqonda ukuthi abanye bebefuna ukudayisa amaphepha kodwa kufanele nisebenzisane nathi nibike ngendlela ehlelekile, ningabhali okudukisa umphakathi. Silapha nje ngenxa yenu ngoba nilayithe umentshisi. Ithala alikho sephutheni kodwa wuhulumeni oshintshe imithetho.”Uthe ezinye izinkinga zaseThala azithinti imali kuphela kodwa zithinta nepolitiki.“Wuhulumeni kazwelonke oshintsha imithetho ethinta izikhungo ezifana neThala ngakho uyena ozoza nesixazululo. UNdunankulu usukumele phezulu ukuthola isixazululo.
