Ithala lisasebenza ngisho uhulumeni waseGauteng uthatha izifundo eThala.” Ubalule ukuthi Ithala belilokhu lisebenza kahle kodwa kwashintsha imithetho njengoba ingavuselelwanga i-exemption ebilivumela ukuba lisebenze njengamanye amabhange anemishwalense neminye imikhiqizo.Isikhulu esiphezulu sebhange Ithala, uDkt Thulani Vilakazi sithe ziyalungiswa izikhalo ze-FSCA ngakho abantu mabakhululeke.Uveze ukuthi i-FSCA ikhiphe Ithala ezikhungweni zemali ebezingadingi ukuletha umbiko we-Financial Soundness okuyinto eyenziwa izikhungo eziqoqa imali yemishwalense nokunye.Ubalule ukuthi Ithala belingangeni kulolu hlu ngoba beluqhuba umsebenzi walo ngaphandle kokuphazamiseka iminyaka engaphezulu kuka-20.“Izikhalo ze-FSCA besizilungisa vele. Kuyimanje sithathile uhlu lwebhizinisi oluthinta umshwalense silufake ngaphansi kwe-Ithala Development and Finance Corporation (IDFC) kuze kube sithola isixazululo salolu daba. Abathola amathenda kuhulumeni nabo basazoyithola imali e-IDFC, umehluko wukuthi ngeke sisakwazi ukubavulela ama-akhawunti ebhange Ithala.”Ubalule ukuthi isinqumo se-FSCA asisho ukuthi ibhange Ithala linenkinga yemali ngoba namanje linombiko ongenawo ugcobho womcwaningi mabhuku.Uveze ukuthi umehluko wukuthi phambilini kunemithetho elandelwa ngamabhange amakhulu ebingalithinti ibhange Ithala njengoba lona lingafani namanye amabhange.“Ithala liyibhange elihlukile, lidinga ukuthi kushintshe umthetho ozokwazi ukubhekana nesimo salo. Alifani namanye amabhange, alilona ibhange elikhulu, alilona ibhange eliwumfelandawonye kodwa liyibhange elikwazi ukusiza wonke umuntu. Izinkinga ezibalulwe yi-FSCA kudala siqalile ukuzilungisa.”Ukhale ngokuthi bazoshayeka beyibhange njengoba bengakwazi ukuvula ama-akhawunti amasha noma bamukele amakhasimende amanye njengoba besalungisa izinkinga ze-FSCA.Uphethe ngokuthi kunomehluko phakathi kwe-IDFC okuyiyona ebolekisa ngemali futhi ephethe ibhange Ithala. Ubalule ukuthi okwenzeka ebhange Ithala akunamthelela kwi-IDFC.

UMENGAMELI Cyril Ramaphosa uyalele amadoda ukuba avale oziphu njengoba ucwaningo lwakamuva luveza ukuthi u-600 000 wawo usuke wahlukumeza umuntu wesifazane.URamaphosa ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi kugujwa usuku lwabesifazane emcimbini kahulumeni obuseNorthern Cape izolo.“Ucwaningo lwakamuva luveza ukuthi u-7% wabesifazane, okuwu-1.5 million, usuke washaywa noma wadlwengulwa ngabesilisa. U-13% uveze ukuthi izithandwa zabo ziyabahlukumeza ngokomnotho kanti u-4% wamadoda, okuwu-600 000, uvumile ukuthi usuke washaya noma wahlukumeza abesifazane,” kusho uRamaphosa.Uthe amadoda kufanele ashintshe indlela aziphethe ngayo, azibophezele ukuvikela abesifazane.“Madoda, kufanele nivale oziphu benu. Nizibophezele ukuthi ngeke nibahlukumeze noma yingaluphi uhlobo abesifazane. Nami ngiyazibophezela ukuthi ngizoqinisekisa ukuthi umthetho wokubavikela, ukubanikeza isithunzi sabo nokubavulela amathuba omnotho uyasebenza,” kusho uRamaphosa.Ukhale ngokuthi ubuso bobuphofu busewumuntu wesifazane omnyama yize sekukhona ushintsho oluncane abalwenzile bewuhulumeni.Uthe abesifazane bahlakaniphile ukudlula abesilisa ngoba nasezikoleni amantombazane yiwo aphasa kahle futhi yiwona agcwele ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme.“Awuphele umkhuba omubi wokuholela amadoda kangcono ezinkampanini ezizimele. Abesifazane kufanele bahole umholo olingana nowamadoda ngomsebenzi ofanayo abawenzayo,” kusho uRamaphosa.Uthe ufuna nemisebenzi kahulumeni iye ezinkampanini zabesifazane ngoba abesifazane bathenga ukudla, banakekele nemindeni yabo. Ubalule ukuthi abafani namadoda okuthi uma ethola imali athenge izimoto, ahlale ematshwaleni noma enze ezinye izinto ezingawakhi umphakathi.Ubuye wakhumbuza abantu baseNorthern Cape ukuthi lolu suku lwasunguleka kanjani njengoba ngo-1956 abesifazane baqunga isibindi bamashela ezindlini zoMbuso ePitoli befuna inkululeko.Uthembise ukuthi bazoqinisekisa ukuthi abesifazane babuyelwa yisithunzi, bahlala ezindlini ezisesimeni esikahle, banamanzi, ugesi nemisebenzi ebuyisa isithunzi.Uthe akukuhle ukuthi bawubuso benhlupheko, baphila ngezibonelelo zikahulumeni.Ubalule ukuthi bazoqinisekisa ukuthi abesifazane bathola umhlaba othi bona nasezindaweni zasemakhaya ukuze babe ngabalimi noma bazenzele izimboni ezizolekelela ukuthi banganciki kumuntu.

INJABULO kubantu bakwaDakadaka, KwaQwabe, eMthandeni iqembu leMK Party liletha usizo kulabo abakhahlanyezwa isishingishane esahlasela ngenyanga edlule sashiya kukhalwa ezindaweni ezahlukene KwaZulu-Natal.Leli qembu linezinyanga ezimbalwa lasungulwa kodwa lingelinye lamaqembu asukumela phezulu uma kunesimo esiphuthumayo emphakathini.Yize lingangenanga kuhulumeni wokubambisana ukuqinisekisa ukuthi yilona eliholayo esifundazweni, liyaqhubeka nokuxhumana nemiphakathi liphose esivivaneni.Angu-130 amakhaya akule ndawo alimala ngesikhathi kuhlasela isishingishane esahamba saze sayophelela eBallito sinqamula oThongathi lapho okwadaleka khona umonakalo omkhulu.Abantu bakule ndawo yaseMthandeni, KwaMaphumulo abasalanga ngaphandle kwabatholelwe usizo yiqembu leMK ngesikhathi lizama imizamo yokuphosa esivivaneni.Leli qembu lahambela imizi ekhahlamezekile libheka ukuthi abantu bangasizakala kanjani ngaphambi kokuba bafake izicelo kubaxhasi abahlukene ngosizo oludingekayo.Nebala u-Ismael Mohamed nozakwabo enkampanini iPak Plastic esoThongathi basabelile basamukela isicelo kumalungu ale nhlangano ngesikhathi ecelela izakhamizi umphakathi.UMuzi Qwabe ongomunye wabaholi beMK kule ndawo, ubonge kakhulu uxhaso abaluthole kule nkampani nathe bayakujabulela ukuthi kukhona umehluko abeza nawo emphakathini wakubo.Ezintweni okunikelelewe ngazo umphakathi kukhona imibhedi kanye namaphasela okudla.

KUHLALE kuthiwa omama yibona abazifelayo ngetiye kuze kuthiwe uma bengalitholanga bakhala ngekhanda. Ucwaningo lwakamuva olwenziwe ngabakwaRooibos luveza ukuthi empeleni amadoda ayazifela ngetiye.Njengoba siphila esikhathini esimatasatasa kuthiwa kunamadoda aqala usuku lwawo ngetiye ukuze ehlise ukhwantalala. UDkt Gerald Maarman, ongusosayensi obehola ucwaningo olwaziwa ngeMen’s Drinking Habits Survey, uthe lolu cwaningo luveza ukuthi u-69% wamadoda uphuza amanzi uma nokhwantalala, u-16% uphuza ikhofi kanti u-11% uphuza itiye iRooibos. Luqhuba luthi uma eseqede ukusebenza u-32% wawo uphuza iRooibos, u-19% ubhiya, u-12% ikhofi, u-11% uphuza ugologo kanti u-10% uphuza iwayini.Amadoda kulolu cwaningo abike ukuthi iRooibos awayiphuzeli ubumnandi kodwa asuke enzela ukuthi imizimba yawo ikwazi ukubhekana  nemisebenzi eyenzayo ngosuku olulandelayo ngoba inezithako ezilwa nezifo egazini.UDkt Maarman uthe yize amadoda amaningi ethi aphuza iRooibos, u-67% walawo azivocavocayo aphuza amanzi ukuze umzimba wawo ube namanzi enele, iRooibos iyisiphuzo sesibili asikhethayo. Ezindaweni zomphakathi, uthe iRooibos nobhiya yizona ziphuzo ezihamba phambili njengoba u-47% wadoda uphuza zona, zilandelwe yitiye elimnyama, ama-cooler namacider."I-Rooibos ihamba phambili esigabeni seziphuzo ezishisayo. Abesilisa abangaphezu kuka-42% baphuza okungenani inkomishi eyodwa ye-Rooibos nsuku zonke, u-22% wawo uyiphuza kabili noma kathathu ngesonto bese kuthi u-17% uyiphuze njalo ngemva kwesonto,"UMaarman uthe lolu cwaningo lugunyazwe yiSouth African Rooibos Council (SARC) ukuze ibone ukuthi ngabe izinkolelo zabantu ngokuphuzwa kwetiye ziyizo yini.

USOMABHIZINISI waseThekwini, uMnuz Moses Tembe, uthe wayemfuna ebhokisini lofakazi aziphendulele noma engumsolwa umrepha uKiernan Forbes owayedume ngelika-AKA owayekhona kushona indodakazi yakhe, u-Anele Tembe, eminyakeni emithathu edlule.U-Anele washona ngemuva kokuwa esitezi seshumi ehhotela ayelele kulo no-AKA ayethandana naye ngaleso sikhathi, naye okwathi ngonyaka odlule, wadutshulwa ephuma endaweni yokudlela emgwaqweni uFlorida eThekwini.UTembe ukhulume okokuqala ngalezi zigameko zombili nentatheli yeSABC uChriselda Lewis, engxoxweni ekhethekile ebikhonjiswa kwiSABC News (404), izolo.Le ngxoxo iqoshwe emtapweni wolwazi owaqanjwa ngo-Anele esikoleni ayefunda kuso eThekwini.UTembe uveze ukuthi wayemthanda u-AKA futhi akanaso isizathu esasingaholela ekutheni ambulale.“Engangikufuna kuye ukumbona ebhokisini enkantolo echaza ngokwenzeka ngosuku okwashona ngalo indodakazi yami. Mina nomndeni wami sihlala lapha eThekwini, isigameko senzeka eKapa. Ngaphukelwa umoya ngibuka indodakazi yami ivalwe ngopulasitiki ocwebezelayo ezindabeni ngingakwazi ukufinyelela khona ngokushesha. Udaba ngaluthola ngomfowethu owafika ezongibikela ngosuku lwangeSonto engangilungiselela ngalo ukuya enkonzweni. Ngemuva kwalokho, ngazibuza ukuthi ubenobani? Ubani owazama ukumsiza njengoba sezwa ukuthi kwaphela imizuzu engu-20 ephila, futhi wayeyedwa emgwaqweni nokwaze kwaqhamuka owesifazane wambona elimele,” kusho uTemba.Uthe ngokwakhe, uphenyo aluhambanga ngendlela afisa ngayo kuze kube manje.Uveze ukuthi uphiko lwezokushushisa, iNPA eWestern Cape luhambise kancane uphenyo lwaleli cala kuze kube manje.Ebuzwa ukuthi uzizwa kanjani ngokuchaywa kwegama lakhe ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngokufa kuka-AKA, uTembe uveze ukuthi angeke aze aphendule abantu abazifihlayo nangabazi.“Ngisho emndenini wami kukhona ababethi uKiernan kumele aboshwe ngokushona kuka-Anele kodwa kukodwa engangikusho, ukuthi kumele silinde umthetho udlale indawo yawo. Abantu abasola mina nomndeni wami ngokuba nesandla ekushoneni kuka-AKA kuyacaca abawazi umndeni wami nokuthi singabantu abanjani,” kuchaza yena.UTembe ukhuluma kanjena nje, bayisikhombisa abesilisa ababoshiwe ababhekene necala lokulawa kuka-AKA nomngani wakhe uTebello Tibz Motsoane.Ababili kubo basagcinwe ezitokisini eSwatini, lapho baboshehlwa khona, kusalindwe kulalelwe isicelo sokuthi babuyiselwe kuleli. Kuleli sonto kulindele ukuthi kuphume incwadi ekhuluma ngothando luka-AKA no-Anele ebhalwe uMelinda Ferguson ethi When Love Kills: The Tragic Tale Of AKA And Anele.

OMAKHELWANE bomholi weMK, uJacob Zuma, bathe ngeke bamlahle lo mholi njengoba bebethi bavotele iMK ngesikhathi kuvotwa.Abantu abavote esikhungweni okuvote kuso uZuma, esisesikoleni iNtolwane Primary, bathe ngeke bamlahle uZuma, sebehamba neMK.Kusukume nesinedolo ngesikhathi kufika uZuma esikhungweni sokuvota.Kuqhume umkikizo namakhwelo, kwama yonke into njengoba wonke umuntu ebefuna ukuzibonela uZuma.UZuma akazange athathe isikhathi eside evota.Ubelokhu encokola nabavotisayo ngesikhathi kubhekwa igama lakhe ohlwini lwabazovota.Ngesikhathi enikwa amaphepha okuvota ufune ukwazi ukuthi iqembu 'lakubo' likhona yini ohlwini lwamaqembu azovotelwa.Ukhombise ukujabula ngesikhathi ebona iqembu abelifuna, wabe esethi sekuphelele konke.Emva kwalokho usuke wayovota, wabe esephuma eyobingelela amalungu eMK abehlezi etendeni, ebelingaphandle kwesikhungo.Kuleli tende bekuqhuma ingoma evala izindlebe.UZuma ubonge abantu abebemjabulela, wazwakalisa ithemba lokuthi bazolunqoba ukhetho.Ube esehamba emva kwalokho.Abantu abebejabulela uZuma bathe sebehamba neMK.Bathe bayakholelwa ebuholini bukaZuma, bathi sebelahle ithemba kwi-ANC.Abanye babo bathe bafuna ukujezisa uMengameli, Cyril Ramaphosa, abamsola ngokubahlukumeza ngesikhathi kubhoke ubhubhane iCorona.UMnuz Funukwazi Ndlovu, uthe uyamethemba uZuma.“Sihamba naye, ngoba igalelo lakhe silibonile ngesikhathi esaphethe. Abantu abaningi baphumelele ngesikhathi kusaphethe yena. Baningi abantu abaphumelela lapha endaweni ngesikhathi kusaphethe yena. Wayewusizo kakhulu. Wayengakhethi bala, wayengabuzi ukuthi uqhamuka kuyiphi inhlangano. Wayekusiza noma ingani uma usufikile kwakhe.”UNdlovu uthe ufisa ukuthi uZuma athuthukise indawo yangakubo uma enqoba ukhetho.“Ngifuna ukuthi kungabi khona izinto esizokhala ngazo. Sisakhala kakhulu ngamathuba emisebenzi. Izingane zifundile, zagogoda, kodwa aziyitholi imisebenzi. Nathi esinamakhono, ayikho indlela esixhaseka ngayo ukuze sithuthukise amakhono ethu.”UNdlovu uthe isasasa elikhona ngeMK ilona elimsukumise phansi.“Bengithi angizukuvota, kodwa ke ngokubuka isasasa, ngithe angiye kovota.”UNkk Dalekile Biyela uthe ufuna ukuthi uZuma aphinde aphathe.“Sihamba nomuntu walapha endaweni ngoba siyamazi, sakhula naye. Uyazazi izidingo zethu. Ngeke asilahle.”Uthe ufisa ukuthi uhulumeni ubakhele izindlu.“Sihlala ezindlini zodaka. Akulungile ukuthi silale phandle. Akufuneki ukuthi sifele ezindlini zodaka.”UNksz Biyela uthe ukhetho alukaze lumphuthe selokhu abantu abamnyama bavunyelwa ukuvota.“Selokhu saqala ukuvota kusavotelwa uMandela. Namanje asisaboni nakahle, kodwa ngiyavota ngoba ngiyaye ngithande ukuthi uvo lwami luzwakale.”UNksz Nokwanda Ntombela uthe akajabule ngohulumeni ophethe.“Sahlukumezeka kakhulu ngesikhathi seCorona. Kwakushaywa imithetho esicindezelayo. Baningi abantu abalahlekelwa imisebenzi, kwavalwa amafemu. Kuyimanje asisebenzi.”UNksz Ntombela uthe kuningi okwenziwa uZuma esaphethe.“Asikaze sihlupheke kanje ngesikhathi kusaphethe uZuma. Abantu babesebenza, futhi ziningi izinhlelo zentuthuko ezazilethwa uhulumeni.”

USIHLALO we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Siboniso Duma, uthe uhulumeni wobumbano ophethe iKwaZulu-Natal angeke uzanyazanyiswe noma kungafika izivunguvungu ezinkulu.UDuma uthe ukubambisana kwamaqembu ayingxenye yohulumeni wokubambisana kuzokwenza kube lula ukuthi uhulumeni wesifundazwe usebenze ngendlela.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi enengxoxo ekhethekile neSolezwe.I-ANC, IFP, DA neNFP yibona abaphethe ngokubambisana uhulumeni wesifundazwe.I-MK okuyiyo eyahamba phambili ngokwamavoti KwaZulu-Natal, iyaqhubeka ngokusonga ngokuthi uhulumeni wesifundazwe ngeke uhlale isikhathi eside.I-MK ayinazo izihlalo ezanele ukuthi ibuse ngokuzimela.UDuma uthe uhulumeni wokubambisana ophethe iKwaZulu-Natal awuyi ndawo.“Abantu ababeke phansi amaphaphu, uhulumeni wokubambisana uzosebenza lapha KwaZulu-Natal.”UDuma uthe umnyango awukavalwa kulabo abasala ngaphandle ngesikhathi kwakhiwa uhulumeni wobumbano, wase exwayisa ngokuthi bazothathelwa izinyathelo zomthetho labo abazokwenza izinto eziphambene nomthetho.“Leli lizwe lafelwa. Isikhathi segazi safika sedlula. Manje sekuyisikhathi samaphoyisa nomthetho. Yonke into eyenzeka lapha kufanele iqale ezingxoxweni, iphethwe khona ezingxoxweni. Ngiyacabanga nje ukuthi abantu basahlushwa ulaka nelukuluku, basazohamba babone ukuthi sinezinhloso ezinhle. Bazohamba babone ukuthi sizosebenzela abantu bakithi.”Amaqembu ayingxenye yokubusa iKwaZulu-Natal akwazi ukusheshe avumelane ngokwabiwa kwezikhundla kwikhabhinethi lesifundazwe.Kuze kube manje kuzwelonke naseGauteng akukavunyelwana ngokwabiwa kwezikhundla.UDuma ubalule izizathu ezintathu athe zenze kube lula ukuthi basheshe bavumelane KwaZulu-Natal.Esokuqala, uDuma uthe iKwaZulu-Natal yagubuzelwa kakhulu udlame lwezepolitiki, wathi abantu abafuni ukubuyela kuleso sikhathi.Esesibili; uthe iKwaZulu-Natal ivele inomlando wokubusa ngokubambisana kuhulumeni wesifundazwe nakomasipala.Esesithathu; uDuma uthe abantu baKwaZulu-Natal bayakwazi ukuthobela umthetho ngoba iningi labo liqhamuka ezindaweni zamakhosi.“Abantu baKwaZulu-Natal bayakwazi ukuthobela umthetho obekiwe. Uzokhumbula ukuthi emakhaya uma insizwa ishaye enye ikhanda, kuyaye kufanele ukuthi iyigeze ikhanda, bese kuqhubeka kahle umcimbi. Le indlela esidalwe ngayo.”UDuma uthe izingxoxo zabo esifundazweni beziholwa yizingwevu okungoMnuz Sbu Ndebele, Mike Mabuyakhulu noNkk Weziwe Thusi.“Lesi sikhathi sifana no-1994 kuthina lapho uhulumeni kaMadiba (uMnuz Nelson Mandela) wawuhlanganise amaqembu amaningi. Okubalulekile manje ukuthi sisebenzele abantu. Isisu asikwazi ukubona ukuthi lona uyi-ANC, i-IFP, DA, noma iMK.”UDuma uthe uyabethemba abaholi bakazwelonke ukuthi bazogcina bevumelene.“Udaba lukazwelonke lubucayi ngoba kunokwehlukana kwemigomo yamaqembu. Amanye amaqembu akholelwa ekutheni izwe kufanele lisebenzele ongxiwa, bese bethatha inzuzo bondle ngayo izingane zabo. Thina njenge-ANC sikholelwa ekutheni izwe kufanele lisebenzele abantu.“Ngisho ebandleni imibono ihlezi ishayisana. Ngiyabethemba abantu abangu-400 (amalungu ePhalamende) ukuthi bazokwazi ukubeka eceleni indaba yokulangazelela izikhundla. Kunengcithabuchopho esixwayisa ngokuthi isikhundla siyize leze, ithi into ebalulekile abantu.”

ITHEMBISE ukubeka eqhulwini ukuhlinzekwa kwabantu ngamanzi, imeya entsha kuMasipala i-Zululand okuthiwa ikhethwe ngo-elethu, emhlanganweni womkhandlu wamakhansela.Kuphele ukuqagela ngozongena njengoba, uMnuz Michael “Mkhonyovu“ Khumalo we-IFP, egcine engene kulesi sikhundla, esivuleke kushiya uMfundisi Thulasizwe Buthelezi osekunguMphathiswa woMnyango wezokuBusa ngokubambisana nobuHoli boMdabu esifundazweni.  Phambilini, kuke kwaba namahlezi abeveza ukuthi umholi we-NFP, uMnuz Ivan Barnes, uyena othishiwe ekubeni yimeya kulo masipalaEsitatimendeni esithunyelelwe abezindaba wumasipala, uKhumalo uthembise ukusebenza ngokuzikhandla nokuthembeka kulesi sikhundla.“Ngifisa ukudlulisa ukubonga kwami emkhandlwini wamakhansela ngokungethemba. Ngethembisa ukuhola ngokuthembeka nokuthi kube nokusebenzisana kwawo wonke amaqembu ezepolitiki angaphansi kwalo masipala,” usho kanje.Lo masipala omkhulu, unomasipala abahlanu ngaphansi kwawo okuwuMasipala Ulundi, Nongoma, Phongolo, iDumbe nowaBaqulusi. Iningi lezindawo ezakhele labo masipala zinenkinga yokushoda kwamanzi.UKhumalo useke waba usomlomo kuMasipala Abaqulusi, ngaphambi kokuthi ahoxiswe kulesiya sikhundla ngo-2022, emva kokuthi kuthiwa wakhuluma budedengu ngesikhathi ehambele umngcwabo kazakwabo owayeyikhansela kulo masipala. Inkulumo eyamdonsela amanzi ngomsele, ayenza kulo mngcwabo eyokuthi kumele kuphenywe isikhala kuqashwe ingane yekhansela, uma kungukuthi azikho izikhalo kuxoshwe umuntu we-ANC, kodwa wabuye waxolisa.

UKUBUKA ubunzima bokukhula ngaphandle kukababa kodwa ekhona ephila yikona okwenza amadoda aqotho aqhamuke nezinhlangano ezilekelela nezinikeza izingane ezingenabo obaba uthando futhi bazeseke.INingizimu Afrika ihamba phambili ngesibalo sezingane ezikhula ngaphandle kobaba abazizalayo kanti lokhu kubikwa ukuthi kunomthelela omubi kakhulu nodala isilonda esijulile ekukhuleni kwengane.Ukungabibikho kukababa oseduze, onakekela noyesekayo ingane kunomthelela ezimeni ezingezinhle njengokusetshenziswa kwezidakamizwa, ukukhulelwa kwezingane, udlame lobulili nodlame lwasemindenini.Iningi lalezi zinkinga zingagwemeka ngisho engekho ubaba okuzalayo kodwa ukuba khona komuntu ongubaba empilweni yakho kwenza umehluko. UGeorge Mwaura, ongumqondisi wenhlangano engenzi nzuzo, Isiseko Imara, futhi ubuye abe yinxusa le-Heartlines Fathers Matter,  uyisibonelo esihle sabantu besilisa abasebenza ngokuzikhandla ukuvala isikhala ezinganeni ezingenabo obaba.UMwaura uneminyaka ecela kwemine esebenza njengomqeqeshi nobaba ezinganeni ezingenabo obaba ikakhulukazi ezabafana. Uthi lokhu kumfundise lukhulu ngempilo nangezinqumo ozithathayo.“Ukuthatha isinqumo sokuba ngubaba empilweni yengane kuwumqansa ngoba kumele ukwazi ukuyeseka ngokwemizwa nangawe siqu sakho, ubonakale ngezenzo, uzikhathaze ngezinto ezithandwa yingane nangokuvikeleka kwayo,” kusho yena.Uthi izingane eziningi asebenza nazo zikhuliswa omama noma ogogo kuphela futhi bancane abantu abangobaba empilweni yabo. Uthi esikhathini esiningi abantu besilisa abagqamayo yilabo abahlukumezayo nabaziphethe budlabha nokubeka izingane zabafana engcupheni yokulandela bona ngoba yikona kodwa abakwaziyo nabakhule bekubona. “Isibopho sami wukuhlakaza lezi zindlela, ukuhlinzeka ngokuphepha nokuvikeleka kanye nokuzinikeza isiqondiso. Ngiyazi ukuthi akhona amadoda anyonyobela izingane futhi leyo yinto esiyigxekayo ngaphandle kokuzigodla. Njengobaba nabesilisa bezenhlalakahle kuleli, sinomthwalo wemfanelo wokuvikela izingane nokuzigcina zikude nabahlukumezi.”

UNIKWE isikhundla sokuhola ikomiti lasePhalamende, obeyimeya yeTheku uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda.UKaunda owasuswa eThekwini yi-ANC, wajutshwa ePhalamende ukuyofungiswa njengelungu leNdlu yoMkhandlu weziFundazwe (National Council of Provinces), ukhethelwe ukuba usihlalo wekomiti lo Mnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu kanjalo nokuPhatha.IPhalamende neNdlu yoMkhandlu weziFundazwe bebematasa kuleli sonto bekhetha abazohola amakomiti.Ngaphansi kwekomiti eliholwa nguKaunda, kuneminyango ehlukene okubalwa owezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu.Kukhona noMnyango weziSebenzi zikaHulumeni nokuPhatha, uMnyango wezokuHlaliswa kwaBantu kanjalo noMnyango wezaManzi nokuHanjiswa kweNdle.Ngokwesitatimende sasePhalamende, kwiNCOP kuba nelungu elilodwa elimele isifundazwe ngasinye.Usihlalo wekomiti ukhethwa kwabangamalungu eNCOP kanti njengoba emancane amalungu ale ndlu, ngaphansi kwekomiti ngalinye kuba neminyango ehlukene.“Umsebenzi kasihlalo wekomiti ukubiza nokwengamela imihlangano aphinde enze neminye imisebenzi kasihlalo. Umsebenzi wamakomiti ukulusa ukusebenza kweminyango kahulumeni,” kusho isitatimende sasePhalamende.Isikhala sikaKaunda sivalwe nguMnuz Cyril Xaba. UKaunda owangena kulesi sikhundla ngo-2019, wakhuza ibuya emuva kokhetho lohulumeni basekhaya ngo-2021, washiya kunezikhalazo ngezinkinga ezibhekene neTheku. Wahamba amanye amaqembu eseke azama ukumkhipha ngevoti kodwa ahluleka.UKaunda wazishaya isifuba ngokuthi ushiye umbiko omuhle wokusebenza kwezimali. Wathi akashiyi umkhandlu obuzoguqa ngamadolo noma yinini  nomkhandlu obusezinkingeni zokungakwazi ukukhokhela abasebenzi.Phakathi kwezinkinga ezikhona, okukhalwa ngazo mihla eThekwini yindaba yamanzi ashodayo. Emiphakathini eyakhele leli dolobha kunenkinga yamanzi.Kwezinye izindawo sekuphele izinyanga engekho, kwezinye sekuphenduke isinkwa semihla ukuthi aphela abuye noma yinini umphakathi ungaziswa.Nezimoto ezithwala amanzi azifiki kweminye imiphakathi.Enye yezinkinga ezibhekene neTheku yizincwadi zezikweletu. Abanye kufika izincwadi eziveza ukuthi bakweleta izizumbulu zemali zamanzi, ugesi kanjalo nama-rate.Kuke kwaba nezinkinga ekuqoqweni kukadoti ezinyangeni ezedlule kwezinye izindawo lapho ubungaqoqwa khona ngenxa yezikhalazo zabasebenzi.UXaba uthembise ukulungisa izinkinga ezibhekene nedolobha.

AKUBONA bonke ubugebengu obungaqedwa ngokubopha,  obunye kudinga ukuthi kubhekwe umsuka wabo okungaba izifo zengqondo nokunye.Lokhu kushiwo uNgqongqoshe wezamaPhoyisa, uGeneral Bheki Cele, ngesikhathi ekhuluma nabazalwane esontweni, iKwaMashu Christian Church, ngeSonto.Uthe lokhu ukushiso ukuthi umnyango wakhe nyakenye ngoMeyi, usungule umkhankaso owaziwa ngokuthi i-Operation Shanela oqapha ubugebengu obenzeka ngoLwesine ntambama kuya ngoMsombuluko ekuseni."Kusukela ngalesi sikhathi kuboshwe abantu abangu-550 000. Ngikhuluma ngamacala amakhulu afana nokubulala, ukubamba inkunzi kuhlonyiwe, ukudlwengula, ukubamba izimoto zemali,“  kusho yena.Uthe ngekota eyodwa okungu-Okthoba kuya kuDisemba, izibalo zobugebengu zikhomba ukuthi kudlwengulwe abantu besifazane abangu-4 990. Iningi labo lidlwengulwa ngabantu ababaziyo kubo okukhona nezelamani."Asikwazi ukuthi singathi ukudlwengula udadewenu kungasonjululwa ngejele. Kumele sikubheke nokuthi kunezifo zengqondo ezihlasele abantu bakithi. Iningi lazo ziqale ngesikhathi kuhlasela iCovid-19. Kuningi obekungelona isiko-mpilo yethu okwenzekile. Singabantu abamnyama sazi ukuthi owakithi oshonile kumele simphelezele. Sime eduze kwebhokisi sikhale, sivalelise. Ngesikhathi seCovid-19 bekwenzeka kungavumeleki ukuthi nisondele eduze kwesidumbu somuntu wakini ngoba kwesatshelwa ukusabalala kwegciwane. “Leyo nto idale ukuphazamiseka okukhulu emindenini. Ngaphezu kwalokho, abanye baphelelwe imisebenzi, zonke lezi zinto ziyayiphazamisa ingqondo. Siyafisa ukuthi abelapha izifo zengqondo basondele ngoba uma kungenjalo kusho ukuthi kuzogcwala amajele," kusho uCele.Uqhube wathi ilokishi laKwaMashu liyisidleke sezigebengu.“Isidleke saKwaMashu ihostela, empeleni wonke amahostela anobugebengu kodwa elaKwaMashu ledlulele. IKwaZulu-Natal yonke inezigebengu eziningi. Uma kuboshwe izinkabi noma kuyiphi ingxenye yezwe ezinye zazo kuyavela ukuthi zidabuka kulesi sifundazwe,” kubeka uCele.

INkantolo eNkulu yasePitoli igwebe owesifazane waseGoli odilikajele abathathu ngamacala okubulala abesilisa ababili ayejola nabo nendodana yakhe.UPamela Ncumisa Selani (47) wabulala amasoka akhe uMichael Changisa noGift waseMalawi kanjalo nendodana yakhe u-Avile Jonjwana.Okhulumela iNPA eGauteng uLumka Mahanjana, uthe uphinde wathola neminyaka emihlanu ngokuphazamisa ukusebenza kwengalo yomthetho.Kuthiwa ngo-2016 uSelani wayethandana noChangisa ngesikhathi bexabana ngemuva kokuthola ukuthi umthelele ngengculazi."Ngemuva kwalokho wacela elinye lamasoka akhe uGift ukuthi limsize ukubulala uChangisa. UGift wabe eseya endlini uSelani ayehlala kuyo noChangisa wacasha egunjini lokugeza elinde uChangisa ukuthi alale. Ngesikhathi uChangisa eselele, uGift wamshaya ephindelela ngesando phambi kwezingane zikaSelani ezimbili ezincane. Ngemuva kwesigameko, uSelani noGift bangcwaba uChangisa egcekeni uGift wabe esehlala noSelani," kusho iNPA.Ithe ngemuva konyaka, uSelani nendodana yakhe ena-17 u-Avile, bakha itulo lokubulala uGift ngoba wayehlukumeza.Bamdlisa ushevu base befaka ikhanda lakhe emanzini waze wafa."Ngemuva kwalokho bangcwaba isidumbu sakhe ethuneni elingashoni ngaphezu kwesidumbu sikaChangisa," kusho uMahanjana.Kuthiwa u-Avile wayecwile ezidakamizweni wazama ukuthi unina amkhokhele emsabisa ngokuthi uzomceba emaphoyiseni.UMahanjana uthe ngobunye ubusuku, u-Avile waxosha unina nengane yakwabo encane kubo lapho abahamba bayohlala khona nelinye isoka likanina lasendaweni. USelani nendodana yakhe encane babuyela  ekhaya bacasha egcekeni."Ngesikhathi benza njalo, u-Avile wabuya wayolala. Kwathi eselele uSelani wacela indodana yakhe encane ukuthi ingene endlini bese ivula isicabha. Ngemuva kwalokho uSelani wathatha isando washaya a u-Avile ekhanda ephindelela waze wafa wase emngcwaba phezu kwezidumbu zalaba abanye ababili egcekeni. Ngo-Agasti 2020 uSelani wathatha indodana yakhe encane (14) wayiyisa enyangeni ngoba yayingaphilile. Ngesikhathi bekhona umfana watshela umelaphi ngezigameko zokubulala. Umelaphi wabiza umholi womphakathi enza sengathi ubiza omunye umelaphi ukuze athole usizo. Ngesikhathi umholi efika indodana yagonyuluka ngodaba kumholi owabe esebiza amaphoyisa."USelani nendodana baboshwa sebebuyela ekhaya. Amacala ayebhekene nendodana ahoxiswa ngoba yaphenduka ufakazi woMbuso.USelani wawaphika amacala kodwa ufakazi wakwazi ukuchaza udaba ngale kongabazane.

INKANTOLO eNkulu yaseThekwini igwebe owesilisa odilikajele abathathu neminyaka engu-85 ngoxhaxha lwamacala okukhona kuwo nawokubulala eMlaza.UBongumusa Sphesihle Radebe (25), wasesigcemeni kwa-B eMlaza, ugwetshwe ngoLwesithathu emini.Uwaphike kwaze kwaba sekugcineni amacala nokuthe uma esemgojele wacela uxolo emindenini yabagilwa.Ugixabezwe udilikajele icala ngalinye lokubulala uLoyiso Shabalala, Sthembiso Njapha noMthobisi Shibase.Abafi babulawa ngokudutshulwa ngoDisemba 2020, Meyi 2021 nangoJuni 2023.Ijaji liphinde lagweba uRadebe iminyaka engu-15 icala ngalinye kwamathathu okuzama ukubulala, neminye engu-15 icala ngalinye kwamabili okuphanga kuhlonyiwe.Inkantolo igwebe uRadebe iminyaka engu-10 ngokutholakala nesibhamu nezinhlamvu okungekho emthethweni nezinyanga ezingu-12 ngokutholakala nemoto okwakukholakala ukuthi uyebile.Enkantolo kuvele ukuthi lokhu kubulala kwakuthinta amaqembu amabili ezigelekeqe ayeqembukelene eselwa futhi kunombango ofaka phakathi izidakamizwa.

UGWETSHWE odilikajele ababili neminyaka emihlanu ngaphezulu ebhadla ejele owesilisa waseFolweni, owabulala intombazane ayephuza nayo.Izolo, iNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini, igwebe uSamkelo Victus Dube (33) owayengumshayeli wamatekisi asuka eFolweni eya eThekwini.Ecaleni lokuqala lokushaya ngenhloso yokulimaza, umngani kamufi, uNksz Thandi Princess Shange, ugwetshwe iminyaka emihlanu.Kwathi kwelokubulala uSbahle Faith Biyela (17) wagwetshwa udilakajele. Udilakajele wesibili uwuthole ngecala lokudlwengula umufi.Esigamekweni esenzeka ngo-Okthoba 5, 2020, kuthiwa uDube wayekade ehlezi nomufi endlini yakhe noNksz Shange.Kuthiwa wabathengela utshwala ngemuva kwalokho kuthiwa wadlwengula wabulala umufi.Isidumbu sikamufi satholakala sinenqwaba yamanxeba okugwazwa, sasidindilize sibheke phezulu nesitho sangasese sihlezi obala.Wakhalelwa ngamasongo kaSigonyela ngo-Okthoba 13, ebhace kubo kukanina eChesterville.Wawaphika wonke amacala inkantolo ebimbeke wona uDube.Umshushisi, u-Advocate Khatija Essack, uveze ukuthi umufi wayenekusasa eliqhakazile njengoba wayebuye alingise emdlalweni wethelevishini, Isidingo. Wanxusa inkantolo ukuba imnikeze isigwebo sikadilakajele uDube.IJaji uBroos Beddersson likhale ngesihluku esasetshenziswa nguDube ngesikhathi edlwengula ephinda ebulala umufi."Isigwebo sikadilikajele yiyonanto ekufanele. Indlela owambulala ngayo lo wesifazane ibe nesihluku esikhulu. Lesi yisigwebo esikufanele kunazo zonke,'' kugcizelala ijaji.Liqhuba, lithe izigwebo zalolu hlobo zingaklama indima enkulu ekwehliseni izehlakalo zalolu hlobo zokudlwengula nokubulawa kwabesifazane elithe seziphenduke insakavukela.Ijaji lisukumise abazali bakamufi lase lidlulisa amazwi enduduzo kubona. "Sengathi ningathobeka amanxeba. Kuyabonakala ukuthi umufi ubenekusasa eliqhakazile,'' kusho ijaji.Ngemuva kokuba inkantolo seyiwise isigwebo, unina kaDube obesenkantolo igama lakhe eligcine lingatholakalanga, ubonakale ekhala.Usukumile waya kuDube wakhuluma naye wase eyamqabula. "Ngiyakuthanda yezwa mfana wami futhi ngiyohlezi ngikuthanda,'' usho kanje. Uphendulile uDube ngamazwi afanayo.Ngaphandle kwenkantolo, unina kaDube ucele ukukhuluma nabazali bakamufi kodwa benqaba."Yini azoyikhuluma nathi njengoba bengakaze bezoxolisa futhi abakaze beze nasemngcwabeni wengane yami,'' kuchaza unina kamufi, uNksz Zonke Mabhida.Ubonge inkantolo ngokugixabeza uDube ngesigwebo esinesisindo.

UPHUNYUKE bemchitha ekubeni yilungu lekhomishini eluleka uhulumeni ngezinto ezithinta amajaji, ohola iqembu Umkhonto weSizwe ePhalamende, uDkt John Hlophe.UHlophe ungene ngodli kule khomishini nakuba ebechithwa amanye amaqembu ePhalamende abengayizwa eyokuphakanyiswa kwegama lakhe ekubeni yilungu le-Judicial Service Commission (JSC). Igama likaHlophe owayengumengameli wamajaji eWestern Cape, beliphakanyiswe namanye amagama amalungu ePhalamende, ukuthi abe yingxenye yeJSC, ephenya izikhalazo ezibhekiswe emajajini. Akubanga namsindo ngokuphakanyiswa kwamagama amalungu ahlukene ukuthi abe yingxenye yeJSC, okubalwa elomholi we-EFF uMnuz Julius Malema, elikaNksz Fasiha Hassan we-ANC, Advocate Glynnis Breytenbach we-DA, Mnuz Athol Trollip we-ActionSA noMnuz Molapi Lekganyane we-ANC. USotswebhu we-ANC, uMnuz Mdumiseni Ntuli, nguyena ophakamise amagama alawa malungu.USomlomo wePhalamende, uNkk Thoko Didiza, ubuze ukuthi kukhona yini abaphikisana nalesi siphakamiso, kwaphakama uSotswebhu we-DA uMnuz George Michalakis, wathi bachitha igama likaHlophe. Kushintshane abaholi bamaqembu ahlukene baphefumula ngalesi siphakamiso sokufaka igama likaHlophe.I-DA, Freedom Front Plus ne-ACDP yiwona maqembu achithe igama likaHlophe, kwathi amanye amaqembu ameseka. UMnuz Sihle Ngubane weMK, uthe uMthethosisekelo wezwe, awuwavimbi amalungu ePhalamende ukuthi abe yingxenye yeJSC.Uthe uHlophe unawo amava okuba yingxenye yeJSC ngoba uthunywe abavotele iMK.UMnuz Floyd Shivambu iPhini likaMengameli le-EFF, uthe selimlinde ngabomvu uHlophe kwiJSC.“Sifuna ukuzwa amangwevu akho kwiJSC ngakho asinankinga nokuphakanyiswa kwegama lakho. Kunamalungu e-DA, angongqongqoshe angafundile. Amanye awo awanasicucu kodwa angongqongqoshe. Asinankinga nalokhu ngoba avumelekile ukuthi akhethelwe ezikhundleni eziphezulu,” kusho uShivambu.Umholi we-UDM, uGeneral Bantu Holomisa, uthe abantu abavotele iMK bamjube noma ikuphi uHlophe ngakho angaya noma ikuphi lapho ethunywa khona yiqembu lakhe.“Asinankinga noHlophe, unamava ngakho akangene.”Amanye amaqembu akhale ngokuthi uHlophe akumele abe kwiJSC ngoba waphucwa igunya lokuba yijaji emva kokuzama ukuhlohla amanye amajaji aseNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo ukuthi aseke owayengumengameli wezwe, uMnuz Jacob Zuma (osengumholi weMK) emacaleni enkohlakalo abhekene nawo. Akhale ngokuthi ukufakwa kukaHlophe kungaphazamisa umsebenzi weJSC. Noma kunjalo kodwa uNkk Didiza uthe igama likaHlophe lizoba yingxenye yabantu abazoba kwiJSC ngoba usekwe yiningi. Kunezinhlangano zomphakathi ebezingahambisani nokufakwa kukaHlophe kwiJSC.

Kulindeleke ukuthi avele ngoMsombuluko eNkantolo yeMantshi eNelspruit owesilisa (37) oboshwe ngezinsolo zokudala udlame emphakathini ngemibhalo ayenze ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.Lona wesilisa uboshwe yithimba leSerious Organised Crime Investigation lisizwa yiCrime Intelligence ngemuva kokubhala ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ukuthi “alivalwe izwe futhi umengameli kumele akhishwe”.Ngemuva kwalo mbhalo, amaphoyisa aqale uphenyo wase eboshwa ngokuphula umthetho i-Section 14 of the Cybercrimes Act 19 of 2020 othi: “Umuntu osebenzisa ubuchwepheshe ukuxhumana, ukuthumela omunye umyalezo noma iqoqo labantu noma umphakathi jikelele ngenhloso yokudala udlame emphakathini uzotholwa enecala.”Inhloko yoKlebe ebambile eMpumalanga, uBrigadier Gregory Gaillard, ikushayele ihlombe ukuboshwe komsolwa.“NjengoKlebe sizokuvikela ukuhlala kwabantu ezweni futhi sibophe noma wubani ophula umthetho ngaphandle kokusaba nokwenzelela.”

OKLEBE KwaZulu-Natal basindise amadoda ayisithupha abebikwe ukuthi athunjiwe, abopha abasolwa ababili ngempelasonto.Abasolwa abaneminyaka engu-33 nengu-41, kulindeleke ukuthi bavele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMgungundlovu, ngoLwesibili.Okhulumela oKlebe KwaZulu-Natal, uLieutenant Colonel Simphiwe Mhlongo, uthe abasolwa baboshwe ngoMgqibelo eNewlands West.“Abagilwa abayisithupha bahlengwe ngempumelelo eNewlands futhi uphenyo lwethu esilwenzayo luyaqhubeka,” kusho uMhlongo.Uqhube wathi ngokolwazi abanalo bewoKlebe, ayikho imali ekhokhwe abagilwa kulabo abebekade bebathumbile ukuze bakhululwe.Kubikwa ukuthi ithimba lamaphoyisa ezinhlaka ezehlukene nonogada bakaMagma Security and Investigations bebe yingxenye yokuboshwa kwabasolwa obekwenziwa oKlebe.Kuthiwa abagilwa babekade kubikwe ukuthi bathunjiwe ngesonto eledlule, base beyogqunywa emzini thize oseNewlands West, eThekwini.Kolunye udaba, ubuholi bamaphoyisa kuzwelonke buveze ukukhathazeka kwabo ngokubize ngokwanda kwezigameko ezibikwayo zokuthunjwa kwezakhamuzi, abantu abadumile nosomabhizinisi.UNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa, uMnuz Bheki Cele, izolo esePitoli, uthe nakuba isimo sinjena kodwa uyancomeka umsebenzi owenziwa amaphoyisa asekhaleni lempi yokuhlakaza lobu bugebengu.UCele uveze ukuthi oKlebe sebebophe abasolwa abangu-62. “Kukhona abasolwa abangu-55 ababoshelwe icala lokuthumba amaChina. Abanye abasolwa abahlanu baboshelwe icala lokuthumba abantu abadabuka ezweni iMozambique,” kusho uCele.

Kubukeka sengathi obengundunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube, uphuthwe wukuthamela ukufungiswa kothatha izintambo kuye uMnuz Thami Ntuli, eMgungundlovu, ngoLwesibili ngoba engekho ezweni.UDube-Ncube waqopha umlando eqokwa njengondunankulu wokuqala wesifazane ngo-2022, engena esikhaleni esashiywa nguSihle Zikalala.Indodakazi yakhe, uZama Dube, ifake ekhasini layo le-Instagram ngoMsombuluko ukuthi ibithweswa iziqu zobudokotela.Ithe onina bayo ababili bahambe amahora angu-28 ukuzoyibona kwenzeka into eyaphrofethwa ngugogo wayo ongasekho eNyuvesi yaseCalifornia Los Angeles. Ezithombeni kubonakala uDube-Ncube futhi kune-video ethula nenkulumo.UZama uke waba ngumsakazi eziteshini zaseGoli okubalwa kuzo iYFM ne-702 ngaphambi kokuyoqhuba izifundo zakhe phesheya,Uthweswe iziqu zeDoctor of Philosophy: Film, Television and Digital Media.UZama ubonge bonke abamesekile wathi kuzothatha isikhathi ukukholwa.

INKAMPANI ephehla ugesi kuleli i-Eskom ithi zihamba kahle izinhlelo zokushintsha izinto kule nkampani njengoba sekuphele izinsuku eziwu-150 ugesi ungacimi ezweni.Iveze ukuthi namuhla izoba nesithangami sabezindaba ukuchaza kabanzi ngezinhlelo zayo zokuqinisekisa ukuthi lesi simo siyaqhubeka.Ukungacimi kukagesi kusho ukuthi isiyonge u-R10.60 billion kudizili njengoba ingakhanyisi imishini esetshenziswa ezimweni eziphuthumayo.Ithe iziteshi ezenza kahle yiKusile, Kendal, Majuba neLethabo kanti ezinye nazo zihlale zinogesi owu-70%.Ugesi ongekho njengamanje uphakathi kuka-9 800MW no-10 482MW.Ugesi okhona uwu-31 963MW kanti odingwa ngabantu uwu-26 420MW.Abophiko lwezokuxhumana e-Eskom bathe ngesikhathi ithimba lale nkampani lenza izinhlelo zasebusika lalilindele ukuthi okungenani ugesi uzocinywa ngokwesigaba sesibili. Lalizitshela ukuthi kuzoba nogesi owu-15 500MW  kusukela ngo-Ephreli 26 kuze kuphele ubusika kodwa izinhlelo zokulungisa ingqalasizinda ziye zashintsha isimo.Bathe namuhla i-Eskom izokhipha izinhlelo zasehlobo zikagesi ezizoqala kuSepthemba 1 kuze kube wuMashi 31 wonyaka ozayo.Yize ugesi ungacimi ngokohlelo lokunqamula ugesi kodwa uyacinywa ukuvikela ingqalasizinda okungama-transformer (imishini yokuphehla ugesi). Ugesi ucima lapho bebaningi abantu abadinga ugesi njengoba ingqalasizinda yakhelwe ukuhlinzeka isibalo esithile ngogesi. Lolu hlelo lubizwa nge-load reduction.Kugqugquzelwe abantu ukuba babike abaxhuma ugesi wezinyokanyoka ukuze kuvikelwe ama-transformer. Bangabika ngokushayela u-0800 112 722 naku-WhatAspp: 081 333 3323.

LIZOQALA ukuqulwa ngo-Okthoba 21 nonyaka, icala likathisha waseMqhele Secondary obhekene namacala ayisikhombisa okudlwengula abafundi bamantombazane.Lo thisha elingeke lidalulwe igama lakhe ubekade evele eNkantolo yesiFunda yasePinetown, izolo.Kuvela ukuthi wadlwengula abafundi abathathu bamantombazane ngo-Ephreli wango-2020. Kuthiwa lokhu wayekwenza ngaphakathi emagcekeni esikole.Umfundi ngamunye kwababili, kuthiwa wamphinda amahlandla amabili embizela egumbini lakhe lokufundisa.Ngenyanga efanayo, ngawo loyo nyaka, wakhalelwa ngamasongo kaSigonyela ngemuva kokuba abafundi bebikele abazali.Wathola ibheyili ka-R5 000. Kusukela lapho ubegqigqa kule nkantolo kodwa lingaqulwa icala ngenxa yezizathu ezahlukene. Esinye sazo kwakungukuthi abafundi bebengakwazi ukuza enkantolo ngoba bebefunda.Izolo, imantshi uCele ikuqinisekisile ukuthi leli cala lizoqulwa ngo-Okthoba nonyaka, yathi okwamanje bazosebenzisa izinsuku ezimbili okuwu-Okthoba 21 no-23."Icala lakho lizoqala ukuqulwa ngo-Okthoba. Siyacela ube khona uma seliqala," isho kanje ibhekise kuthisha.Ummeli kammangalelwa, u-Andile Thusi, uthe kuhle ukuthi leli cala selizoqala ukuqulwa ngemuva kokuba selibambezeleke isikhathi eside.Izolo, abafundi okusolakala ukuthi wabadlwengula bebengabonwa nangalukhasha. Ngokujwayelekile bajwayele ukufika bephelezelwa ngabazali babo.Ummangalelwa usamisiwe emsebenzini.

UQALE kabusha umdonsiswano ngendaba yomhlaba ongaphansi kwamakhosi KwaZulu-Natal, onganyelwe isikhwama Ingonyama Trust njengoba iSilo izolo senekele izwe ngezinkinga zaso nebhodi eliphethe.Uqhekeko phakathi kweSilo uMisuzulu kaZwelithini nohulumeni luhlale obala emhlanganweni wamakhosi obusoLundi.Kulo mhlangano iSilo sikhale ngokukhishwa inyumbazane yibhodi leNgonyama Trust. Ibhodi laqokwa uNgqongqoshe wezoLimo, uNkk Thoko Didiza, ngonyaka odlule.ISilo yiso esinguSihlalo weNgonyama Trust, nokuyisikhundla esisithathe kulo nyaka emva kokususwa kwenkosi uThanduyise kaMpiyezintombi Mzimela.ISilo sithe amalungu ebhodi awafuni ukusamukela njengoSihlalo walo.“Ngicela ukusho ukuthi asizwani kuleli bhodi. Abafuni ukungamukela, bafuna ukungixosha. Angazi ukuthi bazongixosha kanjani ngoba phela yimina ophethe Ingonyama Trust, kuza amakhosi emva kwami. Basayina izinto ezingekho emthethweni. Angithi phela bayazi ukuthi ngimatasa ngeminye imisebenzi yesizwe.”ISilo sithe ngeke sivume ukuthi Ingonyama Trust iphele, saphinde sakhononda ngokungabi bikho kukaNkk Didiza emhlanganweni wayizolo.Okhulumela uNkk Didiza, uMnuz Reggie Ngcobo, uthe uNkk Didiza akazange amenywe kulo mhlangano.“Siyakweshwama lokhu okushiwo uNgangezwe. Asizange sisithole isimemo. Indaba yalo mhlangano besiyizwela emoyeni. Siyibonile nje incwadi indiza emoyeni, kumenywa amakhosi.”Akuqali manje ukubhekana ngeziqu zamehlo kukaZulu nohulumeni ngodaba lweNgonyama Trust.Udaba lombango weNgonyama Trust luqale ukususa udweshu ngesikhathi ithimba elaliholwa owayengumengameli, uMnuz uKgalema Montlanthe, liphakamisa ukuthi Ingonyama Trust ihlakazwe.Lokhu kwaholela ekutheni iSilo uGoodwill Zwelithini kaBhekuzulu sibize imbizo kaZulu eyayisoLundi lapho kwahuba khona isimo kunukwa inhangano ebusayo i-ANC ngokuthi izama ukuphuca amakhosi umhlaba.ISilo sithe umbango wesihlalo sobukhosi bukaZulu udala ukuthi abangayifuni Ingonyama Trust bathole ithuba lokuyiqeda.ISilo sibalule amacala afakwa uMntwana uMbonisi kaBhekuzulu, esithe amanye sengathi 'uvele aphuphe ebusuku bese evuka ekuseni eyowafaka'.Sithe sona asinendaba nemihlomulo esiyithola kuhulumeni, sathi singaphila ngaphandle kwayo.ISilo siphinde sasebenzisa ithuba izolo ukwethula ngokusemthethweni uNdlunkulu waso omusha, (Nomzamo) uKaMyeni.UNdunankulu kaZulu, uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi, uthe amalungu ebhodi eNgonyama Trust nabasebenzi benza sengathi Ingonyama Trust eka-Nkk Didiza.“Ngesikhathi iSilo sihlela lo mhlangano, isikhulu esiphezulu kwiNgonyama Trust, sibuze ukuthi ngabe uNkk Didiza uwugunyazile yini umhlangano.”Omele iSilo endlini yobuholi bomdabu, uMntwana uSimphiwe Zulu, ubuze ukuthi kungani Ingonyama Trust iphethwe ehhovisi likaNkk Didiza.“Kungani ingaphethwe lapha KwaZulu-Natal? Laba bantu abayiphethe ePitoli abanandaba nayo, bafuna ibhidlike. Ukuba iphethwe lapha KwaZulu-Natal ngabe iphethwe abantu abayikhathalelayo.”Inkosi Russell Nsikayezwe Cebekhulu ikhale ngokuthi amalungu ekomiti lasePhalamende elibhekelele ezomhlaba awayifuni Ingonyama Trust.Uthe uZulu kufanele uhlanganise imali, ukuze uyokulwa udaba lweNgonyama Trust enkantolo.Usihlalo wendlu yobuholi bomdabu KwaZulu-Natal, iNkosi Sifiso Shinga, namakhosi asesigungwini sale ndlu, bebengekho emhlanganweni.Ngaphambi komhlangano uShinga ubebhale incwadi, ephakamisa ukuthi iSilo sihlehlise umhlangano.Iphini likaNdunankulu kaZulu, iNkosi Phathisizwe Chiliza, lithe ngesikhathi lisengusihlalo wendlu, abakaze baphikisane nokusuke kushiwo iSilo.Uthe babeshiya konke ababekwenza uma sekukhulume iSilo.

KUKHULEKELWE izimo ezahlukene omama abazithola bebhekene nazo, engqungqutheleni yomama bebandla, Isibusiso IBandla leNkosi Baptist Church in Zion of Southern Africa.Leli bandla belinengqungquthela yomama ebiseSoweto, eGoli ngempelasonto. Lingaphansi kobuholi buka-Archbishop Phumlani Dlamini ophinde abe ngusomabhizinisi.Phakathi kwezinto ebeziseqhulwini ezikhulekelwe kakhulu kule nkonzo kubalwa ukukhulelwa kwamantombazane, ukwanda kwabantu abasha abangena ogibeni lwezidakamizwa, nezingqinamba ezikhinyabeza inhlalonhle emishadweni.UNkk Nontobeko Dlamini, ongomunye wabebehamba phambili kulo mkhuleko, unxuse ukuthi omama bakhuleke bajule bathandazele ingwadla enkulu yokukhulelwa kwamantombazane.Uthe ukholwa ukuthi uma omama bengakhuleka bagxile kakhulu emkhulekweni nakanjani uNkulunkulu angangenelela. Ukugcizelele nokuthi umkhuleko kumele uhambisane nokuqinisa nasezimfundisweni, omama babe neqiniso ezinganeni zamantombazane. Bawatshele amaqiniso empilo noma ngabe ababa kangakanani."Sinxusa uNkulunkulu ukuthi abe nathi ukuze sizokwazi ukuthi sibhekana kanjani nalesi simo. Iqiniso ukuthi liyonakala izwe lethu uma siqhubeka nokukhula isibalo samantombazane amancane akhulelwayo,'' usho kanje.Uthe omama kungumsebenzi wabo ukuphebeza izinkinga ezahlukene ngomkhuleko.Uthe uNkulunkulu uyabalalela abesifazane uma bekhuleka ngokweqiniso.Ugcizelele kakhulu ukuthi omama kumele babumbane benze isiqiniseko sokuthi basebenzisa umkhuleko njengethuluzi nanoma yini ekhinyabeza inhlalonhle yasemindenini.UNkk Gugulethu Dlamini ukhulume kabanzi ngokubaluleka kokuba omama bakhulekele isihlava sokwanda kwabantu abasha asebephenduke izisulu zezidakamizwa.Ugcizelele ukuthi akukho nokukodwa okungenqotshwe uma kusetshenziswa umkhuleko ngendlela efanele. Uthe kumqoka kakhulu nokuthi uma kukhulekwa, ingashiywa ngaphandle indaba yemindeni ukuze imishado izoma phakade ingazamaziseki kalula. Ubalule nokuthi kuba nzima ukukhulisa izingane uma umndeni vele usuqhekekile.U-Archbishop Dlamini uthe kuleli bandla bayakholelwa kakhulu ophikweni lomama ngoba lunamandla okwenza izinto zenzeke lisebenzisa amandla omkhuleko.

UNGQONGQOSHE kaGesi, uDkt Kgosientsho Ramokgopa, uthi omasipala bakweleta i-Eskom u-R78 billion.URamokgopa uveze lezi zindaba izolo esithangamini sabezindaba ngezinhlelo zokuphehla ugesi.“Omasipala bakweleta i-Eskom uR78 billion, bona bakweletwa uR349 billion ngamabhizinisi, iminyango kahulumeni nezakhamuzi ezingawukhokheli ugesi. Sizosebenzisana neSouth African Local Government Association (Salga) ukuqinisekisa ukuthi omasipala bayalekelelwa ukukhokha izikweletu zabo. Kunohlelo lokubasiza olwenziwa wuMnyango weziMali kuzwelonke kodwa sifuna omasipala abazongena kulo bahlonyiswe ngamakhono azobasiza ukuthi bangaphinde bazithole kulesi simo,” kusho uRamokgopa.Uthe u-78% womasipala abangaphansi kohlelo lokuhlela kabusha isikweletu sabo sikagesi abayikhokhi imali okufanele bayikhokhe nyanga zonke. URamokgopa uthe kuzothathwa omasipala ababili abakweleta kakhulu kuzo zonke izifundazwe ukuze baqale uhlelo oluvivinywayo lokubasiza. Bazosebenzisana noNgqongqoshe wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana nezoMdabu, uMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa, nezinkampani ezizimele ezizobalekelela.Ukhale ngokuthi uma isimo sokukweletwa kwe-Eskom womasipala singanqandwa manje, kuyoshaya u-2050 sebeyikweleta u-R3.1 trillion.Ube eseveza ukuthi izinhlelo zokulwa nenkinga yokucima kukagesi zihamba kahle njengoba sekuphele izinyanga ezine ugesi ungacimi.“Zihamba kahle kakhulu izinhlelo zokuphehla ugesi. Isimo sishintshile eKusile, Majuba naseMatla njengoba lezi ziteshi ziphehla ugesi owanele. Ezinye iziteshi zikagesi ezingasafelwa yimishini njalo yiTutuka, Kendal neKrile. I-Eskom ibithe akufanele ugesi ongekho udlule ku-14 000MW kodwa manje lesi sibalo simi ku-10 508MW. Okuyisimo esihle kakhulu,” kusho uRamokgopa.Yize izinhlelo zokuphehla ugesi zihamba kahle kodwa uRamokgopa uthe lokhu akusho ukuthi seludlulile uhlelo lokucima ugesi ngoba zisekhona izingqinamba.Ubuye waveza ukuthi bazoqinisekisa ukuthi intengo kagesi ayinyuki ngendlela exakile njengoba izinhlelo zokuphehla ugesi sezingconywana kunesimo ezazikuso ngonyaka odlule.Uthembise ababhekene nohlelo lokucinywa kukagesi ukuze kuvikelwe ingqalasizinda, olubizwa nge-load reduction, ukuthi uyalusukumela udaba lwabo.Ubuye wakhala ngokuthi emizini ewu-10 million okufanele ukuthi ithole ugesi wamahhala, iwu-2 million kuphela ehlomulayo.Uthe bazosebenzisana nomasipala ukuqinisekisa ukuthi kuhlomula abantu abaningi futhi basizwe nangama-solar okuziphehlela ugesi welanga. Uveze ukuthi uhulumeni usuke eyikhiphile imali yokuxhasa okufanele bathole ugesi wamahhala kodwa omasipala abababhalisi abantu abenele.

UKUBUYA kukaNobhala Jikelele weMK, uMnuz Arthur Zwane, kudale omunye uginqigonqo kule nhlangano eholwa owayengumengameli, uJacob Zuma.Ungqimphothwe oshaywe uZwane udale ukuthi kugudluzwe uDkt Sifiso Maseko, obengakaqedi namasonto amabili engenile esikhundleni sikanobhala jikelele.UMaseko wayeqokelwe kulesi sikhundla ekupheleni kwenyanga eyedlule, kulandela ukushiya kukaZwane.Ukushiya kukaZwane kwaba indida njengoba kwaqale kwavela incwadi yokuthi uyasula, kwabuye kwavela eyokuthi ususiwe esikhundleni.Incwadi yokususwa kukaZwane esikhundleni ebisayinwe uZuma, yabhalwa ngoJuni 28. Neyokuqoka uMaseko nayo yabhalwa ngawo uJuni 28.Kule ncwadi uZwane wakhala ngomsebenzi omningi, wathi ufuna ukugxila emabhizinisi akhe.Kuqubuke ingwijikhwebu izolo ngesikhathi iMK imemezela ukuthi uZwane ukhuza ibuya.I-MK imemezela ukubuya kukaZwane nje, ubese ke wabonakala ehamba noZuma.Ngempelasonto, uZuma noZwane bebebonakala bencokola ngesikhathi behambele eBuhleni.Khona lapho kuphinde kwaputshuka i-video kaZuma lapho ebekhala khona ngomuntu athe uhambe exosha abantu.“Bonke laba bantu okuthiwa baxoshiwe abaxoshiwe,” kuzwakala kusho uZuma kule video emfishane.Okhulumela iMK, uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndhlela, uthe uZuma akazange akwemukele ukwesula kukaZwane.“UZuma noZwane babe nomhlangano, lapho bexoxe khona eyokubuya kukaZwane. Ngingasho ukuthi uZwane usebuyile.”UNdhlela uthe okwenze ukuthi uZuma angayivumi eyokushiya kukaZwane ukuthi iqembu lilungiselela ukwenza kahle okhethweni lohulumeni basekhaya oluzokuba ngo-2026.“Emhlanganweni wokucobelelana ngamasu esasiwubambele eLimpopo, savumelana ngokuthi kufanele sihlale sihlomile. Savumelana ngokuthi kufanele siqinise izinhlaka zeqembu njengoba kuzokuba nokhetho. Sinxusa abantu baqhubeke nokweseka iMK.“Sisembhidlangweni wokulwa nohulumeni wokubambisana we-ANC neDA. Sibhekene nomsebenzi omkhulu wokuqapha ukusebenza kwahulumeni ongabanakile abantu abamnyama.”UNdhlela uthe uMaseko usezophatha uphiko lwakwandaba zabantu.Sekuyinto ejwayelekile ukugudluzwa kwabaholi kwiMK.Ngesikhathi kushiya uZwane, kwaphinde kwavela nencwadi yokuxoshwa kowayengumgcinimafa, uMnuz Danisa Zulu.Esikhundleni sikaZulu kwaqokwa uMnuz Menzi Magubane.Owabhalisa iMK ngokusemthethweni, uMnuz Jabulani Khumalo, wakhonjwa indlela nabanye ababesethimbeni lesikhashana elalihola iMK kuzwelonke.Kwaphinde kwadilizwa owayedidiyela iMK KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Nhlanhla Ngidi, nowayehola uphiko lwentsha enhlanganweni, uBonginkosi Khanyile.

IZAZI zomthetho zithi uMkhonto weSizwe (MK) awunathuba lokuphumelela ngisho ungaya enkantolo ngenhloso yokuvimba ukuthi  kufungiswe amalungu njengoba kunezikhalo ngemiphumela yokhetho.Iqembu elisha i-MK ifuna buchitheke bugayiwe njengoba izama ukumisa izinhlelo zokuhlala komhlangano wokuqala wePhalamende. I-MK isabisa nangokuya enkantolo iyovimba ukuhlala kwePhalamende ukuze kulungiswe isikhalo sayo ngemiphumela yokhetho.Zinkani zababili njengoba iPhalamende likubeke kwacaca ukuthi liyaqhubeka nezinhlelo zalo noma ngabe abe-MK abezi. Kulindeleke ukuthi iPhalamende lihlale okokuqala lifungise amalungu, kukhethwe uSomlomo bese kuvotelwa noMengameli ngoLwesihlanu.Umsindo ususwa wukuthi i-MK ayeneme ngemiphumela yokhetho obelungenyanga edlule nalapho iwole khona inqwaba yezihlalo. I-MK ithi akulungiswe isikhalo sayo ngaphambi kokuhlala kwePhalamende.Ungoti wezomthetho uSolwazi Pierre de Vos ekhuluma neNewzroom Afrika, uthe iPhalamende livunwa wumthetho ukuthi liqhubeke nomsebenzi.“Mancane amathuba okuthi inkantolo imise ukuhlala kwePhalamende, njengamanje amalungu akhethiwe angu-400 futhi abhaliwe ohlwini. Bangamalungu ePhalamende kumanje umehluko wukuthi abakwazi ukuqala ukusebenza bengafungile,’’ kusho uDe Vos.Uthe umthetho uthi uma kukhona amalungu angafikanga kuyaqhubeka ukuhlala kodwa umuntu uma ephuthwe yimihlangano engu-15 ilandelana engabiki kufanele athathelwe izinyathelo achithwe.Omunye ungoti wezomthetho uMnuz Mpumelelo Zikalala weZikalala Attorneys, uthe umhlangano wePhalamende uzobe usemthethweni. UZikalala uthe kuyaqala ukwenzeka lokhu kodwa akuyona ingqinamba yinto ecacile nje.“Uhlu lwamalungu ePhalamende lukhona aselinde ukufunga bese eyasebenza. Mancane amathuba okuphumelela enkantolo uma uzama ukuvimba ukuhlala kwePhalamende,’’ kusho uZikalala.Uthe okokuqala uma i-MK iya enkantolo kuyofanele kube wudaba oluphuthumayo.“Uma udaba luphuthuma kufanele kube wukuthi kunamalungelo azophazamiseka, kunomonakalo omkhulu oyobe ungeke usalungiseka bese kuba wukuthi alukho olunye uhlaka olungalungisa udaba,’’ kusho uZikalala.Uthe uma ubheka amaphuzu amathathu angenhla kuzoba nzima ukuthi udaba lwamukeleke. Uthe iMK bekufanele ifake udaba eNkantolo yezoKhetho ngaphambi kokuya eNkantolo yezoMthethosisekelo.UNobhala wePhalamende, uMnuz Masibulele Xaso, naye obekhuluma kwithelevishini, uthe amalungu ePhalamende asekhethiwe futhi azofungiswa ngoLwesihlanu.“Konke kumi ngomumo umhlangano uzohlala kufungiswe amalungu ePhalamende noma ngabe kukhona amanye aqoke ukungezi. Uhlu lukhona lunikwe inhloko yamajaji yona yalunika iPhalamende,’’ kusho uXaso.

ONGOTI bezomthetho babona umqansa ongakhwelwa mbongolo emajajini ngodaba lowayengumengameli uJacob Zuma owacele ukuthi ashenxe uma sekulalewa udaba lwakhe ne-IEC.Kulindeleke ukuthi iNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo ngoLwesihlanu, ilalele udaba lombango phakathi kukaZuma ne-IEC. Abe-IEC banquma ukuthi uZuma aphume ohlwini lwabaya ePhalamende ngoba walahlwa ngecala wagwetshwa.I-IEC ikhuluma ngecala lokwedelela umyalelo wenkantolo elagweba uZuma izinyanga ezingu-15 ejele ngo-2021, lapho okwasuka khona izibhelu. Lelo cala yilona elibangwa kakhulu njengoba sekufanele aye ePhalamende, i-IEC ithi umthetho awuvumi.UZuma walufaka enkantolo udaba wafika walunqoba kodwa abe-IEC balwedlulisela eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo bengenelisekile. Kuthe kusalindwe ukuthi lungene, uZuma wathushuka nesicelo esingajwayelekile.UZuma ucele ukuthi amajaji ayisithupha athatha isinqumo sokumlahla ngecala amgweba ngo-2021, awangalulaleli udaba lwe-IEC. UZuma ukhala ngokuthi lawo majaji angase angabi nobulungiswa kulolu daba.UZuma ugagule amaJaji uMbuyiseli Madlanga, Steven Majiedt, uNonkosi Mhlanthla, uLeona Theron noZukisa Tshiqi. INhloko yamaJaji uRaymond Zondo ingelesithupha kwabacelwa ukuba bashenxe.Ungoti wezomthetho, uMnuz Mpumelelo Zikalala wenkampani yabameli iZikalala Attorneys, uthe zihlala ziba khona izicelo kodwa lesi sehlule kakhulu.“Izicelo zokuthi amajaji ashenxe sizejwayele kodwa hhayi amaningi kangaka, akuvamile lokhu. Kwalona uhlaka lwezomthetho kuleli indlela oluhlelwe ngayo alukaze lucabange ukuthi kuyofika isicelo salolu hlobo, sekuzosiza ukuthi babhekane naso,’’ kusho uZikalala.Ibhentshi linamjaji angu-11 esewonke njengoba uZuma efuna kuhoxe ayisithupha nje. UZikalala uthe kungathathwa amajaji ezinkantolo ezinkulu noma eNkantolo okuDluliswa kuyo amaCala azohlalela udaba. Uthe kodwa kuyofanele kube amajaji angakaze alulalele udaba lukaZuma phambilini.Omunye ungoti wezomthetho u-Advocate Michael Osborne obekhuluma neSABC, uthe yinkiyankiya yodaba le kaZuma.“Wudaba oluyimpicabadala lolu ngoba okokuqala kufanele asebenze kanzima uZuma ukuveza ukuchema kwamajaji. Okwesibili kodwa wukuthi udaba lwe-IEC oluzongena enkantolo luxhumene nesigwebo sakhe esakhishwa yiyo inkantolo ezolalela udaba,’’ kusho u-Osborne.Uthe iphuzu likaZuma elizwakalayo wukuthi ngeke inkantolo ikhiphe isinqumo bese ngelinye ilanga icelwa ukuba isicubungule isihlaziye ukuze inqume ngaso futhi.U-Osborne uthe uma kwenzeka amajaji eshenxa kuyofanele iphini lenhloko yamajaji liqoke amajaji azobamba alalele udaba.

KUNGAKAPHOLI maseko kuphele isiteleka sodokotela abangaqashiwe abebeqhinqe ehhovisi likaMphathiswa wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal befuna ukuqashwa, ngoMsombuluko osokhemisi bagasele emahhovisi abaphathiswa bezempilo ezweni lonke befuna ukuqashwa.Osokhemisi bathi uMnyango wezeMpilo wagcina ngo-2015 ukulandela uhlelo oluyilo lokuqasha osokhemisi abasuke sebephothule izifundo zabo,  baze baqeqeshelwa umsebenzi ezikhungweni zikahulumeni.UMnuz Sandile  Nzuza ongomunye wosokhemisi abangaqashiwe, obehambise uhlu lwezikhalo ehhovisi likaMphathiswa wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal,  uthe muva nje izikhala zosokhemisi ziyakhangiswa ezibhedlela bafake izicelo kungaqashwa muntu kuzo,  kuthiwe izikhala  ebezivulekile zimisiwe noma asisekho isidingo sazo."Ukukhangiswa komsebenzi kusuke kusho ukuthi isuke isikhona imali yokukhokhela lowo msebenzi obezoqashwa. Kwenzekani ngaleyo mali uma umnyango noma leso sikhungo sesithi  umsebenzi asisekho isidingo sawo. Kuze kushiwo njalo nje kwenzekani ngezikhala ezivuleka ngokuthi kube khona osokhemisi  abahambayo nabashonayo kusukela ngo-2015. Sekunesikhathi sikhuluma noMnyango wezeMpilo ngalokhu ngokubhala izincwadi  singaphendulwa. Kulokhu sithathe isinqumo sokuthi sibe nemashi enokuthula ezoya kuwo wonke amahhovisi abaphathiswa bezempilo sethule  uhla lwezikhalo zethu bese kuba nohla oluzoya eMnyangweni wezeMpilo kuzwelonke nakumengameli,"  kusho uNzuza.Phakathi kwezikhalo osokhemishi bafuna ukuthi kuqashwe osokhemisi abangu-150 esifundazweni ngasinye njalo ngonyaka. Kuphinde kwamukelwe ososayensi abaqeqeshelwa umsebenzi njalo ngonyaka."Sifuna ukuthi  kuqashwe osokhemisi abasha ezikhaleni zalabo abasuke bekhushulelwe ezikhundleni ngoba lezo zikhala zisuke zivele zikhona kwibhajethi yomnyango," kusho uNzuza.Uthe  bafuna ukuthi umnyango uphendule kungakapheli izinsuku eziyisikhombisa uma ungaphenduli bazothatha ezinye izinyathelo." Siyazi ukuthi kunenkinga yokushoda kwemali emnyangweni kodwa osokhemisi babalulekile ezikhungweni zezempilo uma kukalwa imisebenzi yabasebenzi bezimpilo babalwa njengabenza umsebenzi obucayi. Ngakho akukwazi ukuthi bashiywe ngaphandle bangaqashwa ngoba umnyango uthi uqasha abasebenzi abenza imisebenzi ebalulekile kuphela,"  kusho  uNzuza..Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMpilo kuleli uMnuz Foster Mohale, uthembise ukuthi uzoyiphendula imibuzo athunyelelwe yona.

INHLANGANO  yosomabhizinisi, i-Black Business Federation ikhala ngomdonsiswano phakathi kwe-ANC ne-DA  okubambezela ukumenyezelwa kweKhabhinethi, ekholwa ukuthi kungalimaza kakhulu osomabhizinisi ikakhulu abancane njengoba iRandi liya ngokuya lintengantenga.UNobhala-jikelele we-BBF uMnuz Wonder Jaca ekhuluma neSolezwe, uthe ukungamenyezelwa kweKhabhinethi wuMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, akugcini nje kuphela ngokufaka ingcindezi kosomabhizinisi ikakhulu abansundu abadonsa kanzima, kodwa kushaya nomnotho njengoba kungabalekisa abatshalizimali okufakazelwa ukuphelelwa amandla kwe-Randi uma liqhathaniswa nomnotho wakwamanye amazwe.“Nakuba elakuleli sekuphele iminyaka ewu-30 lathola inkululeko, kodwa osomabhizinisi abansundu basadonsa kanzima ngakho lokhu kubambezeleka nomdonsiswano, kudala ukuthi isimo sibe sibi kakhulu kubona ngoba kuphazamiseka notshalozimali,” kusho uJacaUkusho lokhu nje izingxoxo zokuqokwa kweKhabhinethi kuzwelonke ziyaqhubeka phakathi kwe-DA ne-ANC osekuphele amasonto amabili abantu bakuleli belindele ukumenyezelwa kwalo.Le nhlangano ithe ikuqonda kahle ukuthi udaba lokwandiswa kwamathuba omsebenzi akuncikile kuphela ekutheni avulwe uhulumeni, kodwa kufanele aqinisekise uzinzo oluzokwenza osomabhizinisi bakhule ngaleyo ndlela kuvuleke amathuba okuqashwa kwabantu.  Uthe ukuputshuka kwezincwadi ze-DA ngekufunayo ngesikhathi kuqhubeka izingxoxo, yikhona okwenza abatshalimali babe manqika okungaba nomthelela ongemuhle kosomabhizinisi abancane, wanxusa uRamaphosa ukuthi amemezele ikhabhinethi ukugwema ukuthi isimo singadlebeleki.Ngaphandle kokukhathazeka ngenxa yalo mdonsiswano, i-BBF inxuse uRamaphosa ukuthi eminyangweni emibili okungowoHwebo, ukuNcintisana neziMboni noMnyango obhekele amabhizinisi amancane, kuqokwe ongqongqoshe abansundu abakuqonda kangcono ukuhlupheka kwabantu abansundu.

ISANTACO KwaZulu-Natal ikhuthaze osomatekisi ukuthi basebenzise izinhlaka nemigudu yangaphakathi embonini yamatekisi ukuxazulula izinkinga kungaze kukapakele emiphakathini.Lokhu kuza emuva kwemibhikisho ebinodlame ezingxenyeni ezehlukene esifundazweni.UMphathi weHhovisi leSantaco eKZN, uMnuz Sfiso Shangase, uthe osomatekisi kumele bakhanyiselwe ukuthi imboni isebenza kanjani“Uma ningaboni ngaso linye akumele uyogovuza umphakathi ningene emgwaqweni ekubeni wazi kahle ukuthi kusetshenzwa kanjani. Uma kunenselelo, asisombulule izinto ngemigudu okuyiyona yona esikwazi ukuphila ngayo kwezokuthutha,” kusho uShangase.Usho kanjena nje ibibambene ngezihluthu embonini yamatekisi phakathi kososeshini bamatekisi oLundi nasoPhongolo.UShangase uthe abathole ukuthi kususe  udweshu wukuthi bekukhona osomatekisi abebefuna ukusebenzela ngasemakubo ngaphandle kokulandela imigudu efanele. Uthe embonini akusetshenzwa kanjalo kunemithetho eyilawulayo okumele ilandelwe.“Kukhona abebefaka amatekisi abo ngenkani bethi akukwazi ukuthi ngasemakubo kusebenze abantu bakwezinye izindawo. Bese kuba nososeshini ababili abebefuna ukusebenza ngenkani,” kusho uShangase.UShangase uthe umuntu ofuna ukufaka itekisi kusoseshini kumele aqale abheke ukuthi sikhona yini isikhala bese efaka isicelo.Uqhube wathi uma kuvuleka izikhala uyafakwa lowo asebenze.Imibhikisho yangenyanga edlule iphoqe iSantaco ukuthi ithathe isinqumo sokuthi ngoSepthemba ihambele zonke izifunda zamatekisi eKZN, ikhulume nabemboni yamatekisi emazingeni aphansi kososeshini.Isola ukuthi izinqumo ezithathwa abaholi ezingeni lesifundazwe azifiki kososeshini okungenye yezinto ezidala udungunyane.UMnyango wezokuThutha eKZN uthe uzosiqapha ngeso lokhozi isimo kuleya ndawo usebenzisana neSantaco.Umnyango uthe umdonsiswano obusudonse iminyaka emibili ugcine sewuba umbhikisho womphakathi kwavalwa imigwaqo eMayiwane, oLundi ngenyanga edlule.

ABAZALI nothisha kuzomele bavivele ukudonsa ngejoka lensimbi ngenxa yezindleko zemfundo ngemuva kokugejulwa kwesabelomali soMnyango wezeMfundo eyisiSekelo.Lona ngumbono kaMengameli wenyunyana yothisha i-National Teachers Union, uMnuz Sibusiso Malinga, othe ukuncishiswa kwesabelomali kuzogcina sekushaya kuzwele nakubazali.UMalinga ubenanela inkulumo kaNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezeMfundo eyisiSekelo, uNksz Siviwe Gwarube, obephawula ngalesi simo esithangamini nabezindaba ePitoli izolo.UNksz Gwarube uthe izifundazwe ezahlukene kuleli, zidinga imali ephakathi kuka-R350 million no-R3.8 billion ngonyakamali, ukuvala izikhala zothisha ezivulekile.UMalinga uthe: “Ukungatholi kwezikole izincwadi ezanele, kuphoqa ukuthi abazali bathenge izincwadi ukugcwalisela. Isimo semisebenzi siyabheda, lokho kusho ukuthi uma abazali bengakwazi ukuthenga izincwadi ingcindezi enkulu isala nothisha. Ukungaqashwa kothisha kuphinde kwengeze umsebenzi kwabasuke besebenza njengoba begcina sebefundisa izifundo ezengeziwe okungathikameza imiphumela ezikoleni.” UNgqongqoshe uthe inhloso yesithangami ukuvezela umphakathi izinkinga lo Mnyango obhekene nazo kulandela ukwehliswa kwesabelomali onikwa sona.UNksz Gwarube uthe emasontweni edlule iminyango yezemfundo ezifundazweni iveze ukuthi ibhekene nengcindezi enkulu ngenxa yokushoda kwemali.“Ingcindezi isibekhona iminyaka ngenxa yokwehliswa kwesabelomali esinikwa le minyango. Isimo somnotho esingesihle nokungaphathwa ngendlela kwemali kuhulumeni kugcina kuba nomthelela omubi ezikoleni. Ukuncishiswa kwemali enikezwa iminyango kuholela ekwehleni kwesibalo sothisha abaqashwayo, ukuncishiswa kwezincwadi zesikole, ukuncipha kwesibalo sabasebenzi abalekelela ngemisebenzi yasemahhovisi ezikoleni okuholela ekutheni othisha bazenzele lowo msebenzi, okulimaza isikhathi sokufundisa. Konke lokho kubeka ikusasa lezingane engcupheni,” usho kanje.Ukusho lokhu nje, uMnyango wezeMfundo esifundazweni i-Western Cape usuvele umemezele isinqumo sokwehliswa ukuqashwa kothisha ngonyaka ozayo ngenhloso yokuhambisana nesabelomali esincishisiwe, okusho ukuthi othisha kuzodingeka bafundise ikilasi elinesibalo esikhulu sabafundi.UNksz Gwarube uthe ngeshwa lokhu sekukapakela nakwezinye izifundazwe ngenxa yesizathu esifanayo.Uthe eminyakeni emibili noma emithathu ezayo, iminyango ezifundazweni izothola kunzima ukuvala izikhala zothisha ezivulekile ngesabelomali enaso, ngaphandle uma kukhona imizamo engenziwa ukugwema lesi simo.“Isibonelo nje ngonyakamali u-2025/2026, izifundazwe ezine zizobhekana nobunzima ekuqashweni kothisha, ngo-2026/2027 zizoba nhlanu bese kuthi ngo-2027/2028 zibe yisikhombisa izifundazwe ezizobhekana nalesi simo,” usho kanje.UNksz Gwarube uthe eminyakeni emihlanu eyedlule, isibalo sabafundi sikhule ngo-292 820, kanti ukukhula kwesibalo sabafundi esothisha singakhuli kuphazamisa izinga lemfundo etholakala ezikoleni.Nakuba kunjalo, uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, ngenyanga edlule ukhangise izikhala zothisha ezevile ku-700, ukufakwa kwezicelo okuvalwe ngoLwesihlanu.UNksz Gwarube uthe ukubhekana ngqo nalesi simo, uhlangane nabaphathiswa bomnyango kuzona zonke izifundazwe ukubheka ukuthi yiziphi izinselelo isifundazwe nesifundazwe esibhekene nazo. Uthe ucele umhlangano ophuthumayo noNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezeziMali.Ukhale ngokukhula kancane komnotho kuleli okuthiwa kungaphansi kuka-1%, nenkohlakalo okuthiwa isidle imali engu-R1.5 trillion phakathi kuka-2014 no-2023 okunomthelela omubi emnothweni. Uthe uhulumeni kumele ubeke eqhulwini iminyango ebalulekile inikezwe isabelomali esithe xaxa ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ikhipha imiphumela egculisayo.

UKUNGENELA imincintiswano eyahlukene yobuciko ukuhlola ithalente nezinga asekulona kugcine kuthela izithelo kumbhali osemncane ehlabana ngoR75 000 emncintiswaneni wezincwadi zesiZulu waminyaka yonke ohlelwa yi-University of Johannesburg (UJ).U-Ayanda Mchunu (26) waKwaSwayimane, ngaseMgungundlovu, udle umhlanganiso ngencwadi yakhe ewumdlalo esihloko sithi Angikaze Ngikubone Okunje, emncintiswaneni wezincwadi zesiZulu, i-UJ Prizes for Creative Writing in isiZulu. Exoxa neSolezwe ngemuva kokuzwa lezi zindaba, lo mbhali oseshicilele izincwadi eziwu-11 kusukela ngo-2020, uthe ukunqoba lo mncintiswano kusho lukhulu kuyena ikakhulu ngoba uvuleleke nakubabhali asebemnkantshubomvu kunaye.“Njengoba ngiwumbhali osafufusa kule ndima, ngihlale ngizihlola ngemincintiswano efuze lona ukubheka izinga lami ukuthi likude kangakanani manje ngakho ukunqoba kulesi sigaba kwenze ngabona ukuthi ubuciko bami buyakhula,” kusho u-Ayanda.Ngokuhlabana kulo mncintiswano okumenyezelwe abanqobe kuwona ngoLwesine, u-Ayanda ubhincisele nxanye uMuntomuhle Mcambi wencwadi yezinkondlo ethi Ukufa Kwenono, noNtombenhle Dlamini weyezindaba ezimfishane esihloko ethi Kujiyile Kwamhlaba.Eqhuba, u-Ayanda uthe okunye okumhlabe umxhwele ngale ncwadi anqobe ngayo, nengeyisithupha ezincwadini zakhe, wukuyibona iqhubeka yenza kahle njengoba kumanje ingenye yezincwadi ezikhona emitapweni yolwazi yakuMasipala wangakubo, uMsunduzi. “Iyatholakala futhi emitapweni yolwazi yase-University of The Free State futhi nabantu asebeyifundile abawuvali umlomo ngesifundo esitholakala kuyona. Nakhu manje futhi isinqoba kulo mncintiswano wezincwadi ezibhalwe kahle ngesiZulu.“Lo mklomelo uzongisiza ukuqhubeka ngithuthukise ubuciko bami, ngihlele imicimbi yokukwethula izincwadi zami ebantwini futhi ngihlela nokuthenga i-laptop ukwenza ukubhala izincwadi kube lula njengoba okwamanje ngibhala kwiselula,” usho kanje.Ezinye izincwadi zika-Ayanda ngezithi Imfundo Ikusasa Lethu, Usuku Lomshado, Kuyosa, Imiphumela, Words of Wisdom, Akabange Esafika, On Thin Ice, Beyond The Storm, Imfihlo ne-Echoes of Courage.

UFUNA bangabi nokucwasana ezikoleni abafunda kuzo abafundi abaqhamuka emindenini ehlukene uLandi Ndlovu oseqale umkhankaso wokunikela ngomfaniswano wesikole, ezikoleni ezahlukene zaseMkhanyakude.ULandi uthi ukukhulela emakhaya kumenze wabona ukuthi kuningi okumele bakwenze beyintsha eqhamuka khona.Muva nje uhambele izikole ezahlukene okubalwa kuzo nakade ayefunda kuso iJevu Secondary noNgqongqoshe wezaManzi, ukuHlanjwa kwawo nokuHanjiswa kweNdle kuleli, uMnuz Senzo Mchunu.Uthe ukwenze lokhu ngokufuna ukubuyisa isithunzi kubafundi bangazenyezi ngezinto abazigqokile uma beya esikoleni.“Ukukhulela lapha esifundazweni saseMkhanyakude kusenze sabona okuningi, kodwa manje njengoba nami senginamandla ngibone kungcono ngibuyisele emindenini okubonakalayo ukuthi ayikwazi ukwenza konke.“Nginike abafundi okuzobenza bakwazi ukuziqhenya futhi bakukhuthalele ukuya esikoleni,” kusho uLandi.UMchunu uthe akwaziyo wukuthi abafundi baphasa kahle uma yonke into ihamba kahle ezimpilweni zabo.Uthe kuyamjabulisa okwenziwe uLandi njengoba eyintsha, ekhuthaza ukuthi emphakathini kube nabafundi abadinga ukuxhaswa uma kuziwa ezintweni ezibenza babe bahle phambi kwabanye.Ukhuthaze abafundi bakamatric ukuthi bazimisele ukuze nabo bezoshintsha isimo sabo sasemakhaya nesendawo abasuka kuyo.

UTHUKUTHELE uyaveva owesilisa wakwaNongoma, uMntwana Bongani Zulu (57), othi uxoshwe yinduna yakhe emsebenzini imsola ngokuthi uthakathe uzakwabo, washona.UZulu ubengomunye wabasebenzi abaphusha izinqola ezithuthela abantu impahla uma beqeda ukuthenga eSpar, KwaNongoma.Uthe ubesebenzela iSpar, waxoshwa yinduna yakhona ngemva kokumsola ngokuthakatha uzakwabo ophathwe yizinyawo washona.UZulu usevule icala lokwehliswa isithunzi ngokusolwa ngokuthakatha yinduna yakhe ayibize ngoMsimango, athe ize yamxosha nasemsebenzini imnuka ngokuthakatha.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda ukuqinisekisile ukuthi uZulu uvule icala ngemuva kokusolwa ngokubulala umuntu ngomuthi. Uthe amaphoyisa aKwaNongoma, ayaphenya ngalokhu. UZulu uchaze uMsimango wathi uyinduna yaseSpar, aphinde abe yinduna yenkosi endaweni. Uveze ukuthi isono sakhe kube wukungaphumeleli ukuya emngcwabeni kazakwabo ophathwe yizinyawo wagcina eshonile.Ngaphambi kosuku lomngcwabo uthe kwaba nomhlangano lapho kwaqoqwa khona umnikelo wo-R50."Kwabe sekuthiwa abaphakamise izandla abangazophumelela ukuya emngcwabeni. Mina ngibe ngomunye wabantu abaphakamisa isandla, ngathi ngeke ngiphumelele ukuya emngcwabeni ngoba ngiyagula, ngizobe ngichathile," kusho uZulu.Inkinga uthe iqale esebuyela emsebenzini emva komngcwabo emasontweni amabili edlule.“UMsimango uvele wangibuza ukuthi kungani ngingayanga emngcwabeni kazakwethu. Ngimtshelile ukuthi ngasho nje ukuthi kungani ngingeke ngiye. Uvele wathi angihambe emsebenzini ngoba ngiyathinteka ekufeni kukamufi," usho kanje uZulu.Uthe simphathe kabi isenzo sikaMsimango, wathi ufuna achazele izwe ukuthi uzwe ngobani ukuthi uyena othakathe umufi washona. Uthe okunye wukuthi umufi ubeyisoka lendodakazi kaMsimango, manje akazi noma ubhodlela kuyena ngoba ephethwe kabuhlungu wukushona kwesoka lendodakazi yakhe yini. Uthe okuzomjabulisa ukuthi uMsimango ageze igama lakhe ngemva kokumhlambalaza phambi kwabanye ozakwabo ngokumbheca ngobende ekubeni inyama engayithanga mbibi.Kuthintwa uMsimango, akafunanga ukuphendula ngesinqumo sakhe sokuxosha uZulu emsebenzini. Kunalokho, uthe akekho umuntu ongamazi uZulu ukuthi ungumuntu onjani endaweni. Uqhube wathi ngisho kungabuzwa abanye abasebenzi bangamchaza ukuthi ungumuntu onjani. Uphethe ngokuthi bese beke balukhuluma udaba naye efike emsebenzini, waze waxolisa uZulu kodwa uyaxakeka ukuthi kungani esemvulele necala. Uthe uma enenkinga akazikhulumele nabaphathi besitolo yena akasangeni kulolu daba, akuselona olwakhe.

Lihlehliselwe uMashi 27 nonyaka icala lowesifazane owayeyiphoyisa osolwa ngokuphazamisa ukusebenza komthetho nokukhipha ngokungemthetho isiboshwa ejele. NgoLwesithathu uNkk Nokulunga Gumede uvele eNkantolo yeMantshi ePinetown wadedelwa ngesexwayiso, kwahlehliswa icala. Ngokwesitatimende samaphoyisa, umsolwa wayeqashwe ngaphansi kwamaphoyisa iSAPS esebenzela esiteshini saKwaMakhutha njengokaputeni engu-branch commander. Kubikwa ukuthi ngo-Ephreli 17, 2020 waya ejele eWestville wakhipha indodana yakhe ngaphandle kwamaphepha afanele aphuma enkantolo. Lokhu kuthiwa wakwenza ngaphandle kolwazi lomphenyi wecala. Indodana yakhe kuvela ukuthi yayikade iboshelwe icala lokushaya ngenhloso yokulimaza. UNkk Gumede kuthiwa wayisa indodana yakhe enkantolo kodwa icala langafakwa ohlwini lwamacala ayezolalelwa ngenxa yemithetho eyayilawula ubhubane iCovid-19. Kuvela ukuthi wabe eseyithatha indodana yakhe wagoduka nayo. Kwabe sekubikwa icala lokuphazamisa umthetho  nelokususa isiboshwa ejele. Okhulumela oKlebe eKZN, uMnuz Simphiwe Mhlongo, uthe idokodo laleli cala labe selidluliselwa koKlebe ophikweni oluphenya ngamacala enkohlakalo ebucayi eThekwini. Kwabe sekukhishwa amasamanisi. Ngo-Febhuwari 5 umsolwa wabizwa ukuba avele enkantolo ngoLwesithathu wabe esededelwa ngesixwayiso.

I-ANC KwaZulu-Natal isihleka usulu isinqumo seMeya yoMasipala wesifunda iZululand, uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi, sokubophisa iphini likasihlalo wayo esifundazweni, uNksz Nomagugu Simelane owagoloza ukuhoxisa izinsolo zokuthi ihlukumeza abesifazane ngokocansi.Okhulumela i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mafika Mndebele uthe angeke siphumelele isicelo sikaButhelezi sokuthi uNksz Simelane amhlawule ngo-R10 million.“Ihlaya leli elenziwa uThulasizwe,” kusho uMndebele.Impi yezomthetho kaButhelezi noNksz Simelane ithathe elinye igxathu kuleli sonto njengoba uButhelezi efake amaphepha eNkantolo eNkulu eMgungundlovu, efuna ukuba inkantolo iphoqe uNksz Simelane ukuba amhlawule.UButhelezi, obuye abe uNdunankulu kaZulu ukhala ngokuthi izinsolo zikaNksz Simelane, oyiphini likasihlalo we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal zimehlisa isithunzi.Emaphepheni asenkantolo, uButhelezi uthe izinsolo zikaNksz Simelane zingalimaza amathuba akhe okuthi abe yilungu lesiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal.UButhelezi uvela ohlwini lwabaholi be-IFP abazoyimela esiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal.UNksz Simelane waziqhatha noButhelezi ngokuthi amsole ngokufuna ukulala nabafazi babantu, lokhu ukusho emcimbini we-ANC owawuseVryheid.UNksz Simelane wakhalaza ngezinduna zamabutho ezagxeka isenzo sikasihlalo we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Siboniso Duma sokuphuca uButhelezi umbhobho ngesikhathi kunomcimbi wokukhumbula iSilo uDinuzulu kaCetshwayo.Enkulumweni kaNksz Simelane eyingxenye yamaphepha asenkantolo afakwe uButhelezi, ukhala ngokuthi izinduna zamabutho, azikaze ziphawule ngezinsolo zokuthi uButhelezi uhlukumeza abesifazane ngokocansi.“Kusiphatha kabi singabantu besifazane ukuthi izinduna ziyakwazi ukukhala ngokuthi uThulasizwe uphucwe umbhobho, kodwa azisho lutho uma efuna amakhosikazi abantu embhedeni. “Zithuli zithini izinduna ngehlazo elifana naleli? Imeya ethi ngaphambi kokuthi ngikukhokhele umholo wakho owusebenzele, woza uzolala kwami kuqala,” kusho okaSimelane.UNksz Simelane ophinde abe uMphathiswa wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, wayebekelwe umnqamulajuqu wangesonto eledlule ukuhoxisa izinsolo azenza ngoButhelezi.UButhelezi uziphikile izinsolo ezenziwa uNksz Simelane wathi zingcolisa igama lakhe.“Izinsolo zingiveza njengomuntu osebenzisa budlabha isikhundla sami njengemeya, futhi zingiveza njengomuntu ongafanelwe ukuphatha isikhundla.“Lezinsolo zibeka engcupheni amathuba okuthi ngiqokwe njengelungu lesiShayamthetho,” kusho uButhelezi. UNksz Simelane unikezwe izinsuku eziyishumi ukuba afake amaphepha aphikisa isicelo sikaButhelezi.Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kukaNksz Simelane ayizange iphumelele njengoba ucingo lwakhe belungangeni futhi akazange awuphendule umbuzo awuthunyelwe.

OVELA ohlwini lwamalungu azomela i-DA ePhalamende, uMnuz Maliyakhe Shelembe, uthe akubaqwashisi ukudlondlobala koMkhonto weSizwe (MK)  KwaZulu-Natal.UShelembe uthe akukho simanga kwiMK ekhankaselwa owayengumengameli, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, wathi abantu abaningi abalandela iMK bayilandela ngoba nakhu iholwa uZuma abamthandela ukuthi udansa kahle.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi exoxa neSolezwe  emva komcimbi wokumenyezelwa kwabaholi baKwaZulu-Natal abazomela iDA esiShayamthetho sesifundazwe nasePhalamende.UShelembe, oke waba yimeya kaMasipala waseMtshezi, uvela ohlwini lwabaholi abaya ePhalamende.Umbango wokuhola iKwaZulu-Natal mkhulu, uShelembe ungomunye wabaholi abanesipiliyoni sokukhankasa KwaZulu-Natal njengoba eke waba imeya amahlandla amabili ngesikhathi eseyilungu le-IFP, waphinde waba iphini lemeya kuMasipala wesiFunda uThukela ngesikhathi eseyilungu leNFP. UShelembe uthe umkhankaso wabo awufani nowamanye amaqembu, wathi awuncikile esiqwini somuntu oyedwa.“Uma ukhuluma naboMkhonto, bakutshela ngoMsholozi, bakhuluma ngoZuma, abanye baze baphimisele, bathi simthanda uma esedansa. Lokho kukutshela ukuthi abanye abantu ababheki ukuthi ikusasa lezwe limi kanjani. Babheka ukuthi umuntu ubhekene nayiphi inkinga ngaleso sikhathi, bese bemeseka kuleyo nkinga. Umkhankaso weDA ugxile kakhulu ezintweni iqembu elithembisa ukuthi lizozenza. Umehluko mukhulu kakhulu phakathi kweDA namaqembu akhonza umuntu oyedwa.”Uhlu lwabe-DA abaya esiShayamthetho luholwa ogaqele isikhundla sikandunankulu wesifundazwe, uMnuz Chris Pappas, olandelwa umholi weDA esifundazweni, uMnuz Francios Rodgers.Amagama abaholi abasha aqaphelekayo elikaMnuz Sbongiseni Vilakazi, ovela endaweni yesithupha noMnuz Mlondi Mdluli, ongowesi-12 ohlwini.URodgers uthe zonke izinhlanga zimelelekile ohlwini lweDA.“Ngike ngalubona uhlu lwe-ANC, luyamangaza. Akukho ukumeleleka kwazo zonke izinhlanga.”URodgers uthe balungiselela ukuphatha iKwaZulu-Natal emva kokhetho lwangoMeyi.“Kuza izinguquko KwaZulu-Natal. Ingakho siqale manje ukulungiselela izinguquko ezizayo. Kusukela manje, akulalwa, sikhankasela ukhetho.”USihlalo weDA KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Dean Macpherson, uthe kubathathe isikhathi eside ukukhetha amagama abaholi abazomela iqembu esiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal.“Sathola izicelo ezingaphezu kuka-100. Uhlelo lokuhlunga beluhlukene izigaba ezing-11. Abakhethiwe babhale izivivinyo, benza nenhlolokhono.”UMacpherson uthe okujabulisayo ukuthi akekho okhalaza ngohlelo olulandeliwe.“Akekho umuntu osiyisa enkantolo, uma ubheka kukhona abayisa i-ANC enkantolo. Lokhu kukutshela ukuthi bonke abantu bayayamukela imiphumela yohlelo esilulandelile.”

OMELE i-EFF embangweni wesikhundla sikandunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mongezi Twala, ukhale ngokushaywa indiva kwabantu abahlala emijondolo nasemapulazini esifundazweni, wathi basathwele kanzima njengoba bengahleli kahle. Uthe abalimi basabahlukumeza kakhulu abantu abahlala emapulazini ezindaweni ezehlukene esifundazweni.“Ezindaweni ezifana nakoFilidi, Madlangeni nezinye, basahlukunyezwa kakhulu abantu abahlala emapulazini. Njenge-EFF esifundazweni nakuleli, uma sithatha amandla sizokwazi ukulwa nalesi sihlava ngoba amaBhunu abacindezele,” kusho uTwala. Uveze ukuthi kusanabagilwa bezikhukhula ezahlasela esifundazweni, namanje abasahlala emaflethini.“Kumele kubuyiswe isithunzi somuntu omnyama, abantu bahlale ezindlini ezibafanele. Uhulumeni akabasizi ngalutho, impilo yabo ayithuthuki.” Ubalule ukuthi iminyango kahulumeni okungowezeMfundo nowezeMpilo, iwe bhu esifundazweni, ayisebenzi.“Abantu abalutholi usizo ezikhungweni zezempilo, ekubeni kunabahlengikazi abahleli emakhaya abangasebenzi. Esibhedlela eMadadeni imibhede ayisekho, ziningi nezinye izikhungo ezingasebenzi kwezinye izindawo. Imitholampilo ayivulwe ubusuku nemini ngoba abantu badinga usizo, ngaso sonke isikhathi.” Kwezemfundo, uthe othishanhloko kudingeka basebenzise imali yabo ukuze kuqhubeke ukufunda nokufundisa.UTwala uphefumule kanje ngesikhathi enengxoxo ekhethekile neSolezwe, lapho ebekhuluma khona ngomkhankaso wokuhola isifundazwe.Okhethweni lwango-2019, leli qembu lathola amavoti acela ku-350 000 esifundazweni, lathola izihlalo eziyisishiyagalombili esiShayamthetho eMgungundlovu.Lilele endaweni yesine ngobukhulu kulesi sifundazwe kanti kulolu khetho lihlose ukuthola amavoti ayisigidi.“Sihlose ukuthola isigidi samavoti, siphathe uhulumeni ngokuphelele. Siphume imikhankaso senza nezinhlelo zokudla umhlanganiso kulolu khetho.” Ubalule ukuthi bayiqembu labantu abasha ngakho bagxile kubona ngethemba lokuthi babavotele. “Siphuma singena ezindaweni ezihlala izitshudeni namafulethi ukuze sithole amavoti. Akulalwa, sisebenza ubusuku nemini ngoba sifuna ukuwina ngamalengiso lolu khetho. Sike sahlala sacubungula ukuthi kungani sesekwe abantu abasha ezikhungweni zemfundo siwine imikhandlu kulezi zikhungo kodwa bangavoti ngobuningi babo. Sithole ukuthi abanye abanendaba nokuvota. Sibeke phambili uhlaka lwabantu abasha okuyilo olusebenza ngamandla nangokuzikhandla ukuze siwine ukhetho olwaziwa ngeMlungisi Madonsela Battalion. UMadonsela wayeyisitshudeni eDUT, esashona kubhikishwa kule nyuvesi. Sinamashoshozela angu-1 000 okungenani isikhungo ngasinye ukuze kugqugquzelwe intsha ukuthi ivote.” Uthe ukuba ngusihlalo weqembu elesekwa yintsha njenge-EFF, akuyona into elula ngoba kudingeka bagxishe imfundiso kubantu abangakaze bavote, abanye basuke bengakaze babe ngisho ngamalungu amanye amaqembu ezombusazwe.UTwala (38) uphinde waxwayisa amalungu abo ukuthi angacekeli phansi impahla ezikhungweni zemfundo noma emiphakathini uma kukhona angeneme ngakho.“Siyiqembu elilandela imithetho yezwe, ngakho asihambisani nokucekelwa kwempahla ozobuye uyidinge ngomuso. Kodwa ke nasezikhungweni eziningi zemfundo ephakeme, kuyaqapheleka ukuthi abaphathi abayifuni imikhandlu yezitshudeni ye-EFF ngoba uthola ukuthi uma kutelekwa, kuboshwa amalungu ethu. Uma uya ezinkantolo uthola kuwuphiko lwethu oluboshiwe, ekubeni nezinye izinhlangano beziteleka. Lokhu kukushiya nemibuzo eminingi ngoba kukhona namalungu ethu anikwe izincwadi zokuthi angasondeli ezikhungweni.” Mayelana nokufika kweqembu elisha Umkhonto weSizwe esifundazweni elizongenela ukhetho okokuqala eliholwa ngowayengumengameli we-ANC nezwe uJacob Zuma, uthe okwamanje alikho ilungu noma umholi we-EFF osejoyine iMK. “Abantu engicabanga ukuthi abasabuthi quthu ubuthongo uKhongolose njengoba kunamakhansela eMzumbe ajoyina iMK.
