Akusithusi ukubakhona kweMK, ngicabanga ukuthi izoshaya kakhulu i-ANC, thina sesekwa kakhulu yintsha, engadidiseki kalula.”UTwala wasoSizweni eNewcastle, akalona ivukana kwezepolitiki njengoba eyingxenye yabantu abasungula i-EFF esifundazweni.Uthe balikhulisa lasabalala kusona sonke isifundazwe njengoba laqala ezifundeni ezine kuphela kodwa manje sebemeleleke kuyona yonke iKZN.“Ngiqale ukusebenza eduzane nomphakathi ezinhlakeni ezehlukene okubalwa kwimiphilandawonye nako-Love Life. Umndeni wami wawuvele ukhona emzabalazweni, nomkhulu wayeyingxenye yekhomishini yamaqiniso nokubuyisana.”

UNOBHALA Kikelele we-EFF, uMnuz Marshall Dlamini, akafuni nokuyizwa eyemiphumela yocwaningo ekhombisa ukuthi ukuvela kweMK kuzobalahlekisela ngamavoti KwaZulu-Natal.UDlamini uthe i-EFF isazoqhubeka nokwenza kahle KwaZulu-Natal, wathi bazogila izimanga okhethweni lwangesonto elizayo.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi benemashi yokukhombisa amandla abo, izolo.Imashi ebiseThekwini, iqale eBotha Park, yayophelela olwandle.Ucwaningo lwe-Ipsos lukhombisa ukuthi kunamalungu e-EFF asefudukele kwiMK, eholwa owayengumengameli, uJacob Zuma.Imiphumela yocwaningo ize yadala ukuthi abaholi be-EFF bajube uDlamini ukuba azoqinisa umkhankaso waKwaZulu-Natal.UDlamini uthe i-EFF angeke iphazanyiswe ukuqhamuka kweMK.“Baningi ababhalile ukuthi sekuphelile nge-EFF. Labo abathi i-EFF ayizukwenza kahle lapha KwaZulu-Natal bazozibonela okhethweni ukuthi i-EFF iyaphila lapha KwaZulu-Natal.”UDlamini uthe okufakazela ukuthi angeke baphazanyiswe yiMK ukuthi bakwazile ukukhankasa eNkandla, lapho kuqhamuka khona uZuma.UDlamini uthe ngesikhathi somkhankaso baphinde bakhombisa amandla abo ngokuthi bakhankase ezizindeni ze-ANC ne-IFP.UDlamini uthe bakwazile ukuyisa umkhankaso wabo ezindaweni okuqhamuka kuzo abaholi abaqavile be-ANC.Ubale umkhankaso wabo owawuseKokstad, lapho kuqhamuka khona uNobhala we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Bheki Mtolo.“Ngisho naye uMtolo akakwazanga ukusivimba, wabaleka wayocasha ngesikhathi sesifikile.”UDlamini uthe bakwazi ukukhankasa esifundeni Ugu, lapho kuqhamuka khona uSihlalo we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Siboniso Duma.UDlamini uthe baphinde bakwazi ukuyokhankasa ezizindeni ze-IFP, wabalula uLundi.“UHlabisa (uMengameli we-IFP, uMnuz Velenkosini) wayengeke asivimbe, asivimbeki. Ukukhankasa kwethu kuzo zonke izindawo kukhombisa ukuthi yonke le ndawo kwelikaMthaniya, wumhlaba we-EFF.”UDlamini uthe alikho iqembu abalisabayo lapha KwaZulu-Natal.“Abeze, sizobashaya behlangene. Labo abathi bafuna ukuba ondunankulu, bazogcina ngokuba ondunankulu emizini yabo. Amaphupho nje lawa esizowaqeda ngesonto elizayo. Angeke babe ondunankulu sisekhona.”UDlamini uthe i-ANC izophuma emandleni, wanxusa abaseNanda ukuba baye elibeni likamengameli wokuqala we-ANC, uJohn Dube, bayombikela ukuthi i-ANC iyaphuma emandleni ngesonto elizayo.

UNOBHALA-Jikelele we-EFF uMnuz Marshall Dlamini ulahlwe yicala lokushaya iphoyisa ngempama emcimbini wenkulumo kamengameli ebhekiswe ezweni ngo-2019. Ivideo uDlamini enza lokhu yasabalala ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, kubatshazwa.UDlamini ulahlwe yicala eNkantolo yesiFunda eCape Town lapho abevele khona.Wabonakala kwi-video esakaza ngempama uWarrant Officer Johan Carstens ebusweni kwafahlaka izibuko zakhe walimala.UCarstens wavula icala emuva kwesigameko njengoba selihambe laze lamgojela uDlamini emuva kweminyaka cishe emihlanu isigameko senzeka.UDlamini uthi wayelunywe indlebe ngokuthi kukhona ababefuna ukusoconga umholi wakhe uMnuz Julius Malema okwaphoqa ukuthi amvikele.Uthi wayezitshela ukuthi uCarstens uyingxenye yozungu lokuqeda ngoMalema.IMantshi uNashwa Banwari ekhipha isinqumo uthe ukuzithethelela kukaDlamini akwemukeleki, umlahle ngecala lokushaya ngenhloso yokulimaza.UDlamini emuva kwaleso sigameko wacashunwa kwabezindaba ethi ubeqondisa umuntu omhlophe obegcwaneka. Kulindeleke ukuthi uDlamini abuyele enkantolo ngoMeyi 31 lapho okuzophuma khona isigwebo sakhe ngalolu daba.Ngaphandle kwaleli cala, abaholi be-EFF uMalema noDkt Mbuyiseni Ndlozi banamanye amacala abawahambayo ezinkantolo okusalindelwe izinqumo zawo.

ISIKHULU se-IEC KwaZulu- Natal, uNkk Nombifuthi Masinga, sithi akufanele lidale ukudideka iphepha lesithathu lokuvota.Izwe limatasa lilungiselela ukhetho lukazwelonke oluzoqala namuhla ngalabo ababhalisele ukuvota ngokukhethekile. Uhlelo lwabavota ngokukhethekile luzoqhubeka nakusasa.NgoLwesithathu kuyobe sekuwusuku lokuvota lwawonke umuntu, kanti izikhungo zizovulwa ngo-7 ekuseni zivalwe ngo-9 ebusuku.I-IEC isivele isethulile isikhungo semiphumela yokhetho KwaZu-Natal okuzoba yi-ICC, eThekwini.Abe-IEC bathe konke kumi ngomumo, balindele ukhetho olungenazihibe.UNkk Masinga uxoxe neSolezwe ecacisa ukuthi umuntu uma evota angaxwayi uma enikwa amaphepha amathathu. Phambilini, okhethweni lukazwelonke umuntu ubethola amaphepha amabili avotele iPhalamende likazwelonke bese evotela isifundazwe.Kuzobe kuqala ukuthi umuntu anikwe amaphepha amathathu okulindeleke ukuthi avote kuwowonke.UNkk Masinga uthe ngeke liphazamise ngalutho iphepha lesithathu, indaba yalo icace bha.''INkantolo yoMthethosisekelo yanquma ukuthi kufakwe nabangenela ukhetho ngokuzimela. Iphepha lesithathu lenzelwe ukufaka labo abangenele ngokuzimela. Umuntu uma evota ukhetha kuwona womathathu amaphepha,“ usho kanjena.Amaphepha womathathu ahlukaniseka kalula ngokwemibala yawo ecacile. Iphepha lokuqala eliluhlaza njengesibhakabhaka elokuvotela uzwelonke futhi linamaqembu kuphela.Elesibili elinombala osawolintshi libizwa ngokuthi elesifunda nelizobe lixube amaqembu nabangenele ukhetho ngokuzimela.Elesithathu li-pink lona elesifundazwe lizobe lixube amaqembu nabangele ukhetho ngokuzimela.UNkk Masinga uthe balwenzile uhlelo lokusabalalisa ulwazi ngephepha lesithathu nasemisakazweni bayachaza kakhulu ngalo.Abe-IEC bathe abantu uma befika ezikhungweni bazolekelelwa abasebenzi abaqeqeshiwe abanesineke abazobachazela konke.Olunye udaba aluvezile wukweluswa kwamaphepha okuvota uma abantu sebevotile. Uthe kunohlelo lwezobuchwepheshe abalusebenzisa ukuwaqapha amaphepha ukuthi asekuphi ngesikhathi ethuthwa.Kulindeke ukuthi uma sekuqedwe konke bese i-IEC imemezela imiphumela ngokusemthethweni ngoJuni 2.

OWAYEYIMEYA yaseMsinga, uMnuz Mlethi Ndlovu owamiswa esikhundleni sokuba yimeya emva kokuyamaniswa wuzakwabo nokubulala elinye ikhansela, uselufake kubameli olokudicilelwa phansi kwesikhundla sakhe nguzakwabo oyikhansela laseMsinga.Ummeli kaNdlovu, uKunene weKunene Attorneys eMgungundlovu, uthe sebefake enkantolo incwadi yamademeshe ukugeza igama likaNdlovu ngokuhlanjalazwa esidlangaleni kuthiwe ubulele.“Ngokudicilelwa phansi kwesithunzi sikaNdlovu, sifuna owamhlambalaza ageze igama lakhe ngo-R6.5 million. Sesiyifakile incwadi enkantolo efuna amademeshe ngokuhlanjalazwa kwakhe esidlangaleni.“Sesilinde ukuzwa kuSheriff wasenkantolo ukuthi usemthumelele yini uMnuz Lungisani Ntuli le ncwadi.“Unikwe izinsuku ezingu-30 emva kokuyithola ukuthi akhokhe le mali. Uma engazimisele kuzophoqa ukuthi siye enkantolo siyoluqedela khona udaba,” kusho ummeli uKunene.UNdlovu ubopha uNtuli ngezinsolo ezenziwa yilo zakwabo zokuthi uyena owabulala ikhansela uMnuz Siyanda Magubane owayehamba noNtuli ngelanga lesigameko sokudutshulwa kwakhe.UNtuli wakhuluma enkonzweni yomngcwabo kaMagubane ngo-2022 lapho atshela khona izinkumbi zabantu ukuthi wazibonela ngawakhe uNdlovu eqeda ukubadubula.Lolu daba lwaba ngundabamlonyeni kwaze kwaphoqeleka ukuthi i-IFP imise uNdlovu esikhundleni sokuba yimeya kuze kube kuphothulwa uphenyo.Emva kwalesi sigameko kwaphinde kwaboshwa uNdlovu etholwa nezibhamu, okwaba yinto eyayamaniswa nesigameko sokushona kukaMagubane.Echaza uNdlovu ngalesi sigameko uthe yena akakaze aboshelwe ukubulala uMagubane ngoba umsulwa kulokho.“Amaphoyisa angiphenya akukho okwangihlanganisa nalesi sigameko. Engangiboshelwe kona ukutholakala nezibhamu okwabe sekwenziwa uphenyo ukuthi kungani zikumina.“Nakhona kugcine kutholakele ukuthi kwakuyizibhamu zomsebenzi, akukho okwakushayisa amakhala ngazo. Kumanje lelo cala seliphelile futhi ngitholakale ngimsulwa kulona,”’ kusho uNdlovu.Ngokuboshwa kukaNtuli uthe akukho okuningi azokuphawula ngoba udaba lukubameli.Uveze ukuthi noma kunjalo akanankinga noNtuli futhi bayabingelelana ngisho behlangana kumasipala njengoba besaqhubeka nokusebenza njengamakhansela e-IFP.Uthe naye usaqhuba umsebenzi wakhe njengekhansela leWard yakhe futhi usenguyena uSihlalo we-IFP wesiFunda uMzinyathi. UMagubane owadutshulwa naye wayeyikhansela le-IFP eMsinga.

UNUNUSELWA ngesikhundla sikandunkulu wesifundazwe uSihlalo we-IFP KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Thami Ntuli, okuthiwa ucingo lwakhe lukhala umlibe eshelwa ngamaqembu.UNtuli obefakwe kwesombango kandunankulu kuthiwa ufunwa yiMK, yi-ANC ne-DA abafuna ukungena naye embusweni wesifundazwe. Kumatasa njengamanje kuyaxoxiswana ukuze kubunjwe uhulumeni wesifundazwe.IMK ihambe phambili ngezihlalo ezingu-37 esifundazweni. IMK ilandelwa yi-IFP ngezihlalo ezingu-15 bese kuba yi-ANC enezihlalo ezingu-14. Endaweni yesine kuhleli i-DA ngezihlalo ezingu-11.I-EFF inezihlalo ezimbili bese kuvala i-NFP ngesihlalo esisodwa kodwa esingenza umehluko omkhulu. Isolezwe lithole ngezingede zalo ukuthi amaqembu ashela uNtuli kwesikandunankulu.Ebuzwa uNtuli ngalokhu uthe kuyiqiniso ukuthi amaqembu ayamthinta kodwa akukho azokwenzeka ngoba izingxoxo ziphethwe yiqembu kuzwelonke.“Ucingo lukhala manje namanje kube kungena olunye bayangithinta kodwa ngibedlulisela kubaholi kuzwelonke lapho okuphethwe khona izingxoxo. Mina ngiqhubeka nomsebenzi lapha eKing Cetshwayo,’’ kusho uNtuli.UNtuli wale waphetha ukudalula amagama amaqembu amthintile wathi ngeke akwazi okwamanje. Uthe akazi ukuthi izingxoxo zizophetha kanjani kodwa iqembu lizomemezela uma kukhona izivumelwano.Okokuqala okusabalele wukuthi i-ANC ingase ingene iphathe ne-DA ne-IFP bese befaka neNFP. Uma wonke la maqembu ehlangene enza izihlalo ezingu-41 nokungenza kube lula ukuthatha umbuso wesifundazwe.Izihlalo eSishayamthetho zingu-80, okusho ukuthi ophethe izintambo kufanele abe nezihlalo ezingu-41 kuya phezulu. Uma ehlangana amaqembu abalwe ngenhla kuyobe kusho ukuthi iMK ne-EFF bazoba amaqembu aphikisayo.Uma i-IFP ikhetha ukungena neMK kuyobe kusho ukuthi izihlalo zabo uma zihlangene zingu-52 nokuyokwenza badlule ngehubo beyothatha izintambo zombuso kuhulumeni wesifundazwe.Lokhu kuyobe kusho ukuthi i-ANC, DA, EFF neNFP bazoba amaqembu aphikisayo esifundazweni. I-ANC ebiphethe isifundazwe ilahlelwe yizihlalo ezingu-30 eyayizithole okhethweni lwango-2019, lapho yayithola u54%.

USIHLALO weDA KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Dean Macpherson, ujabulela ukuthi iMK ayizange ithole izihlalo ezanele ukuthi ibuse ngokuzimela KwaZulu-Natal.UMacpherson uthe bazokwenza ngakho konke okusemandleni abo ukuthi iMK ayisiphathi isifundazwe.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma nabezindaba esikhungweni sokubala amavoti esiseThekwini.IMK iyona ezihola phambili KwaZulu-Natal ngamavoti angaphezu kuka-44%, iDA yona ilele isine.UMacpherson uthe bamelene nokuthi kuphathe iMK KwaZulu-Natal."Emkhankasweni wethu besithi 'takula iKZN'. Besisuke sisho ukuthi iKZN ayitakulwe ezintweni ezifana neMK. Sijabule ukuthi abakwazanga ukuthola isibalo esingaphezu kuka-50%."UMacpherson uthe amaqembu aphikisayo kufanele abambisane ukuze iMK ingezukuphatha.UMacpherson uthe angeke bayemukele imiphumela yokhetho  uma izikhalazo zayo zingaxazululwa ngokushesha.UMacpherson, uthe kunezikhalazo ezingu-34 abazifakile ezingakaxazululwa.Imiphumela yokhetho izomenyezelwa kusasa, ntambama.Izolo, iDA ibhalele inhlangano eyengamele, i-Independent Electoral Commission (IEC), beyitshela ukuthi bafuna izikhalazo zabo zixazululwe ngaphambi kokuthi kumenyezelwe imiphumela.I-DA iphinde yafaka isikhalazo ngokwesigaba somthetho u-55, esiphoqa ukuthi kuqokwe ukhomishana ozophenya izikhalazo zabo.UMacpherson uthe izikhalazo zabo zingenza umehluko omkhulu uma zingaxazululwa."Kunezindawo lapho othola khona ukuthi kunaphepha okuvota esifundazweni angu-2 000, bese kuthi akazwelonke abe u-4 000. Kunzima ukukholwa ukuthi into enje yenzeke kanjani."Okubi ukuthi asizitholi izimpendulo eziqondile uma sibuza imibuzo. Uma uhlanganisa lezibalo uyabona ukuthi kungashintsha izinto eziningi. Kungashintsha ukwabiwa kwezihlalo esiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal."

UNGQONGQOSHE weMfundo eyisiSekelo, uNksz Siviwe Gwarube, uchitha eyokuzodlala ipolitiki emnyangweni nokuzolwa nenyunyana yothisha iSadtu.UNksz Gwarube uzibophezele ekutheni uzohlangana nezinhlaka ezehlukene ngoba zibaluleke kakhulu noma kungathiwa kuhlukenwe ngemibono. Izinto azibeke eqhulwini lwazozenza, ukuqeda ngezindlu zangasese zomgodi ezikoleni, ukuphucula izinga lokufunda kubafundi abangakuqondi abakufundayo ukuphucula ingqalasizinda nokulwa nesihlava sokuhlukunyezwa kwabafundi.“Angizile ukuzolwa izimpi zepolitiki noma ukuzofaka imigomo ye-DA kwezemfundo. Ngizosebenzisana nezinhlaka ezehlukene kwemfundo ngoba ngeke ngiwenze ngingedwa lo msebenzi.” Ukusho lokhu ekhuluma nesiteshi sethelevishini iNewzroom Afrika.Usho kanje iSadtu yaphumela obala yachitha ukuqokwa kwakhe ikhala ngokuthi iqembu lakhe aliyifuni le nyunyana ngoba libona isitha nokuthi konke okungalungile kwezemfundo, kwenziwa yile nyunyana.Le nyunyana isole ne-DA ngokuchitha umthetho wezikole obuchitshiyelwa olinde ukusayinwa nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa iBela Bill, onika amandla izinhloko zeminyango yezemfundo ezifundazweni ukuthi zinqume uma izikole sezigcwele kanjalo namanye amandla.UNksz Gwarube (34) uthe kummangazile ukuthi kube nomuzwa onje kule nyunyana esanda kuqokwa.“Odabeni oluthinta iBela Bill, ngizoxoxa noMengameli ngezinye izigatshana engingeneme ngazo. UMengameli unawo amandla okuwuphindisela ePhalamende lo mthetho, ukuze ulungiswe ngaphambi kokuba awusayine. Angicabangi ukuthi wonke lo mthetho kumele uchithwe kodwa izigatshana ezimbalwa ezidinga ukulungiswa,” kusho uNksz Gwarube.Uthe okwakhe yena ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abafundi abangu-14 million, ababhekele bayafunda.“Okwami nje ukuqinisekisa ukuthi angibenzeli phansi abafundi. Okunye nokunye ngizokubona uma kuhamba isikhathi. Ngizoyiveza eminye imibono yami, ngeke ngidlale ngizosebenza.” Uthe uzimisele nokuvakashela ezifundazweni ayohlangana nabaphathiswa beminyango, namathimba abo."Yinto engiyijahe kabi ukuhambela zonke izifundazwe ngihlangane nezikhulu zomnyango ngizwe ngezinto ezimbi, nezinhle ezidinga ukulungiswa. Ngizothola nalapho kuhamba kahle khona, ukuze siqinise kakhulu khona.“ Uthe uzoxhumana nanongoti kwezemfundo ukuze bamluleke ngezinye zezinto ezidinga ukulungiswa.Uncome obenguNgqongqoshe walo mnyango uNkk Angie Motshekga, wathi usenamava kulo mkhakha ahlale kuwo iminyaka engu-15. Uveze nokuthi uzosebenzisana nozakwabo osemnyangweni wezemiSebenzi yoMphakathi neNgqalasizinda uMnuz Dean MacPherson, okwi-DA mayelana nezithinta ingqalasinda ezikoleni.

UMHOLI weMK oyikhansela kuMasipala waseThekwini, uMnuz Visvin Reddy uthweswe icala lokuphehla udlame emva kwenkulumo yakhe esabisa ngokuthi kuzokuba nodungunyane uma kukhishwa iMK ohlwini lwamaqembu angenele ukhetho.UReddy uvele eNkantolo yeMantshi eChatsworth ngoLwesithathu lapho ebekwe khona icala ngaphansi komthetho olawula ukuhlangana kwabantu, iRiotous Assemblies Act.Okhulumela iNational Prosecuting Authority KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Natasha Ramkisson-Kara uthe icala likaReddy lihlehliselwe uJune 14 kanti selizoqulwa eNkantolo yesifunda eThekwini.” UReddy uyilungu eliqavile leMK, uvela ohlwini lwamalungu alenhlangano aya ePhalamende emva kokhetho oluzayo. Izolo ubonakale engathukile ngaphandle kwenkantolo.Utshele amalungu eMK abezomeseka ngaphandle kwenkantolo ukuthi lelizwe alikayitholi inkululeko, wathi iyotholakala mhla iMK yanqoba ukhetho.“I-ANC kaRamaphosa (Mengameli, uCyril) ihlezi ifuna sigubhe usuku lwenkululeko ngo-Ephreli 27.“U-Ephreli 27 akusilo usuku lwenkululeko. Usuku lwenkululeko kuzokuba uMeyi 29, lapho iMK iyonqoba ukhetho ngamalengiso,” kusho uReddy.UReddy wazifaka otakwini ngokusongela izinkantolo nenhlangano eyengamele ukhetho, i-Independent Electoral Commission (IEC).UReddy ekhuluma emcimbini weMK, wathi kuzokuba nodlame uma izinkantolo zithatha izinqumo ezinqinda amandla leli qembu elikhankaselwa owayenguMengameli uJacob Zuma.Inkulumo yakhe wayenza ngenyanga eyedlule ngaphambi kokuthi kulalelwe amacala amabili lapho i-ANC imangalele kuwo iMK.Icala lokuqala lalalelwa eNkantolo yezoKhetho, lapho i-ANC yayifuna ukuthi iMK ikhishwe ohlwini lwamaqembu azongenela ukhetho.Isicelo se-ANC sachithwa. Icala lesibili lalilalelwe eNkantolo eNkulu eThekwini, lapho i-ANC yayisola iMK ngokuntshontsha igama nophawu lombutho wezempi owahlakazwa, uMkhonto weSizwe.Kwi-video esabalale ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, uReddy uzwakala ethi kuzosuka izibhelu uma kukhishwa iMK ohlwini lwamaqembu angenele ukhetho.“Siyazi ukuthi izinkantolo zichemile. Uma kuvinjwa iMK, kuzosuka udungunyane kuleli zwe. Kuzokuba nemibhikisho engakaze ibonwe. “Kwalona ukhetho lolo ngeke lube khona. Akekho umuntu waseNingizimu Afrika ozovota iMK ingekho okhethweni,” kusho uReddy,Uphinde wasabisa ngodlame uma kukhishwa igama likaZuma ohliwni lwabangenele ukhetho.UZuma uvele usekhishiwe ohlwini, kepha usiphonsela inselelo lesinqumo.

UMENGAMELI weNFP, uMnuz Ivan Barnes, ufuna kubasebenzele ukuba ababeki benkosi KwaZulu-Natal.UBarnes ufuna isihlalo abasithole esiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal sibasize bakhulise iqembu.Yize iNFP ithole isihlalo esisodwa KwaZulu-Natal, ibonwa njengababeki benkosi njengoba lingekho iqembu elinqobe ukhetho ngamalengiso.INFP imataniswa nesivumelwano sokusebenzisana okuthiwa sixoxwa i-IFP, ANC, neDA, abanezihlalo ezingu-40.Ukuze la maqembu aphathe adinga isihlalo esisodwa.Uma isivumelwano siphumelela, kuthiwa iNFP izonikezwa isikhundla kwikhabhinethi lesifundazwe.UBarnes uthe isivumelwano abazongena kuso ufuna sibasize ukuba bakhe kabusha leli qembu elikhombisa ukwehlelwa ukwesekwa.“Njengeqembu sizobheka izindlela esingasebenzisa kahle ngazo isihlalo esisitholile. Kubalulekile ukuthi isihlalo sisisebenzele ukuze sibuye ngamandla okhethweni lohulumeni basekhaya lwango-2026.”UBarnes ukuqinisekisile ukuthi kukhona amaqembu asebathintile, efuna ukuthi basebenzisane.“Ngingakuqinisekisa ukuthi i-ANC ne-IFP sebesithintile, sesilinde ukuba sihlangane nabo. Engingakusho ke ukuthi iDA ayikakhulumi nathi. Esikulindile ukuthi zonke izinhlangano ezifuna ukuphatha zihlangane, zikhulume ngezwi elilodwa. Sifuna ukuba kube nesivumelwano esizosiza abantu.”Kucishe kwavalwa ngehlahla kwiNFP kulolu khetho njengoba ingatholanga lutho ePhalamende, ibikade inezihlalo ezimbili.Naso isihlalo abasithole KwaZulu-Natal basithole ngengcacamezela njengoba bethole amavoti angu-16 991.Isihlalo esiShayamthetho besingamavoti angaphezu kuka-40 000, iNFP ibhekelelwe njengeqembu elincane elithole amavoti angconywana kunamanye.UBarnes ukhale kakhulu ngezinkinga zangaphakathi, wathi izona ezenze ukuthi bangenzi kahle okhethweni.“Imiphumela yokhetho ngeke siyihlukanise nezinto ebezenzeka ngaphakathi kwiNFP. Yebo abantu abathembekile kwiNFP bavotile kodwa kunamalungu eNFP anganelisekile angazange avote. Izinkinga zangaphakathi kwiNFP zenze ukuthi abantu abaningi bagcine bengasayithembi iNFP.”UBarnes uthe izinkinga eziningi sebezilungisile, wathi sekusele kancane bakhulume ngezwi elilodwa.“Lokhu kusho ukuthi sizoya okhethweni olulandelayo singasabhekene nezinkinga. Lokho kusinika amathuba okuthi senze kahle.”Izinkinga zeNFP zindala, zaqala ngesikhathi kunengqungquthela yokukhetha ubuholi eyayingo-2019.Ubuholi obakhethwa kule ngqungquthela bahlakazwa isinqumo senkantolo.Ngonyaka odlule i-NFP yaba nengqungquthela yokukhetha ubuholi, nokho kukhona abaphikisana nobuholi obakhethwa.

Amaphoyisa abophe owesifazane ngezinsolo zokuthi ugwaze wabulala isoka lakhe maqede wafonela unina walo eLimpopo ngoLwesihlanu.Lesi sigameko okufe kuso uMnuz Tumelu Makwala (34) kuthiwa senzeke eBolobedu ngabo-8 ebusuku.Ngokombiko wamaphoyisa, umsolwa ushayele unina wesoka emtshela ukuthi ukujikijelana ngamazwi phakathi kwakhe nendodana yakhe kushube kwaphetha ngokuthi ayigwaze ngommese.Kuthiwa ngesikhathi unina efika lapho bekuhlala khona umgilwa, umfice opha egunjini lakhe lolala wabe eseshayela abezimo eziphuthumayo. Bafike bathi usethule.Kuvulwe icala lokubulala umsolwa wakhalelwa ngamasongo kaSigonyela. Kulindeleke ukuthi avele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseKgapane maduze ebhekene necala lokubulala.Umkhuzi wamaphoyisa eLimpopo, uLieutenant General Thembi Hadebe usigxekile lesi sigameko. Unxuse izithandani ezinezinkinga ukuthi zifune usizo kunokusebenzisa udlame.Kwesinye isigameko, kusolwa isoka abesehlukene nalo esigamekweni sokugwazwa kubulawe owesifazane (28) esifundeni iWaterberg eLimpopo ezintatha ngoMgqibelo.Kuthiwa lona wesifazane ubebuya endaweni yokucima ukoma ngo-1 ekuseni ngesikhathi ehlaselwa ngowayeyisoka lakhe omgwaze amanxeba amaningi ngaphambi kokuphela emoyeni. Owesifazane ufele emtholampilo oseduze abephuthunyiswe kuwo.

OBEGCOTSHELWA kwesokuba nguMengameli omusha weZulu Congregational Church (ZCC), uMfu Sihle Zuma ufuna ukuthi ibandla lilwe nenkinga yezidakamizwa ekhungethe intsha.Umsebenzi wokugcotshwa kukaMfu Zuma bewenganyelwe nguMfu George Mnisi wesikole sokufundela ubufundisi, i-Union Bible Institute (UBI).Le ndumezulu yenkonzo ebihanjelwe ngamalungu aleli bandla  ebevela ezingxenyeni ezehlukene zeKwaZulu Natal ibisesakhiweni sePresbyterian Church of Southern Africa esiseMpendle.UZuma enkulumeni yakhe uqhakambise kakhulu ukubaluleka kokuba leli bandla liklame indima enkulu ekuthuthukisweni kwentsha yalo.Uthe ukholwa ukuthi ibandla likaNkulunkulu  linendima enkulu okumele liyiklame uma kukhulunywa ngentsha eacwile ezidakamizweni."Ngifuna ukuthi kube khona esikwenzayo  ngenhloso yokuphucula impilo yentsha. Kodwa konke kulele ekutheni sisebenza ngokubambisana kangakanani,'' usho kanje.Uthe ingwadla yentsha ecwile ezidakamizweni akumele ibandla liyibukele kude kodwa kumele  libhukule ukuze lithole isisombululo sayo.Uthe ebuholini bakhe ufuna ukubona leli bandla linentsha eaphokophelele impilo engcono futhi engeke nangephutha igcine isiphenduka imilutha yezidakamizwa.Ngale kwezidakamizwa uthe ibandla kumele kube khona elikwenzayo ukugwema ukuthi intsha ingangeni ebugebengwini"Ngiyilolu hlobo lomholi olukholelwa kakhulu entsheni. Yingakho nje ngifuna sibabeke phambili siphinde sibalekelele ngayo yonke indlela esingenza ngayo,'' usho kanjena.

UTHEMBISE ukungenela alungise isimo aphinde aqede nenkohlakalo ohlelweni lokuphakelwa kwabafundi ezikoleni zaKwaZulu-Natal uNgqongqoshe weMfundo eyisiSekelo uNksz Siviwe Gwarube.UNksz Gwarube uthe ukhathazekile ngezinkinga ezibhekene nalolu hlelo eKZN njengoba kunezinkinga angenela kuzona, ngokungakhokhelwa ngesikhathi kwabahambisa ukudla ezikoleni.Uthe yingakho eze wamisa nse nokukhishwa kwethenda kaR9.8 billion, yokuphakela izikole zakuleli ngoba efuna ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abafundi abalambi, nokuthi ukudla kuzofika nsuku zonke ezikoleni.“Ngizimisele ukuyisiphula nezimpande inkohlakalo ohlelweni lokuphakelwa kwabafundi ezikoleni zethu. Kuke kwaba nezinselelo ezifundazweni iKZN naseGauteng kanti ngibe sengibiza umhlangano wabo bonke abaPhathiswa ukuthola ngezinkinga. Siyangenela eKZN ngezinkinga ezikhona zokungakhokhelwa kwabahambisa ukudla ezikoleni ngenxa yezinkinga zemali,” kusho uNksz Gwarube ephendula imibuzo ePhalamende.Abaphakela izikole esifundazweni sebeke basabisa ngokumisa ukuhambisa ukudla ngenxa yokungakhokhelwa ngesikhathi.UNksz Gwarube uthe akakholwa ukuthi umuntu oyedwa angaphakela abafundi abevile ku-9.7 million, abahlomula kulolu hlelo.“Yingakho ngamisa ithenda yokuthi umuntu oyedwa aphakele bonke abafundi. Kumele kuhlomule umphakathi kulolu hlelo kungazuzi umuntu oyedwa,” kusho uNksz Gwarube.Uthe uma esethathe isinqumo uyomemezela indlela okuzosetshenzwa ngayo ngaphansi kwalolu hlelo.Sinconyiwe isinyathelo sokumisa lithenda njengoba bekusolwa ukuthi kungenzeka kube nenkohlakalo.EKZN uhlelo lokunika umuntu oyedwa ozophakela abafundi lwaba nezinkinga kwaze kwabuyelwa ohlelweni oludala lokuhambisa ukudla kosonkontileka abahlukene.UNksz Gwarube ubuye wathembisa ukuthi ngoMashi ngonyaka ozayo bafuna ukube sebeqede nya ngamathoyilethi omgodi ezikoleni zakuleli.“Zingu-259 izikole ezinamathoyilethi emigodi kuleli. Sihlela ukuthi siqede ngawo uma kuphela unyaka wezimali ophela ngoMashi 2025.” Amalungu ePhalamende afune ukwazi ukuthi uzoqinisekisa kanjani ukuthi lokhu kuyenzeka.Uwaphendule ngokuthi eminyakeni edlule zingaphezu kuka-4 000 izikole ebezinamathoyilethi omgodi kanti manje sekusele ezimbalwa.UNksz Gwarube uchithe indaba yokuthi umnyango wehlisa isibalo sothisha eWestern Cape.Uthe kunenkinga yemali kuleli wathi basazama ukuxoxisana noMgcinimafa ngalolu daba.“Uma sivala noma sihlanganisa izikole sixoxa nomphakathi. Asimane sisivale noma yikanjani njengoba nalapho ngakhulela khona kunezikole eziningi ezavalwa,” kusho uNksz Gwarube.

IDINGA ithimba longqongqoshe beminyango ehlukene inkinga yokuduva kwezidumbu ezingenabanikazi emakhazeni kahulumeni kuleli. Lokhu kushiwo nguDkt Sibongiseni Dhlomo, iphini likaNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo kuleli ngesikhathi ekhuluma nesiteshi sethelevishini izolo. UDkt Dhlomo ubekhuluma ngemuva kokukhishwa kombiko othi zibalelwa ku-2 000 izidumbu eziduve emakhazeni kahulumeni kuleli, ezingenabanikazi.Isibalo sidalulwe nguNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo ezweni uDkt Joe Phaahla, obephendula umbuzo welungu leDA, ePhalamende uNksz Madeleine Hicklin.UPhaahla uveze ukuthi isifundazwe iKwaZulu-Natal, yisona esinesibalo esiphezulu sezidumbu eziduve emakhazeni njengoba zingu-1 336, kulandele iLimpopo ngezingu-283, neNorth West ngezingu-266. Ungqongqoshe uveze nokuthi eMpumalanga zingu-82 izidumbu ezingenabanikazi, eFree State zingu-82, kuthi eNorthern Cape zingu-51.Azikho izidumbu ezidalulilwe eGauteng, Eastern Cape, naseWestern Cape.UDhlomo uthe inkinga isidinga ukuthi kungenelele ithimba longqongqoshe abehlukene okubalwa owamaPhoyisa, owezaseKhaya, owezeMpilo, owezokuBusa nokuBambisana nowezobuLungiswa. “Ngikhulumile noPhaahla ukuthi mhlawumbe kumele sicele kumengameli ukuthi sisebenzisane nalabo ngqongqoshe kule nkinga. Isidinga uwonke wonke ngoba ukuze singcwabe izidumbu ezingenamuntu sidinga umhlaba kumasipala,” kuchaza uDkt Dhlomo.UDhlomo uqhube wathi izidumbu eziningi zakulesi sifundazwe zisuke zingezabantu abagwaziwe, nabadutshuliwe.“Ezinye izidumbu eKZN zisuke zingezabantu abazikhungile kanjalo nabasuke belimele ezingozini. Siyazigcina izidumbu ngethemba lokuthi imindeni izofika izofuna izidumbu emakhazeni. Uma kudlula izinsuku ezingaphezu kuka-30, sibe sesihlela ukuzingcwaba siwuhulumeni, ngokwethu sisigcina izinsuku ezingu-30 isidumbu,” kuchaza uDhlomo.Uthe bengumnyango abakwazi ukubika izidumbu eziduvile ezingenabantu ngoba ezinye izinqumo zidinga eminye iminyango.UDkt Dhlomo uchaze kanje:“Okunye okumele sikubheke noNnqongqoshe wezobuLungiswa ngukuthi mhlawumbe isidumbu esesihlale isikhathi eside emakhazeni silothiswe. Manje lesi sinqumo asikwazi ukusithatha singumnyango wezeMpilo wodwa, sidinga usizo lweminye iminyango.” Uthe bayalugcina ulwazi olufana nesithombe, amasampula egazi namanyela ezandla ukuze ngomuso uma kufika izihlobo bakwazi ukuhlola ulibofuzo.Unxuse imindeni esuke ilahlekelwe yizihlobo ukuthi iye emakhazeni kahulumeni iyothungatha khona izidumbu ezisuke zingaziwa.UDkt Dhlomo uveze ukuthi akukuhle ngasohlangothini lwezempilo ukugcina isidumbu emakhazeni iminyaka eminingi.“Sinxusa abasebenzi bethu ukuthi baqhubeke nje bazigcine lezi zidumbu noma sazi ukuthi akukuhle ngakwezempilo. Ezinye izidumbu kuphela iminyaka ziduvile emakhazeni.”

Uyazikhipha uMnyango wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal odabeni lonogada abadube umsebenzi esibhedlela iNorthdale, eMgungundlovu, ngoba bengaholanga.UMphathiswa wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, uNksz Nomagugu Simelane, ekhuluma ohlelweni lomnyango i-KZNHealthChat DotGov, ngoLwesihlanu, uthe umnyango awunabo onogada bawo, uba nezinkontileka nezinkampani bese zikhokhelwa ngomsebenzi wazo, njalo ngenyanga.Uthe onogada abadube umsebenzi abaqashiwe yibona kodwa baqashwe yizinkampani ezinezinkontileka nomnyango ngakho kuyabakhathaza ukuthi uma bengaholile noma benezinkinga nabaqashi babo, bavimbele iziguli ukuthi zingene esibhedlela ngoba kabakweletwa yisibhedlela, bakweletwa yilezo zinkampani.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe onogada baqale bavala amasango esibhedlela, obekuphazamisa iziguli ezingena esibhedlela. Bekhuzwa bayeka kodwa kuze kwashaya uLwesihlanu bengakabuyeli emsebenzini, beme ngaphandle. Uthe sekuyinsakavukela ukuthi abasebenzi abaqashwe yizinkampani ezinezinkontileka nomnyango badubele ezikhungweni esikhundleni sokulungisa izinkinga nabaqashi babo.UMnuz Ayanda Zulu onguNobhala wenyunyana yabasebenzi iNehawu, uthe bayabeseka abasebenzi abalaxaze umsebenzi ngoba bengaholanga, bafuna umnyango nomqashi balungise udaba ngokushesha, kodwa umphathiswa, uthe: "Ngokwazi kwethu, ayikho inkampani engakhokhelwanga ngomsebenzi ewenzile. Uma kungenzeka ukuthi inkampani ayikhokhelwanga njengoba kuthiwa isho njalo kubasebenzi, iphutha likuyo. Uma ilethe amaphepha okukhokhelwa ngemuva kwesikhathi iphutha likuyo. Kunesikhathi esibekiwe sokuthi inkampani iwaletha nini lawo maphepha."Sekuyinto evamile ukuthi izinkinga zezinkampani ezinezinkontileka zikapakele ekusebenzeni kwezibhedlela. Ekuqaleni kwenyanga, abasebenzi abahlanza esibhedlela iKing Dinuzulu - ebebesebenzela inkampani iNdlamlenze Cleaning Services - bebekhala ngokwephucwa isinkwa ile nkampani okuthe uma sekumele kuvuselelwe izinkontileka yashiya abanye ngaphandle. Abasebenzi baze baya e-CCMA ngoba bekholwa ukuthi uhlelo alulandelwanga kahle.

UMQONDISI wezokuShushisa (NPA) KwaZulu-Natal, u-Advocate Elaine Harrison, uthe awafakwanga amagama ofakazi esicelweni sokubuyiswa kwabasolwa ekufeni kuka-AKA ngoba kunokukhathazeka ngokuphepha kwabo.UKiernan “AKA” Forbes, nomngani wakhe uTebello “Tibz” Matsoane, bavinjezelwa okwezinyamazane babulawa nyakenye. Bathelekelwa ngamadoda abavithiza ngenhlamvu bashona bencokola ngaphandle kwendawo yokudlela i-Wish, esemgwaqweni kuFlorida, eyagcina ivaliwe.Kunomshikashika wokuzama ukubuyisa abanye abasolwa ababhajwe eSwatini, okuthiwa bayathinteka ekufeni kwabo. UMnuz Siyabonga Gezani Ndimande obuye abizwe ngoNxele, noMnuz Malusi Dave Ndimande basabhajwe eSwatini.Baboshwa begobe amadlangala eNkwalini, eZone 4, eMbabane, khona eSwatini, lapho ababeqashe khona. U-Advocate Harrison uthumele amaphepha esicelo sokubuyiswa kwabasolwa abaseSwatini, asidlulisele kuNgqongqoshe wezobuLungiswa, uMnuz Ronald Lamola. Iphephandaba iTimes of Eswatini libike ngodaba lithi amaphepha esicelo asefakiwe.Kuvela ukuthi isicelo sibhalwe amakhasi angu-254 nokulapho u-Advocate Harrison, eveza khona uvalo analo ngofakazi becala.“Bekungeke kube nobulungiswa ukudalula amagama ofakazi esicelweni secala. Amacala abafunelwa wona abucayi futhi makhulu, ukuvikelwa kofakazi nesithunzi sophenyo yikhona okuphambili ukuze kushushiswe ngempumelelo,’’ kuchaza u-Adv Harrison.Emaphepheni uphinde waveza ukuthi banobufakazi obuqanda ikhanda ngamacala abazowathwesa abasolwa. Uthe ubufakazi obuqukethwe yidokodo bukhomba ukuthi abakwaNdimande basebenza ngokubambisana ekufeni kuka-AKA nomngani wakhe.U-Advocate Harrison uveza nokuthi abaphenyi becala bami ngomumo ukuyofakaza eNkantolo eSwatini, uma kunesidingo salokho ukuze basekele isicelo sokubuyisa abakwaNdimande.Izinsizwa zakwaNdimande sezivele izikhawu eNkantolo yeMantshi kwaManzini, eSwatini, udaba luhlehlisiwe ngoba bekusalindwe isicelo sakuleli. Kulindeleke ukuthi abasolwa abaseSwatini, baphindele enkantolo ngo-Ephreli 9, kuzwakale ukuthi kuthiwani ngesicelo sokubuyiswa kwabo.Abanye abasolwa abahlanu babhizi nesicelo sabo sebheyili eNingizimu Afrika, abasifake eNkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini. Kulindeleke ukuthi babuyele enkantolo ngoMashi 27, ukuze uMbuso wenze izethulo zawo uphikisa isicelo sebheyili sabasolwa.

UMNYANGO wezokuThutha uthi sekuseduze  ufike umshini ozoshicilela ngokushesha amalayisensi okushayela.Lo mshini ozolandwa e-Europe kulindeleke ukuthi ushicilele amalayisensi kungakadluli izinsuku ezinhlanu.Bekufanele ufike ngoMeyi kodwa awufikanga ngenxa yokuthi kusalandelwa izinhlelo zikahulumeni zokuthenga impahla.UMnuz Collen Msibi okhulumela uMnyango wezokuThutha, uthe bekufanele kulandelwe izinhlelo zokuthenga impahla kodwa wona umshini ozoshicilela amalayisensi ngokushesha uyeza.“Sicela abantu basibekezelele ngoba simatasa nezinhlelo ezilandelwa uma kuthengwa impahla. Sizodedela ikomiti elibhekele amabhidi okuthengwa kwempahla ukuba lenze umsebenzi walo,” kusho uMsibi.Uthe okwamanje akekho umuntu oselinde isikhathi eside engayitholi ilayisensi kodwa kuzothengwa umshini omusha ngoba omdala usufa njalo.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi ngesikhathi seCovid-19 kwaphazamiseka ukushicilelwa kwamalayisensi emuva kokufa komshini wokuwashicilela.Kwavela ukuthi umshini wawuthengwe eGermany ngo-1998, uma ufile kuyama ukushicilelwa kwamalayisensi kwazise izipele zokuwulungisa zilandwa eGermany.UMnuz Fikile Mbalula owayenguNgqongqoshe wezokuThutha waveza ukuthi izinsimbi zokuwulungisa azikho kuleli futhi naseGermany abasalusebenzisi lolu hlobo lomshini ukushicilela amalayisensi.Yikhona lokhu okwenza ukuthi uhulumeni anqume ukuthenga umshini omusha wokushicilela amalayisensi okuthiwa azohluka kakhulu kulawa akhona njengamanje ngoba azobe esenobuchwepheshe obuthe xaxa.Kulindeleke ukuthi amalayisensi amasha abe yikhadi elicishe lifane nelomazisi omusha. Kuthiwa nawo azoba nemininingwane yomuntu akwazi nokusebenzisa ubuchwepheshe be-biometric.

UKHALA uyazithulisa umculi owazakhela udumo emsakazweni ngowesifazane athi ubaleke nengane yakhe futhi akasafuni ayibone. Lo mculi, odumile eThekwini nophinde abe ngumphathi wezinhlelo emicimbini eyehlukene, uthe unendodana eneminyaka eyisithupha nalo wesifazane waseMlaza. Inkinga uthe akasakwazi ukuyibona emva kokuthi lo wesifazane ethole isoka elisha asehlala nalo nendodana yabo.Uveze ukuthi okubuhlungu uyayondla indodana yakhe futhi usayihlawula waze wengeza nangenkomo ngaphezulu ngoba efuna ukuba nobudlelwano nayo.“Ayikho into engiphethe kabuhlungu njengale eyenziwa wu...(egagula igama lakhe). Akukho engingakwenzeli yona indodana yethu kodwa ukwazi ukuyithatha abaleke nayo. Sithole le ngane naye sisafunda, ngingakabi nayo imali, kodwa bengimnika imali uma kwenzekile ngaba nayo. Nabazali bakhe u....(esho unina wendodana yakhe) abanankinga nami njengoba bebekwazi ukuthi uma ngifuna ukubona ingane yami bayikhiphe ngiyibone njengoba ibihlala nabo. Udaba lwethu sengize ngaluyisa enkantolo njengoba ngidinga ukuthi ngikwazi ukubonana nengane yami emva kokuthi efike kubo u...(esho unina) wayithatha wahamba nayo ngaphandle kokuvumelana nabazali bakhe,” kusho lo mculi.Uthe ngoJulayi 18 baya enkantolo njengoba efuna ukuthi anikwe ithuba lokuthi abe sempilweni yendodana yakhe.“Mina engikukhalelayo ukuthi sihlale sazana nendodana yami. Ngalokho angisho ukuthi ngifuna sibuyelane. Ukuba sempilweni yendodana yami akusho ukuthi ngizoyithatha ngizohlala nayo kodwa ngifuna ukwenza isiqiniseko ukuthi ngezimpelasonto ngihlala nginayo ukuze sihlale sixhumene. Yena uthi iyoze iqale ukuhlangana nami isineminyaka engu-11 engingazi ukuthi kusho ukuthini. Okubuhlungu kakhulu ukuthi indodana yami angiyazi noma isafunda yini njengoba zonke izikole aveza ukuthi ifunda kuzona sengiyile kuzona kuvela ukuthi ayikaze ifunde khona,”usho kanje.Imizamo yokuxhumana nonina wendodana yalo mculi ayiphumelelanga njengoba engekho emndenini wakhe onezinamba zocingo lwakhe njengoba kuthiwa usexabane ngisho nomndeni wakhe.Udadewabo walo wesifazane uthe kumanje unina wengane yalo mculi usenze izincwadi zesivimbelo emaphoyiseni ukuthi unina noyise abamzalayo bangaphinde baxhumane naye njengoba ebasola ngokuzwelana noyise wengane yakhe.“Akekho ekhaya osevumeleke ukuthi axhumane naye. Nathi asimazi ukuthi uhlala kuphi nengane. Usashintsha ngisho nezingcingo zakhe. Indoda ahlala nayo sezwa kuthiwa inguphrojusa wakhe womculo njengoba naye engumculi. Umndeni wami uhlukumezeke kabi ngesenzo sikadadewethu njengoba engasafuni ukuxhumana namuntu ekhaya. Uyise wengane wenze konke kahle ekhaya futhi ingane uyikhokhele ngokugcwele. Inkinga nguyena udadewethu. Asazi uthando olunjani lolu alutholile olwenza aze adikile ngisho nomndeni wakhe ngenxa yendoda, aphinde angafuni ingane ixhumane noyise,” kusho udadewabo walo wesifazane.

UMCULI wokholo uKhulekani Chili, uphuthunyiswe esibhedlela iCharlotte Maxeke, elimele kanzima emuva kokwehlelwa yingozi yemoto ngeSonto ngabo-7 ebusuku, eSandton, eGoli. UKhulekani uthe wehlelwe yilo mshophi ephuma emhlanganweni lapho bekulalelwa khona umucu wakhe omusha futhi bekudingidwa ngokuthi bazowukhangisa kanjani."Ngithe sengiseGrayston, ngathi uma ngingena emarobhothini abengivumela, ngashayiswa ngenye imoto. Ngihluleke ukulawula imoto yami iFord Fiesta, ngaye ngayoshayisa ibhokisi likagesi maqede imoto yaphaphalazela ogqegqemeni lomgwaqo. Ngihlale amahora amaningi ngizama ukuphuma ngoba bengivalelekile emotweni."Uqhube wathi ulimale kabi kangangoba uze waphuka izimbambo nethambo lasegxalabeni.UKhulekani uthe ukulimala kuphazamise izinhlelo zokukhangisa ngengoma yakhe entsha ethi Bhasobh' Umngani,  nemicimbi abezonandisa kuyona.Eminyakeni edlule umculi waduma kakhulu kodwa ukwaziwa kwakhe kwaphazanyiswa ukudakwa wutshwala. Uze wavela nasohlelweni lweMoja Love olisiza abantu asebeyimilutha yotshwala Uyaphuza, nakweloMzansi Magic iBlew It.Uphuzo oludakayo lwamenza wagcina esebandakanyeka ezingozini zomgwaqo futhi esewukudla kwejele njengoba manje esezelwe kabusha.Waqala ukuzakhela udumo nge-albhamu ethi Ingane Yomfana  ngo-2007. Ngo-2022 wakhipha esihloko sithi Ungumhlobo kodwa izingoma adume ngazo ngezithi Ngenzeni, Makhelwane, Ndiwanga Morena nethi Xola Sitha Sami.

IBOSHIWE indoda engeyokufika eNingizimu Afrika etholakale nensada yezidakamizwa ezingabiza uR500 000 okusolakala ukuthi ibiizidayisa. Umsolwa oneminyaka engu-44 uboshwe amaphoyisa emuva kokuthi egasele eflethini lakhe eliseMbilo, eThekwini ngoMsombuluko.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa alunywe indlebe ngendoda obekuisolakala ukuthi idayisa izidakamizwa eflethini elisemgwaweni uMelbourne.“Sibe sesithola incwadi yenkantolo esigunyazayo ukuba siseshe le ndawo. Iseshiwe, umsolwa watholakala nezidakamizwa okukhona kuzona izingcezu ze-cocaine nempuphu yewunga (heroine),” kusho uNetshiunda.Uqhube wathi izidakamizwa ezitholakele zibiza ngaphezu kukaR500 000.Kulindeleke ukuthi umsolwa avele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini ngoLwesibili ngecala lokuhweba ngezidakamizwa.

NJENGOBA umphakathi namaqembu ezepolitiki eyilinde ngabomvu imiphumela yokhetho lukazwelonke nolwezifundazwe, uhulumeni uthi phansi amaphaphu.Okhulumela uhulumeni uNksz Nomonde Mnukwa, uthe njengoba lusaqhubeka uhlelo lokuqinisekisa imiphumela yokhetho, abantu ababeke umoya phansi.Uthe uhlelo luthatha isikhathi ngoba kudingeka kwenziwe izinto eziningi okubalwa ukwaba izihlalo zasePhalamende, kanjalo naseziShayamthetho zezifundazwe.Uchaze kanje uNksz Mnukwa:“IKhomishini yezoKhetho ivulelekile ohlelweni lokuqinisekisa imiphumela ukuze ukhetho kube ngolukhululekile. Le miphumela kudingeka icwaningwe yizinkampani zabacwaningi eziqokwe ukwenza lo msebenzi.” Uqhube wathi amaqembu ezepolitiki ayakwazi ukuzicwaningela imiphumela wathi ngokomthetho imiphumela kumele imenyezelwe ezinsukwini eziyisikhombisa ngemuva kokhetho.“Izinsuku eziyisikhombisa ziphela ngoJuni 5, 2024. IKhomishini iyona kuphela enelungelo lokumemezela imiphumela yokhetho. Asikho esinye isikhungo noma abahlaziyi kanjalo namaqembu abanelungelo elisemthethweni lokumemezela imiphumela yokhetho.” Uxwayise amaqembu ukuthi angasheshi amemezele imiphumela. Uthe uma seyimenyezeliwe imiphumela, uhlu lwabazomela amaqembu ePhalamende luzonikezwa umengameli wamajaji.Uzobe eseludlulisela kunobhala wePhalamende.“La malungu kudingeka afungiswe, bese kuphakanyiswa igama lomuntu ozoba ngumengameli, ozovotelwa amalungu. Uhlelo lokuvotelwa kukamengameli lusingathwa nguJaji Raymond Zondo.” Uhulumeni usho lokhu nje kulindeleke ukuthi ikhomishini idedele imiphumela yokhetho kusasa. Kuthiwa imiphumela yesikhashana ize ifakwe emqulwini kahulumeni iGovernment Gazette.Umcimbi wokumemezela imiphumela yokhetho KwaZulu-Natal, use-Inkosi Albert Luthuli International Convention Centre eThekwini, kanti uqala ngo-4 ntambama.Okazwelonke useMidrand, kanti wona uqala ngo-6 ntambama.Lolu khetho belubhekwe ngabomvu kanti belufaniswa nolokuqala olwabanjwa ngaphansi kwentando yeningi ngo-1994.

ISIKHULU esiphezulu sebhange Ithala, uDkt Thulani Vilakazi, sithi phansi amaphaphu kubantu abalondoloza imali kuleli bhange nababolekwe yilona imali.UVilakazi uthe ukumiswa kwelayisensi yaseThala akusho ukuthi imali yabantu izohamba noma kufanele bayoyikhipha ebhange kodwa isekhona.UNksz Lungi Memela olondoloza imali yakhe eThala, eGreytown, utshele Isolezwe  ukuthi umbiko we-FSCA umthusile ngoba ibhange lakhe alizange limazise okwenzekayo kodwa ufunde ephepheni ukuthi kunenkinga yelayisensi.“Ngivuke ekuseni ngaya edolobheni ngiyobheka ukuthi ngabe imali yami iphephile yini. Okwamanje konke kusahamba kahle kodwa awukho umlayezo engiwutholile iThala. Ngibonga Isolezwe ngokulokhu lisazisa okwenzekayo,” kusho uNksz Memela.UVilakazi uthe imiyalezo yokuchaza isimo bayithumele ngoMsombuluko. Uthembise amakhasimende abo ukuthi imishwalense yawo ngeke iphazamiseke ngoba basazoyithola yonke imihlomulo yabo njengoba isifakwe ngaphansi kwe-Ithala Development and Finance Corporation (IDFC).“Ngithanda ukuqinisekisa abantu baKwaZulu-Natal abalondoloza imali yabo eThala ukuthi iphephile futhi bazokwazi ukuyithola noma kunini uma beyidinga. Sikhiphe izaziso sichaza ngesimo esikhona emuva kwemibiko yangempelasonto yabezindaba.”Ubuye waveza ukuthi okwamanje abakwazi ukuvula ama-akhawunti amasha.“Ngiyaphinda futhi ukuthi one-akhawunti ebhange Ithala ngeke athikamezeke ndawo ngenxa yesimemezelo se-FSCA. Imali ikhona, umshwalense nayo yonke imihlomulo ayitholayo izoqhubeka. Izikhalo ze-FSCA ziyalungiswa. Sinikezwe kuze kube wu-Okthoba 28 ukuba sizilungise.”Uthe Ithala alinazo izinkinga zezimali futhi umncwaningi mabhuku jikelele uwufakazi walokhu njengoba elinike umbiko ongenalo ugcobho.Uveze ukuthi banenqwaba yamakhasimende athembele eThala, amanye ahola kulo, amanye alondoloze imali yawo kanti amanye abe ngamakhasimende emuva kokubolekwa imali yokwakha imizi, ukuthenga amakhumbi nokunye okuningi.

UMNYANGO wezeMpilo uthi abantu abangatatazeli ngokuthi inhlangano yezempilo emhlabeni, iWorld Health Organisation (WHO) nenhlangano ebhekele izifo e-Afrika, i-Africa Centres for Disease Control (CDC) imemezele iMpox njengesimo esiphuthumayo e-Afrika.UMqondisi-jikelele we-Africa CDC uDkt Jean Kaseya ememezela isimo esiphuthumayo ngeMpox kuleli sonto, uthe kunesidingo esiphuthumayo sokuthi umphakathi womhlaba wonke uthathe izinyathelo ezinqala ukuze kuqedwe lesi sifo. Wathi okungenani angu-13 amazwe ase-Afrika abike ukubheduka kwezifo kulo nyaka.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMpiloi, uMnuz Foster Mohale, uthe okwamanje asikabi khona isidingo sokuthi umphakathi wakuleli uphakamise amaphaphu ngalolu daba.Uthe iNingizimu Afrika inemithamo eyanele yemithi yokwelapha lesi sifo. Wathi umnyango uthole enye inqwaba ye-Tecovirimat, eyaziwa nangokuthi i-TPOXX, enikelwe yi-WHO, njengengxenye yokwesekwa okuqhubekayo emizameni yokusiza iNingizimu Afrika ukuthi ilawule lesi sifo. "Ukuvikela kungcono kunokwelapha, ngakho abantu akumele bagxile ekusebenziseni izindlela zokuzivikela zokuhlanzeka nokusheshe basukume uma bebona izimpawu noma beke basondelana nabanaleli gciwane,"  kusho uMohale.INingizimu Afrika isiqinisekise izigameko zabahaqwe ileli gciwane ezingu-24 ezaseGauteng , ezingu-11 ezakwa-KwaZulu-Natal nesisodwa saseWestern Cape. Bathathu abashonile ngenxa yalesi sifo.

UKUTHANDANA nabantu abadala kwezitshudeni kwandisa izigameko zokuhlukunyezwa.Lokhu kushiwo u-registrar (isikhulu) wesikhungo sezemfundo i-Durban University of Technology (DUT), uDkt Maditsane Nkonoane, ngesikhathi ekhuluma nezitshudeni zakule nyuvesi ngesikhathi kunemashi yezitshudeni ekhuza ukuhlukunyezwa ngokobulili, i-Gender Based Violence (GBV), i-Silent March, ebiyizolo."Siyinyuvesi umsebenzi wethu ukuthi uma sinemukela nizofunda nibuyele ekhaya senineziqu zenu, hhayi ukuthi nibuyele emakhaya niyizidumbu. Umkhuba wokuthandana namadoda amadala o-sugar daddy nomama abadala o-sugar mama, abazi ukuthi uma bethandana nezitshudeni banelungelo lokuzilawula. Uma ukulobo budlelwano phuma! Phuma ngoba kulobo budlelwano usengcupheni yohlukumezeka," kuxwayisa uNkonoane.UNksz Silindile Mabonga osesigungwini sabafundi i-SRC, uthe le mashi osekuneminyaka eyishumi yenziwa ngabafundi bakulesi sikhungo iyisikhumbuzo salaba abavalwa imilomo ngokuthi bangakhulumi ngokuhlukunyezwa kwabo."Iyisikhumbuzo sokuthi kumele siqwashe, sikhande indawo ephephile elungele ukuthi sikwazi ukuphilisana sonke, sesekane nokuthi sizame senze isiqiniseko sokuthi abenzi bokubi babhekana nengalo yomthetho.UNkk Thembalethu  Fihlela wophiko lwezomthetho e-DUT, uthe kumele kuphele ukuthi uma kuthiwa kunomfundi odlwenguliwe kubuzwe ukuthi ubekuphi, egqokeni."Ukuthi umuntu ubegqokeni akusho ukuthi sekumele adlwengulwe," kusho uNkk Fihlela.IPhini likaNgqongqoshe weMfundo ePhakeme, uMnuz Bhuti Manamela, lithe kunezinto amadoda okumele azazi njengokuthi umzimba wabantu besifazane akuwona owawo."Akukhathalekile ukuthi uwena omondlayo,  uma ethi cha kusho ukuthi cha! Akukhathalekile ukuthi cha uwusho ngezwi eliphansi noma uke wavuma wabuye washintsha. Amadoda awawazi ucha,"  kusho uManamela.Uthe uzwile ukuthi selokhu kwaqalwa le mashi baningi ababika ngokuhlukunyezwa."Kuhle lokho kodwa sifuna kufike esigabeni lapho kuzothiwa azisekho izigameko zokuhlukunyezwa," kusho uManamela.UMnuz Sandiseni Madela ongowesilisa othandana nabobulili obufanayo, uthe abathandana nabobulili obufanayo basahamba beqalaza uma besezindaweni abahlala kuzo noma besemphakathini."Kunenkolelo yokuthi awukwazi ukushintsha indlela odalwe ngayo uma ungowesilisa noma ungowesifazane. Bakholwa ukuthi siyazenzisa ngakho sidinga ukuthi silungiswe ngokuthi sidlwengulwe noma sishaywe," kusho uMadela.

UMHOLI weDA uMnuz John Steenhuisen usebenzise ukunqoba kwabo uMasipala waseMngeni ngamavoti amancane, ukukhuthaza abantu bakuleli ukuphuma ngezinkani okhethweni oluzayo.USteenhuisen uthe ukunqoba kwabo sekuvalwe amehlo uMasipala waseMngeni okhethweni lohulumeni basekhaya lwango-2021, kungubufakazi bokuthi ukungavoti komuntu oyedwa okhethweni lwangoMeyi kungashintsha izinto.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ethula isikhangiso sokuqala seDA sokhetho esizokhonjiswa kwithelevishini.Kulesikhangiso iDA iqhosha ngokufuqa intuthuko emikhandlwini eyiphethe.USteenhuisen uthe iningi lemikhandlu abayiphethe bayiwina ngamavoti amancane.I-DA yahlwitha i-ANC uMasipala waseMngeni ngamavoti angu-44, nokungumkhandlu wokuqala KwaZulu-Natal ophethwe iDA.Ngo-2006, i-DA yawina uMasipala waseCape Town ngevoti elilodwa.“Yomibili lemikhandlu neminye ephethwe iDA isiphenduke yaba yisibonelo esihle. Imikhandlu ephethwe iDA yenza kahle kakhulu,” kusho uSteenhuisen.Uthe ukunqoba kwabo lemikhandlu ngamavoti amancane kumele kukhuthaze bonke abantu bakuleli ukuthi bayovota ngoMeyi 29.Nakuba iDA yaziwa ngokuphatha kahle komasipala ebusa kubona uthe abantu bayakhohlwa ukuthi baqale kanjani. Indlela ibeyinde kakhulu, baqale kancane, balokhu bekhula.Isifundo esibalulekile lapha uthe wukuthi wonke umuntu avote. Isimo ababhekene naso sibi kakhulu, akufanele kube khona umuntu ongezukuvota.“Sinxusa bonke labo asebelahlekelwe ithemba ukuba bangadikibali, bahambe bayovota. Ivoti elilodwa lingawenza umehluko uma sekubalwa.“Ukuvota yisona sikhali esikhulu esinaso esingasisebenzisa ukuzwakalisa uvo lwethu. Ukungavoti nokuvota kwakho kungacacisa ukuthi izwe liphathwa ngokubambisana i-ANC, MK ne-EFF noma liphathwa ngokubambisana ngamaqembu asebenzisana neDA,” esho.Esikhangisweni kuvela kakhulu izimeya zomasipala abaphethwe yileliqembu, lapho zikhuluma khona ngezikwenzile kusukela zaqokelwa ezikhundleni.USteenhuisen uthe abantu bakuleli bakhathele wukungazitholi izidingo.Unxuse abantu bakuleli ngokungapheli amandla, kuningi okufanele kubajabulise njengoba kuyiwa okhethweni, maningi amathuba okuthi i-ANC iphume emandleni.Lokhu uthi kuzonikeza ithuba amaqembu ahambisana neDA ukuba aphathe.USteenhuisen uthe isikhangiso sizoqala sikhonjiswe kwiziteshi zethelevision ezahlukene maduze. “Lokhu kuzoqinisa kakhulu umkhankaso wethu. Sizimisele ngokutakula abantu baseNingizimu Afrika kulolu sizi ababhekene nalo,” kuphetha lomholi.

KUPHELILE ukuvalelwa ngaphandle kwabalimi abancane bakamoba KwaZulu-Natal njengoba ngoLwesine benikwe umqulu obangenisa embonini kashukela. UNgqongqoshe wezoLimo nokuThuthukiswa kweziNdawo zaseMakhaya, uNkk Thoko Didiza nowezoHwebo, iziMboni nokuNcintisana uMnuz Ebrahim Patel bafake iSouth African Farmers Development Association (Safda) ngaphansi kwemboni kashukela.Kuyaqala ngqa ukuthi usoseshini wabalimi abamnyama abancane uhlale nososeshini abakhulu embonini kashukela eneminyaka ewu-180.Lokhu kusho ukuthi iSafda isizohlala etafuleni elilodwa neSouth African Sugar Association nezinye izinhlangano ezisembonini kashukela.UDkt Siyabonga Madlala onguSihlalo weSafda, uthe kuqopheke umlando njengoba sebezohlala nezinye izinhlangano zemboni kashukela.“Kudala besingamukelekile lapha KwaShukela besithathwa njengabashokobezi. “Lolu suku lwanamhlanje luzosiza abalimi abancane bakamoba nezizukulwane ezizayo ngoba kusho ukuthi izwi lethu selizozwakala ngokwenzeka embonini esisebenza kuyo,” kusho uDkt Madlala.Ubalule ukuthi kubathathe iminyaka eyisishiyagalolunye ukuba bafike kulesi sigaba ngoba baqale bavalelwa ngaphandle, kodwa ngokuhamba kwesikhathi bebehlala isikhashana bese ubulungu babo buphelelwa yisikhathi.“Namuhla ugogo waseMakhathini nomunye olima umoba uzoba nezwi embonini kamoba. Siyabonga kakhulu kongqongqoshe bethu ngokusisukumela singabalimi abancane.“Sizoqhubeka nezinhlelo zokuthuthukisa abalimi esizenzayo namanje ngoba sifuna le mboni iqhubeke nokukhula,” kusho uMadlala.UNkk Didiza uthe kuningi okuzayo embonini kamoba ngoba abafuni nje igcine ngokukhiqiza ushukela kodwa bafuna yenze nophethroli ozosetshenziswa ngamabhanoyi.Bafuna amakhasi omoba asetshenziselwe ukwenza ugesi nokunye okuningi. UPatel uthe beza nohlelo lokufukula imboni olubizwa ngeSugar Industry Masterplan, babefuna ukuthi imboni ibe nazo zonke izinhlaka zakuleli.“Selokhu saba nohlelo lweSugar Industry Masterplan sesikwazile ukunyusa umkhiqizo kashukela ngo-23%. Sikwazile ukusayina izivumelwano nabasebenzisa ushukela ukuba bathenge owakuleli kanti sinentela ekhokhwa ushukela wangaphandle ukuvikela imboni yethu.Isibonelo uma kade sikhiqiza amasaka amane kashukela kudala, sesikhiqa amahlanu manje. Uma besithenga amasaka amathathu phesheya manje sesithenga amabili,” kusho uPatel.Uthe kusukela ngo-2019 kuze kube manje bebesebenzela ukuletha uzinzo embonini kashukela.Kuzothi esigabeni sesibili basebenzele ukuyikhulisa kakhulu lemboni njengoba sebebheka nezinye izinto abangazenza ngomoba.U-Adv Fay Mukaddam onguSihlalo weSouth African Sugar Association (Sasa), uthe bayalwemukela uguquko olukhona embonini kashukela.Uthe bayajabula ukuthi iSafda isiyilungu eligcwele elizothola yonke imihlomulo etholwa ngabanye ososeshini bemboni.

UGQUGQUZELE abesifazane ukuba basebenzise izinkundla zokuxhumana ukuzithuthukisa, uNksz Nondumiso Mkhize (32) ojimisa abesifazane ku-WhatsApp.UNksz Mkhize waseWilliowfontein, eMgungundlovu uthe wabona kungcono ukusungula iWhatsApp group ukuze abesifazane bakwazi ukuzivocavoca noma ngabe bakuphi.“Ngiwumuntu othanda ukuzivocavoca. Kudala besizivocavoca sibaningi kodwa saqhelelana ngenxa yemisebenzi. Ngibe sengifikelwa umcabango wokuvula iWhatsApp group ukuze sizivocavoce ngokuhlanganyela noma ngabe sikuphi. Kubalulekile ukusebenzisa izinkundla zokuxhumana ukuzithuthukisa,” kuchaza uNksz Mkhize.Uveze ukuthi okumgqugquzele kakhulu ukuba asungule ijimu kuWhatsApp wukuthi ngesikhathi somvalelandlini we-Covid-19, abantu bebexhumana kalula ngo-WhatsApp njengoba babengavumelekile ukuphuma ezindlini.“Asisekho isidingo sokucasha ngokuthi awukwazi ukuzivocavoca ngoba sinazo izinhlelo zokuzivocavoca kuWhatsApp nakwezinye izinkundla zokuxhumana. Kubalulekile ukuthi ube nenhloso ethile ozivocavocela yona. Kungaba wukuthi ufuna ukuphila kahle, kube wukuthi ufuna ukuncipha nokunye osuke uzibekele kona,” kusho uNksz Mkhize.Uthe ukuzivocavoca kugcina umzimba uphile kahle ngoba ozivocavocayo uyagqugquzeleka ukuphuza amanzi nokudla ukudla okunezakhamzimba.Ugqugquzele abesifazane ukuba bangakujabuleli ukuthi bakhuluphele ngoba ukukhuluphala kuhambisana nezifo ezehlukene.Ubalule isifo somfutho wegazi, esikashukela, amathambo, umdlavuza nezinye ezihambisana nokukhuluphala.Uthe ukuzivocavoca kulula izinsuku zokuphila komuntu ngoba kwenza inhliziyo ishaye kahle, kumenze abe nesikhumba esibushelelezi futhi angabi nokhwantalala.Uphethe ngokuthi abesifazane abazithola bewa ohambeni lokuzivocavoca bangadikibali ngoba ukuzivocavoca kuyindlela yokuphila okufanele bayiphile nsukuzonke.“Kudingeka ubekezele uma uzivocavoca ngoba kulula ukudikibala uma uwumuntu ongakujwayele ukunyakazisa umzimba. Kufanele uqhubeke nokuzivocavoca uze ubone umehluko. Ukhumbule ukuthi ukudla okunomsoco kubaluleke ukudlula ukuzivocavoca,” kuphetha uNksz Mkhize.

KUPHELILE ukuma kolayini abade emahhovisi oMnyango wezaseKhaya ahlale ematasa njengoba sekuvulwe ihhovisi elizokhipha omazisi nama-passport enxanxatheleni yezitolo, iPavilion.Ekuqaleni kwesonto uNgqongqoshe wezaseKhaya, uDkt Aaron Motsoaledi, uthe ukuvulwa kwehhovisi lezaseKhaya ePavilion kuyingxenye yezinhlelo zabo zokusondeza izinsiza kubantu.“Sifuna abantu bazithole kalula izinsiza zethu yingakho sivule ihhovisi lapha ePavilion. Azoqhubeka nokusebenza wonke amahhovisi ethu kodwa sizosondeza amanye ezinxanxatheleni zezitolo. Kuningi esikwenzayo ukusondeza izinsiza kubantu njengoba sisebenzisa namabhange,” kusho uMotsoaledi.Isikhulu sePareto Group okuyiyona engabanikazi bePavilion nezinye izinxanxathela zezitolo, uMnuz Malose Kekana, uthe bayibhizinisi elifuna ukulekelela umphakathi ngayo yonke indlela ngakho bekulula ukuthi basebenzisane noMnyango wezaseKhaya ukuvula ihhovisi.Uthe amanye amahhovisi azovulwa kwezinye izinxanxathela zezitolo zabo ezikwezinye izifundazwe okubalwa iWestern Cape, Gauteng nezinye.UNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube, ukushayele izandla ukuvulwa kwehhovisi lezasekhaya ePavilion.“Yizindaba ezinhle lezi ngoba kusho ukuncipha kolayini abade emahhovisi oMnyango wezaseKhaya amatasa afana nelaseMngeni, elisenkabeni yeTheku nelisePinetown. Uhulumeni usebenza ngokuzikhandla ukuletha izinsiza kubantu,” kusho uNkk Dube-Ncube.Amahhovisi asePavilion avulwa ngoMsombuluko kuya kuLwesihlanu ngo-8 ekuseni kuya ku-15:30 ntambama bese ngoLwesithathu lokugcina enyangeni avulwe ngo-9 ekuseni avalwe ngo-15:30 ntambama.

SINCIPHE kancane isibalo sabantu abane-HIV KwaZulu-Natal njengoba sisuke ku-1.99 million ngo-2017 saya ku-1.98 million ngo-2022.Lokhu kuvezwe wucwaningo lwakamuva lwe-Human Sciences Research Council (HSRC).USolwazi Khangelani Zuma obehola ucwaningo lwe-SAHRC, uthe ngo-2022, i-HIV ibitholakala kakhulu kulabo abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-25 kuya ku-49 njengoba ibiku-31.1%, kwabesifazane ibiwu-38.4%, bese kuthi kwabesilisa ibe wu-21.5%.Uthe iKwaZulu-Natal ayisahambi phambili ngokusabalala kwe-HIV njengoba isibalo sayo siku-16%, sekuhamba phambili iMpumalanga lapho kutholwe khona ukuthi ukusabalala kwe-HIV kuku-17% okubeka abantu abaphila ne-HIV kulesiya sifundazwe ku-890 000.Ubalule ukuthi yize ukusabalala kwe-HIV KwaZulu-Natal kwehlile kodwa lesi sifundazwe sisenabantu abaningi abaphila ne-HIV ngenxa yokuthi vele sinabantu abaningi (high population numbers).Uthe okuhle wukuthi u-87% wabantu abane-HIV udla imishanguzo futhi u-87% uyidla kahle imishanguzo. Lokhu kuholela ekuthithibaliseni igciwane nokuthi bangalidluliseli kwabanye.Uzwakalise ukukhathazeka ngokuthelelana nge-HIV kubantu abaneminyaka ewu-15 kuya ku-24 athe yibona abasengcupheni yokutheleleka nge-HIV nokungayidli imishanguzo njengoba bengakukhuthalele ukuzihlola. Nalabo abaneminyaka ewu-45 kuya ku-49, kuvele ukuthi bayatheleleka nge-HIV ngenxa yendlela yokuziphatha (sexual behaviour).Uthe kufanele kuqalwe phansi imikhankaso yokuqwashisa nge-HIV, ihambe phambili njengoba kwakwenzeka ngesikhathi kuqwashiswa ngeCovid-19.Ugqugquzele abantu ukuthi baye ocansini oluphephile ngoba ocwaningweni kuvele ukuthi kwehlile ukusetshenziswa kwamakhondomu.Amadoda uthe kufanele asokwe ngoba kufanele kusetshenziswe zonke izindlela zokunqanda i-HIV.

INKINGA yokubhuqabhuqana kosomatekisi bakwaSwayimani seyingenelelwe wuMasipala waseMshwathi kanye nohulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal. Lokhu kuvele kwimbizo yokunqanda ubugebengu nokubhebhetheka kwezidakamizwa ebibanjelwe ezinkundleni zemidlalo zaKwaNdlebezembuzi, kwaSwayimani ngoLwesine.Imeya yakuMasipala waseMshwathi, uMnuz Mandla Zondi, uthe zimphatha kabi izigameko zokubulawa kosomatekisi ngaphansi kumasipala awuholayo, ikakhulukazi kwaSwayimani."Kulimale osomatekisi abaningana, cisho abawu-15 esikhathini esingeside kakhulu. Ngenye yezinto esithe uma sikhala esifundazweni, behla, baya esteshini samaphoyisa, bayobonana nomphathisiteshi." UZondi uthe bathole ukuthi abasebenzi basesiteshini saseWartburg, esibhekene nanoSwayimani, abanele nezinsizakusebenza zincane."Kwakunesiteshi samaphoyisa esingumahambanendlwana (kwaSwayimani) esamiswa kuqhubeka ngenxa yenkinga kagesi namanzi. Imeya yoMkhandlu wesifunda (UMgungundlovu, uMnuz Mzi Zuma), ngoba yibo ababhekene namanzi, uthe uyazibophezela ukulungiseni inkinga yamanzi maduzane futhi sizohamba siyokhuluma no-Eskom ukuze ufake ugesi. Ukuze lesi siteshi esingumahambanendlwana siqale ukusebenza." UZondi uthe ufuna sibe namaphoyisa azosebenza ubusuku nemini ukuqapha ubugebengu, ikakhulukazi obuqondene nemboni yamatekisi."Lokhu kungalekelela ekwehliseni izinga lobugebengu, ikakhulukazi obuthinta imboni yamatekisi."Uthe kubuye kwamphatha kabi ukuzwa izindaba zokuthi kunosomatekisi obesebenzisana nabakwaSwayimani obulewe ngoLwesithathu.UNdunankulu uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube uthe umasipala wabathinta bangenelela ekufeni kosomatekisi futhi uthe ukujabulele ukuzwa kuthiwa sekudambile."Kuchaza ukuthi umsebenzi esiwenzayo uyabonakala ngoba bakhona nasebeboshiwe." Uthe bazozama ukuvula isiteshi esingumahambanendlwana ukuze kuphele ukuba ikwamachangca, kwampunzedlemini ezigebengwini. UZondi, ephelezelwa wuNkk N.I.Vilakazi nekhansela laku-ward 11, uMnuz Mthokozisi, bavakashele iDisability Skills Centre eseMabheleni nasekhaya labadala eliseGujini, kwaSwayimani, bebeqiqinge izipho ezihlukahlukene.

INATIONAL Consumer Commission (NCC), okuyinhlangano elwela amalungelo abathengi kuleli, ithi isiqale uphenyo ngenkampani ebitshalisa abantu imali ezingulubeni ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, iPiggy Farm Trading.Uphenyo luza emuva kokuthi iNCC ithole izikhalo kubantu abangasayitholi imali ababethenjiswe yona yiPiggy Farm Trading.Le nkampani ibiheha abantu ezinkundleni zokuxhumama ithi inepulazi okufuywe kulo izingulube. Abantu bebethenga ingulube eyodwa ngoR2 750 bese bethenjiswa ukuthi bazokhokhelwa uR500 njalo ngenyanga kuze kuphele unyaka. Lokhu kusho ukuthi umuntu ubezoba no-R6 000 uma sekuphela unyaka.Ingulube ubengeke ayithole ngoba ibihlala epulazini, iPiggy Farm, njengoba bekuthiwa yibona abayiphakelayo, bayigome bayenze konke okuhlangene nezolimo.INCC ithe iPiggy Farm iyibhanoyi njengoba isebenza ngendlela efanayo namanye amabhanoyi, athembisa abantu inzalo engaphezulu ngo-20% kwimali mboleko.“Sicela abantu bazi ukuthi ukutshala imali ebhanoyini kuyicala, akufanele futhi bakhuthaze nabanye ukuthi bangene kulo. Ucwaningo lwethu luveza ukuthi ayanda amabhanoyi asebenzisa ezolimo ukuheha abantu. Uma umuntu ethenga imfuyo kufanele ayibone, hhayi ukuthi athenge imfuyo engabonakali,” kusho iNCC esitatimendeni.Ithe abasungula amabhanoyi bazenza sengathi baphila kahle ngoba befuna ukuheha abantu abayisebenzele kanzima imali yabo.NgoLwesithathu uphiko lwezokushushisa lumemezele ukuthi lunegunya lokuvala i-akhawunti yePiggy Farm Trading enoR4.3 million njengoba luphenya okwenzeka kule nkampani.Elinye iphephandaba elibhala online libike ukuthi iNedbank ivale i-akhawunti yePiggy Farm Trading ebinoR16 million.Esitatimendeni ebesikhishiwe yiPiggy Farm Trading, ithe iyakuqonda ukukhathazeka kwabantu futhi iyazisukumela izikhalo zabo.Isolezwe lizamile ukushayela abePiggy Farm Trading ucingo enombolweni yabo ethi 031 006 5204 kodwa belungangeni njengoba bekunomsindo ozwakala sengathi bakolunye ucingo.

BAZOTHOLA ithuba lokuzikhangisa lapho behlala khona abantu baseThekwini, njengoba uMasipala weTheku uzoba nemibukiso yamabhizinisi ezifundeni ezihlukene zalo masipala.Imibukiso yamabhizinisi yezifunda ebizwa ngama-Regional Durban Business Fairs iyasiza ekukhangiseni imikhiqizo yamabhizinisi endawo, ukuhlomisa osomabhizinisi ngamakhono, nokuxhumanisa osomabhizinisi nabantu abasha.Sekuvuliwe ukubhalisa kulabo abafisa ukuyokhangisa ngemisebenzi yabo embukisweni wesifunda saseningizimu ozoqala ngo-Okthoba 25 uphele ngo-Okthoba 27, enxanxatheleni yezitolo KwaMnyandu Shopping Centre.Ukuze ubekise isikhala sokukhangisa kulo kufanele ubhalise kusukela manje njengoba kuvalwa ngoSepthemba 30.Amafomu okubhalisa athokakala ngokungena kwi-link: https://bit.ly/SouthForm noma ngokuthumela i-email ku [email protected] ucele ifomu. Amafomu okubhalisa ayatholakala nakonogada e-Embassy Building, ku-199 Anton Lembede Street. Akhona nakwi-website kaMasipala weTheku ethi: www.durban.gov.za. Uciphiza isihlokwana esithi government, bese wehla uze uyofika engosini ye-Durban Business Fair.Usihlalo wekomiti lezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho nokuHlela, uMnuz Thembo Ntuli, uthe amabhizinisi amancane ayinsika yomnotho waseThekwini futhi asiza ukudala amathuba omsebenzi.“Ukwakha amathuba okukhula komnotho wasemakhaya nasemalokishini yingxenye ebalulekile ezinhlelweni zethu. Sifuna ukukhulisa umnotho ngendlela engavaleli muntu ngaphandle, ezosiza ukudala amathuba omsebenzi. Kuwumsebenzi wethu obalulekile ukuqhamuka nezinhlelo ezikhuthaza ukuqalwa kwamabhizinisi nokukhuliswa kwamabhizinisi amancane ukuze kuvuselelwe umnotho wasemakhaya nasemalokishini,” usho kanje.Wengeze ngokuthi ukuvuselela imibukiso yamabhizinisi yezifunda kuseqhulwini ezinhlelweni zabo zokuthuthukisa umnotho weTheku. Lokhu kusiza ekutheni kufukulwe osomabhizinisi basemakhaya nasemalokishini futhi bangavalelwa ngaphandle ezinhlelweni zomnotho.Lolu hlelo luzoba nemibukiso yemikhiqizo ehlukene, izithangami zokucobelelana ngolwazi, imibukiso yengqephu, izinhlelo zokupheka, amakilasi okuzofundisa kuwona ongoti bemikhakha ehlukene nezinhlelo zokuthuthukiswa kwamakhono.Ukuthola eminye imininingwane, osomabhizinisi bangashayela ku-031 266 9938.

UMNYANGO wezabaSebenzi usuzoba nebhasi elingumahamba-nendlwana emahhovisi asePinetown ukusiza abafaka izicelo ze-Unemployment Insurance Fund (UIF).Ukuba khona kwaleli bhasi kuzoxazulula inkinga yabantu abakhele izindawo ezisentshonalanga yeTheku, abebekhala ngongalutholi usizo emahhovisi alo mnyango asePinetown.UMnuz Nhlanhla Khumalo ophethe ezokuxhumana eMnyangweni wezemiSebenzi KwaZulu-Natal, uthe ukuxazulula izinkinga zasePinetown sebenqume ukuthi kuzojutshwa ibhasi le-UIF elingumahamba-nendlwana maduze.Abantu batshele Isolezwe  ukuthi ihhovisi lasePinetown lisebenza abantu abawu-15 kuphela ngosuku bese kuthiwa amakhompyutha a-offline (abakwazi ukuthola imininingwano ngabakuzele), kuthiwe abasele ababuye ngakusasa.Baveze ukuthi uma bebuza kumphathi wehhovisi ukuthi kungani kuhlezi kuthiwa amakhompyutha a-offline, baye batshelwe ukuthi abayobuza uNgqongqoshe, uMnuz Thulas Nxesi ngoba wonke amahhovisi oMnyango wezemiSebenzi anale nkinga.“Sikhala kwiSolezwe ngoba umphathi wehhovisi lasePinetown uthe asitshele ungqongqoshe ukuthi bahlale be-offline. Siza lapha ngoba sizobhalisela imali yethu ye-Unemployment Insurance Fund (UIF) bese kuthiwa amakhompyutha a-offline. Yisonto lesibili leli siza lapha ngoba bafike babuke amaphepha ethu bathi asibuye kusasa, amakhompyutha a-offline. NgoLwesibili, bathe asihambe siyotshela uNxesi ukuthi amakhompyutha a-offline ngoba yinkinga yawo wonke amahhovisi lena,” kusho omunye obeyofaka isicelo se-UIF.Abanye bathe ukube banemali ngabe baya kwamanye amahhovisi oMnyango wezabaSebenzi ngoba elasePinetown linabantu abangathandi ukulekelela abasebenzi.“Siyacela uNxesi angenelele ngoba umphathi wehhovisi uvele athi amakhompyutha a-offline abe esesifulathela. Asazi ukuthi amakhompyutha asengaba offline amasonto amabili?” kubuza omunye.UKhumalo uthe akusilo iqiniso ukuthi wonke amakhompyutha abo a-offline.“Uma sithole ukuthi amakhompyutha a-offline siye sithumele ithimba lethu lobuchwepheshe ukuthi liyilungise leyo nkinga. Siyacela abantu basibikele uma bengaphathekile kahle emahhovisi ethu. Bahlale bekhona abaphathi bamahhovisi, bangagcini ngokukhuluma nezinduna kuphela,” kusho uKhumalo.Uthe banazo izinambolo zabaphathi bamahhovisi kwi-website yabo, wagqugquzela abantu ukuthi bazisebenzise ukubika.

SELIDLULELA eNkantolo eNkulu icala lokusocongwa kowesifazane owaqale wadlwengulwa ngaphambi kokulahlwa kwesidumbu sakhe  ebhulohweni ngoDesemba 23, nyakenye.Lokhu kuvele izolo ngesikhathi abasolwa abane bevele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini.Abasolwa oMnuz Nkosinathi Emmanuel Ndala (23), Sphamandla Mkhulise (24), Sphamandla Thulani Bhengu (24) noTalent Mbongeni Ntanzi (21).Umufi kuthiwa wayekade ephuma endaweni yokuzijuxuza eseChesterville, iClassic Lounge ngesikhathi yena nomngani wakhe kuba khona imoto eyacela ukubagibeza.Imoto eyabathatha kuthiwa yahamba ibanga elide nabo yangabagodukisa njengoba yayithembisile.Kuthiwa yaze yama kuN2 emgwaqweni obheke KwaDukuza, okuyilapho umufi nomngani wakhe okuthiwa bashaywa base beyabadlwengulwa.Umngani kamufi yena kuthiwa wasindiswa wukuphunyuka. Namanje kuthiwa isimo sakhe asikho kahle, selokhu kwehla lesi sigameko.Umufi owayehlala eManzimtoti kuthiwa sebeqede ukumdlwengula bambulala baphosa isidumbu sakhe ngaphansi kwebhuloho. Watholakala ngakusasa ngemuva kokuba umngani wakhe ekhombise amaphoyisa lapho bevelelwe khona wumshophi.Izolo, enkantolo kuvele ukuthi leli cala selidluliselwa eNkantolo eNkulu ukuze liqale ukuqulwa. Lizobuyela enkantolo ngoJuni14.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi ngaphambilini bobane abasolwa benza isicelo sebheyili kodwa inkantolo yasichitha.UMshushi u-Advocate Govender uthe kuyinto enhle ukuthi leli cala lidluliselwe eNkantolo eNkulu.Amalungu omndeni akubo kamufi athi akufunayo nje ukuthi kube khona abajezayo ngalesi sihluku okwabulawa ngaso ilungu lawo.Ngaphambilini kwavela ukuthi unina kamufi, uNkk Nomusa Xulu isimo sakhe sibi, namanje akuvumi amukele ukuthi ingane yakhe yehlelwa yilo mshophi.

SELIDLULISELWE eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini icala lokusocongwa kwephoyisa loMkhandlu weTheku, uCaptain Thomas Zwelakhe Ntombela.Lokhu kuvezwe uMshushisi u-Advocate Lungelo Nsibande izolo ngesikhathi abasolwa abathathu kuleli cala bevele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMlaza.Umufi wahlaselwa wadutshulwa esemzini wakhe okwa-S, eMlaza ngoMeyi 3 ngonyaka owedlule.Waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela eSiphingo Medical Towers nokuyilapho okwafike kwamenela khona.Ngemuva kwalokho kwaboshwa inkabi, uSipho Ntombela okunguyena owadubula.UNtombela kwathi esevela eNkantolo yaseThekwini wageqa amagula, watshela inkantolo ukuthi uyalivuma icala.Wadalula ukuthi wayekade ethunywe yinkosikazi kamufi, uNkk Nongcebo Faith Ntombela ukuba asoconge umyeni wakhe.Ngemuva kwezinyanga ezimbalwa, uNkk Ntombela wakhalelwa ngamasongo kaSigonyela benoMnuz Sithembiso Justice Khumalo njengoba kwavela ukuthi babesebenzisana ekuhleleni itulo lokusocongwa kukamufi.UKhumalo unguthishanhloko esikoleni saKwaMaphumulo, iMpumulwane Primary.Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi kwavela negama lenkabi eyesatshwayo KwaZulu-Natal evele igwetshiwe, uKhulani Cele ukuthi nayo ibibandakanyeka kuleli cala.Bobathathu bagqigqa inkantolo, uKhumalo ungaphandle ngebheyili, uNkk Ntombela inkantolo yamnqabela ibheyili.UMshushisi izolo utshele inkantolo ukuthi konke sekumi ngomumo ukuthi leli cala selingadluliselwa eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini ukuze liqale ukuqulwa."Namhlanje ngiyaqinisekisa ukuthi leli cala sekuphothuliwe okuningi okumayelana nalo. Ngakho-ke selingadluliselwa eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini,'' usho kanje.IMantshi uNgcobo ibe seyimemezela ukuthi leli cala lidluliselwa eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini ngoJuni 13."Nobathathu nizovela eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini ngalolu suku osekuvunyelwene ngalo,'' usho kanje.UMnuz Nkosinathi Ntombela oyiwele likamufi uthe kubajabulisile ukuthi ekugcineni leli cala selize ladluliselwa eNkantolo eNkulu."Kade siwulindile lo mzuzu wokuthi leli cala lithuthe lapha eMlaza liye eThekwini. Siyathemba ukuthi azophuma wonke amaqiniso uma seliqulwa eThekwini,'' echaza.Njengenjwayelo ngaphandle kwenkantolo amalungu omphakathi abegcwele.Abameli babasolwa bobathathu bathe bagculisekile ngokuthi leli cala selingadluliselwa eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini.

BAFUNA ukuthi kungenelele uKhomishana wamaPhoyisa kwaZulu-Natal, uLieutenant General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi, noNgqongoshe wamaphoyisa, uMnuz Bheki Cele, odabeni lwephoyisa elikhala ngokuhlukunyezwa, baphinde bazama ukulidlwengula.Owesifazane (47), ongusayitsheni futhi ongathandanga kudalulwe igama lakhe ngoba ezibona engaphephile, wehlelwa yilo mshopi ngesikhathi esebenza echwebeni laseThekwini ngo-2022.Umthombo weSolezwe ongathandanga ukudalulwa uveze ukuthi leli phoyisa lalingena ekuseni ngalelo langa ngesikhathi umsolwa, ongumabhalane ophikweni lwabaseshi osebenzela eMaritime House, efika edle amponjwana.“Wayephuzile, kwakhona ofonela uzakwabo kasayitsheni ukuthi akazomthatha ayofihlwa lapho kusebenzela khona umgilwa ukuze abaphathi bakhe (umsolwa) bengamboni, wayiswa eV.I.S echwebeni laseThekwini,” kusho umthombo.Ulandise wathi yilapho lo mlisa aqala khona ukuhlukumeza lo wesifazane, embamba futhi emshaya.“Waqala wamshayisa odongeni ngesiphundu wawa phansi kwacima izibani, nalapho aqhubeka wamkhumula ijezi, wamehlisa ibhande kanye nebhulukwe. Lo wesifazane waphaphama sekukhona amaphoyisa kanye nabaqaphi abathathu kodwa abangazange bamsize ngalutho.” Uqhube wathi lo wesifazane walubika udaba kubaphathi bakhe kodwa bamshaya indiva.“Bamtshela ukuthi akaluyeke udaba ngoba uxolisile umlisa. Lo wesifazane uze washintsha indawo yokusebenzela, wayosebenzela eBayhead nokuyilapho abaphathi abambona khona ukuthi unengcindezi base bambuza ukuthi kwenzekani wabe esechaza kubo, wavula icala ngoNovemba 2022. Selokhu kwenzeka lesi sigameko umgilwa uphila ngamaphilisi okhwantalala ngenxa yokuhlukumezeka.“Udaba walubika nasenyunyaneni yamaphoyisa, iSouth African Police Union (Sapu), kodwa nakhona bamxosha bemtshela ukuthi kufanele engabe ushadile usemzini wakhe, engalokhu ezobika izinto ezingamanyala.“Njengoba icala alifaka ngoNovemba wango-2022, uze wabizwa ngoNovemba 27, 2023 ezothula ubufakazi. Ekuthuleni kwakhe ubufakazi wezwa sekuthiwa icala liphelile, umlisa lo uliwinile. Okumangazayo ukuthi akaze abizwe ngesikhathi icala liqulwa futhi  ayikho nento ebhalwe phansi eshoyo ukuthi icala selicishiwe,” kubeka lo mthombo.NgoJanuwari 2, 2024 abaphathi bacela ukuthi lo wesifazane afike nomndeni wakhe ukuze kuzoxoxwa ngalolu daba, naye umlisa axolise emndenini. Usufikile umndeni watshelwa ukuthi lo wesilisa uzoxolisa ngembuzi noma ngenkomo, baxakeka ukuthi lo mlisa lesi senzo usenziswa yini ngoba icala uliwinile.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe icala lavulwa kodwa laphinde lachithwa enkantolo.“Amaphoyisa asePhoyinti alivula icala lokuzama ukunukubeza owesifazane ngokocansi kulandela ukuthi owesilisa ezame ukudlwengula owesifazane oneminyaka engu-47 kuJonhson Lane ngoMashi 1, 2022. Icala layiswa kumshushisi omkhulu, lafika lachithwa enkantolo,” kusho u-Netshiunda.UNobhala weSapu esifundazweni, uNksz Astrid Easthorpe, uthe akakwazi ukuphawula kabanzi ngalolu daba.“Ngiyazi ngalo icala kodwa angivumelekile ukuthi ngiphawule ngalo. Usayitsheni wafika kimi washo ukuthi akaphathekile kahle ukuthi icala lisuliwe ngase ngicela ukuthi angilethele umbiko waso isigameko. Kodwa ulwazi oluningi anginalo ngoba anginayo ngisho nenombolo yalo icala ukuze silulandelele,” kusho u-Easthorpe.

LISHAYE ungqimphothwe lathi selizosifaka isicelo sebheyili isosha lombutho wezempi eNingizimu Afrika elisolwa ngokudubula libulale inkosikazi yalo emzini wabo osePinetown, eThekwini.Phambilini uMnuz Lwanda Mxolisi Zungu (37) watshela iNkantolo yeMantshi yasePinetown ukuthi uyayibonga ibheyili ngaleso sikhathi.Kushintshile ukudla epuletini ngoMsombuluko ngesikhathi uZungu, ogqunywe ezitokisini, esethi uzofaka isicelo sebheyili.Inkantolo ibe isikubekela uMashi 26 nonyaka ukulalelwa kwalesi sicelo sebheyili sikaZungu.Leli cala lidonse amehlo amaningi nabamahlelo ahlukene emphakathini okufakazelwa wukugcwala enkantolo kwabantu abasuke bezolithamela.UZungu usolwa ngokudubula amahlandla amaningi abulale inkosikazi yakhe, uTania Msane-Zungu (36), ngoJanuwari 3 nonyaka.Kuthiwa endlini kwakukhona unina kamufi, uNkk Gwen Msane, nezingane zalaba bashadikazi ababili ngesikhathi kwenzeka lesi sigameko.Le ndoda kuthiwa yagcwala izinkalo emuva kwesigameko kodwa yagcina izinikele emaphoyiseni iphelezelwa ngummeli wayo.NgoJanuwari umndeni kamufi wasola uZungu ngokuthi ungumuntu obenesandla esilula futhi esebenzisa indlakadla emshadweni wakhe. Lo mndeni wathi ufuna inkantolo imncishe ibheyili uZungu.Ngakolunye uhlangothi ilungu lomndeni kaZungu lathi ubulale inkosikazi yakhe ngoba ubekade eyisola ngokuthi iyaphinga nomuntu amaziyo.

KUBUYE ithemba kubekwa usuku okuzoqulwa ngalo icala kunina wengane eyabulawa ngokuklinywa ngentambo yesikhindi eyayisigqokile kwaboshwa uyise wayo.UNksz Nonhlanhla Sibisi, obegajwe injabulo, uthe useyabona ukuthi iyasebenza ingalo yomthetho emuva konyaka nezinyanga eziyisikhombisa kwabulawa uSfundo Sibisi (8).Izolo, iNkantolo yesiFunda yasePinetown ibeke uNovemba 27, ukuthi kuzoqala ngawo kuqulwe icala lokubulala elithweswe uMnuz Siyabonga Innocent Shezi (30).Ngenyanga eyedlule, uShezi wenqatshelwe ibheyili yinkantolo efanayo.“Ngizizwa ngikhululekile emoyeni nokuthi ingalo yomthetho imande isebenza ngempela. Amanga okushiwo ummeli kamsolwa uma ethi ingane yaziwela ngesiphongo, ngoba ubufakazi bentambo bukhona,” kusho uNksz Sibisi.Uqhube wathi uma kuwukuthi ingane yawa ngesiphongo, imiphi imizamo ayenza uShezi njengoyise wayo, ukuyihlenga?Ubuze nokuthi uShezi wayekade eyaphi nomufi ehlathini?“Ingoba wayazi ukuthi wayefuna ukwenza into yakhe ayiqede engabonwa muntu. Ingane yayiphuke nomlenze. Ingane yashaywa uyena (uShezi) futhi ngezwa ngothile amxoxela athi kuyena ngesikhathi esebona ukuthi izwela ubuhlungu, wavele wayiphumuza ngokuthi ayiklinye (yashona),” kuchaza uNksz Sibisi.Isidumbu sikamufi satholakala ehlathini eNtshongweni.Ummeli kaShezi uthe ingane yawa yashaywa itshe esiphongweni yashona.Umshushisi, uMnuz Rowen Souls, uthe uzobiza ofakazi abahlanu boMbuso uma sekuqulwa icala.USfundo ushone ngoJanuwari nyakenye. Kwaboshwa uyise ogqunywe ejele laseWestville kusukela ngaleso sikhathi.Phambilini, uNksz Sibisi wathi uShezi wabulala ingane ngoba evova yena kwazise ucu lwalungasahlangani.Khonamanjalo: Kuhlehliselwe uLwesithathu ngesonto elizayo ukwenziwa kwezindlalelo zokuqala kokuqulwa kwecala lokubulala elithweswe uConstable Lungisani Xaba (48).UXaba ubekade evele kule nkantolo izolo ngecala lokubulala unina owayephila nokukhubazeka, uNkk Greta Xaba (81) KwaDabeka, eClermont, ngoMeyi 2022.UMbuso usola ukuthi wamshaya ngeplangwe elalinezipikili waze washona ngosuku lomama lwangalowo nyaka.

AMALUNGU ekomiti lezimali ePhalamende athi azokwenza konke okusemandleni awo ukuvikela ibhange Ithala nabantu ababeka imali yabo kulo.Izolo uSihlalo waleli komiti, uDkt Joe Maswanganyi, uthe baseThekwini ukuzothola isixazululo senkinga yelayisensi yebhange Ithala.“Size lapha ukuzoqinisekisa ukuthi imali yabantu iphephile ngoba simele bona. Siyazi bakhathazekile emuva kokumiswa kwelayisensi yeThala yiFinancial Services Conduct Authority (FSCA). Ukukhathazeka kwabo kulandela ukuthi babone kuwa iVBS okwakuyibhange labantu abamnyama ngakho bakhathazekile ukuthi neThala lingase lehlelwe yisimo esifanayo. Siyabathembisa ukuthi sizokwenza konke okusemandleni ukuvikela Ithala,” kusho uMaswanganyi.Ucele abantu ukuthi bangakhathazeki ngemali yabo esebhange Ithala ngoba iphephile.UNkk Lusizo Sharon Makhubela we-ANC uthe bengamalungu ekomidi lezimali ePhalamende bazokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi imithetho iyaguquka ukuze Ithala likwazi ukusebenza.Uthe kuwumsebenzi kahulumeni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi Ithala, elinomlando omuhle wokusiza abantu basemakhaya nasemalokishini ngemali, alishabalali.Wenze isibonelo sokuthi uhulumeni ngesikhathi ehlenga iSouth African Airways ne-Eskom wathi lezi zikhungo zinkulu kakhulu ukuba zingafeyila ngakho neThala kufanele libukwe ngaleyo ndlela.UMnuz Seaparo Sekwati usole izikhungo ezishintsha umthetho wamabhange ngokucindezela Ithala ngoba belisebenza kahle kudala kodwa emuva kokushintsha kwemithetho laqala ukuba nezinkinga.UMnuz Andrew Bateman we-DA uthe ngeke bavume ukuthi Ithala, elisiza abantu abangakwazi ukuthola usizo emabhange amakhulu, lishabalale.Uthe abakutholile wukuthi ezinye zezikhalo ze-FSCA nePrudential Authority ziyalungiswa ngakho kufanele kube nendlela yokusiza Ithala ukuba lithole ilayisensi yalo.UMaswanganyi uthe bazokwenza konke okusemandleni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi Ithala libuyelwa yilayisensi yalo futhi kugudluzwe nezihibe ezingase ziliphazamise ngokuzayo.

SELIPHENYWA ngamaphoyisa udaba lokuphahlaka kwebhanoyi likaR5 eliwe nezizumbulu zabantu abakhele iVerulam, enyakatho yeTheku.UConstable Thenjiswa wamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uthe amaphoyisa aseVerulam aphenya icala lokukhwabanisa emuva kokuthi abantu akade betshale imali enkampanini ebizwa ngokuthi yiLeftover Currency bebikele amaphoyisa ukuthi abasayitholi lapho ibisebenzela khona futhi nabanikazi bayo sebenyamelele.Izindaba zokuphahlaka kweLeftover Currency zisabalale ngoMsombuluko ntambama emuva kokuthi abantu akade befake imali yabo khona bevimbezele emahhovisi ale nkampani kwaze kwafika amaphoyisa.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi abantu bebefaka uR5 onobuso bukamengameli wokuqala wentando yabantu, uNelson Mandela, bese befaka noR1 300 ngaphezulu obekuthiwa owokulekelela ukusebenza kwehhovisi. Bebethenjiswa inzalo kaR33 800 emuva kwezinsuku eziwu-32.Inzalo ibiya ngokuthi ufake hlobo luni lukaR5 njengoba bekufuneka owokugubha iminyaka ewu-90 kuphila uMandela nabanye baleyo minyaka.NgoLwesithathu abantu bebesaqhubeka nokuthutheleka kuleli hhovisi elisenkabeni yeVerulam njengoba benethemba lokuthi lisazovulwa.Abanye bathi sengathi basephusheni elibi abasovuswa kulona njengoba bebelindele izizumbulu zikaR700 000, R1million nezinye izimali.Okwamanje akekho oseboshiwe ngalesi sigameko njengoba amaphoyisa esaphenya ngaleli bhanoyi ebeliphethwe ngowesilisa ozibiza ngoBrian Mkhize nozakwabo obebizwa ngoDlamini.UNksz Ntombikhona Dlamini waKwaSimamane, eNdwedwe, uthe baqale ukuzwa ngeLeftover Currency ngo-Agasti wonyaka odlule ngesikhathi benikwa amaphepha achaza ngale nkampani uma beyothenga eVerulam.Uthe baye batshala imali kule nkampani ngoba bebona sengathi isemthethweni njengoba bekulenga isitifiketi esitholakala ezinkampanini zangempela esinombhalo weSouth African Revenue Service (Sars).

KUGQUGQUZELWA abantu baseNingizimu Afrika ukuba balungise imininingwane yabo njengoba selivuliwe iwindi lokuqoqa intela yalo nyaka.UKhomishana weSouth African Revenue Service (Sars), uMnuz Edward Kieswetter, uthe basebenzisa izindlela ezihlukene ukuqoqa intela okubalwa ukuvakashela emagatsheni abo, ukufaka imininingwane online nangokulungiselela abantu imininingwane yabo yentela bengenzanga lutho. Uveze ukuthi bangaphezu kuka-5 million abantu abenzelwe i-automatic assessment.Imali esibuyiselwe kubantu iwu-R10 billion kanti imvamisa abantu babuyelwa wuR5 900.“Kubalulekile ukuthi abantu bafake intela yabo, balungise imininingwane yabo. Sizoqinisekisa ukuthi siyabasiza ngokushesha emagatsheni ethu, siyabagqugquzela ukuthi bafake imininingwane online ngezinhlelo zethu zobuchwepheshe ezihlukene.
