Siyayenza i-automatic assessment kodwa abanye abantu kufanele bazifakele bona imininingwane yabo,” kusho uKieswetter.Uthe ngonyaka odlule bakwazile ukugwema ukuthi uR100 billion uqolwe ngabantu akade bezobuyelwa yimali ngendlela engafanele.Kusukela ngoMsombuluko bangaphezu kuka-191 000 abantu abafake imininingwane yabo yentela, abawu-183 000 bazifake ngamakhompyutha kanti abawu-7 700 bebesebenzisa iMobiApp.Uveze ukuthi baphendule izinkulumo eziwu-16 million online, wathi abantu kufanele bangene kwiwebsite yakwaSars ukuze basizakale.Ngaphambi kokuya egatsheni lakwaSars, uKieswetter uthe abantu abavakashele ikhasi elithi www.secure.sarsefiling.co.za badownloade i-app yakwaSars ku-Google Play noma Apple Stores. Bangashayela no *134*7277# bayakwazi nokuthumela uWhatsApp ku- 0800 11 7277 noma bangene ku-www.sars.gov.zaUnxuse abaqashi ukuthi bayeke ukuthumela abantu abasuke besafuna umsebenzi ukuba bayocela itax number emahhovisi akwaSars, wathi ngabaqashi okufanele benze lokhu.

SESENYUKELE kwabayisikhombisa isibalo sabadlule emhlabeni belekelela ukucima umlilo wamadlelo, okwenzeke eMpophomeni kuMasipala Umngeni, emasontweni amabili adlule.UMnuz Vusi Dlamini ongomunye wabebelimele kanzima ngesikhathi bezama ukubhula umlilo, kuthiwa udlule emhlabenii ngoLwesihlanu emva kokuthi esehlale isikhathi esingangesonto egunjini labalimele kakhulu, eshe kanzima.Ilungu lomphakathi elicele ukuthi igama lalo ligodlwe, lithe izindaba zokudlula emhlabeni kukaDlamini zifinyelele kubona besemngcwabeni kazakwabo naye oshone kule ngozi.“Ubewuntu olungile, ezithulela futhi ethanda umndeni wakhe.  Ubesesebenzele inkampani kasonkontileka iFarmusa iminyaka eminingi ngokumazi kwami, kanti ngendlela ayelimele ngayo ngokuzwa kwethu, bekukubi kakhulu,” usho kanje.Ukudlula emhlabeni kukaDlamini kwenze safinyelela kwabawu-15 isibalo sabafe ezigamekweni zomlilo obonakale kulesi sifundazwe emasontweni adlule, kubalwa noNksz Nomthandazo Dawodi (30) obezithwele, oshone kungqongqa inqwaba yemijondolo eKenville, eThekwini emasontweni amabili adlule.Kuthiwa abayisithupha abashone becima umlilo abasebenzela usonkontileka elekelela inkampani i-Sappi ngomsebenzi wamahlathi, iFarmusa Agric and Forestry,  okungoNksz Ntombikhona Nxele, Nonsikelelo Zuma,  Khethiwe Ngcobo, Ntombifuthi Ngcobo, Mabongi Shishane noMnuz Vusi Radula bafihlwe ngempelasonto, kanti uDlamini angase afihlwe kuleli sonto.Imizamo yokuthola abomndeni wakhe ayiphumelelanga njengoba izingcingo ezedluliselwe entathelini bezivaliwe kwaze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela.I-Farmusa kuthiwa idlulisele emindenini yabalahlekelwe usizo ngokubambisana nenkampani yakwa-Sappi, umasipala neminyango kahulumeni.Ngesikhathi evakashele kule ndawo ngesonto eledlule, uNgqongqoshe wokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu uMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa, uthe kusanemininingwane esalinde ukuhlanganiswa nombiko mayelana nezigameko zomlilo wequbula ohlasele izingxenye zesifundazwe, okuzoba wumkhombandlela ekutheni umengameli uyasimemezela yini  njengenhlekelele lesi simo esehlele umphakathi ezindaweni ezithintekile.  Kuthiwa ulinganiselwa ku-R90 million umonakalo odalwe yilesi simo.

UMASIPALA waseThekwini uthi umphakathi usungaqala uwukhiphe udoti kulandela ukuthi kade uthe awume ukuwukhipha noma uzilahlele wona ezikhungweni olahlwa kuzo.Imeya yalo masipala uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda isho lokhu ohlelweni lwayo lokwazisa umphakathi ngezinto ezenzeka kulo masipala oluba kwesinye seziteshi zomsakazo ngoLwesibili.Uthe ngoMsombuluko kukhona imiphakathi ewukhiphile udoti kodwa wangalandwa, wathembisa ukuthi uzolandwa izolo."Umphakathi besiwucelile ukuthi uma ungakwazi, ungazihambisela udoti ezikhungweni olahlwa kuzo, singawukhokhisi ngoba uma uyozilahlela udoti uyakhokha ngokujwayelekile," kusho uKaunda.Isitatimende esithunyelwe umasipala, izolo sithe uphiko lukagesi lwenza konke okusemandleni ukubhekana nokusilela emuva ekulungisweni kukagesi."Sigxile ekubuyiseleni ugesi kumakhasimende asenezinsuku eziningi engenawo ugesi, kodwa-ke amaphutha kagesi asanda kufakwa nawo siyawabhekwa," kusho isitatimende.UKaunda uthe ukucisha kukagesi kwezinye izindawo kudalwe izinkinga zawo, kodwa okunye kwenziwe ngamabomu njengoba bekunesiteleka sabasebenzi abangaphansi kwe-SA Municipal Workers Union (SAMWU)."Sicela umphakathi usebenzisane nathi ngokuthi unciphise imibhikisho enodlame, ehlanganisa ukuvalwa kwemigwaqo, okubambezela  abasebenzi uma beyolungisa inkinga yamanzi nogesi ezindaweni ezingenawo,"  kusho uKaunda.Uthe ezindaweni ezifana naseDube Village, KwaMashu, eLindelani ugesi ubuyile ngempelasonto kodwa zikhona izindawo ongakalungiswa kuzo ezifana naKwaMakhutha nezinye eziseningizimu. Khonamanjalo, inhloko yophiko lukagesi kulo masipala uMnuz Maxwell Mthembu, inikwe incwadi yokuthi isizomiswa emsebenzini ngenxa yokwehluleka kwakhe ukuxosha abasebenzi bophiko lwakhe ababambe iqhaza esitelekeni esingavikelekile. Umasipala usuxoshe abasebenzi abangaphezu kuka-81 abebesesitelekeni  kanti abanye abangu-88 bamisiwe, basazothamela izigcawu zokuqondiswa kwezigwegwe.UNkk Gugu Sisilana okhulumela umasipala, uthe umasipala awuzikhulumi izindaba ezithinta abasebenzi nabezindaba.

LINGASE liphele isonto elizayo isiqokiwe imeya yomasipala waseThekwini njengoba i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal ithi uzobizwa “maduze” umhlangano wokuqoka ozongena kule sikhundla esivuleke emva kokususwa kukaMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda.Kulindeleke ukuthi kube nezingxoxo zokugcina kule mpelasonto.Uma amaqembu evumelana, kulindeleke ukuthi kubizwe umhlangano womkhandlu oyisipesheli ngesonto elizayo, ozokhetha imeya.ITheku lisale lingenayo imeya ngenyanga eyedlule emva kokususwa kukaKaunda, osejutshwe eMkhandlwini weziFundazwe.Ukuqokwa kwemeya entsha kwabhuntsha emhlanganweni womkhandlu owawungenyanga eyedlule.Yize uSomlomo womkhandlu, uMnuz Thabani Nyawose, athi ukukhethwa kwemeya kwabhuntshiswa wukungabi bikho kwenhlangano eyengamele ukhetho, i-Electoral Commission of South Africa (IEC), imithombo yaveza ukuthi ukungavumelani kwamakhansela e-ANC ngozongena esikhundleni yikhona okwenza ukuthi imeya igcine ingakhethwanga.Igama elihamba phambili elaloyo owayephathiswe uMnyango wezoLimo, uMnuz Cyril Xaba.Umthombo uthe uma izingxoxo zingahamba kahle, umhlangano wokukhetha imeya uzokuba ngesonto elizayo.“Kubukeka sengathi kukhona ukuvumelana, sekushoda ukuthi kuqinisekiswe yonke into. Izingxoxo zokugcina zizokuba kuyo le mpelasonto. Lokho kusho ukuthi uma kuvunyelwene ngayo yonke into, umhlangano womkhandlu uzokuba ngesonto elizayo. Ngeke kulindwe umhlangano womkhandlu owejwayelekile ngoba usekude (umhlangano womkhandlu owajwayelekile uba sekupheleni kwenyanga). Umasipala omkhulu kangaka ngeke uhlale isikhathi eside kangaka ungenayo imeya.”Okhulumela i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mafika Mndebele, uvumile ukuthi umhlangano wokuqoka imeya uzobizwa maduze kodwa wanqaba ukusho usuku.“Thina lapha kwi-ANC asisebenzi kanjalo. Thina sifike senze izinhlelo zethu zangaphakathi kwi-ANC, bese siyekela abaholi esibajube kuhulumeni ukuba baqhubeke nomsebenzi. Yingakho kungeke kube yithina esimemezela umhlangano womkhandlu waseThekwini, sishiyela ebuholini bomkhandlu ukuthi kube ibona obumemezela umhlangano. Engikwaziyo nje ukuthi umhlangano uzobizwa maduze.”UMndebele uthe ngokwabo sebekulungele ukuhlala komhlangano.“Sesiphothule yonke into, sesilinde ukuthi kubizwe umhlangano.”Ngakolunye uhlangothi, uNyawose utshele iphephandaba elinguzakwano weSolezwe, iThe Mercury, ukuthi bebengakanqumi ukuthi umhlangano uzokuba nini.“Asikho isimemezelo somhlangano esesiphumile. Sizokwenza isimemezelo uma sesinqumile ukuthi umhlangano uzokuba nini.”I-ANC ayinazo izihlalo ezanele ukuthi ibuse ngokuzimela eThekwini, ibambisane namaqembu amancane.Akucaci noma isizosebenzisana yini ne-IFP neDA kumasipala njengoba la maqembu esebambisene kuzwelonke nasesifundazweni.

SEZIFAKWE ngokusemthethweni ohlelweni lokufundisa izifundo zobuchwepheshe bamakhompyutha iCoding neRobotics.Lezi zifundo zifakwe ngokusemthethweni emqulwini kahulumeni iGovernement Gazette, muva nje.Zizofundiswa kusuka kaGrade R kuya kuaGrade 9 kanti seziyingxenye yeCurriculum Assessment Policy Statements (CAPS), okuwuhlelo okufundwa ngalo ezikoleni zakuleli.UMnyango weMfundo eyisiSekelo waqala ukuhlola ukufundwa kwalezi zifundo kwaGrade R kuya kwaGrade 3, ngo-2021 ezikoleni ezingaphezu kuka-2 000.UNgqongqoshe walo mnyango uNkk Angie Motshekga, wathi bafuna abafundi bakuleli bafunde izinto ezihambisana nesikhathi wathi yingakho befaka izifundo ezintsha.Wathi lezi zifundo zibandakanya ukwakha izinto ezifana namarobhothi, nokufunda ngezinto ezithinta amakhompyutha.KwaGrade R kuya kwaGrade 3, lezi zifundo zizokwenziwa neMaths, kuthi kwaGrade 4 kuya ku-9, zenziwe neMaths, Natural Sciences neTechnology.Emazingeni aphansi kwaGrade R kuya ku-3, abafundi bazofundiswa ngezinto ezisetshenziswayo uma kwakhiwa amarobhothi.Kwezithinta amakhompyutha bazofundiswa ukuhlwaya ulwazi kwi-internet. KwaGrade 4 kuya ku-6, bazofundiswa ukusebenzisa i-internet, izinto ezithinta ukuntshontsha ulwazi lomunye ulwenze olwakho.KwaGrade7 kuya kuGrade 9, abafundi bazofundiswa amakhono okwakha ama-website nokunye. UNkk Motshekga waveza ukuthi baqeqeshe abaluleka ngalezi zifundo bahlinzeka ngezinsiza zokufunda nokufundisa kulezi zifundo.Okhulumela umnyango uMnuz Elijah Mhlanga, uveze ukuthi baqale nezinye izifundo ezintsha ezifana neMarine Sciences, Technical Science, Technical Mathematics nezinye.Uthe baziqala ngoba zidingwa ngumnotho wakuleli.“Ukushintsha kwezinto kwenza ukuthi senzise izifundo ezintsha ezikoleni ukuze zihambisane nesikhathi. Siqala nezinye ezithinta amabhizinisi nezinye ezikoleni zamabanga aphezulu,” kusho uMhlanga.

UMENGAMELI Cyril Ramaphosa usesungule ithimba eliyisipesheli, elizoxazulula izinkinga zikaMasipala weTheku nechweba laleli dolobha.Lezi zindaba uzimemezele ngoLwesine, emcimbini wokuvula ngokusemthethweni inkampani ezothutha impahla esuka ezitimeleni iye emkhunjini iNewlyn Park Terminal, eseduze kwechweba eThekwini.“Ngisungule ithimba elibizwa ngeThekwini Presidential Working Group,  elizobheka ukuthi uMasipala weTheku usebenza ngendlela efanele. Lizobuye liqinisekise ukuthi izinto zihamba kahle echwebeni laseThekwini. Sifuna ukubuyisela ichweba leTheku esicongweni ngoba yilona ebelihamba phambili e-Afrika. Sifuna libuyele lapho. Leli thimba kufanele lethule umbiko ngomsebenzi walo njalo emva kwamasonto amathathu,” kusho uRamaphosa.Uncome umnikazi weNewlyn Park Terminal, uMnuz Raj Balmakhun, ngokufeza isithembiso asenza ngo-2019 sokutshala uR3.4billion.Uthe baningi ababezitshela ukuthi ngeke sifezeke kodwa sifezeke phambi kwabo.“Okwenzeka lapha kuwubufakazi bokuthi uma uhulumeni esebenzisana nosomabhizinisi, izinyunyana nomphakathi wonkana kuningi, okuhle okungafezeka. INewlyn idale amathuba omsebenzi awu-4 013 ngesikhathi yakhiwa nawu-1 000 njengoba seyiphelile,” kusho uRamaphosa.Ugqugquzele osomabhizinisi nabantu bonke baseNingizimu Afrika ukuba bangalilahli ithemba ngoba abaziyekelelanga yize iKwaZulu-Natal yakhinyabezwa yiCovid-19, izibhelu nezikhukhula.Usuke eNewlyn wanikela efemini yakwaTetra Pak, ePinetown, enwetshwe ngoR500 million.UNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube, uthe ukuvulwa kweNewlyn kusho ukuphela kwesiminyaminya njengoba amakhonteyna ezosuka echwebeni angene ezitimeleni.Uthe kuyimanje sesiphelile isiminyaminya samakhonteyna echwebeni .“Ichweba laseThekwini lisazoba matasa kakhulu ngoba manje kuza imishini emisha yokuqubula amakhonteyna. Impahla eningi izohamba ngezitimela ngakho osomabhizinisi bazobona ukuthi umsebenzi uyashesha echwebeni laseThekwini,” kusho uNkk Dube-Ncube.UBalmakhun uthe usazodala inqwaba yemisebenzi ngezinhlelo ezehlukene zokuthuthukisa umnotho nengqalasizinda eduze kwamachweba.Uveze ukuthi wakhulela emakethe yezithelo nemifino eThekwini, lapho umndeni wakhe wawudayisa imifino eyayithwalwa yisitimela isuka emapulazini.Uthe lokhu kwamkhombisa ukuthi ukusebenza kahle kwezitimela kubalulekile kwezomnotho.Phakathi kwezinhlelo zokuthuthukisa ingqalasizinda zeNewlyn kubalwa olwegesi oluzoletha ugesi owu-30MW Richards Bay, olokuphehla ugesi welanga kuzo zonke izikhungo zaseNewlyn.Olokuthuthukisa i-terminal ye-manganese echwebeni laseNgqura, olwe-terminal ye-iron ore eSaldanha nezinye.

IKHOMISHINI yezokhetho kuleli i-Independent Electoral Commission (IEC), ithi ikulindele ukuthi kube khona abazokhononda ngokuthi ukhetho belungakhululekile.Ngokusho kwekhomishini kujwayelekile ukuthi kukhalaze abasuke bekhale ngaphansi okhethweni.UMnuz Masego Sheburi isikhulu sekhomishini, uthe njengoba sanda isibalo samaqembu angenela ukhetho, kugcina ngokuthi kukhethwe ambalwa azoya ePhalamende, naseziShayamthetho.Echaza uSheburi ubeke kanje:“Okhethweni lwango-1999 angu-26 amaqembu angenela ukhetho. Njalo uma kunokhetho siyanda isibalo samaqembu angenela ukhetho kodwa ambalwa avotelwayo. Manje angu-370 abhalisele ukhetho kodwa uthola ukuthi angu-13 avotelwayo, okwenza abasuke bekhale ngaphansi bese bekhononda ngokuthi ukhetho belungakhululekile ngoba amaqembu abebewafuna engaphumelelanga.” Uthe sebelulungele ukhetho wathi zingaphezu kuka-23 000 iziteshi zokuvota. USheburi uveze nokuthi kuneziteshi ezingomahamba nendlwana abazisebenzisa okwesikhashana.Ubalule nokuthi abasuke bemele amaqembu ezikhungweni zokuvota basheshe bahambe uma bebona ukuthi izinto azihambi kahle.“Uma sekuvotiwe, isikhungo siyavalwa bese siqala ukubala. Alikho iphepha eliphuma esikhungweni sokuvota lingabaliwe. Kodwa uthola ukuthi iqembu eliwinayo kugcina sekuba yilona elisayina ukugunyaza imiphumela yalesi sikhungo, amanye engasabonwa.”

LISHENXISIWE icala lokudlwengula inkosazana ebelethweswe isethenjwa somholi wamaNazaretha, iNkosi Mduduzi Shembe uNyazilwezulu, ngenxa yokushoda kobufakazi obanele bokusishushisa.UMnuz Xolani “Maliyavuza” Zungu owaboshwa ngecala lokudlwengula inkosazana ukhishwe phambili yinkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini, izolo. Ubethweswe icala lokudlwengula inkosazana okuvele kamuva ukuthi bekuyintombi yakhe.Ummeli kaZungu, uMnuz Ayanda Khanyile we-Ayanda Khanyile Attorneys, uthe ukuhoxa kwecala kufakazela khona ukuthi uZungu ubeboshelwa amanqina enyathi ngalo.“Leli cala belivele lingekho kwasekuqaleni. Umshushisi ufike enkantolo wakhuluma into engabambeki, washo nokuthi ingxoxo obekumele ibekhona phakathi komphenyi wecala nommangali ayibange isabakhona. Ngolwazi lwami nobufakazi enginabo, ingxoxo ibekhona kodwa usaba ukuthi ummangali akasambophi uZungu ngoba nasekuqaleni wayevele esetshenziswa ukuthi amvulele leli cala. Njengamanje sithatha isinqumo sokubopha uMbuso ngokudicilela phansi isithunzi sikaZungu,” kusho ummeli uKhanyile.Njengoba uZungu ebehamba leli cala bekunemiyalezo athe yayithunyelwe uyena ummangali, kuyena eveza ukuthi kukhona ababemsebenzisa ukuthi amvulele icala ngoba befuna ukumgudluza eduze koNyazilwezulu. Kukhona nalapho lo wesifazane ayesecela khona uZungu ukuthi babaleke naye ngoba akasafuni nokuhlala ekhaya ngoba nomndeni wakhe uhambisana nabathi akaboshwe. Yonke le miyalezo ebinikwe umshushisi kwakuvele ukuthi isayohlolwa ubuqiniso bayo kuphinde kuxoxwe nommangali. Bekuvele kuhlelwe usuku lwayizolo ukuthi icala libuyele enkantolo sekuxoxiwe naye ummangali kwase kuvela ukuthi akuxoxiwe naye, kwahoxa icala.UZungu oseke wasinda edutshulwa okusolakala ukuthi lesi sigameko seyamene naleli cala lokudlwengula abethweswe lona, uthe ubonga amandla oNyazilwezulu ngokuphela kwecala.“Ngijabule kakhulu ngokwenzekile ngoba belivele lingekho leli cala. Ngiyabonga ngamandla kababa uNyazilwezulu ukungiphephisa,” kusho uZungu.UZungu ungomunye wezethenjwa zoNyazilwezulu owaziwa ngokuhamba phambi kwezimoto zalo mholi uma kunemihlangano emikhulu yamaNazaretha. Kuthiwa uyena oqinisekisa nokuphepha kwalo mholi uma kunabantu abaningi lapho ekhona. Kuthiwa ubeboshelwe itulo ngenxa yezinsolo zokuthi uyena obevimbe ukuthi kuqhubeke umsebenzi wokwakhiwa kwamadokodo eBuhleni. Lokhu kwenzeka emva kokuba umholi uNyazilwezulu emise ukwakhiwa kwawo emva koxhaso lukaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa luka-R18 million wokwakha amadokodo.Kuvela ukuthi kunezethenjwa zoNyazilwezulu ezisebenzisana nezikhulu zepolitiki ukuze zihlomule kulo R18 million, nezagcina zisola yena uZungu ukuthi uvimbile.UZungu usalokhu emile ekutheni yena akangene ezintweni ezithinta amathenda futhi wayengeke avimbe ukwakhiwa kwamadokodo aseBuhleni.Ngesikhathi esinda esigamekweni sokudutshulwa bekuputshuke izwi lowesifazane ezihlangula ukuba yingxenye yokubulawa kukaZungu, ayethi kuhlelwa ngabathile ebandleni lamaNazaretha. Kuthiwa kwakunqunywe ukuthi ungafiki uJulayi 12, engabulewe ngoba kwakuyiwona azovela ngawo enkantolo. Kuthiwa okwakwenza kuthiwe akasheshe asocongwe lungakafiki usuku lwecala yingoba bese kuzwakele ukuthi ummangali akazimisele ukuqhubeka nokumbophisa njengoba kwakuhleliwe.

SICHITHWE nezindleko isicelo esiphuthumayo samalungu eqembu Umkhonto weSizwe, axoshwe ePhalamende yileli qembu.La malungu angu-10 aya enkantolo enkulu yaseWestern Cape, efuna kumiswe ukufungiswa kwamalungu amasha ezikhundleni zawo.Abefuna kubuyekezwe nendlela axoshwe ngayo kuleli qembu njengoba athola izincwadi ezivela ePhalamende, ziwazisa ngokuthi buhoxisiwe ubulungu bawo yi-MK.Esinqumweni esikhishwe yinkantolo ngoMsombuluko, kuvele ukuthi isicelo esiphuthumayo sala malungu sichithwe nezindleko.La malungu ayekhale ngokuthi uma echithwa kuzodingeka aphume ezindlini zePhalamende lapho eqube khona.Abekhala ngokuthi awazange anikwe izizathu zokuhoxiswa kobulungu bawo.Asola umholi waleli qembu, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, ngokuba undlovukayiphikiswa ngokumane awaxoshe noma yikanjani kungazange kuhlale ngisho isigcawu sokuqondisa kwawo ubugwegwe.Phambilini, uZuma ubelokhu ekuveza ukuthi bazolokhu bebahosha labo abangafanele ukuba sePhalamende.Leli qembu lakuveza ukuthi la malungu ayazisiwe ngesikhathi sokufungiswa ukuthi asazosuswa ezikhundleni ngoba kukhona abangena ngomkhoshosho ohlwini lwabantu ababezojutshwa yileli qembu ePhalamende.Esewonke amalungu axoshwa yi-MK ePhalamende angu-18.

SICHITHIWE isicelo sobengusomlomo wePhalamende, uNkk Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula, sokuthi umnyango wakhe ukhokhele izindleko zabameli emacaleni abhekene nawo.UMapisa-Nqakula uthweswe amacala awu-12 athinta inkohlakalo nokushushumbisa imali.Ubuye asolwe ngokwamukela intshontsho komunye wosonkontileka owayethole ithenda eMnyangweni wezokuVikela ngesikhathi esangungqongqoshe kulo mnyango.Ungaphandle ngebheyili ka-R50 000 ayinikwa yinkantolo yasePitoli, icala lakhe lahlehliselwa uJuni 4.Ekuqaleni kuka-Ephreli, usule njengosomlomo wePhalamende.Ngenyanga edlule, uNgqongqoshe wezokuVikela uNkk Thandi Modise, wathi usacabanga ngesicelo sokuthi umnyango wakhe ukhokhele izindleko zabameli emacaleni abhekene nawo.Wathi uzolandela umthetho ngenhloso yokuvikela imali yabakhokhi bentela.Ekhuluma esithangamini nabezindaba ngeSonto emini, uModise, uthe balubhekile udaba base bebheka umthetho ukuthi bangasivuma yini isicelo.“Asikwazi ukusiza owayengungqongqoshe, ngakho ngeke size simsize,” kusho uNkk Modise.

SICHITHWE nezindleko isicelo sokukhipha umholi wamaNazaretha, inkosi Mduduzi ‘Unyazilwezulu’ Shembe ebesifakwe wumholi webandla lakwaShembe owavunwa yinkantolo ukuhola ibandla, inkosi Phinda ‘Ukukhanyakwelanga’ Shembe.Inkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini ikhiphe lesi sinqumo ebese sinesikhathi silindiwe.Ummeli woKukhanyakwelanga, uMnuz Trevor Nkosi uthe azikho izizathu ezibambekayo ngokuchithwa kwesicelo sabo enkantolo.“Kuvele kwathiwa isicelo sethu siyachithwa kwangakhishwa zizathu ukuthi kungani sichithwa. Kuthiwe zombili izinhlangothi zizozikhokhela zona izindleko zecala, kwaphela kanjalo,” kusho uNkosi.Uthe noma bengakazitholi izizathu zokuchithwa kwesicelo sabo, basezinhlelweni zokufaka isicelo sokubuyekezwa kwalesi sinqumo.Umthombo waleli phephandaba, uthe kuyaxaka okweziwe yinkantolo.“Wonke umuntu usele nemibuzo ngoba akekho obelindele isinqumo salolu hlobo. Ngeke uwine icala kuzona zonke izinkantolo zaseNingizimu Afrika ukuthi uwena umholi ofanele bese kuchithwa isicelo sakho sokuthi inkantolo igudluze umuntu ohleli esihlalweni sakho ngokungemthetho. Kuyacaca nje ukuthi lesi sinqumo senziwe okwesikhashana kuze kube kudlula ukhetho laseNingizimu Afrika olungoMeyi ngoba abaholi basabheke ivoti kumaNazaretha. Kwakhona ukuthi zingabikhona izizathu kuyinkomba yokuthi kukhona okushaya amanzi. Nokuthi isinqumo sidonse kanje ukuthi sikhishwe bekuyizinkomba zakho ukuthi kunemizamo yokusibambezela,” kusho umthombo.Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kokhulumela umholi wamaNazaretha Ukukhanyakwelanga, uMnuz Chance Sibisi ayiphumelelanga. Ucingo lwakhe belukhala lungabanjwa. Eselubamba akaphendulanga kodwa bekuzwakala abantu bekhuluma eceleni ukuthi basemhlanganweni oshubile.Okhulumela uNyazilwezulu, uMnuz Thokozani Mncwabe uthe babonga amandla oNyazilwezulu ngalesi sinqumo.“Inkosi uNyazi lugile izimanga njengoba engekho obezitshela ukuthi kuzophuma isinqumo salolu hlobo. Lokhu kuyinjabulo enkulu kuthina njengamaNazaretha ngaphansi kobuholi boNyazilwezulu. Lesi sinqumo siqondane kahle nokuthi kule nyanga yisikhumbuzo senkosi Inyangayezulu, esizongena maduze nje,” kusho uMncwabe.

UKUNGAGEZI izinsuku ezintathu kwabesifazane, abanye bengakwazi ukushintsha amaqakelo, bengakwazi ukuncelisa izingane ezincela amabhodlela, indlala nokuququdwa amakhaza, ngezinye zezinto abavaleleke emigwaqeni ewuthelawayeka u-N3  no-N11 phakathi kweFree State neKwaZulu-Natal, abayoyixoxela amagwababa ecobana.Lishone elangeSonto lesi simo singakalungiseki kanti sekuqinisekiswe nokuthi kushone nabantu ababili okuthiwa baququdwe ngamakhaza kulesi simo. Lokhu kuvezwe oyibamba likaNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Thembeni Madlopha-Mthethwa, esithangamini sabezindaba eMgungundlovu. UNkk Madlopha-Mthethwa uthe omunye wabafi ushonele kwenye yezimoto ebezivalelekile kule ndawo ngesikhathi owesibili ongowesifazane, evele waquleka ngesikhathi itekisi abehamba ngayo ingena ezitolo eMerrivale eHowick.“Imibiko esiyitholile ithi uvele wawa. Uphuthunyiswe esibhedlela, endleleni kwabonakala ukuthi isimo sakhe siya ngokuya siba sibi. Kuvela ukuthi uhlonzwe njengoseshonile ngesikhathi efika esibhedlela,” kusho uNkk Madlopha-Mthethwa.Uthe bobabili babulawe ukuzwela amakhaza kakhulu.Ubuye waveza nokuthi zingu-1 823 seziphelele izimoto ebezivaleleke ku-N3 kusukela ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku.Kuzona wathi bekukhona namabhasi amabili abethwele izingane zesikole saseQwaqwa eFree State, iQwabi Primary ebezibuya ohambweni lwaseThekwini.“Nazo ziseqhulwini ekutheni siqinisekise ukuthi ziyaluthola usizo eziludingayo,” kusho yena.Uveze ukuthi phakathi komasipala abakhahlamezekile kukhona uThukela, athe yilo olukhahlamezeke kakhulu, kube Amajuba, Harry Gwala noMgungundlovu.Uthe babophele amathimba ehlukene ukuyonikezela ngosizo; kuwona kukhona i-South African Police Service (SAPS), South African National Defence Force (SANDF) abalekelela ngokutakula abantu ezimotweni, babayise emahholo ahlonzelwe ukuthi abagcine.Uthe uMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi ngokubambisana ne-South African Social Security Agency (SASSA) banikezela ngosizo lokudla okufudumele, izingubo zokwembatha, olokwelulekwa ngokomqondo nolokubhalisa bonke abakhahlamezekile.Uveze nokuthi noMphathiswa woMnyango wezokuThutha, uMnuz Siboniso Duma ngokubambisana neSANRAL, RTI, N3TC, RTMC bakhona emgwaqweni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi usizo lokukhucululwa komgwaqo luyaqhubeka masinyane.UMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu, oholwa uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi, yiwo osingethe wonke umsebenzi wokutakula njengoba kwaziwa ukuthi izinhlekelele zingaphansi kwawo.Phakathi kwezinye izinhlangano ezizimele ezinikele kulo mgwaqo ukuyosiza, kube yi-Gift of the Givers, Red Cross, me-Al Imdaad Foundation.“Ngesikhathi siqala umsebenzi wokutakula obekuseqhulwini ukuthi kusize abantu ebebebhajwe ezimotweni kuqala, bathathwe bayonikwa usizo,” kusho uNkk Madlopha-Mthethwa.Uthe no-Eskom wenza konke okusemandleni ukubuyisa ugesi ezindaweni ezikhahlamezwe yiqhwa. Ebala imigwaqo esavuliwe nesavaliwe, wexwayise abasuka eGoli abeza eThekwini ukuthi bangalokothi bahambe ngo-N3, wathi okungenani abahambe ngasePiet Retief, bagudle ngoPongolo.Uthe imigwaqo esivuliwe uthe u-N11 phakathi koMnambithi neNewcastle, N11 Amajuba Pass, R33 phakathi kweVryheid neDundee, R34 phakathi kweNewcastle neBloodriver/Vryheid, R33 phakathi kweVryheid nePaulpietersburg, R34 phakathi kweVryheid neMelmoth, R69 phakathi kweVryheid nePongola, N2 phakathi kweRichards Bay nePiet Retief.Uthe wonke u-R34 phakathi kweNewcastle neMemel usavaliwe.Wethembise ukuthi namuhla isimo sizoba ngcono kakhulu, wathi bazohambela amahholo lapho okubekwe khona abatakuliwe.

UMENGAMELI wezwe, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa, uthe izigebengu zizophelelwa ngamahlathi kuleli ngoba ngeke besazibekezelela. URamaphosa ukhulume kanje ngesikhathi uMasipala waseCape Town nohulumeni waseWestern Cape besayina isivumelwano sokwandisa isibalo samaphoyisa ukulwa nobugebengu kulesi sifundazwe. URamaphosa uthe abantu bakuleli bakhathele ukuhamba bethuka izanya ngenxa yezigebengu ezigcweleza umphakathi. Uthe lesi sivumelwano siqinisekisa ukuthi ubugebengu sebumi emphinjeni ebantwini baseNingizimu Afrika.URamaphosa uthe inhlanzi izoshelwa ngamanzi kwi-construction mafia ngoba osomabhizinisi sebekhathele ukuhlukunyezwa. “Amaphoyisa ezingeni likazwelonke asembhidlangweni wokwenza imigwaqo iphephe.” Esephetha uthe baqhamuke namaqhinga ezobuchwepheshe abangangabazi ukuthi azosiza nasekutheni kuhlakazwe nobugebengu obusahlelwa.

UNIKWE umsebenzi wokubumba izinhlaka zeqembu Umkhonto weSizwe (MK), ukusungulwa kophiko lwentsha nolwabesifazane, ukwakha imigomo yeqembu aphinde aqaphe ukusebenza kwabajutshelwe ePhalamende naseziShayamthetho obeyiphini likamengameli kwi-EFF uMnuz Floyd Shivambu.UShivambu umenyezelwe njengoMgqugquzeli kaZwelonke kwi-MK esithangamini sabezindaba ebesihanjelwe wuMengameli waleli qembu, uMnuz Jacob Zuma.Kulesi sithangami ebesiseSandton, eGauteng, kumenyezelwe abaholi abaphezulu baleli qembu abayisishiyagalombili.UShivambu oshiye kwi-EFF muva nje, bekubhekwe ngabomvu isikhundla abezonikwa sona kwi-MK njengoba eshiye iqembu alisungula noMnuz Julius Malema.UMalema ukhale ngokushiywa nguShivambu wamfanisa nomuntu ojikele umzabalazo.UShivambu uthe akazange ajikele umzabalazo kodwa usemkhankasweni wokwakha iqembu elizofukula abamnyama.“Ngeke sixolise ngomsebenzi esiwenzayo ngoba yinto esibizelwe kuyona. Ngijoyine i-MK ngoba ngifuna ukusebenza abantu bakuleli. Sizobumba abantu asizile ukuzoncengana,” kusho uShivambu.Uthe noma bangamsusa kulesi sikhundla kodwa uzoqhubeka nokuba yilungu.“Uma ngisuswa ekubeni yilungu leqembu, ngizoqhubeka nokuba ivolontiya. Ngizofaka izingqwembe noma kuthiwa ubuholi buyangichitha. Angizele izikhundla kwi-MK kodwa ukuzosebenzela abantu.” UZuma uthe yingakho kuyinto enkulu ukushiya kukaShivambu kwi-EFF yingenxa yobuhlakani bakhe.Enkulumeni kaZuma efundwe nguNobhala Jikelele we-MK uDkt Sifiso Maseko, uveze ukuthi umsebenzi kamgqugquzeli kazwelonke wukuhlela, athuthukise izinhlaka zeqembu, akhe imiqulu nemigomo, acije ngezepolitiki, enze ucwaningo, aqaphe ukusebenza kwemigomo.Okunye ngukuqapha ukusebenza kwalabo abakumakhokhasi ahlukene aphinde abe sethimbeni leKhomishini yezoKhetho.UDkt John Hlophe oyiPhini likaMengameli we-MK, uthe uShivambu ubukhali njenge-razor, wathi akangabazi ukuthi iqhaza lakhe lizobonakala.Uthe abamthezanga kwi-EFF ngenhloso yokuhlakaza leliya qembu.UMaseko uthe uZuma nguyena kuphela onamandla okuqoka izinhlaka ezehlukene, wathi ubuholi obuphezulu yibona obuzokwakha amakomiti afaka elezezimali, elokuxhumana, elokuthuthukiswa komnotho namanye.“Kuzoba nengqungquthela yokwakha imigomo eqenjini ukuze kuthuthukiswe abantu emikhakheni ehlukene ezweni. Ezifundazweni kuzoba nethimba elizohola elihlanganisa ozohola leso sifundazwe, umxhumanisi nomgqugquzeli bese kuba nobhekele ukuhlwaya uxhaso. Ezifundeni kuzoba nozohola isifunda, umxhumanisi nomgqugquzeli kanjalo nozohlwaya uxhaso. Kuzoba nezinhlaka ezizoba komasipala,” kusho uMaseko.Uthe zonke izinhlaka zizosebenzela ukudla kwe-MK umhlanganiso okhethweni, waveza nokuthi lezi zinhlaka akuzona ezokulungiselela izingqungquthela zokukhetha ubuholi.

PHEZU kokugxekwa nxa zonke kwesikhangiso sethelevishini sokukhankasela ukhetho se-DA, esiveza ifulegi lakuleli lingqongqa, kodwa leli qembu lithe ngeke lisihoxise.Umholi waleli qembu uMnuz John Steenhuisen uthe ngeke basihoxise futhi bangaya ngisho enkantolo bayosivikela.Uveze ukuthi lesi sikhangiso sikhombisa izwe elishayo, wathi inhloso yaso ngukuthi abantu babone ukuthi uma beqhubeka nokuvotela isixaxa samaqembu esihlanganise i-ANC, EFF noMkhonto weSizwe Party ikuphi okuzokwenzeka ezweni.Ngisho noMengameli uCyril Ramaphosa ukubize njengesenzo sokuvukela umbuso lesi sikhangiso.UNgqongqoshe wezemiDlalo, ubuCiko namaSiko uMnuz Zizi Kodwa, uthe bacubungula indaba yokuthi bayihlasela ngezinhlaka zomthetho eyalesi sikhangiso.Uveze ukuthi kumele kube nomgomo ozobekwa yiKhomishini yezoKhetho, mayelana nokuthi amaqembu angavezi izinto ezifana nokuthi kushiswe ifulegi lezwe nezinye izinto eziyifagugu zezwe.“Kumele kushaywe umthetho wokuthi izinto ezifana nefulegi nezinye ezithinta izwe, zingashiswa noma zicekelwe phansi.“Lokhu asikwenzi ngoba kuwukhetho kuphela kodwa kumele kwenziwe ukuze nangomuso isehlakalo esifuze lesi singaphinde senzeke. Abameli bakahulumeni yinto abayifakela izibuko eyokushiswa kwefulegi,”kusho uKodwa.URamaphosa uthe ifulegi wuphawu oluhlanganisa abantu.“Ifulegi lezwe akulona eleqembu lezepolitiki elithile. Wuphawu oluhlanganisa abantu. Baningi abantu abafa, befela leli fulegi. Yinto okumele ihlonishwe ngoba wuphawu olubumba isizwe,” kusho uRamaphosa. UKodwa uthe ngisho kwamanye amazwe amaciko azigqaja ngalo.“Uma sekuphephezela ifulegi emva kokwenza kahle kwamaciko ethu kwamanye amazwe siba nokuzigqaja ngempumelelo yethu. Yingakho kumele lihlonishwe ifulegi, kungabikhona nje ozovele alishise,” kuqhuba  uKodwa.Uthe ngeke isebenze imizamo yokuhlukanisa isizwe. Abaholi bamanye amaqembu okubalwa i-ActionSA uMnuz Herman Mashaba, ukugxekile ukushiswa kwefulegi wathi kufana nokuvukela umbuso.Nophiko lwentsha lwe-ANC, uVukayibambe lukhwele lwadilika kwi-DA, lwathi leli qembu lizama ukuzuza amavoti ngalesi sikhangiso.Nasezinkundleni zokuxhumana iyindaba egudwini eyokushiswa kwefulegi njengoba begxeka leli qembu ngalesi sikhangiso.

BAPHENDUKA inkomo edla yodwa abafelokazi abasebancane ngemuva kokushona kwabayeni, okudalwa izizathu eziningi okubalwa ukuthi kuye kusolwe bona ngokushona kwabayeni,  ukusaba ukuthi bangase basolwe ngokuthi sebengenwe ngabafowabo bomyeni uma beqhubeka nokusondela kubo. Laba bafelokazi abazibiza ngeYoung Widows Talk, bebehlangene eThekwini ngoMgqibelo, bedingida ngezinto ezithinta abafelokazi abashiywe amadoda besebancane,  okuhlanganisa ukuthi umphakathi usuke ulindele ukuthi baziphathe kanjani, ukuthi uzikhulisa kanjani izingane usuwedwa, ukuthi usamukela kanjani isimo sakho esisha nodaba olunzima lokuthi ungaqoma nini nokuthi ngabe yinto okumele uyenze yini leyo nemiphumela yayo.UNkk Mamatu Joyisa onezinyanga eziyisithupha eshonelwe umyeni wakhe, okunguyena obehlele lesi sigcawu, uthe: "Indaba iqala nje ngokuthi abafelokazi bahlale besolwa ngokubulala amadoda. Kwabanye, leyo nkulumo iqala umyeni esagula. Uma engagulanga kuba nzima kakhulu. Kungcwatshwa nje, umakoti usuke engasabhekani nabasemzini. Uthe kusuke kumele uqaphele indlela okhuluma ngayo nabafowabo bomyeni wakho, ungasondeli kakhulu kubo noma ngabe bewujwayele ukucela usizo kubo umyeni wakho esakhona ngoba kuzokudalela amazinyo abushelelezi  kumakhosikazi abo. UNkk Baby Mkhabela owashonelwa umyeni ngo-1995 eneminyaka engaphansi kuka-30, uthi kwesinye isikhathi umfelokazi uze akhumule inzilo engakaze abe naso isikhathi sokukhala nesokuzila, exabana nabasemzini kubangwa ifa. "Lesi sigcawu sizosisiza ekutheni sikhulume ngokukhululeka ngoba sonke siyefana. Abanakwenu, abangani bakho, abazalwane basuke bekhona bekweseka kodwa iqiniso ukuthi bona basuke bengashonelwe amadoda, kukhona abasuke bengakuqondi. Kunzima ukukhuluma uvuleleke ngakho. Esigcawini esinjengalesi uma ngithi nginesizungu, ngikhuluma nomuntu owaziyo ukuthi ngikhuluma ngani. Ongeke angibuke ngeso lokuthi ngihlulwa inyama ngoba uyazi ukuthi kunjani ukuthenga ithuluzi locansi kwesinye isikhathi kungayilethi injabulo ephelele ngoba ngisuke nginesikhala sokuthi udinga ukuxoxa nomuntu okuyinto esuke ingeke isenzeka ngoba lowo muntu akasiye umyeni wakho, awukwazi ukumxoxela ngezinye izingqinamba zesimo obhekene naso,“ kusho uNkk Mkhabela.UNkk Phili Mfeka oneminyaka emithathu eshonelwe umyeni, uthe kuyenzeka impi nabasemzini iholele ekutheni umfelokazi ashiye konke akusebenzele nomyeni wakhe, aqale phansi athenge umuzi ukuze abe nokuthula, okuba nomthelela omubi uma enezingane.

IKHABHINETHI seyizwakalise ukukhathazeka ngesiteleka sabasebenzi baseThekwini abangaphansi  kwenyunyana iSA Municipal Workers Union (Samwu), esiphazamise ukulethwa kwezidingo zomphakathi.UNgqongqoshe eHhovisi likaMengamali wakuleli, uNksz Khumbudzo Ntshavheni, uthe: “Umthelela walesi siteleka wenze izakhamuzi eziningi zasala zingenawo amanzi, ugesi, kwaphazamiseka  nokuthuthwa kwemfucuza nokuyinto ehlukumeza amalungelo abantu futhi ewukwephulwa koMthethosisekelo." Uqhube wathi ukuvalwa kwezindawo ezinikeza usizo ezifana nemitholampilo ngenxa yalesi siteleka, kufana nokunqabela umphakathi usizo lwezempilo okubeka engcupheni impilo yabantu."Ukuziphatha okunje ngeke kubekezelelwe. IKhabhinethi icela izinhlaka zomthetho ukuthi zenze konke okudingekayo ukuze zivikele amalungelo abantu. Abatholakala benecala bazobhekana nengalo yomthetho,“ kusho uNtshavheni.

UMBIKO wakamuva mayelana nokutakulwa kwabantu emgwaqweni u75  Victoria Street, eGeorge uveza ukuthi sebengu-26 abantu okuqinisekiswe ukuthi bashonile ngenxa yokuwa kwebhilidi eliyizitezi ezinhlanu ebelakhiwa.Ithimba labatakuli selisebenze amahora angu-166 kusukela kwavela imibiko yokuwa kwebhilidi.Umbiko oqinisekisiwe kuze kube yimanje wukuthi babengu-81 abantu ababesebenza ngoMsombuluko odlule ngesikhathi kuwa ibhilidi ngo 2.00 ntambama. UMasipala waseGeorge uveze ukuthi kuzoba nomzuzu wokuthula ngo-2.09 emini namhlanje kuyo le ndawo ukukhumbula abashonile nokweseka imindeni yabo.Kuthiwa bangu-55 abatholakele batakulwa, bangu-26 okuqinisekiswe ukuthi bashonile kanti bangu-13 abasesibhedlela. Bangu-26 abantu abangakatholakali njengoba usaqhubeka umsebenzi wokutakula.Umasipala uveze ukuthi umsebenzi wokwenza ulibofuzo uzothatha isikhathi njengoba kusenzima ukuthola imininingwane yabashonile nalabo abangakatholakali.Kunxuswe amalungu emindeni ukuba inikele ehholo lomphakathi eGeorge Civic Centre emgwaqweni uYork Street, ukuze kusizakale uMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi uthole imininingwane efanele kuqondiswe amarekhodi adingekayo.

ANGENE eNkantolo eNkulu eThekwini ngoLwesine amaphepha okubuyekeza isicelo sokugudluza umholi uNyazilwezulu, esihlalweni eBuhleni.Lokhu kuza emva kokuthi isicelo ebesifakwe wumholi wamaNazaretha, Ukukhanyakwelanga sichithiwe kule nkantolo.Umshumayeli Chansey Sibisi weBandla lamaNazaretha, nophinde asebenze nabameli bebandla, uthe bagcine besithathile isinqumo sokuthi bafake isicelo sokubuyekezwa kwesinqumo.Bebekalelwe yile nkantolo ukuthi kungapheli izinsuku ezingu-20 bengasifakile isicelo sokubuyekeza isinqumo uma bezimisele kanjalo.“Njengoba amaphepha siwafaka enkantolo ngoLwesine kuningi esikhala ngakho. Okokuqala ukuthi ijaji libuyisele icala emuva ngesikhathi likhipha isinqumo ngesicelo sethu sokuthi kugudluke uNyazi esihlalweni.“Kunokuthi libheke esikucelile livele laqala phansi lakhuluma ngendaba yobuholi bebandla lamaNazaretha. Asisekho isidingo sakho ngoba zonke izinkantolo sezanquma ukuthi uNyazilwezulu aluyena umholi wamaNazaretha.“Okwesibili sikhala ngokuthi lithathe isikhathi eside ukukhipha isinqumo ekubeni bekungasaqulwa cala. Okunye ukuthi uNyazilwezulu luhleli ngokungemthetho esihlalweni futhi siwushaye indiva umthetho ngoba isikhonzi senkantolo sayihambisa incwadi ngesikhathi seluchithwe yinkantolo yoMthethosisekelo,” kusho uSibisi.Uthe okwenziwe yijaji lichitha isicelo sabo kungukubukela phansi amajaji aseNingizimu Afrika angu-18 achitha uNyazilwezulu ezinkantolo ezahlukene ukuthi alusiye umholi wamaNazaretha.Uveze ukuthi konke okuthintwe yijaji ngesikhathi likhipha isinqumo ngesicelo sabo sekwanqunywa ngakho, besingasekho isidingo sokuphindela kukhona.Isicelo sabo uthe besinenombolo yecala entsha engahlangene nesinqumo sezinkantolo ezedlule, wathi alikwazi ukuthatha isinqumo libheka into esiyadlula.Isolezwe linawo amaphepha esinqumo sejaji ngokugudluzwa koNyazilwezulu esihlalweni eBuhleni. Kusona ijaji lithinta zonke izigameko zokuqulwa kwecala kusuka ngo-2011. Kukhona nalapho liveza khona ukuthi uNyazilwezulu lwakulwela kodwa ukuthi alukwazi ukususwa eBuhleni ngoba kusemzini kayisemkhulu, Inyangayezulu.Kulokho uSibisi uthe besingasekho isidingo sakho ngoba lolo hlangothi lwadingidwa enkantolo, eyaluchitha uNyazi ngoba bawaveza amaphepha aqinisekisa ukuthi umuzi waseBuhleni ubhaliswe njengendawo yesonto.

KUSHIYE abantu bekhuluma ukuvela kwezindaba zokuthi uMnuz Jabulani Khumalo ubhalele inhlangano yokhetho i-IEC eyinxusa ukuthi ihoxise igama lowayengumengameli  uJacob Zuma njengomholi nobuso beqembu uMkhonto Wesizwe Party.UKhumalo, owabhalisa iqembu ngonyaka odlule, ukhonjwe indlela kuleli qembu ngesonto eledlule.Ekhasini leSolezwe kuFacebook abantu baveze imibono ehlukene ngesenzo sikaKhumalo.Senzo Gwala: Nokuthemba umuntu kuyingozi, uNxamalala wamthemba wabhalisa ngaye iqembu. Kwabanolwazi anibhaliseki yini nibe ngaphezu koyedwa ukuze kugwemeke izinto ezinje?Msawakhe Mzamo: Kodwa amaqhinga e-ANC lawa.Sbusiso SeNkosi Sbusiso Senkosi: Ulayekile Khumalo kudala sibakhuza ngoZuma, bamenza uNkulukulu wabo eKZN, ukuthi uZuma ungumkhohlisi wakhohlisa uMalema, Nzimande noZwelinzima Vavi ukukhipha uMengameli Thabo Mbeki waze wabaxosha.Conzie Ngubane: Cha ayiphumuli i-ANC isimthengile njalo, ngeke ikhohlwe kodwa ibanyakazisile iMK noma ingangawina kodwa hhayi ngiyayivumaMhlolo Nhlokonhle Ganwa'mahle: Noma bangakhipha ikhanda lakhe  kodwa yena sizomvotela nje uZuma. Noma engenzani lo Khumalo asinandaba bese ezitshela ukuthi uyena ozoba umengameli waleli qembu Smonyo Mashobane: Khumalo yinyosi engenadosi asizixaki ngaye, viva MKMzamo Byanda Junior: Ngeke sisayivotelaSthembiso Isaac Nxumalo: UKhumalo waziwa ubani, ngoba bonke abantu uma ekhipha uZuma bazovotela Inkatha.Spha Somuhle Ndimande: Kuyacaca ke ngempela ukuthi wakwenza abesolwa ngakho, uyasetshenziswa. Kuwubuwula  ke lokhu akwenzile ngoba ukube ufunde ukulinda ubezoba sezindaweni ezinhle, uselibulele ikusasa lakhe kwezombusazwe.Phiwayinkosi Mtakalahlwa Noel Cele: Washo uZuma wathi i-ANC izobusa kuze kubuye uJesu Kristu waseNazaretha. Viva ANC Viva.

Abezimo ezphuthumayo ngaphansi kwenkampani i-IPSS Medical Rescue baqinisekise ukutholakala kwesidumbu sowesilisa owamuka emfuleni uThukela, eMandeni ngeSonto.Kubikwa ukuthi lo mlisa oneminyaka engu-21 ubudala wamuka kulo mfula ngeSonto ntambama. Abe-IPSS Medical Rescue nabeMpangeni Saps Medical Rescue basebenza kusukela ngeSonto ntambama behla nomfula bethungatha lo mlisa, kukhona amalungu omndeni nomphakathi belindile eceleni komfula.NgoLwesibili emini, amaphoyisa ophiko lwezinja baseshe enye ingxenye yalo mfula, ngenhlanhla satholakala lapho isidumbu salo mlisa.

Asethunyeliwe eSwatini amaphepha okucela ukubuyiswa kuleli izelamani uMnuz Siyabonga Gezani Ndimande noMnuz Malusi Dave Ndimande abanukeka ecaleni lokufa komrepha uKiernan “AKA” Forbes nomnngani wakhe uTebello “Tibz” Matsoane.Umnyango wezobuLungiswa namaJele ukuqinisekisile esitatimendeni ngoLwesibili ekuseni ukuthi uNgqongqoshe uMnuz Ronald Lamola uwagunyazile futhi wawathumela amaphepha eSwatini.Umnyango uthe isicelo senziwe ngaphansi kwesivumelwano sala mazwe womabili nangokwemigomo yeSADC Protocol on Extradition la mazwe ayisayina.MEDIA STATEMENT : REQUEST FOR EXTRADITION BY SOUTH AFRICA TO THE KINGDOM OFESWATINI: SIYABONGA GEZANI NDIMANDE AND MALUSI DAVE NDIMANDE pic.twitter.com/TbmUPWHOl8Okhulumela iNPA KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Natasha Ramkisson-Kara ubesanda kutshela iziko lezindaba lakwabo kweSolezwe, i-IOL, ukuthi amaphepha esicelo sokubuyiswa kwalaba athunyelwe kuLamola.Kulindeleke ukuthi uma bebuya kuleli bajoyine abanye abammangalelwa ecaleni okungoMnuz Lindokuhle Mkhwanazi (30), uMnuz Lindani Ndimande (35), uMnuz Eddie Myeza (21), uMnuz Muziwethemba Gwabini (36) noMnuz Lindokuhle Ndimande abahamba iNkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini.

KUNOHLANGOTHI oluzogqemeka udume lwengozi ecaleni lokufa kukaSenzo Meyiwa uma iJaji Ratha Makgoatlheng selikhipha isinqumo maqondana nezitatimende okuthiwa ezabamangalewa abavuma kuzo amacala.UMeyiwa, owayeyisilomo se-Orlando Pirates neBafana Bafana, wadutshulwa wabulawa ekubo kwentombi yakhe, uKelly Khumalo, eVosloorus, eGauteng, ngo-2014. Amadoda amahlanu abhekene necala lokufa kukaMeyiwa kodwa ayawaphika wonke amacala.Uhlangothi loMbuso lwethula izitatimende oluthi zabhalwa, zasayinwa abamangalelwa bevuma amacala bechakida nomuntu abathi wayebathumile. Abamangalelwa bathi bashaywa amaphoyisa abaphoqa ukuthi bavume amacala abasayinisa ngenkani.Uhlangothi lwabameli babamangalelwa lwafaka isicelo sokuthi zichithwe izitatimende. Bathi akufanele zibe wubufakazi ngoba zatholakala ngendlela engekho emthethweni.Izinhlangothi zombili ziqedile ukwenza izethulo. IJaji lithe lizokhipha isinqumo kusasa maqondana nokuthi izitatimende ziyemukwelwa noma cha.Ungoti wezomthetho onguMqondisi weZikalala Attorneys, uMnuz Mpumelelo Zikalala, uchazile ngesigaba icala elikusona. Uthe okokuqala okufanele abantu bakuqonde wukuthi icala lehlulelwa ngobufakazi obusuke bubekwe phambi kwenkantolo.Uthe uma izitatimende zemukelwa kuyobe kuwudume lwengozi kubameli kodwa kuyobe kungaphelile ngecala. UZikalala uthe kukhona into esemqoka eshiwo yijaji selivala.“IJaji lishilo ukuthi sinqumo salo sizobe sinquma ngezitatimende kuphela, hhayi ngecala lonke. Isinqumo sizobe singachazi ukuthi sekufike ekugcineni. Ukwemukelwa kwezitatimende kuzobe kungasho ukuthi sekuyomiwa ngazo ngoba okuqukethwe kuzona kusazobhekwa,’’ kusho uZikalala.Uthe uma izitatimende zichithwa, kuyobe kuwudume kwaboMbuso. Uthe lokhu kuyonika abameli ithuba lokufaka isicelo ngaphansi kukaSection 174 weCriminal Procedure Act 51 ka-1977. Lesi sigatshana sigunyaza abameli ukuthi bafake isicelo sokuthi abamangalelwa bakhishwe phambili uma kuvela ukuthi uMbuso uyehluleka wukuveza ubufakazi.

SIVUNDULULWE abahlala emgwaqweni sinezibazi zokushiswa, sesonakele, isidumbu sengane engaziwa okukholakala ukuthi ineminyaka eyisikhombisa, esitholwe epaki iLotus eSiphingo, ngoMsombuluko.UNksz Dawn Gounden we-Renegades Search and Rescue unxuse ukufuniswa umndeni kamgilwa isidumbu sakhe okuthiwa bese sesonakele okukholakala ukuthi bese kunesikhathi eside senzakaliswa, sagqitshwa ethuneni elingashoni kakhulu, esibonwe ngabahlala emgwaqweni.“Bathinte amaphoyisa nabeRenagades and Rescue, kanti isidumbu besisemweni esibi kakhulu, sesingasabonakali kahle obekukhombisa ukuthi bese kunesikhathi sagqitshwa futhi sinezibazi zokusha. Sinxusa usizo emphakathini ukuthi usilekelele ekutholeni ulwazi olungaholela ekutholakaleni komndeni,” kusho uNksz Gounden.Kwenzeka lokhu nje, umndeni waseMalukazi uphansi phezulu uthungatha indodakazi yawo uZekhethelo Luphalule (6) osekuyophela inyanga anyamalala njengoba egcine ukubonwa ngoJuni 20, 2024.UNksz Gounden uqinisekise ukuthi umndeni kaZekhethelo ufikile ukuzobheka isidumbu esitholiwe kodwa kwatholakala ukuthi akuyena. Uthe kungenzeka ukuthi isidumbu esitholiwe akusona esasendaweni kodwa ingane ibulawe kwenye indawo yayisizolahlwa eSiphingo.  Ugqugquzele abantu ukuthi baqinisekise ukubika emaphoyiseni uma kunomuntu onyamelele, ukuze besizakale, bekwazi ukufuniswa abathandiweyo babo.Isihlava sokubulawa kwezingane kumbe sokuduka kwezingane zitholwe sezibulewe kubukeka sidla lubi kulesi sifundazwe. Kuthe ngesonto eledlule kwatholwa isidumbu sikaSifundo Mkhize (7) waseZinketheni, eMgungundlovu, sivalelwe endlini kamakhelwane siboshwe izandla nezinyawo sinenxeba esiphangeni. Kulesi sigameko kukholakala ukuthi senziwe umakhelwane obefuna ngodli umsebenzi kuyise kamufi, okuholele ekutheni amalungu omphakathi athukutheliswe yilesi senzo amhlasele umsolwa ambulale.ULisulenkosi Lamula (2) waseMakhazane, oLundi, isidumbu sakhe sitholwe emasontweni amabili edlule ethoyilethi lomgodi emva kosuku edukile ngesikhathi bekunomcimbi ezihlobeni zomndeni. Umndeni usola isandla semfene ngokufa kwakhe.Mayelana nesidumbu esingaziwa esitholwe eSiphingo ngoMsombuluko, okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLieutenant Colonel Thenjiswa Ngcobo, uthe amaphoyisa aseSiphingo aphenya icala lokubulala.“Imibiko iveza ukuthi isidumbu sengane engaziwa sitholwe sesonakele ehlathini kubonakala sengathi sasiqale sashiswa,” usho kanje.

AMALUNGU ePhalamende ahoxiswe yiqembu uMkhonto weSizwe (MK), aseveze ukuthi asamhlonipha futhi asamthanda umholi waleli qembu, uMnuz Jacob Zuma. La malungu angu-10 aye enkantolo enkulu eWestern Cape efuna kumiswe ukufungiswa kwamalungu amasha ezikhundleni zawo, aveze ukuthi kunedlanzana elixovayo kuleli qembu elidinga ukususwa.Angu-18 amalungu ahoxiswe yi-MK ePhalamende ngoJulayi.Esithangamini sabezindaba izolo, okhulumele la malungu uMnuz Thami Khuzwayo owayehola uphiko lwezitshudeni kuleli qembu, uthe abalwi noZuma ngokuya enkantolo.“Asilwi nomengameli uZuma ngoba siyamthanda futhi asilwi neqembu. Sajoyina leli qembu ngoba simthanda uZuma neqembu. Kodwa kunabantu okumele basuswe okuyibona abaxova iqembu,” kusho uKhuzwayo.Uthe baye enkantolo ngoba befuna ubulungiswa.“Sethemba ukuthi uZuma uzoyixazulula le nkinga. Kunzima ukufinyelela kuyena uma ufuna ukumbona ngoba siyavinjwa. Ezinye izinto ezenzekayo akazazi,” kusho yena. IPhini likaMengameli we-MK ophinde ahole leli qembu ePhalamende, uDkt John Hlophe, lithe bazoyekela izinkantolo ukuthi zinqume ngalolu daba. “Njengoba lolu daba selusezithebeni zenkantolo siyajabula ngoba nosuku seluseduzane lokuthi lulalelwe. Sizolinda yona inqume. Asiphawuli ngezinto ezingaphambi kwezinkantolo ngoba siyawuhlonipha umthetho,” kusho uHlophe.Icala lizolalelwa ngoSepthemba 3.UKhuzwayo usole uSotswebhu waleli qembu ePhalamende, uMnuz Sihle Ngubane, indodakazi yomholi we-MK uMnuz Jacob Zuma, uDuduzile Zuma-Sambudla, umkhulumeli weqembu uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndhlela nabanye ngokuxova iqembu.“Sizolwa kuze kube sekugcineni. Asiyanga kwi-MK ngenxa yezikhundla kodwa silwa ngoba nabanye kuyobenza okusenzile. Uma singalwi kuyophela nge-MK. Siyalithanda iqembu, salijoyina ngenxa kaZuma owayehlushwa yi-ANC. Ngeke sililaxaze manje, okunalokho sifuna kukhishwe abaxovayo.”Ufunge wagomela ukuthi bazobuyela ePhalamende ngoba bebengafudumezeli muntu izihlalo zabo. Ukwamukele ukufika kukaMnuz Floyd Shivambu, obeyiphini likamengameli le-EFF, kuleli qembu. UKhuzwayo ukhale ngokuthi abazi noma baqhubeke basebenze noma bahlale emakhaya njengoba behoxisiwe.Ubuye wagxeka uNkk Zuma-Sambudla ngokubasola ukuthi baxhasiwe njengoba beye enkantolo.“Asisebenzisani noKhumalo (Jabulani, owaxoshwa owabhalisa iqembu). Asikaze simeseke uKhumalo, saseka uZuma. Sisizwa abameli ngaleli cala ngoba bebona ukuthi kudlalwa ngathi. Siholelwe imali yezinsuku ezinhlanu ekubeni sasebenza inyanga yonke,” kusho uKhuzwayo.Uthe bayazi ngeke kube mnandi kodwa bona abayi ndawo kwi-MK.

BABONGE uKhomishana wamaPhoyisa uLieutenant General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi emva kokuhlanganisa izikhulu zamatekisi KwaZulu-Natal emhlanganweni obubanjelwe eDurban Central Police Station, eThekwini.Lo mhlangano bekungokwesibili uhlala njengoba owokuqala wawubanjelwe eMayville ngenyanga edlule.Lokhu kulandela ukuvala umgwaqo kosomatekisi bamabanga amade asePort Shepstone kanye naseThekwini.Osomatekisi bavala imigwaqo emikhulu okubalwa kuyo uthelawayeka uN2 ePort Shepstone no-N3 eThekwini bephazamisa ukuhamba kwezimoto bekhala ngokugqoza kokukhishwa kwezimvume zokusebenza ngaboMnyango wezokuThutha kulesi sifundazwe.Okhulumela inhlangano yamabanga amade ePort Shepstone, uMnuz Lizwi Maphumulo ekhuluma neSolezwe, uthe abenelisekile ngokuhlalukile kuwo lo mhlangano.“Sizothatha ezinye izinyathelo njengoba sifike nommeli, sizoxoxa naye akwazi ukusilekelela ukuthi sigcine sikutholile esikufunayo,” kusho uMaphumulo.Uthe zikhona ezinye izindlela abazozizama ukulwa nale nkinga yezimvume ababhekene nayo embonini yamatekisi.“Impela sizozama ukuya enkantolo futhi njengoba size safika lana sibonga igalelo likaMkhwanazi ngoba uyena osilekelele kakhulu. Njengoba samisa isiteleka, sasihlonipha yena. Ukube sasingamhloniphi sasizophinde sibuyele emgwaqeni,” usho kanje.Okunye okuhlalukile kuwo lo mhlangano yilapho ummeli obemele uMnyango wezokuThutha KwaZulu-Natal, u-Adv Nxumalo efunde umthetho, isigaba 50 se-National Land Transport Act esithinta ukugunyazwa kwezimoto ezithutha umphakathi, isigaba 87 esikhuluma ngokuboshwa kwezimoto kanye nesigaba 90 esikhuluma ngamacala nangenhlawulo uma izimoto seziboshiwe.“Lo mthetho uthi akekho umuntu okwazi ukuthi asebenzise isithuthi somphakathi ngaphandle kokuthi abe nemvume emgunyazayo futhi imvume iyona enikeza isithuthi igunya lokusebenzisa uhlobo oluthize lwesithuthi,” kusho u-Adv Nxumalo.Uthe uma umuntu ezothutha umphakathi futhi ezohlomula kulokho, imvume iyadingeka.“Uma umuntu ezothutha abantu, ikakhulukazi ngokwenkokhelo yamabhizinisi, kufanele abe nemvume yokukwenza lokho.”Obemele osomatekisi u-Adv Sinclair uyaphikisana nalokhu okushiwo umthetho esigabeni 87 mayelana nokuboshwa kwezimoto.“Uma uwufunda lo mthetho, kunegama elithi ‘kungenzeka’, okungezinye zezinto eziletha izinkinga engicabanga ukuthi osomatekisi bahlangabezana nazo ngoba osomatekisi bayazifaka izicelo zezimvume kodwa lezo mvume aziphumi ngaleso sikhathi ekumele ziphume ngaso,” usho kanje.UNkk Nokulunga Hlophe ubacaciselile osomatekisi ngemigudu elandelwayo uma befaka izicelo zezimvume. Uthe uma bezifakile izicelo, zithatha izinsuku ezingu-60 ukuthi ziphume,  uma kuyizicelo zezimvume zezimoto ezihamba amabanga amade umthetho esigabeni 65 uthe akumele bakhiphe izimvume umasipala ungavumile.

ZISAKHALA izinhlangano ezehlukene ngokufakwa kowayengumengameli wamajaji eWestern Cape, uDkt John Hlophe, kwikhomishini eluleka uhulumeni ngezithinta amajaji.UHlophe ohola iqembu uMkhonto weSizwe ePhalamende, ufakwe ekubeni yilungu le-Judicial Service Commission (JSC), phezu kwezikhalazo zamanye amaqembu ePhalamende.Omunye wemisebenzi yeJSC ukuphenya izikhalazo ezibhekiswe emajajini.Umcwaningi enhlanganweni iJudges Matter, uMnuz Mbekezeli Benjamin, uthe badumele ngesinqumo sePhalamende, sokuqoka uHlophe ekubeni yingxenye yeJSC.Uthe ukuqokwa kwakhe kubeka engcupheni isithunzi seJSC.“Umsebenzi wePhalamende ukuvikela ukuzimela kwezinkantolo. Kubakulekile ukuthi kukhethwe abantu abangeke babeke engcupheni isithunzi seJSC kanjalo nezinkantolo ngoba le khomishini iphakamisa abantu abazoba amajaji asezinkantolo.”UNksz Judith February weFreedom Under Law, uthe bekungamele kufakwe umuntu ofana noHlophe, owasuswa ekubeni ijaji ngoba azama ukuhlohla abanye ozakwabo ukuthi benze okuphambene nomthetho.Uthe kuyaxaka ngoba amanye amaqembu ezepolitiki avota ekutheni akhishwe ngaphansi kwabantu ababizwa ngamajaji kuleli, kodwa futhi manje amanye amaqembu asemvotele ukuthi abe sekomitini elibhekele izinto ezithinta umthetho.“UMthethosisekelo wezwe kumele uvikelwe zikhathi zonke. IPhalamende lihlulekile ukwenza umsebenzi walo ngokuthi lifake umuntu owasuswa ekubeni ijaji, kwikhomishini ephakamisa amajaji.” Uthe bazosiphikisa lesi sinyathelo ngokulandela umthetho.Amaqembu achithe uHlophe ePhalamende kubalwa i-DA, Freedom Front Plus ne-ACDP.

UMENGAMELI we-ANC, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa uthi bazowakhombisa ukuthi bangobani amaqembu athi angeke balunqobe ukhetho.URamaphosa uthe i-ANC izomangaza abaningi okhethweni lwangoMeyi 29, njengoba ethe izonqoba ngamalengiso.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma emcimbini wokubungaza usuku lwabasebenzi obuseCape Town.“Ngomhlaka 29 kuzokuba nokhetho, lolu ukhetho olubalulekile. Kukhona abayizimbangi zethu abahambe bekhuluma, bethi sizothola ngaphansi kuka-50%. “Abasebenzi nabantu baseNingizimu Afrika angeke bavume ukuthi i-ANC ithole ngaphansi kuka-50%, kodwa bazolwela ukuthi sinqobe ukhetho ngamalengiso.“Sizobakhombisa labo abahambe bethi sizohlulwa. Laba abahamba bethi sizohlulwa, abasazi kahle, basizwa ngendaba. Bazosibona kahle ngomhlaka 29 laba abasibukela phansi,” kusho uRamaphosa.Uthe bafuna ukubuyisa isifundazwe iWestern Cape okhethweni oluzayo, nokuwukuphela kwaso esingaphethwe i-ANC.“Laba asebezitshela ukuthi iWestern Cape eyabo, sizobakhombisa.”URamaphosa uthe i-ANC izoqhubeka nokweseka abasebenzi.“Bayathanda, abathandi, i-ANC izohlale ihamba nabasebenzi. Sizoqhubeka nokweseka abasebenzi.”URamaphosa uthe uhulumeni oholwa i-ANC uzimisele nokuqhubeka nokudala amathuba emisebenzi.Uthe abafuni ukuthi abaneminyaka engu-35 babandlululwe uma kudalwa amathuba emisebenzi.“Yebo siyazi ukuthi inkinga yokuswelakala kwemisebenzi ikhungethe kakhulu intsha kodwa asifuni ukuthi abaneminyaka engu-35 basale ngaphandle. Nabo abantu abaneminyaka engu-35 bayayidinga imisebenzi.”UMengameli weCosatu, uNksz Zingiswa Losi, uthe amalungu eCosatu azophuma ngobuningi bawo eyokhankasela i-ANC. “Sifuna ukuthi i-ANC inqobe ukhetho oluzayo ngamalengiso. Kuningi osekwenziwe uhulumeni we-ANC kusukela wangena emandleni. Miningi imithetho eshayiwe eyenza izimpilo zabasebenzi zibe ngcono,” kusho uLosi.UNobhala Jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula uthe bayakujabulela ukwesekwa ngabasebenzi.“Siyabonga ukuthi abasebenzi bathe bazohamba ne-ANC okhethweni. Anigcini nje ngokusho ngomlomo, kodwa niyayikhankasela i-ANC. “Kufanele uma sesingena emandleni, singabakhohlwa abasebenzi. Abantu abaningi bayakhohlwa uma sebesemandleni,” kusho uMbalula.UMbalula, obekhuluma emcimbini obuseThekwini uthe amalungu eCosatu kufanele angawavoteli amaqembu athi azokwehlisa isibalo sabasebenzi bakahulumeni uma enqoba ukhetho.Uthe kunamaqembu alibeka ngembaba elokhu azodiliza abasebenzi bakahulumeni uma enqoba ukhetho.Imicimbi yosuku lwabasebenzi ibithe chithi saka.Umcimbi obuseGauteng, eSoweto, uphazamiswe amalungu eNUM, akhala ngokudilizwa kwabasebenzi ezimayini.Lomcimbi ubuhanjelwe iPhini likaMengameli we-ANC, uMnuz Paul Mashatile.UMashatile ugcine ekwazile ukwethula inkulumo yakhe.

UZOQINISA isandla kubantu abasebenzisa imigwaqo uMnyango wezokuThutha KwaZulu-Natal ukugwema izingozi zomgwaqo.Lokhu kuvezwe uMphathiswa walo mnyango, uMnuz Siboniso Duma, izolo, esithangamini nabezindaba emahhovisi ezeMisebenzi yoMphakathi eMayville.UDuma ubize lesi sithangami kulandela ukufa kwabangu-21 ezingozini ezintathu ezenzeke ezindaweni ezehlukene esifundazweni ngoMgqibelo.UDuma uthe bazoqasha abantu abangaphezu kuka-600 abazosebenza ngaphansi kwohlelo i-Rural Roads Transport Forums.Uthe phakathi kwezinye izinto ezizokwenziwa yilaba, ukuqinisekisa ezokuphepha emigwaqweni esezindaweni ezisemakhaya.“Bazokwenza nemikhankaso lapho bezogqugquzela baphinde bafundise ngezokuphepha ezindaweni ezehlukene. Lokhu bazokwenza kuze kuphele iminyaka eyisihlanu,” kusho uDuma.Uqhube wathi bazokwandisa nezivimbamgwaqo ubusuku nemini ezindaweni ezehlukene lapho amaphoyisa azobe engahleki engathi nsi, kubashayeli abephula imithetho yomgwaqo.“Amaphoyisa ngeke abe nomusa kulabo abaphula umthetho,” kusho uDuma, othe uphenyo lwabo kuveza ukuthi izingozi ezinyantisa igazi zivame ukwenzeka ngezimpelasonto nasebusuku.Edlulisa amazwi enduduzo emindenini yabashonile uthe, sebehlanganise ithimba lezikhulu ezinesipiliyoni, ukuthi livakashele imindeni ukusuka izolo. “Siyaqonda ukuthi umndeni ngamunye unezidingo ezingafani, ngakho sizozwa kuyona imindeni ukuthi ifuna ukusizwa ngani. Sizoqinisekisa ukuthi umnyango uyayilekelela imindeni ezinhlelweni zemingcwabo,” kusho uDuma.Ugqugquzele ukuthi kwenziwe imikhuleko ezindaweni ezehlukene njengoba ethe leli sonto balithatha njengesonto lokuzila esifundazweni ngokugubuzelwa yifu elimnyana ngezingozi ezenzekile.Ezingozini ezenzekile, kukhona eyenzeke emgwaqweni u-R66, phakathi kweMooi River neGreytown lapho okufe khona abangu-12.Kube eyenzeke ku-R74 lapho okusho kungqongqe khona amalungu e-MK ayisithupha abesendleleni eya emzini kaMengameli waleli qembu, uMnuz Jacob Zuma eNkanda, njengoba bekunomcimbi wokubungaza inkosikazi yakhe endala, uNkk Sizakele “MaKhumalo” Zuma.Bese kuba eyenze KwaDukuza, lapho okufe khona abathathu.UDuma uthe uphenyo lokuthi yini ebe yimbangela yalezi zingozi, lusaqhubeka, wathi kusesekuseni kakhulu ukuthi kungashiwo ukuthi kube yini imbangela.

UNOBHALA jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, uthi uhulumeni wokubambisana ophethe kuzwelonke uzoqhubeka nokusebenza noma kungakhona amaqembu aphumayo.UMbalula uthe bakulindele ukuthi kube khona amaqembu aphumayo ngokuhamba kwesikhathi kodwa wathi lokho ngeke kuguqise uhulumeni wokubambisana.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma kwisithangami nabezindaba, ngoLwesithathu. Uhulumeni wokubambisana wakhiwe ngamaqembu awu-10 athola u-70% wamavoti okhethweni.Phakathi kwamaqembu ayingxenye yokubambisana kukhona iDA, IFP, PA namanye.Kuvele sekukhona ukungaboni ngasolinye emaqenjini abambisene ngoba i-ANC neDA bethibelene ngodaba lokuphathwa kwesifundazwe, iGauteng.EGauteng alikho iqembu elathola amavoti anele ukuthi libuse ngokuzimela.I-ANC, DA namanye amaqembu ayingxenye yohulumeni wokubambisana anezihlalo ezanele ukuthi aphathe iGauteng, kodwa amaqembu ayehluleka ukuvumelana ngokwabiwa kwezikhundla.Umdonsiswano usuholele ekutheni kube nokwesaba ukuthi ukwehluleka kwamaqembu ukuvumelana eGauteng, kungaphazamisa ukusebenza kwawo kuhulumeni kazwelonke.Kepha uMbalula uthe uhulumeni wokubambisana uzoqhubeka nokuphatha noma kungakhona abashiyayo.Ubeke kanje uMbalula: “Uhulumeni wokubambisana uzohlezi ukhona. Vele kuzokuba khona amaqembu azobuye aphume ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, uma ebona mhlawumbe ukuthi uhulumeni wokubambisana awuwasebenzeli. Ngesikhathi kukhona amaqembu aphumayo kukhona lawo azophinde angene. Ngakho-ke abantu kufanele babeke phansi amaphaphu.”UMbalula uveze ukuthi basazimisele ngokusebenzisana neDA eGauteng kodwa wathi abavumelani nalokhu okufunwa yiDA. UMbalula uqhube wathi iDA ishintshe isivumelwano abebe naso.Uthe iDA yayikade ifune izikhundla ezintathu kuhulumeni waseGauteng, kodwa yabuye yashintsha yathi ifuna ezine.“Ngeke sikwazi ukuhlangabezana nalezi zimfuno zabo. Into okufanele bayazi ukuthi asikhulumi nabo kuphela lapha eGauteng, kukhona amanye amaqembu esixoxa nawo.”Ukumenyezelwa kwekhabhinethi laseGauteng, sekuze kwahlehliswa kwabili ngenxa yokungavumelani kwalamaqembu.NgoLwesithathu uNdunankulu, uMnuz Panyaza Lesufi, umemezele ikhabhinethi lakhe. ULesufi ubethe uzolimemezela ikhabhinethi lakhe noma ngabe iDA ayivumi ukusebenzisana nabo.“Ngeke ngize ngikuhlehlise kulokhu ukumenyezelwa kwekhabhinethi,” kusho uLesufi obekhuluma esithangamini nabezindaba.Ebuzwa ukuthi bazosebenzisana namaphi amaqembu, uLesufi uthe bazosebenzisana nawo wonke amaqembu anezihlalo esiShayamthetho sesifundazwe. Amaqembu anezihlalo eGauteng kukhona iMK, ne-EFF abengeyona ingxenye yohulumeni wokubambisana.ULesufi ukuphikile ukuthi benza okuphambene nokuvunyelwene ngakho kuzwelonke.IDA ithe isazimisele ngokusebenzisana ne-ANC uma ingavumelana nemibandela yayo.Usihlalo woMkhandlu weDA, uNkk Hellen Zille, uthe uma i-ANC ibashiya ngaphandle eGauteng, bazokwamukela ukuba yiqembu eliphikisayo.UNkk Zille uthe uma beshiywa ngaphandle eGauteng, ngeke bahoxe kuzwelonke naKwaZulu-Natal, lapho bebambisene khona ne-ANC namanye amaqembu.

Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) certificates are a fundamental technology for securing online communications. SSL certificates are small data files that digitally bind a cryptographic key to an organization’s details.When installed on a web server, they activate the padlock and the HTTPS protocol, ensuring secure connections between a web server and a browser.In simpler terms, SSL certificates encrypt data transmitted between users and websites, protecting sensitive information from being intercepted by malicious actors.Why SSL Certificates are Essential for South African WebsitesImproving SecurityThe primary reason every website in South Africa needs an SSL certificate is security. In an era where cybercrime is on the rise, protecting users' data is paramount.SSL certificates encrypt information such as personal details, credit card numbers, and login credentials, making it difficult for cybercriminals to access or tamper with the data.This level of security is essential for e-commerce websites, banking portals, and any platform where users share sensitive information.Building Trust and CredibilityWeb users are becoming increasingly aware of online security. When they visit a website, they often look for the padlock symbol in the address bar, indicating that the connection is secure.Websites with an SSL certificate display this symbol, along with "HTTPS" in the URL, which helps in building trust and credibility with visitors.In contrast, sites without SSL certificates are marked as "Not Secure" by browsers, deterring potential customers and reducing traffic. For South African businesses, establishing trust is essential for retaining customers and attracting new ones, making SSL certificates a vital component.Improving Search Engine RankingsGoogle and other search engines prioritize user safety, and as part of this commitment, they favour HTTPS websites in their search algorithms. Websites with SSL certificates are more likely to rank higher in search engine results, leading to increased visibility and traffic.For businesses in South Africa looking to improve their online presence and attract more customers, having an SSL certificate can provide a competitive edge in search engine optimization (SEO).Complying with Data Protection RegulationsSouth Africa has implemented the Protection of Personal Information Act (POPIA), which regulates how organizations collect, store, and manage personal information. SSL certificates help websitescomply with these regulations by ensuring that data is encrypted during transmission, protecting it from unauthorized access.Non-compliance with POPIA can result in hefty fines and legal repercussions, making SSL certificates not just a security measure but also a legal requirement for businesses operating in South Africa.Types of SSL CertificatesDomain Validated (DV) CertificatesDV certificates are the most basic type of SSL certificate, offering encryption and a basic level of validation. They are quick to issue and are ideal for small businesses and personal websites.Organization Validated (OV) CertificatesOV certificates provide a higher level of validation compared to DV certificates. They require more thorough vetting of the organization’s identity and are suitable for websites where visitors need assurance about the legitimacy of the business.Extended Validation (EV) CertificatesEV certificates offer the highest level of validation and security. They involve a rigorous vetting process and provide a green address bar in browsers, indicating the highest level of trust. These certificates are ideal for e-commerce sites and organizations handling sensitive transactions.ConclusionSSL certificates are indispensable for websites in South Africa. As cyber threats continue to evolve, having an SSL certificate is no longer optional but a necessity for any website that values the safety and trust of its users. Investing in the right type of SSL certificate can significantly benefit businesses by protecting data, building credibility, and driving traffic to their sites.

UCWANINGO lwakamuva lwaseFNB luveza ukuthi u-50% wabantu bakuleli awukulungele ukuthatha umhlalaphansi njengoba ungalondolozi imali eyanele yomhlalaphansi.UMnuz Samukelo Zwane, oyiNhloko yeFNB Wealth and Investments, uveze ukuthi u-60% wemali eyenziwa ngabasebenzi bakuleli abahola kancane iphelela ekuthengeni ukudla, ukugibela nokurenta. Enye ingxenye ikhokhela izikweletu bese besala no-2% abawulondolozela umhlalaphansi.Uveze ukuthi abahola kangcono nabacebile bonga u-12% abawufaka ezikhwameni zomhlalaphansi.“Ukubiza kwezinga lempilo, ukunyuka kwemali-mboleko nokungabi nolwazi olwanele ngezindaba zomhlalaphansi kwenza abantu abahola kancane bangasheshi ukulondoloza imali yomhlalaphansi. Abaningi bathi bazosizwa yizingane zabo noma bazohola impesheni kahulumeni uma sebegugile,” kuchaza uZwane.Uthe kubalulekile ukuthi abantu baqale ukulondolozela umhlalaphansi uma beqala ukusebenza noma bangafaka uR300 esikhwameni somhlalaphansi esifanele ngoba yisona esiba nenzalo enhle.Ubalule ukuthi yize abacebile nabahola kangcono kubukeka sengathi babeka imali eningi yomhlalaphansi kodwa ukuze umuntu ahlale ngokunethezeka ekugugeni kwakhe, kufanele alondoloze u-15% womholo wakhe nyanga zonke.Ubuye waveza ukuthi abacebile nabahola kahle abahlali phansi dekle uma sebethathe umhlalaphansi kodwa bayasebenza noma bavule amabhizinisi kodwa abahola kancane bavamise ukuhlala phansi dekle ngenxa yokungabi namanye amakhono.Yize kubukeka sengathi isimo sibi, uZwane uthe ucwaningo lwabo luveza ukuthi abantu abaqala ukusebenza manje sebeqalile ukulondolozela umhlalaphansi.UMnuz Siphamandla Mkhwanazi, oyisazi somnotho sakwaFNB, uthe balindele ukuthi imali-mboleko yehle ngoNovemba ngenxa yokuqina kwerandi.Uveze ukuthi ukuqina kwerandi kunomthelela omuhle ngoba kuzokwehlisa intengo kaphethroli neyegilosa njengoba ukudla kuthuthwa ngamaloli.UMnuz Bheki Mkhize, oyisikhulu seFNB Wealth and Investments, uthe sebezoletha usizo lokwelulekwa ngezimali kuwo wonke umuntu obeka imali eFNB ngoba abafuni ulwazi lwezimali kube ngolwabacebile kuphela.Ugqugquzele abantu ukuthi bangajahi ukukhipha imali yempesheni njengoba kunohlelo oluzoqala ngoSepthemba (two pot system) olubavumela ukukhipha ingxenye ethile.Uthe le mali ekhishwayo yenzelwa izimo eziphuthumayo njengeCovid-19 nokunye okungagwemeki.

BAZOHLUKANISELANA uR900 000 abazodla umhlanganiso womncintiswano wokumodela nowomjaho wamahhashi yaminyaka yonke eyenziwa wuMasipala wesiFunda iKing Cetshwayo.Le micimbi yaminyaka yonke, nonyaka izoqala ngowokumodela, uMr & Miss King Cetshwayo ozoba seCivic Centre, Empangeni  ngoLwesihlanu ngo-6 ntambama. Owomjaho wamahhashi uzoba seMpangeni Airfield, ngoMgqibelo ngo-10 ekuseni. Okhulumela lo masipala, uMnuz Thami Shangase, uthe abazonqoba kowokumodela bazohlukanisela uR120 000, kwabesilisa nabesifazane.“Sibeke uR60 000 kwabesilisa nabesifazane. Abazophumelela bazothola uR30 000, uR20 000 kwabendawo yesibili noR10 000 abazophuma isithathu,” usho kanje. Eqhuba, uthe kwabomjaho wamahhashi bahlele ukwenza imijaho eyishumi, kanti babeke uR780 000 kwabazophuma phambili.Ozodla umhlanganiso womjaho omkhulu uzokhala emuke noR300 000, kube wuR200 000 olale isibili, uR150 000 ophume isithathu, uR80 000 kweyesine noR50 000 kolale isihlanu. “Silindele amahhashi asezindaweni ezahlukene zesifundazwe, ngisho nawasemazweni esingabala neLesotho kuwona, ingxenye yawo ebikade ikhona nakwiDundee July. Asibeke sibalo samahhashi esiwadingayo, sivulelekile kwabafuna ukuzoncintisana emjahweni,” kusho uShangase.Uthe njengaminyaka yonke, emncintiswaneni wokumodela kuzoncintisana izinsizwa nezintokazi ezinqobe emincintiswaneni ebiyenziwe komasipala babo abancane abahlanu abangaphansi kwesifunda iKing Cetshwayo, ukubasiza bachume kule ndima.“Sifuna bathuthuke kule ndima baze bafike ezingeni eliphezulu njengoLalela Mswane waKwaSokhulu, owanqoba uMiss South Africa ngo-2021. Sikholwa wukuthi lokhu esikwenzayo kuzoba yisisekelo esiqinile sokuthuthuka kwabo endimeni,” usho kanje.UShangase uveze ukuthi nakuba lingezukuba bikho idili lomculo njengangonyaka odlule, kodwa bazoba khona abaculi abadumile nabendawo ukunandisa ngokuqhubeka komcimbi womjaho.Emacikweni azonandisa kukhona uMawhoo, Mzukulu, Saliwa, DJ Dusty, DJ Halleluyah, Sithelo Shozi, DJ Fhiso, Ama-Tycooler, Njabulo The Drummer, Menzi, Ndumiso, Khaya Dladla noPenny Ntuli.Kungenwa mahhala kowomjaho wamahhashi ngoMgqibelo, bese kungena abamenyiwe kuphela kowonobuhle.

UMCULI wowokholo uFikile Mlomo ubonge uNkulunkulu ngokumnika elinye ithuba njengoba ebonakale okokuqala enandisa emcimbini wokugubha inyanga yabesifazane obuseThalaneni eNkandla.Lo mculi owaziwa ngamacwecwe okukhona kuwo elithi Noma Kunje, Ngiyabonga Mama namanye, ubenandisa okokuqala phambi kwezinkumbi zabantu emva kokuthi ezinyangeni ezintathu ezedlule axinwa wukugula okwaholela ekutheni afe esingezansi, esehamba ngesihlalo. Kwaba kubi ngendlela yokuthi ozakwabo baze bamenzela ikhonsathi yokuqoqa imali ukuze ayohlinzwa esibhedlela iNkosi Albert Luthuli eThekwini.Ekhuluma neSolezwe, uthe ubonga abantu bakuleli ngokumnika uthando ebhekene nokufa. “Abantu basangithanda futhi badinga okunye okuningi kimina. Bangitshengisile lokho ngesikhathi ngigula, bengithumelela imiyalezo befika nasesibhedlela bezongibheka,” usho kanje.Uthe ukugula obekumxinile akumenzanga walahlekelwa ithemba.“Besingekho isidingo sokuthi ngitatazele. UNkulunkulu ungidlulise ezintweni eziningi futhi obekungiphethe bengikuthatha njengomkhuhlane odlulayo yize bekukubi ngempela,” usho kanje.Uphinde waqinisa idolo ababhekene noma abadlula ezimweni ezehlukene empilweni ukuthi bangatatazeli, behlise umoya ngoba okusuke kwenzeka kusuke kungesikhona ukuthi kuzobabulala. Uthe ulindele ukuthi aqashwe kakhulu ukuze aqhubeke nokushumayeza abantu ngephimbo lakhe. “ Maduze ngizokhipha i-albhamu ezoba ngehlukile ngoba kuyona ngizobe ngilandisa ngohambo lwami noNkulunkulu engidlulisa esigodini sethunzi lokufa,” kusho lo mculi oseke washiyelana inkundla nezingwazi emculweni wokholo.Khonamanjalo, elandisa ngohambo lwakhe kulo mcimbi uFikile, uphinde wadalula ukuthi usinde kukubi ecishe enukubezwa ngokocansi ngempelasonto edlule.“Abangaziyo bazobona ukuthi ubuso bami budumbile, anginawo ngisho umakhalekhukhwini ngoba kukhona owesilisa engingamazi obezama ukungidlwengula. Ngize ngamncenga engidonsela ehlathini, ngimbuza ukuthi ngimenzeni ngoba angimazi naye akangazi, yini angathathi lokhu akufunayo bese eshiya umphefumulo wami, kodwa uthe ufuna ukungidlwengula anginqume,” ubeke kanje.Uthe munye umkhuleko awukhulekayo emhlabeni nathe ucela uNkulunklulu amsize axolele abantu besilisa. “ Silimele sibaningi singabesifazane ngenxa nje yomuntu wesilisa.”

NGOKUSHO kwamalungu omphakathi, kuthiwa liziphephise ngokuzinikela esiteshini samaphoyisa liyobhaca khona libalekela ulaka lwawo (umphakathi) obulifuna uthuli, ikhehla laseMpophomeni, eHowick, okuputshuke i-video lizithokozisa ngocansi nentombazane okukholakala ukuthi ineminyaka engaphansi kuka-16.Lesi sigameko esenzeke ngeSonto, kuthiwa umphakathi waseMagwababeni, eMpophomeni, uvuke umbhejazane wanikela emzini wale ndoda (igama layo eligodliwe emva kokuthi ingatholakalanga ukuthi iziphendulele) okuvele ukuthi ineminyaka eyevile ku-60, emva kokuthi kuthe ngoLwesihlanu, kwaputshuka i-video yayo izitika ngocansi nomfundi yasabalala ezinkundeni zokuxhumana.Ilungu lomphakathi elihlala khona endaweni elingathandanga kudalulwa lilandisa Isolezwe, lithe ngendlela le ndoda ebithenjwe ngayo emphakathini, kuwethusile ukubonakala kwe-video yayo yenza amanyala.“Uwumuntu ozihlalela yedwa kubo, kanti bakhona abebembuza ukuthi njengoba esekhulile kungani engethathi unkosikazi kodwa ubelokhu engena ezintangeni kanti yena uyazi ukuthi wenzani. Izingane zethu zamantombazane ezincane aziphephile, besifisa ukuthi aboshwe ajeze ngoba lesi senzo sifaka indawo yangakithi ehlazweni,” lisho kanje.Ilungu lomphakathi lithe akaqali ukunukeka ezenzweni zokunukubeza ngokocansi izingane ezincane njengoba kuyisigameko abeke wasoleka ngaso eminyakeni eyishumi eyedlule lapho wayesolwa ekunukubezeni ezabafana kodwa icala elalivuliwe lagcina liphela.Kwi-video, Isolezwe eliyibonile, kubonakala owesifazane osemncane ngeminyaka ebusweni engakhombisi ukuthokozela okwenziwa kuye ngesikhathi lo wesilisa emphenduphendula, okwenza amanye amalungu omphakathi asole ukuthi kungenzeka kwakungayona intando yakhe kodwa wayeyikhohlise ngokuyinika okuthile.Nakuba kunjalo, elinye ilungu lomphakathi liveze ukuthi ngesikhathi kuhlaselwa le ndoda, owesifazane uveze ukuthi bayathandana waphinde wagxeka umphakathi ngokugxambukela ezindabeni zabo. Kuthiwa ngesikhathi eziphendulela owesilisa, uveze ukuthi owesifazane uneminyaka ewu-20 futhi unawo umazisi wakhe oveza lokho, okuyinto eshayisanayo nokushiwo wumphakathi. Kuthiwa uphinde waveza ukuthi baneminyaka emithathu bethandana futhi kuyaziwa nakubo. Ecacisa ngokusabalala kwe-video yabo bezitika ngocansi, kuthiwa uthe ulahlekelwe yiselula yakhe ngoLwesihlanu, usola ukuthi abayitholile yibona abasabalalise le video, okuyikhona okumdonsele amanzi ngomsele. Nakuba kunjalo, kuthiwa ukuqinisekisile ukuthi yayithathwe ngokuvumelana nathandana naye, okuqinisekiswe nawukuthi owesifazane aveze ukuthi alikho icala azomvulela lona. Elinye ilungu lomphakathi elikhulume neSolezwe, lithe bakholwa ukuthi intombazane isadungeke umqodo futhi okubuhlungu ukuthi kwi-video esabalele, ayisetshenzisiwe ikhondomu okubeka impilo yengane engcupheni.Imizamo yokuthola izinombolo zalaba bobabili noma izihlobo zabo ayiphumelelanga Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLieutenant  Colonel Robert Netshiunda, uqinisekise ukuthi kalikho icala elivulwe emaphoyiseni aseHowick, nawaseMpophomeni.

UKHALE ngabamzilise kabuhlungu eshonelwe umngani wakhe owesifazane waseNanda eThekwini obengumngani wephoyisa elibhokodwe ngommese yisoka lalo laze lafa ngeSonto.Kulesi sigameko kufe uNksz Yolanda Bianca Khuzwayo (23) waseGlenmore, kwaboshwa uMnuz Sizwe Ngema (27). Bobabili bebengamaphoyisa kaMasipala weTheku.Isigameko esishaqise abaningi, umsolwa enameka ezinkundleni zokuxhumana i-video kamufi ephuma umphefumulo, senzeke eflethini elisemgwaqweni uJoseph Nduli (Russell) enkabeni yeTheku.Emva kwalesi sigameko, kuvele izinkulumo ezehlukene, abanye bethi umsolwa ubulale umufi ngoba ethole ukuthi uhushule isisu.Abanye bebethi umsolwa uthole ukuthi ingane abeyikhulelwe umufi bekungesiyo eyakhe.Kugcine kungena igama likaNksz Anele Sandra Mkhize, ongumngani kamufi, kuthiwa uye obaqhathile, kwasolwa yena ngokubulawa komngani wakhe. Embhalweni omude awubhale ekhasini likaFacebook okukholakala ukuthi ngelikaNksz Mkhize, unameke nama-voice note amabili, eyakhe lapho abezwakalisa khona ukukhathazeka ngomufi, kuthi kwenye, kuzwakale umufi echaza ngesimo esingesihle phakathi kwakhe nomsolwa.Kwi-voice note okukholakala ukuthi ngekaNksz Mkhize, uzwakala ethi uzokhuluma iqiniso kumufi njengomngani.“Mngani ukhombisa ukudideka, ukhuluma into uphinde uziphikise, lokho kuyasisabisa singabangani bakho futhi kuyasikhathaza. Uma udiniwe othandweni, ufuna ukuyihushula ingane, uma ujabulile, ufuna ukuyigcina,” kusho uNksz Mkhize.Uqhuba athi bona bagcina bengasazi ukuthi kufanele bameseke kanjani.“Thatha isinqumo bese uyama kuso. Udinga ukuthi uhlale phansi, ucabangisise, bese uthatha isinqumo esisodwa, esizokweseka kuso thina,” kusho uNksz Mkhize.Uphinde athi uNksz Khuzwayo kudingeka athathe isinqumo ngokushesha ngoba isikhathi sesihambe kakhulu.Uveza ukuthi umufi ubeke washo ukuthi uzomtshela umsolwa ukuthi uyangabaza ukugcina ingane.“Ngagcina ngingazi ukuthi ngijabulele ukuba u-anti noma ngikhathazeke ngokuba umngani womuntu owumbulali. Kufanele usicacisele ukuthi sizoba ngo-anti noma sizoba abangani bombulali,” kusho uNksz Mkhize.Kuwona lo mbhalo uNksz Mkhize ubuye aveze ukuthi ukwehlulelwa kwakhe abantu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kuholele ekutheni angamukeleki emndenini kamngani wakhe.Waveza nokuthi ngenxa yabantu ‘abangazi lutho’ ngeke esakwazi ukungcwaba umngani wakhe. Ukhale ngabantu abakhuluma into abangayazi.Kwi-voice note okukholakala kuthi ekamufi, kuvela ukuthi wayesehlele ukuthi kungenele umamncane wakhe engxabanweni yakhe nomsolwa, wathi mhlawumbe uma ikhulunywa kukhona umuntu omdala izoxazululeka.Imizamo yokuthola uNksz Mkhize, ayiphumelelanga.Umamncane kamufi, uNksz Nozipho Khuzwayo ucele ukungaphenduli wathi akekho esimweni sokukhuluma nabezindaba.

UBALISA ngendlala yocansi owesilisa waseMphumulo, KwaMaphumulo, okhukhunyalelwa yisisu ngendlela eyethusayo.UMnuz Zakhele Mhlongo (43), okungesilona igama lakhe langempela, uthi usefisa ngisho ukufa kunokuthi aqhubeke aphile le mpilo ayichaza njengegcwele usizi nezinyembezi kuphela.Ulandise Isolezwe Ngempelasonto ngomnyombo wale nkinga abhekene nayo.Uthi ngo-2018 wazizwa enenkinga esiswini waya emtholampilo KwaDukuza okuyilapho abamhlinza khona.Uthi ngokwakhe wabona sengathi konke bakwenze kahle. Uveze ukuthi inkinga yaqala ngemuva kwezinyanga eziyisithupha ehlinziwe.''Njalo ekuseni isisu sami ngangisibona sivuvukala kancane kancane ohlangothini lwangakwesobunxele. Kuphele inyanga sesikhukhumele ngendlela ethusayo,'' usho kanje.Uthi uhambile eyocela esibhedlela ukuba bamhlinze kabusha bazame ukumlekelela kodwa kwanhlanga zimuka nomoya."Bakhala ngokuthi ifayela lami aliveli, akukho lapho okubonakala khona ukuthi ngangihlinzwe kulesi sibhedlela,'' echaza.Uthi kusukela lapho ucansi yinto aseyizwa ngendaba ngenxa yokuthi ngeke vele luze lwenzeke kulesi simo akusona."Kubuhlungu kakhulu ngoba phela kuyacaca ukuthi ngizogcina ngishiywa umkami ngenxa yale nkinga,'' ebalisa.Uveze ukuthi umkakhe uyalufuna ucansi. Naye uyavuma uthi akekho umuntu wesifazane owasuka kubo ezogana indoda engeke ize imthinte nje nhlobo.Uveze ukuthi unezingane ezintathu, kwazona akasenawo amandla okuthi azondle ngenxa yokuthi umsebenzi akawutholi.Uthi ubeke awuthole umsebenzi uma eya egqoke ijakhethi ezifihlile.Kodwa uthi inkinga beyiqala uma sebembuza abaphathi ukuthi yini le ayifihlile ngaphansi kwejakhethi."Uyabona nje emsebenzini wokugcina bangibizela ehhovisi bangibuza ukuthi yini le esesiswini sami enkulu kangaka. Kwathi uma ngibavezela abaphathi bami bamane bangixosha emsebenzini bekhala ngokuthi ngizofela emsebenzini,'' usho kanje izinyembezi zizehlela nje.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Ntokozo Maphisa, uthe lezi zinsolo ziyawukhathaza umnyango.‘Umthetho awusivumeli ukuthi sikhulume ngezinto ezithinta isiguli nokulashwa kwaso kodwa lolu daba sesilwedlulisele kubaphathi besibhedlela. Kumanje baxhumanile nesiguli basicela ukuba sibuyele esibhedlela ukuze sixilongwe. Sizoya khona ngoMsombuluko,“ kusho uMaphisa.Unxuse zonke iziguli ukuthi zingalinge zihambe ezikhungweni zezempilo zinganelisekile. Kumele zithintane nabaphathi besibhedlela ngoba lokho kuyilungelo lazo.

UBALISA ngosizi lokubulawa kwengane yakhe ebineminyaka emibili owesifazane okugcine kuboshwa owayeyisoka lakhe “elalingafuni ukwaliwa” eSiqungeni, eMthwalume.UNksz Phumzile Mthethwa ongunina ka-Ayabonga, uthi namanje usabuzwa ubuhlungu  uma ecabanga ingane yakhe.Kusolakala ukuthi u-Ayabonga ubulawe owayeyisoka likaNksz Mthethwa abase behlukene nalo, uMnuz Siyabonga Ndlovu ngenyanga edlule.“Angikho kahle emoyeni futhi angikhoni nokulala ebusuku ngihlala ngicabanga ingane yami. Isizungu sakhe siningi ngoba ubeyingane eziqinele nje. Ngiguliswa nayinqwaba yemibuzo engihlale ngibuzwa yona abaseshi,” kubalisa unina kamufi.Ube esefisela uNdlovu ukuthi aqhubeke nogqunywa ezitokisini aze alahlwe icala bese egwetshwa udilikajele.
