Nakuba ethe lokhu ngeke kuyivuse ingane yakhe kodwa kuzomthoba amanxeba.Uthe ukube bekusekhona isigwebo sentambo ubezofuna ukuthi uNdlovu agixabezwe ngaso.UNdlovu usanda kunqatshelwa ibheyili yiNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMzumbe ayekade evele kuyona.Bekulindeleke ukuthi abuyele enkantolo efanayo ngoLwesihlanu lapho bekuzokwenziwa khona amalungiselelo okuthi icala lidluliselwe enkantolo enkulu.Kusolakala ukuthi uNdlovu, obengamzali u-Ayabonga, wagajwa isikhwele engafuni ukwaliwa uNksz Mthethwa wadubela kumufi.Kusolakala ukuthi uNdlovu wathatha ingane kunina wayo omncane, uNksz Anele Mthethwa.Lo wesifazane uthi uNdlovu wathi uthunywe wunina wengane abahlezi naye kwamakhelwane ukuba azoyithatha kanti uyamkhohlisa.Kusolakala ukuthi uNdlovu wabulala u-Ayabonga wase eshayela ucingo unina wengane emazisa ukuthi usembulele isidumbu wasilahla egcekeni eduzane kwethangi lamanzi, wasimboza ngobhavu.Emuva kwalokho le ndoda kusolakala ukuthi yacasha, yase icela imali yokugibela ukuze ibaleke eMthwalume.UNksz Mthethwa (Anele) uthe esinye sezihlobo zikaNdlovu sathi akangene ebhuthuni yemoto ukuze amhambise lapho eya khona kanti simusa ngqo esiteshini samaphoyisa, kwaba ukuboshwa kwakhe.

BAFUNA ukukhulisa imakethe yemisebenzi yezandla yasemakhaya bayisabalalise nasemazweni aphesheya osomabhizinisi baseNkandla abasafufusa. Labo somabhizinisi basho kanje emcimbini wombukiso wezandla obuseNkandla Indoor Sport Centre izolo. UNksz Thabisile Ntombela waseNhloyana kuWard 6, waphelelwa umsebenzi ngesikhathi sobhubhane lweCovid-19, namhlanje usewusomabhizinisi owenza izikhwama zomtakabani. Kuleli bhizinisi wabona kugcono asebenze namalungu omndeni wakhe ngenxa yokuswela umsebenzi."Ngacela usizo kumngani owenza lo msebenzi kanti abantu bazowuthanda. Ngithunga noblankethi bezingane, ngenza nemihlobiso yokhiye. Zikhona nezingqinamba zemishini efanele engisadinga usizo lwayo kodwa umasipala uyasisiza ngokusiveza kubantu," kusho uNksz Ntombela.UNksz Hlobisile Khumalo weSizanani Huts waseSinqobile, uthe bangamalungu awu-37 asiza intsha ukuthi ifunde amakhono okwenza ubuhlalo, izinto zelala, ukuthunga nokunye okuningi. "Sibafundisa mahhala ukuze bakwazi ukudayisa baziphilise nokwenza sigcine sisebenzisa ubuhlalo obuningi busishodele. Sifisa ukukhula sikwazi nokuyodayisa emadolobheni amakhulu ngoba iningi imakethe khona. Lo mcimbi sifisa ukhule ngoba uzokwazi ukusiveza kubantu," kusho uNksz KhumaloUNksz Nomalungelo Nkabinde ungomunye wabesifazane abakhulisa osomabhizinisi abaningi ngokuhambela imibukiso ehlukene emaketha imisebenzi yabo. Akagcini lapho, uphinde abalekelele ngokuthenga eminye yemisebenzi yabo ayoyidayisa emibukisweni ehlukene."Kuyasisiza kakhulu ukungena emibukisweni kamasipala futhi nosekhaya ukwazi ukuthola isinkwa ngokuthi adayise umsebenzi wakhe. Siyafisa ukukhula nombukiso kamasipala ukwazi ukusabalala usifake kwezinye izindawo," usho kanje.IMeya kaMasipala, uMnuz Mbhekiseni Biyela, ithe bafuna ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ayasimama amabhizinisi endawo ukuze abantu bezosebenza ngokubambisana. "Silwa nokuthi abantu balindele ukuqashwa kodwa bangene kulo mkhakha wamabhizinisi. Ukuzisebenza kunothile futhi kuyawuthuthukisa nomnotho wendawo nokwenza silokhu sivakashela umphakathi sibheka izinsiza ezingasiza ukugcina la mabhizinisi esebenza," kusho uBiyela.

UBANJWE esikhumulweni sezindiza owesilisa odabuka kwelaseChina, obefunelwa icala lokubulala namanye okuzama ukubulala kulandela isigameko esenzeka ngenyanga edlule eDurban North.Abesifazane abane abadabuka e-Asia babehleli emzini abebeqashe kuwo osemgwaqweni u-Adelaide Tambo, eDurban North, ngesikhathi kufika owesilisa naye owuhlanga lwabo.“La besifazane bacele umlisa lo obefika ukuba abahambise esitolo esiseduze. Ngesikhathi bengena emotweni, kuphume omunye wesilisa naye owuhlanga lwabo, wavulela ngenhlamvu ebhekise kubona,” kusho amaphoyisa ngesitatimende.Kushone owesifazane oyedwa, abanye baphuthunyiswa esibhedlela besesimweni esibucayi.Umsolwa wabaleka ngemuva kokwenza leli cala. Uphenyo lwamaphoyisa luwaholele esikhumulweni sezindiza i-OR Tambo International lapho kubanjwe khona umsolwa uChong Cheng odabuka eChina.Ngemuva kokuboshwa kwakhe, lo mlisa oneminyaka engu-36, uvele kancane eNkantolo yesiFunda eGuateng ngaphambi kokubuyiswa KwaZulu-Natal, lapho avele khona eNkantolo yesiFunda eThekwini ngoMsombuluko, ngo-Meyi 6.Uzogqunywa esitokisini aze abuyele enkantolo ngoMeyi 15, lapho azofaka khona isicelo sebheyili.

Kuboshwe ababili abatholakale nesidumbu sigoqwe ngoplastiki emotweni ngesikhathi amaphoyisa kaMasipala weTheku enze isivimbamgwaqo kuM41 ngoMgqibelo ebusuku.Amaphoyisa athe abone umshayeli esolisa ngaphambi kokuzama ukubaleka.“Ngemuva kokumjaha ibanga elifishane, amaphoyisa ngesikhathi ehlolisisa imoto athole isidumbu somuntu sigoqwe ngoplastiki. Kubizwe abezimo eziphuthumayo abafike baqinisekisa ukuthi umuntu ufile,” kusho amaphoyisa.Athe abasolwa ababili baboshelwe esiteshini samaphoyisa akwaSAPS eDurban North ngesikhathi kusaqhubeka uphenyo.Abanye abangu-16 baboshelwe ukushayela bephuzile. Abesilisa abangu-14 nabesifazane ababili.Isikali sikatshwala esiphezulu esitholakale komunye kube ngu-0.71mg/1.

UMengameli weNFP, uMnuz Ivan Barnes, uyaqhubeka nokulolela izembe abaholi benhlangano abaqavile.Muva nje, kuputshuke incwadi lapho uBarnes ebizela iMeya yaseDumbe, uMnuz Sibusiso Mkhabela, emhlanganweni ophuthumayo.Kule ncwadi ebonwe yiSolezwe Ngempelasonto, uBarnes uthe ufuna ukuthi uMkhabela azochaza ngezinto ezithinta ukuphathwa komkhandlu.INFP iphethe lo mkhandlu ngokubambisana ne-ANC.UBarnes uthe uthole izikhalazo ebuholini be-ANC esifundeni iMzala Nxumalo, athe abeneme ngokuphathwa komkhandlu.“Uma izinto zingalungiseki ngokushesha zingase zibeke engcupheni ubudlelwane bethu ne-ANC komasipala, esifundazweni nakuzwelonke.”UMkhabela uphinde abe usihlalo weNFP kazwelonke.Ethintwa yiSolezwe Ngempelasonto, uBarnes ukuqinisekisile ukuthi usebhalele uMkhabela incwadi embizela emhlanganweni kodwa wanqaba ukuphawula ngayo.“Lena yindaba ethinta iqembu, ngeke ngiphawule ngayo kwabezindaba. Lona othumele abezindaba le ncwadi ugangile, mhlawumbe ubezitshela ukuthi ngizoyeka ukubuza imibuzo. Ngiyazi ukuthi iputshuke kanjani incwadi yaze yafika kwabezindaba,” kuphendula uBarnes.Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kukaMkhabela ayizange iphumelele ngoba ucingo lwakhe belungangeni, futhi akazange awuphendule nomyalezo awuthunyelwe.UMkhabela akasiye umholi weNFP wokuqala ukubhalewa incwadi eshubile nguBarnes.Muva nje, uBarnes ubhalele iphini lemeya kumasipala waseThekwini, uNksz Zandile Myeni, imeya yomasipala wakwaNongoma uMnuz Mshangane Ndabandaba, nonobhala jikelele weqembu, uMnuz Teddy Thwala, izincwadi ezibayalela ukuba bachaze ukuthi kungani kungafanele ukuthi bamiswe.Labaholi basolwa ngamacala ahlukene. Basanda kubhalela uBarnes incwadi yabameli bemsababisa ngokumthathela izinyathelo zomthetho uma ebamisa.Umthombo ongaphakathi kwiNFP uthe izingxabano eziningi eqenjini  zidalwa ukungaboni ngaso linye ngodaba oluthinta uhulumeni wokubambisana ophethe KwaZulu-Natal.UBarnes uke wasabisa ngokuthi iNFP izohoxa kulo hulumeni emva kokuthi ephuthwe yisikhundla sobumeya kumasipala wesifunda, iZululand.UBarnes wayekholelwa ekutheni iNFP ne-IFP kufanele basebenzisane nakomasipala ngoba sebebambisene esifundazweni.Nokho isikhundla sobumeya kumasipala waseZululand sagcina sithathwa yikhansela le-IFP, uMnuz Michael 'Mkhonyovu' Khumalo.Kwaba khona abaholi beNFP, okubalwa kubo uThwala, abaphumela obala bathi ngeke iNFP ihoxe kuhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal.Ilungu leNFP eliqavile elicele ukuba igama lalo lingadalulwa, lithe izinto zimapeketwane ebuholini beNFP.“Le nto ibaqhathile kakhulu abaholi. Wonke umuntu uzibheke yena. Le ndaba yokubusa ngokubambisana isiqhathe kakhulu. Asazi ukuthi iyozala nkomoni. Okubuhlungu ukuthi sisanda kukhetha ubuholi obusha, lobu osebubhekene ngeziqu zamehlo manje.”

KUTHIWA ubesebenzisa iNcwadi eNgcwele ukuxhopha izingane uMfundisi webandla elise-Waterloo, ngase-Verulam, otitinywe kanzima ngabantu emva kokuvela kokuthi ubuye anukubeze ngokocansi abafanyana angumqeqeshi wabo ebholeni.Lo msolwa oneminyaka engu-57, kuthiwa ungeniswe esibhedlela kukubi lapho eluswe khona amaphoyisa. Kuthiwa ithumba ngemikhuba asolelwa kuyo liqhunjuswe omunye wabafana oqunge isibindi wabikela unina ngamanyala enziwa kubo. Kuthe ngoLwesibili ntambama, umphakathi wendawo wamthelekela, usho ukumudla luhlaza. Nakuba usindile yingoba kufike onogada benkampani i-Reaction Unit of South Africa (Rusa).UMnuz Xolani Ngcobo, onguSihlalo wekomiti elibhekelele ukulwa nobugebengu endaweni, uthe omunye wabafana abebeqeqeshwa wumsolwa ubikele unina ngobekwenzeka. Uthe umsolwa ubehlala yedwa ngakho izingane bezimvakashela, ewumuntu ozifundisa ngeBhayibheli nangebhola obekwenza abazali banganaki.“Sitshelwe ukuthi uyabaqeqesha ebholeni njengoba eneqembu labafana abancane abaneminyaka engaphansi kuka-10. Abagilwa abane abaphumele obala ngaleso senzo baveze ukuthi uqala ebabhixe ngo-Vaselina ngemuva ngaphambi kokubanukubeza alale nabo. Baveza ukuthi kwesinye isikhathi uyabaphoqa ukuthi bamphulule umphambili, kanti izingane bezisaba ukusho ngoba ubesonga ngokuzenzakalisa,” usho kanje.Umsolwa kuthiwa uqashwe kuMasipala weTheku, kanti lokhu kokufundisa ngeBhayibheli nokuqeqesha ubekwenza ngesikhathi sakhe.UMnuz Prem Balram we-Rusa, uthe ngesikhathi befika umsolwa ubesehlutshulwe konke abekugqokile, esenqunu, abantu besafuna ukuqhubeka nokumshaya.“Sithole ukuthi umsolwa lokhu ubesekwenze isikhathi esingangonyaka. Kuthiwa ubeziqhuba izingane ziyiqembu noma ahehe eyodwa, azifakele izidakamizwa bese egila le mikhuba. Kusolwa ukuthi umsolwa phambilini ubeseke waboshelwa icala elifanayo lokudlwengula umfana omncane alenze eMhlasini, kodwa lokhu akukaqinisekiswa,” usho kanje.UNksz S’bo Ngcobo wenhlangano ebhekelele izingane engenzinzuzo, uThingo Crisis, uthe isikhathi esiningi izingane zinukubezwa ngabantu abasuke bethenjiwe.“Kubalulekile ukuthi singabazali siqaphele kakhulu izingane zethu, sizinike isikhathi sokukhuluma nazo sizilalele. Noma ngabe ingane yenza ezemidlalo, kubalulekile ukuthi umzali abe nobudlelwano nomqeqeshi, azi futhi ukuthi ingane yakhe idlala kuphi, nini. Kumele ahambe ayoyibuka uma kunemidlalo ukuze uma kukhona okungahambi kahle kuzoba lula ukuthi asheshe asole,” usho kanje.Uthe abazali kumele baqinisekise ukuthi izingane ezidlule kulesi simo ziyakuthola ukwelulekwa ngokomqondo ukuze zingabinakho ukuzenyeza nolaka esikhathini esizayo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe kuboshwe umsolwa ona-57 ngamacala okudlwengulwa kwabafana abane.“Amacala okudlwengula avulwe esiteshini samaphoyisa e-Verulam. Imibiko iveza ukuthi umsolwa ushaywe ngamalungu omphakathi kanti ungaphansi kweso lamaphoyisa esibhedlela,” usho kanje.

UBENOKHWANTALALA, ehlale ebalisa ngoyise okukholakala ukuthi wathunjwa wangaphinde wabuya ekhaya, umfundi waseKuhlekonke eMaswazini, ngaphansi kukaMasipala Umngeni, isidumbu sakhe esitholwe ngabanye abafundi silenga elawini lakhe.UMlondi Hlengwa (18) okuthiwa ubedume ngelikaMbududu, efunda uGrade 11 kulesi sikole, isidumbu sakhe sitholwe abanye abafundi abangabangani bakhe sivalelwe elawini lakhe silengiswe ngentambo ophahleni lwendlu ngezikhathi zokuphuma kwesikole.Owomndeni, uNksz Nozipho Hlengwa elandisa Isolezwe, uthe umufi ubezihlalela nabantu asebekhulile ngakho bebezitshela ukuthi uvuke waphikelela esikoleni  njengezinye izingane.“Baqale ukubona ngesikhathi kufika abafundi abejwayelene nabo bezombheka. Nabafundi kuthiwa bathe abazange bambone esikoleni ngalolo suku, kanti ubematasa ebabhalela imiyalezo abangayiqondi kwiFacebook.  Ngesikhathi kuvulwa isicabha sendlu yakhe, bazithele esidunjini silenga okukholakala ukuthi uzibulele,” usho kanje.Uthe ubeyingane ebizithulela, ihlonipha futhi ihlakaniphile nasesikoleni ngakho okusolisayo ukuthi ubehleze ebalisa ngoyise owanyamalala ngo-2019. Uyise kuvela ukuthi washayelwa ucingo othile wathi abahlangane naye eThekwini, kukhona umsebenzi wonogada ovelayo, kwabe ukugcina kokubonwa kwakhe. Kuthiwa isigameko sokunyamalala kukayise okunenkolelo yokuthi wenzakaliswa, saphoqa ukuthi abuyele koninalume ayohlala khona. Umufi kuvela ukuthi wayekhule ekhonze kakhulu uyise, ezihlalela naye, okukholakala ukuthi yinto ebihlale imhlupha ukuhamba kwakhe ngaleya ndlela.Isolezwe liyibonile eminye imibhalo ekhasini lakhe kwiFacebook okukhona kuyo othi;“Uphi ubabawakho? Akukho lula ukuthi ngithi anginaye.”Umndeni uthi akusona isigameko sokuqala sokuthi kubekhona emndenini ohamba ngale ndlela njengoba umkhulu wakhe omncane ngasohlangothini likanina nobabomncane wakhe nabo badlula emhlabeni ngendlela efanayo.Umufi kuthiwa ubedume ngokuzigidela ingoma, kangangoba ngesikhathi ebhalela abangani bakhe afunda nabo umyalezo, kuthiwa ubacele ukuthi bafike bonke baphelele emcimbini wakhe ngoLwesihlanu kugidwe ingoma kuze kuse, okukholakala ukuthi ubeqonde umngcwabo wakhe.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa ase-Taylor’s Halt, avule idokodo lophenyo ngokufa komuntu emva kokuthi isidumbu sakhe sitholwe silengisiwe kubo ngoMsombuluko.

ASEWU-42 amacala athweswe owesilisa osolwa ngokudlwengula ekhombe abesifazane ngesibhamu noma ummese bese ebaphanga nomazisi babo.Umsolwa uMnuz Khethani Khoni (31), oshadelwe nonabantwana abathathu, uvele eNkantolo yeMantshi eMlaza, izolo, ecela ibheyili.Umphenyi wecala, uSergeant Mndeni Mzila, uthe babophe uKhuboni ngo-Agasti 27, endlini yakhe esehostela eGlebelands, eMlaza.Ephikisa ukuthi anikwe ibheyili, uthe umsolwa akaqali ukuboshwa.“Uthweswe amacala angu-20 okudlwengulwa, amanye awu-20 okuphanga esebenzisa udlame namabili okushaya,” kusho umphenyi.Umsolwa kuthiwa uhlanganiswa ulibofuzo, amaselula awebela abagilwa nokuxhumana kwakhe nabagilwa ngezingcingo.UMzila uthe indawo okwakwenzeka khona isigameko iyodwa, isenkundleni yezemidlalo eGlebelands.Kuthiwa umsolwa wayesebenzisa uzinkundla nokuxhumana u-Facebook no-WhatsApp enze ubuhlobo nabagilwa.“Wayecela ujuhlangana nabo, abaqashele u-Uber uma esethole ukuthi bangobani futhi bahlalaphi. Babefika  kwaJeena, esebalindile uKhuboni,” kuchaza UMzila.Kuthiwa wayetshela abagilwa ukuthi uthunywe umuntu abekade exoxa naye kumakhalekhukhwini ukuba azomlanda ngoba yena umatasa.Kusolakala ukuthi uKhuboni wayehamba nomgilwa, uma esethi dundu kule nkundla aqale izimanga.“Wayedonsa ummese noma isibhamu akhombe umgilwa bese eyadlwengula, uma eseqedile aphange umakhalekhukhwini womgilwa. Abagilwa ngokungayazi indawo babeya egaraji eliseduzane bacele usizo. Abanye abagilwa uKhuboni wayefika nabo ngo-Uber, enze esifanayo, “ kuchaza uMzilaUmphenyi uthe akanalo ulwazi noma bayazana yini abagilwa kodwa imiphumela yolibufuzo eyisikhombisa isiqinisekisile ukuthi nguKhuboni owadlwengula. Kusalindwe eminye imiphumela.Kuvele nokuthi ngoJulayi 2022, waboshwa uKhuboni wabekwa icala lokushaya nokuphuca owesifazane i-weave (izinwele zokufakelwa).Kwathathwa ulibofuzo lwakhe lwathunyelwa ePitoli, wakhululwa ngebheyili.NgoJanuwari nyakenye, wasolakala ekudlwenguleni nasekwebeni i-laptop, kwaphinde kwathathwa ulibofuzo lwakhe.Kuthiwa wayezishintsha amagama ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, uma ebona ukuthi sekuyambhedela.Kuthiwa kwathathwa amasampula akubagilwa athunyelwa e-laboratory ayohlolwa, kwavela ukuthi uKhuboni umsolwa, amaphoyisa amthungatha amthola ehostela.Ngakolunye uhlangothi, uKhuboni uvumile ukuthi ushadelwe, unabantwana abathathu futhi nguye kuphela owondla umndeni njengoba inkosikazi ingasebenzi.UKhuboni othe uno-matric, udalule ukuthi umndeni wakhe wondliwa uninakhulu ogulayo ngoba yena uboshiwe.Uthe uhlele ukuwaphika wonke amacala aziswe ngawo eboshwa. Uthe ngeke abe yingozi kofakazi nasemphakthini uma ededelwa futhi angakwazi ukukhokha ka-R20 000 ukuze adedelwe.Uthe uzobuveza ubumsulwa bakhe uma sekuqulwa icala futhi ungusomabhizinisi onenkampani eyakha ifenisha yepulangwe.Ubekade ebukeka ezikhululekele, elokhu ejeqeza emaceleni nangemuva kwayo, ibuke sakusabisa abebethamele icala abebegqoke izimpahla ze-EFF.Icala liqhubeka ngoMsombuluko.

BEKUKHONA okumtshelayo owesifazane obesekubalwa izinsuku atete, odlule emhlabeni kungqongqa umjondolo abevaleleke kuwo kokheleka neminingi okushiye abaningi abahlala emijondolo eseKenville, eThekwini, besele dengwane, esigamekweni esenzeke ngoMgqibelo ebusuku.Ngesikhathi Isolezwe lifika kuleya ndawo, bekuwunyu nosizi lodwa kumalungu omphakathi amanye  abebonakala encike ngengcosana yezimpahla ezisinde kusha. Buqamama, ezansi le, amaphoyisa abematasa nezinsalela zesidumbu sikaNksz Nomthandazo Dawodi (30) nombungu wakhe, okuthiwa ubesengateta noma yinini njengoba bese zevile kweziyisishiyagalombili izinyanga ezithwele.Umngani kamufi uNksz Nonhlanhla Mgwaba imijondolo yabo ebeyincikene, uthe bekungathi kukhona obekumtshela indlela abeyiyo ngaphambi kwalesi sigameko.“Okusixakayo ukuthi sipheka endlini yami, kweyakhe uyalala kuphela bekungekho sitofu kodwa umlilo uqale khona. Ngendlela abeyiyo bekungathi uyabikelwa, akazange adle ngisho ukudla, kanti ubethule engaswabulukile njengasemihleni. Ushayela ucingo wonke umuntu wakubo, kuthe kanti sijwayele ukuphuza ukulala, kodwa wathi ucela ukuyophumula ukhathele,” usho kanje.Uthe uzwe ngomsindo abantu beshaya isicabha ukuthi kusha umjondolo wakhe, bazama ukumsiza njengoba ubevaleleke ngaphakathi endlini evalwa ngamaketango, kwasho ukuthi sekuhambe isikhathi, amalangabi asekhotha isibhakabhaka futhi sekokheleke neminye imijondolo.“Kwamina ngiphume nengikugqokile kuphela. Kushe konke enginakho; omazisi, izincwadi zezingane zesikole, ukudla, ngisele nginje. Nginezingane ezimbili ezifunda uGrade 10 esikoleni eSea Cow Lake Secondary neyodwa efunda uGrade 4, angazi ngizothathani ngihlanganise nani,” kubalisa yena.Isoka likamufi uMnuz Thulani Mhlongo elidabuka eShowe elithe besebeneminyaka emithathu bethandana futhi bebesebenza ndawonye, lisola ukuthi kukhona okushaya amanzi ngokufa ngesihluku kothandiweyo wakhe.“Ugesi ubungakaze uhambe futhi izintambo zikagesi bezingekho esimweni sokuthi sezingasha kuqaleke umlilo, futhi ubewudonsela ukukhanyisa njengoba ubengaphekeli endlini yakhe. Kuyamangaza ukuthi kungani isicabha singavulekanga ngoba bekuyisicabha esidala noma ubani obengasikhahlela sivuleke. Lokhu kwenza ngisole ukuthi kukhona oqale umlilo,” kusho isoka.UMhlongo egcina ukubonana naye emini ngosuku okwenzeke ngalo isigameko, ubewumuntu obengeneme kangangoba wambuza ukuthi kukhona yini okungamphethe kahle kodwa umufi wathi akafuni ukuqhatha abantu. Umtshele ukuthi kunofike kuyena abamjwayele, wathi akathandaze okuyinto esamdida namanje ukuthi ubesho ukuthini njengoba kwehle lesi sehlo. Uthe odokotela bebeqinisekise ukuthi bazothola ingane yomfana.UNksz Ntombozuko Daniso osekomitini lomphakathi uthe yevile ku-270 imijondolo eshile, kanti zingu-89 izingane ezisale zingenamakhaya. Bangu-342 abantu abadala.“Okwamanje ngoba kusekusha besingakatshelwa ukuthi sizosizakala kanjani kwazise kusabalwa. Kodwa indlela okwenzeke ngayo, kusihlukumezile kakhulu kangangoba abanye abasele nabakugqokile kuphela,” kusho uNksz Daniso.Kushaye isikhathi sokushicilela amaphoyisa engakayiphenduli imibuzo athunyelelwe yona.

UBEMAGANGE efika ekhaya ngoMsombuluko owesifazane waseDumisani Makhaye, eMpangeni, obebuya koteta, ethi uzokhombisa umufi ingane yakwabo ezelwe.Nokho injabulo yakhe iphenduke eyesikhashana, ethola ukuthi indodakazi yakhe, uZanokuhle Khumalo (7) unyamalele.Isidumbu sikaZanokuhle sigcine sitholwa sishuthekwe ngo-plasitiki ngaphansi kombhede wesiqashi endaweni ngoLwesibili, kanti kusolwa ukuthi uklinyiwe.Elandisa ngesigameko umakhelwane, uMnuz Sandile Mhlongo, olusukumele phezulu udaba, uthe ufike kubo ngoMsombuluko, ingundabamlonyeni eyokunyamalala kukamufi.Uveze ukuthi unina kamufi, uNksz Nondumiso Khumalo, uthe efika ebuya esibhedlela wabe ebuza ukuthi uphi uZanokuhle, ufuna ukumkhombisa ingane yakwabo.“Kuqale kwathiwa uhambe wayodlala nokuthe uma esebhekwa, kwavela ukuthi umasitende kamsolwa, uke wamthuma amaphilisi ezinhlungu esitolo,” kusho uMhlongo.Uqhube wathi kugcine kubikelwa amaphoyisa, wabe esabalalisa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ukuthi bacela ukufuniswa umufi.Uthe ngoLwesibili, behlangene ngalo udaba eduze kwesitolo, iChakalaka, kuqhamuke umasitende kamsolwa ethwele izandla ekhanda ethi: “Waze wangigila umfana, uthi ubulale ingane wayifaka ngaphansi kombhede.”Uthe banikele khona endlini, nebala bayithola ingane ngaphansi kombhede.Uqhube wathi bahlome ngemibuzo owesifazane owafika ngaye endaweni lona wesilisa, obayalele lapho kuhlala khona intombi yakhe (umsolwa).“Sithe uma sifika kuyo, yathi akekho kuyona kodwa uke wayitshela ukuthi wenze into engadala ukuthi alahlekelwe yimpilo yakhe. Ugcine esiyalela umngani asondelene naye kakhulu, sanikela kuye,” kusho uMhlongo.Uqhube wathi umngani ubatshele ukuthi umgcine ethi use-B&B eseHillview.Uthe bathe uma befika khona, izisebenzi zakhona zathi wenze okungajwayelekile, ebhalisela ukuhlala isikhashana kodwa wabuye wahamba.“Ngisole ukuthi kukhona okushaya amanzi ngalokhu, ngabampintshela ekutheni basikhombise igumbi abelibhalisile. Silithole likhiyiwe, sangqongqoza, wangavula. Kuthe uma umngani wakhe embiza ngegama, wasabela masinyane. Sibe sesingena ngendlovu iyangena, samxhakathisa, samyisa emaphoyiseni,” kusho uMhlongo.“Unina wengane namanje akakholwa ukuthi ingane yakhe ibulelwe. Nomphakathi ushaqekile futhi udiniwe. Sithe uma simbuza umsolwa ukuthi uyibulaleleni ingane, wathi ingoba inqabile ukulala naye.”Uthe bathole ukuthi ungowaseMacekane.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa aseMpangeni abophe owesilisa (33) ngecala lokuthumba nelokubulala.“Uboshwe emuva kokutholwa kwesidumbu sengane (7) ngaphansi kombhede kamsolwa owaziwayo ngoLwesibili, eDumisani Makhaye,” kusho uNetshiunda.Uqhube wathi umsolwa bekulindeleke ukuthi avele eNkantolo yeMantshi eNgwelezane ngoLwesine.

Obengumsakazi woKhozi FM, uBheka “Beekay” Mchunu ubehlushwa yinto ebikhuphuka esifubeni nasentanyeni imncishe umoya.Lokhu kuvezwe ngumnngani wakhe uLungelo “Ngelo V” Vilane ngesikhathi ekhuluma enkonzweni yomngcwabo kaBeekay ebiKwaDlangezwa, eMpangeni, ngeSonto.UBeekay (45), ochazwe njengomuntu obenenhliziyo emnene, ephana, enamahlaya futhi ethobekile, ushone ngoLwesibili ngemuva kokugula isikhathi.UNgelo V uthe uBeekay uqale ukugula ngo-2020, kuyinto encane kodwa abantu bagcina sebebona ngoba kwakumphazamisa emsakazweni kokunye angaluqedi uhlelo.“Wathi bafo ngiyagula ngisaya kodokotela. Ngancokola ngathi asiyohlola, wathi asingene sobabili sahlola saphuma sihleka,” kusho uNgelo V.Uthe bazame odokotela besintu nabesilungu futhi ngisho eyohlola ubethi abangene bobaili.“Ngiyazi ukuthi niyakhala nithi kumzumile thina esibe seduze kwakhe sithi uphumulile. Ugulile ubafo.”Uthe ubekhala athi kunento enyuka esifubeni, ekhala ngekhanda nenkwantshu ezandleni.“Uma ekhala ngento enyuka la ubuyibona, ubusibona isifuba sikabafo sikhukhumala. Entanyeni ubuyibona acokame afune umoya.”Uthe uBeekay ugule emoyeni nasenyameni ngoba ubenomusa ephana kodwa abantu athe ukhanyise izibani zabo abazange bavele kuye, uma bekhona bancane.Ubalule ukhwantalala nengcindezi athe ube nayo yamhlukumeza nasemzimbeni.Umafungwase kaBeekay, uZiyanda, ekhulumela izingane zakwabo, uchaze uyise njengendoda ebilungile futhi ibathanda. UZiyanda uthe ngesikhathi uyise egula bekunzima ukumbona ehlukumezeka kodwa bezama ukuqina.“Kubuhlungu kakhulu ukuthi sonke simi la asisenababa kodwa sinomama bethu, obaba omncane nobaba abadala. Sithembisa ukwenza ubaba aziqhenye ngathi,” kusho uZiyanda obebuye acaphune amavesi eBhayibheli.Uthe ubethanda umndeni wakhe, abangani nozakwabo.UBeekay ubeyingane yesithathu kuyise uNhlamvana Mchunu nonina uBonakele Mchunu ongasekho.UBeekay ushiye emhlabeni izingane zakhe eziyisithupha, odadewabo nabafowabo abayisishiyagalolunye sebebonke.Umfowabo kaBeekay, uSifiso, uthe bebefisa ukumngcwaba kwesaKwaMthethwa lapho azalwa khona kodwa umholi wamaNazaretha aseBuhleni uNyazi, lwanqaba lubuza ukuthi kukhona bani khona?“Ngithe mina ukhona ubaba omncane. Wabuza ukuthi akude kangakanani amathuna? Ngithe athe ukuqhela. Wathi ngeke uBeekay angcwatshwe kanjalo, phela inkosi le. Bazophalazela kuye bagezele kuye. Zama indlela, ngithi mina angazi baba lapho esikhona. Sebakuvala ukuthi uma wakhe ngaleyo ndlela ungcwabe egcekeni. Uthe hamba ukhulume noZungu,” kusho uSifiso.Uthe usuke kuNyazi ephithene ikhanda kodwa iNkosi uZungu yavuma.Enkonzweni yomngcwabo abantu bebephume ngobuningi babo, abanye beyithamele bukhoma kwiFacebook ekhasini leNcanda Funerals lapho ebisakazwa khona.Uhlelo beluphethwe nguLinda Sibiya, Dudu Khoza noNgizwe Mchunu.Bekukhona abasakazi, izikhulu zikahulumeni, osomabhizinisi nabanye.

UMNDENI wowesifazane okuthiwa udutshulwe wabulawa ngobeyisoka lakhe eHighflats, ngoMsombuluko, wase ezibulala naye, uveze ukuthi ubemsongela ngokumbulala emva kokumala.Kuvela ukuthi bese kuphele izinyanga ezimbili umgilwa, uNksz Mandisa Mgenge (33) atshela umsolwa, uMnuz Dumisani ‘Bhejane’ Msomi, naye okuthiwa uzibulalele endaweni yesigameko, ukuthi ucu alusahlangani.Kuthiwa umgilwa wakubeka kwacaca ukuthi uqeda ubudlelwano ngoba engaliboni ikusasa nomsolwa njengoba eganiwe aphinde abe nonina wezingane.Isihlobo sikaNksz Mgenge, esicele ukungadalulwa sithe umndeni ubunalo ulwazi ngezinsongo zokubulala kodwa ungazithatheli phezulu, uzitshela ukuthi umsolwa uyazisabisela nje.Uveze ukuthi bese kuphele izinyanga ezimbili umgilwa amala umsolwa kodwa engafuni nakuyizwa leyo.Uthe umgilwa wayebeka yona indaba yokuganwa kukamsolwa ukuthi idweba isthombe esicacile sokuthi bona bobabili alikho ikusasa elingaba khona phakathi kwabo.“Ukuveze kaningi ukuthi ngeke avume ukuhlukana naye, waze walimisa ngesihloko elokuthi uzombulala okungcono bese eyazibulala naye, nokuyinto agcine eyenza ngempela,” kusho isihlobo.Sithe lokhu ubekusho kuye umgilwa, aphinde akusho nakomunye udadewabo kanjalo nakubazali bakamgilwa uqobo, okuthiwa ubebashayela ucingo uma esesonga.Isihlobo siphinde sasola amaphoyisa ngokuhluleka ukumvikela umgilwa, kwaze kwaba ubulawa ngempela.“Nakuba abazali bengazithathelanga phezulu izinsongo ezazenziwa umsolwa, umgilwa wazisukumela. Waze waya ngisho emaphoyiseni ukuyobika kodwa amchilizela izandla, ethi akukho angamsiza ngakho ngoba umsolwa akaze ambeke isandla, umsabise ngamazwi kuphela,” kusho isihlobo.Uthe lokhu abaphoyisa akwenza phezu kokuba umgilwa ewachazele ukuthi umsolwa uke wamkhomba ngesibhamu, wathi ukuba enza okuthize ngezinsongo, mhlawumbe ngabe umgilwa usaphila.Ubuye wathi bewumndeni kubadinile ukuthi uMsomi aphendule izingane zikamgilwa ezisencane - azithola ebudlelwaneni baphambilini - izintandane.“Lo muntu ubenomfazi wakhe, eganiwe. Ubebuye aphinde abe nonina wezingane. Isidingo sokuthi abulale isihlobo sethu besingekho,” kusho isihlobo.Sichaza ngokuthiwa kwenzeke endaweni yesigameko, sithe umsolwa ufike wavulela ngenhlamvu kumgilwa esendlini adayisela kuyo imithi kayise, owaziwa ngelikaMgenge, inyanga edumile yaseMzinto.Uthe emva kokudutshulwa ebusweni, entanyeni nasesifubeni, umgilwa uzamile ukuphuma abaleke, kodwa wawa esabaleke ibanga elifishane.Uthe kuphele amahora amabili ephila engalutholi usizo, amaphoyisa ethi akulindwe umndeni wakhe, nothe uma usufika umphuthumisa esibhedlela, wafike washona.Isihlobo sikamsolwa, uMnuz Thabani Msomi, uthe kulukhuni ukuthi bakhulume kakhulu ngesigameko ngoba abazi ukuthi bekubangwani.“Sisola ukuthi bebexabene. Thina sazi ukuthi bebethandana, cishe sekuphele iminyaka emithathu bethandana,” kusho uMsomi.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa aseHighflats, aphenya icala lokubulala emva kwesigameko sokudutshulwa kubulawe owesifazane oneminyaka engu-33, ngumuntu wesilisa amaziyo.“Imibiko ithi lona wesilisa naye uzidubulile,” kusho uNetshiunda.

UZAME kaningi ukulugwema uhambo lokuyothatha ikhasimende Kwa-E eNtuzuma umshayeli wezimoto ezikhokhelwa ngebanga ezilihambile waseLindelani otholwe eshiswe nemoto ngoLwesibili ekuseni.UMnuz Lungisani Cele (28) ongowokudabuka ePort Shepstone, utholwe eshiswe nemoto yekhe iTotoya Corolla Cross ngoLwesibili emva kokuthi ephume eyothatha ikhasimende ngoMsombuluko ebusuku. I-app abesebenza ngayo yi-Bolt.Umzala wakhe, uMnuz Mhlengi Xaba, naye ohlala emqashweni oseduze nokamufi eLindelani, uthe usinqabe kaningi isicelo ebesiya ngala agcine ebulawelwa khona.“Uqale wasinqaba kaningi, ethi akafuni ukuya kuso. Lo obesifaka isicelo, ubelokhu eqhubeke njalo nokusifaka. Uthe esuka wabe esamukela,” kusho uXaba.Uqhube wathi ngesikhathi esamukela, uthe kubona usivuma ngoba siseduze. Elilinganisa ibanga uXaba,  liphakathi kwamakhilomitha amabili kuya kwamathathu ukusuka emqashweni wabo.Uthe baqale ukuqaphela ukuthi kukhona okushaya amanzi ekuseni ngoLwesibili ngesikhathi sekufona izisebenzi avame ukuziyisa emsebenzini ngo-6, zithi akazilandile.“Sithe uma sibheka, sabona imoto yakhe ingekho, saqala sadideka. Sithathe inye iselula yakhe, nayo enemininingwane yakhe yokungena kwi-app ka-Bolt, sangena kwi-app sabona ukuthi ugcine ngalo lolu hambo kwaseNtuzuma obeluthathe ngabo-08:30 ebusuku ngoMsombuluko,” kusho uXaba.Uqhube wathi balandele izinkomba zohambo, ezibathathe zababeka endaweni yesigameko.“Sizithele phezu kwamaphoyisa nongoti abahlola izindawo zezigameko, behlola indawo yesigameko. Bekukhona imoto yakhe, ishile, sathola ukuthi naye ushele phakathi,” kulandisa uXaba.Uqhube wathi umufi ubelaliswe ezihlalweni zangemumva nokubenza basole ukuthi uqale wabulawa ngaphambi kokuthi ashiswe nemoto.Uthe banezinsolo eziqinile zokuthi umuntu obefake isicelo sokuthi a zomthatha uyathinteka ekwenzakalisweni kukamufi.Uthe omakhelwane ababize amaphoyisa endaweni yesigameko emva kokubona ukuthi kanti umlilo ebebezitshela ukuthi usha kude bekusha imoto.Uthe umufi ubengesiye umuntu ojwayele ukwamukela izicelo zasemalokishini ebusuku, uma kwenzekile wasebenza ebusuku, ubesuke amukele izicelo zasesilungwini. Uveze nokuthi ubesenezinyanga ezintathu kuphela ezisebenza kulo msebenzi.“Siyabufuna ubulungiswa ngokubulawa kwakhe. Inombolo ebifake isicelo sohambo, siyifonele kodwa sathola ukuthi ivaliwe,” kusho uXaba othe badidekile ukuthi ubulawelweni nemoto yakhe yashiselwani ngoba ubengesiye umuntu ogolozayo uma elwiswa.Uthe lokhu ukusho ekhumbula isigameko sanyakenye lapho wake waphucwa imoto, yabuye yatholwa KwaMashu.“Wayengakawuqali lomsebenzi. Kwakuyizigebengu nje ezamphuca imoto, akudingekanga ukuthi zise zenze okuningi ukuze azinike,” kusho uXaba.Umufi ubenengane eneminyaka emithathu.

UBENGOWESILISA obewaziwa ngemigilingwane umthandazi ogixabezwe ngodilikajele elahlwa ngecala lokudlwengula ephindelela umzukulu wakhe ophila nokukhubazeka.Lo wesilisa oneminyaka engu-50 elingeke lidalulwe igama lakhe ukuvikela umgilwa, ugixabezwe yiNkantolo yesiFunda yaseNtuzuma isigwebo sikadilikajele ngemuva kokuba ngeledlule imlahle ngecala lokudlwengula umzukulu wakhe izikhawu ezine.Kuvele ukuthi ngoNovemba 2022, wadlwengula umzukulu wakhe owayeneminyaka eyisishiyagalombili, ekhaya eLindelani.Umshushisi u-Advocate Naushaad Haripersadi unxuse inkantolo ukuba imgwebe lo wesilisa.Uveze ukuthi akaqali ukubandakanyeka ezigamekweni ezingezinhle, waveza ukuthi eminyakeni eyedlule, wake walahlwa ngecala lokushushumbisa izidakamizwa, waphinde walahlwa ngamacala amathathu okushaya ngenhloso yokulimaza, wabhadla ejele izinyanga eziyisithupha.Umshushisi uthe onecala wasinda kukubi abesilisa abangomakhelwane bakhe besho ukumqeda benengwa umkhuba wakhe wokuthi njalo ubavezela isitho sakhe sangesese ebachomela ngokuthi sinamandla kunezabo.Uke wabhekana nanecala lokubizela izinkabi umndeni wakhe. Kuvele nokuthi uke wagwaza amalungu omndeni amahlanu."Izenzo zakho zonke zikuveza ngokusobala ukuthi ungumuntu onjani. Leli cala lokudlwengula lifakazela ukuthi ungumuntu onjani,'' kugcizelela uMshushisi.Ubuze lo wesilisa ukuthi ngaphambi kokuba inkantolo iwise isigwebo kukhona yini okusenhliziyweni angathanda ukukusho?"Ngicela inkantolo inganginikezi udilikajele ngoba lokho kuyongikhinyabeza empilweni yami. Kuyoholela ekutheni nomsebenzi wami wokuqopha amafilimu ungaphinde ube khona,'' echaza.Umshushisi umbuzile ukuthi angamenzanjani owesilisa okungathiwa udlwengule indodakazi yakhe."Loyo muntu kungamele athole isijezo esifanele,'' kuphendula lo wesilisa.Umshushisi uthe kuyacaca ke ukuthi naye kumele athole udilikajele. "Ayi phela mina awungifanele udilakajele ngoba ngimsulwa,''  kuphendula yena.Imantshi, uNkk Mpunguse, uthe ummangalelwa ukhombise ukungazisoli ngoba akakaze alivume icala."Isigwebo sikadilikajele yisona esikufanele,'' kusho imantshi. Ithe igama lalo wesilisa lizofakwa ohlwini lwabantu abake badlwengula futhi lizofakwa ohlwini lwabantu okungafanele ukuba bagunyazwe ukusebenzisana nezingane.Iqhuba, ithe ukugwetshwa kwakhe kusho ukukhululwa komgilwa emaketangweni engcindezelo. "Phela umgilwa ubengeke esakwazi ukuqhubeka ahlale nawe endlini. Uyakwesaba,'' isho kanje.Imantshi ikhale nangokuba yinsakavukela kwamacala okudlwengula ngaphakathi emindenini, yathi okubuhlungu ukuthi imindeni eminingi ijwayele ukuwafihla amacala alolu hlobo.Unina kamgilwa ocele ukuba lingadalulwa igama lakhe, uthe namanje akuvumi ukuthi akholwe ukuthi umuntu wasegcekeni wenze umonakalo onjengalona enganeni yakhe yentombazane.Ngemuva kwesigwebo, ukhihle isililo phakathi enkantolo.

KUSOLWA ukuthi belingafuni ukwamukelwa ukwaliwa iphoyisa elisolwa ngokudubula unina wengane yalo endaweni yokudlela abesebenzela kuyona i-Authentiq, esemgwaqweni uFlorida, eThekwini, ngoMsombuluko ekuseni.Lokho kushiwo wuyise kamufi uNksz Zamangwane Bija (26), uMnuz Thulani Khanyile waKwaNyuswa, othe usola ukuthi ubaba womzukulu wakhe, naye wasendaweni, uMnuz Nhlakanipho Mkhize, ugajwe yisikhwele sokungafuni ukwamukela ukuthi indodakazi yakhe isiqhubeke nempilo.UMkhize obeyiphoyisa eHillcrest, naye ushonile kulesi sigameko okukholakala ukuthi ugasele lapho obekusebenzela khona uNksz Bija, wambizela emnyango wamdubula. Kwale ngisho ezama ukubaleka engena ngaphakathi emsebenzini, waqhubeka wamdubula, wafela khona lapho, kwalimala nabanye ababili. Elandisa Isolezwe  ngakholwa wukuthi kuholele kulesi sigameko, uKhanyile uthe ngasekuqaleni kwalo nyaka kuke kwaba nesehlo lapho uMkhize agijimisa khona uNksz Bija ngesibhamu endaweni, efuna ukumlimaza.“Kwaze kwafika abomndeni wakhe ekhweni lami bezoshweleza ngesenzo sendodana yabo. Saqhubeka nempilo ngoba sizitshela ukuthi sekudlulile. Besingazi ukuthi kuzofika lana, futhi sengiyazisola ngokwamukela uxolo lwabo. Ukube sabika emaphoyiseni ngaleso sikhathi ngabe kungcono,” kusho yena.Eqhuba, uthe bakholwa wukuthi uMkhize wehlulwe wukwamukela ukuthi indodakazi yakhe ibisiqhubeke nempilo njengoba ngokwazi kwakhe, laba bobabili abanengane yentombazane eneminyaka emine, bahlukana nyakenye.“Sizwa kuthiwa uZama ubeke afake izithombe zakhe nesoka lakhe elisha ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, eveza ukuthi ujabule kangakanani empilweni yakhe. Kungenzeka ukuthi lokho ngenye yezinto eziholele ekutheni abulawe.“Sibona manje ukuthi kwakumele siyisukumele kusanesikhathi lento, njengoba sazi ukuthi uze usebenza lapho afele khona nje, washiya kwenye indawo yokudlela ayesebenzela kuyona eHillcrest ngoba enzela ukuqhelelana naye. Nakhu manje esefika lapho abesesebenzela khona, wambulala,” kusho uKhanyile.Uthe okunye okubaphatha kabi wukuthi bezwe kuthiwa amaphoyisa aqapha ngakule ndawo athe akaphumele emnyango ayokhuluma naye.“Ngiyawasola ngokuba budedengu kulesi simo ngoba kuthiwa atsheliwe ukuthi lo muntu obesemnyango unodlame kodwa awanganaka njengoba kuze konakala kanje,” kukhala uMkhize.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa aseBerea aphenya icala lokubulala nelokuzama ukubulala.“Kubikwa ukuthi lo mlisa oyiphoyisa ebelingekho emsebenzini, uye lapho okusebenzela khona intombi yakhe, wayicelela emnyango wase eyidubula ngesibhamu somsebenzi, kwathi izama ukubaleka waqhubeka wayidubula amahlandla amaningi, yashona. Amaphoyisa kaMasipala abeqaphile kule ndawo adubule lo mlisa, waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela wafike washonela khona. Okwamanje imbangela yokubulala ayikaziwa,” kusho uNetshiunda. Ngesikhathi Isolezwe lihambele e-AuthentiQ, bekuvaliwe kanti imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula komnikazi wale ndawo ayiphumelelanga, ucingo lwakhe belukhala umlibe lungabanjwa, wangawuphendula nomyalezo athunyelwe wona kuWhatsApp. Abantu abakhulume neSolezwe abebekule ndawo baveze ukuthi izigameko zalolu hlobo ezilokhu zenzeka kule ndawo zizodala ukuthi abantu babe novalo lokuyihambela. Nyakenye ngakuyo lendawo kwadutshulwa umrepha  u-AKA nomngani wakhe uTibz bashona bephuma eThe Wish, eyagcina ivaliwe.

KUDUTSHULWE kwabulawa umsolwa obengaphandle ngebheyili yamacala angu-29 okweba nokuduna izimoto.Ithimba elihlanganisa amaphoyisa ezinhlaka ezahlukene nenkampani yonogada ezimele bebelandela abasolwa ecaleni lokuthunjwa kukasomabhizini waseBenoni, uMnuz Shamshudeen Faki.Lo somabhizinisi oneminyaka engu-68 ubudala, wathunjwa esendaweni yebhizinisi lakhe ngoMgqibelo ngoMeyi 11. Abasolwa baxhumana nomndeni wakhe befuna izigidi zamaRandi ukuze adedelwe.Ngokombiko wamaphoyisa, umgilwa wafa esasezandleni zabathumbi bakhe kanti isidumbu sakhe size satholakala ngoMsombuluko, silaxazwe eDalpark.“Isidumbu sikamgilwa owathunjwa ngoMgqibelo sitholwe amalungu eCPF eDalpark, ngoMsombuluko, okuyiwona ashayele amaphoyisa,” kusho amaphoyisa ngesitatimende.Ithimba ebelihlanganiselwe ukuphenya icala lokuthumba lilandele umkhondo wolwazi ngabasolwa lwabaholela kuN12 phakathi kweKliprivier nejika lomgwaqo uXavier eGoli, lapho kube nokungqubuzana nabasolwa abebehamba ngengqovungqovu yeveni ngoLwesibili ebusuku.Umsolwa obehamba ngale moto udutshulwe wabulawa ngamaphoyisa. Ngesikhathi kuseshwa imoto abehamba ngayo kutholakale izincwadi zikaMnuz Faki, amalambu aluhlaza, izinombolo zezimoto ezazisetshenziswa kuthunjwa umufi, izibhamu ezimbili okuyi-pistol nevolovolo.Uphenyo lokuqala luveze ukuthi lo msolwa obulewe unamacala angu-29 okweba nokuduna izimoto futhi ubefunwa ngamaphoyisa kulandela ukunyamalala ngemuva kokudedelwa ngebheyili.Amaphoyisa aveze ukuthi ayaqhubeka nokuthungatha abanye abasolwa abebesebenza nalo obulewe.

UPHIKO loKlebe lusebenze ngokuzikhandla ngoMsombuluko, lulandela umkhondo wabasolwa kwelokubulawa kukaDitebogo Phalane.Ngokombiko otholwe yithimba eliphenya icala, umkhondo abawutholile ubaholele eSoshanguve, nase-Atteridgeville. Lapha ithimba libambe abasolwa ababili abaneminyaka engu-29, no-30 ubudala. Kuthiwa batholakale nezibhamu ezimbili okusolakala ukuthi esisodwa sasetshenziswa ngenkathi kubulawa uDitebogo, obeneminyaka emihlanu ubudala.Lezi zibhamu zizohlohlwa ngochwepheshe ukuze kucace uma zike zasetshenziswa kwamanye amacala. Uphenyo lokuqala mayelana nabasolwa luveza ukuthi omunye wabo ungaphandle ngebheyili yamacala okuduna, ukuzama ukubulala nokutholakala nesibhamu esingekho emthethweni. NgoLwesithathu, kulindeleke ukuba babingelele iMantshi ePitoli.

UNUKWA ngokungayibheki imfuyo owesilisa ogcine eshonela esibhedlela, kulandela ukudutshulwa ethi usiza owesifazane otholwe edutshuliwe emotweni eshiywe kanjalo egcekeni lakwakhe eHlane Location, ngoMgqibelo.Kuthiwa lona wesilisa, uMnuz Ntandoyenkosi Langa (53), uhlonzwe njengoseshonile ngesikhathi efika esibhedlela ngosuku lwesigameko.Kulesi sigameko kushone abantu ababili njengoba Isolezwe lithole ukuthi indodana kaLanga angayizali, uMnuz Philasande Chiya (32) yona ishonele endaweni yesigameko.Umthombo ocele ukungadalulwa, uthe uLanga nomnikazi wemoto, oqede ukuyipaka endaweni yesigameko, wacela empunzini, bahlanganiswa yikho ukweba imfuyo.Uthe bayakholwa ukuthi umnikazi wemoto nowesifazane abehamba naye bebehlaselwa ndawana thize, bakhetha ukubalekela kwaLanga.“Akavelanga wabalekela emzini angawazi, ubalekele kwamngani wakhe (uLanga) avame ukuhlala naye futhi abanukwa naye ekwebiweni kwemfuyo,” kusho umthombo.Uthe basola ukuthi abahlaseli bebengabasukeli ebebesemotweni kanjalo noLanga, wathi abasola ukuthi ufele into angayazi, wuye uChiya.“Naye unkosikazi kaLanga ubazi ngokwenziwa umyeni wakhe ngoba indodana yakhe (uChiya) kuthiwa iye yamtshela unina ukuthi akakhuze usingababa wayo ayeke ukweba imfuyo,” kusho umthombo.Uqhube wathi uChiya waze wengeza nangokuthi unina akawuhlakaze umhlangano wobungani obusuvuthiwe phakathi kukaLanga nomnikazi wemoto.Uthe imfuyo ebiyebiwa, ibihlinzelwa khona endaweni, bese idayiswa.“Bekuye kutholakale izinhloko zezinkomo, zisele kanjalo esigangeni, uzwakale umoya wokuthi zihlinzwe yibo, bayozidayisa,” usho kanje.Uphinde umthombo wathi uLanga nomnikazi wemoto bebebuye badobe amalungu omphakathi ukuthi abajoyine ekwebeni imfuyo.“Omunye wabo, naye udutshulwe wabulawa ezinyangeni ezine ezedlule, ejahwa ngabantu abangaziwa,” kubeka umthombo.Udalule nokuthi kwayena umnikazi wemoto usesinde kathathu edutshulwa.“Abasukelwanga. Ngisho naye lo wesifazane, sisola ukuthi usebenzisana nabo,” Ngesikhathi kwenzeka isigameko, kuthiwa imoto yabonwa uChiya esesitolo sendawo ipaka kubo ebusuku. Kuthiwa washayela ucingo unina emtshela ukuthi akaphume abheke ukuthi kwenzekani.  Kuvela ukuthi wathi uma ebheka, wazithela kowesifazane odutshuliwe. Kuthiwa wabiza abantu okukhona kubo nomyeni wakhe nayo indodana eyayisesitolo ukuthi bazosiza nokuyilapho okufike khona abalisa abathathu bavulela ngenhlamvu.Owomndeni, uNksz Bongi Chiya, ethintwa, uthe usazobuza enkosikazini kamufi ukuthi iyathanda yini ukuthi kukhulunywe nabezindaba, wathembisa ukuthi uzobuya entathelini nempendulo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa ase-Creighton aphenya amacala amabili okubulala nelilodwa lokuzama ukubulala kulandela isigameko sokudutshulwa kubulawe abesilisa ababili eHlane Location.“Owesilisa oyedwa uhlonzwe njengoseshonile endaweni yesigameko, abanye bephuthunyiswa esibhedlela ukuyokwelashwa. Owesilisa wesibili, uhlonzwe njengoseshonile naye ngesikhathi efika esibhedlela,” kusho uNetshiunda.

BESE kunesikhashana esongelwa ngokubulawa oyilungu eliqavile loMkhonto weSizwe Party (MK) odutshulwe wabulawa eCato Crest, eMayville, eThekwini.UMnuz Mxolisi Zungu (32) kuthiwa uhlaselwe umsolwa obehamba yedwa ngezinyawo ngesikhathi yena (umufi) nowakwakhe behamba ngezinyawo bengazelele bebuya ukuyohambisa ingane (3) yabo enkulisa yendawo.Isolezwe lithole ngelinye ilungu leMK kule ndawo elicele ukungadalulwa ukuthi umufi uke wabatshela ukuthi kukhona abamsongela ngokumyisa kwagoqanyawo.Leli lungu liqhubeke ladalula ukuthi nangenyanga edlule, ngesikhathi kungqongqiswa nendlu elinye ilungu leqembu, umufi wakuveza ukuthi naye impilo yakhe isengcupheni.“Ngesikhathi sisendaweni yesigameko lapho okwakubulewe khona uMorgan, uMxo wayeqhaqhazela, esho ukuthi naye unovalo lokuthi angahle alandele,” kusho ilungu.UMnuz Morgan Mbili (45) washona ngo-Ephreli 30 emva kokusha nomjondolo kule ndawo. Abaningi okubandakanya nabeqembu, basola unyawo lwemfene ngendlela ashona ngayo.Omunye osebuholini beMK kule ndawo, naye ocele ukungavezwa uthe, umufi ubengumdidiyeli wokhetho eqenjini kule ndawo. Uthe bakholwa ukuthi amavoti evile ku-5 000 atholwe yiqembu kule ndawo, atholwe ngenxa yezithukuthuku zakhe.“Kusithusile ukubulawa kwakhe ngoba lesi sigameko selama esenzeke ngenyanga edlule lapho kushiswe khona elinye ilungu lethu nendlu. Manje uma sekwenzeka lesi sigameko, sesiqala ukuyibuka ngamanye amehlo le nto. Umufi ubeyimenenja yokhetho kule ndawo. Nalezi zibalo esizitholile, kungenxa yakhe,” kusho ilungu.Ilungu lomndeni, elicele ukufihlwa ngoba libona lingaphephile njengoba umsolwa esacanasa, lithe umufi udutshulwe ngezinhlamvu eziyisihlanu, kwathathwa nesibhamu sakhe. Liqhube lathi umsolwa uvele wachusha phakathi kwemijondolo, waphela emehlweni emva kokugila le mikhuba.Lidalule ukuthi ubebuye enze umsebenzi wokuba umqaphi uma ebiziwe nokwenza badideke ukuthi ubulawelwani.“Asazi ukuthi isigameko sokubulawa kwakhe singasiyamanisa nakuphi phakathi komsebenzi wakhe kanjalo nezepolitiki. Yena ubeyilo ilungu leMK eliqavile,” kusho ilungu lomndeni.Liqhube lathi bona bewumndeni ubengakaze abavezele ukuthi uyasongelwa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa aseCato Manor aphenya icala lokubulala nelokubamba inkunzi emva kokudutshulwa kowesilisa eCato Crest izolo ekuseni.“Umgilwa ubehamba nomkakhe kuNew Road, beqeda kushiya ingane yabo enkulisa ngesikhathi umsolwa obehamba ngezinyawo emdubula ngemumva. Ushonele endaweni yesigameko. Umsolwa uthathe isibhamu sikamgilwa ngaphambi kokubaleka endaweni yesigameko,” kusho uNetshiunda, othe imbangela yokubulala ayikaziwa.

UMPHAKATHI waseThornwood, eMariannhill lapho kukhulele khona uZanele Mbokazi-Nkambule, uthi ufe olwembiza ngokushona kwalo msakazi woKhozi FM ophinde abe ngumsunguli wama-SABC Crown Gospel Awards.Yize ebengasahlali endaweni, kuthiwa ubengapheli khona futhi ewusizo emphakathini. Omakhelwane bakhe kule ndawo bathi yize sebezwile ngezindaba zokudlula kwakhe emhlabeni kodwa akekho okholwayo ukuthi akasekho ngempela.Umakhelwane wakhe obesondelene naye kakhulu, uNksz Madlala, uthe balimele kakhulu ngokushona kwakhe.“Endaweni ubesiza wonke umuntu. Besazi ukuthi uma uyokhala kuyena ngeke uphume ungalutholanga usizo. Noma ebengahlali la kodwa ubefika njalo. Uma esefikile ubumuzwa ngokuhlabelela izingoma zokholo abingelele bonke omakhelwane. Ubengenendaba ukuthi akakwazi, uma ungowasendaweni udinga usizo ubekunika. Sike saxakwa yisiphepho nezikhukhula la endaweni kuwona lo nyaka, uZanele ufike wanikela ngomatilasi, obhulankethi nokudla emphakathini. “Uma eza ekhaya ubemiswa abantu esaqhamuka phezulu esitobhini ngemoto yakhe bembingelela axoxe nabo aze afike kudala ekhaya ngendlela abeba nesineke ngayo nabantu. Ngisho kunemicimbi emphakathini, awukho umuzi abengezi kuwona elethe isipheko. Bekuhlula ngisho ematasa engezophumelela kodwa ubenza isiqiniseko ukuthi uyasithola isipheko,” kusho uNksz Madlala.Uthe okubajabulisa kakhulu ukuthi uzongcwatshelwa eMariannhill, wathi nasenkonzweni yomngcwabo bazophuma ngobuningi ukuyofihla uZanele. Uthe bebenovalo bezitshela ukuthi ukuthi njengoba eshadile mhlawumbe umyeni wakhe uzomyisa eSwatini, kodwa bayabonga ukuthi amngcwabele la, ukuze bathole ithuba lokuyovalelisa okokugcina kuyena.UMnuz Francis Bafana Nkosi, uthe yena ubesefana nowomndeni kaZanele.“Kuningi angisize ngakho uZanele. Njengoba ngingasebenzi nje bengihlala ngiqashwa uyena. Ngike ngahlala iminyaka emibili emzini wakhe e-La Mercy. Ngaya khona engiqashile ukuthi ngiyopenda amahhovisi akhe ngagcina sengihlala khona. Nangesikhathi ethenga umuzi okokuqala ngase-Pavillion wathatha mina nabanye abafowabo ukuthi siyohlala khona ngoba wayekhala ngokuthi uyasaba ukuhlala yedwa khona,” kusho uNkosi.UMnuz Themba Bindela obaziwa njengoninalume kaZanele, uthe uZanele ubengafani namuntu endaweni.“Ubenza izimanga nento engajwayelekile. Bekuthi uma kunomcimbi wakhe ongekho la endaweni afisa ukuthi sibe yingxenye yawo, avele asiqashele amatekisi ukuthi asiyise kuwona. Ubengaziphakamisile njengoba ubeshiya ngisho imoto yakhe agibele nathi ematekisini uma siya emcimbini. Obekumangaza besiza sizozijabulela kodwa sothi sesibuya asixhawule ngemali,” kusho uBindela.UZanele ubengowokugcina ezinganeni zakwabo bebahlanu. Omdala kwabo uFelo Mbokazi, alanywe wuQondi, uMdu, uKhethi bese kuba uyena uZanele. Abafowabo abasekho bonke emhlabeni nodadewabo uQondi. Bese kusele yena noKhethi okunguyena osaphila ezinganeni zakwabo.Kuthiwa izingane zabafowabo nabazukulu ubehlala nazo emzini wakhe e-La Mercy kanti ekhaya eThornwood, kusele indodana kamfowabo uCharles Mbokazi abebefikela kuyona bonke uma beze ekhaya.

USELE yedwa notavatava lokugebenga nokuntshontshela uyise uLongwe Twala, ogqunywe esitokisini ngemuva kokudedelwa komfowabo uSello ayeboshwe naye ngamacala okugqekeza nokweba.ULongwe uvele kancane enkantolo yeMantshi yaseRandburg, ngoMsombuluko, ngamacala okugebenga nokweba. Le nsizwa yaboshiswa uyise uChicco Twala ngemuva kokufica kwakhe kugqekeziwe, kwebiwe nemishini yakhe ebiza izinkulungwane. UChicco wanikela esiteshini samaphoyisa eDouglasdale, wavulela amadodana akhe amabili, uLongwe noSello, amacala okugqekeza nokweba.USello wadedelwa yinkantolo ngomhla ka-12 kwephezulu ngemuva kokuba kuvele enkantolo ukuthi abukho ubufakazi obanele obumyamanisa nalawa macala.ULongwe oneminyaka engu-39 ubudala, uthole ummeli woMbuso ocele inkantolo ukuba imnikeze isikhathi sokuthola imininingwane eyanele ngalo.Imantshi u-Abdul Khan itshele uLongwe ukuthi ngeke bakwazi ukuqhubeka necala ngemuva kokuthi ummeli wakhe ecele ukuthi icala lihlehliswe."Mnumzane Twala, udaba luzobuyela enkantolo ngoSepthemba 25. Ummeli wakho ucele isikhashana ukuze athole ulwazi olwanele ngecala. Ucele uMbuso isikhathi sokulilungiselela icala lakho, uzohlala esitokisini uze uzwe ngebheyili yakho ngesonto elizayo,” kusho yona.

UMSHUSHISI ecaleni lokufa komrepha u-AKA, u-Advocate Lawrence Gcaba uthe ummangalelwa wesine uMnuz Muziwethemba Gwabeni, ugweve neselula efunwa amaphoyisa.UGcaba usho lokhu ngesikhathi kuqhubeka isicelo sebheyili sabamangalelwa abahlanu eNkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini ngoLwesihlanu. Zisongiwe izethulo zesicelo sebheyili, sekulindwe isinqumo.UKiernan Forbes “AKA”, wadutshulwa wabulawa nomngani wakhe uTebello “Tibz” Motsoane eThekwini nyakenye. U-AKA nomngani wakhe bathelekelwa amadoda abavithiza ngenhlamvu baphelela khona lapho.Amaphoyisa akhomba abalisa abayisikhombisa ukuthi yibona ababemlandela okwenyamazane u-AKA bamjuqa bahlukaniselana imali. Abamangalelwa ababili babhajwe eSwatini lapho ababoshelwa khona kanti kusenziwa imizamo yokubabuyisa.UMbuso waveza uGwabeni njengongqondongqondo kuleli cala okuthiwa wakhokhela abamangalelwa sebeqedile ukubulala umrepha.UMbuso uyasiphikisa isicelo sebheyili sabamangalelwa ufuna bahlale ejele kuze kuphothulwe icala. UGcaba ukhulume indaba yeselula ezama ukuveza ukuthi uGwabeni angaluphazamisa uphenyo uma engathola ibheyili.“Kwacelwa abameli bakhe ukuthi basize kulethwe iselula le amaphoyisa angayitholanga efika emzini wakhe. Ummangalelwa uthi iselula yebiwa amaphoyisa futhi icala liphenywa yi-IPID kodwa ohlwini lwezinto ezibhaliwe ezebiwa ayibalwanga iselula,’’ kusho uGcaba.Uqhubekile uGcaba wathi bafaka isicelo sokuthola amarekhodi ayo le selula bathola okushaqisayo.“Sathola ukuthi iselula iyasebenza namanje futhi idonsa embhoshongweni edonsa kuwona uma ummangalelwa esemzini wakhe. Umbuzo uthi iphi iselula? Akukhona yini ukuphazamisa uphenyo lokho, ” kubuza uGcaba.IMantshi uMnuz Vincent Hlatshwayo ibuzisisile ngodaba lweselula, uGcaba wagcizelela yashona phansi ngepeni yabhala okuthile ebhukwini layo.UMbuso kuleli cala ubukeka ugabe kakhulu ngobufakazi bezobuchwepheshe bamaselula obuninda abamangalelwa ngokuthi babekuphi, nemali abafakelana yona.Ngaphandle kodaba lweselula, okunye okuvelile wudaba lwabamangalelwa abaseSwatini. Ummeli wabamangalelwa u-Advocate Cyril Mlotshwa ukhale ngokuthi udaba lokubuyiswa kwabo lungase lubambezele.“Udaba lokuthi kulindwe abamangalelwa abaseSwatini luthinta amalungelo abamangalelwa okuthi icala labo liqulwe ngokushesha liphothulwe. Isicelo sokubuyisa abantu kwelinye izwe siwumdanti odlula ezandleni zabantu abaningi,’’ kusho uMlotshwa.Kulindeleke ukuthi inkantolo ikhiphe isinqumo sebheyili yabamangalelwa ngoMeyi 15.

UBONGA ukwesekwa yibandla umculi wokholo osanda kukhipha i-albhamu, uNdumiso Mzobe. Uthe ngale albhamu uhlose ukukhuthaza ngayo ukuzethemba ebantwini.Lo mculi, okhonza ebandleni labasindisiwe i-Ebenezer Christian Family Church,  uthi kumqoka ukuthola ukwesekwa ngamalungu ebandla uma ungumculi wokholo.Usanda kukhipha i-albhamu esihloko sithi God is Able. Ngale albhamu uthi uhlose ukukhuthaza abazalwane ukuthi bangaliphosi ithawula kungakhathaleki ukuthi bazithola bebhekene naziphi izimo."Ngifuna ukuthi le albhamu ibuyise ukuzethemba ebantwini. Ngifuna bazi ukuthi asikho nesisodwa isimo esingabanqoba uma nje uNkulunkulu engakubo,'' echaza.Uveze ukuthi le albhamu iyatholakala ezitolo ezahlukene ezikhona eNingizimu Afrika. Uthe kulokoza inhlansi yethemba ngokuthi izowenza umehluko omkhulu kubona bonke abantu abazoyithenga.Ukhulume nangokubaluleka kokuba abaculi bokholo bawazi umnyango wesonto. Ugcizelele ukuthi ubudlelwane bomculi wokholo noNkulunkulu bumqoka kakhulu.Uthe akumele abaculi bakhombe indlela maqede bajike. "Mina ngikholwa ukuthi uma ungumculi wokholo kumele uye nakanjani enkonzweni. Lokho kuyakwakha njengomculi,'' usho kanje.Ubalule ukuthi kumele kube seqhulwini ngaso sonke isikhathi kubaculi bokholo ukubaluleka kwendlela yokuziphatha.Uthe eminyakeni ezayo ufuna ukuzibona ebalwa nabanye babaculi asebedlondlobele kakhulu ngokomculo.Uveze nokuthi uyafisa kakhulu ukuthi acule nabanye babaculi asebemnkantshubovu kulo mkhakha womculo wokholo

USHAYE ungqimphothwe esefike enkantolo, wakubonga ukufaka isicelo sebheyili okwamanje, umlisa osolwa ngokushumpula ikhanda likaninakhulu waligenda njengebhola lezinyawo ePinetown, eThekwini.UMnuz Thabo Ntokozo Nzimande (31) ubekade evele eNkantolo yeMantshi yasePinetown.Uthweswe icala lokubulala uNkk Beatrice De Lange (80) ayekade ehlala naye ngoJuni nonyaka.Ngesonto eledlule, uNzimande uvele enkantolo efanayo ngohlelo lwethelevishini yena esejele laseWestville.Wabuza iMantshi uWendolyne Robinson ukuthi angakwazi yini ukufaka isicelo sebheyili?Imantshi yamqinisekisa yathi uvumelekile. Yabe seyimtshela ukuthi uzolethwa enkantolo siqu sakhe izolo, khona kuzolalelwa isicelo sebheyili.Kodwa izolo uNzimande ufike enkantolo egqoke ibhulukwe elimnyama nejakhethi egqize ngemibala obomvu nomnyama, efake ophaqa abaziwa ngokuthi obhamba namasokisi.Akukho namunye umuntu wasemndenini wakhe ofikile enkantolo ukuzothamela icala lakhe.UNzimande obekade ebukeka ezikhululekele, eklame kahle izinwele zakhe, akayichithelanga isikhathi inkantolo izolo.Utshele imantshi ngomlomo wommeli wakhe wamahhala (weLegal Aid) wathi uyasibonga isicelo sebheyili okwamanje.Usho kanje uNzimande, uMbuso ubukade usushilo wathi uzosiphikisa isicelo sebheyili.Imantshi ibe isihlehlisa icala, yatshela uNzimande ukuthi useyoze abuye enkantolo ngo-Okthoba 30, nonyaka.Iqhube yathi sezithathiwe izitatimende zofakazi, yahlanganiswa i-albhamu yezithombe ezathathwa endaweni yesigameko, manje sekulindwe imiphumela yolibufuzo engakabuyi lapho ihlolwa khona.UNzimande wathi akasikhumbuli nhlobo isigameko. Waze waya kohlolwa ingqondo eFort Napier, eMgungundlovu, imiphumela yodokotela yathi uphile saka, uzokwazi ukubhekana necala.Ishaqe abantu abaningi indlela enonya nesihluku okwabulawa ngayo umufi.Isolezwe lahosha ngomthombo walo ukuthi uNzimande wanquma umufi ngommese, maqede waligendisa okwebhola lezinyawo ikhanda lakhe.Kuthiwa amaphoyisa amfica egqoke izimpahla ezazigcwele igazi okusolakala ukuthi kwakungelikamufi isidumbu sakhe esasisegumbini lokulala.

UVELE wayibonga ibheyili owokufika eNingizimu Afrika othweswe uxhaxha lwamacala okukhona nelokuthumba ophila nokukhubazeka amqole uR50 000.UMnuz Benjamin Banda oneminyaka ongu-29, ugqigqa eNkantolo yesiFunda yasePinetown.Ubhekene necala lokuphanga, elokuthumba, elokutholakala nesibhamu nezinhlamvu okungekho emthethweni nokungabi namaphepha aqondile amgunyaza ukuba seNingizimu Afrika.Kuvele ukuthi uBanda ubelokhu ethi ungowaseMozambique okuthe uma sekubhekisiswa amaphepha akhe, anesithombe esinanyathiselwe ngesandla, kwavela ukuthi ungowaseMalawi.Kwakubekelwe ukuthi kube izolo ukulalelwa kwesicelo sebheyili sikaBanda kodwa kwangenzeka.Lokhu kudalwe ukuthi walethwa isigubhukane kule nkantolo ngoLwesithathu olwedlule, emuva kokuthi kade evele okokuqala ngoMsombuluko.Yilapho okuthiwa wafike wayibonga khona ibheyili sekwengezwe amanye amacala kwathweswe wona. Icala libe selihlehliselwa u-Okthoba 4 nonyaka ukuze kuqhutshwe uphenyo.Kuvele ukuthi uMbuso ungase wengeze amanye amacala agcine esengu-15 kwazise bathathu abantu ababesendlini ngesikhathi bethelekelwa abasolwa.Kuthiwa amaphoyisa kumanje athungatha abanye abasolwa abane okuthiwa babekade benoBanda begila le migilingwane.Uzithola esobishini nje uBanda kungenxa yesigameko esenzeke emasontweni amabili edlule emzini oseWyebank, ePinetown.Kusolaka ukuthi bagqekeza umuzi bathumba owesifazane ophila nokukhubazeka bamphoqa ukuba athumele uR50 000 nge-app bemkhombe ngesibhamu.Kuthiwa phambilini umgilwa wake wabandakanyeka engozini yemoto eyamshiya ekhubazekile ehamba ngesihlalo esinamasondo.Kuvela nokuthi wabe esethola imali yesinxephezelo evela kwiRoad Accident Fund (RAF), isamba sayo esingaziwa.

USEKHALELWE amasongo kaSigonyela owesilisa oneminyaka engu-19 obonakala kwivideo eshaya ngezimpama ugogo wakhe azawe phansi.Le video, ezungeza ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, ivuse umunyu, usizi nolaka kubantu.Okhulumela amaphoyisa kuzwelonke, uBrigadier Athlenda Mathe, uqinisekise ukuthi amaphoyisa aseWestern Cape abophe umsolwa.UBrig Mathe uthe umsolwa uthungathwe watholwa eWallecedene, eKraaifontein, ngoLwesithathu ebusuku.Uthe kulindeleke avele eNkantolo yeMantshi eBlue Downs ngecala lokushaya.Kunezithombe ezingaqinisekisiwe eziveza le ndoda ihlezi phansi iqimbile kwesingenhla imabokobo igxiza negazi.Kunemibhalo ethi umsolwa utholwe umphakathi wambeka isandla ngaphambi kokuthi kufike amaphoyisa ambopha.Kule video umgilwa nomsolwa basekhishini akucaci kahle ukuthi bakhuluma ngani. Umgilwa uphethe ibhodwe okuthi uma sebemshaye ngezimpama ezimbili zilandelana, ngesikhahe esewa phansi alidedele kuchitheke uphuthu oluphakathi kulona. Umgilwa ubuza ephindelela kumsolwa athi: “Luvo, undibulalela ntoni?” aphendule athi: “ndizokubulala”.

ZIMKHALELE uFata webandla lamaRoma aKhatholika okuvela ukuthi ushaye ngesando ekhanda ilungu lebandla ngemuva kwengxabano.UFata esingeke silidalule igama lakhe okwamanje ungumholi wePherishi yaseKlaarwater, iSt Charles Lwanga okuyilapho isigameko esenzeke khona.Kuvela ukuthi lesi sigameko senzeke ngoMgqibelo emini kanti kuze kwangenelela obezosika utshani. Ilungu lebandla elilinyaziwe kuvela ukuthi linguthisha kwezinye zezikole. Ngaphambilini lalikade lisekomitini lezezimali kuyona le Pherishi kodwa lahoxa ngomunye unyaka. Kuyimanje kuvela ukuthi likhonza ebandleni eliseMontclair.Umthombo uveze ukuthi umgilwa ugasele emagcekeni esonto ngoMgqibelo kungazelele muntu.Kuthiwa ufike ngesikhathi uFata esamatasa ngaphakathi elathini elungiselela inkonzo yamasundu ebizokuba khona ngakusasa.Kuthiwa uFata ubevele esebenza ngesando ngoba kukhona abekulungisa ngoba kuzoba inkonzo enkulu ngeSonto. Kuthiwa esengaphakathi ufune incwadi kuFata okungacaci kahle ukuthi ngeyani.Kuthe uma uFata emtshela ukuthi akamlinde kancane, kwabonakala sengathi akakwamukeli lokho.Kuyavela ukuthi uFata umbuzile ukuthi kungani ezofuna usizo lwencwadi kwiPherishi angasakhonzi kuyona?Kuthiwa umgilwa uvuke ngolaka kwaphoqa ukuthi uFata amshiye angene  eSacrista.Kuthiwa ingxabano yabo iqhubekile lapho behilizisana ngamazwi kanti bagcine sebebambana ngezandla, umgilwa wagcina ngokuwa.UFata kuthiwa uzame ukumsabisa ngesando ngesikhathi evuka eqonda ngqo kuye. Ekuhilizisaneni kwabo, umgilwa ugcine eshayeka wopha ekhanda.Kuthiwa kube sekungena obesika utshani emnyango ngoba ezwa ukuthi kukhona ubugungqugungqu obukhona. Ilungu lebandla elikhulume neSolezwe lithe uFata ungumuntu othanda ukwenza izinto ngendlela yakudala, obekwenza ngayo amaKhatholika.Kuthiwa ngaphambi kwakhe bekukhoba uFata osemncane obenza kube nokushukuma ebandleni, enza izinto ngendlela yesimanje. Amakholwa kuthiwa abesejwayele leyo ndlela. Amanye amalungu aleli bandla aveze ukuthi akhathazekile ngalesi simo. Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda usiqinisekisile lesi sigameko.Uthe amaphoyisa aseMariannhill aphenya icala lokuzama ukubulala."Kusolakala ukuthi owesilisa ulinyazwe kabuhlungu ngesando ekhanda nasesiphongweni,'' usho kanje.

UPHUME esibhedlela waqonda esitokisini owesilisa odle ushevu nengane yakhe egcine ishonile.Lokhu kwenzeka ngo-Agasti 3, 2024, endaweni yaseKanana, ngaseKlerksdorp, eNorth West.Kubikwa ukuthi lo mlisa waba nengxabano nentombi yakhe engumama wezingane zakhe wafuna ngodli izingane zakhe ngayizolo.Yize umama wezingane waqale wanqaba nazo, wagcina esevuma, wayalela umalume wezingane ukuthi ahambe nazo.“Uyise wezingane wamukela izingane watshela umalume wazo ukuthi akahambe, umalume uhambe neyodwa ingane eneminyaka emine zasala ezimbili,” kusho okhulumela amaphoyisa aseNorth West.Lo mlisa akapholisanga maseko, washayela ucingo unina wezingane emtshela izinhlelo zakhe zokuphuza ushevu nalezi zingane. Kwathi kusenjalo lo wesifazane wathola ucingo oluvela kugogo wezingane emtshela ukuthi basendleleni eya esibhedlela ngenxa yomonakalo odalwe uyise wezingane.Kuvela ukuthi ingane eneminyaka esisishiyagalombili yasinda ngoba yanqaba ukuphuza ushevu, kanti le encane yona yayisesimweni esibucayi kakhulu yagcina ishonela esibhedlela. Umsolwa naye wasinda wakhululwa esibhedlela ngoLwesine, ngoSepthemba 4, kanti kuzokuba wusuku lokuboshwa kwakhe ngecala lokubulala.

INHLANZI ishelwe amanzi kobefunelwa icala lokubulala umuntu eMzingazi, eRichards Bay, eboshwa yiphoyisa elimnike u-lift esebaleka eyobhaca.Indoda eneminyaka engu-19 kulindeleke ukuthi ivele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseRichards Bay ngoLwesihlanu.Isolwa ngokugwaza ibulale uMnuz Khanya Mthembu ngeSonto. Ikhalelwe amasongo kaSigonyela ngoLwesithathu ebusuku.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda elandisa uthe,  ngoLwesithathu ebusuku amaphoyisa asophikweni iRichards Bay Crime Prevention alunywe indlebe ngendoda ebikade isemgwaqeni ifuna u-lift.“Ubekade efuna u-lift eseMadlankala, eSikhaleni, efuna ukubaleka ayobhaca KwaNongoma. Kube sekuthunyelwa iphoyisa nemoto engabhaliwe lapho obekunomsolwa khona lafika lamnikeza u-lift,” kuchaza uNetshiunda.Kuthiwa iphoyisa liyishaye yazula imoto laqonda egaraji lokwetha uphethroli, lapho elibe selixhumana namanye amaphoyisa lihlaba umkhosi, afika wase eyaboshwa umsolwa.UNetshiunda uthe imininingwane esemaphoyiseni iveza ukuthi umsolwa nomgilwa babe nengxabano ethaveni.Kubikwa ukuthi ngesikhathi umgilwa esegoduka, ulandelwe umsolwa, ofike wamgwaza washona eduze kwenkundla yezemidlalo.

U-ADVOCATE Thulani Mngomezulu ngoMsombuluko, unikwe amasonto amathathu ukuba abuyekeze ubufakazi obungamakhasi angu-9 000 ecaleni lokubulawa kukaSenzo Meyiwa.Leli cala liqulwa eNkantolo eNkulu yasePitoli ehleli ePamridge lapho kulalelwe khona ubufakazi ngokudutshulwa kubulawe isihlabani sebhola kubo kaKelly Khumalo eVosloorus.Ijaji, uRatha Mokgoatlheng unqume ukuthi icala alibuyele enkantolo ngo-Ephreli 15, sekwedlule nekhefu lezinkantolo lamasonto amabili okuthiwe lizoqala ngoLwesine.Udaba lokuthi uMngomezulu, ongummeli kammangalelwa wokuqala, uMuzikawukhulelwa Sibiya noBongani Ntanzi udinga isikhathi sokubuyekeza lobu bufakazi luvezwe uMshushisi woMbuso u-Adv George Baloyi.“Uzakwethu udinga isikhathi sokuthi abuyekeze ubufakazi obethuliwe ngaphambi kokuthi kuqale ukulalelwa kobufakazi obuthinta ukugonyuluka kwabanye babamangalelwa,” kuveza uBaloyi.UBaloyi uqhube wakhumbuza inkantolo ukuthi uMngomezulu uqale umsebenzi wokumela abasolwa ngasekupheleni konyaka odlule lapho ebese kulalelwe khona lobu bufakazi uSibiya noNtanzi abazininda kubo ngecala lokubulala uMeyiwa.“Kusamele ngibubuyekeze bese ngibuqhathanisa nobukaMangena (Lt-Col Chris) nobabanye ongoti ababili bokuhlolwa kwezibhamu. Uma singabuya ngo-Ephreli 15, ngizobe sengikulungele ukuthi siqhubeke,” kusho uMngomezulu.UMangena naye ungungoti wokuhlola izibhamu kanti ngesikhathi efakaza nyakenye, waveza ukuthi isibhamu esatholwa kummangalelwa wesithathu kuleli cala uMthobisi Mncube, yiso okwadutshulwa ngaso uMeyiwa.Ubufakazi bukaMangena bamiswa ngesikhathi abameli becela ukuletha owabo ungoti (ozimele).Ngaphambi kwalokho, uMngomezulu uphose imibuzo kufakazi uSuperintendent Chupye Christopher Matlou, ebiqhakambisa iphuzu lokuthi ngeke ame ngesihloko, athi uSibiya wayehlala eGauteng ngonyaka okwabulawa ngawo uMeyiwa.UMatlou ungungoti we-Electronic National Administration Traffic Information System kanti ungumphenyi we-Road Traffic Management Corporation (RTMC).UMatlou ngoLwesihlanu wayekade ethule ubufakazi bokuthi uSibiya wayehlala eGauteng phakathi kuka-2013 no-2015.Lokhu uMatlou uveze ukuthi ukusho ngoba uSibiya wabhala iLearner’s License yakhe ezikhungweni ezimbili eGauteng.UMngomezulu ephikisa lokhu uthe uSibiya wayeye agibele esuka kubo eMahlabathini KwaZulu-Natal aye eGauteng uma eyokwenza lokhu.UMatlou uphikise ngelithi ngokomthetho, uma umuntu ebhala iLearner’s noma ilayisense, kufanele ayibhalele esikhungweni esakhele indawo ahlala kuyo ngokugcwele.Nokho uMngomezulu washaya phansi ngonyawo wathi ukufaka kukaSibiya ikheli lalapho okwakuhlala khona umalume wakhe, kwakungachazi ukuthi wayehlala kulo ngokugcwele, yena wayelokhu egibela uma eyobhala.

UNGOTI wamaselula uLieutenant Colonel Gideon Gouws ecaleni lokufa kukaSenzo Meyiwa, uveze ubufakazi obulahla ummangalelwa wesibili uBongani Ntanzi.UMeyiwa owayeyisilomo se-Orlando Pirates neBafana Bafana, wadutshulwa wabulawa ekubo kaKelly Khumalo eVosloorus, eGauteng ngo-2014.Bahlanu abalisa abashushiswayo, icala lisesigabeni lapho uMbuso wethula khona ubufakazi ozimisele ukugojela ngabo abamangalelwa. Kufundwa ubufakazi bamaselula obuveza ukuxhumana kwabo ngaphambi nangemuva kwesigameko.UGouws weneke ubufakazi bokuthi iselula kaNtanzi yayidonsa eduze kwesiteshi samaphoyisa eVillieria, ePitoli lapho ayetoke khona. Phambilini uNtanzi waphika ukuthi watholwa neselula esesitokisini.UGouws uthe iselula yasebenza ngesikhathi idonsa ngasesitokisini okwakuvalelwe kusona uNtanzi. Kuvela ukuthi kunezithombe zephephandaba elalishicilele udaba lwecala lokufa kukaMeyiwa ezabukwa kwiselula eyatholwa kuNtanzi.“ Izithombe zavulwa zahlelwa kabusha ngo-9 ebusuku, kunesithombe sephephandaba esikhuluma ngaleli cala esavulwa sahlelwa kabusha sekwedlule umzuzu kushaye u-9 ebusuku,’’ kusho uGouws.Phambilini iphoyisa uSergeant Vusumuzi Mogane wethula ubufakazi bokuthi wathola uNtanzi ephethe iselula esitokisini emuva kokulunywa indlebe ngayo.Ummeli kaNtanzi u-Advocate Thulani Mngomezulu wathi ikhasimende lakhe liyakuphika ukuthi latholwa neselula. UMngomezulu wathi iselula kaNtanzi yayikade ithathwe amaphoyisa ngesikhathi eboshwa.Kuvela ukuthi uNtanzi watholwa neselula ngoFebhuwari 2021 esitokisini eyishutheke ezingutsheni zakhe zokulala. Kuvela ukuthi ngaphambi kwalokho iselula yayikade idonsa eQueenswood, ePitoli nokuyindawo esondelene nesiteshi samaphoyisa ayevalelwe kusona uNtanzi.Abamangalelwa bebebukeka bebulandela ngokuzimisela ubufakazi bephethe nebhuku bebhala belalele ngokucophelela. Bebebuye bahlanganise amakhanda sengathi babhunga okuthile sabantu abqhathanisa lokhu okwethulwayo. Kuthe kusaqhubeka lobu bufakazi kwasukuma abameli besola uMbuso ngokuxova ubufakazi. Kuphikiswane ngalokho kwase kuvela ukuthi sekuvele kushaye isikhathi sokuguqa kwecala. UMbuso uthembise ukulungisa lokhu abebekhala ngakho abameli.Kulindeleke ukuthi kuqhutshekwe namuhla kulalelwe ubufakazi bukangoti wamaselula.

BAHLELI lubhojozi abantu baKwaDlangezwa eMpangeni abathi izigebengu zizenzela umathanda, zingena ezindlini zibambe inkunzi zibuye zidlwengule. Lokhu kuvezwe yilungu lomphakathi elicele ukuthi igama lalo lingadalulwa ngokwesabela impilo yalo.Lithe izigebengu zingena ezindlini zigcweleze abantu, kokunye zibahlasele bezihambela emgwaqweni.Liveze ukuthi kubo, izigebengu zingene kabili esontweni elilodwa zadala umonakalo ogcine udlula nomphefumulo womuntu, kwaba khona nodlwengulwayo.“Ngo-Ephreli 4, zingene zashaya ilungu lomndeni ngensimbi, lashona ngoLwesihlanu,” kusho ilungu.Lilandisa ngokwenzeke ngosuku lwesigameko, lithe abasolwa bakhahlele isicabha sendlu kamufi maqede zambamba zambopha ngentambo, zamvala umlomo nge-salotape.“Ziqoqe yonke impahla endlini, maqede zamqhuba ukuthi aye endlini elala ugogo. Nakhona zifike zamshaya ugogo zifuna ngodli imali, zazama nokumdlwengula,” kusho ilungu.Liqhube lathi umufi uhlaselwe khona lapho, washaywa ngensimbi ekhanda, walimala.Udalule ukuthi nasendlini elala ugogo ikhona impahla ethathiwe.Uthe umufi nakuba eyisiwe emtholampilo kodwa akalaliswanga, watishwa wadedelwa.“Sibona ukuthi waba mkhulu umonakalo wokushaywa ngoba uvele wathulela embhedeni lapho abethi usazohlala khona izinsukwana ngenxa yokwanda kwezigameko zobugebengu,” kusho ilungu.Eqhubeka uveze ukuthi ngoMashi 31, kudlwengulwe ilungu lomndeni elineminyaka engu-14, kwathi elinye lahlukunyezwa ngokocansi.Kulesi sigameko, kuthiwa abagilwa babelele bodwa endlini enkulu ngesikhathi amanye amalungu omndeni esilisa asekhulakhulile, elele ezindlini zawo ezingaphandle.“Babona ngabantu sebegcwele indlu, bebasabisa ngommese nangesibhamu abebekuphethe, bebatshela ukuthi uma beke bathi nkente, bazobabulala,” kusho ilungu.Lithe nakulesi sigameko kuphinde kwathathwa nezinye izimpahla.Liveze ukuthi bafuna kungenelele izinhlaka ezilwa nobugebengu nenkosi yendawo, ukuze kwehle ubugebengu.Kwenzeka lokhu nje nezitshudeni zaseNyuvesi yaseZululand (Ongoye) nazo zihlaliswe lubhojozi yizigebengu ezibizwa ngamadabuka ezeba kwasani.NgoLwesihlanu kubulawe obeqapha imiqasho okuhlala kuyo izitshudeni, kwabulawa lona wesilisa, kwebiwa ama-laptop namaselula.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa aseMthunzini asebophe owesilisa (43) ngecala lokugqekeza, elokudlwengula nawokuhlukumeza ngokocansi.“Uvele ngo-Ephreli 2, icala lahlehliselwa u-Ephreli 9. Idokodo lidluliselwe ophikweni oluphenya amacala odlame lwasekhaya, ukuvikeleka kwezingane namacala ocansi eMpangeni,” kusho uNetshiunda.

UTHOLWE eshonile esitokisini, esiteshini samaphoyisa eBhekithemba, eMlaza obesolwa ngokubulala ngesihluku unina wengane yakhe enezinyanga eziyisikhombisa, oboshwe ngesonto eledlule okukholakala ukuthi uzilengisile.Isidumbu sikaMnuz Sboniso Chamane (27) waseMlaza Kwa-H, sitholwe ngoMgqibelo emva kosuku zimkhalele, ubefunwa amaphoyisa ngecala lokubulala uNksz Simangele Dlamini (23) obeyisinqandamathe sakhe okuthiwa bese simala, esigamekweni esenzeke emasontweni amabili edlule.Kwi- akhawunti ku-Facebook okukholakala ukuthi eyakhe enegama lika-Sboniso Sbo, bese enamathelise umbhalo esola abamgxeka ngokubulala umufi ngokuthanda ukungena izinto ekubeni bengazi ukuthi kuqalephi, esonga ngokuzibulala.Kubhalwe kanje:“Ingane besihlala nayo sithandana kamnandi inkinga besihlushwa umndeni wakhe uthanda ukungena izindaba zethu. Bamfide wafideka naye, bengimthanda futhi namanje ngisamthanda ukuthi nje kwenzeka ngendlela engingayiqondi ngiyazisola manje.  Ngizozibulala maduze nami ngimlandele bese ninameka kule nkundla, lindani-ke nizozwa khona nizojabula.” kubhalwe kanje Ngokusho komthombo weSolezwe, umsolwa uboshwe ebhace  ekhabonina KwaMaphumulo.Unina kaSimangele, uNksz Duduzile Dlamini elandisa, uthe umsolwa nomgilwa bebehlala ndawonye kubo kamsolwa, okuthe uma indodakazi yakhe inquma ukubuyela ekhaya, isoka layo lagana unwabu.“Ungifake ezindlekweni engingazi ukuthi ngiyophuma kanjani kuzona.  Ngengane yami iyinhle kanje.   Kuyimanje  isesemakhazeni kufanele ngabe ingcwatshwe ngesonto eledlule, kodwa aginayo nemali yokungcwaba  Ngethembele emalini efakwa esosweni ukuqongelela izindleko. Okungizwisa ubuhlungu kakhulu  yingane ayishiyile ngoba ibisancela kunina, ngizoyithathaphi kwamali yobisi?” ebalisa.Uthe umsolwa ubengaqali ukushaya indodakazi yakhe njengoba  phambilini ike yangeniswa egunjini labagula kakhulu esibhedlela ilimele emva kokushaywa wuyena kanzima, kodwa kwathiwa imindeni ayixoxe okwagcina kungenzekanga. Uthe usola ukuthi umsolwa ubeyidlisile indodakazi yakhe ngoba beyingezwa mshini ngaye okuthe uma eyibuyisela ekhaya eyiphalazisa kwasa inkungu yamala, ibulawa nje bese kuphele amasonto amathathu yabuyela ekhaya,Ikhansela lendawo uMnuz Mhlengi Shinga oveze ukuthi uyihambele yomibili imindeni eyobhonga emswanini, ukhale ngokwanda kwezigameko zokubulawa kwabesifazane bebulwa yizinqandamathe zabo. “Okunye esibona ukuthi kuyimbangela yalezi zigameko, ukusetshenziswa kakhulu kotshwala. Lesi sigameko silamana eduze nesinye esifanayo esenzeke khona endaweni okutholakale ukuthi owesilisa wayephuze utshwala bezandla ngesikhathi enza isigameko.  Sifisa  uNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa uMnuz Bheki Cele aqinise umkhankaso wokuvalwa kwezindawo ezidayisa utshwala ngokungekho emthethweni,” kusho uShinga.Imizamo yokuthola inombolo yelungu lomndeni kaChamane ayiphumelelanga kwaze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela. Okhuluma amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa aseBhekithemba avule idokodo lophenyo, emva lokuthi umsolwa obeboshelwe icala lokubulala etholwe eshonile esitokisini. Uthe imbangela yokufa kwakhe ayikaziwa okwamanje.

KUBOSHWE indoda esolwa ngokunquma umakhelwane kade kubangwa ukunqamula egcekeni, isidumbu sakhe kuthiwa sitholwe abazingeli siphonswe emfuleni ngoMsombuluko, esigamekweni esenzeke eBethany, eBergville ngempelasonto.Umsolwa oneminyaka engu-22 uvele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseBergville ngoLwesithathu. Eboshwa, kuthiwa ucele ikhansela  limhambise emaphoyiseni,  esaba ulaka lomphakathi kwazise  bese zikhona izinsolo zokuthi uyazi ngokufa kukaNksz Karabo Kubheka (21), okuvela ukuthi  ubegcine ukubonwa ngoMgqibelo. Isidumbu sakhe kuthiwa sitholwe sintanta emfuleni iNconcosi ngabafana abebezingela.Ngokulandisa kukaMnuz Themba ‘Tiza’ Khoza oyikhansela elihambise umsolwa emaphoyiseni, uthole umbiko ovela kubo kamsolwa obuthi ufisa amphelezele amyise emaphoyiseni, walandisa ngakho konke akwenzile.“Uthe entathakusa ngeSonto ubephuma endaweni yokucima ukoma ngesikhathi enqamula egcekeni lakubo kamgilwa.  Umgilwa akathandanga baxabana embuza ukuthi unqamulelani egcekeni lakubo ngabo-2 ekuseni kangaka, uzothakatha yini, okuyinto emdinile umsolwa waqonda kubo wayolanda ummese.  Ebuya, uhlangane nomgilwa ebuyela esitolo lapho ebephuza khona, njengoba naye kuthiwa ubeziphuzela kwenye indawo, wamfukula wehlela naye ngasemfuleni okuyilapho afike wamgwaza khona wazama nokumnquma, isidumbu sakhe wasiphonsa emfuleni,” kulandisa ikhansela.Lithe bekungakabikho okusolisayo ngokunyamalala komgilwa kwaze kwaba isidumbu sakhe sitholwa abafana, kwaqala kwasoleka ukuthi kungenzeka ukuthi uyazi ngokunyamalala kwakhe.UKhoza uthe ngokuqonda ububi besigameko, usukumele phezulu ukuqinisekisa ukuthi umsolwa uyamhambisa yena mathupha, kanti uveze ukuthi izigameko zobugebengu ziyinto esiqala ukwanda kule ndawo.Imizamo yokuthola umndeni kamgilwa ayiphumelelanga njengoba kuvele ukuthi uhlala nesalukazi esinguninakhulu kanti abakubo bakwenye indawo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uConstable Thenjiswa Ngcobo, uthe kuboshwe owesilisa oneminyaka engu-22 ngecala lokubulala, kanti uvele enkantolo ngoLwesithathu.

EZOMHLABA: Kubikwa ukuthi ubesekhathele ukucefezelwa ngokuganwa owesilisa obulale umakhelwane wakhe obehlezi ebuza ukuthi uganwa nini njengoba esena-45 kodwa lutho umalokazana.Ngokwemibiko yabezindaba e-Indonasia, lesi sehlo senzeke ngomhla ka-29 Julayi nonyaka eeTapanili eNorth Sumatra lapho umsolwa uParlindungan Siregar, 45, ehlasele umakhelwane wakhe u-Asgim Irianto, 60, emqqema ngepulangwe ekhanda.Ukhomishana wamaphoyisa uMaria Marpaung uthi umgilwa waphuma wabaleka ngemuva kokuhlaselwa uSiregar kodwa wawa, umsolwa waqhubeka nokumshaya kwaze kwangenelela abanye omakhelwane balamula.“Umgilwa waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela esiseduze nokuyilapho ashonela khona. Umsolwa ulivumile icala ngesikhathi eboshwa ngemuva kwesigameko,” kusho uMarpaung.

UKHALA ngokungasukunyelwa kwenkinga yokudlebekela kwezigebengu usomabhizinisi waseMgungundlovu, obhekene nenkinga yokugqekezelwa izikhawu eziningi, kucekelwe phansi impahla nengqalasizinda yokusebenza ebhizinisini lakhe.UMnuz Bongani Zuma wase-Unit 2, eMbali, uthi ibhizinisi lakhe liqashisa ngezindawo zokusebenzela kwabenza amabhizinisi ehlukene okubalwa ukucwala ikhanda, awabathungayo nabadayisa ukudla nemikhiqizo eyahlukene.Nokho ukuthula akakutholi ngenxa yokwanda kwezigameko zokucekelwa phansi kwempahla yamakhasimende akhe, okuba nomthelela omubi njengoba kuwaxosha, abone kungaphephile ezigebengwini.“Lezi zigameko ziqale ukwenzeka ngabo-2022, lapho ebesifika khona ekuseni kugqekeziwe futhi kucekelwe phansi impahla yamakhasimende ami. Sekwaba yinsakavukela njengoba kungapheli isikhathi esingakanani, kuphinde kwenzeke. “Kwala ngisho ngibika kaningi emaphoyiseni, akukho mehluko futhi akukho muntu oboshwayo. Inkinga yami wukuthi anginawo amandla okuqasha abaqaphi ebhizinisini, yingakho kubiyiwe kodwa izigebengu ziyangena, zimoshe konke,” kulanda uZuma.Uthe le ndawo ayivula ngo-2013, inezakhiwo eziwu-9 eziwusizo kakhulu emphakathini ngoba zenza kube lula kosomabhizinisi asabafufusa abaqashe kuyena ukusebenzela futhi iwukuphela kwendlela aziphilisa ngayo nezingane zakhe eziyisithupha.Uthe kuyamkhathaza kakhulu konke lokhu, ikakhulu ngoba ubona kungekho okwenziwa wumthetho ukunqanda inkinga abhekene nayo, wathi kugcine ukugqekezwa ngoMeyi nonyaka ebhizinisini.Kuthintwa okhulumela amaphoyisa esifundazweni, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uqinisesike ukuthi amaphoyisa ayazi ngezinye zezigameko ezibikwa wuZuma. “Amacala obugebengu obuhleliwe bokweba impahla nokukhomba ngesibhamu abikwa esiteshini samaphoyisa ePlessislaer ukuthi kuphenywe ngezigameko ezenzeka ngoMashi 27 wango-2022 nangoFebhuwari 17 wango-2024, nokho akukaze kuboshwe muntu ngazo,” kusho uNetshiunda.

BASOLA ukuthi ubulawe ukushumpulwa umphambili owesilisa waKwaDumisa eMzinto, isidumbu sakhe esitholakale emzini abewugada, ngoMsombuluko.UMnuz Mduduzi Mkhize (42) kuthiwa utholwe umfowabo ephaseji lendlu, izinyawo zakhe zingaphakathi egunjini lokugeza, sekuphele izinsuku ezintathu engabonakali.Ekhuluma neSolezwe izolo umfowabo, uMnuz Nkanyiso Ngongoma. uthe umuzi okubulawelwe kuwo umufi owezihlobo ezizinze eThekwini ngokomsebenzi, ezazicele ukuthi azigadele wona.Uthe belungapheli usuku engezanga kubo ezobabona noma ezobheka okuya ngasethunjini.“Utholwe yimi emva kokuqaphela ukuthi sekuphele izinsuku ezintathu engezi ukuzosibheka ekhaya sinesalukazi sethu njengenjwayelo. Ngithe uma ngifika khona, ngaqaphela ukuthi umsakazo nethelevishini bekukhalela phezulu. Ngimumemezile, lutho ukusabela,” kulandisa uNgongoma.Uqhube wathi uze waphusha umnyango, wabona ukhiye obujikijelwe kude, wawuqhweba ngenduku, ukuze akwazi ukuvula, angene.“Ngiqaphele ukuthi umsakazo nethelevishini bekukhushulwe i-volume yaze yafika ekugcineni,” kulandisa uNgongoma.Uqhube wathi ngaphambi kokuba azithele phezu kwesidumbu sikamfowabo, uqale wakhangwa ngamabhodlela otshwala, amanye esele nobuwuhhafu.UNgongoma uthe ngesikhathi eqhubeka ngephaseji, uzithele kumfowabo elinyaziwe.“Ibisekhona impintshisi egcwele igazi, engikholwa ukuthi yiyo esetshenzisiwe ngesikhathi ebulawa. Umphambili wakhe ubungekho, bahambe nawo,” kusho uNgongoma.Uthe okunye akuqaphele iphuphusi elingatheni ekhanda likamufi, athe akakholwa ukuthi libe nomthelela ekufeni kwakhe.Uthe abanalo ulwazi lokuthi ubulawe nini phakathi kwalezi zinsuku angezanga ngazo ekhaya baze banquma ukuyombheka.Uthe okunye okubadidayo ukuthi yisiphi lesi sitha abesenaso, esikhethe ukumbulala ngesihluku esingaka njengoba bemazi njengomuntu ongesona isixhwanguxhwangu.“Akasiye nomuntu okhonze abantu noma abangani. Ubezikhonzele ukuchitha isikhathi nathi siwumndeni, engesilo novanzi. Manje siyadideka ukuthi ubani lo omenzakalise ngesihluku esinje, edinwa yini?,” kusho uNgongoma.Ikhansela lendawo, uMnuz Mandlenkosi Phungula, lithe umphakathi usovalweni njengoba sikhona esinye isigameko esicishe sifane nalesi esenzeke emasontweni amathathu edlule.“Nakuso kwangenelwa umuntu endlini, wabulawa, wakopolotwa amehlo. Nakuso kwaficwa umsakazo ukhalela phezulu, kusho ukuthi lo muntu usuke engafuni kuzwakale abagilwa bekhala. Umphakathi ukhathazwa ukuthi awazi noma indawo isinomalugaju yini,” kusho uPhungula.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa aseSawoti aphenya icala lokubulala kulandela isigameko sokusokutholwa kowesilisa ebulewe ngoMsombuluko.“Isidumbu sikamgilwa sitholwe phansi egumbini lokugeza,” kusho Netshiunda.
