BASOLA ukuthi ubemyenga unina wezingane zakhe uma ethi akazogubha usuku lwakhe lokuzalwa emqashweni wakhe oseLusaka, eMawoti, eNanda, ngoMgqibelo, owesilisa ongumpheki okuthiwa ugcine embulala ngeSonto.UNksz Mbali Makokone (29) wakhona endaweni kuthiwa utholwe efile ngaphakathi emqashweni kamsolwa anezingane ezimibili naye, eneminyaka emibili neyisithupha.Kuthiwa ngesikhathi kufika amaphoyisa, umsolwa uficwe ezidlela inyama eduze kwesidumbu esazidlubhe ziphelele izingubo ezinegazi abezigqoke ngesikhathi ebulala umufi.Uthe ngesikhathi eseboshwa, utshele amaphoyisa ukuthi awamnike isikhathi agqoke izingubo ezifudumalayo ngoba kuyabanda esitokisini.Kuthiwa endaweni yesigameko bekukhona isitini esigcwele igazi, umufi enenxeba lokugwazwa emqaleni, nezibazi zokuklinywa.Isihlobo sikamufi esicele ukungadalulwa silandisa ngesigameko sithe, baqale baxakwa ukufika kwezingane zikamufi kubo ekuseni, zihamba zibambene ngezandla.“Sithe uma sizibuza ukuthi kwenzenjani zafika zodwa, endala yathi uyise uzinike u-R10 wathi azihambe ziyothenga esitolo bese ziza ekhaya. Ibe isisho nokuthi uyise ubemshaya unina,” kusho isihlobo.Siqhube sathi abazange banake ukuthi konakele njengoba bese kujwayelekile ukuthi umsolwa amshaye umufi.Uthe bathuke sekungena ucingo lwesihlobo sithi asihambe siyobheka ukuthi konke kuhamba kahle yini kumufi emqashweni kamsolwa ngoba uqeda kuthola ucingo lwakhe, ethi awuze umndeni wakhe uzomthatha.“Umama uhambe waya khona, wafica umshophi. Nathi size kamumva safica kugcwele abantu egcekeni, abanye bezobuka, abanye bebevele bekhona njengoba uMbali ebegubha usuku lwakhe lokuzalwa,” kusho isihlobo.Uthe abakutholile ukuthi kugujwe umsolwa engekho, eye emsebenzini.Uqhube wathi ubuye ezintatha, wafika abantu begcwele igceke kuphuzwa, wakhombisa ukunengeka yize engashongo lutho.“Sizwa kuthiwa ekuseni umsolwa nomufi baphelezele omunye umngani kamufi esegoduka. Kuthiwa akuphelanga sikhathi esingakanani sebebuyile, waqala wamshaya endlini,” kusho isihlobo.Uthe okubaphathe kabi ukuthi umufi ubulawe kukhona abantu egcekeni kanjalo nomakhelwane abaseduze, okukhona kubo ngisho nabesilisa kodwa bonke abakwazanga ukusiza.Uthe umufi ubulawa nje ubenezinsuku ezintathu ebuye ekhaya emva kokuxoshwa umsolwa abehlala nye emqashweni.“Kuthe uma sekusondela usuku lwakhe lokuzalwa, wamncenga ukuthi eze  emqashweni wakhe. Sesibona sengathi ubevele ehlele ukumbulala ngoba umbiza nje ubazi ukuthi baxabene, wajika wahamba wayosebenza, wambulala emva kwamahora ambalwa ebuye emsebenzini,” kusho isihlobo.Uthe bafuna ubulungiswa ngobulwane abenzile.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Nata,l uConstable Thenjiswa Ngcobo, uthe amaphoyisa abophe owesilisa oneminyaka engu-38 emva kokuthi owesifazane oneminyaka engu-29 etholwe efile ngeSonto eLusaka.“Umufi ubenezibazi eziningi zokulimala emzimbeni. Umsolwa bekulindeleke ukuthi avele eNkantolo yaseNtuzuma ngoLwesibili. Imbangela yokubulala ayikaziwa,” kusho uConst Ngcobo.

IFOLOSA ngoSihlalo wayo i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sboniso Duma, kwabazojutshelwa esiShayamthetho sesifundazwe ngemuva kokhetho.UDuma ulandelwa ohlwini yiPhini lakhe, uNksz Nomagugu Simelane onguMphathiswa wezeMpilo, alandelwe nguMnuz Sipho Hlomuka iPhini likaNobhala jikelele, kuthi uMphathiswa wezeMfundo, uNkk Mbali Frazer, alale endaweni yesine. UNdunankulu Nomusa Dube-Ncube, ngokohlu olukhishwe yi-ANC, ulele endaweni ka-31.Okuqaphelekile ngukuthi usihlalo we-ANC eThekwini, uNkk Zandile Gumede, akekho ohlwini njengoba esahamba amacala.UNksz Sizophila Mkhize oke wahola iCosas ulele endaweni yesihlanu, kuthi uNkk Hlengiwe Mavimbela usendaweni yesithupha.Ngokwalolu luhlu, uSomlomo wesiShayamthetho ulele endaweni yesishiyagalombili, uDkt Ntuthuko Mahlaba uMgcinimafa we-ANC esifundazweni, usendaweni yesishiyagalolunye.OwayenguMphathiswa wezeMfundo, uMnuz Mthandeni Dlungwane, yena ulele endaweni ka-10, kuthi imeya yaseHarry Gwala, uMnuz Zamo Nxumalo, isendaweni ka-11.UMnuz Mike Mabuyakhulu ukhuza ibuya esiShayamthetho uma le nhlangano ithola amavoti enele njengoba elele endaweni ka-63. UMabuyakhulu owayephethe uMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho, wacela ukuma kuyona yonke into eyayithinta i-ANC ngoba kwakunophenyo olwaluqhubeka olwagcina lumkhiphe phambili, mayelana nomunye wemicimbi wokwenza iJazz.OwayenguMphathiswa wezokuHlaliswa kwaBantu esifundazweni, uMnuz Jomo Sibiya, yena uphakanyiswe ukuthi aye ePhalamende ngemuva kokhetho.USibiya ongomunye wabaluleka uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, wakhishwa esikhundleni sokuba ngumphathiswa esifundazweni emuva kokungena kobuholi obusha be-ANC, okumanje buholwa nguDuma.Abanye abantu abaya ePhalamende oNkk Nomalungelo Gina, iPhini likaNgqongqoshe wezoHwebo. Abanye abaholi ababuyayo uDkt Zweli Mkhize, oke waba ngungqongqoshe wezeMpilo kuleli.UDkt Sibongiseni Dhlomo ngomunye wabakhuza ibuya, njengoba eyiPhini likaNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo.Abanye abakhona kulolu luhlu, kubalwa ilungu lePhalamende uMnuz Sdumo Dlamini, uMnuz Edwin Mkhize onguNobhala weCosatu esifundazweni.UNksz Bathabile Dlamini oke waba ngungqongqoshe wezeNhlalakahle ngomunye okuphakanyiswe igama lakhe ukuthi aye ePhalamende.Oke wakhulumela i-ANC esifundazweni, uMnuz Nhlakanipho Ntombela, uvela ohlwini oluya esiShayamthetho, noluya ePhalamende.UMnuz Lucky Moloi, umyeni kaMphathishwa wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu, uNkk Bongi Sithole-Moloi naye obuyayo, ungenile ohlwini lwabaya esiShayamthetho. Abangekho ohlwini kubalwa uMphathiswa wezokuHlaliswa kwaBantu, uMnuz Sipho “KK” Nkosi, nozakwabo wezezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi, uNkk Nonhlanhla Khoza, abaveza ukuthi sebethi khumu.UNobhalaJjikelele uMnuz Fikile Mbalula ekhuluma nabezindaba izolo, uthe uyabathemba bonke abajutshelwe ukumela le nhlangano.Uthe ohlwini kukhona intsha, abantu abanamava kanjalo nabaphila nokukhubazeka okubalwa nabathandana nobulili obufana nobabo.Uveze ukuthi kunemigomo abajutshiwe obekumele bahlangabezane nayo, wathi bekudingeka iziqu futhi kungabi umuntu oseke walahlwa amacala.

SIBUYELE ekhaya singenamyocu isitshudeni saseBerea Tech obekubikwe ngeledlule ukuthi sekuphele izinsuku sinyamalale endaweni yobumnandi iLondon On 75, Kwa-L KwaMashu.U-Amile Khambule waseMbumbulu kuthiwa ubuyele kubo ngoLwesithathu ntambama.Wayekade ehambe kubo ngo-Agasti 3, ethi uya ebanganini bakhe eVerulam.Ugogo wakhe, uNkk Patience Khambule ekhuluma neSolezwe izolo ukuqinisekisile ukubuya kuka-Amile, wathi umfice ezihlalele ekhaya ebusuku ngoLwesithathu ebuya emsebenzini. UNkk Khambule ubezwakala ukuthi sisamdinile isenzo somzukulu wakhe sokuhamba izinsuku ekhaya engabuyi.“Ngithe uma ngimfica ngambuza ukuthi uvelaphi, wathi ubesazihlalele ebumnandini. Ingidinile le ngane. Namanje ayikho into etheni esengiyikhulumile nayo. Akuvumi nje ngikhulume naye,” kusho uNkk Khambule.Uthe akwenza emva kokubuya kwakhe, wamthatha wamyisa esiteshini samaphoyisa eMbumbulu ukuze ayotshela amaphoyisa ukuthi usebuyile kwamathanda nhliziyo.Uthe wabikela amaphoyisa ngokunyamalala kuka-Amile ngoba ekhathazekile, kwazise izigameko zokunyamalala kwabesifazane ziyathusa kulezi zinsuku.“Ngangizothini ukungawabikeli amaphoyisa, umuntu engabuyi ngosuku ayethe uzobuya ngalo? Nokho ungifundise isifundo sokuthi uma ephinda elahleka, ngingabe ngisazihlupha,” kusho uNkk Khambule obabaze ukuthi akazi ukuthi umuntu onjani ohlala ebumnandini izinsuku ngezinsuku engagoduki.Ethintwa u-Amile uphendule ngelithi yena ubengalahlekile, wathi iselula yakhe ebilahlekile.Ebuzwa ukuthi iselula yatholwa kumngani nje, owathi umnike yona ngo-Agasti 3, maqede wanyamalala, akabange esezwakala ukuthi uphendula uthini, kuhixiza i-network.Wethembisile ukuthi uzoyiphendula imibuzo Isolezwe elizoyithumela ku-WhatsApp, nokugcine kungenzekanga njengoba ewuzibile umyalezo awuthunyelwe.Isolezwe lalaziswe umnikazi weLondon, uMnuz Xolani Mabanga ngoLwesine ekuseni ukuthi u-Amile ubuyele ekhaya ephephile. Ethintwa izolo uthe okubajabulisayo bona ukuthi u-Amile ubuyele ekhaya ephephile ikakhulukazi njengoba imibiko ebisabalele ibithi uduke endaweni yabo yobumnandi.Uthe imibiko yokunyamalala kwabantu endaweni yobumnandi ibuye ihluphe ngoba uthola ukuthi umuntu usuke engadukile, kodwa ezihlalele, engafuni ukugoduka.

USIBANGE nomholi we-EFF isikhundla sokuba wumengameli wezwe kulokhu uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa ogcine ephinda ekhethwa waba ngumengameli wezwe ihlandla lesibili. IPhalamende lihlale umhlangano wokuqala eKapa lakhetha uNkk Thoko Didiza kwesikaSomlomo. UNkk Didiza wehlule uNksz Veronica Mente onguSihlalo we-EFF kuzwelonke nobephakanyiselwe kwesikasomlomo. Amalungu akhethe uDkt Annelie Lotriet we-DA kwesePhini likaSomlomo eginqa uMnuz Vuyolwethu Zungula we-ATM naye obephakanyisiwe.IPhalamende ebelihlala lingelesikhombisa kusukela ngo-1994 ngesikhathi izwe liphuma kuhulumeni wobandlululo kungenwa kowentando yeningi.Ukuhlala kwePhalamende kuqale kwenganyelwa yiNhloko yamaJaji kuleli iJaji uRaymond Zondo yase iphosa izintambo kuSomlomo uNkk Didiza. UMengameli ukhethwe selishonile ilanga ebusuku ngenxa yokuhamba kancane kohlelo.Ukukhethwa kukahulumeni omusha kuwumphumela wohulumeni wobumbano lweANC, DA ne-IFP.I-ANC ebiphethe izwe iminyaka engu-30 ingene ehlazweni ihluleka wukubuyela emandleni nokuphoqe ukuthi ihambe ifongqa isigqoko ixoxa namaqembu.Kuthe kusahleli umhlangano wePhalamende kusakhethwa, i-MK yathumela isimemo sabezindaba ibika ukuthi uMnuz Jacob Zuma uzokhuluma ngeSonto njengoba ebize abezindaba.Isimemo siveza inkulumo kaZuma njengezobe iqavile ibhekene ngqo nesizwe sezwe nepolitiki.“UMengameli uZuma uzokhuluma nabezindaba kwingqophamlando yenkulumo maqondana nesimo sepolitiki esiqhubekayo. IPhalamende liqhubekile nomsebezi walo ngaphandle kwamalungu ePhalamende eMK adube umhlangano ngoba ethi awayemukeli imiphumela yokhetho lukazwelonke. Uzokhuluma ngezinto eziningi nezithinta ikusasa lezwe,’’ kusho isitatimende esikhishwe wuMnuz Nhlamulo Ndhlela, okhulumela iMK.UNdhlela uthe inkulumo kaZuma izoba ngeSonto eGoli endaweni engakadalulwa ngehora lesibili ntambama nokuyilapho azokhuluma khona konke.UZuma ubiza imbizo nje wachithwa yinkantolo ohlwini lwamalungu ePhalamende ngenxa yokuthi wake walahlwa ngecala wagwetshwa.I-MK ibingabonwa nhlobo ePhalamende kodwa esifundazweni KwaZulu-Natal amalungu ayo afungiswe ngempumelelo. I-MK inezihlalo ezingu-58 ePhalamende bese iba nezingu-37 esiShayamthetho saseKZN.Kulindeleke ukuthi uMengameli agcotshwe emcimbini ozoba ngoLwesithathu lwesonto elizayo ePitoli. Emuva komcimbi amehlo ayobe esethi njo kumengameli ukuthi amemezele amalungu ekhabhinethi azosebenza nawo kuhulumeni omusha.Nakuba i-ANC ingenile kuhulumeni wobumbano namanye amaqembu kodwa sikhona isikhalo kwezinye izakhamkhanya ezisola i-ANC ngokushintsha imibala.Amaqembu angafakwanga kuhulumeni wobumbano abelokhu ekhale njalo futhi abeziphakamisela amanye amagama aphikisa lawo aphakanysiwe yilawo ayingxenye kahulumeni wobumbano.

UMSOLWA wesine ecaleni lokubulawa komrepha uKiernan ‘AKA’ Forbes nomngani wakhe uTebello ‘Tibz’ Motsoane ubuze inkantolo izolo ukuthi kungani uMfundo Gcaba engekho ebhentshini labasolwa.UMnuz Mziwethemba Harvey Gwabeni, osolwa ngokuba ngungqondongqondo kuleli cala ubuze lombuzo ngomlomo kammeli wakhe u-Advocate Paul Jorgensen omfundele incwadi efungelwe.Incwadi efungelwe kaGwabeni ibiphendula uMbuso owenza izethulo zokuthi kungani ungafuni uGwabeni nabanye abasolwa abane kuleli cala kungafanele badedelwe ngebheyili.Igama likaGcaba, ongusomabhizinisi odumile embonini yamatekisi lavela phambilini enkantolo, kuthiwa imali okusolwa ukuthi yayiyinkokhelo yokubulawa kuka-AKA noTibz yafakwa yinkampani yakhe (uGcaba) kwi-akhawunti kaGwabeni.Efunda incwadi kaGwabeni, uJorgensen uthe umbuso nguye ungqondongqondo ekubulaweni kwalaba ababili, wathi imali engu-R800 000 yafakwa kwi-akhawunti yakhe ukuze kukhokhelwe ukubulawa kwabo.“Uma umbuso ukholelwa kulokhu, mina bengilindele ukuthi umbophe uMfundo Gcaba, naye azoba umsolwa kanye nathi,” kusho uJorgensen.Uqhube wathi kuze kube yimanje umbuso awukaze uchaze ukuthi yisiphi isizathu esenza ukuthi angaboshwa.“Isizathu ukuthi abukho ubufakazi obuqinile obumyamanisa naleli cala,” kusho uJorgensen.Esekulo lelo phuzu ugcizelele ngelithi ukufakelana imali eyisamba kwakuhambisana nomsebenzi wenkampani yakhe yemayini. Uqhube wathi inkantolo ayikakwazi ukuveza ukuthi yini eyayingadala ukuthi yena noGcaba bafune u-AKA noTibz befile.Wathi uyavuma ukuthi wayifakelwa vele imali kodwa kwakungeyomsebenzi, waqhuba wathi wayichaza kwasolwa nabo ngomsebenzi ababemenzele wona.“Ukuthi ngayithola ngosuku okwabulawa ngalo abafi nokuthi ngabe sengifakela uLindokuhle Ndimande uR133 000 khona lapho, kwaziqondanela nje,” kusho uJorgensen.UJorgensen uphinde wafunda isitatimende esathunyelwa wumndeni wakwaGcaba kwabezindaba lapho bechaza khona ukuthi ilungu labo, uMfundo linobudlelwano bezamabhizinisi noGwabeni, obungaqalanga ngesikhathi emfakela uR800 000 kodwa budala.Ngokwesitatimende uthe umndeni wakwaGcaba waveza ukuthi awukaze uthintwe ngamaphoyisa mayelana nodaba lwale mali uMfundo ayifakela uGwabeni.Waveza ukuthi uMfundo uthi ukulungele ukuthi azocacisa ngale mali nanoma yinini uma engabizwa ngamaphoyisa. Eziphendulela kolwezimoto okuthiwa zasetshenziswa ekubulaweni kwalaba ababili, iBMW nePolo, uthe kuyiqiniso ukuthi wayezibolekile enkampanini ebolekisa izimoto. Wathi njengoba umphenyi egqamisa ukuthi zasetsheziswa ekwenzeni icala, wehluleke wancama ukuvezela umbuso ukuthi ngesikhathi kwenzeka isigameko, kwase kuphele izinyanga aboleka lezi zimoto.IMantshi uMnuz Vincent Hlatshwayo ulihlehlisele uMay 2 icala ukuthi kwenziwe izethulo zokugcina phakathi kwabashushisi bombuso nabameli babasolwa.Angu-12 amacala abhekene nabasolwa, kuwona kukhona elokwakha itulo lokubulala, elokubulala u-AKA, elokubulala uTibz, elokutholakala nesibhamu ngokungemthetho, elokutholakala nezinhlamvu bese kuba ayisihlanu okuzama ukubulala namabili okushintshisana ngemali ngokungemthetho.

UMREPHA waseNingizimu Afrika, uCassper Nyovest uzokuba ngezinye zezikhulumi engqungqutheleni yebandla iCovenant Fellowship Church (CFCI) eholwa nguMphostoli Collins Dhlomo.Le ngqungquthela iqhubeka esakhiweni sebandla esiseThekwini. Izoze iphothulwe ngeSonto ekuseni.UNyovest wenze i-video enxusa abalandeli bakhe ukuba beze ngobuningi babo kule nkonzo. "Ngizobe ngiyisikhulumi ebandleni i-CFCI, eThekwini. Ngicela nize nonke nibekhona, kodwa ngizizwa nginovalo oluncane,'' usho kanje.UDhlomo uthe okudale ukuthi bamsondeze eduze lo mculi ukuthi ubalwa nabanye babaculi abaziwayo kakhulu eNingizimu Afrika.Uthe njengoba esemukele uJesu njengenkosi nomsindisi wakhe, babone kumqoka kakhulu ukuthi asondele ezokhuluma nabantu abasha bebandla.Uthe  lo mculi ulandelwa yizinkumbi zabantu ngokomculo wakhe. Uma ke esevuma indaba kaJesu lokho kuchaza ukuthi baningi abanye abalandela yena abazobona ukuthi ukukholwa kuyisidingo esikhulu kubantu.Uthe kuhle ukuthi umculi okuleli qophelo athathe isinqumo sokuthi akhonze uJesu ngokugcwele.

UDINGA ozomtakula ezidakamizweni uSifiso “Ndishi” Manana, ozisola ngokubulala ikusasa ngoba waziwa esaseyinjini yaseswini ezinkulisa zebhola ezehlukene. Phakathi kwezinkulisa acijwe kuzona uManana, kubalwa eyaMaZulu, eyeMaritzburg City, neyeBloemfontein Celtic.UNdishi (34), odabuka eSub 5 eClermont, kodwa oke wahlala naseMbali,  usephenduke umhambuma emigwaqweni yaseThekwini.Echaza ngokuzithola eseyiphara, uNdishi uthe waxoshwa ebholeni futhi waphelelwa yindawo yokuhlala kubo emuva kokuntshontshela amalungu omndeni. Uthe ungene ezidakamizweni emuva kokujola nentokazi yekhaladi eyamqoma esedlalela iCeltic ngo-2002.Echaza ngokucwila ezidakamizweni ubeke kanje:"Lo muntu wesifazane wagcina esengicela kwi-fitness coach yesifazane yeqembu ukuba ngizomhlalisa kubo ngoba usele yedwa. Ubengithatha impelasonto yonke uma singenayo imidlalo angidlise izidakamizwa. Lokho kwakungenza ngibambeke ngize ngifike ngoLwesibili." Uthe intokazi, esiligodlile igama layo ngoba asiyitholanga ukuba iziphawulele, imfundise izidakamizwa ezinjenge-cocaine, ecstacy nenyaope.UNdishi uthe babanjwa nabanye abadlali ukuthi bazitika ngezidakamizwa."Owayengumqeqeshi wethu wangikhulumela naMaZulu ukuba ngiyodlala kuwo ngoba wayechazekile yikhono lami. Ngafika enkulisa yaMaZulu ngadlala ngaphansi komqeqeshi uJoel Faya." Uthe nakhona kwabuye kwamvuka ukuthi useyazazi izidakamizwa."Nakhona ngaqala ukuntshontsha izidakamizwa, ngagcina ngingasakwazi ukujima nokuya emdlalweni. Kunokuthi bangixoshe, ngabona kungcono ukuthi ngizihambele."Uthe kwababuhlungu kuye ukuhlukana nomdlalo webhola ngoba iyona yinto ayeyazi. Eqhuba uthe ubuyele kubo kodwa waxoshwa khona, okuyikho okumenze wagcina esegxila ezidakamizweni ngoba ubesengundingasithebeni.Uthe angakujabulela ukunikezwa ithuba lokuhambela izikole aqwashise ngobubi bezidakamizwa futhi asize nabadlali abasacathula ebholeni.UNdishi ufunde eVezamafa Primary, eZakhele Primary kwathi u-matric wawenza eLanga High, KwaDabeka kodwa wafeyila. Uthe ubuye wenza izifundo zeTourism eLangeni TVET College, ePinetown kodwa wangahlala isikhathi eside.Uqale ukugijima kwezikanobhutshuzwayo kwiSilver Spurs, Masters, Young Mates, nakwiClermont United. Uthe wajoyina iCeltic, ngemva kokubona kwelinye iphephandaba laseGoli, elibhala ngebhola ukuthi kwakunenhlolokhono. Abadlali ake agijima nabo ngoKermit Erasmus (Celtic), Sphelele Mthembu (City), Japhet Zwane (AmaZulu), Andile Jali (Celtic) noBrilliant Khuzwayo (AmaZulu). Esakhula wayefuna ukudlalela iKaizer Chiefs kodwa wagcina esehalela iMamelodi Sundowns. Phakathi kwabadlali akhule ebukela kubo, ubale uJabu Mahlangu, noScara Ngobese. Uthe abangakwazi ukumsiza bangaxhumana noMP Da Bee, weMPtv eCity Life, esemgwaqweni uJoseph Nduli, noma ku-071 281 7509.

KUTHIWA uphele emehlweni umshayeli wemoto ekhokhelwa ngebanga ngemuva kokushayisa amatekisi amabili kuM25 ngaseDube Village.Abezimo eziphuthumayo basendaweni yesehlo, bathathu abagibeli okubukwa ukuthi balimele, kodwa akekho osesimweni esibucayi. Kuphazamisekile ukuhamba kwezimoto kule ndawo, kunxuswa abashayeli ukuba basebenzise eminye imizila.Okhulumela abamatekisi eGreater North uMnuz Kubheka uthe ngokombiko awutholile, umshayeli wemoto encane ubalekile  washiya umnikazi obelimele phakathi emotweni. “Umbiko engiwuthole komunye wabanikazi bamatekisi alimalile wukuthi umshayeli wemoto encane ubehamba nomphathi wakhe okuthe ngemuva kwengozi wabaleka umshayeli washiya umphathi wakhe elimele, ” kusho uKubheka. Uqhubeke wathi umnikazi wemoto encane kuthiwa wehle ku-ambulensi ebimhambisa esibhedlela wathi akakwazi ukushiya imoto yakhe eyodwa engazi ukuthi kuzokwenzekani kuyo. Le ngozi ilandela enye eyenzeke kuM25 ngaseCrossini lapho kushayisane khona izimoto ezincane ezimbili zaphonseka emanzini. Amaphoyisa nabezimo eziphuthumayo basendaweni yesigameko.

UFUNA ibheyili ukuze akwazi ukuyodayisa amaswidi, amagwinya namashibusi owesilisa othweswe icala lokubulala indodana yakhe.UMnuz Siyabonga Innocent Shezi (30) ufake ubeke lamaphuzu enxenxa imantshi ukuthi imnikeze ibheyili.Usolwa ngokushaya aklinye indodana yakhe uSifundo Sibisi owayenenminyaka eyisishiyagalombili.Ubuzwe ummeli wakhe kungani iMantshi L Gorie kumele imnikeze ibheyili wathi ufuna ukuyovusa ibhizinisi lakhe.“Ngifuna ukuthi ngiqhubeke namabhizinisi ami amancane. Ngingumakhi, ngiyabhaka futhi nginebhizinisi lokudayisa oswidi, ukudla okungamagwinya, amashibusi engikudayisa ezikoleni nasemphakathini, “ kuchaza uShezi.Waboshwa ngoJanuwari 13, 2023 wathweswa icala lokubulala okuhleliwe.Isidumbu sikamufi satholakala ehlathini eNtshongweni eThekwini sinamanxeba okushaywa ngokuklinya.Uvele wayihleka usuku yonke into ebikade ichazwa uShezi ethula ubufakazi unina kaSifundo, uNksz Nonhlanhla Shezi obesenkantolo.Usole uShezi ngokusenga ezimithiyo wathi ubengayenzi yonke lento athi uyayenza, udukisa inkantolo.Icala lihlehliselwe uJuni 13 nonyaka khona uMbuso uzoyofuna iminingwane ngezinto ezishiwo uShezi ngesikhathi ethula ubufakazi ecela ibheyili.UShezi ubeqale wadonswa ngendlebe yimantshi ethe akamusa ukudlala uma eza enkantolo.Ubekade ekhuluma kancane, ebuka phansi unomphela abuye acimeze, wathi kwenziwa ukukhathala anakho.Ubebuye ajeqeze unina kaSifundo nakade ehlezi nabo abebekade bezomeseka enkantolo.

UNGQONGQOSHE wamaPhoyisa uMnuz Bheki Celi uhambele ekhaya lomfana oneminyaka emihlanu owadutshulwa wabulawa ngoLwesihlanu kudunwa imoto kayise.UCele uhlanganyele nalo mndeni ukuzobabaza isiga esehlele lo mndeni kubulawa uDitebogo Phalane.Lokhu kwenzeke ngoLwesihlanu ebusuku ngesikhathi owesilisa efika emzini wakhe ehamba ngeveni elihlophe leToyota. Bekungezithuba zika-10.30pm ngesikhathi efika ekhaya wahlangantshezwa yindodana yakhe esencane. Lo mlisa ungena ekhaya nje uphelezelwa yizigebengu ezimuvimbezele zizama ukuthatha imoto yakhe.Kuzwakale kuduma izulu lezandla ngesikhathi kuthathwa le moto nokuyilapho okubonakale khona ukuthi kudubuleke le ngane, ephuthunyiswe esibhedlela kodwa ngeshwa yafike yaphelela khona.Ukubulawa kukaDitebogo ngalesi sihluku kuthuse kakhulu amalungu omphakathi waseSoshanguve nasePitoli yonkana asehlalele ovalweni ngenxa yokwanda kwezigameko zobugebengu obunodlame.UCele uvakashele lomndeni ehambisana noKhomishana wamaPhoyisa kuZwelonke uGeneral Fannie Masemola nabanye abaholi basesiphiyiseni.Kulolu hambo, amaphoyisa azokwethula umbiko ophelele ngezigameko zobugebengu, kuxhunyanwe nomphakathi ukuze kucutshungulwe izindlela ezingasiza ukulwa nobugebengu obunodlame.

UNGQONGQOSHE wamaphoyisa, uMnuz Bheki Cele, ukhale ngokuhlaliswa ngesinqe esisodwa kwabantu eDesai, eMariannhill, athe bekukade kwenziwa “izinswelaboya” ezibulewe.UCele udalule ukuthi amacala enzekile, ayamaniswa nababulewe angu-26 aqale ngo-Okthoba 2023.“Amacala angu-23 bekungawokugqekezwa kwemizi kusetshenziswa indlakadla kuphethwe izibhamu kuthathwe izinto zabantu. Kukhona necala lokudlwengula nawokuzama ukubulala,” kusho uCele.Mayelana nosekuhlukanise phakathi umphakathi, njengoba kukhona abakujabulele ukubulawa kwabasolwa, abanye bekhala ngesandla esiqinile abathi ngesamaphoyisa, uCele uthe abafana ababulewe bayingozi.Uqhube wathi kuyaye kuthi uma amaphoyisa eseluqoqile ulwazi, eseyobopha abasolwa, bavele badubule kuqala.“Uma udedela izulu lezandla emaphoyiseni nawo kumele aphendule ngezulu lezandla. Zitholakele izibhamu ezingekho emthethweni kule ndawo, labantu bebenza ubelelesi obesabekayo,” kucaza uCele.Uphinde wavakasha emzini wowesifazane okuthiwa waphoqwa abasolwa ababulewe ukuthi abukele ngesikhathi omunye wabo edlwengula indodakazi yakhe eyayina-18 weminyaka.Kuvele nokuthi abasolwa abane kulaba ababulewe babekade bekhona kugqekezwa lo muzi futhi kudlwengulwa indodakazi yakhona.Ungqongqoshe uthe uphiko oluphenya izenzo zamaphoyisa i-Ipid iyaphenya ngokwenzekile.“Ngeke sikuvume ukuthi uma amaphoyisa ezophenya amacala anjengalawa, sibuye sizoqoqa izidumbu zawo. Singamane sithethe amacala ukuthi amaphoyisa aqinise isandla kunokuthi sihambe siyowangcwaba,” kusho uCele.Ukhale ngezindawo ezisenyakatho nasentshonalanga yeTheku wathi zigubuzelwe ububengu.UCele uthe usazobuya eDesai ukuzoxoxa nomphakathi futhi uyabona ukuthi isekhona intuthu kule ndawo okuzomele amaphoyisa abuye azoyicisha.Ungqongqoshe uthe ukubulawa kwamaphoyisa angu-22 ezinyangeni ezintathu zokuphela kuka-2023, kubalwa nelalisophikweni i-NIU kukhomba ukuthi izigebengu azizimisele ukuhlehlela emuva. “Uma ufuna ubufakazi bokuthi ziyingozi kangakanani izigebengu, yilezi zidumbu zamaphoyisa esizingcwabayo. Umuntu okhala ngokuthi amaphoyisa anesandla esiqinile, okusho ukuthi uma sithamba, sizowangcwaba zonke izinsuku amaphoyisa,“ kusho uCele ethi amaphoyisa adutshulwa ngesikhathi evikela umphakathi nawo.

USONGELE izigebengu ungqongqoshe wamaphoyisa wathi akukho sigebengu esizogila imikhuba bese siyolala endlini sibhekise amadolo phezulu.UMnuz Bheki Cele uthe akukho zinyane lemvubu ladliwa zingwenya kwacweba iziziba.“Asisusanga-mpi. Ngifuna ukuzithembisa izigebengu sizoyilwa (impi) futhi ngiyazibophezela kulokho,” kusho uCele.Usho kanje oThongathi, eThekwini ngoMgqibelo emngcwabeni wephoyisa elidutshulwe labulawa lisemsebenzini, uSergeant Sibongiseni Khoza.Kusolakala ukuthi uKhoza wadutshulwa ebusuku washona enza usebenzi wakhe eSundumbuli.UCele uzihlangulile wathi akayena umvubeli wempi kepha impi uyifice ikhona futhi akayazi isuswe ubani. Wengeze nokuthi impi ekhona seyikhiphe izidumbu.Usho kanje wabe ekhomba ibhokisi ebelinesidumbu sikaKhoza wathi ibona ubufakazi.“Kunempi eliwayo. Le mpi ayiliwa namaphoyisa kodwa iliwa nomphakathi,” kusho uCele.Uyalele amaphoyisa ukuthi awabafune abathole abasolwa ababli okuthiwa baphunyukile eDesai, eMariannhill ngesikhathi kubulawa ozakwabo abayisishiyagalolunye ngesikabhadakazi ngoLwesithathu.“Ngiyazifuna lezigebengu ngoba zizovuselela ziphembe. Ziyizinkuni zokuqala phansi (umlilo), cisha phoyisa kungasuki mlilo,” kusho uCele.Udalule nokuthi akanaso isikhathi sokuyocosha izidumbu zabaphoyisa abulewe izigebengu. Uthe uma sekucoshwa izidumbu, akungabi ezamaphoyisa futhi izigebengu azinanembeza.Olunye udaba, ungcwatshiwe uDkt Zamambo Mkhize isidumbu sakhe esatholakala sigxishwe ebhuthini yemoto eMbali, eMgundlundlovu.

KUKHUTHAZWE amaphoyisa ukuthi asiqinile isandla uma ebhekene nos’khwiliphambana nobhoko abahlela ukunyomfa ukhetho.Lokhu kushiwo uNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa kuleli, uMnuz Bheki Cele.Ukhulume kanje  emuva kwezehlekalalo lapho abemboni yamatekisi eThekwini, ePort Shepstone naseMthatha bevale thaqa imiwaqo emikhulu nesibhedlela ngenxa yezikhalazo abebekade benazo.Ezinye zazo ukushaqwa kwamatekisi abo abathi kwenziwa amaphoyisa omgwaqo ngoba kuthiwa awanazo  izimvume zokusebenza.UCele uxwayise abantu abaphula umthetho wathi bazojeza.“Zonke izinhlaka eziqapha ukuthula namaphoyisa kumele basiqinise isandla kubantu abasebenzisa indlela efana nalena (yokuvalwa kwemigwaqo nezikhungo). Umsebenzi wamaphoyisa ukuqinisekisa ukuthi uyagcinwa umthetho, akuxoxiswana,” kusho uCele.Uqhube wathi awufike uqale ngokuthi uvale isiteshi sokuvota, isikole noma isibhedlela bese uthi ufuna kuxoxwe.Ugqugquzele amaphoyisa wathi awaqale aqinisekise ukuthi uyagcinwa umthetho ngaphambi kokuthi axoxisane nabantu abagila lemigilingwane.Idolobha laseMthatha belivalwe thaqa embhikishweni okusolakala ukuthi bewuholwa abemboni yamatekisi.UCele uthe iminyango yabo ivuliwe bewuhlumeni ekutheni kuxoxwe ngezingqinamba zabamatekisi. Uphinde wathi ngeke baxoxisane nabo bephethe izibhamu ngezandle njengoba kwenzekile ePort Shepstone.“Sinxusa abemboni yamatekisi ukuthi uma benezinkinga, abazikhuulume nathi. Kodwa uma beya emgwaqweni, bephaka impi beyibhekise emphakathini, uMbuso kuzomele ubhekane kanzima nabenza lokho,” kusho uCele.Uthe kukhona asebeboshelwe lezi zigameko abanye balimala njengoba kukhona nabebekade befuna ukuvala isikhumulo sezindiza saseMthatha.

UNGQONGQOSHE wamaPhoyisa kuleli uMnuz Bheki Cele, uvule ngokusemthethweni isikhungo sezokuphepha esibizwa ngeNational Joint Operational and Intelligence Structure (NatJOINTS) Co-ordination Centre.Izwe lilungiselela ukhetho lukazwelonke oluzoba ngoLwesithathu oluzayo ngakho uhulumeni wenza konke okusemandleni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ukhetho lungaphazamiseki. Isikhungo esethuliwe sizzobhekana ngqo nezokuphepha.Isikhungo sixube izinhlaka zezokuphepha ezehlukene kanti kuhlanganisa nongqongqoshe beminyango ehlukene abasebenza ngokubambisana ukuqinisekisa ezokuphepha.UCele uvule isikhungo ePitoli, wamemezela ukuthi zonke izinhlaka zokuphepha eziqaphe ukhetho zizohlangana khona. Uthe lokhu kuzosiza ekutheni bakwazi ukuphendula ngokushesha uma kunezigameko eziphazamisa uzinzo ezweni.Uthe ngeke kugcine ngokhetho kuphela kodwa nokunye okusazokwenzeka kuzobe kugadwe ngeso lokhozi yisikhungo esisha sezokuphepha.UCele uqhube wathi isikhungo sihlinzekelwe ngazo zonke izinsiza nezobuchwepheshe besimanje ukuze kusebenzeke kahle. UMkhuzi wamaPhoyisa kuzwelonke, uGeneral Fannie Masemola, wethule izimoto ezinhlakeni zamaphoyisa ezehlukene.Zingu-78 izimoto ezethuliwe sezizonke zadluliselwa kwabeTRT, NIU, abezobunhloli, Special Task Force, nabaphenyi bamacala. UMasemola uthe izimoto ezintsha zizolekelela amaphoyisa ukuthi enze umsebenzi wawo ngendlela efanele.

UNGQONGQOSHE kaGesi uDkt Kgosientsho Ramokgopa usechithe ukuthi bamise izinhlelo zokucisha ugesi ngenhloso yokuwonga ngenxa yokuthi kunokhetho lukazwelonke ngasekupheleni kwenyanga.URamokgopa uthe alukho uhlelo olufuze lolu abalwenzayo lokumisa ukucishwa kukagesi ukuze i-ANC inganyundelwa ngalokhu ngako ngamaqembu aphikisayo njengoba kuzoba nokhetho ngoMeyi 29. Uthe mkhulu umsebenzi owenziwe yi-Eskom ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ugesi awucishwa.“Baningi engihlangana nabo bangibuze ukuthi ngabe kuzobuya yini ukucishwa kukagesi. Abanye bathi simise ukucinywa kwawo ngenxa yokhetho.“Ugesi awucinywa ngenxa yemizamo yabasebenzi abazikhandlayo kanjalo nokubakhona kwawo okwamanje esingathi wenele ukuthi ungacishwa ngenhloso yokuwonga,” kusho uDkt Ramokgopa. Ukusho lokhu izolo ekhuluma esithangamini sabezindaba lapho kade azisa khona izwe ngezinhlelo zokuqeda ngale nkinga kagesi ebesisesikhungweni esiphehla amandla iKusile, eMpumalanga.Ukhuluma kanje sekuphele izinsuku ezingu-47 ugesi ungacishwa kuleli.Njengoba sekusele amasonto kuvotwe, amaqembu ahlukene nezinhlangano zomphakathi zikhala ngokuthi kuzothi kungavotwa nje, kubuye ukucishwa kukagesi.UNobhala - Jikelele we-ANC uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, ekhankasa KwaZulu-Natal ngempelasonto uthe bazoyiqeda le nkinga, bazosebenza kanzima ukuqinisekisa ukuthi iyaphela nya.“Ngiyazi abanye abaholi bamaqembu aphikisayo bebefuna ukukhankasa ngale nkinga yokucinywa kukagesi. Bashaye eceleni-ke ngoba silwa nayo futhi sizoyinqoba siwuhulumeni kaKhongolose,” kusho uMbalula.URamokgopa uthe uhulumeni akayifuni into yokucinywa kukagesi ngakho ngeke athi akumiswe ukucinywa kwawo ngenxa yokuthi kuzoba nokhetho bese iphinde iyabuya le nkinga ngemuva kwalo.Uthe ngokwezinhlelo ze-Eskom njengoba kungena ubusika, uma kukhona izinkinga ezibakhona kudingeke ukuthi kucinywe ugesi, kungenzeka ngokwesigaba sesibili.“Uma kungukuthi isimo sibi kakhulu ugesi ungacishwa ngokwesigaba sesihlanu. Kodwa kusetshenzwa ngamandla ukuthi lokhu kungenzeki ngoba kunohlelo lokubheka isimo samanje ebusika nesimo sasehlobo,” esho. Uveze ukuthi kwehlisiwe ukusetshenziswa kukadizili ukuze kutholakale ugesi.Ugxeke ababeyizikhulu ze-Eskom, abaqhubeka nokugxeka bethi ugesi awucinywa ngenxa yokuthi kusetshenziswa udizili.“Abanye bahlulwa umsebenzi bayobhala izincwadi ngenkinga kagesi. Thina esikwenzayo wukuqinisekisa ukuthi ugesi ukhona, ngeke sigijime sibhale izincwadi, siyeke umsebenzi esiqokelwe ukuthi siwenze ngogesi, ” kusho ungqongqoshe. Usho lokhu nje owayeyisikhulu esiphezulu se-Eskom, uMnuz André de Ruyter, wathi i-Eskom isebenzisa kakhulu udizili ukuze ugesi ungacishwa njengoba kuzoba nokhetho. Encwadini yamasonto wonke uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, uncome ukungacishwa kukagesi wathi le yimizamo kawonke wonke.Uxwayise ngokuthi isimo asikalungi ngokugcwele okuyinto egcizelelwe nanguRamokgopa.

IPHINI likaNobhala Jikelele we-ANC, uNkk Nomvula Mokonyane, lichithe amahlebezi okuthi ubuholi benhlangano KwaZulu-Natal bulengelwa izembe.UNkk Mokonyane uthe azikho izingxoxo zokuthi kuhlakazwe ubuholi be-ANC eKZN.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ehambele umhlangano wesigungu esiphezulu esifundazweni ngempelasonto.I-ANC ayizange yenze kahle KwaZulu-Natal okhethweni lwangoMeyi njengoba yaphunyukwa isifundazwe, manje isiyiqembu lesithathu ngobukhulu.UNkk Mokonyane uthe ukungenzi kahle kwe-ANC KwaZulu-Natal akusho ukuthi kufanele kuhlakazwe ubuholi.“Kungaba iphutha ukuthi emva kokhetho bese sigijimela ukuhlakaza ubuholi. Kufanele ubuke ukuthi unani, ubheke izindlela zokwenza ngcono lokho onakho. Kufanele uqhamuke namasu okubuyisa lokho okukulahlekele. “Kufanele uqhamuke namasu okugqugquzela uphinde uthuthukise labo abakhona ukuze bezokwenza ngcono ngokuzayo. Indaba yokuthi ubuholi buzohlakazwa amahemuhemu nje futhi ngingakutshela ukuthi ngaphakathi kwi-ANC azikho izingxoxo ezinjalo.”Uhambo lukaNkk Mokonyane laKwaZulu-Natal luqale ngoMgqibelo, lapho ehlangane khona nobuholi besifunda iTheku.Nabo ubuholi besifunda bubhekene nezembe njengoba ikomiti elibhekelele ukusebenza kwansuku zonke kwi-ANC KwaZulu-Natal lenza isiphakamiso sokuthi buhlakazwe.Isigungu esiphezulu kwi-ANC KwaZulu-Natal isona esizothatha isinqumo sokugcina ngalolu daba.Echaza ngenjongo yohambo lwakhe, uNkk Mokonyane, uthe bahamba behlaziya imiphumela yokhetho.“Sihamba sibheka ukuthi izinhlakaza zeqembu zalukhankasela kanjani ukhetho. Sihamba sibheka ukuthi umyalezo we-ANC wafinyelela kanjani kubantu. Sifuna ukuqhamuka nezindlela zokuya phambili njengoba sisembhidlangweni wokwakha i-ANC kabusha.”Ukuqhamuka kweqembu eliholwa owayengumengameli, uJacob Zuma, iMK, kwayilimaza i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal.I-MK iyona eyathola amavoti amaningi kulesi sifundazwe.UNkk Mokonyane uthe amalungu e-ANC kufanele angaqheli kubantu uma efuna ukubuyisa amavoti awalahlekele okhethweni olwedlule.“Kufanele singaqheli kubantu. Izinhlaka zeqembu kufanele zihlezi zisemphakathini. Kufanele le nto yokusondela emiphakathini singagcini nje ngokuyenza uma sekusondele ukhetho kodwa kufanele sihlezi siyenza. Kufanele sisebenze nezinhlaka ezahlukene emiphakathini. Kufanele onke amalungu e-ANC afundiswe ngepolitiki.”I-ANC izokuba nomhlangano wesigungu esiphezulu ozodonsa izinsuku eziyisithupha. Izinsuku ezintathu zibekelwe ukuxoxa ngemiphumela yokhetho.

NGOLWESIBILI silale ngezindaba ezibuhlungu zokudlula emhlabeni koqweqwe lomlingisi, uConnie Temweka Gabisile Chiume, oshonele esibhedlela iGarden City, eGoli, lapho umndeni dalule ukuthi ushone ngenxa yokugula okumxine isikhashana. Lolu qweqwe lomlingisi luzalelwe eWelkom, eFree State, ngoJuni 5, 1952. Lugqame kwezokulingisa ngendawo kaStella Moloi olwaluyilingisa emdlalweni owawukhonjiswa kwi-SABC 1, i-Zone 14, ngo-2007 kuya ku-2015, selujoyina i-Rhythm City, lapho lufike khona kwezwakala ngendawo kaMamokete Khuse.UConnie (72) ngaphambi kokungena ekulingiseni, akuqale ngasekupheleni kwama-70’s, wenze izifundo zobuthishela, waziphothula ngo-1976. Ufundise iminyaka emibalwa, wase eshiya phansi, eseyozinza phesheya kwezilwandle, e-Greece. Ungenise kwezokulingisa ngendawo kaThembi emdlalweni osihloko sithi Inkom’ Edla Yodwa ngo-1989 nakwifilimu ethi Warriors from Hell ngo-1990.Uwole inqwaba yezindondo ngegalelo lakhe ekulingiseni, kubalwa eye-Best Actress in a Drama Series neye-Best Supporting Actress kuma-South African Film and Television Awards. Ngo-2018 uqophe umlando elingisa kwifilimu yaphesheya kwezilwandle eyaba nedumela umhlaba wonke, i-Black Panther, wenza esifanayo nango-2020, kweyesihlabani somculi waphesheya kwezilwandle, u-Beyonce, ethi Black Is King.Ngawo futhi u-2020 kuya ku-2023, uphinde wenza ezibukwayo kwithelevishini, elingisa indawo kaMam’ Sonto Molefe emdlalweni wakuMzansi Magic osuwaphela, i-Gomora. Eminye imidlalo yethelevishini namafilimu alingise kukho yi-I Dreamed of Africa, In My Country, Blessers, What Did You Dream?, Seriously Single, Sgudi Snaysi, Yizo Yizo, The Line, A Woman of Color, Mazinyo Dot Q ne-Thula's Vine. Ushiye emhlabeni izingane ezintathu, nabazukulu abathathu, kanti futhi kuvele nokuthi ubewumngani omkhulu wenye inkakha yezokulingisa, uThembi Nyandeni, aqale ukulingisa naye ngabo-70’s. Kuvele ukuthi uyise udabuka eMalawi, unina owaseKZN. Okhulumela umndeni wakhe, uPercy Vilakazi, ubonge ukwesekwa abakuthola ebantwini selokhu edlulile emhlabeni, wase edalula ukuthi okuningi kuzocaca kusasa ngemininingwane yokufihlwa kwakhe, aqinisekise ukuthi kuzokwenzelwa eGoli.

UCWANINGO lwakamuva luveza ukuthi inhlangano ekhankaselwa owayengumengameli, uJacob Zuma, iMK  isemathubeni okunqoba iKwaZulu-Natal okhethweni oluzayo.Ucwaningo lweSocial Research Foundation luveza ukuthi iMK ingazidlela amahlanga kulesifundazwe esibhekwe ngabomvu uma ukhetho lwangenyanga ezayo lungabanjwa manje.Umbiko uthole ukuthi iMK angeke ithole izihlalo ezanele ukuthi ibuse ngokuzimela iKwaZulu-Natal. Ngokocwaningo, iMK izothola u-26% wamavoti.IMK ibilokhu ikhombisa ukudlondlobala KwaZulu-Natal selokhu uZuma aqala ukuyikhankasela, ibiyenza kahle ezinkethweni zokuchibiyela ezingenelile.Ucwaningo luveze ukuthi iDA izolala isibili KwaZulu-Natal, ngamavoti angu-20%.I-ANC ne-IFP balandela ngemumva ngamavoti angaphnasi kuka-20%.Umhlaziyi wezepolitiki ozimele, uMnuz Thabani Khumalo, uthe okutholwe wucwaningo,  kucishe kuhambisane nesasasa elibonakala ezindaweni ezahlukene KwaZulu-Natal.UKhumalo uthe nakuba evumelana nokuthi iMK izokwenza kahle KwaZulu-Natal, ubona i-IFP kuyiyo ezowashaya emakhanda amaqembu agaqele lesi sifundazwe.I-IFP yiyona enqobe iningi lezinketho zokuchibiyela ezibe khona KwaZulu-Natal emva kokhetho lohulumeni basekhaya lwango-2021.“IMK ngibona izolandela emva kwe-IFP. Bobabili I-IFP neMK yiwona maqembu engiwabona ezohlabana ngempela KwaZulu-Natal,” kuso uKhumalo.Uthe okulekelela kakhulu umkhankaso weMK KwaZulu-Natal wugazi lukaZuma.Udalule ukuthi uZuma ngesikhathi eqokwa ukuba abe ngumengameli we-ANC, isibalo sabantu abajoyina i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal sanyuka cishe ngo-50%. Uthi i-ANC yajoyinwa ngisho abantu ababengayithandi ngesikhathi isaphethwe uMandela (uDkt Nelson), umuntu owayethandwa kangaka.Labantu bangabalandeli bakaZuma bokuqina. Njengoba uZuma esehamba neMK, kusho ukuthi uzoxebula cishe u-50% wamalungu e-ANC KwaZulu-Natal.UKhumalo uthe ubona iKwaZulu-Natal izophathwa ngokubambisana i-IFP neDA emva kokhetho.Lamaqembu aphethe ngokubambisana omasipala baKwaZulu-Natal, futhi womabili ayingxenye yamaqembu anesivumelwano sokusebenzisana emva kokhetho.“Lamaqembu avele ayasebenzisana, ngakho kuzokuba lula okwawo. Ngakolunye uhlangothi i-ANC ne-EFF sebezamile, behluleka ukusebenzisana,” kuqhuba uKhumalo.Ucwaningo luveze ukuthi iMK izokuba yiqembu lesithathu ngobukhulu kuzwelonke.Lolu cwaningo lwenziwe ezifundazweni ezintathu, iKwaZulu-Natal, Gauteng, naseWestern Cape.AbeSocial Research Foundation baxoxe nabantu abangaphezu kuka-1 200 kulezifundazwe ezintathu.Ucwaningo luveze ukuthi i-ANC izokwehla kuzwelonke ithole u-37%, iDA izothola u-25%, iMK ithole u-14%.I-EFF izothola u-11%, i-IFP izothola u-5%, i-ActionSA ithole u-2%.Luqhubeka luveze ukuthi iDA isazoqhubeka nokuzidlela amahlanga eWestern Cape, lwayibeka ku-58%, ilandelwa i-ANC okuthiwa izothola ngaphansi kuka-20%.AbeSocial Research Foundation bathe ucwaningo lwabo lukhombisa ukuthi kuzokuba nohulumeni wokubambisana KwaZulu-Natal naseGauteng.“Kungase kudingeke ukuthi kubambisane amaqembu angaphezu kwamathathu ukubusa kulezifundazwe. “Maningi amathuba okuthi amaqembu azobusa ngokubambisana kulezifundazwe kube yiwo futhi nakuzwelonke,” kusho umbiko.

UYALELWE ukuthi ahambise i-passport yakhe kubaphenyi, angaxhumani nofakazi obenguSomlomo wePhalamende uNkk Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula ngoLwesine ngesikhathi ededelwa ngebheyili kaR50 000 yinkantolo yasePitoli.Kuvele ukuthi akayona ingozi yokuthi angase abalekele kwamanye amazwe njengoba ezinikele kwabezomthetho.UMbuso uveze ukuthi uhlela ukwengeza omunye ufakazi ecaleni likaNkk Mapisa-Nqakula obhekene namacala angu-12, athinta inkohlakalo nokushushumbisa imali ubuye asolwe ngokwamukela intshontsho komunye wosonkontileka owayethole ithenda eMnyangweni wezokuVikela, ngesikhathi esanguNgqongqoshe kulo mnyango.Umshushisi u-Advocate Bheki Manyathi, ubefune ukuthi uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula anikwe ibheyili kaR100 000, kodwa wakhala ummeli wakhe u-Advocate Graham Kerr-Phillips, otshele imantshi uNkk Anna Oosthuizen, ukuthi usesempeshenini ngakho ngeke abe nemali engaka.Imantshi ithe kumele abuyele enkantolo ngoJuni 4, 2024.UManyathi uthe unecala eliqinile ngakho ufuna liye enkantolo enkulu.Uthe ubhekene necala lenkohlakalo yemali efinyelela kuR4.5 million, kule mali uR2.1 million wawuthola uwukheshi izikhawu ezehlukene  kanti wabuye wathola  izipho ezehlukene okubalwa izikhwama newigi ebizayo.UNkk Mapisa-Nqakula uzinikele esiteshini samaphoyisa iLyttelton, wase edlulela enkantolo. Ubephelezelwa umyeni wakhe uMnuz Charles Nqakula, kanti enkantolo bekukhona owayengusomlomo wePhalamende uNksz Baleka Mbete, obezomeseka.Efunda incwadi efungelwe uKerr-Phillips, uthe uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula, akazi lutho ngamacala abhekene nawo.Uthe usekhulile futhi uphila nezifo ezingamahlalakhona.Ubalule ukuthi udla amaphilisi esifo somfutho wegazi ophezulu.“Lesi sifo siyingozi ngoba kudingeka ahlale edla amaphilisi aso. Ukhathazekile ngesimo samajele nokuthi isifo anaso siyingozi.” UManyathi uthe ngeke bayiphikise ibheyili ngenxa yesimo  sempilo yakhe nokuthi akayona ingozi yokuthi angabalekela kwamanye amazwe.Eminye yemibandela yebheyili ngukuthi i-passport yakhe kumele ayihambise ngoMsombuluko, ngo-Ephreli 8 ungakashayi u-4 ntambama, kumele angasifaki esinye isicelo se-passport entsha. I-DA isiphakamise ukuthi sisheshe sivalwe isikhala sikaSomlomo wePhalamende.Leli qembu lithe asikho isidingo sokulinda kanti ithe iyakwamukela ukusula kwakhe esikhundleni.Namanye amaqembu athe ayahambisana nesinqumo sakhe sokusula esikhundleni.IPhini lokuqala likanobhala jikelele we-ANC , uNkk Nomvula Mokonyane, lithe uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula, usule njengelungu lePhalamende kanjalo nokuba uSomlomo.“Akasulanga njengelungu le-ANC, usayilungu eligcwele lenhlangano,” kusho uNkk Mokonyane.

UDEDELWE ngebheyili uNkk Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula osanda kusula esikhundleni sakhe sokuba nguSomlomo wePhalamende nanjengelungu lePhalamende. UMapisa-Nqakula uzinikele emaphoyisa esiteshini samaphoyisa iLyttelton, eCenturion ngoLwesine ekuseni.  Ubhekene namacala angu-13, angu-12 enkohlakalo nelilodwa lokushushumbisa imali.Umshushisi utshele inkantolo ukuthi lo msolwa wathola imali engaphezu kukaR2 million eyintshontsho. Ngaleyo ndlela ufanelwe wukunikezwa ibheyili kaR100 000. Ummeli kaMapisa-Nqakula unxuse inkantolo ukuba imnikeze ibheyili kaR50 000 ngoba useminyakeni yempesheni, iyona mali angakwazi ukuyikhokha.IMantshi u-Anna Oosthuizen unikeze uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula ibheyili kaR50 000 wayalelwa nokuthi anike abaphenyi izincwadi zakhe zokuvakasha.

Akazange awuthamele umcimbi wokugcotshwa kukaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, uMnuz Nqabayomzi Kwankwa, iPhini likamengameli we-UDM emuva kokuthunjwa ngoLwesibili ntambama.UKwankwa oyilungu lePhalamende elimele i-UDM, uthunjwe ngabalisa abangaziwa ngesikhathi elibangise esikhumulweni sezindiza eKapa, ubelibhekise ePitoli lapho bekunomcimbi wokugcoba uRamaphosa ezindlini zoMbuso obuyizolo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa uBrigadier Novela Potelwa, uthe uKwankwa (44), ubanjwe inkunzi waphucwa imoto eseDriftsands ngoLwesibili ntambama.“Bamthumbe base bemlaxaza eLingelethu West, eKhayelitsha. Ube eseya esiteshini samaphoyisa eyobika ngokumehlele. Imoto yakhe itholwe khona eKhayelitsha.” Uthe akukaboshwa muntu ngalesi sehlakalo, uphenyo luyaqhubeka.Umengameli we-UDM uGeneral Bantu Holomisa, uthe uKwankwa ubanjwe wathunjwa ngesikhathi eya esikhumulweni sezindiza.Uthe abathumbi bafune uR10 000 ukuze bamdedele.“Siyi-UDM siyikhokhile le mali ukuze abuye ephephile. Ubethukile, eqhaqhazela. Bathathe zonke izinto zakhe okubalwa nemoto,” kusho uHolomisa.Uthe bayajabula ukuthi usindile kulesi sehlakalo.Ubalule ukuthi bamyalele ukuthi aphumule ekhaya.IPhalamende lizwakalise ukukhathazeka ngalesi sehlakalo.Isitatimende sePhalamende sinxuse abomthetho ukuthi baphenye kabanzi ngalesi sehlakalo ukuze kubanjwe abenzi bobubi.“Simbeke emkhulekweni uKwankwa kulesi sikhathi esinzima. Simfisele ukuthi asheshe alulame ekhaya emva kwalesi sehlakalo,” kusho isitatimende sePhalamende.UHolomisa uthe umndeni kaKwankwa wazisiwe ngokwenzekile wathi kwayena uyaxhumana namaphoyisa.“Siyashaqisa lesi sehlakalo futhi siyasigxeka kakhulu,” kusho uHolomisa.

NKOSIKHONA CELEOWESILISA waseJozini uthi kuduma ikhanda, akazi nokuthi kumele enze njani ngemuva kokuthola izindaba zokuthi ingoduso yakhe ayilobole ekuqaleni konyaka, ibizolotsholwa omunye umbhemu emasontweni ambalwa edlule.UMnuz Simon Makhathini (46) uthi okumdidayo ukuthi izinto bezihamba kahle phakathi kwakhe nengoduso yakhe, bayafonelana nsuku zonke njengoba yena esebenza eMpumalanga. Usola ingoduso yakhe, uNksz Fikile Mjwara (34) ngokuba yinyoka.“Ngenhlanhla kunomakhelwane engimaziyo eMpangeni, ongihlebelile ukuthi ingoduso yami ibizolotsholwa. Angikholwanga kodwa ngethukile uma sengiziseshela ngithola ukuthi ngempela ngiyisilima,” kusho uMakhathini othi wazishaya zonke izinkomo ezazibizwe ekhweni lakhe.Uthi yena ubesaqhubeka nokubeka imali yomgcagco nawo abehlele ukuthi ube maduze nje kodwa manje kuduma ikhanda.Uthe baneminyaka eyisithupha bethandana nalo wesifazane.“ Uma ngibuza ingoduso yami ngalo mhlola, iphike yalala ngomhlane kodwa kuthe uma isibona ukuthi ngiyazi ngempela, yathi lesi yisinqumo esithathwe abazali bayo, uma ngifuna izincazelo angithinte bona,” kusho uMakhathini."Ngimbuzile ukuthi emdala kangaka angavumela kanjani abazali bakhe bamfake entweni angahambisani nayo, uma ethi akahambisani nayo. Uhlulekile ukungiphendula." UMakhathini uthe uma ebuza mayelana nowesilisa obezomlobola, ingoduso yakhe nakhona ivele yathi akabuze kuyise nonina. Uthi umshayele ucingo umkhwe wakhe embuza ngale mbedumehlwane, wavele wamphendula ngokuthi indodakazi yakhe seyithole indoda ekholwayo yena bazombuyisela izinkomo zakhe.ISolezwe Ngempelasonto lixhumanile nengoduso yavuma ukuthi iyamazi uMakhathini. Yathi ayithandi ukuphendula imibuzo eminingi yase inikeza intatheli izinombolo zikayise.Ethintwa uyise uthe izindaba zakwakhe azifuni abantu bakwaCele. Wathi futhi azifuni Isolezwe wase egcizelela nokuthi indodakazi yakhe inelungelo lokuthi ilandele inhliziyo yayo. Uthe akathandi ukukhuluma kade ngalolu daba ngoba luthinta imindeni eminingi.ISolezwe Ngempelasonto lizamile ukuthola imininingwane yowesilisa okuthiwa ulobole okwesibili kodwa ligcine lingazitholanga.

UDIDEKILE umndeni waseMzikhulu njengoba uthi uxakwa wukuphuma kwezidumbu ngambili kuwona.Umndeni wakwaGabela uthi sekuze kwaba amahlandla amathathu manje kuvela umshophi walolu hlobo.Ilungu lomndeni eliyindodana endala, uMnuz Nzuzo Gabela uchazele iSolezwe Ngempelasonto ngakho konke okuqhubeka kulo mndeni.Uveze ukuthi ngo-2007 inhloko yekhaya, uMnuz Thathezakho Gabela wagingqika nemoto washona ekanye nendodakazi yakhe.Lesi sehlakalo uthi senzeka kuN2 engwaqweni obheke KwaDukuza ngosuku olwalandulela uKhisimuzi.Uthe lesi sehlakalo sabashiya bekhungathekile.Uthe kwabaphinda lokho ngo-2010 ngesikhathi kuhlasela izigilamkhuba kubo zadubula zabulala indodana yakhona, uMnuz Sanele Gabela nengane yakhe yomfana eyayineminyaka engu-16 ngaleso sikhathi.Uthe baqala banyusa izinhlonze basola ukuthi kukhona okushaya amanzi. Base beqala ukusukuma behamba abantu ababonayo.Ngonyaka owedlule ngoDisemba uthe ilungu labo lomndeni lakhala ngekhanda lashona. Kwathi ngemuva kwezinsuku ezimbili umfana wakhona wagwazwa ngabafana ababezama ukumbamba inkunzi eThekwini."Asisazi manje ukuthi siyithini lento. Kuyasicacela nje ukuthi inkulu into engahambi kahle uma kunje," usho kanje.Uthi sebezame konke ukubhula lo mlilo kodwa kunhlanga zimuka nomoya.Uthe akukho nokuncane nje ukungabaza mayelana nokuthi kukhona okudinga ukulungiswa emsamo."Eyi, futhi inkulu inkinga ekhona lapha ekhaya," usho kanje.Uthe ziningi kakhulu izinyanga asebezihambile kodwa kunhlanga zimuka nomoya."Sesihlalele ovalweni lokuthi uma kungukuthi lona umkhokha, awuvaleke phela ngoba kuyacaca ukuthi uzosishaya usibhuqe," usho kanje.UMnuz  Bongani Gumede ongumelaphi wendabuko wakhona eMzimkhulu uthe kukhona okudinga ukulungiswa kulo mndeni.Uthe uma bengenankinga bangasondela kuyena, kukhona angabalekelela ngakho. Uthe lo mndeni kubonakala sengathi ubhekene nomkhokha.

UFUNA izimpendulo umndeni womfundi waseDurban Girls Secondary (17) odlwengulwe wabulawa esigamekweni okusolwa ukuthi bekungesokugqekeza.Isidumbu sikaWandile Ngcobo waseMlaza , obefunda uGrade 11 kulesi sikole sitholakale siboshwe izandla nge-pentihose, elinye i-pentihose lifakwe emlonyeni, sinamanxeba okugwazwa amahlanu, ngoLwesibili emini. Uyise uMnuz Mondli Ngcobo, uthe ufonelwe umzalwane akhonza naye ethi akaphuthume ekhaya kugqekeziwe kwantshontshwa impahla."Ingane yami ibisibulewe ngaleso sikhathi kodwa bengafuni ukungethusa. Ngivale lolo cingo ngase ngifonela umfana wakwamakhelwane ngambuza ukuthi uWandile ukuphi njengoba ngizwa kuthiwa kungene abantu bantshontsha impahla. Uvumele phansi wathi yebo kunabantu abangenile. Wangawuphendula umbuzo wokuthi uphi uWandile. Ngize ngabuza okwesibili wathi akasekho," kuchaza uNgcobo.Uthe uWandile ubesele yedwa ekhaya ngoba ubengabhali ngoLwesibili, ezotadishela ekhaya ." UWandile ufunda esikoleni esisodwa nodadewabo ofunda uGrade 8. Bahamba bobabili kodwa ngoLwesibili usalile ngoba ethi akabhali. Ngixakekile uma kuthiwa kugqekeziwe ngoba ngiyazi ukuthi ubekhona ekhaya. Namanje angazi ukuthi kwenzekeni. Ngokucabanga kwami izigebengu bezihlele ukuthi zizogqekeza zebe impahla, zafica uWandile. Ngibona sengathi  uqale walwa nesigebengu noma izigebengu. Sagcina simnqobile noma zimnqobile ngoba ubeboshwe izandla, kubonakala ukuthi uqale wanukubezwa ngaphambi kokuthi agwazwe amanxeba amahlanu okuyiwona ambulele," kuchaza uyise. Uthe kwebiwe iTV, iDStv Decoder, i-remote neselula kamufi.Ebuzwa mayelana nokubhalwe enkundleni yeokuxhumana uFacebook ukuthi umufi ubulawe umfowabo, uthe:"Lo mfowabo engicabanga ukuthi bakhuluma ngaye, ngamthola ngaphandle komshado. Asihlali naye. Uphazamisekile ekhanda unesifo esaziwa nge-schezophrenia. Sesizame kaningi ukuthi adle imishanguzo yalesi sifo, ayiyeke. Ngeke ngivume noma ngiphike ukuthi uyena ngoba bengingekho kodwa ngesikhathi sihamba ekhaya ubengekho, nakomakhelwane akekho othi uke wambona. Okunye okungididayo ukuthi uma kunguye impahla yebiwe ngubani?  Ngithembe ukuthi ukuhlòlwa kwezinsalela zoketshezi esidumbini sikamufi  kanye nezinsalela zeminwe  kuzoveza  iqiniso," kusho yena.Uthe indodakazi yakhe ibihlale ithi ababuyele emakhaya eMalangeni, eMzinto bayolima ngoba ifuna ukufundela ezoLimo." Bengingazi ukuthi uzoshona engalifezanga lelo phupho, kube imina oyolima ukuze atshalwe. Ubeyingane ekhonze ukusonta nelalelayo engahluphi. Ngiphatheke kabi  ngendlela abulawe ngayo," kusho uNgcobo.Amaphoyisa abengakayiphenduli imibuzo athunyelwe yona ngalolu daba.

OWAYENGUNGQONGQOSHE wezoLimo, uNkk Thoko Didiza, usola ungqongqoshe walo mnyango, uMnuz John Steenhuisen, ngokufuna ukubukwa ngodaba lwezinsolo zenkohlakalo kaR500 million.UNkk Didiza uthe uSteenhuisen ukhombise ukuba isakabuli ngokugijima aye kwabezindaba eyothi ufice inkohlakalo yezigidi zamaRandi emnyangweni.Okukhalisa uNkk Didiza ukuthi uSteenhuisen akazange azibalule izinyathelo ezathathwa umnyango ukuphenya lolu daba.Ngempelasonto uSteenhuisen utshele abezindaba ukuthi uR500 million owanikezwa inkampani eyenza imigomo yezilwane, Onderstepoort Biological Products (OBP) akwaziwa ukuthi washonaphi.USteenhuien unezinyanga ezimbili ephethe lo mnyango, imali akhuluma ngayo yakhishwa ngesikhathi kusaphethe uNkk Didiza.Esitatimendeni, uNkk Didiza, osenguSomlomo wePhalamende, uthe ziningi izinyathelo ezathathwa umnyango ngesikhathi kusaphethe yena.“Kwenziwa uphenyo olugcwele, emva kwalokho udaba lwabe seludluliselwa ophikweni oluphenya amacala enkohlakalo, iSpecial Investigating Unit. Imininingwane emayelana nalolu daba iyatholakala embikweni wokusebenza kwemali we-OBP.”UNkk Didiza uthe akulungile ukuthi uSteenhuisen akhulume kakhulu ngalolu daba ekubeni kunophenyo olungakaphothulwa.“USteenhuisen kufanele aqaphele uma ekhuluma ngoba izinto azishoyo zingagcina zimosha okuningi. Akufanele akhulume ageqe amagula, enze sengathi azikho izinyathelo ezithathiwe ngalolu daba ekubeni kunophenyo oluqhubekayo.”UNkk Didiza uthe usembhalele uSteenhuisen emazisa ngezinyathelo ezathathwa umnyango kanye nekomiti lasePhalamende elibheke ukusebenza komnyango.Uthe ngesikhathi edlulisela izintambo zokuphatha umnyango kuSteenhuisen, wachaza kabanzi ngokusebenza komnyango.UNkk Didiza uthe namanje usazivulile izandla kuSteenhuisen uma kukhona okunye afuna ukukwazi ngalolu daba.“Kusobala ukuthi incazelo ebanzi engamnikeza yona ngokusebenza komnyango nezinkampani ezingaphansi kwawo, ayanele. Ingakho ngithi ngizimisele ukwelekelela uSteenhuisen ngezinto ezithinta ukuphathwa komnyango.”Imali uSteenhuisen uthe yayikhishelwe ukwakha kabusha isikhungo esikhiqiza imigomo.Uthe udaba uselubikile kumqondisi jikelele womnyango, wathi ufuna ukuthi kuthathwe izinyathelo.“Umcwaningi mabhuku ukhale ngezinto eziningi ezithinta ukusebenza kwemali. Ngizobheka izinto umcwaningi mabhuku akhale ngazo, bese senza isiqiniseko sokuthi izinto ezifana nalezi azenzeki,” kusho yena.

OWESILISA usabuzwa namanje ubuhlungu bokubulawelwa udadewabo okwenzeka ngoJulayi 2018, eneminyaka engu-18, mhlazane bengenelwa kubo yizigebengu zibaphanga KwaSithebe, eSundumbili.Lokhu kuvele esitatimendeni esifundelwe iNkantolo yesiFunda yaseShowe ephethe ngokuthi igwebe uSiphiwe Kweyama (28) udilikajele ngecala lokubulala neminyaka nengu-15 ngokuphanga kusetshenziswa udlame.Inkantolo ithole uKweyama njengomuntu ongasakufanele ukuphatha isibhamu impilo yakhe yonke.UKweyama nayekade egebenga nabo, omunye wabo owathelwa othulini ngenhlamvu amaphoyisa egoloza ukuboshwa, bagqekeza kubo kwabagilwa.Ngokusho kophiko lwezokushushisa i-National Prosecuting Authority (NPA) KwaZulu-Natal kwashona intombazane eyayineminyaka engu-18.Okhulumela i-NPA, uNkk Natasha Ramkisson-Kara, uthe ngobusuku bangoJulayi 13, izelamani zazikubo ngesikhathi zithelekelwa uKweyama nayekade ehamba nabo.Kuthiwa baphanga iselula yowesilisa bemkhombe ngesibhamu.“Bamqhuba umgilwa bamyisa endlini kanina ekhona egcekeni. Bazenza amaphoyisa bangena ngaphakathi, bavulela isibhaxu kubantu ababesendlini bebafuna imali,” kusho uNkk Ramkisson-Kara.Kuvela ukuthi kwakumnyama endlini ababekuyona abahlaseli sebewucimile ugesi abagilwa bekhihla esikaNandi.Kuvela ukuthi uKweyama wayemi phandle, elokhe eyalela ozakwabo ababesendlini ukuthi abenze isiqiniseko sokuthi abagilwa abawubangi umsindo owawuzovusa omakhelwane.I-NPA ithe ngalesi sikhathi, umufi walizwa izwi likaKweyama wase eyasho ukuthi uyalazi futhi kabawona amaphoyisa.“Ngaphambi kokwenzeka kwesigameko, uKweyama wake wazama ukushela umufi. Omunye wababekade behamba noKweyama wabe esedubula umufi amahlandla amathathu maqede badla phansi,” kuchaza i-NPA.UKweyama waboshwa emuva kwesonto neselula kamufi. Kuvela ukuthi enye yamadoda ayekade ehamba nawo kwenzeka isigameko yashona idubulalana namaphoyisa ayezama ukuyibopha.Emaphepheni asenkantolo umgilwa, uthe yashintsha unomphela impilo yakhe kusukela kwenzeka isehlo.“Mina nomndeni wami sizizwa singasaphephile ekhaya. Isabuya le nto emqondweni wami ngibe namaphupho amabi. Umama wayekhungatheke kakhulu ngokushona kukadadewethu, wagcina edlulile emhlabeni,” kusho umgilwa.I-NPA ikwamukele ukushushiswa ngempumelelo kukaKweyama, yathi isigwebo iyathemba sizosiza ukunqanda abanye abebekade besahlela ukugila imigilingwane.

INKANTOLO yesiFunda yaseNtuzuma igwebe udilikajele owesilisa obedlwengula ephindelela unina omzalayo okhubazeke ngomqondo KwaMashu.Ngokobufakazi obethulwe enkantolo, lo wesilisa oneminyaka engu-31 obehlala  nonina, waqala ukumnukubeza ngokocansi kusukela ngo-2020. Kuvela ukuthi kusukela lapho, lokhu bese kuyinsakavukela njengoba kuthiwa ubesemdlwengula cishe nsuku zonke.Okhulumela uphiko lwezokushushisa KwaZulu-Natal, iNational Prosecuting Authority (NPA), uNkk Natasha Ramkisson-Kara uthe umgilwa waqale wabikela omakhelwane ngayekade ekwenziwa yindodana yakhe kodwa bangamnaka.Kuthiwa indaba yaze yabhadlazwa udadewabo kamgilwa emaphoyiseni emuva kokuthi exoxelwe ngokukade kwenzeka. “Udadewabo wayevakashile ephuma kwesinye isifundazwe waxoxelwa wumgilwa ukuthi unukubezwa yindodana yakhe. Emuva kwalokho udadewabo kamgilwa walubika emaphoyiseni udaba, zamkhalela umsolwa,” kusho uNkk Ramkisson-Kara.Inkantolo ifundelwe isitatimende esichaza ngobunzima umgilwa abhekane nabo emuva kokudlwengulwa.Kusona uveza ukuthi okwamehlela kuzomkhinyabeza impilo yakhe yonke.“Uchaza nokuthi kwaphoqeleka ukuthi athuthe lapho ayekade ehlala khona ngenxa yento ayenziwa indodana yakhe engakhombisanga ukuzisola,” kusho iNPA.Inkantolo yahlulele nangokuthi igama lale wesilisa lifakwe ohlwini lwabantu asebeke balahlwa amacala athinta ucansi.INPA yamukele ukushushiswa ngempumelelo kwalo wesilisa incoma umsebenzi wabashushisi namaphoyisa. Ithe kuwumsebenzi wayo ukuvikela abantu abangakwazi ukuzivikela emphakathini.Khonamanjalo, le nkantolo igwebe udilikajele indoda ena-58 eyayingumqeqeshi wesibhakela ngokudlwengula intombazane ena-13.Ibhanselwe nangeminyaka eyisikhombisa ngokufundisa umgilwa izinto eziphathelene nocansi.Kuthiwa umgilwa wayeqeqeshelwa isibhakela umgilwa. Kuthiwa wayeqala ngokumanga bese eyamqabula uma embingelela.“Wagcina esedlwengula umgilwa isikhathi esingaphezu konyaka. Umgilwa wangatshela muntu okwakumehlela kodwa ekubhala phansi ebhukwini. Langa limbe unina kamgilwa walibona ibhuku wambuza ngokwakubhalwe kulona,” kusho iNPA.Kuthiwa unina wengane wabuza umsolwa ngokwakubhaliwe kodwa waphika kunalokho waya ekhaya likamgilwa wafuna ukukhokha isinxephezelo okuyinkomo.Kuvela ukuthi umalume nonina wengane bakunqaba lokhu bavele babikela amaphoyisa, wagcina eboshwa umsolwa.

UGWETSHWE udilikajele neminyaka emihlanu ngaphezulu, owesifazane olahlwe ngecala lokubulala isoka lakhe,  isidumbu salo esatholwa singqongqiswe nemoto emgwaqweni ophakathi koPhongolo noNongoma, ngo-2021.UNonjabulo Nokukhanya Nkosi (37) ugwetshwe udilikajele ngecala lokubulala owayeyisoka lakhe uMnuz Dumisani Qwabe (47) neminyaka emihlanu ngaphezulu ngelokweba, kwathi uzakwabo  aboshwe naye uXolani Skhumbuzo Mtambo (38) wagwetshwa iminyaka engu-15 ngelokubulala.Inkantolo imxegisele uMtambo emva kokuthi kuthiwe bekungokokuqala elahlwa ngecala futhi wayengekho endaweni yesigameko ngesikhathi sokubulawa kukamufi.UNonjabulo noQwabe kuthiwa babeyizithandani, kodwa wagcina enqume ukumbulala. Kuthiwa wacela uMtambo ukuthi amfunele inkabi  eyayizogudluza umufi kodwa iqhinga langaphumelela. Kuvele ukuthi wazitholela isibhamu nophethroli wokuzenzela umsebenzi wokubulala isoka kwathi ngo- Okthoba 2021 wahlangana noMtambo owamfundisa ukuthi sihlohlwa kanjani isibhamu futhi sisetshenziswa kanjani.Kuthiwa washayela uQwabe ucingo, kwathi makhathaleni imoto kamufi yatholwa ishisiwe emgwaqweni ophakathi koPhongolo noNongoma, kunezinsalela zesidumbu sikamufi. Kuthiwa uNonjabulo akazange alubeke emsebenzini ngosuku olulandelayo njengoba kuthiwa wayenezibazi zokusha esiqhomeni nasesandleni sangakwesobunxele.Emva kokufa kukaQwabe, amalungu omndeni wakhe athola ukuthi iselula nekhadi lasebhange kukamufi kuyasetshenziswa, nokwathi emva kophenyo lwamaphoyisa kwavela ukuthi  uNonjabulo owayesebenzisa ikhadi ukukhipha imali ne-app yasebhange kaQwabe.  Waboshwa kwathi uma kulandelwa umkhondo kwatholakala ukuthi ubefonelana noMtambo owaboshwa emva kwezinyanga ezintathu.Ebufakazini obunekelwe inkantolo obebuholwa ngabashushisi o-Advocate Nokulunga Ngcobo no- Alex Moolman kutholakale ukuthi uNonjabulo noMtambo babelokhu bexhumana ngezindlela ezehlukene ngemuva nangaphambi kokubulawa  kukamufi, kubukwa nezingxoxo zabo ku-WhatsApp nokucwaninga amakhamera emishinini yokukhipha imali lapho ayehamba ekhipha khona imali kamufi.Isitatimende esifundelwe inkantolo sezihlobo zikaQwabe, simchaze njengomuntu owayenobuntu, osiza umphakathi. Kuthiwa wayewumuntu onomusa nonakekelayo.

IMGIXABEZE ngodilikajele iNkantolo yesiFunda yaseMadadeni owesilisa olahlwe elokudlwengula isaguga (73) oSizweni ngoNovemba 2017.Owesilisa, uSizwe Gift Zwane (30) uphinde wanikwa iminyaka emibili ngaphezulu ngokulahlwa yicala lokugqekeza ngenhloso yokwenza icala.Elandisa ngokwenzeka ngosuku lwesigameko, okhulumela iNational Prosecuting Authority (NPA), uNkk Natasha Ramkisson-Kara, uthe umgilwa wayesendlini yakhe ngesikhathi uZwane egqekeza.“Umgilwa wambuza uZwane ukuthi ufunani, kodwa kunokuthi amphendule wavele wambhozomela, wamdlwengula,” kusho uNkk Ramkisson-Kara.Uqhube wathi umgilwa waphunyuka, wabaleka, wayobiza indodakazi yakhe.“Umgilwa nendodakazi yakhe, bambona uZwane esebaleka,” kuchaza uNkk Ramkissson-Kara.Uveze ukuthi umgilwa wabe eseyiswa esiteshini samaphoyisa lapho afika khona wavula icala.Eqhuba uthe umgilwa wabe esedluliselwa esikhungweni iThuthuzela yakhona eMadadeni ukuze ayohlolwa kuqinisekiswe ukuthi udlwenguliwe yini aphinde anikwe nosizo lokwelulekwa ngokomqondo.Uthe ngesikhathi kuqulwa icala enkantolo, uMshushisi woMbuso uCindy Alberts uhole ubufakazi bakhe umgilwa, obendodakazi yakhe kanjalo nombiko owabhalwa odokotela emva kokuxilonga umgilwa.“UZwane, ngomlomo wommeli wakhe wazama ukubuphikisa ubufakazi bukamgilwa, ethi amehlo kungenzeka ukuthi awabonanga kahle ngoba usegugile. Yize kunjalo umgilwa wakwazi ukwenaba ngesibazi esasibukeka njengesibazi sokusha ngemumva kwendlebe kaZwane,” kusho uNkk Ramkisson-Kara.Uthe umgilwa wacacisa enkantolo ukuthi isibazi wasibona kahle ngesikhathi uZwane emdlwengula.“Inkantolo iyalele ukuthi igama lakhe lifakwe ohlwini lwabahlukumeza ngokocansi, yaphinde yanquma ukuthi akumfanele ukuba nesibhamu,” usho kanje.Uphethe ngelithi beyiNPA, bayasamukela isigwebo, wathi kuwumsebenzi wabo ukushushisa, bamele bonke abangabagilwa bobugebengu.

KUHLWE emini kuMnuz Sihle Dlamini ngesikhathi iNkantolo yeMantshi yaseDundee imgixabeza ngodilikajele ngecala lokusoconga ikhansela le-NFP, uNksz Nompumelelo Zondi (38).Isidumbu sikamufi satholakala emotweni iduma ngoMashi 15 wango-2016 ngaphandle kwendlu yakhe eMsinga.Kwavela ukuthi wabulawelwa ivoti lakhe ngesikhathi kuzokhethwa iMeya entsha kuMasipala waseMsinga.Kwavela nokuthi wasocongwa ngemuva komhlangano wamakhansela owadonsa usuku lonke.Ngo-2018 kwajutshwa ithimba labaseshi ukuba liphenye kabanzi ngokusocongwa kwakhe.Ithimba labaseshi kusukela ngalowo nyaka belenza konke okusemandleni ukuthola umsolwa, laze laphumelela ngonyaka odlule. Ngokobufakazi obusenkantolo, amanyela eminwe atholakala ngaphandle kwemoto kamufi yiwona aholela ekutheni kutholakale umbulali.Ngaphambi kokuthi ijaji liwise isigwebo, uMshushisi u-Advocate Elvis Gcweka unxuse inkantolo ukuba imgixabeze ngesigwebo esinzima umsolwa kwazise wabulala inzalabantu.Lokhu uMshushisi uthe kuzodweba isithombe esicacile nakulabo abacabanga ukubulala abanye abantu egameni lezepolitiki.“Ukubulawa kwabantu egameni lezepolitiki yinto esijwayelekile. Ngakho kumqoka ukuba kunqandwe ngokuthi bajeziswe labo abasekhaleni lakho,’’ usho kanje.Uthe ukuphenduka insakavukela kokusocongwa kosopolitiki yikhona okwaholela ekutheni ungqongqoshe wamaphoyisa asungule ithimba elibhekelele ukubulawa kosopolitiki.Udalule ukuthi uDlamini wayekade ekhokhelwe u-R2500 ukusoconga umufi.IMantshi u-AJ Fererra ichaze uDlamini njengomuntu owakhetha ukukhipha umphefumulo egameni lezepolitiki.Uthe abantu abafana naye akufanele babe semphakathini, wamchaza njengezambane elibolile.Uthe inkantolo kungumsebenzi wayo ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu balolu hlobo bayasuswa emphakathini.Uyise kamufi uMnuz Msawenkosi Zondi ulishayele elikhulu ihlombe ithimba labaseshi elajutshwa ukuqhubeka nophenyo.Uthe bungehla ubugebengu ezweni uma bonke abaseshi bengasebenza ngokuzikhandla nangokwethembeka njengalaba ebebebhekelele leli cala."Ngijabule kakhulu ngesinqumo esiphume lapha enkantolo. Ngiyalibonga kakhulu nethimba labaseshi okuyilona elenze umsebenzi omuhle ukuqinisekisa ukuthi lo wesilisa ubhadla ejele," usho kanje.Uthe noma ingeke isabuya indodakazi yakhe emhlabeni kodwa ubulungiswa obenziwe yinkantolo yibona obumthoba amanxeba.

UGWETSHWE udilikajele neminyaka engu-18 owesilisa (52) olahlwe ngecala lokuthumba nokudlwengula owesifazane oneminyaka engu-55. Kuthiwa lo wesilisa wagila le mikhuba ngoJulayi 25, 2022 kanti wayevele enikwe incwadi eyisivimbelo senkantolo sokuthi angasondeli kulo wesifazane. Ngokwesitatimende sophiko lwezokushushisa iNPA, laba bobabili babethandana ngo-2019, kwathi ngo-Agasti 2021 owesifazane wanquma ukumala lo wesilisa ekhala ngokuhlukunyezwa. NgoJulayi 2022 kuthiwa lo wesilisa wahlasela umgilwa, wamklinya, wamdonsela endlini eseduze lapho afike amshayela khona, wamgqema ngesando, wamgwaza wabe esemdlwengula elokhu ehleli naye ekwenza lokhu ephindelela izinsuku ezingu-10. Lo wesifazane waphunyuka wabaleka ngesikhathi kukhona owayevakashele lo wesilisa, wayobikela umndeni wakhe ngalesi sigameko. Uthe esebabikele abomndeni babe sebemthatha bemyisa esikhungweni esilekela abahlukumezekile iThuthuzela Care Centre eseMlaza. Okhulumela uphiko lwezokushushiswa komphakathi KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Natasha Ramkisson-Kara, uthe bayasemukela isigwebo esinikwe lo wesilisa. “Izigwebo ezifana nalezi zitshengisa amandla ophiko lwezokushushiswa komphakathi lokulwela ubulungiswa. Siyawuncoma umsebenzi owenziwe abashushisi kanye namaphoyisa ophiko lwe-SAPS,” kusho yena.Lo mlisa ugwetshwe udilikajele ngokudlwengula, iminyaka emihlanu ngokuthumba,  iminyaka engu-10 ngokushaya nemithathu ngokuphula incwadi yesivimbelo senkantolo.

NKOSIKHONA CELEUMQEQESHI webhola ophinde abe wumfundisi ebandleni labasindisiwe ugwetshwe ukudilikelwa yijele enkantolo yesifunda eVerulam ngoLwesihlanu ngecala lokudlwengula umfana owayeneminyaka ewu-9 ubudala.UDavid Mkhanyisi Ntshulana (59) ugwetshwa nje ubephika elala ngomhlane ukuthi wadlwengula lo mfana ngoSepthemba 16 ngonyaka odlule.Ngokobufakazi obethulwe phambi kwenkantolo, uNtshulana wadlwengula lo mfana ngesikhathi elele emzini wakhe eMhlasini eWaterloo. Lo mfana wayengomunye wabafana ababeqeqeshwa yilo mdlwenguli njengoba wayeneqembu lebhola labafana abancane. Kuvela ukuthi lo mfana wathi uma evuka, wezwa izinhlungu endaweni yokulahla itshe lentaba futhi egcotshwe ngamafutha khona. Kuthiwa eduze kwakhe kwakukhona umqeqeshi, enqunu, wathi akazange amenze lutho.Isisulu sasikade silele nomngani waso yena ongazange adlwengulwe. Ngakusasa umqeqeshi wabathatha bobabili abafana waya nabo enkonzweni kwaba sengathi akwenzekanga lutho.Isisulu sabhoboka ngale ndaba kumngani waso, wasiyala ngokuthi singathuli kodwa lolu daba siludlulisele kunina.Unina wavula icala lokudlwengula, nokwaholela ekutheni kuboshwe le ndoda edume ngokushumayela iqekebule enkonzweni.Phambilini lesi sigameko saba yindaba egudwini kumalungu omphakathi waseWaterloo namaphethelo, owawusabisa ngokumudla luhlaza lo mqeqeshi uma inkantolo imdedela ngebheyili.Ngaphambi kokuthi aboshwe, wayiswa esibhedlela kwazise umphakathi wawuqale ngokumtitinya.Ngesikhathi egqigqa enkantolo kwavela ukuthi ubhekene namanye amacala amane okunukubeza ngokocansi abafana abaneminyaka engu-12 kuya phezulu khona eWaterloo.Kwahlaluka nokuthi uMfundisi abagilwa wayeqala ngokuthi abaphuzise unemenayidi okukholakala ukuthi wayesuke esewuthake nesidakamizwa esithile esasibenza bazumeke, bese eyabadlwengula.Kuthiwa wayebasabisa ngokuthi uzobenzakalisa uma beke bathi nkente ngalolu daba.Kwavela nokuthi abazali abaningi bebemethemba kakhulu lo mfundisi emphakathini.

KUHLWE emini kowesilisa obebhekene necala lokusoconga umshayeli kaBolt ngo-2021 ngesikhathi iNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini imgixabeza ngesigwebo sikadilakajele.Kuvela ukuthi uLuyanda Makhanya (17) wabulala uSiboniso Shangase (23) ngoFebhuwari 2021.Kuthiwa wamyenga ngokuthi enze isicelo sokuzolandwa emgwaqeni uMointy Naicker eThekwini ukuze ezomyisa eQueensburgh.Esefikile umufi, kuthiwa uMakhanya nomngani wakhe, u-Ayanda, bamjikela endleleni bambulala maqede bathatha isidumbu bayosilahla ehlathini eMlaza.Kuthiwa bambopha izandla nezinyawo base beyamklinya.Ngemuva kwalokho kuthiwa imoto kamufi yohlobo lweToyota Etios babeyishayela njalo uma bebuya esikoleni.Bakhalelwa ngamaSongo kaSigonyela njengoba amaphoyisa ababhadama beshayela imoto kamufi ngemuva kwalokho base bewakhombisa lapho belahle khona isidumbu.Isidumbu satholwa ngamaphoyisa sesibolile, sinephunga futhi sihanjwa yizimpethu. Ngaphambilini ethula ubufakazi, uConstable Patrick Xaba watshela inkantolo ukuthi ubuso bukamufi babugcwele izimpethu.IJaji uWilliam Nicholson limthole enecala uMakhanya, kwathi umngani wakhe lamkhipha phambili njengoba bungekho ubufakazi bokuthi kukhona akwenza ngesikhathi kubulawa umufi.UMakhanya limgojele ngokuthi kwasetshenziswa iselula yakhe ukuthumela isicelo sokulandwa.Izolo ijaji limgixabeze ngodilikajele uMakhanya ngecala lokusoconga umufi, lathi wayengungqondongqondo etulweni lokubulala umufi.Liphinde lamgweba iminyaka emihlanu ngkuthumba nengu-15 ngelokubamba inkunzi."Ngenhloso yokwehlisa isibalo samacala alolu hlobo, kumqoka ukuthi sikugwebe ukuze nabanye bezobona ukuthi bayagwetshwa abenza njengawe,'' usho kanje.UMnuz Bonga Zondi, ongumalume kamufi, ukushayele ihlombe ukugwetshwa kukaMakhanya.Uthe kubathoba izinhliziyo yize umshana wakhe engeke esabuya.Uthe bekungaba ngcono ukuba bobabili abathintekayo bagcine begwetshiwe. "Akusenani ngoba ukhona oyedwa ogwetshiwe ngokubulawa kukamshana wami,'' usho kanjena.UMshushisi, u-Advocate Thabani Buthelezi, ubenxuse inkantolo ukuba imgwebe ummangalelwa ngoba ukhombise unya ebulala umufi.

UHLULEKE ukuzibamba wavele wakhihla isililo enkantolo, umkamfundisi ngesikhathi ebona umyeni wakhe emi phambi kwemantshi ngamacala abhekene nawo okudlwengula izingane ezincane.UMfu Mandla Mahlaba (49), izolo, uvele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseNtuzuma, ngamacala okudlwengulwa izingane zamantombazane ezineminyaka engu-13.Umkakhe ocele ukuba lingadalulwa igama lakhe, ukhulume neSolezwe ngendlela azizwa ngayo.Uthe okwenziwe ngumyeni wakhe uyokuxoxela amagwababa echobana. Uthe kumzwise ubuhlungu obukhulu ukuthi uMahlaba akhulelise ingane yakhe yentombazane eneminyaka engu-19 ngoba azi ukuthi akayizali.Uveze ukuthi ubenganalo ulwazi ngomjolo obuphakathi komntanakhe nomyeni wakhe. "Bengingazi mina ukuthi bobabili bayathandana,'' usho kanje.Uthe akukho azokubuza umntanakhe ngoba okwamanje akakulungele ukuthi kungaba khona ingxoxo emayelana nalolu daba phakathi kwabo bobabili."Angeke ngize ngiluxoxe okwamanje nomntanani lolu daba. Ngiyehluleka,'' usho kanje.IMantshi uMisri ithe okwamanje kukhona izinto ezincane inkantolo esafuna ukuzibhekisisa ngakho kuhle ukuthi isicelo sakhe sebheyili asenze ngokuzayo uma esevele enkantolo.Icala lihlehliselwe u-Epreli 30, nonyaka.UMahlaba ubefake ijakhethi emhlophe elokhu ebheke phansi njalo. Kuthe uma esehla esephindela phansi ekhulukuthu wabonakala ewabuka amalungu ebandla lakhe abejabulela ukuthi usazoqhubeka nokubhadla ejele.Ngaphandle kwenkantolo umphakathi ububhikisha uphethe izingqwembe ebezinemibhalo eyehlukene.Eminye yazo ibibhalwe ukuthi anganikwa ibheyili. Eminye ibithi abazalwane sebezoke baphumule ukudla amasi nesiklabhu masonto onke. Lokhu kusukela ekutheni uMahlaba ubebadlisa lezi zinto ethi uyabasiza, uqaqa izinkinga zabo.Amalungu ebandla akhale ngempatho yoMfundisi bethi ibibaxaka. Omunye waleli bandla, uthe bekubamangaza ukuthi uMahlaba kungani asondelane kakhulu nezingane zamantombazane ezincane.“Kusho ukuthi ubazi ukuthi uhloseni ngazo,’’ lisho kanje ilungu. Lithe aphume nobomvu njengoba ekhalelwe ngamasongo kaSigonyela.Elinye lithe bafisa abolele ejele uMahlaba, lamchaza njengempisi embethe isikhumba semvu.Omunye umzali kamgilwa, ocele ukuba igama lakhe lingadalulwa uveze ukuthi ingane yakhe eneminyaka engu-13, ikhulelwe ingane yoMfundisi."Iyangicika le nto eyenziwe yilo Mfundisi enganeni yami. Ngikhuluma nawe nje ihlukumezekile kakhulu. Angazi ukuthi kwakuyinhloboni yomfundisi yona le,'' usho kanje.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uConstable Thenjiswa Ngcobo, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi kunamacala okudlwengulwa avulelwe owesilisa waseNtuzuma.Esewonke amacala okudlwengula avulelwe uMahlaba okwamanje mathathu, kuvela ukuthi kungenzeka kuphele isonto sekwengezwe amanye.

UDINGA uxhaso umdlali wegalofu (7) waseSavannah Park, eThekwini, okleliswe waba wunombolo 10 kwiSA Kids U/7.ULuyanda Gumede waba nothando lwegalofu emuva kokubuka uyise olidlalela ukuchitha isizungu.Uthe ngesikhathi ehamba noyise wayebuka indlela okudlalwa ngayo bese elingisa abadlali begalofu.“Ngiyakuthanda ukudlala igalofu ngoba awulinyazwa futhi akekho okudushayo njengasebholeni. Bengihamba nobaba uma eyodlala, kwathi ngelinye ilanga wangithengela eyami induku yokudlala, ngaqala lapho. Kumnandi ukudlala igalofu futhi ngifisa ukuba wumdlali odumile njengoTiger Woods,” kusho uLuyanda.Uyise, uMnuz Siphiwe Gumede, uthe ubehamba nendodana yakhe uma eyodlala igalofu ngoba bekungekho lapho abengayishiya khona.“Ngashonelwa wunkosikazi nokwenze ukuthi umfana wami, okunguye umagcino, angabi nendawo lapho ezosala khona uma ngiyodlala igalofu. Bengihamba naye ngase ngibona ukuthi uyakwazi ukudlala. Njengamanje uncintisana nezinye izingane kodwa sinenkinga yokuthi kunemidlalo angakwazi ukuya kuyona ngenxa yokushodelwa amasenti,” kuchaza uGumede.Uthe badinga uxhaso lwezimpahla zegalofu, olwemali ekhokhwa lapho kusuke kudlalwa khona igalofu ebizwa ngama-green fees, kube eyezokuthutha neyendawo yokuhlala.UGumede ungumshayeli wamabhasi kaMasipala weTheku.Uyafisa nokuthi indodana yakhe iye esikoleni esinegalofu ngoba njengamanje izifundela esikoleni esijwayelekile, iSimla Primary eShallcross.“Egalofini izinga lakho linyuka ngemidlalo oyidlalayo. Njengoba ekleliswe kunombolo 10 ngabe sikude manje kodwa kunemidlalo esingakwazi ukuya kuyona uma singenawo uphethroli nemali yokukhokhela abaphatha izikhwama neyokungena lapho kudlalwa khona. Njengamanje uLuyanda uqeqeshwa mahhala wuMnuz Janco Kruger axhunyaniswa naye wuPete Craig. Singakujabulela uma uhulumeni nosomabhizinisi nomphakathi wonkana ungasixhasa,” kusho uGumede.Uthe ngo-Agasti uLuyanda uzodlala kwiSan Lameer Junior Challenge ezoba seSan Lameer Gold Club ngo-Agasti 18 kuya ku-Agasti 23.ULuyanda uyatholakala ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kuTiktok uwu-@luyandagumedegolf.

KUKHUTHAZWA abantu abasha ukuba babe nentshisekelo yokuvakashela izigcinamagugu ukuze bafunde kabanzi ngomlando onothile wezwe.Lokhu kugqugquzelwe nguNgqongqoshe wezeMidlalo, ezobuCiko namaSiko KwaZulu Natal, uDkt Ntuthuko Mahlaba.UDkt Mahlaba ukusho ngesikhathi kuvulwa ngokusemthethweni isigcinamagugu saKwaDukuza, enyakatho neKwaZulu Natal."Siyakholelwa kakhulu ekubalulekeni kwezigcinamagugu KwaZulu Natal. Yingakho nje sikukhuthaza kakhulu ukuthi zakhiwe zibe ningi,'' usho kanje uDkt Mahlaba, uNgqongqoshe wezeMidlalo, ezobuCiko namaSiko KwaZulu Natal.UMahlaba udalule ukuthi ukwakhiwa kwesikhungo samagugu kudle imali elinganiselwa ku-R27 million. Uqhube wathi kubajabulisile kakhulu ukuphothulwa kwesigcinamagugu.Ungqongqoshe uchaze izigcinamagugu njengezikhungo ezilonda futhi zinakekele amagugu esizwe nomlando ojulile wezwe. Uthe bafisa ukubona sanda isibalo sabantu abasha basendaweni ababayingxenye yokuvakashela isigcinamagugu."Akukho nokuncane ukungabaza ukuthi kuningi kakhulu abangakuzuza uma bezijwayeza ukusisebenzisa ngendlela efanele,'' kusho uMahlaba.UNgqongqoshe ubuye wahalalisela izikole zaKwaDukuza namaphethelo, wathi zizozuza lukhulu ngokusebenzisa isigcinamagugu. Ugcizelele ukuthi kungaba yinto enhle uma zinganda izigcinamagugu ezingxenyeni ezahlukene KwaZulu Natal.Uthe lokhu kumele kube yinto ebonakala iba seqhulwini komasipala abehlukene baKwaZulu Natal.IMeya yaKwaDukuza, uNkk Lindiwe Nhaca, ikushayele ihlombe ukuphothulwa kwesigcinamagugu kule ndawo. UNkk Nhaca nxuse abantu abasha bakule ndawo ukuba bazijwayeze ukusisebenzisa ngendlela efanele ukuze bahlomule ngolwazi olunzulu mayelana nomlando wezwe.UNkk Nhaca uthe kusemqoka futhi ukuthi abantu abadala nabo kumqoka bazijwayeze ukusebenzisa isigcinamagugu."Kuningi kakhulu abazokufunda abantu abasha bethu abazokuthola uma bengena ngaphakathi kusona,'' usho kanje.

UDkt Nandipha Magudumana kuthiwa ushaywe yiziboshwa ejele eKroonstad, eFree State ngeSonto lapho egcinwe khona.Lokhu kuvezwe wummeli wakhe uMachine Motloung ngesikhathi ekhuluma esiteshini sezindaba i-eNCA ngoMsombuluko emini.UMotloung uthe uthole izindaba zokuthi kushaywe amumele eshaywa ngesinye isiboshwa ngesikhathi esengqungqutheleni. Uthe ube esezama ukuqinisekisa akuzwile ngenhloko yejele kodwa wangayithola.“Ngesikhathi sisahlabe ikhefu ngibe sengithola ucingo oluvela ngqo kwengimumele  engitshela ngesigameko. Ngibe sengizibophezela ukulandelela nenhloko yejele. Ngamafuphi nje ushayiwe ngempela okuthiwa yiziboshwa ezimbili esinye okuyisangoma nesinye esiphazamisekile emqondweni ezitokisini,” kusho uMotloung.Uthe sekunesikhathi  esatshiswa  futhi ebika ezinhlakeni ezifanele kodwa kungenziwa lutho.UMagudumana ugcinwe kuleli jele ngemuva kokuboshwa kwakhe ngo-Ephreli ngamacala okubalwa kuwo ukusiza isiboshwa ukuthi seqe ejele. Kuthiwa wasiza uThabo Bester ukuthi eqe ejele laseBloemfontein.Okhulumela uMnyango wezokuHlunyeleliswa kweziMilo ucashunywe kwi-eNCA ethi bebengakawutholi umbiko ngesigameko.

UBECELE umufi ukuthi azomkhiphela i-lay-by ababeyenze bobabili, umsolwa okuthiwa ugcine egwaza ebulala owesifazane enxanxatheleni yezitolo eGateway, eMhlanga, ngeSonto.Lokhu kuvezwe owomndeni, uMnuz Halalisani Mbatha, engxoxweni neSolezwe, izolo, kulandela ukuvela kukamsolwa eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini.Izithombe zokubulawa kukaNksz Nomfundo Msibi (30) zisabalale ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngosuku lwesigameko, abantu bebabaza isihluku sikamsolwa, uMnuz Siphamandla Khumalo (34), ebhokoda ngommese umufi kubuka wonke umuntu.Elandisa, uMbatha uthe umufi bese kunesikhashana ebuqedile ubudlelwano bakhe noKhumalo, anezingane ezimbili naye.Uveze ukuthi uKhumalo ubengafuni nokuyizwa leyo, njengoba ebehlale eshayela ucingo umufi kodwa azizibe izingcingo zakhe.Uthe ngoMgqibelo, umsolwa uvele waba yiphela endlebeni kumufi nakuye uMbatha, ethi ufuna kuyokhishwa i-lay-by yakhe yejakhethi eGateway.“Wayenike uNomfundo imali ezinyangeni ezintathu ezedlule ukuthi ayomenzela yona ngomazisi wakhe. Kuthe esebona eziba izingcingo zakhe, wagcina eseshayela mina ucingo, ethi ufuna ayomkhiphela,” kusho uMbatha.Uthe umufi ubemanqikanqika ukuya, ethi akazizwa kahle ngalolu hambo.Uthe wuye (uMbatha) omncengile ukuthi ahambe ayoyikhipha, khona kuzobonakala ukuthi uma ephinda eshaya uzobe esefunani.“Ungicele ukuthi ngikhulume naye, ngimtshele ukuthi okungenani akathumele umfowabo, angazizeli yena. Uthembisile ukuthi uzokwenza njalo kodwa bagcine befika bobabili,” kubeka uMbatha.Uqhube wathi uyalele umufi ukuthi angahambi yedwa, aphelezelwe wumngani, ukuze amvikele.“Sizwa kuthiwa ingxabano iqale khona ngaphandle kwesitolo isikhishiwe ijakhethi, umsolwa ebuza ukuthi kungani uNomfundo eziba izingcingo zakhe?” usho kanje.Uthe bona bezwe sebeshayelwa wuye umngani obehamba nomufi edinda esikaNandi ethi: “Nangu emgwaza, ephindelela.”Uthe babuze ukuthi ukhuluma ngani, wabatshela ukuthi umsolwa ubulala umufi.Uthe phambilini, ubudlelwano babo bebubuhle kodwa mumva nje bese bunodlame, umsolwa esehlale eshaya umufi, waze wathatha isinqumo sokumala.Uthe bakholelwa ukuthi ubekuhlelile ukumbulala njengoba ubemphathele ummese amgwaze ngawo.Uveze ukuthi ingane yabo endala, yashona eminyakeni edlule ineminyaka eyisikhombisa, kanti ephilayo ineminyaka emihlanu.Kuthiwa umufi obeseqashe kwa-Q eMlaza, ubeseshintshe amahlandla amabili imiqasho abehlala kuyo ebalekela yena umsolwa. Umufi owaseHlophenkulu, kanti umsolwa owaKwaMinyamanzi KwaNongoma, kanti babehlala ndawonye ubudlelwano busahamba kahle. Umsolwa ubesebenza ezinkontilekeni, umufi ebamba amatoho. Enkantolo, umsolwa ungene esagqoke isikibha esinamachaphazelo egazi, okukholakala ukuthi wayesigqoke ngesikhathi ehlasela umufi.Imantshi, uMnuz Ashwin Singh, ilihlehlisele uLwesine oluzayo, icala ukuze umsolwa afake isicelo sebheyili. UMbuso uveze ukuthi uzosiphikisa isicelo sebheyili, ngokusabela ukuphepha kofakazi nobucayi becala.Emva kwesigameko, amaphoyisa abopha umsolwa nomfowabo, Isolezwe elinalo igama lakhe, kodwa ugcine engavelanga enkantolo izolo, njengoba kuvele ukuthi igama lakhe libuye lahoxiswa ecaleni.
