Umkhuzi wamaphoyisa aseLimpopo uLieutenant General Thembi Hadebe useyalele amaphoyisa ukuthi athungathe futhi abophe ngokushesha owesilisa osolwa ngokudubula abulale umkakhe esesontweni ngoMgqibelo.Lesi sigameko kuthiwa senzeke eMadonde Shadani ngabo-6 ntambama ngoMgqibelo.Kubikwa ukuthi umsolwa ungene emagcekeni esonto ngesikhathi ibandla lisadumisa wadubula umkakhe ephindelela (45) waphelela endaweni yesigameko.Ngokwesitatimende samaphoyisa, umsolwa ongaziwa iminyaka yakhe, ubaleke ngeToyota Corolla e-sivler grey.Amaphoyisa athe yize imbangela yalokhu ingaziwa kodwa ngeke akuchithe ukuxabana kwezithandani njengesizathu.Amaphoyisa anxuse noma ubani ongaba nolwazi olungasiza ukuthi kuboshwe umsolwa ukuthi ashayele umphenyi wecala uSergeant Mashamba Mbangiseni ku-079 424 3573 noma ku-08600 10111 okanye abikele isiteshi asize samaphoyisa.

BAGQEMEKE inkambabeyibuza yengozi abamangalelwa ababili ecaleni lokufa kukaSenzo Meyiwa, ngesikhathi iJaji Ratha Makgoatlheng linquma ukuthi izitatimende zokuvuma icala zizoba yingxenye yobufakazi.UMeyiwa wadutshulwa wabulawa ekubo kwentombi yakhe uKelly Khumalo, eVosloorus eGauteng ngo-2014. UMbuso uthi abamangalelwa ngesikhathi beboshwa bavuma emaphoyiseni baze basayina izitatimende bewalandisa ngokubulala uMeyiwa.Abamangalelwa bathi amaphoyisa abaphoqa ukuthi basayine izitatimende futhi bayawaphika onke amacala ababhekene nawo. Bebefake isicelo sokuthi izitatimende zichithwe zingabi yingxenye yobufakazi benkantolo.IJaji uMakgotlheng likhiphe isinqumo salo ngoLwesine ekuseni emuva kokuthi icala laguqa ngoMsombuluko. Lithe abamangalelwa owokuqala uMuzikawukhulelwa Sibiya  nowesibili uBongani Ntanzi bahlulekile wukuveza ubufakazi bokuth baphoqwa.“Emuva kokucungungula kabanzi ngithole ukuthi ummangalelwa wokuqala nowesibili bazivumela bona bengaphoqwe wumuntu ukusayina izitatimende. Ummangalela wesibili futhi wayengaphoqwe muntu wazivumela ukuyokhomba endaweni yesigameko,’’ kusho iJaji.UMbuso ucele ukuthi kuyiwe ekhefini beyoxoxa ukuthi kuzoqhutshekwa kanjani necala emuva kwesinqumo.

UMPHATHISWA wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi eKZN, uNkk Mbali Shinga, uzwakalise ukudumala ngabakuthole esikhungweni esingenzi nzuzo, i-ABH Children’s Home esizinze eChatsworth, KwaZulu-Natal.Umphathiswa usho kanje kulandela ukuthi ngoJulayi, kuqubuke izinsolo zokuhlukunyezwa kwezingane, zihlukunyezwa ngabanye babasebenzi kulesi sikhungo abagcina bexoshiwe.NgoLwesibili, uhlangane nebhodi lesikhungo njengoba ebezoletha umbiko emva kophenyo oluthathe amaviki amathathu.Ekhuluma nabezindaba uthe benza isithembiso ukuthi inhloko yomnyango izokwenza uphenyo ukubheka ukuthi izinsolo ezazibikiwe ziyiqiniso ngempela yini.“Siwudluliselile umbiko futhi njengomnyango sidumele kakhulu ngezinto esizitholile ngaphakathi esikhungweni. Ngempela abantwana bazisholo bona ukuthi bebeshaywa, bejeziswa ngezindlela ezehlukene futhi bewashiswa nezitsha ngamanzi abandayo,” kusho uNkk Shinga.Uthe abanye bebehlukunyezwa ukuthi bebebuka abanye beshaywa.“Ngokomoya nangokomqondo uma ulokhu ukhunjuzwa ukuthi njengoba ulapha watholakala uhluphekile noma usesimweni esithile ngakho-ke yamukela noma yini, lokho kuyakuhlukumeza. Ngakho njengomnyango lezo zinto azisiphethe kahle yingakho silapha,” usho kanje.Uthe kunethimba elizoqapha iThekwini Monitoring Unit Evaluation elizosebenzisana nalesi sikhungo elizobabikela ukuthi ukhona yini umehluko okhona.Inhloko yomnyango, uNkk Nelisiwe Vilakazi, ithe isikhungo asibabheki abasebenzi baso ukuthi bakhona yini ohlwini lwabahlukumeza izingane.“Umthetho uthi uma uzosebenza endaweni enabantwana kufanele ubhekwe ukuthi awukho yini la okubhalwa khona abantu abenze amacala ebantwaneni. Uma ukanjalo uyaye ungabe usaqashwa kuleyo ndawo, ngakho-ke sitholile kulesi sikhungo ukuthi abantu ababhekwa kuleyo rejista ebizwa ngo-Part-B, yokuvikela izingane,” kubeka uNkk Vilakazi.Uthe banxusa ukuthi wonke umuntu osebenza esikhungweni ukuthi abhekwe kuleyo rejista, uma etholakala, aqheliswe ngoba ungathola ukuthi omunye unenkinga yokuhlukumeza abantwana. Uqhube wathi balindele ukuthi izinkinga zilungiseke masinyane ukuze izingane ziphephe.Isikhulu esiphezulu sase-ABH, uMnuz Ray Naguran, sithe bayawamukela umbiko futhi basazowufunda.“Sisanda kuwuthola umbiko, asibanga naso isikhathi sokuwufunda. Sizochitha izinsuku ezimbalwa siwetshise emva kwalokho bese siyaphawula. Okwamanje izinto zisahamba kahle ngaphakathi esikhungweni,” kusho uNaguran.

UVELE wadumala unina webhungu elabulawa ngesihluku, lisolwa ngokuntshontsha utshwala, ethola esefikile enkantolo ukuthi kwahlehliselwa olunye usuku ukukhishwa kwesinqumo secala.Unina kamufi, umndeni wakhe namakholwa bebemagange ngesikhathi befika eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseVerulam izolo kodwa baphuma sebephatheke kabi.Bekulindeleke ukuthi iMantshi Sanele Hlatshwayo yehlulele ecaleni lokubulawa kowayengumfundi ka-matric, u-Andile ‘Bobo’ Mbuthu (16), okwenzeka ngo-Ephreli 2020.Abamangalelwa abahlanu bebengabonwa nangokhalo enkantolo nokuthe uma intatheli ifonela ummeli wabo, imbuza ukuthi kungani kucwebile enkantolo, wathi kwahlehliselwa uJulayi ukukhishwa kwesinqumo.Umshushisi wecala ubengekho enkantolo kodwa uzakwabo oficiwe uqoqele ndawonye abebeze kuleli cala waxolisa ngokuthi abaziswanga ukuthi imantshi yathi izobe ingekho enkantolo osukwini lwayizolo.Lo mshushisi uthe phambilini kwahlanganwa kwathathwa isinqumo sokuthi imantshi yehlulele ngoJulayi 18.Ngaphandle kwenkantolo umalume kaBobo, uMnuz Bongani Mthembu, uthe baphatheke kabuhlungu bewumndeni.UMthembu uthe yibona obekumele baziswe kuqala ukuthi icala lihlehlile kodwa bathola sebefika enkantolo okuyinto athe iwubudedengu.“Bakhombise ukuseya ekubeni salinyalelwa. Kuvusa isilonda ukuza kwethu enkantolo. Kumanje sihamba nonina womntwana (Bobo), uphatheke kabi ukuthi ngosuku okumele ngabe ujabula ngalo, uthola ingcindezelo,” kusho uMthembu ethi bathatheke kancane.Abomndeni kaBobo namalungu ebandla babuthelane ndawonye ngaphambi kwesango lenkantolo kubonakala ukuthi abayikholwa into ebehlele.Umholi webandla labo, uMnuz Cebolenkosi Mngomezulu, uhambe emazwini kaMthembu wathi badumele ngakuchaze ngobudedengu benkantolo.“Sekuphele iminyaka emine siyihamba le ndlela. Asijabule neze indlela okwenzeke ngayo izinto. Siyathemba akusekho okunye ukuhlehla okuzoba khona futhi buzokwenzeka ubulungiswa,” kusho uCebekhulu.UBobo washaywa washona ngamadoda ayisikhombisa endaweni yobumnandi okwakungekamzala wakhe, iMagagula Lounge, eHambanathi, oThongathi. Umzala kaBobo, uMlungisi Thabethe, owayengummangalelwa wokuqala kuleli cala, wadutshulwa washona ngo-2021 esigamekweni amaphoyisa athi asihlobene naleli cala.Omunye wabamangalelwa, owayengumngani kaBobo futhi ehamba phambili kwababemshaya, waphenduka ufakazi woMbuso.Isidumbu sikaBobo sashiswa kwathi izinsalela zaso zaqotshwa zafakwa ezikhwameni nezitini zaphonswa edamini. Amaphoyisa asithola, okuyinto eyagovuza umphakathi wangqongqisa iMagagula.

NKOSIKHONA CELEUBONGA uNkulunkulu ngokuhlanganisa iminyaka engu-15 ehola ibandla uMphostoli Njabulo Zulu weHouse of Glory Family Church.Ibandla elasungulwa ngo-2009, nonyaka libungaza ukuhlangana kweminyaka engu-15 labunjwa. Linesizinda eMthonjaneni, eMelmoth.Lizokuba nendumezulu yenkonzo yokubungaza iminyaka ngo-Okthoba 24 kuya ku-25 esakhiweni salo.Lokhu kuyisibusiso esikhulu ngokusho kukaMphostoli Zulu. Uthi zibe khona izinselelo nezingqinamba abadlule kuzona kuyona yonke le minyaka kodwa ngenhlanhla enkulu, uNkulunkulu ume nabo bakwazi ukubhekana nezimo ezahlukene.Uthi kuningi abakufundile kuyona eminyakeni edlule njengebandla beqhuba umsebenzi kaNkulunkulu. Umfundisi ubonga bonke abazalwane ababekhona ngesikhathi lisungulwa nabasekhona namanje. Nalabo asebalishiya nabo uthe baklama indima enkulu ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi liyadlondlobala futhi liba nenqubekela phambili. Ukubambisana uthe yikhona okube umgogodla wokuphumelela kwalo."Siyambonga kakhulu uNkulunkulu ngokusigcina kuze kube lapha. Sesihambe ibanga elide kakhulu manje,'' usho kanje uMfundisi Zulu.Uveze ukuthi bakhona abazalwane abase bephenduke umgogodla webandla abalishiya kodwa uNkulunkulu waqhubeka nokuma nabo.Uthe kodwa ibandla livele ladlondlobala kakhulu kunakuqala. "Ngalokhu ngicabanga ukuthi uNkulunkulu ubefuna ukusikhombisa ukuthi ibandla lingelakhe,'' usho kanje.Uveze ukuthi ibandla likholelwa kakhulu emkhulekweni nasekukhuthazeni imfundo ebantwini abasha. Wathi bayakholelwa kakhulu nasekubunjweni kwemindeni. UZulu ukholwa ukuthi ibandla elinabantu abasha abathanda imfundo nalo liba nekusasa eliqhakazile.Ibandla linamagatsha ehlukene okubalwa elise-Alice, e-Eastern Cape, eliseMpangeni, eNkandla, eRicharsd Bay, naseThekwini.Laziwa kakhulu nangokunikezela ngosizo olwahlukene emphakathini elikuwona.Leli bandla ulihola ngokubambisana nomkakhe naye ongumfundisi uMfu Portia Zulu.

KUSOLWA ukuziphindisela kudutshulwa owesifazane obelele nosana eMalukazi washona, ngoLwesihlanu entathakusa.UNksz Ncamisile Mkhize (40) kuthiwa ubelele nosana lwakhe olunezinyanga eziyithupha ngesikhathi kungena amadoda amabili endlini, eyodwa yabanga isibhamu nomyeni wakhe, enye yaqonda akamelweni lokulala yamdubula elele,  kwadubuleka nosana abelele nalo.Kuthiwa eminyakeni emithathu edlule uNksz Mkhize wabopha owesilisa okhulile owayethi uthandana nendodakazi yakhe eyayineminyaka ewu-14 ngaleso sikhathi. Owesilisa waboshelwa icala lokudlwengula ngoba indodakazi yakhe yayisengaphansi ngokweminyaka. Kuthiwa waphuma ejele, kungakapheli sikhathi esingakanani sekudutshulwa unina wentombazane owavula icala.Umyeni kaNksz Mkhize, uMnuz Nanana Dlamini, uthe uzwe umsindo obekungathi kukhona ongena emjondolo ongaphandle, wavuka ethi uyobheka.Kuthe esathi uyovula ngasekhishini, engakavuli abebengaphandle bakhahlela isicabha, savuleka bahlangana khona ekhishini. Kwangena amadoda amabili, egqoke izigqoko ezivale ubuso.  Engene kuqala uzame ukulwa nayo kodwa kwaba nzima ngoba ibiphethe isibhamu. Eyesibili ingene yaqonda ekamelweni labo lokulala yafike yadubula umkakhe nengane abelele nayo embhedeni."Sisale ekhishini  nalesi sigebengu esingene kuqala. Ngizwe kuqhuma isibhamu. Umkami udutshulwe elele, ingane nayo idubulekile kodwa yona isindile. Iyiswe  esibhedlela yabhandishwa yabuya,"  kuchaza yenaUthe umsolwa obedubula uzishaye ngempama izingane ebese zivuswe umsindo wesibhamu,  zizama ukubaleka, wazibuza ukuthi siphi isibhamu sikanina."Umkami ubengenaso isibhamu futhi akakaze abe naso. Izigebengu zithathe amaselula abo nesikhwama semali obekuseduze  kombhede,"  kusho yena.Uqhube wathi umkakhe ubengakaze abike ukuthi kukhona umuntu axabene naye."Ngisadidekile nje ukuthi ngizothi udutshulelwani ngoba akujwayelekile ukuthi izigebengu zisike ama-buglar guards ngoba zifuna amaselula,"  kusho yena.Ebuzwa ngezinsolo zokuziphindisela, uthe akanalo ulwazi lwalokho, obesho njalo  kungenzeka ukuthi unolwazi umndeni ongenalo kodwa ukhona umuntu owaboshelwa ukudlwengula indodakazi yabo. Okhulumela amaphoyisa kulesi sifundazwe uLt Col Nqobile, usiqinisekisile isigameko, wathi amaphoyisa aphenya amacala amathathu, elokugqekeza, elokubulala nelokuzama ukubulala.

IDUTSHULWE yafela endaweni yesigameko indoda okuthiwa ihlwithe isibhamu sephoyisa ngaphakathi esiteshini, yadubula ibhekise emaphoyiseni kwalimala amathathu.Isigameko esithuse abaningi senzeke ngaphakathi esiteshini samaphoyisa esiseRichmond, ngoMgqibelo.Umsolwa, Isolezwe  elithole ngomthombo walo ukuthi ngowase-Harding, kuthiwa ufike kulesi siteshi ezenza umuntu ozovula icala. Ngesikhathi iphoyisa lesifazane lisazama ukumsiza, kuthiwa ugxavune isibhamu salo ebesilenga enqulwini, wadubula ebhekise emaphoyiseni abekhona kwalimala amathathu. Kuthiwa amaphoyisa angenelelile aphendula ngenhlamvu wadubuleka wafela endaweni yesigameko.Umthombo weSolezwe  osondelene namaphoyisa aseRichmond, uthe; “Kusolwa ukuthi ubeseke waya esiteshini esise-Harding, wayobika ukuthi kukhona abamlandelayo abafuna ukumbulala, wanxusa amaphoyisa ukuthi amsize ayomcashisa okungenani eXobho, okuyinto okwagcina kungavunyelwene ngayo.” Uthe ukholwa ukuthi kungenzeka ukuthi umsolwa ubezama ukuzibulala ngalesi senzo sakhe kwazise ukugasela esiteshini samaphoyisa ahlwithe isibhamu salo udubule kungenasizathu, kuyizinkomba zokuzimbela igodi kalula.UNksz Kamogelo Mgotsi okhulumela ihhovisi likaNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa kuleli, uMnuz Senzo Mchunu, uthe uMchunu ukushayele ihlombe ukungenelela ngokushesha kwamaphoyisa okuholele ekudutshulweni komsolwa.Kwenzeka lokhu nje, kuthe ngalo isonto eledlule ithimba lamaphoyisa esifundeni Umzinyathi, adubula abulala umsolwa okuthiwa udubule wabhekisa ngakuwo ngesikhathi embhadama ephethe isibhamu esingekho emthethweni, erenke eMsinga.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, Colonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe kulimale iphoyisa elilodwa kulesi sigameko.“Amaphoyisa abeqeda kubopha umsolwa obefunwa uthuli ngamacala amathathu okubulala enzeke eQulu, eNquthu, obanjwe eMsinga. Ngesikhathi esendleleni ebuyayo, azithele phezu komsolwa obephethe isibhamu erenke okuthe uma esondela ngakuyo wasikhipha wadubula ebhekise ngakuwo, kwadubuleka iphoyisa elilodwa lalimala. Amaphoyisa aphendule ngendlela efanayo wafela endaweni yesigameko,” kusho uNetshiunda.Uthe umsolwa oboshiwe utholwe nesibhamu esikhulu, kanti odutshulwe ngamaphoyisa, utholwe nesibhamu esincane sohlobo lwe-38 special revolver.

UFAKAZI esigcawini esiqondisa ubugwegwe uMengameli wezimantshi KwaZulu-Natal, uthe ubucayi bezinsolo zokugwazisa ngemali nangocansi kwababefuna izikhundla zokuba yizimantshi kwamphoqa ukuthi avule icala emaphoyiseni.IMantshi uJohannes Meijer yethule ubufakazi esigcawini esiqondisa ubugwegwe uMnuz Eric Sibusiso Nzimande ngoMsombuluko.Isigcawu esenganyelwe ngusihlalo okuyiJaji Jeremiah Shongwe, osathatha umhlalaphansi, siqhubeka eNkantolo edingida amacala athinta imindeni ePhoyinti, eThekwini.“Akukho lapho mina engaphenya khona ngokwami kodwa ngasebenzisa imininingwane engahlinzekwa yona, ngavula icala emaphoyiseni. Umthetho uyangiphoqa ngenxa yesikhundla sami ukuthi ngibikele amaphoyisa ngoba ngangiyoba senkingeni uma ngithula nolwazi mayelana nezinsolo zenkohlakalo,” kusho uMeijer.UNzimande, obekade ebukeka ezikhululekele futhi ebhala phansi obekushiwo wufakazi ngaye, ubekwe amacala awu-162 yiKhomishini yeziMantshi.UMeijer usophikweni olubheke ukusebenza ngobuqotho kusukela ngonyaka u-2000, izinsolo abekade efakaza ngazo, uthe zazivela kuNkk Lindelwa Gumede owayesebenza noNzimande ngoJulayi 2015.Kuthiwa wayesola uNzimande ukuthi ugwazisa ngemali nangezinto ezithinta ucansi kwababegaqele ukuba yizimantshi okwesikhashana.UNkk Gumede kuthiwa wenza izinsolo zokuthi wayesegwazele uNzimande izikhawu. Kuvela nokuthi langa limbe wacelwa nguNzimande azohlala emathangeni akhe khona ezomphulula, baxoxe ngocansi.UMeijer uthe nakuba uNkk Gumede awahoxisa ngo-2016 amacala, kodwa wagcizelela ukuthi kuyiqiniso ayekubhale encwadini efungelwe eyanikwa amaphoyisa.UMeijer uthe umthetho unika igunya Nzimande ukuba enze izincomo kwiphini likangqongqoshe eMnyangweni wezobuLungiswa ngabalungele ukuba izimantshi okwesikhashana.Ummeli kaNzimande, uMnuz Ravindra Maklilall, upheke Meijer ngemibuzo ethi buphi ubufakazi bokuthi uNzimande wagwazisa uNkk Gumede uR140 000?UMeijer ubebuye athi okunye akanalo ulwazi lwakho. Lapho uNzimande ubewahlome kuMeijer amehlo akhe uma ephendula abuye abhale phansi.Emacaleni uMeijer athi wawabikela amaphoyisa, kukhona nawokuba seCasino egembula ngesikhathi somsebenzi uNzimande.UNzimande uthe uyakweshwama kushiwo ngaye futhi anyathelwa ngezinyawo amalungelo akhe kwenziwa uphenyo, wathi kuyinto abazoyiveza esigcawini.UMaklilall ubuze sakubhuqa uMeijer ukuthi uyazi yini ukuthi u-50% wabantu okuthiwa bagwazela uNzimande, babhala izitatimende bekuchitha njengamampunge okushiwo ngabo?UMeijer uthe akanalwazi ngoba kwakungeyena umphenyi.Isigcawu siyaqhubeka.

IPHOYISA ladubula amahlandla amaningi kwaze kwajama isibhamu libhekise kowesilisa owekade encike ngendololwane emotweni yalo imizuzwana emithathu eMolweni, eThekwini.Ummangalelwa uSergeant Sibonelo Shabangu kuthiwa waqeda wabaleka walahla phansi isibhamu ayekade edubula ngaso esasala sibangwa abantu.Lobu ubufakazi obethulelwe iNkantolo yeMantshi yasePinetown, izolo, ngumngani kamufi futhi ongumshayeli wetekisi, uMnuz Ayanda Ngcobo.UShabangu, ongaphandle ngebheyili kaR5 000, usolwa ngokudubula amahlandla amane uyise wezingane ezinhlanu, uMnuz Qaphela Mdima.UMdima washona esanda kungeniswa emtholampilo waKwaDabeka.Isigameko senzeka ebusuku ngoNovemba 25, 2022, lapho kupakwa khona izimoto endaweni yobumnandi eCasa Blanca Lifestyle eMolweni, eThekwini.UNgcobo utshele inkantolo ukuthi uShabangu ulandise wathi bafika behamba bengabangani beyisithupha eCasa Blanca ngo-11 ebusuku bahlala endaweni yezicukuthwane.Kwakunguye (uNgcobo), umufi nowesilisa athe uNjabulo, abaphuma ngaphandle kwendawo yobumnandi.“UMandla (indoda eyazana nomufi abayifica eCasa) wagaxa umufi wathi abaphumele phandle baye kumuntu ababekweleta naye uMdima uR200. Singakafiki kulowo muntu, UShabangu wayalela uMandla ukuthi angasondeli eduze wemoto yakhe nomufi, “ kusho UNgcobo.Uqhube wathi umufi owayengahlomile futhi eneme, waphendula uShabangu wathi: “Awu mfethu, ngoba ngithi sesayilungisa nje leya nto, yinindaba singavele sithenge i-drink, sidlule kule nto.”Kuthiwa uShabangu wavele wahosha isibhamu emotweni yekhe wavulela ngenhlamvu ebhekise kuMdima wawa phansi.Kuthiwa wadutshulwa ngisho esephakamise izandla zombili samuntu ocela uxolo kodwa uShabangu wadubula saze sajama isibhamu.UNgcobo uthe wabaleka nayekade ehamba nabo uShabangu, watshinga phansi isibhamu.Bekuqale kwethulwa ubufakazi uDkt Njabulo Ndlovu owahlola isidumbu sikaMdima. Uthe umufi wayenamanxeba amane okudutshulwa elalisesifubeni, amabili emhlane nasesihluzwini.UNgcobo uzoqhubeka nokwethula ubufakazi ngo-Ephreli 25. Uzobe ehlonywa imibuzo ummeli kaShabangu, uMnuz Andile Dakela.

UPHENYEKE izinqe uMuzikawukhulelwa Sibiya ongummangalelwa wokuqala ecaleni lokufa kukaSenzo Meyiwa, ngesikhathi ufakazi eveza ukuthi wayekhona eGauteng ngo-2014 ekubeni ethe wayengekho.UMeyiwa wadutshulwa wabulawa ekubo kwentombi yakhe uKelly Khumalo, eVosloorus, eGoli ngo-2014.USuperintendent Chupye Christopher Matlou ongumphenyi kwiRoad Traffic Management Corporation (RTMC), ufakaze walahla uSibiya.UMatlou uveze ukuthi uSibiya wayeseGauteng ngo-2014 waze wafaka isicelo sokubhala ukuhlolelwa izincwadi zokushayela.“NgoJulayi 17, 2014 wabhala ehlolelwa izincwadi zokushayela eBrakpan wafeyila. Waphinda wafaka esinye isicelo ngalolo suku esefuna ukubhalela eBoksburg. Wabhala ngoSepthemba 15 waphasa,’’ kuchaza uMatlou. Ummeli wommangalelwa wokuqala osewamxosha, uMnuz Sipho Ramosepele, phambilini wathi uSibiya wayengekho eGauteng ngonyaka okwabulawa ngawo uMeyiwa. URamosepele wathi uSibiya waphelelwa wumsebenzi, wahamba ngoMashi 2013 wabuyela kwelakubo KwaZulu-Natal waze wabuyela eGauteng ngo-2015. UMshushisi u-Advocate George Baloyi uthe ubize lo fakazi ngamabomu ukuze aveze ukuthi uSibiya wakhuluma amanga.UMatlou uphinde waveza ukuthi ummangalelwa wesihlanu uFisokuhle Ntuli  wayenemoto iVW emhlophe ebhaliswe ngaphansi kwegama lakhe kwabezokuthutha. Izitatimende zokuvuma amacala zabamangalelwa, ziveza ukuthi babehamba ngeVW Polo emhlophe ngesikhathi kuyosocongwa uMeyiwa.Kuvela nokuthi leyo moto yayishayelwa wuyena uNtuli okuthiwa wafika wasala ngaphandle komuzi okwadutshulwa kuwona uMeyiwa.Ufakazi uveze ukuthi uNtuli wayehamba ngayo le moto ngoFebhuwari 2, 2016 ngesikhathi emiswa yiphoyisa elambhala ithikithi.Ufakazi uthe uNtuli uphinde avele emabhukwini abo ukuthi wayehamba ngayo ngolunye usuku emiswa amaphoyisa ophiko lweJohannesburg Metro, nawo ambhala elinye ithikithi.UMatlou uthe uyafunga uyagomela ukuthi amarekhodi abo awashayi eceleni futhi lokhu akwethule enkantolo kuyiqiniso elimsulwa.Ummeli u-Advocate Charles Mnisi, uzamile ukuphebeza ukwethulwa kobufakazi ekhala ngokuthi abanikwanga ngesikhathi isitatimende sikafakazi. Abanye abameli bathe bona banikwa kusenesikhathi.Leli phuzu libangiwe kakhulu kodwa ijaji lanquma ukuthi ubufakazi buqhubeke. Kulindeleke ukuthi abameli baphose imibuzo kuMatlou ngoMsombuluko uma icala selibuyela enkantolo.

UCHAZWE njengeqhawe lomuntu omusha owesifazane waseSheshi obebhekelele izimali kwisiFundabhishobhi saseNatal esiholwa nguMbhishobhi Nkosinathi Ndwandwe.UNksz Thandekile Charmaine Dumisa (40) udlule emhlabeni ngemuva kokuxinwa ukugula esePort Shestone Hospital.Izolo bekunenkonzo yakhe yomngcwabo ebikade iqhutshwa esakhiweni sePherishi abekade ekhonza kuyona, iSt Augustine, eyaziwa ngokuthi kukwaMdladla, eMlaza.UFata Phumlani Dludla uthe njengebandla bagqemeke engeqiwa ntwala ngokudlula emhlabeni kukaNksz Dumisa.Umchaze njengowesifazane obenobuhlakani, ekhuthele futhi kukuningi okuhle aphokophelele ukukuzuza.“Kuningi okuhle abekwenzela ibandla. Siyafisa nje ukuthi siduduze umndeni nabo bonke nabangani,’’ usho kanjena.Uyise kamufi ongusomabhizinisi owaziwayo, uMnuz Musa Celani Dumisa, uthe bafe olwembiza ngokudlula emhlabeni kukaThandekile.Uthe kuningi okuhle abekwenza emndenini kanjalo nasebandleni laseSheshi.Uthe indodakazi yakhe ibingumuntu ekubeka eqhulwini ukubona intsha iba nekusasa eliqhakazile.Umncomile ngokuthi usebenzele ibandla ngokuzikhandla nangokuthembeka.NgoLwesine bekukade kukhona inkonzo yakhe yesikhumbuzo eMargate ebikade ihanjelwe nguMbhishobhi uNdwandwe, naye omethulele isigqoko umufi.Amalungu amaningi ebandla amncomile umufi ngegxalaba alifakile ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi zihamba kahle ezezimali ebandleni.USolwazi Bonke Dumisa, onguyise omncane kamufi, uthe bayambonga  uNkulunkulu ngokubabusisa ngohlobo lomuntu omusha obehlakaniphile futhi ebazisaabanye abantu.Uthe uhlobo lwenkonzo aphelezelwa ngayo umufi iwubufakazi bokuthi ubengumuntu onjani.Umlando omfishane kamufi uveza ukuthi amabanga aphansi uwenze eCebolenkosi Pre Primary nasesikoleni Enyanisweni Primary. Wadlulela ePort Shepstone High School. Ubeneziqu zeBusiness Science azithole eNyuvesi yaseKapa. Wase enza neBachelor of Commerce. Ufihlelwe emathuneni ebandla.

INDODANA yomholi webandla lamaJericho, isiqokelwe ekutheni ingene ezicathulweni zikayise ongasekho emhlabeni.USabelo Mhlaba (24) uqokelwe ukuba ahole igatsha laleli bandla eliseNgonyameni ebeliholwa nguyise, uMfu Samuel Mhlaba  ngaphambilini.UMhlaba owayaziwa ngesiphiwo sakhe sokuphulukisa abagulayo usanda kudlula emhlabeni.Waduma kakhulu ngesikhathi kuvela ukuthi uyena owayelapha uZodwa Wabantu.Indodana yakhe ithe izimisele ngokuthi iqhubeke nokuhola leli bandla ngobuqotho njengoba noyise ayekade enza ngaphambilini.Ithe ayifuni ukuthi yenze into uyise angeke aze ayithande nalapho ekhona.Ichaze uyise njengomuntu obemazisa kakhulu uNkulunkulu futhi ewuqhakambisa nomkhuleko."Ngizimisele ngokuthi ngihambe ezinyathelweni zikababa ongizalayo ngokuhola kahle ibandla kanjalo nangendlela yokuziphatha. Angifuni ukuthi ngenze izinto ubaba ayengeke aze azithande ukuba ubesadla anhlamvana,'' usho kanje.Ithe okuseqhulwini kuyona ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ibandla libonakala likhula liba nenqubekela phambili ngaso sonke isikhathi.Okunye okumqoka kakhulu njengamanje uthe ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi konke kubonakala kuhamba kahle ebandleni, kungabi khona ugcobho wokuthi ibandla seliholwa wuyena ekubeni esemncane ngokweminyaka."Kukhona konke engikwenzayo ngithemba uNkulunkulu ukuthi uzoba nami kanjalo nomoya wakhe ubaba lapho ekhona,'' echaza.Uthe ubunye nokusebenzisana phakathi kwamalungu aleli bandla yikhona okuwumgogodla wokuphumelela kwebandla anikezwe umsebenzi wokuba alihole.Ukuvezile ukuthi yena ungena kulesi sigqiki njengebamba. Wathi kuyothi uma umfowabo omncane esekhule ngokwanele bese kuba nguyena ongenayo ekuholeni ibandla njengoba uyise wayefisile esadla anhlamvana.

UNGQONGQOSHE wokuHlunyeleliswa kweziMilo ukhale ngokuthi kuzobambezela ukuthengwa komshini omisa i-signal yamaselula aphathwa iziboshwa ukuncishiswa kwesabelomali somnyango wakhe.UDkt Pieter Groenewald usho kanje emuva kokwethulwa kwesabelomali sikaR87.1 million. Le mali yehle ngoR2.5 billion.Ekhuluma nabeziko lezindaba iNewzroom Afrika, uGroenewald udalule ukuthi kungase kunqindeke nokuqashwa kwabasebenzi abasha abagada iziboshwa.Ukuncishiswa kwesabelomali uthe kuzobambezela ukuthengwa komshini omisa i-signal yamaselula asetshenziswa yiziboshwa kuzobambezela ukuthengwa kwawo.“Sidinga nomshini osezingeni eliphezulu lobuchwepheshe besimanje ozokwenza sinqamule i-signal yamaselula aphathwa yiziboshwa. Asikwazi ukuwuthenga manje kodwa wudaba engizolubika kubaphathi bami,” kusho uGroenewald.Elakuleli lineziboshwa ezingu-156 600 uGroenewald athe kuwumsebenzi ukugadwa kwazo ngakho badinga kwengezwe abasebenzi.Ufuna kuqhanyukwe nezisombululo ekutheni kuzokwenziwa njani ngeziboshwa eziboshelwe amacala amancane, ezinye zazo ezivalelwe ngoba zihluleka wukukhokha ibheyili kaR100.Uthe kudla umnyango awengamele uR400 ukunakekela isiboshwa esisodwa ngosuku ejele.“Zibalelwa ku-60 000 lezi ziboshwa. Ukunciphisa le sibalo kungasiza ekongeni imali nokugcwala okusemajele,” kusho uGroenewald.Ngo-2019 ngesikhathi ekhankasela ukhetho uGroenewald wathi kumele kubuyiswe isigwebo sentambo sinikezwe abasuke belahlwa amacala okubulala. Wathi kumele kuqikelelwe ukuthi abanikwa isigwebo sentambo yibo kanye abenze amacala abasuke belahlwe ngawo.Kodwa useshaya ungqimphothwe uthi kwakuwumbono weqembu iFreedom Front Plus angumengameli walo.Ube esebeka ukuthi wonke umuntu unelungelo lokuphila.“Abantu abaqala le nto yesigwebo sentambo nokuyinto engahlangene nomnyango wami futhi engahambisani noMthethosisekelo wezwe. UChapter 2 ucacisa ngamalungelo abantu, ukuthi wonke umuntu unelungelo lokuphila,” kusho uGroenewald engeza ngokuthi akakwazi ukubuyisa isigwebo sentambo.

UFUNGISWE maqede wayokwanga umkakhe washaya nesinqandu uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ngoLwesithathu ezindlini zoMbuso ePitoli.Kudume ihlombe ngesikhathi uRamaphosa obeqeda ukuzibophezela ukuthi uzohlonipha yonke imithetho yezwe ngesikhathi efungiswa yinhloko yamaJaji kuleli uRaymond Zondo, efika kunkosikazi wakhe uDkt Tshepo Ramaphosa, wafike wamanga, wambamba ngesandla wase emqabula. Lo mcimbi ubuhanjelwe izinkumbi zabantu bakuleli, abebelokhu befike ekuseni bequngela amakhaza abeshubisa umnkantsha.Kuthe kungaphakama ilanga zaqala ukutheleka izicukuthwane ebezithamele umcimbi wokugcotshwa kukaRamaphosa.Phakathi kwabantu abebekhona kubalwa ababengomengameli bezwe lakuleli, abebekhashwe amakhosikazi abo.Abebekhona kubalwa oMnuz Thabo Mbeki, Kgalema Motlanthe kanjalo nababengamaphini omengameli okubalwa oMnuz David Mabuza, Paul Mashatile, Nkk Phumzile Mlambo-Ngcuka, uSomlomo wePhalamende uNkk Thoko Didiza obehamba nowakwakhe kanjalo nowayenguSomlomo uNksz Baleka Mbete.Bekuhlangene nemihlathi eyalanayo njengoba bekukhona abaholi bamaqembu ahlukene ezepolitiki, amalungu ePhalamende, oNdunankulu bezifundazwe, amakhosi ahlukene okubalwa neSilo samaZulu uMisuzulu kaZwelithini, iNgonyama yaseSwatini uMswati III, nabaholi bamazwe ase-Afrika okubalwa owaseZimbabwe uMnuz Emmerson Dambudzo Mnangagwa, owaseNamibia uMnuz Nangolo Mbumba, owaseBurundi uMnuz Gervais Ndirakobuca nePhini likaMengameli waseCuba uMnuz Salvador Mesa, nabanye.Umholi we-EFF uMnuz Julius Malema ubengekho njengoba ehamba icala lokuqhumisa isibhamu e-Eastern Cape elenzeka ngesikhathi leli qembu ligubha iminyaka emihlanu.Amalungu eqembu eliholwa owayengumengameli wezwe uJacob Zuma, Umkhonto weSizwe, abevele ekuvezile ukuthi ngeke awuhambele lo mcimbi.UZuma selokhu akhishwa ekuholeni izwe akakaze ayihambele imicimbi yokugcotshwa kukaRamaphosa.Okhulumela iMK uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndhlela, utshele Isolezwe ukuthi bebengeke bawuhambele lo mcimbi ngoba babuthatha njengento engekho ubuholi bukaRamaphosa.Ukhale ngokuthi kwaba nomkhonyovu emiphumeleni yokhetho ngakho bebengeke bathamele ukufungiswa komuntu ongeyena umengameli.Umphakathi ujabulele umculo wamaciko ahlukene okubalwa uSjava, ama-piano njengoba bekukhona noDJ Maphorisa noYoung Stunna, umculo weMzansi National Philharmonic Orchestra. Abanye abekebhona kubalwa uKabza D Small, DJ Lamiez, PJ Powers, Vicky Sampson noMakhadzi.

KUSOLWA isikhwele sokungafuni ukwaliwa kowesilisa obengusingababa oboshelwe icala lokubulala ingane yentombazane eneminyaka emibili, isidumbu sayo wasilahla egcekeni kubo kwayo.Isigameko sokubulawa kuka-Ayabonga Mthethwa senzeke eSiqungeni, eMthwalume ngoMgqibelo ebusuku.Umsolwa okuthiwa ungumakhelwane kamufi, uboshwe ngeSonto ekuseni wathweswa icala lokubulala.Ngokusho kukanina omncane ka-Ayabonga, uNksz Anele Mthethwa, umsolwa ufike kuyena ngosuku lwesigameko wathi uzothatha ingane uthunywe wunina wayo bahlezi naye kwamakhelwane.Uthe unina wengane ubekade engekho ekhaya ngaleso sikhathi esezindaweni zobumnandi.Lona wesifazane uqhube wathi uvumile ukuthi umsolwa ahambe nengane engazi ukuthi uyamkhohlisa akathunywanga unina wayo obesebumnandini.“Ngibe sengifonelwa unina wengane engibuza ukuthi ingane ikuphi? Ngamtshela ukuthi ithathwe umsolwa,” kusho uNksz Mthethwa.Kuthiwa unina wengane ube esefonela amaphoyisa wabiza nabekomiti elilwa nobugebengu emphakathini.Ngaleso sikhathi kubikwa ukuthi umsolwa ubefonela ephindelela unina wengane emtshela ukuthi ingane ikuyena.Lendoda kuthiwa ishayele unina wengane ucingo lokugcina imazisa ukuthi isiyibulele ingane, yayilahla ehlathini nokuthe kunikelwa khona, kanti udukisa umkhondo.Usale wayilahla egcekeni eduzane kwethangi lamanzi, isidumbu wasimboza ngobhavu.“Ingane ibiyiyona nje, asazi uyibulale kanjani ngoba ibingenazo izimpawu zokuklinywa noma izibazi emzimbeni.“Sithe uma sibheka ngaphakathi emlonyeni, ubumhlophe esisola ukuthi mhlampe uyicwilise emanzini noma uyivale ngethawula emlonyeni eyincisha umoya,” kusho uNksz Mthethwa.Uqhube wathi unina ka-Ayabonga nomsolwa bahlukane ngoFebhuwari nonyaka, ubekade esenesoka elisha.Udalule nokuthi uyise kamufi abamazi ukuziphi izinkalo, ukhonjwa oShabeni, bagcina ukumbona ngo-2022 okuwunyaka okwazalwa ngawo ingane.Udalule ukuthi bathole ucingo kuyise wengane wathi uzwile ukuthi ingane ishonile futhi uyeza.Uchaze ubudlelwane bukadadewabo nomsolwa ngaphambi kokuthi bahlukane njengobebumuncu.“Umsolwa ubenesikhwele kanti ekupheleni kukaMashi umgqeme izingozi ezimbili ekhanda, sekungokwesibili emshaya.“Wamshaya emuva kokuthi ethole ukuthi udadewethu usenesoka elisha,” kusho uNksz Mthethwa.Uchaze umsolwa njengomuntu obheke phansi, ombuka umethembe obungeke umcabangele ukuthi angabulala ingane ngoba naye unezakhe zabafana ezimbili ezisencane.Ufuna inkantolo incishe umsolwa ibheyili futhi imgixabeze ngodilikajele.UNksz Nombuso Sibisi ongusihlalo wenhlangano elwela abesifazane nezingane, iWomen of Mthwalume uthe sibashaqisile isenzo sikamsolwa.“Singomama eMthwalume sithukile ngesenzo sika (egagula igama likamsolwa). Umthetho uzothatha indawo yawo athole isigwebo esimfanele,” kusho uNksz Sibisi.Ube eseyala abantu besifazane wathi abaqhele ebudlelwaneni bezothando obungebuhle futhi abahlukunyezwayo kubona.Uthe alikho ithuna lomuntu ongajoli kodwa maningi awabantu ababulawe emjolweni.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Robert Netshiunda uthe kuboshwe owesilisa oneminyaka engu-34.Ubekwe icala lokuthumba nelokubulala futhi uzovela eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMzumbe maduze.UNetshiunda uthe kusolakala ukuthi ngoMgqibelo umsolwa nonina wengane babe nengxabano elandelwe wukuthi athumbe ingane kwaphetha ngokuthi ayibulalele kubo.

KUVELA ukuthi ushadelwe futhi unezingane ezimbili azishiye nenkosikazi yakhe emakhaya eXobho, owesilisa othweswe uxhaxha lwamacala okudlwengula abantu besifazane ehostela eGlebelands eMlaza.UMnuz Khethani Khuboni (31) uvele okokuqala eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMlaza ngoLwesine kanti ubonakale efake indandatho emunweni.Ubhekene namacala angu-18 okudlwengula abantu besifazane abehlukene esebenzisa indlela efanayo.UMbuso ungase wengeze amanye amacala okungawokuthumba nawokuphanga uma esecela ibheyili ngenyanga ezayo.Umsolwa uboshwe ngesikabhadakazi ngoLwesibili endlini amaphoyisa athe ubebhace kuyona ehostela eGlebelands, eMlaza.Kuthiwa uKhuboni ubefunwa amaphoyisa kodwa isehlakalo sokudlwengula, okuthiwa senzeke ngempelasonto, yisona esiholele ekuboshweni kwakhe.Umshushisi uMnuz Khulekani Mzotho usho zisuka wathi uMbuso uzosiphikisa isicelo sebheyili sikaKhuboni.Uthe lokhu bakwenza ngenhloso yokuphephisa abagilwa abamangalele uKhuboni“Iningi labagilwa, bonke okungabantu besifazane, liyamazi umsolwa. Kukholakala ukuthi umsolwa ubekade esebenzisa izindlela eziningi ezihlukene eyenga ngazo abagilwa bese eyabadlwengula,” kusho uMzotho.Emuva kokuthi imantshi ifundele uKhuboni uhla lwamacala asolwa ngawo nokuthi wawenza nini, le ndoda ibe isidlana indlebe nommeli wayo wamahhala.Ummeli utshele inkantolo ukuthi uyalelwe uKhuboni ukuthi ufuna ukucela ibheyili.Isolezwe lihoshe ngomthombo walo ukuthi uKhuboni akasebenzi, uhlala ehostela futhi ushadelwe unezingane ezzimbili eXobho. Ehostela kuthiwa ubehlala nentombi Isolezwe elithole ukuthi ikhulelwe. Kuthiwa ubefike ayenge abesifazane bese eyabadlwengula  abaphange amaselula abo.Enkantolo kuvele ukuthi icala lokuqala lenzeka ngoDisemba 11, 2021. Usolwa ngokudlwengula abesifazane ababili ngosuku olulodwa ngoDisemba ngonyaka odlule. UKhuboni usolwa ngokudlwengula abesifazane abathathu kule nyanga  kanti kuthiwa wadlwengula oyedwa ngenyanga efanayo ngonyaka odlule.Beyibukeka izikhululekele le ndoda ebifaswe ngozankosi ngesikhathi iqhutshwa amaphoyisa iphuma nangesikhathi ibuyiselwa esitokisini. Ngisho eseshuthwa ubengazifihli ubuso kodwa ezifakele isigqoko asikhumule esengaphakathi enkantolo. Ngaphakathi enkantolo bekukhona owesifazane abonakale ekhuluma naye esephuma enkantolo baze bahambisana baze bakhuzwa amaphoyisa ukwathiwa owesifazane akabuyele eceleni.Owesifazane ubebonakala ekhathazekile, yize bekungacaci ukuthi ubefunani kumsolwa kodwa kubonakale sengathi bebengavumelani enkulumeni yabo. Isolezwe lithole ngomthombo walo ukuthi abanye abagilwa ubebaheha ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Ngaphambi kokuthi aboshwe kuthiwa utholwe neselula yowesifazane amaphoyisa aveze ukuthi ubemdlwengule ngeSonto ebusuku. Umbiko wamaphoyisa uveze ukuthi owesifazane uqale ukuxhumana naye kwi-internet base bexoxa bavumelana ngokuthi bazohlangana. Sebehlangana baya enkundleni esehostela eGlebe lapho umsolwa kuthiwa waba nodlame wadlwengula owesifazane. Emuva kwesigameko umsolwa wathatha iselula kamgilwa wamnika i-sim card yakhe. Icala lihlehliselwe uSepthemba 5 nonyaka ukuze acele ibheyili.

KULALWE ngeSonto kuzalele ihlokohloko ezinkundleni zezindaba kulandela ukukhonjwa indlela kowayengumengameli we-ANC nezwe, uMnuz Jacob Zuma.UZuma uphelelwe ubulungu bakhe be-ANC emva kokuthi ikomiti elibhekele ukuqondisa ubugwegwe linqume ukuba asulwe njengelungu lale nhlangano.Kulesi sinqumo obekunqakiswana ngaso ezinkundleni zokuxhumana izolo ebusuku, uZuma unikwe izinsuku ezingu-21 ukuthi afake isimangalo sokuphikisana naso. Kulesi sinqumo kuvele ukuthi uxoshwe ngenxa yokusebenzisana neqembu Umkhonto weSizwe Party awumholi walo.UZuma umemezele ngoDisemba nyakenye, ukuthi ujoyina leli qembu. Ubelokhu emile ukuthi nakuba eyilungu laleli qembu kodwa usayilungu le-ANC. Ugcine esememezela ukuthi usengumholi we-MK.I-MK ibhincisele nxanye amaqembu amaningi okhethweni okubalwa i-ANC eyehlise ukwesekwa kwayo. KwaZulu-Natal yathola izihlalo eziningi.EPhalamende likazwelonke iyiqembu eliphikisayo, kwadingeka ukuthi i-ANC isebenzisane namanye amaqembu okubalwa i-DA, IFP, UDM namanye ukubumba uhulumeni.I-ANC yahlehlisa uhlelo lokuqondisa ubugwegwe kukaZuma kuze kudlule ukhetho. Le nhlangano yathi ifuna ukulandela yonke imigudu efanele odabeni oluthinta uZuma.UNobhala we-ANC, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, ubelibeka ngembaba ukuthi uZuma uzixoshe yena ngokuphumela obala akhankasele elinye iqembu.Kushaye isikhathi sokushicilela i-ANC ne-MK bengakaphawuli ngokuxoshwa kukaZuma.

UZIBOPHEZELE ekuholeni ibandla likaNkulunkulu ngokwezimiso zebandla, uMfu Sihle Lancelot Dlamini obegcotshelwa kwesokuhola igatsha le-United Congregational Church of Southern Africa (UCCSA), eliseBotha's Hill.Leli gatsha lingaphansi kwesiFunda iKwaZulu Natal, sona esingaphansi kweSynod yaseNingizimu Afrika.UDlamini ubekade egcotshwa kwindumezulu yenkonzo yaleli bandla ebiseNanda muva nje.Inkonzo beyiqhutshwa nguMfu KT Ngema ongumholi waleli baandla kwisifunda saKwaZulu Natal.Uqale ngokubuza amalungu aleli bandla aseBothas Hill ukuthi ayakuqinisekisa yini ukuthi ayamvumela uDlamini ukuba abe umholi webandla."Nina malungu aleli bandla laseBothas Hill ngabe niyamvuma yini uMfundisi Dlamini ukuba abe ngumelusi wenu na? Niyamamukela egameni leNkosi Jesu Kristu na?,'' ubuze kanje.Uqhubekile walibuza ibandla ukuthi lizohlanganyela kanye noDlamini yini kukho konke okuthinta umsebenzi webandla ukuze uqhubeke uye phambili.Kusukume yonke indlu yasho ukuthi iyavuma ukuholwa nguDlamini.UNgema ube esegcizelela ukubaluleka kwezintshumayelo ebandleni likaNkulunkulu ethi kumele kusetshenziswe zona ukuguqula ukucabanga nokwenza komuntu.Umenzise izifungo wase emyala ngokuthi ahambe ngokucophelela ohambeni  lokuhola ibandla.Esephetha uNgema unxuse abefundisi asebephambili kuleli bandla ukuthi makungabi yibona abajika benze ukusebenza kukaDlamini kube lukhuni satshe.UDlamini wenze isibophezelo ngesikhathi egcotshwa sokuthi konke uzokwenza ngendlela efanele, esizwa nguNkulunkulu."Ngizibophezele ekutheni konke ngikwenze ngendlela ekahle. Konke ngizobe ngikwenza ngiholwa uNkululunkulu,'' usho kanje.UMfu BG Swartz onguNobhala Jikelele kwiSynod yaseNingizimu Afrika naye ube namazwi abewabhekise kuDlamini.Ulibongelile ibandla ngokuthola uDlamini njengomholi walo.

YIZE sesingcono kakhulu isimo sokuphehlwa kukagesi eNingizimu Afrika njengoba sekuphele izinsuku eziwu-124 ugesi unganqamuki kodwa ezinye izindawo zizocinyelwa ugesi ukuze kuvikelwe ingqalasizinda.Usho kanje uNgqongqoshe wezikaGesi, uDkt Kgosientsho Ramokgopa, izolo, ngesikhathi echaza ngesimo sikagesi ezweni.URamokgopa uthe ukunganqamuki umlibe kukagesi kwenziwa wuMnuz Bheki Nxumalo nethimba lakhe labaphathi beziteshi, eliqinisekisa ukuthi imishini isebenza kahle.“Isimo sokunganqamuki kukagesi isikhathi eside kanjena sagcina ukusibona eminyakeni eyisithupha edlule, kwakuwuJulayi ka-2018. Sinogesi owu-70% njengamanje, ngonyaka odlule kwakukhona owu-55%. Izinhlelo zokushintsha isimo zihamba kahle kakhulu kodwa zisekhona izingqinamba,” kusho uRamokgopa.Uveze ukuthi bayonga nasezindlekweni zikadizili ngoba kusasebenze okaR3 billion kulo nyaka ekubeni ngonyaka odlule kwase kusebenze okaR9 billion ngesikhathi esifanayo.Uthe lokhu kuzosiza ekwehliseni izindleko zikagesi ngoba indlela onyuka ngayo ilawulwa nayizindleko zokuwuphehla.Ubuye wachaza ukuthi yize uhlelo lokucima ugesi lumile kodwa kunezindawo ezicishelwayo amahora ambalwa ukuze kuvikelwe ingqalasizinda.“Uhlelo lwe-load reduction okuwukucinywa kukagesi ukuze kuphole imishini ewusabalalisayo, luyaqhubeka. Lokhu kwenziwa wukuthi uma singawucishi ingqalasizinda ewusabalalisayo njengama-transformer nokunye kuzosha bese abantu bengabi nawo ugesi izinyanga.”Ukhale ngokuthi lolu hlelo lwenzeka ezindaweni zabampofu ngoba kwesinye isikhathi kusuke kuwukuthi abantu bakhe izindlu zemiqasho noma kwande imijondolo endaweni.Ubalule ukuthi imishini ayisafi njalo kanti nohlelo lokuyikhanda luqhubeka kahle.“Iziteshi zethu ziwuphehla kahle kakhulu ugesi, lapha sibala iKusile, Medupi, Matla, Matimba, ezinogesi owu-70% ophehlwayo. ILethabo nayo yenza kahle njengoba ugesi uku-60% ngisho isiteshi sethu esidala, esineminyaka ewu-50 sisebenza, iGrootvlei, senza kahle.”Uthe lokhu kuwubufakazi bokuthi noma ngabe isiteshi sikagesi sidala kangakanani kodwa uma ingqalasizinda yaso inakekelwa sizoqhubeka nokusebenza.Uthe bahlela ukusebenzisana neSouth African Local Government Association (Salga) neNersa ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ugesi awumbi eqolo.

UNOBHALA Jikelele we-EFF, uMnuz Marshall Dlamini, ukholelwa ukuthi kuzobuya ngamandla ukucishwa kukagesi emva kokhetho.UDlamini uthe ukucishwa kukagesi kumiswe ngoba nakhu sekusondele ukhetho lwangenyanga ezayo.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ehola umbhikisho wokukhalaza ngezinkinga zikagesi namanzi obulubhekise emahhovisi oMasipala waseMsunduzi, obungoLwesihlanu.Ngonyaka owedlule nasekuqaleni kwalonyaka, inkinga yokucishwa kukagesi iye ngokukhula, izwe belifakwa ngaphansi kwezigaba ezahlukene zokucishwa kukagesi.Mumva nje le nkinga isathule, cishe sukuyophela inyanga ugesi ungacishwa.UDlamini uthe ukungacishwa kukagesi izinsuku zilandelana akusho ukuthi le nkinga isiphelile.“Into eyenziwayo manje ukuthi ugesi uphehlwa kusetshenziswa udizili. Udizili uthengwa phesheya. Udizili uyabiza, akuyona into ongayenza ingunaphakade. Siyazi ukuthi emva kokhetho bazophinde bawucishe ugesi. Le nto bayenzele ukhetho. Kufanele bengadlali ngathi, siyazi ukuthi ugesi usazocishwa.“Le nto bayenza nangesikhathi kuneNdebe yoMhlaba yebhola lombhoxo. Basitshela ukuthi sebeyiqedile inkinga yokucishwa kukagesi. Lokhu babekusho ngoba nakhu besaba abelungu. Ugesi wabuye wacishwa emva kweNdebe yoMhlaba.”UDlamini uthe le mali okuthengwa ngayo udizili wokuphehla ugesi izokhokhwa abantu bakuleli.“La mabillion amaRandi abathenga ngawo udizili azokhokhwa ithina uma sebenyusa amanani okudla, kuzokhuphuka nezokuthutha.”UDlamini uthe uMasipala waseMsunduzi uyehluleka ukuhlinzeka abantu ngogesi.Uthe sekuze kwavalwa nezinkampani ngenxa yokwehluleka komkhandlu ukuhlinzeka abantu ngogesi.“Abantu sebeze balahlekelwa imisebeni ngenxa yokwehluleka kwalo masipala.”UDlamini uthe bazobakhipha bonke abantu abahluleka ukwenza umsebenzi mhla bathatha lo mkhandlu.“Emva kokhetho siyabuya sizobheka ukuthi ngabe bonke abasebenzi bakulo masipala banazo yini iziqu ezifanele? Sifuna ukuthi bonke abasebenzi basikhombise ukuthi baqashwa ngendlela efanele. Bazokuba senkingeni labo abaqashwa ngendlela engekho emthethweni.“Ukuqashwa kwabantu abangawufanele umsebenzi ikhona okwenza ukuthi kube nzima ukuhambisa izidingo kubantu ngoba abantu abaqashiwe basuke bengawazi umsebenzi abawuqashelwe.”UDlamini uthe abakungabazi ukuthi bazonqoba iKwaZulu-Natal okhethweni oluzayo.“Laba abangabaphathiswa bazophelelwa umsebenzi ngoMeyi 29. Kuzophela ukupepenyeka ngezimoto zikahulumeni. Bazobuya bezofuna izindlu zomxhaso ngoba siyazi ukuthi imali bayiphuza utshwala, abanalutho. Asiqhubekeni nomkhankaso wethu, kuyathembisa ukuthi sizonqoba.”

UQALE waba yinhlekisa kubantu evela emaqenjini ehlukene egqoke nezikibha zawo ngesikhathi ethula imihlahlandlela yokhetho. Muva nje ugcine ephenduka usaziwayo, waba yintandokazi kwabaningi  ngokuhambela yonke imihlahlandlela yamaqembu. Ubengakhethi qembu njengoba ebebonakala ngemifaniswano yawo uma kunomhlahlandlela walelo qembu. Lokhu kumbeke ebalazweni uThembeka Dliwako (22) waseHoneyville, eMgungundlovu nowenza unyaka wesibili ezifundweni zeHuman Resources Management, eMnambithi TVET College. Le ntokazi esencane igcine isibangwa ngisho amaqembu abefuna ukugqama ngokuthi kukhona yona kumhlahlandlela wawo. Ngaphezu kwegama lakhe lokuzalwa likaThembeka, ugcine esethiwa amagama amaningi njengoba edume ngelikaNomaRally kanti ekuqaleni wayebizwa ngeNdlondlo yaseMabhida ngenxa yokubonakala kwimihlahlandlela yamaqembu epolitiki ebiba kule nkundla yezemidlalo eseThekwini. UTHOKOZANI NDLOVU uxoxe nale ntokazi ukuthola ukuthi iphatheka kanjani  ngoshintsho empilweni yayo nangomuzwa wayo ngokhetho lwalo nyaka.THOKOZANI NDLOVU (TN): Ngabe likhona iqembu lepolitiki ogcine uthathe isinqumo sokuthi uzolivotela, kungani ukhethe lona?THEMBEKA DLIWAKO (TD):Yebo likhona iqembu engizolivotela. Noma ngingeke ngilidalule kodwa izithembiso zalo zikhombise ukugxila kakhulu ekunakekeleni thina njengabafundi njengoba ziziningi izinkinga esibhekene nazo nokuvula amathuba omsebenzi. TN: Kukhona ongakuphawula ngemikhankaso eqhubekayo yamaqembu epolitiki?TD: Engikuqaphelile ukuthi inselelo ibe nkulu kakhulu emaqenjini epolitiki njengoba wonke ekhombise ukuzimisela efuna ukunqoba ukhetho.TN:Uveze ukuthi iqembu ozolivotela liqhakambise ukuthi lizoninakekela njengabafundi, kukhona ongakuveza obona ukuthi aninakekelwe kukho njengabafundi?TD: Ngikhuluma nawe nje kuvele kwavaleka imali yethu yeNSFAS sangakwazi nokuthenga ukudla esikoleni. Okubuhlungu akukho esitshelwa khona ngokuthi kwenzekeni.TN:Usuhambe izindawo eziningi ngenxa yamaqembu epolitiki, ngabe amaqembu abezikhokhela izindleko zakho zokuya kwimihlahlandlela yokhetho?TD:Ngiqale ngeza ngamabhasi amahhala abesuke ehlelwe ukuthi athuthe abantu ebayisa kwimihlahlandlela, kodwa muva kushintshile lokho. Amaqembu abengiyisa emicimbini yawo ngokukhethekile engigibelisa ngisho nebhanoyi okuyinto engiqale ukuyigibela ngawo, ngiphinde ngibhukhelwe nendawo yokulala, kanti nasemicimbini bengiba yingxenye yezicukuthwane. Akugcinanga lapho njengoba kugcine sekuba nemali engiholelwa yona ngokuza emicimbini yawo.TN:Ezintweni ezithenjiswe amaqembu yikuphi okukuchaze kakhulu kuwona ethula imihlahlandlela yokhetho?TD: Iningi lawo belikhuluma into ecishe ifane kodwa obekugqama ukuthi wonke athembisa amathuba omsebenzi ukunyusa imali yezibonelelo nohlelo lwabafundi baka-matric abazoqeqeshwa ukuze baqasheke.TN:Uzovotela kuphi?TD: Ngizovotela eMnambithi  lapho ngibhalise khona.TN: Njengoba usudumile unjani umuzwa wakho ngodumo?TD: Ngizizwa ngijabule kakhulu kodwa ekuqaleni benginokwesaba ngoba ngiqale ngahlekwa. Okunye ukuthi sekunzima ukuphila impilo ngokukhululeka ngenxa yokwaziwa. Yonke indawo lapho ngiqhamuka khona abantu bayangijabulela bafune nokushutha nami ngigcine ngingakwazanga ukwenza engisuke ngifuna ukukwenza.TN:Njengoba kudlula ukhetho zithini izinhlelo ngempilo yakho?TD:Ukuzibandakanya namaqembu epolitiki kuveze  okunye ngempilo yami ngathola ukuthi nginekhono lokuphatha uhlelo emicimbini. Emva kokhetho ngizogxila ekuphatheini izinhlelo emicimbini. Kumanje ukhona umcimbi kamaskandi ozoba ngoJuni 16 engizobe ngiphethe kuwona.TN: Uhambile kakhulu namaqembu epolitiki, uyazibona ungusopolitiki ngelinye ilanga?TD:Noma ikanjani futhi ngingakujabulela ukuba wusopolitiki ngelinye ilanga, futhi yinto engiyifuna kakhulu.TN: Izikibha zamaqembu ehlukene obuzigqoka emicimbini ehlukene uzozigcina noma uzozishisa?TD: Ngeke ngizishise ngizozigcina. Zizohlala ziyisikhumbuzo ngomlando wami nepolitiki. Ngisho sengimdala ngiyafisa ukuzikhombisa abantwana bami babone ukuthi ngaduma ngenxa yazo. Okunye ukuthi impahla ayishiswa.TN: Uzobe uqala ukuvota? Ungathini kubantu abathi ngeke bavote?TD: Yebo ngizobe ngiqala. Kubantu ngithi abaphume bayovotela amaqembu abawathandayo. Ukungavoti kwabo kuzobe kusho ukuthi abalufuni ushintsho, kuzokwenzeka izinto abangazithandi bangabi nendawo abazokhala kuyona.Yize elifihlile iqembu azolivotela uThembeka kodwa emva kwayo yonke imihlahlandlela ugcine esebonakala eziyamanisa kakhulu ne-Action SA. Nogaqele esikaNdunankulu wakwaZulu-Natal kwi-Action SA, uZwakele Mncwango uyabonakala esebenzisana noNomaRally ezintweni eziningi zaleli qembu.

UMMELI wabamangalewa ecaleni lokufa kukaSenzo Meyiwa, u-Advocate Thulani Mngomezulu, usole umholi wabaphenyi uBrigadier Bongani Gininda, ngokunyanyalata nokuqamba amanga.UMeyiwa owayeyintandokazi kanozinti we-Orlando Pirates neBafana Bafana, wadutshulwa wabulawa ekubo kwentombi yakhe uKelly Khumalo ngo2014. Kushushiswa abalisa abahlanu okuthiwa yibona abathengwa ukuthi baqede ngaye.UMbuso umi ngezitatimende othi zabhalwa zasayinwa ngabamangalelwa ngesikhathi begeqa amagula ngeqhaza labo ekufeni kukaMeyiwa. Abameli babamangalewa bafake isicelo sokuthi zichithwe izitatimende ngoba abamangalelwa baphoqwa ukuthi bazibhale.UMbuso ushaya phansi ngonyawo uthi izitatimende kufanele zibe yingxenye yobufakazi obuzobhekwa ngoba abamangalelwa bazihlambulukela bona bengaphoqwe ngumuntu. Izinhlangoti zombili zenza izethulo phambi kwejaji.UMbuso uqedile ukwenza izethulo kwase kuba yithuba labameli ukuthi babeke awabo amaphuzu. Kulapho-ke ummeli uMngomezulu esole khona umphenyi ngokuqamba amanga ukuze athole incwadi egunyaza ukuboshwa kwabamangalelwa.“UGininda nakuba enesipiliyoni seminyaka emsebenzini kodwa akenzanga kahle. Waqamba amanga ukuze athole incwadi yokubopha abamangalelwa. Akashongo encwadini ukuthi bakuphi, amakheli ayengabhaliwe. Incwadi ayisebenzisa ukubabopha yatholakala ngokungemthetho,’’ kubeka uMngomezulu.Ukhale ngokuthi kubukeka sengathi uGininda wayengazi ukuthi bangaki abantu afuna ukubabopha.“Nkosi yenkantolo khona lapho okubhalwe ukuthi abamangalelwa bayisihlanu, ajike athi bayisithupha. Phathaphatha usekhuluma ngoKelly Khumalo athi nguyena owabaqasha. Kufike kuthiwe kwakubanjwa inkunzi khona lapho futhi kwakungabantu abathengiwe, kuyadida nje,’’ kusho uMngomezulu.UMngomezulu uthi iphoyisa uWarrant Officer Meshack Makhubo, lishilo ukuthi amaphoyisa aphikisana aze ahlukana phakathi ngokwakumele baboshwe. Uthe kukodwa nje lokho kuyakhomba ukuthi kunenkinga.UMngomezulu ucelele abamangalelwa ukuthi ubufakazi babo buthathwe njengeqiniso uma sekubhekwa isinqumo. IJaji Ratha Makgotlheng likhiphe imiqingo yamafayela lathi lizobheka konke uma selinquma.Ijaji lithe lifunde amakhasi angaphezu kuka-5 000 ukuze lithathe isinqumo esifanele. Kulindeleke ukuthi icala libuyele enkantolo ngoMsombuluko.

UGOBE uphondo wasula ePhalamende owayenguNgqongqoshe wezeMidlalo, ubuCiko nezokuNgcebeleka kuleli uMnuz Zizi Kodwa.UKodwa usula emva kokuba ezinye izinhlangano bezikuchitha ukuba khona kwakhe ePhalamende njengelungu lekomiti leMfundo eyisiSekelo.Usula nje ungaphandle ngebheyili kaR30 000 ngamacala enkohlakalo. Unobhala jikelele we-ANC uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, wamukele incwadi yokusula kukaKodwa.Ibamba lomkhulumeli we-ANC uMnuz Zuko Godlimpi, lithe uKodwa uthumele le ncwadi ngoLwesithathu, waveza ukuthi usula ngokushesha.UGodlimpi uthe i-ANC ikwamukele ukusula kukaKodwa wathi bamfisela okuhle kodwa. UKodwa nosomabhizinisi uMnuz Jehan Mackay, babuyela enkantolo ngenyanga ezayo ngalawa macala.UMackay usolwa ngokugwazela uKodwa ngo-R1.68 million ngesikhathi esawumkhulumeli we-ANC, ukuze amcubuzele amagabadi kwithenda yezobuchwepheshe ayefake isicelo kuyona.Kuthiwa le mali yakhokhela indawo yomntakabani ayevakashele kuyona eKapa phakathi kuka-2015 no-2016. Babuyela enkantolo ngo-Agasti 21. UKodwa wasula ekubeni ngungqongqoshe emuva kokubekwa la macala.Wafungiswa njengelungu lePhalamende ekubeni umgomo we-ANC ukubeka kucace ukuthi ababhekene namacala kumele bahoxe baze batholwe bemsulwa yizinkantolo.Ibigxekwa i-ANC ngokuthi ikhetha iphela emasini uma kuziwa emgomeni wokuhoxa kwamalungu abhekene namacala njengoba owayengunobhala jikelele we-ANC uMnuz Ace Magashule, wasuswa kulesi sikhundla ngoba esahamba amacala enkohlakalo enzeka ngesikhathi esangundunankulu waseFree State. Ngisho neCosatu ike yakhala ngokujutshwa kukaKodwa ePhalamende, yathi lokhu kubuyisela emuva imizamo yokuzakha kabusha kwale nhlangano.

UBHOBOKE ngokuhlukumezeka nokuncishwa ucansi kwakhe emendweni unkosikazi welungu lePhalamende obekuthiwa udukile.UNkk Simenyiwe MaDlomo Zondo, ogane ilungu le-IFP, uMnuz Sanele Zondo, ugeqe amagula kwi-Instagram ngezinkinga abhekene nazo emshadweni wakhe athi ubesenezinyanga ezine kuphela ekuwo. UNkk Zondo wenze izinsolo zokuthi umyeni wakhe uyamshaya, akamnaki, nokuthi ufuna ukuthatha unkosikazi wesithathu okuthiwa uzomlobola ngenyanga ezayo njengoba sekuphume nosuku lomcimbi.UNkk Zondo wenza le nkulumo nje, izolo bese kuphele izinsuku ezinhlanu kubikwe ukuthi udukile. UZondo nabakwaDlomo bathi bagcina ukuxhumana naye ngoLwesihlanu.Izolo, uNkk Zondo uveze ukuthi izinto ziqale ukuba muncu kubuya unkosikazi omdala owayesehambile.Uthe ngesikhathi egana umyeni wakhe wamtshembisa izulu nomhlaba kodwa esefika emzini izinto zashintsha.Uthi ubemhlukumeza, wathi wake wamshaya waze wabulala ngisho iselula yakhe.“Umbhede ebengilala kuwo ubufile phakathi nendawo, mina ngigana wayethe ekhaya uzongakhela indlu kodwa ngafika ngangena endlini karondo engiyifanisa nehhoko lezinkukhu. Ucingo bengingenalo, ngathi ngimcela ukuthi angithengele wathi uzokwenza lokho. Kukhona isikhathi la abengasanginiki khona ngisho imali yokuthenga ukudla. Lo muntu wangiyekisa ukudayisa kanjalo nokufuna umsebenzi,” kubeka uNkk Zondo.Uthe esigamekweni angeke asikhohlwe ila aya khona ngenkani endlini uZondo alala khona yedwa ngoba sekukudala alugcina ucansi.“Ngashada naye mina ngiyintombi nto. Ngafike ngangena engubeni wangangenza lutho kodwa ngaba nethemba lokuthi ekuseni kukhona okuzokwenzeka. Kwathi ngezithuba zehora lisihlanu kwakhala ucingo lwakhe nokwathi eqeda kuluphendula wathi angiphume endlini yakhe. Ngazama ukuziba nokuyilapho angishaya khona waze wangikhipha ngomnyango. Ngamtshela ukuthi ngiya emaphoyiseni, uZondo wagijima kuqala waya emaphoyiseni, wawatshela ukuthi ngimshayile,” kuchaza yena.UNkk Zondo uthe icala lagcina lingavulwanga njengoba udaba baluxoxa lwaphela. Muva nje, uthi uNkk Zondo uthe uhamba ezwa ngabantu ukuthi umyeni wakhe umhlukumeza kanjena nje ingoba efuna ukuthatha unkosikazi wesithathu.“Nginezinyanga ezine ngishadile. Ngicela ukubuza ukuthi wake welanywa yini umuntu onezinyanga ezine eshadile?”Ngale kokuba yilungu lePhalamende, uZondo uphinde abe usihlalo wophiko lwentsha kwi-IFP, i-IFP Youth Brigade.UNkk Zondo uthe umyeni wakhe akafanelwe ukuphatha isikhundla esingaka.“Uma mina ngizokuba nendoda ewumholi eyazi ukuthi umfazi uyashaywa, nithi akathini entsheni? Ayihole athini? Intsha le esikhuluma ngayo, ikusasa lesizwe? Abantu abasha ibona abazokuba abaholi bakusasa. Uma nithi abantu abasha abaholwe umuntu owazi ukuthi umfazi uyahlukunyezwa, uyashawa, akondliwa, nithi akathini entsheni?”UNkk Zondo uveze ukuthi umyeni wakhe ubenqaba ukumondla, emnqabela ukuthi asebenze, nokuthi wehluleka ukufeza isethembiso sokumakhela umuzi.Ubaba kaNkk Zondo, uMnuz Nkosinathi Dlomo, unqabile ukuphawula ngalolu daba, wathi ufuna ukuthi kube nomhlangano wemindeni.UZondo yena uthe uzobiza isithangami nabezindaba, lapho athe khona uzophawula khona ngalolu daba.

OWAYENGUNGQONGQOSHE wezamaBhizinisi kaHulumeni, uMnuz Pravin Gordhan, ubalise ‘ngogombela kwesakhe’ athe bayazitamuzela ezimalini zomphakathi enkulumweni yakhe yokugcina ebhalwe phansi.UGordhan uthe ogombela kwesakhe bayaqhubeka nokubhubhudla izimali zomphakathi, wathi lo mkhuba udla lubi komasipala.Lokhu ukusho enkulumweni ayibhale esesibhedlela, le nkulumo ubeyibhale njengengxenye yokugubha iminyaka engu-130 kwasungulwa inhlangano eyayilwa nobandlululo, iNatal Indian Congress.Inkulumo kaGordhan ifundwe umndeni esithangamini nabezindaba izolo.UGordhan ushone izolo ekuseni emva kokuxinwa ukugula.Enkulumweni yakhe, uGordhan uthe izimali zomphakathi ziphelela kwabazicabangela bona, abatamuza amathenda nalabo abafuna ukukhokhelwa yizinkampani ezithola amathenda.“Izimali zomphakathi kufanele zisetshenziselwe ukuthuthukisa abahlwempu, kuthuthukiswe umnotho. Into esiyibonayo manje sibona ogombela kwesabo beqhubeka nokuzicebisa bona ngezimali zomphakathi.”UGordhan unxuse ukuthi kuliwe nenkohlakalo, wathi abantu bakuleli akufanele bavumele ukuthi kuphinde kube nokulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana.Uthe ukulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana kwaholela ekubhubhudlweni kwezimali zomphakathi, wathi akufanele into enjengalena iphinde yenzeke.“Akukwazi ukuthi singaphinde sibe nesimo lapho izinhlaka ezifana neNational Prosecuting Authority, iHhovisi loMvikeli woMphakathi nezinye, zilawulwa abathile abafuna ukubhubhudla izimali zomphakathi.”Abakhulume esithangamini nabezindaba, okubalwa kubo owayenguNgqongqoshe wezeziMali, uMnuz Trevor Manuel, owayeyiphini likaNgqongqoshe wezeziMali ngesikhathi lomnyango usaphethwe uGordhan, uMnuz Mcebisi Jonas, bancome amagalelo kaGordhan ekulweni nenkohlakalo.Bathe ukulwa kukaGordhan nenkohlakalo kwamdalela amazinyo abushelelezi kulabo ababhubhudla izimali zomphakathi.UGordhan uzongcwatshwa eThekwini, ngoLwesine.UMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, umemezele ukuthi uGordhan uzohlonishwa ngomngcwabo osezingeni likahulumeni.Lesi simemezelo usenze ngesikhathi kunomcimbi wokusayina umthetho wezikole, iBasic Education Laws Amendement Act.URamaphosa uthe uGordhan uyisebenzele iNingizimu Afrika.“Ingakho sizokuba nomngcwabo osezingeni likahulumeni, lapho sizokhumbula khona amagalelo akhe.”Amazwi enduduzo abelokhu engene njalo izolo kulandela ukumenyezelwa kwezindaba zokushona kukaGordhan.Amaqembu ezepolitiki ehlukene azwakalise ukudumala ngokushona kukaGordhan.UGordhan usebenze isikhathi eside kuhulumeni.Phakathi kweminyango ake wayiphatha kubalwa owezeziMali nowezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu.Ngaphambi kwalokho, wayengukhomishana weSA Revenue Service (Sars), wamemezela ukuthatha kwakhe umhlalaphansi kwezepolitiki ngaphambi kokhetho lwangoMeyi nonyaka.

UNGQONGQOSHE wamaBhizinisi kaHulumeni, uMnuz Pravin Gordhan, uzoshiya kwezepolitiki emuva kokhetho lukazwelonke ngoMeyi 29. UGordhan kuthiwa wazise i-ANC ukuthi ingamfaki ohlwini lwabaya ePhalamende emuva kokhetho.Kwenzeka lokhu nje i-ANC ibimatasa ihlanganisa uhlu lwamalungu ayo azojutshwa ePhalamende emuva kokhetho lukazwelonke. I-IEC ibibeke umnqamulajuqu wangoLwesihlanu ukuthi kuthunyelwe uhlu lwamalungu amaqembu azoya ePhalamende emuva kokhetho.Abajutshwa ePhalamende kuvame ukuthi kube ngamalungu esigungu esiphezulu enhlangano.Isikhathi esiningi kusuke kungabantu abethenjwayo nokuzobukwa kubona ukuthi bafakwe ezikhundleni zongqongqoshe namaphini abo uma inhlangano inqoba ukhetho.UGordhan uvele akaselona ilungu lesigungu esiphezulu se-ANC emuva kokuthi wenqaba ukuphakanyiswa engqungqutheleni edlule. UGordhan ungaphansi kwengcindezi kulezi zinsuku ugxekwa ngokufihla imininingwane yokudayiswa kwengxenye ye-SAA.Ngesikhathi ethula umbiko ePhalamende ucele ukuthi kube sesithe abezindaba bengavunyelwa futhi amalungu asayine isivumelwano sokuzibophezela ukuthi angeke adalule lutho.Uma eshiya uzobe ejoyina uhlu lwabaholi be-ANC asebevele bememezele ukuthi abasabuyi.Phakathi kwabo kukhona uDkt Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma , uNkk Nosiviwe Mapisa -Nqakula noNkk Naledi Pandor. UGordhan phambili uke wasebenza eSARS, uke waba wungqongqoshe wezemali.

NKOSIKHONA CELEUGQIGQA ezinkantolo umfundisi waseZayoni iSolezwe Ngempelasonto elabika kabanzi ngaye nyakenye, ngesikhathi kuvela ukuthi ulobole abesifazane abangu-22.UMfu Zamani Shozi webandla iGalile, kuvela ukuthi akukho ukuphumula kuyena, ugqiga ezinkantolo ezahlukene zaKwaZulu Natal ngamacala ehlukene.NgoLwesibili, uShozi ubekade evele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaKwaDukuza ngecala lokushaya kabi alimaze owesifazane esithweni sakhe sangasese. Lo wesifazane ungomunye walaba abalobolile.Kulelo cala iMantshi uM. Blose yathi ilihlehlisela uLwesihlanu oluzayo ngoba kusanophenyo olunzulu olumayelana nesigameko okumele luphothulwe.“Icala lakho inkantolo iyalihlehlisa ukuze kuqhutshekwe nolunye uphenyo mayelana nalo lolu daba,’’ kubeka uBlose.Yamtshela ukuthi isicelo sakhe sebheyili sizobuye senziwe uma selutholakale lonke ulwazi oludingekayo ngecala abhekene nalo.Mayelana naleso sigameko sokushaya  owesifazane, kuvela ukuthi wamlimaza kabi ngemuva kwengxabano ababa nayo. Kuthiwa lo wesifazane wayesetholile ukuthi uShozi ulobole inqwaba yabesifazane.Ephawula ngaleso sigameko lo wesifazane ocele ukuba okwamanje ligodlwe igama lakhe, uthe ufisa ukumbona ebolela ejele uShozi.Wamchaza njengowesilisa ombethe isikhumba semvu kanti uyimpisi. "Unesihluku nangu umfundisi wabantu. Empilweni yami yonke mina angikaze ngize ngokuthole ukuhlukumezeka okunjena,'' usho kanje.NgoLwesine, uShozi uphinde wavela enkantolo yasePinetown ngecala lokushushumbiswa kwemali. Icala lakhe lihlehliselwe inyanga ezayo.NgoMeyi 24, kuwona lo nyaka kuvela ukuthi uzovela eNkantolo yaseMgungundlovu ngecala lokweba amatekisi amane omunye wesifazane ayesemlobolile.Ngesikhathi iSolezwe Ngempelasonto libika kabanzi ngoShozi, lakuveza ukuthi nasebandleni ujola nenqwaba yabesifazane.Laveza nesigqebhe sekhadi lomgunyathi ayezenza ngalo iphoyisa.Kunomunye wesifazane ocele ukuba ligodlwe igama lakhe, yena ukhala ngokuthi weba u-R85 000 wakhe.Kuvela ukuthi uShozi walihamba lelo cala isikhashana kodwa laphela ngendlela engaqondakali.Ngokombiko owashicilelwa yileli phephandaba, uShozi ucathamela abesifazane ababukeka bemi kahle ngasezimalini. Abesifazane abaphumela obala baveza ukuthi usheshe afune ukuyolobola enza nemicimbi ehambisana nalokho njengemembeso ibe wubukhazikhazi. Emva kwalokho, bathi ushaya achithe nezinto zakho. Abanye babala izimoto anyamalala nazo, abanye bamsola ngokubaqola izizumbulu ethi abatshale imali enkampanini mbumbulu athi ngeyakhe.

KUVUSELELEKE ufuqufuqu lokuthatha isifundazwe iKwaZulu-Natal okhethweni lwangoMeyi kubaholi be-IFP behlwitha amawadi abephethwe i-ANC.I-IFP yenze i-ANC isilo sengubo iyiphuca amawadi amathathu okhethweni lokuchibiyela obelungoLwesithathu.I-IFP ithathe uWard 12, 19 no-23, kuMasipala waseNewcastle, izikhala kulamawadi zavuleka emva kokusula kwamakhansela e-ANC.Usihlalo we-IFP KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, uthe le miphumela ifike ngesikhathi esihle lapho belungiselela ukhetho oluzayo.“Njengoba sibheke okhethweni lukazwelonke nezifundazwe, ukunqoba izinketho zokuchibiyela kuzosigqugquzela kakhulu kuphinde kudlondlobalise umkhankaso wethu wokwakha kabusha iKwaZulu-Natal neNingizimu Afrika. Sizoqhubeka nalo mgqigqo. Sizimisele ngokuletha ushintsho ezimpilweni zabantu baKwaZulu-Natal.”Kuwo wonke amawadi i-IFP izigwazele ibhece kuWard 12 ithole amavoti angu-1 973, yalandelwa i-ANC ngamavoti angu-763.KuWard 19 ithole angu-1 566, ilandelwa i-ANC ngawu-732, kwathi kuWard 23 khona yathola angu-1 498, i-ANC yalandela ngawu-315.“Le miphumela ikhombisa ukuthi i-IFP iyakhula. Sibonga abantu baseNewcastle ngokuqhubeka nokusethemba.”Ukunqoba kwe-IFP amawadi amathathu kusho ukuthi sukuyiyo enezihlalo eziningi kulo mkhandlu ewubusa ngokubambisana namaqembu amancane.I-IFP isinezihlalo ezingu-22, ilandelwa i-ANC, enezihlalo ezingu-18.UNtuli, ogaqele esikandunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, unxuse amakhansela amasha ukuba asebenze ngokuzikhandla.I-ANC esifundeni iMbuso Kubheka, ikhale ngomkhonyovu.Unobhala we-ANC kulesi sifunda, uMnuz Chris Mhlophe, uthe bathole ukuthi kunenqwaba yabantu abebebhalisele ukuvota ukhetho lwangoLwesithathu abasebenzisa ikheli elilodwa.Uthe bathe uma bephenya leli kheli bathola ukuthi indawo nje evulekile, engenasakhiwo.“Njengamanje sisezinhlelweni zokuvula icala emaphoyiseni, siphinde sifake isikhalazo enhlanganweni eyengamele ukhetho, i-IEC (Independent Electoral Commission). Sifisa ukuthi i-IEC ithathele izinyathelo iqembu lezepolitiki noma amalungu eqembu lezepolitiki okuzotholakala ukuthi enza lo mkhuba. Kuyicala ukuvota endaweni lapho ungahlali khona.”I-ANC ikwaze ukugcina uWard 6 kuMasipala waseMshwathi.Le wadi ibikade ivele iphethwe yiyo i-ANC.Iqembu elisha, uMkhonto weSizwe, elikhombisa ukwenza kahle ezinkethweni zokuchibiyela, bebengazingenelanga izinketho zokuchibiyela ebezingoLwesithathu.Kunamahlebezi athi kunekhansela lomkhandlu waseNewcastle eselisulile, lajoyina uMkhonto weSizwe, nokusho ukuthi kungase kuphinde kube nolunye ukhetho lokuchibiyela kulo masipala.

KUBIKWA ukuthi owesifazane ugwazwe owesilisa ongumakhelwane wakhe emuva kwengxabano esuswe wukuthi umgilwa unqabe ne-password ye-WiFi router yakhe eWaterloo, eVerulam.Abezimo eziphuthumayo enkampanini yonogada iReaction Unit South Africa (Rusa) bathi umgilwa oneminyaka engu-37 ugwazwe esiswini kanti ubekade opha kakhulu.Okhulumela abezimo eziphuthumayo kwaRusa, uMnuz Prem Balram, uthe umgilwa ulimale kanzima emuva kwengxabano kubangwa ipassword.Ulandise wathi lendoda ilethwe emahhovisi eRusa imoto iJeep emnyama ilayishwe ezihlalweni ezingemuva yopha.“Beyikade yopha kakhulu kwazise ibidle amanzi amponjwana. Isichaze ukuthi ingxabano iphenduke yaba udlame emuva kokuthi inqabe ukunikezela nge password yeWiFi router yayo,” kusho uBalram.UBalram uqhube wathi umgilwa ubatshele ukuthi ugwazwe umuntu wesifazane.Kubikwa ukuthi umgilwa uxilongwe abosizo lokuqala bakwaRusa ababe sebemphuthumisa nge-ambulensi esibhedlela eyothola ukwelashwa okuthe thuthu.

UGWETSHWE iminyaka engu-25 ebhadla ejele owesilisa olahlwe icala lokuphanga nokubulala ngokungenhloso umshayeli wemoto ekhokhelwa ngebanga elihambile.USimiphi Ntombela (31) ugwetshwe iNkantolo yesiFunda yaseNtuzuma ngoLwesibili.Uliqule laze laphela icala egqunywe ezitokisini emuva kokuthi anqatshelwa ibheyili.Ngesikhathi secala, uNtombela waqale wazibiza ngegama okungesilona elakhe ethi yena unguSiphamandla Mkhize.Kwagcina kutholakele ukuthi yena ungubani emumva kokuthungathwa kutholakale umazisi wakhe.Kuthiwa uNtombela waphinde wazenza umuntu ophanjanelwa ingqondo ngesikhathi sokuqulwa kwecala kodwa odokotela bathola ukuthi uphile saka.Ugwetshelwe isehlakalo esenzeka ngoJanuwari 10 ngonyaka odlule okwagcina kushone kusona uMnuz Mpendulo Hopewell Mpungose (40).Umufi, owayengumshayeli we-Uber, wathola isicelo esasivela kumuntu owayesePhoenix owayefuna ukuyiswa eDuffs Road.Kuthiwa sebefikile lapho ayeya khona uNtombela nowesilisa ayekade ehamba naye, bakhomba umufi ngesibhamu bamfaka ebhuthini yemoto bashaya bachitha naye.Bazithela emaphoyiseni ayekade eqaphe ubugebengu abona le moto eyiVW Polo eyayishayelwa budlabha ayishayela amasayini ezama ukuyimisa.Kunokuba ame uNtombela wavele wabaleka ngesivinini, okwaholela ekutheni ijahwe imoto eyagcina ishayise isihlahla.Bobathathu bakhishwa kule moto abezimo eziphuthumayo kusetshenziswa izindlawu baphuthunyiswa esibhedlela lapho uMpungose aphangalalela khona.Omunye walawa madoda wakhululwa yinkantolo.

UVUME icala wagwetshwa owesifazane waseMatabetulu, eNanda, ngokubulala omunye wesifazane ayebanga naye indoda ngo-2022.UMakhosazane Prudence (37) obevele eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini, izolo, obengumsolwa wokuqala kuleli cala, uvume icala lokubulala umufi, uNksz Ntombifuthi Faith Mkhize (27).Ulivume nowesilisa u-Andile Welcome “Lulu” Gcaba (26) owayemlekelela ukubulala umufi.Baphinde bavuma necala lokuthumba. Laba bobabili kuthiwa ngoJulayi 19, 2022, bahlasela umufi ekubo eNanda.Kuthiwa bamfica ehlezi yedwa bamphoqa ukuba angene emotweni iToyota emnyama.Kuvela ukuthi bahamba naye baya endaweni eyihlathi khona eNanda, lapho abambulala ngokumklinya belekelelana.Enkantolo kuvele ukuthi itulo lalihlelwe uMakhosazane ngoba wayecikwe ukuthi umufi umthathele isoka lakhe leminyaka, uMnuz Nkosinathi Kunene.Kuvela ukuthi ngemuva kokuba laba ababili sebembulele umufi, bathatha isidumbu sakhe bayosilahla emfuleni eBuffelsdraai, eVerulam.UGcaba ngosuku olufanayo wagoduka waya kubo eXobho, wafika wagonyuluka ngakho konke okwenzekile kumalume wakhe.Umalume wakhe wazisa amaphoyisa kwalandwa isidumbu zase zibakhalela uGcaba noMakhosazane.UMshushisi uDernado MacDonald uthe laba balivumile icala nakuyena wathi sekulele kwinkantolo ukuthi ibagweba kangakanani.IJaji uMchunu ubasukumisile waqinisekisa ukuthi bayalivuma ngampela yini icala."Ngabe kuyiqiniso ukuthi nobabili niyalivuma icala futhi nizimisele ngokuthi nijeze ngenikwenzile?“ kubuza iJaji.Bobabili bavumile. IMantshi ibe isibagixabeza ngesigwebo seminyaka engu-20 umuntu ngamunye.IJaji lithe icala lokubulala liyohlale njalo libucayi phambi kwamehlo enkantolo.Lithe laba ababili yize belivuma icala kodwa bakhombisa isihluku esikhulu njengoba umufi bambulala ngokumklinya.“Noma nilivuma icala kodwa iqiniso ukuthi isenzo senu saba sibi kakhulu. Umuntu enambulala namzwisa ubuhlungu obukhulu. Kodwa naqhubeka ngoba naninenhloso eyodwa nobabili. Ngenxa yaleso sizathi iminyaka engu-20 inifanele,’’ kusho iJaji.Bobabili abameli u-Adv Enerst Blero no-Attorney Zera Fareel babasolwa, bakuqinisekisile ukuthi abebesolwa balivumile icala.Okuqaphelekile ukuthi enkantolo bebengekho abomndeni kamufi kodwa bekukhona abebezoseka abagwetshiwe.

Ugwetshwe iminyaka eyisishiyagalombili ejele yiNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMiddleburg, eMpumalanga, owesilisa owasebenzisa amaphepha omgunyathi ethenga imoto iSuzuki Ertiga wangabe esayikhokhela njalo ngenyanga.UJacob Aphane (36) ubebhekene necala lokukhwabanisa uR496 211 wemoto ayithenga.“Kubikwa ukuthi ngo-Okthoba 7 ngo-2022, umsolwa wafaka isicelo sokubolekwa imali yokuthenga imoto eYagos 4 Wheel Cars eMiddleburg esebenzisa amaphepha omgunyathi, i-payslip nesitatimende sasebhange. Wathi usebenza eGT Auto Company eMarblehall. I-WesBank yasiphasisa isicelo sakhe ngenxa yamaphepha omgunyathi awasebenzisa,” kusho uCaptain Sekgotodi Dineo okhulumela oKlebe eMpumalanga.Uthe ngemuva kokuthi isicelo sakhe siphumelele, u-Aphane walanda i-Ertiga kodwa kwaphela izinyanga ezintathu engayikhokheli.“Ibhange lazama ukumthola kodwa wayengatholakali. Udaba lwadluliselwa koKlebe eMiddleburg ukuze baphenye. Ngesikhathi sophenyo, kwatholakala ukuthi ayikho inkampani u-Aphane athi uyayisebenzela,” kusho uSekgotodi.Uthe oKlebe baqhubeka nophenyo imoto yatholakala futhi u-Aphane wayalelwa ukuthi avele enkantolo.“Waboshwa, wathweswa icala wabe esededelwa ngesixwayiso. Uvele izikhawu enkantolo kwaze kwaba utholwa enecala wagwetshwa ngoMsombuluko, ngoSepthemba 23 2024 iminyaka eyisishiyagalombili, emithathu yalengiswa iminyaka emihlanu ngombandela wokuthi angatholakali enecala elifanayo,” kusho uSekgotodi.

UGWETSHWE iminyaka engu-6 ebhadla ejele owayeyisikhulu esiphezulu sophiko oluphenya amacala athinta inkohlakalo, eGoli,  iSpecial Investigating Unit (SIU), uSifiso Phillip Kunene (54).UKunene ugwetshwe yinkantolo enkulu yesiFunda yaseThekwini ebhekelele amacala athinta ezezimali. Kule minyaka kube sekulengiswa emibili.Ugwetshelwe icala lokukhwabanisa imali yakwaRoad Accident Fund (RAF) alenza esengummeli ngaphansi kwenkampani yakhe iKunene Masango Incorporated Attorneys.Wayesebenzisana nomngani wakhe uMasango owajika waba ngufakazi woMbuso okuyimanje ungaphakathi ezikhindini.Ilinganiselwa ku-R226 ,790 imali eyakhwatshaniswa uKunene eyangena ebhange lakhe ekubeni kwakumele ayidlulisele kwikilayenti lakhe, uNksz Precious Swartling kodwa wayidla yonke.Ngokobufakazi obethulwe phambi kwenkantolo, kwamthatha izinsuku ezingu-33 ukuba ayiqede.Ingxenye yayo wayisebenzisela ukukhokhela izingane zakhe imali yesikole. Wenza nokunye okwakuyizidingo zakhe.Ngo-Okthoba wango-2020, uKunene wazinikela koKlebe wakhalelwa ngamaSongo kaSigonyela.Waphuma ngebheyili ka-R5000. Kusukela lapho ubegqigqa enkantolo mayelana naleli cala.IJaji, uGarth Davis likhale kakhulu ngokungethembeki kwabameli lathi sekuphenduke insakavukela.Lithe kumele lidlulise umyalezo ocacile nakulabo bameli abacabanga ukwenza njengoKunene."Ngikugweba iminyaka engu-6 ubhadla ejele ngecala lokukhwabanisa imali,'' usho kanje ekhuluma ebhekise kuKunene.Ngesikhathi kuqhubeka icala uKunene ubebonakala ebheke phansi ebhala okuthile ebhukwini. UMshushisi u-Advocate Abbey Letsholo uthe izinkantolo kumele zibagwebe abameli abenza njengoKunene.Uthe buningi ubufakazi obusobala obuveza ukuthi uKunene wayisebenzisa yonke imali okwakumele ayidlulisele kwikilayenti lakhe.Ummeli kaKunene uzamile ukumncengela kodwa kwanhlanga zimuka nomoya, iMantshi ikhala ngokuthi wehlise isithunzi sabameli.Kuvelile ukuthi ikilayenti likaKunene lamnikeza isikhathi sokuba ayikhokhe imali ngaphambi kokuba limvulele icala kodwa nalokho akazange akwenze.UKunene wayenguthisha ofundisa izibalo kusukela ngo-1990 kuya ku-1997. Uke waba ngumeluleki wakwaPassengers Rail Agency of South Africa (Prasa) ngo-2022 kuya ku-2023.

AHLULEKE nokuzibamba ejabulela isinqumo amalungu omndeni kanjiniyela owabulawa ngo-2020, ngesikhathi iNkantolo eNkulu eThekwini ilahla unkosikazi wakhe nosibali ngawo wonke amacala abathweswe wona.Isinqumo senkantolo esiphume izolo siphoqe kuthi uNompumelelo Goncalves owayewunesi, ashone ekhulukuthu njengoba ubengaphandle ngebheyili kusuka ngo-2020 ngecala lokubulala umyeni wakhe uMnuz Nkosi Langa owayengunjiniyela kwa-Transnet. Wamthengela izinkabi. Ubelokhu egqigqa inkantolo nomfowabo uNkosinathi Zungu yena obetokile, kanti inkabi esiphenduke uFakazi woMbuso uJames Mashudu Mthimkhulu, uvele udonsa isigwebo seminyaka ewu-20 emva kokuvuma icala.Efunda uhlu lwamacala abalahile, obambe njengeJaji, uSolwazi Bonke Dumisa, abebethamele icala iningi labo obekuyizihlobo nabazwelana nomndeni wakwaLanga, bebekhuzwa sebeshaya ihlombe bejabulela abakubize ngokwenzeka kobulungiswa.Bobabili abalahlwe amacala okukhona kuwo elokuthumba, ukubamba inkunzi, nelokubulala, bebewaphika. UNompumelelo uphinde watholwa enecala  lokuzama ukuphazamisa ukusebenza kwamaphoyisa nelokuvula icala elingamanga emaphoyiseni.Udadewabo kamufi uNksz Zodwa Langa uthe lesi sinqumo sibajabulise kakhulu, yize singeke simvuse umfowabo nonina okuthiwa yena waxinwa wukugulwa washona ezinsukwini ezimbalwa kudedelwe umakoti wakwakhe ngebheyili kuleli cala.“Angiboni ukuthi inkosikazi yomfowethu siyoyixolela ekhaya ngalesi senzo. Ngeke sixole. Umuntu esesimxolele uMthimkhulu (inkabi eyavuma icala), ngoba yena wakhombisa ukuzisola wakhuluma lonke iqiniso esikholwa ukuthi yilona eliholele ekutheni laba batholwe benecala,” usho kanje.Isidumbu sikaLanga owathunjwa kwakhe ngoSepthemba 2020, satholwa emva kwezinyanga ezimbili enyamalele, sesonakele silahlwe ehlathini oZwathini eNdwedwe.  Ebufakazini bukaMthimkhulu, uyena noZungu abaklinya umufi ngentambo ye-ayina.Ngaphambi kokuthi ijaji likhiphe isinqumo, lifunde ubufakazi bukangoti uMnuz Peter Andries Oosterhuizen ocwaninga ngokusebeza kwe-tracker emotweni, owaqinisekisa ukubonakala kwemoto kaNompumelelo ihambela eKenville eThekwini ukuyohlangana nomfowabo ngosuku olwandulela ukubulawa komyeni wakhe, nokuhamba kwemoto yomfowabo. Ubufakazi bukangoti ngezindawo ezahanjwa yizimoto nezikhathi, ijaji lithe buyahambisana nobendlalelwe yinkantolo uMthimkhulu. Kuphindwe kwabhekwa ubufakazi bukangoti wamaselula uMnuz Thabani Golele obaveza ukudonsa kwamafoni abamangalelwa ezindaweni ezehlukene, nakhona okuhambisana nobufakazi obethuliwe.  Kwavezwa nokukhishwa kwemali kamufi, eyakhishwa oThongathi naseMsinga. Ubufakazi bukaDkt Sureke Maharaj, okwathiwa wahlola uNompumelelo  - inkantolo ekholwa ukuthi wazenza okhathazekile ngesikhathi umyeni wakhe engabuyi ekhaya - buveze ukuthi wayengenazo izimpawu zokukhathazeka futhi  umfutho wakhe wegazi wawushaya ngendlela ejwayelekile ngaphandle kokuthi wayenamehlo abomvu.Inkantolo ilihlehlisele uMeyi 23 nonyaka icala, lapho abameli babamangalelwa noMbuso beyohlanganisa khona amakhanda ukuvumelana ngokuthile ngosuku lokwenziwa kwezethulo zokubashwelezela nokwehliswa kwesigwebo.

UMNIKAZI wendawo yokudlela i-AuthentiQ, esemgwaqweni uFlorida, eThekwini, uMnuz Ndumiso Mncwabe, usegxeke abezindaba nabantu ngakubize ngokwakha isithombe esibi ngezindawo zokudlela eziholwa ngosomabhizinisi abamnyama.Lokhu kuza emva kwesehlakalo sangoMsombuluko ekuseni sokushona kukaNksz Zamangwane Bija (26), obesebenzela kule ndawo yokudlela, odutshulwe yisoka lakhe ebeliyiphoyisa, uMnuz Nhlakanipho Mkhize, naye ogcine eshona kulesi sigameko emva kokudutshulwa ngamaphoyisa abeqaphe isimo.UMncwabe uthe kuyamkhathaza ukuthi nakuba kuhlale kwenzeka izigameko ezifuze lezi kwezinye izindawo zokudlela eThekwini namaphethelo, kodwa akuvamile ukuthi kubikwe ngazo kwabezindaba.“Ngikhuluma ngento engiyaziyo njengoba kusanda kugwazwa umngani wami kwenye indawo yokudlela eseDavenport, futhi kuhlale kwenzeka nakwezinye izindawo eziseMhlanga ukuthi kubulawe abantu, kodwa angikaze ngibone kukhulunywa ngakho kwabezindaba. Lokhu kwenza ngibone sengathi le nto iyindlela yokwakha isithombe esibi ngamabhizinisi aphethwe ngabantu abamnyama,” kukhononda uMncwabe.Ebuzwa ukuthi kuzokwenzekani ngendawo yakhe yokudlela, uthe okwamanje basavalile, kodwa kuzophela leli sonto sebevulile uma sebeqede yonke imicikilisho phakathi kwabo nomndeni kaNksz Bija, angeke akwazi ukuyidalulela abezindaba. “Isimo esinjengalesi esenzekile akuyona into ehlale yenzeka, futhi lokhu kuyinto esingenayo indlela ebesingayivimba ngayo ngoba yenzeka ngaphandle, kwaba wukuthi usisi ushonela phakathi endaweni yethu yokusebenzela.“Ngiyafisa ukuthi kungagcini ngezindaba ezibuhlungu kuphela, kwenziwe okufanayo ngokuthi kukhulunywe ngemisebenzi emihle esiyenza ngamabhizinisi ethu ehlukene” usho kanje.

IBHUNGU laseThekwini elenza unyaka wesithathu eDurban University of Technology (DUT), libalwe ohlwini lwentsha ewu-200 eyenza ezibukwayo emikhakheni ekuyona. U-Enzokuhle Sabela (21) waseWestville, eThekwini, wenza izifundo zobuntatheli kanti uhlonishwe emcimbini obizwa nge-Mail and Guardian 200 Young South Africans  njengomunye wabantu abanomthelela omuhle emkhakheni awenzayo emcimbini obubanjelwe eGoli, muva nje.Leli bhungu linePodcast okudingidwa kuyo izindaba ezithinta ipolitiki, esigxile eDUT. Wengamele uhlelo lokucija abaholi bakusasa iTomorrow’s Leaders in Training kanti usebhale nezindaba ezinohlonze yize esayisitshudeni. Ekhuluma neSolezwe uthe namanje akakakholwa ngempela ukuthi uhlonishiwe.“Kuwumuzwa engisazama namanje ukuwamukela futhi kuwudumo nelungelo elikhulu kimi ukuthi ngibe yingxenye yohlu lwalabo abahlonishiwe ngo-2024. Ngiyabonga kakhulu,” kusho uSabela.Uthe ukuthola le ndondo engakaphothuli ngisho izifundo zakhe zobuntatheli kuyinto enkulu kakhulu.“Bengingakaze ngicabange ukuthi ngizohlonishwa futhi ngithole umklomelo walolu hlobo ngikakaziphothuli izifundo zami,” usho kanje.Uqhube wathi ukusebenza kanzima ngaphambi kokuthi uqede iziqu zakho kubalulekile.“Ukusebenza kanzima futhi wenze ukuxhumana nabantu abanomqondo ocabanga njengowakho kanye nalabo abasemkhakheni wezobuntatheli kuzohamba ibanga elide,” ubeke kanje.Uthe ohlwini labantu abukela kubo kubalwa abafundisi bakhe okungoMnuz Siphumelele Zondi, Sphelele Ngubane, Nksz Ayesha Mall, Deseni Sooben noSlindile Khanyile. Emkhakheni wezobuntatheni ubukela ezingqweleni ezifana noXoli Mngambi, Stephen Grootes noSherwin Bryce Pease.

Umholi we-IFP uMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa, uthi akuzange kubalimaze ukufika kweqembu Umkhonto weSizwe ngoba banyuse ukwesekwa baze badlula ne-ANC KwaZulu-Natal.UHlabisa obekhuluma nezintatheli esikhungweni semiphumela seKhomishini yezoKhetho eMidrand, uthe bathole konke abebezibekele khona njengeqembu.Uthe baneme ngoba i-ANC yehlelwe wukwesekwa kulolu khetho.“Akusithintanga ukufika kweMK ngoba sikhulise ukwesekwa sadlula emavotini esawathola ngo-2019. Amanye amaqembu ashayekile. Siyiqembu elinyukelwe wukwesekwa, sizoya eziShayamthetho zezifundazwe sesithole izihlalo ezithe xaxa,” kusho uHlabisa. Uveze ukuthi ubuholi besigungu esiphezulu seqembu buzohlangana ukuze kuphume nomhlahlandlela ngokuzokwenzeka.“Asijahile ukuthi singene kuhulumeni wokubambisana nanoma ngubani. Sizoxoxa ngesizokwenza bese siphuma nomkhombandlela,” kusho uHlabisa.Uthe kuzoba nomhlangano wesixaxa samaqembu abexoxa eyokusebenzisana ngaphambi kokhetho. Ubalule nokuthi bayayamukela imiphumela yokhetho ngoba abantu baphumile ukuyovotela ukususa i-ANC emandleni.“Silinde ihlandla elisha likahulumeni. Abavoti bakhulumile ukuthi bafuna kube nohulumeni wokubambisana, kuphelile ukuthi kube neqembu elilodwa eliphethe. Ayikho into ezomane iphasiswe manje ngenxa yokuthi kuphethe iqembu elilodwa.” Uthe manje sekuzodingeka kutholakale umbono wamanye amaqembu ngaphambi kokuba kuphasiswe into ethile.Uveze ukuthi nesixaxa samaqembu seneme ngokuthi i-ANC ithole ngaphansi kuka-50%, okhethweni.

UHLAMUKWE uyise nabantu abephila nabo ehostela laseGlebelands, eMlaza owesilisa onqatshelwe ibheyili ngamacala angu-42 abhekene nawo.UMnuz Khethani Khuboni (31) usolwa ngokudlwengula abesifazane abangu-20, abaphange esebenzisa indlakadla enkundleni yezemidlalo eGlebelands.Unqatshelwe ibheyili ngoMsombuluko futhi akukho okuvelayo eHome Affairs okufakazela ukuthi ushadelwe.UKhuboni ufake indandatho emunweni futhi usanda kutshela inkantolo ukuthi iyisishiyagalolunye iminyaka abopha ifindo lomshado.Inkampani athi ngeyakhe, kuvele ukuthi empeleni wayivulela umngani wakhe futhi ayisebenzi uma ibhekwa kubaqoqi bentela eSars.Lokhu kuvezwe enkantolo umphenyi uSergeant Mndeni Mzila ephikisana noukuthi uKhuboni adedelwe ngebheyili.UMzila uthe uxhumene noyise kaKhuboni omtshele ukuthi umhluphile, amacala aboshelwe wona wawaqala ngo-2019 futhi akazi lutho ngomshado, wezwa ngomsolwa ebuya ethi ushadelwe.“Uyise uthe uma inkantolo imdedela, ayimtholele indawo yokuhlala ngoba akasadingeki ehostela. Waqhwaga nendlu ayinikwa uyise ehostela ukuba ahlale kuyo nabafowabo, abakhipha kuyo,” kusho uMzila othe uphenya amacala “kamalugaju.”Inkantolo ichitha isicelo sebheyili ibalule ukuphepha kwabamangali.
