UMzila uthe uKhuboni uyawazi amakheli abo futhi wabasongela.Iveze nokuthi kwayena uKhuboni akanandawo azohlala kuyona futhi kungase kube nombhedukazwe emphakathini uma ededelwa lokhu okungamenza naye angaphephi.Ibalule nokuthi uKhuboni angase alibalekele icala ngoba uyazi ukuthi lihambisanaa nesigwebo sikadilikajele.UMzila uthe buqinile ubufakazi ababuqukethe obuyamanisa uKhuboni namacala angase engezwe.Wale ukhasha uMzila ukuthi adedelwe uKhuboni ethi waziphika efika ezombopha kwesikabhadakazi ehostela wathi ungu-Amos Mbhele. Uthe kwasiza uyise owamkhomba eduze umsolwa eqinisekisa ukuthi unguKhethani Khuboni.Zehle kamnandi kwabebethamele icala ezokuncishwa ibheyili kukaKhuboni.Bakhombise ukujabula bezwa imantshi ithi uzogqunywa ezitokisini kusaqhutshekwa nophenyo.UKhuboni akakhombisanga ukudinwa noma ukuphatheka kabi ezwa lokhu kunalokho ukhale ngabasebenzisa ifoni yakhe njengoba yena eboshiwe.Kuthiwa ifoni yashaqwa amaphoyisa futhi iyingxenye yophenyo alwenzayo. Icala lihlehliselwe u-Okthoba 23 kusaqhutshekwa nophenyo.

UBHEKENE nezinkinga uMengameli weNFP, uMnuz Ivan Barnes, ofuna ukumisa abaholi beqembu abaqavile okukhona kubo nezimeya.INkantolo eNkulu eMgungundlovu ikhiphe isivimbelo sesikhashana esinqanda uBarnes ekutheni amise abaholi okukhona kubo iPhini leMeya kuMasipala waseThekwini, uNksz Zandile Myeni neMeya kaMasipala waKwaNongoma, uMnuz Mshangane Ndabandaba.UBarnes ubefuna ukumisa abaholi beqembu abangu-12, iningi labo lingamakhansela.Laba baholi bebebhekene namacala ahlukene okukhona kuwo awokwehluleka ukuthobela umthetho. Bavele banikela enkantolo emva kokuthola izincwadi ezibayalela ukuba bachaze ukuthi kungani kungafanele ukuthi bamiswe?Likhipha isinqumo sesikhashana, iJaji uSidwell Mngadi, lichithe izincwadi zikaBarnes ezisabisa ngokumisa laba baholi.“Inkantolo inquma ukuthi asikho emthethweni isigaba somthethosisekelo weNFP esinika isigungu esiphezulu  ngokubonisana nomengameli amandla okumisa, ukwehlisa esikhundleni noma ukuxosha amalungu eqembu. Inkantolo inquma ukuthi ummangalelwa wokuqala (uBarnes) akanawo amandla okumisa noma awokuqondisa ubugwegwe amalungu eqembu.”UMngadi ukhiphe isivimbelo esinqanda uBarnes nesigungu esiphezulu ekutheni bamise noma bashushise amalungu eqembu kuze kuba kuqedwa ukuqulwa kwecala.UBarnes uyalelwe ukuba afake amaphepha aphikisa isinqumo sesikhashana ungakashayi uSepthemba 19.Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kukaBarnes ayizange iphumelele njengoba ucingo lwakhe belukhala lungabanjwa.UBarnes uqokelwe kwesokuhola iNFP engqungqutheleni eyayingonyaka owedlule.Emva kokuqokwa kwakhe waba nokungaboni ngaso linye noNobhala Jikelele, uMnuz Teddy Thwala, wambhalela incwadi yokumumisa.Mumva nje, uBarnes usanda kubhala incwadi ebizela iMeya kaMasipala waseDumbe, uMnuz Sibusiso Mkhabela, emhlanganweni lapho efuna ukuthi izochaza ngezinto ezithinta ukuphathwa komkhandlu.UMkhabela uphinde abe usihlalo kazwelonke kwiNFP.Encwadini, uBarnes wathi uthole izikhalazo ebuholini be-ANC kwisifunda iMzala Nxumalo, bukhalaza ngoMkhabela. I-NFP iphethe ngokubambisana ne-ANC kulo mkhandlu.Izinkinga zangaphakathi kwi-NFP azizintsha.Ubuholi obudlule beNFP bahlakazwa yisinqumo senkantolo nokwalandelwa umbango omude owaholela ekutheni iqembu lingakwazi ukungenela izinketho.

Uhlanganise abantu abaqhamuka ezinhlakeni ezahlukene umcimbi wokugcotshwa kukaNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, obuseMgungundlovu, ngoLwesibili.Izicukuthwane eziqhamuka ezinhlakeni eyahlukene nabantu abajwayelekile beziphume ngobuningi bazo ukuzozibonela lo mcimbi ochazwe njengengqophamlando.Kuqale kwanesibhocobhoco ngaphambi komcimbi, izicukuthwane zibukeka zikhungathekile ngenxa yokungaqali ngesikhathi kwawo.Umcimbi uqale sekudlule isikhathi esingaphezu kwehora kwebesishiwo, ayikho incazelo enikeziwe.Zonke izicukuthwane zike zakhishelwa ngaphandle, kwathiwa abezokuphepha basabheka ukuthi azikho yini iziqhumane etendeni.UNtuli ufike ehamba nomndeni wakhe, okukhona kuwo unkosikazi wakhe, uNkk Sindiswa MaSibisi Ntuli, ofike wahlala phambili.Kwizicukuthwane ebezihambele umcimbi bekukhona abaseNdlunkulu, phakathi kwabo bekukhona owayekhulumela iSilo, uMntwana uThulani kaGqikazi, kube khona noMntwana uNkinobho Zulu, ongomunye wababhekelele ukusebenza kwansuku zonke kwebutho likaZulu.Umcimbi ubuhanjelwe amakhosi okukhona kuwo usihlalo wendlu yobuholi bomdabu KwaZulu-Natal, inkosi Sifiso Shinga, amakhosi aseKing Cetshwayo aphambili ekwesekeni iSilo uMisuzulu kaZwelithini, uThembinkosi Xulu noZenzo Zungu.Umndeni womsunguli we-IFP, inkosi Mangosuthu Buthelezi, nawo ubuphume ngezinkani uholwa iNkosi uNtuthukoyezwe Zuzifa Buthelezi.Umcimbi ubuhanjelwe owayengundunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Willies Mchunu nabaholi bezepolitiki abahlukene. Bekukhona izifundiswa, abaholi bamabandla, nosomabhizinisi.Abantu abajwayelekile nabo bathe angeke basale ngaphandle, bafika bezozibonela umcimbi ngaphandle kwenkundla.Amalungu e-IFP abecula, ekhuza iziqubulo esangweni obekungena kulo izicukuthwane. Athe ukujabulele ukuphinde abe nondunankulu KwaZulu-Natal.I-IFP yagcina ukuba nondunankulu KwaZulu-Natal ngaphambi kokhetho lwango-2004.Bekuyinjabulo yodwa phakathi kwabe IFP nabe-ANC ngesikhathi kuqhubeka umcimbi.Kubonakale usihlalo we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Siboniso Duma, encokola noNdunankulu kaZulu, uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi, owumholi we-IFP.UDuma noButhelezi baba nesiwombe esibi emcimbini wokukhumbula iSilo uDinuzulu kaCetshwayo, lapho khona uDuma aphuca uButhelezi umbhobho.

KUPHAZAMISE uSomlomo ogcine engafikanga ePhalamende ukuzokwengamela uhlelo lukaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa lokuphendula imibuzo, ukugasela kophiko lwezokuShushisa kuleli emzini kaNkk Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula, ophenywa ngezinsolo zokuthi wamukela intshontsho esanguNgqongqoshe wezokuVikela.Iyaqonga ingcindezi yokuthi uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula ehle esikhundleni njengoba i-DA isiphakamise ukuthi akashiye emuva kokuba kugasele lo luphiko emzini wakhe oseBruma eGoli.Okhulumela iPhalamende uMnuz Moloto Mothapo uthe lo luphiko lugasele emzini kaSomlomo luzophenya.Uthe lokhu kugasela kumphazamisile uSomlomo njengoba engafikanga ukuzokwengamela uhlelo lukamengameli lokuphendula imibuzo.“Ugcine ejuba iphini likasomlomo ukuthi lengamele lo luhlelo lokuphendula imibuzo. USomlomo umile ekutheni akukho akufihlile futhi nophenyo uyalweseka.”USotswebhu we-DA uNksz Siviwe Gwarube uthe usomlomo kumele ahoxe ngenxa yokuthi ubhekene nezinsolo zenkohlakalo ebalelwa ku-R2.3 million.“Le mali kusolwa ukuthi wayithola izikhawu komunye wosonkontileka esaphethe uMnyango wezokuVikela. Kumele ahloniphe isifungo asenza sokuthi uzoziphatha ngendlela. Sifuna ikomiti lasePhalamende liphuthumise uphenyo.” Okhulumela uphiko lwezokuShushisa u-Advocate Mthunzi Mhaga, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi bagaselile emzini kasomlomo izolo beyophenya wathi ngeke bande kakhulu. Umholi we-DA uMnuz John Steenhuisen ufune ukuthi uRamaphosa aphendule ngokuthi kumele usomlomo ahoxe njengoba ebhekene nezinsolo zenkohlakalo.UMnuz Cedrick Frolick obengusihlalo ngesikhathi sokuphendulwa kwemibuzo, uthe umbuzo omusha ngalokho ulele kuRamaphosa ukuthi aphendule noma angaphenduli.URamaphosa unqume ukuthi angawuphenduli lo mbuzo.Ephendula eminye imibuzo ethinta ukuqasheka kwentsha, uRamaphosa  uthe kumele yenze imikhakha edingwa umnotho wezwe.Uthe akusizi ukuthi yenze imikhakha egcina ngokuthi ibhuquze ekhaya.“Yingakho sinezinhlelo zokuthi iye emakolishi amakhono ukuze yenze imikhakha yamakhono. Akusizi ukuthi yenze iziqu ezogcina ihleli nazo ekhaya.” Odabeni oluthinta izincomo zekhomishini eyayiphenya ngokulawulwa kombuso yidlanzana, uthe lezi zincomo uyazilandelela. Ukuchithile ukuthi abenzi lutho ngazo.Akulona iqiniso ukuthi asenzi lutho ngezincomo zekhomishini yejaji uZondo. Izincomo ezibalelwa ku-200 siyazisebenza, hhayi ngoba singenzi lutho ngazo,” kusho uRamaphosa. Uveze ukuthi le khomishini yadla enkulu imali wathi kuningi okwenziwayo ukubamba abathinteka embikweni wayo.Mayelana nezinhlelo zokulwa nobugebengu kuleli, uthe bandisa isibalo samaphoyisa ukuze kuqiniswe izinhlelo zokulwa nabo.

UKUZISEBENZA kunezinselelo eziningi ezingagcina zisiwisa kwesikwenzayo kodwa kumele sifunde ukuzilawula, sizibambe zishise, singakhubeki endleleni uma sekunezivunguvungu.Lokhu kushiwo uNksz Desiree Ngema wenkampani ebhaka iphinde idayise amakhekhe enesitolo esidayisa ikhofi namakhekhe iDesbaked, esisenkundleni yezemidlalo iMoses Mabhida.I-Desbaked yadla umhlanganiso emncintiswaneni wosomabhizinisi ohlelwa yiHollywood Foundations, iBambelela Business Awards ngasekuqaleni konyaka. NgoLwesihlanu, uNksz Ngema ubemukela izinsiza kusebenza ezibiza u-R100 000, awuwina.IHollywood Foundation nezinkampani ebambisene nazo kuzo okukhona neSolezwe zihambele umcimbi wokunikezwa kukaNksz Ngema izinsiza kusebenza.UNksz Ngema uthe ukuthola izinsiza ezifana nohhavini omkhulu nomshini wokukuxova inhlama  kuzomsiza ekutheni akwazi ukwenza umkhiqizo omningi aphinde engeze nabasebenzi."Ngike ngabhekana nesivunguvingu seCovid-19, ngisanda kuqala ukusebenzela endaweni engaphandle kwasekhaya. Ngakwazi ukusinqoba ngama, langavalwa ibhizinisi. Nyakenye, lapho ngisebenzela khona ugesi uke wahamba amasonto amathathu okwangibuyisela emuva kakhulu ngoba izindleko ze-generator zazinkulu okwaholela ekutheni ingabikhona inzuzo ngomsebenzi engiwenzile. Bengiphila ngokuthandaza ngibuza kuNkulunkulu ukuthi ngabe sekufike isikhathi sokuthi ngivale yini noma ukhona umnyango ezovuleka? Ngempela kwaba njalo ngabona isikhangiso saseHollywood. Ngangenela kanti ngizowina," echaza.UMnuz Simo Vilakazi we-Hollywood Foundation, uthe bayabeseka osomabhizinisi abafana noNksz Ngema abakwaze ukuyibamba ishisa."Uhlelo lwethu lokulekelela osomabhizinisi luhlose ukuthi lusize ukuze amabhizinisi asuke esekhona angawi nokusiza ekutheni kuvuleke amathuba omsebenzi. Ukunikeza uNksz Ngema umklomelo kuqondane nokuthi kule nyanga sibungaza imbokodo eyibambe ishisa emikhakheni eyehlukene. UNksz Ngema ungomunye wabantu besifazane esibabungazayo," kusho yena.UMnuz Siyanda Ntenga weDream Business Hub, okuyiyo esiza iHollywood ngezinhlelo zokuthuthukisa osomabhizinisi, uthe uNksz Ngema wabashaya emakhanda bonke osomabhizinisi abangaphezu kuka-320 ayeqhathwe nabo.Umhleli weSolezwe, uMnuz Thulani Mbatha, uthe  iphephandaba libone kufanele ukuthi libe yingxenye yothuthukiswa kosomabhizinisi ngokuthi libhale izindaba zabo ezikhuthazayo."Sijabula kakhulu uma sibona abesifazane bephumelela ngoba nathi njengephephandaba abafundi bethu abaningi ngabantu besifazane, abakhuthazekayo ngokubona abanye bephumelela," kusho uMbatha.

OWACHITHWA kwesokuba yijaji, uDkt John Hlophe, umenyezelwe njengomholi weMK ePhalamende.UHlophe, owayengumengameli wamajaji eWestern Cape, wachithwa ekubeni ijaji ngasekuqaleni konyaka.Iningi lamalungu ePhalamende lavotela ukuthi uHlophe achithwe emuva kokuthi uphenyo lwathola ukuthi wazama ukunxenxa amajaji ukuba enzelele umholi weMK owayebhekene necala lenkohlakalo ngaleso sikhathi, uJacob Zuma.Uphenyo lwathola ukuthi uHlophe waphula umthetho wokuziphatha, wathunaza umkhakha wamajaji. Kwakungokokuqala ngaphansi koMbuso wentandoyeningi ukuba kuchithwe ijaji.Yize iMK ibingakakumemezeli ukuqokwa kukaHlophe, incwadi yangaphakathi eputshukile ikhombisa ukuthi uHlophe usesiqhoqhobele isikhundla.Incwadi eputshukile ibhalwe ngunobhala jikelele weMK, uMnuz Arthur Zwane. Le ncwadi ibhekiswe kubo bonke osotswebhu beMK ebangaphansi kweziShayamthetho, ibiza uHlophe ngosotswebhu wasePhalamende. Yize kunjalo kodwa leli qembu libuye lakuchitha ukuthi uHlophe usenalesi sikhundla. Okhulumela iMK, uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndhlela, uthe uHlophe usilungele isikhundla aqokelwe kusona."Uyisishoshovu esizabalaze iminyaka silwela ukuba kube nokulingana. Kuyasijabulisa ukuthi uHlophe abe ingxenye yeMK. Sizimisele ukuhlanganisa bonke abafuna ukubona abantu abamnyama beya phambili."UNdhlela uthe uHlophe uzoqapha ngeso lokhozi ukusebenza kukahulumeni wobumbano oholwa i-ANC, DA namanye amaqembu amancane.UHlophe kulindeleke ukuthi afunge namanye amalungu eMK. Wonke amalungu eMK awazange aye ukuyofungiswa mhla kwakufungiswa amalungu ePhalamende.Lokhu ayekwenza ngoba ekhala ngemiphumela yokhetho, aze azama nokumisa umcimbi wokufungiswa kwamalungu ePhalamende, kepha inkantolo yabachitha.Emuva kokufungiswa kwamanye amalungu ePhalamende, iMK yamemezela ukuthi amalungu ayo azokuya kofungiswa. Akukacaci ukuthi azofungiswa nini amalungu eMK. IMK yathola izihlalo ezingu-58 ePhalamende.Ohlwini lwamalungu eMK aya ePhalamende kukhona indodakazi kaZuma, uNkk Duduzile Zuma-Sambudla, owayenguNgqongqoshe ngesikhathi kusaphethe uZuma, uMnuz Des van Rooyen, ikhansela lakumasipala waseThekwini, uMnuz Visvi Reddy, nobengunobhala jikelele weMK, uMnuz Sihle Ngubane.Uhlu lokuqala lwamalungu eMK aya ePhalamende lwalukade luholwa nguZuma, kepha wakhishwa emva kokuthi inkantolo inqume ukuthi akakulungele ukuba ilungu lePhalamende ngoba wagetshwa isikhathi esingaphezu konyaka ebhadla ejele.Igama likaZuma lalilandelwa elaloyo owabhalisa ngokusemthethweni iMK, uMnuz Jabulani Khumalo.UKhumalo ngeke afungiswe namanye amalungu eMK ngoba waxoshwa enhlanganweni. UKhumalo uzame wehluleka ukuphonsela inselelo ukuxoshwa kwakhe.

USIHLALO weKwaMashu Taxi Association uMnuz Philani "Splash" Ngwenya uthembise umphakathi waKwaMashu ukuthi uzowakhela istudiyo esiseqophelweni eliphezulu ngenhloso yokuthuthukisa intsha yakuleli kwezobuciko emcimbini obusehholo lomphakathi eNkanyisweni, KwaMashu esigcemeni sakwa-F muva nje.UNgwenya uveze lokhu ngesikhathi enomcimbi obizwa nge-INK Kasi Experience Business Empowerment, lapho intsha ibifundiswa ngezinto ezithinta ubuciko.Lo mcimbi ubuhanjelwe yizinkakha kwezokulingisa kanye nezomculo okubalwa kuzo oMnuz Mbuso Khoza, Professor, Edmund Mhlongo ongumsunguli we-K-CAP kanye noMthunzi Dubazana oyi-Creative Director emdlalweni wethelevishini, Uzalo.Ekhuluma nabezindaba, uthe uhlele lo mcimbi ngenxa yothando analo ngentsha yaKwaMashu ."Angiyena umuntu ogxile kakhulu ezintweni zamaciko kwazise ngisemkhakheni wamatekisi namanye amabhizinisi, kodwa ngenxa yothando enginalo ngentsha yalapha KwaMashu ngithe akube nalo mcimbi. Inhloso yawo bekuwukuthi labo asebephambili kwezobuciko bazocobelela intsha efisayo ngelinye ilanga ukuziphilisa ngakho ukucikoza, okungaba ukucula, ukulingisa nokunye,” kusho uNgwenya.Uthe istudiyo azosakha ufisa sikhiqize abalingisi, abaculi nabahleli bamafilimu abazohlonishwa umhlaba wonke.Entsheni ebihambele umcimbi kubalwa abafundi bezikole iNqabakazulu Secondary, iSibonelo High, uMzuvele High namalungu omphakathi.UNgwenya uphinde abe ngumhleli wendumezulu yomcimbi oba njalo ngoDisemba obizwa nge-INK Kasi Experience oba sePrincess Magogo Stadium kulo nyaka ozobe uqeda iminyaka engu-10 wasungulwa. Kulo nyaka udalule ukuthi kuzobe kunabaculi okubalwa kubo uMurda Bongs, Sjava, Lwa Ndlunkulu, Saliwa asebeqinisekisile ukuthi bayobe beyingxenye yawo.

I-BLACK Business Federation (BBF) ithi uhulumeni akazihlole yena ngezinhlangano ezibizwa ngele-construction mafia ezifuna umsebenzi wokwakha ngodli, zisabise abangakhokhi imali yokuvikelwa.UNobhala Jikelele we-BBF, uMnuz Wonder Jaca, uthe inkinga yabadla umsebenzi ngenkani yaqalwa wosopolitiki abangafuni ukwenza izinto ngendlela.Uveze ukuthi eminyakeni ewu-10 edlule, kwavunyelwana ukuthi u-30% womsebenzi wokuthuthukisa ingqalasizinda kahulumeni uzonikwa osomabhizinisi abancane abamnyama kodwa osopolitiki abalulandeli uhlelo oluqondile, bafaka abantu babo noma beze nezabo izinkampani.“Uzokhumnbula ukuthi kudala osomabhizinisi abamnyama ababekhathele wukukhishelwa ngaphandle baqala uhlelo lokumisa imisebenzi yokwakha eThekwini namaphethelo. Sabe sesihlangana nomasipala nohulumeni wesifundazwe sesibizwa nge-Federation for Radical Economic Transformation (Ffret), kwavunyelwana ukuthi u-30% womsebenzi uzoza kosomabhizinisi abamnyama.”Uthe banohlu lwama-forum okwakulula ukuthi uma kunohlelo lwentuthuko endaweni ethile kwaziwe ukuthi nazi izinkampani ezidinga umsebenzi.“Osomabhizinisi abasebenzisana nathi sithole ukuthi bakhishwa inyumbazane, amakhansela, izikhulu zeminyango nabanye osopolitiki bakhetha ama-forum abo. Iye yaqala kanjalo-ke indaba ye-construction mafia efuna abantu imali.”Uthe emhlanganweni wabo noMphathiswa weMisebenzi yoMphakathi neNgqalasizinda KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Martin Meyer, balubekile lolu daba futhi banethemba lokuthi ngokusebenzisana sizotholakala isixazululo.“Njengoba udaba lwe-construction mafia selusixakile kufanele uhulumeni uzinuke amakhwapha. Thina sifisa kube nomthetho ozolawula ukusebenza kwama-business forum ngoba akhona. Kungalula ukuwalawula uma uhulumeni esebenzisana nathi.”Ukugcizelele ukuthi bona abaziphazamisi izinhlelo zokwakha ngakho akufanele bahlanganiswe ne-construction mafia.Uthe amaphoyisa kufanele abophe abaphula umthetho. Wathembisa ukuthi bayasebenzisana nezinhlaka zomthetho.UMeyer uthe umhlangano wakhe ne-BBF uhambe kahle futhi umnyango wakhe uhlale uvulelekile kubantu abalandela umthetho.

Inyosi yeSilo uMnuz uBuzetsheni kaSombila Mdletshe, iqinisekisile ukuthi uhulumeni waKwaZulu- Natal unqamule inkontileka yayo yokuhasha Ingonyama, uMisuzulu kaZwelithini.UMdletshe ukhulume neSolezwe ngoMsombuluko ntambama wathi incwadi ifike kuyena ngoLwesihlanu kodwa akazi ukuthi konakelephi.UMdletshe uthe inkontileka yakhe bekufanele iphele ngo-2025.Ngokwencwadi evela kuhulumeni ehhovisi likaNdunankulu, inkontileka izonqanyulwa ngo-Ephreli 30 futhi isizathu kuthiwa ukushoda kwenkece.UMdletshe kuthiwa ubewuholela ngenkampani yakhe umsebenzi awuqhuba eNdlunkulu.

PHEZU kokuba uhulumeni ashaya umthetho wokuthi akufanele kuphele izinsuku eziwu-30 osomabhizinisi bengakhokheliwe uma sebeqede ukwenza umsebenzi kodwa lo mkhuba usaqhubeka.UMnyango wezeziMali uveze ukuthi kunyaka wezimali ka-2023/24 iminyango kahulumeni ikhokhele imisebenzi ewu-362 068 eyenziwe wosomabhizinisi abahlukene.Kule misebenzi imali ewu-R35.1 billion ikhokhwe sekudlule izinsuku eziwu-30.Kuvele ukuthi ngoMashi iminyango kahulumeni ezifundazweni ibikweleta osomabhizinisi uR10.7 billion ngemisebenzi asebeyenzile. Bebekweletwa le mali yize sebethumele zonke izimfanelo zokuqeda umsebenzi futhi sekuphele nezinsuku eziwu-30 bazithumela.Lesi simo sibeka engcupheni osomabhizinisi nempilo yabasebenzi abaqashwe kulawo mabhizinisi.UMnuz Malusi Zondi ongumengameli weBlack Business Federation (BBF) uthe kuyishwa ukuthi iminyango kahulumeni isaqhubeka nokungakhokhi ngesikhathi.“Isimo esibuhlungu sokungakhokhelwa kosomabhizinisi uma sebeqedile ukwenza umsebenzi kahulumeni. Okubuhlungu wukuthi abakhokhelwa yize bezithumela zonke izimfanelo zokuqeda umsebenzi nezemali okufanele bayithole. Kubi ukuthi uhulumeni ushaya umthetho wokuthi abantu abakhokhelwe ngesikhathi kodwa abasebenzi bakhe abawulandeli,” kusho uZondi.Uthe ngenxa yalesi simo amabhizinisi amaningi ayavalwa ngoba uma usomabhizinisi engakhokheliwe kusho ukuthi izikweletu ziyanda, abasebenzi abaholi bese ephoqeleka ukuthi avale.Ubuye waveza ukuthi muva nje, kunosomabhizinisi abangakhokheliwe ngoba kuthiwa bajeziselwa ukuvotela amanye amaqembu abengaphethe umbuso.Ucele uhulumeni ukuthi aqinise isandla kubasebenzi abangakhokheli osomabhizinisi ngesikhathi ngoba lokhu akuhlukumezi nje usomabhizinisi kodwa kuhlukumeza nezinkumbi zabantu abaqashwe wosomabhizinisi.

UNGQONGQOSHE  wezabeSifazane, Abantu abasha, nabaphila nokuKhubazeka, uDkt Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma, uthe umthetho omusha wokulwa nokuhlukunyezwa ngokobulili uwubufakazi bokuzimisela kukhalumeni ekutheni unqobe le mpi.UDkt Dlamini Zuma usho lokhu ngesikhathi kusayinwa umthetho omusha wokusungulwa komkhandlu kazwelonke ozobhekana nokulwa nodlame lobulili. Umthetho usayinwe ezindlini zoMbuso ePitoli, emcimbini obuphethwe nguMengameli wezwe uCyril Ramaphosa.UDkt Dlamini Zuma uthe kufanele kuphele ukuphila ngokwesaba kwabesifazane.“ Lo mthetho uyisisekelo sokuqala sokwakha ikusasa elihle labesifazane nezingane. Kufanele singagcini nje ngokulwa nesihlava kodwa sisivimbe. Singakwenza lokhu uma sihlangene ngoba kufanele kuvikelwe zonke izakhamuzi,’’ kuphawula uDkt Dlamini Zuma.Uqhube wathi kuwumthwalo wawo wonke umuntu ukweseka abantu abahlukunyeziwe futhi kuvinjwe lo mkhuba. Uthe abantu abahlukane nokuthula uma bebona imikhuba igilwa emphakathini.URamaphosa osayine umthetho, uthe wathinteka kakhulu ngokukhala kwabesifazane bethi akusukunywe. Uthe uke wamenywa kwesinye isigcawu sokudingida amaqhinga okulwa nalo mhlolo nalapho kukhona owesifazane owakhumula wamkhombisa izibazi.Uthe kulapho anquma khona ukuthi kukhona okufanele kwenziwe ukubhekana nenkinga yokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane nezingane.

ISEZITHEBENI zikahulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal eyokuxhasa abazokwembathwa iSilo uMisuzulu kaZwelithini ohambweni lwaso lwasebukhosini baseMalawi okuthiwa ludinga imali engaphezu kukaR3 million.Udaba lokuxhasa abazokwembathwa iSilo ohambweni lwangesonto elizayo luxoxwa yihhovisi likaNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal noMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana kanye neziNdaba zoMdabu esifundazweni. ISilo sizohambela umcimbi waminyaka yonke waseMalawi, iMthetho Cultural Festival, oba ngo-Agasti.ISilo kuhlelwe ukuthi sembathwe abantwana basendlunkulu, amakhosi namabutho uma sesihambele lo mcimbi ozoqala ngoLwesithathu.UNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, uthe basalubheka lolu daba.“Lolu udaba lusezithebeni. Uzokhumbula ukuthi uMphathiswa wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana kanye neziNdaba zoMdabu (uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi) ubuye abe uNdunankulu kaZulu. Ngakho ke siyalubheka lolu daba. Uma ngingaphosisi sengathi uhambo luzodinga imali engaphezu kukaR3 million.”UNtuli ubekhuluma nabezindaba emva komhlangano weKhabhinethi, iLekgotla, ophele ngoLwesithathu.Kuvele sekukhona itwetwe kwabanye abantwana basendlunkulu abafisa ukuba yingxenye yohambo lwangesonto elizayo.Abanye bathe babona sengathi baningi abazophutha sebethembile.Umthombo osendlunkulu uthe bayalelwe ukuba banciphise ithimba labazokwembathwa iSilo.“Sitshelwe ukuthi kufanele kuhambe abantwana abalishumi kanye nasemabuthweni futhi kufuneka abalishumi. Kusho ukuthi baningi abazosala. Lokhu kuwukubukela phansi iSilo. Ingonyama yamaZulu iphethe isizwe esikhulu kabi, kufanele uma inyathela eMalawi kubonakale.”Lo mthombo uthe awazi ukuthi imali edingekayo ingaphezu kukaR3 million, wathi bazi ukuthi kufuneka imali engu-R400 000.Ulanda lo mthombo, uthe yize iSilo sizohamba ngebhanoyi bona batshelwe ukuthi bazohamba ngebhasi.“Lolo hambo mhlawumbe luzothatha izinsuku ezimbili ebhasini. Sofika sinjani eMalawi? Khona uyokube usekhona umdlandla wokuhuba uma sifika phambili? Sibona sengathi kukhona nokungacabangelani lapha.”Umcimbi uhlelwe Inkosi Ya Makhosi M’mbelwa V, wamaNgoni.AmaNgoni adubuka kwelikaMthaniya, afuduka ngesikhathi sezimpi eholwa uZwangendaba Gwaza kaZiguda Jele Gumbi.Inkosi yakhona inobudlelwano obuhle neSilo, yayikhona ngesikhathi iMbube ingena esibayeni.Isasasa likhulu eMalawi ngokunyathela kweSilo.UM’mbelwa uthe ukuhambela kweSilo eMalawi kuzoqinisa ubudlelwano bobukhosi bukaZulu nobamaNgoni.Lokhu ukusho embhalweni awufake ekhasini lakhe leFacebook.“Sikulangazelele ukufika kweSilo lapha kwelakithi.

UHULUMENI waKwaZulu-Natal uzongenela ezinkingeni ezikhungethe omasipala bakulesi sifundazwe.Uhulumeni wesifundazwe uthathe isinqumo sokulekelela bonke omasipala.Le sinqumo sithathwe emhlanganweni wezinsuku ezimbili wekhabhinethi, ilekgotla, ophele ngoLwesithathu.Undunankulu, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, uthe bonke omasipala baKwaZulu-Natal bayalelwe ukuba balwele ukuthola imibiko yomcwaningi mabhuku engenagcobho kulo nyaka wezimali ozoqala.“UMphathiswa woMnyango wokuBusa ngokuBambisana  (uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi) sithe akahambe ayobheka ukuthi imaphi amaphuzu amqoka omasipala okufanele sibalekelele kuwona  ukuze bathole imibiko engenawo ugcobho. Nokuthi akufanele sifike komasipala ngoba nakhu umcwaningi mabhuku esekhiphe imibiko. Kufanele imibiko yokusebenza kwemali yomasipala siyithole njalo emva kwezinyanga ezintathu.”UNtuli uthe omasipala babambe iqhaza elikhulu ekuhanjisweni kwezidingo.“Sithe ngeke sikubekezelele ukuthi omasipala bangenzi kahle. Omasipala bayithemba lethu. Intuthuko eningi yenziwa omasipala.”UNtuli uthe uhulumeni wesifundazwe usuzosebenzisana nomasipala.“Siqala umkhuba omusha manje wokusebenzisana nomasipala. Akufanele nje uma siyosebenza ezindaweni zomasipala, singabazisi. Omasipala abangaboni nje sesiqhamuka. Lokhu sizokwenza ngokubambisana nenhlangano yohulumeni basekhaya.”Ikhabhinethi yaKwaZulu-Natal ibunjwe amaqembu ehlukene, iqembu elathola amavoti amaningi esifundazweni iMK, lasala ngaphandle ngesikhathi kubunjwa uhulumeni, nosekwenze ukuthi kube khona abangawamukeli uhulumeni wesifundazwe.UNtuli ukuvumile ukuthi nakuba bona bebumbene njengamaqembu abusa ngokubambisana, abantu baKwaZulu-Natal basahlukene phakathi.“Kufanele siqhamuke nomyalezo ozokhombisa ubumbano. Thina njengamaqembu aphethe ngokubambisana kufanele sikhombise ubumbano.”UNtuli uthe wonke amaqembu ayingxenye kahulumeni wokubambisana, i-IFP, ANC, DA, neNFP, azimisele ukubona uhulumeni wesifundazwe uphumelela.“Indlela okuyiyona, kufanele umuntu we-IFP akhathazeke uma kunezinkinga kwi-ANC, nowe-ANC kufanele akhathazeke uma kunezinkinga kwi-IFP ngoba sonke sifuna ukuthi kube nozinzo kula maqembu. Uma kunozinzo kula maqembu kusho ukuthi uhulumeni wobumbano ngeke uphazamiseke.”UNtuli umemezele ukuqokwa koMphathiswa woMnyango wezokuThutha nokuHlaliswa kwaBantu, uMnuz Siboniso Duma, esikhundleni sokuxhumanisa ikhabhinethi lesifundazwe nesiShayamthetho.UDuma ubevele esiphethe le sikhundla ngesikhathi kusaphethe i-ANC.“Uzokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi awungeni lapho kungafanele ungene khona, ukuze kungabikhona ukuphambana kokusebenza kuhulumeni wethu.”

KUMJABULISILE ukuboshwa kukamakhelwane wakhe obengaphandle ngoshwele onikwa iziboshwa uyise wentombazane eyadlwengulwa yabulawa ngoMeyi nonyaka kubo eMlaza.UMnuz Mondli Ngcobo onguyise kaWandile Ngcobo (17), ubonge amaphoyisa ngomsebenzi wawo wathi umsolwa umuntu obehlala emzini ohlukaniswe wumgwaqo nowakhe.Isidumbu sikaWandile, owayefunda uGrade 11 eDurban Girls Secondary, satholakala sinamanxena okugwazwa emzimbeni, siboshwe izandla savalwa umlomo nge-pentihose ngoLwesibili ngoMeyi 28 nonyaka.Kwebiwa iTV ne-remote, idecoder neselula kamufi okusolakala ukuthi waqale wadlwengulwa.Umsolwa oneminyaka ewu-39 uboshwe ngeSonto ekuseni esekubhaceni KwaShembe, eClermont.Kuqale kwaboshwa indoda ena-25 eMalukazi ngoMgqibelo okuthiwa itholwe nefoni kamufi.“Kungijabulisile ukuboshwa kwabasolwa ngoba le nto ibiyindida. Kwaqale kwasolwa umfana wami kodwa kwashintsha lokho. Kuyacaca ukuthi umsolwa wangigada ngahamba waseyongena ingane seyisele yodwa. Ngibonga amaphoyisa, asebenzile,” kusho uNgcobo.UNgcobo uthe umsolwa uphuma esigwebeni seminyaka engu-15. Ugcine ukubonakala endaweni ngosuku lwesigameko sekusele iziqashi kubo. Uthe akazi wayekade edonsa isigwebo saliphi icala umsolwa nokuthi hloboluni lempilo ayiphilayo.UNgcobo uthe amaphoyisa aphenye naye uqobo, kwadingeka alethe ubufakazi obushoyo ukuthi wayengekho kwakhe ngesikhathi kwehla isigameko.Ube esekhala ngamakhaza kahulumeni asePark Rynie ayegcine isidumbu sikaWandile asole ukuthi ayengasebenzi amafriji akhona.“Ingane yami yafa kabili. Isidumbu sayo sasonakele sihanjwa izibungu amehlo eseshone phakathi. Asilethwanga nasemlindelweni ngendlela esase sonakele ngayo. Ngisifakile isimangalo ngahlinzeka nangobufakazi kubaphathi balendawo,” kubalisa uNgcobo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, Brigadier Jay Naicker kulindeleke ukuthi abasolwa bavele enkantolo yeMantshi eMlaza. Umsolwa wesibili yena uthe uzovela kule nkantolo ngoLwesibili. UNaicker uthe abaphenyi basebenze ubusuku nemini beqoqa ubufakazi.“Uphenyo luholele ekuboshweni komsola ona-26 otholakale nefoni kamufi ngoMgqibelo eMalukazi. Kuphinde kwaboshwa umsolwa ona-39 ngesikabhadakazi ngeSonto KwaShembe, eClermont. Ubekwe icala lokudlwengula nelokubulala. Lo msolwa ubengaphandle ngoshwele onikezwa iziboshwa,” kusho uNaicker.

UPHENDUKELWE amakhansela eqembu lakhe uMengameli weTeam Sugar SA (TSSA), uMnuz Musa “Shukela” Thwala, okhishwe esikhundleni sephini lemeya kuMasipala waseNewcastle.Isolezwe  lithole ukuthi amakhansela amane eTSSA avotele isiphakamiso sokungabethembi ubuholi bukaThwala emhlanganweni womkhandlu obungeledlule.Kulo mhlangano amakhansela avumelane ngokuthi uThwala akhishwe esigungwini esiphezulu, bese isikhala sakhe sithathwa elinye ikhansela leTSSA.Ukukhishwa kwakhe esigungwini esiphezulu kusho ukuthi uzophunyukwa nayisikhundla sokuba usihlalo wekomiti elibhekelele ingqalasizinda yamanzi nemigwaqo.I-TSSA inamakhansela ayisikhombisa kulo mkhandlu, ibambisene ne-IFP ekuphatheni.Amakhansela eTSSA ayekade eyalelwe ukuthi angalubhadi emhlanganweni.Ngaphambilini, uThwala wake waveza ukuthi akanelisekile ngokubambisana kwabo ne-IFP kuMasipala waseNewcastle, kuvela ukuthi amakhansela eqembu lakhe ahlukene phakathi ngalolu daba njengoba kukhona asafuna beqhubeke nokusebenzisana ne-IFP.USomlomo womkhandlu, uMntwana uThengi Zulu, uthe uThwala ukhishelwe ukulova emihlanganweni.“Walova emihlanganweni emithathu yesigungu esiphezulu elandelanayo. Sibe sesivumelana ngokuthi akhishwe esigungwini esiphezulu. Naye uThwala uyazi ukuthi umthetho awuvumi ukuthi ikhansela lilove emihlanganweni emithathu elandelanayo.”Amakhansela e-ANC nawe-EFF awazange alubhade emhlanganweni.UMntwana uThengi uthe wonke amakhansela ayazisiwe ngomhlangano, kodwa amanye akhetha ukungezi.Uthe uThwala ubazisile ukuthi uzokuphonsela inselelo ukukhishwa kwakhe esikhundleni.“Wangishayela ucingo emva komhlangano, wathi angimthumelele amaminithi omhlangano. Wangitshela ukuthi abameli bakhe bafuna ukuthatha izinyathelo. Ngimtshelile ukuthi amaminithi omhlangano uzowathola uma esephasisiwe. Naye uyazi ukuthi amaminithi awukwazi ukuwathola ngokushesha, kufanele aqale alungiswe, bese eyaphasiswa emhlanganweni womkhandlu. Thina sanelisekile ukuthi kwalandelwa yonke imigomo ngesikhathi kunomhlangano.”UThwala uthe ubengakayitholi into ebhalwe phansi esho ukuthi usekhishiwe esikhundleni kodwa wathi usephuciwe imoto yomkhandlu nabaqaphi.“Kuyangikhathaza lokhu kokuthi ngiphucwe abaqaphi njengoba kunenkinga yokubulawa kosopolitiki KwaZulu-Natal. Ngizokuphonsela inselelo ukukhishwa kwami ngoba akuzange kulandelwe imigomo.”UThwala uthe azothathelwa izinyathelo zokuqondiswa ubugwegwe amakhansela eTSSA ashaya indiva umyalelo wokuba angayi emhlanganweni.“Isigungu esiphezulu kwiTSSA sahlala phansi, savumelana ngokuthi amakhansela eTSSA angayi emhlanganweni ngoba sasingajabule ngezinhlelo ezithile. Uma sesithole amaminithi omhlangano, sizothatha izinyathelo ezifanele.”

UMBUSO umkhiphe phambili umrepha nongumethuli wezinhlelo zethelevishini, uJub Jub, emacaleni obegebengu abebekwe wona obekubalwa kuwo izinsolo zokudlwengula, ukuzama ukubulala nokushaya kanzima ngoLwesine.Encwadini ethunyelelwe abameli bakaJub Jub, ogama lakhe lokuzalwa wuMolemo Maarohanye, ngoJune 20, oyibamba likasekela mqondisi womshushisi eGoli, uTebogo Maodi, uthe emva kokucubungula imininingwane yecala abanayo, kanjalo nombiko womshushisi, babone kufanele ahoxiswe wonke lavmacala abebekwe wona ngoba akukho okufakazela ukuthi kumele uJub Jub ashushiselwe wona.“Ngakho-ke izethulo zenu ziphumelele futhi necala selihoxisiwe,” kusho uMaodi ngezimfishane. UPhindi Mjonondwana wophiko lwezokushushisa iNational Prosecuting Authority, uyiqinisekisile le ncwadi, wathi emva kokucubungula idokodo lecala, umbiko womshushisi nezethulo ezivela ehhovisi lomshushisi omkhulu, babone kunganele ukwenza kufanele ukuthi ummangalelwa ashushiswe.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi kuze kufikwa lapha nje, uJub Jub wavulelwa icala ngowayeyintombi yakhe, u-Amanda Du Point, ongumethuli wezinhlelo zethelevishini  nomlingisi, embeka icala lokuthi wamhlukumeza ngokocansi, icala lavulwa esiteshini samaphoyisa iBrixton, eGoli ngo-2022.Ngaphambi kokuvula icala, u-Amanda waqala ngokuqopha i-video wayifaka ekhasini lakhe lika-Instagram, lapho ayesola khona uJub Jub ukuthi wamdlwengula.Lokho kwenzeka emva kokuthi uJub Jub ayemenywe ohlelweni lukaMacG lakwiYouTube, iPodcast and Chill, lapho akhuluma khona izinto ezilumelayo ngo-Amanda.Abewu-14 uma esewonke amacala abekwe uJub Jub, kanti wonke ahoxisiwe okwenza losaziwayo wodumo lwengoma ethi Ngikhokhele abe ngokhululekile manje.Esitatimendeni asithumele abezindaba khona izolo, uJub Jub ubonge ithimba labameli bakhe ngokumsiza atholwe engenacala kuwo wonke amacala abebekwe wona.Uthe ukutholwa engenacala kwenza akhululeke futhi kwehlise umthwalo empilweni yakhe, ngakho uyabonga kubo bonke abame nayo kuzo zonke lezi zimo abebhekene nazo.

IMEYA yeTheku, uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda, ithi ijijimeze uSihlalo we-IFP KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thami Ntuli ngencwadi yabameli imsola ngokuyihlambalaza.Kulezi zinsuku osopolitiki balokhu bejikijelane njalo ngamagama bezamela amaqembu abo amavoti njengoba kubhekwe okhethweni lukazwelonke ngoMeyi 29.UNtuli oyiMeya kaMasipala iKing Cetshwayo, ungenele umbango wesikhundla sikandunankulu wesifundazwe. Kulezi zinsuku uNtuli unqamula izinkalo ekhankasela iqembu lakhe.UKaunda uthi uNtuli ukhulume into angenabo ubufakazi bayo emsola ngenkohlakalo ekhankasa eMlaza, ngempelasonto edlule. UNtuli ekhuluma eMlaza, uthe uma i-IFP inqoba isifundazwe izohlakaza uMasipala weTheku, bakhiphe uKaunda nozakwabo ngoba bakhohlakele.UMnuz Mluleki Mntungwa okhulumela iMeya yeTheku, uthe izinsolo zikaNtuli azinaso isisekelo. Uthe uKaunda unike uNtuli izinsuku eziyisikhombisa ukuthi ayobika emaphoyiseni ngenkohlakalo akhuluma ngayo noma ahoxise amagama akhe.Uthe uma uNtuli ehlulwa yilokho uzothathelwa izinyathelo zomthetho yena neqembu lakhe i-IFP.“Siyaqonda ukuthi yisikhathi sokhetho manje kodwa sinxusa i-IFP ukuthi iwacele kahle amavoti iyeke ukusabalalisa amanga nemfundisoze. Sizimisele ukulwa nalolonke uhlobo lwenkohlaklo kumasipala,’’ kusho isitatimende seMeya yeTheku.UNtuli ebuzwa ngalokhu uthe uqala nokuyizwa indaba yokuthi uboshwa wuKaunda ngalolu daba.“Angikayitholi incwadi, ngiqala ukuzwa ngawe nje lokho,’’ kusho uNtuli obezwakala ukuthi akafuni ukwanda ngalolu daba. UKaunda ukhala kakhulu nangokuthi uNtuli wakhuluma la mazwi phambi kwenqwaba yabantu nabezindaba bethe shayi.Kwenzeka lokhu nje, iMeya kaMasipala wesiFunda iZululand, uMfundisi uThulasizwe Buthelezi, yajijimeza uMphathiswa wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, uNomagugu Simelane, ngencwadi.UButhelezi usola uMphathiswa ngokumhlambalaza ngesikhathi eqhuba umkhankaso we-ANC esifundeni iZululanda.

UYISE womunye wabayisishiyigalolunye ababulawe ngamaphoyisa eDesai, eMariannhill uthi ubehlale emkhuza umfana wakhe ukuthi makahlukane nabangani bakhe abangalungile, ashone nabo.Lona wesilisa ukhulume kanje embizweni yomphakathi noNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa uMnuz Bheki Cele kule ndawo ngoLwesine.Le ndoda enqabile negama layo kodwa yadalula elomfana wayo oshonile, ethe u-Andile Makhathini iveze ukuthi ngumuzi wakubo lapho okwenzeke khona isigameko.Izwakalisa nokukhathazeka kwayo ngokuthi amaphoyisa amane aqhulula ngenhlamvu wonke umuntu obengaphakathi endlini ekubeni bekukhona nabangenacala.Kwabangenacala uthe bekungumzala ka-Andile obekade evakashile, uLungisani Simelane waKwaMashu.“Into engiphatha kabuhlungu ukuthi kuthiwa nabo bebephindisela kodwa bekungekho lutho olukhombisa ukuthi bebephindisela. Bebekhona vele abangani bakhe (u-Andile) ebebengalungile,’’ echaza.Uthe kungamampunge ukuthi ababulewe bebeyizinkabi, okumphathe kabi ukubulawa kwabo. Uqhubeke ngokuthi ngabe kungcono ukuthi bathathiwe bayoboshwa ngoba bebengalwi, kodwa bamane baqhululwa ngenhlamvu.“Bengingekho ngesikhathi kwenzeka isigameko, ngishayelwe ucingo. Ngifike ekuseni ngathi ngizama ukungena ekhaya amaphoyisa angihlehlisa ngoshova, angithuka,’’ echaza.Uthe kulaba ababulewe kukhona abaziyo nabanye abengabazi. Uveze ukuthi ubemkhuza u-Andile ukuthi makahlukane nalaba bangani bakhe abangalungileYilapho-ke uCele engene khona wambuza ukuthi kanti ubazi ukuthi bayabheda abangani bakhe?Waphendula ngokuthi ubebazi abanye babo ukuthi bayabheda. Kuthe uma uCele embuza ukuthi bebebheda benzani, wabhoka ngolaka.“Baba uCele angihambi nezingane mina, kodwa ngisasho namanje ukuthi bebekhona ababhedayo. Ngiyazi ukuthi bebekhona ababhedayo bebamba inkunzi,’’ kusho lendoda.Ibigcizelela ibuza ukuthi sekuwumthetho waseNingizimu Afrika yini ukuthi amaphoyisa amane adubule wonke umuntu nabamsulwa?Amaphoyisa athi afike kulendawo ngenhloso yokuzobopha abasolwa abathile kanti azongqongqoza emnyangweni okungewona.Aqhuba athi abe esedutshulwa abantu abebekade bekwenye indlu, nokuyilapho ephindisele kwaphangalala abayisishiyagalolunye.Aveze ukuthi ababili bakwazile ukubaleka, basagcwele amathafa.

OMELE iBuild One SA Movement (Bosa) embangweni wesikhundla sikaNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Ntokozo Biyela ukhala ngamathuba okufukula umnotho wesifundazwe athi awasetshenziswa.UBiyela uthe iKwaZulu-Natal ingaba yisikhondlakhondla kwezomnotho uma kungasetshenziswa amathuba akhona.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma neSolezwe lapho ephawula khona ngokuqokwa kwakhe ukungenela umbango wesikhundla sikaNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal.UBiyela uthembise ukusebenzisa lamathuba ezomnotho ukufukula iKwaZulu-Natal uma benqoba okhethweni oluzayo.Uthe iKwaZulu-Natal inamachweba amabili amakhulu, elaseThekwini nelaseRichard’s Bay, angasetshenziswa ngokugcwele.“Maningi amathuba akhona kula machweba, kuphinde kube nezimayini ezingakatholakali. Uma kungavulwa lezi zimayini, maningi amathuba angavela,” kusho uBiyela.Umbango wokuhola iKwaZulu-Natal mkhulu, lesi sifundazwe singesesibili ngokwesibalo sabantu abaningi ababhalisele ukuvota.UBiyela uthe babheke ukuthi intsha kube yiyona ezobaweza embangweni wokuhola isifundazwe.Kubantu abangu-27.79 million ababhalisele ukuvota kuzwelonke, abangu-11.7 million baneminyaka ephakathi kuka-18 no-39.“Umbango mkhulu kakhulu KwaZulu-Natal, sizibona sinethuba. Konke kusezandleni zabantu bakhona. Kukubona ukuthi ngabe bayafuna yini ukuholwa abaholi abanamava, sizokhuluma nentsha, siyicele ukubambisana nathi.“Sizoyinxusa ngokuhambisana nathi ngoba inhloso enkulu yethu ukwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi iba nekusasa eliqhakazile,” kuqhuba uBiyela.Udalule ukuthi balungiselela ukwethula umqulu wezethembiso KwaZulu-Natal cishe ngo-Ephreli yize usudlulile okazwelonke, bebesalindele ukuthi kumenyezelwe ozomela iqembu kulesi sifundazwe.UBiyela ongowokuzalwa eNquthu, useke wabamba izikhundla ezahlukene ezinkampanini ezinkulu usekulungele ukuphatha iKwaZulu-Natal kanti akawangabazi amava anawo.Isimemezelo sokuthi uBiyela uzomela iBosa kwesobundunankulu ngoLwesihlanu kanti nguyena kuphela osamenyezelwe kweso balesi sifundazwe.Okhulumela iBosa kuzwelonke uMnuz Roger Solomons uthe bakhethe ukuqala KwaZulu-Natal ngenxa yombango oshisa phansi khona.

ULOKHU ekhale njalo ngobungozi bendodakazi owesilisa waseChatsworth eThekwini okumanje umatasa nokunakekela izilonda zokusha emva kokuthi imbhunyele ngamanzi abilayo ngeledlule.UMnuz Sithembiso Ngidi (42) uthe ugcine eyivulela icala indodakazi yakhe (20)  yize ifunda u-matric, yase ikhalelwa amasongo kaSigonyela. Uthe isigameko abengasilindele futhi esimshiye ethuthumela senzeke ngoMsombuluko.Elandisa ngesehlakalo, uthe simehlele ngesikhathi ebuyile lapho esebenza khona ezochitha isikhathi nomndeni njengoba esebenzela kude, ebuya njalo uma kuphele inyanga.“Siqhathwe ukuthi ngimbuze ukuthi kungani engayenzi imisebenzi yakhe yasekhaya njengentombazane. Ngibuza lokhu nje, umama (73) ubeqeda kukhala ngokuthi usuku lonke akakaze adle namaphilisi akawaphuzile,” kusho uNgidi.Uthe wayeyicele kahle indodakazi ukuthi yenze imisebenzi yasendlini njengokupheka, ukuhlanza indlu nezitsha, bese isondezela unina (ongugogo kumsolwa) amanzi okuthi aphuze amaphilisi.Uveze ukuthi unina akakwazi ukuzenzela izinto kulandela ukuphuka onyaweni eshayiswa yimoto, waphinde wehlelwa omunye umshophi, wokuwa  waphuka ingalo emasontweni ambalwa edlule.“Umntanami ngangimtshelile ukuthi njengoba umama enenkinga yokuba nonyawo olulodwa nengalo eyodwa, ngithembe yena ukuthi abe yiso amnakekele,” kusho uNgidi.Ngosuku lwesigameko, uthe emva kokuyithethisa indodakazi, iphume iyishodi, ibheke kwamakhelwane kanti iyobilisa amanzi.“Sisale sazibukela ithelevishini nomunye umngani wami. Ngizwe ngigodola, ngangena ekamelweni ngiyolanda ingubo yokulala ukuze ngimbathe. Ngithe ngibuya nayo, ngisathi ngisazisonga, ngezwa ngomngani wami ethi ‘Sthe bhasobha’. Ngithe ngisathi ngiyaqalaza ukuthi yini le athi angiyibhasobhe, asho amanzi abilayo ebusweni,” kusho uNgidi.Udalule ukuthi ubezitshela ukuthi uzoyiyeka indodakazi yakhe ngemenze khona kodwa ubuye washintsha umqondo esezwa izinkulumo zayo ezithusayo.“Ngithole ngomakhelwane ukuthi uyakhuluma, uthi ngoba amanzi awangibulali, usezongitholela abantu abazongibulala,” usho kanje.Uqhube wathi: “Le ngane icwile otshwaleni. Iyingozi. Ayihloniphi muntu.”Uthe akafuni nokuthi ithole ibheyili, ngoba usebonile ukuthi iyingozi, ingambulala nokumbulala.

UYAVEVA umlimi osola uMasipala wesiFunda iZululand ngokugweva ukumkhokhela imali yezinkomo umkhandlu owayikhipha ngesikhathi kugcotshwa inkosi yaseMbongobongweni, uMzamo Buthelezi, nowakhalisa ngayo umndeni wenkosi yakwaMpungose oLundi ngesikhathi kushona indodana yenkosi. UMnuz Siphiwe Sithole uthe sekuphele isikhathi eside umasipala ungafuni ukumkhokhela imali yalezi zinkomo.USithole uthe wahlinzeka umasipala ngenkomazi ngesikhathi kugcotshwa uButhelezi, waphinde wenza okufanayo nangesikhathi umasipala uyokhalisa inkosi yakwaMpungose.Uthe sezihlangene lezinkomo zibiza u-R42 000.USithole uthe usegqigqe emahhovisi omkhandlu waze wakhathala.“Uma ngiya khona ngifike ngiyiswe le, nale. Okubuhlungu ukuthi bona bayahola, mina angikhokhelwa. Njengoba kukade kuwumhlaka-25 nje, bona baholile, mina angitholanga lutho. Bona bayaqhubeka nezimpilo zabo, mina ngilinde ukukhokhelwa imali yami.”Umcimbi wokugcotshwa kwenkosi yaseMbongobongweni wawuhanjelwe nayiSilo uMisuzulu Sinqobile kaZwelithini kanye nezikhulu zikahulumeni.USithole uthe okumcasulayo ukuthi umasipala wafike wanconywa ngokuletha inkomo ongasafuni manje ukuyikhokhela.“Angithi babefuna ukuyobukwa, manje ke abasafuni ke ukukhokha.”USithole uthe ukungakhokhelwa kwalezi zinkomo kuphazamisa ibhizinisi lakhe.Uthe uziphilisa ngokuthenga izinkomo ezindalini eDundee, Newcastle, Mooi-River, naseVryheid.“Ngiyaye ngizithathe lezi zinkomo, ngizozidayisa lapha oLundi. Uyacabanga ukuthi ngabe yimalini esengiyenzile ngalo-R42 000 abangafuni ukungikhokhela wona kulezi zinyanga ezine? Kubuhlungu ngoba sicindezelwa yiwo umkhandlu singabantu abamnyama. Uma beyothenga emabhunwini, bafike bakhokhe ngaso leso sikhathi, kuthina bantu abamnyama abakhokhi.”USithole uthe nasekhaya impilo ayihambi kahle.“Izingane zami azikhokhile ezikoleni. Kukhona efunda eMooi River. Njengoba kuzovulwa izikole nje kuthiwe ingabuyi ingakhokhile. Angazi ukuthi kufanele ngenze njani manje.”USithole uthe akasafuni ukuphinde asebenzisane nalo mkhandlu.“Into nje engiyifunayo ukuthi bangikhokhele imali yami bese ngiyaphuma kubona.”Umasipala uthe uSithole uzokhokhelwa maduze, wathi empeleni kufanele engabe kade akhokhelwa.Ngokwempendulo, umasipala uthe inkinga idalwe ukuthi uSithole washintsha imininingwane yasebhange ngesikhathi uhlela ukumkhokhela."Saxoxa naye izikhathi eziningi, elokhu ephika ukuthi ushintshe imininingwane. Besilokhu simncenga ukuthi akalethe okukhombisa ukuthi useshintshe imininingwane yasebhange. Useze wakuletha konke, imali yakhe uzoyithola maduze."

UHLUSHWA wumcabango wokuthi ngeke esaqasheka emkhakheni awufundele kanzima ngenxa yeminyaka  yakhe, ophothule iziqu zakhe emva kokuthi wayeqale wasebenza enkampanini ehlanza esibhedlela iminyaka eyisikhombisa.UNksz Zanele Mathenjwa (37) ongowokudabuka eGroutville, KwaDukuza, wethweswe iziqu i-Degree in Environmental Science yi-University of South Africa ngesonto eledlule. Yize ukusebenza kanzima kukaNksz Mathenjwa nesifiso sokuguqula isimo sakubo nokuthweswa lezi ziqu kulethe inhlansana yethemba, kodwa uthe injabulo anayo ibuye ibe nebohlololo uma ecabanga imigomo yezinkampani eziningi kuleli neminyango kahulumeni enikeza ithuba abantu abaneminyaka engaphansi kuka-35 ama-internship okuyiwo akuvulela iminyango namava adingekayo emkhakheni osuke ulangazelele ukuqashwa kuwo.“Ngijabule kakhulu, yikhona ukuthi angazi ngizoqashwa kuphi njengoba sengineminyaka ewu-37 nje, yilokho okungikhathazayo. Ngiwumuntu okhule ekhaya kulinywa, ngakho izinto ezisondelene nemvelo nezolimo yizinto engikhule ngizithanda.  Yingakho ngaqoka ukwenza lezi ziqu, engizenze iminyaka emine kusuka ngo-2020,” usho kanje.UNksz Mathenjwa uthe waqeda u-matric ngo-2008 esikoleni samabanga aphezulu eGroutville. Kuthe ngo-2012  wathola umsebenzi wokuhlanza enkampanini ehlanza esibhedlela i-Alberlito esiseBallito. Ngo-2017, kwavalwa inkampani ayesebenza kuyo, wabe esefikelwa wumcabango wokubuyela esikoleni ayolungisa u-matric wakhe njengoba wayengaphasanga kahle. Ngaleso sikhathi wayeneminyaka engu-30, kanti kwadingeka ukuthi aqale ku-grade 11 esikoleni amukelwa kusona iBhekikusasa High eMpangeni.  Ngo-2019, waphasa u-matric wakhe ngo-B, wathola isikhala sokufunda e-Unisa ngo-2020, kusuka lapho akabange esabheka emuva.Uthe beziningi izinselelo abhekana nazo ngesikhathi efunda kule nyuvesi kwazise ubengafundi ngokugcwele kanti ubesevele esebenza njengomsebenzi ojwayelekile nje kwenye yezimboni khona KwaDukuza nokuyilapho asasebenza khona namanje.“Bengibuya emsebenzini ngikhathele, kwesinye isikhathi kade ngingena ebusuku ngizela, kodwa kuphoqa ukuthi ngenze umsebenzi wesikole. Bekunzima kangangoba ngo-2022 kukhona isifundo engisifeyilile kwaphoqa ukuthi ngisiphinde nyakenye ukuze ngithweswe iziqu zami,” usho kanje.Uthe isifiso sakhe ukuthola umsebenzi awufundele ukuze athole amava adingekayo.

UQOME ukuzibhixa ngothuvi kunokubingelela iMantshi owesilisa osolwa ngokubulala uyise. Ngokwemibiko yamaphoyiseni,  ibhungu elineminyaka engu-24 laxabana noyise ngeSonto ekhaya kubo kwaMhlushwa, eMpumalanga. Ngemuva kwengxabano uyise wahamba waya esontweni engazi ukuthi uzobuya indodana yakhe imlalele unyendle.“Ngesikhathi ubaba wekhaya ebuya esontweni, indodana yakhe yamhlasela yambokoda ngommese iphindelela,” kusho uCaptain Magonseni Nkosi.Kuthiwa umgilwa oneminyaka engu-64 wazama ukubaleka kodwa wawa. Kwasiza omakhelwane ababona igazi bahlaba umkhosi kwafika abezimo eziphuthumayo kodwa ngeshwa akasindanga.Umsolwa waboshwa wabekwa icala lokubulala.Kuthe ngoMsombuluko sekumele ahanjiswe enkantolo, amaphoyisa abhekana nenkinga efica lo mlisa ezibhixe ngothuvi bakhe.Kuphoqe ukuthi lo msolwa ogama lakhe nguTsepo Dlamini avele ngoLwesibili enkantolo yeMantshi eNkomazi, ukubhekana necala lokubulala.

UDEDELWE ngebheyili ka-R 5000 uNobhala we-ANC eThekwini, uMnuz Musa Nciki nomqaphi wakhe uMnuz Ivan Khoza, ababoshelwe izinsolo zokungahloniphi imithetho yomgwaqo. UNciki noKhoza bavele eNkantolo yeMantshi eThekwini, bathola ibheyili, icala lase lihlehlela u-Ephreli 10, ukuze kuqhubeke uphenyo.Okhulumela abezokushushisa (NPA) KwaZulu-Natal , uNkk Natasha Ramkisson-Kara, uthe abasolwa babhekene necala lokushayela budedengu. Uthe abakwazanga ukumisa imoto irobhothi livalile futhi bebeshayela imoto engagunyaziwe.UNciki nomqaphi wakhe baboshwe ngoLwesithathu ebusuku, emgwaqweni uLighthouse, eMhlanga, eThekwini. Kuthiwa uNciki uzithethelele ngokuthi babone bexinwa yimoto ebingabonakali ukuthi eyamaphoyisa, bayexwaya.UNciki waziwa ngokuba yisithenjwa sikasihlalo we-ANC, eThekwini uNkk Zandile Gumede, futhi bakhethwa kanye kanye engqungutheleni ngo-2022. UNciki enkantolo ubonakale engaxwayile, efake isikibha esiluhlaza esifake ngaphakathi nejakhethi.UNciki ubonakale ebingelela abezindaba eseshona phansi emgodini, eyolinda kulungiswe udaba lwebheyili yakhe. UKhoza ubehamba phambili efake ishethi eliluhlaza naye engaxwayile kangako.UNobhala we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Bheki Mtolo esitatimendeni, uthe abakwazi ukuphawula, balinde umbiko ophelele. Bathe bayezwa abezindaba bebabuza ngokuboshwa komholi wesifunda.“Okwamanje sibona sengathi ngeke kube yinto ephusile ukuphawula ngodaba olusasetshenzwa amaphoyisa. Sizokwazi ukuphawula uma sesithole umbiko ophelele ovela kubaholi besifunda,’’ kusho UMtolo.I-ANC inomgomo wokuthi abaholi abahamba amacala bashenxe ezikhundleni kuze kusombululwe amacala enkantolo. UMtolo akakuphathanga lokho, wathi bazobuye baphawule kahle.IMeya yaseMngeni, uMnuz Chris Pappas, engenele umbango wesikhundla sikandunankulu iphawulile ngalolu daba. UPappas uthe bayakwemukela ukuboshwa kukaNciki. Uthe i-ANC ikhuluma ngokubuyisa isithunzi sayo ilwe nenkohlakalo kodwa ibuye iziphikise.

UNGENISWE esibhedlela owayengusihlalo webhodi le-SAA uNkk Dudu Myeni, obekufanele avele eNkantolo eNkulu eGoli, kodwa waphutha. UNkk Myeni uboshelwe amacala enkohlakalo yemali elinganiselwa ku-R300 000, okuthinteka kuwona inkampani iBosasa.UNkk Myeni waziwa ngokusondelana kakhulu nowayengumengameli wezwe uMnuz Jacob Zuma.UNkk Myeni uboshwe ngoSepthemba nyakenye, noMnuz Trevor Mathenjwa badedelwa ngebheyili ka-R10 000 umuntu eyedwa. Bavela eNkantolo yeMantshi eRichards Bay, icala labo ladluliselwa eNkantolo eNkulu eGoli.  UMathenjwa wayeyisikhulu senkampani iSondolo IT, okusolwa ukuthi yaba nesandla ezenzweni zenkohlakalo. Ngesikhathi udaba lungena enkantolo kubikwe ukuthi uNkk Myeni akekho ngoba usesibhedlela uyagula.Kusolwa ukuthi uMyeni wayemukela imali ngamasaka waphinda wafakelwa izinsiza zezokuphepha emzini wakhe nokuyizinto okwakungafanele azithole.UNkk Myeni wavela izikhawu phambi kwekhomishini eyeyiphenya ukulawulwa kombuso yidlanzana lapho ayephekwa khona ngemibuzo. Ngesikhathi ephekwa ngemibuzo wayenikwe umbandela wokuthi angamdaluli ufakazi ofihliwe kodwa yena wamdalula. Wazidonsela amanzi ngomsele waboshwa, wakhokha inhlawulo.Icala likaNkk Myeni lenkohlakalo lihlehlele uNovemba 21, ngethemba lokuthi uyobe eseluleme futhi esekwazi ukuvela enkantolo.

NKOSIKHONA CELESEKUQUBUKE omkhulu umsindo ebandleni laseMzimkhulu, Inkanyezi yokuKhanya. Lokhu kwenzeka ngemuva kokuthi omunye umholi webandla enenge amakholwa ngomthetho wokuthi akalingcwabi ikholwa elinikela "into engacacile"Kuvela ukuthi kusuke umsindo ebandlani ngoba uMbhishobhi Vusukukhanya Malinga, egunyaze umthetho wokuthi ngeke abangcwabe abazalwane abanikela "ngozuka''Kuthiwa akagcinanga lapho uthe abanikela kancane ngeke besangcwatshwa emathuneni ebandla.Isolezwe Ngempelasonto likhulume namalungu ebandla abekhathazekile ngokugunyazwa komthetho womnikelo webandla.Liqale lakhuluma nomndeni wakwaNxumalo onelungu, osekuphele iminyaka ewu-10  likhonza ebandleni. Kuthiwa uMalinga akafikanga emngcwabeni walo futhi wathi ngeke lize lifihlelwe nasemathuneni ebandla.UMnuz Zakhele Nxumalo (56), kuthiwa udlule emhlabeni ngemuva kokuxinwa ukugula. Kuvela ukuthi ubelazisa kakhulu ibandla. Ilungu lomndeni wakwaNxumalo, uNksz Zothile Nxumalo lisole uMalinga ngokuthi uphatha ibandla ngesandla sensimbi."Kuyasixaka ukuthi ngampela yini eyenziwa nguMbhishobhi manje. Okokuqala nje umfowethu wayenikela kahle kabi esanguthisha engakaphelelwa umsebenzi. Manje njengoba eseshona engasasebenzi usehliswa isithunzi ngale ndlela,'' kukhononda uNksz Nxumalo. Isolezwe Ngempelasonto likhulume nelinye ilungu lebandla laveza ukuthi uma uMalinga eqhubeka nokwenza kanjena uzophuma yena ebandleni."Ngeke phela sidlale indoda. Leli bandla salakha sonke ngokubambisana. Manje yena usecabanga ukuthi isinqumo sakhe yedwa singujuqu,'' echaza.Ethintwa uMalinga uvumile ukuthi kunomethetho awugunyazile omayelana nokungafihlwa kwamakholwa anganikeli kahle enkonzweni. Uthe unamandla okuthi aphasise noma ngabe yimuphi umthetho ngoba ibandla kumele libe namakholwa azibophezele ngokweqiniso kulona. Wathi akathandi ukuthi ande kade ngokuthi umthetho uze ugunyazwe nje yingoba kusukela kuphi.Unobhala webandla uNkk Ncamsile Khawula, uthe bazamile ukuxoxisana noMalinga ukuthi athambise kancane kodwa wala waphetha. Waveza ukuthi akukuningi azokuphawula ngodaba ngoba usefinyelele esinqumweni sokuthi alishiye ibandla ngoba kunoxhaxha lwezinkinga ezikhona kulona ngaphakathi.Uveze ukuthi uMalinga akazange alubhade emngcwabeni kadadewabo omdala ngoZibandlela nyakenye ekhala ngokuthi akukho okutheni abekwenzela ibandla.“Kwathi uma ngimbuza wangiphendula ngokuthi akayi emfihlweni welungu lebandla eliba nenkwantshu uma kumele kunikelwe,’’ usho kanje ekhulumela phansi.Kuvela ukuthi uMalinga ungumsunguli webandla. Sekuphele iminyaka engu-20 likhona. Kuthiwa phambilini konke ubekwenza ngendlela efanele.Kodwa konke kuqale ukushintsha ngemuva kokuba kushone umkakhe eminyakeni eyedlule.

UFUNA ubulungiswa umlisa waseNtabamhlophe, e-Estcourt, uMnuz Sizwe Vilakazi, emuva kokukhonjwa indlela emsebenzini abewenza ngoba exoxe “imikhuba" nentombazane yomdabu waseNdiya eneminyaka ewu-14.UVilakazi (35) uthe uqale ngokumiswa ngaphambi kokuxoshwa enkampanini ezinze ePinetown kodwa ediliva amanzi emiphakathini yaseVerulam nasePhoenix, iCrosmoor (XM Group). Eluchaza ukusuka nokuhlala udaba uVilakazi, uthe wayejutshwe yinkampani ukuba ayohambisa amanzi emphakathini waseVerulam, eThekwini ngoJulayi 17.Uthe wathi esalinde ukuba umphakathi uze namabhakede uzokhongozela amanzi, kwaqhamuka intombazane engumNdiya yamnikeza incwadi efundeka kanje: "Igama lami nguK****a futhi ngikukhonzile kakhulu. Ubani igama lakho ngoba ngiyazifela ngawe. Ngiyakuthanda. Ivela kuK......"UVilakazi uthe wafike waxoxela ozakwabo ukuthi ushelwa yintokazi yomNdiya.Uthe washaqeka kabi ebusuku ethola ucingo kodwa lulokhu lungena lunqamuka. Uthe wagcina elubambile kanti ushayelwa yile ntokazi ngocingo lukayise nolukagogo wayo. Uthe okwamshaqa wukuthi wayengayinikezanga le ntombazane inamba yakhe.Uthe wabuye wathola nemiyalezo kuWhatsApp, Isolezwe Ngempelasonto elinayo. Le ntombazane ebingelela kuqala kuVilakazi ngokuthi "Hi Baby" bese yena ephendula ngokuthi "Hi Babe, how are you love..." Le ntombazane ibuye imtshele ukuthi imkhumbule, bese uVilakazi aphendule ngokuthi ayenze imizamo yokuba babonane bese yona imbuza ukuthi ufuna ukulala nayo yini, athi yena ufuna bazipholele nje. UVilakazi uthe ngoLwesine wabe esethola ucingo oluthi akaphuthume ehhovisi emuva kokuba ilungu le-ward committee lazise inkampani ukuba engabe esajutshwa eVerulam ngoba ufuna ukulala nengane encane.Uthe okwalandela lapho kwaba wukumiswa kwakhe ngoba kuthiwa ubexoxa imikhuba nentombazane eneminyaka ewu-14.Isolezwe Ngempelasonto  lizibonile lezi zincwadi, eyokummisa neyokumxosha.Isikhulu seCrossmoor Transport (XM Group), uPauline Naidoo, uvumile ukuthi lesi sehlakalo senzekile."Okokuqala, ubudlelwano umshayeli akhuluma ngabo obengane eneminyaka ewu-14, umntwana ... ngeke sisanaba kakhulu. Izingxoxo ezakhe nomntwana," kuphetha uNaidoo.UVilakazi uthe ubengazi ukuthi intombazane ineminyaka engu-14 ngoba inethambo futhi yena akayishelanga kodwa iyona eyamshela. Uthe akaneme ngokuxoshwa kwakhe ngoba abenzanga lutho nale ntombazane ngoba bagcina ngokuxoxa futhi ngeke ayikhomba. Uthe kungcono ukuba uvulelwe icala ngoba yena uzibona emsulwa.Unxuse nanoma wubani ongamsiza kulolu daba ngoba usawudinga umsebenzi wakhe.SIDE BARUNGOTI wezithinta  abasebenzi ozimle, uMnuz Nzulu Dlamini, weluleke uVilakazi ngokuthi udaba lwakhe aludlulisele enkantolo yezabasebenzi. Uthe ukuba khona kwemiyalezo nokuthi akuzange kuvele zisuka ukuthi intombazane akhulume nayo ezothando yingakanani, kungaluqinisa udaba lwakhe.Uxwayise abesilisa nokho ukuthi uma besemsebenzini, ikakhulukazi abahamba ngezimoto ezibhalwe amagama ezinkampani, kubalulekile ukuthi baziphathe kahle. Uma   kuyiwa ngasezintweni ezithinta uthando, uthe kubalulekile nokuthi bayibhekisise indaba yeminyaka noma ubudala babesifazane abakhuluma nabo ezothando. “ Ngiyacabanga nje ukuthi ukube le ndaba kaVilakazi nale ntombazanyana iqhubekile, ubengaze azihlanganise nayo ngokocansi engayazi iminyaka yayo. Lokho bekuyomenza umdlwenguli obengabhadla ejele iminyaka ngeminyaka,” echaza. Uthe ucansi nentombazane eneminyaka engaphansi kuka-16, yicala elibovu eNingizimu Afrika.Uthe noma engeke akusho kugcwale umlomo ukuthi inkampani iphambukile ngokwesinqumo sokumxosha, kodwa uma indaba isiqhamuka ezikhulwini zenkampani isithi: ‘ umshayeli wenu ubekhuluma amanyala nengane eneminyaka ewu-14’, kulula ukugcoba ngodaka leyo nkampani uthi inabashayeli abakhohlakele abashela izingane ezincane. Lokho uthe kungafinyelela esinqumeni sokuthi ngempela umsebenzi ufake inkampani ehlazweni.

UMSUNGULI weMK olwa nokuxoshwa kwakhe kule nhlangano, uMnuz Jabulani Khumalo, uvunwa umthetho ukuba amele le nhlangano emhlanganweni wasePhalamende ozoqoka umengameli nosomlomo.Lokhu kungenxa yokuthi amaqembu awakwazi ukushintsha uhlu lwamagama awathumela enhlanganweni eyengamele ukhetho, i-Independent Electoral Commission (IEC).Igama likaKhumalo lilandela elomholi wale nhlangano okwanqunywa ukuthi akakulungele ukuba yilungu lePhalamende, uMnuz Jacob Zuma.UKhumalo waxoshwa kwiMK ngenyanga eyedlule, ngoMsombuluko bekulalelwe icala lapho khona ephonsela inselelo ukuxoshwa kwakhe.Ukuxoshwa kukaKhumalo kudale imibuzo yokuthi ngabe uzokwazi yini ukuqhubeka ayomela iMK emhlanganweni wasePhalamende.Okhulumela i-IEC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thabani Ngwira, uthe umthetho awuvumi ukuthi amaqembu enze izinguquko manje ohlwini lwamalungu azowamela.“Bangakwazi kuphela ukushintsha uhlu emva komhlangano wokuqala wasePhalamende. Njengamanje amaqembu awakwazi ukushintsha.”UNgwira uthe noma benganqaba ukufungiswa labo abavela ohlwini, amaqembu angeke akwazi ukufaka abanye abantu.IMK inezihlalo ezingu-58 ePhalamende.UKhumalo akusiye yedwa ovela ohlwini lweMK lwasePhalamende osexoshiwe eqenjini.Ophezulu ohlwini lwayo lwasesiShayamthetho, uMnuz Nhlanhla Ngidi, wadilizwa ekubeni umdidiyeli weMK KwaZulu-Natal.Ngesikhathi edilizwa iqembu lathi ukuxoshwa kwakhe kungase kudale izinguquko ohlwini lwasesiShayamthetho.IMK inezihlalo ezingu-37 esiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal.Imizamo yokuthola uKhumalo nokhulumela iMK, uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndhlela, ayizange iphumelele njengoba izingcingo zabo bezikhala zingabanjwa.IMK isike yakusho ngaphambilini ukuthi uhlu lwayo lwasePhalamende lusazoshintsha.Ngeledlule uNobhala-Jikelele weMK, uMnuz Sihle Ngubane, wathi asikho isiqiniseko sokuthi bonke laba bantu abasohlwini bazokuya ePhalamende.Ekhuluma esikhungweni semiphumela, uNgubane wathi basengashintsha ngisho ukukleliswa kwamalungu avela ohlwini lweMK.Elinye iqembu eliveze ukuthi lisazokwenza izinguquko ohlwini lwayo yi-EFF.I-EFF yehlile okhethweni olwedlule, yathola izihlalo ezingu-39, isuka kwezingu-44.Umholi we-EFF, uMnuz Julius Malema, uthe angeke baye ePhalamende labo abangazange bakhombise ukuzimisela ngesikhathi kukhankaselwa ukhetho.“Abakhohlwe labo abebelibele ukujuxuza ngesikhathi sikhankasela ukhetho. Abantu babelibele ukuhamba izindawo zobumnandi ngesikhathi sikhankasela ukhetho. Sizokwenza izinguquko ohlwini lwasePhalamende nolwaseziShayamthetho. Kukhona esizobatshela ukuthi bangayi ukuyofungiswa ePhalamende.”

OWABHALISA iqembu uMkhonto weSizwe (MK), uMnuz Jabulani Khumalo umangalele i-IEC afuna ihoxise owayengumengameli uJacob Zuma kwesokuhola nokumela  iqembu.UKhumalo noZuma babengamathe nolimi kodwa manje sebeyinkukhu nempaka emuva kwengxabano. UZuma ngoDisemba nyakenye umemezele ukuthi weseka i-MK uzoyikhankasela ayivotele.Isolezwe lixoxe nommeli kaKhumalo, u-Advocate Mfesane Ka-Siboto oqinisekisile ukuthi usezinhlelweni zokufaka amaphepha enkantolo. UKa-Sibotho uthe uKhumalo ukubeke kwacaca ukuthi umangalela i-IEC.UKhumalo ubethumelele i-IEC incwadi ethi ayikhiphe uZuma ibuyisele yena njengomholi kungenjalo uya enkantolo. Abe-IEC abayiphendulanga incwadi nokulandelwe wukuthi uKhumalo alufake enkantolo udaba.UKa-Sibotho uthe sebeyohlangana enkantolo lapho beyochaza kahle konke.“Sibathumelele incwadi bangayiphendula, manje udaba sizolufaka eNkantolo yezoKhetho kube iyona enqumayo. Sizowafaka maduze nje amaphepha enkantolo,’’ kusho uKa-Sibotho.UKhumalo akeneme ngokuxoshwa kwakhe eqenjini ukhala ngokuthi akukho emthethweni futhi wuyena umholi weqembu hhayi uZuma.UKhumalo ethintwa ngalolu daba akavumanga, akaphikanga ukuthi ubopha i-IEC kodwa uthe uzokhuluma ngesikhathi esifanele ngakho konke okwezekayo.Okhulumela i-MK uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndlhela, uthe abanandaba noKhumalo ngisho angenzani akuthi shu. UNdlhela uthe uKhumalo uxoshiwe akujiki lokho.Kwenzeka konke lokhu nje kulindeleke ukuthi iNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo ikhiphe isinqumo ngodaba oluphakathi kwe-IEC ne-MK. I-IEC yanquma ukuthi uZuma akafanelwe ukuba sohlwini lwabaya ePhalemende ngoba walahlwa ngecala wagwetshwa.UZuma ne-MK balusa enkantolo udaba bafika balunqoba kodwa i-IEC yalwedlulisa ingenelisekile ngesinqumo. Udaba lungenile enkantolo ngesonto eledlule kodwa isinqumo sagodlwa.NgoMsombuluko inkantolo ithumelele umyalelo kuzozonke izinhlangothi ukuthi zithi ukwenaba ngezethulo ezithinta isikhulu se-IEC, uJanet Love, esaphawula ngalolu daba kwabezindaba.I-MK isiphume ingena ezinkantolo kaningi inqoba njengoba yamangalelwa yi-ANC ngokusebenzisa igama loMkhonto weSizwe. I-MK yalunqoba udaba lombango wegama, kwangenwa ecaleni lombango wophawu yalunqoba futhi.Manje kubangwa udaba lokuthi uZuma ufanelwe yini ukuya ePhalamende noma cha.

UCHITHWE wayalelwa ukuthi akhokhe nezindleko zecala uMnuz Jabulani Khumalo, obefake icala efuna ukubuyiselwa njengomholi weMK.UKhumalo ubemangalele i-IEC neMK efuna bambuyisele esikhundleni ethi wakhishwa ngendlela engekho emthethweni. INkantolo yezoKhetho ikhiphe isinqumo ngoLwesithathu ichitha uKhumalo.UKhumalo usola owayengumengameli uJacob Zuma ngokumqhwaga iqembu aselenza elakhe. UKhumalo wuyena owabhalisa iMK kodwa kwavela ukuthi ubhalele i-IEC eyazisa ukuthi usedlulisela izintambo kuZuma.UKhumalo enkantolo wathi incwadi okuthiwa wayibhala edlulisela amandla okuphatha iMK, yayikokotelwe. IMK yamemezela ukuthi iyamxosha uKhumalo nabanye abaholi besolwa ngokungethembeki.UKhumalo ususwe nasohlwini lweMK ePhalamende nokuwudaba asaluphosela inselelo enkantolo. Kulindeleke ukuthi iPhalamende lifungise amalungu ngoLwesihlanu emcimbini uKhumalo abezimisele ngokuwuhambela.

UYABALISA owesilisa waseHarding ngokunyamalala kwengoduso yakhe ebese kusele inyanga ngaphambi kokuthi ziwushaye.UMnuz Msawenkosi Mpofana uthi kuduma ikhanda kuyena njengoba kulahleke uNksz Nokuthokoza Biyela (27). Akathandanga ukudalula ukuthi beluzoba nini usuku lomshado kodwa uthe bese luseduze.Lo wesifazane ongowaseMlaza kuvela ukuthi uduke ngeledlule kade ephume ewumuntu oya ezitolo KwaMnyandu.UMpofana uveze ukuthi ingoduso yakhe inyamalala nje bebesezinhlelweni zomshado njengoba esemlobole waqeda.Uthi ayikho ingxabano abake baba nayo angasola ukuthi yiyona eholele ekutheni aze anyamalale.Uthi into abake bayibanga nje nengoduso yakhe wudaba lwamaringi njengoba ike yashintsha umqondo yakhomba amanye amaringi yena abekholwa ukuthi ayashaya ephaketheni."Nalapho futhi ngamtshela ukuthi angeke ngisakwazi ukuthi ngingahlanganisa leyo mali yalawo maringi,'' usho kanje.Akathandanga ukuveza ukuthi ibingakanani intengo yawo womabili.Ubebalisa ngokuthi okumkhathazayo kakhulu ukuthi umuntu ozoba umsolwa uyena ngoba uyena osondelene kakhulu naye."Ngiyakhuleka sengathi uNkulunkulu angayizwa imikhuleko yami atholakale,'' usho kanje.Uveze ukuthi ingoduso yakhe ike yaphakamisa ukuthi okungcono awuhlehliswe umshado uma kuya ngokuthi lawa maringi awatholakali.Udalule nokuthi okwamanje akasebenzi njengoba esanda kumiswa emsebenzini. Uthe ingoduso yakhe yona iziphilisa ngokudayisa izingubo zokugqoka ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.Uthe uyethemba ukuthi ingoduso yakhe izobuya iphila. Uthe abekho abantu ake axabana nabo mhlawumbe angase asole ukuthi bangacabangela yena nengoduso okubi.Udadewabo kaNksz Biyela ongathandanga ukuba kudalulwe igama lakhe uthe bakhathazekile kakhulu ngokuduka kwakhe.Uthe bazame kaningi ukumshayela ucingo kodwa lutho akatholakali."Siqale ukumshayela ucingo ngosuku anyamalale ngalo sibona engabuyi. Belukhala ucingo lwakhe kodwa engalubambi,'' echaza.Uthi ngokuhamba kwesikhathi lugcine lungasangeni nje nhlobo. "Kuthe sibona ukuthi sekuphela izinsuku ezine enyamalele sabe sesithatha isinqumo sokuthi sivula icala emaphoyiseni,'' usho kanje.Uthe udadewabo akakaze anyamalale ngaphambilini futhi ungumuntu okungelula ukuba angamane anyamalale nje engawazisanga umndeni. Wathi yingakho  bekhathazekile.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa aseMlaza asevule idokodo mayelana nokulahleka kowesifazane oneminyaka elinganiselwa kwengu-27.Uthe amaphoyisa aseBhekithemba anxusa noma ngubani okungenzeka abe nolwazi ngalo wesifazane ukuba ashayele kule nombolo : 031 325 6751.

NKOSIKHONA CELEUKHUTHAZA izinkampani zabangcwabi ukuthi ziklame indima enkulu ekudalekeni kwamathuba omsebenzi, umnikazi wenkampani yabangcwabi iMadlala Funeral Services, uMnuz Mluleki Madlala (42).UMadlala ukholwa ukuthi abangcwabi banendima enkulu abangayidlala ekulweni nobubha emalokishini nasezindaweni ezisemakhaya.Kuyimanje uthe inkampani yakhe isiqashe abantu abangaphezulu kuka-40 ngokugcwele, engababali ababambe itoho."Ngikholwa ukuthi njengoba isimo somnotho sintenga kuhle nathi silekelele ukuze kube khona abantu abalala bedlile.'' "Angigcini ngokuthi ngizithuthukise mina kuphela kwezamabhizinisi kodwa nalaba engibaqashile ngiyabacija ukuze bagcine sebenawabo amabhizinisi.'' Lo mngcwabi uke waba sematheni ngokungcwabela imindeni esuke ingenamali yokungcwaba, okuyinto angayenzi ngakubo kuphela kodwa uma umbiko uke wafika kuye, usiza noma ngabe lowo mndeni ukuziphi izinkalo. Uthe asikho isidumbu okumele size sibole ngoba nakhu umndeni ungenayo imali yokungcwaba. Kumele izinkampani zokungcwaba zingenelele zilekelele, usho kanje.Uthe wakhula kanzima kangangoba noyise wangcwatshwa woninalume isimo singesihle ekhaya."Kusukela lapho ngabona ukuthi kumqoka kangakanani ukulekelela abanye abantu ukuze bangcwabe,'' echaza.Uveze ukuthi ibhizinisi yinto esemithanjeni kuyena. "Ngisemncane bengize ngiphuthe ngisho esikoleni ngiyodayisa lapho okuholwa khona impesheni.  Lena kwaba yinto engikhula nayo ngaze ngagcina sengithuthuka kwezamabhizinisi,'' usho kanjena.Uveze ukuthi inkampani yakhe uyibhalise ngokusemthethweni ngo-2008. Inamagatsha ezindaweni ezahlukene, eMlaza kwaV, eMgababa, eMzinto nasePort Shepstone.

UKHUTHAZA amalungu ebandla laseZayoni ukuba angalenzi iphutha lokuchezuka ezintweni ezingamagugu leli bandla elabe laziwa kakhulu ngazo nasemandulo.UMbhishobhi Siyabonga David Msomi uyiNhloko yebandla i-The Christian Apostolic Zulu Church.UMbhishobhi Msomi uthe ibandla laseZayoni ngelinye lamabandla ahlonishwayo kakhulu ngenxa yokuthi lenza izinto ezehlukile kwamanye amabandla.Uthe kungaba yiphutha elikhulu ukubona ibandla laseZayoni selihlukene nokushawa kwesigubhu, isikhalanga, inkonzo yezithunywa nokunye nje okuningi leli bandla elaziwa kakhulu ngakho.“Ngithi mangithathe leli thuba ngikhumbuze wonke amaZayoni ukuthi ngempela leli bandla lingobani futhi laziwa ngani. Ngiyalinxusa leli bandla ukuba lingagudluki kwesilazi ngakho,’’usho kanje.Uthe okudala ukuthi adlulise lo myalezo ukuthi usekuqaphelile ukuthi kukhona amanye amabandla akhona eZayoni asebonakala eseyishintshile indlela leli bandla elikhonza ngayo.“Akumele senze iphutha lokuthi thina esisasele siguqule lokhu leli bandla esalifica livele liyikhona. Okwethu ukukhuthaza ukuthi lingenzeki nakancane iphutha lokukhohlwa okungokwethu,’’ kuchaza yena.Ugcizelele kakhulu ukubaluleka kokuba leli bandla libe nezingwevu ezindala ebandleni.Lokhu uthe ukholwa ukuthi kuklama indima enkulu ekugcinweni kwezimfundiso zaleli bandla.“Phela amadoda amadala yiwona kanye azoselusa aqinisekise ukuthi asiphumi endleleni kodwa konke siyakugcina. Siyawadinga kakhulu amadoda amadala ebandleni lakithi eZayoni,’’ kugcizelela yena.Leli bandla linamagatsha ezingxenyeni ezehlukene esifundazweni saKwaZulu Natal.Phakathi kwamagatsha aleli bandla kubalwa eliseMgungundlovu, eHammarsdale, Velkom nakwezinye izindawo.

UKUKHULA kowesifazane emndenini owenza izinto ngendlela yesimanje, futhi ongagxili  kwezesintu kungenza kube nzima uma eganela emndenini oqhakambisa indlela nemikhuba yokwenza kwesintu.Wukuqonda nokuqaphela lokho okwenze umbhali wezincwadi, uNelly Page Magwaza wabhala incwadi esihloko sithi Can We Get Married? ukukhuthaza futhi acebise imbokodo ukuthi ingavumi ukwenza izinto eziyicindezelayo ngoba ijabulisa abasemzini.Lo mbhali wodumo lwencwadi yakhe yokuqala yango-2021, ethi The Beloved MaShenge, useqede konke ngalena yesine ezoqala ukutholakala ezitolo ezahlukene zezincwadi ngesonto elizayo.Elandisa Isolezwe Ngempelasonto  ngale ncwadi, uNelly uthe ixoxa indaba yomfana okhulele emakhaya, ozalelwe esithenjini. Lowo mfana uhlangana nentombazane ekhulele emndenini ocebile, futhi onganaki kangako okwesintu, bathandane, ayicele umshado.“Ingqikithi nesifundo sendaba kuba lapho lo mfana eseyisa intombi yakhe kubo, bangayithandi abakubo ngoba becasulwa wukuthi ayikhulanga njengabo.“Yilapho okuzogqama khona isifundo sokuthi abesifazane akumele bavumele abanye abantu ukuthi babenzise izinto abangahambisani nazo ngoba nakhu beganile,” kusho uNelly.Lo mbhali odabuka eMandeni, nonabalandeli abangaphezu kwa-200 000 kwiFacebook, uthe okunye okuhle nokuzojabulisa abantu ngale ncwadi wukuthi ibhalwe ngendlela efundeka kalula nexutshwe namahlaya.“Lokho ngikwenze ngoba ngifuna kube lula kumfundi ukuyiqonda futhi ayilandele kahle, ikakhulu ngoba mina ngithwale kanzima ngiyibhala ngoba bengibheke nezimo zempilo, ngibala nokhwantalala obekwenza ngingakwazi ukuyiqeda ngokushesha, njengoba kungithathe iminyaka emibili ukuyiqeda,” usho kanje.UNelly (28) uneziqu zePsychology aziphothule e-Unisa ngo-2022, kanti manje wenza unyaka wokuqala we-Information Technology, kuyo le nyuvesi.Uthe nakuba umshado kungesiyo into ayigijimisayo nengabusi umqondo wakhe okwamanje, uyowamukela uma impilo imubeka kuleso sigaba. Ukhuthaze amantombazane asemancane ukuthi akuthande ukufunda izincwadi futhi ayikhuthalele imfundo. Uthe into okumele ibe seqhulwini entombazaneni ekhulayo wukuzithuthukisa nokuthatha isikhathi iziqonda uqobo ngaphambi kokuba ingene kwezinye izigaba zempilo njengokugana.I-Can We Get Married? inamakhasi awu-315, kanti yelama incwadi yakhe yesibili neyesithathu, ezisihloko sithi Sabatha: The Begetter yango-2021 neDear Khethelo ephume ngo-2022.

UKHUTHAZA ukuthi kube nokuthula kungabibikho ukuklwebhana nokungcofana okungenasidingo emabandleni umfundisi osemncane.UMfu Siphiwo Sithathu (34) ongumholi webandla, iCCM ukuKhanya Kokuthula uthe leli bandla elineminyaka emibili lasungulwa lakhiwe phezu kwesisekelo sokuthula noxolo.Uthe ukhuthaza okufanayo nakwamanye amabandla akhona KwaZulu Natal nakwezinye izifundazwe.USithathu uthe ukholwa ukuthi kungagwemeka nokuqembukelana kwebandla likaNkulunkulu uma kungase kuqinisekiswe ukuthi kuba nokuthula kweqiniso phakathi kwamakholwa.Echaza kabanzi ngalokhu uSithathu uthe : "Ngiwumholi osemmcane impela kodwa ngiyakholelwa kakhulu ekutheni ibandla likaNkulunkulu lidinga ukuthula noxolo ngaso sonke isikhathi. Uma ukuthula kungaba kuningi ngaphakathi ebandleni likaNkulunkulu kungaba kuningi kakhulu okungagwemeka.''Ukhuthaze nabaholi bamabandla ukuba bazi kabanzi ngezimo nangenhlalo abazalwane ababaholayo abazithola bebhekana nayo mihla namalanga.Uthe kumqoka ukuba abefundisi bakhuthazwe ngokuthi bazi kabanzi ngenhlalonhle yamakholwa abawaholayo."Uyazi ukuthi ayikho into ebuhlungu njengokukhonzisa umzalwane othule kodwa ongasho ukuthi unezinkinga. Ngikholwa ukuthi ibandla likaNkulunkulu lingangenela kube khona elikwenzayo ngenhloso yokubalekelela uma kunesidingo sokuba kwenzeke kanjalo,'' usho kanje.Uthe kubalulekile nokuthi abahola amabandla bahole ngendlela yokuthi kube lula kubazalwane abanezinkinga ukuthi bakhulume nabo ukuze nabahlwempu kube nendlela yokubalekelela.Abanezinkinga emishadweni nabo balulekwe, umzalwane akangadikwadikwa yizinkinga abaholi bamabandla nabanye abazalwane bekhona. Ukholwa wukuthi ibandla likaNkulunkulu likhonela nalokho, ukusiza ababuthakathaka. Uthe eminyakeni eyishumi ezayo ukhulekela ukuthi ibandla aliholayo libonakale likhula ngamandla.Uthe kodwa ekukhuleni kwalo akafuni ukuthi kube nomsindo kodwa ufuna ukuthi ukuthula kuqhubeke kube yisisekelo sokukhula kwebandla.

UKUGCONWA ngokungabi nawo umfaniswano wesikole esafunda kwenze uMnuz Celukwakha Chonco wase-Davenport, eThekwini, osedume ngeleNkosi Yabafundi, ukuthi aqale umkhankaso wokunikelela kubafundi abangathathi entweni.UChonco (25) osebenza njengomluleki wezezimali, uthe ukuba nesandla esiphayo kugqugquzelwa yindlela akhula ngayo eyenze waqala inhlangano engenzi nzuzo ebizwa ngeNkosi Yabafundi Organization esiza abafundi ngemifaniswano yesikole.Ekhuluma neSolezwe, uthe ukugconwa kwengane esikoleni ngokungabi nawo umfaniswano kumphatha kabi.“Ukukhonjwa kwengane igconwe ngokuthi inamasokisi adabukile, lokho kukodwa kwenza ukuthi ungabe usakuthanda ukuya esikoleni,” kusho uChonco.Uthe lokhu akwenzayo kusuka ngaphakathi enhliziyweni njengoba engakabi nabo abazomsiza.Uthe ngesikhathi efunda, abazali bakhe babengakwazi ukumthengela umfaniswano wesikole, ehlale egqoka awuphiwe ngabanye abantu. Lokhu uthe kwamenza waba nentshisekelo yokuthi asize abanye abafundi abaswele umfaniswano ukuze babuyelwe ukuzethemba. UChonco uthe ukungabi nomfaniswano kwakumenza angakuthokozeli ukuya esikoleni ngoba izingane zazimhleka. Ngisho esenawo umfaniswano awuphiwe wayebona sengathi kukhona okungahambi kahle ngenxa yokungazethembi. Azobasiza ubakhetha ngokuhambela izikole akhulume noshishanhloko ukuzwa ukuthi obani abadinga kakhulu umfaniswano, uma sebebhekiwe ube esewuhambisa. Ngaphandle kokusiza ngomfaniswano, ubuye athengele abafundi izixubho nomuthi wokuxubha ukuze zikudayise, bese zithola imali encane yokuthi zikwazi ukuzenzela izinto.

UBONGE ithuba lokusebenzela abantu bakuleli uMnuz uZizi Kodwa esula esikhundleni sobungqongqoshe emuva kokusobozelwa woKlebe wavela enkantolo ngecala lenkohlakalo.UKodwa, obengungqongqoshe wezemiDlalo, ubuCiko namaSiko, udedelwe ngebheyili kaR30 000 benoMnuz Jehan Mackay aboshwe naye. Bebevele eNkantolo yamaCala eMali ePalm Ridge izolo.UMackay wayeyisikhulu senkampani, i-EOH, ngesikhathi okuthiwa kwenzeka ngaso inkohlakalo phakathi kwakhe noKodwa.UKodwa ufike enkantolo engaxwayile ehamba noMackay abehleli naye ebhokisini labamangalelwa. UKodwa noMackay, abakhulunyelwe abameli babo, bayawaphika amacala.UKodwa uphume enkantolo kwavela isitatimende sokuthi usesulile esikhundleni. Ubonge umengameli nabantu bakuleli ngokumnika ithuba lokusebenzela uhulumeni.UMackay, ongummangalelwa wokuqala, usolwa ngokucubuza amagabade kuKodwa ngemali engaphezu kukaR1 million ekhonga amathenda.UMbuso uthi uMackay wayetetemukisa uKodwa, emlalisa ezindaweni ezibizayo eshunqisela izinyosi ukuze atape amakhekhe emalini kahulumeni.UMbuso uthi uKodwa wakwenza lokhu ngesikhathi esakhulumela i-ANC. UKodwa noMackay baboshwe kusukela ebufakazini obethulwa kwikhomishini eyayiphenya inkohlakalo.Kwikhomishini kwavela ukuthi uKodwa wemukela imali kaMackay wathenga unyanyavu lwemoto. UKodwa wayivuma imali phambi kwekhomishini, wathi wayexakekile wacela umngani ukuthi amhawukele.UMbuso uthe uphenyo seluphothuliwe futhi abameli bazonikwa uhlu lofakazi ukuze abamangalelwa bengaxhumani nabo baphazamise uphenyo.UMbuso awukuphikisanga ukudedelwa ngebheyili kwabamangalelwa, wathi akukho okukhomba ukuthi bangase babalekele icala. Bathe abamangalelwa ababona abantu abayingozi emphakathini.Bayalelwe ukuthi banike umseshi izincwadi zabo zokuhambela amanye amazwe. Ummeli kaKodwa, uMnuz Zola Majavu, uthe ikhasimende lakhe liyaliphika icala futhi bayazibuza ukuthi umuntu okhulumela i-ANC uhlangana kanjani namathenda.Icala likaKodwa lihlehlele uJulayi 23 ukuze kunikwe abameli ithuba lokuxoxa kabanzi nabamangalelwa, bathathe imiyalelo yabo.UKodwa uboshwa nje ulandela obengusomlomo wePhalamende, uNkk Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula, naye osenkingeni yecala lenkohlakalo. Umthetho we-ANC uthi bonke ababhekene namacala kufanele bashenxe ezikhundleni abajutshwe kuzona.

ISITHUNZI senhlangano yokhetho kuleli i-IEC sifana neqanda elidinga ukuphathwa ngobukhulu ubunono okungathi uma lifa, kube kuphelile. Siyahlonishwa isithunzi se-IEC futhi kuyohlala kunjalo kodwa nonyaka isimo sibucayi kakhulu ngenxa yokhetho oluzayo.Ukhetho lwangoMeyi 29, lufana nomdlalo womkhumulajezi ngoba wonke amehlo azobe ethe njo ngenxa yesasasa elikhona. I-IEC ifana nonompempe ophethe umdlalo wamanqamu wezinkunzi okukade kwasa zithibelene. Akukwazi ukuthi unompempe angathembeki emdlaweni ngoba kusuka umsindo.I-ANC yiyona esemandleni okwamanje selokhu yangena ngo-1994, emva kokukhipha uhulumeni wobandlululo. Ukwehla kokwesekwa kweqembu kancane kancane, sekwenze kwanemibono yokuthi ingase ihluleke wukunqoba ukhetho. Umbono oqhutshwa ngamanye amaqembu.Kuyaziwa ezweni lonke ukuthi kuzoshiyana ukwenza phakathi kwamaqembu okhethweni olungoMeyi 29 nonyaka, lapho kuyogezelwana khona. Ukhetho lwezwe lubalulekile ngoba lunikeza abantu ithuba lokukhetha uhulumeni abamfunayo.Kuleli uhulumeni ubekelwa iminyaka emihlanu, emuva kwalokho kubuyelwe okhethweni kunikwe abantu ithuba lokukhetha kabusha.Iyini inhlangano yokhetho i-IEC ?I-Independent Electoral Commission (IEC), yinhlangano yokhetho ezimele eNingizimu Afrika, eyasungulwa ngo-Okthoba 17, 1996. Izwe laliqeda ukuphuma kuhulumeni wobandlululo lingena kuhulumeni wentando yeningi.Umsebenzi wayo wukusingatha ukhetho olukhululekile, nolungachemile esigabeni sikazwelonke, izifundazwe nokomasipala emazingeni aphansi.I-IEC ingena ngaphansi kohlu lwezikhungo ezibizwa ngeChapter 9, ezinjengehhovisi loMvikeli woMphakathi, neSouth African Human Rights Commission (SAHRC). Izikhungo zinomsebenzi omkhulu futhi onzima wokuhlonipha imigomo yomthethosisekelo wentando yeningi.I-IEC ivamile ukuthi uma yenza umsebenzi wayo kube khona abayikhomba ngeminwe uma bengenelisekile ngemiphumela yokhetho.Okwenza ukuthi i-IEC ibe wundabamlonyeni kulokhu wukuthi sekukhona ukukhuluma okwandile okuthi kufanele ibhekwe ingakhwabanisi amavoti ilekelele inhlangano ebusayo kuleli. I-DA ibhale incwadi icela usizo e-USA, ithi kayithembi ukuthi ukhetho luzosingathwa ngendlela efanele. Yacela ukuthi i-USA ithumele izingqapheli ezizibheka ukuthi konke kuhamba  okhethweni.Ngaphandle kwalokho kukhona amaqembu akhala ngokuthi othisha abaqashiwe ukuthi bavotise bangamalungu enyunyana iSadtu, edlelana ne-ANC. Bathi lokho kuzokwenza kungethembeki ukuthi bazokwenza umsebenzi ngokujutshwa yi-IEC, ngobuqotho futhi bangachemi.Okunye okucishe kwathunaza isithunzi se-IEC, wukuthi ingene ehlazweni ngemva kokuputshuka kohlu lwamagama abantu abajutshwa ngamaqembu ukuthi babe ngamalungu ePhalamende, emuva kokhetho. Uhlu lwamalungu amaqembu belungakamenyezelwa ngokusemthethweni kodwa kube nesigangi ngaphakathi kwi-IEC.Indlela i-IEC esingathe ngayo udaba ikhombise ubuqotho nobuyoninco ngoba ilusukumele ngokushesha ngoba iyakuqonda ukuthi isithunzi sayo siyikho konke ngakho kufanele isivikele. Isikhulu se-IEC uMnuz Sy Mamabolo, sithe benze uphenyo oluveze ukuthi umkhuba usekhaya.“Imiphumela yophenyo lwethu lokuqala ikhomba ukuthi kukhona omunye wabasebenzi oputshuze uhlu esebenzisa amakhompyutha ethu. Uqede ukwenza lokhu wase elucima uhlu akade eluthumela. Umsebenzi usezobhekana nezinyathelo zokuqondiswa ubugwegwe ngaphakathi,’’ kusho uMamabolo.Kufana nokuthi umsebenzi we-IEC ogile umkhuba uphushele inhlangano esizibeni esinengwenya ngoba isikhathi okwenzeke ngaso lokhu sibucayi. Kubikwe ukuthi umsebenzi we-IEC ugcine exoshiwe emuva kokulahlwa yicala lokwephula umthetho.Esinye isikhulu se-IEC, uNksz Akhtari Henning phambilini sikhale ngabantu abasola i-IEC ngokukhwabanisa ekubeni benganabo ubufakazi.“Izinsolo ezingamampunge lezi futhi siyacela ukuthi uma abantu benza izinsolo basisize phela ngobufakazi bese siyaphenya. Thina simile ekutheni sinikwe umsebenzi wokusingatha ukhetho ngokuzimela ngaphandle kokuchema,’’ kuchaza uNksz Akhtari.Akasalanga ngaphandle uMengameli uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa, usigxekile  isenzo sokuputshuzwa kohlu lwenhlangano yakhe wathi kuyadumaza futhi kuthunaza umsebenzi we-IEC. “Kuyishwa ukuthi kube khona umuntu omagange ohlulekayo nokuzibamba ojahe ukukhipha uhlu lwe-ANC.
