Kucekela phansi isithunzi se-IEC lokhu ekubeni kuyisikhungo esisethembayo futhi okufanele sisivikele ngayo yonke indlela,’’ kuphawula uRamaphosa.Lugadwa ngeso lokhozi ukhetho ngoba i-IEC iqeqesha abasebenzi bayo abalusingathayo. Kuba nabamele amaqembu ezikhungweni abagada ukuthi konke kuhamba kahle yini. Kuba khona izingqapheli zokhetho ezivela kwamanye amazwe, ezisuke zizogada ukhetho.Ngaphezu kwalokho kuba khona abezokuphepha ezikhungweni abasuke bezoqinisekisa ukuthi konke kuhamba ngendlela efanele. Kungumthwalo wabo bonke abantu bakuleli ukuthi bavikele isithunzi sokhetho ne-IEC ngoba kungenjalo kungaba nomonakalo omkhulu.Kwamanye amazwe iyasuka impi kuliwe, kume kwasani ezweni kubangwa indaba yokhetho abantu bekhala ngokukhwabaniswa kwemiphumela. Kwamanye ukhetho luze luqalwe phansi ngenxa yokuthi kusuke kukhona abanganelisekile.

UKUHLASELWA nokubulawa kwamaphoyisa kuleli okwenziwa yimigulukudu, kuwukubukela phansi amandla oMbuso.Lokhu kushiwo oyinhloko yophiko loKlebe, Lieutenant General Godfrey Lebeya esithangamini nabezindaba ePitoli, ngeSonto, obekuhloswe ngaso ukucacisela umphakathi ngosekwenziwe yilolu phiko ekoteni ephelile yonyaka wezimali u-2024/2025.ULebeya uthe ngekota yokuqala kuphela yalo nyakazimali, angu-21 amaphoyisa asebulewe kanti iningi lawo abulawe engekho emsebenzini njengoba engu-16, abe mahlanu abulawe esebenza.“Bangu-18 abasolwa asebeboshiwe ngamacala okubulawa kwamaphoyisa, kubona abayisishiyagalolunye bahlanganiswa namacala akamuva okubulwa kwamaphoyisa angu-21, bese kuthi enye ingxenye ihlanganiswa namacala afanayo enzeke ngaphambi kwekota yokuqala yalo nyakazimali,” kusho uLebeya.Enaba ngamacala asephothuliwe alolu hlobo, uLebeya uveze ukuthi oboshelwe ukubulala iphoyisa lakuMasipala weTheku uConstable Nkosinathi Ndlovu (57) ngoJuni 2022, okwenzeka ehostela eliseMlaza iGlebbelands, okunguSibusiso Sosibo (27), udonsa isigwebo seminyaka ewu-50 emva kokuphenya kwalolu phiko okuholele ekutheni elahlwe ngamacala.Uphinde wakhala ngezigameko sokuqhunyiswa nokubanjwa kwezimoto ezithwala imali okudla lubi, wathi lubeka engcupheni impilo yabantu.Uthe awu-55 amacala adluliselwe kulolu phiko, kanti bangu-34 asebeboshiwe, abangu-28 kubo baboshelwe amacala enzeke ekoteni yokuqala kuhlanganiswa nalabo abafa bedubulana namaphoya. Uthe sekugwetshwe abangu-19, iminyaka ewu-288 uma behlanhaniswa bonke.Awu-18 461 amacala abephenywa yilolu phiko ngekota yokuqala yonyaka u-2024/2025, zibe wu-752 712 izimangalo ezishicilelwe, okudla imali eyevile ku- R 1 billion.Lolu phiko luphinde lwavalela inqwaba yabasolwa emacaleni abucayi okubalwa kuwo inkohlakalo, ukuhwebelana ngemali ngendlela engekho emthethweni, ukubulawa kwamaphoyisa, abavukuza ezimayini ngokungekho emthethweni namanye.ULebeya uthe yinqwaba yezidakamizwa eziqoqwe yilolu phiko kule ngekota edlule engabiza imali eyivile ku-32 million kanti bangu-64 ababoshelwe lolu hlobo lobugebengu. Bangu-25 asebegwetshiwe kanti abangu-15 baphume ngenhlawulo.  Kuhlakazwe izindawo ezintathu okuthiwa beyizidleke ezikhiqizwa izidakamizwa ngokungekho emthethweni eGauteng, kwaboshwa abangu-12, kwashaqwa izidakamizwa ezingabiza imali eyevile ku-R16 million.

UMPHATHISWA woMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana KwaZulu-Natal, ukhathazekile ngokwehluleka kobuholi bukaMasipala uMdoni ukulungisa izinkinga.UMphathiswa womnyango uMfundisi Thulasizwe  Buthelezi,  uhambele umasipala okhungethwe yizinkinga eseziholele ekutheni kube nemibhikisho ehlukene ngaphansi kwawo. Sekuphele amasonto amathathu amahhovisi kamasipala evaliwe ngenxa yemibhikisho yomphakathi neyabasebenzi bekhala ngenkohlakalo nezidingo zomphakathi ezingafiki kuwo."Umkhandlu wehluleke ukulandela izincomo njengokuyalela komthetho uSection 106, mayelana nombiko wophenyo olwenziwa umnyango ngo-2018,  ngenkohlakalo kulo masipala. Ukungalandelwa kwalezo zincomo kuveza lo masipala njengongenandaba nenkohlakalo. Siyafisa ukubona umkhandlu ukusukumela ukuxazulula izinkinga umphakathi okhala ngazo. Ukusebenza ngokuvulelekile, ukubuyisela isimo sokuhanjiswa kwezidingo zomphakathi ngendlela kubalulekile," kusho uButhelezi.Uqhube wathi ikomiti lesigungu sokuphathwa kukamasipala kumele libambe iqhaza elibonakalayo ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi izinkinga zilungiswa ngokushesha nangempumelelo.UButhelezi uthe uzobhalela usomlomo kamasipala incwadi ezobe imnxusa ukuthi akangenelele, alungise izinkinga umphakathi okhala ngazo.

UKUDLIWA komhlaba kubeka engcupheni uhlelo lokwakhiwa kwesikhumulo sezindiza sikaR14 billion okuhlongozwa ukuthi sakhiwe endaweni engaphansi koMasipala waseMkhambathini.Abatshali bezimali abavela eGermany bamanqika ukuqala ukwakha isikhumulo sezindiza esizodala izinkulungwane zamathuba emisebenzi ngenxa yokuthi kukhona abakha imizi endaweni ehlonziwe.Lokhu kuvezwe iMeya uNhlakanipho Ntombela, obekhuluma esidlweni sakusihlwa ebesihlelwe ubuholi be-ANC kwisifunda iMoses Mabhida.Umhlaba odliwayo usendaweni enothile, eLynnfield, phakathi kweCamperdown, noMgungundlovu.UNtombela uthe umhlaba ohlonziwe ukuthi kwakhiwe kuwo isikhumulo sezindiza wabuyiselwa emphakathini.“Mabili ama-Trust ayenikezwe umhlaba. Ama-Trust ke avamisile ukuba nezinkinga. Abantu bayaye bangaboni ngendlela eyodwa. Abanye bayaye bafune ukuqhubeka nokutshala, kube khona abafuna ukuwudayisa umhlaba. Manje kukhona abantu abasika izindawo, ababeka abantu.”UNtombela uthe isikhondlakhondla senkampani yaseGermany esifuna ukwakha isikhumulo sezindiza ngabe sesiqalile ukwakha ukube abekho abantu abadla umhlaba.“Nakuthina kunzima ukungenelela ngoba umhlaba okukhulunywa ngawo uphethwe abantu abazimele. Siyazama ukuxoxisana nabo abanikazi bomhlaba. Into esiyihlongozayo ukuthi basidayisele wona umhlaba.”UNtombela uthe ukwakhiwa kwesikhumulo sezindiza kuzodala amathuba emisebenzi angu-5 000.UMkhambathini ukhula ngamandla, izimboni eziningi sezithuthele ezindaweni ezingaphansi kwalo mkhandlu.Izimboni zihehwa ukuthi lo mkhandlu useduze nothelawayeka uN3, uphinde ube phakathi kwamadolobha amakhulu iTheku noMgungundlovu.UNtombela uthe bafuna ukuthi uMkhambathi ufane nedolobha lomntakabani eliseGoli, iSandton.“Sikhula ngamandla. UMengameli (uCyril Ramaphosa) wakhuluma ngamadolobha esimanje ngesikhathi ethula inkulumo yakhe ngesimo sezwe. Thina sikulungele ukuba yidolobha lesimanje. Ziningi izinkampani eziza lapha.”UNtombela uthe ukukhula kwabo kuphinde kwasizwa nawukuthi banikezwe ezinye izindawo ebezingaphansi kweTheku ngesikhathi kuklanywa kabusha imingcele.“Lezi izindawo eziseCato Ridge. Kunezinkampani eziningi lapho. Siphinde sanikwa iMophela. Lokhu kusho ukuthi sesizophatha amathuna. Kuzokube kungokokuqala siphatha amathuna. Lokhu kukhombisa ukuthi umkhandlu uyakhula.”UNtombela uthe okubuye kuvimbe abatshali bezimali eMkhambathini ukuthi abanawo amapayipi athwala amanzi angcolile.“Lento iyihlazo. Sisebenzisa amathoyilethi emigodi. Abanye abatshali bezimali bafike babe manqika uma bebona lokhu. Le nto iyasibambezela. Njengobuholi asisongile izandla, siyazama ukulungisa le nkinga.”

IKHALE ngokumosheka kwesikhathi senkantolo nangezindleko engena kuzona imantshi ngesikhathi kuhlehla icala likathisha obhekene namacala ayisithupha okudlwengula abafundi abathathu ephindelela.Uthisha oneminyaka engu-56 owayefundisa esikoleni saseClermont, ubevele eNkantolo yeMantshi yasePinetown. Icala lakhe belizoqulwa isonto lonke.Kodwa akubange kusaqala ukuqulwa kwecala njengoba ukugula kommeli kamsolwa, u-Advocate Andile Thusi, kuphoqe ukuba lihlehliselwe inyanga ezayo. Ummeli uMendlula ufikile enkantolo watshela iMantshi  uSimphiwe Hlophe ukuthi uthunywe ngu-Adv Thusi ukuthi azokwazisa inkantolo ukuthi uyagula angeke aze akwazi ukuqhubeka necala kuleli sonto.Imantshi ikwamukelile lokhu kodwa yakhala ngokumosheka kwesikhathi senkantolo nangezindleko inkantolo engena kuzona ngenxa yokuhlehla kwalo."Angeke ilunge phela le nto uma izohamba kanjena. Phela kunemali ekhokhelwa ofakazi bakuleli cala. Namhlanje nampa bafikile kodwa icala aliqhubeki, kuzomele bakhokhelwe imali yokuphinda emuva,'' isho kanje.Ithe ohlwini lwamacala aqhubekayo kuleli sonto kule nkantolo belibekwe eqhulwini leli, kodwa sekufanele kube nokuguquka kwaloluhlu ngenxa yokuthi sekunecala elihlehliswayo.Umsolwa obekhona enkantolo, kuvela ukuthi waboshwa emagcekeni esikole ngo-2022.Usolwa ngokudlwengula abafundi bamantombazane abathathu. Kuthiwa eyedwa umfundi wamdlwengula amahlandla amabili.Ecaleni lokuqala kuvela ukuthi umsolwa wadlwengula umfundi oneminyaka engu-17 ngoMashi 16, 2021. Kuthiwa lo mfundi waphinde wamphinda futhi ngalo usuku olufanayo.NgoJanuwari 19, 2022,, kuthiwa wadlwengula umfundi oneminyaka engu-17. Naye usolwa ngokuthi wamgila amahlandla amabili.Ngo-2021, uthisha usolwa ngokuthi wakhumula isikhindi sakhe sangaphansi ekhombisa umfundi oneminyaka engu-17 isitho sakhe sangasese ngaphakathi emagcekeni esikole.Ngalo lolu suku usolwa ngokuthi wanukubeza ngokocansi omunye umfundi oneminyaka engu-16.Kuvela ukuthi abafundi wayebadlwengulela ngaphakathi emagcekeni esikole.Umsolwa ungaphandle ngebheyili ka-R5 000 ayithola ngoMeyi ngonyaka owedlule.Umzali womunye umfundi okuthiwa wadlwengulwa yilo thisha ukhale ngokubambezeleka kwecala..

BUKHATHAZEKILE ubuholi bamaphoyisa kaMasipala weTheku ngezigameko ezinesihluku ezenziwa ngamaphoyisa awo.Lokhu kuvezwe ngokhulumela amaphoyisa kaMasipala weTheku ngoLwesibili, uMnuz Boysie Zungu.UZungu uthe ayikho into ebakhathaza njengokuthi balahlekelwe ngamaphoyisa omkhandlu wabo ngendlela enesihluku.Ubekhuluma ngezigameko ezimbili ezenzeke esikhathini ezingaphansi kwenyanga kusuka ekupheleni kwaMashi.Esigamekweni sakamumva, esenzeke phakathi nenyanga, uConstable Mlu Ndaba (45) udubule wabulala inkosikazi yakhe, wazingqokloza naye.Isigameko esashiya abaningi bemangele, kwazise kuthiwa bebeyizithandani ezizithulelayo, senzeke emzini wabo oseLovu.Ngaphambi kwalesi sigameko, uConstable Sizwe Ngema (27), usolwa ngokubhokoda ngommese intombi yakhe nayo eyiphoyisa uConstable Bianca Khuzwayo washona.Isigameko senzeke eflethini likaNgema elisenkabeni yeTheku ngoMashi 31.Kusolwa ukuthi emva kokumgwaza ephindelela uNgema, uConst Khuzwayo, waqopha iv-ideo esephuma umphefumulo wayinameka ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, waphinde wayithumela nakubantu abasondelene nomufi.UNgema uhamba inkantolo ngaleli cala.UZungu udalule ukuthi emuva kwalezi zigameko bavumelene ngokuthi basungule izinhlelo ezehlukene ezizolekelela amalungu abo.“Phakathi kwazo kukhona uhlelo lokubizwa kwesithangami samaphoyisa angamadoda lapho kuzobizwa khona ongcweti abehlukene ukuzoweluleka,” kusho uZungu.Uthe kongcweti kuzoba khona odokotela, odokotela bengqondo nabeluleki bezezimali.Uveze ukuthi ngeke kugcine lapho kodwa kuzophinde kube khona nabaholi bezenkolo nabelaphi bendabuko.“Nabo bazonikwa ithuba lokuthi bakhulume namaphoyisa ethu esilisa. Siphinde sibe sezinhlelweni zokusungula indawo lapho ababhekene nokhwantalala nezimo ezinzima zempilo abazothola khona usizo,” usho kanje.Uveze ukuthi belukhona uhlelo lwe-KWAYS lapho zonke izisebenzi zikamasipala zithola khona usizo lokwelulekwa ngokomqondo uma kwenzeka ziludinga.Uthe abakwazi ukuba nesiqiniseko sokuthi yini engaba yimbangela yokuthi amaphoyisa abe nesihluku, wathi kungaba odokotela bengqondo abangakwazi ukusho ukuthi umsuka wodlame kumuntu obulala ngesihluku usukaphi ngoba baqeqeshelwe lokho.Walile ukuphawula ukuthi zikhona yini izinyathelo asebenzithathele uNgema, wathi lokho kuphakathi kwakhe nomqashi, ngeke bakuxoxe nabezindaba. Okhulumela inyunyana yabasebenzi iSouth African Municipal Workers Union kulo masipala, uMnuz Xolani Dube, uthe babuye babe nawo umcabango wokuthi izigameko zalolu hlobo zidalwa ukuthi amaphoyisa abuye ahambele izindawo zezigameko ezihlasimulisa umzimba kubalwa izingozi zomgwaqo.Wathi benze isiphakamiso sokuthi ibuyekezwe indaba yokuthi amaphoyisa afakwe mdibi munye nabanye kwi-KWAYS.“Ngendlela esibona ngayo, amaphoyisa kufanele abe nolwawo wodwa uhlelo lokwelulekwa ngokomqondo, angaxutshaniswa nowonkewonke ngoba okwawo kuhlukile,” kusho uDube.

‘UKUSHAYISANA kosopolitiki nomphakathi ikakhulu ezindaweni zasemakhaya - ezinye zazo ezisaphethwe ngamakhosi - ngenye yezinto ezenza kube nzima ukufukula omasipala basemakhaya.’Sisho njalo isazi sezokuvakasha, uDkt Bandile Mkhize, sikhuluma engqungqutheleni yokuzocebisa omasipala ngezindlela zokuphatha nokubafukula, iMunicipal Strategy Conference, ebisePremier Hotel, eMhlanga, izolo. Le ngqunguthela engeyokuqala yalolu hlobo - ezosongwa namhlanje - ihlelwe yinkampani ezimele iNsikayezwe Management Consultants, eholwa wuMnuz Erick Sithole.Eqhuba, uDkt Mkhize uthe kufanele ngabe ziningi izinhlelo ezenziwa ngabaholi bezepolitiki komasipala ababaholayo ukuze bathuthuke kodwa akwenzeki ngenxa yokuthi akubanjiswene.“Okunye okuhluphayo wukuthi osopolitiki bazitshela ukuthi bahlakaniphile kunabaholi bomphakathi nabelaphi bendabuko, bekhohlwe wukuthi yibona labo bantu abaneqhaza ekutheni kwenzekani emphakathini abawakhele. Yizinto lezo okumele zilungiswe ngokuthi kuhlalwe phansi, kwakhiwe ubudlelwano kulezi zinhlaka zombili ukuze izinto zilunge,” kubeka uDkt Mkhize.UDkt Andre Roux, naye obeyisikhulumi sosuku, weluleke abaholi bomasipala ukubeka eqhulwini izindawo zasemalokishini ngoba yilapho okugcwele khona abantu abasha, abayikusasa lezwe. “Kumele senze impilo ibe lula kubantu abasha ngokubalekelela ezintweni ezinhle abazenzayo ukuze bezothemba ubuholi obuphethe ngaleso sikhathi ngoba kuzobe kubabeka eqhulwini futhi kwenza bazizwe bebalulekile,” kucebisa uDkt Le Roux.USolwazi Siphamandla Zondi, yena ucebise omasipala ukuthi bayeke akubize ngokuthi ukwenza sengathi izinkinga ezibhekene nomphakathi bayazilungisa, bebe bengenzi lutho. Uthe abantu bakhathele yithemba elingekho, bafuna into abayibonayo.USithole ugcizelele ukuthi le ngqungquthela izobuya nangonyaka ozayo, njengoba befuna ukuthi ibe wumcimbi waminyaka yonke.

INHLANGANO esiza abanenkinga yokugembula kuleli, iGamblers Anonymous SA, ithi ukugembula kuyinkinga ezweni jikelele ngenxa yokuthi abantu basuke becabanga ukuthi kuzobalethela imali esheshayo.Ukwesweleka kwemisebenzi nokubiza kwempilo kuthiwa yikona okuholela iningi ekugembuleni njengoba lisuke lizama imali yokuphila.Isolezwe libhalele le nhlangano emuva kokuthi abafundi baleli phephandaba besilisa beveze ukuthi amakhosikazi abo agembula kumaselula.Omunye umfundi uveze ukuthi akasayiniki imali inkosikazi yakhe,  ngisho nekhadi lokuhola isibonelelo sezingane seliphathwa wuyena ngoba ithenga amavawusha okugembula.“Unkosikazi wami ubewumuntu olithandayo ikhaya, okwaziyo ukwenza igilosa esilonda inyanga yonke. “Ubekwazi nokuthengela izingane izimpahla zokugqoka ngesibonelelo sazo sikahulumeni. Muva nje uthenga amavawusha okugembula, ahlale kwiselula yakhe ilanga lonke njengoba engasebenzi.“Uma ngibuza ukuthi kungani ukudla kuphela inyanga isephansi, uvele akhale ngokuthi igilosa iyabiza,” kuchaza indoda.Ithe iye yenza uphenyo lwayo njengoba inqume ukuzenzela igilosa ngemali ebiyinika umkayo, yathola ukuthi yize ukudla kubiza kodwa imali isakwazi ukwenza igilosa ehlala inyanga yonke.Emuva kokuphucwa imali yegilosa kuthiwa lo wesifazane ebesebenzisa imali yesibonelelo sikahulumeni ukuthenga amavawusha okugembula.“Ngiye ngamhlalisa phansi ngambuza ukuthi imali uyenzani? Ungitshele ukuthi uthenga amavawusha kaR50 okugembula kwiselula yakhe. Ungibonisile imidlalo ekhona, eminye eyezinombolo ezihamba ngokushesha njengalezi zemishini yase-casino kanti kunebhanoyi elindizayo okuthiwa lenza imali. Okunye kunamagqamuza alokhu enza imali uma umuntu ewashaya ngephethini ethize. Yena ubengaboni ukuthi lento iyamlimaza ngoba uhlezi esethembeni lokuthi uzowina izigidi zamaradi kodwa lokhu akwenzeki,” kusho indoda.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi abesifazane bagembula kumaselula kakhulu, kanti amadoda avamise ukuhambela izindawo zokubheja ezahlukene futhi sekukhona izinkundla zokucijana ngokugembula ezikhokhelwayo ku-whatsapp nakwezinye izinkundla zokuxhumana.Indlela ukugembula okuyinkinga ngakhona imantshi yenkantolo yaseGqeberha isanda kugweba umgcini mabhuku iminyaka ewu-18 ebhadla ejele emuva kokuthi egembule uR14 million wenkampani abeyisebenzela.Akukona nje ukugembula kumaselula nasezindaweni zokubheja okuheha abantu, kodwa nasezinxanxatheleni zezitolo sekukhona indawo yokugembula ebizwa ngeBingo ekhonzwe kakhulu ngabadala.Kuthiwa bashaya sengathi bayokwenza igilosa kanti sebeyogembula kwiBingo.IGamblers Anonymous SA, ithe abantu balahlekelwa yimali kakhulu ekugembuleni ngenxa yokuthi uma sebebhejile badliwa, babuye bafake enye imali ngethemba lokubuyisa leyo abadliwe yona.Iveze ukuthi izikhangiso zokugembula emazikweni ahlukene ezindaba okubalwa imisakazo, ithelevishini, amaphephandaba, amabillboards nasezinkundleni zokuxhumana, yizona eziheha abantu ukuba bagembule.Igqugquzele abanenkinga yokugembula noma abanabantu abagembulayo emindenini yabo ukushesha  bathinte iGamblers Anonymous SA.“Sinemihlangano ezindaweni ezahlukene. Siyakwazi nokweluleka abadinga ukuyeka ukugembula. ”angaluthola usizo nakwiNational Responsible Gambling, sibagqugquzela ukuthi bavale ama-akhawunti abo okubheja, banikeze nabantu ababathembayo izimali zabo, ukuze bangalingeki baze bagcine sebegembula,” kusho iGamblers Anonymous SA.Abafuna usizo bangavakashela iwebsite yegamblers anonymous ethi https://gamblersanonymous.org.za/Bathe usizo luyatholakala kuzo zonke izifundazwe zakuleli kanti imihlangano iyenziwa ngisho nange-zoom. Usizo olunikwa abantu lumahhala, ayikho imali abakhokhiswa yona.

UCWANINGO lweStatsSA luveza ukuthi bawu-12.08 million abantu bakuleli abangasebenzi, kubona u-10.99 million ngabamnyama kanti u-45.5% wabo ngabantu abasha.Lokhu kukhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi abantu abasha yibona abaswele umsebenzi kakhulu eNingizimu Afrika.Inhlangano yodokotela bengqondo, iSouth African Society of Psychiatrists, iveze ukuthi abantu abasha basengcupheni yokuzibulala uma bengasebenzi ikakhulukazi abesilisa.Ithe izinga lokuzibulala liphindwa kahlanu emadodeni uma liqhathaniswa nabesifazane.Ukungasebenzi, ukuphelelwa yithemba, izinkinga zobudlelwano nokungakhuli kahle, kubalwa nezinye zezinto eziholela abantu ukuba bazibulale.Le nhlangano ibalule ukuthi okwenza abesilisa bazibulale yindlela abakhuliswe ngayo yokuthi bangakhali futhi bakuthola kunzima ukukhuluma ngosizi ababhekene nalo.UNksz Xoliswa Gumbi (30) onguMengameli we-Unemployed Graduates Movement, uthe ucwaningo oluveza ukuthi abangasebenzi basengcupheni yokuzibulala lukhuluma iqiniso.Uthe abantu abasha babhekene nezinkinga ezihlukene zokungahlangani kwempilo yize iningi labo lineziqu zemfundo ephakeme.“Abantu abasha baphelelwa yithemba ngenxa yokuthi sekuphele iminyaka befesa emuva kokuthola iziqu zemfundo ephakeme kodwa bengawutholi umsebenzi. Abanye bagcina sebengena ebugebengwini ukuze bakwazi ukuphila. Abanye bayazibulala ngoba bebona ukuthi impilo ayihlangani. Kuningi kakhulu okubhekene nabantu abasha,” kusho uNksz Gumbi.Uthe bayazama ukusiza abantu abasha abangasebenzi ngokubafunela uxhaso lwezezimali ukuze bakwazi ukuzisebenza.“Izinkampani azisakwazi ukuqasha abantu kunalokho ziyabadiliza. Sifuna uhulumeni ongenayo aqinisekise ukuthi osomabhizinisi bayakwazi ukuqhuba umsebenzi ukuze bezoqasha abantu. Kufanele nabantu abasha bakhulume ngezinkinga zabo zokungasebenzi, bakhulume nangokuyovota ukuze bakhethe abaholi abazobalethela impilo engcono,” kuchaza uNksz Gumbi.Uveze ukuthi izinhlangano ezixhasa abantu abasha ngemali yokuvula amabhizinisi ziyabaxhasa kodwa uyakuqonda ukuthi akusiwo wonke umuntu ofuna ukuba wusomabhizinisi.Le ntokazi yaseHluhluwe eneziqu zePostgraduate Diploma kwiCost Accounting, ithe iziphilisa ngokubamba amatoho ezinkampanini ezidinga usizo lwe-accounting.Ithe nabanye abantu abasha akufanele balahle ithemba kodwa kufanele bazame ukuziphilisa ngamakhono abanawo.Inhlangano esiza abanezifo zengqondo iSouth African Depression and Anxiety Group (Sadag), ithe abantu abasha bayazibulala ngenxa yezinkinga ezihlukene.Ibagqugquzele ukuthi bashayele u-0800 567 567/0800 21 22 23/0800 12 13 14 ukuze bathole umuntu abazokhuluma naye ozobasiza ukuthi bangazibulali kodwa babhekane nezingqinamba zempilo.

OMELE i-IFP kwesikaNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thami Ntuli  uthi ukungenisa kwe-IFP ezindaweni ebikade ingemandla kuzona, kumnikeza ithemba lokuthi bazokwazi ukudla umhlanganiso KwaZulu-Natal okhethweni lwangoMeyi 29.UNtuli uthe kusukela eqale umkhankaso wakhe, i-IFP ikhombisa ukukhula ezindaweni ezisesifundeni Ugu naseHarry Gwala.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi enengxoxo ekhethekile ne-Isolezwe.Yize i-IFP iphethe iningi lomasipala baKwaZulu-Natal, ayikho imikhandlu ephethwe yilenhlangano oGwini naseHarry Gwala.UNtuli uthe abantu basoGwini naseHarry Gwala bakhombise ukuyamukela i-IFP.“Abantu abafike emicimbini yethu bakhombise ukuseseka. Ukufika kwabantu akusho lutho, okubalulekile ukuthi bakweseke.“Ngakho-ke sibona umkhankaso wethu uhamba kahle. Alikho iqembu elinomkhankaso ofana nowethu. Muva nje besinemikhankaso ezindaweni eziyisithupha ezahlukene ngempelasonto eyodwa,”kusho uNtuli.Uthe baningi abantu abanezikhundla ezihlonishwayo emiphakathini abajoyina i-IFP. Basanda kujoyinwa ikhansela le-EFF eKokstad, nomholi wegatsha le-ANC eMkhanyakude.Udalule ukuthi sekukhona abazama ukuvimba umkhankaso wakhe.“Kunezindawo lapho esivinjwayo kuzo uma sithi siyokhankasa. EKokstad banqaba ukusinikeza indawo  naseMzimkhulu futhi banqaba.”Uthe bafuna ukuhlonipha umsunguli we-IFP, Inkosi Mangosuthu Buthelezi ngokuthi banqobe ukhetho oluzayo.UNtuli wethule umqulu wakhe wezethembiso oLundi, lapho kwatshalwa khona uButhelezi.“Indawo yasoLundi ifana nomsamu kuthina ngoba kulapho kulele khona uMntwana. ULundi luyinhliziyo kithi, sakha ngisho iPhalamende laphana.“Likhona nanamhlanje leloPhalamende. Saya oLundi ngoba nakhu sihlonipha uShenge. Sasiyokusho ukuthi Shenge, sizokube sivotela wena. Sasiyocela amandla edlozini,” kuqhuba uMphemba.I-IFP yayikade iphethe iKwaZulu-Natal kwaze kwaba u-2004.UNtuli uthe impilo yayingcono kakhulu KwaZulu-Natal ngesikhathi kusaphethe i-IFP, bafuna ukubuyisela isifundazwe kulento esasiyona ngaphambi kokuthi bakhishwe emandleni.“Uma ubuka ubugebengu nokungasebenzi kwabantu kwakungengaka ngesikhathi kuphethe thina. Isimo sezikole njengamanje sibi kakhulu. Sakha amagumbi okufundela angaphezu kuka-6 000. Uhulumeni okhona njengamanje usuvale izikole ezingaphezu kuka-800.“Yonke lento sasiyenza ngesabelomali esincane. Abantu babephuma ezikoleni behlome ngamakhono, bakwazi ukuziphilisa. Abantu babephuma esikoleni benethemba lokuthi bazothola imisebenzi,” esho.UNtuli uthe uma benqoba ukhetho bazobuyisela amandla omnotho ebantwini bakulesifundazwe.Abantu bangaphandle abakuleli ngokungemthetho uthe yibona abadala njengoba sekugcwele bona yonke indawo.Ufakazise lokhu ngokuthi uma uya lapho kugundwa khona, ezitolo ezisemalokishini, ufika kugcwele bona. Lokhu kusho ukuthi abantu balapha abasenawo amathuba emisebenzi.Akambuluzanga ngabazokwenza uma bengena njengoba bezoshaya umthetho wokuthi uma ufuna ukuba nebhizinisi, kufanele ube nemvume.Uthe bazokuba nomkhankaso wokubheka bonke labo abakuleli ngokungemthetho. Bazothatha wonke amabhizinisi amancane bawabuyisele kubantu bakuleli. Abantu bakuleli uthe bazobaqeqesha, baphinde babaxhase ngabakudingayo. Uthe liqiniso limile, ukuthi abantu abaningi babulawa yindlala nje ngenxa yokuthi amandla omnotho aphethwe abantu abakuleli ngokungemthetho.Okunye abazokwenza uma bethatha, bazohlinzeka amakhosi ngabaqaphi.“Lokhu asifuni ukukungabaza, amakhosi abambe iqhaza elikhulu emiphakathini. Umsebenzi omkhulu wawo wukuxazulula imibango.“ Uma kunomsindo ongadala impi yezigodi, amakhosi yiwona axazululayo. Yingakho sizolungisa izinkantolo zamakhosi, siwakhele nezindlu ngoba akukuhle ukuthi  ahlale emizini engekho esimweni,” kuphetha uGodide.

UMENGAMELI we-IFP, uMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa, unxuse abantu ukuba bangavumi ukubuswa wumcabango wokuthi ukuphuma kwe-ANC emandleni kungenza izinto zibe mapeketwane.UHlabisa uthe ukukhishwa kwe-ANC okhethweni lwangoMeyi 29, angeke kuphazamise ukuphathwa kwezwe, wathi eNingizimu Afrika kunenqwaba yabaholi abakulungele ukuthatha izintambo uma kukhishwa i-ANC.Lokhu ukusho emcimbini wokwethulwa kwencwadi ekhuluma ngokuphathwa kwamazwe, i-Poor state, rich state.Le ncwadi ebhalwe nguDkt Greg Mills, yethulwe ngokusemthethweni eMgungundlovu.Incwadi iveza ukuthi izinto kazihambi kahle eNingizimu Afrika.UHlabisa ugcine engafikanga kulo mcimbi ngenxa yesiminyaminya ebesikuthelawayeka, uN3, wagcina ethumela inkulumo ebhaliwe, efundwe emcimbini.Kule nkulumo ebhaliwe, uHlabisa uthe bakhona labo abanenkolelo yokuthi ukuphuma kwe-ANC emandleni kungona izinto eziningi."Le nto ayisilo iqiniso. Lapha eNingizimu Afrika sinenqwaba yabaholi abanamava okuphatha nabaqotho, abakulungele ukuphatha. Thina njenge-IFP sikulungele ukuthatha izwe, siliyise phambili. Sesikulungele ukuphatha emva kokhetho."UHlabisa uthe sekuyisikhathi sokuba i-ANC iphume emandleni."I-ANC ikhathalele ukufeza izifiso zedlanzana. I-ANC iyinto engeke isalungiseka. Ayidingi ukwakhiwa kabusha, idinga ukuqalwa phansi. Lokho sikushiyela kuyona i-ANC."Esikwaziyo ukuthi angeke izwe siphinde silinike laba bantu. Izwe lethu lisesimweni esibucayi, kungashabalala konke uma bengaphinde baphathe eminye iminyaka emihlanu. Kabanayo imigomo yokukhulisa umnotho. Noma iliphi iqembu lebhola liyazi uma sekufanele lixoshe umqeqeshi. Kusobala ukuthi eNingizimu Afrika sidinga ushintsho oluzoyisa izwe lakithi phambili."UHlabisa uthe ngaphansi koMbuso we-ANC kuningi okonakele.Uthe amathuba emisebenzi nezinga lobugebengu kwakungcono eminyakeni eyishumi yokuqala ngaphansi koMbuso wentandoyeningi."Njengamanje, izinga lobugebengu liphezulu kakhulu. Kanjalo nelokuswelakala kwamathuba emisebenzi liphezulu kakhulu. UMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa wakhala ngokuLawulwa koMbuso yiDlanzana, nokubheduka kobhubhane iCorona ngesikhathi ethula inkulumo ayibhekise ezweni."Iqiniso ukuthi ngaphambi kokuthi kubheduke iCorona, umnotho wethu ubuvele ukhula kancane, abatshalimali base bevele sebeqalile ukulaxaza elakuleli. Asikwazi ukukhala ngeCorona ngoba izinto kade zaqala ukonakala."I-IFP izokwethula umkhankaso wezethembiso zokhetho ngeSonto, eThekwini.

UKWANDA kwesibalo samaqembu asePhalamende sekuqubule isikhalo ngokushoda kwezindawo zokubambela imihlangano emaqenjini ezepolitiki.Sinyuke sisuka ku-14 isibalo samaqembu abesePhalamende ehlandleni eledlule safinyelela ku-18 ngemuva kokhetho obelungoMeyi nonyaka.Lokhu kwenze kwanyuswa nesibalo samalungu azoba sekomitini ePhalamende. Emhlanganweni wekomiti elakha uhlelo lwePhalamende eliholwa nguSomlomo uNkk Thoko Didiza muva nje, amaqembu afune incazelo egcwele ngokuthi lukuphi uhlelo lokulungiswa kabusha kwePhalamende, njengoba ishoda indawo yokubambela imihlangano yamakhokhasi yamaqembu. Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi ingxenye yePhalamende yashiswa ngoJanuwari 2022, kanti seluqalile uhlelo lokubhidliza ingxenye eyacekeleka phansi ukuze yakhiwe kabusha. UNksz Pemmy Majodina we-ANC, ukhale ngokushoda kwezindawo zokubambela imihlangano yekhokhasi ye-ANC.Uthe sekuphele iminyaka bekhokhela izindawo zokubamba le mihlangano njengoba indawo abebebambela kuyo imihlangano ePhalamende yasha.“Kumele ibhekelwe indaba yezindawo zokuhlanganyela kwamakhokhasi ngoba izindawo ziyashoda. Kumele sithole ukuthi selukuphi uhlelo lokulungiswa kwePhalamende.”UNksz Hlengiwe Mkhaliphi we-EFF, uthe kade babenxusa ukuthi banikwe uhlelo olugcwele lwePhalamende ngezindawo zokubambela imihlangano.Uthe amanye amakomiti abebambela imihlangano emahhotela okudla iPhalamende enye imali.“Siyaludinga ulwazi olugcwele mayelana neyezindawo zokubambela imihlangano njengoba iPhalamende lasha.” UMnuz Cedrick Frolick oke waba ngusihlalo ePhalamende, uthe nakwamanye amaPhalamende uma kushoda indawo amalungu ayama.“Akuyona into engajwayelekile ukuthi uma indawo incane uthole amanye amalungu emile. Kwamanye amaPhalamende emhlabeni ufica amalungu eme ngemuva. Isisombululo okwamanje njengoba sisenale nkinga ngukuthi uma kuzoba nemihlangano kunikezwe amaqembu isibalo samalungu okumele azothamela lowo mhlangano. Uma abanye befika kugcwele sebeyoma. Amanye amaqembu amancane ngeke abe nesibalo esanele samalungu azothamela yonke imihlangano,” kusho uFrolick.UNkk Didiza, uthe udaba lwezindawo zokubambela imihlangano luyaphuthuma.“Kuyadingeka ukuthi sithole umbiko ngokushesha ngokuthi selukuphi uhlelo lokulungiswa kwePhalamende.” IPhalamende kulindeleke ukuthi liphothulwe ukulungiswa ngo-2026.Kwenzeka lokhu nje sizonyuka isibalo samalungu azoba semakomitini sifinyelele ku-15 ekubeni ePhalamende eledlule amalungu abengu-11.Lokhu kwenziwe ukwanda kwesibalo samaqembu.I-ANC iyona ezoba namalungu amaningi ekomiti njengoba ezoba mahlanu, ilandelwe yi-DA ngamathathu, Umkhonto weSizwe azoba mabili bese kuthi i-EFF ibe nelilodwa. Amanye amaqembu amancane azonquma ukuthi azohlukaniselana kanjani izihlalo ezine ezisele ekomitini.Amaqembu amancane okudingeka anqume ukuthi azosebenzisana kanjani yi-IFP, Patriotic Alliance, ActionSA,  Freedom Front Plus, Azanian Christian Democratic Party, UDM, Rise Mzansi, Build One SA, Al Jama-ah, African Transformation Movement, National Coloured Congress, PAC ne-United Africans Transformation.

KUZOSUSA umthwalo emahlombe abashayeli bezimoto ukwehliswa kwentengo kaphethroli nekadizili ngemali engaphezu kukaR1 kusuka ngoLwesithathu.Ilitha likaphethroli i-93 unleaded lizokwehla ngoR1.06 cents, i-95 yehle ngoR1.14 cents.Kumenyezelwe nokwehla kwelitha kapharafini ngoR1.11 cents bese udizili wehla ngoR1.12 noR1.14 centsAbantu abathenga igesi bazofaka uchatha ka-23 cents emalini abathenga ngayo i-kilogram layo.Lokhu kusho ukuthi kusukela ngo-Okthoba 2, ilitha kaphethroli izobiza uR21.05 cents ekadizili ibe nguR18.45 cents ezifundazweni ezimaphakathi nezwe kubalwa neGauteng.Ezifundazweni ezigudle ugu, uphethroli uzobiza uR20.26 cents ilitha kuthi udizili ubize uR17.66 cents ilitha.Ukuqina kwamandla erandi uma liqhathaniswa nedollar lase-United States of America nokwehla kwentengo kaphethroli, udizili nopharafini  emhlabeni ikhona okube nomthelela kulokhu kwehla.UMnuz Layton Beard we-Automobile Association, uthe kube yizindaba ezinhle kubashayeli ukwehla kwentengo osekuyihlandla lesihlanu kusukela kuqale unyaka.“Lokhu kusho ukuthi sebezokhokha iimali encane kunalena abebeyikhokha ezinyangeni ezedlule. Wonke umuntu uzojabula ngalokhu kwehla,” kusho uBeard.Ngesonto eledlule uBeard uveze ukuthi ukwehla kwentengo kawoyela ongahluziwe emhlabeni kube nomthelela omkhulu kulokhu kwehla.I-AA ifuna uhulumeni ulwenze luvuleleke kuwona wonke umuntu uhlelo lokunyuswa kwentengo yezimbiwaphansi futhi ungazivaleli ngaphandle izinhlaka ezimqoka uma kuza kwezithinta uwoyela nentengo yawo.UMphathi wehhovisi lenhlangano yamatekisi iSantaco KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sfiso Shangase, uthe kuyabajabulisa ukwehla kwentengo kaphethroli nodizili.“Siphila ngomusa kaThixo (embonini yamatekisi) ngoba nakhu siyakwazi ukukhokha isikweletu semoto sondle imindeni yethu. Alusisizi ngokwenza inzuzo uhlelo esilusebenzisayo lokunyusa imali yokugibela ngoR1. Nakuba wehla uphethroli kodwa imali yokugibela itekisi ngeke yehle,” kusho uShangase.Uthe izindleko zokugcina itekisi lihamba emgwaqweni zimba eqolo .

INKANTOLO eNkulu yasoPhongolo ilahle ngamacala okubulala angu-20 umshayeli weloli eladala isibhicongo libulala abafundi nothisha ngo-2022.USibusiso Siyaya (28) uphinde walahlwa ngamanye amacala amabili okungelokushayela budedengu nelokuhluleka ukulandela imigomo eyenziwa umshayeli osuke ebandakanyeke engozini.Ulahlwe ngala macala ngoLwesibili kanti kulindeleke ukuthi iJaji Garth Davis limgwebe namuhla uSiyaya.UMbuso ubumelwe uqweqwe loMshushisi, u-Advocate Krishen Shah. USiyaya ubemelwe ugalalagala lommeli wakwaLegal Aid eNkantolo eNkulu obuye abe yibamba lejaji, uMnuz Pregasen Marimuthu.Icala liqale ukuqulwa ngo-Ephreli 15 nonyaka, kwaphothulwa ngesonto eledlule ukwenziwa kwezethulo uShah benoMarimuthu benxenxa ijaji ukuba libavune.Umqulu oqukethe uhlu lwamacala athweswe uSiyaya uveza ukuthi wayeqashwe uMnuz Perry Masinga enkampanini iiBaoBao Projects.Wayekade esebenzela inkampani ethutha ilahle isuka esifundazweni iMpumalanga ilisa echwebeni laseRichards Bay.Okhulumela uMnyango wezokuThutha KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Kwanele Ncalane, uthe bayakwamukela ukulahlwa ngecala kukaSiyaya.“Besihlale sisho ukuthi sikholwa wukuthi  imbangela yale ngozi kwaba ubudedengu bomuntu, okuwumshayeli weloli. Besilibheke ngeso lokhozi leli cala. Sinethemba lokuthi  lizoba yisifundo nakwabanye abashayeli bamaloli,” kusho uNcalane.Uqhube wathi banethemba lokuthi isigwebo esizokhishwa yinkantolo sizothumela umyalezo oshubile nakwabanye abashayeli bamaloli abanomqondo ofanayo nokaSiyaya emigwaqweni.Uveze nokuthi umnyango ukholelwa ukuthi isigwebo esizonikezwa uSiyaya sizoyithoba amanxeba imindeni yabashonelwa.NgoSepthemba 16, 2022, uSiyaya wasika izimoto eziningi ngeloli kuyizimoto ayekade ephambana nazo ezazimvika.Kuthiwa wayeqhubeka elibelesela iloli kwaze kwaba lishayisana mahlanze neveni eyayilayishe abafundi ababebuya esikoleni. Kwashona abafundi abangu-18, uthisha nomshayeli weveni owayeneminyaka engu-19.

OWESILISA obesolwa ngokuba ungqondongqondo wokusocongwa kukamshayeli wezimoto ezikhokhelwa ngokwamabanga eziwahambayo ulahlwe yicala.Umufi uMnuz Siboniso Shangase kuvela ukuthi ngoFebhuwari 2021, wathola isicelo sokuba ahambise owesilisa emsusa emgwaqweni uMointy Nacker amyise eQueensburgh.Owesilisa owayenze lesi sicelo nguLuyanda Makhanya, kuvela ukuthi wayehambisana nomngani wakhe u-Ayanda.Kuvela ukuthi umufi wabathatha wabayisa lapho ababethe bafuna ukuya khona. Kuthiwa bamjikela endleleni bamphuca imoto.Ngemuva kwalokho bamklinya, bambopha nezinyawo base bethatha isidumbu sakhe basifaka ngemuva emotweni.Ngemuva kwalokho, kuthiwa basithatha basiphosa ehlathini laseMlaza. Bathatha imoto kamufi yohlobo lweToyota Etios, babeyishayela njalo uma bephuma esikoleni.Bakhalelwa ngamasongo kaSigonyela behamba ngayo imoto, base bewakhombisa amaphoyisa ukuthi isidumbu sikuphi.Ngaphambilini, inkantolo ilalele ubufakazi obehlukene obebuthulwa ngabantu ebehlukene. Omunye wabo kwakunguConstable Patrick Xaba owayekhona ngesikhathi kuthathwa isidumbu sikamufi eMlaza.Walandisa inkantolo ngesimo sesidumbu, eveza ukuthi sase sonakele kangakanani. Wadalula nokuthi iphunga laso lalivimbanisile ngenxa yokuthi kwase kuphele isikhathi eside sisehlathini.Waveza nokuthi kwakungelula ukubona ukuthi ngesikabani isidumbu kodwa wathi ilungu lomndeni lalingabona uma lizazi izingubo zikamufi.Ubuso bukamufi kuthiwa kwakungeselula ukububona ngenxa yokuthi base budliwe yizibungu.UMshushisi u-Advocate Thabani Buthelezi wanxusa inkantolo ukuba yenze okufanelekile, ekhala ngonya olwakhonjiswa ngesikhathi kusocongwa umufi.IJaji uWilliem Nicholson limlahle ngecala uLuyanda njengoba kunguyena owenza isicelo sokubiza umshayeli we-Bolt.Ungoti wenkampani iBolt South Africa, uMnuz Benjamin Meyer, wageqa amagula echazela inkantolo ngobufakazi abanabo obuqoshiwe ngosuku lwesigameko.Wavezela inkantolo ukuthi ngokujwayelekile uma umshayeli ethola isicelo sokulanda umgibeli kuyavela kubona, wathi uma esemthathile kuyavela kubona futhi uma esekhokheliwe kuyavela ngoba umshayeli kunebhathini alicifizayo lokukhombisa ukuthi usemtholile umgibeli futhi usemkhokhelile.Uthe kodwa ngosuku lokusocongwa kukamufi akazange alicifize ibhathini eliveza ukuthi usefikile lapho ayoshiya khona umgibeli. Lokhu wathi kwakungabangelwa ukuthi wayesevele eseshonile.Uthe umufi akalicifizanga nebhathini lokuthi ukhokheliwe, nalapho wathi yingoba akazange akhokhelwe.Namhlanje uyagwetshwa.

UTHUKA izanya umndeni wowesilisa wakwa-B, eMlaza, owayehamba ngesihlalo esinamasondo owaqhululwa ngentululwane yezinhlamvu washona ekuqaleni konyaka.Ukhala ngokuthi usuhlafuna ujeqeza ngenxa yezinsongo ozitholayo zokuthi kumele uthuthe eMlaza, uma ufuna ukuqhubeka nokudla anhlamvana.Uthi uthola izingcingo zabantu ongabazi ezibasabisa ngokuthi kumele uthuthe, wathi uqale ukuzithola kusukela kubulewe indodana yawo. Awuvezanga ukuthi sekungamahlandla amangakhi uzithola. Kunalokho, uthi ngeke ubike emaphoyiseni ngoba abasawethembi.Umufi, uSimanga Khumalo (29) wadutshulwa ngamadoda angaziwa esigamekweni esenzeka kwa-Q, eMlaza, emini kwabha kubuka wonke umuntu.Isolezwe linaso isithombe sikamufi esedutshuliwe, egebise phansi ikhanda, phansi kugcwele idamu legazi.Ngemuva kwalesi sigameko kunabesilisa ababili abakhalelwa ngamasongo kaSigonyela beyamaniswa naleli cala.Ababoshwa ngoMnuz Siyabonga Ngubane (36) benoSithembiso Khomo (23), okuyimanje bavalelwe futhi bagqigqa eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMlaza, njengoba banqatshelwa ibheyili.Babhekene namacala amane. Kuwona kubalwa elokwakha itulo lokubulala, elokubulala, elokutholakala nesibhamu esingekho emthethweni nelokutholakala nezinhlamvu.Umufi kwase kuphele iminyaka emibili ehamba ngesisihlalo esinamasondo kusukela adutshulwa ngo-2021, ngabasolwa ababezama ukumbamba inkunzi.Kuthiwa kuleso sigameko bamphuca iselula, bamshaya ngenduku yegalofu base bayamdubula.Ngemuva kwalokho kwaboshwa owesilisa osejele owesatshwayo, eyamaniswa nalesi sigameko.Lo wesilisa kuthiwa wadonsa ngendlebe umufi ukuthi akalesule icala uma engafuni ukuthi amenzakalise. Kusolwa ukuthi lo wesilisa osejele nguyena ungqondongqondo wetulo lokusocongwa kukamufi njengoba esolwa ngokuthumela ababulali esezikhindini.Kuthiwa wayenengwa ukuthi umufi akalaleli, akafuni ukusula icala.Ilungu lomndeni elikhulume neSolezwe lacela ukungadalulwa ngenxa yokwesaba, liveze ukuthi bahlaliswe lubhujozi ngabathile ababafuna behambile kuleli lokishi."Angeke thina size sithuthe lapha eMlaza ngoba sizwa ngabantu. Into esiyifunayo nje ukuthola iqiniso nobulungiswa mayelana nokubulawa kwelungu lethu lomndeni,'' lisho kanje.Liqhuba, lithe njengomndeni sebeshaya amakhala ngokuthi amaphoyisa ayoke abasize ngelinye ilanga."Phela ngaphambi kokuba uSimanga abulawe wayeseqalile ethola izinsongo zokuthi kumele asule icala uma engafuni ukubulawa. Sawabikela amaphoyisa ngalokhu kodwa waze wabulawa uSimanga, akukho ake azama ukusisiza ngakho,'' kusho ilungu lomndeni.Icala liyabuyela eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMlaza namhlanje.

AMAPHOYISA asekhiphe isixwayiso ekhuza umphakathi ngokungalokothi uvule amacala angekho esiteshini samaphoyisa.Lokhu kuza emuva kokuthi kuboshwe owesilisa okuthiwa uvule icala elingekho esiteshini samaphoyisa sase-Eldorado Park, eGoli.Umsolwa ukhalelwe ngamasongo kaSigonyela ngoMsombuluko ntambama.Okhulumela amaphoyisa aseGauteng, uSergeant Fezeka Khobo uthe kusolakala ukuthi umsolwa uye esiteshini samaphoyisa wayobika ukuthi udunwe imoto yakhe.“Umsolwa ubike ukuthi udunwe imoto yakhe ngamadoda amahlanu ngesikhathi eyipaka lapho ehlala khona,” kusho uSerg Khobo.Kuthiwa uphenyo olunzulu lwamaphoyisa luvundulule ukuthi lendoda iqambe amanga ifungile.Kuvele ukuthi lendoda ihlulekile ukubuyisela imoto yomsebenzi lapho isebenzela khona yavele yayovula icala elingekho.USerg Khobo uthe umsolwa kulindeleke avele enkantolo maduzane.Umphathi-siteshi e-Eldorado Park, uBrigadier Mkhacai Maluleke uhlabe ikhwelo walibhekisa emphakathini wathi awungalokothi uvule amacala angekho.UMaluleke uthe ukuvula amacala angekho kuphazamisa amaphoyisa  emsebenzini wawo wokuphenya amacala angempela.

UVUTHA engabaselwe owesilisa waKwaMaphumulo osola uMfundisi akhonza naye ngokubaleka nomkakhe.UMnuz Sfiso Gumbi (44) usola uMfu Edward Khumalo (47) webandla iGod’s Christian ngokuthi ubaleke nomkakhe, uNkk Nomusa Gumbi (37). Leli bandla linesizinda KwaMaphumulo.Uma elandisa uGumbi, uthi umkakhe ubeye eGoli, kukhona umhlangano webandla abekuwona njengoba enesikhundla ebandleni.Uthi kumxakile ukubuya kwabanye ebebeseGoli kodwa lutho umkakhe."Ngibe sengimshayela ucingo ngimbuza umkami ukuthi kanti kwenzakalani? Umane wangiphendula ngokuthi angikhulume noMfundisi. Ngimane ngaxakeka ukuthi uchaza ukuthini," echaza.Kodwa uthi umshayelile ucingo uMfundisi wambuza ukuthi kungani umkakhe engakabuyi.Uthi impendulo kaMfundisi imshiye ebhocobele."Umane waqala ngokuxolisa, wase engehla ngaphezulu engitshela ukuthi uyathandana nomkami. Wathi uyaxolisa ngokungizwisa ubuhlungu kodwa impela sebeyathandana," kusho yena.Uthi eseshayela umkakhe ucingo okwesibili akabange esalubamba nhlobo.Kuvela ukuthi uMfundisi washonelwa ngumkakhe ngo-2015 engozini yemoto.Isolezwe Ngempelasonto lishayele ucingo uNkk Gumbi, wathi akaqondi ukuthi kwenzakalani kodwa uzizwa enomuzwa wothando olujulile lukaMfundisi, wathi kodwa akathandi ukukhuluma lolu daba nabantu angabazi. Uthe yena noMfundisi bahlela ukubuyela eThekwini, kuxoxwe noMnuz Gumbi ukuze kutholakale isixazululo salolu daba.Eshayelwa ucingo uMfundisi, uthe izindaba zakhe azidingi ukunekelwa izwe.Ilungu lebandla elicele ukuba kugodlwe igama lalo lithe bakhathazekile kakhulu njengoba sekuphele amasonto amabili uMfundisi engalubhadi enkonzweni.Lithe kuduma amakhanda kubona njengoba bengaqondi ukuthi ngempela kwenzekani.“Sizwa kuthiwa uMfundisi wethu ubaleke nomfazi womuntu. Asazi ngoba nathi sididekile. Uma simshayela ucingo uMfundisi akalubambi. Asazi ukuthi ngempela kuqhubekani, ‘’ lisho kanje ilungu likhulumela phansi.Lithe amalungu ebandla asabisa ngokuliduba ibandla uma kuya ngokuthi lolu daba luyiqiniso.

UNQUME ukuqhubeka nokubhadla esitokisini, umsolwa kwelokubulawa kwendodakazi eneminyaka emibili angayizali, isidumbu sayo esitholwe simbozwe ngobhavu egcekeni kubo, esigamekweni esishaqise amalungu omphakathi esenzeke eSiqungeni, eMthwalume ngesonto eledlule.UMnuz Siyabonga Ndlovu (34) ubevele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMzumbe izolo ngecala lokubulawa kuka-Ayabonga (2).Kukholakala ukuthi iqulu lamalungu omphakathi ebelibhikisha lisho ukuyibamba ngezandla iveni yamaphoyisa ebifika naye ngesikhathi ezovela, okungenye yezinto ezimenze wamanqika ukufaka isicelo sebheyili.Inkantolo inqume ukulihlehlisela uMeyi 17 leli cala. Okhulumela inhlangano elwa nokuhlukunyezwa kwezingane nabesifazane endaweni, i-Women of Mthwalume uNkk Bongekile Sithole obengomunye wabebehola umbhikisho uthe ukungadedelwa kukamsolwa ngebheyili yinto abebevele befuna ukuthi yenzeke.Uthe yingakho bebephume ngezinkani ukuzokweseka umndeni nokufaka ingcindezi ukuthi engayinikwa.“Sigculisekile ngokuthi angadedelwa ngebheyili noma enqume ukungasifaki isicelo.“Lokhu ngeke kwenze umphakathi ungabe usaphuma ngobuningi ukuzobhikisha ngaphandle kwenkantolo uma evela ngoba esikufunayo ukuthi athole isigwebo esimfanele,” usho kanjeUthe bazokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi amalungu omphakathi abamaningi enkantolo uma kuzovela umsolwa ukufaka ingcindezi ukuze anikezwe udilikajele.Bakholwa wukuthi ukuphuma ngobuningi komphakathi yikona okumenze wanquma ukungaqhubeki nesicelo sebheyili esaba ulaka lwawo Uthe abakufunayo ukuthi leli cala lidluliselwe enkantolo enkulu ukuze asheshe athole okumfanele ngoba vele icala wazivumela yena ngaphambi kokuboshwa ukuthi ulenzile.UNdlovu okukholakala ukuthi wayegajwe yisikhwele emva kokwaliwa wunina wengane, kuthiwa ngosuku lwesigameko wathatha ingane kuninomncane eyayihleli naye wathi ifunwa wunina oyizalayo bahleli naye kwaba wukunyamalala kwakhe. Kuthiwa ufonele unina ka-Ayabonga emazisa ukuthi ingane useyibulele wayilahla ehlathini okuthe uma kuyobhekwa khona, kusolwa ukuthi ukhokhobe nesidumbu sengane wayosilaxaza egcekeni kwabo wasimboza ngobhavu.

KUWUJABULISILE umndeni wowesifazane owagwazwa wabulawa enxanxatheleni yezitolo i-Gateway umsolwa elaxaza ukufaka isicelo sebheyili.Umsolwa uMnuz Siphamandla Khumalo (34) obevele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini, izolo, ubhekene necala okugwaza abulale unina wezingane zakhe uNksz Nomfundo Msibi (30) ngo-Agasti 4.Ngesikhathi evela ngo-Agasti 6, wayekade etshele ummeli wakhe, uMnuz Ntando Cele, ukuthi uzofaka isicelo sebheyili ngoLwesine.Nokho ushaye ungqimphothwe esethi ibheyili akasayifuni.Umfowabo kamufi, uMnuz Halalisani Mbatha, uthe kubajabulise kakhulu bewumndeni okwenziwe umsolwa.“Sisola ukuthi ubebona vele ukuthi ngeke ayinuke ibheyili uma kubhekwa isihluku asenzile ngesikhathi ebulala udadewethu,” kusho uMbatha.Ubuye wathi babona nokuthi ubuyile umqondo kuyena ukuthi wenza into embi kunina wezingane zakhe.“Ubone kahle ukuthi awukho umphakathi azokwazi ukuhlala kuwo emva kokwenza isigameko esinyantisa igazi,” kusho uMbatha.Imantshi uMnuz Ashwin Singh ilihlehlisele u-Okthoba 1, nonyaka, icala ukuze kuqhubeke uphenyo. Uthe ngalelo langa, uyobe esesho ukuthi lizoqhubeka eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini noma ledluliselwa eNkantolo yesiFunda.Kuthiwa umufi wayesemalile umsolwa kodwa engafuni nokuyizwa leyo.Kuvela ukuthi umufi ubeseshintshe izindawo zokuhlala izikhawu ezintathu, ezama ukubalekela umsolwa.Ngosuku olwandulela olwesigameko kuthiwa umsolwa wavusa indaba ye-lay-by ayeyithume umufi ezinyangeni ezintathu ezedlule.Kuthiwa wathi ucela ayomkhiphela yona ngoba uyayidinga.Kubikwa ukuthi umufi wayengazizwa kahle ngalokhu kodwa waya ngenkolelo yokuthi, uma eseyikhiphile, umsolwa uzoyeka ukumlandela.Kuthiwa umufi wacela ukuthi umsolwa athumele umuntu, angazizeli yena, kwathi yena (umufi) wacela ukuphelezelwa umngani, ezizwa engaphephile.Kuvela ukuthi umufi wathi uma efika e-Gateway wathola ukuthi umsolwa uze nomfowabo, waqala ukumhilizisa eseyikhiphile e-lay-by, esethi uyogibela erenki yamatekisi, wagwaza wafela endaweni yesigameko.Enkantolo umsolwa uvele edlubhe ijakhethi empunga, elokhu ebeke isandla esibhandishiwe ebusweni. Kuthiwa walimala ngesikhathi eboshwa. Ibikhona yomibili imindeni enkantolo, okamufi nokamsolwa.Umufi nomsolwa bebenezingane ezimbili, eyashona ineminyaka eyisikhombisa, nephilayo eneminyaka eyisihlanu.

UKUSEBENZA kwenye yezindawo zobumnandi yaseThekwini ewunogada emnyango kuyona, kwenza waqaphela ukuthi abantu abathanda ubumnandi, bayahashuka - bafune inyama nokudla okusheshayo njalo uma sebebukhile noma sebeqiwe yinjabulo.Yilapho uMnuz Mncedisi Jeza aqala khona edayisa ukudla okusheshayo bude buduze neHavana, indawo yobumnandi yaseThekwini ngasezitolo iWorskshop, ayesebenza kuyona ngaleso sikhathi. Waqala ngo-2019, ibhizinisi ladlondlobala ngokushesha, akangabe esabheka neze emuva emva kwalapho.Manje uJeza odabuka eDududu, eMkhomazi, ogwini oluseningizimu yaseThekwini, usenenkampani ebizwa ngeDurban Mai-Mai Shisanyama, lapho edayisa khona inyama ngaphansi kwebhuloho elingaseWorkshop, khona eThekwini.Ngaphezu kwalokho, lo somabhizinisi usenezitolo ezimbili ezidayisa inyama aziqale kulo nyaka, kulandela ukuchuma kweDurban Mai-Mai ayiqale ngo-2022, nathi ithakaselwa kakhulu ngabantu futhi yibona abayiqamba ngaleli gama ngoba bechazwa yinyama yakhe, abayifanisa nedayisa kwenye yezindawo ezidumile ezidayisa inyama eGoli, KwaMai-Mai.“Ngiqale le ndawo sibabili sisayibiza ngeMnce and Nelly’s Fast Food, kwathi ngokusebenza kanzima nokubeka eqhulwini izidingo zamakhasimende ethu, sakhula kanjalo njengoba sesilana esikhona manje,” kusho uJeza.Eqhuba, uthe manje useqashe izisebenzi eziwu-28 ebhizinisini lakhe, futhi uhlale eqikelela ukuzigcina zijabule ukuze umsebenzi wakhe uhlale usezingeni eligculisa amakhasimende akhe, futhi zingandi izinselelo ezizamazisa ibhizisini.Uthe babiza kusuka kuR40 kuya phezulu ngokwehlukana komkhiqizo wokudla abakudayisayo.“Inselelo enkulu esibhekene nayo okwamanje wukuthi izithako esizisebenzisayo ziyabiza futhi inzuzo esiyenzayo sisaphoqeka ukuyitshala ebhizinisini ukuze sifike lapho esifisa ukufika khona, nokuthi asikabi nemvume yokusebenza ngendlela esifuna ngayo kodwa sesiziqalile izinhlelo zokwenza konke kube yilokhu esikufunayo,” usho kanje.

ULINDE isinqumo sikaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ngokumele akwenze uNgqongqoshe wezoBulungiswa, uNksz Thembi Simelane, ngezinsolo zokuthi wahlomula ebhange eselawa i-VBS Mutual.UNksz Simelane ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ephefumula okokuqala ngalolu daba ekomitini lasePhalamende, lapho ekhiphe ingonyuluka ngemali okuthiwa wayiboleka kuleli bhange.Uveze ukuthi uRamaphosa nguyena ozomnika umkhombandlela ngokumele akwenze.“Ngibekwe umengameli kulesi sikhundla ngakho nguyena ozosho ukuthi kumele ngenzenjani. Ngisazovela nasekomitini lezobuqotho lenhlangano engijubile ngiyochaza kabanzi ngalolu daba,” kusho uNksz Simelane.Ekhuluma eseChina ngalokhu, uRamaphosa uthe akukho okuzofihlwa ngalolu daba. UNksz Simelane uveze ukuthi waboleka u-R575 600 enkampanini iGundo Wealth Solutions, athenga ngayo indawo edayisa ikhofi eSandton. Le nkampani yayisebenzisana nebhange iVBS njengoba uMasipala wasePolokwane ayeyimeya kuwona, wawunobudlelwano nale nkampani.“Ngaboleka le mali ngoba ngangifuna ukuthi ngithole umholo uma sekuphele itoho kuhulumeni. Ngafuna iseluleko enkampanini iGundo ukuze ngikwazi ukufeza leli phupho, yangazisa ukuthi ingakwazi ukungisiza. Ngayikhokha le mali izikhawu ezintathu, ngayibuyisa nenzalo isingu-R800 000 ngayifaka kwi-akhawunti yeGundo, angikaze ngiboleke imali ngqo kwiVBS.”Uthe akukho akufihlayo, wathi noma esezichaza kuRamaphosa, uzobe esakhuluma udaba olufanayo.Ukuchithile ukuthi uzoba nomthelela ekutheni ashushiswe yi-NPA nakuba ingaphansi kwakhe.“Angikwazi ukutshela i-NPA ukuthi ishushise noma ingashushisi. Akukho okuzokwenzeka okuthinta ukucindezelwa kokushushiswa labo abathinteka ekuweni kwe-VBS.”Uthe ibhizinisi alivula lawa ngesikhathi kuhlasele ubhubhane iCovid-19 emhlabeni jikelele nakuleli.Uveze ukuthi ngaphambi kokuwa kwe-VBS, umasipala ayewuhola wase uvele usuhoxile ekutshaleni imali kuleli bhange.Ubalule ukuthi bathatha lesi sinqumo ngaphambi kokufika komyalelo kaMgcinimafa wokuthi bonke omasipala kumele bayeke ukutshala imali yabo ebhange i-VBS.

‘UMA kunothi indodana yami imtshontshele, ngingavuma. Kodwa othi umntanami udubulile, uLongwe akasoze akwenza lokho. Akalona lolohlobo lomuntu!’ “Akakaze waphatha isibhamu. Laba bameli abamsolayo ecaleni likaSenzo Meyiwa, bayahlanya," usho kanje umculi we-Afro pop, uChicco Twala ngesikhathi eseNkantolo yeMantshi yaseRandburg, eGauteng, ngoLwesithathu, njengoba bekuvele amadodana akhe, uLongwe noSello Jnr.Ekhuluma esithangamini sabezindaba, uChicco uthe akanandaba nokuthi abantu bathini, anesiqiniseko sakho ukuthi ngeke uLongwe atholwe enecala ekufeni kukaMeyiwa.Ebuzwa ukuthi yiqiniso yini ukuthi isibhamu sakhe sahlolwa yini ngongoti, uChicco uthe kwenzeka lokho ngoba wumkhuba ovamisile.Uthe kungamanga aluhlaza ukuthi isibhamu sakhe santshontshwa. "Ngamanga asabalaliswa ngabantu ezinkundleni zokuxhumana." Uthe ukube isibhamu sakhe sayamaniswa nokufa kukaMeyiwa, ngabe kade aboshwa.Uthe unobudlelwano obuhle nomndeni kaSenzo, ikakhulukazi unina wakhe.Uthe ubuye abatakule uma behlangabezana nezinkinga, nokuyinto angayenzi ngoba kuthinteka indodana yakhe, kodwa yinto  avamisile ukuyenza kunoma yimuphi umndeni."Kunodokotela abafundiswe yimi."UChicco uthe amadodana akhe uwabophise ngoba emntshontshele impahla emba eqolo e-studio sakhe. Uthe uLongwe umyise amahlandla angu-30 lapho kuhlunyuleliswa khona izimilo kodwa kunhlanga zimuka nomoya. Uthe kungcono amadodana akhe abolele ejele kunohlukumeza umphakathi.

UMMELI ecaleni lokubulawa kukaSenzo Meyiwa, u-Advocate Thulani Mngomezulu, uthi kunobufakazi bokuthi uLongwe Twala wafika ephuzile waxabana nentombi yakhe kwase kudubuleka umufi.UMngomezulu uveze lokhu ngesikhathi epheka ngemibuzo ufakazi woMbuso owumphenyi wecala uSergeant Batho Mokgola. UMngomezulu uthe kukhona ofakazi azobabiza bezochaza kahle ngalolu daba.UMeyiwa wadutshulwa wabulawa ekubo kwentombi yakhe uKelly Khumalo eVosloorus,eGauteng ngo-2014. UMngomezulu uthe uMnuz Tumelo Madlala wathinta umlisa okuthiwa wuHlophe ethi uMeyiwa udubuleke elamula uLongwe nentombi yakhe uZandi Khumalo.“ ULongwe wafika edakiwe ephethe ivolovolo waxabana noZandi wadubula kwalimala uMeyiwa, wazidubula naye uLongwe emlenzeni,’’ kusho uMngomezulu.Uthe kwabe sekuthungwa intimbothi yamanga ukuze kuvikelwe abathile ngokufa kukaMeyiwa.“ Ubufakazi besibhamu obalethwa yiphoyisa buyingxenye yamanga akhandiwe ukuvikela umuntu othile. Yonke lento ikhandiwe futhi umuntu owabulala uMeyiwa akekho lapha enkantolo,’’ kusho uMngomezulu.Icala liyaqhubeka.

UMASIPALA wasoLundi usukulungele ukuthi leli dolobha libuye libe inhloko dolobha yaKwaZulu-Natal.Lokhu kushiwo iMeya kaMasispala wasoLundi uMnuz Wilson Ntshangase ngesikhathi kunesidlo sasekuseni nosomabhizinisi bendawo, amakhosi nabatshali zimali abafisa ukuzozitshala ebesihlelwe uMasipala wesiFunda iZululand, ngoLwesibili.UNtshangase uthe ukulethwa kwezidingo kuleli dolobha kusesimweni esiyiso, ezepolitiki zizinzile kanti nezitolo ezinkulu ebezike zahamba kuleli,  sezibuyile.“Sasivele sikulungele ukuba inhloko dolobha nangesikhathi uhulumeni uthutha isishayamthetho ngo-2004.“Edolobheni nasemalokishini imigwaqo yethu isesimweni esihle, akukho nowodwa onezimbobo,”  kusho uNtshangase.IMeya kaMasipala iZululand, uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi,  uthe ingqalasizinda ezindazweni zasemakhaya ayikho esimweni.Umasipala wakhe uyazama ngemali encane osuke uyitholile ukulungisa ingqalasizinda njengoba besanda kwakha inkundla yezemidlalo, eziHlabeni, oLundi. Uthe inkinga ekhona ukuthi ugesi uyahlupha ngoba ubuye ucishe ngenhloso yokuwonga kodwa banalo uhlelo lokuyilungisa le nkinga ngoba kunenkampani ezokhiqiza ugesi welanga khona oLundi. “Ngo-2004 ngesikhathi uhulumeni uthutha oLundi kwakunenkolelo yokuthi izitolo ezinkulu zizohamba. “Ezinye zazo zahamba kodwa manje sezibuyile ngoba ziyakholelwa ekutheni umnotho waleli dolobha uyakhula,” kusho uButhelezi.Uthe unethemba lokuthi  uhulumeni omusha ozongena ngemuva kokhetho uzoqinisa imithetho, kuphele laba bantu abazenza osomabhizinisi abayiziqhwaga abadla imisebenzi ngenkani esifundazweni. USihlalo weMikhandlu yoMasipala, uSouth African Local Government Association (SALGA), obuye abe iMeya yaseKing Cetshwayo, uMnuz Thami Ntuli uthe uhulumeni wasekhaya, unethuba lokulungisa isimo ukuze sihehe abatshalizimali abazokhuphula umnotho.

UMNDENI wendoda yaseMpangeni, okuthiwa ingcwatshwe yintombi umkayo engazi, ususabise ngokuthi lolu daba uzoluyisa enkantolo ngesonto elizayo.Kuvela ukuthi umufi uMnuz Bhekithemba Thusi (62) ungcwatshwe eSonyongwane, eMzimkhulu, kubo kwentombi, uNksz Sindisiwe Ngcongo (36).Kuthiwa umufi ubesebenzela eGoli kodwa esejwayele ukubuya ayohlala nentombi eMzimkhulu. Ekhaya kuthiwa imali ubeyithumela.Kuvela ukuthi umufi nentombi bese bethandane isikhathi eside, kodwa bengenayo ingane.UNkk Nozuzile Thusi (58) obegane umufi, uthe angeke athule kugxotshwa ilungelo lakhe.Utshele Isolezwe ukuthi sekunesikhathi eside azi ngomjolo womyeni wakhe nentombi.Uveze ukuthi kunesikhathi lapho umufi acela khona ukuthi abe nesithembu, kodwa yena washaya phansi ngonyawo.Uthe unezingane ezimbili zabafana nomufi. Eyokuqala ineminyaka engu-28, eyesibli ineminyaka engu-24."Iyangicasula le nto eyenziwe yile ntombazane. Ukuthi bengazi ngobudlelwano bayo nomyeni wami, akuchazi ukuthi yenze le nto embi kangaka,'' echaza.Uthe ushayelwe ucingo intombi ngeSonto, imazisa ukuthi umyeni uxinwe wukugula washona base bemfihla khona eMzimkhulu. Uthe ngoMsombuluko unikele eMzimkhulu.Uthe ubengakwazi nalapho okuhlala khona intombi kodwa uguduze waze wafika esizwa ngowesilisa obesebenza nomyeni obekwazi.“Ngithe uma ngingena egcekeni ngakhangwa yintombi ifake izingubo ezimnyama. Ngayibuza ukuthi imzilela kanjani umuntu engamganile?” echaza.Uthi intombi ivele yanxapha yase ithi akamlandele amkhombise ithuna okufihlwe khona umyeni wakhe."Ngizwe zehla izinyembezi ngabona ukuthi impela ngiyalingwa. Ngivele ngalibuka ngase ngiyahamba. Ngiwakhuzile amadodana ami esesho ukumqeda lo wesifazane,'' echaza.Indodana endala, uMnuz Scebi Thusi, ithe angeke bande ngalolu daba, kuyolamula inkantolo.Ithintwa intombi, ithe yona inelungelo eligcwele lokufihla umufi. "Bese ngihlale nale ndoda iminyaka eyisikhombisa. Yiyona futhi okuthe uma seyigula yangicela ukuba ngiyingcwabe lapha ekhaya,'' isho kanje yavala ucingo.Khonamanjalo: Umndeni wakwaZungu eMahlabathini, oLundi, ukhala esifanayo, ngomasihlalisane okuthiwa ungcwabe owesilisa eFree State, ngoMgqibelo, engagunyaziwe.UNkk Simangele Zungu (62) ukhala ngesihluku asenziwe owesifazane athe umyeni wakhe, uMnuz James Zungu (64), ubesenezingane ezimbili naye nazo asanda kuthola ngazo.Uthe bekungakapholi maseko bethole ngezingane ngesikhathi eyodwa yazo ibabikela ngo-Ephreli 30, ukuthi uyise uyagula, akasakwazi nokukhuluma."Sithe sisamangazwe yilokho, sithi sizokwenza izaba zokuya khona, yaphinde yathi useshonile ezintatha zangoMeyi 1.“Izingane zami ezintathu zinikele khona ngenhloso yokuthi zibuye nesidumbu sakhe kodwa zahlangabezana nezingqinamba, bengafuni ukudedela isidumbu," kusho uNkk Zungu.Uthi baqale babeka izaba zokuthi kukhokhwe uR11 000  emakhazeni ayesefakwe kuwo uZungu, nokuthe izingane zikaNkk Zungu sezilungiselela ukuwukhokha, zahlaselwa yiqulu elalihamba nomasihlalisane kamyeni wakhe, lizovimba."Kulona kwakukhona nababephethe izibhamu, izingane zami zaphuma ngesamagundane," echaza.Uthe ufisa ukuthola usizo lwabameli abangammela enkantolo enkulu, alwe olokungcwatshwa kukamyeni, eFree State."Ngize ngaya eMnyangweni wezaseKhaya ngiyobhekisisa ukuthi ngabe kuthiwa wafaka isehlukaniso yini umyeni wami.“Ngafica ukuthi ngisewuye unkosikazi wakhe futhi yimi ngedwa obhalwe phansi ngokusemthethweni," usho kanje. Uveze ukuthi umyeni wakhe ubesabuya ekhaya njengenjwayelo uma kungamaholidi futhi bekuthi uma kunemicimbi yesizulu okufanele igcinwe ekhaya, abekhona, bekhuluma nasocingweni.UNksz Slindile Melanu obengumasihlalisane ucele ukuthi athunyelelwe umyalezo ocingweni angazange awuphendule. Nocingo ubengasalupheduli.Ummeli uMpumelelo Zikalala uthe intombi kayivumelekile ukungcwaba umuntu engashadile naye, wathi isixazululo salokhu kuba incwadi yefa eshiywa ngumufi.Uthe umufi uma ekubhalile ukuthi ufisa ukufihlwa yintombi, lokho kungenzeka.Udalule ukuthi kulandelwa lokho okuyizifiso zikamufi, kodwa kulolu daba umama oshadile kulula ukuthi udaba aluyise enkantolo alunqobe.Uthe kodwa inkantolo imvamisa ithatha isikhathi eside ngaphambi kokuba ikhiphe isinqumo ngodaba olufuze lolu.

OKHULUMELA i-ANC, uMnuz Zuko Godlimpi, uthe uma abaholi bengashintshi ukwenza kuzophela nge-ANC esiphathe iNingizimu Africa iminyaka ewu-30.UGodlimpi uthe ukwehluleka kwe-ANC ukunqoba ngamalengiso okhethweni lwangoMeyi, kuyizinkomba zokuthi abantu bayidinelwe inhlangano.Uthe uma abaholi bengazisukumeli ngokushesha izinkinga ezikhungethe abantu bakuleli, i-ANC ngeke iphinde iphathe ngokuzimela.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma nabezindaba abakanise lapho kubanjelwe khona umhlangano wesigungu esiphezulu, i-lekgotla eBoksburg.UGodlimpi uthe i-ANC kufanele ibhukule, wathi uma ihluleka ukwenza lokho izozithola isenkingeni enkulu ukunalena ebhekene nayo manje.“Asisekho isikhathi sokusinisa amahleza kwi-ANC. Sonke siyakubona lokho. Abantu bakhombisa ukuthi bazosikhipha ngomnyango uma siqhubeka kanje. Umyalezo owathunyelwa abantu ngesikhathi kunokhetho, ucacile. Abantu bathi yebo bayakuqonda ukuthi i-ANC inemigomo emihle. Into abantu abakhala ngayo ukuthi i-ANC iyadembesela, ayiyilandeli imigomo yayo emihle. “Uma ukhuluma nabantu uyabona ukuthi bayayazi imigomo ye-ANC, into nje abakhala ngayo ukuthi imigomo ayilandelwa. Manje ke kubalulekile ukuthi silungise isimo ngokushesha. Uma sehluleka ukulungisa isimo, sizolahlekelwa amandla.”Uthe enye yezinkinga ezikhona kwi-ANC ukungathathelwa izinyathelo kwabantu abenza okuphambene nomthetho.“Into ehlezi ishiwo abantu lapha ngaphandle ukuthi i-ANC ihlezi ikwazi ukubona ukuthi inkinga ikuphi, kodwa iyehluleka ukuthatha izinyathelo. Sonke siyavuma ukuthi manje uma kukhona abaphambana nomthetho noma abahlulwa ukwenza umsebenzi, kuzofanele bathathelwe izinyathelo. Asikwazi ukuthula sibuke umsebenzi ungenziwe. Silahlekelwe amandla ngenxa yokungazisukumeli izinkinga.”UGodlimpi uveze ukungena kwe-ANC ngaphansi kohulumeni wokubambisana angeke kuyishintshe imithetho kahulumeni evele ikhona.“Yonke imithetho kahulumeni ekhona njengamanje izoqhubeka nokusebenza. Imithetho okufanele yesekwe amaqembu esibambisene nawo ileyo ezoshaywa manje njengoba sekuphethe uhulumeni wokubambisana.”UGodlimpi uthe banethemba lokuthi wonke amadlelandawonye e-ANC azogcina eweseka uhulumeni wokubambisana.I-SACP isikusho kaningi ukuthi ayihambisani nokufakwa kwe-DA kuhulumeni wokubambisana.UGodlimpi uthe angeke bayivimbe i-SACP ekutheni igxeke lokho engahambisani nakho.I-lekgotla izophothulwa namhlanje.Izolo, kube namakhomishini abexoxa ngezihloko ezahlukene.

ULAXAZE ukufaka isicelo sebheyili, ngenxa yolaka lwamalungu omphakathi, umakhenikha okuthiwa ungowokufika oboshelwe ukubulala ngesihluku umfelokazi nendodana yakhe okuvela ukuthi ubegoloza ukubabuyisela imali okwakuthengwe ngayo imoto eminyakeni edlule egcine ingafinyelelanga kubona, eDundee kuMasipala waseNdumeni, ngesonto eledlule.Umsolwa okuvele ukuthi ungowokudabuka ezweni elingaphandle, Isolezwe elithole ukuthi ubizwa ngo-Ali, kuthiwa uboshwe ngesonto eledlule emva kokubulawa ngesihluku kukaNkk Ntombifuthi Buthelezi nendodana yakhe uMnuz Mncedisi Buthelezi (20), izidumbu zabo ezatholwa zinamanxeba okudutshulwa, zigxivizwe emakhanda ngezinsimbi ezingamathuluzi okukhishwa ngawo izinjini zezimoto, zidindilize endaweni yokulungisa izimoto umsolwa asebenzela kuyo esedolobheni, eDundee. Indodakazi kaNkk Buthelezi kuthiwa yona isasesibhedlela emva kokuthi yakwazi ukuphunyuka ibaleke nenxeba lokudutshulwa, ngesikhathi umsolwa ehlasela unina nomfowabo. Umsolwa obevele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseDundee okuthiwa beyigcwele phama amalungu omphakathi abebhikisha nangaphandle, uncamele ukungasifaki isicelo isebheyili, okuholele ekutheni imantshi inqume ukulihlehlisela uJulayi 15 kulo nyaka icala.Umakhelwane osondelene nomndeni wakwaButhelezi ongathandanga ukudalulwa, elandisa Isolezwe ngokwenzekile, uthe uNkk Buthelezi ubezihlalela nje nomndeni wakhe abewa evuka nawo njengoba ubesebenza umsebenzi ongatheni.“Ngikholwa ukuthi ngesikhathi kudlula emhlabeni ubaba wekhaya owayesebenza kwamasipala oshone eminyakeni edlule, enye imali umndeni wanquma ukuthenga ngayo imoto ku-Ali (umsolwa), kodwa wagcina engayidluliselanga kuwona ebika imbiba nebuzi ekubeni imali wayeseyithathile. Ngenxa yokuhamba kwesikhathi, ngesonto eledlule umndeni umfonelile usufuna ukuthi abuyise imali okungcono, nokuyilapho ebabizele lapho ehlala khona e-Forestdale, uma befika wabanxusa ukuthi bahambe naye baye lapho esebenzela khona endaweni yakhe esedolobheni,” usho kanje.Uthe ngokulandisa kwelungu lomndeni elisinde kubulawa abakwabo, umsolwa uxabane noNkk Buthelezi kubangwa ukuthi ubesegoloza ukukhokha imali, wadonsa isibhamu wamdubula. Uthe ngesikhathi indodana kamufi ibona kudutshulwa unina, izame ukusondela, umsolwa wadubula ebhekise ngakuyo ngaphambi kokuthi adubule nendodakazi kamufi ekwazile ukubaleka nenxeba ibhace ndawana thile emva kokuthi isibhamu somsolwa siphelelwe izinhlamvu.  Kuthiwa umsolwa ugxivize ikhanda likaNkk Buthelezi ngokusansimbi, ephindelela  emva kokuthi eqedele ngesando esendodana yakhe kubuka ilungu lomndeni ebelibhacile.Ikhansela kule ndawo, uMnuz Andile Nsibande, uthe lesi sigameko sishiye amalungu omphakathi eshaqekile.“Yisihluku esikhulu esingagcina sisusa uthuthuva emphakathini. Lokhu kungadweba isithombe esibi ngabantu bokufika okungadala udweshu kodwa ngoba uboshiwe siyethemba ukuthi ubulungiswa buzokwenzeka,” usho kanje.Uqinisekise ukuthi abagilwa bangcwatshwe ngempelasonto. Imizamo yokuthola okhulumela umndeni ayiphumelelanga njengoba izinombolo zocingo zingatholakalanga kwaze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela.

UMHOLI we-EFF, uMnuz Julius Malema, usechithe isiphakamiso somholi weqembu Umkhonto weSizwe, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, sokuthi kumele amaqembu amancane ahlangane ngaphansi kwe-MK, ukufukula abamnyama.UMalema uthe kumele la maqembu ahlangane ngaphansi kweqembu eliholwa yintsha, ngoba umuntu omdala akukho asangakwenzela intsha. “Kubalulekile ukuthi amaqembu amnyama ahlangane, afukule abantu abamnyama. Kodwa kumele akwenze lokhu ngaphansi kweqembu eliholwa yintsha ngoba abantu abadala abanawo umbono ngokumele kwenzeke ngomuso. Asikwazi ukuholwa abantu abadala abavuka nsuku zonke babe nombono omusha befuna ukuzithola la bemi khona. Iqembu elingakwenza ngempumelelo lokhu yi-EFF,” kusho uMalema.Ukusho lokhu izolo, ekhuluma emngcwabeni kamama kasihlalo waleli qembu KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mongezi Twala, oSizweni.UMalema uphefumule kanje emva kokuba uZuma enxenxe amaqembu amancane amnyama ngeledlule ukuthi kumele abubambane.“Amaqembu abamnyama kumele ahlangane ukuze kukhululwe abantu abamnyama. I-MK yisona sisombululo ezweni yingakho kumele sihlangane singamaqembu amnyama sisebenze ukufukula abantu bakithi,” kusho uZuma.UMalema utshele abebehambele lo mngcwabo ukuthi bankanise kulesi sifundazwe ukuzothola umnyombo wokwehlelwa wukwesekwa okhethweni lwangoMeyi nonyaka.Ufanise ukufika kwe-MK nesikhonyane esifike sabhincisela nxanye amaqembu ahlukene ikakhulu kulesi sifundazwe.“Sila ukuzothola ukuthi uZuma wenzeni ukuthola amavoti ethu. Sishaqekile ngokulahlekelwa wukwesekwa okhethweni, i-MK ifike yaba iTsunami. Usishaqisile umntomdala waseNkandla,” kusho uMalema.Ugxeke uhulumeni wokubambisana kwamaqembu wathi ngelinye ilanga siyovuka izwe lihambile.“Lo hulumeni akuwona owokubambisana, owe-DA ne-ANC. Ngelinye ilanga siyovuka ingasekho iKZN, ngoba amaBhunu awabufuni ubuholi bomdabu,” kusho uMalema.Unxuse abefundisi ukuthi bakhululeke i-EFF.“Izivuvaba zakamuva kwi-EFF azinganithusi kakhulu. Wonke amaqembu ayavivinywa,” kusho uMalema.Usho kanje kulandela ukulaxazwa kwe-EFF ngobeyiphini likamengameli uMnuz Floyd Shivambu, osenguMgqugquzeli kaZwelonke kwiMK.Namhlanje leli qembu lizohlanganisa umbiko wezinto ezivele emhlanganweni namagatsha ahlukene esifundazweni ngokwenzeke okhethweni.Lizobe selikhipha umkhombandlela ngokuzokwenzeka kodwa phambilini uMalema wakuveza ukuthi akekho owayazi ukuthi i-MK izocoboshisa kwasani okhethweni njengoba esiShayamthetho sesifundazwe leli qembu lilahlekelwe yizihlalo eziyisithupha, lisalelwe ezimbili vo. UNobhala Jikelele, uMnuz Marshall Dlamini, uveze ukuthi lilahlekelwe amavoti acela ku-300 000.

UMHOLI we-EFF, uMnuz Julius Malema, uthi amaqembu aphikisayo kofanele akhohlwe ukuthi ayoke akhiphe i-ANC emandleni uma ehlulwe ukuguqisa le nhlangano ebusayo okhethweni oluzayo.UMalema uthe ukhetho lwangenyanga ezayo luyithuba lokugcina emaqenjini aphikisayo ukukhipha  i-ANC emandleni.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi enengxoxo nabezindaba, lapho ebekhuluma khona ngezithinta ukhetho.I-ANC izokuya okhethweni lwangoMeyi 29 kunemibiko eminingi yezinhlangano ezenza ucwaningo ethi izohlulwa okhethweni.UMalema uthe ukhetho oluzayo luzofika ngesikhathi esibi kwi-ANC.“I-ANC ayikho esimweni esihle, izinto ziyababhedela. Uma bephunyule kulokhu, angeke siphinde sibabambe. Leli yithuba elihle lokuthi sikhiphe i-ANC emandleni.“Ngo-1994 sasizitshela ukuthi senza into elungile ngesikhathi sivotela i-ANC. Lolu khetho lusinikeza ithuba lokulungisa amaphutha ethu, ” kusho uMalema.Uthe ukungenzi kahle kwe-ANC okhethweni kungaholela ekutheni le nhlangano ixoshe uMengameli uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa.“Into nje engatakula uRamaphosa ukuthi bathole isibalo samavoti esifanayo nalesi abasithola ngokhetho olwedlule, noma bathole amavoti angcono.“Uma bengase bethole amavoti amancane, abantu  be-ANC bazofuna ukuthi inhlangano iholwe omunye umuntu.“I-ANC ihlose ukuthola amavoti angu-11 million noma ngaphezulu okhethweni oluzayo. Uma beke bathola amavoti angaphansi kuka-11 million, uRamaphosa uzokuba senkingeni.“Kwi-ANC bazoqala bazibuze ukuthi kungani kuzofanele aqhubeke nokuba umengameli ekubeni iqembu lingenzi kahle,”eshoUMalema uthe uRamaphosa uzokuba nezinkinga eziningi njengoba ethe nabo basambekele umkhusu.Uthe basafuna ukuthi uRamaphosa aphendule ngokugqekezwa kwepulazi lakhe iPhala phala.“Lolu daba lusazoqhubeka nokuba iphela endlebeni kuRamaphosa. “Phela kunecala elavulwa lapha. Silinde nje ukuthi banqabe ukumshushisa, sobe sesizishushisela yena. Angeke siphumule lolu daba lungakaxazululeki,” kuqhuba uMalema.Uqhubeke ngokuthi bavule izandla kuwo wonke amaqembu ezepolitiki afuna ukubambisana nabo emva kokhetho.Ubeke kanje:“Kunamaqembu anemigomo ecishe ifane neyethu, i-ATM, Azapo, MK ne-ANC. Empeleni sake saba nesivumelwano ne-ANC sokuthi sizothatha umhlaba ngaphandle kwesinxephezelo, kodwa babuye bangenwa amanzi emadolweni.”Uphinde wagxeka isinqumo senhlangano eyengamele ukhetho, i-Independent Electoral Commission (IEC), sokuphonsela inselelo isinqumo esivumela owayengumengameli uJacob Zuma sokuthi angenele ukhetho.UMalema uthe i-IEC ikhombisa ukuba nenkinga noZuma.“Empeleni lento ye-IEC inikeza uZuma ithuba lokuqhuba  umkhankaso wakhe. Ngaphandle kwezinkantolo kugcwala abantu beMK, uZuma afike akhankase,” kuphetha uMalema.

Umholi we-EFF uMnuz Julius Malema uthe bangasebenzisana ne-ANC kuhulumeni wokubambisana ngoba le nhlangano ngeke isakhula ngokwezibaloUMalema uthe uKhongolose uzoqhubeka nokwehla njengoba njalo uma kunokhetho le nhlangano yehlelwa wukweseka.“I-ANC esingasebenzisana nayo kuhulumeni wokubambisana ngoba njengoba yehlelwa wukwesekwa, ngeke abaholi bayo bazikhukhumeze. Iqembu esizosebenza nalo sifuna libuyise umhlaba, kuvulwe imitholampilo ubusuku nemini kuphinde kuhlinzekwe ngamaqakelo mahhala,” kusho uMalema ekhuluma nabezindaba ekomkhulu lemiphumela yezokhetho eMidrand ngoMgqibelo.Uthe bayajabula ukuthi i-ANC ichuthwe amaphiko wathi ngisho ezinkundleni zokuxhumana abaholi bayo bathule du.Uveze ukuthi sebebonile ukuthi abantu abebebaseka KwaZulu-Natal, bekungabantu bomholi weqembu Umkhonto weSizwe, uMnuz Jacob Zuma.“Siyajabula ngoba sesiyazi ukuthi sesekwa ngobani eKZN. Bekungebona abantu bethu laba abebeseseka kodwa abantu abaduba i-ANC emuva kokususa uZuma. Kwakumele sibone ngesikhathi kuboshwa uZuma izibhelu ezasuka eKZN ukuthi lo muntu kukhona abamesekayo,” kusho uMalema.Uthe bazimisele ukusebenza neMK nasezifundazweni.Uchithe ukuthi i-EFF iyashabalala njengoba ilokhu yehlelwa wukwesekwa.“Ayifi i-EFF, ukuvumbuka kweMK ikhona okusiphuce amavoti. Iqembu elilahlekelwe kakhulu kulolu khetho yi-ANC, i-EFF iwinile. Siyakwamukela ukushawa.” Uveze ukuthi bayayamukela imiphumela yokhetho.“Asinamengameli kumanje okhona ezweni. Kwalo okhona manje akanaso isiqinisekiso ukuthi uzoba ngumengameli. Ngeke sifonele muntu thina, abasifunayo bazosishayela bona ucingo ukuze sixoxe.”UMalema uthe izembe lizogawula kulabo abavilaphile bangasebenza ngesikhathi sokhetho.“Sizolishintsha uhlu lwabaya ePhalamende nabaya eziShayamthetho ngoba kukhona abangenzanga lutho. Bazozihoxela bona ngoba ongasebenzanga akayi ePhalamende.”

UMHOLI we-EFF, uMnuz Julius Malema  uzimisele ngokutakula i-ANC uma ingase ingatholi amavoti anele ukuthi ibuse ngokuzimela okhethweni lwangenyanga ezayo.Nokho usizo lukaMalema luza nombandela oqinile i-ANC okofanele ihlangabezane nawo.UMalema uveze ukuthi uzofuna ukuthi i-ANC ibanikeze isikhundla esibalulekile kwikhabhinethi.Lokhu ukusho ngesikhathi enengxoxo ekhethekile nesiteshi somsakazo esizinze eGoli.Ongoti nezinhlangano ezenza ucwaningo ziveza ukuthi i-ANC ngeke ilunqobe ngamalengiso ukhetho oluzayo, izodinga ukubambisana namaqembu amancane ukuze ikwazi ukubuyela emandleni.UMalema uthe i-ANC angayibuyisela emandleni uma ingabanikeza isikhundla sikaNgqongqoshe wezeZimali.“Ngizimisele ukuthatha amavoti e-EFF ngiwanikeze i-ANC uma ihlulwa ukuthola amavoti anele ukuthi ibuse ngokuzimela. Ngiyobabekela umbandela owodwa nje vo, ukuthi baqoke uMnuz Floyd Shivambu (oyiphini likamengameli kwi-EFF) esikhundleni sikaNgqongqoshe wezeZimali.”UMalema uthe uma benganikwa lesi sikhundla kuyobe basikelwe iqatha elinonile.“Phela i-ANC neDA bangonontandakubukwa, abakwazi ukuhlukanisa phakathi kwesikhundla esikunikeza amandla okwenza izinto nesikwenza unontandakubukwa.“Yingakho ngisho komasipala esibusa ngokubambisana kubo singasijahi isikhundla sobumeya.“Thina siyaye sifike sithi asinendaba nokuthi ubani imeya, thina sifuna ukuthi amakhansela ethu abe osihlalo bamakomiti. Imeya ayenzi lutho, osihlalo bamakomiti yibona abahambisa intuthuko.“Imeya iqhamuka isizosika amaribhini (mhla kwethulwa ngokusemthethweni izinhlelo zentuthuko). Iqiniso ukuthi zonke lezi zinhlelo ezisuke zethulwa imeya zisuke zenziwe osihlalo bamakomiti,” kusho uMalemaUthe uyazi ukuthi ngeke kube lula ukuthi i-ANC ibanike lesi sikhundla ngenxa yokubaluleka kwaso.“Phela uma singathola lesi sikhundla ngabe ziphelile izinkinga ezibhekene nabantu baseNingizimu Afrika. Imali eningi ingaya ekwelekeleleni abahlwempu. Kungaphela ukuthi lo mnyango ubanjwe ngobhongwane izinjinga zaseStellenbosch,” kuqhuba uMalema.Uthe ngeke afune ukuba iphini likamengameli uma bebambisana ne-ANC.“Angeke ngilunge lapha. Indlela engikhuthele ngayo ngingagcina sengigqama ngidlule umengameli.“Ngisho unganginikeza isikhundla sokuba ungqongqoshe womnyango onganakiwe, ngingagqama ngidlule umengameli.“Ngale kwalokho vele ngeke banginike lesi sikhundla ngoba bayangizonda. Abantu abangizondayo ilaba engakhula nabo,” esho.Umshado we-EFF ne-ANC komasipala bakuleli okubalwa kubo iTheku ne-Ekurhuleni, awuhambi kahle.

KUPHUPHUMA injabulo nothando luvutha bhe kumlandeli wezemidlalo wokuqina kuleli, uMama Joy Chauke. Le ntokazi ilokhu izinameke njalo izithombe inesoka layo eyalithola eFrance esilethe igama likaPapa Joy.Naye uPapa Joy kucacile ukuthi uzitholele umakoti ngempela kule ntokazi njengoba eseyethule nasemndenini wakhe. Ezithombeni azinamekile kuvela nalapho uMama Joy esekhishini nomamezala wakhe.Uveze ukuthi uninazala umamukele ngenhle indandatho yegolide, okusho ukuthi "uyamamukela njengomakoti kaPapa Joy“.Useqede nokuqagela kubantu abebezibuza beziphendula ukuthi uhanjiswe wubani ukuya eFrance, njengoba kunemidlalo yama-Olympic.“Zonke izindleko zokuya eParis zikhokhelwe wuPapa Joy... uthando luyavutha bhe,” kusho uMama Joy kweminye yemibhalo ayinameke kwi-X.Ekuqaleni kwaleli sonto, uMama Joy ufake izithombe ekhasini lakhe khona kwi-X, zihambisana nombhalo obuthi “ngisendleleni ngiya eFrance”.Abanye abantu bebezibuza ukuthi ngabe wubani okhokhele izindleko zohambo lwakhe, ikakhulu ngoba kuyaziwa ukuthi uNgqongqoshe omusha wezeMidlalo kuleli, uGayton McKenzie usanda kuvala ukukhokhela izindleko zabalandeli bezemidlalo abahambela imidlalo esuke idlalelwa kwamanye amazwe, ekhala ngokuthi kumoshwa imali engabe isiza kwezinye izinto.Kweminye yemibhalo yakhe, uMama Joy uthe: “Ngiyabonga kakhulu ngothando lwakho Papa Joy. Emva kokuba sematheni eNingizimu Afrika, bengiludinga lolu hambo lokuya eFrance.”Uthe njengamanje uwumlandeli oqavile kaPapa Joy olokhu embusisa njalo ngezidlo ezimnandi, emtetemukisa nasezindaweni ezinezinto ezikhala kahle.Kwesinye sezithombe kuvela isipho asithengelwe yisoka lakhe, futhi ufake kaningi izithombe lapho eshuthe khona nalo behambela izindawo ezehlukene kwelinye lamadolobha aseFrance, iLille.Ufake nama-vidieo enomamezala wakhe kubonakala ukuthi kujatshulwe. Nendandatho athe wamukelwe ngayo emzini, uyivezile kwezinye zezithombe. Ukugcizelele nokuthi indandatho isho ukuthi kuzokikizwa maduze eFrance naseNingizimu Afrika.

BAZOGQUNYWA esitokisini umama kaJoshlin Smith osekuphele amasonto amathathu alahleka, isoka lakhe nomngani wakhe.URacquel Chantel Smith nesoka lakhe uJacques Rowhan Appolis kanye nomngani weSteveno Van Rhyn babuyele enkantolo yeMantshi eVredenburg lapho bekulindeleke khona ukuthi bcele khona ibheyili.Laba bobathathu baveze ukuthi abaqhubeki nemizamo yokuthola ibheyili.FUNDA NGALOLU DABA: Unina wentombazane nesoka kwelokunyamalala kwenganeUmsolwa wesine uPhumza Sigaqa udedelwe yinkantolo ngemuva kokuthi uMbuso uveze ukuthi ukuqhubeka kophenyo kuveze ukuthi abukho ubufakazi obanele ukuthi kungaqhutshekwa naye.Ngemuva kokuthi abasolwa bashalazele ibheyili, uMbuso ucele ukuba icala lihlehle njengoba abaphenyi becala besaqhubeka nomsebenzi.“Kusadingeka ukuthi abaphenyi baqhubeke nokuthatha izitatimende zofakazi kuhlaziywe nolwazi oluthathwe kumaselula abasolwa,” kusho u okhulumela iNPA.Abasolwa abathathu babhekene namacala okushushumbisa umuntu ngenhloso yokumdayisa nokuthumba. UMbuso uthe kungahle kwengezwe amanye amacala njengoba uphenyo lusaqhubeka.icala lihlehliselwe umhla ka 13 Meyi nonyaka.

Owesifazane waseThekwini ufuna ubulunigiswa ngemuva kwezinsolo zokuthi indodakazi yakhe enonyaka idlwengulwe esikhungweni esigada izingane emini eNewlands East, eThekwini.Njengamanje kusolwa umyeni womnikazi walesi sikhungo ngalesi sigameko.Kuthiwa isigameko senzeke ngesikhathi ezinye izingane esikhungweni zithathwe zayofundiswa ukubhukuda, ingane yasala ngoba ingakafundiswa ukuziyela endlini encane.Ekhuluma nephephandaba elinguzakwabo neSolezwe, i-IOL, lona wesifazane, uthe amaphoyisa awakambophi umsolwa yize evule ecala.Uveze nokuthi kunabanye asebephumele obala ngezinsolo ezifanayo.Ngokwalona wesifazane ongeke adalulwe ukuze kuvikelwe ingane, ubone ingane ivuvukele futhi ibomvu ngasesithweni sayo sangasese ngesikhathi eyigeza.“Uthe isitho sakhe sangasese sibuhlungu ngase ngicabanga ukuthi uqubulwa yinabukeni ngoba linakho ukumenza njalo. Ngesikhathi sengimgeza ngihlolile ngabona ukuthi isitho sakhe sivuvukele futhi sibomvu.“Bekunokusikeka, ngase ngimuyisa esibhedlela. Udokotela uthe yigciwane ngangenama ngalokho. Ngimuse komunye udokotela wathi ubona sengathi kunezinkomba zokuhlukumezeka,” kusho lona wesifazane.Uthe ube esefonelwa ngamaphoyisa aseNewlands East emcela ukuthi afike esiteshini.“Ngifake ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngesigameko ngase ngiya esiteshini samaphoyisa. Ngiye esiteshini, usonhlalakahle wakhuluma nami. ”Ngitshelwe ukuthi bazongibopha bathathe ingane yami ngoba angenzanga izinto ngendlela efanele,” esho.Uthe uhambise ingane esibhedlela iMahatma Ghandhi lapho udokotela ethe idlwenguliwe.I-IOL iwabonile amaphepha kadokotela axoxa indaba eshaqisayo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uThenjiswa Ngcobo ukuqinisekisile ukuthi kuvulwe icala.“Amaphoyisa aseNewlands East avule icala lokudlwengulwa ngemuva kwesigameko lapho ingane yentombazane enonyaka, kusolwa ukuthi idlwengulwe ngoMsombuluko, ngoMeyi 6.”Uthe kusaphenywa.

USIHLALO we-ANC ukhale ngepolitiki yobuhlanga asola ukuthi idlalwa uMkhonto weSizwe (MK) ukuwola amavoti KwaZulu-Natal.UMnuz Gwede Mantashe uphawule kanje eMidrand, eGoli ngoLwesine emini eqeda kutheleka esikhungweni semiphumela yokhetho.Ubekade ebuzwe intatheli yeziko lezindaba kwa-eNCA mayelana nemiphumela yokhetho yesikhashana ekhomba ukwehla kukaKhongolose eKZN kwadlondlobala i-MK eqengqeleza phambili.“Uma umonakalo omkhulu uKwaZulu-Natal lokho kusho into ehlukile. Ukhomba ipolitiki yobuhlanga yamaZulu okungamele sizikhathaze ngayo. Lolu wuhlobo lwepolitiki olusibuyisela emuva futhi oselaphelelwa isikhathi,” kusho uMantashe.UManatashe uthe okwenzeka eKZN akumkhathazi uma kuwukuthi kunjengoba echaza.Nosihlalo we-Federal Council kwiDA, uNkk Helen Zille uhambe emazwini kaMantashe esola iMK ngepolitiki ehambisana nobuhlanga.Udalule ukuthi isizwe samaZulu singesikhulu futhi esinamandla wathi imiphumela yokhetho ikhombisa ukudlondlobala kweMK eKZN, eMpumalanga nasezingxenyeni zaseGauteng.Ukhale ngobubi balolu hlobo wepolitiki wathi abantu ababe besayibheka imigomo nezisekelo okwakhelwe kuzona iqembu bagxila ekutheni iqembu liphethwe umuntu wohlanga olufana nolwakhe.IMK ithi ibheke phambili ukulungisa umonakalo osuwenzekile kulelizwe nesikhathi  esimoshekile. Ithi okunye ehlose ukukwenza, ukutholela abantu imisebenzi ukuze babuyelwe isithunzi nobuntu babo.Leli qembu lithi liphokophelele ukufukula osomabhizinisi abasathuthuka.
