MININGI imidlalo esikhiqiziwe nezincwadi ezabhalwa ukulandisa ngamaqhawe aseNingizimu Afrika, aphilayo nangasekho, kubalwa nombumbi wesizwe samaZulu, iNkosi uShaka kaSenzangakhona Zulu.Nakuba kunjalo kodwa lokho akwanele kusomabhizinisi futhi ongumbhali uManzini Zungu, okholwa wukuthi kusekuningi okudinga ukwenziwa ukuqhakambisa amakhosi akuleli zwe.Yingaleso sizathu unqume ukuhumusha umdlalo awukhiqiza eminyakeni emine edlule, othi Shaka iNkosi Yamakhosi, wawenza incwadi ayethule ngesonto elidlule, ukuzama ukuqhubeka aqhakambise ubuqhawe beLembe eleqa amanye ngokukhalipha.“Ngiyazi ukuthi sesikhulume futhi senza okuningi ukuzama ukuxoxa umlando kaShaka kodwa ngibona kungakeneli ikakhulu ngoba isikhathi esiningi kwenziwa ngabantu bakwezinye izizwe abangawazi futhi abangawuqondi umlando wethu, okwenza bawuhlanekezele futhi baveze nezinto ezingelona iqiniso ngamaqhawe akithi,” kusho uManzini exoxa neSolezwe.Eqhuba, uthe kule ncwadi kuzogqama ububele nobuhle bomuntu uShaka ayewuyena, hhayi njengoba abanye babenza ukumveza ewumuntu owuphumasilwe. Uthe: “Kule ncwadi kugqama izinto ezingaziwa ngabaningi njengokuthi uShaka wayeyisoka futhi ewumculi, owayengavelela kakhulu kwezobuciko ukube wayephile esikhathini samanje.”Uveze nokuthi le ncwadi, esiqalile ukudayisa ezitolo ezahlukene ezidayisa izincwadi ezweni lonke, iyatholakala nange-audio ukwenza kube lula kwabangakwazi ukufunda futhi seziqalile izinhlelo zokwenza ukuthi itholakale ngazo zonke izilimi zakuleli zwe, njengoba isatholakala ngesiZulu nesiNgisi kuphela okwamanje.“Ngijabule kakhulu ngokubambisana ne-UJ (University of Johannesburg) ukufeza umbono wami ozosiza nabezizukulwane ezizayo ngolwazi,” kusho uManzini osebenza ophikweni lwabacwaningi khona e-UJ.

UNgqongqoshe wezokuVikela uNkk Thandi Modise uthi usacabanga ngesicelo sobenguSomlomo wePhalamende uNkk Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula sokuthi umnyango wakhe ukhokhele izindleko zabameli emacaleni abhekene nawo.UMapisa-Nqakula osule njengosomlomo emasontweni amabili, uthweswe amacala angu-12 athinta inkohlakalo nokushushumbisa imali.Ubuye asolwe ngokwamukela intshontsho komunye wosonkontileka owayethole ithenda eMnyangweni wezokuVikela  ngesikhathi esanguNgqongqoshe kulo mnyango.Ungaphandle ngebheyili ka-R50 000 ayinikwa yiNkantolo yasePitoli, icala lakhe lahlehliselwa uJuni 4.UModise uthe uthole isicelo kuMapisa-Nqakula ngoLwesihlanu sokuthi ufuna umnyango umlekelele ngezindleko zabameli emacaleni akhe.Uthe isicelo singene ehhovisi lenhloko yezomthetho embuthweni wezokuvikela iSouth African Defence Force, uMajor General Eric Mnisi.Kuthiwa uMnisi uvele wasisukumela ngaphandle kokwazisa ungqongqoshe noma unobhala wezokuvikela uDkt Thobekile Gamede ongomunye wabantu abengamele umnyango, ikakhulukazi ezintweni ezithinta imali.“Isenzo sikaGeneral Mnisi sokwengamela lolu daba ngaphandle kokulandela imigudu efanele sifana nokungabahloniphi abaholi eMnyangweni wezokuVikela,” kusho isitatimende.“Sengiyalele uNobhala wezokuVikela uDkt Gamede ukuthi abheke isenzo sikaGeneral Mnisi ngasohlangothini lokulandela imigudu ngoba kunemigudu okumele ilandelwe uma kunezicelo ezinje,” kusho uModise.Uthe usacabanga ngesicelo futhi uzolandela umthetho ngenhloso yokuvikela imali yabakhokhi bentela.

IBAMBA likaMengameli uMnuz Paul Mashatile, lihlabe ikhwelo emphakathini ukuthi ungazishayi indiva izexwayiso ezikhishelwa isizwe ngemvula noma ukukhithika kwezulu okungase kubekhona ukuze kuvikwe izinhlekelele.UMashatile uthe le miyalelo isiza ekutheni kuhlelwe izinto abantu bangabi sengozini.Uzwakalise ukuzwelana nabantu abakhahlanyezwe wukukhithika kwezulu ngempelasonto, okuvale thaqa ukuhamba kwezimoto emgwaqweni omkhulu uN3 eHarrismith. Abantu bachithe izinsuku bebhajwe kuN3 kungahambeki ngenxa yeqhwa. Iqhwa lihlasele nase-Eastern Cape naKwaZulu-Natal.Isimo sezulu sikhiphe izidumbu, kwezinye izindawo sibhidlize izindlu zabantu. “Kubalulekile ukuthi zilalelwe izinhlangano ezikhipha izexwayiso ngesimo sezulu ngaphambi kokuba singene ezimotweni. Kumanje amathimba ahlanganisa izinhlaka ezehlukene asami ngomumo ukusiza uma kunesimo sezulu esizokhahlameza abantu.”Uzwelane nabantu abakhahlamezekile nabashonelwe izihlobo ngalesi sikhathi.“Isimo sezulu ebesikhona sikhahlameze nezindawo zamagugu ezwe. Sibonga ongqongqoshe abahlukene okubalwa owamaPhoyisa nowezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu, ngokusheshe bahlanganise izinhlaka basize abantu abebesenkingeni,” kusho uMashatile izolo ethula inkulumo emgubheni wosuku lwamagugu enkundleni yemidlalo iMeqheleng, eFicksburg eFree State.Uthe ukuguquka kwesimo sezulu yinto okumele siphile nayo siyizwe.“Isimo sezulu sishintshe kakhulu ngoba sekwenzeka izinto ezingakaze zenzeke phambilini. Kubalulekile ukuthi sitshale imali ebuchwephesheni besimanje obuzokwenza ukuthi sikwazi ukusheshe sibone inhlekelele siyivimbe ingakenzeki,” kusho uMashatile.UMashatile usho lokhu nje bekunemvunge ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kukhona abakhala ngokuthi abaziswanga kusenesikhathi ngokuthi lingase likhithike bese kudaleka umonakalo.Abanye bebekuveza ukuthi kusuka ngeledlule ubulokhu usatshalaliswa umyalezo wokuthi isimo sezulu sizoshintsha sibe sibi kakhulu kube neqhwa.Nohulumeni wesifundazwe uzikhiphile izexwayiso kusuka ngeledlule lapho ubuveza ukuthi izinhlaka ezisiza uma kunezinhlekelele zimi ngomumo.

UTHEMBISE ukuthi kuzophela lo nyaka isixazululekile inkinga yokucishwa kukagesi, oyiPhini likamengameli wezwe uMnuz Paul Mashatile.UMashatile uthe akakhulunyiswa ngukuthi kuzoba nokhetho futhi akakhankasi kodwa le nkinga bazimisele ukuyiqeda ngoba ikhahlameza umphakathi.Ethula inkulumo ngesikhathi kunesifundo ngeminyaka engu-30 izwe lakhululeka eNyuvesi iJohannesburg izolo, ubalule ukuthi kuningi okwenziwe nguhulumeni kusuka ngo-1994.“Ngifuna ukuniqinisekisa ukuthi kunezinhlelo esizisebenza ngokushesha zokuthi siqede ngenkinga kagesi kuleli. Ngiyazi aningikholwa, futhi nicabanga ukuthi ngiyakhankasa kodwa akunjalo. Yingakho ngithi ngeke iqedwe ngaphambi kokhetho kodwa izoqedwa ekupheleni kwalo nyaka.” Uthe uma isiqediwe le nkinga ungqongqoshe kagesi uzobe esehlelela ingomuso.“Abanye bamuzwa ethi emuva kokuqeda ngale nkinga uzobe esewuphothulile umsebenzi wakhe. Ngimtshele ukuthi emuva kokuqeda ngale nkinga kumele ahlelele eminye iminyaka engu-10 ukuthi singaphinde sibe nenkinga efanayo,” kusho uMashatile.Uthe kumele kwakhiwe ezinye iziphehli zikagesi bese kusetshenziswa negesi ukuphehla ugesi.Uthe balubheke ngabomvu ukhetho lukazwelonke olungoMeyi 29."Ukhetho olubaluleke kakhulu kuleli njengoba emaningi amaqembu angenele ukhetho, kanjalo nalabo abazozimela. Ngiyayithemba i-ANC ukuthi izokwenzakahle okhethweni. Asithuki ukuthi maningi amaqembu angenele ukhetho ngenxa yokuqina kwentando yabantu kuleli.“Uthe mkhulu umsebenzi owenziwe nguhulumeni emikhakheni ehlukene okubalwa ezokuthutha, ezolimo ezemfundo neminye.“Kuthuthukiswe ingqalasizinda kwabekwa uR21.4 billion, wokuphucula umnotho. Sinxenxa intsha nabesifazane ukuthi babe yingxenye yezinhlelo zokuthi amabhizinisi abo ahlomule.” Uthe uhulumeni uyisukumele nenkinga yamanzi.“UMengameli uqoke ithimba elizobhekana nale nkinga ngoba iyaphuthuma. Kubalulekile ukuthi abantu bakithi bathole ilungelo labo okungamanzi okuphuza ahlanzekile.” Khonamanjalo uNgqongqoshe ehhovisi likamengameli uNksz Khumbudzo Ntshavheni, uthe umnotho usukhule kakhulu uma uqhathaniswa nango-1994.Ekhuluma ngesikhathi kwethulwa inyanga yenkululeko neminyaka engu-30 izwe lakhululeka, uthe imali eqoqwe ngentela kuleli inyuke isuka kuR143 billion ngo-1996, yaya kuR2.1 trillion ngonyaka odlule.Ubalule nezinhlelo eziningi ezithuthukise umphakathi okubalwa ukuxhaswa kwezitshudeni ngemali yokufunda ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme iNSFAS, abafundi abadla nsuku zonke ezikoleni kanjalo nosizo lwezempilo.

IPHINI likaMengameli wezwe, uMnuz Paul Mashatile, lithembise ukuthi sizoqhubeka nokufukula izitshudeni ezintulayo isikhwama esixhasa ngemali yokufunda ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme, iNational Students’ Financial Aid Scheme (NSFAS).UMashatile uveze ukuthi ngeke siguqulwe lesi sikhwama senziwe enye into njengoba inhlangano emele imikhandlu yezitshudeni emanyuvesi, iSouth African Union of Students’ (SAUS), yanxusa uhulumeni othathe izintambo ukuthi ungasiguquli lesi sikhwama sigcine sesibolekisa ngemali yokufunda njengoba manje sikwenza kokubili - sibolekisa ngemali siphinde sihlinzeke ngemifundaze kwabantulayo. “Uhulumeni uyazazi izinselelo ezibhekene neNSFAS, ezenze izitshudeni eziningi zasala dengwane. Siyazilungisa lezi zinkinga ngoba lesi sikhwama sizoqhubeka nokufukula izitshudeni ezintulayo,” kusho uMashatile.Uphefumule kanje ngesikhathi kugujwa usuku lwentsha ePolokwane, eLimpopo, ngempelasonto.UMashatile usho lokhu nje kulandela ukukhathazeka ngohulumeni wobumbano ohlanganisa amaqembu ahlukene okuyi-ANC, DA, IFP, Patriotic Alliance neGood.Ukukhathazeka kwezitshudeni kuqubuke emva kokuba iDA ingelinye lamaqembu afuna siguqulwe lesi sikhwama sibolekise ngemali kunokukhipha imifundaze.ISAUS yaveza ukukhathazeka ngokuthi akumele sithintwe lesi sikhwama noma kuthiwa kungena ungqongqoshe welinye iqembu eMnyangweni weMfundo ePhakeme nokuQeqesha. UMashatile uphinde waveza ukuthi uhulumeni wobumbano uzogxila ezintweni ezithinta intsha kanjalo nokwakha amathuba emisebenzi.“Siwuhulumeni sifuna ukubona abantu abasha bengena bethi shi  kwezithinta umnotho. Sifuna banqume ngempilo yabo njengoba ungeke ukhule umnotho ngaphandle kokuqasha intsha.” Ubalule ukuthi ngaphansi kukamengameli omusha, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa, izinselelo ezibhekene nentsha zizoqhubeka zibe seqhulwini lwezinto uhulumeni azozisukumela.“Kule minyaka emihlanu ezayo uhulumeni uzogxila ekuhlinzekeni intsha ngamakhono. Zizoqhubeka izinhlelo zokwakha amathuba emisebenzi,” usho kanje. UMashatile udalule ukuthi ngeke izwe liye phambili ngaphandle kwentsha yakuleli okuyiyona eningi. Intsha ihlala ikhalaza ngokunqaba kwamathuba emisebenzi okuyisihlava esibhekene nelakuleli.NgokweStatistics SA, izinga lokungasebenzi kuleli limi ku-32.9% kanti elokungasebenzi kwentsha kuleli liphezulu kakhulu njengoba lingu-59.7%.

UMASIPALA weTheku usuqashe amalungu omphakathi waseBuffelsdraai, eVerulam, angu-185 ukwenza umsebenzi wokongiwa kwamahlathi endaweni eyakhele indawo yokulahla udoti.Lokhu kuvezwe yiMeya yeTheku, uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda, ngoMgqibelo, ngesikhathi ibize umhlangano nomphakathi wakule ndawo.Inhloso yomhlangano bekuwukuzowazisa ngenqubekela phambili ngezinhlelo ezamenyezelwa nyakenye, kulandela udlame phakathi kwawo nonogada abagade endawweni.Kulolo dlame olwaba ngoJulayi nyakenye, onogada basolwa ngokudubula uMnuz Njabulo Mbonambi (27) wasoSindisweni wafa. Kwathiwa wadutshulwa ngezinhlamvu zangempela esifubeni, washonela endaweni yesigameko.Kwabikwa ukulimala kwabevile ku-16 abaphuthinyiswa esibhedlela. Bonke abagilwa babengabantu ababezicoshela udoti kule ndawo ngenhloso yokuziphilisa. UKaunda ekhuluma nomphakathi obugcwele phama itende, uthe iminyango eyahlukene yomasipala isatshalaliswe kule ndawo ukuthi isungule izinhlelo ezizokwenza ngcono impilo yabantu.“Bangu-185 asebenikwe umsebenzi ohlelweni lokongiwa kwamahlathi akhele indawo iBuffelsdraai kanjalo nendawo yokulahla udoti,” kusho uKaunda.Uqhube wathi ingu-30 imifelandawonye yamabhizinisi esibhalisiwe kusuka ngalesiya sikhathi kuze kube yimanje.UKaunda uveze nokuthi inqwaba yemilutha yezidakamizwa ingaphansi kohlelo lokuhlunyeleliswa.“Abanye babo sebesiziwe ngokuphelele, base beyohlanganiswa nemindeni yabo,” kuchaza uKanda.Uqhube wathi bazimisele ngokusiza intsha ebisicwile ezidakamizweni ukuthi ithole amathuba omsebenzi ukuze ingaphindeli ekusebenziseni izidakamizwa.“Ngokusebenzisana nama-SETA’s, sizobafaka ezinhlelweni zokuqeqeshelwa i-carpentry, plumbing, ne-brick laying,” kusho uKaunda.Olunye usizo athe lulethelwe umphakathi waseBuffelsdraai, olokubhalisela omazisi, kulabo abangakaze babenabo.Uphinde waveza ukuthi useqokiwe usonkontileka ozokwenza umsebenzi wokwakha isiphehlimanzi sasoGunjini, esizolekelela izinkinga zamanzi.Uphinde wagcizelela ukuthi kuyingozi kubantu ukuya endaweni yokulahla udoti.Le ndawo namanje isavaliwe kulabo abafuna ukuzicoshela udoti. Lesi sinqumo sathathwa umasipala kulandela izidubedube zokubulawa komuntu owayezozicoshela udoti ngoJulayi nyakenye.

NKOSIKHONA CELEIMEYA yesiFunda iLembe, uMnuz Thobani Shandu yethule ngokusemthethweni uhlelo lokulwa nokugxaza kwamanzi ezingxenyeni ezahlukene zakule ndawo.Lokhu ikwenze izolo ngesikhathi iseDarnela kuWard 2, nokuyilapho ifike yethula khona o-plumber okuyibona abazobhekelela amanzi agxazayo.Ithe sekumosheke imali elinganiselwa kwizigidi eziyikhulu ngenxa yale ngwadla. "Uma singayisukumeli le nkinga izodala ukuthi siqhubeke nokuthi silahlekelwe yimali,'' usho kanje.Uthe bazibophezele ekutheni benze konke okusemandleni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi iyaxazululwa inkinga yokugxaza kwamanzi ezindaweni ezahlukene zeLembe.Uveze ukuthi abasebenzi bakamasipala bazofundiswa nangezindlela ezahlukene ezingasetshenziselwa ukuqinisekisa ukongiwa kwamanzi.UShandu uthe kumqoka kakhulu ukuthi amanzi asetshenziswe ngobuhlakani ukuze ezokongiwa. "Amanzi ayisidingo esingatholakali kalula futhi esibizayo. Uma singawanakekeli namuhla, isizukulwane sethu esizayo siyobe singenalutho. Uma songa amanzi songa nemali,'' usho kanje.Ukhumbuze amalungu omphakathi ngokubaluleka kokongiwa kwamanzi. Uthe kuhle umphakathi uzijwayeze ukunciphisa amanzi owasebenzisa nsuku zonke. Ubaphonsele inselelo yokuthi mababhukule benze isiqiniseko sokuthi bayabika njalo uma kukhona ukugxaza kwamanzi abakubonayo, kwazise kusuke kuzodla izigidi uma kwenzeke isikhathi eside.Ikhansela lakule ndawo uMnuz Nkosinathi Ngema uthe kuyabathokozisa ukuthi iLembe liyayisukumela ingwadla yokugxaza kwamanzi kule ndawo.Amalungu omphakathi akushayele elikhulu ihlombe ukwethulwa kwalolu hlelo. Azwakalise ukukhathazeka ngendlela amanzi agxaza ngakhona kule ndawo.UMnuz Nhlanhla Buthelezi oyilungu lomphakathi uthe kuyajabulisa kakhulu ukubona umasipala ukusukumela ukugxaza kwamanzi.Uthe kwesinye isikhathi agxaza kuze kufike ekutheni  umgwaqo ugcine sewumanzi okuyinto athe ibibakhathaza kakhulu."Siyethemba ukuthi njengoba sekukhona umasipala nje uzobhekana nale nkinga izoke iphele ngoba yona isikhathazile,''usho kanje.

USEMBHIDLANGWENI wokufukula osomabhizinisi abancane uMasipala waseMnambithi, i-Alfred Duma.Lokhu kuvezwe yiMeya yakule ndawo, uKhansela Zama Sibisi ngesikhathi enikezela ngezinsiza ezahlukene kosomabhizinisi abasafufusa. Balinganiselwa ku-100 sebe bonke osomabhizinisi ebehlukene abathole usizo oluvela kulo masipala.Osomabhzinisi ebebelekelelwa basemikhakheni ehlukene, okungabalimi, abathungayo, abadayisa ukudla emgwaqweni nabanye."Siyakholelwa kakhulu ekutheni kumele kube khona okuthile esikwenzela osomabhizinisi bakithi ikakhulu abasafufusa. Sifisa ukubabona bedlondlobala,'' usho kanje uNksz Sibisi.Abadayisa ukudla banikezwe amabhodwe nezitofu zokupheka. Abathungayo bahlomula ngemishini yokuthunga yeqophelo eliphezulu.Abadayisa emgwaqweni banikelelwe ngezindlu abazozisebenzisa ukuze benganethwa yimvula noma bashiswe yilanga.Imeya ithe akumele banyundelwe osomabhizinisi abancane ngoba baklama indima enkulu ekufukulweni komnotho wedolobha.UNksz Sibisi uveze ukuthi bazimisele ngokwenza konke okusemandleni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi bayathuthukiswa osomabhizinisi abancane.''Sifuna ukubona osomabhizinisi bethu abancane bethuthuka kuze kufinyelele kwisigaba sokuthi nabo bagcine sebeqashe abanye abantu,'' usho kanje.Uveze ukuthi basebenzise imali eningi ukufezekisa lolu hlelo ngoba bekholelwa kosomabhizinisi abancane.UNksz Nomalanga Ngubane onebhizinisi lokuthunga onikezwe imishini embili uthe bajabule kakhulu ngokuhlomula ngosizo kumasipala."Ngijabule kakhulu ukuthi lokhu ababekade besithembise khona ekuqaleni basigcinile ngampela isethembiso sabo,'' usho kanje.UMnuz Msawakhe Zindela onikelelwe indlu azosebenzela kuyona edolobheni uthe kungathi uyaphupha ulele kusazothiwa akaphaphame."Namanje angikakholwa ukuthi lento yenzekile ngampela,'' usho kanje.UNksz Sibisi uthe lusatshalaliswe ezingxenyeni ezahlukene zaseMnambithi."Lolu hlelo luhanjiswa kuwona wonke ama-ward ethu akhona lapha eMnambithi,'' usho kanje.Uveze ukuthi kunezinhlelo ezinye abanazo ezimayelana nokuhanjiswa kwentuthuko kubantu bakule ndawo ezifaka phakathi ukuvulwa kwamahholo amasha ezindaweni ezahlukene.

NKOSIKHONA CELEUMasipala waseNkosi Mtubatuba usuqale uhlelo lokuthi iziphathimandla zawo zihambele kuzo zonke izindawo okwenziwa kuzo imisebenzi kamasipala ngenhloso yokuqinisekisa ukuthi konke kuhamba kahle nomsebenzi uqedwa ngesikhathi.Lokhu kuvezwe yiMeya yawo, uMnuz Mxolisi Mthethwa ngesikhathi eqala umkhankaso wokuhambela izinhlelo ezehlukene zomphakathi owakhele lo masipala.UMthethwa uthe ukuze intuthuko isheshe ifike emphakathini, babone kubalulekile ukuthi basukume bangahlali emahhovisi, baye ngqo lapho kusetshenzwa khona. Ukholwa wukuthi lokhu kuzosiza nasekutheni kungabi nezinhlelo ezidonsa isikhathi eside ezingapheli.Ubehambisana  neMenenja yakulo masipala, uMnuz Thamsanqa Xulu bahlola nokwakhiwa kwenkundla yezemidlalo eNkombose. Le nkundla izodla uR13 million.“Sifuna ukuthi uma kunenkinga engaholela ekutheni umsebenzi uhambe ngonyawo lonwabu, sisheshe sazi. Ukuziyela mathupha kuyasiza ngoba sifike sithole umbiko ogcwele nathi sizobonele ngawethu, singatshelwa nje sihlezi emahhovisi,” kugcizelela imeya.Ithe kubajabulisile ukuthi ukwakhiwa kwale nkundla kuhamba kahle futhi kubukeka yonke into izophothulwa ngesikhathi esibekiwe.Ngaphandle kwalokhu, uMthethwa uthe uzibonele yena ukuthi ngempela amalungu omphakathi awatholile amathuba omsebenzi njengoba eyingxenye yokwakhiwa kwale nkundla.UNksz Nokukhanya Msane ongomunye wamalungu omphakathi othole umsebenzi ngokwakhiwa kwale nkundla uthe: "Izinhlelo zalolu hlobo zibuyisa ithemba emphakathini wakithi ngoba zifika namathuba emisebenzi,'' usho kanje.Imeya ithe kulokoza inhlansi yethemba ngokuthi le nkundla uma seyiphothuliwe izolekelela abantu abasha bangabi wuvanzi futhi bagweme nokungena ebugebengwini."Sinxusa umphakathi ukuthi usebenzisane nathi ukuqinisekisa ukuthi amaphrojekthi esiwenzayo ayashesha ukuphothulwa. Lokho umphakathi ungakwenza ngokuthi uwavikele aze aphothulwe,'' kuchaza uMthethwa.Kuphinde kwahanjelwa nesakhiwo esizolekelela ukufukula ezokuvakasha kule ndawo, iTourism Centre.Lesi sakhiwo uma sesiphothuliwe kuthiwa ngaphakathi sizoba nendawo yokudayisa nendawo yokudla esezingeni eliphezulu. Bahambele naseZamimpilo Craft Market lapho okwaqubuka khona umlilo kwathi ababesebenza khona basala dengwane. Njengamanje kuqhubheka umsebenzi wokulungiswa kwale ndawo oqhutshwa wumasipala ngokubambisana noMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana nezoMdabu KwaZulu Natal.

UMASIPALA waseZululand uqashe inyosi yeSilo esanda kudilizwa wuhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Buzetsheni Mdletshe.UMdletshe uzosebenza esikhungweni samaciko esingaphansi kwalo mkhandlu, Indonsa Arts and Craft Centre, lapho ezokube ecija khona izimbongi namaciko asafufusa.IMeya kaMasipala waseZululand ephinde ibe uNdunankulu kaZulu, uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi, ukwamukele ukuqashwa kukaMdletshe.“UMdletshe uzofika nesipiliyoni esikhulu kulesi sikhundla sakhe sokuba umdidiyeli omkhulu wezamasiko namaciko. Kungenzeka ukuthi abanye bambona esephelelwe ushatini, kodwa thina siyazi ukuthi amaciko aseZululand azohlumula okukhulu kwisipiliyoni eza naso.”UMdletshe waziswe ngeledlule ukuthi inkontileka yakhe izonqanyulwa ekupheleni kwenyanga.UMdletshe usebenza njengenyosi nomeluleki wezamasiko weSilo uMisuzulu kaZwelithini.UNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube, uthe uMdletshe usezobizwa kuphela uma kunesidingo ukuba azohasha iSilo.

IGODUKE isithwele izinsiza zokuthuthukisa amabhizini ayo intsha ewu-150 engaphansi kukaMasipala uMhlathuze ngesikhathi kunomcimbi wokuzidlulisela kwababefake izicelo eNgwelezane, eMpangeni.  Lo masipala oholwa uMnuz Xolani Ngwezi, usebenzise imali engu-R1 million ukuthenga izinsizakusebenzi okubalwa kuzo imishini yokuthunga, imishini yokugunda utshani, iziqandisi, imishini yokugunda izinwele, izitofu nokunye ukuze ikwazi ukuthuthukisa amabhizinisai ayo. Bekungokwesibili kunomcimbi walolu hlobo njengoba owokuqala ube khona nyakenye. UNksz Bongiwe Mthembu, waseNseleni onebhizinisi lokukhulisa amatshwele, uhlomule nge-incubator okungumshini omumatha amatshwele angu-1000 ukuze amaqanda achanyiselwa yizinkukhu agcineke efudumele."Ngithokoze kakhulu ukuthi ibhizinisi lami lizokwazi ukuthi lenze umkhiqizo omningi, abantu ngeke besalinda isikhathi eside njengoba ukuchamisela amatshwele kuthatha izinsuku ezingu-21. Ukuba ne-incubator efaka amaqanda amaningi kuzokwenza ukuthi umkhiqizo wami uhambe," kusho uNksz Mthembu.Uthe ukuba ne-incubator encane kumlahlekisele ngamakhasimende."Amakhasimende abegcine esethenge kwezinye izitolo engasathengi kimi. Okunye wukuthi amaqanda ayabiza futhi awatholakali kalula, bengize ngiwathenge eGoli," usho kanje.UMnuz Langelihle Shabalala waseSikhaleni onebhizinisi eliwasha amateku, iKick Slack yena uhlomule ngetende, itafula kanye nensipho yokuwasha amateku."Itende lizosisiza kakhulu ngoba sisebenza endaweni evulekile, ngakho sinokuphazamiswa imvula uma ina, singakwazi ukusebenza nokwenza ukuthi ibhizinisi lethu lingayingenisi imali," kusho uShabalala.Uqhube wathi njengoba kuyinyanga u-Juni ibhizinisi lenza kahle kakhulu."Njengoba kungamaholidi kuyenzeka siwashe amateku angu-20 futhi sisebenza kakhulu uma kunemicimbi ngoba baba baningi abantu abafuna ukuwashelwa amateku ngokushesha. Amateku ajwayelekile siwabiza uR60, amhlophe siwawashe ngo-R70, ebese ama-suede kuba ngu-R100 ngoba kudingeka okokufutha ukwenzela ukuthi singalimoshi iteku," usho kanje.UMnuz Ayanda Mpanza ohlomule ngomshini wokuthunga, uthe lokhu kuzomkhuthaza kakhulu, wanxusa ukuthi intsha ingakubukeli phansi ukuthunga."Umshini ekade ngiwusebenzisa ubusebenza ebese uyakhathala njengoba ububizwa nge-domestic, kodwa manje ngoba ngithole umshini we-industrial, ngizosebenza kakhulu. Kuyinto enhle ukuthunga futhi kunayo inzuzo ngoba akekho umuntu ongakudingi ukugqoka," kusho uMpanza.

UMENGAMELI we-ABC obuye abe yiMeya yaseMvoti, uMnuz Philani “PG” Mavundla, uthe lizoduma liyithathe i-ANC komasipala ababambisene nayo kubona. UMavundla uthe ezinsukwini ezintathu ezizayo kuzozwakala okunye ngezinguquko ezizoba khona komasipala.UMavundla usho lokhu ekhuluma nabezindaba eThekwini izolo lapho abecacisa khona ngezinhlelo zabo kubhekwe okhethweni.Uthe uMasipala uMsunduzi eMgungundlovu, uMuziwabantu eHarding noMdoni eScottburg yibona abazothinteka.Imikipito yamaqembu komasipala yande kakhulu emuva kokhetho lohulumeni basekhaya ngo-2021 emuva kokuthi imiphumela ingavumanga kahle.UMavundla wayeyiPhini leMeya yeTheku emuva kokuthi ehlenge i-ANC ihamba nomfula, umasipala uyiphunyuka. Akaliqedanga ihlandla lakhe baxabana ne-ANC yamkhipha ngoshova esikhundleni.Kumanje i-ANC ibusa uMasipala weTheku ngokubambisana neNFP namanye amaqembu.UMavundla uthe nakuba eThekwini bengasakipitile ne-ANC kodwa banawo amandla okuyiketula emandleni uma beshaya izibalo zabo.Uthe abasazimisele ukusebenza noKhongolose yingakho bezowuketula ekuphatheni omasipala. “KuMasipala uMsunduzi babedinga isihlalo esisodwa ukuze babuse umkhandlu, sabanika ezintathu. EThekwini uma ubheka i-ANC inezihlalo ezingu-95, uma ngingalibali ikhansela elashona bese kuba amaqembu ayisikhombisa anesihlalo esisodwa lilinye,’’ kusho uMavundla.Umemezele nokuthi bazoba nomcimbi wokwethula izethembiso zokhetho ngoMgqibelo ka-Ephreli 13 e-The Station, eThekwini.Uthe lapho bazohluba udlubu ekhasini ngokuthi yini abazoyenzela abantu bakuleli. Amaqembu wonke alungiselela ukhetho lukazwelonke oluzoba ngoMeyi 29 nonyaka lapho okulindeleke ukuthi zidlane imilala khona.UMavundla uthe uyazi ukuthi amaqembu amaningi asekhulumile kodwa nabo bazoqhamuka nokwehlukile.Uthe emuva kokhetho bazobe bezimisele ngokuxoxa nanoma yiliphi iqembu elihambisana nemigomo yabo babumbe nalo uhulumeni.UMavundla uthe iqembu labo likhombise ukukhula selokhu lasungulwa ngoba lijoyinwe abantu abanohlonzo abafana noDkt Makhosi Khoza.Uthe bazimisele ngokugadla kuzwakale okhethweni ukuze bakwazi ukuba neqhaza elicacile uma sekubunjwa uhulumeni.

UPHIKISA eyokuchithwa kobuholi be-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uNobhala Jikelele wale nhlangano, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula,  ngokubhacaza okhethweni lukazwelonke nolwezifundazwe njengoba le nhlangano yehlelwe wukwesekwa italajwa yiqembu eliholwa ngowayengumengameli wezwe uJacob Zuma, Umkhonto weSizwe.UMbalula uthe nakuba kukhona abakhuluma eyokuthi kumele buhlakazwe lobu buholi kodwa ngeke kwenzeke lokhu.Uthe akumele kugxekwe ubuholi bakulesi sifundazwe kuphela ngale miphumela.Kumele sonke isigungu esiphezulu se-ANC sizigxeke ngemiphumela yokhetho lwaseKZN. Besazi ukuthi uZuma uzothola ukwesekwa eKZN kodwa hhayi ngale ndlela,“ kusho uMbalula ekhuluma nabezindaba, izolo.Uthe yingakho bathumela inqwaba yabaholi abebegiya bephindelela kulesi sifundazwe ngoba bebefuna ukuwina amavoti.“Besibheke kakhulu i-IFP KwaZulu-Natal. Asigxeki muntu ngale miphumela ngoba siwenzile amaphutha eKZN.” Uthe kuyiwe okhethweni abantu bengenawo amanzi emalokishini amakhulu okubalwa uMlaza.“Senze amaphutha amaningi kuhulumeni. Siye okhethweni kukhalwa eKZN ngendaba yamanzi. Bekunenkinga kagesi. Ngakho siye okhethweni ziningi izinkinga umphakathi obukhala ngazo,” kusho uMbalula.Akuqali ukuthi kukhulunywe indaba yokuthi kuhlakazwe ubuholi be-ANC eKZN.Lobu buholi buholwa nguMnuz Sboniso Duma, noNobhala uMnuz Bheki Mtolo.UMbalula uthe lesi sifundazwe singesinye esinesibalo esikhulu sabantu abavotayo.Uthe bakhethe ukuvotela uZuma kulolu khetho, wathi abazokwenza ukuxoxa ukuthi isimo basilungisa kanjani.“Sizobheka ukuthi sisilungisa kanjani isimo saseKZN, ngoba siyayivuma induku sibhaxabuliwe. Ukube iMK ayifikanga ngabe senze kahle kakhulu eKZN.”

UNOBHALA_Jikelele we-ANC  uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, ukhwele wadilika kwiMK, wayichaza njengeqembu elisungulwe ngabantu abakhungethwe yizinkinga ngesikhathi kukhunjulwa isosha lophiko lwezempi kwi-ANC, uMkhonto weSizwe uMnuz Chris Hani.UMbalula uthe iMK, ekhankaselwa ngowayengumengameli uJacob Zuma, ngeke ilungelwe yilutho ngoba isungulwe abantu abanezinkinga bonke.“Uma ubabheka laba, ungababala bonke banezinkinga. Iqembu lezepolitiki alisungulwa ngabantu abakhungethwe yizinkinga,” kusho uMbalula.UMbalula ubekhuluma emcimbini obuseThomas Nkobi Memorial Park, eGauteng. UHani wayenesikhundla esiphezulu kuMkhonto weSizwe, wasocongwa ngo-1993  ngesikhathi kulungiselelwa ukhetho lwango-1994.UMbalula uthe bamelene nokusungulwa kweMK ekhankaselwa wuZuma, wathi bona bazi uphiko lwezempi lolu olwaluholwa uHani nabanye.“UHani ubezophatheka kabi ukuba usekhona uma ebona kukhona abafuna ukuphikisa umlando. Ubezophatheka kabi uma kukhona abafuna ukuphikisa ukuthi iMK yasungulwa yi-ANC. Ingakho sisenkantolo, silwa naleliqembu lezepolitiki elibizwa ngeMK.“Asinankinga nomuntu uma efuna ukuziqalela iqembu lakhe lezepolitiki, esilwa nakho ukuthi kuntshontshwe igama lethu. IMK wuphiko lwe-ANC ,yingakho sizolilwela igama leMK,” kuqhuba uMbalula.Uthe akubathusi ukuqembuka kwamalungu e-ANC asejoyine iMK, wathi azobuya.Udalule ukuthi akuqali ngeMK ukuthi kusungulwe iqembu lezepolitiki. Ahlezi esungulwa ngabantu amaqembu ezepolitiki, abantu abahambe kwi-ANC bayazibuyela,Uqhubeke ngokuthi bababona sebebuyile, bangazi  nokuthi babuye nini. Abanye babuya sebekhokhoba.UMbalula uthe abanalo uvalo lokuthi bazohlulwa okhethweni oluzayo, wachitha amaqembu athi afuna ukubusa ngokubambisana nabo emva kokhetho.Uthe baningi abahamba bethi bazohlulwa okhethweni. Abanye bathi bazobusa ngokubambisana futhi sebeqalile ukuzisondeza.“Basibingelela ngisho ebumnyameni, singababoni. Abakhohlwe laba abacabanga ukuthi sizobusa ngokubambisana. Abachithe amanzi, akukho nkukhu ezochuthwa la.”“Asisakucabangi ukubusa ngokubambisana ngoba  kunezinkinga eziningi komasipala ababusa ngalo luhlobo,” esho.Kwabanye omasipala uthe yibona abanezihlalo eziningi kodwa akubona abaphethe.Uveze ukuthi kufanele bahambe bencenga amaqembu amancane ukuba abanikeze isikhundla sobumeya, sebeguqela izihlalo ezimbili. Laba bantu uthe bakhuluma lokhu nje kubantu abanezihlalo ezingu-50.

UNOBHALA Jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, ukuphikile ukuthi itwetwe lokuthi bangase bephunyukwe yiKwaZulu-Natal okhethweni oluzayo yilo elenze ukuthi bathumele abaholi bakazwelonke ukuba bezokhankasa kulesi sifundazwe esibangwayo.Amalungu esigungu esiphezulu kwi-ANC aholwa uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, azokuba nemikhankaso ezindaweni ezahlukene KwaZulu-Natal njengoba ukhetho selusondele. Imikhankaso izodonsa isonto lonke.Izinkampani ezicwaningayo nabahlaziyi bezepolitiki babona i-ANC ingeke ilunqobe ukhetho KwaZulu-Natal ikakhulu njengoba iqembu elikhankaselwa owayengumengameli, uJacob Zuma, iMK, likhombisa ukudlondlobala.UMbalula uthe abanalo itwetwe lokuthi bazolahlekelwa yiKwaZulu-Natal, wathi ukuthunyelwa kwabaholi akusho ukuthi bayatatazela.“Asikho engcupheni yokulahlekelwa iKwaZulu-Natal. Inkinga ngeKwaZulu-Natal ukuthi inabantu abaningi kakhulu. Ngakho ke udinga abantu abaningi ukuthi beyokhankasa khona ukuze umyalezo we-ANC uzofinyelela kubo bonke abantu.“Kukhona abathi umbango ushisa phansi KwaZulu-Natal. Abanye bathi njengoba sekukhona iMK, sisengcupheni yokulahlekelwa isifundazwe. Mina engingakusho ukuthi umkhankaso wethu uhamba kahle. Amalungu e-ANC siwacelile ukuthi angavumi ukuchukuluzwa.”UMbalula uthe abaholi bakazwelonke bazokuya eGauteng uma sebeqede KwaZulu-Natal.Lezi zifundazwe izona ezinesibalo esiphezulu sabantu ababhalisele ukuvota.Abaholi be-ANC bafike KwaZulu-Natal ngeSonto, lapho bebenomhlangano okukhulume kuwo uRamaphosa.Lowo mhlangano ubuhanjelwe nangabaholi bamadlelandawonye.Ubuholi be-ANC kwisifunda iTheku buthe ukuhambela kwabaholi bakazwelonke kuzolekelela umkhankaso wokunqoba iKZN.Okhulumela i-ANC kwisifunda iTheku, uMnuz Mlondi Mkhize, unxuse abantu ukuba babe yingxenye yemikhankaso ezokuba iqhutshwa amalungu esigungu esiphezulu.“Sinxusa abantu baseThekwini ukuba basebenzise leli thuba ukuyozwakalisa izinkinga zabo kubuholi bukazwelonke. Abaholi abathunyelwe lapha kukhona abaholi bakahulumeni kazwelonke, abesifundazwe nabaholi bomasipala. Lokhu kusho ukuthi abantu bazothola ithuba eliyingqayizivele lokuba bazwakalise izinkinga zabo.”UMkhize uthe uhambo lwabaholi bakazwelonke lufike kahle njengoba ukhetho seluseMome.“Emikhankasweni emikhulu yokungena umuzi ngomuzi nemihlangano yomphakathi esibe nayo, abantu bawamukele kahle umyalezo we-ANC. Lokhu kwenza sibe nokuzethemba, kwenza singakungabazi ukuthi i-ANC izolunqoba ukhetho.“Umkhankaso wethu wokhetho uzothola amandla ngalokhu kuhambela kwamalungu esigungu esiphezulu. Abaholi bakazwelonke bazokwamukelwa amalungu amagatsha akulungele ukukhankasela ukhetho.”

UNOBHALA Jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, uthi gede ngendaba yokusola iqembu elibusayo ngezinkinga ezikhungethe lowo owayengumengameli wakuleli, uMnuz Jacob Zuma nebhange iFNB.Ngesonto eledlule, kwasuka omkhulu umsindo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, iphephandaba langeSonto iSunday World libika ukuthi iFNB isivale i-akhawunti kaZuma.Abantu abaningi kuleli bavele bakhomba i-ANC njengeqembu okuyilona elisasazele uZuma ngaleli bhange ngoba esebuye ngezinkani kwezombusazwe.Leli bhange lize lakhipha isitatimende ezinkundleni zokuxhumana licacisa ngokwenzekayo nokuthi ayivaliwe i-akhawunti kodwa kuvinjwe imali ephumayo kuphela.“Ayivaliwe i-akhawunti ngoba ikhona imali engenayo kodwa kuvinjwe kuphela ephumayo. Lokhu kube ngumyalelo wenkantolo njengoba kuqhubeka icala lebhange iVBS.”NgeSonto ntambama, uMbalula unikele enkundleni uX lapho echaza khona ukuthi kungamampunge okushiwo abeMK Party ngokuthi i-ANC inesandla kulokhu.UMbalula unameke uhlu lwamaphuzu afake uZuma kulolu talayita lwakamuva.Okuseqhulwini ohlwini lukaMbalula, wukuthi uZuma uhlulekile ukukhokhela isikweletu sakhe neVBS.“1. UNOBHALA-Jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, uyalele abantu baseNanda ukuba baqaphele amaqembu ezepolitiki amasha awachaze njengomlilo wamaphepha.UMbalula uthe la maqembu amasha asungulwayo azophelela emoyeni ngenxa yezingxabano zangaphakathi.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhankasa eNanda izolo.“Abantu bavula amaqembu ezepolitiki kuthi kungakashoni ngisho ilanga sebeyalwa kula maqembu abo. Yonke lento wumlilo wamaphepha.”Umkhankaso kaMbalula wayizolo uyingxenye yowezinsuku eziyisikhombisa wobuholi be-ANC kuzwelonke, walapha esifundazweni iKwaZulu-Natal.UMbalula ucele abantu baseNanda ukuthi bavotele i-ANC, wathi ayikaze ijike.Abantu baseNanda bakhale ngokuhlaliswa lubhojozi yizinswelaboya nokungasebenzi. Izakhamuzi zaseNanda zitshele uMbalula ukuthi sezidla zijeqeza ngenxa yobugebengu obudla lubi, zakhala nangokuthi kunabantu abaningi abangasebenzi.UNkk Zandile Nene, othe uyakujabulela ukuhambela kukaMbalula eNanda, ucele ukuthi uhulumeni asukumele eyobugebengu.“I-ANC sisuka kude nayo. Sijabule ukuthi umholi wethu ulapha yingakho sithe asizombona ngamehlo. Into nje esikhala ngayo lapha wubugebengu. Izibhamu ziningi kakhulu lapha eMawoti. Abantu balapha bayayazi le nkinga engikhuluma ngayo.”UMnuz Muziwendoda Makhoba ukhale ngamathuba emisebenzi.“Amandla anginawo, angisebenzi, ngiyazizamela. Njengoba ubona uphahla lwendlu lufuna ukuwa. Akekho osebenzayo lapha ekhaya. Ngiziphilisa ngokuqashisa ngamagumbi amabili. Anginawo namandla okwakha amanye amagumbi.”UMbalula uthe izakhamuzi kufanele zibambisane namaphoyisa empini yokulwa nobugebengu.“Zonke izinhlaka zomphakathi kufanele zisebenzisane. Umphakathi kufanele uzibambele. Siyazi ukuthi amanye amaphoyisa asebenzisana nezigebengu, akusiwo wonke-ke kodwa amaphoyisa enza lokho. Lawa enza lo mkhuba kufanele siwabike.”UMbalula uthe uhulumeni unezinhlelo eziningi zokudala amathuba emisebenzi.Uthe uNgqongqoshe wezabaSebenzi, uMnuz Thulasi Nxesi, usanda kwethula uhlelo lokuqeqesha abangasebenzi.UMbalula uthe bafuna nokushintsha isibonelelo sabangasebenzi ukuze sizokwazi ukwelekelela abafuna imisebenzi.Izolo abaholi be-ANC bebekhankasa ezindaweni ezahlukene zesifundazwe.USihlalo kazwelonke, uMnuz Gwede Mantashe, ubekhankasa eMkhanyakude.IPhini likaNobhala-Jikelele, uNkk Nomvula Mokonyane, ubekhankasa eMgungundlovu.UMgcinimafa, uNkk Gwen Ramokgopa, yena ubekhankasa esifundeni iTolomane Mnyayiza.

NKOSIKHONA CELEUMBHISHOBHI uthi uzimisele ngokuthi kube khona akwenzayo ngenhloso yokwehlisa isibalo sabantu abangasebenzi eNingizimu Afrika yonkana.UMbhishobhi Graham Sabela weBandla, iThe Church of Jesus Christ of Latter Day Saints uthi ufuna inkampani yakhe iG Force Employment Solutions iklame indima enkulu ekuqedeni ukwesweleka kwamathuba omsebenzi.USabela usho lokhu ngemuva kokuba le nkampani iqashe abantu abangu-100 muva nje.Uthi lonke udumo uluyisa kuNkulunkulu ngoba konke kwenzeka kahle uma uNkulunkulu ekhona."Ngiyambonga kakhulu uNkulunkulu uma kukhona abantu abazokwazi ukondla imindeni yabo manje. Lokhu kusho lukhulu kimina,'' usho kanje.Uthi ufuna ukuthi uNkulunkulu amsebenzise ekulweni nokugqoza kwamathuba omsebenzi ezweni lonke.Uqhubeke ngokuthi kuyajabulisa ukuthi abantu abathole amathuba omsebenzi kubona bevela ezifundazweni ezahlukene zaseNingizimu Afrika.Uveze ukuthi ugxile kakhulu kubantu abasha abaneziqu ezahlukene. Uthi kuye kuba buhlungu kakhulu ukubona abantu abasha beswele imisebenzi ekubeni beneziqu abazithola enyuvesi."Sifuna ukulekelela kakhulu labo bantu abasha abaneziqu abazithole ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme,'' usho kanje.Le nkampani uveze ukuthi isungulwe ngo-2018 kodwa yaze yaqala ukusebenza kahle ngonyaka olandelayo u-2019.Ukhulume nangohlelo abanalo lokulekelela abantu abasha ngezincwadi zokushayela.Uthe ukholwa wukuthi miningi iminyango evulekayo kumuntu omusha osuke esethole izincwadi zokushayela.Uphethe ngokuthi yingakho bethathe isinqumo sokuthi kube khona abakwenzayo kokulekelela intsha ngezincwadi zokushayela.

UMBHISHOBHI Mandla Mkhize weBandla lamaZayoni ophinde abe ngusomabhizinisi uthi uzimisele ngokuthuthukisa abaculi.UMkhize lokhu ukusho ngemuva kokuba ethule izinhlelo zokusebenzisana nabaculi be-Afro Jazz, abangamawele i-SS Twins.Iqembu ama-SS Twins libunjwe nguSiyabonga benoSibongiseni Sithole abaneminyaka engu-42 yobudala. Ngokuzalwa abaseHlokozi, eHighflats. Basanda kukhipha isingili esihloko sithi: Isitimela.UMkhize uthi ukholwa wukuthi kumqoka kakhulu ukuthi abantu abasha abanekhono lomculo balekelelwe ngezindlela ezahlukene.Uthi kumqoka ukuthi nebandla likaNkulunkulu lingavele nje libayekelele abantu abasha abanekhono lomculo.Ugcizelele ukuthi maningi amakhono akhona ebandleni likaNkulunkulu kodwa agcina ngokufadabala ngenxa yokuthi ayazitshwa.Uthe ikhono lokucula kwamaSS Twins uqale ukuliqaphela ebandleni njengoba ekhona nawo."Ngizimisele kakhulu ngokuthi ngibalekelele abaculi uma kukhona lapho engingakwazi khona ukuthi ngifake isandla. Ngikholwa ukuthi abantu abasha bethu abanekhono lomculo, bayakudinga kakhulu ukulekelelwa,'' usho kanje.Uthe nasemabandleni uyakukhuthaza kakhulu ukuthi kube khona okwenziwayo ukuze kuzolekelelwa abantu abasha abanentshisekelo yomculo."Emabandleni baningi kakhulu abantu abasha abathanda umculo nabafisa ukuphumelela kuwona, kodwa bavinjwe ukuthi abazi ukuthi bangaqalaphi ukuze kufezeke iphupho labo,'' echaza.Ama-SS Twins athe ayalubonga kakhulu usizo lukaMbhishobhi Mkhize. Eminyakeni emihlanu kuya kweyishumi ezayo aphokophelele ikusasa elingcono kwezomculo.Athe afisa ukudlondlobala kakhulu aziwe ezweni lonke aze afinyelele naphesheya kwezilwandle.Aveze ukuthi isitimela yisingili abahlose ngayo ukuveza ukubaluleka kothado phakathi kwabantu ababili.

OMUNYE wabefundisi osemnkantshubovu evangelini welinye lamabandla amadala, i-African Gospel Church (AGC) usezwakalise isifiso sakhe esijulile sokuqeda amaqembuqembu kuleli bandla.UMbhishobhi Petros Zimu ungomunye wezingwevu ezindala zaleli bandla.UZimu ukhuluma kanjena nje yingoba uhlangothi lwakhe luzokuba nengqungquthela enkulu ezokube iseFascadale Mission, ePort Shepstone.Uveze ukuthi le ngqungquthela izoqala noJulayi 21 ize isongwe ngomhlaka-24.Uthe kuningi kakhulu okuzobhungwa ngakho kuyona wathi okunye kwakho kuzophinde kube ukubaluleka kokuba kwenziwe okuthile ukuze leli bandla libuyisane."Iqiniso ukuthi kumqoka ngempela manje ukubona leli bandla libuyisana. Ngikholwa ukuthi nakanjani lokho kungenzeka,'' usho kanje.Leli bandla lihlukene ngokwamaqembu amane abizwa ngamagama abaholi bawo.Kukhona iZimu Group, iGigaba Group, iMbili Group neShezi Group."Ukukhuluma iqiniso nje, mina njengoMbhishobhi uZimu ngikhathazekile kakhulu ngale nhlukano. Ngifisa ukubona wonke lawa maqembu ebuyisana,'' usho kanje.Uthe ukholwa ukuthi kuningi okuhle okungavela uma leli bandla lingaqala phansi libumbane libe yimbumba.Ebuzwa uZimu ukuthi kanti konakalaphi kuze kube nenhlukano, uthe naye akukho angakukhomba ukuthi kwaba wumnyombo wale ngwadla ibandla elizithola libhekene nayo manje.Uthe kodwa ukholwa ukuthi kusengahlalwa phansi kulungiswe izinkinga maqede kube nenqubekela phambili.Abaholi abazobe beshiyelana inkundla ngezintshumayelo kubalwa kubo uMfu Ndaba, Mfu Mkhwanazi, Mfu F Mzimela, Mfu B Shangase, Mfu Zuma, Mfu Mthiyane naye uMbhishobhi Zimu.

OWADUMA ngokuhaya izinkondlo ezigxeka uhulumeni wangesikhathi sobandlululo, uMzwakhe Mbuli, uphumele obala wagxeka ukusebenzisana kwe-ANC ne-DA ukubumba uhulumeni wobumbano.Ukungabikhona kweqembu elinqoba ukhetho ngoqekelele kuzwelonke, okungokokuqala emlandweni selokhu kwangenwa kuhulumeni wentando yeningi, kuholele ekutheni i-ANC ethole izihlalo eziningi ephalamende likazwelonke imemezele uhulumeni obunjwe ngamaqembu ahlukene, i-Government of National Unity, okusagqame kuwo i-ANC ne-DA.Engxoxweni neSolezwe, uMbuli uthe okwenziwe yi-ANC, ukuqoka ukusebenzisana ne-DA ishiya ngaphandle amaqembu avotelwe yiningi labantu abansundu, kuwukubukela phansi amaqhawe afela ukuthi kukhululwe leli zwe.“Ngizokhuluma ngokungesabi ngoba vele nangesikhathi sobandlululo kunzima kodwa ngakhuluma ngigxeka uhulumeni wangaleso sikhathi.  Okwenziwa yi-ANC, ukubumba uhulumeni ne-DA, wukwenza abantu iziwula. Uma i-ANC isiwuhulumeni ne-DA, isazoyikhuluma kanjani indaba yokubuyiswa komhlaba nomnotho ebantwini? Kungabe lokhu kusho ukuguquko kwezimiso zayo ezafelwa amaqhawe omzabalazo efela lomhlaba ezandleni ze-DA iseyi-National Party, okuyimanje umhlaba nomnotho usasezandleni zabamhlophe?“ kubuza uMbuli.Kuqubuke umsindo enkundleni yezokuxhumana i-X emva kokusabalala kwezwi lakhe eliqoshiwe ehaya inkondlo egxeka lolu bumbano, abanye bethi akusilo izwi lakhe. UMbuli ukuqinisekisile ukuthi nguye kanye kanti inkondlo yakhe enesihloko esithi: I wish the dead could rise, ubalula kuyo amaqhawe amaningi athi afela ize njengoba konke ayekulwela kubukeka kucwila kuhulumeni we-ANC nowobumbano okuthiwa amaqembu avumelane ngawo emva kwemiphumela yokhetho lwangenyanga edlule.

UMBUSO ukhathazwa ukushintshashintsha abameli othi kwenziwa abanye abamangalelwa ecaleni elithinta izibhelu zomtapo, idokodo lalo elingamakhasi angu-17 000.Ubufakazi bedokodo buqukethwe kwi-USB. Amakhasi alo angu-10 000, anobufakazi obuyizingxoxo okuthiwa zaziphakathi kwabamangalelwa kuWhatsapp.Ngokwaleli dokodo, uMbuso uklelise ofakazi abangaphezu kuka-100 kodwa abangu-20 abazobizwa bazokwethula ubufakazi enkantolo.Kwabazofakaza kubalwa ochwepheshe bezinkundla zokuxhumana nabanye abazi kabanzi ngobuxhakaxhaka besimanje.Uqweqwe lomshushisi, u-Advocate Mahen Naidu, luthe ezingxoxweni eziwubufakazi ezisedokodweni kunezinkulumo eziqoshiwe (voicenotes) nezibhalwe phansi, amavideo nezithombe okuthiwa kwakuxhumana ngakho abamangalelwa abangu-64.Laba bamangalelwa, abaqhamuka ezifundazweni ezehlukene, bavele eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini izolo phambi kweJaji uJacqueline Henriques.Abamangalelwa bathweswe icala lokubopha itulo lokususa udlambedlu emphakathini, ukugqugquzela udlame emphakathini, ubuphekula, ukuvukela uMbuso nokubopha itulo lokuzama ukubulala.Enkantolo kuvele ukuthi obengummangalelwa ka-14, uNksz Ntombizonke Zanele Msalela, ushone ngasekuqaleni kwalo nyaka.UNaidu uthe okudala ixhala manje yingqinamba yokuthi abamangalelwa bayapheka bathulula abameli.“Sebeshintshe kaningi abameli, usuka kulona angene kulona bese omusha edinga isikhathi ukuze alungiselele icala,” kusho uNaidu.Uthe ngenyanga edlule zichithiwe izicelo zabanye abamangalelwa  zabameli bamahhala.UNaidu uthe batshelwa abamangalelwa ukuthi bazozimela ngokwabo uma behluleka ukuzitholela okhokhelwayo.Icala lihlehliselwe uJulayi 26 nonyaka ukuze kwenziwe izindlalelo zokuqala kokuqulwa kwecala.Omunye wabamele ummangalelwa ukhale ejajini ngokubambezeleka okwenzekayo ecaleni. Uthe lokhu kubambezeleka kweminyaka kuphula amalungelo kammangalelwa. Uthe uzoxhumana nommangalelwa bese ethatha isinqumo sokuthi uyasifaka yini isicelo ejajini sokuba icala lakhe liqulwe lodwa eceleni.

UNGQONGQOSHE wezamaPhoyisa, uMnuz Senzo Mchunu, uxwayise ngokuthi zizoqhubeka nokuhlangana nezimbila zithutha izigebengu ezizama ukudubula amaphoyisa uma efuna ukuzibopha.UMchunu uthe amaphoyisa azoqhubeka nokuzivikela ezigebengwini ezinqaba ukuboshwa.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma nabezindaba abalikanise emhlanganweni wesigungu esiphezulu kwi-ANC, i-lekgotla, eBoksburg.UMchunu uvikele amaphoyisa asolwa ngokuqinisa isandla uma ebhekene nezigebengu, wathi ngeke asonge izandla uma ezithola ebhekene nezigelekeqe eziwadubulayo.“Ngifisa ukukhipha isexwayiso ebantwini noma emaqenjini emigulukudu, ukuthi uma ukhomba amaphoyisa ngesibhamu, uwadubule, ungacabangi ukuthi amaphoyisa azokubuka. Amaphoyisa kufanele azivikele.”Amaphoyisa agxekile ikakhulukazi KwaZulu-Natal emva kokwanda kwezigameko zabasolwa abashona kuthiwa bebedubulana namaphoyisa.Bangu-32 abasolwa ababulewe amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal kulezi zinyanga ezimbili ezedlule.UMchunu uthe awukho umyalelo wokuthi amaphoyisa kufanele aqothe izigebengu, wathi ayikho into asuke ezoyenza uma edutshulwa izigebengu.“Amaphoyisa nawo angabantu, awaqhumanga etsheni, angobaba nomama ezinganeni zawo, angabayeni namakhosikazi, anezihlobo zawo eziwathandayo. Ngakho-ke kufanele azivikele. Awakwazi ukuvele azinikelele ezigebengwini.”UMchunu uthe amaphoyisa kufanele azivikele ngazo zonke izindlela, wathi ayadingeka empini yokulwa nobugebengu.“Amaphoyisa kufanele azivikele ukuze ezokwazi ukuqhubeka nokuvikela imiphakathi kusasa. Amaphoyisa kufanele aziphephise ukuze ezokwazi ukusivikela. Siyawagqugquzela amaphoyisa ukuthi aqhubeke nokuzivikela, futhi siyayeseka imizamo yawo yokulwa nobugebengu.”UMchunu uthe amaphoyisa aya ezigamekweni azi kahle kamhlophe ukuthi abhekene nezigebengu eziyingozi, wathi ezinye zazo zisuke ziwafungele amaphoyisa.“Amaphoyisa asuke ephethe ulwazi oluphelele ngendawo asuke eya kuwo futhi asuke ebazi kahle kamhlophe abantu asuke ebafuna ukuthi bayingozi. Kunesigameko nje esenzeka KwaDlangezwa, lapho khona amaphoyisa aya azi ukuthi kukhona izigebengu eziyingozi emzini othile.“Vele amaphoyisa asuke azi ukuthi izigebengu angeke ziwenzele itiye uma efika. Izigebengu uma zifaka izinhlamvu, zisuke zisho kahle ukuthi zifuna ukudubula amaphoyisa. Ziyazi ukuthi abantu abazilwisi, abantu benza konke okushiwo yizigebengu uma bekhonjwe ngezibhamu. Lezo zinhlamvu zisuke zizodubula amaphoyisa.”UMchunu uthe i-ANC izimisele nokulwa nobelelesi obudla lubi.

BAZOYIKHOTHA imbenge yomile abazama ukudla ngodli  imisebenzi kahulumeni yokulungisa nokwakha ingqalasizinda esuke inikezwe osonkontileka abathile, okuthiwa kubambezela ukuhlinzekwa komphakathi ngezidingo.Ethula amaqhinga okulwa nobugebengu esithangamini nabezindaba ebesisePitoli izolo, uNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa kuleli, uMnuz Senzo Mchunu, uthe udaba  lamaqembu ezigelekeqe ezifuna ukudla ngodli imisebenzi esuke inikezwe ngokusemthethweni abathile ukuthi bayenze, ingokunye kwezinto eziseqhulwini umnyango wakhe ozolwa nakho.“Lezi zenzo ziphazamisa ukusebenza nokuthuthukiswa kwengqalasizinda okusuke kudingeka ngokushesha kuleli.  Ukudluliswa komsebenzi kumele kwenzeke ngendlela efanele kulandelwe yonke imigudu ngaphandle kokusetshenziswa kobudlova nokuqhwaga ngenkani imisebenzi,” usho kanje.UMchunu obebambe isithangami sokuqala selokhu ethathe izintambo kobeqhoqhobele lesi sikhundla ngaphambi kokhetho uMnuz Bheki Cele, uthe impi ebahlalele njengamaphoyisa ukuvundulula izibhamu ezisabalele, ezisezandleni ezingafanele okukholakala ukuthi zinomthelela omkhulu ezehlakalweni zobugebengu. Uveze ukuthi kuzophinde kubhekisiswe imigomo yokuphathwa kwezibhamu, ngaleyo ndlela imigomo yokusebenza kwezinkampani zonogada nayo izobuyekezwa.Uphinde waveza ukuthi isihlava sokubulawa kwezingane nabantu besifazane kuyisihlava esikhathazayo kuleli.“Inhloso yethu isobala, ukuqinisekisa abahlali bakuleli.  Abantu kumele bekwazi ukuzihambela ngokukhululeka ngaphandle kokusaba izigebengu. Udlame lwamaqembu ezigebengu ngenye yezinto eqhubekayo nokukhula kuleli okugqame kakhulu esifundazweni i-Western Cape,” kusho uMchunu.Uthe umnyango wakhe uzobhekana ngqo namaphoyisa abandakanyeka ezenzweni zobugebengu. Kulesi sithangami, uMchunu ubehambisana namaphini akhe amabili, uMnuz Cassel Mathale noNksz Polly Boshielo noKhomishana kazwelonke uGeneral Fannie Masemola.

Umholi wePatriotic Alliance uGayton McKenzie uthe uzonikela esikhwameni esisiza ukuthungatha izingane ezilahlekile ngawo wonke umholo wakhe wasePhalamende.UMcKenzie ufungiswe njengelungu lePhalamende ngoLwesihlanu ngemuva kokuthi iqembu lakhe lithole izihlalo eziyisishiyagololunye kade kunokhetho lukazwelonke ngoMeyi 29.UMcKenzie ubhale ekhasini lakhe leTwitter ukuthi uzonikela ngomholo wakhe.“Ngaphandle komholo wami, ngizophinde nginikele ngenye imali ezikhwameni. Ngiyethemba ukuthi lokhu kuyaqeda ngokuthi ‘uyele imihlomulo nomholo’,” kubhala uMcKenzie.Phambilini waveza ukuthi uzonikela enhlanganweni iJoslin Smith Foundation. UJoslin (6) wanyamalala kubo eSaldanha, eWestern Cape ezinyangeni ezine ezedlule futhi akakaze atholakale.Uphinde waveza ukuthi uzimisele ngokuba wungqongqoshe yize ekuqonda ukuthi akusona isinqumo sakhe kodwa sikamongameli.Iqembu lakhe liyingxenye yohulumeni wobambiswano ne-ANC, DA ne-IFP.Ngemuva kokhetho wathi ufuna ukuba wuNgqongqoshe wezaseKhaya noma owamaPhoyisa.

UFUNA ukusebenzisa ukuqoshwa komculo wakhe ukukhulekela ukuqedwa kwesihlava sokubulawa kwabantu nokuhlukunyezwa kwezingane nabesifazane umculi wokholo, uSibongiseni Zikhali.Lo mculi uzopha bukhoma ngo-Ephreli 19, ePlayhouse eThekwini, lokhu kuqopha ukwethe igama lePrayer Project.Uthi ukhethe ukukwetha kanje ngoba enhliziyweni yakhe uhlushwa wukwanda kwezigameko zokubulawa kwabantu eNingizimu Afrika.Ukholwa wukuthi umkhuleko unamandla anele okuguqula lesi simo esibonakala siwuhlalise lubhojozi umphakathi wakuleli."Indlela esezande ngakhona izigameko zokubulawa kwabantu kushiya imibuzo. Ngikholwa ukuthi ngaleli langa uma simbikela uNkulunkulu ngale nkinga kukhona angasenzela khona,'' usho kanje.Ukhulume nangesihlava esimbi sokuhlukunyezwa kwezingane nabantu besifazane. Uthe kuyadabukisa ukuthi kunezigameko zokuhlukunyezwa kwezingane nabantwana abancane okusabikwa ngazo namanje.Uthe yingakho efuna ukuthi ngalolu suku kukhulekwe kujulwe ekubhekaneni nale ngwadla. "Sizophinde simnxuse kakhulu uNkulunkulu esimkhonzayo angenelele kuzo zonke izinkinga esibhekene nazo zokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane nezingane ezincane,'' echaza.Uveze ukuthi ufuna ukubona umculo wakhe udlondlobala kakhulu ngaphezulu kwalokhu oyikhona njengamanje.Ubonge ukwesekwa akuthola kuMfu Melusi Dladla ongumholi weBandla, iFamily Church International  akhonza kulona.Uthe kumnikeza isibindi njalo ukwazi ukuthi unohlobo lomholi olukwaziyo ukuthi lume naye njalo.Phakathi kwabaculi abazobe beyingxenye yomcimbi kubalwa uThobeka Jili, Dorcas Jeza, Mpumi Mtshweni nomsakazi woKhozi FM uPhindi P.Umcimbi uqala ngehora lesithupha ntambama, amathikithi okungena abiza u-R250.

KUBE wugingqigongqo phakathi kommeli omele izelamani zakwaNdimande nomshushisi woMbuso eNkantolo yeMantshi yaKwaManzini, eSwatini, kubangwa ukuqalwa kokulalelwa kwesicelo sokubuyiswa kwazo kuleli.Izelamani, oMnuz Siyabonga Gezani Ndimande noMalusi Dave Ndimande, ziboshelwe icala lokuba kwelaseSwatini ngokungemthetho.Kuleli zifunelwa elokubulawa komrepha uKiernan “AKA” Forbes nomngani wakhe, uTebello 'Tibz' Motsoane nyakenye.Ezobulungiswa zakuleli zisemizamweni yokuthi zibuyiswe ukuze zijoyina abasolwa abayisihlanu asebevele baboshiwe ngelika-AKA.Kuqhubeka icala, ummeli wazo u-Advocate Tsotsi Mabila, ucele ukuthi lihlehliswe icala, ethi kwengezwe amaphepha amasha esicelweni sokubuyiswa kwazo eNingizimu Afrika.Umshushisi woMbuso eSwatini, uMnuz Macebo Nxumalo, ukuphikisile lokhu, ethi akavele asho ukuthi akazilungiselele ngoba awekho amaphepha anezelwe. UMabila uthe esuka wathi esinye isizathu ukuthi bafuna ukubiza ofakazi abazofakaza ngokuthi izelamani zisengcupheni yokubulawa ngamaphoyisa uma zibuyiswa kuleli.UNxumalo uphendule ngokuthi: “Amaphuzu kazakwethu awaphelele. Akukho lapho achaza khona ukuthi lingubani iphoyisa elasabisa ngokubulala abasolwa nokuthi elakusiphi isiteshi.”UMabila ube eseveza ukuthi lokhu abakushoyo bakususela enkulumweni okuthiwa yenziwa yiphoyisa elithize kunina wabasolwa, wathi laze lakhomba ngisho nendawo lapho bezongcwatshwa khona. “Lokhu sikuthathela phezulu kwazise zikhona izihlobo zabo eseke zabulawa ngamaphoyisa phambilini,” kugcizelela uMabila.Kubuye kwaqubuka enye impikiswano phakathi koMbuso nommeli kubangwa iphuzu lokuthi abasolwa bathi babengekho bona endaweni yesigameko ngesikhathi kubulawa u-AKA noTibz.UMabila uthe umsolwa wokuqala wayelaliswe esibhedlela, owesibili wayehlala ngaphakathi esikoleni esafunda. “Ukuze iphuzu lakho lizwakale, kufanele ingabe uyalisho igama lesibhedlela ayelaliswe kulo, usho nokuthi wayengeniswe nini, wakhishwa nini. Maqondana nalo othi wayehlala ngaphakathi esikoleni, nakhona kufanele ingabe uyalisho igama lesikole nesikhathi asihlala khona,” kusho uNxumalo.UMabila usole uMbuso, ethi lolu lwazi luzotholakala kanjani izelamani ziboshiwe? UNxumalo usole ummeli ngokungalaleli, ethi akashongo ukuthi ufuna kuyolandwa ubufakazi balokhu kodwa ubethi kufanele ingabe buyacaciswa encwadini efungelwe yabasolwa. Icala lihlehliselwe u-Agasti 16.

EZINKUNDLENI zokuxhumana sekuyinsakavukela ukuthi uzwe abantu bentela  ngesihloko esimayelana nokuthwala. Ukuthwala kuchazwa abelaphi bendabuko njengemigilingwane eyenziwa kumuntu ukuze agwilike ngokushesha, imali ibuzwe kuye. Kodwa umelaphi wendabuko osezakhele udumo ngolwazi olumayelana nale migilingwane, uMnuz Sabelo Khumalo odume ngelikaSikhiye Sasejele odabuka eMalahleni eMpumalanga, uxwayisa abantu ngalo mkhuba.Uthe yize ububha bubhokile futhi abantu ngisho abasebancane belubalubela ukugwilika nempilo ewubukhazikhazi kodwa ukuthwala akuyona impendulo.Uthe lo wumkhuba oyingozi nobucayi ngendlela emangalisayo. Uthe okubuhlungu wukuthi othwalayo usuke ebeka umndeni wakhe engozini enkulu kwazise ukuthwala kona izinto eziningi emndenini yize othwele esuke esegwilikile.“Inkinga ekhona kulezi zinsuku wukuthi abantu bangena kulo mkhuba bevale amehlo, amehlo abo ethe njo ekugwilikeni,” usho kanje.Uthe sekufike isikhathi sokuthi njengabelaphi bendabuko babe nezinkundla abazoxwayisa kuzo ngale migilingwane ebhubhisa imindeni yabantu abamnyama iyiqede nya.Ukhale nangalabo abathwalisayo ukuthi abachazi ngobubi balo mkhuba kulabo abasuke bezothwala noma befuna ukuthwala. Ulimise ngesihloko elokuthi umndeni uba sengozini enkulu, okubalwa kuyo nokufa uqobo.  Unxuse abantu ukuba bangangeni kulolu gibe.“Okunye abantu abangakwazi wukuthi izinto ezisetshenziswa uma abantu benza lo mkhuba wokuthwala, azihambisani nhlobo nedlozi,” echaza. Uthe kwalabo abasuke bethwalisa, abanandaba nokuthi bachazele kahle labo abasuke sebekhethe ukwenza lokhu.“Uma ungachazelwa kahle ukuthi ukuthwala kuhanjiswa kanjani, kunamiphi imiphumela emndenini nasezinganeni zakho, ngingabeka imali phansi, ngeke uqhubeke nakho ikakhulu uma uwumuntu owuthandayo umndeni wakho.”Yize engathandanga ukuchaza ukuthi uma kuthwalwa kusuke kuzokwenzekani emindenini kodwa uthe imigilingwane ehambisana nalo mkhuba isuke ifuna igazi okungaba ngisho elomuntu.Uthe okuyinkinga ukuthi uma leso sithwalo singayitholi lento esiyifunayo, sishaya umntwana noma umzali wakho.UKhumalo uthe ubona kumqoka ukuba abantu baxwayiswe kahle ngengozi yesithwalo ukuze bengagagameli bacabangele kusona ngoba bebona bebhuqwa wububha nesifiso sokufuna ukugwilika ngokushesha.Lo melaphi ujwayele ukuzwakala emsakazweni Ukhozi, ezinkundleni zokuxhumana nasemakhasini akhe, ufundisa kabanzi abantu ngemikhuba ehambisana nokwelapha ngokwesintu okukhona kuyo udaba lokuthwetshulwa nokunye.

INKANTOLO eNkulu yaseThekwini ikubekele uNovemba ukulalelwa kwecala elithweswe umengameli wezimantshi KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Eric Nzimande.UNzimande, osekuphele iminyaka emihlanu amiswa esikhundleni sakhe, usanda kuvela kule nkantolo. Icala lihlehlisiwe ukuze kulalelwe izindlalelo zokuqala kokuqulwa kwecala. UNzimande ubhekene namacala amahlanu okuphula umthetho iPrevention and Combating of Corrupt Activities (PRECCA) Act.Usolwa wuphiko lwezokushushisa iNational Prosecuting Authority(NPA) ukuthi wamukela imali ‘eyintshontsho’ engu-R230 000.Kwenzeka lokhu nje uNzimande uvele ugqigqa esigcawini esimqondisa ubugwegwe esiqale ngoJanuwari nonyaka.Isigcawu sisenkantolo edingida amacala athinta imindeni, ePhoyinti eThekwini.Sisahlabe ikhefu kanti kulindeleke ukuthi siqhubeke nomsebenzi waso wokubiza ofakazi esontweni lokuqala ku-Okthoba nonyaka.Ummeli kaNzimande, uMnuz Ravindra Maniklal, uthe inkantolo ilinde kuqale kuphothulwe isigcawu bese iqhubeka nokulalela icala eliphambi kwayo.UNzimande uyawaphika wonke amacala awu-162 athweswe wona abandakanya inkohlakalo alalelwe yilesi sigcawu.Okunye umqashi asola ngakho uNzimande ukuthi wayegembula ngesikhathi somsebenzi, enukubeza ngokocansi futhi egwazisa.UNzimande usolwa ngokuthi wayekade egwazisa abantu ababezobamba izikhundla zokuba yizimantshi. Kusolakala ukuthi lokhu wakwenza phakathi kweminyaka u-Ephreli 2012 no-Okthoba 2015.Kuthiwa nguyena owayeluleka ungqongqoshe wezobulungiswa ngaleso sikhathi, ukuthi wobani okwakumele bavale izikhala zokuba izimantshi.Okunye uNzimande asolwa ngakho ukuthumela uzakwabo wesifazane isithombe esasiveza ubuntu bakhe. Owesifazane kuthiwa wagcina elubike kwiKhomishini yeziMantshi lolu daba okuyiyona eshushisa uNzimande esigcawini.

UZOSIFAKA ngoLwesihlanu oluzayo isicelo sebheyili umfundisi webandla laseZayoni osesitokisini ngecala lokushaya umkakhe esithweni sangasese. UMfu Zamani Shozi (54) weGalile ukhalelwe ngamasongo kaSigonyela ngoLwesihlanu olwedlule.NgoMsombuluko uvele okokuqala eNkantolo yeMantshi yaKwaDukuza.Umangalelwe ngowesifazane eligodliwe igama lakhe okuvela ukuthi ngenyanga edlule wamshaya wamlimaza kabi esithweni sangasese.Kuthiwa waqala ngokumkhahlela maqede wambopha wase emshaya ngenduku esithweni sakhe sangasese. Lokhu kuthiwa kuholele ekutheni owesifazane agcine esopha.Lesi sehlakalo kuthiwa senzeka ngesikhathi owesilisa ecathamela umgilwa emgwaqweni ongaphandle kwaseNewlands.Kuyavela ukuthi babeshadile, kwakuwubukhazikhazi mhla beshada ngo-Okthoba nyakenye.Kuthiwa uShozi wamshaya kabi wamlimaza lowesifazane ngoba esefuna isehlukaniso esethole ukuthi umbhangqe nenqwaba yabesifazane.Owesifazane ubalwa nabesifazane abaningi okuvela ukuthi baba ngabagilwa bakaShozi njengoba ayehamba ebalobola bonke maqede abaqole nemali.Isolezwe labika kabanzi ngalolu daba nyakenye ngoDisemba. IMantshi uM. Blose ithe icala lihlehliselwa uLwesihlanu oluzayo kusaqhutshekwa nophenyo.Yaveza ukuthi uShozi uzoqhubeka nokugqunywa esitokisini kuze kufike lelo langa."Isicelo sakho sebheyili uzokwazi ukusifaka uma sewuvela ngokuzayo. Okwamanje kusanophenyo okumele luqhubeke," isho kanje.UShozi ngesikhathi evela enkantolo ubebonakala ekhululekile engathukile.Phambilini ubeke ezwakale eshumayela emisakazweni ehlukene yaKwaZulu Natal.Ibandla lakhe linabazalwane abaningi kodwa kuvela ukuthi sekunoqhekeko kubazalwane ngemuva kokuba kuvele ukuthi uthandana nenqwaba yabesifazane.Lo mfundisi waziwa ngokuphila impilo ewubukhazikhazi futhi uhamba ngezinhlobonhlobo zezimoto ezibizayo.Kuvela nokuthi uhlala emzini obizayo endaweni yomntakabani eThekwini.Ngo-2020 uke wavulelwa icala ngomunye wesifazane waseMgungundlovu ayemsola ngokumntshontshela amatekisi akhe.Isolezwe likhulume naye owesifazane ongumgilwa obekhona enkantolo ngombandela wokuthi angavezwa okwamanje.Ukhale ngesihluku esikhulu esikhonjiswe nguMfundisi kuyena. Wababaza indlela amshaya ngayo.

KUVELE ukuthi bangamalungu eCommunity Policing Forum (CPF) abangani abathathu boMfundisi webandla laseZayoni, bonke ababhekene necala lokudubula babulale abadlali bebhola esigamekweni esenzeka enkundleni yezemidlalo yaKwaDukuza, ngo-Okthoba 20, 2020.Abasolwa kuleli cala ngumholi webandla, iWisdom From Christ Church International, uMbhishobhi Mzwanele Radebe (42), oMnuz Sikhumbuzo Nxumalo (35), Sikhumbuzo Muziwendoda Mathenjwa (42) noBhekezakhe Yimba (39) obethula ubufakazi bakhe izolo.Babhekene necala lokudubula babulale abadlali bebhola ababili uNjabulo Cele (16) noFrancis Kuhane (17).Laba ababili kuthiwa badubuleka umzimba wonke kodwa izinhlamvu eziningi zaziphelela esifubeni kumufi ngamunye.Abamangalelwa bakhalelwa ngamasongo kaSigonyela ngemuva kwezinsuku ezimbalwa. Basifaka isicelo sebheyili kodwa inkantolo yabachitha.Bebekade bevele eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini. Ngosuku lwesigameko abafi kuthiwa babesemotweni ngesikhathi kuqhamuka abasolwa abane abayiqhulula ngezinhlamvu ezingu-24 bashonela kuyona imoto.Enkantolo kuvele ukuthi abamangalelwa bobane babengamalungu okuqina eqembu Inkatha Freedom Party (IFP).Kuvele ukuthi ababedubula babecabanga ukuthi babulala uMnuz Mzwandile Ndlela ongumqeqeshi webhola futhi oyilungu leqembu, i-Independence Alliance.Kuthiwa abahlaseli babenengwa ukuthi uNdlela usola ikhansela labo, uMnuz Jabulani Sibiya, ngokukhetha iphela emasini uma kunikezelwa ngezindlu zomxhaso KwaMadundube, KwaDukuza.UYimba ongummangalelwa wesithathu ethula ubufakazi izolo, uveze ukuthi yena wayengusihlalo weCPF.Ubekade ephendula umbuzo kamshushisi, u-Advocate Thabani Buthelezi wokuthi kungani athola izingcingo eziyishumi kuMnuz Mpilo Biyela okuthiwa kwaqale kwabonakala yena enkundleni yezemidlalo ngaphambi kokuba kusuke udungunyane."Mina bengiyilungu leCPF sinaye uMpilo nabafowethu esisolwa nabo. UMpilo wayengishayela ucingo ngalolo suku ngoba wayefuna ukungazisa njengosihlalo wakhe ngokwenzekile enkundleni yezemidlalo,'' usho kanje.UButhelezi uthe uyayichitha impendulo kaYimba wase emsola ngokuthi ungomunye wongqondongqondo ekubulaweni kwabadlali bebhola.Uqhubekile uButhelezi wasola uYimba ngokugodla iqiniso ngakho konke okwenzeka ngosuku lwesigameko."Angeke ushayelwe ngumuntu oyedwa ucingo amahlandla aze abe yishumi ingekho into eniyihlelayo,'' usho kanje.Uphendulile uYimba wathi: "Uma abantu bekhuluma kaningi ocingweni lokho kuchaza ukuthi kukhona umuntu ozofa?UButhelezi utshele uYimba ukuthi umsebenzi wakhe ukuphendula, hhayi ukubuza uma ebuzwa.IJaji uJikela libuze uYimba ukuthi kungani kuthathe isikhathi eside kangaka ukuvezela inkantolo ukuthi babengamalungu eCPF?UYimba uthe lolu ulwazi vele akholwa ukuthi belusazovela enkantolo ngokuqhubeka kwesikhathi.Icala liyaqhubeka.

IHLOME ngezikhulumi ezinohlonze ikhempu yabafana ehlelwe nguMfu Sizwe Manqele ophinde abe nguSihlalo wenhlangano eqhakambisa umkhuleko, iGap Standers Network.UManqele uveze ukuthi ikhempu izothatha izinsuku ezimbili njengoba izoqala ngoSepthemba 20 iphothulwe ngakusasa, eMbumbulu College.Isiqubulo sayo uthe sithi: Abafana Banamhlanje Bangamadoda akusasa.'Phakathi kwezikhulumi okulindeleke ukuba zibe yingxenye yale khempu, kubalwa uPrince Nhlanganiso Zulu, Dkt Sibongiseni Dhlomo, uMkhuzi wamaPhoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLieutenant General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi, uThabo Mnguni olingisa indawo kaMbatha kuZalo, yingwazi yebhola eseyawaphanyeka emgibeni amakhokho, uSiyabonga "Bhele" Nomvethe nabanye.UManqele uthe inhlosongqangi yale khempu ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abafana bakhuliswa ngendlela efanele.Uthe ziyakhathaza izigameko ezinyantisa igazi ezibandakanya abantu besilisa, wathi ukholwa ukuthi ugotshwa usemanzi. Uthe ikhempu yalolu hlobo ingahamba ibanga elide  uma kukhulunywa ngekusasa labafana abasakhula.Uveze ukuthi le khempu ufuna ukuyibona isabalala kuzona zonke izifundazwe eNingizimu Afrika ngokuhamba kwesikhathi. Uthe kulokoza inhlansi yethemba ngokuthi bazozuza lukhulu bashintshe nendlela yokwenza izinto labo bafana abazoba nenhlanhla yokuthola ithuba lokuba yingxenye yekhempu.“Ngifisa ukuthi le khempu yenze umehluko omkhulu kubafana abasakhula,’’ esho egcizelela.UManqele ungumholi webandla iLife Grace Centre. Ngonyaka owedlule wakhala wemuka nendondo yeBest Community Radio Show ngohlelo lwakhe, iMvuselelo alwenza kwiMbokodo Fm.Kukhuthazwa nabanye abafisa ukuhambisa izingane zabo zabafana ukuba bashayele kule nombolo: 083 762 3454.

USEPHUMELE obala wazwakalisa isifiso sakhe sokubona ibandla aliholayo libuyela esimweni elaliyiso ngaphambilini, uMfu Bonginkosi Ngcobo oyiNhloko yeBandla, iGadner Mvuyane African Congregational Church of Southern Africa.UNgcobo ophinde abe ngusomabhizinisi uqale ukuhola leli bandla njengoMengameli walo ngo-2018.Ugonyuluke ngesifiso sakhe sokubona leli bandla libuyela esimweni. Uthe kwaba yishwa elikhulu ukuthi esanda kungena ekuholeni leli bandla kwavumbuka ukhuvethe lweCovid 19.Ulimise ngesihloko elokuthi labashiya nezibazi. Uthe kuyimanje kuningi okungahambi kahle ebandleni kusukela ngaleso sikhathi."Iqiniso elimsulwa ukuthi iCovid -19 yasishiya nezibazi ezinkulu. Kuyimanje sisalwa nazo lezo zibazi,'' usho kanje.Uveze ukuthi ukhuvethe lwadala umoya wobuvila kubazalwane, lwaphinda lwaqeda imisebenzi kwabanye.Uthe kodwa ukufadabala nokudlondlobala kwaleli bandla kuncike kakhulu kubaholi balo abathathu.Labo baholi ubagagule ngamagama wathi nguMfu B.W. Ngcobo, uMfu B.H. Msibi noMfu M.A. Hlatshwayo.Lawa madoda uthe anobuhlakani obanele bokuqinisekisa ukuthi leli bandla alifadabali, kodwa liyakhula."Nami ngiyazibala kulawo madoda okumele enze isiqiniseko sokuthi leli bandla liyama noma ngabe sekunzima kangakanani.“Uma limile kuyodunyiswa uNkulunkulu ngesikwenzile, kodwa uma lifadabala kuyoba kubi. Kuyobe kwenzeka ezandleni zethu,'' usho kanje.Ukhulume nangezinhlelo ezihlabahlosile leli bandla eliye libe nazo. Ezinye zazo ukulekelelwa kwamalungu omphakathi aswele.Ukhulume nangohlelo abanalo lokukhuthaza ezemfundo kubantu abasha bebandla. "Sikholwa ukuthi ezemfundo ziwumgogodla omkhulu kubona bonke abantu abasha bethu,'' usho kanje.

UKUKHULA kanzima emndenini ohlwempu uthi kumenze wasungula umkhankaso awethe ngokuthi yi-1 Million pairs of school shoes,  umfundisi waseZayoni.UMfundisi Linda Mfekayi (42) ozalelwe eMtubatuba, ukholwa wukuthi abefundisi kumele kube khona indima abayiklamayo ekuthuthukisweni kwezemfundo.Wathi inhloso yomkhankaso wukwelekelela ngezicathulo abafundi abavela emindenini ehlwempu. Uqhube wathi uwuqale ngenxa yokuthi naye wakhula ngaphansi kwesimo esifanayo. "Ngibone ukuthi angibe nomkhankaso ozolekelela abafundi ngezicathulo. Ngibonile ukuthi akwenele uma ngixoxela abantu ukuthi kwakunzima kangakanani ukuthola izicathulo ngisafunda,'' usho kanje uMfundisi ohola ibandla laseZayoni.UMfekayi uqhube wathi uyazi ukuthi kwabanye abantu kuzwakala njengehaba ukuthi ufuna ukuhlanganisa izicathulo eziyisigidi. Ngokusho kwakhe, ukholwa wukuthi wethemba uNkulunkulu ngoba akukho okungenzeki kuyena. Ugcizelele ukuthi isibalo sezicathulo sizohlangana. "Njengoba ngikhuluma nawe nje, sesikwazile ukuthi sihlanganise amapheya ezicathulo alinganiselwa ku-396. Nakanjani ngikholwa wukuthi sizogcina sifikile kwisigidi. Nginxusa bonke abantu ukuthi bafake isandla ukuze lokhu kuzobonakala kuphumelela,’’ kunxenxa uMfekayi. Uveze ukuthi kunabantu abaningi abafaka igxalaba ngoba bafuna ukuqinisekisa ukuthi uthela izithelo ezinhle umkhankaso wezicathulo.Ucaphune encwadini engcwele umbhalo ojwayelekile othi “sibusisiwe isandla esiphayo kunesamukelayo”.Umfundisi uqhube wathi kulokoza inhlansi yethemba ngokuthi ngemuva kwezinyanga ezimbalwa izicathulo zizobe sezihlangene. “Ngikholwa ukuthi uma ukholwa nakanjani kuNkulunkulu uyakwenzela lokho osuke ukudinga ngaleso sikhathi. Nami ngiyakholwa ukuthi lokhu engikufunayo uNkulunkulu uzokwenza nakanjani,'' kuphefumula umfundisi.UMfekayi uphethe ngelithi unethemba lokuthi ibandla likaNkulunkulu kumele libhukule liqinisekise ukuthi abantu abasha, abaphazanyiswa wukushoda kwezicathulo nomfaniswano wesikole emfundweni yabo.

UMFUNDISI osamncane ngokweminyaka ukhuthaza ozakwabo ukuba bahambe ngokucophelela, benze isiqiniseko sokuthi abasidicileli phansi isithunzi sebandla likaNkulunkulu.UMfu Siphiwo Sithathu (33) oyinhloko yeChurch of Christ Ministries (CCM), obekade ekhuluma kwindumezulu yenkonzo yaleli bandla ebikade iseHlanzeni, eMagabheni.USithathu uthi ukholwa ukuthi ibandla likaNkulunkulu kumele lihlonishwe futhi kwenziwe yonke into ngendlela efanelekile neyamukelekile.Wathi kumqoka ukuthi nabo njengabaholi abasebancane ngokweminyaka babonakale benyathela ngokucophelela.Ulimise ngesihloko elokuthi ebandleni aliholayo kunezinto angafuni nje ukuthi zenzeke ngoba kuyokhonjwa yena ngenjumbane.Okunye kwakho umjolo wabazalwane, wathi akafuni nokuyizwa into enjengaleyo. "Mina ngifuna into kaNkulunkulu kube yinto ehlanzekile nehloniphekile ngaso sonke isikhathi,'' usho kanje.Eqhuba, uveze ukuthi eminyakeni ezayo ufuna ukubona leli bandla lidlondlobala lize lifinyelela kuzona zonke izifundazwe ezikhona eNingizimu Afrika.Uthe konke kuncike kakhulu ekutheni ubuholi bebandla busebenza ngokuzikhandla okungakanani.Ngalolu suku kube khona amalungu amasha leli bandla abeliwamukela ngokusemthethweni okuyinto uSithathu athe imhlabe mxhwele kakhulu.Ebebejoyina ibandla ubakhumbuze ngezimiso zebandla ukuba kumqoka kangakanani ukuba zigcinwe futhi zihlonishwe ngaso sonke isikhathi.Ukhulume kabanzi nangokubaluleka kokuba abantu abasha baleli bandla babonakale beqhuba izifundo zabo ezikhungweni zemfundo ePhakeme.Uthe kuba lula ukuphumelela kumuntu omusha ohlome ngemfundo."Siyakholelwa kakhulu ekutheni imfundo iyikusasa eliqhakazile kubona bonke abantu abasha bethu,'' usho kanje.

UMFUNDISI osemncane uthi ukholwa ukuthi kumqoka ukuchelelwa kwemishado yabantu abamnyama ukuqinisekisa ukuthi noma izamaziseka kodwa akuqhumi izehlukaniso.UMfu Thembinkosi Congolo (37) ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi kunesigcawu sabantu abashadile ebesihlelwe yisikhungo sakhe, iMukashi Marriage Officers.Besikade sisesakhiweni seGrace Life Church ebiseReunion, eSiphingo, muva nje.UCongolo uthi uyakholelwa emishadweni ngakho kumele ibandla likaNkulunkulu nalo libhukule liqinisekise ukuthi iyama."Kumqoka ukuthi izigcawu zalolu hlobo zibe khona. Ngikholwa ukuthi zinendima enkulu eziyidlalayo kubantu bakithi abasemishadweni,'' usho kanje.Uveze ukuthi lesi bekungesisona esokugcina isigcawu kodwa ziyeza ezinye ezizoba wuchungechunge kusona sonke isifundazwe iKwaZulu Natal."Sifuna ukufinyelela kusona sonke isifundazwe. Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi sihlela nokuthi sifinyelele nakwezinye izifundazwe,'' usho kanjena.Lo mbhidlango ubambisene kuwona no-Advocate Jodwane Nyameko ongummeli. Uthe ukholwa ukuthi abantu abashadile bayadinga ukuthola ukuboniswa okuvela kubameli.Isikhulumi sosuku bekunguMphostoli Musa Khwela weJesus Restoration owenabe kabanzi ngokubaluleka kokuba abashadile bazane kangcono futhi babekezelelane.Uthe emshadweni akuhlezi kumnandi, wathi kodwa okumqoka yizindlela ezinobuhlakani okumele zisetshenziswe ngabasemshadweni ukuxazulula izinkinga zabo ngokuthula."Yonke imishado iyahlaselwa yizinkinga kodwa okuyikhona okumqoka kakhulu wukuqinisekisa ukuthi izinkinga zisonjululwa kanjani,'' usho kanje.Uthe emandulo sasiphansi kakhulu isibalo sabahlukanisayo, wathi lokhu kwakubangelwa ukuthi kwakubanjiswana kukhona konke ababekwenza.Ukhuthaze nokuthi abashadile bazifundise ukukhuluma kabanzi ngezezimali.

UFUNA ukusebenzisa umculo ukushumayela iZwi likaNkulunkulu uMfu Favour Mabaso oyinhloko yebandla labasindisiwe, iHome Of Divinity.UMabaso usanda kukhipha i-albhamu ayibize ngesihloko sebandla lakhe iHome Of Divinity. Inezingoma ezingu-15 sezizonke.Uthi isiqalile ukuthi itholakale ngezindlela zobuchwepheshe besimanje. Echaza ngalokhu uMabaso uthe: "Ngiyakholelwa kakhulu ekutheni umculo unamandla enele okuthi kuguquke indlela umuntu acabanga ngayo. Umculo unamandla okushintsha izinto eziningi. Yingakho kumele nebandla likaNkulunkulu liwusebenzise.''UMabaso uphinde abe ngumsunguli wenhlangano ecija amakhono ebizwa ngokuthi yiHope 4 Future. Kule nhlangano kufundiswa abantu abasha ukubhaka amakhekhe. Udalule ukuthi sekuphele iminyaka engu-16 eqhuba lo msebenzi.Ugcizelele kakhulu ukuthi uyakholelwa ekusetshenzisweni kwamakhono ngenhloso yokuzithuthukisa.Ibandla aliholayo linamagatsha eThekwini ku-56 Maud Mfusi owabe waziwa ngoSt George ngaphambilini. Linelinye igatsha likuKismet Hotel, 460 Long Market eMgungundlovu. Elesithathu okungelaseGoli lona lizokwethula maduze nje.Uthe ufuna ukubona leli bandla lisabalale lifinyelele ezingxenyeni ezahlukene zesifundazwe iKwaZulu-Natal kanjalo naseNingizimu Afrika yonkana.Uphinde abe ngumbhali onohlonze nosezakhele udumo. Ngo-Agasti uveze ukuthi uzokwethula ngokusemthethweni incwadi esihloko sithi : Holy Ghost Revolution.Unezinhlelo ezahlukene emisakazweni eyahlukene yaKwaZulu Natal. Ibandla ulisungule ngo-2022.

UBONGA uNkulunkulu uMfundisi waseZayoni obegcotshwa waphinde wabopha elikasofa silahlane ngosuku olulodwa.UMfu Mphiliseni Mthunzi ophinde abe ngumelaphi wendabuko, ubegcotshwa  njengoPresiding Bishop webandla aliholayo, iMercy of God Church.Leli bandla ulihola ngokubambisana nomkakhe, uNkk Sakhile Matsebula.Usuku luqale ngokuthi emini laba ababili babophe ifindo lomshado phambi kwezinkumbi zamalungu aleli bandla. Bekukhona namanye amabandla abeyingxenye yale ndumezulu yomcimbi.Umcimbi ubuqhubeka eWithok Estate eBrakpan, eGauteng. Bobabili benze izifungo zokuthi bazothembeka banakekelane futhi bahloniphane baze bahlukaniswe wukufa. Banikezwe nethuba lokuthi basho okusenhliziyweni yabo.Ntambama kungene indumezulu yenkonzo lapho obesekugcotshwa khona uMthunzi esikhundleni sikaPresiding Bishop webandla. UMthunzi ubonge uNkulunkulu ngokumbusisa ngohlobo lwamakholwa akhuthele futhi amazisayo uNkulunkulu. Uthe uzizwa ethobekile ngokuhola abazalwane balolu hlobo. Uthe uyamthanda kakhulu uNkulunkulu yingakho elihlonipha nebandla alinikezwe nguNkulunkulu.Obeqhuba inkonzo yokumgcoba ngu-Archbishop J Khumalo oyiNhloko yebandla, iRevival Catholic Church.UKhumalo umdonse ngendlebe uMthunzi ngokuthi anyathele ngokukhulu ukucophelela kukhona konke akwenzayo."Njengoba sikugcoba kulesi sikhundla nje silindele ukukubona wenza lokhu uNkulunkulu akulindele kuwena, hhayi okunye esingakwazi,'' kuyala uKhumalo.Leli bandla aliholayo uMthunzi linagamatsha kuzona zonke izifundazwe  eNingizimu Afrika. Kulo nyaka lihlanganisa iminyaka eyisishiyagalolunye labakhona njengoba lasungulwa ngo-2016, Julayi 17.Emcimbini bekunezihambeli okubalwa uMnuz Jabulani Ngcobo wodumo lweCashFlow. Abalingani bakaMthunzi abalapha ngokwendabuko nabo bebephume ngobuningi babo bezomeseka.

IHHOVISI likaMgcinimafa selichithe ukuthi izinkinga ezibhekane neKhomishini yezoKhetho kuleli, ngesikhathi kuvotwa zidalwe wukungaxhaswa ngokwanele ngemali.Leli hhovisi lithi ikhomishini ibixhaswe ngemali eyenele ukuze ibambe ukhetho nonyaka lukazwelonke nolwezifundazwe.Lokhu likusho kulandela izikhalazo ngokungahambi kahle kwezinto okhethweni ebezivela ezinhlakeni ezehlukene.Kukhalwe ngokuthi ikhomishini ibingaluhlelelanga ngendlela ukhetho ngoba imishini yokubheka abazovota ibingasebenzi okwenze kwaba nolayini abade ezikhungweni zokuvota. Kwezinye izindawo kukhalwe ngokujikiswa kwabavoti.Isitatimende esikhishwe yihhovisi likaMgcinimafa siveze, ukuthi ngesikhathi lilungiselela isabelomali sezwe, laxhumana nekhomishini mayelana nezidingo zokhetho.“Saxhumana nekhomishini yavuma ukuthi isabelomali esizoyabela yona, sizokwazi ukuhlangabezana nezidingo. Savumelana nekhomishini ukuthi ngeke sibe khona isidingo sokuthi yengezelwe imali ngoba yathi bekukhona uR1.5 billion, eyayinawo emgodleni.”Isitatimende sithe onyakeni wezimali u-2024/2025 ikhomishini yahlinzekwa ngoR2.232 billion. Siveze ukuthi uR322 million wale mali wanikwa ikhomishini ngo-Ephreli kulo nyaka.“NgoMeyi ikhomishini inikwe uR1 billion. Kunemali enguR350 million okwakungeyokuhlinzeka ngezokuphepha ngesikhathi sokhetho.” Abaholi bamaqembu ahlukene bakhalile ngezinkinga ezikhungathe ikhomishini ngalesi sikhathi.UMnuz Granville Abrahams, imenenja ebhekele ukusebenza kwekhomishini, utshele abezindaba ukuthi imali abayabelwa yona yenza izinto ezifanele. Uthe baqasha inqwaba yabasebenzi abebesiza ngezinto zokhetho.Uveze ukuthi kwagaywa namaphepha okuvota acela ku-90 million ngoba kulolu khetho bekukhona iphepha lesithathu lokuvota elinabangenele ukhetho ngokuzimela.“Emalini esabelwe yona siyisebenzise ezinhlelweni zokhetho. Siqashe inqwaba yabasebenzi ngalesi sikhathi sagaya nenqwaba yamaphepha okuvota ukuze angashodi uma sekuvotwa,” kusho u-Abrahams.Akazange adalule ukuthi imali ababelwa yona ibiyanele noma ibingenele.“Senze obekumele sikwenze kulokhu ebesabelwe khona ukuze ukhetho kube ngolukhululekile nolunokuthula.”

UZOYIVALA kusenesikhathi uMnyango wezokuThutha KwaZulu-Natal eminye yemigwaqo ezokhahlanyezwa ukukhithika kwezulu kulesi sifundazwe.Lokhu kushiwo uMphathiswa walo mnyango, uMnuz Siboniso Duma ngoLwesine ngesikhathi enesithangami esiphuthumayo nabezindaba eGreyville eThekwini.UDuma ubize lisithangami ngenhloso yokuzochazela izakhamuzi ukuthi isifundazwe sikulungele kangakanani ukubhekana nokukhithika kwezulu okuthiwa kuzoba khona ngoMsombuluko nangoLwesibili. Phakathi kwezindawo okuthiwa zizokhahlamezeka kukhona uMnambithi, Underberg, Drakensburg, Giant’s Castle nezinye izindawo eziphakeme ezakhele lezi zindawo. Kuvele nokuthi lokhu kungahle kulandelwe yimvula enamandla kulezi zindawo, eThekwini, nakwezinye.UDuma uthe phakathi kwezinto abazimisele ngokuzenza ukuthi bayivale imigwaqo esezindaweni okuphume isexwayiso sokukhithika kuzo.“Kulokhu sizoyivala ngempela imigwaqo futhi ngeke sisithambise isandla kubashayeli,” kusho uDuma.Uveze ukuthi ngempelasonto eyedlule ngesikhathi kuhlasele inkinga efanayo, kube khona ukungabambisani kahle phakathi kwabo nabashayeli ababekhombisa ukungayizwa eyokuthi imigwaqo iyavalwa ngenxa yeqhwa.Uthe balungise nogandaganda abangu-23 ukuthi bame ngomumo ukuze bayogugula iqhwa emigwaqweni ezokhahlamezeka.“Sibankanise ezindaweni ezehlukene okuvele ukuthi zizoba nale nkinga,” kusho uDuma.Uveze nokuthi bankanise namathimba ezinhlekelele anesipiliyoni, ukutze akulungele ukuthi uma sesiqala isimo, akwazi ukuqala umsebenzi olindeleke kuwo. Uthe lama thimba aphinde acijwa ukuthi azowenza kanjani lo msebenzi ngokushesha.Ubalule nokuthi bavivise namaphoyisa omgwaqo ukuthi nawo ame ngomumo ukunika umhlahlandlela emigwaqweni ezokhahlamezeka ukuze kulawuleke isimo nabashayeli.Uthe imigwaqo eseqhulwini kuleyo abazoyiqapha ngeso lokhozi, uN3 ngaseHarrismith, umgwaqo uTugela, uR617 phakathi kweKokstad ne-Underberg, iMooi River neminye.Ephawula ngenhlekelele eyenzeke ngempelasonto, uthe bafunde isifundo sokuthi kufanele bahlele baphinde bazilungiselele kusenesikhathi.Uthe bayaqonda ukuthi okunye ngeke kume ngomumo masinyane njengoba elakuleli liyizwe elisathuthuka, wathi izinto ezifana nemishini efanele nengqalasizinda kuzothatha isikhathi ukuthi kufinyelele ezingeni.“Okukhulu kunakho konke esikufundile ukuthi izexwayiso zezulu kufanele sizithathele phezulu sonke. Abantu abaningi uma zikhishwa lezi zexwayiso, abazikholwa,” kusho uDuma.Uqhube wathi okwenzeke ngeledlule kufanele kukhumbuze abantu ukuthi indaba yokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu yinto okufanele bazi ukuthi iyinto yangempela futhi isiyingxenye yempilo yezakhamuzi zakuleli.Uxwayise nangokuthi kulezi zinsuku okulindeleke ngazo ukukhithika, abantu bayanxuswa ukuthi uma uhambo lungaphuthumi, abangaluthathi, kuze kudlule isimo esibi sezulu.Esigamekweni sokuvaleleka kwezimoto emgwaqweni ngempelasonto, kwashona abagibeli ababili ngenxa yokungenwa amakhaza kakhulu.Zingaphezu kuka-1 800 izimoto ezavaleleka emgwaqweni uN3 noN11 kuleso siwombe.

UMISIWE uthishanhloko wesikole samantombazane iPretoria Girls' High, kuqala phansi izinsolo zokucwasa kulesi sikole.Lokhu kudalulwe nguMphathiswa wezeMfundo eGauteng, uMnuz Matome Chiloane, wathi ukumiswa kukathishanhloko kwenziwe ngenhloso yokuqapha ezokuphepha.UMphathiswa uhambele esikoleni ngoLwesibili ntambama lapho etshele khona abebekhona ukuthi uPhillipa Erasmus, uzohlala ekhaya izinyanga ezintathu kuze kuphothulwe uphenyo mayelana nezinsolo zokucwasa.U-Erasmus waqashwa kulesi sikole ngo-2018 ngemuva kokuba kusuke izidubedube zokucwaswa kwabafundi bebala elinsundu ezaqala ngo-2016.Abafundi abangu-12 kulesi sikole bamisiwe ngenxa yokuthinteka ezinsolweni zokucwasa okwenzeke enkundleni yeWhatsApp yabamhlophe kuphela.

INKOSIKAZI yenkakha kaphrojusa owayebuye abe ngumculi uRobbie Malinga, ongasekho emhlabeni, isithathe isinqumo sokuthi ifake enkantolo iTS Records ifuna inkontileka eyasayinwa wumyeni wayo ephakathi kwakhe nale nkampani.U-Ann Malinga ongunkosikazi kaRobbie uthe kuyaphoqa ukuthi afake iTS Records enkantolo emva kokufaka incwadi yabameli, ebhalela inkampani efuna inkontileka kaRobbie kodwa iTS Records yangampendula. Isolezwe Ngempelasonto linayo ikhophi yencwadi yabameli baka-Ann Malinga ayibhalele iTS Records, ne-Universal Music efuna inkontileka yokusebenzisana kwezinkampani nomyeni wakhe, ukuze abone ukuthi kumele ahlomule kanjani kumaroyalty omyeni wakhe. Incwadi ibhalwe ngabameli baka-Ann, iMdakane Attorneys Inc, lapho becela ukuthi banikwe wonke amaphepha asayinwa nguRobbie enkotileka yokusebenzisana nalezi zinkampani. Uthe okwenza agcine engazi ukuthi kumele ahlomule kanjani ngamaroyalty omyeni wakhe okumele awathole yingoba nenkontileka akanayo.“Ngiyibhalelile iTS Records ne-Universal Music ukuthi banginike lamaphepha enkontileka. I-Universal isingiphendulile icacisa ngedaba yamaphepha engiwadingayo nokuyinto engikhululile kodwa iTS ivele yakhetha ukungaphenduli.
