Isenzo sayo siyaphoqa ukuthi sibafake enkantolo ngoba kuyacaca ukuthi abazimisele ukuthi sisebenzisane kahle njengoba beziba ngisho nencwadi yabameli. Ngesikhathi bebhalelwa bebekelwe isikhathi ukuthi babe sebephendulile kodwa kuze kube yimanje abakasho lutho,” kusho u-Ann.Kwimpendulo yakwa-Universal Music leli phephandaba elinayo ikhophi yayo, le nkampani iyaziqhelelanisa namaphepha asayinwa phakathi kukaRobbie nayo kodwa iwakhomba khona eTS Records. Empendulweni yayo i-Universal Music iyakuveza ukuthi, impela iyazi ukuthi ikhona inkontileka eyasayinwa abaculi abangaphansi kweTS Records ebisebenzisana nayo kodwa bona babenenkontileka neTS Records, engathinti abasayine ngaphansi kwayo. Bathe inkontileka yokusebenzisana neTS Records yasayinwa yi-EMI ngaphambi kokuba ithengwe yi-Universal Music. Bathi le nkontileka yayithinta ukusebenzisana phakathi kwabo ne-TS Records kuphela ingathinti abantu abangaphansi kweTS Records. Yathi uma kukhona abafuna ukukwazi abaxhumane nayo iTS Records.Imizamo yokuxhumana nommeli weTS Records, uDumisani Motsamai ayiphumelelanga ngoba nomyalezo athunyelelwe wona akawuphendulanga.U-Ann uthe akusekho okunye sebezohlangana khona enkantolo ngoba kuyacaca abazimisele ukubambisana nabo.Ukuxabana phakathi kuka-Ann Malinga, neTS Records kaTK Nciza kuqale eminyakeni edlule ngesikhathi sekumele u-Ann athole imali yamaroyalty kaRobbie kodwa wakhala ngokuthi akayitholile. Uthe ubevamise ukuyithola kodwa kumxakile uma esebona engasayitholi kunalokho watshelwa ngemali eyisamba anikwa yona iTS Records watshelwa ukuthi ukhisimuzi wezingane.

NJENGOBA kuqale inyanga yamagugu esintu kuleli, umelaphi wesintu uMnuz Siyanda Miya weTrunquil Herbs uqale umkhankaso wokugqugquzela abantu ukuthi bangabi namahloni ngokusebenzisa amakhambi esintu. Njengamanje uhambela izingxenye zeKwaZulu-Natal ehambe efundisa kabanzi ngamakhambi esintu ikakhulukazi ngezihlahla nezimpande ezitholakala khona emphakathini, eziwusizo ekwelapheni izifo ezithile.UMiya ongowokuzalwa eMazabekweni, eXobho, uthi yinqwaba yemithi yesintu ekwazi ukwelapha izifo ezingamahlalakhona njengaleyo ekwazi ukulawula umfutho wegazi nesifo sikashukela. Uthe ikhona naleyo ekwazi ukwelapha ngisho izifo ezibucayi eyayaziwa emandulo engakutholi ukugqanyiswa ngenxa yokuthi ayihloliwe ngohlelo lwasentshonalanga. "Lo mkhankaso ngikholwa ukuthi uzobasiza abantu bakithi ngoba imithi yesintu inamandla enele okusiza abantu bakithi,'' usho kanje.Uthi kunezifo eziyingozi nezibonakala zidla fumuka zidla silaza kodwa kunemithi yesintu ekwazi ukubhekana nazo. Wenze isibonelo ngesifo sikashukela wathi sesibaqedile abantu."Akuphele manje kubantu ukuthi bayingabaze imithi yesintu ngoba yiyona esebenzayo. Uyabona uma kukhulunywa ngesifo sikashukela, silapheka kangcono uma ungeke uyizibe nemithi yesintu,'' usho kanje.Phakathi kwezinye zezifo imithi yesintu ekwaziyo ukuyiqeda ubale inkinga yezilonda, isifuba, izinduna nezinye.Uveze ukuthi imithi yesintu ayisebenzisayo midala njengoba yaqala ukugaywa ngumkhulu wakhe owabe enguMfundisi ebandleni lamaRoma aKhatholika.Uthe inkinga ukuthi abantu bayayiziba imithi yesintu bese beqala ukuyicabanga ngoba sebebona ukuthi sezihlulekile izibhedlela."Uma umuntu ogulayo engaqala kusanesikhathi ukusebenzisa imithi yesintu nakanjani ukhona umehluko ongaba khona,'' echaza.Uthe imithi yesintu iyalekelela nokuhlanza isinye somuntu wesifazane ngendlela efanele.Ujwayele ukuzwakala emsakazweni uKhozi FM lapho asuke ekhuthaza khona ukusetshenziswa kwemithi yesintu.

UMKHUZI wamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLieutenant General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi, ubize umhlangano okhethekile nezinhlaka ezithintekayo kuqubuka uthuthuva kwabamatekisi eThekwini.Lokhu kuza ngemuva kokuvalwa kwemizila ebheke ePort Shepstone nemigwaqo emikhulu eThekwini ngabamatekisi abebedinwe begane unwabo ngoLwesine nangoLwesihlanu.Kulesi siteleka, kuvalwe imigwaqo uN3 noN2 nokuyimigwaqo emikhulu esetshenziselwa ukuphuma nokungena kulawa madolobha. Imboni yamatekisi ikhala ngokuthi uMnyango wezokuThutha ubopha izimoto zabo kanti futhi lo mnyango ubonakala uhluleka ukukhiqiza izimvume (permits) adingwa yile mboni.Umkhuzi wamaphoyisa ubize lo mhlangano okhethekile phakathi kwazo zonke izinhlaka ezithintekayo kwezomthetho, uMnyango wezokuThutha nabemboni yamatekisi ukuze kuxazululwe izinkinga ezikhona ngaphambi kokhetho.Kulindeleke ukuthi bonke abahlangene bakwazi ukuphuma nezinqumo ezizolekelela, kugwemeke isiteleka ikakhulukazi ngezinsuku zokhetho.

Usenze isibophezelo sokuthi bazosebenza ngokuzikhandla ngenhloso yokuthola ongqondongqondo betulo lokubanjwa kwenkunzi kwezimoto ezithwala imali, uKhomishana wamaPhoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uGeneral uLieutenant Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi.Ubekade ebize isithangami sabezindaba ngoLwesihlanu, eThekwini, ukuzoveza kabanzi ngesimo samacala ehlukene nangesimo sezokuphepha esifundazweni.UMkhwanazi ukhuluma kanjena nje, seziphenduke insakavukela muva nje izigameko zokubanjwa kwenkunzi izimoto zemali.Uveze ukuthi kusuka ngo-Ephreli nonyaka kuze kube manje zingu-17 izigameko zokubanjwa kwezimoto ezithwala imali. Amaphoyisa akwaze ukuvimba ezinye izigameko ezinhlanu ezigcine. Uthe kuboshwe abasolwa abahlanu, abathathu kubo asebelahlwe ngamacala. Kudutshulwe kwabulawa abasolwa abangu-10 balezi zigameko ngesikhathi bedubulana namaphoyisa. Esigamekweni sakamuva kubikwa ukuthi kubanjwe imoto yemali KwaMadundube, KwaMaphumulo. Kulesi sigameko kuthiwa abasolwa babaleke nemali.Ziningi ezinye izigameko ezifuze lezi okuke kwabikwa ngazo ngaphambilini.Emgwaqweni uN2 ngaKwaMashu, abasolwa abane ababehamba ngezimoto ezahlukene bavulela ngenhlamvu bebhekise emotweni ethwala imali bagcina bebaleke nesamba semali engadalulwanga.Isigameko esifanayo senzekile naseKranskop emasontweni edlule, kwafa ujuqu abasolwa ababili ngesikhathi abasolwa ababandakanyekayo sebetholana phezulu namaphoyisa ePhoenix ngesikhathi bebaleka.Ngenyanga eyedlule, amaphoyisa adubule abasolwa abane ebebefunwa ngamacala okubamba inkunzi izimoto ezithwala imali eCamperdown. Abasolwa kuthiwa badubula kuqala amaphoyisa nawo aphendula ngenganono.EMnambithi, eMlazi naseThekwini kuke kwabikwa ngezigameko ezifanayo nakhona."Izigameko zokubanjwa kwenkunzi izimoto ezithwala imali ngezinye zezinto amaphoyisa azimisele ukuzinqoba,'' usho kanje.Phezu kwazo zonke lezi zigameko uMkhwanazi uthembise ukuthi bazokwenza konke okusemandleni ukuthola umnyombo wezigameko nanokuthi obani abangongqondongqondo bazo.Uthe uphenyo ngezigameko zabangakabanjwa abathinteka kulezi zigameko luyaqhubeka.Uthe okubuhlungu ukuthi namaphoyisa agcina esedubula ebese kuba khona abashonayo. “Amaphoyisa umsebenzi wawo ukubopha abasolwa ebese beyashushiswa uma betholakala benecala. Kodwa kwesinye isikhathi kuyawaphoqa ukuba nawo adubule,’’ echaza.

NGOSUKU obekumele luphenduke injabulo emndenini waseNhlangwini, eHlokozi, kudutshulwe kwabulawa abakhongi abayizelamani besakhuleka esangweni bezoshiya nezinkomo zemali. Izelamani, oMnuz Thandokuhle Dlamini (38) noMnuz Mzwandile Dlamini (45) besesigodini saKwaMayibuye, khona eHlokozi, ziphelele emagcekeni asekhweni esehlakalweni esishaqise nomphakathi. Kulesi sigameko, kuthiwa abasolwa baphinde bakhala bemuka no-R50 000 abafi ebebezolobola ngawo.Ngokusho komthombo, abafi bebethunywe umfowabo, uMnuz Bongani Dlamini (41) emzini wakwaHlongwa ukuyocela isihlobo esihle baphinde bashiye nezinkomo zemali.Umthombo uthe abafi baphume ekhaya ngabo-7 ekuseni, kwangaphela ngisho nehora, kwangena ucingo oluthi sebedutshuliwe.“Uma sifika endaweni yesigameko sithole ukuthi abasolwa behle ezimotweni ezimbili ezingama-Polo abengenazinombolo. Baqale baphoqa abakwaHlongwa ebebekikiza emnyango ukuthi babuyele endlini. Base bezodubula abafi,” kusho umthombo.Uqhube wathi baqale ngoMzwandile, bamshaya ngenhlamvu eyodwa, wawa, baqhubekela kuThandokuhle, abambulale ngentululwane yezinhlamvu.Uthe baphinde babuyela kuMzwandile, bamdubula kabili, maqede bathatha imali base bengena ezimotweni zabo, bashaya bachitha.Umthombo uthe uThandokuhle bese kunesikhashana esekubhaceni kulandela izinsongo zokuthi uzosocongwa okusolwa ukuthi ziyamene nezindaba zamathenda.“Usanda kuthola ithenda lokwakha umgwaqo endaweni. Kuthe kungakapheli nasikhathi esingakanani eqalile umsebenzi, kwadutshulwa owesilisa abesebenzisana naye eduze. Kwavela ukuthi abasolwa bathi wuye ozolandela,” kusho umthombo.Umthombo uveze ukuthi izimoto zike zabonakala zimile isikhathi eside ngasendaweni yesigameko ngoLwesihlanu.“Sisola ukuthi bebehlola isimo, nanokuthi izigodi zisondelene kakhulu, ngakho indaba yamalobolo kungenzeka ukuthi basheshe bayithola, base besebenzisa ithuba,” kusho umthombo.Umthombo uthe awukholwa ukuthi isigameko simayelana netulo lokuphazamisa izinhlelo zokushada kwezithandani.Uthe izithandani ezehlelwe umshophi ngosuku lwazo akuvumi nokuthi zikhulume kulandela isigameko.Owesifazane kuvela ukuthi uphatheke kabi ngokonakala kosuku lwakhe ngomshophi onyantisa igazi.Owesilisa yena kuthiwa uphatheke kabi ngokubulawa kwabafowabo ngesihluku bethunywe wuye. Uyazibuza uyaziphendula.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa ase-Highflats avule amacala amabili okubulala kulandela isigameko sokudutshulwa kwababili eHlokozi, ngoMgqibelo. “Ulwazi olutholwe amaphoyisa luthi abafi bebethunywe ukuyolobola. Bathe besamile esangweni, belinde imvume yokungena, bahlaselwa abasolwa abayisithupha ebebehlome ngezibhamu, behamba ngama-Polo amabili eli-dark grey neli-navy blue,” kusho uNetshiunda. Uthe abasolwa bavulele ngenhlamvu bebhekise kubagilwa, bebabulala ujuqu. “Babuye babaphuca nemali ebebezolobola ngayo ngaphambi kokuthi babaleke,” kusho uNetshiunda. Uthe uphenyo lwamaphoyisa luveza ukuthi oyedwa wabafi ubefunelwa icala lokubulala okuthiwa walenza ngoJulayi nonyaka.

UTHEMBISA ukusebenza ngokuzinikela nokubambisana nezinhlaka zenyuvesi, owesifazane wokuqala oqokelwe kwesokuba yiPhini likaShansela eMangosuthu University of Technology.USolwazi Nokuthula Sibiya ongowokudabuka elokishini eMlaza okuyindawo eyakhele le nyuvesi, uqokelwe kulesi sikhundla emva kwamasonto ebambe kuso. Ubebambe kulandela ukumiswa kowayeyibamba lePhini likaShansela uSolwazi Marcus Ramogale, nesinye isikhulu uMnuz Gona Govender okuvela encwadini eyaputshuka eyayibhalelwe abasebenzi ngaphakathi ukuthi bamiselwe ukwenza okungahambisani nenqubo yalesi sikhungo.“Ngizizwa ngithobeke kakhulu ngokuhola isikhungo njengo-Vice Chancellor omusha. Lokhu kuqokwa, kuwukunqoba kwabesifazane abazimisele ukweqa imigoqo, bahole ngobuqotho. Ngizinikele ekwakheni umlando inyuvesi eziqhenya  ngawo ngokusebenza ngokubambisana nabasebenzi, nezitshudeni ukuqinisekisa inqubekela phambili. Ngokusebenza ndawonye, sizokwakha inyuvesi ethuthukisa izitshudeni,” kusho uSolwazi Sibiya.Isitatimende inyuvesi esithumelele abezindaba , sithe uSolwazi Sibiya uzoqala ngokusemthethweni emsebenzini wakhe ngoLwesine.“Ukuqokwa kwakhe kufika esikhathini esibalulekile njengoba inyuvesi ihlose ukuqala kabusha kwezemfundo, ubuchwepheshe nokusebenzisana nomphakathi. Kusukela ngo-Ephreli, 2022 inyuvesi beyilokhu ingaphansi kweso lomlawuli ukuqinisekisa uzinzo nokuqhubeka kokusebenza kahle ngesikhathi ebesinezinselelo. Umsebenzi womlawuli bekuwukuqinisekisa ukuthi inyuvesi yenganyelwa ngendlela efanele futhi igcina izinga lokufunda liphezulu,” kusho isitatimende.Sithe ubuholi bakhe akungabazeki ukuthi buzoletha amava adingekayo ekuqinisekiseni izinga eliphakeme lemfundo. Ngokudabuka nokukhulela kwakhe eMlaza, le nyuvesi ikholwa ukuthi ukuqonda kangcono okudingwa umphakathi.Okunye okuthiwa kuyizinhloso zakhe njengoba ethatha lesi sikhundla, ukuqinisa ezifundweni eziqinisekisa ukuthi izitshudeni ezithole iziqu kule nyuvesi ziphekeke ngendlela efanele ekwazi ukumelana nezidingo zekusasa. Kuthiwa uzophinde aqinise amaxhama okuxhumana phakathi kwesikhungo nomphakathi, ngokuqala izinhlelo ezithile ezibandakanya amalungu omphakathi, nokuqinisa isiko lokuziqalela izinto ezintsha olugqugquzela ukucabanga kwizitshudeni.Le nyuvesi eyethiwe ngegama lomsunguli we-IFP uMntwana uMangosuthu Buthelezi ongasekho,  isineminyaka engu-45 yasungulwa njengoba isungulwe ngo-1979.

Kuqopheke umlando ngesikhathi uNdunankulu omusha waKwaZulu-Natal, uThami Ntuli, ememezela ungqongqoshe wokuqala owaziwa ngokuthandana nobulili obufana nobakhe.UNtuli umemezele ilungu leDA, uMartin Meyer njengoNgqongqoshe weMisebenzi yoMphakathi neNgqalasizinda.Ukuqokwa kwakhe kwenzeke ngenyanga okuqwashiswa ngayo ngazo zonke ezithinta abathandana nobulili obufana nobabo uJuni nebizwa ngePride Month.UMeyer, oke waba yikhansela eThekwini, uyaziwa nangokuba yisishoshovu samalungelo abathandana nobulili obufana nobabo.Owayengumholi wentsha yeDA, uMbali Ntuli ubhale ekhasini lakhe leTwitter ukuthi ucabanga ukuthi uMeyer ungqongqoshe wokuqala othandana nobulili obufana nobakhe eKZN."Ube yiqhawe elihle lamalungelo eLGBTI esifundazweni futhi ngiyathemba ukuthi noma ngabe ubani othandana nabantu banoma ngabe yibuphi ubulili obekhathazekile ukuthi banendawo yini kwezombusazwe ezweni uyabona ukuthi banayo," kubhala uNtuli.Uthe ukumemeleka kubalulekile kubantu abebeshiywe ngaphandle futhi becindezelekile ikakhulukazi kulo mkhakha nakulesi sifundazwe.

UBENOMLANDO wodlame emndenini owesilisa waKwaMkhabela, eNdwedwe, okuthiwa ubulale ugogo wakhe emuva kokufudunyezelwa ukudla ngoMgqibelo.Kuthiwa umsindo usuke ngesikhathi umsolwa (29) evuka umbhejazane, ebuza umalumekazi wakhe, uNksz Zimbili Vilakazi, ukuthi umfudumezelelani ukudla kwakhe ngoba uyakwazi ukuzenzela?Ngokusho kukaNksz Thokozani Nxumalo, oyindodakazi kamufi, uNkk Nombulelo Vilakazi (70), olandwe ngudadewabo (uZimbili) emzini wakhe osendaweni, uthe udadewabo uphendule umsolwa ngokuthi uyamfudumezela ukudla ngoba bese kunqumele. Uthe umsolwa umtshele emehlweni uNksz Vilakazi (uZimbili) ukuthi uzomphahlaza ngalo ipuleti, nokuyinto okuthiwa ugcine eyenzile njengoba uNkk Nxumalo ezifice ngempela izingcucu zepuleti nophuthu kusakazeke phansi.Udalule ukuthi yiyo le ngxabano evuse umufi nomyeni wakhe uMnuz Richard Vilakazi ngenhloso yokuzolamula.“Yilapho avele wavuka khona indlobane, wabangenela ngesando bobathathu,” kusho uThokozani.Uveze ukuthi umsindo ugcine uvusa umfowabo uMnuz Bongani Vilakazi, onguyise kamsolwa, endlini engaphandle, naye kanti uzodliwa yiso isando.Uqhube wathi uNksz Vilakazi (uZimbili) ukwazile ukuphunyula, wazovusa yena (uNkk Nxumalo) kwakhe.“Ngithe uma ngifika ekhaya, ngafica umama nobaba belele phansi bengakhulumi, besaphefumula. Ngibafunele izingubo ngabambathisa, kwabizwa i-ambulensi,” kusho uThokozani.Uthe igcine ithatha umkhulu nomfowabo, ibaphuthumisa esibhedlela, ugogo wangabe esahamba njengoba ebesephangalele.Uthe umkhulu noyise kamsolwa, bebenezingozi ezimbi ekhanda.“Umkhulu usasesibhedlela, isimo sakhe sibi kangangokuthi abakamtsheli ukuthi umkakhe ushonile ngosuku lwesigameko. Umfowethu yena, utishiwe wakhiswa ngalo usuku. Yize isimo sakhe sivele saba sibi namuhla (esho izolo) wabuye wayiswa emtholampilo,” kubeka uThokozani.Udalule ukuthi umsolwa kudala aqala ukuhlukumeza izihlobo zakhe, enza isibonelo ngokuthi bekungesikhona okokuqala elimaza umkhulu.“Kukhona lapho amlimaza khona waze wayotishwa. Wake wawabulala wonke amawindi. Ngaphambi kwalokho, wake washaya unina waze wambopha,” usho kanje.Uqhube wathi ubethi uma esenza izigameko zokuhlukumeza izihlobo, unina aze athi uyazisola ukuthi wamkhiphelani ejele.Uthe basola ukusebenzisa izidakamizwa kumsolwa, abathi uvele abe yibhubesi esithubeni.“Ngibuhlungu ngokuthi alimaze abazali bami kanje ajike angabi nandaba, njengoba ebesho ephindelela ukuthi akanendaba yena, awabizwe lawo maphoyisa, yena akasabi ukubuyela eWestville (ejele) ngoba kumnandi,” kusho uThokozani.IMeya kaMasipala waseNdwedwe, uMnuz Sam Mfeka ohlanganise amehlo nomndeni izolo, ithe kusinda kwehlela ngezigameko zodlame endaweni, wathi kuyabakhathaza ukwanda kwazo.“Sikhathazwa nayindaba yezidakamizwa ezidla lubi entsheni, okuthi uma intsha isizidlile, yenze izinto ezihlasimulisa umzimba,” kusho uMfeka.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa aseNdwedwe abophe owesilisa oneminyaka engu-29 ngecala lokubulala, namabili okuzama ukubulala.“Lokhu kwenzeke emva kwesigameko lapho umsolwa ehlasele uyise, ugogo wakhe nomkhulu wakhe ngesando. Ugogo wakhe (70) uhlonzwe njengosedlulile emhlabeni endaweni yesigameko,” kusho uNetshiunda.Uqhube wathi laba abanye ababili baphuthunyiswe esibhedlela lapho abasathola khona usizo lwezempilo, wathi umsolwa kulindeleke ukuthi avele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseNdwedwe, maduze.

LUVELE lwamsefa ulwandle ummeli uMnuz Sipho Ramosepele, odilizwe wummangalelwa wokuqala ecaleni lokufa kukaSenzo Meyiwa, uMuzikawukhulelwa Sibiya. UMeyiwa owayeyisilomo se-Orlando Pirates neBafana Bafana, wadutshulwa wabulawa ekubo kwentombi yakhe uKelly Khumalo eVosloorus, ngo-2014.Icala belibuyele eNkantolo eNkulu ePitoli, izolo, lapho bekulindeleke ukuthi kuqhubeke izethulo maqondana nezitatimende zabamangalelwa. Icala laliguqe ngenyanga edlule ukunika izinhlangothi; oloMbuso nolwabameli ithuba lokufaka amaphepha.Icala lisesigabeni lapho kubangwa khona ukuthi izitatimende ezasayinwa abasolwa kufanele yini zamukelwe njengobufakazi benkantolo. Abameli bafaka isicelo sokuthi zichithwe izitatimende ngoba abamangalelwa bashawa baphoqwa ukuzisayina.Bekulindeleke ukuthi izinhlangothi zenze izethulo zokuvala bese zishiyela ezandleni zeJaji uRatha Makgoatlheng ukuthi linqume ngezitatimende. Kube nokubambezeleka isikhathi eside icala lingaqali kungacaci ukuthi kwenzenjani.Kuthe ngesikade bengena abamangalelwa bethushuka  ekhulukuthu, beshaya kancane beluswe wojele. Ummeli u-Advocate Thulani Mngomezulu utshele inkantolo ukuthi abeLegal Aid SA ngeke bamkhokhele futhi uSibiya useqashe yena wachitha uRamosepele.“AbeLegal Aid bathe ngeke bangikhokhele ngomsebenzi wami kulesi sigaba sokubangwa kwezitatimende. Ngithintwe wuninalume kammangalelwa wathi ucela ngibe wummeli ozimele uzongikhokhela,’’ kusho uMngomezulu.USibiya ubuziwe ukuthi useyamchitha yini uRamosepele, wavuma wathi kunjalo impela usehamba noMngomezulu. URamosepele ukuqinisekisile naye lokho, wathi injalo indaba.“Nkosi yenkantolo kunjalo ngiyafakaza kulokho, kodwa ngisazoqhubeka nokumela ummangalelwa wesibili uNtanzi kulolu daba,’’ kusho uRamosepele. URamosepele uxoshwa nje, wayevale isikhala emuva kokuhoxa kukaMnuz Malesela Teffo.URamasepele wapika uMngomezulu sekufike esigabeni sesicelo sokuchithwa kwezitatimende njengoba esexoshwa. UMngomezulu uthe izinguquko zenzeka khonamanjalo, ngeke kusapholiswa maseko.Uthe uSibiya umyalele ukuthi afake isicelo sokuthi abize ofakazi abangamaphoyisa abazofakaza odabeni lwezitatimende. Kugagulwe uColonel Leshabane, uGeneral Sibiya noWarrant Officer Makhubo ukuthi bazobizwa bezofakaza.UMshushisi woMbuso u-Advocate George Baloyi ukhombise ukungakwenameli konke lokhu ekhala ngokuthi kuyaphazamisa.Konke lokhu kuphoqe ukuthi lihlehle icala ngoba uMngomezulu uthe usadinga isikhathi sokuqedela amaphepha azowafaka abize nofakazi. Kulindeleke ukuthi icala libuyele enkantolo ngoLwesithathu.

UMMELI ecaleni lokubulawa kukaSenzo Meyiwa u-Advocate Thulani Mngomezulu, uthe uzizwa engaphephile emuva kokugasela kwamadoda amabili kwakhe ezintatha zangoLwesithathu.UMngomezulu omele ummangalelwa wokuqala uMuzikawukhulelwa Sibiya, ubike lolu daba enkantolo ngesikhathi kuqhubeka icala.UMeyiwa owayeyisilomo se-Orlando Pirates neBafana Bafana, wadutshulwa wabulawa ekubo kwentombi yakhe uKelly Khumalo, eVosloorus, eGauteng ngo-2014.UMngomezulu owajoyina icala seliphakathi, ubikele iJaji uRatha Mokgoatlheng ngamadoda asolisayo afike kwakhe.Uthe unezinsolo zokuthi kuhlobene nokusebenza kwakhe kuleli cala.UMngomeezulu uqale wacela inguyazana neJaji, uMshushisi nabanye abameli bayoxoxa esithe.Babuya lapho laqhubeka icala kodwa lithe selisongwa base belikhumbuza iJaji.IJaji libe selendlala udaba esidlangaleni njengokucela kukaMngomezulu.“Ngithole umbiko othusayo kuMngomezulu engibikela ngesigameko asola ukuthi sihlobene naleli cala.Ubike ngamadoda amabili afike emzini wakhe egcaluza ngendlela esolisayo ezintatha.Ngenhlanhla izinja zibhoke kakhulu, zawaphazamisa la madoda abezama ukungena,’’ kusho iJaji.IJaji lithi uMngomezulu akaneme neze ngoba usola ukuthi la madoda abezomenzakalisa futhi uzizwa engaphephile emuva kwesigameko.“UMngomezulu uthi uyasola ukuthi laba balisa bebeze kabi kuyena befuna ukumenza okubi noma bambulale ngoba phela yizigameko ezenzekayo eNingizimu Afrika lezi,’’ kusho iJaji.IJaji lithe uMngomezulu unelungelo lokuthi avikeleke ngoba ungumsebenzi wenkantolo futhi kungaba kuhle uma udaba engalubika amaphoyiseni.Libe selinquma ukulweneka esidlangaleni udaba ukuze kwaziwe ukuthi uMngomezulu uyaphazamiseka emsebenzini.IJaji libuze uMngomezulu ukuthi wenelisekile yini ngendlela eleneke ngayo udaba. UMngomezulu uthe kukhona afisa ukukwengeza ngesinye isigameko esithinta igama lakhe.“Nakuba ngingeke ngikuhlanganise lokhu nalolu daba kodwa ngizokusho.“Nkosi yenkantolo iKaya FM ixoxe noChicco Twala ngobufakazi bukaSifiso Meyiwa, ethi angiwazi umsebenzi wami, akazi ukuthi ngimfakelani kuleli cala,’’ kusho uMngomezulu ngokukhathazeka.UMngomezulu ubesanda kuveza ukuthi isitatimende sikaMeyiwa (uSifiso), siveza ukuthi uSihlalo we-Orlando Pirates nePSL, uMnuz Irvin Khoza wathi umufi akabulawanga yizigebengu.UMngomezulu uthe uzobiza uChicco, uKelly noKhoza bazofakaza ngabakwaziyo kuleli cala. Abameli baqedile ukupheka ngemibuzo ufakazi owumphenyi uSergeant Batho Mogola. Icala liyaqhubeka namuhla, uMbuso uzokhomba indlela.

UMMELI ecaleni lokufa kukaSenzo Meyiwa, u-Advocate Thulani Mngomezulu, uthe ufuna usihlalo we-Orlando Pirates, uDkt Irvin Khoza, uKelly Khumalo noChicco Twala bayofakaza.UMngomezulu omele ummangalelwa wokuqala, uMuzikawukhulelwa Sibiya, usho lokhu ngesikhathi epheka ngemibuzo umphenyi uSergeant Batho Mogola.UMeyiwa owayeyisilomo se-Pirates neBafana Bafana, wadutshulwa wabulawa ekubo kwentombi yakhe uKelly Khumalo eVosloorus, eGauteng, ngo-2014. UMngomezulu uthe uMeyiwa wadutshulwa nguLongwe Twala, indaba yokuthi kwakubanjwa inkunzi yintimbothi eyakhandwa.UMngomezulu uthe uLongwe wafika ephuzile ephethe isibhamu, waxabana noZandi Khumalo owayeyintombi yakhe. Uthe ngesikhathi uMeyiwa ezama ukulamula, wadubuleka naye uLongwe wazidubula ngephutha kwase kulimala noZandi.UMngomezulu uhoshe isitatimende sikaMnuz Sifiso Meyiwa, ongumfowabo kamufi lapho eveza khona ukuthi watshelwa nguKhoza ukuthi umfowabo wafa kanjani.UMeyiwa (Sifiso) esitatimendeni uthi bahamba noKhoza kuyokhethwa ibhokisi likamufi nokulapho amtshela khona ukuthi uMeyiwa ufe elamula uLongwe noZandi belwa. UMshushisi woMbuso, u-Advocate George Baloyi, uthe banesitatimende sikaKhoza ekuphika konke lokhu okushiwo nguMeyiwa (Sifiso).UMngomezulu uthe bazobhalela uKhoza bambize eze enkantolo ezochaza ngalokhu.“UBaloyi akakaze asho ukuthi uDkt uKhoza usohlwini lofakazi. UKhoza akanawo amalungelo akhethekile, sizombiza azofakaza ngalokhu,’’ kusho uMngomezulu.Ngaphandle kukaKhoza, uMngomezulu uthe ufisa ukubiza uLongwe azofakaza bese kuza noKelly bazocacisa kabanzi ngezinto ezithile ezithinta amagama abo. Uthe bazoze babize ngisho uChicco, uyise kaLongwe, naye azochaza akwaziyo.Kuphinde kwafundwa nesitatimende somthandazi uNompilo Sangweni okuthiwa wageza uKelly emuva kwesigameko. Umthandazi esitatimendeni, uthi uKelly wafika ekhala ngokubhedelwa yizinto ethi noma ecula esteji uyezwa ukuthi kukhona okungahambi kahle.UMngomezulu uthe naye umthandazi uzobizwa azofakaza phambi kwenkantolo ngomsebenzi awenzela uKelly emuva kokufa kukaMeyiwa.Kuvele nokuthi kuzobizwa uDkt uV.V.O Mkhize ongumelaphi wendabuko, azolekelela ngolwazi lwakhe lwezindaba zesintu nokugezwa kwethunzi elimnyama.Elinye iphuzu elivezwe nguMngomezulu wukuthi kunendida ngomuntu owadubula uMeyiwa nohlobo lwesibhamu esasebenza. UMngomezulu uthe kuke kwavela igama likaMnuz Makho Buthelezi kuphinde kuthiwe akuyena, kukhonjwe uMthobisi Mncube ongummangalelwa wesithathu.Uthe khona lapho kuthiwa uMeyiwa wadutshulwa nge-9mm bese kuphinde kuvele abanye ofakazi abakhuluma ngo-38 Special Revolver. Kulindeleke ukuthi icala libuyele enkantolo namuhla.

USIHLALO we-ActionSA KwaZulu- Natal, uMnuz Zwakele Mncwango, uthi kungakuhle uNdunankulu kaZulu uMfundisi uThulasizwe Buthelezi, ahoxise amazwi akhe esidlangaleni. UMncwango ubize isithangami nabezindaba eThekwini, ezocacisa ngamazwi okuthiwa ashiwo nguButhelezi ngaye.Umsindo usukela emcimbini wokuvulwa kwesiShayamthetho saKwaZulu- Natal, eMgungundlovu, lapho okwakhuluma khona iSilo uMisuzulu kaZwelithini.UNdunankulu wesifundazwe uNkk Nomusa Dube - Ncube, welama iSilo ngenkulumo ngoLwesithathu kepha sasikade sikhulume ngoLwesibili. Kwakhalwa ngokuthi inkulumo kaBayede ibe mfishane kakhulu kangangokuthi abanye baze bathi umcimbi kufanele ube ngowosuku olulodwa.UMncwango uthi uButhelezi ukhulume kabi ngaye esho okungelona iqiniso ngesikhathi esukumisa iSilo esigodlweni eMachobeni, eNgwavuma kugujwa uMkhosi wamaGanu. UMncwango uthi kuthiwa yena wathi iSilo uMisuzulu kaZwelithini akufanele sikhulume uma kuvulwa iSishayamthetho.Kunenkulumo eqoshiwe okuthiwa kukhuluma kuyona uButhelezi ethi abasondelene noMncwango abamkhuze ngoba usekhuluma izindaba ezingaphezu kwakhe.UMncwango ubebabaza imihlolo ethi akakaze ayisho leyo nto.“Ngingubani mina ongathi iSilo asingabe sisakhuluma? Mina ngangiphakamisa ukuthi kungaba njani uma umcimbi ungaba wusuku olulodwa ukuze kongiwe imali. Ngimangele uma sekuthiwa ngathi iSilo asingakhulumi, uShenge kungaba kuhle axolise impela kufanele axolise esidlangaleni,’’ kusho uMncwango.Uthe bayazana noShenge bahlala bexoxa, uma kunodaba olunjalo bekufanele amthinte ambuze bakhulume kahle. UMncwango uthe uyazi ngobukhosi ngoba uyingxenye yamabutho, uyasihlonipha iSilo nobuholi bendabuko bonke.Uthe usehlele umhlangano nezinduna zamabutho ukuze acacise ngodaba, uma kwenzeka ebonana neSilo.“Abantu abaningi ababengishayela ucingo babeshaqekile ngoba bayazi ukuthi ngeke ngiyisho leyo nto. Ngihlele umhlangano nezinduna zamabutho ukuze zizwe uhlangothi lwami, neSilo ngiyafisa ukubonana naso ngalolu daba,’’ kuchaza uMncwango.Ebuzwa ngalokhu uNdunankulu kaZulu uButhelezi, uthe uMncwango akahloniphi uzama ukubukwa ngeSilo.“Ubengekho uMhlonishwa uMncwango eMachobeni, ngakho kuyangimangaza ukuthi uMhlonishwa angaphawula ngomcimbi abekade engekho kuwona. Nakho lokhu kokuthi uMhlonishwa afune ukugqama ngeSilo akukhombisi inhlonipho,’’ kuphendula uButhelezi.

UMNDENI wowayenguNgqongqoshe wezamaBhizinisi kaHulumeni, uMnuz Pravin Gordhan, uthi uqiniswa idolo yimiyalezo yenduduzo elokhu iqhubekile nokungena.Okhulumela umndeni, uMnuz Adrian Lackay, uthe nakuba kunzima ukwamukela ukushona kukaGordhan, isibalo esiphezulu sabantu abazwelana nabo sibethula umthwalo.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma emzini kaGordhan, eGauteng.“Kusithoba amanxeba ukuzwa abantu bencoma iqhaza elibanjwe uGordhan ngesikhathi kulwelwa inkululeko kanye nangesikhathi kuqalwa uhulumeni wentandoyeningi. UGordhan wanikela ngempilo yakhe.”NgoLwesibili umndeni nezihlobo babe nomcimbi wangasese wokubona isidumbu sikaGordhan.Isidumbu sikaGordhan singene okokugcina kulo muzi wakhe.Ibhokisi ebelinesidumbu sikaGordhan besigoqwe ngefulegi elinemibala ye-ANC, okuyiqembu abeyilungu lalo.Bekuwumunyu wodwa ngesikhathi isidumbu sikaGordhan sesishiya umuzi wakhe, sesibuyela emakhazeni.Isidumbu sikaGordhan sifike eThekwini, ngoLwesithathu ntambama.Umngcwabo wakhe uzoba seNkosi Albert Luthuli International Convention Centre, ngoLwesihlanu.ULackay uthe uGordhan udlule emhlabeni ekhathazekile ngekusasa leNingizimu Afrika.“UGordhan walwela ukuba bonke abantu bakuleli bathole impilo engcono. Akazange azabalazele ukuthi kube khona abantu abazozinothisa bodwa. Ubehlezi esigqugquzela ukuthi sonke silwele ukuba izwe lethu libe ngcono.”Ngaphandle kwemiyalezo yenduduzo, kuhlelwe imicimbi eyahlukene yokukhumbula uGordhan.ngoLwesibili ntambama kube nenkonzo yokumkhumbula ebisehholo ledolobha eGoli.Le nkonzo ibihlelwe yi-ANC esifundazweni iGauteng.Izikhulumi ebezishiyelana inkundla zincome amagalelo kaGordhan.Namhlanje ntambama kuzokuba nenye inkonzo yokukhumbula uGordhan ezokuba seThekwini.Le nkonzo ihlelwe yi-ANC KwaZulu-Natal.UGordhan ushonele esibhedlela esiseGoli ngeledlule, emva kokugula isikhathi eside. UGordhan uhlonishwe ngomngcwabo osezingeni likahulumeni wesigaba sesibili.UMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, uzokwethula inkulumo emngcwabeni kaGordhan.Phakathi kweminyango uGordhan ake wayiphatha kubalwa owezeziMali nowezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu.Ngaphambi kwalokho, wayengukhomishana weSA Revenue Service (Sars), wamemezela ukuthatha kwakhe umhlalaphansi kwezepolitiki ngaphambi kokhetho lwangoMeyi nonyaka.

UMNDENI wePhoyisa loMkhandlu weTheku elabulawa ufuna athole isijezo sikadilikajele umakoti wawo osanda kuvuma icala lokubulala umyeni wakhe.UFaith Nongcebo Ntombela usanda kuvuma icala lokubulala uCaptain Zwelakhe Thomas Ntombela owayesebenzela uphiko lwamaPhoyisa oMkhandlu weTheku.Ubuyela eNkantolo eNkulu yaseScottburgh, okuyilapho okulindeleke khona ukuthi kubhungwe ngesigwebo esimfanele.Kulindeleke ukuthi ummeli wakhe, uMnuz Ashwin Rughbeer, anxuse inkantolo ukuba ingamnikezi isigwebo esinzima.Amacala awavuma elokubulala, elokuhlela itulo lokubulala, elokweba isibhamu sikamufi sohlobo lweCZ-Model 70-Semi-Automatic-Pistol nelokuqamba amanga ephoyiseni elalithatha isitatimende ngemuva kwesigameko.Uvumile ukuthi yaphunza imizamo yakhe yokuzama ukumbulala ngoshevu umufi. Watshela nenkantolo ukuthi kukhona lapho ake ahlela khona netulo lokuthi asoconge omunye wabaphenyi baleli cala.Umufi wadutshulwa wabulawa esemzini wakhe oseMlaza, kwa-S ngoMeyi 3, nyakenye.Waphuthunyiswa esibhedlela eSiphingo Medical Towers nokuyilapho okwafike kwamenela khona.Ngemuva kwalokho, kwaboshwa inkabi eyadubula uSipho Ntombela, eyagwetshwa iminyaka engu-20 ibhadla ejele ngemuva kokuba igonyuluke ngetulo lokubulawa kukamufi, yaveza nokuthi uFaith uyena ungqondongqondo walo.UFaith wakhalelwa ngamasongo kaSigonyela, wagqigqa enkantolo waze walivuma icala emasontweni edlule, eNkantolo eNkulu yaseScottburgh. Uveze ukuthi walingwa yinkabi eyesetshwayo esejele, uKhulani Cele eyamthembisa izulu nomhlaba wagcina esejola nayo ezitshela ukuthi uthandana nesikhulu esiphezulu se-ANC, uMnuz Siboniso Duma.Waveza ukuthi njengoba engumphathi wenkampani esabalalisa ukudla ezikoleni zabaphila nokukhubazeka, iCNgwata (PTY) LTD, lesi sikhulu samthembisa ukuthi sizomsiza ukuthi alithole kalula ithenda lokwenza lo msebenzi.Waveza ukuthi le nkabi wahlangana nayo ekhasini lika-Facebook ngoMashi 22, nyakenye. Ngokusho kwakhe, wathola eseya kubo KwaMaphumulo ehambise igilosa yokudla ukuthi ujola nenkabi, hhayi uDuma.Umfowabo kamufi, uMnuz Nkosinathi Ntombela, uthe isigwebo sikadilakajele yisona kanye esingabanikeza ukuthula."Kumele ajeze kanzima ngale nto ayenza kumfowethu. Njengomndeni sikholwa ukuthi isigwebo sikadilikajele yisona kanye esimfanele," usho kanje.Uthe babengakulindele ukuthi umakoti kamfowabo angahlangana nezitha kuhlanganiswe itulo lokubulala umfowabo.Kuleli cala kubandakanyeka negama likathishanhloko waKwaMaphumulo, uMnuz Sithembiso Khumalo ongaphandle ngebheyili futhi oliphikayo icala.Namhlanje kulindeleke ukuthi inkantolo ibhunge ngesigwebo okumele sitholwe uFaith.Lo wesifazane wazakhela udumo ngokuhlezi emamatheka njalo uma evele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMlaza.Wayeswenka aconse futhi ekujabulela nokuthwetshulwa izithombe yizintatheli. Wayeze azicele ukuthi uma zimthwebula mazizinikeze isikhathi esanele ukuze ephepheni ezovela emuhle.Kukhona lapho ake abuza khona izintatheli ukuthi kungani zingamphatheli iphepha uma zize ecaleni lakhe ukuze naye ezozibona?Ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, ubengasamamatheki uma efika enkantolo futhi eseluka ekhanda ekubeni wayexhuma izinwele ezinhle ekhanda.Amacala waqale wawaphika wonke, ethi uqanjelwa amanga. Kwakuthi uma ezovela enkantolo eMlaza, zonke izisebenzi zakule nkantolo ziphume zizomthwebula izithombe njengoba zazibabaza, kwazise naye wayesebenza kuyona le nkantolo.Enqatshelwa ibheyili ngoDisemba ngonyaka owedlule, wafisela abomndeni wakwaNtombela uKhisimusi omuhle.Unina wayejwayele ukufika enkantolo ezomeseka kodwa wagcina esengasezi ngoba wayehhahhanyezwa ngabantu ababebhikisha, becula ngaphandle kwenkantolo.Babehlabelela iculo elithi WeFaith wawutshelwe ngubani ukuthi indoda iyabulawa?

Umndeni wamalungu amahlanu kasomatekisi ahlaselwe aqothwa evela emcimbini eZakheni, ngoMsombuluko, usuqinisekise ukuthi inhloko yomuzi yalo mndeni isesibhedlela emva kokudubuleka kulesi sigameko.Umthombo weSolezwe ubuveze ukuthi umgilwa ongusomatekisi ungomunye wamalungu omndeni ashonele endaweni yesigameko, kodwa uMnuz Skobho Thusi uveze ukuthi umfowabo usesibhedlela.Uqinisekise ukuthi abadlule emhlabeni  kulesi sigameko yinkosikazi kamgilwa, uNkk Thulile Thusi obenguthisha KwaNgcende Primary nezingane zakhe ezintathu okukhona kuyo eyenza u-Grade 11 esikoleni iLimehill High.“Kushone nezihlobo ezimbili zasemndenini wakithi oseNquthu. Okwamanje sisematasa ngodaba oluthinta amakhaza, ngicela ubuye ungithinte,” kusho uThusi.IKhansela uMnuz Mzuzwana Magasela elihambele umndeni ngenhloso yokuyobhonga emswaneni, lithe bewumasipala bazohlangana nomndeni namhlanje ukubheka ukuthi bangalekelela kuphi.“Namhlanje (esho izolo), bengiye emndenini njengomngani nokuthi izingane ezimbili ezishone kulesi sigameko bengizifundisa esikoleni njengoba ngiwuthisha. Sizoya emndenini sesihambisana neMeya uMnuz Zama Sibi ukuyobhonga emswaneni, sibone ukuthi umndeni ungalekelelwa kuphi,” usho kanje.Kulimale abantu abahlanu kulesi sigameko, kanti okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uqinisekisile ukuthi abayisithupha abashonile ngabesifazane. Uthe amaphoyisa aphansi phezulu afuna abasolwa.UMphathiswa woMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka, udlulise amazwi enduduzo emndenini. Uthe  banethemba lokuthi amaphoyisa azokwazi ukulandela umkhondo wababulali.

KUKIKIZE umndeni kushona ilungu lawo othi ubulihlalise lubhojozi emva kwesigameko sokudlwengula udadewabo maqede lambulala, eMahesheni, eNquthu.Umufi uMnuz Khanyisani Buthelezi (27) okuthiwa ubeyisigebengu esesatshwayo kule ndawo kuvela ukuthi ushonele eGoli, ngoLwesibili emini.Kuthiwa ubesesatshiswa okwenyoka njengoba kuthiwa ubefuna ukuya ocansini nabo bonke odadewabo nezingane zamantombazane zakubo, emva kwesigameko sokubulala udadewabo esemdlwengulile.Kakucaci ukuthi ibe yini imbangela yokufa kwakhe. Kunamahebezi okuthi uzikhungile. Ilungu lomndeni lokuqala, uNkk MaThusini Buthelezi lithe aphume nobovu ngokufa kwelunga lawo.Eqhuba uthe umufi ubenonya nesihluku esiyisimanga. Ulimise ngesihloko elokuthi umufi wazakhela inzondo engapheli emndenini ngo-2020 ngesikhathi edlwengula maqede ebulala udadewabo uNksz Nomvula Buthelezi owayedume ngelikaJuba."Siyawuhalalisela wonke umndeni wakwaButhelezi ngokuthi lo mfana amane akhethe isinqumo esihle kangaka sokuthi adlule emhlabeni. Phela iqiniso limile nje hheyi uhluphile kakhulu nangu umuntu wesilisa,'' usho kanje.Ekhuluma ngesigameko sokudlwengulwa nokubulawa kukaNksz Buthelezi, uthe umufi wamngenela egunjini lakhe lokulala wamdlwengula wathi eseqedile wambulala. Emva kwalokho wase emumboza samuntu osalele ongakavuki ebuthongweni.Emva kwesigameko uButhelezi wakhalelwa ngamasongo kaSigonyela, wahlala ejele iminyaka imibili wase ephuma.Kuthiwa kuleso sigameko kwatholakala insimbi eyayigcwele igazi egunjini  likaButhelezi nephenti likamufi elalinegazi."Waxolisa kithina ngakwenzile, kodwa namanje akuvumi ukuthi sikhohlwe ukuthi kunomuntu ongenza isihluku esinjengalesi kumuntu wakubo,'' kuchaza uNksz Buthelezi.UNksz Jabu Buthelezi naye ukugcizelele ukuthi ibinzima kakhulu impilo esadla anhlamvana umfowabo.Uveze ukuthi izingane zamantombazane zonke zakwaButhelezi bezihlafuna zijeqeza ngoba ubefuna ukulala nazo njalo uma ethola ithuba."Thina asazi ukuthi kanti kakuyisilwane sini sona lesi uNkulunkulu ayesilethile kulo mndeni wethu,'' usho kanjena sakubalisa.Elinye ilungu lalo mndeni liveze ukuthi kunenye ingane yentombazane yasemndenini agcina ephumelelile ukulala nayo ngenkani.Umndeni uthe uzomngcwaba uButhelezi kodwa akukho buhlungu obuzwayo ngokushona kwakhe.

UFUNA izimpendulo esikoleni umndeni womfundi ka-matric eMpumelelo High, isidumbu sakhe esitholwe sidindilize eceleni komgwaqo eLoskop, eMtshezi, okuthiwa uxoshwe wuthisha emva kokubhadanywa ezivalele nomfundi wesifazane kwelinye igumbi esikoleni, kuqhubeka ikhempu yabafundi baleli banga ngoMgqibelo ebusuku.ULuthando Gama (17) waseLoskop, kuthiwa akabange esafinyelela kubo emva kokuthi ekhonjwe indlela ngomunye wothisha ngesikhathi u-matric ukhempile, kufundwa ngesikhathi esengeziwe, okukholakala ukuthi ushayiswe yimoto.UMnuz Mncedisi Mazibuko onguyisemkhulu kaLuthando, uthe batshelwe abafunda naye ukuthi emva kokubonwa wuthisha evalelene nomfundi wesifazane kwelinye igumbi kuqhubeka ukufunda ebusuku, omunye wothisha ezwa lokho, uthukuthelile wamxosha ethi akabuyele ekhaya.“Ngokuzwa kwethu bekungabo-10 ebusuku ngesikhathi exoshwa. Izingane zithi emva kokuthi ebonwe evalelene nomfundi, ubuyele ekilasini, kodwa uthisha umtshele ukuthi ngenxa yesenzo sakhe, akafuni nokumbona, akabuyele ekhaya. Kuthiwa umqhubile waze wayomdlulisa esangweni likanogada enza isiqiniseko sokuthi uyamxosha,” usho kanje.Uthe ngeSonto ekuseni, bengezelele lutho, babone kungena emagcekeni iveni yamaphoyisa, ebazisa ngokutholwa kwesidumbu sikaLuthando, isidumbu sakhe okuthiwa bese sivele sifakwe emakhazeni ngayizolo emva kwesikhashana kwehle umshophi.UMazibuko uthe kuze kwashona ilanga ngeSonto, lutho uthisha ukufika ukuzobika ukuthi kwenzekeni ekubeni isikole siyibanga elingamakhilomitha amathathu nje vo, ukusuka kubo kamufi.Uthe ufike ngoMsombuluko ehambisana nothishomkhulu, wachaza into umndeni ongayiqondi. UMazibuko uveze ukuthi uphikile ukuthi umxoshile umfundi, wathi uthe umlindise egunjini okuhlanganela kulo othisha. Uzihlangule ngokuthi ubesayolanda owesifazane abhadanywe naye ukuze bachaze ukuthi bavalelanelani ngesikhathi sokufunda. Uthisha uthi wabuya engasekho esephumile. Kuthiwa uthisha uthe emva kokumbheka, engamtholi, uqhubekile nokufundisa okuthe emva kwesikhashana bathola ucingo olubazisa ngomfundi ogqoke umfaniswano wesikole sabo oshayiswe yimoto.  UMazibuko uthe uthisha uveze ukuthi uzamile ukuyobikela umndeni ngawo uMgqibelo ngosekwehlile kodwa wafika isango livaliwe, wanquma ukubuyela emuva.Umndeni kamufi ukholwa ukuthi uthisha ubengamjezisa ngenye indlela umfundi kunokuthi afake impilo yakhe engcupheni ngoba akukho okuvelayo ukuthi laba bafundi bebelele kodwa babhadanywe nje kuphela omunye uthisha bezivalele kuleliya gumbi, wabikela lo obaxoshileKuthiwa unina kamufi, ungeniswe emtholampilo emva kokuzwa lezi zindaba okukholakala ukuthi kungenxa yokuphatheka kabi.Ngawo uMsombuluko, kuthiwa abafundi kulesi sikole bavuke indlobana kwaphazamiseka izinhlelo zokufunda, bekhala ngesenzo salo thisha sokuxosha umfundi ebusuku.Kushaye isikhathi sokushicilela okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, engayiphendulile imibuzo athunyelelwe yona.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa esiteshini Amangwe, aphenya icala lokubulala ngokungenhloso, emva kokuthi kutholwe isidumbu sowesilisa ona-17, okusolakala ukuthi ushayiswe yimoto.

UFUNA ubulungiswa umndeni wowesilisa waseNtinyane, eMbumbulu okwatholakala isidumbu sakhe sinqunywe ikhanda futhi sishisiwe endlini yakhe ngemuva kwengxabano aba nayo nentombi yakhe ethinta abantwana.UMnuz Scelo Dodo Mkhize (42) wabulawa ngoJuni 2022. Kuvela ukuthi isidumbu sakhe satholakala ngemuva kwenyanga.Kuthiwa wayekade ebe nokuhilizisana nayethandana naye kubangwa ukuthi umufi wayefuna ukwenza ulibofuzo lwezingane zakhe ezimbili ayekholwa ngukuthi akusizona ezakhe.Kuthiwa lokhu kwayinenga kakhulu intombi yakhe yakhala ngokuthi isenzo sikamufi simenza abukeke kabi kumalungu omndeni nasemphakathini.Kuvela ukuthi kungakapheli izinyanga ezine kwabe sekutholakala isidumbu sakhe sinqunywe ikhanda futhi sesibolile endlini.Umfowabo kamufi, uMnuz Patrick Mkhize uthe bakhathazekile ngokuthi kuze kube yimanje akekho osaboshiwe mayelana nalesi sehlakalo.Uthe bakholwa wukuthi ukhona ungqondongqondo wetulo lokusocongwa kukamfowabo.Ukhale ngendlela okucwebe ngayo iziziba mayelana nalolu daba, wathi ayibanikezi nje nhlobo ukuthula.Uthe kodwa ngeke baze bathule bagoqe izandla, bazoqhubeka nokufaka ingcindezi emaphoyiseni ukuze kutholakale umnyombo wokusocongwa kukamufi."Sekuqala ukusikhathaza kakhulu manje ukubona kuthuleke kangaka ngendaba yokubulawa kukamfowethu. Asisazi ukuthi senze njani uma kuthuleke kangaka,'' usho kanje.Ngaphambilini amaphoyisa akuqinisekisa ukubulawa kukamufi. Aveza ukuthi kusaqhubeka uphenyo olunzulu ngokubulawa kwakhe.

BANIKWE kuze kube yinamhlanje ntambama ukuthi bafake izikhalo zabo enkantolo yezokhetho labo abachithwe yikhomishini eyengamele ukhetho ukuba yingxenye yokhetho ngoMeyi 29, nonyaka.Laba bazokwazi ngo-Ephreli 9, okuwusuku le nkantolo ezonquma ngalo ukuthi kakade bazoba yingxenye yokhetho noma le nkantolo izohambisana nesinqumo sekhomishini yezokhetho i-Independent Electoral Commission.Ikhomishini yathola izikhalo ngabangu-82, ngokungamele babe yingxenye yalolu khetho.Owayengumengameli wezwe uJacob Zuma, okhankasela iqembu Umkhonto weSizwe, ungomunye owachithwa yikhomishini ukuthi abe yingxenye yokhetho ngoba walahlwa yicala lokuthi adonse isigwebo sezinyanga ezingu-15.Phezu kwalokhu iqembu lakhe iMK limile ekutheni uZuma, kumnyama kubomvu uzoba yingxenye yokhetho. Ekhuluma nabezindaba bakwaSABC muva nje, inhloko yezokhetho yeMK uMnuz Musa Mkhize, uveze ukuthi bazophikisana nesinqumo se-IEC odabeni lokuvimba uZuma ukuthi abe yingxenye yokhetho.UMkhize uthe basamatasa babheka lesi sinqumo se-IEC wathi kodwa akukho okuzovimba uZuma ukuthi abe ngumengameli wezwe kusuka ngoJuni 1.Uveze ukuthi bazosebenzisa umthetho wakuleli ukulwa nalesi sinqumo sekhomishini. USihlalo we-IEC kuzwelonke uMnuz Mosotho Moepya, uthe izikhaloo abazitholile bezivela kumaqembu angu-21 ezepolitiki.Uthe balandele umthetho wakuleli wathi abangeneme banelungelo lokuthi baphikisane nalesi sinqumo ngokuya enkantolo yezokhetho.“Kumele bakwenze lokhu ngo-Ephreli 2, 2024. Inkantolo izonquma ngabakhalazile ngo-Ephreli 9, bese ikhomishini idedela uhlu lokugcina ngo-Ephreli 10, 2024.” Odabeni lukaZuma uthe balandele umthetho wathi ngeke abe yingxenye yokhetho.“Akudingeki ukuthi iqembu elikhalazayo ngesinqumo sethu libhalele thina ngqo kodwa kumele liye enkantolo yezokhetho. Iyona ezoba nezwi lokugcina kulolu daba.” UMoepya uveze ukuthi bayisithupha abangenela ukhetho ngokuzimela abazobanga izihlalo ePhalamende.EziShayamthetho zezifundazwe bayisithupha abazobe bebanga izikhundla. NgoLwesine ikhomishini izoba nomcimbi wokusayinwa kwesibophezelo sokuthi amaqembu azohlonipha umgomo obekiwe wezokhetho. Ngalolu suku kuzotonyulwa neqembu elizoba phezulu ephepheni lokuvota.

IPHINI leNhloko yamaJaji kuleli iJaji Mandisa Maya, linike uMkhonto weSizwe (MK), umnqamulajuqu wanamuhla ukufaka amaphepha uma bephikisa, i-IEC esicelweni sayo sokudlulisa isinqumo senkantolo ngodaba lokufakwa ephepheni lokuvota igama lowayengumengameli, uJacob Zuma.Izwe lilungiselela ukhetho lukazwelonke oluzoba ngoMeyi 29, lapho okulindeleke ukuthi zidlane imilala uma amaqembu esebanga amavoti.Wongaphansi nongaphezulu phakathi kwe-IEC neMK abafakana ezinkantolo.AbeMK bamile ekutheni iyoze iyochithana ngoba yona ayijiki iya okhethweni futhi izimisele ngokunqoba, iphathe izwe.UZuma ngoDisemba nyakenye umemezele iqembu elisha iMK wathi usehamba nalo, uzolikhankasela futhi aleseke okhethweni.I-IEC yasefa uZuma yamkhipha ohlwini ithi walahlwa yicala wagwetshwa kanti umthetho uthi akufanele umuntu onjalo aye ePhalamende. UZuma neMK balwedlulisela eNkantolo yezoKhetho udaba, bafike balunqoba.I-IEC ngokungeneliseki kwayo ngesinqumo senkantolo yamemezela ukuthi iyalwedlulisa udaba luya eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo.I-MK ilokhu iwanqobe njalo amacala ebifakelwe wona ezinkantolo zakuleli.Icala lokuqala yilapho i-ANC ebiphosela khona inselelo isinqumo sokubhalisa nokwemukela iMK njengeqembu.I-IEC yagunyaza ukubhaliswa kweMK yahamba yayosimela isinqumo sayo enkantolo, i-ANC yakhala ngaphansi.Kuphinde kwaba necala elifakwe yiyona futhi i-ANC, eNkantolo eNkulu eThekwini kubangwa uphawu loMkhonto weSizwe.I-ANC iphinde yakhala ngaphansi kulolu daba yehlulwa futhi yamemezela ukuthi izosedlulisa lesi sinqumo ngoba ayeneme ngaso.Olunye udaba yilolu lokungena kukaZuma ohlwini lwabaya ePhalamende.Kwenzeka konke lokhu nje, i-IEC isivele iwagayile amaphepha okuvota futhi ubuso bukaZuma buyavela njengokunguyena ongumholi weqembu iMK.

ZINIKWE uhlu lwezinto okufanele zizenze izikhulu zoMnyango weMfundo, okufaka indaba yokuqedwa kwezindlu zangasese eziyimigodi, kanjalo nokuthola ukuthi badukuza kuziphi izinkalo abafundi abaphothula u-matric kodwa bangaya ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme. Lo myalelo ukhishwe yikomiti lalo ePhalamende njengoba namhlanje uNgqongqoshe woMnyango uNksz Siviwe Gwarube, ethula isabelomali salo nyaka wezimali.Eyezindlu zangasese zomgodi ibihlale iqhatha obengungqongqoshe walo mnyango, uNkk Angie Motshekga, nezinhlangano ezehlukene zomphakathi okubalwa namaqembu aphikisayo ezepolitiki, okubalwa ne-DA uNksz Gwarube ayilungu layo.Usihlalo wekomiti uNksz Joy Maimela, uthe bafuna kuphele lo nyaka wezimali, umnyango usuqedile ngenkinga yezindlu zangasese zomgodi.“Sinike umnyango kuze kuphele lo nyaka wezimali ukuthi uqede ngale nkinga yezindlu zomgodi ezikoleni. Sifuna nombiko ogcwele ezinsukwini ezingu-60, mayelana nezinto ezithinta ukuphuculwa kwengqalasizinda ezikoleni. Sifuna ukwazi ukuthi zingaki izikole ezizokwakhiwa ezifundazweni ezehlukene.” Uthe bafuna kubuyekezwe nendaba yesilabhasi endala eyenziwa abafundi abenza uN1 kuya kuN3.“Sifuna abafundi abaphothula u-matric kodwa abangayanga ezikhungweni bahlinzekwe ngezinhlelo zokuthi bazanyelwe izikhala ezikhungweni zemfundo ezehlukene kuleli. Umnyango kufanele uxhumane noweMfundo ePhakeme ukuze kuvaleke igebe elikhona nokuthi laba bafundi bazithole sebebhuquza emakhaya.” UNksz Maimela ukhale ngabafundi abangamahlongandlebe.“Siyalele umnyango ukuthi ukhulume nabazali balaba bafundi abangezwa. Sikhathazekile ngokuphepha kothisha ezikoleni zethu.” Uveze nokuthi kumele umnyango uqikelele ukuthi izinsiza kufundisa zifika ngesikhathi ezikoleni.Mayelana nezinkinga ezibhekene nomkhandlu olawula othisha kuleli iSACE, uthe kumele usheshise ukukhipha izitifiketi zokubhaliswa kothisha abasha endimeni.“Kumele labo thisha bahlonyiswe ngezinto ezenzeka emkhakheni wezemfundo. Kunokusilela emuva odabeni lokubhaliswa kothisha okugcina kuthatha isikhathi eside okudinga ukulungiswa ngokushesha.” Uthe umkhandlu oqinisekisa izingabunjalo lika-matric, Umalusi, kufanele uqinisekise ukuthi ugunyaza amaphepha abhalwayo aleli banga angenawo amaphutha.“Kumele Umalusi usheshise nendaba yokukhipha izitifiketi zika-matric. Kumele wakhe nezinhlelo zokusiza intsha engatohozi ngamakhono angasiza ekutheni ithole imisebenzi.”

UMNYANGO wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal, uthi kuningi okwenzayo ukuze ulwe nokuthi izinkawu zizicanasele esibhedlela iRK Khan eChartsworth.UMnuz Ntokozo Maphisa okhulumela umnyango, uthe indawo isibhedlela  esikuyo  iChatsworth njengazo zonke izindawo ezakhele iTheku inezinkawu eziningi, kodwa umnyango kuningi osukwenzile ukuze ulwe nokuthi izinkawu zizingenele ngokuthanda esibhedlela ikakhulukazi emawodini alele iziguli." Umnyango ufisa ukuxwayisa noma ibaphi abantu abazama ukufaka ipolitiki noma ukubhebhethekisa lolu daba, benzela ukuthi  kubonakale sengathi akukho osekwenziwe ukulawula lesi simo ngempumelelo, okungelona iqiniso,"  kusho uMaphisa.Usho kanjena nje kuleli sonto leli phephandaba lithunyelelwe izithombe nama-video akhombisa izinkawu zidla ukudla kweziguli zingaphakathi ewodini. Iziguli zithi zingena ngamafasitela ngoba ahlale evuliwe ngenxa yokushisa.Kuthiwa zivele zingene seziyiviyo zizitapele ekudleni kweziguli, abasanda kulaliswa emawodini kuthiwa bavele babaleke noma bazimboze ngamashidi.Inhlangano esiza umphakathi ukuze ukwazi ukuxosha izinkawu iMonkey Helpline, ithe abaphathi besibhedlela abazilaleli izeluleko  zayo zokuthi kuhlale kunomuntu okungaba unesi ewodini ozobe ephethe ibhodlela elinamanzi eliputshuzwayo nokuthi kutshelwe imindeni ukuthi ingaletheli iziguli ukudla okuningi okuyikho okuheha izinkawu.

LILOLIWE izembe kwiMeya kaMasipala waseMvoti, uMnuz Philani Mavundla, njengoba uMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu KwaZulu-Natal, usubize umhlangano ozolalela isiphakamiso sokungabethembi ubuholi bakhe.Umhlangano uzokuba ngoLwesibili, uzophinde ulalele isiphakamiso sokungabethembi ubuholi bukaSomlomo womkhandlu, uMnuz Mfundo Masondo.Lo mhlangano kwakuhlelwe ukuthi ube ngoLwesihlanu kodwa wabuye wahlehliswa.Isolezwe libone incwadi yephini lomqondisi jikelele obhekelele ezohulumeni basekhaya, uMnuz Madoda Khathide, eyazisa amakhansela omkhandlu ngomhlangano ozobanjelwa ehholo ledolobha, eMdlovane.UKhathide ubize umhlangano wakusasa emva kokuthi amakhansela omkhandlu ebhalele uMphathiswa uNkk  Bongi Sithole-Moloi, ekhala ngokuthi uMasondo uyenqaba ukuhlalisa umhlangano.Imihlangano yokukhipha ubuholi bemikhandlu ehlaliswa umnyango ijwayele ukuba nezigameko zodlame.Kule ncwadi, uKhathide uveze ukuthi ezokuphepha zizokube ziqinile emhlanganweni.“Izikhali azivumelekile emhlanganweni. Sizothatha izinyathelo ezifanele ukuze siqinisekise ukuphepha. Lokhu sikwenzela ukuqiniskisa ukuphepha kwempahla yomkhandlu nokuvimba noma yini enganzeka okubalwa kuyo nokufa kwabantu.”Okhulumela umnyango, uMnuz Siboniso Mngadi, uyiqinisekisile le ncwadi.UMavundla noMasondo bangamakhansela e-ABC.Bathola lezi zikhundla ngonyaka owedlule, emva kokuthi i-ABC ilaxaze i-IFP emkhandlwini, yaqoma i-ANC.Mumva nje, i-ABC isijikelene ne-ANC njengoba i-ANC isihlangene ne-IFP, baphakamisa ukuthi uMavundla noMasondo bakhishwe ezikhundleni.UMavundla uyigxekile imizamo yokumkhipha esikhundleni, wathi isiphakamiso sokumkhipha emandleni asikho emthethweni.“Ingakho sekuthathe isikhathi ukuthi kubizwe umhlangano. Kodwa ke ngoLwesibili kuthiwa umhlangano uzohlala. Siwulindile ke lowo mhlangano. Esikuqaphelayo ukuthi i-ANC isebenzisana ne-IFP. Akukho lapho besebenzisana khona. Sijahile ke ukuwubona umshado wabo ukuthi uzohamba kanjani.”UMavundla uthe uzondelwa ukuthi ufuna iKwaZulu-Natal ithole uzimele geqe.I-IFP inezihlalo ezingu-10, i-ANC ineziyisishiyagalolunye, i-ABC yona ineziyisikhombisa.Akucaci ukuthi I-IFP ne-ANC bazokwabelana kanjani izikhundla uma isiphakamiso sabo siphumelela.Umthombo osondelene nodaba uthe isiphakamiso esikhona esokuthi elinye iqembu lithathe isikhundla sobumeya, bese kuthi elinye lithole esephini lemeya nesikasomlomo.Njengamanje i-ANC iphethe isikhundla sephini lemeya, esiphethwe uNkk Ntombi Ngubane.

IQEMBU i-All African Alliance Movement (AAAM) lithi ilungu layo, iJaji uMogoeng Mogoeng, lisesiguqweni liyathandaza, licela izimpendulo  ngegxathu kwezepolitiki.Kuyaphithiza ezweni njengoba kubhekwe okhethweni okulindeleke ukuthi lube ngesonto elizayo, ngoLwesithathu.Amehlo abaningi athe njo kuMkhonto Wesizwe Party emuva kokuthi iNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo inqume ukuthi owayengumengameli uJacob Zuma ngeke aye ePhalamende. UZuma ngoDisemba odlule, umemezele ukuthi usehamba ne-MK, akasayingeni indaba ye-ANC.Emuva kwesinqumo seNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo bekuchwaza ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, abantu bethi uMogoeng akaphakame ahole i-MK ngoba uZuma akasayi ePhalamende.Okhulumela i-AAAM, uNksz Glory Matipile, uxoxe neSolezwe ephendula ngokuyamaniswa kukaMogoeng nokuhola i-MK, wathi bayazi ngodaba lokuyamaniswa kukaMogoeng ne-MK kodwa bacela anikwe ithuba.Uthe akusafanele le ndaba ikhulunyelwe eziko ngoba sekungaba wukwenzela phansi izwe lonke lokho.“Ubaba usalinde izimpendulo kuNkulunkulu, umatasa uyathandaza, ucela namadlozi omzabalazo wonke - oTambo noWinnie Mandela - ukuthi aphendule. Uyakhumbula ukuthi wayethe uNkulunkulu ofuna abe wumengameli. Khumbula ukuthi ubaba uZuma uwumdlali we-chess nathi ngapha singabadlali bayo,’’ kusho uNksz Matipile.UMogoeng waziwa njengendoda egxilile kakhulu okholweni, evame ukubonakala ithandaza ijulile.NgoJanuwari nonyaka, i-AAAM imemezele ukuthi yeseka i-MK okhethweni lwalo nyaka. Phambilini, uMogoeng ubelokhu ethi uNkulunkulu umtshela ukuthi uzoba umengameli wezwe kodwa akwaziwa ukuthi lokhu kuyokwenzeka kanjani.I-AAAM yethulwe ngo-2022, iholwa abaholi bezenkolo abamemezela ukuthi bafisa uMogoeng abe wumengameli. UMogoeng, odabuka eZeerust, eNorth West, waqokelwa kwesenhloko yamajaji ngoSepthemba 2011, wathatha impesheni ngo-Okthoba 2021.I-MK ibingakaphumeli obala ngokuthi ngubani ozoyihola ePhalamende emuva kokuthi inkantolo inqande uZuma. Kumanje i-MK inezikhala ezimbili ohlwini lwayo - esikaZuma nesikaMnuz uJabulani Khumalo oxoshiwe eqenjini.Okhulumela i-MK, uMnuz uNhlamulo Ndhlela, ushayelwe kaningi ucingo ethi umatasa uzobuye ashaye. Uma eshayelwa ubengatholakali.

UNGQONGQOSHE weMfundo eyisiSekelo uNkk Angie Motshekga, uchithe ukuthi banomgomo wokuvimba abafundi ukuthi bangadluleli kwamanye amabanga, ukuze izikole zithole imiphumela emihle kwa-matric.Sekuke kwakhalwa ngomkhuba wezinye izikole okuthiwa zifeyilisa abafundi ikakhulu kwaGrade 11, ukuthi bangadluleli kwa-matric ukuze zithole imiphumela emihle.UNkk Motshekga ubephendula umbuzo welungu leDA ePhalamende uMnuz Baxolile Nodada. Ubuze ukuthi ngabe umnyango unawo yini umgomo ofuze lona, nokuthi umnyango uwunqanda kanjani lo mkhuba wokungadluliswa kwabafundi abangenzi kahle ukuze izikole zithole imiphumela emihle kwa-matric?Ungqongqoshe useke wakuveza ePhalamende ukuthi kunezikole ezenza lo mkhuba wokubamba abafundi ngoba zifuna ukuthola imiphumela emihle.Okunye okuhlale kukhalwa ngakho wukuthi cishe kubafundi abayisigidi nangaphezulu abasuke beqale uGrade 1, uhhafu wabo obhala u-matric, abanye basuke besale endleleni.“Asinawo umgomo siwumnyango wokuthi sibambe abafundi bangayi kwamanye amabanga ukuze izikole zithole imiphumela emihle. Ocwaningweni esinalo oluthinta abafundi abashiya bengaqedanga ukufunda, kuvela ukuthi izibalo zabo ziyehla. Nangesikhathi kuhlasele ubhubhane iCovid-19, sanyuka isibalo sabafundi ababefunda nababhala u-matric kuleli,” kuphendula uNkk Motshekga. Ungqongqoshe uqhube wadalula ukuthi kunezikhala zothisha ezingu-31 462 ezingavaliwe kuleli.Ephendula umbuzo kaNodada uveze ukuthi iKwaZulu-Natal, yisona sifundazwe esinesibalo esiphezulu sezikhala zothisha ezingavaliwe ngoba zingu-7 044, kulandele i-Eastern Cape ngezingu-6 111, ne-Limpopo ngezingu-4 933.“Kuyaqhubeka ukuvalwa kwezikhala ezikoleni kanti alikho ikilasi elingenaye uthisha. Uma kuvela isikhala kulandwa ozosivala, abambe size sigcwaliswe,” kuchaza uNkk Motshekga. UDkt Imran Keeka weDA esifundazweni, ukhale ngokuthi baningi othisha ababhuquza emakhaya abangaqashiwe. Uthe empendulweni abayitholile abayibuze esiShayamthetho, bathole ukuthi izikole ezingu-685 azinabo othishanhloko abaqashwe ngokugcwele.“Kule mpendulo kuvele nokuthi umnyango ushoda ngamaphini othishanhloko angu-389, izinhloko zezifundo ezingu-1 215, nothisha abangu-909 abangu-post level 1. Ukungagcwaliswa kwalezi zikhala kwenza kungabi nozinzo ezikoleni zesifundazwe,” kukhononda uDkt Keeka.UDkt Keeka ukhale ngokuthi umnyango wenza izaba ngokuthi uhlale ugxeka ukunqanyulwa kwesabelomali, uthi yikhona okwenza ungakwazi ukuvala izikhala.

PHEZU kokuba othisha besifazane kuyibo abaningi emkhakheni wemfundo kuleli kodwa basembalwa abangothishanhloko bezikole.Lokhu kuvezwe nguNgqongqoshe weMfundo eyisiSekelo, uNkk Angie Motshekga, obekhuluma engqungqutheleni yokubuyekeza imigomo yeSadtu, eGoli, ngempelasonto.UNkk Motshekga uthe lide ibanga elihanjiwe ukufukula abesifazane babe sezikhundleni.Uveze ukuthi u-71% wothisha kuleli abesifazane.“Kulaba kodwa u-41% wabo abangothishanhloko. Ingxenye eningi abesilisa abangothishanhloko. Akufani khona ngoba u-66% wabesifazane bayizinhloko zeminyango.”Uveze ukuthi u-56% wabesifazane basethimbeni labaphathi ezikoleni, ama-school management teams.“Njengoba kuphela iminyaka engu-30 izwe lakhululeka, lide ibanga eselihanjiwe kwezemfundo noma singakafinyeleli lapho sifuna khona singabesifazane. Siyawubona umehluko ngoba phambilini abesifazane yayingacatshangwa nje indaba yabo. Ngezikhathi zethu sisafundisa, wawungayicabangi nje eyokuthi owesifazane angaba nguthishanhloko. Nakhona uma unguthishanhloko wawugcina ezikoleni zamabanga aphansi, ungeke ube uthishanhloko ezikoleni zamabanga aphezulu,” kusho uNkk Motshekga.Uthe ingane yomfana kumele ifundiswe ukuthi iyiveze imizwa yayo uma kukhona okungayiphethe kahle.“Akumele sifundise izingane ukuthi ngoba zingabafana, akumele zikhale. Akumele sithi uma zikhala sizibize ngokuthi zingosisi ngoba nazo zinayo imizwa. Kumele sizifundise ukuthi uma kunzima indoda iyakhala,” kuqhuba uNkk Motshekga.Uveze nokuthi izingane zamantombazane ziyaqhubeka nokwenza kahle ezifundweni zazo ukudlula abafana.Ubalule nokuthi ludla lubi udlame olubhekiswe ezinganeni ezikoleni njengoba kukhona abasebenzisa induku, wathi nakuba ikhona imigomo enqanda lokhu.UMnuz Nkosana Dolopi iPhini likaNonbhala weSadtu, uthe imigomo yenyunyana kumele ilandelwe ngaso sonke isikhathi.Uthe eminye yemigomo elawula othisha kuleli esetshensizwa wumkhandlu wothisha, iSouth African Council for Educators (SACE), yenziwa yibona.“Le migomo ithinta izinto eziningi ezifaka nothisha abasalala nabafundi. Le migomo kumele ilandelwe yingakho nathi sifuna ukubuyekeza eyeSadtu, ukubheka ukuthi isahambisana nesimo samanje.” Uveze ukuthi njengoba kungamalungu aphakamisa le migomo, okwabo njengabaholi kunguthi baqinisekise ukuthi iyalandelwa.“Njengoba kuzovotwa nje, isinqumo sithi sivotela i-ANC, okuyinto eyaziwayo. Uma wena usuphambana nalokhu, kusho ukuthi usuphambana nezinto esavumelana ngazo.”

SIYANDA isibalo sabafundi ababhala izivivinyo zika-matric besezibhedlela ngoba begula noma bekhulelwe.Lokhu kuvezwe nguNgqongqoshe weMfundo eyisiSekelo uNkk Angie Motshekga, ephendula umbuzo welungu le-DA uNksz Samantha Jane Graham, obebuze ukuthi kusuka ngo-2020, bangaki ababhale lizivivinyo besezibhedlela.Ubuze nokuthi ngabe kukhona yini umfundi oke wanqatshelwa ukubhala ngoba esesibhedlela.UNkk Motshekga uveze ukuthi ngo-2020 bangu-85 ababhala izivivinyo besezibhedlela.“Ngo-2021 bangu-140, kwathi ngo-2022 baba ngu-150 kanti ngo-2023 bangu-209 ababhalele ezibhedlela. Imigomo ethinta ukubhalwa kwezivivinyo zika-matric iyavuma ukuthi umfundi abhaliswe noma egula uma engeke akwazi ukuziyela ngqo esikhungweni sokubhalela.” Uthe amantombazane akhulelwe ayabhaliselwa ezibhedlela uma engaphilile.“Lo mfundi kudingeka ukuthi umzali wakhe afake isicelo enhlokweni yomnyango wezemfundo, ukuthi abhalele esibhedlela. Isicelo kumele silethwe nencwadi kadokotela eveza ukuthi umfundi angakwazi ukubhala futhi angamelana nengcindezi ehambisana nezivivinyo,” kusho uNkk Motshekga. Uthe uma inhloko yomnyango isisigunyazile lesi sicelo, kumele kube nemigomo elandelwayo.“Kuzoqokwa umuntu ozomgada uma ebhala, ozoqhamuka ehhovisi lesifunda. Ihhovisi lesifunda kumele libheke isimo sesibhedlela ukuthi umfundi angakwazi ukubhala izivivinyo zakhe. Okubalulekile ngukuthi lapho ezobhalela khona kumele lelo gumbi liqhele nalapho kukhona khona ezinye iziguli, kuqiniswe nezokuphepha.” Uthe ozobe egadile kumele alandele imigomo uma ehambisa noma eselanda amaphepha okubhala.Uveze ukuthi kumele abekwe ngendlela ezohambisana nalawo asesikhungweni obekumele abhalele kusona.“Asikaze sibikelwe ukuthi kukhona umfundi owagcina engabhalanga nakuba isicelo sakhe sasigunyaziwe sokubhalela esibhedlela. Uma kungukuthi sikhona isehlakalo esifuze lesi sicela ukubikelwa ngaso ukuze siphenye, bese sithatha izinyathelo ezifanele,” kusho uNkk Motshekga.Uthe uma kukhona isehlakalo esifuze lesi sizobe sifana nokungawenzi umsebenzi kwalabo abanikwe umyalelo ngumnyango.Umnyango unemigomo ekhishelwe izikole ebalula ukuthi umfundi okhulelwe akangaxoshwa.Kule migomo equkethwe emthethweni iBasic Education Laws Amendment Bill, ibalula ukuthi umfundi okhulelwe kumele asekwe ngezinto zokufunda aze abelethe.Uma esebelethile kumele abuyele esikoleni ngokushesha azoqhubeka nezifundo zakhe.Umnyango ukwenza lokhu ngoba ungafuni kube nabafundi abazogcina sebelaxaza isikole bengaqedanga.

Kuboshwe iphoyisa leTactical Response Team (TRT) elisolwa ngokuzama ukubamba inkunzi lihlomile abantu abalehlule ngamandla base “bexoxa” nalo ngaphambi lokulinikela kozakwabo ukuthi liboshwe.Leli phoyosa elinguSayitsheni elisebenzela iTRT eKapa belijutshwe ePort St Johns, e-Eastern Cape.Okhulumela amaphoyisa e-Eastern Cape uLieutenant Colonel Siphokazi Mawisa, uthe isigameko senzeke eMthumbane ngoLwesithathu.“Ngokwemibiko, kusolwa ukuthi uSayitsheni ojutshwe ePort St Johns ubebamba inkunzi kuhlonyiwe lapho eshaywe khona ngabagilwa eMthumbane, ePort St Johns. Imininingwane iveza ukuthi ngesikhathi ebamba inkunzi, unqotshwe ngabagilwa base bemphuca isibhamu. Babikele amaphoyisa bawanikeza nesibhamu,” kusho uLt Colonel Mawisa.Uthe umsolwa ubhekene necala lokutholakala nesibhamu esinngekho emthethweni nokubamba inkunzi kanti uphenyo lusaqhubeka.“Uma eseluleme ekulimaleni uzobe esevela enkantolo yeMantshi yasePort St Johns.Umkhuzi wamaphoyisa e-Eastern Cape, uLt General Nomthetheleli Mene uzugxekile izenzo zobugebengu embuthweni. Uthe ukuboshwa kwaleli phoyisa kukhombisa ukuthi ngeke bawabekezelele amaphoyisa enza ubugebengu ekubeni umsebenzi wabo kuwukulwa nobugebengu nokuvikela izakhamizi.

NKOSIKHONA CELEUMSAKAZI weMbokodo FM ongaconsi phansi kubalaleli, uMfu Bhelebane Bhele webandla iChosen Generation uzokuba nenkonzo yamazwi ayisikhombisa yamabandla ehlukene ngoMgqibelo.Le nkonzo ezoqala ngehora leshumi ekuseni uyethe elokuthi yiNational Pre -Pass Over kanti izokuba senkundleni yezemidlalo yaseThekwini, iCurries Fountain.Inhloso yayo enkulu uthe ukuhlanganisa amabandla ehlukene enze amazwi ayisikhombisa endawonye ngaphambi kokuba aye emabandleni awo.Uthe ayikho into emqoka ngaphezulu kokubona amabandla ehlangene ndawonye."Inhloso enkulu yale nkonzo ukuhlanganisa amabandla ukuba enze ndawonye inkonzo yamazwi ayisikhombisa. Lokhu kubalulekile kakhulu. Kuzobasiza nalabo abangeke balithole ithuba lokuya ezinkonzweni zePhasika,'' usho kanje.Uveze ukuthi kuzokube kungabefundisi abehlukene abazoshiyelana inkundla ngamazwi ayisikhombisa.Phakathi kwabo ngoMphostoli Sandile Msimang webandla iThy Will Ministries, Mfu Zweli Dlamini we-Apostolic Faith Mission in South Africa (AFMSA), Mbhishobhi Thanda Zulu we-Utterance of His Voice Bible Church International, Mphostoli PD  Ngcobo weCity Church Intenational, noMbhishobhi BM Buthelezi weRestoration and Worship Centre International (RWCI).Minyaka yonke lo msakazi ujwayele ukuthi abe nalo luhlobo lwenkonzo. Ushayela uhlelo iChosen Genaration olungena njalo ngoMsombuluko kuya kuLwesithathu ngehora lesi-7h00 - 10h00.

INKANTOLO eNkulu yaseThekwini imlahle ngamacala umshayeli wetekisi owadlwengula wabulala ayephuza naye.USamkelo Victus Dube (33) ubebhekene necala lokudlwengula aphinde abulale umufi, uNkzs Sbahle Faith Biyela (17) eFolweni, ngo-Okthoba 5, 2022.Ubebekwe necala lokushaya alimaze umngani kamufi ophinde waba ngufakazi kuleli cala, uNksz Thandiwe  Princess Shange.UDube kuthiwa wayeshayela amatekisi asuka eFolweni eya eThekwini. Ngosuku lwesehlo kuthiwa ephuma emsebenzini ntambama wahlangana nomufi ehamba noNksz Shange.Kuthiwa wababuza ukuthi bayaphi, bamphendula ngokuthi bayothenga utshwala.Kuthiwa uDube wahamba nabo waya endlini yakhe wabatshela ukuthi bangakhathazeki uyena ozothenga utshwala.UDube waphuma wayothenga utshwala, kuvela ukuthi wabuya ephethe ugologo nesinye isiphuzo esinamaphesenti eqile ayekade engaphathiswanga sona.Esebuyela endlini bambuza ukuthi kungani wathenga ugologo nesiphuzo abangasicelanga, wabaphendula ngokuthi yibona obebukhona.Ugologo kuthiwa wawuminya mawala uDube, ngemuva kwalokho waqala wacathamela umufi njalo uma ephuma eyochama.Akagcinanga lapho kuthiwa wancoma nephenti likamufi elimnyama, wathi useyahluleka ukuzibamba ngoba ufake iphenti elinombala awuthandayo.Lobu ubufakazi obanikezelwa nguNksz Shange ngaphambilini enkantolo. Sebegoduka umufi noNksz Shange kuthiwa wavuka umbhejazane wakheqa umufi emnqabela ukuthi ahambe waze wamgwaza esiphongweni nge-screwdriver.Izolo, iJaji uBroos Bedderson limthole enecala lokushaya, lokudlwengula nelokubulala."Inkantolo ikuthola unecala lokushaya ngenhloso yokulimaza futhi ikuthola unecala lokudlwengula nelokubulala. Okubuhlungu ukuthi awuzange nakanye ukhombise ukuzisola,’’ lisho kanjena.Liqhuba, likhale ngokuthi uDube wayehubhuza akabhejane uma etshela inkantolo ukuthi waphaphama ekuseni sekunesidumbu phambi kwakhe.UBedderson ukhale nangesihluku esakhonjiswa uDube njengoba esebenzise ubufakazi bukaSayitsheni Mjabulelwa Mbeko owaveza ukuthi isidumbu sasinenqwaba yamanxeba emzimbeni, kunendwangu emhlophe esasishuthekwe yona emlonyeni, ubhodisi ususiwe, nemilenze ivuleke kakhulu nesitho sangasese sihlezi obala.“Indlela isidumbu iphoyisa elithi laliyisona kuveza ngokusobala ukuthi ungumuntu wesilisa onesihluku. Kungumsebenzi wezinkantolo ke ukubasusa emehlweni omphakathi abantu abafana nawe,’’ kusho ijaji.UDube wakhalelwa ngamasongo kaSigonyela ngo-Okthoba 13, esecashe emzini kanina oseChesterville.Kuvele nokuthi uDube ngaphambilini, wake wadlwengula intombazane engumakhelwane wakhe ngokuhamba kwesikhathi agcina esethandana nayo.Amalungu omndeni kamufi asishayele ihlombe isinqumo senkantolo.Namhlanje kulindeleke ukuthi inkantolo imgwebe uDube.

I-INTERPOL idlulisele emaphoyiseni imishini esho ngaleso sikhathi uma umuntu ekuleli ngokungemthetho noma uma uhamba ngemoto eyebiwe.Le mishini inikwe amaphoyisa uNobhala-jikelele we-Interpol, uDkt Jurgen Stock osohambeni lwezinsuku ezimbili eNingizimu Afrika.Imishini yamukelwe uMkhuzi wamaPhoyisa, uGeneral Fannie Masemola.Okhulumela amaphoyisa kuzwelonke, uBrigadier Athlenda Mathe, uthe imishini izolekelela ngokuthi ube impumelelo umsebenzi wamaphoyisa wokulwa nobugebengu.“Uzositshela ngaleso sikhathi uma umuntu engene eNingizimu Afrika ngendlela engekho emthethweni futhi uma imoto iduniwe noma yebiwe,” kusho uBrig Mathe.Umbutho wamaphoyisa kuleli uyingxenye yamazwe omhlaba ayilungu lale nhlangano.Khonamanjalo, athelekile eParis, eFrance amaphoysa angu-15 asophikweni iPublic Order Policing (POP) azoba ingxenye yazobe eqaphe emidlalweni yama-olympic evulwa ngokusemthethweni ngoLwesihlanu.

UMMELI wabamangalelwa ecaleni lokufa kukaSenzo Meyiwa, u-Advocate Zandile Mshololo, ubuze ukuthi kungani abaphenyi bengayibophanga intombi kamufi uKelly Khumalo?UMeyiwa owayeyisilomo se-Orlando Pirates neBafana Bafana, wadutshulwa wabulawa ekubo kwentombi yakhe uKelly eVosloorus, eGauteng, ngo-2014. Kushushiswa abalisa abahlanu okuthiwa yibona abaqashwa bamkakisa okwenyamazane uMeyiwa, bamjuqa.U-Adv Mshololo, omele ummangalelwa wesihlanu uFisokuhle Ntuli, ubepheka ngemibuzo umphenyi wecala uSergeant Batho Mogola ngesikhathi ebuza indaba kaKelly.U-Adv Mshololo ubuze kumphenyi ukuthi ngoba basibhala isicelo sencwadi yokuboshwa kukaKelly, bavinjwa yini ukusihambisa?“Uyazi yini ukuthi isicelo sencwadi yokubopha uKelly sabhalwa kodwa sangahanjiswa? Kungani leso sicelo singathunyelwanga?” kubuza u-Adv Mshololo.UMogola uthe akazi ukuthi incwadi yokubopha uKelly yavinjwa yini. Phambilini, umphenyi wecala ohola ithimba uBrigadier Bongani Gininda, waqinisekisa ukuthi basibhala isicelo kodwa bangasiqedela.Ezitatimendeni ezemukelwe yinkantolo njengobufakazi, kuvela ukuthi abamangalelwa bathi babeqashwe wuKelly ukuthi bajuqe uMeyiwa.Ngesikhathi abamangalelwa bevela enkantolo okokuqala, kwaputshuka ipheshana elalikhuluma ngokuthi kusafanele kutholwe amarekhodi eselula kaKelly.U-Adv Mshololo ubuze nangedokodo lesibili elimaqondana nakho ukufa kukaMeyiwa nakhona uKelly awumsolwa kulona.“Uyazi yini ngelinye idokodo maqondana nalolu daba elinabamangalelwa abangekho la enkantolo?’’ kubuza u-Adv Mshololo. UMphenyi uthe uyazi ngedokodo lesibili elinabanye abasolwa okukhona kubona uKelly.U-Adv Mshololo ukhulume nangobufakazi  bokuthi ummangalelwa wesihlanu uNtuli wayexhumana noKelly. Ubuze ukuthi kuyicala yini ukuthi abantu baxhumane?Phambilini, kuke kwavela ukuthi uNtuli wayexhumana noKelly ngocingo ezinzulwini zobusuku ngaphambi kwezinsuku zokufa kukaMeyiwa.UMbuso uthi uNtuli omelwe wuMshololo, nguyena owashayela iPolo Vivo, eyayinabamangalelwa kuyobulawa uMeyiwa futhi wama ngaphandle komuzi nabanye.Kumanje uNtuli udonsa isigwebo soxhaxha lodilikajele ngamacala okubulala nokuthiwa wayeqashwa eyinkabi eqeda ngabantu.Kulindeleke ukuthi icala liqhubeke namuhla, abameli bafake eminye imibuzo kufakazi woMbuso owumphenyi.

UCABANGA ukulivuma icala uNkk Faith Ntombela obhekene nelokubulala umyeni wakhe owayeyiphoyisa lomkhandlu weTheku, uCaptain Zwelakhe Ntombela.Lokhu kuvezwe umshushisi, u-Advocate Kristen Shaah eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini.Ubekade etshela iJaji uBruce Bedderson ngokuhlelwa nguNkk Ntombela ongumsolwa wokuqala kuleli cala."Umsolwa wokuqala kuleli cala uhlela ukuthi alivume icala lokubulala,'' kusho umshushisi etshela ijaji.Ngaleso sikhathi, uNkk Ntombela ubebonakala ethule ebheke phansi enganyakazi. Kulokhu ubebonakala engahleki, esaba nokubheka abantu abebesenkantolo.Umshushisi uveze nokuthi nenkabi uCele, icabanga ukwenza okufanayo, ngaphandle kukaKhumalo ongummangalelwa wesithathu kuleli cala.Ijaji alizange limbuze uNkk Ntombela ukuthi kuyiqiniso yini lokhu okushiwo ngumshushisi wecala.Ngaphambilini, Isolezwe lake lakuveza ukuthi litholile ngemithombo yalo ukuthi ucabanga ukulivuma icala uNkk Ntombela osolwa ngokuba ungqondongqondo wetulo lokubulawa komyeni wakhe.Umufi wahlaselwa esemzini wakhe okwaS, eMlaza, ngoMeyi 3, ngonyaka owedlule.Ngesikhathi edutshulwa umufi, uNkk Ntombela wayekhona ngaphakathi endlini kodwa kuvela ukuthi akazange azihluphe ngokuyobheka emnyango.Wadutshulwa ngabantu abangaziwa wabe esephuthunyiswa esibhedlela eSiphingo Medical Towers okuyilapho okwafike kwamenela khona.Ngemuva kwalokho, amaphoyisa abopha inkabi uSipho Ntombela okwavela ukuthi iyona eyadubula.Le nkabi yageqa amagula ilandisa inkantolo ngalo lonke itulo, yaveza nokuthi yayikade ithunywe nguNkk Ntombela.Yaveza nokuthi yayikhokhelwe imali engakanani ukuze yenze lo msebenzi. Inkantolo yabe seyiyigweba iminyaka ewu-15 ibhadla ejele.Ngemuva kwalokho, noNkk Ntombela wakhalelwa ngamaSongo kaSigonyela ngaleli cala.Kwavela nokuthi uNkk Ntombela itulo wayelihlanganisa noMnuz Sithembiso Justice Khumalo onguthishanhloko esikoleni iMpumulwane Primary, KwaMaphumulo, ongaphandle ngebheyili.Kwavela negama lenkabi esatshwayo KwaZulu-Natal, uKhulani Cele, ukuthi nayo iyabandakanyeka kuleli tulo.Icala lihlehlele u-Agasti 15. UMnuz Nkosinathi Ntombela ongumfowabo kamufi, uthe bajabule ukuthi umakoti wabo useze wathambisa inhliziyo."Ukuhamba leli cala kuyasikhathaza kakhulu futhi kusivusela amanxeba. Ngakho  kuyajabulisa lokhu okuvezwe ngumshushisi kokuthi ucabanga ukulivuma icala,'' usho kanjena.

Isuse ukukhuluma iMeya yaseGoli, uMnuz Dada Morero ngesiphakamiso sayo sokuthi abantu bangaphandle bafakwe embuthweni wamaphoyisa omkhandlu ukulwisana nobugebengu.Kwi-video esabalele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, uMorero uzwakala ethi uhlale ebuza ukuthi awekho amaphoyisa akhuluma ngisho olulodwa ulimi lwakwamanye amazwe ase-Afrika.“Ingqinamba wukuthi silwe nobugebengu. Ungaba nabo bonke abasolwa bakho la kodwa ngaphambi kokuthi ubhale izitatimende bangahlela phambi kwakho ukuthi bazothini wena ungezwa ukuthi bathini,” kusho uMorero.Uthe  uma bezimisele ngokulwa nobugebengu ku-ward 67, bangabaqasha abantu bangaphandle abanamaphepha aqondile ukuthi basebenzele amaphoyisa aseGoli.Unbelievable @HermanMashaba @GaytonMcK pic.twitter.com/PPaeED0anQEchaza esiteshini sezindaba e-eNCAuMorero, uthe bebesemhlanganweni we-ANC esifundeni eGoli futhi umhlangano kumele ukhulume ngazo zonke izinto ezibathintayo eGoli. Uthe enye yezinto abebekhuluma ngazo bekuyinkinga yobugebengu.Uthe emhlanganweni kubekwe kwacaca ukuthi isiphakamiso ngeke siphumelele ngokuthi kumele kubekwe phambili abantu bakuleli.Umholi we-Action SA uMnuz Herman Mashaba, uthe ngeke baseseke isiphakamiso.“Umgomo wokuqala ukuze usebenze kwiJMPD uthi kumele ube ngowaseNingizimu Afrika futhi okwesibili sinenqwaba yabaneziqu abalindele ukusebenza.”I-EFF eGauteng ithe ayihambisani nesiphakamiso. Ithe uma kunenkinga yolimi uhulumeni kumele uqeqeshe amaphoyisa ukuze akwazi ukuxhumana kangcono nemiphakathi asebenza kuyo.“Abukho ubufakazi obuveza okushiwoyo kokuthi iJMPD neSAPS bayahluleka ukulwa nobugebengu ezindaweni ezinabantu abaningi bokufika ngenxa yokuvinjwa wulimi.”

UKhomishana wamaPhoyisa kaMasipala weTheku uSibonelo Mchunu uthi amaphoyisa akhe anelungelo lokushaqa imoto eshintshwe i-suspension yakhasa phansi.Wumkhuba owandile kuleli dolobha ukuthi abashayeli bashune izimoto zabo bazenze zikhase phansi okuwumkhuba odume ngokuthi yi-stance.UMchunu uthe akukho emthethweni ukwenza izinguquko eziphazamisa indlela imoto ebambelela ngayo emgwaqweni noma ijubane layo.Ubekhuluma neSolezwe ngemuva kwezikhalo zabanye abashayeli, amaphoyisa eshaqe izimoto zabo ngenxa yokuthi zikhasa phansi kunendlela eziphuma zakhiwe ngayo emagaraji.Omunye wabashayeli onemoto eyehlisiwe uMnuz Sphamandla Shabane, uthe kuyamthusa ukuthi amaphoyisa aseyazishaqa manje izimoto ezihushayo.“Uma kuwumthetho okhona obhaliwe phansi, anginankinga nawo. Kuyathusa kodwa kithina singabashayeli ngoba lento isiqala ukuvela manje ngoba sekudume “ingezo” nokuyinto edume nyakenye lapho abashayeli besuke betsaka ngobunono nobuhle bezimoto edume emalokishini amaningi. Le nto yezimoto ezihushayo akuyona into yamanje kodwa ingenise kakhulu ngenhloso yokugqugquzela ukuthi izimoto zibe zinhle ukuze abagibeli bezothokozela ukugibela izimoto ezihlanzekile. Kusho ukuthi lo mthetho ubukhona kodwa ubunganakekile ngoba bezingandile kakhulu izimoto ezinjalo kodwa kuyathusa,” kusho uShabane.UMchunu uthe kuyicala ukushintsha imoto uyenze ikhase phansi.“Wonke amaphoyisa anelungelo lokuthi ayishaqe imoto ayibona ukuthi ayikho semthethweni ukuthi ibe semgwaqweni. Amaphoyisa ayazi ukuthi imoto kumele iphakame kangakanan futhi nokuxebula -idisc yemoto kuba kulo iphoyisa uma libona ukuthi  ayikufanele ukuba semgwaqweni. Inhloso yephoyisa ngokwenza leso senzo ukuthi linqande ingozi engenzeka engafaka impilo yabantu abaningi engcupheni,” kusho uMchunu.Ngokomthetho we-National Road Traffic Act 93 wango-1996, ukuguqulwa  noma ukuphazamisa ukuphepha kwendlela imoto eyakhiwe ngayo kwenza imoto ingabibikho semthethweni noma ingakufaneli ukuba semgwaqweni ngaphandle kokuthi lokho kwenziwe lapho imoto yakhiwe khona.

KUHLUKENE imibono kumalungu omphakathi waseNhlonga, ku-ward 13 ngaphansi kukaMasipala waseMsinga, ngesakhiwo esiyihholo sika-R480 000, okuthiwa lakhelwa inkosazana yamanzi osebeni lomfula wumasipala, emva kwesibonakaliso somthandazi.Leli hholo kuthiwa akuvumelekile ukuthi lisetshenziswe yinoma wubani ukugwema ulaka lwenkosazana yasemanzini. Livulwa uma kukhona umthandazi kuphela ezobamba inkonzo khona. Amanye amalungu omphakathi akholwa wukuthi ukwakhiwa kwalo kwehlisa izingozi nokufa kwabantu ababefela kulesi siziba njengoba bekholwa ukuthi bekuwulaka lwayo. Abaphikisana nalokho, bagxeka umasipala ngokuchitha imali ngabakubiza ngenkoleloze yabathile ekubeni intuthuko igqoza endaweni.Elinye ilungu lomphakathi eselikhulile, lilandisa ekhasini lika-Ayanda Msweli kwi-You Tube, lithe izigameko zokufa kwabantu esizibeni okukholakala ukuthi ihlala kuso, bezibhilitile phambilini, ngaphambi kokulandwa komthandazi okwazi ukukhuluma nayo okuwuyena owaveza ukuthi ifuna ukwakhelwa.“Kwathi uma abesifazane beyibona ngelinye ilanga babikela amadoda ayengayikholwa ukuthi ikhona. Amabili agijima eyobheka esizibeni, omunye wangena kuso, kwaba ukuphela kwakhe bamkhipha esethule. Kwesinye isikhathi izikebhe zabelungu uma bentweza, bezifika zicishe kulesi siziba, baze banikele ngemali emhlophe kuyima bekwazi ukudlula, okuyizimpawu zokuthi bekukhona okukhona kusona,” usho kanje.Uthe umphakathi wasukuma wathungatha umthandazi okwazi ukukhuluma nayo, okuyilapho olande khona uMnuz Felize Dladla waseGreytown, eMatimalo, okuwuyena owaveza ukuthi ithi ifuna ukwakhelwa indlu yayo.Ekhuluma neSolezwe, uDladla uthe emva kokuthi umphakathi umcelile, inkosazana imtshele ukuthi ifuna umphakathi uyakhele indlu eyisitezi.  Kuthiwa umphakathi uhlanganise imali, yaqala ukwakhiwa, kodwa yona (inkosazane) yayibhidliza okuvele ukuthi yayidinwe ukwakhiwa kwayo ngabantu besifazane kanti yayifunwa ukwakhelwa ngamadoda kuphela. Umphakathi kuthiwa ufake isicelo kumasipala, wagunyaza ukuthi yakhiwe.UMnuz Mletheni Ndlovu oyikhansela kule ndawo oseke waba yimeya kulo masipala, uthe nguye owafaka isicelo ngokuthunywa wumphakathi“Bengisayikhansela ngesikhathi umphakathi uphakamisa ukuthi ucela umasipala uwusize wakhele inkosazane indlu. Ngesikhathi ngifaka isicelo, umasipala uthe akusetshenziswe isabelomali sewadi ukwakha indlu ngoba awunayo imali eyanele. Sigcine sibona kungcono ukuthi sakhe esahholo ngoba eyisitezi yayizobiza kakhulu. Sisebenzise u-R480 000 wesabelomali sonyakamali ababili ukwenza lo msebenzi,” usho kanje.Uveze ukuthi inkosazana ayihlali kuleli hholo, kodwa lisetshenziswa kuphela uma kunemicimbi eqondene nayo noma kukhona abasuke befuna ukuzonikela.Imvunge kwamanye amalungu omphakathi ivukuzwe yesinye isibonakaliso sesibili somthandazi (uDladla) njengoba kuvele ukuthi ifuna umphakathi wenzele izingane zayo umemulo.  Emhlanganweni obuyizolo kulo leli hholo lenkosazane, kuthiwa kuvunyelwene ngokuthi umuzi nomuzi ukhokhe u-R100 ukuze kuthengwe inkomo yokwenza lo mcimbi.Ilungu lomphakathi elikhulume neSolezwe elingelinye langahambisani nezibonakaliso zomthandazi ngenkosazana, lithe lidumele ngemali eyachithwa umasipala.“Kuyadumaza ukuthi umasipala ukholelwa kokushiwo umuntu kungenabo ubufakazi. Izingane zethu ziwela kanzima uma ziya esikoleni, kodwa kunemali ekhishelwa ukwakha izinto  ezingakaze zibonwe wumphakathi kodwa okuthiwa zabonwa abathile,” usho anje.Amanye amalungu omphakathi avumile ukuthi awakaze ayibone inkosazana kodwa kule ndawo akuvumelekile ukuwasha esizibeni ngoMgqibelo nokuchitha amanzi obuwasha ngawo kusona ngoba kuyayithukuthelisa.

NKOSIKHONA CELEAVUTHA engabaselwe amalungu eBandla laseZayoni, eNseleni, uKukhanya Kwezwe athi awafuni ukuphinde ambone umholi walo, amsola ngokuthi ubanjwe oqotsheni ezitika ngocansi endlini yesonto.UMbhishobhi Zwelibanzi Mtimande (59) oshadelwe, usolwa ngamalungu aleli bandla ngokuthi ngesonto eledlule ubhadanywe amalunga amane aleli bandla, ezitika ngocansi nowesifazane ohlala eduze kwesakhiwo sebandla.Lamalunga amane kuthiwa abezokwenza umsebenzi wokuhlanza indlu yesonto njengenjwayelo, azithela phezu kukamholi walo ezitika ngocansi nowesifazane okuthiwa uwumakhelwane wendlu yebandla. Ilungu lebandla elikhulume naleli phephandaba, lifunge lagomela lathi buzochitheka bugayiwe kuleli sonto uma kuya ngokuthi uMtimande uzofika ezobakhonzisa.Elinye lithe kuzoba nzima nokumbuka ngoba lesiya sithombe abazithele phezu kwaso, sizohlale sikhona."Angeke thina sishunyayezwe yisikhohlakali. Hheyi waze wangcola nangu umuntu. Uyazi ukuthi usiphoxile ngendlela nje ebesimethemba ngayo lapha ebandleni. Konke lokho manje sekumane kwashabalala nje,'' usho kanje.Kuthiwa intokazi abanjwe nayo, okuthiwa isencane, ayizange ikhombise kuhlazeka yize bese kungene namalunga ebandla. “Uvele wathi thina siyaphi ngalesiya sikhathi esontweni ngoba kunezikhathi ezibekiwe zokuthi sizohlanza indlu yesonto,” kusho omunye wabazibonele ngawakhe.Kuvela ukuthi uMtimande uyindoda ehlonishwayo ebandleni nasendaweni uqobo. Unkosikazi wakhe kuthiwa selokhu kuvele leli hlazo, akaziwa ukuthi ukuziphi izinkalo njengoba evele wahamba nasekhaya.
