Omunye kulaba abazibonele uthe uMtimande uzamile ukubavala umlomo ngemali kodwa banqaba. “Besizoba nelikhulu iphutha ukuvuma ukuthula namanyala, nokwenza enzeke endlini yebandla,” usho kanje.Lo wesifazane walile obelokhu ebabaze uhlobo locansi abebelwenza, uthe akafuni nokuluchaza ephaphandabeni kodwa akubonile uyokuxoxela amagwababa echobana.Ethintwa uMtimande, akaphikanga ukuthi ubesendlini yokukhonza nalo wesifazane, kodwa uthe abambonile mhlawumbe badidwe wukuthi owesifazane ubengagqokile kwesingenhla, esele ngobhodisi.Uthe kodwa yena ubemthandazela. Ukhale ngezimpi zangaphakathi ebandleni, wathi kukhona abanye abaholi abamkhandela uzungu ngoba befuna ukuhola ibandla.Uqhubeke ngokuthi uNkulunkulu oyomphendulela njengoba ebhecwa ngobende inyama engayidlanga nje. "Nabo labo abathi bangibambile bayazi ukuthi owesifazane ubeguqile mina ngimile ngikhuleka. Kodwa uma sebekhetha ukuthi bangibukanise nomhlaba ngokungiqambela amanga kulungile. Owami uNkulunkulu uyashesha ukuphendula,'' usho kanje.Kuvela ukuthi ngaphakathi ebandleni sekuqubuke omkhulu umsindo njengoba kukhona abathi akaxolelwe uMtimande ngakwenzile. Abanye kuthiwa bashaya phansi ngonyawo bathi inkomo ingazala umuntu.UMfu Ntokozo Makhathini ongunobhala webandla ukhombise ukungathandi ukuphawula ngalolu daba ngesikhathi ethintwa. Ubelokhu ethi akazi ukuthi intatheli ikhuluma ngani.

SEKUQUBUKE umsindo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, ikakhulu kwi-X, ngenxa yezindaba zokudlulela esigabeni sabawu-13 bokugcina emncintiswaneni wokumodela uMiss South Africa, kukaChidimma Adetshina, abantu abathile abashaya amakhala ngokungenela kwakhe lo mncintiswano othathwa njengomkhulu yokumodela ezweni.Okushukumise izinto futhi kwadala ukwehlukana kwemibono kubantu wukuthi ubaba kaChidimma (23) ngowaseNigeria, kuthi unina owaseMozambique kodwa wakhulela kuleli. Kuvele ukuthi lo nobuhle wazalelwa kwesinye sezibhedlela zaseGoli, wakhulela eSoweto.Kwi-video eyangenela ngayo uMiss SA, le ntokazi eyenza izifundo zomthetho eVarsity College, yazichaza ukuthi ingunobuhle ophokophelayo nonamaphupho waseKapa.Abantu banikele kwi-X besho imibono yabo ngalolu daba.U-@Mbalinsimbini uthe: “Umbuzo wami wukuthi umele luphi uhlanga? Uma enqoba uzomela bani, futhi yiluphi ulimu lwakuleli zwe akwazi ukulikhuluma? UMiss SA usuyinhlekisa.”U-@YesThatRuss ubhale wathi: “UMiss SA ngowabantu bakuleli zwe, njengoba nokwenziwa eNigeria kwenzelwa abantu bakhona. Yekani ukuthatha izinto zethu nizinike abantu bakwamanye amazwe.”U-@NokulungaZulu2 yena uthe: “UMiss SA owabantu baseNingizimu Afrika, akahambe eyoncintisana nabakubo eNigeria.”U-@ShottaZee uthe: “Abantu baseNingizimu Afrika kuphela abafike bavikele abadlali bebhola baseFrance abamnyama ukudlalela leliya lizwe, bese bezogxeka umuntu ongenele uMiss SA ngokwenza okufanayo. Awukwazi ukushintsha imithetho ngoba nakhu sekuyinto eqondene nawe, yenza okukodwa.”Akuqali ukuba nomsindo ngemithetho nendlela inhlangano iMiss South Africa eyenza ngayo uma iqoka onobuhle abazongenela umncintiswano wayo.Ngonyaka odlule, kwasuka umsindo nempikiswano ngenkathi imemezela ukuthi umncintiswano wayo usuzongenelwa wonobuhle abashadile nabanezingane, into ebikade ingavumelekile eminyakeni edlule.Kuthintwa okhulumela iMiss SA Organisation, uJanine Walker, ucingo lwakhe belukhala umlibe lungabanjwa. Kwale ngisho esethintwa kwiWhatsApp, wangaphendula imibuzo abethunyelwe yona ngalolu daba.Umcimbi wokuklomelisa ozonqoba kulo mncintiswano, nozobe ethatha isicoco kuNatasha Joubert onqobe nyakenye, uzoba se-SunBet Arena, ePitoli ngo-Agasti 10.

UNETHEMBA lokuthi usuzokwazi ukufihla ithambo lawo ngesizotha, umndeni wowesilisa osekuphele izinyanga ezinhlanu anyamalala okukholakala ukuthi esakhe isidumbu okuthiwa sigqitshwe ethuneni elingashoni, KwaMaphumulo.Lishone elangoLwesithathu amaphoyisa ematasa kumbiwa lapho kukholakala ukuthi isidumbu sikaMnuz Msizi ‘Manyosi’ Mchunu (24), sagqitshwa khona.  Lokhu kungemuva kokuthi kuthiwa amaphoyisa aqinise isandla kumsolwa wagonyuluka wakhomba lapho uMchunu agqitshwa khona. Kuthiwa wayegcine ukubonwa nabangani bakhe ngoSepthemba 25, 2023 bejahwa abesilisa ababexabane nabo endaweni yokucima ukoma, eNtshawini KwaDukuza.Bese kuphele izinyanga ezinhlanu umndeni umthungatha, kanti kuthiwa omunye wabasolwa emva kokuthi amaphoyisa eqinise isandla, ugcine ekhombile lapho kwagqitshwa khona isidumbu sikaMchunu.Uyise kaMsizi uMnuz Bongani Mthembu ekhuluma neSolezwe elapho bekuyombiwa khona, uthe kudingeke ukuthi udaba lwakhe alubike emaphoyiseni ezingeni lesifunda ngoba bekungekho okuqhubekayo ngokulahleka kwendodana yakhe.“Sihleli lapha kulindwe amaphoyisa athile okuyiwona anegunya lokumba isidumbu. Kuthiwa umsolwa obeboshiwe wabuye wadedelwa ngebheyili ukhombe lapha, ngakho silindile uma kungesakhe isidumbu, sesizokwazi ukumfihla ngokufanelekile,” usho kanje.Lo mndeni uthi ubusubheke yonke indawo kubalwa emakhazeni, ezibhedlela kwafunwa nasezihlotsheni kodwa lutho ukuthola umkhondo njengoba ubusukhalela ukufihla ithambo lawo.Elandisa ngokwenzeke ngosuku lwesigameko uthe bathole ukuthi uMchunu nabangani bakhe bahilizisana nabanye besilisa endaweni yokucima ukoma, kulandela ukugwazwa komunye wabangani bakhe. Uthe owayegwaziwe bamtholela imoto bamphuthumisa esibhedlela, ngenkathi sebesendleleni kuthiwa bahlangana nequlu kukhona kulo nababehilizisane nabo.Indaba yaqala ngokuthi bamise imoto bababuze ukuthi kungani begwaze umngani wabo, iqulu lavele ladubula.Uthe umngani kaMchunu owayeshayela imoto wadubuleka, kodwa wakwazi ukuqhubeka wabaleka ngayo waze wayofika esibhedlela. UMchunu kuthiwa wayegcine ukubonwa ngesikhathi bemjaha ebaleka ngezinyawo kwaba ukunyamalala kwakhe.UMthembu uthe emva kokudedelwa ngebheyili komsolwa owabekwa icala lokuzama ukubulala, kuthiwa ubebhala epikla ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.Kuthiwa kusize amaphoyisa akwazile ukusebenzisa izindlela zawo njengoba egonyulukile wakhomba lapho kugqitshwe khona isidumbu sengane yakhe.Yize kuze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela amaphoyisa engakaphenduli, kodwa umndeni uqinisekise ukuthi umsolwa oboshiwe uyena okhombe lapho kugqitshwe isidumbu okusolwa okuthi esikaMchunu okuthiwa izinsalela zaso zithathiwe zagcinwa emakhazeni kusalindwe imiphumela yolibofuzo.

SEKUBALWA izinsuku ezimbalwa aqale ama-Olympic akulo nyaka eParis eFrance, wonke amazwe abamba iqhaza emidlalweni ehlukene kulo mncintiswano asemi ngomumo ukwenza ezibukwayo.Njengamanje, amazwe ahlukene asekhiphe ingqephu ehlukene okuyimifaniswano ezogqokwa abadlali emcimbini wokuvula, uma kutholwa izindondo noma sekuvalwa. La mazwe apike abasiki bengqephu abadumile nabangaziwa, kusukela kuRalph Lauren Suits wethimba lase-USA kuya ekubukekeni kwegciwane le-Mongolia nokunye.Njengoba isizungeza kuzo zonke izinkundla zokuxhumana le ngqephu, yinye into ecacile, wukuthi i-mongolia ihamba yodwa ngobuhle, ikhwalithi nesitayela. Bonke abantu bavumelana ngokuthi uMachel Amazonka ubashaye bonke emakhanda.Izwe elibonakala lenza kancane i-Australia. Izintokazi ezimbili zinikele kuTiktok ziveza lo mswenko zithokozile kodwa zangamukelwa ngendlela ebezicabanga ngayo.Ithimba lasekhaya iFrance lithungelwe uBerluti kanti umswenko wabo wokuvulwa komcimbi ngamasudi ohlobo lwe-tuxedo abesilisa nabesifazane. Umswenko wabo wokwamukela izindondo bawenzelwe nguStéphane Ashpool ongumqondisi wezobuciko nomsunguli we-Pigalle.Umswenko wamanye amazwe:

BAZOHLANGANA nemamba iphuza umhluzi abantu abasabisa ngodlame nezenzo zokuphulwa komthetho uma sekukhishwe imiphumela yokhetho.Lesi sixwayiso esishubile sikhishwe wuhlaka longqongqoshe beminyango ebhekele ezokuphepha kuleli, iNational Joint Operational and Intelligence Structure (Natjoints) esithangamini sabezindaba.INatjoints ithi yenelisekile ngokugcinwa kokuthula nokuphepha okubonakale ngokhetho, nakuba kukhona ababoshiwe.Labo ngqongqoshe baphendule imibuzo yezintatheli mayelana nenkulumo yowayengumengameli wezwe ne-ANC, uJacob Zuma.UZuma, ubulungu bakhe obumisiwe kwi-ANC futhi osengumholi weqembu uMkhonto weSizwe Party, uthe ayikho imiphumela yokhetho ezomenyezelwa yi-IEC (izolo) ingakabaphenduli izikhalazo zabo.Uthe kumele i-IEC iqale ibenelise ukuthi ikubhekile abebekade bekhala ngakho“Ayikho imiphumela ezomenyezelwa. Uma kwenzeka, kuyosho ukuthi siyachukuluzwa ngoba siyayazi into esikhuluma ngayo, asiqageli. Kungani bejaha ukubala? Ngiyathemba obhekele lokhu uyangizwa, ningayiqali inkinga uma ingekho,” kusho uZuma.UNgqongqoshe wezokuVikela noMakadebona bezeMpi, uNkk Thandi Modise, uthe amasosha afika emva kwendaba ngomtapo ngoJulayi 2021, nokuyinto eyabavula amehlo engasoze iphinde yenzeke.Ufungile wathi bami ngomumo bazofika ngesikhathi uma bedingeka.“Akukho namunye ozobekezelelwa uma ephazamisa amalungelo ezinye izakhamizi. Nakuba abantu benelungelo lokukhuluma bezwakalisa izimvo zabo, kodwa lelo lungelo linomkhawulo,” uNksz Thandi Modise enxenxa abantu bathobele umthetho.Uthe bazongenelela uma leli lungelo lokukhuluma libeka engcupheni impilo yomuntu nempahla.UNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa, uMnuz Bheki Cele ushayelele isipikili, wathi akukhathaleki ukuthi uwubani kodwa uzojeza kanzima lowo ozoke aphule umthetho.Ukhumbuze abantu wathi kumanje bagqigqa inkantolo abammangalelwa abevile ku-60 abathweswe amacala okuvukela uMbuso nokuphehla izibhelu zangoJulayi 2021.UKhomishana wamaPhoyisa, uGeneral Fannie Masemola, uthe kuboshwe abantu abangu-90 ngesikhathi sokuvota, kwavulwa amacala angu-130.UNgqongqoshe eHhovisi likaMengameli, uNksz Khumbudzo Ntshavheni, uthe abaholi bezepolitii basayina umgomo wokuziphatha ngesikhathi sokhetho okumele awulandele. Uthe ukuphulwa kwawo kusho ukuphulwa komthetho okuhambisana nokubhekana nengalo yomthetho.

ZIDLA ngamapayipi iziguli esibhedlela eRK Khan, eChatsworth ngenxa yezinkawu ezichachaza emawodini zizitike ngokudla kwabantu.Kuleli sonto iziguli ezilele kwelinye lamawodi kulesi sibhedlela zithathe i-video yezinkawu zihleli phakathi ewodini zidla ukudla kwazo. Iziguli ezilaliswe kuleli wodi ezinesifo somdlavuza.Ngo-2019 owayenguNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo ngaleso sikhathi uDkt Aaron Motsoaledi, wazifikela mathupha kulesi sibhedlela, ngemuva kokubona i-video eyayikhombisa ogoboyi bechwayitheka phezu kwamakhethini abanye bezikholisa ngokudla kweziguli. Wathi kuqokweithimba elizolungisa lesi simo kodwa kuleli sonto kuphinde kwavela enye i-video ikhombisa onkabimalanga sebebuyele embusweni.Umthombo waleli phephandaba obuvakashele isihlobo kulesi sibhedlela, uthe ngesikhathi evakashile uthuke kakhulu ngesikhathi kungena iqulu lezinkawu ezilinganiselwa eshumini ngamafasitela ahlale evuliwe ngoba kuyashisa."Zingene ngesikhathi sezivakashi. Bekungathi isekisi iziguli ebeziqala ukuzibona zibaleka ezinye zizimboza ngamashidi. “Ezinye bezizama ukuthatha ukudla kwazo zikuvalela emakhabetheni, izinkawu zikudonsa ngenkani. Iziguli esezinesikhathi zilele kulesi sibhedlela bezithule emibhedeni yazo. Angikaze ngiyibone into enjengale. Izinkawu ziyazicanasela nje emawodini sengathi akwenzeki lutho. Uma ukhuluma nonesi ngalokhu bathi ungazichukuluzi. Ngikhathazeke ngokuthi azikho yini izifo ezingazithelela iziguli ezivele zigula njengoba zidla zichithe phezu kweziguli," kusho ongumhlobo wesinye isiguli. Uthe isihlobo sakhe esinezinsuku ezimbalwa silalisiwe esibhedlela, sithe sesifisa ukuphuma ngoba kwesinye isikhathi izinkawu zidonsa ama-drip azigcini ngokudla. UMnuz Steven Smit weMonkey Helpline eseWestville, uthe ithimba lakhe seliye kwaze kwaba kabili esibhedlela iRK Khan liyofundisa abasebenzi bakhona ukuthi bangasilawula kanjani isimo, abasebenzi bakhona bazishaya indiva izeluleko zabo."Izinkawu aziyona ingozi, uma zingachukuluziwe ngeke zihlasele muntu. Izinkawu azihluphi kuwo wonke amawodi kulesiya sibhedlela, kunathile ahlale enokudla okuningi ezingena kuwo ngoba zifuna khona. Kulula ukulawula lesiya simo kumele kuhlale kunonesi osewodini ozophatha ibhodlela elinamazi aputshuzwayo. Izinkawu zingamagwala zingaphuma zibaleka zithelwa ngamanzi." Uqhube wathi azikho izifo ezisatshalaliswa izinkawu ngokungena lapho kuneziguli khona. UMnyango weZempilo awuyiphendulanga imibuzo othunyelelwe yona.

BAZOTHOLA umthobanhliziyo kaR20 000 umuntu ngamunye abasebenzi bakwaFord abebetelekela amabhonasi akhethekile.Lezi zindaba zivezwe uNobhala Jikelele we-National Union of Metalworkers of South Africa (Numsa), uMnuz Irvin Jim.Abasebenzi bakwaFord baqale isiteleka ngoJulayi 4 bafuna ukuthi uma inkampani yenze inzuzo nabo bahleshulelwe kuleyo mali njengoba kwenzeka ezikhulwini. Bathe ngeke kwenzeke inzuzo uma bengasebenzi ngokuzikhandla.Bathe abahambisani nokuthi izikhulu zidle zodwa ekubeni nabo besebenza kanzima.UJim uthe yize iFord yayithole incwadi evimbela abasebenzi ukuba bateleke, iningi labo lathi alibuyeli emsebenzini izikhalo zabo zingaphenduliwe.“Besilokhu sixoxa nabakwa-Ford Motor Company of Southern Africa sizama ukuxazulula lolu daba, baphuma nesisombululo sokuthi bazokhokhela abasebenzi uR20 000 umuntu ngamunye ukuze babuyele emsebenzini. Lokhu akusho ukuthi sebezimisele ukucazela abasebenzi inzuzo, kodwa yindlela yabo yokuxoxisana nathi ngendlela efanele,” kusho uJim.Uthe abasebenzi babuyele emsebenzini ngokugcwele ngoLwesihlanu.“Yize iFord ithi lokhu akusho ukuthi isicazela abasebenzi inzuzo yayo, kodwa sikholwa wukuthi lesi sinyathelo sibalulekile ekukhumbuzeni izinkampani ukuba zidle nabasebenzi. Lesi simo sizosiza ekunciphiseni igebe elikhulu phakathi kwabacebile nabampofu,” kusho uJim.IFord Motor Company of Southern Africa ithe isiteleka esiqale ngoJulayi 4 sesixazululiwe ngaphandle kwezihibe.“Bonke abasebenzi akade betelekile bazobuyela emsebenzi ngoLwesihlanu (12 Julayi) ukuze kuqhubeke ukukhiqizwa kweFord Ranger efemini yethu eseSilverton,” kusho iFord esitatimendeni.

UNOBHALA we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Bheki Mtolo, uncoma ubunsizwa kusihlalo we-ANC esifundazweni, uMnuz Siboniso Duma.UMtolo uthe uDuma wakhombisa ubuqhawe ngesikhathi eyabula umbhobho kundunankulu kaZulu, uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi, owayethula iSilo uMisuzulu kaZwelithini emcimbini wokukhumbula iSilo uDinuzulu kaCetswayo.Ukusho lokhu kwisithangami nabezindaba ngoLwesithathu.UMtolo uthe kwakufanele uDuma ahlwithe uButhelezi umbhobho ngoba wafaka ipolitiki emcimbini kahulumeni.[WATCH] ANC KZN secretary Bheki Mtolo says Siboniso Duma displayed heroism and became a sacrificial lamb to save the day and prevent bloodshed by grabbing the microphone from Traditional Prime Minister Thulasizwe Buthelezi.#Newzroom405 pic.twitter.com/mSPdfLSgjzUMtolo uthe bekungekhona okokuqala uButhelezi esebenzisa isikhundla sakhe ukulwa izimpi zepolitiki, wathi wenza into efanayo ngesikhathi kunoMkhosi waMaganu esigodlweni eMachobeni.“Akwenzile eMachobeni uShenge, ubefuna ukukuphinda kwaCeza kanti akabhulanga, ikhona insizwa yakwaDuma, uMthombeni, uLwandle kaluwelwa luwelwa zinkonjane kuphela, insizwa engesabi ngakusantshiswa. Wathi ngeke phambi kwami, yimi oshayela loluhlelo, inhlekelele engenzeka lapha iyobuzwa kimi, wayivimba.“UMthombeni ubekwe esimeni sokuthi akhethe ezintweni ezimbili eziyinhlekele ebezingenzeka. Eyokuqala inhlekelele kwakungaba ukuthi amyeke aqhubeke abize amagama abantu, bese kuqubuka udlwambendlu iSilo singasakwazi nokuthula inkulumo. Eyesibili kwakuwukuthi amephuce umbhobho. UDuma wakhetha inhlekelele engcono. Ngalokho uMthombeni ube yiqhawe.”UMtolo uthe uButhelezi kufanele akhuzwe angaphinde azame ukufaka ipolitiki ezintweni ezithinta ubukhosi.“Siyafisa ukukhuza umhlolo ngesukubona kwenzeka. Isihlalo sobukhosi siyahlonishwa kodwa sibona umfoka Shenge esilulaza. UShenge ungomunye wosopolitiki abakhuluma ipolitiki begqoke ingubo yokuba nguMzulu ngenhloso yokuzihlomulela bona namaqembu abo, hhayi ngoba bevikela isihlalo.”UMtolo uthe uDuma usexolisile kwiSilo nakuMengameli, uCyril Ramaphosa, wathi basazoya endlunkulu beyoxolisa kahle.

UNobhala we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Bheki Mtolo, uthi yize bezishaya isifuba ngokuthi kuningi abakushintshile eNingizimu Afrika njengeqembu kodwa kuningi okusasele.UMtolo ubekhuluma ngesikhathi ekhankasa eFolweni, eThekwini, njengoba kusondela izinsuku zokhetho lukazwelonke oluzoba ngoMeyi 29.“Sikuqonda kahle njengo-ANC ukuthi umsebenzi wokushintsha iNingizimu Afrika usekhona, omkhulu osisalele ngoba uma ufika endaweni enjengakoBhambayi ko-ward 53 koMawoti, basekhona abasahlala emikhukhwini, abangenazo izindlu. Basekhona abantu abangakawatholi amathuba omsebenzi. Yikho ukuthi lokho esesikuzuzile kumele abantu baqhubeke bavotele i-ANC, ukwenzela ukuthi i-ANC iqhubeke nomsebenzi wokwenza impilo yabantu ibe ngcono ukuze nalaba esingakafiki kubo sigcine sifikile kubo ukushintsha impilo yabo,” kusho uMtolo.Uthe KwaZulu-Natal bashintshe inqwaba yezikole zodaka kodwa ziningi futhi abangakafiki kuzo.Uthe kusuka ngo-2004, kulesi sifundazwe bakhe imitholampilo engaphezu kuka-3 000 kodwa kusenezindawo abangakafiki kuzo.“I-ANC kule ndawo engakakhiwa umtholampilo kuyo siyakwazi ukuletha umtholampilo ongumahamba-nendlwana.”

UNobhala we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Bheki Mtolo, uzithintele ulaka lwenyunyana iNehawu esola amalungu ale nhlangano angahambisani nohulumeni wokubambisana ngokungafuni ukusebenza.INehawu isiyalele uMtolo ukuba axolise kumalungu ayo kungakapheli izinsuku ezimbili.Unobhala weNehawu KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Ayanda Zulu, uthe ngeke bamvumele uMtolo ukuthi akhulume emihlanganweni yeNehawu uma ehluleka ukuxolisa.UMtolo uzithintele ikhekhe leziqandu, ngesikhathi ekhwela edilika kumalungu eNehawu aphikisaba nohulumeni wokubambisana.UMtolo uthe isizathu esenza ukuthi amalungu eNehawu angafuni ukuthi i-ANC ibambisane neDA kuhulumeni wokubambisana wukuthi afuna ukuqhubeka nokuzenzela umathanda emsebenzini.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma emcimbini obungoMgqibelo abewenzele izaguga eKokstad.INehawu ingelinye lamadlelandawonye e-ANC angayizwa eyokufakwa kweDA kuhulumeni wokubambisana.Le nyunyana ibinomhlangano eGoli ngeledlule, lapho izikhulumi ezehlukene zigxeke ukufakwa kweDA kuhulumeni wokubambisana.UMtolo uthe amalungu eNehawu akhala ngokufakwa kweDA ngoba afuna ukuqhubeka nokuhudula izinyawo emsebenzini.“Into ezondelwa i-ANC ukuthi kuqhubeke ukuthi kube nabasebenzi bakahulumeni ababheke izidingo zabo, abangazikhathalele izidingo zabantu. Bacabanga ukuthi kuzophela lokhu kukhohlakala kwabo uma kuphethe uhulumeni wokubambisana.”UMtolo uthe amalungu eNahawu agcwele eminyangweni kahulumeni ehlulekayo ukusiza abantu.Uthe amalungu eNahawu agcwele eMnyangweni wezaseKhaya, owezeMpilo nakowezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi.“Uma ufika eMnyangweni wezaseKhaya uthi uzofuna isitifiketi sokushona, ufike unganakwa, okwazi ukuthi umuntu weNehawu lona ongakunaki. Uma ufika kwaSassa bafike baziqhenye ngawe, okwazi ukuthi abantu beNehawu labo. Uma nicasulwe ukuthi i-ambulance ayifikanga ngesikhathi, nazi ukuthi umuntu weNehawu lona ongazange asheshe.”UMtolo uthe abantu kufanele babaqaphele labo abathi abawufuni uhulumeni wokubambisana.“Kufanele nimbheke kahle ukuthi lowo muntu akusiye yini lona owenze ukuthi kuhlehle umngcwabo ngenxa yokuthi unqabile ukukwenzela isitifiketi sokushona.”UZulu uthe kubashaqisile ukuzwa uMtolo ehlasela amalungu eNehawu.Uthe amalungu eNahawu asebenza ngokuzikhandla, wathi ngesikhathi kuhlasele  i-corona amalungu enyunyana abeka impilo yawo engcupheni.“I-ANC kufanele iyicubungule kahle le nto eshiwo uMtolo. Ngabe uchaze ukuthi uhulumeni wokubambisana uzokwenza kangcono kunalokhu okwenziwe i-ANC kule minyaka engu-30 eyedlule?”UZulu uthe uMtolo kufanele azinuke amakhwapha ngokuhlulwa kwe-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, wathi i-ANC isazophinde idinge amalungu eNehawu uma isikhankasela ukhetho lohulumeni basekhaya oluzayo.UZulu unxuse ubuholi be-ANC KwaZulu-Natal ukuba bukhuze uMtolo.

UNGQONGQOSHE weMfundo ePhakeme uDkt Blade Nzimande uhambele imindeni yezitshudeni ezithelwe amachaphazelo kuhlaselwa osomatekisi eBraamfontein ngesonto eledlule.UNzimande uthe  okwenzekile kukhombisa inkinga enkulu izwe elibhekene nayo yokulwa nodlame lwezibhamu  emphakathini.Uthe banazo izinhlelo asebezenzile zokuqinisa ezokuphepha emanyuvesi ngoba kubalulekile kubo ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abafundi bayazivikela futhi baphephile ngaso sonke isikhathi.Lo Ngqongqoshe udlulise amazwi enduduzo emndenini olahlekelwe yisitshudeni kulesi sehlo wancoma inyuvesi yaseGoli ngendlela esingathe ngayo lolu daba.Lesi sehlakalo esithuse abaningi senzeke ngoLwesine ntambama endaweni evame ukuphithizela kakhulu izitshudeni eBraamfontein, eGoli.Amaphoyisa aqinisekise ukufa kwabantu abathathu okungosomatekisi ababili nesitshudeni esisodwa."Kubikwa ukuthi abasolwa abangaziwa bavulele ngenhlamvu kubalisa ababili abebehleli emotweni ebipakile eceleni komgwaqo. Oshayasibhamu bavulele ngenhlamvu kwachaphazeleka nebhasi elithutha izitshudeni zasenyuvesi kwadubuleka ezimbili.“Bashone bobabili abalisa abebesemotweni nesitshudeni esisodwa. Esinye isitshudeni siphuthunyiswe esibhedlela esiseduze,” kusho okhulumela amaphoyisa eGauteng uColonel Dimakatso Nevhuhulwi.Isitshudeni esiphangalale kulesi sigameko uNkosingiphile Nxumalo ubenza unyaka wesibili ezifundweni zeBecom Accounting enyuvesi yaseGoli. UNxumalo udabuka eNewcastle. Umndeni wakubo okubalwa kuwo umalume, umqashi kanina nezingane zakubo ezintathu banikele eGoli ngeSonto ngenhloso yokukhomba nokuqinisekisa ithambo labo ngaphambi kokuba libuyiselwe ekhaya lapho lizofihlwa khona

KUKHUTHAZWE eyokubambisana phakathi kwamaphoyisa namalungu omphakathi, kungcwatshwa abayisithupha kwayisikhonbisa omndeni owodwa eHlokozi, ahlaselwe aqothwa ngesihluku ehlezi ndawonye ngesonto eledlule.Kulo mngcwabo obungoMgqibelo khona eHlokozi, bekugqame umunyu nosizi kubantu abebewuhambele. Bebephume ngobuningi ukuzovalelisa okokugcina kwabomndeni wakwaKhambule; okungoNkk Bahlakaniphile Khambule (64), uNksz Nompilo Khambule (34), uNksz Philile Khambule (39), uSiphosethu (10), uYonelisa (10) noZemvelo (5).Ilungu lesikhombisa nalo elidlule emhlabeni kulesi sigameko uMnuz S’khulu Khambule lingcwatshwe ngoLwesine, eMzumbe.Ekhuluma nabebethamele umngcwabo, obambe njengoNdunankulu KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Thembeni kaMadlopha Mthethwa, unxuse umphakathi ukuthi usebenzisane namaphoyisa ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izigilamkhuba ziyavalelwa.“Kumele senze konke okusemandleni emizamweni yethu yokuthola ababulali. Laba abenze lobu bugebengu obunyantisayo badinga ukujeziswa kanzima ezobulungiswa kuleli. Kumele senze isifundazwe kube yindawo ephephile ukuhlala kuyo ngakho sikhathazekile ukubona izigameko zobugebengu ezifuze lobu ziya zikhula futhi,” usho kanje.Kuqhubeka lo mngcwabo, bezikhona izinkulumo ezikhomba ngenjombane amaphoyisa aseHlokozi ngokuzithela ngabandayo emacaleni enzeka endaweni.UNkk kaMadlopha Mthethwa uthe undunankulu uphakamise ukuthi kuzokwenziwa imbizo ezoqwashisa ngobugebengu kule ndawo, waphakamisa ukuthi kubunjwe ithimba eliyisipesheli elizobhekana ngqo nokuphenywa kokubulawa kwalawa malungu omndeni.IMeya kuMasipala i-Harry Gwala, uMnuz Zamo Nxumalo, nayo ebeyingxenye yabebehambele lo mngcwabo, ikhale ngokwanda kokuzondana kwabantu okuyimbangela yokubulalana.“Indaba yokuphathwa kwezibhamu, kumele ibhekisiswe ngoba azisasetshenziselwa ukuzivikela kepha ukubulala abanye abantu. Ngalesi sigameko akumele sizibambele umthetho ngesandla. Kuyashaqisa ngoba ipulazi nepulazi elikhona kule ndawo ngeke umthole umlungu ongenaso isibhamu kodwa ngeke uzwe kuthiwa badubulane bodwa,”  usho kanje.Laba bomndeni kuthiwa babezihlalele endlini yokuphumula bezibukela ithelevishini ebusuku, ngesikhathi bengenelwa abasolwa abangaziwa babaqotha bonke. Lesi sigameko sithinte abaningi njengoba uNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa kuleli, uMnuz Senzo Mchunu noKhomishana wamaPhoyisa esifundazweni uLieutenant General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi, behambele lo mndeni ukuyobhonga emswaneni nokuqinisekisa ukuzibophezela kwamaphoyisa ekuboshweni kwabasolwa.

LUTHOLAKALE selushonile usana obelusanda kuzalwa lusongwe ngoplastiki kadoti eTea Estate, eNanda, KwaZulu-Natal, izolo.Ngokwesitatimende sonogada be-Reaction Unit South Afrika (RUSA), bathole ucingo oluphuthumayo obeluqhamuka komakhelwane abakhelene nendawo izolo ekuseni.Baphuthume endaweni ababizelwe kuyo behamba nabezimo eziphuthumayo abafike bathola ingane yentombazane ingaphefumuli isongwe ngoplastiki kadoti eduze komgwaqo, bayihlola kwatholakala ukuthi isishonile.Kuthiwa amadoda amathathu okuyiwo athole ingane abalekile ngaphambi kokuthi kufike abantu.Okhulumela iReaction Unit South Afrika, uMnuz Prem Balram, uthe ngesikhathi befika endaweni yesehlo batshelwe amalungu omphakathi ukuthi abesilisa abathathu abebehamba nezinja zokuzingela bebebheka emgqomeni kadoti nalapho bevule khona umgqomo bathola ingane ilahliwe, base bethinta abantu bendawo abashayele ucingo onogada. Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, Constable Thenjiswa Ngcobo, uthe amaphoyisa ayaphenya.“Amaphoyisa ase-Verulam aphenya icala lokufihla ukubeletha kulandela isigameko lapho ingane ebisanda kuzalwa itholakale ishonile ngoJuni 25. Isidumbu sengane sitholwe sigoqwe ngoplastiki,” kusho uConst Ngcobo.

BESIMUNCU isimo kuwo wonke umuntu obehambele emzini wakwaKhambule eChibini, eHlokozi, okudutshulwe kuwo kwabulawa abomndeni abayisikhombisa okukhona kuwo nezingane ezintathu. Abantu abaningi endaweni bebelokhu bethutheleke njalo kulo muzo ukuzobabaza umhlola owehlile.Baningi ebebevukwa umunyu uma kuphathwa eyokuthi ababulali badubule ngisho ingane eneminyaka emihlanu.Ngesikhathi umuntu esondela kuwona, ububona ukuthi umuzi ongaswele njengoba kubiywe kahle ngocingo, kwakhiwa nezindlu ezinhle ezinkulu norawondi.Uma ungena egumbini lokuphumula, okwenzeke kulo isigameko, ubuqaphela ukuthi lona umndeni obunawo amandla okukwenza ikhaya lawo libukele kahle.Nokho kuqaphelekile ukuthi kunamathuna ayisikhombisa aklele ngezansi kwezindlu. Isolezwe lithole ukuthi kuwona (amathuna) kukhona indodana yakhona uMnuz Phumlani Khambule okuthiwa yadutshulwa yabulawa nyakenye. Libuye (Isolezwe) lathola ukuthi kukhona nelikababa wekhaya okuthiwa wadutshulwa eminyakeni eyedlule.

INKANTOLO iyilahle ngecala indoda eyabulala ingoduso yayo ngoba yayiyikhuza ukuthi ingakhwelezeli indodakazi yayo engayizali eyayikade iyisola ngokuthi ijola nomshayeli wetekisi.IJaji elibambile, uKevin Gounden weNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini, lilahle ngecala le ndoda eneminyaka engu-38. Isigwebo sizokhishwa ngesonto elizayo.Phambilini le ndoda yavuma ukuthi yadlwengula indodakazi yayo engayizali eyayina-18 neyizalayo eyayina-14 KwaNyusa, eThekwini entathakusa ngoMeyi 11, 2022.Unina wamadodakazi washaywa yile ndoda wafa, isidumbu sakhe saphonswa esiweni sisongwe ngengubo sambozwa ngamahlamvu.Le ndoda yaboshwa ngo-Agasti 3, 2022 eLovu ibhace kwagogo wayo igqoke ingubo yabesifazane e-navy newigi izifihla ngoba yayikade yazi ukuthi ifunwa amaphoyisa.“Umufi wawusumthathisa okomuntu osesithenjini nengane yakhe owawusuyithatha njengentombi yakho uyidlwengula. Usumbulele umufi watshela amadodakazi akhe ukuthi anakekelane, abambane ngoba wena ngeke usabakhona isikhathi eside,” kusho ijaji lahlulela.Lithe lanelisekile ngobufakazi boMbuso, obethulelwe inkantolo ofakazi abebekade beluswa umshushisi u-Advocate Thabani Buthelezi.Ijaji lithe  ubufakazi bukhiphe isithombe esisodwa esiphelele sokuthi yile ndoda eyabulala futhi ikuhlelile.Bebekhona  abagilwa ngesikhathi ijaji likhipha isinqumo enkantolo.Kube nesikhathi  lapho bevukwa khona umunyu, omunye wabo waphumela ngaphandle, omunye wasala ekhala enkantolo ngesikhathi kufundwa izitatimende zabo zokuthi kubashiye benjani okwenziwa uyise kubona.Nayo le ndoda ibimi ngezinyawo ebhokisini labasolwa ichiphiza izinyembezi igebise ikhanda unomphela.Ezitatimendeni ezinikezwe inkantolo, zabo bobabili abagilwa, bathe ngeke bamxolele uyise futhi sebephenduke inhlekisa emphakathini behlelwa ukuzethemba baqalwa ukhwantalala. Omunye wabo usole unina ngokuyiletha empilweni yakhe le ndoda ayichaze ngomhlukumezi.Enye yalezi zingane ithe le ndoda iyiphuce ubuntombi bayo, yaphelelwa ukuthemba umuntu, futhi ayisakwazi ukuya eMkhosini woMhlanga okuyinto ebikade iphila ngayo.Ngakolunye uhlangothi, uNkk Zeera Fareed, ongummeli wale ndoda uyicelele ukuba ithanjiselwe isigwebo ngoba iyazisola, iyaxolisa ezinganeni zayo ngeyakwenza futhi isiphila ngemishanguzo ethithibalisa ukhwantalala eyiqale ngoSepthemba 2023, ejele laseWestville. Ucele inkantolo ikubeke emqondweni uma seyigweba ukuthi le ndoda seyinonyaka nezinyanga eziyisishiyagalombili igqunywe ejele.Ummeli uthe ngaphambi kokuthi iboshwe yayingunogada esibhedlela sikahulumeni eHowick kuyiyona kuphela ebheke ikhaya ngeholo likaR5 000. Uqhube wathi  inabantwana abayisithupha omdala una-17 futhi ayikaze yalahlwa icala phambilini.Kodwa uButhelezi uthe  ifanelwe isigwebo esingudilikajele ngokudlwengula nokubulala umuntu okwakumele ngabe iyamvikela.“Sekuthenjwe izinkantolo ukuba zikhiphe izigwebo eziqinile ezizothumela umyalezo emphakathini nakwabanye abantu abasacabanga ukwenza izigameko ezinyantisa igazi njengalezi. Le ndoda ayiwavumanga amacala ngoba kusuka ngaphakathi kuyona kodwa yabona ukuthi uMbuso unobufakazi obuqanda ikhanda obuzoyigojela,” kusho uButhelezi.

BADINGA ukunikezwa uthando abantwana bamantombazane abatholele abantwana emakhaya kunokuthi bahlulelwe ngamaphutha abawenze ngaphambilini.Lona bekuwumongo wenkulumo kaMfu Thandi Ngonelo we-Acts of Obedience Ministries ngesikhathi ekhuluma engqungqutheleni iLadies Tea yamashumi amabili nesithupha.Le ngqungquthela ibibanjelwe esakhiweni sebandla lakhe esiku-37 Qashana Khuzwayo (Shepstone Road), eNew Germany.Le ngqungquthela ihlanganisa abesifazane abehlukene abavela ezifundazweni zakuleli, okuxoxwa kuyo ngezingqinamba abesifazane abazithoa bebhekana nazo empilweni.Inhloso yayo wukucija abesifazane nokubakhuthaza ukuthi bangaliphosi ithawula kunoma yini abahlangabezana nayo ebudeni bendlela.Kube kuningi kakhulu uMfu Ngonelo akhulume ngakho kabanzi enkulumweni yakhe.Eqhulwini uNgonelo ukhulume ngephutha athe lenziwa ngabazali lokwahlulela izingane zabo zamantombazane ezitholela abantwana ekhaya.Ugcizelele ukuthi leli yiphutha okumele abazali bangabe besalenza."Awukho umgqomo wokulahla umuntu. Masizithande singazehluleli izingane zethu zamantombazane ezitholele abantwana emakhaya,'' usho kanje.Uthe ukuze abesifazane babe nekusasa eliqhakazile, kungakuhle ukuthi basheshe bathole injongo yabo yokuphila bese beba nentshisekelo yokufinyelela kulokho abakudingayo.Abazali uthe kumele bakhumbule nokuthi ziningi izilingo esezikhona manje ezingagcina zikhinyabeza amantombazane amancane.Noma esho kanje kodwa uthe ngale nkulumo yakhe akahlosile khona ukubavuna.“Empeleni akekho umuntu wesifazane okumele atholele umntwana ekhaya okanye esemncane.“Kumele owesifazane osemncane umqondo wakhe ugxile ekuqhakaziseni ikusasa lakhe ngezindlela eziningi, njengokufunda nokuzithuthukisa, esho.UNgonelo waziwa kakhulu ngenhlangano yakhe ebizwa ngokuthi yiPalm Tree  nayo ejwayele ukuhlela izingqungquthela zabesifazane.Ibandla aliholayo uNgonelo laziwa kakhulu ngokunakekela umphakathi elikuwona ngezindlela ezahlukene.Isikhulumi sosuku bekunguDkt Pinky Ngcakani-Ncula umongo wenkulumo yakhe ubumayelana nokubaluleka kokuzethemba kubantu besifazane.

UMphathiswa wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho, ezokuvakasha NezeMvelo  uMnu Siboniso Duma.Njengoba sesiya kumaholide ePhasika, isifundazwe saKwa-Zulu Natali sikulindele ukwamukela  izivakashi ezivela ezindaweni eziningi ezahlukene.Ziningi izindawo zokuchitha isizungu esifundazweni - izivakashi zingavakashela iziqiwi eziphambili ezinezinhlobonhlobo zezilwane zasendle, noma zizelule amathambo ngokuqwala izintaba zoKhahlamba. Kukhona nezitolo ezisezingeni eliphakeme kanye nezindawo zekhethelo zokufunda ngamagugu namasiko.Njengenjwayelo, siyazikhathaza ngokuphepha kwezivakashi zethu - ngifisa ukuqinisekisa ukuthi sisebenzisana nemikhakha yonke yokuphepha okubalwa kuyo i-SAPS namaphoyisa omgwaqo esifundazweni sonke.Njengoba ulwandle lusanesasasa kulesifundazwe, ngithanda ukukhumbuza  izivakashi ngobubanzi bogu lwethu oluseningizumu nolusenyakatho. Ngiyanikhumbuza futhi ukuthi amabhishi amaningi aseThekwini akulungele ukubhukuda.Sinentokozo ukumemezela ukuvulwa kweShaka Marine World, okuyiyona i-aquarium enkulu emngceleni wase-Ningizimu. Woza uzitike ngokubuka izilwane ezinhle nezimangazayo ngaphansi kolwandle lwethu. Bheka nje kunezindawo zokubhukuda, ukutshuza kanye nokuthola okuya ngasethunjini.Kuhle kakhulu uma uhamba ungcebeleka ngemoto yakho ngoba uthola amathuba okubona izindawo ezikhethekile ohambweni lwakho ezifana neMidlands Meander maduze naseHowick.Uma ufisa ukuthola ulwazi olugcwele ngokuvakashela lesifunda, zitholele i-KZN Travel Guide app kumakhalekhukhwini wakho. Noma uvakashela ikhasi elithi www.zulu.org.za ukuze ube sethubeni lokuthola izipesheli kumalungu ethu ohwebo kwezokuvakasha nokungcebeleka. Qaphelisisa usebenzise lelikhasi ngokuphephile uzivikele kubugebengu.

AMAPHOYISA amfuna uthuli umyeni okusolakala ukuthi ubhokode inkosikazi yakhe ngento ecijile wayibulala emzini wabo osesigodini iSengatane, eSeshego.Isigameko kubikwa ukuthi senzeke enkathakusa ngoLwesithathu.Kusolakala ukuthi umufi obeneminyaka engu-45 nomyeni wakhe babe nengxabano eshubile. Kuvela ukuthi le ngxabano iphethe ngokuthi umyeni agwaze kwesingenhla inkosikazi yakhe waqeda wadla phansi.Amaphoyisa nabosizo lokuqala, bathintiwe ngalesigameko, ngeshwa bafike esevele esethule umufi ohlonzwe njengoshonele endaweni yesigameko.UMkhuzi wamaPhoyisa eLimpopo, uLieutenant General Thembi Hadebe uzwakalise ukukhathazeka kwakhe ngezigameko ezifuze lesi, ezithinta udlame lwasemindenini eziqhubekayo eLimpopo.“Sizokwenza ngakho konke okusemandleni sikhuthaze abagilwa nofakazi ukuthi babike lawa macala emaphoyiseni, ezikhungweni zikahulumeni nakubaholi bomphakathi,” kusho uLt Gen Hadebe.Uqhube wathi amaphoyisa aphansi phezulu athungatha umsolwa ngenhloso yokumbopha. Amaphoyisa avule icala lokubulala aliphenyayo.Kunxuswa noma ngabe ubani ongaba nolwazi olungaholela ekutheni kuboshwe umsolwa aludlulisele kumphenyi wecala uWarrant Officer Frans Mohlabi enombolweni yocingo ethi: 082 344 7716.Bangabika esiteshini samaphoyisa esiseduzane noma bashayele kwaCrime Stop ku-08600 10111.

IGIXABEZWE ngodilikajele indoda eneminyaka engu-28 elahlwe ngecala lokudlwengula uninakhulu (70) eBlaaubosch, eNewcastle.Lo mlisa ugwetshwe yiNkantolo yesiFunda yaseMadadeni ngoMsombuluko.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uConstable Thenjiswa Ngcobo ulandise wathi umgilwa wayekade ekwakhe ngo-Agasti 9 ngonyaka odlule ngesikhathi ecelwa umzukulu ukuthi amvulele isango.“Wabe eseyalivula ugogo isango engasoli lutho, engazi ukuthi umzukulu uhlele ukumdlwengula. Wavula isango wase ephindela egumbini lakhe wayolala kanti umzukulu uzomlandela afike amdlwengule,” kuchaza uConst Ngcobo.Uqhube wathi amaphoyisa ophiko oluphenya amacala athinta udlame lwasemindenini, ukuvikelwa kwezingane nathinta ucansi, asebenza ngokuzikhandla eqinisekisa ukuthi le ndoda iyaboshwa.Kuthiwa igqigqe enkantolo kwaze kwaba ilahlwa yicala yanikwa isigwebo sikadilikajele.

ISILO samabandla uMisuzulu Sinqobile kaZwelithini, siyalele ukuthi kubenomzuzu   wokugobisa amakhanda kuzothwe ukuhlonipha iSilo  uMdlokombane, njengoba namhlanje kuphela unyaka wesithathu sakhothama.Esitatimendeni esikhishwe uNdunankulu kaZulu uMfundisi Thulasizwe Buthelezi, iNdlulamithi iyalela ukuthi ngo- 12 emini wonke uZulu nabasondelene nalesi sizwe bazothe umzuzu ukuhlonipha iSilo uZwelithini kaBhekuzulu esikhothame ngalo lolu suku, ngo- 2021.“ISilo uZwelithini siwuphawu lobunye noxolo esifundazweni iKwaZulu-Natal futhi lokhu kuzohlale kukhona ezinhliziyweni zabantu besizwe sikaZulu kulo lonke leli. nasemhlabeni  jikelele. Ukuthatha umzuzu wokuzotha ngalesi sikhathi kungabe emsebenzini, esikoleni noma ekhaya kuzobe kuwukuhlonipha inkosi yethu ebithandwa futhi ihlonishwa kuzwelonke,” kusho uButhelezi esitatimendeni.Inhlangano engenzi nzuzo yeSilo uZwelithini, i-The Goodwill Foundation nendlunkulu bazohola umkhuleko, okuthiwa owaminyaka yonke ongowesibili kulo nyaka, ukubungaza lolu suku.  Ngokwesitatimende esikhishwe uMntwana uMbonisi kaBhekuzulu, umkhuleko uzoba KwaNongoma, eMahhashini khona namhlanje.Khonamanjalo uNdunankulu kaZulu uqinisekise ukuthi iSilo esibusayo, sizohola indlunkulu namabutho emcimbini wokubungaza iSilo uDinuzulu kaCetshwazayo ozoba ngoMgqibelo, kwaCeza. Uveze ukuthi umcimbi wokuvulwa komfuziselo weSilo uZwelithini obuzokuba kuleli sonto usuhlehlile ngenxa yezinhlelo zemicimbi yasendlunkulu eyandulela oweSilo uDinuzulu. Ngesonto eledlule, kudingeke ukuthi ihhovisi likaNdunankulu esifundazweni uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube lixolise eendlunkulu emva kokuthi belimemezela ukuthi umcimbi wosuku lokuhlonishwa kweSilo uDinuzulu uzoba ngempelasonto edlule, okuvele ukuthi lesi simemezelo senziwe kungaxhunyanwanga neSilo esibusayo nokugcine kuphoqa ukuthi kubekwe olunye usuku.Zivele seziqalile izinhlelo zokugubha  iqhaza leSilo uDinuzulu ekulweni nohulumeni wengcindezelo, njengoba kuthe ngesonto eledlule uNkk Dube Ncube wamhlonipha ngokubeka izimbali egunjini ayeboshelwe kulo, ejele eliseMgungundlovu.Undunankulu uphinde wahambela epaki i-King Dinuzulu eThekwini, lapho kunomfuziselo wakhe.

UDADEWABO wowesifazane osanda kuvuma icala lokubulala umyeni wakhe  uncengele ngudadewabo ukuthi inkantolo ingamnikezi isigwebo esinzima.UNksz Londi Nkosi ongudadewabo kaNongcebo Faith Ntombela - ovume icala lokubulala umyeni wakhe owayeyiphoyisa uCaptain Zwelakhe Thomas Ntombela - uncenge inkantolo ukuthi ingamgwebi kanzima udadewabo ngoba unezingane. Umufi wahlaselwa esemzini wakhe okwaS, eMlaza, ngoMeyi 3, ngonyaka owedlule, wadutshulwa wabulawa.Wadutshulwa ngabantu abangaziwa wabe esephuthunyiswa esibhedlela eSiphingo Medical Towers okuyilapho okwafike kwamenela khona.UFaith ubekade evele eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini, njengoba leli cala libuyiselwe kuyona le nkantolo njengoba selibuya naseNkantolo eNkulu yaseScottburgh.UNksz Nkosi uthe unxusa inkantolo ukuba ingamnikezi udilikajele uFaith, kumele athole isigwebo esizodala ukuthi aphinde aphume ngelinye ilanga akwazi nokuthi ayoqhubeka nokunakekela izingane zakhe."Okunye lo muntu esikhuluma ngaye lapha uyena obesondla sonke,'' usho kanjena.Umfowabo kamufi, uMnuz Nkosinathi Ntombela, naye unikezwe ithuba elifanayo.Uqale ngokucacisa ukuthi umuzi kamufi sewukhokhelwe waqedwa, wathi lokho kusho ukuthi izingane zikamufi ngeke zize zisale dengwane.Uthembise nokuthi bona njengomndeni bazimisele ngokuthi izingane zikamufi bazinakekele, wathi asikho isidingo sokuthi kusetshenziswe isizathu sokunakekelwa kwesingane ukuze  angagwetshwa uFaith.Ummeli wakhe, uMnuz Ashwin Rughbeer, uphakamise ukuthi uFaith anikezwe isigwebo seminyaka engu-20 ebese ehlala engu-10 ngaphakathi eminye engu-10 aboshelwe ngaphandle.Njengenjwayelo amalungu omphakathi abephume ngobuningi bawo ukuzothamela icala. Icala lihlehliselwe uNovemba 14.

UNCOMA ukusebenza ngokuzikhandla kwamaphoyisa omunye wemindeni yabesifazane abadutshulwe babulawa ngesihluku eKenville eThekwini ngempelasonto.Abangani, uNksz Anele Mbokazi (29) obengumhlengikazi esibhedlela saKwaDukuza iGeneral Justice Gizenga Mpanza Regional noNksz Zizipho Gabisa (30) obeyi-pharmacist esibhedlela esizimele eMhlanga, batholwa befile, benamanxeba okudutshulwa ebusweni ngeSonto.Ngokuphazima kweso, amaphoyisa abopha abesilisa abangamathe nolimu, uMnuz Lungani Mthethwa (38) noMnuz Sandile Chili (44).Babanjwa emotweni iMercedes-Benz emhlophe okusolwa ukuthi  babehamba ngayo ngosuku lwesehlo eSouth Beach, eThekwini, ngoMsombuluko.Emotweni kutholwe iselula kaNksz Mbokazi, eyasiza abakwasidlodlo ekulandeleni umkhondo wabasolwa.Umfowabo kaNksz Mbokazi, uMnuz Mvuselelo Magwaza, uthe bayawabonga amaphoyisa ngokuzikhandla kwawo.“Siyishayela ihlombe indlela asukumela phezulu ngayo, yaze yaholela ekutheni kusheshe kuboshwe abasolwa. Sesifuna ukubona umthetho usebenza,” kusho uMagwaza.Uphinde waveza ukuthi bamagange ngokuzotholwa amaphoyisa emafonini abafi awathathile ngenhloso yokuphenya njengoba benenkolelo yokuthi azoveza kabanzi ngobudlelwano babafi nabasolwa.Uqhube wathi yize bengeke bazazi izindaba zezingane bengabantu abadala kodwa abafi nabasolwa bese benobudlelwane obuqinile bokwethembana.“Akuvelanga kwahanjwa kungaziwana, laba bantu bayazana futhi bebethembana. Okunye, lezi zingane azizona izigruvane njengoba kushiwo. Kuyiqiniso ukuthi bahlangana emcimbini ngenyanga edlule,” kusho uMgwaza.Uphinde wagcizelela ukuthi abasolwa akusibo nje abantu abangaziwa.“Oyedwa wabasolwa uyisihlobo salapho okwakunomcimbi khona ngakho bekungumuntu owaziwayo,” kusho uMagwaza.Uthe abazange bahambe ngoLwesihlanu kodwa bahamba ngoMgqibelo ngezikhathi zasemini ohambweni olwaluhleliwe.Uthe uNksz Mbokazi uzongcwatshwa ngoMgqibelo emva kwenkonzo ezoba sesontweni lamaRoma e-Oakford eVerulam.Uthe uNksz Gabisa uzofihlwa e-Eastern Cape lapho umndeni wakhe udabuka khona.Ezinkundleni zokuxhumana usaqhubeka umsindo abantu beveza ukuthi bayamazi umsolwa wokuqala, uMthethwa ngezindlela ezehlukene.Baningi abakhala ngokuthi uyiqola, wabagebenga izishaqane zemali, kuphinde kube khona owesifazane odalule ukuthi wabulala udadewabo kodwa waphunyula ngoba enemali.

UNDLUNKULU  Catherene Gumede waKwaMduku unxenxe isizwe ukuba sikhulukele indlunkulu kaZulu emcimbini obuKwaMakhasa eHluhluwe, lapho bekukhulekelwa izinkinga ezikhungethe iNingizimu Afrika.Uthe iNingizimu Afrika ibhekene nesikhathi esingesihle nhlobo kodwa bayafisa ukuthi uNkulunkulu angenelele.“Siyazi ukuthi uSathane uyathanda ukuxova enze izinto ezingalungile kodwa siyakhuleka mihla yonke ukuthi uNkulunkulu angenelele, avikele ubukhosi obakhiwa nguye emhlabeni. Ngakho- ke siyakholwa ukuthi uMdali uzongenelela ngoba siyazi ukuthi obekiwe usuke ebekwe uNkulunkulu, hhayi abantu basemhlabeni,” kusho uNdlunkulu.Uveze lokhu emva komhlangano wembizo obuseSishayamthetho esidala oLundi obubizwe yiSilo uMisizulu kaZwelithini.Kule mbizo Isilo sizwakalise ukukhathazeka kwaso ngendlela okugxambukela ngayo abepolitiki odabeni lweNgonyama Trust okunezinsolo zokuthi bafuna ukudla amandla okulawulwa kweNgonyama Trust nokuhlwitha amandla amakhosi ukuthi angabi nazwi kuyo.Ibhodi elisha leNgonyama Trust lamalungu ayisishiyagalolunye lisanda kwenza isibophezelo eNkantolo eNkulu eMgungundlovu ukuthi ngeke liphinde likhokhele izindleko zabameli beSilo uma kunamacala athinta umbango wesihlalo sobukhosi bukaZulu.

UYA esiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal uNdunankulu kaZulu uMfundisi Thulasizwe Buthelezi nePhini lakhe Inkosi Phathisiwe Chiliza uma kungukuthi amaqembu abo athola amavoti anele okuthi bathole izihlalo ngemuva kokhetho. UButhelezi oyiMeya kaMasipala waseZululand, uyomela i-IFP njengoba esendaweni yesishiyagalolunye ohlwini lwaleli qembu.UChiliza oyinkosi yesizwe saseMadungeni, uya esiShayamthetho ngethikithi leqembu elesekwa ngowayenguMengameli weZwe ne-ANC  uJacob Zuma, Umkhonto weSizwe, kanti ohlwini lwaleli qembu ungunombolo 42.UButhelezi noChiliza basanda kumenyezelwa yiSilo samaBandla uMisuzulu kaZwelithini njengazosebenza nabo emsebenzini wesizwe.UChiliza akalona ivukane emsebenzini othinta amakhosi njengoba eke waba ngusihlalo wawo esifundazweni. Usebenze kakhulu neSilo esesabuza uMdlokombane.UZuma usanda kumemezela ukuthi ohlwini lwabajutshiwe usazokwenza izinguquko kulona njengoba befuna kumeleleke zonke izinhlaka.Ohlwini lwe-IFP olukhishwe yikhomishini yezokhetho kukhona neNkosi yeSizwe saKwaButhelezi, uZuzifa oyindodana yomsunguli we-IFP Inkosi Mangosuthu Buthelezi, okhothame nyakenye.Inkosi uZuzifa inethezekile endaweni yesikhombisa ohlwini lwabajutshwe yi-IFP ePhalamende. Uhlu lwaleli qembu kuzwelonke luholwa ngumengameli uMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa, kulandele abanye abaholi okubalwa nomkhulumeli waleli qembu uMnuz Mkhuleko Hlengwa nabanye.Ohlwini lwe-IFP oluya esiShayamthetho sesifundazwe kuqhwakele usihlalo waleli qembu uMnuz Thami Ntuli oyiMeya yaseKing Cetshwayo, kuthi indodakazi kaShenge uMntwana uPhumzile Buthelezi yena usendaweni yesishiyagalolunye ohlwini lwesifundazwe. IMeya kaMasipala uMzinyathi uMnuz Petros Ngubane ungunombolo 24 ohlwini lwabaya esiShayamthetho, kuthi uMfundisi Musa Zondi, osanda kufungiswa esiShayamthetho ukhuza ibuya ohlwini lwe-IFP njengoba ehleli kunombolo 16. IMK ifolosa ngoMnuz Nhlanhla Ngidi ohlwini lwabazojutshelwa esiShayamthetho sesifundazwe. UNgidi wayenguMqondisi Jkelele kuhulumeni wesifundazwe.UNgidi nguyena obhekiwe ukuthi abe ngundunankulu ngokwe-MK uma idla umhlanganiso kulolu khetho lwangoMeyi 29. Okunye okuqaphelekayo ohlwini lwe-MK amalungu abekwi-ANC okubalwa uMnuz Thobani Zuma, ongumgqugquzeli waleli qembu esifundazweni kanti uhlale ebonakala lapho kukhona khona uJZ. UZuma wayeyiphini leMeya kuMasipala uMsunduzi.Omunye osohlwini lweMK uDkt Kwazi Mbanjwa owayengumqondisi jikelele esifundazwenu kanti wayeyinhloko yoMnyango wezokuThutha esifundazweni.Ohlwini lweqembu okunombango wobuholi iNFP kufoloswa ngoMnuz Ivan Barnes kuzwelonke, esifundazweni lifolosa ngoNksz Mbali Shinga.I-EFF esifundazweni iholwa nguMnuz Mongezi Twala. Iqembu i-Abantu Batho Congress, eholwa ngowayeyiPhini leMeya kuMasipala weTheku lifolosa ngomholi walo uMnuz Philani Mavundla, kwabaya ePhalamende.I-African People’s Movement ifolosa ngomholi wayo uMnuz Vikizitha Mlotshwa kanti kunamanye amaqembu azobanga izihlalo esiShayamthetho sesifundazwe okuyiJustice and Employment Party ne-People’s Freedom Party. Ikhomishini ivale izolo ntambama ithuba lokuthi umphakathi uphawule ngohlu olushicilelwe.Namhlanje kulindeleke ukuthi ikhulume nesizwe ngezikhalazo ezitholile.Ngo-Ephreli 10, izoshicilela uhlu lokugcina lwabaya ePhalamende naseziShayamthetho njengoba kukhona abavela ohlwini lwamanye amaqembu.

UNDUNANKULU waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, uphosele abomthetho esifundazweni inselelo yokubhekana ngqo nabantu bokufika abahweba ngendlela engekho emthethweni, ukuzama ukunqoba ukwanda kwezenzo zobugebengu obudlangile.UNtuli ubeyisikhulumi sosuku engqunqutheleni ebiyenzelwe ukubhunga ngamasu angasetshenziswa ukulwa nobugebengu, iKZN Social Crime Prevention Summit ebise-Olive Convention Centre, eThekwini ngoLwesihlanu.“Kumele kuphenywe izitolo zabokufika ikakhulu lezo ezenza ubugebengu nakulezo zindawo eziyisizinda sokuqhuba umkhuba omubi wokushushumbisa izidakakamizwa,” usho kanje.Uthe okunye okuzosiza ukulwa nobugebengu eKZN wukuthi kuqiniswe uhlelo lwezivimbamgwaqo emigwaqweni eyahlukene yesifundazwe, ukusiza ukubheka izigebengu ezishushumisa izidakamizwa nezihwebelana ngezikhali ngokungekho emthethweni. Uthe: “Akumele umuntu asuke eThekwini aze ayongena eJozini, engakaze amiswe nakanye emgwaqweni ngoba yilokho okudala ukuthi izigebengu zicanaze, zizibona zikhululekile”’UNdunankulu udalule nokuthi yena nethimba asebenzisana nalo bazohambela zonke izifunda zaseKZN, kanjalo nezindawo eziyizizinda zobugebengu ukushumayela ivangeli lokulwa nobugebengu, futhi bazimisele ukusebenzisana nomphakathi.“Akumele sizibe ukuthi iKZN ingesinye sezifundazwe ezenza kwande ubugebengu ezweni. Ngeke siwushaye indiva umthelela omubi walokho njengoba kumanje sekuvele kunosomabhizinisi nabatshalimali abashiyayo esifundazweni sethu ngenxa yobugebengu. Lokho okuzodala ukuthi kulahleke amathuba emisebenzi, kuphinde kubhebhetheke ubugebengu,” usho kanje.UNtuli ugcizelele nokuthi kukho konke okwenziwayo, kumele kubekwe abesifazane nezingane phambili, ikakhulu njengoba sekuqale inyanga yokuqhakambisa imbokodo ezweni.“Kuyadumaza ukubona kuqhubeka izigameko zokuhlukunyezwa kwabesifazane njengoba sizwile ngokwenzeke kuthisha wesifazane odutshulwe, wafa phambi kwezingane azifundisayo kwesinye sezikole zaseThekwini. Yizo zonke izinto okumele silwe nokuzinqoba lezo. Asikwazi ukuhlala singenzi lutho kube konakala kangaka emphakathini wethu,” kusho undunankulu.Ushayele ihlombe umsebenzi owenziwa ngamaphoyisa wokubopha izigebengu, wathi: “Awaqhubeke ayibambe kanjalo futhi angathandeli izandla uma izigebengu zingafuni ukuthobela umthetho. Iphoyisa ngeke lithandele izandla uma isigebengu sihlulwa wukuthobela umthetho. “’Nomphakathi awubambisane nathi kukho konke lokhu ngoba iqiniso wukuthi izigebengu zinathi emphakathini. Asingathuli sibe sibona konokala phambi kwethu,” kusho uNtuli.

UNDUNANKULU waKwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube, unengwa wukwanda kwezigameko zokudlwengulwa kwezalukazi ezindaweni ezingaphansi kukaMasipala waseMshwathi. UNkk Dube-Ncube udalule lokhu ngoLwesihlanu ngesikhathi kunembizo yokulwa nobugebengu ezinkundleni zemidlalo eNdlebezembuzi, kwaSwayimani.UNdunankulu uthe baze badlulela esiteshini samaphoyisa esisebenzela indawo ukuyokhuluma namaphoyisa ngale nkinga. Unxuse umphakathi ukuba ubambisane namaphoyisa ekulweni nesihlava.Ngo-2012 ucwaningo olwenziwa wuMnyango wokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi eKZN, lwaveza ukuthi indawo yakwaSwayimane, ihamba phambili ngezigameko zokudliwa kwezidakamizwa, utshwala nokudlwengulwa kwezalukazi. Unkosikazi walowo owayenguMengameli wezwe, uNkk Thobeka Madiba-Zuma, ehambisana nosonhlalakahle baze bathula umkhankaso wokulwa nokuhlukunyezwa kwabantu abadala emuva kokudlwengulwa kwezalukazi ezineminyaka ewu-84 nesino-94. Ngo-2015 owayenguNgqongqoshe woMnyango wokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi kuzwelonke, uNkk Bathabile Dlamini, wethula ikhaya labantu abadala esigodini saseGujini.UNkk Dube-Ncube ubuye wanikela ngezindlu ebantwini abebehlala emapulazini futhi wathembisa ukutakula imindeni eyasala dengwane emuva kokuhlasela kwezikhukhula kule ndawo.Undunankulu unxuse osomabhizinisi abasafufusa ukuba bayeke ukurentisa ngezitolo zabo ebantwini bangaphandle, kunalokho abaxhumane nehhovisi lakhe ukuze bathole uxhaso. Ugqugquzela abafundi abaneziqu ukuba bazifukule ngolwazi ukuze bakwazi ukuqasheka ngoba kungenzeka ukuthi iziqu aziwalungele amathuba emisebenzi ekhona.Imeya yaseMshwathi uMnuz Mandla Zondi, ikhale ngokwanda kwezigameko zokubulawa kosomatekisi KwaSwayimani. Uthe esikhathini esifushane kule ndawo sekubulawe osomatekisi ababalelwa kwabangu-15. Wathi basezinhlelweni zokuvuselela isiteshi samaphoyisa esingumahambanendlwana esikule ndawo. Eqhuba echaza uZondi, uthe isiteshi sasivalwe ngenxa yokungabikhona kukagesi namanzi. IMeya yoMkhandlu waseMgungundlovu ithembise ukusukumela inkinga yamanzi nekagesi. Uhlelo lomcimbi beluphethwe nguNgqongqoshe wezoLimo eKZN, uMnuz Super Zuma.

UNDUNANKULU waseGauteng uMnuz Panyaza Lesufi uyaqhubeka nemizamo yakhe yokusiza izakhamuzi zaseGauteng ezingasebenzi.NgoLwesithathu ntambama ubenomcimbi eGrace Bible Church ePimville eSoweto lapho kuqashwe khona abasebenzi abangu-2500 ababengamasosha omzabalazo. Laba baqashelwe ukuba ngabasizi basemgwaqweni amaGauteng Traffic Wardens (GTW), njengengxenye yohlelo lokuqasha iNasi iSpani. Uhlelo lweNasi iSpani lwaqala ngonyaka odlule lapho uLesufi wathembisa ukuqeqesha izinkulungwane zabantu abazosebenza ukulekelela ezinhlakeni ezehlukene zikahulumeni, babodwa abaqeqeshelwe ukuqapha ubugebengu emphakathini, abantu bathole amathuba okufundela umsebenzi eminyangweni eyahlukene kahulumeni abanye basebenzisana namaphoyisa omgwaqo.NgoLwesine ekuseni, uhulumeni saweGauteng ukhiphe isimemezelo sokuthi zonke izakhamuzi ezingasebenzi zinganikela ezikoleni ezehlukene ngokohlu olukhishiwe lapho bezobhalisela khona amathuba omsebenzi kanjalo namathuba okuqeqeshelwa amakhono ahlukahlukene ngale mpelasontoUhlu lwezikole

UNGASE uhlakazwe umkhandlu wase-Ekurhuleni, owehlulwa wukukhetha imeya entsha.UMasipala Ekurhuleni usuhlale isonto ungenayo imeya ngemva kokukhishwa kukaMnuz Sivuyile Ngodwana. Lokhu kwenzeke ngesonto eledlule ngemva kokuba kuvotelwe ukuthi ubuholi bakhe abusathembekile.Ngokomthetho olawula ukuphathwa komasipala, umkhandlu kufanele ukhethe imeya entsha zingakapheli izinsuku eziyisikhombisa kukhishwe imeya. Ziphele ngoLwesihlanu izinsuku eziyisikhombisa.Umhlangano obubizelwe ukuzokhetha imeya entsha obekuhlelwe ukuthi ube ngoLwesine, uhoxiswe ngemizuzu yokugcina.UMphathiswa wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu eGauteng, uMnuz Mzikayifani Khumalo  uthe umthetho ucacile ngokufanele kwenzeke e-Ekurhuleni.“Akumina oshoyo kodwa wumthetho okhulumayo. Umthetho uthi uma umkhandlu uhluleka ukukhetha ubuholi, kufanele uhlakazwe. Njengamanje sicubungula isimo, sekufanele umkhandlu ufakwe ngaphansi komthetho uSection 139.“USection 139 uhlukene kabili. Ungakwazi ukuthi umkhandlu ungawuhlakazi ngokuphelele. Okunye ongakwenza wukuthi uwuhlakaze ngokuphelele. Lokho kungasho ukuthi kufanele kuqalwe phansi ukhetho, ukuze abantu baseku-Ekurhuleni, bezokwazi ukuvotela ubuholi obusha,” kuchaza uKhumalo.Uqhube wathi bakhathazekile ngokuphazamiseka kokuhanjiswa kwezidingo zabantu abangaphansi komkhandlu.UKhumalo uqhube kanje: “Imeya isebenza ngokugcwele kumasipala. Kanjalo nosihlalo bomakomiti nabo basasebenza. Ukungabi khona kobuholi kusho ukuthi abekho abantu abenza umsebenzi okufanele engabe wenziwa wubuholi.”UMasipala wase-Ekurhuleni ubuswa ngokubambisana ngamaqembu ahlukene, okuyi-ANC, EFF namanye amancane.I-EFF iyona ewungqo shishilizi kulo mkhandlu ngoba iphethe izikhundla ezibalulekile okubalwa esikasihlalo wekomiti lezimali eliphethwe nguSihlalo wenhlangano eGauteng, uMnuz Nkululeko Dunga, nesikaSomlomo esiphethwe nguNksz Nthabiseng Tshivhenga.Bumuncu ubudlelwano phakathi kwe-ANC ne-EFF kulo mkhandlu.Lokhu kwagqama kakhulu ngesikhathi kunesiphakamiso sokungabethembi ubuholi bukaNgodwana, oyikhansela le-AIC. Amakhansela e-ANC avele akhetha ukungavoti.I-DA eyakhishwa ekuphatheni umasipala ngonyaka owedlule, ithe isisombululo ukuthi umkhandlu uhlakazwe.Ikhansela leDA elakhishwa kwesobumeya uNksz Tania Campell, lithe basamile ekutheni bafuna ukhetho luqalwe phansi.

Uzokhunjulwa ezinkonzweni ezimbili ezahlukene ngoLwesihlanu eThekwini uBheka Mchunu, obengumsakazi woKhozi FM.UBheka (45) ushone ngoLwesibili ngemuva kokugula isikhathi kungaziwa ukuthi uphethwe yini.Ekhasini lakhe lika-Instagram kunamekwe imininingwane yenkonzo yesikhumbuzo ezoba sesontweni i-Ethekwini Community Church, enkabeni yeTheku.Kuthiwa izoqala ngo-2 emini futhi izobe isakazwa bukhoma ekhasini leNcanda Funerals kuFacebook.Nalapho ebesebenza khona kuKhozi kuhlelwe eyakhona inkonzo yesikhumbuzo yona okuvela ukuthi izoqala ngo-12 emini kuya ku-3 ntambama.Imininingwane iveza ukuthi izoba sezindlini zomsakazo eM1 Studios  futhi izosakazwa kuFacebook, Youtube nasemoyeni.Kusuka kuvele izindaba zokushona kwakhe baningi asebedlulise amazwi enduduzo.

UBEKADE engcwatshwe phezu kwesinye isidumbu, ethuneni elingashoni umfana oneminyaka eyisithupha wasePienaar, eMpumalanga ebese kuphele inyanga edukile.Kube sekuboshwe ibhungu elineminyaka engu-18 elititinywe kanzima umphakathi okumanje ligadwe amaphoyisa esibhedlela.Umsolwa kuthiwa uvumile ukuthi uyambandakanyeka ekufeni kukaJunior Mabandla nenye intombazane eneminyaka emithathu okulindeleke ukuthi isidumbu sayo simbiwe namuhla emathuneni asegcekeni kubo kamsolwa.UJunior wagcina ukubonakala ephila ngoJuni 6 ngabo-3 ntambama ephuma kubo eyothenga oswidi esitolo. Wayegqoke ijezi elihlaza okwesibhakabhaka nebhulukwe elimnyama.Umphakathi wavala thanqa izintuba ezingenayo neziphumayo kule ndawo ufakela amaphoyisa ingcindezi ukuba athungathe athole uJunior.Amaphoyisa aseMpumalanga athi ngoLwesithathu abizelwe endaweni yesehlakalo, kushubile lapho umphakathi ububuthene khona ubambe umsolwa okuthiwa uvumile ukuthi uyathinteka ekunyamalaleni kwalezingane.Kuvela ukuthi umsolwa uphuthunyiswe esibhedlela eyokwelashwa esekhombile ukuthi ugqitshwe kuphi uJunior.Umndeni kamufi uqinisekisile ukuthi isidumbu ngesikaJunior kanjalo nezimpahla ayezigqokile.Obambe esokuba uMkhuzi wamaPhoyisa eMpumalanga, uMajor General Zeph Mkhwanazi uzwakalise ukukhathazeka ngokwenzeke ePienaar wathi kukhona okungahambi kahle.“Siqinisekisa umphakatthi ukuthi amaphoyisa asiqaphile isimo ukuze alethe uzinzo kuleya ndawo. Sinxusa umphakathi ukuthi ugweme ukuziphindisela udedele umthetho uthathe indawo yawo,” kusho uMkhwanazi.

OWAYENGUMSAKAZI woKhozi FM, uNgizwe Mchunu, usevaliwe ekusebenziseni amabhanoyi angaphansi kwenkampani iFlySafair, emuva kokuphothulwa kophenyo obelwenziwa yizikhulu zale nkampani. Ngokusho kwemithombo, iziphathimandla zale nkampani zithathe isinqumo sokumisa lo msakazi emabhanoyini ayo emuva kokubonakala kwi-video ephazamisa ukusebenza kwabasebenzi nabagibeli ngeziqubulo namahubo.Emasontweni adlule , kusabalale i-video ebikhombisa uNgizwe nabehamba nabo bekhuza izaga futhi besho namahubo besebhanoyini esikhumulweni samabhanoyi saseThekwini, i-King Shaka International Airport. Ngesonto eledlule oyisikhulu sezokuxhumana kwa-FlySafair,  uKirby Gordon, wakuqinisekisa ukuthi bayibonile i-video ebiveza abasebenzi bale nkampani behlangabezana nezimbila zithutha ziholwa ngemhlophe phambili ebhanoyini i-FA196, ngesikhathi kuneqeqebana ebeliphazamisa abagibeli. Uthe iqeqebana liphinde laphula imithetho yokuphepha, okubalwa nokwehluleka ukuhlonipha izimpawu zokugqokwa kwebhande lokuphepha.“Abophiko lwezokuphepha njengamanje baphothula ukubuyekeza ngesehlakalo. Izinyathelo ezifanele zizothathwa ngokwenqubomgomo yethu, okubalwa nokuvala ngokuzayo abantu ababandakanyekayo  emabhanoyini akwa-FlySAfair,” kuphetha uGordon. Esebuzwa kuleli sonto uGordon ukuthi bahambe bagcinaphi nophenyo lwabo, uqale wathi akubuzwe uNgizwe. Exinwa ngemibuzo ugcine esethi uyenqaba ukuphawula kabanzi ngalolu daba ngoba sebeluphothulile ngokulandela inqubomgomo yabo.“Ngokwenqubomgomo yenkampani, asiphawuli ngodaba oluthinta ikhasimende elilodwa. Ngakho kufanele uthole imininingwane kuMnuz Mchunu. Okwethu ukugxila ekungadaluleni izimfihlo esinazo namakhasimende ethu. Siyakubonga ukuqonda kwakho futhi sizibophezele ekugcineni izinga lokunakekela nokuvikela amakhasimende ethu liphezulu.”Ethintwa uNgizwe, esikhundleni sokuphendula,  uvele wabhoka ngolaka maqede waqhulula intatheli ngenhlamba ngaphambi kokuvala ucingo. Umhleli walolu hambo lwabebebuya kwiBhinca Day eNyuvesi yase-Cape Peninsula, uSthembiso “Navigator” Gcwensa, wadlulisa ukuphoxeka okukhulu ngalesi sigameko esibandakanya izihambeli zakhe futhi wasigxeka kakhulu.“Ngesikhathi sesibuyela eKZN, abathize bahlulekile ukulandela imithetho yebhanoyi le-FlySafair. Thina njengenhlangano sidlulisa ukuxolisa kubo bonke abahlukumezeka, ikakhulukazi abenkampani i-FlySafair namakhasimende ayo. Siyaxolisa emphakathini wonkana futhi siyaqinisekisa ukuthi sizothatha izinyathelo ezinqala ukuze ukuziphatha ngale ndlela kungaphinde kwenzeke,” kusho uNavigator. Ngesonto eledlule, uNgizwe uthe abantu okufanele baxolise ngabanikazi be-FlySafair ngoba bona njengemabhinca babekhuleka kwiLembe ngoba indiza yayisimile. “Nalesi siphukuphuku esinguNavigator sasingekho endizeni. Uyazifaka ezintweni ayengekho kuzo. Uxoliselani? Uxolisela ukuthandaza?” kubhoka uNgizwe ozishaya isifuba ngokuba wumengameli wamabhinca owagcotshwa yiSilo SamaBandla. Akukhona okokuqala uNgizwe exabana nabantu esikhumulweni sendiza. Wake wamangalela abaphathi balesi sikhumulo efuna ukunxeshezelwa ngo-R10 million emuva kokubasola ngokulahla phansi ihawu lakhe ngoba belisola ngokuba namatele. Ngebhadi wakhala ngaphansi okwentshebe yaKwaMashu.

KUSHESHE kwamshela owesilisa ohlangane namaphoyisa esolwa ngokubulala usomatekisi ePitoli.NgoLwesibili ebusuku, kuhlaselwe usihlalo kasoseshini wamatekisi ahamba ngebanga enkabeni yedolobha iTshwane. Kubikwa ukuthi umsolwa uvulele ngenhlamvu ebhekise kumgilwa wamshiya edindilizele ngaphambi kokubaleka ngezinyawo.“Amaphoyisa ophiko oluqapha ubugebengu ezitimeleni ezwe kuqhuma isibhamu anikela ngalapho, abona owesilisa ebaleka ephethe isibhamu,” kusho amaphoyisa ngesitatimende.Amaphoyisa azamile ukummisa lo mlisa kodwa wadubula ebhekise ngakuwo, nawo aphindisela ngenhlamvu. “Umsolwa udubulekile emlenzeni nokuyinto emenze waphelelwa amandla wokubaleka waboshwa khona lapho.”Uphenyo lokuqala luveze ukuthi lo mlisa ungowaseNanda, KwaZulu-Natal. Ugaxwe ozankosi wabekwa icala lokubulala nokuphatha isibhamu esingekho emthethweni. Uhanjiswe esibhedlela. Kulindeleke ukuthi avele eNkantolo yeMantshi ePitoli, uma ededelwa.Amaphoyisa athi uphenyo luyaqhubeka ukuze kucace ukuthi awekho amanye amacala umsolwa anawo athinta imboni yamatekisi.

UMNYANGO wezaseKhaya uthe awuzixoshi izivakashi ezinama-visa asephelelwe yisikhathi zinelungelo lokuwavuselela. UNgqongqoshe walo Mnyango, uDkt Aaron Motsoaledi, ukusho lokhu esithangamini nabezindaba  izolo. Kulesi sithangami uMotsoaledi ubezochaza ngesekhula eyasusa umsindo  eyayithi zonke izivakashi  ezinama-visa  asephelelwe yisikhathi sezinsuku ezingu-90,  ezingawavuselelanga kumele zibuyele emazweni azo ngoFebhuwari 23.   Uthe okwakushiwo kule sekhula kwezwakala sengathi kuxoshwa izivakashi ezihlala zivakashela amazwe ehlukene uma kusehlobo ekubeni leli lizwe lizidinga kakhulu izivakashi kanti kwakukhunjuzwa abasebenza ngaphakathi ngomthetho. Uthe isiliphu sokuvuselela sinikeza ovuselele i-visa ilungelo lokuthi ahlale,  kuze kube umnyango uyaphendula.Uthe le sekhula kwakungeyokuxhumana ngaphakathi yagcina isifinyelele kwabezindaba,  okudale ukuthi kuzwakale sengathi umnyango wakhe uxosha izivakashi ezaziwa  ngama-Sun Chasers,  ezifika kuleli njalo uma kuqala ihlobo okujwayele ukuthi kube ngu-Okthoba zihambe uma sekungena ubusika ziye emazweni okusuke kuyisehlobo kuwo."Mhlawumbe kwakumele singayibhali isekhula, sisebenzise izindlela zangaphakathi zokuxhumana  ngoba sasifuna ukukhumbuza abasemingceleni ngale mithetho ekhona kuleli. Siyasebenzisana noMnyango wezokuVakasha," kuchaza uMotsoaledi.'Uthe kusukela kuphume isekhula kuvela ukuthi  ziyisithupha izivakashi ezithintekile kodwa udaba lwazo lulungisiwe." Akuyona into entsha ukuthi  uma usuphelelwe isikhathi sokuba sezweni elithize  kusuke kumele uvuselele i-visa,  nakwamanye amazwe lolu uhlelo lukhona. Kwamanye amazwe ushayelwa ucingo ukhunjuzwe, thina ukwenza kanjalo  ngoba ubuchwepheshe esibusebenzisayo abukwenzi lokho," kugcizelela uNgqongqoshe.UNgqongqoshe wezokuVakasha, uNkk Patricia De Lille,  ephawula, uthe  isekhula  yezwakala sengathi izivakashi ziyaxoshwa okwafaka ingebhe kwabakulo mkhakha ngoba basatabalasa  ekubuyiseni izivakashi kusukela kwahlasela iCovid-19.“Siyajabula ukuthi uNgqongqoshe usecacisile ngale sekhula, uke wacacisa ePhalamende kodwa bekumele aphinde acacise futhi ukuze wonke umuntu aqonde,”  kusho uNkk De Lille.

AKUPHUMANGA gama emhlanganweni wamakhosi nekhabhinethi laKwaZulu-Natal obubizelwe ukuzobhunga ngombango  wombhobho owasuka emcimbini wokukhumbula iSilo uDinuzulu kaCetshwayo.Umhlangano wangoLwesithathu awuzange unqume ukuthi uMphathiswa wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho, uMnuz Siboniso Duma, uzoya nini ukuyoshweleza eSilweni uMisuzulu Sinqobile kaZwelithini.Ubuholi bomdabu KwaZulu-Natal bebuhlangene nekhabhinethi lesifundazwe ngoLwesithathu lapho bekuxoxwa khona ngesenzo sikaDuma sokuphuca undunankulu kaZulu, uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi, umbhobho.Umhlangano obuseThekwini udonse kwaze kwaba ntambama.Usihlalo wendlu yobuholi bomdabu KwaZulu-Natal, inkosi Sifiso Shinga, uthe abazange baluphothule udaba."Yebo sihlanganile nekhabhinethi kodwa isiphetho sodaba asizange sifike kusona."Amakhosi nekhabhinethi bahlukene ngokwemibono uma kuza endleleni okufanele lusingathwe ngayo lolu daba.Amakhosi ayamgxeka uDuma, amsola ngokwehlisa uButhelezi isithunzi.Ikhabhinethi yona iyameseka uDuma, ithi wenza kahle wayabula umbhobho.Isola uButhelezi ngokufaka ipolitiki emcimbini kahulumeni.Yize kunalokhu kwehlukana kwemibono, uShinga uthe umhlangano wabo uhambe kahle."Sijabule kakhulu ngesikuxoxile. Iqiniso ukuthi sanelisekile."Amakhosi ayalela uDuma ukuthi aqale azovela phambi kwawo ngaphambi kokuthi ayoshweleza eSilweni.Amakhosi athi iwona azohambisa uDuma kwiMbube.UShinga uthe abakanqumi ukuthi bazomyisa nini uDuma eSilweni."Usuku alukaziwa, sizonazisa uma selubekiwe."

BEKUKHONA nengane enonyaka, unina nabantwana abathathu bengqongqa elolini umnikazi walo okunguyise walezi ngane.Izidumbu zitholakale emgwaqweni oyibhuqu ophakathi kwaseMabate naseTshiame B-Khalanyoni, eHarrismith ngoMsombuluko ekuseni.Obedlula ngendlela kuthiwa uzame ukubhula amalangabi, kwanhlanga zimuka nomoya, wase ehlaba umkhosi ebiza amaphoyisa.Umufi obeneminyaka engu-32 ushone nengane yomfana ena-10, eyentombazane eneminyaka eyisishiyagalombili nomfana ononyaka. Manje amaphoyisa athungatha uyise walezi zingane (35) okungaziwa ukuthi ukuziphi izinkalo.Uphenyo lwesikhashana lwamaphoyisa luveza ukuthi le ndoda, eligodliwe igama layo, okungeyaseMakwana, eQwaqwa, isuke ngo-4:30 kubo yalibangisa eTshiame B kwadadewabo kamufi iyolanda izingane nenkosikazi yayo.Amaphoyisa athe ifike emva kwehora eTshiame B, nebala yabathatha bahamba bonke ngeloli belibangise eQwaqwa kodwa kabazange bafike.Okhulumela amaphoyisa eFree State, uWarrant Officer Mmmako Mophiring uthe kutholakale izidumbu ezine elolini. Uqhube wathi kuvulwe idokodo lokufa kwabantu njengoba kusathungathwa umuntu wesihlanu.Ube esecela noma ngabe ubani ongalekelela ngemininingwane engaholela ekutholakaleni kwalo muntu wesihlanu ukuba athinte abaseshi baseHarrismith enombolweni ethi: 082 854 75 42 noma iCrime Stop kwethi: 08600 10111.

UNGQONGQOSHE weMfundo ePhakeme, uBlade Nzimande, wethule uhlelo lokufukula intsha ngamakhono ahlukene emcimbini obusesigodini sakwaNdlebezembuzi, kwaSwayimani kuleli sonto.UNzimande uthe ukuzibophezela ekuxhaseni ukuthuthukiswa kwamakhono kuyimpendulo yesicelo esafakwa yiNkosi yakwaSwayimani, uNdumiso Gcumisa neMeya yaseMshwathi, uMnuz Mandla Zondi  sokuba kwakhiwe isikhungo sokuthuthukisa amakhono esizoba wuphiko loMgungundlovu TVET College. Ekhuluma kulo mcimbi, uNzimande, uthe ukuqeqeshwa kwentsha yakwaSwayimani kudle imali engu-R30 694 700.Uthe ubumqoka bomkhakha wezolimo kule ndawo benze ukufukulwa kwamakhono ngaphansi kohlelo lwe-AgriSETA lwaba seqhulwini. I-AgriSETA ikhiphe isamba sikaR5000 000 ngenhloso yokuthuthukisa abafundi abawu-800 abafuna ulwazi ngokutshalwa kwemifino nokufuywa kwemfuyo. Uhlelo lweFP&MSETA lunikele ngesamba sikaR1 830 000 ukuze kufukulwe intsha efuna ukuthuthukisa amakhono okuthunga nokwenza ifenisha. I-MICTSETA ikhiphe isamba sikaR2 916 000 ekucijeni intsha emkhakheni wezobuchwepheshe. I-CETA ikhiphe uR12 788 700 ekufukuleni abafuna ukwazi kabanzi ngokubekwa kwesitini, ukwakhiwa kwezimpahla zepulangwe, i-welding nogesi.I-FOODBEV SETA inikele ngoR3 350 000 ukuze kucijwe abantu abafuna ukungena emkhakheni wokubhaka amakhekhe. I-INSETA ixhase ngoR2 275 000 ekuqeqesheni abazifela ngomkhakha wezobuchwepheshe kanti W&R SETA yeseke ngesamba sikaR2 535 000 ukufukula abasemunxeni wezobuchwepheshe nosomabhizinisi abasafufusa. UNzimande uthe lolu hlelo luzoqala ukwenziwa emphakathini wakwaSwayimani.Eqhuba uthe uhlelo lokuqala luzofukula amalungu omphakathi awu-2000, ikakhulukazi intsha engasebenzi neqeqeshwa ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme."Iqhaza elibanjwe ngamaSETA ethu ukuzibophezela ekulweni nokugqoza kwamathuba emisebenzi, indlala, ukungalingani nokuphucula impilo yomphakathi wakwaSwayimani."Uthe indima ezodlalwa ngamaSETA iyizinkomba zokuzibophezela kukahulumeni ekuguquleni impilo yabantu abajwayelekile, ikakhulukazi basemakhaya."Sikujabulele ukubamba iqhaza emphakathini. NjengoMnyango sikholwa ukuthi sidinga ukutshala imali ezindaweni zasemakhaya ngenhloso yokwenza imali."Lo mcimbi bewuhanjelwe ngamalungu awu-300 omphakathi, okubalwa kuwo iMeya yaseMshwathi, Inkosi uGcumisa, uMqondisi eMnyangweni weMfundo ePhakeme noQeqesho, uDkt Nkosinathi Sishi, usihlalo webhodi le-AgriSETA, uNksz Sharon Sepeng, isikhulu seNSFAS uMnuz Errol Makhubela nabanye osihlalo nezinhloko zamaSETA. Kulo mcimbi bekukhona nombukiso wemisebenzi yamakhono.

LISHONE elayizolo kuchwaza ezinkundleni zokuxhumana abantu bengawuvali ngesimemezelo sikaNgqongqoshe omusha wezemidlalo kuzwelonke osanda kungena kulesi sikhundla, uMnuz Gayton McKenzie, omemezele ukuthi usevale uhlelo lokukhokhelwa kwezindleko zokuhamba kwabalandeli bokuqina bezemidlalo bakuleli lizwe.Bekuhlekwa abanye bedabukela umlandeli wokuqina obehlale etetemuka namaqembu ezemidlalo kuleli uMama Joy, owaduma esewumlandeli wokuqina we-Orlando Pirates. NoBotha Msila akasalanga kulolu teku.Ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka, kwavela ukuthi kwasebenza imali yabakhokhi bentela elinganiselwa kuR1.3 million wokukhokhela izindleko zalaba balandeli behambe neqembu AmaBhokobhoko eNew Zealand naseFrance, ngonyaka odlule.Izolo, uMcKenzie ubhale ekhasini lakhe lakwi-X ukuthi usevale ukukhokhela izindleko zokuhambela imidlalo kwalaba balandeli, akuchaze ngokuthi akunasidingo futhi kumosha imali engabe isiza amaciko.“Sinabadlali bemidlalo ehlukene namaciko athwala kanzima ukuhlanganisa imali yokuya emicimbini yezemidlalo neyobuciko, ngakho kusiza ngani ukukhokhela izindleko zabalandeli? Asisekuyikhokha imali yohambo lwabalandeli, kunalokho sizosebenzisa imali lapho edingeka kakhulu kukhona,” kubhala uMcKenzie ongumengameli wePatriotic Alliance.

UNGQONGQOSHE wezeMpilo uDkt  u-Aaron Motsoaledi ucele iPhalamende ukuthi leseke ukulanyulwa njengendlela yokuxazulula izimangalo ezifakwe ngababopha izibhedlela esikhundleni sezinkantolo okuyindlela esetshenziswa manje. Uthe izinga okufakwa ngalo izimangalo kulo mnyango liholele ekutheni uphiko lwamaphoyisa oluphenya amacala ayisipesheli, iSpecial Investigation Unit (SIU) kusukela manje luphenye zonke izimangalo ezisolisayo.Ngeledlule iSIU ithe izicelo zokukhokhelwa kweziguli ezisola abasebenzi bomnyango ngokuzilimaza ezikhona manje zibiza uR4 billion. UMotsoaledi ubevele ngaphambi komhlangano wamakomiti amathathu ePhalamende ngoLwesithathu. Uthe odokotela sebeyasaba ukwelapha iziguli ngendlela ababona ngayo ngoba besaba ukuboshwa. Uthe lokhu kuyayishintsha indlela yokwelapha.UMotsoaledi ukuqinisekisile ukusebenzisana phakathi kwabameli abangathembekile nabasebenzi bezempilo ukuze kufakwe izicelo zokukhokhelwa ezifuna kukhokhwe imali eningi. Ezinye zazo ziwumgunyathi ikakhulukazi ezezingane okuthiwa zathikanyezwa imithi ethile yokwelapha ubuchopho zabe seziba ne-celebral palsly.Uthe kwezinye zalezi zicelo kuyenzeka ukuthi ingane okukhulunywa ngayo ayikho futhi ayikaze ibe khona.Ungqongqoshe uthe indlela yokuxazulula izimangalo ngaphandle kwenkantolo isetshenziswa emazweni amaningi eScandinavia." Le ndlela isiza abantu abaningi kuhlanganisa nemiphakathi empofu engeke ikwazi ukukhokhela abameli ukuthi ihlomule ngendlela enobulungiswa ngokulimala ngesikhathi sokwelashwa,"  kusho yena.Uthe igwema nokuthi odokotela basebenze benovalo lokuboshwa uma kwenzeka kuba nenkinga.

UNGQONGQOSHE wezoLimo nokuThuthukiswa kweziNdawo zaseMakhaya kwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Thembeni Madlopha-Mthethwa, uhlabe ikhwelo kwabesifazane basemakhaya ukuba babuyele emasimini bavuse ezolimo ukuze bafukule umnotho wesifundazwe.UMadlopha-Mthethwa ubekhuluma emcimbini wokugubha inyanga yabesifazane obuseNqulwana , ku-ward 14 kwaHlabisa ngoMgqibelo.Uthe  ezolimo ziwumgogodla womnotho, akumele abesifazane basonge izandla futhi uMnyango wakhe uzobaxhasa ukuze bakwazi ukuqinisa kulo mkhakha osanenqwaba yabesilisa abamhlophe."SinguMnyango sizimisele ukuba sinixhase siphinde senze isiqiniseko ukuthi njengabantu besifazane nidlala indima ebalulekile emnothweni wesifundazwe nasekudaleni amathuba omsebenzi," kusho okaMadlopha-Mthethwa.Ukusho lokhu nje ezindaweni eziningi zasemakhaya abesifazane bayazilimela ukuze badle nemindeni yabo njengoba bekhala ngokuthi awekho amathuba abavulelwa wona okudayisa imikhiqizo yabo emakethe.UNkk Babongile Mdletshe (54) uthe bayakujabulela ukuthi ekugcineni uHulumeni usesibonile isidingo sokubafukula emsebenzini abebazi ukuthi bawenza nje ukuze kulalwe kudliwe emakhaya."Empeleni besingazi ukuthi uma sizilimela izitshalo zethu lokho sekungasenza osomabhizinisi. Besazi ukuthi silima ngoba kumele emakhaya ethu kuhlale kunokudla singathengi konke ezitolo. Nokho uNgqongqoshe usivula amehlo okuba sihlangane singabesimame sikhande umnotho ngalezi zivande zethu esizilimayo," kusho uNkk Mdletshe.Udaba lokuba abesifazane bangene kwezolimo ngokwebhizinisi luseqhulwini kule nyanga yabesifazane.Muva nje uNdlunkulu wokuqala weSilo samabandla uZwelithini kaBhekuzulu, uNdlunkulu uSibongile maDlamini wakwaKhethomthandayo, ucele abesifazane eMkhosini weSivivane ukuba bayeke ukudayisa imihlaba yabo emakhaya kodwa abayilime benze ibhizinisi ngayo eliyohlomulisa isizukulwane esizayo emindenini yabo.IMeya waseBig Five Hlabisa, uMnuz Comfort Khumalo, ithe banezinhlelo ezizosiza abesifazane ukuba bakwazi ukulima.

UNGQONGQOSHE  kagesi ezweni uMnuz uKgosientsho Ramokgopa, umemezele ukuhoxiswa kwenqubo efakwe emqulwini kahulumeni, igazethi   yesigaba 34 eyavula ithuba lokukhiqizwa kukagesi wenuzi kuleli.“Ngiyayihoxisa igazethi ukuze ngivumele umphakathi ithuba lokuthi ubambe iqhaza,” kusho uRamokgopa.Lolu hlelo luyingxenye yezinhlelo zokukhiqizwa kukagesi wezwe ngesikhathi esizayo uhulumeni asebenzela phezu kwazo ngaphansi kohlelo lwezinsiza oludidiyelwe -2019, i-Intergrated Resource Plan 2019.  Ngokwalolu hlelo, u-2500MW womthamo kagesi ozophehlwa kusetshenziswa inuzi.Echaza ngohlelo uRamokgopa, uthe badinga ukubeka lolu hlelo ekutheni umphakathi ubambe iqhaza ukuze konke okwenziwayo kube sobala.URamokgopa uthe iNational Energy Regulator of South Africa (Nersa), yehlulekile ukwenza izingxoxo eziphelele mayelana nokuqalwa kanye nezindlela zokwenziwa kohlelo lukagesi, okuholele ekutheni kube nezinselelo zezomthetho. Kukhona abathile abakhala ngokungalandelwa kahle kwezinhlelo zokuqala uhlelo.“Abebefake izikhalo bebethi uMnyango usubuya nombiko wokuthi uzohlangabezana kanjani nemibandela esikhundleni sokuthi iNersa ilungise eyakwenza yokuthi izihlelele  yodwa. Bathi yayinesibopho sokudalula konke ngalolu hlelo  ngombiko enawo ngesimo esingenzeka nesingeke senzeke uma kwenziwa lolu hlelo. “Ngithe kwabakhalazayo, sinomthwalo wokuqinisekisa ukuthi uhlelo esilwenzayo umphakathi uyakwazi ukuluhlaziya, ugxeke ngokwakha kuhlanganisana nakho ukubheka isimo esingenaso isiqiniseko saso (suspensive condition)," kusho uRamokgopa.Uqhube wathi uyavumelana nokushiwo abakhalazo ngokuthi iNersa bekumele ifake uhlelo  enkundleni ezovumela ukuthi umphakathi ubambe iqhaza."Esingakufuni ukwakha phezu kwezinsolo zokuthi umnyango nohulumeni kukhona abakufihlela umphakathi. Ukuhoxiswa kwegazethi kuwukuqinisekisa ukuthi uhlelo luhlanzekile futhi lusobala. Yebo, ikhona inhlawulo oyikhokhayo ngenxa ngokubambezeleka kohlelo kodwa siyajabula ukulibazisa ukuze sivumele umphakathi ukuthi ube nezwi. Uhlelo luzolibaziseka ngezinyanga eziphakathi kwezintathu kuya kweziyisithupha," kusho uRamakgopa.

UNGQONGQOSHE wamaPhoyisa uMnuz Bheki Cele usole isifundazwe iKwaZulu-Natal njengesikhiqiza izinkabi ezithunyelwa ezindaweni ezehlukene zibulale abantu.UCele usho lokhu ngesikhathi ehlanganyele nezinduna zamahostela ahlukene eSoweto eGoli ngoMgqibelo. Uthe lesi sifundazwe sesidume kabi, kwaziwa ukuthi kutholakala kusona izinkabi ezithengwa ngamanani ahlukene.Lo ngqongqoshe wenze isibonelo ngoFisokuhle Ntuli, insizwa yaKwaNongoma eyagwetshwa odilikajele abayisithupha neminyaka engu-39 ngaphezulu ngamacala okubulala osomatekisi namakhansela.UNtuli uyathinteka ecaleni lokubulawa kukanozinti we-Orlando Pirates uSenzo Meyiwa kanti leli cala lisaqulwa enkantolo.“Kukhona abanye abaseShowe ababulala umuntu eKapa bengenayo nemoto yokubaleka bahamba bayogibela itekisi, babanjwe bebathathu besetekisini. ETembisa, kwabulawa itshitshi elingunesi, kulelo cala kuboshwe abantu abayisithupha, bonke labo bantu ngabaseMnambithi,” kusho uCele etshela izinduna.Uthe akakususeli ekhanda lokhu akushoyo kodwa kukhuluma ubufakazi bombiko wamacala nabantu ababoshwayo ngamacala enziwayo.Uthe kumphatha kabi ukwanda kwabantu ababulawa ngokuthengelwa izinkabi nokuthi kubonakala sengathi lobu bugebengu buxhaswe ngemali eshisiwe. Izinkabi ziqotha kwasani ezindaweni ezehlukene kusukela kosopolitiki, osomatekisi, abantu abathola nabafuna amathenda nemisebenzi komasipala abahlukene.

UNGQONGQOSHE woMnyango wabesiFazane, iNtsha, iziNgane nabaKhubazekile uxwayisa abesifazane abasebenzayo ngamadoda angamaqola ashaya sengathi eze ngothando kanti azobaqola. UNkk Sindisiwe Chikunga, uthe muva nje sekunamadoda athandana  nabesifazane abasebenzayo njenhloso yokubalutha ukuze basule emisebenzini yabo ukuze bathole mali yempesheni bese eyabaqola." Lona umkhuba omusha osudlangile, abantu besifazane abaqaphele ngoba lawo madoda abesha amashushu ngothando ayanyamalala ngemuva kokuthi esethathe imali yabo kuthiwa kuyoqalwa ibhizinisi," kusho uChikunga. UNkk Chikunga ubesho lokhu ngesikhathi ethula ngokusemthethweni izinhlelo zenyanga yabantu besifazane, ePitoli,  izolo.Uthe ziningi izinto eziwushintsho esezenziwe uhulumeni eminyakeni engu-30 ezibhekela abesifazane."Abesifazane ePhalamende ngo-1994 babengu-28%, ngo-2019 isibalo  bese senyukele ku-45%. Emanyuvesi abesifazane abathole iziqu ibona abaningi. Izibalo zika-2017 zikhomba ukuthi bangu-61% abathole iziqu emanyuvesi, abesilisa bangu-38%  Isibalo sabesifazane abasezikhundleni zokuphatha kuhulumeni nasezinkampanini ezizimele sisuke ku-20% ngo-2001 saya ku-36% ngo-2021," kusho yena.Uqhube wathi ngo-1994  amajaji ayekhona ayengu-165 kuwo angu-160 kungamadoda angabelungu, amadoda amathathu kungabantu abamnyanga nabesifazane ababili abangabelungu."Ngo-2023 izibalo zikhomba ukuthi eNingizimu Afrika bekunamajaji angu-253 kuwo angu-113  ngabesifazane, u32% wawo ngabesifazane abamnyama. Siqala le nyanga nje umengameli usanda kuqoka umengameli wamajaji wokuqala ongumuntu wesifazane, uJustice Mandisa Maya," kusho uNk Chikunga.Uthe ezinhlelweni ezihlelwe umnyango ezizokwenziwa kule  nyanga kubalwa umbungazo kazwelonke ozoba sePuffader, eNamaqualand, eNorthern Cape,  kuwo uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa  uzokwethula inkulumo yakhe. KwaZulu-Natal kuzoba nemashi yamadoda alwa nodlame lobulili ezobe iholwa yiSilo uMisuzulu kanye nePhini likamengameli uMnuz Paul Mashatile.

UNQGONGQOSHE wamaPhoyisa eNingizimu Afrika, uGeneral Bheki Cele uzovula ngokusemthethweni iziteshi zamaphoyisa ezine KwaZulu-Natal.Lokhu kuvezwe wokhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda.Ekuvulweni kweziteshi ngokusemthethweni, uCele uzobe ephelezelwa wuMkhuzi wamaPhoyisa kuZwelonke, uGeneral Fannie Masemola noMkhuzi wamaPhoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLieutenant General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi.Isiteshi sokuqala esizovulwa ngokusemthethweni yiGamalakhe Police Station esingaphansi kwesiFunda Ugu, ngoMsombuluko ngo-11 ekuseni.Esesibili yiDonnybrook Police Station esingaphansi kwesiFunda iHarry Gwala. Sona sizovulwa ngokusemthethweni ngoLwesibili mhlaka 23 Ephreli ngo-11 ekuseni.Esesithathu yiMelmoth Police Station okuhlelwe ukuthi sivulwe ngokusemthethweni ngo-Ephreli 30. Esokugcina yiManguzi Police Station okuhlelwe ukuthi sivulwe ngokusemthethweni ngoMeyi 3.Kwenzeka lokhu nje uColonel Netshiunda uveze ukuthi ithimba lokuqala lamaphoyisa angu-10 000 aqashiwe lizo aqala ukuqeqeshwa ezikhungweni ezahlukene zokuqeqesha amaphoyisa.Uthe ithimba lokuqala lamaphoyisa azoqala ukuqeqeshwa ngoMsombuluko mhlaka 22 Ephreli  linabantu abangu-4500.Elesibili linamalungu angu-5 500, lona lizoqala ukuqeqeshwa ngoJanuwari wonyaka ozayo.Ukuqashwa kwalama phoyisa kungena ngaphansi konyaka wezimali u-2024/2025.Ekuphothuleni kwawo ukuqeqeshwa, uthe azofakwa eziteshini ezibhekene nezinga eliphezulu lobugebengu, nasekuqinisekiseni ukuziphatha kahle kwabantu emphakathini.Amaphoyisa angu-10 000 aqashiwe athathwe kuzona zonke izifundazwe.Lokhu kuza emva kokuthi uMengameli weZwe uCyril Ramaphosa eminyakeni emithathu eyedlule enxuse ukuthi kwandiswe isibalo samaphoyisa ukuqeda ubugebengu.

UBHEKENE nomqansa uNgqongqoshe weMfundo eyisiSekelo uNksz Siviwe Gwarube, ofuna uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, abambe amatomu ngokusayina uMthethosivivinywa wezikole i-Basic Laws Amendment Bill (BELA), okunomsindo ngawo. UNksz Gwarube ufuna kwenziwe izichibiyelo kulo Mthethosivivinywa njengoba amaqembu afana ne-DA ekhala ngokuthi uphuca amandla izigungu ezilawula izikole odabeni oluthinta ulimi okumele lufundwe kuleso sikole, ukuba yimpoqo kukaGrade R ezikoleni nokunye. USihlalo wekomiti elibhekele izinguquko kwezomnotho kwi-ANC, uNksz Mmamoloko Kubayi, utshele abezindaba abebehambele iLekgotla ukuthi kudingeka uNksz Gwarube eze kwiKhabhinethi, afune ukwesekwa ukuze kwenziwe izichibiyelo.Uthe uMthethosivivinywa akuwona okangqongqoshe othile kodwa wagunyazwa yiKhabhinethi.“UMthethosivivinywa ukuRamaphosa, usawucubungula ngaphambi kokuwusayina.
