Ofuna kwenziwe izichibiyelo kumele aye kwiKhabhinethi, ayinxenxe ukuthi imeseke ngaphambi kokuba kwenzeke lokho. Okwamanje akekho oseke weza kwiKhabhinethi mayelana nezinguquko kuMthethosivivinywa,” kusho uNksz Kubayi.Okhulumela uRamaphosa, uMnuz Vincent Magwenya, ekhuluma ngezinhlelo zikamengameli izolo ezindlini zoMbuso ePitoli, uthe uMthethosivivinywa ukumengameli.Uthe umatasa nawo esebenzisana nabeluleki bezomthetho.“Akekho oseke weza kumengameli wathi akamise ukusayina uMthethosivivinywa ukuze ube ngumthetho. Kumele anikwe isikhathi ukuze awucubungulisise,” kusho uMagwenya.Uthe bayazi ngemvunge ekhona ngoMthethosivivinywa.“Umengameli uzokhipha umhlahlandlela ngokuzokwenzeka uma esephothule konke okuthinta uMthethosivivinywa. Ingcabha ikumengameli ukuthi awubuyisele emuva ePhalamende ukuze kwenziwe izichibiyelo uma ebona kunesidingo,” kusho uMagwenya izolo. UNkk Helen Zille, onguSihlalo we-DA, usabise ngokuthi bangaya nasenkantolo uma ugcina usayiniwe uMthethosivivinywa.Uhlale ekugcizelela ukuthi abahambisani nokuthi uMthethosivivinywa uphuca amandla izigungu zezikole.Ngakolunye uhlangothi izinyunyana zothisha ikakhulu iSadtu, ziyalele uRamaphosa ukuthi ayeke ukubamba ayeke kodwa asayine.Inyunyana yakhala ngokuthi uRamaphosa ujwayele ukuhudula izinyawo uma kumele asayine imithetho ephathelene nezemfundo.ISadtu isanda kukhala ngokuthi sekuphele iminyaka engu-10, kukutakutwa indaba yoMthethosivivinywa.

IHHOVISI lePhini likaMengameli, uMnuz Paul Mashatile, lithi uphile njengosheleni emuva kokuquleka ethula inkulumo emcimbini obuseTzaneen, eLimpopo, ngoMgqibelo.Okhulumela uMashatile, uMnuz Keith Khoza, uthe uMashatile uqulekiswe ukuphelelwa amanzi emzimbeni okubangelwe amazinga okushisa abekade ephezulu.UKhoza uthe amaphaphu phansi ezweni, uMashatile ungumqemane, ubonane nodokotela wakhe okunguye oveze lezi zindaba.Itshale ingebhe kubantu i-video ezungezayo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ekhombisa uMashatile, obekade eyisikhulumi sosuku, efumbeka phansi esesteji.Ubekade eyisicukuthwane emcimbini owaziwa ngokuthi iN’wamitwa Day esigodini iValoyi.UKhoza uthe ngesikhathi uMashatile ethula inkulumo yakhe uzizwe eba lula ephelelwa amandla obekade kudalwa wukushisa kakhulu.“Singakuqinisekisa ukuthi iphini likamengameli lisesimweni esikahle emuva kokuxilongwa odokotela,” kusho uKhoza.I-Economic Freedom Fighters (EFF) ikhiphe isitatimende lapho ebikade ifisela khona ukwelulama okusheshayo uMashatile.Leli qembu lichaze uMashatile ngomuntu oqavile kwipolitiki yaseNingizimu Afrika futhi nguye owengamele amabhizinisi kahulumeni ePhalamende.“Ungumuntu obalulekile ekuxhumaniseni amaqembu ezepolitiki aphikisayo nongqongqoshe. Uphinde aqinisekise ukuthi labo abasezintanjeni zoMbuso bayawenza umsenzi ababekelwe wona,” kusho i-EFF.I-EFF ithe yizindaba ezinhle ukuzwa ukuthi uMashatile welulama kahle, yathi ungumholi ozithobile, ovulelekile, otholakalayo futhi owenza kahle umsebenzi wakhe.

IQEMBU elisha eliholwa ngowayengumengameli wezwe uMnuz Jacob Zuma, liqoke obengungqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa kuleli futhi eyilungu le-ANC, uMnuz Nathi Nhleko, njengomgqugquzeli woMkhonto Wesizwe (MK) Party, ngaphambi kokhetho lukazwelonke luka-2024.Lokhu kwenzeke muva nje, ekubeni iqembu liqale laphika ukuthi uNhleko usejoyine iMK. Ubonakale kweminye imihlangano ebihlelwe yiqembu ngenhloso yokulungiselela ukhetho.Ngenyanga edlule uNhleko wesulile kwi-ANC, ekhomba ngenjumbane uNobhala-jikelele kaKhongolose uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, njengengxenye yembangela yokushiya kwakhe enhlanganweni.Encwadini yakhe yokwesula uNhleko wathi besekubuhlungu ukubona i-ANC iphenduka inhlangano angasayazi futhi ingasakwenzi eyayisungulelwe khona, okungukukhulula abantu ekugqilazekeni.UNhleko wasula kwi-ANC emuva kokungaboni ngasolinye noMbalula, owathi uKhongolose waqamba amanga ePhalamende ngombiko waseNkandla, ngenhloso yokuvikela uZuma.NgoJanuwari, ngesikhathi i-ANC ikhankasa eMpumalanga ngaphambi kweJanuwari 8 Statement, uMbalula wavuma esidlangalaleni ukuthi i-ANC yasenga ezimithiyo ngendaba ye-swimming pool, eyayizosetshenziselwa ukucishaumlilo emzini kaZuma, oseNkandla. Emuva kwenkulumo, uNhleko ukhwele wadilika kuMbalula njengonobhala obhacaze ukubedlula bonke emlandweni wenhlangano eneminyaka ewu-112.Ukujoyina kukaNhleko kwiMK kulandela okukaMervyn Dirks, obeyilungu lePhalamende ebelimele i-ANC, nokukaNkosetsha Shezi, obengomunye wabasunguli be-Areta, abasanda kuzibandakanya neqembu elisha.UDirks uxoshwe yi-ANC emuva kokujoyina iMK kwathi uShezi, ongumngani kaZuma, washiya kwi-EFF ukuze ajoyine iMK.Ngokusho kweMK, lokhu kuwukuqinisekisa ukuthi umkhankaso weqembu wokuphumelela ukhetho ngo-elethu, uyaphumelela.

UNIKWE ikhefu uFata wamaKhatholika eLamontville osolwa ngokuba yi-blesser lomfundi oneminyaka engu-17 okhonza ebandleni lakhe.Ngokuthola kwaleli phephandaba, uFata ubengekho enkonzweni ngeSonto esisuka kulo, ebanjelwe ngomunye owenze imisa kulandela ukuthi umndeni womfundi ongamalungu aleli bandla, uthole ukuthi bayathandana wase umceba kuMbhishobhi.Umndeni wengane, efunda izifundo uma kungamaSonto kulo leli pherishi, uthe ubambe izinkulumo phakathi kukaFata nalo mfundi obekucaca ukuthi bayathandana futhi sebeke baya nasocansini, naye uFata wavuma.Unina womfundi uthe ingane yakhe ibisihlale inemali, isigqoka izingubo ezithengwa esitolo soku-oda nge-internet iShein okuthi uma ibuzwa ukuthi izithenge ngani, ingasho. Kugcine kuvela ukuthi i-blesser wuFata."Ngike ngamshaya ngoba ubesenomkhuba wokunyamalala amahora ngingazi ukuthi uyephi kwaze kwaba ngilunywa indlebe yisihlobo ngokuthi sesike sambona izikhawu eziningana egibela emotweni kaFata.“Sinodadewethu sibe sesilandelela sifuna ukuthola iqiniso ngoba yena ubephika uma simbuza. Size savula iselula yakhe sabona izinto ezishaqisayo abazikhulumayo ezigcinwe kuma-archives," kusho unina.Uthe bewumndeni baziyele ngqo kuFata bayombuza ngalokhu, wavuma wathi “ulingekile”. Kuthiwa uvumile nokuthi sebeke baya ocansini, wathembisa nokuhlawula uma umndeni ungayamukela inhlawulo.Ngokwenqubo yamaKhatholika abefundisi bathathwa njengezindela, kabazibandakanyi nocansi futhi abaganwa."Asikwazi ukuthatha inhlawulo sengathi yinto eyemukelekile lena. Izingane sizidedela ukuthi ziye esontweni ngoba sazi ukuthi kukhona ubaba.“Uma sekuzophenduka yena enze into enje siyaphoxeka futhi sifuna anqunywe ebufundisini, anikezwe umsebenzi ozokwenza ukuthi angahlangani nezinye izingane bese enza okufanayo," kusho unina wengane.UMbhishobhi Elias Zondi, owumsizi kaMbhishobhi Mandla Mjwara ehhovisi lesiFundabhishobhi samaKhatholika saseThekwini, uthe lolu daba lubikiwe ehhovisi kuye nakuMbhishobhi (omkhulu). Basezinhlelweni zokuthi bathole umphenyi ozimele ozocubungula ukuthi likhona yini icala elingaphenywa. Kusenziwa lokho babone ukuthi uFata othintekayo anikwe ikhefu."Umndeni siwazisile ngokuthi inqubo ithini uma kunezinsolo ngoFata.“Uma umphenyi webandla etholile ukuthi kunecala okumele liphenywe, uzomiswa uFata bese kwaziswa amakholwa. Ngalolu hlelo asiqondile ukulunyathela udaba. Yinqubo esiyilandelayo kuwo wonke amacala," kusho uZondi.Leli phephandaba lizamile ukuxhumana noFata othintekayo ocingweni lwakhe, kepha belungangeni futhi lungayemukeli imiyalezo.

Uzoshaya indesheni emantshini acele ibheyili owesifazane oboshelwe icala lokubulala indodakazi yakhe eyayinodume lwengozi yokushaywa ngento ethile esiphundu.Kubikwa ukuthi isigameko senzeka KwaMashu, kwa-D ngoMsombuluko ekuseni ngesonto eledlule.Umsolwa uNksz Ncomisile Evarista Hlophe (43) uboshwe ngoLwesine lwesonto eledlule, wavela okokuqala eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseNtuzuma ngoMsombuluko.Namuhla ngoLwesihlanu kulindeleke ukuthi afake isicelo sebheyili ngecala lokubulala uLuvuyo Tafadzwe Bera (14).Umsolwa kuthiwa watshela amaphoyisa ukuthi ingane yakhe iphuze amaphilisi ekhanda, kanti izowela phansi isuka embhedeni eyayikade ilele kuwona, kwaba ukuthula kwayo.Nebala amaphoyisa kuthiwa afika asithatha isidumbu kwase kuvulwa idokodo ngokufa komuntu esiteshini samaphoyisa saKwaMashu.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe lishintshiwe icala laba ngelokubulala emuva kokuhlolwa kwesidumbu.“Umufi ubenenxeba elivulekile esiphundu kanti waqinisekiswa njengomuntu oshonele endaweni yesehlakalo. Umbiko kadokotela wokuhlolwa kwesidumbu uveze ukuthi wabulawa futhi washaywa ngento ethile,” kusho uNetshiunda.Uthe unina kamufi uboshiwe wabekwa icala lokubulala.Ngokuthola ngomthombo weSolezwe, kwakunamachaphazelo egazi lapho abosizo oluphuthumayo abafica khona isidumbu endlini.Kuvela nokuthi umufi nonina bebekade behlala bobabili kulo muzi osemgwaqweni uSangwana nokumenze waba ngumsolwa.Kuthiwa umbiko kadokotela uveze nokuthi umufi ubekade enomaka okomuntu oklinyiwe.

IMANTSHI ikhale ngendlela enesihluku okubulawe ngayo intombazane eneminyaka engu-14 ngesikhathi inqabela ibheyili unina ongumsolwa ecaleni lokubulala.Kuthiwa isidumbu sikamufi uLuvuyo Tafadzwe Bera besikade sinamanxeba amathathu okushaywa ngento ethile esiphundu futhi sinezibazi zokuklinywa.Kube sekuboshwa uNksz Ncamisile Evarista Hlophe (43) obehlala naye emzini okwa-D, KwaMashu.Umsolwa wenqatsheliwe ibheyili yiNkantolo yeMantshi yaseNtuzuma, ngoLwesihlanu, phambi komakhelwane abebethamele icala.IMantshi N Madlala ithe nakuba umufi esekobandayo kodwa uyabudinga ubulungiswa, umndeni wakhe ufuna izimpendulo ngakho ngumsolwa kuphela ongakwazi ukuphendula ukuthi kwenzakalani ngosuku lwesigameko.“Leli yicala elingajwayelekile. Ulindele ukuthi umzali kube nguye onikeza ingane uthando. Ingane ibizokhula ilime indima ethile emphakathini kodwa yabulawa ngesihluku esikhulu,” kusho uMadlala.Uthe ngokunqaba kwakhe ibheyili akasho ukuthi umsolwa unecala noma umsulwa kodwa yinkantolo eyolalela icala lakhe eyokwahlulela uma seliphothuliwe.Umsolwa ubefake isicelo sebheyili wathi ufuna ukuyongcwaba umufi. Uveze nokuthi unebhizinisi lokupheka elimile ngoba esezikhindini. Kodwa akayihlinzekanga inkantolo amaphepha alo nokuthi lenza malini.UMbuso uthe unezitatimende zomakhelwane abezwa umsindo wengxabano phakathi kukamsolwa nomufi. Sekuthulekile, kuthiwa umsolwa waphumela ngaphandle wacela usizo lokutholelwa i-ambulensi komakhelwane.Abanye balabo makhelwane abangathandanga ukudalulwa amagama, bathe abamazi umsolwa enjena, bebemazi ngomuntu olungile ngakho kumele akhulume iqiniso ukuthi kwenzakalani.Kuthiwa ngoJulayi 22, umsolwa utshele amaphoyisa ukuthi umufi waphuza amaphilisi ekhanda wawa phansi esuka embhedeni ayekade elele kuwona.Kodwa emuva kokuhlolwa kwesidumbu kube sekuvulwa icala lokubulala sekutholakele ukuthi umufi akazishonelanga.Kuboshwe uNksz Hlophe obenguye kuphela obehlala nomufi, wathweswa icala lokubulala.UNksz Hlophe obegundile ekhanda efake nezibuko, akazange akhale, athukuthele noma akhombise ukudangala encishwa ibheyili.Icala libe selihlehliselwa ngasekupheleni kukaSepthemba, ukuze kuqhutshekwe nophenyo.

BAVELE kancane enkantolo yeMantshi eVredenburg,abasolwa abane ecaleni lokunyamalala kukaJoslin Smith (6).Phakathi kwabantu ababoshiwe kubalwa unina wengane elahlekile, nesoka lakhe okuthiwa yilona elaliqaphe uJoslin ngosuku alahleka ngoFebhuwari 19, 2024.UJacques Rowhan Appolis (31), umngani wakhe uSteveno Dumaizio Duwayne Van Rhyn (27), uRacquel Chantel Smith ono-32, ongunina wengane elahlekile, noPhumza Sigaqa (iminyaka yakhe ayitholakalanga). Ekhuluma nabezindaba phandle kwenkantolo umyeni kaPhumza, udalule ukungenami ngendlela okusingethwe ngayo udaba. Uthi kwaqale kwaboshwa yena, nomkakhe nezingane zabo ngesikhathi kuvela imibiko yokunyamalala kwengane. “Salala usuku esitokisini ngosuku olulandelayo sakhishwa mina nezingane kwasala umkami. Kungiphatha kabi ukuvalelwa komkami ngoba akahlangane nayo yonke lento eyenzekayo,” kusho umyeni kaPhumza Sigaqa.Lo mlisa usola ukuthi umkakhe waboshwa ngoba behlala endaweni eyodwa nomama wengane elahlekile futhi bayazana. Uthi uyayeshwama imibiko yokuthi ngumkakhe owaxhumanisa isoka likaRacquel, nomngani walo nenyanga okuthiwa yadayiselwa ingane.Abasolwa babhekene namacala okuthumba, nokushushumbisa ingane. Icala lihlehliselwe ku-Ephreli 1,  lapho kulindeleke ukuthi bafake isicelo sebheyili. Umbuso uveze ukuthi uzosiphikisa isicelo sebheyili.

UMYENI kaZanele Mbokazi-Nkambule, uMbhishobhi Mpendulo Nkambule, ukhuze abasabalalisa ukuthi umkakhe uthakathwe emsakazweni Ukhozi FM okuholele ekutheni ashone.Lokhu ukusho enkonzweni yesikhumbuzo kaZanele ebisetendeni le-GNF Ministries eDurban Station, ngoLwesine.“Abantu abayiyeke le nto yokuthi uZanele uthakathwe emsakazweni Ukhozi FM lapho abesakaza khona. Ubephathene kahle nabo bonke abakulo msakazo kodwa uhlaselwe wumdlavuza okuyiwona othathe impilo yakhe. Nokubuyela emsakazweni Ukhozi FM ubengayiswa wukuthi ufuna imali kodwa ubekuthanda ukuba phambi kombhobho. Iphupho lakhe lokuthi abuyele emsakazweni, ngiyabonga ukuthi uhambe selifezekile. Ngiphinde ngibonge uSbongi (uSbongi Ngcobo ongumphathi woKhozi FM) ukuthi enze leli phupho lifezeke,” kusho uNkambule.Kuvuke umunyu wakhihla isililo uNkambule uma ecabanga ukuphilisana kamanndi noZanele nezingane zakhe athe azikaze zikhombise ukungamhloniphi nangelilodwa ilanga.“Ngo-2021, ngishonelwe yinqwaba yamalungu omndeni wami ngenxa ye-Covid-19. Kwashona umama, omalume nabafowethu ngesikhathi esifishane. UZanele ube iyona yonke into kumina njengoba ephenduke umama, umngani, udadewethu njengoba kunguyena ebengimkhalela kunzima. Namhlanje ngizwa ubuhlungu obukhulu ukuthi sengishiywe uyena. Bengithi angizokhuluma kodwa ngikhumbula amagama awasho kimina engitshela ukuthi ngizokhuluma futhi ngicule enkonzweni yomngcwabo wakhe,” kusho uNkambule kwehla izinyembezi.Udadewabo kaZanele, uKitty Mbokazi-Zulu, uthe ngesikhathi kushona umama wabo ohambe ngomdlavuza eminyakeni edlule, wakhuleka ukuthi kungaphinde kushone muntu kubo ngale ndlela.“Kubuhlungu ukuthi uZanele naye usehambe ngendlela efanayo. Yinto ebengihlala ngiyikhulekela ukuthi ingaphinde yenzeke ekhaya kodwa nakhu sekusiphindile futhi. Ngidiniwe kabi yile nto. Ngicela ngisho nozosiduduza angalokothi esivulela izwi elithi ‘Inkosi idinga ithole layo.’ Hawu ingaze izolidinga kuthina sivele sesibancane kanje bebe bebaningi abaseyinqwaba emakubo. Noma kunjalo kodwa siyabonga indlela eniseseke ngayo. Kusuka udadewethu eqalwe wukugula, abantu bebengena bephuma bezosibheka. Ngisho eseshonile udadewethu abantu balokhu bekhombise uthando njalo. Siyabonga kakhulu ngenisenzele kona,” kusho uKitty.Uthe uyabonga nangendlela abebethandana ngayo nombhishobhi njengoba bebambisane kwaze kwaba sekugcineni.“Ngikhumbula uZanele ezokwethula umbhishobhi kumina. Ngashaywa wuvalo ngibona lolu ngqwazi lwensizwa. Ngaze ngathi ninezibindi weZanele. Iphinde le ndoda ibe umbhishobi futhi,” usho kanje.Indodakazi kaZanele, uYolanda ibonge ukwesekwa komndeni kusuka unina eqalwa wukugula ezinyangeni ezintathu ezedlule kuze kube yimanje.“Umama ubenesibindi enza izinto zenzeke. Nami nginaso isibindi sikama. Ngizoqhubeka lapho egcine khona. Noma kungeke kufike ezingeni lakhe. Silimele kakhulu ngokuhamba kwakhe ngoba impilo yethu ngeke isefana nesikhathi esekhona kodwa impilo izoqhubeka,” kusho uYolanda.Enye indodakazi kaZanele, uNonjabulo ithe bayajabula ukuthi banoyise onguMbhishobhi Nkambule kanti nodadewabo kanina uKitty usekhona.Kule nkonzo bekugcwele kunyinyitheka kuphume nesinedolo. Abaculi bowokholo baphinde babhonga emsaneni ngokuthi banikele ngenkomo bephelezela uZanele ngayo.Kule nkonzo bekugcwele inqwaba yosaziwayo nabaculi abaduduze ngomculo. Phakathi kwabo singabala o-Ayanda Ntanzi, Dumi Mkokstad, Jumbo, Andile kaMajola, Tira, Ga Ndlela, Thobekile, Sipho Makhabane, Ihhashelimhlophe nonkosikazi walo u-Ebony, Noma Ngoma, usomabhizinisi uThemba Njilo, ababhishobhi nabafundisi bamabandla ehlukene, Lindelani Mkhize, Dudu “Lady D” Khoza, Sbongi Ngcobo woKhozi FM, Zimdollar Biyela, Timothy Myeni, Zulu Pavarotti, nabanye abaningi.Inkonzo yomngcwabo kaZanele izoba se-ICC eThekwini ngoMgqibelo bese efihlwa emathuneni eMarianhill, ePinetown.

KULINDELEKE ukuthi bafake isicelo sebheyili abasolwa abangu-15 ababoshwe ezifundazweni ezahlukene kuleli ngecala lokubulala nokuzama ukubulala eNyuvesi yaseFort Hare.UNgqongqoshe wezamaPhoyisa, uMnuz Bheki Cele, noGeneral Fannie Masemola bazifikele mathupha ngoLwesibili eNkantolo yeMantshi eDimbaza, e-Eastern Cape, ngesikhathi bevela okokuqala abasolwa ababhekene namacala amabili okubulala nelilodwa lokuzama ukubulala.Ithimba lamaphoyisa elabunjwa ukuze liphenye izigameko zokubulawa kwabantu enyuvesi, libophe abasolwa abangu-15. Kulaba basolwa kukhona no-Anwar Khan, ongumnikazi weThe Pentagon Group futhi obengumqaphi womrepha wakuleli owadutshulwa wabulawa eThekwini, u-AKA. Abanye abasolwa bangabasebenzi benyuvesi okubalwa nesikhulu seHR, umphathi weSupply Chain, nelungu lezokuphepha nokuvikela enyuvesi.Abasolwa baboshwe ngempelasonto ezifundazweni ezihlukene okubalwa iKwaZulu-Natal, Gauteng, Western Cape, nase-Eastern Cape. Babuyele enkantolo namuhla kanti kulindeleke ukuthi bafake izicelo zebheyili.Ukuboshwa kwabo kwenyusa isibalo sabantu ababoshelwe amacala athinta inyuvesi safinyelela ku-25. Abasolwa abangu-10 okungu-Isaac Plaatjies obengumqondisi kule nyuvesi, uBongani Peter obeyiChief Operating Transport Officer enyuvesi, Wanini Khuza owayengunsumpa wabashayeli osewathatha umhlalaphansi, Sicelo Mbulawa owayeyilungu leSRC enyuvesi kodwa osengusomabhizinisi ohlinzeka le nyuvesi ngomsebenzi wokulungisa izimoto, Mthobisi Khanyile odume ngokweba izimoto azishushumbise emngceleni, noMthobisi Dlamini onamacala evile kwawu-15 okugqekeza nokweba ezindaweni zaseBerea, Mayville naseMorningside, eThekwini. UThamsanqa Mgwetyana owabanjwa ebhace eKZN kanti kuthiwa nguyena owaveza igama likaPlaatjies njengothintekayo kulawa macala. UZimele Chiliza ongusomatekisi KwaZulu-Natal, uPelisa Nkonyeni ongummeli nephoyisa uLindokuhle Manjati elisebenza ngaphansi kophiko lwabaphenyi eMthatha.Bonke abasolwa babhekene namacala amabili okubulala, amathathu nokuzama ukubulala, ukutholakala nezibhamu nezinhlamvu okungekho emthethweni nokweba imoto. UPeter, Mbulawa noKhuza babekwe nelinye icala lokukhwabanisa.Indaba yaqala ngesikhathi kuqashwa uSolwazi Sakhela Buhlungu kwesokuba ngusomaqhuzu eNyuvesi yaseFort Hare ngo-2017. Ngo-2020 lo solwazi wathola ukuthi kunobudedengu kwezokuphatha, inkohlakalo nokukhwabanisa. Wakusukumela lokhu wabe esevula amacala obugebengu kanjalo nokuqondiswa ubugwegwe kubasolwa ababesezikhundleni eziphezulu enyuvesi.Ngo-2022, kwahlaselwa uMnuz Petrus Roets owayeqashwe nguBuhlungu kwesokuba ngumphathi wezithuthi kule nyuvesi. URoets wadutshulwa wabulawa esangweni lomuzi wakhe eGonubie. Ngemuva kokuhlaselwa kwalo mphathi, usolwazi wasatshiswa kwaze kwaba wukuthi utholelwa abaqaphi, waxhumana kanjalo noMnuz Mboneni Vesele owayengunogada wakhe. Akubanga yisikhathi esitheni besebenza ndawonye, wahlaselwa uVesele ngoyaba lwezinhlamvu ngaphandle kwamagceke omuzi kaBuhlungu, waphangalala khona lapho, ngoJanuwari 2023.

UKHATHAZEKILE ngokuphepha kwakhe owesifazane waKwaPata, eMgungundlovu, kulandela isigameko sokudlwengulwa okusolwa kuso iphoyisa ngaphakathi esiteshini samaphoyisa ngesikhathi eyofuna usizo.Ngokusho kukanina kamgilwa (25), isigameko senzeke esiteshini samaphoyisa i-Pietermaritzburg SAPS ngo-Agasti 15.Uthe umgilwa wayeyokwenza incwadi efungelwe, ayezoyisebenzisa ukufaka isicelo somsebenzi ndawana thize.Umsolwa ogcine eboshwa ngamaphoyisa ngo-Agasti 16, uvelile eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMgungundlovu, ngoMsombuluko, wadedelwa ngebheyili ka-R5 000.Unina kamgilwa uthe lokhu akwehlanga kahle kumgilwa njengoba ebevele enovalo kulandela isigameko.“Emva kwesigameko, indodakazi yami ivela yama ukuya lapho eyenza khona i-internship yayo ngenxa yokwesaba. Ithi izizwa ingaphephile,” kusho unina kamgilwa.Uqhube wathi, okwenze isimo saba sibi kakhulu, ukukhishwa kukamsolwa ngebheyili.“Kumsabise kakhulu ukudedelwa kwakhe ngebheyili, ubona ukuthi angamlandela nokumlandela, bese eyamenzakalisa,” kusho unina kamgilwa.Elandisa ngokwenzeka ngosuku lwesigameko, uthe umgilwa wayemi kulayini elinde ukusizwa ngesikhathi umsolwa emtomula kulayini, ethi akeze uzomsiza ehhovisi lakhe.“Wathi uma esengaphakathi ehhovisi lakhe, wamenzisa incwadi efungelwe. Uthe esuka wakhipha isibhamu enqulwini, ethi siyamsinda,” kusho unina kamgilwa.Uqhube wathi, ngokuphazima kweso, umgilwa uthe esuka wayebona umsolwa ekhiya isicabha, waqala wamdlwengula, emsabisa ngesibhamu ayesesisusile enqulwini.Udalule ukuthi emva kwesigameko, ngenxa yovalo, umgilwa waphuma wahamba esiteshini engabikile ngosekumehlele.Uthe washayela omunye umngani wakhe emtshela ngosekumehlele, nowamluleka ngokuthi akangabe esapholisa maseko, akaye kwadokotela, ayohlolwa bese eyovula icala kwesinye isiteshi. Iphoyisa laboshwa ngakusasa.Okhulumela uphiko oluphenya ubugebengu obenziwa ngamaphoyisa, i-Independent Police Investigative Directorate (IPID), uMnuz Phaladi Shuping, usiqinisekisile isigameko.Uthe i-IPID iqale ukusebenza udaba emva kokudluliselwa idokoko ebelivulwe esiteshini samaphoyisa i-Mountain Rise.“Umsolwa uvelile enkantolo ngoMsombuluko, ebhekene necala lokudlwengula, icala lahlehliselwa u-Okthoba 11 nonyaka, ukuze kuqhutshekwe nophenyo,” kusho uShuping.Ungoti kwezokululekwa ngokwengqondo, uDkt Manqoba Myeni, uthe abasolwa abenza okubi kwabanye njengakho ukudlwengula, bavame ukuthi baqale bamhlaziye masinyane umgilwa.“Ngeso elisheshayo, basuke befuna ukubheka ukuthi uma benza isehlakalo mangakanani amathuba okuthi basenze ngempumelelo,” kusho uDkt Myeni.Uqhube wathi izigameko ezifuze lesi ziyenzeka ezindaweni ezehlukene, nakhona emaphoyiseni.“Ezindaweni lapho okuhlangana khona abantu, bezofuna usizo, kukhona yonke inhlobo yomuntu okufaka phakathi nezigebengu. Umuntu angaba yiphoyisa kodwa aqhubeke enze izinto eziphambene nomthetho,” kusho yena.Uthe kuba nzima kumgilwa ukusheshe abone ukuthi umuntu ofuna ukumnika usizo, eceleni, unezinye izinhloso.“Mhlawumbe kubagilwa kungafanele baqale bazibuze imibuzo ngesikhathi etonyulwa eningini ukuthi ayonikwa usizo ngokukhethekile, azibuze ukuthi kungani etomula mina ngedwa, abantu bebaningi kangaka,” kusho uDkt Myeni.

KUPHELE amahlathi kubasolwa abayisikhombisa kwabayisishiyagalolunye bevinjezelwa oKlebe bengazelele.Lokhu kwenzeke ngoLwesine nangoLwesihlanu ezifundazweni ezine okuyiLimpopo, Gauteng, Eastern Cape ne Free State lapho oKlebe becaphune abesifazane abane nabesilisa abathathu. Kubikwa ukuthi laba basolwa bebesebenzela iSouth African Revenue Services (SARS) abanye babo sebelohonjwe indlela.Laba babhekene namacala okukhwabanisa, ukushushumbisa imali nokuphula umthetho wokuphathwa kwentala nokunguMthetho 28 ka-2011, ukwephulwa koMthetho wentela yeMpahla kanye neMpahla Ethengiswayo nokungumthetho 91 ka-1964, kanye nokwephulwa koMthetho Wokuvinjelwa Kobugebengu Obuhleliwe we-121 ka-1998. Kuseduze ukuba kuboshwe abasolwa ababili abafunwa uthuli.Kuthiwa laba basebenzi bebesebenzela eFicksburg Bridge, Maseru Bridge naseVanrooyenshek Bridge lapho bahla ubugebengu bokuthengiselana okungu-333 okufika ku-R653 500 455-28. Konke ukuthengiselana okuhlonziwe bekuyimpahla/impahla (indwangu) engenisiwe ngemali yebhondi (Ukususwa Ngebhondi) isuka esikhumulweni sokungeniswaa kwempahla emtateni waseThekwini ezothunyelwa ngaphandle emngceleni waseFree State (ngebhuloho laseMaseru).ISARS iqinisekisile ukuthi abasebenzi bayo abahlanu babhekene nenqubo yokuqondiswa ubugwegwe emsebenzini futhi balahlwa amacala baxoshwa emsebenzini.Abanye abasebenzi ababili basulile emsebenzini bangakaqondiswa ubugwegwe.Omunye umsebenzi naye oqondiswe ubugwegwe uthole incwadi yokugcine yesexwayiso, kanti ababili abangakaboshwa bona basabhekene nale nqubo kamqashi wabo.OKlebe, basebenzisane nophiko oluphenya ngenkohlakalo kwa-SARS, bethula icala eliqinile kuNational Prosecuting Authority (NPA). I-NPA ikwamukele ukuboshwa kwabasolwa futhi ibona kuboshwa kwalaba kuzothumela umyalezo ocacile kwabanye abenzi benkohlakalo namacala ahlobene nokukhwabanisa.Laba basolwa bazobingelela iMantshi yaseLadybrand ngoMsombuluko mhla ka10 Juni 2024.

BAYOKHOHLWA befile abazibonele owesilisa enquma umakhelwane wakhe uqhoqhoqho ejoyintini kubuka abantu endaweni yokucima ukoma eMevamhlophe, eMpangeni, ngempelasonto.Kulesi sigameko esishaqise umphakathi, kwazise senzeke emini ka bha, kunqunywe uMnuz Thabani Ncanana (21) okuthiwa uke wahilizisana nalo wesilisa emasontweni edlule, khona endaweni yokucima ukoma.Kuthiwa umufi ufele endaweni yesigameko.Ngokusho kukamalume kamufi, uMnuz Sifiso Mathe, umufi ubeziyele eSiphethwini, okuyindawo yokucima ukoma endaweni.Kuthiwa phambilini laba ababili bathi uma bexabana, umsolwa wasabisa umufi  ngokuthi uzomgwaza, okuthe uma sebeficana kule ndawo umufi wabuza ukuthi wayesho ukuthini uma ethi uzomgwaza. Kuthiwa ingxabano isuke lapho ke, umsolwa wakhipha uhalakasha lommese wamnquma  uqhoqhoqho ethi ‘ uyamkhombisa ukuthi wayechaza ukuthini’.UMathe uthe abebekhona kule ndawo babatshele ukuthi umsolwa ubalekile. UMathe uthe umsolwa usuke kule ndawo waya kwenye ebude buduze wayoziphuzela kuyona kwangathi akonakele lutho. Uthe ubhadanywe yibo namaphoyisa ezidansela futhi ezicima ngotshwala. "Uthe uma ebona amaphoyisa wabaleka wangena ethoyilethi. Eseficwa khona, uma ebuzwa ukuthi wenzeni, wathi yena akenzanga lutho," kusho uMathe.Uqhube wathi uthe uma ebuzwa ngesigameko, wathi yena akukhumbulayo ukuthi baxabene nomufi kuphela.Kuvela nokuthi ummese omkhulu anqume ngawo umufi uwufake esikhwameni wawunika isihlobo esiyingane wathi asiyowufihla."Sithe uma sifika kubo namaphoyisa, usucingwe nasehlathini ummese ungatholakali, unina wambuza ukuthi yini le abeyinika ingane ekuseni, ethi iyoyifihla," usho kanje.Uqhube wathi isikhwama abefake kuso ummese sigcine sitholwa emva kwendlu lapho ebesithukuswe khona yingane."Ubusenalo igazi. Ngathi uma ngimbuza ukuthi umbulaleleni ubafo, wathi ubengazi ukuthi owakithi. Ngaxakeka ke ngoba phela umuntu noma ngabe owaphi, akufanele abulawe," kusho uMathe.Uthe abamdingi ngaphandle umsolwa njengoba engumuntu owaziwa ngokuba yisigelekeqe endaweni.Uveze ukuthi wenza leli cala nje, ungaphandle ngebheyili ngelinye icala asaqhubeka nokulihamba enkantolo."Udaba silubizele amaphoyisa ukuze umthetho udlale indima yawo ngoba asifuni ukuzithathela umthetho ngezandla. Lo muntu asimdingi ngaphandle, asifuni aphume ngisho nangebheyili," kusho uMathe.

UNDUNANKULU waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, uthe akafuni ukuphinde ababone abokufika abakuleli ngokungemthetho emafemini aKwaSithebe, eMandeni.UNtuli usho kanje ngoLwesihlanu, kule ndawo ngesikhathi ehambele amafemu ehlukene, eyohlola izimo zokusebenza kuwona.Ekhuluma nezisebenzi ezivele zaqoqana eduze kwakhe, zimbona etheleka kungazelelwe namaphoyisa, abezoMnyango weziSebenzi, uMnyango wezaseKhaya nobuholi bendawo, uthe udaba lwabokufika abangenamaphepha abagunyaza ukuba kuleli, akafuni ukuphinde ababone kule femu abeyihambele, nakwamanye asendaweni.“Ngiyezwa ukuthi nithi bazongena (emsebenzini) ebusuku (abokufika). Angithi amaphoyisa akhona? Azophinde abuye nasebusuku,” kusho uNtuli.Uthe lolu hlelo lwangoLwesihlanu, luzoqhubeka nangezinye izinsuku, ngisho engasekho yena, wathi abakwasidlodlo behambisana nobuholi bendawo bazolokhu beya njalo emafeni ukuyobheka ukuthi iyaqhubeka yini indaba yokuqasha abantu bakwamanye amazwe abakuleli ngokungemthetho.Uthe basembhidlangweni wokuhambela wonke amafemu esifundazweni ukubheka ukuthi aqashe abantu okufanele baqashwe yini.“Sizobheka nokuthi izimo zokusebenza zisezingeni yini. Sibheke ukuthi imithetho yamaholo iyalandelwa yini,” kusho uNtuli.Uqhube wathi uhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal noMnyango wezaseKhaya bazoqhubeka babambisane ukuthi lolu hlelo abaluqalile luqhubeke.“Asifuni kube khona abantu okuzodlalwa ngabo. Sizozilandelela izimo enisebenza ngaphansi kwazo ngoba baningi abantu bakule ndawo abangaqashiwe, abafuna umsebenzi,” usho kanje.Wethembise ukuthi uzobuyela emumva ayohlela ithimba elizobuya lizohlala phansi (nezisebenzi), lithathe zonke izikhalo zazo ukuze abone ukuthi zixazululwa kanjani.“Namuhla bengizobheka nje abokufika abangenawo amaphepha okuthiwa bagcwele la,” kusho uNtuli.Izisebenzi zizwakalise ukungeneliseki ngesikhathi uNtuli ethi kufanele zibike ukungaphatheki kahle kwazo eMnyangweni wezeziSebenzi, zathi uyagwazelwa, awuzithatheli phezulu izikhalazo zazo.

ABAMANGALELWA ababili ecaleni lokubulawa kowayengunozinti uSenzo Meyiwa, bayabuchitha ubufakazi bokuthi batholwa namaselula besejele. UMeyiwa owayeyisilomo se-Orlando Pirates neBafana Bafana, wadutshulwa wabulawa ekubo kwentombi yakhe Kelly Khumalo eVosloorus, eGauteng, ngo-2014.Ufakazi woMbuso, uSergeant uVusumuzi Mogane, uthe kwatholakala iselula kummangalelwa wesihlanu uFisokuhle Ntuli owayesejele eQalakabusha, eMpangeni. UMogane usethimbeni labaphenyi abaphethe udaba lokufa kukaMeyiwa.UMogane uthe ngo-Agasti 2020, wayeseMpangeni ehamba noBrigadier Bongani Gininda ngesikhathi bethola ukuthi uNtuli uphethe iselula ejele. UMogane uthe babevele besendleleni beyophenya uNtuli ngecala likaMeyiwa kodwa wayeboshelwe elinye icala eMpangeni.“Sathintwa wumphathi wejele eQalakabusha ethi uNtuli utholwe neselula. Saphuthuma khona lapho ejele siyothola kabanzi ngalokhu. Safika sayithola iselula kumphathi wejele sayithatha sayifaka esikhwameni sobufakazi,’’ kusho uMogane.UMogane ufakazelwe wuMnuz Sibusiso Yaka owayewumphathi wejele iQalakabusha osedla umhlalaphansi. UYaka utshele inkantolo ukuthi wathola iselula kuNtuli wase eyinika abaphenyi becala ngoba wayazi ukuthi bavele baphezu komsebenzi wokuphenya ngecala likaMeyiwa.UMogane uphinde wethula ubufakazi bokuthi ummangalelwa wesibili uMnuz Bongani Ntanzi watholwa neselula esiteshini samaphoyisa eVillieria, ePitoli. UMogane uthe walunywa indlebe ngokuthi uNtanzi uphethe iselula nangempela wafika wayithola ezingutsheni zokulala.UMogane uthe kuNtuli kwatholwa iselula iStylo kanti kuNtanzi kwatholwa iSamsung J5 ahlolwa kwatholwa ubufakazi obuhlobene necala lokufa kukaMeyiwa.UMogane uthe enye yamaselula yathunyelwa kuColonel Lambert Steyn owungoti owawacubungula. USteyn uke wafakaza phambilini, eveza ukuthi ummangalelwa wesihlanu uNtuli wake waxhumana noKelly ngaphambi kokufa kukaMeyiwa.Ummeli kaNtanzi uMnuz Sipho Ramosepele uthe ikhasimende lakhe liyayichitha indaba yokuthi latholwa neselula. Ubepheka uMogane ngemibuzo embuza ukuthi kuphi lapho abhala khona ngesikhathi ethola iselula?Ummeli kaNtuli, u-Advocate Zandile Mshololo, uthe ikhasimende lakhe lithi iselula yatholakala eduze kombhede wesinye isiboshwa ayehleli naso futhi ne-charger yatholwa ekhabetheni laso.UMshololo uchithe ubufakazi bukaYaka othe uNtuli wazikhiphela yena iselula ngaphandle kokuphika. Kulindeleke ukuthi icala libuyele enkantolo namuhla kubizwe omunye ufakazi woMbuso.

UNdunankulu omusha waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, umemezele ikhabhinethi yakhe entsha ngoLwesibili ekuseni.UNtuli, obeyiMeya kaMasipala iKing Cetshwayo, umemezele ikhabhinethi ngemuva kokufungiswa yiJaji uThoba Poyo-Dlwathi, ezinkundleni zemidlalo iWoodburn, eMgungundlovu.Kwikhabhinethi yakhe ufake nabavela kwamanye amaqembu njengoba isifundazwe sibuswa wuhulumeni wokubambisana ngemuva kokuthi kungabanga khona qembu elinqobe uqekelele.Amaqembu i-IFP, DA neNFP asayine isivumelwano sokusebenzisana.UNtuli ubabe kanje ongqongqoshe:UMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho - Mfundisi Musa ZondiUMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana kanye neziNdaba zoMdabu - Mfundisi Thulasizwe ButheleziUMnyango weMisebenzi yoMphakathi - Mnuz Martin MeyerUMnyango wezeZimali - Mnuz Francois RodgersUMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi - Nksz Mbali ShingaUMnyango wezokuThutha - Mnuz Siboniso DumaUMnyango wezeMfundo - Mnuz Sipho HlomukaUMnyango wezoLimo - Nkk Thembeni Madlopha-MthethwaUMnyango wezeMpilo - Nksz Nomagugu SimelaneUMnyango wezemiDlalo, ubuCiko namaSiko - Mnuz Mntomuhle Khawula

UMMANGALELWA wesihlanu ecaleni lokufa kukaSenzo Meyiwa, uFisokuhle Ntuli, uvumile ukuthi ngeyakhe inombolo yocingo okwake kwavela ukuthi ixhumane noKelly Khumalo.UMeyiwa wadutshulwa wabulawa ekubo kwentombi yakhe uKelly eVosloorus, eGauteng, ngo-2014. UMbuso uthi abamangalelwa abahlanu bamkakisa okwenyamazane uMeyiwa bethengiwe.NgoLwesine, kuvele ukuthi uNtuli uyayivuma inombolo okuthiwa waxhumana ngayo noKelly ngaphambi kokufa kukaMeyiwa.Ummeli kaNtuli, u-Advocate Zandile Mshololo, ubepheka ngemibuzo ungoti wamaselula uLiutenant Colonel Gideon Gouws ngesikhathi kuvela lokhu. Kuvele izinombolo eziningi eziyamaniswa noNtuli, waziphika wazikhomba ezihlotsheni zakhe, wavuma eyodwa.Inombolo avumile ukuthi ngeyakhe yileyo eyahlonzwa wungoti wamaselula, uColonel Lambertus Steyn, njengokuyiyona uNtuli axhumana ngayo noKelly. UColonel Steyn nyakenye, wethula ubufakazi wathi uNtuli waxhumana noKelly ngo-Agasti 2014 kuyoshaya u-11, ebusuku baxoxa cishe imizuzu emibili.UMshololo uthe uNtuli uyayiphika enye inombolo uthi ekanina uBathethelele Zungu ongasekho emhlabeni. Enye inombolo uyiphikile wayikhomba kuMabhonga Ntuli naye okuthiwa sewashona.Kukhona enye inombolo ayiphikile wayikhomba kuLungisani Ndwandwe ophilayo nokuvele ukuthi uzobizwa azofakaza. UMbuso uthi uNtuli unolwazi ngokufa kukaMeyiwa, wayekhona eshayela iVW Polo.UMbuso uthi uNtuli wayemi ngaphandle nommangalelwa wesine uMthokoziseni Maphisa, beqaphe isimo ngesikhathi abanye begila umkhuba ngaphakathi.UMbuso umile ekutheni abamangalelwa bathengwa ukuthi bajuqe uMeyiwa futhi lokhu kwahlelwa ehostela eVosloorus. Kulindeleke ukuthi icala libuyele enkantolo namuhla, kuqhutshekwe kuphekwe ungoti wamaselula ngemibuzo.

ABEPHUME ngobuningi bawo amaNazaretha ngesikhathi  kuvulwa ngokusemthethweni uMhlangano kaJulayi futhi kungeniswa uMdedele kuleli sonto. Indawo yaseBuhleni beyimhlophe sengathi yembethe iqhwa, kumhlophe zonke izinkalo ngamaNazaretha.Ekhuluma ngosuku lokungenisa uMhlangano, umholi wasohlangothini laseBuhleni, kwaShembe, Inkosi uMduduzi "uNyazilwezulu" Shembe, ukhale ngamasela ahlukumeza amaNazaretha eMhlanganweni kaJulayi. UNyazi belukhuluma ngesikhathi kungeniswa uMdedele ngoMsombuluko."Ngiyacela namasela ake asixolele kule gemu. Phela amasela azalwa yithi. Nawe-ke mNazaretha ungathathi-ke into ehluphayo kwakho uyilethe la. Izofika la bese iyakuveza ukuthi iyahlupha. Uyabanjwa lo muntu, esentshontshile kutholakale ukuthi yindodana yomfundisi. Indodana yomvangeli. Indodana yomshumayeli. Bese omunye eseshaywa ngoba phela uma ufica umuntu esesedokodweni lakho..."UNyazi luthe alugqugquzeli ukuba bashaywe abagqekeze emadokodweni."Kodwa uma esephakathi edokodweni lakho, kade ukhiyile wena, sekufanele cishe asigwinye isibhakela esisodwa. Uyamfica uyahlunga, uthatha amabhulukwe akho, amanye uwabeke ngala..." Unxuse ukuba abazobhadanywa benza ubugebengu bangabekwa izandla kodwa balethwe kuye."Ngoba ngiyazi niyashaya kodwa akufanele nishaye ngale ndlela enenza ngayo. Umuntu engabe esazi ukuthi abaleke ashone kuphi. Athi uya nga la, kuthiwe vala. Athi uyakha ngujubane, abe la amaNazaretha. Nangaphambili kube sengathi athi yima wena, uyaphi la kuthina.”UNyazi luthe abangashaywa abantu ngoba uzothi uyamlokotha kanti ubesesalelwe imizuzu emibili ephila."Uthi uyamshaya bese ethula. Usuyabuya uza kimi uzofuna uVaselina wokuvusa umuntu, ebulawe nguwena. Ngakho ngiyanicela bantwana bakaNkulunkulu, kade sawulinda lo Mhlangano. Sewuze wafika."UNyazi lubuye lwacela abanikazi bezitolo ukuba bazivale izitolo ngesikhathi kusontwa.Lubuye lwadonsa ngendlebe abantu abaxabene ukuba bangezi nengxabano yangasemakubo bezodunga ngayo uMhlangano.Lo mholi ubuye wadonsa ngendlebe amakhosazane ukuba angabonakali egcaluza kodwa uhlale eSipholi. "Akufunakali-ke inkosazane egcaluza umuzi wonke sengathi idiliva iposi. Kufanele abantu bahlale eSipholi. Kunesikhathi-ke okufanele inkosazane isazi ukuthi ngaseKamu ayisafuneki ngaso."UNyazi luthe isikhathi okungasafuneki ngaso amakhosazane u-7 ntambama. Luthe intombi ayihambi nomfana uma sekungene isikhathi somhlangano, "ngisho noma owakini ngoba akanayo i-number plate ethi owakini."Lubuye lwanxusa amakhosazane kuMdedele ukuba aziphathe kahle."Okufanele nikwazi makhosazane ukuthi nina ningabanikazi balo mhlangano. Kufanele niwuphathe kahle, ungoniwa yinina. Ngibabekile abashumayeli.  Abashayi bayabhaxabula. Angazi-ke. Ngithe benganishayi kakhulu. Kodwa nifuna ukushaywa khona. Ophuma esiporweni kufanele asithole isijeziso. Noma ningashaywa yinhlalisuthi yabashumayeli, kuyofanele baniyise kubaphathi benu. Angazi-ke ngoba abaphathi bayayidedela impama. Ziyovuthwa izihlathi," kuphetha uNyazi.Njengoba kuyinkonzo kaJulayi, kuningi okwenzeka kuyona. Kumanje amaNazaretha azile izinto eziningi njengoba kuwuJulayi. Awayi ocansini kanjalo nokunembiliso awakudli kuze kuphele uJulayi. Kunemigido eyahlukene okungeyomama, eyezintombi neyenhlalisuthi. Nezintombi ziyisa nezintingo eNtanda eNanda lapho zisuke zilindwe khona wuNyazilwezulu. Uma sekuvalwa umhlangano ngasekupheleni kwenyanga kulapho kuzobe sekuyiwa khona ebhentshini lapho inhlalisuthi izobe ikhetha izintombi ngenhloso yokuganwa. Kuzophinde kuphume nemishado esuke ibusiswa khona enkonzweni ngokohlelo lwamaNazaretha.

KUYINTO ejwayelekile ukuthi abesifazane abaningi abazithwele bangazi bazothathani bahlanganise nani ngenxa yokungasebenzi nokungesekwa obaba bezingane.OyiMeya yoMasipala uMngeni nozibheke kwesokuba uNdunankulu wesiFundazwe iKwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Chris Pappas uthembisa ukuholela onina bezingane besakhulelwe.Lokhu ukuveze kwingxoxo ekhethekile abenayo nabeSelect Africa TV etholakala kwiYoutube. UPappas uveze ukuthi uyabuqonda ubunzima ababhekana nabo abesifazane ngesikhathi bekhulelwe kodwa bengasebenzi.Yize besuke bezosithola isibonelelo sesondlo sikahulumeni kodwa uPappas uveza ukuthi izindleko ziqala ingane isengaphakathi esiswini sikanina nokuyinto azoyisukumela."Umama okhulelwe akaholi isibonelelo sesondlo, okusho ukuthi ingane uma isengaphakathi iyahlupheka ngoba umama akakwazi ukuthola ukudla.“Kuze kube umntwana uyaphuma bese umama kuyima ekwazi ukuthola isibonelelo sesondlo. Sithi uma ukhulelwe kumele ukwazi ukuqala uthole isibonelelo sesondlo ukuze ukwazi ukuzinakekela nomntwana wakho," kusho uPappas.Selokhu kusabalele ingxenye yesiqephu sale nkulumo abantu bahlukene phakathi, babodwa abazwakalisa ukuyithakasela nokubona engathi izokwehlisa umthwalo kwabesifazane.Abanye bakhala ngokuthi kungandisa isibalo sabakhulelwa bengasebenzi ngenxa yokuthembela kulokhu.

OMELE iDA embangweni wesikhundla sikandunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Chris Pappas, uthembisa ukuqala isibonelelo sabafuna imisebenzi uma benqoba ukhetho esifundazweni.UPappas uthe bafuna ukunika intsha imali yokugibela ukuze kube lula uma iyofuna imisebenzi.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ethula umqulu wezethembiso zokhetho weDA KwaZulu-Natal, eVerulam, ngoMgqibelo.Ukwethulwa komqulu waKwaZulu-Natal kulandela ukwethulwa komqulu weDA kazwelonke owethulwa ngenyanga eyedlule.UPappas uthe abantu abaningi bagcina belahla ithawula ekufuneni imisebenzi ngenxa yokweswela imali yokugibela.“Kunzima ukuba ngumuntu ofuna umsebenzi. Kufanele ube nemali yokugibela ekubeni ungaholi ndawo. Ingakho sizoqhamuka nesibonelelo ukuze abantu abasha bezokwazi ukuyofuna imisebenzi.”UPappas uthembise ukusungula amathuba emisebenzi angu-300 000 uma enikwa ithuba lokuphatha.Uthe lokhu uzokwenza ngokutshala imali kwingqalasizinda nakwezomnotho.“Uma ngikhuluma ngamathuba emisebenzi, angikhulumi ngamatoho lawa i-ANC ehlezi iwathembisa ohlelweni lwemisebenzi yomphakathi. Ngicela ningizwe kahle, akukho okubi ngemisebenzi yomphakathi kodwa iqiniso ukuthi iyimisebenzi yesikhashana. Imisebenzi yomphakathi ayisona isisombululo sokuqeda indlala. Uma ngikhuluma ngokudalwa kwamathuba emisebenzi, ngisho imisebenzi lapho abantu bezoqashwa khona ngokugcwele.”UPappas uthe ngeke abalahle labo abaneminyaka engaphezu kuka-35.“Abaneminyaka engaphezu kuka-35 basele dengwane, abanikwa amathuba emisebenzi. Uma ngikhethwa njengondunankulu, ngizoqhamuka nezinhlelo zokuthuthukisa abantu abaneminyaka engu-35.”UPappas uthe ukucishwa kukagesi kuphazamisa imizamo yokudala amathuba emisebenzi.“Ngizokwandisa umthamo kagesi esinawo ngokuthenga ugesi ezinkampanini ezizimele, sisebenzise nezinye izinhlobo zikagesi. Indaba yokuthembela kwi-Eskom ikhona okusilimazayo. Uma kunikwa abanye abantu ithuba lokuthi basihlinzeke ngogesi, kuzokwenza ukuthi sibe nogesi omningi, namanani kagesi azokwehla.”UPappas ukhale ngezinga eliphezulu lobugebengu KwaZulu-Natal.Uthe bafuna kusungulwe uphiko lwamaphoyisa aKwaZulu-Natal.“Ngizolwela ukuthi kusungulwe uphiko lwamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal. Lolu phiko ngifuna luhlinzekwe ngezinsiza, amaphoyisa aqeqeshwe futhi kungabi khona ukugxambukela kosopolitiki ezindabeni ezithinta amaphoyisa. Angeke sithembele kungqongqoshe wamaphoyisa ukuthi uzokulwa nobugebengu ekubeni ezihlalele ePitoli. Sifuna amaphoyisa azokwazi izinkinga esibhekene nazo emiphakathini yethu.”

UNGQONGQOSHE wezeMpilo kuleli uDkt Joe Phaahla uthe zingu-2000 izidumbu eziduve emakhazeni kahulumeni ezingaziwa ukuthi ezobani. UPhaahla usho lokhu ephendula imibuzo yamalungu e-DA ePhalamende.Uthe zisemakhazeni ehlukene ezweni lonke futhi zihlala zihanjiswa cishe zonke izinsuku zigcine zibe ningi.Izidumbu okukhulunywa ngazo kusuke kuyilezo ezitholwe zilahliwe noma zidindilizile kungaziwa ukuthi kwenzekeni. Kuvele ukuthi inkinga idalwa wukuthi abantu abafiki ukuzocinga izidumbu zihlonzwe bese beyozingcwaba, zigcina zibhadla isikhathi eside.Uthe isifundazwe iKwaZulu-Natal ihamba phambili ngezidumbu ezingu-1 336 ezingaziwa, ilandelwe yiLimpopo ngezingu-283, iNorth West ilele isithathu ngezingu-266. IMpumalanga yona inezidumbu ezingu-82 okuyisibalo esilinganayo nesaseFree State, kugcine iNorthern Cape ngezingu-51.Akazikhiphanga izibalo ngezinye izifundazwe. UPhaahla uthe umgomo wabo wokusebenza uthi kufanele isidumbu uma sifika sibekwe eshalofini lamakhaza izinsuku eziyisikhombisa, emuva kwalokho bese kwenziwa uhlelo lokusingcwaba.Uthe uma singcwatshwa ngokohlelo lukahulumeni, kushuthwa isithombe kuthathwe amaloba eminwe namasampula olibofuzo. Kukhalwe nangesikhala sokubeka izidumbu uma zilokhu zinqwabelana emakhazeni kahulumeni.

AMALUNGU eMK athi uzikhiphile kuwo umdidiyeli wamabutho akwaMandlakazi, uMnuz Nkosikhona ‘Phakel ‘umthakathi’ Ndabandaba, amsola ngokugxibha umholi wawo, uJacob Zuma.Amalungu eMK axwayise uNdabandaba ngokuthi udumo lwakhe luzoshabalala ngokushesha uma ezifaka kwipolitiki, ameluleka ngokuthi agxile ekushayeni induku.UNdabandaba uzithintele ulaka lwabeMK emva kokufaka inkulumo ethathwe ngokuthi ugxeka uZuma kuyo.Kule nkulumo ayifake ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, uNdabandaba ukhale ngobaba angazange ambize ngegama, athe wayedlala ngeSilo esesabuza, uGoodwill Zwelithini kaBhekuzulu.Inkulumo kaNdabandaba ibihambisana nesithombe esinomsunguli weMK, uMnuz Jabulani Khumalo, noZuma, uZuma ukekeleziwe kelesi thombe.UNdabandaba ubhale ukuthi lo baba amshoyo akakaze abenzele lutho abantu baKwaZulu-Natal, wathi akakaze abuthande ubukhosi bukaZulu.“Uxhaphaze uMdlokombane kwaze kwaba sekugcineni,bnamanje ufukuzela nalamakhosazana angaphethe muntu sibe sazi kahle ukuthi ulikhomanisi, wabulala abantu bakwaZulu ezama ukuzikhombisa eMaXhoseni ukuthi unamandla. Ngenxa yakhe kunemindeni eyafelwa abantu abantu (395) ngezibhelu evulele amasela ukuthi ayotapa amabhenke, nina nathatha ama stay soft anizange nibone ukuthi kwakuqondwa amabhenke ukuze ezokwazi ukuvula iqembu.”Le nkulumo idine amalungu eMK atshele uNdabandaba ukuthi aphume ezintweni ezithinta ipolitiki.Abaningi bakhombise ukubungabaza ubunsizwa bukaNdabandaba, bamtshela ukuthi uyinsizwa ngakubo.UNdabandaba uqale ukudonsa amehlo ngesikhathi exabana nowayengumsakazi woKhozi FM, uNgizwe Mchunu, ngesikhathi kunenkonzo yokutshala undunankulu kaZulu ongumsunguli we-IFP, inkosi Mangosuthu Buthelezi.UNdabandaba wazwakala etshela uMchunu ukuthi akamnqeni, wathi engamshaya ebelethe umuntu emhlane.Ethintwa yiSolezwe, uNdabandaba uthe akazange alibize igama likaZuma enkulumweni yakhe.UNdabandaba uthe inkulumo yakhe ibiqonde ukukhuthaza abantu ukuthi bangawashiyi amaqembu abo.“Abantu abafunde ukwethembeka emaqenjini abo. Akungabe kusafike iqembu elisha, wena usuyagxuma. Uma kukhona into umuntu afuna ukuyilungisa akayilungise khona engaphakathi eqenjini lakhe, kube ithina esibonayo ukuthi badlala ngaye eqenjini lakhe.”UNdabandaba uthe akanendaba nabantu abamthukayo ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, wathi iningi labo bazifihlile.“Labantu abasongayo ngingathi nje mina ngiyobona ngabo.”Okhulumela iMK KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Ndaba Gcwabaza, uthe kubadumazile ukuthi umuntu onesikhundla esiphezulu kangaka akhulume budedengu ngale ndlela.“Ukhombisa ukuthi ukhokhelwe abantu abamhlophe ukuba akhulume kabi ngeMK noZuma. Lento ayishilo ayehli kahle kuthina.”UGcwabaza uthe inkulumo kaNdabandaba ikhombisa ukungabahloniphi abantu abadinwa ukugwetshwa kukaZuma ngaphandle kokuthi ayeziphendulela enkantolo.

SEKUPHELE isonto kuphazamiseke ukufunda nokufundisa ezikoleni ezimbili zaseNdlondlweni eMandeni, kulandela umbhikisho womphakathi.Kuthiwa kusuka ngoLwesihlanu olwedlule, izikole iGcwalamoya Primary neTshana Secondary zavalwa wumphakathi odinwe wukuthi ukhishelwe izintambo zikagesi.Ngokusho komthombo, lokhu kuqale ngesikhathi kucisha ugesi endaweni, emva kokuqhuma kwe-transformer.“Uthe uma ufika u-Eskom wathola ukuthi umphakathi uxhume izinyokanyoka. Uvele wangena umuzi nomuzi waxebula zonke izinyokanyoka, kwasala kumnyama,” kusho umthombo.Uthe lesi senzo siwucasulile umphakathi wakhetha ukuthi ubhikishe endaweni.Uqhube wathi umphakathi uthe usuka wabe uthatha imbhikisho wawo wawuyisa ezikoleni.“Bavale amasango azo zombili lezi zikole ezakhelene, kwacaca ukuthi ngeke kuqhubeke ukufunda nokufundisa. Kumanje izingane nothisha bahleli emakhaya, akucaci ukuthi kuzobuyelwa nini,” kusho umthombo.Kuthintwa uSihlalo wesiSungu elisawula isiKole iTshana High, igama lakhe elingatholakalanga, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi sekuphele isonto kungafundwa.“Bekukhona isimo somphakathi obufuna izimfuno zawo kwagcina sekuphazamiseke izikole. Bavele bavala amasango azo zombili izikole, ngaleyo ndlela kwaphazamiseka ukufunda,” kusho usihlalo.Uthe izikole ziphenduke izisulu zokungabi bikho kukagesi endaweni.Uthe noma engenaso isiqiniseko kodwa banethemba lokuthi kungase kuqalwe ukufunda ngoMsombuluko.Kuthintwa ikhansela, uMnuz Simphiwe “Tshebe” Mdunge uthe udaba bayalwazi kodwa wezwakalisa ukungenami ngendlela i-Eskom esingatha ngalo udaba.Uthe indaba iqale ukonakala maphakathi noJuni, kuqhuma itranformer ephakela izikole ezithintekayo nomphakathi onemizi elinganiselwa ku-300.Uthe bazamile ukuyilungisa abe-Eskom i-transformer kodwa yaphinde yaqhuma ngasekupheleni kukaJuni.“Kusuka lapho ke kumnyama, akukalungiswa,” kusho uMdunge.Uthe ngeke ame gelekeqe ngelithi abantu bazixhumela izinyokanyoka, wathi inkinga iqale ngokwanda kwemizi endaweni, okuthi uma umuntu efika, acele abazomfakela ugesi, bathi uma sebemfakele kucace ukuthi i-transformer isiyasindwa ayisenawo amandla okuthwala isibalo esengeziwe semizi edonsa kuyo.UMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal awutholakalanga ukuze uphawule ngalolu daba, kwaze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela.

KUZOPHENYWA ngebhilidi lamaphoyisa elathengwa ngo-R695 million eseliphenduke umhume wabaphangi emva kokuchithwa kukaR250 million kuzanywa ukulilungisa.UNgqongqoshe woMnyango wezeMisebenzi yoMphakathi, uMnuz Dean Macpherson, usejube uphenyo ngebhilidi lamaphoyisa iTelkom Towers, esePitoli.Leli bhilidi lathengwa ngo-2016. Ngo-2017 kwavalwa izingxenye eziningi zesakhiwo emva kokuthi kutholakale ukuthi akuphephile. Kwabe sekuqala imizamo yokulungisa ibhilidi. Muva nje uMnyango weziSebenzi usanda kuyalela ukuthi livalwe ibhilidi ngenxa yokuthi aliphephile. Ngesikhathi uMacpherson eyohlola ibhilidi, utshelwe ukuthi seliphenduke umhume wabaphangi.Uphinde watshelwa ukuthi izigebengu zintshontshe impahla ebikuleli bhilidi, enye yacekelwa phansi.UMacpherson uthe akwamukelekile ukuthi ibhilidi elathengwa ngemali eshisiwe liphenduke umhume wabaphangi ngale ndlela.“Uhulumeni uyivumela kanjani into enje ukuba yenzeke? Kuyamangaza ukuthi kule minyaka eyisishiyagalombili leli bhilidi belingasetshenziswa ngokugcwele, laze laphenduka umhume wabaphangi.”UMacpherson uthe ufuna kuphenywe ukuthi sasikhona yini isidingo sokuthi uhulumeni athenge leli bhilidi kwasekuqaleni.“Ngifuna ukwazi ukuthi yini eyadala ukuthi umnyango uthenge leli bhilidi, nokuthi ayikho yini enye indlela umnyango owawungenza ngayo. Asikwazi ukulahlekelwa izigidi zamaRandi sizama ukulungisa ibhilidi ngenxa nje yokwehluleka kwezikhulu zomnyango ukuhlela.”Uphenyo luzokwenziwa yinkampani ezimele, luzophothulwa ezinyangeni ezimbili.Uphenyo luzobheka ukuthi ayikho yini indlela yokuthi izinkampani ezathola amathenda okulungisa ibhilidi zihlanziswe imali ezayithola.“Kuzophenywa ukuthi yiluphi uhlelo olwalandelwayo ngesikhathi kuqokwa izinkampani ezanikwa umsebenzi wokulungisa ibhilidi, kuphenywe nokuthi lezi nkampani zaziwulungele yini umsebenzi. Uphenyo luzositshela ukuthi ayikho yini indlela yokuthi izinkampani ezahluleka ukwenza umsebenzi ziphoqwe ukuthi zibuyise imali.”UMacpherson uthe uphenyo luzophinde lubatshele nokuthi azikho yini izinyathelo okufanele zithathelwe izikhulu zomnyango ezibandakanyeka ekuthengweni kwebhilidi.“Sifuna ukuthi uphenyo lusitshele ukuthi yini okufanele yenziwe ngaleli bhilidi njengoba isimo sesinje.”UMacpherson uthe umnyango kufanele wenze isiqiniseko sokuthi imali yomphakathi ayimoshwa.“Kufanele senze isiqiniseko sokuthi zonke izakhiwo ezithengwe ngezimali zomphakathi ziyasetshenziswa, siphinde senze isiqiniseko sokuthi siyazivikela, zingaphenduki imihume yabaphangi. Isimo sezimali sibi, ngakho asikwazi ukumosha izigidi zamaRandi ezintweni ebesingakwazi ukuzigwema.”

INHLANGANO elawula ukusebenza kwemigwaqo, i-Road Traffic Management Corporation (RTMC), isiqalile ukuphenya ngengozi edlule nemiphefumulo yabayishumi kuN1 eMakhado, eLimpopo, ngoLwesibili ebusuku.Le ngozi yenzeke ngo-23h50 ebusuku lapho umshayeli webhasi, okuthiwa ubeshesha, ehlulekile ukwehlisa isivinini kundingiliza laginqika ibhasi lalala ngohlangothi.Kuthiwa leli bhasi belisuka eZimbabwe lilayishe abantu bokufika bodwa libheke eGoli kanti kunezinsolo zokuthi umshayeli ubemusha emsebenzini nendlela engayazi kahle.AbeRTMC badlulise amazwi enduduzo emindenini yabashonile, baveza ukuthi kuyaphenywa ngembangela yale ngozi enyantisa igazi.

UHULUMENI ugunyaze ukuba kuphenywe kabusha ngembangela yokukhothama kweNkosi u-Albert Luthuli eyayingumengameli we-ANC nokusocongwa kukaMnuz Griffiths Mxenge owayeyisishoshovu sikaKhongolose.Kuzophenywa nangembangela yokubulawa kowayengumholi womphakathi uMnuz Booi Mantyi.Lokhu kugunyazwe uNgqongqoshe wezobuLungiswa nokuHlunyeleliswa kweziMilo uMnuz Ronald Lamola.ULamola ubethole isicelo esivela ophikweni lezokushushisa, iNational Prosecuting Authority (NPA).ULuthuli, owahlabana ngendondo iNobel Peace Prize, wadlula emhlabeni ngoJulayi 21, 1967. Ngokwemibiko eqoshwe phansi, imbangela yokukhothama kwakhe kwaba wukushayiswa isitimela ngasesiteshini iGledhow.Okhulumela lomnyango uMnuz Chrispin Phiri, esitatimendeni uthe ngo-1967 uhulumeni wobandlululo wenza uphenyo eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseStanger eyathola ukuthi uLuthuli wafahlaka ugebhezi nobuchopho.UPhiri uthe inkantolo ngaleso sikhathi yathi abukho ubufakazi obabukhomba ukuthi kube nonyawo lwemfene ekukhothameni kukaLuthuli.“Kube nombiko owethulelwe iNPA oveze ukuthi uphenyo lwango-1967, lwashiya ngaphandle ubufakazi obubalulekile.“Lobufakazi bezobuchwepheshe buveza ukuthi iNkosi Luthuli yayingeke ishayiswe isitimela siyibulale,” kusho uPhiri.Uthe kungenxa yalobu bufakazi nobethulelwa kwiKhomishini yamaQiniso obenze uLamola wemukela isicelo seNPA, wavuma nokuthi kuphenywe kabusha.Kulindeleke ukuthi uLamola acele uMengameli wamaJaji KwaZulu-Natal ukuba avule uphenyo ngokukhothama kukaLuthuli.Isidumbu sikaMxenge, satholakala enkundleni yezemidlalo eMlaza ngoNovemba 20,1981sinamanxeba angu-45.Kuvela ukuthi uphenyo lwango-1983, lukahulumeni wobandlululo ngembangela yokufa kwakhe, lwahluleka ukuthola ababulali bakaMxenge.Kuthiwa uMantyi wabulawa emuva kwengxabano namaphoyisa ngesikhathi sobandlululo ngo-1985 eNorthern Cape.Uphenyo lwango-1985 olwenziwa e-De Aar ngembangela yokufa kukaMantyi, lwaveza ukuthi akukho muntu okumele abekwe icala ngokufa kwakhe.UPhiri uthe ubufakazi obusha bukhomba ukuthi kunomuntu owazibonela ngamehlo isigameko ongazange afakaze ekuqaleni.

IMantshi icele ukuzwa ngommangalelwa ukuthi ufuna lihlehle isikhathi esingakanani icala lokubulala athweswe lona elenzeka ehostela laKwaMashuUMnuz Sbongiseni Njabulo Khanyile uvele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseNtuzuma ngoLwesithathu.Uthweswe icala lokubulala uMnuz Sizwe Petros Zungu okuthiwa waqale wamchapha ngenhlamba embiza ngempimpi yamaphoyisa ngaphambi kokuthi amdubule ambulale ngoNovemba 21, 2021.UZungu ucele inkantolo ukuthi imnikeze isikhathi esingamasonto amabili ukuze intombi yakhe iye esibhedlela ilande ubufakazi bokuthi wayephukile yena ngesikhathi kwenzeka isigameko.UZungu uthe akukwazi ukuthi wayengahlohla isibhamu, adubule abulale umuntu ekubeni wayekade egodle ingalo, efake ukhonkolo.UMbuso usola uZungu nayekade ehamba nabo ukuthi bathelekela umufi nayehleli nabo endaweni ekhanda izimoto ehostela baqale babatalabha. Umndeni kamufi uthi amanga aluhlaza okushiwo uZungu ngomfowabo. Bathe ngelanga lesigameko uZungu wayephile saka futhi wayengumgulukudu owaziwayo ukuthi uhlukumeza abantu ehostela.IMantshi uRavi Pillay iqale ngokubuza uKhoza ukuthi isikhathi esingakanani asidingayo ukuze athole amaphepha? Ibe isilihlehlisela u-Agasti 14 icala yathi iyathemba ukuthi konke kuyobe sekumi ngomumo. UPillay ubefuna kuphothulwe konke ngecala ngoLwesithathu.

Uphiko lwentsha ye-ANC esifundeni iJosiah Gumede lusola iPhini leMeya kaMasipala Ukhahlamba, uNkk Nothile Tshabalala, ngokuqasha amalungu omndeni walo kumasipala.Esitatimendeni esithunyelelwe abezindaba esinegama likanobhala wesifunda uMnuz Sphelele Masuku nelomkhulumeli uMnuz Lindokuhle Maphalala, i-ANCYL ithe isikhathele wuTshabalala, oyilungu le-ANC, ngenxa yezizathu ezehlukene.“I-ANCYL isebenzise izinhlaka ezifanele izama ukugxeka ngokwakhayo iphini lemeya kusuka ehhovisi likasotswebhu kuya kwi-ANC uqobo. Kusobala ukuthi iphini lemeya livimba ukuthi i-ANC ithuthukise intsha ikakhulukazi ekudaleni amathuba omsebenzi,” kusho isitatimende.Lolu phiko luthe uTshabalala uma eqasha uyenzelela njengoba muva nje kuqashwe umfowabo njengomqaphi wakhe nodadewabo usekhushulelwe kaningi ezikhundleni.Luthe kumele i-ANC ingenele ngokushesha.UNkk Tshabalala uthe yena njengekhansela akaqashi kodwa kuqasha imenenja kamasipala. Uthe kungamanga aluhlaza ukuthi uqasha izihlobo zakhe.“Yinto ongakwazi ukuyiphenya leyo. Umuntu uma eqashwe kwamasipala ungamfihla kanjani? Ngisho noma ngabe bengiyimenenja kamasipala bengingeke ngiqashe i-ANC Youth League kodwa bengizoqasha umphakathi. Asivotelwanga yi-ANC Youth League kodwa sivotelwe wumphakathi,” kusho uTshabalala.Uthe umasipala uphethwe ngokubambisana yizinhlangano ezehlukene ngakho uma kunokuphambene akwenzayo kusho ukuthi “imeya nosomlomo bayizithumuthumu zami”.“Sisemkhandlwini olawulwa ngokubambisana, akekho ongenza okuphambene. Umkhandlu wethu uhlale uthola umbiko womcwaningi mabhuku ongenagcobho, amabhuku awaphekwa. Izingane (ANCYL) zinomkhankaso wazo nje eziwuphushayo,” kusho uTshabalala.

SIZOLALELWA namhlanje isicelo esiphuthumayo sikaSomlomo wePhalamende osahlabe ikhefu uNkk Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula, sokuvimba ukuboshwa kwakhe.Lesi sicelo sizolalelwa eNkantolo eNkulu eTshwane, njengoba efuna ukuthi uphiko lwezokuShushisa  lungambophi ngezinsolo zenkohlakalo.Okhulumela uphiko, u-Advocate Mthunzi Mhaga, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi isicelo sizolalelwa namhlanje wathi bazosiphikisa.Uthe bakholwa wukuthi asinasisekelo futhi ngeke siphumelele.Usho lokhu nje umengameli wezwe ne-ANC uCyril Ramaphosa, uthe bazoyeka umthetho usebenze kulolu daba.URamaphosa obekhuluma ngempelasonto ngesikhathi ehambele eGqeberha, uthe akunikwe ithuba abezomthetho benze umsebenzi wabo.“USomlomo uhlabe ikhefu futhi ushilo ukuthi uyahambisana nophenyo. Kuyaziwa ukuthi uma kufike ezingeni elithile, imigomo yenhlangano izobe isilandelwa.” Usho lokhu nje, uNobhala we-ANC uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, uthe le nhlangano ngeke ivikele muntu othinteka emacaleni afuze lawa.“Uma ethinteka, uzobhekana nomthetho. Imigomo ye-ANC icacile ukuthi uyashenxa ezintweni ozenzayo. USomlomo uxhumane nami ngalolu daba. Abaholi be-ANC bazohlangana ngoMsombuluko (namhlanje) babhunge ngalo.” USomlomo usolwa ngokuthola intshontsho likaR2.3 million komunye wosomabhizinisi owayenza umsebenzi eMnyangweni wezokuVikela, ngesikhathi esanguNgqongqoshe kulo mnyango.Kwenzeka lokhu nje iPhini likaSomlomo, uMnuz Lechesa Tsenoli, yilona eseliyibamba likaSomlomo njengoba kusaqhubeka uphenyo.Isitatimende esikhishwe yiPhalamende siveze ukuthi imigomo icacile ukuthi kumele kubambe ibamba uma uSomlomo ehlabe ikhefu. “UTsenoli uzokwengamela yonke imisebenzi kaSomlomo njengoba ehlabe ikhefu eliyisipesheli. Imisebenzi yePhalamende iyaqhubeka ayimile, njengoba kulindeleke ukuthi iPhini likamengameli uMnuz Paul Mashatile, liphendule imibuzo ePhalamende kuleli sonto,” kusho isitatimende.Abanye abaholi bamaqembu sebefune ukwazi ukuthi ngabe kuvumelekile yini ukuthi athathe ikhefu eliyisipesheli.Isitatimende sikucacisile lokhu ngokuthi kuba nesiphakamiso esifakwa ePhalamende sokuthatha ikhefu  uma kungukuthi uSomlomo uphuthwa ukuhlala kwePhalamende amahlandla angu-15 kulandelana.“IPhalamende lihlalelwe ukuthi lihlale izikhawu ezintathu njengoba lizoguqa ngenxa yokuthi kuzoba nokhetho lukazwelonke ngoMeyi 29. Ngakho ngeke sibekhona isidingo sokuthi kube nalesi siphakamiso.”

UMBIKO wodokotela ovela esibhedlela saseMgungundlovu sabanokukhubazeka ngokwengqondo, i-Fort Napier, uveza ukuthi isebenza kahle ingqondo kaMnuz Thabo Ntokozo Nzimande (31) obhekene necala lokushumpula ngocelemba ikhanda likaninakhulu wase eyaligenda njengebhola.UNzimande utokile eWestville njengoba esolwa ngokubulala uninakhulu, uNkk Betreace de Lange (80) esigamekweni esenzeka ePinetown ngoJuni 7, nonyaka.UNzimande ubekade evele kwithelevishini yasenkantolo kusetshenziswa ubuchwepheshe besimanje yena eseWestville. Icala belikade liqhubeka eNkantolo yeMantshi yasePinetown.Ngaphambilini, icala belihlehlisiwe ukuze inkantolo igcine ithole ukuhlinzekwa ngombiko ogcwele ovele e-Fort Napier.UDkt Shain noDkt Lugongolo kuvele ukuthi yibona ebebehlola ingqondo uNzimande.Izolo, umshushisi uNksz Nomcebo Xulu uveze ukuthi sewubuyile umbiko omayelana nokuhlolwa kwengqondo kaNzimande.Umbiko kuthiwa uveza ukuthi uNzimande uphila saka ekhanda futhi azikho izimpawu ezikhombisa ukuthi kukhona okumphazamisayo. Ugcizelela nokuthi uNzimande angakwazi ukumelana necala.Kuze kufinyelelwe kulesi sigaba sokuthi ahlolwe ingqondo nje uNzimande, yingoba ngaphambilini watshela inkantolo ukuthi akasakhumbuli ukuthi kwenzakalani ngosuku lwesigameko.Nombiko wokuqala kadokotela wase-RK Khan eChartswoth, uveze ukuthi uNzimande akakulungele ukuthi angabhekana necala ngokwesimo sakhe somqondo.Uveze nokuthi uNzimande une-bipolar (isifo sengqondo esenza ukushintshashintsha kwemizwa nendlela abhekana ngayo nempilo) futhi nesigameko akasasikhumbuli.UNzimande utshele imantshi uWendolyine Robinson ukuthi akakhumbuli lutho.Waveza nokuthi usumhlamukile umndeni wakoninalume abekade ehlala nawo egcekeni ngaphambilini.URobinson uthe ukuphuma kwalo mbiko kunikeza umhlahlandlela ogcwele wenqubekela phambili kuleli cala. “Yilo mbiko obubalulekile kakhulu kuleli cala. Kusuka manje sesizoqhubeka senze konke okumele sikwenze kuze kufinyelele esiphethweni secala,’’ usho kanje.Icala lihlehliselwe uSepthemba 10, njengoba kukhona uphenyo okuthiwa lusazoqhubeka mayelana necala.

UBOSHWE enkantolo ngesikhathi ezovela ngelinye icala uBonginkosi Khanyile (34) wabekwa icala lokuphula umthetho ovimba ukuhlangana kwabantu ngaphandle kwemvume  nelokubopha itulo lokugovuza umphakathi ukuba uvuke udlambedlu.OKlebe okuyibo ababophe uKhanyile bathe ukuboshwa kukaKhanyile kusukela enkulumeni ayenze ngoMashi nonyaka eGoli.Kuthiwa inkulumo kaKhanyile yayiphambene nomthetho iRiotous Assemblies Act.Uboshwa nje uKhanyile uvele ungaphandle ngebheyili ka-R5 000 ngecala elithinta izibhelu zomtapo zangoJulayi 2021 abelivelele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini ngoLwesihlanu.Okhulumela oKlebe kuzwelonke, uColonel Katlego Mogale, uthe inkulumo kaKhanyile yayihlose ukugovuza umphakathi ukuthi ubhikishe futhi ube nodlame uma iqembu lakhe lezepolitiki lingekho ohlwini layezovotelwa.“Lenkulumo yayinencazelo ethi izakhamuzi kumele zihlangane bese ziyatapa njengoba kwenzeka ngoJulayi 2021. Icala livulwe esiteshini samaphoyisa saseBrixton,” kusho uCol Mogale.Uthe uKhanyile uphinde wadedelwa ngebheyili uzobuyela enkantolo ngoSepthemba 23 nonyaka ngawo wonke amacala athweswe wona.Kuthiwa uKhanyile wathi ngeke lube khona ukhetho eNingizimu Afrika uma kususwa iqembu lakhe uMkhonto weSizwe Party nomholi walo uMnuz Jacob Zuma.

UZIBONA ekhula endimeni yokusakaza ibhola uQhawe Hlengwa ofunda esikoleni samabanga aphezulu iLanga Secondary, KwaDabeka onxusa intsha  ukuthi iphumele obala ngamakhono enawo ukuze yesekwe.UHlengwa (19) waKwaDabeka, eThekwini ubesakaza bukhoma emqhudelwaneni wezikole, iThanduyise Khuboni 2nd Annual Schools Tournament, obuseChristianenburg Stadium, eClermont muva nje, nalapho eshiye izethameli zalo mqhudelwano zingawuvali umlomo zibabaza ubuchule bendlela asakaza ngayo.Ekhuluma neSolezwe uthe uthando lokusakaza ibhola yinto akhula nayo.“Uthando lokusakaza ibhola ngaluqala ngisemncane ngifunda uGrade 4 eMcopheleli Primary. Ngangingazi ukuthi abantu bazoyithanda le nto engiyenzayo ngoba nasekhaya bengihlale ngisakaza futhi bangincome,” kusho uHlengwa.Uthe ufuna ukukhula kule ndima njengoba ebukela kwezinye izinkakha ezisakaza ibhola.“Njengoba ngizophothula u-matric nje, isifiso sami ukuyifundela le ndima yokusakaza ibhola. Umuntu engibukela kuye nguReggie ‘Mapensela’ Ndlovu osakaza imidlalo ye-Priemier Soccer League,” usho kanje.UHlengwa uphinde waphonsa inselelo entsheni yamanje ukuthi iphumele obala ngamakhono enawo.“Kubalulekile ukuthi singathuli namakhono ethu esinawo ngoba kubalulekile ukuziveza ukuze uthole usizo. Kwesinye isikhathi uthola ukuthi umuntu omncane unalo ikhono kodwa akasakwazi ukuqhubeka aye nalo phambili ngenxa yokuthi akekho omesekayo,” ubeke kanje.

SELOKHU kubheduke upokisi wezinkawu, iMpox ebuye yaziwe nge-Monkeypox edlange kakhulu kwabesilisa abathandana nobulili obufanayo,  kunombuzo wokuthi ngabe yisifo socansi yini.Uma kuyisifo socansi  kungani abezempilo bengaphumeli obala bathi yisifo socansi? Kunalokho balokhu bemile ekutheni noma ngubani angasithola uma esondelene nomuntu onaso.Ungoti wezifo ezithathelanayo eNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal, uDkt Richard Lessells, uthe lesi sifo akusona esocansi kodwa indlela esitholakala ngayo yenza sibukeke sengathi esocansi. Emasontweni ayisithupha edlule sibhedukile sidlange kwabesilisa abathandana nabanye besilisa. Yize sivela ngalolu hlobo kodwa akusona isifo socansi. UDkt Lessells uthe lesi sifo sidala, wathi isigameko sokuqala seMpox ehaqe abantu sabikwa ngeminyaka yama -70s, eCentral Africa.Uthe kukholakala ukuthi lesi sifo okwakungesezilwane sadluliselwa kubantu yizilwane ezincelisayo ezincane  (small mammals) namagundane. Ngemuva kwakho sase siphenduka siba yigciwane elisuka komunye umuntu liye komunye uma bethintene. UDkt Lessells uthe ukuqubuka kwalesi sifo manje emhlabeni-jikelele naseNingizimu Afrika, okuqale ngo-2022, kudaleke ngokuthi onaleli gciwane athelele omunye, asisasuki ezilwaneni."I-Mpox  ne-Smallpox, isifo ebese siphelile ngenxa yokuthi abantu abaningi bayagoma. Yize i-Mpox ne-Smallpox zinezimpawu ezibonakala zifana kodwa zidalwa izinhlobo ezehlukene zamagciwane," kusho uLessells.Onalesi sifo uthe uba namabhamuza anamanzi noma izilonda."Uketshezi okungaba amanzi aphuma ezilondeni noma okusamafinyila uma kuhlangana ngesikhathi kuthintana isikhumba igciwane lidlulela kanjalo komunye,"  kusho uLessells.UDkt Nevashan Govender wesikhungo esibhekelele izifo ezithathelanayo kuleli, iNational Institute for Communicable Diseases (NICD), uthe uma leli gciwane selingenile esigulini liyaziphindaphinda bese lidlulela ezindlaleni ezisentanyeni.Uqhube wathi eNingizimu Afrika, ukusuleleka kwenzeka ngemva kokuthintana  kwesikhumba, ikakhulukazi ngokuhlangana ngokocansi. Kuneminye imizila engase ibe khona yokudlulisela leli gciwane  kodwa yona akucatshangwa ukuthi igciwane lidlulele ngazo kulokhu kuqubuka kwakamuva."Ubufakazi besayensi buveza ukuthi abantu abanezifo ezingamahlalakhona basengcupheni yokuthi bagule kakhulu uma kwenzeka behaqwa yileli gciwane. Akubona abaneHIV engalawulwa kahle kuphela,"  kusho uGovender.Uthe izimpawu zeMpox zihlanganisa izilonda ezinkulu bezisabalele emlonyeni, emehlweni nasezithweni zangasese, izifo ezibangelwa amagciwane ziba sesikhumbeni, egazini nasemaphashini.Umsunguli wephephandaba elibhala ezempilo, iBhekisisa Health Journalism, uNkk Mia Malan, ucashunwe kweminye imithombo yezindaba ethi iMpox ayitholakali emoyeni.“Leli gciwane ulithola kumabhamuza asesikhumbeni somuntu. Lawo mabhamuza anoketshezi. Lawo manzi anegciwane. Ngakho-ke, ukuze uthole i-Mpox, udinga ukuthintana nalawo mabhamuza," kusho uNkk Malan. “ENingizimu Afrika, iSmallpox ibigonyelwa kwaze kwaba u-1980.  Uma uneminyaka engu-45  kuya phezulu maningi amathuba okuthi ungawugomela upokisi. Lowo mgomo ukuvikela ngo-85%, mancane amathuba okuthi uhaqwe iMpox," kucacisa uNkk Malan.UMnyango wezeMpilo uthe abahaqekile amadoda aneminyaka ephakathi kuka-23 no-43.Isikhungo esibhekelele imingcele kuleli, iBorder Management Authority (BMA), sesiqale uhlelo lokuthi kuqashwe ukusabalala kwaleli gciwane ngokuthi kuhlolwe izinga lokushisa emzimbeni kubo bonke abangena kuleli.  Lolu hlelo luqale kuleli sonto.Umnyango uthenge umshanguzo iTecovirimat, owaziwa nangokuthi i-TPOXX noma i-ST-246 engatholakali kuleli ukuze isetshenziswe ezigulini ezibambeke kakhulu. Kunokukhathazeka ukuthi imishanguzo ethengiwe ayenele kodwa okhulumela uMnyango wezeMpilo kuleli, uMnuz Foster Mohale uthe: “U-1% wabantu abahaqekayo ngesonto abadinga ukwelashwa ngalo mshanguzo masonto onke, umnyango usazoyithenga eminye imithi.”

SIDALE uqhekeko kumalungu enhlangano yothisha abangaqashiwe, i-KZN United Unemployed Educators, isenzo soMnyango wezeMfundo esifundazweni sokuqasha ngasese abanye babaholi bayo okuthiwa bathole izincwadi ezibakhomba ezikoleni ezithile, ngesonto eledlule.Abanye bakholwa ukuthi lokhu kuphambene nesimemezelo esenziwe nguMphathiswa eMnyangweni, uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka, ngokushintshwa kohlelo lokuqasha othisha. Isimemezelo besithi zonke izikhala zikhangiswe ngendlela esobala evumela noma wubani afake isicelo, okuhlukile  kobekwenzeka phambili njengoba bekudingeka kutonyulwe kuphela amagama aku-database yomnyango. Umnyango ubuveze ukuthi lokhu ukwenza ngenhloso yokulwa nenkohlakalo ekuqashweni kothisha njengoba bekunezikhalo eziningi ngohlelo oludala, namalungu ale nhlangano abelugxeka kakhulu. Lungesinye sezikhalo esenze aqoka ukuyoqhinqa emahhovisi omnyango, eMgungundlovu kusuka ngenyanga edlule.Nakuba kunjalo, Isolezwe lithole ukuthi iningi labebesekhaleni lempi kule nhlangano, yibona abathole izincwadi zokuqashwa ezibakhomba ezikoleni ezehlukene, ngaphandle kwesikhangiso esifakiwe.UMnuz Mfanelo Mncube ongomunye wabaholi bale nhlangano, uthe abanye ozakwabo abamukele lezi zincwadi, bebethenjwe kakhulu ngamalungu.“Sonke lesi sikhathi besilwela ukuthi kuphele inkohlakalo ekuqashweni kothisha. Kuyadumaza ukuthi ozakwethu ebisilwa nabo, bona futhi baqashwa ngendlela efanayo. Siyabahalalisela ngomsebenzi kodwa okwenzekile kushiya imibuzo kumalungu ukuthi akusiyona yini imizamo yokusivala imilomo? Kungabe izikhala zisazoqhubeka zikhangiswe na njengoba silindele ukuthi umnyango wenze njalo kusukela ngoLwesine (namuhla)?” usho kanje.Uthe okubuhlungu ukuthi abathole izincwadi zokuqashwa abahlale beqhinqe eMgungundlovu, kanti basekwa ngeminikelo yenqwaba yamalungu asuke engakwazi ukuphumelela ngenxa yezizathu ezehlukene eziphoqayo, enikela ngemali ukuthi bakwazi ukudla nokukhokhela nendlu yesonto abalala kuyo.Omunye wamalungu ongathandanga ukudalulwa, uthe bebekhokha imali esuka ku- R20 umuntu eyedwa ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ababamele eMgungundlovu abahlupheki, kanti emva kokuvela kwalezi zindaba, abanye sebenqume ukungayifaki imali ngoba bakholelwa ukuthi sebedayisiwe.UMnuz Ndumiso Mngwengwe owuSihlalo wale nhlangano, uqinisekise ukuthi ungomunye wabamukele incwadi yokuqashwa kwakhe.“Ebesikulwela sesikutholile. Besifuna ukuthi izikhala zikhangiswe ngendlela esobala okuyinto ezokwenziwa kusuka ngoLwesine. Uhlelo lokukhangisa luqala ngoLwesine, ngakho thina sisaqashwe ngohlelo lakudala lokufakwa kwemininingwane kwi-database,” usho kanje.Ukuphikile ukuthi ukuqashwa kwabo yimizamo yokuvalwa imilomo, wathi basazoqhubeka noma sebeqashiwe ukulwela ukuthi iningi lothisha abahleli emakhaya baqasheke. Uthe okwenzekile, yikhona kanye abavumelene ngakho nomnyango ikakhulukazi bona abebeqhinqe eMgungundlovu, bedele amakhaza ukulwela amalungelo othisha abahleli emakhaya.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Muzi Mahlambi, ethunyelelwa imibuzo ngalolu daba, uthe sekukaningi bezwa ngezinsolo zokuqashwa kothisha, kodwa uma sekumele kutholakale ubufakazi akwenzeki. Nakuba kunjalo, uMngwengwe ekhuluma neSolezwe  uzivumele yena ukuthi ubengowokugcina ukwamukela incwadi yokuqashwa kwakhe, waveza ukuthi akusibona kuphela abaholi benhlangano abaqashiwe, kodwa kukhona nabanye bakwezinye izindawo.

UMENGAMELI Cyril Ramaphosa ubhalele umholi we-DA uMnuz John Steenhuisen, incwadi eshubile mayelana nezikhundla zongqongqoshe ezifunwa yi-DA.URamaphosa encwadini esabalele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, utshele uSteenhuisen ukuthi udumele ngendlela leli qembu elenza ngayo izinto njengoba kuqhubeka izingxoxo zokwakha uhulumeni wobumbano.Ukusho lokhu kulandela izincwadi ezilokhu ziputshuke njalo ze-DA iveza izikhundla ezifunayo kuhulumeni.Encwadini kaRamaposa yangoLwesibili, utshele uSteenhuisen ukuthi uyaqhubeka nezingxoxo zokubumba lo hulumeni namanye amaqembu asayine isivumelwano sokusebenzisana.Uthe udaba lokubumba uhulumeni luseqhulwini njengoba efuna ukuluphothula kuleli sonto.“Ngizimisele ukuphothula izingxoxo nokubonisana ngeyokwakha lo hulumeni kuleli sonto. Ngisavulelekile ukuthi ngibe nengxoxo nawe,” kusho uRamaphosa kuSteenhuisen.Ngale mpelasonto i-ANC izohlangana nezinhlaka zayo okubalwa namadlelandawonye ukuzozazisa ngebanga eselihanjiwe kulezi zingxoxo.Ngemuva kwale mihlangano kulindeleke ukuthi amemezele iKhabhinethi entsha njengoba abantu bakuleli belinde ngabomvu lesi simemezelo.Iyaqonga ingcindezi yokuthi uRamaphosa amemezele le Khabhinethi njengoba bengekho ongqongqoshe namaphini abo, kuwuyena ophethe izintambo.Encwadini kaSteenhuisen kuRamaphosa ngoMsombuluko, iveza ukuthi uphakamise ukwabela leli qembu ongqongqoshe eminyangweni okubalwa oweMfundo eyisiSekelo, owezaseKhaya, owezemiSebenzi yoMphakathi neNgqalasizinda, owezokuXhumana, owezamaHlathi, ukuDoba nezeMvelo kanjalo nowezoHwebo nokuNcintisana.Uveze nokuthi uzokwabela leli qembu izikhundla zamaphini ongqongqoshe eMnyangweni weziMali, owezaMandla noGesi nowamaBhizinisi amancane.USteenhuisen uphakamise ukuthi kwengezwe izikhundla ezimbili zongqongqoshe kuphinde kwengezwe ezamaphini ongqongqoshe. Lokhu kusho ukuthi i-DA ifuna izikhundla zongqongqoshe abayisishiyagalombili, besuka kwabayisithupha.

BEBEHLEKA baze baqhephuke uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, noNgqongqoshe wezobuCiko, amaSiko nezeMidlalo, uMnuz Gayton McKenzie, ngesikhathi beqhosha ngokusebenza kukahulumeni wokubambisana ophethe izwe.Labaholi bathe uhulumeni wokubambisana awuyi ndawo, uMcKenzie uze wathi ngeke avume ukuhlonyekiswa yilabo abathi akashiye uhulumeni wokubambisana.Bakusho lokhu ngesikhathi bekhuluma emcimbini wokwamukelwa kwamathambo ezishoshovu zomzabalazo ezangcwatshelwa emazweni angomakhelwane iZambia neZimbabwe.Umcimbi wokwamukelwa kwamathambo alezi zishoshovu ezingu-42 ubuseFreedom Park, ngoLwesihlanu.URamaphosa noMcKenzie bangabaholi bamaqembu ayingxenye yohulumeni wokubambisana, i-ANC nePatriotic Alliance.Bekuqhilika izihlathi kula baholi ngesikhathi bekhuluma ngokusebenzisana kwabo.UMcKenzie uthe ngeke abalalele labo abamhlohlayo, abathi akashiye uhulumeni wokubambisana.“Bayangihlomekisa laba, bafuna ngixoshwe. Abazi ukuthi kumnandi kanjani lapha kuhulumeni wokubambisana. Labo abangeyona ingxenye yohulumeni wokubambisana bayaphuthelwa. Wonke amaqembu amenywa ukuba abe yingxenye yohulumeni wokubambisana, anqaba. Abathule-ke labo abanqabayo.”NgeSonto kuphela izinsuku ezingu-100 kwasungulwa uhulumeni wokubambisana.URamaphosa uthe bonke ongqongqoshe bakubeke eceleni ukuthi baqhamuka emaqenjini ezepolitiki ahlukene.“Ubani obengacabanga ukuthi ungqongqoshe ongelona ilungu le-ANC (uMcKenzie) angaqhubeka nomsebenzi owaqalwa ungqongqoshe we-ANC? Miningi iminyango ebambe iqhaza emcimbini wanamhlanje. Le minyango iholwa ongqongqoshe abaqhamuka emaqenjini ehlukene. Lokhu kukhombisa ukuthi sonke sifuna into eyodwa, ukusebenzela abantu,” kusho uRamaphosa.Phakathi kwabaholi okubuyiswe amathambo abo, kubalwa lowo owayengunobhala jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Duma Nokwe, nezinye ezishoshovu ezifana noMnuz Bafana Nsele, Jackson Khuzwayo noVincent Khumalo.URamaphosa uthe asazolandwa amathambo amanye amaqhawe omzabalazo.“Abantu baseNingizimu Afrika kufanele bazi ukuthi angobani la maqhawe alwela inkululeko. La maqhawe anikela ngezimpilo zawo. Amagama abo azoqoshwa emlandweni lapha eFreedom Park khona singeke sibakhohlwe.”

UMENGAMELI Cyril Ramaphosa ukhale ngobunzima nezinkinga abhekane nazo ehlandleni lakhe lokuqala lokuphatha izwe.URamaphosa uthe uchithe isikhathi esiningi elungisa izinkinga kule minyaka emihlanu yokuqala ephethe izwe.Lokhu ukusho ngesikhathi ekhuluma nosomabhizinisi, eGoli.URamaphosa uthe ezinye zezinkinga ezehle ngesikhathi kuphethe yena azikaze zibonwe kule lizwe.“Kule minyaka emihlanu sithwale kanzima, silungisa izinkinga esizificile nezinkinga ezisehlele. Sichithe isikhathi esiningi silungisa, sakha kabusha.”URamaphosa ubale izibhelu zokuzitapela zango-2021, izikhukhula, nokulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana njengezinye zezinselelo abhekane nazo.URamaphosa uthe izibhelu ezaziKwaZulu-Natal nasezingxenyeni zaseGauteng zakhinyabeza umnotho.Kwashona abantu abangu-354 kulezo zibhelu ezaqubuka emva kokuboshwa kowayengumengameli, uJacob Zuma, owaboshelwa icala lokudelela umyalelo weNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo.URamaphosa uthe izibhelu zaveza ngokusobala ubuthaka bezinhlaka zokuvikela kuleli.“Kwacaca ukuthi izinhlaka zokuphepha nezinhloli zibuthaka, nokwenza ukuthi umonakalo ube mkhulu.”URamaphosa uthe kubathathe isikhathi eside ukuthi balungise umonakalo owadalwa izibhelu.Uthe kuthe besaxakwe umthelela wezibhelu, kwahlasela izikhukhula, ezaba mandla kakhulu, eThekwini.Kwashona abantu abangu-495 KwaZulu-Natal ngesikhathi kuhlasela izikhukhula.“Ukuhlasela kwezikhukhula kwacekela phansi ingqalasizinda emqoka, nokwaphazamisa ukuhanjiswa kwezidingo.”URamaphosa uthe ngesikhathi engena ehhovisi ubhekane nomthwalo wokuqeda ukulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana.“Sithe uma sifika sakwazi ukuyiqeda nya le nto yokulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana. Bonke labo ababebambe iqhaza ekulawulweni koMbuso yidlanzana, sebabaleka bazephula. Siyazi ke kodwa ukuthi bakhona ababesebenzisana nabo abasasele.”URamaphosa uthe kuningi abakwenzayo ukulwa nenkohlakalo, athe kukona kukhona nokunikezwa kwezinhlangano eziphenyayo amandla athe xaxa, nokusungula ezinye izinhlaka ezilwa nenkohlakalo.URamaphosa uthe inkohlakalo ayiqali manje njengoba sekuphethe i-ANC.“Uhulumeni wobandlululo nawo wawukhohlakele. Into eyayikhona ukuthi abezindaba babengabiki ngokukhululeka ngesikhathi kusaphethe uhulumeni wobandlululo. Ingakho wawungeke uzwe kukhulunywa ngenkohlakalo.“Uma abantu bekhuluma ngenkohlakalo, bakhuluma sengathi inkohlakalo lena inkinga ekhungethe uhulumeni kuphela. Iqiniso ukuthi inkohlakalo idla lubi nasezinkampanini ezizimele.”

UMENGAMELI we-ANC, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa ubize ngezimaku amalungu eMK azame ukufaka unyawo lwedada emkhankasweni wakhe wokhetho.URamaphosa uwatshele ezinhlamvini zamehlo amalungu eMK azame ukumphazamisa ukuthi ayizimaku ezikhonkotha ubala.Lokhu kwenzeke ngesikhathi uRamaphosa ekhankasa enxanxatheleni yezitolo iHammarsdale Junction, ngeSonto.Kuthe uRamaphosa esakhuluma namalungu e-ANC, kwaqhamuka iqeqebana labantu abebefake izikibha ze-MK, bacula izingoma ezibhinqa uRamaphosa ne-ANC.URamaphosa ube esefanisa amalungu eMK nezinja ezikhonkotha ubala."Abanye bafana nama-blackie. Niyayazi inja encane ehlezi ikhonkotha, ingazi ukuthi ikhonkothani? Nampa abanye bayakhonkotha (esho ekhomba amalungu eMK). Bonke nje bayizinja ezikhonkotha ubala."Ube esekhuza isiqubulo esithi niyabesaba na, washo ekhomba amalungu eMK.Amalungu eMK anqabile ukukhuluma nabezindaba. Kume yonke into ngesikhathi uRamaphosa efika enxanxatheleni yezitolo.Kube ububhudubhudu abantu befuna ukuzibonela uRamaphosa, namalungu e-ANC abengazibekile phansi, ecula izingoma ezeseka uRamaphosa.Iningi labasebenzi basezitolo livele lashiya imisebenzi, layodushana nabebefuna ukubona uRamaphosa.URamaphosa uzulazule kancane enxanxatheleni yezitolo, ehamba ebingelela abantu, wabe esekhuluma namalungu e-ANC avele athi mbo ngesikhathi efika.Utshele amalungu e-ANC ukuthi inhlangano yabo izomangaza abaningi okhethweni oluzayo."I-ANC inkunzi ezokhonya lapha. Laba abazitshela ukuthi i-ANC isiyehlile, bazomangala.“Bazobona ukuthi yibona asebehlile. Yithi esizonqoba lapha KwaZulu-Natal futhi yithi esizonqoba eNingizimu Afrika yonke," esho.URamaphosa uqale umkhankaso wakhe wayizolo KwaNgcolosi, lapho ebe nomhlangano womphakathi.Kulomhlangano uRamaphosa ubabize ngezimpumputhe labo abathi i-ANC ayizange yenze lutho kuleminyaka engu-30 eyedlule."Bakhona abahamba bethi abayiboni into eyenziwe i-ANC. Sithi kulabantu bayizimpumputhe, ababoni futhi abezwa. Kuleminyaka engu-30 ziningi izinto ezenziwe i-ANC,"kusho uRamaphosa.Uchithe labo abathi ugesi awucishwa ngenxa yokuthi kuza ukhetho.Uthe i-ANC ingalunqoba ukhetho noma ngabe kunenkinga yokucishwa kukagesi."Ukunqoba kwethu ukhetho akuncikile ekutheni ugesi awucishwa. Ukhetho sizoluwina noma ngabe ugesi uyacishwa ngoba abantu bayayithemba i-ANC.“Ugesi awucishwa ngoba siyayilungisa inkinga kagesi. Nalapha eThekwini siyayilungisa. Wonke ama-transformer ashile, sifaka amasha," eqhuba.Utshele abantu ukuthi bangavumi ukukhohliswa ngamaqembu amancane enza izethembiso angeke azigcine."Abakaze benze lutho kodwa bahamba bethi, 'nywe nywe nywe', bathi bazodala amathuba emisebenzi. Thina sithi votelani abantu abazi ukwenza umsebenzi," kugcizelela uRamaphosa.Uphothule umkhankaso wakhe wayizolo KwaMashu kanti owaKwaZulu-Natal uwuqale eNanda ngoLwesihlanu.NgoMgqibelo ukhankase KwaXimba, ezindaweni eziseduze nePinetown naKwaDukuza.Namhlanje kulindeleke aqhubeke nomkhankaso wakhe KwaZulu-Natal.Umbango wokuhola lesifundazwe ushisa phansi njengoba kukhona ababona i-ANC izophuma emandleni.

UKUKHULELWA kwabafundi, inkemane ebhekene neminye imindeni, udlame emiphakathini ngezinye zezinto ezenza abafundi balaxaze isikole bengakafiki ebangeni, lika-matric.Lokhu kudalulwe nguMengameli wezwe uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa, okhale ngesihlava sabafundi abalaxa isikole.URamaphosa obekhuluma engqungqutheleni ehlelwe nguMnyango weMfundo eyisiSekelo esongwa kusasa eGoli, uthe kumele kwenziwe okuthile ngokushesha ngale nkinga.“Iyakhathaza eyokuthi abafundi abaningi abasuke beqale isikole bagcina bengasiqedanga, bashiya phansi ukufunda. Ziningi izinto ezidala izinkinga okungaba ukukhulelwa kwabafundi, udlame emiphakathini, abanye kudingeka bagade ogogo babo kanti kokunye yinkinga yendlala,” kuchaza uMongameli wezwe.Uqhube wathi kuningi osekwenziwe ngumnyango ukuzama ukugcina abafundi besezikoleni.“Okunye kwakho ngukuthi kunohlelo lokudla ezikoleni okuhlomula abafundi abangu-9 million nsuku zonke. Ezikoleni eziningi, cishe u-80% wazo akukhokhwa nhlobo imali yokufunda. Abafundi banikwa izincwadi zokufunda mahhala ezikoleni. Kwabadonsa kanzima kukhona isibonelelo sabantwana ukuze kungabikhona abantu abazobhuqwa yindlala,” kuqhuba uRamaphosa.
