Ukhale ngezinga eliphezulu labantu abasha abagcina bebhuquza emakhaya bengenzi lutho.Kwenzeka lokhu nje, uNgqongqoshe weMfundo ePhakeme nokuQeqesha uDkt Blade Nzimande, ukhale ngokuthi bambalwa abafundi abafinyelela emanyuvesi kulabo abasuke beqale uGrade 1. UNzimande obekhuluma izolo emhlanganweni nabaqashi eKapa, uveze ukuthi kubafundi abangu-100, abaqala uGrade 1, bayisithupha kuphela abaya emanyuvesi.“Umkhakha wasemanyuvesi mkhulu kakhulu kodwa bayisithupha kuphela abafundi abaya khona uma beqeda u-matric. Sizibuza ukuthi u-94 walaba bafundi bayaphi? Abanye bafeyila u-matric, abanye balaxaza isikole bengaqedanga. Esifuna ukukushintsha siwuhulumeni wuhlelo lwezemfundo ngoba ezweni elifana neGermany, u-30% wabaqede isikole baya emanyuvesi, enye ingxenye iya emabhizinisini amancane,” kuchaza uNzimande. Uqhube wathi uhlangana nenqwaba yabaqashi lapho ehamba khona abakhala ngokuthi kukhiqizwa izitshudeni ezingadingwa ngumnotho.“Angikwazi ukuthi ngingungqongqoshe ngikhiqize izitshudeni ezidingwa ngumnotho uma kungukuthi abaqashi abavuli amathuba okuqeqesha abasuke bephothule iziqu zabo. Kumele iphele le nkinga yentsha ebhuquza emakhaya, engasebenzi,” kuqhuba uNzimande.USihlalo weNational Education Collaboration Trust uMnuz Sizwe Nxasana, ekhuluma engqungqutheleni yezemfundo, uveze ukuthi kuningi okusamele kwenziwe ukunxenxa abafundi ukuthi benze i-maths.Ukhale ngokuthi bancane abafundi abathatha lesi sifundo wathi bambalwa abenza kahle kusona. Uveze nokuthi kubafundi ababhale lesi sifundo kwa-matric nyakenye, u-6% kuphela wabo abasiphase ngo-60% kuya phezulu.

UPHIKO oluphenya amacala akhethekile iSIU luveza ukuthi luthole igunya lokuphenya ukuphathwa budedengu kwekhomishana yezamaFilimu KwaZulu-Natal.UMengameli uCyril Ramaphosa usayine isiMemezelo R.4539 ngomhla ka-22 kuMashi 2024 esigunyaza i-SIU ukuthi iphenye izinsolo zokungaphathi ngendlela iKhomishana Yezamafilimu KwaZulu-Natal (KZNFC) nokubuyisa impahla noma imali elahlekile yombuso noma yayo ikhomishini.Lokhu kugunyaza iSIU ukuba iphenye ngezinkampani ezisebenzisana nekhomishini, izinkontileka ezenziwe ngokubambisana nazo ukuze  zitshale izimali nasekuthuthukisweni kokusetshenziswa kweKZN Studios.I-SIU izophinde iphenye nanoma yiziphi izindleko ezingagunyaziwe, ezingekho emthethweni, noma ezingenanzuzo nezimoshayo ezenziwe yikhomishini noma wumbuso.“Uphenyo luzohlanganisa ukungaziphathi kahle kwezikhulu noma abasebenzi bekhomishini, abahlinzeki abasebenzayo noma abahlinzeki bezinsizakalo nanoma yimuphi omunye umuntu noma inhlangano okwenzeka phakathi kuka-1 Julayi 2017 no-22 Mashi 2024,” kusho iSIU ngesitatimende.

UMENGAMELI uCyril Ramaphosa ukhale ngokudlebeleka komholi we-EFF, uMnuz Julius Malema, uma kunezinkulumompikiswano ePhalamende.URamaphosa ukhale ngokuthi uMalema uvele ahlasele isiqu somuntu uma kukhulunywa ePhalamende, ayeke ukukhuluma ngezinto ezithinta abantu okusuke kuxoxwa ngazo.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma ePhalamende, lapho ebephendula izinto ezashiwo amaqembu ezepolitiki ngesikhathi kunenkulumompikiswano, ngoLwesihlanu.Ngesikhathi uMalema ekhuluma kwinkulumompikiswano, wagxeka isinqumo se-ANC sokubambisana ne-DA.UMalema wasola uRamaphosa ngokuthengisa ngabantu abamnyama, wathi vele nangesikhathi sobandlululo wayesolwa ngokuba impimpi.Eziphendulela, uRamaphosa uthe uMalema usadinga ukufundiswa ipolitiki.“Uchithe isikhathi esiningi lapha uhlasela mina siqu sami, esikhundleni sokukhuluma ngezinto ezizoyisa izwe phambili. Mina nawe kusafanele sihlale phansi sikhulume ngepolitiki. Kusafanele ke ngikufundise ipolitiki. Ngibona sengathi ipolitiki iyakudida. “Kufanele uma usukuma lapha, ukhulume izinto ezizoyisa abantu phambili. Nginesiqiniseko sokuthi emva kokuhlala nawe phansi, uyobuya ipolitiki usuyiqonda kangcono. Uyothi uma usuthola ithuba lokukhuluma lapha, bese ukhuluma into ephilayo.”URamaphosa uthe izinto eziningi uMalema akhuluma ngazo ezazenzeka ngesikhathi kuliwa nobandlululo, uyaziphambanisa, wamyalela ukuba abuze kubaholi be-ANC abadala uma kukhona izinto ezazenzeka ngesikhathi kuliwa nobandlululo afuna ukuzazi.“Into engizibuza yona ukuthi wena wawukuphi ngesikhathi kwenzeka lezi zinto okhuluma ngazo?”URamaphosa uthe bekungekhona okokuqala uMalema emhlasela ePhalamende, wathi ngomunye unyaka uMalema wathuka ubaba wakhe khona ePhalamende.“Uyazi mina ukuthi ngakhuluma nogogo wakho. Mina angisoze ngama la, ngathuka ugogo wakho ngoba ngiyamhlonipha, futhi nawe ngiyakuhlonipha. Le nto ngiyisho ngoba ngifuna wazi ukuthi kufanele sihloniphane.”URamaphosa uncome ukubambisana kwamaqembu aphethe uhulumeni wobumbano ngesikhathi kunenkulumompikiswano.“Amaqembu abusa ngokubambisana akhombisa ukuthi azimisele kangakanani ukubona uhulumeni uya phambili. Amaqembu akhombisa ukuthi azimisele ukubeka eceleni ukungaboni ngaso linye, abeke phambili izidingo zezwe. Akukho okuzovimba uhulumeni wokubambisana. Lo hulumeni uzophumelela noma kukhona abasishwabulelayo.”URamaphosa uthe amaqembu abusa ngokubambisana azoxoxa ngemithetho angavumelani ngayo.Kule mithetho kukhona umshwalense wezempilo nemthetho wezeMfundo.“Sizokwazi ukuthola isisombululo kulokho esingavumelani ngakho. Uhulumeni uzosebenza kahle.”

UGXILE KwaZulu-Natal umkhankaso kaMengameli we-ANC uCyril Ramaphosa kule mpelasonto njengoba seziya emajikeni ngokhetho.Kumatasa ezweni kulungiselelwa ukhetho lukazwelonke oluzoba ngoMeyi 29 olubhekwe ngamehlo abomvu.I-ANC ihlasela ngabo bonke abaholi bayo, ibachitha izwe lonke izama ukuncenga abantu ukuthi bayibuyisele emandleni.Leli qembu selimemezele ukuthi uRamaphosa uzoba KwaZulu- Natal aqhube umkhankaso wehlangano wokucela amavoti kubantu. NgoLwesihlanu uRamaphosa ubeseMavundla Square khona, eGreytown esifundeni se-ANC Inkosi Bhambatha, wadlulela enkundleni yezemidlalo yendawo iLakhis.Ntambama ngalolo suku uRamaphosa wedlulele enkundleni yezemidlalo e-Ashdown eMgungundlovu esifundeni iMoses Mabhida.Uvale ngeSADTU abonane nayo ngoLwesihlanu ntambama e-ICC, eThekwini.NgoMgqibelo kulindeleke ukuthi uRamaphosa avukele edolobheni eThekwini akhulume nabantu ekuseni.Ngosuku olufanayo uzodlulela eSundumbili Plaza eMandeni esifundeni sayo iGeneral Gizenga Mpanza.Uzodlulela ehholo lendawo iSibusisiwe emini bese ebuya eqonde eChatsworth, eThekwini ntambama.NgeSonto kulindeleke ukuthi ayokotha Inkosi uBhekamanganga Shozi esigodlweni sayo eMangangeni entshonalanga yeTheku  bese edlulela eSiphingo.Isifundazwe iKwaZulu-Natal silokhu siyinyama emaqenjini ezepolitiki asina ededelana kusona.Ngaphandle kukaRamaphosa ofike e-KZN, kuke kwabonakala owayeyiphini likaMengameli uMnuz David Mabuza eseMnambithi ehamba enxenxa abavoti.Kuke kwanyathela nowayenguMengameli uMnuz uThabo Mbeki naye ohambele izindawo ezahlukene esifundazweni.Kulindeleke ukuthi i-ANC iqhubeke ihlasele ngabanye abaholi esifundazweni inxenxe abavoti.I-ANC imile ekutheni izonqoba ukhetho ngengcaca nakuba abaningi bethi ingase ikhale ngaphansi, bese idinga amanye amaqembu ezobambisana nawo.

UMENGAMELI wezwe uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa, uncome iqhaza elabanjwa yiSilo sasoSuthu, uDinuzulu kaCetshwayo, ngesikhathi kuliwa nengcindezelo.URamaphosa uthe uMamonga walwela wonke umuntu waseNingizimu Afrika, ngesikhathi kulwelwa inkululeko.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma enkonzweni yokukhumbula uDinuzulu, ebikwaCeza ngoMgqibelo.“Yize iSilo uDinuzulu wayelwa elapha KwaZulu-Natal, wayelwela wonke umuntu. Wasilwela sonke singabantu baseNingizimu Afrika. Ngalesikhathi zonke izizwe zathatha izikhali, zalwa nabamhlophe. Yingakho uma sikhumbula iSilo uDinuzulu sikhumbula namanye amakhosi alwa nokugcindezelwa kwabantu abamnyama.”URamaphosa uthe uMamonga waziqhatha nolaka lwabamhlophe ngesikhathi elwa nengcindezelo njengoba wagcina edingiselwa esiqhingini iSt Helena, iminyaka eyisikhombisa.ISilo uMisuzulu Sinqobile kaZwelithini sibonge uhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal ngokuhlela umcimbi wokukhumbula uMamonga.Umcimbi ubuhanjelwe ngabaholi bezepolitiki abaqavile, okubalwa kubo ababengondunankulu baKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sibusiso Ndebele, noDkt Zweli Mkhize, nomengameli we-IFP, uMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa.

UMENGAMELI, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa, okungakacaci namanje ukuthi uzolimemezela nini iKhabhinethi, ukhuza umbango wezikhundla kumaqembu ayingxenye yohulumeni wokubambisana.Kukholaka ukuthi umbango wezikhundla yiwo omise ukumenyezelwa kweKhabhinethi.Uhulumeni wokubambisa wakhiwe amaqembu ayishumi.URamaphosa uthe amaqembu akufanele ajoyine uhulumeni wokubambisana ngoba nakhu ejahe izikhundla.Ukusho lokhu encwadini yakhe ayibhekise kubantu bakuleli."Akufanele sivumele umbango wezikhundla ukuba ubeke engcupheni ukusebenza kuhulumeni wokubambisana. Akufanele sibeke phambili umbango wezikhundla, kufanele sibeke phambili izidingo zabantu."URamaphosa uthe abantu bakuleli babheke lukhulu kuhulumeni wokubambisana."Abantu bakubeka kwacaca ngesikhathi bevota ukuthi bafuna sibeke eceleni ukwehlukana kwethu, sisebenze ndawonye. Ngoba maningi amaqembu avumelana ngokuthi kube nohulumeni wokubambisana, ngiyathemba ukuthi sizokwazi ukubeka eceleni ukwehlukana."URamaphosa ofungiswe ngeledlule, bekulindelwe ukuthi iKhabhinethi yakhe ayimemezele ngempelasonto.Umholi wePatriotic Alliance (PA), uMnuz Gayton Mckenzie, uphumele obala waveza ukuthi izingxoxo zibanjezelwe umbango wezikhundla.I-PA ingelinye lamaqembu ayingxenye yohulumeni wokubambisana.Le nhlangano yakubeka kwacaca ukuthi ifuna ukunikwa uMnyango wezaseKhaya nowamaPhoyisa.UMckenzie ubhale kwi-X, ukuthi basaqhubeka nokuphikisana ngokwabiwa kwezikhundla."Akufanele siqambe amanga, sonke njengoba singene kuhulumeni wokubambisana sifuna izikhundla. Alikho iqembu lezepolitiki elingazifuni izikhundla."USotswebhu weDA ePhalamende oyingxenye yezingxoxo, uNksz Siviwe Gwarube, uthe izingxoxo zokubusa ngokubambisana azilula, wacela abantu ukuthi babekezele.“Ngonyaka owedlule, ePhalamende ngenze isiphakamiso sokuthi kululwe isikhathi esibekiwe sokuthi kuqokwe abaholi emva kokhetho, sibe izinsuku ezingu-30 esikhundleni sezinsuku ezingu-14. Lokhu ngangikwenza ngoba ngiyazi ukuthi izingxoxo zokubusa ngokubambisana azilula.”Umhlaziyi wezepolitiki, uMnuz Sandile Swana, uthe i-ANC neDA bahlulekile ukulungiselela kusenesikhathi izingxoxo zokubusa ngokubambisana.Ekhuluma nabeNewsroom Afrika, uSwana uthe la maqembu kufanele engabe kade aqala ukuzilungiselela ngoba kuyiwe okhethweni kubonakala ukuthi i-ANC angeke inqobe ngamalengiso. “Ngasekuqaleni konyaka bese kubona nengane encane ukuthi i-ANC izothola ngaphansi kuka-50%. I-ANC neDA bebekubona lokhu kodwa abazange bazilungiselele. Ingakho ke sekuthatha isikhathi eside.”Imibiko iveza ukuthi i-DA ifuna ukunikwa izikhundla eziyishumi kwiKhabhinethi kaRamaphosa.USwana uthe i-DA ayinalo ilungelo lokufuna inqwaba engaka yezikhundla.

UMENGAMELI Cyril Ramaphosa useqoke uNgqongqoshe ehhovisi likamengameli obhekele ukuhlela, nokuqapha ukusebenza kukahulumeni, uNksz Maropene Ramokgopa, njengozobamba izintambo emnyangweni wezeMidlalo, uBuciko namaSiko.Uqoke uNksz Ramokgopa emva kokusula kobengungqongqoshe walo mnyango uMnuz Zizi Kodwa, njengoba ebhekene necala lenkohlakalo.UKodwa uhoxe nasekubeni yilungu lekomiti lesigungu esiphezulu se-ANC, nokuba yilungu lekomiti elibhekele ukusebenza kwansuku zonke kwale nhlangano.URamaphosa uthe uNksz Ramokgopa, uzobamba izintambo kuze kutholakale ozovala isikhala sikaKodwa.“Umengameli ukwamukele ukusula kukaKodwa, wambonga ngomsebenzi awenzele isizwe. Usebenzele isizwe esayiPhini likaNgqongqoshe emnyangweni wezokuPhepha kwezwe kusuka ngo-2019 kwaya ku-2023. Kusuka ngoMashi 2023, ube esengena emnyangweni wezobuCiko,” kusho ihhovisi likaRamaphosa.Kwenzeka lokhu nje kulindeleke ukuthi kungene iKhabhinethi entsha emva kokhetho lwangeledlule.Kulolu khetho alikho iqembu elidle umhlanganiso elingabumba uhulumeni ngalodwana.URamaphosa uphakamise ukuthi kube nohulumeni wobumbano ozohlanganisa wonke amaqembu ezepolitiki.

UMENGAMELI we-ANC, uCyril Ramaphosa, usakubabaza namanje ukugqemeka kwe-ANC udume lwengozi KwaZulu-Natal, ngesikhathi kunokhetho lwangoMeyi nonyana.URamaphosa ukufanise nokuhlangabezana nezimbila zithutha okwehlela i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi eseMgungundlovu, lapho ebezohlangana khona nezinhlaka zeqembu.URamaphosa uqale wahlangana nobuholi be-ANC esifundeni iMoses Mabhida, wahlangana nabaholi be-ANC abajutshwe komasipala, wabe esegcina ngokuhlangana nabaholi abaqhamuka emagatsheni.Kule mihlangano bekubukwa imiphumela yokhetho.I-ANC ayizange yenze kahle KwaZulu-Natal njengoba yasuka ekubeni yiqembu eliphethe ngokuzimela, yaba iqembu lesithathu ngobukhulu.URamaphosa uthe imiphumela yokhetho olwedlule ibadumazile.“Amavoti esiwatholile ehle kakhulu, ikakhulukazi lapha KwaZulu-Natal.”Abaholi be-ANC kuzwelonke bebephume kuzo zonke izinkalo zesifundazwe, behambe bekhuluma namalungu enhlangano.USihlalo we-ANC, uMnuz Gwede Mantashe, ubesesifundeni iJosiah Gumede, iPhini likaNobhala, uNkk Nomvula Mokonyane, belisesifundeni iMusa Dladla, uMgcinimafa Jikelele, uDkt Gwen Ramokgopa, yena ubesesifundeni i-General Gizenga Mpanza.URamaphosa uthe inhloso yale mihlangano ukuqinisa izinhlaka zeqembu.“Sifuna ukuzinikeza kahle isikhathi, sibuke ukuthi ikuphi esingazange sikwenze kahle ngesikhathi kunokhetho. Lena iyona ndlela esizokwazi ukuqinisa ngayo amagatsha e-ANC futhi ezokwenza ukuthi sikwazi ukwakha kabusha i-ANC.”Okhulumela i-ANC, uMnuz Zuko Godlimpi, uphinde waphebeza amahlebezi okuthi kunezinhlelo zokuhlakaza ubuholi be-ANC KwaZulu-Natal.UGodlimpi uthe isigungu esiphezulu kwi-ANC asikaze sithathe isinqumo sokuthi kuhlakazwe ubuholi be-ANC KwaZulu-Natal.Amahlebezi okuhlakazwa kobuholi besifundazwe awaqali manje, ngesikhathi kubhekwe okhethweni kwakunamahlebezi okuthi ubuholi buzohlakazwa.Aphinde aqala phansi amahlebezi emva kokumenyezelwa kwemiphumela yokhetho.“Njengoba silapha sizolalela abaholi bamagatsha. Asikwazi nje ukuvele sivuke ekuseni, bese sithi sihlakaza ubuholi besifundazwe. Sekungaba ke abaholi bamagatsha abangakhuluma leyo nto uma kuwukuthi iyona nto abayibona ifanelwe ukwenzeka.”UGodlimpi uthe basazohambela nezinye izifundazwe, abezokugcina lapha KwaZulu-Natal.Namhlanje ubuholi be-ANC kuzwelonke buzokuba nomhlangano nesigungu esiphezulu saKwaZulu-Natal.USihlalo we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Siboniso Duma, uthe uhambo lobuholi lubalulekile ikakhulukazi njengoba sekusondele ukhetho lohulumeni basekhaya oluzokuba ngo-2026.

NJENGOBA ziqhubeka izinguyazana zamaqembu ezepolitiki ngohulumeni wokubambisana ngenxa yokuthi alikho iqembu elidle umhlanganiso okhethweni, elingakwazi ukumisa uhulumeni ngalodwana, iKhabhinethi kaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa izoqhubeka nokuphatha izwe kuze kufungiswe umengameli omusha.Le khabhinethi igunyazwe yisigaba sika-94 soMthethosisekelo esibalula ukuthi umengameli, iphini lakhe, ongqongqoshe namaphini ongqongqoshe baqhubeke nomsebenzi wabo kuze kube kufungiswa umengameli omusha ozobe esekhetha amafolosi akhe.Okhulumela iPhalamende uMnuz Moloto Mothapo, ukuqinisekisile lokhu wathi seziqalile izinhlelo zokuthi kulungiselelwe uhulumeni wehlandla lesikhombisa ozongena ezintanjeni selokhu kwatholakala intando yeningi.Uthe emazweni abusa ngentando yeningi iPhalamende lidlala indima ebalulekile yokushaya imithetho ezokwenza uhulumeni aphendule. Uveze ukuthi iPhalamende libunjwa amalungu angekho ngaphansi kuka-350 kuya kwawu-400.Kunezihlalo ezingu-400 ePhalamende, ezingu-200 ezomkhandlu weziFundazwe kuthi ezingu-200 ezeNational Assembly.“Uma sekumenyezelwe imiphumela yokhetho ezweni, kumele kuhlale iPhalamende ezinsukwini ezingu-14. Uhlu lwabaya ePhalamende lunikwa inhloko yamaJaji kuleli okuyiyona ebiza umhlangano wokuqala wokuhlalisa iPhalamende. Kulo mhlangano kufungiswa wonke amalungu amasha, bese kuphakanyiswa igama lomuntu ozoba ngusomlomo wePhalamende.”Uthe kuzobe sekuvotelwa igama likasomlomo, uma kungukuthi baningi abantu okuphakanyiswe amagama abo. “Uma esekhethiwe usomlomo, uzobe esengamela uhlelo lokukhethwa kwephini likasomlomo. Uhlelo lokukhetha umengameli lwenzeka ekugcineni emva kokuba sekukhethwe iphini likasomlomo. Lenganyelwa inhloko yamajaji. Kuphakanyiswa igama lozoba ngumengameli, uma emaningi amagama aphakanyisiwe, kuvotwe ngokuyimfihlo bese okhethiwe kwesikamengameli esula ekubeni yilungu lePhalamende. UMothapo uqhube wachaza ukuthi ezinsukwini ezinhlanu ekhethiwe umengameli kumele kubanjwe umcimbi wokumfungisa.“Lo mcimbi wenganyelwa yinhloko yamajaji. Umengameli okhona nethimba lakhe yilapho ke bezobe sebededa khona inkundla uma sekufungiswe umengameli omusha.”Uthe lokhu kwenziwa ukuze ezindlini zombuso kungahlali bungekho ubuholi obuphethe izwe. Ubalule ukuthi uma umengameli esengene ehhovisi, ube esekhetha iKhabhinethi yakhe.“Esebenzisana noSomlomo wePhalamende kanjalo noSihlalo weNdlu yoMkhandlu weziFundazwe, kube sekunqunywa usuku lokuvulwa kwePhalamende. Ukuvulwa kwePhalamende kuhambisana nenkulumo ebhekiswe esizweni.” Uthe kube sekucijwa amalungu amasha ngemigomo yePhalamende nangezinto azobe ezenza kule minyaka emihlanu.Uveze nokuthi maduzane bazokhipha uhlelo olugcwele oluzolandelwa ekubunjweni koMkhandlu weziFundazwe.

UMENGAMELI wezwe, uCyril Ramaphosa, utuse uhulumeni wokubambisana ophethe iNingizimu Afrika ngesikhathi ekhuluma nabaholi bamazwe omhlaba.URamaphosa uthe uhulumeni wokubambisana ongene emva kokhetho lwangoMeyi, usuqalile ukusombulula izinkinga ezibhekene nezwe.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma emhlanganweni wenhlangano yezizwe i-UN General Assembly oqhubeka eNew York, eMelika.Kuleli sonto kuphela izinsuku ezingu-100 kwakhiwa uhulumeni wokubambisana.Bekungokokuqala ukuba uRamaphosa ahambele eMelika kusukela kwakhiwa uhulumeni wokubambisana.URamaphosa uthe isiqalile ukubonakala imisebenzi yohulumeni wokubambisana.“Isimo somnotho wethu sesingcono kakhulu kanti futhi nabatshalimali babuyelwe ithemba. Ikusasa lezwe libukeka liqhakazile. Uhulumeni wokubambisa uzosiyisa endaweni engcono, ezweni lesethembiso.”URamaphosa uthe ukwakhiwa kohulumeni wokubambisana kukhombisa ukukhula kwentando yeningi eNingizimu Afrika.“INingizimu Afrika yathola inkululeko eminyakeni engu-30 eyedlule. Namhlanje iNingizimu Afrika iyizwe elikhululekile. Sisanda kuba nokhetho lwesikhombisa ngaphansi kombuso wentando yeningi.“Imiphumela yokhetho lwakamumva iyona eyenze ukuthi sigcine siba nohulumeni wokubambisana. Uhulumeni wokubambisana wakhiwe amaqembu ayishumi afuna ukukhulisa umnotho, ukudala amathuba emisebenzi, nokuqeda indlala.”URamaphosa nabanye ongqongqoshe ilokhu batheleka eNew York ngeledlule lapho bexoxa khona nabaholi bamazwe omhlaba nabatshalimali.URamaphosa uphinde wesebenzisa enye yezinkulumo zakhe ukunxusa ukuba izwekazi i-Afrika limeleleke ngendlela emkhandlwini wezokuphepha kwi-UN.URamaphosa uthe akulungile ukuthi i-Afrika ingabi naso isihlalo emkhandlwini wezokuphepha.Uthe bakhathazekile ngezinxushunxushu eziqhubeka emazweni omhlaba, wabala impi ephakathi kwelaKwa-Israel neHamas.Sekuyophela unyaka kwaqubuka le mpi esidlule nemiphefumulo engaphezu kuka-40 000.URamaphosa uthe akwanele okwenziwe amazwe omhlaba ukuqeda le mpi.“Abantu basePalestine babhekene nodlame oluyisihluku esinzima. Sekuneminyaka abantu basePalestine becindezelwe yi-Israel. Thina njengeNingizimu Afrika siyazi ukuthi kunzima kanjani ukuphila ngaphansi kwengcindezelo. “Saphila ngaphansi kobandlulo. Sahlupheka kabi ngesikhathi kuphethe uhulumeni wobandlululo. Ingakho singeke sithule uma sibona kukhona abancindezelekile. Ingakho sifuna ukuthi kuqiniswe imithetho, kuthathelwe izinyathelo labo abenza okuphambene.”

UMENGAMELI Cyril Ramaphosa usekhiphe isexwayiso esishubile kosopolitiki nalabo abazama ukudala uqhekeko nodungunyane ezweni ukuthi izophunza imizamo yabo. URamaphosa ophefumule kanje ngoLwesithathu ngesikhathi egcotshwa eziNdlini zoMbuso ePitoli, uthe akuphele ukujikijelana ngamazwi kosopolitiki nokungabaza imiphumela yokhetho ngoba abantu bakhulumile.Uphinde waxwayisa nalabo abazama ukuthi abantu bajikelane bodwa ukuthi nabo ngeke baphumelele. Uveze ukuthi izwe libumbene futhi ungumengameli kawonke wonke.“Kumele siyichithe yonke imizamo yabahlela ukusikhipha endleleni esihlele ukuyihamba ngokuthi bafake ungabazane noma bafune sijikelane sodwa. Abafuna ukuma endleleni yethu ngokuthi bafake uqhekeko bagxeke nemiphumela yokhetho ngeke baphumelele,” kusho uRamaphosa.Noma engazange abadalule laba abazama ukudala uqhekeko nokungabaza imiphumela yokhetho kodwa kucacele noma ngubani ukuthi ubekhuluma ngeqembu uMkhonto weSizwe eliholwa owayengumengameli wezwe ne-ANC, uJacob Zuma.I-MK ingabaza imiphumela yokhetho kanti yaduba nokuya ePhalamende ngesikhathi kukhethwa uMengameli noSomlomo wePhalamende.Leli qembu lidube nokuhambela umcimbi wokugcotshwa kukaRamaphosa ihlandla lesibili. Liye naseNkantolo yezoKhetho lichitha imiphumela yokhetho.URamaphosa uthe abantu bakuleli bayakwazi abakufunayo.“Ngiwumengameli wawonke wonke, hhayi idlanzana. Abantu bakhulumile, sibazwile, senza lokhu abakufunayo. Alikho iqembu eliwine ngamalengiso okhethweni, yingakho abavoti bethe asisebenzisane ukubumba uhulumeni,” usho kanje.Uveze ukuthi babumbe uhulumeni ohlanganisa amaqembu ahlukene.“Sizoba nokhukhulelangoqo womhlangano ozohlanganisa zonke izinhlaka zomphakathi, amaqembu ahlukene ezepolitiki, abezenkolo ukuhlahla indlela ngekusasa lezwe. Kumele sisebenzisane ukulungisa izinselelo ezibhekene nezwe.” Uveze ukuthi bazosebenza nawo wonke amaqembu, ngeke bakhethe iphela emasini.“Izandla zivuliwe zokuthi sisebenze nawo wonke umuntu. Siyabanxenxa nabangakasondeli ukuthi beze ukuze sisebenzisane ukuyisa izwe phambili,” kusho yena.Ubalule ukuthi abantu bakhathele yinkohlakalo, izinga eliphezulu lobugebengu, ukulawulwa koMbuso yidlanzana, ukwebiwa kwemali yomphakathi kanti bazibekile izinto abafuna ukuthi zilungiswe ngokushesha ezweni. “Akubekwe abantu bakuleli phambili. Akukhuliswe umnotho, kwakhiwe amathuba emisebenzi, abantu baphephe siphinde sisebenzele abantu. Mina ngizimisele ukusebenzela umphakathi.” Uthe abantu bakuleli bayemukele imiphumela yokhetho. URamaphosa ufungiswe yinhloko yamaJaji kuleli, iJaji uRaymond Zondo, phambi kwezinkumbi zezicukuthwane, kuhlanganisa nomengameli bakwamanye amazwe.

USEYIHLONZE njengesimo esiphuthumayo esidinga ukulungiswa ngokushesha eyabahlalise lubhojozi osomabhizinisi nomphakathi ngoba befuna imali yokubavikela.Lo mkhuba cishe osusabalele ezweni lonke wenza abanye osomabhizinisi bagcine sebevala amabhizinisi abo ngoba uma bengakhokhi abanye bayabulawa noma bahlukunyezwe.UMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, uthe bayibeke eqhulwini futhi iyabakhathaza kakhulu eyalobu bugebengu ngoba ikapakele nasezikhungweni zikahulumeni okubalwa nezikole. “Isimo esiphuthumayo eyokukhuculula lobu bugebengu ngoba kwezinye izindawo ihambisana nokuthumba abantu. Kunethimba eyisipesheli elijutshwe ukulwa nale nkinga. Le nto yaqala ngesikhathi sabantu abazibiza ngamaDelangokubona, ababefuna imisebenzi kuhulumeni.”Uthe sekuzoba nenombolo kazwelonke lapho kuzobikwa khona abafuna imali ngodli.Ukusho lokhu ephendula imibuzo eMkhandlwini weziFundazwe ePhalamende.Amalungu ePhalamende akhale ngokuthi abantu abaphephile athi kuze kuvalwe ngisho izikole ngenxa yalobu bugebengu.URamaphosa uveze ukuthi bavumelene nabaholi bamaqembu abambisene kuhulumeni ukuthi kube nethimba elizohlela izinto okumele zikhulunywe, zilungiswe.“Kuyohlale kukhona abantu abangaboni ngaso linye ngakho sivumelene nalaba baholi ukuthi kube naleli thimba. Yilona elizohlonza izinto okumele zixoxwe amaqembu ayingxenye kahulumeni wokubambisana.”Uthe izinkinga nokungaboni ngaso linye ziyohlale zikhona wathi kodwa akaboni ukuthi zingaze zifike ezingeni lokuthi kuhlukane inhloko nesixhanti.“Sizoxoxa uma kunezinkinga size sifike esivumelwaneni. Abantu bakuleli basibeka esimeni sokuthi sisebenzisane singamaqembu ahlukene njengoba lingekho iqembu elawina ngamalengiso ukuze libumbe uhulumeni ngalodwana.”URamaphosa uthe usewutholile umbiko kuNgqongqoshe wezobuLungiswa nokuThuthukiswa koMthethosisekelo, uNksz Thembi Simelane, ngezinsolo zokuthi waboleka imali ebhange eselawa iVBS.“Ngisanda kuwuthola umbiko ovela kungqongqoshe njengoba ngesikhathi kuvela izindaba zokuthi waboleka imali, ngamcela ukuthi anginike umbiko. Ngimatasa ngiyawufunda, ngizolandela imigudu ebekiwe,” kusho uRamaphosa.UNksz Simelane wakuchitha ukuthi waboleka imali eVBS kodwa wayiboleka enkampanini eyayisebenzisana nomasipala ayeyimeya kuwona. Uveze ukuthi uhulumeni uzogxila ekuphothuleni umsebenzi owashiywa kanjalo ungaphothulwanga osekuphele iminyaka.“Le misebenzi yama ngenxa yenkohlakalo, eminye ngenxa yokuthi ayengekho amava kulabo ababeyenza. Eminye yayo uthola ukuthi kwabizwa imali enkulu ukuze abanye bazuze kwagcina ngokuthi ingapheli.”Odabeni oluthinta imisebenzi, uthe bazowavula amathuba nakulabo abaneminyaka engu-35 kuya phezulu.“Ngeke sigxile kuphela entsheni eneminyaka engu-35 kuya phansi ngoba nalabo asebekhulile kuyadingeka ukuthi basizwe.”

Ushaya amaphiko kuyona yonke iminyango kahulumeni uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, njengoba engamele yonke iminyango kuze kube uqoka iKhabhinethi entsha.Ihlandla leKhabhinethi ekhona liphela namhlanje uma esefungiswe ngokusemthethweni uRamaphosa yinhloko yamaJaji uRaymond Zondo.URamaphosa ufungiswa eziNdlini zoMbuso ePitoli emcimbini ohanjelwe abaholi abahlukene bamazwe ase-Afrika, nezimenywa.Ihhovisi likamengameli likhumbuze abantu ukuthi namhlanje wusuku olujwayelekile njengoba kungelona iholidi.“Wusuku olubalulekile emlandweni ngoba kufungiswa umengameli ozophatha uhulumeni wehlandla lesikhombisa kodwa akulona iholidi. Emuva kokufungiswa uMengameli uzothula inkulumo,” kusho ihhovisi lakhe.UNksz Nomonde Mnukwa ibamba likaMqondisi jikelele kwaGCIS, uveze ukuthi uRamaphosa ufungiswa ngesikhathi izwe ligubha iminyaka engu-30 lakhululeka.“Ufungiswa ngesikhathi izwe limatasa nezinhlelo zokugubha iminyaka engu-30 lakhululeka. Ngenxa yesimo somnotho simeme abaholi bamazwe ase-Afrika nezinye izimenywa ezimbalwa,” kusho uNksz Mnukwa.Uveze ukuthi maningi amaciko azonandisa kulo mcimbi wathi kuzoba nomdlalo ozodlalwa bukhoma.Izangoma zezulu zibalule ukuthi lizobe lifudumele namhlanje uma sekugcotshwa uRamaphosa.Siye koshicilela kusafike omengameli abahlukene okubalwa owaseZimbabwe uMnuz  Emmerson Mnangagwa, owaseNamibia uMnuz Nangolo Mbumba, owaseBurundi uMnuz Gervais Ndirakobuca nePhini likaMengameli waseCuba uMnuz Salvador Mesa.Ekhuluma namaphoyisa abethola izindondo izolo esikhungweni iTshwane Academy obenguNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa uMnuz Bheki Cele, uthe uRamaphosa uzokwengamela yonke into kuhulumeni uma esegcotshiwe.“Uma esegcotshiwe iyaphela eyeKhabhinethi ekhona, izwe uzoliphatha yedwa aze aqoke iKhabhinethi yakhe entsha. NgisenguNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa okwamanje, kodwa ngizobizwa kuthiwe obenguNgqongqoshe uma esefungisiwe uRamaphosa.” Ubonge ithuba alinikwe nguRamaphosa empini yokulwa nobugebengu kuleli.“Ngiyabonga kubantu bakuleli, ikakhulu i-ANC. Labo abazothatha izintambo, kumele bazi ukuthi lude ukhalo okumele luhanjwe. Akusetshenzelwe umphakathi kuliwe nobugebengu,” kusho uCele.Abanye abebengoNgqongqoshe okubalwa noweMfundo ePhakeme nokuQeqesha uDkt Blade Nzimande, babambe imihlangano yokugcina nezikhulu zeminyango yabo izolo.

UMENGAMELI we-ANC, uCyril Ramaphosa uzohola amalungu esigungu esiphezulu azoqinisa umkhankaso walenhlangano esifundazweni esibangwayo, iKwaZulu-Natal.URamaphosa nabanye abaholi be-ANC kuzwelonke bazohlala isonto lonke KwaZulu-Natal lapho bezokube behamba bekhankasa ezingxenyeni ezahlukene zesifundazwe.Lezindaba zivezwe usihlalo we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Siboniso Duma, obekhuluma ngaphambi kokuqala komhlangano wokulungiselela ukhetho.Umhlangano wobuholi be-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, ubuseThekwini izolo.Umbango wokuhola iKwaZulu-Natal ushisa phansi, lesifundazwe singesesibili ngokwesibalo sabantu abaningi ababhalisele ukuvota.Ongoti babona kuzokuba wumqansa ukuthi i-ANC ikwazi ukugcina lesifundazwe okhethweni lwangenyanga ezayo.UDuma uthe njengoba ukhetho lwangoMeyi 29 selusondele, bazoqinisa umkhankaso wabo.“Kuyizindaba ezinhle kuthina ukuthi umengameli nawo wonke amalungu esigungu esiphezulu, azohlala izinsuku eziyisikhombisa lapha KwaZulu-Natal.“Lapha KwaZulu-Natal sinabantu abangu-5, 7 million ababhalisele ukuvota. Sibalwa nezifundazwe ezinabantu abaningi abahalisele ukuvota.“Kulomhlangano wanamhlanje sizolungiselela ukufika kwamalungu esigungu esiphezulu. Njengoba sekusele izinsuku ezingu-42 kufike ukhetho, lokhu kukutshela ukuthi kufanele siqinise umkhankaso wethu,” kusho uDuma.Umhlangano wayizolo ubuhanjelwe amalungu esigungu esiphezulu kuzwelonke abeholwa wuMnuz Zizi Kodwa  nabaholi abaqhamuka ezifundeni.UDuma uthe bazoxoxa kabanzi ngezindaba ezithinta ukuhanjiswa kwezidingo kubantu.“Kulezinsuku ezingu-42 ezisele kufanele sibone ukuthi sikwenza kanjani lokhu okusasele. Kufanele sixoxe ukuthi abantu abangakawatholi amanzi, bazowathola kanjani.“Sonke siqaphelile ukuthi sekuphele izinsuku ezingu-22 ugesi ungacishwa. Lokhu kukutshela ukuthi umehluko usukhona odabeni lukagesi,” esho.Uthe bazophinde bathole umbiko ngokusebenza komasipala basesifundazweni, wabalula umasipala omkhulu, iTheku.Udaba lwesiteleka sabasebenzi esidonse isikhathi eside saphazamisa ukuhanjiswa kwezidingo ezindaweni ezingaphansi kwalomkhandlu dolobha, luzoba seqhulwini.Lesiteleka esidonse amasonto siholela ekutheni abantu bagcine sebekhala ngokuphazamiseka kwezidingo ezifana namanzi, ugesi nokuqoqwa kukadoti.UDuma uthe bafuna ukwazi ukuthi isimo sinjani njengamanje.“Esikwaziyo ukuthi isiteleka sesaphela, abasebenzi sebabuyela emsebenzini. Yingakho sithe asibize onke amalungu esigungu esiphezulu, ukuze sizothola umbiko. Sifuna ukuthi sonke sikhulume ngazwi linye, kuqhuba uDuma.Ngaphambi kokuqala komhlangano amalungu e-ANC abebukeka egcwele ukuzethemba, ecula izingoma zomzabalazo.

UKUSHAYWA wonogada basemsebenzini komlisa waseMabheleni, KwaSwayimane, walimala kabi, uthi sekuphazamise izinto eziningi njengoba esesaba nokuchithekelwa wumuzi ngenxa yokungavuki kwenduku emva kokulimala. UMnuz Scelo Khuzwayo uthe sekuphele izinyanga ezintathu ehlelwe yile nkinga. Uthe kuthe eziyela emsebenzini njengenjwayelo, wavinjwa wunogada wasesangweni lesitolo, ethi akavumelekile ukungena ngaphakathi ngoba kunecala ayesolelwa lona. Uveze ukuthi okumkhathaza kakhulu manje wukuthi induku yakhe isiba buhlungu futhi ayisaqini ngokwanele ukuze akwazi ukuya ocansini.“Ngiganiwe futhi nginengane eyodwa, ngakho kuyangikhathaza ukuthi indlela engalimala ngayo ngibuye ngingakwazi ukufeza umsebenzi wami wasekamelweni ngendlela efanele,” usho kanje.“Unogada wasesangweni wathi angimnike iselula yami, ethi kusho abaphathi bakhe. Kwathi sisahleli kanjalo silinde ukuthi angingenise ngaphakathi, kwafika abanye onogada bangiqhuba ukuya kwelinye lamagumbi angaphakathi esitolo, lapho esafica khona umphathi wonogada besitolo,” kusho yena.UKhuzwayo, oveze ukuthi wayewumshayeli womshini othutha impahla yesitolo kulesi sitolo, uthe wathi sebekulelo gumbi, umphathi wonogada wamtshela ukuthi bazwile ukuthi naye ungomunye wabantu abasolwa ngokweba impahla yesitolo, beyidayisela abantu abathile, okuyinto athi akakaze ayenze.“Baqhubeka bengipheka ngemibuzo, bengisola ngokweba, ngabatshela ukuthi angazi lutho ngalokho. Abakukholwanga engikushoyo, becofa iselula yami, bethi babheka izinombolo zabantu engihlangene nabo ukweba esitolo, bangathola lutho.“Basuka lapho bangithelekela ngezimpama, bangishaya nangezibhakela ngisho nangensimbi ephathwa wonogada, ngaze ngafofobala phansi. Omunye wonogada wangikhahlela ezimbanjeni nasebuntwini bami, ngalimala kabi impela nje, bajika bangangikhombisa ubufakazi obungihlanganisa nalezi zinsolo ababengihlanganisa nazo,” kulanda uKhuzwayo.Uthe emva kwesigameko uxhumane ne-agent eyayimqashe kulesi sitolo, yacebisa ukuthi avule icala, walivula kodwa okumkhathazayo wukuthi sekuze kwaphela izinyanga ezintathu kungaboshwe muntu. “Ngaphoqeka ukuwuyeka umsebenzi ngoba ngatshelwa nokuthi angisadingeki kulesi sitolo, bengisola ngokuthi angithembekile. Kungiphatha kabi ukuthi sekuhambe isikhathi esingaka, kodwa akukho engikuzwayo ngecala, ekubeni ngashayelwa ubala futhi ngalimala kabi nasendukwini,” kubalisa uKhuzwayo.Kuthintwa imenenja yesitolo, uKhuzwayo athi wayesebenza kusona, ithe ayazi lutho ngalolu daba, futhi ayikaze izwe lutho ngesigameko esinjalo, yase ivala ucingo. Okhulumela amaphoyisa esifundazweni, uConstable Thenjiswa Ngcobo, uthe amaphoyisa aseMgungundlovu aphenya icala lokushaya ngenhloso yokulimaza, elivulwe emva kwalesi sigameko. Uthe kwashaywa kwalimala owesilisa oneminyaka engu-37 emgwaqweni uVictoria, eMgungundlovu ngoMashi 8.UConstable Ngcobo uthe kuboshwe abalisa abathathu ngalesi i sigameko, futhi bagcine ukuvela enkantolo ngoMeyi 2.

UBHONGOZA weWest, okuyiqembu lemigulukudu elisolwa ngokudubula libulale ababili ebebesohlakeni olulwa nobugebengu eNewtown C eNanda, usalokhu efika ngaphandle komuzi woyedwa wabafi.Lokhu kuvezwe ngelinye ilungu lomndeni wakwaMbambo, elicele ukungadalulwa ngenxa yokuzibona lingaphephile, izolo ngesikhathi bevakashelwe nguNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube.UNkk Dube-Ncube ubehambele imindeni emithathu yalabo abadutshulwe babulawa besekhaleni lokulwa nobugebengu eNanda naseVerulam.Esigamekweni esenzeke ngeSonto kudutshulwe kwabulawa u-Avela Nomphahla (30) ezilolonga nabanye enkundleni yemidlalo.Esigamekweni sesibili (naso esenzeke ngeSonto) kungenelwe uMzwandile Mbambo (60) emzini wakhe wadutshulwa ngabasolwa phambi kwabazukulu nonkosikazi.Kwesinye esenzeke ngoMsombuluko eWaterloo, eVerulam, kudutshulwe kwabulawa uMajola weCommunity Policing Forum (CPF) igama lakhe elingatholakalanga.Kuthiwa uhlaselwe ngababulali esematasa ephelezela amalungu omphakathi eyogibela eya emsebenzini ezama ukuthi aphephe."Uyafika zonke izinsuku u... (Egagula ubhongoza ngegama), afike ame la ngenhla komuzi. Ufika ngezimoto ezehlukene. Lokhu ukwenza zonke izinsuku selokhu kwabulawa umufi (uMbambo)," kusho ilungu lomndeni.Umsunguli weThekwini Neighbourhood Watch, uMnuz Andile Jali, uthe bazisiwe ngalokhu.Uqhube wathi indlela abahlaselwa ngayo yimigulukudu idweba isithombe sokuthi abaphephile kangakanani bengamalungu ezinhlangano ezilwa nobugebengu."Phela thina siyisithiyo esibavimba ukuthi bangakwazi ukufinyelela kubantu ukuze babagcweleze," kusho uJali.Ukhale ngokuthi indawo yonke ye-INK (Inanda, Ntuzuma neKwaMashu) ibhekene nobugebengu obuseqophelweni eliphezulu.Uthe sekunesikhathi bexhumana nezinhlaka ezehlukene zikahulumeni okukhona kuzo yena undunankulu, uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka, ukhomishana wamaphoyisa esifundazweni noMnuz Bheki Cele."Njengoba eza lana nje uzwelana nathi ngoba wonke umuntu ogadayo akavikelekile. Siyabonga ukuthi azifikele mathupha azozibonela ubungozi bale ndawo. Siyajabula uma undunankulu eveza ukuthi kukhona ithimba lamaphoyisa elitshaliwe kule ndawo ukuba ligade ubusuku nemini," kusho uJali.Uthe bakuyekele kuwona amaphoyisa ukuthi ayababopha noma ayababulala njengoba nabo bebulala ozakwabo abaqaphe nabo ubugebengu.Uthe kubajabulisile ukubulawa komunye wabasolwa ngoMsombuluko ngoba lokho kusho ukuphunguka ngasohlangothini lwezigebengu ezizenzela umathanda emphakathini.UNkk Dube-Ncube uthe kubuhlungu ukuhlaselwa kwamalungu ezinhlaka ezilwa nobugebengu, ebulawa yizigebengu."Sizoqhubeka nokuletha izinsiza okufanele zibe khona. Yikho sibanike izimoto, amaselula, nezimpahla zokugqoka," kusho uNkk Dube.Uqhube wathi basazonikwa noqeqesho lokuthi bagcine bekwazi ukubhekana ngqo nezigebengu uma ziphethe izibhamu.Ukhale ngokwakheka kwelokishi iNewtown, wathi kufanele kube khona izindlu ezibhidlizwayo ukuze kwakheke kahle imigwaqo khona namaphoyisa ezokwazi ukuthi afinyelele kalula uma ebizelwa esigamekweni.Uthe basezingxoxweni nemiphakathi efana nale ukuthi mhlawumbe sekuyisikhathi sokuthi kudilizwe eminye yemijondolo ukuze kwakhiwe imigwaqo ukuze usizo lufike kalula.

OWAYENGUNGQONGQOSHE wamaphoyisa uMnuz Nathi Nhleko, uthe akakafuni ukukhuluma ngepolitiki, usafuna ukupholisa ikhanda emuva kokulaxaza i-ANC. UNhleko wesule enhlanganweni ebusayo ngoMsombuluko.Incwadi kaNhleko esabalale ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ibale abantu ebhekiswe kubona, okukhona kubona uNobhala wesifunda se-ANC iMusa Dladla, uMnuz Madanga Xulu. Kukhona negama likaNobhala wesifundazwe uMnuz Bheki Mtolo, wuNobhala-Jikelele kaKhongolose uMnuz Fikile Mbalula noMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa.UNhleko uthe kwamkhuba kakhulu ukuthi uMbalula amqambele amanga. UMbalula wacashunwa ethi i-ANC yaqamba amanga ngodaba lomuzi wowayengumengameli uJacob Zuma oseNkandla.UMbalula waveza ukuthi uNhleko wayekha izithukuthuku ejuluka ePhalamende ezama ukuphesha ngamanga, lubhokile udaba lwaseNkandla. UNhleko waphendula wabiza uMbalula ngonontandakubukwa ethi ukhuluma into engekho.UNhleko encwadini uthe uyasola ukuthi kukhona abaholi be-ANC abangaphathekanga kahle ngombiko wakhe ngeNkandla ngoba wakhishwa inyumbazana kusukela lapho. Uthe akabange esajutshwa ndawo ngokwezikhundla kuze kube manje.Ebuzwa ngekusasa lakhe nokushiya kwakhe i-ANC, uthe usacela ukunikwa isikhathi nje angasho lutho.“ Ngisathe ake ngiziphathe kahle  maqondana nesimo esikhona okwamanje. Ngicela sithintane ngoLwesihlanu,’’ kusho uNhleko. Emuva kwalokho uphinde wayishayela intatheli ucingo kodwa wathi lushayeke ngephutha waxolisa wathi uzobuya ayithinte intatheli.Ebuzwa ngabamyamanisa neqembu elisha uMkhonto weSizwe, uNhleko akayiphendulanga nhlobo leyo. Isishoshovu se-ANC esake saba wumengameli weSASCO uMnuz Ntuthuko Makhombothi sibhale kuX ukuthi uNhleko uya kuMkhonto weSizwe.UMakhombothi uthe uNhleko waputshuza inkulumo yakhe eqoshiwe ngamabomu ukuvuselela igama lakhe ukuze afike kwiMK njengosondonzima.

UMBUSO uzobiza ofakazi abangu-62 ecaleni lokuphehla izibhelu zomtapo ngoJulayi 2021 olithweswe owayeyisishoshovu se-#FeesMustFall, uMnuz Bonginkosi Khanyile.UKhanyile, ongaphandle ngebheyili kaR5 000, ubevele eNkantolo yesiFunda yaseThekwini ngoLwesihlanu.Enkantolo bekwenziwa izindlalelo zokuqala kokuqulwa kwaleli cala eselidonse iminyaka linganyakazi.Umshushisi u-Advocate Yuri Gangai uthe labo fakazi baqhamuka kuzona zonke izifundazwe eNingizimu Afrika.“Ingxenye yalabo fakazi iphuma ngaphandle kwesifundazwe iKwaZulu-Natal. Umbuso uzosebenzisa ubufakazi bama-video nezinkulumo zaku-Whatsapp obuzoveza ukuthi ummangalelwa unecala,” kusho uGangai.Enye yala ma-video amahlanu azosetshenziswa wuMbuso uma sekuthethwa icala ingase iphonselwe inselelo wummeli kaKhanyile okhala ngogcobho athi ikuyona.Ngakolunye uhlangothi, ummeli kaKhanyile uthe uzobiza yena ummangalelwa nabanye ofakazi ababili bezothula ubufakazi.Imantshi ibe isikuhlehlisela uSepthemba 23 nonyaka ukuphothulwa kwalezi ngxoxo zokuqala kokuqulwa kwecala okungase kube ngasekupheleni konyaka.UGangai uveze ukuthi uMbuso ungase udinge isikhathi esiyinyanga yonke sokulalelwa kwaleli cala uma seliqulwa enkantolo.Kulindeleke ukuthi uMbuso unike ummeli kaKhanyile uhla lofakazi bawo uma sekusele izinsuku ezingu-30 kuqulwe icala.UKhanyile ubebukeka ezikhululekele ebhokisini lofakazi. Njengenjwayelo uswenka aconse uma evela phambi kwale nkantolo.Bekukhona namalungu eqembu lakhe lezepolitiki uMkhonto weSizwe Party abegqoke izimpahla zaleli qembu abezomeseka enkantolo.Abantu bavuka umbhejazane ngo-2021 emuva kokuboshwa kowayengumengameli wezwe, uMnuz Jacob Zuma bangenela izitolo nezindawo ezigcina impahla batapa.Kwashona abantu ababalelwa ku-350 ngesikhathi sezibhelu ezaqala KwaZulu-Natal zenabela ezingxenyeni zaseGauteng.Ubalelwa kuR50 billion umonakalo owadaleka emnothweni wezwe kwalahleka imisebenzi eyizinkulungwane.UMbuso usola uKhanyile ukuthi nguyena nabanye abaphehla izibhelu ngokugovuza abantu ukuthi batape futhi bashise, okuyinto ummangalelwa ayiphikayo.Kwenzeka lokhu nje, uthe eqeda kuleli cala oKlebe bambophela elinye okuthiwa kusukela enkulumeni ayenze ngoMashi nonyaka eGoli.Kuthiwa inkulumo kaKhanyile yayiphambene nomthetho iRiotous Assemblies Act.Kuthiwa uKhanyile wathi ngeke lube khona ukhetho eNingizimu Afrika uma kususwa iqembu lakhe uMkhonto weSizwe Party nomholi walo uMnuz Jacob Zuma.Okhulumela oKlebe kuzwelonke, uColonel Katlego Mogale, uthe inkulumo kaKhanyile yayihlose ukugovuza umphakathi ukuthi ubhikishe futhi ube nodlame uma iqembu lakhe lezepolitiki lingekho ohlwini layezovotelwa.“Le nkulumo yayinencazelo ethi izakhamuzi kumele zihlangane bese ziyatapa njengoba kwenzeka ngoJulayi 2021. Icala livulwe esiteshini samaphoyisa saseBrixton,” kusho uCol Mogale.Uthe uKhanyile uphinde wadedelwa ngebheyili uzobuyela enkantolo ngoSepthemba 23 nonyaka ngawo wonke amacala athweswe wona.

UMBUSO uchaze uMphrofethi Paseka “Mboro” Motsoeneng njengomuntu oyingozi, ongumkhohlisi futhi ongakufanele ukudedelwa ngebheyiili ngoba lokho kuzobeka impilo yofakazi neyezingane engcupheni.UMbuso usho kanje eNkantolo yeMantshi yase-Palm Ridge, ngoMsombuluko, uphikisa isicelo sebheyili esifakwe uMboro nababili aboshwe nabo.Kungene osukwini lesibili ukulalelwa kwalesicelo sebheyili, lapho uMbuso uthe uMboro unike inkantolo ikheli elingekho, akwaziwa uhlala kuphi nezimpahla anazo.“Uqambe amanga wathi akabazi ofakazi edukisa inkantolo. Uyabazi ofakazi ababili ugogo wezingane no-anti wazo. Kunencwadi yenkantolo yesikhashana eshoyo ukuthi izingane kumele zihlale koninalume kuze kuphothulwe umdonswano okhona kodwa bona baya esikoleni bayozithumba bephula umthetho wenkantolo,” kusho umshushisi.UMbuso uthe uMboro uma ededelwa angalibalekela icala ngoba akaziwa uhlala kuphi, unikezele ikheli elingekho.Bathi ayikho impahla anayo eyaziwayo futhi ukudedelwa kwakhe kungaphazamisa inhlalo enhle yomphakathi.Ukulalelwa kwesicelo sebheyili kuzoqhubeka emuva kwekhefu lamadina.UMboro ubelokhe ekhuleke njalo ngesikhathi kuqhubeka ukulalelwa kwesicelo sakhe sebheyili. Ubebuye ahlahle amehlo akhombise ukumangala uma kukhona okushiwo uMbuso ngaye.Uboshwe nendodana yakhe nomqaphi emuva kwesigameko lapho baya esikoleni basabisa othisha ngocelemba nangesibhamu. UMboro nonogada wakhe wancishwe ibheyili, bazogqunywa esitokisini kuze kube yinyanga kaMfumfu lapho kuzoqulwa khona leli cala.

USATHUKILE namanje owesilisa waKwaNxamalala, eNkandla uma ecabanga ngobuqhawe abenze ngoLwesihlanu olwedlule, etetisa owesifazane amawele kulandela ukungalutholi usizo emtholampilo wendawo.Lesi sehlo senzeke esangweni lasemtholampilo KwaNxamalala, emva kokuthi abahlengikazi bale baphetha ukusiza lona wesifazane obesikwa.Elandisa ngesigameko uMnuz Simphiwe Ndlovu (38), ongunogada, uthe ubethi uziyela esitolo ukuyothenga i-airtime namakhandlela ngesikhathi ekhangwa umsindo wowesifazane obekhala ubumayemaye, ecela usizo.“Ngendlela abekhala ngayo, ibingekho indlela yokuthi ngingaqinisa ikhanda, ngiqhubeke nohambo lwami,” kusho uNdlovu.Uthe ngesikhathi esondela emotweni eyiveni, uthole owesifazane nomshayeli, kwamcacela ukuthi kubi.Uveze ukuthi ugijime waya konogada bomtholampilo, wabacela ukuthi bayovusa abahlengikazi ngoba kunesimo esiphuthumayo.Uthe babuyise impendulo ethi ‘abasebenzi ebusuku bona’.Uqhube wathi umpongoloze kwaduma izihosha, ecela usizo komakhelwane. Abanye ubethi mayebatshela ukuthi abasondele kuzosizwa owesifazane osikwayo, bathwale izandla ekhanda, bathi bayesaba ngeke bakwazi.Uthe kuthe uma ebona ukuthi kuyonakala evenini, wasizana nomshayeli ukuthi kundlalwe ublankethi ngemuva evenini, yabe iza ingane yokuqala.“Sikhongozele ngezandla sinomshayeli, senzela ukuthi ingane ingashayeki phansi, ihuzuke.“Besithi sesiqedile kodwa owesifazane wathi kuseza enye ingane. Nayo siphinde sayikhongozela,” kusho uNdlovu.Uthe ngesikhathi eqeda ukuteta owesifazane, uqale phansi wayofuna usizo emakotishini aseduze, nokuyilapho okuphume khona owesifazane.Nalona ophumile naye ubekhulelwe, walekelela ngokuthi ashayele imoto iye komunye umtholampilo njengoba umshayeli bese zingcolile izandla zakhe engeke akwazi ukushayela.Uthe yena akabange esahamba nabo, wagoduka waya ekhaya.Echaza ngesizathu esenza ukuthi afake isandla ekuteteni kowesifazane, uthe akasilona uhlobo lomuntu oluvele lufulathele uma kufuneka usizo.Nokho uveze ukuthi nakuba enezingane ezintathu, ubengakaze atetise. “Ngiye ngiqikelele ukuthi ngiqaphela izinsuku zakhe (unina wezingane) zokuya emtholampilo, ngimeseke kulokho.“Noma sekusondela isikhathi sokuteta, ngiye ngiqinisekise ukuthi okuningi kumi ngomumo ukuze uma eqala esikwa, ngimphuthumise esibhedlela,” usho kanje.Usigxekile isenzo sabahlengikazi baKwaNxamalala, ethi indlela abaziphathe ngayo ayamukelekile.“Ubengafa nokufa lona wesifazane ngenxa yesenzo sabo. Ekumsizeni kwami, ngibhekise kimi ukuthi ngingenzenjani uma isinqandamathe sami noma udadewethu ehlelwa yinto efana nale. “Kubuhlungu ukukhala komuntu enganakwa,” kusho uNdlovu.Uthe akakaze axhumane nowesifazane ukuzwa ukuthi kwahamba kanjani esefike emtholampilo omnike usizo. Kuvela ukuthi lo mtholampilo uvalwa ngehora lesine ntambama, kanti amanye amanesi ahlala ngaphakathi. Isolezwe lizamile ukuthola owesifazane kodwa ucingo lwakhe beluvaliwe, olukayise wamawele lungenile, washiya angalazi, ebuza ukuthi intatheli iyithathephi inombolo yakhe.Akagcinanga lapho, uphinde wathi konke kuhamba kahle, akukho akubona kungahambi kahle ngokuthi amawele atetelwe esangweni lomtholampilo.

USAYINWE ngaphansi kwemibandela umthethosivivinyo  olawula ukusebenza kwezikole iBela Bill ukuthi ube ngumthetho. UMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, usayine lo mthetho esidlangaleni yize kunamaqembu amane abephikisana nokusayinwa kwawo.Lama qembu okuyi-DA, iPatriotic Alliance (PA), i-Al Jama-ah neFreedom Front Plus abengekho emcimbini wokusayinwa kwalo mthetho, kuhlanganisa noNgqongqoshe woMnyango weMfundo eyisiSekelo, uNkk Siviwe Gwarube, obusezindlini zoMbuso ePitoli. La maqembu aphikisana nezingxenye ezithile zalo mthetho osekuphele iminyaka eyevile eshumini udingidwa. URamaphosa uthe kunamaqembu akholwa wukuthi kumele kube nezingxenye ezithile ezishintshayo kulo mthetho."Kuze kwaba imizuzu yokugcina lama qembu ethi angingasayini kuze kulungiswe lokhu akhala ngakho. Ngathi cha, ngizowusayina umthetho bese nginikeza abakhalayo izinyanga ezintathu zokuthi sibonisane ngabakhala ngakho. Uma kukhona okubambekayo, ngemuva kwezinyanga ezintathu kuzolandelwa indlela efanele. Uma kungekho, okukulo mthetho kuzoqhubeka kulandelwe kunjengoba kunjalo," kusho uRamaphosaOkuqukethwe yilo mthetho ukuthi uGrade R uzoba yimpoqo, amanye amandla okubalwa ulimi lokufunda ezikoleni kanjalo nokugcwala kwesikole kubekwe enhlokweni yomnyango kuleso sifundazwe, awasezukuba sesigungwini sabazali sokuphathwa kwesikole, iSchool Governing Body (SGB).Abazali bazobekwa amacala uma kungukuthi banqabela izingane zabo ukuthi ziye esikoleni. Uhlelo lokufundela ekhaya seluzolawulwa uMnyango wezeMfundo kuphinde kube nezinhlelo zokuluhlola ukuthi lwenzeka ngendlela yini.URamaphosa uthe: "Ziningi izinselelo ezibhekana nabafundi ezizoxazululwa yilo mthetho. Kunabafundi abebenqatshelwa ezikoleni ezithile ngenxa yolimi abalukhulumayo. Abanye bangakwazi ukubhala izivivinyo ngoba bengakhokhanga imali yokufunda. Izinto ezinjengalezo kumele ngabe kade sazilungisa ukuze sinikeze izingane zethu imfundo elinganayo kodwa kungcono ukuba ngemuva kwesikhathi kunokungenzi."IPhini likaNgqongqoshe weMfundo eyisiSekelo, uDkt Regina Mhaule, uthe lo mthethosivivinyo ufike ePhalamende ngo-2022 ngenhloso yoluthi kulungiswe izinkinga zokufunda.Unobhala we-ANC, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula ephawula ngokunikezwa kwamaqembu akhalayo ithuba, uthe akukhona ukuthi i-ANC ivikela uhulumeni wokubambisana iGovernment of National Unity (GNU)  kodwa wukwenza izinto ngendlela ehloniphekile yokubambisana. “IGNU ayisho umshado, uma ukubambisana namaqembu akhona kuphela, akusho ukuthi uhulumeni ngeke ube khona. Zikhona ezinye izihlelo ezingalandelwa”.

UYIDONSE ngendlebe intsha wathi ayingakhethi imisebenzi uSive Mbizo (29) odume njengobaba wemikhoma ngenxa yokuthi ushaya uphondo olutshela izivakashi ukuthi imikhoma ingakuphi emabhishi aseHermanus, eWestern Cape.Le nsizwa eneziqu zeTourism Management, ithe yayizitshela ukuthi izohlala ehhovisi ngesikhathi iyofuna umsebenzi kodwa yatshelwa ukuthi kunesikhala somuntu ozobiza imikhoma.“Emuva kokuphothula iziqu zami zeTourism Management ngangizitshela ukuthi ngizosebenza ehhovisi ngibe wumuntu obhekele ezokuvakasha kodwa kwathi uma ngitshelwa ukuthi kunomsebenzi womuntu ozofutha uphondo uma ebona imikhoma, ngawuthatha. Sengidume kakhulu ngalo msebenzi futhi angisagcini nje ngokuhamba olwandle ngazise abantu ngemikhoma kodwa sengiyiTourism Information Officer, okusho ukuthi yimina engitshela izivakashi ngezinto ezingazenza uma zivakashele eHermanus,” kusho uSive.Uthe intsha kufanele ithathe amathuba ewatholayo noma ngabe akuphi.“Intsha ayiwathathe amathuba ewatholayo ikakhulukazi emkhakheni wezokuvakasha ngoba maningi amathuba okukhula. Isibonelo nje mina angisagcini ngokutshela abantu ukuthi imikhoma ingakuphi kodwa sengikwazi ukubatshela nangezindawo abangazivakashela nangokunye okuphathelene nezokuvakasha eHermanus. Ngiye ngaqeqeshwa ukuze ngazi ngakho konke okudingwa yizivakashi uma ziya emalokishini. Umkhakha wezokuvakasha ubalulekile ngoba uyakwazi ukudala amathuba omsebenzi,” kusho uSive.Ugqugquzele intsha wathi ayingasongi izandla ngisho noma ngabe  isafuna umsebenzi kodwa izame ukuvula amabhizinisi ezokuvakasha.“Izivakashi azisagcini emadolobheni kuphela kodwa zifuna ukuya elokishini ziyodla nathi inyama yenhloko, zibonane nabahlala emijondolo ngoba zifuna okuhlukile. Njengamanje ayikho imisebenzi ezimbonini kodwa emkhakheni wezokuvakasha amathuba omsebenzi ayohlale ekhona, okuhle wukuthi noma ngubani uneqhaza angalibamba, akukhathalekile ukuthi ungakanani noma ukuyiphi indawo,” kusho uSive.

UMCULI kamaskandi ophinde abe ngusomatekisi ongumsolwa wesibili ecaleni lokubulawa komrepha uKiernan “AKA” Forbes nomngani wakhe uTebello “Tibz” Motsoane usole amaphoyisa ngokuchema nomndeni abasembangweni nawo embonini yamatekisi. ULindani Zenzele Ndimande (36) odume ngelikaShiselansimbi kumaskandi efaka isicelo sakhe sebheyili enkantololo yeMantshi eThekwini, ngoMsombuluko, ngesitatimende esifungelwe esifundwe ummeli wakhe, u-Advocate Joe Wolmarans, kuvele ukuthi useke wagwetshwa iminyaka engu-10 ngecala lokubamba inkunzi esebenzisa isihluku.Uveze nokuthi umndeni wakhe ugxile kakhulu embonini yamatekisi, yena unawakhe amatekisi amane, amngenisela u-R250 000 ngenyanga.Ubuye waveza ukuthi ngenxa yombango werenki yamatekisi aseMalukazi nomndeni wakwaGumede, uselahlekelwe amalungu omndeni ayisithupha, edutshulwa wuphiko lwamaphoyisa uNational Intervention Unit (NIU).“Lolu phiko lumi ngasohlangothini lomndeni esingabhekani nawo,” kusho isitatimende sikaNdimande.Udalule ukuthi ngenxa yale mpi, izelamani zakubo ezimbili, nazo ezithintekayo kuleli cala, zaphoqeleka ukuthi ziyobhaca eSwatini.“Zazibalekela iNIU, eyayifuna ukuzisoconga,” kusho isitatimende.Lesi sitatimende siveze ukuthi unengoduso ayithembise umshado kanti ulungiselela ukushada, waveza nokuthi unezingane ezineminyaka ephakathi kowodwa neminyaka engu-15. Uthe izingane zakhe, umndeni wakhe nebhizinisi lakhe lamatekisi, konke kubheke yena, yikho efuna ukukhishwa ngebheyili.UNdimande ufake isicelo sebheyili emuva kwesomsolwa wokuqala nowesithathu ngoLwesine olwedlule. Sekubuywa ekhefini lesikhashana, kuqubuke inkulumo-mpikiswano phakathi kukamshushisi woMbuso, u-Advocate Lawrence Gcaba noWolmarans, kubangwa amaphepha anohlu lwamacala ezelamani zakwaNdimande eziboshwe eSwatini, nazo ezisolwa kuleli cala.Ngesikhathi uWolmarans esezofunda isitatimende esifungelwe somsolwa wesine, uMnuz Mziwethemba Gwabini, uGcaba uqale waveza ukuthi akaqondi ukuthi ukuxhumana kwakhe nommeli, uNksz Yolanda Gielink, omele ummangalelwa wesithathu, ngama-email kugcine kufinyelela kanjani kwabanye abameli.“Ngithole ukuthi ama-email ami aseyingxenye yesicelo sikamsolwa wesine. Bengingabafakanga laba bameli ngesizathu ezithize, kungimangazile uma sengibona ama-email ami eseyingxenye yesicelo sikammangalelwa wesine,” kusho uGcaba.Mayelana nalokhu, uWolmarans uthe emva kwesikhalo sikaGcaba, bagcine beyisusa ingxenye uGcaba abekhala ngokuthi ifinyelele kanjani kubona.UGcaba uphinde wezwakalisa ukungenami ngokuthola ukuthi esicelweni sikaGwabini sebheyili siqukethe uhlu lwamacala ezelamani zakwaNdimande ezihamba icala eNkantolo yaKwaManzini, eSwatini.“Ngimangazwa ukuthi amaphepha enkantolo yakwelinye izwe, afike kanjani kwelinye izwe,” kusho uGcaba.Uthe okubuye kudide kakhulu ukuthi leli phepha liphinde libe namanothi abhalwe ngesandla.“Sizokwazi ngani ukuthi leli phepha kuseyilo elahanjiswa enkantolo yakuleliya lizwe?” kubuza uGcaba, ongeze ngelithi uyafisa ukwazi ukuthi ingabe ubani obhale amanothi akula maphepha.Imantshi, uMnuz Vincent Hlatshwayo, ithe aliguqe icala liqhubeke namuhla ngenxa yokuthi amanzi awekho enkantolo, nokho wakhala ngokuthi sekuwusuku lwesibili abameli bekhombisa ukuthi abazihlelele ngokwanele njengoba befaka isicelo sebheyili sabasolwa.

NKOSIKHONA CELEUTHISHA ophinde abe wumelaphi wendabuko, uthi kumele ifundiswe intsha ngokusebenza kwemithi yesintu ukuze lolu lwazi lungashabalali, okanye lugcine luhlanekezelwa.UMnuz Mfanafuthi Msomi odume ngelikaMkhulu uHlombe, unekhemisi lesintu athi kulona akudayisi nje imithi yesintu, kodwa usabalalisa nolwazi nangezihlahla ezingamakhambi abantu abahlale bewadlula, bengazi ukuthi ayimithi engelapha eziningi izifo.“Iqiniso wukuthi imithi yasentshonalanga kuba sengathi ingcono kuneyesintu ngoba yona ibhalwa ngesingisi esikhulu, iyahlolwa futhi ikalwe ngendlela ehlelekile. Nathi singakwazi ukukwenza lokhu. Yingakho nokufunda kubalulekile uma uwumelaphi wendabuko,” usho kanje.UMsomi ungowokuzalwa ePort Shepstone, unguthisha eThulubheke Primary School, eMthwalume. Ikhemisi lakhe i-Indigenous Knowledge  liseMgungundlovu.Ukholwa wukuthi amakhambi esintu awumgogodla wempilo engcono kubantu abansundu.Izifo ezifana neBP nokunye zingancipha yinqobo nje  uma kungaba nezifundo eziqondile kubelaphi bendabuko ngalokhu. Bangancipha nabantu abasebenzisa indlela yesilungu ukwelapha.Ukugcizelele kakhulu ukubaluleka kokusetshenziswa kwamakhambi esintu wathi kuwumgogodla wempilo engcono kubantu abansundu.Uthe kungafana nokuthi uxamu ugeje umgodi uma kungase kwenzeke iphutha lokuthi abantu abansundu bagcine sebechizela amakhambi esintu.Lo melaphi unanesigodlo sokwelapha eSihlonyaneni, eMthwalume.Ngokusho kwakhe, akukho ukushayisana phakathi kokwelapha abantu nomsebenzi awenzayo wokufundisa."Empeleni nje kuyangijabulisa ukuthi ngiyakwazi ukuthi ngiqhube umsebenzi wami wokufundisa ekubeni ngibe ngenza nowokulapha abantu,'' usho kanje.Eqhuba uthe uma esesikoleni uba matasa nomsebenzi wesikole. Kanjalo uma esenza umsebenzi wokwelapha uba matasa nalokho.UMsomi ukholwa wukuthi ukuba ngumelaphi wendabuko oyile esikoleni kuyalekelela kakhulu ekutheni kube lula ukuqhuba umsebenzi wokwelapha abantu."Iqiniso ukuthi kulesi sikhathi samanje ukufunda yinto ewumgogodla wokuphila kwethu sonke. Yingakho nje nami kungisebenzela kakhulu kulo msebenzi engiwenzayo,'' echaza.Wenze isibonelo ngokuthi uma ungumelaphi wendabuko kwesinye isikhathi kuba nemithi okumele isikalo singeqi kwesithile, kungenjalo isiguli singafa nokufa.Uthi kulezo zimo kuba lula ukuthi umelaphi wendabuko asebenze ngoba uyile esikoleni.

I-ANC ithi usomabhizinisi uMnuz uTokyo Sexwale uphakathi kwezingwevu ezilandiwe ukuze zilekelele emkhankasweni wayo. I-ANC imatasa nomkhankaso wokhetho ngenhloso yokubuyela emandleni iphathe izwe.Izwe limatasa lilungiselela ukhetho lukazwelonke oluzoba ngoMeyi 29 nonyaka kanti lubhekwe ngabomvu.USihlalo we-ANC eGauteng, uMnuz Panyaza Lesufi, uthe balande uSexwale ngoba ungomunye wabaholi abamethembayo ukuthi angaba nesandla emkhankasweni.USexwale ubewumholi oqavile kwi-ANC kanti yake yamjuba esikhundleni sokuba wundunankulu waseGauteng.ULesufi uthe umkhankaso wabo uhlelwe kahle futhi uzoba nezigaba ezehlukene ezizobe ziphethwe abaholi bayo abehlukene abahlonishwayo.I-ANC ilanda uSexwale nje, kusanda kubonakala owayengumengameli uThabo Mbeki eyikhankasela emuva kwesikhathi eside.Kuthe kusabukwa uMbeki, kwavela ukuthi noMnuz Kgalema Motlanthe uzoba yingxenye yomkhankaso we-ANC. USexwale kulindeleke ukuthi abonakale ezingxenyeni eziseGauteng lapho ezobe enxenxa khona abavoti ukuthi babuyisele uKhongolose.ULesufi uthe abantu abaningi bazomangala uma sekuphuma imiphumela yokhetho. I-ANC izithola ingaphansi kwengcindezi yamaqembu aphikisayo ayimise kabi, kubalwa neqembu iMK Party eholwa owayengumengameli uJacob Zuma.
