USHALAZELE isicelo sebheyili osolwa ngokubulala ngesihluku indodakazi yakamakhelwane, isidumbu sayo esitholwe sisongwe ngengubo yokulala emotweni kayise okuthiwa wayeyiphuthumisa esibhedlela, esigamakweni esenzeke eManzimtoti, ngesonto eledlule.INkantolo yeMantshi yaseMbumbulu inqume ukulihlehlisela u- Ephreli 4, kulo nyaka, icala elibhekene noMnuz Mzo Mkhize (33) osolwa ngokubulawa kukaThobeka Radebe (19). Kuthiwa uboshwe ngoMgqibelo, ebhace eClairwood, kanti unyamalale emva kokubhadanywa nguyise kamgilwa egwaza indodakazi yakhe okuthiwa yayisele yodwa kubo, abazali besemsebenzini, izingane ezincane zakwabo zisesikoleni.UMnuz Aggripa Radebe uyise kamgilwa ekhuluma neSolezwe emva kokuhlehliswa kwecala, uthe ukunqaba kwakhe ukuphuma ngebheyili mhlawumbe kumsizile njengoba bebaningi abasamdinelwe ngalesi senzo.“Bekuzoba nzima ukumbona njengoba kuwumuntu ohlala emzini osondelene nasekhaya. Engingakusho ukuthi uzisize yena ngokungayiceli ibheyili, ngoba angazi besizombhekelwa ubani,” kusho uRadebe.Uqinisekise ukuthi uThobeka ufihlwe ngoMgqibelo. URadebe ofundisa esikoleni Isipingo Beach, ngosuku lwesigameko, uthe wajika esesemsebenzini ngesikhathi ezizwa eshiywa yigazi, watshela uthishomkhulu ukuthi akazizwa kahle. Uveze ukuthi ngesikhathi eqhamukela ekhaya, wabona kuvulwe isicabha segaraji okuyilapho kwaphuma khona umsolwa waqhasha okuthiwa udume endaweni ngokuhlalisa umphakathi lubhojozi. Isidumbu sikaThobeka sitholwe ngamaphoyisa emotweni kaRadebe eyayimi emgwaqweni uKingsway iphantshelwe amasondo. URadebe nayehamba naye bahlonywa ngemibuzo, babuye badedelwa emva kokuchaza ukuthi unguyise wengane, ubeyiphuthumisa esibhedlela. Wabika ukuthi amasondo emoto yakhe agwazwa wumsolwa ngesikhathi yena esematasa ezama ukuhlenga impilo yendodakazi yakhe.

SITHOLWE sesonakele, silahlwe exhaphozini elisosebeni lwedamu i-Henley, eMgungundlovu, isidumbu somfundi wase-Snathing Junior Primary, obesekuphele amasonto kubikwe ngokunyamalala kwakhe.U-Asenathi Ngcobo (9), obefunda u-Grade 4 kulesi sikole, kuthiwa ugcine ukubonwa ngoJulayi 29, ephuma esikoleni njengoba isidumbu sakhe sitholwe silaxazwe kwenye i-ward eyibanga ukusuka lapho ebehlala khona, sisagqokiswe umfaniswano wesikole ngoMsombuluko ntambama.Ngokulandisa kwekhansela lasendaweni okutholwe kuso isidumbu salo mfundi, uMnuz Mlungisi Zondi, lithe sitholwe obezilusela izinkomo. Uhlabe umkhosi kwase kubikelwa amaphoyisa ngokushesha nokuyilapho kutholakale khona ukuthi ingane okungasiyona eyasendaweni kodwa ngeyakwenye i-ward okukholakala ukuthi izigilamkhuba zayibulala maqede isidumbu sayo zazosilahla ngasedamini.Kuthintwa unina kamgilwa uNksz Nondumiso Ngcobo, uthe ukuyigcina kwakhe indodakazi yakhe, babephuma edolobheni wayehlisa etekisini ababeligele ngenhloso yokuthi idlulele lapho ebihlala khona njengoba ubengahlali nayo, ihlala emzini othile eyacelelwa kuwo ukuze iqhubeke nesikole, okuvele ukuthi ayibange isafika.UNksz Ngcobo uthe okwamanje akukavumi aphawule ngalolu daba wacela ukuthi intatheli ibuye imthinte.Ikhansela lase-Snathing, uMnuz Sanele Zuma, ebelihambisana nothisha abebefundisa umgilwa ukuyobhonga emswaneni, lithe lesi sigameko siwethusile kakhulu umphakathi.“Akusikhona okokuqala kuduka ingane itholwe isibulewe njengoba kuke kwenzeka eminyakeni emihlanu edlule.  Umphakathi wethuke kakhulu ikakhulu njengoba kuthe kulo leli sonto, omunye umfundi obephuma esikoleni esinde ngokulambisa kwabebembhudubeza bemfaka emotweni ngenkani okukholakala ukuthi bebemntshontsha, kwasiza ukuqhamuka kukamakhelwane,” usho kanje.Uthe bathole ukuthi umndeni wakwaNgcobo unesikhashana uthuthile endaweni emva kokuthi kubekhona abawuhlaselile kwakhona amalungu alimalayo. Uthe kuphoqe ukuthi ingane icelelwe komunye umuzi wakamakhelwane ukuze isale iqedele ukufunda kulo nyaka, njengoba seyehlelwa yilo mshophi. Kunemidlinzo yokuthi kungenzeka abebehlasela umndeni banesandla ekubulaweni kukamgilwa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa asePlessislaer avule idokodo lophenyo ngokufa komuntu, kanti okwamanje imbangela yalesi sigameko ayikaziwa.

UBALISA ngobunzima obhekene nabo umndeni wakwaNyathi, eSonyongwane, eMzimkhulu ngemuva kokushona kukababa wekhaya ngesikhathi ebona isidumbu sendodana ebizongcwatshwa. Ubaba wekhaya, uMnuz Bhekithemba Nyathi (64) kuthiwa uvele wawa washona ngoMgqibelo ntambama ngesikhathi kufika isidumbu sendodana yakhe, uMnuz Swelihle Nyathi (27).Kuvela ukuthi indodana yakhe beyisebenzela eFree State ingunogada kwenye inkampani.Kuthiwa ixabane nomngani wayo ogcine ngokuyigwaza yashona. Akucaci ukuthi ingxabano ibimayelana nani.Kuvela ukuthi ubaba ubelokhu ebalise njalo ngokufa kwendodana yakhe ekhala ngokuthi uzoba yini ngozinyobulala wakhe. Kuthiwa ubebalisa ngokuthi indodana yakhe ishone isanda kulobola.Ilungu lomndeni elikhulume neSolezwe, uNkk Nomaswazi Khumalo (uMaNyathi) ongudadewabo omncane kababa wekhaya, uthe bayakweshwama okubehlele."Besisazikhotha amanxeba ngodaba lokufa kwendodana yethu kanti asazi ukuthi kuzolandela uyise. Izinhliziyo zethu ziyathatha ziyabeka futhi ziyabhibha zinjalo nje,’’ usho kanje.Uthe ibethusile kakhulu indlela uyise kamufi  ahayize ngayo kungena isidumbu endlini. "Ubungaze ufunge ukuthi kukhala umuntu wesifazane. Besingazi ukuthi usekhala okokugcina,'' kusho uNkk Khumalo.Uthe kuthe eqeda ukuhayiza washayeka phansi akuphelanga mizuzu emingaki wathula. Uthe kumane kwahlwa emini kubona."Indlela okwenzeke ngayo isethusile sonke njengomndeni. Siyazibuza siyaziphendula ukuthi ngempela sivelelwa yini,'' usho kanje.Uthe uqhubekile umngcwabo wendodana ngeSonto. "Njengamanje senza amanye amalungiselelo omunye futhi umngcwabo. Angikaze ngiyibone mina into enjengalena,’’ usho kanje.Uthe okunye abakusolayo ngokuwa kukababa uma ebona kungena ibhokisi lendodana yakhe ukuthi kungenzeka umane wacabanga ngomkakhe okungakapheli ngisho izinyanga ezimbili ebandakanyeke engozini yemoto washona.

IZAGUGA ezihlala ezindaweni ezingaphansi kukaMasipala waseMshwathi zihlonyiswe ngolwazi futhi zabuyela emakhaya ziqiqinge izipho ezihlukahlukene. Phakathi kwezipho ezihlonyulwe yizaguga ebezihambele umcimbi wokubangazwa kwazo kubalwa izinduku zokudondolozela, ama-voucher amane okulala izinsuku ezimbili eMsinsi Resort, ama-hamper amabili, imitsholwane yamawolintshi, imiswibelo, amakha angama-roll on nokunye okuningi.IMeya yakuMasipala waseMshwathi, uMnuz Mandla Zondi, ithe iyona ephakamise kumakhansela ukuba kubungazwe izaguga ezihlala ngaphansi kwalo mkhandlu."Ngiyajabula ukubona ogogo ngoba yibo abathatha imadlana abayinikezwa wuhulumeni ka-ANC bayidle nabazukulu. AbakwaSassa bathe kunemali esizokwengezwa kwizaguga ezihola impesheni yokuguga kodwa ezingasakwazi ukuzenzela kanye nakwizingane ezihola isibonelelo sabantwana kodwa ezingasenabo abazali.UNksz Lusanda Ntolosi, ongumxhumanisi kamasipala ne-IEC, ufundise izaguga ngokuthi kulo nyaka kuzobe kuvotwa kanjani. Uthe amaphepha okuvota azobe emathathu ngenxa yokuthi kukhona abazobe bengenele ngokuzimela. "Kunelikazwelonke eliluhlaza okwesibhakabhaka, elesifunda elinombala o-orange nelesifundazwe elinombala o-pink."UNksz Ntolosi unxuse izaguga ukuba zibhalise ngokohlelo lobuchwepheshe ukuze zikwazi ukuvota ngezinsuku ezikhethekile, okunguMeyi 27 no-28.Uthe kunezaguga ezizofika esikhungweni lapho kuvotwa khona nalezo ezizofikelwa emakhaya.USister Morgan wasesibhedlela sase-Appelsbosch unxuse abahlengikazi ukuthi yize emitholampilo kuvulwa ngo-7 ekuseni,  kuvalwa ngo-4 ntambama kodwa akufanele iziguli zibuyele emakhaya zingaqedwanga ukwelashwa.Uthe abantu sekufanele bengakunqeni ukuyohlolelwa izifo emitholampilo ngoba sekuhlale kufika odokotela."Abantu sebeyakwazi ukuxilongwa amazinyo namehlo, bathole nezibuko. Kufika nodokotela abangama-physio." USister uthe lokhu kwenzeka ngenxa yomshwalense obizwa ngeNH1. Esephetha uthe uma kudingeka umuntu adluliselwe esibhedlela, uyahanjiswa mahhala ngezinsuku ezithize.Obeyisikhulumi sosuku uNkk Peggy Nkonyeni uthe okwenza kubekhona izaguga kuhulumeni ukubhekela amalungelo ontanga babo. "Ukuthi lokhu enikuzwayo, nabo bayakuzwa. Uma kuthiwa ogogo bahlukunyezwa ngabazukulu, nabo bayahlupha." UNkk Nkonyeni uthe ziningi izinto ezihlukumeza ogogo nomkhulu, uhulumeni ayilungisayo."Nizokhumbula ukuthi ngesikhathi kuthatha uhulumeni, ogogo babehola ngekwata uR395. Wathi uma ethatha uhulumeni wayinyusa wayibeka kuR995. Saqhubeka salwa. Manje nina senihola imali engaphezu kuka-2000. Uma uzoyeka lohulumeni, uyazi yini ukuthi abanye bazokwenzenjani. Bazoniphuca." UNkk Nkonyeni uthe kuqala abantu abamnyama babehola imali engalingani neyezinye izinhlanga.Eqhuba uthe uhulumeni ka-ANC ufike wafundisa izingane mahhala kusukela kuGrade 0 kuze kufike ku-Grade 12. Uthe uyaqhubeka uhulumeni afundise izingane nasezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme. "Uthe esuka lapho wakhela abantu izindlu zamahhala. Akekho noyedwa umuntu lapha ongakaze wahlomula kuhulumeni."Ubuye wagqugquzela izaguga ukuba zizivocavoce futhi zidle ukudla okunempilo."Ungadli ube uphuza ngoba isisu sakho sizoqina. Lokho kuzokwenza ukuthi uma sewuya endlini encane ufike ukhiphe imisimbane. Ngikhuluma kanje ngoba lomsebenzi ngiwufundele. Yingakho senginoMqemane Institutes of Wellness. Uma nifika khona siyakuchatha futhi sikufake okwangaphezulu ukuze kuphume konke ukungcola."Lo mcimbi bewuhanjelwe wuNdlunkulu uThobekile Maphumulo, usomabhizinisi uMnuz Themba Njilo, iLungu lePhalamende eKapa, uNkk Sfucwana Zungu, uSomlomo waseMgungundlovu uNkk Nonhlanhla Gabela, uNkk Mbali Ndlovu woMsinsi Holding nabaNtwana baseNdlunkulu nezinye izicukuthwane. Uhlelo lwalo mcimbi beluphethwe wuZanele Mbokazi woKhozi kanti kunandise isihlabani somculo wokholo, uHlengiwe Mhlaba noKing M.

USALE egade abafundi ngesikhathi othisha beduba ukufundisa, uthishanhloko wasesikoleni Umbambangwe High KwaFelekisi, eManzimtoti, abamsola ngokuhlukumeza nokuqhuba intwala ngewisa.Othisha okuvele ukuthi bevile kwabangu-20, bavuke bayoqhinqa emahhovisi omhloli kwiSekethi eMbumbulu, befuna umnyango ungenelele ngabakubize ngokuphathwa ngesandla sensimbi nokuhlukunyezwa. Uthisha ongagunyaziwe ukukhuluma nabezindaba, uthe ithumba liqhumbuzwe ukuvulelwa icala kukazakwabo othandana nabobulili obufana nobakhe ngaphakathi emnyangweni. Icala avulelwe lona elokukopelisa abafundi bakaGrade 12 iGeography ngesikhathi kubhalwa izivivinyo zikaJuni nonyaka, ngaphambi kokuvalwa kwezikole.“Sekunesikhathi emsebenzisa kabuhlungu, emnyanyela indlela ayiyo, kanti ubevele enyamanambana kuthishomkhulu selokhu afika ngo-2019. Esanda kuqashwa besehhovisi, uthishomkhulu waphimisa amagama abuhlungu, wathi uzothatha amadoda abantu esikoleni ngoba uyisitabane,” usho kanje.Uthe isenzo sokuhlukumeza othisha yinto uthishomkhulu ayiqala efika ngo-2016, ebadelela engabazi nokuthi bayini.Uthe kamuva nje, ngaphambi kokuvalwa kwezikole, usole othisha ngokumthakatha emva kokuthi ethe uthole inkalankala ifile emnyango wehhovisi lakhe, wathi lokhu  kuholele ekutheni anqume ukulawula abangena ehhovisi lakhe elibuye libe nezinsiza ezibalulekile zesikole. Uthisha ukhale ngokuthi lesi senzo sikathishanhloko siphazamise ukufunda kwezingane ezenza uGrade 12 ngamaholidi asebusika ngenxa yokuthi othisha bebengakwazi ukusebenzisa umshini wokufothokhopha.Kuthintwa uthisha okuthiwa uvulelwe icala okuvumile ukuthi uthandana nobulili obufana nobakhe, unqabile ukuphawula ngalolu daba athe imigomo ayimvumeli kodwa wakuqinisekisa ukuthi likhona icala elifakwe emnyangweni nguthishanhloko oluthinta abafundi.Umthombo weSolezwe  uqinisekise ukuthi othisha bahlangane nabaholi bezinyunyana egatsheni nomnyango ngenhloso yokuveza indlela abaphethwe ngayo. Uthe umhloli ubekhona kulo mhlangano wathembisa ukulidlulisela emahhovisi omnyango ezingeni lesifundazwe lolu daba. Umthombo uthe bazamile ukukhuluma nothishanhloko kodwa akekho okwazi ukumsola ingcaca kubona ngoba uma uphikisa akushoyo uyakunombola bese ekuhlukumeza emsebenzini. Uthe uma umnyango ungangeneleli, bazoqhubeka othisha nokungalubhadi esikoleni, bavukele ukuyoqhinqa emahhovisi.Kuthintwa uMnuz Sibongiseni Xulu (uthishanhloko), ukhombise ukushaqeka ngalolu daba, wakhala ngokuthi umthetho womnyango awumvumeli ukuthi aphawule kwabezindaba.“Ukube bekuthiwa mina njengendoda nje yakwaXulu angiziphendulele bengizophawula, manje ngoba nginguthishomkhulu angikwazi ukuphawula, umgomo womnyango awungivumeli,” usho kanje.Kushaye isikhathi sokushicilela uMnyango wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal ungakaphenduli ngalolu daba.UMbatha (esingenalo igama lakhe) ongusihlalo wesigungu esengamele isikole unqabile ukuphawula ngalolu daba wanxusa intatheli ukuthi ifike emhlanganweni ongoLwesithathu.

USHIYE esezihlelele ukuthi zikwazi ukuzimela izingane zakhe uZanele Mbokazi Nkambule ongcwatshelwe emathuneni aseMariannhill, eThekwini, ngoMgqibelo.UZanele (52) obengumsunguli wama-Crown Gospel Music Awards ushone ngoMsombuluko owedlule ngemuva kokuhlaselwa yisifo somdlavuza wamaphaphu.Uhlonishwe ngomngcwabo osesigabeni sesibili ezingeni lesifundazwe.Enkonzweni yomngcwabo wakhe ezinye zezikhulumi bezihamba emazwini okuthi zifunde lukhulu kuye.Indodakazi yakhe uNonjabulo Mdluli, ithe ngesikhathi kushona unina omzalayo, owayelamana noZanele, uQondi, bakhuliswa nguZanele.UNonjabulo uchaze umama uZanele njengomuntu owayesebenza ngokuzikhandla, wathi ngesikhathi esegula “wayesho izinto obonayo ukuthi uthini kodwa futhi ungafuni ukubona”.Uthe wayesho ukuthi uyagula futhi ekhala ngezinhlungu.“Umama wayengakhali kodwa yilapho engabona khona ukuthi uyagula. Impilo yakhe yonke wayengahlukani ne-laptop yakhe. Ezinyangeni ezintathu ezedlule wathi uyayivula i-laptop ethi uyasebenza wayivala wathi akuvumi. Kwakungokokuqala selokhu ngamazi engakwazi ukusebenza. Kwakumcasula kakhulu ukuthi akakwazi ukusebenza,” kusho uNonjabulo.Uthe wabiza umhlangano womndeni wathi unemali futhi ucela bonke beze namacebo amabhizinisi.Uthe wawacubungula enza nezincomo zokuthi yiliphi alibona lizosebenza. Ubonge ukwesekwa kwakhe nomndeni wabo kwaze kwaba yisekugcineni.“Ukube ukhona ngabe uyasho ukuthi uyibonile ingqovungqovu engihambe ngayo. Igama likaZanele lizohlale likhona ingunaphakade.”UNonjabulo ubemi esiteji nomfowabo uLindo nezingane zikaZanele ezimbili uYolanda Myeza noMawande.Umzukulu wakhe uMazwi obehamba nabanye abazukulu u-Andiswa noNolifa, uthe uZanele ubaphe impilo efiswa ngabaningi.Umyeni kaZanele uMbhishobhi Mpendulo Nkambule encwadini afundelwe yona, uthe ubusisiwe ngokuthola uthando lwangempela ngoba uZanele ubemthanda.Enkonzweni bekunezikhulu zikahulumeni, osaziwayo, nabanye.Uhlelo beluphethwe ngobunono wuThokozani MaMkhize Ndlovu noSiya Mhlongo.Kubaculi abebenandisa kubalwa kubo uSbu Noah, Dumi Mkokstad, Benjamin Dube, Solly Mahlangu noRebecca Malope.UNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uThami Ntuli, ubonge uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ngokuvumela ukuthi uZanele ahlonishwe ngomngcwabo kahulumeni.Uthe yize engasekho kodwa umbono wakhe wokuthuthukisa abantu abasha nezobuciko kuzoqhubeka.UZanele ubeyingane yokugcina kaMichael noMargaret Mbokazi abangasekho.Waqopha umlando ngokuba ngowesifazane wokuqala ukusakaza ohlelweni lwantambama kuKhozi FM okuwumsakazo ashone esebuyele kuwo.Uke wethula izinhlelo zethelevishini futhi wabhala izincwadi.Ushiye emhlabeni umyeni wakhe, izingane nodadewabo uKitty Zulu.

UBANJWE ugesi washona umsebenzi ngesikhathi ezama ukutakula uzakwabo obesenkingeni efana neyakhe.Kuthiwa uMnuz Sithembiso Nkomanisi (20) uficwe wukufa ngesikhathi yena nabanye asebenza nabo belungiselela ukuqala umsebenzi.Kuvela ukuthi bebezolungisa isiphehlimandla sikagesi iNkobongo Substation, eShakaskraal, KwaDukuza ngoMsombuluko.Okhulumela uMasipala waKwaDukuza uMnuz Sphesihle Ngobese, ulandise ngokuthi umufi ubengumsebenzi wenkampani ezimele eyaziwa ngokuthi Ijuba Investments ebijutshwe wumasipala ukwenza umsebenzi wokulungisa isiphehlimandla sikagesi.“Kusolakala ukuthi uNkomanisi ubanjwe ugesi ngesikhathi ezama ukuhlenga uzakwabo okunguyena oqale wabanjwa ugesi,” kusho uNgobese.Kubikwa ukuthi umsebenzi wokulungisa okuthile kulesiphehlimandla sikagesi bewuzokwenza kunqamuke ukuphakelwa kukagesi emiphakathini eminingi eyakhele uWard 7, 8, 12, 20, 23 no-28.UNgobese ube esedlulisa amazwi enduduzo emndenini kamufi, enkampanini abeyisebenzela, ophikweni lukagesi nakubantu abebemazi.Ube esefisela ukwelulama okuphuthumayo kuNgema okuthiwa uyelashwa esibhedlela.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uConstable Thenjiswa Ngcobo, uthe amaphoyisa aseMhlali avule idokodo lapho ephenya khona imbangela yokushona komuntu.Uthe kusolakala ukuthi uNkomanisi nozakwabo bebekade benza umsebenzi wokushintshwa kwamakhebuli kanti uzobanjwa ugesi.Uthe ushonele esibhedlela efika.

UMMANGALELWA wokuqala ecaleni lokufa kukaSenzo Meyiwa, uMuzikawukhulelwa Sibiya, uthi amaphoyisa awamtholanga neselula ngesikhathi eboshwa.USibiya ubechitha ubufakazi bukangoti wamaselula, uLieutenant Colonel Gideon Gouws othi, wahlola amaselula abamangalelwa wathola ukuthi babexhumana. UMeyiwa wadutshulwa wabulawa ekubo kwentombi yakhe uKelly Khumalo eVosloorus, eGauteng, ngo-2014.Bahlanu abalisa abashushiswayo, uMbuso uthi yibona abathengwa base bemphumela inqina uMeyiwa bamkakisa okwenyamazane bamjuqa. Bonke abamangalelwa bayawaphika onke amacala abethweswe wona.UGouws uthe wathatha umsebenzi emuva kokuthi uLieutenant Colonel Lambertus Steyn ethathe umhlalaphansi. UGouws uthe watshelwa ukuthi uSibiya watholwa neselula ngesikhathi eboshwa nokuyiyona eyahlolwa ukuthi inabo yini ubufakazi obuhlobene necala.Ummeli kaSibiya, u-Advocate Thulani Mngomezulu, uthe ayikho iselula eyatholwa ekhasimendeni lakhe. UMngomezulu uqale wadlana indlebe noSibiya obechaza nangezandla kummeli wakhe.UMngomezulu ubuye lapho wathi ikhasimende lakhe alikaze litholwe neselula.“Ngiyabuchitha ubufakazi bakho bokuthi amaphoyisa athatha iselula kuSibiya ngesikhathi eboshwa. Awunabo nobufakazi bemiyalezo noma uWhatsApp, abukho ubufakazi obukhomba ukuthi waxhumana nommangalelwa wesibili,’’ kusho uMngomezulu.UGouws ubelokhu emile ekutheni imininingwane yokuboshwa kukaSibiya iveza ukuthi iphoyisa elambopha lamthola neselula eyathathwa ukuze ihlolwe.UGouws uphinde wagadla kuKelly, wathi ubufakazi bukhomba ukuthi waxhumana nommangalelwa wesihlanu uFisokuhle Ntuli. Udaba lokuxhumana kukaKelly noNtuli luke lwavela phambilini, kwashaqeka abaningi.UGouws uthe naye uthole ukuthi uNtuli waxhumana noKelly ngocingo ngo-Agasti 2, 2014, baxoxa cishe imizuzu emibili, kuyoshaya u-11 ebusuku. Uthe baphinda baxhumana futhi ngo-Okthoba, baxoxa ngocingo.Ngesikhathi kwethulwa ubufakazi, abamangalewa bebelokhu bexoxa sakuhleba babuye bahleke abanye banikine amakhanda. Bebebuye babonakale bethe njo kufakazi obekhuluma, sabantu abafuna ukuzwa kahle.UMbuso uthe kusazoza ufakazi osuka enkampanini ehlinzeka ngosizo lwamaselula ezolandisa inkantolo ngalokhu okuqukuthwe amaselula abamangalelwa.Kulindeleke ukuthi icala libuyele enkantolo namuhla abameli baqhubeke nokuphosa imibuzo ufakazi.

UZICELELE ikhefu lokuxazulula izingxaki ezimkhungethe umsakazi woKhozi FM osolwa ngokushaya alimaze isinqandamathe sakhe ngempelasonto.Kuvela ukuthi lo msakazi ovulelwe icala lokushaya ngenhloso yokulimaza owesilisa ozishaya isifuba ngokuthi uyisinqandamathe sakhe, uzicelele ikhefu lesikhashana emsebenzini ukuze abhekane nezinkinga zakhe zangasese.Lokhu kuvezwe nguNksz Mmoni Seapolelo okhulumela iSABC, othe abaphathi besiteshi Ukhozi FM bathole isicelo esivela kulo msakazi sokuba anikezwe ikhefu lesikhashana.“Abaphathi boKhozi FM bafuna ukukuqinisekisa ukuthi uMnuz Siya Mhlongo ucele ukuhlaba ikhefu emsebenzini ukuze abhekane nodaba lwakhe. Ngalesi sikhathi uZama Mseleku uzobe ebambe izintambo  ohlelweni lwakhe,” kusho yena.Lo msakazeli womphakathi ubuye waveza ukuthi uyazi nge-video ezungeza ezinkundleni zokuxhumana yesigameko asolwa ngaso uMhlongo. “Abaphathi nabo bayayazi le video... njengamanje bangathanda ukunikwa ithuba lokukhuluma lolu daba ngaphakathi ngokuhambisana nezinhlelo ze-SABC. Ngaphezu kwalokho, uma udaba lubikiwe kwabaphethe umthetho, abaphathi nabo bazoluhlonipha lolo hlelo.”UMhlongo uvulelwe icala lokushaya ngenhloso yokulimaza esiteshini samaphoyisa eThekwini. "Amaphoyisa aseDurban Central aphenya icala lokushaya ngenhloso yokulimaza, kulandela isigameko okusolakala ukuthi owesilisa oneminyaka engu-29 ushaywe, wagwazwa ngumsolwa amaziyo ngo-Agasti 31, 2024. Umgilwa ulimale ebusweni wabe esephuthunyiswa esibhedlela ukuze athole usizo lwezempilo," kusho uColonel Robert Netshiunda.Umgilwa uthe udlulisele emaphoyiseni ubufakazi bezithombe nama-video nemininingwane yasesibhedlela njengokucela kwawo amaphoyisa.“Amaphoyisa acele ukuba ngiwalethele ubufakazii bezithombe nama-video.”Isolezwe lizamile ukuxhumana noSiya Mhlongo kodwa ucingo lwakhe lusavaliwe kanti nemilayezo athunyelelwe yona ayiphendulwa.

LUYINZUKAZIKEYI udaba lwamanzi kuMasipala waseThekwini njengoba iningi lezakhamuzi ligcine ukuba namanzi aphuma kompompi ngoLwesine.Njengoba kade kuyimpelasonto, ezinye izingane ezifundayo aziwashile ngoba amanzi abengekho impelasonto yonke. Kwezinye izindawo ugesi awukho, nakhona sekuphele izinsuku ezintathu ungekho, emadolobheni afana naseThekwini, eSiphingo, kanti imfucuza isakazwe emigwaqweni.Ukuphazamiseka kokulethwa kwezidingo ezifana namanzi nogesi, ukuqoqa kwemfucuza kweyamaniswa nesiteleka sabasebenzi abangaphansi kwenyunyana, iSouth African Municipal Workers' Union (Samwu).Abasebenza bakuMasipala iTheku bangene esitelekeni befuna ukuthi umqashi akhulume nabo mayelana nokuthi iholo labo lingaphansi kwelozakwazo abasebenza komasipala abangama-metro, i-Ekurhuleni nawamasipala waseKapa ekubeni belawulwa umthetho ofanayo.Umasipala usola abasebenzi ngokuthi bangene esitelekekeni esingekho emthethweni, bachitha udoti baphazamisa ukuthunyelwa kwezidingo kubantu. Ngenxa yalokhu, umasipala uthole incwadi yenkantolo evimbela abasebenzi ukuthi bazibandakanye nesiteleka.UMnuz Siya Dladla weSamwu, uthe kuze kube manje umqashi akakaze ahlangane nabo njengoba kade becelile, ayikho impendulo abasayitholile echaza ukuthi bazohlangana nini ukuze kudingidwe lolu daba. "Siyayihlonipha incwadi yenkantolo," kusho uDladla.Ebuzwa ukuthi uma kunjalo ngabe sebebuyele yini emsebenzini, akaphendulanga ngokuqondile, uthe bayawuhlonipha umthetho. Waqhubeka wathi ngabathile abazicabangelayo ukuthi ibona abathintekayo ekuphazamisekeni kokulethwa kwezidingoUMasipala weTheku izolo, uthumele isimemo ezintathelini uthi uzoba nesithangami sabezindaba khona izolo, wabuye wasihlehlisa, wathi uzozazisa izintatheli ukuthi sinini.Ezindaweni ezisenyakatho yeTheku okuyiseVerulam, ePhoenix, KwaMashu, Ntuzuma, eNanda nakwezinye, umphakathi ubuhlangana nawo uphethe izigubhu namabhakede, uhambe ubheka amanzi. Kwabanye ompompi abasemigwaqweni abephuma amanzi kodwa kwabanye abengasaphumi. UNksz Nomusa Mkhize oyisakhamuzi saKwaMashu, uthe ubehlale enamanzi awafake emabhekedeni okugada ingozi,  aseze aphela njengoba sekuphele izinsuku ezintathu amanzi engekho kulendawo."Isimo esiphila ngaphansi kwaso sinzima kakhulu. Selokhu ephelile amanzi iloli ewalethayo ayifiki, amathoyilethi ayanuka, izingubo aziwashiwe kakhulukazi ezabantu abasebenzayo nezingane zesikole. Endlini akusahlanzwa ngoba amanzi amancane esinawo siwongela ukupheka nokuphuza," kusho yena.Ezindaweni ezihlala omntakabani ezifana naseMorningside naseWestville amanzi ake avaleka nakuzona ngoMgqibelo emini kodwa izolo abesebuyile

SIKHIHLA esikaNandi isaguga (78) saseLovu, eThekwini esiqolwe isamba semali owesilisa waseMgababa, esidayisela indlu yomxhaso okungesiyo eyakhe.UNkk Cecilia Mswazi (78) otshele Isolezwe ukuthi usephenduke undingasithebeni, uthe bekunguMeyi nyakenye ngesikhathi ethenga umuzi kuMnuz Daluxolo Sifumba ngoR160 000.Elandisa ngesigameko, uthe wayefuna ukuthola umuzi omusha emva kokudayisa omdala ayesehlale kuwo iminyaka.Uthe wezwa ngowesilisa wendawo ukuthi uSifumba udayisa umuzi wakhe osendaweni, wamnika inombolo yocingo ukuba amshayele.“Sengimshayela ucingo ngathola ngempela ukuthi uyawudayisa umuzi. Wajaha ukuthi sikhokhelane, wathi nokho itayitela akakalitholi,” kusho uNkk Mswazi.Uthe uSifumba wathi uma selibuya itayitela, liyoshintshwa libize uNkk Mswazi.Uthe baya ebhange, bayofakelana imali isuswa ebhange likaNkk Mswazi, iya kwelikaSifumba.“Ngahamba ngayongena kahle endlini kodwa kwathi uma kuphela isonto omakhelwane bangitshela ukuthi ngizophuma kabuhlungu kuwo, sengikhishwa abanikazi bangempela,” kusho uNkk MswaziUthe wathi uma ebuyela kuSifumba, wangundaza, maqede waqala waziba izingcingo zakhe.Uthe kuthathe isikhathi ezama ukuthi uSifumba ambuyisele imali yakhe, kwaze kwafika ekutheni ayomvulela icala ezinsukwini ezimbalwa ezedlule.“Ungenze isilo sengubo engiqola imali yami yokugcina. Ngesikhathi ngithenga indlu, nganginethemba lokuthi ngizoba nekhaya elikahle kanti angibuzanga elangeni,” kusho uNkk Mswazi.Uthe akufunayo kuSifumba, imali yakhe.Ethintwa uSifumba uthe uNkk Mswazi ukhuluma iphutha, yena wamtshela ukuthi indlu ayikabi netayitela emdayisela wathi akunankinga.“Emva kwezinyanga ezintathu ehlala kuyo wathi iyavuza akasayifuni, ngamtshela ukuthi imali uyoyithola uma sengithole itayitela,” kusho uSifumba.Uthe kumanje kuhlala indodana kaNkk Mswazi kule ndlu. Uvumile ukuthi indlu kwakuzoba eyomuntu othile kodwa wagcina enikwa enye indlu eCornubia. Uthe akulona iqiniso ukuthi uziba izingcingo. Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi amaphoyisa aseManzimtoti aphenya icala lokukhwabanisa kulandela isigameko lapho isaguga siqolwe isamba semali.

Iphoxekile iCosatu kuphunza imizamo yokuhlenga imisebenzi engu-4 889 yabasebenzi beSouth African Post Office (Sapo), abadiliziwe emuva kokuthi isicelo soxhaso lwe-Temporary Employment Relief Scheme (TERS) singaphumelelanga.Ababhekelele ukuhlenga iposi bebefake isicelo kwi-UIF ukuthi ikhokhele abasebenzi amaholo izinyanga eziwu-12 ngesikhathi beseza nezinhlelo zokuletha uzinzo eposini. Lesi sicelo besibhekwa ngaphansi kweCCMA okuyiyona ebhekelele izinhlelo zokudilizwa kwabasebenzi.Kuleli sonto kuvele izindaba zokuthi isicelo asiphumelelanga ngoba ababhekelele ukuhlenga iposi abanazo izinhlelo ezicacile zokungenisa imali nokugcina abasebenzi beqashiwe.ICommission for Conciliation, Mediation and Arbitration (CCMA) iye yasichitha lesi sicelo ikhala ngokuthi ngeke imise ukudilizwa kwabasebenzi ngoba izinhlelo bezithi basazodilizwa emuva kwezinyanga eziwu-12 kade beholelwa yiTERS.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi ngesonto eledlule Isolezwe belibike ukuthi kuzohoxiswa izinyanga eziwu-12 ukudilizwa kwabasebenzi njengoba bekufakwe isicelo seTERS, kodwa manje ababhekelele ukuhlenga iposi bathe bazodilizwa abasebenzi.UMnuz Anoosh Rooplal obhekelele izinhlelo zokuhlengwa kweposi, uthe baphatheke kabi ngokungaphumeleli kwesicelo sabo.“Ngesikhathi sifaka isicelo sasho ukuthi ukudilizwa kuzomiswa isikhashana njengoba sasifake isicelo seTERS.“Njengoba singaphumelelanga abasebenzi abawu-4 889 bazodilizwa. Sizamile ukuhlenga imisebenzi kodwa asiphumelelanga.“Siyazi lesi sinqumo sizoba nomthelela omubi kubasebenzi abathintekayo nemindeni yabo, siyaxolisa ngalokhu,” kusho uRooplal.Izindaba zokudilizwa kwabasebenzi baseposini ziqale ukuvuthwa ngonyaka odlule ngesikhathi ababhekelele izinhlelo zokulihlenga bethi ukunciphisa abasebenzi kuzolisiza ukonga imali.UMnuz Matthew Parks ongumkhulumeli weCosatu osabambile, uthe sibaphoxile isinqumo seCCMA sokuchitha isicelo seTERS.“Asikwazi ukulahlekelwa yimisebenzi njengamanje. Sizokhuluma noNgqongqoshe wezemiSebenzi nowezokuXhumana ngalolu daba,” kusho uParks.Iposi linezikweletu ezingaphezu kuka-R3 billion okubalwa nemali yokurentela amaposi ahlukene.Amaningi asevaliwe kanti imiphakathi yasemakhaya iyakhala ngokuvalwa kwamaposi. Emakhaya abantu basasebenzisa amaposi ukuhola izibonelelo, ukulondoloza imali, ukulanda imishanguzo nezinye izinsiza.

SIBALISA ngokusala dengwane kubulawa umzukulu, isaguga esinguninakhulu wowesifazane okuthiwa ushaywe yinhlamvu ebinhlanhlatha ngesikhathi kuqhunyiswa izibhamu enkonzweni yomngcwabo wowayeyisosha loMkhonto WeSizwe, obusenkundleni yezemidlalo eChesterville, ngeSonto.Lesi sigameko esishiye abantu beshaqekile, kuthiwa senzeke kungcwatshwa uMnuz Story Shelembe owayeyisosha loMkhonto weSizwe, kanti ngesikhathi kuviliyelwa kuqhunyiswa izibhamu okukholakala ukuthi bekwenziwa ngenhloso yokuhlonipha umufi, kuphethe ngezinyemebezi emndenini wakaNdlovu. Kudubuleke ilungu lawo uNksz Thobile Goodness Ndlovu (24), okuthiwa ubezimele nabanye esangweni lenkundla yezemidlalo bebukela kuqhubeka umngcwabo.Uninakhulu kaThobile, uNksz Constance Ndlovu (81) ekhuluma neSolezwe, uthe ufe olwembiza ngomzukulu wakhe abethembele kuyo njengoba ubezihlalela naye emlekelela njengoba esewumuntu ophila nezifo ezingamahlalakhona ngenxa yokukhula.“Ubengekho ngisho ngaphakathi emngcwabeni ngokuzwa kwethu. Ubezimele esangweni nezinye izingane bebukela buqamama njengoba bekuviliyela amasosha, kanti kuzothi sekuqhunyiswa izibhamu, inhlamvu ivele ikhethe yena. Ngibuhlungu kakhulu ngoba bekuyona ngane ebengizihlalela nayo, abazali bayo abanginikeza yona ukuthi inginakekele njengoba sengikhulile futhi ngihlala ngokugula,” kubalisa yena.Uthe okubuhlungu kakhulu ukuthi umufi ushiye ingane enezinyanga eziwu-18 abebehlala nayo osekuzophoqa ukuthi iyohlala noninakhulu.Uthe inhlamvu ingene esweni kanti uphuthunyiswe emtholampio nokuyilapho ephelele khona.“Bengingazi lutho ngizihlalele ekhaya. Ngibone kuma iveni yamaphoyisa egcekeni bangitshela ngalokhu esekwenzekile.  Ngiyafisa ukuthola izimpendulo ukuthi ubani odubule umzukulu wami,” usho kanje.UMnuz Zethembe Cele owayemgqugquzeli ophikweni lomakadebona boMkhonto WeSizwe, i-MK Military Veterans Association osefudukele kwi- MK Party, uthe wazisiwe ngesigameko esenzeke kuqhubeka inkonzo yomngcwabo kazakwabo.“Odubulile akulona isosha ngiyasola umuntu nje. Amasosha aqeqeshiwe kakhulu ngokudubula futhi ayazi ukuthi uma udubula ungahlose kulimaza umuntu, isibhamu sibhekiswa emoyeni futhi kungaqondaniswa nendawo enesixuku sabantu,” kusho uCele.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uConstable Thenjiswa Ngcobo uthe amaphoyisa aseCato Manor aphenya icala lokubulala emva kokuthi owesifazane oneminyaka engu-24, kusolwa ukuthi udutshulwe inhlamvu ebinhlanhlatha ivela kumsolwa ongaziwe, obalekile emva kwesigameko.

UBALISA ngeminjunju ayizwayo owesifazane waseMadundube, eMbumbulu ngokubulawa komyeni wakhe obeyiphoyisa eselathatha umhlalaphansi.UNkk Zilungile Makhanya ubalisa ngokudutshulwa kukaMnuz Joachim Makhekhe Makhanya (65) okuthiwa uhlaselwe esemzini wakhe eMbumbulu.UNkk Makhanya uthe umufi ubeqeda kugeza ngesikhathi kuthushuka indoda engazange ibuze lutho yamane yamdubula wawela khona lapho.Uthe indlela ebimdubula ngayo bekubonakala ukuthi yenza isiqiniseko sokuthi akasindi. “Ngikutshela ukuthi le ndoda imdubule wawa phansi. Isidumbu sakhe sagingqika saze sayofika ekugcineni kwegceke. Ushonele khona lapho,’’ kuchaza yena.Uthe indawo yokugezela ingaphandle komuzi. Uthe bebekade begeza bobabili ngesikhathi edutshulwa.Noma iyinye indoda ebonakale idubula amahlandla amaningi ibhekise kumufi, kodwa uthe kukhona abanye besilisa ababili ebebekhona.“Owomndeni uthe uwabonile amanye amadoda amabili egcekeni abekade ehambisana nalo odubulile,’’ usho kanje.Uthe okumhlukumezile ukuthi lesi sehlakalo senzeke phambi kwakhe."Ingihlukumezile kakhulu le nto indlela eyenzeke ngayo,’’ usho kanje kuzwakala ukuthi ukhathazekile emoyeni.Uthe iminjunju yokubulawa komyeni wakhe phambi kwakhe isekude ukuphela.Kuthiwa umufi uzamile ukubaleka kodwa wagcina ewa phansi. Kuvela ukuthi udubuleke esifubeni, esiswini nasengalweni yangakwesokudla, ethangeni kwesokudla, umlenze wangakwesobunxele kuthiwa uphukile futhi ubumbobombobo yizinhlamvu.Egcekeni kuthiwa kutholakale amagobolondo ezinhlamvu amahlanu.Ukhala ngokuthi kuduma ikhanda kuyena njengoba engazi ukuthi siyini isizathu sokubulawa komyeni wakhe.“Akukho nje nokuncane esingathi siyakusola ngabe siqamba amanga aluhlaza,’’ usho kanje.Uchaze umufi njengowesilisa obengenazo izitha kodwa engumuntu obechitha isikhathi esiningi ngokuzivocavoca.Uveze ukuthi umufi wathatha umhlalaphansi emaphoyiseni ngo-2016.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa aseMbumbulu aphenya icala lokubulala kulandela isigameko sokubulawa kowesilisa.

UKHIHLE esikaNandi enkantolo owayengumdlali weBanyana Banyana efakaza ngempilo enzima aseyiphila kusukela adlwengulwa, wagwazwa, wakhuthuzwa, washiywa kuthiwa ufile.Lona wesifazane othandana nobulili obufana nobakhe futhi elingeke lidalulwe igama lakhe ngoba ungumgilwa ecaleni elithinta ucansi, uchazele inkantolo yeMantshi yaseNtuzuma ngobunzima bempilo nokushabalala kwamaphupho akhe emuva kwalesi sigameko.Udalule ukuthi useyinhlekisa emphakathini waKwaMashu  ngoba okwamehlela ebusuku ngoNovemba 29, 2020 kwamshiya engenalo iso.Uthe manje usegqoka izibuko ubusuku nemini kushisa noma kubanda.IMantshi N Sipunzi, igwebe uSandile Wiseman Nikwe (34) udilikajele ngecala lokudlwengula, iminyaka engu-10 ngecala lokuzama ukubulala neminye engu-10 ngelokuphanga kuhlonyiwe.Ukhishelwe umbandela othi akasakufanele ukuphinda aphathe isibhamu empilweni yakhe.“Sengiyinhlekisa emphakathini abantu bangibiza ngamagama ngento engenzekanga ngokuthanda kwami. ”Ngangidlalela iBanyana neqembu lebhola esigabeni esikhokhelwayo eThekwini, kuyimina engondla umndeni wami.“Ngangibizelwe ukuyokwenza inhlolokhono kwiMamelodi Sundowns Ladies kanti ngizoba neshwa ngidlwengulwe,” kuchaza umgilwa.Uqhube wathi okwamehlela kwamshiya nesilonda angakholwa ukuthi siyoke siphole.Ngesikhathi ethula ubufakazi ubekhala, uze wakhumula izibuko wakhipha neso lokufakelwa wabuka ngqo uNikwe, wambuza ukuthi amenza khona wayekwenziswa yini nokuthi wayehloseni ngakho?Uveze ukuthi ngesikhathi emdlwengula bejijimezana, uNikwe wathi, uyaqala ukuhlangana nesif%*# esilwa kanje. Wambuza ukuthi kanti bangaki abanye aseke abenza into efana nalena. Ubuze nokuthi ziphi izimpahla zakhe aziphangwa uNikwe okuyibhulukwe elimnyama, i-anda, iwashi, iselula nophaqa okungatholakalanga? UNikwe uvele wabheka phansi, wathula du.“Ngangingeke ngitholakale ukuba ngangintekenteke. Wangishiya odakeni, uzitshela ukuthi ungibulele. Wangigwaza amanxeba emqaleni engase ngiphefumula ngawo,” kusho umgilwa.UNikwe waboshwa ngoDisemba 4, 2020 wanqatshelwa ibheyili njengoba esebhadle iminyaka emine ezitokisini.Uwaphike kwaze kwaba sekugcineni amacala, wathi ubhecwa ngobubende inyama engayidlanga.Usole umgilwa wathi nguyena owayezifunela ucansi abalwenza bevumelene.Ukhombe ngenjumbane umgilwa wathi nguyena owayefuna ukumgwaza wabe eseyazivikela, ulandulile ukuthi zikhona izimpahla zikamufi azithatha.UMshushisi uNksz Shenola Sewbaran obekunguye obelusa ngemibuzo umgilwa, naye ubebonakala evukwa wumunyu echiphiza ngesikhathi (umgilwa) echazela inkantolo isimo sakhe.UNksz Sewbaran ubuye waveza ukuthi ukupheka ethulula abameli uNikwe, yikhona okubambezele ukuphothulwa kwecala wahlala sonke lesi sikhathi asesihlale esitokisini. Imantshi ibuhlabe yabuhlikiza ubufakazi bukaNikwe yathi bungamampunge, kodwa yamukela obukamgilwa obufakazelwe nayimibiko yodokotela ababili.Kuthiwa umgilwa wahlangana noNikwe ebusuku ngo-11 ngesikhathi eyobheka umngani wakhe.Kuvele ukuthi uNikwe wayazi ukuthi umgilwa udlala ibhola futhi uthandana nabobulili obufana nobakhe.Kuvele ukuthi uNikwe wadonsela umgilwa emseleni, bajijimezana wagcina ewile (umgilwa) wase emgwaza ngebhodlela emqaleni nasemhlane. Kuthiwa wabe esemdlwengula, maqede wamphanga izimpahla zakhe.Umgilwa utshele inkantolo ukuthi wasindiswa ukuthi wavele wazenza ofile okuyinto eyenza uNikwe wamshiya kanjalo ezitshela ukuthi ushonile.Uchaze ukuthi watibula waphuma exhaphozini ayeshiywe kulona, waphumela emgwaqweni wabonwa ngabantu abamphuthumisa emtholampilo.Uthi yilapho kwafika khona izihlobo zakhe wazilandisa ngokumehlele wachaza nokuthi uNikwe omdlwengulile.

USIZI luzwa olunye emindenini ehlukene yasoThongathi ekhahlanyezwe yimvula eshiye kukhalwa kule ndawo.Uma ungena ezingxenyeni ezehlukene zakule ndawo ukhangwa yizihlahla eziwiswe umoya zivimbe imigwaqo, izindlu ezidilikile nezimoto ezipheshulwe umoya.Abantu ubafica behlezi ngaphandle kwezindlu bengamaqoqo kubonakala nje ukuthi badidekile futhi basakhuluma ngalo mshophi obehlele.Emndenini wakwaMngadi usizi lumi ngenhla njengoba kubhidlike umuzi wabo waphela maqede kwalimala izingane zamantombazane ezimbili ezingamawele.UNkk Berlina Mngadi ubebalisa ngabazukulu bakhe ebebenonyaka nezinyanga eziyisithupha bezelwe. "Hheyi futhi Nkosi yami abazukulu bami bebancane kangaka,'' kubalisa yena.Uveze ukuthi isiqandisi siwele phezu kwabazukulu belele. Elilodwa iwele lishonele khona lapho elinye laphuthunyiswa esibhedlela isimo sisibi kakhulu. "Kwayena lo omunye ubesaphila kodwa bese ebanda. Kodwa konke sikuyekela kuNkulunkulu owazi konke,'' usho kanjena.UMnuz Zakhele Chili uveze ukuthi  nasemndenini wakhe usizi luzwa olunye njengoba kudilike umuzi wakhe kwase kulimala kabi indodana yakhe ayiphuthumise esibhedlela ilimele kabi ekhanda."Kubi ngibalisa ngosizi lokuwa komuzi wami. Kodwa nantu olunye usizi lokulimala kabi kwendodana yami,'' usho kanje.UNkk Nkosingiphile Khanyile uthe kumnyama amehlo kuyena akazi nokuthi uzothathani ahlanganise nani uma izinto zimapeketwane ngalolu hlobo.Uveze ukuthi imvula ibhidlize umuzi wakhe oyisitezi ayeewuthenge ngo-R730 000 ngo-2007.Emndenini wakwaMthembu nakhona bakhala ezimathonsi njengoba bebalisa ngokuthi imvula iwubhidlize yawuqeda umuzi wabo ebebengakaqedi ukuwakha.UNkk Noncedo Hlamaphi uthe ukudilika komuzi kubashiye bedidekile njengoba kube manzi nezincwadi zendodakazi efunda u-matric.Ukhale ngokuthi ukonakala kwempahla yasendlini kunezele phezu kosizi lokudilika komuzi.UNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomusa Dube Ncube,  uthe senyukile isibalo sabantu abadlule emhlabeni ngenxa yemvula kule ndawo.Uthe abayisikhombisa abakhona oThongathi abanye abaseNquthu, eShowe naKwaHlabisa.Uthe kunabantu abangu-55 abalimalile base bephuthunyiswa ezibhedlela wathi kukhona abazobalekelela ngakho labo abangazi ukuthi bazohlala kuphi ngemva kwemvula.Le mvula kuvela ukuthi ikhahlameze lezi zifunda, iLembe, uMzinyathi, King Cetshwayo, Amajuba naseMkhanyakude.Izinhlangano ezigxile ekulekeleleni umphakathi iRed Cross, Gift of the Givers nazo zimatasa ezindaweni ezikhahlamezekile.

UPHITHENE amakhanda umndeni wakwaGumede eMalenda, KwaDukuza, kulandela ukushelwa yiyo yonke impahla endlini ngomlilo abathi abazi uqubulwa yini. Ngokusho kwelungu lomndeni, uNksz Nokukhanya Luthuli, umlilo athi uhlasela umndeni kadadewabo, uNkk Dolly Gumede, uqale phakathi nenyanga edlule.Uthe okuxakayo ukuthi yonke imizi udadewabo, umyeni nengane (12) abakhoseliswa kuyo, nayo ivele ishe.Ubalise ngokuthi ngenxa yalesi simo, udadewabo nomyeni wakhe, abanawo namandla okuyixoxa le nsumansumane ababhekene nayo. Echaza, uthe isimine imizi esishile okufaka phakathi okadadewabo lapho okwaqala khona umlilo, kube owakhe (uNksz Luthuli) nawo oseMalenda, nemibili eyalapho bezalwa khona KwaMaphumulo.Udalule ukuthi umlilo wokuqala waqala ekameleni likaNkk Gumede nomyeni wakhe, uMnuz Vusumuzo Gumede. Uthe uGumede wayekhona ekhaya kuqala umlilo, uNkk Gumede yena esetohweni.“Wonke umuntu uqale wazitshela ukuthi udalwe ukuphambana kwezintambo zikagesi njengoba kwakushajwe iselula ekameleni.“Wacishwa kodwa ezinsukwini ezilandelayo, wedlulela kwamanye amakamelo, washisa yonke impahla,” kulandisa uNksz Luthuli.Uthe igcine isha yonke indlu enamagumbi ayisihlanu, kwasha konke okuphakathi, wathi ngokubazwela uzamile ukubakhoselisa kodwa emva kwezinsuku ezintathu befikile kwakhe, wagasela umlilo.“Nakwami kushe yonke into esendlini enamagumbi ayisihlanu,” kusho yena.Uqhube wathi kuphinde kwanqunywa ukuthi baye KwaMaphumulo, lapho okudabuka khona umndeni wakwaLuthuli, nakhona kwenzeka esifanayo.Umuzi wokugcina wesihlobo abaye kuwo, nawo okhona KwaMaphumulo , nakuwo kwenzeke esifanyo.“Udadewethu nomyeni wakhe bagcina bekhetha ukubuyela emumva eMalenda, kuzo lezo zindlu, ezinye zazo ezingenalo uphahla namawindi ngenxa yokungqongqiswa umlilo.“Ayikho inhlobo yosizo esingaludingi. Sidinga ukudla, izimpahla zokugqoka, nokunye okudingwa umuntu ukuze akwazi ukuphila,” usho kanje.Uthe ikhansela lendawo, uNkk Nkintimen Mpaza, ilulethile usizo olufana negilosa, izipontshi nezingubo zokulala kodwa nakho kwaphinde kwasha konke.“Nabebandla esikhonza kulo i-United Congregational Church of Southern Africa (UCCSA), nabo balethe ezinye izimpahla, nazo zasha,” usho kanje.Uthe badidekile ukuthi kwenzekani nokuthi inkinga bayilungisa kanjani.“Sifisa ukuqhubeka sithole usizo lwezimpahla ezahlukene ngoba isimo sibi, ayikho imali yokuthenga okunye,” kusho uNksz Luthuli.Uveze ukuthi umlilo wakamumva wenzeke ngoLwesithathu (olwedlule), wathi bangajabulela noma yiluphi usizo abangaluthola.Ikhansela uNkk Nkintimen Mpanza lithe: “Siluhambisile ngempela usizo, sazibonela isimo ukuthi sibi kangakanani. Siyafisa ukuthi basizakale.”Uthe okuthusayo ukuthi umlilo uke washa phambi kwakhe naye ngesikhathi efikile ezoletha usizo.

KUSOLWA unyawo lwemfene ngokungqongqiswa kwehhovisi lekhansela laku-ward 107, eNtuzuma ngoLwesibili.Ngokusho kwekhansela le-ANC, uMnuz Njabulo Ntuli, kwenzeka lesi sigameko nje bekusanda kudedelwa ngebheyili osomabhizinisi bendawo, ngecala lokuphazamisa ukwakhiwa komgwaqo, uSinamumva.UNtuli uthe nakuba bengakabi nalwazi lokuthi lishiswe ubani ihhovisi lakhe kodwa alivelanga lazishisa.“Ayikho enye into ebiyinkinga ewadini ngaphandle kodaba lwalabo somabhizinisi,” kusho uNtuli.Elandisa ngodaba lwabo, uthe kuqale uthuthuva ngo-Ephreli nonyaka ngesikhathi osomabhizinisi abathile bezwakalisa ukungenami ngendlela okukhethwe ngayo abenza umsebenzi wokulungisa umgwaqo owakhahlamezeka ngezikhukhula.“Umsindo ugcine uholela ekutheni udaba lubikwe emaphoyiseni. Kwaboshwa abayisishiyagalombili ekuqaleni kukaMeyi abaficwa besaqhubeka nokuphazamisa uhlelo,” kusho uNtuli.Uthe bahlale ezitokisini ngaphambi kokuthi badedelwe ngebheyili maphakathi noMeyi.“Uma ngingaphazami, baphume ngoLwesihlanu njengoba sekwenzeka isigameko phakathi kwamabili ngoLwesibili,” usho kanje.Uthe uzwile kancane ngezinsongo angazi ukuthi ziqhamukaphi ngoba zizungeze ezinkundleni zokuxhumana zithi bazophindiselelwa ababoshiwe.Uthe ngaphakathi bekungenampahla kagesi kodwa bekukhona imiqingo ebalulekile yabantu be-ward.Kuyona uthe bekukhona eyalabo abebedinga ukwakhelwa izindlu nalabo abadinga usizo eMnyangweni wokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi.Okhulmela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa aseNtuzuma aphenya icala lokushisa, kulandela isigameko sokushiswa kwehhovisi lekhansela elingumahamba nendlwana. Uqhube wathi imbangela yesigameko ayikaziwa.

UBEWUMLUTHA wezidakamizwa umfundi waseBongucele High, eMthwalume, osolwa ngokuba umalugaju ocathamela izingane ezifunda ezikoleni zamabanga aphansi azenzakalise, obevele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMzumbe, ngoLwesihlanu.Lokhu kwenzeke emva kwesigameko esishaqise abaningi sokuhudulelwa esikhotheni komfundi oneminyaka eyisithupha obephuma esikoleni ahlutshulwe izimpahla okukholakala ukuthi kwenziwe yilo msolwa oneminyaka ewu-17 ofunda u-Grade 9. Ubhekene namacala; elokudlwengu nelokuzama ukubulala njengoba kuvela ukuthi kulesi sigameko esenzeke ngesonto eledlule, kuthiwa uzame ukudlwengula umgilwa ngaphambi kokumshaya ngetshe ekhanda wamshiya edindilizile ezitshela ukuthi ufile. Kuthiwa emva kokuboshwa uvumile ukuthi uyena owenze lesi sihluku waphinde wavuma nokuthi wuye owabulala  uSinethemba Ngcece (8) owayenza u-Grade 3 esikoleni samabanga aphansi eMakhoso, nyakenye. Isidumbu sakhe satholwa silaxazwe ngasemfuleni sesonakele okwasekuphele amasonto enyamelele selokhu wayegcine ukubonwa ephuma esikoleni.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi umsolwa uvele uwuhlupho esikoleni afunda kuso, kuthiwa uzitika ngezidakamizwa nangesikhathi sesikole.Omunye wothisha ofundisa esikoleni afunda kuso ongagunyaziwe ukukhuluma nabezindaba, uthe umsolwa ubemisiwe esikoleni ngaphami kokuvalwa kwezikole kwathiwa akabuye nomzali njengoba ubebanjwe namaphilisi ohlobo oluthile ayizidakamizwa esikoleni.“Uwuhlupho kakhulu. Kuthiwe akabuye nomzali ngokuvulwa kwezikole ngenxa yezenzo zakhe kodwa wakhetha ukufika nomuntu othile okungesiye umzali wakhe. Kuthiwe uzobuyela esikoleni mhla wafika nomzali wakhe. Yize ubengakaze akhombise ulaka kwabanye abafundi kodwa ukusebenzisa izidakamizwa esikoleni, sekuyinto yakhe, ” usho kanje. Uthe nasekilasini kufundwa, ubevele enze akuthandayo uma kuthi akasukume ame ngezinyawo noma aphume ngaphandle uthisha efundisa okukanye akhulume amagama ayiziswana, enze njalo.Uqinisekise ukuthi nabazali bakhe sebeke babizelwa esikoleni babikelwa imikhuba yakhe.Uthishomkhulu wesikole okufunda kuso umsolwa, uMnuz Vuyani Nguse, uthe akukho okuhlanganisa isikole nezenzo umsolwa asolelwa kuso.“Okusiphatha kabi nje ukuthi lokhu kulimaza igama lesikole ngoba kuzovela ukuthi umfundi wethu lo osolelwa ezenzweni eziyisihluku kangaka. Kodwa ngiyafisa ukuqinisekisa umphakathi ukuthi izingane ezifunda kulesi sikole ziyahlonipha ngendlela eyisimannga njengoba kuyisiko lethu futhi kuyafundwa akukhona kwampunzi edla emini. Nokho siyazwelana kakhulu nemindeni ethintekile nomndeni nje wakhe umsolwa ngoba akekho obekulindele lokhu uma sibuka iminyaka yakhe,” usho kanje.Ubabekazi kamsolwa ocele ukungadalulwa, uthe bewumndeni kubashaqisile ukuthola ukuthi unukeka ezenzweni ezimbi kanje.“Uwumuntu ohloniphayo lapha ekhaya, ngisho omakhewane bebemazi kanjalo. Besingakulindele ukuthi athinteke ezenzweni ezinjengalezi, kodwa ngicela ukungaphawuli kakhulu kwazise sisazohlangana siwumndeni ngoba uyingane yasekhabonina. Lapha nje ubezohlala kubo kayise esondelela isikole, kumele sihlale nabo siludingide lolu daba,” usho kanje.

USOLA imizamo yokucekelwa phansi ababegaqele ithenda, usomabhizinisi kubulawa isihlobo sakhe sigade impahla yokusebenza esigamekweni esenzeke ngeledlule emgwaqweni u-M4 obheke eBallito.UMnuz Thulasizwe Ntuli (33) ongumzala kasomabhizinisi uMnuz Stoney Buthelezi wenkampani i-Thelbridge Enterprise (PTY) Ltd, enikezwe umsebenzi wokulungisa umgwaqo uM4 ngaseBallito, kuthiwa ushone emva kokudutshulwa ngabasolwa abangaziwa egadile ngoLwesine ebusuku.UButhelezi uthe uNtuli nezinye izihlobo, bekungakapheli sikhathi esingakanani ebalande emakhaya KwaHlabisa ukuzoba yiso lakhe njengoba ubelokhu ebona kunyamalala impahla ebalulekile ngaphansi kweso lenkampani yonogada abeyiqashele ukugada umsebenzi.“Ngisola ukuthi kukhona abathile futhi abanamandla abenze le nto, mhlawumbe abangathandanga ukuthi kube yinkampani yami eyenza lo msebenzi. “Bekulokhu kulahleka izinto, kwesinye isikhathi uthole ukuthi amaloli asekhishwe amalahle okungenze nganquma ukulanda abegazi lami emakhaya ukuthi bangibhekele umsebenzi ngoba bese ngingasabethembi kahle abangisebenzelayo,” usho kanje.Elandisa ngokuthiwa kwenzeke ngesikhathi kudutshulwa uNtuli, uthe kungene ngendluzula abasolwa endaweni okuhlala kuyo impahla yokusebenza, babakhomba ngezibhamu abebegadile babavalela ethoyilethi.“Kuthiwa uNtuli uzame ukulwa nokuyilapho abasolwa bemdubule khona. Uthe uthole ucingo obelumazisa ngosekwenzekile, ngesikhathi ephuthuma endaweni yesigameko esuka eMhlanga, ufike umzala wakhe esedutshuliwe, amasondo ayisishiyagalombili amaloli abeseqaqiwe, elaliswe phansi.“Okwenza ngibone ukuthi abasolwa bebethunyiwe, isondo leloli lisinda kakhulu, bebezowuthathaphi u-crane wokuwalayisha bahambe nawo?  Lokhu kuyakhombisa ukuthi kukhona umuntu onamadla obebathumile,” usho kanje.Inkampani i-Thelbrigde Enterprise (PTY) Ltd inikezwe ngabakwa-Sanral umsebenzi wokulungisa umgwaqo u-M4 ukusuka eBoy’s Town kuya e-Westbrook Beach owacekelwa phansi yizikhukhula zango–2022.Kuze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela amaphoyisa engakaphenduli ukuqinisekisa isigameko..

UPHIKA ulala ngomhlane uSomlomo wePhalamende, uNkk Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula, ukuthi wathola intshontsho lezigidi zamaRandi ngesikhathi esengungqongqoshe woMnyango wezokuVikela.UNkk Mapisa-Nqakula uthe akusilona iqiniso ukuthi wagwazelwa ngo-R2.3 million izinkampani ezathola amathenda ngesikhathi esengungqongqoshe womnyango.Ukusho lokhu esitatimendeni lapho ebephendula khona umbiko oshicilelwe iphephandaba eliphuma ngeSonto.Umbiko wephephandaba uthe uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula uphenywa ngezinsolo zokugwazisa.UNkk Mapisa-Nqakula waqala ukuphenywa ngo-2021, emva kwesikhalo esafakwa umholi we-UDM, uMnuz Bantu Holomisa.Kepha uphenyo lwabuye lwavalwa ngenxa yokungabi bikho kobufakazi.Imibiko yangempelasonto iveze ukuthi kunobufakazi obusha, obukhomba ngenjumbane uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula.Kulobu bufakazi kuthiwa kunencwadi efungelwe yesikhulu senkampani eyathola ithenda emnyangweni.Isikhulu senkampani kuthiwa sikusho singananazi ukuthi safumbathisa uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula izigidi zamaRandi.Kepha uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula ukuphikile lokhu.Esitatimendeni, ihhovisi likaNkk Mapisa-Nqakula lithe lezi zinsolo uziqabuke embikweni wephephandaba langempelasonto.“Ngikholelwa ekutheni uphenyo lwezinsolo ezibucayi ngalolu hlobo kufanele luphathwe ngobuchule. Kuyakhathaza ukubona izinsolo ezibucayi ngalolu hlobo ziputshuzelwa abezindaba.”UNkk Mapisa-Nqakula uthe uzobambisana nezinhlaka eziphenya izinsolo abekwa zona.“Ngiyakugcizelela ukuthi ngimsulwa, futhi ngisazimisele ngokuqhubeka nokusebenza ngokuzikhandla. Kuzo zonke izikhundla esengike ngaziphatha, ngiziphathe ngobuqotho.”Kuvele sekukhona amaqembu afuna ukuthi uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula akhishwe esikhundleni.UHolomisa uthe uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula akakulungele ukuphatha  isikhundla.Uthe kunobufakazi obubambekayo obuzogojela uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula.“Ekuqaleni babungekho ubufakazi obuphathekayo. Kulokhu usomabhizinisi wenze incwadi efungelwe. Kuyakhombisa ukuthi usomabhizinisi uzimisele ngokubhekana noNkk Mapisa-Nqakula. Kufanele kuqale uhlelo lwasePhalamende lokuthi akhishwe esikhundleni.”USotswebhu weDA ePhalamende, uNksz Siviwe Gwarube, uthe bafuna kuqalwe uphenyo ngokushesha.“Sizofaka isikhalo ekomitini elibhekele ubuqotho bamalungu ePhalamende. Sifuna kuqale uphenyo ngokushesha. IPhalamende liyisikhungo esihlonishwayo. Kufanele sibuvikele ubuqotho bePhalamende, labo ababhekene namacala kufanele bathathelwe izinyathelo.”UNkk Mapisa-Nqakula uyaqhubeka nokwenza umsebenzi wakhe owejwayelekile njengoba kuleli sonto ezohola amalungu ePhalamende azoya emcimbini wokugubha usuku lwabantu besifazane.Umcimbi uzokuba seFrance, eParis.I-ANC ibingakaphawuli ngodaba lukaNkk Mapisa-Nqakula.

UMHOLI weDA, uMnuz John Steenhuisen, ubona ukuvela kweqembu eliholwa owayengumengameli, uJacob Zuma, iMK, kuzobasiza KwaZulu-Natal.USteenhuisen uthe ukudla kweMK amavoti e-ANC kuzokwenza ukuthi iDA inqobe iKwaZulu-Natal okhethweni lwangoLwesithathu.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhankasa eNtuzuma, izolo.USteenhuisen uthe kuzoshintsha izinto KwaZulu-Natal.“Kuzokwenzeka isimanga lapha kwaZulu-Natal. IMK idla amavoti e-ANC, ngapha iDA iyakhula. IDA izokwenza kahle okhethweni. Sizokuba nondunankulu omusha lapha KwaZulu-Natal.”USteenhuisen uthe umkhankaso wabo waKwaZulu-Natal unxuse amalungu eDA ukuba aqhubeke nokuqinisa umkhankaso.“Sekusele kancane ukuthi ukhetho lufike. Manje asisekho isikhathi sokuphumula. Sesiyophumula emva kokhetho.”Ogaqele isikhundla sikandunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Chris Pappas, uthe umkhankaso wabo waKwaZulu-Natal uhambe kahle kakhulu.“Asikungabazi ukuthi la masela azophuma emandleni. Kufanele ngibathumelele umyalezo wokuthi bayaphuma, ukuze baqoqe zonke izinto zabo. Angifuni ukuthi uma ngifika lapha ehhovisi ngifice izimpahla zikaDube-Ncube (uNkk Nomusa). Bayaphuma la bantu.”Izakhamuzi zaseNtuzuma zitshele uSteenhuisen ngezinkinga ezibhekene nazo.Zikhale ngobugebengu, amathuba emisebenzi, izindlu nokungahanjiswa kwezidingo.UNkk Chrimentina Ngcobo, uthe uhulumeni ophethe awumsizi ngalutho.Uthe ngeke ephinde amvotele uMengameli, uCyril Ramaphosa.“URamaphosa akangenzeli lutho, angimfuni. Ugangile kakhulu uRamaphosa. Babopha uZuma. URamaphosa yena akaboshwa ngani ngoba phela siyazizwa naye ezakhe izindaba?”UNkk Ngcobo uthe akakanqumi ukuthi uzovotela liphi iqembu, wathi kuzokuba phakathi kweDA neMK.“Mhlawumbe bazoba ngcono laba bebala elimhlophe, angazi.”UNkk Ngcobo uthe indlu ahlala kuyona ayikho esimweni, wathi nemali yempesheni ayizaneli izidingo zakhe.Uthe uhlala nomzukulu ofunde waze wagogoda, ongawutholi umsebenzi.UNksz Khonzeni Nxele, uthe uyafisa ukuthi iDA ithole ithuba lokuphatha.“Ngifisa ukuthi izingane zami zibe nekusasa eliqhakazile. Kusaphethe abamhlophe izingane ezincane zazingadlwengulwa. Manje izingane ziyabulawa, zilahlwe esigangeni. Angikaze ngimuzwe uhulumeni ophethe ekhuluma ngale nto. Sesisaba noma kuthiwa izingane ziya esikoleni, sishaywa uvalo ngoba asazi ukuthi kuzokwenzekani kuzo.”UNksz Qhubo Ngema, onebhizinisi lokuwasha amateki, ukhale ngamathuba emisebenzi noxhaso kosomabhizinisi abasafufusa.

Usuthembele emaphoyiseni umndeni waKwaXimba, eCato Ridge, kulandela ukubulawa kwelungu lawo ngoLwesine, libulawelwa ophaqa bomngani.UMnuz Siboniso Hlophe (23) kuthiwa udutshulwe umsolwa owaziwayo, ekubo kamngani wakhe endaweni. Kulesi sigameko kuphinde kwalinyazwa abesilisa ababili abangabangani bakamufi. Kuthiwa kumanje kusekubi kubona njengoba besegumbini labagula kakhulu esibhedlela.Kuthiwa abomndeni baphuthume endaweni yesigameko emva kokuzwa kuqhuma isibhamu. Bathe uma befika khona bathola ukuthi abangani badutshuliwe.“Sithe uma singena ngaphakathi, sathola ukuthi ababili balimele, oyedwa ubesakwazi ukuchaza ukuthi kwenzekeni kodwa uSiboniso ubesethule,” kusho uNksz Nomfundo Ndawonde okhulumela umndeni.Udalule ukuthi bathole ukuthi ingxabano yophaqa ibisinesikhashana yaqala. Uthe umsolwa wabaqhwaga kumngani kamufi emasontweni ambalwa edlule.“Ngosuku lwesigameko, bahlangane naye ebagqokile, babafuna. Ugcine ngokubanika, wathi uma esekude, wamemeza wathi uzobuya nezinja zakhe,” kubeka uNksz Ndawonde.Uthe nangempela, umsolwa ubuyile esehamba nabangani bakhe, bafike badubula umufi nabangani bakhe. Abangani balimalile base bephuthunyiswa esibhedlela.Uthe umufi ubedutshulwe kwesingenhla nokwenza babone ukuthi umsolwa ubehlose ukumbulala.Uthe umfowabo omdala ongomunye wabagilwa, ubatshele ukuthi bebehleli endlini enkulu ngesikhathi bezwa kuqhuma isibhamu endlini engaphandle ebihleli abangani.“Uthe bathe uma bephuma beyobheka babona izithunzi zabesilisa ziphuma zigijima, bazilandela, bezitshela ukuthi abangani bagijimisa izigebengu,” kusho yena.Uqhube wathi abasolwa baphele emehlweni, maqede abafowabo boyedwa wabagilwa babuyela ekhaya ukuyobheka ukuthi kwenzakaleni ngoba sekucaca ukuthi akubona abangani laba ababalandelayo.Uthe yilapho ke abazithele khona phezu komshophi wokuthi kanti abagilwa badutshuliwe endaweni yesigameko.Uthe ngokwazi kwabo abasolwa bebengakaboshwa, basagcwele amathafa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa aseMsunduzi aphenya icala lokubulala namabili okuzama ukubulala., emuva kokubulawa koyewa kulinyazwe ababili KwaXimba ngoLwesine. Uthe ngokombiko abawutholile, laba abathathu bebehleli endlini ngesikhathi kutheleka abalisa ababili bavulela ngenhlamvu bebhekise kubona.“Umgilwa oyedwa ushonele endaweni yesigameko, ababili baphuthunyiswa esibhedlela benamanxeba okudutshulwa,” kusho uNetshiunda.Uthe abasolwa abakaziwa okwamanje nembangela yokubulala ayikahlonzwa.

Inkantolo yeMantshi yasePinetown ibeke usuku okulindeleke ukuthi kuqalwe ngalo kuqulwe icala lokubulala elithweswe isosha lomMbutho wezempi kuleli elisolwa ngokubulala umkalo.IMantshi uWendolyn Robinson ibeke uJulayi 23 nonyaka, eNkantolo yesiFunda yasePinetown ukuba kulalelwe icala elithweswe uMnuz Lwanda Zungu.Usolwa ngokudubula abulale inkosikazi yakhe, uNkk Tania Msani-Zungu ngoJanuwari 3 nonyaka kubuka izingane zabo.UMbuso uthe ihhovisi lomqondisi wophiko lwezokushushisa lithathe isinqumo sokuthi lingayi enkantolo enkulu leli cala kodwa lilalelwe kweyasePinetwon.Umshushisi uNksz Nomcebo Xulu akazishongo izizathu eziholele kulesi sinqumo sabaphathi bakhe kodwa uthe uMbuso usubuqoqile ubufakazi ngecala, umi ngomumo.Njengenjwayelo uZungu, oqatha ngomzimba, ungene enkantolo eshesha egqoke isikibha esinemikhono emide esinemibhalo, ibhulukwe eliluhlaza namateku.Bathe bebeka isinqe emabhentshini abantu abebezothamela icala, wabe eseyophuma ngomnyango uZungu ebuyela ezitokisini icala selihlehlisiwe.Laba bantu, iningi ebelikade lizokweseka umndeni kamufi, baze basizwa utolika obe esebakhanyisela ngobekushiwo imantshi kwazise akuthathanga sikhathi esingakanani icala lahlehliswa.

OBENGUSOMLOMO wePhalamende uNkk Nosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula, uthi ukusula kwakhe kulesi sikhundla akusho ukuthi uvuma izinsolo zenkohlakalo abhekene nazo.Ukusho lokhu encwadini yokusula izolo ayithumele iBamba likaSomlomo uMnuz Lechesa Tsenoli.Kule ncwadi uthe usula njengoSomlomo kanjalo nelungu lePhalamende lakuleli.“Ngithathe lesi sinqumo sokusula ukuze ngibhekane nezithinta uphenyo ngezinsolo zenkohlakalo eziphenywayo ngigcine isithunzi sePhalamende,” kusho uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula.Uthe isikhundla sikaSomlomo sibalulekile ekuthuthukiseni izwe ngenxa  yokuthi lezi zinsolo abhekene nazo zibucayi, ubone kungcono ukuthi angaqhubeki nomsebenzi wakhe njengomuntu obhekele ukwakhiwa kwemithetho. “Ngikholwa ngukuthi uma sekufike isikhathi, ngiyokwazi ukukhuluma kabanzi ngalezi zinsolo uma sengibekwe amacala ngokusemthetheni,” kusho uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula.Uthe umsulwa ezinsolweni abhekene nazo wathi njengelungu le-ANC uchithe iminyaka eminingi elwela inkululeko kuleli.Elinye lalelo lungelo ngelithi wonke umuntu umsulwa aze atholakale enecala. Unesibopho sokuthi ahoxe esikhundleni nakuba emsulwa.Uthe uyibhalele ne-ANC eyibonga ngokumnika ithuba lokuhola ezikhundleni ezahlukene.“Ngisayilungu le-ANC, okuyinhlangano engithembeke kuyona empilweni yami yonke yezepolitiki,” kuqhuba uNkk Mapisa-Nqakula.Usula nje bekuvele kunengcindezi ebivela kwamanye amaqembu ezombusazwe ukuthi asule.Ubhekene nezinsolo zokwamukela intshontsho ngesikhathi esanguNgqongqoshe wezokuVikela.Leli ntshontsho kuthiwa walithola komunye usonkontileka owayethola ithenda emnyangweni. Kuthiwa wathola intshontsho elibalelwa ngaphezu kukaR4 million, okuhlanganisa nemali ebalelwa kuR2 million, ayeyithola izikhawu ezahlukene.

IHALALISELWA nxa zonke iNhloko yokuqala yamaJaji engeyesifazane kuleli, iJaji Mandisa Maya.UJaji Maya uzothatha izintambo ngoSepthemba 1 nonyaka kuJaji Raymond Zondo obeka phansi amatomu ekupheleni kwenyanga ezayo njengoba esethatha umhlalaphansi.UNgqongqoshe wezobuLungiswa uNkk Thembi Simelane, ukwamukele ukuqokwa kukaMaya ngumengameli Cyril Ramaphosa.Uthe lokhu kuqokwa kwakhe kusho lukhulu ezweni.“Sizoba nenhloko yamajaji engowesifazane ezweni okuyinto eveza ibanga eselihanjiwe kwezobulungiswa. Siyakwamukela ukuqokwa kwakhe nokumeleleka kwabesifazane emkhakheni wamajaji.” Usihlalo weKomiti lezobuLungiswa ePhalamende, uMnuz Xola Nqola, uthe kuqopheke umlando ngokuqokwa kukaJaji Maya, ngamava anawo kulo mkhakha futhi aphinde abe ngowesifazane wokuqala.Uthe bamfisela okuhle konke kulesi sikhundla esiphezulu kulo mkhakha.I-ActionSA imhalalisele uMaya yathi isinyathelo esihle sokuqeda eyokuthi lo mkhakha uqhoqhobelwe abesilisa.“Uyisibani esihle esizokhanyisa emkhakheni wezobulungiswa. Sikholwa ngukuthi izinqumo zezinkantolo zizothinta zonke izinhlangothi.”I-ANC ikwamukele ukuqokwa kukaMaya, yathi uwusebenzele lo mkhakha.“Unamava kulo mkhakha njengoba eke waphatha ezinkantolo ezehlukene kuleli. Siyazethemba ezobulungiswa zakuleli ukuthi zisezandleni eziphephile.”I-EFF ithe iyamamukela uMaya njengoba yameseka nangesikhathi kunohlelo lokuhlolwa kwalabo ababefuna ukungena kulesi sikhundla.Ithe babefuna kungene yena ngoba uZondo wayesalelwe iminyaka embalwa ngaphambi kokuthatha umhlalaphansi.Ne-Law Society of South Africa (LSSA), imamukele uMaya yathi lokhu kuqokwa kwakhe kuqophe umlando kuleli.Ithe usebe yiPhini lenhloko yamajaji kusuka ngo-2022, kanti ubengumengameli weNkantolo yezokuDluliswa kwamaCala kuleli kusuka ngo-2017.“Lokhu kuqokwa kwakhe kusho izinguquko emkhakheni wezobuLungiswa. Sinethemba ukuthi uzoma angagudluki ezintweni zomthetho.” AmaKhomanisi akwamukele ukuqokwa kukaMaya, akhala ngezinto ezithinta ukucwasa kwezobulungiswa.Le nhlangano ithe umthetho kumele usize wonke umuntu kungayi ngokuthi unemali.I-DA ithe uMaya kumele aqinisekise ukuthi umthetho uyalandelwa.Ibonge neqhaza likaZondo osebeka phansi amatomu yathi ngeke lilibaleke iqhaza lakhe ekubekeni phambili uMthethosisekelo wezwe.NoZondo ufisele okuhle konke uMaya, wathi akangabazi ukuthi uzokwenza umsebenzi oncomekayo.

SEKUHLOLWE kwaphinde kwagonywa abafundi abevile esigidini kuleli ngaphansi komkhankaso woMnyango weMfundo eyisiSekelo noMnyango wezeMpilo. Abafundi okubalwa nabafunda ezikoleni zabaphila nokukhubazeka, bahlolwe izifo ezehlukene baphinde bagonyelwa izifo ezifana ne-Human papillomaviru, eyaziwa nge-HPV, okuyisifo esithathelana ngokocansi esidala umdlavuza womlomo wesibeletho.Lokhu kuvele ngesikhathi le minyango ivele ngaphambi kwekomiti lasePhalamende.UMqondisi obhekele imfundo yabaphila nokukhubazeka, uMnuz Jabulani Ngcobo, utshele amalungu ePhalamende ukuthi lo mkhankaso uthela izithelo njengoba sanda isibalo sabafundi abahlolwa izifo ezehlukene, baphinde bagonywe ukuze bavikeleke.Uveze ukuthi angaphezu kuka-4 million amantombazane asegonyelwe iHPV.“Asibashiyi ngaphandle abafundi abaphila nokukhubazeka uma kwenziwa le mikhankaso ezikoleni. Kusuka ngo-2015 sekuqeqeshwe othisha abevile ku-178 000, ukuthi balandele imigomo ethinta ezempilo ezikoleni. Kubalulekile ukuthi sisheshe sinqande izifo ikakhulu kubafundi bamantombazane,” kusho uNgcobo.UDkt Lesley Bamford woMnyango wezeMpilo, uthe bangaphezu kuka-7 million abafundi asebethole usizo lokukhishwa izikelemu ezikoleni ezingu-Quintile 1 kuya ku-3.Uthe babalelwa ku-1.6 million abafundi abaneminyaka engu-6 kuya ku-12, asebethole imigomo yezifo ezehlukene okubalwa i-tetanus ne-diphtheria.“Abafundi abevile ku-258 000 basizwe ezinkingeni ezithinta amehlo, abangu-59 451 bathole usizo oluthinta ukuzwa kwathi abangu-685 000, basizwa ezinkingeni ezithinta inhlanzeko yamazinyo. Abanye basizwe ngokuthi babone ongoti abazobasiza ukuze bakwazi ukukhuluma.”UMqondisi jikelele eMnyangweni weMfundo eyisiSekelo, uMnuz Mathanzima Mweli, uthe zonke izikole abazakhayo bayaqikelela ukuthi zinezinsiza ezizokwenza kube lula kwabaphila nokukhubazeka.Uthe kuyadingeka kube nokubambisana emikhakheni ehlukene.Amalungu ePhalamende aveze ukuthi akumele bazibone beshaywe indiva abafundi abaphila nokukhubazeka kunakwe abafunda ezikoleni ezijwayelekile.Okunye okuvelile ngukuthi kumele kuqiniswe ezobuchwepheshe ezikoleni zabaphila nokukhubazeka.

UTHEMBISA amanye amacwecwe ashisayo uGatsheni njengoba ehlabane ngendondo ye-Best Newcomer kumaCultural and Creative Industry Awards (Ccia) abebanjelwe eSandton Convention Centre, eGoli ngempelasonto.Lo mculi  wasePhongolo ubesembangweni wendondo nentokazi esencane uTyla, owahlabana ngendondo yeBest African Music Perfomance kumaGrammy Awards ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka.Lo mcimbi obekungowokuqala, ubuwenziwe uMnyango weZemidlalo amaCiko namaSiko kuzwelonkeUGatsheni othathelwe yimenenja yakhe indondo kulo mcimbi, ekhuluma neSolezwe uthe ujabule ngukuhlomula ngendondo enkulu kangaka nesho  lukhulu kuye nasemsebenzini wakhe.Uphinde watshela leliphephandaba ukuthi baningi abaculi asebenzisana nabo manje."Ngisebenzile namaQwabe Twins senza ingoma ethi uMalambane, ngasebenza noBig Zulu senza ingoma ethi Ikhaya Lami, ngaphinde ngasebenza noJaiva Zimnike senza izingoma ezimbili kwi-album yakhe ephume kamuva," kubeka uGatsheni.Uthe njengoba ephezu kokwenza umculo omusha nje angeke awuqhathanise nowakamuva. "Ngizosebenza ngokuzikhandla noma ngingezukuqophisana namuntu futhi ngingezubhala umculo ogadla kothile.Inhloso yami wukwenza umculo ozongena ugxile kubantu ngaphandle kokuwuqhathanisa nalo wakamuva," kuqhuba lo mculi.Elinye lamaciko elingumlingisi ophinde abe ngumculi uWiseman Mncube, uthe ukuhlonishwa njengamaciko kuyabagqugquzela ukuthi basebenze kanzima."Kusinika amandla futhi kuyasigqugquzela ukuthi lento esiyenzayo abantu bayayibona, bayayithakasela imisebenzi esiyenzayo okuzokwenza laba abaqhamuka emva kwethu ukuthi nabo baphakamise amasokisi.“Kubanika ithemba lokuthi njengoba senza, asenzeli ize kodwa basinika amandla okuthi sizimisele siqhubeke siye phambili," usho kanje.UNgqongqoshe woMnyango uMnuz uZizi Kodwa uthe kubalulekile ukuthi amaciko abongwe ngomsebenzi omuhle awenzayo."Njengomnyango sibone kubalulekile ukuthi sibabonge ngomsebenzi abawenzela izwe.“Iningi labo eliphesheya kwezilwandle liphakamisa igama laseNingizimu Afrika. Namuhla sihlangene kanti abanye babo abasekho kodwa kubalulekile ukuthi amaciko ahlangane," usho kanje.

UTHEMBISA ukuqinisa ezokuvikelwa kwemali uNgqongqoshe wezemiSebenzi kaHulumeni neNgqalasizinda uMnuz Dean Macpherson, emva kokwebiwa kukaR300 million emnyangweni.Le mali uveze ukuthi yebiwe eminyakeni engu-10 edlule.Esitatimendini uveze ukuthi kusengenzeka inyuke imali eyebiwe emnyangweni.“Uphenyo mayelana nokwebiwa kwale mali luyaqhubeka. Le mali yebiwa kusetshenziswa ubuchwepheshe kanti lolu daba silubike ezinhlakeni zokuphepha ezehlukene okubalwa oKlebe, emaphoyiseni, iState Security Agency nongoti kwezobuchwepheshe.” Uthe isehlakalo sakamuva sokwebiwa kwemali senzeke ngoMeyi nonyaka. “Kulesi sehlakalo kwebiwe uR24 million. Kucacile ukuthi izigebengu zithole inkundla yokudlalela emnyangweni. Yinto okumele engabe kade yabanjwa. Kuyacaca ukuthi kudingeka siqinise amabhawodi ezintweni ezithinta imali emnyangweni, yinto okumele siyenze ngokushesha.”Zine izisebenzi zomnyango ezisemazingeni ahlukene okuphatha ezimisiwe mayelana nalolu daba kanti kushaqwe nama-laptop angu-30.Uveze ukuthi abakwazi ukuvumela izinswelaboya zizixebulele umkhoma emalini yabakhokhi bentela.“Yimali okumele ngabe isebenza ukuphucula ingqalasizinda ezweni. Uphenyo lwethu luzobheka yonke indawo, sifuna ukubamba ongqondongqondo nalabo abahlomulayo kulokhu kwebiwa kwemali. Ngifuna ukubabona betholoza ejele,” kusho uMacpherson.Unxuse abenza uphenyo ukuthi balusheshise ukuze bavale lesi sahluko.Lo mnyango phambilini wamemezela ukuthi wenza uphenyo mayelana nezimbobo ezikhona ezintweni ezithinta ubuchwepheshe.Waveza ukuthi usebenzisana nezinhlaka ezehlukene okubalwa ibhange i-Absa nebhange lombuso, iSouth African Reserve Bank, ukulwa nale nkinga yokuba ntekenteke kohlelo lwalo mnyango oluthinta ubuchwepheshe.

Ligcine linquma ukuthi lihlehliselwe inamuhla icala lokubulawa kowayengunozinti weBafana Bafana ne-Orlando Pirates, uSenzo Meyiwa, ijaji ngesikhathi ummeli echitha imephu obekuzofakazwa ngayo ngoLwesine.Ngokwezinhlelo, bekuzogxilwa emephini ekhombisa imibhishongo okuthiwa kwakudonsa kuyo amaselula abamangalelwa ngosuku okwabulawa ngalo uMeyiwa.Nokho kuthe uMshushisi woMbuso, u-Advocate Ronnie Sibanda, eselungiselela ukuhola ubufakazi bemephu bukaNksz Pinky Vythilingm, oyisikhulu senkampani yamaselula iVodacom, washaya phansi ngonyawo u-Adv Charles Mnisi, ongummeli kammangalelwa wesithathu, uMthobisi Mncube.UMnisi uthe yena ubelindele ukuthi kulethwa imephu ekhombisa zonke izindawo ezithintekayo ngesigameko.USibanda uveze ukuthi bona ngokwabo, bebethe uNksz Vythilingam akalethe imephu ekhombisa kuphela indawo eyakhele imibhishongo okuthiwa iyathinteka.“Anginaso isiqiniseko sokuthi yiziphi ezinye izindawo abazifunayo,” kusho uSibanda ebhekise kuMnisi ngesiphakamiso sakhe.UMokgoatlheng ubuzisise uSibanda ukuthi emephini kuvezwe kuphela izindawo uMbuso ozibone zibaluleke kuwo, uSibande uphendule ngelithi izindawo ezivezwa yimephu yilezo ezibalulwa uSection 205.Enza isibonelo, uMnisi uthe bazame kaningi ukuthola ukuthi ithawa ethile ikuphi nendawo, wengeza ngokuthi ngisho nehostela, iBasuthu (okuthiwa abasolwa baya kulo) aliveli kule mephu abakhonjiswa yona.“Ezinye zalezi zindawo ezingaveli, sizobuza imibuzo ngazo uma sesihloma ufakazi ngemibuzo,” kusho uMnisi.Ugcizelele ngelithi okwamanje uMbuso usakhetha izindawo ezithandwa yiwo, hhayi lezi abazifunayo bengabameli.“Sicele ukuthi basikhombise ukuthi ikuphi iBasuthu Hostel kule mephu, basitshela ukuthi kungenzeka ukuthi ila ingezansi, asikwazi ke ukusebenza ngento enjalo,” kubhikisha uMnisi.URatha ugcine enquma ukuthi ayiguqe inkantolo, uMnisi athole ithuba elanele lokuthi enze uhlu lwazo zonke izindawo afuna ukuzibona emephini, alunike uNksz Vythilingam ukuze abuye nalo namuhla.UVythilingm uveze ukuthi nakuba kungahle kube nzima ukwenza okushiwo uMnisi ngesikhathi esifishane kodwa uzozama ngakho konke okusemandleni.

UMMANGALELWA wesithathu ecaleni lokusocongwa kwephoyisa loMkhandlu weTheku, uxwayiswe yinkantolo ngokuthi akahlukane nokuzama ukuxhumana nofakazi baleli cala.Izolo eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini bekuvele abamangalelwa abathathu abasolwa ngokuba ongqondongqondo ekusocongweni kukaCaptain Zwelakhe Thomas Ntombela.UNtombela wadutshulwa esemzini wakhe okwaS eMlaza ngoMeyi 3 nyakenye.Waphuthunyiswa eSiphingo Medical Towers okuyilapho okwafike kwamenela khona.Abamangalelwa kuleli cala nguNkk Faith Nongcebo Ntombela owayegane umufi, kube yinkabi evele isezikhindini uKhulani Cele noMnuz Justice Khumalo onguthishanhloko waseMpumulwane Primary, KwaMaphumulo.Izolo kuvele ukuthi uKhumalo uke wazama ukuxhumana nabanye ofakazi kuleli cala.IJaji uBruce Bedderson limxwayisile uKhumalo ngalesi senzo sakhe."Awuvumelekile ukuthi ungaxhumana nanoma yimuphi ufakazi kuleli cala. Lokho kungukuphula imibandela yakho yebheyili. Ngiyethemba uyakuqonda lokho."Umthombo osondelene nalolu daba uveza ukuthi uKhumalo uvakashele inkabi esivele isejele uMzo Ntombela okunguyena owadubula.Kuthiwa uzame ukumnxenxa ukuba angabethuli ubufakazi kuleli cala okanye angaliphathi igama lakhe uma esebethula.Umthombo uthe kukhona uKhumalo akuthembise inkabi uma izolandela umyalelo wakhe.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi le nkabi yagonyuluka yaveza konke okwenzeka ngokusocongwa kukamufi maqede inkantolo yayigweba.Yadalula ukuthi ibikade isebenzisana noNkk Ntombela nabanye. Yaveza nokuthi yanunuselwa ngesamba semali enkulu eyahluleka ukusenqaba.UMshushisi uKrishen Shaah ukuvezile eNkantolo izolo ukuthi batholile ukuthi uKhumalo uke wenza imizamo enjalo.Ummeli kaKhumalo u-Advocate Mdu Mvune uphikile ukuthi lokhu kuke kwenzeka phambilini.Icala lihlehlele uJulayi 25 ukuze uCele athole ummeli.

UMNDENI usola ukuthi liqale labanjwa inkunzi, lashaywa lase liyabulawa ilungu lawo, isidumbu salo esitholakale silahlwe epulazini eliseGuzulu, eMpangeni ngoLwesihlanu.Umufi uMnuz Lindani Mtholephi Mkhwanazi (28) ugcine ukubonakala ephila ngo-Ephreli 4.Kuthiwa wacela u-lift ngo-8 ebusuku elolini elilayisha izimoto elalipake egaraji okwethiwa kulona uphethroli eHluhluwe.Kuvela ukuthi wayekade elibangise eSikhaleni eJ1 lapho abekade eqashe khona.Izithombe ezizungeza ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, ezisuselwa kwividyo, ziveza uMkhwanazi engena kuleli loli elingabonakali kahle izinombolo zalo.Udadewabo kamufi, uNksz Buhle Mkhwanazi uthe umndeni awungabazi ukuthi umfowabo ubulawe abantu ayekade ecele kubona u-lift.“Labantu bamshaya waphuma amazinyo futhi belingekho ikhadi lasebhange ngesikhathi etholakala.“Ubegqoke isikibha, i-trunk nebhulukwe ebese lisemaqakaleni okungezona izingubo zakhe,” kusho uNksz Mkhwanazi ngosizi.Uqhube wathi ifoni kamufi ithathwe amaphoyisa, umndeni wasala nesikhwama semali sikamufi oshiye emhlabeni ingane eyodwa eneminyaka eyisikhombisa.UNksz Mkhwanazi udalule ukuthi umufi uneziqu zeMechanical Engineering athweswa zona  ngo-2022.Uveze ukuthi ushona nje ubesezinhlelweni zokuqala ibhizinisi lakhe emuva kokwesula emsebenzini eThekwini.“ULindani unayo eyakhe imoto kodwa wayishiya eSikhaleni ngesikhathi evakasha ekhaya eBhekabadletshe ngePhasika.“Sisola ukuthi wacela ulift esebuyela emuva nokuyilapho eduke khona njengoba etholakala eseshonile,” kusho uNksz MkhwanaziUchaze nokuthi akukho ukulimala nezibazi umufi akade enazo emzimbeni, balinde umbiko kadokotela wokuhlolwa kwesidumbu okuyiwona ozocacisa ukuthi ubulawe yini futhi kanjani.“Siyasola ukuthi isidumbu sakhe siqale sagcinwa endaweni ethile ngaphambi kokuthi siyolahlwa eGuzule. ”Besingonakele futhi singadliwanga yizilwane,” kusho uNksz Mkhwanazi.Uthe bathole ngomufi emuva kokuthi efonelwe owesifazane omtshele ukuthi ubona isidumbu sendoda efana nalena esesithombeni ezinkundleni zokuxhumana abebecele khona ukufuniswa.Ucingo lwelanywe olunye lowesilisa osho into efanayo. UNksz Mkhwanazi uthe bafike endaweni yesigameko esethathwe ngamaphoyisa umufi, kodwa bamhlonze  emakhazeni.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Ntal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa aseMpangeni avule idokodo ngemuva kokutholakala kwesidumbu sowesilisa ebese siqala ukonakala ngoLwesihlanu."Umbiko wokuhlolwa kwesidumbu iwona ozocacisa ngembangela yokufa," kusho uNetshiunda.--

UTHOLWE necala lokuzama ukubulala nokudlwengula owayeyisosha, ongamtshelanga ayethandana naye ukuthi uphila negciwane lengculazi agcina emthelela ngalo.ULeon Santos Conga utholwe necala yiMantshi uFikiswa Ntlati enkantolo yasePitoli ngoLwesibili.Umgilwa, u-Antoinette Ndishishi, obemelwe wuphiko lwezokushushisa lwe-AfriForum wabika lolu daba kulo ngo-2018.I-AfriForum yaphoqa iSouth African National Defence Force (SANDF) ukuthi ikhiphe umlando wezempilo kaConga owaveza ukuthi wayazi ngokuthi unegciwane kusuka ngo-2007.Ithe ukunqaba kweSANDF ukuthi ikhiphe umlando kaConga kwenza ukuthi uphiko lwezokushushisa umphakathi, iNational Prosecuting Authority (NPA), iluhoxise kabili udaba enkantolo.Esitatimendeni, i-AfriForum ithe imantshi ithole uConga enecala lokudlwengula ngoba uNdishishi wavuma ukuthi baye ocansini ngoba azi ukuthi akanalo igciwane. Ithe inkantolo ibamukele ubufakazi bukaNdishishi bokuthi ukuba uConga wasidalula isimo sakhe, wayengeke avume ukuthi balale njengoba lezi zithandani zakhuluma ngalolu daba kodwa uConga wayigodla imininingwane.UConga kuthiwa utholwe necala lokuzama ukubulala ngoba wathelela uNdishishi ngegciwane azi ukuthi unalo futhi wangamtshela.UNdishishi ubonge i-AfriForum, wathi ngaphambi kwayo ubesekwa wunina kuphela."Ngizwa ngathi ngithole ubulungiswa ngoba utholwe enamacala kuwona womabili, okungelokuzama ukubulala nokudlwengula. Uma ngikhuluma iqiniso, ngikhalile ngesikhathi ngizwa imantshi imthola necala. Ngikhale ngoba sengilwe iminyaka eyisikhombisa ngakho bengijabule. Kungaba kuhle ukuthi nabanye besifazane bavele bazibike izigameko ezinje ngoba eNingizimu Afrika baningi abatheleleka ngeHIV."Icala lihlehliselwe u-Agasti 7.

USEHAMBA ethuka izanya ngenxa yezinsolo ezibhekiswe kuyena unina wowesifazane owadutshulwa wabulawa kwaboshwa umyeni wakhe oyisosha.UNkk Gwen Msane ongunina kaNkk Tania Msane-Zungu, uthe njengoba sekusondela ukuqala kokuqulwa kwecala usebekwa amabala, yonke into embi ibhekiswe kuyena.Ukhale ngomndeni wesosha lombutho wezokuvikela kuleli elingummangalelwa, uMnuz Lwanda Zungu, athe umsola ngezinto eziningi.“Amakhadi asebhange nezimpahla zikammangalelwa ezathathwa kuthiwa zikumina,” kubalisa uNkk Msane.Ubekade evevezela, amehlo ebomvu ebambe izinyembezi, eqalaza nasemaceleni ngesikhathi enekela intatheli usizi kwakhe.Uthe lezi zinto asolwa ngazo okubalwa namakhadi asebhange, kwathathwa odadewabo bakaZungu kodwa manje sekukhonjwa kuyena.“Kwayena ubaba wabantwana (uZungu) ubengabhekani nomndeni wakhe kodwa ngoba esenze le nto (esolwa ngokubulala), usehlangene nawo, balwa nami,” kuchaza uNkk Msane.Uthe uma eza enkantolo bakhona abamkhaphayo kodwa akasuki nabo eMlaza, lapho ehlala khona.UNkk Msane uthe udinga ukuvikelwa, kube khona umuntu omlandayo eMlaza, ambuyisele khona emuva kwecala ngoba uyasaba.Lo wesifazane uze wacela iphoyisa elingumphenyi wecala ukuba aphume nalo enkantolo, egajwe uvalo.UZungu usolwa ngokubulala umkakhe ngokumdubula amahlandla ayisithupha emqaleni nasesifubeni ngoJanuwari, nonyaka.UMbuso usola ukuthi wakwenza lokhu phambi kwezingane zakhe benoNkk Msane, maqede wabaleka. Wanyamalala emuva kwesigameko, kwadlula izinsukwana wazinikela emaphoyiseni eqhutshwa ummeli wakhe.Inkantolo yasichitha isicelo sakhe sebheyili.NgoLwesibili, ubekade evele phambi kweNkantolo yeMantshi yasePinetown okuyiyona ezolalela icala lakhe.Icala libuyela kule enkantolo ngoSepthemba 3, ukuze kwenziwe izethulo zokuqala zokuqulwa kwecala.Laba abashadene banezingane ezimbili ndawonye. Phambilini, uNkk Msane wathi uZungu wayeyihlukumeza indodakazi yakhe kwaze kwaba ugcina eyibulele.Ngakolunye uhlangothi, abakubo kaZungu basola umufi ngokuphinga nomuntu wesilisa obesondelene kakhulu nalo mndeni, nokuyinto abathi yanenga kakhulu ummangalelwa.Njengenjwayelo uZungu, oqatha ngomzimba, ungene enkantolo eshesha. Ubegqoke isikibha esimhlobhe nebhulukwe elikuhlaza namateku.Ungena enkantolo ame phuhle adedele izingalo. Akatolikelwa kwazise usuke ekuzwa njengoba kunjalo okusuke kukhulunywa ngesiNgisi enkantolo.
