UBUMBONGI ngenye yezinhlobo zobuciko ezimqoka kakhulu nobubamba iqhaza ukwedlulisa umyalezo obalulekile ebantwini, futhi buqwashisa nomphakathi ngokumele ukugweme, nokho kuyakhathaza ukuthi izimbongi zingachumi ngobuciko. Usho njalo uDkt Gcinile Thwala, othweswe iziqu zobudokotela kuleli sonto e-University of Johannesburg (UJ), ngocwaningo alwenzile olubheka izingqinamba ezibhekana nezimbongi, luhluba udlubu ekhasini ngokungenziwa ukuxazululula leyo nkinga.Elandisa Isolezwe Ngempelasonto ngalolu cwaningo olusihloko sithi Ubunkondlo Obutholakala Ezinkondlweni ZikaNqobile Msawenkosi Duma: Inqanawe Yangempela, uthe uhlatshwe umxhwele wubuciko baleli ciko laseMlaza eningizimu yeTheku. “Ngikhule ngivele ngizithanda kakhulu izinkondlo, kusukela ngisafunda emabangeni aphansi, okuthe sengizoqala lolu cwaningo ngazithanda izinkondlo zikaNqanawe, ngigculiswa yindlela azihlupha ngayo ngokucwaninga ngezindikimba ahaya ngazo, nomyalezo awedlulisa ngezinkondlo zakhe,” usho kanje.Eqhuba, uDkt Thwala odabuka Osizweni, eNewcastle, enyakatho yaKwaZulu-Natal, uthe uqale ukwenza lolu cwaningo lweminyaka emithathu, ngo-2021 waze waluphothula ngonyaka odlule.“Inhloso yami wukuveza ubumqoka bezinkondlo, ngiqhakambise ukubaluleka kwezimbongi emphakathini ukuzama ukuqeda inkinga yokubukeleka kwazo phansi, nokusalela kwazo emuva uma ziqhathaniswa namanye amaciko emhlabeni,” kusho yena.Uthe kuyamkhathaza ukuthi namanje izikhungo eziningi zemfundo zisasebenzisa imiqulu yezincwadi zamaciko amadala, amanye awo angasekho emhlabeni, ekubeni ekhona amaciko anjengoNqanawe Yangempela, enza umsebenzi omuhle.“Lokho kwakha isithombe esibi esenza kube sengathi amaciko amanje awanayo imisebenzi esezingeni eliphezulu, kanti akunjalo. Ngalolu cwaningo ngizoguqula konke lokho, ngenze umehluko ngolwazi esenginalo ngalokhu,” kusho uDkt Thwala.Uthe uziqhenya kakhulu ngokuthi yena nozakwabo uDkt Nomfundo Mbatha, babe ngabokuqala ukwenza, baphothule ucwaningo lwabo lwezifundo zobudokotela ngesiZulu e-UJ.

UKUSHAYA isicabha etekisini kube yisitebhisi sokuqala esimkhuphulele phezulu ofundisa esikhungweni semfundo ephakeme, iDurban University of Technology, obethweswa iziqu zobudokotela yile nyuvesi emkhakheni weManagement Sciences.UDkt Simiso Mabaso (42), ongowokudabuka eBergville, uthi kudingeke ashaye iminyaka emibili yonke etekisini lomngani kamalume wakhe eMlaza, ukuzama ukuqoqa imali yokubhalisa enyuvesi emva kokuthi ephothule umatric ngo-1998.Uthweswe iziqu, iDoctor of Philosophy, kwiManagement Sciences egxile kakhulu emkhakheni wezokupheka nokuvakasha, wuphiko lwale nyuvesi oluseMgungundlovu, Indumiso, kuleli sonto.“Ngesikhathi ngiphothula umatric nginikele eThekwini ukubheka isikhala enyuvesi. Ngamukelwa yile nyuvesi kodwa bengingenayo imali yokubhalisa. Bengingafuni ukubuyela ekhaya ngilambatha ngakho nginqume ukuthi ngibheke amatoho. Omunye wabangani bakamalume ubewumnikazi wetekisi elihambela eMlaza Kwa-M naKwa-R, wangiqasha njengomsizi womshayeli,” usho kanje.Uthe imali ayeyithola enza lo msebenzi yayimsiza ukuthi kube khona ayihambisa ekhaya, aziphilise ngayo nokubeka eyokubhalisa. Emva kweminyaka emibili eqhuba lo msebenzi ngokugcwele, ngo-2001 wabuyela kulesi sikhungo waqala ngokwenza iNational Certificate emkhakheni, i-Tour Guiding, esiwunyaka. Ngesikhathi efunda, bekuthi ngempelasonto nangamaholidi aqhubeke nomsebenzi wokushaya isicabha ukuzenzela imali yokumelana nezinye izindleko. Ngo-2002 wenze iNational Diploma in Tourism Management okuthe ngo-2010 waphothula iMaster’s Degree emkhakheni ofanayo.Uqale ukwenza iziqu zobudokotela kulo mkhakha ngo-2021 enza ucwaningo ngaphansi kweso likaSolwazi D Hlongwa. Ucwaningo lwakhe belugxile ekubhekeni iqhaza elibanjwe abamabhizinisi emphakathini ukuqinisekisa uzinzo emnothweni wezokuvakasha eBergville.Ngokwalolu cwaningo, uveza ukuthi umkhakha wamabhizinisi asemphakathini usuthole ukunakwa kakhulu ngenxa yobumqoka bawo ekuqhakambiseni isintu, imvelo nenhlalo ezindaweni zasemakhaya.Uthe ukwenziwa kocwaningo kudinga ukuthi uhambele izindawo ezihlukene ukucosha ulwazi oludingekayo okuyinto edinga imali. Uthe lokhu kungenye yezinselelo abhekane nazo ngesikhathi esenza i-PhD yakhe njengoba ubezame ukuthola uxhaso kodwa wehluleka.Uthe uhlose ukuqhubekela phambili kwezemfundo kanti uyakuthakasela ukufundisa izitshudeni ezisuke zizokwenza unyaka wokuqala enyuvesi kwazise kulapho okusuke kwakhiwa isisekelo khona.

USUZOLUTHOLA eduzane usizo lwezempilo umphakathi waseMbumbulu namaphethelo emuva kokunikelelwa kukaMasipala weTheku ngomtholampilo ongumahamba nendlwana.Izolo iMeya yeTheku, uMnuz Cyril Xaba, yamukele umacekecele weveni enobuchwepheshe besimanje umasipala oxhaswe ngayo abakwaToyota.Umkhandlu uthi abantu baseMdumezulu naseMadundube bebethwala isiphambano uma izulu liyidliva kungafinyeleleki emtholampilo.Kuthiwa lokhu bekudalwa yimigwaqo emibi eyibhuqu okungahambeki nhlobo kuyona uma izulu lina.UXaba ubonge wanconcoza kwaToyota wathi lo mtholampilo uzoba isixazululo ezinkingeni lapho umnyango wabo wezempilo uhluleka khona ukuhlinzeka abantu usizo ngenxa yobude bendlela.“Siyajabula siwumasipala ukuthi abakwaToyota bathathe isinqumo sokuthi basihlinzeke ngomtholampilo ongumahamba nendlwana ozosiza abantu baseMbumbulu. Siyophumelela siyisizwe uma kukhona ukusebenzisana nabomkhakha wamabhizinisi,” kusho uXaba.Umengameli ophinde abe isikhulu esiphezulu kwaToyota South Africa Motors, uMnuz Andrew Kirby, uthe bajabulile ngoba kubathathe iminyaka bakhela umasipala iveni yezempilo.UKirby uthe bakhe umahamba nendlwana ukuze kube lula ukuba ufinyelele ezindaweni lapho usizo lwempilo lungafiki khona kalula.“Kuyasijabulisa ukusebenza ngokuhlanganyela noMnyango wezeMpilo nomasipala. Sekunezinyanga siyihlola, siqinisekisa ukuthi imelana nanoma isiphi isimo,” kuchaza uKirby.Umtholampilo ongumahamba nendlwana kuthiwa wakhiwe waba sezingeni eliphezulu futhi uyakwazi ukumelana nanoma isiphi isimo somgwaqo nezulu.Kuvela ukuthi unethangi lamanzi eziguli, iWiFi, ama-solar panels, umbhede, i-microwave, ifriji namawindi.

KUMISWE ukufungiswa kwamalungu amasha eqembu Umkhonto weSizwe ePhalamende kuze kuxazululwe eyecala elifakwe abebengamalungu aleli qembu, abahoxiswa ezikhundleni zabo.Amalungu ayishumi kwangu-18 ahoxiswa yiMK ePhalamende, aye enkantolo enkulu yaseWestern Cape, efuna kumiswe ukufungiswa kwala malungu kuphinde kuchithwe ukuhoxiswa kobulungu bawo. Inkantolo ilihlehlisele inyanga ezayo icala ukuze inike ithuba izinhlaka ezehlukene okubalwa uSomlomo wePhalamende neMK  ithuba lokufaka amaphepha kule nkantolo.Okhulumela iPhalamende uMnuz Moloto Mothapo, uthe akukho lungu leMK elizofungiswa kuze kuxazululwe lolu daba enkantolo.Ekhuluma nabezindaba ngaphandle kwenkantolo izolo ummeli wala malungu, weWendy Cele and Associates, uthe icala lihlehlele uSepthemba 3, 2024.Uthe bafake isicelo esiphuthumayo sokuthi akungafungiswa amalungu amasha ezikhundleni zamalungu ahoxiswa yiqembu.“Amalungu akhala ngokuthi awazazi izizathu zokuhoxiswa kobulungu eqenjini okwenze ahoxiswa njengamalungu ePhalamende. Afuna kungafungiswa amalungu amasha ezikhundleni zawo. Amalungu angakhishwa ezindaweni ahlala kuzona ePhalamende,” kusho ummeli.Uveze ukuthi amanye alawa malungu ashiya emisebenzini ayeyenza ayomela leli qembu ePhalamende.Kwenzeka lokhu nje ibhekwe ngabomvu inkulumo yomholi waleli qembu, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, obize isithangami lapho ezokhuluma khona nesizwe eGoli namhlanje.Angu-18 amalungu iMK eyahoxisa ubulungu bawo ikhala ngokuthi abanye babo bangena ngomkhoshosho ohlwini lwabantu ababezojutshwa yileli qembu.Okhulumela iqembu uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndhlela, uxwayise abaye enkantolo wathi sebezixoshile.Ekhuluma neDaily News enguzakwabo weSolezwe, uthe amalungu angayilandeli imigomo yeqembu azokhonjwa indlela.Uthe abaye enkantolo baya bazi ukuthi basemseni weqembu.“Angiqondi kungani besiyisa enkantolo ngoba baya bazi ukuthi bazosuswa ezikhundleni zabo. Abaya ezinkantolo kumele bazi ukuthi sizobhekana nabo kanzima. Sebefana nabantu abazixoshe bona ngokuya enkantolo,” kusho uNdhlela. Amalungu okulindeleke ukuthi afungiswe kubalwa obeyiphini likamengameli kwi-EFF uMnuz Floyd Shivambu, umculi uPenny Penny, kanjalo nabanye okubalwa uMnuz Brian Molefe, Lucky Montana nabanye.

KUSUKE inkombankombane phakathi kweMeya kuMasipala Umzinyathi, uMnuz Petros Ngubane, nosomabhizinisi waseMsinga osolwa ngokuvalela umphakathi amanzi ekhala ngokungakhokhelwa, okuthiwa sekuyophela inyanga engabonwa endaweni.Abantu kule ndawo kuthiwa sebethembele emanzini abagcina ngokuwakhongozela emvuleni, kulabo abangenawo amandla okuwathenga ezitolo. Kule ndawo kunesibhedlela i-Church of Scotland naso okuthiwa sikhahlamezekile njengoba amanzi engekho. Isolezwe lithinta uNgubane, uvumile ukuthi amanzi awekho endaweni, wathi bathole ukuthi avalwe usonkontileka wenkampani i-FDM Construction enikezwe umsebenzi wokuhambisela umphakathi amanzi ngamaloli, uMnuz Simanga Mabaso, emva kokuthi ekhale ngokungakhokhelwa emva kokuthi emisiwe.“Ngiye kule ndawo ngesonto eledlule emva kokuthola izikhalo ngokungaphumi kwamanzi. Sithole ukuthi esinye isiphehlimanzi sethu sivalwe nguMabaso okuthiwa uxoshe onogada bakamasipala wafaka abakhe, wavala ngokwakhe kule ndawo yokusebenzela. Lesi senzo sibeke engcupheni abasebenzi ngoba akuvunyelwe umuntu ongasiye umsebenzi angene lapha aphinde akhiphe abasebenzi, kanti nempilo nje yabantu baseMsinga uyibeke engcupheni ngoba amanzi yinto ebalulekile. Ngithe abamvulele icala ngalesi senzo, ngenxa yokuthi bengingaphandle kwesifundazwe, ngizozwa ngoLwesibili ukuthi kuqhubekani ngalolu daba,” usho kanje.Ebuzwa ngemali ekweletwa lo somabhizinisi, unqabile ukuphawula wathi udaba lokumiswa kwakhe nenkontileka ethinta ukukhokhelana, kusingethwe yihhovisi leMenenja kuMasipala, yena akangene. Imizamo yokuthola imenenja kumasipala ayiphumelelanga, ucingo lwayo belukhala lungabanjwa nemibuzo athunyelelwe yona ayiphendulwanga kwaze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela.Kuthintwa uMabaso, ukuvumile ukuthi phambilini sikhona isiphehlimanzi asivalile nokuyindlela abezama ukuveza ngayo ilaka lakhe, njengoba umasipala umkweleta u-R700 000 ongakhokhiwe osekuphele izinyanga. Uthe ubuye wavula ngoMsombuluko odlule emva kokuvumelana ngokuthi uzokhokhelwa lingakapheli leli sonto. Yize esho kanje uMabaso nanamuhla amanzi awekho. Ngokusho kwakhe lokhu sekudalwa ukuthi eminye imishini kulesi siphehlimanzi ifile kwazise umasipala ukweleta omunye usonkontileka imali yokulungisa lemishini.“Okokuqala; angikuveze ukuthi angixoshwanga wumasipala kodwa ngixoshwa uNgubane. Ungixoshe emva komcimbi weqembu i-MK (Party) esengiyilungu layo, obesezinkundleni zezemidlalo (eMphelankani), ngoMashi 20, okuthe emva kwawo ngaziswa ukuthi amaloli ami awasadingeki. Ngilindile-ke ukuthi ngokuphela kukaMashi njengoba sengixoshiwe ngizokhokhelwa imali engikweletwa yona, kodwa lutho. Kwaphela u-Ephreli ngangakhokhelwa ngagcina ngibona ukuthi indlela engingakwazi ukubhikisha ngayo ukuze ngithole okungokwami ukuvala isiphehlimanzi kodwa sengisivulile kodwa amanzi awaphumi ngoba sifile,” usho kanje.UMabaso uthe uvala nje isiphehlimanzi bese kuvele kunesikhathi eside singasebenzi ngenxa yokufa kwaso, kanti  naye inkinga yamanzi yinto emlimaze kakhulu njengoba enamabhizinisi ehlukene kuleya ndawo.  Uveze  ukuthi Umsinga wonke amanzi awekho kubalwa nasezikhungweni zikahulumeni ezisiza umphakathi, wathi kunamahlebezi okuthi ngoLwesine kungase kube nokhukhulengoqo wesiteleka lapho abantu bezobhikishela amanzi osekunesikhathi eside bawagcina.Okhulumela uMnyango wezoBusa ngokuBambisana uMnuz Siboniso Mngadi, uthe umsebenzi wamanzi unikezwe umasipala omkhulu okuyiwona onelungelo lokuxazulula izinkinga zamanzi.“Umasipala nosomabhizinisi kumele bahlale phansi baxoxe ukuthi lolu daba baluxazulula kanjani kungaze kugcine sekuhlukumezeka abantu abangenacala abasuke belindele ukuhlinzekwa ngezidingo,” kusho uMngadi

KUVALWE umngcele iSani Pass ophumela eLesotho ngenxa yeqhwa.Lokhu kuvezwe abe-Border Management Authority SA ngesitatimende esithi iqhwa lingaphezu kuka-6cm izimoto azikwazi ukuhamba. Ukuvalwa kwalo mngcele kulandela isitatimende somnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu KwaZulu-Natal okhiphe isixwayiso kubashayeli ngemigwaqo evaliwe ngenxa yokugcwala kweqhwa. Abezimo eziphuthumayo bathumele lo mlayezo ngemigwaqo evaliwe ngenxa yesimo sezulu. Kunxuswa bonke abasebenza imigwaqo ukuba bangazami ukuhamba kulezi indawo nokusebenzisa 'okhokhoba road'. SEBUTHATHE elinye igxathu ubugebengu baKwaBester, eNanda njengoba kubikwa ukuthi izigelekeqe sezibamba abantu inkunzi ematekisini.Kubikwa ukuthi nasematekisini ahambela eMlaza emzileni wakwaM&R, kukhalwa esifanayo.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe ziyisithupha izigameko KwaBester lapho abasolwa bezenza khona abagibeli ngenhloso yokubamba inkunzi.Ngokusho kwelinye lamalungu aqapha ubugebengu kule ndawo, uMnuz Mfaniseni Mthethwa, lolu hlobo lobugebengu luqale emasontweni amathathu edlule.“Singakuqinisekisa impela ukuthi kuyiqiniso lokho. Siqale ukubikelwa ngakho emasontweni amathathu edlule.“Kuvela ukuthi izigilamkhuba zihamba ngazimbili, zima esitobhini, zimise itekisi sabantu abafuna ukugibela,” kusho uMthethwa.Uqhube wathi, umshayeli wetekisi uvele ame ngenkulu inkululeko, ezitshela ukuthi ngabantu abafuna ukugibela.“Bathi uma bevula isicabha babeke unyawo lokuqala etekisini, kube sengathi bayagibela, ngokuphazima kweso bese bekhipha izibhamu, batshele wonke umuntu osuke engaphakathi ukuthi akalethe iselula yakhe nesikhwama,” kulandisa uMthethwa.Uthi baphinde baphendule umbhobho wesibhamu, ubheke ngakumshayeli, bamfune yonke imali aseyisebenzile.Ubuye waveza ukuthi lezi zigelekeqe azigcini lapho, uma zibone izingubo ezizithandayo zigqokwe ngabagibeli, ziyabakhumulisa zizithathe. Lo mkhuba, uthe wenzeka kusuka KwaBester erenki, uze uyoshaya eDube Village eNanda.Ukhale ngobugebengu obuphezulu, wathi isimo asisalawuleki.Echaza ngokwamenza wajoyina izinhlaka ezilwa nobugebengu nyakenye, uthe kwaba yisigameko sokudlwengulwa kowesifazane wendawo, ngamalungu egenge angu-12.Kwenye i-voice note ethunyelelwe Isolezwe, omunye wabashayeli uveze ukuthi sebeyisithupha abashayeli asebebanjwe inkunzi ematekisini abahamba ngawo.“Bafika noplastic, bathathe yonke into. Mina nje laphaya eZintombini angisagibezi muntu ongimisayo. Laba bafana sebesihlukumeze kakhulu, baphatha izibhamu,” kusho umshayeli.Uthe omunye uzakwabo ubanike uR300, omunye wabasolwa wafaka izinhlamvu esibhamini, watshela umshayeli ukuthi uma eqeda ukuzifaka bazozithulula kuyena zonke.“Bathe imali agoloza nayo akuyona eyakhe ngoba itekisi akuyona eyakhe, ngeke kube ukuthi ngo-4.30 ntambama usasebenze uR300 kuphela, wavele wabanika yonke umshayeli,“ kusho umshayeli.Uthe naKwaBester erenki ngezikhathi zasekuseni, bahlale bedlula abesifazane bekhala ubumayemaye, bephucwa izikhwama.“Kwenye itekisi bathe uma sebeqede ukubabamba inkunzi bababuza ukuthi bayayazi yini iWest, baphendula ngokuthi cha, bathi iWest yibona, banamalungu angu-200, ngeke benziwe lutho,” kusho umshayeli.Umsunguli weNtuzuma Neighbourhood Watch, esisabalale nakwamanye amalokishi eTheku afana noMlaza, KwaMashu neNanda, uMnuz Andile Jali uthe isimo sakuleya ndawo sesidinga iNatonal Intervetion Unit (NIU).Udalule ukuthi sekukhona imindeni esithuthile endaweni, ixoshwa yigenge yeWest ne-East.“Bafuna ukuthi kube khona izindlu ezingahlali muntu ukuze bezothi uma beqeda ukucanasa, bahlale kuzo. ”Leya ndawo ayisalawuleki. Namalungu ethu asenomuzwa wokuthi impilo yawo isengcupheni njengoba eqapha ubugebengu engenazikhali. Lama genge afuna ukuyiphatha indawo,” kusho uJali.Okhulumela iSouth African National Taxi Association (SANTACO)  KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sfiso Shangase uthe lobu bugebengu buyisihlava abasigxekayo.“Sibuhlungu ngoba kuhlukumezeka abagibeli ezimotweni zethu. Siphinde siphathwe kabi wukuthi nathi siyalahlekelwa uma kuphucwa nabashayeli imali abasuke beyisebenzile,” kusho uShangase.Uqhube wathi lukhona uhlelo abaphezu kwalo lokuzama ukuqinisekisa ukuphepha kwabagibeli kulezi zigilamkhuba kodwa wathi akafuni ukudalula yonke into.“Zingaze zithole ngezinhlelo esinazo zokulwisana nobugebengu bazo,” kusho yena.Uphinde wathi bagqugquzela osomatekisi ukuthi bafake amakhamera ematekisini abo ngoba nawo ayasiza ngobufakazi obuqandula ikhanda.Ihhovisi lezokuxhumana emaphoyiseni aKwaZulu-Natal, lithe lidinga imininingwane egcwele ngezigameko ukuze likwazi ukubheka ukuthi akhona yini amacala avuliwe ngalokhu.

BASATHUTHUMELA othisha nabafundi baseMukelani Primary, KwaMashu, kulandela ukungena kwezigebengu - ebezihlome ziyizingovolo ngezibhamu - zaphuca othisha imali namaselula.Lesi sigameko senzeke ngoLwesibili ntambama, kanti izolo abafundi abaningi  nabanye othisha abalubhadanga esikoleni ngenxa yovalo.Kwenzeka lesi sigameko nje, bekusabatshazwa isigameko sangoMsombuluko ekuseni, sokubulawa kukathisha wasePhikiswayo Primary eLindelani, odutshulwe wabulawa ngamadoda amabili okuthiwa angene ngaphakathi esikoleni ngesikhathi kuphithizela kungena abafundi, amdubula washonela emagcekeni esikole. Ngokuthola kweSolezwe, esigamekweni sangoLwesibili unogada wesikole ukhonjwe ngesibhamu esebude buduze nesango lesikole abelikhiyile esawelisa abafundi bamabanga aphansi ebese bephumile ngoba baphuma kuqala esikoleni.Elandisa Isolezwe, usihlalo wesigungu sabazali esikoleni, uNksz Zama Sokhulu, uthe unogada uvule isango esekhonjwe ngesibhamu, sekuthathwe neselula yakhe.Uthe izigebengu eziyisithupha zimqhube zaze zamngenisa egumbini elihlala othisha. Kulo bekunothisha oyedwa nabafundi abebefundisa amagama, eSpelling Bee. Lo thisha nalaba bafundi balaliswe phansi ngezibhamu, uthisha waphoqwa ukuthi akhiphe iselula yakhe. “Izigebengu bezilinda kube nomfundi othunywe kuleli gumbi bese zimkhomba ngesibhamu, zithi akayobiza uthisha wakhe, ucelwa ngothisha abasehhovisi. Uma efika akhonjwe ngesibhamu aphucwe iselula noma kuthiwe akayivule kubhekwe ama-App anawo ukuze kusetshenziswe wona ukukhipha imali. Omunye wothisha ukhiphe uR3 000 obukhona kwi-App, omunye kuthathwe ikhadi lasebhange nenombolo eyimfihlo. Abebengenawo ama-App bashayiwe, omunye wathathelwa ijakhethi,”  kuchaza uNksz Sokhulu.Uqhube wathi kulamule umfundi okuthe uma ethunywa ukuthi ayobiza uthisha wakhe,  waphuma wamemeza, ekhala. Kuphume  abafundi ebebesemakilasini nothisha, izigebengu zabaleka.Izigebengu kuthiwa zithathe nokhiye wemoto yomunye uthisha kodwa zagcina zingakwazanga ukuhamba nayo. Izolo, uthe abafundi abafike esikoleni bangu-40 kwabangu-585 abafunda khona. “Izingane zethu zithukile, eyami ithe isiyesaba ukuya esikoleni ngoba izigebengu zingena nasezikoleni zikhombe othisha nezingane ngezibhamu. Othisha abanye bakhona kodwa nabo bayesaba. Umnyango ubungakasho ukuthi kumele kwenziwenjani. Ngokwethu besifisa ukuthi kufike abeluleka ngezengqondo bakhulume nabafundi nothisha, ukufunda kuze kuqale ngesonto elizayo,” kusho yenaUthe ekuseni kubakhona amaphoyisa kaMasipala weTheku awelisa abafundi, emini awabe esabuya, abafundi baweliswa ngunogada. UMphathiswa wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka, uthe ukhathazekile futhi udabukile ngalesi senzo, wathi ukuphepha nokuvikeleka kothisha nabafundi kubalulekile kakhulu. “Umnyango uzibophezele ngokuhlinzeka ngosizo oludingekayo kothisha nabafundi abahlukumezekile. Sizokwenza okusemandleni ukuqinisa ezokuphepha eMukelani Primary nakwezinye izikole esifundazweni ukuze sigweme izehlakalo ezinjengalesi. Sinxusa abangaba nolwazi ukuthi basondele ukuze kuboshwe izigilamkhuba,” kusho uHlomuka. Esitatimendeni umnyango uthe: “Sinabo onogada kwezinye izikole esifundazweni, kodwa lokho sekubonakele ukuthi akusona isixazululo ngoba kwezinye izikhathi bayahlaselwa baphinde babulawe yizigebengu,” Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa aKwaMashu avule icala lokubamba inkunzi kuhlonyiwe.“Izigebengu eziyisithupha ebezihlomile kuthiwa zingene esikoleni ngoLwesibili, zaphuca othisha amaselula, imali nezimpahla zokugqoka,” kusho uCol Netshiunda.

Ushaywe wuvalo waze wacela umthandazo umculi wowokholo uXolisa Kwinana ngesikhathi ibhanoyi abehamba ngalo lisuka eThekwini liya eKapa lihluleka wukuhlala ngenxa yobuhixihixi laze laphoqeleka ukujika liye eGqeberha, nakhona laba nenkinga.Ngokwe-Flightradar24, ibhanoyi (FA183) lisuke esikhumulweni sezindiza iKing Shaka ngo-7.25 ebusuku ngeSonto liya eKapa kodwa lajika endleleni layohlala eGqeberha.Ngokomlando wohambo kuthe ngo-9.14 seliseWestern Cape kodwa lingakafiki esikhumulweni sezindiza eKapa laqala lazungeza kathathu. Okwesine ngo-9.47 libe selidweba libheke eGqeberha lapho lifike lahlala esikhumulweni sezindiza sakhona ngo-10.32 ebusuku.Ngakusasa ngo-9.11 ekuseni liphinde lazama ukusuka kodwa lajiika ngasolwandle lwaseSt Francis Bay lase lizungeza eGqeberha ngaphambi kokuhlala esikhumulweni sakhona ngo-10.50 ekuseni.Ngokombhalo kaXolisa, libhanoyi lijikele eGqeberha ngenxa yenkinga kagesi esikhumulweni saseKapa."Ngenxa yalokhu, amabhanoyi abengakwazi ukuhlala nokusuka. Sichithe cishe amahora amabili sihleli ebhanoyini eGqeberha.Abantu balale esikhumulweni sezindiza ngenhlanhla mina ngikwazile ukuthola indawo yokuphumula kancane. Ngemuva kuka-2 ekuseni bathumele imiyalezo yokuthi ibhanoyi lizosuka ngo-9 ekuseni," kubhala uXolisa.Uthe ngesikhathi selizosuka, ukapteni umemezele ukuthi ibhanoyi linezinkinga kumele libuyele liyopaka base belinda imizuzu engu-30 ngaphambi kokuthi lisuke."Ngemuva kwemizuzu engu-10 kuya kwengu-15 lisemoyeni, sitshelwe ukuthi ibhanoyi linezinkinga futhi kumele liyohlala ngokushesha eGqeberha."Uthe balinde ibhanoyi elisuka eGoli lizobayisa eKapa."Sicela nisibeke emthandazweni,"  kubhala yena kuFacebook ngoMsombuluko.I-Airports Company South Africa (Acsa) ithe kuye kwaphazamiseka ukuhamba kwamabhanoyi eCape Town International Airport ngenxa yokuthi ugesi ubungekho ngeSonto.Ithe lesi simo siye saphazamisa ukuhamba kwamabhanoyi njengoba ebengakwazi ukungena nokuphuma kulesi sikhumulo. Abethunyelwa kwezinye izikhumulo okubalwa i-O.R. Tambo International Airport, Chief Dawid Stuurman International Airport namanye.Ithe konke bese kulungile ngoLwesibili, yaxolisa ngokuthikamezeka okube khona. Igqugquzele abantu ukuthi bathole i-app yakwa-Acsa ezobavezela ukuhamba kwamabhanoyi.

KUVUNGUZA umoya wokwesaba emalungwini eThekwini Neighbourhood Watch eNanda kulandela ukubulawa kwamalungu amabili ale nhlangano elwa nobugebengu abulawe ezigamekweni ezehlukene ngeSonto ekuseni.Ngokusho kwelinye ilungu lenhlangano, esigamekweni sokuqala, kudutshulwe kwabulawa uMnuz Avela Nomphahla (31) edlala ibhola enkundleni yezemidlalo, i-One, ngaseDube Village.“Uma kungamaSonto, ujwayele ukuthi ayozidlalela ibhola nabafana bendawo, beziqeqeshela imidlalo ababuye babe nayo. Kuqhamuke abalisa ababili, bafike bamdubula. Kuthe kusenjalo bajoyinwa owesithathu, ofike wamqedela,” kulandisa ilungu.Uthe isigameko senzeke phambi kwabanye ebebedlala ibhola, kanti abahlaseli bebezihambela ngezinyawo.Isigameko sesibili, athe senzeke kungakapheli imizuzu engu-30 kwenzeke esokuqala, senzeke eMatendeni, eNewtown C.Kusona uthe kudutshulwe kwabulawa uMnuz Mzwandile Mbambo phambi komndeni wakhe.“Kuthiwa kugasele abalisa abathathu, bafuna ngodli isibhamu kumufi. Kuthiwa uthe uma elandula ethi akanasibhamu yena, bamdubula phambi kwabazukulu bakhe abehleli nabo egumbini lokuphumula,” kusho ilungu.Leli lungu likhombe ngenjumbane iqembu lemigulukudu, iWest, okuthiwa lisalokhu liqhubeka nokuhlalisa lubhojozi umphakathi waseNanda.Uthe amalungu abo ahlalele ovalweni njengoba lezi zigameko zilandela ezinye ezimbili ezenzeke ngeledlule, ngenhlanhla bangafa abebedutshulwa.“NgoLwesibili, kudutshulwe uMnuz Langa, obegada esinye isakhiwo somphakathi, ngenhlanhla wangashona. Sathi sisabheke lokho, ngoLwesine kwadutshulwa uMnuz Cele, naye obeqapha esinye isakhiwo endaweni,” kwenaba ilungu.“Isimo simuncu, wonke umuntu wethukile ngoba siyabona ukuthi inkulu impi ihlasele, futhi ibhekiswe kithina ngqo,” kusho ilungu.Uchaze abafi njengabantu ebebengabufuni nalapho obuhambe khona ubugebengu. Uthe bobabili baneminyaka emithathu bengamalungu enhlangano.Umsunguli wenhlangano, uMnuz Andile Jali unxuse uNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa kuzwelonke uMnuz Bheki Cele noKhomishana wamaPhoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLiutenant General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi ukuba basondele nekhambi lokulwa nobugebengu kule ndawo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa aseNanda aphenya amacala amabili okubulala kulandela ukubulawa kwababili ezigamekweni ezehlukene. '"Esigamekweni sokuqala, owesilisa (30) udutshulwe enkundleni yezemidlalo eNewtown C abasolwa abathathu, kwesesibili khona eNewtown C, owesilisa (60) udutshulwe abasolwa abathathu ezibukela ithelevishini nomndeni wakhe," kusho uNetshiunda.Uthe abasolwa abakaziwa okwamanje nembangela yokubulala ayikaziwa kanti amaphoyisa asaphenya ukuthi ngabe lezi zigameko zihlobene yini.

BAHLALELE ovalweni osomabhizinisi abangabanikazi bezindawo zokucima ukoma emva kokusocongwa kwabanye babo kulandelana. Lokhu kuza emva kokudutshulwa kubulawe uMnuz Zola Kweyama wakwa-A eMlaza. Kuvela ukuthi udutshulwe ekuseni ngabesilisa abathathu abafike bazenza abantu abazothenga utshwala. “Sididekile ukuthi kungani ebulewe ngesihluku esingaka uKweyama ngoba ubengumuntu wabantu,” kusho umthombo.UKweyama udutshulwe ngoyaba lwezinhlamvu waphelela endaweni yesigameko. Udutshulwa nje kusasa kuzobe kungcwatshwa umelaphi wendabuko, uMnuz Nhlanhla Cele, uSbushebushe,  naye obenendawo yokucima ukoma encikene nekaKweyama.Naye uCele wadutshulwa ngeledlule esendaweni yakhe yokucima ukoma, iYellow Lounge, ngamadoda angaziwa. Badutshulwa nje emasontweni edlule kwadutshulwa umnikazi wendawo yokucima ukoma ese-Reunion, engekho kude naseMlaza.Khona eMlaza kwa-E kunowesilisa obenendawo yokucima ukoma naye okuthiwa ubulawe ngendlela efanayo.Ezinyangeni ezedlule kusocongwe induna yaseMbumbulu, nayo ebinendawo yokucima ukoma khona eMbumbulu.Nayo yadutshulwa ngoyaba lwezinhlamvu ngamadoda angaziwa ngesikhathi esevala endaweni yakhe.EMgungundlovu, ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka, kwabulawa owesifazane obenendawo yokucima ukoma ngokudutshulwa.Lokhu sekudale itwetwe kubanikazi bezindawo zokucima ukoma.USihlalo weSisonke Liquor Traders KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Brush Mncadi, uthe bakhathazekile ngokwanda kwezigameko zokusocongwa kwabo.“Sihlalele ovalweni ngoba asazi sixabene nobani. Akekho futhi umuntu oseke weza kithina ezobeka isikhalo sakhe ngathi. Lokho kusishiya ebumnyameni ukuthi kwenzekani njengoba sibulawa. “Kumanje sesicabanga nokuthi sithole onogada abazosiqapha kodwa nakhona sinenkinga yokuthi asinayo imali eyanele ukuthi singabakhokhela,” kusho uMncadi.UMncadi uqhube wathi abasaqondi noma abahlaseli babo kunomyalezo abaqonde ukuwudlulisa yini ukuze uma sebekhuluma kuzwakale.Uqhube wathi into ebaphatha kabi ukuthi lezi zigameko ziphazamisa osomabhizinisi abamnyama.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uCol Robert Netshiunda, uthe esigamekweni sayizolo kuphenywa icala lokubulawa kowesilisa oneminyaka engu-57 obengumnikazi wendawo yokucima ukoma. “Kule ndawo yokucima ukoma kungene owesilisa ephethe isibhamu esikhulu wadubula ebhekise kumnikazi wendawo obemi ngemuva kwetafula lokudayisa. Emva kwemizuzwana kuphinde kwangena omunye wesilisa ephethe isibhamu esincane waqhubeka wadubula umnikazi wendawo yokucima ukoma esemdubulela eduze. Baqede lapho baphuma babaleka, kumanje basathungathwa abenze lokhu,” kusho uCol Netshiunda.

BAYATHUTHUMELA abantu base-Nairobi, eKenya, kweqa ejele iziboshwa ezingu-13 okukhona kuzo nomalugaju osenqume wabulala inqwaba yabantu besifazane.Ngokombiko wamaphoyisa aseKenya, laba beqe esitokisini samaphoyisa eNairobi.Ngokusho kwamaphoyisa, uCollins Khalusha oneminyaka engu-33 ubudala okuthiwa uzivumele yena amacala okunquma abulale abesifazane abangu-42, uphakathi kwabantu abangu-13 abeqe esitokisini samaphoyisa eNairobi.UKhalusha uchazwe ngamaphoyisa “njengomuntu onobulwane nongaphilile kahle ekhanda ngesikhathi eboshwa ngoJulayi, ngemuva kokutholwa kwezidumbu endaweni eyaziwayo enhlokodolobha yaseKenya.Amaphoyisa athe ngoLwesibili, iphoyisa eliphethe nomphathi wenkantini esiteshini samaphoyisa iGigiri, babone ukuthi abasolwa bebengekho ngesikhathi beyobanika isidlo sasekuseni ngo-5 ekuseni.Kuthiwa uKhalusha nezinye iziboshwa ezidabuka e-Eritrea futhi eziboshelwe izinsolo zokuba eKenya ngokungemthetho, basika izintambo ezitokisini zabo base beqa udonga.UMohamed Amin oyinhloko yophiko oluphenya ngamacala obugebengu, utshele i-Associated Press ukuthi kuyishwa ukweqa kwalaba basolwa. “Lona bekungumsolwa onobungozi kakhulu obhekene namacala abucayi. Siyasiphenya lesi sigameko futhi sizothatha izinyathelo ezifanele,” kusho u-Amin.Ngokusho kwamaphoyisa, uKhalusha uzivumele yena amacala okubulala abesifazane abangu-42 eminyakeni emibili edlule, waphonsa izidumbu zabo enkwalini okumanje isisetshenziswa njengendawo yokulahla udoti. Kwatholakala okungenani amasaka angu-10 anezitho zomzimba ezinqunyiwe kule ndawo.

KUNGENZEKA sande isibalo sabashone kuhlasela  izikhukhula ezihlasele eMargate, ePort Shepstone ngeSonto ntambama.Lokhu kudalulwe okhulumela uMasipala Ugu, uMnuz France Zama ngesikhathi ekhuluma neSolezwe mayelana nomshophi obavelele kule ndawo.Uthe okwamanje bahlanu abantu abangaqinisekisa ukuthi bashonile ngenxa yezikhukhula.Uthe kunezimoto ezivaleleke ngaphansi kwebhuloho eliya eMargate ngasemfuleni iNkangweni."Sizobheka ukuthi izimoto ezivaleleke ngaphansi kwaleliya bhuluho bezinabantu yini noma cha. Uma kwenzeka ukuthi bezinabantu kuyacaca ukuthi sizokwanda isibalo sabantu abadlule emhlabeni bakule ndawo ngenxa yezikhukhula,'' usho kanje.Ukhale kakhulu ngomonakalo athe mkhulu odalwe yilzikhukhula. Uveze ukuthi umonakalo okwamanje abakwazi ukusho ukuthi ungalinganiselwa emalini engakanani.Ukhale kakhulu nangokukhahlamezeka kwengqalasizinda. Wathi le ndawo ithandwa kakhulu yizivakashi, uthe ukukhahlamezeka kwayo ngalolu hlobo kungaphazamisa ezokuvakasha.Udalule nokuthi nezikhungo eziphehla amanzi zikhahlamezekile.Uveze ukuthi abezimo eziphuthumayo bebematasa bekuyona le ndawo.Okhulumela uMnyango wokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu, uMnuz Siboniso Mngadi, uthe bathumele ithimba lezinhlekelele ukuze liqaphe ngelokhozi okuqhubekayo ngemuva kwezikhukhula.Ngaphandle kwaseMargate izikhukhula kuvele ukuthi zidale umonakalo nakwezinye izindawo ezisogwini oluseningizimu kubalwa, uMgababa noMzinto. Amalungu omphakathi aseMzinto akhahlamezekile abalise ngokuthi izindlu zawo ziwe bhu phansi.UMnuz Zakhele Sibisi uthe akazi ukuthi uzothathani ahlanganise nani ukuze aqale phansi akhe umuzi wakhe wamagumbi amane odilike kuhlasela izikhukhula. "Inzima kakhulu le nto esehlele mina nabantwana bami. Kuyimanje nje angazi nokuthi ngizolalaphi ngoba ngiswele indawo yokulalala,'' usho kanje.Elinye ilungu lomphakathi lakhona eMzinto, uNksz Snegugu Makhanya, lithe abazi ukuthi bazolallaphi njengoba izikhukhula zicekele phansi indawo abebehlala kuyo.

UNOBHALA Jikelele weSouth African Federation of Trade Unions (Saftu), uMnuz Zwelinzima Vavi, uthe abaholi bezinyunyana abayeke ukuba wohlohlesabo kodwa kumele balwele amalungelo abasebenzi.UVavi ubekhuluma engqungqutheleni ye-General Industries Workers Union of South Africa (Giwusa), ebise-Germiston, eGauteng, ngempelasonto.“Izinyunyana ziphelelwe ngamandla ngenxa yethu baholi bazo. Sidlala ipolitiki yesisu, sivune abantu esihlomula kubo yize bengabenzeli lutho abasebenzi. Sekuyisikhathi sokuthi sakhe kabusha izinyunyana, siyeke nokuqembukelana ngoba uthola ukuthi enyunyaneni eyodwa sekunezinhlangothi ezimbili. Omunye udonsa abhekise le, nomunye aye le. Ayibasebenzeli leyo nto abasebenzi,” kusho uVavi.Uthe kuyimanje kuneqeqebana eselifuna ukuqala izinyunyana ezintsha emuva kokuhluleka ukusiza abasebenzi ezinselelweni ababhekene nazo.“Akufanele sincenge abaholi abangafuni ukusebenzela abasebenzi. Izinyunyana ngezabasebenzi, kufanele zibalekelele ukuba nempilo engcono. Njengoba anda amaqembu epolitiki nezinyunyana ziyanda kwazise kunabaholi asebefuna ukuhlohla izisu zabo. Bafuna ukuvula izinyunyana ezidlelana namaqembu athile ngoba banezinhloso zabo, hhayi ukuthi bafuna ukuqhuba umzabalazo wabasebenzi,” kuchaza uVavi.Uthe inkulumo yakhe akufanele isetshenziswe ngabaholi abafuna ukuqhoqhobala izikhundla ezinyunyaneni kodwa bengabasebenzeli abasebenzi.“Kuyimanje izinga lempilo liyabiza, imalimboleko iphezulu, amaholo awanyuki ngendlela efanele. Izinyunyana kufanele ukuthi zilwe nale nkinga. Akufanele zilume ziphephetha ngoba zincenge izikhundla kuhulumeni, kufanele zigxeke futhi zize nesisombululo,” kusho yena.Uthe njengoba sekunohulumeni wokubambisana kwamaqembu, izinyunyana kufanele zilwe kakhulu kunakuqala ngoba kulo hulumeni kugcwele ongxiwa abacindezela abasebenzi.

UBONAKALE ehlengezela izinyembezi umsolwa obhekene nohide lwamacala okubalwa kuwo nelokubulala.UNkk Agnes Sekgomotsi Setshwantsho (49) ubuyele eNkantolo yeMantshi eMolopo ngecala lokubulala, amabili okukhwabanisa nelokwephula umthetho.Icala lakhe lihlehliselwe umhlaka 22 Meyi 2024 lapho kuzozwakala khona isinqumo somqondisi wezokushushisa kuleli ngokudluliswa kwaleli cala liye enkantolo enkulu.“Ubucayi baleli cala yibona obenza kube nesidingo sokuba lidluliselwe enkantolo enkulu, lokhu kuzozwakala mhla libuyela enkantolo icala. Umsolwa uzoqhubeka nokugqunywa esitokisini njengoba ahluleka esicelweni sakhe sebheyili,” kusho uHenry Mamothame okhulumela iNPA eNorth West.Uphenyo olunzulu olwenziwe wuphiko lwezobunhloli oluholwa uSergeant Kheshi Mabunda lwaholela ekuboshweni komsolwa ngezinsolo zokuthi wabulala izihlobo zakhe ukuze ahlomule ngezicelo zomshuwalense.Lo nkosikazi waboshwa endaweni yaseCenturion ngemuva kokuthi amaphoyisa ephenye ngokufa kukamshana wakhe, okwadingeka ukuba kumbiwe isidumbu sakhe ukuze sihlolwe.Lokhu kwenzeka ngemuva kokuthi umyeni kamshana namanye amalungu omndeni azwakalisa ukungenami kwawo ngendlela ashona ngayo nangokuthi umsolwa wayethathe umshuwalense ka-R3 million egameni likamufi, ezinyangeni ezimbalwa ngaphambi kokuba ashone.Ethula ubufakazi uSergeant Mabunda, utshele inkantolo ukuthi umsolwa akafanelwe wukuthola ibheyili ngoba esaphenywa ngamanye amacala okubulala indodana yakhe, umyeni wakhe namadodakazi akhe amabili.U-Sgt Mabunda uthe uphenyo lokufa kwendodana kamsolwa uKutlo luguqulelwe ecaleni lokubulala ngemuva kokuvela kombiko othi unina nguyena muntu wokugcina wokubona indodana yakhe iphila.Kuthiwa indodana yakhe wayeyikhave ngomshuwalense ka-R6 million. Kuthiwa umufi wagcina ukudla i-burger yaseSteers ayithengelwa ngunina ngesikhathi besendleleni ebheke eMothibistad, besuka eKapa lapho yayifunda khona ngaphambi kokudlula emhlabeni.

UBINGELELE iMantshi yaseThekwini owesilisa oneminyaka engu-44  obhekene necala lokubulala namabili okuzama ukubulala.Isigameko senzeka emzini osemgwaqweni uHyder, eGlenmore entathakusa ngeSonto. Imibiko yokuqala yaveza ukuthi kuhlaselwe umndeni. Abosizo oluphuthumayo benkampani i-ALS Paramedics bafika endaweni yesigameko bathola ukuthi mathathu amalungu omndeni ahlala kuleli khaya agwazwe amanxeba amaningi futhi asesimeni esibucayi kakhulu.“Ngesikhathi kuhlolwa abantu abalimele kubonakale ukuthi kwabalimele, kukhona owesimame oseminyakeni eko-40  obesephangalele ngenxa yamanxeba okugwazwa. Abanye abagilwa ababili okungubaba nendodana banikwa usizo lokuqala olusezingeni ngenxa yesimo sabo esibucayi.UGrayson James Beare oneminyaka engu-44  nguyena msolwa oboshiwe wabekwa icala lokubulala namabili okuzama ukubulala. Uvele kancane phambi kweMantshi eThekwini icala lakhe lahlehliselwa umhla ka-11 kwephezulu lapho kulindeleke ukuthi acele ibheyili.UNatasha Ramkisson-Kara okhulumela iNPA KwaZul-Natal uthe umsolwa usazohlolwa ingqondo futhi uMbuso uhlela ukusiphikisa isicelo sakhe sebheyili.

LIVELE lakhiphela ulaka lalo ezintathelini iphoyisa eliboshelwe icala lokubulala unina, libuza ukuthi zifunani enkantolo nokuthi zivumelekile yini ukucoshela okuqhubeka ecaleni?UConstable Lungisani Xaba (48) ubekade evele eNkantolo yesiFunda yasePinetown, izolo.Ungenisane nezintatheli nentombi yakhe enkantolo yena esuka ezitokisini. Ube esenza izimpawu okomuntu obuza ugwayi entombini. Emuva kwalokho, ube esephakamisa isandla edonsa amehlo emantshi, wacela ukudlana indlebe nommeli wakhe ongowomdabu waseNdiya, kwasondela notolika ezobalekelela batholane ngenkulumo.Kulowo mzuzu, uXaba uphendule ikhanda, wabuka ngenhla kwehlombe lakhe lakwesokunxele wakhomba ngesandla izintatheli.Uphimise amagama athi: “Bafunani laba lana? Ngicela ukubuza ukuthi zivumelekile yini izintatheli ukuthi zithamele leli cala enkantolo?”UXaba obekubonakala ukuthi udiniwe, uthe udaba lwakhe lugcwele yonke indawo, kufundwa ngalo nasejele laseWestville agqunywe kulona.Izintatheli bezikade zihleli emabhentshini angemuva kwakhe eduze kwebhokisi okuhlala kulona abammangalelwa. Intombi yakhe beyihleli ngemuva kwezintatheli.Enkantolo kuvele ukuthi uXaba ubonane nodokotela ngoLwesithathu owedlule, omxilongile wase ethola ukuthi akakulungele ukuqula icala ngenxa yokugula anakho.Udokotela uphinde wabhala, enza isincomo sokuthi yize emhlolile kodwa uphakamisa ukuthi ayohlolwa kabanzi wudokotela wengqondo.Umshushisi, uMnuz S Govender, ube esetshela inkantolo ukuthi bafuna umbono kadokotela wesibili ngakho kuzomele kuqalwe uhlelo lokuthi uXaba atholelwe umbhede esibhedlela iFort Napier, eMgungundlovu, lapho ezoxilongelwa khona.Kodwa kugcine kungenzekanga lokho ngoba ummeli kaXaba uvele watshela imantshi ukuthi usekhulumile nommangalelwa ngakho bahlabela phambili necala.Ummeli ukushaye indiva ukukhononda kukaXaba akwenzile mayelana nezintatheli ekhuluma nemantshi u-B Asmal.Nebala imantshi ibe isibeka usuku lwango-Agasti 14 nonyaka, ukuze kuqalwe izindlalelo zokuqala kokuqulwa kwecala.Lapha uMbuso nommeli kulindeleke bakhulume ngobufakazi obamukelwayo, obungaphikiswa kubekwe nosuku okuzoqala ngalo icala.Imantshi ikhale ngokudleka kwesikhathi lingaquliwe icala, yathi kusukela ngoNovemba 2022, efika enkantolo uXaba, akunyakazeki.Ikhombe ngasohlangothi lukaXaba, yathi ukubambezeleka okuningi kuqhamuka ngakulona.Abekade engekho enkantolo amalungu omndeni kaXaba ahlale efuna ukuthi kuqale icala khona ezothola umnyombo wesehlakalo sokushona kukamama wabo.UXaba usolwa ngokushaya ngepulangwe abulale unina, uNkk Greta Xaba (81), owayephila nokukhubazeka.Isigameko senzeka emzini kamufi KwaDabeka, ngoMeyi 6, 2022, waboshwa ngakusasa uXaba.

UVULE icala lokwehliswa isithunzi unobhala jikelele weNFP, uMnuz Teddy Thwala, obizwe ngembongolo washwabulelwa ngokufa.UThwala ubizwe ngembongolo yilungu leNFP okuthiwa lisebenza komunye womasipala abangaphansi kwesifunda, iZuland.Enkulumweni eqoshiwe, kuzwakala ilungu leNFP lithi ngabe kungcono ukuba uThwala wafa.Ingxabano iqale ngemva kokuthi iNFP iphunyukwe yisikhundla sobumeya kumasipala wesifunda, iZululand.I-NFP ibifuna ukuthi uMengameli wayo uMnuz Ivan Barnes, agaxwe amaketango obumeya kulo mkhandlu.Kuphenduke amatafula ngesonto eledlule, kwaqokwa uMnuz Michael ‘Mkhonyovu’ Khumalo, oyikhansela le-IFP, ukuba athathe isikhundla esivuleke emva kokwesula kukaMfundisi Thulasizwe Buthelezi, osephathiswe uMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu.Ingwijikhwebu yokungaqokwa kukaBarnes yenze ukuthi amalungu eNFP ajikelane wodwa, amanye, okubalwa kuwo uThwala, asolwa ngokusebenzisana ne-IFP.Enkulumweni eqoshiwe, kuzwakala umholi weNFP ekhwela edilika kuThwala, emsola ngokusebenzisana ne-IFP.“Sawubona Teddy, wena lamanyala owenzayo okuxova iqembu lethu, wena uyiNkatha kodwa uxova iqembu lethu. Siyawazi amanyala owenzayo. Ngeke uze ulunge mfana wami. Sobona ukuthi ubani ozogcina phakathi kwami nawe. Uyimbongolo kabi wena. Awuzwa nasemadlebeni, uyimbongolo nje. Akekho usopolitiki ongezwa nasemadlebeni njengawe.”Inkulumo iphetha ngokuthi lomholi weNFP aveze ukuthi uThwala bamthakatha kancane kwi-UDM, aze athi ufisa engabe usafa.“Bakuloya kancane, uyimbongolo wena. Ukube kwa-UDM bakuloya wafa, ngabe kungcono.”UThwala uthe izinkulumo eziqoshiwe uzithunyelelwe ngoWhatsapp, wathi umsolwa uyamazi. Uthe okuqukethwe yizinkulumo kumenze wasabela impilo yakhe.“Angikwazi ukungathuki uma ngithola izinsongo ezinje ikakhulukazi uma uzobheka ukuthi isimo sishube kanjani lapha esifundazweni. Kunesisho esithi isishiphi sikhonga ukunya.”UThwala uthe ufuna ukuthi umsolwa alethe ubufakazi bezinto amsola ngazo. Uthe usazothathela amanye amalungu eNFP izinyathelo.“Kunemibhalo nezinkulumo eziqoshiwe ezisabalele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, lapho ngithukwa ngamalungu eqembu. Konke lokho ngizokunikeza amaphoyisa.”Okhulumela amaphoyisa, uConstable Thenjiswa Ngcobo, uthe amaphoyisa aphenya icala lokwehlisa isithunzi.

USOBISHINI umsakazi woKhozi FM, uSiya Mhlongo, njengoba evulelwe icala lokushaya ngenhloso yokulimaza, ngowesilisa ozishaya isifuba ngokuthi wajola naye unyaka wonke. Lo mlisa ocele ukuba ligodlwe igama lakhe, uvule icala esiteshini samaphoyisa iDurban Central, eThekwini ngeSonto. Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal,  uColonel Robert Netshiunda ukuqinisekisile ukuvulwa kwecala. "Amaphoyisa aseDurban Central aphenya icala lokushaya ngenhloso yokulimaza kulandela isigameko okusolakala ukuthi owesilisa oneminyaka engu-29 ushaywe, wagwazwa ngumsolwa amaziyo ngo-Agasti 31 2024. Umgilwa ulimale ebusweni wabe esephuthunyiswa esibhedlela ukuze athole usizo lwezempilo," kusho uNetshiunda.Ekhuluma neSolezwe, umgilwa uthe lesi sehlakalo senzeke entathakusa ngeSonto ngesikhathi yena nalo msakazi, owayeyisinqandamathe sakhe ngo-2020 kuya ku-2021,bephuma ebumnandini eMorningside, eThekwini. "Besesihamba kwenye indawo yobumnandi eMorningside entathakusa ngeSonto ngesikhathi sixabana naye. Into emcasulile wukuthi bengivalelisa komunye wabangani bethu, sishayana ngesinqanda sasemoyeni kanti uzocikeka," kusho umgilwa.Uthe akazange anake ukuthi ulwandle selugcwele kumsakazi ngesikhathi bephuma kule ndawo bebheke emotweni, kwaze kwaba wukuthi sebephakathi emotweni yaqala ingxabano."Ubethukuthele egane unwabu, engisola ngokushendeza naloya mngani, ethi besingeke sivalelisane ngale ndlela uma kungenzeki lutho phakathi kwethu. Indaba yonakale esefonela lo mngani ethi angikhulume naye ngenkani ukuze abone ukuthi akwenzeki lutho phakathi kwethu. Nginqabile, ngavala ucingo kanti sengizithintele,"Lo mlisa uthe lo msakazi umgqeme ngebhodlela lotshwala ebusweni, maqede wagibela kuye ngezibhakela ethukuthele. Uthe kulamule abantu abebedlula ngendlela, behamba ngemoto iPolo, abafike babuza ukuthi kwenzenjani kwayima esuka kuyena.Lo mgilwa uthe waphuma emotweni, waqopha ivideo (Isolezwe elinayo nezithombe) ukuze abe nobufakazi. Kule-video kubonakala owesilisa ehleli phezu komsakazi, umsakazi ekhala ethi kungcono ambulale.Lo umlisa obemcindezela uzwakala ethi qhubekani nokulwa kwenu. Umsakazi ubize lo mlisa abexabana naye ngegama emnxusa ukuthi angene emotweni ukuze amhambise esibhedlela, kodwa wenqaba lo mlisa, wathi akasahambi naye. Kwenye-ivideo lo msakazi, obezwakala njengomuntu oweqiwe amambawu, unxuse asolwa ngokumshaya ethi akayeke ukuqopha i-video. Umsakazi kubikwa ukuthi ujahe lo mlisa abehamba naye, efuna ukumphuca iselula ukuze asuse i-video, washiya imoto iduma, babuya abafana be-Polo, bashaya bachitha nemoto yomsakazi.Ethintwa umsakazi ucingo lwakhe beluvaliwe kanti nomlayezo athunyelelwe wona akazange awuphendule.Kwenzeka lokhu-nje uKhozi FM lunomkhankaso wokulwa neGBV nodlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane nezingane unyaka wonke.UNksz Mmoni Seapolelo Okhulumela iSABC uthe usalinde umbiko ehhovisi laseKZN ngalolu daba.

NKOSIKHONA CELEUVUMA eyokukhulelisa indodakazi yomkakhe, uMfundisi webandla laseZayoni osesolwe nangokukhulelisa amanye amavolontiya abalelwa eshumini ebandleni lakhe.UMfu Mandla Mahlaba ongumholi weBandla, iNew Jerusalem eliseNtuzuma, uthi kuyiqiniso ukuthi impela uyikhulelisile indodakazi yomkakhe angayizali eneminyaka engu-19.Ube esethi uzimisele kodwa ngokuhlalisa phansi unkosikazi wakhe nendodakazi ngoba ‘ubathanda bobabili’.UMahlaba ubephendula iSolezwe Ngempelasonto ngemuva kokuqubuka kwezinsolo zokuthi usebhubhisile ebandleni, wakhulelisa inqwaba yamavolontiya."Vele ngiyikhulelisile indodakazi, lokho angeke ngize ngiwaqambe amanga ngithi angikwazi noma ngithi akwenzekanga. Angizimisele ngokuchazela wena ukuthi kwenzeke kanjani,'' usho kanje.Ugcizelele ngokuthi lolu wudaba lwasesithe okungamele akhulume ngalo esidlangalaleni, bazolubhunga njengomndeni. Ngaphandle kwalokhu, kunemithombo engaphakathi ebandleni ethi lo mfundisi muva nje wenza imigilingwane abangayiqondi.Njalo ngeSonto kuthiwa uvele ahlabe isiklabhu athi asidliwe ngabazalwane. Kuthiwa usuke ethi abasishebe namasi. "Lokho okhuluma ngakho ngisuke ngikwenza ngoba  ngizama ukusiza bona. Angeke ngichaze ukuthi ngisuke ngibasiza kanjani,'' echaza.Uphike walala ngomhlane wathi akathwele. "Umuntu othwele akasweli njengami. Phela mina ngizixakekele,'' usho kanje.Mayelana nokuthi kunezinsolo zokuthi ubalekile, akaziwa ukuthi ukuziphi izinkalo, ukuphikile konke lokhu. "Mina ngikhona ngizihlalele lapha kwami, ongifunayo akeze,“ esho. Ikhansela lakule ndawo uNkk Mafi Zondi uthe bazwile ngezinto okuthiwa zenziwa uMfundisi endaweni. Lithe lizohlangana nabazali  ukuze kuzotholakala isixazululo sodaba. Imizabo yokuthola unkosikazi kamfundisi ayiphumelelanga ngoba ucingo lwakhe ubengalluphenduli.

AMAQEMBU ezepolitiki amancane avuke azithatha, athula imiqulu yezethembiso zokhetho njengoba kusondela usuku lokuvota.Ngempelasonto, amaqembu amathathu okuyi-UDM, PAC ne-FF Plus, athule imikhankaso yawo yakhetho.La maqembu athula imiqulu yawo emva kokuthi amaqembu amakhulu i-ANC, DA, ne-EFF, eseyivulile indlela.I-ANC, DA ne-EFF, iwona anezihlalo eziningi ePhalamende, futhi iwona aba ngowokuqala ukwethula izethembiso zokhetho.Njengoba ukhetho lwangoMeyi selusondele, kulindeleke ukuthi abe maningi amaqembu amancane azokwethula izethembiso zokhetho.Amaqembu athule izethembiso ngempelasonto, athembise amathuba emisebenzi, ukuthuthukisa umnotho nokulwa nenkohlakalo.Umholi we-UDM, uMnuz Bantu Holomisa, uthe bafuna kuphele ukuphathwa ngendlela engafani kwabaholi bomdabu eNingizimu Afrika. UHolomisa uthe bafuna ukuthi abaholi bomdabu baphathwe ngendlela efanayo kuzo zonke izifundazwe zakuleli.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ethula umqulu wezethembiso zokhetho, eGoli, ngoMgqibelo.UHolomisa uthe akulungile ukuthi abaholi bomdabu bathole izinto ezingafani."Uma abaholi bomdabu bethengelwa izimoto eLimpopo naKwaZulu-Natal, abathengelwe nakwezinye izifundazwe. Ayiyekwe le nto yokukhetha iphela emasini."UHolomisa uthe iqembu lakhe lizimisele ngokulwa nenkohlakalo."Inkohlakalo idla lubi lapha eNingizimu Afrika. Abantu abazitholi izidingo ngenxa yokuthi imali yehliswa ngemilenze. Iphutha elikhulu elenziwa ngabantu ukuthi bayaqhubeka nokuvotela abantu abanukwa ngenkohlakalo."Thina angeke siyibekezelele inkohlakalo. Namanje siyalwa nenkohlakalo. Ingakho sesisungule uphiko olulwa nenkohlakalo."Selokhu i-UDM yasungulwa eminyakeni engaphezu kwengu-27 eyedlule, uHolomisa uyena obelokhu eyihola.Ebuzwa ukuthi ucabanga ukwehla nini esikhundleni, uHolomisa uthe ulindele igama elizophuma kumalungu eqembu."Uma ubheka, sengiqalile ukucija abaholi bakusasa. Baningi abaholi abasebasha kwi-UDM. Ngilindele ukuthi bangihlebele uma sebekulungele ukuthatha. Bazosho uma sebefuna ukuthatha."Khonamanjalo: I-PAC yethule umqulu wezethembiso zokhetho, eGoli, ngoMgqibelo.UMengameli wePAC, uMnuz Mzwanele Nyhontso, uthembise ukwenza izinguquko kwezobulungiswa uma benqoba ukhetho.UNyhontso uthe imithetho yakuleli iyaphambana namasiko akuleli."Imithetho yezwe kufanele ihambisane namasiko abantu bomdabu. Imithetho yezwe akufanele ihambisane nokwabamhlophe."UNyhontso uthe iPAC iyohlezi ibeka phambili izidingo zabantu bakuleli."Thina asifani ne-ANC. Kulo mqulu siyasibophezela ekufezeni izidingo zabantu bakithi."I-FF Plus yona ithe ifuna ukuqeda uhlelo lokunikezwa amathuba angcono kosomabhizinisi abamnyama iBEE, yathi iyaphikisana nohlelo lwezempilo olusha oluhlongozwayo iNational Health Insurance (NHI).

IPHINI likaNobhala Jikelele kwi-ANC, uNkk Nomvula Mokonyane uthi ingqalabutho yalenhlangano uNkk Winnie Madikizela-Mandela yakhetha ukuhlala kwi-ANC noma yayibhekene nezikhathi ezinzima.UNkk Mokonyane uthe uWinnie akazange enze njengabanye abakhetha ukuyosungula amaqembu abo uma bebhekene nezikhathi ezinzima kwi-ANC.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi kunomcimbi obuhlelwe i-ANC Women’s League  wokukhumbula usuku okwashona ngalo uNkk Madikizela-Mandela.NgoLwesibili bekuhlangana iminyaka eyisithupha kwashona uNkk Madikizela-Mandela.Abaholi be-ANC babeke izimbali ethuneni likaNkk Madikizela-Mandela eliseFouways Memorial Park, kwase kuba nomcimbi wokukhanyisa amakhandlela emzini kaNkk Madikizela-Mandela oseSoweto.UNkk Mokonyane uthe uNkk Madikizela-Mandela wakhombisa uthando olukhulu kwi-ANC nangezikhathi ezinzima.“Waze wafa eyilungu lokuqina le-ANC. Abantu baseNingizimu Afrika kufanele bangakukhohlwa ukuthi uNkk Madikizela-Mandela akazange ayilaxaze i-ANC nangezikhathi ezinzima.“Ziningi izinto ezazingamenza ashiye i-ANC ayozivulela isitokofela sakhe esincane, noma inkulisa yakhe encane, kodwa wakhetha ukuhlala kwi-ANC.“Wahlala kwi-ANC yize noma ayethandwa kakhulu abantu abangewona amalungu ayo. Lokhu wayekwenziswa wukuthi wayazi ukuthi i-ANC yiyo eyamenza waba yilento ayeyiyo,” kusho uNkk Mokonyane.Uthe abantu abaningi bamthande ngoba engasekho uNkk Madikizela-Mandela.Uqhubeke ngokuthi iyefana nekaJesu, sisanda kubuya ezinkonzweni zePhasika. Indaba kaNkk Madikizela-Mandela ithi ayifane nokubethelwa kukaJesu esiphambanweni. Emva kokushona kwakhe, ngisho nezitha zakhe imbala zamvuma.UNkk Mokonyane uthe bazohlezi beliqhakambisa igalelo likaNkk Madikizela-Mandela.“Size lapha ukuzozibophezela kabusha. Siqhamuka kwinhlangano kaNomzamo Madikizela-Mandela, i-ANC.“Nathi njengenhlangano sesike sabhekana nezikhathi ezinzima, kodwa sizibophezela ekuqhubekeni nokulandela ezinyathelweni zakho. Kuningi esesikubonile,” kubalisa uNkk Mokonyane.Unxuse abazukulu bakaNkk Madikizela-Mandela ngokulandela ezinyathelweni zikagogo wabo, bavotele i-ANC okhethweni oluzayo.Umzukulu kaNkk Madikizela-Mandela, uNkk Zamaswazi Dlamini-Mandela, unxuse abantu bakuleli ukuba baphume ngobuningi baye okhethweni lwangenyanga ezayo.“Lokhu sicela nikwenze egameni lokuhlonipha ugogo wethu. Sicela ningakhohlwa ngamagalelo akhe nezinye izingqalabutho ezalwela inkululeko.“Kubalulekile ukuthi wonke umuntu avote, lonke ivoti libalulekile. Kuphela iminyaka engu-30 elakuleli lathola inkululeko. Lokhu kubalulekile kakhulu kuthina njengomndeni,” kusho umzukulu kaNkk Madikizela-Mandela.

NKOSIKHONA CELEZIGCWALE udaka izinyawo zikamfundisi webandla laseZayoni, uMusa wokuKhanya, ngemuva kokuba esakaze umkakhe ngempama phambi kwesigungu sebandla.Ngokuthola kweSolezwe, uMfundisi Zethembe Mcambi uwaklaze umkakhe ngempama, uNkk Nomalungelo Mcambi ngemuva kokuba babe nokungaboni ngasolinye ngodaba lokusetshenziswa kwemali ebandleni.Umthombo obukhona ngesikhathi sesigameko uveza ukuthi isehlakalo senzeke emagcekeni ebandla kunomhlangano waminyaka yonke, lapho okusuke kudingidwa ukungena nokuphuma kwemali yebandla.Uthi umfundisi ubephakamisa okuthile mayelana nendlela okumele kusetshenziswe ngakhona imali yebandla esuke inikelelwe ukuthi kulekelelwe ngayo izingane ezingenabo abazali ebandleni.Kuthiwa umkakhe ubenombono owehlukile kobe kushiwo ngumholi webandla, ongumyeni wakhe."Angifuni ukuveza ukuthi ubaba ubefuna imali isetshenziswe kanjani kodwa umama uphakamise okuhlukile kobe kushiwo ngumyeni wakhe,'' usho kanje umthombo.Elandisa uthi umfundisi ubuze umkakhe ukuthi kungani emhlambalaza emphikisa phambi kwabazalwane ekubeni engumuntu wesifazane yena eyindoda."Uqede ukubuza loyo mbuzo wabe esemsakaza ngempama izikhawu ezimbili. Kusize ukuthi abemaningi amadoda abekhona kulo mhlangano ase eyasukuma amkhuza embamba,'' usho kanje.Uthi ukube akakhuzwanga ngabe kukhulu akwenzile kumkakhe, umfundisi ngendlela abese eyiyona ebusweni."Sonke simane saxakeka nje ukuthi ngempela kwenzakalani. Ubese egqunqile emnyama namehlo akhe esebomvu tebhu ukudinwa,'' usho kanje.Isolezwe likhulume nomfundisi mayelana nalokhu, ezwakala ekhulumela phansi. Uvumile ukuthi uxoshiwe ebandleni."Ngiyalivuma icala lami impela ngonile. Angazi ukuthi bengingenelwe yini kangaka. Kodwa ngiyacela ndodana ningalubhali lolu daba,'' usho kanje.Uveze ukuthi uzamile ukuxolisa kumkakhe kodwa kwanhlanga zimuka nomoya njengoba engekho nasekhaya emukile waya kubo eMnambithi."Ngikhuluma nawe nje akekho ekhaya, ngizwile ukuthi ukubo. Nami angikho ekhaya ngizihlalele kwenye indawo ngesaba nokubabuka abantwana bami ngoba bangicasukele nabo, abafuni nakukhuluma nami,'' echaza uMcambi.Ethintwa umama uthe sebeshade iminyaka engu-12 nomyeni wakhe futhi ubengakaze ambeke isandla. Wathi lokhu akwenzile kummangazile.Uthe kodwa uzobuyela ekhaya baxoxisane ukuthi nje usafuna ukuhlehla kancane nasezintweni ezithinta ibandla.Inhloko yebandla ezweni lonke, uMbhishobhi Nhlanhla Ntombela inqabile  ukuphawula kumayelana nokudicilelwa phansi kwebandla alisebenzela kanzima kangaka. “ Mfana wami angifuni nanokuthi kulokhu kuthiwa ngiphawulile. Ngilisebenzele kabi leli bandla eselehliswa isithunzi ngalolu hlobo...angiphawuli lutho,” usho kanje.Ukuqinisekisile kodwa ukuthi uMcambi uxoshiwe.

UYA ePhalamende owayenguMphathiswa wezokuHlaliswa kwaBantu KwaZulu-Natal uMnuz Jomo Sibiya ngemuva kokhetho  lukazwelonke ngoMeyi 29, 2024.Lokhu kuvele ohlwini lwe-ANC lwamalungu azojutshelwa ezikhundleni eziphezulu ngemuva kwalolu khetho olubhekwe ngabomvu.USibiya ongomunye wabeluleka uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, wakhishwa esikhundleni sokuba nguMphathiswa esifundazweni emuva kokungena kobuholi obusha be-ANC, okumanje buholwa nguMnuz Sboniso Duma.Abanye abantu abaya ePhalamende oNkk Nomalungelo Gina,  iphini likaNgqongqoshe wezoHwebo. Abanye abaholi ababuyayo uDkt Zweli Mkhize, oke waba nguNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo.UDkt Sibongiseni Dhlomo ngomunye wabakhuza ibuya, njengoba eyiPhini likaNgqongqoshe wezeMpilo.Abanye abakhona kulolu luhlu, kubalwa ilungu lePhalamende uMnuz Sdumo Dlamini, uMnuz Edwin Mkhize ongunobhala weCosatu esifundazweni. UNksz Bathabile Dlamini oke waba nguNgqongqoshe wezeNhlalakahle ngomunye okuphakanyiswe igama lakhe ukuthi aye ePhalamende.Ohlwini lwesifundazwe baningi abanye abaholi abasha abazobe beqala ukuya esiShayamthetho.

UKHALA ezimathonsi uyise wengane enonyaka, okusolwa ukuthi ibulawe unina isidumbu sayo okuthiwa sitholwe sintanta emfuleni iNjakane, eThembeni KwaDukuza ngoMsumbuluko.Isidumbu sikaNonkanyiso Tembe (1), kuthiwa sitholwe owesilisa obezidobela emfuleni, kanti kuthiwa ugcine ukubonwa ngeSonto ebelethwe wunina okuthiwa ufonele uyise wengane asebahlukana naye, uMnuz Ernest Tembe, wamazisa ngokuthi ingane uyishiye ehlathini.Kuthiwa bobabili abazali bakaNonkanyiso bangabokudabuka eMaputo, eMozambique. Elandisa Isolezwe ngokwenzekile, uTembe (uyise wengane) uthe bahlukane ngonyaka odlule nomsolwa ababehlala naye ndawonye eThembeni KwaDukuza, kanti owesifazane wabuye wahamba wayohlala eMpangeni nengane yabo.“Ngesonto eledlule ungishayele ucingo  wathi uzoletha ingane ngoMgqibelo.  Ngimtshelile ukuthi ngizobe ngingekho ngiphume nomsebenzi njengoba bengisebenzela eHarding. NgeSonto ntambama ungishayele ucingo wathi usetekisini elibheke eManguza, ingane uyibulele wayishiya ehlathini. Ngesikhathi ngifika endlini ngicele ukuthi angiyalele lapho eshiye khona ingane ngoba bengingazitsheli ukuthi ukwenzile ngempela lokho , uze wathi angimfonele nge-video ukuze angikhombise kahle lapho eshiye khona isidumbu sengane,” usho kanje.Uthe ubheke wakhathala engayitholi, kodwa waqala ukubheka ngamanye amehlo uma esethola ucingo oluvela ngakubo eMozambique lapho umsolwa okuthiwa usebalekele khona, ngesikhathi bembuza ukuthi kuyiqiniso yini abakutshelwa umsolwa ukuthi usebulele ingane.  Uthe ngakusasa ingane itholwe ilaxazwe emfuleni kanti ubelokhu exhumana nomsolwa ku-WhatsApp.Enkulumweni yabo eqoshiwe yakuWhatsApp Isolezwe  eliyizwile, umsolwa ecashunwa lapho ekhuluma khona ngesiZulu, ubezwakala ekhala ebalisa ethi uyazisola ngakwenzile.  Uveza ukuthi ingane uyishiye ehlathini akazange ayiphonse emanzini.UTembe uthe akungeni nokudla selokhu kwenzeke lesi sigameko ngoba akazi ukuthi iyiphi imbangela ebingaholela ekubulaweni ngesihluku kwengane yabo.Uthe bekuwuzinyobulala wakhe, wathi yena nomsolwa bahlangane kuleli bathandana kodwa into yabo yayaziwa nangakubo eMozambique, kodwa babuye bahlukana.  Lishone elayizolo besazoyovula icala lokubulala esiteshini samaphoyisa KwaDukuza obekuzokwenziwa emva kokuhlolwa kwesidumbu kutholwe imbangela yokushona kwenganeIkhansela lendawo, uMnuz Sicelo Sithole, lithe umphakathi uthukile ngalesi sigameko.“Okubi ukuthi sizosusa ukucwaswa kwabokufika kuleli okuyinto ekhuzwayo njengoba sebekhona lesi senzo abasibheka ngokuthi senziwe abokufika abazongcolisa indawo yabo.  Unina wengane ngokwami akakhombisi ukuzisola, uma ngihlulela nje ngokwezinkulumo zakhe engithunyelelwe zona uTembe zaku-WhatsApp,” usho kanje.

UKHALE ngesihluku okubulawe ngaso indodana yakhe edutshulwe yashona nezihlobo zayo ezimbili ngesikhathi besendleleni bebuya ukuyovota eSihlabeni, eMuden.UMnuz Mdumiseni Mzila, onguyise kamufi, uMnuz Menzi Mzila, usola ukuthi siwubugebengu isenzo sokubulawa kwendodana yakhe.UMzila uthe ukusocongwa kwendodana yakhe entathakusa ngoLwesine akuhlangene nhlobo nokuvota.“Bese bebuya ukuyovota, beziyela ekhaya badlula komunye umuzi bethi bayothenga i-artime kanti bazodutshulwa. Kuyakhombisa ukuthi abantu ababadubulile bebebalalele unyendle,” kusho uMzila ngosizi.Lo wesilisa uthe abanye ababulewe kulesi sigameko wumshana wakhe uMnuz Foni Dladla noMnuz Fundo Mdletshe ongumzukulu wakhe.Ukubulawa kwabafi uthe kubashiye bedumele bewumndeni, wakhala nangendlela eyisihluku abasocongwe ngayo.Kuthiwa ababulewe bekungabesilisa abathathu behamba ngemoto namantombazane amathathu.Enye yalawa mantombazane kuthiwa ilimalile ngesikhathi behlaselwa, amabili aphuma engenamyocu.Amaphoyisa athe uphenyo lwawo luveza ukuthi imoto obekuhanjwa ngayo yayikade ibikwe njengeyebiwe eGoli.“Ayikho into esike sayizwa njengabazali babo ukuthi bayenzile. Besingakwazi ukuthi imoto abebehamba ngayo yebiwe, siqale ukukuzwa ngamaphoyisa lokho. Sifuna uhulumeni aqinise umthetho, amaphoyisa abathungathe ababophe ababulali,” kusho uMzila.Uchaze ababulewe wathi ngokwazi kwakhe bebeyizingane eziziphethe kahle, bebengakaze bathole izikhalazo ngabo ezivela emphakathini.UMzila uthe ababulewe bebengasebenzi kodwa uzobakhumbula njalo uma ebona izingane ezilingana nabo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa esifundazweni, uColonel Robert Netshiunda uthe ababulewe baneminyaka engu-22, 24 nengu-25. Uthe kabaziwa ababulali nembangela yokusoconga kodwa uphenyo lwamaphoyisa luyaqhubeka.Unxuse noma ubani ongaba nolwazi olungalekelela amaphoyisa ekutholeni abasolwa ukuba aludlulisele emaphoyiseni aseduzane noma abike kwabakaCrime Stop enombolweni yocingo ethi: 08600 10111.

UYAVEVA umgcotshwa webandla lamaNazaretha eBuhleni othi uyabulwe ngomjiva, kwagqashuka nomqhele ekhishwa ngesidlozana ethempelini, esolwa ngokuzibeka kwesobufundisi ngesikhathi kuvalwa umhlangano kaJulayi.Umgcotshwa uMnuz Mandlakayise Mthethwa ozinze ethempelini eMaqhaweni, e-Uganda, eMlaza, uthe usesaba ngisho ukuya enkonzweni ngokwenziwe kuyena ngabefundisi eBuhleni.Uthe kulesi sigameko kulahleke ngisho nemali yakhe engu-R10 000 abezoyothenga ngayo izimbuzi, waze wavula icala emaphoyiseni.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda ukuqinisekisile ukuthi kunecala elivulwe wuMthethwa eNanda.“Kulesi sigameko ummangali uthe walahlekelwa yisigqoko sakhe, wumjiva wesonto nemali. Amaphoyisa ayaphenya,” kusho uNetshiunda.Echaza uMthethwa uthe: “Mina ngingumfundisi owaphakanyiselwa kulesi sikhundla wuBaba uNyazilwezulu. BengiwuMshumayeli futhi amagalelo ami ayaziwa njengoba kukhona amathempeli amathathu eMlaza asungulwe ngenxa yami. Uma sekufika isikhathi sokuthi ngiphakanyiselwe kwesobufundisi, kukhona abangathandanga. “Bekungekhona okokuqala bengiphatha kanje abagcotshwa. Lesi sigameko senzekile siseTafelkop ngoMashi kulo nyaka. Bafike bangigxavuna kanje futhi baze bangiphuca kwawona umjiva wami. Namanje bangigxavule kabuhlungu bangiphuca umjiva wami kwaze kwagqashuka nomqhele. Kulokhu angikwazanga ngisho ukuthatha izimpahla ebengiziphethe, zisale khona ethempelini eBuhleni ngikhishwa kabuhlungu. Kulahleke nemali engu-R10 000 ebengiyikhiphele ukuthi ngizoyothenga ngayo izimbuzi,” kusho uMthethwa.Uthe ngesikhathi ephucwa umjiva okokuqala eTafelkop, akazange afune ukuphumela obala ngalolu daba ngoba wayezitshela ukuthi luzogcina lulungisekile. Uthe manje uyabona ukuthi akusizi ukuthi athule ngoba uyabona ukuthi bazoze bamlimaze laba bagcotshwa.Ngesikhathi ekhishwa ngesidlozana eBuhleni, uthe uzamile ukubatshela abagcotshwa abebemkhipha ukuthi abaye kumholi uNyazilwezulu ngoba uyazi ngaye ukuthi usengumfundisi kodwa banqaba, bengafuni ukumlalela.“Angazi noma babefuna ngibagwazele yini laba bagcotshwa ukuze bangibeke esikhundleni sokuba ngumfundisi. Bengingeke ngikwenze lokho ngoba igama lami laphakanyiswa wuBaba uNyazilwezulu. Into abangenze yona isangithusile futhi bangihlazile, bengikhipha kabuhlungu kanje phambi kukankosikazi wami nezingane,” kusho uMthethwa.Okhulumela umholi wamaNazaretha, inkosi Mduduzi Shembe uNyazilwezulu, uMnuz Thokozani Mncwabe uthe uyalwazi udaba lukaMthethwa.“Kuyiqiniso ukuthi unguMshumayeli uMthethwa kodwa okokugcotshwa kwabefundisi, ibandla alingeni kukhona. Isikhathi esiningi bagcotshwa wubaba uNyazilwezulu uma kuqala unyaka sisentabeni engcwele. Thina njengamalungu ebandla sibona ngaye umgcotshwa sesibuyile entabeni esevathe isevatho sabefundisi. Okunye asingeni kukhona ngoba kuningi okwenzekayo uma begcotshwa esingeke sakudalula ngoba kuyizimfihlo zebandla. Ukugcina kwami ukukhuluma noMthethwa kungesikhathi ephucwe umjiva siseTafelkop. Kulapho ngaphakamisa khona ukuthi udaba lwakhe lulungiswe ngokukholwa,” kusho uMncwabe.

ABATHANDI bezincwadi eThekwini bazojabula kakhulu njengoba umkhumbi omkhulukazi emhlabeni  oba nombukiso wezincwadi , iLogos Hope, uzotheleka kuleli dolobha kuleli sonto.Umkhumbi uzoma echwebeni laseThekwini, iNelson Mandela Cruise Terminal kusukela ngoLwesithathu kuze kube uJuni 2.UMasipala weTheku, uthe izihambeli ze-Logos Hope zizothola izincwadi ezingeziwe ezingaphezu kuka-5 000 kuzo okukhona ezeSayensi, ezemidlalo,  ezokuchitha isizungu , ezokupheka, ezobuciko, ezikhuluma ngemithi, ezezilimi, ezenkolo  nezinye ngemali  engambi eqolo.UNkk Gugu Sisilana okhulumela umasipala, uthe ezinye izincwadi ezizobe zitholakala kulo mkhumbi ezikhuluma ngezingane, izichazamazwi, ezikhombisa ibalazwe, ucwaningo olwenziwe amanyuvesi nokunye.IMeya yeTheku uMxolisi Kaunda, ithe ukunwetshwa kwechweba laseThekwini kuheha abagibeli abaningi bemikhumbi edolobheni.Umasipala uthe,  i-Logos Hope izovulwa kusukela ngoLwesibili kuya ngoMgqibelo kusukela ngo-11 ekuseni kuya ku-8 ebusuku. NgeSonto, izovulwa kusukela ngo-1pm kuya ku-8pm. Umkhumbi uyavalwa uma kunguMsombuluko. Imali yokungena ngu-R10, kodwa izingane ezingaphansi kweminyaka engu-12 nabadala abaneminyaka engu-60 kuya phezulu bangena mahhala.Umbukiso wezincwadi uzovulelwa ukuvakasha kwezikole kusukela ngoLwesihlanu Meyi 24 kuya ngeSonto Juni 2. Kufanele ubhukhe ngaphambi kokuwuvakashela.

UNGOTI wezepolitiki uthe umholi we-EFF, uMnuz Julius Malema, ukhombise ukuxhamazela ngokuhlokoloza abaholi beqembu abasola ngokuthi bazwelana nobeyiphini lakhe, uMnuz Floyd Shivambu.UDkt Ongama Mtimka uthe bekungafanele ukuthi uMalema agudle labo asola sengathi bazolandela uShivambu, oshiye kuleli qembu ngeledlule, wajoyina i-MK.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma nabe-Newsroom Afrika.UMtimka ukhuluma kanjena nje, uMalema ubebhodla umlilo ngesikhathi ekhuluma namalungu eqembu ngoMsombuluko, eGoli.UMalema utshele amalungu eqembu afuna ukuhamba ukuthi awahambe.Kusukela kuhambe uShivambu nobeyilungu lePhalamende, uMnuz Mzwanele Manyi, kulokhu kunamahlebezi okuthi kukhona amanye amalungu e-EFF asazoshiya.Kepha uMalema uthe angeke babancenge labo abafuna ukuhamba.“Ngifuna ukubatshela labo abafuna ukuhamba ukuthi abahambe manje. Asikho isizathu sokuthi sibancenge.”UMtimka uthe uMalema bekufanele alusingathe ngenye indlela lolu daba.“Ngibona sengathi ugagamelile. Kunokukhuluma okuthi le nto yokushiya kwabantu izolokhu yenzeka kancane kancane. Bekufanele ukuthi yena uMalema alinde bahambe bonke ngaphambi kokuthi akhulume.”UMtimka uthe i-EFF ilahlekelwe kakhulu ngokushiya kukaShivambu.“I-EFF angeke iphinde ifane. UMalema noShivambu bayakha, beyisusa phansi i-EFF.”Umhlaziyi wezepolitiki, uMnuz Lukhona Mnguni, uthe inkulumo kaMalema ikhombisa ukuthi imthusile eyokushiya kukaShivambu.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma ne-SABC.“Kufanele ukuthi uyatatazela. Kufanele ukuthi uzibuza imibuzo. Uma kushiya umuntu onjengoShivambu, abayiqala naye phansi i-EFF, kufanele athuke. Kule nkulumo uMalema ubezama nje ukuziduduza. Nginesiqiniseko sokuthi wayengakaze akucabange ukuthi i-EFF izoqala ukulahlekelwa amandla kusaphethe yena.”UMnguni uthe okunye okuthusa uMalema ukuthi usezokuba nephini elisha.“Uma ubheka zonke izikhundla kwi-EFF, uShivambu noMalema kuphela abebengakaze bashintshwe. Kusukela kwaqalwa i-EFF, bebelokhu bezibambile izikhundla zabo. Zonke lezi ezinye izikhundla sekube nezinguquko. Manje usekuba nephini elisha. Kungenzeka ukuthi isikhundla sithathwe umuntu angemethembi.”UMalema umemezele ukuthi wonke amandla abephethwe uShivambu asezobuyela kuyena.Uthe bafuna ukuqeda yonke into ezobakhumbuza uShivambu kwi-EFF.

UBONGINKOSI Khanyile (34) ukhathazwa ngakubize ngokulandelelwa kakhulu kwabantu abeseka noma ababonakala behamba nowayengumengameli wezwe osengumholi woMkhonto weSizwe Party, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, athe kwenziwa wuMbuso.UKhanyile usho kanje engxoxweni neSolezwe emuva kokuvela kwakhe eNkantolo yesiFunda yaseThekwini ngoLwesihlanu.“Mina bangiqala ngimncane, sengize ngakhulela kuyona le nkantolo sengimdala ngiwubhuti manje. Kodwa asilinde icala selizohlala. Yonke le nto eyenzakalayo yayivele iyipolitiki kwasekuqaleni,” kuchaza uKhanyile.Uthe uZuma waboshwa kungafanele, kusetshenziswa imithetho akhelwa yona eyisipesheli ukuze aboshwe engazange avele enkantolo.Usole owayewusihlalo weKhomishana kaZondo, iJaji uRaymond Zondo athe laphula uMthethosisekelo wezwe libophisa uZuma ngaleya ndlela.“Into esasiyibanga nohulumeni wangaleso sikhathi ukuthi akawulandeli umthetho. Akekho umuntu ozovele agwetshwe esendlini ngoba kuthiwa wayengumengameli wezwe,” kusho uKhanyile.Uthe i-Criminal Procedure Act ikubeka kucace ukuthi uma kuwukuthi uyasolakala, kumele ubekwe icala futhi ubuzwe ukuthi uyalivuma noma uyaliphika.Uqhube wathi umthetho uyakucacisa ukuthi lowo osolwayo unalo ilungelo lokumelwa ummeli, bese liyaqulwa icala, ekugcineni kukhishwe isigwebo.“Sonke siyalingana phambi komthetho, lokho kuhlanganisa umengameli okhona njengamanje  nowayephethe phambilini,” kusho uKhanyile.Usamile emazwini okuthi akazange ashise, atape noma abulale umuntu ngesikhathi sezibhelu zangoJulayi 2021.UKhanyile uthe umsulwa futhi uhulumeni akanabo ubufakazi obuqanda ikhanda bokuthi nguye owayiphaka ngesikhathi somtapo.Uveze nokuthi uzophuma phambili ngoba wonke amacala abekwe wona okuphehla izibhelu akazange awenze.NgoLwesihlanu, uKhanyile uboshwe kule nkantolo ngesikhathi ezovela ngelinye icala elithinta umtapo, angaphande ngebheyili kaR5 000 kulona.Uboshiwe wabekwa icala lokuphula umthetho omayelana nokuhlangana kwabantu endaweni eyodwa nelokubopha itulo lokugovuza umphakathi ukuba uvuke udlambedlu.OKlebe okuyibona ababophe uKhanyile bathe ukuboshwa kwakhe kusukela enkulumeni ayenze ngoMashi nonyaka, eGoli.Kuthiwa wathi ngeke lube khona ukhetho eNingizimu Afrika uma kususwa iqembu lakhe, uMkhonto weSizwe Party nomholi walo uZuma ohlwini lamaqembu nabantu ababezovotelwa.Manje oKlebe bathi ngenkulumo yakhe wayehlose ukugovuza umphakathi uvuke injebomvu uma kungenzeki akufunayo.Udedeliwe uKhanyile ngebheyili njengoba ezobuyela enkantolo ngoSepthemba 23, ngawo wonke amacala athweswe wona.UMbuso uveze ukuthi uzobiza ofakazi abangu-62 uma sekuqulwa icala. Ummeli kaKhayile uzobiza ummangalelwa nabanye ofakazi ababili.

UNOBHALA we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Bheki Mtolo, useyalelwe yinhlangano yakhe ukuthi axolise kumalungu enyunyana i-National Education, Health and Allied Workers Union ngenkulumo yakhe elumelayo ayeyibhekise kuwo ngesikhathi ekhuluma namakhulu abantu emcimbini owawuseKokstad ngoJulayi nonyaka.Kulo mcimbi, uMtolo wakhwela wadilika kumalungu alenyunyana angabasebenzi bakahulumeni, ewasola ngokuthi yiwona awumthelela wokuthi kungasetshenzwa ngendlela ezikhungweni zikahulumeni.  Kwenzeka lokhu nje, kube khona kuwona aphumele obala agxeka uhulumeni wobumbano obunjwe.Emva komhlangano phakathi kukaNobhala-Jikelele wale nhlangano, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula nobuholi be-Nehawu neCosatu izolo, uthe kuyalelwe uMtolo ukuthi ahoxise akusho aphinde axolise ngokungenambandela kulawa malungu.“Umhlangano uthole ukuthi inkulumo kaMtolo yayingafanele, kanjalo nendawo eyathulwa kuyo yaqinisa uqhekeko kunoma yakhe ubumbano phakathi kwamadleladawonye. Kunqunywe ukuthi uMtolo akhiphe isitatimende axolise ngokungenambandela, kanjalo neNehawu  ihoxise amacala okwehliswa kwesithunzi asenkantolo,” kusho uMbalula.UMtolo uyalelwe ukuthi isitatimende asikhiphe kusuka izolo noma namhlanje, ngaleyo ndlela i-Nehawu ihoxise icala elisenkantolo. Le nyunyana beyifuna uMtolo ne-ANC bakhokhe inhlawulo ka-R2 million ngenkulumo yakhe njengoba beyifake amaphepha eNkantolo eNkulu yaseMgungundlovu.UMengameli we-Nehawu, uMnuz Mike Shingange, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi bazolihoxisa icala abalifake enkantolo emva kokuthi uMtolo exolisile.“Emva kwenkulumo yakhe elumelayo, sazama ukuveza ilaka lethu kodwa ngokubona ukuthi ayikho into eyenzekayo, sabona kungcono siye enkantolo. Kodwa emva kokuthi esexolisile, sizolihoxisa icala,” usho kanje.Yize kunjalo, uShingange uthe usamile enkulumeni yakhe yokuthi njengamadlelandawonye e-ANC kwakumele nabo bevunyelwe babe nombono ekubunjweni kwalo hulumeni.Phambilini, uNobhala-Jikelele we-SACP, uMnuz Solly Mapaila, usole i-ANC ngokwakha uhulumeni wobumbano ne-DA.  UMbalula uthe akukho zinyathelo abazozithathela lo mholi njengoba abekusho kuwumbono wahe, wathi kodwa akulungile ukukhuluma ngento ethinta amadlelandawoye ungayivezi ngaphakathi enhlanganweni.

NKOSIKHONA CELEWELULEKWE kabanzi umfundisi webandla labasindisiwe, i-Acts of Obedience Ministries (AOM), ngesikhathi ebopha ifindo likasofasilahlane.UMfundisi Bhuti Mbuthumo ubebopha ifindo lomshado noNksz Nonhlanhla Maphumulo, kanti umshado ubuhlelelwe esizindeni sebandla esiseNew Germany.Umholi webandla uMfundisi Thandie Ngonelo, ubeluleke ngesineke bobabili kepha waqondisa kakhulu encekwini yeNkosi, eyihlomisa ngeziyalo ezinqala engazisebenzisa emshadweni.Eqhulwini uyale uMbuthumo ngokuthi kumele azi ukuthi emshadweni kuyaxolwa. "Ngifuna ukukuxoxela mina ukuthi njengoba ushada nalo wesifazane zikhona izinto ezizobonakala zivuka maphakathi nendlela. Kodwa kumele wazi ukuthi kuyaxolwa emshadweni,'' usho kanje uMfu Ngonela.Waqhubeka wamyala ngokuthi enze isiqiniseko sokuthi uyazidongcula izinto ezibonakala zingaba yisithiyo emshadweni wabo. "Uyabona mfundisi uma kukhona into ema endleleni yomshado wenu kodwa ubona ukuthi unamandla okuthi uyigudluze, ubomane wenze kanjalo,'' kweluleka uMfu Ngonela.Inkulumo kaMfu Ngonela, yokugudluza into ethikameza umshado uyiyamanise nesibonelo sowesifazane owayeshadile kodwa ethanda kakhulu ithelevishini aze akhohlwe ukuthi unomyeni.Uqhube walandisa wathi ngelinye ilanga unkosikazi wafika umyeni wakhe eseyikhiphile endlin ithelevishini.UMfu Ngonelo uthinte nendaba yokubekezelelana emshadweni, wathi kuwumgogodla omkhulu ogcina umshado uphila isikhathi eside kakhulu.UMbuthumo uthembise ukuthi uzomthanda futhi amnakekele umkakhe impilo yakhe yonke. Uthe kuningi kakhulu okuhle akuthandayo ngomkakhe."Ngiyakuthembisa mkami ukuthi ngizokuthanda, ngikunakekele kuze kube sihlukaniswa ukufa,'' usho kanje uMbuthumo, emfaka indandatho unkosikazi wakhe, maqede kwaqhuma umkikizo.Akasalanga ngaphandle unkosikazi, naye wenze isethembiso esifanayo kumyeni wakhe.

UYAQHUBEKA ugingqigonqo wezikhundla kumasipala okungekho kuwo iqembu elathola izihlalo ezanele ukuba libuse ngokuzimela, uMvoti.INkantolo eNkulu eMgungundlovu ichithe umhlangano okwakhishwa kuwo iMeya, uMnuz Philani Mavundla, noSomlomo, uMnuz Mfundo Masondo.UMavundla noMasondo, abangamakhansela e-ABC, bakhishwa ngevoti lokungabethembi ubuholi babo emhlanganweni womkhandlu owawungeledlule.NgoLwesibili, inkantolo ikhiphe isinqumo sesikhashana esivimba ukukhishwa kukaMavundla noMasondo.Abafuna ukukhipha uMavundla noMasondo ezikhundleni bayalelwe ukuba bafake amaphepha asenkantolo ngaphambi kuka-Agasti 6, baveze ukuthi kungani uMavundla noMasondo kufanele bakhishwe ezikhundleni?UMavundla bakhishwa ezikhundleni emhlangaweni owawubizwe wuMnyango wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana neziNdaba zoMdabu KwaZulu-Natal.Amakhansela ayebhalele uMphathiswa woMnyango, uNkk Bongi Sithole-Moloi, emcela ukuba abize umhlangano, ekhala ngokuthi uMasondo akafuni ukubiza umhlangano.Isiphakamiso sokuthi kukhishwe uMavundla noMasondo sesekwa amakhansela e-IFP nawe-ANC.Kwabe sekuqokwa ikhansela le-IFP, uMnuz Zamani Malembe, kwesobumeya, uNkk Ntombi Ngubane, we-ANC, yena waqokelwa kwesikasomlomo.UMalembe wabuye wasula esikhundleni emva komyalelo wobuholi be-IFP.Amakhansela e-ABC awudikila umhlangano, aveza ukuthi anesivimbelo sasenkantolo evimba ukuhlala komhlangano.UMasondo uthe babevele beshilo ukuthi kwakungekho emthethweni ukukhishwa kwabo.“Umhlangano esakhishwa kuwo wawufana nomhlangano waphansi kwesihlahla, basebenzisa ubunsizwa, benza ngomqondo waserenki. Bakwenza lokhu bephikisana nezinkantolo.”UMasondo uthe ukukhishwa kwabo ngokungekho emthethweni kushayisa amakhala.Uthe ziningi izinqumo ezithathiwe, nezinto ezenzekile kulezi nsukwana bekhishiwe ezikhundleni.UMasondo uthe ngosuku olulandela abakhishwa ngalo kwahlala umhlangano womkhandlu owabuyisela emsebenzini imenenja kamasipala esamisiwe, uNksz Noxolo Ndaba.“Ayikho enye into eyakhulunywa kuloyo mhlangano, kwakhulunywa lena yokubiyiswa kwemenenja kamasipala esamisiwe kuphela. Imenenja kamasipala ibhekene nezinsolo ezibucayi. Bekufanele ukuthi balinde uhlelo lwayo lokuqondiswa ubugwegwe luze luphele. Uma ibingenacala ibizotholakala imsulwa.”UMasondo uthe kwaba nemizamo yokuxosha abanye abasebenzi, kwaphinde kwagqekezwa nasehhovisi lakhe.“Kwagqekezwa kwabili ehhovisi lami. Kusho ukuthi kukhona imikhoshosho ababefuna ukuyenza.”UMasondo uthe angeke bavume ukuthi umasipala uphenduke isidleko senkohlakalo.Alikho iqembu elathola izihlalo ezanele ukuthi libuse ngokuzimela umasipala waseMvoti.I-IFP inezihlalo ezingu-10, i-ANC ineziyisishagalolunye, i-ABC yona ineziyisikhombisa.

ISIKHALO esafakwa owesifazane ekhala ngokuhlukumezeka lapho asebenzela khona esitolo sokudlela iBabel, eMenlyn siphoqe izikhulu zomnyango wezaBasebenzi ukuba ziqale umkhankaso wokukhuculula kule mboni.NgoLwesithathu ithimba labahloli bezindawo zokudlela ebelihambisana nethimba lomnyango wezasekhaya, ligasele eSandton lihlola izindawo eziyisithupha zokudlela. Kuboshwe abasebenzi abahlanu okukhona kubo nomphathi wendawo yokudlela iTang, eSandton, kwavalwa nezinye ezintathu ngokungalandeli imigomo yokusebenza nezokupheppha kulezi zindawo.Ababoshiwe babekwe amacala okuba kuleli nokusebenza ngokungemthetho ngemuva kokuthi behluleke ukuveza amaphepha agunyaza ukuba kuleli. [BREAKING NEWS] Five employees, including a manager, were arrested for working without permits at Tang restaurant in Sandton, Joburg, during a Department of Employment and Labour blitz.Tune into Newzroom AfriKA DStv channel 405 for more. pic.twitter.com/0ccjZl9B2ILo mkhankaso uqale ngemuva kwesikhalo sentokazi eyaziwa ngoMihlali Nobavu enikele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ikhala ngokuthi eBabel abasebenzi bayaphoqwa ukuba bazithengele bona umfaniswano womsebenzi, futhi imali yokubonga abayithola kumakhasimende ifika kubo isinconzuliwe.Umnyango wezaBasebenzi uthe imboni yezokuvakasha ingenye yemikhakha egqame kakhulu futhi izohlezi ihlolwa njalo ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukulandelwa kwemithetho eyengamele abasebenzi.Ngempelasonto uNgqongqoshe walo mnyango uNomakhosazana Meth udalule ukuthi bathole ukuthi miningi imithetho engalandelwa e-Ocean Basket naseBabel, futhi lezi zindawo zikweleta abasebenzi  imali engaphezu kuka-R1m abaholelwa imali encane kakhulu ngokwemigomo ebekiwe.Ungqongqoshe uthe ithimba labo elinikele kule ndawo eseMenlyn Mall lifike lahlola nezinye izindawo lathola ukuthi i-Ocean Basket neBabel ababakhokheli abasebenzi iholo eliwumgomo kaR27.58 ngehora. IBabel ikweleta aasebenzi abahlanza le ndawo imali enguR271,984.32 abasizi bamakhasimende bona bakweletwa uR295,547.28.

INKOSI uNtuthukoyezwe Zuzifa kaMangosuthu Buthelezi, ithi undunankulu kaZulu, inkosi Mangosuthu Buthelezi, iyajabula lapho ikhona uma ibuka izithelo zezithukuthuku zayo.Lokhu ikusho ngesikhathi ikhuluma nabantu abebehambele ihlambo likaButhelezi, elikhishwe ngoMgqibelo, oLundi.Inkosi Zuzifa ithe amagalelo kaButhelezi ayaqhubeka nokubonakala yize sekuphele unyaka akhothama.Inkosi uZuzifa ithe uButhelezi ube nemivuzo eminingi ngesikhathi engundunankulu wamakhosi akwaZulu amathathu ehlukene.“Uwe evuka nobukhosi bukaZulu, evika abakwabo nabezizwe.”Inkosi uZuzifa ithe ukulwa kukaButhelezi kwamfakela amazondo waze wazondwa ngisho nangabakwabo endlunkulu kaZulu.“Kwakuthiwa uwumuntu wakwaButhelezi. Lokhu akuzange kukuqede amandla. Waqhubeka nokuthanda indlunkulu, iminyaka engu-70 yonke.”Inkosi Zuzifa ithe ibona amazondo ayethwelwe uButhelezi esehlele kuyona.“Sengiyezwa manje ukuthi cha ijazi loMntwana sengiligqokile. Leli jazi loMntwana makhosi asendlunkulu linothando nenzondo. Sengibona abantu sebengizonda angazi ukuthi kwenzenjani. Ngithi angikusho lokhu ngoba ngiyazi ukuthi kusazokuba nzima kakhulu.Inkosi Zuzifa ithe uButhelezi ubulwelwe kakhulu ubukhosi, yathi abaholi be-IFP banethuba lokubuyisa isithunzi sobukhosi njengoba umengameli weqembu, uMnuz Velenkosini Hlabisa, enguNgqongoshe woMnyango wokuBusa ngokuBambisana kanye neziNdaba zoMdabu, bese kuthi ilungu lesigungu esiphezulu eqenjini, uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi,  abe uMphathiswa womnyango KwaZulu-Natal.“Uma sehluleke manje ukubuyisa ubukhosi, kungadingeka ukuthi sikhohlwe. Uma singahluleka ukukwenza manje, kuyobe kufana nokuthi kuyize leze lokhu esikwenzayo kokutusa uMntwana. Kuyofana nokuthi simkhafulele ebusweni. Ngiyaxolisa ukukusho lokhu kodwa kusuka enhliziyweni.”UHlabisa uthe uButhelezi uhleka yedwa lapho ekhona uma ebuka imiphumela yokhetho lwangoMeyi.Ukhetho lwangoMeyi lwalungolokuqala uButhelezi engasekho.I-IFP yakhula kulolu khetho, yazithola ihola uhulumeni wokubambisana KwaZulu-Natal, yaphinde yaba ingxenye kahulumeni wokubambisana kuzwelonke naseGauteng.UHlabisa uthe uButhelezi ube ingelosi enhle kubona.“Ukhetho luchome uMntwana uphaphe lwegwalagwala.”Undunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, uthe uButhelezi wavulela abaholi abaningi amathuba.“Iqiniso lithi sasingeke saziwe, sasingeke senze lutho, sasizokuba nje amadoda ajwayelekile aseVumanhlamvu.”Ihlambo likaButhelezi belihanjelwe abantu abaqhamuka emikhakheni eyehlukene okubalwa kubo abantwana basendlunkulu, amakhosi, abameli basemajajini nezazi zamasiko.Inqina ephume kwaPhindangene ibuye nentibane.Ungoti wezamasiko, uSolwazi Otty Nxumalo, uthe kuqala kwakungazingelwa izinyamazane, wathi amakhosi akuqala ayezingela izitha zawo.Isizwe sakwaButhelezi sinxuse inkosi uZuzifa ukuba ihambe ezinyathelweni zikaButhelezi.Ibambabukhosi lesizwe, uMpikayise Buthelezi, uthe uButhelezi usenzele konke isizwe.“Sifisa sengathi ukhamba lungafuza imbiza.”
