WABOSHWA ngesikhathi engumphathi wesiteshi samaphoyisa eBhekithemba, eMlaza obesebe yiphoyisa iminyaka engu-32 obhekene necala lokufumbathiswa uR120 000 ukuze kunyamalale idokodo likamfowabo.UMnuz Khephu Ndlovu, osule ngonyaka odlule embuthweni wamaphoyisa esenguLieutenant Colonel, ugqigqa eNkantolo yesiFunda yasePinetown nabanye abane.Uthweswe icala lokufumbathiswa imali nelokuphazamisa ukusebenza kwengalo yomthetho okungamacala awaphikayo.UMbuso usola uNdlovu (ongumsolwa wesine) ukuthi wamukela uR120 000 owawufakwe esikhwameni semali epaki yezimoto esiteshini samaphoyisa eDurban Central.Le mali kuthiwa yayivela kuNkk Sibongile Ndlovu (umsolwa wesibili) ngomyalelo womyeni wakhe ongumfowabo kaNdlovu, uFelokwakhe Ndlovu (ongumsolwa wesithathu).Kuthiwa imali kwakucubuzwa ngayo amagabade ukuze uNdlovu asebenzise isikhundla ayesiphethe emaphoyiseni ayalele uKaputeni Bonginkosi Dlamini (ongumsolwa wokuqala) kulahlwe ubufakazi becala lokubulala. Lagcina lisusiwe kuDlamini lelo cala.UDlamini wayephenya uFelokwakhe ngecala lokubulala uMnuz Thulani Nxumalo owayengunobhala wegatsha le-ANC KwaNdengezi.Limgojelile ngoMeyi wakulo nyaka lelo cala uFelokwakhe wagixabezwa ngesigwebo sikadilikajele.UNdlovu (Khephu) uthe akazani nemali okukhulunywa ngayo futhi akamazi uDlamini wayengakaze ambone empilweni yakhe.Uthe wahlangana noNkk Ndlovu, abesilisa ababili, obizwa ngomkhulu omunye ngoMpofu ukuze kudingidwe izinto ezithinta umndeni.Lezo zinto uthe wayefuna umkhulu amboleke abafana ababeseqenjini lakhe lengoma ukuze banandise emcimbini womndeni owawuzokuba ngo-Okthoba 2019  kwaNdlovu, eMgungundlovu.Lo fakazi uthe uyakweshwama ukuthi babehlangene ngenhloso yokumnikeza imali ukuze kulahleke ubufakazi ecaleni elalibhekene noFelokwakhe.Ubuzwe umshushisi u-Advocate Lawrence Gcaba ukuthi  wayefunani emsebenzini ngoMgqibelo ekubeni isikhundla ayesiphethe sasimdinga emsebenzini phakathi nezinsuku.“Sasisekhempini eDurban Central, sicija ikhwaya yamaphoyisa engangiphethe isikhundla khona eyayizoya komela isifundazwe emcimbini owawuzokuba seBloemfontein. Akukho esasikuxoxa okwakuyimfihlo,” kusho uNdlovu.Enkantolo bekukhona owayengumkhulumeli wamaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uVincent Mdunge ezokweseka uNdlovu (Khephu) othe wayeyibamba lomphathi siteshi eboshwa.UDlamini nabaganene bakwaNdlovu bagqunywe ezitokisini. Ungaphandle ngebheyili uNdlovu (Khephu) nomsolwa wesihlanu oyindodana yabaganene uMnuz Lindokuhle Ndlovu.Bebebukeka bezikhululekele abasolwa futhi bexoxa namalungu emindeni yabo abezobeseka enkantolo uma iMantshi uMuntukayise Khumalo isaliguqisile icala.Kuyaqhubeka ukwethulwa kobufakazi namuhla.

UPHIKE walala ngomhlane umsolwa wesine ecaleni lokubulawa komrepha uKiernan ‘AKA’ Forbes nomngani wakhe uTebello ‘Tibz’ Motsoane ukuthi isamba semali esangena ebhange lakhe sasiyinkokhelo yokusoconga abafi.U-AKA noTibz badutshulwa bafa ngaphandle kwendawo yokudlela ekuFlorida, iWish ngoFebhuwari 10 nyakenye.U-Advocate Joe Wolmarans omele umsolwa wesine uMnuz Mziwethemba Harvey Gwabini (36), izolo eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThekwini ngesikhathi efuna isitatimende sikamsolwa sokucela ibheyili, uthe njengoba umbuso ubambelele kulesi samba sikaR800 000, ukhuluma ngento eyamane yaziqondanela nje. .“UR803 000 ngawukhokhelwa yinkampani ethembekile engangenze ibhizinisi nayo. Empeleni ubudlelwano bami nayo busuka eminyakeni emithathu eyedlule,” kusho isitatimende sikaGwabini.Uqhube wathi uma sekuqhubeka uphenyo kuzofanele kuvele ukuthi kwakungesikhona okokuqala ukuthi lenkampani imfakele isamba semali.Ugcizelele ukuthi ukungena kwalesi samba ngosuku okwabulawa ngalo abafi nokukhokhela kwakhe umsolwa wesihlanu uMnuz Lindokuhle Ndimande isamba esingu-R133 000 nakho kwaziqondanela nje.Uqhube wathi kuleyo mali, wayeyifake yathi xaxa njengesipho njengoba uNdimande wayezoshada.Uphinde waphika neyokuthi wake wahamba ngeBMW egrey okuthiwa yiyo eyayilokhu imlandele njalo u-AKA esuka esikhumulweni sezindiza eya ehhotela kwaze kwaba uya endaweni yokudlela kuFlorida. “Isikhathi esiningi le moto ibisetshenziswa izisebenzi zami uma zenza imisebenzi eyahlukene, okufaka phakathi nokuhambisa izingane zami esikoleni. Angizikhumbuli ngiyishayela ngosuku lwesigameko,” kusho isitatimende sikaGwabini.Okubuye kwahlaluka esitatimendeni sakhe ukuthi ungusomabhizinisi ongumacaphuna kusale.Kuvele ukuthi uhlala emzini kaR1.4 million nenkosikazi yakhe yokuqala ePinetown, unenkampani yemayini iGwabs Trading (Pty) Ltd, eyokwakha neyonogada athe ayibhalisiwe ngokusemthethweni.Isitatimende sithe wenza imali ephakathi kukaR2 million kuya kuR3 million ngonyaka ngenkampani yemayini, kuthi kweyokwakha, enze imali ephakathi kukaR300 000 kuya kuR400 000 ngenyanga.Uthe unezisebenzi ezingu-64 e-Ermelo eMpumalanga, bese eba nezingu-12 ezisebenza kweyonogada, kubona kukhona nalaba asolwa nabo ecaleni lokubulala u-AKA noTibz.Unamakhosikazi amabili, eyokuqala eneminyaka engu-34 ayishada ngo-2015 ingudokotela esibhedlela esisePinetown.Inkosikazi yesibili eneminyaka engu-26 ayishada ngo-2021, yenza iziqu zobumeli e-UKZN. Zinhlanu izingane anazo kula makhosikazi, zineminyaka ephakathi kowodwa nengu-16.UGwabini uneziqu ze-Information Technology (IT) azithola eDurban University of Technology (DUT).Uthe emacaleni abekwa wona umbuso, uyawaphika wonke ngoba icala abekwe lona lintekenteke.Ngaphambi kokufundwa kwesitatimende sikaGwabini, kufundwe esikamsolwa wesihlanu uMnuz Lindokuhle Ndimande, esifundwe ngummeli wakhe u-Advocate Simphiwe Mlotshwa.Kuhlaluke kuso ukuthi uyazisebenza njengoba enepulazi lezinkukhu abambisene kulo nabanye ababili. Kule lobhizinisi, ungenelwa imali engu-R70 000 ngenyanga.Uveze ukuthi ubuye angenelwe uR20 000 ngenyanga ngetekisi yakhe eyodwa esebenza ngaphansi kukasoseshini waseMalukazi.Uveze ukuthi unomndeni wakhe, okukhona kuwo namakhosikazi amathathu kayise.Unobudlelwano obuqondile nowesifazane abesezinhlelweni zokuyomlobola ngo-R25 000 ngePhasika. Uthi unezingane ezimbili, enye ihlala nonina (umawakhe uLindokuhle), enye ihlala nonina wayo, bonke bondliwa nguye.IMantshi uMnuz Vincent Hlatshwayo ulihlehlisele uMashi 27 icala ukuze umbuso uphendule izitatimende zonhlanu, abasolwa abacele ngazo ibheyili.Khona manjalo, uNgqongqoshe wezoBulungiswa uMnuz Ronald Lamola ukuqinisekisile ukuthi sebewahambisile amaphepha eSwatini, okucela ukuthi kubuyiswe abasolwa ababili abakule liyazwe.

OKHULE kanzima ukhumbule izintandane, abafelokazi nabampofu amahhashi akhe ewina emincintiswaneni yamahhashi ehlukene.UMnuz Nyanga Ndlangamandla ongumlimi nekhansela eDumbe, uthe amahhashi akhe amane abengenele imijaho yamahhashi kuyo okungowaseNkandla, owaseDundee nowaseKing Cetshwayo awine uR250 000  kulo nyaka. Kule mali usebenzise uR70 000 wajabulisa umphakathi wangakubo odla imbuya ngothi ngomcimbi obekudliwa kuwo izinkomo ezimbili, muva nje.UNdlangamandla uthe unamahhashi angu-10 angenela imijaho, mane awinile kuwo. Lama hhhashi okunguShenge athi uliqambe esusela esibongweni sikaMntwana waKwaPhindangene ngoba lithembekile njengaye, akwenzeki lingawini, uBaselona, uMthwal'zethule no-Asenali.Uthe uqale ukungenela imijaho yamahhashi eyesekwa omasipala ngo-2008, ngaphambi kwalokho ubengenela imijaho yasemakhaya ebihlelwa abafuyi bamahhashia, obekuwinwa kuyo izingubo zokulala."Ngikhule kanzima ngikhuliswa usingamama. Ngiyazi ukuthi kunjani ukulala ungadlile, ukugqoka ihembe elilodwa amasonto amabili lingawashwa uya esikoleni. Lokho kuhlupheka mina kungenze ngazibamba zaqina, ngangayeki ukufunda. Ngifuna lolo gqozi ukulunika izingane ezikhuliswa ngabafelokazi neziyizintandane ukuze zazi ukuthi noma ukhule kanzima uyakwazi ukutabalasa uze uzimele nawe udonse abanye,"  kusho yena.Uthe unemindeni emithathu kuyo okukhona ephethwe ngabafelokazi nephethwe izingane ayondlayo nyanga zonke. Kuyo kunezingane eziyisikhombisa ezifundayo azithengela umfaniswano nesinkwa zonke izinsuku."EDumbe miningi imindeni eswele, indlala ibhokile ngithe uma ngithola le mali ngase ngicabanga kuthi angibuyisele emphakathini. Abantu badle basuthe, ngingadli ngedwa," kusho uNdlangamandla.Uthe ufisa ukuthi uhulumeni umsize umnike indawo yokulima angatshala kuyo ummbila ozogaywa ube impuphu ezonikezwa imizi eswele njalo ngenyanga. Uthe amahhashi omjaho kuyabiza ukuwanakekela akufani namahhashi ajwayelekile okulanda izinkomo."Ngiwumfuyi ngiyakwazi ukunakekela imfuyo, kimi akuwona umthwalo ukuba nehhashi. Into eke ingithwalise kanzima ukuthi wona adinga ukunakekelwa ngokwehlukile ngoba awomjaho," kuchaza uNdlangamandla.

UNEPHUPHO lokuba unjiniyela ohlonishwayo kuleli nakwamanye amazwe, umfundi oqokwe ukuba ayomela elakuleli emqhudelwaneni wamazwe omhlaba, i- International Science Technology Engineering Competition, ozokuba se-Indonesia ngenyanga ezayo.USiqiniseko Mpontshana (20) waseNdumo kuMasipala Umkhanyakude, ofunda u-Grade 12 eMandla Mthethwa School of Excellence, uqokwe ohlelweni i-Eskom Expo for Young Scientists olukhuthaza ukuqhamuka namakhono nezinto ezintsha ezingalekelela umphakathi kanti umqhudelwano uzothatha izinsuku ezintathu phakathi kukaMeyi 2 no- 5.Engxoxweni neSolezwe, lo mfundi oseke wadla umhlanganiso emiqhudelwaneni yakuleli ngombukiso wakhe wemoto azisungulele yona, uthe isifiso sakhe ukuba yi-Megatronic Electrical Engineer. “Ngiqale ukuba nombono wokwakha le moto ngisemncane kakhulu ngifunda amabanga aphansi eJozini Primary. Ngesikhathi ngikhula, ngenza nocwaningo, bengilokhu ngiqhubeka nokuthuthukisa umsebenzi wami okuthe ngo-2021 ngathola indondo yethusi ezingeni lesifunda emqhudelwaneni we-Eskom Expo for Young Scientists,”  usho kanje.Uthe uphinde wawungenela ngonyaka olandelayo esethe ukuthuthukisa umsebenzi wakhe, wahlomula ngendondo yegolide, okumvulele amasango njengoba eqokwe ukuthi abe yingxenye yososayensi abahambele i- International Science Fair eGoli nyakenye.USiqiniseko, ongumagcino kwabo ezinganeni eziyisikhombisa, uthe umbono wokwakha imoto esebenza ngogesi edonsa inqola ngaphandle kokuthi ixhunywe kuyo umfikele ngoba abantu abaningi abakwazi ukushayela izimoto ezidonsa izinqola. “Amanani ka-phethroli ayanyuka, ngakho uhlobo lwemoto enje lungaba yisisombululo.  Ngiphinde ngabona indlela izingozi ezanda ngayo emigwaqweni okudalwa ubudedengu babashayeli ngabona ukuthi uma kungasungulwa imoto ekwazi ukuthi izishayele zingancipha,”  kulandisa yena.Okunye akufakile, umayibuthe ovimba ukuthi imoto ingasondeli kakhulu kwenye athi kungehlisa ukushayisana kwezimoto kanti imoto yakhe iyashajwa isikhathi esingangemizuzu eyishumi kuphela.Yize kumthokozisa ukuthola isimemo, kodwa uthe leli thuba eliyingqayizivele lingamphunyuka ngenxa yesimo somnotho njengoba kungekho muntu osebenzayo kwabo.Ngokwencwadi eshicilelwe abenkampani, i-Eskom izokhokha izindleko zika-R45 000 okubalwa kuzona ukukhokhela uhambo, indawo yokulala nokudla bese kuthi oqokiwe ahlangabeze ngo-R6000 kuphela.Unina uNkk Ntombiziphi Mpontshana uthe ngesikhathi bethola ukuthi indodana yabo ithole ithuba lokuyokhangisa umsebenzi wayo phesheya iqhudelana nezincitha-buchopho zakwamanye amazwe, kube yizindaba ezibajabulisa kakhuku ekhaya.“Uvele ungumuntu ozimiselayo uma enza okuthile.  Ukhule ewumuntu othandayo ukusebenza ngokuzimisela futhi ethanda izinto ezithinta ubuchwepheshe. Nokho sisadidekile ukuthi sizokwenzenjani ngezindleko zohambo njengoba kukhona imali okudingeka ukuthi ayikhokhe kuqala ewu- R6000 ukuhlangabezana ne-Eskom, ezokhokhela uhambo, ukudla nendawo yokulala,” usho kanje.Uthe njengoba lesi simemo bebengasilindele, okwamanje ubamba uyayeka, ngakho ufisa noma ngubani ongalekelela ekufezweni kwephupho lendodana yakhe.

UMCULI uZandie Lorraine Khumalo uthi sekuseduze yena, nomndeni wakhe baphumule ngoba kunenqubekela phambili ecaleni lokubulawa kukaSenzo Meyiwa, owayengunozinti we-Orlando Pirates.UMeyiwa wayeqonywe ngumculi uKelly Khumalo futhi banengane, nongudadewabo kaZandie, wadutshulwa ngo-Okthoba 2014, ekubo kwezelamani eVosloorus ngo-2014.NgoLwesine iJaji uRatha Mokgoatlheng elangemele icala, eliqulwa eNkantolo eNkulu yasePitoli, likhiphe isinqumo mayelana nokwamukelwa kobufakazi bezitatimende zokuvuma icala okwenziwa ngabasolwa ababili, kwabahlanu ecaleni, okuthiwa kwenziwa nguMuzikawukhulelwa Sibiya noBongani Ntanzi.Ijaji linqume ukuthi abasolwa benza izitatimende ngaphandle kokuphoqwa. Ngemuva kwesinqumo, uZandie ongomunye wofakazi ecaleni, utshele iphephandaba ukuthi isinqumo sisho lukhulu kubo.“Kutshengisa ukuthi indlela yombuso yokuvalela abenzi bobubi ayisezokuba nasiphazamiso. Kunenqubekela phambili. “Isikhathi samanga nemidlinzo sesiphelile manje, sikhuluma ngamaqiniso nobufakazi. Sekuseduze phambili nami nomndeni wami siphumule, silivale leli khasi futhi ngiyathemba kuzokwenza okufanayo emndenini kaSenzo,” kusho uZandie owaqala engumdansi oweseka udadewabo uKelly, ngaphambi kokucula ngokuzimela.

OWAYEYIMEYA kaMasipala waseThekwini, uNkk Zandile Gumede, uphika imibiko yokuthi udlelwe impahla ebiza izigidi zamaRandi.UNkk Gumede uthe ungamanga aluhlaza umbiko oshicilelwe ezikweni lezindaba elibika ngesingisi othi uphiko oludla impahla, i-Assets Forfeiture Unit, lushaqe izimoto nomuzi wakhe kanokusho.Ukusho lokhu esitatimendeni esikhishwe yinhlangano yakhe engenzi nzuzo, iMama Zandile Gumede Foundation.Umbiko uthe i-Assets Forfeiture Unit ishaqe impahla kaNkk Gumede yesamba sikaR25 million.Lo mbiko uthe ukushaqwa kwale mpahla kumayelana necala lenkohlakalo yezigidi zamaRandi yethenda yokuqoqa udoti eThekwini.UNkk Gumede, owusihlalo we-ANC kwisifunda iTheku, ungomunye wabantu ababhekene naleli cala.Okhulumela uNkk Gumede, uMnuz Siphelele Jiyana, uthe i-Assets Forfeiture Unit yagasela kanye emzini wakhe, yaphuma ilambatha.“Wonke umuntu uyazi ukuthi bagasela ngo-2019, ngo-Okthoba 10. Abazange bathole lutho futhi abaphindanga bagasela.”UNkk Gumede usale ngaphandle ngesikhathi kukhethwa abaya esiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal njengoba esabhekene namacala.Uthe la mampunge okuthi udlelwe impahla asabalaliswa ngabantu abafuna ukungcolisa igama lakhe.“Sinxusa abezindaba ukuba bayeke ukudukisa izwe ngokubika izinto abazi kahle kamhlophe ukuthi azisilona iqiniso. UNkk Gumede uyisakhamuzi sakuleli okufanele sihlonishwe njengoba kuhlonishwa bonke abantu bakuleli.”UNkk Gumede nabangu-21 aboshwe nabo bagqigqa enkantolo ngamacala okubalwa kuwo elokwakha itulo lokwenza inkohlakalo, elenkohlakalo, elokukhwabanisa, elokuphulwa komthetho olawula ukusebenza kwemali kamasipala nelokukhishwa ngendlela engekho emthethweni kwethenda yophiko olubhekele ukuqoqwa kukadoti eThekwini, i-Durban Solid Waste, ka-R300 million.Le thenda yakhishwa ngesikhathi uNkk Gumede eseyimeya yalo mkhandlu oyisizinda somnotho waKwaZulu-Natal.Icala lizobuyela enkantolo ngoJulayi 22.UJiyana uthe abukho ubufakazi obuyamanisa uNkk Gumede naleli cala.“Abezindaba abakaze beze enkantolo ukuzobika ngokwenzekayo ngoba nabo bayazi ukuthi akukho okuhlanganisa uNkk Gumede naleli cala.”

UMSAKAZI woKhozi FM okuvele ukuthi unesifo somdlavuza, uZanele Mbokazi, useziphendulele esibonakalisweni senyanga yaseThekwini, uBhongolethu "Dr Khehlelezi, esasithi kunezidumbu ezimbili ezizophuma kulo msakazo emuva kwesikaBheka “Beekay” Mchunu. UZanele uthe baningi abantu abamthumelele i-video kaKhehlelezi ekhuluma ngesibonakaliso athi usitshelwe wuNkulunkulu.UZanele lokhu ukuveze ekhasini lakhe kwiFacebook.Kulona uphinde waveza izindaba zokuthi usephumile esibhedlela futhi ubonga yonke imikhuleko ayitholile.“Yize luselude uhambo olubheke ekutheni ngilulame, kodwa siyabonga kakhulu imikhuleko ngibuyile ekhaya,” kusho uZanele.Ekhuluma ngokushiwo uKhehlelezi uZanele, uthe konke ukuzwe esesibhedlela.“Lesi sibonakaliso siphume ngisesesibhedlela, mayelana nokuthi uNkulunkulu wathi ngizokufa ngalo nyaka. Lokhu kungikhumbuze u-Elijah nababholofithi baseBaal. Anohlolisisa imimoya njengoba ngiphikisana nalesi sipholofetho egameni likaJesu.” UZanele uthe uyindodakazi kaNkulunkulu, ngakho usazophila futhi ngeke aze afe. “Ngizofakaza ngobuhle bukaNkulunkulu,” kuphetha uZanele okuvele ukuthi uxinwe yisifo somdlavuza. Ekhuluma ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, uKhehlelezi, oke walingisa kuZalo futhi wasakaza kwiVuma FM, uthe uboniswe ngalo mshophi ngoMgqibelo owedlule, ngezithuba zika-10.23 ebusuku ngesikhathi ethandaza.Uthe uzwe izwi likaNkukunkulu limtshela ukuba avule uKhozi ngoba efuna abholofithe ngoKhozi."Ngibone ngalo nyaka izidumbu ezimbili emisakazweni. Ngithe 'Nkulunkulu usekhona oseshonile'. Uthe uNkulunkulu 'batshele ukuthi kusenabanye ababili abazoshona. Kukhona lo moya okumele uyothandazelwa oKhozini.'" Eqhuba, uKhehlelezi uthe kuzodingeka abantu ababili bakaShembe, abaseZayoni ababili, izangoma ezinhlanu nezinyanga ezintathu."Labo bantu bahola umthandazo. Uze wathi uMoya oyiNgcwele kimi, uma bekwenzeka, labo bantu bekufanele bangene esiteshini, bephethe amakhandlela amhlophe. Ngibone amakhandlela amhlophe. Bengena sengathi bayakhuluma. Sengathi kunomuntu abazomlanda ngaphakathi. Kukhona into okufanele iyolandwa kabi, ewumkhokha, phakathi ezindlini zokusakaza." UKhehlelezi uthe kusazogulwa kabi oKhozini, kubekhona abadlula emhlabeni. "Ngibone abantu bephathwa yizinyawo, abanye bephathwa yizibhobo bephakathi endaweni yokusebenzela."Uthe kufanele kube nempepho eshiswayo ngoba lo msakazo unabantu abadala. "Kukhona umsebenzi owadlula emhlabeni owayengeve elithanda Ukhozi." Uthe uyafisa ukuya oKhozini kodwa uyazi ngeke bamnake ngenxa yempakamo.

UZISHAYA isifuba uMengameli wezwe, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa, ngokuthi uzokhuza ibuya kuhulumeni, uma sekuqala ihlandla elisha emva kokhetho. URamaphosa uthe kuningi okwenziwe kuleli eminyakeni engu-30 edlule, ekubeni kube nezinselelo eziningi okubalwa kuzo ubhubhane iCovid-19, izikhukhula, izehlakalo zokwanda kobugebengu nezinye.Umengameli wezwe uthe kukho konke lokho, izwe aliguqanga ngamadolo.“Zizosukuma kakhulu izinto kuhulumeni ozongena ngemva kokhetho. Ngizobe ngiyingxenye kahulumeni olandelayo,” kusho uRamaphosa.URamaphosa ukusho lokhu ngoLwesibili, evula ingqungquthela ezobheka iqhaza lezinkampani ezihlomulisa abasebenzi ngamasheya, eSandton. Ukhuluma kanje nje uRamaphosa, ubhekene nenselelo ephuma emaqenjini amaningi ahlose ukukhipha i-ANC emandleni. Amaqembu afuna kwehle ukwesekwa kukaKhongolose nokuthi uhulumeni uphathwe ngokubambisana phakathi kwezinhlangano zepolitiki ezehlukene kunokuthi kuphathe iqembu elilodwa. URamaphosa uveze ukuthi ukunika abasebenzi amasheya kwenza ukuthi basebenze ngokuzikhandla ngoba basuke bengabanikazi baleyo nkampani.“Kwakha umdlandla futhi kuba nobudlelwano obuhle ngoba abasebenzi basuke bezazi ukuthi bayingxenye yenkampani. Uma bengabanikazi bayaziqonda izingqinamba ezibhekene nezinkampani ukuze bazikhulise,” kubeka uRamaphosa.Umengameli uqube wathi abasebenzi beza namasu okukhulisa ibhizinisi.“Kumele sincome ukuthi noma sisincane isibalo sabasebenzi abanamasheya ezinkampanini abasebenza kuzona kodwa ikhona inhlansi yethemba. Banguhhafu wesigidi kuleli abasebenzi abanamasheya lapho besebenza khona. Lokhu kusho ukuthi umsebenzi oyedwa kwabangu-20 emkhakheni ozimele, unamasheya enkampanini ayisebenzelayo,” kusho uRamaphosa. Wengeze ngokubalula izikhathi lapho ayehola khona abasebenzi ababeyinkukhu nempaka nomqashi.“Kwakuthi uma sizohlangana nabaqashi singasebenzi, bangafuni ngisho ukuphuza itiye, bathi ngeke baliphuze itiye lezitha. Abasebenzi babebuka abaqashi njengezitha zabo. Kodwa kwakuthi uma isidonsa imihlangano, bagcine abasebenzi beliphuzile itiye labaqashi nama-semishi ayesuke ethengiwe,” kusho uRamaphosa.Uqhube wathi nangesikhathi engumholi wenye yezinkampani, abasebenzi bamcela ukuthi abanikeze iqatha lokuthi babe namasheya ukuze basebenze ngokuzikhandla.“Bathi uma bengathola nje okuncane, bangangena noma yikuphi lapho kungangeneki khona. Lokhu kukhomba ngokusobala ukuthi bazinikela kakhulu uma bazi ukuthi nabo kukhona abazokuzuza.” URamaphosa uncome osomabhizinisi abancane abaphethe amabhizinisi ukuthi badela konke ukuze amabhizinisi abo athuthuke. Umengameli usonge ngokuthi uhulumeni wentando yabantu usebenze ngamandla ukuphucula umnotho ngoba phambilini abamnyama babevalelwe ngaphandle ngenxa yemithetho yobandlululo.

ILUNGU lesigungu esiphezulu le-ANC lithi akungadukiswa abantu, ayikho inhlangano yezepolitiki ebizwa nokuthi uMkhonto weSizwe (MK).UMnuz Sihle Zikalala ukhulume kanje esontweni e-UCCSA, eNanda, ngeSonto.Ubekade eyisikhulumi sosuku ethula isifundo kuhlonishwa amaqhawe ayabamba ishisa, elelwa inkululeko yezwe."Ayikho inhlangano yepolitiki ebizwa ngokuthi yiMK Party kodwa iZuma Party. UMkhonto weSizwe kwakungelona iqembu lepolitiki kodwa uphiko lwezempi le-ANC," kusho uZikalala.Ukhuthaze abantu ukuthi baye kovota ngoMeyi 29, wathi ukhetho oluhlukile kunezinye izinketho esezike zabakhona kule minyaka engu-30 yentando yabantu.UZikalala uthe lolu wukhetho oluzocacisa ngekusasa leNingizimu Afrika."Izinhlangano ezinomqondo ofanayo nowe-DA ziya ngokukhula njengoba sezibuya seziyi-ActionSA, Rise Mzansi ne-BOSA. Ngakolunye uhlangothi, sinamahlubuka afana ne-EFF nalokhu okubizwa ngokuthi uMkhonto weSizwe okuyiZuma Party," kusho uZikalala.IPhini likaNobhala we-ANC eThekwini, uMnuz Nkosenhle Madlala, osebenzise usuku lwakhe lokuzalwa wahlanganisa lesi sifundo, uhambe emazwini kaZikalala ekhuthaza abantu ukuthi bayovota.UMadlala uthe kubalulekile ukuhlonipha abalwela umzabalazo nemiphakathi abavela kuyona."Kuhle ukuvota ngoba uzikhethela wena umuntu ofuna akumele ezintweni ozifunayo. Simeme imindeni engu-25 eyashonelwa amalungu ayo, siyiphe okuncane, sikhombise ukuthi yize sinezinkinga ezingaka kepha asikhohliwe iyona," kusho uMadlala.UNksz Sibongile Shabalala waseNewtown A, eNanda ongumamkhulu wowayeyelungu le-ANC elashona, uNksz Nompumelelo Shabalala, uthe kubathoba amanxeba ukubizwa i-ANC izokhumbula izihlobo zabo."Sijabulile sonke siwumndeni kaMpume ngoba kwakubuhlungu esishiya emhlabeni. Impilo yashintsha ekhaya ngoba sasesibheke yena. Abantu abangafuni ukuyovota benza iphutha abazosisola ngalo impilo yabo yonke," kusho uNksz Shabalala.

UNESI, owathenga izinkabi ezabulala umyeni wakhe owunjiniyela, uvumbuke nesicelo sentethelelo ekugcineni lapho sekubhekwe ukuthi kukhishwe isinqumo secala. UNompumelelo Goncalves (31), obheke necala lokuhlela nokubulala umyeni wakhe, uxolisile emndenini kamufi, wathi wayengaqondile ukumbulala.Ummangalelwa ukusho lokhu encwadini efundwe eNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini ngoMsombuluko ngummeli wakhe, u-Advocate Mandla Luthuli.NgoLwesibili UNksz Goncalves nomfowabo uNkosinathi Zungu (40) bagwetshwe iminyaka engu-10 ngecala lokuthumba, engu-20 ngecala lokuphanga kusetshenziswa udlame nodilikajele ngokubulala okuhleliwe.Lo wesifazane ubhanselwe ngeminyaka eyisishiyagalombii ngamacala amabili okuphazamisa ukusebenza kwengalo yomthetho.Wabika amacala angekho emaphoyiseni okungelokuduka komuntu nelokwebiwa kweveni kamufi uMnuz Nkosi Timmy Langa owayengunjiniyela kwaTransnet.Encwadini yakhe uveze ukuthi wayehlukunyezwa wumufi, uMnuz Nkosi Timmy Langa owayengumyeni wakhe. Uthi wayephela yisibhaxu.ULuthuli ubekade emcelela eJajini, uSolwazi Bonke Dumisa, ukuthi limthambisele isigwebo.“Ngiyacela ukuthi ungixolisele emndenini wakwaLanga. Ungitshelele bona ukuthi ngiyaxolisa kakhulu ukuthi balahlekelwa ubhuti wabo. Kwakungeyona inhloso yami ukuthi kube khona umuntu obulawayo. Ngiyavuma engakwenza kwaba kubi futhi kwakungekho emthethweni,” kusho uLuthuli efunda incwadi uGoncalves abezicelela ngayo intethelelo.Lo mmeli uthe uGoncalves uhlalile ejele wadlinza, ezisesha emhlanganweni ayewubambe yedwa, nokuyilapho ebone khona ukuthi akwenza kwaba yiphutha, kwakungamele akwenze.Kuvele ukuthi uGoncalves akagcini ngokuba umhlengikazi, uphinde abe  nesikole esiqeqesha abahlengikazi eMgungundlovu.Ungumaqhuzu ngeziqu ze-honours zobuhlengikazi, uyinsika yekhaya futhi unengane eneminyaka eyisishiyagalombili ehlala nogogo wayo eMtubatuba.Uzincengelile kuDumisa wathi uyacela ukuthi achezuke esigwebeni sikadilikajele esibekelwe icala lokubulala okuhleliwe, okungenani amnikeze iminyaka engu-18 ejele.Umcele nokuthi amgwebe iminyaka eyishumi ngecala lokuphanga kusetshenziswa udlame, eyisishiyagalombili ngokuthumba nemihlanu icala ngalinye kwamabili ngokuphazamisa ukusebenza kwengalo yomthetho.UGoncalves waboshwa nomfowabo, uNkosinathi Zungu (40), ayekade emqashile ukuba kusocongwe umyeni wakhe.Ummeli kaZungu, uMnuz Jabulile Malinga, uthe ummangalelwa unabantwana abathathu futhi usetoke iminyaka emithathu. Umcelele ukuba athanjiselwe isigwebo ngoba wavuma ukuthi kukhona lapho abamba khona iqhaza kuthunjwa nangesikhathi kuphangwa umufi.Ukuhlabe wakuhlikiza konke lokhu umshushisi, u-Advocate Krishen Shah, wathi bayazenzisa abamangalelwa ngoba inhlanzi isishelwe amanzi.UShah uthe uxolo balufuna ngoba sebelahlwe ngamacala, sebefuna ukuthanjiselwa izigwebo nokudatshukelwa.“Ungqondongqondo ongummangalelwa wesibili (uGoncalves) wayengakumisa konke okwenzeka ukube wayenonembeza kodwa waba mdibi munye. Wamosha ikusasa likamfowabo nelikaMthimkhulu (ayebaqashile ukubulala uLanga). Kwakumele ngesikhathi ethula ubufakazi atshele inkantolo iqiniso lonke neqhaza alibamba futhi axolise ngomlomo wakhe kubantu bakwaLanga enkantolo,” kusho uShah.Inkabi, uJames Mashudu Mthimkhulu, yalivuma icala yathi yiyona noZungu ababulala umufi, yagwetshwa iminyaka engu-20..

UZINIKELE emaphoyiseni usomabhizinisi waseNanda obhekene necala lokudlwengula akhulelise intombazane engumakhelwane wakhe eneminyaka engu-13.Lo somabhizinisi oneminyaka engu-59, inkantolo ekhiphe umyalelo wokuthi igama lakhe ligodlwe ubevele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseNtuzuma ngaleli cala.Kuvele khona enkantolo ukuthi uzinikele yena emaphoyiseni ngesonto eledlule.Kuthiwa unamabhizinisi ahlukene eThekwini nakwezinye izindawo ezingaphandle kweTheku. Kubatshazwa isithabathaba somuzi wakhe okhona eNanda. Akuvelanga ukuthi unamabhizinisi anjani.Kuhlaluka ukuthi uzinikele emaphoyiseni ngemuva kokuba unina kamgilwa emvulele icala esethole ukuthi kwenzekeni. Kuvela ukuthi le ngane bese kuphele isikhathi eside elala nayo.Kuvele ukuthi unina wengane uze wathola ngalokhu ngoba ingane seyikhulelwe kwaba yima eyibuza ukuthi kwenzekani.Usomabhizinisi kuthiwa ubenobudlelwane obuhle nomndeni kamgilwa.UMshushisi elingatholakalanga igama lakhe unxuse inkantolo ukuba iqinisekise ukuthi uthola ubulungiswa umndeni kamgilwa.Isolezwe litholile ukuthi amalungu omphakathi waseNanda ahlela ukumxosha endaweni usomabhizinisi. Akhala ngesenzo sakhe esinobulwane."Kungekudala uzozwa kuthiwa usexoshiwe eNanda ngoba umphakathi ucasukile kakhulu. Ukholwa ukuthi ngeke ukwazi ukuthi ungahlala ndawonye nowesilisa onesibindi sokwenza into efana nalena,'' kuchaza ilungu lomphakathi.Liqhuba lithe umphakathi ukholwa ukuthi aziphephile izingane ezincane zamantombazane uma ezoqhubeka nokuhlala kule ndawo owesilisa uma kuya ngokuthi inkantolo izogcina imnikeza ibheyili.Lithe ngesonto elizayo bazobhikisha ngaphandle kwenkantolo bafake ingcindezi yokuthi usomabhizinisi angayitholi ibheyili.Liveze nokuthi kukhona uqhekeko phakathi kwalo somabhizinisi nomkakhe okhala ngokuthi umthunaze isithunzi sakhe wasiqeda.Elinye ilungu lomphakathi lithe bebemethemba usomabhizinisi bengazi ukuthi ngelinye ilanga kungathiwa ubhekene necala elibucayi ngalolu hlobo.Icala lakhe lihlehliselwe isonto elizayo ukuze acele ibheyili.

OBEYIMEYA yaseZululand uMfundisi uThulasizwe Buthelezi, uthe uhamba nenhliziyo emhlophe ngoba uwenzile umsebenzi abejutshelwe wona wokuhambisa amanzi ebantwini.UButhelezi obuye abe wuNdunankulu kaZulu, wesulile esikhundleni sobumeya njengoba ephikelele esiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal. Uhleli endaweni yesishiyagalolunye ohlwini lwamalungu e-IFP esiShayamthetho.Kulindeleke ukuthi i-IFP iqoke imeya entsha ezovala isikhala sikaButhelezi ngoba iyona ephethe ngokubambisana namanye amaqembu kulo mkhandlu.I-IFP KwaZulu-Natal ize mawala okhethweni yathola izihlalo ezingu-15 esiShayamthetho okuyizona ebikhulumela phezu kwazo ezingxoxweni.UButhelezi exoxa neSolezwe, uthe uzishaya isifuba ngakwenzele abantu baseZululand njengoba eseshiya nje.“ Ngifike eZululand ngoNovemba 2017 manje ngiwushiya umkhandlu usesimeni esihle ngokwezimali futhi uMcwaningi mabhuku uthe awukho ugcobho. Kunemisebenzi yokufakwa kwamanzi eminingi esiyenzile siqinisekisa ukuthi ayafika ebantwini,’’ kusho uButhelezi.Uthe imisebenzi ibonakale ngesikhathi sokhetho i-IFP yanqoba cishe wonke ama-ward KwaNongoma kwacaca ukuthi banelisekile.Uthe kunemizi eminingi ebingenawo amanzi ikakhulukazi ohlangothini lwaKwaNongoma kodwa aseyaphuma manje.“ Imizi engu-36 000 ibingawatholi amanzi kodwa siwafakile, banawo manje. Ngishiya umasipala onozinzo futhi ngibonga amakhansela, abasebenzi namakhosi ngokusebenza ngokubambisana,’’ kusho uButhelezi.Uthe unethemba lokuthi bazoqhubeka nokuhlonipha imeya ezovala isikhala sakhe ukuze umsebenzi uqhubeke kahle. Maqondana nokuya esiShayamthetho uthe inkonyane izobe ingethuki isisinga.UButhelezi uthe iqembu lamjuba esiShayamthetho sesifundazwe ngo-2006 wasebenza khona iminyaka emihlanu. Uthe wayegxile ekomitini lehhovisi likandunankulu nezindaba zasendlunkulu. Uthe wafunda okuningi ngokusebenza kukahulumeni nobukhosi.Uthe namanje uzosebenzisa leso sipiliyoni sakhe ukuqhuba umsebenzi ofunwa yi-IFP.

UZIZWA ebusisekile obedidiyela izinkumbi zezintombi eMkhosini woMhlanga ochazwe njengomkhulu ukunayo yonke esike yaba khona.Induna yezintombi, uNksz Mningi Zuma (32), ithe ukuphumelela komkhosi  kuyivusele umunyu, yakhumbula izikhathi ezinzima uZulu odlule kuzo kusukela kwakhothama iSilo uGoodwill Zwelithini kaBhekuzulu.UNksz Zuma uyena obehamba phambili nabantwana basendlunkulu ngesikhathi izintombi zihambisa umhlanga eSilweni uMisuzulu Sinqobile kaZwelithini.UNksz Zuma, owaqala ukuhamba uMkhosi woMhlanga ngo-2011, uthe ubekuqala akubone emkhosini wakulo nyaka obusesigodlweni eNyokeni, ngempelasonto.“Umkhosi wakulo nyaka mkhulu kakhulu kunayo yonke esesike sadlula kuyona. Kungenze ngathobeka ukubona umkhosi uba yimpumelelo, kungenze ngabona ukuthi omdala akenzanga iphutha ngesikhathi engiqoka ukuba ngibe induna yezintombi.”UNksz Zuma waqokelwa kwesokudidiyela izintombi ngo-2022.Uthe umsebenzi awenzayo awulula.“Kuyaye kube nzima ngoba kufanele ngilungise izintombi ezisuke zisesigodlweni nezisuke zisezansi ematendeni. Okungisiza kakhulu ukuxhumana nomama abahlola izintombi, okuyibona abangilekelelayo ukuhlela izintombi. Lokhu kwenza ukuthi kube lula uma sesifika namazinyane eSilo, sifika izintombi sezihlelekile.”UNksz Zuma uthe umsebenzi uqala ngoLwesithathu, lapho bephuma ebusuku nabantwana basendlunkulu, beyogawula umhlanga.Uthe ziphuthelwe kakhulu izimbali zesizwe ebezingekho.“Umkhosi ulethe ukuthula ezintombini. Laba abangaphumelelanga, ngiyabanxusa ukuthi benze isiqiniseko sokuthi bayeza ngonyaka ozayo. Sikhulu isibusiso esikhishwa iNgonyama, siyasidinga lesi sibusiso njengezintombi.”UNksz Zuma unxuse labo abangasaphelele ukuba bajoyine uMkhosi weSivivane, ukuze nabo bezothola izibusiso.“Wathi uMdlokombane awukho umgqomo wokulahla umuntu. Nabo kufanele bajoyine umkhosi womama ukuze bezothola isibusiso ngokwaleso sigaba abasuke bekuso.”UNksz Zuma uthe labo abadlwengulwa akufanele bazenyeze, wathi abaqhubeke nokuhamba uMkhosi woMhlanga.UNksz Zuma uqale ukuba phambili endlunkulu ngesikhathi kukhotheme uMdlokombane.Waba nesibonakaliso sokuthi izintombi zikhanyise amakhandlela awu-100, bese ziyakhuleka ngaphambi kokuthi uMdlokombane ayotshalwa.Wahlala esigodlweni izinsuku eziyisikhombisa ngesikhathi kukhotheme uMdlokombane, evunule, ehola izintombi ezazicula amahubo.Wenza okufanayo nangesikhathi kukhotheme iNdlovukazi uShiyiwe Mantfombi Dlamini Zulu.UNks Zuma wahola umkhankaso wezintombi wokweseka Indlulamithi yamakhosi ngesikhathi kunomsindo wesihlalo sobukhosi.UNksz Zuma nezintombi ezingaphezu kuka-100 babenomkhankaso owawubizwa ngokuthi #esethu iSilo.Lezi zintombi zahlatshiswa inkomo esigodlweni, zathelwa ngenyongo.UNksz Zuma ungowokuzalwa KwaNongoma, kwaDabhazi.Uneziqu zeBsc in Biochemistry and Microbiology azithola oNgoye.Njengamanje uwuthisha esikoleni iMpikanina High.UNksz Zuma ungomunye wabaholi benhlangano Ubuhle Bezolo Lethu Youth Development Organisation, ekhulisa izintombi iphinde icije namabhungu asakhula.

UHLALELE ovalweni usihlalo wenhlangano yosomabhizinisi eyazakhela udumo ngokufuna umsebenzi ngodli, iDelangokubona SA Business Forum, uMnuz Nathi Bhamuza Mnyandu, emuva kokugeqa amagula ngokuthi kuthinteka nosopolitiki kulo mkhuba wokufuna umsebenzi ngenkani.UMnyandu uthe ngesikhathi bebona ukuthi uhulumeni ubakhiphela ngaphandle bewosomabhizinisi, bahlangana base beziyela ngenkani lapho kunezinhlelo zokwakha nenye intuthuko kahulumeni, ukuyofuna umsebenzi.Uthe ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, uhulumeni wabahlalisa phansi wagcina esebavumela ukuba babhidele imisebenzi ehlukene.“Obekwenzeka wukuthi uma kuza umsebenzi onemali enkulu, osopolitiki bebesithinta bathi asihambe siyofuna ngenkani u-30% waloyo msebenzi. Uma sesiwutholile bebeletha izinkampani ezizomela bona esingazazi kodwa ebesitshelwa ukuthi singazilwisi ngoba yizona abazodla ngazo.”Ebuzwa ukuthi uzowakhipha yini amagama osopolitiki akade benza lo mkhuba njengoba uNobhala we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Bheki Mtolo, ethe kufanele akhishwe, uthe: “Ungijwayela kabi uBheki Mtolo ngoba bayaziwa osopolitiki akade benza lo mkhuba. Ushiswa yini yena uma ngithi osopolitiki ngingalikhiphi igama lomuntu? “Kunzima kabi eNingizimu Afrika, awukwazi nje ukuvele ugagule amagama abantu. Njengamanje ngihamba nonogada futhi ngiyakudinga ukuvikelwa wuKhomishana wamaPhoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLt-Gen Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi, kulabo abangifunayo.”Wenze isibonelo sokuthi abantu abakhipha amagama abaholi abathinteka ezigamekweni ezingezinhle bayabulawa eNingizimu Afrika, ngakho ngeke nje avele adedele amagama abantu.Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kukaNobhala we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Bheki Mtolo ayiphumelelanga njengoba ucingo lwakhe belukhala bese lucishwa kungathi umatasa.Ekhuluma esiteshini sezindaba i-Newzroom Afrika, uMtolo, uthe njengoba kukhona abacashunwe emaphephandabeni bethi kunosopolitiki abathintekayo kufanele babadalule ngamagama.Uthe uma bethi osopilitiki kufana nokuthi babhixa bonke osopolitiki ngobende inyama bengayidlanga. Ucele namaphoyisa ukuthi athathe labo abathi kunosoplitiki abathintekayo kwi-construction mafia abaphose imibuzo ngoba kunosopolitiki abathembekile nalabo abanegama elibi kuhulumeni. UMnyandu uthe yize esengumuntu ogadwayo kodwa ngeke ayeke ukukhuluma iqiniso futhi ngeke awahoxise amazwi akhe.“Abafuna ukungibulala abafuni ngikhulume iqiniso. Ngeke ngiyihoxise inkulumo yami ngoba bayazi osopolitiki ukuthi bebesisebenzisa ukuthi asifune umsebenzi ngodli. Njengamanje asisekho thina kule genge efuna umsebenzi ngenkani esibizwa nge-construction mafia. Siqashiwe kuhulumeni, siyasebenza asiphazamisi izinhlelo zentuthuko. Abenza lo mkhuba kufanele bajeziswe wumthetho. Akufanele abantu bacabange thina uma kukhulunywa nge-construction mafia.”Ubalule ukuthi Isolezwe liyazi kahle indaba yabo njengoba baqala befuna umsebenzi ngenkani - ngokuhamba kwesikhathi - baba wosomabhizinisi abakhulumayo uma kukhona abanganeme ngakho, hhayi abanendluzula.Uthe abanendluzula abawona AmaDelangokubona futhi umphakathi akufanele nje ubahlanganise nabo.Uphethe ngokuthi uMasipala weTheku umkweleta u-R5 million ngokuwugadela ingqalasizinda yawo ngezibhelu zikaJulayi 2021.

OJOYINE iqembu i-MK Party, uMnuz Canaan Mdletshe, uyifanise  nentaba engcwele indawo yaseNkandla lapho kwakhe khona uMengameli waleli qembu. UMdletshe ukusho lokhu ngemuva kokwemukelwa “ngezandla ezimhlophe” umholi waleli qembu, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, emcimbini owenzeke khona Kwadakw’udunuse ngempelasonto. UMdletshe phambilini wayenguNobhala Jikelele we-NFP ngaphambi kokuthi uhlangothi lwakhe lwehluwe emdonsiswaneni owawusenkantolo. Uvumbuka kwi-MK nje usanda kushiya i-NFP ethi unengwa yisinqumo sayo sokubambisana ne-DA namanye amaqembu KwaZulu-Natal.“INkandla isifana nentaba engcwele. Wonke umuntu ozizwa sengathi ucindezelekile, uya khona eNkandla eyokhuleka. Nami ngizizwa ngisekhaya lapha,” usho kanje uMdletshe.Elanidisa Isolezwe ngesinqumo sakhe, uMdletshe uthe umbono womsunguli we-NFP, uNkk Zanele KaMagwaza-Msibi, nawo umholele kwi-MK.Uthe ngesikhathi uKaMagwaza-Msibi, esungula i-NFP ngo-2011, wayefuna ukwakha iqembu lezepolitiki elizokuba yikhaya labantu abahluphekile nabanganakiwe.“Uma uzobheka i-MK, uzobona ukuthi nayo inombono ofanayo nalona njengoba ibeka phambili abantu. Kucacele noma ubani ukuthi i-MK iyona eyithemba labantu. Noma ungabuza noma yimuphi umuntu waKwaZulu-Natal noma eNingizimu Afrika, bazokutshela ukuthi wonke amathemba abo akuZuma, bazokutshela ukuthi angeke kuhlale kunje.”Nakuba uMdletshe ethe akuzange kube yisinqumo esilula ukuthi ashiye i-NFP ngenxa yomlando anawo enhlanganweni, uthe kube lula ukuthi ajoyine i-MK ayifanise nompheme wokuphephela.Izembe lihlezi liloliwe kwi-MK njengoba sebebaningi abaholi asebexoshiwe okubalwa kubo nowabhalisa le nhlangano ngokusemthethweni, uMnuz Jabulani Khumalo. Kamuva nje izembe lidle isethenjwa ebesinguNobhala Jikelele uMnuz Arthur Zwane.Kepha uMdletshe uthe yena angeke ahlale ngesinqe esisodwa, wathi indlela ethulwe ngayo itshengise ukuthi wamukelekile eqenjini.UMdletshe wethulwe ngendlela engejwayelekile njengoba ethulwe nguZuma phambi kwabalandeli be-MK Party. Akubona bonke abaholi abafike kanje kuleli qembu.Injabulo ibibhalwe emehlweni kuZuma ngesikhathi ethula uMdletshe.“Ingithobisile kakhulu indlela engethulwe ngayo. Ukuba le nto ibiyenzeka ngo-12 ebusuku, bengizokuthi mhlawumbe ngiyaphupha. Inhlokomo ebe khona ikhombise ukuthi ngamukelwa ngisho nangamadlozi e-MK. Ngizohlala ngokukhululeka, angizukulokhu ngiqalaza ngoba ngiyazi ukuthi ngamukelekile.”UMdletshe uthe akazange ahehwe ngesikhundla ukuba ajoyine i-MK.“Nami futhi asikho isikhundla engike ngahlebeza ukuthi ngiyasifuna. Ngiyakuqonda ukuthi ukuze iqembu liqine emazingeni aphansi, kufanele kube nabantu abakhona. Kodwa-ke uma kukhona lapho iqembu elifuna ukungithuma khona, angeke nginqabe.”

UGWETSHWE iminyaka ewu-20 umshayeli weloli elabulala abantu abawu-20 ngesikhathi lishayisa lihudula iveni lababekade behamba ngalo oPhongolo, ngoSepthemba 2022.IJaji uGarth Davis leNkantolo eNkulu yasoPhongolo, ligwebe uSibusiso Siyaya (28) ngoLwesine.Ugwetshwe iminyaka emithathu ngecala lokushayela budedengu neyisithupha ngokuhluleka ukulandela imigomo elandelwa umshayeli osuke embandakanyeke engozini.Icala lesithathu kuya kwelesi-22, okungawokubulala, uSiyaya ugwetshwe iminyaka engu-14 lilinye.“Izigwebo ecaleni lokuqala nelesibili zizohambisana. Mayelana nezigwebo zamacala okubulala, inkantolo iwathatha njengenhloso eyodwa, ngakho kuzoba iminyaka engu-14. Lokhu kusho ukuthi ummangalelwa uzodonsa isigwebo seminyaka engu-20 ebhadla ejele,” kuchaza ijaji.Libe selikhipha umyalelo wokuba kuhoxiswe izincwadi zokushayela zikaSiyaya.Awukho umbandela onikezwe yijaji mayelana nokuthi uSiyaya uvumelekile yini ukuthi aphathe isibhamu empilweni yakhe.USiyaya ulahlwe yinkantolo ngamacala okubulala ngoLwesibili. Phambilini, wanqatshelwa ibheyili njengoba kusukela kwenzeka isigameko ubekade egqunywe ezitokisini.UMbuso bewukade umelwe wuqweqwe lukamshushisi, u-Advocate Krishen Shah. USiyaya ubekade emelwe ugalagala lommeli weLegal Aid enkantolo enkulu obuye abe yibamba lejaji, uMnuz Pregasen Marimuthu.Leli cala liqale ukuqulwa ngo-Ephreli 15 nonyaka, laphothulwa ngasekuqaleni kwesonto eledlule lapho uShah benoMarimuthu benxenxe khona ijaji ukuba libavune.Kuthangi, uShah ufundele inkantolo izitatimende ezifungelwe ebezivela kumalungu emindeni yabashona lapho bebechaza khona ngobunzima mayelana nesimo somqondo nomphefumuo ababhekene naso kusukela kwehla lo mshophi.Umqulu oqukethe uhla lwamacala abekade ethweswe uSiyaya uveza ukuthi wayekade eqashwe nguMnuz Perry Masinga enkampanini iBaoBao Projects.Wayekade esebenzela inkampani ethutha amalahle isuka esifundazweni iMpumalanga, ewayisa echwebeni laseRichards Bay.NgoSepthemba 16, 2022, kuthiwa uSiyaya wasika izimoto ayekade ephambana nazo ngeloli, eziningi zazimvika.Kuthiwa wayehamba ngesivinini kanti iloli lizogcina lishayisana mahlanze neveni eyayilayishe abafundi ababekade bebuya esikoleni. Kwashona abafundi abawu-18, uthisha nomshayeli weveni.

UFUNA kuthathwe izinyathelo uSihlalo wekomiti elibhekele ukusebenza kwemali yomphakathi ePhalamende iStanding Committee on Public Accounts (Scopa), uMnuz Songezo Zibi, obhalele iPhini likaMengameli wezwe uMnuz Paul Mashatile, ngokuhluleka ukuvela ngaphambi kwekomiti kwezikhulu zoMnyango weMfundo ePhakeme.Ayaveva amalungu eScopa ngokungafiki kuleli komiti kwePhini likaNgqongqoshe eMnyangweni uMnuz Buti Manamela, onqume ukuthamela umcimbi obuseGoli.UZibi ufuna uMashatile aqinisekise ukuthi emhlanganweni wangesonto elizayo, lezi zikhulu zibakhona njengoba begcine bewuhoxisile umhlangano wabo. Uveze ukuthi uthole umyalezo kunobhala wekomiti ngoLwesibili ekuseni, obumazisa ukuthi uManamela noDkt Mimmy Gondwe, iphini likangqongqoshe kulo mnyango ngeke baphumelele emhlanganweni.Emhlanganweni bekuzobhungwa ngophenyo lwe-SIU esikhwameni iNational Skills Fund (NSF) neNational Students Financial Aid Scheme (NSFAS).“Siyakuqonda ukungabikhona kukaNgqongqoshe womnyango ngoba useChina. UManamela ubethamele omunye umcimbi kanti uDkt Gondwe ubuyelile kimina wangazisa ngokungafiki wathi okungenani akuhlelwe omunye umhlangano ngesonto elizayo. Akufikanga ngisho noMqondisi jikelele walo mnyango uDkt Nkosinathi Sishi emhlanganweni.” Uthe ngokubhalela uMashatile bafuna aqinisekise ukuthi okungenani uma uNgqongqoshe engekho, iPhini lakhe libakhona.“Sifuna kuthathwe izinyathelo ezinqala ngalesi senzo. Sikhala nangemali esetshenziswe abasebenzi bomnyango abahambele ize leze beza eKapa, le mali siyithatha njengemoshekile,” kusho uZibi.I-EFF isigxekile isenzo sikaManamela noDkt Gondwe sokushaya indiva iScopa ngoba behambele imicimbi.Ithe kuyadumaza ukuthi kulo mnyango kunamaphini amabili ongqongqoshe kodwa ahlulekile ukuvela phambi kwePhalamende.I-DA ikhale ngemali echithiwe kugitshelwa amabhanoyi kuqashwa nezindawo zokuhlala eKapa kodwa izikhulu zangafika. Ithe ziningi izinto ebezizoxoxwa kulo mhlangano obalulekile yathi ngokuzayo kumele nakanjani lezi zikhulu zifike emhlanganweni.

KULINDELEKE ukuthi avele eNkantolo yeMantshi eBloemfontein, uNksz Moroadi Cholota owayengumsizi kaMnuz Ace Magashule ngesikhathi esangundunankulu wase-Free State.UNksz Cholota ufike kuleli ngoLwesine emva kokuboshwa ngohlelo lokulanda abasuke bekwamanye amazwe ukuthi bezobhekana namacala abethweswe wona njengoba kuthiwa ubese United States lapho ebefunda khona. Ngo-2022, uphiko lwezokuShushiswa koMphakathi, i- National Prosecuting Authority yafaka amaphepha kuleliya lizwe ukuthi kubuyiswe lo msolwa ngalolu hlelo emva kokuthi igama lakhe lathinteka enkohlakalweni ka-R255 million kulesiya sifundazwe efaka phakathi negama likaMagashule ogqigqa inkantolo ngecala elifanayo. NgoJuni iNkantolo yesiFunda yaseMaryland kuleliya lizwe, iwamukele amaphepha alolu phiko, athi kunobufakazi obanele. UColonel Nkwalase okhulumela uphiko loKlebe, uthe bangu-18 abasolwa abesebethweswe amacala okubalwa kubo nezinkampani ezinkulu ezinhlanu.

UZOCHITHA isonto egqunywe ezitokisini uMphrofethi Paseka ‘Mboro’ Motsoeneng obhekene noxhaxha lwamacala angu-12 okukhona kuwona nelokushaya, elokusabisa nokuthumba.Uvele eNkantolo yeMantshi yasePalm Ridge izolo nomqaphi wakhe uMnuz Vincent Baloyi nendodana yakhe uMnuz Revival Motsoeneng.Icala lihlehliselwe u-Agasti 16 ukuze kuqhubeke uphenyo futhi abasolwa bacele ibheyili.Bekunamaqembu amabili ngaphandle kwenkantolo okungelamakholwa abezokweseka abasolwa, abecula ethandaza nangezilimi efuna bakhululwe.Bekukhona nelinye lamalungu omphakathi ebelicula amaculo omzabalazo lizophikisana nokuthi badedelwe.Ukuboshwa kwabo kusuka esigamekweni esibonakale kwi-video lapho uMboro egasele nobhushu esikoleni iMatshediso Primary, eKatlehong ngoMsombuluko wasabisa othisha nabafundi.Bashaye bachitha nabafundi ababili okuthiwa ngabamshana kaMboro. Ingxabano kuthiwa iphakathi kwemindeni emibili ezala lezi zingane engaboni ngasolinye mayelana nokukhuliswa kwazo.INational Prosecuting Authority ithi unogada kaMboro uthweswe namacala okungelokuphatha isibhamu esingekho emthethweni, esingavumelekile, elokukhomba umuntu ngaso nokusiqhumisa. Laba abathathu bathweswe namacala okusabisa.INPA ithe uphenyo lwayo luyaqhubeka futhi kungenzeka yengeze amanye amacala.Khonamanjalo kuvela ukuthi ugogo nomalume balezi ngane bavelile nabo kule nkantolo ngecala lokushaya okuthiwa balivulelwa uMboro.Inkantolo ibadedele ngebheyili kaR1 000 umuntu emunye. Icala labo eliqulwa ngokwehlukana nelikaMboro libe selihlehliselwa uSepthemba 10.Kuvela ukuthi amaphoyisa aphenya necala lokushisa emuva kokuthi umphakathi ungqongqise isonto likaMboro ngoLwesibili.

UYOTHOLOZA ejele owaqashwa ezikhundleni ezehlukene eHhovisi likaNdunankulu KwaZulu-Natal, esebenzisa iziqu zomkokotelo.UMlekeleli Masondo (45), ulahlwe amacala amahlanu okukhwabanisa ngoLwesine, yiNkantolo yesiFunda eMgungundlovu. UMasondo wafaka isicelo somsebenzi esikhundleni sokuba yi-Project Manager ngo-2010.Waqashwa kulesi sikhundla, kwathi ngo-2019, waphinde wafaka isicelo sokuba yiPhini likaMqondisi, okuyisikhundla aqashelwa kusona.Okhulumela oKlebe, uLieutenant Colonel Simphiwe Mhlongo, uthe inkinga iqale ngo-2021, ngesikhathi uMnyango weziSebenzi zikaHulumeni, usuwenza ucwaningo ngeziqu zikaMasondo.Uthe zayima emthumeni njengoba ahluleka ukuhambisa imiqingo yeziqu eyayidingeka. “Kwabe sekutholakala ukuthi iziqu zakhe ziwumkokotelo, wabe esehamba uhlelo lokuqondiswa ubugwegwe. IHhovisi likaNdunankulu lakhwatshaniselwa u-R3.7 million,” kusho uMhlongo.UMhlongo uveze ukuthi kwavulwa icala esiteshini samaphoyisa sakhona eMgungundlovu.“Idokodo labe selidluliselwa ophikweni loKlebe bePietermaritzburg Serious Commercial Crime Investigation, zamkhalela uMasondo ngoFebhuwari, nyakenye. Wavela izikhawu eziningi enkantolo waze walahlwa amacala ngoMeyi 9, 2024.” Uthe ugwetshwe iminyaka eyisithupha; ngamacala amabili okukhwabanisa, wagwetshwa iminyaka emibili ngamacala amabili okukokotela, eminye iminyaka emibili ngamacala amabili okuhambisa imiqingo engumgunyathi.“Le minyaka uzoyidonsa kanye kanye” Inhloko yoKlebe esifundazweni uMajor General Lesetja Senona, usamukele isigwebo esinikwe uMasondo, wahalalisela amalungu ophiko lwamaphoyisa ngomsebenzi omuhle awenzile.

UMA kukhulunywa ngembiza ewumvusankunzi kwabaningi besilisa, ababuzi lutho, bakhala khona. Abanye esikhundleni zokuphuza isivalo, bagcina bephuza ibhodlela lonke okuyinto ebabeka engcupheni yezinkinga eziningi emzimbeni wabo.Yingakho ungoti wemithi yesintu, Mnuz Mfanafuthi Msomi esekhethe ukuvula ikhemisi okuhloswe ngalo ukufundisa kabanzi ngezikalo zemithi yesintu nezimbiza ezithandwa kakhulu ngabantu.“ Into engiyaye ngiyisho wukuthi imithi yasentshonalanga ayingcono ngalutho kunale yesintu, umehluko nje wukuthi bona bayacwaninga bese beqhamuka nezikali ezibhalwe phansi zemithi yabo. Lokho kube sekwenza engathi bona bangcono,”kusho uMsomi.Uthe lunzulu ulwazi nakubelaphi bendabuko mayelana nezikalo zemithi, kuphela wukuthi abantu abafundiswa ngazo. UMsomi uvula leli khemisi ngoMgqibelo enkabeli yeTheku. Uthe lizoba elehlukile abantu abake balibona ngoba lizoba nendawo okufundwa kuyona kabanzi ngezikalo zemithi yesintu.Ubalule nale mithi eyaziwayo ukuthi inomsebenzi othile njengekhambi lesisu, abantu abaningi okuthi uma belidlula endleleni balibalule ukuthi eliqeda isisu. Umehluko wukuthi basuke bengazi ukuthi liphekwa bese likalwa kanjani. Uthe kule khemisi yakhe uzobe efundisa kabanzi nangalokhu.“ Ngifuna sibuye isithunzi semithi yesintu, nokufaka isifundo nje sokuthi umuthi wesintu awulona ihlazo noma awusho ukuthi awuphucuzekile,” egcizelela. UMsombi uwuthisha oqeqeshiwe ofundisa eThulubheke eMthwalume.Uthe okunye akuthokozelayo ngaleli khemisi lesintu, wukuthi lizovula namathuba omsebenzi njengoba beyishumi abantu abazobe besebenza kulo.UMsomi obuye aziwe ngelikaMkhulu Hlombe, uthe leli khemisi lizoba senkabeni yeTheku ku-114 Joe Slovo.''Kuyangijabulisa kakhulu ukuthi kuzodaleka amathuba omsebenzi uma kuvulwa leli khemisi. Siyazi sonke ukuthi amathuba omsebenzi abaluleke kangakanani ikakhulukazi kulesi sikhathi samanje,'' usho kanje.Okunye okwehlukile athi kuzokwenzeka kuleli khemisi, wukuthi imithi ngeke ifike isisemabhodleleni kodwa izothakwa khona kule ndawo. Njengoba elindele ukuthi leli khemisi lihanjelwe yizinkumbi zabantu, uthe ukhethe nokuthi zonke izinsuku kuleli khemisi kuphekelwe amakhasimende ukuze bathi besalindile bathole okuya ngasethunjini."Lokhu sizobe sikwenza ngamabomu ngoba abantu behlukene. Kukhona abanye abafika bezothenga amakhambi azodinga ukuthi balinde, uthole ukuthi akukho lutho naseziswini ngenxa yezinkinga esizaziyo,“echaza. UMsomi ngokudabuka ungowasePort Shepstone, eningizimu uyesifundazweNgaphandle kwaleli khemisi unawo amanye ezingxenyeni ezahlukene zeKwaZulu-Natal kodwa leli kuzoba kungelokuqala elizoba nalezi zinhlelo.Uthe kungekudala naseGoli, naseFree State uzobe esenawo amakhemisi nakhona uthe ufuna kudaleke amathuba omsebenzi ngawo.Phezu kwakho konke, abantu babe nolwazi olunzulu ngokusebenza kwemithi yesintu.

Usazohlala esitokisini uMnuz Xolani Gregory Khoza ngemuva kokuhlehliswa kwamacala asolwa ngawo okuvukela umbuso, ukubhebhethekisa udlame emphakathini nokusabisa ngemuva kwenkulumo okuthiwa wayenza ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.UKhoza (37) ubhozonyelwe woKlebe ngempelasonto ngemuva kokufaka ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ukuthi “alivalwe izwe futhi umengameli kumele akhishwe”.Lona wesilisa uvele eNkantolo yesiFunda eNelspruit ngoMsombuluko. Icala lakhe lihlehliselwe uJulayi 1 ngesikhathi esagcinwe esitokisini ukuze afake isicelo sebheyili.Ngemuva kwalo mbhalo, amaphoyisa aqale uphenyo wase eboshwa ngokuphula umthetho, i-Section 14 of the Cybercrimes Act 19 of 2020, othi: “Umuntu osebenzisa ubuchwepheshe ukuxhumana, ukuthumela omunye umuntu, iqoqo labantu noma umphakathi jikelele umlayezo ngenhloso yokudala udlame emphakathini uzotholwa enecala.”

ZIKHALILE endodeni egwetshwe udilikajele ngecala lokugwaza amanxeba amaningi ibulale owesifazane eyayisihlukene naye phambi kwabantu kuphuzwa utshwala KwaMbonambi, eMpangeni.Uzobhadla ejele iminyaka eminingi uNhlanhla Zikhali (42) ogwetshwe yiNkantolo yesiFunda eNgwelezane ngokubulala uNksz Winile Zwane ngoFebhuwari, wangonyaka odlule.Lo wesilisa watholwa yinkantolo njengomuntu ongasakulungele ukuphinde aphathe isibhamu empilweni yakhe.Kukholakala ukuthi uZikhali wahlukana nomufi wase eyamxosha endlini ababekade behlala kuyona bobabili. Kuvela ukuthi umufi wabe esehamba eyohlala nomngani wakhe. Kuthiwa ngoFebhuwari 27, 2023, uNksz Zwane wayezihambela ngesikhathi ebizwa wumakhelwane wesifazane walapho ayekade esehlala khona ukuthi bazophuza utshwala.Okhulumela uphiko lwezokushushisa, iNational Prosecuting Authority (NPA) KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Natasha Ramkisson-Kara, uthe uZikhali wayekade ekhona naye kulo muzi okwakuphuzwa khona.“UZikhali wasukuma waqonda kuNksz Zwane wafike wamgwaza umzimba wonke. Wasabisa nangokugwaza ababekade besondela kuyena. Wagwaza uNksz Zwane waze washona maqede wabaleka,” kusho iNPAKuthiwa uZikali wakhalelwa amasongo kaSigonyela emuva kwezinyanga ezimbili kade ethungathwa amaphoyisa. Enkantolo, iNPA isebenzise ubufakazi babantu ababili ababekhona kubulawa umufi ne-albhamu yezithombe. Kuthiwa ofakazi bakwazi ukuhlonza uZikhali ngoba indawo ababekade bekuyona yayikade ikhanya.UNkk Ramkisson-Kara uncome umsebenzi owenziwe ithimba labashushisi namaphoyisa, wathi bayakwamula ukuphothulwa ngale ndlela kwecala futhi baphokophelele ekuletheleni ubulungiswa abantu abangabagilwa bobugebengu.

INKANTOLO yesule izinyembezi umndeni wowesilisa owalalelwa unyendle, wagwazwa amanxeba angu-53 wafa yinkosikazi yakhe egwetshwe udilikajele.UMnuz Mark Buttle wabulawelwa eNewlands East, eThekwini, ngoFebhuwari 2018.Kwaboshwa inkosikazi kamufi, uDias Bella Dosantos (44) ogwetshwe udilikajele ngokubulala neminye emihlanu yokuphazamisa ukusebenza kwengalo yomthetho.Umakhelwane uCharmaine Khumalo (48) ugixabezwe ngeminyaka engu-18 ebhadla ejele.Inkantolo ithe iyachezuka esigwebeni sikadilikajele kuCharmaine ngoba akuyena owakha itulo lokubulala futhi wasebenzisana nanamaphoyisa eboshwa.Owayeboshwe nabo uNksz Teagan Brown owayengowesifazane othandana nabobulili obufana nobakhe, ushone ngo-Agasti 2023, ngaphambi kokuthi kuqale icala ngoNovemba.Okhulumela iNational Prosecuting Authority (NPA) KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Natasha Ramkisson-Kara, uthe uButtle wayejoyine umshwalense okwakuzohlomula kuwona umkakhe futhi wayazi ngakho.I-NPA ithi kwaba nesikhathi lapho zishuba izinto emshadweni wabo, uDias waphuma emzini kwakhe wayohlala noTeagan abase beqomene.“Laba ababili bahlela ukubulala uButtle ukuze uDias ahlomule emalini yomshwalense. Bafaka noCharmaine owayengumakhelwane ezinhlelweni zabo,” kusho iNPA.Ngelanga lesigameko kuthiwa uDias wayenga uButtle ukuba eze eNewlands East emkhohlisa ngokuthi bazophemba kabusha umshado wabo.Kuthiwa baphuza iwayini badakwa bamayoywane baze bazitika nangocansi. Kuvela ukuthi ngesikhathi uButtle esengazelele, wagwazwa amanxeba angu-53 wafa.“UDias waphuma wayofuna usizo komakhelwane wathi sebedunwe imoto nomyeni wakhe. Laba besifazane baboshwa emuva kokutholakala kwemiyalezo ezingcingweni zabo lapho kwakwakhiwa khona itulo lokubulala umufi,” kusho iNPA.I-NPA izamukelile izigwebo zenkantolo futhi yancoma ukubambisana okube khona phakathi kwamaphoyisa nabashushisi okuzuze impumelelo.

Ugwetshwe udilikajele ngecala lokuzama ukubulala nokudlwengula owayeyisosha ongamtshelanga ayethandana naye ukuthi uphila negciwane lengculaza agcina emthelela ngalo.ULeon Santos Conga ugwetshwe eNkantolo yeMantshi ePitoli eyamthola enecala ngoJuni.Umgilwa, u-Antoinette Ndishishi, obemelwe wuphiko lwezokushushisa lwe-AfriForum wabika lolu daba kulo ngo-2018.I-AfriForum yaphoqa iSouth African National Defence Force (SANDF) ukuthi ikhiphe umlando wezempilo kaConga owaveza ukuthi wayazi ngokuthi unegciwane kusuka ngo-2007.Ithe ukunqaba kweSANDF ukuthi ikhiphe umlando kaConga kwenza ukuthi uphiko lwezokushushisa umphakathi, iNational Prosecuting Authority (NPA), iluhoxise kabili udaba enkantolo.Esitatimendeni, i-AfriForum yathi imantshi yathola uConga enecala lokudlwengula ngoba uNdishishi wavuma ukuthi baye ocansini ngoba azi ukuthi akanalo igciwane. Ithe inkantolo ibamukele ubufakazi bukaNdishishi bokuthi ukuba uConga wasidalula isimo sakhe, wayengeke avume ukuthi balale njengoba lezi zithandani zakhuluma ngalolu daba kodwa uConga wayigodla imininingwane.UConga watholwa enecala lokuzama ukubulala ngoba wathelela uNdishishi ngegciwane azi ukuthi unalo futhi wangamtshela.UNdishishi ubonge i-AfriForum, wathi ngaphambi kwayo ubesekwa wunina kuphela.

KUZOKONGEZWA elinye icala lokudlwengula abe ngu-19 kowesilisa osolwa ngokunukubeza abesifazane elokishni eMlaza, eThekwini.UKhethani Khuboni (31) uvele okwesibili eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMlaza. Bekulindeleke ukuthi afake isicelo sebheyili kodwa kwahlehliselwa uSepthemba 19.Isolezwe  lihoshe ukuthi uKhuboni uzophinde athweswe amacala amabili okuphanga amaselula abagilwa okusolakala ukuthi wakwenza eseqede ukubadlwengula.Izolo, enkantolo uKhuboni ulumane indlebe nommeli weLegal Aid obe esetshela inkantolo abebekhuluma ngakho.UKhuboni ukhale ngokuthi kukhona umuntu osebenzisa umakhalekhukhwini wakhe njengoba yena egqunywe ezitokisini.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi ngesikhathi eboshwa entathakusa ngoLwesbili lwangesonto eledlule, amaphoyisa ashaqa neselula yakhe.Leyo selula isiyizibithi, kusolakala ukuthi iyingxenye yophenyo lwamaphoyisa.UKhuboni ufake isicelo sokuthi alethele inkantolo ubufakazi akholelwa wukuthi bungase bumkhiphe phambili kodwa inkantolo ithe iyosilalela isicelo sakhe uma esefaka isicelo sebheyili emasontweni amabili ezayo.Lo wesilisa ubekade egqoke izimpahla ezifanayo neyayikade ezigqoke ngesonto eledlule ivela enkantolo.Umsolwa ubebukeka ezikhululekele ngesikhathi efaswe umlenze owodwa wakwesokunxele ngozankosi wahlanganiswa nowesokudla ungomunye umsolwa obeze kwelinye icala kule nkantolo.Okuqaphelekile ukuthi ubekade engekho enkantolo owesifazane okuthiwa uthandana noKhuboni owayekhona ngesonto eledlule.Lo wesifazane kusolakala ukuthi wayengazi ukuthi uKhuboni umshiya endlini ayogila imigilingwane abuye ahlale naye kube ngathi akwenzekanga lutho.Lamuzwa Isolezwe ethi ufuna ukubuyela emakhaya ngoba ayikho into asazoyihlalela endlini esehostela okwaboshelwa khona uKhuboni. Phambilini, kuvele ukuthi uKhuboni unezingane ezimbili futhi ushadelwe, inkosikazi yakhe isemakhaya eXobho.UMbuso uthi icala lokuqala lenzeka ngoDisemba 11, 2021. Usola uKhuboni ngokudlwengula abesifazane ababili ngosuku olulodwa ngoDisemba ngonyaka odlule.UKhuboni usolwa ngokudlwengula abesifazane abathathu ngenyanga edlule kanti kuthiwa wadlwengula oyedwa ngenyanga efanayo ngonyaka odlule.

I-Eskom kulindeleke ukuthi inyuse intengo kagesi ngo-12.7 % kusukela ngo-Ephreli.Isikhungo esilawula  ezamandla kuleli,  iNational Energy Regulator of South Africa (Nersa) sigunyaze ukwenyuswa kwentengo kagesi ngo-12.74% onyakeni wezimali u2024/25 ngoJanuwari nyakenye.INERSA igunyaze lokhu kwenyuka kukagesi nyakenye ngesikhathi igunyaza ukunyuka kwentengo kagesi ngonyaka odlule ngo-18, 65%, okungaphansi kakhulu kwalokho okwakucelwe i-Eskom okungu-32.02%.I-Nersa igcizelele ukukhathazeka ngokuthembela kwe-Eskom emthamweni wokuphehlwa kukagesi  obhekele izimo eziphuthumayo, kusetshenziswa izinjini zegesi ezivulekile okugcina kuholele ekutheni kube nogesi ongaphansi kwalowo odingekayo. UMnuz Nhlanhla Gumede, uthe maningi amalahle abaswayo ukuze akhiqize ugesi kodwa umkhiqizo ophumayo muncane.Kulinganiselwa ekutheni  abasebenzisa ugesi ongu-600kWh  bazokhokha uR168.24  owengeziwe njalo ngenyanga, abasebenzisa ugesi ongu- 900kWh bazokhokha  imali ephakathi kuka-R398.52 kuya ku-R405.81 ngenyanga.

KUPHOTHULWA amalungiselelo okwethula umhlahlandlela weNFP wokhetho okulindeleke ukuthi ube soLundi ngesonto elizayo. Amaqembu amatasa alungiselela ukhetho lukazwelonke oluzoba ngoMeyi 29 nonyaka lapho okuzoqophiswana khona.Amaqembu amaningi asevele ayethulile imihlahlandlela yawo yokhetho futhi abebukeka egxile kakhulu esifundazweni KwaZulu-Natal esibukeka siyinyama.INFP ehlala ihlaselwe yizinkinga zombango ifakana ezinkantolo, ithi iyaya okhethweni futhi iphezu kwemizamo yokuphundla izinkinga eziyihlasele.Isiyikhokhile imali yokungenela ukhetho efunwa yi-IEC yalandela yonke imibandela. INFP ithe yasheshe yakhokha izama ukugwema ishobolo elayehlela ngo-2016 ngesikhathi yehlulwa wukungenela ukhetho lohulumeni basekhaya.Umsunguli weNFP ongasekho uNkk Zanele kaMagwaza-Msibi udabuka oLundi nokulapho umhlahlandlela weqembu uzokwethulelwa khona.UNkk kaMagwaza-Msibi ushone ngo-2021 emuva kokugula okwase kumphathe isikhathi eside.INFP ikhiphe isimemezelo sokuthi umhlahlandlela wayo wokhetho izowethula ngoMgqibelo ngo-Ephreli 20, oLundi lapho izochazela khona izwe ngezethembiso zayo.UMengameli weNFP uMnuz Ivan Barnes  uthe umcimbi wokwethula umhlahlandlela uya oLundi kodwa basazama ukuqedela izinto ezimbalwa ngamalungiselelo.INFP eyihlubuka le-IFP yasungulwa ngo-2011 emuva kokuthi uNkk kaMagwaza-Msibi ekhonjwe indlela emva kokulahlwa ngamacala angaphakathi. Wayeyisethenjwa se-IFP ephethe isikhundla esiqavile sikasihlalo kazwelonke.Le liqembu liya okhethweni nje linezihlalo ezimbili ePhalamende likazwelonke kanti lizimisele ukubuyisa abalandeli nabavoti abalihlamukile.INFP ingenisa oLundi nje, idedelana ne-IFP ekade yethula umhlahlandlela wayo wokhetho wesifundazwe.Nayo ibikwenza lokhu lapho okudabuka khona umsunguli wayo ongasekho uMntwana waKwaPhindangene uMangosuthu Buthelezi.

INKANTOLO yeMantshi yasePitoli igwebe umlisa odabuka eMalawi uMlotha Nelson Usale (59) ophinde abe ngumfundisi weGods Chapel Church iminyaka engu-10 ebhadla ejele ngamacala okweba ingqalasizinda ebalulekile neminyaka engu-8 ngamacala amathathu okukhwabanisa.Kusukela ngo-2021 kuya kuMeyi 2022, u-Usale ubehola iqembu lemigulukudu elintshontsha amabhethri ezinkampanini ezahlukene ze-network yakwaVodacom ne-MTN ezweni lonke, eshintsha indlela yokuphatha amabhethri kubakhiqizi abahlukene, aphinde apende amabhokisi ebhethri ezama ukufihla imvelaphi yangempela yamabhethri ukwenza kubukeke sengathi amabhethri elanga athengiswayo.Ngemuva kwalokho, lawa mabhethri ubewadayisela abathengi ngokufaka izikhangiso ezinkundleni zokuxhumana ngaphansi kwebhizinisi elibizwa nge-SOLAR MART ne-SUN SHOP.Uma ikhasimende selithengi lawa mabhethri ubeletha ngokusebenzisa izimoto ezikhokhelwa ngebanga. Lo mkhonyovu wakhe uze watholakala ngesikhathi kukhononda elinye lamakhasimende akhe lithola ibhethri elingasebenzi. Leli khasimende labonisa umngani ibhethri owamchazela ukuthi yi-network battery.Umgilwa wabikela amaphoyisa ngodaba, nawo aphinde acupha umgoga okwaholela ekutheni kuboshwe abanye abantu ababili baseMalawi, ngoMeyi 2022, asebegwetshwe iminyaka engu-8 umuntu ngamunye ngoJulayi 11, 2023.Laba ababili bakhombisa amaphoyisa endaweni yokugcina impahla eMidrand, lapho begcine khona amabhethri ebiwe, amaphoyisa athola khona amabhethri angu-53.Ngemva kwalokho, bobabili bathatha amaphoyisa bawayisa ezindaweni abadayisela kuzo amabhethri.Ngemva kokuboshwa kwalaba ababili, kwakhishwa incwadi egunyaza ukuboshwa kuka-Usale, nokho, weqa izwe wabuyela eMalawi. Wagcina eboshiwe ngoJanuwari 25, 2024 emngceleni we-Beitbridge ezama ukweqa izwe futhi.Enkantolo uwavumile amacala wathi uzokhokha inhlawulo ka-R200 000 ngalawa macala. Kodwa-ke umshushisi u-Advocate Tholoana Sekhonyana, wakuchitha lokho wathi amacala awenzile adinga isigwebo sokugqunywa ejele.Ngaphezu kwalokho, ubugebengu obenziwe babangela ukuphazamiseka kwe-network futhi kwadla abahlinzeki i-MTN neVodacom imali eningi ukuze kushintshwe amabhethri antshontshiwe.

UKWANDA kwezigameko zobugebengu kuyamkhathaza uNdunankulu omusha waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, kangangoba unqume ukufaka uMnyango wokuPhepha koMphakathi ngaphansi kwehhovisi lakhe.UNtuli ozichaza njengomholi ozibambelayo, hhayi othumelayo, uthi inkinga yobugebengu idinga wonke umuntu wakuleli eze nesisombululo.“Ngithathe isinqumo sokuthi uMnyango wezokuPhepha koMphakathi ube ngaphansi kwami ngoba ngesikhathi ngisahola iSouth African Local Government Association (Salga) bengikhathazeka uma ngibona kwanda ukubulawa kwabaholi bomdabu, ukubulawa kwabantu abaningi nobunye ubugebengu. Ngifuna ukusebenzisana nezinhlaka ezihlukene nomphakathi wonkana ngoba inkinga yobugebengu isithinta sonke futhi kufanele sisebenzisane ukuze siyixazulule,” kusho uNtuli.Wenze isibonelo sokuthi uma emphakathini kukhona umuntu onesibhamu esingekho semthethweni ahlale esiqhumisa njalo kufanele abikwe emaphoyiseni ngoba uma engabikwa leso sibhamu siyobulala elinye ilungu lomphakathi.Uthe kubalulekile kuyena ukuthi iKwaZulu-Natal ibe yisifundazwe esiphephile ukuze abantu bahlale kahle, kuhehwe abatshalimali abazokwazi ukudala amathuba omsebenzi nokufukula umnotho.Wehlise amaphaphu kubantu baKwaZulu-Natal abanovalo lokuthi uhulumeni wokubambisana ungase ungasebenzi ngenxa yokuthi kuzwelonke kuthatha isikhathi eside ukufinyelela esivumelwaneni sikahulumeni wokusebenzisana.“Ngenhlanhla akusikona okokuqala iKwaZulu-Natal ibuswa wuhulumeni wokubambisana ngoba nakuqala i-IFP yayiphethe uhulumeni kodwa kukhona abaphathiswa be-ANC okubalwa uDkt Zweli Mkhize noSbu Ndebele. Besinaso isisekelo sokuthi kufanele siziqhube kanjani izingxoxo futhi ubungekho umdonsiswano ngezikhundla. Ngisho amaqembu ayefika ezoxoxa ne-IFP ayekubeka kucace ukuthi afuna ihole uhulumeni. Kuningi esesikulungisile futhi ngeke uphazamiseke uhulumeni waKwaZulu-Natal,” kusho uNtuli.Uveze ukuthi izingxoxo kuhulumeni wokubambisana zizolokhu ziqhubeka.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi bekukhona abaphathiswa abangazwani ngaphambi kokubunjwa kwalo hulumeni kodwa uNtuli uthe sekuxazululiwe ukungaboni ngasolinye phakathi kwalabo baphathiswa.Uveze ukuthi sekunokubambisana okuhle phakathi kukaMphathiswa wezokuBusa ngokuBambisana nezoMdabu uMfundisi Thulasizwe Buthelezi noMphathiswa wezokuThutha nokuHlaliswa KwaBantu, uMnuz Siboniso Duma owaphuca uButhelezi obuye abe nguNdunankulu kaZulu umbobho emcimbini okwakukhona kuwo Isilo.Uthe selihoxisiwe necala ebelifakwe wuButhelezi emuva kwezinkulumo ezingezinhle ezenziwa wuMphathiswa wezeMpilo, uNksz Nomagugu Simelane, owayesola uButhelezi ngokuqasha abesifazane ngesinene. UNtuli uthe kuheleza umoya wobumbano nokusebenzela abantu baKwaZulu-Natal.Uthe uyajabula uma kusizakala abantu ngoba inhloso yakhe wukufukula izinga lempilo yabantu baKwaZulu-Natal, kuvuselelwe izimboni koSithebe, Madadeni nakwezinye izindawo ukuze kuzothuthuka umnotho, kuqashwe abantu abangasebenzi ikakhulukazi abasha.Uthe ezinye izinto ezizobekwa phambili ezemfundo, ezempilo kanye nokuthuthukiswa komphakathi. “Asikwazi ukuqala izinhlelo zentuthuko ezingapheli, uma uhlelo lungaphelanga kumele kuphenywe bese kuthathwe izinyathelo.”

INHLOKO yamajaji esibeka phansi imijiva yezobulungiswa, uRaymond Zondo, iveze imfihlo yamajaji nezimantshi uma kuziwa ezinqwumeni nasezigwebeni ezikhishwa yizinkantolo.Udalule ukuthi ezinye zezigwebo azikhiphayo - kwesinye isikhathi - asuke yena mathupha engahambisani nazo. Uthe kodwa baphoqwa nguMthethosisekelo okuyiwo obekwe phambili ukuthi bakhiphe lezi zinqumo nezigwebo. "Amajaji nezimantshi ngeke aphumele obala aveze ukuthi isigwebo noma isinqumo esithile asuke esikhiphile, awahambisani naso. Esikwenzayo sisuke sibuswa nguMthethosisekelo wezwe okumele siwulandele,“ kusho uZondo.Ukusho lokhu izolo, ethula inkulumo yokuvalelisa eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo, njengoba ethatha umhlalaphansi ekupheleni kwenyanga.UZondo onconywe nxa zonke ngamava akhe okusebenzela ezobulungiswa, wavuma ukuthi uzakhele inqwaba yezitha ngalesi sikhathi.Uthe amajaji nezimantshi akumele afune ukuduma noma anconywe ngabezindaba ngoba umsebenzi wawo ukuqinisekisa ukuthi umthetho ubekwa phambili.Unxuse ozakwabo ukuthi babeke phambili uMthethosisekelo wezwe.“Yinto eningangihlonipha ngayo njengoba sengibeka phansi izintambo ukubeka phambili umthetho wezwe. Ngifisa ukuthi singaphinde sibuye isihlava sokulawulwa kombuso yidlanzana,” kusho uZondo. Othatha izintambo kuZondo, iJaji uMandisa Maya, likhale ngokuthi kuzovuleka igebe ngokuhamba kukaZondo.Lithe baneminjunju ngokuhamba kukaZondo lathi basebenze kahle naye.“Ngesikhathi sakho ufukule inqwaba yabantu besifazane kwezobulungiswa, bakhethelwa ezikhundleni eziphezulu. Wenze nezinhlelo zokweseka amajaji nabameli besifazane.”Uthe bezomkhumbula ngemisebenzi yakhe emihle njengoba eyibekile induku ebandla. USomlomo wePhalamende, uNkk Thoko Didiza, uthe bayaziqhenya ngomsebenzi omuhle owenziwe nguZondo.Uthe wenze umsebenzi omuhle muva nje ngesikhathi kuvulwa iPhalamende, kufungiswa amalungu amasha kanjalo nangesikhathi kukhethwa umengameli wezwe.UNkk Didiza uthe akusoka lingenasici njengoba kukhona ezinye zezinqumo zikaZondo ababeshaya amakhala ngazo. UZondo uthe bonke omengameli bezwe ngaphansi kwentando yeningi bamqokela ezikhundleni ezehlukene kubalwa noMnuz Jacob Zuma.

INHLOKO yamajaji, iJaji uRaymond Zondo, lizothamela umcimbi wokumenyezelwa kwemiphumela yokhetho lapho lizokwamukela khona uhla lwamalungu azofungiswa njengamalungu ePhalamende likazwelonke.Ihhovisi likaZondo liqinisekise lokhu esitatimendeni esishicilelwe enkundleni yezokuxhumana i-X.I-IEC kulindeleke ukuthi imemezele imiphumela yokhetho ngo-6 ntambama ngeSonto, eMidrand.IHhovisi likaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa likuqinisekisile ngoMgqibelo, ukuthi uzowuthamela umcimbi.Imiphumela imenyezelwa nje, kunamaqembu angaphezu kuka-20, okubalwa kuwo noMkhonto Wesizwe, angeneme ngendlela ukhetho oluhambe ngayo nokubalwa kwemiphumela.Umholi woMkhonto Wesizwe, uJacob Zuma, esithangamini nabezindaba, uthe imiphumela akumele imenyezelwe izikhalo zabo zingalaleliwe.Ngokomthetho, iPhalamende akumele libe namalungu angaphansi kuka-350 nangaphezu kuka-400.Amalungu ePhalamende aqokelwa isikhathi esiyiminyaka emihlanu.Okhulumela iPhalamende, uMoloto Mothapo, uthe uma iPhalamende lihlakazwa, umengameli wezwe kumele abize ukhetho zingakapheli izinsuku ezingu-90.“Yize isikhathi saleli siphele ngoMeyi 21, liqhubekile nokusebenza kwaze kwaba yingaphambi kosuku lokhetho okube yiphakathi kwamabili ngoMeyi 28,” kusho uMothapo.Ngemuva kokumenyezelwa kwemiphumela yiokhetho, i-IEC idlulisa uhla lwamalungu kwinhloko yamajaji eyidlulisela ePhalamende.Uthe iPhalamende kumele lihlale zingakapheli izinsuku ezingu-14 kumenyezelwe imiphumela yokhetho futhi lolo suku luzokhethwa wuZondo.Uqhube wathi ngaphambi kokuthi amalungu eqale ukusebenza kumele afungiswe yinhloko yamajaji.“Ngemuva kokufungiswa kwamalungu, inhloko yamajaji ibhekelela ukuqokwa kukasomlomo wePhalamende yena okumele abhekelele ukuqokwa kwephini likasomlomo. Umengameli wezwe ngowokugcina ukuqokwa ngoba indlu  kumele ihlangane kuqala ngaphambi kokusebenzisa amandla ayo ukukhetha umengameli.”

UZONGCWABA amathambo umndeni wowesifazane owabulawa umyeni wakhe, wamgqiba emgodini oseceleni kwethoyilethi, emzini wabo ngo-2020.UNkk Nontobeko 'MaDlomo" Ntombela (31) waseQabavu, eNsuze  kusolakala ukuthi waxabana nomyeni wakhe uMnuz Khetha Ntombela (36).Ngemuva kwengxabano kuthiwa owesilisa wamshaya ngesando ekhanda, wase emumbela umgodi egcekeni, wamgqiba.Kuthiwa umsolwa akazange athi vu kumalungu omndeni kamufi ukuthi kwenzekeni kuyena, kodwa wayemlandula ethi akamazi ukuthi washonaphi.Kuthiwa wabikela umndeni kamufi namaphoyisa ngokunyamalala kwakhe.NgoNovemba nyakenye, owesilisa wakhombisa amaphoyisa lapho agqiba khona umkakhe. Ngemuva kwalokho wakhalelwa ngamasongo kaSigonyela.Ngaphambi kokuba abakhombise waqale ngokubantuntisa ebakhombisa izindawo ezehlukene.Kune-video Isolezwe elinayo lapho owesilisa echaza khona ukuthi kungani ambulala umufi. Kuyona uzwakala ekhala ngokuthi umkakhe wayesemshiyile esebuyele kubo.UMnuz Bhekokwakhe Dhlomo ongumfowabo omdala kamufi ukuqinisekisile ukuthi umufi uzofihlwa ngeSonto kubo KwaMaphumulo.Uthe imiphumela yolibofuzo isiphumile yingakho sebethathe isinqumo sokuthi bamfihle. Imiphumela uthe ikhomba ukuthi nguyena ngempela udadewabo owambiwa."Kuzoba umngcwabo nje ophelele. Sizofaka amathambo ebhokisini. Kuzoba nenkonzo ngaphambi kokuba afihlwe,'' usho kanje.Ugcizelele ukuthi lokhu kubathoba amanxeba, njengomndeni njengoba sebazi ukuthi ithambo labo likuphi."Khona kuhle ukuthi sesiyazi ukuthi ilungu lethu lashona. Obekukubi kakhulu ukuthi aduke njengoba sonke lesi sikhathi besingazi ukuthi kwenzekani ngaye,'' usho kanje.Okhulumela amaphoyisa uColonel Robert Netshiunda wakuqinisekisa ukumbiwa kwamathambo omuntu eNsuze.Umsolwa kuyimanje ugqigqa enkantolo ngecala lokubulala.

INDODA eboshewe icala lokubulala ‘owashela’ intombi yayo ehostela KwaMashu, inikwe ithuba lokuya esibhedlela iyofuna isiqiniseko sokuthi yalashwa khona mhlazane iphukile.UMnuz Sbongiseni Njabulo Khoza uzoziyela mathupha esibhedlela i-Victoria Mnxenge,  ebiyaziwa ngeKing Edward VIII, ayofuna amaphepha okulashwa kwakhe.Uyaphika ukuthi nguye owadubula wabulala uMnuz Sizwe Petros Zungu (40) ngoNovemba 2021, ehostela laKwaMashu.UKhoza watshela iNkantolo yesiFunda yaseNtuzuma efakaza ukuthi wayegodle ukhonkolo ngengalo ephukile, wayengawubamba kanjani umkhono wekati athathe impilo kaZungu?Waphinde wathi ngesikhathi sesigameko wayekade esentombini eMlaza.Imantshi uRavi Pillayi, ngoLwesithathu, ikhiphe umyalelo wokuthi umphenyi wecala ayofaka isicelo sokukhipha uKhanyile ejele laseWestville bese eya naye esibhedlela.Kuvele nokuthi uKhoza usemelwe ummeli omusha yize icala selifike ngasemaphethweni. Lo mmeli ucele ukunikwa isikhathi afunde imininingwane yecala. Sekusele kufakaze udokotela owelapha uKhanyile ephukile obizwe imantshi.UKhoza wayekade efake isicelo sokuthola imininingwane ukuze aqinise ubufakazi bakhe bokuthi akazani nokubulawa kukamufi.UMbuso uyavuma ukuthi uKhoza waphuka futhi walashwa kodwa akwenzekanga ngesikhathi sokubulawa kukamufi. Usola uKhoza ngokuqondanisa izigameko ngenhloso yokuzihlangula.Umfowabo kamufi owabona ebulawa, uMnuz Zubise Zungu, wathi nguKhoza owadubula futhi ngamampunge ukuthi wayephukile efake ukhonkolo.Wachaza umufi njengemvu, eyayinothando lwabantu idabuka KwaMaphumulo, kodwa ehlala ehostela ukuze asondelane nomsebenzi wokuba unogada.Wasola ukuthi umufi wabulawela ukuthi washela owesifazane oyintombi kaKhoza amchaza ngomgulukudu owayesatshwa ehostela negenge yakhe.

UKHUMBULE umphakathi awakhele umculi weGospel uThulani Ga Ndlela enikela ngamapheya angu-47 ezicathulo zesikole eNsimbini Primary eCato Manor.UNdlela ungumnikazi wenkampani yemicimbi iGa Music Production.Le nkampani ihlela umcimbi wokholo iPre-Easter Gospel Music Festival ezobe ise-ICC, eThekwini, ngoMashi 23, Isolezwe elingabaxhasi bawo.Ekhuluma neSolezwe kulesi sikole uGa, uthe uke wacabanga ukuthi umnikelo wezicathulo avele awuyise ezindaweni zasemakhaya, eziqhelile neTheku kodwa wabuye wabona kukuhle ukuqala ekhaya.“Ngihlala ewadini eyodwa nesikole. Ngibuye ngacabanga ukuthi angilwehlukanise kabili usizo lwezicathulo, ngiqale ngihambise ewadini engihlala kuyo, ngaphambi kokuthi ngiye kude,” kusho uGa.Uveze ukuthi izicathulo uzinikelelwe uSolwazi Qedi Zulu, owayehlele umcimbi wamaChristmas Carols ayeyingxenye yawo.Uthe uZulu wathi kukuye ukuthi uzisaphi.“Ngikhethe lesi sikole, ngakhetha nesaKwaMsane, eMtuba okuthiwa iKwazitike Primary. Khona sizoya ezinsukwini ezimbalwa ezizayo. Sizohambisa amapheya angu-48,” kusho uGa.Uthe emva kokuhambela lesi sikole ubonile ukuthi lusadingeka usizo oluningi, wathi ubonile ukuthi kufanele abuye kuwo lonyaka nolunye isizo.Uveze ukuthi njengoba benxenxa abantu ukuthi bahambele iPre Easter Gospel, enye yemali abazoyithola , bahlela ukuyisebenzisela ukuguqula amakhonteyna bawenze imitapo yolwazi engomahamba nendlwana.“Izoyiswa ezikoleni zasemakhaya ukugqugquzela ukufunda ezinganeni,” usho kanje.Ezibongela ngomnikelo, uthishanhloko wesikole uNksz Pinky Mhlongo, uthe umnikelo ofana nalo bahlale bewamukela ngezandla ezimhlophe ngoba isikole sisendaweni ehaqwe ububha.“Abantwana bazosizakala kakhulu ngalo mnikelo wanamuhla wezicathulo ngoba abanye babo isimo sibheda ngempela emakhaya,” kusho uNksz Mhlongo.Uthe ngaphakathi esikoleni banekomiti elibheka izingane ezingenabazali.“Sinohlu lwalaba bantwana, uma kuqhamuka usizo, sibhekela bona kuqala, silokhu sibheka futhi ukuthi bashoda ngani,” kusho uNksz Mhlongo.Uveze nokuthi badinga yonke inhlobo yosizo, olubandakanya ngisho nezimpahla zokugqoka nokudla ngoba kwezinye izikhathi kuye kudingeke ukuthi babanike ukudla abazogoduka nakho baye emakhaya.Uthe bafisa nokulungiselwa inkundla yezemidlalo, wathi izingane ziyazimisela kwezemidlalo yize bengakabi nayo inkundla yokudlala.Ukuzibeka ethubeni lokuziwinela amathikithi okuba yingxenye yalo mcimbi. Thumela igama elithi "ISOGOSPEL" ku-33258, i-SMS ibiza R 1.50. Abawinile bazokwaziswa ngocingo. Umncintiswano uzovalwa kusasa ngo-8 ebusuku.

Uzovalwa thaqa uthelawayeka uN3 phakathi kwase-Ashburton naseLynnfield Park ngoMsombuluko emini njengoba kuzobe kuqhunyiswa ngaphansi kwebhuloho iLynnfield.Lokhu kuqhunyiswa kuyingxenye yokwakhiwa komgwaqo okuqhubekayo kulo mgwaqo.Umgwaqo uzovalwa phakathi kuka-2.30 kuya ku-3, uphinde uvalwe ngesikhathi esifanayo nangoLwesithathu.UJason Lowe iyimenenja kwaSanral, uthe phambilini abakwazanga ukuqhumisa njengoba babehlelile ngenxa yobuhixihixi.“Ukuvalwa thaqa isikhashana kuzokwenzeka kuN3 naku-R103 phakathi kwezimpambano zase-Ashburton naseLynnfield Park. AbakwaToad Traffic Inspectorate (RTI) bazobe belawula izimoto uma sekwenziwa lokhu belekelelwa yithimba labakhayo,” kusho uLowe.Uthe njengoba ukuqhumisa kwenziwa kuR103 ngaphansi kwebhuloho kuN3, ayikho enye indlela izimoto ezingahamba kuyo ngakho ukubambezeleka imiuzuzu engu-30 akugwemeki kuzo zonke izindlela.I-Sanral ithe ukuvalwa komgwaqo kungadinga ukuthi kushintshwe uma isimo sezulu singavumi kodwa bazokubika uma kwenzeka.Banxuse abashayeli ukuthi babekezele futhi bahlele izinkambo zabo ngendlela.

KUXWAYISWA abasebenzisa umgwaqo uN3 ngokuvalwa kwawo ngoLwesithathu njengoba uqhubeka umsebenzi wokuwuthuthukisa.Ngokwesitatimende esithunyelwe ngabeSanral, lo thelawayeka uzovalwa kusasa (ngoJulayi 10) phakathi kuka-14h30 no-15h00 njengoba kuhlelwe ukuthi kuqhunyiswe ngaso lesi sikhathi.Lo mgwaqo uzovalwa ejikeni likaM13/N3 kuya ejikeni laseHammarsdale. Kuzophinde kuvalwe umgwaqo uMeadway ejikeni laseThousand Hills Street nokuyindawo esondele kakhulu nalapho okuzobe kuqhunyiswa khona.UJason Lowe, oyiProject Manager kuSanral Eastern Region, uthi banezinhlelo ezizosiza ukuze kungabi nesiminyaminya ngesikhathi kusavalwe lo mgwaqo.“Sisebenza ngokubambisana nabeRoad Traffic Inspectorate (RTI) ukuqapha isiminyaminya emgwaqeni ngesikhathi umgwaqo usavaliwe.”Abashayeli bangasebenzisa uR103 ukugwema isiminyaminya.

UZOVELA maduze enkantolo owesilisa wokufika oboshelwe icala lokuzenza udokotela eSydenham, eThekwini ngempelasonto.Lokhu kushiwo okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Robert Netshiunda.Ubeqinisekisa isigameko sokuboshwa kowesilisa oneminyaka engu-43 ngoLwesihlanu, eSydenham emva kokubhadanywa esebenza ekubeni ewudokotela mbumbulu. “Ubesebenza ngaphandle kwamaphepha obudokotela. Amaphoyisa ambophe emva kokulunywa indlebe ngokuba khona kodokotela abasolisayo esikhungweni sezempilo esisemgwaqweni uRandless kule ndawo. Umsolwa uficiwe, waboshwa, uzovela enkantolo maduze,” kusho uNetshiunda. Umthombo osemaphoyiseni utshele Isolezwe ukuthi udokotela mbumbulu ubhadanywe exilonga ingane eneminyaka emine endaweni yakhe yokusebenzela ngosuku aboshwe ngalo.  Uqhube wathi owesilisa okuthiwa ungowokufika kuleli uboshwe amaphoyisa ophiko oluhlukahlukene okukhona kulo neSydenham Trio Task Team.Umthombo uthe owesilisa uboshwe emva kokuthi amaphoyisa ngokubambisana nenhlangano yabasebenzi bezempilo, iHealth Professions Council of South Africa (HPCSA), enohlu lwabo bonke odokotela kuleli elunywe indlebe ngemikhuba egilwa ilona wesilisa.Uthe kuthiwa ubekwe icala lokuzenza udokotela osemthethweni ekubeni engenazo iziqu zobudokotela.“Amaphoyisa eSydenham Trio Task Team athole umkhondo ngeHPCSA ngodokotela mbumbulu okuthiwa usebenza ngezikhathi zasebusuku ekhemisi laseSydenham,” kusho umthombo.Uveze ukuthi banikele khona nezikhulu zeHPCSA, bazithela phezu kwakhe exilonga ingane (4) ebilethwe abazali bayo.“Amaphoyisa aqonde kuyena, ambuza ngezincwadi zomsebenzi wakhe, wahluleka wancama ukuziveza, maqede wakha phansi, ebalekela ukuboshwa,” kusho umthombo.Uthe ugcine eboshwa, wayiswa esiteshini samaphoyisa eSydenham ukuze kuqhutshekwe nophenyo.Umthombo uveze ukuthi kuthathwe zonke izinto zakhe zokusebenza okukhona kuzo iStethoscope, isigxivizo sikadokotela, imiqingo yezempilo namanye amafayela nemoto iToyota Fortuner ecishwe izinombolo zayo (Vin number).“Konke okuthathiwe kuzosetshenziswa uma sekuqhutshekwa nophenyo,” kusho umthombo.

UZULELWA ngamanqe owayengumsakazi woKhozi FM, uSbu Buthelezi, osekuvele izindaba zokuvulelwa amacala ngabantu abathi wabaqola izigidi zemali ababeyilondoloze enkampanini yakhe i-Abombuso Investments.Isolezwe Ngempelasonto lixoxe nabambalwa abathi kwacwila izigidi zabantu ezilinganiselwa ku-R60 million enkampanini kaButhelezi. Baveza ukuthi abacwila balinganiselwa ku-600 000.Baze basho nokuthi kwakuyinto encane kabi le yokushaywa kukaSbu ngamalungu eSikebhe ngoba kwakukhulunywa ngemali yomuntu oyedwa bengaveziwe ukuthi baningi ngalolu hlobo abalahlekelwe.Kukhona namacala asevuliwe kanti amanye kuthiwa azovulwa maduze.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uwaqinisekisile amacala amabili asevuliwe.Kukhona elivulwe wuNksz Nompumelelo Nxumalo eDurban Central kanti elesibili livulwe wuMnuz Lindani Gumede esiteshini samaphoyisa eManzimtoti.UNetshiunda uthe womabili la macala asaphenywa kodwa akekho oseboshiwe ngawo.Ekukhaleni kwabantu kuvela nezindaba ezishaqisayo ngabantu abalahlekelwa yimali beyilondoloze enkampanini kaSbu Buthelezi.UMnuz Mbongeni Ndlovu ongomunye wabakhala ngokuthi waqolwa wuSbu Buthelezi, uthe kumanje kunemindeni esihlakazekile ngenxa kaSbu.“Njengoba siseqoqweni likaWhatsApp angaseyona ingxenye yalo uSbu, kuvela izindaba ezithusayo ngabantu abadlele imali.
