Kunogogo nje oneminyaka engu-87 ohlala ekhala ezimathonsi ngemali ayifaka kuSbu yacwila.“Omunye uthe kumanje usexabene nomyeni wakhe ekhaya sebelala ngokuhlukana ngoba wayemkhuza ukuthi angayifaki imali kule nkampani kaSbu kodwa waqhubeka ngenkani ngethemba lokuthi uzothola inzuzo.“Kumanje sekuhluleke ngisho abefundisi bezama ukuthi kube nokuthula kulo mndeni kodwa indoda imi ngelokuthi yayimkhuzile unkosikazi wayo ngokufaka imali kuSbu waqhubeka ngenkani, ngeke imxolele.“Omunye uthe uSbu wafika ehleli emakhandleleni eshonelwe wumyeni wakhe, wathi akafake yonke imali yempesheni yomyeni wakhe, yacwila yonke,” kusho uNdlovu.UNdlovu uthe kunamaqoqo kaWhatsApp abunjwe ngokuhlukana ngokwezifundazwe njengoba kuthiwa le nkampani kaSbu yaqola inqwaba yabantu.Kuwona amaqoqo kuthiwa abantu baze baxabane bodwa ngoba kukhona nabafuna ukuzifikela mathupha kuButhelezi kodwa bashaywe wukuthi akatholakali kuzona zonke izindawo okwaziwa ukuthi uhlala kuzona.UMnuz Lindani Gumede, uthe naye ubesejwayele ukuthola izingcingo ezivela kuSbu emsabisa ngokuthi uyamazi lapho ehlala khona, akayeke ukufaka abantu umoya wokufuna imali yabo. Kumanje kuthiwa kunephoyisa elizibophezele ukuthi lizobalekelela bonke abafuna ukuvulela uSbu amacala okuqolwa.Abakhala ngokuthi baqolwa kulindeleke ukuthi bahlangane ngobuningi kwesinye seziteshi zamaphoyisa eThekwini ukuzovula amacala maduze ukuze amaphoyisa aqale ukumthungatha uButhelezi.NgoJanuwari 26, uSbu Buthelezi ukhiphe incwadi eyithumelela abantu abakhala ngokuthi wabaqola, ebathembisa ukuthi bazoqala ukukhokhelwa ngenyanga edlule. Kuze kube yimanje bathe akukho noyedwa osekhokheliwe.Kule ncwadi Isolezwe Ngempelasonto elinayo ikhophi yayo, uSbu uveza eminye imizamo yokuthi adayisele laba bantu amasheya ukuze akwazi ukubakhokhela imali yabo.Uze asho nokuthi uyazi ukuthi abanye sebezonda kwasani into ethi “bangababusi” okuyigama athi liyisiphrofetho kubona njengenkampani ukuthi bazobusa.Uthi kunalokho abantu bazibiza “ngabaqolwa” nakho athe kuyisiphrofetho sabo ngoba uma becabanga kanjalo bazohlupheka impilo yabo yonke.Abanye bathe bacikwa nawukufunda le ncwadi yonke ngoba kudala uSbu Buthelezi ebakhohlisa kugcine kucwebe iziziba ngemali yabo.

UHLONISHWE yizizwe uZulu kugujwa iminyaka ewu-40 kwavuselelwa uMkhosi woMhlanga.Izizwe, okukhona kuzo nezangaphandle kwaleli, aziwuvali umlomo ngobuhle ezibubone esigodlweni eNyokeni, ngempelasonto.Umkhosi wakulo nyaka ubuhanjelwe abasebukhosini bezinye izizwe okubalwa kubo iNdlovukazi yamaPedi, uManyaku Thulare, iNgonyama yesizwe esise-Uganda, uPapa Sande, nabasebukhosini baseSwatini.Okuqaphelekile emkhosini wangempelasonto ukubonakala kwesibalo esiphezulu soNdlunkulu namazinyane eSilo uGoodwill Zwelithini, esake sabonakala emikhosini yaseNdlunkulu kusukela kwaphatha iSilo uMisuzulu kaZwelithini.Umkhosi ubuhanjelwe oNdlunkulu abane bakaMdlokombane, okuwuNdlunkulu waKwaKhethomthandayo, uSibongile Winnifred Dlamini Zulu, uNdlunkulu waKwaDlamahlahla obeqala ukubonakala emkhosini omkhulu okukhona kuwo Indlulamithi, uBuhle Mathe Zulu, uNdlunkulu waKwaLinduzulu, uThandekile Ndlovu, noNdlunkulu wasoNdini, uZola Mafu Zulu.Izimbali zesizwe beziphume ngobuningi emkhosini wakulo nyaka, umkhosi ubuwubukhazikhazi njengoba izintombi bezihlobe ngemibala eyehlukene.Lize lashona elangoMgqibelo izintombi zilokhu zihambisa umhlanga esigodlweni.AbaNtwana uZelamile noNontethelelo kaMisuzulu bahole izintombi ebezihambisa umhlanga eSilweni.Kushintshe izulu lana ngesikhathi iSilo siphuma esigodlweni siya enkundleni lapho ebesiyokhuluma khona nezinkulungwane zamatshitshi, kuphinde kwenzeka okufanayo ngesikhathi iMbube isithula inkulumo.INdlovukazi uManyaku ithe uZulu uyisibonelo esihle kwezinye izizwe zase-Afrika.“Ngiyajabula ukuba iSilo singimeme ukuba ngizobuka lobuhle obungaka bezintombi ezizigcinile. Sibukela kunina ukuthi izintombi ziziphatha kanjani, futhi sifunda lukhulu lapha.”INdlovukazi ithe bafuna ukuvuselela ubuhlobo bukaZulu namaPedi obaqala kubusa iSilo uCetshwayo neNgonyama uSekhukhune.“Uma nisibona lapha ningethuki, ubudlelwano bethu busuka kude kakhulu.”INdlovukazi ithe bayaseseka iSilo uMisuzulu kaZwelithini.“Laba abathanda iSilo ngiyabathanda nami, labo abazonda iSilo ngiyabazonda nami.”INgonyama uPapa Sande ithe usiko kuphela olukwazi ukuhlanganisa abantu ngale ndlela abebehlangene ngayo eNyokeni.USande uhole amakhosi angaphansi kwenhlangano i-African Kingdom Diaspora Alliance adlulisele isitifiketi sokuqokwa kweNdlulamithi njengosihlalo ngokuhlonishwa wale nhlangano egqugquzela ubumbano nokuthula ezwenikazi i-Afrika.Okhulumela iSilo, uMntwana uSimphiwe Zulu, uthe ukuqokelwa KweNdlulamithi kulesi sikhundla kusho ukuthi ivunywa yizo zonke izizwe.“Ngalesi sitifiketi bathi bayavuma ukuthi beseZimbabwe, beseMalawi, bese-Uganda, kodwa uma bengamaZulu bathi inkosi yabo iyodwa nina beSilo. Bathi inkosi yabo ile ephambi kwethu. Manje base bethi angeke kulunge ukuthi bakhulume ngomlomo kuphela, base beletha isitifiketi esishoyo ukuthi Ingonyama yethu yiyo yona lena, akekho omunye.“Nathi siyavuma Ngonyama ukuthi ubani nje omunye ongathi uma ezokhuluma bese kuna imvula, athi uma eqeda ukukhuluma bese iyaphela? Ilona ophambi kwethu nina beSilo. Akekho omunye okungenzeka kuye lapha kwaZulu.”

UNGOTI wezomthetho uthi owayenguMengameli, uJacob Zuma, kuzofanele akhethe phakathi kokulahlekelwa yimihlomulo ayithola ngokuba ngowayengumengameli njengoba esevunyelwe ukuthi angenele ukhetho.UMnuz Mpumelelo Zikalala, weZikalala Attorneys uthe uZuma uzolahlekelwa yiyo yonke imihlomulo ayitholayo uma engavuma ukuba yilungu lePhalamende.Umhlaziyi wezepolitiki yena uthe akaboni uZuma ezovuma ukuphunyukwa yimihlomula ayithola ngokuba owayengumengameli.Izolo iNkantolo yezoKhetho ichithe isinqumo sokukhishwa kwegama likaZuma ohlwini lwabantu abaya ePhalamende nokusho ukuthi maningi amathuba okuthi abuyele njengoba igama lakhe liphezulu ohlwini lweMK.UZikalala uthe uZuma angeke akwazi ukuhlomula kabili.“Kufanele akhethe okukodwa. Akakwazi ukuthola  umhlomulo wokuthi abe ilungu lePhalamende, aphinde athole imihlomulo yokuba owayengumengameli. Uzolahlekelwa imihlomulo efana nokuba nabaqaphi,” kusho uZikalala.Uthe ubona sengathi isinqumo sikaMengameli, uMnuz Cyril Ramaphosa sokuthambisa isigwebo sikaZuma, ikhona okumnikeze ithuba lokuthi akwazi ukungenela ukhetho.URamaphosa wathambisa isigwebo sikaZuma esadonse izinyanga ezintathu kwesezinyanga ezingu-15.Umthetho awubavumeli abagwetshwa isikhathi esingaphezu kwezinyanga ezingu-12 ukuthi baye ePhalamende.“Kunomehluko la. UZuma akazange anikwe ushwele, isigwebo sakhe sehliswa. Lokhu kusho ukuthi isigwebo sakhe asibanga yilezinyanga ezingu-15 ayegwetshwe zona,” esho,Umhlaziyi wezepolitiki oseNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Zakhele Ndlovu, uthe akaboni uZuma ezovuma ukulahlekelwa imihlomulo ayitholayo.“Mikhulu kakhulu imihlomulo ayitholayo, okubalwa kuyo nokuba nabaqaphi. Angiboni ukuthi uZuma engadela lemihlomulo, akhethe ukuba ilungu lePhalamende,” kusho uNdlovu.UNdlovu uthe ukuvunyelwa kukaZuma ukuba angenele ukhetho kuyizindaba ezimbi kwi-ANC.Uthe ukuvela kwegama likaZuma ohlwini lwabaya ePhalamende, kuzovusa ufuqufuqu kwabeMK.Uqhubeke ngokuthi bekungeke kube kuhle kwiMK ukuthi uZuma angabi khona okhethweni. Ngaphandle kukaZuma, ayikho iMK.UZuma kuphela owaziwayo kwiMK. Ukungabibikho kukaZuma ohlwini lwabaya ePhalamende bekuzokusho ukuthi uwumhlobiso nje. Impi enkulu lena abayinqobile.Uthi manje sebezokhankasa ngokukhululeka njengoba sebazi ukuthi umuntu abamthwele ngeqoma, uzokuba khona ohlwini. Lokhu kuzolimaza kakhulu i-ANC, kushaye ne-IFP.Iqiniso wukuthi uZuma uthandwa kakhulu lapha KwaZulu-Natal. Ngibona bengalala isibili noma isithathu lapha KwaZulu-Natal.”Okhulumela iMK, uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndhlela uthe ukuvunyelwa kukaZuma ukuba angenele ukhetho kusho ukuthi amadlozi avumile ukuthi aphinde abe umengameli.“Konke esikwenzayo sikwenza ngokukamoya. Manje sekusobala ukuthi lokhu esikwenzayo kufunwa amadlozi. Akekho ke ongavimba into efunwa amadlozi,” kusho uNdhlela.Uqhubeke ngokuthi bafuna ukuthi uZuma aphinde abe umengameli.“Iqiniso ukuthi akusiye uZuma othe ufuna ukuba umengameli, abantu abathe bafuna abuye. Kuningi esikufunayo kuZuma. Sifuna amanzi, ugesi nemigwaqo,” esho.Uthe ukukhishwa kukaZuma ohlwini bekushiya imibuzo engaphenduleki.Kubantu abangu-15 000 abasohlwini lwabangenele ukhetho, kube yigama likaZuma kuphela elikhishwayo. Lokhu kukwenza uzibuze ukuthi yini lena engaka efunwa kuZuma.UNdhlela uthe njengoba igama likaZuma selibuyiselwe ohlwini, sebezokwazi ukugxila emkhankasweni wabo.

AKAWUVALI umlomo owayengumengameli, uMnuz Jacob Zuma, ngomshado afuna wakhiwe iqembu alikhankaselayo, uMkhonto weSizwe ne-EFF.UZuma uthe umbimbi lungenza lukhulu uma seluphethe izwe emva kokhetho lwangoMeyi.Lokhu ukusho kwi-video, lapho ebefisela khona umholi we-EFF, uMnuz Julius Malema, usuku oluhle lokuzalwa.UMalema ubegubha ukuhlanganisa iminyaka engu-43, ngeSonto.UZuma, obelokhu emamatheka uma ekhuluma ngombimbi alufunayo, uthe uMalema usethubeni lokuba yingxenye yokuqoshwa komlando.Kwi-video, uZuma uthe bafuna ukuthi ukhetho balunqobe ngamalengiso ukuze bezokwazi ukushintsha isimo sakuleli.“Ngifisela wena nathi sonke ukuba sikwazi ukuguqula isimo sezwe. Lokhu ngifuna sikwenze noma kukhona abangathandi. Kuyaphoqa ukuthi siwine ukhetho ngokubili kokuthathu. Ngaleyo ndlela nawe uyoxoxa ukuthi wenza isimanga esingaka uneminyaka engu-43. Jabula, wenze konke ofuna ukukwenza. Kodwa ungakhohlwa ukuthi kufanele sinqobe ukhetho ngokubili kokuthathu.”I-MK ne-EFF kabanaso isivumelwano sokusebenzisana, uZuma akacacisanga ukuthi bazosebenzisana kanjani uma bengagcina besitholile isibalo samavoti abasifunayo.“Okunye nokunye sizokuxoxa emva kokhetho.”UZuma noMalema bake baba inkukhu nempaka.Ubudlelwano babo baqala ukonakala ngesikhathi uMalema engaweseki umkhankaso kaZuma wokuhola i-ANC ngesikhathi kunengqungquthela, wagcina exoshiwe kuyona, wabe esesungula i-EFF.UMalema ubehlezi ephazamisa izinkulumo zikaZuma ePhalamende, futhi wayeyingxenye yemikhankaso yokuba uZuma aphume esikhundleni.Babuye bakhombisa ukubuyisana ngesikhathi uZuma ebhekene nokuboshwa, ngo-2021.UMalema waya “kophuza itiye” emzini kaZuma ngesikhathi kwakusaphikiswana ngesinqumo sokuthi uZuma kufanele aye ejele.Okhulumela iMK, uMnuz Nhlamulo Ndhlela, uthe bebengakanqumi ukuthi bazosebenzisana namaphi amaqembu ezepolitiki.“Njengamanje, alukabi khona ukhetho, asazi ukuthi sizothola amavoti amangaki. Uma singathi siyaqala sikhuluma indaba yokusebenzisana, singathi sikhuluma ngamaphi amavoti? Njengamanje sigxile ekukhankaseleni ukhetho.”UNdhlela uthe bazosebenzisana kuphela namaqembu anemigomo efana neyabo.“Kubalulekile ukuthi amaqembu acabanga ngokufana abe yimbumba. Lezo zingxoxo sizokuba nazo emva kokhetho.”Ebuzwa yiSABC ngomyalezo awuthunyelwe uZuma, uMalema uthe bazimisele ngokusebenzisana namaqembu anemigomo efanayo neyabo.“Akhona amaqembu anemigomo efanayo neyethu, iPAC, ATM. Manje sekukhona neMK ekhuluma indaba yokuthathwa komhlaba ngaphandle kwesinxephezelo. Sihlezi sikusho ukuthi sifuna kube nobumbano.”Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kokhulumela i-EFF, uMnuz Sinawo Thambo, ayizange iphumelele njengoba ucingo lwakhe belukhala lungabanjwa.Khonamanjalo: UNdhlela ugxeke ukuqhubeka kwezigameko zokubulawa kosopolitiki KwaZulu-Natal.Lokhu ukusho emva kokubulawa komxhumanisi we-ANC kuWard 74, kuMasipala waseThekwini, uMnuz Vusumuzi “Blesser” Ntuli.UNtuli udutshulwe wabulawa ngoMgqibelo ehostela eTehuis, ephuma emhlanganweni weMK.“Sifuna kube nobulungiswa. Kufanele kuphele ukubulawa kwabaholi bezepolitiki KwaZulu-Natal. Sinxusa amalungu oMkhonto ukuba ehlise imimoya, adedele uphenyo lwamaphoyisa. Sinxusa nabaholi bamaqembu ezepolitiki ukuba bangakhulumi izinto ezisusa udlame uma bekhuluma emiphakathini.”

UNobhala Jikelele we-ANC, uMnuz Fikile Mbalula, ubona ukudideka kumholi we-MK Party, uJacob Zuma.UMbalula uthe uZuma akazi nokuthi kufanele ezisebenzise kanjani izihlalo ezitholwe yiMK okhethweni lwangoMeyi.Ukusho lokhu ngoMgqibelo ngesikhathi ekhuluma nabezindaba, lapho ebezophawula khona ngenkulumo yokuvula iPhalamende eyethulwe uMengameli uCyril Ramaphosa.UMbalula uthe okukhombisa ukuthi uZuma udidekile ngempela ukuthi uvele waqoka owachithwa ekubeni yijaji, uDkt John Hlophe, ukuba ahole iMK ePhalamende.“Lokhu kukhombisa ngokusobala ukuthi uZuma akabahloniphi abantu abavotayo. Kubo bonke abantu abengabaqoka uvele wakhetha uHlophe. Awucabange nje.”UMbalula uthe uHlophe ugcwele intukuthelo.“Ingakho nangesikhathi ethola ithuba lokukhuluma ePhalamende evele wangakhuluma ngenkulumo kaRamaphosa. Uvele wazikhulumela into ethandwa uyena.”UZuma ubekhona ePhalamende ngesikhathi kunenkulumompikiswano ngoLwesihlanu.Ngesikhathi kuqhubeka inkulumo mpikiswano amalungu eMK abelokhu ekhalaza ngokuthi abebephethe umhlangano abafuni ukumemezela ukuthi uZuma ukhona ePhalamende.UMbalula uthe nakho lokhu kuyizinkomba zokuthi nawo amalungu eMK azididekele.

OWAYENGUMENGAMELI wezwe uMnuz Jacob Zuma, neqembu Umkhonto Wesizwe (MK) bafake isicelo eNkantolo yoMthethosisekelo. Bacela ukuthi amajaji ayekhona ngesikhathi kuthathwa isinqumo sokuthi aboshwe ngokwedelela umyalelo wenkantolo, ashenxe uma sekulalelwa isicelo senhlangano yokhetho i-IEC ngesonto elizayo. UZuma wagwetshwa izinyanga ezingu-15 waboshelwa ejele lase-Estcourt ngo-2021.I-IEC, yanquma ukuthi uZuma akafanelwe wukungena ohlwini lwasePhalamende ngoba walahlwa ngecala, wagwetshwa. UMkhonto weSizwe walufaka enkantolo udaba wanqoba kodwa i-IEC yalwedlulisa ithi ayinelisekile ngesinqumo.INkantolo yoMthethosisekelo kulindeleke ukuthi ilalele isicelo se-IEC ngoMeyi 10.I-SABC ibike ukuthi uZuma emaphepheni uthe ukuze inkantolo ihlale, kumele kuba nokungenani namajaji ayisishiyagalombili. Emaphepheni iMK noZuma abawafakile, babale iNhloko yamaJaji uRaymond Zondo namanye okungoJaji Madlanga, Jaji Majiedt, Jaji Mhlantla, Jaji Theron noJajiTshiqi ukuthi kumele bashenxe.

OWAYENGUMENGAMELI wezwe ne-ANC uMnuz Jacob Zuma, uthe bamatasa bavimba amankentshane azifaka ngenkani ezikhundleni zoMkhonto weSizwe aze asebenzise nemali.UZuma usho lokhu ekhuluma ngaphandle kweNkantolo eNkulu eGoli emuva kokuhlehla kwecala lokushushisa uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa ngokuzimela. UZuma ukhale ngokusebenza komthetho wakuleli wathi unamehlo uyabona ukuthi yimuphi umuntu obhekene naye.Ukhale ngokuthi uRamaphosa akaze avele enkantolo kodwa kube kunezinsolo abhekene nazo zokufihla imali endlini. UZuma uthe yena ngesikhathi eseCuba amajaji athi amfuna la aze akhipha incwadi yokuthi aboshwe ebe engakaze ebe ngisho inaliti.Udaba abeze ngalo enkantolo lulalelwe kancane lwaguqela u-Agasti nonyaka.Ekhuluma nabalandeli beMK ngaphandle kwenkantolo, uZuma uthe njengoba behosha abaholi ezikhundleni yingoba bayakhuculula balungisa isimo.Uthe kukhona ngisho abasebenzisa imali abaphatha izibhamu ngoba bebuswa wogovane babo belobizela izikhundla. Uthe bonke labo bayaziwa bazokhishwa ngoba abafanelwe wukusebenzela umbutho.“ Kuthiwa kukhona nabasebenzisa imali, bonke labo siyabazi baze baphathe izibhamu bayiziqhwaga. Kukhona nezicagogwana zezinhlaka manje. Yingakho sizolokhu simemezela kancane kancane ukuthi siyabakhipha abantu ngoba asidlali la,’’ kusho uZuma.Uthe kukhona abazifake bona ohlwini lwabaya ePhalamende nabo bazokhishwa badalakacwe phandle.“ Labo ababanga izikhundla siyabazi abafuneki lapha ngoba savumelana ngezinhlaka zesikhashana. Sathi ngeke siqale sibize ingqungquthela okwamanje ngoba kuzosibambezela ukubanga izikhundla.’’ UZuma ukhuluma kanjena nje iqembu lakhe lisanda kumemezela ukudilizwa kobehola intsha uBonginkosi Khanyile nabanye abaholi. Kusolwa ukuthi badilizelwe ukungaziphathi kahle.UZuma uthe uma bebona ukuthi umuntu uhalela isikhundla ngeke afakwe nhlobo uyosizwa ngendaba ngoba bafuna abantu bazibonakalise ngemisebenzi.Uthe uhlu lwabo lwasePhalamende lusabhekwa kabanzi lulungiswe kusefwe abanye ngoba bafuna ukufaka amakhosi nabanye bezinye izinhlaka ukuze zimeleleke.UZuma ubenanelwa amakhwelo nemikikizo ekhuluma aze akhuze izaga zakhe zokubhinqa ahleke kancane.

IBASHAYISA amakhala abeMK Party eyengozi yemoto evelele umholi wabo, uMnuz Jacob Zuma ngesikhathi eseShowe ngoLwesine ebusuku.Isolezwe Ngempelasonto lithole ukuthi uZuma ubephuma kwakhe eNkandla, eyokhankasela iMK eShowe.Oyinhloko yokhetho kwiMK eKZN, uMnuz Musa Mkhize utshele abeSABC News ukuthi ibathusile lengozi ngoba kuke kwathiwa luyoshaya usuku lokhetho esesibhedlela.Uthe kunesandla sesithathu kule ngozi yemoto, kunabathize abazama ukuqeda ngempilo kaZuma."Nanoma wubani owenza lokhu, bayazazi. Angizosho ukuthi ngobani kodwa bayazazi ngoba bakushilo emphakathini. Bakusho kwithelevishini,  umphakathi uyazi ukuthi bangobani.“Ngenxa yokuthi banamandla okwenza nanoma yini nokujuba okubeka impilo kaZuma engcupheni. Siyakholelwa ukuthi yini edale lokhu," kusho uMkhize.Uqhubeke ngokuthi akukaze kwenzeke ingozi enjengalena kwabanye abantu asebeke baba ngomengameli bamazwe."Kungani lokhu kwenzeka kuMengameli uZuma. Nginalombuzo. Usengozini kulabo abamzondayo. Usengozini kubantu abafuna ukumbulala. Abakhumbule labo abamfuna efile ukuthi abahlaseli yena yedwa kodwa bahlasela lonke izwe. “Bahlasela thina sonke ngoba okwenzeka kuye, kuyobe kwenzeke kithi sonke. Yingakho sizokwenza nanoma yini ukuvikela uMengameli," kugcizelela uKhabazela.UMkhize uthe njengamanje uZuma usekubhaceni lapho ecashiswe khona ngokuba kusatshelwa ukuphepha kwakhe.Unxuse ukuba kuthandazelwe ukuphepha kukaZuma ngoba impilo yakhe isengcupheni. Ebuzwa ukuthi sinjani isimo sikaZuma, uMkhize uvele wangena ezintangeni.Ubuze ukuthi kungani imoto ivele yaqonda emotweni ebigibele uZuma. Uthe njengamanje icala selisemaphoyiseni ukuze kutholakale ukuthi ngubani obezama ukubulala uZuma ngengozi yemoto. Unxuse ungqongqoshe wamaphoyisa ukuba enze konke okusemandleni ukuthi uZuma uyavikeleka, ngale kokubheka ukuthi uZuma weseka liphi iqembu okhethweni lukazwelonke ngoMeyi 29, kulo nyaka.Kwenzeka lokhu nje, igama likaZuma lihoxisiwe ohlwini lwabaholi beMK abangase balibhekise ePhalamende.UMkhize uthe njengamanje baxhumana nabameli babo ukuba balwe baze banqamuke izandla ngoba emuva kokhetho, akukho okuyovimba uZuma ekubeni yilungu lePhalamende nokuba wuMengameli wezwe.

UTHEMBISE impilo engcono kwabamnyama, owayengumengameli uJacob Zuma, ngesikhathi ethula umqulu wezethembiso zokhetho weMK.UZuma uthe inhlupheko izophela kwabamnyama uma iMK inqoba ukhetho oluzayo.Umqulu wezethembiso wethulwe enkundleni yezemidlalo i-Orlando Stadium, eGoli, ngoMgqibelo.Emuva kokwethula lo mqulu, izolo inkantolo yoMthethosisekelo imemezele ukuthi sizophuma namuhla ngo-10 izinqumo secala elifakwe yinhlangano eyengamela ukhetho kuleli, i-IEC sokucela incazelo ngesinqumo sokuthi kugcinwe igama likaZuma ohlwini lwabazoya ePhalamende emva kokhetho. I-IEC yafaka isimangalo enkantolo yezoKhetho ngoba ithi uZuma akakufanele ukuba sohlwini lwe-MK lwabazoya ePhalamende ngoba wake wagwetshwa izinyanga ezingu-15. UZuma utshele izinkulungwane zabalandeli beMK ukuthi izwe lizobuyela kubantu abangumsinsi wokuzimilela.Ukhale ngokuthi abantu abamnyama bawuphawu lwenhlupheko.“Uma kukhulunywa ngabantu abangasebenzi, sikhuluma ngabantu abamnyama. Uma sikhuluma ngabantu abahlala emkhukhwini sikhuluma ngabantu abamnyama. Uma singasukumi sizimele, akekho ozosimela.”UZuma uthe ufisa ukuthi izwe liphathwe amakhosi.Uthe ufuna ukuthi izingane zifunde mahhala, kuphele indlala, kube nokuthula noxolo.UZuma uthe inhlupheko ebhekene nabantu abamnyama iphinde idalwe nawukuvela kwamaqembu amancane.UZuma uthe abaholi bamaqembu amancane abanandaba nezidingo zabantu, wathi basuke bezifunela izikhundla ePhalamende.“Mina nginenkinga yokuthi amaqembu maningi kakhulu. Iwona adala ukuthi sihlupheke. La maqembu athola imali kubelungu. Kuwona ukuya ePhalamende bakuthatha njengomsebenzi.“Kulaba abaningi enibavotelayo, abanandaba nani, bazifunela umsebenzi. Noma sebesePhalamende abakhulumi ngenhlupheko yenu. Bafike bakhohlwe uma sebethole izikhundla.”UZuma uxwayise abaholi beMK ngokubanga izikhundla.Uthe bazoxoshwa abalwela izikhundla.“Angikufuni ukuvungama. Umuntu athi ngifuna ukuya ePhalamende. Njengoba sibaningi kangaka ngeke sonke siye ePhalamende. Angifuni kube nabantu abazokhalela ukuthi bakhishiwe ohlwini lwabaya ePhalamende. Leli qembu silakhele indlu emnyama. Wena uzokhalela ukuthi ukhishwe ohlwini. Kanti wena ubulwela ukuba sohlwini?“Asingabangi ubala size siphathelane izibhamu. Uma nje sike sabathola laba abahamba bekhalela izikhundla, ngeke siphinde sibanike izikhundla. Labo abazoba amalungu esigungu esiphezulu kwiMK kufanele bazi ukuthi ngeke baqokwe njengongqongqshe. Phela into eyenza ukuthi kube nenkohlakalo yile nto yokuthi abantu bahlafune ngapha nangapha.”Abalandeli beMK bebephume ngezinkani kulo mcimbi.Abaholi bakhale ngokuthi kube nemizamo yokuphazamisa umcimbi.Lokhu kufakazwe nawuZuma, othe uzwe kuthiwa amabutho abeze emcimbini avinjiwe.“Ngiyajabula ukubona izinsizwa zimi lapha ngoba ngike ngaphatheka kabi emini uma ngizwa kuthiwa ziyavinjwa.”Nasezinkundleni zokuxhumana kukhona abebekhala ngokuthi sebeme baze bavuvukala izinyawo amabhasi awafiki kuthiwa abashayeli bawo bayavinjwa.

Umholi woMkhonto Wesizwe uJacob Zuma uthi akukho miphumela yokhetho ezomenyezelwa kusasa ngeSonto besenezikhalo ezingaphenduliwe.UZuma ukusho lokhu esithangamini nabezindaba esikhungweni semiphumela se-IEC eMidrand, eGoli, ngoMgqibelo ebusuku.Uthe abafuni ukujahwa kodwa bafuna ukunikwa ithuba ukuze bafake izikhalo zabo. Iqembu lakhe namanye amaqembu angaphezu kuka-20 bakhala ngendlela izinto ezenzeke ngayo ngesikhathi kuqhubeka ukhetho nangesikhathi kubalwa.“Sizodinga isikhathi. Akukho muntu ozothi nansi imiphumela. Uma lokho kwenzeka abantu bazobe besichukuluza ngoba siyazi sikhuluma ngani, asiqageli. Nginethemba lokuthi okunguyena obhekelele lokhu ulalele. Ungayiqali inkinga uma ingekho. Nika amaqembu ezepolitiki ithuba lokubeka udaba lwawo,” kusho uZuma.Uthe inhlangano ebhekelele ukhetho uma bekhuluma ngokuthi kunezinkinga okumele zibhekwe ibanika imizuzu emincane.“Angazi yinkululeko enjani leyo. Siphushwa sengathi siyiziboshwa  umuntu okuphoqa ukuthi ungene esitokisini akhiye.”Uthe akekho umuntu okumele abaphoqe ukuthi nayi imiphumela yiza ingashayi emhloleni. Uthe kumele i-IEC ibagculise ukuthi izinto zenzeke ngendlela efanele.“Akujahwe lutho, ngeke kufe muntu uma imiphumela ingakhishwa kusasa. Kujahweni? Sesibekezele kakhulu izinto zenzeka. Ngisho abantu benza ubugebengu ababoshwa.Akukho muntu ozomemezela kusasa ngaphandle uma bebengasebenzi nathi. Asikwazi ukuba nondlovukayiphikiswa.”Khonamanjalo uMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa sekuqinisekisiwe ukuthi uzokwethula inkulumo  emcimbini wokumenyezelwa kwemiphumela ngeSonto.

UMHOLI weMK uMnuz Jacob Zuma usehlise amaphaphu kulabo abajahe ukuthi leli qembu lihlalise izingqungquthela njengoba ethi abajahile ukuzibiza. UZuma uthe esinye sezizathu zokuthi bangazihlalisi izingqungquthela yingoba abantu bakhipha imali bathenge amalungu.“Abantu bathenga amalungu ukuthi abavotele. Sithe lokhu asifuni ukuthi kwenzeke kwiMK. Sifuna ukwakha uzinzo eqenjini lihlonishwe uwonke wonke ngaphambi kokubiza izingqungquthela. Sifuna iqembu limele abantu, yingakho singajahile ukuhlalisa izingqungquthela,” kusho uZuma.Ukusho lokhu izolo esithangamini nabezindaba eSandton lapho bekuthulwa khona ubuholi obuphezulu baleli qembu.UZuma uphefumule kanje kulandela ikhwelo elihlatshwe yizinhlaka ezehlukene ngaphakathi eqenjini ezifuna kuhlaliswe izingqungquthela.Lezi zinhlaka zikhala ngokuthi ukungabikhona kwezinhlaka ezikhethwe engqungqutheleni kwenza lungabikhona uzinzo njengoba neqembu lipheka lithulule abaholi abahlukene okubalwa obengunobhala jikelele uMnuz Arthur  Zwane.UZuma ephendula umbuzo wokupheka kuthululwe abaholi, uveze ukuthi yingoba ababafuni abantu abenza izinto ezingalungile eqenjini.“Ngithi angiwuphendule lo mbuzo wabantu ababuza ngokuphekwa kuthululwe abaholi. Ezinyangeni ezimbalwa kusungulwe iqembu sekube nonobhala jikelele abayisihlanu. Sasivele sishilo ukuthi akekho umuntu ozokwenza into engalungile bese simyeka. Sisazoqhubeka sibaxoshe abenza okungalungile. Ngiyazi bathi singamaqaba sixosha abantu,” kusho uZuma.UZuma uveze umbono wokuthi kumele ahlangane abe yimbumba amaqembu amancane ukuze kukhululwe abamnyama.“Amaqembu abamnyama kumele ahlangane ukuze kukhululwe abantu abamnyama. IMK yisona sisombululo ezweni yingakho kumele sihlangane singamaqembu amnyama sisebenze ukufukula abantu bakithi,” kusho uZuma.Kulesi sithangami kumenyezelwe ubuholi obuphezulu obuholwa nguZuma njengomengameli, Dkt John Hlophe iphini likaZuma, Dkt Sifiso Maseko unobhala jikelele, iphini lakhe nguNksz Nombuso Mkhize, usihlalo kazwelonke uMnuz Nathi Nhleko, iphini lakhe nguMnuz Wilson Sibiloane, umgqugquzeli kazwelonke uMnuz Floyd Shivambu othezwe kwi-EFF lapho ebeyiphini likamengameli kuthi uMgcinimafa kube uMnuz Menzi Magubane. UMaseko uthe ihhovisi lakhe yilona elizobe limatasa wathi bafuna ukwehlisa umthwalo obhekene noZuma.Ukhale ngokuthi uZuma uhlangana nenqwaba yabantu kuze kuse emnyango.Uchithe eyokuthi kukhona abavinjwayo uma befuna ukubona uZuma eNkandla.“Umengameli umatasa, ungafika emini uze umbone ebusuku, ngendlela amatasa ngayo. Akekho ovinjwayo ukuthi ambone. Umuntu oshaya amaphiko eqenjini ngumengameli,” kusho uMaseko.Uthe baxhumane nezinhlaka ezehlukene eqenjini mayelana nobuholi obuphezulu.Ukhale ngamaqembu amaningi amancane wathi kunesidingo sokuthi ahlangane, asebenzisane.“Ngeke babekezelwe abantu abazodala uqhekeko eqenjini. Ubuholi obukhona kumele buhlonishwe. Zonke izinqumo zeqembu zizokhishwa yihhovisi likanobhala jikelele.”Uthe bayaqhubeka nokujuba abantu abanamava ePhalamende naseziShayamthetho zezifundazwe.“Abantu esibajubayo banolwazi namava emikhakheni ehlukene okubalwa nakuhulumeni. Sifuna abantu abakhaliphile ePhalamende. Abahola iqembu ngeke bajutshelwe ePhalamende naseziShayamthetho.” Uveze ukuthi bazoqhubeka basebenzisane namanye amaqembu ePhalamende naseziShayamthetho.UMaseko uchithe eyokuthi leli qembu liyistokfela sikaZuma.“Angiyena owakwaZuma, nabanye abaningi ababona abakwaZuma. Yinto engekho ukuthi iqembu elakwaZuma.”

BAKHATHAZEKILE abazali babafundi basesikoleni i-Ekwazini High, eMlaza, ngenxa yamabhoklolo ahlukumeza abanye abafundi.Esigamekweni sakamuva esigcine sidlule nomphefumulo womunye wabafundi u-Awande Mdabe (20) obenza u-matric, kusolakala ukuthi uklinywe womunye wamabhoklolo ngothayi endlini yangasese khona esikoleni ngesonto eledlule.UNksz Slindile Mdabe ongumamncane ka-Awande ekhuluma neSolezwe, uthe baphatheke kabi ngalesi senzo.“Ngikhala ngobudedengu bothisha ngoba abayihambisanga ingane esibhedlela futhi abawashayelanga amaphoyisa. Njengabazali baze basazisa ngo-2 ntambama kodwa ingane ibe ilimale ekuseni. Izimoto zothisha bezikhona, okwenze ngazibuza ukuthi yini ndaba bengayihambisanga ingane?” kusho uNksz Mdabe.Uthe okumphatha kabuhlungu kunakho konke ukuthi kuthiwa lo mfundi oklinye umufi akukona okokuqala ekwenza lokho.“Ngibabuzile ukuthi yini ndaba besamgcinile lo mfundi, bathi uMnyango wezeMfundo awuvumi ukuthi umfundi axoshwe esikoleni. Umphakathi nawo ubukhalaza ngoba ziningi izigameko zenzeka njengoba kwesinye isehlakalo abafundi bagwazana,” usho kanje.Uthe mhlawumbe ezinye zezizathu ezenze ukuthi umufi abulawe yingoba amazinyo angaphambili ubengenawo njengoba ashayiswa yimoto, manje izingane bezimgcona ngakho lokho. Uthe nasekhaya umufi wabika ukuthi kukhona umfundi omhlukumezayo esikoleni, kodwa banganaka.Oyilungu lesigungu esangamele isikole, uNkk Hayzel Joyisa, ekhuluma neSolezwe, uthe abafundi bathukile.“Abafundi abathusiwe yisigameko lesi esenzekile, kodwa bathuswe yiqulu labantu ebelimemeza esangweni lesikole, lithi lifuna uthishomkhulu futhi lisabisa ngokushisa isikole. Belithi uthishomkhulu ubengayihambisi ngani ingane esibhedlela? Akekho owayebona ukuthi umfana ulimele kakhulu ngoba wayelokhu ekhuluma ethi kubuhlungu ikhanda,” kusho uNkk Joyisa.Uthe njengabazali baphatheke kabi. “Siphoxekile yilesi senzo ngoba asikwazi ngisho nokulala. Uthishomkhulu namalungu ekomiti bahambile baya emndenini kamufi beyobhonga emswaneni nomndeni womfana owenze lesi sigameko nawo uhambile wayoxolisa,” usho kanje Uqhube wathi izingane ziyaseshwa esangweni lesikole uma zifika ekuseni kubhekwa izikhali noma ezinye izinto ezingalungile besizwa yiforamu namanye amalungu esigungu esangamele isikole.Okhulumela uMnyango wezeMfundo, KwaZulu-Natal, uSihle Mlotshwa, uthe balinde umbiko ophelele ovela emahhovisi esifunda mayelana nalolu daba.Uqhube wathi ukushaya kuyicala lobugebengu, ezinkantolo isiqhwaga singathweswa icala.“Isikole kufanele sisebenzise umyalelo wekhodi yaso yokuziphatha. Akulungile ukuthi umfundi akakwazi ukuxoshwa futhi asinawo umthetho othi othisha bangakwazi ukuyisa abafundi esibhedlela,” ubeke kanje.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, ukuqinisekisile ukuboshwa komsolwa.“Amaphoyisa aseMlaza, abophe umsolwa oneminyaka engu-21 ubudala kulandela isigameko sokushona komfundi oneminyka engu-20 esikoleni esigcemeni sakwa-G eMlaza, ngoLwesihlanu olwedlule. Umsolwa uvele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMlaza ngoMsombuluko, Septhemba 2, 2024. Imibiko iveza ukuthi umsolwa waklinya futhi washaya isisulu ngemuva kwengxabano,” kusho uCol Netshiunda.

UGWETSHWE kanzima owesilisa waseZakheni owaboshiswa ngumama wakhe ngemuva kokuba agonyuluka kuye ngokubulala umuntu ababemgebenga nabangani bakhe.INkantolo yesiFunda eZakheni igwebe uSaneliso Tshabalala (23) noLungani Ngwenya (19) udilikajele neminyaka engu-25 umuntu ngamunye ngamacala okubulala, ukugqekeza ngenhloso yokubamba inkunzi nokubamba inkunzi kusetshenziswa isihluku kanye nokuthumba abakwenza ngoMashi 2023. Ummangali uSiyabonga Makhaza nomufi uSithembe Mabizela babehlala emqashweni eZakheni, eMnambithi. Ekuseni ngoMashi 7, 2023, bavuswa wumsindo wokuphuka kwengilazi. Babona amadoda amane endlini yabo. Amadoda abashaya athatha nezimpahla zawo. Emva kwalokho uMakhaza noMabizela bathathwa bayiswa ebhulohweni eliseduze batshelwa ukuthi beqe.Baphinde bashaywa lapho benqaba. UTshabalala wathi abagxume ngoba esaba ukuthi bazokwazi ukubakhomba uma kuvulwa icala. Yize uMakhaza agwazwa wakwazi ukubaleka kodwa uMabizela akakwazanga ukuphunyuka.UMakhaza waya emizini eminingi eseduzane ukuze athole usizo wagcina efike esiteshini samaphoyisa. Ngesikhathi amaphoyisa eya endaweni yesehlo, athola isidumbu sikaMabizela. UTshabalala waboshwa sekuphele isonto ngemuva kokuvuma icala kunina, wabe esemnikela emaphoyiseni. UNgwenya waboshwa ngemuva kwalokho.Ekwenzeni lesi sigwebo sibe nzima, uMshushisi uCwayita Ngcongo wethule isitatimende esibhalwe ugogo kaMabizela. Esitatimendeni sakhe, uthe uMabizela wayeyithemba lomndeni lempilo engcono. Washiya ikhaya wayohlala eZakheni ukuze ezokwazi ukufunda njengoba wayesenza unyaka wokugcina ezifundweni zakhe.

BAVUKWE umunyu enkantolo abesilisa bechaza ngesigameko sokubulawa komfowabo owadutshulwa ehostela laKwaMashu esolwa ngokuthi uyimpimpi yamaphoyisa.OMnuz Mike Zungu noZibuse Zungu abangabafowabo bakamufi, uMnuz Sizwe Petros Zungu (40), bebekhuluma eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseNtuzuma izolo.La madoda achaze umfowabo njengemvu, eyayinothando lwabantu idabuka KwaMaphumulo kodwa behlala ehostela ukuze asondezele nomsebenzi wokuba unogada.Basola ukuthi umfowabo wafela ukuthi washela owesifazane oyintombi kammangalelwa, uMnuz Sbongiseni Njabulo Khoza, abamchaze ngomgulukudu owayesatshwa ehostela.UZungu (Mike) uthe nakuba umufi nalo wesifazane base benikezene nezinamba zocingo kodwa wayeka ukumeshela ngesikhathi ezwa ukuthi bahlobene naye ngezibongo.“Kwaba ukuqala kwezinkinga zikamfowethu owangitshela ukuthi uzwa kuthiwa kukhona umuntu osefike izikhawu emfuna kodwa engachazi. Lo muntu wayengayazi indlu naye (umufi) wagcina esefona,” kuchaza uZungu.Ulandise wathi ngosuku lwesigameko uNovemba 21, 2021, babehlezi emnyango ntambama ngabo-5 owesifazane ayemshela wafonela umufi embuza ukuthi ukuphi.Kuthiwa yayingamphethe kahle umufi indaba yokufunwa umuntu angamazi wafuna ikhulunywe iphele le nto. Kuthiwa wabiza abafowabo ababili nowesilisa ongusibonda wendawo kwayiwa endaweni okukhandwa kuyona izimoto ukuze kuxoxwe.Kuvela ukuthi uKhoza waqhamuka neviyo lamadoda behlome ngezibhamu waqonda kumufi wathi: “Ngayithola impimpi yamaphoyisa, asilali nje uwena?”Kuthiwa kwathi uma elandula umufi, amthelekela ngesibhaxu amadoda, uZungu (Mike) waphelela endaweni.Kuvela ukuthi amadoda aqhuba umufi noZungu (Zibuse) aya nabo kumama obolekisa ngemali ezalayo befuna abatsheleke uR10 000.Kubikwa ukuthi kwathi uma ingaphumeleli imizamo yokuthola imali eyayifunwa amadoda, kwayiwa endaweni ewumhosha lapho afike wadutshulelwa khona washona umufi.“Ngathi uma ngibona edonsa isibhamu emshaya, ngaphunyula kumfana owayengibambile ngabaleka ngazodlula kuyena lona owayephethe isibhamu ngabaleka ngashiya ophaqa nefoni yami khona lapho,” kusho uZungu (Zibuse).Uthe wabalekela egengeni yangakubo emakhaya wayitshela ukuthi ayihlome ihlasele kodwa yamphendula ngokuthi ayizile yona ngezimpi kodwa izosebenza okuyinto eyamqeda amandla. Athutha ehostela la madoda emuva kwesigameko.Bekulindeleke ukuthi kufakaze udokotela obizwe inkantolo acacise ukuthi wamelapha nini achaze nangokulimala kwakhe. UKhoza ucele inkantolo ukuthi imnike isikhathi esingamasonto amabili ukuze intombi yakhe iye esibhedlela ilande ubufakazi bokuthi wayephukile yena ngesikhathi kwenzeka isigameko.UKhoza uthe akukwazi ukuthi wayengahlohla isibhamu, adubule abulale umuntu ekubeni wayekade enokhonkolo engalweni.Icala lihlehlele u-Agasti 14.

UMNTWANA uPhumzile Buthelezi udalule ukuthi walandwa nge-ambulance esibhedlela ukuba azovota ngesikhathi i-MK isho ukusobozela amaqembu abusa ngokubambisana KwaZulu-Natal, mhla kuqokwa undunankulu wakulesi sifundazwe.UMntwana uPhumzile uthe ivoti lakhe ilona elawelisa amaqembu abusa ngokubambisana mhla kukhethwa uNdunankulu, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, uSomlomo uNksz Nontembeko Boyce, nePhini likaSomlomo, uNksz Mmabatho Tembe.I-MK yayivota ne-EFF ngesikhathi kuqokwa abazongena kulezi zikhundla, bathola amavoti angu-39.Izikhundla zagcine zithathwa amaqembu abusa ngokubambisana, i-IFP, ANC, DA ne-NFP, abathola amavoti angu-41.Kulo mhlangano uMntwana uPhumzile wafika ehamba ngesitulo esinamasondo.UMntwana uPhumzile uveze ukuthi wayelandwe esibhedlela esiseMpangeni.Ukusho lokhu ngesikhathi ekhuluma emcimbini wokugubha usuku lwabantu besifazane obuhlelwe uMasipala wasoLundi. UMntwana uPhumzile uthe ivoti lakhe lalibalulekile, ingakho alandwa esibhedlela.“Wawubagojela u-MK!”Wawushubile umhlangano okwaqokwa kuwo abazongena ezikhundleni njengoba abe-MK ne-EFF babelokhu bezwakalisa izikhalazo ngohlelo olwalulandelwa ngesikhathi kuvotwa.Umhlangano waqala ngo-10 ekuseni waze waphela u-6 wasebusuku usushaye wadlula.UMntwana uPhumzile uveze ukuthi wayengakwazi ngisho nokuma ngosuku lomhlangano, wathi okwakumkhinyabeze kakhulu ukuqhuma komsipha ehlombe.UMntwana uPhumzile uthe umsipha waqhuma emva kokuthi ewile esendlini encane.“Inkinga basuke bathi bangiqeda ubuhlungu edolweni, ngasuke ngangabe ngisawuzwa umlenze. Ngawa, kwase kuqhuma umsipha ehlombe.”UMntwana uPhumzile uthe useyakwazi manje ukuzimela, wathi usaqhubeka nokuthola usizo lwezempilo.UMntwana uPhumzile, obuye abe usihlalo wophiko lwabesifazane kwi-IFP, i-IFP Women’s Brigade, uxwayise abe-IFP ngokuthi i-MK izobaphuca omasipala abaningi lapha KwaZulu-Natal uma bengabhekile.Ukhetho lohulumeni basekhaya oluzayo luzokuba ngo-2026.Njengamanje, i-IFP iyona iphethe omasipala abaningi lapha KwaZulu-Natal kodwa i-MK iyona eyathola amavoti amaningi esifundazweni okhethweni lukazwelonke nolwezifundazwe obelungoMeyi.UMntwana uPhumzile uthe i-MK, esungulwe ngonyaka owedlule, ibukeka indlondlobala yize ingakaze ibe nengqungquthela yokukhetha ubuholi.“Uma nihleli uzonigojela ngo-2026. Awudlali, uwisa kwasani. Abanazikhundla ukuthi bakwenza ngobani, abanasihlalo kazwelonke, abanalutho.”UMntwana uPhumzile uphinde abe usihlalo wekomiti elibhekelele ukusebenza koMnyango wezeMfundo esiShayamthetho saKwaZulu-Natal.

KUNEZINTO ongafuniseli ngazo kuNdunankulu omusha waKwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, uma ufika emzini wakhe esigodini iVumanhlamvu, eNkandla. Uyakholelwa ezimfundisweni zomsunguli weqembu i-IFP, uMntwana wakwaPhindangene. Lokhu ukubona ngezithombe zalo mholi okhothame ngonyaka odlule. Izindondo ezihlobise endlini kwakhe zikhomba ukuthi umculo wamakhwaya usegazini kuye, engakakusho nokukusho lokhu. Ukuqeqeshwa njengothisha kusesemizweni yakhe - ukhuluma acacise futhi uyalalela. UNtuli (51) cishe uyisakhamuzi sesibili saseNkandla ukukhuphukela ehhovisi elikhulu ekuphathweni kwezwe ngemva kwalowo owayenguMengameli uMnuz Jacob Zuma. Ngesikhathi Isolezwe limvakashele bekulokhu kungena abantu abazobingelela baphiwe ukudla, iziphuzo nezithelo. Akekho kubo obehamba engakutholanga okokumaya.UNtuli uthi umoya wokuphana wawufunda kubazali bakhe, okungunina uMaMbatha noyise ngoba kwakuthi uma bedlala nezinye izingane egcekeni baphakelwe bonke, kuthi uma sekudliwa isidlo santambama kuphakelwe nabanye omakhelwane okwakwaziwa ukuthi isimo sabo asisihle kahle.Echaza ngokukhula kwakge, uthe uyinsizwa nje yasemakhaya eyayenza konke okwenziwa ngontanga bayo okubalwa ukwelusa, ukuzingela, ukudlala ibhola, ukudla izithelo zasendle nokunye. Eyokuba yiphisi ifakazelwa izinja eziningi anazo egcekeni, yize-ke engasazingeli ngazo. UNtuli uthi ebholeni wayengemuhle kahle yize wayefuna ngodli ukufakwa esikimini ngoba wayenenkolelo yokuthi uzoshaya amagoli, kodwa kunqabe khona. Ngenxa yalokhu abanye ontanga yakhe babembiza ngenkomo. Kodwa ngesikhathi esewuthisha, waliqeqesha ngempumelelo iqembu lebhola. Ekhula ontanga yakhe uthe babemteketisa ngelika “mlungu”, kodwa wayengasithandi leso sidlaliso ngoba wayengazi ukuthi sisuselwaphi.UNtuli ufunde esikoleni sendawo iVumanhlamvu Primary, wadlulela eMatsheni High, eSibonokuhle High naseNomanci Secondary.Emuva kokuthophula u-matric ube eseyofuna umsebenzi waqashwa njengomuntu ohlanza isitolo eMdlovana, wakhushulwa washaya isisefo, wadlula wayosebenza njengonogada wezitolo Olundi, wagada isikhungo samanzi eMabedlane. Ukungena esiShayamthetho okokuqala wakuzwa ngesikhathi eba unogada esiShayamthetho sasoLundi kanti akazi ukuthi ngelinye ilanga angagcina esekhuphukele esihlalweni esiphezulu akuso namuhla. Ube esebizwa ngesinye sezikole ukuba azoba wuthisha ozosebenza engaqeqeshiwe njengoba sasifuna uthisha ozoculisa ikhwaya kwazise wayewumuntu owayekuthanda ukucula esakhula futhi edla izicoco.Nempela wawuthatha lo msebenzi, waba wuthisha wanqoba izindebe zomculo eMashinga Secondary waze wakhushulelwa isikhundla ngenxa yamagalelo akhe waba yinhloko yomnyango (HOD).Ngesikhathi ewuthisha ongaqeqeshiwe wabhalisela izifundo zobuthishela eRand Afrikaans University esibizwa nge-University of Johannesburg (UJ), waphasa wathola iziqu ze-diploma yobuthishela. Wadlulela eNyuvesi yaKwaZulu-Natal wenza eze-Advanced teaching nazo waziphasa wabe esebhalisela i-honours yakho ukufundisa kodwa akazange aziphothule ngenxa yokuthi wayesematasa kakhulu njengoba wayesewuthishomkhulu futhi esebenzela nenyunyana yothisha iNational Teachers Union (Natu).Uveze ukuthi wenza ezinye izifundo zokucija abaholi nezinye eziningi ngoba uwumuntu okholelwayo kwezemfundo.KwiNatu ubebhekele konke okuthinta amacala othisha, kunguye okhulumela othisha uma bebhekene nezingqinamba. Ube wuthishomkhulu eHwanqana naseLushaba Secondary.Uthe akakaze acabange ukuthi uyoba wuNdunankulu wesifundazwe ngoba akasiye umuntu wezikhundla.“Ngikhule ngithanda ukuba uthisha ogxile kwezomculo ngoba ngiwumuntu okwaziyo ukucula. Ngilifezile iphupho lami lokuba wuthisha futhi bengisungula amakhwaya ezikoleni engifundise kuzo sinqobe izicoco. Ngikwazile nokunyusa izinga lokuphasa ezikoleni ebengizihola ngesikhathi ngiwuthishomkhulu. Angikaze ngicabange ukuthi ngelinye ilanga ngiyoba wuNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal,” kuchaza uNtuli.UNtuli, oyizibulo ezinganeni zakwabo, ulanywa abafana ababili nentombazane eyodwa, ushadelwe uNkk Sindiswa umaSibisi futhi unguyise wabafana abathathu namantombazane amabili.Uma engasebenzi uhlala ekhaya enze imisebenzi yasegcekeni okungaba wukulungisa ingadi nokubheka okunye okudinga ukulungiswa, ubuye apheke njengoba ewumuntu okukhonzile ukudla okumnandi. Uthe akukho ukudla angakwazi ukukupheka ngoba ukhule ekhaya lapho bekufanele umuntu akwazi ukupheka, ukuhlanza indlu nokuzi-ayinela.Ukudla akuthandayo amadumbe, ubhatata, ispinashi, inyama yenkukhu, eyengulube nenhlanzi.Yize engalilandeli kakhulu ibhola kodwa uthanda iKaizer Chiefs, AmaZulu neRichards Bay FC. Kwawaphesheya iBarcelona idlala ibhola alithandayo. Ngokwenkonzo uyilungu lebandla laseSheshi, e-All Saints Anglican Church. Uthe abazali bakhe bebethembele kuNkulunkulu, wakhulela enkonzweni noMntwana waKwaPhindangene owayemkhuthaza ukuthi abambelele okholweni emtshela ukuthi impilo idinga umkhuleko nokukholwa ukuze umuntu anqobe.Okumjabulisayo empilweni ukusiza abantu nokubona besizakala, kanti kumphatha kabi ukungakwazi ukusiza. Mayelana nezinkulumo zokugconwa akuthola ezinkundleni zokuxhumana njengoba abanye bembiza ngoNdunankulu womgunyathi noma uNdunankulu ka-18%, uthe akayinaki into engakhi.“Uma uwumuntu awuwasusi amehlo akho ohambweni lwakho. Uqonda ngqo kulokho osophe ukukufeza. Uma uzingela usubona inyamazane, awuyeki ukuyishaya ngoba sekuvuka ingwenya esizibeni. Akusibo bonke abantu abazokushayela ihlombe ngempumelelo yakho, abanye bazokugxeka ngoba bebefisa kube yibona bodwa abaphumelelayo,” kusho uNtuli.Kodwa noma kunjalo, uMphemba uyatholakala emakhasini ezokuxhumana okubalwa i-Facebook, instagram, Tiktok nakwi Twitter.

WATHATHA isibindi ngokuminya ibhodlela likagologo waliqeda eyedwa umshayeli wetekisi obhekene necala lokudlwengula abulale intombazane eneminyaka engu-17 ayekade eyeshela.UMnuz Samkelo Victus Dube (29) usolwa ngokudlwengula abulale umufi, uSibahle Faith Biyela (17), ngokumgwaza esiphongweni ngesikudrayva,  esigamekweni okuthiwa senzeka ngo-Okthoba 5, 2020.UDube kuthiwa wayekade evakashelwe ngumufi endlini yakhe eseFolweni kade embizile ukuthi bazohlala ndawonye baphuze utshwala.INkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini ilalele ubufakazi bukaNksz Thandiwe Princess Shange ongumngani kamufi nowayekhona ngosuku lwesigameko.UNksz Shange ulandise inkantolo ngokuthi yena nomufi bahlangana noDube ehamba ngetekisi ephuma emsebenzini ntambama."Wasibuza ukuthi siyaphi samtshela ukuthi siyothenga utshwala somile. Wathi masikhululeke uzosithengela. Ngempela wasithatha saya naye endlini yakhe wase ephuma eyothenga utshwala,'' echaza.Uthe uDube babemphathise uhlobo oluthile lotshwala kodwa yena wabuya nobunye obunamaphesenti aphezulu nebhodlela likagologo okuyinto ababengazange bavumelane ngokuthi ithengwe.Uthe inkukhu yawusola umgqakazo ukuthi kukhona itulo aphezu kwalo uDube kodwa bathalalisa."Sesisendlini uDube waminya ibhodlela likagologo waliqeda ngokuphazima kweso. Kuyacaca ukuthi wayethatha ngalo isibindi. Ngemuva kwalokho njalo uma umufi eyochama, wayephuma ampopole,'' echaza.Uthe kunesikhathi lapho uDube eza kuyena wagonyuluka ngokuthi useyahluleka ukuzibamba ngoba uSbahle ufake iphenti elimnyama okuwumbala awuthandayo.Ube esethi uDube wazenza umuntu ozumekile, kwathi uma sebegoduka wavuka indlobane washaya walimaza kabi umufi emnqabela ukuthi agoduke.Uthe wazama naye ukulwa noDube kodwa wamehlula ngoba yena ungumuntu wesifazane."Esengaphezulu kwami uDube wangigwaza ngesikudrayva ekhanda ngabaleka. Ngezwa ngakusasa ukuthi uDube ugcine embulele uSbahle,'' echaza.Inkantolo ilalele nobufakazi bephoyisa elafika endaweni yesigameko, uSayitsheni Mjabulelwa Mbeko.Uthe wafika kunequlu labantu endaweni yesigameko. Ngaphakathi endlini wafica isidumbu sikamufi silele sibheke phezulu, eceleni kwaso kunedamu legazi. Emqaleni kwakunezimpawu zokuthi uke waklinywa.Uthe isidumbu sasinamanxeba okugwazwa ebusweni nasemzimbeni, amabele ehlezi obala, ubhodisi ukhushuliwe wabekwa ngenhla, efakwe indwangu emhlophe emlonyeni nemilenze kamufi ivuleke kakhulu.USenior State Advocate Khatija Essack umbuzile ukuthi ngokwakhe isidumbu sasinazo yini izinkomba zokuthi umufi uqale ngokunukubezwa. Uvumile wathi kukhomba lokho ngoba nesitho sangasese sasihlezi obala.Kuvelile enkantolo ukuthi uDube wayeshayela amatekisi asuka eFolweni eza eThekwini.Ubekwe amacala amathathu elokubulala, elokushaya ngenhloso yokulimaza nelokudlwengula awaphikile wonke.Esitatimendeni asenza uDube, uthe wadakwa kakhulu waphaphama ekuseni sekunesidumbu endlini yakhe.Icala liyaqhubeka.

WAYEHLOSE ukuziphindiselela owesilisa ongummangalelwa wokuqala ecaleni labathathu abasolwa ngokubulala iphoyisa bekhala ngokuthi liyabaphazamisa etulweni lokuduna iloli lenyama lakwaChester.Esigamekwani esenzeka ngonyaka owedlule ngo-Okthoba 20, kusolakala ukuthi abesilisa abathathu balandela iloli lenyama lisuka kwaChester oseMbilo, baze balimisa phakathi nendlela behlisa umshayeli bamfaka ngemuva.Kwathi uma bemiswa yiphoyisa lomdabu waseNdiya, uWarrant Officer Errol George, balidubula amahlandla amaningi esifubeni laphelela endaweni yesigameko. Kuthiwa bathatha nesibhamu salo bahamba nangemoto yalo iPolo.Abamangalelwa kuleli cala ngoMnuz Mlungisi Phakamani Mpanza (37) waseMlaza, Mzomuhle Lawrence Gamede (34) waseMbilo, noSabelo Mncube (42) waseNanda.Izolo, iNkantolo eNkulu yaseThekwini, ilalele ubufakazi obebethulwa nguVuyokuhle Jamujamu owayeyingxenye yetulo kodwa owashintsha, wagcina ekhethe ukuba ufakazi woMbuso.UJamujamu utshele inkantolo ukuthi uMpanza nguyena ungqondongqondo wetulo lokudunwa kweloli lenyama."UMpanza nguyena owasihlanganisa sonke ukuba sibambe inkunzi iloli lenyama. Wayekade esebenza khona kwaChester  oseMbilo, waxoshwa. Kithina wathi lena yindlela afuna ukuziphindiselela ngayo,'' usho kanje.Uthe kwakungekho ezinhlelweni zabo ukubulala iphoyisa elabamisa endleleni. Kodwa uthe babona ukuthi yilona kuphele eselimi endleleni yabo yempumelelo.Uveze ukuthi ngesikhathi kusaphekwa itulo babevamise ukuhlanganyela emzini kaMpanza oseMlaza, okuyilapho athe babehlanganisa khona amaqhinga.Eqhubeka ethula ubufakazi, uthe kuyamxaka ukuthi kungani pho uMpanza esehhubhuza akabhejana esethi akamazi.''Ngiyambuka nje uMpanza eqamba amanga lapha enkantolo ethi akangazi, ungazi kahle futhi mina naye besingamathe nolimi,'' usho kanje.Lo fakazi kuthe esaphekwa ngemibuzo wezwakala esekhononda ngokuthi abamangalelwa abaphelele, kukhona abanye okumele ngabe nabo bakhona."Baphi oSpha benoKhaye? Nabo kumele ngabe bakhona lapha,'' usho kanje.IJaji uHarrison limbuyisele emgqeni lathi makaphendule imibuzo kamshushisi, uSenior Prosecutor T. Mbokazi, hhayi ukuthi kube uyena ophosa imibuzo enkantolo.Ngesikhathi ethula ubufakazi uJamujamu, uMpanza ubebonakala embuka emehlweni ejulile.Laba bamangalalelwa bagcwala amathafa kodwa kwathi amaphoyisa esebophe uJamujamu wase ewalekelela ukuthola umkhondo walaba abanye.Bakhalelwa ngamasongo kaSigonyela bafaka nesicelo sebheyili kodwa inkantolo yabachitha.Icala liyaqhubeka.Isolezwe lithole ukuthi iloli nemoto yephoyisa kwatholwa lishiywe ngasePinetown. Inyama yasisekhona elolini.

WAYEBHEKENE nenkinga yemali owesifazane owayengumsebenzi woMnyango wezaseKhaya obhekene noxhaxha lwamacala okudayisela abantu bokufika omazisi nama-passport.Lokhu kuvezwe nguMnuz Ben Dlamini ongummeli kammangalelwa, uNksz Judy Zuma (47), ovele eNkantolo yamaCala athinta iMali, eThekwini, ngoLwesihlanu.Bekulindeleke ukuthi agwetshwe kodwa iJaji Davis Gather, lacela ukuthi lokhu kwenzeke ngoLwesine, kuleli sonto.Lo wesifazane ubhekene namacala angu-1 159 awavuma wonke.Kuwona kubalwa awenkohlakalo, ukukhwabanisa, ukudayiswa komazisi nama-passport nokuphula umthetho olawula ukungena nokuphuma kwabantu bakwamanye amazwe. Kuvele ukuthi iyinye i-passport wayeyidayisa ngo-R4 000. Ibalelwa ngaphezu kuka-R770 000 imali ayenza edayisa ama-passport.Ungaphandle ngebheyili ka-R6 000.Lawa macala kuvele ukuthi wawenza ngesikhathi esasebenza emahhovisi aseRichards Bay. Wakhalelwa ngamasongo kaSigonyela ngo-2021.UDlamini unxuse inkantolo ukuba imshaye ngesigwebo esincane ummangalelwa ngenxa yokuthi akazange asichithe isikhathi sayo.Uqale ngokuvezela inkantolo umnyombo athe yiwona owaholela ekutheni uNkk Zuma agcine esengene ogibeni lokudayisa ama-passport."Wayebhekene nenkinga yokungabi nayo imali ekubeni kunguyena umuntu owondla umndeni wakhe. Yingakho kwathi uma kukhona abamyengela oPhathe kwaba lula ukuthi avume,'' kusho uDlamini echazela ijaji.Uthe ucela inkantolo imcabangele uNksz Zuma kunoma yisiphi isigwebo ezosikhipha."Kumele inkantolo ikubheke ukuthi lo muntu esikhuluma ngaye lapha akasisona isigebengu esiyingozi kodwa ngumuntu nje wesifazane owazithola engena ekulingweni,'' usho kanjena.Omunye wesifazane okuvela ukuthi wayengungqondongqondo esebenzisana noNksz Zuma, uNksz Zime Shange, usevele usezikhindini ngamacala afanayo.UMshushisi uSenior Advocate Abbey Lesholo uthe kungakuhle uma inkantolo ingamnikeza isigwebo esinesisindo uNksz Zuma.Uthe ngokwenza kanjalo inkantolo iyobe idwebe isithombe esicace bha nakwabanye abacabanga ukuthi benze okufanayo.Kunabanye besilisa ababili baseCongo okungoMajari Kahwere (25), noJohn Majani (44) abalahlwa ngamacala, okukholakala ukuthi babesebenzisana noNksz Zuma.UMorshed Alam (25) noSaiful Islam Sujon (43) baseBangladesh, nabo abalahla amacala. Bese kuba omunye wesilisa wakuleli, u-Oliver Whendle Huriiparsad, naye owalahlwa amacala.

UNGQONGQOSHE weMfundo eyisiSekelo uNksz Siviwe Gwarube,  useveze ukuthi wayengaziphuphi esesikhundleni esifuze lesi empilweni yakhe.UNksz Gwarube uthe wasizwa wuhlelo lwe-DA lokucija abaholi bangomuso alujoyina esafunda enyuvesi, olwamenza wazithemba.“Ngo-2009 ngalahla ivoti lami ngavotela iqembu engingeke ngilidalule. Ngangingeyena umuntu ogxile kwipolitiki ngesikhathi ngisafunda eRhodes, ngaze ngajoyina lolu hlelo lwe-DA.” Usho kanje ekhuluma ngohlelo lwe-DA lokucija intsha ezoba abaholi bangomuso.“Ngesikhathi ngijoyina lolu hlelo ngafunda lukhulu nabaholi abahlukene okumanje basezinhlakeni zokuhola iqembu, abanye basePhalamende. Ngibe sengigxila kwipolitiki ngagcina sengiyoba uSotswebhu waleli qembu ePhalamende.”Uthe manje unguNgqongqoshe weMfundo eyisiSekelo ngaphansi kukahulumeni wokubambisana kwamaqembu ahlukene.“Ngangingaphuphi nje empilweni yami ngiwungqongqoshe. Lolu hlelo lungisize kakhulu ngoba akukho lapho ngingeke ngijutshwe khona ngifike ngihluleke ukuzibamba ziqine,” kusho uNksz Gwarube. Unxuse intsha ukuthi ilujoyine lolu hlelo ngoba kumele kubunjwe isizwe esizovikela izwe laso.Leli qembu linxuse abafuna ukufaka izicelo zokuba yingxenye yalolu hlelo ukuthi bavakashele izinkundla zalo ukuze bazifake.Kudingeka intsha eneminyaka engu-18 kuya ku-35.Bacijwa ngamakhono okuba abaholi abaqotho kanti ukuqeqesha kwenziwa ongoti abasemikhakheni ehlukene.Ukufakwa kwezicelo zokuba yingxenye yohlelo kuvalwa ngo-Agasti 26, 2024. UNksz Gwarube ungomunye wongqongqoshe abasebancane kwiKhabhinethi kaCyril Ramaphosa lapho ephethe khona umnyango obalulekile.Umsebenzi awengamele uthe uza nezinselelo eziningi njengoba ebhekele izinkumbi zabafundi.

OWESILISA waseNtshongweni, obhekene necala nokubulala indodana yakhe, kuvele ukuthi wayiklinya ngentambo yesikhindi ngoba ethi ulaya unina. Lokhu kuvezwe ngumphenyi wecala, uSergeant Vincent Zondi, obethula ubufakazi, eNkantolo yesiFunda yasePinetown.Bekuvele uMnuz Suyabonga Shezi (32) obhekene necala lokubulala indodana yakhe, uSifundo Sibisi (8), esigamekweni esenzeka ngoJanuwari 13, 2023.UShezi kuthiwa waya emqashweni owawuhlala indodana yakhe nonina wayo, wayicela ukuthi iye ezihlotsheni zakhe ngoba bayikhumbule.Kuvela ukuthi akayiyisanga ezihlotsheni kodwa wayithatha waya nayo ehlathini wayibulala.UZondi uveze ukuthi ingane yabulawa ngokuklinywa ngentambo yesikhindi eyayikade isifakile, yase imbozwa ngejakhethi emnyama okwavela ukuthi ngekayise.UShezi eseyibulele indodana yakhe, kuthiwa washayela unina ucingo emazisa ngokuthi useyibulele, wase emtshela nokuthi isidumbu uzositholaphi."Ngesikhathi siyithungatha ehlathini, uShezi wayedane eshaya ucingo eyalela unina kamufi ukuthi isidumbu uzosithola kuphi,’’ kuchaza umphenyi.Isidumbu satholwa yisihlobo sikaShezi esasikhona ngesikhathi kuthungathwa.Ngemuva kwalokho, uthi amaphoyisa aya KwaNdengezi lapho uShezi ayehlala khona."Asizange simfice kodwa waqala phansi washayela ucingo unina kamufi emtshela ukuthi angeke abuye uma kusakhona amaphoyisa egecekeni. Sangena emotweni senza sengathi siyahamba, nangempela weza uShezi. Yilapho esambamba khona,'' elandisa.Uveze ukuthi - esitatimendeni - uShezi wagonyuluka washo ukuthi uyibulele indodana ecikwa ukuthi unina useyajola.Umshushisi, uRowen Souls, uveze ukuthi banobufakazi bokuthi uShezi wagonyuluka kubantu abehlukene."Wagonyuluka ephoyiseni, kunina wengane, kugogo wakhe, kudadewabo kanina kamufi nasemndenini wakho,'' kusho umshushisi ebhekise kuShezi.Eziphendulela uShezi uthe: "Angizele lokho ongitshela khona. Ngizele ukuthi inkantolo ingitshele ukuthi iyaningikeza ibheyili noma cha.''Isinqumo sokuthi uyayithola yini ibheyili uShezi, imantshi ithe izosikhipha kuleli sonto.

OWESIFAZANE ovume icala lokusoconga umyeni wakhe uveze ukuthi uke wazama nokusoconga omunye wabaphenyi becala.UNkk Nongcebo Faith Ntombela uveze lokhu ngoLwesihlanu eNkantolo eNkulu yase-Scottburgh lapho ebegeqa khona amagula ngetulo lokusoconga umyeni wakhe owayesebenzela uMkhandlu weTheku, uCaptain Zwelakhe Ntombela.UNtombela wadutshulwa ngabantu abangaziwa wabe esephuthunyiswa esibhedlela, iSiphingo Medical Towers, okuyilapho okwafike kwamenela khona.UNkk Ntombela uwavume wonke amacala abekwe wona mayelana nokufa komyeni wakhe.Ube esevuma nokuthi uke wazama ukubulala umseshi wecala, uWarrant Officer Sibusiso Ntshangase, kodwa behluleka. Akabange esachaza ukuthi wazama kanjani ukumsoconga umseshi nokuthi kwavimbani.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi ngesikhathi kwenziwa isicelo sebheyili phambilini uNtshangase wanekela inkantolo lonke itulo likaNkk Ntombela lokubulala umyeni.Wayezama ukuvezela inkantolo izizathu zokuthi kungani kungamele ayithole ibheyili. Nguyena futhi uNtshangase owaveza okokuqala udaba lokujola kukaNkk Ntombela nenkabi, uKhulani Cele.Ngaleso sikhathi icala lalisaqhubeka eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseMlaza, uNkk Ntombela esaliphika. UNtshangase uthe akukho azimisele ukuthi angakuphawula ngokugonyuluka kukaNkk Ntombela ngokuthi wazama ukumsoconga.

UZOBANJELWA ezindlini zesiShayamthetho eMgungundlovu, umcimbi wezinsuku ezimbili wokuvulwa kwesiShayamthetho, esivulwa yiSilo uMisuZulu kaZwelithini.Lo mcimbi othatha izinsuku ezimbili, ujwayele ukubanjelwa ngaphandle kwesiShayamthetho ngenxa yokuthi indawo incane.Kuqashwa amatende ngenxa yokuthi kusuke kunezimenywa ezehlukene ezisuke zihambele le micimbi.Ngosuku lokuqala sekufana nesiko ukuthi sivulwa yiSilo, bese ngosuku olulandelayo undunankulu wesifundazwe, athule inkulumo asuke eyibhekise kubantu basesifundazweni. Nakulokhu iSilo sivula isiShayamthetho namhlanje, bese kusasa uNdunankulu, uMnuz Thami Ntuli, athule umkhombandlela wezinto uhulumeni wesifundazwe ozogxila kuzona kule minyaka emihlanu ezayo, ngaphansi kukahulumeni wokubambisana kwamaqembu ahlukene.Okhulumela isiShayamthetho, uNksz Nomusa Phungula, uthe njalo uma kuwunyaka okubanjwe ngawo ukhetho lukazwelonke nolwezifundazwe, isiShayamthetho sivulwa kabili.Uthe umcimbi wokuvulwa kwesiShayamthetho okwesibili, ubanjelwa ezindlini zaso eMgungundlovu.Usho lokhu nje, ngoFebhuwari nonyaka, iMbube yathula inkulumo yokuvulwa kwesiShayamthetho. Kodwa ngenxa yokuthi kube nokhetho ngoMeyi nonyaka, kudingeka siphinde sivulwe kabusha ngaphansi kukahulumeni wehlandla lesikhombisa.UNksz Phungula uthe ayincane kakhulu indawo yezivakashi ezisuke zihambele isiShayamthetho.“Le ndawo ikwazi ukuhlala abantu abangu-120. Kuzoba nesidlo emva kokuvulwa kwesiShayamthetho,” kusho uNksz Phungula.Kuke kwakhalwa ngokuthi kungcono umcimbi wokuvulwa kwesiShayamthetho uhlanganiswe nowokuthulwa kwenkulumo kandunankulu ukuze kongiwe imali.Kulo nyaka okukhalise kakhulu ngokuthi iMbube yathula inkulumo engazange ithathe ngisho ihora, kwabe sekuhlakazekwa sekuyodliwa.Ngakusasa kwaphinde kwaba nomcimbi wenkulumo kandunankulu, nakhona kwaphinde kwayodliwa emva kwayo.Ababekhala babethi le mali ingasetshenziselwa ukuthuthukisa umphakathi wesifundazwe.NgoLwesine kuzoba nenkulumo mpikiswano esiShayamthetho ngenkulumo kaNtuli.

UHULUMENI waKwaZulu-Natal uyaseseka isenzo soMphathiswa wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho, uMnuz Siboniso Duma, sokuyabula umbhobho kukhuluma undunankulu kaZulu, uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi.Undunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube, uthe uDuma wenza into efanele ngesikhathi ephuca uButhelezi, owayethula iSilo uMisuzulu kaZwelithini, umbhobho.Ukusho lokhu kwisithangami nabezindaba, ngoLwesithathu.UNkk Dube-Ncube uthe uDuma ubachazelile beyikhabhinethi lesifundazwe ukuthi wamphucelani uButhelezi umbhobho wokukhuluma ngesikhathi kunomcimbi wokukhumbula iSilo uDinuzulu kaCetshwayo.UNkk Dube-Ncube uthe incazelo kaDuma ibanelisile.“Siyameseka uDuma kulokhu akwenza. Ukube akawuthathanga umbhobho kwakuzothukwa abantu emcimbini kahulumeni.”UNkk Dube-Ncube uthe uDuma ubatshele ukuthi uzokuya koshweleza eSilweni.“Akezukuxolisela ukuphuca uButhelezi umbhobho, kodwa uzoxolisela ukuthi isigameko senzeka phambi kweSilo.”UNkk Dube-Ncube ugxeke labo abathi uDuma kufanele ahlawuliswe.Abadidiyeli bamabutho ibona abaphumele obala, bathi bafuna uDuma ahlawule ngokuthela ngechilo iSilo.UNkk Dube-Ncube uthe laba abasho lokhu baphuca iSilo igunya lokunquma ukuthi uDuma ufanelwe yini ukuhlawula.UNkk Dube-Ncube ugxeke uButhelezi, wamsola ngokuzama ukuphazamisa umcimbi wangoMgqibelo.Uthe uButhelezi wayevele eshilo ukuthi uzowuphazamisa umcimbi.“Wayesophe ukuthela iSilo nendlunkulu ngehlazo.”

UMENGAMELI wezimantshi KwaZulu-Natal, omisiwe emsebenzini, usolwa ngokuthumela uzakwabo owayeyimantshi isithombe somphambili wakhe, inkinga engalawuleki yokugembula eCasino, ukugwazisa ngemali nangesinene kwababegaqele izikhundla zokuba izimantshi.UMnuz Sibusiso Eric Nzimande usolwa nangokushaya ucingo  izikhawu ezingu-16 eshayela owayengumsolwa ecaleni elithinta ukuqashwa kwebhilidi okwakusolakala ukuthi kudayiswa kulona izingane.Lobu obunye bobufakazi obethulwe iphoyisa elingumphenyi uColonel Jason McGray eThekwini.UMcGray uveze nokuthi yayiza ngohologo iyindimbane imali eyayithunyelwa kuxhaxha lwama-akhawunti kaNzimande.Le mali uthe kwathi uma ephenya, enye kwavela ukuthi iqhamuka ebantwini iningi labo elafika lisanda kuqokwa ezikhundleni zokuba izimantshi okwesikhashana.UMcGray ubekade egeqa amagula esigcawini esiqondisa ubugwegwe uNzimande obhekene namacala angu-162.Leli phoyisa belikade leluswa ngemibuzo ugalagala lommeli omele iKhomishini yeziMantshi, eshushisa uNzimande, u-Advocate Sipokazi Poswa-LerotholiUMcGray uthe wayazi ukuthi uphenya mayelana nezinsolo zenkohlakalo ethinta izimantshi nabameli ngakho kwakungamele axhamazele enze amaphutha ophenyweni lwakhe.“Ummangali uNkk Gumede (Lindelwa, owayeyimantshi ebambile) encwadini ayenza efungelwe wathi kukhona lapho athunyelelwa khona umqhafazo uNzimande. Umqhafazo kwakuyisithombe esasiveza isitho sikaNzimande sangasese. Akanginikanga leso sithombe kunalokho wathi ucingo lwakhe lwafa, kwalahleka izinto eziningi ezazikulona,” kusho uMcGray.UNkk Gumede waqokelwa esikhundleni sokuba imantshi okwesikhashana ngo-2011.UMcGray uthe encwadini efungelwe kaNkk Gumede, wayephoqwa uNzimande ukuthi amkhokhele emsabisa ngokuthi uma engakhokhi noma engalali naye uzomxoshisa emsebenzini awutholelwa uyena.UMcGray uthe uNkk Gumede wagcina esekhokhele uNzimande uR140 000 eminyakeni emibili.“Lo mmangali waveza nezinsolo zokuthi uNzimande wamtshela ukuthi baningi asebenza nabo ayesezimbandakanye nabo ngokocansi. UNkk Gumede waveza nokuthi uNzimande unenkinga yemali ngenxa yokugembula kwakhe,”Umphenyi uthe imali yayithunyelwa kuNzimande ifakwa kuma-akhawunti akhe amaningi asemabhange ehlukene.Uthe wenza jphenyo olunzulu olubandakanya izingcingo eziqoshiwe, izitatimende zasemabhange nemininingwane  yamaCasino akhona kuleli efuna ukuthola kabanzi ngoNzimande.Ikhomishini isola uNzimande ngokugembula ngesikhathi somsebenzi.Isigcawu siyaqhubeka namuhla.

INKANTOLO izwe ubufakazi obuthi kwasetshenziswa igama likaMphathiswa uSiboniso Duma ngesikhathi isiboshwa uKhulani Cele seshela size siqonywa uNkk Faith Nongcebo Ntombela. Lo wesifazane ubegonyuluka ngetulo alihlela nezinkabi lokusoconga umyeni wakhe owayeyiphoyisa loMkhandlu weTheku, uCaptain Zwelakhe Ntombela.UNkk Ntombela uveze lokhu eNkantolo eNkulu yaseScottburgh ngesikhathi evuma icala lokusoconga umyeni wakhe. Uthe ekuqaleni wayecabanga ukuthi uDuma owayemeshela ku-Facebook, emthembisa ukumzama ngamathenda eMnyangweni wezeMfundo.Umufi wahlaselwa esemzini wakhe okwa-S, eMlaza ngoMeyi 3, ngonyaka odlule, wadutshulwa wabulawa.Wadutshulwa ngabantu abangaziwa wabe esephuthunyiswa esibhedlela eSiphingo Medical Towers okuyilapho okwafike kwamenela khona.UNkk Ntombela uwavume wonke amacala abekwe wona mayelana nalesi sigameko. Uvume elokubulala, elokuhlela ukubulala, elokweba isibhamu sikamufi sohlobo lwe-CZ Model 70 semi-automatic Pistol, nelokunikizela ngolwazi olungamanga ephoyiseni elalithatha isitatimende.Enkantolo, ubekade ekhininda amaqiniso ngomlomo wommeli wakhe, uMnuz Ashwin Rughbeer.Uveze ukuthi konke kwaqala ngoMashi 22, 2023 ngesikhathi ekhasini lakhe lika-Facebook eyengwa uKhulani Cele owayeziveza ngokuthi unguMphathiswa uDuma. Uthe bagcina sebejola nalo wesilisa - khona kuFacebook.Uveze ukuthi njengoba yena enenkampani yokudla, i-CNgwatwa (Pty) Ltd, lo wesilisa wamthembisa ukuthi uzomlekelela ekutheni inkampani yakhe yokudla ithole ithenda lokusabalalisa ukudla ezikoleni zabaphila nokukhubazeka.Uthi base bekujwayele ukuxhumana nalo “mngani ku-Facebook” kwaze kwafika isikhathi lapho emcela khona ukuba amhambisele igilosa kubo KwaMaphumulo.Uthi ulukhumbula kahle lolo suku lwangomhla ka-20 Ephreli 2023."Yilapho engafike ngathola khona ukuthi lo muntu (uKhulani Cele) engikhuluma naye uyinkabi ebhadle ejele akusiyena uDuma,'' usho kanje.Uthi kodwa noma esezwile baqhubeka nokujola nale nkabi."Kwathi uma ngimtshela ukuthi ngingowesifazane oshadile, wangiphendula ngokuthi angikhululeke, lokho uzokulungisa. Ngaleso sikhathi ngangingaqondi ukuthi uhloseni,'' echaza esitatimendeni esihleliwe.Udalule ukuthi inkabi yaqhamuka nombono wokuthi umyeni wakhe abulawe kusetshenziswe ushevu kodwa lelo qhinga lagcina lingaphumelelanga. Akazange aveze esitatimendeni ukuthi kanjani.Ngemuva kwalokho uthe inkabi yamhlanganisa nowesilisa waKwaMaphumulo, uMnuz Sithembiso Khumalo, owathola ukuthi unguthishanhloko ngokomsebenzi."UKhumalo wafika kimina ehamba noMzo Ntombela okuyinkabi eyagcina idubule yabulala umyeni wami,'' echaza.Uthi uthishanhloko kusukela lapho naye ubebakhona kukhona konke obekwenzeka obekumayelana netulo lokusocongwa kukamufi.Uthi inkabi yaqhamuka isimazisa ukuthi sekuphothuliwe konke mayelana netulo lokusoconga umyeni wakhe."Yangitshela ukuthi mina ngizothatha isibhamu somyeni wami lapho esasihlala khona siyiswe kumuntu owayezodubula. Lokhu ngempela ngakwenza ngo-Ephreli 21, 2023,'' usho kanje.Uthe inkabi yamnikeza nomyalelo wokuthi anikezele ngemoto okuyiyona ezosetshenziswa ngosuku lokubulawa kukaNtombela.Uveze ukuthi nangempela lokho wakwenza. "Ngiyavuma ukuthi ngasithatha isibhamu somyeni wami futhi yisona esasetshenziswa ukumbulala,'' usho kanje.Uvumile ukuthi uyena owathuma umufi ukuthi ayomthengela okuthile esitolo emyengela ophathe ukuze ezodutshulwa."Ingane yami yaze yafuna ukumphelezela ngayenqabela ngathi mayihlale phansi ingelule izinyawo,'' usho kanje.Inkabi okuyiyona eyadubula, uMzo, seyagwetshwa ngaleli cala njengoba yagonyuluka ngakho konke yase inikwa iminyaka engu-20 ibhadla ejele.IJaji uMahendra Chetty lithe icala lizobuyela enkantolo efanayo ngoSepthemba lapho okuzobe sekuzobhungwa ngesigwebo okufanele sitholwe ummangalelwa.Kulokhu uNkk Ntombela ubebonakala ebhocobele, kungekho ukumamatheka abejwayele ukubonakala ngakho ngesikhathi icala liseseNkantolo yeMantshi eMlaza.UMnuz Nkosinathi Ntombela, ongumfowabo kamufi, uthe bajabule ukuthi umakoti wabo eseze wathambisa inhliziyo walivuma icala."Yize phela engeke esabuya umfowethu ekufeni, kodwa kuhle ukuthi umenzi wokubi useze wavuma,'' usho kanje.

UKUSABALALA kwenkulumo uNdunankulu kaZulu, uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi, ayezoyethula ephakamisa iSilo emcimbini wokukhunjulwa kweNgonyama uDinuzulu, kuveze obala ukuthi kungani owayephethe uhlelo uMnuz Siboniso Duma agxumisa okwenhlamvu wayabula umbhobho uButhelezi engakafiki engqikithini yephuzu lakhe.Enkulumweni eyayibhalwe phansi kaButhelezi kuvela ukuthi umsuka wendaba usekuphawuleni kukaNobhala we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Bheki Mtolo, eqoqweni likaWhatsapp elibizwa ngokuthi Indonsa Yesizwe Think Tank. USolwazi Musa Xulu, ongumhlaziyi wezamasiko nokunguye owengamele leli gunundu, ukuqinisekisile ukuthi uMtolo wabiza iSilo uMisuzulu kaZwelithini ngeSilo sase-Ballito embhalweni awufaka kuleli qoqo.Esikhathini esiphambilini, ngesikhathi kuqala umsindo wombango weSihlalo eNdlunkulu, kuke kwaba khona ukungcofa obekubhekiswe kwiNdlulamithi abangayemukeli njengeNgonyama beyibizwa ngeSilo saseBallito, esikhundleni sokuthi esikaZulu.Nokho uXulu, onguMfundisi waseLuthela, uthe uMtolo wabuye wachaza ukuthi kungani ebiza Indlulamithi ngeSilo saseBallito."Wabuye wachaza ukuthi iBallito iKwaDukuza, lapho Ilembe lalibusa khona. Yiqiniso lelo," kusho uXulu.Inkulumo ebhalwe phansi iveza ukuthi uMfu Buthelezi wayehlose ukukhalaza ngalesi senzo sikaMtolo, kodwa kangafika ndawo ephucwa umbhobho wokukhuluma uDuma, onguSihlalo qwe-ANC KwaZulu-Natal."Kufanele senzenjani thina bantu beSilo uma uMtolo ethuka iSilo eqoqweni leNdonsa? Kuleli qoqo uMtolo waphinde wahlasela uNdunankulu kaZulu, wathi 'inabo osikhotheni i-IFP, usikhotheni we-IFP uThulasizwe Buthelezi’. Amabutho kufanele enze njani uma kuthukwa umkhuzi wawo?" kusho inkulumo kaButhelezi eputshukile.UXulu uthe kujwayelekile ukuthi kube nemibono ehlukene kwiNdonsa athe igcwele izifundiswa, ababhishobhi, amakhosi, amalungu ePhalamende neziShayamthetho, abaholi bamaqembu ezombusazwe, abaNtwana basendlunkulu nabadidiyeli bamabutho.Uqhubeke ngokuthi uButhelezi naye wabhala kuyo iNdonsa ukuthi uzophendula inkulumo kaMtolo phambi kukaRamaphosa.“UDuma naye ukhona kwiNdonsa. Ngicabanga ukuthi wayazi ukuthi uButhelezi uyaphi njengoba ayeseqalile efunda amagama abantu athi bayizitha zeSilo,” kusho uXulu.Ebuzwa ukuthi ikhona yini indlela anayo ukulawula okubhalwa kule nkundla okungaba yizinto ezisusa udweshu, uXulu uthe yonke into ebhalwa eqoqweni iyingxenye yentando yeningi.Kubuzwa okhulumela i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mafika Mndebele, ngokubizwa kweMbube ngeSilo saseBallito, ume kwelokuthi uButhelezi wayehlose ukuxova umcimbi wangoMgqibelo.Imizamo yokuthola ukuphawula kukaMtolo ayizange iphumelele njengoba ucingo lwakhe belukhala lungabanjwa futhi akazange awuphendule umyalezo awuthunyelelwe.NgoLwesithathu uMtolo usincome njengobuqhawe isenzo sikaDuma sokuyabula umbhobho, wathi wakhombisa ubunsizwa ngokuvimba enkulu inhlekelele eyayizokwenzeka.Usole uButhelezi ngokusebenzisa isikhundla sakhe ukulwa izimpi zepolitiki, wathi lo mkhuba wawenza nasesigodlweni eMachobeni ngesikhathi kunoMkhosi wamaGanu.“Akwenzile eMachobeni uShenge, ubefuna ukukuphinda KwaCeza kanti akabhulanga, ikhona insizwa yakwaDuma, uMthombeni, uLwandle kaluwelwa luwelwa zinkonjane kuphela, insizwa engesabi nakusatshiswa. Wathi ngeke phambi kwami, yimi oshayela lolu hlelo, inhlekelele engenzeka lapha iyobuzwa kimi, wayivimba.”Kanjalo noNdunankulu waKwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nomusa Dube-Ncube uthe uDuma wenza kahle ngokuphuca uButhelezi umbhobho.Uthe uDuma ubachazelile beyikhabhinethi lesifundazwe ukuthi wamphucelani uButhelezi umbhobho, wathi incazelo kaDuma ibanelisile.“Siyameseka uDuma kulokhu akwenza. Ukube akawuthathanga umbhobho kwakuzothukwa abantu emcimbini kahulumeni. UDuma usitshele ukuthi uzokuya koshweleza eSilweni,” kusho uNdunankulu Dube-Ncube.Amakhosi athe afuna ukuba nomhlangano nekhabhinethi yaKwaZulu-Natal kanti ake ahlangana esiShayamthetho esidala ngoLwesithathu.USihlalo wendlu yobuholi bomdabu KwaZulu-Natal, Inkosi Sifiso Shinga, uthe bafuna ukuthi uDuma aqale kubo ngaphambi kokuyoshweleza eSilweni.UShinga uthe uDuma wadelela iSilo ngokuphuca uButhelezi umbhobho kanti kuwumkhuba owaziwayo ukuthi iSilo sisukunyiswa undunankulu waso.Omele iSilo endlini yobuholi bomdabu, uMntwana uSimphiwe Zulu, uthe iSilo nendlunkulu bakhathazekile ngalesi simo kanti banethemba lokuthi lolu daba luzoxazululwa ngokushesha.

WEHLILE umthwalo kwabanezikweletu njengoba iBhange loMbuso, i-South African Reserve Bank (Sarb), liyehlise ngo-25 basis points imali mboleko.Izolo umphathi we-Sarb, uMnuz Lesetja Kganyago, uthe amalungu athatha izinqumo ngemalimboleko avumelane ngokuthi yehle ngo-25 basis points (amaphuzu) isuka ku-8.25% ibe wu-8%. Imalimboleko yagcina ukwehla eminyakeni emithathu edlule, njengoba ibilokhu inyuka umlibe.Lokhu kusho ukuthi i-prime lending rate, okuyinzalo ekhokhiswa abantu uma beboleke imali emabhange isizoba wu-11.5%. Isuka ku-11.75%.USolwazi Bonke Dumisa oyisazi somnotho nezomthetho esizimele, uthe yizindaba ezinhle lezi ngoba vele bebelindele ukuthi izokwehla imali mboleko.“Besazi ukuthi imalimboleko izokwehla njengoba amandla emali ekhombise ukudlondlobala ngo-Agasti, aba wu-4.4%. Ebesingenaso isiqiniseko sakho wukuthi izokwehla ngo-25 basis points noma ngo-50 basis points. Kuvelile ukuthi namalungu athatha izinqumo ngemalimboleko abexoxa ngokuthi ayehliswe ngo-50 basis points kodwa agcina evumelene ngo-25 basis points,” kusho uDumisa.Uthe abakhokhela izindlu, izimoto nezinye izikweletu abangangenanga ohlelweni lokuthi zinganyuki uma kunyuka imalimboleko, bazojabula ngoba kunemali esizosala uma bekhokhela izikweletu zabo.“Le mali ngicela abantu bangayibhubhudli ezintweni ezingenasidingo. Kufanele bayibeke noma baqhubeke nokukhokha imali ethe xaxa ezikweletini zabo. Kubalulekile ukuthi songele izinsuku ezinzima ngoba ngesikhathi imalimboleko inyuka ngo-2021, baningi abantu abazithola sebeklinywa yizikweletu.”UNkk Annaline van der Poel wenkampani esiza abacwile ezikweletini, i-Debt Rescue, uthe akwanele ukwehliswa kwemalimboleko ngo-25 basis points ngoba abantu bavele bathwele kanzima ngenxa yokubiza kwempilo.Ubalule ukuthi ayikho into engabizi kusukela kugesi, ukudla, uphethroli nezinye izidingo zabantu nokuyikho okubenza bangene ezikweletini.Uthe uyathemba ukuthi ngoNovemba, iBhange loMbuso lizoyehlisa ngesikalo esibonakalayo imalimboleko.UKganyago uthe abantu bazobona ngoNovemba ukuthi imalimboleko yehla kangakanani kodwa wazwakalisa ukukhathazeka ngezimpi eziqhubeka emhlabeni okubalwa i-Israel nePalestine, eyeseRussia ne-Ukraine, athe ziba nomthelela ekuntengiseni amandla emali.

YENZA umahluko imishanguzo emisha eyelapha isifo sofuba esingazweli emakhambini, iDrug-resistant-TB.Imishanguzo eyinhlanganisela yamakhambi iBedaqualline, iPretomanid, iLinezolid eyaziwa ngeBPaL, yelapha iziguli ezinaleli gciwane izinyanga eziyisithupha esikhundleni sezinyanga ezingu-18.  Iqale ukusetshenziswa kuleli ngoSepthemba nyakenye, ongoti bathi alukho uhlelo olwake lwasebenza njengayo.USolwazi Norbert Ndjeka, umqondisi wezihlelo zokwelapha iTB  kuleli, usho lokhu izolo, engqungqutheleni yesifo sofuba yakuleli, i8th SA TB Conference, eThekwini.Uthe njengamanje zingu-2000 iziguli ezidla imishanguzo, kuzo kusashone ezimbili kuphela."Asinazo iziguli ezingasabuyeli ezikhungweni zezempilo ngoba uhlelo lwenziwe ngendlela yokuthi iziguli nabasebenzi bezempil,  basebenzisane. Uma isiguli sinenkinga sazisa umsebenzi wezempilo inkinga isheshe isonjululwe. Ngemuva kwezinyanga eziyisithupha odla imishanguzo usuke eselapheke ngokuphelele. Imali yokukwelapha isiguli yehlile uma siqhathanisa nohlelo lwezinyanga ezingu-18 zaphambilini ngoba kule mishanguzo kukhishwe izinhlobo ezine zamaphilisi ebezisetshenziswa,  kwehla nesikhathi sokwelashwa," kuchaza uNdjeka.Ukusetshenziswa kwamakhambi kuyingxenye yokuhambisana nemigomo yakamuva ebekwe yinhlangano yezeMpilo eMhlabeni, iWorld Health Organisation (WHO).UDkt Karen Dupreez weNyuvesi iStellenbosch, uthe kungekudala bazokhipha imigomo emisha yokwelapha isifo sofuba ezinganeni, ebafaneni nasemantombazaneni asengena ebuntombini nabesifazane abakhulelwe, iNational Child, Adolescence, Martenal TB Working guidelines.Uthe imigomo emisha bayisungule ukuze balwe nokufa kwezingane kanye nabantu abasha bebulawa yilesi sifo."Zingu-27 000 izingane ezibulawa yiTB kuleli ngonyaka ngokombiko iGlobal TB Report ka-2022, ekhishwe nyakenye, okuyisibalo esikhulu kakhulu," kuchaza uDkt Du Preez.Uthe kunzima ukuhlonza iTB ezinganeni. Okunye okwenza ukuthi isibalo silokhu siphezulu ukuthi kuthathe isikhathi eside ukuthi iNingizimu Afrika, iqale ukulandela imigomo yeWHO. Wengeze ngokuthi ukwelashwa kweTB kuqalwa noma bungekho ubufakazi obubambekayo uma nje kusoleka ukuthi inayo. Wathi imigomo yakhishwa ngo-2015, kepha iNingizimu Afrika iqale nyakenye ukusebenzisa uhlelo.UDkt Enesto Jarmillo we-WHO, uthe uhlelo lokwelapha iTB kumele luhambisane nokuhlolwa kwesifo sikashukela, izifo ezidalwa wukubhema, iHIV nezinye izifo ezihamba phambili ngokubulala abantu, ukuze isiguli singathi sesiphothule ukwelashelwa esinye isifo.

USIHLALO we-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Siboniso Duma, uthi kade kwasa abantu beyingcwaba iphila i-ANC, bethi izokwehlulwa okhethweni kodwa ibuye. Amaqembu amaningi asongela i-ANC KwaZulu-Natal, awayiniki lutho okhethweni.Izwe kumanje lilungiselela ukhetho lukazwelonke oluzoba ngoMeyi 29 nonyaka, kanti izingqapheli nabahlaziyi bathi i-ANC ingase ilahlekelwe amavoti iphume emandleni.UDuma onguMphathiswa wezokuThuthukiswa koMnotho nezokuVakasha esifundazweni, ube nengxoxo ekhethekile neSolezwe, echaza ngomkhankaso wokubuyisela i-ANC emandleni.UDuma okhethelwe kwesikaSihlalo kaKhongolose ngoJulayi 2022, ubehleli enethezekile kusofa ekhuluma ngokukhulu ukuzethemba echaza ngokuvuleleka. Uthe akusabethusi ukuthi abantu bathi i-ANC izokwehlulwa.“Akukho soka ladla kahle imbangi ikhala vele, uma uphethe uzolandelwa. I-DA kumanje ikhanda imibiko yocwaningo engekho emthethweni. Nangesikhathi uMengameli uMbeki (Thabo) ezonqoba egwaza ibhece, kwakuthiwa i-ANC izophuma emandleni. Asikhathazekile neze, kunalokho sibona i-ANC ikhula kakhulu,’’ kusho uDuma.I-ANC ngo-2019, yanqoba isifundazwe ngo-55.47% isuka ku-65.0%, yalandelwa yi-IFP eyakhombisa ukukhula yathola u-16.34 yaphikisa ngokusemthethweni. I-DA eyathola u-13.91% ngo-2019, yehla endaweni yesibili yokuba yiqembu eliphikisayo, yalala isithathu. Uthe izimbangi zabo zithembisa abantu izulu nomhlaba zithi zizobakhela izindlu kodwa zingakaze zakhe ngisho umjondolo. Uthe uyakuqonda ukuthi isifundazwe iKZN siyinyama ngezizathu ezehlukene.Uthe esokuqala; wukuthi inabantu abaningi futhi bangu-4.6 million ababhalisele ukuvota okhethweni oluzayo. Uthe futhi iKZN iyisifundazwe esicebile ngokomnotho yingakho kunesasasa kakhulu, iconselwa amathe.Uthe okubanika ithemba kakhulu wukuthi uMengameli uCyril Ramaphosa uke wakhankasa esifundazweni wemukelwa kahle, abantu bejabula. Uthe bakhona nabanye abaholi abasazofika bahlale cishe izinsuku eziyisikhombisa besebenza isifundazwe.Uthe bagabe ngomqulu wezethembiso zokhetho owethulwe yi-ANC, wathi yiwona okhombisa ukuthi basazimisele ngokusebenzela abantu bakuleli.I-ANC ibeke amaphuzu ayisithupha aphambili okuwudaba lwamathuba emisebenzi, inkinga yokwenyuka kwezindleko zokuphila, wukugxila kakhulu kubantu nezidingo zabo, wukuvikela intando yeningi nokugxilisa inkululeko bese kuba wukwakha i-Afrika nomhlaba ongcono.UDuma uthe nakuba bengene ihlandla likahulumeni wesifundazwe seliphakathi kodwa bakwazile ukuhlela kabusha uhulumeni basebenza kahle. Ukhale ngezinselelo ezifana nezikhukhula ezishaye kwezwela kodwa wathi bahlabela phambili.“Kuningi esikwenzile phezu kokuthi  kube khona izikhukhula, kwagadla iCovid-19 nezibhelu zangoJulayi 2021. Uma ubheka izethembiso zethu zokhetho, phezulu eqhulwini, amathuba omsebenzi. Uhulumeni siwuthumile yingakho ubona izinhlelo ezifana noSthesha Waya Waya,’’ kusho uDuma.Uthe bakhele phezu kwesisekelo esihle esiqalwe wondunankulu baphambilini abenze umsebenzi omuhle esifundazweni. UDuma uthe kufanele abantu bakuqonde ukuthi ezinye izinselelo zidalwa wukungahambi kahle kwesimo somnotho emhlabeni wonke.Uthe i-ANC ithathwe izwe livele linezinkinga zeminyaka kodwa yazama konke okusemandleni ukusebenzela abantu bakuleli. Uthe namanje banalo ithemba lokuthi abantu bazobumbana bavikele izwe labo kuqhutshekwe nombono kaMnuz Nelson Mandela.

UMNYANGO wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal umemezele ukwelulwa kwezinkontileka zababhekele ezokuphepha nenhlanzeko ezikoleni.Ngokwesitatimande somnyango, abasebenzi abasiza ezikoleni zikahulumeni, izinkontileka zabo zokusebenza zizoqhubeka kuze kube uMashi ngonyaka ozayo.UMphathiswa walo Mnyango esifundazweni uNkk Mbali Frazer, uthe lokhu kwenzelwe ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abafundi bafundela ezindaweni ezihlanzekile neziphephile ezikoleni.“Ngenxa yokubaluleka komsebenzi abawenzayo, izinkontileka zababhekele ukuphepha ezikoleni nabahlanzayo zeluliwe kuze kube wuMashi 31 ngonyaka ozayo.“Okukhulu ngalokhu kwelulwa kwezinkontileka wukuthi abafundi bathola imfundo esezingeni, endaweni ehlanzekile nephephile,” usho kanje.Uthe lokhu kuzophinde kusize nabasebenzayo ukuthi baqhubeke nokuxosha ikati eziko.  Umnyango uphinde waveza ukuthi zonke izikole  sezizitholile izinsiza kufunda ezidingekayo, ebezisilele kuzo kunyakamali u-2023/2024.Phambilini kubekhona ungabazane mayelana nokulungela komnyango ukuqala ukufunda, njengoba bekubikwa izingqinamba ekudlulisweni kwemali yama- norms and standards ezikoleni ezinikezwe igunya lokuthi zizithengele zona izinsiza kufunda. “ Ukudluliswa kwale mali kuzoqinisekisa ukusebenza ngendlela ezikoleni zakulesi sifundazwe nokuthi abafundi bathola imfundo esezingeni elifanele.” kusho uNkk Frazer.

ZIKHALE ngezinkinga ezehlukene iziboshwa zesifazane ejele laseWestville, izolo, ngesikhathi kuhambele uMphathiswa wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nonhlanhla Khoza.UNkk Khoza ubehlele ukuyohlanganyela neziboshwa zesifazane ezalahlwa amacala okubulala abesilisa ezazithandana nabo.UPhumelele Zulu weseMelmoth, ukhale ngeminye yemithetho elawula ukuphathwa kweziboshwa kubalwa nezesifazane.“Aseneme ngezigwebo. Sithi siqala ukona singomama, sinikwe odilikajele.”Uqhube wathi babuye babe nenkinga uma befaka izicelo zoshwele sebedlulelwe amalungu emindeni abalulekile.“Uba nenkinga yokusayinelwa uma sekumele uphume, uphinde uhlale la, ungayi ndawo ngoba akekho umuntu ozokusayinela,” kusho uNkk Nompumelelo.Wenze umzekelo wokuthi zilukhuni izimo ezabehlela, zaholela ekutheni baboshwe.Echaza ngesakhe kafishane uthe: “Ufike ushaywe yindoda, ilethe intombi, uphume ekameleni lakho, kungene yona. Uphunyuke kubantu abebethunywe yindoda ukuthi bazobulala wena, uxoxe nabo, ubanike imali ethe xaxa, ashone (umyeni).“Ngazitshela ukuthi nami nginemali engcono kunale abanike yona. Wayefuna ukuganwa omunye umfazi, badle imali yami, kuhlupheke izingane zami.”Uthe bayazidinga izigccawu lapho kuzoxoxwa khona nabo, babuzwe izizathu ezaholela ekutheni babulale izinqandamathe.“Umsuka wakho ilezi zizathu ezisilethe la ngoba njengoba ngila, nami ngangiziphumuza. Kwakufuneka kufe bani?” kusho uNkk Nompumelelo, othe bacela uLamola (uNgqongqoshe wezobuLungiswa, ake alubuyezele olwabesifazane).Esinye isiboshwa, uDuduzile Mthethwa waseVryheid, sithe sasifundisa kwesinye sezikole endaweni. UDuduzile ukhale ngokuthi noma ngabe baziphethe kahle kangakanani ngaphakathi kodwa bahlale bechazwa njengabantu abayingozi.“Ngafika ngo-2013, ngafundisa ngisho no-matric imbala.
