Nami bengiqhubeka nokuqhubeza izifundo zami kodwa kuthe ngo-2019, sekufanele ngiyogqoka ijazi lami le-Honours, kwathiwa ngiyingozi, angikwazi ukuya,” kusho uNkk Mthethwa.Ubuze umbuzo wokuthi ngesikhathi efundisa ezinye iziboshwa usuke engesiyo ingozi?“Lokhu esakwenzayo kwakungafanele, kodwa uma usungaphakathi, isibuyile nengqondo, uthi uyazakha kabusha kodwa ugcine ufana nomuntu ongakaze enze lutho,” kusho uNkk Mthethwa.UNomshado Mdluli waseNorth West ukhale ngokungabibikho kwezingcingo ezenele ezisebenzayo ngaphakathi ejele.“Ukusuka eNorth West uza la, kuthatha amahora angu-12. Kunzima ukuthi umndeni wami ungazongibona lana. Ukuba nocingo olulodwa kuphela olusebenzayo kuyasikhathaza ngoba sethembele ezingcingweni ukuthi sixhumane nemindeni yethu nezingane zethu,” kusho uMdluli.Umphathi wamajele KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Mnikelwa Nxele, uthe ezinye zezinto eziphakanyiswe yiziboshwa njengenkinga yocingo bazozisukumela bona.UMphathiswa wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Khoza, uthe ngokuhambela kwabo isikhungo, bazonika ithemba lokuthi ngale kobumnyama kukhona ukukhanya.“Sike sifice umntwana ona-14 esibhedlela (ezobeletha), uma umbuza ukuthi okabani umntwana, kuvele kwehle izinyembezi. Uthole udaba lokuthi umntwana okababa omzalayo, okamalume, okamakhelwane, abantu abaseduze. Uma ufika kuleso simo esinjalo uwumama, kufanele wenzenjani? Uhleke? Ngeke. Yingakho sithi siyaziqonda izimo ezinibeke lana,” kusho uNkk Khoza.Wathembise ukuthi izikhalazo eziphakanyisiwe bazozisukumela.

UMASIPALA weTheku usuqale uhlelo lokufaka ugesi wekhadi ezikoleni ezicwile ezikweletini zikagesi namanzi ezingaphansi kwawo. Lolu hlelo uthe ngalo kuhloswe ukusiza izikole ukuze zikwazi ukukhokhela izikweletu zazo ezinkulu,  zibe zinawo ugesi. Imeya yeTheku uMnuz Cyril Xaba , ithe lolu hlelo luqondene nezikole ezinezikweletu ezinkulu zikagesi kodwa nezingenazo izikweletu zingakwazi ukufaka izicelo.Uthe ezikoleni ezingu-1000 eziphakelwa umasipala ngogesi ezingu-66 sezifake izicelo zokuthi zifakelwe ugesi wekhadi.“Njengobuholi bedolobha sizibophezele ekwenzeni ngcono ukuqoqwa kwemali engenayo ukuze silethe izinsiza ezisezingeni. Ngakho kumele silekelele amakhasimende anezingqinamba kodwa azimisele ngokukhokhela izinsiza,” kusho uXaba.Uqhube wathi ukuze umasipala uthuthukise ukuqoqwa kwezikweletu zikagesi namanzi, wethule uhlelo lwamamitha aziwa ngama-smart metres."Njengamanje  angaphezu kuka-120 000 asefakiwe.  Ngokuhambisana nesu lokushintsha ugesi, kuzosatshalaliswa amanye amamitha ama-smart meters angu- 150 000 kule minyaka emihlanu ezayo," kuchaza uXaba.

ZIKHISHWE ngendlakadla ezindlini zazo izitshudeni zaseThekwini TVET College, ophikweni uMbilo College ngoba kuthiwa asizikhokhelile isikhwama esixhasa izitshudeni, iNational Student Financial Aid Scheme (NSFAS).Izitshudeni okuthiwa zibalelwa ku-120, zithi zilale emgwaqweni zaqhuqhwa amakhaza zanethwa yimvula.Ngesikhathi zikhuluma neSolezwe zibalise ngobunzima ezizithole zibhekene nabo. Izitshudeni ezikhulume neSolezwe ziveze ukuthi zithole umyalezo kumaselula azo obuzazisa ngokuthi maziphume ezindlini ngoba iNSFAS ayizikhokhelile.Isolezwe liwubonile umyalezo othunyelelwe izitshudeni uzazisa ngokuthi aziphume eflethini ngoba azikhokheliwe.UNomasonto Khawula (23) ofunda kuleli kolishi, uthe bayitholile imiyalezo kodwa bangaphuma.Uthe kodwa ngoLwesibili bagcine sebekhishwa ngendluzula ngabantu abangaziwa."Ibuhlungu kakhulu le nto esehlele. Silale emgwaqweni saqhuqhwa ngamakhaza. Okubuhlungu kakhulu ukuthi sigcine sesinethwa nayimvula,'' usho kanje.Lezi zitshudeni ziveze ukuthi bese zihlale inyanga kuleli flethi. USlindile Ngcamu (22) naye ofunda kulesi sikhungo ubalise ngobuhlungu abadlule kubona.Uthe abasazi manje ukuthi bazothathani bahlanganise nani ukuze kulungiswe indaba yokuthi iNSFAS ikhokhele izindlu abahlala kuzona."Uyabona isiqala ukuba yinkinga enkulu ngempela le nto. Nangonyaka odlule sazithola sibhekana nale nkinga,'' usho kanje.Abanye Isolezwe elikhulume nabo, omunye ohlala eMgababa omunye ohlala ePort Shepstone bathe sebevele babuyela emakhaya bazolinda kuze kulungiswe lesi simo. Umnikazi waflethi uzanywe kaningi ngocingo wathunyelelwa nomyalezo, engaphenduli, ucingo lwakhe lwagcina lungasangeni. Okhulumela inhlangano iSouth African Technical Vocational Education and Training Students Association, uBongani Mgwali, uthe bayazi ngenkinga yalesi sikhungo.Uthe emasontweni amathathu edlule bayile beyoxisana nezitshudeni nabaphathi besikhungo ngoba bese bezwile ukuthi kukhona inkinga yokuthi kungenzeka zikhishwe eflethini.Uthe bawabonile ama-video akhombisa izitshudeni zilele emnyango. “Sithole ukuthi iNSFAS engayifakile imali esikhungweni sizophinda sizame ukuthi sithole isixazululo kule nkinga,’’ usho kanje.Kwenzeka lokhu nje esithangamini nabezindaba ebesisePitoli ngoMsombuluko obambe njengosihlalo ebhodini lalesi sikhwama, uSolwazi Lourens Van Staden uqinisekise ukuthi bona abukho ubudlelwano abanabo nabezindawo zokuhlala izitshudeni.Uveze nokuthi izinsolo zenkohlakalo nokugwazisa phakathi kwabanikazi bezindawo zokuhlala nabanikezwe umsebenzi wokugunyaza izindawo ezisezingeni lokuhlala izitshudeni sezifinyelele kubona.Ugcizelele ukuthi esikhathini esizayo bahlela ukuthi kungabibikho isitshudeni esihlomulayo esikhwameni seNSFAS esizohlala endaweni engagunyaziwe yisona.Ngeledlule, amalungu ekomiti loMnyango weMfundo ePhakeme anxuse uMnyango weMfundo ePhakeme ukuthi uphenye njengoba kunomdonsiswano phakathi kwezikhungo, iNSFAS nezitshudeni osekwenze kwaqubuka neziteleka ezidalwa nawukuthi  lesi sikhwama asikayikhokhi  nemihlomulo yezitshudeni. Isolezwe lizame kaningi ukuxhumana nabesikhungo kodwa kwaba nhlanga zimuka nomoya. Ucingo belukhala lungabanjwa kwaze kwashaya isikhathi sokushicilela.

EHLILE amaphaphu kwabasebenzela inkampani yensimbi i-ArcelorMittal South Africa, emuva kokuzwa ukuthi ngeke isawavala amagatsha  okubalwa eliseNewcastle, KwaZulu-Natal, noluseVereeniging, eGauteng.Kuzokhumbuleka ukuthi ngonyaka odlule i-ArcelorMittal yayithe izovala uphiko olukhiqiza insimbi esetshenziswa ezimayini, ekwakhiweni kwamabhuloho, emizileni yezitimela nakwenye intuthuko edinga insimbi eqinile.Lolu hlelo beluzoholela ekutheni kudilizwe abasebenzi abangu-3 500INational Union of Metalworkers of South Africa (Numsa), ithe ehlile amaphaphu kubasebenzi abakade bezophelelwa wumsebenzi ukube uhlelo lokudiliza beluqhubeka.Ithe kudingeka uhulumeni athathe indawo yakhe alungise izikhalo zenkampani ukuze izohlala ivuliwe ngoba akufanele kube nemisebenzi ephelayo.Isikhulu esiphezulu sase-ArcelorMittal South Africa, uMnuz Kobus Verster, sithe okwenze ukuthi bangavali wukuthi bazimisele ngokunikeza ithuba izinhlelo zabo zokushintsha isimo ebhizinisi lensimbi.“Sizoqhubeka sisebenzisane namakhasimende ethu nezinye izinhlaka ezithintekayo ukuze sazi ukuthi ifemu yethu yensimbi isebenza kahle e-Afrika eseNingizimu,” kusho uVerster.Phambilini wathi akusikona ukuthi bafuna ukuphathwa ngendlela ehlukile kunaleyo okuphethwe ngayo ezinye izinkampani kodwa bafuna uhulumeni alungise izikhalo zemboni yensimbi ngoba bekungena insimbi yaphesheya eshibhile.Wathi izinkinga zikagesi, ukuphazamiseka kwamaguzu nokuma kwezinhlelo zokuthuthukiswa kwengqalasizinda zibashayile.UVerster uthe njengamanje kulokoza inhlansi yethemba ukuthi zizojika izinto emnothweni waseNingizimu Afrika, bese kudingeka insimbi eyakhiwe kuleli ezinhlelweni zengqalasizinda.

UZOVELA phambi kweMantshi yaseWelkom owesifazane obone ithuba lokwenza imali ngosizi lomuntu obefuna umsebenzi.Kuthiwa uphiko loKlebe lubophe owesifazane oneminyaka engu-45 ngoLwesine mhla ka 8 Mashi esemsebenzini kuMasipala iMatjhabeng eFree State. Kuthiwa ngoFebhruwari nonyaka, uMasipala waseMatjhabeng ukhiphe imisebenzi yabazoqeqeshelwa ukuba ngamaphoyisa omgwaqo.“Intombazane eneminyaka engu-20 yayithokozile ithola ucingo oluqinisekisa ukuthi sitholakele isicelo sayo somsebenzi.Umgilwa uthe owayemshayele ucingo wamthembisa umsebenzi uma engakhokha u-R10 000.Lolu daba  lwabikelwa uphiko oluphenya amacala abucayi enkohlakalo okuyilona olwabopha umsolwa ngesikhathi eseyolanda imali yokugwazisa ngoLwesine ngo-8 ekuseni.“Ubecabanga ukuthi sekuyisikhathi sokulanda itshontsho lakhe kanti cha, uzothola abaphenyi becala bemlindile.”

UVELE phambi kwenkantolo yeMantshi yase-Dannhauser wakhishwa ngebheyili owesilisa osolwa ngokusenga ezimithiyo, ethi uyinkosi yaseSwatini.UMnuz Gcina Bethuel Nkosi ubezibiza ngenkosi uMenziwa wesi-11, esebenzisa amafulegi aseSwatini emibhalweni yize ezinze esifundeni eMajuba, KwaZulu-Natal.Ngokwesitatimende esikhishwe wuMnyango wezokuBusa nokuBambisana neziNdaba Zomdabu KwaZulu-Natal (Cogta), uMphathiswa uMfundisi Thulasizwe Buthelezi ukushayele izandla ukuboshwa kukaNkosi."Ungqongqoshe ukholelwa ukuthi ukuboshwa kukamsolwa kuthumela umyalezo ocacile nakwabanye abangaba amaqola ukuthi abomthetho ngeke bababekezelele abantu abazama ukukhohlisa imiphakathi bethi bangamakhosi bebe bengesiwo," kusho isitatimende.Sithe umphathiswa uncome amaphoyisa ngomsebenzi wawo wokuvikela aphinde aqikelele ukuthi umthetho uyalandelwa."Amaphoyisa enze umsebenzi oncomekayo ngokugcina umthetho nokuvikela isithunzi sezinhlaka zobuholi bomdabu. Lesi senzo siqinisekisa ukuzinikela kwabomthetho ukuvikela imiphakathi ezenzweni ezikhohlisayo," sisho kanje.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda uthe uNkosi uboshwe ngoba wephule umthetho weSigaba 51 weKZN Traditional Leadership and Governance Act wango-2005.

KUBOSHWE owesifazane waKwaLindizwe, KwaNongoma,  obonakala kwi-video, ezungeza ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, eshaya ngesihluku ingane yakhe (2).Umsolwa okuthiwa uboshwe ngempelasonto, ubevele eNkantolo yeMantshi kwaNongoma.Kwi-video okukholakala ukuthi iqoshwe othile obesendlini edlala ngaphezudlwana kweminithi, ubonakala ebhaxabula ingane ngesicathulo, abuye ayicindezele phansi sakuyincisha umoya. Kanti kukhona lapho eyishaya khona ngesipuni sokuphaka seplastiki.Akucaci ukuthi beyenzeni kodwa umsolwa uzwakala ethi: “Angithi uhlupha uMvelo wena? Angithi uyamhlupha?”Abasendlini abanye bezwakala bemkhuza kanti okukholakala ukuthi uyena oqophe i-video, ulokhu emxwayisa ngokuthi njengoba eqhubeka nokushaya ingane uyamqopha, uphethe ubufakazi.Lesi sihluku esinyantisayo sinyakazise ngisho ubuholi endaweni njengoba kuthiwa induna yesigodi iyalele ikhansela ukuthi libize umhlangano ukuthi kukhuzwe lesi sihlava.UMnuz Zithulele Dlamini oyikhansela endaweni, uthe nakuba bengakwazanga ukuthola ukuthi lesi sigameko senzeke kumuphi umuzi kodwa bakubone kuyijoka labo ukuthi basukume bakhuze umhlola zingaze zande izigameko ezifuze lesi.“Sihlanganile nenduna yendawo nayo ekuvezile ukuthi beyingazi ngalolu daba. Ngiyikhombisa i-video, ithuke yoma yathi angicishe ngingabe ngisaqhubeka ngenxa yesihluku esibonakala kuyo, savumelana ngokuthi kubizwe umhlangano ozokuba ngeSonto, ukuze sikhuze le nto eyihlazo ingaphinde yenzeke,” usho kanje.UMphathiswa wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi KwaZulu-Natal, uNkk Nonhlanhla Khoza, usigxekile lesi senzo.“Sifuna ukubona othintekayo ebhekana nesijeziso esimfanele ngokuhlukumeza ingane. Akusho lutho ukuthi uhlobene nengane, ziningi izindlela zokuyiqondisa kunalesi sihluku esibonakala kule video,” usho kanje.Uncome amaphoyisa ngokusukumela phezulu ukubopha umsolwa.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uLieutenant Colonel Nqobile Gwala, uthe amaphoyisa ophiko olubhekelele uDlame lwaseMindenini, ukuVikelwa kweziNgane namaCala aphathelene noCansi, Olundi ayaphenya. Uqinisekise ukuthi umsolwa uvelile enkantolo.

IPHETHE kabi ingxabano yezithandana isoka libulala intombi ngesibhakela eKlerksdorp, ngeSonto. Kuthiwa lezi zithandani bezinabangani bazo endlini yomngani eseBrakspruit, ngaphandle kwaseKlerksdorp, ngesikhathi kuqubuka ingxabano. “Imibiko esiyitholile ithi umgilwa wuyena ohlasele umsolwa kwaze kwaba wukuthi umsolwa uyaziphindiselela ngokumshaya ngezibhakela waze wawa umgilwa,” kusho  okhulumela amaphoyisa seNorth West.Kuthiwa umshiye lapho phansi umgilwa bahamba, kwaze kwabuya umnikazi wendawo wazama ukumvusa kodwa kwacaca ukuthi usethule.“Umnikazi wendawo utshele abangani bakhe nesoka likamgilwa kwabizwa i-ambulensi. Abezimo eziphuthumayo bafike baqinisekisa ukuthi intombi ishonile.”Liboshwe lapho isoka labekwa icala lokubulala. Kulindeleke ukuba livele eNkantolo yeMantshi eKlerksdorp, ngoLwesibili.

USASHAQEKILE owesifazane waseDaveyton ohlaselwe wumfowabo efuna ifa likamfowabo omdala.Owesifazane oneminyaka engu-35 uthe ngomhla ka 20 kwephezulu wayesekhaya ngesikhathi umfowabo (42) engena egumbini lakhe lokulala ethi ufuna imali eyashiywa ngumfowabo omdala.Uthi wamphendula ngokuthi akahambe ayoyifuna lapho ayesebenza khona umfowabo.“Yilapho umsolwa akhipha khona isibhamu wamtshela ukuthi akayikhiphe imali, uthe umgilwa wazama ukubaleka kodwa umsolwa wamdonsa emshaya, kwathi uma evika, umsolwa waqhubeka nokumshaya,’ kusho amaphoyisa kaMasipala waseKurhuleni.Umgilwa wavula icala lokusabisa nokushaya emaphoyiseni aseBronberg. Umsolwa wabanjwa ngemuva kwezinsuku ezimbalwa lapho ehlala khona, kwatholakala nesibhamu esizohlolwa ngesikhathi kuqhubeka icala.

BAZIPHONSE kunoxhaka abebecushelwe wona woKlebe abantu ababili okukhona kubona nongumsebenzi kaMasipala eMfuleni, eGauteng ababoshelwe icala lokuthatha ngodli imali emphakathini.Abasolwa ababili abaneminyaka engu-39 no-51 baboshwe ngoLwesibili.Kuthiwa bagqunywe ezitokisini kanti kulindeleke ukuthi bavele enkantolo maduze njengoba kusaqhubeka uphenyo.Okhulumela oKlebe, uColonel Katlego Mogale, uthe ithimba lamaphoyisa lisebenze ngokushesha eSharpville emuva kokuthola umbiko ngabantu abakhokhisa abanye imali.“Ithimba lamaphoyisa libe selihlela umhlangano obukade ugunyaziwe nabasolwa lapho kushintshanwe khona ngemali. Emuva nje kwalokho, bakhalelwe amasongo kaSigonyela abasolwa,” kusho uCol Mogale.Uthe abasolwa batholakale bephethe imali abadotshwe ngayo enye ebikade isemotweni yabo.Udalule ukuthi abasolwa kulindeleke ukuthi bavele okokuqala enkantolo maduzane.Kwenzeka lokhu nje kukhalwa nkalozonke ngabakhokhisa imali ngodli osomabhizinisi nabantu emiphakathini.Kunekhwelo lokuba iPhalamende lenze izichibiyelo emthethweni olawula i-extortion khona sizoqina isandla kwabagila le migilingwane.Amaphoyisa akhuthaza abantu ukuthi bawabikele ngalabo ababahlalise ngesinqe esisodwa bephula umthetho.

KUBOSHWE owokufika eziNdlini zoMbuso ePitoli wabekwa icala lokukhwabanisa nelokuba kuleli ngokungemthetho.Kuthiwa umsolwa ugqunywe ezitokisini emuva kokuthi eboshwe ngoMsombuluko.Kubikwa ukuthi amaphoyisa athole ukuthi umsolwa uzame ukusebenzisa umazisi womuntu osewashona ukuze anikezwe imvume yokuthamela umcimbi wokugcotshwa kukamengameli.Okhulumela amaphoyisa kuzwelonke, uBrigadier Athlenda Mathe, uthe akuwathathanga isikhathi esingakanani amaphoyisa athola ukuthi umsolwa “uthatha amashansi.”Ïsigameko senzeke ngoMsombuluko lapho bekulandwa khona izimvume  zokuthamela lo mcimbi. Kutholakele ukuthi usebenzisa umazisi womuntu osewashona, wakhalelwa amasongo kaSigonyela,” kusho uBrig Mathe.Uthe ziqinisiwe ezokuphepha kulo mcimbi futhi amaphoyisa atshalwe zinkalo zonke. UBrig Mathe uthe amaphoyisa ngeke azibekezelele izigameko zokuphulwa komthetho nobugebengu.Kwesinye isigameko kuboshwe owokufika odabuka eLesotho oneminyaka engu-21 obhadanywe namadayimane angasikiwe eKleinsee, eNorthern Cape, ngoLwesibili.Okhulumela amaphoyisa kulesiya sifundazwe, uSergeant Timothy Sam, uthe ithimba lamaphoyisa belinesivimbamgwaqo, liqaphe ubugebengu ngaphansi kohlelo, i-Operation Vala Umgodi.Lapha uthi bebemisa izimoto bezisesha nokuyilapho umsolwa etholakale khona namadayimane.“Uhlulekile ukunikeza impendulo eqondile ukuthi uwathathe kuphi amadayimane nokuthi ziphi izincwadi ezimgunyaza ukuba seNingizimu Afrika. Ube esekhalelwa amasongo kaSigonyela, kulindeleke avele enkantolo maduze,” kusho uSam.

KUBOSHWE owesilisa oneminyaka engu-51 ngecala lokushayela ebudlonyile nokushayela budedengu.Ngokwesitatimende samaphoyisa, imoto yomlisa ishayisane nemoto ebihamba owayengumengameli wezwe, uMnuz Jacob Zuma kanye nabavikeli bakhe.Akekho olimele esehlakalweni sengozi kanti abaqaphi bakaZuma baqinisekise ukuthi uyakhishwa emotweni waphuthunyiswa lapho ehlala khona.Okhulumela amaphoyisa kuzwelonke uBrigadier Athlenda Mathe, uthe ingozi yenzeke emgwaqweni uR66 ngoLwesine, ngabo-18:40 ebusuku.Umsolwa kulindeleke ukuthi avele ngoLwesibili eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseShowe.

UMNYANGO wezeMfundo KwaZulu-Natal, uthi uyalusukumela udaba lwezikole ezicekeleke phansi, kugasela isiphepho kulesi sifundazwe ngesonto eledlule. Isiphepho sishiye amanye amalungu omphakathi esele dengwane kuphephuka imizi nezinye izikhungo zikahulumeni.Sishaye kwazwela kakhulu oThongathi njengoba iminingi imizi ecekeleke phansi kwakhona nabadlula emhlabeni.Okhulumela umnyango uMnuz Muzi Mahlambi, uthe bathole umbiko wezikole ezingu-20 ezicekeleke phansi ngenxa yalesi simo, kanti isikole esisoThongathi, i-Seatides Combined kuthiwa yisona esithinteke kakhulu kwezisabikwe ukuthi zicekeleke phansi ngesikhathi kwehla lo mshophi.“Siwumnyango sinqume ukususa izingane ezifunda kusuka ku-Grade 10 kuya ku-Grade 12 kulesi sikole, siziyise esikoleni i- Anton Lembede ukuze zikwazi ukuqhubeka nokubhala izivivinyo zazo,” usho kanje.Uthe umnyango uzodlulisela amagumbi esikhashana angomahamba nendlwana ezikoleni ezithintekile, kanti uveze ukuthi ngokwemibiko abasayitholile okwamanje, angu-56 amagumbi angomahamba nendlwana adingekayo.UMahlambi uqinisekise ukuthi umnyango uyaqhubeka nokubheka isimo, uxhumana namahhovisi awo ezingeni lezifunda ukuqoqa ulwazi ngomonakalo odwalwe yilesi siphepho.Bevile ku-8 000 abasale dengwane endaweni yasoThongathi, kanti kuthiwa ilinganiselwa ku-2 000 imizi ecekeleke phansi.Ngesikhathi iMeya yeTheku uMnuz Mxolisi Kaunda ehlangene nalo mphakathi ngoLwesihlanu ukudlulisela ezinye izinsiza kubagilwa balesi siphepho, uqinisekise ukuthi uMnyango wezokuHlaliswa kwaBantu uzokwenza isiqiniseko sokuthi abadlule emhlabeni ngenxa yale nhlekelele, bangcwatshwa ngesizotha.“Emva kokubheka isimo sikwazile ukususa imindeni ekhahlamezekile sayifaka ezindaweni eziphephile ezisafihle khona amakhanda, ngakho namhlanje siqinisekisa ukuthi sibahambisela izinto eziyizidingongqangi,” usho kanje.Uthe le nhlekelele iphazamise ugesi namanzi endaweni kodwa umasipala wenza isiqiniseko sokubuyisela isimo kwesejwayelekile.Lo masipala ngokubambisana noMnyango wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi esifundazweni, udlulisele izingubo zokwembatha ezingu- 1 700 neziponji abangu-1 300 kubagilwa.

NKOSIKHONA CELEZINGU-35 000 izigebengu ezikhalelwe ngamaSongo kaSigonyela ngamacala abucayi kusukela ngo-Ephreli wangonyaka owedlule kuze kube yimanje.Lokhu kudalulwe nguKhomishana wamaPhoyisa KwaZulu Natal, uLieutenant General Nhlanhla Mkhwanazi.Ubebize isithangami sabezindaba izolo eThekwini, ekweneka kabanzi ngesimo samacala ehlukene nangezokuphepha esifundazweni.''Zingu-35 000 sezizonke izigebengu esizibophile kusukela ngonyaka owedlule kuze kube yimanje. Lokhu kungumsebenzi omuhle kakhulu obonakale wenziwa ngamaphoyisa,'' usho kanjena.Uveze ukuthi kulezi zigebengu kukhona ebeziboshelwa amacala okubulala, owokudlwengula, nawokweba. Wathi zilinganiselwa ku-11 000 izigebengu eziboshelwe amacala okubulala. Uthe amaphoyisa athole izibhamu ezingekho emthethweni ezilinganiselwa ku-953, nezinhlamvu ezingu-100."Ukutholakala kwezibhamu nezinhlamvu kusho ukusinda komphefumulo womuntu,'' usho kanjena uLt General Mkhwanazi.UMkhwanazi uqhube wathi zilinganiselwa ku-331 izigameko ezimayelana nokusocongwa kwabantu kwezepolitiki okubalwa amakhansela, izikhulu zomasipala abehlukene nabantu nje abazibandakanya nepolitiki emazingeni aphansi.Ukhuze izinhlaka ezibhekelele ubugebengu emiphakathini wathi mazingaphenduki zizenze amaphoyisa, kodwa okwabo ukusebenzisana namaphoyisa ukunqanda ubugebengu.Wathi amaphoyisa asehambe ibanga elide ekuphenyweni kwamacala athinta ukusocongwa kwabantu belaliswa uyaca.Ukhulume ngezigameko ezahlukene ebezenzeka ezingxenyeni ezahlukene zeKwaZulu Natal.Wenze isibonelo ngesigameko sokubulawa kwabangu- 11 okwenzeka eMgungundlovu, nyakenye. Wathi kukhona asebeboshiwe mayelana nesigameko.Mayelana nesigameko sokudutshulwa kwabangu-11 eZakheni, nonyaka nakhona uthe luyavuthwa uphenyo lwamaphoyisa.Wathi usegwetshiwe uZwelakhe Nene ngesigameko sokubulala amalungu omndeni wakhe okwakuyamelene nezinkinga zomndeni.Uthe ukwengezwa kwamaphoyisa angu-1500 ngaphambi kokhetho kulethe uzinzo esifundazweni. Wathi nakuba amanye esephindele kwezinye izifundazwe kodwa akhona amanye asasele.Uthe basembhidlangweni wokuqinisekisa ukuthi ubugebengu buyancipha kusona sonke isifundazwe. Uthe babhunge kabanzi ngalokho emhlanganweni omqoka ababe nawo noNgqongqoshe omusha wamaPhoyisa eNingizimu Afrika, uMnuz Senzo Mchunu.

BANGAPHEZU kuka-150 abasolwa abadutshulwe babulawa amaphoyisa eNingizimu Afrika kusuka ngo-Ephreli 2023.Lokhu kuvezwe esithangamini nabezindaba ePitoli ngeSonto nguNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa, uMnuz Bheki Cele.Esikhathini esifanayo, angu-109 amaphoyisa adutshulwe abulawa. UCele uthe iningi lamaphoyisa libulawe lingekho emsebenzini uma kuqhathaniswa nangu-36 asocongwe enza umsebenzi wawo.UCele uthe sekuboshwe abasolwa abangu-83 ngamacala athinta ukubulawa kwamaphoyisa.“Ukufa komuntu noma ngabe ubani akumele kube yinto ejatshulelwayo. Kodwa ukujabula komphakathi emuva kokubulawa kweqembu lemigulukudu KwaZulu-Natal (eMariannhill) naseMpumalanga kukutshela into ethile,” kusho uCele.Ugcizelele ukuthi alikho iphoyisa okumele life liphethe isibhamu ngesandla.Ube esewakhuthaza ukuthi ahlale eqaphile, avikele imiphakathi nawo uqobo futhi asiqinise isandla uma elwa nobugebengu.Uphinde wakhipha izibalo ezithinta imikhankaso yamaphoyisa ekulweni nobugebengu nasekuzuzile.UCele uthe ingu-1 171 imikhankaso ehleliwe yamaphoyisa esezingeni eliphezulu ababe nayo. Kuyona kuboshwe abasolwa abangu-3 749.“Lapha kubalwa abasolwa abangu-173 ababoshelwe amacala okubulala, abangu-57 ngamacala okugwazisa nokuthumba. Abawu-768 baboshelwe ukutholakala nezibhamu ezingekho emthethweni, u-488 uboshelwe ukuphanga kwathi abangu-79 baboshelwa ukubamba imoto yemali,” kusho uCele.Uqhube wathi abasolwa abangu-1 510 nabangu-214 baboshelwe amacala ezidakamizwa nathinta ukuvukuza ezimayini okungekho emthethweni.Uveze nokuthi bevile ku-500 000 abantu ababoshiwe ngamacala ehlukene kusuka ngoMeyi 2023 kwethulwa i-Operation Shanela.Uthe bashaqe impahla yenani likaR6.2 million, bahlakaza izidleke ezingu-16 okukhiqizwa kuzona izidakamizwa zenani elinguR161 million. Uveze nokuthi emikhankasweni yoKlebe kushaqwe izidakamizwa ezingabiza uR506 million kwaboshwa abasolwa abangu-148.Ngempelasonto uCele ubesoThongathi, eThekwini emngcwabeni wephoyisa uSergeant Sibongiseni Khoza (37) odutshulwe wafa esemsebenzini eSundumbili.UKhoza ushiye emhlabeni abantwana ababili, oneminyaka engu-12 nomunye oneyisithupha. UCele usongele izigebengu wathi asikho esizogila imikhuba bese siyolala endlini sibhekise amadolo phezulu.

UPHINDE wakhala ngaphansi loyo owayengumengameli, uJacob Zuma, emzamweni wakhe wokushenxisa umshushisi omkhulu ecaleni lakhe lenkohlakalo, u-Advocate Billy Downer.INkantolo eNkulu eMgungundlovu ichithe isicelo sesibili sikaZuma sokuba kushenxe uDowner ecaleni.UZuma usola uDowner ngokuchema, ukhala ngokuthi waputshuzela izintatheli imininingwane yecala kanye nethinta impilo yakhe.IJaji Nkosinathi Chili lithe uZuma wehlulekile ukuveza ukuthi amalungelo akhe azocindezeleka kanjani uma uDowner engashenxi ecaleni.Isicelo sokuqala sachithwa iJaji Piet Koen, owagcina eshenxa kuleli cala.Ummeli kaZuma, u-Advocate Dali Mpofu, uthe bazosiphonsela inselelo isinqumo sikaChili.“Amaphepha okuphonsela inselelo isinqumo senkantolo sizowaletha singakapheli isikhathi esibekelwe sona.”UDonwer uthe bafuna kuqale ngokushesha ukuqulwa kwecala.“Sekuneminyaka kubambezeleka ukuqulwa kwecala. Kufanele kuqale ngokushesha ukuqulwa kwecala.”Icala lizobuyela enkantolo ngenyanga ezayo.

KUQINISEKISWE izitshudeni ezifunda ezikhungweni ezine ezikhishwe ohlwini lwezibhalisiwe ngaphansi koMnyango weMfundo ePhakeme nokuQeqesha ukuthi iziqu zazo zisemthethweni.Lokhu kushiwo nguDkt Blade Nzimande, ophethe lo mnyango obeqinisa idolo izitshudeni ezifunda ngaphansi kwezikhungo i-Educor.Ngeledlule uDkt Nzimande uthe ziyakhishwa ohlwini lwezikhungo ezibhalisiwe kuleli ngenxa yokwehluleka ukuhlangabezana neminye imibandela yomnyango efaka nokuletha imininingwane ethinta ukusebenza kwezimali.Isitatimende esikhishwe ngumnyango kaNzimande, siveze ukuthi iziqu zezitshudeni ezizithole kulezi zikhungom, zisemthethweni.Lezi zikhungo ezikhishwe ohlwini lwezibhalisiwe yiCity Varsity (Pty) Ltd, Damelin (Pty) Ltd, Icesa City Campus (Pty) Ltd neLyceum College (Pty) Ltd.“Siyazi ngomthelela lesi sinqumo esibe nawo sokukhipha lezi zikhungo ohlwini lwezibhalisiwe ikakhulu kulezo zitshudeni ezisaphothula iziqu kuzona. Njengoba sibhekele izikhungo ezizimele nezomphakathi, kuwumsebenzi wethu ukuqinisekisa ukuthi umthetho wezwe uyalandelwa.” Lesi sitatimende sithe nalabo abasalelwe wukuqedela iziqu zabo kulezi zikhungo, iziqu zabo zisezingeni.Lezi zikhungo uthe zihlalelwe yijoka lokuqinisekisa ukuthi izitshudeni ezisasele ziphothula iziqu zazo futhi zibhaliswe izivivinyo ngesikhathi esisele.Sithe umnyango usazimisele ukufaka isandla ukuze lezi zitshudeni zingaphenduki ondingasithebeni.“Uphiko olubhekele ukubhaliswa kwezikhungo ezizimele emnyangweni, lumatasa nezingcingo ezivela kwizitshudeni ezikhala ngokuthi akukho ukuxhumana okukhona okuvela ezikhungweni ezingaphansi kwe-Educor, mayelana nekusasa lazo. Sinxusa i-Educor ukuthi icacisele umphakathi ngokuzokwenzeka,” kusho isitatimende. Siveze nokuthi nakuba kunjalo kodwa sisamile isinqumo sokuthi kukhishwe lezi zikhungo ohlwini lwezibhalisiwe kuleli, kuze kube kulungiswa izinkinga ezibhekene nazo.Selokhu uNzimande ememezele ukukhishwa kwalezi zikhungo ohlwini lwezibhalisiwe kuleli, kunokukhathazeka kulabo abebefunda kuzona.Umnyango uxwayise ezinye izikhungo ezizimele ukuthi ngeke unanaze ukuzikhipha ohlwini lwezibhalisiwe uma zephula imigomo.“Sifisa ukuxwayisa nalabo abahlela ukuvula izikhungo ezingombombayi ukuthi sizozivala, umthetho wezemfundo uthi kumele zonke izikhungo zbhaliswe ukuze kuvikeleke isithunzi sezemdundo. Sisebenza namaphoyisa ukuzivala uma sesizazi,” kusho isitatimende.

ZISHE zangqongqa izisebenzi ezintathu zikhiyelwe umqashi ebhilidini okwakhiwa kulo ifenisha eMissionlands eVerulam ngoMgqibelo.Okhulumela iReaction Unit South Africa (Rusa), uMnuz Prem Balram uthe zintathu izinsalela ezitholwe kule ndawo ngabezimo eziphuthumayo.Uthe imindeni nabangani babalisa abane abangakwazanga ukubuyela emakhaya izolo ekuseni bafike qathatha kule ndawo bezobabheka.Uveze ukuthi ithimba lakwaRusa lithole ucingo emva kokuthi abebebheka, belunguze ngewindi lebhilidi ebelisha, baqaphela ukuthi kunezinsalela zesidumbu somuntu.“Kuthe uma befika endaweni yesigameko, bebheka, bathola ukuthi ngempela isidumbu somuntu. Izicishamlilo zikaMasipala weTheku nazo zifikile, zathola ezinye izidumbu ezimbili,” kusho uBalramUthe isidumbu esisodwa asikahlozwa.Ngokwezihlobo zabashonile, bayisishiyagalolunye abokufika baseMalawi abebesebenza ebusuku kule ndawo eyakha ifenisha ngesikhathi kuqala umlilo.Kuthiwa uqale ngabo-11.30 ebusuku.“Zonke izintuba zokuphuma kuthiwa bezikhiywe umqashi ngesikhathi beqala ukusebenza. Lokhu kushiwo izisebenzi ezisinde kulo mlilo,” kusho yena.Uqhube wathi zinhlanu izisebenzi ezigxumele ngaphandle, zisuka phezulu, zibalekela umlilo. Uthe zisale nemihuzuko.“Abezicishamlilo basathungatha umgilwa wesine,” kusho uBalram.Nakuba uBalram ethe zitholiwe izidumbu ezintathu, okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uLieutenant Colonel Nqobile Gwala, uthe izisebenzi ezine azikatholakali. Uthe ibhilidi lishe laphela nya.Uthe uphiko lwamaphoyisa lwabatakuli nezinye izinhlaka bahlole isimo, babona ukuthi akuphephile ukuthi kungenwe ebhilidini, kubhekwe abagilwa.“Abemindeni yabagilwa batsheliwe ngalesi simo. Kuvulwe idokodo ngokufa kwabantu esiteshini samaphoyisa eVerulam.

ZIVULWE ngaphandle kwezihibe izikole KwaZulu-Natal emva kwamaholidi asebusika.Lokhu kuvezwe nguMphathiswa wezeMfundo kulesi sifundazwe, uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka, ngesikhathi ehambele isikole samabanga aphakeme, i- Seatides Combined, oThongathi esacekelwa phansi yisiphepho ngenyanga edlule.“Ngijabule ukuthi ukufunda kuqale ngaphandle kwezihibe osukwini lokuqala lwekota yesithathu yonyaka wokufunda kusona sonke isifundazwe,” usho kanje.Ekhuluma nabafundi bakulesi sikole, ugcizelele ukuthi umnyango uyabeseka futhi uzoqinisekisa ukuthi bathola imiphumela emihle ekupheleni konyaka.Lesi siphepho sigasele ngesikhathi kubhalwa izivivinyo zaphakathi nonyaka okuholele ekutheni ziphazamiseke. Abafundi abenza u-grade 12 kusona kuphoqe ukuthi bayiswe e-Anton Lembede MTS Academy ukuze bangaphazamiseki ezifundweni zabo.Lesi sikole singesinye sezikole ezacekelwa phansi yisiphepho esashaya kwazwela oThongathi, sashiya nabantu bengenawo amakhaya.Zevile ku-10 izikole esifundazweni ezicekelwe phansi yilesi siphepho sangenyanga edlule esidlule nemiphefumulo yabangu-11, abayisikhombisa kubona bavela oThongathi kanti abane abaseNquthu, eShowe nakwaHlabisa.Umnyango uqinisekise ukuthi usuwafakile amagumbi angomahamba nendlwana esikoleni i-Seatides Combined yize ungaphumelanga obala ngohlelo lokufakwa kwalawa magumbi kwezinye izikole ezacekeleka phansi ngenxa yesimo esifanayo.

ZIHLULEKILE ezinye izikhungo zokuvota ukuthi zivule ngesikhathi Zibalelwa ngaphezu kweziwu-20 izikhungo zaKwaZulu-Natal, ezivule sesidlulile isikhathi.Lokhu kudalulwe nguMnuz Masego Sheburi, iphini lesikhulu esiphezulu seKhomishini yezoKhetho, ngesikhathi ekhuluma nabezindaba ngokuthi luqale kanjani usuku lokuvota.USheburi uthe e-Eastern Cape, zinhlanu izikhungo zokuvota eziphuzile ukuvulwa ngenxa yemibhikisho yomphakathi.“EThekwini zingu-20 izikhungo eziphuzile ukuvulwa ngenxa yemibhikisho yomphakathi. Kube nokubambezeleka kwezinye izikhungo ngenxa yokuthi amaphoyisa abengekho ukuphelezela abasebenzi bekhomishini ukuhambisa izinsiza zokuvota.”Ubale izindawo ezehlukene okubalwa eThekwini, uThukela, Mtubatuba, Ugu, uMbumbe naseBuhlebezwe lapho bekulindeke ukuthi amaphoyisa aphelezele abasebenzi.“Isikhungo esigcine ukuvulwa isikole iLenkasi Secondary, eMuziwabantu esivulwe ngo-10 ekuseni ngoba sekungenelele imeya. Izikhungo ezimbili eNewcastle, zivulwe emuva kwehora kanti bezivalwe abanye babaholi bamaqembu ezombusazwe. EShowe kube esifanayo ngenxa yokuthi  i-Area Manager ivinjwe ngabamaqembu ezepolitiki ngakho akangakwazi ukungena lapho kugcinwa khona izinsiza. Kudingeke ukuthi kubizwe amaphoyisa ukuzolungisa isimo.”USheburi ubalule ukuthi ukungasebenzi kwemishini yokubheka abazovota akumele kuphazamise ukhetho. Ugcizelele ukuthi bonke okuzoshaya isikhathi sokuvala ngo-9 ebusuku, bazovotiswa uma kuvalwe beme kulayini.Usihlalo wekhomishini uMnuz Mosotho Moepya, unxuse abaholi bamaqembu ukuthi kungabi ibona abaphazamisa ukhetho.

KUQUBUKE imvunge ngesenzo soMnyango weMfundo ePhakeme, sokubuyisela emuva uR580 million kuMgcinimafa ngoba ungasebenzanga. Imvunge iqutshulwa wukuthi iningi likholwa wukuthi le mali ngabe yenze izinto eziningi okuhlale kukhalwa ngazo ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme, okungamanyuvesi namakolishi amakhono ama-TVET.Okukhalisa kakhulu izinhlangano zezitshudeni wukuthi imali ibingasetshenziselwa ukwesula izikweletu zezitshudeni, ukuxhasa izitshudeni ezidonsa kanzima nokwenza ezinye izinto ezibalulekile. Umfelandawonye wezinyunyana zabasebenzi iSouth African Federation of Trade Unions (SAFTU), udumele ngesenzo somnyango uthi le mali ibingasiza enkingeni yengqalasizinda ezikhungweni zemfundo.I-Saftu ithe imali ibingasiza izitshudeni ezingu-476 ezincishwe uxhaso kulo nyaka wezimali yisikhwama iNSFAS.“Minyaka yonke kuhlale kunesililo, izitshudeni zikhala ngoxhaso ekubeni umnyango ubuyisela emuva imali. Le mali ibingenza izinto eziningi okubalwa nokuphucula ingqalasizinda ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme, ukuthenga izinsiza kufundisa ezifana namakhompyutha angasebenzi ezikhungweni,” kusho iSaftu.Umengameli weSasco uMnuz Vezinhlanhla Simelane, ugxeke umnyango ngokubuyisela emuva imali engabe isize izitshudeni.Uthe kunezitshudeni ezingaxhasiwe yiNSFAS ezisalinde isinqumo salesi sikhwama ngokuthi ziyaluthola uxhaso.“Kuhlale kuthiwa imali ayenele yokuxhasa izitshudeni kodwa kubuyiselwa emuva imali. Inkulu kakhulu le mali ukuthi ingabuyiselwa emuva imali engaka,” kusho uSimelane.Ugxeke obengungqongqoshe womnyango uDkt Blade Nzimande, ngokubuyiselwa emuva kwemali.“Sethemba ukuthi ubuholi obukhona buzoyibhekisisa le nkinga. Kumele le mali ibuyiselwe emnyangweni ukuze izosiza izitshudeni ezidonsa kanzima.” Ibamba likanobhala jikelele wenhlangano i-The Economic Freedom Fighters Students’ Command (EFFSC) uMnuz Khanya Bungane, ligxeke umnyango ngalesi senzo lathi imali kumele ibuyiswe ukuzokweseka izitshudeni ezidonsa kanzima.UBungane uthe uhulumeni we-ANC uhlulekile ukuthuthukisa abantu abasha nezwe ngoba akukwazi ukuthi imali engaka ingabuyiselwa emuva.“Izitshudeni zishoda ngendawo yokuhlala ezikhungweni zemfundo. Izinsiza ziyashoda, liphezulu izinga labalaxaza izifundo bengaqedanga. Sidumele ngokuthi kunemali engaka ebuyiselwa emuva phezu kwezingqinamba ezingaka emfundweni ephakeme.”UMnuz Lucian Kearns, ibamba lomphathi wezimali emnyangweni, uthe le mali ebuyiselwe emuva eyeminyaka emibili yezimali.Uveze ukuthi ingu-R462 million imali eyabuyela emuva okwakungeyonyaka wezimali u-2022/2023, noR117 million wangonyaka wezimali u-2023/2024, kanti uma isihlanganisiwe ibalelwa kuR580 million. “Le mali kwakumele isebenze ukuvala izikhala ezikhona ezikhungweni zemfundo ephakeme. Imali ethinta ezinye izidingo ezibalulekile njengokuxhaswa kwezitshudeni yasebenza cishe yonke,” kuchaza uKearns ekhuluma nesiteshi sethelevishini i-ENCA, izolo ekuseni.Uthe uma befake isicelo sokwabelwa imali basuke behlele ukuyisebenzisa yonke kodwa kuke kubekhona izingqinamba ezenza ukuthi izifiso zingafezeki.

INHLANGANO ebhekelele ukuphepha komphakathi, i-Institute for Security Studies, ithi ikhathazekile ngezigameko zokuqothwa kwabasolwa ezigamekweni ezahlukene okubukeka kudla lubi kulezi zinsuku, okushayelwa ihlombe ngabantu abaningi.Esigamekweni sakamuva esenzeke ngesonto eledlule eDesai, eMariannhill  amaphoyisa aqothe abasolwa abayisishiyagalolunye abaneminyaka ephakathi kuka-18 no- 23, kanti lokhu kushiye amalungu omphakathi enconcoza njengoba kuthiwa abewuhlalise lubhojozi.UMnuz Gareth Newham oyiNhloko oPhikweni lweZobulungiswa kanye Nokunqandwa koDlame kule nhlangano ephendula imibuzo yeSolezwe, uthe nakuba amaphoyisa enelungelo lokudubula uma ebhekene nobungozi, kodwa izigameko zakamuva zokuqothwa kwabasolwa ngamaphoyisa, zishayisa amakhala.“Lokhu kuveza ukuthi amaphoyisa awanabo ubuhlakani obudingekayo noma amaqhinga ahlelwe kahle okubopha abasolwa abasuke bendawonye.“Uma bengabopha izigebengu, kungasiza ekubeni nolwazi ngazo nobunye ubugebengu ezibenzayo.“Lokhu kungaqinisekisa ukuthi ubulungiswa buyenziwa kubagilwa, nokuthi okwawo ukuqinisekisa ukuthi umthetho uyalandelwa,” usho kanje.Ephawula ngesigameko saseMariannhill, uthe ngokwezibhamu okuthiwa zatholwa endaweni yesigameko (amaphoyisa aqinisekisa ukuthi zine), kuyakhombisa ukuthi iningi labasolwa ababulewe belingahlomile. Uveze ukuthi ukudubulana phakathi kwamaphoyisa nezigebengu, kuphinde kube yingozi kakhulu kubantu abasuke bezimele nje bengahlangene nokuqhubekayo.“Uma amaphoyisa engazobonakala njengabantu abamele ukulandelwa komthetho kodwa ababulali, kuzokwenza umsebenzi wawo ubeyingozi kakhulu njengoba izigebengu zizowadubula uma ziwabona noma  ziwahlasele,” usho kanje.Unxuse iziphathimandla emaphoyiseni ukuthi zithathe izinyathelo ukuqonda ukuthi kungani amaphoyisa aqeqeshwe ngezinga eliphezulu kangaka engabophi uma ebhekene nezigebengu, kodwa kube nokudubulana okuholela ekufeni kwabantu abasuke bengahlomile.Emngcwabeni wephoyisa elidutshulwe lisemsebenzini uSergeant Sibongiseni Khoza obusoThongathi ngoMgqibelo, uNgqongqoshe wamaPhoyisa kuleli uMnuz Bheki Cele ugcizelele ukuthi amaphoyisa awadubule uma ebhekene nezigebengu ezidubula zibhekise kuwo uma enza umsebenzi wawo.Kwenzeka lokhu nje, amaphoyisa abesanda kucoboshisa abasolwa ngokuba yizinkabi, abathathu esigamekweni esenzeke eShowe ngeledlule.Kanti ngoFebhuwari, amaphoyisa adubule abasolwa  abayisithupha okuthiwa badubula kuqala, esigamekweni esenzeke eNanda.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal uColonel Robert Netshiunda uthe bangu- 9 522 abasolwa asebeboshwe ngamaphoyisa esifundazweni, ngamacala ahlukene kule nyanga nje kuphela. Uveze ukuthi zingu-258 izibhamu ezingekho emthethweni eziqoqiwe nezinhlamvu ezingu- 3000.

ZIMISWE zaphinde zayalelwa ukuthi zingasondeli emagcekeni enyuvesi iMangosuthu University of Technology (MUT), izikhulu ezimbili kulesi sikhungo kuze kuphothulwe uphenyo. Lokhu kumenyezelwe ngumlawuli wesikhashana walesi sikhungo uSolwazi Lourens van Staden, othumele incwadi kwizitshudeni nakubasebenzi balesi sikhungo.Kule ncwadi ekwi-website yalesi sikhungo nasezinkundleni zokuxhumana, iveza ukuthi kumiswe ibamba lomphathi wale nyuvesi nebamba lemenenja ehhovisi lomphathi wenyuvesi.Uthe laba bamiswe kuze kuphothulwe uphenyo.“Isinqumo sokumisa laba silandela izinsolo ezisanda kuvela ezingalimaza isithunzi senyuvesi. Kubalulekile ukuthi lezi zinsolo ziphenywe ukuze sivikelwe isithunzi sesikhungo kuphinde kube nokuvuleleka kohlelo lokuthi abantu baziphendulele.”Lezi zikhulu ziyalelwe ukuthi zingathinti lutho oluthinta umsebenzi wazo. Azivunyelwe ukuthi zisondele emagcekeni alesi sikhungo noma baxhumane nabasebenzi nezitshudeni.“Abavumelekile nokuthi baxhumane nezinhlaka ezehlukene kulesi sikhungo ngezinto ezithinta inyuvesi,” kusho uVan Staden.Uthe lesi sinqumo sithathwe ukuze kungabikhona abazokhala ngokuchema ngohlelo lokuphenya.Udalule ukuthi bangakwazi ukuxhumana nalezi zinhlaka uma begunyazwe nguVan Staden, noma nanoma ngubani amjubile.“Ukumiswa kwabo akusho ukuthi banecala kodwa wuhlelo lokuqinisekisa ukuthi uphenyo luqhubeka ngaphandle kokuphazamiseka.“Ngifuna ukuqinisekisa zonke izinhlaka zasenyuvesi ukuthi sizimisele ukubeka phambili isithunzi senyuvesi,” esho. Unxuse ukuthi kubanjiswane ngalesi sikhathi kusaqhubeka uphenyo. Umemezele ukuthi uSolwazi Nokuthula Sibiya, uzoba yibamba lomphathi walesi sikhungo.Uthe usewuqalile umsebenzi wakhe kanti uzobamba kuze kwenziwe isimemezelo.“Unamava ezintweni ezithinta imfundo ephakeme kanjalo nezokuphatha. Ngiyamethemba ukuthi uzokwazi ukuhlinzeka ngobuholi obusezingeni ngalesi sikhathi,” kugcizelela uVan Staden. Unxuse zonke izinhlaka ukuthi zimeseke ngalesi sikhathi ukuze kuqhubeke kube nozinzo kule nyuvesi.Iyinsakavukela eyezinkinga kule nyuvesi njengoba uNgqongqoshe weMfundo ePhakeme uDkt Blade Nzimande, ehlale ekhala ngokuthi njalo kudingeka ayifake ngaphansi kwesandla somlawuli.UNzimande wathi ukhathazekile ngokuthi sekube namahlandla amaningi le nyuvesi eyifaka ngaphansi komlawuli ukuze kulungiswe izinkinga ezisuke zibhekene nokuphathwa kwayo kanjalo nezinye.URegistrar eMUT uDkt Phumzile Masala, uthe ngeke baphawule ngalo myalezo ngoba bekuyinto yangaphakathi ebithunyelwe izitshudeni nabasebenzi.Uthe bazokwazisa abezindaba ngesikhathi esifanele.

Kusolakala ukuthi ungene esibhedlela ngesikhathi sokuvakashelwa kweziguli owesifazane obanjwe oqotsheni ezenza udokotela ewodini.Umsolwa uboshwe esibhedlela, iThembisa Provincial Tertiary Hospital, eGauteng ngoLwesibili ebusuku.Uboshwe wase egqunywa esiteshini samaphoyisa, iRabasotho, eThembisa.Bekulindeleke ukuthi avele eNkantolo yeMantshi yaseThembisa ngoLwesine ebhekene necala lokuzenza umsebenzi wezempilo.Abezempilo eGauteng bathi yisigameko sesibili kulo nyaka sokuboshwa kozenza udokotela.NgoFebhuwari kwaboshwa owesifazane esibhedlela, iChris Hani Baragwanath Memorial Hospital, owayefuna intshontsho likaR700 esigulini ukuze asisize.Kuthiwa lo muntu wabonwa yisisebenzi sasesibhedlela esabikela abaphathi nonogada, wase ekhalelwa amasongo kaSigonyela.Nyakenye ngo-Okthoba kwaboshwa odume kuTikTok ngezeluleko zezempilo, uMnuz Matthew Lani, esibhedlela iHelen Joseph Hospital eGauteng.Kubikwa ukuthi uLani waboshwa esathwabaza kulesi sibhedlela, eziqopha edlubhe umfaniswano wodokotela nabasebenza ngakho.UMnyango wezeMpilo eGauteng uthi bazobhekana kanzima nengalo yomthetho oskhwiliphambana nobhoko abazenza odokotela nabasebenzi bezempilo bengebona.Lo mnyango uthi uzoqinisa ezokuphepha ezibhedlela nendlela elawula ukungena nokuphuma kwabantu.

ZIYIFANISA nesigodi sethunzi lokufa indawo eyisiganga ebhulohweni eliphakathi kwaseMachobeni naseMolweni izakhamuzi kulandela ukuthowa kwezidumbu zabesilisa ababili abangaziwa ngoLwesithathu.Izidumbu zabafi, ebeziboshwe izandla ngemuva, kuthiwa zibonwe ngumuntu obezidlulela, wahlaba umkhosi emaphoyiseni nasemphakathini.Umthombo weSolezwe, ocele ukungadalulwa, uthe kubukeka sengathi babulawelwe endaweni yesigameko ngokudutshulwa njengoba igazi beligobhoza lapho ziwele khona izidumbu.“Mhlawumbe yisigameko seshumi manje lesi, kutholwa abantu ababulewe esikhathini esingangonyaka,” kubabaza umthombo.Uthe ngeledlule kutholwe isidumbu sowesilisa obephoswe phansi ebhulohweni.“Ukutakulwa kwakhe kwakunzima ngenxa yokuphoswa phansi ebhulohweni. Ayikho inhlobo yephoyisa engafikanga kuzanywa ukuthi atakulwe,” kusho umthombo.Ngaphambi kwalokho kwatholwa umuntu eshisiwe.“Uhulumeni ake asilekelele ngendaba yobugebengu babantu ababulawayo kule ndawo,” kusho umthombo.Induna yendawo, uMnuz Zaba Muthwa, ikuqinisekisile ukuthi le ndawo ihlaselwe yizehlo ezihlasimulisa umzimba ngenxa yokuthi iyisigange futhi akuvamisile ukuthi abantu behle benyuke kuyo.Uvumile ukuthi sekuyinto ejwayelekile ukuthi kutholwe izidumbu zabantu ababulewe ngesihluku.“Sikholelwa ekutheni bababulalela kwezinye izindawo bese bezobalahla lapha endaweni yethu ngoba kuye kuthi uma kulandelelwa kuvele ukuthi abantu basezindaweni eziqhele kakhulu nathi,” kusho uMuthwa.Uthe le nkinga ibakhathaza kakhulu ngoba ingcolisa indawo yabo futhi itshala ukwesaba ebantwini.Uveze ukuthi ngenxa yokwanda kwalezi zigameko baze basungula iforamu  eqapha ubugebengu endaweni nyakenye, wathi ukhathazeke ngokuthi yize kunjalo izigameko azinciphi.“Sesifisa nokuthi kulethwe isiteshi samaphoyisa esingumahamba nendlwana kwenzele ukuthi zizothuka izigebengu,” kusho uMuthwa.NgoFebhuwari nonyaka Isolezwe libike ngowesifazane, uPatricia Jeza (48), nendodakazi yakhe, uQueen Jeza (22), baseChesterville abatholwa belahliwe endaweni efanayo.Emva kokuhlonzwa ukuthi bangobani, kwaboshwa inyanga, uMnuz Abraham Mhlaba, owayengumfundisi webandla lamaJericho eNanda ngokubulawa kwabo.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe amaphoyisa aseNanda aphenya amacala amabili okubulala kulandela isigameko sokudutshulwa kubulawe abesilisa ababili eMachobeni izolo. “Abagilwa batholwe benenqwaba yamanxeba okudutshulwa,“ kusho uNetshiunda.

ZIQALE phansi izigameko zokubanjwa inkunzi kwezimoto ezithwala imali, KwaZulu-Natal, njengoba sekwenzeke ezintathu esikhathini esingaphansi kwenyanga.Esigamekweni sakamuva esenzeke emgwaqweni u-N2 ngaKwaMashu izolo ekuseni, kuthiwa abasolwa abebehamba ngezimoto ezehlukene bavulele ngenhlamvu bebhekise emotweni ethwala imali bagcina bebaleka nesamba semali engadalulwanga.Okhulumela amaphoyisa KwaZulu-Natal, uColonel Robert Netshiunda, uthe ngesikhathi abasolwa bedubula bebhekise ngasemotweni ethwala imali,  badubule nemoto ebihamba iphoyisa engamakiwe ebelidlula liya emsebenzini.  Uthe iphoyisa  lidubule labhekisa ngakubasolwa, lasiza ekuvimbeni nabanye abashayeli bezimoto abebesebenzisa umzila ofanayo,  abebengazithola bengabagilwa bentululwane yezinhlamvu ebezindiza emoyeni zivela ohlangothini lwabasolwa.“Izigebengu zikwazile ukuqhumisa imoto ethwala imali zabaleka nesamba semali engadalulwanga.  Onogada abebegade imoto yemali baphume bengenamyocu, nakuba izigebengu zibaphuce izibhamu zabo.  Kunxuswa  noma ngubani ongaba nolwazi olungasiza amaphoyisa ukuze abambe abasolwa aludlulisele esiteshini samaphoyisa esiseduze, noma ashayele enombolweni ethi; 08 600 10111,” kusho uNetshiunda.Kwenzeka lokhu nje, amaphoyisa abesanda kuthela othulini abasolwa ababili, abadutshulwe bafa, kwathi oyedwa zamkhalela enenxeba lokudutshulwa.  Laba basolwa kuthiwa bebelandelwa ngecala lokubanjwa kwenkunzi imoto ethwala imali okuthiwa kwenzeke emgwaqweni u-R74 ngaseKranskop, ngoMsombuluko.UNetshiunda uthe ngesikhathi amaphoyisa elandela umkhondo, alandele imoto ebihamba abasolwa egcine ishayisa ipali eliseceleni komgwaqo ePhoenix, emva kokuthi abasolwa bebonile ukuthi kubashele, kuthiwa baphume badubula bebhekise ngasemaphoyiseni, amaphoyisa aphendula kwashona ababili, kwathi oyedwa  watholwa ebhace kwesinye isakhiwo enenxeba lokudutshulwa, kanti ungeniswe esibhedlela ngaphansi kweso lamaphoyisa.Ngenyanga edlule, amaphoyisa adubule abasolwa abane abebefunwa ngamacala okubamba inkunzi izimoto ezithwala imali, babulawe e-Camperdown.  Kukholakala ukuthi abasolwa badubula kuqala bebhekise emaphoyiseni, aphendula ngendlela efanayo.

ZIYANDA izinkinga kumholi weNFP,  uMnuz Ivan Barnes, okufakwe icala lokuthi axoshwe ebukhanseleni.Owakhishwa esikhundleni ngesikhathi kufakwa uBarnes ebukhanseleni kuMasipala wesifunda iZululand, uMnuz Sibusiso Nkosi, ufake icala eNkantolo eNkulu eMgungundlovu.UNkosi ufuna ukuthi inkantolo ichithe ukuxoshwa kwakhe, iphinde ichithe nokuqokwa kukaBarnes kwesobukhansela.UNkosi waxoshwa kwiNFP esolwa ngokuthi usefudukele kwelinye iqembu elingazange lishiwo.Emaphepheni asenkantolo, uNkosi uthe kungamanga aluhlaza ukuthi usefudukele kwelinye iqembu.UNkosi uthe akuzange kulandelwe imigomo ngesikhathi exoshwa, wakhala ngokuthi akazange anikwe ithuba lokuthi aziphendulele.“Isinqumo sokungixosha kuthiwa sathathwa emhlanganweni wesigungu esiphezulu. Iqiniso ukuthi isigungu esiphezulu asinawo amandla okuxosha umuntu. Akukho okubhalwe phansi okukhombisa ukuthi obani ababekhona kulo mhlangano okuthiwa wathatha isinqumo sokungixosha.“Umthetho weqembu unikeza ilungelo umuntu ukuthi abizelwe esigcawini sokuqondiswa ubugwegwe uma kunezinsolo abhekene nazo. Umuntu uxoshwa emva kokunikezwa ithuba lokuthi aphonsele inselelo isinqumo sokumxosha. Mina angizange nginikwe ithuba lokuthi ngiziphendulele.”UNkosi uthe uxoshelwa ukuthi ubonwa njengomuntu ongameseki uBarnes.“UBarnes uphezu komkhankaso wokuxosha bonke labo akholwa ukuthi abahambisani naye. Akusimina owokuqala ukuba athole incwadi emxoshayo, baningi abanye abaholi abathole izincwadi zokubaxosha.”Kuleli cala, uNkosi umangalele noMphathiswa wokuBusa ngokuBambisna neziNdaba zoMdabu, uMfu Thulasizwe Buthelezi, uMasipala wesifunda iZululand, nenhlangano eyengamele ukhetho, i-Independent Electoral Commission.UNkosi ufuna kuchithwe isinqumo sikaButhelezi sokwamukela incwadi yokumxosha.Ufuna ukuthi icala lokuxoshwa kwakhe lilalelwe ngo-Okthoba 2.Ayizange iphumelele imizamo yokuthola uBarnes ukuze aphawule njengoba ucingo lwakhe beluthi lumatasa.UNkosi akasiyena umholi wokuqala ukufaka uBarnes enkantolo.Ngenyanga eyedlule abaholi beqembu abangu-12 abaqavile okukhona kubo iphini lemeya kuMasipala waseThekwini, uNksz Zandile Myeni, nemeya kaMasipala waKwaNongoma, uMnuz Mshangane Ndabandaba, bamangalela uBarnes emva kokuthi ebathumelele izincwadi ezibasabisa ngokubaqondisa ubugwegwe.INkantolo eNkulu eMgungundlovu yakhipha isivimbelo sesikhashana esinqanda uBarnes ukuthi amise la baholi.INFP ibhekene nezinkinga zangaphakathi njengoba kukhona icala eliphonsela imiphumela yengqungquthela okwakhethwa kuyo uBarnes.UBarnes wakhethwa engqungqutheleni eyayingonyaka odlule kodwa akasahoshelani nabanye abaholi aqokwa kanye nabo okubalwa kubo unobhala jikelele, uMnuz Teddy Thwala, naye uBarnes ambhalela incwadi yokumumisa.

ZIZOQALA ukufundwa ngonyaka ozayo emazingeni aphansi ezikoleni zakuleli izifundo ezintsha ezizogxila kwezesayensi nobuchwepheshe, iCoding and Robotics.Lezi zifundo zigunyazwe ukuthi zifundwe wumkhandlu oqinisekisa izingabunjalo lemiphumela, Umalusi.Lokhu kuvezwe nguNgqongqoshe weMfundo eyisiSekelo uNkk Angie Motshekga, ekhuluma engqungqutheleni yabeluleka ngalezi zifundo eBirchwood Hotel & OR Tambo Conference Centre, eGoli.Uthe balubuyekezile uhlelo lokufunda nokufundiswa kwalezi zifundo abebesaluvivinya bathola nezincomo emphakathini kanjalo nakuMalusi.“Lezi zifundo zizofundwa kusuka kwaGrade R kuya kwaGrade 9. Uhlelo luzoqala ngonyaka ozayo, kodwa emazingeni aphansi okwamanje, luzobe selwenabela nakwamanye amabanga.”Uthe luzogxila ezintweni zesayensi nokuxazululwa kwezinkinga ezikhona kulo mkhakha wesayensi.“Abafundi bazokwazi ukwenza izinto ezintsha, bazofunda bebe benza kanti bazobe besebenzisa nezinto ezithinta amakhomyputha,” kusho uNkk Motshekga.Uthe bazokwakha izinto besebenzisana namarobhothi, emikhakheni ehlukene ethinta ezobunjiniyela. “Lezi zifundo zizolungiselela abafundi abazokwenza imikhakha ehlukene ethinta amakhompyutha, izibalo, ezobunjiniyela, ezobuchwepheshe neminye. Zizoqinisa ukufundwa kwezinye izifundo ezivele zikhona ezifana neCreative Arts, nezinye ezithinta impilo jikelele.” Uthe kubalulekile ukuthi abafundi babe nolwazi ngezinto ezithinta ubuchwepheshe ikakhulu ngalesi sikhathi njengoba abantu abaningi sebephila ngobuchwepheshe. Ubalule nebanga elihanjiwe emkhakheni wemfundo eyisisekelo eminyakeni engu-30 edlule.Uveze ukuthi kube nezinguquko ezinqala selokhu kwatholakala inkululeko.“Sivule iminyango kwezemfundo njengoba phambilini imfundo yayihlukaniswe ngokobuhlanga. Manje kuyimpoqo ukuthi abafundi abaneminyaka engu-7, kuya ku-15 babe sezikoleni.”Ubalule nokuthi kunezinhlelo ezihlomulisa abafundi abahlwempu njengohlelo lokudla ezikoleni.“Lolu hlelo luphakela abafundi abangu-9.6 million ngosuku ezikoleni ezingu-21 274. Bangu-61 314 abaphakela abafundi abathola itoho bakwazi ukondla imindeni yabo. Uhlelo lokudla lwenza abafundi bangalovi ezikoleni futhi bathola ukudla okunazo zonke izakhamzimba.” Uveze ukuthi basebenza ngamandla ukuqala uhlelo lokuthi kube nesidlo sasekuseni nsuku zonke ezikoleni.Ubalule nohlelo lwezikole kuzona okungakhokhwa nhlobo imali yokufunda.“Sinyukile isibalo sezikole okungakhokhwa nhlobo kuzona  njengoba zingu-80% kuleli. Lokhu kwenza ukuthi nabahlwempu bakwazi ukuthola imfundo.” Ukhale ngezinselelo ezisekhona kwezemfundo ukungaphephi ezikoleni, izidakamizwa kanjalo nodlame ezikoleni.Ubalule ukuthi sebefake ugesi ezikoleni eziningi selokhu izwe lakhululeka.Uthe njengoba kuzoba nokhetho kubalulekile ukuthi abantu bavote.

ZIYANDA izinkinga kuMasipala weTheku njengoba enye inyunyana yabasebenzi enamalungu kuwona isiqale uhlelo lokuhlola ukuthi ngabe amalungu ayo ayafuna yini ukuya esitelekeni noma cha.Inyunyana yabasebenzi i-Municipal and Allied Trade Union of SA (MATUSA), ithi inesitifiketi esigunyazayo ukuthi ingaya esitelekeni uma umqashi engagobi uphondo.Mayelana nodaba lokuthi ifuna abasebenzi bakulo masipala abasesigabeni  ucategory 10, bahole iholo elilingana nelabanye abasebenzi bakwabanye omasipala abangama-Metro, okuyinto ebifunwa yinyunyana iSA Municipal Workers Union (SAMWU) yaze yangena esitelekeni esingavikelekile esithathe amasonto amathathu.UNobhala -Jikele wale nyunyana  uMnuz Thulani Ngwenya, uthe le nyunyana enamamalungu angaphezulu kancane kwangu-5000 kulo masipala sekunesikhathi inesitifiketi eyasithola kwiNational Bargaining Council kodwa bebesaqhubeka nezingxoxo kwaze kwaba isonto eledlule lapho ibone khona ukuthi sekumele ithathe isinyathelo esilandelayo."Ngasekupheleni kwesonto eledlule siqale uhlelo lokuthi abasebenzi abangamalungu ethu bavote basho ukuthi bayafuna yini singene esitelekeni noma cha. Uma sithola amavoti asivumelayo ukuthi singene esitelekeni sizobe sesitshela umqashi ukuthi siya esitelekeni. Okwamanje asikazi ukuthi sizoluphothula nini uhlelo lokuvota.“Okunye okusiphazamisayo ukuthi abanye babasebenzi bethu bathole izincwadi zokuqondiswa ubugwegwe ngenxa yokuthi bebengakwazi ukusebenza ngesikhathi kuqhubeka isiteleka seSAMWU, ” kusho UNgwenya.USihlalo we-IMATU eThekwini  uNksz Queen Mbatha  uthe okwamanje abakehluleki ezingxoxweni ezikhona ezingeni likazwelonke, basazoqhubeka nokukhuluma nomqashi."Isiteleka usicabanga uma izingxoxo sezihlulekile, okwamanje asikahluleki,"  kusho yena.Uthe abakuxoxa nomasipala okwabasebenzi abangamalungu abo abathole izincwadi zokumiswa nezokuthi bachaze ukuthi kungani kungamele baxoshwe."Amalungu ethu yize ebengekho esitelekeni bekunzima ukuthi asebenze ngoba abesatshiswa. Sinabo ubufakazi balokho. Njengamanje siyaxoxa nomqashi simkhombisa nobufakazi," kusho uNksz Mbatha.UNkk Gugu Sisilana okhulumela uMasipala weTheku ebuzwa ngalokhu uphendule wathi umasipala ngeke uziphendule izindaba ezithinta noma  iyiphi inyunyana yabasebenzi kwabezindaba.“ Lukhona uhlaka olusemthethweni okuyi-Bargaining Council lapho zonke izindaba zabasebenzi nezikhalo kuxoxwa ngazo khona. Umasipala uyazihlonipha lezi zinqubo futhi uzoqhubeka nokuxoxa nezinyunyana zabasebenzi kulezi zinhlaka ezaziwayo.”kusho yena.

IYAVEVA inhlangano ephakela izikole KwaZulu-Natal, ngesitatimende esenziwe nguMnyango wezeMfundo esifundazweni sokuthi ibona okumele bazinuke amakhwapha ngokungakhokhelwa ngesikhathi ngenxa yokuthi eminye imininingwane ayifiki ngesikhathi emnyangweni.Le nhlangano ithi ngamampunge lokhu ngoba osonkontileka bahambisa zonke izimfanelo ngesikhathi. Labo sonkontileka bakhala ngokungakhokhelwa ngesikhathi osekuphenduke insakavukela eMnyangweni wezeMfundo esifundazweni.Le nhlangano i-National School Nutrition Programme Service Providers Association (NSNP), ithe akulona iqiniso ukuthi ibona okumele bagxekwe ngokungakhokhelwa ngesikhathi.Isitatimende sayo sithe kudala ihambisa izikhalazo zayo zokungakhokhelwa ngesikhathi ekubeni imali ephuma kuzwelonke kudala yafakwa esifundazweni.Ithe nakuba lolu hlelo lwengezelwe isabelomali ngo-R19 million, okwamenyezelwa nguMphathishwa wezeziMali, uMnuz Francois Rodgers, kodwa awukho umnyakazo wokukhokhelwa ngesikhathi njengoba kuphela izinyanga imali ingafakiwe.“Abanye osonkontileka bangene shi ezikweletini. Noma singakhokhelwa kodwa kulindeleke ukuthi ukudla sikuhambise ezikoleni. Abanye sekuphele izinyanga ezintathu bengakhokhelwe okwenza bangakwazi ukukhokhela izikweletu abasuke bezenzile bethenga ukudla,” kusho isitatimende.Umholi we-ActionSA esifundazweni, uMnuz Zwakele Mncwango, uthe le nkinga engaxazululeki yenza kube nongabazane kuhulumeni ukuthi ubakhathalele abafundi abangeke badle.Uthe akuqali ukuthi kube nesimo esifuze lesi njengoba nanyakenye kwaba nenhlekelele abafundi bangadla.“Sambhalela ngoJulayi uMphathiswa wezeMfundo, uMnuz Sipho Hlomuka, sifuna incazelo mayelana nokubambezeleka ekukhokhelweni kosonkontileka, wasishaya indiva. Kucacile ukuthi uhulumeni wesifundazwe ohlanganisa i-ANC, IFP, DA ne-NFP uyahluleka ukubhekela abafundi,” kusho uMncwango. Umnyango usuke wayiveza eyokuthi ukufakwa izikhawu kwemali yawo kwenza ungakwazi ukuhlangabezana nezinye izidingo okubalwa ukukhokhelwa kwabenza imisebenzi nalo mnyango ngesikhathi.Okhulumela umnyango, uMnuz Muzi Mahlambi, uthe bayaxoxa nenhlangano emele abaphakela izikole mayelana nokukhokhelwa.Uthe akubona bonke abangakhokhelwe njengoba ezinye izizathu zidalwa ngukuthi abakazilethi ezinye izimfanelo ngesikhathi.“Abanye uthola ukuthi othishanhloko besuke bechitha ukuthi izinto ezithile zilethwe bese kuba nokubambezeleka. Siyangenelela singumnyango ekutheni bakhokhelwe ngokushesha. Sinethemba ukuthi bazokhokhelwa lingakapheli isonto.”

SIQALE ngegiya eliphezulu isigcawu esiqondisa ubugwegwe uMengameli wezimantshi KwaZulu-Natal, uMnuz Eric Nzimande.Isigcawu sihlelelwe ukuhlala kusukela ngoMashi 4 kuze kube nguMashi 15, nonyaka, eNkantolo yasePhoyinti eThekwini.UNzimande uthweswe amacala angu-162, awaphika wonke, okukhona awokugwazisa ngemali nangocansi abafuna izikhundla, ukugembula e-casino ngesikhathi somsebenzi namanye.IKhomishini yeziMantshi iyona eshushisa uNzimande phambi kweJaji uJeremiah Shongwe eselathatha umhlalaphansi.Ngokusho kuka-Advocate Sipikazi Poswa-Lerithole SC, ohola ithimba lekhomishini, bafuna uNzimande alahlwe ngawo wonke amacala athweswe wona.Lolu qweqwe lommeli luthi umvusi wenyamazane, uNkk Lindelwa Gumede owabika uNzimande kwikhomishini ngamacala okugwazisa ukuze ahambise igama lakhe kwiphini likaNgqogqoshe woMnyango wezobuLungiswa, uMnuz John Jeffreys, khona ezothola isikhundla sokuba yimantshi okwesikhashana.Kusolakala ukuthi uNkk Lindiwe wayencamela ukugwaza ngemali eyagcina isinguR140 000 ngoba egwema okwakufunwa uNzimande owayefuna azohlala emathangeni akhe bawotawotane, kukhulunywe ngocansi.UNkk Gumede kuthiwa wakhokha kwaguga iphakethe, kwathi esehluleka wavele wabika izinsolo ngoJulayi 2015.Kodwa ngo-2016, lo mmangali wawahoxisa amacala ayesebikwe nasemaphoyiseni ebhekiswe kuNzimande kodwa wama ekutheni akushilo esitatimendeni esifungelwe kuyiqiniso.Kuthiwa washenxa ngoba eshodelwa yimali yokuqhubeka necala. Kuvele ukuthi uphenyo olwasungulwa lwapequlula namarekhodi ezingcingo eziqoshiwe ocingweni likaNzimande noxhaxha lwama-akhawunti akhe asemabhange okuthiwa wayefakelwa khona imali ayegwazelwa ngayo abafuna izikhundla.UNzimande usolwa ngokuthi wayenabantu ababezwa ngaye, bemkhokhela imali, kuthi ogolozayo abukaniswe nabanye abasebenzi esidlangalaleni. Laba ababizwe ngobhululu bakaNzimande kuthiwa babesentendeni yesandla sakhe, besebenza umathanda ngisho ungafaka icala ngabo, babengathintwa.UNzimande akavumanga ukuya phansi engandlalelwe njengoba ekhulume ngomlomo wommeli wakhe, uMnuz Ravindra Maniklall, wathi uyabhecwa, kuhlaselwa isithunzi sakhe nesezobulungiswa.Uthe kwaphulwa umthetho kupeqululwa amarekhodi ocingweni lakhe nawasemabhange yize uNkk Gumede ayesewahoxisile amacala.UNzimande ulandise wathi uNkk Gumede wadinwa ukuthi wachithwa nguJeffreys ekutheni aqhubeke abambe isikhundla semantshi, wase esola yena ukuthi wamnyundela.Uqhube wathi uzofakaza uma edingeka futhi nabantu okuthiwa wabagwazisa bayakweshwama okushiwoyo ngabo ngaye.Kulindeleke ukuthi uShongwe abize ufakazi wokuqala walesi sigcawu.

SESENYUKELE kubantu abangu-1 044 isibalo sabantu abahaqwe isifo samehlo uphenyane KwaZulu-Natal.Izibalo zakamuva ezikhishwe wuMnyango wezeMpilo KwaZulu-Natal zikhombisa ukuthi kusukela ngeSonto, bese zingu-1 044 iziguli ezihaqwe ilesi sifo.Izimpawu zaso zihlanganisa ukuvuvukala kolwelwesi lweso, ukukhala kweso nokuluma kwalo. Kulezi ziguli umnyango, uthe ezine  zihlala ezindaweni ezingaphansi kukaMasipala Ugu ezingu-1 040 zihlala eThekwini.Lesi sitatimende siqhuba sithi uMphathiswa walo mnyango, uNkk Nomagugu Simelane, unxusa abantu abazibona benezimpawu zalesi sifo ukuthi bavakashele emtholampilo noma kudokotela ngokushesha. "Umnyango unohlelo oluqhubekayo lokufundisa umphakathi usebenzisa izinkundla ezehlukene zokuxhumana nemithombo yezindaba. Indlela yokusigwema ukugeza izandla nokuthi abanaso bagweme ukuhlala nabanye abantu noma bafake izinto ezivikela amehlo," kusho isitatimende.

IQEMBU elisha, uMkhonto weSizwe, lithi kalisahlehli esinqumeni salo njengoba owayengumengameli, uJacob Zuma, ephezulu ohlwini lwalo, lifuna abuyele aphathe izwe.Amaqembu ezepolitiki amatasa alungiselela ukhetho lukazwelonke oluzoba ngoMeyi 29, nonyaka. Inhlangano yokhetho i-IEC ngoLwesihlanu, ivalile ukwemukela uhlu lwabazomela amaqembu ePhalamende.Uhlu lwamalungu e-ANC luputshukile, kuthe kusabatshazwa lona kwavela nolweMK ehlasela ngoZuma phezulu eqhulwini.UMkhonto weSizwe yiqembu elimenyezelwe ngoDisemba nyakenye, lapho uZuma aphumela khona obala ethi uyaleseka, akasayingeni eye-ANC. Kunengqinamba yokuthi uZuma uke walahlwa yicala kanti i-IEC ayibemukeli abantu abanjalo ohlwini.Kuphinde kube nemibuzo yokuthi njengoba eke waba wumengameli usazokwazi yini ukuphinda angenele umbango wesikhundla esebuya ngelinye iqembu?Okhulumela uMkhonto weSizwe, uMnuz uNhlamulo Ndhlela, uxoxe neSolezwe ngohlu lwabo lwasePhalamende olusabalele ezinkundleni zokuxhumana. Uhlu lukhomba uZuma phezulu eqhulwini, alanywe nguMnuz Jabulani Khumalo olele isibili.Uthe bazolwa banqumuke izindla impela akusajiki, uZuma kufanele abe wumengameli uma benqoba. Sekuvele kuqalile ukusabalala izithombe zikaZuma njengokunguyena owubuso beMK.UNdhlela uthe bakhathezekile ngokuthi uhlu lwabo luputshukile futhi basafuna ukubheka ukuthi yilona ngqo yini. Uthe kuyiqiniso ukuthi uZuma uphezulu ohlwini lwabo futhi kufanele abe wumengameli wezwe.“Uzoba wubuso esizokhankasa ngabo futhi wuyena esihlasela ngaye kwesikamengameli. Indaba yerekhodi lobugebengu ayikho ngoba kwakungelona icala lobugebengu kodwa kwakuyicala lombango. UZuma akaze avele enkantolo yemantshi noma enkantolo enkulu alahlwe yicala,’’ kusho uNdhlela.Ungoti wezomthetho uMnuz Mpumelelo Zikalala onguMqondisi weZikalala Attorneys, uthe awekho nakancane amathuba okuthi abeMK banqobe noma bengaya enkantolo ngalolu daba. “I-IEC yiyona enamandla okumchitha uZuma ngenxa yokuthi walahlwa yicala. Umthetho uthi uma umuntu walahlwa yicala wagwetshwa izinyanga ezingu-12 enganikiwe nethuba lolukhokha inhlawulo, ngeke aye ePhalamende. UZuma wagwetshwa izinyanga ezingu-15 futhi wayengeke asidonse isigwebo uma engatholwanga enecala,’’ kusho uZikalala.Uthe uZuma akanalo ithuba lokungena ePhalamede futhi lokho kucace bha, kungenzeka ukuthi basebenzisa igama lakhe nje ngoba ewumuntu onodumo kwezepolitiki.Ngokuvamile uma iqembu lididiyela uhlu lwasePhalamende, lowo abahlasela ngaye kwesikamengameli uba ngowokuqala ohlwini. Abanye abaqaphelekayo ohlwini nguMnuz Des Van Rooyen wodumo lwesikhundla sikangqongqoshe wezeziMali owafakwa wakhishwa.UVan Rooyen ungunombolo 12 ohlwini kanti kuvela negama lendodakazi kaZuma, uDuduzile. Kuvela negama likaMnuz Phumlani Mfeka wodumo lwenhlangano Injeje yaBeNguni yena ongunombolo 175 ohlwini.Sebebonke bangu-200 ohlwini kanti kugqishe amagama abantu abangaziwa kahle kwezepolitiki. UNdlhela uthe baningi abantu abasebenzayo nabanamagalelo kwezepolitiki kodwa abangadumile.UNdhlela uthe iqembu lilungiselela ukwethula umhlahlandlela wokhetho ekuqaleni kuka-Ephreli, wathi bankankanya cishe umhlaka 6. Uthe ngeke kube senkundleni yezemidlallo futhi indaba yaseFNB le esabalele, ayikho. Uthe bazoqhamuka nento ehlukile nengakaze ibonakale.

UKUHLAKAZWA kwebhodi leNSFAS ebelehlulwa wumsebenzi, akufanele kube yinto eyenzeka yedlule kanjalo nje. Kufanele uhulumeni azibuze imibuzo ngokusebenza kwamabhodi ezinkampani zakhe.UDkt Blade Nzimande, uNgqongqoshe weMfundo ePhakeme, usanda kumemezela ukuthi uhlakaze ibhodi leNSFAS, ekhala ngokuthi lehlulwe wumsebenzi. I-NSFAS ingaphansi kweso lomnyango kaNzimande futhi kulindelekile ukuthi anyakaze uma esola ukuthi akuhambi kahle.Amalungu ebhodi axoshwa nje, obengusihlalo uMnuz Ernest Khosa ubesevele esulile esikhundleni sakhe. Wesula nje, uke waba sematheni ngezinsolo ezinzima. Ngaphambi kwalokho obeyisikhulu esiphezulu uMnuz Andile Nongogo, waxoshwa emuva kokusolwa ngokungahambisi kahle.Kwayena uNzimande lona ohlakaze ibhodi, uke wasoleka ngenkohlakalo kukhalwa ngokuthi kukhona imali abebuye ayiphambukise. UNzimande uyaziphika zonke izinsolo uthi futhi akayi ndawo, ngeke esule esikhundleni ngenxa yomsindo.Izinhlaka ezehlukene zimncomile uNzimande ngalokhu zithi udodile ngoba uzwe isikhalo sezitshudeni ezithwele kanzima ngenxa yeNSFAS. Izinhlangano zezitshudeni azikufihlanga ukuthi liphume nobovu futhi izitshudeni zitshakudulisa okwamathole ebona onina njengoba kuhlakazwe ibhodi leNSFAS.UNzimande uwachithe wonke amalungu ebhodi wase efaka iNSFAS ngaphansi komlawuli, lokhu kuchaza ukuthi isimo sibi impela.Into okufanele icutshungulwe kabanzi wukuthi kudalwa yini ukuthi amabhodi ezinkampani zombuso abenezinkinga? Akuqali ngeNSFAS ukuba nezinkinga kodwa zibhokile izinsolo ngezinkampani zombuso futhi yinto endala.Inkampani yezindiza kuleli iSAA, ibe sematheni isikhathi eside ibhedelwa yizinto, namanje isimo asikabi sihle nakhona kukhalwa ngebhodi. Udaba lwebhodi leSAA lwakhulunywa kakhulu ngesikhathi kuhlezi ikhomishini eyayiphenya ukulawulwa kombuso yidlanzana.IPrasa ingenye yezinkampani kahulumeni eke yaba nezinkinga ezifanayo kukhalwa ngebhodi layo. Nayo iPrasa yavela phambi kwekhomishini lapho yayiphenywa futhi kusolwa ibhodi ngokungahambisi kahle izinto.IDenel ibibhekene nenkinga efanayo nakhona kukhalwa ngamalungu ebhodi, kuthiwa ayebuye angahambisi izinto ngendlela.IPosi libhekene nezinkinga zezimali nakhona bekukhonjwa ibhodi lakhona ngokuthi alizihambisi kahle izinto.I-Eskom ihlaselwe yizinkinga namanje futhi udaba lwebhodi layo lukhulunywe kakhulu nayo le nkampani yakhonjwa kakhulu ngesikhathi kuhleli ikhomishini eyayiphenya ngokulawulwa kombuso yidlanzana.NaseTransnet wutwayi olufanayo nakhona, balwenwaya luvumbuke kanti kunenkombankombane nakhona kukhalwa ngebhodi. Zonke lezi zinkampani zisolwa ngokuba yizizinda zenkohlakalo yamathenda nokuyinto ebuyela kukho ukungasebenzi kahle kwamabhodi.Izinkampani zikahulumeni zihlala zitakulwa ngokunikezwa imali njalo nje uma sezicwile ezikweletwini futhi zingasakwazi ukusebenza kahle. Kwesinye isikhathi kuze kudilizwe nabasebenzi.Aqokwa kanjani amabhodi ezinkampani zombuso ?Izinkampani zombuso zingaphansi kweminyango kahulumeni eyelusa ukusebenza kwazo. Ungqongqoshe unamandla okuqoka, nokudiliza ibhodi futhi lokhu ukudingida nekhabhinethi kube yiyona ephasisayo.Kuyaziwa kodwa ukuthi inhlangano ebusayo ivamile ukuba nezwi ekuqokweni kwabantu ngoba yazivumela yona ukuthi iyawubeka umbono, iphakamise namagama abantu ebathembayo.Ibhodi uma seliqokiwe liba nomsebenzi wokwelusa ukusebenza kwenkampani liqashe isikhulu esiphezulu kube yisona esiphatha ukusebenza kwansuku zonke. Kuvamile ukuthi uma kunezinkinga kube wukuthi indaba inebhodi nesikhulu esiphezulu, abasuke behlulekile.I-DA ithi iyezwa ngesinqumo sokuhlakaza ibhodi kodwa ayigculisekile futhi ibona ukuthi uNzimande kufanele alandele ibhodi naye asule ngoba wehlulwe wumsebenzi.“Yonke le nyakanyaka idala olukhulu ungabazane ngokuphathwa kwezindaba zokuxhaswa kwezitshudeni ngemali. Ziningi izitshudeni ezisale dengwane zilambile. Bekungakuhle naye uNzimande abalandele bonke asule esikhundleni,’’ kusho iDA.I-ActionSA ikhala esifanayo neDA ithi, akuhambe uNzimande ngoba empeleni nguyena owehlulwa wumsebenzi.“Ukwesula kwebhodi akuchazi ukuthi seliphunyilile ekutheni liphendule ngezenzo zalo ngoba udaba lusaphenywa amaphoyisa. Siyanxusa nokuthi uNgqongqoshe uNzimande ahoxe esikhundleni,’’ kusho i-ActionSA.I-SACP ebuye ibe yikhaya likaNzimande, ithe iyasemukela isinqumo sakhe sokuhlakaza ibhodi leNSFAS futhi ikubona njengesinyathelo esimqoka ekusombululeni izinkinga zezitshudeni.Kufanele uhulumeni azinuke amakhwapha ngendlela okuqokwa ngayo amabhodi, nohlobo lwabantu abaqokwayo kanjalo nendlela abasebenza ngayo. Kufanele kubhekwe nokuthi yikuphi okungase kwenziwe ukuthuthukisa ukusebenza kwamabhodi.

IZOQEDA izingane ezingondingasithebeni iFundani Children’s Home, eyakhiwe ngumacaphunakusale waseThekwini, uMnuz Vivian Reddy.Leli khaya elidle uR7 million eliku-North Coast Road, eThekwini, livulwe ngokusemthethweni ngoLwesihlanu, nguReddy, iMeya yeTheku uMnuz Cyril Xaba nePhini likaNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi, uMnuz Ganief Hendricks.UReddy uthe ukusiza abantu yinto ehlale isenhliziyweni yakhe njengoba engafuni ukubona abantu bedonsa kanzima. Uthe leli khaya lisekujuleni kwenhliziyo yakhe ngoba umsunguli walo uNkk Prudence Mwandla, ngumuntu osebenza kanzima ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izintandane ziba nekusasa eliqhakazile.“Ngingusomabhizinisi okholelwa kakhulu ekubuyiseleni emphakathini ngoba ngifuna abantu baphile kahle. Kubalulekile ukuthi singalindi ukuthi uhulumeni enze yonke into kodwa nathi singosomabhizinisi, silekelele emphakathini. Leli khaya lizosusa izingane ezingondingasithebeni emgwaqweni,” kusho uReddy.Uthe iSibaya Community Trust okuyinhlangano yakhe abuyisela ngayo emphakathini, isinikelele ngo-R270 million isiza izinhlangano zomphakathi ezingaphezu kuka-200, ngezindlela ezihlukene.IMeya yeTheku, uMnuz Cyril Xaba, ithe abanye osomabhizinisi kufanele basike iphethini kuReddy, babuyisele emphakathini ukuze kunciphe igebe phakathi kwabampofu nabacebile.Uthe uhulumeni ufuna ukuqeda ubuphofu ngonyaka ka-2030, ngakho osomabhizinisi kufanele basebenzisane nohulumeni ukuletha impilo engcono kubantu.IPhini likaNgqongqoshe wezokuThuthukiswa koMphakathi, uMnuz Ganief Hendriks, lithe yize uhulumeni ekhipha izibonelelo zabampofu kodwa kubalulekile ukuthi osomabhizinisi basize.Uthe iFundani Children’s Home ngeke igcine ngokuqoqa izingane kodwa izozinika ikusasa eliqhakazile ukuze zibe yizakhamuzi ezizoletha umehluko eNingizimu Afrika.UNkk Mwandla uthe uswele amazwi okubonga kuReddy ngoba sekuphele iminyaka ewu-15 ecela uxhaso lokwakhelwa elinye ikhaya lezintandane kodwa kungekho abamsizayo.UMnuz Njabulo Mngadi (30) owakhulela eKhulani Children’s Shelter, uthe uNkk Mwandla wamsiza kakhulu njengoba weza kuleli khaya emuva kokushonelwa ngabazali.“Impilo yayinzima emuva kokushonelwa ngabazali kodwa uMam’Prudence wangithatha wangikhulisa nabanye ababesesimweni esifana nesami. Namhlanje ngiyiphoyisa, ngishadelwe ngenxa yokuqoqwa nguye. Naleli khaya lizosiza ezinye izintandane,” kusho uMngadi.
